## Source Text: unaltered below
##

GEN 1:1 Xoossay koyro salotanne sa7a medhis.
GEN 1:2 He wode sa7i giigonanne aybika bayna mela de7ees. Dhumi biitta ma77ida wolqaama haathata bolla de7ees. Xoossa Ayyaanay haathaafe bollara qaaxees.
GEN 1:3 Hessafe guye, Xoossay, “Poo7oy hano” yaagin, poo7oy hanis.
GEN 1:4 Poo7oy lo77o gididaysa Xoossay be7is; poo7uwa dhumape shaakis.
GEN 1:5 Xoossay poo7uwa, “Gallas” gidi sunthis; qassi dhumaa “Qamma” gidi sunthis. Sa7i qammis wontis; hessi koyro gallas.
GEN 1:6 Hessafe guye, Xoossay, “Bollara de7iya haatha garsan de7iya haathaafe shaakiya salo gufanthoy hano” yaagin hanis.
GEN 1:7 Xoossay salo gufantho giigisidi, salo gufanthofe bollara de7iya haatha garsan de7iya haathaafe shaakis.
GEN 1:8 Xoossay he gufanthuwa, “Salo” gidi sunthis. Sa7i qammis; wontis; hessi nam7antho gallasa.
GEN 1:9 Hessafe guye, Xoossay, “Mela bessay qoncanaada Salope garsan de7iya haathi ubbay issi bessi shiiqo” yaagin hanis.
GEN 1:10 Xoossay he mela bessaa, “Biitta” gidi sunthis; qassi issi bessan shiiqida haatha, “Abba” gidi sunthis. Yaatidi, Xoossay hessi lo77o gididaysa be7is.
GEN 1:11 Hessafe guye, Xoossay, “Biittay mithi maata doliso; zeretha ayfey de7iya kathinne zeretha ayfey giddon de7iya mithi dolo” yaagis; hessadaka hanis.
GEN 1:12 Biittay mithi maata iya qommon qommon dolisis. Xoossay hessi lo77o gididaysa be7is.
GEN 1:13 Sa7i qammis wontis; hessi heedzantho gallas.
GEN 1:14 Hessafe guye, Xoossay, “Gallasa qammafe shaakanaw poo7oti salon hano. Enti qamanne, gallas, wodenne laythi erisanaw malla gido.
GEN 1:15 Biitta bolla poo7ana mela enti salo gufanthon hano” yaagis; hessadaka hanis.
GEN 1:16 Xoossay nam7u gita poo7ota medhis. Awi gallas, ageeni qamma poo7ana mela oothis. Hessadaka Xoolintota medhis.
GEN 1:17 Xoossay enti ha sa7a bolla poo7ana mela salon wothis.
GEN 1:18 Hessi, gallasinne qamma haarana melanne poo7o dhumape shaakana melasa. Xoossay hessi lo77o gididaysa be7is.
GEN 1:19 Sa7i qammis wontis; hessi oyddantho gallas.
GEN 1:20 Hessafe guye, Xoossay, “De7oy de7iya dumma dumma medhetethati haathan daro; kafotika sa7ape bollara, salo gufanthofe garsan piradho” yaagis.
GEN 1:21 Yaatidi Xoossay abban de7iya gita do7ata, haatha giddon woxi qaaxiya medhetethata ubbaanne paalliya kafota ubbaa iya qommon qommon medhis. Xoossay hessi lo77o gididaysa be7is.
GEN 1:22 Xoossay enta, “Yeletite, darite, abba kumite, kafoti biitta bolla daro” yaagidi anjis.
GEN 1:23 Sa7i qammis wontis; hessi ichashantho gallas.
GEN 1:24 Hessafe guye, Xoossay, “De7oy de7iya medhetethati enta qommon qommon, meheta, sa7ara gooshetiya medhetethatanne do7ata enta qommon qommon biittay kesso” yaagin hanis.
GEN 1:25 Hessada oothidi enta ubbaa medhis. Xoossay hessi lo77o gididaysa be7is.
GEN 1:26 Hessafe simmin, Xoossay, “Ase nuna daanisidi ane medhoos. Enti abba moluwa, salo kafota, biitta bolla woxi qaaxiya medhetetha ubbaa haaro” yaagis.
GEN 1:27 Hessada Xoossay ase bana daanisidi medhis. I ase Xoosse daanisidi medhis; enta addenne maccas oothidi medhis.
GEN 1:28 Xoossay entana, “Yeletite, darite, sa7a kumite; haarite. Abba molo, salo kafotanne biitta bolla woxi qaaxiya, de7oy de7iya medhetetha ubbaa haarite” yaagidi anjis.
GEN 1:29 Hessafe guye, Xoossay, “Taani biitta ubbaa bolla zeretha ayfey de7iya katha ubbaanne zeretha ayfey giddon de7iya mithi ubbaa hintew immas; hessi hintew kathi gido.
GEN 1:30 Qassika ha sa7an de7iya mehenne do7a ubbaas, salo kafo ubbaasinne sa7ara gooshetiya medhetetha ubbaas miyaba gidana mela, cil7o mithinne maata immas” yaagis; hessadaka hanis.
GEN 1:31 Xoossay ba medhida ubbabaaka xeelliya wode daro lo77o gididaysa be7is. Sa7i qammis; wontis; hessi usupuntho gallas.
GEN 2:1 Salotinne sa7i entan de7iyaba ubbabay haysada medhetidi poletis.
GEN 2:2 Xoossay ba oosuwa polidi, laapuntha gallasan shempis.
GEN 2:3 Xoossay laapuntha gallasan ba oothiya oosuwa ongidi shempida gisho he gallasaa anjis; gallasatape dummayis.
GEN 2:4 Salotinne sa7i hessada hani medhetis. Godaa Xoossay sa7anne salota medhida wode,
GEN 2:5 sa7a bolla iri bukiboona gishonne oothiya asi bayna gisho mithinne maati dolibeenna; aaciyabayka baawa.
GEN 2:6 Gidoshin, sa7ape haathi pultidi, biitta ubbaa laakisees.
GEN 2:7 Hessafe guye, Godaa Xoossay biitta baanape ase medhidi iya siidhera de7o shempo punnidi gelsis. Yaatin, he addey de7ora de7iya ase gidis.
GEN 2:8 Godaa Xoossay doloha baggara Edene gannate giigisis; yan ba medhida addiya wothis.
GEN 2:9 Godaa Xoossay xeellanaw lo77iya, maanawuka mal7iya ubba qommo mithi biittafe dolisis. Gannate giddon de7o immiyanne lo77onne iita erisiya nam7u mithata wothis.
GEN 2:10 Gannate ushshiya shaafa haathay Edenepe goggees. He shaafay Edenepe keydi oyddu shaafu keyidi shaaketees.
GEN 2:11 Koyro shaafa sunthay Fisoone. Fisooney worqey de7iya Hawila biitta bolla goggees.
GEN 2:12 He biitta worqey geeshsha worqa. Qassi al7o shittoynne shuchi yan de7ees.
GEN 2:13 Nam7antho shaafa sunthay Giyoone. Giyooney Tophe biitta yuushuwan goggees.
GEN 2:14 Heedzantho shaafa sunthay Xegroosa. Xegroosi Asoorepe doloha baggara goggees. Qassi oyddantho shaafay Efraxiisa.
GEN 2:15 Godaa Xoossay asi Edene Gannate oothana melanne naagana mela iya efidi yan wothis.
GEN 2:16 Godaa Xoossay ase, “Gannate mitha teera ubbaafe neeni maanaw danda7aasa.
GEN 2:17 Shin lo77onne iita erisiya mitha ayfiyape moopa. Ayis giiko, neeni iyape mida gallas tuma hayqana” yaagidi kiittis.
GEN 2:18 Hessafe guye, Godaa Xoossay, “Addey barka de7eysi lo77o gidenna. Taani iya maaddana mela iyaw injetiya lagge medhana” yaagis.
GEN 2:19 Godaa Xoossay meheta, do7atanne salo kafota ubbaa biittafe medhis. Yaatidi, enta woygidi sunthaneko be7anaw Addaameko ehin, Addaamey de7oy de7iya medhetetha ubbaa sunthida sunthay enta sunthi gididi attis.
GEN 2:20 Hessadaka, Addaamey meheta, salo kafotanne bazzo do7ata ubbaa sunthis. Shin Addaames injetiyanne iya maaddiya laggey bentibeenna.
GEN 2:21 Hessa gisho, Godaa Xoossay Addaame wolqaama dhiskon yeggis. I dhisko hayqidashin iya miye meqethafe issuwa ekidi, he bessaa ashon kunthis.
GEN 2:22 Godaa Xoossay Addaamepe ekida meqetha macca oothidi medhis; yaatidi iyo iyako ehis.
GEN 2:23 Addaamey, “Ha meqethiya ta meqethafe, ha ashshiya ta ashope eketidaro. Iya addefe eketida gisho macca geeteto” yaagis.
GEN 2:24 Hessa gisho, asi ba aawanne ba aayiw aggidi, ba machera issife de7ees; nam7ay issi asi gidoosona.
GEN 2:25 Addaameynne Hewaanna nam7ayka xire kallo de7oosona; shin issoy issuwas yeellatokona.
GEN 3:1 Shooshi Godaa Xoossay medhida do7a ubbaafe aadhida genancho. Issi gallas shooshi maccasiw, “Xoossay tuma hintena, ‘Gannatiyan de7iya mitha ayfe ubbaafe moopite’ gidee?” yaagidi oychis.
GEN 3:2 Maccasiya shooshako, “Akay, Xoossay hessada gibeenna; nuuni gannate giddon de7iya mithata ayfe maanaw danda7oos.
GEN 3:3 Shin Xoossay nuna, ‘Gannate giddon de7iya mitha ayfe moopite, bochofite; ixiko hinte hayqana’ gis” yaagasu.
GEN 3:4 Shooshay maccasiw, “Hinte aykoka hayqeketa.
GEN 3:5 Xoossay hessa giday, he mitha ayfiya hinte miiko akeeka demmidi lo77onne iitaa Xoossada hinte eranaysa I, eriya gishosa” yaagis.
GEN 3:6 Maccasiya mitha ayfey maanaw mal7eysa, be7anaw lo77eysanne, cincatethi demmanaw amoyaba gideysa be7asu. He mitha ayfiyape ekada masu. Qassi ba azinaska immin ika mis.
GEN 3:7 Enti mi simmidi, nam7ayka akeeka demmidosona. Enti xire kallo de7eysa eridosona. Hessa gisho, balase mitha haythi sikidi dancidosona.
GEN 3:8 Sa7i omarsida wode gannate giddon Godaa Xoossay hemetishin iya girsa Addaameynne iya machiya si7idosona. Enti gannate mitha giddon Godaa Xoossafe qosetidosona.
GEN 3:9 Shin Godaa Xoossay Addaame xeegidi, “Addaame, awun de7ay?” yaagis.
GEN 3:10 Addaamey, “Gannate giddon ne girsa si7ada taani kallo de7iya gisho yayyada qosetas” yaagis.
GEN 3:11 Godaa Xoossay, “Neeni kallo de7eysa new odiday oonee? Taani nena moopa gida mitha ayfepe madiyee?” yaagidi oychis.
GEN 3:12 Addaamey, “Taara daana mela neeni immida maccasiya he mitha ayfiyape taw immin mas” yaagis.
GEN 3:13 Godaa Xoossay, maccasiw, “Neeni hessa ayis oothadii?” yaagidi oychis. Maccasiya, “Tana shooshay cimmin mas” yaagasu.
GEN 3:14 Godaa Xoossay shooshaa, “Neeni haysa oothida gisho, mehepenne do7a ubbaafe aadhada baadetidaba gida. Neeni ne ulon biittara gooshetana; ne de7o laytha ubban baana laaccana.
GEN 3:15 Taani, ne giddoninne maccase giddon, ne sheesha giddoninne I sheesha giddon morketethi wothana. I ne huuphiya qoxana, neka iya gindiya dukana” yaagis.
GEN 3:16 Maccasiw Godaa Xoossay, “Ne qanthatida ageenan daro un7etana. Neeni wolqaama waayen na7a yelana. Gidoshin, neeni ne azinaara daanaw amottana; I nena haarana” yaagis.
GEN 3:17 Godaa Xoossay Addaameko, “Neeni ne mache oda si7ida gishonne taani nena moopa gida mitha ayfiyape neeni mida gisho, biittay ne gaason baadetidaysa gido. Neeni ne de7o laytha ubban gita daabursan biitta oothada maana.
GEN 3:18 Biittay new agunthinne harme dolisana; neeni biittafe dolidi kaxiyaba maana.
GEN 3:19 Neeni ne medhetida biitta simmana gakanaw daaburan cawatada oothida ne kathi maana. Neeni biittafe medhetida gisho biitta simmana” yaagis.
GEN 3:20 Addaamey ba machiw de7oy de7iya asa ubbaas aayo gidiya gisho Hewaanno gidi sunthis.
GEN 3:21 Godaa Xoossay Addaamenne iya machiw ite giigisidi mayzis.
GEN 3:22 Godaa Xoossay, “Hiza asi lo77onne iita eron nuupe issuwada gidis. Enti banta kushiya yeddidi, de7o immiya mitha ayfiyape ekidi moonna melanne merinaw de7on doona mela teqetanaw koshshees” yaagis.
GEN 3:23 Hessa gisho, enti banta medhetida biitta oothana mela Godaa Xoossay Edene Gannatepe enta kessis.
GEN 3:24 Yaatidi, de7o immiya mithaako efiya ogiya naagana mela Kirubeela geetetiya de7o medhetethatanne shireti shireti wodhiya tama laco mashshe Edene Gannatepe doloha baggara wothis.
GEN 4:1 Addaamey ba mache Hewaannira aqis. Iya qanthatada adde na7a yelasu. “Goday tana maaddin adde na7a demmas” gada Qaayela gada sunthasu.
GEN 4:2 Iya ishaa Aabela yelasu. Aabeli dorse heemmees qassi Qaayeli biitta oothees.
GEN 4:3 Undenna wodepe guye, Qaayeli ba gaden kaxida kathaafe Godaas yarsho yarshis.
GEN 4:4 Shin Aabeli ba dorsa wudiya giddon bayra yeletidaysa shukidi iya ashuwape modho bagga yarshis. Goday Aabelanne iya yarshuwa ekis.
GEN 4:5 Shin Qaayelanne iya yarshuwa ekibeenna. Hessa gisho, Qaayeli daro yilotis; iya som7oy dhumis.
GEN 4:6 Goday Qaayelako, “Ayis yilotay? Ne som7oy ayis dhumidee?
GEN 4:7 Neeni lo77o oothidaba gidiyako, ne som7oy pashka gidennee? Shin neeni lo77o oothonna ixiko, nagari do7ada ne pengen naagees. I nena haaranaw koyees, shin neeni iya xoonanaw bessees” yaagis.
GEN 4:8 Hessafe guye, Qaayeli ba ishaa Aabelako, “Ane demba bessi boos” yaagis. Enti demban de7ishin, Qaayeli ba ishaa Aabela bolla dendidi iya wodhis.
GEN 4:9 Goday Qaayela, “Ne ishay Aabeli awunee?” yaagidi oychis. Qaayeli zaaridi, “Taani erike; ta isha naagey taneyee?” yaagis.
GEN 4:10 Goday Qaayela, “Haysa ayis oothadii? Heko, ne ishaa suuthay biittafe taako xillo pirdas waassees.
GEN 4:11 Neeni baadetidaba gidiya gisho biitta zaarada oothanaw danda7aka. Ne ishaa wodhadasa iya suuthaaka biittan gussadasa.
GEN 4:12 Neeni oothinka biittay new ayfena; bete asada neeni sa7a bolla toylattada daaburana” yaagis.
GEN 4:13 Qaayeli Godaako, “Ne ta bolla pirdida pirday ta wolqafe bolla.
GEN 4:14 Neeni tana hachi biittafe yedethaasa; ne sinthafeka haassasa. Bete asada taani sa7a bolla daaburana; tana demmiya oonika wodhana” yaagis.
GEN 4:15 Goday iya, “Nena oonika wodhenna; wodhiko, taani laapun toho halo keyana” yaagis. Hessa gisho, iya demmiya oonika wodhonna mela Goday iya bolla naagiso malla wothis.
GEN 4:16 Qaayeli Godaa sinthafe keyidi, Edene baggafe doloha baggan de7iya Nooda, biittan de7is.
GEN 4:17 Qaayeli ba machera aqis; iya qanthatada Heenoke yelasu. He wode Qaayeli katama keexidi, he katama ba na7aa sunthan “Heenoke” gidi sunthis.
GEN 4:18 Heenokey Gayda yelis. Gaydi Ma7eela yelis. Ma7eeli Matusa7eela yelis. Matusa7eeli Laameha yelis.
GEN 4:19 Laamehi Adonne Siilo geetetiya nam7u macho ekis.
GEN 4:20 Ada Yabaala yelasu. Yaabali mehe haariyanne dunkaanen de7iya asata aawa.
GEN 4:21 Iya ishaa sunthay Yubaala. Yubaali qassi diithi diixeysatanne suusul7e punniya asata ubbaa aawa.
GEN 4:22 Siila qassi Tubalqayna geetetiya na7aa yelasu. Tubalqayni naase biratapenne biratape dumma dumma miisheta qoxeysata aawa. Tubalqayna michiya Na7imo.
GEN 4:23 Issi gallas Laamehi ba macheta, “Ade, Siile, si7ite; ta macheto, taani odiyaba hayzite. Issi pantha addey tana dechidi madunxisida gisho, taani iya wodhas.
GEN 4:24 Qaayela haluwa keyanaw laapun kushe koshshiko, Laameha haluwa keyanaw laapun tammanne laapun kushe koshshees” yaagis.
GEN 4:25 Addaame machiya hara adde na7aa yelasu. Yaatada, “Qaayeli wodhida Aabela gisho Xoossay taw hara na7a immis” gada iya Seeta gada sunthasu.
GEN 4:26 Seeti adde na7a yelidi iya “Henoosa” gidi sunthis. Asay Godaa suntha xeegidi goyinno doomiday he wode.
GEN 5:1 Addaame yeletethay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa. Xoossay ase medhida gallas bana daanisidi medhis.
GEN 5:2 I addenne maccas oothi medhidi enta anjis. Enta medhidi Ase (Addaame) gidi sunthis.
GEN 5:3 Addaamey 130 laythi de7idi, bana daaniya adde na7a yelidi iya “Seeta” gidi sunthis.
GEN 5:4 Addaamey Seeta yelidaape guye 800 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 5:5 Addaamey 930 laythi de7idi hayqis.
GEN 5:6 Seeti 105 laythi de7idi Henoosa yelis.
GEN 5:7 Seeti Henoosa yelidaape guye, 807 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 5:8 Seeti 912 laythi de7idi hayqis.
GEN 5:9 Henoosi 90 laythi de7idi, Qaynana yelis.
GEN 5:10 Henoosi Qaynana yelidaape guye, 815 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 5:11 Henoosi 905 laythi de7idi hayqis.
GEN 5:12 Qaynani 70 laythi de7idi, Malal7eela yelis.
GEN 5:13 Qaynani Malal7eela yelidaape guye, 840 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 5:14 Qaynani 910 laythi de7idi hayqis.
GEN 5:15 Malal7eeli 65 laythi de7idi, Yaareda yelis.
GEN 5:16 Malal7eeli Yaareda yelidaape guye, 830 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 5:17 Malal7eeli 895 laythi de7idi hayqis.
GEN 5:18 Yaaredi 162 laythi de7idi, Heenoke yelis.
GEN 5:19 Yaaredi Heenoke yelidaape guye, 800 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 5:20 Yaaredi 962 laythi de7idi hayqis.
GEN 5:21 Heenokey 65 laythi de7idi, Matusaala yelis.
GEN 5:22 Matusaala yelidaape guye, Heenokey 300 laythi Xoosse ufaysiya de7o de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 5:23 Heenokey 365 laythi de7is.
GEN 5:24 Xoossi iya baako ekida gisho simmidi bentibeenna.
GEN 5:25 Matusaali 187 laythi de7idi, Laameha yelis.
GEN 5:26 Matusaali Laameha yelidaape guye, 782 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 5:27 Matusaali 969 laythi de7idi hayqis.
GEN 5:28 Laamehi 182 laythi de7idi, adde na7a yelis.
GEN 5:29 Yaatidi, “Ha na7ay Goday baaddida biitta bolla ha daabura ooso ubbaafe nuna shempisana” gidi iya Nohe gidi sunthis.
GEN 5:30 Laamehi Nohe yelidaape guye, 595 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 5:31 Laamehi 777 laythi de7idi hayqis.
GEN 5:32 Nohey 500 laythi de7i simmidi heedzu adde nayta Seema, Kaamanne Yaafeta yelis.
GEN 6:1 Asay sa7a bolla darida wode entaw macca nayti yeletidosona.
GEN 6:2 “Xoossaa nayta” geetetiya medhetethati he macca nayti mala lo77o gideysa be7idi entafe bantaw dooridaysata machidosona.
GEN 6:3 Goday, “Asas de7o immiya ta Ayyaanay asan merinaw deenna. Asi hayqeysa gidiya gisho, hizape iya laythay issi xeetanne laatama gidana” yaagis.
GEN 6:4 He wodenne hessafe guye, Xoossa nayti asa macca nayta ekin, nayti yeletida wode, wogga adussa asati sa7a bolla de7idosona. Enti beni wode olas minonne eretida asata.
GEN 6:5 Goday he wode sa7a bolla de7iya asa iitatethi daridaysanne enta wozanay ubba wode qopiyabay iita xalaala gididaysa
GEN 6:6 be7idi, ase ha sa7a bolla medhidaysan azzanis; ba wozanan daro qiirotis.
GEN 6:7 Taani ase ayis medhadina gada qiirotas. Hessa gisho, Goday, “Taani medhida ase, mehe, do7a, sa7ara gooshetiya medhetethatanne salo kafota sa7a bollafe dhaysana” yaagis.
GEN 6:8 Shin Nohey Godaa sinthan saba demmis.
GEN 6:9 Nohe taarkey haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa. Nohey ba wode de7iya asa giddofe Xoossaa ufaysiyanne suure asi.
GEN 6:10 Nohey Seema, Kaamanne Yaafeta geetetiya heedzu adde nayta yelis.
GEN 6:11 He wode biittay kumethi Xoossa sinthan tunis; biitta ubbay geellatethan kumis.
GEN 6:12 Xoossay ha biitta xeelliya wode sa7an de7iya asa ubbay banta ogiya tunisidi de7eysa be7is.
GEN 6:13 Hessa gisho, Xoossay Nohe haysada yaagidi kiittis; “Taani asa ubbaa dhaysana hanayis. Enta gaason biittay geellatethan kumida gisho, ase biittafe dhaysana.
GEN 6:14 Hessa gisho, mino mithafe new markabe keexa. He markabiya giddon daro qol7ata kessa. Yaatada sooranne karera made melaban meesha.
GEN 6:15 Markabiya haysada yaatada keexa; adussatethaa 300 wadha, gompaa 50 wadha, geesa 30 wadha ootha.
GEN 6:16 Markabiyas kaara medha; kaarapenne godaape giddon issi wadha gidiya bessi dooya agga. Pengiya markabiyas miye baggara kessa; markabiya heedzu pooqe kessada keexa.
GEN 6:17 “Taani salope garsan shempora de7iya medhetetha ubbaa dhaysanaw dhayo haatha yeddada ha sa7aa bolla de7iyaba ubbaa dhaysana.
GEN 6:18 Shin taani ta caaquwa neera caaqana. Neeni, ne machiw, ne adde naytanne enta macheta ekada markabiya giddo gela.
GEN 6:19 Enti neera de7on daana mela, de7oy de7iya medhetetha ubbaafe qommon qommon addenne macca nam7a nam7a oothada, markabiya giddo gelsa.
GEN 6:20 Dumma dumma qommo kafotape, dumma dumma qommo mehetapenne sa7ara gooshetiya dumma dumma qommo medhetetha ubbaafe nam7a nam7a gididi de7on daana mela neeko yo.
GEN 6:21 Qassi hintenne do7ati maanaw dumma dumma qommo miya kathi efada, markabiya giddon qola” yaagis.
GEN 6:22 Nohey ubbabaaka Xoossay kiitidaysada oothis.
GEN 7:1 Hessafe guye, Goday Nohe haysada yaagis; “Neeni ne soo asa ubbaara markabiya giddo gela. Ha wodiya yeletethaa giddon ta sheniya poliday ne xalaala gididaysa be7as.
GEN 7:2 Neeni tuna gidonna mehenne do7a ubbaafe iya qommofe qommofe addenne macca laapun laapun, tuna mehenne do7a ubbaafe iya qommofe qommofe issi addenne issi macca gelsa.
GEN 7:3 Qassi salo kafotape iya qommofe qommofe addenne macca laapun laapun oothada, biitta ubbaa bolla dumma dumma kochay de7on daana mela neera ekada gela.
GEN 7:4 Laapun gallasape guye, taani oytamu gallasinne oytamu qamma ha sa7aa bolla ira bukisana. Yaatada taani medhida medhetetha ubbaa biitta bollafe quchana” yaagis.
GEN 7:5 Yaatin, Nohey Goday iya kiitida ubbaba oothis.
GEN 7:6 Dhayo haathay ha sa7aa bolla yida wode Nohes laythi usupun xeeta.
GEN 7:7 Nohey, iya adde nayti, iya machiyanne iya nayta macheti dhayo haathaafe attanaw markabiya giddo gelidosona.
GEN 7:8 Tuna gidonna mehepenne do7ape, tuna mehepenne do7ape kafotapenne biittara goosheteyisata ubbaafe
GEN 7:9 Xoossay Nohe kiitidaysada addenne maccas nam7a nam7a gididi, Noheko markabiya giddo gelidosona.
GEN 7:10 Laapun gallasape guye, dhayo haathay ha sa7a bolla yis.
GEN 7:11 Nohey usupun xeetu laythi de7in, nam7antho ageenan, tammanne laapuntha gallasan, biitta giddon de7iya gita ciimmuwa pulto ubbay dhuuqi aggis. Salon de7iya haatha maskooteti dooyetidosona.
GEN 7:12 Iray ha sa7aa bolla oytamu gallasinne oytamu qamma bukis.
GEN 7:13 Iri buka doomida gallas Noheynne iya machiya, iya adde nayti, Seemi, Kaaminne Yaafeti, iya nayta heedzata macheti issife markabiya giddo gelidosona.
GEN 7:14 Do7a ubbaafe ba qommon qommon, mehe ubbaafe ba qommon qommon, biittara gooshetiya ubbaafe ba qommon qommon, kafo ubbaafe ba qommon qommon entara issife gelidosona.
GEN 7:15 Shempora de7eysati ubbay nam7a nam7a gididi Noheko markabiyan gelidosona.
GEN 7:16 Xoossay Nohe kiitidaysada, medhetetha ubbaafe addenne macca gididi markabiya giddo gelin Nohepe guyera Goday markabiya pengiya gordis.
GEN 7:17 Dhayo haathay oytamu gallas sa7a bolla bukishe de7is. Haathay daridi markabiya biittafe pude denthis.
GEN 7:18 Haathay biitta bolla keehi darin, markabey haatha bolla tooketis.
GEN 7:19 Salope garsan de7iya zumati ubbay mitettana gakanaw haathay sa7a bolla keehi daris.
GEN 7:20 Haathay zumata xeerape aadhidi, tammanne ichashu wadha gakanaw diccis.
GEN 7:21 Yaatin sa7a bolla woxi qaaxiya medhetethati ubbay, kafoti, mehey, do7inne, asi ubbay hayqis.
GEN 7:22 Biitta bolla de7iya ba siidhera de7o shempo shempiya ubbayka hayqis.
GEN 7:23 Sa7a bolla de7oy de7iya ubbay, asay, mehey, do7aynne salo kafoti ubbay sa7ape qushetidosona. Noheynne iyara markabiya giddon de7eyisata xalaali attidosona.
GEN 7:24 He haathay pacconna xeetanne ishatamu gallas sa7a bolla gam7is.
GEN 8:1 Shin Xoossay Nohe, iyara markabiya giddon de7iya do7a ubbaanne mehe ubbaa qopidi sa7a bolla carko carkisin he haathay wodhi wodhi bis.
GEN 8:2 Qassi biitta giddon de7iya ciimmuwa pultoynne salon de7iya haatha maskooteti gordetidosona; irayka salon teqetis.
GEN 8:3 Yaanin, haathay xeetanne ishatamu gallas gakanaw wodhi wodhi bis.
GEN 8:4 Haathay wodhin laapuntha ageenan, tammanne laapuntha gallasan markabey Araraate zumata bolla uttis.
GEN 8:5 Haathay tammantha ageena gakanaw wodhi wodhi bis. Tammantho ageenas koyro gallas zumata xeerati bentidosona.
GEN 8:6 Oytamu gallasape guye, Nohey ba keexida markabiya maskootiya
GEN 8:7 dooyidi issi quuro kare yeddin quuroy haathay biitta bollafe melana gakanaw, yaanne haanne piradhishe gam7is.
GEN 8:8 Qassi Nohey haathay biitta bollafe wodhi wuridaako be7anaw issi holle kare yeddis.
GEN 8:9 Shin he holliya haathay biitta ubbaa bolla ha7ika de7iya gisho, shempiya bessi demmabuku. Hessa gisho, simmada, markabiyako yin, Nohey ba kushiya yeddidi, baako markabiya giddo ekis.
GEN 8:10 Hessafe guye, laapun gallas gam7idi, holliw zaaridi yeddis.
GEN 8:11 He holliya sa7i omarsiya wode iyako simmada yashe shamaho aacape duuthida irxa haythi ba doonan saxa ekada yasu. Yaatin, haathay biitta bollafe wodhidaysa Nohey eris.
GEN 8:12 Qassi Nohey hara laapun gallas gam7idi, he holliw zaaridi yeddis. Shin he holliya iyako simmada yabuuku.
GEN 8:13 Nohey usupun xeetanne issi laythi de7in, koyro ageenan koyro gallas, haathay biitta bollafe xiz7is. Nohey markabiya kamaa qaari xeellidi, biittay xiz7idaysa be7is.
GEN 8:14 Nam7antho ageenan laatamanne laapuntha gallasan, biittay kumethi melis.
GEN 8:15 Xoossay he wode Nohe haysada yaagidi kiittis;
GEN 8:16 “Neeni, ne machiw, ne adde naytanne ne nayta macheta ekada markabiya giddofe keya.
GEN 8:17 Enti yeletidi, darana mela de7oy de7iya medhetetha ubbaafe neera de7eyisata kafota, meheta, do7atanne biittara gooshetiya ubbaa neera kessa” yaagis.
GEN 8:18 Yaatin Nohey ba adde naytara, ba macheranne ba nayta machetara markabiya giddofe keyis.
GEN 8:19 Yaanin, meheynne do7ay, sa7ara gooshetiya medhetethay, kafoynne sa7a bolla woxi qaaxiyaba ubbay ba qommuwan qommuwan markabiya giddofe keyidosona.
GEN 8:20 Hessafe guye, Nohey Godaas yarsho bessi gimbidi tuna gidonna mehenne do7a ubbaafe, tuna gidonna kafo ubbaafe ekidi, giigisida bessan yarsho oothidi xuuggis.
GEN 8:21 Yaatin, Goday he yarshuwa peenuwa singidi, ba wozanan haysada yaagis; “Na7atethafe doomidi asi wozanan qopiyaba ubbay iita gidikoka taani asa qoho gisho gada nam7antho ha sa7aa baaddike. Qassi taani ha7i oothidaysada de7oy de7iya medhetetha ubbaa nam7antho dhaysike.
GEN 8:22 Ha biittay de7ida wode ubban, zeriya wodeynne cakiya wodey, meegoyinne hombey, boneynne balgoy, gallasinne qammi ubba wode daana” yaagis.
GEN 9:1 Xoossay Nohenne iya adde nayta haysada yaagidi anjis; “Yeletite, darite, sa7a ubbaa kumite.
GEN 9:2 Sa7aa do7ati, salo kafoti, biittan woxi qaaxiyabaynne abban de7iya moloti ubbay hintew yashshaninne dagaman de7o. Enti hintew haareto.
GEN 9:3 Taani doliya dumma dumma cil7obata hintew immidaysada, de7oy de7iya woxi qaaxiya medhetetha ubbay hintew kathi gidana mela immas.
GEN 9:4 Shin shempoy giddon de7iya gisho suuthi iya giddon de7iya asho moopite.
GEN 9:5 Oonika shempo wodhiday pirdetana. Qassi asa suuthi gussiya do7aka hayqon pirdana.
GEN 9:6 Xoossay ase bana daanisidi medhida gisho, asa suuthi gussiya oona gidikoka iya suuthayka asa kushen gukana.
GEN 9:7 Hinte yeletite, darite, hinte sheeshayka sa7a bolla daro” yaagis.
GEN 9:8 Hessafe guye, Xoossay Nohenne iyara de7iya iya adde nayta haysada yaagis;
GEN 9:9 “Hiza, taani ta caaquwa hintera, hinte sheesharanne de7oy de7iya medhetetha ubbaara caaqayis.
GEN 9:10 Taani ta caaquwa kafotara, mehiyara, sa7a do7a ubbaaranne, markabiyape hintera keyida, de7oy de7iya medhetetha ubbara caaqayis.
GEN 9:11 Taani hintera caaqidaysa mela hizape de7oy de7iya medhetethati dhayo haathan dhayokona; ha sa7aaka zaari dhayo haathi dhaysena” yaagis.
GEN 9:12 Qassika Xoossay, “Taani taapenne hintefe, de7oy de7iya medhetetha ubbaafe giddon caaqiya caaquwa mallay haysa;
GEN 9:13 Taani ta zuulla shaaran essas. I taapenne sa7a bolla de7iya medhetetha giddon de7iya caaquwas malla gidana.
GEN 9:14 Ta saluwa shaara mayzida wodenne shaaran zuulli eqida wode,
GEN 9:15 taapenne hintefe giddon, de7oy de7iya dumma dumma medhetetha ubbaafe giddon caaqida ta caaquwa akeekana. De7oy de7iya medhetetha ubbaa dhaysanaw hizape guye dhayo haathi yeenna.
GEN 9:16 Zuulli shaaran eqida wode ta iya be7ada taapenne sa7a bolla de7iya dumma dumma medhetetha ubbaafe giddon caaqida merina caaquwa akeekana” yaagis.
GEN 9:17 Xoossay Nohe, “Taani taapenne sa7a bolla de7oy de7iyaba ubbaafe giddon caaqida caaquwa mallay haysa” yaagis.
GEN 9:18 Markabiyape keyida Nohe adde nayti Seema, Kaamanne Yaafeta; Kaami Kanaane aawa.
GEN 9:19 Ha heedzati Nohe nayta; sa7a ubban de7iya asay entafe yeletidosona.
GEN 9:20 Nohey goshshancho; I woyne tokethan koyro asi.
GEN 9:21 Issi gallas Nohey he woyniyape uyidi mathotidi ba dunkaaniya giddon xire kallo zin7is.
GEN 9:22 Kanaane aawa Kaami ba aawa kalluwa be7idi, kare keyidi, ba nam7u ishatas odis.
GEN 9:23 Shin Seeminne Yaafeti afila ekidi, nam7ayka banta hashiyara hashiyara gathi oykidi, guye guthu hemeti gelidi, banta aawa kalluwa kammidosona. Enti banta aawa kalluwa be7oona mela banta ayfiya haraso zaaridosona.
GEN 9:24 Nohey mathoy aadhin, barkidi, iya kaalo na7ay oothidaba eris.
GEN 9:25 Nohey iyako, “Kanaaney baadetidaba gido! I ba ishatas wursetha aylle gido” yaagis.
GEN 9:26 Qassika Nohey, “Goday, Seema Xoossay galatetto! Kanaaney Seema aylle gido;
GEN 9:27 Xoossay Yaafeta biitta aasso. Yaafeta sheeshay Seema sheeshara wolla de7onna; Kanaaney Yaafeta aylle gido” yaagis.
GEN 9:28 Dhayo haathaafe guye, Nohey heedzu xeetanne ishatamu laythi de7is.
GEN 9:29 Nohey uddufun xeetanne ishatamu laythi de7idi hayqis.
GEN 10:1 Nohe nayta, Seema, Kaamanne Yaafeta yeletethay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa. Dhayo haathaafe guye, entaw adde nayti yeletidosona.
GEN 10:2 Yaafeta adde nayti, Gomera, Maagoge, Madaya, Yawaana, Tubaala, Mosahanne Tirasa.
GEN 10:3 Gomera adde nayti, Askanaaza, Irfatanne Togarma.
GEN 10:4 Yawaana adde nayti, Elisha, Tarsesa, Kiximanne Rooda.
GEN 10:5 Haysati Yuushoy abban teqetida biittan de7iya Yaafeta sheeshatas mayzata. Enti banta biittan biittan, banta doonan doonaninne banta kawotethan kawotethan shaaketidi de7iya dereta.
GEN 10:6 Kaama adde nayti, Kuusha, Gibxe, Liibenne Kanaane.
GEN 10:7 Kuusha adde nayti, Saaba, Hawila, Saabita, Ra7imanne Sabtaka. Ra7ime adde nayti; Saabanne Dedaana.
GEN 10:8 Kuushi Namiruude yelis; Namiruudey ha sa7an koyro wolqaama olancho gidis.
GEN 10:9 Godaa maaden wolqaama shankancho gidis. Asay, “Namiruudeda Goday nena wolqaama shankancho kesso” gidi anjey hessa gishosa.
GEN 10:10 Iya kawotethaas koyro katamati Sana7oora biittan de7iya Babiloone, Ereka, Arkadanne Kaline.
GEN 10:11 I he biittafe Asoore bidi, Nanawe, Rehobootanne Kalaha keexis.
GEN 10:12 Qassi Nanawepenne Kalaha katamaape giddon Reseena keexis.
GEN 10:13 Mixiraymi, Luudeta, Anamimeta, Lahabeta, Naftuheta,
GEN 10:14 Patroosatanne Filisxeeme kochaa yelida Kasluheematanne Qaftooreta mayza.
GEN 10:15 Kanaaney ba bayra na7a Sidoonanne Heeta yelis.
GEN 10:16 Qassi Kanaane sheeshati Yaabuseta, Amooreta, Gergeseta,
GEN 10:17 Hiweta, Arketa, Siinata,
GEN 10:18 Arwaadeta, Xamaaratanne Hamaatata yelis. Hessafe guye, Kanaane sheeshati dumma dumma bessi laaletidosona.
GEN 10:19 Kanaane biitta zaway Sidoonape doomidi, Garaaranne Gaazara gakidi, Soodomenne Gamoora, Adaamanne Xaboyma bidi, Lasha7a gaki eqis.
GEN 10:20 Haysati Kaama sheeshata; entaw dumma dumma dooni, dumma dumma biittinne dumma dumma kawotethi de7ees.
GEN 10:21 Seemas nayti yeletidosona. I Yaafetas bayra ishanne Eboora nayta ubbaas mayza.
GEN 10:22 Seema adde nayti, Elama, Asoore, Arfakisaade, Luudenne Araame.
GEN 10:23 Araame adde nayti, Uxa, Hula, Geteranne Masheka.
GEN 10:24 Arfakisaadi Saala yelis. Saali Eboora yelis.
GEN 10:25 Ebooras nam7u adde nayti yeletidosona. Sa7an de7iya asay iya wode shaaketida gisho issuwa Pelega gidi sunthis. Iya ishaa sunthay Yoqxaana.
GEN 10:26 Yoqxaana sheeshati haysata. Entika Almodaada, Salefa, Hasermoota, Yaraha,
GEN 10:27 Hadoraama, Uzaala, Diqila,
GEN 10:28 Obaala, Abmaala, Saaba,
GEN 10:29 Ofira, Hawilanne Yobaaba. Haysati ubbay Yoqxaana sheeshata.
GEN 10:30 Enti de7ida heeray Meesape bidi doloha baggara de7iya derey dariya Safaara biitta gakees.
GEN 10:31 Haysati ubbay Seema sheeshata; entaw dumma dumma dooni, dumma dumma biittinne dumma dumma kawotethi de7ees.
GEN 10:32 Haysati ubbay banta sheeshan sheeshaninne banta kawotethan kawotethan xaafetida Nohe nayta. Dhayo haathaafe guye kawotethati haysatape sa7a ubbaa laaletidosona.
GEN 11:1 Sa7a bolla de7iya asi ubbay koyro issi doonan odetees.
GEN 11:2 Enti doloha baggafe dendidi bida wode Sana7oora biittan demba bessi demmidi yan uttidosona.
GEN 11:3 Enti issoy issuwako, “Haa yiite, xuube medhidi, minnana mela taman xuuggoos” yaagidosona. Enti shucha gisho xuube, urqa gisho made melaba,
GEN 11:4 ekidi, “Haa yiite, nu sunthaa xeegisanawunne qassi nuuni ha sa7a bolla laaletonna attana mela issi gita katamaanne xeeray salo gakiya pooqe keexoos” yaagidosona.
GEN 11:5 Shin Goday asati keexida gita katamaanne pooqiya be7anaw duge wodhis.
GEN 11:6 Goday haysada yaagis; “Heko, enti issi asi; enti ubbayka issi doonan odetidosona. Enti ha7i haysa oothanaw doomidosona. Enti bantaw oothanaw halchidaba polonna aggokona.
GEN 11:7 Yaaniya gisho, haayite; duge wodhidi enti issoy haasayiya doona issoy eronna mela enta doona dummayos” yaagis.
GEN 11:8 Goday enta hessafe sa7a ubbaa bolla laallin, enti katama keexeysa aggaagidosona.
GEN 11:9 Goday sa7an de7iya asa doona yan buqida gisho he katamaa sunthay Babiloone geetetis. Goday enta hessafe sa7a ubbaa bolla laallis.
GEN 11:10 Seema yeletethay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa; dhayo haathaafe guye, nam7u laythi gidin, Seemas laythi xeeta gidida wode, Seemi Arfakisaade yelis.
GEN 11:11 Seemi Arfakisaade yelidaape guye, ichashu xeetu laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 11:12 Arfakisaadi 35 laythi de7idi, Salaha yelis.
GEN 11:13 Arfakisaadi Saala yelidaape guye, 403 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 11:14 Saali 30 laythi de7idi, Eboora yelis.
GEN 11:15 Saali Eboora yelidaape guye, 403 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 11:16 Eboori 34 laythi de7idi, Pelega yelis.
GEN 11:17 Eboori Pelega yelidaape guye, 430 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 11:18 Pelegi 30 laythi de7idi, Ra7a yelis.
GEN 11:19 Pelegi Ra7a yelidaape guye 209 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 11:20 Ra7i 32 laythi de7idi, Saruga yelis.
GEN 11:21 Ra7i Saruga yelidaape guye, 207 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 11:22 Sarugi 30 laythi de7idi, Nakoora yelis.
GEN 11:23 Sarugi Nakoora yelidaape guye, 200 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 11:24 Nakoori 29 laythi de7idi, Taara yelis.
GEN 11:25 Nakoori Taara yelidaape guye, 119 laythi de7is. Hara adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
GEN 11:26 Taari 70 laythi de7idi, Abrame, Nakooranne Haarane yelis.
GEN 11:27 Taara yeletethay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa; Taari Abrame, Nakooranne Haarane yelis. Yaatin Haraani Looxe yelis.
GEN 11:28 Haraani ba aaway Taari paxa de7ishin, ba yeletida Kaldaaweta biittan, gita Uure kataman hayqis.
GEN 11:29 Abrameynne Naakorey nam7ayka machidosona. Abrame mache sunthay Soora. Qassi Nakoora mache sunthay Milko. Milka Haarana na7iw; Haaraney Milkanne Yosika aawa.
GEN 11:30 Soora maynthi gidida gisho iw na7i baawa.
GEN 11:31 Taari ba na7aa Abrame, ba na7aa Haarane na7aa Looxenne, ba na7aa Abrame machiw Soora ekidi, Kanaane biitta baanaw Kaldaaweta katamaa Uurepe dendis. Shin enti Kaarane katama gakidi yan uttidosona.
GEN 11:32 Taari 205 laythi de7idi Kaaranen hayqis.
GEN 12:1 Goday Abrameko, “Ne biittafe, ne deriyape, ne soo asaape, shaaketada ta nena bessiya biitta ba.
GEN 12:2 Ta nena wolqaama dere oothana, nena ta anjana ne suntha gita kessana; ne haratas anjo gidana.
GEN 12:3 Taani nena anjeyisata anjana; nena baaddeyisata baaddana, biitta bolla de7iya dere ubbay ne gaasora anjetana” yaagis.
GEN 12:4 Hessa gisho, Abramey Xoossay iya kiitidaysada keyis. Looxey iyara issife bis. Abramey Kaaranepe keyiya wode iyaw laythi laapun tammanne ichasha.
GEN 12:5 Abramey ba machiw Soora, ba isha na7a Looxe, Kaaranen de7ishe shiishida shaluwanne ba aylleta ubba ekidi Kanaane biitta bidi gakidosona.
GEN 12:6 Abramey Seekeman de7iya More geetetiya gita mithaako gakanaw kanthidi bis. He wode Kanaane asati he biittan de7oosona.
GEN 12:7 Xoossay Abrames yan qoncidi, “Ha biitta taani ne sheeshas immana” yaagis. Ika ba qoncida Godaas he bessan yarsho bessi giigisis.
GEN 12:8 He bessaafe dendidi Beetelepe doloha baggara de7iya zumako bis. Yan Beetele wuloha baggan, Gaye doloha baggan aggidi, ba dunkaaniya tokis; yan Godaas yarsho bessi giigisidi Godaa sunthaa xeegis.
GEN 12:9 Hessafe guye, Abramey bessafe besse aadhishe Negebe gakis.
GEN 12:10 He wode Kanaane biittan koshi keyis. Koshay minnida gisho guutha wode yan daanaw Abramey Gibxe biitta bis.
GEN 12:11 Gibxe gelanaw matiya wode Abramey ba mache Soorako, “Neeni mala lo77o gideysa taani erayis;
GEN 12:12 Gibxe asati nena be7idi, ‘Hanna iya machiw’ yaagidi tana wodhidi nena aggaagana.
GEN 12:13 Hessa gisho, ne gisho gidi taw lo77oba oothana melanne ta shempiya attana mela ‘Ta iyaw micho’ yaaga” yaagis.
GEN 12:14 Abramey Gibxe biitta gakida mela Gibxe asati Soora mala lo77o maccasi gidoysa be7idosona.
GEN 12:15 Gibxe Paarona moorinnati iyo be7idi daro nashshidi kawa Faaronas odidosona, iyoka kawa sinthe efidosona.
GEN 12:16 I gaason kawoy Abrame bonchidi mokis. Gujidika dorsata, miizata, hareta, gimaleta, adde aylletanne macca aylleta iyaw immis.
GEN 12:17 Shin Goday Abrame mache Soora gaason Gibxe kawanne iya keetha gado hargen shocis.
GEN 12:18 Hessafe guye, kawoy Abrame xeegisidi, “Ne ta bolla oothidabay haysi aybee? Iya ne macho gideysa ayis taw odabikii?
GEN 12:19 Ayis ta micho gada wordotadii? Ta iyo macho oothada ekas, shin attis; ne machiya hannashu eka ba” yaagis.
GEN 12:20 Hessafe guye, Abramenne iya machiw iyaw de7iyaba ubbara kessi yeddana mela Kawoy ba asata kiittis.
GEN 13:1 Abramey ba machiw Sooranne baw de7iyaba ubba ekidi Gibxefe Negebe mela biitta bis. Looxeyka iyara wolla bis.
GEN 13:2 Abramey he wode mehen, biraninne worqan daro duretis.
GEN 13:3 Abramey Nagebepe dendidi bessafe besse aadhishe Beetele gakanaw bis. Beetelepenne Gayepe giddon I koyro dunkaaniya tokida bessaanne
GEN 13:4 Godaas kase yarsho yarshida bessa gakidi, yan Abramey Godaa sunthaa xeegis.
GEN 13:5 Abramera wolla hemetiya Looxesika daro dorsati, deeshati, meheti, soo asatinne aylleti de7oosona.
GEN 13:6 He wode Abramesinne Looxes daro mehey de7iya gisho enti banta meheta heemmiya bessay xuummis.
GEN 13:7 Hessa gisho, Abrame meheta heemmeyisata giddoninne Looxe meheta heemmeyisata giddon kachi keyis. He wode Kanaane asatinne Parze asati he biittan de7oosona.
GEN 13:8 Hessa gisho, Abramey Looxeko, “Nuuni ishanta gidiya gisho nu giddon woyko nu meheta heemmeyisata giddon kachi daanaw bessena.
GEN 13:9 Biittay dalga gidiya gisho nu wolipe shaaketana. Ne haddirsa bagga biiko taani ushacha bagga baana; neeni ushacha bagga biiko taani haddirsa bagga baana” yaagis.
GEN 13:10 Looxey biitta yuuyi aadhidi xeelliya wode Yordaanose zangaaray, Godaa gannatiyada woyko Zo7aare baggara de7iya Gibxe biitta mela haathi kumidaysa be7is. Hessika, haniday Goday Soodomenne Gamoora geetetiya katamata dhaysanape sinthe.
GEN 13:11 Hessa gisho, Looxey Yordaanose zangaara ubba baw dooridi doloha bagga bis. Hessada hanidi issoy issuwafe shaaketidosona.
GEN 13:12 Abramey Kanaane biittan de7is. Shin Looxey Zangaaran de7iya katamata giddon Soodome matan ba dunkaaniya tokis.
GEN 13:13 He wode Soodome asay daro iitanne Godaa sinthan nagaranchota.
GEN 13:14 Looxey Abramepe shaaketidaape guye, Goday Abrameko, “Ne de7iya bessaafe pude dhoqu gada pudeha bagganne dugeha bagga, doloha bagganne wuloha bagga yedda xeella.
GEN 13:15 He neeni be7iya biitta ubba taani merinaw newunne ne sheeshas immana.
GEN 13:16 Taani ne sheesha biitta baanada darsana. Oonika biitta baana taybanaw danda7onaysada ne sheeshayka taybetenna.
GEN 13:17 Taani ha biitta new immana gisho dendada biitta adussatethaninne dalgatethan simereta.”
GEN 13:18 Hessa gisho, Abramey ba dunkaaniya shoddidi Kebroonan de7iya Mamire gita mithata matan de7anaw bis. Yan Godaas yarsho bessi giigisis.
GEN 14:1 Sana7oora kawoy Amrafeeli, Elsaare kawoy Ariyooki, Elama kawoy Kolodogomoorinne Goyma kawoy Tidaley oyddu kawotethati wolla,
GEN 14:2 ichashu kawotethatara, Soodome kawa Beraara, Gamoora kawa Bersara, Adaama kawa Sen7abera, Xiboyma kawa Sambaranne Zo7aara geetetiya Beella kawuwara oletanaw dendidosona.
GEN 14:3 Ha ichashu kawotethati issife shiiqidi Maxine Abba geetetiya Sidima zangaaran banta toora shiishidosona.
GEN 14:4 Ha kawotethati tammanne nam7u laythi Kolodogomooras haaretidosona shin tammanne heedzantho laythan iyaw kiitetonna ixidosona.
GEN 14:5 Tammanne oyddantho laythan Kolodogomoorinne iyara tobbida kawotethati banta olanchota eki bidi Raafaymeta Astarooten de7iya Qarnayman, Zuzayteta Haaman, Emimeta Sawen de7iya Qiratayman;
GEN 14:6 Qassi Hoora biitta asataka derey dariya Sayre biittan oli xoonidi, mela biitta matan de7iya Elfaraana geetetiya bessa gakanaw goodidosona.
GEN 14:7 Yaape simmidi, Qaadesa geetetiya Ayin Mispata yidosona. Amaaleqata biitta ubbanne Hazazon Tamaaren de7iya Amooreta biitta oli xoonidi oykidosona.
GEN 14:8 Hessafe guye, Soodome kawoy, Gamoora kawoy, Adaama kawoy, Zeboyma kawoy, Zo7aare geetetiya Beella kawoy dendidi Sidima zangaaran olas giigidosona.
GEN 14:9 Ha ichashu kawotethati, Elama kawara, Goyma kawara, Sana7oora kawaranne Elsaare kawara ha oyddu kawotethatara oletidosona.
GEN 14:10 He wode Sidima zangaaran madeda oykiyabati de7iya ollati de7oosona. Soodome kawoynne Gamoora kawoti olape attanaw baqatishe he ollan wullidosona. Shin hanko heedzu kawotethati zumako baqatidi attidosona.
GEN 14:11 Oyddu kawotethati Soodomeninne Gamooran de7iyaba ubba hari attoshin, enta kathaaka bonqidi efidosona.
GEN 14:12 Abrame isha na7ay Looxey Soodomen de7iya asi gidiya gisho ika baw de7iyaba ubbara di7etis.
GEN 14:13 Hessafe guye, di7eti bida asaape kessi ekida issi asi yidi hanidaba ubba Ibraawe addiya Abrahaames odis. He wode Abramey Amoore addiya Mamire gita mithata matan de7ees. Mamireynne iya ishati Eskolinne Aneeri olaa zaaranaw Abramera caaqidi uttidosona.
GEN 14:14 Abramey ba isha na7ay di7etidaysa si7ida wode ba son yeleti diccidi loohida 318 tooranchota ekidi enta geedo kaallidi Daane katama gakanaw bis.
GEN 14:15 I baara eki bida tooranchota qamma cugan cugan shaakidi morketa olidi xoonis. Damasqofe pudeha baggara de7iya Hoobe geetetiya bessi gakanaw goodis.
GEN 14:16 Yaatidi de7etidaba ubba, ba isha na7a Looxenne iyaw de7iyaba ubba, maccasaanne hara asata woossis ekis.
GEN 14:17 Abramey Kolodogomoorinne iyara tobbida kawota xoonidi simmiya wode Soodome kawoy, Kawota Zangaara geetetiya Sawe Zangaaran iya mokanaw keyis.
GEN 14:18 Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaa kahiney, Saleema kawoy Malkexaadeqi uythinne woyne ekidi yis.
GEN 14:19 I haysada Abrame anjis; “Salonne sa7a medhida, Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossay nena anjo.
GEN 14:20 Ne morketa ne kushen aathidi immida, Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossay galatetto” yaagidi anjis. Abramey ba demmidaba ubbaafe asraata kessidi Malkexaadeqas immis.
GEN 14:21 Soodome kawoy Abrameko, “Shaluwa ne ekada, asaa taw imma” yaagis.
GEN 14:22 Shin Abramey Soodome kawako, “Taani Godaas, saluwanne sa7a medhida Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossas ta kushiya denthas.
GEN 14:23 Neeni, ‘Abrame dure oothiday tana goonnaada’ hari attoshin kire woyko caamma wodoroka ekike.
GEN 14:24 Ta asati midaysafe attishin ta aybibaaka ekike. Qassi taara bida Aneeri, Askoolinne Mamirey bantana gakiyaba eko” yaagis.
GEN 15:1 Hessafe guye, Goday Abrames amuhon qoncidi, “Abrame babofa, taani new gondalle, Ne woytoy gita” yaagis.
GEN 15:2 Shin Abramey, “Abeeti Ubba Haariya Godaw, neeni immiya woytoy taw aysee? Taw yeloy baawa; buroo tana laattanay Damasqo Eli7azara gidennee?
GEN 15:3 Abramey, neeni taw yelo immaboonna gisho ta keethan de7iya ta aylley tana laattana” yaagis.
GEN 15:4 Goday iyako, “Ha aylley nena laattenna, shin ne gulbatape keyana ne na7ay nena laattana” yaagis.
GEN 15:5 Yaagi simmidi iya kare kessidi, “Pude salo xeella, neeni xoolintota paydanaw danda7iko payda, hiza ne sheeshayka hessada gidana” yaagis.
GEN 15:6 Abramey Godaa ammanis; Goday iyaw hessa xillotethi oothidi ekis.
GEN 15:7 Qassika Goday iyako, “Neeni ha biitta laattana mela Kaldaaweta biittafe Uure katamaape nena kessida Goday tana” yaagis.
GEN 15:8 Shin Abramey iyako, “Abeeti Ubba Haariya Godaw ha biitta ta laatanaysa aybin ero?” yaagis.
GEN 15:9 Goday iyako, “Heedzu laythi gidida issi ussi, issi deeshi, issi dorsenne hessadaka hollenne gorille taw ekada ya” yaagis.
GEN 15:10 Abramey hessata ubba Xoossas ehidi kafoti attishin, harata qanxidi nam7u kessi shaakidi issuwa issuwa ginan wothis.
GEN 15:11 Ankoti he ashuwa maanaw bollafe wodhidosona; shin Abramey enta goodis.
GEN 15:12 Awi wullana haniya wode Abrame wolqaama dhiskoy shoci yeggis. Daganthiya wolqaama dhumi iya bolla wodhis.
GEN 15:13 Goday Abrameko, “Ne sheeshay allaga biittan bete asi gididi daanaysa loythada era; enti aylletethan oyddu xeetu laythi naaqeti haaretana.
GEN 15:14 Shin entana aylletethan haariya deriya ta pirdana; enti he biittafe keyishe daro shalo ekidi keyana.
GEN 15:15 Nena gidiko, neeni ne mayzatako sarotethan baana. Neeni daro cimada moogetana.
GEN 15:16 Ne sheeshay buroo oyddantho yeletethan ha biitta simmana. Ayis giiko, Amooreta nagaray pirdetana likiya buroo gakibeenna” yaagis.
GEN 15:17 Awi wullin sa7i dhuma linxi gin, cooce tama cuyinne tama lacoy bentidi shaaketida ashuwa giddora aadhis.
GEN 15:18 He gallas Goday Abrames, “Gibxe shaafape doomidi Efraxiisa shaafa gakanaw de7iya biitta ubbaa taani ne sheeshas immana.
GEN 15:19 He biittay Qeenata biitta, Qenezata biitta, Qadimooneta biitta,
GEN 15:20 Hiteta biitta, Parzeta biitta, Raafaymeta biitta,
GEN 15:21 Amooreta biitta, Kanaaneta biitta, Gergeseta biittanne Yaabuseta biitta” yaagidi caaqis.
GEN 16:1 Abrame machiya Soora iyaw na7a yelabuuku. Shin iw Gibxefe yida Aggaaro geetetiya gadhindoy de7awusu.
GEN 16:2 Soora Abrameko, “Taani na7a yelonna mela Goday tana yelo diggis. Neeni bada ta ayllera aqa; taani I baggara na7a demmanekonne ooni eri” yaagasu. Abramey I qofa ekis.
GEN 16:3 Abramey Kanaane biittan tammu laythi de7idaape guye, iya machiya Soora Gibxefe yida ba aylliw Aggaaro ba azinaas macho oothada immasu.
GEN 16:4 Abramey Aggaaro ekis, iyaka qanthatasu. Iya baw qanthatidaysa erida wode ba godatiw kadhasu.
GEN 16:5 Soora Abrameko, “Ha qohuwas tana gathiday nena; taani ta aylliw new immin, iya qanthatidysa be7ada tana kadhawusu. Nebaanne tabaa Goday pirdo” yaagasu.
GEN 16:6 Abramey Soorako, “Hanno be7a ne aylliw iya ne kushena; nena lo77idaba ootha” yaagis. Hessafe guye, Soora Aggaaro un7ethin yaape keyada baqatasu.
GEN 16:7 Godaa kiitanchoy Aggaaro mela biittan, pulto haatha matan demmis; he pultoy shuura biitta efiya ogiya matan de7ees.
GEN 16:8 Kiitanchoy Aggaaro, “Soora ayllete, Aggaare, awupe yadii? Awu bay?” yaagidi oychis. Aggaara zaarada, “Taani ta godate Soorape baqatas” yaagasu.
GEN 16:9 Godaa kiitanchoy iiko, “Ne godateko simma bada iw haareta” yaagidi odis.
GEN 16:10 Gujidika Godaa kiitanchoy iiko, “Ne yeletetha oonika taybanaw danda7onnaada oothada darsana” yaagis.
GEN 16:11 Qassika Godaa kiitanchoy iyo, “Heko neeni qanthatadasa, Neeni adde na7a yelana. Xoossay ne waasuwa si7ida gisho Iya neeni Isma7eela gada sunthana
GEN 16:12 I bazzo hare mela gidana, I ba qesiya asa ubba bolla denthana, Qassi asa ubbayka banta qesiya iya bolla denthana. I ba ishata ubbara ixon de7ana” yaagis.
GEN 16:13 Aggaara baara odetida Godaa, “Neeni Tana Be7iya Xoossa” yaagada xeegasu. “Taani tana be7eysa be7as” yaagasu.
GEN 16:14 Hessafe dendoysan he pulto haathay, “Tana Be7iya De7o Xoossa Pultuwa” geetetidi xeegetis. He haatha pultoy Qaadesapenne Bareedape giddon de7ees.
GEN 16:15 Aggaara Abrames adde na7a yelasu; Abramey yeletida na7a Isma7eela gidi sunthis.
GEN 16:16 Aggaara Abrames Isma7eela yeliya wode Abrames laythi hospun tammanne usupuna.
GEN 17:1 Abrames laythi uddufun tammanne uddufuna gidiya wode, Goday iyaw qoncidi, “Taani Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossa, taw kiiteta, ta sinthan polo gida.
GEN 17:2 Ta giddoninne ne giddon de7iya caaquwa ta minthana; ne zeretha ta taybanaw danda7etonada oothana” yaagis.
GEN 17:3 Abramey ba som7uwara sa7an duge gufannin Xoossay iyako,
GEN 17:4 “Heko ta new caaqiya caaqoy haysa; ne daro kawotethatas aawa gidana.
GEN 17:5 Ta nena daro kawotethatas aawa oothana gisho hizape ne sunthay Abrame gidi xeegetenna, shin ne sunthay Abrahaame gidi xeegetana.
GEN 17:6 Taani ne yeletetha darsana, ta nena daro dere kessana, kawoti neepe keyana.
GEN 17:7 Taani newunne neepe guyen ne sheeshas Xoosse gidana mela merina caaquwa ta giddoninne ne giddon, neepe guyera yaa ne sheesha giddon, yeletethafe yeletetha gakanaw ta caaqas.
GEN 17:8 Neeni ha77i bete gidada de7iya Kanaane biitta ubba newunne neepe guyera yaa ne sheeshas merina laata gidana mela new immana; qassi taani enta Xoossa gidana” yaagis.
GEN 17:9 Qassika Xoossay Abrahaame, “Nena gidiko ta caaquwa naaga; neka neepe guyera yaa ne sheeshati, yeletethafe yeletetha gakanaw naagite.
GEN 17:10 Ta gidduwaninne ne gidduwan, neepe guyera yaa ne sheesha giddon hinte naagana caaqoy haysa; hinte gidduwan de7iya adde ubbay qaxareto.
GEN 17:11 Hinte addetetha koohuwa dookalite; hessi ta giddoninne hinte giddon de7iya caaquwas malla gidana.
GEN 17:12 Hizape yaana yeletethan adde nayti ubbay yeletida hospuntho gallasan qaxareto. Ne son yeletidaysata gidin, woyko allagape miishen shametida aylleta gidin, ne zerethafe gidonayisata dookala.
GEN 17:13 Ne son yeletidaysata gidin woyko miishen shametidaysati qaxaretanaw bessees. Haysan hinte ashuwan de7iya ta caaqoy merina caaqo gidana.
GEN 17:14 Oonika qaxaretona de7iya adde asi ubbay ta caaquwa menthida gisho ba asaape duuxo” yaagis.
GEN 17:15 Xoossay Abrahaameko, “Hizape ne mache sunthay Soora gidi xeegetofo; hachife doomidi I sunthay Saara geeteto.
GEN 17:16 Taani iyo anjana; taani iipe new adde na7a immana. Taani iyo anjana gisho iya kawotethatas aayo gidana; deriya kawoti iipe keyana” yaagis.
GEN 17:17 Abrahaamey ba som7uwara sa7an gufannidi, “Hay asaw, xeetu laytha asi na7a yelanee? Uddufun tammu laythi gidida Saarika na7a yelanee?” yaagidi ba wozanan miicis.
GEN 17:18 Abrahaamey Xoossako, “Isma7eeli tana laattana mela ne iya anjarki” yaagis.
GEN 17:19 Shin Xoossay, “Akay, ne machiya Saara new adde na7a yelana, neeni iya Yisaaqa gada sunthana. Taani iyape guyera yaa iya zerethas merina caaqo gidana mela iyara ta caaquwa caaqana.
GEN 17:20 Isma7eelaba ne tana oychida oysha si7as. Taani iyaka anjana. Ta iya ayfisana, iya yeletetha loytha darsana. I tammanne nam7u haareysatas aawa gidana. Taani iya gita kawotethi kessana.
GEN 17:21 Shin ta caaquwa wonto laythi hanoode Saara new yeliya na7a Yisaaqara caaqana” yaagis.
GEN 17:22 Xoossay Abrahaamera odetidi ongidaape guye iyape shaaketidi pude bis.
GEN 17:23 He gallas Abrahaamey ba na7a Isma7eela, ba son yeletidaysatanne ba miishen shammidaysata, ba son de7iya adde asa ubba Xoossay iya kiitidaysada qaxaris
GEN 17:24 Abrahaamey qaxaretiya wode iyaw laythi uddufun tammanne uddufuna.
GEN 17:25 Iya na7ay Isma7eeli qaxaretiya wode tammanne heedzu laytha na7a.
GEN 17:26 Abrahaameynne iya na7a Isma7eeli nam7atika he gallas qaxaretidosona.
GEN 17:27 Abrahaame son de7iya adde ubbay, iya son yeletidaysatinne miishen shammetidaysati ubbay iyara qaxaretidosona.
GEN 18:1 Abrahaamey Mamire gita mithata garsan ba dunkaaniya pengen seeta gallas uttidashin Goday iyaw qoncis.
GEN 18:2 Abrahaamey dhoqu gidi xeelliya wode iya matan eqida heedzu asata be7is. I enta be7idi entara gahetanaw ba dunkaaniya pengefe dendidi entako woxi bidi enta sinthan ziggis.
GEN 18:3 Yaani simmidi, “Abeeti ta godaw, ta ne sinthan saba demmidaba gidiko tana ne aylliya aggada aadhofa.
GEN 18:4 Guutha haathi yiiko hinte tohoy meecetiko ha mitha kuyan shempi ekite.
GEN 18:5 Hinte taako hinte aylliyako yida gisho xaalidi hinte biya bessi baana mela taani hintew miyaba ehana” yaagis. Entika, “Daro lo77o, ne gidaysada ootha” yaagidosona.
GEN 18:6 Abrahaamey ellesidi Saariko dunkaaniya giddo gelidi, “Ellesada heedzu gabate lo77o dhiille eka munuqada uythu uuka” yaagis.
GEN 18:7 Abrahaamey qassi ba meheta giddo woxi bidi lo77o buldubulda mara dooridi ba issi aylliyas immin I ellesidi shukidi giigisis.
GEN 18:8 Yaatidi Abrahaamey meqa maathinne giigisida mara ashuwa imathata sinthe aathis; enti mishin I mitha garsan enta matan eqis.
GEN 18:9 Enti Abrahaameko, “Ne machiya Saara awunee?” yaagidi oychidosona. Ika, “Hini dunkaaniya giddona” yaagis.
GEN 18:10 Goday iyako, “Wonto laythi hannoode tuma ta neeko simmana; ne machiya Saara adde na7a yelana” yaagis. Saara he wode iyape guye baggara de7iya dunkaaniya pengen eqada hessa si7awusu.
GEN 18:11 Abrahaameynne Saari banta laythan daro cimidosona. Saara na7a yeliya wodepe aadhasu.
GEN 18:12 Hessa gisho, Saara ba wozanan, “Taaninne ta goday nam7ayka cimidaape guye waanidi ha ufaysay hananee?” yaagada miicasu.
GEN 18:13 Goday Abrahaameko, “ ‘Taani cimidaape guye na7a yelane’ gada Saara ayis miicay?
GEN 18:14 Godaas danda7etonabay tuma de7iyee? Ta new gidaysada wonto laythi hannoode ta simmada yaana; he wode Saara adde na7a yelana” yaagis.
GEN 18:15 Saara yashetida gisho, “Taani miicabike” gada lahasu. Shin I, “Ne tuma miicadasa” yaagis.
GEN 18:16 Asati baanaw dendishe Soodome duge xeellidosona. Abrahaamey entana moyzanaw entara keyis.
GEN 18:17 Xoossay iyako, “ta oothanaw haniyaba Abrahaamepe qosaneyee?
GEN 18:18 Abrahaamey tuma gitanne wolqaama kawotethi gidana. Ha biitta kawotethati ubbay iyan anjetana.
GEN 18:19 Xillotethinne suure pirda oothidi Godaa ogiya naagana mela ba naytanne iyape guyera yaa ba soo asaa zorana mela taani iya dooras. Hessika, Xoossay Abrahaames immana gida ufaysa polanaasa” yaagis.
GEN 18:20 Goday Abrahaameko, “Soodome bollanne Gamoora bolla waassiya waasoy daris; enta nagarayka daro deexis.
GEN 18:21 Hessa gisho, enta oosoy enta waasuwa meleko be7anaw taani duge wodhana; qassi hessa mela iita gidonaako shaaka erana” yaagis.
GEN 18:22 Hessafe guye, nam7u asati Soodomeko simmidi bidosona, shin Abrahaamey Godaa sinthan eqidasuwan de7ees.
GEN 18:23 Abrahaamey Godaako shiiqidi, “Tuma neeni xillota iitatara issife dhaysannee?
GEN 18:24 He katamen ishatamu xillo asati de7iko ne dhaysannee? Yan de7iya ishatamu xillo asata gisho he katama ashshikii?
GEN 18:25 Hessa mela oosoy neepe haako; xilluwa iitaara woli gathada wodheysi, xilluwanne iita issi ayfiyan xeeleysi neepe haako. Ha biitta ubba pirdiya neeni xillo pirdikii?” yaagis.
GEN 18:26 Goday, “Ta Soodomen ishatamu xillota demmiyako he bessa ubba enta gisho gada ashshana” yaagis.
GEN 18:27 Abrahaamey zaaridi, “Taani biittanne bido gidada ta Godaara odetanaw minetakichas;
GEN 18:28 ishatamu xillotape ichashati pacikochii? Neeni he ichashata gisho gada he katama ubba dhaysaneyee?” yaagis. Goday, “Taani oytamanne ichashu xillota demmiko he katama dhaysike” yaagis.
GEN 18:29 Abrahaamey zaaridi, “Yan oytamu xalaali de7ikochii?” yaagis. Ika, “Oytamata gisho gada he katama dhaysike” yaagis.
GEN 18:30 Qassika Abrahaamey zaaridi, “Hay ta Godaw, tana hanqetofa, taani gujadaka odetana. Hastamu xalaali de7ikochii?” yaagis. Goday zaaridi, “Taani yan hastamu demmiko dhaysike” yaagis.
GEN 18:31 Abrahaamey, “Taani Godaara odetanaw minetakichas; ooni eri yan laatamu xalaali de7ikochi” yaagis. Godayka, “He laatamata gisho gada dhaysike” yaagis.
GEN 18:32 Abrahaamey qassika, “Hay ta Godaw, tana hanqetofa ta issi toho odetana, yan tammu xalaala demmikochii?” yaagis. Ika, “Tammata gisho gada taani he katama dhaysike” yaagis.
GEN 18:33 Goday Abrahaamera odetidi ongidaape guye bis; Abrahaameyka ba soo simmis.
GEN 19:1 Nam7u kiitanchoti omarsishin Soodome katamaa gakidosona. He wode Looxey he katamaa pengen uttis. Looxey enta be7idi mokanaw dendidi entako bis. Ba som7uwa sa7a gathidi entaw ziggis.
GEN 19:2 I entako, “Ta godato, hinte aylliya soo gelerketi, hinte tohuwa meecetidi qamma haysan aqite; wonta guura hinte biya bessi biite” yaagis. Enti, “Akay, nuuni ha katamaa dabaaban aqana” yaagidi zaaridosona.
GEN 19:3 Shin I enta minthi woossida gisho bidi iya soo gelidosona. I entaw uythi uukidi aathin midosona.
GEN 19:4 Enti zin7ana hanishin Soodome katama adde asa ubbay na7atethinne dondzi issoyka attona yidi keethaa yuuyi aadhidosona.
GEN 19:5 Enti Looxe xeegidi, “Hachi omarsi ne soo gelida adde asati awun de7oona? Nuuni entara gahetana mela enta nuuko kare kessa” yaagidosona.
GEN 19:6 Yaatin Looxey entara odetanaw kare keyishe pengiya guyera gordidi,
GEN 19:7 entako, “Ta dabboto, hayyana ha iita oosuwa oothopite.
GEN 19:8 Taw adde eronna nam7u geela7oti de7oosona. Taani enta hintew kare kessiko hinte koydaba oothite. Shin haysati ta imathe gidiya gisho ta kaarape garsan de7oosona; ha asata bolla aybibaaka oothopite” yaagis.
GEN 19:9 Asati, “Nu sinthafe gede kicha” yaagidosona. Qassi, “Ha addey baw bete asi shin, nu bolla pirdanaw koyees? Nuuni enta bolla oothanaw koyida iitaape aathidi ne bolla oothana” yaagidosona. Enti Looxe guye sugi yeggidi pengiya menthanaw shiiqidosona.
GEN 19:10 Shin nam7u asati banta kushiya kare yeddidi Looxe soo goochi gelsidi pengiya gordidosona.
GEN 19:11 Hessafe guye, enti keetha pengey de7iyasuwa demmona mela guuthafe gita gakanaw qooqisidosona.
GEN 19:12 He nam7u asati Looxeko, “New haysan adde na7i woyko macca na7i, ne macca nayta oychiday woyko hara dabboy ha kataman de7ii? De7iko entana haysafe kessa.
GEN 19:13 Ayis giiko, nu ha katama dhaysanaw hanoos. Enta bolla waassiya waasoy Godaa sinthan gita gidiya gisho ha katama dhaysana mela Goday nuna kiittis” yaagidosona.
GEN 19:14 Yaatin Looxey ba macca nayta oychidaysatako bidi, “Goday, ha katama dhaysana haniya gisho ellessidi ha bessaafe keyte” yaagis. Shin iya macca nayta oychidaysati I qelqisees gidi qopidosona.
GEN 19:15 Sa7i wontanaw gontey zo77iya wode he kiitanchoti Looxeko, “Denda, ne machiwnne haysan de7iya ne nam7u nayta ekada ellesada keya. Akay giiko, ha katamay pirdetiya wode neka dhayasa” yaagi dirgisidosona.
GEN 19:16 Shin Looxey keyanaw gam7in, Goday iyaw qadhetida gisho, he kiitanchoti iya kushiya, iya mache kushiyanne nam7u nayta kushiya oykidi he katamaape kessidosona.
GEN 19:17 Kiitanchoti enta kessida mela he kiitanchotape issoy, “Hinte shempuwa ekidi baqatite! Guye xeellofite! Ha heeran awunka eqofite! Hinte dhayona mela zamaako baqatite” yaagis.
GEN 19:18 Shin Looxey entako, “Hay ta godato, yaagopite.
GEN 19:19 Taani hinte aylley hinte sinthan saba demmida gisho tana ashshanaw taw daro qadhetideta. Shin taani zumako baqatanaw danda7ike; ha dhayoy gakidi tana dhaysana.
GEN 19:20 Heko, haysan issi katami de7ees; yaa woxidi baanaw matanne guutha katama. Ta shempuwa ashshanaw ta yaa baqato? I daro guutha katama gidennee?” yaagis.
GEN 19:21 Kiitanchoy, “Lo77o! Taani ne woosa ekas; he ne odida katamaa dhaysike.
GEN 19:22 He katamaako ellesada baqata; ne yaa gakanaw ta aybibaaka oothike” yaagis. Hessa gisho, he katamaa sunthay Zo7aare geetetis.
GEN 19:23 Looxey Zo7aare gakiya wode buroo xalqey caares.
GEN 19:24 Goday he wode salope tamanne xuuggiya diine Soodome bollanne Gamoora bolla bukisis.
GEN 19:25 Hessada oothidi Goday he katamata, heera ubba, katamatan de7iyaba ubbaa he biittan de7iya mithaanne maata dhaysis.
GEN 19:26 Shin Looxe machiya guye simma xeellada maxine shuchu gidasu.
GEN 19:27 Wontetha gallas wonta guura Abrahaamey dendidi kase I Godaa sinthan eqida bessaa bis.
GEN 19:28 I Soodomenne Gamoora, he heeran de7iya biitta ubbaa duge xeelliya wode xuussa tamada cuyay biittafe dendeysa be7is.
GEN 19:29 Xoossay he heeran de7iya katamata dhaysiya wode Abrahaame qopidi, Looxey de7iya katamata dhaysidi, Looxe dhayope ashshis.
GEN 19:30 Looxey Zo7aaren daanaw yashetida gisho, yaape dendidi ba macca nayta nam7atara zuma bolla keyis. Yan gongolo giddon ba nam7u macca naytara de7is.
GEN 19:31 Issi gallas bayra na7iya ba kaalo micheko, “Nu aaway cimis, biitta ubban de7iya wogaatho nuura aqanaw issi addey haysan baawa.
GEN 19:32 Yaaniya gisho, haaya! Nu aawa ushshu ushshidi, iyara aqidi, nu aawape nuus koche ashshos” yaagasu.
GEN 19:33 He wode qamma banta aawa ushshu ushshidosona. Bayra na7iya gelada iyara aqasu. Iya iyara aqiya wodenne dendiya wode I eribeenna.
GEN 19:34 Wontetha wode bayriya kaaliw, “Zine qamma taani ta aawara aqas; hachi qammaka iya ushshu ushshiko, neka gelada iyara aqa. Yaatidi nuuni nu aawape koche ashshos” yaagasu.
GEN 19:35 He wode qamma banta aawa ushshu ushshidosona. Kaalo na7iya gelada iyara aqasu. Ha77ika iya iyara aqiya wodenne dendiya wode I eribeenna.
GEN 19:36 Yaatidi Looxe macca nayti nam7ay banta aawape qanthatidosona.
GEN 19:37 Bayriya adde na7a yelasu; iya sunthaa Moo7abe gada sunthasu. I hachi gakanaw Moo7abeta mayza.
GEN 19:38 Kaaliyaka adde na7a yelasu; iya sunthaa Beni7aama gada sunthasu. I hachi gakanaw Amooneta mayza.
GEN 20:1 Abrahaamey Mamirepe dendidi Negebe mela biitta heera bidi Qaadesapenne Shura biittatas gidduwan de7is. Geraaranka guutha wode gam7is.
GEN 20:2 Yan de7ishe Abrahaamey ba machiw Saaro, “Iya ta michiw” yaagida gisho, Geraara kawoy Abimelekey kiittidi Saaro baako efis.
GEN 20:3 Shin Xoossay issi qamma amuhon Abimelekeko yidi, “Neeni ehida macaase gaason hayqaasa, iya azinara de7awusu” yaagis.
GEN 20:4 Hanoshin, Abimelekey iyo bochibeenna. I, “Godaw, neeni tananne ta derey qohonna de7ishin coo dhaysaneyee?
GEN 20:5 I, ‘Iya, ta micho’ gibeennee? Qassi iyaka, ‘I, ta isha’ gabikee? Taani ta wozana xillotethaninne ta kushe geeshshatethan haysa oothas” yaagis.
GEN 20:6 Xoossay amuhon iyako, “Ee, neeni ne wozana xillotethan oothidaysa ta erayis. Hessa gisho, neeni iyo bochonaadanne ta sinthan nagara oothonnaada nena taani teqas.
GEN 20:7 Ha77i ha addiya machiw zaara. I nabe gidiya gisho, new Xoossa woossiko ne attana. Shin iyo zaarona ixiko, neeninne new de7iyaba ubbay hayqanaysa era” yaagis.
GEN 20:8 Abimelekey wontetha gallas daro guura ba moorinnata baako xeegis. He hanidaba ubba entaw odin enti daro babidosona.
GEN 20:9 Yaatin Abimelekey Abrahaame xeegidi, “Neeni aybiba nu bolla oothadii? Ne ta bollanne ta kawotetha bolla haysa mela qoho ehanaw ta new ay iitaba oothadina? Neeni ta bolla oosetanaw bessonnaba oothadasa” yaagis.
GEN 20:10 Qassi Abimelekey Abrahaame, “Neeni haysa ayis oothadii?” yaagidi oychis.
GEN 20:11 Abrahaamey zaaridi, “ ‘Ha bessan Xoossas yashetiya asi bayna gishonne qassi ta mache gaason enti tana wodhana’ gada qopida gishosa.
GEN 20:12 Hessa bolla iya tumaka ta micho; iya ta aawa na7ape attishin ta aaye na7a giduku, yaaniya gisho, iya ta macho gidasu.
GEN 20:13 Xoossay tana ta aawa keethafe kessida wode taani iiko, ‘Neeni bida biitta ubban ne taw oothana keehatethay haysa; “I ta isha” gada’ oda yaagas” yaagis.
GEN 20:14 Hessafe guye, Abimelekey dorse, mehe, macca aylletanne adde aylleta kessidi Abrahaames immis; iya machiw Saaro iyaw zaaris.
GEN 20:15 Abimelekey Abrahaameko, “Heko, ta biittay haysish nena lo77oson de7a” yaagis.
GEN 20:16 Saariko, “Taani ne ishas issi mukulu bira santime immayis. Hessi neera de7iya ubba sinthan neeni xillo gideysanne aybi iitabaka oothonaysa eriseysa gido” yaagis.
GEN 20:17 Goday Abrahaame mache Saari gaason Abimeleke keetha ubba maynisida gisho Abrahaamey Xoossa woossin, Abimelekey, iya machiyanne iya macca aylleti na7a yelana mela Xoossay enta pathis.
GEN 21:1 Goday ba odidaysada Saaro anjis; ba gelida qaalaka polis.
GEN 21:2 Saara qanthatada Xoossay gida wodey gakin cimida Abrahaames adde na7a yelasu.
GEN 21:3 Abrahaamey Saara yelida na7a suntha Yisaaqa gidi sunthis.
GEN 21:4 Abrahaamey ba na7a Yisaaqa Xoossay kiitidaysada yeletida hospuntho gallasan qaxaris.
GEN 21:5 Iya na7a Yisaaqi yeletiya wode, Abrahaames laythi xeeta.
GEN 21:6 Saara, “Xoossay taw miiche immis; qassi haysa si7iya ubbay taara miicana” yaagasu.
GEN 21:7 Qassika Saara, “Saara Abrahaames na7a yelada dhanthana giday oonee? Gidikoka taani ha7i iyaw I cimida wode na7a yelas” yaagasu.
GEN 21:8 Guutha na7ay diccidi; dhanthi duuthis; Abrahaamey Yisaaqi dhanthi duuthida gallas wolqaama gibira giigisis.
GEN 21:9 Shin Gibxefe yida Aggaara Abrahaames yelida na7ay Yisaaqa toochishin Saara be7asu.
GEN 21:10 Saara Abrahaameko, “Ha aylle na7ay ta na7a Yisaaqara ubbaka laattonna gisho, gadhindiwunne I na7aa kessada goodda” yaagasu.
GEN 21:11 He oday ba na7a bochiya gisho, Abrahaamey daro metootis.
GEN 21:12 Shin Xoossay Abrahaame, “Ne kochay Yisaaqa baggara xeegetana gisho ne na7aasinne ne ayllees daro metootopa; Saara new odiyaba ubba si7a.
GEN 21:13 Qassi ika ne koche gidiya gisho aylle na7a taani iya gita dere oothana” yaagis.
GEN 21:14 Wonta guura Abrahaamey dendidi guutha kathinne koddan haathe kunthidi, Aggaaro toossidi, I na7a iyo idinthidi kessi goodis. Iya bada, Barsaabe mela biittan daaburasu.
GEN 21:15 Haathay koddaafe wurida wode iya, “Na7ay hayqishin, uttada be7ike” gada, na7a issi buure garsan yeggada, nam7u xeetu wadha gideysa mela bada utta aggasu. Yan uttada, ba qaala dhoqu oothada yeekasu.
GEN 21:17 Xoossay na7a waasuwa si7is. Xoossa kiitanchoy Aggaaro salope xeegidi, “Aggaare, waanadii? Xoossay na7a yeehuwa si7ida gisho babofa;
GEN 21:18 danda eqada, na7a denthada ne kushiyan oyka; taani iya gita dere oothana” yaagis.
GEN 21:19 Xoossay iyo haatha olla bessin, bada koddan haathe kunthada na7aa ushshasu.
GEN 21:20 Na7ay dicciya wode ubban, Xoossay iyara gidis. I mela biittan de7idi, dongen dukiya ase gidis.
GEN 21:21 I Paarana mela biittan de7ishin, iya aayiya Gibxefe iyaw macho immasu.
GEN 21:22 He wode, Abimelekey, ba toora mocona Fikoolara Abrahaameko bidi, “Neeni oothiyaba ubban Xoossay neera de7ees.
GEN 21:23 Neeni ta bolla woyko ta nayta bolla woyko ta zeretha bolla cimmada gene oothonna mela, ha7i haysan, Xoossa sinthan taw caaqa. Taani new keehidaysada, neenika taasinne neeni betetethan de7ida ha biittees keeha” yaagis.
GEN 21:24 Abrahaamey, “Taani caaqayis” yaagis.
GEN 21:25 He wode, Abrahaamey Abimeleke aylleti ekida haatha ollaba Abimelekes maggannis.
GEN 21:26 Shin Abimelekey, “Hessa ooni oothidaako taani erike. Neenika qassi taw odabaaka; taani hachi gakanaw hessa si7abike” yaagis.
GEN 21:27 Hessafe guye, Abrahaamey dorsatanne miizata ehidi, Abimelekes immin, enti nam7ay caaqidosona.
GEN 21:28 Abrahaamey laapun uzzo dorsata wudiyape shaakis;
GEN 21:29 Abimelekey Abrahaame, “Ha neeni dumma shaaka wothida laapun uzzo dorsata ayis shaakadii?” yaagidi oychis.
GEN 21:30 Abrahaamey, “Taani ha haatha olla bookidaysas marka gidana mela, ha laapun uzzo dorsata taape eka” yaagis.
GEN 21:31 Hessan he nam7u asati caaqida gisho, he bessay Barsaabe (Caaqo Haatha Olla woyko Laapun Haatha Olla).
GEN 21:32 Barsaaben caaquwa caaqidaape guye, Abimelekeynne iya toora moconay Fikooli dendidi, Filisxeeme biitta simmidosona.
GEN 21:33 Abrahaamey Barsaaben tamarsiik geetetiya mithi tokis. Hessan Godaa, Merina Xoossa xeegidi iyaw goyinnis.
GEN 21:34 Abrahaamey Filisxeeme biittan daro wode de7is.
GEN 22:1 Hessafe guye, Xoossay Abrahaame paacis; iya, “Abrahaame” yaagidi xeegis. I, “Yee” gidi koyis.
GEN 22:2 Xoossay, “Neeni dosiya ne issi na7a Yisaaqa ekada, Mooriya biitta ba. Yan taani nena bessiya issi dere bolla iya xuussa yarsho oothada taw yarsha” yaagis.
GEN 22:3 Wontetha gallas Abrahaamey guura dendidi, ba hariya caanis. Ba aylletape nam7atanne ba na7a Yisaaqa baara ekidi, xuussa yarshuwas gidiya mitha qeri ekidi, Xoossi iya bessiya bessi baanaw dendis.
GEN 22:4 Heedzantho gallas Abrahaamey dhoqu gidi, he bessa haahora be7is.
GEN 22:5 Abrahaamey ba aylleta, “Hinte hariyara haysan de7ishite. Taara ta na7aara ya bidi Xoossas goyinnidi, hinteko simmana” yaagis.
GEN 22:6 Abrahaamey yarshuwa mitha denthidi, ba na7a Yisaaqa toossis. I baw tamanne mashshe oykis. Enti nam7ay issife bishin;
GEN 22:7 Yisaaqi ba aawa Abrahaame, “Ta aawaw” yaagis. Abrahaamey, “Yee, ta na7aw” yaagis. Yisaaqi, “Tamaynne mithay haysish; shin xuussa yarsho urge dorsay awunee?” yaagis.
GEN 22:8 Yaatin Abrahaamey, “Ta na7aw, xuussa yarsho urge dorsa Xoossay baw immana” yaagis. Yaagin enti nam7ay issife bidosona.
GEN 22:9 Enti Xoossay iyaw odida bessa gakida wode, Abrahaamey yan yarsho bessi giigisidi, mithi hiixis. Ba na7a Yisaaqa qachidi, he mitha bolla zin7isis.
GEN 22:10 Abrahaamey ba na7a shukanaw ba kushiya yeddidi mashshe ekis.
GEN 22:11 Shin Godaa Kiitanchoy salope, “Abrahaame, Abrahaame” yaagidi xeegis. I, “Yee” yaagidi koyis.
GEN 22:12 Kiitanchoy, “Na7a bolla ne kushiya wothofa; iya aybibaaka oothofa. Neeni ne issi na7aa tana diggona gisho, neeni Xoossas yayyeysa taani erayis” yaagis.
GEN 22:13 Abrahaamey dhoqu gidi xeellis; heko kacey turan qaxetida issi dorsi de7eysa be7is. Abrahaamey bidi he dorsa ekidi, ba na7a bessan xuussa yarsho oothidi yarshis.
GEN 22:14 Hessa gisho, Abrahaamey, “Goday immana” gidi he bessa sunthis. Hachi gakanaw hessi, “Godaa zuma bolla imetana” geetetees.
GEN 22:15 Godaa kiitanchoy saluwape nam7antho Abrahaame xeegidi,
GEN 22:16 “Taani Goday, haysada gada taani ta huuphen new caaqayis; neeni haysa oothida gishonne ne issi na7aa tana diggona gisho,
GEN 22:17 taani nena tuma anjana. Ne zeretha taani salo xoolinto melanne abba gaxan de7iya shafe mela oothana. Ne zerethati banta morketa katamata laattana.
GEN 22:18 Neeni taw kiitetida gisho, ha sa7a kawotethati ubbay ne zeretha baggara anjetana” yaagis.
GEN 22:19 Hessafe guye, Abrahaamey ba aylletako guye simmin, enti ubbay issife Barsaabe dendidi bidosona. Abrahaamey Barsaaben de7is.
GEN 22:20 Hessafe guye, Abrahaames, “Milka ne isha Naakoras nayta yelasu;
GEN 22:21 entika bayray Uxa; Uxa ishati Buza,
GEN 22:22 Araame aawa Qameela, Kesada, Haazo, Pildasha, Yidlaafanne Batu7eela geetetoosona” yaagis.
GEN 22:23 Ha hospun nayta Milka Abrahaame isha Naakoras yelasu. Batu7eeli Irbiqa yelis.
GEN 22:24 Re7uma geetetiya iya nam7antho maccasiya qassi Xeba, Gahaama, Tahasanne Maka yelasu.
GEN 23:1 Saara xeetanne laatamanne laapun laythi de7asu.
GEN 23:2 Hessafe guye, iya Kanaane biittan de7iya Qiriyaat-Arba (Kebroona) kataman hayqasu. Abrahaamey Saaris yeekisinne kayotis.
GEN 23:3 Yeeki simmidi, Abrahaamey ba mache aha matape dendidi bidi, Hiteta haysada yaagis;
GEN 23:4 “Taani hinte giddon imathe; ta mache aha mooganaw taw hinte gadiyape duufo bessi bayzerketi” yaagis.
GEN 23:5 Hiteti Abrahaame, “Godaw, nuuni odeysa si7a; neeni nu giddon wolqaama halaqa; neeni ne mache aha nu duufuwape nena lo77idason mooga; neeni ne mache aha mooganaw ba duufuwa oonika nena diggenna” yaagi zaaridosona.
GEN 23:7 Abrahaamey dendi eqidi, Hiteta sinthan ziggis.
GEN 23:8 I entako, “Hinte tana, ‘Ne mache aha mooga’ giiko, taani giyaba si7ite. Zohaara na7a Efroonas iya gadiya gaxan de7iya Makifeela geetetiya gongoluwa ta duufo oothanaw bayzana mela kumetha gaten nuna zal7iserketi” yaagis.
GEN 23:10 Hite addiya Efrooni he wode katama pengen shiiqida ba asa giddon uttis. Hiteti ubbay si7ishin, Abrahaameko yaagis;
GEN 23:11 “Hessada gidenna; ta godaw, ta odeysa si7a; taani gadiyaka iya giddon de7iya gongoluwaka new immayis; taani new iya ta asa sinthan immayis; neeni ne mache aha mooga” yaagis.
GEN 23:12 Abrahaamey he biitta asa sinthan zaari ziggidi,
GEN 23:13 asay si7ishin Efroona, “Ta odeysa si7arki! Taani he gadiya gate qanxana; neeni taape ekarki. Hessan taani ta mache aha moogana” yaagis.
GEN 23:14 Efrooni Abrahaameko zaaridi, “Ta godaw, taani odeysa si7a; gadey oyddu xeetu bira santime kessana; shin hessi ne giddoninne ta giddon aybika gidenna; ne mache aha mooga” yaagis.
GEN 23:16 Abrahaamey Hiteti si7ishin, Efrooni gida gatiya ekis; he wode miishen oyddu xeetu bira santime Efroonas immis.
GEN 23:17 Yaati simmidi, Mamire katama matan Makifeelan de7iya Efroona gadey, yan de7iya gongoloynne he gadiyan de7iya mitha ubbay,
GEN 23:18 katama pengen shiiqida Hiteta ubba sinthan wogatho Abrahaame gade gidis.
GEN 23:19 Hessafe guye, Abrahaamey ba machiw Saara Kanaane biittan (Kebroona) geetetiya Mamire katama matan de7iya Makifeela geetetiya gade gongoluwan moogis.
GEN 23:20 Hessa gisho, he gadeynne yan de7iya gongoloy Hiteta sinthan higgiyan Abrahaames duufo gidis.
GEN 24:1 Abrahaamey daro cimis. Goday iya ubbabanka anjis.
GEN 24:2 Abrahaamey ba aylliya, ba soo asa ubbaas halaqatiya, ba aqo ubbaa bolla sunthetidaysa haysada yaagis, “Ne kushiyan ta gulbata oyka;
GEN 24:3 taani enta giddon de7ida Kanaaneta macca naytape ta na7aas macho oychonna mela, Godan, salonne sa7a Xoossa sunthan taani nena caaqisayis;
GEN 24:4 shin neeni ta yeletida biitta, ta dabbotako bada, ta na7a Yisaaqas macho oycha” yaagis.
GEN 24:5 Iya aylley, “He maccasiya taara yaanaw dosona ixiko, ne na7a neeni yida biitta guye efo?” yaagidi oychis.
GEN 24:6 Abrahaamey, “Ta na7a ay gaasonka yaa efonnaada nena era!
GEN 24:7 Goday, saluwa Xoossay, tana ta aawa soopenne ta yeletida biittafe kessidaysi taw, ‘Ne zerethas taani ha biitta immana’ yaagidi caaqidaysi, neeni ta na7aas yaape macho demmana mela, I ba kiitanchuwa neepe sinthe kiittana.
GEN 24:8 He maccasiya neera yaanaw dosona ixiko, ha taani nena caaqisida caaqoy new gome gidenna; shin ta na7a yaa ubbaka efopa” yaagis.
GEN 24:9 Aylley ba godaa Abrahaame gulbata oykis; he odaas caaqis.
GEN 24:10 Hessafe guye, aylley ba godaa gimaletape tamma ekidi, ba godaa miishiyapeka muruuta muruuta eki bidi Masephexoome biittan Nakoora katama gakis.
GEN 24:11 Omarsi, maccasi haathe tikanaw yaa wode, katamaape gaxan haatha olla matan ba gimaleta gulbatisis.
GEN 24:12 I woossishe, “Godaw, ta godaa Abrahaame Xoossaw, hachi taani qopada yidaysa taw giigisa; qassi ta godaa Abrahaames keehaba ootha.
GEN 24:13 Heko, taani ha haatha pultuwa matan eqayis; ha katama macca nayti haatha tikanaw haa yoosona.
GEN 24:14 Taani, ‘Ane otuwa ziqi oothada tana haathe ushsha’ giya wode, iya, ‘Heko uya; qassi ne gimaleta taani ushshana’ giyara, hinna ne aylliya Yisaaqas neeni dooridaro gido; neeni ta godaas keehaba oothidaysa taani hessan erana” yaagis.
GEN 24:15 Buroo I woosa zaarona de7ishin, Irbiqa haatha oto tookada puttu gasu. Iya Batu7eela na7a, Batu7eeli Milka na7a, Milka Abrahaame isha Nakoora machiw.
GEN 24:16 Irbiqii daro yegelsinne adde eronna geela7o. Pultuwa duge wodhada, ba otuwa kunthada baanaw dendasu.
GEN 24:17 Yaanin, he aylley iiko woxi bidi iyo, “Ne tana guutha haathe ushsharki” yaagis.
GEN 24:18 Iya, “Ero ta godaw, uya” yaagasu. Ellesada otuwa ba hashepe wothada, gedi ootha oykada iya ushshasu.
GEN 24:19 Iya ushshidaape guye, “Ne gimaletika alana gakanaw taani entaw haatha duuqana” yaagasu.
GEN 24:20 Attida haatha ellesada gongen tigada, hara haathe duuqanaw olla woxasu; gimaleti ubbay alana gakanaw, haatha ollafe duuqa duuqa ehada gongen tigada ushshasu.
GEN 24:21 I qopidi yida qofa Goday injeyishe de7iyakonne eranaw addey si77i gidi iyo xeellees.
GEN 24:22 Gimaleti haatha uyi simmin, addey ichashu giraame bagga siidhen aathiya worqa xeetanne tammu giraame gidiya nam7u worqa sagaayota giigisis.
GEN 24:23 Iyo, “Neeni oodde na7ee? Ane taw oda; ne aawa son nuus aqiya bessi daanee?” yaagis.
GEN 24:24 Iya, “Taani Batu7eela na7a; Batu7eeli Milka Naakoras yelida na7a.
GEN 24:25 Nu son gidiya kaleynne harqoy de7ees; qassi hinte aqanaw bessi de7ees” yaagasu.
GEN 24:26 Addey gulbatidi Godaa goyinnidi,
GEN 24:27 haysada yaagis; “Ta godaas keeheysanne ammaneteysa aggiboonna Goday, ta godaa Abrahaame Xoossay galatetto; taani yishin, Goday tana ta godaa dabbota soo kaalethis” yaagis.
GEN 24:28 Na7iya woxa bada, ba aaye son de7iya asaas hanidaba odasu.
GEN 24:29 Irbiqas Laaba geetetiya ishay de7ees. Laabi kare keyidi haatha pultuwa matan de7iya addiyako woxis.
GEN 24:30 Siidhe worqanne ba miche kushen de7iya sagaayota be7ida wode Irbiqa addey bana gidoysa odin si7ida wode, keyidi addiyako bis. Addeyka gimaletara pultuwa matan eqidaysa demmis.
GEN 24:31 Iyako, “Goday nena anjidayso, haaya, neeni karen ayis eqadii? Taani new keethenne gimaletaska besse giigisas” yaagis.
GEN 24:32 Yaatin addey soo gelis. Laabi gimaleta caana billidi, kalenne dhiille gimaletas immas. Toho meeccanaw iyasinne iyara de7iya asaas haathe ehis.
GEN 24:33 Kathi iya sinthe aadhis. Shin, “Taani tana ehidaba hintew odonna de7ashe kathi miike” yaagis. Laabi, “Yaako oda” yaagis.
GEN 24:34 Hessa gisho, I, “Taani Abrahaame aylliya.
GEN 24:35 Goday ta godaa daro anjida gisho I duretis. Dorse, miizi, bira, worqa, adde aylleta, macca aylleta, gimaletanne hareta iyaw immis.
GEN 24:36 Ta godaa machiya Saara ba cimatetha laythan iyaw adde na7a yelasu. Yaatin I baw de7iyaba ubba iyaw immis.
GEN 24:37 Ta goday tana haysada caaqisis, ‘Taani de7iya Kanaane biitta macca naytape ta na7aas macho oychofa.
GEN 24:38 Shin ta aawa asaako, ta dabbotako bada ta na7aas macho oycha’ yaagis.
GEN 24:39 Taani ta godaa, ‘Na7iya taara yaanaw dosona ixikochi?’ yaagada oychas.
GEN 24:40 Ika, taani iya sinthan kiitetida Goday ba kiitanchuwa kiittana; neeni ta na7aas ta aawa asaape, ta kochaafe macho demmana mela, ne beysaka injeyana.
GEN 24:41 Neeni ta kochatako bin, enti new iyo immonna ixiko, he wode new caaqoy gome gidenna” yaagis.
GEN 24:42 “Taani hachi he pultuwako yaa wode yaagas; ‘Godaw, ta godaa Abrahaame Xoossaw, ne shene gidiko, taani biya allalliya giigisa.
GEN 24:43 Heko, taani ha pultuwa matan eqayis; geela7o issinniya haathe tikanaw yiiko, taani iyo, tana ne otuwape guutha haathe ushsharki’ yaagana.
GEN 24:44 Iya, ‘Ero uya, qassi ne gimaletaska taani haathe duuqana’ giyara, Goday ta godaa na7aas dooridaro gido” yaagas.
GEN 24:45 “Taani ta wozanan wooseysa zaarona de7ishin, Irbiqa ba otuwa tookada, puttu gasu; pultuwa duge wodhada haatha duuqasu; taani iyo, ‘Tana haathe ushsharki’ yaagas.
GEN 24:46 “Yaagin iya ellesada ba hashiyape otuwa wothada, ‘Heko uya; qassi taani ne gimaleta ushshana’ yaagasu. Yaatin taani uyas; qassi ta gimaleta iya ushshasu.
GEN 24:47 “Taani iyo, ‘Neeni oodde na7ee?’ yaagas. “Iya zaarada, ‘Taani Batu7eela na7aa; Batu7eeli, Milka Naakoras yelida na7a’ yaagasu. Taani worqa I siidhen, sagaayota I kushen aathas.
GEN 24:48 Hessafe guye, taani gulbatada, Godaas goyinnas. Taani Godaa, ta godaa Abrahaame Xoossa, ta godaa isha na7a na7iw iya na7aas ekanaw tana like ogiya kaalethidaysas galatayis.
GEN 24:49 Ha77ika hinte ta godaas keehanabanne ammanetanaba gidiko, taw odite; gidonna ixikoka odite; hessafe guye taani hananaba erana” yaagis.
GEN 24:50 Laabinne Batu7eeli zaaridi yaagidosona; “Ha oday Godaape yis; nuuni yaa haa gaanaw danda7oko.
GEN 24:51 Irbiqo hanno be7a; ekada ba; Goday gidaysada ne godaa na7aas macho gido” yaagidosona.
GEN 24:52 Abrahaame aylley enti giyaba si7ida wode, sa7an gulbatidi Godaas goyinnis.
GEN 24:53 Aylley bira alleeqo, worqa alleeqo, ma7onne kessidi Irbiqas immis. Qassi al7o miisheta I ishaasinne I aayes immis.
GEN 24:54 Hessafe guye, inne iyara de7eysati midosona uyidosona; yan aqidosona. Enti guura dendin, I, “Tana ta godaako yeddite” yaagis.
GEN 24:55 Yaatin I ishaynne I aayiya, “Na7iya issi tammu gallasa mela nuura tako, hessafe guye iya baana” yaagidosona.
GEN 24:56 Shin I, “Goday ta yidaysa injeyin, hinte tana gam7isopite. Taani ta godaako baana mela tana moyzite” yaagis.
GEN 24:57 Enti, “Na7iw xeegidi ane iyo oychoos” yaagidosona.
GEN 24:58 Irbiqa xeegidi, “Ha addiyara baanee?” yaagidi oychidosona. Iya, “Ee; taani baana” yaagasu.
GEN 24:59 Yaanin, enti banta michiw Irbiqa, iyo dichidaaro, Abrahaame aylliyanne iya asata moyzidosona.
GEN 24:60 Enti Irbiqa, “Nu miche Irbiqe, mukulupe mukulu gakanaw dara; ne kochay banta morketa katamata laatto” yaagidi anjidosona.
GEN 24:61 Hessafe guye, Irbiqinne I macca aylleti dendidi, gimaleta toggidi, addiyara bidosona. Yaatin aylley Irbiqa ekidi bis.
GEN 24:62 He wode Yisaaqi, “Tana Be7iya De7o Xoossa Pultuwa” geetetiya pultuwa mata bidi, Negebe mela biittan de7ees.
GEN 24:63 Issi gallas omarsi Yisaaqi ba wozanan qopishe demba keyidi yuuyees; I dhoqu gidi xeelliya wode, gimaleti yeyisata be7is.
GEN 24:64 Irbiqaka dhoqu gada xeelliya wode, Yisaaqa be7asu; gimaletape wodhasu.
GEN 24:65 Abrahaame aylliyako, “Ha nuura gahetanaw dembara yaa addey oonee?” yaagasu. Aylley, “I, ta godaa” yaagis. Iya ba laxana ekada guuluntasu.
GEN 24:66 Qassi aylley ba oothidaba ubba Yisaaqas odis.
GEN 24:67 Yisaaqi Irbiqa ba aaye Saara dunkaaniya giddo efis. Iyo machis; iyaka iyaw macho gidasu. I iyo dosis; ba aaye kayuwa wothis.
GEN 25:1 Abrahaamey Keexura geetetiya hara macho ekis.
GEN 25:2 Iya Zimiraana, Yoqsaana, Madaane, Midiyaame, Yasboqanne Siwa iyaw yelasu.
GEN 25:3 Yoqsaani Saabanne Dedaana yelis. Dedaani Ashooreta, Lexusetanne Le7umata yelis.
GEN 25:4 Midiyaame nayti Gefera, Efera, Henooha, Abidanne Elda. Haysati ubbay Keexura sheeshata.
GEN 25:5 Abrahaamey babaa ubbaa Yisaaqa laatisis.
GEN 25:6 Shin I paxa de7ishe, hara machetape yelida nayta baw de7iyabaape woytis. Ba na7a Yisaaqape enta shaakidi, doloha bagga biitta yeddis.
GEN 25:7 Abrahaamey kumethi issi xeetanne laapun tammanne ichashu laythi de7is.
GEN 25:8 Abrahaamey daro wode de7idi, lo77o cimidi, hayqidi ba mayzatan gahetis.
GEN 25:9 Iya nayti Yisaaqinne Isma7eeli iya Makifeela geetetiya gongolo duufuwan moogidosona; he gongoloy Mamire matan, Hite addiya Xohaara na7a Efroona gadiyan de7ees.
GEN 25:10 Hessi Abrahaamey Hitetape shammida gadiya. Abrahaamey ba machiya Saara moogetida duufuwan moogetis.
GEN 25:11 Abrahaamey hayqidaape guye, Xoossay iya na7a Yisaaqa anjis. He wode Yisaaqi, Beer-lay-ro7i (Tana Be7iya De7o Xoossa Pulto) geetetiya pultuwa matan de7ees.
GEN 25:12 Saara aylliya, Gibxefe yida Aggaara, Abrahaames yelida na7a Isma7eela yeletethay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa.
GEN 25:13 Isma7eela nayti banta sunthaninne banta yeleta maaran haysata; entika, Nabayoota, Qedaare, Adbeela, Mibsaama,
GEN 25:14 Misima, Duma, Masa,
GEN 25:15 Kudane, Teema, Ixura, Nafisanne Qedima.
GEN 25:16 Isma7eela nayti haysata; enta sunthay enta moothaninne de7iya bessan haysa. Enti banta yaranka tammanne nam7u halaqata.
GEN 25:17 Isma7eeli kumethi xeetanne hastamanne laapun laythi de7idi, hayqidi ba mayzatan gahetis.
GEN 25:18 Isma7eela kocheti Gibxefe doloha baggan de7iya Hawilapenne Suurape gidduwan, Asoore efiya ogiya matan de7idosona. Enti banta ishata ubbara morketethan de7idosona.
GEN 25:19 Abrahaame na7a Yisaaqa yeletethay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa; Abrahaamey Yisaaqa yelis.
GEN 25:20 Yisaaqas laythi oytama gidin, Irbiqa ekis; iya Masephexoomen de7iya Araame addiya Batu7eela na7iwunne Laaba michiw.
GEN 25:21 Yisaaqi ba machiya maynthi gidida gisho, iw Godaa woossis; Goday iya woosa si7is. Yaatin iya machiya Irbiqa qanthatasu.
GEN 25:22 Shin I ulon de7iya nayti mente gidi uttidi, issoy issuwara sugetidosona; iya, “haysi taw ayis hanii?” yaagasu. Hessa gisho, Godaa oychanaw basu.
GEN 25:23 Goday iyo, “Ne ulon nam7u kawotethi de7ees; qassi ne giddon de7iya nam7u dere asati issoy issuwafe shaaketana; issi dere asati hankotape minnana; qassi bayray kaaluwas kiitetana” yaagis.
GEN 25:24 Iwu yelo wodey gakin, I uluwan mente adde nayti de7oosona.
GEN 25:25 Koyro yeletidaysi aarise; iya bolla ubba ikisey ma7is; Hessa gisho, enti iya Eesawe (Iksaama) gidi sunthidosona.
GEN 25:26 Hessafe guye, iya ishay yeletis. I ba kushiyan Eesawe gindiya oykidi keyis, Hessa gisho, iya Yayqooba (Ginde Oykeysa) gidi sunthidosona. Irbiqa enta yelida wode Yisaaqas usupun tammu laythi gidis.
