GEN 25:27 Nayti diccidosona; Eesawey shanka hiilla eriya bazzo ase gidis. Shin Yayqoobi dunkaanen de7iya wopa ase gidis.
GEN 25:28 Yisaaqi Eesawe dosis; ayis giiko, I shankateysafe maanaw dosees; shin Irbiqa Yayqooba dosawusu.
GEN 25:29 Issi wode Yayqoobi woxe kathishin, Eesawey koshatidi bazzofe yis.
GEN 25:30 Eesawey Yayqooba, “Tana ha zo7o woxiyape muza, tana koshi wodhees” yaagis. (Hessa gisho, qassi iya sunthay Edoome (Zo7o) geetetis).
GEN 25:31 Yayqoobi iya, “Koyro taw ne bayratetha bayza” yaagis.
GEN 25:32 Yaatin Eesawey, “Heko, taani hayqana hanayis, ha bayratethay tana ay maaddii?” yaagis.
GEN 25:33 Yayqoobi zaaridi, “Ane taw koyro caaqa” yaagis. I caaqis, ba bayratetha Yayqoobas bayzis.
GEN 25:34 Yayqoobi Eesawes uythinne misire woxe immin mis uyis. Hessafe guye dendidi bis. Eesawey ba bayratetha haysada kadhis.
GEN 26:1 He biittan kase Abrahaame wode keyida koshaape hara koshi keyis. Yaanin, Yisaaqi Filisxeeme kawa Abimelekeko Geraara bis.
GEN 26:2 Goday Yisaaqas qoncidi “Gibxe biitta duge boopa, taani new odida biittan de7a.
GEN 26:3 Ha biittan guutha wodiya gam7aasha, taani neera gidana, nena anjana. Ha biitta ubba taani newunne ne sheeshas immana. Taani ne aawa Abrahaames caaqida caaquwa polana.
GEN 26:4 Ne sheesha salo xoollintoda darsana, ha biitta ubba taani entaw immana. Sa7a kawotethati ubbay ne sheesha baggara anjetana.
GEN 26:5 Hessika, Abrahaamey ta qaala si7idi, ta awaajota, ta kiitatanne ta higgeta naagida gishosa” yaagis.
GEN 26:6 Hessa gisho, Yisaaqi Geraaran de7is.
GEN 26:7 He biitta asay Irbiqaba denthidi, “Hanna new aybee?” gidi Yisaaqa oychidosona. I, “Hanna taw micho” yaagis. Hessa I giday, Irbiqa daro mala lo77o gidiya gisho, “Iya ta macho giiko, ha asay I gaason tana wodhana” yaagi qopidi babis.
GEN 26:8 Yisaaqi yan daro wode de7idaape guye, Filisxeeme kawoy Abimelekey maskootera duge xeelliyade, Yisaaqi ba mache Irbiqara kaa7ishin be7is.
GEN 26:9 Hessa gisho, Abimelekey Yisaaqa xeegisidi, “Heko, iya ne macho; neeni ayis iya ta micho gadii?” gidi oychis. Yisaaqi, “Iya ta macho giiko, asay tana I gaason wodhana gada gas” yaagis.
GEN 26:10 Abimelekey, “Haysi neeni nu bolla oothidabay aybee? Ta asaape issi asi ne machera aqis shin atis, neeni nu bolla gome ehadasa” yaagis.
GEN 26:11 Hessa gisho, Abimelekey ba asa, “Ha ura woyko iya machiw bochiya oonika tuma hayqana” yaagidi kiittis.
GEN 26:12 Yisaaqi he biittan kathi zeridi, Goday iya anjida gisho he laythan xeetu kushe ekis.
GEN 26:13 I duretethan eretana gakanaw daro duretishe bis.
GEN 26:14 Yisaaqas dorsa wudey, miiza wudeynne aylleti aadhidi darida gisho, Filisxeeme asati iya qanaatidosona.
GEN 26:15 Hessa gisho, iya aawa Abrahaame wode iya aawa aylleti bookida haatha olla ubba Filisxeemeti biitta ushshidi kunthidosona.
GEN 26:16 He wode Abimelekey Yisaaqako, “Neeni nuupe aadhada minnida gisho nu matape ba” yaagis.
GEN 26:17 Yisaaqi hessafe dendidi, Geraara zangaara bidi dunkaane tokidi yan de7is.
GEN 26:18 Yisaaqi ba aawa Abrahaame wode booketida haatha ollata, Abrahaamey hayqidaape guye, Filisxeemeti kunthidaysata zaari booki kessidi, iya aaway sunthida sunthan xeegis.
GEN 26:19 Yisaaqa aylleti he zangaaran haatha olla bookidi yan lo77o pulto haatha demmidosona.
GEN 26:20 Shin Geraara henthanchoti Yisaaqa henthanchotara, “Haathay nubaa” yaagidi ooyetidosona. Enti palametida gisho, Yisaaqi he haatha olla “Eseeqa” gidi sunthis.
GEN 26:21 Hessafe guye, enti hara haatha olla bookidosona. Shin enti he haatha olla geedonka ooyetidosona. Hessa gisho, Yisaaqi he haatha olla “Siixina” gidi sunthis.
GEN 26:22 Hessafe guuthi sinthe shiiqidi hara haatha olla bookisis. Iya gaason oonika ooyetiboonna gisho, “Xoossay ha7i nuus dalgisis nuuni ha biittan darana” gidi he bessa Rehoboota gidi sunthis.
GEN 26:23 Hessafe dendidi pude Barsaabe keyis.
GEN 26:24 He bida gallas qamma Goday iyaw qoncidi, “Taani ne aawa Abrahaame Xoossa, taani neera de7iya gisho, babofa. Ta aylliya Abrahaame gisho taani nena anjana, ne sheeshaka darsana” yaagis.
GEN 26:25 Yisaaqi yan yarsho bessi giigisidi Godaa suntha xeegis. Yan I ba dunkaaniya tokis, iya aylleti yan haatha olla bookidosona.
GEN 26:26 Hessafe guye, Abimelekey bana zoriya Ahuzanne toora mocona Fikoola ekidi, Geraarape Yisaaqako yis.
GEN 26:27 Yisaaqi entako, “Hinte kase tana ixidi, hinte biittafe kessi yeddibeeketii? Ha7i taako ay ekanaw yidetii?” yaagis.
GEN 26:28 Enti, “Goday neera de7eysa nuuni geeshshi erida. Hessa gisho, sarotetha caaqoy nu giddoninne ne giddon daanaw koshshees.
GEN 26:29 Nuuni nena bochibooko, new keehatetha xalaala oothidi, nena sarotethan moyzidi yeddida. Hessadaka neeni nu bolla iitaba oothonna mela, ane neera caaqoos. Tumaka ha7i nena Goday anjis” yaagidosona.
GEN 26:30 He wode Yisaaqi entaw gibira giigisin midosona, uyidosona.
GEN 26:31 Wontetha gallas wonta guura dendidi enti issoy issuwara caaqidosona. Yisaaqi enta moyzin, enti saro shaaketidi bidosona.
GEN 26:32 He gallas Yisaaqa aylleti yidi, “Nuuni haathe demmida” yaagidi banta bookida haatha ollaba iyaw odidosona.
GEN 26:33 I he haatha olla Saabe (Caaqo) gidi sunthis. Hessa gisho, he katama sunthay hachi gakanaw Barsaabe (Caaqo haatha olla) geetetees.
GEN 26:34 Eesawes laythi oytama gidida wode Hite addiya Bi7eera na7iw Yooditonne Hite addiya Eloona na7iw Basemaato machis.
GEN 26:35 Enti Yisaaqanne Irbiqa azzanthishe de7idosona.
GEN 27:1 Yisaaqi cimin iya ayfey xeelo ixida wode ba bayra na7a Eesawe xeegidi, “Ta na7aw” yaagis. Ika, “Yee” gidi koyis.
GEN 27:2 Yisaaqi, “Heko, ha7i taani cimas, taani awude hayqaneko erike.
GEN 27:3 Yaaniya gisho, ha7i ne shanka dongiya ekada bazzo bada do7a shankatada asho ekada ya.
GEN 27:4 Mal7o kathi ta doseysatho ootha kathada taw eha. Taani hayqanaape sinthe ma simmada nena anjana” yaagis.
GEN 27:5 Yisaaqi ba na7a Eesawes odiya wode Irbiqa si7awusu. Eesawey do7a shankatidi ehanaw bazzo bidaape guye,
GEN 27:6 Irbiqa ba na7a Yayqooba, “Ne aaway ne isha Eesawe,
GEN 27:7 ‘Do7a shankata ehada taw mal7o kathi ta maanaw katha. Taani hayqanaape sinthe ma simmada Godaa sinthan nena anjana’ yaagishin taani si7as.
GEN 27:8 Ta na7aw, ha7i taani new odeysa loytha si7a.
GEN 27:9 Wudiya giddo bada nam7u modho deesha marata taw ekada ya. Taani ne aawas mal7o kathi I doseysada oothada kathana.
GEN 27:10 Ne aaway hayqanaape sinthe midi nena anjana mela iyaw aatha” yaagasu.
GEN 27:11 Shin Yayqoobi ba aayiw, “Ta isha Eesawe bolla ikisey de7ees shin ta bollay liiqo.
GEN 27:12 Ta aaway tana oyki be7idi taani iya cimmidaba daaniko, taani anjuwa gisho baadethi ta bolla ehanaysa erikii?” yaagis.
GEN 27:13 Iya aayiya, “Ta na7aw, he baadethay tana gako. Taani new odeysa ootha, bada deesha marata taw ekada ya” yaagasu.
GEN 27:14 Ehidi ba aayes immin iya aayiya mal7o kathi iya aaway doseysada oothada kathasu.
GEN 27:15 Hessafe guye, Irbiqa bayra na7a Eesawe ma7o lo77uwa ehada Yayqooba mayzasu.
GEN 27:16 Qassi he deeshata itiya iya kushiyanne iya liiqo qoodhiya mayzasu.
GEN 27:17 Ba kathida mal7o kathaanne uythaa ba na7a Yayqoobas immasu.
GEN 27:18 Yaatin, I ba aawako gelidi, “Ta aawaw” yaagis. Ika, “Yee, ta na7aw, neeni oonee?” yaagis.
GEN 27:19 Yayqoobi ba aawa, “Taani ne bayra na7a Eesawe. Neeni tana kiitidaysada taani oothas; ha77i denda uttada, taani shankata ehidaysafe mada, tana anja” yaagis.
GEN 27:20 Yisaaqi ba na7a, “Ta na7aw, waata ellesada demmadii?” yaagidi oychis. Yayqoobi, “Goday, ne Xoossay taw giigisis” yaagis.
GEN 27:21 Yisaaqi Yayqooba, “Ta na7aw, neeni tuma ta na7a Eesaweko ta nena oyka be7ana ane ha shiiqa” yaagis.
GEN 27:22 Yayqoobi ba aawako shiiqin oyki be7idi, “Ne qaalay Yayqooba qaala shin kushey Eesawe kushiya daanees” yaagis.
GEN 27:23 Iya kushey iya isha Eesawe kushiyada ikisera de7iya gisho, shaakidi eriboona iya anjis.
GEN 27:24 Iya, “Tuma neeni ta na7a Eesawee?” yaagidi zaari oychis. Ika, “Ee, tana” yaagis.
GEN 27:25 Yaatin I, “Ta na7aw, taani ne shankata ehidabaape mada nena anjana mela ane ha aatha” yaagis. Yayqoobi aathin mis, qassi iyaw woyne ehin uyis.
GEN 27:26 Hessafe guye, iya aawa Yisaaqi, “Ta na7aw, ha shiiqada tana yeera” yaagis.
GEN 27:27 Yayqoobi shiiqidi iya yeeris. Yisaaqi iya ma77uwa singi si7idi, “Ta na7a peenoy Goday anjida goshshada sawees.
GEN 27:28 Xoossay salo akanne sa7a shica, kathinne woyne darsidi new immo.
GEN 27:29 Kawotethati new haareto, asay new gulbato. Neeni ne ishatas godaa gida, ne aaye sheeshati new gulbato. Nena baaddeysati baadetidaba gido, nena anjeysati anjetidaba gido” yaagidi anjis.
GEN 27:30 Yisaaqi Yayqooba anjidi ongidaape guye, Yayqoobi ba aawa sinthafe buroo keyiya wode Eesawey shankafe puttu gis.
GEN 27:31 Ika qassi mal7o kathi kathidi ba aawas aathidi, “Ta aawaw, danda uttada ta shankatidabaape ma, yaatada tana anja” yaagis.
GEN 27:32 Yisaaqi, “Ne oonee?” yaagidi oychis. Ika, “Taani ne bayra na7a Eesawe” yaagis.
GEN 27:33 Yisaaqi dagammidi kokorishe, “Yaatin do7a shankatidaysafe taw aathiday oonee? Taani ha7i neeni yaana sinthan mada, iya anjas. Ika tuma anjetidaysa gidana” yaagis.
GEN 27:34 Eesawey ba aawa qaala si7ida wode ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, daro iita yeeho yeekishe, “Ta aawaw, tanaka anja” yaagis.
GEN 27:35 Shin I, “Ne ishay cimmidi ne anjuwa eki diggis” yaagis.
GEN 27:36 Eesawey, “I eridi Yayqooba (Cimmeysa) gidi sunthetis. I tana cimmishin haysi nam7antho, kase ta bayratetha ekis, ha7i qassi ta anjuwa ekis” yaagis. Yaatin, “Neeni taw anjuwafe aykoka ashshabikii?” yaagidi oychis.
GEN 27:37 Yisaaqi Eesawe, “Taani iya new godaa oothas. Iya ishata ubbataka iyaw aylle oothas. Qassi taani kathaninne woynen iya minthas. Yaatin, ta na7aw, new ta ay ootho?” yaagis.
GEN 27:38 Eesawey ba aawa, “Ta aawaw, new issi anjo xalaali de7ii? Ta aawaw, tanaka qassi anja” yaagis. Hessafe guye, Eesawey ba qaala dhoqu oothidi yeekis.
GEN 27:39 Iya aawa Yisaaqi zaaridi, “Ne de7iya bessay ha sa7a duretethafe haaho, salo akika new wodhenna.
GEN 27:40 Neeni ne mashshan aqana, ne ishaas haaretana. Shin neeni iyara eqetiya wode iya qambara ne gannaafe holana” yaagis.
GEN 27:41 Yayqooba iya aaway anjida gisho, Eesawey ba ulon iya morkis. I ba wozanan, “Ta aaway hayqanaw matis. I hayqida mela ta isha Yayqooba wodhana” yaagis.
GEN 27:42 Shin Irbiqa he ba bayra na7a Eesawe qaala si7ida gisho, ba kaalo na7a Yayqooba xeegisa ehada, “Ne isha Eesawey nena wodhidi haluwa kessanaw halchees.
GEN 27:43 Hayyana ta na7aw, taani new odeysa ootha. Dendada Kaaranen de7iya ta isha Laabako baqata.
GEN 27:44 Ne isha hanqoy irxana gakanaw guutha wode iyara de7aasha.
GEN 27:45 Ne ishaa yiloy wodhiya wodenne neeni iya bolla oothidaba I dogiya wode taani kiittada nena ehana. Taani issi gallas hinte nam7aafeka mela atanaw koyke” yaagasu.
GEN 27:46 Hessafe guye, Irbiqa Yisaaqako, “Eesawey ekida Hiteta macca nayta gaason taani ta de7uwa shaatetas. Qassi Yayqoobika haysatho Hiteta macca naytape macho ekiko, taw hayqoy lo77o” yaagasu.
GEN 28:1 Hessa gisho, Yisaaqi Yayqooba xeegidi, “Kanaane biitta macca naytape macho ekofa.
GEN 28:2 Dendada ne aaye aawa Batu7eelako Masephexoome biitta bada yaape ne aaye isha Laaba macca naytape macho eka.
GEN 28:3 Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossay nena anjo, I new nayta immo, daro dere gidana gakanaw I nena darso.
GEN 28:4 Neeni ha7i betetethan uttida ha biitta nebaa oothana mela newunne ne sheeshas Xoossay Abrahaame anjuwa immo” yaagi anjidi kiittis.
GEN 28:5 Yaagidi Yisaaqi Yayqooba yeddis. Yayqoobi Masephexoome biitta Laabako bis. Laabi Yayqoobanne Eesawe aaye Irbiqa ishanne Araame addiya Batu7eela na7a.
GEN 28:6 Yisaaqi Yayqooba anjidi Masephexoome biittafe macho ekana mela iya yedidaysa, I Yayqooba anjida wode, “Kanaane maccas ekofa” gidi kiittidaysanne,
GEN 28:7 Yayqoobi ba aawasinne ba aayes kiitetidi Masephexoome biitta bidaysa, Eesawey eris.
GEN 28:8 Eesawey hessan Kanaane biitta maccas ba aawa Yisaaqi ay mela ixiyako eris.
GEN 28:9 Hessa gisho, Eesawey Abrahaame na7a Isma7eelako bidi, iya na7iw Mahlaato, Nebayoota michiw, ba macheta bolla gujidi ekis.
GEN 28:10 Yayqoobi Barsaabepe Kaarane baanaw keyis.
GEN 28:11 I, issi bessi gakiya wode awi wullin, qamma yan aqis. He bessan de7iya shuchatape issuwa borkotidi he bessan dhiskis.
GEN 28:12 I amuho amuhidi kodo issoy sa7an eqin xeeray salo gakidaysanne, Xoossa kiitanchoti iya bollara pude keyeysatanne duge wodheyisata be7is.
GEN 28:13 He koduwas xeeran Goday eqidi, “Taani Godaa, ne aawa Abrahaame Xoossa, Yisaaqa Xoossa, ha neeni zin7ida biitta newunne ne sheeshas immana.
GEN 28:14 Ne sheesha sa7a shafeda darsana. Neeni doloha bagga, wuloha bagga, pudeha bagganne dugeha bagga dalgana. Biitta bolla de7iya asa ubbay ne baggaranne ne sheesha baggara anjetana.
GEN 28:15 Taani neera de7ayis. Neeni biya bessa ubban taani nena naagana. Taani nena ha biitta guye zaarada ehana. Taani new oothana gidaysa polana, nena aggike” yaagis.
GEN 28:16 Yayqoobi dhiskofe barkidi, “Ta erabikefe attishin, tuma Goday ha bessan de7ees” yaagis.
GEN 28:17 I babidi, “Ha bessay waani yashshi! Ha bessay Xoossa keethife attishin, haraso gidenna. Haysi salo penge” yaagis.
GEN 28:18 Wontetha gallas wonta guura Yayqoobi dendidi, Xoossas dummayanaw ba borkotida shucha ekidi tuussatho essidi iya bolla zayte tigis.
GEN 28:19 Yayqoobi he bessa Beetele (Xoossa keethi) gidi xeegis. Shin he katamay hessafe kase Looza geetetees.
GEN 28:20 Yayqoobi, “Ta biya ogiyan ne tana naagiko, taw kathinne ma7o immiko,
GEN 28:21 ne tana ta aawa soo saro zaariko, ne ta Xoossa gidana.
GEN 28:22 Taani dummayanaw tuussatho essida ha shuchay Xoossa keetha gidana. Tuma neeni taw immiyaba ubbaafe tammaafe issuwa new immana” yaagidi Xoossas caaqis.
GEN 29:1 Hessafe guye, Yayqoobi dendidi, bidi doloha bagga asa biitta gakis.
GEN 29:2 Yanka demba bessan haatha olla demmis. Heedzu dorsa wudeti he haatha olla matan de7oosona. Wude ubbay haathe uyey he ollafe. He haatha olla doona gordiya shuchay gita.
GEN 29:3 Dorsa wude ubbay yaa shiiqiko, wudiya heemmeysati haatha olla doonape he shucha gondorsidi wudiya haathe ushshoosona. Ushshi simmidi he shucha olla doonan zaari wothoosona.
GEN 29:4 Yayqoobi entako, “Hinte awupe yidetii?” yaagidi oychis. Entika, “Nuuni Kaaranepe yida” yaagidosona.
GEN 29:5 I, “Nakoora na7a na7aa Laaba ereetii?” yaagidi oychis. “Ee, iya eroos” yaagidosona.
GEN 29:6 Yayqoobi enta, “I lo77o de7ii?” yaagidi oychis. “Ee, lo77o, iya na7iw Raheelo dorsata laaggada yaaro hini be7a” yaagidosona.
GEN 29:7 Yayqoobi entako, “Heko, ha7i awi dhoqan de7ees. Wude mehey soo simmiya wodey buroo gakibeenna, dorsa ushshi efidi heemmite” yaagis.
GEN 29:8 Shin enti, “Wude ubbay shiiqin shucha haatha olla doonape gondorsana gakanaw nu ushshanaw danda7oko. Hessafe guye, shucha gondorsidi dorsata ushshana” yaagidosona.
GEN 29:9 I buroo odishin, Laaba na7iya Raheela dorsata heemmiya gisho, ba aawa dorsata laagga ekada gakasu.
GEN 29:10 Yayqoobi ba aaye isha Laaba na7iw Raheelo Laaba dorsata laaggada yaaro be7ida wode bidi olla doonape shucha gondorsidi dorsata haathe ushshis.
GEN 29:11 Yayqoobi Raheelo yeeridi, ufaysan ba qaala dhoqu oothidi yeekis.
GEN 29:12 Yayqoobi, “Taani ne aawa miche Irbiqa na7a” yaagidi iw odis. Hessa gisho, iya woxa bada ba aawas odasu.
GEN 29:13 Laabi ba miche na7a Yayqooba yuussaa si7ida mela mokanaw woxidi bis. Iya idimi yeeridi ba soo efis. Yan Yayqoobi hanidaba ubba Laabas odis.
GEN 29:14 Laabi iya, “Neeni tuma ta ashonne ta suuthi” yaagis. Yayqoobi iyara issi ageena kumethi uttis.
GEN 29:15 Hessafe guye, Laabi Yayqooba, “Neeni taw dabbo gidida gisho, taw mela coo oothaneyee? Ane ta new ay qanxanaw koshshiyako taw oda” yaagis.
GEN 29:16 Laabas nam7u macca nayti de7oosona. Bayre sunthay Liya, kaaliya qassi Raheelo geetetawusu.
GEN 29:17 Liya ayfera cuuca, shin Raheela yegelsinne mala lo77o.
GEN 29:18 Yayqoobi Raheelo dosidi, “Taani ne kaalo na7e Raheeli gisho new laapun laythi oothana” yaagis.
GEN 29:19 Laabi, “Iyo hara asas immanaape new imoy lo77o, ne taara haysan de7a” yaagis.
GEN 29:20 Hessa gisho, Yayqoobi Raheelo ekanaw laapun laythi oothis. Shin I iyo daro dosiya gisho, iyaw guutha gallas daanis.
GEN 29:21 Hessafe guye, Yayqoobi, “Ta machiw taw imma, ta laythay wuris taani iyo ekanaw koyayis” yaagis.
GEN 29:22 Hessa gisho, Laabi asa ubba xeegidi yaagano kessis.
GEN 29:23 Shin sa7i qammin Laabi ba na7iw Liya efidi Yayqoobas immis. Yayqoobi iyo ekis.
GEN 29:24 Qassi Laabi ba aylliw Zalafa ba na7e Liyas aylle oothidi immis.
GEN 29:25 Sa7ay wontin I xeelliya wode, heko, Liya. Yayqoobi Laaba, “Haysi neeni ta bolla oothidaysi aybee? Taani new oothiday Raheeli gishosa gidenneyee? Tana ayis cimmadi” yaagis.
GEN 29:26 Laabi iyako, “Nu biittan bayriya de7ishin kaaliw azinas immeysi woga gidenna.
GEN 29:27 Mishiratethan iira saaminta ongiko, qassi kaaliwka taani new immana. Hessafe guye, hara laapun laythi taw oothaasa” yaagis.
GEN 29:28 Yayqoobi oda ma77idi saaminta iira ongis. Hessafe guye, Laabi ba na7iw Raheelo iyaw immis.
GEN 29:29 Qassi Laabi ba aylliw Baalo ba na7e Raheelis aylle oothidi immis.
GEN 29:30 Yayqoobi Raheeloka ekis. Raheelo Liyape aathidi dosis. Hara laapun laythi Laabas oothis.
GEN 29:31 Goday Liya Raheelitho dosetabonaro be7idi, iw yelo uluwa dooyis. Shin Raheela na7a yelonna gam7asu.
GEN 29:32 Liya qanthatada adde na7a yelasu. Iya, “Goday ta metuwa be7is, ha7i tana ta azinay dosana” gada he na7a Robeela gada sunthasu.
GEN 29:33 Iya nam7antho qanthatada adde na7a yelasu. Iya, “Goday taani dosetabonaysa be7ida gisho, taw haysaka gujis” gada Simoona gada sunthasu.
GEN 29:34 Iya heedzantho qanthatada adde na7a yelasu. Iya, “Taani iyaw heedzu adde nayta yelida gisho, ta azinay ha7i taara siiqon waaxetana” gada iya Leewe gada sunthasu.
GEN 29:35 Iya hara qanthatada adde na7a yelasu. Iya, “Ha7i taani Godaa galatana” gada iya suntha Yihuda gada unthasu. Hessafe guye, yelo eqasu.
GEN 30:1 Raheela Yayqoobas nayta yelonnaysa be7ada ba michiw qanaatasu. Hessa gisho, Yayqooba, “Taw na7a imma, ixiko taani hayqana” yaagasu.
GEN 30:2 Yayqoobi Raheelo hanqetidi, “Tana new yelo immanaw woyko digganaw Xoosse gadiyee?” yaagis.
GEN 30:3 Iya, “Ta gadhindiw Baalo hinno be7a. Iya ta gisho yelana mela neeni iira aqa, yaaniko, taani I baggara na7a demmana” yaagasu.
GEN 30:4 Ba gadhindiw Baalo macho oothidi ekana mela iyaw immasu.
GEN 30:5 Baala qanthatada adde na7a Yayqoobas yelasu.
GEN 30:6 Yaatin Raheela, “Xoossay taw pirdis, ta woosaka si7idi taw adde na7a immis” yaagada he na7a Daane gada sunthasu.
GEN 30:7 Raheeli gadhindiya Baala qanthatada Yayqoobas nam7antho adde na7a yelasu.
GEN 30:8 Raheela, “Taani ta michera wolqaama baaxe baaxetada xoonas” yaagada he na7a Niftaaleme gada sunthasu.
GEN 30:9 Liya yelo eqidaysa be7ada, ba gadhindiya Zalafa Yayqoobas macho oothada immasu.
GEN 30:10 Liya gadhindiya Zalafa adde na7a Yayqoobas yelasu.
GEN 30:11 Liya, “La haysi aybi lo77o qaade!” yaagada, he na7a Gaade sunthasu.
GEN 30:12 Liya gadhindiya Zalafa Yayqoobas nam7antho adde na7a yelasu.
GEN 30:13 Liya, “Tana daro ufaysees; maccasi ubbay tana ufaytiyaro gaana” gada he na7a Aseera gada sunthasu.
GEN 30:14 Giste cakiya ageenan Robeeli gade bidi inkoya mitha ayfe demmidi ba aaye Liyas ekidi yis. Raheela Liyako, “Ne na7ay ehida enkoya mitha ayfiyape taw imma” yaagasu.
GEN 30:15 Shin Liya, “Ta azinaa neeni wolqan ekidaysi gidonna ixin ha7i qassi ta na7a inkoya mitha ayfiya ekanee?” yaagasu. Raheela, “Ne na7a inkoya ayfiya taw immiko, Yayqoobi hachi qamma neera aqo” yaagasu.
GEN 30:16 He gallas omarsi Yayqoobi bazzofe yaa wode Liya iya mokanaw keyada, “Neeni taara aqanaw koshshees; taani ta na7a inkoya ayfiyan nena shammas” yaagasu. Hessa gisho, I he qamma iira aqis.
GEN 30:17 Xoossay Liya woosa si7is. Iya qanthatada ichashantho adde na7a Yayqoobas yelasu.
GEN 30:18 Liya, “Taani ta aylliw ta azinas immida gisho, Xoossay hessa taw qanxis” yaagada he na7a Yisakoora gada sunthasu.
GEN 30:19 Liya hara qanthatada usupuntho adde na7a Yayqoobas yelasu.
GEN 30:20 Liya, “Xoossi taw al7o imota immis. Taani ta azinaas usupun adde nayta yelida gisho, ha7i I tana bonchana” yaagada he na7a Zabloona gada sunthasu.
GEN 30:21 Hessafe guye, issi macca na7a yelasu, iyo Diina gada sunthasu.
GEN 30:22 Xoossay Raheelo qopis. I woosa si7idi I yelo uluwa dooyis.
GEN 30:23 Iya qanthatada adde na7a yelasu; “Xoossay ta yeella qaaris.
GEN 30:24 Goday taw hara adde na7aka gujo” yaagada he na7a Yoosefa gada sunthasu.
GEN 30:25 Raheela Yoosefa yelidaape guye, Yayqoobi, “Taani ta aawa biitta simmada bana tana moyza.
GEN 30:26 Taani enta gisho new oothida ta macceetanne ta nayta imma. Taani baana, taani new ay mela ooso oothidaako neeni eraasa” yaagis.
GEN 30:27 Shin Laabi iyako, “Taani new issiba odayis, Goday ne gaason tana anjidaysa taani ta Xoossafe eras.
GEN 30:28 Ne damooziya taw oda, taani new qanxana” yaagis.
GEN 30:29 Yayqoobi, “Taani new waata oothidaako, ne mehetika waani yeletidaako neeni eraasa.
GEN 30:30 Taani yaanape kase new de7iya guuthay ha7i loythi daris. Goday nena taani aadhida bessa ubban anjis. Shin ha7i, taani ta soo asaas oothana wode” yaagis.
GEN 30:31 Laabi, “Yaatin taani new ay immo?” yaagidi iya oychis. Yayqoobi, “Taw aykoka immofa, neeni taw issiba oothana gidiko, taani ne wudiya ha7ika heemmananne naagana.
GEN 30:32 Taani hachi ne wude ubbaa giddora aadhana. Hessan ne dorsatape wancuwa woyko gazza, kareetha marazeta ubbaa, deeshape gazzanne wanco ubbaa taani shaakana, enti ta damooze gido.
GEN 30:33 Hessa gisho, ta xillotethay ne taw qanxida damooziya be7anaw yaa wode taw markatana. Ta deeshape gazza woyko puncare gidonabay woyko kareethi gidonna ay dorsati ta matan bentiko, kaysotetidaada tayba” yaagis.
GEN 30:34 Laabi, “Ero, neeni gidaysada gido” yaagis.
GEN 30:35 Shin he gallasan Laabi kalaade woyko gazza gidida kole ubba, wanco woyko gazza gidida macca deesha ubba, bootha wanco deeshatanne kareetha wanco dorsata ubba kessidi ba adde nayta heenthis.
GEN 30:36 Yaatidi he wudiya heedzu gallasa ogiya Yayqoobape haassidi efis. Shin Yayqoobi attida Laaba wudiya heemmis.
GEN 30:37 Yayqoobi ongafirepe, bar7efenne lawuze mithafe xam7a kessidi, poquwa poqidi giddo bootha bagga qaaridi shiloyis.
GEN 30:38 Wudey haathe uyanaw yaa wode gongen wudiya sinthan poqida xam7a wothis. Biraysi keydaysati haathe uyanaw yidi,
GEN 30:39 he xam7ata sinthan biraysetosona. He biraysidaysati kalaade, wanconne gazza marata yelidosona.
GEN 30:40 Yayqoobi deesha maratanne dorsa wudiyape shaakidi dumma wothis. Attida wudiya kalaadenne kareethi gidiya Laaba mehiyako zaaridi essis. Yaatidi Laaba wudiyara gathonna ba wudiya dummayidi darsis.
GEN 30:41 Wudiyape gooba maccati biraysas keyiya wode he xam7ata matan biraysetana mela Yayqoobi he xam7ata haatha gongen meheta sinthan wothees.
GEN 30:42 Shin meheti laafa gidiko enta sinthan xam7a wothenna. Hessa gisho, laafa meheti Laababa gidin goobati Yayqoobaba gididosona.
GEN 30:43 Hessada oothidi Yayqoobi daro duretidi, daro wudiya, macca aylletanne adde aylleta, daro gimaletanne hareta haaris.
GEN 31:1 Laaba adde nayti, “Yayqoobi nu aawaba ubba ekidigis. Ha shalo ubba nu aawabape demmis” yaagishin Yayqoobi si7is.
GEN 31:2 Yayqoobi Laaba som7oy iyaw kase mela gidonaysa be7is.
GEN 31:3 He wode Goday Yayqooba, “Neeni ne aawata biitta, ne dabbotako guye simma. Taani neera gidana” yaagis.
GEN 31:4 Yayqoobi Raheelonne Liya ba wudey heemetiya bessaa yaana mela kiittidi xeegisis.
GEN 31:5 I entako, “Hinte aawa som7oy taw kase mela gidonaysa taani be7ayis. Shin ta aawa Xoossay taara de7ees.
GEN 31:6 Taani ta kumetha wolqan hinte aawas oothidaysa hinte ereeta.
GEN 31:7 Shin hinte aaway tana cimmidi, ta damooziya tammu toho laammis. Gidikoka Xoossay tana I qohonnaada diggis.
GEN 31:8 I, ‘Puncareti ne damooze gido’ gin wude ubbay puncare yelis. Qassi I, ‘Kalaadeti ne damooze gido’ gin wude ubbay kalaade yelis.
GEN 31:9 Xoossay hessan hinte aawa mehiya wothi ekidi taw immis.
GEN 31:10 “Meheti biraysas keyiya ageenan taani issi amuho amuhas. He amuhuwan taani xeelliya wode mehiya biraysiya deesha urgeti kalaade, puncarenne gazza.
GEN 31:11 Xoossa kiitanchoy amuhon tana, ‘Yayqooba’ yaagis. Taani, ‘Yee’ gada koyas.
GEN 31:12 Ika, ‘Dhoqu gada mehiya biraysiya deesha urge ubba kalaade, puncarenne gazza be7a. Laabi ne bolla oothiyaba ubba taani be7ida gisho hessa oothas.
GEN 31:13 Neeni essida shucha zayte tiyada taw caaqida Beetele Xoossay tana. Ha7i dendada ha biittafe keya. Guye ne yeletida biitta simma’ gis” yaagis.
GEN 31:14 Hessafe guye, Raheeliranne Liyara “Nu aawabape nuna gakiyabay aybee?
GEN 31:15 I nuna allagada xeellees gidennee? I nuna bayzi ekis. Bayzi ekidaba ubbaa midi dhaysis.
GEN 31:16 Xoossay nu aawape wothi ekida shalo ubbay tumaka nubaanne nu naytabaa. Hessa gisho, Xoossay new odidaba ubba ootha” yaagi zaaridosona.
GEN 31:17 Yayqoobi Kanaane biittan de7iya ba aawa Yisaaqako baanaw dendis. I ba naytanne ba macheta gimale togisis. Wude ubba laaggidi, Masephexoomen de7ishe shiishida shalo ubba ekidi bis.
GEN 31:19 Laabi ba dorsata ikisiya qanxanaw bidashin, Raheela ba aawa soo eeqa misileta kaysotasu.
GEN 31:20 Qassi Yayqoobi Araame addiya Laabas ba buussaa odonna ixidi cimmis.
GEN 31:21 I baw de7iyaba ubba ekidi ellesidi Efraxiisa shaafa pinnidi, derey dariya Galada biitta bis.
GEN 31:22 Heedzu gallasape guye, Yayqoobi baqatidi bidaysa Laabi si7is.
GEN 31:23 Ba dabbota baara ekidi, laapun gallasa oge Yayqooba geedo kaalli derey dariya Galada biittan iya gakis.
GEN 31:24 He wode Xoossay qamma Soore Laabako amuhon qoncidi, “Neeni Yayqooba bolla iitaba gidin lo77oba, aybibaaka odetiko nena era” yaagis.
GEN 31:25 Laabi gakiya wode Yayqoobi derey dariya Galada biittan dunkaane tokidi uttis. Laabika dabbotara yan dunkaanidosona.
GEN 31:26 Hessafe guye, Laabi Yayqooba, “Neeni haysada tana ayis cimmadii? Ta macca naytaka olan di7etidabada ayis laagga kessadii?
GEN 31:27 Neeni ayis qosan taape kessa ekada tana cimmadii? Taani nena ufaysaninne yethan, karaaboninne diithan moyzana mela ayis taw odabikii?
GEN 31:28 Neeni hari attoshin, ta nayta naytanne ta macca nayta taani yeera ekona mela diggadasa. Neeni iita oothadasa.
GEN 31:29 Taani nena genanaw taw wolqi de7ees shin ne aawa Xoossay zine qamma tana, ‘Yayqooba bolla iitaba gidin lo77oba aybibaaka odetonaada nena era’ yaagidi taw odis.
GEN 31:30 Ha7i neeni ne aawa soo baanaw daro laamotida gisho keyadasa. Shin ta soo eeqa misileta ayis kaysotadii?” yaagis.
GEN 31:31 Yayqoobi Laaba, “Neeni ne nayta taape wolqan wosisa ekanekonne gada qopida gisho yayada haysada oothas.
GEN 31:32 Shin ne soo eeqa misileta ekida asi oonaka neeni demmiko, he uray hayqo. Nu dabbota sinthan nebaa gididaba ubba koyada eka” yaagis. Yayqoobi Raheela ba aawa soo eeqa misileta kaysotidaysa eribeenna.
GEN 31:33 Hessa gisho, Laabi Yayqooba dunkaaniya giddo, Liya dunkaaniya giddonne nam7u aylleta dunkaaniya giddo gelidi koyis. Shin aykoka demmibeenna. Liya dunkaaniyape keyidi, Raheeli dunkaaniya gelis.
GEN 31:34 Raheela soo eeqa misileta ekada gimale koora garsan qosada iya bolla uttasu. Laabi dunkaaniyan de7iyaba ubba pilgidi koyis. Shin aykoka demmibeenna.
GEN 31:35 Raheela ba aawa, “Ta godaw, tana hanqetofa. Taani new denda eqanaw danda7ike, ta kushe metora de7ayis” yaagasu. I koyidi soo eeqa misileta demmibeenna.
GEN 31:36 Yayqoobi yilotidi Laabako, “Taani ay iissadina? Haysa neeni tana kaallanaw ta ay qoho oothadina?
GEN 31:37 Ha7i neeni ta miishe ubba pilgada koyadasa. Ne soo eeqa misiletape ay demmadii? Enti nu nam7a giddon pirdana mela ne dabbota sinthaninne ta dabbota sinthan haysan wotha.
GEN 31:38 “Taani neera laatamu laythi kumethi de7as. Ne dorsatinne deeshati awucaybokona woyko ne wudiyape issuwaka qottada mabike.
GEN 31:39 Do7i mida gawuxaka ta new eha erike; taani taape ciggayis. Gallas woyko qamma kaysotetidaysata qanxisaasa.
GEN 31:40 Gallasa suulan, qamma meegon taani qohetas. Maara dhisko dhiska erike.
GEN 31:41 Taani haysada hanada ne son laatamu laythi de7as. Tammanne oyddu laythi ne nam7u macca nayta gisho, usupun laythi ne mehiya gisho new oothas. Shin neeni ta damooziya tammu toho laammadasa.
GEN 31:42 Ta aawa Xoossay, Abrahaame Xoossay, Yisaaqi Xoossay taara gidonaba gidiyako, sidhey bayna neeni tana mela kushe kessa yeddadasa. Shin Xoossay ta metuwanne ta daabursa be7idi zine qamma nena hanqis” yaagis.
GEN 31:43 Laabi zaaridi Yayqooba, “Maccasati ta macca nayta, enta nayti ta nayta, ha meheyka ta mehiya, neeni be7iya ubbay taba. Hachi ha macca nayta bollanne enta nayta bolla ay oothanaw danda7ayna?
GEN 31:44 Ane haaya, neeranne taara wolla ane caaqoos. Hessi ne giddoninne ta giddon marka gido” yaagis.
GEN 31:45 Hessa gisho, Yayqoobi issi shucha ekidi tuussatho essis.
GEN 31:46 Ba dabbota, “Shucha shiishite” yaagis. Enti shucha shiishidi keelidosona. He keela matan kathi midosona.
GEN 31:47 Laabi he keela, Yigar-Sahaduta gidi sunthis. Yayqoobi qassi iya Galada gidi sunthis.
GEN 31:48 Laabi, “Ha keelay neepenne taape giddon hachi marka” yaagis. Hessa gisho, iya sunthay Galada geetetis.
GEN 31:49 Laabi, “Nuuni issoy issuwafe haakidi de7iya bessan Goday nenanne tana naago” gidi he bessa Mixipha gidi sunthis.
GEN 31:50 Laabi, “Neeni ta macca nayta naaqiko, woyko neeni ta macca nayta bolla hara macco ekiko, ta eronna ixikoka ne giddoninne ta giddon Xoossay marka gideysa akeeka” yaagis.
GEN 31:51 Laabi qassika, “Keeletida shuchaynne taani ne giddoninne ta giddon essida shucha tuussay haysish.
GEN 31:52 Taani ha keelape nena genanaw neeko kanthonnaada, neka tana genanaw ha keelapenne ha shucha tuussafe haa aadhonada ha keelaynne ha shucha tuussay marka.
GEN 31:53 Abrahaame Xoossay, Nakoora Xoossay, enta aawa Xoossay, nu giddon pirdo” yaagis. Yayqoobi ba aawa Yisaaqa Xoossa sunthan caaqis.
GEN 31:54 Yayqoobi zuma bolla yarsho yarshis. Ba dabbota kathi maanaw xeegis. Enti midi zuma bolla aqidosona.
GEN 31:55 Wontetha gallas guura Laabi dendidi ba nayta naytanne ba macca nayta anjidi, yeeridi ba soo simmis.
GEN 32:1 Yayqoobi dendidi ba ogiya bishin Xoossa kiitanchoti iyara gahetidosona.
GEN 32:2 Yayqoobi enta be7ida wode “Haysati Xoossa olanchota” yaagidi, he bessa Mahanayma (Nam7u guta) gidi sunthis.
GEN 32:3 Yayqoobi Edoome biittan Sayre giya bessan de7iya ba isha Eesaweko kiita baape sinthe kiittis.
GEN 32:4 I enta, “Hinte ta godaa Eesawes gaanabay haysa, ‘Taani ne aylley Yayqoobi, ha77i gakanaw Laaba matan gam7as.
GEN 32:5 Taw miizi, harey, dorsinne deeshi, adde aylletinne macca aylleti de7oosona. Ha7i taani ha kiita ta godaa sinthan saba demmandinasha gada kiittas yaagis’ yaagite” yaagidi kiittis.
GEN 32:6 Kiitetidaysati Yayqoobako simmidi, “Nuuni ne isha Eesaweko bida. Ika qassi neera gahetanaw yees. Iyara oyddu xeetu asay de7oosona” yaagidosona.
GEN 32:7 Yayqoobi daro babidi baara de7iya asa nam7u cugan shaakis. Ba dorsa, deesha, miizanne gimaleta nam7u cugan shaakis.
GEN 32:8 I, “Eesawey yidi issi cuga oliyaba gidiko, attida cugay kessi ekana” gidi qopis.
GEN 32:9 He wode Yayqoobi haysada yaagidi woossis, “Abeeti Godaw, ta aawa Abrahaame Xoossaw, ta aawa Yisaaqa Xoossaw, tana, ‘Ne biitta, ne dabbotako simma, taani new lo77oba oothana gidayso, tana si7arki’,
GEN 32:10 neeni ne aylliyas keehidabasinne ammanetetha ubbaas taani bessona asi. Taani Yordaanose shaafa pinniya wode taw issi xam7a xalaali de7ees; shin ha7i taani nam7u cuga godaa gidas.
GEN 32:11 Taani nena woossayis ta isha Eesawe kushepe tana ashsha. I yidi, tananne aayeta enta naytara dhaysona aggenna gada yayyayis.
GEN 32:12 Shin neeni tana, ‘Taani new tuma lo77oba oothana. Taani ne sheesha taybanaw danda7etona abba shafeda oothana’ gidaysa qopa” yaagis.
GEN 32:13 He gallas qamma I yan aqis. Baw de7iyaba ubbaafe ba isha Eesawes immanaba qoridi kessis.
GEN 32:14 I, nam7u xeetu macca deeshatanne laatamu deesha marazeta, nam7u xeetu macca dorsatanne laatamu dorsa marazeta, hastamu dhanthiya gimaleta enta maratara, oytamu macca miizata, tammu korma boorata, laatamu macca haretanne tammu adde hareta qoridi kessis.
GEN 32:16 Hessata wuden wuden shaakidi ba aylletas immidi, “Taape sinthe bidi wudiya wudiyape haahon haahon laaggite” yaagis.
GEN 32:17 Sinthan kaaletheysa, “Ta ishay Eesawey neera gahetidi, ‘Neeni oodesee? Neeni aw bay? Ne sinthan de7iya mehe ubbay oodebayee?’ yaagidi oychiko,
GEN 32:18 ne iyako, ‘Haysati ne aylliya Yayqoobasa, I ta godaa Eesawes immanaw yeddidaysata. Ika nuupe guyera yees’ yaaga” yaagidi kiittis.
GEN 32:19 Qassi nam7anthuwa, heedzanthuwanne wudiya kaalliya harata ubbaa, “Hinte Eesawera gahetiya wode haysada geeta;
GEN 32:20 ‘Ne aylliya Yayqoobi nuupe guyera yees’ goonna aggofite” yaagidi kiittis. I, “Taani immanaw sinthe yeddidaysan iya irxisana. Ooni eri hessafe guye taani iyara gahetiya wode I tana moki ekana” yaagidi qopis.
GEN 32:21 Hessa gisho, ba immanaba baape sinthe yeddis. Shin I ba huuphen he gallas qamma yan aqis.
GEN 32:22 He qamma Yayqoobi dendidi, ba nam7u macheta, ba nam7u aylleta, ba nayta tammanne issota ekidi, Yaaboqa shaafa pinnis.
GEN 32:23 I enta shaafa pinthi simmidi baw de7iyaba ubbaa pinthidi yeddis.
GEN 32:24 Shin Yayqoobi barka guye attis. He wode issi asi sa7i wontana gakanaw iyara baaxetishe aqis.
GEN 32:25 He uray iya xoonanaw danda7onaysa be7ida wode Yayqoobas bulxiya bochin, iya bulxey kesuwape keyis.
GEN 32:26 Yaatin uray iya, “Sa7i wontana haniya gisho, tana yedda” yaagis. Shin Yayqoobi, “Neeni tana anjonna nena yeddike” yaagis.
GEN 32:27 Uray, “Ne sunthay oonee?” yaagidi oychis. I zaaridi, “Yayqooba” yaagis.
GEN 32:28 Uray, “Neeni Xoossaranne asara baaxetada xoonida gisho, hizape ne sunthay Yayqooba geetetofo, Isra7eele (Xoossara baaxetis) geeteto” yaagis.
GEN 32:29 Yayqoobi uraa, “Ne sunthay oonee?” yaagidi oychis. Shin uray, “Neeni ta suntha ayis oychay?” yaagidi iya anjis.
GEN 32:30 Hessa gisho, Yayqoobi, “Taani Xoossa som7on be7as shin paxa de7ayis” yaagidi, he bessa Phin7eela (Xoossa som7o) gidi sunthis.
GEN 32:31 I Phin7eelape dendiya wode iya bolla xalqey dolis. Iya bulxe kessay sakiya gisho dogees.
GEN 32:32 Yayqooba bulxey wodire ashuwa matan boshetida gisho, Isra7eele asay mehes bulxe asho hachi gakanaw mookonna.
GEN 33:1 Yayqoobi dhoqu gidi xeelliya wode Eesawey ba oyddu xeetu asaara yeysa be7is. Hessa gisho, nayta Liyas, Raheelisinne nam7u aylletas shaaki immis.
GEN 33:2 Aylletanne enta nayta sinthan, Liyanne I nayta enta geedon, Raheelonne Yoosefa wursethan wothis.
GEN 33:3 Shin I baw sinthe aadhidi ba ishaako matishe sa7a gaki gaki laapuntoho ziggis.
GEN 33:4 Shin Eesawey iyara gahetanaw woxi yidi iya qoodhiya qoomidi yeeris. Nam7ayka yeekidosona.
GEN 33:5 Eesawey dhoqu gidi xeellidi maccasatanne nayta be7idi, “Ha neera de7eysati oonantee?” yaagidi oychis. Yayqoobi, “Ta godaw, haysati Xoossay ne aylliyas ba keehatethan immida nayta” yaagis.
GEN 33:6 Aylleti banta naytara shiiqidi iyaw ziggidosona.
GEN 33:7 Kaallidi Liyaranne I naytara yidi ziggidosona. Wursethan Yoosefaranne Raheelira yidi ziggidosona.
GEN 33:8 Eesawey, “Ha sinthan bishe taara gahetida wudey ubbay aybee?” yaagidi oychis. Yayqoobi, “Ta godaw, hessi taani ne sinthan saba demmanaw yeddidaysata” yaagis.
GEN 33:9 Shin Eesawey, “Ta ishaw, taw gidiya shaloy de7ees, nebay new gido” yaagis.
GEN 33:10 Yayqoobi, “Hayyana, ha7i taani ne sinthan saba demmidaba gidiko, ha taani immeysa eka. Neeni tana moka ekida gisho, ta ne som7uwa be7eysi Xoossa som7o be7eysa mela.
GEN 33:11 Taani new ehida ha imota eka. Xoossay taw keehi immida gisho kumis” yaagis. Yayqoobi woossidi aggonna ixida gisho, Eesawey iya imota ekis.
GEN 33:12 Eesawey, “Ane yedha, taani neera issife baana” yaagis.
GEN 33:13 Shin Yayqoobi, “Ta godaw, nayti shugo gideysa eraasa. Qassi taani galo marata dhanthiya dorsatanne miiza naaganaw koshshees. Asay enta hari attoshin, issi gallas minthi laagiko, mehe ubbay hayqana.
GEN 33:14 Hessa gisho, ta godaw, ne aylletape sinthatada ba. Taani Sayren ta godaa gakanaw, ta sinthan de7iya mehiyanne nayta hemethaa mela loddan kaallada ta godaa taani Edoomen gakana” yaagis.
GEN 33:15 Eesawey, “Yaaniko, taani ta asaape guuthara new asho” yaagis. Shin Yayqoobi, “Koshshenna; taani ta godaa sinthan sabetidaysi taw gidana” yaagis.
GEN 33:16 Hessa gisho, Eesawey he gallas ogen wodhidi Sayre simmis.
GEN 33:17 Shin Yayqoobi Sukota bis. Yan baw keethe keexis, ba mehetas shaqara shaqaris. Hessa gisho, he bessa Sukota (Kuya woyko Gaabba) gidi sunthis.
GEN 33:18 Yayqoobi Masephexoomepe simmidi Kanaane biittan de7iya Seekema katama saron gakis. I he katamas sintha baggara dunkaane tokidi uttis.
GEN 33:19 Ba dunkaaniya tokidi uttida gadiya Seekema aawa Hamoora naytape issi xeetu bira santimen shammis.
GEN 33:20 Yan yarsho bessi giigisidi, “Godaa, Isra7eele Xoossa” gidi sunthis.
GEN 34:1 Liya Yayqoobas yelida na7iya Diina, he wode Kanaane maccasata be7anaw keyasu.
GEN 34:2 He biitta haariya Hiwe addiya Hamoora na7a Seekemi iyo be7idi, dafidi iissis.
GEN 34:3 Iya wozanay Yayqooba na7iw Diinas qadhetis. I iw mishetida gisho lo77o qaalara iyo odisis.
GEN 34:4 Seekemi ba aawa Hamoora, “Taw ha na7iw macho oycharki” yaagis.
GEN 34:5 Yayqoobi ba na7iw, Diina, azini dafidaysa si7ida wode iya adde nayti mehera bazzon de7oosona. Hessa gisho, enti yaana gakanaw si77i gis.
GEN 34:6 Hessafe guye, Seekema aawa Hamoori Yayqooba odisanaw yis.
GEN 34:7 Yayqooba adde nayti bazzofe yidi hessa si7idosona. Enti Seekemi Yayqooba na7iw dafidi, iissidi Isra7eele yeellayida gisho daro yilotidosona.
GEN 34:8 Shin Hamoori entako, “Ta na7ay Seekemi hinte na7ees daro mishetees, hayyana iyo iyaw macho immerketi.
GEN 34:9 Nuura eketitenne geletite, hinte macca nayta nuus immite, nu macca naytaka hintew ekite.
GEN 34:10 Hinte nu giddon daanaw danda7eeta. Biittay daro dalga, iya oothidi zal7idi hintew aqo demmanaw danda7eeta” yaagis.
GEN 34:11 He wode Seekemi Diina aawanne I ishata, “Taani hinte sinthan sabetiko, hinte koyiyaba aybiba gidikoka immana.
GEN 34:12 Hinte mishira na7ees immanabaanne koyta hinte koyda mela tana oychite. Taani hinte tana oychidaba ubba immana. Shin taani machanaw na7iw taw immerketi” yaagis.
GEN 34:13 Banta michiw Diina Seekemi tunisida gisho, Yayqooba adde nayti Seekemasinne iya aawa Hamooras wordotidosona.
GEN 34:14 Entako, “Nuuni hessa mela palabaa oothanaw danda7oko, nuuni nu michiw qaxaretiboona asas immoko, hessi nuna kawushiyaba.
GEN 34:15 Hinte nuus issiba ero giiko nu hintew ero gaana. Hessika, hinte biitta adde asa ubbay qaxaretidi nuuda haniko,
GEN 34:16 nuuni nu macca nayta hintew immanaw Ero gaana. Hinte macca naytaka nuus ekana. Nuuni hinte giddon de7idi hintera issi ase gidana.
GEN 34:17 Shin hinte qaxaretanaw ero goonna ixiko, nuuni nu michiw eki baana” yaagidosona.
GEN 34:18 Yaatin ha enti gidabay Hamoorasinne iya na7a Seekemas lo77o daanis.
GEN 34:19 He panthay ba aawa keethan de7iya ubbaafe aadhidi bonchetida gisho koydaba oothanaw iyaw maati de7ees. Yayqooba na7iw daro dosida gisho, enti gidaba oothanaw guye gibeenna.
GEN 34:20 He wode Hamoorinne iya na7ay Seekemi banta katama dabaaba bidi, banta katama asaas haysada yaagidi odidosona.
GEN 34:21 “Ha asati nuura siga de7oosona. Biittay daro dalga gidiya gisho enti ha biittan goyo zal7o. Enta macca naytaka nuuni ekana, entika nu macca nayta ekona.
GEN 34:22 Shin nuura enti issi asada de7anaw nuuni issiba ero gaanaw koshshees. Hessika, enti qaxaretidaysada nu adde asa ubbay qaxaretanaysa.
GEN 34:23 Nuuni hessada oothiko, enta meheynne, enta aqo ubbay nubaa gidennee? Hessa gisho, ane nuuni enti geysa ero goos. Entika nu giddon de7ana” yaagidosona.
GEN 34:24 Katamaa dabaaba shiiqida asati ubbay Hamoorasinne iya na7a Seekemas, “Ero” gidoosona. Yaatin he katama adde asati ubbay qaxaretidosona.
GEN 34:25 Heedzantho gallas, enti ubbay banta qaxara maduntha saketishin, Yayqooba adde naytape nam7ay, Diina ishati, Simoonaranne Leewera banta mashsha ekidi oonika eronna katama gelidi adde asa ubba wodhidosona.
GEN 34:26 Hamooranne iya na7a Seekema mashshan wodhidi, banta michiw Diina Seekema keethafe eki bidosona.
GEN 34:27 Yayqooba hara adde nayti ahata bolla gelidi banta michiw Diina tunisida katama ubbaa bonqidosona.
GEN 34:28 Enta dorsa wudiya, miiza wudiya, hariya, katama giddon de7iyabaanne gaxan de7iyaba ubba ekidosona.
GEN 34:29 Enta keethan de7iya aquwa ubba, enta nayta ubbaanne maccasata ubba di7idosona.
GEN 34:30 Yayqoobi Simoonanne Leewe, “Hinte ta bolla gita meto ehideta. Ha biittan de7iya Kanaanetinne Parzeti tana ixana. Nuuni taybon guutha, enti issife gididi ta bolla dendiko, taaninne ta soo asay dhayana” yaagis.
GEN 34:31 Shin enti, “Yaatin, I nu michiw layma maccasada oothanaw bessii?” yaagidosona.
GEN 35:1 Hessafe guye Xoossay Yayqooba, “Dendada pude Beetele keyada yan de7a. Neeni ne isha Eesawepe baqatida wode new qoncida Xoossas yan yarsho bessi giigisa” yaagis.
GEN 35:2 Hessa gisho, Yayqoobi ba soo asaanne iyara de7eyisata ubba, “Hinte giddon de7iya allaga xoossata diggite. Hintena geeshshite, hinte ma7uwa laammite.
GEN 35:3 Haysafe dendidi pude Beetele boos. Ta metuwa gallas taw si7ida, taani bida bessa ubban taara gidida Xoossas taani yan yarsho bessi giigisana” yaagis.
GEN 35:4 Enti bantaw de7iya allaga xoossata ubbaanne banta haythan aathida worqa ubba kessidi Yayqoobas immidosona. Yayqoobi hessata Seekeman de7iya wolaa garsan moogis.
GEN 35:5 Hessafe guye, Yayqoobinne iya adde nayti dendidi biyade enta yuushuwan de7iya asa bolla Xoossa yashshay wodhida gisho entana kaallidi oykanaw oonika danda7ibeenna.
GEN 35:6 Yayqoobinne iyara de7iya asa ubbay Kanaane biittan de7iya Beetele geetetiya Looza gakidosona.
GEN 35:7 Yan I yarsho bessi giigisis. I he bessa El-Beetele (Beetele Xoossa) gidi sunthis. I ba ishaape baqatidi biya wode Xoossay iyaw qonciday he bessaana.
GEN 35:8 Irbiqa dichiya Diboora yan hayqasu. Beetelepe garsara de7iya wolaa garsan iya moogetasu. Hessa gisho, he mitha sunthay Alon-Bakute (Yeeho Wola) geetetis.
GEN 35:9 Yayqoobi Masephexoomepe simmidaape guye, Xoossay iyaw zaari qoncidi iya anjis.
GEN 35:10 Xoossay, “Ne sunthay Yayqooba. Shin hizape neeni Yayqooba geetetaka, ne sunthay Isra7eele geetetana” yaagidi iya “Isra7eele” gidi sunthis.
GEN 35:11 Qassi Xoossay Yayqooba, “Taani Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossa. Neeni yeleta, dara. Dereynne kawotethati neepe keyo. Kawotika ne gulbatape keyo.
GEN 35:12 Taani Abrahaamesinne Yisaaqas immida biitta, new immana. Neepe guye taani ha biitta ne sheeshas immana” yaagis.
GEN 35:13 Xoossay iyara odetida bessaafe pude keyis.
GEN 35:14 Yayqoobi Xoossay iyara odetida bessan qofisiya shucha mala essidi iya bolla woyniyanne zayte tigis.
GEN 35:15 Yayqoobi Xoossay iyara odetida bessa “Beetele” gidi sunthis.
GEN 35:16 Enti hessafe guye, Beetelepe dendidi bidosona. Enti Efraata gakanaw guuthu attishin, Raheelo iqethi oykin daro waayetasu.
GEN 35:17 Iqethay iyo waaysida wode iyo yelisiyara, “Babofa; haysika adde na7a” yaagasu.
GEN 35:18 Shin iya hayqos matada shempoy keyana hanishin, ba na7a Benoona (Meto na7a) gada sunthasu. Shin iya aaway Biniyaame (Ta ushacha) gidi sunthis.
GEN 35:19 Hessafe guye, Raheela hayqa aggasu. Beeteleme geetetiya Efraata efiya ogiya gaxan moogetasu.
GEN 35:20 Yayqoobi I duufuwa bolla hawulte shucha essis. He hawultey hachu gakanawuka Raheeli duufuwa erisees.
GEN 35:21 Isra7eeley hessafe dendidi Edera gimbiyafe hefinthan ba dunkaaniya tokis.
GEN 35:22 Isra7eeley he biittan de7ishin, Robeeli ba aawas yelida aylle Baalira aqis. Isra7eeley he odaa si7is. Yayqooba adde nayti tammanne nam7a.
GEN 35:23 Liya nayti Yayqooba bayra na7a Robeela, Simoona, Leewe, Yihuda, Yisakooranne Zabloona.
GEN 35:24 Raheeli adde nayti Yoosefanne Biniyaame.
GEN 35:25 Raheeli aylle Baali adde nayti Daanenne Niftaaleme.
GEN 35:26 Liya aylle Zalafa adde nayti Gaadenne Aseera. Ha nayti Yayqoobas Masephexoomen yeletida adde nayta.
GEN 35:27 Yayqoobi Kebroona geetetiya Qiriyaat-Arba matan Mamiren de7iya ba aawa Yisaaqa soo bis. He bessay kase Abrahaameynne Yisaaqi de7ida bessaa.
GEN 35:28 Yisaaqi xeetanne hospun tammu laythi de7is.
GEN 35:29 I daro wodiya de7idi lo77o cimidi, hayqidi ba mayzatan gahetis. Iya nayti Eesaweynne Yayqoobi iya moogidosona.
GEN 36:1 Edoome geetetiya Eesawe yeletethay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa;
GEN 36:2 Eesawey Kanaane biitta macca naytape baw machota ekis. Entika Hite addiya Eloona na7iw Ado, Hiwe addiya Xiba7oona na7ay Ani yelida Oholbaamonne
GEN 36:3 Isma7eela na7iw, Nebayoota michiw Basemaato.
GEN 36:4 Ada Eesawes Elfaaza yelasu. Basemaata Ragu7eela yelasu.
GEN 36:5 Oholbaama Ye7usa, Ya7ilamanne Qore yelasu. Kanaane biittan Eesawes yeletida adde nayti haysata.
GEN 36:6 Eesawey ba macheta, ba adde naytanne macca nayta, ba soo asa ubbaa, ba miizanne ba hara mehe ubbaa Kanaane biittan haaridaba ubbaa ekidi ba isha Yayqoobape haakidi hara biitta bis.
GEN 36:7 Enta shaloy darida gisho, enti issife daanaw danda7ibookona. Enta mehey darida gisho, enti de7iya biittay enta nam7aas gidonna ixis.
GEN 36:8 Yaanin, Edoome geetetiya Eesawey derey dariya Sayre biittan de7is.
GEN 36:9 Derey dariya Sayre biittan de7ida Edoometa mayza Eesawe yeletethay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa;
GEN 36:10 Eesawe adde nayta sunthay, Eesawe mache Adi na7aa Elfaazanne Eesawe mache Basemaati na7a Ragu7eela.
GEN 36:11 Elfaaza nayti Temaana, Omaara, Xafa, Ga7itamanne Qeneza.
GEN 36:12 Qassi Timnaa7a Eesawe na7a Elfaazas aylle. Iya Elfaazas Amaaleqa yelasu. Haysati Eesawe mache Adi na7aa nayta.
GEN 36:13 Ragu7eela adde nayti Nahaata, Zara, Shamanne Miiza. Haysati Eesawe mache Basemaati na7a nayta.
GEN 36:14 Xiba7oona na7ay Ani yelida Oholbaama adde nayti haysata; Entika Ye7usa, Ya7ilamanne Qore.
GEN 36:15 Eesawe yeleta halaqati haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata; Eesawes bayra na7a Elfaaza adde nayti, halaqa gididaysati Temaana, Omaara, Xafa, Qanaza,
GEN 36:16 Qore, Ga7itamanne Amaaleqa; Edoome biittan Elfaazi yelida halaqati haysata; hessati ubbay Adi na7aa nayta.
GEN 36:17 Eesawe na7a Ragu7eela adde nayti, halaqa gididaysati Nahaata, Zaraha, Shamanne Miiza; Edoome biittan Ragu7eeli yelida halaqati haysata; enti Eesawe mache Basemaati na7a nayta.
GEN 36:18 Eesawe mache Oholbaami adde nayti, halaqa gididaysati Ye7usa, Ya7ilamanne Qore; enti Ana na7e, Eesawe mache Oholbaamipe yeletida halaqata.
GEN 36:19 Edoome geetetiya Eesawe adde nayti haysata; enta halaqatika haysata.
GEN 36:20 Edoome biittan de7iya Hoora Sayre adde nayti haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata; hessatika Loxaana, Shobaala, Xiba7oona, Ana,
GEN 36:21 Disoona, Exeranne Disaana; hessati, Edoome biittan de7iya Sayre adde nayti, Hoorata halaqata.
GEN 36:22 Loxaana adde nayti Hooranne Hemaama; Loxaana michiya Timnaa7o.
GEN 36:23 Sobaala adde nayti Aliwa, Manahoota, Ebaala, Sifanne Onaama.
GEN 36:24 Xiba7oona adde nayti Ayanne Ana; haysi Ani mela biittan ba aawa Xiba7oona hareta heemmishe bilbo haatha pultuwa demmidaysa.
GEN 36:25 Ana na7ay Disoona; na7iya qassi Oholbaamo.
GEN 36:26 Disoona adde nayti Hemdaana, Esbaana, Yitraananne Kaarana.
GEN 36:27 Exera adde nayti Bilihaana, Zawananne Aqana.
GEN 36:28 Disaana adde nayti Uxanne Arana.
GEN 36:29 Hoorata halaqati haysata; Loxaana, Shobaala, Xiba7oona, Ana,
GEN 36:30 Disoona, Exeranne Disaana. Haysati Sayre biittan banta yaran yaran shaaketida Hoorata halaqata.
GEN 36:31 Isra7eelen Kawoy kawotanaape kase Edoome biittan kawotida kawoti haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata.
GEN 36:32 Bi7oora na7ay Balaaqi Edoomen kawotis; iya katamaa sunthay Dinaaba geetetees.
GEN 36:33 Balaaqi hayqin, Baasora addey Zaara na7ay Yobaabi iya bessan kawotis.
GEN 36:34 Yobaabi hayqin, Temaana addey Husami kawotis.
GEN 36:35 Husami hayqin, Badada na7ay Hadaadi, Midiyaameta Moo7abe biittan xoonidaysi kawotis; iya katamaa sunthay Awiita geetetis.
GEN 36:36 Hadaadi hayqin, Masreeqa addey Samili kawotis.
GEN 36:37 Samili hayqin, shaafa matan de7iya Rehoboota addey Saa7uli kawotis.
GEN 36:38 Saa7uli hayqin, Akboora na7ay Ba7al-Hanani kawotis.
GEN 36:39 Akboora na7a Ba7al-Hanani hayqin, Hadaadi kawotis; iya katamaa sunthay Paa7u geetetees; iya machiya Mezahaaba na7iya Maxireeda yelida Mahexabeelo geetetawusu.
GEN 36:40 Eesawe yeleta halaqati banta yaran yaran, banta bessan bessan banta sunthan sunthan haysata; Timina, Aliwa, Yeteta,
GEN 36:41 Oholbaama, Ela, Pinoona,
GEN 36:42 Qanaza, Temaana, Mibsaara,
GEN 36:43 Magdelanne Irama. Haysati banta aysiya biittan, banta de7iyasuwan de7iyasuwan Edoome halaqata. Haysi Eesawey, Edoometa aawa.
GEN 37:1 Yayqoobi iya aaway Yisaaqi de7ida Kanaane biittan de7is.
GEN 37:2 Yayqooba yeletetha taarikey haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa. Yoosefi tammanne laapun laytha na7a gidida wode ba aawa machetape, Baalipenne Zilpafe yeletida ba ishatara mehe heemmees. I ba aawas ba ishati oothida iitabata odees.
GEN 37:3 Isra7eeley Yoosefa cimidi yelida gisho, ba hara adde nayta ubbaafe aathidi dosees. Hessa gisho, iyaw alleeqetida ma7o giigisis.
GEN 37:4 Iya ishati enta aaway iya entafe aathidi doseysa be7ida wode iya ixidosona. Mal7o qaalaka iyako odetanaw danda7ibookona.
GEN 37:5 Issi wode Yoosefi amuho amuhidi, ba ishatas odin enti iya kaseysafe aathidi ixidosona.
GEN 37:6 I entako, “Taani amuhida amuhuwa si7ite.
GEN 37:7 Nuuni gaden giste mirqishin ta mirqey dendidi luule eqis. Hinte mirqeti yuuyi aadhidi ta mirqiyas ziggidosona” yaagis.
GEN 37:8 Iya ishati, “Neeni nu bolla kawotada nuna haaranaw qopay?” yaagidi oychidosona. Enti iya amuhuwa gishonne iya odaa gisho, kaseysafe aathidi ixidosona.
GEN 37:9 Qassika Yoosefi hara amuho amuhidi ba ishatas odis. “Heko, taani hara amuhoka amuhas. He amuhuwan awi, ageeninne tammanne issi xoolintoti taw ziggoosona” yaagis.
GEN 37:10 Ba ishatas odida amuhuwa ba aawas odida wode iya aaway, “Haysi waanida amuho? Tuma taani, ne aayanne ne ishati yidi, ne sinthan zigganeyee?” yaagidi hanqetis.
GEN 37:11 Iya ishati iya qanaatidosona, shin iya aaway he odaa ba wozanan wothis.
GEN 37:12 Issi gallas iya ishati Seekeman banta aawa meheta heemmanaw bidosona.
GEN 37:13 Isra7eeley Yoosefa, “Ne ishati Seekeman meheta heemmeysa eraasa. Haaya, taani nena entako kiittana” yaagis. Yoosefika, “Ero” yaagis.
GEN 37:14 I iyako, “Bada ne ishatinne mehey saro gideysa be7ada entaba taw yada oda” yaagidi Yoosefa Kebroona zangaarape kiittis. Yoosefi kiitetidi Seekema bis.
GEN 37:15 Yan demba bessan enta koshshan yaa haa simeretishin, issi asi iya demmidi, “La na7aw, ay koyay?” yaagidi oychis.
GEN 37:16 I, “Ta ishata koyayis; enti mehiya heemmiya bessaa be7idaako, hayyana taw odarkii” yaagis.
GEN 37:17 Uray, “Haysafe bidosona; enti, ‘Nuuni Dootane baana’ gishin si7as” yaagis. Hessa gisho, Yoosefi ba ishata geedo kaalli bidi, enta Dootanen demmis.
GEN 37:18 Shin I haahon de7ishin, enti iya be7idosona. I entako gakonna de7ishin, wodhanaw iya bolla maqetidosona.
GEN 37:19 Enti issoy issuwako, “Hini be7ite, amuhuwa goday yees.
GEN 37:20 Haayite, iya wodhidi, ha ollatape issuwan yeggoos. Hessafe guye, ‘Do7i iya mis’ yaagana. Yaatidi, iya amuhuwa wursethaa be7ana” yaagidosona.
GEN 37:21 Robeeli hessa si7ida wode, enta kushepe iya ashshanaw koydi, “Iya wodhoko;
GEN 37:22 iya wodhanaape mela biittan de7iya ha ollan yeggite; iya bolla kushe wothofite” yaagis. Robeeli hessa giday, iya enta kushepe ashshidi guye aawako zaaranaasa.
GEN 37:23 Yoosefi ba ishatako gakida wode I ma77ida alleeqetida ma7uwa iyape qaari ekidosona.
GEN 37:24 Iya efidi haathi bayna mela ollan yeggidosona.
GEN 37:25 Enti kathi mishin hassayoona Isma7eela asati Galadape Gibxe bishin, dhoqu gidi be7idosona. Enti banta gimaleta bolla sawuwa, madiyanne karbiya caanidosona.
GEN 37:26 Yihudi ba ishata, “Nuuni nu isha wodhidi, iya suuthaa qottiko nuna ay maaddanee?
GEN 37:27 Haayite, iya Isma7eela asaas bayzoos. I nu isha, nu suuthunne nu asho gidiya gisho iya bolla nu kushiya wothoko” yaagis. Iya ishati iya odaa ma77idosona.
GEN 37:28 Hessa gisho, Midiyaame biitta zal7anchoti yaara aadhishin, iya ishati Yoosefa ollafe kessidi, Isma7eela asatas laatamu bira santimen bayzidosona. Enti Yoosefa Gibxe biitta efidosona.
GEN 37:29 Robeeli ollaako simmidi, Yoosefi yan baynaysa be7ida wode, azzanidi ba ma7uwa daakis.
GEN 37:30 I guye ba ishatako bidi, “Na7ay yan baawa; hiza, taani ay hanosha?” yaagis.
GEN 37:31 Enti Yoosefa ma7uwa ekidi, issi deeshe shukidi, he suuthan naaqidosona.
GEN 37:32 Alleeqetida iya ma7uwa banta aawako efidi “Nuuni haysa demmida; haysi ne na7a ma7uwakonne ane be7a” yaagidosona.
GEN 37:33 Yayqoobi ma7uwa eridi, “Haysi ta na7aa ma7uwa; ta na7aa do7i mis. Yoosefi tumaka zaazetis” yaagis.
GEN 37:34 Yayqoobi azzanidi, ba ma7uwa peedhis. Kayo ma7o ma7idi, ba na7aas daro gallas yeekis.
GEN 37:35 Iya adde naytinne macca nayti ubbay iya minthethanaw yidosona. Shin I minettonna ixidi, “Akay, taani yeehoy yeehoshin duufo gelana” yaagidi, Yoosefas yeekis.
GEN 37:36 He wode Midiyaame biitta asati Yoosefa, Gibxe kawa moorinnatanne kawa naageysata halaqa gidida Phoxfaaras bayzidosona.
GEN 38:1 He wode Yihudi ba ishatape shaaketidi, Adulaama kataman de7iya Hira geetetiya uraara daanaw bis.
GEN 38:2 Yan Yihudi Shuu7a geetetiya Kanaane ura na7iw machis.
GEN 38:3 Iya Yihudas qanthatada adde na7a yelasu. I he na7a Era gidi sunthis.
GEN 38:4 Qassika qanthatada adde na7a yelasu. Iya he na7a Onaana gada sunthasu.
GEN 38:5 Zaaradaka hara adde na7a yelasu. Iya he na7aa Seela gada sunthasu. He na7ay yeletiya wode Yihudi Akziiba biittana.
GEN 38:6 Yihudi ba bayra na7a Eras Timaaro geetetiya macho immis.
GEN 38:7 Yihuda bayra na7ay, Eri, Godaa sinthan iita asi gidiya gisho, Goday iya wodhis.
GEN 38:8 Yihudi Onaanako, “Wogay nena kiiteysa mela ne ishaa machera aqa. Ne ishaas na7a yelada iya suntha xeegisa” yaagis.
GEN 38:9 Shin Onani yeletana nayti iyabaa gidonaysa erida gisho, ba ishaa machera aqiya wode ba ishaas na7i yeletonna mela ba attunta sa7an gussees.
GEN 38:10 I oothidabay Godaa sinthan iitaba gidida gisho, Goday iyaka wodhis.
GEN 38:11 Hessafe guye, Yihudi ba na7aa machiw Timaaro, “Ta na7ay Seeli diccana gakanaw ne aawa soo bada, am7etethan de7aasha” yaagis. Hessa I giday, ika ba ishatada hayqanekonne gidi hirgida gishosa. Hessa gisho, Timaara bada ba aawa son de7asu.
GEN 38:12 Daro wodepe guye, Yihuda machiya, Shuu7a na7iya hayqasu. Yihudi ba kayo wodiya ongidi, ba dorsata ikisiya meediya asatako Timina geetetiya bessi ba laggiya Adulaama addiya Hirera bis.
GEN 38:13 Asay Timaaro, “Heko, ne azina aaway Yihudi, ba dorsata ikisiya meedanaw Timina bees” yaagidi odidosona.
GEN 38:14 Iya ba am7etetha ma7uwa laammada, bana balethanaw shaashe ekada guuluntasu. Yaatada, Timina efiya ogiya doonan de7iya Enayme katama gaxan uttasu. Hessa iya oothidaysi, Seeli diccidi gakinka iyaw macho gidada imetonaysa iya erida gishosa.
GEN 38:15 Iya ba som7uwa guuluntida gisho, Yihudi iyo be7ida wode, layma maccas gidi qopis.
GEN 38:16 Ba na7aa machiw gideysa eronna de7ishe, ogiya gaxa iiko shiiqidi “Taara aqanee?” yaagidi oychis. Iya, “Taani neera aqiko, ne taw ay immanee?” gada oychasu.
GEN 38:17 I, “Taani ta mehiyape issi kole new yeddana” yaagis. Iya, “Neeni hessa taw yeddana gakanaw ay oythanee?” yaagasu.
GEN 38:18 I, “Ay oytho?” yaagis. Iya, “Ne maatamiya iya gooshuwaranne ne kushiyan de7iya xam7a oytha” yaagasu. I hessata immidi, iira aqis; iyaka qanthatasu.
GEN 38:19 Iya hessafe dendada bidaape guye, ba guulunthaa qaarada, ba am7etetha ma7uwa ma7asu.
GEN 38:20 Yihudi ba oythidaba he maccaseepe zaari ekanaw deesha ba laggiya Hira bolla iw yeddis. Shin I iyo demmibeenna.
GEN 38:21 I he biitta asaako, “Enayme kataman, oge doonan uttida layma maccasiya awunee?” yaagidi oychis. Asay, “Layma maccas haysan ubbaka baawa” yaagidosona.
GEN 38:22 I Yihudako simmidi, “ ‘Taani iyo demmabike; hessa bollaka he biitta asay, layma maccas haysan ubbaka baawa’ yaagidosona” yaagis.
GEN 38:23 Yihudi, “Ba oykidaysa baw eko, atto giiko, asi nuna miicana. Hiza taani iw deeshe yeddas shin neeni iyo demmabaaka” yaagis.
GEN 38:24 Heedzu ageena gidishin asay, “Ne na7aa maccasiya Timaara laymatada qanthatasu” yaagidi Yihudas odidosona. Yihudi, “Iyo kare kessidi taman xuuggite” yaagis.
GEN 38:25 Iyo kare kessiya wode, “Taani qanthatiday ha miisheta godaasa. Ha maatameynne xam7ay oodebayeko eranaw danda7iko era” gada ba azina aawaka kiittasu.
GEN 38:26 Yihudi he miisheta eridi, “Taani ta na7aa Seelas iyo immaboonna gisho, taape iya xillo” yaagis. Hessafe guye, I iira zaaridi aqibeenna.
GEN 38:27 Iwu yelo qammi gakiya wode, I ulon mente nayti de7eysi eretis.
GEN 38:28 Iya maaretishin, entafe issoy ba kushiya kessin yelisiyara, “Haysi koyro keyis” gaanaw zo7o qacina ekada iya kushen qachasu.
GEN 38:29 Shin I ba kushiya guye ekida wode, iya ishay keyin iya, “Neeni waanada porxu gada keyadii?” yaagasu. Hessa gisho, Paaresa (Porxu gis) gada sunthasu.
GEN 38:30 Hessafe guye, iya kushiyan zo7o qacini de7iya iya ishay yeletis. Iya sunthay Zaara (Zo7o) geetetis.
GEN 39:1 Isma7eela asati Yoosefa Gibxe biitta efidosona. Gibxe kawa moorinatape issuwas, kawa naageysata halaqaas Yoosefa bayzidosona.
GEN 39:2 Goday Yoosefara de7iya gisho, I oothiyaba ubbaa iyaw injeyis. Yaatin, ba Gibxe godaa son de7is.
GEN 39:3 Goday iyara de7eysanne I oothiyaba ubbaa iyaw injeyidaysa Phoxfaari be7ida wode,
GEN 39:4 Yoosefa dosis, baw mata oosancho oothis. Phoxfaari iya ba keetha bollanne baw de7iyaba ubbaa bolla shuumis.
GEN 39:5 He wodepe doomidi, Goday Gibxe ura keetha Yoosefa gisho anjis. Godaa anjoy Phoxfaara sooninne iya gaden de7iyaba ubbaa bolla wodhis.
GEN 39:6 I miya kathiw eriyaripe attishin, baw de7iya haraba ubbaa Yoosefa kushen sheedhis. Yoosefi yegelsinne mala lo77o asi.
GEN 39:7 Guutha wodepe guye, iya godaa machiya Yoosefa be7ada, “Haaya, taara zin7a” yaagasu.
GEN 39:8 Shin I ixidi, iiko, “Be7a, ta goday, baw de7iyaba ubbaa ta kushen yeggida gisho, ba son de7iyabas aykoka hirgenna.
GEN 39:9 Ha son taape aadhey oonika baawa. Neeni iya macho gidiya gisho, neepe attishin, haraa, I taw immonabay baawa. Yaatin, taani waatada haysa mela daro iitaba hanada Xoossa bolla nagara ootho?” yaagis.
GEN 39:10 Iya he odaa wonta wonta Yoosefas odinka, I iira aqonna woyko I mata shiiqona ixis.
GEN 39:11 Shin issi gallas I ba ooso oothanaw soo geliya wode, soo aylletape oonika son baawa.
GEN 39:12 Iya Yoosefa afila oykada, “Taara zin7a” yaagasu. Shin I ba afila I kushiyan yeggi aggidi, soope kare woxi keyis.
GEN 39:13 Yoosefi ba afila I kushiyan yeggi aggidi, soope kare woxi keydaysa iya be7ida wode,
GEN 39:14 ba soo aylleta xeegada, “Heko, ta azinay ehida ha Ibraawe uray tana kawushshanaw oykis. I tana iissanaw ta de7iyasuwa gelis, shin taani waassas.
GEN 39:15 I ba afila ta matan yeggi aggidi, soope kare woxidi keyis” yaagasu.
GEN 39:16 I azinay soo yaana gakanaw iya Yoosefa afila ba matan wothasu.
GEN 39:17 I yin, iyaw haysada gada odasu; “Haysi ne ehida Ibraawe aylley tana iissanaw taako gelis.
GEN 39:18 Shin taani waassin, ba afila ta matan yeggi aggidi, soope kare woxi keyis” yaagasu.
GEN 39:19 Iya goday hanidaba si7ida wode daro yilotis.
GEN 39:20 Iya goday Yoosefa efidi, kawa qasho asay de7iya qasho keethan yeggis.
GEN 39:21 Shin Yoosefi qasho keethan de7iya wode, Goday iyara de7ees. Ba keehatetha iyaw darsidi, qasho keetha kaapuwa sinthan iyaw saba immis.
GEN 39:22 Yaanin, qasho keetha kaapoy qasho asa ubba Yoosefa kushen yeggis. Yan oosetiyaba ubbaas aawatetha immis.
GEN 39:23 Goday Yoosefara gididi, I oothiyaba ubbaa iyaw injeyida gisho, qasho keethaa kaapoy Yoosefa kushen de7iyabas aykoka hirgenna.
GEN 40:1 Guutha wodepe guye, Gibxe kawa ushsha kaapoynne katha kaapoy banta godaa, Gibxe kawa naaqidosona.
GEN 40:2 Kawoy he nam7u kaapota bolla daro yilotidi,
GEN 40:3 Yoosefi qashetida, qasho keetha naageysata kaapuwa son enta qachis.
GEN 40:4 Naageyseta halaqay enta Yoosefas sheedhis, ika entaw kiitetees. Enti qasho keethan daro wode uttidosona.
GEN 40:5 Gibxe kawa ushsha kaapoynne katha kaapoy, qasho keethan de7ishe nam7ayka issi qamma dumma dumma amuho amuhidosona. He amuhotas dumma dumma birshethay de7ees.
GEN 40:6 Yoosefi wonta entako geliya wode enti azzanidi uttidashin be7is.
GEN 40:7 I entana, “Hachi hinte som7oy ayis dhumidee?” yaagidi oychis.
GEN 40:8 Enti, “Nu nam7ayka amuho amuhida, shin nuus birshiya asi dhayis” yaagidosona. Yoosefi entako, “Amuho birshiya eratethay Xoossaba gidenneyee? Ane hinte amuhuwa taw odite” yaagis.
GEN 40:9 Yaatin ushsha kaapoy ba amuhuwa Yoosefas odis; “Taani ta amuhon issi woyne ta sinthan be7as.
GEN 40:10 He woyniyas heedzu tasheti de7oosona. I hayxidi, ciiyi simmidi teeris.
GEN 40:11 Kawo wanci ta kushen de7ees. Taani woyne teera ekada iyan gum7ada, he wanca kawa kushen wothas” yaagis.
GEN 40:12 Yoosefi, “Ha amuhuwa birshethay haysa; heedzu tasheti heedzu gallasata.
GEN 40:13 Heedzu gallasata giddon Kawoy nena qashope billana. I nena kase shuumatethaako zaarana. Kase neeni ushsha kaapo gidada ootheysada neeni kawa wanca iya kushiyan wothana.
GEN 40:14 Shin new sa7i lo77ida wode tana dogopa; taw keeha. Tabaa kawas odada, ha qasho keethafe tana kesisa.
GEN 40:15 Tana Ibraawe biittafe wolqan ehidosona. Hari attoshin, haysan tana qashos gathiyaba aybibaaka oothabike” yaagis.
GEN 40:16 Kathaa kaapoy Yoosefi amuhuwa loythidi birshidaysa be7ida wode Yoosefako, “Taani amuhida amuhoy haysa; ta huuphen heedzu gabate uythi de7ees;
GEN 40:17 bolla bagga gabatiyan Gibxe kawas dumma dumma katha qommofe uuketida uythay de7ees. Shin kafoti he ta huuphen de7iya gabatiyape moosona” yaagis.
GEN 40:18 Yoosefi, “He amuhuwa birshethay haysa; heedzu gabateti heedzu gallasata.
GEN 40:19 Heedzu gallasa giddon Kawoy nena qashope billana. Ne qoodhiya qanxisidi mithan kaqisana; ne ashuwaka kafoy maana” yaagis.
GEN 40:20 Heedzantho gallasan Gibxe Kawoy ba yeletida gallasan ba moorinnata ubbaas gibira giigisis. Ushsha kaapuwanne katha kaapuwa billi ehidi ba asa sinthan essis.
GEN 40:21 Ushsha kaapuwa iya shuumatethaako zaarin, I kawa kushiyan wanca wothis.
GEN 40:22 Shin Kawoy kathaa kaapuwa kaqisis. Ubbayka Yoosefi enta amuhuwa birshidaysada hanis.
GEN 40:23 Shin ushsha kaapoy Yoosefa hassayonna dogi aggis.
GEN 41:1 Nam7u laythafe guye, Gibxe Kawoy amuho amuhis. He amuhuwan I Nayle Shaafa gaxan eqis.
GEN 41:2 Laapun ordenne modho miizati Nayle Shaafape keyidi, maata mishin be7is.
GEN 41:3 Entafe kaallidi, hara laapun gilqa miizati Nayle Shaafape keyidi, shaafa gaxan de7iya hara miizata matan eqidosona.
GEN 41:4 He gilqa miizati laapun ordenne modho miizata mittidosona. Hessafe guye, Kawoy barkis.
GEN 41:5 I zaari dhiskidi, hara amuhoka amuhis. Laapun lo77onne muruuta mor7eti issi maqa bolla keyidosona.
GEN 41:6 Entafe kaallidi, lee7onne doloha bagga carkon shullida hara laapun mor7eti keyidosona.
GEN 41:7 He lee7ida mor7eti lo77onne muruuta mor7eta mittidosona. Hessafe guye, Kawoy barkidi amuho gideysa eris.
GEN 41:8 Sa7ay wontin dhiskofe I dendiya wode iya wozanay yarkis. Hessa gisho, Gibxen de7iya bitanchotanne eranchota ubbaa kawoy xeegisidi entaw ba amuhuwa odis. Shin iyaw he amuhuwa birshiya asi dhayis.
GEN 41:9 Ushsha kaapoy he wode Gibxe kawako, “Taani ta naaquwa hachi hassayayis.
GEN 41:10 Issi wode Kawoy ba aylleta hanqetidi, tananne kathaa kaapuwa qasho keethan yeggis.
GEN 41:11 Yan de7ishe nu nam7ati amuho amuhida. He amuhotas dumma dumma birshethay de7ees.
GEN 41:12 He wode naageysata kaapuwa aylley, Ibraawe panthay, nuura qashon de7ees. Nuuni nu amuhuwa iyaw odin, I nuus huuphen huuphen amuhuwa billis.
GEN 41:13 Yaanin, he hanoti I nuus billidaysada hanidosona. Hessi aybe giiko, taani ta shuumatethaako simmas, hankoy kaqetis” yaagis.
GEN 41:14 Yaatin, Gibxe Kawoy Yoosefa xeegisis. Enti iya qasho keethafe ellesidi ehidosona. I meedetidi ba ma7uwa laammidi, kawako gelis.
GEN 41:15 Kawoy Yoosefa, “Taani amuho amuhas, shin taw issi asika billanaw danda7ibeenna. Taani, ne amuho billanaw danda7eysa si7as” yaagis.
GEN 41:16 Yoosefi, “Taani hessa danda7ike, shin Xoossay kawas lo77onne like birshethi immana” yaagis.
GEN 41:17 Kawoy, “Taani ta amuhora Nayle Shaafa gaxan eqidashin,
GEN 41:18 laapun ordenne modho miizati Nayle Shaafape keyidi, maata moosona.
GEN 41:19 Entafe kaallidi, hara laapun gilqanne laafida miizati keyidosona. Taani hessa mela gilqa miizi Gibxe biittan ubbaka be7a erike.
GEN 41:20 He gilqanne laafida miizati koyro keyida laapun modho miizata mittidosona.
GEN 41:21 Shin enta mittidaape guye kaseysada gilqi uttida gisho, enti mittidaba oonika eranaw danda7ibeenna. Hessafe guye, taani barkas.
GEN 41:22 “Taani ta amuhuwan qassi laapun lo77onne muruuta mor7eti issi maqa bolla keydaysata be7as.
GEN 41:23 Entafe kaallidi, lee7onne doloha bagga carkuwan shullida hara laapun mor7eti keyidosona.
GEN 41:24 He lee7ida mor7eti laapun lo77o mor7eta midosona. Taani ha amuhuwa bitanchotas odas, shin taw amuhuwa birshiya asi bentibeenna” yaagis.
GEN 41:25 Hessafe guye, Yoosefi Gibxe kawako, “kawa amuhota birshethay issino. Xoossay ba oothana haniyaba kawas qoncisis.
GEN 41:26 He laapun lo77o miizati laapun laythata, qassi laapun lo77o mor7eti laapun laythata, ha amuhota birshethay issino.
GEN 41:27 He laapun gilqanne laafida miizati laapun laythata, qassi doloha bagga carkuwan shullida, lee7o laapun mor7eti laapun kosha laythata.
GEN 41:28 “Taani kawas odidaysadaka, Xoossay ba oothana haniyaba kawa bessis.
GEN 41:29 Laapun daro kalo laythati Gibxe biitta ubban yaana.
GEN 41:30 Shin hessafe guye, laapun kosha laythati kaallidi yaana. He wode Gibxe kaaloy ubbay dogetana, koshi biitta caacana.
GEN 41:31 Koshay daro iita gidiya gisho he biitta kaaloy dogetidi attana.
GEN 41:32 Nam7u ogiyan kawas he amuhoy bentiday Xoossay ba qopidaba oothanaw qanxida gishosa. Hessa Xoossay mata woden oothana.
GEN 41:33 “Ha7i hiza, neeni eranchonne cinca asi koyada Gibxe biittan shuuma.
GEN 41:34 Laapun kalo laythan kaxiya kathaafe ichashu kushiyape issuwa shiishana asata shuuma.
GEN 41:35 Enti yaa kalo laythan kathaa shiishidi, banta aawatethan kataman kataman minjidi wothana mela kiita.
GEN 41:36 Biittay koshan dhayona mela ha kathay Gibxe biittan laapun laythan dendana koshas minjetidi de7o” yaagis.
GEN 41:37 Yaatin he oday Gibxe kawasinne iya moorinnatas lo77o gididi bentis.
GEN 41:38 Hessa gisho, Kawoy entako, “Yoosefape aadhiya hara Xoossa Ayyaanara de7iya asi demmanaw danda7oko” yaagis.
GEN 41:39 Hessafe guye Kawoy Yoosefa, “Xoossay haysa ubba nena erisida gisho, ne mela eranchoynne cinca asi oonika baawa.
GEN 41:40 Taani nena ta biittan shuumas. Ta asa ubbay new kiitetana. Taape hari neepe aadhiya oonika baawa.
GEN 41:41 Heko, taani nena Gibxe biitta ubba bolla shuumas” yaagis.
GEN 41:42 Hessafe guye, Kawoy ba paramiya migiduwa ba biradhiyafe kessidi, Yoosefa biradhen aathis. Boncho ma7onne qoodhe worqa iya mayzis.
GEN 41:43 Kawoy ba nam7antho para gaariya Yoosefa togisis. Boncho wotaadarey, “Ziggite! Ziggite!” yaagishe iyape sinthara hemetees. Hessada oothidi, kawoy iya Gibxe biitta ubbaa bolla shuumis.
GEN 41:44 Hessafe guye Kawoy Yoosefa, “Taani kawo gidikoka ne kiittonna oonika Gibxe biitta ubban ba kushiya woyko ba tohuwa qaaxofo” yaagis.
GEN 41:45 Kawoy Yoosefa, “Xafnaat-Pa7ina” gidi sunthis. I iyaw Ona katama kahiniya Phoxfaara na7iw Asnaato macho immis. Yaanin, Yoosefi Gibxe biitta ubbaa bolla maata ekis.
GEN 41:46 Yoosefi Gibxe kawas ooso oykiya wode, iyaw laythi hastama. Yoosefi kawa sinthafe keyidi, Gibxe biitta ubbaa giddon hemetis.
GEN 41:47 He laapun kalo laythan biittan daro kathi kaxis.
GEN 41:48 Yoosefi Gibxe biittan he laapun kalo laytha katha ubbaa shiishidi, katamatan minjis. Issi issi katama yuushuwan de7iya gadiyape katha ubbaa he katamatan shiishis.
GEN 41:49 Yoosefi abba shafiya mela daro katha shiishis. Katha darotethaafe dendoysan makanaw danda7etibona gisho, maki maki qoleysa aggaagis.
GEN 41:50 Kosha laythi yaanape sinthe, Ona katama kahine Phoxfaara na7e Asnaatipe Yoosefi nam7u adde nayta yelis.
GEN 41:51 Yoosefi ba bayra na7aa sunthaa, “Xoossay tana ta metuwanne ta aawa soo asa ubbaa dogisis” gidi Minaase gidi sunthis.
GEN 41:52 Nam7antho na7aa sunthaaka, “Xoossay ta metootida biittan taw na7a immis” gidi Efreema gidi sunthis.
GEN 41:53 Gibxe biittan de7iya he laapun kalo laythati aadhidosona.
GEN 41:54 Yoosefi odidaysada laapun kosha laythati kaalli yidosona. Hara biitta ubban koshi keyis, shin Gibxe biitta ubban kathay de7ees.
GEN 41:55 Gibxe biittay ubbay koshatida wode, asay kathas kawako waassidosona. Kawoy Gibxe asa ubba, “Yoosefako bidi, I odeysa oothite” yaagidi kiittis.
GEN 41:56 Koshay Gibxe biitta ubba gakida wode, Yoosefi katha minjida shaaleta ubba dooydi, kathi Gibxe asaas bayzis.
GEN 41:57 Biitta ubban koshi suullida gisho, sa7an de7iya asa ubbay kathi Yoosefape shammanaw Gibxe yidosona.
GEN 42:1 Yayqoobi Gibxen kathi de7eysa si7ida wode ba adde nayta, “Hinte issoy issuwa ayis xeelleetii?
GEN 42:2 Gibxen kathi de7eysa taani si7as; yaa bidi, nuuni hayqonna mela guutha kathi shammite” yaagis.
GEN 42:3 Yaatin, Yoosefa ishati tammati kathi shammanaw Gibxe bidosona.
GEN 42:4 Shin Yayqoobi I qohetana gidi hirgida gisho Yoosefa isha Biniyaame iya ishatara yeddibeenna.
GEN 42:5 Kanaane biittan wolqaama koshi de7iya gisho, kathi shammanaw beysatara Isra7eele adde nayti Gibxe gelidosona.
GEN 42:6 He wode Yoosefi he biitta aysiya gisho biittan de7iya asa ubbaas kathi bayzees. Hessa gisho, Yoosefa ishati yaa gakida wode banta som7uwa sa7a gathidi iyaw ziggidosona.
GEN 42:7 Yoosefi ba ishata be7ida melaka eri aggis. Shin I enta eronna asada hanidi; entako, “Hinte awupe yideti?” yaagidi oychis. Enti, “Kathi shammanaw, Kanaane biittafe yida” yaagidosona.
GEN 42:8 Yoosefi ba ishata eris, shin enti iya eribookona.
GEN 42:9 Yoosefi entaba amuhida ba amuhuwa akeekidi entako, “Hinte wochanaw yida asi, hinte nu biittan naagoy lepiya baggay awuneko be7anaw yideta” yaagis.
GEN 42:10 Enti, “Akay, nu godaw, nuuni wochanaw yida asi gidoko. Nuuni ne aylleti kathi shammanaw yida.
GEN 42:11 Nuuni ubbayka issi aawa nayta. Nuuni ne aylleti ammanetiya asi” yaagidosona.
GEN 42:12 Yoosefi entako, “Akay, hinte nu biittan naagoy lepiya baggay awuneko be7anaw yideta” yaagis.
GEN 42:13 Shin enti, “Nuuni ne aylleti Kanaane biittan de7iya issi ura nayta; nuuni tammanne nam7u ishanta. Wursetha kaaloy ha7i nu aawara son de7ees, issoy hayqis” yaagidosona.
GEN 42:14 Yoosefi entako, “Taani hintew odidaysada hinte biitta wocheyisata.
GEN 42:15 Hinte paacetanaysi haysana; tuma Kawoy hayqo, hinte wursetha kaalo ishay haysa yoona ixiko, hinte ha bessaafe beeketa.
GEN 42:16 Hinte odeysi tuma gideysa paacanaw, hintefe issuwa kiittite. I hinte isha ekidi yo, attidaysati qasho keethan gam7eeta. Hessi hanona ixiko, Kawoy hayqo, hinte biitta wocheyisata” yaagis.
GEN 42:17 Entana heedzu gallas qasho keethan qachis.
GEN 42:18 Heedzantho gallasan Yoosefi entako, “Taani Xoosse yayiya asi. Yaaniya gisho, hinte issiba oothiko hinte shempuwa ashshana.
GEN 42:19 Hinte tumaka ammanetiya ase gidiko, hinte ishatape issoy haysan qasho keethan de7o; attidaysati koshatiya hinte soo asaas kathi efite;
GEN 42:20 Shin hinte wursetha ishaa taako ehiko, hinte qaalay tumatana; hinteka hayqonna attana” yaagis. Entika iya oda ero gidi ekidosona.
GEN 42:21 Enti issoy issuwako, “Tuma nuuni nu ishas oothidabay nuna kaa7ees. I ba shempuwas watwatidi woossiya wode nuuni si7ishe ixida. Hessa gisho, ha waayey nuna gakis” yaagidosona.
GEN 42:22 Robeeli, “Taani hintena, na7aa bolla nagara oothopite gada odas, Shin hinte si7onna ixideta. Ha7i iya suuthay nuna achees” yaagis.
GEN 42:23 Yoosefi entara turjumaanen odetiya gisho enti giyaba I ereysa enti akeekibokona;
GEN 42:24 I entafe haraso bidi yeekis. Shin zaari entako yidi, entaw gujidika odis. I Simoona enta giddofe kessidi enti be7ishin qachis.
GEN 42:25 Yoosefi ba aylleta, “Katha enta ogoruwan kunthite; enta miishiyaka zaaridi, enta ogoruwan ogoruwan yeggite. Entaw oges shinqeka immite” yaagidi kiittis.
GEN 42:26 Enti I gidaysada oothidaape guye, Yoosefa ishati katha banta hareta bolla caanidi bidosona.
GEN 42:27 Enti qamma aqiya bessan entafe issoy ba hariyas kathaafe yegganaw ba ogoruwa billidi, he ogoruwa doonan de7iya ba miishiya demmis.
GEN 42:28 I ba ishatako, “Ta miishey taw simmis; tuma haysa be7ite; Ta ogoruwan de7ees” yaagis. Enti dagammidi kokorishe, issoy issuwako simmidi, “Xoossay nu bolla oothidabay haysi aybee?” yaagidosona.
GEN 42:29 Enti Kanaane biittan de7iya banta aawa Yayqoobako yidi, bantana gakidaba ubbaa iyaw odidosona.
GEN 42:30 Enti iyako, “He biitta haariya uray, nuna he biitta wochiya asada oothidi nu bolla yilotidi odetis.
GEN 42:31 Shin nuuni iyako, ‘Nuuni ammanetiya asi, biitta wocheyisata gidoko.
GEN 42:32 Nuuni tammanne nam7u ishanti issi aawa nayta. Issoy hayqis; wursetha kaaloy Kanaane biittan ha7i nu aawara de7ees’ yaagida.
GEN 42:33 Yaatin he biitta haariya uray nuna, ‘Hinte ammanetiya ase gideysa taani erana mela hinte ishatape issuwa haysan ta matan aggidi, koshatiya hinte soo asaas kathi ekidi biite.
GEN 42:34 Hinte biitta wocheyisata gidonna, ammanetiya asi gideysa taani erana mela, hinte wursetha isha taako ekidi yiite. Yaatiko, taani han attida hinte ishaa hintew zaarada immana. Hinteka ha biittan de7idi zal7anaw danda7eeta’ ” yaagidosona.
GEN 42:35 Enti banta ogoruwape kathaa qolishe, banta ogoruwan ogoruwan banta miishiya qashuwara uttidaysa demmidosona. Entinne enta aaway he qashuwara de7iya miishiya be7idi yayyidosona.
GEN 42:36 Enta aawa Yayqoobi entako, “Hinte tana ta naytape mela ashshideta. Yoosefi baawa, Simooni baawa, ha7i qassi Biniyaame efanaw koyeeta. Ubbabay taw zoko zaaris” yaagis.
GEN 42:37 Hessafe guye Robeeli ba aawako, “Taani Biniyaame new zaarada ehonna ixiko, ta adde nayta nam7aaka wodha. Tana ammanetada iya ta kushen yegga; taani iya zaarada ehana” yaagis.
GEN 42:38 Shin Yayqoobi entako, “Ta na7ay hintera beenna; iya ishay hayqin, attiday iya xalaala. Hinte efishin, ogen iitabay iya gakiko, hinte ta cimatetha afuthu muzishe ta hayquwa matayeta” yaagis.
GEN 43:1 Kanaane biittan koshay ha77ika kaseysafe aadhidi wolqaamis.
GEN 43:2 Yaanin, enti Gibxefe ehida katha ubba midi ongin, enta aaway, “Qassika Gibxe bidi nuus guutha kathi shammite” yaagis.
GEN 43:3 Shin Yihudi, “He uray nuna, ‘Hinte ishay hintera yoona ixiko, ta som7uwa zaari be7eketa’ yaagidi minthidi odis.
GEN 43:4 Neeni nu isha nuura yeddiko, nuuni Gibxe bidi new kathi shammana.
GEN 43:5 Shin he uray, ‘Hinte ishay hintera yoona ixiko hinte ta som7uwa zaari be7eketa’ ” yaagida gisho, neeni iya yeddonnaba gidiko nuuni booko.
GEN 43:6 Yaatin Isra7eeley, “Hinte, ‘Nuus hara ishi de7ees’ gidi odidi ha metuwa ta bolla ayis ehidetii?” yaagis.
GEN 43:7 Enti zaaridi, “He uray nubaanne nu soo asaaba minthidi oychis. I nuuko, ‘Hinte aaway paxa de7ii? Hintew hara ishi de7ii?’ yaagidi oychis. Nuuni I oychidaysa iyaw zaarida. I nuna, ‘Hinte isha eki yiite’ gaanaba nu awude erido?” yaagidosona.
GEN 43:8 Yihudi ba aawa Isra7eeleko, “Nuuni, neeninne nu nayti koshan hayqanaape na7aa taara yedda, nuuni baana.
GEN 43:9 Na7a ta waasetethan imma; iyabaa tana oycha. Taani iya new saro zaarada ehonna ixiko, ta de7o ubban ne baadethay tana gako.
GEN 43:10 Nu gam7onaba gidiyako, hannoode nam7antho yaa simmana shin” yaagis.
GEN 43:11 Enta aaway Isra7eeley, “Hessa gidiko haareysas kushe genthiyaba, ha biittan kaxiyaba ubbaafe lo77oba doorite. Hessika, qibaate, shitto, dumma dumma sawo, eessinne, ocholone hinte ogoruwan yeggidi, ekidi biite.
GEN 43:12 Hinte ogoruwa doonan simmida miishey baletidaba gidanaw danda7iya gisho, miishiya nam7u kushe oothidi eki biite.
GEN 43:13 Hinte ishaa ekidi, he uraako ellesidi guye biite.
GEN 43:14 I hanko hinte ishaanne Biniyaame hintera yeddana mela Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossay he uray hintew qadhetanada ootho. Tana gidiko, ta naytape mela attikoka attas” yaagis.
GEN 43:15 Hessa gisho, ishanti wolla banta immiyabata, nam7u kushe miishiyanne Biniyaame bantara ekidi bidosona. Enti Gibxe gakidi, Yoosefa sinthe shiiqidosona.
GEN 43:16 Yoosefi Biniyaame entara be7ida wode ba keetha kaapuwako, “Ha asata ta soo ekada ba. Issi mehe shukada giigisa; enti kathi taara maana” yaagidi kiittis.
GEN 43:17 Yaatin kaapoy, Yoosefi kiitidaysada he asata iya soo efis.
GEN 43:18 Enti Yoosefa soo bishe, yayidi, “Enti nuna haysa ehiday koyro nu ogoruwan simmida miishiya gisho gidonna aggenna. Enti nuna qohidi aylletethan haaronnanne nu hareta ekona aggokona” yaagi hirgidosona.
GEN 43:19 Hessa gisho, enti Yoosefa soo penge gakidi, keetha kaapuwa odisidosona.
GEN 43:20 “Godaw, nuuni koyro kathi shammanaw haysa yida.
GEN 43:21 Guye simmishe nuuni qamma aqiya bessan ogoruwa billiya wode huuphen huuphen nu miishey paconna nu ogoruwan de7eysa demmida. Heko, nuuni he miishiya guye eki yida.
GEN 43:22 Ha7i nuuni katha shammanaw hara miishe oyki yida. Nu miishiya nu ogoruwan ooni yeggidaako eroko” yaagidosona.
GEN 43:23 I zaaridi, “Aykoy baawa, yayofite; hinte Xoossay, hinte aawa Xoossay, hinte ogoruwan hintew miishe immis. Taani hinte ciggida miishiya kumethi ekas” yaagis. Hessafe guye, Simoona entako kessis.
GEN 43:24 He uray he asata Yoosefa soo efidi, enta tohuwas haathe ehin, enti meecetidosona. Enta haretasika miyaba yeggis.
GEN 43:25 Enti Yoosefara kathi maanaysa si7ida gisho banta immanabata Yoosefas giigisidosona.
GEN 43:26 Yoosefi ba soo gelida wode enti ehida banta immiyabata iyaw immidi, iya sinthan sa7a gakidi ziggidosona.
GEN 43:27 I enta sarotetha oychi simmidi, “Hinte taw odida hinte cimida aaway lo77o de7ii? Ha77ika I paxa de7ii?” yaagis.
GEN 43:28 Enti, “Ee, ne aylley, nu aaway paxa de7ees; I lo77o” yaagidi, hokidi iyaw ziggidosona.
GEN 43:29 I ba aaye na7aa Biniyaame be7ida wode entako, “Hinte odida wursetha hinte ishay haysee?” yaagis. Biniyaame, “Ta na7aw, nena Xoossay anjo” yaagis.
GEN 43:30 Yoosefi, iya ishaabay iyaw gompan seellida gisho, ellesidi, qol7a gelidi yan yeekis.
GEN 43:31 I ba som7uwa meecetidaape guye keyidi bana minthethidi, kathi aathana mela kiittis.
GEN 43:32 Enti Yoosefas dumma, iya ishatas dumma aathidosona. Gibxe asay Ibraawe asatara issife meysi bantana kawushiyaba oothi xeelliya gisho iyara miya Gibxe asatas dumma aathidosona.
GEN 43:33 Enti Yoosefa sinthan bayray ba bayratethan, kaaloy ba kaalotethan maaran uttidosona. Enti issoy issuwa xeellidi, enta waatidi utisidaako be7idi malaaletidosona.
GEN 43:34 Yoosefa gaytape entaw qumi gishetees, shin Biniyaames haratape aathidi ichashu kushe immis. Yaanidi, enti Yoosefara midi uyidi ufaytidosona.
GEN 44:1 Yoosefi ba keetha kaapuwa, “Neeni ha asati tookanaw denda7ida keena enta ogoruwan kathi kuntha. Enta ubbaa miishiya enta ogoruwa doonan doonan yegga.
GEN 44:2 Yaatada wursetha kaaluwa ogoruwa doonan ta bira wancaanne I shammanaw ehida miishiya yegga” yaagidi kiittis. I Yoosefi gidaysada oothis.
GEN 44:3 Sa7i wontin he asati banta hareta ekidi baanaw dendidosona.
GEN 44:4 Enti he katamaape keyidi haaki boonna de7ishin, Yoosefi ba keetha kaapuwako, “Ha asata geedo kaalla. Neeni enta gakida wode entako, ‘Hinte ayis keeha iitan zaaridetii?
GEN 44:5 Haysi ta goday uyeysanne xuuraba demmiya wanca gideysa ereketii? Ayis kaysotidetii? Haysi hinte oothidabay daro iitaba’ yaaga” yaagis.
GEN 44:6 Yaatin I enta geedo kaali gakidi, he gidaysadaka entaw odis.
GEN 44:7 Shin enti, “Godaw haysa melaba ayis odetay? Hessa melaba oosoy nuupe ne aylletape haako.
GEN 44:8 Nuuni hari attoshin, nu ogoruwa doonape demmida miishiya Kanaane biittafe guye zaaridi new ehidaysa eraasa. Ne godaa keethaafe nuuni worqa woyko bira waati kaysotanee?
GEN 44:9 Ne aylleta giddon he wancay bentida uray hayqo. Qassi attida nuka nu godaas aylle gidana” yaagidosona.
GEN 44:10 I entako, “Hessa gidiko lo77o, hinte gidaysada hano. Wanca ekida oonika ta aylle gidana; attidaysati saron beeta” yaagis.
GEN 44:11 Hessafe guye, enti ellesidi banta ogoruwa ogoruwa sa7an wothidi billidosona.
GEN 44:12 He kaapoy ubbaafe bayra ogoruwape doomidi wursetha kaaluwaysa gakanaw koyidi, he wanca Biniyaame ogoruwape demmis.
GEN 44:13 Hessan enti azzanidi, banta ma7uwa peedhidosona. Banta ogoruwa hareta bolla caanidi, guye katama simmidosona.
GEN 44:14 Yihudi ba ishatara Yoosefako geliya wode Yoosefi son de7ees; enti iya sinthan sa7an gufannidosona.
GEN 44:15 Yoosefi entako, “Hinte aybi palaba oothidetii? Ta mela asi xuuraba demmanaw danda7eysa hinte ereketiyee?” yaagis.
GEN 44:16 Yihudi, “Ta godaas nuuni ay gaanee? Nuuni ay odetiyabay de7ii? Nu xillotetha nuuni waati bessanee? Xoossay ne aylleta naaquwa qoncisis. Hiza nuunika he wancay bentida urayka ta godaas aylle gidida” yaagis.
GEN 44:17 Shin Yoosefi, “Hessa melaba oothanaysi taape haako; ta wancay iyape bentida ura xalaali ta aylle gidana. Hanko hinte hinte aawako guye saro simmite” yaagis.
GEN 44:18 Yihudi iyako shiiqidi “Ta godaw, neeni kawa mela gidikoka taani neera odetanaw nena woossayis. Tana ne aylliya hanqetofa.
GEN 44:19 Neeni ta goday nuna ne aylleta, ‘Hintew aawi woyko ishi de7ii?’ gada oychadasa.
