GEN 44:20 Nuunika, ‘Nuus cimida aaway de7ees. I cimatethan yelida kaalo na7ayka de7ees. He na7aa ishay hayqis, ba Aayen issino, iya aaway iya daro dosees’ yaagida.
GEN 44:21 “Neeni nuuko, ‘Taani iya be7ana mela taw ehite’ yaagadasa.
GEN 44:22 Yaatin nuuni, ‘He na7ay ba aawape shaaketanaw danda7enna; shaaketiko iya aaway hayqana’ yaagida.
GEN 44:23 Shin neeni, ‘Hinte kaalo ishay hintera yoona ixiko, ta ayfiya zaari be7eketa’ yaagadasa.
GEN 44:24 Nuuni nu aawako simmidi bida wode ne gidaysa iyaw odida.
GEN 44:25 “Nu aaway, ‘Guye bidi guutha kathi shammite’ yaagin,
GEN 44:26 nuuni iyako, ‘Nu kaalo ishay nuura boonna ixiko, ura ayfiya be7anaw danda7oko. Nu kaalo ishay nuura biyaba gidiko, nuuni yaa baana’ yaagida.
GEN 44:27 “Yaatin nu aaway nuna, ‘Ta machiya Raheela taw nam7u adde nayta yelidaysa hinte ereeta.
GEN 44:28 Entafe issoy taape shaaketidi bin, iya do7i moonna aggenna yaagas. Hachi gakanaw taani iya be7abike.
GEN 44:29 Haysa qassi taape hinte shaaki efin, iitabay iya gakiko, hinte tana ta cimatethan afuthu muzishe ta hayquwa matayeta’ ” yaagis.
GEN 44:30 “Hessa gisho, ha77i taani guye ta aawako biya wode Biniyaamey taara baanaw bessees. Ta aaway na7aa shempofe dosiya gisho, na7ay nuura baynaysa be7iko hayqana. Nuuni ne aylleti nu aawa cimatetha afuthan duufo gelsoos.
GEN 44:32 Taani ne aylley na7aa ta waasetethan ekas. Qassi, ‘Ta aawaw, taani iya new saro zaarada ehonna ixiko ta de7uwa ubban ne baadethay tana gako’ yaagas.
GEN 44:33 “Yaaniya gisho, taani ne aylley na7aa gisho aylletada haysan attana na7ay ba ishatara guye simmo.
GEN 44:34 Na7ay bayna taani waanada guye ta aawako simmanee? Tana ta aaway seeletana seela bessofo” yaagis.
GEN 45:1 He wode Yoosefi ba aylleta sinthan gencanaw danda7iboona gisho, “Asa ubbaa ta sinthafe kessite” yaagidi waassis. Hessa gisho, Yoosefi ba ishatas bana erisida wode iyara oonika allagi baawa.
GEN 45:2 I ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, Gibxeti iya si7ana gakanaw yeekis; kawa soo asayka he woriya si7idosona.
GEN 45:3 Yoosefi ba ishatako, “Taani Yoosefabay. Ta aaway hanno gakanaw paxa de7ii?” yaagidi oychis. Shin iya ishati daro dagammida gisho, iyaw aykoka zaaranaw danda7ibookona.
GEN 45:4 Yaanin, Yoosefi ba ishatako, “Taako haa shiiqite” yaagis. Enti iyako shiiqin I enta, “Taani hinte tana Gibxe biitta bayzida hinte ishaa Yoosefa.
GEN 45:5 Ha77i hinte tana bayzida gisho, qiirotofitenne hintena baaddofite. Ayis giiko, Xoossay tana hintefe sinthe kiitiday asa shempo ashshanaasa.
GEN 45:6 Ha biitta koshi gelin haysi nam7antho laythi. Asi goyonna woyko cakonna hara ichashu laythati buroo de7oosona.
GEN 45:7 Shin taani sa7an hinte sheeshanne hintena malaalsiya ogen ashshana mela Xoossay tana hintefe sinthe kiittis.
GEN 45:8 Hessa gisho, tana ha bessa kiittiday Xoossafe attishin, hintena gideketa. I tana Gibxe kawas zoriya aawa, iya aqo ubbaa bolla godanne Gibxe biitta haariya asi oothis.
GEN 45:9 “Ha77i ellesidi guye ta aawako bidi iyako, ne na7ay Yoosefi haysada yaagees giite; ‘Xoossay tana Gibxe biitta ubbaa bolla godaa kessis; neeni gam7onna taako haaya.
GEN 45:10 Ne nayta, ne nayta nayta, ne dorsaa, ne deesha, ne mehiyanne new de7iyaba ubbaa ekada haaya; ta matan Geesame biittan de7aasa.
GEN 45:11 Buroo ichashu kosha laythati attidosona. Nena, ne soo asaanne ne mehiya koshi qohonna mela taani nena muzana’ ” yaagis.
GEN 45:12 Qassika Yoosefi entako, “Hinteka, ta ishaa Biniyaameyka, ha hintera odetey tuma tana Yoosefa gideysa hinte ayfiyan be7ideta.
GEN 45:13 Taw Gibxe biittan de7iya gita bonchuwanne hinte be7idaba ubbaa ta aawas odite. Ta aawaka ellesidi haa ekidi yiite” yaagis.
GEN 45:14 Yoosefara Biniyaamera nam7ay wolu qoomidi yeekidosona
GEN 45:15 Yoosefi yeekishe ba ishata ubbaa yeeris. Hessafe guye, iya ishati iyara odetidosona.
GEN 45:16 Yoosefa ishata yuussaa worey kawo keethi gakida wode kawoynne iya moorinnati ufaytidosona.
GEN 45:17 Kawoy Yoosefako, “Neeni ne ishatako yaaga; hinte hareta caanidi, Kanaane biitta simmite.
GEN 45:18 Hinte aawanne hinte soo asa ekidi, guye taako haa yiite. Taani hintew Gibxe biittan ubbaafe lo77iya bessa immiko, he biitta modhuwa hinte kaashana.
GEN 45:19 Qassika, banta nayta, banta machetanne banta aawa ehanaw Gibxefe gita para gaare eki baana mela enta kiita.
GEN 45:20 Gibxe biittan de7iya ubbaafe aadhidi lo77iyabay entassa gidiya gisho, banta aggidi yaa aquwas qoponna mela entaw oda” yaagis.
GEN 45:21 Yaatin Isra7eele adde nayti kawoy gidaysada oothidosona. Yoosefi Kawoy kiitidaysada gita para gaaretanne oges shinqeka entaw immis.
GEN 45:22 Enta ubbaas huuphen huuphen ooratha ma7o immis. Shin Biniyaames tammanne usupun kilo giraame deexiya biranne ichashu kumetha ma7o immis.
GEN 45:23 I ba aawas Gibxen de7iyabaape lo77iyaba ubbaa tammu adde haren caanidi, qassi oges kathi, uythinne hara kathi tammu macca haretan caanidi yeddis.
GEN 45:24 Yaatidi, Yoosefi ba ishata moyzishe, entako, “Ogiyan bishe ooyetofite” yaagis.
GEN 45:25 Enti Gibxefe dendidi, Kanaane biittan de7iya banta aawa Yayqoobako simmidosona.
GEN 45:26 Enti Yayqoobako, “Yoosefi paxa de7ees. I hessafe aadhidi Gibxe biitta ubbaa haarees” yaagidosona. Yayqoobi dagammidi, wozana dhayda gisho, enti giyaba ammanibena.
GEN 45:27 Shin enti Yoosefi entaw odidaba ubbaa iyaw odin, qassika iya eki yaana mela I yeddida gita para gaareta I be7in iyaw shempoy simmis.
GEN 45:28 Isra7eeley, “Hiza ta ammanetas. Ta na7aa Yoosefi hanno gakanaw paxa de7ees. Ta hayqanaape sinthe bada iya be7ana” yaagis.
GEN 46:1 Isra7eeley baw de7iyaba ubbaa ekidi, Barsaabe gakida wode ba aawa Yisaaqa Xoossas yarsho yarshis.
GEN 46:2 Xoossay qamma Isra7eeles qoncidi, “Yayqooba, Yayqooba” yaagis. Ika, “Heko, abe Godaw” gidi koyis.
GEN 46:3 Xoossay iyako, “Taani Xoossaa, ne aawa Xoossa; neeni Gibxe baanaw babofa. Ta ne sheesha yan gita dere kessana.
GEN 46:4 Taani neera issife Gibxe baana; taani ne sheesha yaape kessada haa ehana. Ne hayqiya wode Yoosefi ne ayfiya oykana” yaagis.
GEN 46:5 Hessafe guye, Yayqoobi Barsaabepe dendis. Isra7eele adde nayti banta aawa Yayqooba, banta naytanne banta macheta Gibxe Kawoy entaw yeddida gita para gaare bolla uttisidi efidosona.
GEN 46:6 Enti Kanaane biittan haarida haaruwanne mehe ubbaa eki bidosona. Yayqoobi ba soo asa ubbaa ekidi Gibxe bis.
GEN 46:7 I ba soo asa ubbaa; adde naytanne ba adde nayta nayta, ba macca naytanne ba macca nayta nayta, ubbaa baara ekidi Gibxe bis.
GEN 46:8 Isra7eelera Gibxe biitta bida iya nayta sunthay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa. Yayqooba bayra na7ay Robeela;
GEN 46:9 Robeela adde nayti Hanooka, Pala, Hesiroonanne Karma.
GEN 46:10 Simoona adde nayti Yamu7eela, Yamina, Ohada, Yakina, Xohaaranne Kanaane maccaseepe yelida Saa7ula.
GEN 46:11 Leewe adde nayti Gedisoona, Qahatanne Meraara.
GEN 46:12 Yihuda adde nayti Era, Onaana, Seela, Paaresanne Zaara. Shin Erinne Onani Kanaane biittan hayqidosona. Paaresa adde nayti Hesiroonanne Hamuula.
GEN 46:13 Yisakoora adde nayti Tola, Puu7a, Yoobanne Shimroona.
GEN 46:14 Zabloona adde nayti Sareda, Eloonanne Yahilaala.
GEN 46:15 Ha adde naytinne macca na7iya Diina, Liya Masephexoome biittan Yayqoobas yelidaysata. Diina gujin iya naytinne nayta nayti kumethi hastamanne heedza.
GEN 46:16 Gaade adde nayti Xafoona, Hagge, Shuuna, Exiboona, Eri, Aroodanne Ar7eela.
GEN 46:17 Aseera adde nayti Yimina, Yesuwa, Yisiwanne Beri7a. Enta michiya Saraho. Beri7a adde nayti Hebeeranne Malki7eela.
GEN 46:18 Haysati Laabi ba na7e Liyas immida Zalafa Yayqoobas yelida nayta. Enti kumethi tammanne usupuna.
GEN 46:19 Yayqooba mache Raheeli adde nayti Yoosefanne Biniyaame.
GEN 46:20 Ona katama kahine Phoxfaara na7iya Asnaata Yoosefas Gibxen Minaasenne Efreema yelasu.
GEN 46:21 Biniyaame nayti Beella, Bekera, Asbeela, Geera, Naamane, Eha, Orosha, Mufima, Hufimanne Arada.
GEN 46:22 Haysati Yayqoobas yeletida Raheeli adde nayta. Enti kumethi tammanne oydda.
GEN 46:23 Daane adde na7ay Hushima.
GEN 46:24 Niftaaleme adde nayti Yahixeela, Guna, Yexeranne Shileme.
GEN 46:25 Haysati laapunati Laabi ba na7e Raheelis immida Baali Yayqoobas yelida naytanne nayta nayta.
GEN 46:26 Yayqoobara Gibxe bida, iya gulbatape keyida nayti, iya nayta macheta gujonna usupun tammanne usupuna.
GEN 46:27 Gibxen Yoosefas yeletida nam7u nayta gujiko, Gibxe bida Yayqooba soo asay kumethi laapun tamma.
GEN 46:28 Geesame biittan bantana mokana mela Yayqoobi Yihuda baape sinthe Yoosefako kiittis. Enti yaa gakiya wode,
GEN 46:29 Yoosefi ba para gaariya giigisidi, ba aawa Isra7eelera gahetanaw Geesame bis. Yoosefi ba aawa demmida mela iya qoodhiyan xaaxetidi daro wode yeekis.
GEN 46:30 Isra7eeley Yoosefako, “Neeni paxa de7ishin, taani ne ayfiya be7ida gisho, hiza taani hayqikoka aykoy baawa” yaagis.
GEN 46:31 Hessafe guye, Yoosefi ba ishatanne ba aawa soo asatako, “Taani Gibxe kawako bada iyako, ‘Kanaane biittan de7iya ta ishatinne ta aawa soo asay taako yidosona.
GEN 46:32 Enti mehe haareyisata, enti bantara banta dorsa, banta deesha, mehiyanne bantaw de7iyaba ubbaa ekidi yidosona’ yaagana.
GEN 46:33 Kawoy hintena xeegisidi, ‘Hinte oosoy aybee?’ gidi oychiko,
GEN 46:34 hinte iyako, ‘Nuuni ne aylleti na7atethafe doomidi nu aawatada mehe heemmoos’ yaagite. Dorse haariya asi Gibxe asan kadhetidaba gidiya gisho, I hinte Geesame biittan daana mela oothana” yaagis.
GEN 47:1 Yoosefi ba ishatape ichashata dooridi Gibxe kawako gelidi haysada yaagis; “Ta aawaynne ta ishati, banta dorsa, banta deesha, banta mehiyanne bantaw de7iyaba ubbaa ekidi Kanaane biittafe yidi, ha7i Geesamen de7oosona” yaagis.
GEN 47:3 Kawoy he ishatako, “Hinte oosoy aybee?” yaagidi oychis. Enti kawako, “Nuuni ne aylleti nu aawatada dorse haariya asata” yaagidi zaaridosona.
GEN 47:4 Qassika enti iyako, “Kanaane biittan koshi keyida gishonne nu mehiyas miyabay dhayda gisho, nuuni haysan daanaw yida. Hayyana, nuna ne aylleta Geesame biittan de7o garki” yaagidosona.
GEN 47:5 Kawoy Yoosefako, “Ne aawaynne ne ishati neeko yidosona.
GEN 47:6 Hiza Gibxe biittay ne kushena. Ha biittan ubbaafe aadhidi lo77iya bessan ne aawanne ne ishata wotha; enti Geesame biittan de7ona. Enta giddofe dumma qaratethi de7eysati de7iko, hessata ta mehiya bolla shuuma” yaagis.
GEN 47:7 Hessafe guye, Yoosefi ba aawa Yayqooba gelsidi, kawa sinthe aathis. Yayqoobi Gibxe kawa anjidaape guye,
GEN 47:8 Kawoy Yayqooba, “New aapun laythee?” yaagidi oychis.
GEN 47:9 Yayqoobi kawako, “Taani daabursan de7ida laythay xeetanne hastama. Ta laythay beni ta aawati daabursan de7ida laythafe guuthanne metoy darida laythi” yaagis.
GEN 47:10 Hessafe guye, Yayqoobi kawa anjidi, iya sinthafe kare keyis.
GEN 47:11 Yoosefi kawoy kiitidaysada ba aawanne ba ishata Gibxe biittan Ramse katama matan de7iya ubbaafe aadhida arada biittan enta wothis.
GEN 47:12 Yoosefi ba aawas, ba ishatasinne baara de7iya ubbaas enta nayta taybuwada kathi immis.
GEN 47:13 Biitta ubban koshi suullida gisho biittan ubban kathi baawa; Gibxeynne Kanaane biittay qohetidosona.
GEN 47:14 Yoosefi Gibxe katha bayzidi, Gibxeninne Kanaane biittatan de7iya miishiya ubbaa shiishidi Gibxe kawa keetha gelsis.
GEN 47:15 Gibxe miisheynne Kanaane miishey wurida wode Gibxe asa ubbay Yoosefako yidi “Nuus kathi imma. Nu miishey wurida gisho nuuni ne sinthan ayis koshan hayqanee?” yaagidosona.
GEN 47:16 Yoosefi entako, “Hinte mehiya eki yiite. Hinte miishey wuridaba gidiko, taani katha hinte mehiyara laammana” yaagis.
GEN 47:17 Hessa gisho, enti banta mehiya Yoosefas ehidosona. Yoosefi enta para, dorsa, deesha, miizanne hariya kathara laammis. I he laythi enta mehiya ubbara kathaa laammidi, enta muzidi shaachis.
GEN 47:18 Enti kaalliya laythan iyako yidi “Nuuni nu godaape qosiyabay baawa; nu miishey ubbay wuris. Nu mehiyaka new immi diggida. Nu bollafenne nu gadiyape attishin, nu godaas immanabay harabay baawa.
GEN 47:19 Nuuni ne be7ishin ayis koshan hayqanee? Nu gadeyka ayis dhayii? Nunaka nu gadiyaka shammada nuus kathi imma. Nuuni kawas aylletana, nu gadeyka iyabaa gido. Nuuni hayqonna attana mela nu gadeyka oxonna mela zerethi nuus imma” yaagidosona.
GEN 47:20 Yoosefi Gibxe biitta ubbaa kawas shammis. Koshi suullin, Gibxe asay un7etidi banta gadiya bayzin gadey kawuwaba gidis.
GEN 47:21 Yoosefi asa ubbaa Gibxes ha gaxape hini gaxa gakanaw kawas aylle oothis.
GEN 47:22 Shin kawoy kahinetas kathi immiya gisho Yoosefi enta gadiya shammibeenna. Hessa gisho, banta gadiya bayzibokona.
GEN 47:23 Yoosefi asaako, “Hiza hachi taani hintenanne hinte gadiya kawas shammida gisho, zerethi efidi hinte gaden zerite.
GEN 47:24 Shin kathaa shiishiya wode ayfidabape ichashu kushiyape issi kushiya kawas immite. Attida oyddu kushey hinte gadiyas zerethi, hintewunne hinte soo asaas kathi gido” yaagis.
GEN 47:25 Enti, “Neeni nuna ashshadasa. Nu godaa sinthan nuuni sabetiko, nuuni kawas aylletana” yaagidosona.
GEN 47:26 Hessa gisho, Yoosefi Gibxe biittan ayfidabape ichashu kushiyape issuwa kawas immeysa higge kessis. He wogayka hachi gakana eqidi de7ees. Kahineta gadiyape attishin, hari ubbay kawuwaba gidis.
GEN 47:27 Isra7eeleti Gibxe biittan Geesame giya bessan de7idosona. Enti yan duretidosona; yeleti daridosona.
GEN 47:28 Yayqoobi Gibxe biittan tammanne laapun laythi de7is. Yayqoobi de7ida laythay xeetanne oytamanne laapuna.
GEN 47:29 Isra7eeles hayqiya wodey matatin, ba na7aa Yoosefa xeegisidi haysada yaagis; “Taani ne sinthan sabetidaba gidiko, ne kushiya ta shempuwa bolla wotha. Neeni taw mishetiyaba gidiko tana Gibxen moogike gada taw caaqa.
GEN 47:30 Shin taani hayqiya wode tana Gibxefe efada, ta mayzati moogetidasuwan mooga” yaagis. Yoosefi, “Taani, nena ne gidaysada oothana” yaagis.
GEN 47:31 Yayqoobi iyako, “Ane taw caaqa” yaagis. Yoosefi iyaw caaqis. Hessafe guye, Isra7eeley ba guufiya bolla katidi Xoossaa goyinnis.
GEN 48:1 Hessafe guye asay, “Ne aaway saketees” yaagidi Yoosefas odidosona. I ba nam7u adde nayta Minaasenne Efreema ekidi ba aawa be7anaw bis.
GEN 48:2 Yayqoobi, iya na7ay Yoosefi yidaysa si7ida wode, Isra7eeley bana minthethidi hiixan uttis.
GEN 48:3 Yayqoobi Yoosefa, “Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossay Kanaane biittan Looza kataman taw qoncidi, tana anjis.
GEN 48:4 I tana, ‘Taani ne yeletetha darsana, nena daro dere oothana. Ha biitta taani neepe guye, ne sheeshas merina laata oothada immana’ ” yaagis.
GEN 48:5 “Hiza, ne nam7u adde nayti, taani neeko haa yaanape sinthe Gibxen new yeletidaysati tabaa. Efreemeynne Minaasey taw Robeela melanne Simoona mela.
GEN 48:6 Entafe guye yeletanaysati nebaa gido. Enti laattana biittay Efreema sunthaninne Minaase sunthan gido.
GEN 48:7 Taani Masephexoomepe simmishin, Efraata gakanaw guuthi attishin, Raheela Kanaane biittan hayqasu. Taani iyo Beeteleme geetetiya Efraata efiya ogiya gaxan moogas” yaagis.
GEN 48:8 Isra7eeley Yoosefa adde nayta nam7ata be7ida wode, “Haysati oonantee?” yaagidi oychis.
GEN 48:9 Yoosefi ba aawako, “Haysati Xoossay taw ha biittan immida nayta” yaagis. Yaatin Isra7eeley, “Taani enta anjana mela, enta taako haa shiisha” yaagis.
GEN 48:10 Isra7eeley cimin iya ayfey ixida gisho, xeellanaw danda7enna. Hessa gisho, Yoosefi ba adde nayta iyako shiishin, Yayqoobi enta idimmidi yeeris.
GEN 48:11 Isra7eeley Yoosefa, “Taani ne ayfiya be7ana gada qopabike, shin Xoossay heko ne naytaka tana bessis” yaagis.
GEN 48:12 Yoosefi ba nayta Yayqooba gulbatape denthidi, ba som7uwa sa7a gathidi ziggis.
GEN 48:13 Yoosefi ba nam7u adde nayta, Efreema Isra7eeles haddirsa baggara, Minaase Isra7eeles ushacha baggara essis.
GEN 48:14 Isra7eeley ba kushiya barbaxidi Efreemi kaalo gidikoka, ba ushacha kushiya huuphen wothis. Minaasey bayra gidikoka, Isra7eeley ba haddirsa kushiya Minaase huuphen wothis.
GEN 48:15 Hessafe guye, Yayqoobi Yoosefa haysada yaagidi anjis; “Ta aawati Abrahaameynne Yisaaqi, iya sinthan de7ida Xoossay, ta de7o ubban hachi gakanaw tana heemmida Xoossay nena anjo.
GEN 48:16 Iitaba ubbaafe tana ashshida, iya kiitanchoy, ha nayta naago. Ta sunthaynne, ta aawata Abrahaame Yisaaqa sunthay entan xeegeto. Enti sa7a bolla daro” yaagidi anjis.
GEN 48:17 Yoosefi ba aaway ba ushacha kushiya Efreema huuphen wothidaysa be7ida wode dosibeenna. Hessa gisho, Efreema huuphiyape denthidi, Minaase huuphen wothanaw ba aawa kushiya oykis.
GEN 48:18 Yoosefi, “Ta aawaw, hessa gidenna. Bayray haysa ne ushacha kushiya iya bolla wotha” yaagis.
GEN 48:19 Shin iya aaway ixidi, “Ta erayis, ta na7aw, ta erayis. Minaaseyka gita dere gidana, shin iya kaalo ishay iyape aadhidi gitatana. Iya sheeshayka daro gita kawotetha gidana” yaagis.
GEN 48:20 I he gallas enta anjishe, “Isra7eeleti anjo anjiya wode, ‘Xoossay hintena Efreemadanne Minaaseda ootho’ yaagidi hinte sunthan anjana” yaagis. Yaatidi Efreema Minaasepe sinthayis.
GEN 48:21 Hessafe guye, Isra7eeley Yoosefa, “Taani hayqanaw matas, shin Xoossay hintera de7ees. I hinte aawata biitta hintena guye zaarana.
GEN 48:22 Taani Amooretape ta mashshaninne ta dongen ekida biitta, ne ishatara ne shaaketada ekiya biitta bolla new gujada immas” yaagis.
GEN 49:1 Hessafe guye, Yayqoobi ba adde nayta xeegidi, “Sinthafe hananaba taani hintew odana mela ha shiiqite” yaagis.
GEN 49:2 “Hinteno Yayqooba nayto, issife shiiqidi si7ite; hinte aaway Isra7eeley odeysa hayzite.
GEN 49:3 “Robeela, ta bayra na7aw, neeni ta wolqaa; ta minotethas koyruwa; neeni bonchonka wolqanka ubbaafe aadhasa.
GEN 49:4 Neeni haatha mela, eqidason de7aka; ne ishata bolla bayratethi new bessena. Neeni ne aawa hiixan keyadasa; ne aawa arsa tunisadasa.
GEN 49:5 “Simooninne Leewey ishata; enti banta mashsha makallatethas denthoosona.
GEN 49:6 Enti banta hanquwan adde wodhidosona, banta amuwa kunthanaw boorata gaadiya qanxidosona. Yaaniya gisho, taani enta zoretan gelike; enta shiiquwanka uttike.
GEN 49:7 Enta wolqaama hanqoy enta wozanaa iitatethay baadetidaba gido. Taani, enta Yayqooba asa giddon laallana. Isra7eele biittan dharcana.
GEN 49:8 “Yihuda, ne ishati nena galatana; Ne kushey ne morketa qoodhe oykana; Ne aawa nayti new hokidi ziggana.
GEN 49:9 Yihudaa, neeni wodala gaammo; Ta na7aw, neeni shankafe wodhi simmidi, cogotidi zin7ida gaammo mela. Nena bochanaw danda7ey baawa.
GEN 49:10 Merinaw haareysi yaana gakanaw kawotetha xam7ay, Yihuda kushepe keyenna; kawotethati iyaw kiitetana.
GEN 49:11 I ba hariya woyne bolla, ba hare mara dooretida woyne bolla qachana; I ba ma7uwa suuthi daaniya woyne ushshan meeccana.
GEN 49:12 Iya ayfey woyne ushshafe aadhidi dulkana; iya achay xaamatape aadhidi booxana.
GEN 49:13 “Zabloni abba doonan daana; I abba doonan markabeti eqiya bessi gidana; iya zaway Sidoona gakana.
GEN 49:14 “Yisakoori mino hare mela, caanata giddon zin7ees.
GEN 49:15 Shin I ba shempiya bessay lo77o gideysanne ba biittay ufayseysa gideysa be7iya wode, caana tookanaw ba hashiya ziqi oothidi, aylletetha ooso oothana.
GEN 49:16 “Daaney Isra7eele zerethafe issuwa gidiya ba asa bolla pirdana.
GEN 49:17 Daaney oge gaxan de7iya shoosha mela, Para shuquliya dukidi, para toggidaysa guye yeggiya gope mela.
GEN 49:18 “Abeeti Godaw, taani ne ashuwa naagayis.
GEN 49:19 “Gaade, bonqeysati qohana; shin I enta geedo kaallidi oykana.
GEN 49:20 “Aseera biittay orde; I kawotas lo77o kathi immana.
GEN 49:21 “Niftaalemey qashetonna yeda de7iya, lo77o marata yeliya gen7e mela.
GEN 49:22 “Yoosefi haatha matan toketidi, dere bolla zaa7ida, ayfey kumida woyne mela.
GEN 49:23 Dongen dukeysati iya bolla dendana; banta dongiyan dukishe iya gooddana.
GEN 49:24 Shin Yayqooba Xoossa wolqan, Isra7eele henthanchuwa naaguwan, iya dongey mino, iya qesey xaala gidana.
GEN 49:25 Ne aawa Xoossay nena maaddana. Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossay, Bolla salo anjuwan, Garsa ciimmuwa anjuwan, mehenka yelonka nena anjana.
GEN 49:26 Ne aawa anjoy benipe minnidi de7iya zumata anjuwafeka, merinaw de7iya deretape bentiya ufaysiya anjuwafeka aadhees. Haysi ubbay Yoosefa huuphen, ba ishata giddon kaapo gideysa liiphen shempo.
GEN 49:27 “Biniyaamey bonqiya suudhume; ba olidaaba wonta mees; ba di77idabaa omarsi shaakees” yaagis.
GEN 49:28 Haysati tammanne nam7u Isra7eele sheeshata. Enta aaway enta huuphen huuphen entaw bessiya anjuwa anjishe entako gidabay haysa.
GEN 49:29 Hessafe guye, I enta haysada yaagidi kiittis; “Taani ta mayzatan gahetana hanayis. Tana Hite addiya Efroona gaden de7iya gongoluwan ta aawata matan moogite.
GEN 49:30 Hessika, Kanaane biittan, Maammire matan de7iya, Makifeelan de7iya gongoluwa. He gongoloy Abrahaamey moogoos Hite addiya Efroonape iya gadiyara shammida duufuwa.
GEN 49:31 Abrahaameynne iya machiya Saara, Yisaaqinne iya machiya Irbiqa yan moogetidosona. Taani qassi Liyaka yan moogas.
GEN 49:32 He gadeynne iyan de7iya gongoloy Hitetape shametidaysa. Tana yan moogite” yaagis.
GEN 49:33 Yayqoobi, ba nayta kiitaa ongidaape guye ba tohuwa ba hiixan shiishi ekidi, ba mayzatan gahetis.
GEN 50:1 Yoosefi ba aawa aha bolla kundidi, yeerishe iyaw yeekis.
GEN 50:2 Hessafe guye, Yoosefi dhale shiishiya ba oosanchota, ba aawa Isra7eele aha shitto tiyidi melisana mela kiittis. Enti tiyidi melisidosona.
GEN 50:3 Shitto tishsha wogay oytamu gallas kumethi ekees. Gibxe asati iyaw laapun tammu gallas yeekidosona.
GEN 50:4 Yeeho gallasati aadhida wode, Yoosefi Gibxe kawa oosanchota, “Taani hinte sinthan saba demmidaba gidiko, taw kawas haysada yaagidi odite.
GEN 50:5 ‘Ta aaway tana issi caaqo caaqisis. Taani hayqanaw matas. Taani ta huuphen Kanaane biittan bookida gongolo duufuwan tana mooga’ yaagis. Hessa gisho, ‘Ha7i taani yaa bada ta aawa moogada simmana mela tana yeddarki’ yaagite” yaagis.
GEN 50:6 Yaatin Kawoy, “I nena caaqisidaysada bada ne aawa mooga” yaagis.
GEN 50:7 Yaatin Yoosefi ba aawa mooganaw bis. Kawa moorinnati ubbay, kawa keethaninne Gibxen de7iya gita asati ubbay Yoosefa kaallidi bidosona.
GEN 50:8 Yoosefa soo asa ubbay, iya ishatinne iya aawa soo asati Yoosefara bidosona. Enta yooga nayti, enta dorsati, enta deeshatinne enta miiza wudiya xalaali Geesamen attis.
GEN 50:9 Para gaaretinne togati iyara bidosona. Iya kaallidi bida asay daro.
GEN 50:10 Enti Yordaanose Shaafa matan de7iya Axaade geetetiya wudumma gakidi, banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, zeleelidi yeekidosona. Yan Yoosefi ba aawa yeehuwan laapun gallas uttis.
GEN 50:11 He biittan de7iya Kanaane asati Axaade wudumman he yeehuwa be7ida wode, “Gibxeti aybi yibbata yeeho yeekona?” yaagidosona. Hessa gisho, Yordaanose matan de7iya he bessay Abeel-Mixraama (Gibxeta Yeeho) geetetis.
GEN 50:12 Yayqooba nayti enta aaway enta kiitidaysada oothidosona.
GEN 50:13 Enti iya aha Kanaane biitta efidi, Mamirepe ushacha baggan de7iya Makifeela gongoluwan moogidosona. Hessika, Abrahaamey Hite addiya Efroonape moogoos shammida gadiya.
GEN 50:14 Yoosefi ba aawa moogidaape guye, ba ishataranne iya aawa mooganaw iyara bida hara asata ubbatara Gibxe simmis.
GEN 50:15 Banta aaway hayqidaape guye, Yoosefa ishati banta giddon, “Nuuni iyaw oothida iitaba ubbaas Yoosefi nuna ba ulon morkidi halo keyanaw koyiko nuuni waananee?” yaagidosona.
GEN 50:16 Hessa gisho, Yoosefako yaagidi kiita kiittidosona; “Ne aaway hayqanaape sinthe nuuko,
GEN 50:17 ‘Neeni, ne ishata nagaraanne enta iita naaquwa hayyana atto yaaga yaagis gidi odite’ yaagis. Hessa gisho, ha7i hayyana, nu nagara, ne aawa Xoossa aylleta naaquwa atto yaaga” yaagidosona. Yoosefi hessa si7idi yeekis.
GEN 50:18 Hessafe guye, iya ishati banta huuphen iyako yidi, iya sinthan gufannidi, “Nuuni, ne aylleta” yaagidosona.
GEN 50:19 Shin Yoosefi entako, “Babofite, Tana hintew Xoossa gidetiyee?
GEN 50:20 Hinte taw iita oothideta, shin ha7i daro asay hayqonna attana mela Xoossay haysa lo77otethas oothis.
GEN 50:21 Hessa gisho, hiza babofite. Taani hintenanne hinte nayta muzana” yaagidi, enta minthethidi lo77o qaala hassayis.
GEN 50:22 Yoosefi, iyaw laythi xeetanne tamma gidana gakanaw ba aawa soo asaara Gibxen de7is.
GEN 50:23 Efreema naytanne, enta nayta nayta be7is. Qassi Minaase na7aa Makira nayta, ba nayta oothis.
GEN 50:24 Hessafe guye Yoosefi ba ishata, “Taani hayqanaw matas, shin Xoossay hintena maaddanaw xomoosana. I hintena ha biittafe kessidi, Abrahaames, Yisaaqasinne Yayqoobas immana gidi caaqida biitta efana” yaagis.
GEN 50:25 Yoosefi Isra7eele nayta, “Xoossay hintena maaddanaw xomoosiya wode, hinte ta meqetha ha biittafe ekidi biite” yaagidi caaqisis.
GEN 50:26 Yoosefi xeetanne tammu laythi de7idi hayqin, shittuwan iya aha tiyidi melisidaape guye, Gibxe biittan saaxinen wothidosona.
EXO 1:1 Banta soo asaa ubba ekidi, Yayqoobara Gibxe bida Isra7eele adde nayta sunthay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa;
EXO 1:2 Entika Robeela, Simoona, Leewe, Yihuda,
EXO 1:3 Yisakoora, Zabloona, Biniyaame,
EXO 1:4 Daane, Niftaaleme, Gaadenne Aseera.
EXO 1:5 Yayqooba sheeshati ubbay laapun tamma. Yoosefi kaseka Gibxen de7ees.
EXO 1:6 Wodepe guyen Yoosefi, iya ishatinne he yeletetha ubbay hayqidosona.
EXO 1:7 Shin Isra7eele sheeshay yeletidi Gibxe biitta kumana gakanaw taybon daridosonanne minnidosona.
EXO 1:8 Hessafe guye, Yoosefa eronna hara kawoy Gibxe biittan kawotis.
EXO 1:9 He kawoy ba asaa, “Heko, ha Isra7eeleti nuupe aadhidi yeletethaninne wolqan daridosona.
EXO 1:10 Nuuni hiillatonna ixiko enti taybon kaseysafe haa darana. Qoponna oli dendiko enti nu morketara issifidi nuna olidi, biitta yeggidi baanaw danda7oosona” yaagis.
EXO 1:11 Hessa gisho, deexo ooson enta un7ethana mela enta bolla iita kaapota wothidosona. Enti Pitoomanne Ramse geetetiya shallo wothiya katamata kawas keexidosona.
EXO 1:12 Shin Gibxeti enta darsi un7ethinka enti haa daridi yeletidosonanne biitta gakidosona. Gibxeti Isra7eeleta ixida gisho yayyidosona.
EXO 1:13 Entana iita ooso oosisidosona.
EXO 1:14 Urqa yedhison, siminton xuube medhon qassi gade oosison enta de7uwa camisidosona. Qadhey bayna deexo ooso ubbaa enta oosisidosona.
EXO 1:15 Gibxe kawoy qantha Ibraawe maccasata ulo pittiya Sipooronne Puuho geetetiya nam7u maccasatako haysada yaagis;
EXO 1:16 “Ibraawe maccasati yeliya wode yeletida na7ay adde gidiko wodhite, shin macca gidiko paxa aggite” yaagis.
EXO 1:17 Shin ulo piteysati Xoosse babbidi, Gibxe kawoy kiitidaysada oothibookona. Enti adde nayta paxa aggidosona.
EXO 1:18 Hessafe guye, Gibxe kawoy he ulo pitteyisata xeegidi, “Hinte ayis haysa oothidetii? Adde nayta ayis paxa aggetii?” yaagidi enta oychis.
EXO 1:19 Ulo piteysati zaaridi, “Ibraawe maccasati Gibxe maccasata mela gidokona. Enti mino gidiya gisho ulo piteysati gakanaape sinthatidi yeloosona” yaagidosona.
EXO 1:20 Hessa gisho, Xoossay ulo pitteysatas keehis. Isra7eele asay kaseysafe haa darshenne minnishe bidosona.
EXO 1:21 Qassi ulo piteysati Xoossas yayyida gisho Xoossay entaw enta soo asi immis.
EXO 1:22 Hessafe guye, kawoy ba asaa ubbaako, “Ibraawetape yeletiya adde ubbaa Nayle Shaafan yeggite; shin macca na7i yeletiko paxa aggite” yaagidi kiittis.
EXO 2:1 He wode Leewe qommo gidida issi uray Leewe maccas issiw ekis.
EXO 2:2 He maccasiya adde na7a yelasu. Na7ay mala lo77o gideysa be7ada heedzu ageena qosasu.
EXO 2:3 Shin iya hessafe daro qosanaw danda7onnaysa erada, maqafe daacho dadada, made melaba tiyada na7aa iyan wothasu. Yaatada Nayle Shaafa gaxan mayca giddon wothasu.
EXO 2:4 Iya michiya iya gakiyaba be7anaw haahon eqasu.
EXO 2:5 Gibxe kawa na7iya bolla meecetanaw Nayle Shaafa wodhasu. I macca aylleti haatha doonan yaa haa simeretoosona. Iya daacho mayca giddon demmada, ba aylliw bada ehana mela kiittasu.
EXO 2:6 Daacho dooyada he guutha na7aa be7asu. I yeekeysa be7ada qadhetada, “Haysi Ibraaweta guutha naytape issuwa” yaagasu.
EXO 2:7 He wode iya michiya kawa na7eko, “Ha na7aa dhanthana mela Ibraawe maccas new eho?” yaagada oychasu.
EXO 2:8 Iya, “Ee, eha” yaagasu. Na7iya bada na7aa aayiw ehasu.
EXO 2:9 Kawa na7iya maccasiw, “Ha na7aa efada, taw dhantha; dicha; taani new damooze qanxana” yaagasu. Maccasiya na7aa efada dhanthasu.
EXO 2:10 Na7ay diccin, kawa na7eko ehasu; I iw na7a gidis. “Taani haathaafe iya kessa ekas” gada, iya Muse gada sunthasu.
EXO 2:11 Musey diccidaape guye issi gallas ba asaa be7anaw bidi, enti deexo ooso oothishin enta be7is. Gibxe asi issoy Ibraawetape issuwa ba yara wadhishin be7is.
EXO 2:12 I yaa haa xeellin, oonika baynaysa be7idi, he Gibxe ura wodhidi shafen qosis.
EXO 2:13 Wontetha gallas keyidi, nam7u Ibraaweti wadhetishin be7is. Qoheysako, “Neeni ne dabbuwa ayis shocay?” yaagidi oychis.
EXO 2:14 He uray, “Nena nu bolla haareysanne daynna oothiday oonee? Neeni zine Gibxe uraa wodhidaysada, tanaka wodhanaw koyay?” yaagis. Musey he wode, “Taani oothidabay asan eretis” yaagi qopidi yayyis.
EXO 2:15 Kawoy hessa si7ida wode, Muse wodhisanaw koyis. Shin Musey betidi, Midiyaame biittan de7anaw bis. Issi gallas I haatha olla doonan uttis.
EXO 2:16 He wode Midiyaame kahine issuwas laapun macca nayti de7oosona. Enti banta aawa dorsata gongen haathe duuqi ushshanaw yidosona.
EXO 2:17 Henthanchoti yidi macca nayta goodidosona. Shin Musey enta maaddidi enta dorsata haathe ushshis.
EXO 2:18 Enti banta aawa Yetorako yida wode, “Hachi waani ellesi yidetii?” yaagidi oychis.
EXO 2:19 Enti zaaridi, “Gibxe asi issoy nuna henthanchotape ashshis. Haathe duuqidi dorsata ushshis” yaagidosona.
EXO 2:20 I ba macca nayta, “Yaatin I awun de7ii? Hinte he ura ayis aggidi yidetii? Nuura kathi maana mela ane iya xeegite” yaagis.
EXO 2:21 Musey he addiyara yan de7anaw qofa qachis. Yotori ba na7iw Sipooro Muses macho oothidi immis.
EXO 2:22 Sipoora adde na7a yelin, Musey iya, “Taani ha biittan bete asi” gidi Gersaama gidi sunthis.
EXO 2:23 Daro laythafe guye Gibxe kawoy hayqis. Shin Isra7eeleti banta aylletethan un7etidi waassidosona. Banta aylletethan enti waassida waasoy Xoossaako gakis.
EXO 2:24 Xoossay enta waasuwa si7idi, I Abrahaamera, Yisaaqaranne Yayqoobara caaqida caaquwa hassayis.
EXO 2:25 Xoossay Isra7eeleta aylletetha un7aa be7idi entana qopis.
EXO 3:1 Issi wode Musey Midiyaame biitta kahiniya, ba bolluwa Yotora dorsaanne deesha heemmees. I he wudiya laagi ekidi mela biitta gaxan Xoossa zuma geetetidi xeegetiya Koreeba zuma bolla efis.
EXO 3:2 He bessan Godaa Kiitanchoy tushiyan eexiya tama lacuwa giddon iyaw bentis. Musey tushey taman oyketinka tamay tushiya moonnaysa be7idi,
EXO 3:3 “Taani yaa bada, tushey ayis taman meetetonnaako he oorathabaa shiiqada be7ana” gidi qopis.
EXO 3:4 I be7anaw shiiqidaysa Goday be7idi, tushiya giddofe, “Muse! Muse!” gidi xeegis. Musey, “Heko, abe Godaw” gidi koyis.
EXO 3:5 Xoossay iyako, “Haa shiiqopa. Neeni eqida biittay geeshshi gidiya gisho, ne tohuwan de7iya caammaa kessa” yaagis.
EXO 3:6 Goday iyako, “Taani ne aawata, Abrahaame, Yisaaqanne Yayqooba Xoossaa” yaagis. Musey Xoossaa ba7anaw yayyida gisho, ba som7uwa kammis.
EXO 3:7 Goday qassika haysada yaagis; “Taani Gibxen de7iya ta asay ay mela waayako be7as. Enti bantana un7ethidi haareysatape ashshana mela taako waassiya waasuwa si7as. Enta waayaka erayis.
EXO 3:8 Hessa gisho, taani enta Gibxe asaa kushepe ashshanawunne he biittafe enta kessada, ha77i Kanaaneti, Hiteti, Amooreti, Parzeti, Hiwetinne Yaabuseti de7iya biitta, maathinne eessi kumida lo77o biitta ehanaw wodhas.
EXO 3:9 Ta deriya waasoy ha77i tana gakis. Gibxe asati enta qohida qohuwa taani be7as.
EXO 3:10 Hessa gisho, ha77i neeni ta asaa iya biittafe kessana mela Gibxe kawako taani nena kiittayis” yaagis.
EXO 3:11 Shin Musey, “Kawako baanawunne Isra7eeleta Gibxefe kessanaw taani oonee?” yaagis.
EXO 3:12 Xoossay zaaridi, “Taani neera gidana. Qassi taani nena kiittidaysas mallay haysa; neeni ta asaa Gibxefe kessiya wode ha zuma bolla hinte tana goyinnana” yaagis.
EXO 3:13 Musey Xoossaako, “Gidoshin, taani Isra7eeletako bada entako, ‘Hinte aawata Xoossay tana hinteko kiittis’ yaagiko, enti tana, ‘Iya sunthay oonee?’ yaagidi oychiko, taani entaw woygada zaaro” yaagis.
EXO 3:14 “Xoossay Museko, ‘De7eysinne daanaysi, Tana’ neeni Isra7eeletako, ‘TAANI TANA GIDIDAYSI’ tana hinteko kiittis yaaga” yaagis.
EXO 3:15 Xoossay zaaridi, “Neeni Isra7eeleta Goday hinte aawata, Abrahaame, Yisaaqanne Yayqooba Xoossay, tana hinteko kiittis. Haysi ta merina sunthaa; yaana yeletetha ubbay ha sunthan tana xeegana.
EXO 3:16 “Bada Isra7eele cimata shiishada, Goday hinte aawata Xoossay, Abrahaame, Yisaaqanne Yayqooba Xoossay new qoncidaysa oda. Gibxen enti waayetiya waayiya taani xomoosada be7idaysa entaw oda.
EXO 3:17 Taani entana Gibxe waayiyape kessada maathinne eessi kumida, Kanaaneta, Hiteta, Amooreta, Parzeta, Hiwetanne Yaabuseta biitta efanaw qaala gelas.
EXO 3:18 “Isra7eele cimati ne giyaba si7ana. Hessafe guye, neeninne Isra7eele cimati Gibxe kawako bidi, ‘Goday, Ibraaweta Xoossay, nuus qoncis. Ha77i nuuni heedzu gallasa oge mela biitta bidi, Godaas, nu Xoossaas yarshsho yarshana mela nuna yedda’ yaagite.
EXO 3:19 Shin wolqan gidonna ixiko, Gibxe kawoy hintena yeddonnaysa taani erayis.
EXO 3:20 Hessa gisho, taani ta wolqan dumma dumma malaatata oothada Gibxeta shocana. Hessafe guye, I hintena yeddana.
EXO 3:21 “Qassi taani Gibxe asaa sinthan teemo hintew immana. Yaaniya gisho hinte keyiya wode mela kushe keyeketa.
EXO 3:22 Ibraawe maccas ubbay ba shooron de7iya Gibxe maccasaakonne ba son de7iya Gibxe maccasaako bidi, bira alleeqo, worqanne ma7o immite gidi oychana. Hinte hessa ekidi hinte nayta mayzana. Hessada oothidi hinte Gibxe shalo ubbaa ekidi baana” yaagis.
EXO 4:1 Musey, “Enti tana ammanonna ixidi, woyko taani giyaba si7onna ixidi, ‘Goday new qoncibeenna’ giiko woygo?” yaagidi oychis.
EXO 4:2 Goday Museko, “Ne kushiyan de7eysi aybee?” yaagidi oychis. “Xam7a” yaagis.
EXO 4:3 Goday iyako, “Ane sa7an yegga” yaagis. Musey he xam7aa sa7an yeggin, shooshi gidin, Musey iyape woxis.
EXO 4:4 Hessafe guye, Goday, “Ne kushiya yeddada iya goyna oyka” yaagis. Musey ba kushiya yeddidi shoosha oyki denthin shooshay iya kushen simmidi, xam7a gidis.
EXO 4:5 Goday, “Ne aawata Xoossay, Abrahaame, Yisaaqanne Yayqooba Xoossay new qoncidaysa enti ammanana mela haysa ootha” yaagis.
EXO 4:6 Kaallidi Goday Museko, “Ne kushiya ne shophen naaqa” yaagis. Musey ba kushiya shophen naaqis. I kessiya wode iya kushey baro hargen oyketidaada booxis.
EXO 4:7 Goday iyako, “Ne kushiya ne shophen zaarada naaqa” yaagis. Musey ba kushiya ba shophen zaari naaqidi kessiya wode iya kushey simmidi hanko asatethi mela gidis.
EXO 4:8 Goday, “Enti nena woyko koyro malaata ammanonna ixiko, nam7antho malaata ammanana.
EXO 4:9 Shin enti ha nam7u malaatata ammanonna ixiko, woyko neeni giyaba si7onna ixiko, Nayle Shaafape haathe ekada, mela biitta bolla gussa. He haathay biitta bolla suuthan laametana” yaagis.
EXO 4:10 Musey Godaako, “Abeeti Godaw, kaseka woyko ha77i ne tana odiso oykidaysafe doomin odidi ammanthoy taw hanenna. Ta geeshshada odetanaw danda7ike; ta inxarsay lufa” yaagis.
EXO 4:11 Goday iyako, “Asas doona immiday oonee? Muume woyko tulle oothey oonee? Xeeliseynne qooqisey oonee? Tana Godaa gidikinaayee?
EXO 4:12 Ha77i neeni ba; neeni odetana mela ta nena maadana. Ne gaanaba ta new immana” yaagis.
EXO 4:13 Shin Musey, “Godaw, hayyana, hara asi kiitta” yaagis.
EXO 4:14 Hessafe guye, Goday Muse bolla daro hanqetidi iyako, “Leewe gidida ne ishaa Aaroni baawee? I oda loythidi ereysa ta erayis. Ha77i I neera gahetanaw yishe oge bolla de7ees; I nena be7iya wode wozanape ufaytana.
EXO 4:15 Neeni, ‘Yaaga’, gada iyaw odana. Taani hinte nam7ayka woygi odanekonne waatidi oothaneko hintena tamaarsana.
EXO 4:16 I ne doona gididi asas ne gisho odana. Neeni Xoossa bessan gidada I gaanaba iyaw odana.
EXO 4:17 Ha xam7a eka bada iyara malaata oothada bessa” yaagis.
EXO 4:18 Hessafe guye, Musey ba bolluwa Yotarako simmi bidi, “Hanno gakanaw asay paxa de7iyako be7anaw, taani guye Gibxe ta asaako boo?” yaagis. Yotori Museko, “Ee ba; saro gaka” yaagis.
EXO 4:19 Musey Midiyaame biittan de7ishin Goday iyako, “Nena wodhanaw koyida asati ubbay hayqida gisho guye Gibxe simmada ba” yaagis.
EXO 4:20 Musey ba machiwunne ba adde nayta hare togisidi guye Gibxe simmis. Musey Xoossaa xam7a ba kushen oykidi bis.
EXO 4:21 Goday Muse, “Neeni Gibxe simmada biya wode, taani new immida wolqan Gibxe kawa sinthan malaatata oothanaysa balopa. Shin hessanka I asaa yeddonna mela taani iya wozanaa muumisana.
EXO 4:22 He wode taani Goday giyaba kawas hayssada yaagada oda. ‘Isra7eeli ta bayra na7a.
EXO 4:23 I taw goyinnana mela iya yedda gada taani new odas. Shin neeni yeddonna ixadasa. Hessa gisho, taani ne bayra adde na7aa wodhana’ yaagees gada oda” yaagis.
EXO 4:24 Ogen shempo bessan Goday Musera gahetidi iya wodhanaw koyis.
EXO 4:25 Iya machiya Sipoora qara shuchu ekada, ba na7aa qaxarasu. Qaxara shoohuwara Muse tohuwa bochasu. Iya Museko, “Neeni taw tuma suutha medda” yaagasu.
EXO 4:26 Hessa gisho, Goday iya wodhonna aggis. He wode iya Museko, “Ha qaxaruwa gaason neeni attadasa” yaagasu.
EXO 4:27 He wode Goday Aaronako, “Musera gahetanaw mela biitta ba” yaagis. I bidi, Xoossaa zuma bolla Musera gahetidi iya yeeris.
EXO 4:28 Musey Gibxe bidi gaanabaanne oothana malaatata ubba Goday iya kiitidaysa Aaronas odis.
EXO 4:29 Museranne Aaronara Gibxe bidi, Isra7eele cimata ubbaa shiishidosona.
EXO 4:30 Aaroni Goday Muses odida qaala ubbaa entaw odis. Qassi Musey malaatata he asaa sinthan oothis.
EXO 4:31 Entika ammanidosona. Goday entaw qopidaysanne enta waayiya be7idaysa si7ida wode gufannidi goyinnidosona.
EXO 5:1 Hessafe guye, Museynne Aaroni Gibxe kawako bidi, “Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, ‘Ta asay tana bonchanaw mela biittan, ba7aale oothana mela enta yedda’ yaagees” yaagidosona.
EXO 5:2 Kawoy, “Taani iyaw kiitetada Isra7eele yeddanaw I, Goday oonee? Taani Godaa erike; Isra7eelaka yeddike” yaagis.
EXO 5:3 Enti zaaridi, “Ibraaweta Xoossay nuus qoncis. Ha77i nuuni Godaas, nu Xoossaas, yarsho yarshanaw heedzu gallasa oge mela biitta baana mela nuna yeddarki. Hessa nu oothonna ixiko I nuna hargen woyko olan dhaysana” yaagidosona.
EXO 5:4 Shin Gibxe kawoy, “Muse, Aarona, Asaa ayis ooso diggetii? Guye bidi hinte oosuwa oothite.
EXO 5:5 Heko, ha biittan hinte darideta; qassi hinte asaa ooso diggeta” yaagis.
EXO 5:6 Kawoy he gallas Gibxe kaapotanne Isra7eeleta oosiseyisata haysada yaagidi kiittis;
EXO 5:7 “Kaseysada xuube oothanaw asaas utulla immofite. Enti utulla bantaw koyidi shiisho.
EXO 5:8 Shin kaseysafe taybuwa guuthonna enti xuube medhidi shiishana mela kiittite; issinnoka pacisopite. Enti, ‘Nuuni nu Xoossaas yarshsho yarshana mela nuna yedda’ yaagidi tana oychey entaw oosoy guuxida gishosa.
EXO 5:9 Enti ooson gundana melanne wordo oda si7onnaw entaw wodey doonna mela ooso deexisite” yaagidi kiittis.
EXO 5:10 Gibxe kaapotinne Isra7eeleta oosiseysati keyidi, asaako, “Kawoy, ‘Taani hintew utulla immike.
EXO 5:11 Hinte bidi awupeka koydi demmite. Shin hinte oothiya xuube taybuwape issoyka pacenna’ yaagis” yaagidosona.
EXO 5:12 Hessa gisho asay utulla koyanaw Gibxe biitta ubban laaletidosona.
EXO 5:13 Gibxe kaapoti entaw utulli imetin enti oothiya xuube taybuwa keena oothidi shiishana mela enta un7ethidosona.
EXO 5:14 Gibxe kaapoti bantafe garsara de7iya Isra7eele kaapota, “Hinte kase oothiya xuube keena ayis oothi shiishibeketii?” yaagidi wadhidosona.
EXO 5:15 Hessafe guye, Isra7eele kaapoti kawako bidi, “Abeeti godaw, neeni ne aylleta haysada ayis oothay? yaagidi maggannidosona.
EXO 5:16 Ne aylletas utulli imetenna, shin xuube oothana mela kiitetida. Hessa bolla nuna wadhosona; shin balay ne asaa bollana” yaagidosona.
EXO 5:17 Shin kawoy, “Hinte ooso dosonna azallata; hinte wora wodhida azallata. Hinte, ‘Nuuni Godaas yarshanaw baana; nuna yedda’ yaagidi zaari zaari tana oychey hessa gishosa.
EXO 5:18 Ha77i guye bidi oothite. Hintew ayba utullika imetenna, shin hinte kaseysa keena xuube oothanaw bessees” yaagis.
EXO 5:19 Isra7eele kaapoti, enti kaseysa keena xuube oothana mela kiitetida wode enti meton gelidaysa eridosona.
EXO 5:20 Enti kawa matape keyidi, bantana karen naagiya Musekonne Aaronako bidosona.
EXO 5:21 Enti Musekonne Aaronako, “Hinte nuna kawoynne iya moorinnati ixana melanne wodhana mela hinte oothidaysa Xoossay xeello; I pirdo” yaagidosona.
EXO 5:22 Musey Godaako simmidi, “Godaw, neeni ha asaa bolla meto ayis ehadii? Neeni tana kiittiday hessasee?
EXO 5:23 Taani ne sunthan kawas odanaw bida wodepe doomin I ha asaa bolla meto ha darsis. Qassi neka ne asaa ashshabaaka” yaagis.
EXO 6:1 Hessafe guye, Goday Museko, “Taani Gibxe kawa bolla oothanaba ha77i neeni be7ana. I ta deriya yeddana mela taani ta wolqaa iya bessaana. I enta ba biittafe gooddidi kessana” yaagis.
EXO 6:2 Xoossay Muse, “Taani Godaa.
EXO 6:3 Taani Abrahaames, Yisaaqasinne Yayqoobas Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaa gidada qoncas. Shin taani, ‘Godaa’ geetetiya ta sunthan tanatethaa enta erisabike.
EXO 6:4 Qassi taani enti betetethan de7ida Kanaane biitta immana gada entara caaqas.
EXO 6:5 Qassika Gibxe asati aylleyiya Isra7eeleta waasuwa taani si7as; ta caaquwaka qopas.
EXO 6:6 “Hesaa gisho neeni Isra7eeletako, ‘Taani Godaa. Taani hintena Gibxe aylletethaafe ashshada kessana. Taani enta ta mino axan iita pirdaa pirdada hintena wozana.
EXO 6:7 Taani hintena ta dere oothana; taani hinte Xoossaa gidana. Gibxe aylletethaafe taani hintena kessida wode, taani Godaa hinte Xoossaa gideysa hinte erana.
EXO 6:8 Taani Abrahaames, Yisaaqasinne Yayqoobas immana gada caaqida biitta hintena ehana. He biitta taani hintew laata biitta oothada immana. Taani Godaa’ yaaga” yaagis.
EXO 6:9 Musey hessa Isra7eeletas odis, shin enti aylletetha un7afe dendoysan ufaysi qanxida gisho I giyaba si7ibookona.
EXO 6:10 Hessafe guye, Goday Muse,
EXO 6:11 “Bada Gibxe kawas, ‘Isra7eeleta ne biittafe yedda’ yaagada oda” yaagis.
EXO 6:12 Shin Musey, “Ta inxarsay lufa. Isra7eeleti tana si7ibookona, shin Gibxe kawoy tana waanidi si7anee?” yaagis.
EXO 6:13 Goday Musenne Aarona, “Bidi, Isra7eela asaa Gibxefe kessana mela, taani hintena kiitidaysa Isra7eeletasinne Gibxe kawas odite” yaagis.
EXO 6:14 Haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysati enta mayzata; Yayqooba bayra na7aa Robeela adde nayti, Heenoke, Faalu, Esroomenne Karma. Haysati Robeela soo asaas mayzata.
EXO 6:15 Simoona adde nayti, Yamu7eela, Yamina, Ohada, Yakina, Zohaaranne Kanaane biitta maccaseepe yeletida Saa7ula. Haysati Simoona soo asaas mayzata.
EXO 6:16 Leewe adde nayti Gedisoona, Qahaatanne Maraara. Leewey xeetanne hastamanne laapun laythi de7is.
EXO 6:17 Gedisoona adde nayti Libinanne Same7a geetetoosona. Haysati banta soo asaas mayzata.
EXO 6:18 Qahaata adde nayti Amraama, Izara, Kebroonanne Uzi7eela. Qahaati xeetanne hastamanne heedzu laythi de7is.
EXO 6:19 Maraara adde nayti Mahilanne Muse. Banta yeletethaa maaran hayssafe qommon xaafetidaysati Leewe sheeshata.
EXO 6:20 Amraami ba aawa michiw Yokebeedo machis. Iya Aaronanne Muse iyaw yelasu. Amraami xeetanne hastamanne laapun laythi de7is.
EXO 6:21 Izarada nayti, Qore, Nefeganne Zikira.
EXO 6:22 Uzi7eela adde nayti, Misa7eela, Elzafaananne Sitira.
EXO 6:23 Aaroni Amnadaabe na7iw, Na7asoona michiw Elsebo machis. Iya iyaw Naadabe, Abyooda, Alaazaranne Itamaara yelasu.
EXO 6:24 Qore adde nayti, Asira, Elqaananne Abiyasafa.
EXO 6:25 Aarona na7ay Alaazari Puti7eela naytape issinniw machis. Iya iyaw Pinihaasa yelasu. Haysati Leewe sheeshatanne enta mayzata.
EXO 6:26 Goday, Musenne Aarona Isra7eele asaa yaran yaran enta soo asaara Gibxefe kaalethidi kessana mela kiittis.
EXO 6:27 Isra7eeleta Gibxefe kessi yeddana mela Gibxe kawas odiday enta.
EXO 6:28 Goday Gibxen Muses odida wode,
EXO 6:29 “Taani Godaa; taani new odiyaba ubbaa Gibxe kawas oda” yaagis.
EXO 6:30 Shin Musey, “Ta doonay lufa gideysa ne eraasa, yaatin kawoy taani odiyaba waani si7anee?” yaagis.
EXO 7:1 Goday Museko, “Heko taani nena Gibxe kawas Xoossa mela oothas. Ne ishaa Aaroni ne nabe gididi iyaw odana.
EXO 7:2 Taani nena kiitida kiita ubbaa Aaronas oda. I, Isra7eeleta ba biittafe kessi yeddana mela kawas odana.
EXO 7:3 Shin taani kawa wozanaa muumisana. Taani Gibxe biittan malaatatanne malaalsiyabata oothikoka,
EXO 7:4 I hinte odiyaba si7enna. He wode taani Gibxeta pirdana; ta deriya Isra7eele Gibxefe kessana.
EXO 7:5 Hessi haniya wode taani godaa gididaysa Gibxeti erana” yaagis.
EXO 7:6 Museynne Aaroni Goday kiitidaysada oothidosona.
EXO 7:7 Enti kawas odiya wode, Muses hospun tammu laythi; Aaronas qassi hospun tammanne heedzu laythi.
EXO 7:8 Goday Musenne Aarona,
EXO 7:9 “Kawoy hintena, malaata oothidi tana bessite giiko, Aaroni ba xam7a ekidi kawa sinthan yeggana mela iyaw oda; he xam7ay shooshi gidana” yaagis.
EXO 7:10 Museynne Aaroni kawako bidi Goday enta kiitidaysada oothidosona. Aaroni ba xam7aa kawa sinthaninne iya moorinnata sinthan yeggin xam7ay shooshu gidis.
EXO 7:11 Hessafe guye, kawoy marotanne bitanchota xeegisis. Entika banta bitan hessada oothidosona.
EXO 7:12 Enti ubbay banta xam7aa sa7an yeggida wode xam7ati shooshi gididosona. Shin Aarona xam7ay enta xam7ata mittis
EXO 7:13 Gidoshin Goday gidaysa mela kawa wozanay muumis. I enti geysa si7onna ixis.
EXO 7:14 Goday Muse, “Kawa wozanay muumis; I asaa yeddonna ixis.
EXO 7:15 Wonto wonta guura shooshi laametida xam7aa ekada, Nayle Shaafa matan eqada, kawuwara gahetanaw naaga.
EXO 7:16 Iyako, ‘Goday, Ibraaweta Xoossay ta asay mela biittan taw goyinnana mela yedda’ yaagidi tana neeko kiittis. Shin neeni hanno gakanaw ixadasa.
EXO 7:17 Goday, I, Godaa gideysa I oothiyaban neeni erana. Taani Nayle Shaafa haatha ta kushen de7iya xam7an shociko haathay suuthi laametana.
EXO 7:18 Nayle Shaafan de7iya moloy hayqana; shaafayka xinqana. Gibxeti he shaafa haatha uyanaw danda7okona” yaagada oda.
EXO 7:19 Goday Museko, “Aaroni Gibxen de7iya haathata bolla, shaafata bolla, zara haathata bolla, teqe haatha bollanne duuqetida haathi ubbaa bolla ba xam7aa denthana mela oda. He wode haatha ubbay suuthi laametana. Hari attoshin Gibxe biittan mithafenne shuchafe oosetida haathe tikiya miishetan de7iya haathay ubbay suuthi laametana yaaga” yaagis.
EXO 7:20 Museynne Aaroni Goday kiitidaysada oothidosona. Kawa sinthaninne iya moorinnata sinthan ba xam7aa denthidi, Nayle Shaafa haatha shocis. Haatha ubbay suuthi laametis.
EXO 7:21 He Shaafa haathan de7iya moloti hayqidosona. Shaafa haathay iita xinqida gisho, Gibxe asay uyanaw danda7ibookona. Gibxe biitta ubban suuthi kumis.
EXO 7:22 Shin Gibxe bitanchoti banta bitan hessada oothidosona. Goday gidaysada kawa wozanay muumin, Museynne Aaroni odidaysa si7onna ixis.
EXO 7:23 Kawoy he hanidaba aybinka taybonna yeggi aggidi ba gadho simmidi bis.
EXO 7:24 Gibxe asay Nayle Shaafa haatha uyanaw danda7iboona gisho, uyiya haathi demmanaw Shaafa gaxan olla bookidosona.
EXO 7:25 Goday haatha shoci simmin laapun gallas gidis.
EXO 8:1 Hessafe guye, Goday Museko, “Gibxe kawako bada, ‘Goday, taw goyinnana mela ta asaa yedda.
EXO 8:2 Neeni enta yeddonna ixiko, ne biitta ubban shodhe gado yeddana.
EXO 8:3 Nayle Shaafan shodhey kumana. Enti yaape keyidi ne kawotetha, ne zin7iya kifiliya, ne hiixa, ne moorinnata keethaanne ne deriya keetha ubban gelana. Hessadaka ne cooceninne munuqa miishe ubban gelana.
EXO 8:4 Shodheti ne bolla, ne asaa bollanne ne shuumata ubbaa bolla gupana yaagees’ yaagada oda” yaagis.
EXO 8:5 Goday Museko, “Aaroni Gibxen de7iya haathata bolla, zara haathata bollanne teqe haatha ubbaa bolla ba xam7aa denthana mela oda” yaagis.
EXO 8:6 Aaroni Gibxe haathata bolla ba xam7aa denthida wode shodheti keyidi, Gibxe biitta ma7idosona.
EXO 8:7 Shin marotika banta bitan hessada oothidi Gibxe biittan shodhe kesidosona.
EXO 8:8 Kawoy Musenne Aarona xeegisidi, “Ha shodheta taapenne ta asaape diggana mela Godaa hinte woossiko ta hinte asaa Godaas yarsho yarshana mela yeddana” yaagis.
EXO 8:9 Musey kawako, “Shodheti neepe, ne moorinnatapenne ne asaape kichana mela ta woossanaw qaxaro imma. Hessafe guye, Shaafa shodheti neepenne ne keethaafe kichidi Nayle xalaalan de7ana” yaagis.
EXO 8:10 Kawoy zaaridi, “Wonto gido” yaagis. Musey, “Nu Godaa Xoossaa meli hari oonika baynaysa neeni erana mela ne gidaysada oothana.
EXO 8:11 Shodheti neepe, ne keethaafenne, ne moorinatape kichidi Nayle Shaafa xalaalan attana” yaagis.
EXO 8:12 Museynne Aaroni kawa matape keyidi, kawa bolla Goday ehida shodheta diggana mela Musey Godaa woossis.
EXO 8:13 Goday Musey oychidaysada oothin son, kareninne geeshshan de7iya shodheti hayqidosona.
EXO 8:14 Gibxe asay hayqida shodheta shiishidi dooridosona; biitta ubbay xinqis.
EXO 8:15 Shin shodheti hayqidaysa kawoy be7ida wode iya wozanay zaari muumis. Goday gidaysa mela I Musenne Aarona si7onna ixis.
EXO 8:16 Hessafe guye, Goday Museko “Aaroni ba xam7a denthidi biitta baana shocana mela oda. Gibxe biitta ubban de7iya baanay boxe gidana” yaagis.
EXO 8:17 Enti kiitetidaysada oothidosona. Aaroni xam7ara biitta baana shocis. Gibxen de7iya baana ubbay boxe laametidi mehiyanne asaa ma7is.
EXO 8:18 Marotika banta bitan hessada oothanaw paacidosona, shin xoonetidosona. Boxey asaa bollanne mehiya bolla laaletis.
EXO 8:19 Maroti kawako, “Haysi Xoossaa ooso” yaagidosona. Shin kawa wozanay muumis. Goday gidaysa mela I entana si7onna ixis.
EXO 8:20 Goday Muse, “Guura dendada, kawoy Shaafa bishin iyara gahetada, ‘Goday, tana goyinnana mela ta asaa yedda.
EXO 8:21 Neeni ta asaa yeddona ixiko, taani, ne bolla, ne moorinnata bollanne, ne asaa bolla udunxe gado yeddana. Gibxeta keethaanne enti de7iya biitta ubban udunxey kumana.
EXO 8:22 Shin he gallas ta asay de7iya Geesame biittan udunxey doonada enta teqada ashshana. Taani Goday, He wode ha biittan taani Goday ootheysa neeni erana.
EXO 8:23 Taani, ta asaanne ne asaa shaakana; he gita malaatay wonto hanana’ yaagees gada oda” yaagis.
EXO 8:24 Hessafe guye, Goday gidaysada oothis. Kawa gadhonne iya moorinnata soo daro udunxe gado yeddis. Kumetha Gibxe biittay udunxe gadon qohetis.
EXO 8:25 He wode kawoy Musenne Aarona xeegisidi, “Bidi, ha biittan hinte Xoossaas yarsho yarshite” yaagis.
EXO 8:26 Shin Muse zaaridi, “Hessi hanonnaba. Nuuni Godaas, nu Xoossaas yarshiya yarshoy Gibxeta matan ixetiya gisho, hessa oothoko. Nu yarshishin enti be7iko nuna shuchan caddana.
EXO 8:27 Nuna kiitidaysa mela, nuuni Godaas, nu Xoossaas yarsho yarshanaw heedzu gallas oge mela biitta baanaw bessees” yaagis.
EXO 8:28 Kawoy zaaridi, “Godaas, hinte Xoossaas mela biitta bidi yarshana mela taani hintena yeddana. Shin hinte haakidi boopite; taw woossite” yaagis.
EXO 8:29 Musey zaaridi, “Taani ne matape keyida mela Godaa woossana. Ha udunxey wonto kawuwape, iya moorinnatapenne iya asaape kichana. Shin kawoy asay Godaas goyinnanaysa diggidi zaari nuna cimmofo” yaagis.
EXO 8:30 Hessafe guye, Musey kawa matape keyidi, Godaa woossis.
EXO 8:31 Goday Musey oychidaysada oothis. Udunxey kawuwape, iya moorinnatapenne iya asaape issoyka attonna kichis.
EXO 8:32 Shin ha77ika kawa wozanay muumin asaa yeddonna ixis.
EXO 9:1 Goday Museko, “Gibxe kawako bada, Goday, Ibraaweta Xoossay neeko, ‘Enti taw goyinnana mela ta asaa yedda.
EXO 9:2 Neeni enta yeddonna ixiko,
EXO 9:3 taani ne parata bolla, ne hareta bolla, ne gimaleta bolla, ne mehiya bolla, ne dorsata bollanne ne deeshata bolla iita gado yeggana.
EXO 9:4 Shin taani Goday Isra7eele asaa mehiya giddoninne Gibxe asaa mehiya giddon dummatethi medhana. Isra7eele asaa mehiyape issoyka hayqenna.
EXO 9:5 Wonto taani hessa oothana gidi Goday wode qanxis’ yaaga” yaagis.
EXO 9:6 Wontetha gallas Goday gidaysada oothis. Gibxe asaa mehe ubbay hayqis, shin Isra7eele asaa mehiyape issoyka hayqibeenna.
EXO 9:7 Kawoy hanidabaanne Isra7eeleta mehiyape hari attoshin issoyka hayqonaysa ase kiittidi, oychidi eris. Shin ha77ika iya wozanay muumida gisho asaa yeddonna ixis.
EXO 9:8 Hessafe guye, Goday Musenne Aarona, “Coocepe bido kuuci ekidi, kawoy be7ishin bolla dharcite.
EXO 9:9 Hessi Gibxe biitta ubbaa bolla baana gididi laaletana. Gibxe biittan de7iya asaa bollanne mehey bolla kixa gado ehana” yaagis.
EXO 9:10 Enti coocepe guutha bido ekidi kawa sinthan eqidosona. Musey hessa bolla laallin, asaa bollanne mehiya bolla kixa gadoy wodhi aggis.
EXO 9:11 Gibxe asaa bolla wodhida kixay marota bollaka wodhida gisho Muse sinthan eqanaw danda7ibookona.
EXO 9:12 Shin Goday Muses gidaysa mela, kawoy ba wozana muumisida gisho, Musenne Aarona si7onna ixis.
EXO 9:13 Hessafe guye, Goday Museko, “Kawako guura denda bada, ‘Goday, Ibraaweta Xoossay, taw goyinnana mela ta asaa yedda.
EXO 9:14 Ha77i ne ixas giiko, ne moorinnatanne ne asaa xalaala gidonashin ne bollaka iita gado ehana. He wode alame ubban Godi ta xalaala gideysa neeni erana.
EXO 9:15 Taani ta kushiya denthada nenanne ne asaa gadon shocidaba gidiyako ha77i gakanaw hinte biitta bolla de7eketashin.
EXO 9:16 Shin ta sunthay biitta ubban eretana mela taani ta wolqaa bessanaw nena de7on wothas.
EXO 9:17 Neeni ha77ika otortada ta asaa yeddonna ixadasa.
EXO 9:18 Taani wonto hannoode Gibxe biittay medhotosape hachi gakanaw buki eronna wolqaama shachi bukisana.
EXO 9:19 Ha77i neeni ne mehiyanne karen de7iyaba ubbaa elle soo gelsana mela kiitta. Soo gelonna asaa bollanne mehiya ubbaa bolla shachi bukidi, enta wodhana yaagees’ yaaga” yaagis.
EXO 9:20 Kawa moorinatape issoti issoti Goday gidaysa si7idi yayyida gisho, banta aylletanne banta meheta soo gelsidosona.
EXO 9:21 Shin harati Goday gidaysa si7onna ixidi banta aylletanne banta mehiya karen aggaagidosona.
EXO 9:22 Hessafe guye, Goday Museko, “Gibxe biitta ubbaa bolla, asa bolla, mehiya bollanne gaden de7iya katha bolla shachi bukana mela ne kushiya salo dentha” yaagis.
EXO 9:23 Musey ba xam7aa salo denthida wode, Goday wolqaama deshonne wol7anthi yeddis. Hessada oothidi Goday Gibxen shachi bukisis.
EXO 9:24 Goday gedera haara wolqaama wol7anthi yeddis. Hessa melabay Gibxe biittan asi doosape hani erenna.
EXO 9:25 He shachay Gibxen de7iya asaanne mehiya shocis. Gaden de7iyaba, mithinne maata ubbaa dhaysis.
EXO 9:26 Isra7eeleti de7iya Geesame biitta xalaalan shachi bukibeenna.
EXO 9:27 Kawoy Musenne Aarona xeegisidi, “Taani ha77i nagara oothas. Goday tumancho; taaninne ta asay bala.
EXO 9:28 Deshoynne shachay nu bolla daridi un7ethida gisho nuus Godaa woossite. Taani hintena yeddana; hizape hinte haysan gam7eketa” yaagis.
EXO 9:29 Musey iyako, “Taani ha katamaape keyida wode ta kushiya denthada Godaa woossana. Deshoynne shachay eqiya wode sa7ay Godaaba gideysa neeni hessan erana.
EXO 9:30 Shin nenne ne moorinnati ha77ika Godaa Xoossa yayyonnaysa taani erayis” yaagis.
EXO 9:31 Talbay ciishshe, bangay qorxa gidiya gisho ubbay shachan dhayis.
EXO 9:32 Shin gisteynne murqay gakiboonna gisho shachan dhaybeenna.
EXO 9:33 Musey kawa matape keyidi, katamaape gaxaa bidi ba kushiya denthidi Godaa woossis. Yaatin deshoy, shachaynne iray ellesidi eqi aggis.
EXO 9:34 Shin kawoy he ubbay eqidaysa be7ida wode zaaridi nagara oothis. Iyaranne iya moorinnatara banta wozana gujidi minthidosona.
EXO 9:35 Goday Muse baggara odidaysa mela kawa wozanay muumin, Isra7eeleta yeddonna ixis.
EXO 10:1 Hessafe guye, Goday Museko, “Gibxe kawako ba. Taani ha malaatata enta giddon oothanaw koyada kawa wozanaanne iya moorinnata wozana muumisas.
EXO 10:2 Taani hessa oothiday ta malaatatan waatada Gibxeta seeridaako hinte hinte naytasinne hinte nayta naytas odana mela koyida gishosa. He wode taani Godaa gideysa hinte erana” yaagis.
EXO 10:3 Museynne Aaroni kawako bidi, “Goday, Ibraaweta Xoossay neeko, ‘Neeni taw kiitetethi ixey awude gakanaasee? Tana goyinnana mela ta asaa yedda.
EXO 10:4 Neeni enta yedo ixiko, wonto ne biitta bolla taani boole yeddana.
EXO 10:5 Booley darotethaafe dendoysan biitta ubba kammana. Enti shacha gaduwape attida guuthabanne mitha haythi ubbaa maana.
EXO 10:6 Ne keethaa, ne moorinnata keethaanne Gibxe asaa ubbaa keethaa enti kumana. Hessi ne mayzati ha biittan de7osape hano gakanaw be7ida iitabaape aadhiyaba gidana’ yaagees” yaagidosona. Hessafe guye, Musey kawa sinthafe keyidi bis.
EXO 10:7 Kawa moorinnati kawako, “Ha uray awude gakanaw nuus xihe gidanee? Asay Godaa, banta Xoossaa goyinnana mela enta yedda. Gibxe biittay dhayeysa neeni akeekikii?” yaagidosona.
EXO 10:8 Kawoy Musenne Aarona guye xeegisidi, “Bidi Godaa, hinte Xoossa goynite, shin beysati oonantee?” yaagis.
EXO 10:9 Musey, “Nuuni biya bessan Godaa bonchanaw ba7aale oothana gisho, nuuni nu guutha nayta, nu cimata, nu adde nayta, nu macca nayta, nu dorsatanne nu miizata ekidi issife baana” yaagis.
EXO 10:10 Kawoy, “Hinte hinte naytanne hinte maccasata eki boonna mela taani Godan caaqisayis. Hinte hinte wozanan iitaba qopidaysi eretees.
EXO 10:11 Hinte, bidi Godaa goyinnanaw koyaba gidiko addeta xalaala eki biite” yaagis. Hessafe guye, Musenne Aarona kawa sinthafe goodetidi keyidosona.
EXO 10:12 Goday Museko, “Booley yidi shacha gaduwape attida ubbaa maana mela ne kushiya Gibxe biitta bolla dentha” yaagis.
EXO 10:13 Musey ba xam7aa Gibxe biitta bolla denthida wode, Goday doloha bagga carko he qammanne gallas kumethi biitta bolla carkisis. Wontiya wode he carkoy boole ehis.
EXO 10:14 Booley Gibxe biitta ubbaa gakidi ma7is. Hessa mela boole gadoy he biittan kaseka hanibeenna; sinthafeka hanenna.
EXO 10:15 Biitti dhumana gakanaw booley biitta ubbaa ma7is. He booley shachafe attidi gaden dicciyaba ubbaanne mitha ayfe ubbaa midosona. Gibxe biittan de7iya mitha haythinne cil7oba ubbaa midigis.
EXO 10:16 Kawoy Musenne Aarona ellesi xeegisidi, “Taani Godaa hinte Xoossaanne hintena naaqas.
EXO 10:17 Hiza ta nagara taw issi toho atto giite. Ha dhaysiya gaduwa taape diggana mela Godaa hinte Xoossaa woossite” yaagis.
EXO 10:18 Musey kawa matape keyidi Godaa woossis.
EXO 10:19 Goday wuloha wolqaama carkuwa kiittidi booliya biittafe denthidi, Zo7o Abba yeddis. Gibxe biitta ubban issi booleyka hayqibeenna.
EXO 10:20 Shin Goday kawa wozanaa muumisida gisho Isra7eeleta yeddonna ixis.
EXO 10:21 Goday Muse, “Gibxe biittan asi oyki be7iya dhumi dhumana mela ne kushiya salo dentha” yaagis.
EXO 10:22 Musey ba kushiya salo denthis. Gibxe biitta ubban heedzu gallas kumethi sakana dhumay dhumis.
EXO 10:23 He heedzu gallasatan Gibxeti issoy issuwa be7ibookona woyko oonika ba soope keybeenna. Shin Isra7eeleti de7iya Geesamen poo7oy de7ees.
EXO 10:24 Kawoy Muse xeegisidi, “Bidi hinte Godaa goyinnite. Hinte maccasaynne hinte nayti hintera baanaw danda7oosona. Hinte dorsaa wudiyanne hinte miiza wudiya xalaala aggidi biite” yaagis.
EXO 10:25 Shin Musey, “Nuuni xuussa yarshonne hara yarsho Godaa Xoossaas yarshana mela mehe neeni nuus immanaw koshshees.
EXO 10:26 Issoyka guye attona nu mehey nuura baanaw koshshees. Godaa, nu Xoossaa goyinnanaw mehiyape dooranaw bessey nuna. Nuuni ya gakonna de7ishe ay mehe yarshaneko eranaw danda7oko” yaagis.
EXO 10:27 Shin Goday kawa wozanaa muumisida gisho, I enta yeddanaw koybeenna.
EXO 10:28 Hessafe guye, kawoy Museko, “Ta sinthafe kicha; ta sinthan zaara bentada nena era. Ta ayfiya ne be7ida gallas hayqana” yaagis.
EXO 10:29 Musey iyako, “Tumaka ne gidaysada neeni ta ayfiya zaarada be7aka” yaagis.
EXO 11:1 Goday Museko, “Taani Gibxe kawa bollanne iya asaa bolla issi hara gado yeddana. Hessafe guye, I hintena kessi yeddana. I hintena ubbaa gooddidi kessana.
EXO 11:2 Isra7eele asay, addeynne maccasi banta shoorotape biranne worqa alleeqo oychana mela entaw oda” yaagis.
EXO 11:3 Goday Isra7eele asaas Gibxeta sinthan teemo immis. Gibxe kawa moorinnatinne asay Muse daro bonchetida asada xeellidosona.
EXO 11:4 Musey kawako, “Goday haysada yaagees; ‘Qamma bilahe taani Gibxe biitta giddora kanthana.
EXO 11:5 Gibxe biittan de7iya bayra adde na7i ubbay, kawa araata laattanaw de7iya bayra na7aape doomidi, woxan gaaciya macca aylle bayra na7a gakanaw, bayra yeletida mehe ubbay hayqana.
EXO 11:6 Gibxe biitta ubban hessafe kaseka sinthafeka hanonna gita yeehoy yeekeettana.
EXO 11:7 Shin Isra7eele asaa bolla woyko enta mehiya bolla kanika boccenna.’ He wode taani Goday Gibxeta giddoninne Isra7eele giddon dummatethi medheysa neeni erana.
EXO 11:8 Ne moorinnati ubbay yidi ta sinthan gufannana. Ta asaa ekada ha biittafe keyana mela enti tana woossana. Hessafe guye, taani baana” yaagis. Musey shenen xuugetidi kawa sinthafe keyidi bis.
EXO 11:9 Goday muses kase, “Gibxe biittan taani malaalsiyaba darsada oothana gaso kawoy hintena si7enna” yaagidi odi wothis.
EXO 11:10 Museynne Aaroni malaalsiyaba ubbaa kawa sinthan oothidosona. Shin Goday kawa wozanaa muumisida gisho, Isra7eeleta ba biittafe yeddonna ixis.
EXO 12:1 Goday Gibxe biittan Musenne Aarona haysada yaagis;
EXO 12:2 “Ha ageenay hintew laythas koyro ageena gido.
EXO 12:3 Isra7eele asa ubbaas ha wogaa odite. Ha ageenay gelida tammantho gallasan, issi asi ba soo asaas issi maraze woyko issi kole eko.
EXO 12:4 He keetha asaa tayboy he mehiya wursidi maanaw danda7onna ixiko, iyaranne iya mata shooruwara banta soo asaa taybuwa melanne issi issi asi midi wursanaw danda7iya keena ekidi he mehiya shukidi issife mona.
EXO 12:5 Hinte dooriya mehey dorse woyko deeshe gidanaw danda7ees, shin issi laythi kumidaysanne iya bolla borey bayna adde gido.
EXO 12:6 Ha ageenas tammanne oyddantho gallas gakanaw enta heemmite. He gallas omarsi laadiya wode Isra7eele asaa maabara ubbay enta shukanaw bessees.
EXO 12:7 Asay he suuthaafe ekidi enti miya keetha wula garsa, qomuwanne bokoluwa tiyo.
EXO 12:8 Ashuwa he gallas qamma taman caacidi cammiya boncoranne uythara miite.
EXO 12:9 Ashuwa qaye woyko kathidi moopite. Huuphiya, gedatanne ulo ashota ubbaa caacidi miite.
EXO 12:10 He ashuwape wontana gakanaw aykoka ashshofite. Wontana gakanaw attiko hessa xuuggite.
EXO 12:11 Oges giigiya ma7o ma7idi, hinte caammaa aathidi, hinte xam7aa oykidi eeson miite. Hessi tana Godaa bonchiya Paasika ba7aale hintew gido.
EXO 12:12 “Taani he qamma Gibxera kanthada bayra yeletida ubbaa, asenne mehe wodhana. Gibxe eeqata ubbaa pirdana; taani Godaa.
EXO 12:13 He suuthay hinte de7iya keethaa erisiya malla gidana. Taani Gibxeta pirdiya wode he suuthaa be7ada hintena qohonna agga aadhana.
EXO 12:14 “Ha gallasay taani Goday hintew oothidaysa laythan laythan qofisiya Godaa bonchiya ba7aale gido” yaagis.
EXO 12:15 “Laapun gallas gakanaw irshoy gelonna uythi miite. Koyro gallas irsho hinte soope diggite. He laapun gallasatan irshoy de7iya uythi miya asi Isra7eele asaa giddofe duuxidi kureto.
EXO 12:16 Koyro gallasaninne laapuntha gallasan goyinnanaw shiiqite. He gallasatan aybi oosoka oothopite, shin kathi kathanaw danda7eeta.
EXO 12:17 “Taani Isra7eele deriya Gibxefe kessiday he gallas gidiya gisho ha uytha baaliya laythan laythan bonchite. Hessi hintew merina woga gido.
EXO 12:18 Koyro ageenan, tammanne oyddantho gallas omarsafe doomidi, laatamanne issintho gallas omarsi gakanaw irshoy geliboonna uythaa miite.
EXO 12:19 Laapun gallas gakanaw irshoy hinte son bentofo. Irshoy gelidaba miya biitta aawu na7a gidin woyko asa gade asi gidin, he keetha aaway Isra7eele maabara giddofe kureto.
EXO 12:20 Irshoy gelidaba aykoka moopite. Hinte de7iyason awunka irshoy geliboonna uythu miitepe attishin, irshoy gelida uythu moopite” yaagis.
EXO 12:21 Musey Isra7eele cimata ubbaa xeegisidi haysada yaagis; “Hinte issoy issoy soo bidi paasika ba7aale bonchanaw maraze woyko kole shukite.
EXO 12:22 Hisoophe mitha haythafe danki ekidi, keren de7iya suuthan yeddi ekidi wula garsa, qomuwanne bokoluwa tiyite. Wontana gakanaw hintefe issoyka ba keethaafe kare keyopo.
EXO 12:23 Goday Gibxe bayrata wodhanaw he biittara kanthiya wode, he suuthaa wula garsa, qomuwaninne bokoluwa bolla be7idi aggidi aadhana. Hayqo ehiya kiitanchoy hinte soo gelidi hintena wodhonna mela diggana.
EXO 12:24 “Hintenne hinte nayti ha kiita merinaw naagite.
EXO 12:25 Goday kase immana gidi qaala gelida biitta hinte geliya wode ha wogaa oothite.
EXO 12:26 Hinte nayti hintena, ‘Ha baaliya nu ayis bonchiw?’ gidi oychiya wode,
EXO 12:27 hinte entako, ‘Haysi Godaa bonchiya Paasika yarsho. Hessika Goday Gibxe biittan Isra7eele asa keethaa aggidi, aadhidi, Gibxe bayrata wodhidi, nuna ashshida gishosa’ yaagite” yaagis. Hessafe guye, Isra7eeleti gulbatidi goyinnidosona.
EXO 12:28 Isra7eeleti, Goday Musenne Aarona kiitidaysada oothidosona.
EXO 12:29 Giddi bilahe Goday Gibxen bayra yeletida ubbaa, kawa araata laattanaw de7iya bayra na7aape doomidi, qasho keethan de7iya asata bayra nayta gakanawunne bayra yeletida mehe ubbay hayqidosona.
EXO 12:30 Kawoy, iya moorinnatinne Gibxe biitta asa ubbay qamma dendidosona. Gibxe biittan asi hayqiboona issi keethika bayna gisho, asay banta qaala dhoqu oothidi gita yeeho yeekidosona.
EXO 12:31 He qamma kawoy Musenne Aarona xeegisidi, “Hintenne hinte Isra7eeleti ta biittafe keyidi biite. Hinte tana oychidaysada bidi hinte Godaa goyinnite.
EXO 12:32 Hinte gidaysa mela hinte dorsaanne mehiya wudiya ekidi biite. Qassi hinte Xoossay tana anjana mela woossite” yaagis.
EXO 12:33 Gibxe asay, “Isra7eeleti banta biittafe ellesidi keyana mela dirgisidosona. Hinte keyonna ixiko nu ubbay wuroos” yaagidosona.
EXO 12:34 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele asay irshoy geliboonna munaqa keren kunthidi, banta ma7uwan kammidi, banta hashen tookidosona.
EXO 12:35 Isra7eeleti Musey enta kiitidaysada Gibxeta, bira alleeqo, worqa alleeqonne ma7o immana mela oychidosona.
EXO 12:36 Goday, Isra7eeleti Gibxeta sinthan sabetanaada oothin, Gibxeti enti oychidaba ubbaa immidosona. Hessada yaatidi enti Gibxeta shaluwa bonqi ekidi bidosona.
EXO 12:37 Isra7eeleti Ramse katamaape dendidi Sukota geetetiya bessi tohon bidosona. Asaa tayboy naytanne maccasaa gujonna usupun xeetu mukula.
EXO 12:38 Qassi entara hara daro walaka asay, meheynne dorsa deesha wudey laagetidi bis.
EXO 12:39 Gibxefe enti dirgon keyida gisho kathi kathanaw wode dhayidosona. Enti keyishe eki keyida irshoy geliboonna munuqape ekidi uythi uukidosona.
EXO 12:40 Isra7eeleti Gibxe biittan de7ida laythay oyddu xeetanne hastama.
EXO 12:41 Oyddu xeetanne hastamu laythay wuriya he wursetha gallas Godaa asa ubbay Gibxe biittafe keyidosona.
EXO 12:42 Goday ba asaa naagidi, Gibxefe kessida wode sa7i qamma. He qammay yeletethaafe yeletethaa gakanaw Isra7eele asay barkidi naagishe aqiya, Godaas dummatida qamma.
EXO 12:43 Goday Musenne Aarona, “Paasika gallasaa bonchiya wogay haysa yaagis; asa gade asi paasika kathaafe moopo.
EXO 12:44 Hinte hinte miishen shammida aylley qaxaretidaape guye mo.
EXO 12:45 Shin hintera gam7iya imathinne une oothiya asi iyape moopo.
EXO 12:46 “He Paasika kathay kaxida keethan yan miite. He ashuwape aykoka kare kessofite. Meqethatape issuwaka menthofite.
EXO 12:47 Isra7eele maabara ubbay Paasika ba7aale bonchanaw koshshees.
EXO 12:48 “Asa gade asi gididi hinte giddon de7iya asi Godaa Paasika Ba7aale bonchanaw koyko, iyaranne iya son de7iya adde ubbay qaxareto. Hessafe guye, I biitta aawu na7ada taybetidi Paasika Ba7aale bonchanaw danda7ees. Shin qaxaretiboona asi iyape moopo.
EXO 12:49 Ha wogay biitta aawu naytasinne hara biitta asi gididi hinte giddon de7iya asaas issino” yaagis.
EXO 12:50 Isra7eele ubbay, Goday Musenne Aarona kiitidaysada oothidosona.
EXO 12:51 He gallas Goday Isra7eeleta cugan cugan Gibxe biittafe kessis.
EXO 13:1 Goday Museko,
EXO 13:2 “Bayra yeletida adde ubbaa taw dummaya. Isra7eele asaa giddon bayra yeletida ubbay, ase woyko mehe gidin ubbay tabaa” yaagis.
EXO 13:3 Hessafe guye, Musey asaako, “Ha gallasay, hinte Gibxe aylletethaafe keyida gallas gidiya gisho iya qopite. Goday ba gita wolqan hintena kessiday he gallasaana gidiya gisho, irshoy gelidaba aykoka moopite.
EXO 13:4 Abiiba ageenan, hachi gallasan hinte Gibxefe keydeta.
EXO 13:5 Goday Kanaaneta, Hiteta, Amooreta, Hiwetanne Yaabuseta biitta hintena laatisanaw hinte mayzatas caaqis. Goday hintena maathinne eessi kumida he biitta gathiya wode laythan laythan ha koyro ageenan ha gallasaa bonchite.
EXO 13:6 Laapun gallas kumethi irshoy geliboonna uythi miite. Laapuntha gallasay Godaa bonchiya ba7aale gidana.
EXO 13:7 He laapun gallasatan irshoy geliboonna uythi miite. Irshoy woyko irshoy de7iyabay hinte giddoninne hinte zawan bentofo.
EXO 13:8 He gallas neeni, ‘Taani haysa oothey taani Gibxefe keyiya wode Goday taw oothidaysa qopanaasa’ yaagada ne naytas oda.
EXO 13:9 Ha ba7aaley hinte kushen woyko hinte som7on qashetida malla gididi hintena qofisiyaba gidana. Goday hintena ba gita wolqan Gibxefe kessida gisho, Godaa wogay hinte doonape wodhonna melanne haratas hinte odana mela hintena qofisana.
EXO 13:10 Hessa gisho, hinte ha baaliya laythan laythan ba wodiyan bonchite.
EXO 13:11 “Goday hintewunne hinte mayzatas immana gidi caaqida Kanaaneta biitta gelsidi, he biitta hintew immiya wode,
EXO 13:12 bayra yeletida ubbaa Godaas imma. Ne mehetan bayra yeletiya adde ubbay Godaasa.
EXO 13:13 Bayra yeletiya hare mari ubbaa dorsa maran woza. Wozonna ixiko iya morgiya mentha. Ne adde nayta giddon bayra yeletida ubbaa woza.
EXO 13:14 Sinthara yaana laythatan ne nayti nena, ‘Haysi aybee?’ gidi oychiko neeni, ‘Goday nuna ba gita wolqan Gibxe aylletethaafe kessis.
EXO 13:15 Gibxe kawoy ba wozana muumisidi nuna yeddonna ixin, Goday Gibxe biittan de7iya asape doomidi mehe gakanaw bayra ubbaa wodhis. Nuuni bayra yeletida mehe adde Godaas yarsheynne bayra adde nayta nuuni wozey hessasa yaaga.
EXO 13:16 Goday nuna ba gita wolqan Gibxefe kessida gisho, ha ba7aaley nu kushen woyko nu som7on qashetida malla gididi nuna qofisiyaba gidana’ yaaga” yaagis.
EXO 13:17 Kawoy asaa yeddida wode, Xoossay enta mata gidida Filisxeeme biittara kanthisiya ogiyara kaalethibeenna. Xoossay hessa oothiday, “Asaa oli gakiko, banta qofaa laammidi guye Gibxe simmana” yaagidi qopida gishosa.
EXO 13:18 Hessa gisho, Xoossay asaa mela biitta ogiyara yuushshidi, Zo7o Abbaako kaalethis. Isra7eeleti olas giigidi Gibxe biittafe keyidosona.
EXO 13:19 Yoosefi, “Xoossay tuma hintena ashshanaw yaana. He wode hinte ta meqethaa ha biittafe ekidi biite” yaagidi Isra7eeleta caaqisidi wothida gisho Musey iya meqethaa baara ekidi bis.
EXO 13:20 Enti Sukotape dendidi mela biitta gaxan de7iya Etaaman uttidosona.
EXO 13:21 Enti gallasinne qamma hemetana mela gallas entana kaalethanaw shaara tuussan, qamma poo7isidi enta kaalethanaw tama tuussan enta sinthan bis.
EXO 13:22 Gallas shaara tuussay, qamma tama tuussay asaa sinthafe kichibeenna.
EXO 14:1 Hessafe guye, Goday Museko,
EXO 14:2 “Enti guye simmidi Migdoolapenne Zo7o Abbaafe giddon, Pihahiroota sinthan, Ba7aal-Zafoona matan uttana mela oda.
EXO 14:3 Kawoy, ‘Isra7eeleti mela biitta keyanaw oge dhayidi coo toylatoosona’ yaagidi qopana.
EXO 14:4 Taani kawa wozanaa muumisana; I enta gooddana. Taani kawanne iya olanchota ubbaa xoonada bonchetana. He wode Gibxet taani Godaa gideysa erana” yaagis. Hessa gisho, Isra7eeleti I odidaysada oothidosona.
EXO 14:5 Asay kessi ekidaysa Gibxe kawoy si7idi, iyaranne iya moorinnatara banta qofa laammidi, “Nuuni ayis hessa oothido? Nuuni Isra7eeleta yeddidi, nuna haggaaziya asi ayis dhayane” yaagidosona.
EXO 14:6 Hessa gisho, I ba para gaariya kooridi, ba olanchota ekidi dendis.
EXO 14:7 I usupun xeetu dooretida para gaaretanne Gibxe biittan de7iya hara gaareta ubbaa enta halaqatara ekidi bis.
EXO 14:8 Goday Gibxe biitta kawa wozana muumisida gisho yashshi bayna kessa bolla de7iya Isra7eele asaa yedethis.
EXO 14:9 Gibxe kawa parati, para gaaretinne olanchoti Isra7eeleta kaallidi bidi, Abba doonan Ba7aal-Zafoonanne Pihahiroota matan enti uttidashin demmidosona.
EXO 14:10 Kawoy ba olanchotara yishin Isra7eeleti demmidi yayyidosona; bantana maaddana mela Godaako waassidosona.
EXO 14:11 Enti Museko, “Gibxe biittan nuus duufoy dhayidee? Nuuni mela biitta hayqana mela nuna kessiday hessasee? Nuna Gibxefe ayis ehadii?
EXO 14:12 Gibxen de7ishe haysi hananaysa eridi, ‘Nuna agga nuuni Gibxetas haaretana’ yaagidi new odibooko? Mela biittan hayqanaape entaw haareteysi nuus lo77oshin” yaagidosona.
EXO 14:13 Shin Musey zaaridi, “Yayyofite; minnidi eqite. Goday hachi hintena ashshiya ashuwa hinte be7ana. Hachi hinte be7iya Gibxeta zaari be7eketa.
EXO 14:14 Hinte si77i giite; Goday hinte gisho oletana” yaagis.
EXO 14:15 Goday Museko, “Neeni ayis taako waassay? Isra7eeleti sinthe hemetana mela oda.
EXO 14:16 Ne xam7a Abbaa bolla dentha; haathay shaaketana. Isra7eeleti mela biittara Abbaa pinnidi baana.
EXO 14:17 Taani Gibxeta wozanaa muumisana; enti hinte geedo kaallidi Abban gelana. Taani kawa, iya olanchota, iya para gaariyanne iya para gaariya laageyisata xoonada bonchetana.
EXO 14:18 Ta enta xoonida wode, taani Godaa gideysa Gibxeti erana” yaagis.
EXO 14:19 Xoossaa kiitanchoy, Isra7eele olanchotape sinthara hemeteysi entafe guye aadhidi hemetis. Shaara tuussay enta sinthafe guye bagga aadhidi,
EXO 14:20 Gibxetasinne Isra7eeletas giddon eqis. He shaaray Gibxetas dhumisidi, Isra7eeletas poo7isis. Yaatin qamma kumethi Gibxeti Isra7eeletako shiiqibookona.
EXO 14:21 Musey Abba bolla ba kushiya miccis. Goday he qamma wolqaama doloha carko yeddidi mela biitti bentana gaso Abbaa shocis. Haathay shaaketis.
EXO 14:22 Haathay shaaketidi nam7u baggan godada eqin, Isra7eeleti mela biittara hemetidi pinnidosona.
EXO 14:23 Gibxe kawa parati, iya para gaaretinne iya para gaariya laaggeysati entana kaallidi, Abban gelidosona.
EXO 14:24 Sa7i wontana hanishin Goday tamanne shaara tuussan gididi Gibxe olanchota duge xeellidi, entaw hananaba dhaysis.
EXO 14:25 Para gaareta gertoy genderetonna mela Goday enta para gaareta gertuwa sa7ara oythis. Gibxeti, “Goday Isra7eeleta maaddidi nuna oliya gisho, nuuni enta aggidi baqatoos” yaagidosona.
EXO 14:26 Goday Museko, “Haathay Gibxeta bolla, enta para gaareta bollanne enta para gaariya laageyisata bolla guye simmana mela ne kushiya Abbaa bolla micca” yaagis.
EXO 14:27 Musey ba kushiya Abbaa bolla miccin, sa7i wontiya wode Abbay ba kase bessaa guye simmis. Gibxeti baqatanaw koydosona, shin Goday enta Abban yeggis.
EXO 14:28 Haathay guye simmidi, Isra7eeleta kaallidi Abban gelida para gaareta, para gaareta laaggeysatanne Gibxe olanchota mittis. Entafe issoyka attibeenna.
EXO 14:29 Shin Isra7eeleti Abbaa giddora mela biittara hemetidi, haathay shaaketidi godada eqidashin pinnidosona.
EXO 14:30 Goday he gallas Isra7eele asaa Gibxeta kushepe ashshis. Isra7eeleti hayqidi zin7ida Gibxeta Abbaa doonan be7idosona.
EXO 14:31 Isra7eeleti Goday Gibxeta bolla bessida gita wolqaa be7ida wode Godaa yayyidosona. Godaanne iya aylliya Muse ammanidosona.
EXO 15:1 He wode Museynne Isra7eele asay ha mazmuriya Godaas yexidosona. I ba gita xoonuwan bonchetida gisho, taani ta Godaas galata mazmuriya yexana. Paranne para toggeysa Abban yeggis.
EXO 15:2 Goday ta minotethaanne ta mazmuriya gasuwa, I tana ashsheysa. I ta Xoossaa; taani iya sabbana. I ta aawata Xoossaa; taani iya bonchana; galatana.
EXO 15:3 Goday olancho; iya sunthayka Godaa.
EXO 15:4 Gibxe kawa para gaaretanne iya olanchota Abban yeggis. Gibxe kawa, ubbaafe aadho gidida toora moconata, Zo7o Abban mitisis.
EXO 15:5 Entana ciimmo haathay mittis; enti shuchada ciimmon mitetidosona.
EXO 15:6 “Abeeti Godaw, ne ushacha kushey wolqan gooba; ne kushey morkiya mentherethis.
EXO 15:7 Ne gita xoonuwan, neera eqeteyisata oladasa. Ne sheney tamada eexidi, enta kafleda mis.
EXO 15:8 Ne hanquwan ne Abbaa punnin, haathay godada eqis. Abbaa ciimmoti garsan shuchada minnidosona.
EXO 15:9 “Morkey, ‘Taani enta yedethada oykana; taani enta shaluwa shaakada, ta koydaba ubbaa ekana. Taani ta mashsha shoddada enta dhaysana’ yaagidi ceeqetis.
EXO 15:10 Shin neeni enta punnin, Abbay enta mittis. Enti Abbaa ciimmuwan biratada mitetidosona.
EXO 15:11 Abeeti Godaw, Xoossata giddon ne mali oonee? Geeshshatethan yashshey ne mali oonee? Bonchoy daggantheynne malaalsiyaba oothey ne mali oonee?
EXO 15:12 Neeni ne ushacha kushiya miccida wode, biittay enta mittis.
EXO 15:13 “Neeni wozida asaa ne merina siiquwan kaalethadasa. Neeni ne wolqan enta ne geeshsha biitta gelsadasa.
EXO 15:14 Kawotethati hessa si7idi yashshan kokoridosona. Filisxeeme biitta asatika un7etidosona.
EXO 15:15 He wode Edoome biitta halaqati dagammidosona; Moo7abe biitta haareysati yashshan kokoridosona; Kanaane asati dagaman daaburidosona.
EXO 15:16 Dagaminne yashshi enta oykis. Abeeti Godaw, enti ne wolqaa gitatetha be7idi, ne asay aadhana gakanaw, neeni wozida asay aadhana gakanaw, shuchada toletidi eqidosona.
EXO 15:17 Neeni enta ehada, ne zumaa huuphen tokana. Abeeti Godaw, he bessay neeni new daanaw doorida bessi, neeni ne kushiyan minthada keexida ne keethe.
EXO 15:18 Goday merina gakanaw kawotana” yaagidi yexidosona.
EXO 15:19 Isra7eeleti Abbaa giddora mela biittara pinnin, Gibxe kawa parati, iya para gaaretinne iya para toggeysati Abban gelida wode Goday enta bolla Abbaa haatha zaarin haathay enta mittis.
EXO 15:20 Aarona michiya, nabiya Mayraama karaabo ekasu. Hara maccasati ubbay banta karaabo ekidi baqishenne yexishe iyo kaallidosona.
EXO 15:21 Mayraama, “I ba gita xoonuwan bonchetida gisho, Paranne para toggeyisata I Abban yeggida gisho, Iyaw mazmuriya yexite” yaagada entaw yexasu.
EXO 15:22 Hessafe guye, Musey Zo7o Abbaa matape Isra7eeleta denthidi Shuura mela biitta gakanaw kaalethis. He mela biittan enti heedzu gallas hemetidosona shin haathe demmibookona.
EXO 15:23 Enti Maara geetetiya bessi gakidi haathe demmidosona, shin haathay camo gidiya gisho uyanaw danda7ibookona. Hessa gisho, he bessay Maara geetetis.
EXO 15:24 Asay, “Nuuni ay uyanee?” gidi Muse bolla zuuzumidosona.
EXO 15:25 Yaanin, Musey Godaako waassis; Goday iya issi mithi bessis. Musey he mitha haathan yeggin haathay mal7is. Yan Goday entaw higge immis; yan Goday enta paacis.
EXO 15:26 Musey entako, “Hinte hinte Godaa Xoossaas kiitetite; I koyaba oothite. Hinte taw polo kiitetikonne ta giyaba si7iko Gibxeta bolla ta yeddida hargiyan hintena pirdike. Taani hintena pathiya Godaa” yaagis.
EXO 15:27 Hessafe guye, enti Elima bidosona. Yan tammanne nam7u haatha pultotinne laapun tammu zamba mithati de7oosona. Enti yan haatha doonan uttidosona.
EXO 16:1 Gibxefe keyida nam7antho ageenan, tammanne ichashantho gallas Isra7eele asa ubbay Elimape dendidi, Elimapenne Siinape giddon de7iya Siine geetetiya mela biitta yidosona.
EXO 16:2 Isra7eele asa ubbay mela biittan Muse bollanne Aarona bolla zuuzumidosona.
EXO 16:3 Isra7eeleti entako, “Nuuni Gibxe biittan Godaa kushen hayqida gidorkoshin. Hari atto nuuni yan wodhi uttidi ashuwanne hara kathi ubbaa nu koyida mela moos. Shin hinte nuna ubbaa kessidi ha mela biitta koshan wodhiseeta” yaagidosona.
EXO 16:4 Goday Museko, “Taani hintew salope kathi buksana. Asay gallas gallas keyidi, hachis gidiyaba maxanaw koshshees. Asay taw kiitetiyakonne kiitetonaako taani enta hessan paacana.
EXO 16:5 Saamintan saamintan Usupuntho gallas enti kase maxeysas nam7u kushe maxidi katho” yaagis.
EXO 16:6 Hesaa gisho Museynne Aaroni Isra7eele asaako, “Hintena Gibxe biittafe kessiday Godaa gideysa omarsi hinte erana.
EXO 16:7 Hinte Godaa bolla zuuzumidaysa I si7ida gisho, wonta Godaa bonchuwa hinte be7ana. Hinte nu bolla zuuzumanaw nuuni oonee?” yaagidosona.
EXO 16:8 Hessafe guye, Musey, “Hinte Godaa bolla zuuzumidaysa I si7ida gisho, I hintew omarsi maanaw asho immeynne wonta maanaw hinte koyiya mela uythu immey Godaa gideysa hinte erana. Hinte nu bolla gidonashin Godaa bolla zuuzumeta” yaagis.
EXO 16:9 Musey Aaronako, “Neeni Isra7eele asaa ubbaa, ‘Goday hinte zuuzuntha si7ida gisho, yidi Godaa sinthan eqite’ yaaga” yaagis.
EXO 16:10 Aaroni Isra7eele asaa ubbaas odida wode enti mela biitta simmidi, shaara giddora qoncida Godaa bonchuwa be7idosona.
EXO 16:11 Goday Museko, “Taani Isra7eeleta zuuzuntha si7as. Neeni entaw ‘Omarsi asho hinte maana; wonta hinte koyida mela uythu ekana. He wode hinte taani Godaa hinte Xoossaa gideysa erana’ yaagada oda” yaagis.
EXO 16:13 He gallas omarsi kuraachoti yidi, Isra7eele asay de7iya bessaa ma7idosona. Wonta enta heeran aki biitta ma7is.
EXO 16:14 Akay, xiz7ida wode lee7onne laafabay mela biitta bolla bentis. Ika shachada boothi.
EXO 16:15 Isra7eeleti hessa be7ida wode iya eronna gisho, issoy issuwako, “Haysi aybee?” yaagidosona. Yaatin Musey entako, “Hinte maana mela Goday immida kathay haysa.
EXO 16:16 Goday, ‘Asay issoy issoy baw koshsheysa mela shiisho; son de7iya issi issi asi ba huuphen nam7u litiro eko’ yaaga” yaagidi kiittis.
EXO 16:17 Isra7eeleti kiitetidaysada oothidosona; baggay darsidi, baggay guuthidi shiishidosona.
EXO 16:18 Enti shiishidi litiron makiya wode darsi shiishidaysas palahibeenna; guuthu shiishidaysaska pacibeenna. Issoy issoy baw koshsheysa mela shiishis.
EXO 16:19 Musey entako, “Oonika iyape wontas ashshofo” yaagidi kiittis.
EXO 16:20 Shin entafe issoti issoti Musey odidaysa si7onna ixidi wontas minjidosona. Enti minjidaysi guxuntidi xinqis. Hessa gisho, Musey enta bolla hanqetis.
EXO 16:21 Wonta wonta asa ubbay bantaw koshsheysa mela shiishees. Away michiya wode sa7an attidaysi til7ees.
EXO 16:22 Usupuntho gallas enti kase shiishiya nam7u litiruwa bolla iya mela gujidi issi issi asas oyddu litiro shiisho. Yaatin Isra7eele halaqati bidi hessa Muses odidosona.
EXO 16:23 Musey zaaridi, “Wontoy shempo gallas gididi Godaa bonchiya geeshsha Sambaata. Hessa gisho, hinte uukiyaba uukite; doysiyaba doysite. Palahidaysa wontos wothite” yaagis.
EXO 16:24 Enti Musey kiitidaysada wontos wothin, xinqibeenna woyko guxuntibeenna.
