EXO 16:25 Musey entako, “Haysa hachi miite; hachi Godaa bonchiya shempo Sambaata gidiya gisho, hinte hachi denban demmeketa.
EXO 16:26 Hinte kathaa usupun gallasatan shiishanaw danda7eeta, shin laapuntha gallasay shempo gallas gidiya gisho aybi kathika he wode deenna” yaagis.
EXO 16:27 Laapuntha gallasan issi issi asay shiishanaw keyidosona, shin aykoka demmibookona.
EXO 16:28 Yaatin, Goday Museko, “Ta kiitaanne ta higgiya hinte naagonna ixey awude gakanaasee?
EXO 16:29 Taani hintew Sambaata immidaysa akeekite. Usupuntho gallasan I hintew nam7u gallasa kathi immey hessa gishosa. Laapuntha gallasan oonika kare keyonna ba son ba son gam7o” yaagis.
EXO 16:30 Hesaa gisho, asay laapuntha gallasan shempis.
EXO 16:31 Isra7eele asay he katha manna gidi xeegidosona. Mannay deebo ayfe mela gididi boothi. I eessara uukida uythada mal7ees.
EXO 16:32 “Taani hintena Gibxe biittafe kessida wode mela biittan muziday manna gideysa yaana yeletethay be7ana mela iyape nam7u kilo giraame wothite” yaagidi Goday kiitidaysa Musey Isra7eele asaas odis.
EXO 16:33 Musey Aaronako, “Nam7u kilo giraame manna ekada xaaron qolada yaana yeletethaas Goday goyinnetiya bessan wotha” yaagis.
EXO 16:34 Goday Muse kiitidaysada, Aaroni manna Godaa sinthan taabotiya giddon wothis.
EXO 16:35 Isra7eeleti banta de7iya Kanaane biitta zawa yidi gakanaw oytamu laythi manna midosona.
EXO 16:36 He wode asay makiya miishey laatamanne nam7u litiro oykees.
EXO 17:1 Isra7eele asa ubbay Goday kiitidaysada issi bessafe hara bessi yuuyishe, Siin mela biittafe dendidi Rafidima geetetiya bessan uttidosona. Shin enti uyanaw haathi he bessan dhayis.
EXO 17:2 Enti, “Nuus uyanaw haathe imma” yaagidi Musera kacetidosona. Musey zaaridi, “Hinte taara ayis kacceteetii? Godaa ayis paacetii?” yaagis.
EXO 17:3 Shin asay yan haatha saamotidi, “Neeni nuna, nu naytanne nu mehiya saamon wodhanaw Gibxefe kessada haysa ayis ehadii?” yaagidi Muse bolla zaari zaari zuuzumidosona.
EXO 17:4 Yaatin Musey, “Taani ha asaa waato? Enti tana shuchan caddana hanoosona” yaagidi Godaa woossis.
EXO 17:5 Goday Museko, “Neeni Isra7eele asaape cimata neera ekada asaape sinthe aadhada hemeta. Qassi Nayle Shaafa shocida xam7aa ne kushen oykada ba.
EXO 17:6 Taani Koreeba zuman zaalla bolla ne sinthan eqana. He zaalla shoca; asay uyana haathay iyape keyana” yaagis. Musey Isra7eele cimata sinthan hessa oothis.
EXO 17:7 Isra7eeleti, “Tuma Goday nuura de7ii?” yaagidi zuuzumida gishonne Godaa paacida gisho he bessa Masahanne Mariba gidi sunthis.
EXO 17:8 Amaaleqati yidi Rafidiman Isra7eeleta olidosona.
EXO 17:9 Muse Iyyasuko, “Neeni wonto Amaaleqata olanaw guutha asi doora. Taani Xoossaa xam7aa oykada zuma huuphen eqana” yaagis.
EXO 17:10 Musey kiitidaysada Iyyasuy Amaaleqata olis. Musey, Aaroninne Hoori zuma huuphe keyidosona.
EXO 17:11 Musey ba kushiya denthidi gam7iya wode Isra7eeleti xoonosona, shin I ba kushiya wothiya wode Amaaleqati xoonosona.
EXO 17:12 Muse kushey argaacida wode Aaronaranne Huurara shuchi ehidi Muse iya bolla utisidosona. Aaroninne Huuri ushacharanne haddirsara eqidi away wullana gakanaw iya kushiya katisi oykidosona.
EXO 17:13 Hessada oothidi Iyyasuy Amaaleqata mashshan olidi dhaysis.
EXO 17:14 Hessafe guye, Goday Museko, “Haysi ubba wode hassayetana mela ha xoonuwa taarikiya xaafa. Taani Amaaleqata burxora dhaysanaysanne enti dogetanaysa Iyyasus oda” yaagis.
EXO 17:15 Musey yarsho bessi giigisidi, “Goday ta xoonuwa bandira” gidi sunthis.
EXO 17:16 I, “Godaa xoono Bandira dhoqu oothidi oykite. Goday Amaaleqata merinaw olana” yaagis.
EXO 18:1 Midiyaame biitta kahiney, Muse bolloy Yotori, Goday Musesinne ba asaa Isra7eeletas oothidabaanne entana Gibxefe kessidaba si7is.
EXO 18:2 He wode Muse bolloy Yotori, iya matan Musey aggidi bida iya machiw Sipooronne,
EXO 18:3 I nam7u nayta ekidi yis. Musey, “Taani allaga biittan bete asi gidas” gidi bayra na7aa Gersaama gidi sunthis.
EXO 18:4 Kaaluwa qassi, “Ta aawa Xoossay, tana Gibxe kawa mashshafe ashshis” gidi Alaazara gidi sunthis.
EXO 18:5 Muse bolloy Yotori, iya machiwunne I adde nayta baara ekidi, mela biittan, Xoossaa zumaa matan de7iya Museko yis.
EXO 18:6 I banta yuussaa erisanaw Museko kiittis.
EXO 18:7 Hessa gisho, Musey ba bolluwa mokanaw keyidi, iya ziggi sarothidi iya yeeris. Enti issoy issuwa sarothi simmidi Muse dunkaaniya giddo gelidosona.
EXO 18:8 Goday Isra7eeleta ashshanaw Gibxe asaa bollanne enta kawa bolla oothidaba ubbaanne ogen enta gakida metuwa ubban Goday waati maaddidaako Musey ba bolluwas odis.
EXO 18:9 Yotori Goday Isra7eele asaa Gibxeta kushepe ashshanaw oothida lo77o oosotaba si7idi ufaytis.
EXO 18:10 I, “Hintena Gibxetape enta kawa kushiyape ashshidi, Gibxe aylletethaafe kessida Goday, I galatetto.
EXO 18:11 Otoron enta bolla iitaba oothida Gibxetape Isra7eeleta ashshanaw hessa oothida gisho, Goday xoossata ubbaafe gita gideysa taani ha77i eras” yaagis.
EXO 18:12 Hessafe guye, Yotori, Muse bolloy, xuussa yarshonne hara yarsho Xoossaas yarshis. Aaroninne Isra7eele cimati ubbay Xoossaa sinthan iyara geeshsha katha maanaw yidosona.
EXO 18:13 Wontetha gallas Musey asaas pirdanaw uttis. Asay Muse yuushuwan wontafe omarsi gakanaw eqidi de7ees.
EXO 18:14 Muse bolloy Musey asaas ootheysa ubbaa be7idi, “Neeni ne xalaala haysa ayis oothay? Asay wontafe omarsi gakanaw ne yuushuwan essada ayis nerka oothay?” yaagis.
EXO 18:15 Musey ba bolluwako, “Asay Xoossaa sheniya oychanaw koyidi taako yaa gishosa.
EXO 18:16 Enta giddon odi de7iko taako yoosona. Ta enta giddon balinne tumi ooneko shaakayis; Xoossa kiitaanne higgiya entaw odayis” yaagis.
EXO 18:17 Muse bolloy, “Haysi ne ootheysi lo77o gidenna.
EXO 18:18 Neka neeko yaa asa ubbay daabureta. Ha oosoy issi asape daro gidiya gisho, neeni nerka oothanaw danda7aka.
EXO 18:19 Ha77i taani nena zoreysa si7a; Xoossay neera gidana. Neeni ha asaa bessan gidada entaba Xoossas oda.
EXO 18:20 Xoossa kiitaanne higgiya enta tamaarsa. Enti waani daanekonne ay oothaneko enta bessa.
EXO 18:21 Qassi asaa giddon oda shaakidi eriya asata, Xoossaa yayyeyisata, ammantheysatanne wodhaafe ekonnaysati doora. Entana asaa bolla shaalaqata, mato halaqata, hamsalaqatanne asiralaqata oothada shuuma.
EXO 18:22 Enti ubba wode kawushsha odata bantaw pirdo, shin deexo odata neeko eho. Hessada ne oothiko toohoy new kawuyana.
EXO 18:23 Ne oothana mela Xoossi koyey hessa. Qassi ne daaburaka ha asa ubbay ba allalley poletin ba soo ba soo simmana” yaagis.
EXO 18:24 Musey Yotora zoriya si7is; I gidaba ubbaa oothis.
EXO 18:25 Musey Isra7eeleta giddofe oda shaaki eriya asata dooris. Entana asaa bolla shaalaqata, mato halaqata, hamsalaqatanne asiralaqata oothidi shuumis.
EXO 18:26 Shuumati kawusha odata bantaw pirdidosona, shin deexo odata Museko ehoosona.
EXO 18:27 Hessafe guye, Musey ba bolluwa moyzin, I ba biitta simmis.
EXO 19:1 Isra7eele asay Gibxefe keyida heedzantho ageenas koyro gallasan Siina mela biitta gakidosona.
EXO 19:2 Enti Rafidimape dendidi bidi, Siina zuma sinthan de7iya mela biittan uttidosona.
EXO 19:3 Musey Xoossara gahetanaw zuma bolla keyis. Goday zumaa huuphepe iya xeegidi, “Yayqooba sheeshi gidida Isra7eeletas haysada yaaga;
EXO 19:4 ‘Taani Gibxeta bolla oothidabaanne arganthi ba na7a ba qefiyan tookeysda ta hintena waata tookada taako ehidaako hinte hinte huuphen be7ideta.
EXO 19:5 Ha77i hinte taw kiitetikonne ta caaquwa naagiko, biitta kumethay tabaa gidikoka hinte taw dooretida dere gidana.
EXO 19:6 Hinte taw geeshsha dere gidana; hinte kawotethan kahine gididi tana haggaazana.’ Neeni Isra7eeletas odana qaalay haysa” yaagis.
EXO 19:7 Musey guye bidi, zumako cimata xeegi shiishidi, Goday odida qaala ubbaa entaw odis.
EXO 19:8 Enti, “Goday gidaba ubbaa nuuni oothana” yaagidosona. Musey enti gidaysa Godaas odis.
EXO 19:9 Goday Museko “Taani neera haasayishin asay si7anaadanne enti nena ubba wode ammananada taani muumida shaarara neeko yaana” yaagis. Hessafe guye, Musey asay gidaysa Godaas odis.
EXO 19:10 Goday Museko “Neeni asaako bada hachinne wonto taara gahetanaw bantana geeshshana mela entaw oda. Enti banta ma7uwa meeccidi,
EXO 19:11 heedzantho gallasas giigeto. He gallas asa ubbay tana be7ishin taani Siina zuma bolla wodhana.
EXO 19:12 Neeni ha zuma yuushuwan zawa wotha. Asay zuma bolla keyonna mela woyko zumaa xaphuwa bochonna mela entaw oda. Zumaa bochida oonika hayqana.
EXO 19:13 He uray shuchan cadetidi woyko dongen duketidi hayqo; iya kushen oonika bochofo. Mehey woyko asi hessada hayqo. Moyzey punetiya wode enti zumaa bolla keyanaw danda7oosona” yaagis.
EXO 19:14 Musey zumaa bollafe wodhidi, asay Xoossaa goyinnanaw bantana giigisana mela odis. Entika banta ma7uwa meeccidosona.
EXO 19:15 Musey asaako, “Heedzantho gallasaas giigetite; hinte machetara aqopite” yaagis.
EXO 19:16 Heedzantho gallas wonta guura deshoy dechis. Wol7anthinne sakana shaari zumaa ma7idi bentis. Wolqaama moyze waasoy si7etis. Asay dunkaanida bessa ubban yashshan kokoridosona.
EXO 19:17 Hessafe guye, Musey asaa Xoossara gathanaw entana dunkaaniyape kessidi efis; enti zumaa xaphon eqidosona.
EXO 19:18 Goday Siina zumaa bolla tama lacora wodhida gisho Siina derey cuyan kametis. Gita coocepe cuyi keyeysada iyape cuyiya zuley suure keyis. Asa ubbay daro kokoridosona.
EXO 19:19 Moyziya waasoy dari dari bida wode Musey odin, Xoossay deshon iyaw zaaris.
EXO 19:20 Goday Siina zumaa huuphe bolla wodhidi, Muse pude zumaa bolla xeegis. Musey zumaa bolla keyis.
EXO 19:21 Goday iyako, “Neeni duge bada asay tana be7ana gidi, zawa aadhona melanne entafe daroy hayqonna mela entaw oda.
EXO 19:22 Hari atto Godaa mati shiiqiya kahinetika bantana geeshsho. Enti hessa oothonna ixiko ta enta hanqana” yaagis.
EXO 19:23 Musey Godaako, “Neeni zuma dummayida gishonne zawa immida gisho asay zuma huuphe keyanaw danda7okona” yaagis.
EXO 19:24 Goday iyako, “Neeni duge bada Aarona neera ekada ya. Kahinetinne asay zawa kanthidi taako yishe dhayona mela entaw oda” yaagis.
EXO 19:25 Hessa gisho, Musey asaako wodhidi Goday gidaysa entaw odis.
EXO 20:1 Xoossay Isra7eele asaako haysada yaagis;
EXO 20:2 “Nena Gibxefe aylletethaafe kessida Goday ne Xoossay tana.
EXO 20:3 “Taape attishin, hara xoosse goyinnofa.
EXO 20:4 “Bolla saluwan de7iyaba, woyko garsa sa7an de7iyaba, woyko sa7ape garsan haatha giddon de7iyaba aybaka new goyinniya eeqa daanisada oothofa.
EXO 20:5 Entaw hokofa woyko enta goyinnofa. Ayis giiko, taani, Goday ne Xoossay, ta bonchuwa hara xoossatara koxonna Xoosse. Tana ixiya aawata nagaraa gisho nayta heedzantho woyko oyddantho yeletethi gakanaw hanqana.
EXO 20:6 Shin tana siiqeysatanne ta kiita naageysata sheesha mukulu yeletethi gakanaw keehana.
EXO 20:7 “Xoossaa ne Godaa sunthaa hadan denthofa. Goday ba sunthaa hadan dentheyisata seeronna aggenna.
EXO 20:8 “Sambaata Geeshsha gallas oothada naaga.
EXO 20:9 Neeni ooso oothanaw bessiya usupun gallasati de7oosona.
EXO 20:10 Shin laapuntha gallasay neeni Godaa bonchiya shempo gallas. He gallasan ayba oosoka oothofa. Neeni, woyko ne nayti, woyko ne aylleti, woyko ne mehey, woyko ne biittan de7iya asa gade asati he gallasan ooso oothopite.
EXO 20:11 Usupun gallasa giddon Goday salota, sa7aa, abbanne enta giddon de7iya ubbaa medhis, shin laapuntha gallasan shempis. Hessa gisho, Goday Sambaata gallasaa anjisinne dummayis.
EXO 20:12 “Goday ne Xoossay new immiya biittan ne laythay aduqana mela ne aawanne ne aayiw boncha.
EXO 20:13 “Ase wodhopa.
EXO 20:14 “Laammofa.
EXO 20:15 “Kaysotopa.
EXO 20:16 “Ne laggiya bolla wordo markatofa.
EXO 20:17 “Ne laggiya keethaa amottofa. Ne laggiya machiw, woyko iya aylleta, woyko iya mehiya, woyko iya hariya, woyko iyaw de7iyaba aybaka amottofa” yaagis.
EXO 20:18 Asa ubbay deshoy decheysanne moyzey puneteysa si7idi, wol7anthay wol7ameysanne derey cuyeysa be7idi yashshan kokorishe haahon eqidosona.
EXO 20:19 Enti Museko, “Neeni nuus oda; nuuni si7ana. Shin nuuni hayqonna mela Xoossay nuus odopo” yaagidosona.
EXO 20:20 Musey asaako, “Yayyofite; Xoossay hintena paacanawunne hinte iyaw kiitetidi nagara oothonna mela I yis” yaagis.
EXO 20:21 Asay banta de7iyasuwan haakidi eqidashin, Xoossay de7iyasuwa muumida shaarako Musey shiiqis.
EXO 20:22 Hessafe guye, Goday Museko “Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; ‘Salope taani hintew odishin hinte tana hinte huuphen be7ideta.
EXO 20:23 Yaaniya gisho, bira eeqa woyko worqa eeqa hintew oothidi ta bolla gujidi goyinnofite.
EXO 20:24 Neeni taw yarsho bessi urqafe giigisa. Ne dorsatapenne ne booratape ekada xuussa yarshonne issifetetha yarsho iya bolla yarsha. Hinte tana goyinnana mela taani doorida bessa ubban hinteko yada hintena anjana.
EXO 20:25 Neeni taw yarsho bessi shuchafe keexiyaba gidiko masetida shuchafe keexofa. Neeni massiya miishen iya bochiko tunisaasa.
EXO 20:26 Neeni keyashe kallotonna mela taw yarsho bessi kodora keyiya bessan keexofa’ ” yaagis.
EXO 21:1 Goday Muse baggara ba deriyas immida wogay haysa;
EXO 21:2 “Ne Ibraawe aylle shammiko, I new usupun laythi ootho, shin laapuntha laythan aykoka qanxonna, aylletethaafe coo yedeto.
EXO 21:3 I macho ekona shametidaba gidiko, barka yedeto. I machidi, shametidaba gidiko, iya machiyaka iyara yedeto.
EXO 21:4 Iya goday iyaw macho immidaba gidikonne machiya iyaw adde nayta woyko macca nayta yelidaba gidiko, iya machiyanne I nayti iya godaaba gido; addey barka yedeto.
EXO 21:5 Shin aylley, ‘Taani ta godaa, ta machiwnne ta nayta dosayis’ gidi aylletethaafe keyanaw koyonna ixiko,
EXO 21:6 iya goday, Godaa sinthe iya aatho. Yaatidi, penge woyko penge zizgiya matan iya essidi, iya haythaa goothan luko. Hessafe guye, I ba de7o laytha ubban iyaw aylle gido.
EXO 21:7 “Issi asi ba macca na7iw aylletethas bayziko, adde aylletatho aylletethaafe keyopo.
EXO 21:8 Iyo shammidi machanaw efida goday iyo dosona ixiko, I goday iyo deriyan woziso. I goday I bolla iitabaa oothida gisho, iyo allagas bayzanaw danda7ena.
EXO 21:9 I iyo ba na7aas immanaw koyiko, ba macca na7atho oothidi eko.
EXO 21:10 I hara macho I bolla ekiko, koyro machees kathi, ma7onne indas bessiya woga iw pacisopo.
EXO 21:11 I ha heedzubata iw oothonna ixiko, aybi miisheka qanxonna aylletethaafe keyada boo.”
EXO 21:12 “Ase shocidi wodhiya oonika hayqanaw bessees.
EXO 21:13 I wodhanaw qoponna iyape hayqiyaba gidiko, I baqatidi attana bessi taani iyaw giigisana.
EXO 21:14 Shin asi qopidi hara asi wodhiko, he uray ta yarsho bessi biiko yaape diggada hara bessan wodha.
EXO 21:15 “Ba aawa woyko ba aayiw dechiya oonika hayqo.
EXO 21:16 “Ase bayzanaw woyko haaranaw wolqan oykiya asi hayqanaw bessees.
EXO 21:17 “Ba aawa woyko ba aayiw cayey hayqo.
EXO 21:18 “Nam7u asati ooyetidi, issoy issuwa shuchan caddidi qoo7iko, woyko zhultiko, he deshetidaysi hayqonna attidi hargidi hiixan pee7iko,
EXO 21:19 dendidi guufetidi kare heeran hemetiko, he dechidaysi hayqope attees. Gidikoka I iya oosope ashshida gisho, accanawunne paxana gakanaw hargisanaw koshshees.
EXO 21:20 “Issi asi ba adde aylliya woyko macca aylliw xam7an shocidi wodhiko seeretanaw bessees.
EXO 21:21 Shin he aylley issi woyko nam7u gallasa giddon hayqonna ixiko, iya goday seeretofo. He aylley iya shalo gidiya gisho iya hayqoy baw seera.
EXO 21:22 “Nam7u asati issoy issuwara wadhetidi qanxatida maccasiw dechidi, iya boshetana mela oothiko, hara iita qoho gathonna ixiko, he dechida uray, he mache azinay oychiya aca daynnati pirdiko ciggo.
EXO 21:23 Shin he maccase deshethay dariko, shempo gisho shempo,
EXO 21:24 ayfe gisho ayfe, acha gisho ache, kushe gisho kushe, toho gisho toho,
EXO 21:25 xuussa gisho xuussi, maduntha gisho madunthi, qoo7o gisho qoo7o ekanaw koshshees.
EXO 21:26 “Issi asi ba adde aylliyas woyko macca ayllees ayfe baqidi toysiko, he ayfiya gisho aylletethafe kessi yeddo.
EXO 21:27 Hessadaka, ba aylliya ache woyko ba aylle ache menthiko, he acha gisho aylletethafe kessi yeddo.
EXO 21:28 “Boori ase qaycidi wodhiko, he booray shuchan caddeti hayqo. Iya ashoy meetetofo, shin boora goday seeretofo.
EXO 21:29 Shin booray kaseka qayciyaba gidikonne koyrottidi boora godaas odetin, I qachonna ixidaba gidiko, he booray ase wodhiko, booraynne boora goday issife shuchan cadetidi hayqo.
EXO 21:30 Shin boora goday aca qanxana mela oyshetiko, enti oychidaba qanxidi ba shempuwa wozo.
EXO 21:31 Booray adde na7a woyko macca na7a qaycidi wodhiko pirday iya mela gido.
EXO 21:32 Booray adde aylle woyko macca aylle qaycidi wodhiko, boora goday aylliya godaas hastamu bira santime qanxo; booray shuchan caddetidi hayqo.
EXO 21:33 “Issi asi olla bookidi kammonna aggiko woyko kamaa denthin boori woyko harey he ollan wulliko,
EXO 21:34 he ollaa goday mehiya gatiya qanxo. I iya godaas gatiya qanxidi, hayqida mehiya baw eko.
EXO 21:35 “Issi asa boori hara asa boori caddidi wodhiko, paxa boora bayzidi, iya miishiyanne hayqida boora ashuwa nam7ay shaaki eko.
EXO 21:36 Shin he booray kaseka qayciyaba gideysa erishe, iya goday qachonna aggidaba gidiko, he uray iyaw boori qanxo. Yaatidi, he hayqidaysa baw eko.”
EXO 22:1 “Issi asi boori woyko dorse kaysidi shukiko, woyko bayziko, boora gisho ichashu boorata, dorsaa gisho oyddu dorsata ciggo.
EXO 22:2 “Kaysoy keethe bookishe oyketidi shocetidi hayqiko, shoci wodhidaysi oyshetenna.
EXO 22:3 Shin hessi haniday gallas gidiko, I he gusida suuthaa acuwan oyshetees. Kaysoy ba kaysidaysa zaaro, shin iyaw zaaranabay dhayko ba huuphen aylletethas bayzeto.
EXO 22:4 I kaysida mehey paxa de7ishe iya kushen bentiko, boori woyko hare woyko dorse gidiko, I kaysidaysas nam7u kushe ciggo.
EXO 22:5 “Issi asi ba mehiya denban woyko woyne gaden heemmishin, mehey hara asa kathi miiko, I ba kathaafe woyko ba woyniyape lo77uwa aca qanxo.
EXO 22:6 “Issi asi ba gaden tama xuuggishin tamay buuriya kanthidi hara asa gaden dicciya kathaanne dooriya miiko, tama oythida uray aco qanxo.
EXO 22:7 “Issi asi bira woyko hara al7o miishe ba shooruwas hadara immin, he shooruwa soope kaysoy he miishiya ekikonne he kaysoy oyketiko, he kaysoy miishiya nam7u kushe ciggo.
EXO 22:8 Shin kaysoy bentonna ixiko, uray Xoossaa sinthe shiiqidi, ba shooruwa miishiya, I ekonnaysa erisanaw caaqo.
EXO 22:9 “Nam7u asati boora gaason woyko hare gaason woyko dorsa gaason woyko ma7o gaason woyko hara dhaydaba gaason mootetidi, Xoossaa sinthe shiiqiko, Xoossay iya bolla pirdidaysi nam7u kushe ciggo.
EXO 22:10 “Issi asi hare woyko boori woyko dorse woyko hara mehe hadara immidasuwan hayqiko woyko me7iko woyko oonika be77onna kaysotetiko,
EXO 22:11 hadaro ekidaysi ba laggiya mehiya kaysotonaysa Godaa sinthan caaqo. He mehiya goday caaquwa eko; mehey iyape dhayida uray cigganaw koshshenna.
EXO 22:12 Shin mehey kaysotetidaba gidiko, mehiya godaas ciggo.
EXO 22:13 He mehiya do7i midaba gidiko, marka gidanaada gawuxaa eho; do7i midaba gidiko iyaw ciggofo.
EXO 22:14 “Asi ba shooruwape mehe woossi ekiko iya goday bayna bessan he mehey deshetiko woyko hayqiko, he mehiyas ciga immo.
EXO 22:15 Shin iya goday iyara de7ishin hessi hanidaba gidiko aca qanxofo. Hashe ekidaba gidiko, he hashe miishey aco gate gido.
EXO 22:16 “Issi asi issi geela7iw cimmidi, iira zin7etiyaba gidiko, iw aca immidi, baw macho ootho.
EXO 22:17 I aaway iyo iyaw immanaw koyona ixiko, geela7o ekiya uray aca immiya miishe mela I aawas immidi acco.
EXO 22:18 “Bita bitiya maccasi hayqo.
EXO 22:19 “Mehera tuniya oonika hayqo.
EXO 22:20 “Xoossaafe hara godatas yarshiya oonika hayqo.
EXO 22:21 Hinte Gibxe biittan bete asi gididi, de7ida gisho, bete asi qohopite woyko un7ethofite.
EXO 22:22 Am7etanne yi7ota un7ethofite.
EXO 22:23 Hinte enta un7ethiko, enti taako waassana;
EXO 22:24 taani enta waasuwa si7ana. He wode ta hinte bolla hanqetada hintena olan wursana. Hinte macheti am7o, hinte naytika aawu baynayisata gidana.
EXO 22:25 “Hinte giddon de7iya manqo gidida ta asaape oodeska miishe tal7iko, yelon tal7iya asada yelo oychofite.
EXO 22:26 Neeni issiba gisho, iya ma7uwa oykida asi de7iko, awi wullonna de7ishin iya ma7uwa zaara.
EXO 22:27 I ma7idi aqey I xalaala. I hara ay ma7idi aqanaw danda7ii? Taani qadhetiya Xoossi gidiya gisho, I taako waassiya wode si7ana.
EXO 22:28 “Xoossaa bolla cashsha qaala haasayopa, woyko ne deriya ayseysa baaddofa.
EXO 22:29 Ne kathaafe, ne woyne ushshafenne ne shamaho zaytiyape taw yarsho yarsha. “Bayra gididi yeletida adde na7aa taw imma.
EXO 22:30 Ne miizapenne ne dorsaafe bayra yeletidaysa taw imma. Enti laapun gallas gakanaw, banta aayetara gam7o; hospuntho gallasan enta taw imma.
EXO 22:31 “Hinte taw geeshsha asi gidanaw koshshees. Hessa gisho, do7i menthidi wodhida mehe asho moopite; hessa kanas yeggite.”
EXO 23:1 “Wordo oda gasethofa; wordo markatada bala asi maaddofa.
EXO 23:2 Iitaba oothanaw daro asaa kaallofa. Pirda wobisanaw daro asaara issifada markatofa.
EXO 23:3 Manqoy pirdas shiiqiya wode iya manqotetha be7ada maaddofa.
EXO 23:4 “Ne morkiya booray woyko harey dhayin demmiko, zaarada iyaw efa.
EXO 23:5 Nena ixiya uraa harey caanara kundin be7ada, uraa maaddada denthona aggada aadhofa.
EXO 23:6 “Pirda dabaaban manqoy pirdas shiiqiya wode iya pirdaa wobbisopa.
EXO 23:7 Oonaka malten mootopa; xilluwa wodhopa. Hessa melaba oothidaysa taani pirdonna aggike.
EXO 23:8 Wodhaafe ekofa; wodhaafey suure xeelliya asa ayfe qooqisees, xillota pirdaa mirqees.
EXO 23:9 “Betanchuwa naaqofa. Hinte Gibxe biittan bete asi gididi de7ida gisho, asa gade asi gidoy ay mela si7etiyako ereeta.
EXO 23:10 “Neeni ne gadiya usupun laythi goyada ma.
EXO 23:11 Laapuntha laythan gadiya goyonna shaacha; iyan dolidi kaxiyaba shiishopa. Ne asaa giddon de7iya manqoti iyape mo; qassi entafe attidaysa do7ati mo. Ne woyne gadiyanne ne shamaho gadiya hessada ootha.
EXO 23:12 “Neeni usupun gallas ooso ootha. Ne booraynne ne harey shempana melanne ne son yeletida aylleynne bete asi shempana mela laapuntha gallasan ooso oothofa.
EXO 23:13 Taani hintew odidaba ubbaa minthidi oothite. Hara xoossata sunthaa xeegidi woossofite; enta sunthaa denthofite.
EXO 23:14 “Tana bonchanaw laythan heedzu ba7aale gallasati hintew de7o.
EXO 23:15 Hinte Gibxefe keyida Abiiba geetetiya ageenan, taani hintena kiitidaysada Uytha Ba7aale bonchite. Laapun gallas irsho yeggidi uukida uythi moopite. Tana goyinnanaw yishe mela kushe yoopite.
EXO 23:16 “Qassi hinte, hinte gaden zerin, koyro gakida kathaa cakiya wode Kathaa Cako Ba7aale bonchite. “Laytha wursethan, woyniyanne hessa mela mithata ayfiya hinte gadepe maxiya wode Shaqara Ba7aale bonchite.
EXO 23:17 Laythan laythan bonchetiya ha heedzu ba7aaletan adde ubbay tana, hinte Godaa goyinnanaw yo.
EXO 23:18 “Neeni taw mehe yarshiya wode irsho yeggidi uukida uythara taw yarshofa. Ba7aale bonchiya gallas yarshetida modhuwafe wontas aybika attofo.
EXO 23:19 Hinte gaden bayra kaxida katha ubbaafe lo77uwa Godaa, hinte Xoossaa soo ehite. Deesha mari woyko dorsa mari iya aaye maathan doysopa.
EXO 23:20 “Ne ogiyan nena naagana malanne taani new giigisida bessaa nena efana mela taani kiitancho ne sinthan kiittana.
EXO 23:21 I odiyaba si7ada iyaw kiiteta; iya bolla Makallofa. Ta iyaw maata immida gisho, hinte nagara oothiyaba gidiko, hinte nagaraa maarenna.
EXO 23:22 Hinte iyaw kiitetikonne ta kiita ubbaa poliko, hinte morketa ubbaa morkana; hintera eqeteyisata taani olana.
EXO 23:23 Ta kiitanchoy hinte sinthan bidi, hintena Amooreta, Hiteta, Parzeta, Kanaaneta, Hiwetanne Yaabuseta biitta ehana. Taani enta dhaysana.
EXO 23:24 Enta xoossatas ziggofite woyko goyinnofite, woyko enta ammano wogaa kaallopite. Enta xoossata dhaysite, enta eeqa shuchata mentherethite.
EXO 23:25 Godaa, hinte Xoossaa tana, goyinnite. Hessada hinte oothiko, taani hinte kathaanne hinte haatha anjana; hargiyaka hinte giddofe diggana.
EXO 23:26 Hinte biittan maccasay boshetenna; maynnena. Taani hinte laytha adussana.
EXO 23:27 “Taani ne morketa bolla ta yashsha yeddana. Hintera eqetiya kawotethata ubbaa daganthana. Hinte morketi ubbay hintew zoko zaaridi baqatana mela oothana.
EXO 23:28 Taani hinte morketa bolla kazhe yeddada Hiweta, Kanaanetanne Hiteta hinte sinthafe goodda kessana.
EXO 23:29 Shin biittay mela attonaadanne bazzo do7i hintena waaysonaada issi laythan enta goodike.
EXO 23:30 Shin hinte taybon daridi, minnidi, he biitta laattana gakanaw enta guuthara guuthara goodda kessana.
EXO 23:31 Taani hinte zawa Zo7o Abbaafe Filisxeeme Abbaa, mela biittafe bidi Efraxiisa Shaafa gakanaw dalgisana. He biittan de7iya ubbaa taani hinte kushen aathada immana; hinteka enta gooddidi kessana.
EXO 23:32 Entara woyko enta xoossatara caaqo oothopite.
EXO 23:33 Enta hinte biittan wothofite. Hankoode enti hintena ta bolla nagara oosisana. Enta xoossata hinte goyinniko hintew xihe gidana” yaagis.
EXO 24:1 Goday Museko, “Neeni, Aaroni, Naadabi Abyoodanne Isra7eele cimatape laapun tammu asati taako zuma bolla keyidi, haahon eqidi, gufannidi, taw goyinnite.
EXO 24:2 Shin neeni nerka taako shiiqa; harati ta mati shiiqopo. Qassi asayka neera zuma bolla keyopo” yaagis.
EXO 24:3 Musey bidi, Godaa qaalanne woga ubbaa asaas odin, asa ubbay issi qaalan, “Goday gidaba ubbaa nuuni oothana” yaagidosona.
EXO 24:4 Musey Goday odidaba ubbaa xaafis. Wontetha gallas guura dendidi, zumaa garsan yarsho besse giigisis. Tammanne nam7u Isra7eele sheeshata sunthan, tammanne nam7u shucha tuussi essis.
EXO 24:5 Isra7eele panthata I kiittin, enti bidi xuussa yarshuwanne issifetetha yarshuwas kormata shukidi, Godaas yarshidosona.
EXO 24:6 Musey mehiya suuthaafe bagga ekidi keriyan tigis; attida bagga suuthaa yarsho bessan dharcis.
EXO 24:7 Hessafe guye, Caaqo Maxaafa ekidi, asaas nabbabin, enti, “Goday gidaba ubbaa nuuni oothana; nuuni iya kiita polana” yaagidosona.
EXO 24:8 Hessafe guye, Musey he suuthaa ekidi, asaa bolla dharcidi, enta, “Goday hintew ha kiitata immiya wode hintera gelida caaquwa minthiya suuthay haysa” yaagis.
EXO 24:9 Musey, Aaroni, Naadabi, Abyoodanne Isra7eele cimatape laapun tammay zumaa bolla keyidi,
EXO 24:10 Isra7eele Xoossaa be7idosona. Iya tohuwape garsan saloda geeyida, sanpare geetetiya shuchafe oosetidaba daaniya demba bessi de7ees.
EXO 24:11 Shin Xoossay Isra7eele asaa halaqata wodhibeenna. Enti Xoossaa be7idosona; iya sinthan midosonanne uyidosona.
EXO 24:12 Goday Museko, “Neeni taako zumaa bolla haa keyada, haysan gam7a. Ta asay taw kiitetana mela nam7u loche shuchata bolla ta kushen ta xaafida higgeta new immana” yaagis.
EXO 24:13 Museynne iyaw kiitetiya Iyyasuy baanaw dendidosona; Musey Xoossara gahetanaw zumaa bolla keyis.
EXO 24:14 Musey Isra7eele cimatako, “Nuuni hinteko simmana gakanaw haysan gam7ite. Aaroninne Huuri haysan hintera de7oosona; odi de7iya oonika entako boo” yaagis.
EXO 24:15 Musey zumaa bolla keyida wode shaaray zumaa ma7is.
EXO 24:16 Godaa bonchoy Siina Zumaa bolla uttis. He shaaray usupun gallas zuma bolla ma7is; laapuntha gallas Goday shaara giddon gididi Muse xeegis.
EXO 24:17 Zumaa bolla qoncida Godaa bonchoy Isra7eeletas tama laco daanidi bentis.
EXO 24:18 Hessafe guye, Musey zumaa huuphiya keyidi shaara giddo gelis; yan oytamu gallasinne oytamu qamma gam7is.
EXO 25:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
EXO 25:2 “Taw imota ehana mela Isra7eeletas oda. Iya wozani iya imma imma gidaba immiya imota asa ubbaafe taw eka.
EXO 25:3 Hinte entafe ekana imotay, worqaa, bira, naase birata,
EXO 25:4 kaalose qacina, ocha teera daaniya qacina, zo7o qacinanne al7o liino, deesha ikise,
EXO 25:5 haashetidi zo7o qalamen tiyetida dorsa ite, lo77o do7a ite, soqala mithi,
EXO 25:6 xompes maaddiya shamaho zayte, shuumatetha zayteninne ixaanen guzhetiya sawota,
EXO 25:7 Kahine halaqay ma7iya efuude geetetiya ma7uwa bollanne iya tiran wosetiya margide geetetiya al7o shuchaanne hara alleeqo shuchata eho.
EXO 25:8 Taani enta giddon daana mela enti tana goyinniya bessi giigiso.”
EXO 25:9 Dunkaaniyanne iya giddon de7iya miisheta ubbaa ta nena bessiya maaran ootha.
EXO 25:10 “Soqala mithafe, adussatethay nam7u wadhanne takadho, gompay issi wadhanne takadho, geesay issi wadhanne takadho gidiya saaxine oothite.
EXO 25:11 Gaathaanne kariya walahi bayna worqan kamma; iya yuushuwaka worqan lanxa.
EXO 25:12 He Taabotiyas oyddu worqa sagaayota oothada; oyddu gedata bolla issi baggara nam7u sagaayota, qassi hanko baggara nam7u sagaayota aathada gasetha.
EXO 25:13 Taabotiya tookiya kaso mithata soqala mithafe kessada worqan lanxa.
EXO 25:14 Taabotiya tookanaw iya miyen de7iya sagaayotan kaso mithata aatha.
EXO 25:15 Tookiya kaso mithati Taabotiya sagaayota giddon de7o; enti yaape keyopo.
EXO 25:16 Taabotiya giddon taani new immiya, tammu kiitati xaafetida nam7u loche shuchata wotha.
EXO 25:17 “Walahi bayna worqafe adussatethay nam7u wadhanne takadho, gompay issi wadhanne takadho gidiya nagara atotetha kama ootha.
EXO 25:18 Qefera de7iya nam7u kiruubeta worqafe qoxada ootha.
EXO 25:19 Issi kiruubiya issi bagga gaxan, nam7antho kiruubiya hanko bagga gaxan wothada nam7aa Taabotiya guphiyara oythada ootha.
EXO 25:20 Kiruubeti woliko simmi uttidi, banta qefiya denthidi, atotetha kamaa kammo.
EXO 25:21 Taani new immiya loche shucha bolla xaafetida tammu kiitata Taabotiya giddon wotha. Yaatada, guphiya Taabotiya bolla wotha.
EXO 25:22 Taabotiya guphiya bolla de7iya nam7u kiruubetape giddon gidada taani neera gahetana. Isra7eele asaas immiya kiita ubbaa taani yan new immana.”
EXO 25:23 “Soqala mithafe adussatethay nam7u wadha, gompay issi wadha, geesay issi wadhanne takadho gidiya issi xarpheeza ootha.
EXO 25:24 Yaatada, walahi bayna worqan lanxa; iya yuushuwaka worqan lanxa.
EXO 25:25 Hessadaka, gompay takadho gidiya goossa iya bolla yuushsha aatha. Yaatada, iya yuushuwa worqan lanxa.
EXO 25:26 He xarpheezas oyddu worqa sagaayota oothada, xarpheezaa oyddu tohotara oytha.
EXO 25:27 Xarpheezaa tookanaw kaso mithata aathiya sagaayoti xarpheeza goossaa matan shiiqidi de7o.
EXO 25:28 He tookiya kasota soqala mithafe kessada, worqan lanxa.
EXO 25:29 Hessadaka, shaatetanne cilpata, woyne yarshuwa duuqiya miishetanne xuu7ata walahi bayna worqafe ootha.
EXO 25:30 Xarpheezay Taabotiyas sintha baggara utto. Ta sinthan uttiya geeshsha uythay ubba wode xarpheezaa bollafe dhayopo.”
EXO 25:31 “Xompe wothiya kocaa walahi bayna worqafe ootha. He kocay eqiya tohuwanne tooma worqafe qoxada ootha. Alleeqos oosetiya wallaxati, gambuthatinne ciishshati ubbay issino gididi oosetanaw bessees.
EXO 25:32 Nam7u baggara, heedzu heedzu tasheta iyaw kessa.
EXO 25:33 Usupun tashetas xeeran xeeran heedzu heedzu alleeqo gambuthatinne ciishshati de7iya lawuze mitha ciishshe daaniyabay de7o.
EXO 25:34 Xompiya wothiya kocaa giddon de7iya tooma xeeran oyddu alleeqo gambuthatinne ciishshati de7iya lawuze mitha ciishshe daaniyabay de7o.
EXO 25:35 Tashetape garsan, nam7u tasheti gahetiya bessan issi issi gambuthi de7o.
EXO 25:36 Gambuthay, tasheynne xompiya wothiya kocay issino gididi, walahi bayna worqafe qoxetidi ooseto.
EXO 25:37 “Xompe wothiya kocaa bolla laapun xompeta giigisada, enti sinthe poo7ana mela dhoqu oothada wotha.
EXO 25:38 Xompiya naaganaw maaddiya Qaphetanne enta wothiyabata walahi bayna worqafe ootha.
EXO 25:39 Xompe wothiya kocaynne iya miisheti ubbay hastamanne ichashu kilo giraame gidiya walahi bayna worqafe ooseto.
EXO 25:40 Taani nena zumaa bolla bessida leemisuwa kaallada, akeekada ootha.”
EXO 26:1 “Dunkaaniya gaatha baggaas al7o liinope oosetida, tammu geshe giigisa. Enta kaalose, ocha teera daaneysaninne zo7o qacinan daddada kiruubeta misiliyara alleeqisa.
EXO 26:2 Gesheti ubbay issi like gido; adussatethay laatamanne oydda, gompay qassi oyddu wadha gido.
EXO 26:3 Ichashu gesheta issife gathada sika; hanko attida ichashata hessada ootha.
EXO 26:4 Issife gahetidi siketida nam7u geshetas issuwa issuwa gaxan kaalose afilape oosetida sagaayota ootha.
EXO 26:5 Issife siketida koyro magarajuwa bolla koyro maaran kaalose afilape oosetida ishatamu sagaayota ootha; hessadaka nam7antho magarajuwa bolla wursetha gaxan ishatamu sagaayota ootha.
EXO 26:6 Geeshsha Dunkaaney issino gidana mela nam7un shaaketi siketida gesheta woli gathidi oysethanaw, ishatamu worqafe oosetida oykiyabata ootha.
EXO 26:7 “Geeshsha Dunkaaniya bollara kammana mela tammanne issi gesheta deesha ikisepe ootha.
EXO 26:8 Tammanne issi gesheti issi gina gido; issi issi magarajuwa adussatethay hastamu wadha, gompay oyddu wadha gido.
EXO 26:9 Ichashu gesheta issi baggara, usupun gesheta hanko baggara gathada sika. Usupuntho magarajoy dakoyetidi, dunkaaniyas sintha baggara daabuleto.
EXO 26:10 Woli gathi sikida geshetape issi magarajuwas macara bolla ishatamu sagaayota ootha; qassi hanko magarajuwas macara bolla ishatamu sagaayota ootha.
EXO 26:11 Nam7un shaaketi siketida gesheti issi kama gidana mela ishatamu naase biratape oosetida oykiyabata ootha.
EXO 26:12 He dunkaaniya geshetape palahida baggaa ekada Geeshsha Dunkaaniyas guye baggara kaqa.
EXO 26:13 Dunkaaniya geshetape adusatetha baggara palahida gompay issi issi wadha gidida gesheta Geeshsha Dunkaaniyas nam7u baggara kaqa.
EXO 26:14 “Dunkaaniyas bolla baggara daabulidi kammanaw zo7o qalamen tiyetida maraze itenne lo77o do7a ite ootha.
EXO 26:15 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya tuuqeta soqala mithafe ootha.
EXO 26:16 Issi issi tuuqiya adussatethay tammu wadha, gompay issi wadhanne bagga gido.
EXO 26:17 Nam7u tuuqeti issife oyketana mela issi issi tuuqiyas oysethiyabay de7o. Geeshsha Dunkaaniya tuuqeta ubbaa hessada ootha.
EXO 26:18 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya wuloha baggara laatamu tuuqeta ootha.
EXO 26:19 Entana essanaw enta garsan bira biratape oosetida oytamu luhoy de7iya tohota ootha. Issi issi tuuqiyas nam7u nam7u toho kessa.
EXO 26:20 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pudeha baggara laatamu tuuqeta ootha.
EXO 26:21 Entana essanaw enta garsan bira biratape oosetida oytamu luhoy de7iya tohota ootha. Issi issi tuuqiyas nam7u nam7u toho kessa.
EXO 26:22 Geeshsha Dunkaaniyas guyera wuloha baggara usupun tuuqeta ootha.
EXO 26:23 Guye baggara de7iya maazanetas nam7u tuuqeta ootha.
EXO 26:24 He maazaniyan de7iya tuuqeti tohope huuphe gakanaw oyketo. Nam7u maazaneta medhiya nam7u tuuqeta hessatho oosetanaw bessees.
EXO 26:25 Hessadaka nam7u nam7u tohoy de7iya hospun tuuqeta oothada, entaw bira biratape oosetida tammanne usupun luhoy de7iya tohota ootha.
EXO 26:26 “Tuuqeta sathidi oythiya soqala mithafe oosetida tammanne ichashu liyoota kessa. Entafe ichashata Geeshsha Dunkaaniyas issi bagga miyen de7iya tuuqetas,
EXO 26:27 qassi ichashata hanko bagga miyen de7iya tuuqetas, hessadaka attida ichashata wuloha baggan de7iya tuuqetas ootha.
EXO 26:28 Ha gaxa tuuqiyapenne ya gaxa tuuqiyape yaa liyooti giddo tuuqiyara oyketo.
EXO 26:29 Tuuqeta worqan lanxa; liyoota oykanaw maaddiya sagaayota worqafe ootha; qassi liyoota worqan lanxa.
EXO 26:30 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya zumaa bolla ta nena bessidaysada ootha.
EXO 26:31 “Al7o liinope issi magarajo oothada, iya kaalose, ocha teera daaneysaninne zo7o qacinan daddada kiruubeta misilen alleeqisa.
EXO 26:32 Iya soqala mithafe oothada, worqan meeshetida kocataninne bira biratape oosetida oyddu tohoy de7iya tuussata bolla kaqa.
EXO 26:33 He magarajuwa Geeshsha Dunkaaniyas kaaran de7iya qaphetape garsan kaqa. Yaatada higgey xaafetida nam7u loche shuchata oykida Caaqo Taabotiya magarajuwas guye baggan wotha. He geshey, Geeshsha Bessaanne Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaafe shaakees.
EXO 26:34 Nagara atotetha kaman Caaqo Taabotiya kamma.
EXO 26:35 Xarpheezaa, Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaafe karera, Geeshsha Dunkaaniyape pudeha baggan wotha; xompe wothiya kocaa dugeha baggara wotha.
EXO 26:36 “Dunkaaniya penge magarajuwa, al7o liinope giigisada, kaalose, ocha teera daaneysaninne zo7o qacinan daddada alleeqisa.
EXO 26:37 Magarajuwas ichashu tuussata soqala mithafe oothada worqan lanxa; kocatika worqafe oosetidaysata gido. Tuussatas naase biratape ichashu tohota giigisa.”
EXO 27:1 “Soqala mithafe yarsho bessi ootha. Adussatethaynne gompay oyddu wadhanne takadho, geesay heedzu wadha gidida oyddu maazanera de7iya yarsho bessi ootha.
EXO 27:2 Oyddu maazaneta bolla kace daaniyaba kessa; kaceti yarsho bessaara issino gididi ooseto. Yaatada, yarsho bessa ubbaa naase biratan laxa.
EXO 27:3 Iyaw go7etiya miisheta; bido kessiya kereta, akaafata, baldeta, asho qaphetanne cooceta ubbaa naase biratape ootha.
EXO 27:4 Yaatada, naase biratape zarzare daaniyaba oothada, iyaw oyddu maazaneta bolla oyddu sagaayota giigisa.
EXO 27:5 He zarzariya yarsho bessa goossaafe garsan yarsho bessaas bagga zawa gathada wotha.
EXO 27:6 Soqala mithafe yarsho bessa tookiya kaso mithata kessada, naase biratan lanxa.
EXO 27:7 Yarsho bessaa tookiya wode maaddana mela he kaso mithata nam7u miyera de7iya sagaayotan aatha.
EXO 27:8 Taani nena zumaa bolla bessidaysada yarsho bessi xawulape oothada, gidduwa kaysi ootha.”
EXO 27:9 “Geeshsha Dunkaaniya dabaaba gechanaw al7o liinope magarajo giigisa. Geshetas adussatethay dugeha baggara xeetu wadha gido.
EXO 27:10 Iyaw kate gidana mela naase biratape oosetida laatamu tuussatanne laatamu tohota ootha. Enta bolla bira biratape oosetida xam7atanne kaceta ootha.
EXO 27:11 Dabaabas pudeha baggaraka hessada ootha.
EXO 27:12 “Dabaabas wuloha bagga adussatethay ishatamu wadha gidida gesheti oosetidi, entaw tammu tohoy de7iya tuussati de7o.
EXO 27:13 Geliya wulay de7iya, doloha bagga dabaaba gompay ishatamu wadha gido.
EXO 27:14 Dabaaba pengiyafe issi baggara adussatethay tammanne ichashu wadha gidiya gesheti de7o; entaw heedzu tohoy de7iya heedzu tuussati de7o.
EXO 27:15 Hanko baggara de7iya geshetika hessada ooseto.
EXO 27:16 “Dabaaba geliya wulaas adussatethay laatamu wadha gidiya, al7o liinope magarajo giigisada, kaalose, ocha teera daaneysaninne zo7o qacinan daddada alleeqisa. Enti iyan zempana mela oyddu tohora de7iya oyddu tuussata giigisa.
EXO 27:17 Dabaaba yuushuwan de7iya tuussati ubbay bira biratape oosetida xam7atan oyketo; enta kaceti bira biratape, enta tohoti naase biratape ooseto.
EXO 27:18 Dabaaba adussatethay xeetu wadha, gompay oytamu wadha, geesay ichashu wadha gido. Magarajoti al7o liinope, enta tohotika naase biratape ooseto.
EXO 27:19 “Geeshsha Dunkaaniyan go7etiya miishe ubbay, dunkaaniyanne dabaaba dhisheti ubbay naase biratape ooseto.
EXO 27:20 “Xompey qamma poo7ishe aqana mela gum7i xillisida shamaho zayte new ehana mela Isra7eele asaa kiita.
EXO 27:21 Aaroninne iya nayti, poo7oy, Godaa sinthan omarsafe wonta gakanaw poo7ana mela Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon, Marka Taabotiya sinthan de7iya magarajuwafe kare baggara eetho. Hessi Isra7eele asaas merina woga gididi de7o.
EXO 28:1 “Ne ishaa Aaronanne iya nayta Nadaaba, Abyooda, Alaazaranne Itamaara neeko xeega. Enti kahine gididi taw haggaazana mela Isra7eele asaa giddofe enta dummaya.
EXO 28:2 Iyaw bonchonne teema immana mela ne ishaa Aaronas boncho ma7ota giigisa.
EXO 28:3 Aaroni kahinetethan dummatidi taw haggaazanaada, taani hiillatethi immida oosanchota ubbaa xeegada, Aaronas ma7ota giigisana mela oda.
EXO 28:4 Enti giigisana ma7otika haysata; tiran ma7etiya ma7o, efuude, adussa qamise, alleeqetidi dadetida shamize, qacenne danco. Ne ishay Aaroninne iya nayti kahine gididi taw haggaazishe ma7ana mela geeshsha ma7ota entaw giigiso.
EXO 28:5 Kushe hiillanchoti he ma7ota worqa cachafe, kaalosepe, ocha teera daaneysafe zo7o qacinapenne al7o liinope giigiso.
EXO 28:6 “Efuude geetetiya ma7uwa worqa cacha qacinape, kaalosepe, ocha teera daaneysafe, zo7o qacinapenne al7o liinope kushe hiillanchoti alleeqisidi giigiso.
EXO 28:7 Nam7u hashiyara wodhidi, nam7u baggaa woli gathidi qachanaw maaddiya qangoti de7o.
EXO 28:8 Efuudey oosetidabaape hiillan oosetida dancoy efuudiyara wolla oosetidaba gididi issife oyketo.
EXO 28:9 Margide geetetiya nam7u shuchata ekada, tammanne nam7u Yayqooba nayta sunthaa enta bolla woocada xaafa.
EXO 28:10 Enta yeleta maarada issi shucha bolla usupun sunthata, hanko shuchaa bolla attida usupun sunthata woocada xaafa.
EXO 28:11 Ha nam7u shuchata bolla tammanne nam7u Yayqooba nayta sunthaa woocadi xaafanaw hiillancho demma; he xaafetida shuchata efuudiya bolla oythanaw iya yuushuwa worqan lanxa.
EXO 28:12 Yaatada tammanne nam7u Isra7eele sheesha qofisiyaba gidana mela ha nam7u shuchata efuudiyara oythada hashiyara aadhiya qanguwa bolla wotha. Taani, Goday, ta asaa ubba wode hassayana mela Aaroni enta sunthaa ba hashiyan tooko.
EXO 28:13 He shuchata oykeysa worqafe ootha.
EXO 28:14 Qassi walahi bayna worqafe wodoroda dooqetida nam7u santhalaata hashiyara aadhiya qanguwara oyketana mela ootha.
EXO 28:15 “Godaa sheniya oychidi eranaw, tiran ma7etiya ma7uwa kushe hiillanchon oosisa. He tiran ma7etiya ma7uwa worqa cacha qacinape, kaalosepe, ocha teera daaneysafe, zo7o qacinapenne al7o liinope efuudiyada alleeqisidi giigiso. Kaalosepe oosetidabaape oothada alleeqisa.
EXO 28:16 Iyaw geesaynne gompay issi issi takadho gididi oyddu maazaney de7o.
EXO 28:17 Iyaw oyddu maaran al7o shuchata wotha. Koyro maaran sardiyoone, toophazenne phooliya al7o shuchata wotha.
EXO 28:18 Nam7antho maaran baluure, sanperenne almaaze geetetiya al7o shuchata wotha.
EXO 28:19 Heedzantho maaran yaakinte, kelqedoonenne ametesxinoosa geetetiya al7o shuchata wotha.
EXO 28:20 Oyddantho maaran birelle, margide, yasphide geetetiya al7o shuchata wotha. Haysati ubbay worqa kaquwa bolla woseto.
EXO 28:21 Isra7eele naytas qofiso gidana mela ha tammanne nam7u al7o shuchata, issi issi Yayqooba nayta sunthay, issi issi shucha bolla woocetidi xaafeto.
EXO 28:22 “Tiran ma7etiya ma7uwas walahi bayna worqafe wodoroda dooqada santhalaata ootha.
EXO 28:23 Nam7u worqa migiddota oothada, tiran ma7etiya ma7uwas qommo gaxa maazaniyan gathada oytha.
EXO 28:24 He nam7u worqa santhalaatata migiddotara gathada oytha.
EXO 28:25 Hanko baggan de7iya nam7u santhalaata gaxa nam7u qangotara gasetha. Hessada oothada sintha baggara, hashiyara wodhiya efuudiya qanguwara gasetha.
EXO 28:26 Qassi nam7u worqa sagaayota oothada, efuudiyape gatha baggara kaallidi de7iya tiran ma7etiya ma7uwas nam7u maazaneta xeeran aatha.
EXO 28:27 Hessadaka, worqafe hara nam7u migiddota oothada, efuudiyas sintha bagga hashiyara wodhiya qanguwas garsa baggara gasetha. Efuudiya sikuwa matan dancuwaafe qommo baggara enta gasethanaw bessees.
EXO 28:28 Tiran ma7etiya ma7uwan de7iya migiddota efuudiyan de7iya migiddotara gathada kaalose qacinan qacha. Hessada oothiko, tiran ma7etiya ma7oy xeessafe qommon de7iya gisho, qashoy dol7enna.
EXO 28:29 “Aaroni Geeshsha bessa geliya wode Isra7eele mayzata sunthaa oykida, tiran ma7etiya ma7uwa ma7o. Yaaniya gisho, taani, Goday ubba wode ta asaa qopana.
EXO 28:30 Qassi saama yeggiya nam7u geeshsha shuchata tiran ma7etiya ma7uwan yegga. Aaroni Geeshsha dunkaaniya geliya wode ba tiran enta tookidi gelo. Ta sheniya Isra7eele asaa erisanaw ta sinthe geliya wode ubban tira kiisiyape dhaysofo.
EXO 28:31 “Efuudiyape bollara ma7iya adussa ma7uwa kumethi kaalose afilape giigisa.
EXO 28:32 He adusse ma7uwas huuphe aathiya luho medha. He luhoy peedhetonna mela guye qalam7ada yuushsha aathada sika.
EXO 28:33 Adussa ma7uwas duge bagga macara yuushuwan kaalose, ocha teera daaneysaninne zo7o qacinape, oromaane teera misile medha. Yaatada enta giddon aatha aatha worqafe oosetida daalata ootha.
EXO 28:34 Worqa daalatinne oromaane teera misileti he adusse ma7uwas duge bagga macara yuushuwan aadho.
EXO 28:35 Aaroni kahinetethan oothiya wode ha adussa ma7uwa ma7o. Godaa sinthe, Geeshsha Bessaa geliya wodenne keyiya wode, daalay giirana; ika hayqenna.
EXO 28:36 Walahi bayna worqafe issi alleeqo oothada, iya bolla ‘Godaas Dummatis’ yaagada woocada xaafa.
EXO 28:37 Yaatada huuphiya qaciya bolla kaalose qacinara qacha.
EXO 28:38 Aaroni iya ba som7uwan wotho. Hessan Isra7eele asay Godaas imota immishe balidabay de7iko, he balaa Aaroni tookees. Asay ehiyaba Goday ekana mela I hessa ubba wode ba som7uwan wothanaw koshshees.
EXO 28:39 “Aarona shamziyanne qacciya al7o liinope dadda. Qassi dancuwaka al7o liinope daddada alleeqisa.
EXO 28:40 Aarona naytas bonchonne puula immana mela shamizeta, dancotanne huuphen wothiya qoobeta giigisa.
EXO 28:41 Neeni ha ma7ota ne ishaa Aaronanne iya nayta mayza. Enti kahinetethan taw haggaazana mela enta shamaho zayten tiyada taw dummaya.
EXO 28:42 Enta kalloy kametana mela garsan ma7iya ma7uwa xeessafe bidi wodire gakanaw kammiyaba al7o liinope sure giigisa.
EXO 28:43 Aaroninne iya nayti Geeshsha Dunkaaniya geliya wode woyko Geeshsha Bessan kahinetethan haggaazanaw yarsho bessi shiiqiya wode ha ma7ota ma7o. Hessada haniko, enti banta bolla hayqo ehokona. Hessi Aaronasinne iya sheeshatas merinaa woga gido.
EXO 29:1 “Aaroninne iya nayti kahinetethan taw haggaazana mela neeni enta dummayanaw haysada ootha; borey bayna wofaanonne nam7u maraze eka.
EXO 29:2 Geeshsha giste dhiille ekada, irsho yeggonna shamaho zaytera gindada uythu uuka. Qassi zaytey gelonna hara uythu uuka; hessadaka, lee7o uythu uukada zayten tiya.
EXO 29:3 Wofaanuwanne nam7u marazeta yarshiya wode he uytha ubbaa gaytan wothada taw shiisha.
EXO 29:4 “Yaatada Aaronanne iya nayta Geeshsha Dunkaaniya penge ehada haathan enti meecetana mela oda.
EXO 29:5 Hessafe guye, kahinetetha ma7ota, shamziya, efuudiya, efuudiya bollara ma7iya adussa ma7uwanne tiran ma7etiya ma7uwa Aarona mayza; dancuwaka dancisa.
EXO 29:6 Qacciya qaccisa; iya bolla, ‘Godaas dummatis’ geetetidi xaafetida worqa alleequwa wotha.
EXO 29:7 Tishsha zaytiya ekada iya huuphiyan tigada tiya.
EXO 29:8 Iya nayta ehada shamziya mayza.
EXO 29:9 Enta xeessaa dancisa; enta huuphiyanka qoobe wotha. Aaronanne iya nayta yaatada kahinetethan shuuma. Hessika, entaw merina woga gido.
EXO 29:10 “Wofaanuwa Geeshsha Dunkaaniya sinthe ehada, Aaroninne iya nayti iya huuphiyan banta kushiya wothana mela ootha.
EXO 29:11 Wofaanuwa Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengiyan Godaa sinthan shuka.
EXO 29:12 Wofaanuwa suuthaafe guuthu ekada ne biradhiyan, yarsho bessa bolla de7iya kaceta tiya. Attidaysa yarsho bessaafe garsan gussa.
EXO 29:13 Hessafe guye, ulo ashuwa kammida modhuwa ubbaa, tiriyaas lo77o baggaa, nam7u kilahotanne enta kammida modhuwa ekada, yarsho bessaa bolla wothada xuugga.
EXO 29:14 Shin wofaanuwa ulo ashuwa, iya galbaanne maraaciya gutaape gaxa kessada xuugga. Hessi kahineta nagaraa quchiya yarsho.
EXO 29:15 “Nam7u marazetape issuwa ekada, Aaroninne iya nayti banta kushiya iya huuphen wothana mela ootha.
EXO 29:16 He maraziya shukada, suuthaa yarsho bessan oyddu maazanetan wurxa.
EXO 29:17 Iya ashuwa qanxerethada, ulo ashuwanne gedaa meeccada, huuphiya hara qommo ashotara issife yarsho bessan wotha.
EXO 29:18 Hessafe guye, kumetha ashuwa yarsho bessan xuugga. Hessika Godaas xuussa yarsho. He yarshuwa sawoy Godaa ufaysees.
EXO 29:19 “Qassi kahinetetha wogas eketida hanko maraziya ekada Aaroninne iya nayti banta kushiya iya huuphen wothana mela oda.
EXO 29:20 Iya shukada, suuthaafe guuthu ekada, Aaronasinne iya naytas ushacha haythatas gaxaa, enta ushacha kushiyasinne tohuwas wogga biradheta tiya. Attida suuthaa yarsho bessa oyddu maazanetan wurxa.
EXO 29:21 Yarsho bessan de7iya suuthaafenne tiyiya zaytiyape guuthu ekada, Aarona bollanne iya ma7uwa bolla, qassika iya nayta bollanne enta ma7uwa bolla wurxa. Hessan Aaroninne iya nayti banta ma7uwara taw dummatidaysata gidana.
EXO 29:22 “He marazey kahineta shuuma wogaas eketiya gisho, goyna modhuwa, ulo ashuwa kammida modhuwa, tiriya kammida moodhiya, nam7u kilahota, enta kammida moodhiyanne ushacha guye gedaa qanxada shaaka.
EXO 29:23 Godaa sinthan wothida uythatape, zaytey geliboonna uythaa, zaytera uukida uythaanne lee7o uythaafe issuwa eka.
EXO 29:24 Neeni ha katha ubbaa Aarona kushiyaninne iya nayta kushiyan wotha. Enti iya yuusho yarsho oothidi Godaas immiya yarsho oothidi Godaa sinthan shiisho.
EXO 29:25 Hessafe guye, enta kushepe ekada yarsho bessa bolla wotha; xuussa yarshuwara gathada, Godaa sawana mela yarsho bessa bolla taman xuugga.
EXO 29:26 Aaroni kahine gididi shuumetiya wode shukida maraziya angaasuwa ekada, Godaa sinthan yuusho yarsho ootha. Hessi hintena gakiya gisho gidana.
EXO 29:27 “Kahiney shuumetiya wode, Aaronanne iya nayta kahinetethan shuumanaw eketida angaaysuwanne toho ashuwa taw dummaya. Hessika, kahineta gakiya gisho gido.
EXO 29:28 Isra7eeleti ubbay kahine shuumanaw woyko anjetanaw Godaas Angaasonne guye toho yarsho immiya wode ashoy taw dummatidaysa gido. Shin gishoy Aaronasinne iya naytas gako; he wogay laametofo.
EXO 29:29 “Aaroni hayqida wode iya nayti iya kahinetetha ma7uwa laatto. Enti kahinetethan shuumetidaape guye he ma7uwa ma7o.
EXO 29:30 Iya naytape iya bessan kahine gididi, Geeshsha bessan haggaazanaw Geeshsha Dunkaaniya yaa na7i he ma7uwa laapun gallas ma7o.
EXO 29:31 “Aaroninne iya nayti kahine gididi shuumetiya wode shuketida maraziya ashuwa ekada, geeshsha bessan katha.
EXO 29:32 Aaroninne iya nayti maraziya ashuwa gaytan attida uythaara Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen mo.
EXO 29:33 Enti kahine gididi shuumetiya wode nagara atotethas yarshetida he ashuwa mona. Shin he kathay geeshshi gidida gisho, kahineta xalaali mo; hara asi oonika moopo.
EXO 29:34 Ashuwapenne kathaafe mishin attidi aqiko, taman xuugeto; geeshshi gidida gisho meetetofo.
EXO 29:35 “Aaroninne iya nayti kahine gididi shuumetiya wode, ta nena kiitida ubbaa ootha; ba7aaley laapun gallasan poleto.
EXO 29:36 Nagaraa atotethas issi issi gallasan issi wofaano shukada yarsha. Hessi yarsho bessa geeshshees. Yaatada yarsho bessa polo geeshshanaw shamaho zayte tiya.
EXO 29:37 Hessa laapun gallas gakanaw gallas gallas ootha. Yaatiko yarsho bessay polo geeshshi gidana. I polo geeshshi gidida gisho, iya bochiya asi woyko haraba ubbay geeyana.
EXO 29:38 “Laythan laythan yarsho bessan gallas gallas issi laythi gidida nam7u marazeta yarsha.
EXO 29:39 Marazetape issuwa wonta, qassi hankuwa omarsi yarsha.
EXO 29:40 Koyro maraziyara issi kilo giraame gidiya geeshsha lo77o giste dhiille, issi litiro shamaho zaytera gindada yarsha. Issi litiro woyne ushsha yarsho oothada gussa.
EXO 29:41 Hanko maraziya omarsi yarshashe wonta yarshoysa mela dhiille, zaytenne woyne ushsha shiisha. Hessi taw yarshetiya katha yarsho; iya sawoy tana ufayseysa gidana.
EXO 29:42 “Laythan laythan he xuussa yarshoy Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen, Godaa sinthan paci bayna yashetanaw bessees. He bessan taani ta deriyara gahetana; neeraka yan odetana.
EXO 29:43 Yan taani Isra7eeletara gahetana; ta bonchoy he bessa dummayana.
EXO 29:44 Taani Geeshsha Dunkaaniyanne yarsho bessa dummayana; enti taw kahine gididi haggaazana mela Aaronanne iya nayta dummayana.
EXO 29:45 Yaatada, taani Isra7eeleta giddon daana; enta Xoossaa gidana.
EXO 29:46 Enta giddon daanaw Gibxefe enta kessida Goday, enta Xoossay tana gideysa enti erana. Taani Godaa, enta Xoossaa.
EXO 30:1 “Ixaane cuyisiya bessaa soqala mithafe medha.
EXO 30:2 Iyaw oyddu maazaney de7o. Adussatethaynne gompay issi issi wadha, geesay nam7u wadha gido. Oyddu maazaniyan de7iya kaceti iyara oyketidi oosetonna.
EXO 30:3 Iyaw bolla baggaa, iya oyddu maazanetanne iya kaceta walahi bayna worqan lanxa. Iya yuushuwaka worqan lanxa.
EXO 30:4 Nam7u worqa sagaayota oothada, xarpheeza tookanaw maaddiya kaso mithata aathanaw goossaas nam7u baggara oytha.
EXO 30:5 Kaso mithata soqala mithafe kessada, enta worqan lanxa.
EXO 30:6 He ixaane yarsho xarpheezaa, Caaqo Taabotiya sinthan kaqetida magarajuwafe kare baggara wotha. Yan taani neera gahetana.
EXO 30:7 “Aaroni wonta wonta xompeta giigisanaw yaa wode, sawiya ixaane yarshiya bessan cuyiso.
EXO 30:8 Hessada, Aaroni omarsi xompeta xompiya wodeka ixaane cuyiso. He ixaaniya yarshoy yaana laytha ubban Godaa sinthan cuyo.
EXO 30:9 Ha yarsho bessan hara digetida ixaane, katha yarsho, mehe yarshonne woyne yarsho yarshofa.
EXO 30:10 Aaroni, nagaraa atotethas laythafe issi toho shuketiya mehiya suuthaafe ekidi, he yarsho bessa maazaneta bolla de7iya kaceta wothidi geeshsho wogaa polo. Ha wogay sinthara yaana wode ubban laythan laythan poleto. He yarsho bessay geeshshi gidiya gisho Godaas dummatis” yaagis.
EXO 30:11 Hessafe guye, Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
EXO 30:12 “Neeni Isra7eele asaa taybiya wode, issi issi asi ba shempuwa wozanaw Godaas miishe qanxo. Yaatiko neeni enta taybiya wode gadoy enta bolla yeenna.
EXO 30:13 Taybon geliya asi oonika huuphen huuphen geeshsha dunkaanen eretida mizaane ginan bira ciggo. Issi issi asi hessa taw yarsho oothidi immo.
EXO 30:14 Taybon geliya asi oonika laythi laatamanne iyape bolla gidida ubbay Godaas hessa eho.
EXO 30:15 Enti banta shempuwa wozanaw Godaas imota immiya wode, dureyka manqoyka issi gina immofe attishin, durey darsidi woyko manqoy guuthidi immofo.
EXO 30:16 He miishiya Isra7eele asaape ekada, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya naaganaw peeshsha. He miishey enta shempuwa wozanawunne ta enta naagana mela qofisiyaba gidana” yaagis.
EXO 30:17 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
EXO 30:18 “Meecha keriyanne iya tohuwa naase biratape medha. Iyan haathe tigada Geeshsha Dunkaaniyapenne yarsho bessaafe giddon wotha.
EXO 30:19 Aaroninne iya nayti banta kushiyanne banta tohuwa yan meeceto.
EXO 30:20 Enti Geeshsha Dunkaaniya gelanaapenne yarsho yarshanaape sinthe hessa oothanaw bessees. Hessa enti oothiko hayqope attoosona.
EXO 30:21 Enti hayqonna mela, banta kushiyanne banta tohuwa meecetanaw bessees. Hessi Aaronasinne iya sheeshatas, yaa yeletetha ubbaas merinaa woga gidana” yaagis.
EXO 30:22 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
EXO 30:23 “Geeshsha sawota, hessatika; usupun kilo giraame gukiya karbe, heedzu kilo giraame sawiya qarafa, heedzu kilo giraame sawiya maata,
EXO 30:24 usupun kilo giraame burgude eka. He ubbayka geeshsha dunkaanen eretida mizaaniya gina gido. Hessata bolla oyddu litiro zayte guja.
EXO 30:25 Hessata shittoda walakada, sawiya geeshsha zayte oothada,
EXO 30:26 Geeshsha Dunkaaniyanne Caaqo Taabotiya tiya.
EXO 30:27 Xarpheezanne iya miisheta, xompe wothiya kocaanne iya miisheta, ixaane cuyisiya xarpheezaa,
EXO 30:28 xuussa yarsho bessinne iyan bolla de7iya miisheta ubba, meecha keriyanne iya tohuwa tiya.
EXO 30:29 Enti polo geeshshi gidana mela enta dummaya. Enta bochiya oonika geeshshi gidana.
EXO 30:30 “Hessafe guye, Aaroninne iya nayti kahine gididi taw haggaazana mela enta tiyada dummaya.
EXO 30:31 Isra7eele asaas, ‘Haysi Geeshsha shuumatetha zaytey yaa yeletethaas tana haggaazanaw maaddiya zayte gido.
EXO 30:32 He zaytiya coo asa bolla gussofa; qassi ay zayteka iya oothida ogiyan oothofa. Zaytey geeshshi gidida gisho, hinteka iya geeshshatetha erite.
EXO 30:33 He shittuwa giigisiya asi, woyko kahine gidonna hara asi tiyiya oonika ta asaa giddofe hileto’ yaaga” yaagis.
EXO 30:34 Goday Museko haysada yaagis; “Geeshsha sawota, xokiya mitha made, dhaadhe keethan de7iya shitto, sawiya madenne sawiya ixaane eka; enta ubbaa mizaaney issi gina gido.
EXO 30:35 Shittoda walahetida ixaane oothada enta go7eta. Walahi baynanne geeshshi gidana mela iyan maxine yegga.
EXO 30:36 Iyape guuthara ekada liiqisa caddada, taani neera gahetiya Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon, Caaqo Taabotiya sinthan wurxa. He ixaaney new polo geeshshi gido.
EXO 30:37 Hintew go7etanaw he ixaaniya ay ogenka giigisopite. Hessi taw dummatidaysa gideysa erite.
EXO 30:38 Hessatho oothidi, iya sawuwa singidi ufaytanaw koyiya oonika, ta asaa giddofe dhayana” yaagis.
EXO 31:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
EXO 31:2 “Taani Yihuda sheeshape gidida Huura na7aa na7aa, Ure na7aa, Basili7eela dooras.
EXO 31:3 Taani iya ta Ayyaanan kunthas; taani hiilla, akeekanne ooso ubbaa oothiya era iyaw immas.
EXO 31:4 Hessika, hiillan oothana oosota halchidi worqafe, birapenne naase biratape dumma dummaba kessidi oothanaasa.
EXO 31:5 Hessadaka, al7o shuchu massidi giigiseysa, mithi masseysanne hara ooso ubbaa oothana mela cincatethi immas.
EXO 31:6 Qassi iya maaddana mela Daane sheeshi gidida Ahisamaaka na7aa Eliyaaba dooras. Taani nena kiittidaba ubbaa enti oothana mela kushe hiilla eriya harata ubbaas gita eratethi immas.
EXO 31:7 Enti oothanabati, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya, Caaqo Taabotiya, iya bolla wothiya nagara atotetha kamaa, Dunkaaniya giddon go7etiya miishe ubbaa,
EXO 31:8 xarpheezanne iya miisheta, walahi bayna worqafe oosetida xompe wothiya kocaanne iya miishe ubbaa, ixaane cuyisiya xarpheezaa,
EXO 31:9 xuussa yarsho bessinne iya miishe ubbaa, meecha keriyanne iya tohuwa,
EXO 31:10 Aaroninne iya nayti kahinetethan haggaazishe ma7iya kahinetetha ma7uwa,
EXO 31:11 shuumatetha zaytiyanne Geeshsha Bessaas haniya sawiya ixaaniya, taani nena kiitidaysada enti oothana” yaagis.
EXO 31:12 Goday Muse haysada yaagidi kiittis;
EXO 31:13 “Isra7eele asaa, ‘Ta Sambaata naagite. Hessi taani, Goday, hintena taw geeshsha dere oothada dooridaysa bessiya malla gididi, yaana yeletetha ubbaas taapenne hintefe giddon de7o.
EXO 31:14 He gallasay geeshshi gidiya gisho, iya bonchite. Sambaata bonchonaynne he gallasan ooso oothiya oonika ta asaa giddofe dhayo woyko hayqo.
EXO 31:15 Hinte ooso oothanaw bessiya usupun gallasati de7oosona. Shin laapuntha gallasay Godaas dummatida, shempo gallas. Sambaata gallasan ooso oothiya oonika hayqo.
EXO 31:16 Isra7eele yeletetha ubbay ha Sambaata gallasaa merina caaqo malla oothidi boncho.
EXO 31:17 Taani usupun gallasan saluwanne sa7aa medhida gishonne laapuntha gallasan ooso aggada shempida gisho, ta giddoninne Isra7eeleta giddon hessi merinaw eqidi de7iya malla gidana’ yaaga” yaagis.
EXO 31:18 Goday Muse Siina zuma bolla odiseysa ongida wode, I ba biradhen xaafida tammu kiitata oykida nam7u loche shuchata Muses immis.
EXO 32:1 Asay, Musey zumaa bollafe wodhanaw gam7idaysa be7ida wode Aaronako yidi, “Nuna kaalethishe naagana xoossata nuus ootha. Gibxe biittafe nuna kessida Musey waanidaako eroko” yaagidosona.
EXO 32:2 Aaroni entako, “Hinte macheta, hinte adde naytanne hinte macca nayta haythan de7iya worqaa kessidi, taw haa ekidi yiite” yaagis.
EXO 32:3 Asi ubbay banta haythafe worqaa kessidi, Aaronas ehidosona.
EXO 32:4 I hessa entafe ekidi, taman sheeshidaape guye, qoxidi, worqa mara misile oothidi medhis. Enti, “Isra7eeleto, nuna Gibxe biittafe kaalethidi kessida nu xoossati haysata” yaagidosona.
EXO 32:5 Aaroni hessa be7ida wode, he maraa sinthan yarsho besse giigisidi, “Wonto Godaa bonchiya ba7aale gallas gidana” yaagidi erisis.
EXO 32:6 Wontetha gallas guura asay dendidi, xuussa yarshonne issifetetha yarsho yarshidosona. Yaatidi, asay maanawunne uyanaw uttidosona. Mi uyi simmidi, duranawunne pokoba hananaw dendidosona.
EXO 32:7 Goday Museko, “Neeni Gibxefe kessada, ehida ne asay nagara oothidi, bantana tunisida gisho ellesada duge wodha.
EXO 32:8 Taani enta kiitida ogiyape enti ellesidi shiretidosona. Worqa sheeshidi mara misile oothidi, bantaw eeqa medhidi iya goyinnidosona. Iyaw yarshidi, ‘Nuna Gibxe biittafe kessida nu xoossay haysa’ yaagidosona.
EXO 32:9 Goday Museko, ha asay ay mela wozana muumeko ta be7as.
EXO 32:10 Ha77i ta hanqoy enta bolla eexin, taani enta dhaysanaw giigetida gisho, neeni tana diggofa. Yaatada, taani nena gita dere oothana” yaagis.
EXO 32:11 Shin Musey ba Godaa, Xoossaa haysada yaagidi woossis; “Abeeti Godaw, neeni ne gita wolqaaninne ne mino kushiyan Gibxefe kessada ehida ne asaa bolla ne hanqoy ayis eexii?
EXO 32:12 Ne hessa oothiyaba gidiko, Gibxeti, ‘Goday entana dereta bolla wodhanawunne biittafe pittidi dhaysanaw kessis’ ayis gaanee? Ne yashshiya hanquwafe simma. Ne asaa dhaysanaw qopidaysa agga.
EXO 32:13 Ne aylleta Abrahaame, Yisaaqanne Yayqooba hassaya. Neeni entaw, ‘Taani hinte sheesha salo xoolintoda darsana; taani hintew immana gida ha biitta ubbaa hinte sheeshatas immana; enti he biitta merinaw laattana’ gada ne huuphen ne caaqida caaquwa qopa” yaagis.
EXO 32:14 Hessa gisho, Goday ba deriya bolla iitabaa ehanaw qopidaysa aggidi, enta maaris.
EXO 32:15 Musey nam7u baggara xaafetida, tammu kiitati de7iya nam7u loche shuchata ba kushen oykidi, zumaape duge wodhis.
EXO 32:16 He masetida shuchata giigisiday Xoossaa; shuchata bolla woocidi xaafidayka Xoossaa.
EXO 32:17 Iyyasuy asaa kooshincha si7ida wode, Museko, “Asay siiratida bessan ola waasoy si7etees” yaagis.
EXO 32:18 Musey zaaridi, “Haysi xoonida asa ceeqo woyko xoonetida asa yeeho gidonashin, yetha waaso” yaagis.
EXO 32:19 Musey gutaako matida wode maranne dursaa be7idi daro hanqetis. He wode ba kushen oykidi yida, masetida shuchata zumaa xaphon holidi mentherethis.
EXO 32:20 Enti medhida maraa ekidi, taman xuuggis. Hessafe guye, liiqana gakanaw gaaccidi haathara maadhidi, Isra7eele asay uyanaada oothis.
EXO 32:21 Musey Aaronako, “Ha asay new ay oothin, enta haysa mela iita nagara banta bolla oothana mela oothadii?” yaagis.
EXO 32:22 Aaroni zaaridi, “Ta godaw, tana hanqetofa. Ha asay iitaba oothanaw ay mela koyaako ne eraasa.
EXO 32:23 Enti, ‘Nuna Gibxefe kessidi ehida, Musey waanidaako nu eroko. Hessa gisho, kaalethiya xoossata nuus ootha’ yaagidosona.
EXO 32:24 Taani entako, ‘Hinte haythan de7iya worqaa kessidi, hammite’ yaagas. Enti taw immida worqaa taani taman yeggin, ha mara misiley keyis” yaagis.
EXO 32:25 Aaroni asaa coo yeddi aggin, asay ba morketa sinthan kawuyidi, kadhetidaysa Musey be7is.
EXO 32:26 Hessa gisho, Musey gutaa geliya pengiyan eqidi, “Godaa bagga gidiya asi oonika taako yo” yaagis. He wode Leeweti ubbay iyako shiiqidosona.
EXO 32:27 I, entako, “Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, hinte issoy issoy hinte mashshaa shoddidi, gutaas ha pengefe hini penge gakanaw bidi, hinte ishata, hinte laggetanne hinte shoorota wodhite” yaagis.
EXO 32:28 Leeweti Musey kiitidaysada oothidi, he gallas heedzu mukulu gidiya asaa wodhidosona.
EXO 32:29 Musey Leewetako, “Hachi hinte, hinte naytanne hinte ishata wodhanaw kiitetidi hintena Godaas dummayideta. Goday hintena anjis” yaagis.
EXO 32:30 Wontetha gallas Musey asaako, “Hinte iita nagara oothideta; shin ha77i taani Godaako zuma bolla keyada, ooni eri hinte nagaras atotethi demmonna aggike” yaagis.
EXO 32:31 Yaatin Musey Godaako simmidi bidi, “Ha asay iita nagaraa oothidosona; enti bantaw worqafe xoosse medhidosona.
EXO 32:32 Shin hayyana, ha77i enta nagaraa atto yaaga. Hessi hanonnaba giiko, ne asaa ne xaafida mazgabiyape ta sunthaa qucha” yaagis.
EXO 32:33 Goday zaaridi Museko, “Taani ta mazgabiyape quchana asaa sunthay, ta bolla nagara oothidaysata sunthaa.
EXO 32:34 Ha77i bada, ha asaa taani new odida bessaa kaaletha. Ta kiitanchoyka nena kaalethanaysa akeeka, shin taani ha asaa enta nagara gisho seerana wodey yaanaysi attenna” yaagis.
EXO 32:35 Aaroni worqafe mara misiliya medhanaada oothiday asaa gidiya gisho, Goday asaa bolla wolqaama gado yeddis.
EXO 33:1 Hessafe guye, Goday Museko, “Neeninne ne Gibxefe kessida asay ha bessaafe dendidi, taani Abrahaames, Yisaaqas, Yayqoobasinne enta sheeshatas immana yaagada caaqida biitta biite.
EXO 33:2 Taani hinte sinthan kiitanchuwa kiittana. Kanaaneta, Amooreta, Hiteta, Parzeta, Hiwetanne Yaabuseta taani gooddada kessana.
EXO 33:3 Maathinne eessi goggiya he biitta biite. Shin hinte, wozani muumida asi gidiya gisho ta hintena ogen dhaysona mela hintera biike” yaagis.
EXO 33:4 Asay he yashshiya odaa si7idi yeekidosona. He wodepe doomidi ubbay banta alleequwa aathibokona.
EXO 33:5 Goday Museko, Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda yaagis; “Hinte wozana muume asi. Taani hintera hari attoshin guutha wodeska biiko, hinte taape dhayana. Ha77i hinte, hinte alleeqota kessite; taani hinte bolla oothanaba bessaana yaaga” yaagis.
EXO 33:6 He wode Isra7eeleti Koreeba zumaa aggidi bidaape guye, banta alleeqota aathibokona.
EXO 33:7 Isra7eele asay bishe siiratiya guta ubban Musey dunkaaniya gutaape haassidi tokees. He dunkaaney, “Godaara gahetiya Dunkaane” geetetidi xeegetis. Godaa oychanaw koyiya ubbay yaa bees.
EXO 33:8 Musey dunkaaniyako biya wode asa ubbay ba dunkaaniya pengen pengen eqidi, Musey yaa gelana gakanaw iya be7oosona.
EXO 33:9 Musey yaa gelidaape guye, shaara tuussay wodhidi Dunkaaniya pengen eqees. Goday shaara giddon gididi Musera odetees.
EXO 33:10 Asay shaara tuussa Dunkaaniya pengiyan be7ida wode ubban, ba pengen pengen gulbatidi Godaas goyinnoosona.
EXO 33:11 Asi ba laggera odeteysada Goday Musera som7on odetees. Hessafe guye, Musey gutaa simmees. Shin iya maaddiya na7atethay, Nawe na7aa Iyyasuy, Godaara gahetiya Dunkaaniyape shaaketenna.
EXO 33:12 Musey Godaako, “Neeni tana, ha asaa ta gida biitta kaaletha yaagadasa. Shin taara baana mela neeni kiittey ooneko, tana erisabaaka. Neeni, tana ereysanne tanan ufayteysa taw qoncisadasa.
EXO 33:13 Hessi tuma gidiko, ta nena haggaazana melanne guja ufaysana mela ne ogiya tana tamaarsa. Ha asay ne dere gideysa be7a” yaagis.
EXO 33:14 Goday zaaridi, “Taani, neera baana melanne new saro immana mela koyay?” yaagis.
EXO 33:15 Musey zaaridi, “Neeni nuura boonnaba gidiko, haysafe nuna kessofa.
EXO 33:16 Neeni nuura boonnaba gidiko, tananinne ne asan ne ufaytidaysa asa ubbay waatidi eranee? Biitta ubban de7iya hara asa ubbaafe taaninne ne asay dummatey ne nuura de7eysan gidenneyee?” yaagis.
EXO 33:17 Goday Museko, “Taani nena eriya gishonne nenan ufaytida gisho, ne tana oychidaysa ubbaa oothana” yaagis.
EXO 33:18 Musey Godaako, “Hayyana ne kumetha bonchuwa tana bessa?” yaagis.
EXO 33:19 Goday zaaridi, “Taani ta maarotanne ta lo77otetha ubbaa ne sinthara aathana. Ta geeshsha sunthaa ne matan awaajana. Taani Godaa; ta dooridaysata maarananne entaw qadhetana.
EXO 33:20 Shin oonika ta som7uwa be7idi paxa doonna gisho, neeni ta som7uwa be7aka” yaagis.
EXO 33:21 Shin, “Neeni zaalla bolla eqanaw haysan ta matan bessi de7ees.
EXO 33:22 Ta bonchoy aadhiya wode taani za77ida zaalla giddon nena wothana. Ta aadhana gakanaw ta kushiyan nena kammana.
EXO 33:23 Hessafe guye, taani ta kushiya denthana; neeni ta zokuwa be7ana, shin ta som7uwa be7aka” yaagis.
EXO 34:1 Goday Museko, “Koyroyisata daaniya nam7u loche shuchata massada giigisa. Taani he shuchata bolla kase neeni menthida shuchata bolla de7iya qaalata xaafana.
EXO 34:2 Wonto wonta guura taara gahetanaw Siina Zumaa huuphiya keya.
EXO 34:3 Neera oonika keyopo woyko zumaa bolla awunka bentofo. Hari attoshin dorsa woyko mehe wudey zumaa xaphon heemetofo woyko moopo” yaagis.
EXO 34:4 Hessa gisho, Musey koyro shuchata daaniya nam7u shuchata massidi, Goday kiitidaysada, shuchata oykidi wonta guura Siina zuma bola keyis.
EXO 34:5 Goday shaarara wodhidi, iyara yan eqidi, “Taani Godaa” yaagidi ba geeshsha sunthaa awaajis.
EXO 34:6 Goday Muse sinthara aadhishe haysada yaagidi awaajis; “Taani Xoossaa, ta sunthay Godaa. Taani, qadheynne maarotay kumida Xoossaa. Taani danda7aninne merina siiqon kumidaysanne daro ammantheysa.
EXO 34:7 Taani, ta asaas geliya qaala mukulu yeletethi gakanaw naageysanne iitatethaa, makallanne nagaraa atto geysa. Shin heedzanthonne oyddantho yeletethi gakanaw aawata nagara gisho nayta seeronna aggike” yaagis.
EXO 34:8 Musey ellesidi biittan gufannidi goyinnis.
EXO 34:9 I zaaridi, “Abeeti Godaw, neeni tanan ufaytiyaba gidiko, nuura issife yedha. Haysi asay si7onna asi; nu iitatethaanne nu nagaraa atto yaagada, nuna ne ase ootha” yaagis.
EXO 34:10 Goday Museko, “Taani Isra7eele asaara caaqana. Haysafe kase biitta bolla awunka hani eronna malaalsiyaba ne asaa sinthan oothana. Taani Goday, ay mela malaalsiyaba oothiyako, neeni enta giddon de7iya asay be7ana.
EXO 34:11 Hachi taani hintena kiittiya kiita naagite. Hinte sinthafe Amooreta, Kanaaneta, Hiteta, Parzeta, Hiwetanne Yaabuseta taani gooddana.
EXO 34:12 Enti hintew xihe gidonna mela hinte geliya biittan de7iya asaara caaqofite.
EXO 34:13 Enta yarsho bessata laallite; goyinno tuussata mentherethite. Asheera geetetiya macca xoosse misile tuussata qanxerethite.
EXO 34:14 Taani Goday, ta bonchuwa hara xoossatara koxonna Xoosse gidiya gisho, taape hara xoossatas goyinnofite.
EXO 34:15 He biittan de7iya asatara ayba caaqoka caaqofite. Enti banta xoossata goyinniya wodenne entaw yarshiya wode, enti hintena bantara issifana mela oychiko, hinte enti banta xoossatas yarshiya kathaa maanaw paacetidi, taw ammanetona ixana.
EXO 34:16 Qassi hinte enta macca naytape hinte adde naytas immiko, he wode he macca nayti banta xoossata goyinnidi, hinte adde naytika taw ammanetona ixidi, banta xoossata goyinnana mela oothana.
EXO 34:17 “Biratape qoxetidi, medhetida xoossata goyinnofite.
EXO 34:18 “Uythaa Ba7aale bonchite. Hinte Gibxefe keyday, Abiiba ageenan gidiya gisho, taani hintena kiitidaysada, he ageenan, laapun gallas gakanaw uythi miite.
EXO 34:19 “Bayra yeletiya adde na7i ubbaynne bayra yeletiya mehe adde ubbay tabaa.
EXO 34:20 Koyro yeletida hare mari dorsa marara laammada woza. Wozonna ixiko, iya morgiya mentha. Bayra yeletida adde na7a ubbaa woza. “Oonika immiyaba oykonna mela kushe ta sinthan shiiqopo.
EXO 34:21 “Usupun gallas oothite, shin laapuntha gallasan shempite. Zeriya wode gidin woyko kathaa cakiya wode laapuntha gallasan shempite.
EXO 34:22 “Koyro hinte gistiya cako doomiya wode, Katha Shiisho Ba7aale bonchite. Qassi laytha wursetha kathaa shiishiya wode, Shaqara Ba7aale bonchite.
EXO 34:23 Laythan heedzu toho Isra7eele adde ubbay medhetetha Godaa, Isra7eele Xoossaa goyinnanaw yo.
EXO 34:24 Kawotethata taani hinte sinthafe yedetha kessada hinte zawa aassana. Hinte tana goyinnanaw laythan heedzu toho yaa wode, oonika hinte biitta olidi ekanaw amottenna.
EXO 34:25 “Hinte taw mehe yarshiya wode, irsho yeggidi uukida uythara shishopitte. Paasika bonchiya gallasas yarshida yarshuwafe wontas aybaka ashshofite.
EXO 34:26 “Hinte gaden bayra kaxida kathaafe koyro ayfiya Godaa hinte Xoossaa keethi ehite. “Deesha mari iya aaye maathan doysopite” yaagis.
EXO 34:27 Goday Museko, “Taani neeranne Isra7eele asaara caaqo geley ha qaalatan gidiya gisho, ha qaalata xaafa” yaagis.
EXO 34:28 Musey moonnanne uyonna, oytamu gallasinne oytamu qamma Godaara zuma bolla gam7is. I, caaqo qaala gelida tammu kiitata loche shuchatan xaafis.
EXO 34:29 Musey Godaara odetishe gam7idi, tammu kiitata oykida nam7u loche shuchata ekidi Siina Zumaape wodhiya wode iya som7oy phoolees, shin I hessa eribeenna.
EXO 34:30 Aaroninne Isra7eele asa ubbay Muse xeellidi, iya som7oy phooleysa be7idi, iyako shiiqanaw yayyidosona.
EXO 34:31 Shin Musey enta xeegis. Aaroninne Isra7eele halaqati ubbay iyako shiiqin, I enta odisis.
EXO 34:32 Hessafe guye, Isra7eele asa ubbay iyako shiiqin, Goday iyaw Siina zuma bola immida kiita ubbaa I entaw immis.
EXO 34:33 Musey entara odeteysa wursida wode ba som7uwa laxanan kammis.
EXO 34:34 Shin Musey Godaa sinthe, iyara odetanaw geliya wode laxana ba som7uwafe qaarees. Yaape keyiya wode, Goday iya kiittidaba ubbaa Isra7eele asaas odees.
EXO 34:35 He ubban enti iya som7oy phooleysa be7oosona. Hessa gisho, Musey Godaara odetanaw baana gakanaw, ba som7uwa laxanan kammees.
EXO 35:1 Musey Isra7eele asaa ubbaa xeegidi, “Hinte oothana mela Goday kiittidabay haysa;
EXO 35:2 Saaminta giddon usupun gallasa xalaalan ooso oothite; shin laapuntha gallasay hintew geeshsha gallas; Godaaska dummatida shempo Sambaata. He gallasan ooso oothiya oonika hayqanaw bessees.
EXO 35:3 Sambaata gallas hinte son tama eethofite” yaagis.
EXO 35:4 Musey Isra7eele asaako, “Goday haysada yaagidi hintena kiittis;
EXO 35:5 Godaas hinte wozanay immo giyaba immanaw ehite. Hinte immanaw ehiyabati worqaa, bira, naase birata,
EXO 35:6 kaalose qacina, ocha teera daaniya qacina, zo7o qacinanne al7o liino, deesha ikise,
EXO 35:7 zo7o qalamen yeggi kessida dorsa ite, lo77o do7a ite, soqala mithi,
EXO 35:8 xompes shamaho zayte, shuumatetha zayte, iyan yegetiya sawuwanne ixaane sawo,
EXO 35:9 efuudiyasinne tiran ma7etiya ma7uwas haniya margide geetetiya shuchaanne hara alleeqota eho.
EXO 35:10 “Hinte giddon de7iya kushe hiillancho ubbay yidi, Goday kiitidaysa ubbaa ootho.
EXO 35:11 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya, iya gaatha kamaanne kare kamaa, kaqota, tuuqeta, liyoota, tuussatanne enti eqiya tohota;
EXO 35:12 Taabotiyanne iya tookiya kaso mithata, nagara atotetha kamaanne Taabotiya genthiya magarajuwa;
EXO 35:13 xarpheezaa, iya tookiya kaso mithatanne, iya miisheta ubbaanne Godaa sinthan wothiya geeshsha uythaa;
EXO 35:14 xompe wothiya kocaa, iya miisheta, xompiyanne xompe zaytiya;
EXO 35:15 ixaane cuyisiya xarpheezanne iya tookiya kasota, shuumatetha zaytiyanne sawiya ixaane, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya penge magarajuwa;
EXO 35:16 xuussa yarsho bessinne iya naase birata zarzariya, iya tookiya kasotanne iya miisheta ubbaa, naase biratape oosetida meecha keriyanne iya tohuwa;
EXO 35:17 dabaaba godaa gesheta, tuussatanne enta tohota, dabaaba penge magarajuwa,
EXO 35:18 Geeshsha Dunkaaniyanne dabaaba dunkaaniya tole dhishetanne enta wodorota;
EXO 35:19 Aaroninne iya nayti Geeshsha bessan haggaazishe ma7anaw alleeqetidi oosetida boncho ma7ota ootho” yaagis.
EXO 35:20 Hessafe guye, Isra7eele asa ubbay Muse sinthafe keyidosona.
EXO 35:21 Asa ubbay ba wozanan immo immo gidaba Geeshsha Dunkaaniyas, iya giddon oosetiya ooso ubbaasinne boncho kahine ma7otas koshshiyaba ubbaa ehidosona.
EXO 35:22 Immanaw koyida macci adde ubbay worqa alleeqota, siidhe worqata, migidota, qoodhe worqa ehidi, Godaas imo oothidi immidosona.
EXO 35:23 Kaalose qacina, ocha teera daaniya qacina, zo7o qacina, al7o liino, woyko deesha ikise, woyko zo7o qalamen yeggi kessida dorsa ite woyko, lo77o do7a itey de7iya asi ubbay ehis.
EXO 35:24 Bira woyko naase birata immanaw danda7iya ubbay banta imota Godaas immidosona. Qassi soqala mithi de7iya asi ubbay dumma dumma oosuwas ehis.
EXO 35:25 Kushe hiilla maccasa ubbay banta kushen suqida kaalose qacina, ocha teera daaniya qacina, zo7o qacinanne al7o liino ehidosona.
EXO 35:26 Qassika imota immanaw koyida maccasa ubbay deesha itepe dooqetida wodoro ehidosona.
EXO 35:27 Halaqati efuudiyasinne tiran ma7etiya ma7uwas haniya margidenne hara lo77o shuchata,
EXO 35:28 qassika enti ixaanen, shuumatethasinne xompes maaddiya shamaho zayten yegetiya sawo ehidosona.
EXO 35:29 Isra7eele asa ubbay, oothana mela Goday Muse baggara kiitida oosuwas haniya imotata ubbaa banta dosan Godaas ehidosona.
EXO 35:30 Musey Isra7eele asaako haysada yaagis; “Goday Yihuda sheeshape gidida Huura na7aa na7aa, Ure na7aa, Basili7eela dooris.
EXO 35:31 Goday iya ba Ayyaanan, hiillan, akeekaninne ooso ubbaa oothiya eran kunthis.
EXO 35:32 Hessika, hiillan oothana oosota halchidi worqafe, birapenne naase biratape dumma dummaba kessidi oothanaasa.
EXO 35:33 Hessadaka, al7o shuchu massidi giigiso, mithi masethinne hara ooso ubbaa oothana mela cincatethi immis.
EXO 35:34 Qassi iyasinne Daane sheeshi gidida Ahisamaaka na7aa Eliyaabas, banta hiilla harata tamaarsana mela eratethi immis
EXO 35:35 Enti dumma dumma ooso oothana mela ooso halcho kessana mela, kaalosen, ocha teera daaneysaninne zo7o suufe qacinan al7o liino alleeqisidi, daddiya hiillatethi immis. Goday enta, eratethan kunthis. Enti ubbay dumma dumma ooson luxida hiillancho gididosona.
EXO 36:1 “Hessa gisho, Basili7eeli, Eliyaabinne Geeshsha Dunkaaniya keexana mela Goday hiillanne eratethi immida asa ubbay, Goday kiitidaysada ubbaba oothana” yaagis.
EXO 36:2 Musey Basili7eela, Eliyaaba, Goday dumma eratethi immidaysatanne ooso oothanaw koyiya ubbaa xeegidi, oosuwa doomana mela kiittis.
EXO 36:3 Enti, Isra7eele asay Geeshsha Dunkaaniya oothanaw ehida imo ubbaa Muse kushepe ekidosona. Qassi asay ba dosan immiya imota wonta wonta ehuwa aggibokona.
EXO 36:4 Yaatin, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya oothiya hiillanchoti banta oosuwa essidi, museko bidi,
EXO 36:5 “Asay, Goday kiitida oosuwas koshsheysafe aathidi eho bolla de7oosona” yaagidosona.
EXO 36:6 Musey, “Geeshsha Dunkaaniya keexanaw oonika immiyaba ehopo” yaagidi kiittin, asay eheysa aggaagidosona.
EXO 36:7 Enti ehida imotay ooso ubbaa oothi polanaw gididi palahees.
EXO 36:8 Oosuwa ootheysatape hiillan aadheysati Geeshsha Dunkaaniya oothidosona. Enti iya al7o liinope, kaalosen ocha teera daaneysaninne zo7o qacinan alleeqisidi daddida tammu gesheta giigisidi, iya bolla kiruubeta misiliya sikidosona.
EXO 36:9 Magarajoti ubbay issi gina gididi, adussatethay laatamanne oyddu wadha, gompay oyddu wadha.
EXO 36:10 Ichashu gesheta issife gathidi sikidosona; qassi hanko attida ichashu geshetaka hessada oothidosona.
EXO 36:11 Issife gathidi sikida geshetape issi magarajuwas wursetha gaxan kaalose afilape oosetida sagaayota medhidosona. Qassi issife gathidi sikida hanko geshetape issuwa gaxanka hessada oothidosona.
EXO 36:12 Enti issife siketida koyro magarajuwa bolla koyro maaran kaalose afilape oosetida ishatamu sagaayota, hessadaka nam7antho magarajuwa bolla wursetha maaran, hanko sagaayota ginan, ishatamu sagaayota oothidosona.
EXO 36:13 Enti nam7u baggan de7iya gesheta gasethidi issino oothanaw worqafe ishatamu oykiya bessata medhidosona.
EXO 36:14 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya bollara kammanaw tammanne issi gesheta deesha ikisepe daddidosona.
EXO 36:15 Tammanne issi gesheta adussatethaa laatamanne usupun wadha, gompaa oyddu wadha oothidi medhidosona.
EXO 36:16 Ichashu gesheta issi baggara, qassi usupun gesheta hanko baggara gathidi sikidosona.
EXO 36:17 Woli gathidi sikida geshetape wursetha magarajuwa macaran ishatamu sagaayota, qassi woli gathidi sikida hanko geshetape wursetha magarajuwa macaran ishatamu sagaayota medhidosona.
EXO 36:18 Nam7u baggara de7iya gesheta gasethidi issi kama oothanaw naase biratape ishatamu oykiya bessata medhidosona.
EXO 36:19 Dunkaaniya kammanaw zo7o qalamen yeggi kessida dorsa ite, qassi iya bollara kammanaw lo77o do7a ite giigisidosona.
EXO 36:20 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya tuuqeta soqala mithafe kessidosona.
EXO 36:21 Issi issi tuuqiya adussatethay tammu wadha, gompay issi wadhanne takadho.
EXO 36:22 Issi tuuqiya issuwara gasethanaw nam7u luhoti de7oosona. Geeshsha Dunkaaniya tuuqeta ubbaa hessada oothidosona.
EXO 36:23 Geeshsha Dunkaaniyas dugeha baggara laatamu tuuqeta medhidosona.
EXO 36:24 Issi issi tuuqetas nam7u toho medhidi, he tohota oythanaw oytamu luhota biratape giigisidosona.
EXO 36:25 Geeshsha Dunkaaniyas pudeha baggara laatamu tuuqeta medhidosona.
EXO 36:26 Issi issi tuuqetas nam7u toho medhidi, he tohota oythanaw oytamu luhota biratape giigisidosona.
EXO 36:27 Geeshsha Dunkaaniyas guye baggan, wuloha baggara usupun tuuqeta medhidosona.
EXO 36:28 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya guye baggan de7iya maazanetas nam7u tuuqeta giigisidosona.
EXO 36:29 He nam7u maazane tuuqeti xaphope xeera gakanaw oyketi bidosona. Nam7u maazaniyan de7iya nam7u tuuqeti hessada hanidi oosetidosona.
EXO 36:30 Hessa gisho, issi issi tuuqiyas garsan nam7u nam7u tohoti de7oosona. Hospun tuuqetas biratape oosetida tammanne usupun tohoti de7oosona.
EXO 36:31 Qassi enti soqala mithafe tammanne ichashu liyoota kessidosona. Ichashu liyooti Geeshsha Dunkaaniya issi bagga miyen,
EXO 36:32 qassi ichashu liyoota hanko bagga miyen, hessadaka ichashu liyoota guye baggara wuloha baggan wothidosona.
EXO 36:33 Tuuqetas miye baggara giddon de7iya liyoy, ha gaxape ya gaxa gakanaw kanthi keyana mela oothidosona.
EXO 36:34 Tuuqetanne liyoota worqan lanxidosona. Liyooti enta giddora kanthi aadhana mela worqa sagaayota tuuqetara oysethidosona.
EXO 36:35 Magarajuwa al7o liinope kaalosen, ocha teera daaneysaninne, zo7o qacinan alleeqisidi oothidosona. He magarajuwa bolla kiruube misileta sikidosona.
EXO 36:36 Magarajuwa kaqanaw oyddu tuussata soqala mithafe giigisidi, worqan lanxidosona. Yaatidi worqa sagaayota entas giigisidosona. Qassi tuussata essiya oyddu tohota bira biratape medhidosona.
EXO 36:37 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengiyas al7o liinope kaalosen, ocha teera daaneysafenne zo7o qacinan alleeqisid magarajo giigisidosona.
EXO 36:38 Qassi iyaw kocati de7iya ichashu tuussata medhidi, entaw xeeranne tohuwa worqan lanxidosona. Tuussatas naase biratappe oosetidi ichashu tohota giigisidosona.
EXO 37:1 Basili7eeli Taabotiya soqala mithafe giigisis. Taabotiya adussatethay nam7u wadhanne bagga, gompaynne geesay issi wadhanne bagga.
EXO 37:2 Taabotiya giigisidi, gaathaanne kariya walahi bayna worqan lanxis. Iya yuushuwa bollaka worqan lanxis.
EXO 37:3 Oyddu worqa sagaayota Taabotiyas oyddu gedata bolla, issi baggara nam7u sagaayota, qassi hanko baggara nam7u sagaayota aathis.
EXO 37:4 Yaatidi soqala mithafe oosetida kasota kessidi enta worqan lanxis.
EXO 37:5 Taabotiya tookanaw, Taabotiyas miyiyan de7iya sagaayotan kasota aathis.
EXO 37:6 Walahi bayna worqafe, adussatethay nam7u wadhanne bagga, gompay issi wadhanne bagga gidida nagara atotetha kamaa oothis.
EXO 37:7 Qefey de7iya nam7u kiruubeta qoxetida worqafe oothidi,
EXO 37:8 issi kiruubiya issi baggan, hanko kiruubiya hanko baggan wothidi, atotetha kamuwara issino oothidi medhis.
EXO 37:9 Kiruubeti banta qefiya miccidi, atotetha kamuwa kammidi, issoy issuwa xeelloosona.
EXO 37:10 Adussatethay nam7u wadha, gompay issi wadha, geesay issi wadhanne bagga gidida xarpheezaa soqala mithafe medhis.
EXO 37:11 Walahi bayna worqan iya lanxidi, yuushuwaka worqan lanxis.
EXO 37:12 Hessadaka, gompay takadho gidiya goosse oothidi, iya worqan yuushshi aathidi lanxis.
EXO 37:13 Taabotiya tookanaw maaddiya oyddu worqa sagaayota medhidi, oyddu gedata oyddu maazaneta bolla wothis.
EXO 37:14 Xarpheeza tookanaw kasota aathiya sagaayoti xarpheezaa goossa matan oosetidosona.
