EXO 37:15 Xarpheezaa tookiya kaso mithata soqala mithafe kessidi, worqan lanxis.
EXO 37:16 Hessadaka, xarpheezaa bolla wothiya dumma dumma miisheta walahi bayna worqafe medhis. Hessatika saaneta, cilpata, kereta, woyne yarshsho tigiya xuu7ata.
EXO 37:17 Hessafe guye, Basili7eeli xompe wothiya kocaa walahi bayna worqafe oothis. Kocaa essiya tohuwanne tooma qoxetida worqafe giigisis. Alleeqos oosetiya, iya gambuthata, iya wallaxatanne iya ciishshata ubbaa iyara issife oythidi medhis.
EXO 37:18 Issi baggara heedzu tasheti, qassi hanko baggara heedzu tasheti de7iya usupun tasheta iya miyiyan medhis.
EXO 37:19 Usupun tashetas xeeran xeeran heedzu heedzu alleeqo gambuthatinne ciishshati de7iya lawuze mitha ciishshe daaniyaba medhis.
EXO 37:20 Xompe wothiya kocaa giddon de7iya tooma xeeran oyddu alleeqo gambuthatinne ciishshati de7iya lawuze mitha ciishshe daaniyaba medhis.
EXO 37:21 Waathan de7iya heedzu heedzu tashetape garsan issi issi gambuthi oosetis.
EXO 37:22 Gambuthati, tashetinne xompe wothiya kocay issino gididi, walahi bayna worqafe qoxetidi oosetidosona.
EXO 37:23 Xompe wothiya kocaas laapun xompeta, xompe toysiya qaphetanne enta wothiyabata walahi bayna worqafe oothis.
EXO 37:24 Xompe wothiya kocaanne iyaw go7etiya miishe ubbaa oothanaw hastamanne ichashu kilo giraame gidiya, walahi bayna worqa ongis.
EXO 37:25 Basili7eeli ixaane cuyisiya xarpheeza soqala mithafe giigisis. Iyaw oyddu maazaney de7ees. He xarpheezas adussatethaynne gompay issi wadha; qassi geesay nam7u wadha. Oyddu maazaniyan de7iya kaceti iyara issino gidi oyketidi oosetidosona.
EXO 37:26 Iyaw bolla bagga, oyddu miyanne kaceta walahi bayna worqan lanxis, iya yuushuwaka worqan lanxidi yuushshi aathis.
EXO 37:27 Iyaw gaxa bolla tookanaw maaddiya nam7u worqa sagaayota medhidi, nam7u bagga miyiyan wothis. Enti ixaane xarpheezaa tookiya wode kaso mithata aathanaw maaddeyisata.
EXO 37:28 Kaso mithata soqala mithafe kessidi, worqan lanxis.
EXO 37:29 Geeshsha shuumatetha zaytiyanne sawiya lo77o ixaane shittoda walakidi oothis.
EXO 38:1 Soqala mithafe xuussa yarsho bessi oothis. He yarsho bessa adussatethaynne gompay, ichashu ichashu wadha, qassi geesay nam7u wadhanne takadho. Iyaw oyddu maazaney de7ees.
EXO 38:2 Oyddu maazanetara oyketidi oosetida kaceta medhis. Yaatidi, he yarsho bessa naase biratan lanxis.
EXO 38:3 He yarsho bessan go7etiya miisheta, disteta, baldeta, akaafata, ashuwa qaphiya qaphetanne tama cooceta ubbaa naase biratape medhis.
EXO 38:4 Naase biratape gite daaniya teqe yarsho bessaas giigisidi, yarsho bessaas giddo zawa yuushshi aathidi wothis.
EXO 38:5 Tookanaw maaddiya kasota aathanaw, oyddu sagaayota medhidi, oyddu maazaneta bolla wothis.
EXO 38:6 Soqala mithafe yarsho bessa tookiya kaso mithata kessidi, naase biratan lanxis.
EXO 38:7 Ha kasota nam7u miyen de7iya sagaayotan aathis. Yarsho bessaa xawulape giigisidi, gidduwa kaysi oothis.
EXO 38:8 Naase biratape meecha kerenne iya wothiya toho medhis. He naase biratay, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen oothiya maccasati ehida mastootiyape eketis.
EXO 38:9 Geeshsha Dunkaaniyas dabaaba baggaa gechanaw al7o liinope magarajo oothis. Dugeha bagga geshetas adussatethay xeetu wadha.
EXO 38:10 Geshetas kate gidana mela laatamu tuussatanne enti eqiya tohota naase biratape oothis. Enta xam7atanne kaceta bira biratape oothis.
EXO 38:11 Pudeha bagga dabaabayka hessada hanidi oosetis.
EXO 38:12 Wuloha bagga gesheta adussatethay ishatamu wadha. Entaw tammu tuussatinne tuussati eqiya tammu tohoti de7oosona. Tuussatas bira biratape oosetida xam7atinne kaceti de7oosona.
EXO 38:13 Dabaaba geliya pengey de7iya, doloha bagga magarajuwa gompay ishatamu wadha.
EXO 38:14 Issi baggara de7iya magarajuwa adussatethay tammanne ichashu wadha. Iyaw heedzu tuussatinne tuussati eqiya tohoti de7oosona.
EXO 38:15 Hanko baggara de7iya magarajuwa adussatethay tammanne ichashu wadha. Iyaw heedzu tuussatinne tuussati eqiya tohoti de7oosona.
EXO 38:16 Dabaaba yuushuwan de7iya gesheti ubbay al7o liinope oosetidosona.
EXO 38:17 Tuussati eqiya tohoti naase biratape oosetidosona. Xam7ati, kacetinne tuussata xeera goossati bira biratape oosetidosona. Dabaaba yuushuwan de7iya tuussati ubbay bira xam7atan oyketidosona.
EXO 38:18 Dabaaba pengiyan de7iya magarajuwa al7o liinope oothidi, kaalosen ocha teera daaneysaninne zo7o qacinan daddidi alleeqisis. Iyaw hanko dabaaba geshetada adussatethay laatamu wadha; qassi geesay ichashu wadha.
EXO 38:19 Iya, oyddu tohoti de7iya oyddu tuussata bolla kaqis. Kaceti, xaara kammeysatinne xam7ati bira biratape oosetidosona.
EXO 38:20 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya dhishetinne iya yuushuwan de7iya gesheta dhisheti ubbay naase biratape oosetidosona.
EXO 38:21 Tammu kiitata oykida nam7u loche shuchati de7iya bessan, Geeshsha Dunkaaniyan, go7etiya miisheta mazgabey haysa. He miisheta mazgabana mela kahiniya Aarona na7a Itamaara aawatetha garsan de7iya Leeweta Musey kiittis.
EXO 38:22 Yihuda sheeshape gidida Huura na7aa na7aa, Ure na7aa, Basili7eeli, Goday kiitidaysada ubbaba oothis.
EXO 38:23 Daane sheeshape gidida Ahisamaaka na7aa Eliyaabi, kushe hiillanchoy, oothiyabas koyro halcho kessiya asi; I, kaalose, ocha teera daaneysanne zo7o qacinan al7o liino daddidi alleeqisiya asi.
EXO 38:24 Geeshsha dunkaaniya oosuwas hanana mela Godaas imetida worqay geeshsha dunkaanen eretida mizaanen issi mukulu kilo giraame gidis.
EXO 38:25 Taybon de7iya asaape eketida biray geeshsha dunkaanen eretida mizaanen, heedzu mukulunne oyddu xeetanne hastamu kilo giraame gidis.
EXO 38:26 Hessika, taybon gelida adde asay, issoy issoy geeshsha dunkaanen eretida mizaaniya liken koyetiya ubbaa immidosona. Laatamu laythinne iyape bolla gidida, mazgaben gelida, adde asaa tayboy usupun xeetanne heedzu mukulunne ichashu xeetanne ishatama.
EXO 38:27 Geeshsha Dunkaaniyanne magarajota essanaw maaddiya xeetu tohota oothanaw 3,400 kilo giraame bira birata ekidosona. Hessika, issi issi tohoy hastamanne oyddu kilo giraame bira birata ekis.
EXO 38:28 Basili7eeli, attida hastamu kilo giraame bira biratan xam7ata, kacetanne tuussatas xeera goossata oothis.
EXO 38:29 Asay Godaas immida naase biratay 2,425 kilo giraame.
EXO 38:30 He naase biratan Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengiya essiya tohota, gite daaniyabara naase birata yarsho bessaanne iya giddon go7etiya dumma dumma miisheta medhis.
EXO 38:31 Qassi dabaaba yuushuwan de7iya dirsaa tohotinne pengiya bolla eqida tohoti, Geeshsha Dunkaaneynne iya yuushuwan de7iya dabaaba dirsaa dhisheti ubbay he naase biratape oosetidosona.
EXO 39:1 Kahineti Geeshsha Dunkaaniyan oothiya wode ma7ana boncho ma7ota, kaalosen, ocha teera daaniya qacinapenne zo7o qacinan daddidosona. Aaroni ma7iya kahinetetha ma7uwa Goday Muse kiitidaysada oothidosona.
EXO 39:2 Qassi efuudiya, worqafe, kaalosepe, ocha teera daaniya qacinape, zo7o qacinapenne al7o liinope daddidosona.
EXO 39:3 Enti worqaa qoxidi, lee7isidi, iya qaraaridi, qacinada kessidosona. Yaatidi kaalosen, ocha teera daaneysan, zo7o qacinaninne al7o liinon alleeqisidi daddidosona.
EXO 39:4 Enti nam7u hashiyara wodhidi, nam7u bagga woli gathidi oysethanaw maaddiya qangota efuudiyas oothidosona.
EXO 39:5 Goday Muse kiitidaysada, hiillanchoy alleeqisida dancoyka efuudey oosetidaysatape oosetidi, worqan, kaalosen, ocha teera daaneysan, zo7o qacinaninne al7o liinon dadetis.
EXO 39:6 Enti margide geetetiya shuchata giigisidi, worqafe oosetida kaquwa bolla wothidosona. Maatame bolla woocidi xaafeysada, he shuchata bolla Isra7eele nayta sunthaa woocidi xaafidosona.
EXO 39:7 Goday Muse kiitidaysada, tammanne nam7u Isra7eele nayta qofisiyaba gidana mela enta, efuudiya qangotan wothidosona.
EXO 39:8 Enti, tiran ma7etiya ma7uwa efuudey oosetidaysatape oothidi, efuudiyada alleeqisidosona.
EXO 39:9 Iyaw oyddu maazaneti de7oosona; geesaynne gompay issi issi takadho gididi, dakoyetees.
EXO 39:10 Iya bolla oyddu maaran inqo geetetiya al7o shuchata wothidosona. Koyro maaran sardiyoone, toophazenne phooliya al7o shuchata;
EXO 39:11 nam7antho maaran baluure, sanparenne almaaze geetetiya al7o shuchata;
EXO 39:12 heedzantho maaran yaakinte, kelqedoonenne ametesxinoosa geetetiya al7o shuchata;
EXO 39:13 oyddantho maaran birille, margidenne yasphide geetetiya al7o shuchata wothidosona. Hessata ubbaa worqafe oosetida kaquwa bolla wothidosona.
EXO 39:14 Tammanne nam7u shuchata bolla issi issi Isra7eele nayta sunthay woocetidi xaafetis.
EXO 39:15 Tiran ma7etiya ma7uwas walahi bayna worqafe wodoroda dooqada santhalaata ootha.
EXO 39:16 Nam7u worqa kaqotanne nam7u worqa sagaayota medhidi, nam7u worqa sagaayota tiran ma7etiya ma7uwas qommo baggan de7iya maazanetara gathidi oysethidosona.
EXO 39:17 He nam7u worqa santhalaatata nam7u worqa sagaayotara gathidi oysethidosona.
EXO 39:18 He santhalaatata, hanko bagga xeeraa, nam7u kaqotara gasethidosona. Yaatidi, efuudiyas sintha baggara, hashiyara wodhiya qangotara gathidi qachidosona.
EXO 39:19 Qassi nam7u worqa sagaayota medhidi, efuudiyas sintha baggara de7iya tiran ma7etiya ma7uwas, gaatha baggara de7iya nam7u maazaneta xeeran aathidosona.
EXO 39:20 Hessadaka, worqafe hara nam7u migiddota oothada, efuudiyas sintha bagga hashiyara wodhiya qanguwas garsa baggara, sikuwa matan dancuwaafe qommo baggara oysethidosona.
EXO 39:21 Goday Muse kiitidaysada, tiran ma7etiya ma7uwa bolla de7iya migiddota efuudiyan de7iya migiddotara gathidi, kaalose qacina qachidosona. Tiran ma7etiya ma7oy xeessafe qommon pee7iya gisho qashoy dol7enna.
EXO 39:22 Efuudiyape bollara ma7etiya adussa ma7oy kumethi kaalose afilape giigisidosona.
EXO 39:23 He adussa ma7uwas huuphe aathiya luho medhidi, peedhetonna mela guye qalam7idi, yuushshi aathidi sikidosona.
EXO 39:24 Adussa ma7uwas duge bagga macara yuushuwan kaalosen, ocha teera daaniya zo7o qacinaninne al7o liinon, oromaane teera misileta medhidosona.
EXO 39:25 Enti walahi bayna worqafe daalata medhidi, adussa ma7uwas duge bagga gaxan, oromaane misileta giddon wothidosona.
EXO 39:26 Goday Muse kiitidaysada, oromaane teera misileta, adussa ma7uwas duge bagga macaraa yuushuwan aathidosona.
EXO 39:27 Enti, Goday Muse kiitidaysada, Aaronasinne iya naytas, shamizeta,
EXO 39:28 huuphe qaceta, uketanne gaatha sureta al7o liinope daddidi giigisidosona.
EXO 39:29 Qassi dancuwa kaalosen, ocha teera daaniya qacinan, zo7o qacinaninne al7o liinon alleeqisidi, giigisidosona.
EXO 39:30 Enti, geeshsha kallacha misiliya walahi bayna worqafe medhidi, iya bolla, “Godaas Dummatis” giya qaala woocidi xaafidosona.
EXO 39:31 Yaatidi, Goday Muse kiitidaysada, huuphe qaciya bolla kaalose qacinara qachidosona.
EXO 39:32 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya ooso ubbay kumethi poletis. Isra7eele asay, Goday Muse kiitidaysada oothidosona.
EXO 39:33 Hessafe guye, enti Geeshsha Dunkaaniyanne iya miisheta Museko ehidosona. Hessatika, kaceta, tuussata, liyoota, tuuqetanne enti eqiya tohota.
EXO 39:34 Bolla kamaas, zo7o qalamen yeggidi kessida dorsa ite, haashetida do7a ite, magarajuwa,
EXO 39:35 Tammu kiitata oykida Taabotiya, iya tookiya kaso mithatanne nagara atotetha kamaa,
EXO 39:36 xarpheezanne iya miisheta ubbaa, Godaa sinthan de7iya geeshsha daabbuwa,
EXO 39:37 walahi bayna worqafe oosetida xompe wothiya kocaa, iya bolla de7iya xompeta, iya miisheta ubbaanne xompe zayte,
EXO 39:38 worqafe oosetida yarsho bessi, shuumatetha zayte, sawiya ixaane, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya penge magarajuwa,
EXO 39:39 naase biratape oosetida yarsho bessi, naase birata teqiya, tooho kaso mithatanne iya miisheta ubbaa, meecha kerenne iya wotheysa,
EXO 39:40 dabaaba geliya penge magarajuwa, tuussatanne, enti eqiya tohota, dabaaba magarajuwa, tole wodorota, dhisheta, Geeshsha Dunkaaniyan go7etiya miisheta ubbaa,
EXO 39:41 kahineti Geeshsha bessan ma7iya boncho ma7ota, Aaroninne iya nayti ma7iya kahinetetha ma7ota.
EXO 39:42 Isra7eele asay ooso ubbaa, Goday Muse kiitidaysada oothidosona.
EXO 39:43 Asay, ooso ubbaa, Goday kiitidaysada oothidaysa Musey be7is. Hessa gisho, Musey enta anjis.
EXO 40:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
EXO 40:2 “Koyro ageenan, koyro gallasan, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya toka.
EXO 40:3 Tammu kiitata oykida Caaqo Taabotiya iya giddon wothada, iya sinthan magarajuwa kaqa.
EXO 40:4 Xarpheezaa gaathi gelsada, koshshiya miisheta ubbaa iya bolla wotha. Xompe wothiya kocaa gelsada iya bolla xompeta wotha.
EXO 40:5 Ixaane cuyisiya worqa xarpheezaa Caaqo Taabotiya sinthan wotha. Geeshsha Dunkaaniya penge magarajuwa kaqa.
EXO 40:6 Xuugetiya yarsho bessi Geeshsha Dunkaaniya sinthan wotha.
EXO 40:7 Meecha keriya Geeshsha Dunkaaniyapenne yarsho bessaafe giddon wothada, iyan haathe kuntha.
EXO 40:8 Geeshsha Dunkaaniyape karera dabaaba yuushsha aatha giigisada, magarajuwa Dunkaaniya penge bolla kaqa.
EXO 40:9 “Yaatada, geeshsha zaytiya ekada, Geeshsha Dunkaaniyanne iya giddon de7iya ubbaba tiyada, dummaya; I geeshshi gidana.
EXO 40:10 Kaallada, xuussa yarsho bessinne iyan go7etiya miishe ubbaa tiyada, dummaya; I polo geeshshi gidana.
EXO 40:11 Meecha keriyanne iya wothiya miisheta tiyada, dummaya.
EXO 40:12 “Aaronanne iya nayta Geeshsha Dunkaaniya penge ehada haathan enta meecca.
EXO 40:13 Kahine ma7uwa Aarona mayzada, I taw kahinetethan oothana mela iya tiyada, dummaya.
EXO 40:14 Iya adde naytaka ehada shamize mayza.
EXO 40:15 Enti taw kahinetethan oothana mela, enta aaway tiyetidaysada, entaka tiya. He tishsha gaason, yaana laytha ubban, enti taw kahine gididi oothana” yaagis.
EXO 40:16 Musey, ubbaba Goday kiitidaysada oothis.
EXO 40:17 Hessa gisho, enti Gibxefe keyida nam7antho laythan, koyro ageenan, koyro gallasan Geeshsha Dunkaaniya tokis.
EXO 40:18 Musey, Dunkaaniya tohota essis, tuuqeta, liyootanne tuussata aathis.
EXO 40:19 Goday kiitidaysada, Musey, garsa kamaanne bolla kamaa Dunkaaniya bolla kammis.
EXO 40:20 Yaatidi, tammu kiitata oykida nam7u loche shuchata, Taabotiya giddon wothis. Tooho kaso mithata Taabotiya sagaayotan aathis; nagara atotetha kamaka Taabotiya bolla wothis.
EXO 40:21 Taabotiya Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddo gelsidi, geshe magarajuwa kaqis. Yaatidi, Goday kiitidaysada, Caaqo Taabotiya kammis.
EXO 40:22 Musey, xarpheezaa Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddo gelsidi, magarajuwafe karera, pudeha baggan wothis.
EXO 40:23 Goday kiitidaysada, Godaa sinthan wothiya geeshsha daabbuwa iya bolla wothis.
EXO 40:24 Xompe wothiya kocaa, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddo gelsidi, xarpheezape sintha baggara Geeshsha Dunkaaniyas dugeha baggan wothis.
EXO 40:25 Goday kiitidaysada, Musey, Godaa sinthan xompeta oythis.
EXO 40:26 Musey, worqa yarsho bessa Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddo gelsidi, magarajuwafe sintha baggara wothis.
EXO 40:27 Goday kiitidaysada, sawiya ixaane iya bolla cuyisis.
EXO 40:28 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen magarajuwa kaqis.
EXO 40:29 Xuugetiya yarsho bessi, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya penge sinthan wothis. Goday kiitidaysada, iya bolla xuussa yarshonne katha yarsho yarshis.
EXO 40:30 Meecha keriya Geeshsha Dunkaaniyapenne yarsho bessaafe giddon wothidi, iyan haathe kunthis.
EXO 40:31 Musey, Aaroninne iya nayti banta kushiyanne tohuwa iyan meecetidosona.
EXO 40:32 Goday kiitidaysada, enti Geeshsha Dunkaaniya geliya wode woyko yarsho bessi shiiqiya wode hessa oothosona.
EXO 40:33 Geeshsha Dunkaaniyanne yarsho bessa yuushshi aathidi dabaaba giigisidi, he dabaaba pengen magarajo kaqis. Hessada oothidi, Musey oosuwa polis.
EXO 40:34 Hessafe guye, shaaray Geeshsha Dunkaaniya kammis; Godaa bonchoyka iya kumis.
EXO 40:35 Shaaray Geeshsha Dunkaaniya kammida gishonne Godaa bonchoy iyan kumida gisho, Musey iya giddo gelanaw danda7ibeenna.
EXO 40:36 Isra7eeleti banta de7iya bessaa yeddidi, baanaw dendey, he shaaray Dunkaaniyape dendiya wodena.
EXO 40:37 Shin shaaray dendonna ixiko, enti banta de7iya bessaa yeddidi bookona.
EXO 40:38 Godaa shaaray gallas gallas Geeshsha Dunkaaniya kammees, qamma qamma qassi shaara giddon tamay eexees. Isra7eele asay biya wode ubban he shaara be7oosona.
LEV 1:1 Godaa Xoossay, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon gididi Muse xeegidi yaagis;
LEV 1:2 Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; hintefe oonika Godaas yarsho yarshiya wode ba mehiyape, ba dorsafenne ba deeshape eho.
LEV 1:3 He yarshoy mehepe xuussa yarshos gidiko borey bayna wofaano gido. Goday he yarshuwa ekana mela Geeshsha Dunkaaniya geliya pengen yarsho.
LEV 1:4 Yarshuwa yarshiya uray xuussa yarshos ehida mehiya huuphen ba kushiya wotho. Hessi iya nagara atotethas Goday ekida yarsho gidana.
LEV 1:5 I he wofaanuwa Godaa sinthan shuko; kahineti, Aarona nayti he suuthaa ekidi, Geeshsha Dunkaane geliya pengen de7iya yarsho bessa oyddu maazaneta bolla wurxo.
LEV 1:6 He mehiya galbaa qaaridi, ashuwa qommon qommon kesso.
LEV 1:7 Kahiniya Aarona nayti yarsho bessan mithi wothidi tama eetho.
LEV 1:8 Kahineti, Aarona nayti he kessida ashuwa bolla huuphiyanne modhuwa gujidi, yarsho bessan taman de7iya mithaa bolla maarayidi wotho.
LEV 1:9 Shin he uray ulo ashuwanne gedata haathan meecco. Kahiney he ubbaa yarsho bessan xuuggo; hessi Godaas taman xuugetiya sawo tonku giya yarsho gidana.
LEV 1:10 Xuugetiya yarshos I immiya imoy dorsaafe woyko deeshape gidiko, borey bayna maraze woyko kole gido.
LEV 1:11 He mehiya yarsho bessaafe pudeha baggara Godaa sinthan shuko. Kahineti, Aarona nayti he suuthaa ekidi yarsho bessa oyddu maazaneta ubbaa bolla wurxo.
LEV 1:12 He uray ashuwa qommon qommon kesso; kahiney he kessida ashuwa bolla huuphiyanne modhuwa gujidi, yarsho bessan taman de7iya mithaa bolla maarayidi wotho.
LEV 1:13 Shin he uray ulo ashuwanne gedata haathan meecco; kahiney he ubbaa yarsho bessan xuuggo; hessi Godaas taman xuugetiya sawo tonku giya yarsho gidana.
LEV 1:14 Godaas yarshetiya xuussa yarshoy kafo gidiko holle woyko kuraacho gido.
LEV 1:15 Kahiney hessa ekidi qoodhiya kushera duutho; huuphiya yarsho bessa bolla de7iya taman xuuggo. Iya suuthay yarsho bessa miyera guko.
LEV 1:16 Ulo ashuwanne qefiya kessidi, yarsho bessaafe doloha baggara bido qoliya bessan yeggo.
LEV 1:17 I he kafuwa qefeta oykidi shaako, shin kumethi shaakofo. Kahiney yarsho bessa bolla de7iya taman wothidi xuuggo; hessi Godaas taman xuugetiya sawo tonku giya yarsho gidana.
LEV 2:1 Oonika katha yarsho Godaas yarshiya wode he yarshoy lo77o dhiille gido; iya bolla zaytenne ixaane gujo.
LEV 2:2 Hessa kahine gidida Aarona naytako eho; kahineti he lo77o dhiilliyafe issi kuuca ekidi, zaytenne ixaane ubbaa gujidi yarsho bessa bolla taman xuuggo. Hessi Godaas taman xuugetiya sawo tonku giya qofiso yarsho gidana.
LEV 2:3 Katha yarshuwafe attidaysi Aaronasinne iya naytas gidana. Hessi Godaas taman xuugetida ubbaafe geeshsha yarsho gidana.
LEV 2:4 Yarshetiya uythay coocen kompetida gidiko, zaytera munuqetida lo77o dhiille gido. He uythay irshoy bayna zayten munuqetidaysa woyko lee7on uuketidi zayten tiyetidaysa gido.
LEV 2:5 Yarshetiya uythay beshen uuketidaba gidiko, irshoy bayna zayten munuqetida lo77o dhiille gido.
LEV 2:6 Iya menthada iya bolla zayte tigada katha yarsho oothada yarsha.
LEV 2:7 Ne yarshiya kathay oton kaxidaba gidiko zayten munuqetida lo77o dhiille gido.
LEV 2:8 Hessada hanidi giigida kathaa yarshuwa Godaas ehada kahiniyas imma; kahiney hessa ekidi yarsho bessan yarsho.
LEV 2:9 Kahiney he katha yarshuwa ekidi, yarsho bessan xuussa yarsho oothidi taman xuuggo. Hessi Godaas taman xuugetiya sawo tonku giya qofiso yarsho gidana.
LEV 2:10 Katha yarshuwafe attidaysi Aaronasinne iya naytas gidana. Hessi Godaas taman xuugetida ubbaafe geeshsha yarsho gidana.
LEV 2:11 Neeni irsho woyko eessi Godaas taman xuuggada yarshanaw bessonna gisho Godaas hinte ehiya katha yarshoy irshoy de7iyaba gidopo.
LEV 2:12 Hayisata bayra yarsho oothidi Godaas yarshanaw danda7eeta, shin sawo tonku giya yarsho oothidi Godaas yarsho bessan xuuggofite.
LEV 2:13 Maxiney, neeni ne Xoossara caaqida caaquwas malla gidiya gisho ne katha yarsho ubban maxine yegga. Ne katha yarsho ubbaa maxinen mal7etha.
LEV 2:14 Neeni kathaafe bayra Godaas ehiya wode caacetidi shirketida tiya gidanaw bessees.
LEV 2:15 Hessi katha yarsho gidiya gisho iya bolla zayte tiga; ixaane wotha.
LEV 2:16 Kahiney he caacetidi shirketidanne zaytey tigetida katha yarshuwafe bagga ekidi ixaane ubbaara qofiso yarsho oothidi Godaas taman xuuggo.
LEV 3:1 Issi asi issifetetha yarshos ba mehiyape borey bayna ussi woyko wofaano Godaa sinthe shiisho.
LEV 3:2 Yarshanaw ehida mehiya huuphen ba kushiya wothidi Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen shuko. Kahineti, Aarona nayti suuthaa ekidi yarsho bessa oyddu maazaniya bolla wurxo.
LEV 3:3 Issifetetha yarshuwafe xuussa yarsho oothidi Godaas shiisho; hessika ulo ashuwa kammida moodhiya,
LEV 3:4 nam7u kilahota, enta bolla de7iya moodhiyanne tiriya xeera baggaa eko.
LEV 3:5 Aarona nayti hessa xuussa yarshuwara issife yarsho bessa bolla de7iya mithaa bolla wothidi xuuggo. Hessi Godaas xuugetiya sawo tonku giya yarsho gidana.
LEV 3:6 Issifetetha yarshos shiiqey macca woyko adde dorse gidiko borey baynaba gido.
LEV 3:7 Issi asi dorsa urge yarshiyaba gidiko hessa Godaa sinthan shiisho.
LEV 3:8 He dorsa urgiya huuphen ba kushiya wothidi Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen shuko. Aarona nayti suuthaa ekidi yarsho bessa oyddu maazaniya bolla wurxo.
LEV 3:9 Issifetetha yarshuwafe Godaas xuussa yarsho oothidi yarsho; hessika modhuwa, goynaape bidi zoko meqethaa gakanaw de7iya modhuwa, ulo ashuwa kammida moodhiya,
LEV 3:10 nam7u kilahota, enta kammida moodhiya tiriya xeera baggaa eko.
LEV 3:11 Kahiney hessa Godaas xuussa yarsho oothidi yarsho bessan xuuggo.
LEV 3:12 I yarshey deeshe gidiko I hessa Godaa sinthe shiisho.
LEV 3:13 Iya huuphen ba kushiya wothidi Geeshsha Dunkaaniya sinthan shuko. Aarona nayti suuthaa ekidi yarsho bessa yuushuwa wurxo.
LEV 3:14 I he yarshuwafe ekidi Godaas xuussa yarsho oothidi yarsho; hessika ulo ashuwa kammida moodhiya ubbaa,
LEV 3:15 nam7u kilahota, enta kammida moodhiya tiriya xeera baggaa eko.
LEV 3:16 Kahiney hessa Godaas sawo tonku giya yarsho oothidi yarsho bessan xuuggo. Modho ubbay Godaaba.
LEV 3:17 Hinte modhonne suuthi moopite. Hessi hinttesnne yaana yeletethay de7iya bessa awunka naagiya woga gido.
LEV 4:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 4:2 Neeni Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; oonika qoponna nagara oothiko woyko Godaa kiitatape issuwa menthiko,
LEV 4:3 Dooretida kahiney nagara oothidi asaa gomen gathiko, I ba oothida nagaraa gisho borey bayna wofaano Godaas nagara yarsho oothidi eho.
LEV 4:4 He wofaanuwa Geeshsha Dunkaaniya penge ehidi, huuphen ba kushiya wothidi Godaa sinthan shuko.
LEV 4:5 Dooretida kahiney wofaanuwa suuthaafe guuthara ekidi Geeshsha Dunkaaniya gelsidi,
LEV 4:6 ba biradhiya suuthan yeddi ekidi Geeshsha Dunkaaniya magarajuwa sinthan Godaa sinthan laapun toho wurxo.
LEV 4:7 Kahiney guutha suuthi ekidi Geeshsha Dunkaaniyan Godaa sinthan sawiya ixaane cuyisiya bessan de7iya kaceta tiyo. Attida suuthaa Geeshsha Dunkaaniya geliya penge baggara de7iya xuussa yarsho bessa garsan gusso.
LEV 4:8 Nagara yarshos shuketida wofaanuwa modhuwa ubbaa, ulo ashuwa ma7ida modhuwa,
LEV 4:9 nam7u kilahota, enta kammida moodhiyanne tiriya xeera baggaa eko.
LEV 4:10 Issifetetha yarshos shuketida wofaanuwa modhuwa kessidaysada iyape modhuwa kesso. Kahiney xuussa yarsho oothidi yarsho bessan xuuggo.
LEV 4:11 Shin wofaanuwa galbaa, iya ashuwa ubbaa, iya huuphiya, iya tohota, ulo ashuwa, tociya,
LEV 4:12 ashuwape attidaysa ubbaa gutaape kare kessidi bido yeggiya woga mela geeshsha bessi efidi yan taman xuuggo.
LEV 4:13 Isra7eele maabara ubbay qoponna nagara oothikonne Godaa kiitatape issuwa menthiko hessi entafe qosetikoka entaw bala gididi taybetana.
LEV 4:14 Enti oothida nagaraa akeekiya wode nagara yarshos haniya wofaano Geeshsha Dunkaaniya sinthe eho.
LEV 4:15 Maabara cimati banta kushiya wofaanuwa huuphen wothidi Godaa sinthan shuko.
LEV 4:16 Dooretida kahiney wofaanuwa suuthaafe guuthara ekidi Geeshsha Dunkaaniya gido gelo.
LEV 4:17 I ba biradhiya suuthan yeddi ekidi magarajuwa sintha baggara Godaa sinthan laapun toho wurxo.
LEV 4:18 Qassi guutha suuthi ekidi, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon Godaa sinthan ixaane cuyisiya bessan de7iya kaceta bolla tiyo. Attida suuthaa Geeshsha Dunkaaniya geliya pengiya baggara de7iya xuussa yarsho bessa garsan gusso.
LEV 4:19 Modho ubbaa ekidi yarsho bessan xuuggo.
LEV 4:20 Ha wofaanuwaka nagara yarshos shuketida wofaanuwa mela oothada shiisha. Hessada oothidi, kahiney nagara atotetha wogaa polana; asaa nagaray atto geetetana.
LEV 4:21 Kahiney wofaanuwa gutaape kare kessidi, koyro wofaanoy xuugetidaysada iyaka xuuggo; hessi maabaraas yarshetiya nagara yarsho.
LEV 4:22 Asaa kaalethiya shuumatape issoy qoponna nagara oothikonne Godaa Xoossaa kiitaape issuwa menthiko he uray bala.
LEV 4:23 I ba oothida nagaraa akeekidaape guye, borey bayna issi kole eho.
LEV 4:24 He koliya huuphen ba kushiya wothidi xuussa yarshoy yarshetiya bessan Godaa sinthan shuko; hessi nagara yarsho.
LEV 4:25 Kahiney ba biradhiya suuthan yeddi ekidi, xuussa yarsho bessan de7iya kaceta bolla tiyo; attida suuthaa qassi xuussa yarsho bessa garsan gusso.
LEV 4:26 Issifetetha yarshos shiiqida modhuwa ubbaa xuuggidaysada ha koliya modhuwa xuuggo. Hessada oothidi, kahiney he uraa nagara qushisees; he uraa nagaray atto geetetana.
LEV 4:27 Maabaraape issi asi qoponna nagara oothikonne Godaa kiitaape issuwa menthiko he uray bala gidees.
LEV 4:28 I ba oothida nagaraa akeekidaape guye borey bayna macca deeshi ba nagaraa gisho eho.
LEV 4:29 Ba kushiya he deeshe huuphen wotho; yaatidi xuussa yarsho bessan nagara yarsho oothidi shuko.
LEV 4:30 Hessafe guye, kahiney he deeshe suuthan ba biradhiya yeddi ekidi xuussa yarsho bessan de7iya kaceta bolla tiyo. Attida suutha ubbaa yarsho bessaafe garsan gusso.
LEV 4:31 Issifetetha yarshos shuketida mehiyape modhuwa kessidaysa mela he deeshe modhuwa qaari kessidi, yarsho bessan Godaas sawo tonku giya yarsho oothidi xuuggo. Hessada oothidi, kahiney he uraa nagaraa qushisees; iya nagaray atto geetetana.
LEV 4:32 He uray ba nagaraa gisho yarshey dorse gidiko, borey bayna macca dorse gido.
LEV 4:33 I ba kushiya he dorse huuphen wotho; yaatidi, xuussa yarsho mehe shukiya bessan shuko.
LEV 4:34 Hessafe guye, kahiney dorse suuthan ba biradhiya yeddi ekidi xuussa yarshoy yarshetiya bessan de7iya kaceta bolla tiyo. Attida suuthaa yarsho bessaafe garsan gusso.
LEV 4:35 Issifetetha yarshos shuketida mehiyape modhuwa kessidaysada he dorse modhuwa qori kessidi, yarsho bessan Godaas xuussa yarsho oothidi xuuggo. Hessada oothidi, kahiney he uraa nagaraa qushisees; iya nagaray atto geetetana.
LEV 5:1 Issi asi ba be7idaba woyko ba eriyaba markatana mela oyshetidi markatonna ixiko he uray nagara oothida gisho seereto.
LEV 5:2 Issi asi eronna de7ishe tunabaa, hessika, hayqida do7a woyko mehe woyko sa7ara gooshetiya do7ata bochiko, hessi tuna gideysa I eronna ixikoka tuna gidiya gisho bala gidees.
LEV 5:3 Issi asi eronna de7ishe asa asatethafe goggidi tunisiyaba bochiko, hessi tuna gideysa I eronna ixiko, tuna gidiya gisho bala gidees.
LEV 5:4 Issi asi iitaba gidin lo77oba oothanaw eeson caaqikonne ba caaqidaysa dogidi, guyepe I akeekida wodepe doomidi bala gidees.
LEV 5:5 Issi asi ha odetida balatape issuwa oothidaba gidiko ba oothida nagaraa paaxo.
LEV 5:6 I ba oothida nagaraa gisho Godaas ba mehiya giddofe macca dorse woyko macca deeshe nagaraa yarsho oothidi shiisho. Kahiney ekidi he uraa nagaraa qushethas yarshana.
LEV 5:7 Issi asi ba oothida nagaraa gisho yarshanaw dorse woyko deeshe shammanaw iyaw gatey gakonna ixiko nam7u kuraachota woyko nam7u holleta, issuwa nagara yarshos qassi issuwa xuussa yarshos oothidi Godaas eho.
LEV 5:8 I enta kahiniyas immo; kahiney nam7u holletape issuwa qoodhiya mirqidi duuthonnashin, nagara yarsho oothidi shiisho.
LEV 5:9 Yaatidi suuthaafe guuthara ekidi, yarsho bessa matan wurxo; attida suuthaa yarsho bessa garsan gusso; hessi nagara yarsho.
LEV 5:10 Hanko holliya qassi higgey kiiteysada xuussa yarsho oothidi xuuggo. Kahiney haysada oothidi, uray oothida nagaraa qushisanaw yarsho yarshees; he uraa nagaray atto geetetana.
LEV 5:11 Shin issi asi nam7u holle woyko nam7u kuraacho ehanaw gatey gakonna ixiko, issi kilo giraame lo77o dhiille ba nagaraa gisho yarsho oothidi eho. He dhiilley nagara yarsho gidiya gisho zaytey woyko ixaaney iya bolla guzhetofo.
LEV 5:12 I hessa ehidi kahiniyas immo; kahiney he dhiilliyafe issi kuuca ekidi, Godaas shiiqiya katha yarshuwara gathidi, qofiso oothidi yarsho bessan xuuggo; hessi nagara yarsho.
LEV 5:13 Issi asi ha nagaratape issuwa oothiko haysada oothidi iya nagara qushisees; he uraa nagaray atto geetetana. He yarshuwafe attidaysi katha yarshuwada kahiniyas gido.
LEV 5:14 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 5:15 Oonika Godaa naaqikonne geeshsha miisheta tunisidi qoponna nagara oothiko ba naaquwas ba mehiya giddofe borey bayna issi maraze Godaas eho. Iya gatey geeshsha dunkaanen eretida mizaane ginan cigeto; hessi naaqo yarsho.
LEV 5:16 I geeshsha miisheta bolla nagara oothida gisho koyro cigganaw bessiya gatiya bolla xeetape laatamu kushe gujidi kahiniyas immo. Kahiney hessa maraziyara gathi yarshidi uraa naaquwa qushisees; iya nagaray atto geetetees.
LEV 5:17 Issi asi qoponnashin, Godaa kiitatape issuwa menthidi nagara oothiko I hessa eronna ixikoka bala gidiya gisho ba nagaran seereto.
LEV 5:18 I ba mehiyape borey baynanne gate kunthiya issi maraze naaqo yarshos kahiniyako eho. Kahiney he maraziya yarshidi uraa naaquwa qushisees; iya naaqoy atto geetetees.
LEV 5:19 I tumape Godaa naaqida gisho hessi naaqo yarsho.
LEV 6:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 6:2 Issi asi hara asi hadara wothidaba woyko tal7idaba lahiko woyko bonqiko woyko cimmiko,
LEV 6:3 woyko dhayidabaa demmidi ta be7abike gidi wordon caaqikonne asi oothiya haysa melabaape issuwa oothiko,
LEV 6:4 hessan nagarancho gididi bentiko, kaysidaba woyko bonqidaba woyko hadara ekidaba woyko dhayin demmidaba,
LEV 6:5 woyko wordon caaqidi ekida kumetha shaluwa godaas zaaro. Qassi ba naaqo yarshuwa yarshiya gallas ba ekidaba bolla xeetape laatamu kushe gujidi shaluwa godaas immo.
LEV 6:6 Qassi ba naaquwa gisho Godaas yarsho yarshiya wode ba mehiya giddofe borey bayna issi maraze kahiniyako eho. He dorsay naaqo yarshos gate kuntheysa gido.
LEV 6:7 Kahiney he dorsaa yarshidi he uraa naaquwa qushisees; he uraa naaqoy atto geetetana.
LEV 6:8 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 6:9 Aaronanne iya adde nayta haysada yaagada kiitta; xuussa yarshuwas de7iya wogay haysa; xuussa yarshoy sa7i wontana gakanaw yarsho bessan de7o. Tamay yarsho bessan qamma kumethi eexishe aqo.
LEV 6:10 Kahiney liinope dadetida qamise ma7idi, sure dancidi, xuussa yarshuwa tamay mida biduwa kaashidi yarsho bessa miyen laallo.
LEV 6:11 Yaatidi ma7uwa qaari wothidi hara ma7o ma7idi he biduwa gutaape gaxa efidi wogaada geeshsha bessan qolo.
LEV 6:12 Yarsho bessaa bolla de7iya tamay to7onna ubba wode eexishe de7o. Kahiney wonta wonta mithi iya bolla gujo. Xoossa yarshuwa mitha bolla maaran wothidi, issifetetha yarshuwa modhuwa iya bolla xuuggo.
LEV 6:13 Tamay yarsho bessa bolla ubba wode eexishe de7o; to7anaw koshshenna.
LEV 6:14 Katha yarshos imetida wogay haysa; kahine gidida Aarona nayti yarsho bessaafe sintha baggara Godaa sinthan yarsho.
LEV 6:15 Kahiney issi kuuca lo77o dhiillenne zayte ekidi katha yarshuwa bolla de7iya ixaaniyara yarsho bessan Godaas sawo tonku giya qofiso yarsho oothidi xuuggo.
LEV 6:16 Iyape attidaysa Aaroninne iya adde nayti uythi uukidi Dunkaaniya dabaaban de7iya geeshsha bessan mo.
LEV 6:17 He uythay irshoy bayna uuketo. Taman xuussa yarshuwafe hessa taani entaw gisho oothada immas. Nagara yarshuwa melanne naaqo yarshuwa mela I ubbaafe geeshshi.
LEV 6:18 Godaas taman xuussa yarshuwafe enta gakiya gisho gidiya gisho yaa yeletethan Aarona koche gidida addeti ubbay hessa mo. He yarshuwa, geeshshi gidonna oonika bochofo.
LEV 6:19 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 6:20 Aaroninne iya adde nayti kahinetethan tiyetiya wode issi kilo giraame gidiya lo77o dhiille katha yarsho oothidi Godaas eho. Iyape baggaa wonta, baggaa omarsi yarsho.
LEV 6:21 He dhiilley zaytera walaketidi loythi munuqetidi bashen uuketo; iya menthada yarsho bessan sawo tonku giya katha yarsho oothada Godaas yarsha.
LEV 6:22 Qassi Aarona adde naytape iya kahinetetha laattanaw tiyetiya oonika he wogaa giigisees. Hessi Godaas ubba wode yarshetiya yarsho gidiya gisho kumethi xuugeto.
LEV 6:23 Kahiney katha yarshuwa guye ashshona xuugganaw koshshees; I meetetanaw bessenna.
LEV 6:24 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 6:25 Aaronasinne iya adde naytas haysada yaaga; “Nagara yarsho wogay haysa; nagaras shuketiya yarshoy xuussa yarshoy shuketiya bessan Godaa sinthan shuketto. He yarshoy ubbaafe geeshsha yarsho.
LEV 6:26 He yarshuwa yarshiya kahiney Dunkaaniya dabaaban de7iya geeshsha bessan mo.
LEV 6:27 He ashuwa bochiya oonika geeshshi gido; qassi shukishin suuthi ma7uwa bochiko he ma7oy geeshsha bessan meeceto.
LEV 6:28 Ashoy kaxida otoy meqo; birata disten kaxidaba gidiko he miishiya qaacidi haathan meeccanaw koshshees.
LEV 6:29 Kahine kochaafe adde gidida oonika he ashuwa mo; he yarshoy ubbaafe geeshshi.
LEV 6:30 Shin Geeshsha bessan nagara atotethas suuthaa ekidi Dunkaaniya giddo gelidaba gidiko he mehiya ashoy meetetanaw koshshenna; I taman xuugetanaw bessees.”
LEV 7:1 Ubbaafe geeshshi gidiya gisho naaqo yarsho wogay haysa;
LEV 7:2 Xuussa yarsho mehey shuketiya bessan naaqo yarsho mehey shuketto; iya suuthay yarsho bessa oyddu baggan wurxeto.
LEV 7:3 Iya modhuwa ubbaa, hessika goynaape bidi zoko meqethaa gakanaw de7iya modhuwa, ulo ashuwa kammida moodhiya,
LEV 7:4 nam7u kilahota, enta kammida moodhiyanne tiriya xeera baggaa ekidi yarsho.
LEV 7:5 Kahiney haysata taman xuussa yarsho oothidi Godaas yarsho; hessi naaqo yarsho.
LEV 7:6 Kahine yara gidida adde ubbay he yarsho ashuwa mo. He yarshoy ubbaafe geeshshi gidiya gisho geeshsha bessan meeteto.
LEV 7:7 Naaqo yarshuwanne nagara yarshuwa wogay issinno. He mehiya ashoy nagara atotethas yarshida kahiniyas imetees.
LEV 7:8 Oonika xuussa yarsho mehe ehin ekidi yarshiya kahiney he mehiya galba baw eko.
LEV 7:9 Coocen kompetida woyko oton kaxida woyko bashen uuketida ubbay he yarshuwa yarshida kahiniyas imetees.
LEV 7:10 Qassi zaytera munuqetida woyko munuqetonna katha yarsho ubbay Aarona adde nayta ubbaas issi gina shaaketidi imetees.
LEV 7:11 Issi asi issifetetha yarsho Godaas yarshiya wode iyaw de7iya wogay haysa;
LEV 7:12 I yarshey galata yarsho gidiko he yarshuwara issife zaytera munuqida uythu, irshoy gelonna uuketidi zayten tiyetida lee7o uythunne lo77o dhiillefe zaytera munuqetida uythu shiisho.
LEV 7:13 He issifetetha yarshuwara issife irshora uuketida uythaa imota oothidi yarsho.
LEV 7:14 He issi issi uythaafe issuwa denthidi Godaas yarsho oothidi eho. Hessi issifetetha yarshuwa suuthaa wurxida kahiniyas imeto.
LEV 7:15 He mehiya ashoy he gallas meeteto; wontas aybika attofo.
LEV 7:16 Shin iya yarshoy gaso yarsho woyko dosa yarsho gidiko he ashoy he yarshetida gallas meeteto; iyape attey de7iko wontetha gallas meeteto.
LEV 7:17 He ashuwape palahidi heedzantho gallas gakanaw gam7iko hessi taman xuugeto.
LEV 7:18 Issi asi shiishida issifetetha yarsho ashoy heedzantho gallasan meetetiko iya yarshoy eketenna; yarshoy yarshetidada taybetenna. He yarshoy tuna; iyape mida oonika ba nagaran oyshetees.
LEV 7:19 Tunabaa bochida ashoy meetetofo; I taman xuugetanaw koshshees. Hara ashuwa wogan tuna gidonna asi oonika maana giiko mo.
LEV 7:20 Shin issi asi tuna gidi uttidi, Godaas shiiqida issifetetha yarsho ashuwape miyaba gidiko, he uray asaa giddofe kuretto.
LEV 7:21 Issi asi tunaba bochiko, asa tunatethi gidin woyko tuna mehe gidin woyko hara ixetiya tunaba bochidi, Godaas yarshetida issifetetha yarsho ashuwape miiko, he uray ba asaa giddofe kureto.
LEV 7:22 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 7:23 Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; korma woyko maraze woyko kole modho ashuwa moopite.
LEV 7:24 Hayqida mehe woyko do7i wodhida mehiya modhuwa harabas go7etitepe attishin, iyape aybaka moopite.
LEV 7:25 Godaas taman xuussa yarshos shiiqiya mehiya modho ashuwa miya oonika ba asaa giddofe kuretto.
LEV 7:26 Hinte de7iya bessan awun gidikoka, kafo suuthi woyko mehe suuthi moopite.
LEV 7:27 Suuthi miya oonika ba asaa giddofe kuretto.
LEV 7:28 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 7:29 Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; Godaas issifetetha yarsho shiishiya oonika he issifetetha yarshuwafe shaakidi ba imota oothidi Godaas dummayidi yarsho.
LEV 7:30 Hessa I Godaas taman xuussa yarsho oothidi, ba kushen ekidi eho. Qassi modhuwa angaasuwara gathi ehidi yuusho yarsho oothidi Godaa sinthan yarsho.
LEV 7:31 Kahiney yarsho bessan modhuwa xuuggo; shin angaasoy Aaronasinne iya adde naytas imeto.
LEV 7:32 Hinte issifetetha yarshuwafe ushacha gedaa imota oothidi kahiniyas immite.
LEV 7:33 He ushacha geday issifetetha yarshuwa suuthaanne modhuwa yarshiya kahiniya gakiya gisho gido.
LEV 7:34 Taani Isra7eele asaa issifetetha yarshuwafe yuusho angaasuwan shiiqida gedaa Isra7eele asaape ekada, kahiniya Aaronasinne iya adde naytas gisho oothada immas. Hessi enta gakiya enta gisho gidiya gisho Isra7eele asay merinaw hessa entaw immishe daana.
LEV 7:35 Aaroninne iya adde nayti kahine gididi shuumetida gallas Godaas shiiqida xuussa yarshuwafe, hesika entaw gisho gididi imetis.
LEV 7:36 Goday enta kahinetethas tiyida gallas, hessa entaw immana mela Isra7eele asaa kiittis; hessi yaana yeletethan eqidi de7iya woga gidana.
LEV 7:37 Hiza xuussa yarshuwa, katha yarshuwa, nagara yarshuwa, naaqo yarshuwa, kahineti tiyetiya wode yarshetiya yarshuwanne issifetetha yarshuwa wogay haysa.
LEV 7:38 Isra7eele asay Siina mela biittan banta yarshuwa Godaas yarshana mela Goday kiitida gallas, Siina zuma bolla Goday Muse kiitida wogay haysa.
LEV 8:1 Goday Muses haysada yaagidi odis;
LEV 8:2 Aaronanne iya adde nayta, entara issife kahinetetha ma7uwa, tiyo zaytiya, nagara yarshuwa shuketiya kormaa, nam7u marazetanne, irshoy geliboonna uuketida uythaa wothiya gayta ekada ya.
LEV 8:3 Qassi Isra7eele asa ubbaa xeegada Dunkaaniya penge shiisha.
LEV 8:4 Musey Goday kiitidaysada oothis; asa ubbay dunkaaniya penge shiiqis.
LEV 8:5 Musey asaako, ta oothana mela Goday kiittidaysi haysa.
LEV 8:6 Musey Aaronanne iya adde nayta ehidi haathan meeccis.
LEV 8:7 Aarona ma7uwa mayzidi, danco dancisis; adussa ma7uwa mayzidi iya bolla efuude ma7uwa mayzis. Efuudiya alleeqisidi daddida saqiyan Aarona xeessara gathidi qachis.
LEV 8:8 Efuudiya bolla tira kiise sikidi iyan Uriimenne Tumiime wothis.
LEV 8:9 Aarona huuphen xaatha qace wothis. Goday Muse kiitidaysada xaatha qaciya sintha baggara Geeshsha worqa guche misiliya wothis.
LEV 8:10 Hessafe guye Musey tiyo zaytiya ekidi, Dunkaaniyanne Dunkaaniya giddon de7iya miishe ubbaa tiyidi dummayis.
LEV 8:11 He zaytiyape ekidi yarsho bessa bolla laapun toho wurxis; iya miisheta, meecha keriyanne iya utuwa dummayanaw he zaytiyara tiyis.
LEV 8:12 He tiyo zaytiyape guuthara ekidi Aarona huuphen tigidi iya dummayis.
LEV 8:13 Goday Muse kiittidaysada Musey Aarona adde nayta sinthe aathidi ma7o mayzidi danco dancisis. Enta huuphen xaatha qace wothis.
LEV 8:14 Musey nagara yarshos yarshetiya kormaa ehis; Aaroninne iya adde nayti he kormaa huuphen banta kushiya wothidosona.
LEV 8:15 Musey he kormaa shukidi iya suuthan ba biradhiya yeddi ekidi, yarsho bessan de7iya kaceta tiyidi yarsho bessa geeshshis. Attida suuthaa yarsho bessaafe garsan gussis; hessada oothidi yarsho bessa Xoossas dummayidi geeshshis.
LEV 8:16 Musey ulo ashuwa kammida modhuwa ubba, tiriya xeera baggaa, kilahotanne enta kammida modhuwa ekidi, yarsho bessan xuuggis.
LEV 8:17 Shin Goday Muse kiitidaysada korma galbaa, attida ashuwanne tociya gutaape gaxa kessidi xuuggis.
LEV 8:18 Hessafe guye, Musey xuussa yarshos maraze ehis; Aaroninne iya adde nayti he maraziya huuphen banta kushiya wothidosona.
LEV 8:19 Musey he maraziya shukis; iya suuthaa yarsho bessa oyddu maazaneta bolla wurxis.
LEV 8:20 Musey maraziya ashuwa qommon qommon qanxerethis; huuphiya, attida ashuwanne modhuwa xuuggis.
LEV 8:21 Goday Muse kiitidaysada ulo ashuwanne gedata meeccidi, kumetha dorsaa Godaas sawo tonku giya xuussa yarsho oothidi yarsho bessan xuuggis.
LEV 8:22 Kahineti shuumetiya wode shiiqiya nam7antho dorsaa Musey ehis; Aaroninne iya adde nayti he dorsaa huuphen banta kushiya wothidosona.
LEV 8:23 Musey he maraziya shukis; iya suuthaafe ekidi, Aaronas ushacha haythaa, ushacha kushiya wogga biradhiyanne, ushacha tohuwa wogga biradhiya tiyis.
LEV 8:24 Qassi Musey Aarona adde nayta sinthe aathidi, he suuthaafe ekidi, enta ushacha haythaa, ushacha kushiya wogga biradhiyanne ushacha tohuwa wogga biradhiya tiyis. Yaatidi, Musey attida suuthaa yarsho bessa oyddu maazaneta bolla wurxis.
LEV 8:25 Modhdhuwa, goynaape bidi zoko meqethaa gakanaw de7iya modhuwa, tiriya xeera baggaa, kilahotanne enta kammida modhuwanne ushacha gedaa ekis.
LEV 8:26 Godaa sinthan de7iya gaytape irshoy bayna uuketida issi uythaa, uuketidi zayten tiyetida issi uythaanne lee7on uuketida uythaa ekidi modhuwa bollanne ushacha gedaa bolla wothis.
LEV 8:27 I he katha ubbaa Aarona kusheninne iya adde nayta kushen wothin, Godaa sinthan yuusho yarsho oothidi yarshidosona.
LEV 8:28 Musey he kathaa enta kushepe ekidi, xuussa yarshuwara gathidi, kahineta shuumiya wode Godaas sawo tonku giya yarsho oothidi yarsho bessan xuuggis.
LEV 8:29 Qassi Musey angaasuwa ekidi, yuusho yarsho oothidi Godaa sinthan yarshis. Goday Muse kiitidaysada, kahineta shuumiya wode yarshetiya maraziya ashuwape hessi Muse gakiya gisho.
LEV 8:30 Musey tiyo zaytiyapenne yarsho bessan de7iya suuthaafe ekidi, Aarona bollanne iya ma7uwa bolla, iya adde nayta bollanne, enta ma7uwa bolla wurxis; Aaronanne iya ma7uwa, iya naytanne enta ma7uwa dummayis.
LEV 8:31 Musey Aaronanne iya adde naytako haysada yaagis; ashuwa Dunkaaniya pengen kathite; Aaroninne iya adde nayti ta kiitidaysada gaytan de7iya geeshsha uythaara miite.
LEV 8:32 He ashuwapenne uythaafe palahiday de7iko taman xuuggite.
LEV 8:33 Kahineta shuumiya wogay laapun gallas ekiya gisho he wogay poletiya laapun gallasay wurana gakanaw Dunkaaniya pengefe kare keyopite.
LEV 8:34 Goday kiittin hachi poletida wogay hinte nagaraa quchanaasa.
LEV 8:35 Dunkaaniya pengen laapun gallas kumethi gallasinne qamma gam7ite; Godaa wogaa naagite; ixiko hinte hayqana. Tana Goday kiittiday haysa.
LEV 8:36 Aaroninne iya adde nayti Goday Muse baggara kiittidaba ubbaa oothidosona.
LEV 9:1 Hospuntha gallas Musey Aarona, iya adde naytanne Isra7eele cimata xeegis.
LEV 9:2 Aaronako haysada yaagis; borey bayna issi korma nagaraa yarshos, qassi issi maraze xuussa yarshos Godaa sinthe shiisha.
LEV 9:3 Borey bayna issi kole nagara yarshos, issi laythi kumida marinne dorsa urge xuussa yarshos bantaw ehana mela Isra7eele asaas oda.
LEV 9:4 Qassi issifetetha yarshos issi korma, issi marazenne katha yarshos zaytera munuqetida dhiille ehana mela entaw oda. Hachi Goday hintew qoncana gisho hessa oothite.
LEV 9:5 Enti Musey kiittidaba ubbaa Geeshsha Dunkaaniya sinthe ehidosona; maabara ubbay shiiqidi Godaa sinthan eqidosona.
LEV 9:6 Musey entako, Godaa bonchoy hintew qoncana mela hinte oothana mela Goday kiittiday haysa.
LEV 9:7 Musey Aaronako haysada yaagis; “Yarsho bessaako shiiqada ne nagaraa gisho nagara yarshonne xuussa yarsho yarsha. Goday kiitidaysada asaa nagaraa atotethas yarsho yarsha.”
LEV 9:8 Aaroni yarsho bessaako yidi, ba nagaraa gisho yarshetiya maraa shukis.
LEV 9:9 Aarona nayti suuthaa ekidi iyaw ehidosona; I, ba biradhiya he suuthan yeddi ekidi, yarsho bessan de7iya kaceta tiyis; attida suuthaa yarsho bessaafe garsan gussis.
LEV 9:10 Goday Muse kiitidaysada, ashuwape modhuwa, kilahotanne tiriya xeera baggaa ekidi yarsho bessan xuuggis.
LEV 9:11 Shin attida ashuwanne galbaa gutaape kare kessidi xuuggis.
LEV 9:12 Aaroni xuussa yarshos shiiqida mehiya shukis; iya nayti suuthaa ekidi iyaw ehidosona. I yarsho bessa oyddu maazaneta bolla wurxis.
LEV 9:13 Enti ashuwa qommon qommon kessidi, huuphiyara wolla iyaw ehidosona; I ekidi yarsho bessan xuuggis.
LEV 9:14 Ulo ashuwanne gedata haathan meeccidi, yarsho bessan de7iya xuussa yarshuwa bolla wothidi xuuggis.
LEV 9:15 Hessafe guye, Aaroni asaa gisho yarsho yarshis. I asaa nagaraa gisho yarshetiya koliya ekidi shukis; I kase ba nagaraa yarshidaysada enta nagaraa gisho yarshis.
LEV 9:16 Wogay kiiteysada xuussa yarshos shiiqiya mehiya ehidi yarshis.
LEV 9:17 Katha yarshuwa ehidi, iyape issi kuuca ekidi, wonta wonta xuussa yarshuwa bolla gujidi yarsho bessan xuuggis.
LEV 9:18 Aaroni kormanne maraziya asaas issifetetha yarsho oothidi shukis; iya adde nayti suuthaa iyaw ehidosona; I he suuthaa ekidi yarsho bessa oyddu maazaneta bolla wurxis.
LEV 9:19 Kormanne maraziya ashuwape modhuwa, goynaape bidi zoko meqethaa gakanaw de7iya modhuwa, ulo ashuwa kammida modhuwa, kilahotanne tiriya xeera baggaa ekidi,
LEV 9:20 enti angaaysuwa bolla wothin, Aaroni yarsho bessan xuuggis.
LEV 9:21 Goday Muse kiitidaysada, Aaroni angaaysuwanne ushacha gedaa yuusho yarsho oothidi Godaa sinthan yuushshis.
LEV 9:22 Hessafe guye, Aaroni ba kushiya asaako denthidi enta anjis. I nagara yarshuwa, xuussa yarshuwanne issifetetha yarshuwa yarshidaape guye yarsho bessaafe wodhis.
LEV 9:23 Museynne Aaroni Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddo gelidosona; enti yaape keyidi asaa anjidosona. He wode Godaa bonchoy asa ubbaas qoncis.
LEV 9:24 Godaa matape tami wodhidi, yarsho bessan de7iya xuussa yarshuwanne modhuwa mis. Asa ubbay hessa be7ida wode ililidosona; gufannidi bonchidosona.
LEV 10:1 Aarona adde nayti, Naadabinne Abyoodi, banta ixaane cuyisiya miishe ekidi iya bolla tama wothidosona; iya bolla ixaane gujidosona. Goday enta kiittiboona coo tama Godaa sinthan shiishidosona.
LEV 10:2 Hessa gaason Godaa matape tami yidi enta min, enti Godaa sinthan hayqidosona.
LEV 10:3 Musey Aaronako, Goday, “Taani asaa giddofe taako shiiqeyisata, ta geeshshatetha bessaana. Qassi asa ubbaa sinthan ta bonchetana” gidi odidaysa haysa be7a. Aaroni zaaro immonna si77i gis.
LEV 10:4 Musey Aarona aawa ishaa Uzi7eela adde nayta Misa7eelanne Elzafaana xeegidi, “Haa yidi hinte aawa ishaa nayta aha Geeshsha Dunkaaniya sinthafe denthidi, gutaape gaxa kessite” yaagis.
LEV 10:5 Enti yidi, Musey kiitidaysada enta kahinetetha ma7uwara enta aha tookidi, gutaape gaxa kessidosona.
LEV 10:6 Musey Aaronanne iya adde nayta, Alaazaranne Itamaara haysada yaagis; “Hinte hayqonna melanne Goday ba asaa bolla hanqetonna mela hinte huuphiya meedopite; hinte ma7uwaka daakofite. Shin hinte ishati, Isra7eele asay, Goday ba taman wodhidaysatas yeeko.
LEV 10:7 Godaa tiyo zaytey hinte bolla di7iya gisho Dunkaaniya pengefe kare keyopite; keyiko hinte hayqana” yaagis. Enti Musey gidaysada oothidosona.
LEV 10:8 Goday Aaronako haysada yaagis;
LEV 10:9 Hinte hayqonna mela Dunkaaniya gido geliya wode nenne ne nayti woyne ushshi woyko hara mathoyiya ushshi uyopite; hessi sinthafe yaana yeletethaas merinaw eqidi de7iya woga gidana.
LEV 10:10 Hinte geeshshabanne geeshshi gidonaba qassi tunabaanne tuna gidonaba shaakidi erite.
LEV 10:11 Goday Muse baggara odida woga ubbaa Isra7eele asaa tamaarsite.
LEV 10:12 Musey Aaronanne attida iya adde nayta Alaazaranne Itamaara haysada yaagis; Godaas xuussa yarshuwafe attida katha yarshuwa ekidi irsho yeggonna uukite. I ubbaafe geeshshi gidiya gisho yarsho bessaa matan miite.
LEV 10:13 Godaas xuussa yarshuwafe hessi nenanne ne adde nayta gakiya gisho gidiya gisho, hessa hinte geeshsha bessan miite; Haysa hinte oothana mela Goday tana kiittis.
LEV 10:14 Shin yuusho yarshos shiiqida angaaysuwanne gedaa neeni, ne adde naytinne ne macca nayti geeshsha bessan miite. Hessi Isra7eele asay shiishiya issifetetha yarshuwafe nenanne ne adde nayta gakiya hinte gisho.
LEV 10:15 Godaas yarshida gedaanne yuusho yarshos shiiqida angaasuwa modhuwara issife gathidi Godaa sinthan yuusho yarsho oothidi yarshanaw shiiqo. Goday kiitidaysada, hessi newunne ne adde naytas merinaw hintena gakiya gisho gidana.
LEV 10:16 Musey nagara yarshos shiiqida deesha enti waatidaako eranaw koyidi oychis; I xuugetidaysa erida wode attida Aarona adde nayta, Alaazaranne Itamaara bolla hanqetis.
LEV 10:17 “Nagaraa yarshos shiiqida ashuwa ayis geeshsha bessan mibeeketii? I ubbaafe geeshshi. Godaa sinthan asaa nagaraa diggidi asaas atotethi immana mela hessi hintew imetis.
LEV 10:18 He mehiya suuthay geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddo geliboonna gisho, taani hintena kiitidaysada, hinte iya geeshsha bessan maanaw bessees, shin aggideta” yaagis.
LEV 10:19 Aaroni Museko, “Heko, ha asati hachi banta nagaraa yarshuwanne xuussa yarshuwa Godaa sinthe ehidosona. Gidoshin, hessa melabay ta bolla gakis. Taani nagaraa yarshuwa hachi midaba gidiyako, Goday ufaytanashin attidee?” yaagis.
LEV 10:20 Musey hessa si7ida wode iya zaaruwan ufaytis.
LEV 11:1 Goday Musekonne Aaronako,
LEV 11:2 Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagidi odite; “Biitta bolla de7iya mehetapenne do7atape hinte maanaysati haysata;
LEV 11:3 Shuquley phalqetidaysatanne waammotiya meheta miite.
LEV 11:4 Shin waammotishe shuquley phalqetonaysatanne shuquley phalqethi gididi waammotonayisata moopite. Gimaley waammotees, shin shuquley phalqetonna gisho, hintew tuna gido.
LEV 11:5 Gupalley waammotees, shin shuquley phalqetonna gisho, hintew tuna gido.
LEV 11:6 Eshey waammotees, shin shuquley phalqethi gidonna gisho, hintew tuna gido.
LEV 11:7 Guduntho moopite; iyaw shuquley phalqethi, shin waammotonna gisho, I hintew tuna.
LEV 11:8 Hinte hessata moopite; enta bawuta bochofite; enti hintew tuna.
LEV 11:9 “Haatha giddon de7iya medhetetha ubbaafe hinte maanaysati haysata; Abbaa giddon woyko shaafa haatha giddon de7iya ubbaafe qefeynne poqoy de7iya ubbaa miite.
LEV 11:10 Shin abba giddon woyko goggiya haathan de7iya qefeynne poqoy bayna medhetethati hintew tuna gidiya gisho moopite.
LEV 11:11 Haysati hintew tuna; enta moopite; enta bawuta bochofite.
LEV 11:12 Qefeynne poqoy bayna haatha giddon de7iya medhetethati ubbay hintew tuna.
LEV 11:13 “Kafotape hintew tuna gididaysatinne hinte maanaw bessonnaysati haysata; arganthi, anko, molo kafo,
LEV 11:14 xilo, phirco qommo ubbaa,
LEV 11:15 quuro ubbaa
LEV 11:16 yancho, solo, qoolle, gutto ubbaa,
LEV 11:17 guutha gutto, hazazo, diidinthe,
LEV 11:18 haatha kutto, shi7a anko, daare anko,
LEV 11:19 silaago, saabisanne iya qommo ubba, ayyaana kafonne shirshiqo.
LEV 11:20 “Qefera de7iya oyddu tohon hemetiya laafa medhetethati ubbay hintew tuna.
LEV 11:21 Gidoshin, qefey de7iya oyddu tohon hemeteysatape enta tohuwape bollara gupanaw maaddiya tohoy de7eyisata miite.
LEV 11:22 Hessatika, boole qommo ubbaa, xaqo ubbaanne sere ubbaa.
LEV 11:23 Shin hara qefera de7iya oyddu tohoy de7iya medhetethati ubbay hintew tuna.
LEV 11:24 “Haysati hintena tunisana; enta bawuta bochiya oonika omarsi gakanaw tuna gidana.
LEV 11:25 Enta bawuta denthiya oonika ba ma7uwa meecco; shin omarsi gakanaw I tuna gido.
LEV 11:26 Shuquley de7ishe phalqethi gidonnaysati woyko waammotonnaysati ubbay hintew tuna; enta bochiya oonika tunees.
LEV 11:27 Oyddu tohotan hemetiya do7a ubbaafe gindera hemeteysati hintew tuna; enta bawuta bochiya oonika omarsi gakanaw tunees.
LEV 11:28 Enta bawuta denthiya oonika ba ma7uwa meecco; shin omarsi gakanaw I tuna. Entika hintew tuna.
LEV 11:29 “Sa7ara hemeteysatape haysati hintew tuna. Entika giro, ecere, dumma dumma koche,
LEV 11:30 geegge, haylasho, korche, wakallanne shaaqancho.
LEV 11:31 Sa7ara hemetiya ubbaafe haysati hintew tuna; enta bawuta bochiya oonika omarsi gakanaw tuna gidees.
LEV 11:32 Enta bawuta bochiya ay miisheyka tuna gidees; mitha miishey woyko ma7oy woyko galbi woyko ogoroy tuna gidees. Enta bawutay bochida miishe ubbay haathan muuketidi omarsi gakanaw gam7o; hessafe guye geeshshi gidana.
LEV 11:33 Entafe issuwa bawutay oto giddon wodhidi bentiko, iya giddon de7iyaba ubbay tuna; he otuwa menthite.
LEV 11:34 Ay kathi gidin he otuwa giddon de7iya haathaafe xokiko, he kathay tuna gidees; uyetiyaba gidin, he otuwa giddon de7iko tuna gidees.
LEV 11:35 He bawutape issoy wodhida miishe ubbay tuna; cooce woyko oto gidikoka menthite; enti hintew tuna.
LEV 11:36 He bawutay bochida ubbay tuna gidikoka pultoynne haatha olli tunenna.
LEV 11:37 Enta bawutape issoy zeretha katha bolla wodhiko, hessi tunenna.
LEV 11:38 Shin he zerethaa bolla haathi gukidi simmin, enta bawutape issoy iya bolla wodhiko, he zerethay hintew tuna.
LEV 11:39 “Meetetiya mehetape issoy bawutiko, iya bawuta bochiya oonika omarsi gakanaw tuna.
LEV 11:40 Oonika he mehiya bawutape miiko, ba ma7uwa meecco; omarsi gakanaw I tuna. Oonika iya bawuta tookidi denthiko, ba ma7uwa meecco; omarsi gakanaw I tuna.
LEV 11:41 “Sa7ara gooshetiya medhetethi ubbay hintew tuna; iya moopite.
LEV 11:42 Ulora gooshetiyaba gidin, oyddu tohora hemetiyaba gidin, daro tohoy de7iyaba gidin, sa7ara gooshetiya medhetethi ubbay hintew tuna gidiya gisho moopite.
LEV 11:43 Ha sa7ara gooshetiya medhetethatan hintena tunisopite; enta gaason hinte asatethaa tunisopite.
LEV 11:44 Taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa. Taani geeshshi gidiya gisho, hintena dummayidi geeshshi gidite. Sa7ara gooshetiyabatan hinte asatethaa tunisopite.
LEV 11:45 Taani hintew Xoosse gidanaw hintena Gibxe biittafe kessida hinte Godaa. Hesaa gisho, taani geeshshi gidiya gisho, hinteka geeshshi gidite.
LEV 11:46 “Mehe, kafo, haatha giddon qaaxiya medhetethi ubbaanne sa7ara hemetiya medhetetha ubbaa wogay haysa.
LEV 11:47 Hessan hinte tunanne tuna gidonnayisata giddon, qassi meetetiyanne meetetonna medhetethata giddon de7iya dummatethaa shaakidi erana.”
LEV 12:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 12:2 Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; “Issi maccasi qanthatada adde na7a yeliko, ba kushe metuwa be7iya wode tuna gideysada laapun gallas gakanaw tuna gidana.
LEV 12:3 Hospuntha gallas na7ay qaxaretanaw koshshees.
LEV 12:4 Hessafe guye, maccasiya ba yelo suuthay xiz7ana gakanaw hastamanne heedzu gallas gam7o; qassi ba geeyiya gallasay wurana gakanaw geeshshaba bochofo; Geeshsha Dunkaaniyaka gelopo.
LEV 12:5 “Shin issi maccasi macca na7a yeliko, ba kushe meto be7ida wode iya tuna gididaysada nam7u saaminta gakanaw iya tuna gidana. Hessafe guye, ba yelo suuthay xiz7ana gakanaw usupun tammanne usupun gallas gam7o.
LEV 12:6 “Maccasiya adde na7a woyko macca na7a yelada ba geeyiya wodiya ongidaape guye, xuussa yarshos issi laytha dorsenne nagara yarshos qassi issi holle woyko issi kuraacho Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen de7iya kahiniyako eho.
LEV 12:7 Kahiney hessa ekidi Godaa sinthan I nagaraa atotethas yarshees. Hessafe guye, iya geeyana. Adde na7a woyko macca na7a yeliya maccasas de7iya wogay haysa.
LEV 12:8 “Shin iya issi laytha dorse ehanaw danda7onna ixiko, nam7u holleta woyko nam7u kuraachota eho. Entafe issoy xuussa yarshos, qassi issoy nagara yarshos gido. Hessada oothidi kahiney I nagaraa atotethas yarshees; iyaka geeshshi gidana.”
LEV 13:1 Goday Musekonne Aaronako haysada yaagis;
LEV 13:2 “Issi asa asatethaa bolla kixi wodhiko woyko shattoy woyko iralley keyiko iya gogay hargen laametiko, he uraa kahiniya Aaronako woyko kahine gidida iya adde naytape issuwako eho.
LEV 13:3 Kahiney iya goga bolla de7iya madunthaa be7o. He madunxida bessan de7iya ikisey booxikonne madunthay ollatiko, hessi goga harge. Kahiney hessa be7idi uray tuna gideysa eriso.
LEV 13:4 Shin iya gogaa bolla de7iya madunthay boothi gididi, gogaape kanthidi ollatiboonaba gidiko he madunthaa bolla de7iya ikisey booxonnaba gidiko, kahiney he uraa dumma keethan laapun gallas gordidi wotho.
LEV 13:5 Laapuntha gallas kahiney iya zaaridi be7o; I be7iya wode madunthay uraa gogaa bolla dalgonna kaseysda de7iko, kahiney he uraa nam7antho dumma keethan laapun gallas gordidi wotho.
LEV 13:6 Qassika laapuntha gallas kahiney iya be7o; I be7iya wode madunthay dalgonna ixidi dhayi dhayi biiko, kahiney I tuna gideysa eriso. Hessi goo7o gideysa eriso; he uray ba ma7uwa meeccidi tuna gidonaysa erisees.
LEV 13:7 Shin I geeyanaw bana kahiniya bessidaape guye, he goo7oy iya gogaa bolla dalgi dalgi biiko I zaaridi bana bessanaw kahiniyako boo.
LEV 13:8 Kahiney iya be7o; he goo7oy uraa gogaa bolla dalgi dalgi biiko, hessi goga harge gidiya gisho kahiney I tuna gideysa eriso.
LEV 13:9 “Oonika goga hargen oyketiko iya kahiniyako eho.
LEV 13:10 Kahiney iya be7iya wode iya gogaa bolla bootha kixi de7iko, ikisey boothi laammikonne he kixa giddon ashoy bentiko,
LEV 13:11 hessi gogaa bolla gam7ida harge gidiya gisho, kahiney I tuna gideysa eriso. I tuna gideysi eretida gisho, iya dumma keethan gordidi wothanaw koshshenna.
LEV 13:12 Kahiney goga hargey addiya asatethaa bolla dalgiko, huuphepe toho gakanaw ubbaa ma77idaba gidiko be7o.
LEV 13:13 He goga hargey iya asatethaa ubbaa ma7iko, iya asatethay kumethi laametidi boothi gidida gisho, I tuna gidonaysa kahiney eriso.
LEV 13:14 Shin he maduntha giddora ashoy bentiko I tuna.
LEV 13:15 Kahiney he ashuwa be7idi he uray tuna gideysa eriso. He ashoy goga harge gidiya gisho I tuna.
LEV 13:16 Shin he ashoy qassika laametidi booxiko, he uray kahiniyako bo.
LEV 13:17 Kahiney iya be7o; iya madunthay booxidaba gidiko, he uray tuna gidonaysa kahiney eriso; I tuna gidana.
LEV 13:18 “Issi asa bolla merkoy wodhidi paxidaba gidiko,
LEV 13:19 iya bessan bootha kixay wodhiko woyko zo77ida iralley keyiko he uray kahiniyako bo.
LEV 13:20 Kahiney iya be7o; he madunthay ollatiko, madunthaa bolla de7iya ikisey laametidi booxiko, he uray tuna gideysa kahiney eriso. Hessi merkoda doomida goga harge.
LEV 13:21 Shin kahiney be7iya wode ikisey booxonnaba gidiko, madunthay gogaa kanthidi ollatiboonaba gidiko, qassi dhayi dhayi biiko, kahiney iya dumma keethan laapun gallas gordidi wotho.
LEV 13:22 Hessi iya gogaa bolla dalgi dalgi biiko, hessi goga harge gidiya gisho he uray tuna gideysa kahiney eriso.
LEV 13:23 Shin he iralley dalgi dalgi boonna issi bessan de7iko, hessi merkoy paxida beeta gidiya gisho, he uray tuna gidonaysa eriso.
LEV 13:24 “Tami issi asi miiko he mida bessan bootha woyko zo7o iralley keyiko,
LEV 13:25 kahiney he bessa be7o. He bessan de7iya ikisey booxikonne he madunthay ollatiko, hessi goga harge. I tamay mida bessaara keyida gisho kahiney I tuna gideysa eriso.
LEV 13:26 Shin kahiney be7iya wode he madunthaa bolla de7iya ikisey booxonnaba gidiko, madunthay gogaa kanthidi ollatiboonaba gidikonne qassi dhayi dhayi bidaba gidiko, kahiney iya dumma keethan laapun gallas gordidi wotho.
LEV 13:27 Laapuntha gallas kahiney iya be7iya wode he bessay dalgi dalgi biiko, hessi goga harge gidiya gisho I tuna gideysa kahiney eriso.
LEV 13:28 Shin he madunthay gogaa bolla dalgonna aggidi issi bessan uttikonne dhayi dhayi biiko, hessi tamay mida bessan attida beeta gidiya gisho, I tuna gidonaysa kahiney eriso.
LEV 13:29 “Issi addey woyko maccasa huuphen woyko gaco bolla madunthi keyiko,
LEV 13:30 kahiney he madunthaa be7iya wode madunthay gogaa kanthidi ollatiko iya bolla de7iya ikisey lee7idi galal7o daaniko, hessi huuphen woyko gaco bolla keyiya qaachiya goga harge gidiya gisho, he uray tuna gideysa kahiney eriso.
LEV 13:31 Qassi kahiney he hargiya be7iya wode gogaa kanthidi ollatiboonaba gidiko, kareetha ikisey iya bolla dhayiko, he qaachiya hargey de7iya uraa kahiney dumma keethan laapun gallas gordidi wotho.
LEV 13:32 Laapuntha gallas kahiney he hargiya be7iya wode qaachiya hargey dalgonnaba gidiko, iya bolla galal7o daaniya ikisey baynaba gidikonne gogaa kanthidi ollatiboonaba gidiko,
LEV 13:33 he ura qaachiya bessan de7iya ikisiya gidonashin, madunthaa yuushon de7iya ikisiya meedo. Kahiney he uraa dumma keethan hara laapun gallas gordidi wotho.
LEV 13:34 Laapuntha gallas kahiney he qaachiya bessaa be7iya wode uraa galbaa bolla dalgonna ixikonne gogaa kanthidi ollatonna ixiko, he uray tuna gidonaysa kahiney eriso. Uray ba ma7uwa meeccidi geeshshi gidana.
LEV 13:35 Shin I geeydaape guye, qaachiya hargey he uraa galba bolla dalgi dalgi biiko,
LEV 13:36 kahiney iya be7iya wode he qaachiya hargey dalgidaba gidiko, he uray tunida gisho kahiney galal7o daaniya ikisiya koyopo.
LEV 13:37 Shin kahiney be7iya wode he qaachiya bessay dalgonnaba gidikonne kareetha ikisey iya bolla dolidaba gidiko, he qaachiya bessay paxis. He uray tuna gidonna gisho, I geeshshi gideysa kahiney eriso.
LEV 13:38 “Issi adde woyko maccasa goga bolla bootha iralley keyiko,
LEV 13:39 kahiney be7iya wode enta gogaa bolla de7iya iralley bulla gidiko, hessi gogaa bolla coo keydaba gidiya gisho he uray tuna gidenna.
LEV 13:40 “Issi asas huuphe binaanay qoqofetiko, bo77a gideesipe attishin, I tuna gidenna.
LEV 13:41 Issi asi sinthara bo77atiko, iya tiishshi misipe attishin, I tuna gidenna.
LEV 13:42 Shin iya bo77i woyko tiishshi midaysa bolla zo7o woyko bootha madunthi keyiko, hessi iya bo77an woyko iya tiishsha bolla keyida goga harge.
LEV 13:43 Iya kahiney be7iya wode iya bo77i woyko tiishshi midaysa bolla de7iya madunthay galba bolla keyiya goga harge mela zo7o gidiko,
LEV 13:44 he uray tuma goga hargen oyketida hargancho. I tuna gidiya gishonne iya hargey iya huuphen de7iya gisho I tuna gideysa kahiney eriso.
LEV 13:45 “Goga hargey oykida asi peedhetida ma7o ma7o; ba huuphiya pixopo; ba doona kammo; ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, ‘Taani tuna, taani tuna!’ yaago.
LEV 13:46 He hargey iya bolla de7ida wode ubban I tuna. I tuna gidiya gisho, asaape shaaketidi, gutaape karen barka de7o.
LEV 13:47 “Ay ma7o bolla buuqida bessi bentiko, he ma7oy suufe gidin woyko liino gidin,
LEV 13:48 qacinape woyko shalope dadetida liino woyko suufe gidin, galba woyko galbafe oosetida ma7o gidin,
LEV 13:49 he ma7uwa bolla bentida buuqay ciliilo woyko zo7o mala bessiko, I qacinape woyko shalope dadetidaba gidin, galba woyko galbafe oosetidaba gidin, hessi asape ase oykiya harge gidiya gisho, hessa kahiney bessanaw koshshees.
LEV 13:50 Kahiney he buuqa be7idi, he buuqida ma7uwa dumma keethan laapun gallas gordidi wotho.
LEV 13:51 Laapuntha gallas kahiney he ma7uwa be7iya wode he ma7uwa bolla de7iya buuqay dalgi dalgi biiko, I qacina woyko shalo gidin, galba woyko galbafe oosetida ma7o gidin, hessi issuwafe issuwa oykiya buuqa harge gidiya gisho he ma7oy tuna.
LEV 13:52 He ma7oy qacina woyko shalo gidin, liino woyko suufe gidin, galbafe oosetidaba ayba gidin, kahiney iya xuuggo. Hessi issuwafe issuwa oykiya buuqa harge gidiya gisho, I xuugetanaw bessees.
LEV 13:53 “Shin kahiney be7iya wode he buuqa ma7uwa bolla dalgiboonaba gidiko, I qacina woyko shalo woyko galbafe oosetidaba ayba gidin,
LEV 13:54 he buuqay de7iya ma7uwa meeccana mela kahiney kiitto. Hessafe guye, he ma7uwa dumma keethan hara laapun gallas gordidi wotho.
LEV 13:55 He ma7oy meecetidaape guye qassika kahiney be7iya wode he buuqay ba malaa laammonnabaa gidikonne dalgi dalgi boonna ixikoka I tuna. He buuqa bessay ma7uwas guye baggara woyko sintha baggara de7ikoka he ma7oy taman xuugetanaw koshshees.
LEV 13:56 Shin he ma7uwa meecci simmin kahiney be7iya wode buuqay dhayi dhayi biiko, I galba gidin, qacina woyko shalo gidin, he buuqay de7iya bessaa kahiney daakidi kesso.
LEV 13:57 Hessafe guye, ma7uwa bolla simmidi keyiko, he ma7oy qacina woyko shalo gidin, galbafe oosetidaba gidin, hessi dalgi dalgi biiko he buuqay de7iya ma7oy taman xuugetanaw bessees.
LEV 13:58 Shin meecetida ma7oy qacina woyko shalo gidin, woyko galbafe oosetidaba ma7o gidin, buuqa malay dhayiko, he ma7oy nam7antho meeceto; Hessafe guye, I geeyees” yaagis.
LEV 13:59 Issi ma7oy suufe woyko liino gidin, qacina woyko shalo gidin, woyko galbafe oosetidaba gidin, he ma7uwa geeshshi woyko tuna yaagisanaw danda7iya wogay haysa.
LEV 14:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 14:2 Goga hargey oykida uray geeyiya gallas oothanaw koshshiya wogay haysa. He uraa kahiniyako ehanaw koshshees.
LEV 14:3 Kahiney gutaape gaxaa keyidi iya hargiya be7o. I be7iya wode goga hargey uraa asatethafe dhayidabaa gidiko,
LEV 14:4 kahiney nam7u tuna gidonna kafota, ziga mitha qanxo, zo7o qacinanne hisoophe bonco he hargiyafe geeyiya uraa gisho ehana mela kiitto.
LEV 14:5 Hessafe guye, kahiney nam7u kafotape issuwa pultofe duuqidi keren qolida haatha bolla shukana mela kiitto.
LEV 14:6 Hanko kafuwa zo7o qacinaranne hisoophe boncora ekidi, keren de7iya pulto haatha bolla shukida kafuwa suuthan naaqo.
LEV 14:7 He suuthaa, he goga hargiyafe geeyiya uraa bolla laapun toho wurxo; he uray tuna gidonaysa eriso; paxa de7iya kafuwa demba yeddo.
LEV 14:8 He hargiyafe geeyiya uray ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatethaa bolla de7iya ikise ubbaa meedeto; ba asatethaa meeceto. Hessafe guye, I geeyidi guta gelo, shin ba dunkaaniya giddo gelonna laapun gallas karen gam7o.
LEV 14:9 Laapuntha gallas ba huuphiya, buuchaa, deemuwanne ba asatethaa bolla de7iya hara ikise ubbaa meedeto; qassi ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatethaka meeceto; Hessafe guye, I geeshshi gidana.
LEV 14:10 Hospuntha gallasan borey bayna nam7u urge dorsatanne issi laythi gidida issi macca dorse eho. Qassi katha yarshos zaytera munuqetida heedzu kilo giraame lo77o dhiillenne issi litiro zaytepe siko eho.
LEV 14:11 Iya geeshshiya kahiney uraanne I ehida yarshotara issife Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen Godaa sinthan shiisho.
LEV 14:12 Kahiney nam7u dorsa urgetape issuwa ekidi, issi litiros siko zaytera issife naaqo yarsho oothidi shiisho; he shiiqida yarshuwa yuusho yarsho oothidi Godaa sinthan shiisho.
LEV 14:13 Yaatidi, I he dorsa urgiya nagara yarshonne xuussa yarsho shukiya geeshsha bessan shuko. Nagara yarshuwa mela naaqo yarshoyka kahiniyas imetees; ika ubbaafe aadhida geeshshi.
LEV 14:14 Kahiney naaqo yarshuwa suuthaafe guuthi ekidi, he geeyiya uraas ushacha bagga haythaa, ushacha kushiya wogga biradhiyanne ushacha tohuwa wogga biradhiya tiyo.
LEV 14:15 Hessafe guye, kahiney zaytiyape guuthara ekidi, ba haddirsa kushiya qaaqan tigo.
LEV 14:16 He haddirsa kushiya qaaqan de7iya zaytiya ba ushacha kushe biradhiya yeddi yeddi ekidi, Godaa sinthan laapun toho wurxo.
LEV 14:17 Yaatidi, ba kushiya qaaqan de7iya zaytiyape ekidi, geeyiya uraas ushacha haytha, ushacha kushiya wogga biradhiyanne ushacha tohuwa wogga biradhiya kase naaqo yarshuwa suuthaa tiyida bessan tiyo.
LEV 14:18 Qassi ba kushiya qaaqan attida zaytiya kahiney geeyiya uraa huuphen gusso; yaatidi Godaa sinthan he uraa nagaraa atto yaagiso.
LEV 14:19 Hessafe guye kahiney geeyiya uraa nagara atotethas shiiqida yarshuwa yarshees; kallidi qassi xuussa yarshos shiiqida mehiya shukees.
LEV 14:20 Kahiney xuussa yarshuwa katha yarshuwara issife yarsho bessan wothidi xuuggees; yaatidi uraa nagaraa atto yaagisees; he uray geeyees.
LEV 14:21 Shin uray hessa ubbaa ehanaw danda7onna manqo gidiko, Godaa sinthan iya nagaraa atotethas yuushshanaw naaqo yarshos issi dorsa urge eho. Katha yarshos zaytera munuqetida issi kilo giraame lo77o dhiillenne issi litiro zaytepe sikuwa eho.
LEV 14:22 Baw danda7etida mela nam7u holle woyko nam7u kuraacho issuwa nagaraa yarshos, issuwa xuussa yarshos eho.
LEV 14:23 Hospuntha gallas ba tunatethaafe geeyiya uray Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen Godaa sinthe ehidi kahiniyas immo.
LEV 14:24 Kahiney naaqo yarshos yida dorsa urgiyanne zaytiya ekidi, yuusho yarsho oothidi Godaa sinthan yuushsho.
LEV 14:25 Naaqo yarshos yida dorsa urgiya shuko; He urgiya suuthaafe guuthara ekidi, ha geeyiya uraa ushacha haytha, ushacha kushiya wogga biradhiyanne ushacha tohuwa wogga biradhiya tiyo.
LEV 14:26 Kahiney zaytiyape guuthara ba haddirsa kushiya qaaqan tigo.
LEV 14:27 Haddirsa kushiya qaaqan de7iya zaytiyape ushacha kushiya biradhiya yeddi ekidi, Godaa sinthan laapun toho wurxo.
LEV 14:28 Kahiney ba kushiya qaaqan de7iya zaytiyape guuthara ekidi, geeyiya uraas ushacha haytha, ushacha kushiya wogga biradhiyanne ushacha tohuwa wogga biradhiya kase naaqo yarsho suuthaa tiyida bessan tiyo.
LEV 14:29 Godaa sinthan uraa nagaraa atotethas kahiney ba kushen attida zaytiya geeyiya uraa huuphen tigo.
LEV 14:30 Hessafe guye, geeyiya uray baw danda7etidaysa mela holle woyko kuraacho eho.
LEV 14:31 Issuwa nagara yarshos nam7anthuwa xuussa yarshos katha yarshuwara issife shiisho. Kahiney geeyiya uraa nagaraa Godaa sinthan iya nagaraa atto yaagiso.
LEV 14:32 Ba asatethaa bolla de7iya goga hargiyafe geeyanaw manqotethi diggida uraas de7iya wogay haysa.
LEV 14:33 Goday Musekonne Aaronako haysada yaagis;
LEV 14:34 “Taani hintew immiya Kanaane biitta hinte geliya wode he biittan de7iya hinte keethafe issuwan taani buuqa yeddiya wode,
LEV 14:35 he uray kahiniyako bidi, ‘Ta keetha bolla buuqa daaniyabay de7ees’ yaagidi odo.
LEV 14:36 Kahiney soo gelidi buuqa qommuwa be7anaape kasetidi, son de7iyabay ubbay tuna geetetonna mela son de7iyaba ubbaa kare kessana mela kiitto; hessafe guye, kahiney be7anaw soo gelo.
LEV 14:37 I gelidi be7iya wode buuqay godaa bolla ciliilo woyko zo7o malla bessikonne qassi godaa midi ollayidi giddo geliko,
LEV 14:38 kahiney kare keyidi, keethaa laapun gallas gakanaw gordo.
LEV 14:39 Laapuntha gallasan kahiney he keethaa zaaridi xeelliya wode he buuqay keetha godaa bolla dalgiko,
LEV 14:40 buuqay de7iya shucha ubbaa godaape shoddidi, katamaape gaxa kessidi tuna bessan yeggana mela kiitto.
LEV 14:41 Kaallidi godaa meeshida urqa soo baggara bookidi, yuushshi aathidi qoqofana mela ootho; yaatidi he urqa katamaape gaxan de7iya tuna bessan yeggo.
LEV 14:42 Hessafe guye, he shodetida shuchata bessan hara shuchata wotho; hara urqan keethaa meesho.
LEV 14:43 “Shuchay shodetin, urqay qoqofetin, hara urqa meeshi simmin, buuqay keethaa giddon zaari bentiko,
LEV 14:44 kahiney hessa be7o. I be7iya wode buuqay he keethaa giddon dalgiko, hessi asape ase oykiya buuqa harge gidiya gisho he kathay tuna.
LEV 14:45 Hessa gisho, he keethaa, iya shuchaa, iya mithaanne I meeshetida urqa ubbaa laallidi katamaape gaxa efidi, tuna bessan yeggo.
LEV 14:46 He keethay gordan gam7iya wode iya gido geliya oonika omarsi gakanaw tuna.
LEV 14:47 He keethan aqiya woyko kathi miya uray ba ma7uwa meecco.
LEV 14:48 “Shin kahiney yidi xeelliya wode keethay meeshetidi simmin, zaaridi dalgonna ixiko, buuqay dhayida gisho, he keethay tuna gidonaysa kahiney eriso.
LEV 14:49 Keethaa geeshshanaw nam7u kafota, ziga mitha qanxo, zo7o qacinanne hisoophe bonco eho.
LEV 14:50 Kafotape issuwa pultofe duuqidi keren qolida haathan shuko.
LEV 14:51 Hessafe guye, zigaa, hisoophe boncuwa, zo7o qacinanne paxa de7iya kafuwa ekidi, keren de7iya shuketida kafuwa suuthaninne pulto haathan yeddi ekidi laapun toho he keethaa wurxo.
LEV 14:52 Yaatidi, kahiney he keethaa kafuwa suuthan, pulto haathan, paxa de7iya kafuwan, ziga mithan, hisoophe boncuwaninne zo7o qacinan geeshsho.
LEV 14:53 Paxa de7iya kafuwa katamaape gaxa yeddo. Hessada oothidi, keethaa geeshshiya wogaa polees; keethay geeshshi gidees.
LEV 14:54 “Dumma dumma goga hargeesinne goo7o hargees imetida wogay haysa.
LEV 14:55 Ma7o bolla woyko keetha bolla keyiya buuqa harge gidin,
LEV 14:56 kixa gidin, merko gidin, iralle gidin,
LEV 14:57 issibay tuna gideysanne tuna gidonnaysa erisiya wogay haysa.”
LEV 15:1 Goday Musekonne Aaronako haysada yaagis;
LEV 15:2 Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagidi odite; “Issi asa asatethafe goggiyabay de7iko hessi tuna.
LEV 15:3 Goggiyabay de7iya uraa tuna oothiya wogay haysa; he goggiyabay aggin, aggonna ixin, he uraa tuna oothees.
LEV 15:4 “Iya asatethafe goggiyabay de7iya uray zin7iya hiixaynne uttiya oyde ubbay tuna.
LEV 15:5 Iya hiixa bochiya oonika ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatethaka meeceto; yaatidi omarsi gakanaw tuna gidees.
LEV 15:6 Goggiyabay de7iya uray uttidaba bolla uttiya oonika ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatethaka meeceto; yaatidi omarsi gakanaw tuna gidees.
LEV 15:7 “Goggiyabay de7iya uraa asatethaa bochiya oonika ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatethaa meeceto; yaatidi omarsi gakanaw I tuna gidees.
LEV 15:8 “Goggiyabay de7iya asi tuna gidonna asa bolla cutiko, he uray ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatethaka meeceto; yaatidi omarsi gakanaw I tuna gidees.
LEV 15:9 “Goggiyabay de7iya uray uttiya toga koori tuna.
LEV 15:10 Iyape garsara de7iyaba bochiya oonika omarsi gakanaw tuna gidees; qassi hessa tookiya oonika ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatetha meeceto; yaatidi omarsi gakanaw I tuna gidees.
LEV 15:11 “Goggiyabay de7iya asi ba kushiya meecetonna bochiya asi oonika ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatethaa meeceto; yaatidi omarsi gakanaw tuna gidees.
LEV 15:12 “Goggiyabay de7iya uray bochiya oto ubbaa menthite; mithafe oosetida miishe ubbay haathan meeceto.
LEV 15:13 “Goggiyabay de7iya asi he gogiyabape geeyida wodepe laapun gallas gam7o. Ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatethaa pulto haathan meeceto; yaatidi I geeshshi gidees.
LEV 15:14 Hospuntha gallasan nam7u holleta woyko nam7u kuraachota ekidi, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya penge, Godaa sinthe ehidi kahiniyas immo.
LEV 15:15 Kahiney holletape issuwa nagara yarshos, issuwa qassi xuussa yarshos yarshees; yaatidi kahiney uraa asatethafe goggiyaba gisho Godaa sinthan iya nagaraa atto yaagisees.
LEV 15:16 “Issi addefe iya atunthay gukiko, ba kumetha asatethaka meeceto; yaatidi omarsi gakanaw I tuna gidees.
LEV 15:17 Atunthay bochida ma7o ubbay woyko galba ubbay haathan meeceto; yaatidi omarsi gakanaw tuna gidees.
LEV 15:18 Issi addey maccara aqin, iya atunthay gukiko, nam7ayka haathan meeceto; yaatidi omarsi gakanaw enti tuna gidoosona.
LEV 15:19 “Issi maccasi ba kushe meto be7iko, laapun gallas gakanaw iya tuna; iyo bochiya oonika omarsi gakanaw tuna.
LEV 15:20 “Ba kushe meto wode iya zin7iya hiixaynne iya uttiya oydey ubbay tuna.
LEV 15:21 Iya zin7iya hiixa bochiya ubbay ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatethaka meeceto; yaatidi omarsi gakanaw tuna gido.
LEV 15:22 Iya uttiyaba bochiya ubbay ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatethaa meeceto; yaatidi omarsi gakanaw tuna gido.
LEV 15:23 Iya zin7iya hiixa gidin woyko iya uttiyaba bochiya oonika omarsi gakanaw tuna.
LEV 15:24 “Issi maccasi kushe metora de7iya wode addey iira aqiko, he kushe metuwa I bochiko, laapun gallas gakanaw I tuna gidees; I zin7iya hiixa ubbay tuna gidees.
LEV 15:25 “Issi maccasi, ba kushe meto wodey aadhin, suuthi aggonna goggiko woyko kushe meto wodey ba qammafe aadhidi goggiko, kushe meto wode iya tuna gididaysada suuthay eqana gakanaw iya tuna gidawusu.
LEV 15:26 Suuthi iipe goggiya wode iya zin7iya hiixa ubbay, ba kushe meto be7iya wode iya zin7ida hiixa melanne iya uttiya oydiya mela tuna gidees.
LEV 15:27 He tunidabata bochiya oonika tuna gidiya gisho I ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatethaa meeceto; yaatidi omarsi gakanaw tuna gidees.
LEV 15:28 “Iipe goggiya suuthay eqiko, iya he wodepe doomada laapun gallas gam7o; hessafe guye, iya geeshshi gidana.
LEV 15:29 Hospuntha gallas iya nam7u holleta woyko nam7u kuraachota ehada Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen kahiniyas immo.
LEV 15:30 Kahiney holletape issuwa nagaraa yarshos, issuwa xuussa yarshos yarsho. Yaatidi, kahiney iipe goggiya tunatethaa gisho Godaa sinthan I nagaraa atto yaagisees.
LEV 15:31 “Isra7eele asay banta giddon de7iya Geeshsha Dunkaaniya tunisidi, hayqonna mela neeni haysada oothada enti bantana tunisiyabape dummayidi daana mela naaga.”
LEV 15:32 Iya asatethafe goggiyabay de7iya asas, iya atunathay gukin tuniya addes,
LEV 15:33 ba kushe meto gaason tuniya maccasas, adde gidin macca gidin goggiyabay de7iya asaasinne tunida maccara aqiya addes imetida wogay haysa.
LEV 16:1 Aarona adde nayti nam7ay Godaa sinthe shiiqidi hayqidaape guye, Goday Museko haysada yaagis:
LEV 16:2 Taani Taabotiya nagara atotetha kamaa bolla shaaran gidada qonciya gisho magarajuwafe guyen de7iya Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa ba koyida wode gelidi hayqonna mela ne ishaa Aaronas oda.
LEV 16:3 Aaroni nagaraa yarshos issi wofaano, xuussa yarshos issi maraze ekidi Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa gelo.
LEV 16:4 Aaroni liinope oosetida geeshsha adussa qamisenne garsara ma7etiya ma7o ma7o. Liinope oosetida danco danco; hessada ba huuphen liinope oosetida xaatha qace wotho. He ma7oti geeshshi gidiya gisho, ma7anape sinthe ba asatethaa meeceto.
LEV 16:5 Isra7eele maabaray nagara yarshos nam7u koleta, xuussa yarshos issi maraze Aaronas eho.
LEV 16:6 Aaroni ba nagarasinne ba soo asaa nagaraa atotethas issi wofaano yarsho.
LEV 16:7 Hessafe guye, nam7u koleta Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen Godaa sinthe eho.
LEV 16:8 He nam7u deeshata ekidi issuwa Godaasa, issuwa qassi Azaazelasa gidi enta bolla saama yeggo.
LEV 16:9 Aaroni saaman Godaas gidida deesha ekidi nagara yarsho oothidi yarsho.
LEV 16:10 Shin saaman Azaazelas gidida deesha asa nagaraa atotethas mela biitta yeddanaw paxa de7ishin Godaas shiisho.
LEV 16:11 Aaroni ba nagarasinne ba soo asaa nagaraa atotethas issi wofaano nagaraa yarsho oothidi shiisho. Yaatidi ba nagaraa gisho he wofaanuwa shuko.
LEV 16:12 Godaa sinthan de7iya yarsho bessaafe ixaane cuyisiya miishen bonqo kunthidi, liiqidi gaacetida sawiya ixaane nam7u kuuca ekidi magarajuwa giddo gelo.
LEV 16:13 Godaa sinthan de7iya taman ixaane wotho. I hayqonna mela ixaaniya cuyay Taabotiya bolla de7iya nagara atotetha kamaa kammo.
LEV 16:14 Wofaanuwa suuthaafe guuthara ekidi, ba biradhiya yeddi ekidi atotetha kamaa sintha baggaa wurxo. Nagara atotetha kamaa sintha baggara de7iya bessaa laapun toho wurxo.
LEV 16:15 Hessafe guye, asaa nagaraa gisho gidiya deesha shukidi, iya suuthaa magarajuwa giddo ehidi, wofaanuwa suutha wurxidaysada nagara atotetha kamaanne Taabotiya sinthaa wurxo.
LEV 16:16 Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa Isra7eele asaa tunatethafenne nagarape geeshshees. Enti tunabaa oothishin, enta giddon de7iya Geeshsha Dunkaaniya haysada oothidi geeshsho.
LEV 16:17 Aaroni Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa gelidi, ba nagaraa, ba soo asaa nagaraanne kumetha Isra7eele asaa nagaraa atotethas yarshidi keyana gakanaw, oonika geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon de7opo.
LEV 16:18 Hessafe guye, Godaa sinthan de7iya yarsho bessa keyidi iya geeshsho. Wofaanuwa suuthaafenne deesha suuthaafe guuthara ekidi, yarsho bessa yuushuwan de7iya kaceta tiyo.
LEV 16:19 He suuthan ba biradhiya yeddi ekidi laapun toho wurxo; hessada oothidi Isra7eele asaa tunatethaafe he yarsho bessa geeshsho.
LEV 16:20 Aaroni Ubbaafe Geeshsha bessaa, geeshsha Dunkaaniyanne yarsho bessa geeshshiya wogaa polidaape guye, paxa de7iya deesha shiisho.
LEV 16:21 Aaroni ba nam7u kushiya paxa de7iya deesha huuphen wothidi, Isra7eele asaa naaqo ubbaa, enta makalla ubbaa, enta nagara ubbaa paaxo. Yaatidi he deesha huuphen hessa toosso; he deesha efana mela giigisida uraa bolla mela biitta yeddo.
LEV 16:22 Deeshay enta nagara ubbaa tookidi, asi bayna bessi mela biitta bo.
LEV 16:23 Hessafe guye, Aaroni Geeshsha Dunkaaniya bidi Ubbaafe Geeshsha bessaa gelo. Liinope oosetida kase I ma7idi gelida ma7uwa qaaridi yan wotho.
LEV 16:24 Geeshsha bessan ba asatethaa meecetidi, ba kase ma7uwa ma7i keyidi ba nagaraanne asaa nagaraa atotethas xuussa yarsho yarshsho.
LEV 16:25 Nagara yarshuwa modhuwa yarsho bessan xuuggo.
LEV 16:26 Bazzo yedetiya deesha efida uray ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatethaa meeceto; yaati simmidi guta gelo.
LEV 16:27 Nagara atotethas Aaroni enta suuthaa Ubbaafe Geeshsha bessaa ehida wofaanuwanne deesha galbaa, attida ashuwanne tociya gutaape gaxa kessidi xuuggo.
LEV 16:28 Hessa xuuggida uray ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatethaa meeceto; hessafe guye, gutaa gelo.
LEV 16:29 Haysi hintew merinaa woga gido; laapuntha ageenay gelida tammantho gallas hintena kawushite; biitta aawu na7a gidin woyko hara biitta asi gidin, ay oosoka oothopite.
LEV 16:30 Ayis giiko he gallasay hinte nagara atotethi demmiya gallas; hinte Godaa sinthan hinte nagara ubbaafe geeyana.
LEV 16:31 Hessi hintew gita Sambaata shempo gallas gidana. He gallas hintena kawushite; hessi hintew merinaa woga gido.
LEV 16:32 Qassi ba aawa bessan kahine gidana mela tiyetiyanne dummatiya kahiney geeshshi gidida liinope oosetida ma7uwa ma7idi, nagaraa atotetha wogaa polo.
LEV 16:33 I ubbaafe Geeshsha bessaa, Geshsha Dunkaaniya, yarsho bessa, kahinetanne Isra7eele asa ubbaa geeshsho.
LEV 16:34 Isra7eele asa ubbaa nagaraa atotethas laythan laythan issi toho oothanaw haysi hintew merina woga gido. Goday kiitidaysada Musey oothis.
LEV 17:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 17:2 “Aaronas iya adde naytasinne Isra7eele asa ubbaas haysada yaagada oda; Goday kiittidaysi haysa;
LEV 17:3 Isra7eele asaape oonika boori woyko maraze woyko kole gutan woyko gutaape gaxan shukidi,
LEV 17:4 Godaas imota oothidi immanaw Geeshsha Dunkaaniya penge Godaa sinthe ehonna ixiko, I he suuthan oyshetees. He uray suuthu gussida gisho ba asaa giddofe kuretto.
LEV 17:5 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele asay yarsho mehe coo denban shukeysa aggidi, Godaa sinthan Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen de7iya kahiniyako eho. Kahiney hessa ekidi, Godaas issifetetha yarsho oothidi shuko.
LEV 17:6 Kahiney Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen de7iya yarsho bessa bolla he suuthaa wurxo. Modhdhuwa Godaas sawo tonku giya yarsho oothidi xuuggo.
LEV 17:7 Isra7eele asay Godaa aggidi kaallida tuna ayyaanatas zaaridi banta yarshuwa yarshofo. Hessi entawunne yaana yeletethaa ubbaas merinaa woga gido.
