LEV 17:8 “Entako haysada yaaga; Isra7eele asaape gidin woyko enta giddon de7iya allaga biitta asape gidin, oonika xuussa yarsho woyko hara yarsho shiishiya wode,
LEV 17:9 Godaas yarshanaw Geeshsha Dunkaaniya penge ehonna ixiko, he uray ba asaa giddofe kuretto.
LEV 17:10 “Isra7eele asaape woyko enta giddon de7iya allaga biitta asaape oonika suuthu miiko, he suuthaa miya uraa bolla ta zoko zaarana; taani he uraa asaa giddofe kurana.
LEV 17:11 Ayis giiko asho ma7ida ubbaa de7oy iya suuthaa giddon de7ees; suuthi de7oy iya giddon de7iya gisho nagara atto giisees. Hinte nagara atotethas suuthu yarshana mela hintew immas.
LEV 17:12 Taani Isra7eele asaako, hintefe woyko hinte giddon de7iya allaga biitta asaape oonika suuthu moopo yaagiday hessa gishosa.
LEV 17:13 “Isra7eele asaape woyko enta giddon de7iya allaga biitta asaape oonika meetetiya do7a woyko kafo shankatidi wodhiko, iya suuthaa sa7an gussidi biitta kammo.
LEV 17:14 Ayis giiko asho ma7ida ubbaa de7oy iya suutha giddona. Asho ma7ida medhetethata ubbaa de7oy iya suutha giddon de7iya gisho, suuthu moopite; qassi miya oonika ba asaa giddofe kuretto yaagada Isra7eele asaas odas.
LEV 17:15 “Isra7eele asaa gidin woyko enta giddon de7iya allaga biitta asaa gidin, oonika bawuta woyko do7i wodhidaba miiko, ba ma7uwa meecco; ba asatethaa meeceto; yaatidi omarsi gakanaw tuna gidees. Hessafe guye, I geeshshi gidana.
LEV 17:16 Ba ma7uwa meecconna ixiko, ba asatethaa meecetonna aggiko, I ba nagaraa baw tookees.”
LEV 18:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 18:2 “Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 18:3 Hinte kase de7ida Gibxe asay ootheysada oothopite; woyko ha77i taani hintena gelsiya Kanaane biitta asay ootheysada oothopite; enta wogaa kaallopite.
LEV 18:4 Hinte ta kiitta oothite; ta wogaa naagite; taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 18:5 Ta kiitaanne ta wogaa naagite, hinte hessa oothiko de7on daana. Taani Godaa.
LEV 18:6 “Hintefe oonika ba mata dabbora xaallofo. Taani Godaa.
LEV 18:7 “Ne aayiw xaallada ne aawa kawushofa. Iya ne aayiw gidiya gisho iyo xaallofa.
LEV 18:8 “Ne aawa machiw xaallada ne aawa kawushofa.
LEV 18:9 “Ne michiw xaallofa; son yeletida woyko karen yeletida ne aawa na7iw woyko ne aaye na7iw xaallofa.
LEV 18:10 “Ne na7aa na7iw woyko ne na7e na7iw xaallada ne nena kawushofa.
LEV 18:11 “Ne micho gidiya gisho ne aawa mache na7iw xaallofa.
LEV 18:12 “Ne aawa michiw xaallofa; iya ne aawas mata dabbo.
LEV 18:13 “Ne aaye michiw xaallofa; iya ne aayes mata dabbo.
LEV 18:14 “Ne aawa ishaa machiw xaallofa; iya ne aawa ishaa machiw.
LEV 18:15 Ne na7aa machiw xaallofa; iya ne na7aa machiw.
LEV 18:16 “Ne ishaa machiw xaallada ne ishaa kawushofa.
LEV 18:17 “Aayiwunne I na7iw xaallofa; I na7e na7iw woyko I na7aa na7iw xaallofa. Enti iw mata dabbo gidiya gisho, hessi iita tuna.
LEV 18:18 “Ne machiya paxa de7ishin, ne mache michiw dawuthofa.
LEV 18:19 “Kushe metora de7iya maccasi xaallofa.
LEV 18:20 “Neeni tunonna mela ne shooruwa machiw xaallofa.
LEV 18:21 “Ne Xoossaa sunthay cayetonna mela ne naytape issuwa taman xuuggada, Moloka giya eeqas yarsho oothada immofa. Taani Godaa.
LEV 18:22 “Xoossa sinthan ixetidaba gidiya gisho maccasara gaheteysada addera gahetofa.
LEV 18:23 “Neeni tunonna mela mehera gahetofa; maccasi mehera gahetanaw mehe sinthe aadhofo. Hessi wogan baynaba.
LEV 18:24 “Taani hinte sinthafe yedethiya kawotethati he oosotan tunida gisho, hinte he oosotan enta mela tunopite.
LEV 18:25 Hari attoshin, biittayka tunida gisho, iya nagaraa gisho ta iya seeras. Biittiya banan de7ey asaa cuttasu.
LEV 18:26 Shin hinte ta higgiyanne ta kiita naagite. Hintena gidin woyko hinte giddon de7iya allaga biitta asaa gidin oonika hessa mela tuna ooso oothopite.
LEV 18:27 “Hintefe kase ha biittan de7ida asay hessa mela tunabaa oothida gisho, biittiya tunasu.
LEV 18:28 Hinte ha biitta tunisiko, hintefe kase de7ida kawotethata ha biittiya cuttidaysada hintenaka cuttonna mela naagetite.
LEV 18:29 Hessata daaniya tuna oosotape issuwaka oothiya asi de7iko, he uray ba asaa giddofe kuretto.
LEV 18:30 Hessa gisho, hintefe kase de7ida asati oothida tuna oosota ubbaa oothidi hinte tunonna mela ta kiitta naagite; taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa” yaagis.
LEV 19:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis.
LEV 19:2 Isra7eele asa ubbaas haysada yaagada oda; “Taani, Goday, hinte Xoossay, geeshshi gidiya gisho, hinteka geeshshi gidite.
LEV 19:3 “Hintefe issoy issoy ba aawanne ba aayiw boncho; ta Sambaata bonchite. Taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 19:4 “Tana aggidi eeqata goyinnofite; woyko biratape oosetida xoossata hintew oothopite. Taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 19:5 “Hinte issifetetha yarsho Godaas yarshiya wode he yarshoy hinte gisho eketana mela besseysada yarshite.
LEV 19:6 He yarshoy hinte yarshida gallas woyko wontetha gallas meeteto; heedzantho gallas gakanaw attiday de7iko taman xuugeto.
LEV 19:7 Heedzantho gallas meetetiko, hessi tunisiyaba; taani hessa ekike.
LEV 19:8 Hessa miya oonika Godaas geeshshi gididaba tunisida gisho ba nagaran oyshetana. He uray ba asaa giddofe kuretto.
LEV 19:9 “Hinte gaden kaxida kathaa hinte cakiya wode gadiya gaxaa gakanaw de7eysa cakofite; caki simmin de7iya poshiliya qoropite.
LEV 19:10 Ne woyne ayfiya maxiya wode mithaa bolla qosetidi attidaysa woyko sa7an wodhida woyne ayfiya maxopa. Hessa manqotasinne bete asaas aggaaga. Taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 19:11 “Kaysotopite. “Wordotopite. “Issoy issuwa cimmofite.
LEV 19:12 “Ta sunthan wordo caaqofite; hinte Xoossaa sunthaa tunisopite. Taani hinte Godaa.
LEV 19:13 “Ne shooruwa bolla gene oothofa; woyko iya bonqofa. “Une oothiya uraa damooziya diggada, issi qammaka ne matan aysopa.
LEV 19:14 “Tulliya cayopa; woyko qooqiya sinthan dhube wothofa, shin neeni Xoossas yayya. Taani ne Godaa.
LEV 19:15 “Pirda geellayopite; manquwa iya manqotetha gisho maaddada pirdofa; duriya iya duretetha gisho yayyada aggofa. Shin ne shooruwas suure pirda.
LEV 19:16 “Ne asaa giddon iita zigirsi ekada yuuyopa. “Ne shooruwa hayqos gathiyaba aykoka oothofa. Taani ne Godaa.
LEV 19:17 “Ne ishaa ne wozanan ixofa. Ne shooruwa gaason ne nagara oothonna mela iya hanqa.
LEV 19:18 “Halo keyopa; ne asaape issuwa bollaka shifopa. Shin ne shooruwa ne huupheda dosa. Taani ne Godaa.
LEV 19:19 “Ta kiitata naaga. “Issi qommo mehe hara qommo mehera biraysisopa. “Issi shooqan nam7u qommo zerethi zeropa. “Nam7u qommofe oosetida ma7o ma7ofa.
LEV 19:20 “Issi asi azinas oyshetada de7ishin, wozo miishey imetidi wuronnashin woyko la77a keyonnashin, he ayllera aqiko enti seeretanaw bessees, shin enti hayqanaw bessenna.
LEV 19:21 Gidoshin, he uray ba naaqo yarshos gidiya maraze Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen Godaa sinthe eho.
LEV 19:22 Kahiney he naaqo yarsho maraziya ekidi, ura nagara atotethas Godaa sinthan yarshees; iya nagaray atto geetetana.
LEV 19:23 “Hinte Kanaane biitta geliya wode ayfe immiya ay qommo mithi tokikoka, he mithaa ayfey meetetonna mela digetidaysa akeekite. Heedzu laythi wurana gakanaw he mithaa ayfey meetetofo.
LEV 19:24 Oyddantho laythan he mithaa ayfey Godaas galatas shiiqiya geeshsha yarsho gidana.
LEV 19:25 Ichashantho laythan he mithaa ayfiya miite. Hinte hessada oothiko, hinte mithaa ayfey darana. Taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 19:26 “Suuthi iya giddon de7iya asho moopite. Marotopite woyko bitopite.
LEV 19:27 “Hinte huuphe binaana garsara yuushshi aathidi ciiropite; hinte buuchaa yuushshi aathidi meedopite.
LEV 19:28 “Hayqida asa gisho hinte asatethaa gaaropite; woyko cacha beeta hinte asatethaa bolla medhofite. Taani ne Godaa.
LEV 19:29 “Biittiya laymatethaninne tunatethan kumonna mela ne macca na7iw laymatethas aatha immada tunisopa.
LEV 19:30 “Ta Sambaata bonchite; ta goyinnetiya bessaa bonchite. Taani Godaa.
LEV 19:31 “Moytille odisiya asaako woyko marotako boopite; hinte tunonna mela enta koyopite. Taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 19:32 “Dondza asinne cima asi be7iya wode uttida bessaafe denda eqada enta boncha; ne Xoossaas yayya. Taani Godaa.
LEV 19:33 “Hinte biittan de7iya bete ase sugopite.
LEV 19:34 Hinte biittan de7iya bete asi hinte gade asada xeellite; iya hinte huupheda dosite. Hinte kase Gibxe biittan bete asi gididi de7ideta. Taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 19:35 “Hinte wadhiyaban, makiyabaninne mizaanen wordotopite.
LEV 19:36 Hinte mizaaney, hinte makiyabaynne wadhiyabay issino gido. Taani hintena Gibxe biittafe kessada ehida Godaa hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 19:37 “Hinte ta higgiyanne ta kiitaa ubbaa naagitenne oothite. Taani Godaa.”
LEV 20:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis.
LEV 20:2 Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; “Isra7eele asaape gidin, woyko hinte giddon de7iya allaga asaape gidin, oonika ba na7a moloka geetetiya eeqas aathidi immiko, I hayqo; Isra7eele asay iya shuchan caddidi wodho.
LEV 20:3 Ba na7aa moloka geetetiya eeqas immidi ta Dunkaaniya tuniseynne ta geeshsha sunthaa kawushey ta sinthan ixetidaba gidana. Ta asaa giddofe shaakada taani iya dhaysana.
LEV 20:4 Shin he uraa Isra7eele asay be7ishe qelli gidi aadhikonne wodhonna ixiko,
LEV 20:5 taani he addiyanne iya soo asaa morkana; iyanne Moloka kaallidaysata enta deriya giddofe shaakada dhaysana.
LEV 20:6 “Oonika tana ammanetona ixidi moytille xeegikonne maro soo biiko, taani iyaw morke gidana; asaa giddofe iya dhaysana.
LEV 20:7 “Taani, Goday, hinte Xoossaa gidiya gisho, hinte hintena dummayite; geeshshi gidite.
LEV 20:8 Ta wogaa naagite; iya polite. Taani hintena geeshshiya, hinte Godaa.
LEV 20:9 “Oonika ba aawa woyko ba aayiw cayiko hayqo. I ba aawa woyko ba aayiw cayida gisho, iya suutha acoy iya bolla gido.
LEV 20:10 “Issi asi ba shooruwa machiw xaalliko, enti nam7ay hayqo.
LEV 20:11 Issi asi ba aawa machiw xaalliko, I ba aawa kawushis; enti nam7ay hayqo. Enta suuthaa acoy enta bolla gido.
LEV 20:12 Issi asi ba na7aa machiw xaalliko, enti nam7ay hayqo. Enti tunabaa oothidosona; enta suuthaa acoy enta bolla gido.
LEV 20:13 “Issi addey maccasara gaheteysada addera gahetiko, enti nam7ay ixetidaba oothida gisho hayqo. Enta suuthaa acoy enta bolla gido.
LEV 20:14 Issi asi na7iwunne aayiw macho ekiko, hessi tunabaa. Hinte giddon tunatethi doonna mela inne enti taman xuugeto.
LEV 20:15 “Issi asi mehera gahetiko, I hayqo; he miiziw wodhite.
LEV 20:16 Issi maccasi mehera gahetiko he maccasiyanne he mehey nam7ay hayqo; enta suuthaa acoy enta bolla gido.
LEV 20:17 “Issi asi ba aawa na7iw woyko ba aaye na7iw macho ekiko, hessi tunabaa. Enti banta asaa giddofe shaaketidi hayqo. I ba michiw kawushida gisho, ba nagaran baw oysheto.
LEV 20:18 Issi asi kushe metora de7iya maccasara aqiko, I qetha qaarida gisho, enti nam7ay banta asaa giddofe kuretto.
LEV 20:19 “Ne aaye michiw woyko ne aawa michiw xaallofa; hessa oothey ba mata dabbotetha kawushshees. Enti nam7ay banta nagaran oysheto.
LEV 20:20 Issi asi ba aawa ishaa machiw xaalliko, I ba aawa ishaa kawushis. Enti banta nagaran bantaw oysheto; enti nam7ay na7a yelonna hayqana.
LEV 20:21 Issi asi ba ishaa machiw ekiko, hessi tuna. I ba ishaa kawushis; enti nam7ay yelo dhayana.
LEV 20:22 “Hinte daana mela ta hintena gelsiya biittay hintena cuttonna mela hinte ta higgiyanne ta kiitaa naagite.
LEV 20:23 Taani hinte sinthafe dhaysiya asaa de7uwa wogaa kaallopite. Enti hessa ubbaa oothida gisho, ta enta ixas.
LEV 20:24 Hinte enta biitta laatana; maathinne eessi goggey biitta hintew immana. Taani hintena hara asaape dummayada kessida, Godaa hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 20:25 “Hessa gisho, hinte tunanne tuna gidonna mehetanne kafota shaakidi erite. Taani hessati hintew tuna gada wothida meheta, kafotanne biittan qaaxiyabata ubban hintena tunisopite.
LEV 20:26 Taani Goday geeshshi gidiya gishonne hinte tabaa gidana mela hintena hara asaape dummayida gisho, hinteka taw geeshshi gidite.
LEV 20:27 “Addey woyko macci moytillera haasayiko woyko marotiko, enti hayqanaw bessees. Enti shuchan cadetidi hayqo; enta suuthaa acoy enta bolla gido.”
LEV 21:1 Goday Museko, “Kahine gidida Aarona adde naytas haysada yaagada oda. Hintefe oonika
LEV 21:2 ba mata dabbo, ba aaye, ba aawa, ba adde na7aa, ba macca na7e, ba ishaa,
LEV 21:3 woyko azina gelonna, iya son de7iya ba miche aha gidonna ixiko, hayqida asa aha bochidi bana tunisopo.
LEV 21:4 Ekoninne gelon dabbotida asa aha bochidi bana tunisopo.
LEV 21:5 “Kahineti kayos banta huuphiyanne banta buuchaa meedopo; woyko banta asatethaa gaaropo.
LEV 21:6 Enti Godaas xuussa yarshonne katha yarsho shiishiya kahineta gidiya gisho banta Xoossaas geeshshi gido; banta Xoossaa sunthaa tunisopo. Hessa gisho, enti geeshshi gidanaw bessees.
LEV 21:7 “Kahineti banta Xoossaas geeshshi gidiya gisho, kahineti layma maccasi, geela7o gidonna maccasi woyko azini yeddida maccasi ekofo.
LEV 21:8 Kahineti hinte Xoossaas katha yarsho yarsheyisata gidiya gisho, hinte enta geeshshi oothidi ekite. Hintena geeshshiya Goday, taani, geeshshi gidiya gisho, enti geeshshi gido.
LEV 21:9 Kahiniya na7iya laymatada bana tunisiko, iya ba aawa kawushasu; iya taman xuugetada hayqo.
LEV 21:10 “Kahine halaqay, iya huuphen tiyo zaytey gukidaysinne kahinetetha ma7uwa ma7anaw dummatidaysi, ba huuphiyape xaatha qacciya denthofo; ba ma7uwa daakofo.
LEV 21:11 Ahi de7iya soo gelopo; hari attoshin ba aawa woyko ba aaye aha gidikoka, hessa bochidi bana tunisopo.
LEV 21:12 Iya dummayanaw tiyida Xoossaa zaytey iya bolla de7iya gisho, kahiney Geeshsha Dunkaaniyape keyopo; Geeshsha Dunkaaniya tunisopo. Taani Godaa.
LEV 21:13 “I ekiya machiya geela7o gido.
LEV 21:14 Azini hayqida maccasi woyko azini yeddida maccasi woyko layma maccasi macho ekofo. Shin ba asaa giddofe geela7o macca na7a dooridi macho eko.
LEV 21:15 Hessi hanonna ixiko, ba asaa giddon ba nayta tuna oothees. Taani iya geeshsheysa, iya Godaa.”
LEV 21:16 Goday Museko haysada yaagis.
LEV 21:17 “Neeni Aaronas haysada yaagada oda; ne kochaafe asatethan borey de7iya oonika katha yarsho taw yarshanaw bessenna.
LEV 21:18 Asatethan borey de7iya asi, hessika qooqe woyko wobbe woyko som7oy iitida asi woyko laqoy de7iya asi,
LEV 21:19 woyko tohoy woyko kushey silida asi,
LEV 21:20 woyko kuuna asi woyko daro qantha asi woyko ayfe mulca asi woyko puusoy oykida asi woyko iralley de7iya asi woyko shuufa asi taw katha yarsho yarshanaw bessenna.
LEV 21:21 Kahiniya Aarona kochaafe asatethan borey de7iya asi oonika Godaas xuussa yarshonne katha yarsho shiishanaw yarsho bessa yaanaw bessenna.
LEV 21:22 I geeshsha kathaanne Ubbaafe geeshshi gidida ba Xoossaa kathaa maanaw danda7ees.
LEV 21:23 Shin iya asatethan borey de7iya asi gidiya gisho, I ta Dunkaaniya tunisonna mela magarajuwako woyko yarsho bessaako shiiqopo. Entana geeshshiya Goday tana.”
LEV 21:24 Musey hessa ubbaa Aaronas, iya adde naytasinne Isra7eele asa ubbaas odis.
LEV 22:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 22:2 Ta geeshsha sunthaa enti tunisonna mela, Isra7eele asay taw dummayida imotata Aaroninne iya adde nayti bonchon ekidi, geeshshatethan naagana mela entaw oda. Taani Godaa.
LEV 22:3 Entako haysada yaaga; “Yaana yeletetha ubban hinte kochaafe oonika tunidi de7ishe, Isra7eele asay Godaas dummayida geeshsha yarshuwako shiiqiko, he uray ta sinthan bentofo. Taani Godaa.
LEV 22:4 “Aarona kochaafe goga hargey de7iya, woyko asatethafe goggiyabay de7iya oonika geeyana gakanaw geeshsha yarshuwa moopo. Aha bochidi tunidaba woyko iya atunthay gukida uraa bochiya oonika tuna.
LEV 22:5 Qassi sa7ara gooshetiya tunisiyabata, woyko aybibanka tuna gididaba bochiya oonika,
LEV 22:6 woyko hessa melaba bochiya oonika, omarsi gakanaw tuna gidees. I ba asatethaa haathan meecetonna de7ishe, geeshsha yarshuwafe maanaw koshshenna.
LEV 22:7 Awi wulliya wode I geeshshi gidees. Hessafe guye, he geeshsha yarshuwafe bana gakiya gishuwa mo.
LEV 22:8 Hayqidaba woyko do7i wodhida mehe asho moopo; hessi tunisiyaba. Taani Godaa.
LEV 22:9 “Kahineti ta wogaa naago; enti iya naagonna ixidi banta balan hayqana. Enta geeshshiya Goday tana.
LEV 22:10 “He geeshsha yarshuwa kahiniya soo asaape attishin, hara asi moopo. Kahiniya soo yida imathe gidin, qaxaretidi oothiya ase gidin moopo.
LEV 22:11 Shin kahiney ba biran shammida aylley woyko iya son yeletida aylley he kathaa mo.
LEV 22:12 Kahine gidonna asi gelida kahiniya na7iya he geeshsha yarshuwafe moopo.
LEV 22:13 Shin I azinay hayqiko woyko iyo yeddiko qassi iw na7i bayna ixiko, iya kase ba geela7otethan de7idaysada simmada ba aawa son de7iko, iya ba aawa gakeysafe mo. Shin hara asi oonika hessafe moopo.
LEV 22:14 “Issi asi eronna de7ishe geeshsha yarshuwafe miiko, he I mida kathaa gatiya bolla xeetaape laatamu kushe gujidi kahiniyas immo.
LEV 22:15 Isra7eele asay Godaas yarshiya geeshsha yarshuwa kahineti tunisopo.
LEV 22:16 Enti banta ehida geeshsha yarshuwa bantaw midi nagaran oyshetana mela oothofo. Enta geeshshiya Goday tana.”
LEV 22:17 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 22:18 “Aaronas, iya adde naytasinne Isra7eele asa ubbaas haysada yaagada oda; Isra7eele asi gidin woyko enta giddon de7iya bete asi gidin, oonika Godaas xuussa yarsho ba dosan immey woyko ba qangetha gathey,
LEV 22:19 he yarshoy eketana mela borey bayna wofaano, woyko maraze woyko kole eho.
LEV 22:20 Borey de7iya ay meheyka eketonna gisho hessa shiishopite.
LEV 22:21 “Issi asi ba qangetha gathanaw issifetetha yarsho Godaas yarshiya wode woyko ba mehiyape dosan imota Godaas shiishiya wode hessi eketana mela he mehey borey baynaba gido.
LEV 22:22 Hinte mehiyape qooqe woyko meqo woyko wobbe woyko giyiya madunthi woyko puusoy woyko shattoy de7iyaba Godaas yarshofite. Taman xuussa yarsho oothidi yarsho bessan Godaas shiishopite.
LEV 22:23 Iya bolla laqoy medheti woyko bolla paci de7iya korma woyko dorse issi asi ba dosan immiya yarsho shiishanaw danda7ees; shin qangetha gasos gidiko hessi eketenna.
LEV 22:24 Sanga woyko madunxidaba Godaas yarshofite. Hinte biittan hessa melaba oothopite.
LEV 22:25 Hinte giddon de7iya allaga asatape ekida hessa mela mehiya hinte Xoossaas katha yarsho oothidi shiishopite. Enta bolla borey de7iya gisho hinte gisho eketokona.”
LEV 22:26 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 22:27 “Boora na7i woyko marazey woyko koley yeletiya wode laapun gallas ba aayera gam7o. Hospuntha gallasape doomidi, Godaas xuussa yarsho oothidi shiishanaw danda7etees.
LEV 22:28 Miizi woyko dorse I maraara issi gallas shukofite.
LEV 22:29 “Hinte galata yarsho Godaas shiishiya wode hinte yarshoy eketana mela yarshite.
LEV 22:30 Yarshoy yarshetida gallas meetetidi wuranaw koshshees; iyape wontos ashshofite. Taani Godaa.
LEV 22:31 “Ta kiitta naagitenne polite. Taani Godaa.
LEV 22:32 Ta geeshsha sunthaa tunisopite. Ta geeshshi gideysi Isra7eele asaa giddon eretanaw bessees. Hintena geeshshiya Goday tana.
LEV 22:33 Hinte Xoosse gidanaw hintena Gibxe biittafe kessiday tana. Taani Godaa.”
LEV 23:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 23:2 Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; Geeshsha shiiqo yaagidi awaajishe, hinte bonchanaw bessiya eretida Godaa ba7aaleti haysata.
LEV 23:3 Hinte usupun gallas ooso ootheeta, shin laapuntha gallasay hinte shempiya Sambaata gallas. He gallas geeshsha shiiqo shiiqite; ay oosoka oothopite; hinte de7iya bessa ubban hessi Godaas Sambaata.
LEV 23:4 Enta woden woden geeshsha shiiqo oothidi hinte bonchanaw bessiya eretida Godaa ba7aaleti haysata;
LEV 23:5 Koyro ageenan tammanne oyddantho gallas sa7i omarsiya wode Godaa Paasikay doomees.
LEV 23:6 He ageenan tammanne ichashantho gallasan Godaas Uytha Ba7aale gallasay doomees. Hessa gisho, laapun gallasatan irshoy geliboonna uythi miite.
LEV 23:7 He gallasatape koyro gallas geeshsha shiiqo shiiqite; ooso oothopite.
LEV 23:8 Laapun gallas ubbaa Godaas xuussa yarsho yarshite; laapuntha gallasan geeshsha shiiqo shiiqite; ooso oothopite.
LEV 23:9 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 23:10 Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; taani hintew immiya biitta gelidi hinte kathi cakiya wode, he kathaa koyro mirqiya kahiniyas ehite.
LEV 23:11 Goday hintebaa ekana mela Sambaata kaalliya wontetha gallas kahiney he mirqiya Godaa sinthan dhoqu oothidi yuushsho.
LEV 23:12 Hinte mirqiya yuushshida he gallas borey bayna issi laytha maraze xuussa yarsho oothidi Godaas shiishite.
LEV 23:13 He yarshuwara issife shamaho zaytera munuqetida nam7u kilo giraame lo77o dhiille katha yarsho oothidi shiishite. Hessi Godaas sawo tonku giya xussa yarsho gidana; iyara issife issi litiro gidiya woyne ushshi shiishite.
LEV 23:14 Ha yarshuwa hinte, hinte Xoossaas shiishiya gallasay gakanaw, wacha kathaafe qaye woyko caaca woyko uukidi moopite. Hessi hinte de7iya bessa ubban yaana yeletethaas merinaa woga gido.
LEV 23:15 Hinte yuusho yarsho mirqiya ehida Sambaata wontetha gallasaape doomidi, laapun saaminta taybite.
LEV 23:16 Laapuntha Sambaata kaalliya wontetha gallasay gakanaw ishatamu gallas taybite; wacha kathaafe yarsho Godaas shiishite.
LEV 23:17 Hinte de7iya bessaafe nam7u kilo giraame gidiya lo77o dhiilliyan irsho yeggidi uukida nam7u uythi yuusho yarshos ekidi yiite. Hessi wacha kathaafe Godaas shiiqiya yarsho gidees.
LEV 23:18 He uythaara issife borey bayna issi laythi gidida laapun dorsa urgeta, issi wofaanonne nam7u marazeta shiishite. Enta katha yarshoranne ushsha yarshora issife Godaas xuugetiya sawo tonku giya yarsho oothidi yarshite.
LEV 23:19 Qassi issi kole nagara yarshos, issi laythi gidida nam7u dorsa urgeta issifetetha yarshos shiishite.
LEV 23:20 Kahiney bayra kathaa, uythaanne nam7u dorsa urgeta yuusho yarsho oothidi, Godaa sinthan dhoqu oothidi yuushsho. Hessati Godaas geeshshi; kahinetas qassi gisho.
LEV 23:21 He gallas hintew geeshsha shiiqo gidana mela awaajite; ooso oothopite. Haysi hinte de7iya bessa ubban yaana yeletethaas merinaa woga gido.
LEV 23:22 Hinte biittan kaxida kathaa cakiya wode gadiya gaxaa gakanaw cakofite; cakishin attida poshiliya qoropite; hessa manqotasinne bete asaas aggaagite. Taani Godaa hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 23:23 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 23:24 Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; laapuntha ageenan koyro gallasaa shempo gallas oothidi bonchite; hassayiso moyze punnishe geeshsha shiiqo shiiqite.
LEV 23:25 He gallas Godaas xuussa yarsho shiishitepe attishin, ooso oothopite.
LEV 23:26 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 23:27 Laapuntha ageenan tammantho gallasay nagara atotetha gallas; he gallas geeshsha shiiqo shiiqite. He gallas hintena kawushite; Godaas xuussa yarsho shiishite.
LEV 23:28 He gallasay Godaa hinte Xoossaa sinthan hinte nagaray qushetana mela hinte nagaraa atotetha gallas gidiya gisho he gallasan ooso oothopite.
LEV 23:29 He gallas banatetha kawushonna asi oonika ba asaa giddofe kuretto.
LEV 23:30 He gallas ooso oothiya uraa oonaka taani iya asaa giddofe kurana.
LEV 23:31 He gallas ooso oothopite. Haysi hinte de7iya bessa ubban yaana yeletethaas merinaa woga gido.
LEV 23:32 Hessi hintew dummatida shempo gallas; he gallas hintenatethaa kawushite. He ageenan uddufuntho gallas omarsafe doomidi, tammantha gallas omarsi gakanaw hinte Sambaata bonchite.
LEV 23:33 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 23:34 Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; laapuntha ageenan tammanne ichashantho gallasaape doomidi, laapun gallas gakanaw Godaas Shaqara Ba7aale.
LEV 23:35 He gallasatape koyro gallasan geeshsha shiiqo shiiqite; ooso oothopite.
LEV 23:36 Laapun gallas ubban Godaas xuussa yarsho shiishite; hospuntho gallasan geeshsha shiiqo shiiqite. Godaas xuussa katha yarsho shiishite. He gallasay baaliya wursetha gallas gidiya gisho, ooso oothopite.
LEV 23:37 Xuussa yarsho, katha yarsho, hara yarshotanne ushsha yarsho koshshiya woden Godaas shiishanaw geeshsha shiiqo oothidi awaajana Godaa ba7aaleti haysata.
LEV 23:38 Ha yarshoti Godaa Sambaatatape, Godaas immiya imotatape, qangetha imotatapenne dosan immiya imotatape dumma.
LEV 23:39 Hinte gaden kaxida kathaa shiishidaape guye, tammanne ichashantho gallasaape doomidi laapun gallas gakanaw Godaa ba7aale bonchite. Koyro gallasaynne hospuntho gallasay hintew dumma shempo gallas gidana.
LEV 23:40 Koyro gallas lo77o mitha ayfe, zamba tashe, cil7o mitha haythenne shaafa gaxan dicciya mitha haythi ekidi, Godaa hinte Xoossaa sinthan ufaytishe laapun gallas ba7aale bonchite.
LEV 23:41 He baaliya laythan laythan laapuntha ageenan laapun gallas Godaa bonchite. Hessi yaana yeletethaas merinaa woga gido.
LEV 23:42 He laapun gallasaa shaqaran de7ite; Isra7eele asi gidida ubbay he shaqaran de7o.
LEV 23:43 Taani hintena Gibxe biittafe kessida wode shaqaran daana mela oothidaysa yaana yeletethay erana. Taani Godaa hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 23:44 Hessada oothidi, Musey Godaa ba7aaleta bonchiya wogaa Isra7eele asaas odis.
LEV 24:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
LEV 24:2 Xompey to7onna eexishe daana mela iyaw koshshiya gum7idi xillisida shamaho zayte new ehana mela Isra7eele asaa kiitta.
LEV 24:3 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon de7iya markatetha magarajuwafe kare baggara omarsafe wonta gakanaw Aaroni Godaa sinthan he xompiya ubba wode eetho. Yaana yeletetha ubbaas hessi merinaa woga gido.
LEV 24:4 Xompe wothiya walahi bayna worqa kocaa bolla de7iya xompeti Godaa sinthan ubba wode eexana mela Aaroni naago.
LEV 24:5 Tammanne nam7u kilo giraame gidiya lo77o dhiille ekada tammanne nam7u uythi uuka.
LEV 24:6 He uythata usupuna usupuna nam7u maaran Godaa sinthan de7iya walahi bayna worqa xarpheeza bolla wotha.
LEV 24:7 Godaas xuugetanaw shiiqida katha yarsho gideysa erisanaw, nam7u maarata miyen geeshsha ixaane wotha.
LEV 24:8 Ha uythaa Sambaatan Sambaatan ubba wode Aaroni Isra7eele asaa gisho merinaa caaqo oothidi Godaa sinthan wotho.
LEV 24:9 Hessi Aaronanne iya adde nayta gakiya gisho; enti iya geeshsha bessan mo. Hessi Godaas xuussa yarshuwafe wogaada Aaronanne iya nayta gakiya gisho gidiya gisho Ubbaafe Geeshshi.
LEV 24:10 Ba aayen Isra7eele, ba aawan Gibxe asi gidida issi uray de7ees. Issi gallas I hara Isra7eele asara heeran wadhetis.
LEV 24:11 Ba aayen Isra7eele gidida uray Godaa sunthaa cayis; yaatin iya asay Museko ehidosona. He uraa aayiya Daane koche gidida Debira na7a. I sunthay Salomito.
LEV 24:12 He uraa waataneko Godaa sheney qoncana gakanaw iya naagisidosona.
LEV 24:13 Goday Muse haysada yaagis;
LEV 24:14 He cayida uraa gutaape gaxa kessa. I cayishin si7ida asa ubbay banta kushiya iya huuphiya bolla wotho; Isra7eele maabara ubbay iya shucha caddidi wodho.
LEV 24:15 Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; issi asi ba Xoossaa cayiko, I ba nagaran oyshetana.
LEV 24:16 Godaa sunthaa cayiya asi hayqo; Isra7eele maabara ubbay iya shuchan caddo. Bete asi woyko gade asi Godaa sunthaa cayiko hayqo.
LEV 24:17 Ase wodhida asi hayqo.
LEV 24:18 Asa mehe wodhida asi oonika ba wodhida mehiya gisho paxa mehiya qanxo.
LEV 24:19 Issi asi ba shooruwa qohiko, I oothidaysada iya bolla ooseto.
LEV 24:20 Menthiko me77o; ayfe gisho ayfe; acha gisho ache. Asa bolla qoho gathida oonika I gathida qohuwada iya bolla gako.
LEV 24:21 Mehe wodhida asi he mehiya gatiya qanxo; shin ase wodhida asi hayqo.
LEV 24:22 Bete asaasinne Isra7eele asas higgey issino gido. Taani Godaa hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 24:23 Musey hessa Isra7eele asaas odis; enti he cayida uraa gutaape gaxa kessidi, shuchan caddidi wodhidosona. Yaatidi Isra7eele asay Goday Muse kiitidaysada oothidosona.
LEV 25:1 Siina zuma bolla Goday Museko haysada yaagis.
LEV 25:2 Neeni Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; taani hintew immiya biitta hinte geliya wode biittiya ba huuphen Godaa Sambaata boncho.
LEV 25:3 Usupun laythi kumethi hinte gaden zerite; usupun laythi kumethi hinte woyne xeera xunqite; iya ayfiya maxite.
LEV 25:4 Shin laapuntha laythay biittas shempo Sambaata; hessi Godaa Sambaata. He laapuntha laythan gaden zeropite; hinte woyne xeeraa xunqofite.
LEV 25:5 Hinte biittan aasebo kaxidaba shiishopite; woyne xeera xunqofite; ayfiya maxopite. He laythay biittas kumethi shempo laythi gido.
LEV 25:6 He Sambaata laythan biittay oosetonna de7ishin kaxiya kathaa neeni, ne adde aylley, ne macca aylley, ne son une oothey, guutha wodes de7iya bete asi maanaw danda7ees.
LEV 25:7 Hessadaka, ne mehiyasinne ne biittan de7iya do7atas gidiya kathi demmana; biittan kaxiyaba ubbay meeteto.
LEV 25:8 Laythatas giddon de7iya laapun Sambaatata tayba; laapun Sambaatatas laytha tayboy laapun toho laapuna; hessika oytamanne uddufun laythi.
LEV 25:9 Laapuntha ageenan, tammantho gallas bonchetiya nagara atotetha gallasan moyze punniya asi biitta ubbaa kiitta.
LEV 25:10 Ishatammantho laytha dummayidi, he biittan de7iya ubbaas la77atethi awaajite. Hessi hintew Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aale. He wode hinte ubbay hinte gadiyakonne hinte soo asaako simmite.
LEV 25:11 He laythay hintew Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aale. He laythan zeropite; aasebo kaxidaba cakofite; xeera xunqonna ayfida woyne ayfiya maxopite.
LEV 25:12 Hessi Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aale gidiya gisho I hintew geeshshi; goyonna coo denban kaxidaba miite.
LEV 25:13 He Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aale wode asi ubbay ba gade simmo.
LEV 25:14 Hinte, hinte shooruwape gade shammiko woyko iyaw bayziko issoy issuwa cimmofite.
LEV 25:15 Hinte Ishatammantho Laytha Baaliyape guye de7iya laythata taybuwan hinte shooruwape shammite. Hinte shooroy gadey kathi immanaw de7iya laythata taybuwada bayzo.
LEV 25:16 Laytha tayboy daro gidiko gatey darees; laythata tayboy guuxiko gatey guuxees. Gadiya lo77otethaada hinte shooroy hintew bayzees.
LEV 25:17 Hinte issoy issuwa cimmofite; shin hinte, hinte Xoossaa yayyite. Taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 25:18 Hinte ha biittan saro daana mela ta kiitta polite; ta higgiya naagite.
LEV 25:19 Biittay ba ayfiya hintew immin hinte kallana gakanaw maana; he biittan hinte saro daana.
LEV 25:20 Heko, nuuni zeronna aggidi, qassi kathi shiishonna aggidi, laapuntha laythan ay maanee? giiko,
LEV 25:21 taani usupuntho laythan ta anjuwa hintew kiittana; biittay heedzu laythas gidiya kathi immana.
LEV 25:22 Hospuntha laythan hinte, hinte biittan zeriya wode shaacha kathaa maana. Hinte zeriya kathaa uddufuntho laythan shiishana gakanaw shaacha kathaa maana.
LEV 25:23 Biittay tabaa gidiya gishonne hinte he biittan imathenne bete gididi de7iya gisho biitta simmonnaada oothidi bayzopite.
LEV 25:24 Hinte oykida gadiya godati, wozana maatay Isra7eele ubban naagetanaw bessees.
LEV 25:25 Issi Isra7eele asi manqidi ba gadiyape bayziko, iya mata dabboy he gadiya iyaw wozo.
LEV 25:26 Iyaw he gadiya woziya dabboy dhayiko, I wonto duretidi woziya miishe demmiko zaaridi wozanaw danda7ees.
LEV 25:27 Ba bayzida wodepe doomidi de7iya laytha taybidi, attida laytha miishiya shammidaysas zaaro; yaatidi I ba gadiya simmo.
LEV 25:28 Shin iyaw he gadiya wozanaw gidiya miishey dhayiko, Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aaley gakanaw gadey shammida uraa kushen gam7o. Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aale wode iya gadey iyaw simmo.
LEV 25:29 Issi asi gimbetida katama giddon de7iya keethe bayziko, I bayzida wodiyape bidi issi laythi kumana gakanaw zaaridi wozanaw danda7ees.
LEV 25:30 Shin issi laytha giddon wozanaw danda7etonna ixiko, he gimbetida katamaa giddon de7iya keethay shammida uraasinne iya kochaas gidees. Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aale wode simmenna.
LEV 25:31 Shin gimbetiboona heeran de7iya keethati gade mela wozetoosona. Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aale wode bayzidaysas simmoosona.
LEV 25:32 Gidoshin, Leeweti katamatan de7iya banta keethaa banta koyida wode wozanaw danda7oosona.
LEV 25:33 Leewetape issi asi enta katamaa giddon de7iya keethaa bayzidi wozanaw xoonetiko, he enta katamaa giddon de7iya keethay Ishatammantho Laytha Baaliya wode simmees. Leeweta katamaa giddon de7iya keethay Isra7eele asaa giddon Leewetasa.
LEV 25:34 Shin enta katamaa yuushuwan de7iya hentha biittay entaw merinaa aqo gidiya gisho bayzetenna.
LEV 25:35 Issi Isra7eele asi manqidi bana aysanaw xoonetiko, imathada woyko bete asada I neera daana mela maadda.
LEV 25:36 Iya neera wothanaw iyape yelo ekofa woyko wodhe moopa. Shin ne Xoossaa yayya.
LEV 25:37 Ne bira iyaw yelora tal7ofa; ne kathaa iyaw wodhera bayzopa.
LEV 25:38 Hintew Kanaane biitta immanawunne hinte Xoossaa gidanaw, hintena Gibxe biittafe kessida, taani, Godaa hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 25:39 Issi Isra7eele asi manqidi, bana new aylle oothidi bayziko iya aylleda oosisopa.
LEV 25:40 I bete asada une oothidi Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aaley gakanaw neera de7o.
LEV 25:41 He wode I ba naytara issife ne soope keyidi ba soo asaako boo; ba aawa gade simmo.
LEV 25:42 Isra7eele asay taani Gibxe biittafe kessida ta aylle gidiya gisho enti aylletethas bayzetofo.
LEV 25:43 Neeni enta un7ethada haaropa; shin neeni, ne Xoossaa yayya.
LEV 25:44 New addenne macca aylley daana mela koyiko, ne yuushuwan de7iya kawotethatape shamma.
LEV 25:45 Hinte biittan de7iya bete asaa nayta shammanaw danda7eeta. Hinte biittan de7ishe yeletida enta soo asaape hintew shalo oothanaw danda7eeta.
LEV 25:46 Hintefe guye, hinte nayti enta merinaw laattana mela hinte naytas immite. Hinte enta ubba wode hinte aylle oothanaw danda7eeta; shin Isra7eele asi un7ethidi haaropite.
LEV 25:47 Ne matan de7iya imathi woyko bete asi duretiko, iya matan de7iya Isra7eele uray manqidi, ne matan de7iya imathas woyko bete uraas woyko imatha addiya kochaafe issuwas bana bayziko,
LEV 25:48 I bayzetidi simmin, iya wozanaw danda7etees; iya dabbotape issoy iya wozo.
LEV 25:49 Iya aawa ishay, woyko iya aawa ishaa na7ay woyko iya yaraape mata dabboy iya wozo; woyko I ba huuphen duretidi bana wozo.
LEV 25:50 I bana shammida uraara gididi, I bana bayzida laythafe doomidi Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aaley gakanaw de7iya laythata taybo. Iya la77atetha gatey, he laytha taybuwa keena gido. I bana shammidaysara gam7ida wodiya gatey issi asi une oothidi demmiya miishiyara gina gido.
LEV 25:51 Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aaley gakanaw daro laythi attidaba gidiko, ba bayzetida gatiyape he laytha taybon bana woziya gatiya qanxo.
LEV 25:52 Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aaley gakanaw attida laythay guutha gidiko, bana shammidaysara issife taybidi, he laytha taybon bana woziya gatiya qanxo.
LEV 25:53 I laythan laythan une oothiya asada bana shammidaysara de7o; iya goday iya un7ethidi haaranaw bessenna.
LEV 25:54 Shin I hessa mela hanon wozetonna ixiko, Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aaley gakiya wode inne iya nayti aylletethafe keyo.
LEV 25:55 Isra7eele asay, ta Gibxe biittafe kessida ta aylle. Taani, Godaa hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 26:1 Goyinnanaw eeqata oothopite; qassi hawulte woyko eeqa tuussu woyko shucha eeqa essofite. Taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa.
LEV 26:2 Ta Sambaatata naagite; ta goyinno bessaa bonchite. Taani Godaa.
LEV 26:3 Hinte ta higgiya kaallikonne ta kiita naagiko,
LEV 26:4 taani hintew ira woden woden immana; biittay kathaa darsidi dolisana; gaden de7iya mithay ayfana.
LEV 26:5 Hinte kathaa shiishidi ongonna de7ishin woyne maxiya wodey gakana; woyniya maxidi wursonna kathaa zeriya wodey gakana. Hinte kallana gakanaw kathi maana; hinte, hinte biittan saro daana.
LEV 26:6 Taani biittas sarotethi immana; oonika hintena yashisonna hinte zin7ana. Iita do7ata taani biittafe dhaysana; hinte biittan nam7antho oli dendenna.
LEV 26:7 Hinte morketa hinte yedethana; enti hinte sinthan mashshan hayqana.
LEV 26:8 Hintefe ichashay xeeta yedethana; qassi xeetay tammu mukula yedethana. Hinte morketi hinte sinthan mashshan hayqana.
LEV 26:9 Taani hintena maarota ayfen be7ana; hintena ayfisana; hintena darsana; taani ta caaquwa hintera minthana.
LEV 26:10 Hinte shaacha kathaa midi wursonna de7ishe, wacha kathaa wothanaw, shaacha kathaa diggidi besse giigisana.
LEV 26:11 Taani ta de7iya bessaa hinte giddon oothana; taani hintena ixike.
LEV 26:12 Taani hinte giddon hemetana; hinte Xoossaa gidana; hinte ta ase gidana.
LEV 26:13 Hinte Gibxetas aylle gidonna mela he biittafe hintena kessida Goday, taani hinte Xoossaa. Taani hinte aylletetha qambara menthas; hinte dhoqu gidi hemetana mela oothas.
LEV 26:14 Shin hinte taana si7onna ixikonne, ta kiita polonna ixiko,
LEV 26:15 ta wogaa kadhiko, ta kiita ubbaa polonna ixidi ta caaquwa menthanaw ta higgiya boriko,
LEV 26:16 he wode taani hinte bolla haysa oothana; hinte akeekona de7ishin yashshi, gilqatethi, hinte ayfiya teljumisiyanne hinte asatethaa melisiya misha harge hinte bolla yeddana. Hinte morketi maana gisho hinte zeriya zerethay mela gidana.
LEV 26:17 Ta hintena iita ayfen xeellana; hinte morketa sinthan hinte kundana; hintena ixeysati haarana; oonika yedethonna hinte baqatana.
LEV 26:18 Hessa ubbaa oothinka hinte tana si7onna ixiko, taani hinte nagaraa gisho hinte seera laapun dako oothana.
LEV 26:19 Ta hinte otoruwa menthana; saluwa birata; sa7aa naase birata oothana.
LEV 26:20 Hinte biittay kathi, hinte mithay ayfe immonna gisho hinte wolqay coo bessan wurana.
LEV 26:21 Hinte taw ixas giikonne tana si7onna ixiko, hinte nagara mela laapun dako gado taani hinte bolla ehana.
LEV 26:22 Taani hinte bolla bazzo do7ata yeddana; enti hinte nayta bonqana. Hinte meheta dhaysana; hinte taybuwa guuthana; hessa gaason hinte hemetiya ogey husatana.
LEV 26:23 He seera ubban hinte taako simmonna ixiko,
LEV 26:24 he wode taka hintew ixas gaana. Hinte nagaraa gisho taani ta huuphen hintena laapun dako seerana.
LEV 26:25 Ta caaquwa hinte menthida gisho, kushe zaaranaw mashsha hinte bolla ehana. Hinte, hinte katamatan shiiqikoka, taani hinte bolla gado yeddana. Hinte, hinte morketa kushen aadhidi imetana.
LEV 26:26 Hinte kathaa taani dhaysiya wode tammu maccasati issi beshen uythu uukana; he uythaa mizaanen shaakidi ekana; hinte hessa maana shin kalleketa.
LEV 26:27 Ha ubban hinte tana si7onna ixikonne hinte iitatethan gujidi biiko,
LEV 26:28 ta hinte bolla hanqon dendana. Hinte nagaraa gisho taani hintena laapun dako seerana.
LEV 26:29 Hinte, hinte adde naytanne hinte macca nayta ashuwa maana.
LEV 26:30 Taani, hinte dhoqa goyinno bessata dhaysana; hinte ixaane yarshiya bessaa laallana. Taani hinte aha hinte eeqata aha bolla holana; taani hintena polo ixana.
LEV 26:31 Taani hinte katamata baysa oothana; hinte goyinno bessata dhaysana; hinte sawiya yarshuwa singike.
LEV 26:32 Taani hinte biitta dhaysana; he biittan de7iya morketi hessan malaaletana.
LEV 26:33 Taani hintena kawotethata giddon laallana; hinte bolla ta mashshaa shoddana. Hinte biittay baysatana; hinte katamati laaletana.
LEV 26:34 Hinte morketa biittan de7iya wode, baysa giigidi de7iya hinte biittay ba Sambaata bonchana. He wode hinte biittay shempananne ba Sambaata bonchishe ufaytana.
LEV 26:35 Hinte he biittan de7iya wode Sambaatatan demmiboonna shempuwa ha77i baysa gidida wode demmana.
LEV 26:36 Hinte di7etidi biya wode guye attida asata wozanan yashshi yeddana; carkoy qaathiya bonco girsay enta daganthana; enti mashshafe baqatiya mela baqatana; enta oonika yedethonna kundana.
LEV 26:37 Oonika yedethonna olape baqatiyada baqatishe, issoy issuwara dhubetidi kundana. Hinte, hinte morketa sinthan eqanaw hintew wolqi dhayana.
LEV 26:38 Kawotethata giddon hinte dhayana; hinte morketa biittan hinte mitetidi dhayana.
LEV 26:39 Morketa biittan attidaysati banta nagaraa gishonne banta aawata nagaraa gisho gilqidi dhayana.
LEV 26:40 Shin enti banta nagaraanne ta bolla makallidi si7onna ixida banta aawata nagaraa paaxiko,
LEV 26:41 ta enta ixanaadanne enta morketa biitta yedethannaada oothida banta nagaraa aggikonne enta kiitetonna wozanay simmiko,
LEV 26:42 Taani Yayqoobara, Yisaaqaranne Abrahaamera caaqida caaquwa hassayana; enta biitta zaara qopana.
LEV 26:43 Enta biittay baysa attana; he enti dhayin baysa gididi de7ida woden biittay Sambaata bonchishe ufaytana. Enti ta kiitaa kadhida gishonne ta wogaa leqida gisho banta nagaraa seera ekana.
LEV 26:44 Gidoshin, enti banta morketa biittan de7ida wode kumethi dhayana gakanaw entara de7iya ta caaquwa menthike; enta yeggike. Taani, Godaa enta Xoossaa.
LEV 26:45 Taani enta Xoossaa gidanaw, kawotethati xeellishin, Gibxe biittafe kessida enta mayzatara taani caaqida caaquwa enta gisho hassayana. Taani Godaa.
LEV 26:46 Goday Siina zuma bolla Muse baggara baapenne Isra7eele asaape giddon wothida wogati kiitatinne higgeti haysata.
LEV 27:1 Goday Museko haysada yaagis.
LEV 27:2 Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda; issi asi Godaas ase immanaw qangiko, wozo gatiya ne gammatidaysa mela he uraa gisho miishe qanxo.
LEV 27:3 Laatamu laythafe bidi usupun tammu laythi gakanaw de7iya adde gidiko geeshsha dunkaanen eretida mizaanen usupun xeetu bira santime qanxo.
LEV 27:4 Macca gidiko hastamu bira santime qanxo.
LEV 27:5 Ichashu laythafe bidi laatamu laythi gakanaw de7iya adde gidiko laatamu bira santime qanxo; qassi maccas gidiko tammu bira santime qanxo.
LEV 27:6 Issi ageenape bidi ichashu laythi gakanaw de7iya adde gidiko ichashu bira santime qanxo; qassi maccas gidiko heedzu bira santime qanxo.
LEV 27:7 Laythi usupun tammanne iyape bolla gidida adde gidiko, tammanne ichashu bira santime; qassi maccas gidiko tammu bira santime qanxo.
LEV 27:8 Qangida uray neeni gammatidaysa qanxanaw danda7onna manqo gidiko, I ba qangetha gathanaw immida uraa ehidi kahiniya sinthan esso; qangetida uray qanxanaw danda7eysa keena qopidi kahiney gammato.
LEV 27:9 Issi asi Godaas yarsho oothidi immanaw qangiday mehe gidiko Godaas imetiya mehe ubbay geeshshi gidees.
LEV 27:10 He mehiya gisho hara mehe immofo; woyko iya hara mehera laammofo. Lo77uwa iitaara woyko iitaa lo77uwara laammofo; shin I laammiko, koyro meheynne laame immida mehey nam7ayka geeshshi gido.
LEV 27:11 Issi asi Godaas yarsho oothidi immanaw gepida mehey geeshshi gidonna ixiko, he uray he mehiya kahiniya sinthe eho.
LEV 27:12 Lo77o gidin, iita gidin kahiney he mehiya gammato; kahiney gammatidaysi iyaw gate gido.
LEV 27:13 Shin he mehiya goday zaaridi wozanaw koyiko, he mehiya gatiya bolla xeetape laatamu kushe gujo.
LEV 27:14 Issi asi ba keethaa geeshshi oothidi Godaas dummayiko, lo77o gidin, iita gidin kahiney he keethaa gammato; kahiney gammatidaysi iyaw gate gido.
LEV 27:15 Ba keethaa geeshshi oothidi Godaas dummayida uray zaaridi wozanaw koyiko, he keethaa gatiya bolla xeetape laatamu kushe gujo; simmidi keethay iyabaa gidees.
LEV 27:16 Issi asi ba laata gadiyape shaakidi geeshshi oothidi Godaas dummayiko, he gadiya gatey iyan zeretiya zerethan gammateto. Hessika nam7u xeetanne laatamu kilo giraame banga zeriya gade gidiko, ishatamu saqile qanxo.
LEV 27:17 I ba gadiya Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aalepe doomidi geeshshi oothidi Godaas dummayiko, he gadiya kumetha gatiya qanxo.
LEV 27:18 Shin I ba gadiya Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aaley aadhin, geeshshi oothidi Godaas dummayiko, kaallidi de7iya Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aaley gakanaw de7iya laythata kahiney taybidi, iya kumetha gatiyape wodho.
LEV 27:19 He gadiya geeshshi oothidi Godaas dummayida uray zaaridi wozanaw koyiko, gammatetida gatiya bolla xeetape laatamu kushe gujo; simmidi gadey iyabaa gidees.
LEV 27:20 Shin I gadiya zaaridi wozanaape sinthe hara asas bayziko, he gadiya wozanaw danda7enna.
LEV 27:21 Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aaley gakin gadey yedetiya wode he gadey nam7antho guye simmonna Godaas geeshshi gido; he gadey kahinetaba gidees.
LEV 27:22 Issi asi hara asape shammida gadiya geeshshi oothidi Godaas dummayanaw koyiko,
LEV 27:23 kaalliya Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aaley gakanaw de7iya gatiya kahiney gammatiko, uray he gallas gammatida gatiya qanxo; He miishey Godaas dummatida miishe gidana.
LEV 27:24 Ishatammantho Laytha Ba7aaley gakiya wode he gadey koyro laatan ekidi bayzida uraas simmees.
LEV 27:25 Enta gatey geeshsha dunkaaniyan eretida mizaanen gammatetees. (Issi saqiley laatamu Geera gidees).
LEV 27:26 Shin oonika bayra yeletida mehe Godaas dummayidi shiishanaw danda7enna; I kaseka Godaaba. Miizi woyko dorse gidin Godaaba.
LEV 27:27 He mehey geeshshi gidonna ixiko, I gammatetida gatiya bolla ichashape issi kushe gujidi iya goday zaaridi wozo. I wozonna ixiko, gammatetida gatiyan hara asas bayzeto.
LEV 27:28 Issi asi Godaas dummayidi immidabay ayba gidikoka, ase woyko mehe woyko iya laata gade gidin, bayzetenanne wozetenna. I dummayidaba ubbay Godaas Ubbaafe geeshshi.
LEV 27:29 Asaa giddofe hayqana mela pirdetida asi oonika wozetofo; he uray hayqo.
LEV 27:30 Gaden kaxida kathi woyko mitha ayfe gidin tammaafe issoy Godaaba. Hessi Godaas geeshshi.
LEV 27:31 Issi asi ba asraata wozanaw koyiko, iya gatiya bolla xeetape laatamu kushe gujidi wozo.
LEV 27:32 Miiza asraata woyko dorsa asraata woyko deesha asraata gidin, henthanchuwa xam7afe garsara aadhiya tammaafe issoy Godaas geeshshi.
LEV 27:33 Tammantho mehey iita gidin, lo77o gidin dooropo; woyko iya haraara laammofo. Laammiko, koyroynne laame immida nam7ay Godaas geeshshi gidoosona; zaaridi wozanaw danda7etenna.
LEV 27:34 Siina zuma bolla Goday Muse baggara Isra7eele asaa kiitida kiitay haysa.
NUM 1:1 Isra7eele asay Gibxe biittafe keyida nam7antho laythan, nam7antho ageenan, he ageena koyro gallasan, Goday Siina mela biittan Geeshsha Dunkaaniyan Museko haysada yaagis;
NUM 1:2 “Neeranne Aaronara Isra7eele asa ubbaa enta kochan kochan, qassi enta soo asan asan taybadi, adde asaa sunthaa xaafite.
NUM 1:3 Laythi laatamanne iyape bolla gidida, oletanaw danda7iya Isra7eele asa ubbaa taybite.
NUM 1:4 Kochape kochape issi issi asi ba soo asaas halaqa gididi hintena maaddo.
NUM 1:5 Hintena maaddana asaa sunthay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa. Robeelape, Shade7ura na7aa Elixura;
NUM 1:6 Simoonape Sursadaya na7a Salumi7eela;
NUM 1:7 Yihudape Amnadaabe na7aa Na7asoona;
NUM 1:8 Yisakoorape Zu7ara na7aa Natina7eela;
NUM 1:9 Zabloonape Heloona na7aa Eli7aaba;
NUM 1:10 Yoosefa naytape, Efreemape Amhuda na7aa Elishama7a; Minaasepe Padazuura na7aa Gamali7eela;
NUM 1:11 Biniyaamepe Gadiyoona na7aa Abdaana;
NUM 1:12 Daanape Amsadaya na7aa Aki7ezera;
NUM 1:13 Aseerape Okraana na7aa Pagi7eela;
NUM 1:14 Gaadape Ragu7eela na7aa Elyaasafa;
NUM 1:15 Niftaalemepe Enaana na7a Akira;
NUM 1:16 Ha asay banta aawata keethaa asaape kaalethanaw dooretida Isra7eele yarata halaqata” yaagis.
NUM 1:17 Yaatin Museynne Aaroni he dooretida asata ekidi,
NUM 1:18 nam7antho ageenan koyro gallasan kumetha maabara xeegidi shiishidosona. Asay banta kochan kochan, qassi banta soo asan asan laatamu laythinne iyape bolla gidida adde ubbay xaafetis.
NUM 1:19 Goday iya Kiittidaysada Musey enta Siina mela biittan taybis.
NUM 1:20 Oletanaw danda7iya adde ubbay, laatamu laythinne iyape bolla gidida adde ubbay taybetidi huuphen huuphen xaafetidosona. Enti banta kochan kochaaninne banta soo asan shaaketidi haysafe kaallidi de7iya taybo maaran mazgabetidosona. Bayra na7aa Robeelape 46,500
NUM 1:22 Simoonape 59,300
NUM 1:24 Gaadape 45,650
NUM 1:26 Yihudape 74,600
NUM 1:28 Yisakoorape 54,400
NUM 1:30 Zabloonape 57,400
NUM 1:32 Yoosefa na7aa Efreemape 40,500
NUM 1:34 Yoosefa na7aa Minaasepe 32,200
NUM 1:36 Biniyaamepe 35,400
NUM 1:38 Daanepe 62,700
NUM 1:40 Aseerape 41,500
NUM 1:42 Niftaalemepe 53,400
NUM 1:44 Musey, Aaroninne banta soo asaape asaape dooretida tammanne nam7u Isra7eele kochaa halaqati taybida asay haysata.
NUM 1:45 Oletanaw danda7iya adde ubbay, laatamu laythinne iyape bolla gidida asay banta soo asan asan taybetidosona.
NUM 1:46 Kumetha asaa tayboy 603,550.
NUM 1:47 Shin Leewe kochati taybetibookona.
NUM 1:48 Gaasoyka kase Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
NUM 1:49 “Leewe kochata taybopa; enta attida Isra7eele asaa taybon gelsofa.
NUM 1:50 Leeweta, Geeshsha Dunkaaniyaninne iyan de7iya miisheta ubbaa bolla halaqa oothada shuuma. Enti Dunkaaniyanne iyan de7iya miisheta tookana; iya giddon oothananne iya yuushon dunkaanana.
NUM 1:51 Geeshsha Dunkaaney shodetiya wode Leeweti shoddo; Geeshsha Dunkaaney eqiya wode Leeweti esso; entafe hari oonika iyako shiiqiko hayqo.
NUM 1:52 Hanko Isra7eele asay banta heeraninne banta cugan cugan shaaketidi, banta dunkaaniya dunkaanona.
NUM 1:53 Shin Godaa hanqoy Isra7eele maabara bolla wodhonna mela Leeweti Dunkaaniya yuushuwan banta dunkaaniya dunkaanidi naago” yaagis.
NUM 1:54 Isra7eele asay Goday Muse kiitida ubbaa oothidosona.
NUM 2:1 Goday Musenne Aarona haysada yaagis;
NUM 2:2 Isra7eele asay banta kochan kochan mallanne banta kocha kocha erisiya bandira kaallidi, Geeshsha Dunkaaniyape guuthi haakidi iya yuushuwan dunkaanona.
NUM 2:3 Doloha baggara Yihuda kochay banta malla kaallidi dunkaanona. Yihuda kochaa kaalethey Amnadaabe na7aa Na7asoona.
NUM 2:4 Iya cugaa tayboy 74,600.
NUM 2:5 Yihuda gakidi dunkaananay Yisakoore kochaa. Yisakoora kochaa kaalethey Zu7ara na7aa Natina7eela.
NUM 2:6 Iya cugaa tayboy 54,400.
NUM 2:7 Iyape kaallidi Zabloona kochay dunkaanees. Zabloona kochaa kaalethey Heloona na7aa Eli7aaba.
NUM 2:8 Iya cugaa tayboy 57,400
NUM 2:9 Yihuda baggan dunkaanida olanchota tayboy 186,400. Isra7eele asay gutaa yeddidi biya wode koyroti keyey enta.
NUM 2:10 Dugeha baggara Robeela kochay banta malla kaallidi dunkaanona. Enta kaalethey Sadiyoora na7aa Elisuura.
NUM 2:11 Iya cugaa tayboy 46,500.
NUM 2:12 Robeela gakidi dunkaaney Simoona kochaa. Simoona kochaa kaalethey Zurishadaya na7a Salumi7eela.
NUM 2:13 Iya cuga tayboy 59,300.
NUM 2:14 Iyape kaallidi Gaade kochay dunkaanees. Enta kaalethey De7u7eela na7aa Eliyasaafa.
NUM 2:15 Enta cugaa tayboy 45,650.
NUM 2:16 Robeela, baggan dunkaanida olanchota tayboy 151,450. Isra7eele asay gutaa yeddidi biya wode nam7antho keyey enta.
NUM 2:17 Hessafe guye, koyro keyiya Yihuda cugaapenne nam7antho keyiya Robeela cugaape giddon Geeshsha dunkaaniya tookidi Leeweti geloosona. Issi issi kochay banta dunkaanida maaran banta malla oykidi keyo.
NUM 2:18 Wuloha baggara Efreema baggay banta malla kaallidi dunkaanona. Entana kaalethey Amhuda na7aa Elishama7a.
NUM 2:19 Enta cugaa tayboy 40,500.
NUM 2:20 Enta gakidi Minaase kochay dunkaanees. Entana kaalethey Padazuura na7aa Gamali7eela.
NUM 2:21 Enta olanchota tayboy 32,200.
NUM 2:22 Iyape kaallidi dunkaaney Biniyaame kochaa. Biniyaame kochaa kaalethey Gidi7oona na7aa Abdaana.
NUM 2:23 Enta cugaa tayboy 35,400.
NUM 2:24 Efreema baggan dunkaanida olanchota tayboy 108,100. Isra7eele asay gutaa yeddidi biya wode heedzantho keyey enta.
NUM 2:25 Pudeha baggara Daane kochay banta malla kaallidi dunkaanona. Entana kaalethey Amsadaya na7aa Aki7ezera.
NUM 2:26 Enta cugaa tayboy 62,700.
NUM 2:27 Entana gakidi Aseera kochay dunkaanees. Aseera kochaa kaalethey Okraana na7aa Pagi7eela.
NUM 2:28 Enta cugaa tayboy 41,500.
NUM 2:29 Iyape kaallidi Niftaaleme kochay dunkaanees. Niftaaleme kochaa kaalethey Enaana na7aa Akira.
NUM 2:30 Enta cugaa tayboy 53,400
NUM 2:31 Daane baggan dunkaanida olanchota tayboy 157,600. Isra7eele asay gutaa yeddidi biya wode wursethan keyey enta.
NUM 2:32 Banta kochan kochan shaaketidi taybetida Isra7eele olanchota tayboy 603,550.
NUM 2:33 Shin Goday Muse kiitidaysada, Leeweti hara Isra7eele asaara taybetibookona.
NUM 2:34 Isra7eele asay, Goday Muse Kiittidaba ubbaa oothidosona. Enti banta mala kaallidi dunkaanidosona; qassi banta kochaanne banta soo asaa asaa kaallidi keyoosona.
NUM 3:1 Goday Siina zuma bolla Musera odetiya wode de7iya Aaronanne Muse soo asay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa.
NUM 3:2 Aarona adde nayta sunthay, bayray Nadaaba, kaalley Abyooda, Alaazaranne Itamaara.
NUM 3:3 He Aarona adde nayti ubbay, kahine gididi oothanaw tiyetidi shuumetidosona.
NUM 3:4 Shin enta giddofe Naadabeynne Abyoodi Siina mela biittan Godaa sinthan geeshshi gidonna taman yarsho yarshidi hayqidosona. Entaw na7i baawa. Hessa gisho, enta aaway Aaroni paxa de7ida laytha ubban Alaazarinne Itamaara xalaali kahine gididi oothidosona.
NUM 3:5 Goday Museko,
NUM 3:6 “Leewe kochata ehada kahiniya Aarona maaddana mela enta iya sinthe shiisha.
NUM 3:7 Enti Aaronanne Isra7eele maabara ubbaa Geeshsha Dunkaaniya sinthan dumma dumma ooso oothidi maaddo.
NUM 3:8 Enti Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon de7iya miishe ubbaa aawatethan ayso. Isra7eele asaa gisho Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon ooso ubbaa enti oothonna.
NUM 3:9 Aaronanne iya adde nayta maadana mela Leeweta shuuma. Enti Isra7eele asaa giddofe shaaketidi Aarona maaddana mela imetidosona.
NUM 3:10 Aaronanne iya adde nayta kahine oothada shuuma. Entafe hara asi oonika Geeshsha dunkaaniyako shiiqiko hayqo” yaagis.
NUM 3:11 Qassi Goday Museko,
NUM 3:12 “Taani Isra7eelen yeletiya bayra adde nayta gisho Leeweta ekas. Leeweti tabaa.
NUM 3:13 Ayis giiko, bayra yeletida ubbay tabaa. Ta Gibxe biittan bayra yeletida ubbaa wodhida gallasan, Isra7eelen bayra yeletidaba ubbaa ase gidin, mehe gidin, taw dummayas. Enti tabaa gidana. Taani Godaa” yaagis.
NUM 3:14 Qassika Goday Museko Siina mela biittan,
NUM 3:15 “Leeweta enta kochan, qassi enta soo asan asan tayba. Yeletin issi ageenanne iyape bolla gidida adde nayta ubbaa tayba” yaagis.
NUM 3:16 Yaatin Goday kiitidaysada Musey enta taybis.
NUM 3:17 Leewe adde nayti Gedisoona, Qahatanne Maraara.
NUM 3:18 Gedisoona adde nayti Libinanne Same7a geetetoosona.
NUM 3:19 Qahaata adde nayti Amraama, Yizihaara, Kebroonanne Uzi7eela.
NUM 3:20 Meraara adde nayti Mahilanne Musa geetetoosona. Leeweta mayzati haysata.
NUM 3:21 Nam7u Gedisoona kochati Libinanne Sim7a.
NUM 3:22 Yeletin issi ageenanne iyape bolla gidida adde nayta tayboy 7,500.
NUM 3:23 Gedisoona kochati Geeshsha Dunkaaniyape guyen wuloha baggan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 3:24 Gedisoona kochaa soo asaa halaqay La7eela na7aa Eliyasaafa.
NUM 3:25 Gedisoona kochaas Geeshsha Dunkaaniya bolla de7iya aawatethay, Dunkaaniya, gaatha kamaa, kare kamaa, wula magarajuwa,
NUM 3:26 Dunkaaniya yuushon de7iya dabaaba magarajuwa, yarsho bessa magarajuwa, dabaaba wula magarajuwa, wodorotanne iyan go7etiya miisheta ubbaa aawatethan aysoosona.
NUM 3:27 Qahaata kochati Amraama, Yizihaara, Kebroonanne Uzi7eela.
NUM 3:28 Yeletin issi ageenanne iyape bolla gidida adde nayta tayboy 8,600. Qahaata kochati Geeshsha Dunkaaniya aawatethan naagoosona.
NUM 3:29 Qahaata kochati Geeshsha Dunkaaniyape dugeha baggara dunkaanidosona.
NUM 3:30 Qahaata kochaa kaalethey Uzi7eela na7aa Elzafaana.
NUM 3:31 Enti Taabotiya, xarpheeza, xompe wothiya kocaa, yarshsho bessaa, kahineti go7etiya Geeshsha Dunkaaniya miisheta, Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa geliya wula bolla de7iya magarajuwa aawatethan ayso.
NUM 3:32 Leeweta halaqay kahiniya Aarona na7aa Alaazara. I Geeshsha Bessan ootheysatas shuuma.
NUM 3:33 Meraara kochati Mahilanne Musa.
NUM 3:34 Yeletin issi ageenanne iyape bolla gidida adde nayta tayboy 6,200.
NUM 3:35 Meraara kochaa kaalethey Abikaala na7aa Zur7eela. Meraara kochay Geeshsha Dunkaaniyape pudeha baggara dunkaanidosona.
NUM 3:36 Meraara kochay Dunkaaniya tuuqeta, liyoota, tuussatanne tuussati eqiya gedata, hessadaka giddon koshshiya miisheta ubbaa enti aawatethan aysoosona.
NUM 3:37 Gujidika, Dunkaaniya yuushon de7iya dabaaba tuussatanne enta gedata, dhishetanne wodorota aawatethan aysoosona.
NUM 3:38 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya sinthan doloha baggara Musey, Aaroninne iya adde nayti dunkaanidosona. Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon Isra7eela asaa gisho oosetiya ooso ubbaa enti aawatethan aysoosona. Hara asi Geeshsha Dunkaaniyako shiiqiko hayqo.
NUM 3:39 Goday, Musenne Aarona Kiittidaysa mela issi ageenanne iyape bolla gidida Leeweta adde nayta tayboy 22,000.
NUM 3:40 Goday Museko, “Yeletin issi ageenanne iyape bolla gidida Isra7eele bayra adde nayta taybada enta suntha xaafa.
NUM 3:41 Isra7eele bayra adde nayta bessan Leeweta, qassi Isra7eele bayra mehiya bessan Leeweta bayra mehiya taw eka. Taani Godaa” yaagis.
NUM 3:42 Goday Muse kiitidaysada Isra7eelen bayra yeletida ubbaa taybis.
NUM 3:43 Yeletin issi ageenanne iyape bolla gidida bayra adde nayta tayboy 22,273.
NUM 3:44 Goday Museko,
NUM 3:45 “Isra7eele bayra adde nayta bessan Leeweta taw dummaya. Qassi Isra7eele bayra meheta bessan Leeweta bayra mehiya taw dummaya; taani Godaa.
NUM 3:46 Isra7eele bayra adde nayta tayboy Leeweta bayra adde nayta taybuwape 273 aadhiya gisho he attidaysata taw woza.
NUM 3:47 Issuwas issuwas geeshsha dunkaanen eretida mizaanen ichashu bira santimen woza.
NUM 3:48 He wozo miishiya Aaronasinne iya adde naytas imma” yaagis.
NUM 3:49 Palahidaysata wozo miishiya Musey shiishis.
NUM 3:50 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya mizaaniya liken Isra7eele bayra adde nayta wozo miishiya 1,365 bira santime ekis.
NUM 3:51 Goday kiitidaysada Musey wozo miishiya Aaronasinne iya adde naytas immis.
NUM 4:1 Goday Musenne Aarona haysada yaagis;
NUM 4:2 “Leewe kochatape Qahaata kochatanne enta soo asaa asaa shaakada tayba.
NUM 4:3 Laythi 30-50 gakida adde ubbaa Geeshsha Dunkaaniyan oothanaw danda7eyisata tayba.
NUM 4:4 Qahaata kochati Geeshsha Dunkaaniyan oothana oosoy Dunkaaniyan go7etiya geeshsha miisheta aawatethan naago.
NUM 4:5 “Asay gutaape baanaw dendiya wode Aaroninne iya adde nayti Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddo gelidi, Caaqo Taabotiya sinthan de7iya magarajuwa wodhisidi he Caaqo Taabotiya iyara xaaxo.
NUM 4:6 He kamaa bolla liiqo galba kammo; iya bolla gujidi kaalose carqe kammo; tookiya kasota sagaayotan aatho.
NUM 4:7 “Godaas shiiqiya uytha wothiya xarpheezaa bolla kaalose carqe kammo. Xarpheeza bolla saaneta, cilpata, xuu7atanne woyne ushsha yarshuwa duuqiya otota wothona. Uythay ubba wode xarpheeza bolla de7o.
NUM 4:8 He ubbaa bolla zo7o carqe kammidi iya bolla qassi liiqo galba kammo; hessafe kaallidi tookiya kasota sagaayotan aatho.
NUM 4:9 “Kaalose carqe ekidi xompe wothiya kocaa, iya xompetara, iya qaphetara, bido kessiya keretaranne zayte tigiya xaarotara ubbaa kammo.
NUM 4:10 Yaatidi iya miisheta ubbaa liiqo galban kammidi tookiya arsa bolla wothona.
NUM 4:11 “Kaallidi worqa yarsho saaxiniya kaalose carqen kammo; qassi iya bollara liiqo galba yeggo. Yaatidi tookiya kasota sagaayotan aatho.
NUM 4:12 Hessadaka, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon go7etiya miisheta ubbaa kaalose carqen xaaxo; iya bolla liiqo galba yeggidi, tookiya alga bolla wotho.
NUM 4:13 “Naase yarsho bessaafe biduwa pitidi iya bolla ocha teera daaniya carqe kammo.
NUM 4:14 Yarsho bessan go7etiya miisheta ubbaa; tama cooceta, asho qapheta, akaafatanne haatha kereta iya bolla wothidi, liiqo galba kammo. Yaatidi tookiya kasota sagaayotan aatho.
NUM 4:15 Aaroninne iya adde nayti, geeshshabatanne iyan go7etiya geeshsha miisheta ubbaa kammidaape guye Isra7eele asay gutaape dendiya wode Qahaata kochay yidi tooko. Shin enti hayqonna mela geeshsha miisheta bochofo. Geeshsha Dunkaaney bessaafe dendiya wode qahaata kochaas de7iya aawatethay haysa.
NUM 4:16 “Kahiniya Aarona na7ay Alaazari xompe zaytiya, sawiya ixaaniya, yarsho kathaanne tiyo zaytiya, hessadaka Geeshsha Dunkaaniyan de7iya dumma dumma geeshsha miisheta ubbaa bolla aawatethi de7ees” yaagis.
NUM 4:17 Goday Musekonne Aaronako,
NUM 4:18 “Qahaata kochay Leewe kochaa giddofe hayqidi dhayana mela oothopite.
NUM 4:19 Ubbaafe Geeshsha miishiyako shiiqidi hayqonna mela Aaroninne iya adde nayti Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddo gelidi, Qohaata kochay huuphen huuphen oothana oosuwanne tookana toohuwa shaakidi besso.
NUM 4:20 Qahaata kochay hayqonnaada geeshsha miisheta be7anaw guutha wodeska Dunkaaniya giddo gelopo” yaagis.
NUM 4:21 Goday Museko,
NUM 4:22 “Leewe kochaafe Gedisoona kochaanne enta soo asaa asaa shaakada tayba.
NUM 4:23 Laythi 30-50 gakida adde ubbaa Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon oothanaw danda7eyisata tayba.
NUM 4:24 Gedisoona kochati oothana oosoy haysafe kaallidi de7eysa;
NUM 4:25 enti Geeshsha Dunkaaniya gaatha kamaa, kare kamaa, bollara yegetiya liiqo do7a galba, geliya wula bolla kaqetiya magarajuwa tooko.
NUM 4:26 Hessadaka Geeshsha Dunkaaniyanne yarsho bessa yuushuwan de7iya dabaaba magarajota, dabaaba geliya wula bolla de7iya gesheta, wodorotanne iyaw go7etiya miisheta ubbaa tooko. Gedisoona kochay miishetan oothanaw bessiya ooso ubbaa ootho.
NUM 4:27 Tooho gidin, hara ooso gidin, enti oothiya ooso ubbaa Aaroninne iya adde nayti enta kaalli oosiso. Enti tookanaw bessiyabata ubbaa ne aawatethan entaw gisha.
NUM 4:28 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon Gedisoona kochay oothana oosoy haysa. Enta oosuwa kahiniya Aarona na7ay Itamaari kaallidi oosiso.
NUM 4:29 “Leewe kochaafe Meraara kochaanne enta soo asaa asaa shaakada tayba.
NUM 4:30 Laythi 30-50 gakida adde ubbaa Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon oothanaw danda7eyisata tayba.
NUM 4:31 “Enti Dunkaaniya tuuqeta, liyoota, tuussata, Dunkaaniya gedata,
NUM 4:32 Dunkaaniya yuushon dabaaban eqiya tuussata, he tuussata gedata, dhisheta, wodorotanne iyan koshshiya miisheta ubbaa tooko. Issoy issoy tookanaw bessiya miishiya iya sunthan shaakada gisha.
NUM 4:33 Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon Meraara kochay oothana oosoy haysa. Enti oothana ooso ubbaa kahiniya Aarona na7aa Itamaari aawatethan kaallidi oosiso” yaagis.
NUM 4:34 Musey, Aaroninne Isra7eele halaqati Qahaata kocha enta soo asan asan shaakidi taybidosona.
NUM 4:35 Laythi 30-50 gakida adde ubbaa Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon oothanaw danda7eyisata taybidosona.
NUM 4:36 Enta tayboy 2,750.
NUM 4:37 Goday Muse kiitidaysada Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon oothana mela Museynne Aaroni taybida Qahaata kochati haysata.
NUM 4:38 Gedisoona kochati banta soo asan asan shaaketidi taybetidosona.
NUM 4:39 Laythi 30-50 gakida addeti ubbaa Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon oothanaw danda7eyisata
NUM 4:40 tayboy 2,630.
NUM 4:41 Goday Muse kiitidaysada Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon oothana mela Museynne Aaroni taybida Gedisoona kochati haysata.
NUM 4:42 Meraara kochati banta soo asan asan shaaketidi taybetidosona.
NUM 4:43 Laythi 30-50 gakida addeti ubbay, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon oothanaw danda7eyisata
NUM 4:44 tayboy 3,200.
NUM 4:45 Goday Muse kiitidaysada Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon oothana mela Museynne Aaroni taybida Meraara kochati haysata.
NUM 4:46 Musey, Aaroninne Isra7eele halaqati Leeweta ubbaa enta kochaaninne enta soo asan asan shaakidi tayba.
NUM 4:47 Laythi 30-50 gakida addeti ubbay, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon oothanawnune miisheta tookanaw danda7iya,
NUM 4:48 Leeweta tayboy 8,580.
NUM 4:49 Goday Muse kiitidaysada, enti huuphen huuphen taybetidosona. Hessadaka Goday Muse kiitidaysada enti oothana oosoynne tookana toohoy imetis.
NUM 5:1 Goday Museko,
NUM 5:2 “Isra7eele asay baro hargen oyketida asi woyko asatethafe goggiyabay de7iya asi woyko aha bochidi tunida asi oonaka banta gutaape kessana mela kiita.
NUM 5:3 Ta enta giddon de7iya gutaa tunisonna mela ha geeshshi gidonna asati macca gidin adde enta giddofe kessada goodda” yaagis.
NUM 5:4 Goday Muse kiitidaysada Isra7eele asay enta ubbaa gutaape kessidi gooddidosona.
NUM 5:5 Goday Museko,
NUM 5:6 “Neeni Isra7eele asaas haysa oda; adde gidin woyko macci gidin oonika Godaas ammanetona ixidi hara asi naaqiko he uray bala oothis.
NUM 5:7 I ba nagara paaxo; ba nagara acciya kumetha aca bolla xeetape laatamu kushe gujidi I naaqida uraas ciggo.
NUM 5:8 Shin he naaqetida uray hayqidaba gidiko, aca ekanaw mata dabboy iyaw dhayko, he acay Godaas gididi kahiniyas imeto. He aca bolla gujidi iya nagara atotethas qoho yarshos gidiya maraze dorsi immo.
NUM 5:9 Qassi Isra7eele asay Godaas immiya geeshsha imo ubbay he kahiniyas gido.
NUM 5:10 Issi issi asi immiya geeshsha imotay he uraaba, shin kahiniyas immiko he imotay kahiniyasa” yaagis.
NUM 5:11 Goday Museko,
NUM 5:12 “Isra7eele asaas yaagada oda; issi addiya machiya kare hemetada iyaw ammanetona ixiko,
NUM 5:13 hara addera aqiko, qassi hessa iya ba azinaape qosiko, iya laymatishin be7ida marki baynaba gidiko,
NUM 5:14 I azinay iyo tunasu gidi sidhiko, woyko iya tunonna de7ishin I ba machiw sidhiko,
NUM 5:15 he addey ba machiw kahiniyako efo. I gisho yarshanaw issi kilo giraame banga dhiille efo. He addey ba machiw sidhida gisho, I qohuwa qoncisiya katha yarsho gidiya gisho, dhiilliya bolla zayte tigopo; ixaane iya bolla wothofo.”
NUM 5:16 Kahiney he maccasiw Godaa sinthan esso.
NUM 5:17 Geeshsha haathi keren eko. Geeshsha Dunkaaniya wuygiyape biitta ekidi he haathan gujo.
NUM 5:18 He maccasiw Godaa sinthan esso; he maccase huuphiya billidi sidhida gisho yarshetiya qohuwa qoncisiya katha yarsho I kushen wotho; qassi kahiney ba kushen baadethi ehiya camo haatha keren oyko.
NUM 5:19 Hessafe guye, maccasiw yaagidi caaqiso; “Neeni hara addera aqabonaba gidiko, nenatethaa tunisaboonaba gidiko, baadethi ehiya haathay new gome gidopo.
NUM 5:20 Shin neeni ne azina aggada hara addera aqada tunidaba gidiko,
NUM 5:21 Goday ne yelo keetha gundisidi, ne uluwa gabbisidi ne asaa sinthan nena baadetidaba ootho.
NUM 5:22 Ha baadethi ehiya haathay ne uluwan gelidi ne uluwa gabbiso; ne yelo keethaa gundiso” yaagidi caaqiso. Maccasiya, “Amin7i, hessi tana gako” yaago.
NUM 5:23 “Haysafe guye, kahiney he baadetha xaafo; he xaafidaysa keriyan de7iya haathan meecco.
NUM 5:24 Qangethi ehiya haatha maccasiw ushshanaape sinthe,
NUM 5:25 kahiney maccase kushepe yarsho dhiilliya ekidi, dentho yarsho oothidi Godaas yarsho.
NUM 5:26 Kahiney yarsho kathaafe zolle ekidi bala qoncisiya yarsho oothidi yarsho bessan xuuggo. Hessafe guye, maccasiw he haatha ushsho.
NUM 5:27 Iya ba azinaas ammanetona ixada tunidaba gidiko baadetha haathay I uluwan camo saho medho. I uloy gabbana; I yelo keethayka gundana; iya ba asaa giddon baadetidaaro gidana.
NUM 5:28 Iya tunaboonabanne xillo maccas gidiko, iya geeshshi gidana; na7a yelanaw danda7awusu.
NUM 5:29 “Issi asi ba machiw laymatasu gidi sidhiko woyko qaanatiko yarsho bessi ehidi iyo esso. Kahiney he wogaa ubbaa I bolla polo.
NUM 5:31 Azinay, qohoy baynaba gidana, shin macciya ba nagaraa gaason gakiya waaye ubbaa tookana” yaagis.
NUM 6:1 Goday Museko,
NUM 6:2 “Isra7eele asaa haysada gada kiita; adde gidin woyko macca bana Godaas dummayidi Naazirawe gidanaw qangiko,
NUM 6:3 woyne woyko hara mathoyiya ushshi uyopo. Caalabanne mathoyaba uyopo; woyne teera, tiyanne mela moopo.
NUM 6:4 I bana Godaas dummayida wode ubban, woyne ayfiya gidin poquwa gidin woyko kochaa gidin moopo.
NUM 6:5 “I bana Godaas dummayida wode ubban, ba huuphiya meedetofo woyko qanxetofo. I ba huuphe binaana adussidi dicho. I bana Godaas dummayida wodey poletana gakanaw geeshshi gidanaw koshshees.
NUM 6:6 I bana Godaas dummayida woden ubban ahako shiiqopo.
NUM 6:7 I bana dummayidaysa erisey iya huuphiya gidiya gisho, iya aaway woyko iya aayiya woyko iya ishay woyko iya michiya hayqiko enta aha bochidi bana tunisopo.
NUM 6:8 I bana Godaas dummayida wode ubban Godaas geeshshi.
NUM 6:9 “Asi iya matan qoponna hayqiko, Godaas geeshshi gidida ba huuphiya tunisiko laapun gallas gam7idi ba huuphiya meedeto.
NUM 6:10 Hospuntha gallasan nam7u holleta woyko nam7u kuraachota Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen de7iya kahiniyas eho.
NUM 6:11 Naazirawey aha bochidi tunida gisho nagarape iya geeshshanaw kahiney holletape issuwa nagara yarsho, hankuwa qassi xuussa yarsho oothidi yarsho. He gallas I ba huuphiya wogaada zaaridi Godaas geeshsho;
NUM 6:12 I bana zaaridi Godaas dummayo. Yaatidi issi laytha maraze naaqo yarsho oothidi yarsho. I Godaas dummayida huuphey tunida gisho, kase I bana Godaas dummayidi de7ida wodey taybetenna.
NUM 6:13 “Issi naazirawey ba qangetha wodiya ongida wode polana wogay haysa; Geeshsha Dunkaaniya penge bidi;
NUM 6:14 borey bayna issi laytha dorsa urge xuussa yarshos, issi laytha uzzo dorsi nagara yarshos, issi maraze issifetetha yarshos he bessaa eho.
NUM 6:15 Qassi katha yarshonne ushsha yarsho entara issife yarshanaw eho. He katha yarshoy irshoy geliboonna lo77o dhiille shamaho zaytera uuketida orde uythinne shamaho zayten tiyetida lee7o gaytan eho.
NUM 6:16 “Kahiney he ubbaa nagara yarshonne xuussa yarsho oothidi Godaas yarsho.
NUM 6:17 Kahiney maraziya gaytan de7iya uythaara Godaas issifetetha yarsho oothidi yarsho; kaallidi katha yarshuwanne ushsha yarshuwa yarsho.
NUM 6:18 Naazirawey Godaas dummayida ba huuphiya Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen meedetidi, binaana issifetetha yarshoy eexiya taman yeggo.
NUM 6:19 “Naazirawey ba huuphiya meedetidaape guye, kahiney doysetida maraziya gedaa ashuwa gaytan de7iya orde uythaafenne lee7o uythaafe ekidi, Naazirawiya kushen wotho.
NUM 6:20 Yaatidi kahiney he ubbaa yuusho yarsho oothidi, Godaas yarsho. He ubbay kahiniya gisho gidiya angaasuwaranne gedaara kahiniyas geeshsha yarsho gidees. Hessafe Godaas Naazirawey woyne ushsha uyo.
NUM 6:21 Hiza Godaas bana dummayida Naazirawey oothana mela imetida wogay haysa. Shin naazirawey yarshanaw koshshiya yarshotape aathidi immanaw qangidaba gidiko, ba qangetha gathanaw koshshees” yaagis.
NUM 6:22 Goday Museko,
NUM 6:23 “Aaroninne iya adde nayti Isra7eele asaa anjiya wode haysada yaagidi anjite yaaga;
NUM 6:24 “ ‘Goday hintena anjo, Goday hintena naago;
NUM 6:25 Goday ba som7uwa hintew poo7iso; I hintew qadheto;
NUM 6:26 Goday ba keeha ayfiyan xeello; I hintew sarotethi immo’ yaagidi anjite” yaaga.
NUM 6:27 “Enti Isra7eele asaa ta sunthan anjiya wode ta enta anjana” yaagis.
NUM 7:1 Musey Geeshsha Dunkaaniya tokidi ongida wode he Dunkaaniyanne iya miishiya, yarsho bessaanne iya miishiya ubbaa zayten tiyidi geeshshis.
NUM 7:2 Hessafe guye, Isra7eele asaa kochan kochan taybidi kaalethiya wode halaqa gidida ubbay,
NUM 7:3 Godaas imota shiishidosona. Enti immida imotay nam7u halaqa sunthan issi para gaare, qassi issi issi halaqa sunthan issi issi booru oothidi, usupun gaaretanne tammanne nam7u boorata Geeshsha Dunkaaniya ehidosona.
NUM 7:4 Goday Museko,
NUM 7:5 “Geeshsha Dunkaaniya oosuwas go77ana mela neeni he imota entafe ekada, enta oosuwas oosuwas koshsheysada shaakada Leewetas imma” yaagis.
NUM 7:6 Hessa gisho, Musey gaaretanne boorata ekidi Leewetas immis.
NUM 7:7 Gedisoona kochaas koshsheysada shaakidi enta oosuwas nam7u gaaretanne oyddu boorata immis.
NUM 7:8 Meraara kochaas koshsheysada shaakidi, enta oosuwas uyddu gaaretanne hospun boorata immis. Enta oosuwa aawatethan kaalethey kahiniya Aarona na7aa Itamaara.
NUM 7:9 Shin Qahaata kochaa oosoy Dunkaaniya geeshsha miisheta hashen toho gidiya gisho Musey entaw para gaarenne booru immibeenna.
NUM 7:10 Musey yarsho bessi Godaas dummayida gallas halaqati yarsho bessa sinthe banta imota ehidosona.
NUM 7:11 Goday Museko, “Issi issi gallas issi issi halaqay yarsho bessi Godaas dummayanaw ba imota immo” yaagis.
NUM 7:12 Koyro gallas ba imota ehiday Yihuda kochaafe Amnadaabe na7aa Na7asoona.
NUM 7:13 Na7asooni ehida imotay geeshsha dunkaanen eretida mizaanen 1,500 giraame birape oosetida picca Saane, 800 giraame birape oosetida ollatiya saane, nam7aaka katha yarsho yarshanaw zaytera walaketida lo77o dhiille kumidaysa;
NUM 7:14 qassi 110 giraame worqafe oosetida ixaaney kumida shaate;
NUM 7:15 xuussa yarshos, issi wofaano, issi maraze, issi laytha urge dorsi;
NUM 7:16 nagara yarshos issi kole;
NUM 7:17 issifetetha yarshos nam7u boorata, ichashu marazeta, ichashu koletanne ichashu urge dorsata ehis. Kaalliya hanko halaqatika Amnadaabe na7ay Na7asooni immidaysada banta imota ehidosona.
NUM 7:18 Nam7antho gallasan Yisakoora kochaafe Zu7ara na7ay Natina7eeli ba imota ehis.
NUM 7:24 Heedzantho gallasan Zabloona kochaafe Heloona na7ay Eli7aabi ba imota ehis.
NUM 7:30 Oyddantho gallasan Robeela, kochaafe Shade7ura na7ay Elizuuri ba imota ehis.
NUM 7:36 Ichashantho gallasan Simoona kochaafe Zurishadaya na7ay Salumi7eeli ba imota ehis.
NUM 7:41 Usupuntho gallasan Gaade kochaafe Ragu7eela na7ay Eliyasaafi ba imota ehis.
NUM 7:48 Laapuntha gallasan Efreema kochaafe Amhuda na7ay Elishama7i ba imota ehis.
NUM 7:54 Hospuntha gallasan Minaase kochaafe Padazuura na7ay Gamali7eeli ba imota ehis.
NUM 7:60 Uddufuntho gallasan Biniyaame kochaafe Gida7oona na7ay Abdaani ba imota ehis.
NUM 7:66 Tammantho gallasan Daane kochaafe Amsadaya na7ay Aki7ezeri ba imota ehis.
NUM 7:72 Tammanne issintho gallasan Aseera kochaafe Okraana na7ay Pagi7eeli ba imota ehis.
NUM 7:78 Tammanne nam7antho gallasan Niftaaleme kochaafe Enaana na7ay Akira ba imota ehis.
NUM 7:84 Yarsho bessay tiyetiya wode Godaas dummayanaw Isra7eele halaqati ehida imotay haysafe kaallidi de7eysa. Birape oosetida tammanne nam7u picca saanetanne ollatiya saaneta; worqafe oosetida tammanne nam7u ixaaney kumida shaateta ehidosona.
NUM 7:85 Issoy issoy 1,500 giraame birape oosetida picca Saane; qassi issoy issoy 800 giraame birape oosetida ollatiya saane, geeshsha dunkaanen eretida mizaanen he ubbaa 28 kilo giraame ehidosona.
NUM 7:86 Ixaaney kumida tammanne nam7u worqa shaateta 1.4 kilo giraame geeshsha dunkaanen eretida mizaanen shiishidosona.
NUM 7:87 Xuussa yarshos shiiqida mehey katha yarshuwara wolla tammanne nam7u wofaanota, tammanne nam7u maraze, tammanne nam7u issi laytha urge dorsinne, tammanne nam7u koleta nagara yarshos shiishidosona.
NUM 7:88 Issifetetha yarshos laatamanne oyddu boorati, usupun tammu marazeta, usupun tammu koleta, usupun tammu issi laytha urge dorsata shiishidosona. Geeshsha Dunkaaniya dummayanaw tiya wode shiiqida yarshoti haysata.
NUM 7:89 Musey Godaara odetanaw Geeshsha Dunkaaniya geliya wode caaqo taabotiya kamaa bolla de7iya nam7u kiruubetape giddon gididi Goday odishin si7is.
NUM 8:1 Goday Museko,
NUM 8:2 “Aaroni laapun xompeta kocaa bolla wothiya wode poo7oy sintha baggara de7iya heera poo7isana mela oothidi wotho gada oda” yaagis.
NUM 8:3 Goday Muse kiitidaysada, Aaroni xompeta kocaa bolla wothidi sintha baggara de7iya heera poo7isana mela oothis.
NUM 8:4 Xompe wothiya kocay, Goday Muse bessidaysada toomape bidi bolla ciishsha gakanaw qoxetida worqafe oosetis.
NUM 8:5 Goday Museko,
NUM 8:6 “Isra7eele asaa giddofe Leeweta shaakada wogaada enta geeshsha.
NUM 8:7 Neeni enta geeshshanaw haysada ootha; geeshshiya haatha ekada enta bolla wurxa; enti banta asatethaa ubbaa meedeto; banta ma7uwa meecco; yaanidi enti wogaada geeshshi gidana.
NUM 8:8 Kaallidi enti issi wofaanonne katha yarshos gidiya zaytera walahetida lo77o dhiille eko; qassi neeni nagara yarshos hara issi wofaano eka.
NUM 8:9 Hessafe guye Isra7eele asa ubbaa shiishada, Leeweta Geeshsha Dunkaaniya sinthe ehada essa.
NUM 8:10 Isra7eele asay enta huuphiya bolla banta kushiya wotho.
NUM 8:11 Leeweti Isra7eele asaa giddofe taw dummatidi oothana mela yuusho yarsho oothidi Aaroni ta sinthe shiisho.
NUM 8:12 Leeweti banta kushiya nam7u wofaanota huuphen wotho. Leeweta nagara atotethas issuwa nagara yarsho, qassi hankuwa xuussa yarsho oothada Godaas yarsha.
NUM 8:13 “Leeweta shaakada taw dummaya; Aaronanne iya adde nayta enta bolla shuuma.
NUM 8:14 Hessada oothada Leeweta Isra7eele asape taw dummaya; enti tabaa gidana.
NUM 8:15 “Neeni enta geeshshidaapenne dummayidaape guye Leeweti Geeshsha Dunkaaniyan banta oosuwa oothanaw yo.
NUM 8:16 Isra7eele asaa giddofe kumethi enti taw imetidosona; Isra7eelen bayra yeletida adde nayta bessan Leeweta taw ekas.
NUM 8:17 Isra7eele asaa giddon bayra yeletida ase gidin mehe gidin ubbay tabaa. Taani Gibxe biittan bayra ubbaa wodhida wode enta taw dummayas.
NUM 8:18 Isra7eelen bayra yeletida adde nayta bessan taw Leeweta ekas.
NUM 8:19 Isra7eele asaa giddofe Leeweta Aaronasinne iya adde naytas immas. Isra7eele asay Geeshsha Dunkaaniyako shiiqidi qohetonna mela Leeweti Isra7eele asaa gisho Geeshsha Dunkaaniyan oothanawunne nagara atotethi ehanaw dooretidosona” yaagis.
NUM 8:20 Goday Muse kiitidaysada, Musey, Aaroninne Isra7eele asa ubbay Leeweta dummayidosona.
NUM 8:21 Leeweti bantana geeshshidosona; banta ma7uwa meeccidosona. Aaroni enta Godaas dumma imo oothidi shiishis; entaw nagara atotethas yarshidi enta geeshshis.
NUM 8:22 Hessafe guye, Leeweti Aaronanne iya adde nayta aawatetha garsan gididi Geeshsha Dunkaaniya giddon banta oosuwa oothanaw yidosona. Goday Muse Leeweta dummayanaw kiitidaysada enti oothidosona.
NUM 8:23 Goday Museko,
NUM 8:24 “Haysi Leeweti oothana wogaa; laythi laatamanne ichashanne iyape bolla gidida Leewe adde ubbay Geeshsha Dunkaaniyan oothanaw yo.
NUM 8:25 Shin laythi ishatamu gidiya wode banta oosuwape shempo; zaari oothofo.
NUM 8:26 Enti Geeshsha Dunkaaniyan oothiya banta ishata oothi maaddanaw danda7oosona. Shin enti bantaw ay oosoka oothofo. Hiza neeni Leeweta haysada oosisa” yaagis.
NUM 9:1 Isra7eele asay Gibxefe keyida nam7antho laythan koyro ageenan Siina mela biittan Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
NUM 9:2 “Isra7eele asay Paasika Ba7aale iya qamman boncho.
NUM 9:3 Ha ageenan tammanne oyddantho gallasan iya qamman omarsi iya woga ubbaadanne iya kiita ubbaada boncho” yaagis.
NUM 9:4 Hessa gisho, Musey Isra7eele asay Paasika Ba7aale bonchana mela entaw odis.
NUM 9:5 Goday Muse kiitidaysada, Isra7eele asay koyro ageenan tammanne oyddantho gallasan, omarsi Siina mela biittan Paasika Ba7aale bonchidosona.
NUM 9:6 Shin entafe baggati aha bochidi tunida gisho he gallas Paasika Ba7aale bonchanaw danda7ibookona. Hessa gisho, enti he gallas Musekonne Aaronako yidi,
NUM 9:7 “Nuuni aha bochida gisho tunida, shin he qamman hara Isra7eele asaara Godaas yarsho yarshonna mela ayis digetido?” yaagidosona.
NUM 9:8 Musey zaaridi, “Goday hintebaa taw odana gakanaw gam7ishite” yaagis.
NUM 9:9 Goday Museko,
NUM 9:10 “Isra7eele asaako haysada yaaga; hintefe woyko hinte kochaafe oonika aha bochidi tuniko woyko ogetidabaa gidiko, Paasika Ba7aale bonchanaw danda7ees.
NUM 9:11 Nam7antho ageenan tammanne oyddantho gallas omarsi Paasika Ba7aale boncho. Paasika dorsa uytharanne camo boncora mo.
NUM 9:12 Sa7ay wontana gakanaw dorsa ashuwape aybika attofo; qassi iya meqethafe issuwaka menthofo. Paasika Baaliya woga ubbaa ootho.
NUM 9:13 Shin geeshshinne ogetonna as Paasika bonchona ixiko, I ta asaa giddofe kuretto. Godaa yarshuwa iya qamman yarshiboona gisho ba nagaraa gisho pirda ekees.
NUM 9:14 “Hinte giddon de7iya bete asi Paasika Ba7aale bonchanaw koyko, Paasika wogaada boncho. Betanchoynne biitta aawu na7i ubbay he wogaatho ootho” yaagis.
NUM 9:15 Geeshsha Dunkaaney toketida gallas shaaray Geeshsha Dunkaaniya ma7is. Omarsafe doomidi, wonta gakanaw Geeshsha Dunkaaniya bollara de7iya shaaray tama daanees.
NUM 9:16 Hessada gallas gallas shaaray ma77ees; qamma qamma he shaaray tamada poo7ees.
NUM 9:17 He shaaray Geeshsha Dunkaaniya bollafe dendiya wode ubban Isra7eele asay banta dunkaanida gutaape dendoosona. Qassi he shaaray wodhiya bessan Isra7eele asay dunkaanosona.
NUM 9:18 Isra7eele asay Godaa kiitan gutaape dendoosona; qassi Godaa kiitan dunkaanosona. Shaaray Geeshsha Dunkaaniya bolla gam7iya wode ubban banta dunkaanida gutan gam7oosona.
NUM 9:19 Shaaray Geeshsha Dunkaaniya bolla daro gallas gam7ikoka, Isra7eele asay Godaa kiita naagosonape attishin, awuka bookona.
NUM 9:20 Issi issi toho shaaray Geeshsha Dunkaaniya bolla guutha gallas gam7ees. Gidikoka enti Godaa kiitan dunkaanosona; qassi Godaa kiitan gutaape dendoosona.
NUM 9:21 Issi issi toho shaaray omarsafe wontana gakanaw xalaala gam7ees; shaaray dendiya wode enti dendoosona. Gallas gidin, qamma gidin, shaaray dendiya wode enti dendoosona.
NUM 9:22 Shaaray Geeshsha Dunkaaniya bolla nam7u gallas gidin woyko issi ageena woyko issi laythi gam7in Isra7eele asay banta dunkaanida gutan gam7osonape attishin, bookona. Shin shaaray dendiya wode entika dendoosona.
NUM 9:23 Goday Muse Kiittidaysada enti Godaa kiitan dunkaanosona qassi Godaa kiitan gutaape dendidi boosona.
NUM 10:1 Goday Museko,
NUM 10:2 asaa shiiqos xeeganawunne dunkaanida gutaape denthanaw maaddiya nam7u moyzeta birape qoxada medha.
NUM 10:3 Ha nam7u moyzeti punetiya wode asa ubbay Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen neeko shiiqo.
NUM 10:4 Shin issi moyze xalaali punetiko, Isra7eele kochaa halaqati ne sinthe shiiqo.
NUM 10:5 Moyzey koyro punetiya wode Geeshsha Dunkaaniyape doloha baggan dunkaanida kochay dendo.
NUM 10:6 Moyzey nam7antho punetiya wode dugeha baggan dunkaanida kochay dendo. Moyzey hessatho punetiya wode gutaape dendanaw malla gido.
NUM 10:7 Asa shiishanaw moyze punna, shin hankoysada dumma mallara punnofa.
NUM 10:8 Kahineti, Aarona nayti moyze punno. Haysi newunne yaana yeletetha ubbaas merina woga gido.
NUM 10:9 “Hinte gadiya bolla ola denthida hinte morkiyara hinte oletanaw keyiya wode he moyzeta goochidi punnite. He wode Goday, hinte Xoossay hintena akeekidi, hinte morketape ashshana.
NUM 10:10 Hinte ufaysa gallasatan hessika ageena xeeron, eretida ba7aaletan, xuussa yarsho wodeninne issifetetha yarsho wode moyze punnite. Hessi Xoossaa sinthan hintena akeekisiyaba gidana. Taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa” yaagis.
NUM 10:11 Asay Gibxefe keyin, nam7antho laythan, nam7antho ageenan, laatamantho gallasan, shaaray Geeshsha Dunkaaniya bollafe dendis.
NUM 10:12 Yaatin asay Siina mela biittafe maaran maaran dendidosona; shaaray Paarana mela biitta gakidi wodhis.
NUM 10:13 Goday Muse kiitidaysada enti baanaw koyro dendidosona.
NUM 10:14 Koyro Yihuda kochaa baggan dunkaanida kochay banta mala ekidi keyidosona. Entana kaalethey Amnadaabe na7aa Na7asoona.
NUM 10:15 Yisakoora kochaa kaalethey Zu7ara na7aa Natina7eela.
NUM 10:16 Zabloona kochaa kaalethey Heloona na7aa Eli7aaba.
NUM 10:17 Yaatin, Geeshsha Dunkaaney shodetin, Gedisoona kochatinne Meraara kochati tookidi dendidosona.
NUM 10:18 Kaallidi Robeela kochaa baggan dunkaanida kochay banta mala oykide keyidosona. Robeela kochaa kaalethey Shade7ura na7aa Elizuura.
NUM 10:19 Simoona kochaa kaalethey Zurishadaya na7aa Salumi7eela.
NUM 10:20 Gaade kochaa kaalethey Ragu7eela na7aa Eliyasaafa.
NUM 10:21 Yaatin Qahaata kochay geeshsha miisheta tookidi dendidosona. Enti kaalliya guta gakanaape sinthe Geeshsha Dunkaaney toketidi uttees.
