NUM 10:22 Kaallidi Efreema kochaa baggan dunkaanida kochati banta malla oykidi keyoosona. Efreema kochaa kaalethey Amhuda na7aa Elishama7a.
NUM 10:23 Minaase kochaa kaalethey Padazuura na7aa Gamali7eela.
NUM 10:24 Biniyaame kochaa kaalethey Gadiyoona na7aa Abdaana.
NUM 10:25 Wursethan Daane kochaa baggan dunkaanida kochay, ubbaas guye baggara kate gididi, banta malaoykidi keyidosona. Daane kochaa kaalethey Amsadaya na7aa Aki7ezera.
NUM 10:26 Aseera kochaa kaalethey Okraana na7aa Pagi7eela.
NUM 10:27 Niftaaleme kochaa kaalethey Enaana na7aa Akira.
NUM 10:28 Isra7eele asay banta zerethan zerethan gutaape dendidi biya maaray hessa.
NUM 10:29 Musey Midiyaame addiya Ragu7eela na7aa Hobaabako, “Goday nuus immana gida biitta laattanaw boos; Goday Isra7eele anjana gida gisho nuura yedha; nuuni new lo77oba oothana” yaagis.
NUM 10:30 Yaatin Hobaabi, “Akay, taani ta biitta ta dabbotako baana” yaagis.
NUM 10:31 Musey zaaridi, “Hayyana, nuna yeggada boopa. Nu biya mela biittan nuuni dunkaanana bessaa ne eraasa; nu baana ogiya nuna kaalethanaw danda7aasa.
NUM 10:32 Neeni nuura biiko, Goday nuus immiya anjuwa ubbaa Nu new shaakana” yaagis.
NUM 10:33 Asay Godaa zumaape dendidi, heedzu gallasa oge bidosona. Godaa caaqo Taabotey enti shempana bessi koyishe heedzu gallas entafe sinthe sinthe bis.
NUM 10:34 Enti dunkaanida gutaape dendiya wode ubban Godaa shaaray gallas gallas entafe bollara de7ees.
NUM 10:35 Taabotey dendiya wode ubban Musey, “Abeeti Godaw, denda; ne morketi laaleto; nena ixeysati ne sinthafe baqato” yaagees.
NUM 10:36 Taabotey shempiya wode ubban Musey, “Abeeti Godaw, daro mukulan taybetiya Isra7eele asaako simma” yaagees.
NUM 11:1 Isra7eele asay bantana gakida metuwan Godaa bolla zuuzumidosona. Enta zuuzuntha Goday si7ida wode iya hanqoy eexin, xuuggiya tama enta bolla yeddis; he tamay enti dunkaanida gutaape issi bagga gaxaa mis.
NUM 11:2 Yaatin Musey enta gisho Godaa woossana mela enti Museko yidi yeekidosona. Musey woossin tamay to7is.
NUM 11:3 Godaa tamay enta giddon eexida gisho, he bessay Tabeera geetetidi xeegetis.
NUM 11:4 Isra7eeletara Gibxefe keyida dumma dumma derey hara kathi maanaw daro amotidosona. Enti, “Nu asho awupe demmanee?
NUM 11:5 Nuuni Gibxen de7iya wode miishe qanxonna miya moluwa, leehiya, habaabe, shunkurte, miskati bayna shunkurtenne tuumuwa hassayoos.
NUM 11:6 Shin ha77i nu qoodhey gordetis; nu ayfeyka ha mannafe attishin, haraba aybaka be7enna” yaagidi yeekidosona.
NUM 11:7 Mannay deebbo ayfe daanees; iya malay bootha adil7e ciishshe daanees.
NUM 11:8 Mannay qamma wodhees; asay yuuyidi iya maxidi woxan gaaccidi woyko udulan caddidi kathoosona. Yaatidi uukosona; iya mal7oy shamaho zaytera uuketida uytha mela.
NUM 11:9 Manni qamma enta gutan akara wodhees.
NUM 11:10 Asay banta dunkaaniya pengen pengen eqidi yeekishin Musey si7is. Enti Godaa hanquwa denthethida gisho, Musey un7etis.
NUM 11:11 Musey Godaako, “Ne aylliya, ta bolla ayis ha metuwa ehadii? Ne tanan ayis ufaytabikii? Ne ha asa ubbaa toohuwa ta bolla ayis wothadii?
NUM 11:12 Ha asa ubbaa ta qanthatadinayee? Woyko enta ta yeladinaayee? Ne enta mayzatas, immana gada caaqida biitta gatho gada na7a idimmada dichiya aseeda ta ki7on ayis enta yeggadii?
NUM 11:13 Ha asa ubbaas ta asho awupe ehanee? Enti taako yidi, ‘Maanaw nuus asho imma’ yaagidi yeekosona.
NUM 11:14 Taani ha asa ubbaa tarka tookanaw danda7ike; taw hessi deexo tooho.
NUM 11:15 Hiza neeni tana haysada oothanaape taw qadheta; ha77i tana wodha; ha metuwape ta shempa aggana” yaagis.
NUM 11:16 Goday Museko, “Asaa kaalethanaw danda7iya Isra7eele halaqatape laapun tammu cimata doora. Enta Geeshsha Dunkaaniyako ehada ne matan essa.
NUM 11:17 Taani wodhada neera yan odetana; ta new immida Ayyaanape shaakada enta bolla wothana. Neeni asaa toohuwa nerka tookonna mela enti nena maaddana.
NUM 11:18 “Neeni asaako haysada yaaga; ‘Wonto hinte asho maana gisho hintena geeshshite. Nu asho awupe demmanee? Nuus Gibxen sa7i lo77oshin’ yaagidi hinte yeekida yeehuwa Goday si7is. Ha77i Goday asho immana; hinteka maana.
NUM 11:19 Hinte maanay issi gallas woyko nam7u gallas woyko ichashu gallas woyko tammu gallas woyko laatamu gallas xalaala gidenna.
NUM 11:20 Shin ‘Hinte giddon de7iya Godaa hinte kadhida gishonne Gibxefe keyonna attidaako nuus lo77oshin gida gisho, hintew siidhera keyana gakanawunne hinte saletana gakanaw issi ageena kumethi hinte asho maana’ yaaga” yaagis.
NUM 11:21 Shin Musey Godaako, “Heko, ta 600,000 asaa kaalethashe de7ayis. Neeni issi ageena kumethi enti asho maana mela immana gaasa.
NUM 11:22 Miiza wudenne dorsa wude ubbaa shukin entaw gidanee? Abban de7iya molo ubbaa shiishiyako entaw gidanee?” yaagis.
NUM 11:23 Yaatin, Goday Museko, “Godaa kushey qantheyee? Taani new odiyabay tumeekonne wordoko neeni ha77i be7ana” yaagis.
NUM 11:24 Hessa gisho, Musey kare keyidi, Goday gidaysa asaas odis. Isra7eele cimatape laapun tammu asaa shiishidi, Geeshsha Dunkaaniya yuushon essis.
NUM 11:25 Yaatin, Goday shaarara wodhidi iyara odetis; iya bolla de7iya Ayyaanape ekidi, he laapun tammu cimata bolla wothis. Ayyaanay enta bolla shempida wode enti nabeda tinbite odidosona. Shin hessafe guye, zaaridi tinbite odibookona.
NUM 11:26 He laapun tammu cimatara xaafetida asatape Eldaadanne Modaada geetetiya nam7ati dunkaanida gutan attidi Geeshsha Dunkaaniyako yibookona. Shin enta bollaka Ayyaanay wodhin, dunkaanida gutan tinbite odidosona.
NUM 11:27 Issi pantha addey Museko woxi yidi, “Eldaadinne Modaadi dunkaanida gutan tinbite odoosona” yaagis.
NUM 11:28 Yaanin, ba na7atethafe doomidi, Muse maaddiya Nawe na7aa Iyyasuy Museko, “Ta godaw, Muse, enta teqa” yaagis.
NUM 11:29 Shin Musey zaaridi, “Ta gisho ne qanaatay? Goday ba asa ubbaa bolla ba ayyaana wothidi nabeda tinbite odisiyaba gidiyako ta ufaytayis” yaagis.
NUM 11:30 Yaatidi, Museynne Isra7eele cimati dunkaanida gutaa simmidosona.
NUM 11:31 Qoponna Goday carko denthidi, sa7ape nam7u wadha mela dhoqu gidi piradhiya kuraachota abbafe ehis. Enta dunkaaniya yuushuwan ubba baggara issi gallasa oge mela sa7an wodhidosona.
NUM 11:32 He gallasinne he qamma ubbaa, qassi wontetha gallasika asay kare keyidi, he kuraachota oykidi shiishidosona. Entafe oonika 10 kilo giraamepe guuthu shiishibenna. Enti dunkaaniya guta yuushon melisanaw miccidosona.
NUM 11:33 Shin ashoy buroo enta doonan de7ishininne meetetidi wuronna de7ishin, Godaa hanqoy asaa bolla eexis; Goday asaa wolqaama boshan shocis.
NUM 11:34 Asho amotidi hayqida asaa enti he bessan moogida gisho he bessay Kebroot-Hataaba geetetidi sunthetis.
NUM 11:35 Asay he bessaafe dendi bidi Haxeroota geetetiya bessan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 12:1 Musey Tophe biitta maccas ekida gisho, Mayraamanne Aaroni Muse yaagidi boridosona.
NUM 12:2 “Goday Muse baggara xalaala odetidee? I nu baggara odibeennee?” yaagidosona. Goday enti gidaysa si7is.
NUM 12:3 Musey biittan de7iya asa ubbaafe aadhiya aada asi.
NUM 12:4 Qoponna Goday Muse, Aaronanne Mayraamo, “Hinte heedzati Geeshsha Dunkaaniyako keyte” yaagis. Entika keyidosona.
NUM 12:5 Goday shaara tuussara wodhidi Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen eqidi, Aarona! Mayraame! yaagidi xeegis. Enti nam7ay iya sinthe shiiqin,
NUM 12:6 Goday, “Ta odeysa si7ite; hinte giddon nabey de7iko, ta iyaw qoncayis; qassi iyaw amuhon odayis.
NUM 12:7 Shin ta aylley Muse hessada gidenna; I ta keetha ubban ammanetidaysa.
NUM 12:8 Taani Musera som7on odetasipe attishin, leemison odike. I ta malaa be7ees. Yaatin, hinte ta aylliya Muse boranaw ayis yayyibeketii?” yaagis.
NUM 12:9 Godaa hanqoy enta bolla eexin, I enta aggidi bis.
NUM 12:10 Shaaray Geeshsha Dunkaaniya bollafe dendida wode Mayraama baro hargen milxi gada booxasu. Aaroni iiko simmidi xeelliya wode baro hargen oyketidaaro be7is.
NUM 12:11 Aaroni Museko, “Hay ta godaw, nuuni eeyatethan oothida nagaraas nuna haysada seeropa.
NUM 12:12 Iyo ba aaye ulope keyiya wode I asatethafe baggay meetetin, hayqidi yeletida na7a mela oothofa” yaagis.
NUM 12:13 Yaatin, Musey, “Abeeti Godaw, iyo patharki” yaagidi Godaa woossis.
NUM 12:14 Goday Museko, “I aaway I som7on cuttiyaba gidiyako, iya laapun gallas yeellara gam7awusu gidikee? Hessa gisho, laapun gallas dunkaaniya gutaape iyo gaxa kessada dumma bessan wotha; hessafe guye, simmada yo” yaagis.
NUM 12:15 Yaatin, Mayraama dunkaaniya gutaape gaxa keyada laapun gallas uttasu. Iya simmana gakanaw asay gutaa aggidi baanaw dendibeenna.
NUM 12:16 Hessafe guye, asay Haxeroota geetetiya bessaafe dendidi, Paarana mela biittan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 13:1 Goday Museko,
NUM 13:2 “Taani Isra7eeletas immana Kanaane biitta wochana mela tammanne nam7u Isra7eele kochaafe issi issi asi halaqa oothada kiitta” yaagis.
NUM 13:3 Yaatin Musey Goday kiitidaysada Paarana mela biittafe Isra7eele kochaafe tammanne nam7u halaqata kiittis.
NUM 13:4 Enta sunthay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Robeela kochaafe Zakura na7aa Samu7a;
NUM 13:5 Simoona kochaafe Hoora na7aa Shaafaxa;
NUM 13:6 Yihuda kochaafe Yoofona na7aa Kaaleba;
NUM 13:7 Yisakoora kochaafe Yoosefa na7aa Yigi7aala;
NUM 13:8 Efreema kochaafe Nawe na7aa Awuse;
NUM 13:9 Biniyaame kochaafe Raafu na7aa Falxa;
NUM 13:10 Zabloona kochaafe Sooda na7aa Gadi7eela;
NUM 13:11 Yoosefa na7aa Minaase kochaafe Suusa na7aa Gaade;
NUM 13:12 Daane kochaafe Gamaala na7aa Ami7eela;
NUM 13:13 Aseera kochaafe Mika7eela na7aa Satura;
NUM 13:14 Niftaaleme kochaafe Waafisa na7aa Nahiba;
NUM 13:15 Gaade kochaafe Maka na7aa Ge7u7eela.
NUM 13:16 He biitta wochana mela Musey kiitida asata sunthay haysata. Musey Nawe na7aa Awuse sunthaa Iyyasu gidi sunthaa laammis.
NUM 13:17 Musey enta, “Negebe mela biitta kanthidi pude derey dariya biitta keyte.
NUM 13:18 Biittay ay mela biittako, asay ay mela minookonne taybon guutheko daroko be7ite.
NUM 13:19 Enti de7iya biittay lo77oko iiteko, enta katamati diretidaakonne mela de7iyako,
NUM 13:20 biittay araddeko laddeko, biittay woran kametidaakonne quu7eko be7ite. Minnite; he biittan de7iya katha ayfiyape ekonna yoopite” yaagis. He wodey woyney teeridi maxetiya wode.
NUM 13:21 Enti keyidi Siina mela biittafe doomidi, Lebo-Hamaata matan de7iya Rehooba gakanaw de7iya biitta wochidosona.
NUM 13:22 Negebe mela biitta kanthidi, Kebroona gakidosona. He bessan Akmaana, Sesayanne Talmaya geetetiya Enaaqa kochati de7oosona. Kebrooni Gibxen de7iya Xo7aane katamaape laapun laythi koyrottidi keexetis.
NUM 13:23 Yaara kanthidi, Eshkola Zangaara bidi gakiya wode teera woyne tashiyara qanxidosona. He tashey deexo gidiya gisho nam7u asi kaso aathidi tookidosona. Iya bolla gujidi oromaanenne balase mithaa ayfe ekidi yidosona.
NUM 13:24 Isra7eele asay he bessaafe woyne tashiya qanxida gisho he bessaa Eshkola Zangaara gidi xeegidosona.
NUM 13:25 Enti he biitta oytamu gallas wochidi guye simmidosona.
NUM 13:26 Paarana mela biittan Qaadesan de7iya Museko, Aaronakonne Isra7eele maabara ubbaako yidosona. Enti be7idaba asa ubbaas odidosona; he biittafe ekidi yida ayfiyaka enta bessidosona.
NUM 13:27 Enti Museko, “Neeni nuna yeddida biitta bida; he biittan maathinne eessi goggees; he biitta ayfiyaka haysa be7a.
NUM 13:28 Shin he biittan de7iya asay wolqaama; enta katamatika gimbe dirsan diretidaysatanne gita. Nuuni ubbaafe aathidi Enaaqa kochata yan be7ida.
NUM 13:29 Amaaleqati Negebe mela biittan; Hitetinne, Yaabuseti derey dariya Amooreta biittan; qassi Kanaaneti Medetiraane Abbaa doonaninne Yordaanose shaafa gaxan de7oosona” yaagidosona.
NUM 13:30 Yaatin Kaalebi asaa Muse sinthan si77i oothidi, “Nuuni xoonanaw danda7iya gisho, ha77i keyidi he biitta yegisidi ane oykoos” yaagis.
NUM 13:31 Shin Kaalebara bida asati, “He biitta asay nuupe aadhidi minniya gisho, nuuni enta xoonanaw danda7oko” yaagidosona.
NUM 13:32 Enti yuuyidi wochida biittaba Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagidi iita oda odidosona. “Nuuni wochida biittay yan de7iya asaaka miya biitta; yan de7iya asayka daro adusse.
NUM 13:33 Nuuni yan Enaaqa koche gidida Nifilime asata be7ida. Enta be7ida ayfen nuna xeelliya wode nuuni xaqo mela; entika nuna hessada be7oosona” yaagidosona.
NUM 14:1 He wode qamma maabara ubbay banta qaala dhoqu oothidi yeekidosona.
NUM 14:2 Isra7eele asay Muse bollanne Aarona bolla zuuzumidosona. Kumetha maabaray, “Nuuni Gibxe biittan de7ishe woyko ha mela biittan hayqida gidorko.
NUM 14:3 Nuuni mashshan wurana mela Goday ha biitta nuna ayis ehii? Nu machetinne nu nayti di7etana; hessa hananaape guye Gibxe simoy nuus keehennee?” yaagidosona.
NUM 14:4 Enti issoy issuwako, “Nuna kaalethiya asi dooridi guye Gibxe simmoos” yaagidosona.
NUM 14:5 Yaatin, Museynne Aaroni he bessan shiiqida Isra7eele maabara sinthan som7ora sa7an gufannidosona.
NUM 14:6 Biittaa wochanaw bida asaa giddofe Nawe na7aa Iyyasuynne Yoofona na7aa Kaalebi banta ma7uwa peedhidosona.
NUM 14:7 Isra7eele maabaraako, “Nuuni kanthi keyidi wochida biittay daro lo77o.
NUM 14:8 Goday nunan ufaytiyaba gidiko maathinne eessi goggiya biitta nuna gelsana; he biitta nuus immana.
NUM 14:9 Hessa gisho, Godaa bolla makallofite. He biitta asaas yayyofite; enti nuus oythika gidokona. Entaw eeshoy baawa; Goday nuura de7ees; hinte entaw yayyofite” yaagidosona.
NUM 14:10 Yaatin Isra7eele maabaray enta shuchan caddanaw dendis. He wode Godaa bonchoy Xoossaa Dunkaaniyan Isra7eele asa ubbaas qoncis.
NUM 14:11 Goday Museko, “Ha asay tana kadhey awude gakanaasee? Taani enta giddon oothida malaatata be7ishe, awude gakanaw tanan ammanonna ixanee?
NUM 14:12 Taani enta gadon shocada dhaysana, shin nena entafe dariyanne minniya kawotethas aawa oothana” yaagis.
NUM 14:13 Musey zaaridi Godaako, “Neeni ne wolqan ha asaa Gibxefe kessidaysa eriya Gibxeti hessa si7iko woyganee?
NUM 14:14 Enti he biittan de7iya asaas hessa odana. Abeeti Godaw, neeni ha asaara de7eysa enti si7idosona. Abeeti Godaw, nuuni nena be7idaysa, ne shaaray nu bolla kuyatidaysanne gallas shaara tuussan, qamma tama tuussan neeni nuna kaalethidaysa enti be7idosona.
NUM 14:15 Yaatin, ha77i neeni ha asa ubbaa issi toho wodha dhaysiyaba gidiko ne kase oothidaysa si7ida kawotethati,
NUM 14:16 ‘Goday, ha asaas immana gidi caaqida biitta enta gelsanaw danda7iboona gisho mela biittan wodhi dhaysis yaagidi’ odana.
NUM 14:17 “Hessa gisho, Godaw, ne wolqaa nuna bessa; ne nuus gelida qaala qopa.
NUM 14:18 ‘Goday elle hanqetenna; maarotinne siiqoy kumidaysa nagaranne geellatethi atto geysa; shin balida uraa seeronna aggenna. Yelidaysata nagaraa gisho heedzanthonne oyddantho yeletethi gakanaw nayta seerana’ yaagadasa.
NUM 14:19 Ha asay Gibxefe keyoosope doomada hachi gakanaw enta maaridaysada ne merinaa siiquwan ha asaa nagaraa atto garki” yaagis.
NUM 14:20 Goday zaaridi, “Ne oychidaysada ta enta maarana.
NUM 14:21 Shin ta de7o gideysadanne ta bonchoy sa7a ubbaa kumidaysada,
NUM 14:22 ha asaape issi asika he biitta be7enna. Gibxe biittaninne mela biittan oothida malaatata ha asati be7idosona; shin enti tammu toho tana paacidi taw kiitetonna ixidosona.
NUM 14:23 Hessa gisho, ta enta mayzatas immana gada caaqida biitta tana kadhidaysatape issoyka gelenna.
NUM 14:24 Shin ta aylley Kaalebi entafe dummatiya gishonne tana polo wozanape kaallida gisho, I kase wochida biitta iyaw immana; iya zerethayka he biitta laattana.
NUM 14:25 Shin ha77i Amaaleqatinne Kanaaneti zangaaran de7iya gisho, wonto Zo7o Abbaako efiya ogiya oykidi mela biitta guye simmite” yaagis.
NUM 14:26 Goday Musekonne Aaronako,
NUM 14:27 “Ha iita asay ta bolla awude gakanaw zuuzumanee? Taani Isra7eele asaa zuuzuntha si7as.
NUM 14:28 Hessa gisho, neeni entaw haysada gada oda; ‘Taani ta de7uwan caaqayis; hinte gidaysada ta hintew oothana.’ Taani, Goday haysa odayis.
NUM 14:29 Asay taybetiya wode laythi laatamanne iyape bolla gidida asi ubbay ta bolla zuuzumida gisho, hinte ahay ha mela biittan kundana.
NUM 14:30 Yoofona na7a Kaalebapenne Nawe na7a Iyyasupe attishin, hintefe oonika ta hintena laatisanaw caaqida biitta gelenna.
NUM 14:31 Hinte, ‘Nu nayti di7eti attana’ gida hinte nayta, he hinte kadhida biitta gelsana; he biittay entaw laata gidana.
NUM 14:32 Shin hinte ahay ha mela biittan kundidi attana.
NUM 14:33 Hinte ammanetibona gisho, hintefe wursetha ahay ha mela biittan kundana gakanaw, hinte nayti ha mela biittan waayetishe oytamu laythi dorse heemmana.
NUM 14:34 Hinte biitta wochida oytamu gallasaa taybon, issi gallasas issi laythi, oytamu laythi hinte nagaraa gisho waayetana; he wode ta hinte bolla ay mela hanqetidaako hinte erana.
NUM 14:35 Issife ta bolla dendida ha iita maabara bolla ta haysada oothana; enti ha mela biittan kundi attana; haysan enti hayqana; ta Goday haysa odayis” yaagis.
NUM 14:36 He biitta wochana mela Musey kiitida asati simmidi, he biittaba iita oda odidi, Muse bolla asay zuuzumana mela oothidaysati,
NUM 14:37 Godaa sinthan boshan hayqidosona.
NUM 14:38 He biitta wochanaw bida asaape Yoofona na7ay Kaalebinne Nawe na7ay Iyyasu xalaali attidosona.
NUM 14:39 Musey hessa Isra7eele asaas odida wode asay daro yeekis.
NUM 14:40 Wontetha gallas wonta guura dendidi, gezze biitta keyidi, “Nuuni nagara oothida, shin ha77i Goday nuus immana gida bessaa pude keyana” yaagidosona.
NUM 14:41 Shin Musey entako, “Godaa kiitaa hinte ayis menthetii? Hintew hanenna.
NUM 14:42 Goday hintera doonna gisho, boopite; hinte morketi hintena xoonana.
NUM 14:43 Amaaleqa asaaranne Kanaane asaara hinte oletidi mashshan hayqana. Godaas hinte kiitetonna ixida gisho, Goday hintera deenna” yaagis.
NUM 14:44 Shin enti Godaa Caaqo Taaboteynne Musey gutaape dendonna de7ishin, derey dariya biitta baanaw minnidi dendidosona.
NUM 14:45 Yaanin derey dariya biittan de7iya Amaaleqa asaynne Kanaane asay enta ollan xoonidi, Horma gakanaw enta yedethidosona.
NUM 15:1 Goday Museko,
NUM 15:2 “Isra7eele asaa haysada yaaga; hinte daana mela ta hintew immiya biitta geliya wode,
NUM 15:3 xuussa yarsho gidin woyko gaso yarsho gidin woyko dosan yarshiya yarsho gidin woyko ba7aale gallasa yarsho gidin, mehepe woyko dorsaafe Godaas taman xuugetiya sawiya yarsho yarshite.
NUM 15:4 Yarshuwa yarshiya uray katha yarshuwas issi kilo giraame lo77o dhiille sayso litiro shamaho zayten munuqetidaysa eho.
NUM 15:5 Qassi xuussa yarshos woyko hara yarshos ehiya issi issi dorsaara sayso litiro woyne ushsha yarsho oothidi giigisite.
NUM 15:6 Maraze yarshiya wode nam7u kilo giraame lo77o dhiille issi litironne bagga shamaho zayten munuqetidaysa ehite.
NUM 15:7 Ushsha yarshuwas siko litiro woyne ushsha yarshuwas ehite. Hessi Godaas sawiya yarsho gidana.
NUM 15:8 Gaso woyko issifetetha yarshos wofaano xuussa yarsho oothada Godaas yarshiya wode,
NUM 15:9 wofaanuwara issife heedzu kilo giraame lo77o dhiille, nam7u litiro shamaho zayten munuqetidaysa katha yarsho oothada eha.
NUM 15:10 Ushsha yarshuwas bagga litiro woyne ushsha ehite. Hessi Godaas sawiya xuussa yarsho gidana.
NUM 15:11 “Issi issi wofaanoy woyko issi issi marazey woyko issi issi koley yarshetiya wode haysada hanidi ooseto.
NUM 15:12 Daro mehey yarshetiya wode yarshetiya katha yarshoyka hessada daro.
NUM 15:13 Isra7eele asi gidida oonika sawiya xuussa yarsho Godaas yarshiya wode ubban haysada oothanaw koshshees.
NUM 15:14 Yaana yeletethan hinte giddon de7iya bete woyko hara asi oonika sawiya xuussa yarsho Godaas yarshanaw koyiko hessada oothanaw koshshees.
NUM 15:15 Hintewunne hinte giddon de7iya bete asaas he wogay issino; hessi yaana yeletethaaska eqidi daana woga; Hinteka bete asatika Godaa sinthan issino.
NUM 15:16 Hintewunne hinte giddon de7iya bete asaas higgeynne wogay issino” yaagis.
NUM 15:17 Goday Museko,
NUM 15:18 “Isra7eele asaas haysada gada oda; taani hintena efiya biitta hinte gelidi,
NUM 15:19 he biittan kaxiya kathi hinte miya wode he kathaafe xeera kessidi hinte Godaas yarshite.
NUM 15:20 Hessika, bayra kaxida kathaafe uukida koyro uythi, gidishin, kathi bukiya wudumaafe immiya yarsho oothidi yarshite.
NUM 15:21 Yeletetha ubban hinte biittan kaxida kathaafe koyruwa uukidi Godaas yarsho yarshite.
NUM 15:22 “Goday, Muses odida kiitaa hinte eronna ixidi naagonna attiko,
NUM 15:23 woyko Goday iya baggara immida kiita ubbaa, Goday immida gallasaape doomidi yaana yeletetha gakanaw naagonna ixiko,
NUM 15:24 qassi hessa Isra7eele maabaray eronna oothidaba gidiko maabara ubbay Godaas issi wofaano sawiya xuussa yarsho oothidi, wogay kiiteysada katha yarshuwaranne ushsha yarshuwara yarsho; qassi nagara yarsho oothidi issi kole yarsho.
NUM 15:25 Kahiney kumetha Isra7eele maabaraas nagara atotetha yarsho shiishees. Enti eronna balida banta naaquwa gisho Godaas xuussa yarshonne nagara yarsho yarshida gisho enta nagaray atto geetetana.
NUM 15:26 Isra7eele maabaraynne enta giddon de7iya bete asay eronna he bala oothida gisho asa ubbaa nagaray atto geetetana.
NUM 15:27 “Issi asi eronna nagara oothiko issi laytha kole nagara yarsho oothidi yarsho.
NUM 15:28 Eronna de7ishe nagara oothida uraas kahiney Godaa sinthan nagara atotetha wogaa polo; iya nagaray atto geetetana.
NUM 15:29 Eronna nagara oothida uraas kahiney Godaa sinthan nagara atotetha wogaa polo; iya nagaray atto geetetana.
NUM 15:30 “Shin Isra7eele asi gidin woyko bete asi gidin erishe otoron nagara oothiya uray Godaa cayees. He uray deriya giddofe dhayo.
NUM 15:31 He uray Godaa kiitaa erishe kadhida gishonne iya kiitaa kawushida gisho iyaw dhayoy bessees. Iya balay iya bolla gido” yaagis.
NUM 15:32 Issi gallas Isra7eele asay mela biittan de7ishin, issi uray Sambaata gallas mithi mixishe oyketis.
NUM 15:33 He uraa asay Museko, Aaronakonne Isra7eele maabaraako ehidosona.
NUM 15:34 Enti iya bolla oothanaba eriboona gisho qashon gam7isidosona.
NUM 15:35 Hessafe guye, Goday Museko, “Ha uray hayqanaw bessees; Isra7eele maabaray banta gutaape gaxa kessidi shuchan caddidi wodho” yaagis.
NUM 15:36 Yaatin Isra7eele maabara ubbay Goday Muse kiitidaysada, gutaape gaxa kessidi shuchan caddidi wodhidosona.
NUM 15:37 Goday Museko,
NUM 15:38 “Isra7eele asaas haysada gada oda; hintenne yaana yeletethay hinte afilaa gaxan macara kessidi he macara gaxan kaalose qacina sikite.
NUM 15:39 He macaraa hinte be7iya wode ubban ta kiitata, akeekidi poleeta; taape haakidi hinte ayfiya amuwanne hinte wozanaa qofaa kaallidi laameteketa.
NUM 15:40 He macaraa be7idi hinte ta kiita ubbaa akeekidi polananne Xoossaas dummatidaysata gidana.
NUM 15:41 Taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa; ta hinte Xoossaa gidanaw hintena Gibxefe kessas. Taani Godaa, hinte Xoossaa yaaga” yaagis.
NUM 16:1 Leewe kochaafe Qahaata koche gidida Yisi7ara na7ay Qorey, Robeela kochaafe Eli7aaba nayti Daataneynne Abeeroy qassi Faleta na7ay Oni,
NUM 16:2 Muse bolla dendidosona. Entara nam7u xeetanne ishatamu asati de7oosona; he asati asan eretidaysatanne maabara kaaletheyisata.
NUM 16:3 Enti Musenne Aarona sinthe shiiqidi, “Hinte darsideta; maabara ubbay geeshshi; Goday entara de7ees. Yaatin, Godaa maabara bolla hintena ayis dhoqu dhoqu oothetii?” yaagidosona.
NUM 16:4 Musey hessa si7ida wode Godaa sinthan gufannis.
NUM 16:5 Qorekonne iya cugaako, “Goday wonto wonta ooni iya baggekonne ooni geeshsheko bessana; he I doorida uraa baako shiishana; he uray iyako shiiqana.
NUM 16:6 Wonto wonta neeranne ne asaara haysa oothite; ixaane cuyisiya miishe ekidi,
NUM 16:7 bonqo tama iyan wothidi, Godaa sinthan ixaane cuyisite. Goday dooriya uray I geeshshi gidana. Hinte, Leeweti zawape aadhideta.”
NUM 16:8 Qassika Musey Qoreko, “Hinte Leeweti si7ite.
NUM 16:9 Isra7eele Xoossay hintena ba maabara giddofe dummayidi, geeshsha dunkaaniyan oothana melanne ba asaa sinthan eqidi haggaazana mela baako shiishidaysi hintew guuxidee?
NUM 16:10 I hintenanne hinte ishata Leeweta ubbaa baako shiishis; shin ha77i hinte kahineta bessaa koyeeta.
NUM 16:11 Neeninne ne cuga ubbay Godaa bolla makallidi dendideta; hinte iya bolla zuuzumanaw I Aaroni oonee?” yaagis.
NUM 16:12 “Yaatidi, Musey, Eli7aaba nayta, Daatanenne Abeero xeegisis; shin enti, ‘Nuuni booko’ yaagidosona.
NUM 16:13 Neeni mela biittan nuna wodhanaw maathinne eessi goggiya biittafe nuna kessidaysi guuxis gada ha77i nu bolla halaqa gidanaw koyay?
NUM 16:14 Neeni nuna maathinne eessi goggiya biitta gelsabaaka; woyko neeni nuus laata oothada goshsha gadenne woyne gade immabaaka; neeni nuna cimmaasa; nuuni booko” yaagidosona.
NUM 16:15 Yaatin, Musey daro hanqetidi, Godaako, “Neeni enta yarshuwa ekofa; ta entafe issuwaka qohabike; qassi hari attoshin issi hareka entafe ekabike” yaagis.
NUM 16:16 Qassi Musey Qoreko, “Wonto neeranne ne asaara hessada Aaronika Godaa sinthe shiiqite.
NUM 16:17 Issi issi asi ba ixaane cuyisiya miishiya eko; ixaaneka iyan wotho; ubbay issife nam7u xeetanne ishatamu ixaane cuyisiya miishe gidees; ixaane iyan wothidi Godaa sinthe shiisho. Neeninne Aaroni hinte ixaaniya hessada shiishite” yaagis.
NUM 16:18 Yaatin, issi issi asi ba miishen ixaanenne tama bonqo wothidi geeshsha dunkaaniya pengen Museranne Aaronara issife eqidosona.
NUM 16:19 Qorey ba asaara geeshsha dunkaaniya pengen Muse sinthaninne Aarona sinthan eqidosona. He wode Godaa bonchoy kumetha maabaraas qoncis.
NUM 16:20 Goday Musekonne Aaronako,
NUM 16:21 “Taani issi toho ha asaa dhaysana gisho, entafe shaaketite” yaagis.
NUM 16:22 Shin Museynne Aaroni sa7an gufannidi, “Abeeti Xoossaw, asa shempo ubbaa medhida Xoossaw, issi asi nagara oothiko, neeni kumetha maabara hanqetayee?” yaagidosona.
NUM 16:23 Yaatin, Goday Museko,
NUM 16:24 “Asaas ‘Qore, Daatanenne Abeero dunkaaniya matape kichite’ gada oda” yaagis.
NUM 16:25 Musey dendidi, Daatanekonne Abeeroko bin, Isra7eele cimati iya kaallidosona.
NUM 16:26 I Maabaraako, “Ha iita asaa dunkaaniya matape kichite; entaba aybibaaka bochofite. Akay, giiko, enta nagara gaason hinteka pitetidi dhayana” yaagidi minthidi odis.
NUM 16:27 Yaatin asay Qore, Daatanenne Abeero dunkaaniya matape kichidosona. Daataneynne Abeeroy kare keyidi, banta machetaranne banta naytara banta dunkaaneta pengen eqidosona.
NUM 16:28 Musey asaako, “Taani ha ooso ubbaa oothana mela, Goday tana kiittidaysanne taani ta shenen oothonaysa hinte eranay haysana.
NUM 16:29 Ha asati asi hayqeysada hayqiko woyko asa bolla gakiyaba xalaali enta bolla gakiko Goday tana Kiittibeenna.
NUM 16:30 Shin, Goday oorathaba oothidi, biittay dooyetidi entanne entaw de7iyaba ubbaa mittikonne enti paxa de7ishe duufo geliko he wode ha asati Godaa kadhidaysa hinte erana” yaagis.
NUM 16:31 I yaagidi ongida wode enti eqida biittay dooyetidi,
NUM 16:32 entanne enta soo asaa, Qore cuga ubbaanne entaw de7iyaba ubbaa mittis.
NUM 16:33 Yaatin enti bantaw de7iyaba ubbaara paxa de7ishe, duufo gelidosona. Biittay enta bolla gordetis; enti maabara giddofe dhayidosona.
NUM 16:34 Enta waasuwa gaason enta matan de7iya Isra7eele asa ubbay, “Biittay nunaka mittana hanees” yaagidi baqatidosona.
NUM 16:35 Qassi tami Godaa matape yidi ixaane cuyisiya nam7u xeetanne ishatamu asaa mis.
NUM 16:36 Hessafe guye, Goday Museko,
NUM 16:37 “Kahiney, Aarona na7aa Alaazari naase biratape oosetida ixaane cuyisiya miisheta xuugetida asaape ekidi, he miisheti geeshshi gidiya gisho, bonqo tama hara soo efidi laallana mela oda.
NUM 16:38 He miisheti banta de7uwa dhaysanaw nagara oothida asay ixaane cuyisiya miishe. He miisheti Godaas imetida gishonne geeshshi gidiya gisho lee7isa qoxada yarsho bessa lanxa. Hessi Isra7eele asaas naagiso malla gido” yaagis.
NUM 16:39 Yaatin kahiney Alaazari ixaane cuyisiya miisheta ekidi yarsho bessa lanxanaw lee7isidi qoxis.
NUM 16:40 Goday Muse baggara kiitidaysada, Aarona koche gidonna oonika Godaa sinthan ixaane cuyisanaw shiiqonna mela, ixas giiko, Qore bollanne iya kaalleyisata bolla gakidaysi iya gakonna mela Isra7eele asaa akeekisanaw haysata oothis.
NUM 16:41 Wontetha gallas Isra7eele maabara ubbay, “Godaa asaa hinte wodhideta” yaagidi Muse bollanne Aarona bolla zuuzumidosona.
NUM 16:42 Enti Musenne Aarona bolla dendanaw shiiqidi, enti geeshsha dunkaaniya xeelliya wode shaaray geeshsha dunkaaniya kammin, Godaa bonchoy qoncis.
NUM 16:43 Hessafe guye, Museynne Aaroni geeshsha dunkaaniya sinthe yidi eqidosona.
NUM 16:44 Yaatin Goday Museko,
NUM 16:45 “Ha asaa giddofe kichite; ta enta issi tohon dhaysana” yaagis. Museynne Aaroni sa7an gufannidosona.
NUM 16:46 Musey Aaronako, “Ixaane cuyisiya ne miishiya ekada yarsho bessaafe bonqo tama ekada iyan wotha; iya bolla ixaane gujada Isra7eele maabaraako efa. Godaa hanqoy iya matape keyi kichis; boshayka doomis” yaagis.
NUM 16:47 Yaatin Aaroni, Musey kiitidaysada ba ixaane cuyisiya miishiya ekidi maabara giddo woxidi gelis. Boshay asaa wodho oykis shin, Aaroni ixaane cuyisidi asaas atotethi ehis.
NUM 16:48 Yaatidi, I hayqidaysatanne paxata giddon eqin, boshay aggis.
NUM 16:49 Qore gaason hayqida asay attishin, he boshan hayqida asaa tayboy 14,700.
NUM 16:50 Boshay eqidaape guye, Aaroni geeshsha dunkaaniya pengen de7iya Museko simmis.
NUM 17:1 Goday Museko,
NUM 17:2 “Isra7eele asay issi issi kochaa halaqatape issi issi xam7a ekidi tammanne nam7u xam7a new ehana mela entaw oda. He xam7aa bolla issi issi asaa sunthaa xaafa.
NUM 17:3 Issi issi kochaa halaqaas issi xam7a koshshiya gisho, Leewe xam7aa bolla Aarona sunthaa xaafa.
NUM 17:4 He xam7ata geeshsha dunkaaniya giddon ta neera gahetiya Taabotiya sinthan wotha.
NUM 17:5 Ta dooriya uraa xam7ay aacana; hessada oothada hinte bolla Isra7eele asaa zuuzuntha ta teqana” yaagis.
NUM 17:6 Hessa Musey Isra7eele asaas odin, tammanne nam7u halaqati huuphen huuphen issi issi xam7a ehidosona. Aarona xam7ayka he xam7ata giddon de7ees.
NUM 17:7 Musey he xam7ata ubbaa geeshsha dunkaaniya giddon Godaa sinthan wothis.
NUM 17:8 Wontetha gallas Musey geeshsha dunkaaniya giddo geliya wode Leewe koche gidida Aarona xam7ay aacidaysa, gambuxidaysa, ciiyidaysanne lawuze mitha ayfe ayfidaysa be7is.
NUM 17:9 Musey xam7a ubbaa Godaa sinthafe ehidi Isra7eele asaa bessis. Enti hanidaba be7idaape guye issi issi halaqay banta xam7aa xam7aa ekidosona.
NUM 17:10 Goday Museko, “Aarona xam7aa Taabotiya sinthan zaarada wotha. Makallida Isra7eele asay ta bolla zuuzuntha aggonna ixiko hayqanaysa entaw malaata oothada wotha” yaagis.
NUM 17:11 Musey, Goday kiitidaysada oothis.
NUM 17:12 Isra7eele asay Museko, “Hessa gidiko, nu ubbay hayqana; dhayana.
NUM 17:13 Geeshsha dunkaaniyako shiiqiya ubbay hayqana gidiko, nu ubbayka hayqoos guusseyee?” yaagidosona.
NUM 18:1 Goday Aaronako, “Geeshsha dunkaaniyan oosetiya nagaraas neeni, ne adde naytinne ne aawa soo asay oyshetana; hinte kahinetetha oosuwan poletiya nagaraa nenne ne adde nayta xalaali oyshetana.
NUM 18:2 Neeninne ne adde nayti geeshsha dunkaaniya sinthan oothiya wode hintena oothidi maadana mela Leewe koche gidida ne dabbota eha.
NUM 18:3 Enti hintefe garsan geeshsha dunkaaniya ooso ubbaa oothonna; shin entika hinteka hayqonna mela enti geeshsha dunkaaniya miishiyakonne yarsho bessaako shiiqopo.
NUM 18:4 Enti hintera issife gididi geeshsha Dunkaaniyan de7iya ooso ubbaa ootho. Shin Leewetape attishin, hara asi oonika hinte de7iya bessaa shiiqopo.
NUM 18:5 Zaaridi Isra7eele asaa bolla hanqoy wodhonna mela geeshsha dunkaaniyaninne yarsho bessan oosetiya oosuwa hinte xalaala oothite.
NUM 18:6 Leeweta, hinte dabbota, Isra7eele asaa giddofe ta dooras. Enti geeshsha dunkaaniya oosuwa oothana mela taani enta taw dummayas.
NUM 18:7 Shin yarsho bessaaninne magarajuwafe gaatha baggan de7iya oosuwa nenne ne adde nayta xalaali oothite. Kahinetetha oosuwa taani hintew imota oothada immas; hara asi oonika he bessaa shiiqiko hayqo” yaagis.
NUM 18:8 Goday Aaronako, “Isra7eele asay taw immiya geeshsha imota ubbaa ta new immas. Taani newunne ne adde naytas merinaa gisho oothada immas.
NUM 18:9 Taw imetiya daro geeshsha imuwape taman xuugetonna baggay hintebaa gidana. Enti taw immiya geeshsha imo ubbay katha yarsho gidin nagara yarsho gidin naaqo yarsho gidin newunne ne adde naytas gidana.
NUM 18:10 Hinte hessa geeshsha bessan miite; adde ubbay hessa mo; hessi hintew geeshshi gidana.
NUM 18:11 “Qassi Isra7eele asay taw yarshiya yuusho yarsho ubbaa new, ne adde naytasinne ne macca naytas merinaw gisho oothada immas; hinte soo asaa giddon wogada tuna gidonna ubbay hessa mo.
NUM 18:12 “Isra7eele asay taw bayra oothidi immiya koyro ayfiyape, shamaho zayte ubbaa, yalaga woyne ubbaanne katha ubbaa new immas.
NUM 18:13 Enti Godaas ehiya gaden koyro gakida ayfey hintesa; hinte soo asaa giddon wogaada tuna gidonna ubbay hessa mo.
NUM 18:14 “Isra7eele asaa giddofe Godaas dummatida ubbay hintesa.
NUM 18:15 Bayra yeletida asi woyko mehey Isra7eele asay Godaas immida ubbay hintesa. Shin bayra yeletida adde na7anne bayra yeletida geeshshi gidonna mehe hinte wozanaw bessees.
NUM 18:16 Issi ageena nayta wozanaw geeshsha dunkaanen eretida mizaanen ichashu bira santime wozo gate qanxite.
NUM 18:17 Shin enti geeshshi gidiya gisho mehe, dorsenne deesha bayra hinte wozanaw koshshenna. Enta suutha yarsho bessa bolla gussa; Godaas sawiya xuussa yarsho oothada enta modho ashuwa taman xuugga.
NUM 18:18 Angaasoynne ushacha geday yuusho yarshon nebaa gididaysada enta ashoyka nebaa.
NUM 18:19 Isra7eele asay Godaas immiya geeshsha yarsho ubbaa new, ne adde naytasinne ne macca naytas merinaw gisho oothada immas. Hessi taani neeranne ne kochaara caaqiya merinaa caaquwa.”
NUM 18:20 Qassika Goday Aaronako, “Enta biittafe nena gakiya gishoy woyko laati baawa; Isra7eele asaa giddon ne laataynne nena gakiya gishoy tana.”
NUM 18:21 Goday, “Leeweti geeshsha Dunkaaniyan oothiya oosuwas damooze gidana mela Isra7eele asay taw ehiya asraata ubbaa entaw immas.
NUM 18:22 Hachife doomidi Isra7eele asay banta nagara gaason hayqonna mela geeshsha dunkaaniyako shiiqopo.
NUM 18:23 Geeshsha dunkaaniya giddon ootheysatinne iya giddon poletiya nagaraa tookey Leeweta. Hessi yeletetha ubbaas merinaa woga. Leewetas Isra7eele asaa giddon laati baawa.
NUM 18:24 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele asay Godaas immiya asraata, ta Leewetas immas. Taani, entaw Isra7eele asaa giddon laati baawa giday hessasa” yaagis.
NUM 18:25 Qassi Goday Museko,
NUM 18:26 “Neeni Leewetako haysada yaaga; taani hintew laata oothada immida asraata hinte Isra7eele asaape ekiya wode hinte he asraatape asraata Godaas immite.
NUM 18:27 Hinte imoy wudummafe shiiqida kathada woyko gum7iya bessaafe ha77i keyida woyneda hintew taybetana.
NUM 18:28 Hessadaka Isra7eele asaape hinte ekiya asraata ubbaafe dumma imo Godaas immite; hinte asraatape Godaa gisho gidida imota kahiniya Aaronas immite.
NUM 18:29 Hinte ekiya imota ubbaafe lo77uwanne geeshsha Godaas gisho oothidi immanaw bessees.
NUM 18:30 Ubbaafe lo77o imuwa hinte immiya wode attidaysi hintew buketiya wudumma kathaadanne gum7etiya woyniyada taybetana.
NUM 18:31 Attidaysi geeshsha Dunkaaniyan hinte oothiya oosuwas damooze gidiya gisho hintenne hinte soo asay awunka maanaw danda7eeta.
NUM 18:32 Lo77o baggaa Godaas immidaape guye hinte miiko hessi hintew nagara gidenna. Lo77o baggaa kessonna de7ishe he imotape midi hinte Isra7eele asaa imota tunisonna mela naagetite; hessa hinte oothonna ixiko hinte hayqana” yaagada Leewetas oda.
NUM 19:1 Goday Musekonne Aaronako,
NUM 19:2 “Goday higgiyan kiitetida wogay haysa; borsoy bayna, I gannan qambari wodhiboonna zo7o ussu ehana mela Isra7eele asaas odite.
NUM 19:3 Kahiniya Alaazaras iyo immite; gutaape iyo gaxa kessidi kahiniya sinthan shuko.
NUM 19:4 Kahiney Alaazari I suuthaafe guuthara ekidi ba biradhiyan geeshsha dunkaaniyako simmidi laapun toho wurxo.
NUM 19:5 Kahiney be7ishin ussiya xuugeto; galbay, ashoy, suuthaynne tocey xuugeto.
NUM 19:6 Kahiney ziga mithi, hisoophe tashenne zo7o qacina ekidi ussiya eexiya taman yeggo.
NUM 19:7 Hessafe guye, kahiney ba ma7uwanne ba asatethaa meecetidi gutaa gelo; shin omarsi gakanaw wogaada tuna gidana.
NUM 19:8 He ussiw xuuggidaysi ba ma7uwanne ba asatethaa meeceto; ika omarsi gakanaw wogaada tuna gidana.
NUM 19:9 “Hessafe guye, hara geeshsha asi ussiya xuugetida biduwa shiishidi gutaape gaxan geeshsha bessan wotho. Isra7eele asay tunatethaafe geeshshiya haathan go7etanaw hessi naagetidi uttana; hessi nagaraape geeshshanaw go77ees.
NUM 19:10 Qassi ussee biduwa shiishida urayka ba ma7uwa meecco; I omarsi gakanaw wogaada tuna gidana. Ha wogay Isra7eele asaasinne enta giddon de7iya hara dere asaas merinaa woga gidana.
NUM 19:11 “Aha bochiya oonika laapun gallas wogaada tuna gidana.
NUM 19:12 Tunatethaafe geeshshiya haathan heedzantho gallasinne laapuntha gallas I bana geeshsho; hessafe guye, I wogaada geeshshi gidana. Shin heedzantho gallasinne laapuntha gallas I bana geeshshona ixiko I geeshshi gidenna.
NUM 19:13 Hayqida asa aha bochiya oonika bana geeshshonna ixiko I Godaa dunkaaniya tunisees; he uray Isra7eele asaa giddofe kuretto. Tunatethaafe geeshshiya haathay iya bolla wurxetiboona gisho I tuna; I tuna gididi gam7ees.
NUM 19:14 “Issi asi dunkaaniya giddon hayqiko oothana wogay haysa; unkaaniya giddo geliya oonika, qassi dunkaaniya giddon de7iya oonika laapun gallas gakanaw tuna gidana.
NUM 19:15 Hessadaka, kamettonna dooya de7iya miishe ubbay tuna gidana.
NUM 19:16 Qassi denban hayqida asa aha woyko hargetidi hayqida asa aha woyko meqethi woyko duufo bochiya oonika laapun gallas gakanaw tuna gidana.
NUM 19:17 “Tunatethaafe geeshshanaw xuugetida ussee biduwape guuthara ekada oton yeggada pulto haathe iya bolla tiga.
NUM 19:18 Geeshsha asi hisoophe wurco ekidi haathan naaqi kessidi, dunkaaniya, iya giddon de7iya miishiyanne asa ubbaa bolla wurxo. Qassi hayqida asa aha woyko meqethi woyko duufo woyko hargeti hayqida asi bochida asa bolla wurxo.
NUM 19:19 Geeyida asi heedzantho gallasinne laapuntha gallas geeyiboonna uraa bolla wurxo. I laapuntha gallas he uraa tunatethaafe geeshsho; he geeyida addey, ba ma7uwanne ba asatethaa meeceto; he gallas omarsi I geeshshi gidana.
NUM 19:20 “Shin tuna uray bana geeshshonna ixiko, he uray geeshsha dunkaaniya tunisida gisho, Isra7eele asaa giddofe kuretto; tunatethaafe geeshshiya haathay iya bolla wurxetiboona gisho I tuna.
NUM 19:21 Haysi hintew merina woga gidana. Tunatethaafe geeshshiya haatha wurxiya uray ba ma7uwa meecco; qassi tunatethaafe geeshshiya haatha bochiya oonika omarsi gakanaw tuna gidana.
NUM 19:22 Tuna uray bochiya aybibayka tunees; qassi he miishiya bochiya oonika omarsi gakanaw tuna gidees” yaagis.
NUM 20:1 Koyro ageenan Isra7eele asa ubbay Siina mela biitta gakidi, Qaadesa geetetiya bessan dunkaanidosona. Mayraama yan hayqada moogetasu.
NUM 20:2 He bessan asaas haathi dhayin, asay Muse bollanne Aarona bolla dendidosona.
NUM 20:3 Enti, “Nu ishati Godaa sinthan hayqida wode nuka hayqida gidorkoshin.
NUM 20:4 Nunne nu mehey ha mela biittan hayqana mela Godaa maabara ha bessa ayis ehidetii?
NUM 20:5 Gibxefe kessidi ha iita bessaa nuna ayis ehidetii? Haysan kathi woyko balasey woyko woyney woyko oromaaney baawa; hari attoshin uyetiya haathika haysan baawa” yaagidi Musera kacetidosona.
NUM 20:6 Yaatin Museynne Aaroni asaa matape geeshsha dunkaaniya penge bidi sa7an gufannidosona; Godaa bonchoyka entaw qoncis.
NUM 20:7 Goday Museko,
NUM 20:8 “Ne xam7a eka; neeranne ne ishaa Aaronara maabara shiishite. Enta sinthan zaallay haathe kessana mela oda. Hinte zaallafe haathe kessidi, entanne enta mehiya ushshana” yaagis.
NUM 20:9 Goday kiitidaysada Musey Godaa sinthafe xam7aa ekis.
NUM 20:10 Museynne Aaroni maabara zaalla sinthan shiiqana mela oothidi, asaako, “Hinteno geellato, si7ite; ha zaallafe hintew nuuni tuma haathe kessanee?” yaagis.
NUM 20:11 Musey ba xam7a denthidi zaalla nam7u toho shocis; haathi dhuuqidi keyin entinne enta meheti uyidosona.
NUM 20:12 Shin Goday Musekonne Aaronako, “Isra7eele asaa sinthan hinte ta geeshshatetha bessanaw ammanetibona gisho ta entaw immiya biitta ha asaa kaalethidi hinte geleketa” yaagis.
NUM 20:13 Isra7eele asay Godaara kacetida gishonne Goday ba geeshshatetha enta giddon qoncisida gisho he bessay Mariba haatha geetetis.
NUM 20:14 Edoome kawako Musey Qaadesape haysada yaagidi kiita yeddis. “Ne ishay Isra7eeley haysada yaagees; nuna gakida meto ubbaa ne si7adasa.
NUM 20:15 Nu mayzati duge Gibxe wodhidosona; yan nuuni daro laythi de7ida. Gibxeti nunanne nu aawata un7ethidosona.
NUM 20:16 Nuuni Godaako waassin, I nu waasuwa si7idi, ba kiitanchuwa Kiitidi nuna Gibxefe kessis. Ha77i nuuni ne biitta gaxan de7iya Qaadesa kataman de7oos.
NUM 20:17 Hayyana, nuuni ne biittaara kanthidi aadhana mela ootharki; nuuni ogepe gaxa keyoko; ne goshsha woyko woyne gade giddo geloko; nuuni haatha ollafe haathe uyoko. Nuuni kawo oge oykidi baana; nuuni ne biittara kanthidi aadhana gakanaw haddirsi woyko ushachi gooko” yaagis.
NUM 20:18 Shin Edoome asay, “Nu biittaara kanthisoko; hinte haysara kanthanaw qopiko, nuuni dendidi hintena olana” yaagidosona.
NUM 20:19 Yaatin Isra7eele asay, “Nuuni kawo ogiyara baana; nuuni woyko nu mehey hinte haathaafe uyiko, nuuni hessas gate ciggana; nuuni tohora aadhetha xalaala koyoos; haraba aykoka koyoko” yaagidosona.
NUM 20:20 Edoome asay zaaridi, “Hinte haysara aadhanaw danda7eketa” yaagis. Kaallidi, daronne wolqaama olanchota ekidi Isra7eele asaa olanaw keyis.
NUM 20:21 Edoome asay banta biittara Isra7eele asaa aathona ixin, Isra7eele asay simmidi hara ogera bidosona.
NUM 20:22 Isra7eele asa ubbay Qaadesape dendidi Hoora zumako bidosona.
NUM 20:23 Edoome zawan de7iya Hoora zuman, Goday Musekonne Aaronako,
NUM 20:24 “Aaroni ba mayzatan gahetiya wodey gakis. Hinte nam7ay Mariba haatha matan ta kiitaa bolla geellatida gisho Isra7eele asaas ta immiya biitta I gelenna.
NUM 20:25 Aaronanne iya na7aa Alaazara ekada Hoora zuma bolla keya.
NUM 20:26 Aarona kahinetetha ma7uwa qaarada, iya na7aa Alaazara mayza. Aaroni yan hayqana” yaagis.
NUM 20:27 Goday kiitidaysada Musey oothis; Isra7eele asa ubbay be7ishin, enti Hoora zuma bolla keyidosona.
NUM 20:28 Musey Aarona kahinetetha ma7uwa qaaridi iya na7aa Alaazara mayzis. Aaroni he zuma huuphen hayqis. Museynne Alaazari zumaape wodhidosona.
NUM 20:29 Aaroni hayqidaysa Isra7eele asay erida wode Isra7eele asay Aaronas hastamu gallas yeekidosona.
NUM 21:1 Kanaane biittan, Negebe mela biittan de7iya Arada Kawoy, Isra7eele asay Ataarima efiya ogiyara yeysa si7ida wode Isra7eele asaara oletidi entafe guutha asaa di7idosona.
NUM 21:2 He wode Isra7eele asay, “Neeni ha asaa nu kushen aathada immiko, nuuni entanne enta katamata kumethi dhaysana” yaagidi Godaas qangidosona.
NUM 21:3 Goday Isra7eele asaa woosa si7idi, Kanaaneta enta kushen aathidi immin, enti Kanaanetanne enta katamata kumethi dhaysidosona. Hessa gisho, he bessay Horma geetetidi sunthetis.
NUM 21:4 Isra7eele asay Hoora zumaape dendidi, Edoome biitta yuushuwara baanaw Zo7o Abbaako efiya ogiyara bidosona; shin oge bolla asaas danda7ay wuris.
NUM 21:5 Asay, “Nuuni mela biitta hayqana mela Gibxefe nuna ayis kessidetii? Kathi baawa; haathi baawa; ha iita kathay nuna shaattis” yaagidi Xoossaa bollanne Muse bolla zuuzumidosona.
NUM 21:6 Yaatin, Goday asaa giddo marzera de7iya shooshi yeddin, Isra7eele asaape daroti duketidi hayqidosona.
NUM 21:7 Asay Museko yidi, “Nuuni Godaa bollanne ne bolla zuuzumidi, nagara oothida. Goday ha shooshata nuupe haassana mela nuus woossarki” yaagidosona. Yaatin, Musey asaa gisho woossis.
NUM 21:8 He wode Goday Museko, “Naase biratape shooshi medhada, enta sinthan mitha bolla kaqa; shooshan duketida oonika iya be7iko paxana” yaagis.
NUM 21:9 Yaatin, Musey naase biratape shooshi medhidi, mitha bolla kaqis. Shooshan duketida asa ubbay naase birata shooshaa be7idi paxidosona.
NUM 21:10 Isra7eele asay Hoorape dendidi Obota geetetiya bessan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 21:11 Obotape dendidi, Moo7abepe sintha baggan de7iya mela biittan, doloha baggan Abariiman dunkaanidosona.
NUM 21:12 Yaape dendidi, Zareeda Zangaaran dunkaanidosona.
NUM 21:13 Yaape dendidi, Amooreta biitta gaxa gakanaw de7iya mela biittan Arnoona Shaafape hefinthan dunkaanidosona. Arnoona Shaafay Moo7abe biittasinne Amoore biittas giddon de7iya zawa.
NUM 21:14 Hessa gisho, Godaa ola taarikiya odiya maxaafan, “Suufa heeran de7iya Waaheba katamaanne Arnoona Shaafa zangaara,
NUM 21:15 Era katamaanne Moo7abe biitta zawa gakanaw de7iya zangaara” yaagetidi xaafetis.
NUM 21:16 Enti yaape dendidi, Goday Museko, “Asaa shiisha; ta entaw haathe immana” yaagidi odida Beera geetetiya haatha ollaako bidosona.
NUM 21:17 He wode Isra7eele asay ha mazmuriya yexidosona. “Haatha ollaw, pulta; Hinteka yexite.
NUM 21:18 Halaqati bookida haatha ollaas, kaaletheysati kawotetha xam7aninne banta xam7an bookida haatha ollaas yexite” yaagis. Enti he mela biittafe dendidi Mataana geetetiya bessaa bidosona.
NUM 21:19 Maatanape Nahili7eela, Nahali7eelape Baamota geetetiya bessaa bidosona.
NUM 21:20 Baamotape dendidi, Moo7aben de7iya zangaara bidosona; he zangaaray Pisga zumaape garsan bazzuwa ginan de7ees.
NUM 21:21 Hessafe guye, Isra7eele asay Amoore kawa Sihooneko haysada yaagidi kiita yeddidosona.
NUM 21:22 “Hayyana, nu ne biittara kanthidi aadhana mela ootharki; nuuni ogepe gaxa keyoko; ne goshsha woyko woyne gade giddo geloko; nuuni haatha ollafe haathe uyoko. Nuuni ne biittara kanthidi aadhana gakanaw haddirsi woyko ushachi gooko” yaagis.
NUM 21:23 Sihooney Isra7eele asay ba biittara kanthonna mela diggis. I ba olanchota ubbaa shiishidi, Isra7eele asaa olanaw mela biitta bis; Yahaaxa geetetiya bessaa bidi Isra7eele asaara oletis.
NUM 21:24 Isra7eele asay olan Amooretape darota mashshan wodhidi, Arnoona Shaafape doomidi, Amooneta zawan de7iya Yaaboqa shaafa gakanaw oykis. Amoone asaa biitta zaway gimbetidi de7iya gisho, enti yaa gelibookona.
NUM 21:25 Isra7eele asay Amooreta, Haseboonanne iya yuushuwan de7iya katamata ubbaa xooni ekidi yan uttidosona.
NUM 21:26 Haseboona katamay Amooreta kawa Sihoone uttiya katama. Sihooney kase Moo7abe biitta kawa olidi, Arnoona shaafa gakanaw de7iya biitta ubbaa ekis.
NUM 21:27 Hessa gisho, leemison haysada yaagidosona; “Haseboonako haayite; ha katamay zaaridi keexeto; Sihoone katamay kase ba bessaa simmo.
NUM 21:28 Tami Haseboonape keyis; lacoy Sihoona kataman bentis; Moo7aben de7iya Era dhaysis; Arnoona dhoqa bessata mis.
NUM 21:29 Moo7abe, nena ayye! Kamoosha asay dhayideta. Hinte adde nayti baqatanaada, hinte macca nayti di7etanaada, Amooreta kawa Sihoones immis.
NUM 21:30 Nuuni hinte kochata Haseboonape doomidi, Diboona gakanaw kumethi dhaysida. Medeba matan de7iya Noofa gakanaw de7iya ubbaa tami dhaysis” yaagidosona.
NUM 21:31 Yaatidi, Isra7eele asay Amooreta biittan de7idosona.
NUM 21:32 Qassi Musey wocheyisata Ya7izeera katamaa yeddin, Isra7eele asay he katamaanne iya heeran de7iya guutha katamata oykidi, yan de7iya Amooreta kessidi goodidosona.
NUM 21:33 Hessafe guye, Isra7eele asay simmidi, Baasane efiya ogiyara keyidosona. Baasane kawoy Oogey ba olanchotara Edraa7a kataman entara oletanaw keyis.
NUM 21:34 Shin Goday Museko, “Ha uraas babofa; hiza, kawa Ooge, iya asaanne iya biitta ubbaa ne kushen aathada immas. Haseboonan uttidi haarida Amooreta kawa Sihoone bolla ootheysada neeni iya bolla oothana” yaagis.
NUM 21:35 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele asay Ooge, iya naytanne iya asa ubbaa issoy attonna wodhidi iya biitta laattidosona.
NUM 22:1 Isra7eele asay dendidi, Iyaarko ginan, Yordaanosepe hefinthan de7iya Moo7abe denban dunkaanidosona.
NUM 22:2 Isra7eele asay Amooreta bolla oothidaysa ubbaa Sifoora na7ay Balaaqi si7is.
NUM 22:3 Isra7eele asay daro gidida gisho, Moo7abeti daro dagammidi yayidosona.
NUM 22:4 Moo7abeti Midiyaame cimatako, “Boori maata pitidi midi dhayseysada ha wude asay nu yuushuwan de7iya ubbaa midi dhaysana” yaagidosona. He wode Moo7abe kawoy, Sifoora na7ay Balaaqi,
NUM 22:5 Amawa biittan, Efraxiisa shaafa matan, Patoora kataman de7iya Bi7oora na7aa Balaamako haysada yaagidi kiittis. “Gibxefe keyida daro asay biitta ubbaa ma7idi, ta matan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 22:6 Enti taape daro wolqaama gidiya gisho, hayyana yada enta baaddarki. Ooni eri, ta enta xoonanawunne biittafe kessanaw danda7ana. Hiza, neeni anjeysi anjeteysa qassi neeni baaddeysi baadetidaba gideysa taani erayis” yaagis.
NUM 22:7 Moo7abe cimatinne Midiyaame cimati baadetha miishiya ekidi Balaamako bidi Balaaqi gidaysa iyaw odidosona.
NUM 22:8 Balaami entako, “Hachi qamma haysan aqite; Goday taw odeysa ta hintew odana” yaagis. Yaanin, Moo7abe halaqati Balaamara gam7idosona.
NUM 22:9 Xoossay Balaama, “Haysati neera de7iya asati oonee?” yaagidi oychis.
NUM 22:10 Balaami Xoossaako, “Moo7abe kawoy, Sifoora na7ay Balaaqi,
NUM 22:11 ‘Gibxefe keyida daro asay, enti biitta ubbaa kumidosona. Neeni yada, enta baaddarki. Ooni eri, ta enta xoonanawunne biittafe kessanaw danda7onna aggike’ yaagidi enta taako Kiittis” yaagis.
NUM 22:12 Yaatin Xoossay Balaamako, “Neeni entara boopa; Isra7eele asay anjetida dere gidiya gisho, neeni enta baaddofa” yaagis.
NUM 22:13 Wontetha gallas wonta Balaami dendidi, Balaaqa halaqatako, “Taani hintera boonnada Goday diggida gisho, hinte biitta simmite” yaagis.
NUM 22:14 Moo7abe halaqati Balaaqako guye simmidi, “Balaami nuura yoonna ixis” yaagidosona.
NUM 22:15 Zaaridi Balaaqi kaseysatape aadho bonchetidanne taybon daro halaqata iyako kiittis.
NUM 22:16 Enti Balaamako bidi, “Sifoora na7ay Balaaqi, ‘Neeni taako yaanaysa nena aybika teqofo.
NUM 22:17 Ta new daro woyto immana; ne oychiyaba ubbaa ta new oothana. Hayyana yada ha asaa baaddarki’ yaagis” yaagidi odidosona.
NUM 22:18 Shin Balaami entako, “Balaaqi hari attoshin ba kawotethan kumida biraanne worqaa taw immiyaba gidikoka Godaa, ta Xoossaa kiitaa menthada aykoka pacisanaw woyko gujanaw danda7ike.
NUM 22:19 Goday taw bessiya harabay de7iko ta erana mela hinteka hachi qamma haysan aqite” yaagis.
NUM 22:20 He qamma Xoossay Balaamako, “Ha asay nena xeeganaw yida gisho, neeni entara ba; shin ta new odeysa xalaala ootha” yaagis.
NUM 22:21 Yaatin wontetha gallas Balaami ba hariw kooridi Moo7abe halaqatara bis.
NUM 22:22 Shin I biya gisho Xoossay hanqetis. He wode Balaami ba hariw toggidi, ba nam7u aylletara bishin Godaa kiitanchoy iya teqanaw ogen eqis.
NUM 22:23 Godaa kiitanchoy mashsha shoddidi ogen eqidaysa hariya be7ada, ogiya aggada goshsha giddo gelasu. Balaami hariw ogen zaaranaw shocis.
NUM 22:24 Yaatin, Godaa kiitanchoy nam7u woyne gadetape giddon ya baggaranne ha baggara gimben diretida xuntha ogen eqis.
NUM 22:25 Hariya Godaa kiitanchuwa be7ida wode gimbe dirsaako shiiqida, Balaama tohuwa gimbe dirsara oythasu; yaatin I hariw nam7antho shocis.
NUM 22:26 Hessafe guye, Godaa kiitanchoy sintha aadhidi, haddirsi woyko ushachi simmanaw ogey bayna xuntha bessan eqis.
NUM 22:27 Hariya Godaa kiitanchuwa be7ada, Balaami toggidi de7ishin zin7asu; Balaami daro yilotidi, ba xam7an hariw shocis.
NUM 22:28 Hessafe guye, Goday harey doona dooyin, hariya Balaama, “Ta new ay iissin tana heedzu toho shocadii?” yaagasu.
NUM 22:29 Balaami zaaridi, “Neeni tana yiloyida gishosa; ta kushen mashshi de7iyaba gidiyako ta nena ha77i wodhanashin” yaagis.
NUM 22:30 Hariya Balaamako, “Neeni hachi gakanaw toggiya ne hariw gidikina? Taani new haysada hana eriyana?” yaagasu. Balaami zaaridi, “Hana eraka” yaagis.
NUM 22:31 He wode Goday Balaama ayfiya dooyin, Godaa kiitanchoy shodetida mashsha oykidi ogen eqidaysa be7is. I lichi gidi som7ora sa7an gufannis.
NUM 22:32 Godaa kiitanchoy, “Ne hariw heedzu toho ayis shocadii? Ne ogey ta sinthan geella gidiya gisho ta nena teqanaw yas.
NUM 22:33 Hariya tana be7ada ta sinthafe heedzu toho hara soo simmasu. Hariya hara soo simmaboonnaba gidiyako, hannoode ta nena wodhada hariw ashshanashin” yaagis.
NUM 22:34 Balaami zaaridi, “Taani nagara oothas; neeni tana teqanaw oge bolla eqidaysa ta erabike. Ne dosonnaba gidiko ta ha77i guye simmana” yaagis.
NUM 22:35 Shin kiitanchoy Balaamako, “Neeni ha asatara ba; shin ta new odeysa xalaala oda” yaagis. Yaatin, Balaami Balaaqa biitta halaqatara bis.
NUM 22:36 Balaami yeysa Balaaqi si7ida wode Arnoona shaafa gaxan ba biitta zawan de7iya Moo7abeta kataman iya mokanaw bis.
NUM 22:37 Balaaqi Balaamako, “Neeni ellesada yaana mela ta kiittabikina? Neeni ayis taako ellesada yabikii? Taani new kushe zaaranaw danda7ikina?” yaagis.
NUM 22:38 Balaami Balaaqako, “Heko, ha77i ta neeko yas; shin ta aykoka taape gaanaw danda7ike. Xoossay tana oda gidaba xalaala odana” yaagis.
NUM 22:39 Yaatin, Balaami Balaaqara Qiriyat-Haxoota katamaa bis.
NUM 22:40 Yan Balaaqi mehenne dorse yarshidi, ashuwape guuthara Balaamasinne iyara de7iya halaqatas immis.
NUM 22:41 Wontetha gallas Balaaqi Balaama Baamot-Ba7aali geetetiya bessa kessis; Balaami yan eqidi Isra7eele asape baggaa be7is.
NUM 23:1 Balaami Balaaqako, “Haysan taw laapun yarsho bessata gimba; qassi laapun kormatanne laapun marazeta taw giigisa” yaagis.
NUM 23:2 Balaami gidaysada Balaaqi oothis; enti nam7ay issi issi yarsho bessan issi kormanne issi maraze yarshidosona.
NUM 23:3 Yaatidi, Balaami Balaaqako, “Neeni ne yarshuwa matan de7aasha; taani gede baana. Ooni eri Goday taara gahetanaw yoonna aggenna; I taw qoncisiyaba ubbaa ta new odana” yaagidi issi dere bolla keyis.
NUM 23:4 Yan Xoossay Balaamara gahetin, Balaami, “Taani laapun yarsho bessata giigisas; issi issi yarsho bessan issi kormanne issi maraze yarshas” yaagis.
NUM 23:5 Balaami gaanaba Goday iyaw odidi, “Neeni Balaaqako simmada iyaw ha kiita oda” yaagis.
NUM 23:6 Balaami simmiya wode Balaaqi Moo7abe halaqata ubbaara ba yarshuwa matan eqis.
NUM 23:7 Balaami haysada yaagidi tinbite odis; “Moo7abe kawoy, Balaaqi, doloha bagga deretape, Soore biittafe tana ehis; ‘Haa ya; Yayqooba taw bada; Isra7eele asaa baadda’ yaagis.
NUM 23:8 Xoossi baaddiboonaysa ta waatada baaddo? Goday, baaddiboonaysa ta waatada baaddo?
NUM 23:9 Ta dhoqa zaalla huuphen eqada enta xeellayis; zumaa bolla eqada enta be7ayis. Enti bantarka de7iya dere; enti hara kawotethatape dumma gideysa eroosona.
NUM 23:10 Yayqooba baana ooni taybi onganee? Isra7eele saysuwa ooni taybi kanthanee? Xillota hayquwa ta hayqarkina; ta wursethay entaysada hano” yaagis.
NUM 23:11 Balaaqi Balaamako, “Neeni ta bolla oothiyabay aybee? Taani nena ta morketa baaddana mela ehas, shin neeni enta anjadasa; haraba aykoka oothabaaka” yaagis.
NUM 23:12 Balaami zaaridi, “Goday taw odeysafe haraa odoyee?” yaagis.
NUM 23:13 Balaaqi Balaamako, “Enta neeni be7anaw danda7iya hara bessi taara yedha; yanka ne entafe guuthara be7aasape attishin, ubbaa be7aka. Neeni yan eqada enta baaddarki” yaagis.
NUM 23:14 Pisga deriya huuphen de7iya Xofima demba efis. Yan laapun yarsho bessata gimbidi, issi issi yarsho bessan issi kormanne issi maraze yarshis.
NUM 23:15 Balaami Balaaqako, “Neeni haysan ne yarshuwa matan de7aasha; taani Godaara gahetanaw gede baana” yaagis.
NUM 23:16 Goday Balaamara gahetidi, “Neeni Balaaqako simmada iyaw ha kiita oda” yaagis.
NUM 23:17 Balaami simmidi yaa wode Balaaqi Moo7abe biitta halaqatara yarshuwa matan eqidaysa demmis. Balaaqi iyako, “Goday new ay odidee?” yaagis.
NUM 23:18 Balaami haysada yaagidi tinbite odis; “Sifoora na7aw, Balaaqa, denda; ta odeysa loythada si7a.
NUM 23:19 Wordotanaw Xoossay ase gidenna; ba qofaa laammanaw asa na7a gidenna. Odidi, ba odidaysa oothennee? Woyko ba gidaysa polennee?
NUM 23:20 Taani anjanaw kiita ekas; I anjis; ta laammanaw danda7ike.
NUM 23:21 Yayqooba kochaa bolla iitabay yeenna; Isra7eele asaa metoy gakenna. Goday, enta Xoossay entara de7ees; I entaw kawo gideysa awaajosona.
NUM 23:22 Xoossay enta Gibxefe kessis; I mino menthada entaw oletees.
NUM 23:23 Yayqooba kochaa bolla biti oothenna; Isra7eele asaa qohana murunnoy baawa. Heko, Yayqoobasinne Isra7eeles ‘Xoossay oothidaba be7ite’ yaagana.
NUM 23:24 Ha asay macca gaammoda dendees; ba oykidaba maana gakanaw, ba wodhidaysa suuthaa uyana gakanaw, shemponna gaammoda dendoosona” yaagis.
NUM 23:25 Yaatin, Balaaqi Balaamako, “Ne enta ubbaka baaddofa; ubbaka anjofa” yaagis.
NUM 23:26 Balaami zaaridi, “Taani Goday giyaba xalaala oothana gada new odabikina?” yaagis.
NUM 23:27 Balaaqi Balaamako, “Haaya; ta nena hara bessi efana. Ooni eri, hessan Xoossay ufaytidi, neeni yan eqada enta baaddana mela oothanaw danda7ees” yaagis.
NUM 23:28 Balaaqi Balaama bazzuwa duge xeelliya Paa7ora zuma bolla efis.
NUM 23:29 Balaami, “Neeni haysan taw laapun yarsho bessata gimba; qassi laapun kormatanne laapun marazeta taw giigisa” yaagis.
NUM 23:30 Balaami gidaysada Balaaqi oothis; issi issi yarsho bessan issi kormanne issi maraze yarshis.
NUM 24:1 Balaami Isra7eele anjeysi Godaa ufaysidaysa I be7ida wode kase I ootheysada bita malla koybeenna, shin ba som7uwa mela biittako zaaris.
NUM 24:2 I dhoqu gidi xeelliya wode Isra7eele asay ba kochan kochan dunkaanidi uttidaysa be7iya wode Xoossaa Ayyaanay iya bolla wodhis.
NUM 24:3 I haysada yaagidi tinbite odis; “Bi7oora na7aa Balaama tinbitiya; iya ayfey dooyetin xeelliya addiya tinbitiya;
NUM 24:4 Xoossay giyaba si7eysa tinbitiya; I som7ora gufannin, iya ayfey dooyetidaysi; Ubbaa danda7iya Xoossaa qoncethaa be7ida addiya tinbitey haysa.
NUM 24:5 Yayqooba, ne dunkaaneti, Isra7eele, ne gutati, ayba lo77oona.
NUM 24:6 Enti micetida zangaarada, shaafa gaxan de7iya atakiltiya bessada, Goday tokida godare uuthada, haatha gaxan de7iya ziga mithada hanoosona.
NUM 24:7 Enta xuggay haathan kumana; enta kochay gidiya haathi demmana. Enta kawoy kawa Agaagape aadhana; enta kawotethay bonchetana.
NUM 24:8 Xoossay enta Gibxefe kessis; I mino menthada entaw oletees. Enta morketa mentherethees; enta meqethaa gaaccees; ba dongiyan caddees.
NUM 24:9 Enti gaammoda zin7idosona; macca gaammoda zaqullidosona; enta boshechanaw danda7ey oonee? Enta anjiya ubbay anjetana; enta baaddiya ubbay baadetana” yaagis.
NUM 24:10 Yaatin, Balaaqi Balaama bolla yilotis. Ba kushiya baqidi Balaamako, “Ta morketa baaddana mela ta nena ehas, shin neeni heedzu toho enta anjadasa.
NUM 24:11 Ha77i ellesada ne soo ba; ta nena darobaa woytana gas, shin neeni woytuwa ekonna mela Goday nena diggis” yaagis.
NUM 24:12 Balaami Balaaqako zaaridi, “Neeni taako kiitida asaako,
NUM 24:13 ‘Balaaqi hari attoshin ba kawotethan kumida biraanne worqaa taw immiyaba gidikoka Goday odidaysa menthada lo77o woyko iita ta shenen oothanaw danda7ike. Taani Goday giyaba xalaala odana’ gada new odabikinayee?” yaagis.
NUM 24:14 Balaami Balaaqako, “Taani ha77i ta asaako bayis; shin ne haaya; Isra7eele asay yaana wodiyan ne asaa oothanaba ta new odana” yaagis.
NUM 24:15 I ba tinbitiya haysada yaagidi odis; “Iya ayfey tishshi oothidi xeelliya, Bi7oora na7aa Balaama tinbitey haysa.
NUM 24:16 Haysi Xoossay giyaba si7eysa tinbitiya, Ubbaa danda7iya Xoossafe gidida eratethi de7iya uray. Lichi gidi som7ora gufannin, iya ayfey dooyetidaysinne Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaa qoncethaa be7eysa tinbitey haysa.
NUM 24:17 “Taani iya be7ayis, shin wodey ha7i gidenna; ta iya xeellayis, shin matan deenna. Yayqooba sheeshape xoolintoy keyana; Isra7eelepe kawotetha xam7ay keyana. Moo7abe asaa som7uwa I gaaccana; Seeta asaa ubbaa huuphiya I tinchana.
NUM 24:18 Edoomey xoonetana; iya morkey Sayrey oyketana; shin Isra7eeley minni minni baana.
NUM 24:19 Yayqoobape haareysi keyana; kataman paxa attidaysata dhaysana” yaagis.
NUM 24:20 Hessafe guye, Balaami Amaaleqa be7idi haysada yaagidi tinbite odis; “Amaaleqi kawotethata giddon koyro, shin enta wursethay dhayo” yaagis.
NUM 24:21 Qassi Balaami Qeena be7idi haysada yaagidi tinbite odis. “Hinte de7iya bessay saro bessi; hinte keethay zaalla bolla keexetis.
NUM 24:22 Shin Asooreti hintena di77iya wode, hinte Qeena asay dhayana” yaagis.
NUM 24:23 Wursethan Balaami haysada yaagidi tinbite odis; “Xoossay hessa oothiya wode, ooni de7on daanaw danda7ii?
NUM 24:24 Markabeti Qophiroosape yaana; enti Asoorenne Ebeera xoonana; shin entika qassi dhayana” yaagis.
NUM 24:25 Hessafe guye, Balaami dendidi ba soo simmis; Balaaqika ba ogiya bis.
NUM 25:1 Isra7eele asay Seexima geetetiya bessan dunkaanidi de7ishin, Isra7eele addeti Moo7abe maccatara laymato doomidosona.
NUM 25:2 He maccasati banta xoossata yarshuwa maana mela xeegidosona. Enti he yarsho kathaa midi enta xoossata goyinnidosona.
NUM 25:3 Isra7eeleti Bi7eel-Fagoora geetetiya eeqa goyinnida gisho Goday enta bolla hanqetis.
NUM 25:4 Yaatin, Goday Museko, “Godaa hanqoy Isra7eelepe simmana mela kaalethiya asa ubbaa efada seeta gallas Godaa sinthan kaqa” yaagis.
NUM 25:5 Musey Isra7eele daynnatako, “Hinte issoy issoy Bi7eel-Fagoora geetetiya eeqa goyinnida asa ubbaa wodhite” yaagis.
NUM 25:6 Museynne maabaray ubbay geeshsha dunkaaniya pengen yeekishin, Isra7eeletape issoy Midiyaame maccasiw enta sinthara aathidi, ba keetha asaako ehis.
NUM 25:7 Kahiniya Aarona na7aa Alaazara na7ay Pinihaasi hessa be7ida wode maabara giddofe dendidi, toora ekidi,
NUM 25:8 Isra7eele addiya kaallidi dunkaaniya giddo gelidi, uraanne maccasiw tooran caddidi kanthi kessis. Hessi hanin Isra7eeleta wursiya gadoy eqis.
NUM 25:9 Shin he gadoy laatamanne oyddu mukulu asaa wodhis.
NUM 25:10 Goday Museko,
NUM 25:11 “Kahiniya Aarona na7aa Alaazara na7ay Pinihaasi Isra7eele asaa giddon taani ta bonchuwas misheteysada mishetida gisho, taani hinte bolla hanqetida hanquwa doshisis. Taani ta qaanatiyan enta polo dhaysabike.
NUM 25:12 Hessa gisho, taani ta sarotetha caaquwa iyara caaqanaysa Pinihaasas oda.
NUM 25:13 I ba Xoossaa bonchuwas mishetida gishonne Isra7eele asaas nagara atotetha ehida gisho, inne iya kochay merinaw kahine gidana” yaagis.
NUM 25:14 Midiyaame maccaseera hayqida uraa sunthay Saalu na7aa Zimira geetetees. Saalu Simoona kochan issi kochaa halaqa.
NUM 25:15 Hayqida Midiyaame maccase sunthay Kozibo; I aaway Zuri Midiyaameta kochaa halaqa.
NUM 25:16 Goday Museko,
NUM 25:17 “Midiyaame biitta asaa morkidi enta wodhite.
NUM 25:18 Enti hintena morkidi Paa7oran cimmidosona qassi bosha gallas Paa7oran hayqida Midiyaameta kochaa halaqa na7e Kozibi gaason hintena morkidosona” yaagis.
NUM 26:1 Boshaape guye, Goday Musekonne kahiniya Aarona na7aa Alaazarako,
NUM 26:2 “Laythi laatamanne iyape bolla gidida Isra7eeleta, olanaw danda7eyisata ubbaa, enta keethan keethan taybite” yaagis.
NUM 26:3 Yaatin, Museynne kahiney Alaazari Yordaanose Shaafape hefinthan, Iyaarko matan, Moo7abe denban asaa shiishidi,
NUM 26:4 “Goday Muse kiitidaysada, laythi laatamanne iyape bolla gidida asaa taybidosona.” Gibxefe keyida Isra7eele asay haysata.
NUM 26:5 Isra7eele bayra na7aa Robeela kochati banta kochan kochan, Hanooka kochaa, Faalu kochaa,
NUM 26:6 Hesiroona kochaanne Karma kochaa;
NUM 26:7 Haysati Robeela kochata; enta kumetha tayboy 43,730.
NUM 26:8 Faalu na7ay Eli7aaba;
NUM 26:9 Eli7aaba adde nayti Nemu7eela, Daatanenne Abeero. Daataninne Abeeroy maabaray dooridaysata, shin enti Qorenne iya kaalleysatara tobbidi Godaa bolla makallidi Muse bollanne Aarona bolla dendidosona.
NUM 26:10 Biittay dooyetidi enta Qorera issife mittis; enta kaalliya 250 asaa tami min hayqidosona. Yaatin, harati enta be7idi naagetana mela malla gididosona.
NUM 26:11 Shin Qore adde nayti ubbay hayqidi dhaybookona.
NUM 26:12 Simoona kochati banta kochan kochan, Nemu7eela kochaa, Yamina kochaa, Yakina kochaa,
NUM 26:13 Zaara kochaanne Saa7ula kochaa.
NUM 26:14 Haysati Simoona kochata; enta kumetha tayboy 22,200.
NUM 26:15 Gaade kochati banta kocha kochan, Xifoona kochaa, Haggi kochaa, Shuuna kochaa,
NUM 26:16 Esina kochaa, Era kochaa,
NUM 26:17 Arooda kochaanne Ari7eela kochaa.
NUM 26:18 Haysati Gaade kochata; enta kumetha tayboy 40,500.
NUM 26:19 Yihuda adde nayti Erinne Onani Kanaane biittan hayqidosona.
NUM 26:20 Yihuda kochati banta kochan kochan, Seela kochaa, Faaresa kochaanne Zara kochaa.
NUM 26:21 Faaresa kochay Hesiroonanne Hamuula.
NUM 26:22 Haysati Yihuda kochata; enta kumetha tayboy 76,500.
NUM 26:23 Yisakoora kochati banta kochan kochan, Toolla kochaa, Puu7a kochaa,
NUM 26:24 Yasuuba kochaanne Shimroona kochaa.
NUM 26:25 Haysati Yisakoora kochata; enta kumetha tayboy 64,300.
NUM 26:26 Zabloona kochati banta kochan kochan, Sareda kochaa, Eloona kochaanne Yahilaala kochaa.
NUM 26:27 Haysati Zabloona kochata; enta kumetha tayboy 60,500.
NUM 26:28 Yoosefa nayta Minaasenne Efreema kochati banta kochan kochan,
NUM 26:29 Minaasey Makira yelis, Makiri Galada yelis.
NUM 26:30 Galada kochati, Izera koche, Kelega koche,
NUM 26:31 Asir7eela koche, Seekema kochaa,
NUM 26:32 Shamida kochenne Hefeera koche.
NUM 26:33 Hefeera na7ay Selophaadi macca na7a xalaala yelis; iyaw adde na7i baawa. Selophaada macca nayta sunthay Mahilo, No7o, Hoglo, Milkonne Tirxo.
NUM 26:34 Haysati Minaase kochata; enta kumetha tayboy 52,700.
NUM 26:35 Efreema kochati banta kochan kochan, Shutula kochaa, Bekera kochaa, Tahana kochatanne
NUM 26:36 Shutula na7aa Erana kochata.
NUM 26:37 Haysati Efreema kochata; enta kumetha tayboy 32,500. Yoosefa kochati banta kochan kochan haysata.
NUM 26:38 Biniyaame kochati banta kochan kochan, Beella kochaa, Asbeela kochaa, Akira kochaa,
NUM 26:39 Shufaama kochaa, Hufama kochaa,
NUM 26:40 Beella na7aa Arada kochaanne Beella na7aa Naamane kochaa.
NUM 26:41 Haysati Biniyaame kochata; enta kumetha tayboy 45,600.
NUM 26:42 Daane kochati Saama kochaa.
NUM 26:43 Shuhaama kochaa kumetha tayboy 64,400.
NUM 26:44 Aseera kochati banta kochan kochan, Yimina kochaa, Yisiwa kochaa, Beri7a kochaa,
NUM 26:45 Beri7a na7a Hebeera kochaanne Beri7a na7aa Malki7eela kochaa.
NUM 26:46 Aseeras Saraho geetetiya macca na7i de7awusu.
NUM 26:47 Haysati Aseera kochata; enta kumetha tayboy 53,400.
NUM 26:48 Niftaaleme kochati banta kochan kochan, Yahixeela kochaa, Guna kochaa,
NUM 26:49 Yexera kochaanne Shileme kochaa.
NUM 26:50 Haysati Niftaaleme kochata; enta kumetha tayboy 45,400.
NUM 26:51 Taybetida Isra7eele adde asaa tayboy kumethi 601,730.
NUM 26:52 Goday Museko,
NUM 26:53 “Ha kochatas enta sunthaa sunthaa taybuwan biitta shaakada laata oothada entaw imma.
NUM 26:54 Taybon dareysatas darsada qassi taybon guuxeysatas guuthada imma. Ubbayka xaafetida banta taybuwa keena eko.
NUM 26:55 Shin biittay saaman shaaketo; issi issi kochay laata ekey ba kochaa sunthan gido.
NUM 26:56 Issi issi laatay taybon darota giddoninne taybon guuthata giddon saaman shaaketees” yaagis.
NUM 26:57 Banta zerthan zerthan taybetida Leewe kochati haysata; Gedisoona kochaa, Qahaata kochaanne Meraara kochaa.
NUM 26:58 Haysatika qassi Leewe kochata; Libina kochaa, Kebroona kochaa, Mohoola kochaa, Muse kochaanne Qore kochaa. Qahaati Amraama yelis.
NUM 26:59 Amraama mache sunthay Yokebeedo; iya Gibxen Leewepe yeletida Leewe na7a. Iya Aarona, Musenne enta michiw Mayraamo yelasu.
NUM 26:60 Aaronas Naadabe, Abyooda, Alaazaranne Itamaara geetetiya oyddu nayti de7oosona.
NUM 26:61 Shin Naadabeynne Abyoodi Godaa sinthan geeshshi gidonna taman yarsho yarshida gisho boshan hayqidosona.
NUM 26:62 Laythi issi ageenanne iyape bolla gidida Leewe adde nayta tayboy laatamanne heedzu mukula. Isra7eele asaa giddon entaw laata biitti imetiboonna gisho enti Isra7eeletara taybetibookona.
NUM 26:63 Yordaanose Shaafape hefinthan, Iyaarko matan, Moo7abe denban Museynne kahiney Alaazari Isra7eele asaa taybida wode taybetida asay haysa.
NUM 26:64 Museynne kahiney Aaroni koyro Siina mela biittan Isra7eele taybida wode taybetida asaape mexi issi asika attibeenna.
NUM 26:65 Goday ha Isra7eeletaba, “Enti ubbay mela biittan hayqana” yaagidi odida gisho, Yoofona na7aa Kaalebapenne Nawe na7aa Iyyasupe attishin, hari issi asika attibeenna.
NUM 27:1 Selophaadi Hefeera na7a; Hefeeri Galada na7a; Galadi Makira na7a; Makiri Minaase na7a; Minaasey Yoosefa na7a. Selophaada macca nayti Mahilo, No7o, Hoglo, Milkonne Tirxo.
NUM 27:2 Ha macca nayti geeshsha dunkaaniya pengen Muse sinthan, kahiniya Alaazara sinthan, halaqata sinthaninne maabara ubbaa sinthan eqidi,
NUM 27:3 “Nu aaway mela biittan hayqis; I ba nagaraa gaason hayqisipe attishin, Godaa bolla dendida Qore kaalleyisata giddon deenna. Iyaw adde na7i baawa.
NUM 27:4 Yaatin, nu aaway adde na7a yeliboona gisho iya sunthay iya kochaa giddofe waanidi dhayii? Nu aawa dabbota giddon nuus laata biitta imma” gidoosona.
NUM 27:5 Yaatin, Musey enta oysha Godaa sinthe shiishis.
NUM 27:6 Goday Museko,
NUM 27:7 “Selophaada macca nayta oyshay like; enta aawa dabbota giddon neeni entaw laata biitta imma; iya gishoy enta laata gido.
NUM 27:8 Qassi Isra7eele asaako, ‘Issi asi adde na7a yelonna hayqiko iya macca nayti laatto.
NUM 27:9 Iyaw macca na7i baynaba gidiko iya ishati laatto.
NUM 27:10 Iyaw ishi baynaba gidiko iya aawa ishati laatto.
NUM 27:11 Iyaw aawa ishi baynaba gidiko iya mata dabboy laatto. Taani Goday nena kiitidaysada haysi Isra7eele asaas woga gido’ ” yaagis.
NUM 27:12 Goday Museko, “Abariima Zumaa bolla keyada ta Isra7eele asaas immida biitta be7a.
NUM 27:13 Ne be7idaape guye, ne ishaa Aaronada neka hayqada ne mayzatan gahetana.
NUM 27:14 Xiina mela biittan, Mariba haatha matan asay ta bolla zuuzumida wode hinte nam7ay enta sinthan tana geeshshi oothidi bonchibeeketa” yaagis. (Mariba haathay Xiina mela biittan, Qaadesa geetetiya bessan de7iya pulto.)
NUM 27:15 Musey Godaako,
NUM 27:16 “Asa ubbaas de7o immiya Godaa Xoossaw, ne asay henthanchoy bayna wude mela gidonnaada,
NUM 27:17 ha asaa sinthan keyaanne geliya qassi enta kaalethidi kessiyanne gelsiya issi asi ha maabara bolla shuuma” yaagis.
NUM 27:18 Goday Museko, “Ayyaanay iyan de7iya Nawe na7aa Iyyasu ekada ne kushiya iya bolla wotha.
NUM 27:19 Iya kahiniya Alaazara sinthaninne maabara ubbaa sinthan essada enti be7ishin shuuma.
NUM 27:20 Isra7eele ubbay iyaw kiitetana mela ne maatape iyaw shaakada imma.
NUM 27:21 Ika Uriimen Godaa sheniya oychidi shaakiya kahiniya Alaazara sinthan eqo. Iyyasuynne Isra7eele maabaray ubbay Alaazara kiitan keyonne gelo” yaagis.
NUM 27:22 Musey Goday kiitidaysada oothis; Iyyasu efidi, kahiniya Alaazara sinthaninne maabara ubbaa sinthan essis.
NUM 27:23 Goday kiitidaysada Musey ba kushiya iya bolla wothidi shuumis.
NUM 28:1 Goday Museko,
NUM 28:2 “Isra7eele asaa haysada yaagada kiitta; xuugetiya sawiya katha yarsho woden woden taw yarshite.
NUM 28:3 Godaas taman xuugetidi yarshetiya yarshoy haysa; kumetha bollara de7iya issi laythi kumida nam7u marazeta wonta wonta xuussa yarsho oothidi yarshite.
NUM 28:4 Marazetape issuwa wonta issuwa qassi omarsi yarshite.
NUM 28:5 Qassi he maraziyara issi litiro shamaho zayten munuqetida issi kilo giraame lo77o giste dhiille katha yarsho yarshite.
NUM 28:6 Haysi Godaa ufaysiya xuussa yarsho. Ika Siina zuma bolla yarshetida koyro xuussa yarsho.
NUM 28:7 Koyro maraziyara issi litiro caala woyne ushsha yarsho oothidi yarsho bessan Godaas gussite.
NUM 28:8 Omarsi nam7antho maraziya yarshiya wode koyroysa mela katha yarshuwanne ushsha yarshuwa gujidi yarshite. Ika Godaa ufaysiya sawo yarsho gidana.”
NUM 28:9 “Sambaata gallas borey bayna issi laythi kumida nam7u marazeta zayten munuqetida nam7u kilo giraame lo77o giste dhiille ekidi katha yarshonne ushsha yarsho oothidi yarshite.
NUM 28:10 Gallas gallas yarshetiya xuussa yarshuwa bolla Sambaatan Sambaatan hinte yarshana xuussa yarshoynne ushsha yarshoy haysa.”
NUM 28:11 “Ageeni xeeriya koyro gallas nam7u wofaanota, issi marazenne issi laythi kumida borey bayna laapun dorsa urgeta xuussa yarsho oothidi Godaas yarshite.
NUM 28:12 Issi issi wofaanuwara shamaho zayten munuqetida heedzu kilo giraame gidiya lo77o giste dhiillera katha yarsho oothidi yarshite. Qassi shamaho zayten munuqetida nam7u kilo giraame gidiya lo77o giste dhiilliya maraziyara wolla yarsha.
NUM 28:13 Laapun marazetape issi issi maraze shamaho zayten munuqetida issi kilo giraame lo77o giste dhiillera xuugetiya sawiya katha yarsho oothada Godaas yarishsha.
NUM 28:14 Qassi ushsha yarshuwa issi issi wofaanuwas nam7u litiro woyne, issi maraziyas issi litironne bagga woyne ushshaanne issi issi dorsa urgiyas issi litiro gidiya woyne ushshi shiishite. Haysi laytha giddon ageeni xeeriya koyro gallasan oosetiya xuussa yarsho.
NUM 28:15 Gallas gallas yarshetiya xuussa yarshuwa bollanne ushsha yarshuwa bolla issi kole nagara yarsho oothidi Godaas yarshite.”
NUM 28:16 “Koyro ageenan tammanne oyddantho gallasay Godaa Paasika bonchiya gallas gido.
NUM 28:17 Qassi he ageenan tammanne ichashantho gallasan Uytha ba7aaley bonchetees; he gallasaape doomidi laapun gallas gakanaw irshoy geliboonna uytha miite.
NUM 28:18 He gallasatape koyro gallasan goyinnanaw shiiqite; he gallasan ay oosoka oothopite.
NUM 28:19 Borey bayna nam7u wofaanota, issi marazenne issi laythi kumida laapun dorsa urgeta xuussa yarsho oothidi Godaas yarshite.
NUM 28:20 Issi wofaanuwara shamaho zayten munuqetida heedzu kilo giraame lo77o giste dhiille, issi maraziyara nam7u kilo giraame dhiillenne
NUM 28:21 laapun dorsa urgetape issi issi dorsaara issi kilo giraame dhiille yarshite.
NUM 28:22 Qassi issi deeshi deriya nagaraas atotethi gidana mela nagara yarsho oothidi yarshite.
NUM 28:23 Hessa ubba wode gallas gallas yarshetiya yarshuwa bolla gujidi yarshite.
NUM 28:24 Ubba wode oosetiya xuussa yarshuwa bollanne ushsha yarshuwa bolla gujidi laapun gallasi Godaas sawiya katha yarsho oothidi yarshite.
NUM 28:25 Laapuntha gallasan goyinnoos shiiqite; he gallas ay oosoka oothopite.”
NUM 28:26 “Katha Shiisho Ba7aale saamintan koyro gallas goyinnoos shiiqiya wode hinte ooratha kathaafe yarsho yarshite; he wode ay oosoka oothopite.
NUM 28:27 Nam7u wofaanota, issi maraziyanne issi laythi kumida laapun dorsa urgeta Godaas sawiya xuussa yarsho oothidi yarshite.
NUM 28:28 Issi issi wofaanuwara shamaho zayten munuqetida heedzu kilo giraame lo77o giste dhiille, issi dorsa urgiyara nam7u kilo giraame dhiillenne
NUM 28:29 laapun dorsa urgetape issi issi urgiyara issi kilo giraame giste dhiille ekidi yarshite.
NUM 28:30 Iya bolla gujidi issi kole nagara atothetha yarsho oothidi yarshite.
NUM 28:31 Gallas gallas yarshetiya yarshuwa bollanne ushsha yarshuwa bolla katha yarsho yarshite. Hinte yarshiya meheti borey baynaba gido.”
NUM 29:1 “Laapuntha ageenas koyro gallasan goyinnanaw shiiqite; ay oosoka oothopite; he gallasay moyzey punetiya gallas.
NUM 29:2 Borey bayna issi wofaano, issi marazenne issi laythi kumida laapun dorsa urgeta sawiya xuussa yarsho oothidi Godaas yarshite.
NUM 29:3 He wofaanuwara shamaho zayten munuqetida heedzu kilo giraame lo77o giste dhiille, issi maraziyara nam7u kilo giraame giste dhiillenne,
NUM 29:4 laapun dorsa urgetape issi issi urgiyara issi kilo giraame dhiille yarshite.
NUM 29:5 Qassi issi kole hintew nagaraa atotethas yarshite.
NUM 29:6 Wogay kiiteysatho, ageena xeeron yarshetiya xuussa yarsho bolla, katha yarsho bolla, gallas gallas yarshetiya xuussa katha yarsho bollanne ushsha yarsho bolla gujidi yarshite; hessi Godaa sawiya xuussa yarsho.
NUM 29:7 “Laapuntha ageenan tammantho gallasan ay oosoka oothopite; hintena kawushidi goyinnoos shiiqite.
NUM 29:8 Borey bayna issi wofaano, issi marazenne issi laythi kumida laapun dorsa urgeta sawiya xuussa yarsho oothidi Godaas yarshite.
NUM 29:9 Katha yarsho oothidi issi wofaanora shamaho zayten heedzu kilo giraame lo77o giste dhiille, issi dorsa urgiyara nam7u kilo giraame dhiillenne
NUM 29:10 laapun dorsa urgetape issi issi urgiyara issi kilo giraame dhiille yarshite.
NUM 29:11 Qassi nagara yarsho oothidi issi kole yarshite. Nagara atothetha yarshuwa bolla, gallas gallas yarshetiya xuussa yarshuwa bolla, katha yarshuwa bollanne ushsha yarshuwa bolla hessa gujidi yarshite.
NUM 29:12 “Laapuntha ageenan tammanne ichashantho gallasan, deexo ooso oothopite; laapun gallas kumethi Godaa bonchanaw Shaqara Ba7aale bonchite.
NUM 29:13 Borey bayna tammanne heedzu wofaanota, nam7u marazeta, issi laythi kumida tammanne oyddu dorsa urgeta sawiya xuussa yarsho oothidi Godaas yarshite.
NUM 29:14 Katha yarsho gidana mela tammanne heedzu wofaanotape issi issi wofaanuwara shamaho zayten munuqetida heedzu kilo giraame lo77o giste dhiille, nam7u marazetape issi issi urgiyara nam7u kilo giraame dhiillenne
NUM 29:15 tammanne oyddu dorsa urgetape issi issi urgiyara issi kilo giraame dhiille yarshite.
NUM 29:16 Qassi nagara yarshuwas issi kole yarshite. Hessi gallas gallas xuussa yarshuwa bolla, katha yarshuwa bollanne ushsha yarsho bolla gujidika yarshite.
NUM 29:17 “Nam7antho gallasan tammanne nam7u borey bayna wofaanota, nam7u marazetanne issi laythi kumida tammanne oyddu urgeta yarshite.
NUM 29:18 Wofaanotara, marazetaranne dorsa urgetara katha yarshuwanne ushsha yarshuwa wogay kiitteysa mela enta taybuwada yarshite.
NUM 29:19 Gallas gallas yarshetiya xuussa yarshuwa bolla, katha yarshuwa bollanne ushsha yarshuwa bolla gujidi nagara yarshuwas issi kole yarshite.
NUM 29:20 “Heedzantho gallasan borey bayna tammanne issi wofaanota, nam7u marazeta issi laythi kumida tammanne oyddu dorsa urgeta yarshite.
NUM 29:21 Wofaanotara, marazetaranne dorsa urgetara katha yarshuwanne ushsha yarshuwa wogay kiitteysa mela enta taybuwada yarshite.
NUM 29:22 Gallas gallas yarshetiya xuussa yarshuwa bolla, katha yarshuwa bollanne ushsha yarshuwa bolla nagara yarshos issi kole gujidi yarshite.
NUM 29:23 “Oyddantho gallasan borey bayna tammu wofaanota, nam7u marazetanne issi laythi kumida tammanne oyddu dorsa urgeta yarshite.
NUM 29:24 Wofaanotara, marazetaranne dorsa urgetara katha yarshuwanne ushsha yarshuwa wogay kiitteysa mela enta taybuwada yarshite.
NUM 29:25 Gallas gallas yarshetiya xuussa yarshuwa bolla, katha yarshuwa bollanne ushsha yarshuwa bolla gujidi nagara yarshos issi kole yarshite.
NUM 29:26 “Ichashantho gallasan borey bayna uddufun wofaanota, nam7u marazetanne issi laythi kumida tammanne oyddu dorsa urgeta yarshite.
NUM 29:27 Wofaanotara, Marazetaranne dorsa urgetara katha yarshuwanne ushsha yarshuwa wogay kiiteysada enta taybuwada yarshite.
NUM 29:28 Gallas gallas yarshetiya xuussa yarshuwa bolla, katha yarshuwa bollanne ushsha yarshuwa bolla gujidi nagara yarshos issi kole yarshite.
NUM 29:29 “Usupuntho gallasan borey bayna hospun wofaanota, nam7u marazetanne issi laythi kumida tammanne oyddu dorsa urgeta yarshite.
NUM 29:30 Wofaanotara, Marazetaranne dorsa urgetara katha yarshuwanne ushsha yarshuwa wogay kiitteysa mela enta taybuwada yarshite.
NUM 29:31 Gallas gallas yarshetiya xuussa yarshuwa bolla, katha yarshuwa bollanne ushsha yarshuwa bolla gujidi nagara yarshos issi kole yarshite.
NUM 29:32 “Laapuntha gallasan laapun wofaanota, nam7u marazetanne issi laythi kumida tammanne oyddu dorsa urgeta yarshite.
NUM 29:33 Wofaanotara, Marazetaranne dorsa urgetara katha yarshuwanne ushsha yarshuwa wogay kiitteysa mela enta taybuwada yarshite.
NUM 29:34 Gallas gallas yarshetiya xuussa yarshuwa bolla, katha yarshuwa bollanne ushsha yarshuwa bolla gujidi nagara yarshos issi kole yarshite.
NUM 29:35 “Hospuntha gallasan goyinnanaw shiiqite; ay oosoka oothopite.
NUM 29:36 Borey bayna issi wofaano, issi maraze, issi laythi kumida laapun dorsa urgeta sawiya xuussa yarsho oothidi Godaas yarshite.
NUM 29:37 Wofaanotara, Marazetaranne dorsa urgetara katha yarshuwanne ushsha yarshuwa wogay kiiteysada enta taybuwada yarshite.
NUM 29:38 Gallas gallas yarshetiya xuussa yarshuwa bolla, katha yarshuwa bollanne ushsha yarshuwa bolla gujidi nagara yarshos issi kole yarshite.
NUM 29:39 “Hinte gaso yarshuwa bollanne hinte dosa yarshuwa bolla xuussa yarsho, katha yarsho, ushsha yarshonne issifetetha yarsho Baaliya bonchanaw kiitetida wodiyan yarshite” yaagis.
NUM 29:40 Musey, Goday bana kiittidaysa ubbaa Isra7eele asaas odis.
NUM 30:1 Musey Isra7eele zeretha halaqatako, “Godaa kiitay haysa;
NUM 30:2 Issi asi Godaas issiba oothanaw caaqiko woyko issibaape bana naaganaw qangiko guye goonna polo.
NUM 30:3 “Ba aawa son de7iya geela7iya Godaas issiba oothanaw caaqiko woyko issibaape bana naaganaw qangiko,
NUM 30:4 I aaway iya caaqidaysa woyko iya qangetidaysa si7idi, iyo diggonna ixiko, iya polanaw koshshees.
NUM 30:5 Shin I aaway hessa si7idi iyo diggiko I caaqoynne I qangethay attanaw danda7ees. I aaway iyo diggida gisho Goday iw atto gaana.
NUM 30:6 “Gelonna macca na7iya caaqada de7ashe woyko issibaape bana naaganaw qangetada de7ashe azina geliko,
NUM 30:7 I azinay hessa si7idi iyo diggonna ixiko iya ba caaquwanne ba qangetha polanaw koshshees.
NUM 30:8 Shin I azinay hessa si7idi iyo diggiko iya caaqida caaqoy woyko qangetida qangethay iyo gomenna. Hessa Goday iw atto gaana.
NUM 30:9 “Shin am7iya woyko sayo maccasi caaqida caaquwa woyko qangida qangetha polanaw bessees.
NUM 30:10 “Azinara de7iya maccasi caaqiko woyko issiba oothanaw qangiko,
NUM 30:11 I azinay hessa si7idi iyo diggonna ixiko, iya caaqida caaquwanne qangetida qangetha polo.
NUM 30:12 I azinay hessa si7ida gallas iyo diggiko I caaqoy woyko iya oothanaw qangetida qangethay iyo gomenna. I azinay diggida gisho Goday iw atto gaana.
NUM 30:13 I azinay iya caaqida caaquwa woyko iya bana kawushanaw qangetida qangetha laallanaw woyko minthanaw danda7ees.
NUM 30:14 Shin I azinay he gallas woyko wontetha gallas aykoka goonna ixiko, I caaquwa woyko I qangetha minthis guussu. I hessa si7idi, si77i giiko I qofaa ma7is guussu.
NUM 30:15 Shin I hessa si7i gam7idi zaari diggiyaba gidiko hessas oyshetey iya” yaagis.
NUM 30:16 Hiza haysi azina giddoninne machi giddon, ba aawara son de7iya geela7o giddoninne I aawa giddon de7iya gahetethaba Goday Muses immida wogaa.
NUM 31:1 Goday Museko,
