NUM 31:2 “Isra7eele asaa qohida gisho Midiyaame asaa olada halo keya; hessafe guye, neeni hayqada ne mayzata gakana” yaagis.
NUM 31:3 Hessa gisho, Musey asaako, “Midiyaame asaa olidi Godaa halo keyana mela hinte giddofe guutha asaa olas dancisite.
NUM 31:4 Issi issi Isra7eele kochaafe issi mukulu adde asaa olas yeddite” yaagis.
NUM 31:5 Hessa gisho, issi issi Isra7eele kochaafe issi issi mukulu asay keyidi, tammanne nam7u mukulu olanchoti olas giigidosona.
NUM 31:6 Musey kahiniya Alaazara na7aa Pinihaasa aawatethan, issi issi kochaafe issi issi mukulu asi dooridi olas yeddis; Pinihaasi bishe geeshsha miishetanne mallas punniya zaye ekidi bis.
NUM 31:7 Goday Muse kiitidaysada, enti Midiyaame asaa olidi adde ubbaa wodhidosona.
NUM 31:8 Ichashu Midiyaame kawota, Ewa, Reqeema, Zura, Huranne Reeba geetetiya asata wodhidosona; qassi Bi7oora na7aa Balaamaka mashshan wodhidosona.
NUM 31:9 Isra7eele asay Midiyaame maccasaanne nayta di7idosona; enta mehiya, dorsaanne deesha wudiyanne enta miishe ubbaa di7idosona.
NUM 31:10 Enti de7iya katamatanne enta gutata ubbaa xuuggidosona.
NUM 31:11 Asaa mehiyanne de7idaba ubbaa ekidi bidosona.
NUM 31:12 Enti di7ida asaa, mehiyanne shalo ubbaa Iyaarkofe hefinthan, Yordaanose shaafa matan de7iya Moo7abe denban dunkaanida Museko, kahiniya Alaazarakonne Isra7eele maabaraako ehidosona.
NUM 31:13 Musey, kahiniya Alaazarinne maabara halaqati ubbay dunkaanida gutaape gaxa keyidi entana mokidosona.
NUM 31:14 Musey olape simmida tora moconata, shaalaqatanne mato halaqata bolla hanqetis.
NUM 31:15 Musey entako, “Maccasa ubbaa ayis wodhibeeketii?
NUM 31:16 Enti Balaama zoriya si7idi, Pe7oora geetetiya bessan Isra7eele asay Godaa aggidi, boshan hayqanaada oothiday maccasa gideysa dogidetii?
NUM 31:17 Hessa gisho, ha77i adde naytanne addera aqida maccas ubbaa wodhite.
NUM 31:18 Shin addera aqiboona macca nayta ubbaa hintew ashshite.
NUM 31:19 Hinte giddofe ase wodhida asi woyko aha bochida oonika gutaape gaxan laapun gallas utto; heedzantho gallasaninne laapuntha gallasan hintenanne hinte di77ida asaa geeshshite.
NUM 31:20 Hessadaka ma7o ubbaa, galbafe, deesha ikisepenne mithafe oosetidabata ubbaa geeshshite” yaagis.
NUM 31:21 Kahiney Alaazari olape simmida olanchotako, “Goday Muses immida higgiya maaray haysa;
NUM 31:22 Worqa, bira, naase, birata, qorqoro, irsaase,
NUM 31:23 taman meetetonnabati ubbay taman geeyanaw bessees. Shin taman meetetiyabati geeshsho haathan geeyanaw bessees.
NUM 31:24 Laapuntha gallasan hinte ma7uwa meeccite; hintena geeshshite. Hessafe guye, gutaa gelite” yaagis.
NUM 31:25 Goday Museko,
NUM 31:26 “Neera, kahiniya Alaazararanne Isra7eele maabara halaqati di7etida asaanne mehiya taybite.
NUM 31:27 Ola bidaysatasinne boonnaysatas nam7u kessidi shaakite.
NUM 31:28 Ola bidaysata gishuwape ase gidin miizi gidin hare gidin dorse woyko deeshe gidin ichashu xeetape issino Godaas immite.
NUM 31:29 Enta gishuwape ekida Godaa imota kahiniya Alaazaras immite.
NUM 31:30 Hanko Isra7eeleta gakida gishuwape, ase gidin miizi gidin hare gidin dorse woyko deeshe gidin ishatammaafe issino ekidi Godaa Dunkaaniya aawatethan aysiya Leewetas immite” yaagis.
NUM 31:31 Museynne kahiney Alaazari Goday kiitidaysada oothidosona.
NUM 31:32 Olanchoti bantaw ekin attida di7oy 675,000 dorsata, 72,000 miizata, 61,000 haretanne 32,000 geela7o macca nayta.
NUM 31:36 Ola bidaysata gakida gishoy 337,500 dorsata;
NUM 31:37 entafe Godaas imetiday 675.
NUM 31:38 Miizati 36,000; entafe Godaas imetiday 72.
NUM 31:39 Hareti 30,500; entafe Godaas imetiday 61.
NUM 31:40 Maccasati 16,000; entafe Godaas imetiday 32.
NUM 31:41 Goday Muse kiitidaysada Godaa imota kahiniya Alaazaras immis.
NUM 31:42 Ola boonna Isra7eele maabara gakida gishoy ola bida asaa gishuwara issi gina; ika 337,500 dorsata, 36,000 miizata, 30,500 haretanne 16,000 geela7o macca nayta.
NUM 31:47 Isra7eele maabara gakida gishuwape ishatamu asaapenne mehiyape isso isso kessidi Goday iya kiitidaysada geeshsha Dunkaaniya aawatethan aysiya Leewetas immis.
NUM 31:48 Hessafe guye, tora moconati, shaalaqatinne mato halaqati Museko shiiqidi,
NUM 31:49 “Nuuni ne aylleti nu aawatetha garsan de7iya olanchota taybin issoyka pacibeenna.
NUM 31:50 Goday nu shempuwa ashshida gisho, nu issoy issoy ekida worqa alleeqota, sagaayota, toho albota, migiddota, haytha worqatanne qoodhe worqata Godaas immanaw ekidi yida” yaagidosona.
NUM 31:51 Museynne kahiney Alaazari worqa alleeqota ubbaa entafe ekidosona.
NUM 31:52 Shaalaqatinne mato halaqati Godaas immida worqay nam7u xeetu kilo giraame gidis.
NUM 31:53 Hanko olanchoti ehida di7uwa bantaw ekidosona.
NUM 31:54 Museynne kahiney Alaazari shalaqatapenne mato halaqatape ekida worqa Godaa sinthan Isra7eele asaa hassayisiyaba oothidi geeshsha dunkaaniya giddo ehidosona.
NUM 32:1 Robeelanne Gaade kochaas daro mehey de7ees. Enti Ya7izeera biittaynne Galada biittay mehes inje gideysa,
NUM 32:2 be7idi Museko, kahiniya Alaazarakonne Isra7eele maabara halaqatako yidi haysada yaagidosona.
NUM 32:3 “Isra7eele asay laattana mela Goday maaddida biittay, Axaarotey, Dibooni, Ya7izeeri, Nimiri, Hasebooni, Eliyaali, Sebami, Naboynne Ba7ooni mehes inje biitta; nuus hinte aylletas daro mehey de7ees.
NUM 32:5 Nuuni hinte sinthan saba demmidaba gidiko, he biitta nuus hinte aylleta laata oothidi immite; nuna Yordaanose shaafape hefinthi pinthofite” yaagidosona.
NUM 32:6 Musey Gaade kochatakonne Robeela kochatako, “Hinte bagga gidida Isra7eele asay olas biya wode hinte haysan uttanaw koyeetii?
NUM 32:7 Goday entaw immida biitta enti pinnonna mela hinte ayis enta wozanaa shugiseetii?
NUM 32:8 Qaadesa Barnefe ha biitta wochana mela hinte aawata ta yeddida wode entika haysada oothidosona.
NUM 32:9 Enti Eshkola Zangaara gakanaw bidi he biitta be7i simmidi Isra7eeleti Goday entaw immida biitta gelonna mela Isra7eeleta wozanaa shugisidosona.
NUM 32:10 Goday he gallas daro hanqetidi haysada yaagidi caaqis;
NUM 32:11 ‘Banta kumetha wozanaape tana kaalliboonna gisho, Gibxe biittafe keydaysatape laythi laatamanne iyape bolla gidida adde asaape issoyka Abrahaames, Yisaaqasinne Yayqoobas immana gada caaqida biitta gelekona.
NUM 32:12 Banta kumetha wozanape kaallida gisho, Qeneza Yoofona na7aa Kaalebapenne Nawe na7aa Iyyasupe attishin, hari oonika gelenna’ yaagis.
NUM 32:13 Godaa hanqoy Isra7eele asaa bolla eexida gisho Godaa sinthan iita oothida he yeletetha ubbay dhayana gakanaw mela biittan oytamu laythi toylatidosona.
NUM 32:14 Hinteno, nagaranchota nayto hinte aawata bessan eqidi Goday Isra7eele asaa bolla gujidi hanqetana mela ootheeta.
NUM 32:15 Hinte Godaa kaallonna ixiko, I qassika ba deriya mela biittan aggana. Entana gakiya dhayuwas hinte oyshetana” yaagis.
NUM 32:16 Enti Museko shiiqidi, “Nuuni haysan nu mehiyas dara, nu naytasinne nu machetas katama keexanaw koyoos.
NUM 32:17 Shin Isra7eele asay banta bessaa ekana gakanaw nuuni ola miishe dancidi enta sinthan keyidi oletanaw giigetida. He wode he biittan de7iya asay nu naytanne nu macheta qohonna mela gimbetidi uttida katamatan de7ona.
NUM 32:18 Isra7eele asa ubbay banta laata laata ekana gakanaw, nuuni nu soo simmoko.
NUM 32:19 Nuuni nu laata Yordaanose shaafape hafinthan doloha baggan laattida gisho, Yordaanosepe hefinthan wuloha baggan entara laata ekoko” yaagidosona.
NUM 32:20 Musey entako, “Hinte geysi tuma gidiko haysan Godaa sinthan ola baanaw dancetite.
NUM 32:21 Goday ba morketa ba sinthafe gooddana gakanaw hinte ola miishiya dancidi, Yordaanose shaafa Godaa sinthan pinniko,
NUM 32:22 he biitta Goday xoonidaape guye hinte simmanaw danda7eeta. He wode hinte Godaasinne Isra7eele asaas oletidi polideta guussu. Qassi he biittay Godaa sinthan hintew laata gidana.
NUM 32:23 “Hinte hessa oothonna ixiko Godaa bolla nagara ootheeta; hiza, hinte nagaraa gisho hintena seeri gakanaysa loythi erite.
NUM 32:24 Hinte hintew katamata, hinte mehiyas dara keexite, shin hinte gelida qaala polite” yaagis.
NUM 32:25 Gaade kochaynne Robeela, kochay Museko, “Nuuni ne aylleti ne kiitidaysada oothana.
NUM 32:26 Nu nayti, nu macheti, nu dorsatinne nu mehey haysan Galada katamatan de7ishshona.
NUM 32:27 Shin nuuni ne aylleti, olanchoti ubbay, neeni nu goday gidaysada oletanaw Godaa sinthan Yordaanose shaafa pinnana” yaagidosona.
NUM 32:28 Hessa gisho, Musey kahiniya Alaazara, Nawe na7a Iyyasunne Isra7eele kochata halaqata entaba yaagidi Kiittis.
NUM 32:29 “Gaade kochaynne Robeela kochay ubbay ola miishiya dancidi, Godaa sinthan hintera Yordaanose shaafa pinnikonne hinte he biitta xooniko, hessafe guye, Galada biitta hinte enta laatisite.
NUM 32:30 Shin enti ola miishiya dancidi, hintera pinnidi olas boonna ixiko, hinteda entaw Kanaane biittan laati imeto” yaagis.
NUM 32:31 Yaatin. Gaade kochaynne Robeela kochay zaaridi, “Nuuni ne aylleti Goday gidaysa oothana.
NUM 32:32 Nuuni ola miishiya dancidi, Godaa sinthan Kanaane biitta gelanaw pinnana; shin nuuni laattiya laatay Yordaanosepe hafintha bagga gido” yaagidosona.
NUM 32:33 Hessa gisho, Musey Gaade kochaas, Robeela kochaasinne Yoosefa na7aa Minaase kochaafe baggaas Amoore kawa Sihoona kawotethaanne Baasane kawa Ooge kawotethaa enta yuushuwan de7iya katamatara immis.
NUM 32:34 Gaade kochay Diboona, Axaarota, Aro7eera
NUM 32:35 Axiroot-Shafaana, Ya7izeera, Yogiba,
NUM 32:36 Beet-Nimiranne Beet-Harana geetetiya gimben diretida katamata zaaridi keexidosona; banta mehiyas dara keexidosona.
NUM 32:37 Robeela, kochay Haseboona, Eli7aala, Qiratayma,
NUM 32:38 Naaba, Ba7aal-Ma7oonanne Sebama geetetiya katamata zaarethi keexidosona; he katamata sunthaa laammidosona.
NUM 32:39 Minaase na7aa Makira kochati Galada biitta oli oykidi yan de7iya Amooreta goodidosona.
NUM 32:40 Hessa gisho, Minaase na7aa Makira kochaas Musey Galada biitta immin enti yan de7idosona.
NUM 32:41 Minaase kochi gidida Ya7iri he si olli oykidi, “Ya7ira katamata” yaagidi sunthis.
NUM 32:42 Nooba Qanaata katamaanne iya yuushuwan de7iya gutata ollan oykide, ba sunthan “Nooba” gidi sunthis.
NUM 33:1 Museynne Aaroni kaalethin, Isra7eele asay, banta cugan cugan Gibxefe keyidi siiratida gutata odiya taarikey haysa.
NUM 33:2 Goday Kiittidaysa mela Musey enti siiratida bessata sunthaa ubbaa kaali kaali xaafis.
NUM 33:3 Isra7eele asay koyro ageenan, tammanne ichashantho gallasan, Paasika bonchiya nam7antho gallas dendidi, Gibxe asa ubbay be7ishin, yayyonna Ramisepe keyidosona.
NUM 33:4 He wode Gibxe asay Godaa gadon hayqida banta bayra nayta moogosona. Hessada oothidi, Goday enta xoossata bolla pirda ehis.
NUM 33:5 Isra7eele asay Ramisepe dendidi Sukota geetetiya bessan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:6 Sukotape dendidi mela biitta gaxan de7iya Etaaman dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:7 Etaamape dendidi Ba7ali-Xafoonape doloha baggan de7iya Pihahiroota simmidi Migdoola matan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:8 Pihahirootape dendidi, Zo7o Abbaa pinnidi, Suuza mela biitta bidosona. Etaama mela biittan heedzu gallas hemetidi Maaran dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:9 Maarape dendidi tammanne nam7u pultotinne laapun tammu zambati de7iya Eliman dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:10 Elimape dendidi Zo7o Abbaa matan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:11 Zo7o Abbaa matape dendidi Siina mela biittan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:12 Siina mela biittafe dendidi Rafaqan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:13 Rafaqape dendidi Elusan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:14 Elusape dendidi haathi bayna bessan Rafidiman dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:15 Rafidimape dendidi Siina mela biittan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:16 Siina mela biittafe dendidi Kibirooti Hati7awan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:17 Kibirooti Hati7awape dendidi Haxerootan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:18 Haxerootape dendidi Irtiman dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:19 Irtimape dendidi Irmoon-Pareezan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:20 Irmoon-Pareezape dendidi Libinan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:21 Libinape dendidi Irisan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:22 Irisape dendidi Qahelatan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:23 Qahelatape dendidi Shefara zuman dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:24 Shefara zumaape dendidi Haraadan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:25 Haradape dendidi Maqhelotan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:26 Maqhelotape dendidi Tahatan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:27 Tahatape dendidi Taaran dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:28 Taarape dendidi Mitiqan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:29 Mitiqape dendidi Hashimoonan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:30 Hashimoonape dendidi Moserootan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:31 Moserootape dendidi Ben-Ya7iqanan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:32 Ben-Ya7iqanape dendidi Hoor-Hagidigaadan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:33 Hoor-Hagidigadape dendidi Yoxibaatan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:34 Yoxibaatape dendidi Abroonan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:35 Abroonape dendidi Exiyoon-Gabiran dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:36 Exiyooni-Gabirape dendidi Siina mela biittan Qaadesan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:37 Qaadesape dendidi Edoome biitta zawan de7iya Hoora zuman dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:38 Kahiney Aaroni Godaa kiitan Hoora zuma bolla keyidi, Isra7eele asay Gibxe biittafe keyida oytamantho laythan, ichashantho ageenan, koyro gallasan yan hayqis.
NUM 33:39 Aaroni Hoora zuma bolla hayqiya wode iyaw laythi xeetanne laatamanne heedza.
NUM 33:40 Negebe mela biittan Kanaanen de7iya Arada Kawoy Isra7eele asaa yuussaa si7is.
NUM 33:41 Isra7eele asay Hoora zumaape dendidi Xalmoonan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:42 Xalmoonape dendidi Punoonan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:43 Punoonape dendidi Obotan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:44 Obotape dendidi Moo7abe biitta zawan de7iya Abariiman dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:45 Abariimape dendidi Diboon-Gaadan dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:46 Dibon-Gaadape dendidi Almoon-Dibilatayman dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:47 Almoon-Dibilataymape dendidi Nabo zuma sinthan Abariima zumata bolla dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:48 Abariima zumatape dendidi Iyaarkofe hefinthan, Yordaanose shaafa matan de7iya Moo7abe denban dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:49 Yordaanose shaafa matan de7iya Moo7abe denban, Beet-Yashimootapenne Abeel-Saxima Zangaarape giddon dunkaanidosona.
NUM 33:50 Iyaarkofe hefinthan, Yordaanose shaafa matan de7iya Moo7abe demban Goday Museko,
NUM 33:51 “Isra7eele asaas yaagada oda; Yordaanose shaafa pinnidi, Kanaane biitta hinte geliya wode
NUM 33:52 he biittan de7iya asa ubbaa hinte sinthafe yedethite. Shuchafe masetidi oosetida misiletanne sheeshidi medhida eeqata dhaysite. Dhoqa goyinno bessata ubbaa laallite.
NUM 33:53 He biitta ta hintew immida gisho iya laattidi yan de7ite.
NUM 33:54 Hinte kochan kochan saama kessidi biitta shaaketite. Taybon dariya kochatas dalga laata immite; taybon guuxiya kochatas guutha laata immite. Saaman enta gakida biittay entaba gidana. Biittaa hinte mayzata kochan kochan shaakidi ekite.
NUM 33:55 Shin he biittan de7iya asaa hinte yedethonna ixiko, hinte ashshidaysati hinte ayfiyas pinco, hinte miyiyas agunthu gidana; hinte daana biittan ubba wode ola denthidi hintena waaysana.
NUM 33:56 Hinte enta yedethonna ixiko, ta enta bolla oothanaw halchidaba hinte bolla oothana gada oda” yaagis.
NUM 34:1 Goday Museko,
NUM 34:2 “Isra7eele asaas haysada gada oda; hinte Kanaane geliya wode ta hintew laata oothada immana biitta zaway haysa.
NUM 34:3 Dugeha bagga zaway Siina mela biittafe dendidi Edoome zawa kanthees. Doloha baggara hinte zaway Maxine Abbaafe duge baggara doomidi,
NUM 34:4 Aqirabima aadhiya bessaa shaakidi Siina biitta bazzuwa kanthidi dugeha baggara Qaades-Barne gakees. Yaape Hadar-Adaara kanthidi Aximoona gakees.
NUM 34:5 Aximoonape dendidi Gibxe shaafa guye simmidi Medetiraane Abbaa gakees.
NUM 34:6 “Wuloha bagga zaway Medetiraane Abbaa gaxa gidana.
NUM 34:7 “Pudeha bagga zaway Medetiraane Abbaa kaallidi Hoora zuma gakanaw bees.
NUM 34:8 Hoora zumaape Hamaata geliya bessaa gakanaw bees; he zawa wursethay Xadaada.
NUM 34:9 Yaape dendidi Zifiroona gakidi, Haxar-Enaanan eqees; pudeha bagga zaway haysa.
NUM 34:10 “Doloha bagga zaway Haxar-Enaanape Safaama mallaa gakees.
NUM 34:11 Safaama mallafe dendidi Aynape doloha baggara Irbila duge wodhidi Kenereeta Abbaafe doloha baggara de7iya zumata gakees.
NUM 34:12 Hessafe hinte zaway duge Yordaanose shaafa wodhi zawaydi Maxine Abbaa gakees. Hinte biitta yuusho zawati haysata” yaagis.
NUM 34:13 Musey Isra7eele asaa haysada yaagidi Kiittis; “Uddufun bagga kochaas hinte saama yeggidi shaakana laata biittay haysa.
NUM 34:14 Robeela kochay, Gaade kochaynne Minaase kochaafe baggay,
NUM 34:15 banta laata Iyaarkofe hefinthan, Yordaanose Shaafape doloha baggan ekidosona” yaagis.
NUM 34:16 Goday Museko,
NUM 34:17 “Kahiniya Alaazaranne Nawe na7aa Iyyasuy he biitta asaas shaako.
NUM 34:18 Qassi biitta shaakanaw maadana mela issi issi kochaafe issi issi halaqa doorite.”
NUM 34:19 Enta sunthay haysafe kaallidi de7eysa. Yihuda kochaafe Yoofona na7aa Kaaleba;
NUM 34:20 Simoona kochaafe Amhuda na7aa Salam7eela;
NUM 34:21 Biniyaame kochaafe Kisiloona na7aa Eldaada;
NUM 34:22 Daane kochaafe Yogila na7aa Buuqa;
NUM 34:23 Yoosefa na7aa Minaase kochaafe Sufeeda na7aa Hani7eela;
NUM 34:24 Yoosefa na7aa Efreema kochaafe Shifixaana na7aa; Qamu7eela;
NUM 34:25 Zabloona kochaafe Farnaaka na7aa Elsafaana;
NUM 34:26 Yisakoora kochaafe Hooza na7aa Palxi7eela;
NUM 34:27 Aseera kochaafe Salooma na7aa Ahuda;
NUM 34:28 Niftaaleme kochaafe Amhuda na7aa Padahi7eela;
NUM 34:29 Kanaane biitta Isra7eele asaas laata oothidi shaakidi immana mela Goday kiitida asati haysata” yaagis.
NUM 35:1 Iyaarkofe hefinthan, Yordaanose shaafa matan de7iya Moo7abe denban, Goday Museko haysada yaagis;
NUM 35:2 “Isra7eeleti banta laatape Leeweti daana katamatanne enta yuushuwan hentha biitta immana mela entaw oda.
NUM 35:3 He katamati entaw duussa bessi gido; hentha biittati enta miizas, enta dorsaasinne enta hara mehetas gido.
NUM 35:4 Hinte entaw immiya hentha biittay ubba baggara katamaa gimbe dirsaafe issi mukulu wadha gido.
NUM 35:5 Katamaa giddo oothidi doloha baggara nam7u mukulu wadha, dugeha baggara nam7u mukulu wadha, wuloha baggara nam7u mukulu wadhanne pudeha baggara nam7u mukulu wadha wadhite. Leeweti he heera banta katamaas hentha biitta ootho.
NUM 35:6 “Leewetas hinte immida katamati, ase wodhida uray baqatidi attiya usupun katamata; hessata bolla gujidika, oytamanne nam7u hara katamata entaw immite.
NUM 35:7 Oytamanne hospun katamata enta hentha biittara issife Leewetas immite.
NUM 35:8 Isra7eele asaa laatape enta laata mela daro kochaafe daro katama, guutha kochaafe guutha katama ekidi Leewetas immite” yaagis.
NUM 35:9 Goday Museko,
NUM 35:10 “Isra7eele asaako haysada yaaga; Yordaanose shaafa pinnidi, Kanaane biitta hinte geliya wode,
NUM 35:11 issi asi qoponna ase wodhidaba gidiko he uray baqatidi attana mela katamata hintew doorite.
NUM 35:12 Yan suuthu zaaranaw koya hayqida uraa dabbotape I attees. Shempo wodhida deriya sinthan pirdas shiiqonna hayqanaw bessenna.
NUM 35:13 Ha hinte immiya usupun katamati hinte baqatidi attiya katama gido.
NUM 35:14 Heedzu katamati Yordaanose shaafape doloha baggan gido; qassi attida heedzati Kanaane biittan gido.
NUM 35:15 Ha usupun katamati eronna ase wodhida Isra7eele asay, betanchotinne guutha wodes hinte giddon de7iya asati baqatidi attiya bessi gido.
NUM 35:16 “Issi asi hara asi birata miishen shocidi wodhiko he uray shempo wodhis; I hayqo.
NUM 35:17 Issi asi wodhanaw danda7iya shuchan hara asi caddidi wodhiko he uray shempo wodhis; I hayqo.
NUM 35:18 Issi asi wodhanaw danda7iya mitha miishen hara asi shocidi wodhiko he uray shempo wodhis; I hayqo.
NUM 35:19 Suuthu zaariya mata dabboy he shempo wodhidaysa demmiko wodho.
NUM 35:20 “Issi asi hara asi ba wozanan morkidi sugi yeggiko woyko hayqo gidi iya bolla issiba holin he uray hayqiko,
NUM 35:21 woyko morkidi ba kushe cuucummidi dechin he uray hayqiko, I shempo wodhis; I hayqo. Suuthu zaariya mata dabboy shempo wodhidaysa demmiko wodho.
NUM 35:22 “Shin morketethi baynan, issi asi hara asi akeekona sugidi woyko qoponna iya bolla issiba holiko,
NUM 35:23 woyko wodhanaw danda7iya shuchu I be7onna iya bolla holin, he uray hayqiko, hessan morketethi bayna gishonne iya qohanaw qopidi dendonna gisho,
NUM 35:24 duulatay iya giddoninne iya suutha zaaranaw koya uraa giddon pirdiya wogay kaallidi de7iya wogaatho gido.
NUM 35:25 Eronna wodhidaysa suuthaa zaaranaw koyeysa kushepe he uraa duulatay ashshidi, I baqatidi attiya katamaa zaaro. He wode de7iya zayten tiyetida kahine halaqay hayqana gakanaw I yan de7o.
NUM 35:26 “Shin eronna wodhidaysi baqatidi attiya katamaa zawape betiko,
NUM 35:27 hayqida uraa dabboy iya demmidi wodhiko, shempo wodhon oyshetenna.
NUM 35:28 He wode de7iya kahine halaqay hayqana gakanaw he eronna wodhida uray baqatidi attiya kataman utto. Shin he kahine halaqay hayqidaape guye eronna wodhida uray ba soo simmanaw danda7ees.
NUM 35:29 “Ha wogaynne higgey hinte de7iya biittan hintewunne hinte zerethaas eqidi de7iya woga gido.
NUM 35:30 “Ase wodhida oonika I shempo wodhidaysa nam7u woyko heedzu marki markatiko hayqo, shin issi asa markatethan oonika hayqanaw bessenna.
NUM 35:31 Qassi shempo wodhida asape aca ekofite; I hayqanaw bessees.
NUM 35:32 Baqatidi attiya katama betida oodefeka kahine halaqay hayqanaape sinthe ba soo simmana mela aca iyape ekofite.
NUM 35:33 Suuthi biitta tunisiya gisho suuthu gussofite. Suuthu gussida uraa suuthaafe attishin, suuthi gukida biitta hara ogera tunatethaafe geeshshiya wogi baawa.
NUM 35:34 Taani, Goday Isra7eele asaa giddon de7iya gisho, hinte de7iya biitta, taani aqiya biitta tunisopite” yaagis.
NUM 36:1 Yoosefa kochaafe, Minaase na7aa Makira na7aa Galada kochaa halaqati Musekonne Isra7eele halaqatako yidi
NUM 36:2 “Nu godaw, Isra7eele asaas laata biitta saaman shaakada immana mela Goday nena kiittis; qassi nu ishaa Selophaada laata iya macca naytas immana mela nena kiittis.
NUM 36:3 Enti hara koche gidida Isra7eele asi geliko enta laatay nu aawata laatape eketidi enta ekiya zerethas guzhetees. Hessa gisho, nuus saaman imetida laatay guuxees.
NUM 36:4 Isra7eele asaas Ishatamantho Laytha bonchiya ba7aaley gakiya wode enta laatay enta ekida asaa kochaas guzhetees; hessa gidiko enta laatay nu aawata kochaa laatape eketana” yaagidosona.
NUM 36:5 Hessa gisho, Musey Godaape ekida kiitaa Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagidi odis; “Yoosefa kochay gidaysi like.
NUM 36:6 Goday Selophaada macca naytabaa kiittidaysi haysa; enti bantaw dosida azina gelanaw danda7oosona, shin enta kochaafe gidanaw koshshees.
NUM 36:7 Isra7eele asaa laatay issi kochaafe hara kochaas aadhofo; Isra7eele asay banta kochaa laata biitta minthidi naago.
NUM 36:8 Isra7eele asa giddon laata biitta ekida maccasi oonika ba aawa koche gidida azina gelanaw koshshees. Hessada oothiko enta kochaa laatay enta kushen gam7ees.
NUM 36:9 Yaatiko, laatay issi kochaafe hara kochaako aadhenna. Issi issi kochay ba laata biitta oykida mela daana” yaagis.
NUM 36:10 Yaatin, Selophaada macca nayti Goday Muse kiitidaysada oothidosona.
NUM 36:11 Selophaada macca nayti, Mahilo, Tirxo, Hoglo, Milkonne No7o geeteteysati banta aawa ishata nayta gelidosona.
NUM 36:12 Enti Yoosefa na7aa Minaase nayta kochaafe azina gelidosona; enta laatay enta aawa kochaas gidis.
NUM 36:13 Iyaarkofe hefinthan, Yordaanose shaafa matan, de7iya Moo7abe Denban Muse baggara, Goday Isra7eele asaas kiitida higgetinne wogati haysata.
DEU 1:1 Ha maxaafan xaafetida qaala ubbay Yordaanose shaafape hefinthan de7iya mela biittan enti de7ishin, Musey Isra7eele asaas odida qaala. He wode enti Suufape sintha baggara Paarana katamaas issi baggara, qassi Tofeela, Laabana, Haxerootanne Dizaaba katamata giddon de7iya Yordaanose zangaaran de7oosona.
DEU 1:2 Sayre deriya baggara Koreeba zumaape bidi Qaades-Barne gakanaw tohon tammanne issi gallasa oge.
DEU 1:3 Gibxefe enti keyida oytamantho laythan, tammanne issintho ageenan, koyro gallasan, Goday entaba Muse kiittidaba ubbaa Isra7eele asaas odis.
DEU 1:4 Hessi haniday Haseboona kataman kawotidi Amooreta haariya Sihoonanne Astarootaninne Edraa7an kawotidi Baasane haariya Ooge, Musey xoonidaape guyena.
DEU 1:5 Asay Yordaanosepe doloha baggara, Moo7aben de7ishin, Musey ha higgiya haysada yaagidi entaw qoncisethi doomis.
DEU 1:6 Nuuni Koreeba Zumaa bolla de7ishin, Goday, nu Xoossay nuuko haysada yaagis. “Hinte ha deriya bolla daro gam7ideta.
DEU 1:7 Dunkaaniya laallite; dendidi derey dariya Amooreta biittanne Araban de7iya enta yuushuwan de7iya biitta ubbaa biite. Hessika Yordaanose zangaara, gezzenne gadha biitta, Negebanne Medetiraane Abbaa gaxa aadhite. Kanaane biitta biite; Libaanose dereta kanthidi, Efraxiisa Shaafa gakanaw biite.
DEU 1:8 Heko, taani hintew ha biitta immas. Bidi hinte aawatas, Abrahaames, Yisaaqas, Yayqoobasinne enta sheeshas immanaw Goday caaqida biitta laattite” yaagis.
DEU 1:9 Musey asaako, “He wode taani hintew haysada yaagada odas; taani tarka hintena tookanaw danda7ike.
DEU 1:10 Goday, hinte Xoossay hinte taybuwa salo xoolintoda darsis.
DEU 1:11 Goday hinte aawata Xoossay, hintena haysafe aathidi mukulu toho gujidi darsonne I gidaysada hintena anjo.
DEU 1:12 Shin hinte metuwa, hinte toohuwanne hinte ooshsha ubbaa taani tarka waata tookanaw danda7ayna?
DEU 1:13 Hinte kochatape cinca, akeekanchonne bonchetida asata doorite; taani hinte bolla enta halaqa oothana” yaagis.
DEU 1:14 Hinte zaaridi, “Ne qofay lo77o” yaagideta.
DEU 1:15 Hessa gisho, taani hinte kochaafe cincanne bonchetida asata ekada, shaalaqa, mato halaqa, hamsalaqanne asiralaqa, hintena ayseysata oothada hinte bolla shuumas.
DEU 1:16 Taani enta, “Hinte ishata giddon de7iya odaa si7ite; he oday issi Isra7eele asaapenne iya ishaape giddon woyko Isra7eele asaapenne hara dere asape giddon de7iyaba gidikoka, odaa si7idi suure pirdite.
DEU 1:17 Pirdi Xoossaba gidiya gisho, hinte pirdan issi baggaa maaddofite; gitaa si7eysada guuthaa si7ite; asa som7os yayyofite. Daro deexo gidida odata taako ehite; hessa taani si7ana.”
DEU 1:18 Hinte oothanaba ubbaa ta he wode hintena kiittana.
DEU 1:19 Hessafe guye, “Nuuni Koreeba zumaape dendida; Goday nu Xoossay nuna kiittidaysada, derey dariya Amooreta biitta biya ogen de7iya he hinte be7ida gitanne yashshiya mela biitta kanthidi Qaades-Barne gakida.
DEU 1:20 Goday nu Xoossay nuna laatisiya, derey dariya Amooreta biittay haysa.
DEU 1:21 Goday hinte Xoossay ha biitta hintew immis. Goday hinte aawata Xoossay hintew odidaysada keyidi, ha biitta laattite; yayofite; ufaysi qanxofite” yaagas.
DEU 1:22 Hinte ubbay taako yidi, “He biitta xomoosidi, nu baanaw bessiya ogiyabanne gelana katamata hanota new ehiya asata nuupe sinthe yeddoos” yaagideta.
DEU 1:23 He qofay taw lo77o daanin, hintefe tammanne nam7u asi, kochaafe kochaafe issi asi dooras.
DEU 1:24 Enti bidi, he derey dariya biitta kanthidi, Eshkola zangaara gakanaw de7iya biitta wochidosona.
DEU 1:25 He biittan doliyabape guutha ayfe banta kushen oykidi nuuko yidosona. Qassi, “Goday nu Xoossay nuus immiya biittay lo77o biitta” giya wore ekidi yidosona.
DEU 1:26 Shin hinte Godaa hinte Xoossaa kiitta ixas gidi yaa boonna ixideta.
DEU 1:27 Hinte dunkaaniya giddon issoy issuwara haysada yaagidi zuuzumideta. “Goday nuna ixida gisho, dhaysanaw Amoore biitta asata kushen aathidi immanaw Gibxe biittafe kessis.
DEU 1:28 Yaatin yaa ayis baanee? Nu ishati, ‘He biittan de7iya asati nuupe daroosonanne aduqosona. Katamatika gitanne salo gakanaw gimbetidaysata. Hessa bolla qassi Anaaqe geetetiya daro adussa asata yan be7ida’ yaagidi, nu wozana til7isidosona” yaagideta.
DEU 1:29 Yaatin taani, “Yayyofite woyko dagammofite.
DEU 1:30 Hinte sinthara biya Goday hinte Xoossay kase Gibxen hinte ayfiya sinthan hintew oothidaysada ha77ika hintew I oletana.
DEU 1:31 Qassi hinte ha mela biitta gakanaw yida oge ubban asi ba na7a tookeysada Goday hinte Xoossay hintena tookidaysa be7ideta” yaagas.
DEU 1:32 Ha ubbay haninka, hinte dunkaanana bessaanne hinte baana ogiya bessanaw qamma tama tuussan, gallas shaara tuussan hintena kaalethida Godaa hinte Xoossaa ammanibeketa.
DEU 1:34 “Goday hinte haasaya si7idi hanqetis; haysada yaagidi caaqis;
DEU 1:35 taani hinte mayzatas immana gada caaqida ha lo77o biitta, ha iita yeletethaafe issoyka be7enna.
DEU 1:36 Ha biitta be7anay Yoofona na7aa Kaaleba xalaala. I yedhida biitta iyasinne iya kochaas immana; I ba kumetha wozanaape Godaa kaallis” yaagidi caaqis.
DEU 1:37 Hinte gaason Goday ta bollaka hanqetidi, haysada yaagis; “Hari attoshin, neka he biitta gelaka.
DEU 1:38 Shin nena maaddiya Nawe na7ay, Iyyasuy he biitta gelana. I Isra7eele asaa he biittaa laatisanaw de7iya gisho neeni iya minthetha.
DEU 1:39 Hinte, nu nayti di7etana gida guuthati, iitanne keeha shaakidi eronna hinte nayti he biitta gelana. Taani he biitta entaw immana; entika laattana.
DEU 1:40 Shin hinte guye simmidi, Zo7o Abbaa efiya ogiya oykidi, mela biitta biite” yaagis.
DEU 1:41 Hinte zaaridi, “Nuuni Godaa bolla nagara oothida; ha77i nuuni Goday nu Xoossay kiiteysada, keyidi oletana” yaagideta. Hinte ubbay ola miishe dancidi, derey dariya biitta keyidi oletanaysa laafaba oothidi qopideta.
DEU 1:42 Shin Goday taako, “Taani entara doonna gisho, enti keyidi oletona mela oda. Akay, giiko, enta morketi enta xoonana” yaagis.
DEU 1:43 Yaagin, taani hintew odas, shin hinte Godaa kiitta ixidetape attishin, ta odeysa si7ibeeketa; yaatidi otoron derey dariya biitta keydeta.
DEU 1:44 He derey dariya biittan de7iya Amooreti hintera ola gahetidi, hintena mathi gooddeysada gooddidi, Sayre biittafe bidi Horma gakanaw shocidosona.
DEU 1:45 Hinte guye simmidi, Godaako yeekideta; shin Goday hinte yeehuwa si7ibeenna woyko hayzibeenna.
DEU 1:46 Hessa gisho, hinte Qaadesan adussa wode gam7ideta.
DEU 2:1 Hessafe guye, Goday tana kiittidaysada, nuuni Zo7o Abbaa efiya ogiya oykidi guye simmidi mela biitta metootishe, derey dariya Sayre biittan daro gallasa toylatishe yuuyida.
DEU 2:2 Hessafe guye, Goday taako haysada yaagis.
DEU 2:3 “Ha derey dariya biitta adussa wode yuuyidaysi hintew gidana; pudeha bagga simmidi biite.
DEU 2:4 Asaa neeni yaagada kiitta; ‘Sayren de7ey Eesawe nayta hinte ishata gidiya gisho enta biittara hinte kantheeta. Enti hintew yayyana, shin hinte keehi naagetite.
DEU 2:5 Taani enta biittafe tohoy yedhiya bessa mela hintew immonna gisho entara oletofite. Taani derey dariya Sayre biitta laata oothada Eesawes koyrottada immas.
DEU 2:6 Hinte miya kathaanne uyaa haatha entafe miishen shammite’ ” yaagada kiitta.
DEU 2:7 Goday hinte Xoossay hinte oothidaba ubbaa anjis; hinte ha wolqaama mela biittan hemetiya wode hintena naagis. Oytamu laytha ubban Goday hinte Xoossay hintera de7is; hintew aybaaka pacisibeenna.
DEU 2:8 Hessa gisho, “Nuuni nu ishata gidiya Eesawe nayti de7iya Sayre biittara kanthidi bida. Qassi Elaatanne Exiyoon-Gabira katamatape dendidi, Maxine Abbaako gathiya ogiya aggidi, Moo7abe mela biittara aadhida.
DEU 2:9 Goday taako, ‘Taani enta biittafe aybaka hintew immonna gisho, Moo7abe asaara kacetofite woyko enta olopite. Era katamaa taani laata oothada Looxe kochaas koyro immas’ ” yaagis.
DEU 2:10 (He biittan kase minonne daro gidida, qassi Anaaqe kochatada adusse gidida Emimeta geetetiya asati de7idosona.
DEU 2:11 Enti Anaaqetada Raafaymeta geetetoosona. Shin Moo7abe asay enta Emimeta gidi xeegosona.
DEU 2:12 Hoora biitta asay kase Sayren de7idosona, shin Isra7eele asay laattana mela Goday entaw immida biittan enti oothidaysada Eesawa kochati Hoorata enta biittafe shoddidosona. Qassi banta sinthafe enta dhaysidi enta bessan uttidosona.)
DEU 2:13 Goday nuuko, “Ha77i dendite, Zareada Shaafa pinnite” yaagin, nuuni Zareda Shaafa pinnida.
DEU 2:14 Nuuni Qaades-Barnefe dendidi, Zareda Shaafa pinnana gakanaw hastamanne hospun laythi aadhis. He wode Goday entaw caaqidaysada olas gakida adde ubbay wuris.
DEU 2:15 Dunkaanida gutaape enti kumethi dhayana gakanaw, Godaa kushey enta bolla deexis.
DEU 2:16 Olas gakida adde asa ubbay kumethi dhaydaapenne asaa giddofe hayqidi wuridaape guye,
DEU 2:17 Goday taako,
DEU 2:18 “Era ogiyara hachi hinte Moo7abe biitta kantheeta.
DEU 2:19 Hinte Amoone asaa biitta gakiya wode enta bochofite woyko entara ooyetofite. Amoone asata biittafe aybibaaka taani hintew laata oothada immike. Taani he biitta Looxe kochaas laata oothada koyro immas” yaagis.
DEU 2:20 [He biittay kase yan de7iya asay xeegetiya sunthaa Raafaymeta biitta geetetidi xeegetees. Qassi Amooneti enta Zamzumeta gidi xeegosona.
DEU 2:21 Enti Anaaqetada adusse, minonne daro dere, shin Goday enta dhaysin, Amooneti enta biitta laattidi uttidosona.
DEU 2:22 Goday Sayren de7iya Eesawe kochaas oothidaysada, enta bolla oothis. Hessika I he biittan de7iya Hoorata dhaysin, Eesawe kochay enta biitta laattidi hachi gakanaw uttidosona.
DEU 2:23 Gaaza gakanaw de7iya heeran de7iya Aweeti, Kaftoore biittafe yida Kaftooreti enta dhaysidi enta biittan uttidosona.]
DEU 2:24 Qassika Goday nuuko, “Dendite; Arnoona Shaafa pinnite. Heko, Amoore biitta asi gidida Haseboona kawa Sihoonanne iya biitta ta hinte kushen aathada immas; iya olidi iya biitta laattite.
DEU 2:25 Hachife doomin salope garsan de7iya asa ubbay hintew yayyana mela taani oothana. Enti hintebaa si7iya wode ubban yashshan kokorana” yaagis.
DEU 2:26 Hessafe guye, Qidemoota mela biittafe Haseboona kawa Sihoonas kiitanchota bolla haysada yaagada saro qaala kiittas.
DEU 2:27 “Nuna ne biittara aatharki; nuuni wogga ogiya xalaala oykidi baana; iyape ushachi woyko haddirsi gooko.
DEU 2:28 Nuuni miya kathasinne uyaa haathas miishe qanxana. Nu koyey ne biittara kanthi aatha xalaala.
DEU 2:29 Sayren de7iya Eesawe kochatinne, Eran de7iya Moo7abe kochati nuna aathidaysada Goday nu Xoossay, nuus immiya biittas Yordaanose shaafa nuuni pinnana gakanaw yaara nuna aatha” yaagas.
DEU 2:30 Shin Haseboona kawoy Sihooney nuna aathona ixis. Goday hinte Xoossay ha77i oothidaysada iya hinte kushen aathidi immanaw koyida gisho iya wozanaa muumisisdi, otorancho oothis.
DEU 2:31 Hessafe guye Goday taako, “Heko, Sihoonanne iya biitta ta new aathada immo doomas; ha77i xoonada iya biitta laatta” yaagis.
DEU 2:32 Sihooney ba olanchota ubbaa ekidi Yahaaxa geetetiya bessan nuura oletanaw keyis.
DEU 2:33 Shin Goday nu Xoossay nuus iya aathidi immin, iya, iya adde naytanne iya olanchota ubbaa nuuni wodhida.
DEU 2:34 He wode nuuni iya katamata ubbaa oykidi, iyan de7iya adde, maccanne na7a ubbaa ashshona dhaysida.
DEU 2:35 Enta mehiyanne nuuni oykida katamatape di77idaysa xalaala nuus ekida.
DEU 2:36 Arnoona Zangaara gaxan de7iya Aro7eerapenne he zangaara giddon de7iya katamaape bidi Galada biitta gakanaw nuura eqetida issi katamika deenna. Goday nu Xoossay enta ubbaa nu kushen aathidi immis.
DEU 2:37 Shin nuuni Amoone biittako, Yaaboqa Shaafa gaxan de7iya biittako, gezze biittan de7iya katamatakonne Goday nu Xoossay nuuni boonna mela diggida bessaa ubbaa shiiqibooko.
DEU 3:1 Hessafe guye, nuuni simmidi Baasane efiya ogiyara keyida. Baasane kawoy Oogey, ba olanchota ubbaara Edraa7a geetetiya bessan nuura oletanaw keyis.
DEU 3:2 Shin Goday taako, “Iyaw yayyofa; taani iya, iya olanchotanne iya biitta ubbaa ne kushen aathada immas. Haseboonan uttidi kawotida Amooreta kawa Sihoona bolla oothidaysada neeni iya bolla oothana” yaagis.
DEU 3:3 Hessa gisho, Goday nu Xoossay Baasane kawa Oogenne iya asa ubbaa nu kushen aathidi immis; nuuni entafe issuwaka ashshona wursidi wodhida.
DEU 3:4 He wode nuuni iya katamata ubbaa oykida; nuuni oykiboonna issi katamika deenna; hessika, Baasane kawa Oogey Argoba biittan aysiya usupun tammu katamata ubbaa oykida.
DEU 3:5 Ha katamati ubbay adussa gimben diretidaysatanne pengeti kobetidaysata. Gimbe dirsi bayna daro gutatika de7oosona.
DEU 3:6 Haseboona kawa Sihoona bolla oothidaysada nuuni enta kumethi dhaysida. Enta katamatan de7iya adde, maccanne na7a ashshona dhaysida.
DEU 3:7 Shin mehe ubbaanne katamatape di77idabaa nuus ekida.
DEU 3:8 He wode nuuni Arnoona zangaarape bidi Armoona zumaa gakanaw de7iya biitta, Yordaanose Shaafape doloha baggara de7iya nam7u Amoore biittata kawotape ekida.
DEU 3:9 (Sidoona biitta asay Armoona zumaa, Siriyoona gidi xeegiya wode, Amoore biitta asay Sanira gidi xeegosona.)
DEU 3:10 Nuuni demba biittan de7iya katamata ubbaa, Galada biitta ubbaa, Baasane biitta ubbaanne Baasane biittan Oogey haariya Salakanne Edraa7a katamata gakanaw de7iya bessaa oykida.
DEU 3:11 (Raafaymetape attiday Baasane kawa Ooge xalaala. Iya arsay birata arsi; he arsay hachi gakanaw Raaba geetetiya Amooneta kataman de7ees; iya adussatethay hospun wadha; gompay oyddu wadha.)
DEU 3:12 He biitta nuuni laatidaape guye, Arnoona shaafa doonan de7iya Aro7eera katamaape doomidi de7iya bessaanne derey dariya Galada biittafe baggaa gujada iya katamatara Robeelasinne Gaade kochaas taani immas.
DEU 3:13 Galadape attidaysanne Oogey haariya Baasane biitta ubbaa Minaase kochaa baggaas immas; hessika, Argoba kawotethaa. (He Baasane biittay ubbay Raafaymeta biitta geetetidi xeegetees.
DEU 3:14 Minaase kochaafe Ya7iri kumetha Argoba biitta laattis; hessika Geeshuretanne Ma7ikata biitta gaxaa gakanaw de7iya Baasane biitta. I he katamata ba sunthan xeegetana mela oothis; hessa gisho, enti hachi gakanaw, Ya7ira katamata geetetidi xeegetoosona.)
DEU 3:15 Galada biitta Minaase koche gidida Makiras immas.
DEU 3:16 Robeelanne Gaade kochaas Galadape bidi Arnoona shaafa mata gakanaw de7iya biitta immas. Dugeha baggara Arnoona Shaafape baggay enta zawa; qassi pudeha baggara Amooneta biittas gaxa gidida Yaaboqa shaafay zawa.
DEU 3:17 Wuloha baggara, enta zaway Araban de7iya Yordaanose shaafa gakees; hessika Galila Abbaafe doomidi Pisga zuma xaphon de7iya Maxine Abbaa (Hayqo Abbaa) gakanaasa.
DEU 3:18 He wode taani hintena haysada yaagada kiittas. “Goday hinte Xoossay he biitta hinte laattana mela hintew immis. Hiza hintew de7iya tooranchota ubbaa ola miishe dancisidi, hinte ishata gidida Isra7eele asaape sinthe aathite.
DEU 3:19 Hintew daro mehey de7eysa taani erayis; hessa gisho, hinte macheti, hinte naytinne hinte mehey taani hintew immida katamatan de7ishshona.
DEU 3:20 Goday hintena shempisidaysada hinte ishata shempisana gakanawunne Yordaanose shaafape hefinthan Goday, hinte Xoossay entaw immiya biitta enti ekana gakanaw entaw oletite. Hessafe guye, taani hintew immida biitta simmeta” yaagis.
DEU 3:21 Taani he wode Iyyasu haysada yaagada kiittas. “Goday, hinte Xoossay ha nam7u kawota bolla oothidaba ubbaa neeni ne ayfen be7adasa; hinte oykanaw biya kawotethata ubbaa bolla Goday hessada oothana.
DEU 3:22 Hintew oletey Godaa hinte Xoossaa gidiya gisho, entaw yayyofite” yaagis.
DEU 3:23 He wode taani haysada yaagada Godaa minthada woossas.
DEU 3:24 “Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, ne gitatethaanne ne mino kushiya tana, ne aylliya bessanaw doomadasa. Ne oothiya wolqaama oosota oothanaw danda7ey salon gidin sa7an hara xoossi de7ii?
DEU 3:25 Godaw, taani bada Yordaanose shaafape hefinthan de7iya derey dariya lo77o biittanne Libaanose deriya be7ana mela tana yeddarki” yaagas.
DEU 3:26 Shin Goday hinte gaason tana hanqetidi si7onnan ixis. Goday taako, “Hiza new gidana; ha odaa nam7antho denthada haasayopa.
DEU 3:27 Hessa aggada denda; Pisga zuma bolla keya; yan eqada he biitta wuloha bagga, pudeha bagga, dugeha bagganne doloha bagga ne ayfiya dhoqu oothada xeella. Neeni ha Yordaanose shaafa polo pinnaka.
DEU 3:28 Shin neeni Iyyasu kiitta; iya zoranne minthetha. I ha asaa kaalethidi pinthananne ha neeni be7iya biitta enta laatisana” yaagis.
DEU 3:29 Hessa gisho, nuuni Beet-Pa7oora sinthan de7iya zangaaran gam7ida.
DEU 4:1 Ha77ika Isra7eele asaw, hinte de7on daana melanne Goday, hinte mayzata Xoossay, hintew immiya biitta hinte laattana mela ta hintena tamaarsiya wogaanne higgiya si7itenne oothite.
DEU 4:2 Ta hintena kiittiya, Godaa hinte Xoossaa kiitta naagitepe attishin, iya bolla aykoka gujofite; iyape aykoka pacisopite.
DEU 4:3 Bi7eel-Fagoora zuma bolla Goday oothidaba hinte, hinte ayfen be7ideta. Goday, hinte Xoossay Bi7eel-Fagoora eeqa goyinnidaysata ubbaa hinte giddofe dhaysis.
DEU 4:4 Shin hinte Godaas, hinte Xoossaas ammanetida gisho, hachi gakanaw ubbayka de7on de7eeta.
DEU 4:5 Heko, hinte laattanaw geliya biittan oothana mela Goday, ta Xoossay tana kiitida wogaanne higgiya ta hintena tamaarsas.
DEU 4:6 Hinte enta naagitenne oothite. Hinte hessa oothiko, hinte ay mela cinceko hara asay hintena be7ana. Enti ha wogabaa si7iya wode, “Tumaka ha gita kawotethay cincanne akeekancho kawotethi” yaagana.
DEU 4:7 Nuuni iya xeegiya wode ubban Goday, nu Xoossay nuus mata gideysada xoossi mata gidida hara ay wolqaama kawotethi de7ii?
DEU 4:8 Taani hachi hinte sinthan wothiya ha higge ubbaa mela xillo gidida woginne higgey de7iya hara ay gita kawotethi de7ii?
DEU 4:9 Hiza ne de7o laytha ubban ha ne be7idaba ubbaa dogonna melanne ne wozanan wothana mela naageta. Ne naytanne ne nayta nayta tamaarsa.
DEU 4:10 Koreeba zumaa bolla Godaa, hinte Xoossaa sinthan hinte eqida wode Goday taako, “Ta qaala enti si7idi, banta laytha ubban taw yayyana melanne banta nayta hessa tamaarsana mela asaa taako shiisha” gidaysa akeekite.
DEU 4:11 He wode hinte shiiqidi zumaa xaphon eqideta; salo gakanaw tami eexis. He zumaa xaphoy sakana dhumaninne shaaran goozetis.
DEU 4:12 Goday tama giddon gididi hintew odis. Hinte iya girsa si7idetape attishin, iya malaa be7ibeeketa.
DEU 4:13 Hinte oothana mela I hintena kiitida ba caaquwa hintew odis; hessika Tammu Kiitata. I enta nam7u loche shuchata bolla xaafis.
DEU 4:14 Hinte laattanaw biya biittan oothana mela wogaanne higgiya hintena tamaarsana mela Goday tana he wode kiittis.
DEU 4:15 Goday Koreeba zumaa bolla tama giddon gididi hintew odida gallas hinte iya malaa be7iboona gisho loythi naagetite.
DEU 4:16 Adde woyko macca medhon oosetidaba gidin,
DEU 4:17 sa7an de7iya do7a ubbaa leemison gidin, salora paalliya kafo ubbaa leemison gidin,
DEU 4:18 sa7a bolla ulora gooshetiya medhetetha leemison gidin, haatha giddon de7iya molo leemison gidin, hinte tunonna mela hintew xoosse oothidi medhofite.
DEU 4:19 Salo pude xeellida, Goday ne Xoossay salope garsan de7iya kawotethatas imida awa, ageena, xoolintotanne salo medhetethata ubbaa be7ida, ne entaw goyinnada balonna mela naageta.
DEU 4:20 Shin Goday hintena hachi hinte hanidaysada baw dummatida ase oothanaw birata seerisiya cooce mela gidida Gibxefe kessidi ehis.
DEU 4:21 Hinte gaason Goday tana hanqetidi, Yordaanose pinnonna melanne Goday hinte Xoossay, laata oothidi hintew immiya lo77o biitta taani gelonna mela caaqis.
DEU 4:22 Hessa gisho, taani Yordaanose shaafa pinnonna ha biittan hayqana, shin hinte pinnidi he lo77o biitta laatteeta.
DEU 4:23 Hiza Goday, hinte Xoossay hintera caaqida caaquwa dogopite. Goday, ne Xoossay nena oothofa gida ay medhon oosetida misile new eeqa oothonna mela naageta.
DEU 4:24 Goday, ne Xoossay miya tamanne qanaatiya Xoossi.
DEU 4:25 Ne naytanne, nayta nayta yelada he biittan adussa wode de7iya wode ay medhon oosetida misile goyinnada tuniko, qassi Godaa, ne Xoossa hanqethanaw iya sinthan iitaba oothiko,
DEU 4:26 hinte Yordaanose shaafa pinnidi laattanaw biya biittafe issoyka attonna elle dhayanaw de7eysas, ta hachi hinte bolla salonne sa7a markayayis. Hinte polo dhayanape attishin, he biittan adussa wode de7eketa.
DEU 4:27 Goday hintena hara asaa giddon laallana; hintena I laaliya kawotethata giddon hinte tayboy guutha gidana.
DEU 4:28 Yan hinte mithafenne shuchafe asa kushen giigida be7onna, si7onna, moonnanne singonna xoossata goyinnana.
DEU 4:29 Shin yan de7ashe ne Godaa, ne Xoossaa koyana; ne iya kumetha wozanapenne kumetha shempofe koyko demmana.
DEU 4:30 He meto ubbaa giddon ne un7etada de7iya wode wursethan Godaako, ne Xoossaako simmananne iya qaalas kiitetana.
DEU 4:31 Goday, ne Xoossay maarotethan kumida Xoosse gidiya gisho, I nena aggenna woyko dhaysena; ne mayzatas caaqida caaquwa dogenna.
DEU 4:32 Goday biittan ase medhida gallasape doomidi, hintefe kase aadhida wodiya ane pilgite; hessa mela gitabay polo hani eriyako woyko si7etidi eriyako saluwas ha gaxape ya gaxaa gakanaw ane oychite.
DEU 4:33 Tama laco giddon Goday haasayin si7idi, hinte dhayona de7on de7eysada Goday odishin si7idi, de7on de7ida hara asi de7ii?
DEU 4:34 Woyko Goday, hinte Xoossay hinte xeellishin, Gibxe biittan hintew oothidaysada paacen, malaatan, malaalsiyaban, olan, wolqaama kusheninne micetida qesen, gita yashshan hara kawotetha giddo gelidi, issi kawotethaa baw ekanaw butetida hara xoossi de7ii?
DEU 4:35 Goday, Xoosse gideysa hinte erana mela hessa I hintena bessis; iyape attishin, hara xoossi baawa.
DEU 4:36 I hintena tamaarsanaw koyida gisho, ba girsaa salope sissis. Qassi ha sa7an ba gita tama hintena bessis; he tama giddofe hinte iya qaala si7ideta.
DEU 4:37 I hessa oothiday hinte aawata siiqidi, entafe guye yeletiya enta sheeshata doorida gisho, hintena Gibxefe ba gita wolqan kessis.
DEU 4:38 Hachi hinte be7eysada, hintena gelsanawunne enta biitta hintew laata oothidi immanaw, hintefe dariyanne wolqaamiya kawotethata hinte sinthafe yedethidi kessis.
DEU 4:39 Hiza, bolla salon gidin, garsa sa7an gidin, Goday Xoosse gideysa erite; hinte wozanan wothite; hara xoossi baawa.
DEU 4:40 Hessa gisho, hintewunne hintefe guye hinte naytas ubbabay lo77o gidana mela, qassi Goday hinte Xoossay hintew merinaw immiya biittan hinte laythay aduqana mela, taani hachi hintena kiittiya wogaanne higgiya naagite.
DEU 4:41 Hessafe guye, Musey Yordaanose hefinthan doloha baggara heedzu katamata dummayis.
DEU 4:42 Hessa I dummayiday kase morketethi bayna de7ishin, eronna de7ishe ase wodhida asi yaa baqatana melasa. He uray he katamatape issuwau baqatidi ba shempuwa ashshanaw danda7ees.
DEU 4:43 Hessa gisho, Robeela kochaas gadhan dere bolla de7iya Boosora katamaa, Gaade kochaas Galadan de7iya Ramootanne Minaase kochaas Baasanen de7iya Goolana katamata dummayis.
DEU 4:44 Musey Isra7eele asaas immida Godaa higgey haysa;
DEU 4:45 Musey ha wogaa, awaajuwanne higgiya enti Gibxefe keyida wode immis.
DEU 4:46 Hessi entaw imetiday enti Beet-Pa7oora katamaa sinthan de7iya Yordaanosepe doloha baggara de7iya zangaaran de7ishina. He bessay Museynne Isra7eele asay Gibxefe keyida wode olidi xoonida, Haseboonan uttidi Amoore haariya kawa Sihoona biitta.
DEU 4:47 He wode enti iya biittanne Baasane kawa Ooge biitta, hessika Yordaanosepe doloha baggan de7iya nam7u Amoore kawota laattidosona.
DEU 4:48 He biittay Arnoona zangaaran Aro7eera katamaape bidi, Siriyoona deriya gakees; Siriyoona geetetidi xeegetiya derey Armoona zuma.
DEU 4:49 He biittay Yordaanosepe doloha baggara de7iya Araba biitta ubbaa ekidi bidi, Pisga deriya xaphon de7iya Maxine Abbaa gakees.
DEU 5:1 Musey Isra7eele asaa ubbaa issife xeegidi, haysada yaagis; “Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw taani hachi hintew odiya wogaanne higgiya si7ite; enta tamaarite; minthidi naagite.
DEU 5:2 Goday, nu Xoossay Koreeba zumaa bolla nuura caaqis.
DEU 5:3 Goday he caaquwa caaqiday nu aawata xalaalara gidonashin, hachi de7on de7iya nu ubbaara caaqis.
DEU 5:4 He zumaa bolla eexiya tama giddon gididi, Goday som7on hintera haasayis.
DEU 5:5 Taani he wode Goday giyaba hintew odanaw, Godaapenne hintefe giddon eqas. Hinte tamas yayyidi zumaa bolla keyibeketa. Goday haysada yaagis.
DEU 5:6 “Gibxe biittafe, aylletetha keethaafe nena woziday taani Godaa, ne Xoossaa.
DEU 5:7 “Taape attishin, hara xoossati new de7opo.
DEU 5:8 “Bolla salon de7iyaba gidin, garsa sa7an de7iyaba gidin, woyko haatha giddon de7iyaba gidin, ay misile new eeqa oothofa.
DEU 5:9 Ne iyaw hokofa woyko iyaw goyinnofa. Taani tana ixeyisata aawata nagaraa gisho, nayta heedzanthonne oyddantho yeletaa gakanaw seerayis. Taani, Goday, ne Xoossay qanaatiya Xoossaa.
DEU 5:10 Shin taani tana siiqeysatanne ta kiita naageysata mukulu yeletaa gakanaw ta merinaa siiquwa bessayis.
DEU 5:11 “Godaa, ne Xoossaa sunthaa coo xeegopa. Goday ba sunthaa coo xeegiya uraa seeronna aggenna.
DEU 5:12 “Goday, ne Xoossay nena kiittidaysada Sambaata gallasaa geeshshi oothada naaga.
DEU 5:13 Neeni ne ooso ubbaa usupun gallasan ootha.
DEU 5:14 Shin laapuntha gallasay Godaas, ne Xoossaas Sambaata. He gallas ay oosoka oothofa. Neeni woyko ne adde na7ay woyko ne macca na7iya woyko ne oosanchoy woyko ne oosanchiya woyko ne booray woyko ne harey woyko ne hara meheti woyko ne kataman de7iya bete asi he gallas ay oosoka oothopite. Neeni shempeysada ne adde aylleytinne macca aylleti shempo.
DEU 5:15 Neeni Gibxe biittan aylle gidada de7idaysa dogopa. Goday, ne Xoossay ba wolqaama kushiyaninne ba micetida qesiyan yaape nena kessidaysa dogopa. Goday, ne Xoossay Sambaata gallas neeni naagana mela kiitiday hessa gishosa.
DEU 5:16 “Goday, ne Xoossay new immiya biittan ne laythay aduqana malanne new lo77ana mela Goday, ne Xoossay nena kiittidaysada ne aawanne ne aayiw boncha.
DEU 5:17 “Wodhopa.
DEU 5:18 “Laammofa.
DEU 5:19 “Kaysotopa.
DEU 5:20 “Wordo markatofa.
DEU 5:21 “Hara asa macho amottofa; iya keethaa, iya shooqa, iya adde aylliya woyko iya macca aylliw woyko iya boora woyko iya hariya woyko iyaw de7iyaba aybaka amottofa” yaagis.
DEU 5:22 Zumaa bolla tama, shaaranne dhumaa giddofe Goday dhoqu gida girsan duulata ubbaas odida qaalati haysata. I enta bolla aybaka gujibeenna; enta nam7u loche shuchata bolla xaafidi taw immis.
DEU 5:23 Zumay taman xuugetishin, dhumaa giddofe girsaa hinte si7ida wode hinte kochaa halaqatinne cimati taako yidi,
DEU 5:24 haysada yaagidosona; “Nuuni Godaa, nu Xoossaa girsaa tamaa giddofe si7ida wode Goday, nu Xoossay ba bonchuwanne ba gitatetha nuna bessis. Xoossi asara haasayin si7idi asi de7on daanaw danda7eysa hachi nuuni be7ida.
DEU 5:25 Shin ha wolqaama tamay nuna dhaysanaw danda7ees; yaatin, nuuni ayis hayqanee? Godaa, nu Xoossaa qaala nuuni nam7antho si7iko hayqana.
DEU 5:26 Asho ma7ida asan nuuni si7idaysada tama giddon gididi odishin, de7o Xoossaa qaala si7idi de7on de7ida asi oonee?
DEU 5:27 Hessa gisho, neeni shiiqada Goday, nu Xoossay giyaba ubbaa si7a; Goday, nu Xoossay new odiyaba nuus oda; nuka si7idi kiitetana” yaagideta.
DEU 5:28 Hinte taw odishin Goday, hinte giyaba si7idi, taako haysada yaagis; “Ha asay new odiyaba ubbaa si7as; enti gidaba ubbay like.
DEU 5:29 Entawunne enta naytas merinaw ubbabay injetana mela taw yayyanawunne ta kiita naaganaw entaw ubba wode hessa mela wozani de7eerenne.
DEU 5:30 Ha77i neeni bada enti banta dunkaaniya simmana mela oda.
DEU 5:31 Shin neeni haysan ta matan gam7a. Enti laattana mela taani entaw immiya biittan enti oothanaba neeni enta tamaarsana ta kiita, ta awaajuwanne ta higgiya ubbaa ta new odana” yaagis.
DEU 5:32 Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, Goday, hinte Xoossay hintena kiittidaba ubbaa oothanaw naagetite; iyape ushachi woyko haddirsi goopite.
DEU 5:33 Hinte de7on daana mela, ubbay hintew injetana melanne hinte laattiya biittan hinte laythay aduqana mela, Goday hinte Xoossay hintena kiitida kiita naagite.
DEU 6:1 Hinte laattanaw biya biittan hinte oothana mela ta hintena tamaarsana mela Goday, hinte Xoossay tana kiitida kiitay, awaajoynne higgey haysa.
DEU 6:2 Ne laythay aduqana mela ne, ne naytinne ne nayta nayite Godaa ne Xoossaa yayya; ta hachi new immiya Godaa awaajiyanne higgiya ne laytha ubban naaga.
DEU 6:3 Neno, Isra7eele si7a; ubbabay new injetana melanne Goday ne aawata Xoossay, new gidaysada maathinne eessi goggiya biittan ne darana mela ha higgeta si7a; minthada naaga.
DEU 6:4 Neno, Isra7eele si7a; Goday nu Xoossay issi Xoossi.
DEU 6:5 Ne Godaa, ne Xoossaa ne kumetha wozanaape, ne kumetha shempuwafenne ne kumetha wolqaafe dosa.
DEU 6:6 Hachi ta nena kiittiya ha kiitaa ne wozanan wotha.
DEU 6:7 Enta neeni ne nayta tamaarsa; neeni ne son uttiya wode, oge hemetiya wode, zin7iya wodenne dendiya wode entaba haasaya.
DEU 6:8 Malla oothada ne kushen enta qacha; qassi ne som7on mallada wotha.
DEU 6:9 Ne penge zizgeta bollanne ne dirsa pengiya bolla enta xaafa.
DEU 6:10 Goday, ne Xoossay new immana gidi ne aawatas Abrahaames, Yisaaqasinne Yayqoobas caaqida, ne keexaboonna gitanne lo77o katamati kumida biitta new immana.
DEU 6:11 Neeni shiishaboona duretethan kumida keethata, ne bookaboona haatha ollata, ne tokaboonna woynenne shamaho new immiya wode, neeni mada kallida wode,
DEU 6:12 nena Gibxe aylletetha biittafe kessida, Godaa dogonna mela naageta.
DEU 6:13 Godaa, ne Xoossaa yayya; iya xalaala goyinna; iya sunthan caaqa.
DEU 6:14 Ne yuushon de7iya asay goyinniya hara xoossata goyinnofa.
DEU 6:15 Ne giddon de7iya Goday, ne Xoossay qanaatiya Xoossu. Iya hanqoy ne bolla eexana; I nena biitta bollafe pitidi dhaysana.
DEU 6:16 Masahan hinte iya paacidaysada Godaa hinte Xoossaa paacopite.
DEU 6:17 Goday, hinte Xoossay hintena kiitida iya kiita, iya wogaanne iya awaajuwa minthidi naagite.
DEU 6:18 New ubbabay injetana mela Godaa sinthan ne surebaanne lo77oba ootha. Hessa oothiko, new immanaw Goday ne aawatas caaqida, he lo77o biitta ne laattana.
DEU 6:19 Goday gidaysada neeni, ne morketa ubbaa ne sinthafe gooddana.
DEU 6:20 Wodepe ne nayti, “Goday, nu Xoossay hintena kiitida ha wogaa, awaajiyanne higgiya birshethay aybee?” yaagidi hintena oychiya wode,
DEU 6:21 ne entaw haysada yaagada zaarana; “Nuuni Gibxe biittan Gibxe kawa aylleta, shin Goday ba mino kushiyan nuna Gibxefe kessis.
DEU 6:22 Goday nu xeellishin, Gibxe biitta bolla, Gibxe kawa bollanne iya shuumata ubbaa bolla gitanne yashshiya malaatatanne malaalsiyabata oothis.
DEU 6:23 Shin I nu mayzas immana gidi caaqida biitta nuus immanaw nuna Gibxefe kessis.
DEU 6:24 Yaatidi hachi hinte be7eysada nuus ubba wode lo77o gidana melanne nuuni de7on daana mela, Goday, ha awaajota ubbaa nuni naagana melanne Godaas nu Xoossaas yayyana mela kiittis.
DEU 6:25 I nuna kiittidaysada, Godaa, nu Xoossaa sinthan ha kiita ubbaa minthidi naagiko, hessi nuus xillotethi gidana” yaagite.
DEU 7:1 Goday, ne Xoossay ne laattanaw biya biitta nena gelsiya wodenne neepe wolqaamanne minniya laapun kawotethata, hessatika Hiteta, Gergeseta, Amooreta, Kanaaneta, Parzeta, Hiwetanne Yaabuseta ne sinthafe gooddiya wode,
DEU 7:2 Goday ne Xoossay ne kushen aathidi immin, ne enta xooniya wode, enta kumethi dhaysa. Entara aybibaaka caaqofa; entaw qadhetofa.
DEU 7:3 Entara eketofa; geletofa. Ne macca nayta enta adde naytas immofa woyko enta macca nayta ne adde naytas ekofa.
DEU 7:4 Enti ne nayta tana kaalleysa aggidi hara eeqata goyinnana mela oothana. He wode Godaa hanqoy ne bolla eexana; nena ellesidi dhaysana.
DEU 7:5 Hessa gisho, enta yarsho bessa laallite; goyinno shucha eeqata mentherethite. Asheera geetetiya eeqa misiliya tincherethite; kushen oosetida misileta taman xuuggite.
DEU 7:6 Neeni, ne Godaa Xoossaas geeshsha dere. Goday, ne Xoossay nena baw dumma asi oothidi biitta bolla de7iya asa ubbaafe nena dooris.
DEU 7:7 Goday hintena dosidaynne dooriday hinte hara asaape taybon darida gisho gidenna. Hinte hara asa ubbaafe taybon guutha.
DEU 7:8 Shin Goday hintena dosida gishonne hinte mayzatas caaqida caaquwa naagida gisho, I hintena aylletetha biittafe, Gibxe kawa kushepe, ba wolqaama kushiyan kessisinne wozis.
DEU 7:9 Hessa gisho, Goday, hinte Xoossay Xoosse gideysa erite. I bana doseysatasinne ba kiita naageysatas mukulu yeletethi gakanaw, ba siiquwa naagiya ammanetiya Xoossi.
DEU 7:10 Shin I bana ixeyisata seeranawunne dhaysanaw guye geenna.
DEU 7:11 Hessa gisho, taani hachi new immiya kiita, awaajuwanne higgiya naaga.
DEU 7:12 Ne ha kiita sa7ada mintha naagiko, Goday, ne Xoossay hinte mayzatas caaqidaysada ba siiqo caaquwa new naagana.
DEU 7:13 I nena dosana; nena anjana; ne taybuwa darsana. Qassi I new immanaw ne mayzatas caaqida biittan ne ulo ayfiya, biitta ayfiya; kathaa, woyniya, zaytiya, mehe maratanne dorsa marata darsidi nena anjana.
DEU 7:14 Ne hara asaape aadhada anjetidaysa gidana. Addey woyko macci woyko ne mehey maynnena.
DEU 7:15 Goday harge ubbaafe nena naagana. Neeni Gibxe biittan eriya iita hargiya ne bolla ehenna, shin I nena ixiya ubbaa bolla he hargiya ehana.
DEU 7:16 Goday, ne Xoossay new aathidi immiya asa ubbaa qadhetonna dhaysa. Hessi new xihe gidana gisho, enta xoossata goyinnofa.
DEU 7:17 Neeni, ne wozanan, “Ha kawotethati taape minnoosona; yaatin, ta enta waatada gooddada kessanee?” gaanaw danda7aasa.
DEU 7:18 Shin entaw yayyofa. Goday, ne Xoossay, Gibxe kawa bollanne Gibxe biitta ubbaa bolla oothidaysa akeeka.
DEU 7:19 Goday, ne Xoossay nena Gibxefe kessiya wode oothida gita gadota, malaatata, malaalsiyabata, iya wolqaama kushiyanne iya micetida qesiya ne, ne ayfen be7adasa. Hachi ne yayiya asa ubbaa bolla Goday, ne Xoossay hessada oothana.
DEU 7:20 Qassi neepe baqatidi qosetidaysati dhayana gakanaw Goday, ne Xoossay enta giddon kazhe yeddana.
DEU 7:21 Hessa gisho, ne entaw yayyofa; neera de7iya Goday, ne Xoossay, gitanne yashshiya Xoossi.
DEU 7:22 Goday, ne Xoossay he kawotethata guuthara guuthara gooddidi, ne sinthafe dhaysana. Ne enta ubbaa issi toho dhaysaka; hessa ne oothiko, biittan de7iya do7ati daridi nena waaysana.
DEU 7:23 Shin Goday, ne Xoossay enta ne kushen aathidi immana; enti dhayana gakanaw I enta daganthana.
DEU 7:24 Enta kawota ne kushen aathidi immana. Ne enta suntha salope garsan quchada dhaysana. Oonika neera eqetidi danda7enna; ne enta dhaysana.
DEU 7:25 Kushen oosetida enta eeqa misileta taman xuugga. He misileta bolla de7iya bira woyko worqaa amottofite; nebaa oothada ekofa. Hessi Godaas, ne Xoossaas tuna gidiya gisho, iyape ne ekiko new xihe gidana.
DEU 7:26 Enti banta huuphen baadetidaysata gidiya gisho, ne he tuna eeqata ne soo gelsada, enta mela baadetidaysata gidopa. Enta kumethi ixa; shaateta.
DEU 8:1 Hinte de7on daana mela, hinte tayboy darana melanne Goday kase hinte mayzatas immana gidi caaqida biitta gelidi, hinte laattana mela hachi ta hintena kiittiya kiita ubbaa minthidi naagite.
DEU 8:2 Goday, ne Xoossay new immida kiita ne naagiyakonne naagonnaako, ne wozanaa qofaa eranaw nena paacanawunne nena aada oothanaw oytamu laythi kumethi nena mela biittan waati kaalethidaako akeeka.
DEU 8:3 Aadatethi erisanaw nena koshaysis; yaatidi ne woyko ne mayzati eronna Manna nena muzis. Hessa I oothiday asi Godaa doonape keyiya qaala ubbaanape attishin, katha xalaalan de7onnaysa nena tamaarsanaasa.
DEU 8:4 Ha oytamu laythata giddon ne ma7ida ma7oy wuribeenna; ne tohoy kixibeenna.
DEU 8:5 Asi ba na7a seereysada Goday, ne Xoossay nena seeroysa akeeka.
DEU 8:6 Iyaw yayyashenne iya bonchashe Godaa ne Xoossaa kiitaa naaga.
DEU 8:7 Goday ne Xoossay nena zangaarapenne deriyape goggiya shaafatinne pultoti de7iya lo77o biitta gelsanaw ehis.
DEU 8:8 He biittay gisteynne bangi, woyneynne balasey, oromaaney, shamaho zayteynne eessi kumida biitta.
DEU 8:9 He biittay aykoyka paconna hinte kallidi miya biitta. He biittay birati shuchada gela gidida biitta. Zumaape madabe birata bookidi ekiya biitta.
DEU 8:10 Ne mada kallida wode new I immida lo77o biitta gisho, Godaa ne Xoossaa galata.
DEU 8:11 Ta hachi nena kiittiya iya kiita, iya higgiyanne iya awaajuwa naagonna ixada, Godaa ne Xoossaa dogonna mela naageta.
DEU 8:12 Ne mada kalliya wode, lo77o keethi keexada iyan de7iya wode,
DEU 8:13 ne meheynne dorsay dariya wode, new birinne worqi dagaayetiya wode, new de7idabay ubbay dariya wode,
DEU 8:14 he wode, ne wozanay otortonna mela, Gibxe aylletetha keethaafe nena wozida Godaa, ne Xoossaa dogonna mela naageta.
DEU 8:15 I nena iita shooshaynne korney kumida, haathi bayna, gitanne yashshiya mela biittara nena kaalethidaysa dogopa. I new mela biittan zaallafe haathe dhuusis.
DEU 8:16 Ne mayzati eronna mannaa I nena mela biittan muzis. Wursethan new ubbabay injetana mela nena aada oothanawunne paacanaw hessa oothis.
DEU 8:17 Neeni, “Ta wolqaynne ta kushe minotethay ha duretetha taw ehis” goonna mela naageta.
DEU 8:18 Shin ne duretana mela new wolqa immiday Godaa, ne Xoossaa gideysa akeeka. I hessa oothiday, hachi ne be7eysada, ne mayzatara caaqida caaquwa minthanaasa.
DEU 8:19 Shin hinte Godaa hinte Xoossaa aggidi, hara xoossata kaalliko, entaw hokikonne goyinniko, hinte tuma dhayanaysa ta hachi markatayis.
DEU 8:20 Goday, hinte Xoossay hara kawotethata hinte sinthafe dhaysidaysada hinte iyaw kiitetonna ixiko hintenaka dhaysana.
DEU 9:1 Neno, Isra7eele si7a; neepe gitatiyanne wolqaamiya kawotethata, gimbey salo gakida gita katamata laattanaw hachi Yordaanose pinnaasa.
DEU 9:2 He biittan de7iya asay minonne adusse. Neeni, “Oonika entara eqetanaw danda7onna Anaaqe kochata” gishin si7adasa.
DEU 9:3 Shin miya tamada neepe sinthara bey Godaa, ne Xoossaa gideysa hachi era. I enta dhaysananne ne sinthan enta kawushana. Goday new gidaysada ne enta gooddada kessananne ellesada dhaysana.
DEU 9:4 Goday, ne Xoossay enta ne sinthafe gooddidaape guye, ne wozanan, “Taani xillo gidiya gisho, ha biitta ta laattana mela Goday tana ehis” goopa. Goday enta ne sinthafe yedethidi kessiday enti iita gidiya gishosa.
DEU 9:5 Ne enta biitta laattanaw yiday ne xillonne suure gidiya gisho gidenna. Shin Goday, ne Xoossay enta ne sinthafe gooddiday ha kawotethati iita gidiya gishonne beni ne mayzatas Abrahaames, Yisaaqasinne Yayqoobas caaqida caaquwa naaganaassa.
DEU 9:6 Hiza ne hessa akeeka. Goday, ne Xoossay ha lo77o biitta nena laatisey ne xillotethaa gishosa gidenna; neeni wozani muumida asi.
DEU 9:7 Godaa, hinte Xoossaa mela biittan waatidi yiloyidaako dogopite. Hinte Gibxe biittafe keyida gallasape doomidi, hachi ha bessaa gakanaw Godaa bolla makallideta.
DEU 9:8 Koreeba zumaa bolla Goday hintena dhaysanaw dendana gakanaw hinte Godaa yiloyideta.
DEU 9:9 Goday hintera caaqida caaqoy xaafetida loche shuchata ekanaw taani zumaa bolla keyida wode, yan kathi moonnanne haathe uyonna oytamu gallasinne oytamu qamma gam7as.
DEU 9:10 Hessafe guye, Xoossa biradhen xaafetida nam7u loche shuchata Goday taw immis. Hinte zumaa xaphon shiiqida wode tama giddon Goday hintew immida kiitati he loche shucha bolla xaafetidi uttidosona.
DEU 9:11 Oytamu gallasapenne qammafe guye, Goday ba caaqo qaalay xaafetida nam7u loche shuchata taw immis.
DEU 9:12 Hessafe guye, Goday taako, “Ellesada haysafe duge wodha; neeni Gibxefe kessida ne asay tunis; enti ta kiitaa eeson aggidi, kushen oosetida eeqa goyinnanaw simmidosona” yaagis.
DEU 9:13 Qassika Goday taako, “Taani ha asaa be7as; enti tuma wozana muume asi.
DEU 9:14 Hiza ta enta dhaysona melanne enta sunthaa biitta bollafe quchonna mela tana diggofa. Ta nena entafe minonne dariya kawotethi kessana” yaagis.
DEU 9:15 Taani caaqo qaalay xaafetida nam7u loche shuchata ta kushen oykada zumaa bollafe wodhas; he wode tama lacoy zumaa bolla bentees.
DEU 9:16 He wode Godaa, hinte Xoossaa bolla hinte nagara oothidaysa be7as. Hinte mara misilen oosetida worqa eeqa giigisideta. Goday, hintena kiitida ogiyape eeson hara soo simmideta.
DEU 9:17 Taani ta kushen oykida nam7u loche shuchata holada hinte be7ishin menthas.
DEU 9:18 Hessafe guye, Godaa yiloyanaw hinte iya sinthan iita ooso oothidi, nagara oothida gisho, kaseysada oytamu gallasinne oytamu qamma Godaa sinthan gufannada gam7as; he wode ta kathi mabike; haathe uyabike.
DEU 9:19 Goday hinte bolla yilotidi dhaysanaw dendida gisho taani yayyas. Shin Goday zaaridi tana si7is.
DEU 9:20 Qassi Goday yilotidi Aaronaka dhaysanaw koyis; shin taani he wode Aaronas woossas.
DEU 9:21 Taani hinte nagaran kumida he mara misiliya ekada, taman xuuggas. Iya tincheretha gaaccada dhiille kessas; he dhiilliya zumaape goggiya haathara yeddas.
DEU 9:22 Qassi hinte Taaberan, Masahaninne Qibiroot-Hatawan Godaa yiloyideta.
DEU 9:23 Goday hinteko, “Bidi, taani hintew immida biitta laattite” yaagidi, Qaades-Barnefe yeddida wodeka hinte Godaa, hinte Xoossaa kiita ixidi makallideta. Iyaw ammanetibeketa woyko iya qaalas kiitetibeketa.
DEU 9:24 Taani hintena erida wodiyape doomidi, hinte Godaas makallideta.
DEU 9:25 Goday hintena dhaysana gida gisho, taani oytamu gallasinne oytamu qamma Godaa sinthan gufannada gam7as.
DEU 9:26 Taani Godaa Xoossaako haysada yaagada woossas; “Abeeti Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, neeni ne gita wolqan wozidanne ne mino kushen Gibxefe kessida, ne laata gidida ne asaa dhaysofa.
DEU 9:27 Ne aylleta, Abrahaame, Yisaaqanne Yayqooba qopa; enta wozanaa minotethaa, enta iitatethaanne enta nagaraa taybopa.
DEU 9:28 Hessi hanonna attiko, neeni nuna yaape kessida Gibxe asay, ‘Goday entaw immana gida biitta gelsanaw danda7iboona gishonne enta ixida gisho, mela biittan wodhanaw enta kessis’ yaagana.
DEU 9:29 Gidoshin, ha asay neeni ne gita wolqaaninne ne micetida qesen Gibxefe kessida ne laata gidida ne asaa” yaagas.
DEU 10:1 He wode Goday taako, “Koyroysa mela nam7u loche shuchata giigisada taako zumaa bolla keya. Qassi iya wothanaw mithafe taabote ootha.
DEU 10:2 Taani kase ne menthida shuchata bolla de7iya qaalata ha shuchata bolla xaafana; ne enta taabotiya giddon wotha” yaagis.
DEU 10:3 Taani soqala mithafe taabote oothas. Kaseysa mela nam7u loche shuchata giigisas; he shuchata ta kushen oykada zumaa bolla keyas.
DEU 10:4 Hinte zumaa xaphon shiiqida gallas, tama giddofe Goday hintew odida qaalata, hessika Tammu Kiitata, kase xaafidaysata he shuchata bolla Goday xaafidi enta taw immis.
DEU 10:5 Hessafe guye, taani zumaa bollafe wodhada, Goday tana kiittidaysada, he shuchata ta oothida Taabotiya giddon wothas; ha77ika enti yan de7oosona.
DEU 10:6 Isra7eele asay Ba7aarota Benyaqanape dendidi, Musera bidosona. Aaroni yan hayqidi moogetis; iya na7ay Alaazari iya laattidi, iya bessan kahine halaqa gidis.
DEU 10:7 Enti yaape Gudgoda geetetiya bessa bidosona; yaape qassi goggiya haathati de7iya Yoxibaata geetetiya bessa bidosona.
DEU 10:8 He wode Godaa caaqo Taabotiya tookana mela, Godaa sinthan eqidi iya haggaazana melanne hachi gakanaw enti ootheysa mela Godaa sunthan anjana mela Leewe kochaa Goday baw dummayis.
DEU 10:9 Hessa gisho, Leewe kochaas enta ishata giddon gishoy woyko laati baawa; Goday, hinte Xoossay entaw gidaysada enta laatay Godaa.
DEU 10:10 Taani kaseysada oytamu gallasinne oytamu qamma zumaa bolla gam7as. Goday zaaridi ta woosa si7idi hintena dhaysanaw koybeenna.
DEU 10:11 Goday taako, “Taani enta aawatas immana gada caaqida biitta enti gelana melanne laattana mela ha asaa kaaletha” yaagis.
DEU 10:12 Neno, Isra7eele, Goday neepe koyey haysa; Godaa, ne Xoossaa yayya; iya ogiya ubban ba; iya dosa; ne kumetha wozanapenne ne kumetha shempuwafe Godaa ne Xoossaas ootha.
DEU 10:13 New injetana mela taani hachi new immiya Godaa kiitatanne awaajota naaga.
DEU 10:14 Saloynne salope bollara de7iya saloti, qassi sa7inne sa7an de7iya ubbay Godaa, ne Xoossaaba gideysi tuma.
DEU 10:15 Gidoshin, Goday hinte mayzatan ufaytidi, enta siiqis; hachi hinte be7eysada entafe guyen enta sheeshi gidida hintena kawotethata ubbaafe aathidi dooris.
DEU 10:16 Hessa gisho, hinte wozanaa qaxarite; hizape hinte wozanaa minthofite.
DEU 10:17 Goday, hinte Xoossay xoossata Xoossinne godata Godaa. I gita Xoossi; I wolqaamanne yashshiya Xoossi. I som7o be7idi pirdenna; wodhaafe ekenna.
DEU 10:18 I yi7otasinne am7etas suure pirdees; betanchuwa siiqidi, iyaw kathinne ma7o immees.
DEU 10:19 Hinteka betanchota siiqite; hinte hinte huuphen bete asi gididi Gibxen de7ideta.
DEU 10:20 Godaa, ne Xoossaa yayya; iyaw ootha; iyara oyketa; iya sunthan caaqa.
DEU 10:21 Neeni ne ayfen be7ida gitanne yashshiya malaalsiyabata new oothiday, I ne galataa; ne Xoossaa.
DEU 10:22 Gibxe biitta wodhida hinte mayzati kumethi laapun tamma; ha77i Goday, hinte Xoossay hintena salo xoolintotada darsis.
DEU 11:1 Hiza Godaa, ne Xoossaa dosa; iya awaajuwa, wogaa, iya higgiyanne iya kiita ubba wode naaga.
DEU 11:2 Hinte nayti be7onnabaanne eronnabaa gidikoka, hinte hachi Godaa seera, iya gitatetha, iya wolqaama kushiyanne micetida qesiya be7idaysa akeekite.
DEU 11:3 Hinte I oothida malaatatanne Gibxe kawa bollanne iya biitta ubbaa bolla oothida malaalsiyabata be7ideta.
DEU 11:4 Enti hintena kaallidi gooddida wode, Goday Gibxe biitta olanchota, enta paratanne para gaareta Zo7o Abban mitisidi, hachi gakanaw enta kumethi dhaysidaysa be7ideta.
DEU 11:5 Hinte ha bessaa gakanaw mela biittan Goday hintew oothidaba hinte ereeta.
DEU 11:6 Robeela kochaafe Eli7aaba nayta gidida Daatane bollanne Abeero bolla Goday oothidaysa akeekite. Isra7eele asa ubbay be7ishin, biittay dooyetidi, enta, enta soo asaa, enta dunkaaniyanne shempora de7iya entaba ubbaa mittis.
DEU 11:7 Goday oothida ha gita oosota ubbaa hinte, hinte ayfen be7ideta.
DEU 11:8 Hiza hinte mino gidana melanne Yordaanose pinnidi hinte ekanaw biya biitta laattana mela taani hachi hintena kiittiya kiita ubbaa naagite.
DEU 11:9 Hinte kiitetiko, Goday hinte mayzatasinne enta kochaas immana gidi caaqida, maathinne eessi goggiya biittan hinte adussa laythi daana.
DEU 11:10 Ne laattanaw biya biittay, ne keyada yida Gibxe biitta mela gidenna. Gibxen ne kathi zerada, goshsha biitta ubbaa atakilte bessada haathe ushshaasa.
DEU 11:11 Shin Yordaanose pinnidi hinte laattanaw biya biittay, dereynne zangaaray de7iya, salo iran aliya biitta.
DEU 11:12 He biittay, Goday ne Xoossay naagiya biitta; laytha doomethaafe bidi laytha wursethaa gakanaw Godaa, ne Xoossaa ayfey iya bolla de7iya biitta.
DEU 11:13 Hessa gisho, Godaa, hinte Xoossaa siiqiko, hinte kumetha wozanapenne hinte kumetha shempuwafe iya goyinniko, taani hachi hintew immiya kiita hinte naagiko,
DEU 11:14 ne kathi, woyney zaytey paconna shiishana mela torchenne sila ira woden woden bukisana.
DEU 11:15 Goday ne mehiyas maata darsana; ne maana; kallana.
DEU 11:16 Hinte wozanaa hara soo zaaridi, hara xoossata goyinnona melanne hokonna mela naagetite.
DEU 11:17 Hessa hinte oothiko, Godaa hanqoy hinte bolla eexana; iray bukonna melanne kathi dolonna mela I saluwa gordana. Hinte Goday hintew immiya lo77o biittafe eeson dhayana.
DEU 11:18 Hiza, ha kiitata hinte wozanaaninne hinte qofan wothite. Mallada enta hinte kushen qachite; qassi hinte som7on qachite.
DEU 11:19 Hinte nayta tamaarsite. Hinte son de7iya wode, ogen hemetiya wode, zin7iya wodenne dendiya wode entaw odite.
DEU 11:20 Hinte penge zizgiya bollanne hinte dirsa pengiya bolla xaafite.
DEU 11:21 Hessa hinte oothiko, Goday hinte mayzatas immana gidi caaqida biittan, hinte laythaynne hinte nayta laythay sa7ape bollara de7iya salo mela gidana.
DEU 11:22 Hinte Godaa, hinte Xoossaa dosiko, iya oge ubban hinte biiko, iyaw ammanetiko, ta hachi hintew immiya kiita hinte minthidi naagiko,
DEU 11:23 Goday ha kawotethata ubbaa hinte sinthafe gooddidi kessana. Hintefe dariyanne wolqaamiya kawotethata biitta yegisidi ekana.
DEU 11:24 Tohon hinte yedhida biitta ubbay hintebaa gidana. Hinte zaway dugeha mela biittafe bidi Libaanose gakanawunne Efraxiisa shaafape bidi Gita Abbaa gakanaw gidana.
DEU 11:25 Hintera ay asika eqetanaw danda7enna; Goday, hinte Xoossay hintew gidaysada hinte biya soo ubban asay hintena be7idi dagammana melanne hintew yayyana mela oothana.
DEU 11:26 Heko, ta hachi hinte sinthan anjonne baadethi wothayis.
DEU 11:27 Ta hachi hintena kiittiya Godaa, hinte Xoossaa kiita naagiko, hinte anjetana.
DEU 11:28 Shin taani hintena hachi kiittiya Godaa, hinte Xoossaa kiita naagonna ixidi, hara xoossata goyinnanaw iya ogiyape deshiko, hinte baadetana.
DEU 11:29 Goday, hinte Xoossay hinte laattanaw biya biitta hintena gelsiya wode, baadetha Garzaana zuma bolla, anjuwa Ebaala zuma bolla awaajite.
DEU 11:30 Ha zumate Yordaanose shaafape hefinthan ogiyape wuloha baggan, Araban de7iya Kanaaneta biittan, Galgala sinthan de7iya Moore mitha matan de7oosona.
DEU 11:31 Hinte ha77i Goday, hinte Xoossay hintew immiya biitta laattanaw Yordaanose shaafa pinnana haneeta. Hinte he biitta ekidi yan de7iya wode,
DEU 11:32 ta hachi hintew immiya awaajotanne higgiya ubbaa minthidi naagite.
DEU 12:1 Hinte laattana mela Goday, hinte aawata Xoossay hintew immida biittan hinte de7ida wode ubban hinte oothanaw bessiya awaajotinne higgeti haysata.
DEU 12:2 Hinte laattiya biittan de7iya kawotethatis deriya bolla, zumaa bollanne issi issi mitha garsan de7iya goyinno bessata dhaysite.
DEU 12:3 Enta yarsho bessata laallite; enta goyinno shucha tuussata mentherethite. Asheera geetetiya enta eeqa misiliya taman xuuggite; kushen oosetida enta xoossata misileta dhaysite; enta sunthata he bessaafe quchite.
DEU 12:4 Godaa, hinte Xoossaa enti banta xoossaa goyinniya ogen goyinnofite.
DEU 12:5 Goday, hinte Xoossay hinte koche ubbaa giddofe ba sunthay yan xeegetana mela doorida bessaa koyte. He bessaa hinte baanaw koshshees.
DEU 12:6 Hinte xuussa yarshuwa, hara yarshuwa, hinte asraata, hinte imuwa, hinte qangetha, hinte dosidi immiya imuwa, hinte mehiyapenne dorsaafe bayraa he bessaa ehite.
DEU 12:7 Goday, hinte Xoossay hintena anjida gisho, hessan, Goday, hinte Xoossay de7iya bessan, hintenne hinte soo asay maana; hinte kushey oothidaba ubban hinte ufaytana.
DEU 12:8 Hachi haysan hinte issoy issoy, dosidaba ootheysada he wode ootheketa.
DEU 12:9 Goday, hinte Xoossay hintew immiya shempo biitta buroo gakibeketa.
DEU 12:10 Shin hinte Yordaanose pinnidi, Goday hinte Xoossay immiya he biitta laattidi yan uttana. Hintena teqida morketape I hintena shempisiya gisho yan wopu gidi hinte daana.
DEU 12:11 He wode Goday, hinte Xoossay ba sunthay hessan xeegetanaw doorida he bessan, ta hintena kiittiyaba ubbaa, xuussa yarshuwa, hara yarshuwa, hinte asraata, hinte imuwanne hinte qangetha ubbaa yaa eheeta.
DEU 12:12 Hinte, hinte adde naytinne hinte macca nayti, hinte adde aylletinne macca aylleti hintera laata ekiboonna hinte kataman de7iya Leewetara issife yan Godaa, hinte Xoossaa sinthan ufaytana.
DEU 12:13 Neeni xuussa yarshuwa ne koyida bessan coo yarshonna mela naageta.
DEU 12:14 Neeni, ne kochaafe issuwan, Goday doorida bessan, ne xuussa yarshuwa yarsha; ta nena kiitida ubbaa yan ootha.
DEU 12:15 Gidoshin ne de7iya bessan awunka ne mehiyape Goday nena anjidaysada shukada ma. Wogaada tuna gidin woyko tuna gidonna asi oonika gaaranne gen7e meysada ne mehiyape shukada ma.
DEU 12:16 Shin suuthi haathada sa7an gussafe attishin, moopa.
DEU 12:17 Ne kathaafe, woyniyapenne zaytiyape immiya asraata, ne mehiyapenne dorsa wudiyape immiya bayraa, Godaas qangidaba ubbaanne ne dosan immiya imuwa ubbaa ne de7iya heeran moopa.
DEU 12:18 Shin neeni, ne adde naytinne ne macca nayti, ne adde aylletinne macca aylleti neera laata ekiboonna ne kataman de7iya Leewetara issife Goday, ne Xoossay doorida bessan, Godaa, ne Xoossaa sinthan, ha yarsho ubbaa ma. Ne daaburada shiishidaban Godaa, ne Xoossaa sinthan ufayta.
DEU 12:19 Ne de7o laytha ubban Leeweta qelli goonna mela naageta.
DEU 12:20 I new gelida qaalada Goday ne Xoossay ne zawa daligisiya wode nena asho maanaw koshshiya wode ne koyida mela ma.
DEU 12:21 Shin Goday, ne Xoossay ba sunthay yan xeegetana mela doorida bessay new haakiko, Goday new immida ne mehe woyko dorsaa wudiyape ta nena kiittidaysada, ne koyida mela ne kataman shukada ma.
DEU 12:22 Wogaada tuna gidin woyko tuna gidonna asi oonika gaara woyko gen7e meysada mo.
DEU 12:23 De7oy suuthan de7iya gisho, suuthi de7iya asho moonna mela naageta; hessa gisho, de7o ashora gathada moopa.
DEU 12:24 Suuthi haathada biittan gussafe attishin, moopa.
DEU 12:25 Newunne neepe guyera yaana ne naytas injetana mela suuthi moopa. Hessa ne oothiko Godaa ufaysaasa.
DEU 12:26 Shin ne Godaas dummayidabaanne iyaw qangidaba ekada, Goday doorida bessaa ba.
DEU 12:27 Xuussa yarsho ashuwanne suuthaa Godaa, ne Xoossaa yarsho bessan yarsha. Hara yarsho suuthaa Godaa, ne Xoossaa yarsho bessa matan gussada ashuwa ma.
DEU 12:28 Newunne ne naytas injetana mela ta nena kiittiya kiitaa minthada naaga. Hessa ne oothiko, Godaa ne Xoossaa ufaysiyabaanne suureba oothaasa.
DEU 12:29 Ne laattanaw biya kawotethaa, Goday ne Xoossay ne sinthafe dhaysiya wodenne ne enta biitta laattiya wode,
DEU 12:30 enti ne sinthafe dhaydaape guye, ne enta xoossata goyinnada, xihen oyketonna mela naageta. Neeni, “Ha kawotethati banta xoossata waatidi goyinnona?” yaagada kaallada oychonna mela naageta.
DEU 12:31 Enti banta xoossata goyinniya wode Goday ixiya ubbaa oothiya gisho, Godaa ne Xoossaa ne hessada goyinnanaw bessenna. Enti hari attoshin, banta adde naytanne macca nayta banta xoossatas yarsho oothidi taman xuuggoosona.
DEU 12:32 Hiza ta nena kiittidaba ubbaa ootha; iya bolla gujofa; iyape pacisopa.
DEU 13:1 Ne giddon tinbite odiya woyko amuho birshiya asi dendidi, malaatanne malaalsiyabata oothiko,
DEU 13:2 I odida malaatay woyko malaalsiyabay tuma gididi poletin, I neeko, “Ane kase ne eronna hara xoossata goyinnoos” yaagiko,
DEU 13:3 ne iya ubbaraka si7opa. Hinte kumetha wozanapenne kumetha shempuwafe Godaa hinte Xoossaa dosiyakonne dosonaako paacanaw hessa oothees.
DEU 13:4 Godaa hinte Xoossaa kaallite; iyaw yayyite; iya kiita naagite; iya qaala si7ite; iyaw goyinnite; iyape duuxofite.
DEU 13:5 Hintena Gibxe aylletethaafe wozida Godaa, hinte Xoossaa bolla hinte makallana mela tamaarsiya nabe woyko amuho birshiya uraa wodhite. Hessa mela asi hinte Godaa, hinte Xoossa kiitaape kare keyana mela oothiya gisho, iya wodhite; iitaa hinte giddofe diggite.
DEU 13:6 Hari attoshin, ne ishay woyko ne adde na7ay woyko ne macca na7iya woyko ne dosiya machiya woyko ne mata laggey, “Kase nenne ne mayzati goyinni eronna xoossata goyinnanaw yedha.
DEU 13:7 Biittaa ha gaxape ya gaxaa gakanaw de7iya, ne yuusho ubban mataninne haahon de7iya asa ubbay goyinniya xoossata goyinnanaw yedha” yaagidi balethiko,
DEU 13:8 iyaw ero goopa; I geysa si7opa. Iyaw qadhetada iya shempuwa ashshofa;
DEU 13:9 iya wodhanaw bessees. Iya wodhanaw koyro ne dooma; hessafe guye, asa ubbay kaallidi wodho.
DEU 13:10 I hayqana gakanaw shuchan cadda; I nena Gibxe biittafe, aylletetha keethaafe kessida Godaa, ne Xoossaafe nena shaakanaw koyees.
DEU 13:11 Isra7eele asay hessa si7idi yayyana; qassi hessa mela iitabaa zaaridi hinte giddon oonika oothenna.
DEU 13:12 Goday, ne Xoossay ne daana mela immida katamaape issuwan ne de7iya wode,
DEU 13:13 ne asaa giddon iitati dendidi, asaako, “Nuuni eronna xoossata goyinnanaw dendite” yaagidi balethishin ne si7iko,
DEU 13:14 he hanota oycha; minthada pilga. He ne giddon oosetida tunabay tuma gideysa shaakada eriko,
DEU 13:15 he kataman de7iya asa ubbaa mashshan wursa; he katamaanne iyan de7iya mehiya ashshona dhaysa.
DEU 13:16 He katamaape ne ekida di7o ubbaa katamaa dabaaba shiishada, he katamaanne iya di7uwa ubbaa Godaas, ne Xoossaas, xuussa yarsho oothada wursada xuugga. I merinaw zaaridi keexetonna laaletha doore gididi attana.
DEU 13:17 Ha digetida miishetape aybika ne kushen bentofo. Goday ba wolqaama hanquwafe simmidi, nena maarana; I new qadhetana. Kase ne mayzatas caaqida caaquwada ne taybuwa darsana.
DEU 13:18 Taani hachi nena kiittiya kiita ubbaa ne naagada, Godaa, ne Xoossaas kiitetiko, Godaa ne Xoossaa ufaysiyabaa oothiko, ha gidabay new poletana.
DEU 14:1 Hinte, Godaa hinte Xoossaa nayta; hayqida asaas hinte asatethaa gaaropite; hinte huuphiya buluusopite.
DEU 14:2 Hinte, Godaa hinte Xoossaas geeshsha dere; Goday hintena ba ase gidana mela biittan de7iya asa ubbaafe baw dooris.
DEU 14:3 Neeni tunaba aybaka moopa.
DEU 14:4 Ne maana mehetinne do7ati haysata; boori, dorse, deeshe,
DEU 14:5 doge, baacho, woshi7e, wora deeshi, waaliya, gaaranne zuma dorse.
DEU 14:6 Shuquley phalqetidaysanne waammotiya mehetanne do7ata ubbaa miite.
DEU 14:7 Shin shuquley phalqetonaysatanne waammotonnayisata moopa; hessika gimale, eshenne gupalle. Haysati waammotoosona, shin enta shuquley phalqetiboona gisho, enti hintew tuna.
DEU 14:8 Gudunthos shuquley phalqethi, shin waammotonna gisho I hintew tuna. Iya ashuwa moopa; iya bawuta bochofite.
DEU 14:9 Haatha giddon de7iya medhetethata giddofe hinte maanaysati haysata; molo mela qefeynne poqoy de7iya ubbaa miite.
DEU 14:10 Shin molo mela qefeynne poqoy baynayisata moopite hessi hintew tuna.
DEU 14:11 Tuna gidonna kafo ubbaa miite.
DEU 14:12 Shin kafotape hinte moonna aggana kafoti haysata; arganthi, bazzo anko, kareetha anko,
DEU 14:13 phirco, xilo koche ubbaa,
DEU 14:14 qoorase koche ubbaa,
DEU 14:15 yancho, haatha kafo, qamma kafo koche ubbaa,
DEU 14:16 laafa gutto, diidinthe, haatha kutto,
DEU 14:17 bazzo gutto, molo kafo, solee, hazazo,
DEU 14:18 saabisa geetetiya kafo koche ubbaa, ayyaana kafonne shirshiqo.
DEU 14:19 Qefera de7iya laafa medhetethati ubbay hintew tuna; enta moopite.
DEU 14:20 Shin qefera de7iyabatape tuna gidonayisata miite.
DEU 14:21 Neeni, Godaa ne Xoossaas geeshsha asi gidiya gisho, bawuta ubbaa moopa. Hessa hinte kataman de7iya bete asay maana mela entaw immanaw danda7eeta; woyko hara biitta asas bayzanaw danda7eeta. Deesha na7a iya aaye maathara kathofa.
DEU 14:22 Ne gaden laythan laythan kaxiya katha ayfe ubbaafe asraata kessa.
DEU 14:23 Ne ubba wode Godaas ne Xoossaas, yashshi tamaarana mela ba sunthay xeegetana mela I doorida bessan, ne kathaa, woyne ushshaanne zaytiya asraata, ne dorsafenne mehiyape bayra yeletidaysa yan, Godaa, ne Xoossaa sinthan ma.
DEU 14:24 Goday ne Xoossay ba sunthay xeegetana mela doorida bessay, ne de7iya bessaafe daro haaho gidiko, Goday nena anjana mela ne asraata yaa efanaw danda7onnaba gidiko,
DEU 14:25 he asraata bayzada miishiya Goday, ne Xoossay doorida bessaa efa.
