DEU 14:26 He miishiyan ne koyida miizi woyko dorse woyko woyne ushshi woyko hara mino ushshi woyko hara ne koyiyaba shammada, nenne ne soo asay Godaa, ne Xoossaa sinthan hessa mada ufayta.
DEU 14:27 Enti neera shaaketidi ekida hara laati entaw bayna gisho, hessa ne oothiya wode ne kataman de7iya Leeweta dogopa.
DEU 14:28 Heedzantho laythan laythan ne katha asraata ehada ne kataman shiisha.
DEU 14:29 Hessa ne kataman de7iya, neera shaakitidi ekida hara laati bayna Leeweti, bete asay, yi7o naytinne am7eti yidi mo. Yaatiko, ne oothiya ooso ubban Goday, ne Xoossay nena anjana.
DEU 15:1 “Laapuntha laytha wursethan tal7e aco ubbaa maara.
DEU 15:2 Ne aco maarana wogay haysa; Isra7eele gidida ba ishaas tal7ida oonika he acuwa maaro. Godaa maarotethay awaajetida gisho, Isra7eele gidida ba ishaas tal7ida ba tal7iya oychofo.
DEU 15:3 Hara biitta asas ne tal7ida acuwa ekanaw danda7aasa, shin ne kochaas tal7idaba ubbaa maara.
DEU 15:4 “Ne laattana mela Goday, ne Xoossay new aqo oothidi immiya biittan, Goday nena anjana gisho ne giddon manqoy deenna.
DEU 15:5 Ne Godaas ne Xoossaas kiitetiko, ta hachi nena kiittiya kiita ubbaa naagiko, ne polo anjetana.
DEU 15:6 Goday, ne Xoossay new odidaysada nena anjana; daro kawotethati hintefe tal7ana, shin hinte issuwafeka tal7eketa. Qassi ne kawotethata haarana, shin issoyka nena haarenna.
DEU 15:7 “Goday, ne Xoossay new immiya biittan de7iya katamatape issuwan de7iya Isra7eele asi manqidi bentiko, iyaw ulo minnofa; ne kushiya shiisha ekofa.
DEU 15:8 Ne kushiya iyaw birsha; iya koshshiyaba tal7a.
DEU 15:9 “Aco maariya laapuntha laythi matis” gada, manqo Isra7eele asi tal7e diggofa; hessa mela iita qofi ne wozanan gelopo. Ne iyaw tal7onna ixin, I Xoossako yeekiko, hessi new nagara gidana.
DEU 15:10 Ne iyaw keehatethan imma; ne wozanan ayis immiyana gada uuzettofa. Hessa ne oothiko, Goday ne Xoossay nena oykidaban yedhidaban ubban anjana.
DEU 15:11 Awudeka gidin, biitta bollafe manqoy dhayonna gisho, ne Isra7eeletas, manqotasinne metootanchotas hinte keeha gidana mela kiittayis.
DEU 15:12 Adde gidin macca gidin, Isra7eele asi, aylle oothidi shammiko, I new usupun laythi ootho; laapuntha laythan aylletethafe la77a keyo.
DEU 15:13 Neeni aylletethaafe iya kessa yeddiya wode mela kushe yeddofa.
DEU 15:14 Goday ne Xoossay nena anjidaysa mela ne mehiyape, shaaliyapenne woyne gum7ethaafe entaw keehatethan imma.
DEU 15:15 Neeni kase Gibxe biittan aylle gididaysanne Goday ne Xoossay nena yaape wozidaysa dogopa. Ta hachi ha kiitaa new immey hessasa.
DEU 15:16 Shin ne aylley nenanne ne keetha asaa dosida gishonne neera de7oy iyaw lo77o gidiya gisho, “Taani ne soope biike” yaagiko,
DEU 15:17 iya penge efada, goothi ekada, iya haytha luka. Yaatiko, I new merinaw aylle gidana; qassi macca aylleska hessada ootha.
DEU 15:18 Iya neeni aylletethaafe kessada yeddiya wode neeni qohetas gada qopofa. I ha usupun laythata giddon asi une ootheysafe dako daro new oothis. Hessa gisho, neeni oothiyaba ubban Goday, ne Xoossay nena anjana.
DEU 15:19 Ne mehiyapenne ne dorsaa wudiyape bayra yeletida adde ubbaa Godaas, ne Xoossaas dummaya. Ne dummayida mehiyape bayra yeletida boora goyopa; ne dorsaa wudiyape bayra yeletida dorsaa ikisiya meedopa.
DEU 15:20 Nenne ne soo asay Goday dooriya bessan Godaa, ne Xoossaa sinthan hessata laythan laythan ma.
DEU 15:21 Shin ne yarshiya mehiya bolla borsiyabay bentiko, I wobbe woyko qooqe woyko hara iita borisiyabay iya bolla de7iko, hessa Godaas, ne Xoossaas yarshofa.
DEU 15:22 Hessa ne de7iya ne kataman ma; wogaada tuna gidonna asi gidin woyko tuna asi gidin gaaranne gen7e ashoda mo.
DEU 15:23 Gidoshin, ne iya suuthaa haathada sa7an gussafe attishin, moopa.
DEU 16:1 Abiiba ageenan Godaa, ne Xoossaa Paasika Ba7aale boncha; Goday, ne Xoossay nena Abiiba ageenan qamma Gibxefe kessis.
DEU 16:2 Neeni dorsafenne mehe wudiyape Goday ba sunthay xeegetana mela doorida bessan, Godaas, ne Xoossaas, Paasika yarsha.
DEU 16:3 He yarshuwa ne miya wode irshoy gelida uythara moopa. Neeni Gibxe yeddada eeson keyiya wode oothidaysada irshoy geliboonna meto uythaa laapun gallas kumethi ma. Ne de7o laytha ubban ne Gibxefe keyida gallasaa hassayana.
DEU 16:4 Ne biitta ubban laapun gallassas ayba irshoy bentofo. Qassi ne koyro gallas omarsi yarshida ashuwape wontas aybika attofo.
DEU 16:5 Ne Paasika yarshuwa Goday ne Xoossay new immiya katama awunka coo shukofa.
DEU 16:6 Goday ne Xoossay ba sunthay xeegetana mela dooriya bessan ne Paasika yarshuwa shuka. Qassi awi wulliya wode Gibxefe ne keyida gisho he saatiyan shuka.
DEU 16:7 Goday, ne Xoossay dooriya bessan, yan kathada ma; yaatada sa7i wontiya wode ne soo soo ba.
DEU 16:8 Usupun gallas kumethi irshoy geliboonna uythaa ma; laapuntha gallas Godaa, ne Xoossaa goyinnanaw shiiqa; he gallas ay oosoka oothofa.
DEU 16:9 Ne katha caka oykida koyro wodiyape doomada, laapun saaminta kumethi tayba.
DEU 16:10 Yaatada, Goday, ne Xoossay nena anjidaysa mela ne, ne dosan immiya imuwa ehada, Godaa, ne Xoossaa Saaminta Ba7aale boncha.
DEU 16:11 Hessan neeni, ne adde nayti, ne macca nayti, ne adde aylletinne ne macca aylleti, ne kataman de7iya Leeweti, bete asay, yi7o naytinne ne giddon de7iya am7eti ubbay, Goday, ne Xoossay ba sunthay xeegetana mela dooriya bessan ufaytite.
DEU 16:12 Neeni Gibxe biittan aylle gididaysa hassayada ha wogaa naaga.
DEU 16:13 Ne wudumaafe ne kathaa, woyne yedhiya bessaafe ne woyniya shiishidaape guye, laapun gallas Shaqara Ba7aale boncha.
DEU 16:14 Neeni, ne adde naytinne macca nayti, ne adde aylletinne macca aylleti, ne kataman de7iya Leeweti, bete asay, yi7o naytinne am7eti ubbay he baaliyan ufaytite.
DEU 16:15 Goday dooriya bessan laapun gallas Godaa, ne Xoossaa, Ba7aale boncha. Ne ufaytana mela ne ayfisidabaninne ne kushe ooso ubban Goday, ne Xoossay nena anjana.
DEU 16:16 Hinte biittan de7iya adde ubbay laythan heedzu toho, Uytha Ba7aale wode, Saaminta Ba7aale wodenne Shaqara Ba7aale wode Godaa, hinte Xoossaa sinthan, I dooriya bessan bento. Enti Godaa sinthe yishe, mela kushe yoopo.
DEU 16:17 Goday, ne Xoossay nena anjidaysa mela issoy issoy baw danda7eysa mela immo.
DEU 16:18 Goday, hinte Xoossay immiya katamatan issi issi kochaas daynnanne halaqa hintew shuumite; enti asaas xillo pirda pirdo.
DEU 16:19 Xillo pirdaa wobbisopa; som7o be7ada maaddofa; wodhaafe ekofa. Wodhaafey cincata ayfiya qooqisees, xillota qaala geellayees.
DEU 16:20 Ne de7on daana malanne Goday ne Xoossay new immiya biitta ne laattana mela xillo pirda.
DEU 16:21 Neeni Godaa, Xoossaa yarsho bessa matan Asheera eeqa misiliya essofa.
DEU 16:22 Hinte Goday, Xoossay ixiya goyinno shucha tuussu new essofa.
DEU 17:1 Godaas, ne Xoossaas, borisiyabay de7iya mehe woyko dorse yarsho oothada shiishopa; hessi Xoossa sinthan ixetidaba.
DEU 17:2 Goday, ne Xoossay new immiya katamatape awunka adde woyko macca gidin Godaa, ne Xoossaa sinthan iitaba oothikonne iya caaquwa menthidi bentiko,
DEU 17:3 ta kiita aggidi, hara xoossata, awa woyko ageena woyko salo xoolinto goyinnida asi de7iko,
DEU 17:4 hessa melaba hinte si7iko, he odaa minthidi pilga. Hinte koyin, hessa mela tunabay Isra7eele giddon oosetidaysi tumanne geeshshi gidiko,
DEU 17:5 he iitaa oothida addiya woyko maccasiw ne katamaape gaxa kessada, shuchan caddada wodha.
DEU 17:6 Issi asi nam7u woyko heedzu marki markatonna de7ishin hayqofo; issi asa markan ay asika hayqofo.
DEU 17:7 Iya bolla markatida asati koyro iya shuchan caddo; enta kaallidi hanko asay caddo. Hessada oothada, iitaa ne giddofe digga.
DEU 17:8 Hinte sinthe shiiqiya mootoy deexo gidiko, hessika, shempo wodho, shoche, madunthi, dumma dumma mootota Goday, ne Xoossay doorida bessaa eha.
DEU 17:9 Kahine gidida Leewetakonne daynnatako he mootuwa shiisha; he mootuwa enti pirdo.
DEU 17:10 Goday doorida bessan enti pirdidaysada ootha; ne oothana mela enti kiittiyaba ubba akeekada ootha.
DEU 17:11 Enti nena tamaarsida higgiyadanne enti odida pirdada ootha; enti pirdida pirdaafe ushachi woyko haddirsi goopa.
DEU 17:12 Godaas, ne Xoossaas oothiya daynnas woyko kahiniyas kiitetonna ixiya asi de7iko, he uray hayqo. Hessada oothada, iitaa Isra7eele giddofe digga.
DEU 17:13 Asa ubbay hessa si7idi yayyana; zaaridi hessa mela iita oothiya asi deenna.
DEU 17:14 Goday, ne Xoossay new immiya biitta laattada, yan de7o doomiya wode, ne yuushon de7iya kawotethatada, “Nuka nu bolla kawo kawothana” yaagiko,
DEU 17:15 ne kawothana kawoy Goday, ne Xoossay new dooridaysa gidanaw bessees. Hessika, ne asaa giddofe dooretidaysa gidope attishin, hara biitta asi ne bolla kawothofa.
DEU 17:16 Goday, “He ogiyara Gibxe simmopite” yaagida gisho, he kawoy daro para shiishanaw bessenna; ba asaaka para shammana mela Gibxe yeddofo.
DEU 17:17 Iya wozanaa balethonna mela kawoy daro macco ekofo; daro worqanne bira shiishopo.
DEU 17:18 I ba araatan uttiya wode Leewe koche gidida kahineti naagiya maxaafape ha higgiya duuqidi baw eko.
DEU 17:19 I ha higgiya qaalanne wogaa naagonne polo eridi Godaas, ba Xoossaas, yashshi tamaarana mela, ha maxaafay iyara de7o; ika ha maxaafa ba de7o laytha ubban nabbabo.
DEU 17:20 I ba wozanan, “Taani ta laggetape aadhayis” gidi ba ishata bolla otortenna. Ika Xoossaa higgiyafe haddirsi woyko ushachi geenna. I ba kawotethan adussa laythi kawotana; iya nayti Isra7eele biittan daro laythi kawotana.
DEU 18:1 Leewe koche gidida kahinetasinne attida enta kochaas Isra7eele giddon laata biitti baawa. Asay Godaas shiishiya xuussa yarshoy enta gisho gidiya gisho iya mishe daana.
DEU 18:2 Entaw enta ishata giddon laati deenna; Goday entaw gidaysada I enta laata.
DEU 18:3 Korma woyko dorse asay yarshos shiishidaysafe kahineta gishoy haysa; missay, gacoynne ulo ashoy entaw imeto.
DEU 18:4 Ne kathaafe, woyniyapenne zaytiyape koyro gakida ayfiyanne ne dorsa ikisiyape bayraa kahinetas imma.
DEU 18:5 Leeweti Godaa sunthan merinaw kahine gididi oothana mela ne kochaa giddofe Goday, ne Xoossay enta dooris.
DEU 18:6 Issi Leewey Isra7eele biittan de7iya issi katamaape dendidi, Goday dooriya bessaa baanaw koyiko,
DEU 18:7 I biya bessan de7iya Leeweti Godaa sinthan eqidi ootheysada ika Godaa ba Xoossaa sinthan eqidi ootho.
DEU 18:8 Bana gakiya gishuwa ekidaba gidikoka, kahineti go7etiya ubbaa entara gina shaaketidi eko.
DEU 18:9 Goday ne Xoossay immida biitta ne geliya wode he biittan de7iya asay oothiya ixetida oosota oothofa.
DEU 18:10 Ba adde na7aa woyko macca na7iw yarshos taman xuuggiya oonika ne giddon bentofo. Biti, maraace be7ey, marotey, higishey,
DEU 18:11 moytille be7ey, hayqida asa ayyaana xeegey, woyko hayqida asa ayyaanara odetey ne giddon de7opo.
DEU 18:12 Hessa melaba oothiya oonika Godaa matan ixetida asi. Enti hessa mela tunaa oothiya gisho, Goday ne Xoossay he kawotethata ne sinthafe gooddana.
DEU 18:13 Shin neeni Godaa ne Xoossaa sinthan borey baynaysa gida.
DEU 18:14 Neeni laattanaw biya biittan de7iya kawotethati murunneysatanne biteyisata; shin ne hessa oothonna mela Goday ne Xoossay nena diggis.
DEU 18:15 Goday, ne Xoossay ne kochaa giddofe ta mela nabe new denthana. Ne I geysa si7a.
DEU 18:16 Koreeba zumaa bolla ne shiiqida wode Godaa ne Xoossaa haysada yaagada oychadasa; “Ta hayqonna mela Godaa, ta Xoossaa girsaa zaarada si7ike; ha wolqaama tama zaarada be7ike” yaagadasa.
DEU 18:17 Goday taako, “Enti tuma gidoosona.
DEU 18:18 Ta enta kochaa giddofe ne mela nabe entaw denthana; taani ta qaala iya doonan wothana; i, ta kiittiya ubbaa entaw odana.
DEU 18:19 I ta sunthan odiya ta qaala si7onna oonaka ta oychana.
DEU 18:20 Shin ta kiittonnaba ta sunthan odiya woyko hara xoossata sunthan odiya he nabey hayqo” yaagis.
DEU 18:21 Neeni, “Nabey odiya qaalay Xoossafe gidonnaysa ta aybin shaakada eranee?” yaagiko,
DEU 18:22 he nabey Godaa sunthan odida qaalay poletonna ixiko, hessi Goday odiboonna qaala gideysa eraasa. He nabey odiya qaalay wordo gidida gisho iya yayyofa.
DEU 19:1 Goday, ne Xoossay new immiya biittan de7iya kawotethata dhaysiya wodenne ne enta gooddada, enta katamataninne enta keethatan duussu doomiya wode,
DEU 19:2 Goday, ne Xoossay laata oothidi immiya biittan de7iya katamatape heedzu katamata new dummaya.
DEU 19:3 Goday, ne Xoossay new laata oothidi immiya biitta heedza kessada shaaka. Yaatada ase wodhida oonika he katamatako eeson baqatidi attana mela oge giigisa.
DEU 19:4 Issi asi kase morketethi bayna de7ishin, eronna ba laggiya wodhiko, I he katamatape issuwako baqatidi ba shempuwa ashsho.
DEU 19:5 Nam7u asati mithi qanxanaw wora bin, issoy mithaa qanxishin, mithaafe kalta ayfey koletidi hankuwa wodhiko, wodhida uray ha heedzu katamatape issuwako baqatidi, ba shempuwa asho.
DEU 19:6 Baqatidi attiya katamay issinni xalaala gidiko, wodhida uray eeson woxidi gakanaw ogey adusse gidiko, suuthi zaariya mata dabboy gooddi gakidi, yilon dendidi hayqanaw bessonna uraa wodhanaw danda7ees. I ba laggiya wodhiday kase morketethi de7iya gisho gidenna.
DEU 19:7 Hinte heedzu katamata dummayi wothana mela ta nena kiittey hessasa.
DEU 19:8 Goday, ne Xoossay kase ne mayzatas caaqidaysada ne zawa dalgisikonne ne mayzatas immana gida biitta ubbaa new immiko,
DEU 19:9 ha heedzu katamata bolla hara heedzu katamata guja. Hachi ta nena kiittiya ubbaa ne poliko, Godaa ne Xoossaa dosikonne I nena tamaarsida ogiyan minnada de7iko, ha biittay new imetana.
DEU 19:10 Hessa ne oothiko, Goday, ne Xoossay laata oothidi new immiya biittan xillo asa suuthi gukenna; neka suuthi gussada oyshetaka.
DEU 19:11 Shin issi asi ba shooruwa ixidi, qoseti naagidi iya wodhidi, ha katamatape issuwako baqatiko,
DEU 19:12 I de7iya kataman de7iya cimati I baqatida katamaape ehisidi, kushe zaaranaw koyeysas aathidi immo.
DEU 19:13 Iyaw aybaka qadhetofa; new ubbabay injetana mela, xillo suuthi gussida uraa Isra7eele giddofe digga.
DEU 19:14 Goday ne Xoossay neeni laattana mela immiya biittan, beni asay essida gade zawa shoddofa.
DEU 19:15 Issi asi bala oothanaw issi marka xalaali gidenna. Nam7u woyko heedzu marki markatin, he mootoy pirdetanaw koshshees.
DEU 19:16 Issi asi hara asi wordon mootiko,
DEU 19:17 mooteysinne mooteteysi nam7ay Godaa sinthan, kahineta sinthaninne daynnata sinthan eqo.
DEU 19:18 Daynnati he odaa minthidi pilgo; he uray ba ishaa wordon mooteysi tuma gidiko,
DEU 19:19 he mooteteysi ekanaw de7iya seera mooteysi seereto. Hessada oothada, iita uraa ne giddofe digga.
DEU 19:20 Hessada oothiko, hara asay hessa si7idi yayyana; hessa mela iita oosoy zaaridi oosetenna.
DEU 19:21 Hessa mela iita ooso oothidaysas qadhetofa; shempo gisho shempo; ayfe gisho ayfe; acha gisho ache; kushe gisho kushe; gedaa gisho gedaa mentha.
DEU 20:1 Neeni morketara oletanaw biya wode, enta parati, para gaaretinne enta olanchoti neepe darin be7ada, entaw yayyofa; nena Gibxefe kessida Goday, ne Xoossay neera de7ees.
DEU 20:2 Hinte ola doomanaape koyro, kahiney olanchota sinthe aadhidi haysada yaago;
DEU 20:3 “Isra7eele asaw, si7ite; hachi hinte, hinte morketara oletanaw haneeta. Hiza hinte wozanay dagammofo; yayyofite; enta sinthan kokoropite; hirgofite.
DEU 20:4 Goday, hinte Xoossay hintera biya gisho, hinte morketa olidi, hintew xoono immana” yaago.
DEU 20:5 Toora moconati olanchotako, “Ooratha keethi keexidi geliboonna asi de7iko, I olan hayqin, hara asi iya keethan gelonna mela I soo simmo.
DEU 20:6 Woyko woyne tokidi, ayfe moonna asi de7iko, I olan hayqin, hara asi iya woyne ayfiya moonna mela I soo simmo.
DEU 20:7 Macho oychidi ekiboonna asi de7iko, I olan hayqin, hara asi iya machiw ekonna mela I soo simmo” yaago.
DEU 20:8 Olaa kaaletheysati gujidi haysada yaago; “Ha asaa giddon yayyanne hirgiya oonika de7iko, I ba laggeta wozanaa yashshan til7isanaape soo simmo” yaago.
DEU 20:9 Olaa kaalethaysati hessa asaas odi wursiya wode cugaas cugaas toora moconata dooro.
DEU 20:10 Issi katamaa olanaw bada ne iyako matiya wode, koyrottidi sarora enti kushe immana mela oycha.
DEU 20:11 Enti sarora banta kushiya immidi, banta gimbe pengiya dooyidi nena gelsiko, he kataman de7iya asa ubbay new deexo ooso oothidi haggaazo.
DEU 20:12 He katamaa asay new sarora kushe immonna ixidi, olas giigetiko, ne he katamaa yuushuwa teqa.
DEU 20:13 Goday, ne Xoossay enta new aathidi immiya wode he kataman de7iya adde ubbaa mashshan wursa.
DEU 20:14 Gidoshin, maccasa, nayta, mehiyanne kataman de7iya ubbaba new di77a. Goday, ne Xoossay new immiya ne morketa shaluwa go7eta.
DEU 20:15 Ne de7iya bessaafe haakidi de7iya katamata ne oykiya wode hessada ootha.
DEU 20:16 Shin Goday, ne Xoossay new laata oothidi immiya biittan shempora de7iyaba issuwaka ashshona wodha.
DEU 20:17 Goday, ne Xoossay kiittidaysada Hiteta, Amooreta, Kanaaneta, Parzeta, Hiwetanne Yaabuseta wursada wodha.
DEU 20:18 Hessi hanonna ixiko, enti banta xoossata goyinnishe oothiya ixetida oosota hinte oothana mela hintena tamaarsidi, Godaa hinte Xoossaa bolla hinte nagara oothana mela denthethana.
DEU 20:19 Issi katama oykanaw yuushuwa ne teqada, daro gallas oletashe gam7iya wode, iyan de7iya ayfe immiya mithaa ayfiya mape attishin, qanxofa. Ne yuushuwa teqidi oley asepe attishin, denban de7iya mithaa gidenna.
DEU 20:20 Gidoshin, ne ayfe immonna hara mithata qanxada, neera oletiya katamay kundana gakanaw yan miixa keexa.
DEU 21:1 Ne laattana mela Goday, ne Xoossay new immiya biittan, ooni wodhidaako eretonna ahi kundidi bentiko,
DEU 21:2 hinte daynnatinne cimati bidi, ahay kundida bessaafe mata katamata gakanaw de7iya haahotetha wadho.
DEU 21:3 Hessafe guye, ahay kundida bessaas matiya katamaa cimati, wadhetaboonnanne morgen qambari wodhiboonna ussi eko.
DEU 21:4 Iyo goggiya haathi de7iya goyetidi eronnanne zeretidi eronna zangaara efidi, he ussee qoodhiya mirqidi mentho.
DEU 21:5 Hessa mela qohuwanne ooshsha shaakidi pirdanaw Goday, hinte Xoossay ba sinthan oothana melanne ba sunthan anjana mela enta doorida gisho, Leewe koche gidida kahineti he bessaa boo.
DEU 21:6 Hessafe guye, ahay kundida bessaas matiya katamaa cimati zangaaran qoodhe mirqidi wodhida ussee bolla banta kushiya meecetidi,
DEU 21:7 “Nu kushey ha suuthaa gussibeenna; nu ayfey hessa be7ibeenna.
DEU 21:8 Abeeti Godaw, neeni wozida ne asaa, Isra7eele maara; ha xillo suuthaa ne asaa bolla naaqo oothada taybopa. Ha xillo suuthaa gisho nu nagaray atto ga” yaago.
DEU 21:9 Neeni Godaa ayfiya sinthan hessada oothada, xillo suuthay gukida nagara ne giddofe digga.
DEU 21:10 Ne morketara ne oletanaw keyin, Goday, ne Xoossay enta ne kushen aathidi immin, enta di7iya wode,
DEU 21:11 di7etida asaa giddon issi mala lo7o maccas be7ada, iw mishetada machanaw koyiko,
DEU 21:12 iyo ne soo eha. I huuphiya meeda; I xuguntha cigga;
DEU 21:13 di7etiya wode de7iya ma7uwa laammada, issi ageena ne son uttada, ba aawasinne ba aayes kayoto. Hessafe guye, iyo macha.
DEU 21:14 Yaata simmada, iira duussay nena ufaysonna ixiko, iya ba koyida soo baana mela iyo yedda. Neeni iyo macho oothada iira issife aqida gisho, iyo miishen bayzanaw woyko aylle oothanaw bessenna.
DEU 21:15 Issi asas I dosiyanne dosonna nam7u macheti de7iko, he nam7ayka iyaw adde na7a yeliko, bayray I dosonna macceepe yeletidaba gidiko,
DEU 21:16 I ba nayta ba shaluwa laatisiya wode, I dosonnaripe yeletida bayray de7ishin, I dosiyaripe yeletida kaaluwa bayrayanaw bessenna.
DEU 21:17 Hara naytas immeysafe iyaw nam7u kushe aathidi immidi I dosonnari na7ay bayra gideysa erisanaw bessees. He na7ay iyaw kushe toho phalqida bayra gidiya gisho, bayratetha I ekanaw bessees.
DEU 21:18 Aawasinne aayes kiitetonna ixida, enti seerinka simmonna, wozana muumenne makallancho gidida na7i de7iko,
DEU 21:19 aawaynne aayiya he katamaa pengen de7iya cimatako iya eho.
DEU 21:20 Enti cimatako, “Haysi nu na7ay wozana muumenne makallancho; I nuus kiitetenna; I yarambanne ushshancho” yaagidi odo.
DEU 21:21 Hessafe guye, he kataman de7iya adde ubbay iya shuchan caddidi wodho. Hessada oothidi hinte giddofe iita uraa dhaysite; Isra7eele ubbay hessa si7idi yayyana.
DEU 21:22 Issi asi hayqo pirdisiya bala oothiko, ne iya mitha bolla kaqada wodhiko,
DEU 21:23 he mithaa bolla iya ahay aqopo; iya he gallas mooga. Mitha bolla kaqetidi hayqiya oonika Xoossan baadetidaysa. Goday, ne Xoossay new laata oothidi immiya ne biitta tunisopa.
DEU 22:1 Isra7eele asa boori woyko dorsi dhayidi bishin demmiko agga aadhofa; laagga ehada iya godaas imma.
DEU 22:2 He mehiya goday ne heera asi gidonna ixiko woyko iya goday ooneko ne eronna ixiko, iya goday koyishe yaana gakanaw ne soo efa; I koyishe yiiko iyaw imma.
DEU 22:3 Hessada hare woyko ma7o woyko aybaka dhayidabaa demmiko, hessada ootha.
DEU 22:4 Isra7eele asa harey woyko boori ogen kundin be7iko, maaddada denthafe attishin, aggada aadhofa.
DEU 22:5 Maccasi adde ma7o ma7ofo; addeyka maccasa ma7o ma7ofo. Hessa melaba oothiya oonaka Goday, hinte Xoossay ixees.
DEU 22:6 Ne oge bishin, mitha bolla gidin, sa7an ba na7aa woyko ba phuuphulliya haphida kafo demmiko, iyo, I naytara oykada ne soo efopa.
DEU 22:7 Nayta efanaw danda7aasa; shin aayiw baana mela yedda agga. Hessada oothiko, neeni duretada adussa laythi daana.
DEU 22:8 Ooratha keethi keexiya wode kaarape asi kundi hayqin ne oyshetonna mela keetha bolla kate giigisa.
DEU 22:9 Ne woyne gaden nam7u qommo kathi zeropa; hessada oothiko, ne zerida kathaynne woyney nam7ayka iitana.
DEU 22:10 Boorinne hare issife waaxada goyopa.
DEU 22:11 Suufepenne liinope oosetida ma7o ma7ofa.
DEU 22:12 Ne ma7iya ma7oy oyddu baggara macari de7iyaba gido.
DEU 22:13 Issi asi macho eki simmidi iyo dosona ixidi,
DEU 22:14 “Ha machiw ta ekiya wode kumethi giduku” yaagidi iyo iissidi odetiko,
DEU 22:15 na7e aawaynne na7e aayiya I geela7otetha malla efidi, katamaa pengen de7iya cimata besso.
DEU 22:16 Na7e aaway cimatas haysada yaagidi odo; “Taani ta na7iw ha uraas macho oothada immas, shin I, iyo ixis.
DEU 22:17 I, ‘Ne na7iya kumethi giduku’ yaagidi iyo iissidi odis. Gidoshin, ‘Ta na7e geela7otetha mallaa haysa be7ite’ ” yaagidi, I geela7otetha erisiya carqiya besso.
DEU 22:18 Yaatiko, he katamaa cimati iya garaafo.
DEU 22:19 I Isra7eele geela7e sunthaa iissida gisho, cimati iya xeetu bira santime acisidi, na7e aawas immo. Na7iya iyaw macho gidada de7o; ba de7o laytha ubban iyo yeddanaw bessenna.
DEU 22:20 Iya mootoy tuma gididi, na7iya kumethi gidonna ixiko,
DEU 22:21 iya ba aawa son de7ashe laymatida gisho, na7iw I aawa kare ehidi, he katamaa addeti iyo shuchan caddidi wodho. Isra7eele giddon iya borsoba oothasu; hessada oothada ne giddofe iitaa digga.
DEU 22:22 Issi asi hara asa machira laymatishe oyketiko, inne iyara laymatida maccasiya hayqo. Hessada oothada ne giddofe iitaa digga.
DEU 22:23 Issi asi hara asas oysheta giigida geela7iw katama giddon demmidi iira laymatiko,
DEU 22:24 enta nam7aa katamape gaxa kessidi, shuchan caddidi wodhite. Na7iya hayqey, katama giddon de7ashe, asi ashshana mela waassaboonna gishosa. Na7ay hayqey, hara asas giigida geela7iw iissida gishosa. Hessada oothada ne giddofe iitaa digga.
DEU 22:25 Issi asi asas giigida geela7iw asi bayna bessan wolqan oykidi, iyo iissiko, iya xalaali hayqo.
DEU 22:26 Iya hayqos gathiya nagara oothaboonna gisho, na7e bolla aybaka oothopite. Hessi issi asi coo dendidi hara asi wodheysa mela.
DEU 22:27 I iyo asi bayna bessan demmidi oykin, he geela7iya waassasu, shin iyo ashshiya asi bentibeenna.
DEU 22:28 Issi asi oyshetaboonna geela7iw oykidi, I geela7otetha ekidi oyketeko,
DEU 22:29 na7e aawa ishatamu bira santime acco. Yaatidi na7iw baw macho ootho. Ba de7o laytha ubban iyo yeddofo.
DEU 22:30 Issi asi ba aawa machiw ekidi, ba aawa kawushofo.
DEU 23:1 Sangatida woyko qaaratetida addey Godaa shiiquwa gelopo.
DEU 23:2 Laymatethan yeletida asi Godaa shiiquwa gelopo. Hari attoshin tammantho yeletethi gakanaw, iya kochaafe oonika Godaa shiiquwa gelopo.
DEU 23:3 Amoone asi gidin woyko Moo7abe asi gidin, Godaa asaa shiiquwa gelopo. Hari attoshin tammantho yeletethi gakanaw enta ase gidida oonika Godaa asaa shiiquwa gelopo.
DEU 23:4 Neeni Gibxefe keyada bishin, enti katharanne haathara nena mokibookona. Enti Masephexoomen Patoora kataman de7iya Bi7oora na7aa Balaami nena baaddana mela shammidosona.
DEU 23:5 Goday, ne Xoossay nena dosida gisho Balaama si7ibeenna; iya baadetha new anjon laammis.
DEU 23:6 Ne de7o laytha ubban enti saro daana melanne duretana mela amottofa.
DEU 23:7 Edoometi new dabbo gidiya gisho enta kadhopa; ne enta biittan bete asi gidada de7ida gisho Gibxeta kadhopa.
DEU 23:8 Enta heedzantho yeletethay Godaa shiiquwa gelanaw danda7oosona.
DEU 23:9 Ne morketa olanaw keyada dunkaanida bessan nena tunatethafe naaga.
DEU 23:10 Qamma amuhon atuntethay gukin, irxabay iya bolla de7iya oonika gutaape gaxa keyidi yan gam7o.
DEU 23:11 Sa7i omarsiya wode ba asatethaa meecetidi, awi wulliya wode gutaa simmo.
DEU 23:12 Ne wora sheeshi uttiya bessi gutaape karen giigisa.
DEU 23:13 Sheeshas uttiya olla bookiya miishe ola miishera gathada oyka; sheeshas utta simmada ollan biitta zaara.
DEU 23:14 Goday, ne Xoossay nena naaganawunne ne morketa ne kushen aathidi immanaw, ne gutan simeretees. I yan shaatiyaba be7idi, nena aggidi simmonna mela ne gutay geeshshi gidanaw koshshees.
DEU 23:15 Ba godaape baqatidi, neeko yida aylliya zaarada iya godaas immofa.
DEU 23:16 I ne katamatape issuwan, ba koyida bessan ba koyida wode gakanaw de7o; iya un7ethofa.
DEU 23:17 Isra7eele asaape oonika adde gidin woyko macca gidin, eeqa goyinniya asay ootheysada laymatopo.
DEU 23:18 Adde gidin woyko maccas gidin, laymatethan demmida miishe qaangethi gathanaw Godaa ne Xoossaa keethi ehopo. Enta nam7aa Goday ne Xoossay ixees.
DEU 23:19 Hinte koche gidida Isra7eele asaas miishe woyko kathi woyko haraba tal7ada yelo ekofa.
DEU 23:20 Hara biitta asape yelo ekanaw danda7aasa; shin neeni laattanaw geliya biittan ne oothiyaba Goday, ne Xoossay anjana mela ne koche gidida Isra7eele asaas yelora tal7ofa.
DEU 23:21 Godaas, ne Xoossaas, immanaw qangetidaba gathanaw gam7ofa. Goday ne Xoossay ne qangidaysa kumethi neepe koyiya gisho, polonna ixiko new nagara gidana.
DEU 23:22 Shin ne qangonna aggiko hessi nagara gidenna.
DEU 23:23 Godaas ne Xoossaas, immana gida ne doonan odetidaba neeni dosan immana gida gisho, ne inxarsan odetidaba pola.
DEU 23:24 Neeni issi asa woyne gade giddora aadhiya wode woyniyape koyda mela ma, shin iyape aybaka ne oykida miishen yeggofa.
DEU 23:25 Issi asa gadera neeni aadhiya wode he gadiyan de7iya tiyape duuthada ma; shin kathaafe cakada ne soo efopa.
DEU 24:1 Issi asi macho eki simmidi, issi iitabaa I bolla demmidi iyo ixidi, pirimaa daakidi, yeddiko,
DEU 24:2 iya soope keyada, hara azina geliko,
DEU 24:3 he nam7antho azinay iyo dosonna ixidi, pirimaa daakidi, iyo ba soope kessidi yeddiko, woyko iyo ekida nam7antho azinay hayqiko,
DEU 24:4 iya tunida gisho, koyro ekida azinay, zaaridi iyo ekofo. Hessi Godaa sinthan ixetidaba; ne Goday, ne Xoossay ne immiya biittan hessa mela nagara oothofa.
DEU 24:5 Ooratha macho ekida asi olas boopo; hara deexo ooso oothofo. Issi laythi aadhana gakanaw awuka boonna ba machiw ufayso.
DEU 24:6 Issi asa woxa woyko mayde acos oykofa; hessi keetha asay miyaba dhayidi hayqo guussu.
DEU 24:7 Issi Isra7eele gidida ba ishaa kaysoti efidi, aylle kessey woyko haras bayziya uray hayqo. Hessada oothada iita uraa ne giddofe digga.
DEU 24:8 Goga hargefe nena minthada naaga; Leewe koche gidida kahineti nena tamaarsiya ubbaa pola; ta entaw immida kiita naaga.
DEU 24:9 Neeni Gibxefe keyada ogen de7ishin, Goday ne Xoossay Mayraami bolla oothidaysa akeeka.
DEU 24:10 Issi asas issiba tal7ada, oythiyaba oychanaw iya soo gelopa.
DEU 24:11 Neeni karen eqidashin, ne tal7ida uray oothiyaba soope kessidi new immo.
DEU 24:12 I manqo gidiko, neeni acos oykida iya ma7uwa ne son aysopa.
DEU 24:13 I ma7idi aqana mela sa7i omarsiya wode iyaw guye zaara; I nena galatana. Hessi Godaa ne Xoossaa sinthan new xillotetha ooso gididi taybetana.
DEU 24:14 Manqonne maade koyidi dookaletida, Isra7eele gidida ne ishaa gidin woyko ne katamatape issuwan de7iya hara biitta asi naaqofa.
DEU 24:15 I hachi oothidaysa hachi ekanaw minthidi koyiya gisho, awi wullonna iyaw qanxa. Hessi hanonna ixiko, manqoy Godaako waassin hessi new nagara gidana.
DEU 24:16 Nayti oothida nagaraa gisho, aawata wodhanaw bessenna; qassi aawati oothida nagaraa gisho nayta wodhanaw bessenna. Oonika ba oothida nagaran nagaran hayqanaw bessees.
DEU 24:17 Hara biitta asaa pirdaanne yi7o nayta pirdaa wobbisopa; am7e ma7uwa aco gisho oykofa.
DEU 24:18 Neeni Gibxe biittan aylle gididaysanne Goday ne Xoossay nena yaape wozidi kessidaysa akeeka. Taani nena kiittey hessa gishosa.
DEU 24:19 Neeni kathi cakiya wode ne dogida mirqiya ekanaw guye simmofa. Goday, ne Xoossay ne kushe ooso ubban nena anjana mela hessa bete asas, yi7o naytasinne am7etas aggaaga.
DEU 24:20 Neeni shamaho ayfe maxiya wode wursada maxanaw nam7antho guye simmofa. Attidaysa bete asaas, yi7o naytasinne am7etas aggaaga.
DEU 24:21 Neeni woyne ayfe maxiya wode wursada maxanaw nam7antho guye simmofa. Attidaysa bete asas, yi7o naytasinne am7etas aggaaga.
DEU 24:22 Neeni Gibxe biittan aylle gidada de7idaysa dogopa. Taani nena kiittey hessa gishosa.
DEU 25:1 Nam7u asati ooyetidi pirda keethi biiko, daynnati xilluwa ne like gidi, naaqidaysa ne bala gidi pirdo.
DEU 25:2 Balidaysa garaafo bessiyaba gidiko, iya tirara zin7isidi zokon shocana mela daynnay kiitto. I garaafetey daynna sinthaninne I oothida balaa mela gido.
DEU 25:3 I oytamu gakanaw garaafetanaw danda7ees, shin hessafe daropo. Hessafe dariko ne ishay ne sinthan kawuyana.
DEU 25:4 Wudumman kathi yedhiya boora doona qachofa.
DEU 25:5 Issife de7iya ishatape issoy na7a yelonna hayqiko, iya machiya hara asi gelopo. I azinaa ishay iyo ekidi, iw koshshiyaba kuntho.
DEU 25:6 Hayqida ishaa sunthay Isra7eele asaa giddofe qushetidi dhayonna mela iya, koyro yeliya adde na7ay hayqida ishaa sunthan xeegeto.
DEU 25:7 Gidoshin, I ba ishaa machiw ekanaw koyona ixiko, maccasiya katamaa pengen de7iya cimatako bada, “Ta azinaa ishay ba ishaa sunthay Isra7eelen daana mela koybeenna; tana ekidi, taw koshshiyaba kunthonna ixis” yaagada odo.
DEU 25:8 Katamaa cimati iya xeegidi oychin, I ha77ika, “Taani iyo ekike” giiko,
DEU 25:9 maccasiya cimata sinthan iyako shiiqada, iya caammaafe issuwa kessada, iya som7on cuttada, “Ba ishaas zerthi daana mela koyonna asa bolla haysa mela kawushi gakanaw bessees” yaago.
DEU 25:10 Yaatin, he uraa soo asay Isra7eele kochaa giddon, “Caamma kessida asaa soo” geetetidi xeegetishe daana.
DEU 25:11 Nam7u asati wadhetishin, issuwa machiya yada, ba azinaa shoceysa kushepe ashshanaw, ba kushiya yeddada hankuwa addetetha oykiko,
DEU 25:12 I kushey qadhey bayna qanxeto.
DEU 25:13 Gitanne guuthi gidida nam7u mizaane oykofa.
DEU 25:14 Daronne guuthi makiya nam7u maka miishey new doopo.
DEU 25:15 Goday, ne Xoossay new immiya biittan adussa laythi ne daana mela like mizaaneynne maka miishey new de7o.
DEU 25:16 Goday ne Xoossay hessa melaba oothidi, balethiya oonaka ixees.
DEU 25:17 Ne Gibxefe keyada oge bolla de7ishin, Amaaleqati ne bolla oothidaba akeeka.
DEU 25:18 Enti Xoosse yayyonna dere; ne ogiyan enti neera eqetidosona. Ne bishin, daaburidi guye attida asa ubbaa wodhidosona.
DEU 25:19 Hessa gisho, Goday ne Xoossay nena he biitta laatisidi, ne yuushuwan de7iya morketape nena shempisiya wode ha biittan enta hassayiya asi dhayana gakanaw Amaaleqata ubbaa dhaysa; hessa oothanaysa dogopa.
DEU 26:1 Goday, ne Xoossay nena laatisiya biitta gelada, wopu gada duussi oykiya wode,
DEU 26:2 Goday, ne Xoossay new immiya biittan mokida katha ubbaafe bayraa, Goday ne Xoossay ba sunthay xeegetana mela doorida bessaa ekada ba.
DEU 26:3 He wode aawatiya kahiniyako bada, “Goday taw immana gidi kase nu mayzatas caaqida bessaa nuna gelsida Godaas, nu Xoossaas, hachi markatayis” yaagite.
DEU 26:4 Kahiney kathaa ne kushepe ekidi, Godaa ne Xoossaa yarsho bessa sinthan wotho.
DEU 26:5 Hessafe guye, Godaa ne Xoossaa sinthan haysada yaaga; “Ta mayzay bessafe besse yuuyishe de7ida Soore biitta asi; I taybon guutha asatara Gibxe wodhidi yan de7is. I yan de7ishe gita, wolqaamanne taybon daro dere gidis.
DEU 26:6 Shin Gibxeti nuuni aylle gididi oothana mela un7ethidosona; kawushidosona.
DEU 26:7 Yaatin, nuuni Godaako, nu aawata Xoossaako waassida. Goday nu waasuwa si7is; nu waayiya, nu daaburanne nu un7etetha be7is.
DEU 26:8 Goday ba wolqaama kushiyan, ba micetida qesiyan, gita dagaman, malaataninne malaalsiyabatan nuna Gibxefe kessis.
DEU 26:9 Ha bessaa nuna ehidi, maathinne eessi goggiya ha biitta nuus immis.
DEU 26:10 Heko, Goday nuus immida biitta ayfiyape bayraa ehas” yaagada, kathaa Godaa ne Xoossaa sinthan wothada, iya sinthan gufanna.
DEU 26:11 Newunne ne soo asaas Goday, ne Xoossay immida lo77oba ubban ufaytashe, Godaa galata. Leewetinne ne giddon de7iya bete asa ubbayka neera ufayto.
DEU 26:12 Asraata kessiya heedzantho laythan, ne kathaafe asraata kessa ongidaape guye ne kataman de7iya Leewetas, bete asaas, yi7otasinne am7etas immada enti kallidi maana mela ootha.
DEU 26:13 Godaa, ne Xoossaako, “Taani ta soope dummatida katha imota kessada, ne tana kiittidaysada Leewetas, bete asaas, yi7otasinne am7etas immas. Taani ne kiitaape issuwaka menthabike; issuwaka doga aggabike.
DEU 26:14 Ta kayotiya wodeka, he asraatape aybaka mabike; ta tunida wodeka iya bochabike; hayqida asas iyape immabike. Taani Godaa, ta Xoossaa bonchas; I tana kiittidaba ubba polas.
DEU 26:15 Ne de7iya geeshsha bessaafe, salope duge xeella; ne deriya Isra7eele anja; kase nu mayzatas ne immana gada caaqida maathinne eessi goggiya biitta nuus anja” yaaga.
DEU 26:16 Ne ha awaajotanne wogata naagana mela Goday ne Xoossay hachi nena kiittis. Hessa gisho, ne kumetha wozanapenne kumetha shempuwafe enta naaga.
DEU 26:17 Goday, new Xoosse gideysanne neeni iya ogiyan baanaw, iya wogaa, iya kiitaanne higgiya naaganaysa hachi erisadasa.
DEU 26:18 Goday ba gelida qaalada ne iya dere gideysa, iyaw buzo miishe gideysanne iya kiita ubbaa naageysata gideysa hachi nena erisis.
DEU 26:19 Hessa ne oothiko, I medhida dere ubbaafe aathidi nena galatan, sunthaninne bonchon gita dere oothana. I gelida qaalada ne iyaw geeshsha dere gidana.
DEU 27:1 Hessafe guye, Museynne Isra7eele cimati asaako, “Taani hachi hintena kiittiya kiitaa naagite.
DEU 27:2 Yordaanose shaafa pinnada, Goday ne Xoossay new immiya biitta geliya wode gita shuchata essada noora tiya.
DEU 27:3 Goday, ne aawata Xoossay new immana gidaysada maathinne eessi goggiya biitta, Goday ne Xoossay new immiya biitta ne pinniya wode ha higgeta ubbaa he shuchata bolla xaafa.
DEU 27:4 Neeni Yordaanose pinnida wode ta nena hachi kiittidaysada ha shuchata Ebaala zuma bolla essada enta bolla noora tiya.
DEU 27:5 He bessan Godaas, ne Xoossaas, birati bochonna shuchafe yarsho bessi giigisa.
DEU 27:6 Godaas, ne Xoossaas yarsho bessi masetiboonna shuchafe ootha; iya bolla Godaas, ne Xoossaas xuussa yarsho yarsha.
DEU 27:7 Issifetetha yarshuwa shiishada mashe Godaa, ne Xoossaa sinthan ufayta.
DEU 27:8 Ha higgeta bentana mela oothada ha shuchata bolla qoncen xaafa” yaagis.
DEU 27:9 Museynne Leewe gidida kahineti issife asaako, “Isra7eele, si77i gada wozanape si7a; hachi ne Godaa, ne Xoossaa dere gidadasa.
DEU 27:10 Ta hachi new immiya Godaa, ne Xoossaa awaajota naaganne kiiteta” yaagis.
DEU 27:11 He gallas Musey asaa haysada yaagidi kiittis.
DEU 27:12 “Hinte Yordaanose pinnidaape guye Garzaana zuma bolla eqidi asaa anjanaysati, Simoona, Leewe, Yihuda, Yisakoora, Yoosefanne Biniyaame kochata.
DEU 27:13 Qassi Ebaala zuma bolla eqidi asaa baaddanaysati, Robeela, Gaade, Aseera, Zabloona, Daanenne Niftaaleme kochata.
DEU 27:14 “Leeweti banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, Isra7eele asaako haysada yaago.
DEU 27:15 Godaa sinthan ixetidaba gidiya gisho, kushe hiillanchchoy mithi massidi, birata sheeshidi woyko shuchi qoxidi oothida eeqa geeman goyinniya oonika baadetidaysa gido” giiko,
DEU 27:16 “Ba aawa woyko ba aayiw kawushiya oonika baadetidaysa gido” giiko,
DEU 27:17 “Ba shooruwa zawa sugiya asi baadetidaysa gido” giiko,
DEU 27:18 “Qooqey baanaw bessiya ogiyape hara soo zaariya asi baadetidaysa gido” giiko,
DEU 27:19 “Bete asaa, yi7o naytanne am7eta pirda geellayiya asi baadetidaysa gido” yaagiko,
DEU 27:20 “Ba aawa machiw xaallidi, ba aawa bonchuwa qaariya asi baadetidaysa gido” giiko,
DEU 27:21 “Mehera tuniya asi baadetidaysa gido” giiko,
DEU 27:22 “Ba micho gidida aawa woyko aaye na7era tuniya asi baadetidaysa gido” giiko,
DEU 27:23 “Ba mache aayera tuniya asi baadetidaysa gido” giiko,
DEU 27:24 “Ase geeman wodhiya asi baadetidaysa gido” giiko,
DEU 27:25 “Miishen shametidi, xillo asi wodhiya asi baadetidaysa gido” giiko,
DEU 27:26 “Ha higgeta naagonna asi baadetidaysa gido” giiko,
DEU 28:1 Neeni Godaa ne Xoossaas polo kiitetiko, hachi ta new immiya kiita ubbaa minthada naagiko, Goday, ne Xoossay biittan de7iya kawotethata ubbaafe aathidi nena dhoqu dhoqu oothana.
DEU 28:2 Neeni Godaa, ne Xoossaas kiitetiko, haysafe kaallidi de7iya anjo ubbay nebaa gidana.
DEU 28:3 Ne katamaninne ne goshshan anjetidaysa gidana.
DEU 28:4 Ne ulo ayfey, ne kathay, ne mehey, ne dorsatinne ne deeshati anjetidaysata gidana.
DEU 28:5 Ne keesheynne ne munaqa miishey anjetidaysa gidana.
DEU 28:6 Ne kessaynne ne geloy anjetidaysa gidana.
DEU 28:7 Ne bolla dendiya ne morketa, Goday ne sinthan xoonetidaysata oothana. Enti ne bolla issi ogera yaana, shin laapun ogera ne sinthafe baqatana.
DEU 28:8 Goday ne kushey oykiyabaanne ne shaaliya anjana; Goday, ne Xoossay new immiya biittan nena anjana.
DEU 28:9 Neeni Godaa, ne Xoossaa kiita naagikonne iya ogiyan biiko, I new caaqidaysada Goday nena baw geeshsha dere oothidi essana.
DEU 28:10 Hessafe guye, biittan de7iya asa ubbay Goday ba sunthan nena xeegidaysa be7idi yayyana.
DEU 28:11 Goday new immanaw ne mayzatas caaqida he biittan, ne ulo ayfiya, ne mehiya, ne goshsha ayfiya darsidi anjana.
DEU 28:12 Ne kushe ooso ubbaa anjanawunne, Goday ne biittas ira woden woden bukisanaw ba minja keethaa, salo pengiya new dooyana. Neeni daro kawotethatas gede tal7anaape attishin, oodefeka haa tal7aka.
DEU 28:13 Goday nena ubbaas kace kessanaape attishin, goyna kessenna. Hachi ta new immiya, Godaa, ne Xoossaa kiita si7ada, minthada naagiko, ne bolla gidanaape attishin, garse gidaka.
DEU 28:14 Ta new hachi immida kiitaape haddirsi woyko ushachi gada, hara xoossata kaallofa; enta goyinnofa.
DEU 28:15 Shin neeni Godaa, ne Xoossaas kiitetonna ixada, hachi ta nena kiittiya wogaanne higgiya ubbaa naagonna ixiko, haysafe kaallidi de7iya baadethati ubbay ne bolla yaananne nena demmana.
DEU 28:16 Ne katamaninne ne goshshan baadetidaysa gidana.
DEU 28:17 Ne keesheynne munaqa miishey baadetidaysa gidana.
DEU 28:18 Ne ulo ayfey, ne katha ayfey, ne mehey, ne dorsaynne deeshay baadetidaysa gidana.
DEU 28:19 Ne kessaynne ne geloy baadetidaysa gidana.
DEU 28:20 Neeni iita ooso oothada tana aggida gisho, neeni eeson dhayana gakanaw ne oothiya ooso ubban Goday baadethi, dagamanne kawushatethi yeddana.
DEU 28:21 Neeni laattanaw biya biittafe dhayana gakanaw Goday, gadoy neepe duuxonna mela oothana.
DEU 28:22 Goday nena gilqatethan, mishan, madunthan, xuuggiya awan, koshan, wol7oninne kathi dhaysiya harmen ne dhayana gakanaw shocana.
DEU 28:23 Neepe bollara de7iya saloy naase birata gidana; neepe garsara de7iya biittay birata gidana.
DEU 28:24 Goday ne biittan bukiya ira bidonne baana kessana; neeni dhayana gakanaw salope baani bukana.
DEU 28:25 Goday nena ne morketan xoonisana. Neeni enta olanaw issi ogera keyana; shin laapun ogera ne enta sinthafe baqatana. Biittan de7iya kawotethi ubbay ne bolla gakidaba be7idi, yashshan kokorana.
DEU 28:26 Ne ahay salo kafotasinne bazzo do7atas kathi gidana; enta yedethiya oonika deenna.
DEU 28:27 Goday nena paxoy bayna Gibxe gadon, kixan, madunthaninne puuso hergen shocana.
DEU 28:28 Goday nena gooshshatethan, qooqetethaninne dagaman shocana.
DEU 28:29 Seeta gallas neeni qooqey tattafeysada tattafana; ne oothiyaba ubbay new giigonna ixana. Ne de7o laytha ubban ne un7etananne bonqetada daana. Nena maaddiya asi demmaka.
DEU 28:30 Ne macho oycha giigisana, shin iyo hari dafi ekidi iissana. Neeni keethe keexana, shin iyan de7aka. Woyne tokana, shin iya ayfiya maaka.
DEU 28:31 Ne booray ne sinthan shuketana, shin iya ashuwa maaka. Ne harey neepe wolqan eketana, shin new guye simmenna. Ne dorsati ne morketas imetana, enta ashshanaw nena maaddiya asi deenna.
DEU 28:32 Ne ayfey be7ishin ne adde naytinne macca nayti hara kawotethas imetana. Enti simmin be7ana gada xeellishin, ne ayfey tollu gidi attana; hessa digganaw new wolqi deenna.
DEU 28:33 Ne biitta ayfiyanne ne cawa ubbaa ne eronna asi maana; ne de7o laytha ubban un7etidaysanne naaqetidaysa gidana.
DEU 28:34 Ne be7iya iitati nena gooshshana.
DEU 28:35 Goday paxoy bayna iita madunthan ne gulbatanne ne wodiriya hargisana; tohope huuphe gakanaw, nena he madunthan shocana.
DEU 28:36 Goday nenanne ne kawa, nenanne ne mayzata eronna asa biitta efana. Hessan neeni mithafenne shuchafe oosetida hara xoossata goyinnana.
DEU 28:37 Goday nena laaliya hara kawotethata giddon neeni miichasinne kaassas attana.
DEU 28:38 Neeni daro kathi ne goshshan zerana; shin booley midigin, guutha kathi shiishana.
DEU 28:39 Woyne tokada iya harmana, shin guxuney iya midigin, iyape ayfe demmaka woyko iyape uyaka.
DEU 28:40 Ne biitta ubban shamahoy dolana, shin ayfey qoqofetidi wuriya gisho, shamaho zayte demmaka.
DEU 28:41 Ne addenne macca yelana, shin oli di77idi efiya gisho enti neera dookona.
DEU 28:42 Ne mithaanne ne biitta ayfiya booley wursana.
DEU 28:43 Ne giddon de7iya bete asay ne bolla dhoqu dhoqu gaana, shin ne guye attada ziqi ziqi gaana.
DEU 28:44 I new tal7anaape attishin, ne iyaw tal7aka; I huuphe gidana; neeni goyna gidana.
DEU 28:45 Godaa, ne Xoossaa, ne kiitetonna ixida gishonne iya wogaanne higgiya naagonna ixida gisho, ne dhayana gakanaw ha baadethati ubbay ne bolla wodhana; nena enti yedethana.
DEU 28:46 Ha baadethati ne bollanne ne kochaa bolla merinaw malaatanne malaalsiyaba gidana.
DEU 28:47 New sa7i injetida wode Godaa, ne Xoossaa ufaysaninne galatan goyinnona gisho,
DEU 28:48 nena koshan, saamon, kallotethaninne meton ubbaba dhayada, Goday ne bolla yeddiya ne morketas haaretana. Goday nena dhaysana gakanaw ne morgen birata qambara wothana.
DEU 28:49 Goday ne enta qaala eronna kawotethata, biitta gaxape ankoy piradhidi wodheysada ne bolla ehana.
DEU 28:50 Enti wozana minota; cima bonchonayisata; naytas qadhetonayisata.
DEU 28:51 Ne dhayana gakanaw enti ne mehiyanne goshsha ayfiya maana. Neeni dhayana gakanaw ne kathaa, ne woyniya, ne zaytiya, ne miizanne ne dorsa wudiya maarokona.
DEU 28:52 Goday, ne Xoossay new immiya biittan de7iya ne ammanetiya adussenne mino dirsati laaletana gakanaw ne katamaa yuushuwa teqidi nena un7ethana.
DEU 28:53 Ne morketi katamaa teqidi nena un7ethiya wode miyaba dhayada, Goday ne Xoossay new immida ne ulo ayfe gidida ne adde naytanne ne macca nayta maana.
DEU 28:54 Ne giddon hari attoshin kase injen de7ida asika ba ishaas, ba dosiya machesinne ba yelida naytas ba kathaafe shaakenna.
DEU 28:55 Morketi katamaa teqidi un7ethiya wode maanabay hari bayna gisho, miya ba nayta ashuwape hara oodeska immenna.
DEU 28:56 Ne giddon kase injen de7ida, ba injiyafe dendoysan sa7a yedhanaw shaatetiya maccasiya, ba dosiya azinaasinne ba yelida naytas uuzettana.
DEU 28:57 Morketi iya de7iya katamaa teqidi iyo un7ethida gishonne waaysida gisho, iw hari miyabay dhayin, ba yelida na7aanne do7aa enta gathonna geeman barka maana.
DEU 28:58 Ha maxaafan xaafetida higgeta ne naagonna ixiko, malaalsiyanne yashshiya Godaa, ne Xoossaa suntha bonchona ixiko,
DEU 28:59 ne bollanne ne kochaa bolla Goday, yashshiya gado, daro wode gam7iya, paxoy bayna iita harge yeddana.
DEU 28:60 Kase Gibxe asaa bolla be7ada, ne yayyida Gibxe harge ubbaa zaaridi ne bolla ehana; he hargey nena yeddenna.
DEU 28:61 Gujidika, ha higge maxaafan xaafetiboonna hargetanne gadota ubbaa ne dhayana gakanaw Goday ne bolla ehana.
DEU 28:62 Godaa, hinte Xoossa hinte si7onna ixida gisho, salo xoolintoda darida hintefe guuthi attana.
DEU 28:63 Goday, hintew lo77oba oothiya wodenne hinte tayboy dariya wode ufaytidaysada ha77i hinte bolla gado ehiya wodenne hintena dhaysiya wode ufaytana; hinte laattanaw biya biittafe shodetidi dhayana.
DEU 28:64 Goday nena ha gaxape ya gaxa gakanaw kawotethata ubbaa giddon laallana. Yan neeni woyko ne mayzati eronna hara mithinne shucha xoossata goyinnana.
DEU 28:65 He kawotethata giddon hinte shempo demmeketa; tohoy yedhiya bessika new deenna. Yan Goday new qofan kumida guugge, amon argaacida ayfenne ufaysi qanxida wozana immana.
DEU 28:66 Ne de7oy hirgan kumana; gallasinne qamma dagamaninne hayqo yashshan un7etada daana.
DEU 28:67 Ne wozanan kumida yashshaafenne ne ayfey be7iya palabaape dendoysan, wontiya wode neeni, “Awude qammandeesha” qassi qammiya wode, “Awude wontandesha” yaagana.
DEU 28:68 Ta nena, “Zaarada ha ogiyara baaka” gida ogiyara Goday nena zaaridi markaben guye Gibxe yeddana. Yan neeni aylle gidanaw ne morketas nena bayzanaw koyana, shin hintena aylleyanaw shammiya asi demmeketa.
DEU 29:1 Goday Koreeba zuman, Isra7eele asaara caaqida caaquwa bolla gujidi Moo7aben entara caaqanaw Muse kiitida caaqo qaalati haysata.
DEU 29:2 Musey Isra7eele asaa ubbaa xeegi shiishidi, haysada yaagis. Goday Gibxe kawa bolla, iya olanchota bollanne iya biitta ubbaa bolla oothidabaanne gathidaba hinte, hinte ayfen be7ideta.
DEU 29:3 Enta bolla gathida iita metota, malaalsiyabatanne gita malaatata hinte, hinte ayfen be7ideta.
DEU 29:4 Shin hachi gakanaw Goday, hintew akeekiya wozana, xeelliya ayfenne si7iya haythi immibeenna.
DEU 29:5 Goday oytamu laythi kumethi hintena mela biittan kaalethiya wode hinte ma7oy wuribeenna, hinte caammay cimibeenna.
DEU 29:6 Goday, hinte Xoossaa gideysa hinte erana mela uythi mibeeketa; woyne woyko hara mathoyiya ushshi uyibeeketa.
DEU 29:7 Nuuni ha bessa gakida wode Haseboona Kawoy Sihooninne Baasane Kawoy Oogey nuura oletanaw keyidosona, shin nuuni enta xoonida.
DEU 29:8 Enta biitta ekidi, Robeelanne Gaade kochaas, qassi Minaase kochaafe baggaas laata oothidi immida.
DEU 29:9 Hinte oykiyabaynne yedhiyabay hintew anjetana mela ha caaqo qaalata ammanetidi naagite.
DEU 29:10 Hachi hinte ubbay, kochata halaqati, cimati, shuumatinne Isra7eele asa ubbay haysan Godaa sinthan eqideta.
DEU 29:11 Hinte naytara, hinte machetara, hinte giddon de7idi, mithi mixiyanne haathe tikiya hara biitta asaara issife haysan eqideta.
DEU 29:12 Godaa, hinte Xoossara qaala gelanaw haysan eqideta. Goday ha qaala hachi hintera caaqon minthana.
DEU 29:13 Goday hintena ba ase oothidi minthana; hintewunne hinte mayzatas, Abrahaames, Yisaaqasinne Yayqoobas caaqidaysada I hintew Xoosse gidana.
DEU 29:14 Goday ha caaqo qaala essey hinte xalaalara gidenna.
DEU 29:15 Hachi haysan, Godaa, nu Xoossaa sinthan eqida nu ubbaaranne sinthafe yaana yeleta ubbaara essees.
DEU 29:16 Nuuni Gibxen waanidi de7idaakonne ha77i gakanaw ogen de7iya kawotethata giddora waanidi kanthidi yidaako ereeta.
DEU 29:17 Enta giddon de7iya ixetida mitha, shucha, biranne worqa eeqa misileta be7ideta.
DEU 29:18 Ha hintefe oonika adde gidin macca gidin, issi soo asi gidin, issi kochi gidin Godaa, nu Xoossaafe, haakidi hara kawotethata xoossata goyinnona mela naagetite. Hessa mela cammiyanne wodhiya ayfe ayfiya asi hinte giddon de7opo.
DEU 29:19 Ha caaqo qaala si7idi, ba wozanan, “Ta shenen taani biikoka, metoy baawa” yaagidi bana cimmiko, hessa mela asi lo77ota bollanne iitata bolla dhayo ehees.
DEU 29:20 Godaa hanqoynne qanaatey hessa mela ase bolla eexidi keyana. Ha maxaafan xaafetida baadethi ubbay iya bolla yaana; salope garsan iya suntha Goday quchana.
DEU 29:21 Goday ha higge maxaafan xaafetida baadetha caaqo qaalada he uraa Isra7eele giddofe shaakidi dhaysana.
DEU 29:22 Yaana yeletethay, hinte sheeshaynne haaho biittafe yaa hara biitta asay, Goday hinte bolla ehida gaduwanne hargiya be7ana.
DEU 29:23 Biitta ubbay diinneninne maxinen kumana; toketiyabay deenna; doliyabay bentenna; maatinne mithi dolenna. Goday ba hanqon dhaysida Soodomadanne Gamoorada, Adaamadanne Xaboyma katamatada hanana.
DEU 29:24 Kawotethati, “Goday ha biitta bolla haysa melaba ayis oothidee? Ha wolqaama hanquwas gaasoy aybee?” yaagana.
DEU 29:25 Asay zaaridi, “Enti Goday, enta aawata Xoossay, enta Gibxefe kessida wode entara gelida caaqo qaala menthida gishosa.
DEU 29:26 Enti eronna xoossatasinne I goyinnofite gida xoossata goyinnidosona.
DEU 29:27 Hessa gisho, Goday hanqetidi, ha maxaafan xaafetida baadethata ubbaa enta bolla ehis.
DEU 29:28 Goday wolqaama hanqo hanqetidi, enta biittafe entana shoddidi hara biitta yedethis” yaagana.
DEU 29:29 Xuuray nu Godaa nu Xoossasa, shin nuuni ha higge qaala oothana mela qoncidaysati merinaw nuusanne nu naytasa.
DEU 30:1 Hachi ta ne sinthan wothida anjoynne baadethay ne bolla gakiya wode Goday, ne Xoossay nena laaliya hara kawotethata giddon de7ishe haysa ne akeekiko,
DEU 30:2 nenne ne nayti Godaa, ne Xoossaako, simmada, ne kumetha wozanapenne ne kumetha shempuwafe taani hachi nena kiittiya higgiyas kiitetiko,
DEU 30:3 yan Goday, ne Xoossay ne di7etida biittafe nena zaarana. I hintew qadhetidi hintena laallida kawotethata ubbaa giddofe zaaridi shiishana.
DEU 30:4 Biitta gaxape gaxa gakanaw ne laaletikoka, yaape Goday, ne Xoossay nena zaaridi shiishana.
DEU 30:5 Ne aawati kase laattida biitta, neka laattana mela Goday, ne Xoossay nena he biitta ehana. Yan nena ne aawatape aathidi dureyana; ne taybuwa darsana.
DEU 30:6 Ne de7on daana melanne Godaa, ne Xoossaa ne kumetha wozanapenne ne kumetha shempuwafe dosana mela I newunne ne naytas kiitetiya wozana immana.
DEU 30:7 Goday, ne Xoossay ha baadethata ubbaa ne morketanne nena gooddeyisata bolla ehana.
DEU 30:8 Hachi ta nena kiittiya higgiya ne naagana; zaarada Godaas, ne Xoossaas kiitetana.
DEU 30:9 He wode Goday ne Xoossay nena ne kushe ooso ubban, ne ulo ayfiyan, mehiyaninne ne goshsha ayfiyan nena darsidi anjana. Goday kase ne aawata anjidi ufaytidaysada nena anjidi ufaytana.
DEU 30:10 Hessi hananay ha higge maxaafan xaafetida Godaa, ne Xoossaa higgiyanne wogaa naagada, Godaa, ne Xoossaako ne kumetha wozanapenne ne kumetha shempuwafe simmiko.
DEU 30:11 Hachi ta nena kiittiya kiitati hessa mela deexo gidokona; neepe haakokona.
DEU 30:12 Neeni, “Nuuni si7idi kiitetana mela salo keyidi nuus wodhisanay oonee?” goonna mela salona gidenna.
DEU 30:13 “Nuuni si7idi kiitetana mela nuus abba pinnidi ehanay oonee?” goonna mela abbaafe hefinthana gidenna.
DEU 30:14 Qaalay new daro matan de7ees; ne oothana mela qaalay ne wozanaaninne ne doonan de7ees.
DEU 30:15 Heko, ta hachi ne sinthan de7onne lo77otethi, hayqonne dhayo wothas.
DEU 30:16 Ne Godaa, ne Xoossaa dosiko, iya ogiyan biiko, iya kiitaa, iya awaajuwanne iya higgiya naagiko, ne de7on daananne darana. Ne laattanaw geliya biittan Goday, ne Xoossay nena anjana.
DEU 30:17 Shin ne wozanay Godaape haakin, iyaw kiitetonna ixada, hara xoossatas gufannada enta goyinniko,
DEU 30:18 hinte ubbay dhayanaysa ta hachi hintew odayis. Yordaanose pinnidi hinte laattanaw biya biittan hinte laythay aduqenna.
DEU 30:19 Ta hinte sinthan de7onne hayqo, anjonne baadethi wothidaysas hachi salonne sa7a hinte bolla markayana. Hiza hintenne hinte sheeshay de7on daana mela de7o doorite.
DEU 30:20 Godaa ne Xoossaa dosa; iya qaala si7a, iyaw kiiteta; iyara oyketa. Hessada haniko, Goday kase ne mayzatas, Abrahaames, Yisaaqasinne Yayqoobas immanaw caaqida biittan nenne ne sheeshay adussa laythi daana.
DEU 31:1 Musey ba odaa wursidaape guye Isra7eele asaako haysada yaagis;
DEU 31:2 “Ha77i taw xeetanne laatamu laythi gidida gisho, hizape guye kaalethanaw danda7ike. Goday taako, ‘Ne Yordaanose pinnaka’ yaagis.
DEU 31:3 Goday, ne Xoossay ne sinthe aadhidi nena kaalethana. Yan de7iya kawotethata I dhaysana gisho, enta biitta ne laattana. Goday gidaysada Iyyasuy hintena kaalethana.
DEU 31:4 Goday Amoore kawota Sihoonanne Ooge xoonidi, enta biitta dhaysidaysada hinte morketa hessada oothana.
DEU 31:5 Goday enta hintew aathidi immin, hinte enta bolla ta hintena kiittidaysada oothana.
DEU 31:6 Minnite; gencite; yayyofite. Enta be7idi dagammopite. Goday hinte Xoossay hintera gidana; I hintena yeggenna, aggenna” yaagis.
DEU 31:7 Musey Iyyasu xeegidi, Isra7eele asaa ubbaa sinthan haysada yaagis; “Minna; genca. Ne ha asaara issife Goday enta mayzatas immana gidi caaqida biitta gelaasa; he biitta enta laatisaasa.
DEU 31:8 Goday, I ba huuphen neera gididi nena kaalethana. I nena yeggenna; aggenna. Hessa gisho, yayyofa; ufaysi qanxofa” yaagis.
DEU 31:9 Musey ha higgiya xaafidi, Godaa qaala caaqo Taabotiya tookiya kahine gidida Leewe naytasinne Isra7eele cimatas immis.
DEU 31:10 Musey entako, “Aco ubbay atto geetetiya laapuntha laytha wursethan, Shaqara Ba7aaley bonchetiya gallas, ha higgiya dhoqu oothidi nabbabite.
DEU 31:11 Godaa, hinte Xoossaa sinthan, I doorida bessan, iya goyinnanaw Isra7eele asa ubbay shiiqiya wode entaw nabbabite.
DEU 31:12 Enti ubbay si7idi, Godaa, hinte Xoossaas yashshi tamaarana mela ha higge qaala ubbaa naagana mela addeta, maccasata, naytanne hinte biittan de7iya hara biitta asaa issife shiishite.
DEU 31:13 Ha higge qaala eronna enta naytika Yordaanose pinnidi, hinte laattanaw biya biittan, hinte de7iya laytha ubban ha higgiya si7o; Godaas, hinte Xoossaas, yashshi tamaaro” yaagidi kiittis.
DEU 31:14 Goday Museko, “Ne hayqiya wodey matis. I kaalethana wogaa ta iyaw immana mela Iyyasu xeegada, iyara issife Dunkaaniya penge shiiqite” yaagin, Museynne Iyyasuy Dunkaaniya pengiyako shiiqidosona.
DEU 31:15 Goday Dunkaaniya pengen eqida shaara tuussan entaw qoncis.
DEU 31:16 Goday Museko, “Neeni mata wode hayqada ne aawatan gahetaasa. Neepe guye, ha asay taw ammanetonayisata gidana; ta entara gelida caaquwa menthana. Enti tana aggidi, banta laattiya biittan de7iya eeqata kaallana.
DEU 31:17 Hessi haniya wode ta hanqoy enta bolla eexana; ta enta aggaagana; ta som7uwa entafe hara soo zaarana. Enti dhayana; iita metoynne dhayoy enta bolla yaana. He wode enti, ‘Tuma ha metoy nuna gakiday nu Xoossay nu giddon bayna gisho gidennee?’ yaagana.
DEU 31:18 Hara xoossata goyinnidi, enti oothida iita oosuwa gisho, ta he gallas ta som7uwa entafe hara soo zaarana.
DEU 31:19 “Ha77i ha mazmuriya xaafada, Isra7eele asaa ubbaa tamaarsa. Ha mazmurey taw Isra7eele asaa bolla marka gidana mela enta yexisa.
DEU 31:20 Enta mayzatas gelida qaalada, maathinne eessi goggiya biitta ta enta gelsa simmin, enti mi kallidi goobidaape guye, hara xoossata goyinnidi, tana kadhana; ta caaquwa menthana.
DEU 31:21 Daro metoynne dhayoy enta bolla gakida wode ha mazmurey enta naytape baletonna gisho, enta bolla marka gidana. Taani caaqida biitta enta buroo gelsonna de7ishin, haara enti qopiya qofaa taani erayis” yaagis.
DEU 31:22 Musey he gallas mazmuriya xaafidi, Isra7eele asaa tamaarsis.
DEU 31:23 Hessafe guye, Goday Nawe na7aa Iyyasuko, “Minna, genca; ta entaw immanaw qaala gelida biitta Isra7eele asaa efada gelsa. Ta neera gidana” yaagis.
DEU 31:24 Musey ha higgeta koyrope wursethi gakanaw xaafidi wursidaape guye,
DEU 31:25 Godaa, Qaala caaqo Taabotiya tookiya Leeweta haysada yaagidi kiittis;
DEU 31:26 “Godaa higgey xaafetida ha maxaafa efidi, Godaa, hinte Xoossaa Qaala caaqo Taabotiya matan wothite. Yan I hinte bolla marka gidana.
DEU 31:27 Hinte ay mela geellekonne wozana iiteko ta erayis. Tuma, ta hintera de7ida laytha ubban hinte Godaas makallata, shin ta hayqin, ubba hintte waanidi makallandetii?
DEU 31:28 Hessa gisho, haysa ubbaa ta entaw odanawunne salonne sa7a ta enta bolla markayanaw hinte kochaa halaqatanne deriya kaalethiya asaa ubbaa taw shiishite.
DEU 31:29 Ta hayqidaape guye, hinte tuma iita ase gidanaysanne taani hintena tamaarsida kiitaape hara soo simmanaysa taani erayis. Hinte iya sinthan iitabaa oothidi, Godaa yiloyiya gisho, wodepe I hinte bolla iita gado ehana” yaagis.
DEU 31:30 Hessafe guye, Musey ha mazmure qaalata wurana gakanaw shiiqida Isra7eele maabara ubbaa nabbabidi sissis.
DEU 32:1 Saloto, taani odeysa si7ite; biittay ta doona qaala hayzo.
DEU 32:2 Ta timirtey ira mela buko; ta qaalay akada wodho. Maata bolla wodhiya xaasada dola bolla wodhiya puuseda wodho.
DEU 32:3 Taani Godaa sunthaa awaajana; gitatetha nu Xoossaas immite.
DEU 32:4 I nu Zaalla; iya oosoy polo; iya ogey suure. Xoossay ammantheysa; wordoy baynaysa; I tumanchonne suure.
DEU 32:5 Iya sinthan banta tunatethaa bessidosona; enti iya na7a gidokona; enti iitanne geella yeletethi.
DEU 32:6 Hinteno, eeyanne akeeki bayna asaw, hinte Godaas immiya zaaroy haysee? I hintena medhida hinte Aawa gidennee? hintena medhidi minthi essiday iya gidennee?
DEU 32:7 Beni wodiya qopa; aadhida yeletethaa akeeka. Ne aawa oycha; I new odana; cimata oycha; enti new qoncisana.
DEU 32:8 Ubbaafe Wolqaamay kawotethatas enta laata shaakida wode, asa zerethika dummayida wode, Isra7eele asaa taybuwa mela, asaas enta zawa essis.
DEU 32:9 Godaa gakida gishoy Isra7eele; Yayqoobi iya gakida laata.
DEU 32:10 I enta mela biittan, aykoy bayna mela biittan, carkoy baqishin demmis. Iyaw gondalle gidis, iya naagis; ba ayfe na77eda minthidi naagis.
DEU 32:11 Arganthi ba na7a paalo tamaarseysada, ba miccida qefiyan gakidi ashsheysada, Goday ba qefiyan haphidi enta ashshis.
DEU 32:12 Goday ba xalaala enta kaalethis; hara allaga xoossi iyara baawa.
DEU 32:13 I biittas dhoqa bessaa enta kessis; goshsha ayfiya enta muzis. Zaalla qophope enta eessi kalsis; shucha biittafe bentiya zayte ushshis.
DEU 32:14 Enta mehiyape qeesa maathi, dorsafenne deeshape xamaata maathi, modho dorsenne deesha asho midosona. Baasane dorsaanne deesha ashuwa, lo77o giste uythara midosona; suuthi daaniya woyne ushsha uyidosona.
DEU 32:15 Shin Isra7eeley ordis; makallis; midi kallidi moollotis. Bana medhida Xoossaa aggis; ba Atotethaa Zaalla kawushis.
DEU 32:16 Enti allaga xoossata goyinnidi, iya qanaatisidosona. Ixetida banta eeqatan iya hanqethidosona.
DEU 32:17 Xoosse gidonaysatas, kase enti eronna xoossatas, zine dendidaysatas, enta aawati goyinniboona xoossatas yarshidosona.
DEU 32:18 Entaw de7o immiya Zaalla dogidosona; yelidi dichida Xoossa aggidosona.
DEU 32:19 Adde naytinne macca nayti iya yiloyidosona; Goday hessa be7idi enta kadhis.
DEU 32:20 I, “Enti geellanne ammanetona dere gidiya gisho, taani ta som7uwa entafe genthana; enta wursethaa si77i gada be7ana” yaagis.
DEU 32:21 Xoosse gidonaysatan tana qanaatisidosona; banta eeqatan tana yiloyidosona. Taani enta kadhetida asan qanaatisana; eeya asan enta yiloyana.
DEU 32:22 Ta hanqoy tamada eexana; Si7oole gakanaw xuuggana. Biittan de7iyaba ubbaa maana, deriya baasuwa gakanaw xuuggana.
DEU 32:23 “Taani enta bolla meto doorana; ta dongiyan enta dukana.
DEU 32:24 Ta enta bolla iita kosha yeddana; enti hargeninne gadon wurana. Enta bolla iita bazzo do7atanne dukidi wodhiya iita shooshata yeddana.
DEU 32:25 Enta, mashshi oge bolla wursana; keetha garsan dagami kawotana. Na7atetha addetinne maccati wurana; guutha naytinne cimati attokona.
DEU 32:26 Ta enta dhaysanawunne enta hassayiya asi doonna mela oothanaw qopas.
DEU 32:27 Shin enta morketi, ‘Xooniday nuna; ha ubbaa oothiday Godaa gidenna; yaagidi otoron ceeqetonna mela gada aggaagas’ ” yaagis.
DEU 32:28 Isra7eele asay wozani bayna asi; enti akeekokona.
DEU 32:29 Enti cincidi akeekidako haysa erana, banta wursethaka shaakanashin.
DEU 32:30 Goday enta Xoossay enta bayzonaako, enta medhida Wolqaamay aathidi immonaako, waatidi issi asi mukulu asaa, num7u asi tammu mukulu asaa xoonii?
DEU 32:31 Nu Zaallay nu morketa zaalla mela gidonnaysa enti eroosona.
DEU 32:32 Enta woyney Soodome woyniyape yees, enti Gamoora goshshan dolidosona; ayfiyan marzeynne camoy kumis.
DEU 32:33 Enta woyney shoosha marze; wodhiya soggo.
DEU 32:34 Goday, “Ta hessa dogadina? Ta mazgaben xaafabikina?
DEU 32:35 Entaw dhayo gallasi matis; enta bolla gakanabay ellesees. He wode enta tohoy dhubetana; ta halo keyananne kushe zaarana.”
DEU 32:36 Enta wolqay wuridaysanne enta maaddiya asi baynaysa be7ida wode, Goday ba asaas pirdana; ba aylletas qadhetana.
DEU 32:37 Xoossay entako, “Enti ammanetiya enta xoossati awunee? Enti baqatidi qosetiya enta zaallay awunee?” yaagana.
DEU 32:38 Enta modho yarshuwa midaysati, enta woyne ushsha yarshuwa uydaysati, ha77i dendidi enta maaddo; enta asho.
DEU 32:39 “Tuma, Godi tana; Xoossi ta xalaala; taape attishin, hara Xoossi baawa. Wodheynne paathey tana; ta madunxisayis; ta pathayis; ta kushepe oonika ashshena.
DEU 32:40 Ta kushiya denthada haysada yaagana; Taani merinaw de7o;
DEU 32:41 Phooliya ta mashsha leefada, pirdanaw ta kushen oykiya wode, ta morketa bolla ta halo keyana; tana ixeysatas kushe zaarana.
DEU 32:42 Ta dongey enta suuthan mathotana; ta mashshay enta ashuwa maana. Tana ixiya ubbaa maarike; madunxidaysatinne di7etidaysati hayqana.”
DEU 32:43 Kawotethato, Godaa asaara ufaytite; I ba aylleta suutha accana. Ba morketa bolla halo keyana; biittan de7iya ba asaa nagaraa atto gaana.
DEU 32:44 Museynne Nawe na7ay Iyyasuy Isra7eele asaa shiishidi, ha mazmuriya ubbaa asay si7ishin yexidosona.
DEU 32:45 Musey ha qaala ubbaa Isra7eele asaas odi wursidaape guye,
DEU 32:46 entako, “Ha higge qaala ubbaa hinte nayti naagana melanne kiitetana mela hachi ta hintew marka oothada immiya qaala ubbaa hinte wozanan wothite.
DEU 32:47 Ha qaalay hintew de7ope attishin, coo qaala gidenna. Hinte ha qaala naagiko, Yordaanose pinnidi laattana biittan adussa laythi daana” yaagis.
DEU 32:48 He gallas Goday Muse haysada yaagis;
DEU 32:49 “Moo7aben, Iyaarko katamape sintha baggara de7iya Abariima Zumatape issuwa gidida Nabo Zuma bolla keya; yan Isra7eele asaa ta laatisana, Kanaane biitta haahon xeella.
DEU 32:50 Ne ishaa Aaroni Hoora Zuma bolla hayqidi, ba mayzata gakidaysada neka ha zumaa bolla hayqada ne mayzata gakana.
DEU 32:51 Hinte nam7ay Isra7eele asaa sinthan taw ammanetibeketa. Siina mela biittan, Qaadesa matan de7iya Mariba haatha matan ta geeshshatetha Isra7eele asaa bessibeketa.
DEU 32:52 Hessa gisho, neeni he biitta haahon xeellanaape attishin, ta Isra7eele asaa laatisana biitta gelaka” yaagis.
DEU 33:1 Xoossa asi gidida Musey hayqanaape sinthe, Isra7eele asaa anjida anjo qaalay haysa.
DEU 33:2 Musey, “Goday Siina zumaape yis; Sayre zumaape nu bolla poo7is. Paarana zumaape phoolis. Mukulan taybetiya kiitanchoti iyara de7oosona; Iya ushachan tama lacoy de7ees.
DEU 33:3 Godaw neeni ne asaa dosadasa; Geeshshati ubbay ne kushen de7oosona. Ne tohuwa garsan ubbay gulbatidi goyinnoosona; neepe kiita ekoosona.
DEU 33:4 Musey immida higgiya Isra7eele asaa laata ekoosona.
DEU 33:5 Isra7eele zerethati deriya halaqatara shiiqida wode, Goday ba asaa, Isra7eele bolla kawotis.
DEU 33:6 “Robeela kochay taybon guutha gidikoka, I hayqofo; paxa de7o.”
DEU 33:7 Musey Yihuda kochaaba, “Godaw, Yihuda waasuwa si7a; hanko iya yaratara iya bu7a. Enta kushiya minthetha; enti banta morketara oletiya wode enta maadda.
DEU 33:8 Musey Leewe kochaaba, ne Tumiimeynne Uriimey, neeni Masahan paacidanne Mariban palamida, ne geeshsha asaasa.
DEU 33:9 Bantana yelidaysatape, banta ishatapenne banta naytape aathidi, enti new ammanetidosona; ne caaqo qaala naagidosona.
DEU 33:10 Enti ne wogaa Yayqooba, ne higgiya Isra7eele tamaarsoosona. Enti ne sinthan ixaane cuyisoosona; yarsho bessan xuussa yarsho yarshoosona.
DEU 33:11 Abeeti Godaw, Leeweta anja; enta kushe oosuwan ne ufayta. Enta bolla dendiya morketa mentheretha zaari dendonna mela enta morketa cadda.”
DEU 33:12 Biniyaame kochaaba, “Godan dosetiday iyan ammanetidi de7ees; qamma gallas I enta naagees; ba hashiyan tookidi shempisees.”
DEU 33:13 Yoosefa kochaaba, “Goday, salope iran, sa7ape pulto haathan enta biitta anjo.
DEU 33:14 Awan kaxidi dooretida ayfeninne woden woden kaxiya ayfen anjeto.
DEU 33:15 Benipe de7iya deretinne zumati lo77o ayfen anjeto.
DEU 33:16 Enta biittay lo77obay kumida biitta gido; tushiya giddon eexiya taman qoncida Goday iya anjo. Ha anjoti ubbay Yoosefa kochaa gako; I ba ishata giddon halaqa gido.
DEU 33:17 Yoosefi koyro yeletida kormada mino; iya kaceti mentha kaceda mino. Iya kaceti tammu mukulan taybetiya Efreema kochata; mukulun taybetiya Minaase kochata. He kacetan I kawotethata qaycana; biitta gaxaa gakanaw I enta sugana.”
DEU 33:18 Zabloona kochaaba, “Zabloona, neeni ne kessan ufayta; Yisaakora, neeni ne dunkaaniyan ufayta.
DEU 33:19 Enti asaa banta zumako xeegana; yan enti geeshshatetha yarsho yarshana. Banta aquwanne banta duretetha, abbaafenne abba gaxan de7iya shafiyape demmana” yaagis.
DEU 33:20 Gaade kochaaba, “Enta biitta dalgisida Goday galatetto; Gaadi morke som7o woyko qese menthanaw, gaammoda naagees.
DEU 33:21 Enti lo77o biitta bantaw dooridosona; halaqatas gida biitta enti ekidosona. Isra7eele halaqati shiiqida wode, Godaa geeshsha sheniya shaakidi eridosona Isra7eeles suure pirdaa pirdidosona” yaagis.
DEU 33:22 Daane kochaaba, “Daaney wodala gaammo mela; I Baasanepe gupidi keyana” yaagis.
DEU 33:23 Niftaaleme kochaaba, “Niftaalemey Godaa aadho keehatethan, iya anjuwan duretis; enta biittay Abbaafe dugeha bagga gakees” yaagis.
DEU 33:24 Aseera kochaaba, “Aseeri hara kochatape aadhidi anjetidaysa; ba ishatan dosetidaysa gido; iya biittay shamaho zayten dureto.
DEU 33:25 Iya katamati birata pengen gordetidi naageto; ba laytha ubban I wolqaama gido.
DEU 33:26 Isra7eele, salope nena maaddanaw, ba gitatethan shaara bolla hemetiya, ne Xoossaa mela xoossi oonee?
DEU 33:27 Merinaa Xoossay ne de7iya bessi; iya merinaa kusheti neepe garsara de7oosona. I ne morketa ne sinthafe kessidi, ‘enta dhaysa’ yaagis.
DEU 33:28 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele kochay, salo iray bukiya bessan, kathinne woyney kumida biittan, hirgi bayna saro daana.
DEU 33:29 Isra7eele, ne anjetadaysa; Goday ashshida ne meli oonee? I new gondallenne maaddiya mashsha; ne morketi ne sinthan gufannana; ne enta baasuwa laallana” yaagis.
DEU 34:1 Musey Moo7abe dembaafe dendidi, Nabo zuma huuphiya, qassi Iyaarkofe doloha baggara de7iya Pisga zuma huuphiya gakis. Yan Goday Daane gakanaw de7iya Galada biitta,
DEU 34:2 Niftaaleme biitta ubbaa, Efreemenne Minaase biitta, wuloha baggara bidi Medetiraane Abbaa gakanaw de7iya Yihuda biittanne
DEU 34:3 dugeha baggara Zo7aarepe dendidi, zambi de7iya Iyaarko katamaa, zangaaran de7iya demba ubbaa bessis.
DEU 34:4 Goday Museko, “Taani hinte sheeshas immana gada Abrahaames, Yisaaqasinne Yayqoobas, caaqida biittay haysa. Ha77i neeni ne ayfen be7ana mela oothas, shin neeni yaa pinnaka” yaagis.
DEU 34:5 Godaa aylley, Musey, Goday gidaysada, yan Moo7abe biittan hayqis.
DEU 34:6 Goday Beet-Pa7oora katamaape sintha baggan Moo7abe zangaaran iya moogis. Shin hachi gakanaw I moogetida duufuwa eriya asi baawa.
DEU 34:7 Musey hayqiya wode iyaw laythi xeetanne laatama; shin iya ayfey ixibeenna; iya wolqay daaburibeenna.
DEU 34:8 Isra7eele asay Moo7abe denban hastamu gallas Muses yeekidosona. Hessafe guye, baley dendin, yeeho wodey wuris.
DEU 34:9 Musey, ba bessan oothana mela, iya bolla ba kushiya wothida gisho, Nawe na7ay Iyyasuy cincatetha ayyaanan kumis. Isra7eele asay Iyyasus kiitetidosona; Goday Muse baggara immida kiita naagidosona.
DEU 34:10 Godaa som7on odisida, Muse mela nabey, Isra7eele biittan dendibeenna.
DEU 34:11 Goday Muse Gibxe kawako, iyara oothiya moorinnatakonne kumetha asaako yeddidi, iya baggara malaatatanne malaalsiyabata ubbaa oothida, Muse mela hara nabey oonika baawa.
DEU 34:12 Isra7eele ubbaa sinthan gita wolqan malaalsiyaba oothida, Muse mela asi oonika baawa.
JOS 1:1 Godaa aylley Musey hayqidaape guye, Goday Muse maaddiya Nawe na7aa Iyyasu, haysada yaagis.
JOS 1:2 “Ta aylley, Musey hayqis. Hessa gisho, neeranne ha asa ubbay dendidi, taani Isra7eele asaas immanaw de7iya biitta gelanaw, Yordaanose shaafa pinnite.
JOS 1:3 Taani Muses odidaysada, hinte tohoy yedhiyaso ubba hintew immas.
JOS 1:4 Hinte zaway dugeha Negebe mela biittafe dendidi, pudehan de7iya Libaanose zuma gakanaasa. Qassi doloha baggan de7iya Efraxiisa wogga shaafape dendidi, Hiteta biitta ubba ekidi wuloha baggan de7iya Medetrane abba gakanaasa.
JOS 1:5 Iyyasu, ne laytha ubban oonika neera eqetanaw danda7ena. Taani Musera gididaysada, neeraka gidana. Taani nena yeggike; aggike.
JOS 1:6 Aykoy baawa minna. Taani enta mayzatas immana gada caaqida biitta neeni ha asaa laatisana.
JOS 1:7 Aykoy baawa minna. Ta aylley Musey new immida higgiya ubbaa minthada naaga. Neeni biya bessa ubban new injetana mela iyape ushachi woyko haddirsi goopa.
JOS 1:8 Ha higge maxaafay ne doonape shaaketofo. Iyan xaafetidaba ubbaa minthada naaganaw gallasinne qamma iya qopa. Hessa ne oothiko, new ubbabay injetananne poletana.
JOS 1:9 Ne biya bessa ubban taani Goday ne Xoossay neera de7iya gisho, babofa; hirgofa; yaagada new odayis” yaagis.
JOS 1:10 Hessafe guye, Iyyasuy deriya halaqata haysada yaagis;
JOS 1:11 “Asay dunkaanidi de7iya guta bidi, heedzu gallasa garsan, ‘Goday, hinte Xoossay, hintew immiya biitta laattanaw Yordaanose shaafa pinniya gisho, hintew shinqe giigisite’ yaagidi deriyas odite” yaagis.
JOS 1:12 Iyyasuy, Robeelanne Gaade kochata qassi Minaase kochatape bagga haysada yaagis;
JOS 1:13 “Goday, hinte Xoossay, hintena shempisana, ha biittaa hintew immana yaagidi, Godaa aylley Musey odidaysa qopite.
JOS 1:14 Hinte macheti, hinte naytinne hinte mehey Yordaanose Shaafape hafinthan Musey hintew immida biittan de7ishshona. Shin hinte olanchoti banta ola miishiya oykidi, hinte asaape sinthatidi, oletanaw Yordaanose shaafa pinnona.
JOS 1:15 Goday hintena shempisidaysada, entaka shempisana gakanawunne Goday hinte Xoossay entaw immiya biitta enti laattana gakanaw, enta maaddite; oletite. Yaatidi, simmi yidi, Yordaanose Shaafape hafinthan doloha baggan, Godaa aylley Musey immida hinte buzo biittan de7ite” yaagis.
JOS 1:16 Enti zaaridi Iyyasuko, “Ne nuna kiitida ubbaa nuuni oothana; ne kiittiyaso ubbaa baana.
JOS 1:17 Nuuni Muses ubbaban kiitetidaysada, newuka kiitetana. Goday, ne Xoossay Musera gididaysada, neeraka gido.
JOS 1:18 Neera eqeteynne ne kiita ixiya oonika de7iko, hayqo. Gidoshin neeni minna” yaagidosona.
JOS 2:1 Nawe na7ay Iyyasuy, biitta wochi be7iya nam7u asata Seexima geetetiya bessaafe qosan kiittishe, “Bidi biitta wochite; qassi Iyaarko katama dummayidi wochite” yaagidi kiittis. Enti bidi, Raabo geetetiya laymatethan aqiya ase soo aqanaw gelidosona.
JOS 2:2 Iyaarko kawoy, “Isra7eele asape kiitetidaysati ha biitta wochanaw hachi qamma yidosona” giya odaa si7is.
JOS 2:3 Yaatin, Iyaarko kawoy Raabiko, “Ne soo gelida asati biitta wochanaw yida asi gidiya gisho, entana kessada imma” yaagidi kiittis.
JOS 2:4 Shin maccasiya he nam7u asata qottada, “Ee asati taako yidosona, shin enti awupe yidaako ta erike.
JOS 2:5 Omarsi katama pengiya gordana haniya wode, enti keyidi bidosona. Enti awu bidaako ta erike. Ellesidi enta hinte kaalliko, oykana” yaagada entaw odasu.
JOS 2:6 Shin iya asata dasa bolla kessada talba coyna giddon qosasu.
JOS 2:7 Yaatin, kawoy kiitida asati wocheyisata koyishe, Yordaanose Shaafa pinthiya ogiya gakanaw bidosona. Enti katamaape buroo keyida mela katama pengey gordetis.
JOS 2:8 Wocheysati dhiskanaape kasetada, iya entako keyada,
JOS 2:9 haysada yaagasu; “Goday ha biitta hintew immidaysa ta erayis. Gaasoyka, hintefe dendidaysan gita yashshan asa ubbay til7is.
JOS 2:10 Gibxe biittafe hinte keyida wode, Goday hinte sinthan Zo7o Abbaa waati melisidaako nu si7ida. Qassi Yordaanose Shaafape doloha baggara de7iya Amoore kawota nam7ata, Sihoonanne Ooge hinte waatidi wodhidakonne enta katama waatidi dhaysidaako nu si7ida.
JOS 2:11 Nuuni hessa si7ida wode, nu wozanay yashshan til7is. Hiza, hinte Goday, Xoossay saluwaka sa7aaka haareysi iya gideysa nu erida.
JOS 2:12 Hessa gisho, ta hintew keehidaysada hinte ta aawa soo asaas keehanaada Godaa sunthan caaqite. Hessas ammanthiya malla taw immite.
JOS 2:13 Ta aawanne ta aayiw, ta ishatanne ta micheta eta soo asaa ubbaa wodhoko gidi caaqite” yaagasu.
JOS 2:14 He asati zaaridi, “Nu new caaqida caaquwa polonna ixiko, Xoossay nuna wodho. Nu oothiyaba ne asas qoncisonna ixiko, Goday ha biitta nuus immiya wode, nuuni new ammanetananne keehana” yaagidosona.
JOS 2:15 Ra7aabi keethay katama gimbe dirsara oyketidi keexetida gisho, maskootiyara wodoro duge yeddada, entana duge wodhisasu.
JOS 2:16 Ra7aaba entako, “Hintena koyeysati demmonna mela deriyako, bidi enti simmana gakanaw yan heedzu gallas qosetite. Yaani simmidi, hinte biya bessa baanaw danda7eeta” yaagasu.
JOS 2:17 Asati zaaridi, “Nuuni ha biitta oykanaw geliya wode, ha zo7o wodoruwa ne nuna wodhisida maskootiyan qachonna ixikonne ne aawa, ne aayiw, ne ishatanne ne soo asa ubbaa ne soo shiishonna ixiko, ne nuna caaqisida caaqoy nuus gome gidenna.
JOS 2:19 Oonika ne soope kare keyidi hayqiko, hessi iya gome. Nuuni hessas oyshetoko. Neera son de7ishe oonika qohetiko, iya suuthaa gomey nuna gako.
JOS 2:20 Shin nu oothiyaba neeni asas qoncisiko neeni nuna caaqisida caaqoy nuus gome gidenna” yaagidosona.
JOS 2:21 Iya zaarada, “Hinte qaalada hano” gada enta moyzasu. Enti bidaape guye, he zo7o wodoruwa maskootiyan qachasu.
JOS 2:22 Enti deriyako bidi, enta koyeysati Iyaarko simmana gakanaw yan heedzu gallas qosetidosona. Enta koyeysati oge ubban koydosona, shin demmibookona.
JOS 2:23 Hessafe guye, he nam7u asati deriyape wodhidosona. Yordaanose pinnidi, Nawe na7aa Iyyasuko yidi, bantana gakidaba ubbaa odidosona.
JOS 2:24 Enti Iyyasuko, “Goday tuma he biittiw nuus aathidi immis. Qassi he biittan de7iya asa ubbay, nuus yayyidi til7idosona” yaagidosona.
JOS 3:1 Wontetha gallas, wonta guura Iyyasuynne asay Seexima geetetiya bessaafe dendidi, Yordaanose shaafa bidi, pinnonna yan dunkaanidosona.
JOS 3:2 Heedzu gallasape guye, halaqati enti dunkaanida guta gelidi,
JOS 3:3 “Leewe koche gidida kahineti tookida, Godaa, hinte Xoossaa caaqo taabotiya hinte be7ida wode dunkaanida gutaape dendidi enta kaallite.
JOS 3:4 Hinte kase ha ogiyara bidi eronna gisho, hinte baana ogiya enti bessaana. Shin caaqo taabotiyako shiiqopite. Hinte giddoninne caaqo taabotiya giddon nam7u mukulu wadha gidiya haahotethi de7o” yaagidi odidosona.
JOS 3:5 Iyyasuy asaako, “Goday wonto hinte giddon malaalsiyaba oothana gisho, hintenatethaa geeshshite” yaagis.
JOS 3:6 Qassi kahinetas, “Caaqo taabotiya tookidi, asape sinthe aadhite” yaagidi kiittis. Kahineti caaqo taabotiya tookidi, asape sinthe aadhidosona.
JOS 3:7 Goday Iyyasuko, “Taani Musera gididaysada, neeraka gidanaysa asa ubbay erana mela hachi Isra7eele ubbaa sinthan nena dhoqu dhoqu ooso doomana.
JOS 3:8 Neeni, caaqo taabotiya tookiya kahinetas, ‘Yordaanose shaafa doona gakiya wode haatha gido gelidi eqite’ gada kiita” yaagis.
JOS 3:9 Iyyasuy Isra7eele asaako, “Haa yidi Godaa, hinte Xoossaa qaala si7ite.
JOS 3:10 De7o Xoossay hinte giddon de7eysa hinte eranay, Kanaaneta, Hiteta, Hiweta, Parzeta, Gergeseta, Amooretanne Yaabuseta hinte sinthafe I gooddidi kesseysana.
JOS 3:11 Biitta ubba Godaa caaqo taabotey hintefe sinthatidi, Yordaanose shaafa pinnana.
JOS 3:12 Hiza tammanne nam7u Isra7eele zerethatape issi issi asi doorite.
JOS 3:13 Biitta ubba Godaa caaqo taabotiya tookida kahineta tohoy Yordaanose haatha yedhiya wode haathay eqana. Qommofe duge goggiya Yordaanose haathay issi bolla shiiqidi dooretana” yaagis.
JOS 3:14 Asay Yordaanose shaafa pinnanaw dunkaanida gutaape dendiya wode, caaqo taabotiya tookida kahineti asaa sinthan boosona.
JOS 3:15 Kathi shiishiya wode Yordaanose shaafay medhaysada kixikoka, caaqo taabotiya tookida kahineti Yordaanose shaafa gakidi, enta tohoy haatha gaxa yedhida wode,
JOS 3:16 qommofe duge goggiya haathay eqis. Zartaana matan de7iya Adaama katama gakanaw shiiqidi dooretis. Duge Hayqo abbaako goggiya haathay eqis. Yaanin, asay Iyaarko katama pinnidosona.
JOS 3:17 Isra7eele asay mela biittara pinnidi wurana gakanaw Godaa caaqo taabotiya tookida kahineti Yordaanose shaafa giddon mela biittan eqidosona.
JOS 4:1 Asa ubbay Yordaanose pinnidaape guye Goday Iyyasuko,
JOS 4:2 “Issi issi Isra7eele kochaafe issi issi asi ekada tammanne nam7u asata doora.
JOS 4:3 He asati Yordaanose shaafa giddon kahineti eqida bessaafe tammanne nam7u shuchata ekana melanne he shuchata hachi hinte dunkaanidi aqiya bessan wothana mela oda” yaagis.
JOS 4:4 Iyyasuy Isra7eele zerethatape dooretida tammanne nam7u asata xeegis.
JOS 4:5 Entako, “Godaa hinte Xoossaa caaqo taabotey de7iya bessa guye Yordaanose shaafa gelidi, issi issi Isra7eele zerethata taybon ubbay issi issi shuchi hinte hashen tookite.
JOS 4:6 Ha shuchati, Goday hachi oothidaba hintena qofisiya malaata gidana. Wonto hinte nayti, ‘Ha shuchati aybisee?’ yaagidi oychiya wode,
JOS 4:7 hinte zaaridi, ‘Godaa caaqo taabotey pinniya wode Yordaanose haathay gogethi aggis. Hessa gisho, ha shuchati ha bessan hanidaba Isra7eele asaa ubba wode qofisiyaba gidana’ ” yaagis.
JOS 4:8 He asati Iyyasuy kiitidaysada oothidosona. Goday Iyyasus odidaysada, Isra7eele zerethata taybon Yordaanose shaafape tammanne nam7u shuchata efidi, enti aqiya bessan wothidosona.
JOS 4:9 Iyyasuy, Kahineti Yordaanose shaafan caaqo taabotiya tookidi, eqida bessan tammanne nam7u shuchata essis. He shuchati hachi gakanaw yan de7oosona.
JOS 4:10 Musey Iyyasu kiitidaysa mela, Goday Iyyasu kiittidaba ubbay poletana gakanaw, caaqo taabotiya tookida kahineti Yordaanose shaafan eqidi gam7idosona. Asay ellesidi shaafa pinnidosona.
JOS 4:11 Asa ubbay, pinnidaape guye, Godaa caaqo taabotiya tookida kahineti asaape sinthe aadhidi kaalethidosona.
JOS 4:12 Musey kiitidaysada, Robeelanne Gaade kochati, qassi Minaase kochaafe baggay olas dancetidi, asaape sinthatidi pinnidosona.
JOS 4:13 Darotethan oytamu mukulu gidiya olanchoti, Godaa sinthan, Iyaarko matan de7iya denban oletanaw shiiqidosona.
JOS 4:14 He gallas, Goday Iyyasu Isra7eele asa ubbaa sinthan dhoqu dhoqu oothis. Enti Muse bonchidaysada Iyyasuka iya de7o laytha ubban bonchidosona.
JOS 4:15 Goday Iyyasuko,
JOS 4:16 “Caaqo taabotiya tookida kahineti Yordaanose shaafape keyana mela oda” yaagis.
JOS 4:17 Iyyasuy kahineti Yordaanose shaafape keyana mela odis.
JOS 4:18 Godaa caaqo taabotiya tookida kahineti Yordaanose shaafape keyidosona. Enta tohoy mela biitta yedhida wode ellesidi, Yordaanose haathay ba bessa simmidi, kase goggeysada gaxa gakidi gogethi oykis.
JOS 4:19 Asay koyro ageenan tammantho gallasan Yordaanose shaafa pinnidi, Iyaarkos doloha baggan de7iya Galgalan dunkaanidosona.
JOS 4:20 Iyyasuy Yordaanose shaafape eketida tammanne nam7u shuchata Galgalan essidi,
JOS 4:21 Isra7eele asaako haysada yaagis; “Wonto hinte nayti, ‘Ha shuchati aybisee?’ yaagidi hintena oychiya wode,
JOS 4:22 ‘Isra7eele asay Yordaanose shaafa mela biittara yedhidi pinnidaysa qofisiyaba’ yaagidi odeeta.
JOS 4:23 Nuuni pinnana gakanaw, Goday, nu Xoossay Zo7o Abbaa kase nu sinthan melisidaysada, hinteka pinnana gakanaw, Goday, hinte Xoossay Yordaanose shaafa hinte sinthan melisidaysa odite.
JOS 4:24 Hessa gisho, biittan de7iya asa ubbay, Godaa wolqay ay mela giteeko erana; hinteka Godaa, hinte Xoossaa, merinaw bonchana” yaagis.
JOS 5:1 Yordaanose shaafape wuloha baggan de7iya Amooreta kawotinne Medetiraane Abbaa lanqen de7iya Kanaaneta kawoti ubbay, Isra7eele asay pinnana gakanaw Yordaanose shaafa Goday waati melisidaako si7ida wode enta wozanay til7in, Isra7eele asaara eqetanaw xaalatethi dhayidosona.
JOS 5:2 He wode Goday Iyyasuko, “Salo shuchu qarayada Isra7eele adde asaa nam7antho qaxara” yaagis.
JOS 5:3 Iyyasuy qara salo shucha ekidi, “Qaxara Dere” geetetiya bessan Isra7eeleta qaxaris.
JOS 5:4 I hessa oothiday, Gibxefe keyda addetan laythi olas gakida ubbay mela biittan hayqi wurida gishosa.
JOS 5:5 Gibxefe keyida adde asa ubbay, qaxaretidosona, shin Gibxefe bishe mela biittan yeletida adde nayti qaxaretibookona.
JOS 5:6 Gibxefe keyiya wode laythi olas gakida adde asa ubbay Godaas kiitetonna ixida gisho, enti hayqidi wurana gakanaw Isra7eeleti mela biittan oytamu laythi yuuyidosona. Goday, nuus immana gidi enta mayzatas caaqida eessinne maathi goggiya aradda biittaa hayqida enta nayti laattonna mela kase caaqis.
JOS 5:7 Hessa gisho, Iyyasuy qaxariday Goday enta bessan denthida enta nayta. Enti oge bolla yeletida gisho qaxaretibookona.
JOS 5:8 Asa ubbay, qaxaretidaape guye, enta madunthay paxana gakanaw enti dunkaanida bessan gam7idosona.
JOS 5:9 Goday Iyyasuko, “Hachi taani Gibxeta boriya hintefe diggas” yaagis. Hessa gisho, he bessaa sunthay hachi gakanaw Galgala geetetidi xeegetees.
JOS 5:10 Isra7eele asay Iyaarko denban Galgala geetetiya bessan dunkaanidi, koyro ageenan tammanne oyddantho gallasan omarsi Paasika Baaliya bonchidosona.
JOS 5:11 Paasikape guye, wontetha gallas, he gadiyan dolida katha ayfiya, uythunne tiya caaca midosona.
