JOS 5:12 He gadiyan mokida kathaa enti mida wontetha gallas mannay wodheysa aggis. He wodepe doomidi Isra7eele asay manna demmibookona. Hessafe guye, enti Kanaanen kaxida katha midi de7idosona.
JOS 5:13 Iyyasuy Iyaarko matan de7iya wode mashsha oykidi ba sinthan eqida issi adde be7is. Iyyasuy iyako shiiqidi, “Neeni nu baggaye woyko nu morketa baggee?” yaagidi oychis.
JOS 5:14 Addey zaaridi, “Taani oodde baggaka gidike. Shin ta Godaa tora mocona gidada yas” yaagis. Iyyasuy sa7an kundi goyinnidi, “Ta godaw, ta oothanaba taw odaa” yaagis.
JOS 5:15 Godaa toora moconay Iyyasuko, “Neeni eqida bessay geeshshi gidiya gisho, ne tohuwape caammaa kessa” yaagis. Yaatin Iyyasuy I gidaysada oothis.
JOS 6:1 Isra7eele asaas yayyida gisho, Iyaarko katama gimbe dirsaa pengeti gordetidosona. Oonika katamaa gelanawunne keyanaw danda7enna.
JOS 6:2 Goday Iyyasuko, “Iyaarko katamaa iya kawaranne iya mino olanchotara ne kushen aatha immas.
JOS 6:3 Neeranne ne olanchotara salpidi, gallasan issi toho usupun gallas gakanaw, katamaa gimbe dirsaa yuushuwa yuuyite.
JOS 6:4 Laapun kahineti issoy issoy moyze oykidi, Godaa caaqo taabotiya sinthan boo. Laapuntha gallas kahineti moyze punniya wode hinte katamaa laapun toho yuuyite.
JOS 6:5 Kahineti moyze goochidi punuwa hinte si7iya wode, asa ubbay ellesidi banta qaala dhoqu oothidi waasso. Hessafe guye, katamaa gimbe dirsay kundana. He wode asa ubbay gido lawuhu gidi gelana” yaagis.
JOS 6:6 Nawe na7a Iyyasu kahineta xeegidi, “Godaa caaqo taabotiya tookite. Hintefe laapun kahineti moyze oykidi, caaqo taabotiyape sinthe aadhidi boo” yaagis.
JOS 6:7 Asaako qassi, “Bidi, katamaa yuushuwan yuuyite; olanchoti Godaa caaqo taabotiya sinthan hemetonna” yaagidi kiittis.
JOS 6:8 Iyyasuy odidaysada, laapun kahineti laapun moyze punnishe Godaa sinthan hemetidosona; qassi Godaa caaqo taabotey enta kaallis.
JOS 6:9 Olas dancidaysati moyze punniya kahineta sinthan hemetoosona. Kahineti qanxonna moyze punniya wode derey taabotiyape guyera kaallees.
JOS 6:10 Shin Iyyasuy, “Ta hintena waasso goonnashin waassofite woyko hinte qaala sissofite; hari attoshin issi qaalaka odetofite. Ta hintena waasso giya he gallas waassite” yaagidi asaa kiittis.
JOS 6:11 Hessa gisho, Godaa caaqo taabotey he katamaa issi toho yuuyanaada oothis. Yaatidi asay banta dunkaanida guta simmidi, yan aqidosona.
JOS 6:12 Wontetha gallas Iyyasuy guuridi dendis; kahinetika Godaa caaqo taabotiya tookidosona.
JOS 6:13 Laapun moyzeta oykida laapun kahineti banta moyziya qanxonna punnishe caaqo taabotiya sinthan boosona. Moyzey qanxonna punetiya wode olanchoti kahinetape sinthan qassi derey taabotiyape guyera kaallees.
JOS 6:14 Nam7antho gallas katamaa issi toho yuuyidi, banta dunkaanida guta simmidosona. Usupun gallas gakanaw hessada oothidosona.
JOS 6:15 Laapuntha gallas gontey wadhishin dendidi, kaseysada katama laapun toho yuuyidosona. He gallasa xalaala katamaa laapun toho enti yuuyidosona.
JOS 6:16 Laapuntha yuushuwan, kahineti moyze punniya wode, Iyyasuy asaako, “Goday ha katamaa hintew aathidi immida gisho, waassite” yaagidi kiittis.
JOS 6:17 “Katamaynne iya giddon de7iyaba ubbay Godaas qangetidaba gididi dhayanaw bessees. Nuuni biitta xomoosana mela yeddida asata qosada ashshida, laymiya Raabanne I son de7iya asaa xalaali attanaw bessees.
JOS 6:18 Shin hinte metonne qoho Isra7eele guta bolla ehona mela dhayanaw bessiyabape aybaka amotidi ekonnaada hinte huuphes naagetite.
JOS 6:19 Biraynne worqey, naase biratape oosetida miisheti ubbay, Godaas dummatidaba gido. Enti Godaa miishiya minjiya shaaliyan de7o” yaagis.
JOS 6:20 Hessa gisho, moyzey punetis; asay waassis. Derey moyze punuwa si7ida wode banta qaala dhoqu oothi waassin, katamaa gimbiya dirsay kundis. He saaten asay lawuhu gidi gelidi katamaa oykidosona.
JOS 6:21 Banta mashsha denthidi, macca adde, na7a cima, mehe, dorse, harenne kataman shempora de7iyaba ubbaa wodhidosona.
JOS 6:22 Iyyasuy biitta xomoosanaw kiitetida nam7u asatako, “Layme Raabi soo bidi, kase hinte iw caaqidaysada, iyonne I soo asa ubbaa kessite” yaagis.
JOS 6:23 Enti bidi, Raabo, I aawa, I aayiw, I ishatanne I dabbota ubbaa Isra7eele asay dunkaanida gutaape gaxa kessidi wothidosona.
JOS 6:24 Yaati simmidi katamaanne iya giddon de7iyaba ubbaa xuuggidosona. Shin biranne worqaa, naase biratape oosetida miisheta Godaa miishiya minjiya shaaliyan wothidosona.
JOS 6:25 Shin laymiya Raaba Iyaarko xomoosana mela kiitetida asata qosada ashshida gisho, Iyyasuy iyo, I aawa soo asaanne iira de7iya dabbota ubbaa hayqope ashshis. I kochati hachi gakanaw Isra7eele biittan de7oosona.
JOS 6:26 He wode Iyyasuy, “Iyaarko katamaa zaari keexanaw dendiya oonika, Godaa sinthan baadetidabaa gido. Buroo baasiya wode iya bayra na7ay hayqo, Pengiya aathiya wode iya tesho na7ay hayqo” yaagidi baaddis.
JOS 6:27 Goday Iyyasura gidida gisho, iya sunthay biitta ubbaa gakis.
JOS 7:1 Isra7eele asay digetidabaa bochidi, Godaas kiitetonna ixidosona. Yihuda koche gidida Karma na7ay, Zebda na7aa na7ay, Zaara na7ay Akaani, digetidabatape ekidi Isra7eele bolla Godaa hanquwa denthis.
JOS 7:2 Isra7eele asay Iyaarko matan dunkaanidi de7ishin, Iyyasuy Beet-Aweena matan Beetelepe doloha baggan de7iya Gayee katamanne iya heera xomoosidi yaana mela guutha asata kiittis. Kiitetida asati bidi, Gayee katamaa xomoosidosona.
JOS 7:3 Enti Iyyasuko simmi yidi, “Gayee katamaa olanaw asa ubbay baanaw koshshenna; nam7u woyko heedzu mukulu olanchoti biiko gidana. Yan guutha asi de7iya gisho, asa ubbay daaburanaw bessena” yaagidosona.
JOS 7:4 Yaatin, heedzu mukulu gidiya asati olanaw Gayee katamaa bidosona. Shin Isra7eeleti Gayee katamaa asaa sinthafe baqatidosona.
JOS 7:5 Gaye katamaa asay Isra7eele asaape hastamanne usupun asaa wodhidi, katamaa dirsaa pengiyafe doomidi, Shebarime gakanaw Isra7eele asaa wodhishe goodidosona. Isra7eele asaa wozanay til7idi, haathe gidis.
JOS 7:6 Yaanin, Iyyasuynne Isra7eele cimati azzanidi, banta ma7uwa daakidosona. Godaa taabotiya sinthan omarsi gakanaw gufannidosona. Banta huuphen bido qolidosona.
JOS 7:7 Yaatin, Iyyasuy, “Hay7i Godaa Xoossaw, Yordaanose shaafa pinthada ne nuna ehiday Amooretas nuna aatha immanaasee? Yordaanosepe hefinthan de7idaako nuus lo77oshin.
JOS 7:8 Abeeti Godaw, Isra7eele asay xoonetidi, banta morketa sinthafe baqatiko, ta woygo?
JOS 7:9 Kanaanetinne ha biittan de7iya asa ubbay, hessa si7idi, nuna teqidi, biittafe dhaysana. Yaatin, ne gita sunthaa gisho ne oothanay aybee?” yaagis.
JOS 7:10 Goday Iyyasuko, “Ayis gufannadii? Denda eqa.
JOS 7:11 Isra7eele asay qohidosona; ta entana kiitida kiita naagonna ixidi, caaquwa menthidosona. Enti digetidabaape ekidosona; kaysotidosona; wordotidosona; qassi he miishiya banta miishiyara walakidosona.
JOS 7:12 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele asay banta morketa sinthan eqanaw danda7ibookona. Enti dhayanaw bessiya gisho, banta morketa sinthafe guye simmidi baqatidosona. Hinte giddofe dhayanaw bessiyaba hinte dhaysona ixiko, hizape ta hintera gidike.”
JOS 7:13 Bada asaa geeshsha. Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, “Hinte ekanaw bessonnaba ekida gisho, wontos hintenatethaa geeshshite” yaagees gada oda. Isra7eele asaw, hessa hinte giddofe diggona ixiko, hinte morketa sinthan eqanaw danda7eketa.
JOS 7:14 Wonto wonta, hinte zariyan zariyan shiiqite. Goday shaakiya zarey ba kochan kochan shiiqo. Goday shaakiya kochay ba soo asan asan shiiqo; qassi Goday shaakiya soo asay, issoy issoy baw shiiqo.
JOS 7:15 Digetidabaa ekida uray Godaa caaquwa menthidaynne Isra7eele asaa qohiday iya gidiya gisho, inne iyaw de7iyaba ubbay taman xuugeto.
JOS 7:16 Iyyasuy wontetha gallas guura dendidi, kochan kochan Isra7eele asaa shiishin, Goday Yihuda kochay bala gideysa bessis.
JOS 7:17 Iyyasuy Yihuda kochaa shiishin, Goday Zaraha kochay bala gideysa bessis. Zaraha kochaa shiishin, Goday Zabida soo asay bala gideysa bessis.
JOS 7:18 Zabida soo asay issoy issoy baw shiiqin, wursethan Goday Zabida na7a na7aa, Karma na7aa Akaani bala gideysa qoncisis.
JOS 7:19 Iyyasuy Akaanako, “Ta na7aw, Godaa, Isra7eele Xoossaa boncha; ane ne oothidaba taw qosonna oda” yaagis.
JOS 7:20 Akaani zaaridi, “Ee tuma, taani Godaa Isra7eele Xoossaa naaqas. Taani oothiday haysa;
JOS 7:21 Nuuni di77idi ekida miishiya giddofe issi lo77o Sana7oora biitta kaaba, nam7u kilo gidiya birata biranne bagga kilo gidiya worqa be7ada amottas; ekas. Yaatada ta dunkaaniya giddon biitta bookada bira garsara wothada moogas.”
JOS 7:22 Yaatin, Iyyasuy ase kiittis. Enti woxi bidi dunkaaniya giddon bira garsara wothidi moogida miisheta demmidosona.
JOS 7:23 Kiitetidi bida asati he miisheta dunkaaniyape Iyyasukonne Isra7eele asa ubbaako ehidi, Godaa sinthan wothidosona.
JOS 7:24 Yaatin Iyyasuynne Isra7eele asa ubbay, Akaana, bira, kaaba, worqaa, iya adde naytanne iya macca nayta, iya mehiya, iya hareta, iya dorsata, iya dunkaaniyanne iyaw de7iyaba ubbaa Meto Zangaara geetetiya bessa efidosona.
JOS 7:25 Iyyasuy Akaanako, “Ha metuwa nu bolla ayis ehadii? Goday hachi ne bolla meto ehana” yaagis. Yaatin Isra7eele asa ubbay, Akaananne iya soo asaa shuchan caddi wodhidi, iyaw de7iyaba ubbaara woli gathidi taman xuuggidosona.
JOS 7:26 Enti Akaana bolla hachi gakanaw bentiya daro shuchi keelidosona. Yaatin, Goday ba eexiya hanquwafe simmis. Hachi gakanaw he bessay Meto Zangaara geetetidi xeegetees.
JOS 8:1 Goday Iyyasuko, “Yayyofa; hirgofa; olanchota ubbaa neera ekada, Gayee katamaa olanaw keya. Gaye kawa, iya asaa, iya katamaanne iya biitta ta ne kushen aathada immas.
JOS 8:2 Neeni Iyaarko bollanne iya kawa bolla oothidaysada Gaye bollanne iya kawa bolla oothana. Shin hinte ha77i olidi di7iya shalonne mehe hintew ekite. Katamaape guye baggara qoponna mentha gelanaw giigeta.”
JOS 8:3 Hessa gisho, Iyyasuynne olanchoti ubbay, Gaye katamaa olanaw dendidosona. Iyyasuy ba olanchota giddofe hastamu mukulu gidiya mino olanchota dooridi qamma yeddishe,
JOS 8:4 entana haysada yaagidi kiittis; “Bidi katamaape guye baggara qosetidi naagite. Katamaape haakidi boonnashin, menthi gelanaw giigidi naagite.
JOS 8:5 Tanne taara de7iya asa ubbay, katamaako shiiqana. He wode Gaye katamaa asay nuna olanaw yaa wode kaseysada nu enta sinthafe guye simmidi baqatana.
JOS 8:6 Enti kesseysada nu enta sinthafe baqatiya daanin, nuupe baqatoosona gidi, katamaape nu enta haassana gakanaw nuna kaallana.
JOS 8:7 He wode hinte qosetida bessaafe keyidi katamaa oykite. Goday hinte Xoossay katamaa hinte kushen aathidi immana.
JOS 8:8 Katamaa oykidaape guye, Goday kiitidaysa mela taman xuuggite. Ta hintena kiittas” yaagis.
JOS 8:9 Hessafe guye, Iyyasuy olanchota kiittis. Enti bidi Gayee katamaape wuloha baggan Beetelepenne Gayeepe giddon qosetidi naagidosona. Shin Iyyasuy he qamma asaara aqis.
JOS 8:10 Wontetha gallas guura Iyyasuy dendidi, olanchota xeegis. Yaatidi, inne Isra7eele cimati olanchota kaalethidi Gaye katamaa bidosona.
JOS 8:11 Iyara de7iya olanchoti ubbay, sinthe bidi Gaye katama matidi, katamaape pudeha baggan dunkaanidosona. Entafenne Gaye katamaape giddon zangaari de7ees.
JOS 8:12 Iyyasuy ichashu mukulu olanchota dooridi, katamaape wuloha baggara, Beetelepenne Gayeepe giddon qosidi wothis.
JOS 8:13 Olanchotape baggaa katamaape pudeha baggara, qassi katamaa menthidi gelana olanchota wuloha baggara besse besse oythis. He qamma Iyyasuy he zangaaran aqis.
JOS 8:14 Gaye katamaa kawoy hessa be7ida wode, ba olanchota ubbaa ekidi, Isra7eele asaara oletanaw demba biitta keyidosona. Shin kawoy katamaape guye baggara qoseti uttida olanchoti de7eysa eribeenna.
JOS 8:15 Iyyasuynne Isra7eele asa ubbay xoonetidaba daanidi, enta sinthafe mela biitta simmidi baqatidosona.
JOS 8:16 Gaye kataman de7iya asa ubbay, enta yedethanaw xeegereti keyidi, Iyyasu goodishe katamaape haakidi bidosona.
JOS 8:17 Gayen woyko Beetelen de7iya asa ubbay, Isra7eele asaa yedethanaw katamaa yeggidi keyin katama pengiya naagiya asi dhayida gisho; dooya attis.
JOS 8:18 Hessafe guye, Goday Iyyasuko, “Ne toora Gaye katamaa bolla dentha. Taani Gaye katamaa ne kushen aathada immana” yaagis. Yaatin Iyyasuy ba toora katamaa bolla denthis.
JOS 8:19 Iyyasuy ba toora denthida wode qosetida olanchoti banta bessaafe dendidi, katamaa geli oykidi, ellesidi taman xuuggidosona.
JOS 8:20 Gaye katamaa asay guye simmidi xeelliya wode, katamaa cuyay salo dendishin be7idosona. Mela biitta baqatida Isra7eele asay, bantana yedethiya asaa bolla guye simmida gisho, enti awu baggaraka kessi ekanaw danda7ibookona.
JOS 8:21 Iyyasunne iyara de7iya asa ubbay, qoseti uttida olanchoti katamaa oykidaysanne cuyay salo dendidaysa be7ida wode guye simmidi, Gaye katamaa asaa wodhidosona.
JOS 8:22 Katamaa gelidi oykida olanchotika katamaape enta bolla keyidosona. Yaatin, Gaye asay Isra7eele olanchotan ubba baggara teqetida gisho, issoyka attona woyko kessi ekonna ubbaa wodhidi wursidosona.
JOS 8:23 Shin Gaye katamaa kawa de7idi, Iyyasuko ehidosona.
JOS 8:24 Isra7eele asay Gaye katamaa asa entana yedethida bessan mashshan wodhidi ongidaape guye, ubbay guye katamaa simmidi, kataman attida asaa ubbaa mashshan wodhidosona.
JOS 8:25 He gallas Gaye kataman hayqida addeynne macci tammanne nam7u mukula.
JOS 8:26 Iyyasuy Gaye kataman de7iyaba ubbaa ongana gakanaw katamaa bolla denthida toora duge wothibeenna.
JOS 8:27 Shin Goday Iyyasu kiitidaysa mela Isra7eele asay he katamaa mehiyanne shaluwa bantaw di7idosona.
JOS 8:28 Iyyasuy Gaye katamaa xuuggis; he katamay hachi gakanaw laaletha doorenne asi baynna bessi gididi attis.
JOS 8:29 Iyyasuy, Gaye katama kawa wodhidi omarsi gakanaw mitha bolla kaqis. Awi wulliya wode, iya aha katamaa geliya pengen yeggana mela oothis. Iya bolla daro shucha keelidosona; he keela shuchay hachi gakanaw he bessan de7ees.
JOS 8:30 Hessafe guye, Iyyasuy Ebaala deriya bolla Godaas Isra7eele Xoossaas yarsho bessi keexis.
JOS 8:31 Godaa aylley Musey Isra7eele asaa kiitidaysadanne higge maxaafan xaafetidaysada, yarsho bessaa masetiboonnanne birati bochiboona shuchafe keexidi, iya bolla Godaas xuussa yarshonne issifetetha yarsho yarshidosona.
JOS 8:32 Iyyasuy, Isra7eele asaa sinthan, Muse higgiya shuchaa bolla zaari xaafis.
JOS 8:33 Isra7eele asaa anjana mela Godaa aylley Musey kiitidaysada Isra7eele asa ubbay, asa gade asata, enta cimati, enta shuumatinne daynnati ubbay, Godaa caaqo taabotiya tookida Leewe koche gidida kahineta sinthan ushacha bagganinne haddirsa baggan eqidosona. Entafe baggay Garzaana zuma sinthan, qassi baggay Ebaala deriya sinthan eqidosona.
JOS 8:34 Higge maxaafan xaafetidaysada, Iyyasuy higge qaala ubbaa, anjuwanne baadetha nabbabis.
JOS 8:35 Musey kiitida higgiya Iyyasuy, Isra7eele asa ubbaas, maccasas, naytasinne, asa gade asaas issi qaalaka ashshona nabbabis.
JOS 9:1 Yordaanose shaafape wuloha baggan derey dariya biittaninne gadhan Medetrane abbaafe bidi Libaanose gakanaw de7iya Hiteta, Amooreta, Kanaaneta, Parzeta, Hiwetanne Yaabuseta kawoti ubbay, Gaye asay xoonetidaysa si7ida wode,
JOS 9:2 Iyyasunne Isra7eeleta olanaw issife shiiqidi zoretidosona.
JOS 9:3 Gaba7oona asay Iyyasuy Iyaarko bollanne Gaye katamaa bolla oothidaba si7idi,
JOS 9:4 Iyyasu cimmanaw koydosona. Enti shinqe qachidi, cima woyne ogoronne curqa qarxiita hare bolla caanidi, Iyyasuko ase kiittidosona.
JOS 9:5 Kiitetida asati wurida caamma aathidosona; peedhetida afila ma7idosona; enti oykida shinqeyka melidabaanne meqertidaba.
JOS 9:6 Enti Isra7eele asay dunkaanida guta Galgala bidi, Iyyasukonne Isra7eele asaako, “Nuuni haaho gadepe yida. Nu yiday hintera caaqetidi saro daanasa” yaagidosona.
JOS 9:7 Yaatin, Isra7eele asay Gaba7oone asaako, “Hinte nu matan de7iya asaakosh? Nu aybin eridi hintera caaqetanee?” yaagidosona.
JOS 9:8 Enti Iyyasuko, “Nu ne aylleta” yaagidi zaaridosona. Iyyasuy zaaridi, “Hinte oonantee? Awupe yidetii?” yaagidi oychis.
JOS 9:9 Enti zaaridi, “Nuuni ne aylleti Goday hinte Xoossay Gibxen oothidaysa si7ida gisho, daro haaho gadepe yida.
JOS 9:10 Qassi Yordaanose shaafape hefinthan wuloha baggan de7iya nam7u Amoore kawota, Haseboona kawa Sihoonanne Astarooten de7iya Baasane kawa Ooge bolla I oothidaysa nu si7ida.
JOS 9:11 Nu biitta cimatinne nu biittan de7iya ubbay, oges shinqe giigisi oykidi bidi entara gahetidi, entako, ‘Nu hinte aylleta; nu yiday hintera caaqetidi saro daanasa’ yaagite.
JOS 9:12 “Nu oykida shinqiya be7ite. Nu soope ekidi keyiya wode ho77o, shin ha77i melidaysanne puulumidaysa be7ite.
JOS 9:13 Ha woyniya ogorotan nu kunthiya wode oorathi, shin ha77i daaketidaysa be7ite. Ogiya haahotethaafe dendoysan nu ma7oynne nu caammay wuris” yaagidosona.
JOS 9:14 Shin Godaa sheniya oychonna de7ishe, Isra7eele asay enta shinqiyafe guuthara ekidosona.
JOS 9:15 Yaatin, Iyyasuy hintena wodhoko gidi saro caaqo entara caaqetis. Isra7eele cimatika he caaquwa menthoko gidi caaqidosona.
JOS 9:16 Entara caaqida heedzantho gallasan he asati enta biittan de7eysanne entaw shooro gideysa Isra7eele asay si7idosona.
JOS 9:17 Isra7eele asay heedzu gallas hemetidi, he asati de7iya katamata gakidosona. Enta katamati Gaba7oona, Kafira, Baarotenne Qiriyat-Yi7aarima geetetidi xeegetoosona.
JOS 9:18 Shin Isra7eele cimati entaw Godaa, Isra7eele Xoossaa sunthan caaqida gisho, Isra7eele asay enta wodhibookona. Yaatin, asa ubbay cimata bolla zuuzumidosona.
JOS 9:19 Shin Isra7eele cimati, “Nu entaw Godaa Isra7eele Xoossaa sunthan caaqida gisho, ha77i enta bochanaw danda7oko.
JOS 9:20 Nuuni entaw haysada oothana; nuuni entaw caaqida caaquwa menthin Godaa hanqoy nu bolla yoonnaada enta wodhoko.
JOS 9:21 Enti de7o giite. Gidoshin Isra7eele asa ubbaas mithinne haathe shiisheyisata gido” yaagidosona. Hessa gisho, cimati banta caaquwa naagidosona.
JOS 9:22 Iyyasuy Gaba7oona asaa xeegidi, “Nu matan de7ishe, ‘Nuuni daro haaho biittafe yida’ gidi, nuna ayis cimmidetii?
JOS 9:23 Hinte hessa oothida gisho, baadetidaysata. Hinte merinaw ta Xoossaa keethan mithin haathe shiishiya aylle gidana” yaagis.
JOS 9:24 Enti zaaridi, “Nuuni ne aylleti, Goday hinte Xoossay ha biittan de7iya asa ubbaa dhaysidi, biitta hintew immanaw ba aylliya Muses odidaysa si7ida. Hessa gisho, hintew babidi haysa oothida.
JOS 9:25 Ha77i nu ne kushen de7oos. New lo77onne suure daanidi bentidaba ootha” gidi zaaridosona.
JOS 9:26 Iyyasuy Isra7eele asay enta wodhonna mela ashshis.
JOS 9:27 He gallas Iyyasuy, Gaba7oona asata Isra7eeletasinne Goday doorida bessan de7iya iya yarsho bessaas haathenne mithi shiishiya asi gidana mela oothis. Gaba7oona asati hachi gakanaw hessa oothosona.
JOS 10:1 Iyyasuy Iyaarko katamaa oli dhaysidi, iya kawa wodhidaysada, Gayee katamaa oli dhaysidi, iya kawa wodhidaysa Yerusalaame kawoy Adooni-Xedeqi si7is. Qassi Gaba7oona asay Isra7eele asaara saro daanaw caaqetidaysa si7is.
JOS 10:2 Gaba7ooni hanko kawo katamatada gita katama; he katamay Gaye katamaape aadhees; iyan de7iya addetika mino olancho gideysa eriya gisho, Adooni-Xedeqinne iya asay daro yayyidosona.
JOS 10:3 Hessa gisho, Yerusalaame kawoy Adooni-Xedeqi, Kebroona kawa Hoohamas, Yarmuta kawa Piraamas, Laakiso kawa Yafi7asinne, Egloona kawa Dabiras haysada yaagidi kiittis;
JOS 10:4 “Gaba7oona asay Iyyasuranne Isra7eele asaara saro de7anaw caaqida gisho, enta olanaw yidi tana maaddite” yaagis.
JOS 10:5 Ha ichashu Amoore kawoti banta olanchota issife gathidi, Gaba7oona olidosona.
JOS 10:6 Gaba7oona asay Galgalan dunkaanida Iyyasuko, “Nuna ne aylleta aggofa; ellesa yada nuna ashsha. Derey dariya biittan de7iya Amoore kawoti ubbay nuna olanaw banta olanchota issino oothida gisho, ne nuna maadda” yaagidi kiittidosona.
JOS 10:7 Hessa gisho, Iyyasuy, baara de7iya olanchotanne mino asata ubbaa, Galgalape ekidi bis.
JOS 10:8 Goday Iyyasuko, “Entaw babofa; taani enta ne kushen aathada immas. Entafe issi asika neera eqetanaw danda7enna” yaagis.
JOS 10:9 Iyyasuy Galgalape qamma kumethi hemetishe aqidi, Gaba7oone asay qoponna de7ishin enta bolla ola denthis.
JOS 10:10 Goday Isra7eele asa sinthan entaw wozana kaha dhaysis. Isra7eele asay enta Gaba7oonan wodhidosona. Isra7eeleti enta Beet-Horona efiya ogiya oythidi goodishe, Azeeqanne Maqeda gakanaw goodidosona.
JOS 10:11 Enti Beet-Horonape duge Azeeqa efiya ogiyara Isra7eele asaa sinthafe baqatishin, Goday gita shacha shuchu salope enta bolla bukisis. Isra7eele asay wodhida asape, shachay wodhida asay daro.
JOS 10:12 Goday Isra7eele asaas Amooreta, aathidi immida gallas, Isra7eele asay si7ishin, Iyyasuy, “Away Gaba7oona bolla wullonna eqo. Ageenayka Eloona zangaara bolla eqo” yaagidi Godaa woossis.
JOS 10:13 Isra7eele asay banta morketa xoonana gakanaw, away wullonna eqis; ageenayka ba de7iya bessaafe qaaxibeenna. Hessi Yaashara maxaafan xaafetis. Away salos giddon qaaxonna eqis; issi gallas kumethi away wullonna gam7is.
JOS 10:14 Goday asa qaala si7ida he gallasa mela gallas haysafe kaseka haysafe sinthanka deenna. Tumaka Goday Isra7eele asaas oletis.
JOS 10:15 Hessafe guye, Iyyasuynne iya olanchoti banta dunkaanida guta Galgala simmidosona.
JOS 10:16 He ichashu Amoore kawoti baqatidi, Maqeda gongoluwan qosetidosona.
JOS 10:17 Ichashu kawoti, Maqeda gongoluwan qosetidi de7ishin demmidaysa Iyyasus odidosona.
JOS 10:18 Iyyasuy zaaridi, “Gita shuchata gondorsidi, gongoluwa doona gordite; enta naagana mela ase yan wothite.
JOS 10:19 Shin hinte yan gam7ofite; enti banta katamaa gelidi attona mela hinte morketa gooddidi enta wodhite. Goday hinte Xoossay enta hinte kushen aathidi immis” yaagis.
JOS 10:20 Guutha asati baqatidi banta gimbetida katamaa gelidi attikoka, Iyyasuynne Isra7eele asay asa ubbaa wodhidosona.
JOS 10:21 Hessafe guye, Isra7eele asa ubbay saron simmidi, Iyyasuy dunkaanidi de7iya guta Maqeda yidosona. He wodepe doomidi oonika Isra7eele asaa bolla issi qaalaka odetanaw xaalida asi baawa.
JOS 10:22 Hessafe guye, Iyyasuy, “Gongoluwa doona dooyidi, he ichashu kawota kessidi, taw ha ekidi yiite” yaagis.
JOS 10:23 Gongoluwa doona dooyidi, Yerusalaame kawa, Kebroona kawa, Yarmuta kawa, Laakiso kawanne Egloona kawa iyako ehidosona.
JOS 10:24 Enti he kawota iyako ehida wode, Iyyasuy Isra7eele asa ubbaa baako xeegidi, baara bida toora moconatako, “Haa yidi, hinte tohuwa ha kawota qoodhiyan wothite” yaagis. Enti yidi kiitetidaysada oothidosona.
JOS 10:25 Iyyasuy entako, “Hinte oletiya hinte morketa bolla Goday haysada oothana gisho, aykoy baawa yayyofite; minnite” yaagis.
JOS 10:26 Iyyasuy he ichashu kawota wodhidi, ichashu mitha bolla kaqis; enta ahay omarsi gakanaw yan pee7is.
JOS 10:27 Awi wulliya wode Iyyasuy, “Aha wodhisidi, enti kase qosetida gongoluwan holite. Yaatidi, he gongoluwa doona gita shuchan gordite” yaagidi kiittis. He shuchati hachi gakanaw yan de7oosona.
JOS 10:28 He gallas Iyyasuy Maqeda katamaa oykis; katamaa kawaka wodhis; kataman de7iya asa ubbaa issi asika ashshona dhaysis. Iyaarko katamaa kawa bolla oothidaysada, Maqeda katamaa kawa bolla oothis.
JOS 10:29 Yaape simmidi, Iyyasuynne iya olanchoti ubbay Maqedape bidi Libina katamaa olidosona.
JOS 10:30 Goday he katamaanne katamaa kawa enta kushen aathidi immis. Iyyasuy kataman de7iya asaape issuwaka ashshona mashshan wodhis. Iyaarko katamaa kawa bolla oothidaysada Libina katamaa kawa bolla oothis.
JOS 10:31 Iyyasuynne iya olanchoti Libina katamaape Laakiso katama bidi, he katama olidosona.
JOS 10:32 Goday Laakiso katama Isra7eele asa kushen aathidi immin, Iyyasuy he katamaa yuushuwa teqidi nam7antho gallasan oykis. Libina kataman oothidaysada Laakiso kataman de7iya asa ubbaa mashshan wodhis.
JOS 10:33 He wode, Gezera kawoy Horami, Laakiso kawa maaddanaw yis, shin Iyyasuy iyanne iya olanchota dhaysis; entafe issi asika attibeenna.
JOS 10:34 Hessafe simmidi, Iyyasuynne iya olanchoti ubbay Laakiso katamaape Egloona katamaa bidi, he katama yuushuwa teqidi olidosona.
JOS 10:35 He gallas Egloona katamaa oykidi, Laakiso kataman oothidaysada mashshan ase ubbaa wodhidosona.
JOS 10:36 Yaati simmidi, Iyyasuynne iya olanchoti Egloonape Kebroona yidi, olidosona.
JOS 10:37 He katamaanne iya yuushuwan de7iya guutha katamata oykidi iyan de7iya asaanne kawa wodhidosona. Iyyasuy Egloonan oothidaysada he katamaa bollaka oothis.
JOS 10:38 Hessafe guye, Iyyasuynne iyara de7iya Isra7eele olanchoti guye simmidi Dabira katamaa olidosona.
JOS 10:39 He katamaanne iya yuushuwan de7iya guutha gutata oykidi, iyan de7iya asaanne kawa wodhidosona. Iyyasuy Kebroonanne Libina katamata bolla oothidaysada Dabira bolla oothis.
JOS 10:40 Iyyasuy he biittan de7iya katamata ubbaa oykis. Derey dariya biittan, Negebe gadhan, loobuwanne enta kawota ubbaa oykis. Goday Isra7eele Xoossay iya kiitidaysada, biitta bolla de7iya asi issuwaka ashshona ubbaa wodhidi dhaysis.
JOS 10:41 Iyyasuy Qaades-Barnefe bidi Gaaza gakanaw qassi Goshena biittafe bidi Gaba7oona gakanaw de7iya ubbaa olidi xoonis.
JOS 10:42 Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, Isra7eeletas oletida gisho Iyyasuy ha kawotanne enta biitta ubbaa olidi oykis.
JOS 10:43 Hessafe guye, Iyyasuynne Isra7eele olanchoti banta dunkaanida gutaa Galgala simmidosona.
JOS 11:1 Hazoora kawoy Yaabini, Isra7eeleta xoonuwa si7ida wode Madoona kawa Yobaabas, Shimroona kawas, Azifa kawas,
JOS 11:2 pudeha gezzen de7iya kawotas, Kenereeta abbaafe dugeha baggan Yordaanose zangaaran de7iya kawotas, Nafat-Doorape wuloha baggara gadhan de7iya kawotas kiita yeddis.
JOS 11:3 Qassi dolohanne wuloha baggan de7iya Kanaanetas, Amooretas, Hitetas, Parzetas, derey dariya biittan de7iya Yaabusetasinne Mixiphan Armoona zumaape garsan de7iya Hiwetas kiittis.
JOS 11:4 Enti ubbay, banta olanchota, paratanne para gaareta issife gathidi yidosona. Enta tayboy abba gaxan de7iya shafe mela.
JOS 11:5 He kawoti ubbay banta wolqaa issife gathidi, Isra7eeleta olanaw Meroome haatha matan dunkaanidosona.
JOS 11:6 Goday Iyyasuko, “Ne entaw babofa; taani wonto hannoode enta ubbaa wodhada Isra7eele asaas aatha immana. Neeni enta parata gaadiya qanxana; enta para gaaretaka taman xuuggana” yaagis.
JOS 11:7 Iyyasuynne iya olanchoti ubbay enti qoponna de7ishin Meroome haatha matan enta bolla keyidi olidosona.
JOS 11:8 Goday entana Isra7eeleta kushen aathidi immis. Isra7eeleti enta olidi, gita Sidoonanne Masroota gakanaw, qassi doloha baggan de7iya Mixipha zangaara gakanaw entana yedethidosona. Entafe issi asika ashshona ubbaa wodhidosona.
JOS 11:9 Iyyasuy, Goday kiitidaysada ubbaa bolla oothis; enta parata gaadiya qanxis; enta gaareta xuuggis.
JOS 11:10 Yaatidi, Iyyasuy guye simmidi, Hazoora oli oykidi, kawuwaka mashshan wodhis. He wode Hazoora kawotethay hara kawotethaa ubbaas huuphe.
JOS 11:11 Isra7eele asay Hazooran de7iya asaa ubbaa mashshan wodhida gisho shempora attida asi baawa. He katamay taman xuugetis.
JOS 11:12 Godaa aylley Musey kiitidaysada, Iyyasuy he katamatanne enta kawota ubba di77is. Issi asika ashshona asa ubbaa mashshan wodhis.
JOS 11:13 Gidoshin, Iyyasuy xuuggida Hazoora katamaape attishin, zooze bolla keexetida katamata Isra7eele asay xuugibookona.
JOS 11:14 Isra7eele asay he katamatape bonqida, miishiyanne mehe ubbaa bantaw ekidosona. Issi asika ashshona asa ubbaa mashshan wodhidosona.
JOS 11:15 Goday ba aylliya Muse kiitidaysada, Musey Iyyasu kiittis; Iyyasuyka kiitaa polis. Goday Muse kiitidabaape issibaaka Iyyasuy ashshibeenna; ubbaa oothis.
JOS 11:16 Iyyasuynne iya olanchoti derey dariya biitta, Negebe mela biitta, Goshena biitta ubbaa, wuloha baggan de7iya gadhaanne Yordaanose zangaara olidi oykis.
JOS 11:17 I Sayre kanthisiya Halaqa zumaape bidi, Armoona zumaape garsa baggan de7iya Libaanose zangaaranne Ba7aal-Gaade gakanaw de7iya biittata oykis. Enta kawota ubbaa shocis; di77idi wodhis.
JOS 11:18 Iyyasuy daro wode he kawota ubbaara oletis.
JOS 11:19 Gaba7oonan de7iya Hiwetape attishin, hara katami Isra7eeletara saro daanaw caaqiday baawa. Isra7eeleti hara katamata ubbaa olan xoonidi oykidosona.
JOS 11:20 Goday Muse kiitidaysada, Iyyasuy enta maaroti baynna ubbaa wodhana mela Goday enta wozana muumisidi Isra7eeleta olana mela denthethis.
JOS 11:21 He wode Iyyasuy bidi derey dariya Kebroonan, Dabiran, Anaaban, derey dariya Yihudaninne Isra7eelen de7iya adusata, Anaaqe kochata wodhidi ongis. Iyyasuy entanne enta katamata kumethi dhaysis.
JOS 11:22 Anaaqe kochatape oonika Isra7eele biittan attibeenna, shin Gaazan, Gaataninne Ashdoodan guuthati attidosona.
JOS 11:23 Goday Muse kiitidaysada Iyyasuy biitta ubbaa oykidi, Isra7eele asaa kochan kochan shaakidi laatisis. Hessafe guye, biittay olape shempis.
JOS 12:1 Isra7eele asay Yordaanose shaafape doloha baggara de7iya Arnoona zangaarape bidi Armoona zumaa gakanaw, qassi doloha baggara Yordaanose zangaara gakanaw de7iya biitta ubbaa olidi oykis. He xoonetida kawoti haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata;
JOS 12:2 Haseboonan uttidi haariya Amooreta kawa Sihoona. I Galada biittas baggaa ekidi, Arnoona zangaara matan de7iya Aroorape dendidi, Amooneta zawa Yaaboqa shaafa gakanaw de7eysa haarees.
JOS 12:3 Qassi doloha baggara Yordaanose zangaaran Kenereeta abbaafe bidi, Beet-Yashimoota baggara Maxine Abbaa kanthidi, Pisga deriyape garsa baggara de7iya biittata haarees.
JOS 12:4 Hessadaka, Raafaymeta sheeshape wursethi gidida, Astarootenne Edraa7a haariya, Baasane kawa Ooge xoonis.
JOS 12:5 Oogey, haariya zaway pudehan Armoona zumaa, dolohan Salaka katamaa gakidi, wulohan Geeshuretanne Makata zawa gakanaw de7iya Baasane biitta ubbaa gakees. Haseboona kawa Sihoona biitta Galada pudeha baggaa gujidi haarees.
JOS 12:6 Godaa aylley Musey kaalethin, Isra7eele asay ha kawota xoonidosona. Godaa aylley Musey enta biitta Robeela kochatas, Gaade kochatasinne Minaase kochaafe baggaas shaakidi laatisis.
JOS 12:7 Iyyasuynne Isra7eele asay Yordaanose shaafape wuloha baggan de7iya kawota ubba xoonidosona. He biittay Libaanose zangaaran de7iya Ba7aal-Gaadepe bidi, dugeha baggara Sayre matan de7iya Halaqa deriya gakees. Iyyasuy he biittaa shaakidi, Isra7eele kochatas laata biitta oothidi immis.
JOS 12:8 He I immida biittay, derey dariya biitta, wuloha baggan de7iya gadha, Yordaanose zangaara, Yihudanne Negebe mela biitta. He biittay kase Hiteti, Amooreti, Kanaaneti, Parzeti, Hiwetinne Yaabuseti de7iya biitta.
JOS 12:9 Isra7eele asay xoonida kawoti haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata; Iyaarko kawa, Beetele matan de7iya Gaye kawa,
JOS 12:10 Yerusalaame kawa, Kebroona kawa,
JOS 12:11 Yarmuta kawa, Laakiso kawa,
JOS 12:12 Egloona kawa, Gezera kawa,
JOS 12:13 Dabira kawa, Gedera kawa,
JOS 12:14 Horma kawa, Arada kawa,
JOS 12:15 Libina kawa, Adulaama kawa,
JOS 12:16 Maqeda kawa, Beetele kawa,
JOS 12:17 Tapuha kawa, Hefeera kawa,
JOS 12:18 Afeeqa kawa, Saarona kawa,
JOS 12:19 Madoona kawa, Hazoora kawa,
JOS 12:20 Shimroon-Maroona kawa, Azifa kawa,
JOS 12:21 Tanaka kawa, Magido kawa,
JOS 12:22 Qaadesa kawa, Qarmeloosan de7iya Yoqinaame kawa,
JOS 12:23 Gezzen de7iya Doora kawa, Galgalan de7iya Goyma kawanne
JOS 12:24 Tirsa kawa. Enti kumethi hastamanne issi kawota.
JOS 13:1 Iyyasuy daro cimida wode Goday iyako, “Neeni cimadasa; ne laythayka sugetis, gidoshin oyketona attida daro biittati de7oosona.
JOS 13:2 Oyketiboonna biittati haysata; Filisxeemetanne Geeshureta biitta ubbaa.
JOS 13:3 Gibxefe doloha baggan de7iya Shihoora Shaafape bidi, pudeha baggan de7iya Ekroona biitta gakanaw de7iya biitta ubbaa. He biittati Kanaane biitta geetetoosona. Entika ichashu Filisxeeme kawoti aysiya Gaaza, Ashdooda, Asqeloona, Gaatenne Ekroona geetetiya katamata. Aweeta biittayka buroo oyketibeenna.
JOS 13:4 Dugeha baggan de7iya Kanaaneta biittanne, Sidoonata biitta gidida Maarape bidi Amooreta zawa Afeeqa gakanaw de7iya biittay oyketibeenna.
JOS 13:5 Gebaalata biittaynne Ba7aal-Gaadepe doloha baggan de7iya Armoona zumaape bidi, Hamaata pino gakanaw buroo oyketibeenna.
JOS 13:6 Libaanosepe bidi Maseroona gakanaw gezze biittan de7iya Sidoonata ubbaa taani Isra7eeleta sinthafe goodda kessana. Taani nena kiitidaysada he biitta Isra7eele asaas laata oothada shaaka.
JOS 13:7 Neeni he biitta uddufun kochatasinne Minaase kochaafe baggaas shaaka” yaagis.
JOS 13:8 Robeela kochaas, Gaade kochaasinne Minaase kochaafe baggaas Godaa aylley Musey Yordaanosepe hefinthan, doloha baggan de7iya biitta kase laata oothidi entaw immis.
JOS 13:9 Enta biittay Arnoona Zangaara matan de7iya Aro7eerape bidi, he zangaaran de7iya katamaape bidi, Medeba gezziya kanthidi Diboona gakanaasa.
JOS 13:10 Qassi Haseboonan uttidi Amooneta zawa gakanaw haariya Amooreta kawa Sihoona katamata ubbaa gakees.
JOS 13:11 Hessadaka, Galadata, Geeshuretanne Ma7ikata biitta ubbaa, Armoona zuma ubbaanne Salaka gakanaw de7iya Baasane biitta ubbaa oykees.
JOS 13:12 Astarooteninne Edraa7an uttidi, haarida Baasane kawa Ooge biitta ubbaa oykees; He biittay kase Raafaymetape attida biitta. Musey enta xoonidi biittafe gooddidi kessis.
JOS 13:13 Shin Isra7eele asay Geeshuretanne Ma7ikata gooddidi kessibookona. Enti hachi gakanaw Isra7eele asaa giddon de7oosona.
JOS 13:14 Musey Leewe kochaas laata biitta immibeenna. Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, entaw kiitidaysada taman xuussa yarsho entaw laata oothidi immis.
JOS 13:15 Musey Robeela kochaas enta kochan kochan laata immis.
JOS 13:16 Enta biittay Arnoona Zangaara matan de7iya Aro7eerape bidi, he zangaaran de7iya katamaa kanthidi gezze Medeba gakees.
JOS 13:17 Haseboona, gezze katamata, Diboona, Baamot-Ba7aala, Beet-Baal-Me7oona,
JOS 13:18 Yahaaxa, Qedemoota, Mefaata,
JOS 13:19 Qiratayma, Sebama, derey dariya zangaaran de7iya Xeret-Shahaare,
JOS 13:20 Beet-Pa7oora, Pisga zumaape garsan de7iya biittanne Beet-Yashimoota geetetiya biittata ubbaa gakees.
JOS 13:21 Qassi gezzen de7iya katamatanne Haseboonan uttidi haarida Amooreta kawa Sihoona biitta ubbaa gakees. Musey kawa Sihoonanne Midiyaameta halaqata Ewa, Reqeema, Xuura, Huranne Reeba olidi xoonis. Haysati kawa Sihoonape garsan he biitta haareyisata.
JOS 13:22 Isra7eele asay maruwa, Bi7oora na7aa, Balaama wodhidosona.
JOS 13:23 Robeela kochaas wuloha bagga zaway Yordaanose shaafa. Robeela kochaas kochan kochan laata gididi imetida katamatinne gutati haysata.
JOS 13:24 Musey Gaade kochaas enta kochan kochan laata biitta shaakidi immis.
JOS 13:25 Enta biittay Ya7izeera, Galadan de7iya katamata ubbaanne Amooneta biittafe baggaa ekidi, Raaba doloha baggan de7iya Aro7eera gakees.
JOS 13:26 Hessadaka, Haseboonape dendidi, Ramoot-Mixiphanne Bexonima gakees. Qassi Mahinaymape bidi Dabeera zawa gakees.
JOS 13:27 Qassi Yordaanose zangaaran, Haseboona kawa Sihoona kawotethaafe attida, Beet-Harame, Beet-Nimira, Sukotanne Xafoona geetetiya katamata ekees. Enta zaway wuloha baggan Yordaanose shaafa, qassi pudeha baggan Kenereeta abba gakees.
JOS 13:28 Gaade kochaas kochan kochan laata biitta gididi imetida katamatinne gutati haysata.
JOS 13:29 Musey Minaase kochaafe baggaas enta kochan kochan laata biitta immis.
JOS 13:30 Enta biittay Mahinaymanne Baasane biitta ubbaa gaki oykees. Baasane kawa Ooge kawotetha ubbaanne Baasanen de7iya usupun tammu Ya7ira katamata oykees.
JOS 13:31 Qassi Galadape bagganne Baasanen Ooge kawotethaas waanna katamaa gidida Astarootenne Edraa7a geetetiya katamata gakees. He ubbay Minaase na7a Makira kochaas enta kochan kochan gakidaysa.
JOS 13:32 Musey Yordaanosepe hefinthan, Iyaarkofe doloha baggan de7iya Moo7abe denban de7ishe shaakidi immida biittay haysa.
JOS 13:33 Shin Musey Leewe kochaas laata biitta immibeenna. Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay enta laata.
JOS 14:1 Kahiney Alaazari, Nawe na7ay Iyyasuynne Isra7eele soo asaa halaqati, Kanaane biitta enta kochan kochan shaakin, Isra7eele asaa gakida biittay haysafe kaallidi de7eysa.
JOS 14:2 Goday Muse kiitidaysada laata biittay uddufunanne bagga kochaas saaman shaaketis.
JOS 14:3 Musey kase nam7anne bagga kochaas Yordaanosepe doloha baggan de7iya biitta immis, shin Leewe kochaas enta giddon laata biitta immibeenna.
JOS 14:4 Yoosefa nayti Minaaseynne Efreemey nam7u koche gididosona. Leewe kochaas duussa katamatanne mehe heemmiya biitta immisipe attishin, laata biitta immibeenna.
JOS 14:5 Goday Muse kiitidaysada Isra7eele asay biitta shaaketidi ekidosona.
JOS 14:6 Issi gallas Yihuda asay Iyyasuko Galgala yidosona. Entafe issoy, Qeneza kochay, Yoofona na7ay Kaalebi Iyyasuko, “Nuuni Qaades-Barnen de7iya wode Goday nabiya Muse baggara nebaanne tabaa odidaysa eraasa.
JOS 14:7 Godaa aylley Musey ha biitta wochana mela Qaades-Barnefe tana kiittiya wode taw laythi oytama. He wode taani ammanthiya oda Muses ehas.
JOS 14:8 Taara bida asati asaa wozanaa yashshan til7isidosona, shin taani Godaa, Xoossaa polo kaallas.
JOS 14:9 He gallas Musey, ‘Neeni, Godaa, Xoossaa polo kaallida gisho, ne tohoy yedhida biittay newunne ne kochaas merinaa laata biitta gidana’ gidi taw caaqis.
JOS 14:10 Iyyasu, ane qopa; Goday hessa Muses odi simmin hachi oytamanne ichashu laythi gidis. Isra7eele asay mela biittan simeretiya wode ubban hachi gathanaw Goday tana paxa wothis. Ha77i taw laythi hospun tammanne ichasha gidis.
JOS 14:11 Taw he wode de7iya minotethay hachika de7ees. Oletanaw, keyanawunne gelanaw taw ha77ika wolqinne xaalatethi de7ees.
JOS 14:12 He wode Goday taw immana gidi caaqida he derey dariya biitta taw imma. He biittan Anaaqeti de7eysanne enta katamati gitanne gimbetida katama gideysa he wode ne si7adasa. Gidikoka Goday gidaysada I taara gidiko, enta he biittafe taani gooddana” yaagis.
JOS 14:13 Iyyasuy Yoofona na7a Kaaleba anjidi, Kebroona iyaw laata oothi immis.
JOS 14:14 I Godaa, Isra7eele Xoossaa polo kaallida gisho, Kebroona hachi gakanaw Qeneza kocha Yoofona na7aa Kaaleba kochaas laata biitta gidis.
JOS 14:15 Kase Kebroona sunthay Qiriyaat-Arba geetetees. Arbi, Anaaqeta giddon eretida gita ase. Hessafe guye, biittay olape shempis.
JOS 15:1 Yihuda kochaas enta kochan kochan shaaketida biittay Edoomen zawatidi, dugeha baggan de7iya Xiine mela biitta wursethaa gakees.
JOS 15:2 Dugeha baggan enta zaway Maxine Abbaafe dugeha baggan wursetha gaxa gakees.
JOS 15:3 Akraabima Pinuwa kanthidi, Xiinepe bidi, Qaades-Barnes dugeha bagga gakees. Qassi Hexroona kanthidi, Adaare keydi, Qarqako simmees.
JOS 15:4 Hessafe qassi Aximoona kanthidi, Gibxe shaafa gakidi, Medetiraane Abban zawatees. Dugeha baggan de7iya Yihuda zaway hessa.
JOS 15:5 Doloha bagga zaway Maxine Abbaa bidi, Yordaanose shaafa wursethaa gakees. Pudeha bagga zaway qassi Yordaanose shaafay geliyasuwap bidi,
JOS 15:6 Beet-Hogila keyees. Yaape Beet-Araba baggara kanthidi, Robeela na7aa Bohaana qofiso shuchan zawatees.
JOS 15:7 Yaape zaway Akoora Zangaarape Dabira keyidi, zangaarape dugeha baggan de7iya Adumima Pinuwa sintha baggan aggidi pudeha baggara Galgala simmees. Hessafe qassi Enshemeshe pultuwa kanthidi, Enrogeelan zawatees.
JOS 15:8 Hessafe Hinooma Zangaara kanthidi, Yaabuseta katama gidida Yerusalaame dugeha baggaa gakees. Kaallidi zaway Hinoome Zangaarape wuloha baggan de7iya zumaa huuphiya keyidi, pudeha baggan Raafayme Zangaara gakees.
JOS 15:9 He zumaa huuphiyape bidi, Naftooha pultuwa kanthidi, Efroona zumaa bolla de7iya katamatako keyees. Hessafe qassi Ba7aala woyko Qiriyat-Yi7aarima simmees.
JOS 15:10 Baala pudeha baggara zawaydi, Sayre zumako wuloha bagga mirqetidi, Yi7aarime woyko Kisaloone deriya gakidi, iyape duge Beet-Sameesa wodhidi, Timina pinnees.
JOS 15:11 He zaway Eqroona pudeha baggara kanthidi, Shikroona mirqetidi, Baala zumaara bidi, Yabni7eelan zawatees. He zawa wursethay Medetiraane abba gididi,
JOS 15:12 wuloha bagga zaway Medetiraane abbas gaxa gidees. Yihuda kochay de7ida biitta zaway haysa.
JOS 15:13 Goday kiitidaysada, Iyyasuy, Yoofona na7aa Kaaleba gakiya laata Yihuda biittafe Qiriyaat-Arba geetetiya Kebroona immis. Arbi Anaaqe aawa.
JOS 15:14 Kaalebi Anaaqe kochata, Sesaya, Akmaananne Talmaya geetetiya heedzata Kebroonape kessis.
JOS 15:15 Hessafe dendidi, Dabiran de7iya asaa olanaw bis. Dabira katamay kase Qiriyat-Sefera geetetees.
JOS 15:16 Kaalebi, “Qiriyat-Sefera olidi, oykiya addiyas taani, ta na7iw Akiso immana” yaagis.
JOS 15:17 Yaatin, Kaaleba ishaa Qanaza na7ay, Gotoniyali he katama olidi oykin, Kaalebi ba na7iw Akiso iyaw immis.
JOS 15:18 Aksa Gotoniyala geliya wode I aaway iw gade immanaada woossana mela Gotoniyali iyo zoris. Iya baqulo bollafe wodhin, Kaalebi iyo, “Ay koyay?” yaagidi oychis.
JOS 15:19 Iya zaarada, “Ne kase taw woytida biittay mela biitta gidiya gisho, haatha pultoy de7iya biitta taw gujada immarki” yaagasu. Yaatin, Kaalebi qommoninne garsan de7iya pulto haatha iw immis.
JOS 15:20 Yihuda kochati banta kochan kochan ekida laatay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa.
JOS 15:21 Dugeha baggan Edoome gaxan de7iya Yihuda katamati, Qabdu7eela, Edera, Yaagura,
JOS 15:22 Qiina, Dimoona, Adaada,
JOS 15:23 Qaadesa, Haxoora, Yitinaana,
JOS 15:24 Ziifa, Xelema, Baalota,
JOS 15:25 Haxoor-Hadaata, Qiriyot-Hexiroona woyko Haxoora,
JOS 15:26 Amaama, Shama7a, Moloda,
JOS 15:27 Haxar-Gaade, Heshmoona, Beet-Palexa,
JOS 15:28 Haxar-Shu7aala, Barsaabeh, Biziyoota,
JOS 15:29 Ba7aala, Iyuma, Exema,
JOS 15:30 Eltolaada, Kesila, Horma,
JOS 15:31 Xiqilaaga, Madmaana, Sansana,
JOS 15:32 Lebawoota, Shilihaama, Aynanne Irmoona. Ha katamati banta gutatara issife laatamanne uddufuna.
JOS 15:33 Wuloha baggan zuma xaphon de7iya katamati, Eshta7oola, Xor7a, Ashina,
JOS 15:34 Zanoha, Enganima, Tapuha, Enama,
JOS 15:35 Yarmuta, Adulaama, Sooko, Azeeqa,
JOS 15:36 Sha7irayma, Aditayma, Gederanne Gederotayma. Ha katamati banta gutatara issife tammanne oydda.
JOS 15:37 Qassi hara katamati, Xinana, Hadasha, Migidaal-Gaade,
JOS 15:38 Dil7ana, Mixipha, Yoqiti7eela,
JOS 15:39 Laakiso, Boxiqaata, Egloona,
JOS 15:40 Kaboona, Lahimaasa, Kitiliisha,
JOS 15:41 Gederoota, Beet-Daagona, Na7imaananne Maqeda. Ha katamati banta gutatara issife tammanne usupuna.
JOS 15:42 Qassi Libina, Etera, Ashena,
JOS 15:43 Yiftaahe, Ashina, Nexiba,
JOS 15:44 Qa7ila, Akziibanne Mareesa. Ha katamati banta gutatara issife uddufuna.
JOS 15:45 Hessadaka, Eqroona katamay ba gutaara yan de7ees.
JOS 15:46 Eqroonape wuloha baggan Ashdooda katamaynne iya gutati de7oosona.
JOS 15:47 Qassi Ashdoodanne Gaaza katamati banta gutatara bidi, Gibxe shaafa zawanne Medetiraane abba lanqiya gakanaw de7oosona.
JOS 15:48 Derey dariya katamati, Samira, Yatira, Sooko,
JOS 15:49 Daane, Qiriyat-Sefera woyko Dabira,
JOS 15:50 Anaaba, Eshtamoo7a, Anima,
JOS 15:51 Goshena, Holonanne Gilo. Ha katamati banta gutatara issife tammanne issino.
JOS 15:52 Qassi Araba, Duma, Esh7ana,
JOS 15:53 Yanima, Beet-Tapuha, Afeeqa,
JOS 15:54 Humixa, Kebroona woyko Qiriyat-Arbanne Xi7oora. Ha katamati banta gutatara issife uddufuna.
JOS 15:55 Qassi Ma7oona, Qarmeloosa, Ziifa, Yuuxa,
JOS 15:56 Izra7eele, Yoqidi7aama, Zanoha,
JOS 15:57 Qayna, Gib7anne Timina. Ha katamati banta gutatara issife tamma.
JOS 15:58 Hessadaka Halhula, Beet-Xura, Gadoora,
JOS 15:59 Ma7irata, Beet-Anotanne Eltiqoona. Ha katamati banta gutatara issife usupuna.
JOS 15:60 Qassi Qiriyaat-Ba7aale woyko Qiriyat-Yi7aarimanne Raaba. Ha katamati banta gutatara issife nam7a.
JOS 15:61 Mela biittan qassi Beet-Araba, Midina, Sekaka,
JOS 15:62 Nibishaana, Maxine katamaanne Engaade. Ha katamati banta gutatara issife usupuna.
JOS 15:63 Gidoshin, Yihuda asay Yerusalaamen de7iya Yaabuseta gooddidi kessanaw danda7ibookona. Hessa gisho, Yaabuseti hachi gakanaw Yerusalaamen Yihuda asaara issife de7oosona.
JOS 16:1 Yoosefa kochata gakida laata biittay dugeha baggara Iyaarko matan de7iya Yordaanosen doomees. Iyaarko pultuwas wuloha bagga gaxape bidi, mela biitta kanthidi, derey dariya biitta ekidi, Beetele gakees.
JOS 16:2 Beetelepe bidi, Arketi de7iya Axaroot-Adaare kanthidi, Looza gakees.
JOS 16:3 Hessafe wuloha baggan de7iya Yafleexata biitta duge wodhidi, garsa Beet-Horona gakidi, yaape Gezera kanthidi, Medetiraane abban zawatees.
JOS 16:4 Yoosefa kochati, Minaasenne Efreema kochati, bantana gakiya biitta laattidosona.
JOS 16:5 Efreema kochaa enta kochan kochan gakida biittay haysa; enta zaway doloha baggara de7iya Axaroot-Adaarepe bidi, qommo bagga Beet-Horona keyees.
JOS 16:6 Yaape kanthidi Medetiraane abban zawatees. Qassi pudeha baggara de7iya zaway Mikmaatata. Yaape doloha baggara de7iya Taanat-Seeloko mirqetidi, Yanoha gakees.
JOS 16:7 Yanohaape dendidi, Axarootenne Na7araate wodhidi, Iyaarko gakidi, wursethay Yordaanose shaafan eqees.
JOS 16:8 Gaxa zaway Tapuhape bidi, wuloha baggara de7iya Qaana shaafa lanqiya oykidi, Medetiraane abban eqees. Efreema kochay banta kochan kochan laattida biittay haysa.
JOS 16:9 Hessi Minaase kochaa laata giddon Efreema kochaas imetida katamatanne enta gutata ubbaa gujees.
JOS 16:10 Gidoshin, Efreema kochay Gezeran de7iya Kanaaneta gooddidi kessibookona. Hessa gisho, Kanaaneti hachi gakanaw Efreema kochaa giddon de7oosona. Shin Efreema kochaas aylletidi oothosona.
JOS 17:1 Yoosefa bayra na7aa Minaase kochaas imetida laata biittay kaallidi de7eysa; Galada aaway Makiri Minaase bayra na7a. Makiri mino olancho gidida gisho, Galadanne Baasane biitta ekidosona.
JOS 17:2 Yordaanose shaafape wuloha baggara de7iya biittay hanko attida Minaase kochaas, Abi7ezeras, Heleqas, Asir7eelas, Seekemas, Hefeerasinne Shamida7as imetis. Haysati Yoosefa na7aa Minaase kochata.
JOS 17:3 Hefeera na7aa Selophaada, Galada na7aa Hefeera, Makira na7aa Galada, Minaase na7aa Makira. Selophaadas macca na7ape attishin, adde na7i baawa. He macca nayta sunthay Mahilo, No7o, Hoglo, Milkonne Tirxo.
JOS 17:4 Enti kahiniya Alaazarako, Nawe na7aa Iyyasukonne deriya cimatako bidi, “Nu dabbotada nuuska laata biitta immana mela Goday Muse kiittis” yaagidosona. Yaatin, Goday kiitidaysada enta dabbotada entawuka laata biitta immis.
JOS 17:5 Minaase kochati Yordaanose shaafape doloha baggan de7iya Galadanne Baasane bolla gujidi tammu biittata saaman ekidosona.
JOS 17:6 Hessa gisho, Minaase kochaafe macca nayti adde naytara issife laata biitta shaaketidosona. Galada biittay attida Minaase kochaas gidis.
JOS 17:7 Minaase kochaa biitta zaway Aseerape bidi, Seekemape doloha baggan de7iya Mikmaatata gakees. He zaway yaape kanthidi, dugeha baggan Antapuhan de7iya deriya gujees.
JOS 17:8 Tapuha biittay Minaase kochaasa, shin Minaase zawan de7iya Tapuha katamay Efreema kochaasa.
JOS 17:9 Qassi he zaway yaape bidi, Qaana shaafan zawatees. Minaase katamata giddon Efreema katamatika de7oosona. Shin Minaase zaway Qaana shaafape pudeha baggara bidi Medetiraane abban eqees.
JOS 17:10 Shaafape dugeha baggan de7iya biittay Efreemasa; qassi pudeha baggan de7iya biittay Minaasesa. Minaase biitta zaway Medetiraane abba gakees. Iyaw pudeha baggara Aseeri, qassi doloha baggara Yisakoori zawatees.
JOS 17:11 Yisakooranne Aseera biittata giddon, Beet-Saana, Yiblaama, Doora, Endoora, Tanakanne Magido geetetiya katamatinne gutati Minaasesa.
JOS 17:12 Shin Minaase kochati he katamatan de7iya asata kessidi katamata oykanaw danda7ibookona. Hessa gisho, Kanaaneti yan duussi oykidosona.
JOS 17:13 Isra7eele asay wolqan minnikoka, Kanaaneti wolqa ooso oothana mela un7ethidosonape attishin, enta kumethi gooddidi kessibookona.
JOS 17:14 Yoosefa kochay, “Goday nuna anjidi, darsis; yaatin, ayis issi saama xalaala laata biitta nuus immadii?” yaagidi Iyyasu oychidosona.
JOS 17:15 Iyyasuy zaaridi, “Hinte daro gidiko, derey dariya Efreema biittay hintew guuxidaba gidiko, Parzetinne Raafaymeti de7iya biitta bidi wora qeexite” yaagis.
JOS 17:16 Yoosefa kochay, “He derey dariya biittayka nuus gidenna. Qassi Beet-Saana katamaninne iya gutan de7eysatasinne Izra7eele zangaaran de7iya Kanaanetas birata para gaareti de7oosona” yaagidosona.
JOS 17:17 Yaatin Iyyasuy Yoosefa koche gidida Efreemanne Minaase, “Hinte daronne wolqaama; hintew issi saama xalaala gidanaw bessenna.
JOS 17:18 Hessa gisho, derey dariya biittay hintebaa gidana. He gezzey wora gidikoka qeexidi, gaxa gakanaw hintebaa oothite. Kanaanetas birata para gaareti de7ikoka, qassi enti ay mino gidikoka hinte enta gooddidi kessanaw danda7eeta” yaagis.
JOS 18:1 Biitta oli xoonidi oykidaape guye, Isra7eele asa ubbay Seelon shiiqidi, Goda goyinno dunkaaniya yan essidosona.
JOS 18:2 Shin Isra7eele asape laata biitta ekiboonna laapun kochati attidosona.
JOS 18:3 Hessa gisho, Iyyasuy Isra7eele asaako, “Goday hinte aawata Xoossay hintew immida biitta laattonna awude gakanaw gam7anee?
JOS 18:4 Issi issi kochaafe heedzu heedzu asata doorite. Issi issi kochay laattana biitta enti yuuyidi, xomoosi be7idi, mazgabidi yaana mela ta enta kiittana. Enti he biittaba xaafi ekidi, simmidi taako yaana.
JOS 18:5 He biitta laapun bessan shaakana. Yihuda kochay dugeha baggan, Yoosefa kochay pudeha baggan de7iya banta biitta oykida mela daana.
JOS 18:6 Ha laapun bessan shaaketana biitta qoncisi xaafidi ekidi yiite. Godaa, nu Xoossaa sinthan entaw saama yeggana.
JOS 18:7 Gidoshin, Leewe kochati kahine gididi, Godaas oothiya gisho, hintera laata biitta ekokona. Gaade kochay, Robeela kochaynne, Minaase kochaafe baggay Yordaanose shaafape doloha baggan, Godaa aylley, Musey entaw immida biitta koyrottidi laatidosona” yaagis.
JOS 18:8 He asati biitta xomoosidi, xaafanaw baanape sinthe, Iyyasuy, “Bidi biitta yuuyidi xomoosidi xaafite; simmidi taako yiite. Taani haysan, Seelon, Godaa sinthan hintew saama yeggana” yaagidi kiittis.
JOS 18:9 Asati bidi, biitta ubbaa yuuyidosona. Katamata ubbaa xaafidi, biitta waati laapun bessan shaakaneko qoncisidosona. Yaati simmidi, Iyyasuy dunkaanida gutaa, Seelo simmidosona.
JOS 18:10 Iyyasuy Godaa sinthan, Seelon entaw saama yeggis. Attida Isra7eele zerethata gakiya laata biitta shaakidi immis.
JOS 18:11 Koyro saamay Biniyaame kochaa enta kochan kochan gakis. Enta gakida biittay Yihudapenne Yoosefa kochaafe giddon de7ees.
JOS 18:12 Pudeha baggara enta zaway Yordaanosepe dendidi, Iyaarko pude keyidi, wuloha baggan de7iya derey dariya biitta kanthidi, Beet-Aweena mela biittan eqees.
JOS 18:13 He zaway dugeha baggara kase Looza geetetidi xeegetiya Beetele kanthidi, dugeha Axaroot-Adaare wodhidi, Beet-Horonape dugeha baggan de7iya zuman zawatees.
JOS 18:14 He zaway dugeha baggara Beet-Horona sinthan de7iya zumaape wuloha bagga xaaxetidi, Yihuda kochaa katama gidida, Qiriyaat-Ba7aale woyko Qiriyat-Yi7aarima aadhees. Hessi wuloha baggara de7iya zawa.
JOS 18:15 Dugeha bagga zaway wuloha baggara Qiriyaat-Yi7aarimepe dendidi, Naftooha pultotan zawatees.
JOS 18:16 Hessafe he zaway duge bidi Raafayme zangaarape pudeha baggan de7iya Henooma zangaarape sintha baggara duge wodhees. Yaape Yaabuseta katamaape dugeha baggan de7iya lanqiya oykidi, Hinoome zangaara wodhidi, Enrogeelan zawatees.
JOS 18:17 Yaape pudeha bagga mirqetidi Enshemeshe baggara Adumima zuma sinthan de7iya Geliloota gakees. Yaape qassi Robeela na7aa Bohaana shuchaako duge wodhees.
JOS 18:18 Qassi Beet-Araba pudeha bagga lanqiya oykidi, duge Yordaanose zangaara wodhees.
JOS 18:19 Hessafe Beet-Hogila pudeha lanqiya kanthi bidi, Yordaanose shaafay goggidi geliya Maxine Abbaafe pudeha bagga gaxa gakees. Haysi dugeha bagga zawa.
JOS 18:20 Doloha bagga zaway Yordaanose shaafa. Biniyaame kochati laattida biittay ubba baggara zawatida zaway haysa.
JOS 18:21 Biniyaame kochay banta kochan kocha laattida katamati, Iyaarko, Beet-Hogila, Emeq-Qaxixa,
JOS 18:22 Beet-Araba, Zamarayme, Beetele,
JOS 18:23 Awiime, Paara, Ofira,
JOS 18:24 Kefaar-Amoona, Ofinanne Gib7a. Enti kumethi tammanne nam7u katama. Enta yuushuwan de7iya gutatika enta bolla guzhetoosona.
JOS 18:25 Qassi Gaba7oona, Rama, Be7erota,
JOS 18:26 Mixipha, Kefira, Mooxa,
JOS 18:27 Reqeema, Yirpha7eela, Tarala,
JOS 18:28 Xela7a, Elefa, Yerusalaame geetetiya Yaabuseta katama, Gib7anne Qiriyat-Yi7aarima. Enti kumethi tammanne oyddu katama. Enta yuushuwan de7iya gutatika enta bolla guzhetoosona. Biniyaame kochay banta kochan laattida biittay haysa.
JOS 19:1 Nam7antho saamay Simoona kochaa enta kochan kochan gakis. Enti laattida biittay Yihuda kochati laattida biitta giddon de7ees.
JOS 19:2 Enti laattida katamati, Barsaabe woyko Seeba, Molada,
JOS 19:3 Haxar-Shu7aala, Bala, Exema,
JOS 19:4 Eltolaada, Batula, Horma,
JOS 19:5 Xiqilaaga, Beet-Markaboota, Haxar-Suusa,
JOS 19:6 Beet-Laba7ootanne Sharuha. Enti kumethi tammanne heedza katama. Enta yuushuwan de7iya gutati enta bolla guzhetoosona.
JOS 19:7 Qassi hara bessan Ayna, Irmoona, Eteranne Ashana geetetiya oyddu katamatanne enta yuushuwan de7iya gutata oykidosona.
JOS 19:8 Simoona biittay dugeha baggan de7iya Ba7ilaat-Ba7eera woyko Rama katamatanne enta yuushuwan de7iya gutata ubbaa gakees. Simoona kochay banta kochan kochan laattida biittay haysa.
JOS 19:9 Yihuda kochata gakida biittay dalga gidida gisho, iyape shaaketidi, Simoona kochatas imetis.
JOS 19:10 Heedzantho saamay Zabloona kochaa enta kochan kochan gakis. Enti laattida biittay Sarida gakees.
JOS 19:11 Yaape dendidi zaway wuloha baggan de7iya Mar7ala kanthidi, Dabasheeta bochishe, Yoqinaama matan de7iya haatha gakees.
JOS 19:12 Saridape doloha bagga mirqetidi, Kisiloot-Taabora kanthidi Dabirataninne Yaafan zawatees.
JOS 19:13 Yaape wuloha baggara kanthidi, Gaat-Hefeeranne It-Qaxinaana gakidi, Irmoonakonne Ne7ako mirqettees.
JOS 19:14 Pudeha bagga zaway Hanatoone yuuyidi, Yiftaahe zangaaran zawatees.
JOS 19:15 He zaway Qaxata, Nahilaala, Shimroona, Yidaalanne Beeteleme geetetiya katamata oykees. Enti kumethi tammanne nam7u katama; enta yuushuwan de7iya gutati enta bolla guzhetoosona.
JOS 19:16 Zabloona kochati banta kochan kochan laattida katamatinne enta yuushuwan de7iya gutati haysata.
JOS 19:17 Oyddantho saamay Yisakoora kochaa enta kochan kochan gakis.
JOS 19:18 Enta zaway Izra7eele, Kasulota, Suneema,
JOS 19:19 Hafarayma, Shi7oona, Anahaarata,
JOS 19:20 Rabita, Qisoona, Abeexa,
JOS 19:21 Rameta, Enganima, Enhadanne Beet-Phaxexa oykees.
JOS 19:22 He biitta zaway Taabore, Shahaxumanne Beet-Sameesa bochishe bidi, Yordaanose shaafan zawatees. Enti kumethi tammanne usupun katama; enta yuushuwan de7iya gutati enta bolla guzhetoosona.
JOS 19:23 Yisakoora kochay banta kochan kochan laattida biitta giddon de7iya katamatinne enta yuushuwan de7iya gutati haysata.
JOS 19:24 Ichashantho saamay Aseera kochaa enta kochan kochan gakis.
JOS 19:25 Enta biitta zaway, Helqata, Hala, Bexena, Azifa,
JOS 19:26 Alameleke, Amadanne Mishaala ekees. Wuloha baggara Qarmeloosaninne Sihoor-Libnaatan zawatees.
JOS 19:27 Qassi doloha baggara Beet-Daagonako mirqetidi, Zabloonanne Yiftahi7eela zangaara bochishe bidi, pudeha baggara Beet-Emeqanne Ni7eela gakees. Qassi pudeha baggara Kaabula,
JOS 19:28 Ebroona, Rehooba, Hamoonanne Qaana kanthidi, Sidoonan zawatees.
JOS 19:29 He zaway Rama yuuyidi, gimben diretida Xiroosa katamaa gakidi, Hoosako mirqetidi, Medetiraane abban zawatees. Qassi Mahalaba, Akziiba,
JOS 19:30 Uma, Afeeqanne Rehooba geetetiya katamata gakidi zawatees. Enti kumethi laatamanne nam7u katama; enta yuushuwan de7iya gutati enta bolla guzhetoosona.
JOS 19:31 Aseera kochay banta kochan kochan laattida katamatinne enta yuushuwan de7iya gutati haysata.
JOS 19:32 Usupuntho saamay Niftaaleme kochaa enta kochan kochan gakis.
JOS 19:33 Enta zaway Helefapenne Zananime wolaape bidi, Adaam-Neqeba, Yabni7eelanne Laquma kanthidi, wursethay Yordaanose shaafan eqees.
JOS 19:34 Qassi he zaway wuloha baggara Aznoot-Taboorako mirqetidi, Huqooqan eqees. He zaway dugeha baggan Zabloona, wuloha baggan Aseera, doloha baggan Yordaanose shaafa kanthidi Yihudan gakees.
JOS 19:35 Gimben diretida katamati, Xidima, Xeera, Hamaata, Raqata, Kenereeta abba,
JOS 19:36 Adaama, Rama, Haxoora,
JOS 19:37 Qeedesha, Edraa7a, Enhaxoora,
JOS 19:38 Yir7oona, Magdela, Horema, Beet-Anaatanne Beet-Sameesa katamata oykees. He katamati kumethi tammanne uddufuna; enta yuushuwan de7iya gutati enta bolla guzhetoosona.
JOS 19:39 Niftaaleme kochay banta kochan kochan laattida katamatinne enta yuushuwan de7iya gutati haysata.
JOS 19:40 Laapuntha saamay Daane kochaa enta kochan kochan gakis.
JOS 19:41 Enti laattida katamati Xor7a, Eshta7oola, Irshemesha,
JOS 19:42 Sha7albima, Eloona, Yitala,
JOS 19:43 Eloona, Timina, Eqroona,
JOS 19:44 Eltaqa, Gibtoona, Balata,
JOS 19:45 Yehuda, Benebaraaqa, Gaat-Rimoona,
JOS 19:46 Mayarqoona, Raqoonanne Yoophe katama yuushuwan de7iya heerata oykees.
JOS 19:47 Daane kochay enta laata biittay entafe eketin, Lashema katama bidi, olan xoonidi, he kataman de7iya asaa mashshan wodhidi, he biitta bantaba oothidosona. He katama sunthaa laammidi, banta aawa Daane sunthan Daane gidi sunthidosona.
JOS 19:48 Daane kochati banta kochan kochan laattida katamatinne enta yuushuwan de7iya gutati haysata.
JOS 19:49 Isra7eele asay biitta shaahuwa ongida wode, Nawe na7aa Iyyasus laata biitta immidosona.
JOS 19:50 Goday kase kiittidaysada Iyyasuy derey dariya Efreeman de7iya Timnaat-Saara katama immana mela oychin, iyaw immidosona. He katamaa zaari giigisidi, yan de7is.
JOS 19:51 Kahiney Alaazari, Nawe na7aa Iyyasuynne Isra7eele soo asaa halaqati Seelon, Godaa sinthan Xoossaa dunkaaniya pengen saama yeggidi, shaakida laata biittay haysa. Enti biitta shaakidi ongidosona.
JOS 20:1 Hessafe guye, Goday Iyyasuko haysada yaagis;
JOS 20:2 “Taani Muse baggara kiitidaysada, ‘Asay baqatidi attiya katamata dummayana mela’ Isra7eele asaas oda.
JOS 20:3 Oonika qoponnanne eronna ase wodhiko, yaa baqatidi gukida suuthaa gisho suuthi zaaranaw koya uraape attana.
JOS 20:4 Ase wodhidaysi he katamatape issuwako baqatidi bidi, katamaa pengen eqidi, hanidaba ubbaa he katamaa cimatas odo. Hessafe guye, enti banta katamaa efidi, I daana bessi immiko entara yan de7o.
JOS 20:5 Suuthaa gisho suuthi zaaranaw koya uray iya kaallidi yiiko, I ba ishaa eridi, qohanaw koyidi wodhiboonna gisho he katamaa cimati iya aathidi immofo.
JOS 20:6 Shango sinthan shiiqidi, pirdetana gakanawunne he wode de7iya kahine halaqay hayqana gakanaw he kataman de7o. Hessafe guye, baqatidi keyida katamaa guye simmidi ba soo gelo” yaagis.
JOS 20:7 Yaatin Isra7eele asay derey dariya Niftaalemen Galilan de7iya Qaadesa, derey dariya Efreeman de7iya Seekemanne derey dariya Yihudan de7iya Qiriyaat-Arba woyko Kebroona dummayidosona.
JOS 20:8 Yordaanose shaafape hefinthan, Iyaarkofe doloha baggan dhoqan, mela biittan, Robeela, kochata biittan de7iya Boosora, Gaade kochata biittan, Galadan de7iya Ramotanne Minaase kochata biittan, Baasanen de7iya Goolana dummayidosona.
JOS 20:9 Isra7eele asaynne enta giddon de7iya betanchoti baqatidi attana mela dummatida katamati haysata. Oonika eronna de7ishe ase wodhiko, shango sinthan pirdetonna de7ishe, hayqonna attanaw ha katamatape issuwako baqatanaw danda7ees.
JOS 21:1 Hessafe guye, Isra7eele asay Kanaane biittan, Seelon dunkaanidi de7ishin, Leewe soo asaa halaqati kahiniya Alaazarako, Nawe na7aa Iyyasukonne Isra7eele halaqatako yidi, “Nuuni daana katamatanne mehe heemmiya biitta nuus immana mela, Goday Muse baggara kiittis” yaagidosona.
JOS 21:3 Hessa gisho, Goday kiitidaysada, Isra7eele asay Leewetas katamatanne mehe heemmiya biitta banta biittafe shaakidi, immidosona.
JOS 21:4 Koyro saamay Qahaata kochaas keyis. Kahiniya Aarona kochay, Yihuda, Simoonanne Biniyaame kochaafe tammanne heedzu katamata saaman ekidosona.
JOS 21:5 Attida Qahaata kochay, Efreema, Daanenne wuloha baggan de7iya Minaase kochaafe tammu katamata saaman ekidosona.
JOS 21:6 Gedisoona kochay, Yisakoora, Aseera Niftaalemenne doloha baggan de7iya Minaase kochaafe tammanne heedzu katamata saaman ekidosona.
JOS 21:7 Meraara kochay, Robeela, Gaadenne Zabloona kochaafe tammanne nam7u katamata ekidosona.
JOS 21:8 Goday Muse baggara kiitidaysada, Isra7eele asay ha katamatanne mehe heemmiya biitta Leewetas saaman shaakidi immidosona.
JOS 21:9 Isra7eele asay Yihudanne Simoona kochaafe kaallidi sunthan xeegetida katamata immidosona.
JOS 21:10 Koyro saamay Leewe kochaafe yeletida, Qahaata koche gidida Aarona yaraas keyin, entaw imetida katamati haysata;
JOS 21:11 Derey dariya Yihudan de7iya Qiriyaat-Arba woyko Kebroonenne iya yuushuwan de7iya hentha biittata entaw immidosona. (Arbi Anaaqe aawa.)
JOS 21:12 Shin koyro he katama yuushuwan de7iya biittanne gutata Yoofona na7aa Kaalebas laata oothidi immidosona.
JOS 21:13 Kahiniya Aarona yaraas ase wodhida asi baqatidi attiya Kebroonenne hentha biitta, Libinanne hentha biitta,
JOS 21:14 Yatiranne hentha biitta, Eshtamoo7anne hentha biitta,
JOS 21:15 Holonanne hentha biitta, Dabiranne hentha biitta,
JOS 21:16 Aynanne hentha biitta, Yuuxanne hentha biitta, Beet-Sameesanne hentha biitta. Haysati Yihudapenne Simoonape eketida, katamati kumethi uddufuna.
JOS 21:17 Biniyaame kochaafe eketida oyddu katamati, Gaba7oonanne hentha biitta, Gib7anne hentha biitta,
JOS 21:18 Anatootenne hentha biitta, Almoonanne hentha biitta.
JOS 21:19 Aarona koche gidida kahinetas imetida katamatinne hentha biittati tammanne heedza.
JOS 21:20 Leewe koche gidida, attida Qahaata kochaas, Efreemas imetida biittafe shaaketidi imetis.
JOS 21:21 Qassi entaw derey dariya Efreeman, ase wodhida asi baqatidi attiya oyddu katamati Seekemanne hentha biitta, Gezeranne hentha biitta,
JOS 21:22 Qibxaymanne hentha biitta, Beet-Horonanne hentha biitta immidosona.
JOS 21:23 Daane kochaafe shaaketi imetida oyddu katamati, Eltaqanne hentha biitta, Gibetonanne hentha biitta,
JOS 21:24 Eloonanne hentha biitta, Gaat-Rimoonanne hentha biitta.
JOS 21:25 Minaase kocha baggafe shaaketi imetida nam7u katamati, Tanakanne hentha biitta, Gaat-Rimoonanne hentha biitta.
JOS 21:26 Attida Qahaata kochati hentha biittara issife tammu katama ekidosona.
JOS 21:27 Hara Leewe koche gidida Gedisoona kochaas imetida biittay, Minaase kocha baggaafe ase wodhida asi baqatidi attiya nam7u katamati, Baasanen de7iya Goolananne hentha biitta, Be7eshtiranne hentha biitta.
JOS 21:28 Yisakoora kochaafe imetida oyddu katamati, Qisoonanne hentha biitta, Debraatanne hentha biitta.
JOS 21:29 Yarmutanne hentha biitta, Enganimanne hentha biitta.
JOS 21:30 Aseera kochaafe shaaketi imetida oyddu katamati Mishaalanne hentha biitta, Abdoonanne hentha biitta,
JOS 21:31 Helqatenne hentha biitta, Rehoobanne hentha biitta.
JOS 21:32 Niftaaleme kochaafe shaaketi imetida heedzu katamati, ase wodhida asi baqatidi attiya, Galilan de7iya Qaadesanne hentha biitta, Hamoot-Dooranne hentha biitta, Qartananne hentha biitta.
JOS 21:33 Gedisoona kochati hentha biittara issife tammanne heedzu katamata ekidosona.
JOS 21:34 Leewe koche gidida attida Meraara kochati, Zabloona kochaafe shaaketi imetida oyddu katamati, Yoqnaamanne hentha biitta, Qartananne hentha biitta,
JOS 21:35 Diminanne hentha biitta, Nahilaalanne hentha biitta ekidosona.
JOS 21:36 Robeela, kochaafe shaaketidi imetida oyddu katamati, Boosoranne hentha biitta, Yahaaxanne hentha biitta,
JOS 21:37 Qidemootanne hentha biitta, Mefaatanne hentha biitta.
JOS 21:38 Gaade kochaafe shaaketidi imetida oyddu katamati, Galadan ase wodhida asi baqatidi attiya, Ramotanne hentha biitta, Mahinayme,
JOS 21:39 Haseboona, Ya7izeera.
JOS 21:40 Leewe koche gidida attida Meraara kochay ekida katamati tammanne nam7a.
JOS 21:41 Isra7eele asay laattida biittafe Leewe kochaas imetida katamati hentha biittara issife oytamanne hospuna.
JOS 21:42 He katamata ubbaa yuushuwan hentha biittati de7oosona.
JOS 21:43 Goday enta aawatas immana gidi caaqida biitta ubbaa Isra7eele asaas immis. Enti he biitta laattidi, yan de7idosona.
JOS 21:44 Goday enta aawatas caaqidaysada, enta saron wothis. Enti olas keyida wode ubban enta morketi entara eqetanaw danda7ibookona.
JOS 21:45 Goday Isra7eele asaas immana gidi caaqida lo77oba ubbaa polisipe attishin, issoyka attibeenna.
JOS 22:1 Hessafe guye, Iyyasuy Robeela, Gaadenne Minaase kochaafe baggaa xeegidi,
JOS 22:2 “Godaa aylley Musey hintena kiitida ubbaa polideta; qassi taw kiitetideta.
JOS 22:3 He ubban hachi gakanaw hinte ishata yeggibeeketa. Godaa, hinte Xoossaa kiitta ubbaa polideta.
JOS 22:4 Goday hinte Xoossay hintew caaqida qaalada, hinte ishata shempisis. Hessa gisho, Godaa aylley Musey hintew Yordaanose shaafape doloha baggan immida, laata biittan de7iya hinte soo soo simmite.
JOS 22:5 Godaa aylley Musey hintena kiitida higgiya minthidi naagite. Godaa hinte Xoossaa siiqite. Iya ogiyape deshopite; iya kiita polite. Iyara shiphi gidi de7ite; hinte kumetha wozanapenne kumetha shempuwafe iyaw oothite” yaagis.
JOS 22:6 Iyyasuy enta anjidi yeddin enti banta soo simmidosona.
JOS 22:7 Iyyasuy, Minaase kochaa baggaas Baasanen laata biitta immis. Attida bagga kochaas qassi Yordaanosepe wuloha baggan laata biitta immis. Iyyasuy enta anjidi moyzishe,
JOS 22:8 Hinte, “Daro mehe, bira, worqa, naase, biratanne daro ma7o ekidi hinte soo simmana haneeta. Hessa gisho, hinte morketape di77idaysa hinte ishatara shaaketite” yaagis.
JOS 22:9 Robeela, Gaadenne Minaase kochaa baggay banta laata biitta simmidosona. Enti, Goday Muse baggara kiittin laattida Galada biitta, Kanaane biittan, Seelon de7iya Isra7eele asaape shaaketidi bidosona.
JOS 22:10 Robeela, Gaadenne Minaase kochaafe baggay Yordaanose matan Kanaane biittan de7iya Galiloota yidi, shaafa matan malaalsiya gita yarsho bessi keexidosona.
JOS 22:11 Robeela, Gaadenne Minaase kochaafe baggay Yordaanose matan, Galilootan, Kanaane biittan yarsho bessi keexidaysa attida Isra7eele asay si7idosona.
JOS 22:12 Isra7eele asay hessa si7idi, enta olanaw Seelon shiiqidosona.
JOS 22:13 Hessafe sinthe Isra7eele asay, kahiniya Alaazara na7aa Pinihaasa, Galadan de7iya Robeela, Gaadenne Minaase kochaafe baggatako yeddidosona.
JOS 22:14 Issi issi kochay ba soo halaqatape issi issi ase dooridi, tammu asi Pinihaasara yeddidosona.
JOS 22:15 Enti Robeela, Gaadenne Minaase kochaafe baggay Galada bidi,
JOS 22:16 “Godaa asay, ‘Isra7eele Xoossaa bolla de7iya hinte ammanuwa ayis paciseetii? Hintew yarsho bessi keexidi, Godaape haakideta. Iya bolla ayis makallidetii?
JOS 22:17 Pe7ooran nu oothida nagaray gidennee? Godaa asaa bolla boshi wodhis; hachi gakanaw nuuni he nagaraape geeyibooko.
JOS 22:18 Godaa bolla hachi hinte zoko zaarideta. Hachi hinte iya bolla zoko zaariko wonto I kumetha Isra7eele asaa hanqana.
JOS 22:19 Hinte de7iya biittay tunidaba gidiko, Godaa dunkaaney de7iya biitta, haa nuuko yidi, nu laata shaaketite. Shin Godaa, nu Xoossaa yarsho bessaafe hara yarsho bessi keexidi Xoossaa bolla woyko nu bolla makallofite.
JOS 22:20 Zaara na7ay Akaani digetidaba ekidi, nagara oothida gisho, kumetha Isra7eele asaa bolla Godaa hanqoy wodhibeenneyee? Iya nagara gaason hayqiday iya xalaala gidenna’ ” yaagidosona.
JOS 22:21 Yaatin Robeela, Gaadenne Minaase kochaafe baggay haysada yaagidi zaaridosona.
JOS 22:22 “Godaa xalaali Xoosse! Godaa xalaali Xoosse! Nuuni haysa ayis oothidaako I erees; hinteka erana mela nu koyoos. Nuuni Godaa bolla makallidabaanne kiitetonna ixidaba gidiko, hachi nuna paxa wothofite.
JOS 22:23 Nu Godaas kiitetonna ixidi, xuussa yarshuwa, katha yarshuwanne issifetetha yarshuwa yarshanaw yarsho bessi keexidaba gidiko, Goday nuna hanqo.
JOS 22:24 Nu hessa qopidi keexibooko. Nuuni yarsho bessi keexiday, wonto hinte nayti, nu naytako, ‘Hintew Godaa, Isra7eele Xoossara ay gahetethi de7ii?
JOS 22:25 Goday nu giddoninne Robeelanne Gaade kochaa giddon Yordaanose shaafa zawa wothis. Hessa gisho, Godaara hintew gahetethi baawa’ gandeshsha gidi yayyida gishosa. Qassi hinte kochay nu kochaa Godaa goyinno diggonna aggokona” yaagidi qopida.
JOS 22:26 “Nu yarsho bessi keexiday hessasa. Xuussa woyko hara yarsho yarshanaasa gidenna.
JOS 22:27 Nuuni yarsho bessi keexiday, xuussa, issifetethanne hara yarshuwa yarshishe de7idaysasinne Godaa dunkaaniya sinthan goyinnishe de7idaysas, nu giddoninne hinte giddon qassi kaalliya yeleta giddon hessi marka gidana melasa. Hessi hinte nayti nu naytako, ‘Hintew Godaara ay gahetethika baawa’ yaagonna mela maadana.
JOS 22:28 Enti wodepe nuuko woyko nu kochaako hessada giiko, nu nayti zaaridi, ‘Nu aawati Godaas keexida yarsho bessa leemisuwa haysa be7ite. Hessi hinte giddoninne nu giddon marka gidana melasafe attishin, xuussa woyko hara yarsho yarshanaasa gidenna’ gaanaw danda7ana melasa.
JOS 22:29 Nu Godaa bolla makallanaysi nuupe haako. Godaa nu Xoossaa dunkaaniya sinthan de7iya yarsho bessaafe haraa xuussa, kathaanne hara yarsho bessi keexidi Xoossaa goyinno aggoko” yaagidi zaaridosona.
JOS 22:30 Kahiney Pinihaasinne iyara de7iya Isra7eele halaqati, Robeela, Gaadenne Minaase kochaafe baggay odidaysa si7idi, ufaytidosona.
JOS 22:31 Kahiniya Alaazara na7ay Pinihaasi, Robeela, Gaadenne Minaase kochatako, “Goday nuura de7eysa nu hachi erida. Hinte Godaa bolla makallibeeketa. Hinte Isra7eele asaa Godaa pirdaafe ashshideta” yaagis.
JOS 22:32 Kahiniya Alaazara na7ay Pinihaasinne iyara de7iya halaqati Galadan de7iya Robeelanne Gaade kochaa matape Kanaanen de7iya Isra7eele asaako simmidi, hanidaba entaw odidosona.
JOS 22:33 Isra7eele asay ufaytidi, Xoossaa galatidosona. Hessafe guye, Robeelanne Gaade asati de7iya biitta olidi dhaysanaw odetibookona.
JOS 22:34 Robeelanne Gaade kochay, “Ha yarsho bessay Godaa xalaali Xoossaa gideysas nuus marka” yaagidi, he yarsho bessa “Marka” gidi sunthidosona.
JOS 23:1 Daro wode gakanaw Goday Isra7eele asaa enta yuushuwan de7iya morketape shempisis. He wode Iyyasuy cimin, laythi sugetis.
JOS 23:2 Iyyasuy, Isra7eele asa ubbaa, cimata, halaqata, daynnatanne toora moconata issife xeegidi, “Taani ha77i daro cimas.
JOS 23:3 Goday, hinte Xoossay ha biittan de7iya kawotethata oli xoonana mela waatidi hintena maaddidaako be7ideta.
JOS 23:4 Dolohan Yordaanose shaafa, wulohan Medetiraane abba gakanaw de7iya oyketida biittanne oyketonna biitta ubbaa hinte kochaas shaaka immas.
JOS 23:5 Goday, hinte Xoossay enta hinte sinthafe gooddidi kessana. Goday, hinte Xoossay hintew caaqidaysada hinte enta biitta laattana.
JOS 23:6 “Muse higge maxaafan xaafetida ubbaa minnidi naagitenne polite; iyape ushachi woyko haddirsi goopite.
JOS 23:7 Hinte giddon attida deriyara walaketofite. Enta xoossata sunthaa xeegopite woyko enta sunthan caaqofite. Entaw oothopite woyko entaw goyinnofite.
JOS 23:8 Shin hachi gakanaw hinte oothidaysada Godaa hinte Xoossaas ammanetite.
JOS 23:9 “Goday, gitanne mino kawotethata hinte sinthafe gooddidi kessis. Hintera hachi gakanaw oonika eqetanaw danda7ibeena.
JOS 23:10 Goday, hinte Xoossay hintew caaqidaysada, I hintew oletiya gisho, hintefe issi asi mukulu asaa yedethana.
JOS 23:11 Godaa, hinte Xoossaa ubba wode siiqite.
JOS 23:12 Shin hinte guye simmidi, hinte giddon attida deriyara walaketiko, hinte enta maccasa, qassi enti hinte maccasa ekidi entara qashetiko,
JOS 23:13 Goday, hinte Xoossay he deriya hinte sinthafe gooddidi kessonnaysa erite. Goday, hinte Xoossay hintew immida ha lo77o biittafe hinte dhayana gakanaw, enti hintew xihenne gite gidana. Enti hinte zokuwas lisso, hinte ayfiyas agunthu gidana.
JOS 23:14 “Ha77i ta hayqanaw matas. Goday, hinte Xoossay hintew immana gidi caaqida lo77oba ubbaafe issoyka attiboonaysa hinte ubbay, hinte wozananinne shempuwan ereeta. I hintew immana gidi caaqidabape issoyka attona ubbay poletis.
JOS 23:15 Goday, hinte Xoossay hintera caaqida caaquwa hinte menthidi, hara xoossatas oothikonne goyinniko, Godaa hanqoy hinte bolla eexana.
JOS 23:16 Goday, hinte Xoossay hintew immana gidi caaqida lo77oba ubbaa ashshona polidaysada, I hintew immida ha lo77o biittafe hintena dhaysana gakanaw iita ubbaa hinte bolla ehana. I hintew immida lo77o biittafe ellesidi hinte dhayana.”
JOS 24:1 Iyyasuy Isra7eele asa ubbaa Seekeman xeegis. Cimata, halaqata, daynnatanne toora moconata xeegin, enti Xoossa sinthan shiiqidosona.
JOS 24:2 Iyyasuy asaako, “Goday Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees; ‘Beni hinte aawati Efraxiisa shaafape hefinthan, hara xoossatas goyinnishe de7idosona. Entafe issoy Abrahaamenne Nakoora aawa Taara.
JOS 24:3 Shin hinte aawa Abrahaame, Efraxiisa shaafape hefinthan de7iya biittafe xeegada, Kanaane biittan kaalethas. Iya kochaa darsas; Yisaaqaka iyaw immas.
JOS 24:4 Yisaaqas Yayqoobanne Eesawe immas. Derey dariya Sayre biitta Eesawe laatisas, shin Yayqoobinne iya nayti Gibxe bidosona.
JOS 24:5 “ ‘Guyepe Musanne Aarona kiittada Gibxe biitta gadon shocas; wursethan hintena kessas.
JOS 24:6 Hinte aawata Gibxefe kessida wode Zo7o Abbaako bidosona. Gibxeti parataninne para gaaretan hinte aawata guye zaaranaw yedethidosona.
JOS 24:7 Enti taako waassida wode enta giddoninne Gibxeta giddon dhumaa yeggas. Yaatada, abbay enta bolla simmanaadanne enta mittanaada oothas. Taani Gibxeta bolla oothidaba hinte hinte ayfen be7ideta. Hinte mela biittan daro wode de7ideta.
JOS 24:8 Hessafe guye, Yordaanose shaafape doloha baggan de7iya Amooreta biitta hintena ehas. Enti hintena olidosona, shin ta hintew xoono immas. Ta enta dhaysin, hinte enta biitta laattideta.
JOS 24:9 Hessafe guye, Moo7abe biitta kawoy, Sifoora na7ay Balaaqi, dendidi, Isra7eeletara oletis. I hintena baaddana mela Bi7oora na7aa, Balaama xeegis.
JOS 24:10 Shin ta Balaama si7abike; I hintena anjana mela oothada, hintena Balaaqa kushiyape ashshas.
JOS 24:11 Hinte Yordaanose shaafa pinnidi, Iyaarko yideta. Iyaarko asay, Amooreti, Parzeti, Kanaaneti, Hiteti, Gergeseti, Hiwetinne Yaabuseti hintera oletanaw dendidosona, shin ta hintena xoonisas.
JOS 24:12 Yordaanose shaafape doloha baggan de7iya nam7u Amoore kawota bolla oothidaysada, kazhe kiittada entana hinte sinthafe goodda kessas. Hessi haniday, hinte mashshaana woyko hinte dongiyana gidenna.
JOS 24:13 Hinte qeexi kessiboonna biittanne hinte keexiboonna katamata taani hintew immin de7eeta. Ha77i hinte tokiboonna woyne ayfiyanne shamaho ayfiya meeta’ ” yaagees.
JOS 24:14 Qassika Iyyasuy kaallidi, “Godaa bonchite; polo ammanetethaninne suure wozanan iyaw kiitetite. Hinte mayzati Efraxiisa shaafape hefinthaninne Gibxen goyinnida eeqata aggidi Godaa goyinnite.
JOS 24:15 Hinte Godaa goyinnanaw koyonna ixiko, hinte aawati Efraxiisa shaafape hefinthan de7ishe goyinnida eeqata gidin, woyko ha77i hinte de7iya Amooreta eeqata gidin, hinte goyinnana Xoossa hachi doorite. Shin taani, ta soo asaara nu Godaa goyinnana” yaagis.
JOS 24:16 Asay zaaridi, “Godaa aggidi, hara eeqa xoossata goyinnanaysi nuupe haako.
JOS 24:17 Nu Godaa Xoossay nunanne nu aawata Gibxe aylletethaafe kessis; I oothida gita malaatata be7ida. Nu kanthidi aadhida biitta ubban Goday nuna naagis.
JOS 24:18 Goday Amooretanne he biittan de7iya hara kawotethata nu sinthafe gooddidi kessis. Hessa gisho, I nu Xoossaa gidiya gisho nu iya goyinnana” yaagidosona.
JOS 24:19 Iyyasuy zaaridi, “Goday geeshshinne qanaatiya Xoossi gidiya gisho, hinte iya goyinnanaw danda7eketa. I hinte naaquwa woyko hinte nagara atto geenna.
JOS 24:20 Hinte Godaas zoko zaaridi, eeqa xoossata goyinniko, I hintew kase lo77o gidikoka simmidi hintena qohananne dhaysana” yaagis.
JOS 24:21 Asay zaaridi, “Nu hara eeqa xoossata goyinnoko; nuuni Godaa, iya xalaala goyinnana” yaagis.
JOS 24:22 Iyyasuy, “Hinte Godaa goyinnana gidaysas hinte, hinte huuphen marka” yaagis. Entika, “Ee nuuni marka” yaagidosona.
JOS 24:23 Iyyasuy zaaridi, “Hinte giddon de7iya eeqa xoossata diggite; hinte wozanaa Godaako, Isra7eele Xoossaako zaarite” yaagis.
JOS 24:24 Entika, “Nuuni Godaa, nu Xoossaa goyinnana; iya kiita naagana” yaagidosona.
JOS 24:25 He gallas Iyyasuy, Seekeman asay Xoossara caaqana mela oothis. Enti kaallana higgiya entaw giigisidi,
JOS 24:26 higge maxaafan xaafis. Hessafe guye, issi gita shuchi ekidi, Godaa dunkaaniya matan de7iya wolaa garsan essis.
JOS 24:27 Iyyasuy asaako, “Ha shuchaa be7ite; I nu bolla marka. Goday nuus odidaba ubbaa ha shuchay si7is. Hinte Xoossaa bolla makalliko, ha shuchay hinte bolla marka gidana” yaagis.
JOS 24:28 Yaatidi, Iyyasuy asaa ubbaa moyzis. Asa ubbay banta laata biitta simmidi bidosona.
JOS 24:29 Godaa aylley, Nawe na7aa Iyyasuy xeetanne tammu laythan hayqis.
JOS 24:30 Asay iya Ga7aasa zumaape pudeha baggan, derey dariya Efreeman de7iya iya laata biittan, Timnaat-Saaran iya moogidosona.
JOS 24:31 Iyyasuy paxa de7ida wode ubban Isra7eele asay Godaa goyinnidosona. Iyape guye, Xoossay Isra7eele asaas oothida ooso ubbaa banta ayfen be7ida cimata wode ubban Godaa goyinnidosona.
JOS 24:32 Isra7eele asay Gibxe biittafe eki keyida, Yoosefa meqethaa Seekeman moogidosona. He bessaa Yayqoobi Seekema aawa Hamoora naytape issi xeetu bira santimen shammis. He biitta guyepe Yoosefa kochay laattidosona.
JOS 24:33 Aarona na7ay Alaazari hayqidi, iya na7aa Pinihaasas imetida derey dariya Efreema biittan de7iya Gib7an moogetis.
JDG 1:1 Iyyasuy hayqidaape guye Isra7eele asay, “Kanaane biitta olanaw nu kochatape koyrottidi keyanay oonee?” yaagidi Godaa oychidosona.
JDG 1:2 Goday, “Yihuda kochay koyrottidi keyo. Taani biitta iya kushen aathada immas” yaagis.
JDG 1:3 Yihuda asay banta ishata, Simoona kochata, “Nuuni Kanaaneta olana mela nuna gishon gakida biitta nuura yedhite. Nuka hintena gishon gakida biitta hintera baana” yaagis. Simoona kochay Yihuda kochaara issife olanaw bis.
JDG 1:4 Goday Kanaanetanne Parzeta enta kushen aathidi immin, Beezeqa kataman tammu mukulu asaa wodhidosona.
JDG 1:5 Beezeqa kataman kawa Adooni-Beezeqa demmidi, iyara oletidi Kanaanetanne Parzeta xoonidosona.
JDG 1:6 Adooni-Beezeqi baqatiya wode enti yedethi oykidi, iya kushiyanne iya tohuwa wogga biradheta qanxidosona.
JDG 1:7 Adooni-Beezeqi, “Kushenne toho wogga biradheta taani qanxida laapun tammu kawoti ta gaytape wodhida tiifiya maxidi moosona. Taani enta bolla oothidaysada Xoossay ta bolla oothis” yaagis. Iya Yerusalaame ehin yan hayqis.
JDG 1:8 Yihuda asay Yerusalaame oli oykidi asaa mashshan wodhidi, katamaa taman xuuggidosona.
JDG 1:9 Hessafe guye, Yihuda asay derey dariya biittan, Negeba mela biittaninne gadhan de7iya Kanaaneta olanaw bidosona.
JDG 1:10 Kase Qiriyaat-Arba geetetiya Kebroona kataman de7iya Kanaaneta olidi Sesaya, Akmaananne Talmaya geetetiya kochata xoonidosona.
JDG 1:11 Yaape dendidi Yihuda asay Debira kataman de7iya asaa olanaw bidosona. Debira katamay kase Qiriyat-Sefera geetetees.
JDG 1:12 Kaalebi, “Qiriyat-Sefera olidi oykiya uraas taani ta na7iw Akiso immana” yaagis.
JDG 1:13 Kaaleba kaalo isha Qanaza na7ay Gotoniyali he katamaa olidi oykin, Kaalebi ba na7iw Akiso iyaw immis.
JDG 1:14 Aksa Gotoniyala geliya wode, I aaway iw gade immanaada woossana mela Gotoniyali iyo zoris. Iya baqulo bollafe wodhishin Kaalebi ta naatte, “Ay koyay?” yaagidi oychis.
JDG 1:15 Iya, “Taw woyto imma. Neeni kase taw immida biittay qaa7e gidida gisho haatha pultota taw immarki” yaagasu. Kaalebi qommo pultuwanne garsa pultuwa iw immis.
JDG 1:16 Musey bolluwa Qenaati kochati Yihuda asaara Zamba Katama geetetiya Iyaarko katamaape dendidi Arada katamaape dugeha baggara, Negeban de7iya Yihuda mela biitta bidi yan de7iya asaa giddon uttidosona.
JDG 1:17 Yihuda asay Simoona asaara issife bidi, Xafaata kataman de7iya Kanaaneta xoonidi katamaa kumethi dhaysidi, he katamaa Horma gidi sunthidosona.
JDG 1:18 Yihuda asay gujidi Gaaza, Asqaloona, Eqroonanne enta yuushuwan de7iya gutata oykidosona.
JDG 1:19 Goday Yihuda asaara de7iya gisho, derey dariya biitta laattidosona. Shin demba biittan de7iya asatas biratape oosetida ola para gaareti de7iya gisho, Yihuda asay enta gooddidi kessanaw danda7ibookona.
JDG 1:20 Musey kiittidaysada, Kebroona katamaa Kaalebas immin Kaalebi Anaaqe koche gidida heedzu kochata gooddidi kessis.
JDG 1:21 Shin Biniyaame kochati Yerusalaamen de7iya Yaabuseta gooddidi kessibookona. He wodepe doomin Yaabuseti Biniyaame kochatara issife Yerusalaamen de7idosona.
JDG 1:22 Qassi Yoosefa kochati Beetele katamaa olidosona; Xoossay entara de7ees.
JDG 1:23 Yoosefa kochati kase Looza geetetiya Beetele katamaa wochiya asata kiittidosona.
JDG 1:24 Enti katamaape keyiya issi addiya demmidi, “Katamaa giddo waanidi gelanaw danda7etiyako nuna bessa; nuuni new keehana” yaagidosona.
JDG 1:25 I enta bessin kataman de7iya asaa mashshan buthidosona; shin he addiyanne iya soo asa ubbaa ashshidosona.
JDG 1:26 Guype he addey Hiteta biitta bidi, yan katamaa keexidi Looza gidi sunthis. Hachi gakanaw he katamay he sunthan xeegetees.
JDG 1:27 Minaase kochati Beet-Saana, Tanaka, Doora, Yiblaama Magidonne enta yuushuwan de7iya gutatan de7iya asata gooddidi kessibookona. Yaatin, Kanaaneti yan duussu oykidosona.
JDG 1:28 Isra7eele asay minnida wode Kanaaneta bantaw wolqan oosisidosona; shin enta kumethi biittafe kessidi goodibookona.
JDG 1:29 Efreema kochatika Gezera kataman de7iya Kanaaneta gooddidi kessibookona; yaatin, Kanaaneti yan entara de7idosona.
JDG 1:30 Zabloona kochati Qitiroonaninne Nahilaalan de7iya asata gooddidi kessibookona; yaatin, Kanaaneti yan entara issife de7idosona. Shin Zabloona kochati enta bantaw wolqan oosisidasona.
JDG 1:31 Aseera kochati Akon, Sidoonan, Ahilaaban, Akziiban, Helban, Afeeqaninne Rehooban de7iya asata gooddi kessibookona.
JDG 1:32 Kanaaneti keyonna attida gisho Aseera kochati entara yan issife de7idosona.
JDG 1:33 Niftaaleme kochati Beet-Sameesaninne Beet-Anaatan de7iya asata gooddi kessibookona; shin Kanaanetara yan issife de7idosona. Beet-Sameesanne Beet-Anata asata bantaw wolqan oosisidosona.
JDG 1:34 Amooreti Daane kochata derey dariya biitta yedethidosona; enti demba biitta wodhonna mela teqidosona.
