JDG 20:39 Ola denban de7iya Isra7eele asay baqateysa aggidi, guye simmidi, enta olidosona. Biniyaame asay Isra7eele asaape hastamu gidiya asaa wodhidi, “Kaseysada ha77ika nu enta xoonida” yaagidosona.
JDG 20:40 Shin malla cuyay katamaape pude kessi doomis. Biniyaame asay guye xeelliya wode katamay taman xuugetin, cuyay pude keyeysa be7idosona.
JDG 20:41 Hessafe guye, Isra7eeleti Biniyaame asaa bolla guye simmidosona. Biniyaame asay wurana haneysa erida gisho dagammidosona.
JDG 20:42 Hessa gisho, enti Isra7eele asaa sinthafe bazzo simmidi baqatidosona; shin kessi ekanaw danda7ibookona. Katamatape keyida Isra7eele olanchoti gidduwan enta wodhi wursidosona.
JDG 20:43 Isra7eeleti Biniyaame asaa teqidi, Gib7a katamaape doloha baggara de7iya bessaa gakanaw yedethidi darota wodhidosona.
JDG 20:44 Yan Biniyaame asaape tammanne hospun mukulu mino olanchoti hayqidosona;
JDG 20:45 Entafe attidaysati guye simmidi, bazzuwa kanthidi, Irmoona zaallako baqatidosona. Isra7eeleti entafe ichashu mukulu asaa oge bolla wodhidosona. Entafe attidaysata Gidooma gakanaw yedethidi nam7u mukulu asaa wodhidosona.
JDG 20:46 He gallas Biniyaame asaape mashshan oletiya laatamanne ichashu mukulu mino olanchoti hayqidosona.
JDG 20:47 Shin usupun xeetu asati bazzuwa kanthidi, Irmoona Zaallako baqatidi, yan oyddu ageena gam7idosona.
JDG 20:48 Isra7eele asay attida Biniyaame asaako guye simmidi, addenne macca, naytanne mehiya ubbaa wodhidosona; heeran de7iya katamata ubbaa taman xuuggidosona.
JDG 21:1 Isra7eele asay Mixiphan shiiqida wode, “Nu giddofe oonika Biniyaame asas ba na7a macho immofo” yaagidi caaqi uttidosona.
JDG 21:2 Isra7eeleti Beetele katamaa bidi, yan sa7i qammana gakanaw Xoossaa sinthan uttidi, banta qaala dhoqu oothidi yeekidosona.
JDG 21:3 Enti, “Abeeti Godaw, Isra7eele Xoossaw, haysi Isra7eelen ayis hanidee? Hachi Isra7eele asaa giddofe issi kochay ayis pacidee?” yaagidosona.
JDG 21:4 Wontetha gallas guura dendidi, yarsho bessi giigisidi, xuussa yarshonne issifetetha yarsho shiishidosona.
JDG 21:5 Isra7eeleti, “Isra7eele zare ubbaafe Godaa sinthan shiiqiya bessaa yoonna kochay oonee?” yaagidi oychidosona. Enti hessa oychida gaasoy, “Mixipha kataman Godaa sinthan shiiqanaw yiboona asi oonika hayqo” yaagidi kase caaqida gishosa.
JDG 21:6 Isra7eele asay banta ishatas, Biniyaame kochatas qadhetidi, “Hachi Isra7eelepe issi kochay dhayis.
JDG 21:7 Nuuni nu macca nayta entaw immonna mela Godan caaqida gisho hayqope attida Biniyaame kochati macho ekana mela nuuni ay oothinoo?” yaagidosona.
JDG 21:8 Qassika enti, “Isra7eele kochatape Mixiphan Godaa sinthe yoonnay oonee?” yaagidi oychidosona. Galadan de7iya Yaabesa katamaape issi asika qangethi gathanaw yoonnaysa be7idosona.
JDG 21:9 Enti asa taybida wode Galadan de7iya Yaabesape issi asika bentibeenna.
JDG 21:10 Hessa gisho, maabaray 12,000 mino olanchota Galadan de7iya Yaabesa katamaa kiittidosona. Enti bidi, “Yaabesan de7iya maccasaanne nayta issuwaka ashshona mashshan buthite.
JDG 21:11 Hessada oothidi; addenne addera aqida macca ubbaa wodhite” yaagidi kiittidosona.
JDG 21:12 Yaabesa kataman de7iya asaa giddofe addera aqiboona oyddu xeetu geela7o macca nayta demmidosona. Enta Kanaane biittan, Seelon dunkaanida gutaa ekidi yidosona.
JDG 21:13 Hessafe guye, kumetha maabaray Irmoona Zaalla matan de7iya Biniyaame asaara sigetanaw cima yeddidosona.
JDG 21:14 Biniyaame asati simmidi yidosona. Isra7eele asay Yaabesa katamaape wodhonna ehida geela7o nayta entaw immidosona. Shin geela7ota tayboy addeta taybuwara ginibeenna.
JDG 21:15 Isra7eele kochata giddon de7iya issifetethay duuxana mela Goday oothida gisho asay Biniyaametas daro qadhetidosona.
JDG 21:16 Maabara cimati, “Biniyaame kochatape maccasi hayqidi wurida gisho, hayqope attida addetas nuuni maccas waatidi demmanee?
JDG 21:17 Isra7eele asaa giddofe qushetidi dhayonna mela Biniyaame kochatape attidaysata laattiya na7i daanaw koshshees.
JDG 21:18 Gidoshin, nuuni nu macca naytape entaw immanaw danda7oko. Isra7eele asay kase, ‘Ba na7a Biniyaame kochaas immiya uray baadetidaysa gido’ yaagidi caaqetidi uttidosona” yaagidosona.
JDG 21:19 Yaatin, cimati, “Heko, laythan laythan Seelon Godaa bonchiya ba7aaley matis” yaagidosona. Seeloy Beetelepe pudeha baggara, Laboonape dugeha baggara, Beetelepe Seekema efiya ogiyape doloha baggara de7ees.
JDG 21:20 Hessa gisho, cimati, Biniyaame asata haysada yaagidi kiittidosona; “Bidi woyne gade giddon qosetidi,
JDG 21:21 naagite. Seelo katamaa macca nayti ba7aale gallas karaabo oykidi, yexishenne durishe yaa wode hinte woyne gade giddofe keyite. Seelo macca naytape dafi ekidi, Biniyaame biitta efite.
JDG 21:22 Enta aawati woyko enta ishati nuuko maggannanaw yaa wode nuuni entako, ‘Hayyana, enta nuus immite; nuuni enta ola bessaafe un7ethidi ekibooko. Hinte dosidi immiboona gisho bala gideketa’ yaagana” yaagidosona.
JDG 21:23 Biniyaame asay Isra7eele cimati gidaysada oothidosona. Issoy issoy Seelon yexiya macca naytape baw macho dafidi ekis. Enti banta laata biitta simmidi, katamata zaari keexidi yan de7idosona.
JDG 21:24 He wode Isra7eele asay yaape laaletidi, issoy issoy ba kochaako, ba kochaakonne ba soo asaako bis.
JDG 21:25 He wode Isra7eele biittan kawoy baawa; asi ubbay baw lo77o daanidaba oothees.
RUT 1:1 Isra7eele biitta daynnati aysiya wode he biittan koshi keyis. Issi addey ba macheranne ba nam7u adde naytara Yihuda biittan Beeteleme katamape dendidi Moo7abe biitta guutha wode yan daanaw betis.
RUT 1:2 He addiya sunthay Abemeleke, iya mache sunthay Nuhaamo, iya nam7u adde nayta sunthay Mahaloonanne Kelewoona. Enti Yihuda Beetelemen de7iya Efraata yara. Enti Moo7abe bidi yan de7idosona.
RUT 1:3 Enti yan de7ishin Nuhaami azinay Abemelekey hayqin, iya ba nam7u naytara attasu.
RUT 1:4 He nayti Moo7abe biitta macca naytape Orfanne Uruuto geeteteyisata machidi, tammu laythi de7aape guye,
RUT 1:5 Mahalooninne Kelewooni nam7ayka hayqidosona. Nuhaama I azinaynne nam7u nayti hayqin barka attasu.
RUT 1:6 Iya Moo7aben de7ishin, Goday ba asa Isra7eeles keehidi kathi entaw immidaysa si7ada ba nam7u nayta machetara Moo7abe biittafe guye simmanaw dendasu.
RUT 1:7 Iya ba de7iya bessaafe nam7u ba nayta machetara guye Yihuda efiya oge bolla keyidosona.
RUT 1:8 Nuhaama ba nayta machetako, “Hinte ubbatika hinte aaye soo, aaye soo simmite. Hinte hayqidaysatasinne taw keehidaysada Goday hintew keeho.
RUT 1:9 Hinte gelana azinata son Goday hintew shempo immo” yaagada yeerada entana anjasu. Entika banta qaala dhoqu oothidi yeekidi,
RUT 1:10 “Nuka neera ne asako baana” yaagidosona.
RUT 1:11 Shin Nuhaama entako, “Ta nayto hinte soo simmite. Hinte taara ayis beetii? Hintew azina gidana adde nayta hizape guye yelana daanii?
RUT 1:12 Ta nayto simmite, taani azina gelonnaada cimas. I wona taani yelana giyako ubba hachi qamma azina gelada adde na7a yeliyakoka,
RUT 1:13 hessati diccidi gakanaa gaso entana naaganeyee? Enta gisho gidi azina gelonna attanayee? Ta nayto, hessi hanonnaba gideysa hinte ereeta. Goday tana un7ethida gisho hintefe ta aadho cametas” yaagasu.
RUT 1:14 Hessan enti banta qaala dhoqu oothidi darsi yeekidosona. Orfi ba azina aayiw yeerada guye simmasu. Shin Uruuta iipe shaaketike gada ganta kana shasho gidasu.
RUT 1:15 Nuhaama zaarada, “Be7a, ne azina isha machiya ba asaakonne ba xoossatako simmasu, neka iira simmada ba” yaagasu.
RUT 1:16 Shin Uruuta zaarada, “Taani neepe shaaketana melanne nena aggada guye simmana mela tana waaysopa. Neeni biya soo awu gidikonne ta baana, neeni de7iya soo awunka taani daana. Ne derey ta dere gidana, ne Xoossay ta Xoossa gidana.
RUT 1:17 Ne hayqiya son ta hayqana, yan moogetana. Hayqope attishin, harabay tana neepe shaakiko, Goday tana pirdo.”
RUT 1:18 Uruuta iira baanaw qanxidaysa Nuhaama erada si77i gasu.
RUT 1:19 Yaape nam7u maccasati Beeteleme gakanaw bidosona. Bidi enti Beeteleme gakida wode he katama asa ubbay entaban malaaletidosona. Qassi maccasay, “Hanna Nuhaamo?” yaagidosona.
RUT 1:20 Iya zaarada ubba danda7iya Xoossay ta de7uwa daro camethida gisho, “Tana Nuhaamo goopite; ‘Maara’ giite.
RUT 1:21 Taani kumethi keyada bas, shin Goday tana mela kushe zaaris. Goday tana kawushshis; ubbaa danda7iya Xoossay tana un7ethis. Tana ayis Nuhaame gidi xeegetii?” yaagasu.
RUT 1:22 Hessada hanada Nuhaama ba na7aa mache Moo7abe Uruutira simmasu. Enti Beeteleme gakiday bangi buroo caka doometiya wodena.
RUT 2:1 Nuhaamis I azina Abemeleke baggara dabbothiya, Boo7eza geetetiya issi eretida dure addey de7ees.
RUT 2:2 Issi gallas Moo7abe Uruuta Nuhaamo, “Taw qadhetiya asi kaallada budhe qoranaw kathi cakiya bessi boosha?” yaagasu. Iyaka, “Ee ta naate ba” yaagasu.
RUT 2:3 Hessa gisho, Uruuta bada katha cakiya asa geeduwaape budhe qoro doomasu. Piko mela budhiya qoriya gadey Abemeleke dabbuwa Boo7eza gade gidis.
RUT 2:4 Heko, guutha wodepe Boo7ezi Beetelemepe gade bidi, kathi cakiya asaa, “Godi wolqa immo” gidi sarothis. Enti zaaridi, “Godi anjo” yaagidosona.
RUT 2:5 Yaatin, Boo7ezi kathi cakeyisata kaapuwa, “Hanna na7atetha maccasiya oonee?” yaagidi oychis.
RUT 2:6 Katha cakeyisata kaapoy zaaridi, “Hanna yegelsiya Nuhaamira Moo7abe biittafe yida Moo7abe maccasi.
RUT 2:7 Iya tana, ‘Katha cakeyisata geeduwa kaallada mirqiya giddofe budhe qoro?’ gada oychasu. Ha77i buroo shempanaw uttawus; wonta guura yoodepe hano gakanaw haysan qorashe gam7asu” yaagis.
RUT 2:8 Boo7ezi Uruuto, “Ta naate si7a; hizape budhe qoranaw hara gade boopa. Qassi haysafe awuka qaaxofa. Ta macca aylletara haysan pee7a.
RUT 2:9 Asay kathi cakiya bessaa xeella xeellada macca aylletara gidada enta geedo kaallada qora. Adde aylleti nena bochonaada taani entaw odas. Qassi nena saamiko, adde aylleti tikidi wothida haathaafe paqada uya” yaagis.
RUT 2:10 Uruuta shoca ziggada, “Taani allaga gidikina? Neeni haysa mela taw qadhetiday aybise?” yaagasu.
RUT 2:11 Boo7ezi zaaridi, “Ne azinay hayqosaape doomin, neeni ne azina aayes oothidaba ubba, neeni ne aayiw, ne aawanne ne yeletida biitta aggada, ne eronna deriyara daanaw yidaysa taani geeshshada si7as.
RUT 2:12 Neeni oothidabaas Godi new kushe zaaro. Neeni iya qefiya garsan attana gada yida, Isra7eele Goday Xoossay new kumethaba immo” yaagis.
RUT 2:13 Uruuta, “Ta godaw, neeni taw daro qadhetadasa; taani ne aylletape issiniwuka gakike, shin taw keehaba hasayada, tana minthethadasa” yaagasu.
RUT 2:14 Quma miya wode Boo7ezi, “Haa shiiqa; uythu ekada woyniyan tushada ma” yaagis. Iyaka katha cakiya asa matan uttasu. Boo7ezi iw banga shaashshi immis; iya mada kallin kathay gididi palahis.
RUT 2:15 Iya budhe qoranaw dendiya wode, Boo7ezi ba aylleta, “Mirqiya giddofeka iya qoriko iyo yeellayopite.
RUT 2:16 Ubbaka mirqiyaafe shoddidi iw yeggite iya eko; iyo kaccofite” yaagis.
RUT 2:17 Hessan Uruuta omarsi gakanaw qorasu. Iya qora pe7idaysa qoxin, tammu kilo giraame banga gideysa ekasu.
RUT 2:18 Iya he katha ba77a ekada katama simmasu; iya ay mela qoridaako ehada ba azina aayiw bessasu. Qassi iya mishin attida kathi ehidaysa kessada iw immasu.
RUT 2:19 I azina aayiya, “Hachi haysa awupe qoradii? Awun ootha pee7adii? New haysada keehida uray anjeto” yaagasu. Yaagin Uruuta iya ba ootha pee7ida gadiya godaaba ba azina aayes odasu. “Taani hachi oothada pee7ida gadiya godaa sunthay Boo7eza geetetees” yaagasu.
RUT 2:20 Nuhaama zaarada, “Hayqidaysatasinne de7on de7eysatas ba keehatetha aggiboonna Goday iya anjo” yaagasu. Gujadaka, “Ha addey nuus mata dabbo; nuna ubba wozanaw gathiya asatape issoy iya” yaagasu.
RUT 2:21 Moo7abe Uruuta, “I tana, ‘Ta kathay caketidi wurana gakanaw, ta oosanchotape shaaketonashin yada budhe qora’ yaagis” yaagasu.
RUT 2:22 Nuhaama ba na7a mache Uruutiko, “Ta naate, tumaka Boo7eza gadiyan oothiya maccasatara biiko new lo77o. Hara asa gade biiko nena metoothana” yaagasu.
RUT 2:23 Hessa gisho, bangaynne gistiya cakay wurana gakanaw Uruuta Boo7eza macca aylletako shiiqada, budhiya qorashe gam7asu. Qassi ba azina aayera issife de7asu.
RUT 3:1 Issi gallas Nuhaama ba na7a machiw, “Ta naate, neeni giigin daana mela taani new wula koyaako waananee?
RUT 3:2 Neeni entara gam7ida macca aylleta goday, Boo7ezi, nuus mata dabbo gidenneyee? I hachi qamma wudumman banga punana.
RUT 3:3 Neeni meecetada shitto tiyeta; ne lo77o ma7uwa ma7ada, duge wudumman ba; Bada Boo7ezi midi uyidi simmana gakanaw iya ayfen keyopa.
RUT 3:4 I hiixa aadhiya wode I awun dhiskiyako be7ada, iya afila qaarada iya tohoson zin7a agga. Neeni hananaba I new odana” yaagasu.
RUT 3:5 Uruuta, “Neeni gidaba ubba ta oothana” yaagasu.
RUT 3:6 Hessa gisho, Uruuta dendada duge moothi bada, I azina aayiya iw odidaba ubba oothasu.
RUT 3:7 Boo7ezi midi uyidi ba bolla pashkisidaape guye, katha cacha matan aadhidi zin7is. Uruuta lepara shiiqada, iya tohuwa qaarada zin7asu.
RUT 3:8 Giddi bilahe gidiyade I dagami dendidi shiretiya wode, issi maccasi iya tohoson zin7idaaro demmis.
RUT 3:9 Ika, “Neeni oonee?” yaagidi oychis. Iya, “Taani ne aylliw Uruuto; neeni ta azinaas mata dabbonne tana wozanaw danda7ey nena gidiya gisho ta bolla ne afilaa yegga” yaagasu.
RUT 3:10 Boo7ezi zaaridi, “Ta naate, Goday nena anjo! ha keehatethay kase ne oothidaysafe aadhees. Neeni manqo woyko dure gidida na7atetha adde koyabaaka.
RUT 3:11 Ha7i ta naate babofa. Neeni oychidaba ubba new taani oothana. Ta kataman de7iya asa ubbay neeni lo77o maccasi gideysa erees.
RUT 3:12 Taani mata dabbo gideysi tuma; shin taape daro matey de7ees.
RUT 3:13 Hachi qamma haysan aqa. Wonto I nena wozanaw koyiko lo77o, wozo. Shin I wozanaw koyonna ixiko, De7o Goday eriya mela, taani nena wozana. Sa7i wontana gakanaw haysan zin7a” yaagis.
RUT 3:14 Hessa gisho, iya Boo7eza tohoson sa7i wontana gakanaw zin7ada aqasu. Boo7ezi, “Maccasi katha moothi yidaysa oonika eropo” gida gisho Uruuta asi ase shaakidi eronna wode wonta, daro guura dendasu.
RUT 3:15 Boo7ezi iyo, “Ne ma7ida yida laxana ha bessa” yaagis. Iya bessin laatamu kilo giraame banga maki qolidi iyo ba7isis. Ika ba7ada guye katama basu.
RUT 3:16 Uruuta ba azina aayeko simmada yin, Nuhaama, “Ta naate, ne bida allaley waanidee?” yaagada oychasu. Uruutaka Boo7ezi oothidaba ubba odasu;
RUT 3:17 Gujadaka, “ ‘Ne azina aayeko mela kushe boopa’ gidi haysa laatamu kilo giraame banga immis” yaagasu.
RUT 3:18 Yaagin Nuhaama, “Ta naate, aybi hananeeko eretana gakanaw naaga. Addey hachi ha allaley oge oykonna shempenna” yaagasu.
RUT 4:1 Boo7ezi pude katama pengiya matan de7iya dabaaban keyidi uttis. I yan uttidashin kase I odida mata dabboy he bessa yin, Boo7ezi iyako, “La, ha shiiqada haysan utta” yaagis. Ika, shiiqidi uttis.
RUT 4:2 Boo7ezi he katama cimatape tammu asata dooridi, “Haysan uttite” yaagis. Entika uttidosona.
RUT 4:3 Boo7ezi ba mata dabbuwako “Moo7abe biittafe simmada yida Nuhaama, nu isha Abemeleke gadiya bayzana gawusu.
RUT 4:4 Hessa gisho, haysan uttida asa sinthaninne ta katama cimata sinthan, woza gada ta new odanaw qopas. Neepe hari maati bayna gisho neeni wozanaw koyiko woza; ixiko, neepe kaalliya maata dabboy tana gidiya gisho tana erisa” yaagis. I “Taani wozana” yaagis.
RUT 4:5 Boo7ezi, “Nuhaamipenne Moo7abe Uruutipe gadiya ne shammiya gallas am7iw Uruutoka woza; yaatiko hayqidaysa sunthay iya laata gadiyan xeegetana” yaagis.
RUT 4:6 Ha mata dabboy, “Hessa gidiko, taani wozanaw danda7ike; ayis giiko, hessi ta buzo laata qohees. Hessa gisho, neeni woza, taani danda7ike” yaagis.
RUT 4:7 Beni wode Isra7eele biittan wozuwanne laata duuthanaw bayziya woyko laatisiya baggay ba caammaa tohuwape kessidi, hanko shammiya woyko laattiya baggaas immees. Isra7eele biittan zal7esinne laatas maaray haysa.
RUT 4:8 Hessa gisho, he mata dabboy Boo7ezako, “Neeni woza” gidi, ba caammaa tohuwape kessidi immis.
RUT 4:9 Yaatin, Boo7ezi cimatanne asa ubba, “Taani Abemelekes, Keliwoonasinne Mahiloonas de7iyaba ubba Nuhaamipe shammidaysas hachi hinte marka.
RUT 4:10 Qassi hayqidaysa sunthay enta soo asaa suntha giddofe woyko katama asaa taybuwape dhayonnaada iya suntha iya laata gadiyan xeegisanaw kase Mahiloona machiw Uruutoka taani wozeysas hachi hinte ubbay marka” yaagis.
RUT 4:11 Katama pengiya dabaaban de7iya cimatinne asa ubbay, “Ee, haysas nuuni marka! Goday hanno ne ekiya maccasiw, Isra7eele asa mayza aayeta gidida Raheelidanne Liyada ootho. Neenika Efraatan dure gida, ne sunthay Beetelemen ereto.
RUT 4:12 Ne keethay, Goday, ha na7atetha maccaseepe new immiya zerethan Timaara Yihudas yelida Faaresa keethada ootho” yaagis.
RUT 4:13 Hessadaka oothidi, Boo7ezi Uruuto ekis iyaka iyaw macho gidasu. Goday iyo qanthatana mela oothin adde na7a yelasu.
RUT 4:14 Maccasati Nuhaamo, “Hachi nena heemmana asi dhaysiboonna Goday galatetto! Iya sunthay Isra7eelen dhoqu go!
RUT 4:15 Iyan new sa7i simmana, ne cimiya wode I nena heemmana. Ayis giiko, laapun adde naytapeka aathada nena siiqiyaranne new keehiyara, ne na7a machiya new na7a yelasu” yaagidosona.
RUT 4:16 Nuhaama na7aa idimmasu; loytha dichasu.
RUT 4:17 I shooro maccasati, “Nuhaamis adde na7i yeletis” yaagidi iya sunthaaka Yoobeda gidoosona. Yoobedi Dawita aawa Isseye yelidaysa.
RUT 4:18 Faaresa yeletethay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa; Faaresi Hesroona yelis;
RUT 4:19 Hesrooni Raame yelis; Raamey Amnadaabe yelis;
RUT 4:20 Amnadaabey Na7asoona yelis; Na7asooni Salmoona yelis;
RUT 4:21 Salmooni Boo7eza yelis; Boo7ezi Yoobeda yelis;
RUT 4:22 Yoobedi Isseye yelis; Isseyey Dawita yelis.
1SA 1:1 Derey dariya Efreema biittan, Rama kataman de7iya, Efreema kochenne Zuufa koche gidida, Hilqaana geetetiya issi addey de7ees. I Yirohaama na7a; Yirohaami Elihu na7a; Elihu Toohu na7a; Toohuy Zuufa na7aa.
1SA 1:2 Hilqaanas nam7u macheti de7oosona; issinne sunthay Haanno; hankoori sunthay Pinaano. Pinaanis nayti de7oosona, shin Haannas na7i baawa.
1SA 1:3 Hilqaani laythan laythan Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa goyinnanawunne iyaw yarshanaw Seelo bees. Eeli nayti nam7ay, Afnaninne Finihaasi Godaa kahine gididi Seelon haggaazosona.
1SA 1:4 Hilqaani yarsho yarshiya wode ubban ashuwape issi issi kushe ba mache Pinaanis, ba adde naytasinne macca naytas huuphen huuphen immees.
1SA 1:5 Goday Haanno yelo diggikoka, Hilqaani iyo dosiya gisho, iw nam7u kushe immees.
1SA 1:6 Goday Haanno yelo diggida gisho, I dawuthiya iyo toochada yiloyawusu.
1SA 1:7 Hessi laythan laythan ubba wode haniyaba. Haanna Godaa keethi bida wode ubban I dawuthiya iya yeekana gakanawunne kathi ixana gakanaw yiloyawusu.
1SA 1:8 I azinay Hilqaani, “Haanne, ne ayis yeekay? Ayis kathi miikii? Ne wozanay ayis azzanii? Taani new tammu naytape aadhikinayee?” yaagees.
1SA 1:9 Issi gallas enti Seelon midaapenne uyidaape guye, Haanna denda eqasu. Kahiney Eeli Godaa keetha pengiya matan ba uttiya bessan uttis.
1SA 1:10 Haanna daro azzanida gisho cametada yeekashe Godaa woossasu.
1SA 1:11 Iya haysada yaagada qangetasu; “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaw, tana ne aylliw be7a. Ta metuwa be7ada, tana hassaya; tana ne aylliw dogopa. Neeni taw ne ayllees adde na7a immiko, iya de7o laytha ubban taani iya new immana; iya huuphey polo meedetenna” yaagasu.
1SA 1:12 Haanna Godaa woosa adussida wode Eeli I doona be7ees.
1SA 1:13 Haanna ba wozanan Xoossaa woossiya wode I mettershay qaaxees, shin I qaalay si7etenna; hessa gisho, Eeli iyo mathotidaada qopis.
1SA 1:14 I, “Neeni awude gakanaw mathotay? Woyne ushsha neepe digga” yaagis.
1SA 1:15 Haanni zaarada, “Ta Godaw, gidenna; taani daro azzanida maccas; taani ta shempuwafe Godaa woossaysipe attishin, woyne woyko mathoyiya ushshu uyabike.
1SA 1:16 Taani metoynne azzanoy darida gisho woossayis. Tana ne aylliw pathenna maccas oothada qopofa” yaagasu.
1SA 1:17 Eeli zaaridi, “Saro ba; neeni woossiyaba Isra7eele Xoossay new immo” yaagis.
1SA 1:18 Haanna, “Ne aylliya ne sinthan saba demmo” yaagasu. Hessafe guye, iya ba ogiya bada kathi masu; hessafe simmada iya azzanabuuku.
1SA 1:19 Wontetha gallas guura dendidi, Hilqaaninne iya soo asay Godaa goynidaape guye, Rama kataman de7iya banta soo simmidosona. Hilqaani ba mache Haannira aqis; Goday iyo qopis.
1SA 1:20 Iya qanthatada adde na7a yelasu. Haanna, “Taani Godaa woossin I tana si7is” gada iya sunthaa Sameela sunthasu.
1SA 1:21 Hilqaani ba soo asa ubbaara laytha yarsho Godaas yarshanawunne qangetha gathanaw Seelo bis.
1SA 1:22 Shin Haanna babuku. Iya ba azinaako, “Na7ay dhanthi duuthidaape guye, iya efada, Godaas immana; I merinaw yan daana” yaagasu.
1SA 1:23 Hilqaani, “Nena lo77idaba ootha; I dhanthi duuthana gakanaw son gam7anaw danda7aasa; Goday ba gelida qaala new polo” yaagis. Haanna ba na7aa dhanthi duuthana gakanaw son gam7asu.
1SA 1:24 Haanna na7ay dhanthi duuthidaape guye, na7aanne heedzu laytha wofaano laatamu kilo giraame dhiillenne ogoro kumetha woyne ushshu ekada Seelon de7iya Godaa keethi basu; he wode na7ay guutha.
1SA 1:25 Enti wofaanuwa shukidaape guye na7aa Eeliko efidosona.
1SA 1:26 Haanna, “Ta godaw, ne shempoy ero; ne sinthan eqada Godaa woossida maccasiya tana.
1SA 1:27 Ha na7aa immana mela woossin, Goday ta woossidaba immis.
1SA 1:28 Hessa gisho, taani iya Godaas immas; I ba de7o laytha ubban Godaas imetis” yaagasu. Enti yan Godaa goyinnidosona.
1SA 2:1 Haanna haysada yaagada woossasu; “Ta wozanay Godan ufaytees; ta kacey Godan dhoqu gis. Ta morketa bolla taani ceeqetayis; ne ashoy tana ufaysees.
1SA 2:2 Godaa mela geeshshi baawa; ne meli oonika baawa. Nu Xoossaafe attishin, hara Zaalli baawa.
1SA 2:3 Otoro haasaya aggite; otoro qaali hinte doonape keyopo. Godaa Xoossay ubbaa erees; asa ooso yiggidi xeellees.
1SA 2:4 Olanchota dongey meqis; shin daaburanchoti wolqa demmidosona.
1SA 2:5 Kallidaysati koshatidi unetidosona; shin koshatidaysati ha77i kallidosona. Maynthiya laapun nayta yelasu; shin daro nayta yelidaara barka attasu
1SA 2:6 Goday wodhees, pathees; Si7oolen yeggees, yaape kessees.
1SA 2:7 Goday dureyees; Goday manqethees; kawushshees; dhoqu oothees.
1SA 2:8 I manqota baanape denthees; metootanchota bidope denthees. Enta boncho asaara utisees; boncho araata laatisees. Biittaa baasoti Godaasa; enta bolla alamiya essis.
1SA 2:9 “I geeshshata tohuwa naagees; shin iitata dhuman si77i oothana; asi ba wolqan xoonenna;
1SA 2:10 Godaara eqeteysati liiqana; Goday salope enta bolla dadada dechana. Goday sa7an de7iya ubbaa pirdana; I ba kawas minotethi immana; I ba tiyidaysas xoono immana.”
1SA 2:11 Hessafe guye, Hilqaani Raman de7iya ba soo bis; shin na7ay Sameeli kahiniya Eelipe garsara Godaas oothees.
1SA 2:12 Eeli adde nayti iita; enti Godaa bonchokona.
1SA 2:13 He wode kahineti asaara de7iya gahetethan oothiya wogi de7ees. Hessika asay yarsho yarshiya wode kahiniya oosanchoy heedzu achara de7iya qaphe ekidi buroo ashoy kaxishin yees.
1SA 2:14 Doysiya otuwan woyko distiyan woyko xaaruwan ba qaphiya yeddidi, ay qommo asho gidikoka kessi efidi kahiniyas immees. Yarsho yarshanaw Seelo yaa Isra7eele asa ubbaa bolla enti haysada oothosona.
1SA 2:15 Qassi modhuwa yarsho bessan xuugganaape sinthe kahiniya oosanchoy yarsho yarshiya addiyako bidi, “Kahiney qaye ashope attishin, kaxida asho neepe ekonna gisho, iyaw caacanaw asho hamma” yaagees.
1SA 2:16 Addey zaaridi, “Koyrottidi modhoy xuugeto; hessafe guye, ne koyeysa eka” yaagees; shin kahiniya aylley, “Akay, taw ha77i imma, ne diggiko, taani wolqan ekana” yaagees.
1SA 2:17 Godaas immiya yarshuwa Eeli nayti kadhida gisho, enta nagaray Godaa sinthan aadhidi daris.
1SA 2:18 Shin Sameeli na7a de7ishe liinope oosetida efuude ma7o ma7idi Godaa sinthan oothees.
1SA 2:19 Sameela aayiya laythan laythan guutha qolle giigisada, laytha yarsho yarshanaw ba azinaara bashe iyaw ekada bawusu.
1SA 2:20 Eeli Hilqaananne iya machiw, “Hinte Godaas dummayidi immida ha na7aa bessan Goday new ha machefe hara nayta immo” yaagidi anjees; yaatin, enti banta soo simmoosona.
1SA 2:21 Goday Haanna anjin, qanthatada heedzu adde naytanne nam7u macca nayta yelasu. Na7ay Sameeli Godaa sinthan diccis.
1SA 2:22 Eeli daro cimis. Iya nayti Isra7eele asa ubbaa bolla oothida iitabaanne Geeshsha Dunkaaniya pengen Godaas oothiya maccasatara tunidaysa si7is.
1SA 2:23 Hessa gisho entako, “Hinte haysa melaba ayis oothetii? Hinte iita oosuwa taani asa ubbaafe si7as.
1SA 2:24 Ta nayto, hessa aggite; Godaa asay hintena giyabay lo77o gidenna.
1SA 2:25 Issi asi ase naaqiko, Xoossay iyaw gaannatana; shin asi Godaa naaqiko, iyaw gaannatanay oonee?” yaagis. Goday entana wodhanaw koyida gisho enti banta aawa zoriya si7onna ixidosona.
1SA 2:26 Na7ay Sameeli Godaa sinthaninne asa sinthan diccisinne sabetis.
1SA 2:27 Issi gallas nabey Eeliko yidi, “Goday haysada yaagees. ‘Ne aawa soo asay Gibxe biittan Paarona kushen de7iya wode ta entaw qoncabikina?
1SA 2:28 Ne aaway kahine gididi ta yarsho bessa keyana mela, ixaane cuyisana melanne ta sinthan efuude ma7idi oothana mela Isra7eele zare ubbaafe iya dooras. Isra7eele asay taman yarshiya yarsho ubbaa taani ne aawa kochaas immas.
1SA 2:29 Taani ta de7iya bessan shiiqana mela kiitida ta yarshuwanne imuwa hinte ayis kadhidetii? Ta asa Isra7eele, taw shiishida yarsho ubbaafe dooretidaysa midi modhana mela oothada ne nayta taape aathada ayis bonchadii?’
1SA 2:30 “Hessa gisho, Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees. Ne kochaynne ne aawa kochay merinaw taw oothana. Shin ha77i hessi taape haako; tana boncheyisata bonchana; tana kadheysati kadhetana.
1SA 2:31 Ne kochan asi ceeggonna mela taani ne wolqaanne ne aawa soo asaa wolqaa dhaysiya wodey yaana.
1SA 2:32 Neeni ta keethan meto be7ana; taani Isra7eele asaas immiya anjuwa neeni be7ada qanaatana; shin ne soo asan ceeggana asi oonika baawa.
1SA 2:33 Taani ta yarsho bessaafe dhaysona asi de7iko, iya gaason ne ayfey afuxishe qooqana; ne wozanay azzanon xuugetana; ne kocha ubbay na7atethan hayqana.
1SA 2:34 Ne nayti nam7ay, Afnaninne Finihaasi issi gallas hayqana; hessa new malla gidana.
1SA 2:35 Ta wozanaadanne ta qofaada oothiya taw ammanetiya kahine denthana. Taani iyaw ammanetida soo asi immana; taani tiyida kawa sinthan enti ubba wode oothana.
1SA 2:36 Ne kochaa giddofe attida ubbay guutha miishe woyko baso uythi woossanaw yidi, iya sinthan gufannidi, ‘Taani miyaba demmana mela kahine oothada tana shuumarki’ yaagana” yaagis.
1SA 3:1 Na7ay Sameeli Eelipe garsara Godaas oothees; Godaa qaalay he wode daro al7o; qoncethika baawa.
1SA 3:2 Ayfey daaburin waayetidi xeelliya Eeli issi qamma ba bessan zin7is.
1SA 3:3 He wode Xoossa xompey buroo to7ibeenna; Godaa Taabotey de7iya keethan Sameeli dhiskis.
1SA 3:4 Goday Sameela xeegis; Sameeli, “Yee” gidi koyis.
1SA 3:5 I Eeliko woxi bidi, “Neeni xeegin Heko yas” yaagis. Shin Eeli, “Ta nena xeegabike; bada zin7a” yaagin, Sameeli bidi zin7is.
1SA 3:6 Qassi Goday, “Sameela” yaagidi nam7antho xeegin, Sameeli dendidi, Eeliko bidi, “Neeni xeegin Heko yas” yaagis. Shin Eeli, “Ta na7aw, ta nena xeegabike; bada zin7a” yaagis.
1SA 3:7 Godaa qaalay buroo iyaw qonciboonna gisho, Sameeli Godaa gideysa eribeenna.
1SA 3:8 Goday Sameela heedzantho xeegin dendidi, Eeliko bidi, “Neeni xeegin Heko yas” yaagis. Hessan Goday na7aa xeegidaysa Eeli akeekidi,
1SA 3:9 “Bada zin7a; I nena xeegiyaba gidiko, ‘Godaw, oda; ta ne aylley si7ayis’ yaaga” gidi, Eeli iyaw odin, Sameeli ba bessaa bidi zin7is.
1SA 3:10 Hessafe guye, Goday yidi iya matan eqidi, kaseysada, “Sameela, Sameela” yaagidi xeegis. Sameeli, “Ne aylley si7ees, oda” yaagis.
1SA 3:11 Goday Sameela, “Heko, taani asa haythas iitiya issiba Isra7eele bolla oothana hanayis.
1SA 3:12 He gallas taani Eeli soo asaa bolla oothana gada odida ubbaa koyrope wursethi gakanaw polana.
1SA 3:13 Eeli eridi seeronna aggida iya nayta nagaraa gisho, taani iya soo asaa bolla merinaw pirdanaysa iyaw kase oda wothas.
1SA 3:14 Hessa gisho, ‘Eeli soo asaa nagaray yarshoninne imon polo atto geetetenna’ yaagada taani iya soo asaas kase caaqas” yaagis.
1SA 3:15 Sameeli wontana gakanaw dhiskis; wontin dendidi, Xoossa keetha pengiya dooyis. Sameeli qoncidaba Eelis odanaw yayyis.
1SA 3:16 Eeli, “Ta na7aw, Sameela” yaagidi xeegis. Sameeli, “Yee” gidi koyis.
1SA 3:17 Eeli, “Goday new odiday aybee? Taape aykoka qosopa; neeni Xoossay new odidabaape issibaaka taape qosiko, Xoossi nena pirdo” yaagidi oychis.
1SA 3:18 Sameeli aykoka qosonna ubbaa Eelis odis. Eeli, “I Godaa; bana lo77idaba ootho” yaagis.
1SA 3:19 Sameeli diccishe bis; Goday iyara de7ees. Sameeli odidabaape issi qaalika sa7an wodhenna.
1SA 3:20 Daanepe Barsaabe gakanaw, Sameeli tuma Godaa nabe gideysa Isra7eele asa ubbay eris.
1SA 3:21 Goday Seelon qoncees; yan ba qaalan banatetha Sameelas qoncisees.
1SA 4:1 Sameeli odida qaalay Isra7eele ubbaa gakis. Isra7eeleti Filisxeematara oletanaw keyidosona; Isra7eeleti Aben7ezeran dunkaanin, Filisxeemeti Afeeqan dunkaanidosona.
1SA 4:2 Filisxeemeti cugan cugan gididi, Isra7eeletara oletanaw dendidosona; olay minnida wode Filisxeemeti Isra7eeleta xoonidi oyddu mukulu gidiya asaa wodhidosona.
1SA 4:3 Olanchoti dunkaanida gutaa simmida wode Isra7eele cimati, “Hachi Goday nuna Filisxeemeta kushen ayis aathidi immidee? Nuura baana melanne nu morketa kushepe nuna ashshana mela Godaa Taabotiya Seelope ane ehoos” yaagidosona.
1SA 4:4 Hessa gisho, asay Seelo kiittin, kiruubeta giddon araatan uttiya Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa Taabotiya ehidosona. Eeli nayti nam7ay Afnaninne Finihaasi caaqo Taabotiyara yan de7oosona.
1SA 4:5 Godaa Caaqo Taabotey asay dunkaanida gutaa gakida wode Isra7eele ubbay biitti qaaxana gakanaw banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Godaa Caaqo Taabotey gakis” yaagidi waassidosona.
1SA 4:6 Isra7eeleta waasuwa Filisxeemeti si7idi, “Ibraaweta gutan si7etiya wolqaama waasoy aybee?” yaagidosona. Godaa Taabotey enta gutaa yidaysa Filisxeemeti erida wode,
1SA 4:7 Yayyidi haysada yaagidosona; “Xoossay enta gutaa yis; nuna ayye! Haysa melabay haysafe kase hani erenna.
1SA 4:8 Nuna ayye! ha wolqaama Xoossaa kushepe nuna ashshanay oonee? Ha Xoossay Gibxeta mela biittan dumma dumma gadon shocis.
1SA 4:9 Hinteno Filisxeemeto, minnite! Adde gidite! Hessi hanonna ixiko, hinte enta kase aylletethan haaridaysada enti hintena haarana. Adde gidite; oletite” yaagidosona.
1SA 4:10 Filisxeemeti oletidi, Isra7eeleta xoonin Isra7eeleti banta soo soo baqatidosona. He olan daro asay hayqidosona; Isra7eele toho olanchotape hastamu mukulu asay hayqidosona.
1SA 4:11 Xoossaa Taabotey di7etis; Eeli nayti nam7ay, Afnaninne Finihaasi hayqidosona.
1SA 4:12 He gallas Biniyaame koche gidida issi addey ola dembafe woxishe yidi Seelo gakis. Ba azzanuwa erisanaw I ba ma7uwa daakidi, ba huuphen biitta qolis.
1SA 4:13 He addey gakiya wode Eeli ba wozanan Xoossa Taabotiyas hirgida gisho naagishe oge doonan de7iya ba oydiyan uttis. Addey katama gelidi, hanidaba odin, katama ubbay waaso goochi aggis.
1SA 4:14 Eeli he waasuwa si7idi, “Haysi aybi waaso?” yaagis. Addey ellesi bidi Eelis odis.
1SA 4:15 Eeli uddufun tammanne hospun laythi gidida cima; iya ayfey daaburidi xeelo aggis.
1SA 4:16 Addey Eeliko, “Ola dembafe yiday tana; taani hachi yaape baqatada yas” yaagis. Eeli, “Ta na7aw, yaatin waanidee?” yaagidi oychis.
1SA 4:17 Addey, “Isra7eeleti Filisxeemeta sinthafe baqatidosona; daro asi wuris; ne nayti nam7ay Afnaninne Finihaasi hayqidosona; Xoossaa Taabotey di77etis” yaagis.
1SA 4:18 Addey Xoossa Taabotiyabaa odida wode pengiya matan de7iya ba oydiyape Eeli guye kundis. I cimanne moollo gidiya gisho morgey meqin hayqis. Eeli Isra7eele biitta oytamu laythi haaris.
1SA 4:19 Eeli na7aa Pinihaasa machiya yelanaw wodey wurida qanthe. Xoossaa Taabotey di7etetha, ba bolluwanne ba azinaa hayquwa si7ida wode qoponna iqethi iyo oykin yelasu.
1SA 4:20 I shempoy keyiya wode yeliseysati, “Adde na7a yeladasa; yayyofa” yaagidosona. Shin entaw aykoka zaarabuuku; enti giyabaka si7abuku.
1SA 4:21 Iya ba na7aa Ikabooda gada sunthasu; Xoossaa Taabotey di7etida gishonne ba bolloynne ba azinay hayqida gisho, “Bonchoy Isra7eelepe shaaketis” yaagasu.
1SA 4:22 Iya, “Xoossaa Taabotey di7etida gisho bonchoy Isra7eelepe shaaketis” yaagasu.
1SA 5:1 Filisxeemeti Xoossa Taabotiya di77idaape guye Aben7ezerape Ashdooda efidosona.
1SA 5:2 Xoossa Taabotiya efidi, Daagone eeqa keethan gelsidi, Daagone misiliya matan wothidosona.
1SA 5:3 Ashdooda asay wontetha gallas guura dendidi be7iya wode Godaa Taabotiya sinthan Daagoni gufannidaysa be7idosona. Daagone denthidi, kase bessan essidosona.
1SA 5:4 Qassi wontetha gallas guura dendidi be7iya wode Godaa Taabotiya sinthan Daagoni sa7an gufannidaysa be7idosona. He wode Daagone huupheynne iya nam7u kushey meqidi pengiya bolla de7ees; hanko asatethay dumma attis.
1SA 5:5 Hachi gakanaw Daagone kahinetinne Ashdoodan de7iya Daagone keetha geliya asati ubbay Daagone pengiya yedhonna xambaali aadhey hessa gishosa.
1SA 5:6 Ashdooda katamaa bollanne iya heeran de7iya asaa bolla Godaa kushey deexis; Goday kixa harge yeddidi enta seeris.
1SA 5:7 Ashdooda katamaa asay hanidaba be7ida wode, “Isra7eele Xoossaa kushey nu bollanne nu xoossaa Daagone bolla deexida gisho, Isra7eele Xoossaa Taabotey nu matan gam7ofo” yaagidosona.
1SA 5:8 Hessa gisho, ichashu Filisxeeme halaqata ubbaa xeegidi, “Isra7eele Xoossaa Taabotiya waatino?” yaagidi oychidosona. Halaqati, “Isra7eele Xoossaa Taabotey Gaate katamaa boo” yaagidi zaaridosona. Isra7eele Xoossaa Taabotiya Gaate efidosona.
1SA 5:9 Shin Taabotey Gaate gakidaape guye, Godaa kushey he katamaa bolla deexidi, daro daganthis. Kataman de7iya asaa na7ape cima gakanaw kixa hargen shocis.
1SA 5:10 Hessa gisho, Xoossaa Taabotiya Eqroona katama yeddidosona. Xoossaa Taabotey Eqroona geliya wode, Eqroona asay, “Nunanne nu asaa dhaysanaw Isra7eele Xoossaa Taabotiya nuuko ehidosona” yaagidi waassidosona.
1SA 5:11 Hessa gisho, enti Filisxeeme halaqata xeegidi, “Nunanne nu asaa dhaysanaape sinthe Isra7eele Xoossaa Taabotiya haysafe diggite; iya iya bessaa guye zaarite” yaagidosona. Godaa kushey katamaa bolla deexida gisho Katama ubbay hayqo dagaman oyketis.
1SA 5:12 Hayqope attida asaa kixa hargey un7ethida gisho he katamaa asaa yeehoy salo gakis.
1SA 6:1 Godaa Taabotey Filisxeeme biittan laapun ageena uttis.
1SA 6:2 He wode Filisxeeme asay banta kahinetanne marota xeegidi, “Godaa Taabotiya nuuni waatino? Nuuni guye iya bessaa iya waati yeddaneeko nuus odite” yaagidosona.
1SA 6:3 Enti zaaridi, “Isra7eele Xoossaa Taabotiya guye yeddishe mela kushe yeddofite. Ay hanidika nagara yarshora yeddite. Hessa oothiko hinte paxana; iya kushey hinte bollafe ayis kichiboonako hinte erana” yaagidosona.
1SA 6:4 Filisxeeme asay, “Nuuni yeddanaw bessiya nagara yarshoy aybee?” yaagidi oychidosona. Enti, “Hintenanne hinte halaqata gakida gadoy issino gidiya gisho, Filisxeeme halaqata taybon ichashu worqa kixatanne ichashu worqa ecereta yeddite.
1SA 6:5 Hinte he kixatanne hinte biitta dhaysiya he ecereta misileta medhidi, Isra7eele Xoossaas boncho immite. Ooni eri I hinte bollafe, hinte xoossata bollafenne hinte biitta bollafe ba kushiya denthana.
1SA 6:6 Gibxe asaynne enta kawoy zore ekonna ixidaysada hinte ayis zore ekeketii? Goday enta daro seerin Isra7eeleti banta ogiya baana mela yeddibookona?
1SA 6:7 Ha77i issi ooratha gaare giigisite; qambara wothiboona nam7u dhanthiya miizata he gaariyan waaxite; shin marata entafe duuthidi son ashshite.
1SA 6:8 Godaa Taabotiya gaariya bolla wothite; nagara yarshos giigisida worqa kixatanne worqa ecereta saaxinen yeggidi Godaa Taabotiya matan wothidi I baana mela yeddite.
1SA 6:9 Shin I biya bessa be7ite; I ba zawa oykidi, Beet-Sameesa simmidi biyaba gidiko, ha gaduwa nu bolla ehiday Godaa gideysa bessees. Shin I hara soo biiko haysi nu bolla coo gakisipe attishin, nuna dechiday Godaa kushe gidonnaysa erana” yaagidi zaaridosona.
1SA 6:10 Enti geetetidaysada oothidosona; nam7u dhanthiya miizata ekidi, gaaren waaxidosona; marata soo zaaridi gordidosona.
1SA 6:11 Enti Godaa Taabotiya, worqa kixanne ecere misileti de7iya saaxiniya gaaren wothidosona.
1SA 6:12 Hessafe guye, miizati Beet-Sameesa efiya ogiya oykidi gede haa goonna “Himbaa” gidi waassishe bidosona. Filisxeeme halaqati miizata geedo kaallidi, Beet-Sameesa zawa gakanaw bidosona.
1SA 6:13 Beet-Sameesa asay he wode zangaaran giste cakoosona; enti dhoqu gidi xeellidi, Taabotiya be7idi ufaytidosona.
1SA 6:14 Gaarey Beet-Sameesan de7iya Iyyasu geetetiya uraa gade gakidi, issi gita shuchaa matan eqis. Enti gaariya mithaa qeridi, xuussa yarsho oothidi he miizata Godaas yarshidosona.
1SA 6:15 Leeweti Godaa Taabotiyanne worqa miisheti de7iya saaxiniya gaariyape wodhisidi, gita shucha bolla wothidosona. He gallas Beet-Sameesa asay Godaas xuussa yarshonne hara yarshota yarshidosona.
1SA 6:16 Ichashu Filisxeeme halaqati hanidaba ubbaa be7idi he gallas Eqroona simmidosona.
1SA 6:17 Worqa kixati Filisxeeme halaqati nagara yarsho oothidi Godaas kiitida Ashdooda, Gaaza, Asqaloona, Gaatenne Eqroona geetetiya ichashu katamata sunthan issuwa issuwa immidosona.
1SA 6:18 Worqa ecereta tayboy Filisxeeme halaqata ichashay de7iya gimbetida katamatanne heeran de7iya gutata taybuwa mela. Beet-Sameesan de7iya Iyyasu geetetiya uraa gaden Godaa Taabotiya wothida gita shuchay hachi gakanaw marka gididi de7ees.
1SA 6:19 Shin enti Godaa Taabotiyas giddo baggaa be7ida gisho Goday Beet-Sameesa asaape laapun tammu asata wodhis. Goday entafe daro asaa wodhida gisho asay yeekidosona.
1SA 6:20 Hessa gisho, Beet-Sameesa asay, “Godaa sinthan, ha geeshsha Xoossaa sinthan ooni eqanaw danda7ii? Taabotey nuupe keyidi oodeko baanee?” yaagidosona.
1SA 6:21 Qiriyat-Yi7aariman de7iya asaako kiita yeddidi, “Filisxeeme asay Godaa Taabotiya zaaridosona; yidi iya hinteko ekite” yaagidosona.
1SA 7:1 Qiriyat-Yi7aarima asay yidi, Godaa Taabotiya efidi dere huuphen de7iya Amnadaabe son wothidosona. Godaa Taabotiya naagana mela Amnadaabe na7aa Alaazara dummayidi sunthidosona.
1SA 7:2 Taabotey Qiriyat-Yi7aariman daro wode gam7is; yan laatamu laythi uttis. Isra7eele asa ubbay azzanidi Godaa koydosona.
1SA 7:3 Sameeli Isra7eele asaako, “Kumetha wozanape hinte Godaako simmidaba gidiko, allaga xoossatanne Astaroote eeqa hinte giddofe diggite. Hintenatethaa Godaas sheedhite; iya xalaalas kiitetite; I hintena Filisxeemeta kushepe ashshana” yaagis.
1SA 7:4 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele asay Ba7aalenne Astaroote eeqa banta giddofe diggidi, Godaa xalaala goyinnidosona.
1SA 7:5 Hessafe guye, Sameeli, “Isra7eeleta, ubbay Mixipha shiiqite; taani yan hintew Godaa woossana” yaagis.
1SA 7:6 Enti Mixipha shiiqidi haathe duuqidi, Godaa sinthan gussidosona; he gallas xoomidosona; he bessan, “Nuuni Godaa bolla nagara oothida” yaagidi paaxidosona. Mixiphan Sameeli Isra7eele asaa bolla daynnatis.
1SA 7:7 Isra7eeleti Mixiphan shiiqidaysa Filisxeeme asay si7ida wode enta olanaw keyidosona. Isra7eeleti hessa si7idi, Filisxeemetas yayyidosona.
1SA 7:8 Isra7eele asay Sameelako, “Filisxeeme asaa kushepe nuna ashshana mela neeni Godaa, nu Xoossa woosa aggofa” yaagidosona.
1SA 7:9 Sameeli issi dhammiya dorsa na7a ekidi, kumethi xuussa yarsho oothidi Godaas yarshis; Isra7eele asaa gisho Godaa woossis; Goday iya woosa si7is.
1SA 7:10 Sameeli xuussa yarsho yarshiya wode Filisxeemeti Isra7eeleta olanaw shiiqidosona. Shin he gallas Filisxeemeta bolla Goday gita dada gunthidi daganthin, enti Isra7eeleta sinthafe baqatidosona.
1SA 7:11 Isra7eeleti Mixiphafe keyidi, Filisxeemeta yedethidi, Beet-Kaarape garsa baggara de7iya bessaa gakanaw oge bolla wodhidosona.
1SA 7:12 Hessafe guye, Sameeli issi shuchu ekidi, Mixiphafenne Shenape giddon essis; “Ha77i gakanaw Goday nuna maaddis” yaagidi he bessaa Aben7ezera gidi sunthis.
1SA 7:13 Filisxeeme asay xoonetidosona; enti Isra7eele biitta bolla nam7antho dendibookona. Sameeli de7ida laytha ubban Godaa kushey Filisxeeme asaa bolla deexis.
1SA 7:14 Filisxeeme asay Eqroonape Gaate gakanaw Isra7eelepe di77ida katamati Isra7eeles simmidosona. Isra7eele asay banta kase zawa Filisxeeme asaa kushepe wothi ekidosona. Isra7eele asaynne Amoore asay saro de7is.
1SA 7:15 Sameeli ba de7o laytha ubban Isra7eele bolla pirdees.
1SA 7:16 Sameeli laythan laythan Beetele, Galgalanne Mixipha yuuyidi Isra7eele bolla pirdees.
1SA 7:17 Iya keethay Raman de7iya gisho yaa simmidi he bessanka Isra7eele bolla pirdees. I Raman Godaas yarsho bessi keexis.
1SA 8:1 Sameeli cimida wode ba nayta Isra7eele bolla daynna oothidi shuumis.
1SA 8:2 Iya bayra na7aa sunthay Iyyu7eela; kaalo na7a sunthay Abiya; enti Barsaaben pirdoosona.
1SA 8:3 Shin iya nayti banta aawa ogiya kaallibookona. Enti bessonna go77a demmanaw guye simmidosona; wodhaafe ekidosona, suure pirda wobbisidosona.
1SA 8:4 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele cimati issife shiiqidi, Sameelako Rama yidi,
1SA 8:5 “Heko neeni cimadasa; ne nayti ne ogiya kaallokona; hara kawotethati ootheysada nuna aysiya kawo ha77i nuus shuuma” yaagidosona.
1SA 8:6 Enti, “Nuna aysiya kawo nuus imma” gidi oychidaysi Sameela ufaysibeenna. Hessa gisho, Sameeli Godaa woossis.
1SA 8:7 Goday Sameela, “Taani enta bolla kawotonnaada nena gidonashin tana ixida gisho asay neeko giyaba ubbaa si7a.
1SA 8:8 Enta taani Gibxefe kessida wodiyape doomidi hachi gakanaw tana aggidi, hara xoossata goyinnishe de7idosona. Ha77i enti ta bolla oothida ubbaa ne bolla oothosona.
1SA 8:9 Ha77i enti giyaba si7a; shin enta bolla kawotana kawa wogaa entaw minthada oda” yaagis.
1SA 8:10 Kawo oychida deriyas Goday odida qaala ubbaa Sameeli yaagidi odis.
1SA 8:11 “Hinte bolla kawotana kawoy oothanabay haysa; I hinte adde nayta ekidi, para gaare asatanne para asata oothana; enti iya gaariya sinthan woxana.
1SA 8:12 Entafe attidaysata shaalaqatanne hamsalaqata, harata iya biitta goyeyisata iya kathaa cakeyisata, qassi harata iya ola miishenne para gaare miishe ootheyisata kessana.
1SA 8:13 Hinte macca naytaka efidi, baw shitto giigiseyisata, katheysatanne uukeyisata oothana.
1SA 8:14 Hinte goshshaafe, woyne gadepenne shamaho gadepe lo77o bessata ekidi, ba moorinnatas immana.
1SA 8:15 Kathaafenne woyniyape tammaafe issi kushiya ekidi ba shuumatasinne ba moorinnatas immana.
1SA 8:16 Hinte adde aylletape, macca aylletape, hinte na7atethatafenne hinte hariyape lo77eysa baw go7etanaw ekana.
1SA 8:17 Hinte dorsafenne deeshape tammaafe issi kushe ekana; hinte iya oosancho gidana.
1SA 8:18 He gallasay gakida wode hinte doorida kawoy gathiya qohuwa gisho waassana; shin he gallas Goday hinte waasuwa si7enna” yaagis.
1SA 8:19 Gidoshin, asay Sameela qaala si7onna ixidi, “Akay, nuus kawoy de7o.
1SA 8:20 Hara kawotethata mela nuna kaalethiya, nu sinthan biyanne nu olaa oletiya kawoy de7o.”
1SA 8:21 Sameeli asaa qaala ubbaa si7idi, Godaas odis.
1SA 8:22 Goday Sameelako, “Enta qaala si7a; enta bolla kawo kawotha” yaagis. Sameeli Isra7eele asaako, “Hinte soo soo simmite” yaagis.
1SA 9:1 Biniyaame koche gidida issi Qiisa geetetiya addey de7ees; I eretida asi. I Abi7eela na7a; Abeeli Xaroora na7a; Xaroori Bakoraate na7a; Bakorati Biniyaame koche gidida Afeeqa na7a.
1SA 9:2 Iyaw Saa7ola geetetiya issi mala lo77o gidida pantha na7i de7ees. Isra7eeleta giddon iya mela mala lo77oy baawa; I asi ubbay iya hashepe garsan attiya adussa asi.
1SA 9:3 Issi gallas Saa7ola aawa Qiisa hareti dhayidosona; Qiisi ba na7aa Saa7olako, “Oosanchotape issuwa ekada hareta koyanaw ba” yaagis.
1SA 9:4 Enti derey dariya Efreema biittaranne Shalisha biittara koyishe aadhidosona, shin hareta demmibookona. Qassi Sha7alima biittara koyishe aadhidosona, shin yanka hareti dookona. Biniyaame biittara aadhidosona, shin yanka demmibookona.
1SA 9:5 Enti Zuufa biitta gakida wode Saa7oli baara de7iya oosanchuwako, “Haaya; ane guye simmoos; aaway haretaba qopeysa aggidi, nuus hirgana” yaagis.
1SA 9:6 Shin oosanchoy, “Heko, issi bonchetida Xoossa asi ha kataman de7ees; I odiya ubbay poletees. Ane ha77i yaa boos; ooni eri nu baana ogiya I nuus odaneko” yaagis.
1SA 9:7 Saa7oli, “Nu biyaba gidiko iyaw ay immanee? Nu oykida kathay wuris; nu Xoossa asas immiyabay baawa. Nuus aybi de7ii?” yaagis.
1SA 9:8 Oosanchoy zaaridi, “Ta kushen guutha bira santimey de7ees; nu baana ogiya nuus odana mela Xoossa uraas hanno immana” yaagis.
1SA 9:9 (Beni wode Isra7eele biittan issi asi Xoosse oychanaw bishe, “Ane qoncethi be7iya asako boos” yaagees. Ha77i nabe geeteteysi he wode qoncethi be7iya asi geetetees.)
1SA 9:10 Saa7oli zaaridi, “Lo77o; yedha” yaagin, Xoossa uray de7iya katamaa bidosona.
1SA 9:11 Enti pude katamaa keyishin, haathe tikanaw yaa geela7otara ogen gahetidi, “Qoncethi be7iya asi haysan de7ii?” yaagidi oychidosona.
1SA 9:12 Enti, “Ee de7ees; I hintefe sinthan de7ees; ellesidi biite. Hachi asay dhoqa goyinno bessan yarsho yarshiya gisho, I nu katamaa yis.
1SA 9:13 Hinte katamaa geliya wode I maanaw dhoqa goyinno bessaa keyonna de7ishin hinte iya demmana. I yarshuwa anjanaw koshshiya gisho I gakonna de7ishin asay kathaa meenna. I anjidaape guye xeegetidaysati maana. Elle keyite; hinte iya ha77i demmana” yaagidosona.
1SA 9:14 Enti katamaa geliya wode Sameeli goyinno bessaa keyanaw bishe entara gahetis.
1SA 9:15 Saa7oli yaanape kase gallas Sameelas Goday haysada yaagidi qoncisis;
1SA 9:16 “Wonto hannoode Biniyaame biittafe issi asi ta neeko yeddana; I ta asaa Isra7eele kaalethana mela tiya. I ta asaa Filisxeeme kushepe ashshana; ta asa waasoy taako gakida gisho ta enta be7as” yaagis.
1SA 9:17 Sameeli Saa7ola be7ida wode Goday, “Taani new odida uray haysa; I ta asaa kaalethana” yaagis.
1SA 9:18 Saa7oli gimbe dirsa pengiya matan de7iya Sameelako shiiqidi, “Qoncethi be7iya ura soy awuneko taw odarkii?” yaagis.
1SA 9:19 Sameeli zaaridi, “Qoncethi be7ey tana. Hachi hinte taara miya gisho taape sinthatidi goyinno bessaa biite. Taani nena wonto guura yeddana; ne wozanan de7iya ubbaa ta new odana.
1SA 9:20 Heedzu gallasape sinthe dhayida haretaba gidiko enti bentida gisho hirgofa. Isra7eele asa ubbaa amoy oonee? Nenanne ne aawa soo asaa gidennee?” yaagis.
1SA 9:21 Saa7oli zaaridi, “Shin taani Isra7eele zare ubbaafe laafa gidida Biniyaame koche gidikina? Ta soo asay Biniyaame kochaa giddon guutha gidennee? Neeni ayis taw haysa melaba oday?” yaagis.
1SA 9:22 Hessafe guye, Sameeli Saa7olanne iya oosanchoy efidi, dalga keethi gelsidi he bessaa xeegetida hastamu gidiya asaa giddon boncho bessan utisis.
1SA 9:23 Sameeli kathi katheysako, “Ne matan dumma wothashsha gada taani new immida ashuwa hamma” yaagis.
1SA 9:24 Kathi katheysi missa ashuwa ehidi, Saa7ola sinthan wothis. Sameeli Saa7olako, “Ta new dumma shaakada wothida ashoy haysa; ekada ma. Taani imathata xeegida wodepe doomada haysa new ashshas” yaagis. He gallas Saa7oli Sameelara mis.
1SA 9:25 Enti goyinno bessaafe duge katama wodhin, keetha bolla de7iya bessan Sameeli Saa7olara odetis.
1SA 9:26 Sa7i wontin, Sameeli Saa7ola keetha bollafe xeegidi, “Denda; ta nena moyzana” yaagis. Saa7oli dendin, nam7ay oge bolla keyidosona.
1SA 9:27 Enti katama gaxa gakishin, Sameeli Saa7olako, “Ne oosanchoy sinthe baana mela oda” yaagis. Oosanchoy sinthe aadhidi bin, Sameeli Saa7olako, “Xoossi gidaba ta new odana mela haysan guuthu gam7a” yaagis.
1SA 10:1 He wode Sameeli tigiyabara zayte ekidi, Saa7ola huuphen tiyis. Saa7ola yeeridi, haysada yaagis; “Ba asaa Isra7eele kaalethana mela Goday nena tiyis.
1SA 10:2 Neeni hachi taape shaaketada biya wode Raheeli duufuwa matan Biniyaame zawan de7iya Xalxaha geetetiya bessan nam7u asatara gahetana. Enti nena, ‘Ne koyanaw bida hareti bentidosona; ha77i ne aaway hareta qopeysa aggidi, ta na7ay waanidesha?’ yaagidi new hirgees” yaagidi odana.
1SA 10:3 Neeni he bessaafe dendada, Taabore gita mithaa gakanaw baana. Xoossaako Beetele biya heedzu asati yan neera gahetana. Entafe issoy heedzu deesha mari tookis; nam7anthoy heedzu uythi tookis; heedzanthoy ogoro kumitha woyne tookis.
1SA 10:4 Enti nena sarothana; new nam7u uythu immana; ne enta kushepe he uythaa ekanaw koshshees.
1SA 10:5 “Hessafe guye, neeni Filisxeeme olanchota cugay de7iya Xoossa deriya Gib7a baana. Neeni he katamaa gakiya wode diithara karaabora, suusul7enne zaye punnidi kaa7ishenne tinbite odishe, goyinno bessaafe wodhiya nabe cugara gahetana.
1SA 10:6 Godaa Ayyaanay ne bolla wolqan wodhana; neeni entara tinbite odana; neeni laametada hara asi gidana.
1SA 10:7 Ha mallati poletiya wode Xoossay neera de7iya gisho ne oothanaw danda7iyaba ubbaa ootha.
1SA 10:8 “Neeni taape sinthatada Galgala wodha. Taani xuussa yarshonne sarotetha yarsho yarshanaw neeko baana. Ta neeko bada ne oothanaba odana gakanaw laapun gallas gam7a” yaagis.
1SA 10:9 Saa7oli Sameelape shaaketida wode Xoossay Saa7ola wozanaa laammis; Sameeli odida mallati ubbay he gallas hanidosona.
1SA 10:10 Saa7olinne iya aylley Gib7a gakiya wode nabe cugay iyara gahetis. Xoossa Ayyaanay iya bolla wolqara wodhin I enta giddon tinbite odetis.
1SA 10:11 Saa7ola kase eriya ubbay I nabetara tinbite odeteysa be7ida wode, “Qiisa na7ay waanidee? Saa7oli nabe yaree?” yaagidosona.
1SA 10:12 He bessan de7iya issi uray, “Nu enta aaway ooneko eriw?” yaagidi oychis. Hessa gisho, “Saa7oli nabe kochee?” geysi hayse gidis.
1SA 10:13 Saa7oli tinbite odeysa wursidaape guye goyinno zumaa bolla keyis.
1SA 10:14 Saa7ola aawa ishay Saa7olanne iya aylliya, “Awu bidetii?” yaagis. Saa7oli, “Hareta koyanaw bida; hareti bentonna ixin Sameela oychanaw bida” yaagis.
1SA 10:15 Saa7ola aawa ishay, “Hayyana Sameeli new gidaba taw odarkii” yaagis.
1SA 10:16 Saa7oli, “Hareti bentidaysa nabey Sameeli nuus geeshshidi odis” yaagis. Shin “Ne kawo gidana” gidi Sameeli iyaw odidaysa ba aawa ishas odibeenna.
1SA 10:17 Hessafe guye, Sameeli Mixiphan Isra7eele asaa Godaa sinthan shiishis.
1SA 10:18 Enta, “Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees; ‘Taani Isra7eele Gibxefe kessas; Gibxe asaa kushepenne hintena un7ethiya kawotethata ubbaa kushepe ashshas.’
1SA 10:19 Shin hachi hintena hinte metuwapenne waayiyape ashshiya tana hinte Xoossaa ixideta. ‘Akay, nuus kawo kawotha’ yaagideta. Hessa gisho, ha77i hinte, hinte kochan kochan gididi Godaa sinthe shiiqite” yaagis.
1SA 10:20 Sameeli Isra7eele zare shiishin, Biniyaame kochay dooretis.
1SA 10:21 Biniyaame kochaa shiishin, Maxira kochay dooretis. Wursethan Qiisa na7ay Saa7oli dooretis; enti iya koydosona, shin I bentibeenna.
1SA 10:22 Hessa gisho enti, “Addey ha bessaa yidee?” yaagidi Godaa oychidosona. Goday, “Ee, Saa7oli miishe giddon qosetidi uttis” yaagis.
1SA 10:23 Enti woxi bidi, qosetida bessaafe kessi ehidosona. Asaa giddon I eqiya wode asi ubbay iya hashepe garsara attiya adussa asi.
1SA 10:24 Sameeli asaako, “Goday doorida addiya be7itee? Iya daaniya asi ha asa giddon oonika baawa” yaagis. Asa ubbay banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Kawoy birata tuussi gido” yaagis.
1SA 10:25 Hessafe guye, Sameeli kawotetha wogaa asaas odis; xaatha maxaafan he wogaa xaafidi Godaa sinthan wothis. Yaatidi Sameeli asa ubbaa ba soo soo moyzis.
1SA 10:26 Saa7oli ba soo Gib7a bis; Xoossay enta wozanaa bochida mino asati Saa7olara bidosona.
1SA 10:27 Shin issi issi pathonna asati, “Ha addey nuna waatidi ashshanee?” yaagidosona. Enti iya kadhidi, iyaw ay imotaka immibookona. Shin Saa7oli si77i gis.
1SA 11:1 Issi ageenape guye, Amoone kawoy Na7oosi dendidi, Galadan de7iya Yaabesa katamaa teqis. Yaabesa asay, “Neeni nuura caaqa; nuuni new haaretana” yaagidosona.
1SA 11:2 Na7oosi, “Taani hintera caaqanay hinte ushacha ayfiya wooca kessada Isra7eele kawshidaape guyena” yaagis.
1SA 11:3 Yaabesa cimati Naa7osako, “Isra7eele biitta ubbaa nuuni kiita yeddana mela laapun gallas taka; nuna ashshiya asi dhayiko nuuni new kushe immana” yaagidosona.
1SA 11:4 Kiitetida asay Saa7oli de7iya bessaa Gib7a gakidi ha odaa asaas odidosona; asa ubbay banta qaala dhoqu oothidi yeekidosona.
1SA 11:5 He wode Saa7oli ba boorata laaggidi goshshafe yishe, “Asay waanidee? Ayis yeekona?” yaagidi oychis. Enti Yaabesa asay gidaba iyaw odidosona.
1SA 11:6 Ha qaala Saa7oli si7ida wode Xoossa Ayyaanay iya bolla wolqan wodhis; Saa7oli shene eexis.
1SA 11:7 Saa7oli waaxa boorata muxerethidi, “Saa7olanne Sameela kaallidi, keyonna asa boorati haysada muxetana” yaagidi kiitetida asata bolla Isra7eele biitta ubba yeddis. He wode asa ubbay Godaas yayyidosona; enti issi asada hanidi keyidosona.
1SA 11:8 Saa7oli Beezeqan enta shiishidi taybida wode Isra7eele asay heedzu xeetu mukulu; Yihuda asay hastamu mukulu gidis.
1SA 11:9 Kiitetida asay, “Bidi Yaabesa Galada asaas, ‘Wonto xalqey michiya wode nuuni hintena ashshana yaagidi odite’ ” yaagidosona. Kiitetida asay bidi, Yaabesa asaas hessa odin, enti daro ufaytidosona.
1SA 11:10 Yaabesa asay Amoonetako, “Nuuni wonto hintew kushe immana; hinte nu bolla dosidaba oothite” yaagidosona.
1SA 11:11 Wontetha gallas Saa7oli ba asaa heedzu cugan shaakis. Enti sa7i wontiya wode Amoone asay dunkaanida gutaa gelidi, xalqey michana gakanaw Amooneta goyridosona. Goyretethaafe attidaysati nam7u asi issife doonnaada baw baw baqaatis.
1SA 11:12 Isra7eele asay Sameelako, “Saa7oli nu bolla kawotane yaagida asati oonantee? Enti ooneko kessite; nu enta wodhana” yaagis.
1SA 11:13 Shin Saa7oli, “Hachi Goday Isra7eele ashshida gisho issi asika hayqenna” yaagidi zaaris.
1SA 11:14 Sameeli, “Haayite; Galgala bidi, yan Saa7oli kawo gideysa zaaridi erisoos” yaagis.
1SA 11:15 Hessa gisho, asa ubbay Galgala bidi, Godaa sinthan Saa7oli kawo gideysa erisidosona. Yan issifetetha yarsho Godaa sinthan yarshidosona. Saa7olinne Isra7eele asa ubbay he bessan ba7aale ufaysan bonchidosona.
1SA 12:1 Sameeli Isra7eele ubbaako, “Hinte taw odida ubbaa si7ada, hinte bolla kawo kawothas.
1SA 12:2 Ha77i hintena kaalethanaw kawoy de7ees. Taani daro cimada puulumas; ta nayti hintera de7oosona. Taani ta na7atethafe doomada hachi gakanaw hintena kaalethas.
1SA 12:3 Heko, taani hinte sinthan eqas; Godaa sinthaninne I tiyida kawa sinthan ta bolla markatite. Taani oodde booru ekadina? Oodde hare ekadina? Oona cimmadina? Oona un7ethadina? Be7ashe be7onnaada hananaw oodefe wodhaafe ekadina? Haysatape issuwa taani oothidaba gidiko taw odite; ta qanxana” yaagis.
1SA 12:4 Enti zaaridi, “Neeni nuna cimmabaaka; woyko nuna un7ethabaaka; ne oodde kushepe aybaka ekabaaka” yaagidosona.
1SA 12:5 Sameeli, “Hinte ta kushen ay balaka demmiboonaysa Godaynne I tiyida kawoy hachi hinte bolla marka” yaagis. Asay, “Ee, Xoossay marka” yaagidosona.
1SA 12:6 Qassika Sameeli, “Musenne Aarona dooridaynne hinte mayzata Gibxefe kessiday Godaa.
1SA 12:7 Ha77i hintewunne hinte mayzatas Goday oothida xillo ooso ubbaas taani hintenera Godaa sinthan mootetana mela haysan eqite.
1SA 12:8 Yayqoobinne iya soo asay Gibxen de7ishin, Gibxe asay enta un7ethida wode hinte mayzati Godaako waassidosona. Goday Musenne Aarona kiittis; enti hinte mayzata Gibxefe kessidi haysan wothidosona.
1SA 12:9 “Shin Isra7eele asay Godaa banta Xoossaa dogidosona. Goday enta Haxoora tora mocona Sisaara kushen, Filisxeeme asaa kusheninne Moo7abe kawa kushen aathidi immin enta olidosona.
1SA 12:10 Enti, ‘Nuuni nagara oothida; Godaa aggidi, Ba7aalenne Astaroota goyinnida. Shin ha77i ne nuna nu morketa kushepe ashsha; nuuni nena goyinnana’ yaagidi Godaako waassidosona.
1SA 12:11 Goday Gediyoona, Baaraqa, Yoftaahenne Sameela kiittidi, hinte yuusho ubban de7iya morketa kushepe hintena ashshis. Yaatin, hinte saro de7ideta.
1SA 12:12 “Amoone kawoy Na7oosi hinteko yidaysa be7ida wode Goday hinte Xoossay hinte kawo gidikoka, hinte, ‘Akay, nuuni kawo koyoos’ yaagideta.
1SA 12:13 Ha77i hinte dooridanne oychida kawoy haysish. Heko, Goday hinte bolla kawothis.
1SA 12:14 Hinte Godaas yayyiko, iyaw kiitetiko, iya qaala si7iko, iya kiitaa bolla makallonna ixiko, hintenne hinte bolla kawotiya kawoy Godaa hinte Xoossaa kaalliko ubbabay suurana.
1SA 12:15 Shin hinte Godaa qaalas kiitetonna ixikonne iya kiitaa bolla makalliko, Godaa pirday kase hinte aawata bolla yidaysada hinte bollaka yaana.
1SA 12:16 “Hiza minnidi eqite; Goday hinte ayfiya sinthan oothana gitaba be7ite.
1SA 12:17 Ha77i giste caka wode gidennee? Goday dadanne ira yeddana mela taani Godaa woossana. Hinte kawo oychidi, Godaa sinthan ay mela iitaba oothidaako hinte akeekana” yaagis.
1SA 12:18 Sameeli Godaa woossis; Goday he gallas dadanne ira yeddis; hessa gisho, asay Godaanne Sameela daro yayyidosona.
1SA 12:19 Asay, “Nuuni kawo oychidi, nu nagara ubbaa bolla ha iitatethaa gujida gisho nuuni ne aylleti hayqonna mela nuus Godaa ne Xoossaa woossarki” yaagis.
1SA 12:20 Sameeli asaako, “Yayyofite; hinte ha iitatetha ubbaa oothideta; shin hinte kumetha wozanan Godaas kiitetite; iya kaalo aggofite.
1SA 12:21 Pathonnaba gidiya gisho maaddonnanne ashshona eeqata kaallopite.
1SA 12:22 Goday ba gita sunthaa gisho ba asaa aggenna; I hintena ba ase oothanaw ufaytees.
1SA 12:23 Hinte gisho woosa aggada Godaa qohoy taape haako; taani hintena lo77onne suure ogiya tamaarsana.
1SA 12:24 Godaa yayyite; hinte kumetha wozanan ammanetidi, iyaw kiitetite; hintew I oothida gitaba hassayite.
1SA 12:25 Shin hinte zaari zaari nagara oothiko, hintenne hinte kawoy dhayana” yaagis.
1SA 13:1 Saa7oli kawotiya wode iyaw laythi hastama; I Isra7eele bolla nam7u laythi kawotidaape guye,
1SA 13:2 Isra7eeleta giddofe heedzu mukulu asi dooris. Entafe nam7u mukulu asay Mikmaasaninne derey dariya Beetele biittan Saa7olara de7ees. Issi mukulu asay qassi Biniyaamen de7iya Gib7an Yoonatanara de7ees; attida asaa Saa7oli enta soo soo yeddis.
1SA 13:3 Yoonataani Gib7an de7iya Filisxeeme olanchota olis; Filisxeeme asay hessa si7idosona. Hessafe guye, Saa7oli, “Ibraaweti haysa si7o” gidi biitta ubban moyze punisis.
1SA 13:4 Saa7oli Filisxeeme asaa olidi xoonidaysa Isra7eele asay si7idosona; Isra7eele asay Filisxeeme asaa matan ixetidaysata gideysa eridosona. Isra7eele asay Saa7ola kaallanaw xeegetidi Galgalan shiiqidosona.
1SA 13:5 Filisxeeme asay Isra7eele asaa olanaw heedzu mukulu para gaaretara, usupun mukulu para asataranne abba doonan de7iya shafeda darida olanchotara shiiqidosona. Enti bidi, Beet-Aweenape doloha baggara de7iya Mikmaasan zugidi uttidosona.
1SA 13:6 Isra7eele asay sa7i entaw iita gideysanne olanchoti dagammidaysa be7ida wode gongolon, buuren, zaalla giddon, kakan, haatha ollan qosetidosona.
1SA 13:7 Ibraawetape guuthati Yordaanose shaafa pinnidi, Gaadenne Galada biitta bidosona. Shin Saa7oli Galgalan attis; iyara de7iya olanchoti ubbay yashshan kokoridosona.
1SA 13:8 Saa7oli Sameeli keerida laapun gallas gakanaw gam7is; shin Sameeli Galgala yibeenna; yaatin, Saa7olara de7iya olanchoti laaletethi doomidosona.
1SA 13:9 Hessa gisho, Saa7oli, “Xuussa yarshonne issifetetha yarshota taw ehite” yaagidi, xuussa yarsho yarshis.
1SA 13:10 Saa7oli xuussa yarshuwa yarshidi polidaape guye Sameeli yis. Yaatin, Saa7oli Sameela mokanaw kare keyis.
1SA 13:11 Sameeli, “Ha neeni oothidabay aybee?” yaagidi Saa7ola oychis. Saa7oli, “Asay laaletanaw matidaysa, neka gida wodiyan yaanaw gam7idaysanne Filisxeemeti Mikmaasan shiiqidaysa taani be7as.
1SA 13:12 Hessa gisho, ‘Filisxeemeti taara oletanaw Galgala wodhana hanoosona; taani Godaa maado oychabike’ gada qopas. Yaatin, xuussa yarsho yarshanaysi taw attonnaba gidis” yaagidi zaaris.
1SA 13:13 Sameeli, “Neeni boozaba oothadasa; Goday, ne Xoossay new immida kiitaa naagabaaka. Neeni naagidaako Goday hachi ne kawotethaa Isra7eele bolla merinaw minthanashin.
1SA 13:14 Shin ha77i ne kawotethay gam7enna; neeni Godaa kiita naagaboonna gisho, Goday ba wozanaada oothiya asi demmis; ba asaa kaalethana mela iya dooris” yaagis.
1SA 13:15 Sameeli Galgalape dendidi, Biniyaamen de7iya Gib7a bis. Saa7oli baara de7iya asaa taybin, asay usupun xeetu gidis.
1SA 13:16 Saa7oli, iya na7aa Yoonataaninne entara de7iya asay Biniyaamen de7iya Gib7an gam7idosona; Filisxeeme asay Mikmaasan dunkaanidosona.
1SA 13:17 Filisxeeme olanchoti heedzu cugan shaaketidi keyidosona. Entafe issi cugay Shu7aala biittan de7iya Ofirako simmidi bis;
1SA 13:18 Nam7anthoy Beet-Horonako bis; heedzantho cugay mela biitta sinthan de7iya Saboyma zangaara duge xeelliya zawa ogiya oykidi bis.
1SA 13:19 Filisxeeme asay, “Ibraaweti mashshenne toora qoxofo” gida gisho, Isra7eele biittan birata qoxiya asi baawa.
1SA 13:20 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele asay banta marasha, konte, kaltanne baaca poshisanaw Filisxeeme boosona.
1SA 13:21 Marashanne konte poshisanaw hospun giraame deexiya bira qanxoosona; kaltanne xooxe poshisanaw oyddu giraame qanxoosona.
1SA 13:22 Hessa gisho, ola gallas Saa7olinne iya na7aa Yoonataani attishin, harata kushen toorinne mashshi baawa.
1SA 13:23 Filisxeeme cugay Mikmaasa pinthi baanaw keyis.
1SA 14:1 Issi gallas Saa7ola na7ay Yoonataani ba ola miishiya tookiya panthaako haysada yaagis; “Haaya; hefinthan de7iya Filisxeemeti dunkaanida gutaa ane boos” yaagis. Shin ba aawas hessa odibeenna.
1SA 14:2 He wode Saa7oli Gib7a matan Migroonan, oromaane mitha garsan de7ees. Iyara usupun xeetu asati de7oosona.
1SA 14:3 Seelon Godaa kahine gidida Eeli na7ay, kahiney Finihaasi yelida Ikabooda ishay, Akxuuba na7ay, Akiyi efuude ma77idi, enta giddon de7ees. Yoonataani enta giddon baynaysa oonika eribeenna.
1SA 14:4 Yoonataani Filisxeemeti dunkaanida gutaa pinnanaw biya ogiya bolla ushacha bagganinne haddirsa baggan, issoy Boxexa, hankoy Sana geetetiya nam7u pooxetida gita zaallati de7oosona.
1SA 14:5 Zaallatape issoy pudeha baggan Mikmaasa sinthan de7iya wode, issoy qassi dugeha baggan Gib7a sinthan de7ees.
1SA 14:6 Yoonataani ba ola miishiya tookiya panthaako, “Haaya; ha qaxaretiboona asay dunkaanida gutaa ane boos. Goday nu gisho oletonna aggenna; daro asan gidin guutha asan, ashshanaysi Godaa xoonenna” yaagis.
1SA 14:7 Iya ola miishiya tookeysi, “Neeni qopidaba ubbaa ootha; guye goopa; ta wozanay neera de7ees” yaagis.
1SA 14:8 Yoonataani, “Yaako haaya; hefinthi pinnidi asaas bentoos.
1SA 14:9 Enti, ‘Nuuni hinteko yaana gakanaw yan naagite’ giiko, nuuni de7iya bessan naaganaape attishin, entako booko.
1SA 14:10 Shin enti, ‘Nuuko haa yiite’ giiko, nuuni entako keyana. Hessi Goday enta nu kushen aathidi immidaysas malla gidana” yaagis.
1SA 14:11 Enti nam7ay keyidi Filisxeemetas bentida wode Filisxeemeti, “Heko, Ibraaweti banta qosetida ollafe zuumidi keyoosona” yaagidosona.
1SA 14:12 Filisxeeme olanchoti, Yoonatananne ola miishiya tookeysa xeegidi, “Haa nuuko keyite; nuuni hintena issiba bessaana” yaagidosona. Hessa gisho, Yoonataani ba ola miishiya tookeysako, “Tana kaallada ha keya. Goday enta Isra7eele kushen aathidi immis” yaagis.
1SA 14:13 Yoonataani ba ola miishiya tookeysa kaalethidi, tohoninne kushen zuumidi keyis. Filisxeemeta Yoonataani shocidi yeggin, iya ola miishiya tookeysi kaallidi enta wodhis.
1SA 14:14 He koyro olan Yoonataaninne iya ola miishiya tookeysi bagga boora soo gaden laatamu gidiya asi wodhidosona.
1SA 14:15 Hessafe guye, gutanin goshshan, olas keyida asatinne naagon de7iya Filisxeemeti dagammidosona. Biitti qaaxis; he dagamay Xoossafe kiitetis.
1SA 14:16 Saa7oli Biniyaame biittan, Gib7an wothida wochiya asati, Filisxeeme olanchoti yaara haara piski gidi laaleteysa be7idosona.
1SA 14:17 Yaatin, Saa7oli baara de7iya asaako, “Ane olanchota shiishidi nu giddofe ooni bidaako be7ite” yaagis. Enti shiishidi taybiya wode Yoonataaninne iya ola miishiya tookeysi baynaysa be7idosona.
1SA 14:18 Saa7oli kahiniya Akiya, “Xoossaa Taabotiya haa ekada ya” yaagis. He wode Taabotey Isra7eelera de7ees
1SA 14:19 Saa7oli kahiniyara haasayishin, Filisxeemeti dunkaanida gutan wocamay dari dari bis. Hessa gisho, Saa7oli kahiniya, “Taabotiyape ne kushiya kessa” yaagis.
1SA 14:20 Hessafe guye, Saa7olinne iya olanchoti shiiqidi olaa bidosona. Filisxeeme asa ubbay hanana ba dhayidi, banta mashshan issoy issuwa buthidosona.
1SA 14:21 Kase Filisxeeme asaara wolla olla bessa bida Ibraaweti enta aggidi, Saa7olaranne Yoonatanara de7iya Isra7eele asaara walaketidosona.
1SA 14:22 Derey dariya Efreema biittan qosetida hara Isra7eeletika Filisxeemeti baqateysa si7idosona. Entika Isra7eeletara walaketidi yedetho oykidosona.
1SA 14:23 Goday he gallas Isra7eele asaa ashshis. Beet-Aweenape hefinthi gakanaw olay kanthis.
1SA 14:24 He gallas Isra7eele asay koshan labbanidosona. Saa7oli, “Sa7i qammanaape sinthe taani ta morketa halo keyonna de7ishin, kathi miya oonika baadetidaysa gido” yaagidi asaa caaqisidi wothis. Hessa gisho, olanchotape kathi doonako shiishida asi oonika baawa.
1SA 14:25 Olanchoti ubbay wora giddo geliya wode mitha bolla eessi de7ees.
1SA 14:26 Enti wora giddon eessi xokeysa be7idosona; shin caaquwa yayyida gisho, issi asika ba kushiya doonako shiishibenna.
1SA 14:27 Shin Yoonataani iya aaway asara oda qachidaysa si7ibeenna. Hessa gisho, ba kushen de7iya xam7a xeeraa ililo eessan yeddi kessidi, laacin iya ayfey xeellis.
1SA 14:28 Hessafe guye, olanchotape issoy, “Ne aaway olanchota ubbaa, ‘Hachi kathi miya asi baadetidaysa gido’ yaagidi, caaqisidi wothis; asa ubbay labbaniday hessasa” yaagis.
1SA 14:29 Yoonataani, “Ta aaway biittas meto medhis. Taani ha eessaafe guuthara laaccida ay mela minnidaako be7a.
1SA 14:30 Asay ba morketape di77ida kathaafe hachi midaba gidiyako lo77oshin; enti wodhana Filisxeemeta tayboyka ay mela daraneshin” yaagis.
1SA 14:31 He gallas Isra7eele asay Mikmaasape Eloona gakanaw Filisxeemeta shoci simmidi daaburidosona.
1SA 14:32 Enti di77ida dorsata, miizatanne marata shukidi suuthaa gussonna midosona.
1SA 14:33 Issi asi Saa7olako, “Heko, asay suuthara de7iya asho midi, Godaa sinthan nagara oothosona” yaagis. Saa7oli, “Hinte nagara oothideta; gita shuchu gondorsidi elle taako haa shiishite” yaagis.
1SA 14:34 Hessafe guye, “Asaa giddo bidi, ‘Hinte issoy issoy hinte mehetanne dorsata taako haa ehite; haysan wogaada shukidi miite. Suuthara de7iya asho midi, Godaa sinthan nagara oothopite’ yaaga” yaagis. Hessa gisho, he qamma issoy issoy ba boora ehidi yan shukidosona.
1SA 14:35 Saa7oli he bessan Godaas yarsho bessi gimbis; Godaas yarsho bessi gimbishin haysi iyaw koyro.
1SA 14:36 Saa7oli, “Hachi qamma Filisxeemeta kaalli, bidi sa7i wontana gakanaw entaba ubbaa bonqos; entafe issuwaka ashshona wodhoos” yaagis. Enti, “Ero, nena lo77idaba ootha” yaagidi zaaridosona. Shin kahiney, “Ane Xoossaa sheney aybeko oychoos” yaagis.
1SA 14:37 Hessa gisho, Saa7oli, “Filisxeeme asaa kaallada boo? Neeni enta Isra7eele kushen aathada immanee?” yaagidi Xoossaa oychis. Shin he gallas Xoossay iyaw zaaro immibeenna.
1SA 14:38 Saa7oli, “Kaaletheyisata xeegidi, ubbay haayite; hachi ayba nagari oosetidaako ane qoridi demmoos.
1SA 14:39 Isra7eele ashshiya de7o Goday eriya mela. Ta na7a Yoonataana gidikoka, hayqanaw bessees” yaagis. Shin asaape issi asika doona pogibeenna.
1SA 14:40 Hessafe guye, Saa7oli Isra7eele asaako, “Hinte ubbay ya baggan eqite; taaninne ta na7aa Yoonataani ha baggan eqana” yaagis. Asay, “Ero, nena lo77idaba ootha” yaagidosona.
1SA 14:41 Hessafe guye, Saa7oli, “Taw like zaaro imma” yaagidi Godaa Isra7eele Xoossaa woossis. Saamay Saa7ola bollanne Yoonataana bolla wodhin asay geeyis.
1SA 14:42 Qassi Saa7oli, “Ta bollanne ta na7aa Yoonataana bolla saama yeggite” yaagis. Saamay Yoonataana bolla wodhis.
1SA 14:43 Saa7oli Yoonataana, “Ane neeni oothidaba oda” yaagis. Yoonataani, “Taani guutha eessa ililo ta xam7aa xeeran bochada laacas. Heko taani haysan de7ayis; hayqos giigetas” yaagis.
1SA 14:44 Saa7oli, “Yoonataana, neeni hayqonna ixiko, Xoossi tana pirdo” yaagis.
1SA 14:45 Shin asay Saa7olako, “Yoonataani, Isra7eeles hessa mela gita xoonuwa ehidaysi hayqanee? Hessi polo hanenna! De7o Xoossi eriya mela! Iya huuphiyape issi binaanika biittan wodhenna. I hachi haysa Xoossa maadon oothis” yaagidosona. Yaatidi asay Yoonataana ashshin, I hayqope attis.
1SA 14:46 Hessafe guye, Saa7oli Filisxeeme asaa yedetheysa aggin enti banta biitta simmidosona.
1SA 14:47 Saa7oli Isra7eele bolla kawotidaape guye, ubba baggara de7iya ba morketa olis. Hessatika, Moo7abeta, Amooneta, Edoometa, Suubba kawotanne Filisxeemeta. Olanaw bida bessa ubban xoonis.
1SA 14:48 I minnidi oletis; Amaaleqata xoonis; Isra7eele asaa bonqeyisata kushepe ashshis.
1SA 14:49 Saa7ola adde nayti Yoonataana, Yesuwanne Malkisa; iyaw bayra na7e sunthay Meraabo; kaalo na7e sunthay Melkoolo.
1SA 14:50 Iya machiya, Akmaasa na7iya Aknahoomo. Iya tora moconay iya aawa ishaa Neera na7aa Abeneera.
1SA 14:51 Saa7ola aawa Qiisinne Abeneera aawa Neeri Abi7eela nayta.
1SA 14:52 Saa7oli de7ida laytha ubban Filisxeemetara morketethan oletida mela de7is. Mino asi woyko xaala asi demmida wode ubban I he uraa ba olanchotan gujees.
1SA 15:1 Sameeli Saa7olako, “Ba asaa Isra7eele bolla neeni kawotanaada tiyana mela Goday kiittiday tana. Hessa gisho, Godaa qaala si7a.
1SA 15:2 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees; ‘Isra7eeleti Gibxefe keyidi yaa wode Amaaleqati ogen entara eqetida gisho taani Amaaleqata seerana.
1SA 15:3 Ha77i bada Amaaleqata shoca; entaw de7iyaba ubbaa polo dhaysa. Enta ashshofa; Maccanne adde, naytanne yooga nayta, miizinne dorse, gimalenne hare ubbaa wodha’ ” yaagis.
1SA 15:4 Saa7oli asaa xeegidi, Xelaame geetetiya bessan taybis. Taybiya wode Isra7eelepe nam7u xeetu mukulu toho olanchota; Yihudape tammu mukulu asi demmis.
1SA 15:5 Saa7oli Amaaleqata katamaa bidi issi shaafan qosetidi uttis.
1SA 15:6 Saa7oli, “Isra7eeleti Gibxefe keyiya wode hinte entaw keehida gisho taani hintena Amaaleqatara issife dhaysona mela dendidi enta giddofe keyite” yaagidi Qeena asaas odis. Yaatin Qeena asay Amaaleqata giddofe keyidi bidosona.
1SA 15:7 Saa7oli Amaaleqata Hawilape doomidi, Gibxefe doloha baggan de7iya Shuura gakanaw shocis.
1SA 15:8 Amaaleqata kawa Agaaga paxa di77is; iya asa ubbaa mashshan wodhidi wursis.
1SA 15:9 Shin Saa7olinne iya olanchoti, Agaaganne lo77o dorsata, miizata, anqara maratanne marazeta, hessadaka hara lo77obata ubbaa ashshidosona. Enti haysata polo wodhanaw koybookona; shin enti laafatanne pathonayisata dhaysidosona.
1SA 15:10 Goday Sameelako,
1SA 15:11 “Saa7oli tana kaalleysa aggidi, ta kiita naagiboonna gisho, taani Saa7ola kawothidaysan qiirotas” yaagis. Sameeli hessa si7ida wode un7etidi qamma kumethi Godaako waassis.
1SA 15:12 Sameeli wonta guura dendidi, Saa7olara gahetanaw bis. Shin asay, “Saa7oli Qarmeloosa katamaa bidi, yan bana hassaysiya hawulte essidaape guye, Galgala wodhis” yaagidi odidosona.
1SA 15:13 Sameeli Saa7ola demmida wode Saa7oli Sameelako, “Goday nena anjo; taani Godaa kiitta polas” yaagis.
1SA 15:14 Shin Sameeli Saa7olako, “Yaatin, ha taani si7iya dorsa waasoynne mehe waasoy aybee?” yaagis.
1SA 15:15 Saa7oli, “Olanchoti haysata Amaaleqatape ehidosona; enti Godaas, ne Xoossaas yarshanaw, ubbaafe lo77iya dorsatanne meheta ashshidosona, shin harata ubbaa dhaysida” yaagis.
1SA 15:16 Sameeli, “Ane aggaaga; Goday zine qamma taw odidaba ta new odana” yaagis. Saa7oli, “Ero oda” yaagis.
1SA 15:17 Sameeli zaaridi, “Ne ayfe sinthan ne guutha gidikoka, Isra7eele zerethaas kawo gidabikii? Isra7eele bolla kawotana mela Goday nena tiyis.
1SA 15:18 Goday, ‘Neeni bada iita gidida Amaaleqata kumethi dhaysa; enti wurana gakanaw wodha’ yaagidi kiittis.
1SA 15:19 Yaatin, ayis Godaas kiitetabikii? Di7os yaaretada Godaa sinthan ayis iitabaa oothadii?” yaagis.
1SA 15:20 Saa7oli, “Taani Godaas kiitetas; I tana kiittidaysada bada Amaaleqata wodha wursas; enta kawa Agaaga ehas.
1SA 15:21 Shin olanchoti di7uwape lo77iya dorsenne mehiya Godaas, ne Xoossaas, Galgalan yarshanaw ehidosona” yaagis.
1SA 15:22 Sameeli, “Goday ba qaalas kiiteteysan ufayteysa mela xuussa yarshoninne hara yarshon ufaytii? Heko, kiitetethi yarshofe aadhees; iya sissi dorsa modho yarsheysafe aadhees.
1SA 15:23 Geellatethi marotho nagara mela; qassi otoroy iita eeqa goyinno mela. Neeni Godaa qaala ixida gisho Goday ne kawo gidonna mela ixis” yaagis.
1SA 15:24 Saa7oli, “Taani nagara oothas; Godaa kiitaanne ne qaala toochas. Taani asaas yayyida gisho enti gidaba oothas.
1SA 15:25 Ha77i ta nagaraa atto garki; taani Godaa goyinnana mela taara yedharki” yaagis.
1SA 15:26 Sameeli, “Taani neera simmada biike; neeni Godaa qaala ixida gisho ne Isra7eele bolla kawo gidonna mela Goday ixis” yaagis.
1SA 15:27 Sameeli baanaw dendin, Saa7oli iya ma7uwa macaraa oykin, ma7oy daaketis.
1SA 15:28 Sameeli, “Goday hachi Isra7eele kawotethaa neepe daakidi neepe lo77iya hara asas immis.
1SA 15:29 Isra7eele bonchoy, Xoossay wordotenna woyko ba qofaa laammenna; ba qaala laammanaw I asi gidenna” yaagis.
1SA 15:30 Saa7oli, “Taani nagara oothas; shin ta biitta cimata sinthaninne Isra7eele asaa sinthan tana boncha. Taani Godaa, ne Xoossaa goyinnana mela taara yedharki” yaagidi woossis.
1SA 15:31 Hessa gisho, Sameeli iyara issife bin, Saa7oli Godaa goyinnis.
1SA 15:32 Sameeli, “Amaaleqata kawa Agaaga taako ehite” yaagis. Agaagi kokorishe Sameelako yidi, “Tuma hayqoy haysada cammii?” yaagis.
1SA 15:33 Sameeli Agaagako, “Ne mashshay maccasa naytape mela ashshidaysada ne aayaka maccasa giddon naytape mela attana” yaagis. Sameeli Agaaga Godaa sinthan Galgalan qanxerethis.
1SA 15:34 Sameeli dendidi, Rama bis; Saa7olika ba soo Gib7a bis.
1SA 15:35 Sameeli hayqana gakanaw Saa7ola be7anaw simmidi bibeenna, shin Sameeli Saa7ola gisho yeekis. Saa7ola Isra7eele bolla kawo oothidaysas Goday azzanis.
1SA 16:1 Goday Sameelako, “Isra7eele bolla I kawo gidonna mela taani ixida Saa7olas neeni awude gakanaw yeekay? Ane kacen zayte kunthada Beetelem addiya Isseyeko ba; kawo gidana mela taani iya nayta giddofe issuwa doora wothas” yaagis.
1SA 16:2 Sameeli, “Taani waanada boo? Saa7oli si7idi tana wodhana” yaagis. Goday, “Issi ussi eka bada, ‘Taani Godaas yarshanaw yas’ yaaga.
1SA 16:3 Isseyeka yarshos xeega. Ne oothanaba ta nena bessaana; ta nena besseysa tiya” yaagis.
1SA 16:4 Sameeli Goday odidaysa oothis; Beeteleme bidi katamaa cimatara gahetida wode enti kokorishe iyako yidi, “Ne saro yadii?” yaagidi oychidosona.
1SA 16:5 Sameeli, “Ee, saro yas; ta Godaas yarshanaw yas; hinteka geeyidi taara yarshos yedhite” yaagis. Qassi Isseyenne iya nayta geeshshidi enta yarshos xeegis.
1SA 16:6 Enti yaa gakiya wode Sameeli Isseye na7aa Eliyaaba be7idi, “Tuma iya sinthan eqida, Goday tiya uray haysa” yaagidi qopis.
1SA 16:7 Shin Goday Sameela, “Iya malaa woyko iya adussatethaa xeellofa; taani iya kadhas. Taani Goday asi be7eysada be7ike; asi som7o be7ees, shin Goday wozanaa be7ees” yaagis.
1SA 16:8 Isseyey Abinadaabe xeegidi, Sameela sinthe aathin, Sameeli, “Goday haysaka dooribeenna” yaagis.
1SA 16:9 Isseyey Saama aathin, Sameeli, “Goday haysaka dooribeenna” yaagis.
1SA 16:10 Hessada oothidi, Isseyey ba nayta laapunata Sameela sinthe aathis; shin Sameeli Isseyeko, “Goday haysata dooribeenna” yaagis.
1SA 16:11 Sameeli, “New de7iya adde nayti haysata xalaalee?” yaagidi Isseye oychis. Isseyey, “Ubbaafe kaalo na7ay attis; shin I dorse heemmanaw bis” yaagis. Sameeli, “Kiittada iya ehisa; I yaana gakanaw nu maanaw uttoko” yaagis.
1SA 16:12 Isseyey kiittidi na7aa ehisis; he na7ay aarise; ayfey lo77onne mala lo77o na7a. Goday Sameela, “Ta dooriday haysa gidiya gisho denda eqada tiya” yaagis.
1SA 16:13 Sameeli kacen kumida zayte ekidi, iya ishata sinthan Dawita tiyis. He gallasape doomidi, Godaa Ayyaanay Dawita bolla wolqan wodhis. Hessafe guye, Sameeli dendidi, Rama bis.
1SA 16:14 Godaa Ayyaanay Saa7olape shaaketin Godaape kiitetida iita ayyaanay Saa7ola waaysees.
1SA 16:15 Saa7ola aylleti, “Xoossaafe kiitetida iita ayyaanay nena waaysees.
1SA 16:16 Nuuni diithi diixiya asi koyidi ehana mela nu goday ba aylleta kiitto. Xoossaafe kiitetida iita ayyaanay nena oykiya wode he uray diithi diixiko new lo77o gidana” yaagidosona.
1SA 16:17 Saa7oli ba aylleta, “Diithi diixiya asi koyidi taw ehite” yaagis.
1SA 16:18 Aylletape issoy, “Beetelemen Isseyes diithi diixiya issi na7i de7ees. He na7ay xaalanne toorancho. I mala lo77onne cinca; Goday iyara de7ees” yaagis.
1SA 16:19 Saa7oli Isseyeko kiittidi, “Dorse heemmiya ne na7aa Dawita taw yedda” yaagis.
1SA 16:20 Isseyey uythunne ogoro woyne ushshu haren caanidi, issi kole gooshisidi ba na7aa Dawitara Saa7olas yeddis.
1SA 16:21 Dawiti Saa7olako yidi ooso doomis. Saa7oli Dawita daro dosis; Dawiti Saa7olas ola miishe tookeysa gidis.
1SA 16:22 Saa7oli, “Dawiti taw oothishe ta matan gam7o; taani iya dosas” yaagidi Isseyeko kiittis.
1SA 16:23 Hessafe simmin, Xoossafe kiitetida iita ayyaanay Saa7ola oykiya wode ubban Dawiti diithi ekidi diixees. I diixiya wode iita ayyaanay Saa7ola yeddeesinne iyaw lo77ees.
1SA 17:1 Filisxeemeti banta olanchota Yihudan de7iya Sooko geetetiya bessan olas shiishidosona. Enti Sokopenne Azeeqape giddon de7iya Efees-Damima geetetiya bessan shiiqidi uttidosona.
1SA 17:2 Saa7olinne Isra7eeleti Ela zangaaran shiiqidi, Filisxeemetara oletanaw keyidosona.
1SA 17:3 Filisxeeme olanchoti issi bagga zuma bolla salpin, Isra7eeleti hanko bagga zuman salpidosona; zangaaray entaw giddon de7ees.
1SA 17:4 Gaate kataman de7iya Gooliyada geetetiya issi toora qara addey Filisxeemeti dunkaanida gutaape keyis; iya geesay usupun wadhanne takadho.
1SA 17:5 I ishatammanne laapun kilo giraame deexiya naase birata xurure ma7is; qassi naase birata barneexa ba huuphen wothis.
1SA 17:6 Naase birata gambaale ba tohon aathis; ba hashiyan naase birata toora tookis.
1SA 17:7 Iya toora toomay wandaraashe mela orde; iya toora ayfey laapun kilo giraame deexees; iya gondalliya tookiya issi addey iya sinthan hemetees.
1SA 17:8 Gooliyadi eqidi ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Isra7eele olanchota bolla haysada yaagidi gayrees; hinte waanana gidi olas keydetii? Taani Filisxeeme asi; hinte qassi Saa7ola aylleta gideketii? Ane hinte giddofe issi asi doorite; he addey taako duge wodho.
1SA 17:9 He addey taara oletidi tana wodhiko, nuuni hinte aylle gidana; shin taani iya xoonada wodhiko hinte nu aylle gidananne nuus haaretana” yaagis.
1SA 17:10 Qassika he Filisxeeme addey, “Taani hachi Isra7eele olanchota mandayis; taw issi asi immite; ane nam7ay oletana” yaagis.
1SA 17:11 Saa7olinne Isra7eeleti Filisxeeme addiya qaala si7idi dagammidosona, daro yayyidosona.
1SA 17:12 Dawiti Yihuda biittan Beetelemen de7iya Efraata addiya Isseye na7a. Isseyes hospun adde nayti de7oosona; Saa7ola kawotetha laythan Isseyey daro laythi de7ida cima.
1SA 17:13 Isseye heedzu bayra adde nayti Saa7ola kaallidi olaa bidosona. Enta sunthay:- bayray Eliyaaba; kaaloy Amnadaabe; heedzanthoy Saama.
1SA 17:14 Dawiti nayta ubbaafe kaalo; bayra heedzu nayti Saa7ola kaallidosona.
1SA 17:15 Shin Dawiti ba aawa dorsata heemmanaw Saa7ola matape Beeteleme simeretees.
1SA 17:16 He Filisxeeme addey oytamu gallas wontanne omarsi yidi Isra7eeleta mandees.
1SA 17:17 Issi gallas Isseyey ba na7aa Dawita haysada yaagis; “Ha caacetida tiyape laatamu kilo giraamenne ha tammu uythata ekada ne ishatas efada ne ishati dunkaanida gutaa elle gatha.
1SA 17:18 Ha tammu nuka pila enta shaalaqas efa; ne ishati waani de7iyako be7ada, enti saro de7eysas malaata entafe ekada ya.
1SA 17:19 Kawoy Saa7oli, ne ishatinne Isra7eele asa ubbay Filisxeemetara oletishe Ela Zangaaran de7oosona” yaagis.
1SA 17:20 Dawiti guura dendidi dorsata hara asi henthidi, Isseyey kiittidaba caani ekidi bis. Isra7eele olanchoti banta qaala dhoqu oothidi gayrishe olas keyishin Dawiti gakis.
1SA 17:21 Isra7eeletinne Filisxeemeti issoy issuwako simmidi salpidosona.
1SA 17:22 Dawiti ba ehidaba shinqe naageysa kushen wothidi, olaa salpiya giddo woxi bidi, ba ishata sarothis.
1SA 17:23 Dawiti ba ishatara haasayishin, Gaatepe yida toora qaray, Filisxeeme Gooliyadi ba salpiyafe gaxa keyidi kaseysada Isra7eeleta mandishin Dawiti si7is.
1SA 17:24 Isra7eele asa ubbay he addiya be7ida wode daro yayyidi baqatidosona.
1SA 17:25 Isra7eele asay issoy issuwako, “Ha keyiya addiya be7idetii? I tuma Isra7eele mandanaw keyis. Ha addiya wodhiya uraas kawoy Saa7oli daro shalo immana; ba na7iwuka iyaw immana; iya aawa keethaa asay Isra7eelen kawo giira giirenna” yaagidosona.
1SA 17:26 Dawiti ba matan eqida asaa, “Ha Filisxeeme addiya wodhidi, ha yeellaa Isra7eelepe denthiya uraas aybe oosetanay? Ha qaxaretiboona Filisxeemey de7o Xoossaa olanchota mandey I oonee?” yaagidi oychis.
1SA 17:27 Enti, “Ha addiya wodhiya uraas haysi haysi oosetana” yaagidi kaseysada zaaridosona.
1SA 17:28 Dawiti asaara odeteysa iya bayra ishay Eliyaabi si7idi, Dawita bolla shene eexis. “Neeni ha bessaa ayis yadii? He guutha dorsata bazzon ooddes yeggadii? Ne otoruwanne ne wozanaa iitatethaa ta erayis; neeni olaa be7anaw yadasa” yaagis.
1SA 17:29 Dawiti, “Taani ha77i ay oothadina? Hari attoshin odetanawuka danda7ikina?” yaagis.
1SA 17:30 Dawiti ba ishaa aggidi, hara asaako simmidi, kaseysada oychin asay iyaw kaseysada zaaridosona.
1SA 17:31 Dawiti odidaysa si7ida asay Saa7olas odin, Saa7oli Dawita xeegisis.
1SA 17:32 Dawiti Saa7olako, “Ha addiya gaason oodde wozanika til7ofo; taani ne aylley bada, ha Filisxeeme addiyara oletana” yaagis.
1SA 17:33 Saa7oli Dawitako, “Neeni na7a; I ba na7atethafe doomidi ola meezetidi diccida gisho, ha Filisxeeme addiyara neeni oletanaw danda7aka” yaagis.
1SA 17:34 Shin Dawiti, “Taani, ne aylley ta aawa dorsata heemmiya wode gaammoy woyko garmafeeley keyidi dorse oykiya wode,
1SA 17:35 iya kaalla bada iya doonape wotha ekayis. Taako simmiya wode qoodhiya cuullada wodhayis.
