1SA 17:36 Taani ne aylley gaammonne garmafeele wodhas; ha qaxaretiboona Filisxeeme addey de7o Xoossaa olanchota guuthida gisho I entafe issuwada hanana.
1SA 17:37 Gaammofenne garmafeelepe tana ashshida Goday, ha Filisxeeme addiya kushepe tana ashshana” yaagis. Saa7oli Dawitako, “Ba, Goday neera gido” yaagis.
1SA 17:38 Saa7oli ba ma7uwa Dawita mayzis; Dawita huuphen naase birata barneexa wothis; naase birata xururiya Dawita mayzis.
1SA 17:39 Dawiti ba ola ma7uwa bolla mashsha dancidi hemetidi be7is. Shin hessa mela ma7o ma7idi eronna gisho hemetanaw danda7ibeenna. Hessa gisho, Dawiti Saa7olako, “Taani haysa mela ma7o ma7ada meezetaboonna gisho haysara baanaw danda7ike” yaagidi ola ma7uwa qaaris.
1SA 17:40 Dawiti ba hentha xam7a oykidi, shaafape ichashu mulumuqe shuchu doori ekidi, ba hentha qarxiitan yeggidi, ba yambarsha oykidi, Goolyadako shiiqis.
1SA 17:41 Gooliyadi ba gondalliya tookiya addiyara issife hemetishe Dawitako matis.
1SA 17:42 I Dawita tishshi oothi xeellidi, Dawiti aarise, mala lo77onne na7a gideysa be7idi kadhis.
1SA 17:43 I Dawitako, “Neeni xam7a oykada taako yaanaw tana kana gadii?” yaagis. Ba xoossata sunthan Dawita baaddis.
1SA 17:44 Kaallidi Dawitako, “Haaya; taani ne ashuwa salo kafotasinne sa7a do7atas immana” yaagis.
1SA 17:45 Dawiti, “Neeni mashsha, tooranne gumba oykada taako yaasa; shin taani Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa sunthan, neeni guuthida Isra7eele olanchota Xoossaa sunthan ne bolla yayis.
1SA 17:46 Hachi Goday nena ta kushen aathidi immana; taani nena shocana; ne qoodhiya muuca holana. Filisxeeme olanchota aha salo kafotasinne sa7a do7atas hachi immana. He wode Isra7eelen Xoossi de7eysa sa7an de7iya asa ubbay erana.
1SA 17:47 Goday ba asaa ashshanaw toora woyko mashshe koyonnaysa haysan shiiqida asa ubbay erana. Olay Godaaba gidiya gisho, I hintena ubbaa nu kushen aathidi immana” yaagis.
1SA 17:48 Filisxeeme addey dendidi, Dawitara olaa gahetanaw shiiqida wode Dawiti iyara gahetanaw ola demba woxidi bis.
1SA 17:49 Dawiti ba qarxiitan kushe yeddidi, issi shuchu eki yambaridi, Filisxeeme addiya som7uwan caddis. Shuchay iya som7uwa lukidi gelis; yaatin, addey ba som7uwara sa7an kundis.
1SA 17:50 Dawiti Filisxeeme addiya yambarshaninne shuchan xoonis. Dawiti ba kushen mashshi bayna Filisxeeme addiya caddidi wodhis.
1SA 17:51 Dawiti woxi bidi, iya bolla keyi eqidi, iya wodhidi, Filisxeeme addiya mashshaa shoohuwape shoddidi, iya qoodhiya muuci yeggis. Filisxeemeti banta toora qaray hayqidaysa be7ida wode baqatidosona.
1SA 17:52 Isra7eele asaynne Yihuda asay dendidi gereerishe, Filisxeemeta Gaatenne Eqroona pengeta gakanaw yedethidosona. Filisxeeme asaa ahay Gaatenne Eqroona gakanaw Sha7irayma efiya ogiya ubban kundis.
1SA 17:53 Isra7eele asay Filisxeemeta yedethi simmidi, enti dunkaanida gutaa bonqidosona.
1SA 17:54 Dawiti Filisxeeme addiya huuphiya Yerusalaame ehis; shin Filisxeeme addiya ola miishiya ba dunkaaniya giddon wothis.
1SA 17:55 Dawiti Filisxeeme addiyara oletanaw bishin, Saa7oli be7idi, tora mocona Abeneera, “Ha na7ay oodde na7ee?” yaagidi oychis. Abeneeri zaaridi, “Kawaw, tuma ne asho taani iya erike” yaagis.
1SA 17:56 Kawoy zaaridi, “Ha na7ay oodde na7eko ane oycha” yaagis.
1SA 17:57 Dawiti Filisxeeme addiya wodhidi simmida wode Abeneeri iya Saa7ola sinthe ehis. He wode Dawiti muucida Filisxeeme addiya huuphiya ba kushen oykidi utisis.
1SA 17:58 Saa7oli, “Ta na7aw, ne oodde na7ee?” yaagidi oychis. Dawiti zaaridi, “Taani Beetelemen de7iya ne oosanchuwa, Isseye na7a” yaagis.
1SA 18:1 Dawiti Saa7olara haasaya wursidaape guye, Saa7ola na7ay Yoonataani Dawitara daro mata dabbotethi medhis; Yoonataani Dawita ba shempuwada dosis.
1SA 18:2 He gallasape doomidi, Saa7oli Dawita baara wothis; ba aawa soo guye simmonna mela diggis.
1SA 18:3 Yoonataani Dawita ba huupheda dosiya gisho iyara caaqis.
1SA 18:4 Yoonataani ba ma7ida kaaba, ba ola ma7uwa, ba mashshaa, ba dongiyanne ba saqiya kessidi Dawitas immis.
1SA 18:5 Saa7oli kiitida ubbaa Dawiti naagetidi oothiya gisho, Saa7oli Dawita ba olanchota giddon halaqa oothidi shuumis. Hessi asa ubbaanne iya moorinnata ufaysis.
1SA 18:6 Dawiti Filisxeeme addiya Gooliyada wodhin, asay soo simmiya wode maccasay ufaysa yethi yexishenne durishe, karaabo baqishenne diithi diixishe, kawa Saa7ola mokanaw Isra7eele katamata ubbaafe keyidosona.
1SA 18:7 Maccasati durishe, “Saa7oli mukulata wodhis; Dawiti tammu mukulata wodhis” yaagidi yexidosona.
1SA 18:8 Saa7ola ha yethay shaatin, daro hanqetis. Saa7oli ba qofan, “Dawita, ‘Tammu mukulata wodhadasa gidi, tana mukulata wodhadasa’ gidoosona. Yaatin, kawotethaafe attishin hari aybi attidee?” yaagis.
1SA 18:9 He wodepe doomidi Saa7oli Dawita qanaate ayfen xeellees.
1SA 18:10 Wontetha gallas iita ayyaani Xoossafe kiitetidi Saa7ola oykin, Saa7oli ba son elmotees. Dawiti kaseysada diithi diixishin Saa7oli toora ba kushen oykidi uttis.
1SA 18:11 I, “Dawita godaara gathada sikana” yaagi qopidi toora xongis. Shin Dawiti nam7u toho iyape attis.
1SA 18:12 Goday Saa7ola aggidi Dawitara de7iya gisho Saa7oli Dawita yayyis.
1SA 18:13 Saa7oli Dawita ba sinthafe haassanaw koyidi mukulu olanchotas halaqa oothis. Yaatin, Dawiti ba cugaa olas kaalethis.
1SA 18:14 Goday Dawitara de7iya gisho I oothiyabay ubbay iyaw injetees.
1SA 18:15 Dawiti oothiyaba ubbay injeteysa Saa7oli be7idi iyaw daro yayyis.
1SA 18:16 Shin Dawiti enta olan kaalethiya gisho Isra7eele asaynne Yihuda asa ubbay iya dosoosona.
1SA 18:17 Saa7oli Dawitako, “Ta na7a bayriya Meraaba hannashu; taani iyo new macho immana; neeni mino asi gida; Godaa olaa oleta” yaagis. Saa7oli ba wozanan, “Taani iya bochike; Filisxeemeti iya wodho” yaagidi qopis.
1SA 18:18 Shin Dawiti, “Kawora bollotanaw taani oonee? Ta soo asay aybee? Woyko ta aawa yaray Isra7eele asaa giddon aybee?” yaagis.
1SA 18:19 Shin Saa7ola na7iya Meraaba Dawitas imetiya wodey gakin, Mahoola addiya Adri7eelas imetasu.
1SA 18:20 Gidoshin, Saa7ola na7iya Melkoola Dawita dosasu; Saa7oli hessa si7idi ufaytis.
1SA 18:21 I ba wozanan, “Iyaw xihe gidana melanne Filisxeemeti iya wodhana mela taani Milkoolo Dawitas immana” yaagidi qopis. Hessa gisho, Saa7oli Dawita, “Neeni taara bollotanaw nam7antho qaada new immas” yaagis.
1SA 18:22 Saa7oli ba oosanchota xeegidi, “ ‘Kawoy nenan ufaytis; iya aylleti ubbay nena dosoosona; ha77i neeni kawuwara bollota’ yaagidi dumma Dawitas odite” yaagidi kiittis.
1SA 18:23 Saa7oli gidaysada enti Dawitas odidosona. Shin Dawiti, “Kawora bollotanaysi hintew laafaba daaniyee? Taani manqonne eretonna asi” yaagidi zaaris.
1SA 18:24 Saa7ola moorinnati Dawiti gidaba Saa7olas odidosona.
1SA 18:25 Saa7oli ba aylletako, “Dawitas haysada yaagidi odite; ‘Kawoy ba morketa halo keyanaw xeetu Filisxeeme asata qaaratidi ehana melape attishin, neepe hara koyta koyenna’ yaagite” yaagis. Saa7oli hessa giday Dawiti Filisxeemeta kushen hayqana mela qopida gishosa.
1SA 18:26 Saa7ola aylleti Saa7oli gidaba Dawitas odidosona; kawuwara bollotanaysi Dawita ufaysis. Wodey aadhanape sinthe,
1SA 18:27 Dawitinne iya asay dendi bidi Filisxeemetape nam7u xeetu asaa wodhidosona. Dawiti kawuwara bollotanaw he asata qaarati ehidi, kawas kumethi taybidi sheedhis. Saa7oli ba na7iw Melkoolo Dawitas immis.
1SA 18:28 Saa7oli Goday Dawitara de7eysanne iya na7iya Milkoola Dawita doseysa eris.
1SA 18:29 Saa7oli Dawitas kaseysafe aathidi yayyis. Saa7oli ba de7o laytha ubban Dawitas morke gidis.
1SA 18:30 Filisxeeme olanchoti olas kessi aggibokona. Shin olas keyida wode ubban Saa7ola toora moconatape aathidi xoonoy haney Dawitasa; hessa gisho, I eretida asi gidis.
1SA 19:1 Dawita wodhana mela Saa7oli ba na7aa Yoonatanasinne ba oosanchotas odis. Shin Saa7ola na7ay Yoonataani Dawita daro dosees.
1SA 19:2 Hessa gisho, Yoonataani Dawitako, “Ta aaway Saa7oli nena wodhanaw koyiya gisho wonto wonta nena naaga; issi bessan qosetada de7aasha.
1SA 19:3 Taani ta aawara bada, neeni qosetida gadiyan eqana; taani nebaa iyaw odada, iyape si7iyaba new odana” yaagidi kiittis.
1SA 19:4 Yoonataani Dawita nashshidi, ba aawa Saa7olako haysada yaagis; “Kawoy ba aylliya Dawita qohidi nagara oothofo; I nena qohibeenna; I oothidabay nena daro go77is.
1SA 19:5 I Filisxeeme addiya wodhida wode ba shempuwas qadhetibeenna. Goday Isra7eele ubbaas gita xoono immis; hessa be7ada neka ufaytadasa. Yaatin, neeni geeshsha asi qohanaw ayis qopay? Gaasoy bayna Dawita wodhanaw ayis koyay?” yaagis.
1SA 19:6 Saa7oli Yoonataani odidaba si7idi, “De7o Xoossi eriya mela, taani Dawita wodhike” yaagidi caaqis.
1SA 19:7 Yoonataani Dawita xeegidi enti odetidaba ubbaa iyaw odis. Yaatidi Dawita Saa7olako ehin Dawiti kaseysada Saa7olara de7is.
1SA 19:8 Filisxeemetara zaaridi hara oli dendis; Dawiti keyidi Filisxeemetara oletidi, enta gita shochu shocin, enti iya sinthafe baqatidosona.
1SA 19:9 Hessafe simmin, Saa7oli toora oykidi ba son uttidashin, iita ayyaani Godaape kiitetidi iya oykis. Yaatin, Dawiti diithi diixishin,
1SA 19:10 Saa7oli Dawita godaara gathidi sikanaw toora xongis; Shin Dawiti iyape deesh gidi attin, tooray godan toketis. He qamma Dawiti kessi ekidi baqatis.
1SA 19:11 Dawita keethan naagidi wonta wodhana mela Saa7oli ase kiittis. Dawita machiya Melkoola, “Hachi qamma neeni ne shempuwa ashshona ixiko, wonto hayqaasa” yaagada Dawitas odasu.
1SA 19:12 Milkoola Dawita maskootera kessin, Dawiti kessi ekidi baqatis.
1SA 19:13 Hessafe guye, Melkoola eeqa misile ekada arsan zin7isasu; huupheson deesha ikise wothada afila mayzasu.
1SA 19:14 Dawita oykidi ehana mela Saa7oli ase kiittin Milkoola, “Dawiti saketis” yaagasu.
1SA 19:15 Dawita be7ana mela Saa7oli he asata guye kiittidi, “Taani Dawita wodhana mela iya algara tookidi eki yiite” yaagis.
1SA 19:16 Shin asati soo geliya wode eeqa misiley arsan zin7idaysanne iya huupheson deesha ikisey de7eysa demmidosona.
1SA 19:17 Saa7oli Melkoolo, “Neeni ayis haysada oothada tana cimmadii? Ta morkey kessi ekana mela ayis oothadii?” yaagis. Milkoola zaarada, “I taako, ‘Tana kessada yedda; ixiko ta nena wodhana’ yaagis” yaagasu.
1SA 19:18 Dawiti kessi ekidi Raman de7iya Sameelako bidi Saa7oli bana oothida ubbaa iyaw odis. Dawitinne Sameeli Nayoota bidi yan uttidosona.
1SA 19:19 Saa7oli Dawiti Raman de7iya Nayootan de7eysa si7is.
1SA 19:20 Dawita oykidi ehana mela ase yaa kiittis. Shin nabe cugay Sameela kaalethuwan tinbite odishin be7ida wode Saa7oli yeddida asata bolla Xoossa Ayyaanay wodhin, entika tinbite odidosona.
1SA 19:21 Saa7oli hessa si7ida wode hara asi yeddis; entika qassi tinbite odidosona. Saa7oli heedzantho ase yeddin entika tinbite odidosona.
1SA 19:22 Wursethan, Saa7oli ba huuphen Rama bidi, Seekun de7iya gita ollaa gakidi, “Sameelinne Dawiti awun de7oona?” yaagidi oychis. Enti, “Hinin Raman de7iya Nayootan de7oosona” yaagidi zaaridosona.
1SA 19:23 Hessa gisho, Saa7oli Raman de7iya Nayoota bis; qassi Xoossa Ayyaanay iya bollaka wodhin, Raman de7iya Nayoota gakanaw tinbite odishe bis.
1SA 19:24 I ba ma7uwa qaaridi, Sameela sinthan tinbite odis; gallasinne qamma kumethi kallo zin7is. Asay, “Saa7olika nabetape issuwa gidideye” geysi hessasa.
1SA 20:1 Dawiti Raman de7iya Nayootape baqatidi, Yoonatanako bidi, “Taani ay oothadina? Ta balay aybee? Ne aaway tana wodhanaw koyey taani iya ay qohinee?” yaagidi oychis.
1SA 20:2 Yoonataani, “Hessi neepe haako; neeni hayqaka. Guuthaba gidin, gitaba gidin, ta aaway taape qosidi aykoka oothenna. Ta aaway taape ayis hessa qosidee? Hessi hanenna” yaagidi zaaris.
1SA 20:3 Shin Dawiti, “Ne tana doseysa ne aaway loythi erees. I ba wozanan, Yoonataani ha oda eropo; I eriko azzanana” yaagis. Shin, “De7o Xoossi eriya mela, ne shempoy ero; taapenne hayqope giddon issi tango xalaali attis” yaagidi caaqis.
1SA 20:4 Yoonataani, “Neeni ootha gidaba aybaka taani new oothana” yaagis.
1SA 20:5 Dawiti zaaridi, “Wonto ageena xeero ba7aale bonchiya gallas; taani kawuwara kathi maanaw koshshees. Shin wonti pee7in omarsi gakanaw taani gaden qosetana.
1SA 20:6 Ne aaway tana koyiko, neeni, ‘Dawiti ba asaara laytha yarsho yarshiya wode gidiya gisho ba soo Beeteleme baanaw tana oychidi bis’ yaaga.
1SA 20:7 I, ‘Yaako lo77o’ giiko, taw ne aylliyas saro; shin I hanqetiko, I tana qohanaw ba wozanan qopidaysa hessan era.
1SA 20:8 Shin neeni taw ne aylliyas lo77oba ootha; Neeni taara ne aylliyara Godaa sinthan caaqadasa. Taani bala gidiko, tana ne wodha; ne aawas tana aathada immofa” yaagis.
1SA 20:9 Yoonataani, “Hessi neepe haako; ta aaway nena qohanaw qopidaba ta eridaako, new odikina?” yaagis.
1SA 20:10 Dawiti “Ne aaway new iita zaaro zaariko, taw odanay oonee?” yaagidi oychis.
1SA 20:11 Yoonataani, “Haaya; gade boos” yaagin, nam7ay gade bidosona.
1SA 20:12 Yoonataani Dawitako, “Goday Isra7eele Xoossay ero, taani wonti pee7in ta aaway nebaa giyaba si7ada new I qopiya qofay lo77o gidiko taani kiittada nena erisana.
1SA 20:13 Shin ta aaway nena qohanaw koyaba gidiko, hessa taani nena erisonnanne neeni saron kessa ekana mela oothonna ixiko, Goday tana pirdo; Goday ta aawara gididaysada neera gido.
1SA 20:14 Ta de7o laytha ubban ta hayqonna mela Godaa siiquwa tana bessa.
1SA 20:15 Goday Dawita morketa ubbaa biittafe dhaysiya wodeka ne siiquwa ta soo asaas bessa” yaagis.
1SA 20:16 Hessa gisho, Yoonataani, “Goday Dawita morketa pirdo” yaagidi Dawita soo asaara caaqis.
1SA 20:17 Yoonataani Dawita ba huupheda dosiya gisho, “Neeni tana tuma doseysa qoncisanaw taw ane nam7antho caaqa” yaagis.
1SA 20:18 Hessafe guye, Yoonataani, “Wonto ageena xeero ba7aale bonchiya gallas; neeni uttiya bessay mela attiko ne baynaysi eretana.
1SA 20:19 Wonti pee7in omarsi bada, ha metoy doomida gallas neeni qosetida bessan, Exela zaallafe guyera qosetta.
1SA 20:20 Taani issiba bolla xongiya asada hanada heedzu donge toorata he zaalla miye yeddana.
1SA 20:21 Hessafe guye, ‘Bada donge toorata koya’ yaagada issi na7a kiittana. Taani iyako, ‘Donge toorati neepe ha baggara de7oosona; haa ekada ya’ giyaba gidiko, haaya; de7o Goday eriya mela, new sa7i saro; nena aykoyka bochenna.
1SA 20:22 Shin taani na7aako, ‘Donge toorati neepe hini baggara de7oosona’ giyaba gidiko, neeni aggada ba; Goday ne baana mela koyiya gisho ba.
1SA 20:23 Neera taara odetida odaas Goday nu giddon merinaw marka” yaagis.
1SA 20:24 Hessa gisho, Dawiti gaden qosetis. Ageena xeero ba7aale bonchiya gallas gakida wode kawoy Saa7oli gibira bolla uttis.
1SA 20:25 Kawoy ba uttiya bessan godaa matan uttis; Yoonataani iyape sintha baggan, Abeneeri Saa7ola matan uttis; shin Dawita bessay mela de7ees.
1SA 20:26 Saa7oli he gallas aykoka gibeenna. Saa7oli ba wozanan, “Dawiti wogaada geeyonna mela issibay iya gakis; I geeybeenna” yaagidi qopis.
1SA 20:27 Shin wontetha gallas, ageenay xeerin nam7antho gallas Dawita bessay mela de7ees. Saa7oli ba na7aa Yoonataana xeegidi, “Isseye na7ay zineka hachika gibira maanaw ayis yibennee?” yaagidi oychis.
1SA 20:28 Yoonataani, “Dawiti Beeteleme baana gidi tana minthidi oychis.
1SA 20:29 I taako, ‘Nu soo asay kataman yarsho yarshiya gishonne ta yan bentana mela ta ishay tana kiitida gisho tana yeddarki. Ta ne sinthan saba demmidaba gidiko taani ta ishata be7ana mela tana yedda’ yaagidi oychis. Kawa gibiraape maanaw I yoonnay hessa gishosa” yaagidi zaaris.
1SA 20:30 Saa7oli Yoonataana bolla shene eexi keyidi, “La, geellanne makallancho maccase na7aw, neeni new kawushe, ne aayes yeella ehanaw Isseye na7aara laggeteysa ta erikinayee?
1SA 20:31 Isseye na7ay ha sa7a bolla de7ida peeshan ne woyko ne kawotethay eqenna. Ha77i kiittada elle ehisa; I hayqanaw bessees” yaagis.
1SA 20:32 Yoonataani ba aawa, “I ayis hayqii? I ay iitabaa oothidee?” yaagidi oychis.
1SA 20:33 Saa7oli Yoonataana wodhanaw toora iya bolla xongis. Hessa gisho, Yoonataani ba aawa Saa7oli, Dawita wodhanaw qopidaysa geeshshidi eris.
1SA 20:34 Yoonataani shenetidi gibira bollafe dendis; ba aaway, Dawita kawushida gisho Yoonataani azzanidi, ageena xeero ba7aale bonchiya nam7antho gallas kathi mibeenna.
1SA 20:35 Yoonataani baara issi na7a ekidi wonta guura Dawitara gahetanaw gade bis.
1SA 20:36 Yoonataani, “Taani dukiya donge toorata woxa bada ekada ya” yaagis. Na7ay woxiya wode issi donge toora hefinthi dukis.
1SA 20:37 Na7ay Yoonataana donge tooray wodhida bessaa gakiya wode Yoonataani na7aa xeegidi, “Donge tooray neepe hini baggara de7ennee?”
1SA 20:38 Yoonataani na7aa, “Ellesa; ba; eqofa” yaagidi ba qaala dhoqu oothidi odis. Na7ay donge toora maxidi ba godaas ehis.
1SA 20:39 Yoonatanapenne Dawitape attishin, na7ay he xuura erenna.
1SA 20:40 Yoonataani ba ola miishiya na7aas immidi, “Haysa katama ekada ba” yaagis.
1SA 20:41 Na7ay bidaape guye, Dawiti he zaalla guyepe keyidi Yoonataana sinthan gulbatidi, ba som7uwa sa7a gathidi heedzu toho ziggis. Hessafe guye, issoy issuwara yeeretidi yeekidosona, shin Dawiti Yoonatanape aadho yeekis.
1SA 20:42 Yoonataani, “Saro ba; ‘Ne giddoninne ta giddon, ne kochaa giddoninne ta kochaa giddon, Goday merinaw marka gido’ yaagidi nu nam7ay Godaa sunthan caaqida” yaagis. Hessafe guye, Dawiti dendidi bis; Yoonatanika katamaa guye simmis.
1SA 21:1 Dawiti kahiniya Abimelekeko Nooba bis. Abimelekey Dawitara gahetanaw kokorishe yidi, “Neeni nerka waanada yadii? Neera asi waanidi baawee?” yaagidi oychis.
1SA 21:2 Dawiti kahiniya Abimeleke, “Kawoy taako, ‘Taani nena kiitida kiitaanne ta new odidaba oonika eropo’ yaagidi tana kiittis. Ta asati issi bessan taara gahetana mela oda wothas.
1SA 21:3 Ha77i ne kushen aybi de7ii? Ichashu uythi woyko new de7iyaba taw imma” yaagis.
1SA 21:4 Kahiney zaaridi, “Coo asi miya uythi taw baawa; shin ne asati bantana maccasape naagidaba gidiko, enti maanaw danda7iya geeshsha uythi de7ees” yaagis.
1SA 21:5 Dawiti zaaridi, “Tuma nuuni ha kiita ekidi keydaape doomidi, maccasape naagetida; hari attoshin hara kiittaka ekidi keyiya wode enti banta geeshshatetha naagoosona. Shin hachi waanidi geeyanaw koshshennee?” yaagis.
1SA 21:6 Hessa gisho, kahiney Dawitas geeshsha uythaa immis. Kahiniyas de7iya uythay, Godaa sinthan wothanaw he gallas ho77o uythara laametida uythaafe attishin, hari baawa.
1SA 21:7 Saa7ola aylletape issoy, iya mehiya heemmeyisata halaqay, Doyqa geetetiya Edoome addey, he gallas Godaa sinthan naagishe de7ees.
1SA 21:8 Dawiti Abimelekeko, “Toori woyko mashshi new dandeesha? Kawa kiitay eesoya gisho taani ta mashshaa woyko hara ola miishe ehabike” yaagidi oychis.
1SA 21:9 Abimelekey, “Neeni Ela Zangaaran wodhida Filisxeeme addiya Gooliyada mashshay haysan de7ees; curqara xaaxetidi, efuude ma7uwape guye baggara de7ees. Neeni koyaba gidiko iya eka; iyape attishin, hara mashshi haysan baawa” yaagis. Dawiti, “Iya mela mashshi baawa; iya taw hamma” yaagis.
1SA 21:10 He gallas Dawiti Saa7olape baqatidi, Gaate kawa Ankusako bis.
1SA 21:11 Shin Ankusa moorinnati, “Haysi Dawiti ba biittan kawo gidennee? Maccasay yexishenne durishe, ‘Saa7oli mukulu wodhis; Dawiti tammu mukulu wodhis’ yaagidi sabbida addiya gidennee?” yaagidosona.
1SA 21:12 Dawiti enta haasaya ba wozanan si7idi, Gaate kawa Ankusa daro yayyis.
1SA 21:13 Hessa gisho, Dawiti enta sinthan gooshshu daanis. Enti iya oykana haniya wode gooshshada penge ibitha qaacethi oykis; buuchaara saasso qolis.
1SA 21:14 Ankusi ba oosanchotako, “Heko, ha addey gooyees; hinte ayis iya taako ehidetii?
1SA 21:15 Ha addey ta sinthan gooyanaada hinte ehiday, ta matan hari gooyey dhayineyee? Ha addey ta soo gelanaw bessii?” yaagis.
1SA 22:1 Dawiti Gaatepe baqatidi, Adulaama matan de7iya gongoluwa bis. Iya ishatinne iya aawa soo asa ubbay hessa si7ida wode yaa iyako bidosona.
1SA 22:2 Metootiday, acotidaynne sa7i iitida ubbay Dawitako shiiqin, enta tayboy oyddu xeetu gidis; I enta halaqa gidis.
1SA 22:3 Dawiti yaape dendidi Moo7aben de7iya Mixipha bidi Moo7abe kawa, “Xoossay taw oothanaba ta erana gakanaw ta aawanne aayiw ne matan wotharki” yaagidi woossis.
1SA 22:4 Dawiti enta Moo7abe kawa matan wothis; Dawiti qosetida bessan de7iya wode ubban enti kawa matan de7idosona.
1SA 22:5 Hessafe guye, nabey Gaadi Dawitako yidi, “Qosetida bessan gam7ofa; haysafe dendada Yihuda biitta ba” yaagis; Dawiti yaape keyidi Hereta wora bis.
1SA 22:6 Dawitinne iya asay bentidaysa Saa7oli si7is. Saa7oli Gib7a matan de7iya dere bolla, tamarsike mitha garsan toora oykidi uttis; iya moorinnati iya yuushuwan eqidosona.
1SA 22:7 Saa7oli entako, “Hinteno, Biniyaame asaw, si7ite; Isseye na7ay gadenne woyne tokiya bessi hinte ubbaas immanee? Shaalaqatanne mato halaqata oothidi hintena shuumanee?
1SA 22:8 Hinte ubbay ta bolla maqetideta; ta na7ay Isseye na7aara caaqidaba taw oonika odibeenna. Hintefe issi asika taw qadhetenna; hachi hanidaysada ta na7ay ta aylliyan tana wodhisanaw denthethidaysa taw oonika odibeenna” yaagis.
1SA 22:9 Saa7ola moorinnatara eqida Edoome addey Doyqi, “Isseye na7ay Akxuuba na7aa Abimelekeko Nooba bidaysa taani be7as.
1SA 22:10 Dawiti ay oothaneko Abimelekey Godaa oychis; yaatidi Dawitas shinqenne Filisxeeme addiya Gooliyada mashshaa iyaw immis” yaagidi Saa7olas odis.
1SA 22:11 Hessafe guye, Akxuuba na7aa kahiniya Abimelekenne Nooban kahine gididi de7iya iya aawa soo asa ubbaa kawoy xeegisin, enti kawako yidosona.
1SA 22:12 Saa7oli, “Akxuuba na7aw, si7a” yaagis. Abimelekey, “Ero ta godaw” yaagis.
1SA 22:13 Saa7oli, “Neera Isseye na7aara ta bolla ayis maqetidetii? Neeni iyaw uythinne mashshe immada, I tana wodhanaw dendana mela iya gisho Xoossaa ayis oychadii?” yaagis.
1SA 22:14 Abimelekey, “Ne oosanchota ubbaa giddon Dawita mela ammanetey, kawa bolloy, nena naageysata kiitteynne ne soo asaa giddon daro bonchetey iya meli oonee?
1SA 22:15 Taani iya gisho Xoossaa oychishin, haysi taw koyro? Gidenna, kawaw, tana ne aylliya woyko ta aawa soo asa ubbaa aykoka mootopa. Taani ne aylley ha odabaa guutha gidin woyko gita gidin erike” yaagis.
1SA 22:16 Kawoy, “Abimeleke, nenne ne aawa soo asa ubbay hayqana” yaagis.
1SA 22:17 Saa7oli ba matan eqidi naageysata, “Godaa kahineta wodhite; enti Dawita maaddidosona. Dawiti baqatidaysa erishe taw odibookona” yaagis. Shin kawa naageysati Godaa kahineta bolla banta kushiya denthonna ixidosona.
1SA 22:18 Kawoy Doyqa, “Enta ne wodha” yaagidi kiittis. Edoome addey Doyqi kahineta shocidi, he gallas efuude ma7ida hospun tammanne ichashu kahineta wodhis.
1SA 22:19 Qassi Doyqi kahineta katamaa, Nooba mashshan wursis; he kataman de7iya addenne macca, naytanne yooga nayta, meheta, haretanne dorsata mashshan wodhis.
1SA 22:20 Shin Akxuuba na7aa Abimeleke naytape Abyataara geetetiya issi na7ay kessi ekidi, Dawitako baqatis.
1SA 22:21 I, Saa7oli Godaa kahineta wodhidaysa Dawitas odis.
1SA 22:22 Dawiti Abyataara, “Edoome addey Doyqi he bessan de7eysa taani be7ida wode I Saa7olas odanaysa he gallas eras. Ne aawa soo asa ubbaa hayqos gathiday tana.
1SA 22:23 Hiza neeni taara de7a; yayyofa. Nena wodhanaw koyiya uray tana wodhanaw koyees; neeni ta matan saro daana” yaagis.
1SA 23:1 Filisxeemeti Qa7ila olidi, wudumman de7iya kathaa bonqidaysa Dawiti si7is.
1SA 23:2 Dawiti, “Taani bada Filisxeemeta olo?” yaagidi Godaa oychis. Goday, “Ba; Filisxeemeta ola; Qa7ila ashsha” yaagis.
1SA 23:3 Shin Dawita kaalleysati, “Nuuni haysan Yihuda biittan de7ishe daroban yayyoos. Filisxeemetara oletanaw Qa7ila nu biiko nuna ubbaa sa7i metana” yaagidosona.
1SA 23:4 Dawiti zaaridi Godaa oychin Goday, “Filisxeemeta taani new aatha immana; dendada Qa7ila ba” yaagis.
1SA 23:5 Dawitinne iya kaalleysati Qa7ila bidi, Filisxeemetara oletidi enta mehiya di77idosona. Entafe daro asaa wodhidi, Dawiti Qa7ila asaa ashshis.
1SA 23:6 Abimeleke na7ay Abyataari Dawitako Qa7ila baqatida wode efuude ma7uwa ekidi bis.
1SA 23:7 Dawiti Qa7ila bidaysa Saa7oli si7idi, “Xoossay Dawita ta kushen aathidi immis; Dawiti gimben diretida katama gelidi bana baw qachis” yaagis.
1SA 23:8 Qa7ila bidi, Dawitanne iya asaa teqana mela Saa7oli ba olanchota ubbaa xeegis.
1SA 23:9 Saa7oli ba bolla iitaba oothanaw maqidaysa Dawiti eridi kahiniya Abyataarako, “Efuudiya haa eka ya” yaagis.
1SA 23:10 Dawiti, “Abeeti Godaw, Isra7eele Xoossaw, ta gaason Saa7oli Qa7ila dhaysanaw maqidaysa taani ne aylley si7as.
1SA 23:11 Qa7ila asay tana Saa7olas aathidi immanesha? Taani ne aylley si7idaysada Saa7oli tumaka haa yaaneshsha? Abeeti Godaw, Isra7eele Xoossaw, taw ne aylliyas oda” yaagis. Goday Dawitako, “Ee; Saa7oli yaana” yaagidi zaaris.
1SA 23:12 Dawiti, “Qa7ila asay tananne ta asaa Saa7olas aathidi immanesha?” yaagidi zaaridi Godaa oychis. Goday, “Ee; enti hintena aathidi immana” yaagis.
1SA 23:13 Dawitinne usupun xeetu gidiya addeti Qa7ilape keyidi, issi bessafe hara bessi yuuyidosona. Dawiti Qa7ilape baqatidaysa Saa7oli si7ida wode baanaw qopidaysa aggaagis.
1SA 23:14 Dawiti bazzo miixataninne Ziifa mela biittan de7iya zumata bolla de7is. Saa7oli iya demmanaw ubba gallas koyees, shin Xoossay iya Saa7ola kushen aathidi immibeenna.
1SA 23:15 Dawiti Ziifa mela biittan de7iya Horesan de7ishin, Saa7oli iya wodhanaw keydaysa Dawiti eris.
1SA 23:16 Saa7ola na7aa Yoonataani dendidi, Dawitako Horesa bidi Dawiti Godaa wolqan minnanaada zoridi,
1SA 23:17 “Yayyofa; ta aawa Saa7oli nena kusheraka bochenna; neeni Isra7eele bolla kawotana; taanika neepe garsara haarana; ta aaway Saa7oli hessa loythidi erees” yaagis.
1SA 23:18 Enti nam7ay Godaa sinthan issoy issuwara caaqidosona; Dawiti Horesan gam7in Yoonataani ba soo bis.
1SA 23:19 Ziifa asay Saa7olako Gib7a bidi, “Dawiti Yasmoonape dugeha baggan, Hakila zuma bolla Horesa miixatan nu matan qosetidi de7ees.
1SA 23:20 Kawaw, ha77ika ne dosida wode duge wodha; nuuni iya ne kushen aathidi immana” yaagidosona.
1SA 23:21 Saa7oli, “Hinte taw qopida gisho hintena Goday anjo.
1SA 23:22 Bidi ane gujidika geeshshite; Dawiti daro toho awu biyakoka ooni iya be7idaako, shaakidi erite; I gene asi gideysa ta si7as.
1SA 23:23 Dawiti qosetiya bessata ubbaa be7idi, muruuta oda ekidi taako simmidi yiite. Hessafe guye, taani hintera baana; I he heeran de7iko, taani iya Yihuda biitta ubban demmana gakanaw koyana” yaagis.
1SA 23:24 Hessa gisho, enti Saa7olape sinthatidi Ziifa bidosona. He wode Dawitinne iya asay Yasmoonape dugeha baggara de7iya Ma7oona mela biittan Araba gadhan de7oosona.
1SA 23:25 Saa7olinne iya asay Dawita koyanaw bidosona. Dawita hessa si7ida wode zaallako wodhidi, Ma7oona bazzuwan uttis. Saa7oli hessa si7ida wode Ma7oona bazzuwan Dawita koyishe bis.
1SA 23:26 Saa7oli zumaape issi bagga miyiyara bees; Dawitinne iya asay hanko bagga miyiyara boosona. Enti Saa7olape baqatanaw eesotoosona; Saa7olinne iya asati, Dawitanne iya asata oykanaw mati uttidosona.
1SA 23:27 Shin, “Ellesada haaya; Filisxeemeti nu biitta olanaw yidosona” giya hara kiiti Saa7ola gakis.
1SA 23:28 Saa7oli Dawita koyeysa aggidi, Filisxeemetara oletanaw bis. Hessa gisho, he bessay “Kessi ekidi attiya zaalla” geetetis.
1SA 23:29 Dawiti he bessaafe keyidi, Engaada matan de7iya miixatan uttis.
1SA 24:1 Saa7oli Filisxeemeta olidi simmidaape guye, Dawiti Engaada bazzuwan de7ees geysa si7is.
1SA 24:2 Saa7oli Isra7eele giddofe dooretida heedzu mukulu asaa ekidi, Dawitanne iya asaa koyanaw, “Bazzo Deeshata Zaalla” geetetiya bessaa mata bis.
1SA 24:3 Saa7oli ogiya doonan dorsa girbiya matan de7iya gongoluwa giddo gelidi shee7anaw uttis. Dawitinne iya asay gongoluwas guye baggara shiiqidi uttidosona.
1SA 24:4 Dawita asay, “ ‘Heko, taani ne morkiya ne kushen aatha immana; neeni iya bolla koydaba oothana’ yaagidi Goday new odida gallasay hachi” yaagidosona. Dawiti Saa7ola erisonna shiiqidi Saa7ola ma7uwa macaraape qanxi ekis.
1SA 24:5 Dawiti Saa7ola ma7uwa macaraa qanxida gisho iya wozanay qiirotis.
1SA 24:6 Dawiti ba asaako, “Goday tiyida kawa, ta godaa bolla taani hessa oothanaysi woyko iya bolla ta kushiya denthanaysi taape haako; Goday tiyidi iya kawothis” yaagis.
1SA 24:7 Dawiti haysada gidi, Saa7ola ba asan boshisonna diggis. Saa7oli gongoluwa giddofe keyidi ba ogiya bis.
1SA 24:8 Saa7oli bidaape guye, Dawiti gongoluwa giddofe keyidi, “Ta godaw, kawaw” yaagidi Saa7ola xeegin, Saa7oli guye simmidi xeellis. Dawiti sa7an gufannidi Saa7olas ziggis.
1SA 24:9 Dawiti Saa7olako, “Dawiti nena qohanaw koyees” giya asaa neeni ayis si7ay?
1SA 24:10 Hachi ha gongoluwan Goday nena taw aathidi immidaysa neeni ne ayfen be7adasa. Taani nena wodhana mela guutha asati tana denthethidosona. Shin, “I, Goday tiyidi kawothidaysa gidiya gisho taani ta godaa bolla ta kushiya denthike” yaagada nena aggas.
1SA 24:11 Ta aawaw, ta kushen de7iya ne ma7uwa maccara haysa xeella. Ne ma7uwa macaraape qanxa ekas, shin nena wodhabike. Taani nena qohonnaysanne ne bolla makallonnaysa akeeka; taani nena qohabike, shin neeni tana wodhanaw shankataasa.
1SA 24:12 Nebaanne tabaa Goday pirdo; Goday neeni tana qohidaysa haluwa kesso, shin taani ne bolla ta kushiya denthike.
1SA 24:13 “Iita ootheysatape iiti keyees” giya beni leemisoy de7ees. Hessa gisho, taani nena kushenka bochike.
1SA 24:14 “Isra7eele kawoy oodde bolla dendii? Oona oykanaw kaallii? Hayqida kana woyko kastolle goodiyee?
1SA 24:15 Goday nu bolla daannato; nebaanne tabaa I pirdo; ta gisho I mooteto; ne kushepe tana I asho” yaagis.
1SA 24:16 Dawiti haasaya wursida wode Saa7oli Dawitako, “Ta na7a Dawita, hessi ne qaalee?” yaagidi Saa7oli ba qaala dhoqu oothidi yeekis.
1SA 24:17 “Neeni taape aadhida xillo; taani new iitabaa oothin, neeni taw lo77oba oothadasa.
1SA 24:18 Goday tana hachi new aathidi immin neeni tana wodhaboonna gisho neeni taw lo77oba oothada bessadasa.
1SA 24:19 Asi ba morke demmidi qohonna yeddiyee? Neeni taw hachi oothida keehatetha gisho, Goday nena anjo.
1SA 24:20 Neeni Isra7eele kawo gidanaysanne Isra7eele kawotethay ne maata garsan eqanaysa ta erayis.
1SA 24:21 Hiza ta kochaa dhaysona melanne ta sunthaa ta aawa soo asaa giddofe quchonna mela Godaa sunthan taw caaqa” yaagis.
1SA 24:22 Dawiti Saa7olas caaqis. Hessafe guye, Saa7oli ba soo simmidi bis; Dawitinne iya asay banta miixaa bidosona.
1SA 25:1 Sameeli hayqin, Isra7eele asa ubbay shiiqidi, iyaw yeekidosona; Rama kataman iya moogidosona. Hessafe guye, Dawiti Ma7oona mela biitta bis.
1SA 25:2 Ma7oona mela biittan, Qarmeloosan shaloy de7iya issi dure addey de7ees. Iyaw issi mukulu deeshatinne heedzu mukulu dorsati de7oosona. I enta ikisiya Qarmeloosan meedees.
1SA 25:3 He addiya sunthay Naabala, I Kaaleba yara; iya mache sunthay Abigiya. Iya akeekanchonne mala lo77o maccas, shin I azinay wozani bayna iita asi.
1SA 25:4 Dawiti mela biittan de7ishe, Naabali dorsaa ikise meedeysa si7is.
1SA 25:5 Dawiti tammu panthata haysada yaagidi kiittis; “Naabalako Qarmeloosa bidi, ta sunthan iya sarothite.
1SA 25:6 ‘Ne barey aduqo! Saroy newunne ne soo asaas gido; new de7iya ubbaas saroy gido!
1SA 25:7 Ne dorsa ikise meedeysa taani si7as; ne dorsaa heemmeysati nuura de7ida wode nuuni enta genibooko; enti Qarmeloosan de7ida wode ubban entabaape aybika pacibeenna.
1SA 25:8 Hessa neeni ne aylleta oychiko enti new odana. Nuuni hachi gibira gallas neeko yida gisho, ta panthatas hayyana keeha. Ne kushen de7iyabaape ne aylletasinne ne na7aa Dawitas hayyana imma’ yaagite” yaagidi kiittis.
1SA 25:9 Dawita asati Naabalako gakidi, Dawita sunthaanne kiitaa iyaw odidi, I gaanaba naagishe yan uttidosona.
1SA 25:10 Naabali, “Dawiti oonee? Isseye na7ay oonee? Ha wodiyan daro aylleti banta godatape baqatoosona.
1SA 25:11 Ta kathaa, ta haathaanne ta dorsaata meedeysatas shuketida ashuwa ekada, guuyeyi eretonna asas ayis immo?” yaagis.
1SA 25:12 Dawita asati simmi guye bidi Naabali gidaba ubbaa Dawitas odidosona.
1SA 25:13 Dawiti, “Hinte mashshaa dancite” yaagin, ubbay banta mashshaa dancidosona; Dawitika ba mashshaa dancis. Dawiti oyddu xeetu gidiya asatara dendidi bis; nam7u xeetu asay entaba naagidi attis.
1SA 25:14 Naabala aylletape issoy Naabala mache Abigiyako haysada yaagis; “Dawiti mela biittan de7ishe nu godaa saro gaanaw ase kiittis, shin I enta cayidi yeddis.
1SA 25:15 Gidoshin, ha asati nuus daro lo77o; enti nuna genibookona; nuuni entara bazzon pee7ida wode ubban nubaape aykoyka pacibeenna.
1SA 25:16 Nuuni nu dorsa wudiya enta matan heemmiya wode, qammanne gallas enti nuus dirsi gididosona.
1SA 25:17 Nu godaa bollanne iya soo asaa bolla iitabay gakana haniya gisho, hayyana ha odaa waataneko qopa. Nu goday asa zore si7onna iita asi gidiya gisho, oonika iya haasayisanaw danda7enna” yaagis.
1SA 25:18 Abigiya eeson nam7u xeetu uythu, nam7u ogoro woyne ushshu, ichashu caacetida dorsata, ishatamu kilo giraame caacetida tiya, issi xeetu uuketida woyne mor7enne nam7u xeetu balase nuka ekada hareta bolla caanasu.
1SA 25:19 Ba aylletako, “Hinte sinthatidi biite; ta hintena kaallana” yaagasu; shin ba azinaa Naabalas aykoka odabuuku.
1SA 25:20 Ba hariya toggada zumaa loobuwa duge wodhiya wode Dawitinne iya asay yishe iira gahetidosona.
1SA 25:21 Dawiti, “Iyabape aykoyka paconna mela taani ha addiya shaluwa naagiday coo mela; taani oothida lo77o oosuwas I taw iita kushe zaaris.
1SA 25:22 Wonto wonta gakanaw, iyabaa gidida addetape issuwa ta paxa aggiko, Xoossi tana pirdo” yaagis.
1SA 25:23 Abigiya Dawita be7ida wode hariyape eesota wodhada, Dawita sinthan gufannada ziggasu.
1SA 25:24 Iya tohuwa bolla kundada, “Ta godaw, ta balay ta bolla gido! Ta issiba odana; ta ne aylliya giyaba si7a.
1SA 25:25 Ha wozani bayna addey, Naabali giyaba si7opa; I ba sunthada eeya. Ta godaw, ne kiitida asata ta ne aylliya be7abike.
1SA 25:26 De7o Goday eriya mela, ne shempoy erin, ne suuthu gussonnaadanne halo keyonnaada nena teqiday Godaa. Ne morketinne nena qohanaw koyeysati Naabalada hano.
1SA 25:27 Ha imotay taani ne aylliya new, ta godaas ehidaysi nena kaalliya asatas imeto.
1SA 25:28 Ta godaw, ne aylle nagaraa atto yaaga! Neeni Godaa olaa oletiya gisho, Goday nenanne ne sheesha kawoyana. Ne de7o laytha ubban iitatethi ne bolla bentofo.
1SA 25:29 Ay asika nena wodhanaw koyiko, issi asi ba al7o shaluwa naageysada Goday, ne Xoossay nena saro naagana. Shin yambarshan shuchu holeysada I ne morketa holana.
1SA 25:30 Goday, ta godaas oothanaw qaala gelida keehatetha ubbaa oothiya wodenne Isra7eele bolla kawothiya wode,
1SA 25:31 ta goday azzaniya gaasoy woyko qiiroyabay baawa. Gaasoy bayna suuthu gussidabay woyko halo keydabay bayna gisho ne wozanay dagammenna. Goday new lo77oba oothida wode tana ne aylliw dogopa” yaagasu.
1SA 25:32 Dawiti Abigiyako, “Taara gahetana mela hachi nena kiitida Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay galatetto.
1SA 25:33 Taani asa suuthu gussonnaadanne halo keyonnaada ne lo77o qofay tana teqida gisho neeni anjeta.
1SA 25:34 Ta nena qohonnaada teqida de7o Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay eriya mela ne taara gahetanaw ellesada yoonnaako, sa7i wontana gakanaw Naabala asaape issi addeyka paxa attenna” yaagis.
1SA 25:35 Abigiya iyaw ehida imota I kushepe Dawiti ekidi, “Ne soo saro ba; taani ne gidaba si7as; ne oyshaaka ekas” yaagis.
1SA 25:36 Abigiya simmada Naabalako yaa wode, kawo son giigiya gibira mela gibira muzishe son uttis. Naabali daro mathotidi, ba wozanan ufaytiya gisho sa7i wontana gakanaw Abigiya iyaw aykoka odabuuku.
1SA 25:37 Wonta Naabala mathoy simmidaape guye, iya machiya hanidaba ubbaa iyaw odasu; Naabala wozanay wodhin, I daaburis.
1SA 25:38 Tammu gallasape guye Goday Naabala shocin, I hayqis.
1SA 25:39 Naabali hayqidaysa Dawiti si7ida wode, “Goday galatetto! Naabali tana cayidaysa halo Goday kessis. Taani iya aylley iitaba oothonna mela tana teqis. Naabali oothida iitabaa Goday iya bolla zaaris” yaagis. Hessafe guye, Dawiti Abigiya ekanaw koyidi kiita yeddis.
1SA 25:40 Dawita aylleti Qarmeloosan de7iya Abigiyako bidi, “Dawiti nena machanaw dosida gisho nuuni nena ekanaw yida” yaagidosona.
1SA 25:41 Abigiya gufanna ziggada, “Taani ne aylliya new kiitetanawunne ne aylleta tohuwa meeccanaw giigeta uttas” yaagasu.
1SA 25:42 Abigiya ellesa dendada ba hariya toggasu, iya ba ichashu macca aylletaranne Dawita kitida asara bada Dawita gelasu.
1SA 25:43 Dawiti kase Izira7eele maccasiw Aknahoomo ekidi de7ees; enti nam7ay iya macheta.
1SA 25:44 Saa7oli Dawita machiw, ba na7iw Melkoolo Galima addiya Leesa na7aa Falxas immis.
1SA 26:1 Ziifa asay Saa7olako Gib7a bidi, “Dawiti Yasmoona sinthan de7iya Hakila zuman qosetis?” yaagidosona.
1SA 26:2 Saa7oli, Isra7eeletape dooretida heedzu mukulu asi ekidi, Dawita koyanaw Ziifa mela biitta bis.
1SA 26:3 Saa7oli Yasmoona sinthan de7iya Hakila zumaa bolla de7iya ogiya matan dunkaanis; shin Dawiti he mela biittan uttis. Saa7oli iya kaallidi yidaysa Dawiti erida wode,
1SA 26:4 wochiya asi yeddidi, Saa7oli tuma he bessaa gakidaysa shaakidi eris.
1SA 26:5 Dawiti dendidi, Saa7oli dunkaanida bessaa bidi Saa7olinne toora moconay Neera na7ay Abeneeri zin7ida bessa be7is. Saa7oli dunkaanida gutan olanchoti iya yuushuwa teqin I dhiskis.
1SA 26:6 Dawiti Hite addiya Abimelekenne Xaruya na7aa Iyo7aaba ishaa Abisaya, “Saa7oli dunkaanida bessaa taara baanay oonee?” yaagidi oychis. Abisayi, “Taani neera baana” yaagis.
1SA 26:7 Hessa gisho, Dawitinne Abisayi he qamma olanchotako yaa wode Saa7oli ba huuphe son toora essidi, dunkaaniya giddon zin7idaysa demmidosona. Abeneerinne olanchoti iya yuushuwan zin7idosona.
1SA 26:8 Abisayi, “Xoossay ne morkiya hachi ne kushen aathidi immis; taani tooran iya issi toho sa7ara oythada caddana; iya zaara caddanaw koshshenna” yaagis.
1SA 26:9 Shin Dawiti Abisayako, “Neeni iya wodhopa; Goday tiyida kawa bolla ba kushiya denthiya oonaka Goday seerana.
1SA 26:10 De7o Goday eriya mela, Xoossay iya wodhana; I ba gallasan woyko olan hayqana.
1SA 26:11 Goday tiyida kawa bolla ta kushiya denthonaada tana Goday teqo. Ane iya huuphe son de7iya tooranne haatha oykiya miishiya ekidi boos” yaagis.
1SA 26:12 Dawiti Saa7ola huuphe son de7iya tooranne haathe oykiya miishiya ekin, enti bidosona. Enta oonika be7ibeenna woyko oonika eribeenna woyko oonika barkibeenna. Goday enta bolla wolqaama dhisko yeddida gisho ubbay dhisko hayqi aggidosona.
1SA 26:13 Dawiti hefinthi pinnidi, entafe haakidi hara dere bolla keyidi eqis.
1SA 26:14 Dawiti Saa7ola olanchotanne Neera na7aa Abeneera xeegidi, “Abeneera, taani xeegiya wode si7ikii?” yaagidi waassis. Abeneeri, “Qaala dhoqu oothi xeegidi kawa dhisko diggey oonee?” yaagis.
1SA 26:15 Dawiti, “Neeni wozanaama asi gidikii? Isra7eele giddon ne mela asi oonee? Yaatin, kawa, ne godaa ayis naagikii? Issi asi kawa, ne godaa wodhanaw bis.
1SA 26:16 Ne oothidabay lo77o gidenna. De7o Goday eriya mela, nenne ne olanchoti Xoossay tiyida hinte godaa naagiboonna gisho hinte hayqanaw bessees. Kawa tooraynne iya huuphe son de7iya haathe oykiya miishey awun de7iyako be7a” yaagis.
1SA 26:17 Dawita qaala gideysa Saa7oli eridi, “Ta na7aw Dawita, hessi ne qaalee?” yaagis. Dawiti, “Ee, ta godaw, kawaw, hessi ta qaala.
1SA 26:18 Ta godaw, tana ne aylliya neeni ayis kaallay? Taani ay oothadina? Ta balay aybee?
1SA 26:19 Ta godaw, kawaw, neeni ne aylliya qaala si7ana mela ta nena woossayis. Goday nena ta bolla denthidaba gidiko, I yarsho eko. Shin asi nena denthidaba gidiko, ‘Bada hara xoossata goyinna’ yaagidosona. Godaa biittan taw de7iya laatape enti tana gooddida gisho enti Godaa sinthan baadetidaba gido!
1SA 26:20 Ha77i Godaa sinthafe haakidi, allaga biittan de7iya uraa suuthaa gussofa. Issi asi kuraacho shankatanaw dere bolla keyeysada, Isra7eele kawoy kastolle koyanaw keyis” yaagis.
1SA 26:21 Saa7oli, “Taani nena qohas. Ta na7aw, Dawita, haa simma! Hachi ne ta shempiw hayqope ashshida gisho taani nena zaarada genike. Tuma taani eeyaba hanas; gita bala balas” yaagis.
1SA 26:22 Dawiti zaaridi, “Kawaw, ne tooray haysish, ne asaape issi asi yidi eko.
1SA 26:23 Issi issi asas iya xillotethaa melanne iya ammanetetha mela Goday gate qanxees. Hachi Goday nena ta kushen aathidi immis; shin Goday tiyida kawa bolla taani ta kushiya wothanaw koyabike.
1SA 26:24 Hachi ne shempuwa ta ashshidaysada Goday tana meto ubbaafe ashshidi boncho” yaagis.
1SA 26:25 Saa7oli, “Ta na7aw, Dawita, neeni anjeta. Neeni gitaba oothana; new injetana” yaagis. Dawiti ba ogiya bis; Saa7olika ba soo simmis.
1SA 27:1 Dawiti ba wozanan, “Issi gallas taani Saa7ola kushen daafatana; taani Filisxeeme biitta baqatanaape attishin, harabay taw lo77enna. Yaaniko, Saa7oli Isra7eele biitta ubban tana koyeysa aggana; taani iya kushepe kessa ekana” yaagidi qopis.
1SA 27:2 Hessa gisho, Dawitinne iyara de7iya usupun xeetu asati dendidi, Gaate kawa Ma7oka na7aa Ankusako bidosona.
1SA 27:3 Dawitinne iya asay Ankusara Gaaten uttidosona. Asa ubbay ba soo asa asa ekidi bis; Dawitika ba macheta, Izira7eele Aknahoomonne Naabala am7iw, Qarmeloosa maccasiw, Abigiya ekidi bis.
1SA 27:4 Dawiti Gaate baqatis geysa si7idi, Saa7oli zaaridi iya koyeysa aggis.
1SA 27:5 Dawiti kawa Ankusako, “Neeni tanan ufaytiko, taani yan daana mela ne kawotethan de7iya katamatape issuwa taw imma. Taani ne aylley kawoy de7iya kataman neera ayis uttanee?” yaagis.
1SA 27:6 He gallas Ankusi Xiqilaaga katamaa Dawitas immis; hachi gakanaw Xiqilaaga katamay Yihuda kawotaba gididi attis.
1SA 27:7 Dawiti Filisxeeme biittan issi laythinne oyddu ageena de7is.
1SA 27:8 Dawitinne iya asati pude keyidi, Geeshureta, Garzetanne Amaaleqata oloosona. Benipe doomidi, he asati Shuurape bidi Gibxe gakanaw de7iya biittan de7idosona.
1SA 27:9 Dawiti he biitta oliya wode ubban he biittan de7iya macca gidin, adde gidin, paxa aggibeenna. Dorsenne mehe, harenne gimale ma7o di77ees; yaatidi Ankusako simmees.
1SA 27:10 Ankusi, “Hachi awun olidetii?” gidi Dawita oychees. Dawiti, “Yihuda dugeha baggaa woyko Yirama7eela dugeha baggaa woyko Qeena dugeha baggaa olida” yaagees.
1SA 27:11 Entafe issi asi Gaate bidi, “Dawiti haysa oothis” gidi odonna mela Dawitinne iya asati macca adde ashshona wodhidosona. Dawiti Filisxeeme biittan de7ida wode ubban haysada oothis.
1SA 27:12 Ankusi Dawitan ammanetidi, “Dawiti ba asan, Isra7eelen daro ixetis; hesaa gisho, I taw merinaw aylle gidana” yaagidi qopis.
1SA 28:1 He wode Filisxeeme asati Isra7eeleta olanaw banta olanchota shiishidosona. Ankusi Dawitako, “Nenne ne asati taara olas baanaysa tuma era utta” yaagis.
1SA 28:2 Dawiti, “Hessa gidiko, ta ne aylley oothanaba ne be7ana” yaagis. Ankusi, “Daro lo77o; taani nena ta de7o laytha ubban tana naageysa oothana” yaagis.
1SA 28:3 Haysafe kase Sameeli hayqin, Isra7eele asa ubbay iyaw yeekidi, iya kataman Raman iya moogidosona. Saa7oli moytille xeegeysatanne marota Isra7eele biittafe yedethidi kessis.
1SA 28:4 Filisxeeme olanchoti shiiqidi, Suneema kataman dunkaanidosona; Saa7oli Isra7eele asa ubbaa shiishidi, Gilbo7a zuman dunkaanis.
1SA 28:5 Saa7oli Filisxeeme olanchota be7idi yayyis; iya wozanay daro dagammis.
1SA 28:6 Hessa gisho, ay oothaneko Godaa oychis; shin Goday amuhon woyko Uriimen woyko nabeta baggara iyaw odibeenna.
1SA 28:7 Hessafe guye, Saa7oli ba aylleta, “Moytille xeegiya maro taw koyte; taani iiko bada iyo oychana” yaagidi kiittis. Saa7ola aylleti, “Moytille xeegiya issi maroy Endooran de7ausu” yaagidosona.
1SA 28:8 Yaagin Saa7oli bana erisonna mela hara ma7o ma7idi, nam7u asata ekidi, qamma he mareeko bidi, maccasiw, “Hayyana, taw issi moytille xeegarki; taani suntha odiya asa taw dentharki” yaagis.
1SA 28:9 Yaagin maccasiya, “Moytille xeegeysatanne marota Isra7eele biittafe Saa7oli waati yedethi kessidaako, tuma neeni eraasa. Tana wodhisanaw neeni taw ayis xihe yeggay?” yaagasu.
1SA 28:10 Yaagin Saa7oli maccasiw, “De7o Xoossay eriya mela, neeni haysa gisho seeretaka” yaagidi Godan caaqis.
1SA 28:11 Maccasiya, “Taani new oona dentho?” yaagada oychasu. Saa7oli, “Sameela taw dentha” yaagis.
1SA 28:12 Maccasiya Sameela be7ada, waaso goochada, Saa7olako, “Neeni tana ayis cimmadii? Neeni Saa7ola gidiki!” yaagasu.
1SA 28:13 Kawoy, “Yayyofa! New aybe bentey?” yaagis. Maccasiya, “Issi moytilley biitta giddofe keyishin be7as” yaagasu.
1SA 28:14 Saa7oli maccasiw, “I ay daanii?” yaagis. Maccasiya, “Kaabba ma7ida issi cima addey keyis” yaagasu. Saa7oli he addey Sameela gideysa eridi, iya sinthan sa7an gufannis.
1SA 28:15 Sameeli Saa7olako, “Tana denthada ayis waaysay?” yaagis. Saa7oli, “Taani daro un7etas; Filisxeeme asati tana oloosona; Xoossay taape shaaketis; nabeta baggara woyko amuhon I taani oychiyaba odenna. Hessa gisho, taani oothanaba ne taw odana mela nena xeegas” yaagis.
1SA 28:16 Sameeli, “Goday shaaketidi new morke gidiko tana ayis zore oychay?
1SA 28:17 Goday ta baggara kaseti odidaba oothis; Goday kawotethaa neepe ekidi, ne shooruwa Dawitas immis.
1SA 28:18 Neeni Godaas kiitetaboonna gishonne iya eexiya iya sheniya Amaaleqa bolla polaboona gisho Goday hachi haysa ne bolla ehis.
1SA 28:19 Nenanne Isra7eele, Goday Filisxeemetas aathidi immana; nenne ne adde nayti wonto tanan gahetana; Goday Isra7eele olanchota Filisxeemetas aathidi immana” yaagis.
1SA 28:20 Saa7oli Sameela odaa si7idi yayyida gisho daaburidi, bana dogidi sa7an kundis. Saa7oli qammanne gallas kathi miboonna gisho iyaw wolqi ixis.
1SA 28:21 He maccasiya Saa7olako yada, I daro kokoreysa be7ada, “Taani ne aylliya new kiitetas; neeni tana oychidaba ta shempuwa dogada oothas.
1SA 28:22 Ha77i taani ne aylliya giyaba hayyana si7a; neeni mada gashtada ne ogiya baana mela taani new guutha kathi giigisas” yaagasu.
1SA 28:23 Saa7oli, “Miike” yaagis. Shin iya asati he maccaseera gididi iya woossidosona; enta woosa si7is; biittafe dendidi hiixan uttis.
1SA 28:24 He maccasiya ba son de7iya anqara maraa shukasu; dhiille eka munuqada, uythi uukasu.
1SA 28:25 Yaatada kathaa Saa7olasinne iya asatas aathin, enti midosona. He qamma dendidi bidosona.
1SA 29:1 Filisxeemeti banta olanchota ubbaa Afeeqan shiishidosona. Isra7eeleti Izira7eelen de7iya pulto haatha matan dunkaanidosona.
1SA 29:2 Filisxeeme halaqati banta olanchota xeetaninne mukulu cugan salpisidosona; Dawitinne iya asay Ankusara issife gididi guye baggara salpidosona.
1SA 29:3 Filisxeeme halaqati enta be7idi, “Ha Ibraaweti haysan ay oothona?” yaagidosona. Ankusi, “Haysi Isra7eele kawa Saa7ola aylliya Dawita gidennee? I daro wode taara aathis; I Saa7ola kaddidi keyoodepe hachi gakanaw taani iyape bala demmabike” yaagis.
1SA 29:4 Shin Filisxeeme halaqati Ankusa bolla hanqetidi, “Ha addiya neeni iyaw immida katamaa guye zaara. Olay goobiya wode I nu bolla simmidi dendonna mela I nuura olaa boopo. I ba godaara sigetanaw nu asata qoodhiya qaanxofe attishin, haraa ay oothanee?
1SA 29:5 Haysafe kase maccasay, ‘Saa7oli mukulata wodhis; Dawiti tammu mukulata wodhis’ yaagidi durishenne yexishe sabbiday Dawita gidennee?” yaagidosona.
1SA 29:6 Hessa gisho, Ankusi Dawita xeegidi, “De7o Goday eriya mela, neeni ammanthiya asi; neeni taara olas beysa ta dosayis. Neeni taako yoosape hachi gakanaw taani ne bolla bala demmabike. Shin halaqati neeni olas beysa dosokona.
1SA 29:7 Neeni guye simmada saro ba; Filisxeeme halaqata ufaysonnaba aykoka oothofa” yaagis.
1SA 29:8 Dawiti, “Taani ay oothadina? Taani neera de7oodepe hachi gakanaw ne taape ay bala demmadii? Yaatin, kawa, ta godaa morketara ayis oletikinaa?” yaagis.
1SA 29:9 Ankusi, “Xoossa kiitanchoda neeni taw lo77o gideysa taani erayis. Shin Filisxeeme halaqati, ‘I nuura ola boopo’ yaagidosona.
1SA 29:10 Nenne neera yida ne godaa aylletara wonto guura dendidi biite” yaagis.
1SA 29:11 Hessa gisho, Dawitinne iya asati Filisxeeme simmanaw wonta guura dendidosona; Filisxeemeti Izira7eele bidosona.
1SA 30:1 Dawitinne iya asati heedzantho gallas Xiqilaaga gakidosona. Amaaleqati Negebanne Xiqilaaga olidi, Xiqilaaga taman xuuggidosona.
1SA 30:2 Xiqilaagan de7iya maccasaanne na7ape cima gakanaw de7iya ubbaa di77idosona; entafe issi asika wodhonna enta ubbaa di77idi efidosona.
1SA 30:3 Dawitinne iya asati Xiqilaaga gakiya wode katamay taman xuugetidaysanne enta macheti, adde naytinne macca nayti di7etidaysa be7idosona.
1SA 30:4 Dawitinne iyara de7iya asay banta wolqay ixana gakanaw waassidi yeekidosona.
1SA 30:5 Dawita macheti Izira7eele Aknahoomanne kase Naabala machiya Qarmeloosa Abigiya nam7ayka di7etidosona.
1SA 30:6 Iya asay banta adde naytinne macca nayti di7etida gisho yilotidi Dawita shuchan caddanaw odetin, Dawiti daro un7etis. Gidoshin, Dawiti Godan ba Xoossan minetis.
1SA 30:7 Dawiti Abimeleke na7aa kahiniya Abyataarako, “Efuudiya ekada ya” yaagin, Abiyatari efuudiya Dawitas ehis.
1SA 30:8 Dawiti, “Taani, tana oliya asata kaallada gakanee?” yaagidi Godaa oychis. Goday, “Ee; enta kaallada ba; tuma enta ne gakana; tuma di7uwa zaarana” yaagis.
1SA 30:9 Dawitinne iyara de7iya usupun xeetu asati dendidi Boosora shaafa gakiya wode entafe guutha asati yan attidosona.
1SA 30:10 Nam7u xeetu asay shaafa pinnanaw daro daaburidosona. Shin Dawitinne oyddu xeetu asay kaallidosona.
1SA 30:11 Enti issi Gibxe asi denban demmidi, Dawitako ehidi, iyaw haathenne kathi immidosona.
1SA 30:12 Balase ongochonne nam7u woyne nuka iyaw immin midi gashtisis. I heedzu gallasinne heedzu qamma kathi moonna haathe uyonna gam7is.
1SA 30:13 Dawiti, “Neeni oodde ayllee? Awupe yadii?” yaagidi addiya oychis. Addey, “Taani Amaaleqa addiyas aylletida Gibxe asi; heedzu gallasape kase ta saketin, ta goday tana yeggi aggidi bis.
1SA 30:14 Nuuni Yihuda zawa, Keltaaweta dugeha bagganne Kaaleba dugeha baggaa olidi Xiqilaaga taman xuuggida” yaagis.
1SA 30:15 Dawiti, “Neeni tana he olida cugatako kaalethanaw danda7ay?” yaagidi oychis. I zaaridi, “Neeni tana wodhonna melanne ta godaas aathada immike gada taw Xoossan caaqa; taani nena entako kaalethana” yaagis.
1SA 30:16 Dawita kaalethidi entako gathis. Enti Filisxeemepenne Yihudape daro di7o di77ida gisho ufaytidi mishenne uyishe laaletidi uttidosona.
1SA 30:17 He gallas omarsafe doomidi wontetha gallas omarsi gakanaw Dawiti enta shocis. Gimale toggidi baqatida oyddu xeetu panthatape attishin, hari issi asika attibeenna.
1SA 30:18 Amaaleqa asati efida ubbaa, ba nam7u machetara issife Dawiti wosisidi ekis.
1SA 30:19 Asati di77idi efidabaape issibayka pacibeenna; na7i woyko cimi, addey woyko macci, hessadaka enti di77idi efida haraba ubbay paconna de7ishin Dawiti ubbaa zaaris.
1SA 30:20 Dawiti dorse, deeshenne mehe ubbaa di77is; Dawita asay I di77ida mehiya hanko mehiyape sinthara laaggishe, “Haysi Dawita di7o” yaagidosona.
1SA 30:21 Dawiti daaburidi Boosora shaafa achan attida nam7u xeetu asaako yis. Enti Dawitanne iyara de7iya asaa mokanaw keyidosona. Dawiti ba asaara shiiqidi enta sarothis.
1SA 30:22 Shin Dawitara bida asata giddofe pathonna iita asati, “Enti nuura boonna gisho nuuni zaaridi ehidabaape aykoka entaw shaakoko; enti banta naytanne banta macheta ekidi boonna” yaagidosona.
1SA 30:23 Dawiti zaaridi, “Ta ishato, Goday nuus immidaban hinte haysada oothanaw bessenna. I nuna naagidi, nuna olida cugata nuus aathidi immis.
1SA 30:24 Hinte giyaba oonika ekenna. Oletanaw bidaysatanne nubaa naagishe haysan gam7idaysata gishoy issino; ubbay gina shaaketana” yaagis.
1SA 30:25 He gallasape doomidi hachi gakanaw Isra7eele biittan hessi higgenne woga gidis.
1SA 30:26 Dawiti Xiqilaaga gakida wode ba lagge gidida Yihuda cimatako, “Godaa morketape di7etidabaape taani hintew immeysa ekite” yaagidi guuthara yeddis.
1SA 30:27 I hessa Beetelen, Raamota Negebaninne Yatiran de7eysatas,
1SA 30:28 Aro7eeran, Sifimootan, Eshtamoo7aninne
1SA 30:29 Rakaalan, Yirahima7eelan, Qeena katamatan,
1SA 30:30 Hormana, Boraasana, Atakaninne
1SA 30:31 Kebroonan de7eysatas yeddis. Inne iya asati yuuyida bessa ubban de7iya asaas yeddis.
1SA 31:1 Filisxeemeti Isra7eeletara oletidosona; Isra7eeleti Filisxeemeta sinthafe baqatidosona; daro Isra7eeleti Gilbo7a deriya bolla hayqidosona.
1SA 31:2 Filisxeemeti Saa7olanne iya adde nayta yedethidi, iya adde nayta Yoonataana, Amnadaabenne Malkisa wodhidosona.
1SA 31:3 Olay teqidi Saa7ola un7ethis; dongen dukeysati iya caddidi daro madunxisidosona.
1SA 31:4 Saa7oli ba ola miishiya tookeysako, “Ha qaxaretiboonaysati yidi, tana caddidi kaa7onna mela ne mashshan tana caddada wodha” yaagis. Shin iya ola miishiya tookeysi yayyidi ixin, Saa7oli ba mashshaa sa7an essidi, iya bolla kundis.
1SA 31:5 Iya ola miishiya tookeysi Saa7oli hayqidaysa be7idi, ika ba mashshaa sa7an essidi, iya bolla kundidi iyara issife hayqis.
1SA 31:6 Haysada hanidi, Saa7olinne iya heedzu adde nayti, iya ola miishiya tookeysinne iya asati ubbay he gallas hayqidosona.
1SA 31:7 Zangaaraninne Yordaanose shaafape hefintha baggara de7iya Isra7eele asay, Isra7eele olanchoti baqatidaysa, Saa7olinne iya nayti hayqidaysa be7idi banta katamaa aggidi baqatidosona. Filisxeemeti yidi, he katamata oykidosona.
1SA 31:8 Wontetha gallas Filisxeemeti aha bollafe ola misheta qaaridi ekanaw yidi, Saa7olinne iya heedzu adde nayti Gilbo7a deriya bolla hayqidi zin7idaysata demmidosona.
1SA 31:9 Enti Saa7ola qoodhiya qanxidi iya ola miishiya qaari ekidosona. Yaatidi banta eeqa keethaninne banta asaa giddon xoonuwa awaajana mela Filisxeeme biitta ubbaas kiita yeddidosona.
1SA 31:10 Saa7ola ola miishiya Astaroote geetetiya enta macca xoosse keethan wothidosona. Saa7ola aha Beet-Saana katama gimbiya bolla mismaaren dhishidi kaqidosona.
1SA 31:11 Filisxeemeti Saa7ola oothidaba Galadan de7iya Yaabesa asay si7ida wode,
1SA 31:12 mino asati qamma dendi bidi, Saa7ola ahaanne iya nayta aha Beet-Saana katama gimbiya bollafe wodhisidi Yaabesa katamaa ehidi, yan xuuggidosona.
1SA 31:13 Hessafe guye, enta meqethaa maxi ekidi, Yaabesan de7iya tamarsike mithaa garsan moogidosona; yaatidi laapun gallas xoomidosona.
2SA 1:1 Saa7oli hayqidaape guye, Dawiti Amaaleqata xooni simmidi Xiqilaagan nam7u gallas gam7is.
2SA 1:2 Heedzantho gallas issi addey ba ma7uwa daakidi, ba huuphen baana qolidi, Saa7oli dunkaanida gutaape yis. I Dawitako yidi sa7an gufannidi ziggis.
2SA 1:3 Dawiti, “Neeni awape yadii?” yaagidi oychis. I zaaridi, “Taani Isra7eeleti dunkaanida gutaape kessa ekada yas” yaagis.
2SA 1:4 Dawiti, “Ane hanidaba taw oda” yaagis. I zaaridi, “Nu olanchoti olape baqatidosona; nu asaape daroti hayqidosona; Saa7olinne iya na7ay Yoonataani hayqidosona” yaagis.
2SA 1:5 Dawiti iyaw odida panthaa, “Saa7olinne iya na7aa Yoonataani hayqidaysa neeni aybin eray?” yaagidi oychis.
2SA 1:6 Panthay, “Taani Gilbo7a deriya bolla de7ishin, Saa7oli ba toora guufetidi eqidaysa be7as; para gaaretinne para asati Saa7olako matatidosona.
2SA 1:7 He wode Saa7oli guye simmidi tana demmidi xeegis. Taani, ‘Yee’ yaagada koyas.
2SA 1:8 Saa7oli, ‘Neeni oonee?’ yaagidi oychin, ‘Taani Amaaleqa asi’ yaagada zaaras.
2SA 1:9 Hessafe guye, Saa7oli, ‘Taani madunxada, hayqos gakas; neeni ta bolla keyiya eqada tana wodha’ yaagis.
2SA 1:10 I kundidaape guye hayqope attonnaysa erida gisho taani iya bolla keya eqada iya wodhas. Iya huuphen de7iya kallachanne iya qesen de7iya ambaariya ekada neeko ta godaako yas” yaagis.
2SA 1:11 Dawitinne Dawita asay kayotidi, banta ma7uwa daakidosona.
2SA 1:12 Enti Saa7oli, Yoonataani, Godaa olanchotinne Isra7eele asay olan wurida gisho omarsi gakanaw kayotidosona; yeekidosona; xoomidosona.
2SA 1:13 Dawiti hessa entaw ehida panthaa, “Ne awupe yadii?” yaagidi oychis. I zaaridi, “Taani bete asi gididi de7iya Amaaleqa addiya na7a” yaagis.
2SA 1:14 Dawiti, “Goday tiyida kawa wodhanaw ne kushiya denthashe waanada yayyabikii?” yaagis.
2SA 1:15 Dawiti ba asatape issuwa xeegidi, “Iya wodha” yaagin, I Amaaleqa panthaa caddidi wodhis.
2SA 1:16 Dawiti Amaaleqa addiyako, “Goday tiyida kawa taani wodhas” yaagada “Neeni ne doonan markatida gisho ne suuthaa gomey nena oyko” yaagis.
2SA 1:17 Dawiti Saa7olasinne iya na7aa Yoonatanas haysada yaagidi zeleelis.
2SA 1:18 Yihuda asay, “Donge yeeho” geetetiya ha zelelsa tamaarana mela kiittis; ha zelelsay Yaashara maxaafan xaafetis.
2SA 1:19 “Neno Isra7eele, ne halaqati, dhoqa bessan hayqidosona. Wolqaamati waanidi kundidona!
2SA 1:20 Filisxeeme macca nayti hessa si7idi ufaytonna mela, qaxaretiboona asaa macca nayti hashshu goonna mela, haysa Gaate kataman odopite Asqaloona ogetan awaajofite.
2SA 1:21 Hinteno Gilbo7a dereto, hinte bolla iri bukofo; aki wodhofo. He bessan wolqaamata gondalley tunida gisho, Saa7ola gondalley zayten qushetiboona gisho, he gadiyan kathi dolopo.
2SA 1:22 Goyretidaysata suuthaafe, wolqaamata modhuwafe, Yoonataana dongey guye gibeenna; Saa7ola mashshay kallonna simmibeenna.
2SA 1:23 Saa7olinne Yoonataani doseteyisata; hayqoninne paxan shaaketibookona. Enti arganthafe aadhidi eeso; gaammofe aadhidi mino.
2SA 1:24 Hinteno Isra7eele maccasaw, zo7onne alleeqo ma7o mayzidaysas, hinte ma7uwa worqan alleeqisida Saa7olas yeekite.
2SA 1:25 Wolqaamati olan waanidi kundidona? Yoonataani dhoqa bessan hayqis.
2SA 1:26 Ta ishaa Yoonataana, ta new azzanayis; ne taw daro al7o. Neeni tana dosiya dosoy malaalsees; macca siiqopeka aadhees.
2SA 1:27 Wolqaamati waanidi kundidona? Ola miisheyka waanidi dhayidee?” yaagidi Dawiti zeleelis.
2SA 2:1 Hessafe guye, Dawiti, “Yihuda katamatape issuwa boo?” yaagidi Godaa oychis. Goday, “Ee, ba” yaagis. Dawiti, “Awu boo” yaagidi oychis. Goday, “Kebroona ba” yaagidi zaaris.
2SA 2:2 Dawiti ba nam7u macheta, Izira7eele Aknahoomanne kase Naabala machiw Qarmeloosa Abigiya ekidi Kebroona katamaa bis.
2SA 2:3 Dawiti baara de7iya asatanne enta soo asa ubbaa ehin, Kebroonaninne iya heeran de7iya katamatan de7idosona.
2SA 2:4 Yihuda asati Kebroona katamaa yidi, Dawita tiyidi Yihuda bolla kawothidosona. Dawiti Yaabesa Galada asay Saa7ola moogidaysa si7ida wode,
2SA 2:5 I ase kiittidi, “Hinte hinte godaa Saa7ola moogida gisho he keehatethas Goday hintena anjo.
2SA 2:6 Goday siiquwanne tumatethaa hintew qonciso; taanika ha keehatetha gisho hintew lo77o kushe zaarana.
2SA 2:7 Hiza minnite; xaalite; hinte goday Saa7oli hayqis. Yihuda asay tana tiyidi, banta bolla kawothidosona” yaagis.
2SA 2:8 Saa7ola tora moconay Neera na7ay Abeneeri Saa7ola na7aa Iyabuste ekidi, Mahinayma geetetiya bessaa efis.
2SA 2:9 Iya Galadan, Aseeran, Izra7eelan, Efreeman, Biniyaameninne Isra7eele biitta ubban kawothis.
2SA 2:10 Saa7ola na7ay, Iyabustey Isra7eele bolla kawotiya wode iyaw oytamu laythi; I nam7u laythi kawotis. Gidoshin, Yihuda asay Dawita kaallidosona.
2SA 2:11 Dawiti Kebroonan Yihuda bolla laapun laythinne bagga kawotis.
2SA 2:12 Neera na7ay Abeneerinne Saa7ola na7ay Iyabuste asay Mahinaymape Gaba7oona bidosona.
2SA 2:13 Xaruya na7ay Iyo7aabinne Dawita asay Gaba7oona olla haatha matan entara gahetidosona. Issi cugay olla haathaafe hefinthan uttin, issi cugay hafinthan uttis.
2SA 2:14 Abeneeri Iyo7aabako, “Ane hintefenne nuupe panthati dendidi, nu sinthan oleto” yaagis. Iyo7aabi, “Ero, dendidi oleto” yaagis.
2SA 2:15 Hessa gisho, Biniyaamepe Saa7ola na7aa Iyabustes tammanne nam7u asati keyidi, Dawitas eqida tammanne nam7u asatara ola gahetidosona.
2SA 2:16 Issoy issoy ba morkiya huuphiya oykidi, mashshan miyen caddis; hessada hannidi laatamanne oydday hayqidosona. Hessa gisho Gaba7oonan de7iya he bessay Mashsha biitta geetetis.
2SA 2:17 He gallas wolqaama ola oletidi, Dawita asay Abeneeranne Isra7eele asaa xoonis.
2SA 2:18 Xaruya nayti heedzay Iyo7aabi, Abisinne Asaheeli he bessan de7oosona; Asaheeli woshi7eda eeson woxidi,
2SA 2:19 Asaheeli Abeneera ushachi woyko haddirsi goonna yedethis.
2SA 2:20 Abeneeri guye simmidi, “Asaheela, nenee?” yaagidi oychis. Asaheeli, “Ee tana” yaagis.
2SA 2:21 Abeneeri, “Ushachi woyko haddirsi simmada, asatape issuwa oykada iya ola miishiya eka” yaagis. Shin Asaheeli iya yedetheysa aggonna ixis.
2SA 2:22 Qassika Abeneeri, “Taani nena sa7ara gathada oythonna de7ishin, tana yedetheysa agga! Nena wodhada taani ne ishaa Iyo7aaba som7uwa waatada xeellanee?” yaagidi waassis.
2SA 2:23 Shin Asaheeli iya yedetheysa aggonna ixis. Hessa gisho, Abeneeri toora guye yeddidi, Asaheela uluwa caddin tooray zokora kanthidi keyis. Asaheeli he bessan kundidi hayqis; Asaheeli hayqida bessaa gakida asa ubbay yan eqis.
2SA 2:24 Shin Iyo7aabinne Abisi Abeneera gooddidosona; awi wulliya wode Gaba7oona mela biittako efiya ogiyan Gaadape sintha baggara de7iya Ama zumako gakidosona.
2SA 2:25 Biniyaame asay Abeneerako shiiqidosona; issi cuga medhidi issi zumaa bolla eqidosona.
2SA 2:26 Abeneeri Iyo7aaba xeegidi, “Merinaw oletishe daaneyee? Haysa wursethay camo gidanaysa neeni erikii? Ne asay, banta ishata gooddeysa aggana mela ayis odikii?” yaagis.
2SA 2:27 Iyo7aabi, “De7o Xoossay ero! Neeni odonnaba gidiyako ta asay ba ishata sa7i wontana gakanaw goodda aggokona” yaagis.
2SA 2:28 Iyo7aabi moyze punnin asa ubbay essis. Isra7eeleta zaari goodibookona woyko olibookona.
2SA 2:29 Abeneerinne iya asay he qamma kumethi hemetidi Araba gadha gakidosona. Yordaanose shaafa pinnidi, Betroona kanthidi Mahinayme yidosona.
2SA 2:30 Iyo7aabi Abeneera gooddeysa aggidi, ba asa ubbaa issi bessi shiishidi xeelliya wode, Asaheela gujonna Dawita asaape tammanne uddufun asi pacis.
2SA 2:31 Shin Dawita asay Abeneerara de7iya Biniyaame kochatape heedzu xeetanne usupun tammu asi wodhidosona.
2SA 2:32 Asaheela aha ekidi, Beeteleme kataman de7iya iya aawa duufon moogidosona. Iyo7aabinne iya asay qamma kumethi hemetidi sa7i wontiya wode Kebroona gakidosona.
2SA 3:1 Saa7ola soo asaynne Dawita asay daro wode oletidosona; Dawiti olan minni minni biya wode Saa7ola asay daaburi daaburi bis.
2SA 3:2 Kebroonan Dawitas nayti yeletidosona; Izira7eele Aknahooma yelida bayra na7ay Amnoona;
2SA 3:3 Qarmeloosa Abigiya kase Naabala machiya yelida Kil7aabi nam7antho na7a. Gashura kawa Talmaya na7iya Ma7ika yelida Abeseloomey heedzantho na7a.
2SA 3:4 Oyddanthoy Haagita na7aa Adoona; ichashanthoy Abixaala na7aa Safaaxa.
2SA 3:5 Usupunthoy Dawita mache Egili na7aa Yitra7aama; ha nayti ubbay Kebroonan yeletidosona.
2SA 3:6 Saa7ola soo asaaranne Dawita soo asaara oletiya wode Abeneeri Saa7ola asaa bolla minni minni bis.
2SA 3:7 Saa7olas Iyoheela na7a gidida Irxifo geetetiya issi laggethiya de7awusu; Iyabustey Abeneerako, “Ta aawa laggethera ayis aqadii?” yaagidi oychis.
2SA 3:8 Abeneeri iya odan daro yilotidi, “Tana neeni Yihudako simmida gaata kana gadiyee? Taani ne aawa Saa7olas, iya ishatasinne iya dabbotas ammanetada de7as; nenaka Dawitas aathada immabike. Shin ha77i neeni tana ha maccase gisho mootaasa!
2SA 3:9 Xoossay Dawitas oothana gidi caaqida qaala taani polonna ixiko, Xoossi tana pirdo.
2SA 3:10 Saa7ola kochaafe kawotethaa wosisidi, Daanepe Barsaabe gakanaw Isra7eele bollanne Yihuda bolla, Dawita araata minthanaw Goday caaqis” yaagis.
2SA 3:11 Iyabustey Abeneeras yayyida gisho hara qaala pogibeenna.
2SA 3:12 Abeneeri Dawitako, “Biittay oossee? Neeni taara caaqa; Isra7eele asa ubbay neeko simmana mela ta nena maaddana” yaagidi ase kiittis.
2SA 3:13 Dawiti, “Lo77o! Ta neera caaqana. Shin taani nena issiba oychayis; neeni tana be7anaw yaa wode Saa7ola na7iw Melkoolo ekonna yoopa” yaagis.
2SA 3:14 Hessafe guye, Dawiti Saa7ola na7a Iyabusteko, “Xeetu Filisxeemeta qaaratada koyta oothada immida ta machiw Melkoolo taw imma” yaagidi ase kiittis.
2SA 3:15 Iyabustey ase kiittidi I azina Lawusha na7a Palxi7eelape kessi ekis.
2SA 3:16 I azinay Biraqima katama gakanaw yeekishe I geedo kaallis. Abeneeri iyako, “Guye soo ba” yaagin addey guye simmidi bis.
2SA 3:17 Abeneeri Isra7eele cimatako bidi, “Dawiti hinte bolla kawotana mela daro wode amotideta.
2SA 3:18 Ha77i polite! Goday, ‘Ta asaa Isra7eele, Filisxeemeta kushepenne enta morketa ubbaa kushepe ta aylliya Dawita baggara ashshana’ gidaysa hassayite” yaagis.
2SA 3:19 Abeneeri Biniyaame kochatas hessa odis. Isra7eele asaynne Biniyaame asa ubbay oothanaw koyida ubbaa Dawitas odanaw Abeneeri Kebroona bis.
2SA 3:20 Abeneeri baara laatamu asi ekidi, Kebroona bin, Dawiti iyawunne iya asaas gibira giigisis.
2SA 3:21 Abeneeri Dawitako, “Enti neera caaqana melanne ne wozanay amotiya ubbaa ne haarana mela ta bada Isra7eele asaa kawas ta godaas shiishana” yaagis. Yaagin Dawiti Abeneera moyzidi saro yeddis.
2SA 3:22 He wode Dawita asaynne Iyo7aabi olape darobaa di77idi simmidosona. Shin Dawiti iya saro ba gidi yeddida gisho, Abeneeri Kebroonan Dawitara deenna.
2SA 3:23 Iyo7aabinne iyara de7iya olanchoti gakiya wode asay, “Neera na7aa Abeneeri kawa Dawitako yin, kawoy iya yeddin saro bis” yaagidi odidosona.
2SA 3:24 Hessa gisho, Iyo7aabi kawako bidi, “Hessi waanidi hanidee? Abeneeri neeko yin, ayis yeddadii? Heko I bikichis!
2SA 3:25 Neera na7ay Abeneeri nena cimmanaw, neeni geliyasonne keyaso be7anawunne neeni oothiya ubbaa eranaw yis” yaagis.
2SA 3:26 Iyo7aabi Dawita sinthafe keyidi, Abeneera geedo kiitaa yeddin, enti iya Siira olla haatha matape guye zaaridosona; shin Dawiti hessa erenna.
2SA 3:27 Abeneeri Kebroona simmidi yida wode Iyo7aabi iyara dumma odetanaw koyida daanisidi dirsa pengiyako de7iya kifiliyanne iya efis. Ba ishaa Asaheela suutha zaaranaw Abeneera ulon caddin Abeneeri he bessan hayqis.
2SA 3:28 Dawiti guyepe hessa si7ida wode, “Taaninne ta kawotethay Neera na7aa Abeneera suuthaa gisho Godaa sinthan merinaw oyshetoko.
2SA 3:29 Iya suuthay Iyo7aabanne iya aawa soo asa acho; madunthi de7iya asi woyko goga hargey de7iya asi woyko wobbe asi woyko mashshan hayqiya asi woyko koshatiya asi Iyo7aaba kochan dhayopo” yaagis.
2SA 3:30 Gaba7oonan keyida olan banta ishaa Asaheela Abeneeri wodhida gisho, Iyo7aabinne iya isha Abisi Abeneera wodhidosona.
2SA 3:31 Dawiti Iyo7aabanne iyara de7iya asaa, “Hinte ma7uwa daakite; baana qolite; Abeneera halaa sinthan yeekite” yaagis. Kawo Dawiti hala kaallidi duufo bis.
2SA 3:32 Abeneeri Kebroonan moogetis; kawoy ba qaala dhoqu oothidi duufon yeekis; asa ubbay yeekidosona.
2SA 3:33 Kawoy Abeneeras, “Abeneeri eeya asada hayqanaw bessii?
2SA 3:34 Ne kushey qashetibeenna; Ne tohoy santhalaatan oyketibeenna. Asi iita asa kushen hayqeysada hayqis” yaagidi zeleelis. Asa ubbay Abeneeras zaaridi yeekidosona.
2SA 3:35 He gallas Dawiti kathi maana mela asay iya shoobbidosona. Shin Dawiti, “Awa ayfey de7ishin, kathi woyko haraba baariko Xoossi tana pirdo” yaagidi caaqis.
2SA 3:36 Kawoy oothidaba asa ubbay be7idi ufaytidosona; tumaka kawoy oothidaba ubbay asaa ufaysis.
2SA 3:37 Hessa gisho, he gallas Dawita asaynne Isra7eele asa ubbay kawoy Neera na7aa Abeneera wodhisiboonaysa eridosona.
2SA 3:38 Kawoy ba aylletako, “Isra7eele biittan gita asinne halaqi hayqidaysa hinte akeekeketii?
2SA 3:39 Taani Xoossay tiyida kawo gidikoka, taani daaburancho; haysati Xaruya nayti ta bolla minnidosona; iita oothidaysatas Goday enta oosuwada zaaro” yaagis.
2SA 4:1 Saa7ola na7ay Iyabustey Abeneeri Kebroonan hayqidaysa si7ida wode iya wozanay til7is; Isra7eele asa ubbayka dagammis.
2SA 4:2 Saa7ola na7aa Iyabustes ola kaalethiya nam7u halaqati de7oosona; issuwa sunthay Ba7ana; hankoy qassi Rakaaba. Enti Biniyaame koche gidida Ba7aarote addiya Irmoona nayta. Ba7aarotey Biniyaame baggada taybetees.
2SA 4:3 Ba7aarotan de7ida koyro asati Gitayma biitta baqatidi, hachi gakanaw bete asada yan de7idosona.
2SA 4:4 Saa7ola na7aa Yoonatanas nam7u tohoy silida na7i de7ees; Saa7olanne Yoonataana hayquwa worey Izra7eelepe si7etiya wode I ichashu laytha na7a. He na7aa dichiyara iya ekada baqatishin na7ay kundin iya tohoy silis; he na7aa sunthay Mempiboste.
2SA 4:5 Ba7aarote addiya Irmoona nayti Rekaabinne Ba7aani Iyabuste soo bidi seeta gallas gakidosona. Enti gakiya wode I shempanaw alga bolla zin7is.
2SA 4:6 Enti giste koyiya asada hanidi soo gelidi, iya uluwan caddidosona. Rekaabinne iya ishaa Ba7aani lepara keydi bidosona.
2SA 4:7 Iyabustey qol7an arsan zin7idaysa demmidi, iyaw uluwan caddidi wodhidosona; iya huuphiya qanxi ekidi, Araba gadha efiya ogiya oykidi, qammara bidosona.
2SA 4:8 Iyabuste huuphiya Kebroonan de7iya Dawitas ehidosona. Kawa, “Nena wodhanaw koyiya ne morkiya Saa7ola na7aa Iyabuste huuphiya haysa be7a. Saa7ola bollanne iya nayta bolla kawa nu godaa gisho Xoossay hachi halo keyis” yaagidosona.
2SA 4:9 Shin Ba7aarote addiya Irmoona nayta Rekaabanne iya ishaa Ba7ana Dawiti haysada yaagis; “Meto ubbaafe tana ashshida de7o Goday eriya mela.
2SA 4:10 Taw mishiraacho odiya asada, ‘Saa7oli hayqis’ yaagidi taw odin, taani iya Xiqilaagan oykada wodhas; taani iya mishiraachuwas immida woytoy haysa.
2SA 4:11 Ba son ba arsan zin7ida xillo addiya wodhida iita asatas iya haluwa keyeysi ay mela iitandesha! Iya suuthaa taani hinte kushepe achana; hintena taani biitta bollafe dhaysana!” yaagis.
2SA 4:12 Rekaabanne Ba7ana wodhana mela Dawiti ba olanchota kiittin, olanchoti enta wodhidosona. Enta kushiyanne tohuwa qanxidi, Kebroonan olla haatha matan kaqidosona. Iyabuste huuphiya efidi, Abeneera duufon Kebroonan moogidosona.
2SA 5:1 Isra7eele zare ubbay Dawitako Kebroona yidi, “Nuuni ne ashonne ne suuthu.
2SA 5:2 Kase Saa7oli nuus kawo gididi de7iya wodeka Isra7eele asaa olas kaalethiday nena. Goday nena, ‘Neeni ta asaa Isra7eele heemmana; enta bolla kawotana’ yaagidi qaala gelis” yaagidosona.
2SA 5:3 Isra7eele cimati ubbay kawa Dawitako Kebroona yidosona; I entara Kebroonan Godaa sinthan caaqis; Isra7eele bolla kawotana mela Dawita tiyidosona.
2SA 5:4 Dawiti kawotiya wode iyaw hastamu laythi; I oytamu laythi kawotis.
2SA 5:5 Kebroonan Yihuda bolla laapun laythinne usupun ageena kawotis; Yerusalaamen Isra7eele bollanne Yihuda bolla hastamanne heedzu laythi kawotis.
2SA 5:6 Yerusalaamen de7iya Yaabuse asaa olanaw Dawitinne iya asay bidosona. Yaabuse asay, “Dawiti ha katamaa gelanaw danda7enna” gidi qopida gisho hari attoshin, “Qooqetinne wobbeti nena teqanaw danda7oosona; ne ha katamaa gelaka” yaagidosona.
2SA 5:7 Gidoshin, Dawiti Xiyoonen de7iya enta miixa oykin, iya Dawita katama gidasu.
2SA 5:8 He gallas Dawiti, “Yaabuse asaa olidi oykiya oonika Dawita morke gidida wobbetinne qooqeti de7iya bessaa gakanaw shaafara pude keyanaw koshshees” yaagis. Hessa gisho, “Qooqetinne wobbeti gadho gelokona” geetetis.
2SA 5:9 Dawiti he miixaa oykidi, yan de7is; he miixaa Dawita katamaa yaagidi sunthis. Dawiti Miilope doomidi he katamaa yuushshidi gimbis.
2SA 5:10 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday Xoossay iyara de7iya gisho Dawiti minni minni bis.
2SA 5:11 Xiroosa kawoy Kiraami Dawitas kawo gadho keexana mela ziga mithi, anaaxetanne shuchu masseyisata yeddin, enti iyaw keethe keexidosona.
2SA 5:12 Goday Isra7eele bolla iya kawo oothidi minthidaysanne ba asaa Isra7eele gisho iya kawotethaa dhoqu oothidi bonchidaysa Dawiti eris.
2SA 5:13 Dawiti Kebroonape Yerusalaame yidaape guye, hara laggethotanne macheta gujidi ekin, hara macca naytinne adde nayti iyaw yeletidosona.
2SA 5:14 Yerusalaamen iyaw yeletida adde nayta sunthay Samu7a, Shobaaba, Naatana, Solomone,
2SA 5:15 Yibhaara, Elishu7a, Nefega, Yafi7a,
2SA 5:16 Elishama7a, Eliyaadanne Elfalaxa.
2SA 5:17 Dawiti Isra7eele bolla kawo gididi tiyetidaysa Filisxeemeti si7ida wode enti ubbay Dawita koyanaw keyidosona; shin Dawiti hessa si7idi miixan bidi gelis.
2SA 5:18 Filisxeemeti bidi, Raafayme zangaaran laaletidi uttidosona.
2SA 5:19 Hessa gisho, Dawiti, “Taani bada Filisxeemeta olo? Neeni enta taw aathada immanee?” yaagidi Godaa oychis. Goday, “Ee ola; tuma ta enta new aathada immana” yaagis.
2SA 5:20 Dawiti Ba7al-Parasime geetetiya bessaa bidi, yan enta xoonis. I, “Di7o haathi menthidi keyeysada Goday ta morketa ta sinthan mentherethis” yaagis. Hessa gisho, he bessa sunthay Ba7al-Parasime geetetis.
2SA 5:21 Filisxeemeti banta eeqata he bessan yeggidi bin, Dawitinne iya asay he eeqata ekidi bidosona.
2SA 5:22 Filisxeemeti guye bidi, nam7antho Raafayme zangaaran laaletidi uttidosona.
2SA 5:23 Dawiti Godaa nam7antho oychin, Goday, “Enta guye baggara teqada wolaa sinthan enta ola, shin entaw som7on keyopa.
2SA 5:24 Wola mithaa xeeran salpe qaala neeni si7iya wode Filisxeeme olanchota shocanaw Goday neepe sinthe aadhidaysa erada ellesa” yaagis.
2SA 5:25 Dawiti Goday kiittidaysada oothis; Geebape Gezera gakanaw Filisxeeme olanchota wodhis.
2SA 6:1 Isra7eele giddofe dooretida hastamu mukulu asata Dawiti zaaridi shiishis.
2SA 6:2 Dawitinne iya asa ubbay Yihuda Baala katamaape dendidi, kiruubetape giddon ba kawotetha araata bolla uttida Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa sunthan xeegetida Xoossa Taabotiya ehanaw bidosona.
2SA 6:3 Enti Xoossa Taabotiya ooratha gaaren wothidi, dere huuphen de7iya Amnadaabe soope ehidosona. Amnadaabe nayti Oozinne Ahiyoy ooratha gaariya kaalethoosona.
2SA 6:4 Dere huuphen de7iya Amnadaabe soope Xoossa Taabotiya ehiya wode Ahiyoy Taabotiyape sinthara hemetees.
2SA 6:5 Dawitinne Isra7eele asa ubbay diithan, maasinqon, karaabon daalaninne shaashshoten kaa7ishe banta kumetha wolqan Godaa sinthan ufaytidi bonchoosona.
2SA 6:6 Naakoni katha bukiya wudumma gakiya wode boorati dhubetin, Oozi ba kushiya yeddidi, Xoossa Taabotiya oykis.
2SA 6:7 Oozi Taabotiya bochida gisho Godaa hanqoy iya bolla eexis. Xoossay iya shocin he bessan Xoossaa Taabotiya matan hayqis.
2SA 6:8 Godaa hanqoy Ooza shocida gisho Dawiti azzanis. He bessay hachi gakanaw Oozi shocetida bessaa geetetees.
2SA 6:9 He gallas Dawiti Godaa yayyida gisho “Godaa Taabotey taako waanidi yaanee?” yaagis.
2SA 6:10 Hessa gisho, I Godaa Taabotiya baara Dawita Katamaa ehanaw koybeenna. Hessa aggidi Gaate addiya Abidaara soo efis.
2SA 6:11 Godaa Taabotey Abidaara son heedzu ageena gam7is; Goday Abidaaranne iya soo asaa ubbaa anjis.
2SA 6:12 Xoossa Taabotiya gisho Goday Abidaara soo asaanne iyaw de7iya ubbaa anjidaysa kawoy Dawiti si7is. Hessa gisho, Dawiti Abidaara soo bidi, Xoossa Taabotiya Dawita Katamaa ufaysan ehis.
2SA 6:13 Dawiti Godaa Taabotiya tookida asati usupuna tango tangida wode enta essidi, issi kormanne issi anqara mari yarshis.
2SA 6:14 Dawiti liinope oosetida efuude ma7idi, baw de7iya wolqa ubban Godaa sinthan duris.
2SA 6:15 Dawitinne Isra7eele asa ubbay ufaysan ililishenne moyze punnishe Godaa Taabotiya Dawita Katama ehidosona.
2SA 6:16 Godaa Taabotey Dawita Katama geliya wode Saa7ola na7iya Melkoola maskootera xeellada, kawoy Dawiti Godaa sinthan gupishininne durishin be7ada ba wozanan kadhasu.
2SA 6:17 Dawiti Godaa Taabotiya wothanaw tolida dunkaaniya giddon Taabotiya wothin, Dawiti xuussa yarshonne issifetetha yarsho Godaas yarshis.
2SA 6:18 Dawiti xuussa yarshonne issifetetha yarsho yarshidaape guye Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa sunthan asaa anjis.
2SA 6:19 Isra7eele asa ubbaas, maccas addes huuphen huuphen issi issi uythi, issi issi qanxo ashonne issi issi woyne nuka gishis. Hessafe guye asa ubbay ba soo soo simmis.
2SA 6:20 Dawiti ba soo asaa anjanaw soo simmida wode Saa7ola na7iya Melkoola iya mokanaw keyada, “Pathonna asati kallo hemeteysada hachi Isra7eele kawoy ba macca aylleta sinthan kallotidi ay mela bonchetide!” yaagasu.
2SA 6:21 Dawiti, “Ne aawapenne iya soo asape aathidi ba asaa Isra7eele kaalethana mela tana doorida Godaa sinthan duras. Taani Godaa bonchoos dursa aggike.
2SA 6:22 Taani haysafe aathada buroo tana toochana; tanatethaa ziqi oothana. Shin neeni gida macca aylleta sinthan ta bonchetana” yaagis.
2SA 6:23 Saa7ola na7iya Melkoola hayqana gakanaw na7a yelabuuku.
2SA 7:1 Kawoy ba gadhon wopu gidi uttidaapenne Goday iya yuushuwan de7iya iya morketape shempisidaape guye,
2SA 7:2 nabiya Naatanako, “Taani zigape keexetida keethan de7ayis, shin Xoossa Taabotey dunkaanen de7ees” yaagis.
2SA 7:3 Naatani, “Oothanaw ne wozanan qopidaba ubbaa ootha; Goday neera de7ees” yaagis.
2SA 7:4 Shin he qamma Godaa qaalay Naatanako yidi,
2SA 7:5 “Bada ta aylliya Dawita haysada yaaga; ‘Taani daana keethaa keexanay nena gidaka.
2SA 7:6 Taani Isra7eeleta Gibxe biittafe kessida wodepe doomada hachi gakanaw keethan de7abike; taani dunkaanen yaanne haanne yuuyashe de7as.
2SA 7:7 Taani Isra7eele asaara yuuyida bessa ubban ta asa Isra7eele heemmana mela taani shuumida asaa, “Taw ziga mithan ayis keethe keexabikii?” gada oychabike’ yaagis.
2SA 7:8 “Hiza, ta aylliya Dawitas oda; ‘Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday neeko haysada yaagees; taani nena hentha bessafe, dorse heemmiya soope denthada ta asaa Isra7eele kaalethana mela oothas.
2SA 7:9 Neeni bida bessa ubban taani neera gidas; ne morketa ubbaa ne sinthafe dhaysas. Ha77i zaarada taani ha sa7an eretida gita asatada ne sunthaa gitayana.
2SA 7:10 Taani ta asaa Isra7eeles besse immada, enta he bessan tokana. Enti banta bessan daana; nam7antho dagammokona. Kase daynnata wodepe doomidi hanidaysada hizape guye enta iita asi haarenna.
2SA 7:11 Taani nena ne morketa ubbaafe shempisana. “ ‘Hessa bolla gujidi Goday ba huuphen taani new keethe keexana yaagidi odis.
2SA 7:12 Ne barey wurin, hayqada ne mayzata ne gakiya wode ne gulbatape keyida na7a taani denthana; iya kawotethaa minthana.
2SA 7:13 Ta sunthaas keethe keexanay iya; taani iya araata merinaw mintha essana.
2SA 7:14 Taani iyaw aawa gidana; ika taw na7a gidana. I baliya wode taani iya asa xam7an, asi shociya lisson seerana.
2SA 7:15 Shin taani ne sinthafe diggida Saa7olape ta keehatethay eketidaysada iyape kumthi eketenna.
2SA 7:16 Ne kochatinne ne kawotethay ta sinthan merinaw daana; ne araatay merinaw minnidi eqana’ ” yaaga.
2SA 7:17 Naatani Goday iyaw qoncethan bessida qaala ubbaa Dawitas odis.
2SA 7:18 Hessafe guye, kawoy Dawiti giddo gelidi Godaa sinthan uttidi haysada yaagidi woossis. “Abeeti ta Godaa xoossaw, hachi gakanaw neeni haysa ubbaa oothanaw ta oonee? Ta soo asayka aybee?
2SA 7:19 Abeeti ta Godaw, Xoossaw, haysi ne ayfe sinthan guutha daanin, sinthafe ne aylliya kochatas oothanaba odadasa. Ta Godaa Xoossaw, neeni asara odetiya ogey haysee?
2SA 7:20 “Haysafe aadhiyaba taani, Dawiti ay gaanaw danda7iyana? Ta Godaa Xoossaw, neeni tana ne aylliya eraasa.
2SA 7:21 Neeni ne qaala gisho, ne wozanaa qofaada ha gitaba oothada tana ne aylliya bessadasa.
2SA 7:22 “Abeeti Ta Godaa Xoossaw, neeni gita. Ne meli baawa; nuuni nu haythan si7idaysada neepe attishin, hara xoossi baawa.
2SA 7:23 Ne ase oothanaw Gibxefe wozida ne asaa Isra7eele daaniya hara kawotethi sa7a bolla baawa. Neeni entaw oothida gitanne malaalsiya oosota gaason ne sunthay biittan eretis. Neeni ne asa sinthafe hara kawotethatanne enta xoossata goodda kessadasa.
2SA 7:24 Ne asaa Isra7eele merinaw nebaa oothadasa; minthadasa. Abeeti Godaw, ne enta Xoossa gidadasa.
2SA 7:25 “Abeeti ta Godaw, Xoossaw, neeni ne aylliyasinne iya keethaas oothana gada gelida qaala merinaw naaga; ne qaalatho ootha.
2SA 7:26 Hessan ne sunthay merinaw gita gidana. Asay nena, ‘Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday Isra7eele Xoossaa’ yaagana. Ne aylliya Dawita kochatika ne sinthan minnidi eqana.
2SA 7:27 “Abeeti Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaw, Isra7eele Xoossaw, neeni, ‘Ne kochati merinaw kawotana’ yaagada taw ne aylliyas caaqadasa. Hessa gisho, taani ne aylley ha woosa woossanaw xaalas.
2SA 7:28 Abeeti Ta Godaa Xoossaw, neeni Xoosse! Ne qaalay tuma; neeni ha lo77obata oothana gada taw ne aylliyas odadasa.
2SA 7:29 Ne sinthan merinaw daana mela ne aylliya kochaa anja. Abeeti Ta Godaa Xoossaw ne gidaysada ne anjiko ne aylliya keethay merinaw anjetana” yaagidi woossis.
2SA 8:1 Hessafe guye, kawoy Dawiti Filisxeemeta xoonidi haaris; yaatidi Meteg-Ama katamaa Filisxeemeta kushepe ekis.
2SA 8:2 Dawiti qassi Moo7abeta xoonis. I enta biittan zin7isidi kushen wadhis; entafe nam7u kushiya wodhidi, heedzantho kushiya paxa aggis. Yaatin Moo7abeti Dawitas haaretidi giiridosona.
2SA 8:3 Rehooba na7ay, Suubba kawoy, Adraazari Efraxiisa shaafa matan de7iya ba zawa zaaranaw bida wode Dawiti iya olidi xoonis.
2SA 8:4 Dawiti iya asaape issi mukulunne laapun xeetu para asatanne laatamu mukulu toho asata di77is. Dawiti gaareta goochanaw xeetu parata ashshidi hara parata ubbaas gaadiya gildayis.
2SA 8:5 Damasqon de7iya Soore olanchoti Suubba kawa Adraazara maaddanaw yida wode Dawiti entafe laatamanne nam7u mukulu asaa wodhis.
2SA 8:6 Dawiti Soore kawotethan, Damasqon, olanchotas miixa medhis. Yaatin Soore asay Dawitas haaretidi giiridosona. Dawiti bida bessaa ubban Goday iyaw xoono immis.
2SA 8:7 Adraazara toora moconati oykiya worqa gondalliya Dawiti ekidi Yerusalaame ehis.
2SA 8:8 Bexahanne Beroota geetetiya Adraazara katamatape kawoy Dawiti daro naase birata ekis.
2SA 8:9 Adraazara olanchota ubbaa Dawiti xoonidaysa Hamaata kawoy To7i si7is.
2SA 8:10 Dawiti Adraazara olidi xoonida wode Hadadizeri To7ara oletishe gam7ida gisho iya hashshu gaanawunne sarothanaw ba na7aa Yoraama Dawitako kiittis. Yoraami worqafe, birapenne naase biratape oosetida imotata Dawitas ehis.
2SA 8:11 Kawoy Dawiti kase giirisiya kawotethata ubbaafe ekida worqanne bira oothidaysada ha imotataka Godaas dummayis.
2SA 8:12 I xoonida kawotethati Edoome, Moo7abe, Amoone, Filisxeemenne Amaaleqa. Hessadaka Rehooba na7aa, Suubba kawa Adraazara ekida di7uwa Godaas dummayis.
2SA 8:13 Maxine zangaaran tammanne hospun mukulu Edoome asata Dawiti wodhidi simmidaape guye iya sunthay keyis.
2SA 8:14 Dawiti Edoome biittan olanchota miixa medhis; he biittay Dawitas haaretis. Dawiti bida bessa ubban Goday iyaw xoono immis.
2SA 8:15 Dawiti Isra7eele ubbaa bolla kawotis; ba asa ubbaa xillotethaninne suure pirdan aysis.
2SA 8:16 Xaruya na7ay Iyo7aabi tora mocona gidishin, Ahiluda na7ay Iyosaafexi taarike xaafe.
2SA 8:17 Ahixuuba na7ay Saadoqinne Abyataara na7ay Abimeleke kahine gidishin, Sarayi qassi xaafe.
2SA 8:18 Yoodahe na7ay Banayasi kawa naageysata halaqa gidishin, Dawita adde nayti kawa zoreyisata.
2SA 9:1 Dawiti, “Yoonatana gisho taani iyaw keehatethi oothanaw Saa7ola keethafe attida asi de7isha?” yaagidi oychis.
