2SA 9:2 He wode Siiba geetetiya issi aylley Saa7ola son de7ees. I Dawita sinthe yaana mela xeegin, kawoy, “Neeni Siibee?” yaagidi oychis. Siibi, “Ee, taani ne aylliya Siiba” yaagis.
2SA 9:3 Kawoy, “Xoossa keehatethi taani bessaana mela Saa7ola keethafe attida asi baawee?” yaagis. Siibi, “Nam7u tohoy silida Yoonataana naytape issoy hanno gakanaw paxa de7ees” yaagis.
2SA 9:4 Kawoy, “I awun de7ii?” yaagis. Siibi, “Lodobaara geetetiya bessan Ami7eela na7aa Makira son de7ees” yaagis.
2SA 9:5 Kawoy Dawiti Lodobaarape Ami7eela na7aa Makira soope Mempiboste ehisis.
2SA 9:6 Saa7ola na7aa Yoonataana na7ay Mempibostey Dawitako yidi, Dawita sinthan ziggidi bonchis. Dawiti, “Mempiboste” yaagidi xeegis. I, “Abe ta godaw, ta ne aylliya” yaagis.
2SA 9:7 Dawiti, “Yayyofa; ne aawa Yoonataana gisho taani new keehana. Ne aawa aawa Saa7ola gadiya ubbaa taani new zaarana; qassi neeni ubba wode ta gaytape maana” yaagis.
2SA 9:8 Mempibostey ziggidi, “Hayqida kana daaniya tana neeni wudada xeellanaw ne aylley taani oonee?” yaagis.
2SA 9:9 Kawoy Saa7ola aylliya Siiba xeegidi, “Saa7olabaanne iya soo asaaba gididaba ubbaa taani ne godaa na7aa na7aas immas.
2SA 9:10 Ne godaa na7aa na7ay maana mela neeni, ne naytinne ne aylleti iya gadiya goyidi, kaxida kathaa iyaw ehite. Gidoshin, ne godaa na7aa na7ay Mempibostey ubba wode ta gaytape maana” yaagis. Siibas tammanne ichashu adde naytinne laatamu aylleti de7oosona.
2SA 9:11 Siibi, “Neeni ta goday, kawoy ne aylliya kiitida ubbaa taani ne aylley oothana” yaagis. Hessa gisho, Mempibostey kawa naytape issuwa mela kawo gaytape mees.
2SA 9:12 Mempibostes Mika geetetiya guutha na7i de7ees. Siiba son de7iya asa ubbay Mempibostes aylle gididosona.
2SA 9:13 Nam7u tohoti silida Mempibostey ubba wode kawa gaytape mishe Yerusalaamen de7is.
2SA 10:1 Hessafe guye, Amooneta kawoy hayqin iya na7ay Hanuni iya bessan kawotis.
2SA 10:2 Dawiti, “Iya aaway taw keehidaysada Na7oosa na7aa Hanunas taka keehana” yaagis. Hessa gisho, iya minthethanaw Dawiti ase iyako kiittis. Dawiti kiitida asay Amoone biitta gakida wode,
2SA 10:3 Amoone halaqati banta godaa Hanunako, “Dawiti ha asaa kiittiday ne aawa bonchidi nena minthethanaw koyida gisho daanii? I ase kiittiday ha katamaa wochi be7idi olanaasa” yaagidosona.
2SA 10:4 Hanuni Dawiti kiitida asata oykidi, enta buuchaafe baggaa meedis; enta ma7uwa garsafe dulle gakanaw qanxidi enta yeddis.
2SA 10:5 Dawiti hessa si7idi, enti yeellatida gisho, “Hinte buuchay diccana gakanaw Iyaarkon de7ishite; hessafe guye, haa yiite” yaagidi ase kiittis.
2SA 10:6 Amooneti Dawiti enta morkidaysa erida wode Beet-Rehoobanne Suubban de7iya Araame asaape laatamu mukulu toho olanchota, Xoobape tammanne nam7u mukulu asatanne Maka kawuwape issi mukulu asata shammidosona.
2SA 10:7 Dawiti hessa si7ida wode Iyo7aaba kumetha olanchotara enta bolla yeddis.
2SA 10:8 Amooneti keyidi, katamaa pengiyan olas salpidosona; Suubbafenne Rehoobape yida Araame asati, Xooba asatinne Maka asati denban dumma salpidosona.
2SA 10:9 Iyo7aabi bana oli sintharanne guyera teqidaysa be7idi, Isra7eele olanchotape minota dooridi Soore asata sinthan essis.
2SA 10:10 Attida asata ba ishaa Abisi kiittana mela oothidi Amooneta sinthan salpisis.
2SA 10:11 Iyo7aabi Abisako, “Soore asati ta bolla wolqaamiko ne yada tana maadda; Amoone asati ne bolla wolqaamiko ta bada nena maaddana.
2SA 10:12 Hiza minna! Nu asaa gishonne nu Xoossaa katamata gisho, ane minni oletoos. Goday bana lo77iyaba ootho” yaagis.
2SA 10:13 Iyo7aabinne iyara de7iya olanchoti Soore asata olanaw keyidosona; Soore asati iya sinthafe baqatidosona.
2SA 10:14 Soore asati baqatidaysa Amoone asati be7ida wode entika Abisa sinthafe baqatidi, katama gelidosona. Iyo7aabi Amooneta oleysa aggidi, Yerusalaame simmis.
2SA 10:15 Soore asati Isra7eele asay enta xoonidaysa erida wode banta olanchota ubbaa shiishidosona.
2SA 10:16 Kawoy Hadadizeri Soore asata Efraxiisa Shaafa hefinthafe kiittidi ehisin, Elama bidosona. Adraazara tora moconay Shobaaki enta kaalethees.
2SA 10:17 Dawiti hessa si7ida wode, Isra7eele olanchota shiishidi, Yordaanose shaafa pinnidi Elama gakis. Soore asati besse oykidi, giigidi, Dawitara oletidosona.
2SA 10:18 Shin Soore asati Isra7eeleta sinthafe baqatidosona. Dawiti Soore olanchotape para gaare laagiya laapun xeetu asatanne oytamu mukulu toho olanchota wodhis. Enta toora mocona Sobaakika he bessan shocetidi hayqis.
2SA 10:19 Adrazaras haaretidi de7iya kawoti Isra7eeleti enta xoonidaysa erida wode Isra7eeletara sigetidi, entaw haaretidosona. Hessafe simmin, Soore asati Amoone asata maaddanaw yayyidosona.
2SA 11:1 Laytha laamen kawoti olas keyiya wode Dawiti ba asaaranne Isra7eele olanchotara issife Iyo7aaba olas yeddis. Enti Amoone olidi, Raaba katamaa teqidosona. Shin Dawiti Yerusalaamen attis.
2SA 11:2 Issi gallas omarsi Dawiti ba hiixape dendidi, keethaa bolla de7iya bessaa keyidi hemetishe bolla meecetiya issi maccasi be7is; he maccasiya daro mala lo77o.
2SA 11:3 Dawiti iya ooneko eranaw koyidi ase kiittis. Kiitetida addey, “Iya Eliyaaba na7iw, Hite addiya Ooriyoona machiw Barsaabo” yaagis.
2SA 11:4 Dawiti ase kiittidi, iyo ehisis, iira aqis. He wode iya kushe metoy aadhin, geeyada de7awusu. Iya ba soo simmada basu.
2SA 11:5 Guyepe iya qanthatidaysa erida wode Dawitako, “New qanthatas” yaagasu.
2SA 11:6 Dawiti, “Hite addiya Ooriyoona haa yedda” yaagidi Iyo7aabako kiittis. Iyo7aabi Ooriyoona Dawitako yeddis.
2SA 11:7 Ooriyooni yin Dawiti, “Iyo7aabi ay melee? Olanchoti ay melee? Olay waanii?” yaagidi oychis.
2SA 11:8 Dawiti Ooriyoonako, “Soo bada shempa” yaagin, Ooriyooni kawo gadhope keyidi bis. Kawoy Ooriyoona guyera kathi yeddis.
2SA 11:9 Shin Ooriyooni soo boonna kawo gadho dirsa pengiyan ba godaa aylletara aqis.
2SA 11:10 Ooriyooni ba soo boonnaysa Dawiti si7idi, “Neeni haahosoope yadasa gidikii? Ne soo ayis babikii?” yaagidi oychis.
2SA 11:11 Ooriyooni Dawitako, “Taabotey, Isra7eele asay, Yihuda asay, ta halaqay Iyo7aabinne kawa asay denban dunkaanen de7oosona. Yaatin ta waanada soo bada mo, uyo, qassi ta machera waanada aqo? Ne shempoy ero! Taani haysa melaba oothike” yaagidi zaaris.
2SA 11:12 Dawiti, “Issi gallas haysan gam7a; wonto nena guye yeddana” yaagis. Ooriyooni he gallasinne wontetha gallas Yerusalaamen gam7is.
2SA 11:13 Dawiti shoobbin Ooriyooni iyara mis; I mathotana gakanaw Dawiti iya ushshis. Shin he wode omarsi Ooriyooni ba soo boonna, ba hiixa hiixidi ba godaa aylletara aqis.
2SA 11:14 Wontethe Dawiti Iyo7aabas dabdaabe xaafidi, Ooriyoona bolla yeddis.
2SA 11:15 Dawiti ba dabdaabiyan, “Ooriyoona olay goobiya bessan sintha bagga aatha. I shocetidi hayqana mela iya matape haakite” yaagis.
2SA 11:16 Iyo7aabi he katamaa teqida wode I eriya mino morke olanchoti de7iya bessan Ooriyoona essis.
2SA 11:17 Katamaa asati keyidi Iyo7aabara oletidosona. Dawita olanchotape guutha asati hayqidosona; Ooriyooni Hite addeyka hayqis.
2SA 11:18 Iyo7aabi olan hanidaba ubbaa Dawitas kiittis.
2SA 11:19 Iyo7aabi kiitetidi biya addiyako, “Olan hanidaba ne kawas oda wursida wode,
2SA 11:20 kawoy shenetidi, ‘Hinte entara oletanaw katamaako ayis shiiqidetii? Enti gimbiya bolla eqidi dongen dukanaysa ereketii?
2SA 11:21 Gediyoona na7ay Abimelekey waanidi hayqidaako akeekeketii? Mayde gimbiya bollara duge holada Tebesa geetetiya bessan wodhiday issi maccas gidekee? Yaatin, hinte gimbiyako ayis shiiqidetii?’ yaagidi oychiko, neeni, ‘Ne aylley, Hite addey Ooriyoonika hayqis’ ” yaaga.
2SA 11:22 Kiitetidaysi bidi Iyo7aabi kiittidaba ubbaa Dawitas odis.
2SA 11:23 Addey, “Nu morketi nuupe wolqaamidosona; nuura oletanaw katamaa gaxan de7iya demba bessaa keyidosona. Shin nu enta katama pengiya gakanaw guye zaaridi yedethida.
2SA 11:24 Hessafe guye, dongen dukeysati gimbiya bolla gididi ne aylleta dongen dukidosona. Kawaw, ne asatape guuthati hayqidosona; ne aylley, Hite addey Ooriyoonika hayqis” yaagis.
2SA 11:25 Dawiti kiitetidaysako, “Neeni Iyo7aabako haysada yaaga; ‘Toori gedeka haaka miya gisho haysas azzanopa; katamaa olada oykanaw minna’ yaagada iya minthetha” yaagis.
2SA 11:26 Ooriyoona machiya ba azinay hayqidaysa si7ida wode iyaw yeekasu.
2SA 11:27 Iya kayo wotha simmin, Dawiti kiittidi iyo ba soo ehis. Iya iyaw macho gidada adde na7a yelasu. Shin Dawiti oothida oosoy iita gidiya gisho Goday ufaytibeenna.
2SA 12:1 Goday nabiya Naatana Dawitako kiittin, Naatani iyako yidi, “Issi kataman nam7u asati de7oosona; entafe issoy dure; qassi hankoy manqo.
2SA 12:2 Dure addiyas daro dorsinne mehey de7ees.
2SA 12:3 Shin manqo addiyas shammidi heemmiya issi dorsa mareepe attishin, hari baawa. He dorsiya iya son iya naytara issife diccasu. I ba miya kathaafe muzees; ba uyaa ushshafe ushshees; iya iya ki7one zin7awusu. He dorsiya iyaw macca na7a mela.
2SA 12:4 “Issi gallas issi imathi duriya soo yis. Durey ba dorsaafe woyko ba mehepe shukidi, imathe mokanaw koybeenna. Shin I he manqo addiya dorsiw ekidi, he imathaas miyaba giigisis” yaagis.
2SA 12:5 Dawiti he dure addiya bolla shene eexidi, “De7o Goday eriya mela, haysa oothida addey hayqanaw bessees.
2SA 12:6 Qassi qadhey bayna I hessa oothida gisho, he dorsa mare gisho oyddu kushe zaaranaw koshshees” yaagis.
2SA 12:7 Naatani Dawitako, “He addey nena! Goday Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees; ‘Taani nena Isra7eele bolla tiyada kawothas; Saa7ola kushiyape nena ashshas.
2SA 12:8 Taani ne godaa, Saa7ola keethaa new immas; ne godaa macheta ne ki7on yeggas. Isra7eele asaanne Yihuda asaa taani new immas. Ha ubbay guuxis giiko, taani new haraa guja immanashin.
2SA 12:9 Haysa mela iitabaa Godaa sinthan oothada, ayis Godaa qaala kadhadii? Hite addiya Ooriyoona mashshan wodhadasa; iya machiw ne ekadasa. Amoone asata mashshan iya wodhadasa.
2SA 12:10 Neeni tana kadhada, Hite addiya Ooriyoona machiw ekida gisho ne soo asaape mashshi shaaketenna’ ” yaagees.
2SA 12:11 Goday haysada yaagees; “Taani ne soo asaa giddofe ne bolla iita ehana; ne macheta neeni xeellishin denthada, new matiya addiyas immana; seeta gallas he addey ne machetara zin7ana.
2SA 12:12 Neeni hessa geeman oothadasa; shin taani seeta gallas Isra7eele asa ubbaa sinthan oothana” yaagis.
2SA 12:13 Yaatin, Dawiti, “Taani Godaa bolla nagara oothas” yaagis. Naatani, “Goday ne nagaraa atto gis; neeni hayqaka.
2SA 12:14 Shin ne haysa oothada, Godaa morketi iya kadhana mela oothida gisho yeletida na7ay tuma hayqana” yaagis.
2SA 12:15 Naatani ba soo bidaape guye, Ooriyoona machiya Dawitas yelida na7aa Goday shocin I hargis.
2SA 12:16 Dawiti ba na7aa gisho Xoossaa woossis; Dawiti xoomis; ba kifiliya gelidi qamma qamma sa7an zin7i aqees.
2SA 12:17 Iya soo cimati iya sa7ape dendana mela iya matan eqidi woossidosona; shin I dendonna ixis; I entara kathi mibeenna.
2SA 12:18 Laapuntha gallas na7ay hayqis. Dawita aylleti na7aa hayquwa odanaw yayyidi, “Na7ay paxa de7ishin nuuni Dawita odisin, si7onna ixis. Yaatin, na7ay hayqidaysa nuuni waatidi iyaw odanee? Ooni eri, I bana qohanekoshii?” yaagidosona.
2SA 12:19 Ba aylleti issoy issuwara kalkasheysa Dawiti si7ida wode na7ay hayqidaysa eris. Dawiti, “Na7ay hayqidee?” yaagidi oychis. Enti, “Ee hayqis” yaagidosona.
2SA 12:20 Yaatin, Dawiti sa7ape dendidi meecetis; qibaate tiyetis; ba ma7uwa laammidi, Godaa keethi gelidi goyinnis. Hessafe guye ba soo bidi, kathi oychin, enti iya sinthe aathin mis.
2SA 12:21 Iya aylleti, “Neeni haysada ayis hanadii? Na7ay paxa de7ishin xoomadasanne yeekadasa; shin na7ay hayqin dendada, kathi madasa” yaagidosona.
2SA 12:22 Dawiti, “Na7ay paxa de7ishin taani xoomasinne yeekas; Goday tana maarin, na7ay paxanekonne” gada qopas.
2SA 12:23 Shin, “Na7ay hayqin, taani ayis xoomo? Taani na7aa guye zaaranaw danda7iyana? Taani iyako baana, I taako yeenna” yaagis.
2SA 12:24 Hessafe guye, Dawiti ba machiw Barsaabo minthethis. Dawiti iiko gelidi iira aqis; iya iyaw adde na7a yelasu. Na7aa Solomone gidi sunthis; Goday he na7aa dosis.
2SA 12:25 Goday na7aa dosida gisho, iya sunthaa “Yididiya” gidi sunthana mela nabiya Naatana kiittis.
2SA 12:26 He wode Iyo7aabi Amooneta katama Raaba olidi kawo miixaa oykis.
2SA 12:27 Iyo7aabi Dawitako, “Taani Raaba katama olada, haathe duuqiya bessaa oykas.
2SA 12:28 Ha77i attida olanchota shiishada katama olada oyka. Hessi hanonna ixiko, taani katamaa oykada ta sunthan xeegetana mela oothana” yaagis.
2SA 12:29 Dawiti ba olanchota ubbaa shiishidi, Raaba katama bidi, olidi oykis.
2SA 12:30 Enta kawa kallachaa iya huuphepe ekis. He worqa kallachay hastamanne ichashu kilo giraame deexees. Iya giddon inqo geetetiya al7o shuchi de7ees. He kallacha Dawiti huuphen wothis. Dawiti katamaape daro di7o di77is.
2SA 12:31 He kataman de7iya asaa kessidi, magaazen, birata konteninne birata kaltan oothana mela oothis. Qassi enti xuube medhana mela oothis. Amoone katama ubban de7iya asaa I haysada oothis. Hessafe guye, Dawitinne iya olanchoti Yerusalaame simmidosona.
2SA 13:1 Issi wode haysada hanis. Dawita na7aa Abeseloomes Timaaro geetetiya issi mala lo77o micha de7awusu. Dawita na7ay Amnooni Timaaro dosis.
2SA 13:2 Amnooni ba michiw Timaaro dosida gisho iyo qopishe daro gilqis. Iya geela7o gidida gisho iyo aykoka oothanaw danda7etonnaba iyaw daanis.
2SA 13:3 Shin Amnoonas Dawita ishaa Saama na7aa Iyonadaaba geetetiya laggey de7ees; Iyyonadaabi daro eca asi.
2SA 13:4 Iyyonadaabi, “Neeni kawo na7a gidashe wonta wonta ayis gilqay? Neeni taw ayis odikii?” yaagidi Amnoona oychis. Amnooni, “Ta ishaa Abeseloome michiw Timaaro taani dosas” yaagis.
2SA 13:5 Iyyonadaabi, “Hargetiya asada hanada hiixan zin7a. Ne aaway nena be7anaw yaa wode, ‘Ta michiya Timaara yada taw miyaba immo; taani iyo be7ishin ta sinthan kathada tana barso’ yaagada oycha” yaagis.
2SA 13:6 Amnooni hargetida asada hanidi hiixan zin7is. Kawoy iya be7anaw yaa wode Amnooni, “Ta michiya Timaara yada, ta be7ishin ta sinthan uythi uukada tana ba kushera barso” yaagis.
2SA 13:7 Dawiti, kawo gadhon de7iya Timaariko kiittidi, “Ne ishaa Amnoona soo bada iyaw kathi katha” yaagis.
2SA 13:8 Timaara ba ishaa Amnoona soo basu; he wode I hiixan zin7is. Timaara guutha dhiille munuqada Amnooni be7ishin uythi uukasu.
2SA 13:9 Timaara uythaa bashepe kessada iyaw aathasu; shin I moonna ixis. Amnooni, “Asa ubbaa kare kessite” yaagin, asa ubbay iya matape keyis.
2SA 13:10 Hessafe guye, Amnooni, “Taani ne kushepe maana mela kathaa haa qol7a ekada ya” yaagis. Timaara ba uukida uythaa ekada, ba ishaa Amnoona sinthe shiishasu.
2SA 13:11 Timaara kathaa iyako shiishiya wode iyo oykidi, “Ta miche, haaya! Taara zin7a” yaagis.
2SA 13:12 Iya, “Ta ishaw, akay hanenna! Tana wolqanthofa! Haysa melabay Isra7eelen hani erenna; haysa mela borsoba oothofa.
2SA 13:13 Ta pokuwa taani waatada genthanaw danda7iyana? Qassi neka Isra7eele giddon kawusha asi gidana. Hayyana kawa oycha; taani nena gelanaysa I diggenna” yaagasu.
2SA 13:14 Shin I iyo si7onna ixis. I wolqaama gidiya gisho, iyo wolqan oykidi iissis.
2SA 13:15 Hessafe guye, Amnooni iyo daro ixis; kase iyo dosidaysafe aathidi ixis. Amnooni, denda, “Keya! Keyada ba!” yaagis.
2SA 13:16 Iya, “Neeni tana keyada ba geysi kase ne ta bolla oothida iitaape aadhees” yaagasu. Shin I iyo si7onna ixis.
2SA 13:17 Amnooni ba aylliya xeegidi, “Ha maccasiw ta sinthafe kessa; iyo kare kessada wulaa gorda” yaagis.
2SA 13:18 Aylley iyo kare kessidi wulaa gordis. Geela7o gidida kawo macca nayti ma7iya alleeqo ma7o ma7asu.
2SA 13:19 Timaara bido ba huuphen qolada, ba ma7ida alleeqo ma7uwa daakada; ba huuphiya oykada, waaso goochashe basu.
2SA 13:20 I ishaa Abeseloomey iyo be7ida wode, “Ne ishay Amnooni nena iissidee? Ta miche, neeni ha77i si77i ga. I ne ishaa; ha odaa ne ulon oykofa” yaagis. Yaatin, Timaara azzanashe, asan keyonna ba ishaa Abeseloome son de7asu.
2SA 13:21 Kawoy Dawiti ha odaa si7ida wode daro yilotis.
2SA 13:22 Abeseloomey Amnoonako camma mal7a pogibeenna. Ba michiw Timaaro iissida gisho Amnoona morkis.
2SA 13:23 Nam7u laythafe guye, Efreema zawa matan Haxoora geetetiya bessane Abeseloomey dorsa ikise meedees. Kawa adde nayti ubbay he bessaa yaana mela Abeseloome enta xeegis.
2SA 13:24 Abeseloomey kawako bidi, “Taani ne aylley ta dorsata ikisiya meedisayis; nenne ne moorinnati nuura yedherketii?” yaagis.
2SA 13:25 Kawoy, “Akay, ta na7aw! Nu ubbay biiko, new tooho gidana” yaagis. Abeseloomey kawa daro shoobbinka kawoy boonna ixis; shin Abeseloome anjis.
2SA 13:26 Abeseloomey, “Neeni boonna ixiko, ta ishaa Amnooni nuura boo” yaagis. Kawoy, “I neera ayis bii?” yaagis.
2SA 13:27 Shin Abeseloomey shoobbidi aggonna ixin, Dawiti Amnoonanne ba adde nayta iyara yeddis.
2SA 13:28 Abeseloomey ba aylletako, “Amnooni woyne uyidi mathotiya wode taani hintena, ‘Amnoona shocite’ yaagada kiittiya wode iya wodhite. Yayyofite! Hintena kiittey tana. Minnite! Xaalite!” yaagidi kiittis.
2SA 13:29 Abeseloome aylleti I kiittidaysada Amnoona wodhidosona. Hessafe guye, kawa adde nayti ubbay dendidi, banta baquluwa baquluwa toggidi baqatidosona.
2SA 13:30 Enti buroo oge bolla de7ishin, “Abeseloomey kawa nayta ubbaa wursis; entafe issoyka attibeenna” geetetiya worey Dawita gakis.
2SA 13:31 Kawoy dendi eqidi, azzanidi, ba ma7uwa daakidi biittan zin7is. Iya aylleti ubbay banta ma7uwa daakidi, iya matan eqidosona.
2SA 13:32 Dawita ishaa Saama na7ay Iyyonadaabi, “Ta godaw, kawo nayti ubbay hayqidosona gada qopofa; Amnoona xalaali hayqis. Amnooni ba michiw Timaaro iissida gallasape doomin, Abeseloomey iya bolla oothanaw qopidabay hanis.
2SA 13:33 Hiza hayqiday Amnoona xalaala gidiya gisho, ‘Kawa adde nayti ubbay hayqidosona’ giya woriya kawoy tuma goopo” yaagis.
2SA 13:34 He wode Abeseloomey baqatis. Naagiya addey dhoqu gidi xeelliya wode wuloha baggara de7iya ogiyara dere lanqiya oykidi daro asay yeysa be7idi kawas odis.
2SA 13:35 He wode Iyyonadaabi, “Heko, taani ne aylley odidaysada kawa adde nayti yidosona” yaagis.
2SA 13:36 I odi wursiya wode kawa adde nayti gelidi banta qaala dhoqu oothidi waassidosona. Qassi kawoynne iya moorinnati ubbay yibbata yeeho yeekidosona.
2SA 13:37 Abeseloomey baqatidi, Geshura kawo gidida Amhuda na7aa Talmayako bis. Shin kawoy Dawiti ba na7aas daro gallas yeekis.
2SA 13:38 Abeseloomey baqatidi Geshura biitta bidaape guye yan heedzu laythi de7is.
2SA 13:39 Kawoy Dawiti Amnoona hayquwan gakida azzaniyape minnida gisho, Abeseloome be7anaw laamotis.
2SA 14:1 Xaruya na7ay Iyo7aabi Kawoy Dawiti Abeseloome laamotidaysa eris.
2SA 14:2 Hessa gisho, Iyo7aabi Tequhe katamaa kiittidi, issi cinca maccas ehisis. Iiko, “Neeni kayotiya asada hana; kayo ma7o ma7a; qibaate tiyettofa; daro wodepe doomidi, hayqida asas kayotiya maccasada hana.
2SA 14:3 Kawako bada ha qaala iyaw oda” yaagis. Iyo7aabi iya kawas odanaba iw odis.
2SA 14:4 Tequhe maccasiya kawako bada biittan gufannada, “Kawaw, tana maaddarki!” yaagasu.
2SA 14:5 Kawoy, “Nena aybe metiday?” yaagidi oychis. Iya, “Taani azini hayqida maccas.
2SA 14:6 Taw ne ayllees nam7u adde nayti de7oosona. Enti issoy issuwara denban wadhetidosona; enta shaakanaw asi dhayin, issoy issuwa shocidi wodhis.
2SA 14:7 Ta dabboti ubbay ta bolla dendidi, ‘Ba ishaa I wodhida gisho nuuni iya wodhana mela ba ishaa wodhida uraa nuus hamma; yaatidi nuuni laattiya asi dhaysana’ yaagidosona. Enti taw laatas attida issi duncha toysoosona; ta azinaa sunthaanne iya kochaa biittafe dhaysoosona” yaagasu.
2SA 14:8 Kawoy maccaseeko, “Ne soo ba; ta ne gisho kiittana” yaagis.
2SA 14:9 Shin Tequhe maccasiya, “Ta godaw, kawaw, gomey tananne ta aawa soo asaa oyko; shin kawoynne iya araatay geeshshi gido” yaagasu.
2SA 14:10 Kawoy, “Ne bolla doona pogiya oonaka taako eha; I nena nam7antho bochenna” yaagis.
2SA 14:11 Maccasiya, “Suuthu zaariya uray qoho bolla qoho ehonadanne ta na7aaka wodhonnaada kawoy Godaa, ba Xoossaa sunthan taw caaqo” yaagasu. Kawoy, “De7o Goday eriya mela, ne na7aa binaanape issoyka sa7an wodhenna” yaagis.
2SA 14:12 Maccasiya zaarada, “Ta godaw, ta kawaw, ta issiba odeto” yaagasu. Kawoy, “Haasaya” yaagis.
2SA 14:13 Maccasiya, “Yaatin, neeni Xoossa deriya bolla haysa mela qoho ayis oothadii? Kawoy dhayida ba na7aa guye zaaribeenna. Ba odida qaalan kawoy bala gidennee?
2SA 14:14 Nu ubbay hayqana; gukida haathi simmonnaysada nu simmoko. Shin Xoossay shempo dhayo dosenna; dogetida asi kumethi dhayonna mela iyaw oge giigisees.
2SA 14:15 “Tana asay yashisiya gisho ta godaa, kawas, haysa odanaw ha77i yas. ‘Taani ne aylliya, taani kawas odana; ooni eri, taani iya aylliya oychidaba kawoy oothonna aggenna.
2SA 14:16 Kawoy si7idi, Xoossay nuus immida laatape tananne ta na7aa dhaysanaw koyiya asaa kushepe ashshana’ gada qopas.
2SA 14:17 Hessadaka kawoy lo77onne iita shaakanaw Xoossa kiitancho mela gidiya gisho, ta godaa kawa qaalay tana shempiso. Goday, ne Xoossay neera gido” yaagasu.
2SA 14:18 Kawoy, “Taani nena oychana; neeni taape qottofa” yaagis. Maccasiya, “Ta goday, kawoy odeto” yaagasu.
2SA 14:19 Kawoy maccasiw, “Haysa ubban Iyo7aaba kushey neera de7ii?” yaagidi oychis. Maccasiya, “Ta godaw, kawaw, ne shempoy ero! Neeni ta goday, kawoy, odida ubbaafe ushachi woyko haddirsi gaanaw danda7iya asi baawa. Ee, haysa tana kiittiday, ne aylle doonan haysa wothiday ne aylliya Iyo7aaba.
2SA 14:20 Ne aylley Iyo7aabi haysa oothiday ha77i de7iya hanota laammanaasa. Kawaw, new Xoossa kiitancho mela cinca gidiya gisho biittan haniyaba ubbaa eraasa” yaagasu.
2SA 14:21 Kawoy Iyo7aabako, “Lo77o! Taani haysa oothana! Bada he na7atetha Abeseloome ekada ya” yaagis.
2SA 14:22 Iyo7aabi kawa sinthan gufannidi, “Ta godaw, kawaw, ba aylley oychidaba oothanaw ero gida gisho, ne sinthan saba demmidaysa ne aylley hachi eris” yaagis.
2SA 14:23 Hessafe guye, Iyo7aabi dendidi Geshura bidi Abeseloome Yerusalaame ekidi yis.
2SA 14:24 Shin kawoy, “Abeseloomey ba soo baanaw bessees; I ta som7on keyopo” yaagis. Abeseloomey ba soo bis; kawa som7uwa be7ibeenna.
2SA 14:25 Isra7eele giddon mala lo77otethan Abeseloome mela sabetida asi baawa. Huuphepe toho gakanaw iyan boriyabay baawa.
2SA 14:26 I bana deexiya wode ba huuphiya qanxisees. Ba huuphiya qanxisiya wode ubban mizaanen mazzanees; iya binaanay kawo mizaane liken nam7u kilo giraamepe aadhees.
2SA 14:27 Abeseloomes heedzu adde na7inne issi macca na7i yeletidosona; macca na7e sunthay Timaaro; iya mala lo77o na7a.
2SA 14:28 Abeseloomey nam7u laythi kumethi kawa som7o be7onna Yerusalaamen de7is.
2SA 14:29 Abeseloomey, “Taani nena kawako kiittanaw koyiya gisho taako haaya” yaagidi Iyo7aabako kiittis; shin Iyo7aabi yoonna ixis. Nam7antho kiittis; shin Iyo7aabi ha77ika yoonna ixis.
2SA 14:30 Abeseloomey ba aylletako, “Heko, ta gadiya matan Iyo7aabas gadey de7ees; iyan bangi de7ees. Bidi iyan tama yeddite” yaagis. Abeseloome aylleti Iyo7aaba bangan tama yeddidosona.
2SA 14:31 Iyo7aabi Abeseloome soo bidi, “Ne aylleti ta bangan ayis tama yeddidonaa?” yaagidi oychis.
2SA 14:32 Abeseloomey, “Ta xeegin ne yoonna ixida gishosa. Neeni kawako bada, ‘Taani Geshurape ayis yadina? Taani hanno gakanaw yan de7idaako lo77oshin’ yaagees gada taw oychana mela koyas. Ha77i taani kawa som7o be7anaw koyayis; taani bala gidiko, I tana wodho” yaagis.
2SA 14:33 Iyo7aabi kawako bidi, Abeseloomey gidaysa odis. Kawoy Abeseloome xeegisis; Abeseloomey soo gelidi, kawa sinthan gufannidi ziggis; kawoy Abeseloome yeeris.
2SA 15:1 Hessafe guye, Abeseloomey issi para gaare, paratanne ba sinthan woxanaw ishatamu asata giigisis.
2SA 15:2 Abeseloomey guura dendidi, katamaa pengiyan eqees. Mootoy de7iya ay asika kawa sinthe pirdas biya wode Abeseloomey xeegidi, “Neeni awu katamape yay?” yaagidi oychees. He uray, “Ta ne aylley Isra7eele zare issuwafe yas” yaagidi iyaw zaarees.
2SA 15:3 Abeseloomey, “Heko, ne oday lo77onne suure; shin kawa baggafe nena si7anay baawa” yaagees.
2SA 15:4 Abeseloomey gujidi, “Ta Isra7eele bolla pirdanaw shuumetidaba gidarkinashin. Hessi hanidaako, mootoy woyko odi de7iya oonika taako yin, taani iyaw suure pirda pirdanashin” yaagees.
2SA 15:5 Oonika iyako yidi iyaw ziggiya wode Abeseloomey ba kushiya yeddidi he addiya oykidi yeerees.
2SA 15:6 Pirdetanaw kawako yaa Isra7eele ubbaas Abeseloomey hessada hanidi Isra7eele asaa wozanaa ekis.
2SA 15:7 Oyddu laythafe guye, Abeseloomey, “Taani Godaas qangida qangetha gathanaw Kebroona baana.
2SA 15:8 Taani ne aylley Soore biittan Geshura kataman de7ashe, ‘Tana Goday Yerusalaame guye zaariko, Godaas goyinnana’ yaagada qangas” yaagis.
2SA 15:9 Kawoy, “Saro ba” gin, I dendidi Kebroona katamaa bis.
2SA 15:10 Shin Abeseloomey Isra7eele zare ubbaas qosan kiita yeddidi, “Moyze puno hinte si7ida wode, ‘Abeseloomey Kebroonan kawotis’ yaagite” yaagis.
2SA 15:11 Abeseloomey xeegin, Yerusalaamepe iyara bida asata tayboy nam7u xeeta. Enti he hanotaba aykoka eronna ashketethan bidosona.
2SA 15:12 Abeseloomey yarsho yarshiya wode Dawita zoriya asaape issuwa Akxoofela Gilo katamaape xeegisis. Kawa bolla dendida maqoy goobis; Abeseloome kaalliya asaa tayboy guji guji bis.
2SA 15:13 Issi kiitetida asi yidi Dawitako, “Isra7eele asaa wozanay Abeseloomera de7ees” yaagis.
2SA 15:14 Dawiti baara Yerusalaamen de7iya ba moorinnatako, “Dendite! Nuuni baqatoos! Yaanona ixiko, nu giddofe ay asika Abeseloomepe kessi ekenna. Nuuni ellesidi baanaw koshshees; hankoode, I ellesi yidi nuna dhaysana; nu katama mashshan buthana” yaagis.
2SA 15:15 Kawa moorinnati, “Nu goday, kawoy doorida ubbaa nuuni ne aylleti oothanaw giigidi uttida” yaagidosona.
2SA 15:16 Kawoy keydi tohora bis; iya soo asaynne iya moorinnati ubbay iyara bis; shin ba gadhuwa naagana mela tammu laggethota son ashshis.
2SA 15:17 Kawoy keyin asa ubbay iyara haahon de7iya issi keetha matan eqidosona.
2SA 15:18 Iya asati ubbay iyape sinthara salpidi aadhidosona; enta kaallidi kawa naageysati salpidosona. Qassi enta kaallidi Gaate katamaape yida usupun xeetu asati, kawa sinthara salpidi aadhidosona.
2SA 15:19 Kawoy Gaate addiya Itayako, “Neeni nuura ayis yay? Guye simmada, kawa Abeseloomera de7aasha. Neeni asa biitta asi; ne di7etada yida asi.
2SA 15:20 Neeni zine yadasa; taani ta huuphen biya soo eronna de7ashe, nena waatada daaburso? Guye simma; ne biitta asi neera efa. Goday new keehonne ammaneto!” yaagis.
2SA 15:21 Shin Itayi, “De7o Goday eriya mela, ta goday kawoy eriya mela, ta goday kawoy de7iya awunka, paxan gidin hayqon taani ne aylley neepe shaaketike” yaagis.
2SA 15:22 Dawiti, “Lo77o! Ba, aadha” yaagis. Gaate addey Itayi asaaranne naytara asa ubbaara bis.
2SA 15:23 He asa ubbay biya wode he biitta asay banta qaala dhoqu oothidi yeekidosona. Kawoy Qediroona zangaara pinnis; asa ubbay mela biittako simmidi bis.
2SA 15:24 Kahiney Saadoqi he bessan de7ees; Xoossa caaqo Taabotiya tookiya Leewetinne kahiniya Abyataari yan de7oosona. Asa ubbay katamaape keyidi wurana gakanaw Xoossa Taabotiya sa7an shempisidosona.
2SA 15:25 Hessafe guye, kawoy Saadoqako, “Xoossa Taabotiya katama guye zaara. Goday tanan ufaytiyaba gidiko, issi gallas guye zaaridi ba Taabotiyanne ba keethaa bessaana.
2SA 15:26 Shin i, ‘Nenan ufaytike’ giiko, I bana lo77iyaba ootho; taani giigeta uttas” yaagis.
2SA 15:27 Qassi kawoy kahiniya Saadoqako, ane akeeka “Neeni ne na7aa Akmaasanne Abyataara na7aa Yoonataana ekida katamaa saro ba.
2SA 15:28 Hinte taw kiittana gakanaw taani mela biittan de7iya shaafa pinuwan de7ashshana” yaagis.
2SA 15:29 Hessa gisho, Saadoqinne Abyataari Xoossa Taabotiya Yerusalaame guye efidi yan de7idosona.
2SA 15:30 Shin Dawiti yeekishe Shamaho deriya bolla keyis. I azzanon ba huuphiya guuluntidi mela tohon hemetis; iyara de7iya asati guuluntidi yeekishe pude keyidosona.
2SA 15:31 Akxoofeli Abeseloomera maqetidaysa Dawiti si7ida wode “Godaw, Akxoofela zoriya eeyatethi laamma” yaagidi woossis.
2SA 15:32 Dawiti asay Xoossaa goyinniya zumaa huuphe gakida wode, Arkaya addiya Kuussi ba ma7uwa daakidi, ba huuphiyan baana qolidi, Dawitara gahetanaw yis.
2SA 15:33 Dawiti, “Neeni taara biiko taw tooho gidana.
2SA 15:34 Shin neeni katamaa guye simmada Abeseloomeko, ‘Kawaw, haysafe kase taani ne aawa aylle gididaysada ha77i newuka aylle gidana’ yaagiko, Akxoofela zoriya laallada tana maaddana.
2SA 15:35 Kahineti Saadoqinne Abyataari neera yan de7oosona gidokona? Neeni kawo gadhon si7iyaba ubbaa entaw oda.
2SA 15:36 Saadoqa na7aa Akmaasinne Abyataara na7aa Yoonataani yan entara de7oosona; neeni si7iyaba ubbaa enta bolla taw kiitta” yaagis.
2SA 15:37 Abeseloomey Yerusalaame gelishin, Dawita laggey Kuussi katama gakis.
2SA 16:1 Dawiti deriya huuphiyara hefinthi aadhishin, Siiba geetetiya Mempiboste aylley iyara gahetis. Nam7u xeetu uythu, issi xeetu zabibe nuka, issi xeetu tiya ayfe, issi ogoro woyne ushshu nam7u haretan caanis.
2SA 16:2 Kawoy, “Haysa ayis ehadii?” yaagidi oychis. Siibi, “Hareta, kawa soo asay toggana mela, uythaanne tiyiya ayfiya asay maana melanne woyne ushshay bazzon daaburiya asati uyana melasa” yaagis.
2SA 16:3 Kawoy, “Ne godaa na7aa na7ay awun de7ii?” yaagidi oychis. Siibi, “ ‘Isra7eele asay ta aawa kawotethaa hachi taw zaari immana’ yaagidi Yerusalaamen uttis” yaagis.
2SA 16:4 Kawoy, “Mempibostes de7iyaba ubbay new gido” yaagis. Siibi, “Abeeti godaw, kawaw! Taani ne sinthan teemo demmayis” yaagidi biittan gufannida ziggayis.
2SA 16:5 Kawoy Dawiti Biraqima katama yaa wode Saa7ola dabbo gidida issi addey yaape keyis. Iya sunthay Geera na7aa Saami. I Dawita baaddishe keyis.
2SA 16:6 Olanchotinne kawa naageysati ushacharanne haddirsara Dawita teqidi de7ishin, Saami Dawita bollanne kawa moorinnata bolla shuchu holis.
2SA 16:7 Saami Dawita baaddishe, “Kicha; ha iitay kicha! Asa suuthu gussiya ha pathonaysi kicha.
2SA 16:8 Neeni Saa7ola bessan kawotadasa; neeni gussida Saa7ola soo asaa suutha ubbaa Goday ne bolla zaaris. Goday kawotethaa ne na7aa Abeseloomes immis; neeni suuthu gussida asi gidiya gisho, new dhayo wodey gakis” yaagis.
2SA 16:9 Hessafe guye, Xaruya na7ay Abisi, Kawako, “Ha bawuta kanay, ta godaa kawa ayis baaddii? Taani bada iya qoodhiya qanxana” yaagis.
2SA 16:10 Kawoy, “Hinteno, Xaruya nayto, hintera taara aybi gathii? Goday, ‘Dawita baadda’ yaagida gisho I baaddiyaba gidiko, ‘Neeni ayis hessa oothay?’ yaagidi oychanaw danda7ey oonee?” yaagis.
2SA 16:11 Hessafe guye, Dawiti Abisanne ba moorinnata, “Ta na7ay, ta ashoy, tana wodhanaw koyees; yaatin, ha Biniyaame addey waati aggane! Goday iya kiitida gisho I baaddees, iya bochofite.
2SA 16:12 Ooni eri, Goday ta metuwa be7idi, taani hachi ekiya baadetha gisho taw keeha qopaneeko” yaagis.
2SA 16:13 Hessafe guye, Dawitinne iya asay ogiya oykidi boosona. Saami zumaa miyara bishe Dawita baaddees; shuchu holees; iya bolla biitta laallees.
2SA 16:14 Kawoynne iyara de7iya asati banta biya bessa daaburidi gakin kawoy yan shempis.
2SA 16:15 Abeseloomeynne Isra7eele asa ubbay Yerusalaame gelidosona; Akxoofeli entara de7ees.
2SA 16:16 Dawita laggey Arkaya kochay Kuussi Abeseloomeko yidi, “Kawoy birata tuussu gido! Kawoy mukulu laythi kawoto!” yaagis.
2SA 16:17 Abeseloomey, “Neeni ne laggiya dosiya dosoy haysee? Ne laggiyara ayis babikii?” yaagis.
2SA 16:18 Kuussi, “Akay! Goday, ha asaynne Isra7eele asay dooridaysas taani aqana; taani iyara attana.
2SA 16:19 Hiza taani ta godaa na7aas oothonna ooddes oothanee? Taani ne aawas oothidaysada ha77i newuka oothana” yaagis.
2SA 16:20 Abeseloomey Akxoofelako, “Neeni ane nuna zora; nuuni ay oothino?” yaagis.
2SA 16:21 Akxoofeli, “Kawo gadho naaganaw son attida ne aawa laggethotara bada zin7a. Neeni ne aawa kawushidaysa Isra7eele asa ubbay si7ana; neera de7iya ubbaa kushey minnana” yaagis.
2SA 16:22 Kawo keethaa pooqiya bolla Abeseloomes dunkaane tokidosona; asa ubbay xeellishin Abeseloomey gelidi ba aawa laggethotara zin7is.
2SA 16:23 He wode Akxoofeli zoriya zorey issi asi Godaa oychidi ekiya zore mela. Dawitinne Abeseloomey Akxoofela zoriya hessada oothidi ekidosona.
2SA 17:1 Hessafe guye, Akxoofeli, “Hachi qamma taani tammanne nam7u mukulu asata doorada Dawita yedethada oykana.
2SA 17:2 I daaburidi wolqa dhayidi de7ishin taani iya bolla wodhana. Taani iya daganthana; yan iyara de7iya asa ubbay baqatiya wode taani kawa xalaala shocana.
2SA 17:3 Yaatada taani asa ubbaa neeko zaarana. Neeni issi asa xalaala wodhanaw koyaasa; hanko asay saro attana” yaagis.
2SA 17:4 Akxoofela zorey Abeseloomenne Isra7eele cimata ubbaa ufaysis.
2SA 17:5 Abeseloomey, “Qassi Arkaya kocha Kuussa xeegite; I giyaba ane si7oos” yaagis.
2SA 17:6 Kuussi iyako yida wode Abeseloomey, “Akxoofeli zorida zorey haysa; nuuni I giyaba oothanaw bessii? Bessonnaba gidiko, ne qofay aybee?” yaagis.
2SA 17:7 Kuusi, “Akxoofeli zorida zorey ha wodiyan lo77o gidenna.
2SA 17:8 Ne aawaynne ne aawa asati mino olanchota gideysanne ba marata bonqetida maahe mela yashsheyisata gideysa neeni eraasa. Ne aaway ola meezetida asi; I qamma ba olanchotara aqena.
2SA 17:9 I hannoode gongolo giddon woyko hara bessan qosetidi uttis. I hinte cugata koyrottidi qohiko, hessa si7ida oonika, ‘Abeseloome kaallidi bida asay shocetidosona’ yaagana.
2SA 17:10 Ne aaway toora qara gideysanne iyara de7iya asay mino gideysa Isra7eele asa ubbay eriya gisho, hari attoshin gaammoda minota wozanay til7ana.
2SA 17:11 “Shin taani nena zorey haysa; abba gaxan de7iya shafe mela darida, Daanepe Barsaabe gakanaw de7iya Isra7eele ubbaa neeko shiisha; yaatada neeni enta olas kaaletha.
2SA 17:12 Nuuni iya demmida bessa awunka shocana; aki sa7an wodhiyada nuuni iya bolla wodhana. Iya gidin woyko iyara de7iya asaa gidin issoyka paxa attenna.
2SA 17:13 I katamaa gelikoka, Isra7eele asa ubbay wodoro ehidi, katamaa giddon issi shuchi aggonna he katamaa goochidi zangaaran yeggana” yaagis.
2SA 17:14 Abeseloomeynne Isra7eele asa ubbay, “Arkaya kocha Kuussa zorey Akxoofela zoriyape lo77o” yaagidosona. Goday Abeseloome bolla iitabaa ehanaw qopidi gisho Akxoofela zoriya ekonnaada oothis.
2SA 17:15 Kuussi kahineta Saadoqanne Abyataara, “Akxoofeli Abeseloomenne Isra7eele cimata haysa haysa gidi zoris; taanika enta haysa haysa gada zoras.
2SA 17:16 Ha77i Dawitako eeson kiittidi, ‘Bazzon de7iya shaafa gaxan hachi qamma aqopa; hefinthi pinna kicha! Hessi hanonna ixiko, kawoynne iyara de7iya asa ubbay dhayana’ yaagidi odite” yaagis.
2SA 17:17 Yoonataaninne Akimaasi qoncen katamaa gelishin enta asi be7onna mela Aynogeela geetetiya bessan uttidi naagoosona. Issi macca aylliya yada entaw odin, enti bidi kawa Dawitas odoosona.
2SA 17:18 Shin issi panthay enta be7idi Abeseloomes odis. Hessa gisho, enti nam7ay he bessaafe eeson kichidi Biraqima kataman issi addiya soo gakidosona. He addiya soo matan haatha olli de7ees; enti he ollan gelidosona.
2SA 17:19 He addiya machiya oonika eronnaada ollaa doona kammada iya bolla kathi miccasu.
2SA 17:20 Abeseloome aylleti addiya soo yidi machiw, “Akmaasinne Yoonataani awun de7oona?” yaagidi oychidosona. Machiya, “Enti shaafa pinnidi bidosona” yaagasu. Enti koyin, bentonna ixin, Yerusalaame simmidosona.
2SA 17:21 He asati bidaape guye, nam7u asati ollafe keyidi, kawa Dawitas odanaw bidosona. Dawitako, “Akxoofeli hinte bolla haysa haysa oothana gidi zori wothida gisho eeson dendidi, shaafa pinnite” yaagidosona.
2SA 17:22 Dawitinne iyara de7iya asa ubbay Yordaanose pinnidi bidosona. Sa7i wontiya wode ubbay pinnidi wuridosona.
2SA 17:23 Akxoofeli ba zorey eketiboonaysa erida wode ba hariya kooridi ba de7iya katamaa bis. Akxoofeli ba soo giigisidi suletidi, hayqidi ba aawa duufon moogetis.
2SA 17:24 Abeseloomeynne iyara de7iya asa ubbay Yordaanose pinniya wode Dawiti Mahanayma katamaa gakis.
2SA 17:25 Abeseloomey ba olanchota bolla Iyo7aaba bessan Amasaya shuumis. Amasayi Isra7eele addiya Yotora na7a. Yotori Na7oosa na7iw, Iyo7aaba aayiw Xaruya michiw Abigiya ekis.
2SA 17:26 Isra7eeletinne Abeseloomey Galada biittan dunkaanidosona.
2SA 17:27 Dawiti Mahanayma katamaa gakiya wode Amoone biittan Raabape yida Na7oosa na7ay Shoobi, Lodobaara katamape yida Ami7eela na7ay Makirinne Orogalma katamape yida Galada addey Barziley,
2SA 17:28 hiixiyabata, keretanne shaateta ehidosona. Qassi enti giste, banga, dhiille, shaashshi, qom7olonne misire,
2SA 17:29 eessi, pila, meqa maathinne dorse Dawitinne iya asay maana mela ekidi yidosona. Hessa enti ehiday, “Asay bazzon koshatis, daaburis, saamotis” gidi qopida gishosa.
2SA 18:1 Dawiti baara de7iya asaa taybidi shaalaqatanne mato halaqata enta bolla shuumis.
2SA 18:2 Dawiti asa heedzu cugan shaakis; issi cugaa Iyo7aabi, nam7antho cugaa Iyo7aaba ishay, Xaruya na7ay Abisi, heedzantho cugaa Gaate addey Itayi kiittees. Kawoy asaako, “Tuma ta hintera issife baana” yaagis.
2SA 18:3 Shin asay, “Neeni baanaw bessenna! Nuuni baqatiyako enti nuna koyokona; hari attoshin nuupe baggay hayqiyakoka nubaa wuda gookona. Shin neeni ne xalaala tammu mukulupe daraasa. Hessa gisho, neeni kataman uttada nuus maado kiittiko lo77o” yaagis.
2SA 18:4 Kawoy, “Hintena lo77iyaba ta oothana” yaagis. Dawiti dirsa pengiya matan eqidi, asa ubbay xeetaninne mukulan salpidi keyishin be7is.
2SA 18:5 Kawoy Iyo7aaba, Abisanne Itaya, “Ta gisho gidi, he na7atetha addiya Abeseloome qohopite” yaagidi kiittis. Kawoy hessa halaqatas odiya wode olanchoti ubbay si7idosona.
2SA 18:6 Dawita olanchoti Isra7eeletara oletanaw Efreema woran salpidosona.
2SA 18:7 He bessan Dawita olanchoti Isra7eele olanchota xoonidosona. He gallas daro asi wuris, laatamu mukulu asi hayqis.
2SA 18:8 Olay gaxare ubbaa gakis; he gallas wori wursida asay mashshi wursida asaape daro.
2SA 18:9 Abeseloomey qoponna de7ishe Dawita asaara gahetis. Abeseloomey ba baquluwa toggidashin daashsha wola garsi baquloy gelin, Abeseloome huuphey mithan oyketis. I toggida baquloy iya tohuwa garsafe bin, Abeseloomey carko bolla kaqatidi attis.
2SA 18:10 Asaape issoy hessa be7idi, “Abeseloomey issi wola bolla kaqetidaysa ta be7as” yaagidi Iyo7aabas odis.
2SA 18:11 Iyo7aabi baw odida addiya, “Yee, be7as gay? Yaatin ayis iya wodhabikii? Ne hessa oothidaba gidiyako, taani new tammu bira santimenne issi saqe immanashin” yaagis.
2SA 18:12 Addey zaaridi, “Neeni mukulu bira santime ta kushen wothiyakoka taani kawa na7aa bolla ta kushiya denthike! Nuuni ubbay si7ishin, kawoy nena, Abisanne Itaya, ‘Ta gisho gidi, na7atetha Abeseloome qohopite’ yaagidi kiittis.
2SA 18:13 Taani kawa kiitta ixada Abeseloome wodhidaba gidiyako, kawoy ubbaa si7eysada hessa si7anaysi attenna. He wode neeni haaki eqiya asaape issuwa gidana” yaagis.
2SA 18:14 Iyo7aabi, “Taani neera odetashe wode wursike” yaagidi heedzu toora ekidi, Abeseloomey wolaa bolla kaqetidi, paxa de7ishin wozana ayfen caddis.
2SA 18:15 Iyo7aaba ola miishiya tookiya tammu asati Abeseloome yuushuwa teqidi iya shocidi wodhidosona.
2SA 18:16 Hessafe guye, Iyo7aabi olaa essanaw moyze punnin asay Isra7eeleta yedetheysa aggis.
2SA 18:17 Enti Abeseloome efidi woran de7iya gita ollan yeggidi, gita shuchu iya bolla dooridosona. He wode Isra7eele asa ubbay ba soo soo baqatis.
2SA 18:18 Abeseloomey paxa de7ishe, “Ta sunthan xeegetiya adde na7i taw baawa” yaagidi, bana qofisiya shuchu massida hawulte kawo zangaaran essidi he hawultiya ba sunthan xeegis. Hachi gakanaw he hawultey “Abeseloome hawultiya” geetetees.
2SA 18:19 Hessafe guye, Saadoqa na7aa Akimaasi Iyo7aabako, “Iya morketa kushepe Goday iya ashshida mishiraachuwa sissanaw taani kawako woxa bada odana” yaagis.
2SA 18:20 Iyo7aabi, “Akay! Hachi neeni mishiraacho odiya gallas gidenna; hara gallas odanaw danda7aasa. Kawa na7ay hayqida gisho hachi odanaw koshshenna” yaagis.
2SA 18:21 Iyo7aabi Tophe asi gidida issi addiya xeegidi, “Bada, ne be7idaba kawas oda” yaagis. He addey Iyo7aabas gufanni ziggidi woxis.
2SA 18:22 Saadoqa na7ay Akimaasi nam7antho Iyo7aabako, “Aybika hano; taani ha Tophe addiya geedo woxana” yaagis. Iyo7aabi, “Ta na7aw, new woytoy baynaban ayis woxanaw koyay?” yaagis.
2SA 18:23 Akimaasi, “Aybika hano; taani woxanaw koyayis” yaagis. Iyo7aabi, “Yaako woxa” yaagis. Hessa gisho, Akimaasi demba ogiya oykidi woxishe bidi Tophe addiya yeggidi aadhis.
2SA 18:24 Dawiti soo pengiyafenne kare pengiyafe giddon uttidashin, naagiya uray keethaa bolla keyidi, issi addey barka woxishe yeysa be7is.
2SA 18:25 Naagiya uray kawa xeegidi odis. Kawoy, “I barka de7iko, mishiraacho ekidi yees” yaagis. Woxiya addey entako matishe yis.
2SA 18:26 Naageysi hara woxiya asi be7idi pengiya naagiya addiyako, “Hara asika barka woxishe yees” yaagis. Kawoy, “Ha addeyka qassi mishiraacho ekidi yees” yaagis.
2SA 18:27 Naageysi, “Koyro addiya wothay Saadoqa na7aa Akmaasa wotha taw daanees” yaagis. Kawoy, “I lo77o asi; I lo77o odara yees” yaagis.
2SA 18:28 Akimaasi kawa xeegidi, “Ubbabay lo77o!” yaagis. Kawa sinthan gufanni ziggidi, “Ta godaa, kawa bolla banta kushiya denthida asata new aathidi immida Goday, ne Xoossay galatetto” yaagis.
2SA 18:29 Kawoy, “Na7atethay, Abeseloomey saro?” yaagidi oychis. Akimaasi, “Iyo7aabi tana kiittana haniya wode wolqaama waaso si7as, shin I aybeko taani erabike” yaagis.
2SA 18:30 Kawoy, “Yaa shiiqa eqa” yaagin I haakidi eqis.
2SA 18:31 Hessafe guye, Tophe addey gakidi, “Ta godaw, kawaw, ta new mishiraacho odayis! Ne bolla dendiya ubbaa kushepe Goday hachi nena ashshis” yaagis.
2SA 18:32 Kawoy Tophe addiyako, “Na7atetha addey Abeseloomey saro?” yaagidi oychis. Tophe addey, “Ta godaw, kawaw, ne morketinne ne bolla iitabaa oothanaw dendeysati ubbay he na7atetha addiyada hanona” yaagis.
2SA 18:33 Kawoy daro azzanis; pengiyafe qommo baggan de7iya keethaa gelidi yeekis. Kawoy, “Yii, ta na7aw Abeseloome taassa! Ta na7aw taassa! Ne gisho ta hayqarkina! Yii, ta na7aw Abeseloome taassa!” yaagidi yeekis.
2SA 19:1 Kawoy, “Ba na7aa Abeseloomes yeekesinne zeleeles” yaagidi Iyo7aabas odidosona.
2SA 19:2 Kawoy ba na7aas yeekeysa si7ida gisho, he gallas enti ubbay xoonida xoonoy yeehon laametis.
2SA 19:3 Olape baqatidi yeellan guye simmida olanchoda he gallas asay doona pogonna katama gelidosona.
2SA 19:4 Kawoy guuluntidi, ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Yii, ta na7aw Abeseloome! Yii, ta na7aw! Abeseloome yii!” yaagidi zeleelis.
2SA 19:5 Hessafe guye, Iyo7aabi kawa soo bidi, “Nena, ne adde nayta, ne macca nayta, ne machetanne ne laggethota ashshida ne asa ubbaa hachi neeni kawushadasa.
2SA 19:6 Nena ixeyisata neeni dosaasa; nena doseyisata neeni ixaasa. Ne olanchotinne enta halaqati new aykoka gidonnaysa neeni hachi qoncisadasa. Nuuni ubbay hayqin, Abeseloomey hachi paxa attidaako neeni ufaytanaysa ta be7as.
2SA 19:7 Ha77i denda! Kare keyada ne asaa minthetha. Ta Godaa sunthan caaqayis; neeni keyonna ixiko, hachi qamma neera issi asika attenna. Na7atethafe hachi gakanaw nena gakida iita ubbaafe haysi new aadhida iita gidana” yaagis.
2SA 19:8 Hessa gisho, kawoy dendidi pengiya matan uttis. Kawoy pengen uttidaysa asa ubbay si7ida wode kawako yidosona. He wode Isra7eele asa ubbay banta soo soo baqatidosona.
2SA 19:9 Isra7eele kochati ubbay issoy issuwara haysada yaagidi palamidosona; “Kawoy Dawiti nuna nu morketa kushepe ashshis; nuna Filisxeemeta kushepe wosisis; shin I ha77i Abeseloome gaason biitta aggidi baqatis.
2SA 19:10 Nu bolla kawotanaada nuuni tiyida Abeseloomey olan hayqis. Yaatin, kawa guye ehanaba hinte ayis si77i gidetii?” yaagidosona.
2SA 19:11 Kawoy Dawiti kahineta Saadoqanne Abyataara kiittidi, Yihuda cimatako haysada yaagis; “Isra7eele asa ubbay odetiya oday kawa gakis. Yaatin, kawa iya gadho zaari ehanaw hinte ayis guye atteetii?
2SA 19:12 Hinte ta ishata; hinte ta ashonne ta suuthu. Yaatin, kawa guye zaari ehanaw hinte ayis haratape guye atteetii?” yaagis.
2SA 19:13 Qassi Dawiti Amaasako, “Neeni ta ashonne ta suuthu gidikii? Hachife doomin, taani nena Iyo7aaba bessan ta tora mocona oothonna ixiko, Xoossi tana pirdo” yaagis.
2SA 19:14 I Yihuda asa ubbaa wozanaa issino oothidi shammis. Hessa gisho, enti kawako kiittidi, “Neera ne asaara ubbay haa simmite” yaagidosona.
2SA 19:15 Kawoy simmidi, Yordaanose shaafa gakanaw yis. Yihuda asay kawa Yordaanose shaafa pinthanaw Galgala bidosona.
2SA 19:16 Biraqima addey, Biniyaame kochay, Geera na7ay Saami Dawita mokanaw ellesidi Yihuda asaara bis.
2SA 19:17 Iyara Biniyaame koche gidida mukulu asay, Saa7ola aylley Siibi, tammanne ichashu iya naytinne laatamu aylleti iyara de7oosona. Enti kawoy de7iya bessaa Yordaanose shaafa dirgishe bidosona.
2SA 19:18 Kawa soo asaa ehanawunne kawa ufaysiyabaa oothanaw pinniya bessaara pinnidosona. Geera na7ay Saami Yordaanose shaafa pinnida wode kawa sinthan gufannidi,
2SA 19:19 “Kawaw ta nagaraa taybopa. Ta goday, kawoy, Yerusalaamepe keyiya wode taani ne aylley qohida qohuwa hassayopa. Hesaa ne ulon oykofa.
2SA 19:20 Ne aylley taani nagara oothidaysa erayis; shin ta godaa, kawa mokanaw Yoosefa soo asa ubbaafe koyrottada taani hachi yas” yaagis.
2SA 19:21 Xaruya na7ay Abisi, “Saami Goday tiyida kawa baaddida gisho hayqanaw besseneyee?” yaagis.
2SA 19:22 Dawiti Abisako, “Hinteno, Xaruya nayto, hintena gathiyabay aybee? Hinte hachi taw morke gideeti! Hachi Isra7eelen ay asika hayqenna! Hachi Isra7eele kawoy tana!” yaagis.
2SA 19:23 Kawoy Saami, “Ne hayqaka” yaagidi caaqis.
2SA 19:24 Qassi Saa7ola na7ay Mempibostey kawa mokanaw duge wodhis. Kawoy bida gallasape doomidi I saron guye simmiya gallas gakanaw Mempibostey ba tohuwanne ba ma7uwa meeccibeenna; ba buuchaa meedibeenna.
2SA 19:25 Mempibostey kawuwara gahetanaw Yerusalaamepe yida wode kawoy, “Mempiboste, neeni taara ayis babikii?” yaagidi oychis.
2SA 19:26 Mempibostey, “Ta godaw kawaw, taani ne aylley sila gidiya gisho ‘Taani toggada kawuwara baana mela ta hariya koora’ yaagas. Shin ta aylley Siibi tana cimmis.
2SA 19:27 Ta godaa, kawas wordo odidi ta sunthaa iissis. Neeni ta goday, kawoy Xoossa kiitancho mela gidiya gisho nena lo77idaba ootha.
2SA 19:28 Ta aawa soo asa ubbay hayqanaw bessees, shin taani ne aylley ne gaytape meysatara maana mela taw besse immadasa. Yaatin, hessafe aadhiyaba kawa oychanaw taw ay maati de7ii?” yaagis.
2SA 19:29 Kawoy zaaridi, “Neeni darobaa odetanaw koshshenna. Neera Siibara gadiya shaaketidi ekana mela kiittas” yaagis.
2SA 19:30 Mempibostey, “Ta goday, kawoy saro soo simmaafe attishin, ubbay Siibas gido” yaagis.
2SA 19:31 Galada addey Barziley kawuwara issife Yordaanose pinnidi iya moyzanaw Roogalimape yis.
2SA 19:32 Barziley laythi hospun tammu gidida cima asi. I daro dure gidiya gisho kawoy Mahanayma kataman de7iya wode kawas koshshiyaba immis.
2SA 19:33 Kawoy iyako, “Neeni taara Yerusalaame yedha; taani new koshshiyaba immana” yaagis.
2SA 19:34 Shin Barziley, “Taani hizape daro laythi de7ike; taani kawuwara Yerusalaame ayis boo?
2SA 19:35 Taani ha77i hospun tammu laytha asi; taani iitanne lo77o shaakada eranaw danda7iyana? Taani ne aylley ta miyabaanne uyaaba mal7uwa shaakada eranaw danda7iyana? Taani addenne macca yethi shaakada si7anaw danda7iyana? Yaatin, taani ne aylley, ta godaw kawaw ayis tooho gido?
2SA 19:36 Taani ne aylley nena Yordaanose pinthana. Shin kawoy taw kushe zaaranaw ayis koshshii?
2SA 19:37 Taani ta aawanne ta aaye duufuwa matan ta kataman hayqana mela simmayis. Ne aylley Kimihaami haysish; ta godaa, kawuwara I boo; nena ufaysiyabaa iyaw ootha” yaagis.
2SA 19:38 Kawoy, “Kimihaami taara pinno; nena ufaysiyabaa taani iyaw oothana. Qassi neeni tana oychiyaba ayba gidikoka taani new oothana” yaagis.
2SA 19:39 Hessafe guye, asa ubbay Yordaanose pinnidosona; kawoyka pinnis. Kawoy Barzile yeeridi anjis; Barziley ba soo simmis.
2SA 19:40 Kawoy Yordaanose pinnidi Galgala biya wode Kimihaami iyara issife bis. Yihuda olanchoti ubbaynne Isra7eele olanchotape baggati kawuwara bidosona.
2SA 19:41 Isra7eele ubbay kawako bidi, “Nu ishati, Yihuda asay kawanne iya soo asaa qosidi, iya asaara issife Yordaanose ayis pinthidona?” yaagidosona.
2SA 19:42 Yihuda asay, “Nuuni hessa oothiday kawoy nuus mata dabbo gidiya gishosa. Yaatin, hinte hessas ayis yilotetii? Nuuni kawuwape ayko mido? Woyko nuuni iyape ayko ekido?” yaagidosona.
2SA 19:43 Isra7eele asay, “Kawuwape tammu kushey nuusa; Dawita matan nuus hintefe aadho maati de7ees! Yaatin, hinte nuna ayis kadhidetii? Kawa guye zaaridi ehanaw koyrottidi odiday nuna gidoko?” yaagidosona. Shin Isra7eele asaape Yihuda asay daro wolqanthidi haasayidosona.
2SA 20:1 Biniyaame koche gidida Bikira na7ay Saabe7a geetetiya meto medhiya addey yan de7ees. He addey moyze punnidi, “Nuus Dawitara gishoy baawa! Isseye na7aara nuus laati baawa! Isra7eele asaw, ubbay hinte soo soo gelite!” yaagis.
2SA 20:2 Isra7eele asa ubbay Dawita aggidi, Bikira na7aa Sabe7erara bidosona. Shin Yihuda asay Yordaanosepe Yerusalaame gakanaw aggonna banta kawa kaallidosona.
2SA 20:3 Dawiti Yerusalaamen de7iya ba gadho simmida wode, kawo gadho naagana mela ashshida tammu laggethota efidi issi keethan naagisidi wothis. Entaw koshshiyaba immis, shin entara aqibeenna. Enti he keethan naagetidi, hayqana gakanaw am7o gididi de7idosona.
2SA 20:4 Kawoy Amaasako, “Yihuda asa ubbaa heedzu gallasan taw xeegada shiisha; neka entara shiiqa” yaagis.
2SA 20:5 Amaasi Yihuda asaa xeeganaw bis; shin kawoy gida gallasan simmanaw danda7ibeenna.
2SA 20:6 Dawiti Abisako, “Ha77i Bikira na7aa Saabe7i Abeseloomepe aathidi nuna qohana. Ne godaa olanchota ekada neeni iya geedo kaalla. Hessi hanonna ixiko I gimbetida katamata demmidi nuupe kessi ekana” yaagis.
2SA 20:7 Iyo7aaba asay, kawa naageysatinne mino olanchoti ubbay Abisara Bikira na7aa Saabe7a geedo kaallanaw Yerusalaamepe keyidi bidosona.
2SA 20:8 Enti bidi Gaba7oonan de7iya wogga zaalla gakiya wode Amaasi entara gahetanaw yis. Iyo7aabi ola ma7uwa ma7i uttis; ba xeessan mashsha dancis. I tangishin iya mashshay shoohuwape kessi ekidi wodhis.
2SA 20:9 Iyo7aabi, “Ta ishaw, ne saro de7ay?” yaagidi, Amaasa yeeranaw ba ushacha kushiyan iya buuchaa oykis.
2SA 20:10 Shin Amaasi Iyo7aaba haddirsa kushiyan de7iya mashshaa be7iboona gisho, iyape naagetibeenna. Iyo7aabi iya uluwan caddidi maraaciya biittan zaazis. Amaasi issi cachan hayqida gisho zaari caddibeenna. Iyo7aabinne iya ishaa Abisi Bikira na7aa Saabe7a geedo kaallidosona.
2SA 20:11 Iyo7aaba asaape issoy Amaasa aha matan eqidi, “Iyo7aaba doseynne Dawitaba gidiya oonika Iyo7aaba kaallo” yaagis.
2SA 20:12 Amaasi suuthan iitidi ogiyas giddon kundidi zin7is. Olanchoti ubbay yidi, he bessan eqidaysa he addey be7idi, Amaasa aha ogiyape shooqan goochi kessidi, iya bolla ma7o yeggis.
2SA 20:13 Amaasa ogepe diggidaape guye, Bikira na7aa Saabe7a geedo kaallanaw olanchoti ubbay Iyo7aabara bidosona.
2SA 20:14 Saabe7i Isra7eele kochata biittara kanthidi, Abeel-Beet-Ma7ika katamaa gakis. Berata biittara kanthishin, asa ubbay shiiqidi iya kaallidosona.
2SA 20:15 Iyo7aabara de7iya asay gakidi, Saabe7i de7iya Abeel-Beet-Ma7ika katama teqidosona. Enti katamaa gimbiyas guye baggara biitta dooridosona. Iyo7aabara de7iya asay gimbiya laallanaw qoxoosona. Enti qoxishin,
2SA 20:16 katamaape issi cinca maccasi enta xeegada, “Si7ite! Si7ite! Bidi, Iyo7aaba xeegite. Taani iyaw odanabay de7ees” yaagasu.
2SA 20:17 I maccaseeko yin, iya, “Neeni Iyo7aabee?” yaagada oychasu. Iyo7aabi, “Ee, tana” yaagis. Maccasiya, “Taani ne aylliya giyaba si7a” yaagasu. Iyo7aabi, “Taani si7ayis” yaagis.
2SA 20:18 Maccasiya, “Beni wode asay, ‘Ne oyshaas Abi7eela katamaa ba’ giiko odi wurees.
2SA 20:19 Isra7eele giddon saronne ammanthiya asi nuna. Isra7eele biittan aayo gidida katamiw neeni dhaysanaw qopaasa. Neeni Godaa laata biitta ayis dhaysanaw koyay?” yaagasu.
2SA 20:20 Iyo7aabi, “Hessi taape haako! Katamaa dhaysoy woyko laalethi taape haako!
2SA 20:21 Nu qofay hessa gidenna. Derey dariya Efreema biittan Bikira na7aa Sabe7a geetetiya addey kawa Dawita bolla dendis. He addiya taw immite; taani katamaa yeddada baana” yaagis. Maccasiya, “Iya huuphiya gimbiya bollara new holana” yaagasu.
2SA 20:22 Hessafe guye, maccasiya ba cinca zoriyara asaako basu. Asay Bikira na7aa Saabe7a qoodhepe qanxidi huuphiya Iyo7aabas holidosona. Yaatin, Iyo7aabi moyze punnin asa ubbay katamaape keyidi, ba soo soo bin, Iyo7aabi kawako Yerusalaame simmis.
2SA 20:23 Iyo7aabi Isra7eele olanchota ubbaa halaqa gidishin, Yoodahe na7ay Banayasi Dawita naageysata halaqa.
2SA 20:24 Adoniraami wolqa ooso ootheyisata halaqa gidishin, Ahiluda na7ay Iyosaafxi hanidaba xaafeysa.
2SA 20:25 Suusi waanna xaafe gidishin, Saadoqinne Abyataari kahine.
2SA 20:26 Qassi Ya7ira addey Irki Dawita kahinetape issuwa.
2SA 21:1 Dawita kawotetha laythan biittay heedzu laythi kumethi koshatis. Hessa gisho, Dawiti Godaa oychin, Goday, “Hessi haniday Saa7olinne iya soo asay Gaba7oona asaa wodhida gisho suuthaa gomey enta gakis” yaagis.
2SA 21:2 Yaatin kawoy Gaba7oona asaa xeegidi odisis. Gaba7oona asati Isra7eele zare gidonashin, enti Amoore asaape attidaysata. Isra7eeleti enta ashshanaw entara caaqidosona; shin Saa7oli Isra7eelesinne Yihudas mishetida gisho, enta kumethi dhaysanaw koyis.
2SA 21:3 Dawiti Gaba7oona asaa, “Taani hintew ay ootho? Godaa laata hinte anjana mela taani hintena ay acco?” yaagis.
2SA 21:4 Enti zaaridi, “Nuuni Saa7olape woyko iya soo asaape worqa woyko bira oychoko. Qassi Isra7eele giddofe issi asika wodhanaw nuus maati baawa” yaagidosona. Dawiti, “Yaatin, taani hintew ay oothana mela koyeetii?” yaagidi oychis.
2SA 21:5 Enti, “Saa7oli nuna dhaysis; nuupe ay asika Isra7eele biittan awunka paxa doonna mela maqetis.
2SA 21:6 Hessa gisho, Saa7ola kochaafe laapun addeta nuus imma. Goday dooridi iya kawothida Saa7ola kataman, Gib7an, Godaa sinthan nuuni enta kaqana” yaagidosona. Kawoy, “Taani enta hintew aathada immana” yaagis.
2SA 21:7 Saa7ola na7ay Yoonataaninne Dawiti Godaa sinthan caaqida caaquwa gisho, Saa7ola na7aa, Yoonataana na7aa Mempiboste kawoy ashshis.
2SA 21:8 Shin kawoy Dawiti Iyoheela na7iya Raxifa Saa7olas yelida nam7u adde nayta, Armoonanne Mempiboste, qassi Saa7ola na7iya Merooba, Mahoola addiya Barzile na7aa Adir7eelas yelida ichashu adde nayta ekis.
2SA 21:9 Gaba7oona asaas aathidi immin, enti Godaa sinthan zumaa huuphen kaqidosona; laapunay issife hayqidosona. Enti banga caka doomiya wode hayqidosona.
2SA 21:10 Iyoheela na7iya Raxifa kayo afila ekada zaalla bolla baw hiixada, kathi cakiya wodiyape bidi ahata bolla iri bukana gakanaw gallas kafoy, qamma do7i bochonaada naagasu.
2SA 21:11 Saa7ola laggethiya, Iyoheela na7iya Raxifa oothidaysa Dawiti si7is.
2SA 21:12 Dawiti bidi, Saa7ola meqethaanne iya na7aa Yoonataana meqethaa Galadan de7iya Yaabesa asaape ekis. Filisxeemeti Saa7olanne iya nayta Gilbo7a deriya bolla wodhidi, Beet-Saana gutarape Yaabesa asay kaysotidi ekidosona.
2SA 21:13 Dawiti Saa7ola meqethaanne iya na7aa Yoonataana meqethaa he bessaafe ehis. Qassi kaqetida laapun asata meqethaaka shiishis.
2SA 21:14 Saa7ola meqethaanne iya na7aa Yoonataana meqethaa Biniyaame biittan Xela kataman iya aawa Qiisa duufuwan moogidosona. Kawoy kiittidaba ubbaa enti polidosona. Hessafe guye, enti he biitta gisho woossida woosa Xoossay si7is.
2SA 21:15 Filisxeemeta giddoninne Isra7eele asaa giddon zaaridi oli dendin, Dawiti ba asaara bis. Filisxeemetara oletidi Dawiti daaburis.
2SA 21:16 Rafaya yaraape Yishibibinooba geetetiya addey de7ees. Naase biratape oosetida, I oykiya tooray heedzu kilo giraamenne bagga; I ooratha mashshi dancidi, Dawita wodhanaw qopidi de7ees.
2SA 21:17 Shin Xaruya na7ay Abisi Dawita ashshis; I Filisxeeme addiya wodhis. Hessafe guye, Dawita asay, “Isra7eele xompey to7onnaada neeni zaarada nuura olaa baaka” yaagidi caaqidosona.
2SA 21:18 Gooba geetetiya bessan Filisxeemetara hara oli dendis. He wode Kusata addey Sabaki, Raafa yara gidida Saafa geetetiya uraa wodhis.
2SA 21:19 Qassika he bessan Filisxeemetara hara oli dendin, Beetelemepe yida Ya7ira na7aa, Elhanaani, toora toomay wandaraashe mela gidida Gaate addiya Gooliyada wodhis.
2SA 21:20 Qassika Gaaten hara oli dendis. He bessan issi adussa addey de7ees. He addiyas issi issi kushiyaninne issi issi tohuwan usupun, woli bolla laatamanne oyddu biradheti de7oosona. Ika Raafa yaraape gidida asi.
2SA 21:21 He addey Isra7eele bushayida wode Dawita ishaa Saama na7ay Yoonataani iya wodhis.
2SA 21:22 Ha oyddati Gaaten de7iya Raafa yarata. Enta Dawitinne iya asay wodhidosona.
2SA 22:1 Goday Saa7ola kushepenne iya morketa ubbaa kushepe ashshida gallas Dawiti Godaas ha mazmuriya yexis.
2SA 22:2 Goday ta zaalla; taw miixaa; I tana ashsheysa.
2SA 22:3 Ta Xoossay taani baqatada attiya zaalla; I ta gondalliya; I ta atotetha wolqaa. I taani baqatada attiya bessi; ne tana makallanchota kushepe ashshaasa.
2SA 22:4 Galati bessiya Godaa taani xeegana; taani ta morketape attana.
2SA 22:5 Hayqo zuley tana teqis; dhayo di7oy tana daganthis.
2SA 22:6 Si7oole wodoroy tana qachana hanees; hayqoy xiheda tana oykis.
2SA 22:7 Tana metoy un7ethin Godaa xeegas; tana maaddana mela ta Xoossaako waassas. I ba keethan ta qaala si7is; ta waassida waasoy iya haythan wodhis.
2SA 22:8 Xoossay hanqetida gisho, biitti qaaxis; buqetis; salota xaphoy kokoris; qaaxis
2SA 22:9 Iya siidhiyape cuyay keyis; iya doonape tama lacoynne xuuggiya bonqoy keyis.
2SA 22:10 Saluwa phalqidi duge wodhis; iya tohuwape garsara sakana dhumi de7ees.
2SA 22:11 Kiruubetan uttidi paallis; carko qefiya bolla uttidi bis.
2SA 22:12 Bana dhuman teqis; iya dunkaaney irara siketida shaara.
2SA 22:13 Iya sinthan de7iya poo7uwape tama bonqoy keyees.
2SA 22:14 Goday salope guummis; Ubbaafe dhoqa Xoossay ba qaala sissis.
2SA 22:15 Ba dongiya dukidi, ba morketa laallis; wol7antha poo7o kiittidi, enta yedethis.
2SA 22:16 Goday seerida wodenne hanqetidi peenuqida wode, abba giddon biittay bentis; Sa7aa baasoyka qoncis.
2SA 22:17 Goday bollafe kushe yeddidi, tana oykis; ciimmo haathaafe tana kessis.
2SA 22:18 I tana ta wolqaama morketape, ta wolqaafe bolla gidida tana ixeysatape ashshis.
2SA 22:19 Ta metuwa gallas enti ta bolla dendidosona; shin Goday tana zempiseysa.
2SA 22:20 I tana dalga bessi kessis; tanan ufaytida gisho tana ashshis.
2SA 22:21 Ta xillotethaada Goday taw qanxis; ta kushe geeshshatethaada taw zaaris.
2SA 22:22 Ayis giiko taani Godaa ogiya kaallas; qassi ta Xoossaa aggada iita oothabike.
2SA 22:23 Taani iya higgiya ubbaa naagas; iya wogaa polanaysa aggabike.
2SA 22:24 Taani iya sinthan suure de7as; tana nagarape naagas.
2SA 22:25 Goday taw ta xillotethaadanne ta geeshshatethaada zaaris.
2SA 22:26 Neeni keehatas keeha; suuretas neeni suure.
2SA 22:27 Geeshshatas neeni geeshshi; shin geellatas neeni morke.
2SA 22:28 Bantana kawusheyisata ashshaasa; shin otoranchota kawushaasa.
2SA 22:29 Abeeti Godaw, ta xompey nena; Goday ta dhumaa poo7isis.
2SA 22:30 Ne maaduwan ta morketa yedhada baana; ta Xoossan gimbe dirsa gupa aadhana.
2SA 22:31 Xoossaa ogey suure; Godaa qaalay geeshshi; iyako baqatiya ubbaas I gondalle.
2SA 22:32 Goday attishin, hara xoossi oonee? Nu Xoossay attishin, hara zaalli oonee?
2SA 22:33 Xoossay taw mino miixaa; I ta ogiya polo oothees.
2SA 22:34 I ta tohuwa gen7e tohoda minthees; tana dhoqa bessan minthidi essees.
2SA 22:35 I ta kushiya olas loohisees; ta qesey naase birata donge dukees.
2SA 22:36 Tana ashshiya ne gondalliya taw immadasa; ne katisoy tana gitayees.
2SA 22:37 Ta hemethaa dalgisaasa; ta gaadiya minthaasa.
2SA 22:38 Ta morketa yedethada mentherethas; enti dhayonna de7ishin guye simmike.
2SA 22:39 Enti zaaridi dendonna mela shocas; ta tohuwape garsan kundidosona.
2SA 22:40 Olas taw wolqa dancisadasa; ta morketa taw gulbatisadasa.
2SA 22:41 Ta morketa ta sinthafe baqatisadasa; tana ixeyisata dhaysas.
2SA 22:42 Maade koyidi waassidosona; shin oonika enta ashshibeenna. Godaa enti xeegidosona; shin I entaw koybeenna.
2SA 22:43 Taani enta baanada liiqisas; oge urqada enta yedhas.
2SA 22:44 Makalla ta asaape tana ashshadasa; kawotethata bolla tana shuumadasa; ta eronna asay taw haaretis.
2SA 22:45 Allaga derey tana aaddashees; ta woriya si7idi taw kiitetoosona.
2SA 22:46 Enti wolqa dhayidosona; banta miixape kokorishe keyidi yoosona.
2SA 22:47 Goday de7on de7ees! Ta zaallay anjeto. Tana ashshiya zaallay dhoqu dhoqu go.
2SA 22:48 I ta haluwa keyiya Xoossaa; kawotethata taape garsan haarisees.
2SA 22:49 Ta morketape tana ashshees; ta morketa bolla tana dhoqu dhoqu oothaasa; Oda medhiya asape tana ashshaasa.
2SA 22:50 Abeeti Godaw taani kawotethata giddon nena galatana; ne sunthaa yexana.
2SA 22:51 Xoossay ba kawas gita xoono immees; ba tiyida Dawitasinne iya kochaas, merinaa siiquwa bessees.
2SA 23:1 Haysi Dawiti wursetha haasaya. Isseye na7aa Dawita wuresethay haysa; I Yayqooba Xoossan tiyetidaysa; Xoossay iya dhoqu dhoqu oothidaysa; Isra7eelen lo77o mazmure yexeysa.
2SA 23:2 “Godaa Ayyaanay ta baggara odees; iya qaalay ta inxarsan de7ees.
2SA 23:3 Isra7eele Xoossay taw odis; Isra7eele Zaallay haysada yaagis. ‘Xillotethan haariya kawoy, Xoossa yashshan aysiya kawoy,
2SA 23:4 I shaari bayna guura doliya xalqe poo7o mela. I iri bukidi aadhin, biittafe maata dolisiya booqalsa mela.’
2SA 23:5 Tuma ta keetha asay Xoossa sinthan suure; I taara merinaw caaqis; ha caaqoy giigidi, minnidinne naagetidi de7ees. Xoossay taw xoono immana; ta amotidaba ubbaa I tuma polana.
2SA 23:6 Shin iita asati ubbay kushen shiishanaw hanonna agunthada wora holetana.
2SA 23:7 Agunthu bochiya oonika wale woyko xam7a ba kushen oykanaw koshshees; hessi ba de7iya bessan eexana” yaagis.
2SA 23:8 Mino Dawita asata sunthay haysafe kaallidi de7eyisata. Koyroy, Takmoona yeleta gidida Yoseeb-Bestibeete geetetees; I heedzata halaqa; issi toho olan ba tooran hospun xeetu asi wodhis.
2SA 23:9 Heedzatape issoy, iya kaalliya nam7anthoy, Ahoha sheeshi gidida Dodo na7aa Alaazara. Issi gallas inne Dawiti olas shiiqida Filisxeemeta mandidosona; Isra7eele asay guye simmis.
2SA 23:10 Shin I ba bessan minni eqidi, iya kushey argaacidi mashshaara oyketana gakanaw Filisxeemeta shocis. He gallas Goday gita xoono immis. Olay eqin, olanchoti Alaazarako simmidi yidosona; shin enti hayqida Filisxeemetape ola ma7o qaaridosonape attishin, haraba oothibookona.
2SA 23:11 Iyape kaalley qassi Arooda yeleta gidida Aga na7aa Saama. Issi gallas Filisxeemeti misirey kumida shooqan, Leehi geetetiya bessan shiiqin, Isra7eeleti enta sinthafe baqatidosona.
2SA 23:12 Shin Saami shooqa giddon murti eqidi oletis. Filisxeemeta wodhis; he gallas Goday wolqaama xoono immis.
2SA 23:13 Katha caka wode hastamu mino asatape heedzati Adulaama gongoluwa Dawitako bidosona. He wode Filisxeeme olanchoti Raafayme zangaaran dunkaanidosona.
2SA 23:14 He wode Dawiti miixan de7ees; Filisxeeme olanchota cugay qassi Beetelemen olla kambe de7ees.
2SA 23:15 Dawiti haathe uyanaw amotidi, “Beeteleme katamaa pengiya matan de7iya olape haathe tana oone ushshanay” yaagis.
2SA 23:16 Ha heedzu mino asati Filisxeeme olanchota gutaa kanthidi, Beeteleme katama pengen de7iya ollafe haathe duuqidi Dawitas ehidosona. Shin I uyonna ixidi, Godaa sinthan tigidi,
2SA 23:17 “Abeeti Godaw, haysa uyanaysi taape haako! Ha haatha banta shempuwa bayzidi ehida asata suuthu gidennee?” yaagidi uyonna ixis. Ha heedzu mino asati haysa oothidosona.
2SA 23:18 Xaruya na7aa Iyo7aaba ishay Abisi hastamata halaqa; I heedzu xeetu asata ba tooran olidi wodhis; ika heedzatada eretis.
2SA 23:19 I hastamatape aadhidi bonchetida asi; I heedzata mela eretida asi gidonna ixikoka hastamatas halaqa.
2SA 23:20 Qabxi7eela yeleta gidida Yoodahe na7ay Banayasi mino ooso oothida gita asi. I nam7u eretida Moo7abe asata wodhis. Issi wode shachi wodhiya gallas ollan wodhidi gaammo wodhis.
2SA 23:21 Qassi issi gita Gibxe addiya wodhis; Gibxe addey toora oykis; shin I xam7a oykidi iyako bidi, iya kushepe toora dafi ekidi, iya toorara iya wodhis.
2SA 23:22 Yoodahe na7ay Banayasi haysa oothis; iya sunthay heedzataysada eretis.
2SA 23:23 I hastamata giddon daro bonchetida asi, shin I heedzata taybuwan deenna. Dawiti iya bana naagiya wotaadaretas tora mocona oothis.
2SA 23:24 He hastamata giddon de7eysati, Iyo7aaba ishaa Asaheela, Beeteleme yeleta gidida Dooda na7aa Eliyaana,
2SA 23:25 Arooda yeleta gidida Saamanne Eliqa,
2SA 23:26 Falxa yara gidida Selesa, Taqoha addiya Esika na7aa Irasa,
2SA 23:27 Anatoote yeleta gidida Abi7ezera, Kuussa yeleta gidida Mabunaya,
2SA 23:28 Ahoha yara gidida Xalmoona,
2SA 23:29 Naxoofa yeleta gidida Mahirayanne Ba7ana na7aa Heleba. Biniyaame biittan, Gib7a yeleta gidida Ribaaya na7aa Itaya,
2SA 23:30 Phir7atoona yeleta gidida Banaya, Ga7aasa zangaara matape yida Hidaya,
2SA 23:31 Araba yeleta gidida Abalboona, Barhuuma addiya Azmoota,
2SA 23:32 Sha7alboona yeleta gidida Eliyaaba, Asana nayta, Yoonataana,
2SA 23:33 Arooda yeleta gidida Saamanne Shaara na7aa Ahi7aama,
2SA 23:34 Ma7ika yeleta gidida Ahasbaya na7aa Elfalaxa, Gilo yeleta gidida Akxoofela na7aa Eli7aama,
2SA 23:35 Qarmeloosa yeleta gidida Hexira, Araba yeleta gidida Pa7aara,
2SA 23:36 Suubba yeleta gidida Naatana na7aa Yigi7aala, Gaade yeleta gidida Baana,
2SA 23:37 Amoone yeleta gidida Seleqa, Xaruya na7aa Iyo7aaba ola miishiya tookiya Ba7eroota yeleta gidida Nahiraya,
2SA 23:38 Yatira yara gidiya Irayanne Gareeba,
2SA 23:39 Hite addiya Ooriyoona. Enti kumethi hastamanne laapuna.
2SA 24:1 Godaa hanqoy qassika Isra7eele bolla eexis; Goday Dawita enta bolla denthethidi, “Bada Isra7eelenne Yihuda asaa tayba” yaagis.
2SA 24:2 Hessa gisho, kawoy tora moconata Iyo7aabanne baara de7eysatako haysada yaagis; “Isra7eele kochata Daanepe Barsaabe gakanaw taani erana mela Isra7eele asaa bidi taybite” yaagis.
2SA 24:3 Shin Iyo7aabi, “Goday ne Xoossay ha de7iya asaa bolla xeetu kushe gujo! Hessa ta godaa, kawa ayfey be7o! Shin ta goday, kawoy ayis hessa melaba oothanaw koyii?” yaagis.
2SA 24:4 Shin kawa qaalay Iyo7aabanne tora moconata xoonin, enti kawa sinthafe keyidi, Isra7eele asaa taybanaw bidosona.
2SA 24:5 Enti Yordaanose pinnidi dugeha baggan de7iya, zangaara giddon de7iya Aro7eera kataman dunkaanidosona; yaape Gaade kanthidi Iyazeera gakidosona.
2SA 24:6 Yaape enti Galadanne Hiteta biittan de7iya Qaadesa bidosona; yaape qassi Daane bidosona; yaara Sidoona gakidosona.
2SA 24:7 Yaape dendidi, Xiroosa miixanne Hiwetanne Kanaaneta katamaa ubbaa bidosona. Wursethan Yihuda Negeban de7iya Barsaabe bidosona.
2SA 24:8 Enti biitta ubbaa yuuyishe uddufun ageenanne laatamu gallas gam7idi, Yerusalaame simmidosona.
2SA 24:9 Iyo7aabi asaa taybuwa kawa erisis; Isra7eelen mashshan oletanaw danda7iya hospun xeetu mukulu mino olanchoti, Yihudan qassi ichashu xeetu mukulu olanchoti de7oosona.
2SA 24:10 Asaa taybidaape guye, Dawita wozanay hirgin, Dawiti, “Taani ha oosuwan gita nagara oothas. Shin ha77i abeeti Godaw, taani nena woossayis; ta nagaraa, ne aylliya nagaraa atto ga. Taani daro boozaba hanas” yaagis.
2SA 24:11 Wontetha gallas Dawiti hiixape dendiya wode Dawitas qoncethi be7iya, nabiya Gaadeko Godaa qaalay yis.
2SA 24:12 “Bada, Dawitako, ‘Taani nena heedzubaape issuwa doorana mela bessayis; taani ne bolla polanaw entafe issuwa doora’ yaagees Goday” yaagis.
2SA 24:13 Gaadi Dawitako bidi, “Heedzu laythi ne biitta bolla kosha ehoyee? Woyko ne morketi nena yedethin, heedzu ageena enta sinthafe baqataneyee? Woyko ne biitta bolla heedzu gallas gadoy yaanaysa dooray? Ane ha77i qopada taani tana kiittidaysas zaaranaba oda” yaagis.
2SA 24:14 Dawiti Gaadeko, “Taani daro un7etas. Godaa maarotay gita gidiya gisho, nuuni iya kushen kundana; tana asa kushen yeggofo” yaagis.
2SA 24:15 Hessa gisho, wontafe bidi I gida gallasay gakanaw Goday Isra7eele biittan gado kiittis. Isra7eele biittan Daanepe bidi Barsaabe gakanaw laapun tammu mukulu asi hayqis.
2SA 24:16 Yerusalaame dhaysanaw kiitanchoy ba kushiya miccida wode asaa bolla gakida gadoy Godaa azzanthida gisho, asaa shociya kiitanchuwako, “Gidana! Ne kushiya zara” yaagis. Godaa kiitanchoy he wode Yaabuse addiya Orna wudumman de7ees.
2SA 24:17 Asaa shociya kiitanchuwa Dawiti be7ida wode Godaako, “Nagaraa oothiday tana; ta balas! Ha dorsati ay oothidona? Hayyana, tananne ta aawa soo asaa ne seerana mela taani woossayis” yaagis.
2SA 24:18 He gallas Gaadi Dawitako yidi, “Bada, Yaabuse addiya Orna wudumman Godaas yarsho bessi giigisa” yaagis.
2SA 24:19 Dawiti, Goday Gaade baggara kiittidaysada oothanaw pude bis.
2SA 24:20 Orni duge xeelliya wode, kawoynne iya asati baako yeysa be7is. I gaxa keyidi, gufannidi kawas ziggis.
2SA 24:21 Orni, “Ta goday kawoy ba aylliyako, ayis yidee?” yaagis. Dawiti, “Asaa bollafe gadoy simmana mela taani Godaas yarsho bessi giigisanaw ne wudumma shammanaw yas” yaagis.
2SA 24:22 Orni, “Ta goday, kawoy ba koydaba ekidi yarsho! Xuussa yarshos boorati de7oosona; eeso mithas qassi kathi bukiya miisheynne boora qambari de7ees.
2SA 24:23 Kawaw, haysa ubbaa Orni kawas immis” yaagis. Gujidi Orni, “Goday ne Xoossay ne yarshuwa eko” yaagis.
2SA 24:24 Shin kawoy, “Akay, taani ta miishen shammana. Ta Godaa, Xoossaas xuussa yarsho gatey bayna yarshike” yaagis. Hessa gisho, kawoy wudummaanne boorata Ornafe ishatamu bira santimen shammis.
2SA 24:25 Dawiti he bessan yarsho bessi giigisidi xuussa yarshonne issifetetha yarsho Godaas yarshis. Goday biitta gisho woosetida woosa si7idi, gaduwa Isra7eelepe diggis.
1KI 1:1 Kawoy Dawiti daro cimidi wode sugis. Iya aylleti ma7o iya bolla doorinka iya ho77onna ixis.
1KI 1:2 Hessa gisho, iya moorinnati, “Kawa matan daana melanne iya heemmana mela issi geela7o nu new koyana. Nu godaa kawa ho7ethanaw iya matan zin7anaw danda7awusu” yaagidosona.
1KI 1:3 Enti Isra7eele biitta ubban koyidi Abisa geetetiya issi mala lo77o geela7o Sunaama katamaape demmidi, kawas ehidosona.
1KI 1:4 He geela7iya daro mala lo77o. Iya kawa heemmasunne iyaw oothasu; shin kawoy iira aqi erenna.
1KI 1:5 Haagita na7ay Adooni, “Ta kawotanaw koyayis” yaagidi dendis; para gaareta, paratanne ba sinthan woxiya ishatamu asata giigisis.
1KI 1:6 Iya aaway, “Ne haysa ayis oothay?” gidi iya oychi erenna. Adoniyaasi daro mala lo77o; I Abeseloome kaallidi yeletis.
1KI 1:7 Adoniyaasi Xaruya na7aa Iyo7abaranne kahiniya Abyataarara zoretin, enti iya maaddanaw giigidosona.
1KI 1:8 Shin kahiniya Saadoqi, Yoodahe na7ay Banayi, nabiya Naatani, Saami, Resimnne Dawita naageysati Adoniyaasara dookona.
1KI 1:9 Issi gallas Adoniyaasi Enrogeela pultuwa matan Zoheleta Zaalla geetetiya bessan dorsata, mehetanne marata yarshis. Kawo nayta ba ishata ubbaanne kawas oothiya Yihuda asata ubbaa ba yarsho bessa xeegis.
1KI 1:10 Shin nabey Naatana, Banaya, kawa naageysatanne ba isha Solomone xeegibeenna.
1KI 1:11 Hessafe guye, Naatani Solomone aayiw Barsaabeko bidi, “Nu goday, Dawiti eronna de7ishin, Haagita na7ay Adoniyaasi kawotidaysa ne si7abikii?
1KI 1:12 Ne ne shempuwanne ne na7aa Solomone shempuwa waatada ashshaneko ta nena zorayis.
1KI 1:13 Kawa Dawitako gelada, ‘Ta godaw, Kawaw tuma, taape guye ne na7ay Solomoney kawotana; I ta araatan uttana’ yaagada taw ne ayllees caaqabikii? Yaatin, Adoniyaasi waanidi kawotidee?
1KI 1:14 Neeni kawuwara haasayishin ta gelada, ne oday tuma gideysa odana” yaagis.
1KI 1:15 Barsaaba kawa haasayisanaw I de7iya keethaa gelasu; Sunaamape yida Abisa kawa heemmawusu.
1KI 1:16 Barsaaba kawa sinthan bonchon som7uwa sa7a gathada ziggasu. Kawoy, “Ay koyadii?” yaagidi oychis.
1KI 1:17 Iya, “Ta godaw, taw ne ayllees, ‘Taape guye ne na7ay Solomoney kawotana; I ta araatan uttana’ gada Godan, ne Xoossan, taw caaqadasa.
1KI 1:18 Heko, ha77i Adoniyaasi kawotis; ne ta goday, kawoy hessa eraka.
1KI 1:19 I daro meheta, maratanne dorsata yarshidi, kawa nayta ubbaa, kahiniya Abyataaranne toora mocona Iyo7aaba xeegis; shin ne aylliya Solomone xeegibeenna.
1KI 1:20 Ta godaw kawaw, ta godaape kawuwape guye ooni ne araatan uttaneeko eranaw Isra7eele asa ubbaa ayfey nena xeellees.
1KI 1:21 Hessi hanonna ixiko ta goday kawoy hayqidi ba mayzatan gahetiya wode tanne ta na7ay Solomoney daafaba oothida asada taybetana” yaagasu.
1KI 1:22 Barsaaba buroo kawuwara haasayishin, nabey Naatani kawo keethi gakis.
1KI 1:23 Nabey yidaysa asay kawas odidosona. Naatani kawa sinthe aadhidi, ba som7uwa sa7a gathidi ziggis.
1KI 1:24 Naatani, “Ta godaw kawaw, neepe guye Adoniyaasi kawotanaysanne ne araatan uttanaysa odadii?
1KI 1:25 Hachi I daro meheta, maratanne dorsata yarshidi, kawa nayta ubbaa, toora moconatanne kahiniya Abyataara xeegis. Enti ha77i iyara mishenne uyishe, ‘Kawoy Adoniyaasi birata tuussi gido’ yaagishe de7oosona.
1KI 1:26 Shin tana ne aylliya, kahiniya Saadoqa, Yoodahe na7aa Banayanne ne aylliya Solomone xeegibeenna.
1KI 1:27 Haysi ta godaa kawuwape guye iya araatan ooni uttaneeko ba aylleta erisonna de7ishe ta goday kawoy oothidabayee?” yaagis.
1KI 1:28 Kawoy Dawiti, “Barsaabo taw xeegite” yaagin kawoy de7iya bessaa gelada iya sinthan eqasu.
1KI 1:29 He wode kawoy, “Tana meto ubbaafe ashshida Goday eriya mela.
1KI 1:30 Godan, Isra7eele Xoossan ta new caaqida caaquwa tuma hachi polana; taape guye ne na7ay Solomoney kawotana; ta araatan, I ta bessan uttana” yaagidi caaqis.
1KI 1:31 Barsaaba kawa sinthan ba som7uwa sa7a gathada ziggada, “Ta goday, Kawoy Dawiti merinaw kawoto!” yaagasu.
1KI 1:32 Hessafe guye Kawoy Dawiti, “Taw kahiniya Saadoqa, nabiya Naatananne Yoodahe na7aa Banaya xeegite” yaagin, enti gelidi, kawa sinthan eqidosona.
1KI 1:33 Kawoy “Ta aylleta hintera ekidi bidi, ta na7aa Solomone ta toggiya baquluwa togisidi, Giyoone pultuwako efite.
1KI 1:34 Yan kahiniya Saadoqinne nabiya Naatani iya tiyidi Isra7eele bolla kawoyo. Moyze punnishe, hinte qaala dhoqu oothidi, ‘Kawoy Solomoney birata tuussu gido’ yaagite.
1KI 1:35 Hinte iya ajabidi iyara biite; I ta araatan uttidi, ta bessan kawoto. Taani Isra7eelenne Yihuda haariya asi oothada iya shuumas” yaagis.
1KI 1:36 Yoodahe na7aa Banayi zaaridi, “Amin7i! Goday, ta godaa kawa Xoossay hessa polo!
1KI 1:37 Goday ta godaara kawuwara gididaysada Solomonera gido; iya araata ta godaa Kawa Dawita araatape aathidi gitayo” yaagis.
1KI 1:38 Hessa gisho, kahiney Saadoqi, nabey Naatani, Yoodahe na7ay Banayinne kawa naageysati Solomone Kawoy Dawiti toggiya baquluwa togisidi, Giyoone efidosona.
1KI 1:39 Kahiney Saadoqi Geeshsha Dunkaaniyape zayte kacen tigi ekidi, Solomone tiyidi kawothis. Enti moyze punnin, asa ubbay ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Kawoy Solomoney merinaw kawoto!” yaagidosona.
1KI 1:40 Asa ubbay iya kaallidi bidosona; enti biitti qaaxana gakanaw suusul7e punnishenne durishe daro ufaytidosona.
1KI 1:41 Adoniyaasinne iyara de7iya imathati gibira midi wursishe hessa si7idosona. Iyo7aabi Moyze puno si7idi, “Ha kataman si7etiya wocama girsay aybee?” yaagidi oychis.
1KI 1:42 I buroo odetishin, kahiniya Abyataara na7ay Yoonataani gaki wodhis. Adoniyaasi, “Ane haa gela. Ne mela lo77o asi lo77o wore ehonna aggenna” yaagis.
1KI 1:43 Yoonataani, “Akay, taani lo77o wore ehabike! Nu goday Kawoy Dawiti Solomone kawothis.
1KI 1:44 Iya ajabana mela kawoy kahiniya Saadoqa, nabiya Naatana, Yoodahe na7aa Banayanne kawa naageysata iyara yeddis; enti kawoy toggiya baquluwa iya togisidosona.
1KI 1:45 Kahiney Saadoqinne nabey Naatani, Giyoone pultuwa matan iya tiyidi kawothidosona; enti ililishenne durishe bidosona; kataman si7etiya girsay hessa.
1KI 1:46 Solomoney araatan uttis.
1KI 1:47 Hessa bollaka, kawa moorinnati nu godaa Kawa Dawitako shiiqidi, ‘Ne Xoossay Solomone sunthaa neysafe aathidi kesso; iya araata neysafe aathidi gitayo!’ yaagidi anjidosona. Kawoy ba algan de7ishe hokidi Xoossa goyinnis.
1KI 1:48 Gujidika, ‘Ta bessan kawothidi, ta araatan utisidi, tana hachi ta ayfen bessiya Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay galatetto!’ ” yaagis.
1KI 1:49 Adoniyaasa imathati ubbay hessa si7ida wode dagammidi, laaletidosona.
1KI 1:50 Adoniyaasi Solomone yayyidi, yarsho bessa kaceta oykidi woossis.
1KI 1:51 Asay Solomone, “Adoniyaasi Kawa Solomone yayyidi, yarsho bessa kaceta oykidi, ‘Kawoy Solomoney tana ba aylliya mashshan wodhike gidi hachi taw caaqo’ ” yaagees gidi odidosona.
1KI 1:52 Solomoney zaaridi, “I ba hanuwa loythiko, hari attoshin iya huuphe binaanape issoyka boshetenna; shin iyan iitatethi bentiko I hayqana” yaagis.
1KI 1:53 Kawoy Solomoney, Adoniyaasa yarsho bessaafe ehana mela ase kiittis. Adoniyaasi yidi, Solomones ziggis; Solomoney iyako, “Ne soo ba” yaagis.
1KI 2:1 Dawitas hayqiya wodey matin, ba na7aa Solomone haysada yaagidi kiittis;
1KI 2:2 “Ta hayqiya wodey matis. Hessa gisho, minna; ase gida.
1KI 2:3 Goday ne Xoossay kiittidaba naaga; iya ogiyan hemeta; Muse maxaafan xaafetida iya awaajuwa, iya kiitaa, iya higgiyanne iya wogaa naaga. Hessa ne oothiko, ne oothiyaba ubbaynne ne biya bessa ubbay new injetana.
1KI 2:4 Goday, ‘Ne kochati banta de7uwan naagetidi de7iko, enti ta sinthan banta kumetha wozanapenne banta kumetha shempuwafe ammanetidi hemetiko, Isra7eele araatan uttiya asi new dhayenna’ ” yaagida ufaysa qaala taw polana.
1KI 2:5 Gujidika, “Xaruya na7ay Iyo7aabi Isra7eele nam7u toora moconata Neera na7aa Abeneeranne Yetera na7aa Amaasa wodhidi, I oothidaba ne eraasa. Hessika, oli baynashin saro wode enta wodhidi, he suuthan ba xeessaa saqiyanne ba tohuwa caammaa tiyis.
1KI 2:6 Ne iya ne cincatethaada ootha; I ceeggidi saro hayqanaada oothofa.
1KI 2:7 “Shin taani ne isha Abeseloomepe baqatiya wode enti taw miye gidida gisho, Galada biittan de7iya Barzile naytas keehaba ootha; enti ne gaytape miya asaara mo.
1KI 2:8 “Taani Mahanayma katama bida wode tana iita baadethi baaddida Biniyaame biittan Biraqima katamape yida Geera na7aa Saami neera de7eysa qopa. I taara gahetanaw Yordaanose Shaafa yida wode, ‘Ta nena wodhike’ gada Godan iyaw caaqas.
1KI 2:9 Shin ha77i neeni iya xillo asada taybopa. Ne cinca asi gidiya gisho ay oothaneko eraasa. Ne he cima addiya suuthara mooga” yaagis.
1KI 2:10 Dawiti hayqidi, ba mayzatan gahetis; ba kataman moogetis.
1KI 2:11 Dawiti Isra7eele bolla oytamu laythi kawotis; Kebroonan laapun laythi, Yerusalaamen hastamanne heedzu laythi kawotis.
1KI 2:12 Solomoney ba aawa Dawita araatan uttis; iya kawotethay daro minnis.
1KI 2:13 Haagita na7ay Adoniyaasi, Solomone aaye Barsaabiko bin Barsaaba, “Ne taako saro yadii?” yaagada iya oychasu. I, “Ee; saro yas” yaagidi zaaris.
1KI 2:14 Gujidika, “Taani nena oychiyabay de7ees” yaagis. Iya, “Oycha” yaagasu.
1KI 2:15 Adoniyaasi, “Kawotanaw bessey tana gideysanne Isra7eele asa ubbay tana bantaw kawoda xeelleysa neeni, ne huuphen eraasa. Shin hanoy Xoossafe gidida gisho oday laametin kawotethay ta ishaako yuuyis.
1KI 2:16 Ha77i taani nena issiba oychana. Hayyana tana yeellayopa” yaagis. Iya, “Oycha” yaagasu.
1KI 2:17 I, “Kawoy Solomoney nena ixas geenna; hessa gisho, Sunaama maccasiw Abiso taw macho oothada ekana mela hayyana taw iya oycharki” yaagis.
1KI 2:18 Barsaaba, “Daro lo77o; ta hessa kawas odana” yaagasu.
1KI 2:19 Hessa gisho, Barsaabey Adoniyaasa kiitaa odanaw Solomoneko gelin, kawoy dendi eqidi, iw ziggis. Ba araatan uttis; ba aayes hara araata ehisidi, baape ushacha baggan utisis.
1KI 2:20 Barsaaba, “Ta nena issi guuthaba oychiyabay de7ees; hayyana tana yeellayopa” yaagasu. Kawoy zaaridi, “Ta aaye, oycha. Ta nena yeellayike” yaagis.
1KI 2:21 Iya, “Sunaama maccasiw Abiso ne ishay Adoniyaasi macho oothidi ekanaw koyiya gisho iyaw immarki” yaagasu.
1KI 2:22 Kawoy Solomoney zaaridi, “Sunaama maccasiw Abiso ne Adoniyaasi ayis oychay? I ta bayraa gidennee? Neeni iyaw kawotethi ayis oychikii? Qassi kahiniya Abyataarinne Xaruya na7ay Iyo7aabi iyara de7oosona gidokona?”
1KI 2:23 Kawoy Solomoney Godan caaqidi, “Adoniyaasi haysa oychida gisho taani iya wodhonna ixiko, Goday tana pirdo!
1KI 2:24 Tana, ta aawa Dawita araatan utisidi, ta kawotethaa minthi essidi, ta kochatas ba qaala polida Goday eriya mela, Adoniyaasi hachi hayqana!” yaagis.
1KI 2:25 Kawoy Solomoney Yoodahe na7a Banaya kiittin, I bidi Adoniyaasa shocidi wodhis.
1KI 2:26 Hessafe guye, kawoy Solomoney, kahiniya Abyataarako, “Neeni ne biitta Anatoota ba. Neeni hayqanaw bessaasa, shin ta nena wodhike. Neeni ta aawa Dawita sinthan Ubbaa Haariya Godaa Taabotiya tookadasa; qassi ta aawa metuwa ubbaa iyara ekadasa” yaagis.
1KI 2:27 Solomoney, Abyataari Godaa kahine gidida bessaafe diggidi, Goday Seelon Eele soo asaas odida qaala polis.
1KI 2:28 Abeseloome ixidi, Adoniyaasa maaddida Iyo7aaba ha oday gakin, baqatidi Godaa Dunkaaniyako bidi, yarsho bessa kaceta oykis.
1KI 2:29 Iyo7aabi baqatidi Godaa Dunkaaniyako bidi, yarsho bessa matan de7eysa kawa Solomoney si7ida wode, Yoodahe na7aa Banaya, “Bada iya wodha” gidi kiittis.
1KI 2:30 Banayi Godaa Dunkaaniya giddo gelidi Iyo7aabako, “Kawoy nena ha bessaafe keya gees” yaagis. Shin I zaaridi, “Keyike! Ta haysan hayqana” yaagis. Banayi, bidi Iyo7aabi gidaysa kawas odis.
1KI 2:31 Kawoy, “I gidaysada iya ootha; iya wodhada mooga! Iyo7aabi xillo asaa suuthu gussida daafape tananne ta aawa soo asaa geeshshaasa.
1KI 2:32 I gussida suuthaa acuwa Goday iyaw qanxana. I, ta aawa Dawiti eronnashin, baape xillo gidida nam7u asata mashshan wodhis. Isra7eele toora moconay, Neera na7ay Abeneerinne Yihuda toora moconay Yetera na7ay Amaasi, suure asi shin wodhis.
1KI 2:33 Iyo7aabi ha asata wodhida gisho, enta suuthaa acoy merinaw Iyo7aaba bollanne iya kochaa bolla wodho. Dawita bollanne iya soo asaa bolla, iya kochaa bollanne iya araata bolla merinaw Godaa saroy gido” yaagis.
1KI 2:34 Hessa gisho, Yoodahe na7ay Banayi keyidi, Iyo7aaba shocidi wodhin, I mela biittan de7iya ba gaden moogetis.
