1KI 18:32 Godaa sunthan he shuchata keelidi, yarsho bessi gimbidi, tammanne oyddu litiro haathe oykiya olla yarsho bessa yuushon bookis.
1KI 18:33 Hessafe guye, yarsho bessan mithi wothidi, kormaa ashuwa iya qommuwan qommuwan qanxerethidi, mithaa bolla wothis. Asaako, “Oyddu baathe haathe kunthidi, yarshuwa bollanne mithaa bolla gussite” yaagis; enti gussidosona.
1KI 18:34 Qassika, Eeliyaasi, “Nam7antho gujite” yaagis; enti nam7antho gujidosona. Qassika, Eeliyaasi, “Heedzantho gujite” yaagis; heedzantho gujidosona.
1KI 18:35 Haathay yarsho bessa yuushuwan goggidi, ollan kumis.
1KI 18:36 Omarsa yarsho shiishiya wode nabey Eeliyaasi yarsho bessaako shiiqidi haysada yaagidi woossis; “Abeeti Godaw, Abrahaame Xoossaw, Yisaaqa Xoossaw, Isra7eele Xoossaw, neeni Isra7eele biittan Xoosse gideysa, taani ne aylle gideysanne taani haysa ubbaa ne qaalan oothidaysi hachi ereto.
1KI 18:37 Abeeti Godaw, taw koya. Neeni, Goday Xoosse gideysanne enta wozanaa neeko zaarey nena gideysa ha asay erana mela taw koya!” yaagis.
1KI 18:38 Godaa tamay salope wodhidi, xuussa yarshuwa, mithaa, shuchaanne biitta mis; ollan de7iya haatha laacis.
1KI 18:39 Asa ubbay hessa be7ida wode, banta som7ora sa7an gufannidi, “Goday Xoosse! Godaa xalaali Xoosse!” yaagidosona.
1KI 18:40 Eeliyaasi, “Ba7aale nabeta oykite; entafe issi asika kessi ekofo” yaagis. Asay enta oykidosona; Eeliyaasi enta Qisoona Shaafa efidi wodhis.
1KI 18:41 Eeliyaasi Akaabako, “Keyada ba; ma; uya; taani, wolqaama ira guunthi si7ayis” yaagis.
1KI 18:42 Hessa gisho, Akaabi maanawunne uyanaw bis. Shin Eeliyaasi Qarmeloosa zuma bolla keyidi, ba som7uwa ba gulbata giddo gelsidi hokis.
1KI 18:43 Eeliyaasi ba aylliyako, “Ane bada, abbaako simmada xeella” yaagis. Iya aylley bidi xeellidi, “Aybika bentenna” yaagis. Eeliyaasi ba aylliya laapun toho, “Qassika bada xeella” yaagis. Iya aylley laapun toho xeellis.
1KI 18:44 Laapunthon, “Kushe qaaqape daronna guutha shaari abbafe keyishin be7as” yaagis. Eeliyaasi, “Bada, ‘iri nena buussu diggonna mela ne para gaariyan uttada ne soo ba’ yaagada Akaabas oda” yaagis.
1KI 18:45 Guutha wodepe guye saloy kareetha shaaran dulkis; carkoy carkis; wolqaama iri bukis. Akaabi para gaariyan uttidi Izra7eela katamaa bis.
1KI 18:46 Godaa wolqay Eeliyaasa bolla wodhis. Eeliyaasi ba ma7uwa xeessan pude siqidi, Izra7eela katamaa gakanaw Akaaba sinthan woxis.
1KI 19:1 Eeliyaasi oothidaba ubbaanne Ba7aale nabeta ubbaa mashshan wodhidaysa Akaabi Elzabeelis odis.
1KI 19:2 Elzabeela, “Neeni he nabeta bolla oothidaysada wonto hannoode taani ne bolla oothonna ixiko, xoossati tana pirdo” yaagada Eeliyaasako kiittasu.
1KI 19:3 Eeliyaasi ba shempuwas yayyidi, ba aylliya ekidi, Yihuda biittan de7iya Barsaabe bis.
1KI 19:4 Issi gallasa oge mela biittan hemetis. I hemethaa aggidi issi sankara kuya garsan uttidi, “Abeeti Godaw, taw gidana; taani ta mayzatape aadhidike; ta shempuwa eka” yaagidi hayqo woossis.
1KI 19:5 Hessafe guye, sankara kuya garsan zaqullidi dhiskis. I dhiskidashin, Heko, issi kiitanchoy iya bochidi, “Denda; ma” yaagis.
1KI 19:6 I dendidi xeelliya wode, Heko, shucha mishan uuketidi, kaxida uythinne oto haathi iya huupheson be7is. I midi uyidaape guye simmidi dhiskis.
1KI 19:7 Godaa kiitanchoy nam7antho yidi, “Eeliyaasa, neeni baana ogey daro adusse gidiya gisho, dendada ma” yaagis.
1KI 19:8 Eeliyaasi dendidi mis, uyis. He I mida kathaa wolqan Xoossa Zumaa Koreeba gakanaw oytamu gallasinne oytamu qamma hemetis.
1KI 19:9 I yaa gakidi, gongolo giddo gelidi aqis. Goday, “Eeliyaasa, haysan ay oothay?” giya Xoossa qaalay iyako yis.
1KI 19:10 Eeliyaasi, “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa Xoossaas taani daro mishetas. Isra7eele asay neera caaqida caaquwa menthis; ne yarsho bessa laallidosona; ne nabeta mashshan wodhidosona. Taani tarka attas; ha77i enti ta shempuwa wodhanaw koyoosona” yaagis.
1KI 19:11 Goday, “Haysafe keyada deriya huuphen ta sinthan eqa” yaagis. Eeliyaasi eqidashin, Heko, Goday iya matara aadhis. He wode wolqaama carkoy zumaa phalqerethis; zaallata tincherethis; shin Goday he carkuwa giddon baawa. Carkuwafe guye biitti qaaxis; shin Goday he biitta qaaxuwan baawa.
1KI 19:12 Biitta qaaxuwape guye tami keyis; shin Goday tama giddon baawa. Tamape guye kalkashi si7etis.
1KI 19:13 Eeliyaasi he kalkashaa si7ida wode ba som7uwa afilan kammidi, kare keyidi gongoluwa pengen eqis. Heko, issi girsi Eeliyaasako, “Eeliyaasa, haysan ay oothay?” yaagis.
1KI 19:14 Eeliyaasi, “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa Xoossaas taani mishetas. Isra7eele asay neera caaqida caaquwa menthidosona; ne yarsho bessa laallidosona; ne nabeta mashshan wodhidosona. Taani tarka attas; enti ta shempuwa ekanaw koyoosona” yaagis.
1KI 19:15 Goday iyako, “Neeni yida ogiyara guye simmada Damasqo mela biitta ba. Neeni yaa gakiya wode Azaheela, Soore bolla kawo oothada tiya.
1KI 19:16 Namisa na7aa, Iyyu Isra7eele bolla kawo oothada tiya. Ne bessan nabe oothada Abeel-Mahoola addiya Safaaxa na7aa Elsa tiya.
1KI 19:17 Azaheela mashshafe kessi ekiya ubbaa Iyyuy wodhana; Iyyu mashshafe kessi ekiya ubbaa Elsi wodhana.
1KI 19:18 Shin Ba7aale eeqa goyinnona woyko banta doonan Ba7aale eeqa yeeronna 7,000 asaa taani Isra7eelen taw ashshana” yaagis.
1KI 19:19 Eeliyaasi he bessaafe dendidi bishe Safaaxa na7ay Elsi tammanne nam7u waaxa booran gade goyishin demmis; Elsi tammanne nam7antho waaxan goyees. Eeliyaasi iya matara aadhishe ba afila iya bolla yeggis.
1KI 19:20 Elsi boorata essidi, Eeliyaasa geedo woxi bidi, “Taani ta aawanne ta aayiw yeera sarothada yaana; yaape simmada nena kaallana” yaagis. Eeliyaasi, “Ero ba; ta nena diggike” yaagis.
1KI 19:21 Hessa gisho, Elsi guye simmidi waatha boorata shukis; boora miishiya qeridi ashuwa kathidi, asaas aathin asay midosona. Hessafe guye, dendi bidi, Eeliyaasas kiitetis.
1KI 20:1 Soore kawoy Ben-Hadaadi ba olanchota ubbaa shiishis. Hastamanne nam7u kawotan, enta parataninne para gaaretan maadetidi, Samaare katamaa teqidi; iya olis.
1KI 20:2 Isra7eele kawa Akaabako ase kiittidi haysada yaagis;
1KI 20:3 “Ne biraynne ne worqay tabaa; ne machetinne ne naytape lo77oti tabaa” yaagis.
1KI 20:4 Isra7eele kawoy zaaridi, “Ee, ta godaw kawaw, ne gidaysa mela; taka taw de7iyaba ubbay nebaa” yaagis.
1KI 20:5 Qassika, kiitetida asati nam7antho bidi, “Ben-Hadaadi haysada yaagees; ‘Ne biraanne ne worqaa, ne machetanne ne nayta taw sheedha’ gada kiittas.
1KI 20:6 Shin wonto hannoode ne kawo gadhuwanne ne moorinnata keethaa pilgana mela ta oosanchota yeddana. Enti ne lo77oba gada wothidaba ubbaa efana” yaagidosona.
1KI 20:7 Isra7eele kawoy biitta cimata ubbaa shiishidi, “Ha addey nuna dhaysanaw koyeysa be7ite. I ta machetanne ta nayta, ta biraanne ta worqaa ekanaw kiittin, ta ixabike” yaagis.
1KI 20:8 Cimatinne asa ubbay, “I odiyaba si7opa! Woyko iyaw ero goopa” yaagidosona.
1KI 20:9 Hessa gisho, Akaabi Ben-Hadaadi kiitida asatako, “Hinte ta godaa kawa, ‘Neeni koyro kiitida kiitaa ta polana; shin ha nam7antho kiita polanaw danda7ike’ yaagees gidi odite” yaagis. Kiitetida asati bidi hessa Ben-Hadaadas odidosona.
1KI 20:10 Ben-Hadaadi, “Tana kaalliya asaas Samaare kataman issi kuuca biitti gakiko xoossati tana pirdo” yaagis.
1KI 20:11 Isra7eele kawoy kiitetidi yidaysatako, “ ‘Tuma olanchoy olape simmishe gayresipe attishin, buroo bishe gayrenna’ yaagidi odite” yaagis.
1KI 20:12 Ben-Hadaadinne kawoti, banta dunkaaniya giddon ushshu uyishe hessa si7ida wode kawoy ba olanchotako, “Olanaw salpite” yaagidi kiittin, enti katamaa olanaw salpidosona.
1KI 20:13 Heko, issi nabey Isra7eele kawa Akaabako, “Goday ‘Ha daro olanchota ubbaa be7a? Taani hachi enta ne kushen aathada immana; ta Godaa gideysa neeni he wode erana’ yaagees” yaagis.
1KI 20:14 Akaabi, “Olaa doomanay oonee?” yaagis. Nabey, “Awuraja haareysati kiittiya na7atetha olanchoti doomo” yaagis. Kawoy, “Attiya olanchota ooni kiittanee?” yaagis. Nabey, “Neeni kiitta” yaagis.
1KI 20:15 Hessa gisho, Akaabi awuraja haareysati kiittiya na7atetha olanchota, 232 shiishis. Qassi 7,000 attida Isra7eele asaa shiishis.
1KI 20:16 Ben-Hadaadi bana maaddida hastamanne nam7u kawotara issife dunkaaniyan uttidi ushshan mathotidashin, seeta gallas Isra7eele olanchoti olas keyidosona.
1KI 20:17 Awuraja haareysati kiittiya na7atetha olanchoti koyro keyidi bidosona. Ben-Hadaadi xomoosana mela kiitida asati, “Samaarepe asay keyidi yuussaa bolla de7ees” yaagidi odis.
1KI 20:18 Ben-Hadaadi, “Enti sigetanaw yin, woyko oletanaw yin, enta paxa oykite” yaagis.
1KI 20:19 Awuraja haareysati kiittiya na7atetha olanchoti salpidi, katamaape gaxa keyidosona; Isra7eele olanchoti enta kaallidi keyidosona.
1KI 20:20 Issoy issoy baara ola gahetida morkiya wodhidosona. Soore asay baqatin, Isra7eele asati kaallidi yedethidosona. Qassi Soore Kawoy Ben-Hadaadi ba para asatara ba paran kessi ekidi bis.
1KI 20:21 Isra7eele kawoy olas keyidi, paratanne para gaareta di77is; Soore asaaka wodho buthis.
1KI 20:22 Hessafe guye, nabey Isra7eele kawako bidi, “Bada nena mintha. Oothanaw bessiyaba akeekada ootha. Wonto laythi bone Soore kawoy nena nam7antho olanaw yaana” yaagis.
1KI 20:23 Soore kawa moorinnati iya haysada yaagidi zoridosona; “Enta xoossati dere xoossata; enti nuna xooniday hessa gishosa. Shin nu entara denban oletiyako tuma nu enta xoonana.
1KI 20:24 Neeni issiba ootha; hastamanne nam7u kawota kiittiya halaqatethafe denthada enta bessan hara halaqata shuuma.
1KI 20:25 Nuuni Isra7eeletara denban oletidi xoonanaw danda7ana mela new kase wurida olanchota bessan olanchota, parata bessan parata, para gaareta bessan para gaareta wothada giigisa” yaagidosona. Kawoy Ben-Hadaadi enta zoriya ekidi hessada oothis.
1KI 20:26 Kaalliya laythi bone Ben-Hadaadi Soore olanchota shiishidi, Isra7eeletara oletanaw Afeeqa bis.
1KI 20:27 Isra7eele olanchoti shiiqidi, shinqenne ola miishe ekidi, entara oletanaw nam7u cuga gididi keyidosona. Isra7eeleti nam7u guutha deesha wude daanidi, entako simmidi uttidosona; shin Sooreti gaxariya ubbaa ma7idosona.
1KI 20:28 Issi Xoossa nabey Isra7eele kawako bidi, “Goday haysada yaagees; ‘Soore asay, Xoossay dere Xoossefe attishin, demba Xoossi gidenna yaagida gisho, ha daro olanchota taani ne kushen aathada immana. He wode taani Godaa gideysa neeninne ne asay erana’ ” yaagis.
1KI 20:29 Sooretinne Isra7eeleti woliko simmi salpidi, laapun gallas takidosona. Laapuntha gallasan ola gahetidosona. Isra7eeleti issi gallasan Soore asaape 100,000 toho asaa wodhidosona.
1KI 20:30 Entafe attidaysati kessi ekidi, Afeeqa katamaa gelidosona. Gelidaysatape 27,000 asaa bolla katamaa dirsa gimbey kundidi wodhis. Ben-Hadaadi katamaa giddo baqatidi, issi keetha qol7an qosetis.
1KI 20:31 Iya moorinnati, “Heko, Isra7eele kawoti, maariya kawota gideysa nu si7ida. Nuuni kayo ma7o ma7idi, nu xeessan wodoro dancidi, Isra7eele kawako boos; ooni eri, I nena paxa ashshona aggenna” yaagidosona.
1KI 20:32 Enti kayo ma7o ma7idi, wodoro banta xeessan dancidi, Isra7eele kawako bidosona. Iyako “Ne aylley Benihadad, tana wodhopa yaagidi woossees” yaagidosona. Kawoy, “I hanno gakanaw paxa de7ii? I ta ishaa” yaagis.
1KI 20:33 Akaabi lo77o malla haasaya daanin, asati iya odaa ellesi ekidi, “Ee, ne ishay Benihadad paxa de7ees” yaagidosona. I entako, “Bidi iya haa ekidi yiite” yaagis. Benihadad yin, Akaabi iya ba para gaariya bolla kessidi utisis.
1KI 20:34 Benihadad Akaabako, “Ta aaway ne aawape ekida katamata ta new zaarana. Ta aaway Samaaren giya essidaysada neka Damasqon giya essa” yaagis. Akaabi zaaridi, “Taani ha caaquwa gaasoyada nena yeddana” yaagis. Iyara caaqidi iya yeddis.
1KI 20:35 Nabeta cugaape issi addey, Goday kiittin, issi ba lagge nabiyako, “Tana shoca” yaagis; shin he nabey shoconna ixis.
1KI 20:36 He nabey iyako, “Neeni Godaa kiitaa ixida gisho, Heko, ne taape shaaketada biya wode nena gaammoy wodhana” yaagis. Nabey iyape shaaketidi biya wode gaammoy keyidi iya wodhis.
1KI 20:37 Nabey hara issi adde demmidi, “Tana shoca” yaagis. Addey iya shocin, nabey madunxis.
1KI 20:38 Nabey iya oonatethay eretonna mela guuluntidi kawa naagishe oge doonan eqis.
1KI 20:39 Kawoy aadhiya wode, nabey kawa xeegidi, “Taani ne aylley olan de7ishin, Heko, issi addey taako yidi, ‘Ha di7etida addiya naaga. Ha addey dhayiyaba gidiko, ne shempoy iya shempuwara gade woyko 3,000 bira santime qanxaasa’ yaagis.
1KI 20:40 Taani ne aylley oosoy darin, yaa haa gishin, addey kessi ekidi dhayis” yaagis. Isra7eele kawoy, “Neeni ne bolla pirdadasa” yaagis.
1KI 20:41 Nabey ba guulunthaa qaari yeggiya wode nabetape issuwa gideysa kawoy eris.
1KI 20:42 Nabey kawako, “Goday, ‘Taani, I hayqanaw bessees yaagida addiya ne yeddida gisho, ne shempoy iya shempuwa bessan, ne asay iya asaa bessan gidana’ ” yaagis.
1KI 20:43 Isra7eele kawoy yilotishenne azzanishe Samaaren de7iya ba gadho simmis.
1KI 21:1 Samaare Kawa Akaaba gadho matan Naabutes Izira7eelen woyne gadey de7ees.
1KI 21:2 Akaabi Naabuteko, “Ta gadhuwa matan de7iya gisho, ta atakilte tokiya bessi oothanaw ne woyne gadiya taw imma. Iya gisho new ta hara lo77o woyne gade immana; woyko ne dosiko iya gatiya ta new qanxana” yaagis.
1KI 21:3 Naabutey zaaridi, “Taani ta aawatape laattida gade new imisiyabaape Goday tana asho” yaagis.
1KI 21:4 Izira7eele addey Naabutey, “Taani ta aawatape laattida gade new immike” gida gisho, Akaabi yilotishenne azzanishe ba soo bidi, godaako simmi zin7idi, kathika moonna ixis.
1KI 21:5 Iya machiya Elzabeela iyako gelada, “Nena haysada yiloyiday aybee? Ayis kathi moonna ixay?” yaagada oychasu.
1KI 21:6 Akaabi, “Izira7eele addey Naabutey, ‘Ne woyne gadiya taw bayza woyko ne dosiko iya gisho ta new hara woyne gade immana’ yaagin, I, ‘Ta woyne gadiya new immike’ yaagin, ta hessa gisho yilotis” yaagis.
1KI 21:7 Elzabeela, “Ne Isra7eele bolla kawo gida uttada haysada hanay? Dendada ma! Wozanape ufayta! Izira7eele addiya Naabute woyne gadiya taani new imisana” yaagasu.
1KI 21:8 Hessa gisho, iya Akaaba sunthan dabdaabe xaafada, iya bolla maatame wothasu. Naabutera issife kataman de7iya cimatasinne gita asatas kiittasu.
1KI 21:9 Dabdaabe haysada yaagada xaafasu; “Issi gallas xooma awaajite; asaa issife shiishite; Naabute boncho bessan utisite.
1KI 21:10 Naabutey, ‘Xoossaanne kawa cayis’ yaagidi markatiya nam7u markata shiishidi, markatanaada oothite. Hessafe guye, katamaape gaxa kessidi, shuchan caddidi wodhite” yaagada xaafasu.
1KI 21:11 Hessa gisho, Naabutera issife kataman de7iya cimatinne gita asati Elzabeela entaw xaafida dabdaabiyan gidaysada oothidosona.
1KI 21:12 Enti xooma awaajidi, Naabute asaa giddon boncho bessan utisidosona.
1KI 21:13 Nam7u wordo markati yidi, iyako simmi uttidi, asaa sinthan, “Naabutey Xoossaanne kawa cayis” yaagidi wordo markatidosona. Naabute katamaape gaxa kessidi, shuchan caddidi wodhidosona.
1KI 21:14 Cimati Elzabeeliko, “Naabutey shuchan cadetidi hayqis” yaagidi kiittidosona.
1KI 21:15 Naabutey shuchan cadetidi hayqidaysa Elzabeela si7ida wode, “Izira7eele addiya Naabutey new miishen bayzanaw ixida woyne gadiya bada eka. I ha77i hayqis” yaagasu.
1KI 21:16 Izira7eele addey Naabutey hayqidaysa Akaabi si7idi, Naabute woyne gadiya baw ekanaw dendidi bis.
1KI 21:17 Hessafe guye, Tesiba addiya Eeliyaasako Godaa qaalay yidi,
1KI 21:18 “Samaaren kawotida Isra7eele Kawa Akaabara gahetanaw ba. Heko, I Naabute woyne gadiya ekanaw bidi, yan de7ees.
1KI 21:19 Goday haysada yaagees gada iyaw oda; ‘Addiya wodhada iya gadiya new ekadasa gidikii?’ yaaga. Qassi Goday, ‘Naabute suutha kanati laaccida bessan ne suuthaaka kanati laaccana’ ” yaagis.
1KI 21:20 Akaabi Eeliyaasa be7ida wode, “Ta morkiyaw, tana demmadii?” yaagis. Eeliyaasi, “Ee, nena demmas. Neeni Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothanaw nena nagaras bayzadasa.
1KI 21:21 Goday neeko haysada yaagees; ‘Heko, taani ne bolla iitabaa ehana. Taani ne kochata dhaysana; taani Isra7eele biittan Akaaba soo asaape aylle gidin womaanno gidin, issi addey attonna dhaysana.
1KI 21:22 Neeni Isra7eele asaa nagara oosisada tana hanqethida gisho, ta ne soo asaa Nabaaxa na7aa Iyorbaama soo asaadanne Akiya na7aa Ba7oosa soo asaada oothana.’
1KI 21:23 Qassi Goday Elzabeeliba odishe, ‘Izira7eele katama gimbe dirsaa lanqen kanati Elzabeelo maana’ yaagees.
1KI 21:24 Akaaba koche gididi kataman hayqiya oonaka kani maana; gaxariyan hayqiya oonaka salo kafoti maana” yaagis.
1KI 21:25 Ba machiya Elzabeela denthethin, Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothanaw bana nagaras bayzida Akaaba mela asi baawa.
1KI 21:26 Akaabi, Goday Isra7eele asaa sinthafe gooddidi kessida Amooreta eeqa goyinnidi daro ixetidaba hanis.
1KI 21:27 Akaabi hessa si7ida wode ba ma7uwa daakidi, kayo ma7o ma7idi xoomis. Kayo ma7o ma7idi dhiskees; azzanishe hemetees.
1KI 21:28 Hessafe guye Godaa qaalay Tesiba addiya Eeliyaasako yidi,
1KI 21:29 “Akaabi bana ta sinthan waatidi kawushidaako be7adii? I ta sinthan bana kawushida gisho, taani dhayuwa iya wode ehike. Shin taani iya na7aa woden iya soo asaa bolla ha dhayuwa ehana” yaagis.
1KI 22:1 Sooreynne Isra7eeley oletonna heedzu laythi saro de7idosona.
1KI 22:2 Heedzantho laythan, Yihuda kawoy Iyosaafexi Isra7eele kawa be7anaw bis.
1KI 22:3 Isra7eele kawoy ba moorinnatako, “Galadan de7iya Raamota katamay nubaa gideysanne nuuni hanno gakanaw he katamaa Soore kawuwape ekanaw aykoka oothonaysa ereketii?” yaagis.
1KI 22:4 I, Iyosaafexa, “Galadan de7iya Raamota katamaa olanaw taara baanee?” yaagidi oychis. Iyosaafexi zaaridi, “Ee, neeni olaa baanaw giigiya wode ta neera baana. Ta olanchoti ne olanchota; ta parati ne parata” yaagis.
1KI 22:5 Qassi, Iyosaafexi Isra7eele kawa, “Gidoshin, sinthatada Godaa oycha” yaagis.
1KI 22:6 Isra7eele kawoy oyddu xeetu nabeta issife shiishidi, “Galadan de7iya Raamota katama olanaw booye boopo” yaagidi oychis. Enti, “Ba; Goday he katamaa kawa kushen aathidi immana” yaagidosona.
1KI 22:7 Shin Iyosaafexi, “Nuuni Godaa oychanaw danda7iya hara nabey haysan baawee?” yaagis.
1KI 22:8 Isra7eele kawoy zaaridi, “Nuuni iya baggara Godaa oychanaw danda7iya issi addey de7ees. I, Yimila na7aa Mikiyaasa. Shin I ubba wode tabaa iitabaape attishin, lo77oba odonna gisho ta iya ixayis.” Iyosaafexi, “Kawoy hessa goopo!” yaagis.
1KI 22:9 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele kawoy ba moorinatape issuwa xeegidi, “Yimila na7aa Mikiyaasa elle ekada ya” yaagis.
1KI 22:10 Isra7eele kawoynne Yihuda kawoy Iyosaafexi banta kawotetha ma7uwa ma7idi, Samaare katamaa geliya pengiya matan de7iya wudumman banta kawotetha araatan uttidosona; nabeti ubbay enta sinthan tinbite odoosona.
1KI 22:11 Entafe issoy, Kanaane na7ay Sedeqiyaasi birata kaceta giigisidi, “Goday haysada yaagees; ‘Sooreti dhayana gakanaw ne enta ha kacetan qaycana’ ” yaagis.
1KI 22:12 Hara nabeti ubbay, “Galadan de7iya Raamota katamaa bada ola; xoona. Goday he katamaa, kawa kushen aathidi immana” yaagidi odidosona.
1KI 22:13 Mikiyaasa xeeganaw kiitetidi bida addey, “Heko, nabeti ubbay issi doona gididi, ‘Kawoy ha olaa xoonana’ yaagidi odidosona. Hessa gisho, hayyana ne odayka entaysa mela gido; ne lo77oba oda” yaagis.
1KI 22:14 Shin Mikiyaasi, “Goday eriya mela, Goday taw odiyaba ta odana” yaagis.
1KI 22:15 Mikiyaasi kawako yida wode, kawoy, “Mikiyaasa, nu Galadan de7iya Raamota katamaa olanaw biino boopo” yaagidi oychis. Mikiyaasi, “Bada ola; ne xoonana. Goday he katama kawa kushen aathidi immana” yaagis.
1KI 22:16 Kawoy, “Ne Godaa sunthan taw tuma odana mela ta nena aapun toho caaqetho?” yaagis.
1KI 22:17 Mikiyaasi, “Isra7eele olanchoti ubbay henthanchoy bayna dorsada deriya bolla laaletidaysa ta be7as. Goday, ‘Haysatas godi baawa. Enti ubbay banta soo soo saro boo’ ” yaagis.
1KI 22:18 Isra7eele kawoy Iyosaafexako, “I tabaa iitabaa odeesipe attishin, lo77oba odi erenna gada, ta new odabikina?” yaagis.
1KI 22:19 Mikiyaasi gujidi, “Hiza Goday giyaba si7a! Goday ba araatan uttin, salo kiitanchoti ubbay iya ushachaninne haddirsan eqidashin be7as.
1KI 22:20 Goday, ‘Akaabi Galadan de7iya Raamota katamaa bidi, yan hayqana mela balethanay oonee?’ yaagis. Issoy haysada giya wode hankoy qassi hessada gees.
1KI 22:21 Wursethan issi ayyaani keyidi Godaa sinthan eqidi, ‘Ta iya balethana’ ” yaagis.
1KI 22:22 Goday, “Ne waata balethanee?” yaagis. Ayyaanay, “Ta bada, iya nabeta ubbaa doonan wordo ayyaana gidana” yaagis. Goday, “Ne iya balethana; new hessi hanana. Bada baletha” yaagis.
1KI 22:23 Mikiyaasi gujidika, “Heko, Goday ne bolla dhayo ehanaw qachida gisho ne nabeta ubbaa doonan wordo ayyaana wothis” yaagis.
1KI 22:24 Hessafe guye, Kenaana na7ay Sedeqiyaasi shiiqidi, Mikiyaasa baqidi, “Godaa Ayyaanay tana aggidi waanidi new odanaw bidee?” yaagis.
1KI 22:25 Mikiyaasi, “Heko, neeni qosetanaw qol7a geliya gallas hessa demmana” yaagis.
1KI 22:26 Isra7eele kawoy ba olanchotape issuwa, “Mikiyaasa oykada katama haariya Amoonesinne ta na7aa Iyo7aasas efada imma.
1KI 22:27 Kawoy simmana gakanaw ha addiya qasho keethan wothite. Taani saro simmana gakanaw, guutha uythafenne haathaafe haraba aykoka iyaw immopite” yaagis.
1KI 22:28 Mikiyaasi, “Tuma ne saro simmiyaba gidiko, Goday taw odibeenna” yaagis. Qassika, Mikiyaasi, “Asa ubbay ta odidaysa akeekite” yaagis.
1KI 22:29 Hessafe guye, Isra7eele kawoynne Yihuda kawoy Iyosaafexi Galadan de7iya Raamota katamaa bidosona.
1KI 22:30 Isra7eele kawoy Iyosaafexi, “Ta ma7uwa laammada, hara asi daanada olaa gelana; shin neeni ne kawo ma7uwa ma7a” yaagis. Isra7eele kawoy ma7uwa laammidi, hara asi daanidi olaa gelis.
1KI 22:31 Soore kawoy ba para gaareta kiittiya hastamanne nam7u asatako, “Kawa xalaali attishin, hara ooderaka oletofite” yaagidi kiittis.
1KI 22:32 Para gaariya kiitteysati Iyosaafexa be7ida wode, “Tuma haysi Isra7eele kawa” yaagidosona. Iyara oletanaw simmin Iyosaafexi waassis.
1KI 22:33 Para gaareta kiitteysati, I Isra7eele kawa gidonnaysa be7idi, iya yedetheysa aggaagidosona.
1KI 22:34 Gidoshin, issi addey coo ba dongiya bolla dukidi, Isra7eele kawa olaa ma7oy gahetiya bessaara caddin, Isra7eele kawoy ba gaariya laagiya addiyako, “Gaariya guye zaarada, tana olaa giddofe kessa; taani iita cache cadetas” yaagis.
1KI 22:35 He gallas olay goobiya wode, Isra7eele kawoy Akaabi ba para gaariya giddon zempidi, Sooreta sinthan takis. Iya suuthay para gaariya giddo gukin, I omarsi hayqis.
1KI 22:36 Away wullanaw matishin, “Asa ubbay ba katamaa katamaa boo! Asa ubbay ba biitta biitta boo!” giya kiiti si7etis.
1KI 22:37 Enti kawa Samaare katamaa efidi yan moogidosona.
1KI 22:38 Layma maccasati meecetiya, teqetidi uttida Samaare haathan gaariya meeccidosona. Goday kase odida qaalada iya suuthaa kanati laacidosona.
1KI 22:39 Akaabi hanida harabay, I oothidaba ubbay, dangarsa zaalen kawo gadho keexidabaanne gimbida katamatabay ubbay Isra7eele kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
1KI 22:40 Akaabi hayqidi ba mayzatan gahetis; iya bessan iya na7ay Akaziyaasi kawotis.
1KI 22:41 Isra7eele kawoy Akaabi kawotida oyddantho laythan Asa na7ay Iyosaafexi Yihudan kawotis.
1KI 22:42 I kawotiya wode laythi iyaw hastamanne ichasha; I Yerusalaamen laatamanne ichashu laythi kawotis. Iya aayiya Shiliha na7iw Azuubo.
1KI 22:43 Iyosaafexi ba aawa Asa ogiyan hemetis; I he ogiyape gede haa gibeenna; Godaa sinthan suureba oothis. Gidoshin, dhoqa goyinno bessata dhaysibeenna; asay he bessan yarshonne ixaane cuyisethi aggibeenna.
1KI 22:44 Iyosaafexi Isra7eele kawuwara sigetis.
1KI 22:45 Iyosaafexi hanida harabay, iya minotethaynne I oletida olay Yihuda kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
1KI 22:46 Iya aaway Asi kawotida wodiyape doomin, attida addera addera laymateyisata biittafe diggis.
1KI 22:47 He wode Edoome biittan kawoy baawa; he biittan shuumetida halaqi haaris.
1KI 22:48 Ofira biittafe worqa ehana mela Iyosaafexi gita markabeta oosisis; shin he markabeti Exiyoon-Gabiran meqeretidosonape attishin, kumthi bibookona.
1KI 22:49 He wode Akaaba na7ay Akaziyaasi, “Ta oosanchoti ne oosanchotara issife markabiyan boo” yaagis; shin Iyosaafexi ixis.
1KI 22:50 Iyosaafexi hayqidi ba mayzatan gahetis. Ba mayza Dawita Kataman moogetis. Iya bessan iya na7ay Iyoraami kawotis.
1KI 22:51 Yihuda kawoy Iyosaafexi kawotida tammanne laapuntho laythan, Akaaba na7ay Akaziyaasi Isra7eele bolla Samaaren kawotis; Isra7eele bolla nam7u laythi kawotis.
1KI 22:52 Akaziyaasi Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis; ba aawanne ba aaye ogiyaninne Isra7eele asa nagara oosisida, Nabaaxa na7aa Iyorbaama ogiyan hemetis.
1KI 22:53 Akaziyaasi Ba7aale eeqas oothis; iya goyinnis. Iya aaway kase oothidaysada, Godaa Isra7eele Xoossaa hanqethis.
2KI 1:1 Akaabi hayqidaape guye, Moo7abe asay Isra7eele bolla dendidosona.
2KI 1:2 He wode kawoy Akaziyaasi Samaare katama bolla de7iya pooqiya barandaafe kundidi deshetis. Hessa gisho, asatako, “Bidi, taani ha hargiyafe paxaneko paxonnaako Eqroona xoossaa Bi7eel-Zebuula ane oychite” yaagidi kiittis.
2KI 1:3 Shin Godaa kiitanchoy Tesiba addiya Eeliyaasa haysada yaagis; “Pude bada, Samaare kawoy kiitida asatara gahetada, ‘Hinte Eqroona xoossaa Bi7eel-Zebuula oychanaw biday, Isra7eelen Xoossi dhayineyee?’
2KI 1:4 Goday haysada yaagees; ‘Kawaw, neeni hayqanaape attishin, ha zin7ida hiixape dendaka’ yaagees” yaaga. Hessa gisho, Eeliyaasi bidi entaw odis.
2KI 1:5 Kiitetida asati kawako guye simmin, “Ayis simmidetii?” yaagidi enta oychis.
2KI 1:6 Enti, “Issi addey nuura gahetanaw yidi, hintena kiitida kawako simmidi, haysada yaagidi odite. Goday neeko, ‘Eqroona xoossa Bi7eel-Zebuula oychanaw neeni ase kiittey, Isra7eelen xoossi dhayneyee? Hessa gisho, neeni hayqanaape attishin, ha zin7ida hiixape dendaka’ yaagees” yaagidosona.
2KI 1:7 Kawoy, “Hintera gahetanaw yidi, haysa hintew odida addey ay mela asee?” yaagidi oychis.
2KI 1:8 Enti, “Ikisepe oosetida ma7o ma7idi, ba xeessan dafo dancees” yaagidi zaaridosona. Kawoy, “Hessi Tesiba addiya Eeliyaasa” yaagis.
2KI 1:9 Hessafe guye, kawoy issi toora mocona ishatamu wotaadaretara kiittis. Toora moconay dere huuphen uttida Eeliyaasako keyidi, “Xoossa aso, kawoy nena, duge wodhada haaya” yaagees.
2KI 1:10 Shin Eeliyaasi toora moconaako, “Taani Xoossaa asi gidiko, tami salope wodhidi, nenanne ne wotaadareta mo” yaagidi zaaris. Tami salope wodhidi, iyanne iya wotaadareta mis.
2KI 1:11 Kawoy hara toora mocona ishatamu wotaadaretara Eeliyaasako kiittis. Tora moconay Eeliyaasako, “Xoossa aso, kawoy nena duge wodhada haaya” yaagees.
2KI 1:12 Eeliyaasi, “Taani Xoossaa asi gidiko, tami salope wodhidi, nenanne ne wotaadareta mo” yaagis. Xoossa tami salope wodhidi, iyanne iya wotaadareta mis.
2KI 1:13 Kawoy heedzantho hara tora mocona ishatamu wotaadaretara Eeliyaasako kiittis. tora moconay Eeliyaasako bidi, iya sinthan gulbatidi, “Xoossa aso, hayyana tawunne taara de7iya asaas qadheta; nu shempuwa hayqope ashsha.
2KI 1:14 Heko, tami salope wodhidi, kase nam7u toora moconatanne enta wotaadareta mis. Shin ha77i taw qadheta!” yaagidi woossis.
2KI 1:15 Godaa kiitanchoy Eeliyaasako, “Yayyofa! Iyara duge wodha” yaagis. Eeliyaasi dendidi, iyara kawako duge bis.
2KI 1:16 “Goday haysada yaagees; ‘Isra7eelen Xoossi dhayine, neeni Eqroona xoossaa Bi7eel-Zebuula oychanaw ase kiittiday? Neeni haysa oothida gisho, hayqana! Ne zin7ida hiixape dendaka’ ” yaagees.
2KI 1:17 Eeliyaasi odida Xoossaa qaalada Akaziyaasi hayqis; Akaziyaasas adde na7i bayna gisho, iya ishay Iyoraami iya bessan kawotis. Hessi haniday Iyosaafexa na7ay Iyoraami Yihudan kawotida nam7antho laythana.
2KI 1:18 Akaziyaasi oothida haraba ubbay Isra7eele Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetidi de7ees.
2KI 2:1 Goday Eeliyaasa goten salo efanaw haniya wode, Eeliyaasinne Elsi Galgalape dendidi bidosona.
2KI 2:2 Eeliyaasi Elsako, “Goday tana Beetele kiitida gisho, hayyana neeni haysan gam7aasha” yaagis. Shin Elsi, “Goday eriya mela, ne shempoy ero! Taani neepe shaaketike” yaagis. Enti duge Beetele wodhidosona.
2KI 2:3 Beetelen de7iya nabeta cugay Elsako keyidi, “Goday hachi ne godaa neepe shaakidi efana haneysa eray?” yaagidi oychidosona. Elsi, “Ee erayis; shin hinte si77i giite” yaagidi zaaris.
2KI 2:4 Eeliyaasi Elsako, “Goday tana Iyaarko kiitida gisho, hayyana neeni haysan gam7aasha” yaagis. Shin Elsi, “Goday eriya mela, ne shempoy ero! Taani neepe shaaketike” yaagidi zaaris. Hessa gisho, enti Iyaarko bidosona.
2KI 2:5 Iyaarkon de7iya nabeta cugay Elsako keyidi, “Goday hachi ne godaa neepe shaakidi efana haneysa eray?” yaagidi oychidosona. I, “Ee erayis; shin hinte si77i giite” yaagidi zaaris.
2KI 2:6 Eeliyaasi Elsako, “Goday tana Yordaanose Shaafa kiitida gisho, hayyana neeni haysan gam7aasha” yaagis. Elsi, “Goday eriya mela, ne shempoy ero! Taani neepe shaaketike” yaagis. Enti nam7ay issife bidosona.
2KI 2:7 Nabetape ishatamu asati enta kaallidi, Yordaanose Shaafa gakanaw bidosona. Eeliyaasinne Elsi shaafa doonan eqidashin, nabeti entafe guuthu haakidi eqidosona.
2KI 2:8 He wode Eeliyaasi ba afilaa ekidi xaaxidi, iyara haatha shocin, haathay yaanne haanne shaaketin mela biittara pinnidosona.
2KI 2:9 Eeliyaasi Elsako, “Taani neepe eketanaape sinthe, new ay oothana mela koyay?” yaagis. Elsi, “Ne ayyaanay ta bolla nam7u kushe gidana mela, taani nena woossayis” yaagidi zaaris.
2KI 2:10 Elsi, “Neeni waaysiya oysho oychadasa. Shin taani neepe eketiya wode neeni tana xeelliyaba gidiko, hessi new hanana. Ne be7onna ixiko hanenna” yaagis.
2KI 2:11 Enti issife odetishe hemetishin, tama paratinne tama gaareti enta nam7aafe giddon gelidi, shaakis. Eeliyaasi goten salo keyis.
2KI 2:12 Elsi hessa be7idi, “Ta aawaw, ta aawaw! Isra7eele paratonne para gaareto!” yaagidi waassis. Hessafe simmin, I Eeliyaasa zaaridi be7ibeenna. Elsi azzanidi, ba ma7uwa nam7a kessidi, daakis.
2KI 2:13 Eeliyaasape wodhida ma7uwa denthidi, guye simmidi, Yordaanose Shaafa doonan eqis.
2KI 2:14 Eeliyaasape wodhida ma7uwa ekidi, iyara haatha shocidi, “Goday Eeliyaasa Xoossay awun de7ii?” yaagis. Elsi haatha shocida wode, haathay yaanne haanne shaaketin, shaafa pinnis.
2KI 2:15 Iyaarko yida nabeta cugay Elsa be7ida wode, “Eeliyaasa ayyaanay Elsa bolla shempis” yaagidosona. Enti iyara gahetanaw yidi, iya sinthan gufannidosona.
2KI 2:16 Enti, “Nuuni ne aylleti ishatamu mino asati haysan de7oos. Hayyana nuuni ne godaa koyanaw baana. Ooni eri, Godaa Ayyaanay iya ekidi, issi zuma huuphen woyko zangaara giddon yeggonna aggenna” yaagidosona. Elsi, “Akay, boopite” yaagis.
2KI 2:17 Shin akay guussay iya yeellayana gakanaw, enti iya woossidi aggonna ixin, “Biite” yaagis. Enti ishatamay bidi heedzu gallas kumethi koyidi, iya demmibookona.
2KI 2:18 Elsi Iyaarkon de7ishin, enti iyako simmidi yidosona. I, “Taani hintena ‘Boopite’ yaagabikinaa?” yaagis.
2KI 2:19 Hessafe guye, Iyaarkon de7iya asati Elsa, “Neeni nu goday be7eysada ha katamay duussas lo77o. Shin haathay iita; qassi biittayka ayfena” yaagidosona.
2KI 2:20 I, “Ane ooratha keren maxine yeggidi, eki yiite” yaagidi kiittin, iyaw ehidosona.
2KI 2:21 Elsi pultuwako bidi, maxiniya iyan yeggidi, “Goday, ‘Taani ha haatha pathas; hizape ha haathay hayqos gaaso gidenna; biittayka ayfana’ yaagees” yaagis.
2KI 2:22 Elsi odidaysada hachi gakanaw, he haathay xillo gidis.
2KI 2:23 Elsi yaape dendidi, pude Beetele keyis. I oge bolla de7ishin, yalaga adde nayti katamape keyidi, “La ha bo77aw, keya! La ha bo77aw, keya” yaagidi iya qelqisidosona.
2KI 2:24 Elsi guye simmi xeellidi, enta Godaa sunthan baaddis. Yaatin, nam7u macca babanthati keyidi, naytape oytamanne nam7u yalagata puuzerethidi wodhidosona.
2KI 2:25 Elsi yaape dendidi, Qarmeloosa zuma bolla keyis; yaape qassi Samaare simmis.
2KI 3:1 Yihuda kawoy Iyosaafexi kawotida tammanne hospuntho laythan, Akaaba na7ay Iyoraami Samaaren Isra7eele bolla kawotis; I tammanne nam7u laythi kawotis.
2KI 3:2 I, Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis. Shin ba aawanne ba aaye Elzabeeli mela iita gidenna; iya aaway oothida Ba7aale eeqa diggis.
2KI 3:3 Nabaaxa na7ay Iyorbaami Isra7eele asa oosisida nagaran oyketis; iyape haakibeenna.
2KI 3:4 Moo7abe kawoy Moosi dorse heemmiya asi. I Isra7eele kawas 100,000 anqara dorsatanne 100,000 urge dorsata ikisiya laythan laythan giirees.
2KI 3:5 Shin Isra7eele kawoy Akaabi hayqidaape guye, Moo7abe kawoy Moosi Isra7eele bolla makallis.
2KI 3:6 He wode kawoy Iyoraami Samaare keyidi, Isra7eele ubba shiishis.
2KI 3:7 Yihuda kawa Iyosaafexi kiita yeddidi, “Moo7abe kawoy ta bolla makallis; Moo7abera oletanaw neeni taara baanee?” yaagis. Iyosaafexi, “Ee baana; taani nena; ta asay ne ase; ta paray ne para yaagidi” zaaris.
2KI 3:8 Iyosaafexi, “Nuuni awura bidi enta olanee?” yaagidi oychis. Kawa Iyoraami, “Edoome mela biitta ogiyara kanthi bidi olana” yaagidi zaaris.
2KI 3:9 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele kawoy, Yihuda kawoynne Edoome kawoy olas keyidosona. Enti laapun gallasa oge yuuyidi bidaape guye, olanchotasinne enta mehiyas aybi haathi attibeenna.
2KI 3:10 He wode Isra7eele kawoy, “Goday nuna ha heedzu kawota issife Moo7abe kawas aathidi immanaw xeegida gisho nuna ayye!” yaagis.
2KI 3:11 Shin Iyosaafexi, “Nuuni iya baggara Godaa oychanaw haysan nabey baawee?” yaagidi oychis. Isra7eele kawa toora moconatape issoy, “Eeliyaasa kushen haathe qoliya Safaaxa na7ay Elsi haysan de7ees” yaagidi zaaris.
2KI 3:12 Iyosaafexi, “Ee, I tuma nabe” yaagis. Isra7eele kawoy, Iyosaafexi, Edoome kawoynne Elsako bidosona.
2KI 3:13 Elsi Isra7eele kawako, “Tananne nena gathey aybee? Bada ne aawaynne ne aayiya oychida nabeta oycha” yaagis. Isra7eele kawoy zaaridi, “Akay, ha heedzu kawota issife Moo7abe kawas aathidi immanaw nuna xeegiday Godaabay!” yaagis.
2KI 3:14 Elsi, “Taani iyaw oothiya De7o Goday ero! Yihuda Kawa Iyosaafexa gisho goonnako taani nena ayfenka xeellikeshin.
2KI 3:15 Ane ha77i taw diithi diixiya asi ehite” yaagis. Diixeysi diixishin, Godaa wolqay iya bolla wodhis.
2KI 3:16 Elsi, “Ha mela zangaara ubban olla bookite.
2KI 3:17 Goday, ‘Carko woyko ira be7eketa, shin ha bookida zangaaran haathi kumana; hinte, hinte meheynne hinte caana mehey uyana’ yaagees.
2KI 3:18 Haysi Xoossa sinthan laafaba; qassi I Moo7abe hintew aathidi immana.
2KI 3:19 Gimbetida katamatanne gita katamata ubbaa hinte xoonana. Lo77o mithata ubbaa qanxana; haatha pultota ubbaa hinte barana; aradda shooqata ubbaa iissidi shuchi kumida biitta oothana” yaagis.
2KI 3:20 Wontetha gallas wonta yarsho yarshiya wodey gakin, Edoome baggara haathi goggidi, biittan eellis.
2KI 3:21 Moo7abe asay, heedzu kawoti enta olanaw yidaysa si7idi, na7atethi, cimi, ola miishe tookanaw danda7iya asa ubbay xeegetidi, banta biitta zawa naagidosona.
2KI 3:22 Enti guura dendiya wode haatha bolla wodhida xalqey zo77idi, entaw suuthu daanidi bentis.
2KI 3:23 Enti, “Haysa suuthaa be7ite! Kawoti banta giddon issoy issuwara oletidi, hayqi wuridosona. Moo7abe bidi, ane enta miixaa qociroos” yaagidosona.
2KI 3:24 Moo7abe asay Isra7eela miixaa bin, Isra7eeleti dendidi, enta shocidosona. Shocidi enta biitta oykidi, Moo7abe asaa wodhidosona.
2KI 3:25 Katamata olidi dhaysidosna. Asa ubbay huuphen huuphen issi issi shuchu ekidi, aradda shooqati ubbay kametana gakanaw, enta bolla holidosona. Pulto ubbaa baridi, lo77o mitha ubbaa qanxidosona. Qir-Hereesera katama gimbiya xalaali attis; shin yambarshan oliya asati he katamaa shocidosona.
2KI 3:26 Moo7abe kawoy olay ba bolla goobidaysa be7ida wode mashsha dancida laapun xeetu asata ekis. Ola gidduwa daakidi, Edoome kawako pinnanaw dendis; shin iyaw hanonna ixis.
2KI 3:27 Hessafe guye, ba bessan kawotanaw de7iya ba bayra na7aa ekidi, katama gimbiya bolla taman xuuggidi yarshis. Moo7abeti Isra7eeleta bolla hanqo suullidosona. Isra7eeleti he katamaa aggidi, banta biitta simmidosona.
2KI 4:1 Nabetape issuwa machiya Elsako bada, “Ne aylley, ta azinay hayqis. I Godaa yayiya asi gideysa neeni eraasa. Shin ha77i iya aco aaway ta nayta nam7a baw aylle oothanaw koyees” yaagada iyaw odasu.
2KI 4:2 Elsi, “Yaatin taani new ay ootho? Ne son aybe de7ey? Ane taw oda” yaagis. Maccasiya, “Taw, ne ayllees guutha xaaron de7iya zaytepe attishin, harabay aybika baawa” yaagasu.
2KI 4:3 Elsi, “Bada ne shoorota ubbaafe kaysa otota garxa. Garxashe guuthu garxofa.
2KI 4:4 Hessafe guye, soo gelada, ne bollanne ne nayta bolla kariya gorda. Oto ubban zayte tiga; zaytey kumida otota issi bagga aatha” yaagis.
2KI 4:5 Maccasiya bada, kariya ba bollanne ba nayta bolla gordasu. Enti iw otota shiishin, iya zaytiya tigethi oykasu.
2KI 4:6 Oto ubbay kumida wode, maccasiya ba na7aako, “Ane taw hara oto ekada ya” yaagasu. Shin na7ay zaaridi, “Hari issi otoyka deenna” yaagis. Hessafe guye, zaytey goggeysa aggaagis.
2KI 4:7 Maccasiya simma bada Elsas odasu. I, “Bada zaytiya bayzada, ne acuwa qanxa. Attidaysa neeninne ne nayti go7etidi daanaw danda7eeta” yaagis.
2KI 4:8 Issi gallas Elsi issi dure maccasiya de7iya Suneema katama bin, maccasiya shoobbada, iya kathi muzasu. He gallasape doomin, I yaara aadhiya wode ubban kathi maanaw I soo gelees.
2KI 4:9 Iya ba azinaako, “Heko, ubba wode nu matara aadhiya addey Xoossaa asi gideysa taani erayis.
2KI 4:10 Ane issi guutha kifile pooqiya bolla iyaw keexoos; iya giddon arsi, oyde, xarpheezanne xompe wothoos. I nuuko yida wode ubban yaa gelanaw danda7ees” yaagasu.
2KI 4:11 Issi gallas Elsi Sunaama katama yidi, ba kifiliya pude keyidi yan shempis.
2KI 4:12 Ba aylliya Giyaazako, “Bada maccasiw xeega” yaagin, Giyaazi xeegin, iya yada Elsa sinthan eqasu.
2KI 4:13 Elsi Giyaazako, “Ha maccasiya ha ubbaa nuus oothasu. Nuuni new ay oothino? Nuuni bidi, kawa woyko toora mocona odisanabay aybi de7iyako iyo oycha” yaagis. Maccasiya, “Taani haysan ta asaa giddon de7ayis” yaagasu.
2KI 4:14 Elsi Giyaaza, “Yaatin, taani iw ay ootho?” yaagidi oychis. Giyaazi, “Iw na7i baawa; I azinay cimis” yaagis.
2KI 4:15 Elsi, “Maccasiw xeega” yaagis. Giyaazi iyo xeegis; iya yada, pengen eqasu.
2KI 4:16 Elsi, “Wonto laythi hannoode neeni adde na7a idimmana” yaagis. Maccasiya, “Akay, ta godaw, neeni Xoossaa asi gidiki, taw wordotopa” yaagasu.
2KI 4:17 Shin maccasiya qanthatasu; Elsi iw odidaysada, kaalliya laythi adde na7a yelasu.
2KI 4:18 Na7ay diccis; issi gallas katha cakiya asatara de7iya ba aawako bis.
2KI 4:19 Ba aawako, “Woo! Tana huuphey wodhees; woo! Tana huuphey wodhees” yaagis. Iya aaway issi aylliya, “Tookada aayeko efa” yaagidi kiittis.
2KI 4:20 Aylley na7aa ekidi, aayeko efis. Seeta gallas gidana gakanaw, na7ay ba aaye ki7on uttis; hessafe guye, na7ay hayqi aggis.
2KI 4:21 Maccasiya na7aa pude efada, Xoossa addiya arsan zin7isasu. Yaatada iya bolla kare gordada basu.
2KI 4:22 Ba azina xeegada, “Taani Xoossa addiyako elle bada yaana mela, aylletape issuwanne haretape issuwa taw yedda” yaagasu.
2KI 4:23 I, “Hachi ageena xeero gallas woyko Sambaata gidenna; nena iyako efey aybee?” yaagis. Iya zaarada, “Aybika baawa” yaagasu.
2KI 4:24 Iya hare caanada, ba aylliya, “Hariya laagga! Taani new odana gakanaw, lepi oothada laaggofa” yaagasu.
2KI 4:25 Maccasiya yaape dendada, Qarmeloosa zuman de7iya Xoossa addiyako basu. Elsi maccasiya haahon be7idi, ba aylliya Giyaaza, “Be7a, Sunaaman de7iya maccasiya yawusu.
2KI 4:26 Iyo mokanaw woxa bada, ‘Neeni saro? Ne azinay saro? Ne na7ay saro?’ yaagada oycha” yaagis. Maccasiya, “Nuuni ubbayka saro” yaagasu.
2KI 4:27 Maccasiya zumaa bolla de7iya Xoossaa addiyako gakida wode, hokada iya tohuwa oykasu. Giyaazi maccasiw digganaw shiiqis; shin Xoossa addey, “Agga! iya gita meton de7awusu; shin Goday taape hessa genthis. I metuwa taw odibeenna” yaagis.
2KI 4:28 Maccasiya, “Ta godaw, neeni taw na7a immana mela taani nena oychadina? Taani nena, ‘Tana coo cimmofa yaagabikinaa?’ ” yaagasu.
2KI 4:29 Elsi Giyaazako, “Ne adussa ma7uwa ne saqiyan sirqa; ta xam7a ekada ellesa. Ogen ooderaka gahetiko, sarothofa; oonika nena sarotiko, zaarada saro goopa. Ta xam7a na7aa som7uwa bolla wotha” yaagis.
2KI 4:30 Shin na7aa aayiya, “De7o Goday eriya mela, ne shempoy ero! Taani nena yeggada biike” yaagasu. Elsi dendidi, iyo kaallis.
2KI 4:31 Giyaazi entafe sinthatidi bidi, xam7a na7aa som7uwa bolla wothis. Shin girsi woyko shempoy baawa. Yaatin Giyaazi Elsara gahetanaw simmi yidi, “Na7ay barkibeenna” yaagidi odis.
2KI 4:32 Elsi soo gelidi, Heko, na7aa ahay iya arsan zin7idaysa be7is.
2KI 4:33 Ba bollanne na7aa bollanne kariya gordidi, Godaa woossis.
2KI 4:34 Na7aa aha bolla keyidi, ba doona iya doonan, ba ayfiya iya ayfiyan, ba kusheta iya kushetara gathidi zin7is; na7aa asatethay ho77is.
2KI 4:35 Elsi dendidi, soo giddon yaa haa simeretis. Nam7antho simmidi, na7aa bolla zin7is; na7ay laapun toho hadhishidaape guye xeellis.
2KI 4:36 Elsi Giyaaza xeegidi, “Sunaama maccasiw xeega” yaagis. Giyaazi iyo xeegin, iya yida wode, Elsi, “Ne na7aa eka” yaagis.
2KI 4:37 Maccasiya Elsa tohuwa bolla kundada, sa7an gufannasu; ba na7aa ekada kare keyasu.
2KI 4:38 Elsi Galgala simmidi yida wode, biittan koshi de7ees. Nabeta cugay iya sinthan uttidi de7ishin, I ba aylliya, “Wogga oto tama bolla wothada, nabetas woxe katha” yaagis.
2KI 4:39 Entafe issoy bonco maxidi ehanaw wora bidi, ecere leehe daaniyaba demmis. Tookanaw danda7eysa keena daro ecere leehe ekidi yis; I aybeko eronna ancidi, otuwan yeggis.
2KI 4:40 Asay maana mela woxiya kessidosona; enti woxiya tushi bari be7idi, “Nabiyaw, ha otuwan wodhiyabay de7ees” yaagidi waassidosona. Asay maanaw danda7ibookona.
2KI 4:41 Elsi, “Ane taw dhiille ekidi yiite” yaagis. He dhiilliya otuwan qolidi, “Asay maanada woxiya tigite” yaagis. Hessafe guye, otuwan iitabay bentibeenna.
2KI 4:42 Koyro gakida kathaafe uuketida laatamu banga daabbuwa, tiya kathara issife ba ogoruwan yeggidi, Xoossa addiyas ehiya issi addey Ba7aal-Shalishapee yis. Elsi ba aylliya, “Maana mela asaas aatha” yaagis.
2KI 4:43 Iya aylley, “Taani xeetu asaa sinthe haysa waatada aatho?” yaagidi oychis. Shin Elsi, “Maana mela asaas aatha; Goday ‘Enti midi kallin, tiifey attana’ ” yaagis.
2KI 4:44 Hessa gisho, aylley enta sinthe aathin, enti midosona; Goday gidaysada tiifey attis.
2KI 5:1 Araame kawas mino toora mocona gidida Ni7imaani, ba godan daro dosetidanne bonchetida asi. Iya baggara Goday Araame olanchotas xoono immis. Ni7imaani toora qara; shin goga hargey iya bolla de7ees.
2KI 5:2 Issi wode Araame biittafe paannoti Isra7eele biitta bidi, issi macca na7a Isra7eelepe di77idosona. He na7iya Ni7imaane machees aylle gidasu.
2KI 5:3 He na7iya ba godateko, “Ta goday Samaaren de7iya nabiyako bida gidiyako, I paxanashin” yaagasu.
2KI 5:4 Ni7imaani ba godaako bidi, Isra7eelepe yida na7iya gidaysa iyaw odis.
2KI 5:5 Araame kawoy Ni7imaaneko, “Ba, taani Isra7eele kawas dabdaabe xaafana” yaagis. Ni7imaani 3,000 bira santime, 6,000 worqa santime tammu kumetha ma7o ekidi bis.
2KI 5:6 I, ekidi bida dabdaabey, “Ha goga hargiyafe neeni ta aylliya, Ni7imaane pathana mela ha dabdaabiyara taani iya neeko yeddas” yaagis.
2KI 5:7 Isra7eele kawoy dabdaabiya nabbabida wode, ba ma7uwa daakidi, “Taani iya wodhanawunne pathanaw Xoosseyee? Taani issi asi iya goga hargefe pathana mela ha addey taako ayis kiittidee? I taara ooyetanaw gaaso koyeysa be7ite” yaagis.
2KI 5:8 Xoossa asi gidida Elsi Isra7eele kawoy ba ma7uwa daakidaysa si7ida wode ase kiittidi, “Ne ma7uwa ayis daakadii? Iya haa taako yedda; Isra7eelen nabey de7eysa taani iya erisana” yaagis.
2KI 5:9 Ni7imaani ba paratanne para gaaretara bidi, Elsa karen eqis.
2KI 5:10 Elsi, “Bada Yordaanose Shaafan laapun toho meeceta; ne hargiyafe neeni paxananne geeyana” yaagidi odana mela ba aylliya iyako kiittis.
2KI 5:11 Shin Ni7imaani hanqetidi, “I taako yidi, Godaa ba Xoossaa sunthaa xeegidi, ba kushiya ta maduntha bolla wothidi, tana ha goga hargiyafe pathees gada qopas.
2KI 5:12 Damasqo shaafati, Abaaninne Farfari Isra7eelen de7iya shaafatape aadhokonayee? Yaatin taani entan meecetada geeyikina?” yaagidi hanqetidi, guye simmis.
2KI 5:13 Iya aylleti iyako shiiqidi, “Nu Godaw, nabey gitaba oothana mela new odidaako, neeni oothikiyee? I nena, ‘Bada meecetada geeyiya’ gidaysi ayis deexidee?” yaagidosona.
2KI 5:14 I duge wodhidi, Xoossa addey iyaw odidaysada Yordaanose Shaafan laapun toho muuketidi meecetis. Iya asatethay na7a asatethada hanis; paxidi geeyis.
2KI 5:15 Hessafe guye, Ni7imaaninne iyara yida asa ubbay Elsako guye bidosona. Ni7imaani iya sinthan eqidi, “Heko, Isra7eele Xoossaafe attishin, hara Xoossi baynaysa taani ha77i eras. Hayyana ha77i taani, ne aylley immiya imota eka” yaagis.
2KI 5:16 Elsi, “Taani iyaw oothiya Goday eriya mela, taani neepe aybaka ekike” yaagis. Elsi imota ekanaada Ni7imaani woossin ixis.
2KI 5:17 Ni7imaani, “Neeni ekonna ixiko, taw nam7u baqulo caana biitta immana mela taani nena woossayis. Taani ne aylley hachife doomada xuussa yarsho ne Xoossaa yarshanaape attishin, hara xoossatas yarshike.
2KI 5:18 Shin Goday taw ne aylliyas issiba atto go. Ta kawoy Irmoona eeqa goyinnanaw geliya wode, taanika iya ajabada gelada goyinnanaw koshshees. Goday taw ne aylliyas hessa atto go” yaagis.
2KI 5:19 Elsi, “Saro gaka!” yaagis. Ni7imaani dendidi bis. I guuthu haakidi bishin,
2KI 5:20 Xoossa asi gidida Elsa aylley Giyaazi, “Ta goday, Elsi Soore Ni7imaani ehidabaape aybaka ekonna coo yeddis. Goday eriya mela, taani iya geedo woxa bada, iyape issiba ekana” yaagidi qopis.
2KI 5:21 Hessa gisho, Giyaazi Ni7imaane kaallis. Ba geedo woxiya Ni7imaane be7idi, iyara gahetanaw para gaariyape wodhidi, “Aybe, saro gidennee?” yaagidi oychis.
2KI 5:22 Giyaazi, “Aykoy baawa; saro! Shin tana ta goday, ‘Derey dariya Efreema biittafe nabeta bagga gidida nam7u panthati taako yidosona. Hayyana entaw heedzu mukulu bira santimenne nam7u kumetha ma7o imma’ yaagidi kiittis” yaagis.
2KI 5:23 Ni7imaani, “Hiza hayyana usupun mukulu bira santime eka” yaagis. Ni7imaani Giyaaza shoobbidi, bira nam7u karxiitan yeggidi, nam7u kumetha ma7onne nam7u aylleta toossidi, Giyaazape sinthe yeddis.
2KI 5:24 Giyaazi de7iya zuma enti gakida wode, biraanne ma7uwa entafe ekidi, soo gelsis. Yaatidi enta moyzin, enti bidosona.
2KI 5:25 Hessafe guye, soo gelidi, ba godaa Elsa sinthan eqis. Elsi, “Aw badii?” yaagidi oychis. Giyaazi, “Taani ne aylley awuka babike” yaagidi zaaris.
2KI 5:26 Shin Elsi, “Addey neera gahetanaw para gaariyape wodhiya wode, ta ayyaanay neera de7ees gidennee? Ha wodey, miishenne ma7o, woyko shamahonne woyne gade, woyko dorsa wudenne miiza wude, woyko addenne macca aylle ekiya wodee?
2KI 5:27 Hessa gisho, Ni7imaane oykida goga hargey nenanne ne kocha ubbaa merinaw oykana” yaagis. Giyaazi Elsa sinthafe keyidi bishin, he hargey iya oykin, iya gogay shachada booxis.
2KI 6:1 Nabeta cugay, Elsako, “Heko, nuuni de7iya bessay nuus daro xuummis.
2KI 6:2 Nuuni ubbay mithi qanxanaw Yordaanose Shaafa boos. Yan nuus duussa bessi keexoos” yaagidosona. Elsi, “Biite” yaagis.
2KI 6:3 Nabetape issoy, “Hayyana neenika nuura ne aylletara yedharkii?” yaagis. Elsi, “Ero baana” yaagidi zaaris;
2KI 6:4 Entara issife bis. Enti Yordaanose gakida wode mithi qanxo doomidosona.
2KI 6:5 Shin entafe issoy mithi qanxishin, beexiya ayfey kessi ekidi, haathan wodhis. He addey, “Ta godaw, taani garxa ekida beexe; taani hiza waano!” yaagidi waassis.
2KI 6:6 Elsi, “Awun gelidee?” yaagidi oychis; addey gelida bessa bessis. Elsi xam7a qanxidi, haathan holis; beexiya ayfey haatha bolla tooketis.
2KI 6:7 Elsi addiya, “Kessada eka” yaagis. Addey ba kushiya yeddidi ekis.
2KI 6:8 Araame kawoy Isra7eeletara oletishe de7ees. I ba toora moconatara, “Taani dumma dumma bessan miixa medhana” yaagis.
2KI 6:9 Elsi, “Araame asay he bessan qosetida gisho, he bessaara yaa boopa” yaagidi Isra7eele kawas kiitta yeddis.
2KI 6:10 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele kawoy Xoossaa asi mallida bessaa ase kiittidi, yan de7iya asay naagetana mela odis. Kawoy naagetana mela Elsi woden woden odees.
2KI 6:11 Ha hanotay Araame kawa daro hanqethin, ba toora moconata xeegidi, “Nu giddon Isra7eele kawa bagga gididi de7ey ooneko ane taw odite” yaagidi oychis.
2KI 6:12 Iya toora moconatape issoy, “Ta godaw, kawaw, nu giddon hessa oothiya oonika baawa. Shin neeni ne qol7an odetiyaba ubbaa Isra7eelen de7iya nabey Elsi Isra7eele kawas odees” yaagis.
2KI 6:13 Kawoy, “Taani ase kiittada iya di7ana mela bidi awun de7iyako koyite” yaagis. Enti, “Heko, I, Dootanen de7ees” yaagidi odidosona.
2KI 6:14 Kawoy daro olanchota parataranne para gaaretara yaa yeddis. I yeddida asati qamma yidi, katama teqidosona.
2KI 6:15 Elsa aylley wontetha gallas guura dendidi, kare keyiya wode, olanchoti parataranne para gaaretara katamaa teqidosona. He aylley, “Heko, nuuni dhayida! Ta godaw, nu waanino?” yaagidi oychis.
2KI 6:16 Elsi, “Yayyofa! Nuura de7eysati entara de7eysatape aadhosona” yaagidi zaaris.
2KI 6:17 Hessafe guye, Elsi, “Abeeti Godaw, I be7ana mela iya ayfiya dooya” yaagidi woossis. Goday Elsa aylliya ayfiya dooyin, Heko, Elsa yuusho ubban de7iya tama paratinne para gaareti zumaa ma7is.
2KI 6:18 Sooreti iya teqida wode Elsi, “Ha asata ayfiya qooqisarki” yaagidi Godaa woossis. Elsi woossidaysada Goday enta ayfiya qooqisis.
2KI 6:19 Hessafe guye, Elsi, “Ogey haysara deenna; katamay haysa gidenna. Hinte koyiya uraa ta hintena bessaana; tana kaallite” yaagidi, enta kaalethidi, Samaare katamaa efis.
2KI 6:20 Enti Samaare katamaa gelida wode Elsi, “Abeeti Godaw, ha asati xeellana mela enta ayfiya dooya” yaagis. Goday enta ayfiya dooyin, Heko, enti Samaare giddon de7eysa be7idosona.
2KI 6:21 Isra7eele kawoy enta be7ida wode, “Ta aawaw, taani enta wodho? Taani enta wodho?” yaagidi oychis.
2KI 6:22 Elsi, “Akay, wodhopa! Hari attoshin, neeni ne mashshaninne ne dongiyan di77idaysataka wodhanaw bessenna. Enti midi uyidi banta godaako baana mela kathi enta muza” yaagis.
2KI 6:23 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele kawoy entaw gibira giigisin, enti midaapenne uyidaape guye, enta yeddin, banta godaako simmidosona. He wodepe doomin, Araameti Isra7eeleta bolla dendeysa aggaagidosona.
2KI 6:24 Hessafe guye, Araame kawoy Wolde-Adari ba olanchota ubbaa shiishidi, Samaare katama teqis.
2KI 6:25 Hessa gaason Samaare kataman gita koshi gelin, issi hare huuphey hospun tammu bira santimen, nam7u xeetu giraame gidiya holle shi7i ichashu bira santimen bayzetis.
2KI 6:26 Isra7eele kawoy katamaa dirsa gimbiya bollara aadhishin, issi maccasiya, “Ta godaw, kawaw, tana maaddarki” yaagada waassasu.
2KI 6:27 Kawoy, “Nena Goday maaddonna ixiko, taani new maado awupe ehanee? Katha bukiya wudummafeye, woyne ayfiya gum7iya bessaafee?” yaagis.
2KI 6:28 Kawoy, “Ne metoy aybee?” yaagidi oychis. Maccasiya zaarada, “Ha maccasiya, ‘Hachi maanaw ne na7a ekada ya; qassi wonto ta na7aa maana’ yaagasu.
2KI 6:29 Yaatin, ta na7aa kathidi mida; wontetha gallas taani, ‘Nuuni maanaw ne na7aa ekada ya’ yaagas. Shin iya ba na7aa qosasu” yaagasu.
2KI 6:30 Kawoy maccasiya odidaysa si7idi, ba ma7uwa daakis. I gimbiya bollara aadhishin, asay garsa baggara I ma7ida kayo ma7uwa be7idosona.
2KI 6:31 Kawoy, “Safaaxa na7aa Elsa guuggey iya bolla hachi pee7iko, Xoossi tana pirdo!” yaagis.
2KI 6:32 He wode Elsi ba son uttis; cimatika iyara issife de7oosona. Kawoy baape sinthe ase kiittis; shin he addey gakanaape sinthe, Elsi cimatako, “Ha shempo wodheysi ta qoodhiya muucisanaw ase kiittidaysa hinte be7eetii? He kiitetidaysi yida wode ibithe gordidi gelsofite; iya godayka iya kaallidi yishe de7ees” yaagis.
2KI 6:33 I cimatara odetishin, Heko, kiitetidaysi gaki wodhis; I, “Ha metoy Godaape yis. Yaatin, taani Godaa ayis naagiyana?” yaagis.
2KI 7:1 Elsi, “Godaa qaala si7a! Goday haysada yaagees. Wonto hannoode heedzu kilo giraame giste dhiilley woyko usupun kilo giraame bangi Samaare katama pengen issi bira santimen bayzetana” yaagis.
2KI 7:2 Kawas matatiya halaqay Xoossa addiyako, “Goday salo maskooteta dooyakoka hessi hanenna” yaagis. Shin Elsi zaaridi, “Neeni hessa ne ayfiyan be7ana; shin iyape maaka” yaagis.
2KI 7:3 Katamaa geliya pengiyan gita goga hargey oykida oyddu asati de7oosona. Enti issoy issuwako, “Nuuni hayqana gakanaw, haysan ayis gam7anee?
2KI 7:4 Nuuni katama geliko, koshi de7iya gisho, nuuni yan hayqana. Qassi haysan gam7ikoka hayqana. Hessa gisho, Araameta miixa ane boos. Enti nuna ashshiko attana; enti wodhiko hayqana” yaagidosona.
2KI 7:5 Sa7i dhumiya wode dendidi, Araameta miixaa bidosona. Enti bidi miixaa gakiya wode, Heko, issi asika yan baawa.
2KI 7:6 Hessi haniday, Goday para gaareta, paratanne daro olanchota qaala Araame asaa sissis. Yaatin enti issoy issuwako, “Heko, Isra7eele kawoy nuna olisanaw, Hitenne Gibxe kawota uneyidi ehis” yaagidosona.
2KI 7:7 Hessa gisho, enti dendidi, banta miixaa, banta dunkaaniya, banta paratanne banta hareta kumethi yeggi aggidi, sa7i dhuma de7ishin, banta shempuwa ashshanaw baqatidosona.
2KI 7:8 He gita goga hargey oykida asati Araameta miixaa gakidi, enta dunkaanetape issuwa gelidi, midosonanne uyidosona; bira, worqanne ma7o ekidi qottidosona. Nam7antho simmidi, hara dunkaaniya, gelidi iyape ekidaysa qottidosona.
2KI 7:9 Hessafe guye, enti issoy issuwa, “Nuuni lo77oba oothibooko. Hachi mishiraacho gallas; shin nuuni si77i gida. Sa7i wontana gakanaw, si77i gidi uttiko, nuuni seeretana. Ane, ha77i bidi, kawo gadhon de7iya asaas odana” yaagidosona.
2KI 7:10 Hessa gisho, enti bidi, katamaa pengiya naageysata xeegidi, “Nuuni Araame miixaa bida; shin, Heko, issi asi woyko asa girsi he bessan baawa. Qashetida parata xalaalinne hareti de7oosona; qassi enti aggidi bida dunkaaneti de7oosona” yaagidosona.
2KI 7:11 Pengiya naageysati xeegidi, kawo gadhon de7iya asaas odidosona.
2KI 7:12 Kawoy qamma dendidi, “Araameti nuna oothidaba taani hintew odana. Nuuni koshatidaysa enti eroosona. Hessa gisho, banta heerape keyidi, gaxariyan qosetidi, enti katamaape kare keyin, nuuni enta paxa oykidi, katama gelana yaagidi qopidosona” yaagidi ba shuumatas odis.
2KI 7:13 Kawa halaqatape issoy, “Ha kataman attida asay kase hayqida asaa mela hayqope attenna. Hessa gisho, hanidaba eranaw ane asaa dooroos. Attida ichashu paratara ane enta Sooreta miixaa yeddoos” yaagis.
2KI 7:14 Guutha asatanne nam7u para gaareta dooridosona. Kawoy enta Soore olanchota geedo yeddidi, “Bidi haniyaba be7ite” yaagidi kiittis.
2KI 7:15 Asati enta geedo kaallidi, Yordaanose Shaafa gakanaw bidosona. Araame asati baqatishe yeggida ma7oynne ola miishey ogiyan kumis. Kiitetida asati guye simmidi, kawas odidosona.
2KI 7:16 Asay bidi, Araameta miixaa bonqidosona. Goday gidaysada heedzu kilo giraame giste dhiilley woyko usupun kilo giraame bangi issi bira santimen bayzetis.
2KI 7:17 Kawoy baw matiya halaqaa penge naageysata halaqa oothidi shuumis; shin asay iya pengen yedhis. Kawoy Elsako bida wode, Elsi ha halaqa bolla odidaysada addey hayqis.
2KI 7:18 Xoossaa asi gidida Elsi kase kawas, “Wonto hannoode heedzu kilo giraame giste dhiilley woyko usupun kilo giraame bangi Samaare kataman issi bira santimen bayzetana” yaagis.
2KI 7:19 He wode halaqay Elsako, “Goday salo maskooteta dooyakoka hessi hanenna” yaagis. Elsi, “Heko, neeni hessa ne ayfen be7ana; shin iyape maaka” yaagidi zaaris.
2KI 7:20 Elsi odidaysada, he addey, asay pengen yedhin hayqis.
2KI 8:1 Elsi, hayqida I na7aa pathida maccasiw, “Ne soo asaa ekada haysafe bada neeni danda7iya bessan awunka de7a. Goday laapun laytha koshaa ha biitta bolla yeddis” yaagis.
2KI 8:2 Maccasiya Elsi odidaysada ba soo asaara bada, Filisxeeme biittan laapun laythi de7asu.
2KI 8:3 Laapuntha laytha wursethan maccasiya Filisxeeme biittafe simmasu. Ba keethaanne ba gadiya oychanaw kawako basu.
2KI 8:4 He wode kawoy Xoossaa asi gidida Elsa aylliya Giyaazara odetishe, “Elsi oothida gita ooso ubbaa ane taw oda” yaagis.
2KI 8:5 Elsi hayqida na7aa waatidi pathidaako, Giyaazi kawas odishin, Heko, Elsi I na7aa pathida maccasiya ba keethaanne ba gadiya oychanaw yasu. Giyaazi, “Ta godaw, kawaw, maccasiya hannashu; Elsi hayqope pathida I na7ayka haysish” yaagis.
2KI 8:6 Kawoy maccasiw oychin, iyaw odasu. Hessa gisho, kawoy halaqaa xeegidi, “Ha maccaseeba gidida ubbaanne iya agga bida wodiyape hachi gakanaw I gaden mokida ubbaa iw zaara” yaagidi kiittis.
2KI 8:7 Elsi Damasqo katama bidi gakiya wode, Soore kawoy Wolde-Adari saketees. I, “Xoossaa asi haysa yis” giya wore si7is.
2KI 8:8 Kawoy Azaheelako, “Immiyaba ekada Xoossa addiyara gahetanaw bada, ‘Taani ha hargiyafe paxanee?’ yaagada Godaa oycha” yaagis.
2KI 8:9 Hessa gisho, Azaheeli Damasqon de7iya dumma dumma qommo muruutape oytamu gimalen caanidi, Elsara gahetanaw bis. Elsa sinthan eqidi, “Ne na7ay Araame kawoy Wolde-Adari, ‘Taani ha hargiyafe paxanee?’ yaagidi, nena oychanaada tana neeko kiittis” yaagis.
2KI 8:10 Elsi Azaheelako, “Neeni bada iyako, ‘Tuma neeni paxana’ yaaga. Shin I tuma hayqanaysa tana Goday bessis” yaagis.
2KI 8:11 Azaheeli yeellatana gakanaw, Elsi iya tishshi oothidi xeellidi yeekis.
2KI 8:12 Yaatin, Azaheeli, “Ta goday ayis yeekii?” yaagidi oychis. Elsi, “Neeni Isra7eele asa bolla oothana iitabaa taani eriya gisho yeekayis. Enta miixaa neeni taman xuuggana; enta panthata neeni mashshan wodhana. Qassi enta yooga naytaka neeni shuchan mentherethana; enta qantha maccasata uluwa neeni daakana” yaagidi zaaris.
2KI 8:13 Azaheeli zaaridi, “Taani ne aylley, pathenna kanay, haysa mela gitaba waatada oothanaw danda7iyana?” yaagis. Elsi zaaridi, “Neeni Araame biittan kawotanaysa tana Goday bessis” yaagis.
2KI 8:14 Hessafe guye, Azaheeli Elsafe shaaketidi, ba godaako simmis. Wolde-Adari, “Elsi nena woygidee?” yaagidi oychis. Azaheeli, “Neeni tuma paxana” yaagis.
2KI 8:15 Shin wontetha gallas Azaheeli bulluko ekidi, haathan muukidi, kawa iyara tuccin, kawoy hayqis. Azaheeli iya bessan baw kawotis.
2KI 8:16 Akaaba na7ay, Isra7eele kawoy Iyoraami kawotida ichashantho laythan, Yihuda Kawa Iyosaafexa na7ay Iyoraami Yihudan kawotis.
2KI 8:17 Iyoraami kawotiya wode iyaw laythay hastamanne nam7a; I Yerusalaamen hospun laythi kawotis.
2KI 8:18 Iyoraami Akaaba na7iw macho ekida gisho, Akaaba soo asay hemetidaysada kase Isra7eele kawota ogiyan hemetis; Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis.
2KI 8:19 Gidoshin, ba aylliya Dawita gisho, Goday Yihuda dhaysanaw koybeenna; Dawita kochay merinaw kawotanaw de7eysa Goday ufaysa qaala immis.
2KI 8:20 Iyoraami kawotida wode, Edoome asay Yihuda kawa bolla makallidi, bantaw kawo kawoydosona.
2KI 8:21 Hessa gisho, Iyoraami ba para gaareta ubbaara Xa7ira geetetiya bessa bis. Edoome asati iyanne iya para gaareta halaqata teqidosona; shin Iyoraami qamma dendidi, kessi ekidi bis. Iya olanchoti baqatidi, guye soo simmidosona.
2KI 8:22 He wodepe doomidi hachi gakanaw, Edoome asay Yihuda asaas haaretibookona. Libina asay qassi he wode makallis.
2KI 8:23 Iyoraami hanida harabaynne I oothidaba ubbay Yihuda Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 8:24 Iyoraami hayqidi, ba mayzatan gahetis. Ba mayza Dawita Kataman moogetis; iya bessan iya na7ay Akaziyaasi kawotis.
2KI 8:25 Akaaba na7ay, Isra7eele kawoy Iyoraami kawotida tammanne nam7antho laythan, Yihuda kawa, Iyoraama na7ay Akaziyaasi Yihudan kawotis.
2KI 8:26 Akaziyaasi kawotida wode, iyaw laythi laatamanne nam7a; I Yerusalaamen issi laythi kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Gotolo; iya Isra7eele kawa Omira na7aa na7iw.
2KI 8:27 I entaw bollo gidida gisho, Akaaba soo asa ogiyan hemetis; Akaaba soo asay oothidaysada, I Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis.
2KI 8:28 Akaziyaasi Araame kawa Azaheelara Galadan de7iya Raamota kataman oletanaw bidi, Akaaba na7aa Iyoraamara issife bin, Araame asati Iyoraama caddidosona.
2KI 8:29 Iyoraami Araame kawa Azaheelara oletiya wode, Araame asati caddida cachafe paxanaw Izra7eele simmis. Iyoraama na7ay, Yihuda kawoy Akaziyaasi, cadetida Akaaba na7aa Iyoraama oychanaw duge Izra7eele bis.
2KI 9:1 Nabey Elsi nabeta cugaape issi asi xeegidi, “Ne ma7uwa ma7ada, xaaro zaytiya ne kushen oykada, Galadan de7iya Raamota ba.
2KI 9:2 Yaa gakada, Iyosaafexa na7aa, Namisa na7aa na7aa Iyyu koya. Iya demmada, iya laggetape iya shaakada qol7a gelsa.
2KI 9:3 Hessafe guye, xaaro zaytiya ekada, iya huuphiyan tigada, ‘Nena Isra7eele bolla kawo ootha tiyana mela Goday tana kiittis’ yaaga. Yaatada pengiya dooyada, ellesada baqata” yaagis.
2KI 9:4 Hessa gisho, pantha nabey Galadan de7iya Raamota bis.
2KI 9:5 I yaa gakida wode toora moconay issife zoretishin demmidi, “Godaw, taani new odiyabay de7ees” yaagis. Iyyuy, “Nu giddofe ooddes odanee?” yaagidi oychis. Nabey, “Godaw, new odana” yaagidi zaaris.
2KI 9:6 Iyyuy dendidi soo gelin, nabey iya huuphen zayte tigidi, “Goday Isra7eele Xoossay, nena haysada yaagees, ‘Neeni Godaa deriya, Isra7eele bolla kawotana mela taani nena tiyas.
2KI 9:7 Neeni ne godaa Akaaba kochaa dhaysana. Taani Elzabeela gussida nabeta, ta aylleta suuthaanne ta hara aylleta suuthaa haluwa kessana.
2KI 9:8 Akaaba kocha ubbay dhayana; taani Isra7eelen Akaaba kochaafe aylle gidin, womaanno gidin, adde ubbaa dhaysana.
2KI 9:9 Akaaba kochaa Nabaaxa na7aa Iyorbaama kochaadanne Akiya na7aa Ba7oosa kochaada oothana.
2KI 9:10 Elzabeelo, Izra7eela goshshan kanati maana; oonika iyo moogenna’ ” yaagis. Hessa odidaape guye, pengiya dooyidi baqatis.
2KI 9:11 Iyyuy ba lagge gidida toora moconatako bida wode, enti, “Sa7i saro? Ha gooshshay neeko ayis yidee?” yaagidi oychis. Iyyuy, “Ha addiyabanne iya odaa hinte ereeta” yaagis.
2KI 9:12 Enti, “Haysi wordo. Ane neeni nuus oda” yaagidosona. Iyyuy, “Neeni Isra7eele bolla kawo gidana mela taani nena tiyanaada Goday tana kiittis” yaagis.
2KI 9:13 He wode enti banta ma7uwa qaaridi, Iyyuy yedhidi keyiya dethan hiixidi, moyze punnidosona. Banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Iyyuy kawotis” yaagidosona.
2KI 9:14 Iyosaafexa na7ay, Namisa na7aa na7ay Iyyuy, Iyoraama bolla maqetis. Hessi haniya wode, Isra7eele asa ubbay Araame kawa Azaheela Galadan de7iya Ramootan naaganaw bidosona.
2KI 9:15 Shin entafe kawoy Iyoraami Soore kawa Azaheelara oletida wode, Araame biitta asay iya caddida cachas Izra7eele yis. Iyyuy halaqata, “Hinte qofay hessa gidiko, ha katamaape issi asika keyidi, Izra7eele kataman ha odaa odonnaada teqite” yaagis.
2KI 9:16 Hessafe guye, Iyyuy para gaariyan keyidi, Izra7eele bis. Iyoraami paxiboonnaysi yan shempees. Qassi Yihuda kawoy Akaziyaasi iya oychanaw yaa duge bis.
2KI 9:17 Izra7eela gimbiya bolla eqidi wocheysa xeegidi, “Issi cuga yeysa taw bentees” yaagis. Iyoraami, “Entara gahetanaada issi para yedda. Paraaway bidi, ‘Sa7i saro?’ yaago” yaagis.
2KI 9:18 Paraaway Iyyura gahetanaw bidi, “Kawoy nena, ‘Sa7ay saro?’ yaagees” yaagis. Iyyuy, “Saroban nena gathiyabay baawa. Ta guye aadhada tana kaalla” yaagidi zaaris. Wocheysi kawa, “Kiitetidaysi entako, gakis; shin guye simmibeenna” yaagidi odis.
2KI 9:19 Hessa gisho, kawoy nam7antho paraawa entako kiittis. I entako yidi, “Kawoy hintena, ‘Sa7i saro?’ yaagees” yaagis. Iyyuy, “New sarora ay gahetethi de7ii? Ta guye aadhada tana kaalla” yaagis.
2KI 9:20 Wocheysi, “Nam7antho paraaway entako gakis; shin guye simmidi yibeenna. Qassi gaariya laagoy Namisa na7aa na7aa Iyyu laaguwa mela; I gooya asada laaggees” yaagidi odis.
2KI 9:21 Kawoy Iyoraami, “Taw para gaare giigisite” yaagidi kiittis. Enti para gaare giigisidosona; Isra7eele kawoy Iyoraami Yihuda kawoy Akaziyaasi banta gaariyan gaariyan uttidi, Iyyura gahetanaw bidi, Izra7eele Naabute gaden iya demmidosona.
2KI 9:22 Iyoraami Iyyu be7ida wode, “Iyyu, sa7i saro?” yaagidi oychis. Iyyuy, “Ne aaye Elzabeeli laymatethaynne bitay de7ishin, saroy awun de7ii?” yaagidi zaaris.
2KI 9:23 Iyoraami ba para gaariya guye zaaridi baqatidi, Akaziyaasa xeegidi, “Akaziyaasa, haysi makalla” yaagis.
2KI 9:24 Iyyuy, ba dongiya ba kumetha wolqan dafidi, Iyoraama nam7u katisotape giddon dukis. Donge tooray iya wozanaara kanthidi keyin, ba gaariya giddon kundis.
2KI 9:25 Iyyuy toora mocona Bidiqaarako, “Iyoraama denthada, Naabute gaden ola. Neera taara issife Iyoraama aawa Akaaba kallidi toggidi bishin, Goday iya bolla tinbite odidaysi akeeka.
2KI 9:26 He wode Goday, ‘Naabute suuthaanne iya adde nayta suuthaa taani zine be7as; hessa acuwa taani nena tuma ha gaden qanxisana’ yaagis. Ha77i simmidi Goday gidaysada, Iyoraama denthada, ha gaden hola” yaagis.
2KI 9:27 Yihuda Kawoy Akaziyaasi hessa be7ida wode, Beet-Hagana baqatis. Iyyuy iya kaallidi yedethidi, “Iyaka wodhite” yaagis. Enti iya kaallidi, Yiblaama matan de7iya Guura pudethan iya gaariya bolla caddidosona. I Magido baqatidi, yan hayqis.
2KI 9:28 Iya aylleti gaariyan iya ekidi, Yerusalaame efidosona; iya mayzata matan Dawita Kataman moogidosona.
2KI 9:29 Akaaba na7ay Iyoraami kawotida tammanne issintho laythan Akaziyaasi Yihudan kawotis.
2KI 9:30 Hessafe guye, Iyyuy Izra7eela bis. Elzabeela hessa si7ida wode, ba ayfiya tiyada, ba huuphiya pixada, maskootiyara duge ogiya xeellasu.
2KI 9:31 Iyyuy pengera gelishin, “La ne godaa wodhida Zemira haysa saro yadii?” yaagasu.
2KI 9:32 Iyyuy pude maskootiyako xeellidi, “Ta bagga gidanay oonee? Oonee?” yaagis. Nam7u woyko heedzu shuufati iya xeellidosona.
2KI 9:33 Iyyuy, “Iyo duge holite” yaagis. Enti iyo duge holidosona. I suuthay godaa bollanne parata bolla dharcetis; parati banta tohuwan iyo yedhidosona.
2KI 9:34 Iyyuy kawa keethi gelidi, misinne uyis. I, “Ha baadetida maccasiw efidi moogite; ay gidikoka iya kawo na7a” yaagis.
2KI 9:35 Shin enti iyo mooganaw bidi, I guuggiyafe, tohotapenne kushetape attishin, haraba demmibookona.
2KI 9:36 Enti simmidi, iyaw odidosona; i, “Goday ba aylliya Tisiba Eeliyaasa baggara, ‘Izra7eele gaden Elzabeeli ashuwa kanati maana.
2KI 9:37 Attidaysi Izra7eelan pito mela yegetana. Hessa gisho oonika, “Hanna Elzabeelo” gaanaw danda7enna’ yaagidi odida qaalay haysa” yaagis.
2KI 10:1 Akaabas Samaare kataman laapun tammu adde nayti de7oosona. Iyyuy Samaare katama halaqatas, cimatasinne Akaaba kochata dicheysatas haysada yaagidi dabdaabe xaafis.
2KI 10:2 “Hiza hinte godaa kochati, parati, para gaareti, yuushoy gimbetida katamatinne ola miisheti hintew de7iya gisho, ha dabdaabey hintena gakida mela,
2KI 10:3 hinte godaa naytape lo77o gididaysa dooridi, iya aawa araatan utisite; hinte godaa keethaas oletite” yaagis.
2KI 10:4 Shin enti daro yayyidi, “Heko, nam7u kawoti iya sinthan eqanaw danda7ibookona, shin nuuni waanidi eqanee?” yaagidosona.
2KI 10:5 Hessa gisho, kawo gadho aawatethan ayseysi, katama halaqay, cimatinne Akaaba kochata dicheysati, Iyyuko haysada yaagidi kiittidosona; “Nuuni ne aylleta; neeni giyaba ubbaa nuuni oothana. Nu bolla oonaka kawoyoko. Nena lo77idaba aybaka ootha” yaagidi kiittidosona.
2KI 10:6 Iyyuy entaw nam7antho dabdaabe xaafishe, “Hinte ta bagga gididi, taw kiitetanaw giigidaba gidiko, hinte godaa nayta qoodhiya muucite; enta guuggiya ekidi, wonto hannoode Izra7eele yiite” yaagis. Laapun tammu kawa kochati bantana dichiya, kataman eretida asatara de7oosona.
2KI 10:7 He kawa kochata dichiya asatako dabdaabey gakida wode, laapun tammu kawa kochata wodhidosona. Enta qoodhiya muucidi, enta guuggiya keeshen ekidi, Izra7eelan de7iya Iyyus yeddidosona.
2KI 10:8 Kiitetida asay, “Enti kawa kochata guuggiya ekidi yidosona” yaagidi Iyyus odidosona. Iyyuy, “Wonto wonta gakanaw, katama geliya pengiyan enta nam7u bessan dooridi wothite” yaagidi kiittis.
2KI 10:9 Wontetha gallas wonta Iyyuy kare keyidi, asa ubbaa sinthan eqidi, “Hinte xillo; Heko, ta godaa bolla maqetada wodhiday tana. Shin haysata ubbaa wodhiday oonee?
2KI 10:10 Goday Akaaba kochata bolla odida qaalape issoyka sa7an wodhonnaysa hinte erite. Goday ba aylliya Eeliyaasa baggara odidaba polis” yaagis.
2KI 10:11 Hessa gisho, Iyyuy Izra7eelan attida Akaaba kochata, iya gita asata, iya laggetanne iya kahineta ubbaa, issoyka attonna wodhis.
2KI 10:12 Hessafe guye, Iyyuy dendidi, Samaare bidi Henthanchota Moothu gakidi,
2KI 10:13 Yihuda kawa Akaziyaasa dabbotara gahetidi, “Hinte oonee?” yaagidi oychis. Enti, “Nuuni Akaziyaasa dabbota; kawa kochatanne kawe Elzabeeli nayta sarothanaw boos” yaagidosona.
2KI 10:14 Iyyuy ba asata, “Enta paxa oykite” yaagidi kiittin, enta paxa oykidi, henthanchota moothan de7iya haatha olla matan enta oytamanne nam7ata wodhidosona; I entafe issuwaka ashshibeenna.
2KI 10:15 Iyyuy he bessaafe dendidi, Rakaaba na7aa Iyonadaabara gahetidi, iya sarothidi, “Ta qofaynne ne qofay issino. Neeni ta bagga gidanee?” yaagis. Iyyonadaabi, “Ee gidana” yaagidi zaaris. I “Ane ta kushiya oyka” yaagis. Iya kushiya oykin pude gaariya bolla kessis.
2KI 10:16 “Taara yedha; taani Godaas waanada mishetiyako be7a” yaagis; iya ba gaariya bolla utisis.
2KI 10:17 Iyyuy Samaare yida wode, Akaaba kochaafe attida ubbaa wodhis; Goday Eeliyaasas odida qaalada enta dhaysis.
2KI 10:18 Hessafe guye, Iyyuy asa ubbaa issife shiishidi, “Akaabi Ba7aale eeqa guuthara goyinnis; shin taani iyape daro goyinnana.
2KI 10:19 Ha77i Ba7aale nabeta, iya goyinneyisata, iya kahineta ubbaa xeegidi shiishite. Entafe issi asika paconnaada naagite. Taani Ba7aale eeqas daro yarsho yarshana hanayis. He bessaa yoonna asi paxa attenna” yaagis. Shin Iyyuy Ba7aale eeqa goyinneyisata cimmidi dhaysanaw hessa oothis.
2KI 10:20 Iyyuy, “Ba7aale eeqa goyinnana gallasaa awaajite” yaagin, enti awaajidosona.
2KI 10:21 Hessafe guye, Iyyuy Isra7eele biitta ubbaa kiittin, Ba7aale eeqa goyinneysatape issi asika attonna ubbay yidosona. Ubbay Ba7aale eeqa keetha gaxape gaxa gakanaw qilxi gidi kumis.
2KI 10:22 Iyyuy, ma7o keethaa naagiya addiyako, “Ba7aale goyinneyisata ubbaas ma7o kessa” yaagis. Addey entaw ma7o ehis.
2KI 10:23 Hessafe guye, “Iyyuynne Rakaaba na7ay Iyyonadaabi Ba7aale eeqa keetha gelidosona. Iyyuy, Ba7aale eeqa goyinneysatape attishin, Godaa aylletape issi asika hinte giddon doonnaada xeellite” yaagis.
2KI 10:24 Hessafe guye, enti xuussa yarshotanne hara yarshota yarshanaw giddo gelidosona. Iyyuy Ba7aale eeqa keethaafe karera hospun tammu asata giigisidi wothis. Entako, “Hintefe issi addey taani hinte kushen immiya asaape issuwa yeddiko, iya shempoy he addiya shempuwa bessan gelana” yaagis.
2KI 10:25 Iyyuy xuussa yarshuwa polidaape guye, naageysatanne halaqata, “Giddo gelidi, enta wodhite. Entafe issi asika kessi ekonna mela” yaagidi kiittin, enta mashshan wursidosona. Enta aha kare goochidi kessidosona; Ba7aale eeqa keetha qol7a gelidosona.
2KI 10:26 Ba7aale eeqa keethaafe eeqa tuussata kessidi xuuggidosona.
2KI 10:27 Ba7aale eeqa shuchata tincherethidosona; Ba7aale eeqa keethaaka laallidosona. He bessaa sheesha keethi kessidosona; hachi gakanaw he bessay sheesha keethi gididi attis.
2KI 10:28 Hessada oothidi, Iyyuy Ba7aale eeqa Isra7eelepe dhaysis.
2KI 10:29 Gidoshin, Nabaaxa na7ay Iyorbaami Isra7eele asaa oosisida nagara ooso aggibeenna. Beeteleninne Daanen Iyorbaami essida worqa mara misileta goyinnis.
2KI 10:30 Goday Iyyuko, “Neeni ta sinthan suureba oothida gishonne ta qofan de7iyaba ubbaa neeni Akaaba kochata bolla polida gisho, ne kochati oyddantho yeleta gakanaw, Isra7eele araatan uttana” yaagis.
2KI 10:31 Iyyuy Godaa Isra7eele Xoossaa higgiya ba kumetha wozanaape minthidi naagibeenna; qassi Isra7eele asaa nagara oosisida Iyorbaama nagaraape haakibeenna.
2KI 10:32 He wode Goday Isra7eele biittafe baggaa shaako doomis. Araame kawoy Azaheeli Isra7eele biittafe daro bessata xoonidi oykis.
2KI 10:33 Yordaanose Shaafape doloha baggara de7iya Galadanne Baasane biitta ubbaa oykis. He biittay Arnoona Shaafa matan de7iya Aro7eera katamaape doomidi, Robeela biitta, Gaade biittanne Minaase biitta gakees.
2KI 10:34 Iyyuy hanida harabay, oothidaba ubbaynne iya minotethay ubbay Isra7eele Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 10:35 Hessafe guye, Iyyuy hayqidi, ba mayzatan gahetis; I Samaaren moogetis. Iya bessan iya na7ay Iyo7akaazi kawotis.
2KI 10:36 Iyyuy Samaaren uttidi Isra7eele bolla laatamanne hospun laythi kawotis.
2KI 11:1 Akaziyaasa aayiya Gotola ba na7ay hayqidaysa be7ida wode, dendada kawa kocha ubbaa dhaysasu.
2KI 11:2 Shin kawa Iyoraama na7iya, Akaziyaasa michiya Yosabeeta, hayqanaw de7iya kawa nayta giddofe Akaziyaasa na7aa Iyo7aasa kaysada ekasu. Iyanne iya dichiyaro efada keethan qosada, Gotolo wodhonnaada ashshasu.
2KI 11:3 Gotola biitta haariya wode ubban, na7ay Yosabeeti matan, Xoossa keethan usupun laythi qosetidi de7is.
2KI 11:4 Laapuntha laythan Yoodahey kawa naageysatanne kawo gadho naageysata halaqatas kiittidi, baako Xoossa keethi ehis. Entara caaqidi, enta Xoossa keethan caaqisis; enta kawa na7aa Iyo7aasa bessis.
2KI 11:5 I enta, “Hinte oothanabay haysa; Sambaatan naaganaw geliya maaray gakida hinte heedzu cugaape issi cugaa kawa keethaa naago.
2KI 11:6 Issi cugay Suura pengiya naago; issi cugaa naageysatape guye baggara de7iya pengiya naago.
2KI 11:7 Sambaata galas naagope keyiya hanko nam7u cugay kumethi kawa bolla metoy gakonna mela Xoossa keetha naago.
2KI 11:8 Ola miishe oykidi, kawa giddon wothidi, kawoy keyiya wodenne geliya wode ubban iyara issife de7o. Hinteko shiiqiya oonaka wodhite” yaagis.
2KI 11:9 He halaqati, kahiney Yoodahe kiittidaba ubbaa oothidosona. Enti ubbay Sambaata gallasan naago maaray gakidaysatanne naaguwa maara polidaysata ekidi, kahiniya Yoodaheko yidosona.
2KI 11:10 Kahiney Xoossa keethan de7iya, beni kawa Dawita gondalletanne toorata ubbaa halaqatas immis.
2KI 11:11 Naageysati issoy issoy ola miisheta banta kushen oykidi, Xoossa keethaafe haddirsa baggafe doomidi, ushacha bagga gakanaw, yarsho bessa mataninne Xoossa keetha matan kawa yuushuwan eqidosona.
2KI 11:12 Yoodahey kawa na7aa kare kessidi, iya huuphen kallacha wothis. Higge Maxaafaa iyaw immidi, tiyidi, iya kawothis. Asay kushe baqidi, ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Kawoy birata tuussu gido!” yaagis.
2KI 11:13 Kawiya Gotola naageysata wocamaanne asaa wocamaa si7ida wode, asaako Xoossa keethi basu.
2KI 11:14 Kawoy kase kawoti haneysada tuussa matan eqidysa be7asu. Halaqatinne moyze punneysati kawa matan de7oosona. He biitta asa ubbay ufaytidi, moyze punnin, Gotola ba ma7uwa daakada, “Heko, haysi makalla! Haysi makalla!” yaagada waassasu.
2KI 11:15 Kahiney Yoodahey tora moconatako, “Gotola Xoossa keethan wodhopite! Iipe yaaranne haara salpida salpeta giddon wothite; iyo ashshanaw qopiya asi de7iko wodhite!” yaagis.
2KI 11:16 Enti iyo oykidi, kawo gadho efidi, Para Pengiyan iyo wodhidosona.
2KI 11:17 Asay Godaa asi gidana mela, kawoy Yodaaheynne asay Godaara caaqana mela oothis. Qassi kawuwapenne asaape gidduwan caaqisis.
2KI 11:18 He wode Yihuda asa ubbay Ba7aale eeqa keethi bidi, he keethaa laallis; yarsho bessatanne iya misileta tincherethis. Ba7aale eeqa kahiniya Mataana yarsho bessata sinthan wodhidosona. Hessafe guye, kahiniya Yoodahey Xoossa keethan naageysata wothis.
2KI 11:19 Baara toora moconata, kawa naageysata, kawo gadho naageysatanne Yihuda asa ubbaa ekin, enti kawa Xoossa keethafe duge ehis. Naageyisata Pengiya baggara kawo keethi issife gelidi, kawoy ba araatan uttis.
2KI 11:20 Yihuda asa ubbay ufaytidosona; Gotola kawo gadhon mashshan hayqidaape guye katamay wopu gis.
2KI 11:21 Iyo7aasi kawotiya wode laapun laytha na7a.
2KI 12:1 Iyyuy, Isra7eele biittan kawotida laapuntho laythan, Iyo7aasi Yihudan kawotis; I Yerusalaamen oytamu laythi kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Saabo; iya Barsaabe maccas.
2KI 12:2 Kahiney Yoodahey, iya tamaarsidanne zorida gisho, I de7ida laytha ubban Iyo7aasi Godaa sinthan suureba oothis.
2KI 12:3 Asay he bessan yarshonne ixaane cuyisethi aggiboonna gisho, dhoqa goyinno bessata dhaysibeenna.
2KI 12:4 Iyo7aasi kahineta xeegidi, “Xoossa keetha yaa geeshsha miishe ubbaa shiishite. Hessika huuphe taybuwa wode imetiya miishiyanne asay ba shenen Xoossa keethi ehiya miishiya.
2KI 12:5 Kahineti ubbay he miishiya ehiya asaape banta gishuwa gishuwa ekidi, Xoossa keetha giddon iitida ubbaa loythana” yaagis.
2KI 12:6 Shin kawoy Iyo7aasi kawotida laatamanne heedzantho laythi gakanaw, kahineti Xoossa keetha oorathibookona.
2KI 12:7 Kawoy Iyo7aasi kahiniya Yoodahenne hara kahineta xeegidi, “Xoossa keetha giddon iitida bessata ayis ooratheketii? Miishe Xoossa keetha oorathanaw immitepe attishin, hintew imetiya miishiya hinte kushen oykofite” yaagis.
2KI 12:8 Kahineti, “Asaape hara miishe ekoko; Xoossa keetha giddon iitida bessaa oorathana” yaagidi zaaridosona.
2KI 12:9 Yaatin, kahiniya Yoodahey issi saaxine ekidi, iya kamaa lukidi, yarsho bessa matan Xoossa keethi geliya pengiya ushacha baggara wothis. Pengiya naagiya kahineti Xoossa keetha yida miishiya ubbaa saaxiniyan yeggoosona.
2KI 12:10 Enti saaxiniyan daro miishey dagaayetidaysa be7ida wode ubban, kawo xaafeynne kahine halaqay yidi, miishiya taybidi, karxiitan qoloosona.
2KI 12:11 Taybetida miishiya salla7idaape guye, Xoossa keetha oosuwa xeellana mela sunthetida asaas immoosona. Enti miishiya ekidi, Xoossa keethan anaaxetasinne gimbeysati immoosona.
2KI 12:12 Miishiya shuchu masseysatasinne qoo7eysatas qanxanaw, Xoossa keetha oorathanaw, sanqa, shuchunne koshshiya harabata shammanaw go7etoosona.
2KI 12:13 Xoossa keetha yida miishiyape Xoossa keetha bira burcukota, qapheta, keretanne moyzeta woyko worqanne bira miisheta oothanaw kessibookona.
2KI 12:14 He miishe ubbay Xoossa keetha oorathiya asaas qanxetis.
2KI 12:15 Xoossa keetha oosuwa xeellanaw sunthetida asati ammanetida asi gidida gisho, “Miishiyan ay ay oothidetii?” yaagidi oychida asi oonika baawa.
2KI 12:16 Naaqo yarshonne nagara yarshos qanxetiya miishey kahinetas gelesipe attishin, Xoossa keetha oorathiya miishe saaxiniyan gelenna.
2KI 12:17 He wode Araame kawoy Azaheeli bidi, Gaate katama olidi oykis. Kaallidi Yerusalaame olanaw simmis.
2KI 12:18 Shin Yihuda kawoy Iyo7aasi iyape kase kawotida Yihuda kawoti Iyosaafexi, Iyoraaminne Akaziyaasi Godaas dummayida miisheta, ba imota, Xoossa keetha imotanne kawo gadho shalo minjiya bessan de7iya worqa ubba ekis. Araame kawas Azaheelas yeddin, Azaheeli Yerusalaame olanaw dendoysa aggaagis.
2KI 12:19 Kawoy Iyo7aasi hanida harabaynne I oothidaba ubbay Yihuda kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 12:20 Hessafe guye, iya moorinnati iya bolla maqetidi, Siila efiya ogiyan Miilo geetetiya keethan wodhidosona.
2KI 12:21 Iya wodhida oosanchoti Sim7ata na7aa Yozakaaranne Shomeera na7aa Yozabaata. Iyo7aasi Dawita Kataman ba mayzata duufon moogetis; iya bessan iya na7ay Amasiyaasi kawotis.
2KI 13:1 Akaziyaasa na7ay, Yihuda Kawoy Iyo7aasi kawotida laatamanne heedzantho laythan, Iyyu na7ay Iyo7akaazi Isra7eele bolla kawotis; I Samaaren uttidi tammanne laapun laythi kawotis.
2KI 13:2 I, Isra7eele asaa balethida Iyorbaama soo asaa nagara kaallidi, Godaa sinthan iitaba oothis; I he nagaraa ooso aggibeenna.
2KI 13:3 Hessa gisho, Godaa hanqoy Isra7eele bolla suullis; Goday enta daro wode Araame kawa Azaheela, hessadaka iya na7aa Wolde-Adara kushen aathidi immis.
2KI 13:4 Hessafe guye, Iyo7akaazi Godaa woossis. Goday iya woosa si7is; Soore kawoy Isra7eele ay mela iita meton un7ethidaako Goday be7is.
2KI 13:5 Isra7eele asa ashshiya asi immin, enta Araame kushepe kessi ekidosona. Isra7eele asay kaseysada banta son saron de7idosona.
2KI 13:6 Hessi haninka Isra7eele asaa balethida Iyorbaama soo asaa nagaraape simmibokona; enti he nagaraa ooso aggibokona. Qassi Asheera geetetiya xoosse eeqa misiley Samaaren eqidi de7ees.
2KI 13:7 Iyo7akaazas ishatamu para asata, tammu gaareta, 10,000 toho olanchota, hara olanchota xalaali attidosona. Araame kawoy enta dhaysis; I enta wudumman de7iya suullada oothis.
2KI 13:8 Iyo7akaazi hanida harabay, I oothidaba ubbaynne iya minotethay Isra7eele Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 13:9 Iyo7akaazi hayqidi, ba mayzata gakis; iya bessan iya na7ay Yo7aasi kawotis.
2KI 13:10 Yihuda kawoy Iyo7aasi kawotida hastamanne laapuntho laythan, Iyo7akaaza na7ay Yo7aasi Samaaren Isra7eele bolla kawotis; I tammanne usupun laythi kawotis.
2KI 13:11 Yo7aasi Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis. Isra7eele asaa balethida Nabaaxa na7aa Iyorbaama nagaraape issuwaka ashshona oothis; I he nagara ooso aggibeenna.
2KI 13:12 Yo7aasi hanida harabay, I oothidaba ubbaynne Yihuda Kawa Amasiyasara oletida olay Isra7eele Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 13:13 Yo7aasi hayqidi, ba mayzata gakis; Samaaren Isra7eele kawotara moogetis. Iya bessan iya na7ay Iyorbaami kawotis.
2KI 13:14 Elsi hayqos gathiya harge hargetis; Isra7eele kawoy Yo7aasi iya be7anaw bidi, “Ta aawaw; ta aawaw, neeni Isra7eele asaas wolqanne gondalle!” yaagidi yeekis.
2KI 13:15 Elsi, “Dongenne donge toora ekada ya” yaagin, Yo7aasi ehis.
2KI 13:16 Elsi kawako, “Dongiya giigisa oyka” yaagis; I dongiya giigisidi oykidashin, Elsi ba kushiya kawa kushiya bolla wothis.
2KI 13:17 Elsi, “Doloha bagga maskootiya dooya” yaagis. I dooyin, Elsi, “Donge tooran duka” yaagis. I dukin Elsi, “Haysi Godaa donge! Haysi Araame asaa xooniya donge! Neeni Araame asaa Afeeqan xoonana gakanaw olana” yaagis.
2KI 13:18 Hessafe guye, Elsi kawako, “Donge toorata eka” yaagis. I ekin, Elsi, “Biittaa cadda” yaagis. I heedzu toho biitta caddidi aggaagis.
2KI 13:19 Xoossa addey, kawa bolla hanqetidi, “Ichashu toho woyko usupun toho biitta caddidaba gidiyako, neeni Araame asaa xoonada kumethi dhaysanashin! Neeni ha77i enta heedzu toho xalaala xoonana” yaagis.
2KI 13:20 Elsi hayqidi moogetis. Moo7abe paannoti Isra7eele biitta bolla laythan laythan dendoosona.
2KI 13:21 Issi gallas guutha Isra7eele asati issi uraa aha moogishe, Heko, Moo7abe paannota be7idosona. Uraa aha Elsa duufuwa giddo holidi baqatidosona. Ahay Elsa meqethaa bolla wodhidi, paxidi dendi eqis.
2KI 13:22 Iyo7akaazi kawotida laytha ubban Soore Kawoy Azaheeli Isra7eele un7ethis.
