2KI 13:23 Shin Goday Abrahaamera, Yisaaqaranne Yayqoobara caaqida caaquwa gisho, entaw keehis, qadhetis, qopis. Hachi gakanaw I enta dhaysibeenna woyko ba sinthafe diggibeenna.
2KI 13:24 Araame kawoy Azaheeli hayqin, iya bessan iya na7ay Wolde-Adari kawotis.
2KI 13:25 Azaheeli iya aawa Iyo7akaazi olan oykida katamata, Iyo7akaaza na7ay Yo7aasi Azaheela na7aa Wolde-Adarape ekis. Yo7aasi iya heedzu toho xoonidi, Isra7eele katamata zaaris.
2KI 14:1 Iyo7akaaza na7ay, Isra7eele kawoy Yo7aasi kawotida nam7antho laythan, Yihuda kawa Iyo7aasa na7ay Amasiyaasi kawotis.
2KI 14:2 I kawotiya wode laythi iyaw laatamanne ichasha; I Yerusalaamen laatamanne uddufun laythi kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Yoodanoo; iya Yerusalaame maccas.
2KI 14:3 Amasiyaasi Godaa sinthan suureba oothis; shin iya mayzay Dawiti oothidaysada gidonashin, ba aawa Iyo7aasa ogiya kaallis.
2KI 14:4 Asay dhoqa goyinno bessata dhaysibeenna; asay he bessan yarsho yarsheysanne ixaane cuyiseysa aggibokona.
2KI 14:5 Amasiyaasi kawotethaa minthidi oykidaape guye, kase kawa, ba aawa Iyo7aasa wodhida shuumata wodhis.
2KI 14:6 Muse higge maxaafan xaafetidaysada, Goday, “Nayti oothida nagara gisho, aawata wodhanaw bessenna; qassi aawati oothida nagaraa gisho, nayta wodhanaw bessenna. Asi ubbay ba oothida nagaran nagaran hayqanaw bessees” yaagidi kiittidaysada ba aawa wodhida asaa nayta wodhibeenna.
2KI 14:7 Amasiyaasi Maxine Zangaaran tammu mukulu Edoome asaa wodhidi, Seela katamaa olan oykidi, he bessa Yoqiti7eela gidi sunthis; hachi gakanaw he sunthan xeegetees.
2KI 14:8 Hessafe guye, Amasiyaasi Iyyu na7aa na7aa, Iyo7akaaza na7aa, Yo7aasako, “Haaya; ane nam7ay ola gahetoos” yaagidi ase kiittidi mandis.
2KI 14:9 Shin Isra7eele kawoy Yo7aasi, Yihuda kawa Amasiyaasako, “Libaanosen de7iya kinchotey, Libaanosen de7iya zigaako, ‘Ne na7iw ta na7aas imma’ yaagis. Shin Libaanosen de7iya issi do7ay yaara kanthidi, he kinchotiya yedhis.
2KI 14:10 Ee, neeni tuma Edoome biitta xoonadasa; ha77i otortadasa. Neeni ne xoonuwan ufaytada, ne son wopu gada utta. Ne bollanne ne biitta Yihuda bolla metonne dhayo ehiyaba ayis denthethay?” yaagidi zaaris.
2KI 14:11 Shin Amasiyaasi iya si7ibeenna. Isra7eele kawoy Yo7aasi olas keyin, inne Yihuda kawoy Amasiyaasi Yihudan de7iya Beet-Sameesa kataman ola gahetidosona.
2KI 14:12 Isra7eeley Yihuda xoonin, Yihuda asa ubbay baqatidi, banta soo banta soo bidosona.
2KI 14:13 Isra7eele kawoy Yo7aasi Akaziyaasa na7aa na7aa, Iyo7aasa na7aa, Yihuda kawa Amasiyaasa Beet-Sameesa kataman di77is. Yerusalaame dirsa gimbiya, Efreema Pengiyafe bidi, Maazane Pengiya gakanaw de7iya oyddu xeetu wadha gidiya bessaa laallis.
2KI 14:14 Xoossa keethaninne kawo gadhon shalo minjiya keethan de7iya worqaa, biraanne miishe ubbaa ekis; qassi oythi gididi di7etida asaaka ekidi, Samaare simmis.
2KI 14:15 Yo7aasi hanida harabay, I oothidabay, iya minotethaynne Yihuda kawa Amasiyasara oletidabay Isra7eele kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 14:16 Yo7aasi hayqidi, ba mayzata gakis; Samaaren Isra7eele kawotara moogetis. Iya bessan iya na7ay Iyorbaami kawotis.
2KI 14:17 Iyo7akaaza na7ay, Isra7eele kawoy Yo7aasi hayqidaape guye, Yo7aasa na7ay, Yihuda kawoy Amasiyaasi tammanne ichashu laythi de7is.
2KI 14:18 Amasiyaasi hanida harabay Yihuda kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 14:19 Amasiyaasa wodhanaw asay Yerusalaamen maqetis; yaatin I Laakiso katama baqatis. Shin enti iya geedo Laakiso katama ase kiittin, iya yan wodhidosona.
2KI 14:20 Wodhidi iya aha paran caani ehidi, Dawita kataman Yerusalaamen iya mayzatara moogidosona.
2KI 14:21 Hessafe guye, Yihuda asa ubbay tammanne usupun laytha na7aa Azaariyasa iya aawa Amasiyaasa bessan kawothidosona.
2KI 14:22 Iya aaway Amasiyaasi hayqidaape guye, Azaariyasi Elata katama zaari keexidi, Yihudan gathis.
2KI 14:23 Iyo7aasa na7ay, Yihuda kawoy Amasiyaasi kawotida tammanne ichashantho laythan, Isra7eele kawa Yo7aasa na7ay Iyorbaami Samaaren kawotis; I oytamanne issi laythi kawotis.
2KI 14:24 Nam7antho Iyorbaami Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis; Isra7eele asaa nagara oosisida Nabaaxa na7aa Iyorbaami ogiyape haakibeenna.
2KI 14:25 Gaat-Hefera addiya Amaate na7aa nabiya, ba aylliya Yoonasa baggara Goday Isra7eele Xoossay ba qaalan odidaysada, Hamaata Pinuwa geetetiya bessaafe doomidi, Maxine Abbaa gakanaw de7iya Isra7eele zawa Yo7aasa na7ay Iyorbaami xoonidi zaaris.
2KI 14:26 Isra7eelen asa ubbay aylle gidin, womaanno gidin, ay mela un7etidaako, Goday be7is; enta maaddiya oonika baawa.
2KI 14:27 Goday Isra7eele asaa sunthaa salope garsan quchana gibeenna. Hessa gisho, Goday enta Yo7aasa na7aa Iyorbaama baggara ashshis.
2KI 14:28 Iyorbaami hanida harabay, I oothidaba ubbay, oletidabaynne Yihuda bagga gidida Damasqonne Hamaata katamata Isra7eeles zaaridabay Isra7eele kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 14:29 Iyorbaami hayqidi, ba mayzata, Isra7eele kawota gakis; iya bessan iya na7ay Zakaryaasi kawotis.
2KI 15:1 Isra7eele kawoy Iyorbaami kawotida laatamanne laapuntha laythan, Yihuda kawa Amasiyaasa na7ay Azaariyasi kawotis.
2KI 15:2 I kawotida wode, iyaw laythi tammanne usupuna; I Yerusalaamen ishatammanne nam7u laythi kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Yikoolo; iya Yerusalaame maccas.
2KI 15:3 Iya aaway Amasiyaasi oothidaysada, ika Godaa sinthan suureba oothis.
2KI 15:4 Gidoshin, he bessan yarsho yarsheysanne ixaane cuyiseysa asay aggiboonna gisho, dhoqa goyinno bessata dhaysibeenna;
2KI 15:5 Goday Azaariyasa guutha goga hargen oythis; hayqana gakanaw he hargey iya yeddiboonna gisho, dumma keethan barka de7is. He wode kawa na7ay Iyo7atami kawo gadhon de7idi, biitta haaris.
2KI 15:6 Azaariyasi hanida harabaynne I oothidaba ubbay Yihuda Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 15:7 Azaariyasi hayqidi, ba mayzata gakis; Dawita Kataman ba mayzatara moogetis. Iya bessan iya na7ay Iyo7atami kawotis.
2KI 15:8 Yihuda kawoy Azaariyasi kawotida hastamanne hospuntho laythan, Iyorbaama na7ay Zakaryaasi Isra7eele bolla Samaaren kawotis; I usupun ageena kawotis.
2KI 15:9 Iya mayzati oothidaysada, ika Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis; Nabaaxa na7ay Iyorbaami Isra7eele asa oosisida nagaraa ooso aggibeenna.
2KI 15:10 Iyabeesa na7ay Saloomi Zakaryaasa bolla maqetidi, Yiblaama geetetiya bessan wodhidi iya bessan baw kawotis.
2KI 15:11 Zakaryaasi hanida harabaynne I oothidaba ubbay Isra7eele Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 15:12 Hessada hanidi, Goday Iyyus, “Ne kochay oyddantho yeleta gakanaw, Isra7eele kawotetha araatan uttana” yaagidi odida qaalay poletis.
2KI 15:13 Yihuda kawoy Ooziyani kawotida hastamanne uddufuntho laythan, Yaabesa na7ay Salumi kawotis; I Samaaren issi ageena kawotis.
2KI 15:14 Gaade na7ay Minaheemi Tirsa katamaape Samaare bis. Samaaren de7iya Yaabesa na7aa Saluma wodhidi iya bessan baw kawotis.
2KI 15:15 Salumi hanida harabaynne I maqetida maqoy Isra7eele Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 15:16 He wode Minaheemi Tirsafe dendidi, Tifisanne, yan de7iya asaanne katamaa heeran de7iya biittata ubbaa olis. Enti banta katamaa dirsa pengiya iyaw dooyonna ixida gisho, Tifisa olidi dhaysis; qassi yan de7iya qantha maccasa ubbaa uluwa daakis.
2KI 15:17 Yihuda kawoy Azaariyasi kawotida hastamanne uddufuntho laythan, Gaade na7ay Minaheemi Isra7eele bolla kawotis; I Samaaren tammu laythi kawotis.
2KI 15:18 I Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis; Nabaaxa na7ay Iyorbaami Isra7eele asaa oosisida nagaraape haakibeenna.
2KI 15:19 Hessafe guye, Asoore kawoy Telgeltelfelisoori Isra7eele bolla dendis. Kawotethan bana minthana melanne maaddana mela, Minaheemi Telgeltelfelisooras 34,000 kilo giraame bira santime immis.
2KI 15:20 Minaheemi he miishiya Isra7eele asaa wolqan kessis; Asoore kawas immanaw dure asi ubbay issoy issoy ishatamu bira santime kessidosona. Hessada oothin, Asoore kawoy Isra7eele biitta aggidi, ba biitta simmis.
2KI 15:21 Minaheemi hanida harabaynne I oothidaba ubbay Isra7eele Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 15:22 Minaheemi hayqidi, ba mayzatan gahetis; iya bessan iya na7ay Paqsiyaasi kawotis.
2KI 15:23 Yihuda kawoy Azaariyasi kawotida ishatamantho laythan, Minaheema na7ay Paqsiyaasi Isra7eele bolla Samaaren kawotis; I nam7u laythi kawotis.
2KI 15:24 Paqsiyaasi Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis; Nabaaxa na7ay Iyorbaami Isra7eele asa oosisida nagaraa ooso aggibeenna.
2KI 15:25 Iya toora moconatape issoy, Ramala na7ay Paaquhey iya bolla maqetidi dendis. Galada asaape ishatamu addeta baara ekidi, Samaaren kawo gadhon de7iya miixaa gelis. Paaquhey, Paqsiyaasa, Argobanne Ariya issife wodhidi iya bessan baw kawotis.
2KI 15:26 Paqsiyaasi hanida harabaynne oothidaba ubbay Isra7eele Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 15:27 Yihuda Kawoy Azaariyasi kawotida ishatammanne nam7antho laythan, Ramala na7ay Paaquhey Isra7eele bolla Samaaren kawotis; I laatamu laythi kawotis.
2KI 15:28 Paaquhey Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis; Nabaaxa na7ay Iyorbaami Isra7eele asaa oosisida nagaraape haakibeenna.
2KI 15:29 Isra7eele kawa Paaquhe wodiyan Asoore Kawoy Telgeltelfelisoori yidi, Iyoona, Abeel-Beet-Ma7ika, Yanoha, Qaadesanne Haxoora olidi oykis; qassi Galada, Galilanne Niftaaleme biitta ubbaa olidi, asaa di77idi Asoore biitta efis.
2KI 15:30 Azaariyasa na7ay Iyo7atami kawotida laatamantho laythan, Ela na7ay Hosey Ramala na7aa Paaquhe bolla maqetidi wodhidi, iya bessan baw kawotis.
2KI 15:31 Paaquhey hanida harabaynne oothidaba ubbay Isra7eele Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 15:32 Ramala na7ay, Isra7eele kawoy Paaquhey kawotida nam7antho laythan, Yihuda kawa Azaariyasi na7ay Iyo7atami kawotis.
2KI 15:33 Iyo7atami kawotiya wode iyaw laythi laatamanne ichasha; I Yerusalaamen tammanne usupun laythi kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Yarusho; Yarusha Saadoqa na7iw.
2KI 15:34 Ba aaway Azaariyasi oothidaysada, Iyo7atami Godaa sinthan suureba oothis.
2KI 15:35 Gidoshin, he bessan yarshonne ixaane cuyisethi aggiboonna gisho, asay dhoqa goyinno bessata dhaysibeenna. Iyo7atami Xoossa keetha geliya qommo bagga pengiya zaaridi keexis.
2KI 15:36 Iyo7atami hanida harabaynne oothidaba ubbay Yihuda Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 15:37 He wode Goday Araame kawa Ra7asoonanne Ramala na7aa, Isra7eele kawa Paaquhe Yihuda biitta olana mela denthethis.
2KI 15:38 Iyo7atami hayqidi, ba aawa Dawita Kataman ba mayzatara moogetis; iya bessan iya na7ay Akaazi kawotis.
2KI 16:1 Ramala na7ay Paaquhey kawotida tammanne laapuntho laythan, Iyo7atama na7ay Akaazi Yihudan kawotis.
2KI 16:2 I kawotiya wode laythi iyaw laatama; Yerusalaamen tammanne usupun laythi kawotis. Iya mayzay Dawita suureba oothidaysada, Godaa ba Xoossaa sinthan suureba oothibeenna.
2KI 16:3 I kase de7ida Isra7eele kawota ogiyan hemetis. Qassi Goday Isra7eele asa sinthafe gooddidi kessida asata wogaa, ixetida ogiya kaallidi, ba adde na7aa tamara aathidi yarshis.
2KI 16:4 Akaazi dhoqa goyinno bessatan, zumata bollanne daashsha mithata ubbaa garsan yarsho yarshis; ixaane cuyisis.
2KI 16:5 Hessafe guye, Araame kawoy Ra7asooninne Ramala na7ay, Isra7eele kawoy Paaquhey Yerusalaame olanaw yidi teqidosona; shin Akaaza xoonanaw danda7ibookona.
2KI 16:6 He wode Araame kawoy Ra7asooni Elata katama zaari ekidi, Yihuda asa gooddidi kessis. Yaatin Edoome asati Elata katama yidi, hachi gakanaw yan de7oosona.
2KI 16:7 Hessa gisho, Akaazi Asoore kawa Telgeltelfelisoorako kiita yeddidi, “Taani ne na7anne ne aylle. Hayyana haaya; tana oliya Araame kawa kushepenne Isra7eele kawa kushepe ashsha” yaagis.
2KI 16:8 Qassi Akaazi Xoossa keethaanne kawo gadhon shalo minjiya bessan de7iya biraanne worqaa ekidi, Asoore kawas imota oothidi yeddis.
2KI 16:9 Akaaza oysha ekidi, Asoore kawoy Damasqo katama oli oykidi, asaa di77idi, Qiira efis; kawa Ra7asoonaka wodhis.
2KI 16:10 Kawoy Akaazi Asoore kawa Telgeltelfelisoorara gahetanaw Damasqo bis. Damasqon de7iya yarsho bessa be7idi, iya daaniya yarsho bessi keexana mela, he yarsho bessa misiliyanne keexiya hanota kahiniya Uraya kiittis.
2KI 16:11 Kawoy Akaazi Damasqofe simmidi yaanas, kahiney Urayi iya daaniya yarsho bessi giigisis.
2KI 16:12 Kawoy Damasqofe simmida wode, yarsho bessay oosetidi poletidaysa be7idi, yarsho bessaako shiiqidi,
2KI 16:13 xuussa yarshonne katha yarsho yarshis. Qassi ushsha yarshuwa gussis; issifetetha yarsho suuthaaka yarsho bessa bolla dharcis.
2KI 16:14 Naase biratape oosetidi, Godaas dummatidi uttida yarsho bessay, ooratha yarsho bessaafenne Xoossa keethaafe giddon de7ees. Akaazi he gal7a yarsho bessa denthidi, ba oosisida ooratha yarsho bessaafe pudeha baggan wothis.
2KI 16:15 Kawoy Akaazi kahiniya Uraya haysada yaagidi kiittis; “Ha gita yarsho bessan wonta xuussa yarsho, omarsi shiishiya katha yarsho, kawoy shiishiya xuussa yarshonne katha yarsho, asa ubbay shiishiya xuussa yarsho, katha yarshuwanne ushsha yarshuwa yarsho bessan shiisha. Naasepe oosetida hanko yarsho bessa taani taw oychiya bessi oothana” yaagis.
2KI 16:16 Urayi kawoy Akaazi kiittidaysada oothis.
2KI 16:17 Kawoy Akaazi Xoossa keetha giddon go7etiya, naase biratape oosetida gaareta loche birata qanxidi, miyepe diggidi meecetiya kereta gaareta bollafe denthis. Qassi gita kereta, iya zempisida naase birata boora misileta bollafe denthidi, shucha baasuwa bolla wothis.
2KI 16:18 Asoore kawa gisho, Akaazi Sambaata gallas Xoossa keetha giddon kawa araatay micetiya dhoqu gida bessaanne kawoy Xoossa keethi geliya kare ogiya gordidi, yuuyi aadhidi gelana mela oothis.
2KI 16:19 Kawoy Akaazi hanida harabaynne I oothidaba ubbay Yihuda Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 16:20 Akaazi hayqidi, ba mayzatan gahetis; Dawita Kataman ba mayzatara moogetis; iya bessan iya na7ay Hizqiyaasi kawotis.
2KI 17:1 Yihuda kawoy Akaazi kawotida tammanne nam7antho laythan, Ela na7ay Hosey Isra7eele bolla Samaaren kawotis; I uddufun laythi kawotis.
2KI 17:2 I, Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis; gidikoka, iyape kase de7ida Isra7eele kawoti oothidaysa mela iitabaa oothibeenna.
2KI 17:3 Asoore kawoy Salminasoori yidi, iyara ola gahetin, Hosey xoonetidi, iyaw giiris.
2KI 17:4 Shin guutha laythafe guye, kawoy Hosey, Gibxe kawa Segoras kiita yeddidi, bana maaddana mela oychis. Kaseysada Asoore kawas giira immeysa aggaagis. Kawoy Salminasoori hessa si7ida wode iya oythidi, qasho keethi gelsis.
2KI 17:5 Asoore kawoy Isra7eele biitta ubbaa bolla dendidi, heedzu laythi gakanaw Samaare katama teqis.
2KI 17:6 Hosey kawotida uddufuntho laythan Asoore kawoy Samaare katama oykis; Isra7eele asaa ekidi, Asoore biitta efis. Entafe baggaa Alahaninne Abooran, baggaa qassi Gozaana shaafa matan, attidaysata Meedona katamatan wothis.
2KI 17:7 Haysi ubbay haniday, Isra7eele asay Godaa banta Xoossaa bolla, enta Gibxefe, Gibxe kawa kushepe kessidaysa bolla nagara oothida gishosa. Qassi enti hara xoossatas goyinnidi,
2KI 17:8 Goday enta sinthafe gooddidi kessida hara kawotethata wogaa kaallida gishosa. Hessa bolla qassi Isra7eele kawoti doomida iita wogaa kaallida gishosa.
2KI 17:9 Isra7eele asay Godaa banta Xoossaa bolla geeman iitabaa oothidosona; guutha moothafe bidi, gita katama gakanaw de7iya bessa ubban bantaw dhoqa goyinno bessata medhidosona.
2KI 17:10 Qassi enti eeqa shuchatanne Asheera geetetiya xoosse misileta zuma huuphe ubbaaninne daashsha mitha ubbaa garsan essidosona.
2KI 17:11 Goday beni enta sinthafe gooddidi kessida allaga asay oothidaysada, dhoqa bessa ubban ixaane cuyisidosona. Enti iitabaa oothidi Godaa hanqethidosona.
2KI 17:12 Goday enta, “Goyinnofite” yaagida eeqa goyinnidosona.
2KI 17:13 Goday Isra7eele asaanne Yihuda asaa ba nabeta baggaranne qoncethi be7iya ubbaa baggara, “Hinte iita ogiyape simmite; taani nabeta, ta aylleta baggara, hinte aawati kiitetanaada immida higgiyan xaafetida wogaanne awaajuwa naagite” yaagis.
2KI 17:14 Shin enti si7onna ixidosona. Godaa banta Xoossaa ammanetibona banta aawatada morge minthidosona.
2KI 17:15 Enti iya wogaa, I enta aawatara caaqida caaquwanne iya naagisuwa kadhidosona. Enti laafa eeqata goyinnidi, banta huuphenka laafa gididosona. Goday enta, “Hinte yuushuwan de7iya allaga asay ootheysada oothopite” yaagida kiitaa ixidi, enta de7uwa wogaa kaallidosona.
2KI 17:16 Godaa banta Xoossaa kiita ubbaa aggaagidosona. Mari daaniya, nam7u goyinno misiletanne Asheera geetetiya eeqe misiliya medhidosona. Salon de7iya xoolinto ubbaa goyinnidosonanne Ba7aale eeqa haggaazidosona.
2KI 17:17 Enti banta adde naytanne macca nayta tama giddora aathidosona. Marotanne moytille xeegeyisata zore oychidosona. Hessa mela iitabaa oothanaw bantana bayzidi, Godaa hanqethidosona.
2KI 17:18 Hessa gisho, Goday Isra7eele bolla hanqetidi enta ba sinthafe diggin, Yihuda kochaa xalaali attis.
2KI 17:19 Qassi Yihuda asayka, Godaa banta Xoossaa kiita naagibookona; enti Isra7eele asaa wogaa kaallidosona.
2KI 17:20 Hessa gaason, Goday Isra7eele kochata ubbaa aggaagis. I enta un7ethidi, ba sinthafe diggana gakanaw, bonqiya asaa kushen yeggis.
2KI 17:21 Goday Isra7eele asaa Dawita kochaa kawotethaafe beni shaakida wode, Isra7eele asay Nabaaxa na7aa Iyorbaama bantaw kawothidosona. Hessafe guye, Isra7eele asay Godaa kaallonnaada Iyorbaami diggis; I enta gita nagara oosisis.
2KI 17:22 Isra7eele asay Iyorbaami oothida nagaraa ubbaa oothidosona; iyape simmibokona.
2KI 17:23 Goday nabeta, ba aylleta ubbaa baggara kase odidaysada enta ba sinthafe diggis. Isra7eele asay banta yeletida biittafe di7etidi, Asoore biitta bidi, hachi gakanaw yan de7idosona.
2KI 17:24 Asoore kawoy Babiloone biittan de7iya Kuuta, Awaana, Hamaatanne Safarwayma katamatan de7iya asa ehidi, Isra7eele asaa bessan, Samaare katamatan wothis. Enti he katamata oykidi, yan de7idosona.
2KI 17:25 Enti koyro yan duussu doomida wode, Godaa goyinnibookona. Hessa gaason, Goday enta giddo gaammota yeddin, gaammoti enta giddofe baggata mentherethidi wodhidosona.
2KI 17:26 Yaatin, Asoore kawas, “Neeni ehada Samaare katamatan wothida asay, ha biitta xoossaa wogaa erokona. Heko, yaatin, enta mentherethi wodhiya gaammota enta bolla yeddis” yaagidi odidosona.
2KI 17:27 Asoore kawoy, “Hinte Samaarepe di77idi ehida kahinetape issuwa zaaridi, yaa yeddite. I yaa bidi, he biitta xoossaa wogaa enta tamaarso” yaagidi kiittis.
2KI 17:28 Hessa gisho, Samaarepe di77idi ehida kahinetape issoy Beetelen daanaw yidi, Godaa goyinno wogaa enta tamaarsis.
2KI 17:29 Gidoshin, Samaaren uttida asay bantaw bantaw goyinniya eeqa misileta ba de7iya bessan bessan medhidosona. Enti de7iya katamatan, kase bantaw keexida dhoqa goyinno bessatan efidi wothidosona.
2KI 17:30 Hessada oothidi, Babiloone asay Sukot-Banooba geetetiya eeqa misileta medhidosona. Kuuta asay Argaala geetetiya eeqa misileta medhidosona. Hamaata asay Ismaata geetetiya eeqa misileta medhidosona.
2KI 17:31 Awaawa asay Albazaranne Tartaqa geetetiya eeqa misileta medhidosona. Safarwayma asay qassi Adramelekinne Anameleka geetetiya banta xoossatas banta nayta taman xuuggidi yarshidosona.
2KI 17:32 Enti Godaa goyinnidosona; shin banta giddofe dumma dumma asaa dooridi, dhoqa goyinno bessatan kahine oothidi shuumidosona.
2KI 17:33 Enti Godaa goyinnidosona; gidikoka, banta yida biitta biitta asaa meeziya kaallidi, banta xoossataka goyinnidosona.
2KI 17:34 Enti hachi gakanaw kase meezetidaysada oothosona. Enti tuma Godaa goyinnokona woyko Goday Isra7eele gidi sunthida Yayqooba zerethaas immida awaajuwanne wogaa, higgiyanne kiitaa naagokona.
2KI 17:35 Goday Isra7eele asaara beni caaqida wode, enta haysada yaagidi kiittis; “Hara xoossata goyinnofite; entaw gulbatopite; entaw oothopite woyko entaw yarshofite.
2KI 17:36 Shin Gibxefe hintena ba gita wolqaaninne ba micetida kushen kessida Godaas oothite; iyaw gulbatite; iyaw yarsho yarshite.
2KI 17:37 Goday hintew xaafida awaajuwanne wogaa, higgiyanne kiitaa ubba wode naagite; hara xoossata goyinnofite.
2KI 17:38 Taani hintera caaqida caaquwa dogopite; hara xoossata goyinnofite.
2KI 17:39 Hessa aggidi, Godaa hinte Xoossaa goyinnite. Hinte morketa ubbaafe hintena ashshanay tana” yaagidi kiittis.
2KI 17:40 Shin enti iyaw ero goonna ixidi, kase banta meeziya kaallidosona.
2KI 17:41 He asati Godaa goyinnisheka, issi baggara banta eeqa misileta goyinnoosona. Hachi gakanaw enta kochay enta aawati goyinneysada goyinnishe de7oosona.
2KI 18:1 Ela na7ay Hosey Isra7eelen kawotida heedzantho laythan, Yihuda kawa Akaaza na7ay Hizqiyaasi Yihudan kawotis.
2KI 18:2 I kawotiya wode laythi iyaw laatamanne ichasha; Yerusalaamen laatamanne uddufun laythi kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Abiya geetetees; iya Zakaryaasa na7iw.
2KI 18:3 Iya mayzay Dawiti oothidaysada, Hizqiyaasi Godaa sinthan suureba oothis.
2KI 18:4 Asay dhoqa goyinno bessata diggis. Eeqa tuussata mentherethis. Asheera geetetiya xoosse misiliya qanxi yeggis. Qassi Musey naase biratape medhida, Nahushitana geetetiya shoosha misiliya mentherethis. He wodey gakanaw Isra7eele asay iyaw ixaane cuyisishe gam7is.
2KI 18:5 Hizqiyaasi Godaa Isra7eele Xoossaa ammanis; Yihuda kawota ubbaa giddon iya mela kawoy iyape kase gidin, iyape guye gidin bentibeenna.
2KI 18:6 I Godaara oyketis; Godaa kaalo aggibeenna; Goday Muse kiitida kiitata naagis.
2KI 18:7 Goday iyara gidis; I oothiyaba ubbay iyaw injetis. I Asoore kawa bolla makallidi, iyaw haaretonna ixis.
2KI 18:8 I, Filisxeeme asaa olidi guutha moothatape bidi, gita katama gakanaw, Gaazanne iya yuushon de7iya biittati attonna enti de7iya bessata ubbaa xoonis.
2KI 18:9 Kawoy Hizqiyaasi kawotida oyddantho laythan, Ela na7ay Isra7eele kawoy, Hosey kawotida laapuntho laythan, Asoore kawoy Salminasoori Isra7eele bolla dendidi, Samaare katamaa teqis.
2KI 18:10 Heedzantho laythi Samaare katama xoonis. Yaatin, Hizqiyaasi kawotida usupuntho laythan, Isra7eele kawoy Hosey kawotida uddufuntho laythan, Samaare katamay xoonetis.
2KI 18:11 Asoore kawoy Isra7eele asaa Asoore biitta efidi, entafe baggaa Alahaninne Aboora katamatan, baggaa Agooza shaafa matan baggaa qassi Meedona katamatan wothis.
2KI 18:12 Hessika enti Godaas banta Xoossaas kiitetonna ixidi, Godaa caaquwa, Godaa aylley, Musey kiitida kiita ubbaa menthida gishosa. Enti iya kiita si7anawunne kiitetanaw koybookona.
2KI 18:13 Kawoy Hizqiyaasi kawotida tammanne oyddantho laythan, Asoore kawoy Sanakreemi gimbetida Yihuda katamata ubbaa olidi oykis.
2KI 18:14 Yaatin, Yihuda kawoy Hizqiyaasi Laakiso kataman de7iya Asoore kawa Sanakreemas kiitaa yeddidi, “Taani balas; hayyana ta biitta yeddada keya. Neeni tana oychidaba aybaka ta new immana” yaagis. Asoore kawoy, Yihuda kawa Hizqiyaasako, “Neeni 10,000 kilo giraame biranne 1,000 kilo giraame worqa taw yedda” yaagis.
2KI 18:15 Hizqiyaasi Xoossa keethan, kawo gadhon shalo minjiya bessan de7iya bira ubbaa iyaw yeddis.
2KI 18:16 He wode Yihuda kawoy Hizqiyaasi, Xoossa keetha pengiya sanqata tiyida worqanne I ba huuphen penge tuuqeta tiyida worqaa qaaridi, Asoore kawas yeddis.
2KI 18:17 Asoore kawoy, Tartana, Rafeesanne Rasfaqisa geetetiya heedzu toora moconata, daro olanchotara Laakiso katamaape kawa Hizqiyaasako Yerusalaame yeddis. Enti bidi, Yerusalaame gakidi, Ma7o Meecciya addiya gade efiya ogiyape qommo baggara de7iya, dagatida haathay goggiya zara lanqen eqidosona.
2KI 18:18 Enti kawa xeegin, kawo gadho aawatethan aysiya Kalqe na7ay Eliyaqeemi, waanna xaafey Saminasinne Asaafa na7ay taarike xaafey Yo7aasi iyako kare keyidosona.
2KI 18:19 Asooreta halaqay, “Hizqiyaasas haysada yaagidi odite. Asoore kawoy, wolqaamay nena haysada yaagees; ‘Neeni aybin ammanetadii?
2KI 18:20 Olaa oletanaw new cincatethinne wolqi de7ees yaagasa. Shin neeni aybin ammanetada ta bolla haysa makalladii?
2KI 18:21 Heko, neeni Gibxe kawoy maaddana gada qopiyaba gidiko, meqida mayre xam7an katiya asa mela. Xam7ay meqin, pincoy kushe caddesinne madunxisees. Gibxe kawoy banan ammanetiya asa ubbaas hessa mela’ ” yaagis.
2KI 18:22 Shin neeni, “Nuuni Godan nu Xoossan ammanetoos” yaagiko, Hizqiyaasi, Yihuda asaanne Yerusalaame asaa, “Hinte Yerusalaamen de7iya yarsho bessan goyinnanaw koshshees” gidi, dhoqa goyinno bessatanne yarsho bessata diggiday iya gidennee?
2KI 18:23 Ha77i haaya; ta godaa Asoore kawuwara mandeta. Neeni togganaw danda7iya, gidiya asi demmiko, nam7u mukulu parata taani new immana.
2KI 18:24 Neeni, “Gibxeti para asatanne para gaareta taw yeddana” gada ammaniko, ta godaa tora moconatape issi guuthaaka zaaranaw danda7aka.
2KI 18:25 Hessa bolla qassi, taani ha77i tuma Godaa kiiti bayna ha biitta dhaysanaw koyadina? Goday ba huuphen tana, “He biitta bada, olada dhaysa” yaagis.
2KI 18:26 Hessafe guye, Kalqe na7ay Elyaqeemi, Saminasinne Yo7aasi Asooreta toora moconaako haysada yaagidosona; “Nuuni birshethi eriya gisho, hayyana nuus ne aylletas Aramike doonan oda. Dirsa gimbiya huuphe son de7iya asay si7onna mela, Ibraawetho doonan odopa” yaagidosona.
2KI 18:27 Shin toora moconay zaaridi, “Ha qaala taani hintewunne hinte godaa xalaalas odanaw ta goday tana kiittideyee? Hintera issife banta shi7a maanawunne banta sheesha uyanaw de7iya, ha dirsa gimbiya bolla uttida asa ubbaasa gidenneyee?” yaagis.
2KI 18:28 Asoore toora moconay dendi eqidi, ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, Ibraawetho doonan haysada yaagis; “Asoore kawoy wolqaamay hintena giyaba si7ite!
2KI 18:29 Kawoy hinteko haysada yaagees; ‘Hizqiyaasi hintena cimmofo; I hintena ta kushepe kessi ekanaw danda7enna.
2KI 18:30 Goday tuma nuna ashshana; ha katamayka Asoore kawa kushen gelenna’ yaagidi hinte Godan ammanetanna mela oothofo” yaagees.
2KI 18:31 Hinte Hizqiyaasi odiyaba si7opite. Asoore kawoy, “Taara sigetite; haa taako keyite. Hinte ubbay hinte woyniyapenne hinte balasiyape maana; hinte bookida ollafe haathe uyana.
2KI 18:32 Taani yada, hintena hinte biitta daaniya biitta efana. He biittay kathinne woyney, uythinne woyne gadey kumida biitta; shamaho zayteynne eessi kumida biitta. Hinte taw kiitetiko, de7on daana; hayqeketa. Hizqiyaasi, ‘Goday nuna ashshana’ yaagidi hintena cimmeysa si7opite.
2KI 18:33 Hara kawotethata xoossatape ba biitta Asoore kawa kushepe ashshida xoossi de7ii?
2KI 18:34 Hamaata xoossatinne Arfada xoossati awun de7oona? Safarwayma, Heenanne Iwa xoossati awun de7oona? Enti Samaare ta kushepe kessi ekidona?
2KI 18:35 Ha biittata xoossata ubbaa giddon, ba biitta ta kushepe ay xoossi ashshidashin, Goday Yerusalaame ta kushepe ashshanee?” yaagis.
2KI 18:36 Kawoy kase, “Entaw aykoka zaaropite” yaagidi odida gisho, asay issi qaalaka zaaronna si77i gidoosona.
2KI 18:37 Kalqe na7ay kawo gadho aawatethan aysiya Eliyaqeemi, waanna xaafey Saminasinne taarike xaafey Asaafa na7ay Yo7aasi banta ma7uwa daakidi, Hizqiyaasako bidi, Asooreta toora moconay gidaba ubbaa iyaw odidosona.
2KI 19:1 Kawoy Hizqiyaasi hessa si7ida wode, ba ma7uwa daakidi, kayo ma7o ma7di, Xoossa keethi gelis.
2KI 19:2 Kawo gadho aawatethan aysiya Eliyaqeemi, waanna xaafey Saminasinne cima kahineti kayo ma7o ma7idi, Amoxe na7aa nabiya Isayaasako baana mela kiittis.
2KI 19:3 Enti Isayaasako bidi, “Hizqiyaasi haysada yaagees; ‘Hachi gallasay meto gallas, seera gallasinne yeella gallas. Hessika na7i yeletanaw wodey gakin, bannakada yelanaw wolqi dhayda maccasa mela.
2KI 19:4 De7o Xoossaa cayana mela, iya goday, Asoore kawoy, kiitida toora mocona qaala ubbaa, Goday ne Xoossay si7onna aggenna. Qassi Goday, ne Xoossay he si7ida qaala gaason iya seeronna aggenna. Hessa gisho, nu asaa giddofe palahidi attidaysatas woossa’ ” yaagidosona.
2KI 19:5 Kawa Hizqiyaasa aylleti Isayaasako bida wode,
2KI 19:6 Isayaasi enta haysada yaagis; “Hinte godaas haysada yaagidi odite; ‘Asoore kawa aylleti tana cayishin, neeni si7ida cashsha qaalas yayyofa.
2KI 19:7 Heko, taani iya giddo issi ayyaana yeddana; I he woriya si7idi ba biitta simmana. I ba biitta bidi, yan mashshan hayqanaada oothana’ ” yaagis.
2KI 19:8 Asoore kawoy Laakiso katamaape dendidi bidaysa Asooreta toora moconay si7idi, guye simmidi kawoy Libina kataman oleteysa demmis.
2KI 19:9 Kawoy Sanakreemi, “Heko, Tophe kawoy Tirhaaqi nena olanaw yis” giya woriya si7idi, Hizqiyaasas haysada yaagidi kiittis.
2KI 19:10 “Yihuda kawaw Hizqiyaasa, neeni ammanetiya xoossay, ‘Yerusalaamey Asoore kawa kushen gelenna’ yaagidi cimmofo.
2KI 19:11 Asoore kawoti biitta ubbaa dhaysidi, oothidaba neeni si7adasa. Yaatin, neeni attana daanii?
2KI 19:12 Beni ta mayzati dhaysida biitta xoossati, hessatika, Gozaana, Kaaranenne Rafeesa biitta xoossatinne Talasaaran de7iya Edene xoossati he biitta dhayope ashshidonaa?
2KI 19:13 Hamaata kawoy, Arfada kawoy, Safarwayma kawoy, Heena kawoynne Iwa kawoy awun de7oona?” yaagidi kiittis.
2KI 19:14 Hizqiyaasi dabdaabiya kiitetida asaape ekidi nabbabis. Dabdaabiya Xoossa keethi efidi, Godaa sinthan miccis.
2KI 19:15 Yaatidi, Godaa haysada yaagidi woossis; “Abeeti Godaw, kiruubetape giddon uttiya Isra7eele Xoossaw, sa7aa kawotethata ubbaa bolla ne xalaali Xoosse; saluwanne sa7aa neeni medhadasa.
2KI 19:16 Abeeti Godaw, ne haythaa haa zaarada si7a. Abeeti Godaw, ne ayfiya dooyada xeella. Nena, de7o Xoossaa cayanaw Sanakreemi yeddida qaala si7a.
2KI 19:17 Abeeti Godaw, Asoore biitta kawoti kawotethatanne enta biitta dhayseysi tuma.
2KI 19:18 Enta xoossata taman xuuggidi dhaysidosona; enta xoossati kaseka asaa kushey massidi kessida mithinne shuchu gidiya gisho, tuma xoossata gidokona; hessa gisho, enti enta dhaysidosona.
2KI 19:19 Abeeti Godaw, ne xalaali Xoosse gideysa sa7aa kawotethati ubbay erana mela, ha77i zaarada, Godaw, nu Xoossaw, neeni nuna iya kushepe ashsha” yaagidi woossis.
2KI 19:20 Hessafe guye, Amoxe na7ay Isayaasi Hizqiyaasako haysada yaagidi kiittis; “Goday Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees. Neeni Asoore kawa Sanakreema gaason tana woossida woosa si7as.”
2KI 19:21 Goday Sanakreemaba haysada yaagees. “Xiyoone geela7iya nena kadhawusu; nena borawusu; Yerusalaame macca na7iya ba huuphiya qaathidi nena qelqisawusu.
2KI 19:22 Neeni cayidaynne toochiday oonee? Neeni ne qaala oodde bolla dhoqu oothadii? otoron dhoqu gada oona xeelladii? Hessa neeni oothiday ta bolla, Isra7eele Geeshshaa bolla gidenne!
2KI 19:23 Neeni kiitida asaa baggara Godaa cayadasa. Qassi haysada yaagadasa; Taani taw de7iya daro para gaaretan dhoqa dereta huuphe, Libaanose zumaa huuphiya keyas. Keyada ubbaafe aduqiya zigatanne ubbaafe lo77iya xiiddata qanxas. Taani iyaw wursetha gaxaanne sikida wora gakas.
2KI 19:24 Taani allaga biittatan haatha olla bookada, haatha yaape uyas. Gibxe biittan goggiya haathe ubbaa taani ta tohuwan yedhada melisas” yaagadasa.
2KI 19:25 “Daro wodepe kase neeni gimbetida katamata laallada, laaletha doore kessana mela, taani qofa qachidaysa neeni si7abikii? Taani ha77i poliya halchota beni halcha wothas.
2KI 19:26 Hessa gisho, enta asaas wolqi ixin, enti kawuyidosonanne yeellatidosona. Enti gade maata mela; goshshan mokida carsha mela. Enti keetha huuphen doliya sharaafa mela kaxonna de7ishin, leegey mida kathada hanidosona.
2KI 19:27 Shin neeni uttiya bessaa, keyiyanne geliya bessaa, ta bolla neeni shenetida sheniya taani erayis.
2KI 19:28 Neeni ta bolla yilotida gishonne ne otoruwaka taani si7ida gisho, taani ne siidhiyan dafo aathana; ne doonan bixaala barsana. Yaatada ne yida ogiyara taani nena guye zaarana” yaagis.
2KI 19:29 Isayaasi kawa Hizqiyaasako haysada yaagis; “Haysi poletanaysas malaatay haysa; ha laythi hinte aasebo kaxida kathi maana; laythi qassi ha laythi kaxida aasebo maana. Shin kaalliya laythi hinte, hintew zeritenne cakite; woyne tokitenne iya miite.
2KI 19:30 Yihuda asaape attidaysati xapho yeddidi, ayfe ayfiya mitha mela gidana.
2KI 19:31 Attidaysati Yerusalaamepe keyana, palahidaysati Xiyoonepe yaana. Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa mishay hessa oothana.
2KI 19:32 “Hessa gisho, Asoore kawuwaba Goday haysada yaagees; ‘Asoore kawoy ha katama gelenna; woyko haysan ba donge dukenna. I ba gondalliya oykidi, ha katama sinthe aadhenna; woyko katama yuushuwa biitta dooren teqetenna.
2KI 19:33 Asoore kawoy ba yida ogiyara guye simmana; I ha katama gelenna. Taani Goday haysa odas.’
2KI 19:34 Taani ta bonchuwa gishonne ta aylliya Dawita gisho, ha katama teqada ashshana” yaagis.
2KI 19:35 He qamma Godaa kiitanchoy keyidi, Asoore asay dunkaanida bessan issi xeetanne hospun tammanne ichashu mukulu addeta wodhis. Yaatin asay wonta dendidi be7iya wode, Heko, ahi heeran kumis.
2KI 19:36 Asoore kawoy Sanakreemi dendidi, guye simmi bidi, Nanawe kataman uttis.
2KI 19:37 Issi gallas Sanakreemi ba xoossaa Nasaraaka Eeqa Keethan goyinnishin, iya nayti Adramelekinne Sarsari mashshan iya wodhidi, Araraate biitta baqatidosona. Iya na7ay Asradooni iya bessan kawotis.
2KI 20:1 He wode kawoy Hizqiyaasi hargidi, hayqanaw matis. Amoxe na7ay nabey Isayaasi iyako bidi, “Goday, ‘Neeni ne hargiyafe paxaka; ne hayqana; hessa gisho, ne keetha giigisa’ ” yaagis.
2KI 20:2 Hizqiyaasi godaako simmidi, Xoossaa woossis.
2KI 20:3 “Abeeti Godaw, taani ne sinthan tumatethan, kumetha wozanan hemetidaysanne nena ufaysiyabaa oothidaysa neeni qopana mela taani ne woossayis” yaagidi, daro cametidi, yeekidi woossis.
2KI 20:4 Isayaasi kawa sinthafe keyidi, kawo gadho dabaaba kanthidi boonna de7ishin, Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe iyako yis.
2KI 20:5 “Guye simmada bada ta asaa kaalethiya Hizqiyaasas haysada yaagada oda. Goday, ne mayza Dawita Xoossay haysada yaagees; ‘Taani ne woosa si7as; ne afuthaa be7as. Heko, taani nena pathana; heedzu gallasape guye, neeni Xoossa keethi baana.
2KI 20:6 Ne laytha bolla taani new tammanne ichashu laythi gujana. Taani nenanne ha katamaa Asoore kawa kushepe ashshana. Taani ta bonchuwa gishonne ta aylliya Dawita gisho, ha katamaas oletada ashshana’ yaagees” yaagis.
2KI 20:7 Isayaasi, “Balase teera daaxidi, iya kixa bolla wothite; I paxana” yaagis.
2KI 20:8 Hizqiyaasi Isayaasa, “Goday tana pathanaysanne taani heedzantho gallas Xoossa keetha baanaysas malaatay aybee?” yaagidi oychis.
2KI 20:9 Isayaasi, “Goday ba gida qaala polanaw new malaata immana. Hiza neeni haysatape awusa dooray? Kuyay tammu dethaa sintha baana mela koyayee? Tammu dethata guye baana mela koyay?” yaagidi oychis.
2KI 20:10 Hizqiyaasi, “Kuyay sinthe baanaysi metenna; kuyay guye simmanaada ootha” yaagis.
2KI 20:11 Nabey Isayaasi Godaa woossin, Goday Kawoy Akaazi gimbisida dethaa bolla shempida kuyay tammu dethaa guye zaaris.
2KI 20:12 He wode Baldaana na7ay, Babiloone kawoy, Marodaaki Baldaani Hizqiyaasi hargidaysa si7ida gisho, dabdaabenne imota Hizqiyaasas yeddis.
2KI 20:13 Hizqiyaasi kiitetidi yida asata mokis. Ba shalo minjiya keethan de7iya bira, worqaa, sawuwa, al7o zaytiya, ba ola miishiyanne ba shalo minjiya keethan de7iyaba ubbaa enta bessis. Ba son woyko ba gadhon de7iyaba ubbaafe Hizqiyaasi enta bessonna aggidabay aybika baawa.
2KI 20:14 Nabey Isayaasi kawa Hizqiyaasako bidi, “Ha asati woygidona? Enti awupe yidona?” yaagidi oychis. Hizqiyaasi, “Enti taako haaho biittafe, Babiloonepe yidosona” yaagis.
2KI 20:15 Isayaasi, “Enti ne son ay ay be7idonaa?” yaagis. Hizqiyaasi, “Enti ta gadhon de7iya ubbaa be7idosona; ta shalo minjiya keethan de7iyabaape taani enta bessaboonabay baawa” yaagis.
2KI 20:16 Isayaasi Hizqiyaasako, “Goday giyaba si7a.
2KI 20:17 ‘Heko, ne gadhon de7iyaba ubbaynne ne mayzati hachi gakanaw shiishidaba ubbay di7etidi, Babiloone biitta baana gallas yaana; iyape aybika attenna.
2KI 20:18 Qassi new yeletana, ne ashonne ne suuthu gidida ne adde nayti di7etidi bidi, Babiloone kawo gadhon shuufa gididi oothana’ ” yaagis.
2KI 20:19 Hizqiyaasi zaaridi, “Neeni odida Godaa qaalay lo77o” yaagis. Hizqiyaasi, “Taani de7ida laythan saroynne wopatethi daana gidenne” yaagidi qopis.
2KI 20:20 Hizqiyaasi hanida harabay, iya minotethaynne haatha zeeridi, biitta giddora haathe katama gelsidabay Yihuda kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 20:21 Hizqiyaasi hayqidi, ba mayzatan gahetis; iya bessan iya na7ay Minaasey kawotis.
2KI 21:1 Minaasey kawotiya wode iyaw laythi tammanne nam7a; I Yerusalaamen ishatammanne ichashu laythi kawotis; iya aaye sunthay Hefseebo.
2KI 21:2 Goday Isra7eele asa sinthafe gooddidi kessida asata de7uwa wogaa kaallidi, Minaasey Godaa sinthan iitaba oothis.
2KI 21:3 Iya aaway Hizqiyaasi laallida, dhoqa goyinno bessata I zaaridi keexis; Isra7eele kawoy Akaabi oothidaysada, Ba7aale xoossaas yarsho bessatanne Asheera xoosse misileta medhis. Qassi salo xoolintota ubbaa goyinnis; entana haggaazis.
2KI 21:4 Goday, “Taani ta sunthaa Yerusalaamen xeegisana” yaagidi odida Xoossa keethan hara xoossatas yarsho bessata giigisis.
2KI 21:5 Xoossa keethan de7iya nam7u dabaabatan salo xoolintota ubbaas yarsho bessata giigisis.
2KI 21:6 Ba na7aa tama giddora aathis. I ba huuphen bitanchonne murunniya asi gididi, marotanne moytilleta zore oychis. Godaa sinthan daro iitabaa oothidi, iya hanqethis.
2KI 21:7 Masetidi keyida Asheera xoosse misiliya ehidi, Xoossa keetha giddon essis. He Xoossa keethay, Goday Dawitanne iya na7aa Solomone, “Isra7eele zare ubbaa giddofe taani doorida ha Xoossa keethan Yerusalaamen taani ta sunthaa merinaw xeegisana.
2KI 21:8 Isra7eele asa taani kiitida kiita ubbaanne ta aylley Musey entaw immida higgiya ubba naagidi oothiko, taani enta mayzatas immida biittafe enta denthada dhaysike” yaagida Xoossa keetha.
2KI 21:9 Shin asay si7onnan ixis; Goday Isra7eele asaa sinthafe dhaysida hara kawotethatape aadhidi iita oothana mela Minaasey enta balethis.
2KI 21:10 Goday ba aylle gidida nabeta baggara haysada yaagis;
2KI 21:11 “Yihuda kawoy Minaasey ha tuna oosuwa oothis; baape kase de7ida Amoore asa ubbaa nagaraape aadhiya iita nagara oothis. Yihuda asa ba medhida eeqa misiliya goyinnisidi, nagara oosisis.
2KI 21:12 Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees; ‘Heko, si7iya asa ubbaa haythas iitiya dhayo Yerusalaame bollanne Yihuda bolla ehana hanayis.
2KI 21:13 Samaare bolla yeggida wadha wodoruwa, Yerusalaame bolla yeggana; Akaaba soo asaa bolla yeddida tumbiya, Yerusalaame bolla yeddana. Issi asi kere meeccidi gufanthidi meliseysada, taani Yerusalaame quchada gufanthana.
2KI 21:14 Ta asaape attidaysata taani yegga aggana; taani enta enta morketa kushen aathada immana. Enta morketi ubbay enta oykananne bonqana.
2KI 21:15 Enta mayzati Gibxefe keyoosope hachi gakanaw, enti ta sinthan iitabaa oothida gishonne tana hanqethida gisho, taani haysa oothana’ ” yaagis.
2KI 21:16 Minaasey Yihuda asaa, Godaa sinthan nagara oosisidaysa bolla gujidi, xillo asaa wodhis; Yerusalaame gaxape gaxa gakanaw, suuthan kunthis.
2KI 21:17 Minaasey hanida harabay, I oothidabay, I oothida nagaray Yihuda Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 21:18 Minaasey hayqidi, ba mayzatan gahetis; ba gadhuwa matan de7iya Oza gaden moogetis; iya bessan iya na7ay Amooni kawotis.
2KI 21:19 Amooni kawotiya wode, iyaw laythi laatamanne nam7a; I Yerusalaamen nam7u laythi kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Masulaamo; iya Yooxiba addiya Haruse na7a.
2KI 21:20 Iya aaway, Minaasey oothidaysada, Amooneyka Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis.
2KI 21:21 I ba aaway hemetida ogiyan hemetis; ba aaway oothida eeqatas ika oothis; enta goyinnis.
2KI 21:22 Godaa, ba mayzata Xoossaa aggis; Godaa ogiyan I hemetibeenna.
2KI 21:23 Amoone shuumati iya bolla maqetidi, kawo gadhon iya wodhidosona.
2KI 21:24 Hessafe guye, Yihuda asay Kawa Amoone bolla maqetida ubbata wodhidosona. Amoone bessan iya na7aa Iyosyaasa kawothidosona.
2KI 21:25 Amooni hanida harabaynne I oothidaba ubbay Yihuda Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 21:26 Amooni Oza gaden ba duufuwan moogetis; iya bessan iya na7ay Iyosyaasi kawotis.
2KI 22:1 Iyosyaasi kawotiya wode, iyaw laythi hospuna; I Yerusalaamen hastamanne issi laythi kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Yidida; iya Baxuroota addiya Adaya na7a.
2KI 22:2 Iyosyaasi Godaa sinthan suureba oothis; ushachi haddirsi goonna ba mayza Dawita ogiyan hemetis.
2KI 22:3 Kawoy Iyosyaasi ba kawotida tammanne hospuntho laythan, Masulaama na7aa na7aa, Ezalaasa na7aa, waanna xaafiya Safaana, Xoossa keethan haysada yaagidi kiittis.
2KI 22:4 “Asay Xoossa keethi ehin, Xoossa keetha pengiya naageysati asaape shiishida miishiya taybanaada, kahine halaqa Kalqeko ba.
2KI 22:5 Kahine halaqay miishiya Xoossa keetha oorathanaw halaqatas immana mela oda. Entika Xoossa keetha oorathiya oosanchotas,
2KI 22:6 anaaxetas, gimbeysatsinne shuchu masseysatas qanxo. Qassi Xoossa keetha oorathanaw, mithinne qoo7etida shuchu shammeysatas qanxo.
2KI 22:7 Oosuwa aawatethan xeelleysati ammanthiya asi gidiya gisho, enta kushen gelida miishiyan ay ay oothidaako, enta oychanaw koshshenna” yaagis.
2KI 22:8 Hessafe guye, kahine halaqay Kalqey waanna xaafiya Saafanako, “Higge Maxaafa Xoossa keethan demmas” yaagis. Maxaafa Saafanas immin Safaani ekidi nabbabis.
2KI 22:9 Waanna xaafey Safaani kawako bidi, “Xoossa keethan de7iya miishiya ne shuumati ekidi, Xoossa keetha oorathanaw halaqatas immidosona” yaagis.
2KI 22:10 Kaallidi, waanna xaafey Safaani, “Kahiney Kalqey taw immida maxaafaa haysa be7a” yaagidi kawa sinthan maxaafaa nabbabis.
2KI 22:11 Nabbabin Kawoy Higge Maxaafan de7iya qaala si7ida wode, azzanidi ba ma7uwa daakis.
2KI 22:12 Kawoy, kahiniya Kalqe, Safaana na7aa Akqaama, Mikiyaasa na7aa Akboora, waanna xaafiya Saafananne kawa oosanchuwa Asaya haysada yaagidi kiittis.
2KI 22:13 “Bidi, ta gisho, ha asaa gishonne Yihuda ubbaa gisho, ha bentida maxaafa qaalaba ane Godaa oychite. Nuuni xaafetida ubbaba oothanaw, nu mayzati ha maxaafa qaalas kiitetiboonna gisho, nu bolla suullida Godaa hanqoy daro” yaagis.
2KI 22:14 Yaagin kahiney Kalqiyaasi, Akqaami, Akboori, Safaaninne Asayi macca nabiw Hildaana oychanaw bidosona. Hildaana Harihaasa na7aa Tiqiwa na7a, Xoossa keetha ma7uwa naagiya Saleema macho. Iya Yerusalaamen nam7antho gutan de7awsu. He bida asati iira odetidosona.
2KI 22:15 Hildaana, “Goday Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees; hintena taako kiitida addiyas odite.
2KI 22:16 Goday haysada yaagees; ‘Yihuda kawoy nabbabida maxaafan xaafetida iita qaala ubbaa taani ha bessaaninne iyan de7iya asaa bolla ehana hanayis.
2KI 22:17 Enti tana aggidi, hara xoossatas ixaane cuyisidosona; enti banta kushen oothidaba ubban tana hanqethidosona. Hessa gisho, ta hanqoy ha bessaa bolla eexis; to7anaw danda7enna’ yaagees.
2KI 22:18 Godaa oychanaw hintena kiitida kawako haysada yaagite; ‘Goday Isra7eele Xoossay neeni si7ida qaalaba haysada yaagees.
2KI 22:19 Taani ha bessaanne iyan de7iya asa baadethasinne dhayos aathada immana gida qaala si7ida wode, ne wozanay shuggin, ta sinthan nena kawushida gishonne ne ma7uwa daakada, ta sinthan yeekida gisho, taani ne woosa si7as.
2KI 22:20 Hessa gisho, taani nena saron ne mayzatan gathana; neeni saro moogetana. Taani ha bessaa bollanne ha bessan de7iya asaa bolla ehana iitaba ne ayfey be7enna’ yaagees” yaagasu. Enti bidi, ha odetidaba kawas odidosona.
2KI 23:1 Kawoy Iyosyaasi Yihuda cimatanne Yerusalaame cimata ubbaa shiishis.
2KI 23:2 Kawoy pude Xoossa keethi keyis; Yihuda asay, Yerusalaamen de7iya asay, kahinetinne nabeti, guuthafe gita gakanaw ubbay iyara issife pude Xoossa keethi keyidosona. Xoossa keethafe bentida caaqo qaala maxaafa ubbaa kawoy entaw nabbabis.
2KI 23:3 Kawoy tuussa matan eqidi, enti Godaa ogiyan hemetananne, iya higgiya, iya wogaanne iya kiita kumetha wozananine kumetha qofan naaganaw, qassi ha maxaafan xaafetida caaquwa oothanaw Godaa sinthan caaqis. Asa ubbayka iyara caaqidosona.
2KI 23:4 Kawoy kahine halaqa Kalqe, iyape garsara de7iya kahinetanne penge naageysata Ba7aale, Asheeranne salo xoolintota goyinnanaw giigisida miisheta ubbaa Xoossa keethafe kessanaada kiittis. Kawoy hessata Yerusalaamepe gaxa kessidi, Qediroona Zangaaran xuuggidi, biduwa Beetele efis.
2KI 23:5 Yihuda katamataninne Yerusalaame yuushuwan de7iya dhoqa goyinno bessa ubban ixaane cuyisanaw Yihuda kawoti sunthida eeqata kahineta ubbaa oosope kessis. Ba7aales, awas, ageenas, xoolintotasinne salon de7iya hara medhetethatas ixaane cuyiseyisata ubbaa diggis.
2KI 23:6 Asheera xoosse misiliya Xoossa keethafe kessidi, Yerusalaame katamaape gaxa efidi, Qediroona Zangaara efidi, yan xuuggis. Xuugetidaysi gaaccidi, dhiille kessis; baana deriya duufo bolla laallis.
2KI 23:7 Xoossa keetha giddon goyinno woga oothidi, addey addera laymatiya keethata laallis; he keethatan maccasati Asheera xoossees geshe suqoosona.
2KI 23:8 Iyosyaasi kahineta ubbaa Yihuda katamatape ehidi, kase kahineti ixaane cuyisiya dhoqa goyinno bessata, Gib7ape bidi Barsaabe gakanaw de7eyisata tunisis. Katamaa haariya Iyyasu Pengiyafe haddirsa baggara de7iya dhoqa goyinno bessaaka laallis.
2KI 23:9 Dhoqa goyinno bessaa kahineti Yerusalaamen Godaa yarsho bessa pude yookona; shin enti hara kahinetara issife irshoy geliboonna daabbo moosona.
2KI 23:10 Kawoy Iyosyaasi Henooma zangaaran de7iya Toofeta yarsho bessa tunisis. Moloka xoossas issi asika ba adde na7aa woyka macca na7a tama giddora aathona mela diggis.
2KI 23:11 Yihuda kawoti Xoossa keethaa geliya pengiyan awas dummayidi wothida parata diggis. Awa parati Naatan-Meleka halaqaa kifiliya matan de7iya dabaaban de7oosona. Hessafe guye, awas dummayidi wothida para gaareta Iyosyaasi taman xuuggis.
2KI 23:12 Akaaza keethaa pooqiya bolla Yihuda kawoti giigisida yarsho bessatan Minaasey Xoossa keethan de7iya nam7u dabaabata giddon giigisida yarsho bessata Kawoy Iyosyaasi laallis. Enta he bessaafe diggidi tincherethidi, Qediroona Zangaaran holis.
2KI 23:13 Kawoy Yerusalaame katamaape doloha baggara, tunatetha zumaape dugeha baggan de7iya dhoqa goyinno bessata tunisis. He dhoqa bessati Isra7eele kawoy Solomoney, tuna xoossata, Sidoona xoosse Astarooto, Moo7abe xoossaa Kamooshanne Amoone xoossaa Moloka goyinnanaw giigisida dhoqa bessata.
2KI 23:14 Kawoy Iyosyaasi goyinno shucha tuussataka mentherethidi, Asheera xoosse misiletaka qanxerethis. Enti eqida bessan hayqida asa meqethi kunthis.
2KI 23:15 Isra7eele asaa, nagara oosisida Nabaaxa na7ay Iyorbaami Beetelen dhoqa bessan giigisida yarsho bessa Kawoy Iyosyaasi laallis. Laallidi he yarsho bessa shuchataka mentherethidi, dhiille kessis; Asheeri misiliyaka xuuggis.
2KI 23:16 Hessafe guye, Iyosyaasi yuushuwa xeellidi, zumaa lanqen de7iya duufota be7is; meqethata duufotape kessidi, yarsho bessa bolla wothidi, taman xuuggis. Yaatidi yarsho bessa tunisis. Hessi haniday Xoossa asi kase awaajida Godaa qaala maarana.
2KI 23:17 Hessafe guye kawoy, “Ha benteysi oodde duufo?” yaagidi oychis. Beetele asay, “Yihudape yidi, Beetele yarsho bessa bolla ha77i neeni oothidabay poletanaysa kasetidi odida nabiya duufo” yaagidosona.
2KI 23:18 Kawoy, “De7o giite; oonika iya meqetha haysafe qaathofo” yaagis. Hessa gisho, Samaarepe yida nabeti addiya meqethaara issife iya meqetha bochonna aggaagidosona.
2KI 23:19 Isra7eele kawoti Samaare katamatan oosisidi, Godaa hanqethida, dhoqa goyinno bessata Iyosyaasi diggis; Beetelen oothidaysada, enta bollaka oothis.
2KI 23:20 I goyinno dhoqa bessan oothiya kahineta ubba yarsho bessa bolla wodhis; qassi he yarsho bessa bolla asaa meqethaa xuuggis. Hessa ubbaa oothidi, Yerusalaame simmis.
2KI 23:21 Kawoy asa ubbaa, “Ha caaqo Maxaafan xaafetidaysada Godaas, hinte Xoossaas Paasika Ba7aale bonchite” yaagidi kiittis.
2KI 23:22 Isra7eele haariya daynnata wodepe doomidi, Isra7eele kawota wodenne Yihuda kawota wode ubban haysa mela Paasika Ba7aale kumethi boncheti erenna.
2KI 23:23 Shin Kawoy Iyosyaasi kawotida tammanne hospuntho laythan Yerusalaame kataman Godaa bonchanaw Paasika Ba7aaley bonchetis.
2KI 23:24 Kahine halaqay Kalqiyaasi Xoossa keethan bentida maxaafan xaafetida higgiya qaala minthanaada, tuna ayyaana xeegeysatanne marota, soo giddo eeqa misileta, eeqa miishetanne Yihuda biittaninne Yerusalaame kataman bentida hara ixetidabata ubbaa Iyosyaasi dhaysis.
2KI 23:25 Muse higgiyada ba kumetha wozanan, ba kumetha shempuwaninne, ba kumetha wolqan Godaako simmida Iyosyaasa mela kawoy, iyape kase gidin, iyape guye dendibeenna.
2KI 23:26 Minaasey Godaa hanqethanaw oothida iita ooso ubbaa gisho, Goday Yihuda bolla hanqetida ba sheniyape simmibeenna.
2KI 23:27 Goday, “Taani Isra7eele ta sinthafe diggidaysada, Yihudaka ta sinthafe diggana; taani doorida katama, Yerusalaamenne ‘Ta sunthay haysan daana’ gida ha keethaa diggana” yaagis.
2KI 23:28 Iyosyaasi hanida harabaynne I oothidabay ubbay Yihuda Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 23:29 Iyosyaasa wode Gibxe Kawoy Naakoy, Asoore kawa olan maaddanaw Efraxiisa Shaafa bis. Kawoy Iyosyaasi iyara oletanaw ba olanchota ekidi keyis. Shin kawoy Naakoy iyara Magidon gahetidi, iya wodhis.
2KI 23:30 Aylleti iya aha para gaare bolla wothidi, Magidope Yerusalaame ehidi, iya buzo duufuwan moogidosona. He biitta asay Iyosyaasa na7aa Iyo7akaaza dooridi, iya aawa bessan iya tiyidi kawothidosona.
2KI 23:31 Iyo7akaazi kawotiya wode, laythi iyaw laatamanne heedza; I Yerusalaamen heedzu ageena kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Hamuxaalo; iya Libina katama de7iya Ermiyaasa na7a.
2KI 23:32 Iya mayzati oothidaysada, Iyo7akaazi Godaa sinthan iitaba oothis.
2KI 23:33 Iyo7akaazi Yerusalaamen kawotennaada Gibxe Kawoy Naakoy Hamaata biittan Irbilan iya qachidi heedzu mukulunne oyddu xeetu kilo giraame deexiya biranne hastamanne oyddu kilo giraame deexiya worqa Yihuda asaa giirisis.
2KI 23:34 Kawoy Naakoy Iyosiyaasa na7aa Eliyaqeeme iya aawa bessan kawothis; iya sunthaa Iyo7aqeema yaagidi laammis. Shin Iyo7akaaza Gibxe efin, I yan hayqis.
2KI 23:35 Iyo7aqeemi, kawoy Naakoy oychida biranne worqa giira iyaw immis. He giira qanxanaw Iyo7aqeemi he biitta asay demmiya keena birapenne worqafe giira shiishis.
2KI 23:36 Iyo7aqeemi kawotiya wode laythi iyaw laatamanne ichasha; I Yerusalaamen tammanne issi laythi kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Zabido; iya Ruuma kataman de7iya Padaya na7a.
2KI 23:37 Iyo7aqeemi ba mayzati oothidaysada, Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis.
2KI 24:1 Iyo7aqeema wode Babiloone Kawoy Nabukadanaxoori Yihuda bolla dendis. Iyo7aqeemi iyaw heedzu laytha haaretidaape guye, Nabukadanaxoora bolla makallis.
2KI 24:2 Goday Kaldaaweta paannota, Soore paannota, Moo7abe paannotanne Amoone paannota Iyo7aqeema bolla yeddis; ba aylleta nabeta baggara Goday kase odidaysada, Yihuda biitta dhaysanaada haysata yeddis.
2KI 24:3 Kawoy Minaasey oothida nagara gaason Goday Yihuda asaa ba sinthafe digganaw ha dhayuwa yeddis.
2KI 24:4 I xillo asa suuthu gussidi, Yerusalaamen kunthida gisho, Goday Minaases he nagaraa atto gaanaw koybeenna.
2KI 24:5 Iyo7aqeemi hanida harabaynne I oothidaba ubbay Yihuda Kawota Taarike Maxaafan xaafetis.
2KI 24:6 Iyo7aqeemi hayqidi, ba mayzata gakis; iya bessan iya na7ay Yo7akini kawotis.
2KI 24:7 Gibxe kawoy nam7antho ba biittafe dendidi, olas yibeenna; Gibxe Shaafape doomidi, bidi Efraxiisa Shaafa gakanaw, Gibxe kawoy haarida biitta ubbaa Babiloone kawoy ekis.
2KI 24:8 Yo7akini kawotiya wode laythi iyaw tammanne hospuna; Yo7akini, Yerusalaamen heedzu ageena kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Nasta; iya Yerusalaame addiya Elnaatana na7a.
2KI 24:9 Yo7akini ba aaway oothidaysada, Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis.
2KI 24:10 He wode Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxoora olanchoti Yerusalaame yidi, katama teqidosona.
2KI 24:11 Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori he katama yis.
2KI 24:12 Yihuda kawoy Iyo7akina, iya aayiya, iya aylleti, iya halaqatinne kawo gadho shuumati ubbay Babiloone kawas kushe immidosona. Yo7akini kawotida hospuntho laythan, Babiloone kawoy Yo7akina qachis.
2KI 24:13 Xoossa keethaanne kawo gadhon de7iya shaluwa ubbaa he bessaafe denthidi efis. Goday kase odidaysada kawoy Solomoney Xoossa keethan giigisida worqa miisheta ubbaa Babiloone kawoy qanxerethis.
2KI 24:14 Nabukadanaxoori Yerusalaame asa, halaqata ubbaa, olanchota ubbaa, kushe hiillanchotanne birata qoxeyisata ubbaa, 10,000 asaa Yerusalaamepe di77idi efin, biittan manqo asa xalaali attis.
2KI 24:15 Nabukadanaxoori Iyo7akina di77idi, iya aayiw, iya macheta, iya moorinnatinne biittan de7iya gita asa ubbaa Babiloone efis.
2KI 24:16 He asape 7,000 asati olanchota; 1,000 asati dumma dumma kushe hiillanchota; enti ubbay minonne olaa oletanaw danda7eyisata.
2KI 24:17 Hessafe guye, Babiloone kawoy Yo7akina bessan iya aawa ishaa Mataana kawothis; iya sunthaa Sedeqiyaasa yaagidi laammis.
2KI 24:18 Sedeqiyaasi kawotiya wode, laythi iyaw laatamanne issino; I tammanne issi laythi Yerusalaamen kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Amxaalo; iya Libana kataman de7iya Ermiyaasa na7a.
2KI 24:19 Iyo7aqeemi oothidaysada, Sedeqiyaasi Godaa sinthan iitaba oothis.
2KI 24:20 Goday hanqetida gisho, Yerusalaame asa bollanne Yihuda asaa bolla haysi hanis; wursethan enta I ba sinthafe diggis. Sedeqiyaasi Babiloone kawa bolla makallis.
2KI 25:1 Sedeqiyaasi kawotida uddufuntho laythi, tammantho ageenan, tammantho gallas, Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori ba olanchota ubbaa ekidi, Yerusalaame teqis; iya yuushuwan biitta dooridi teqis.
2KI 25:2 Sedeqiyaasi kawotida tammanne issintho laythi gakanaw, katamay teqetidi gam7is.
2KI 25:3 Hessa gaason biittan koshi suullin, he laythi oyddantho ageenan, uddufuntho gallasan asas miyabay dhayis.
2KI 25:4 Katamaa yuusho gimbey issi baggara meqin, Kaldaaweti yuuyi aadhidi naagikoka, Yihuda kawa olanchoti kumethi qamma kawo gade efiya ogiya oykidi, nam7u dirsa gimbeti gahetiya pengiyara keyidi baqatidosona. Enti Yordaanose dilbaako simmidi baqatidosona.
2KI 25:5 Shin Babiloone olanchoti kawa yedethidi, Iyaarko demba gathishe oykidosona. Iya olanchoti ubbay iyape shaaketidi laaletidosona.
2KI 25:6 Hessafe guye, enti iya Rabila kataman de7iya Nabukadanaxoorako efidosona. Babiloone kawoy Sedeqiyaasa bolla pirdis.
2KI 25:7 Sedeqiyaasa nayta, Sedeqiyaasi xeellishin wodhidosona. Iya ayfeta wooci kessidi, santhalaatan qachidi, Babiloone biitta efidosona.
2KI 25:8 Nabukadanaxoori Babiloonen kawotida tammanne uddufuntho laythan, ichashantho ageenan, laapuntho gallasan, kawa moorinatape issoy, kawa naageysata halaqay Nabuzardaani Yerusalaame gelis.
2KI 25:9 Xoossa keethaa, kawo gadhonne Yerusalaamen de7iya keetha ubbaa, gita keethi geetetiya ubbaa xuuggis.
2KI 25:10 Babiloone olanchoti ubbay kawa naageysata halaqaa kiitan Yerusalaame katama yuushuwan de7iya dirsa gimbiya ubbaa laallidosona.
2KI 25:11 Nabuzardaani katamaninne Yihudan attida asata, kaddidi Babiloone olanchotan gahetida asata ubbaa oykidi, di77idi efis.
2KI 25:12 Shin Nabuzardaani wursetha manqotape guuthata woyne tokanaadanne gade goyanaada Yihudan ashshis.
2KI 25:13 Babiloone asati Xoossa keethan de7iya naase biratape medhida tuussata, caana gaaretanne gita kereta mentherethidosona; naase birata ubbaa Babiloone efidosona.
2KI 25:14 Kereta, akaafata, xompe xeera pittiyabata, cilpatanne yarsho wode go7etiya naase birata miisheta ubbaa efidosona.
2KI 25:15 Kawa naageysata halaqay Nabuzardaani worqafe oosetida miisheta worqatho, birape oosetida miisheta biratho oothi ekidi, ixaane cuyisiya shaatetanne xaarota ubbaa efis.
2KI 25:16 Kawoy Solomoney Xoossa keetha oosos giigisida nam7u tuussata, gita keretanne caana gaareta, naase birata mizaanen likanaw danda7etibeenna.
2KI 25:17 Nam7u tuussati issi mela gididi, issuwa issuwa geesay tammanne hospun wadha; qassi issi issi tuussa huuphen de7iya gumboti heedzu wadha adusse. He gumbota yuushoy naase birata giteninne oromaane teera misilen alleeqetis.
2KI 25:18 Kawa naageysata halaqay Nabuzardaani, kahine halaqaa Saraya, iya kaalliya kahiniya Sofoniyaasanne penge naagiya hara heedzu asata oykis.
2KI 25:19 He wodey gakanaw, kataman de7iya asape Yihuda toora mocona, kawa zoreysatape ichashu asata, toora moconata xaafiya, olanchota dooriya hara usupun tammu asata efis.
2KI 25:20 Halaqay Nabuzardaani enta ubbaa, Babiloone kawako Rabila katama efis.
2KI 25:21 Babiloone kawoy enta ubbaa Hamaata biittan Rabila kataman wodhis. Hessada hanidi, Yihuda asay banta biittafe di7etidi bidosona.
2KI 25:22 Kawoy Nabukadanaxoori Safaana na7aa na7aa, Akqaama na7aa Godoliya Yihudan attida asaa bolla shuumis.
2KI 25:23 Kushe immiboona Yihuda toora moconatinne olanchoti hessa si7ida wode, Mixiphan de7iya Godoliyara gahetidosona. He halaqati Naatana na7aa Isma7eela, Qareya na7aa Yohaana, Naxoofa addiya Tanhumeta na7aa Sarayanne Makata addiya Yazaana na7aa.
2KI 25:24 Godoliya entawunne enta olanchotas “Haysatasinne enta halaqatas yayyofite. Ha biittan de7ite; Babiloone kawas haaretite; hessa hinte oothiko ubbabay hintew injetana” yaagidi entaw caaqis.
2KI 25:25 Shin laapuntho ageenan, kawo kochi gidida Elisaama na7aa Naatana na7ay Isma7eeli tammu asara Mixipha bidi, Godoliya, Yihuda asaanne iyara de7iya Babiloone asa ubbaa wodhis.
2KI 25:26 Hessafe guye, Babiloone asaas yayyidi, Yihuda asay, guuthi giti attonnashin, toora moconati ubbay Gibxe biitta baqatidosona.
2KI 25:27 Yo7akini di7etidi bida hastamanne laapuntho laythan, tammanne nam7antho ageenan, laatamanne laapuntho gallasan, Yoor-Marodaaki kawotida laythi, Yihuda kawa Yo7akina maaridi qashope billis.
2KI 25:28 Yoor-Marodaaki, Yo7akinara lo77o qaala odetidi, Babiloonen di7on de7iya hara kawota ubbaafe aathidi, iya bonchis.
2KI 25:29 Hessa gisho, Yo7akini qasho keethan ma7ida ma7uwa laammidi, attida ba de7o laytha ubban kawo gaytape mis.
2KI 25:30 Gallas gallas iyaw koshshiyaba ubbaa Babiloone kawoy immis.
1CH 1:1 Addaamey Seeta yelis; Seeti Henoosa yelis; Henoosi Qaynana yelis;
1CH 1:2 Qaynani Malal7eela yelis; Malal7eeli Yaareda yelis;
1CH 1:3 Yaaredi Heenoke yelis; Heenokey Matusaala yelis; Matusaali Laameha yelis;
1CH 1:4 Laamehi Nohe yelis; Nohey Seema, Kaamanne Yaafeta yelis.
1CH 1:5 Yaafeta adde nayti Gamera, Maagoge, Madaya, Yawaana, Tobeela, Mosahanne Tirasa.
1CH 1:6 Gamera adde nayti Askanaaza, Irfatanne Tegarma.
1CH 1:7 Yawaana adde nayti Elisa, Tarsesa, Kiximanne Rooda.
1CH 1:8 Kaama adde nayti Kuusha, Mixirayma, Fuuxanne Kanaane.
1CH 1:9 Kuusha adde nayti Saaba, Ewulaaxe, Sabita, Ra7imanne Sabqata. Ra7ima adde nayti Saabanne Didaana.
1CH 1:10 Kuushi Namiruude yelis. Namiruudey biitta bolla wolqaama olancho gidis.
1CH 1:11 Mixiraymi Luudeta, Anamimeta, Lahabeta, Naftuheta,
1CH 1:12 Patroosata, Filisxeemeta, mayza gidida Kasluheematanne Qaftooreta kochata mayza.
1CH 1:13 Kanaaney bayra na7aa Sidoonanne iya kaaluwa Heeta yelis.
1CH 1:14 Kanaaney Yaabuseta, Amooreta, Gergeseta,
1CH 1:15 Hiweta, Arketa, Siinata,
1CH 1:16 Ardaaweta, Samaaretanne Hamaateta yelis.
1CH 1:17 Seema adde nayti Elama, Asoore, Arfakisaade, Luude, Araama, Uxi, Hula, Geteranne Mosaha.
1CH 1:18 Arfakisaadi Saala yelis; Saali Eboora yelis.
1CH 1:19 Eboori nam7u nayta yelis; issoy yeletida wode sa7i shaaketida gisho iya sunthay Faleqa geetetis; iya ishaa sunthay Yoqxaana.
1CH 1:20 Yoqxaani Almodaada, Salefa, Hazarmoota, Yaraha,
1CH 1:21 Hadoraama, Uzaala, Diqila,
1CH 1:22 Obaala, Abmaala, Saaba,
1CH 1:23 Ofira, Awulaxanne Yobaaba yelis. Haysati Yoqxaana kochata.
1CH 1:24 Seemape Abrahaame gakanaw de7iya yeletay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata; Seema, Arfakisaade, Saala,
1CH 1:25 Eboora, Faleqa, Raga,
1CH 1:26 Saruga, Nakoora, Taaranne
1CH 1:27 Abrahaame geetetiya Abrame.
1CH 1:28 Abrahaame adde nayti Yisaaqanne Isma7eela.
1CH 1:29 Enta yeletay haysafe kaallidi xaafetis. Isma7eela bayra na7ay Nabayoota; hessafe kallidi, Qedaare, Adbeela, Mibsaama,
1CH 1:30 Misima, Duma, Masa, Kudane, Teema,
1CH 1:31 Ixura, Nafisanne Qedima yelis. Haysati Isma7eela nayta.
1CH 1:32 Abrahaamey Keexurape yelida adde nayti Zimiraana, Yoqsaana, Madaane, Midiyaame, Yasboqanne Siwa. Yoqsaana adde nayti Saabanne Didaana.
1CH 1:33 Midiyaame adde nayti Gefera, Efera, Henooha, Abidanne Elda. Haysati Keexura kochata.
1CH 1:34 Abrahaamey Yisaaqa yelis. Yisaaqa adde nayti Eesawenne Isra7eele.
1CH 1:35 Eesawe adde nayti Elfaaza, Ragu7eela, Ye7usa, Ya7ilamanne Qore.
1CH 1:36 Elfaaza adde nayti Temaana, Omaara, Sifo, Gotoma, Qeneza, Timinanne Amaaleqa.
1CH 1:37 Ragu7eela adde nayti Nahoota, Zaara, Saamanne Miza.
1CH 1:38 Edoomen koyro de7ida Sayre adde nayti Looxane, Sobaala, Ziba7oona, Ana, Disoona, Exeranne Disaana.
1CH 1:39 Looxane adde nayti Hooranne Hemaama; Looxane michiya Timnaa7o.
1CH 1:40 Sobaala adde nayti Aliwa, Manahoota, Ebaala, Sifanne Onaama. Xiba7oona adde nayti Ayanne Ana.
1CH 1:41 Ana na7ay Disoona. Disoona adde nayti Hemdaana, Esbaana, Yitraananne Kaarana.
1CH 1:42 Exera adde nayti Bilihaana, Zawananne Aqana. Disaana adde nayti Uxanne Arana.
1CH 1:43 Isra7eelen kawoy kawotanaape kase Edoome biittan kawotida kawoti haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Bi7oora na7ay Balaaqi kawotis; iya katamaa sunthay Dinaaba.
1CH 1:44 Balaaqi hayqin, Baasora addey Zaara na7ay Yobaabi iya bessan kawotis.
1CH 1:45 Yobaabi hayqin, Temaana addey Husami iya bessan kawotis.
1CH 1:46 Husami hayqin, Moo7abe biittan Midiyaameta xoonida Badada na7ay Hadaadi iya bessan kawotis; iya katamaa sunthay Awiita.
1CH 1:47 Hadaadi hayqin, Masreeqa addey Samili iya bessan kawotis.
1CH 1:48 Samili hayqin, shaafa matan de7iya Rehoboota addey Saa7uli iya bessan kawotis.
1CH 1:49 Saa7uli hayqin, Akboora na7ay Ba7al-Hanani iya bessan kawotis.
1CH 1:50 Ba7al-Hanani hayqin, Hadaadi iya bessan kawotis; iya katamaa sunthay Paa7u. Iya machiya Mezahaaba na7e Maxireedi na7iw Mahexabeelo. Hessafe guye, Hadaadi hayqis.
1CH 1:51 Edoome kochata halaqati haysata; Timnaa7a, Aliwa, Yeteta,
1CH 1:52 Oholbaama, Ela, Pinoona,
1CH 1:53 Qanaza, Temaana, Mibsaara,
1CH 1:54 Magdelanne Irama. Haysati Edoome halaqata.
1CH 2:1 Isra7eele adde nayti haysata; Robeela, Simoona, Leewe, Yihuda, Yisakoora, Zabloona,
1CH 2:2 Daane, Yoosefa, Biniyaame, Niftaaleme, Gaadenne Aseera.
1CH 2:3 Kanaane maccase Sewape Yihudi yelida heedzu adde nayti Era, Onaananne Seela. Yihuda bayra na7ay Eri Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothida gisho Goday iya wodhis.
1CH 2:4 Yihudi ba na7aa mache Timaaripe Faaresanne Zaara yelis. Yihudas ichashu adde nayti de7oosona.
1CH 2:5 Faaresa adde nayti Hesiroomanne Hamuula.
1CH 2:6 Zaara adde nayti Zimira, Etaana, Hemaana, Kalkolanne Dara; enti kumethi ichasha.
1CH 2:7 Zaara koche gidida Karma na7ay Akaani Xoossas dummatida di7uwape kaysotidi Isra7eele asaa un7ethidaysa.
1CH 2:8 Etaana na7ay Azaara.
1CH 2:9 Hesrooni yelida nayti Yiram7eela, Araamenne Kaaleba.
1CH 2:10 Araami Amnadaabe yelis. Amnadaabey Yihuda kochata halaqa Na7asoona yelis.
1CH 2:11 Na7asooni Salmoona yelis; Salmooni Boo7eza yelis;
1CH 2:12 Boo7ezi Iyyobeda yelis; Iyyobedi Isseye yelis.
1CH 2:13 Isseyey ba bayra na7aa Eliyaaba, kaalo na7aa Amnadaabe, heedzantho na7aa Saama,
1CH 2:14 oyddantho na7aa Natina7eela, ichashantho na7aa Radaya,
1CH 2:15 usupuntho na7aa Asama, laapuntho na7aa Dawita yelis.
1CH 2:16 Isseye macca nayti Xaruyonne Abigiya. Xaruyi nayti heedzati Abisaya, Iyo7aabanne Asaheela.
1CH 2:17 Abigiya Amaasa yelasu; Amaasa aaway Isma7eela addiya Yetera.
1CH 2:18 Hesiroona na7aa Kaalebas Azuubonne Yir7ooto geetetiya nam7u macheti de7oosona. I Azuubipe Yesaara, Sobaabanne Ardoona yelis.
1CH 2:19 Azuubi hayqin, Kaalebi Efraato ekis; Efraata Huura yelasu.
1CH 2:20 Huuri Ure yelis; Urey Basli7eela yelis.
1CH 2:21 Hesiroonas laythi usupun tammu gidin, Galada aawa Makira na7iw ekidi Saguba yelis.
1CH 2:22 Sagubi Ya7ira yelis. Ya7iri Galada biittan de7iya laatamanne heedzu katamata haaris.
1CH 2:23 Shin Geshuranne Soore kawoti Ya7ira katamata Qanaatanne iya yuushuwan de7iya usupun tammu katamata olidi oykidosona; yan de7iya asa ubbay Galada aawa Makira koche.
1CH 2:24 Hesrooni Kaaleba Efraata geetetiya bessan hayqidaape guye, Hesiroona machiya Abiya Tequhe aawa Ashihuura yelasu.
1CH 2:25 Hesiroona bayra na7aa Yirama7eela bayra na7ay Rama; kaaloti Buna, Orena, Oxeemanne Akiya.
1CH 2:26 Yirahim7eelas Ataaro geetetiya hara macha de7awusu; Ataara Onaama aayiw.
1CH 2:27 Yirama7eela bayra na7aa Rama nayti Ma7asa, Yaaminanne Eqera.
1CH 2:28 Onaama nayti Shamayanne Yada. Samaye nayti Naadabenne Abisura.
1CH 2:29 Abisura machiya Abikaala Ahbaananne Molida yelasu.
1CH 2:30 Nadaaba adde nayti Selidanne Afayma; Selidi na7a yelonna hayqis.
1CH 2:31 Afayma na7ay Yishi7a; Yishi7a na7ay Soosana; Soosana na7ay Ahilaya.
1CH 2:32 Shamaya ishaa Yada nayti Yeteranne Yoonataana; Yeteri na7a yelonna hayqis.
1CH 2:33 Yoonataana nayti Felitanne Zaaza. Haysati Yirama7eela kochata.
1CH 2:34 Soosanas macca na7ape attishin, adde na7i baawa. Soosanas Iyoheela geetetiya Gibxefe aylley de7ees.
1CH 2:35 Soosani ba na7iw ba aylliya Iyoheelas immin, Ataya na7a yelasu.
1CH 2:36 Atayi Naatana yelis; Naatani Zabada yelis;
1CH 2:37 Zabadi Eflaala yelis; Eflaali Obeeda yelis;
1CH 2:38 Obeedi Iyyu yelis; Iyyuy Azaara yelis;
1CH 2:39 Azaariyasi Kelesa yelis; Kelesi El7aasa yelis;
1CH 2:40 El7aasi Sisimaya yelis;
1CH 2:41 Sisimayi Salooma yelis; Saloomi Yiqaama yelis; Yiqaami Elisaama yelis.
1CH 2:42 Yirama7eela ishaa Kaaleba bayra na7ay Moosa. Moosa na7ay Ziifa; Ziifa na7ay Mereesa; Mereesa na7ay Kebroona.
1CH 2:43 Kebroona nayti Qoraha, Tefuwa, Reqeemanne Shamaya.
1CH 2:44 Shamayey Yorqa7aama aawa Rahaama yelis. Reqeemi Shamaya yelis.
1CH 2:45 Shamaya na7ay Ma7oona. Maa7oni Beet-Xura yelis.
1CH 2:46 Kaaleba laggethiya Efa, Harana, Moodanne Gazeeza yelasu; Haraani Gazeeza geetetiya hara adde na7a yelis.
1CH 2:47 Yahidaya nayti Regema, Iyo7atama, Geshana, Falexa, Efanne Shafa.
1CH 2:48 Kaaleba laggethiya Ma7ika Sheberanne Tirihaana yelasu.
1CH 2:49 Qassika Medmaana aawa Shafanne Makibeenanne Gib7a aawa Susana yelasu. Kaaleba macca na7e sunthay Akiso.
1CH 2:50 Kaaleba nayti harati haysafe kaallidi xaafetidosona. Kaalebi ba bayra na7aa Huura ba mache Efraatape yelis. Huura nayti Qiriyat-Yi7aarima aawa Sobaala,
1CH 2:51 Beeteleme aawa Salmonanne Beet-Gadera aawa Hareefa.
1CH 2:52 Qiriyat-Yi7aarima aawa Sobaala yarati Haro7eetatanne Manuhoota yaratape baggata.
1CH 2:53 Qiriyat-Yi7aarima yarati Yatireta, Puuteta, Shumaatetanne Mishireta. Xor7atinne Eshta7ooleti haysatape yeletidosona.
1CH 2:54 Beeteleme aawa Salmoona yarati Naxoofata, Axiroot-Beeteyo7abeta, Manuhoota yaratape baggatanne Xor7ata.
1CH 2:55 Yaabexa kataman de7iya xaafeta yarati Tir7eta, Shim7atanne Sukata. Haysati Rekaabata aawa Hamaatape yeletida Qeenata.
1CH 3:1 Kebroona kataman Dawiti yelida nayti haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata; Izira7eele maccase Aknahoomipe yelida bayra na7ay Amnoona. Qarmeloosa maccase Abigiyape yelida nam7antho na7ay Daanela.
1CH 3:2 Geshura kawa Talmaya na7iya Ma7ika yelida heedzantho na7ay Abeseloome. Agita yelida oyddantho na7ay Adoniyaasa.
1CH 3:3 Abixaala yelida ichashantho na7ay Safaaxa. Egila yelida usupuntho na7ay Yitirhaama.
1CH 3:4 Dawiti ha usupun nayta Kebroonan yelis. Dawiti Kebroonan laapun laythinne usupun ageena kawotis. Yerusalaamen hastamanne heedzu laythi kawotis.
1CH 3:5 Dawiti Yerusalaamen Ami7eela na7e Barsaabepe yelida oyddu nayti Saamusa, Sobaaba, Naatanenne Solomone.
1CH 3:6 Qassi hara uddufun adde nayti Iyabhaara, Elishu7a, Elfalaxa,
1CH 3:7 Noga, Nefeqa, Yafaya,
1CH 3:8 Elsama, Eldahenne Elfalaxa.
1CH 3:9 Ha adde nayta ubbaa bolla Dawitas laggethotape yeletida hara adde nayti de7oosona; Timaaro geetetiya micha entaw de7awusu.
1CH 3:10 Kawa Solomone yeletay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa. Solomone na7ay Orobi7aama; Orobi7aama na7ay Abiya; Abiya na7ay Asa; Asa na7ay Iyosaafexa;
1CH 3:11 Iyosaafexa na7ay Iyoraama; Iyoraama na7ay Akaziyaasa; Akaziyaasa na7ay Iyo7aasa;
1CH 3:12 Iyo7aasa na7ay Amasiyaasa; Amasiyaasa na7ay Azaariyasa; Azaariyasa na7ay Iyo7atama;
1CH 3:13 Iyo7atama na7ay Akaaza; Akaaza na7ay Hizqiyaasa; Hizqiyaasa na7ay Minaase;
1CH 3:14 Minaase na7ay Amoxe; Amoxe na7ay Iyosyaasa.
1CH 3:15 Iyosyaasa na7ay bayray Yohaanana; nam7anthoy Iyo7aaqeme; heedzanthoy Sedeqiyaasa; oyddanthoy Salooma.
1CH 3:16 Iyo7aaqeme nayti Ikoniyaananne Sedeqiyaasa.
1CH 3:17 Di7etidi Babiloone bida Ikoniyaana adde nayti Salatiyaala,
1CH 3:18 Malkiraama, Padaya, Shenaxaara, Yiqaama, Hoshamanne Nadaaba.
1CH 3:19 Padaya adde nayti Zarubaabelanne Same7a. Zarubaabela adde nayti Masulaamanne Hanaana; enta michiya Salomito.
1CH 3:20 Hayisata bolla hara ichashu adde nayti Zarubaabelas de7oosona; entika Hashuba, Oheela, Baraka, Hasadiyanne Yoshab-Heseda.
1CH 3:21 Hanaana adde nayti Palaxanne Yeshaya. Yeshaya na7ay Rafaya; Rafaya na7ay Arnaana; Arnaana na7ay Abdiyu; Abdiyu na7ay Sakana;
1CH 3:22 Sakana na7ay Shamaya. Shamaya nayti ichashati Haxusa, Yigi7aala, Bariha, Na7aranne Shaafaxa.
1CH 3:23 Na7ara nayti heedzati Eliyo7ana, Hizqiyaasanne Aziriqaama.
1CH 3:24 Eliyo7ana nayti laapunati Hodawa, Eliyaseeba, Palaya, Aquba, Yohaanana, Dalayanne Aneena.
1CH 4:1 Yihuda kochati Paaresa, Hesiroona, Karma, Hooranne Sobaala.
1CH 4:2 Sobaala na7ay Rayi Yahaata yelis; Yahaati Ahumayanne Lahada yelis. Haysati Xor7ata yarata.
1CH 4:3 Exaama adde nayti Izira7eele, Yishmanne Yidibaasha; enta michiya Haxilelpoono.
1CH 4:4 Panu7eeli Gadoora yelis. Exeri Husha yelis. Huuri ba aaye Efraatas bayra na7a; Huuri Beeteleme aawa. Haysati Huura yarata.
1CH 4:5 Tequhe aawa Ashihuuras Heelonne Na7ira geetetiya nam7u macheti de7oosona.
1CH 4:6 Na7ira Ahuzama, Hefeera, Teminanne Ashitaara Ashihuuras yelasu; haysati Na7iri nayta.
1CH 4:7 Heela adde nayti Dereta, Yixhaaranne Etnaana.
1CH 4:8 Qooxe adde nayti Anuba, Xobebanne Aharheela.
1CH 4:9 Yaabexi ba ishatape aadhidi bonchetida asi. Iya aayiya, “Taani iya iita iqethan yelida gisho, iya sunthay Yaabexa” gada xeegasu.
1CH 4:10 Yaabexi Isra7eele Xoossaa xeegidi, “Abeeti Xoossaw, tana anja; ta zawa dalgisa. Ne kushey taara gido; tana azzanthonna mela qohiyabaape naaga” yaagidi woossin Xoossay iya woosa si7is.
1CH 4:11 Shuha ishay Kaluba Mahira yelis; Mahiri Eshtoona yelis.
1CH 4:12 Eshtooni Beet-Raafa, Pasehanne Irnahasha aawa Tahina yelis. Tahini Nahaasa katamaa asaa yelis. Haysati Reka biittan de7idosona.
1CH 4:13 Qeneza adde nayti Gotoniyalanne Saraya; Gotoniyala adde nayti Hatatanne Ma7onotaya.
1CH 4:14 Ma7onotayi Ofira yelis. Sarayi Iyo7aaba yelis. Iyo7aabi Kushe Hiillata Zangaara geetetiya bessan de7iya asaa yelis.
1CH 4:15 Yoofone na7aa Kaaleba nayti Ira, Eelanne Na7aama. Ela na7ay Qeneza.
1CH 4:16 Yihali7eela nayti Ziifa, Zifaha, Tirayanne Asar7eela.
1CH 4:17 Ezira adde nayti Yetera, Mereeda, Eferanne Yaalona. Mereedi Gibxe kawa na7iw Bitiya ekin iya Mayraamo, Shamayanne Yishiba yelasu. Yishibi Eshtamoo7a yelis.
1CH 4:18 Yihuda biittafe ekida machiya Gadoora aawa Yereda, Sooko aawa Hebeeranne Zanoha aawa Yaqit7eela yelasu.
1CH 4:19 Nahama miche, Hodiya mache nayti Gariman de7iya Qa7ila aawanne Ma7ikan de7iya Eshtamoo7a aawa.
1CH 4:20 Shimoona nayti Amnoona, Irna, Benihananne Tiloona. Yishi7a nayti Zoheetanne Benzoheeta.
1CH 4:21 Yihuda na7aa Seela kochati Leeka aawa Era, Mareesa aawa Le7adanne Beet-Ashibe7a kataman de7iya liino ma7o daddeyisata yarata.
1CH 4:22 Harati qassi Yoqima, Iyo7aasa, Yashubileheema, Moo7abe haarida Sarafanne Kozeba kataman de7iya asata. Ha yeletaa mazgabey benipe doomidi de7ees.
1CH 4:23 Haysati Naxa7imaninne Gadeeran de7iya meqa miishe medhiya asata. Enti kawa ooso oothanaw iyara issife de7idosona.
1CH 4:24 Simoona nayti Nemu7eela, Yamina, Yariba, Zaaranne Saa7ula.
1CH 4:25 Saa7ula na7ay Saluma; Saluma na7ay Mibsaama; Mibsaama na7ay Masmaa7a;
1CH 4:26 Masmaa7a na7ay Hamu7eela; Hamu7eela na7ay Zakura; Zakura na7ay Same7a.
1CH 4:27 Same7i tammanne usupun adde naytanne usupun macca nayta yelis. Shin iya ishati daro na7a yelibookona. Yihuda kochaada Simoona kochay daribookona.
1CH 4:28 Simoona kochati Barsaabe katamaninne Molada, Haxar-Shu7aala,
1CH 4:29 Baala, Exema, Tolada,
1CH 4:30 Batu7eela, Horma, Xiqilaaga,
1CH 4:31 Beet-Markaboota, Hoxar-Susima, Beet-Biranne Sha7aarima katamatan de7idosona. Dawiti kawotana gakanaw haysati katamata gididi de7idosona.
1CH 4:32 Qassi enta gutati Exaama, Ayna, Irmoona, Tokenanne Ashshana. Enti kumethi ichashu katamata.
1CH 4:33 Ba7aale gakanaw ha katamata yuushuwan de7iya gutati ubbay entan gujetoosona. Haysati enti de7iya bessatanne banta yeletaa maara mazgaben xaafidi oykidosona.
1CH 4:34 Simoona yarata halaqati haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Enti Mashobaaba, Yamileka, Amasiyaasa na7aa Iyosiya,
1CH 4:35 Iyyu7eelanne Yoshiba na7aa Iyyu. Iyyu aawa aaway Asa7eela na7a Saraya.
1CH 4:36 Hara halaqati qassi Eliyo7ana, Yayqooba, Yashohaya, Asaya, Adi7eela, Yasmi7eela, Banayanne
1CH 4:37 Ziiza. Ziizi Shifa na7a; Shifi Aloona na7a; Alooni Yadaya na7a; Yadayi Shimira na7a; Shimiri Shamaya na7a.
1CH 4:38 Simoona yarata halaqati haysata. Enta aawata kochay darishe bis.
1CH 4:39 Enti banta mehiyas heemmiya bessi koyishe Gadoora geliya bessaa matan de7iya zangaarape doloha baggara de7iya bessaa gakanaw bidosona.
1CH 4:40 Yan araddanne lo77o heemmiya bessi demmidosona; he biittay wopatethinne saroy kumida dalga biitta. Beni wode he biittan de7idaysati Kaama kochaa.
1CH 4:41 Haysafe qommon sunthay xaafetida Simoona kochati Yihuda kawa Hizqiyaasa wode Gadoora biitta bidi yan de7iya Kaama kochaanne Ma7uuna asata olidi dhaysidosona. He biittan enta mehiyas heemmiya bessi de7iya gisho, Simoona kochati hachi gakanaw yan uttidosona.
1CH 4:42 Simoona kochaafe ichashu xeetu asay Sayre zuma bidosona. Enta halaqati Yishi7a nayta Palaxa, Naara, Rafayanne Uzi7eela.
1CH 4:43 Baqatidi attida Amaaleqa asaa dhaysidi enti hachi gakanaw he biittan de7oosona.
1CH 5:1 Isra7eele bayra na7aa Robeela yeletay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa. Robeeli bayra na7a; shin ba aawa hiixa tunisida gisho, bayratetha maatay Isra7eele na7aa Yoosefa naytas imetis. Hessa gisho, iya yeletay bayratetha maara naagidi xaafetibeenna.
1CH 5:2 Yihudi ba ishatape aadhidi mino; bayratethay Yoosefas imetidaba gidikoka, Isra7eele asaa haareysi Yihudape keyis.
1CH 5:3 Isra7eele bayra na7aa Robeela adde nayti Henooha, Pala, Hesiroonanne Karma.
1CH 5:4 Iyyu7eela na7ay Shamaya; Shamaya na7ay Googa; Googa na7ay Same7a;
1CH 5:5 Sama7a na7ay Mika; Mika na7ay Raya; Raya na7ay Bi7eela.
1CH 5:6 Bi7eela na7ay Asoore kawoy Telgeltelfelisoorii di77idi efida Bi7eera; Bi7eeri Robeela kochata halaqa.
1CH 5:7 Bi7eera dabboti, banta yeleta mazgaben xaafida Robeela yarata halaqati Iyyu7eelanne, Zakaryaasa.
1CH 5:8 Bi7eeli Azaaza na7a; Azaazi Shama7a na7a; Shama7i Iyyu7eela koche. Iyyu7eela kochati Aro7eera kataman, Nebo biittaninne Ba7aal-Ma7oona biittan de7idosona.
1CH 5:9 Robeela kochatas mehey Galadan darida gisho, enti yaape doloha bagga bidi, Efraxiisa shaafa gakanaw de7iya mela biittan uttidosona.
1CH 5:10 Saa7ola laythan Aggaara yaratara Robeela yarati oletidi xoonidosona. Galadape doloha baggara de7iya Aggaara yarata biittan uttidosona.
1CH 5:11 Gaade kochati Robeela kochatape pudeha baggan, Salka gakanaw de7iya Baasane biittan uttidosona.
1CH 5:12 Iyyu7eeli koyro yaratas halaqa; Safaami nam7antho yaratas halaqa. Yanaynne Safaami Baasanen uttida yaratas halaqa.
1CH 5:13 Enta dabboti, banta soo asan asan, Mika7eela, Masulaama, Saaba, Yoraya, Yaqkana, Zu7enne Ebeera. Enti kumethi laapuna.
1CH 5:14 Haysati Abikaala nayti Buza kochata. Buzi Yedaya yelis; Yedayey Iyesaya yelis; Iyesayi Mika7eela yelis; Mika7eeli Galada yelis; Galadi Idaya yelis; Idayi Huura yelis; Huuri Abihaala yelis.
1CH 5:15 Enta soo asaa halaqay Guna na7aa na7aa Abdi7eela na7aa Aka.
1CH 5:16 Enti Galadaninne Baasanen, yan de7iya katamataninne Saarona biittan mehey heemetiya bessatan uttidosona.
1CH 5:17 Hayisata yeletay Yihuda kawa Iyo7atama wode Isra7eele kawa Iyorbaama wode mazgaben xaafetis.
1CH 5:18 Robeela kochaafe, Gaade kochaafenne Minaase kochaa baggaafe gondalle oykeysati, mashshe danceysatinne donge dukeysati minonne olan loohidaysati 44, 760.
1CH 5:19 Enti Aggaara yaraara, Ixura yaraara, Nafesaranne Nodabaara oletidosona.
1CH 5:20 Enti he asaara oletishe Xoossako waassida gisho, maado demmidosona. Enti Xoossan ammanetida gisho, I entaw woosetis. Hessa gisho, Aggaara yaratinne entara de7iya harati enta kushen gelidosona.
1CH 5:21 Banta morketape ishatamu mukulu gimaleta, nam7u xeetanne ishatamu mukulu dorsata, nam7u mukulu haretanne xeetu mukulu asaa di77idi efidosona.
1CH 5:22 Olay Xoossaba gidida gisho daroti hayqidosona. Di7etetha wodey gakanaw he biittan de7idosona.
1CH 5:23 Minaase kochaafe bagga yaray Baasanepe doomidi, Ba7aal-Armoona, Saniranne Armoona zumaa gakanaw de7iya biittan uttidosona; enti he biittan daridosona.
1CH 5:24 Enta soo halaqati Efera, Yish7a, Eli7eela, Azri7eela, Ermiyaasa, Hodawanne Iyodi7eela. Haysati enta soo asan eretidaysata, xaalanne wolqaama.
1CH 5:25 Shin banta mayzata Xoossaas ammanetibokona; Xoossay enta sinthafe dhaysida he biitta xoossata goyinnidosona.
1CH 5:26 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele Xoossay Asoore kawa Pooha (hessika Telgeltelfelisoora) ayyaana denthethidi Robeela kochaa, Gaade kochaanne Minaase kochaafe baggaa di77idi, Halaha, Habooranne Haara biittanne Gozaana Shaafa efis. Enti hachi gakanaw yan de7oosona.
1CH 6:1 Leewe adde nayti Gedisoona, Qahaatanne Maraara.
1CH 6:2 Qahaata adde nayti Amraama, Yisihaara, Kebroonanne Uzi7eela.
1CH 6:3 Amraama adde nayti Aarona, Musenne Mayraamo. Aarona adde nayti Nadaaba, Abyooda, Alaazaranne Itamaara.
1CH 6:4 Alaazari Pinihaasa yelis; Pinihaasi Abisu yelis; Abisuy Buuqa yelis;
1CH 6:5 Buuqi Oza yelis;
1CH 6:6 Ozi Zara yelis; Zarahi Marayoota yelis;
1CH 6:7 Marayooti Amaare yelis; Amaarey Akxooba yelis;
1CH 6:8 Akxoobi Saadoqa yelis; Saadoqi Akmaasa yelis;
1CH 6:9 Akimaasi Azaariyasa yelis; Azaariyasi Yohaana yelis;
1CH 6:10 Yohaani Azaariyasa yelis. Solomoney Yerusalaamen keexisida Xoossa keethan oothida kahiney Azaariyasa.
1CH 6:11 Azaariyasi Amaare yelis; Amaarey Akxooba yelis;
1CH 6:12 Akxoobi Saadoqa yelis; Saadoqi Saluma yelis;
1CH 6:13 Salumi Kalqe yelis; Kalqey Azaariyasa yelis;
1CH 6:14 Azaariyasi Saraya yelis; Sarayi Iyosadeqa yelis.
1CH 6:15 Goday Yihudanne Yerusalaame Nabukadanaxooran di7etana mela oothida wode Iyosadeqi di7etidi bis.
1CH 6:16 Leewe adde nayti Gedisoona, Qahaatanne Maraara.
1CH 6:17 Gedisoona adde nayta sunthay Libinanne Same7a.
1CH 6:18 Qahaata adde nayti Amraama, Yisihaara, Kebroonanne Uzi7eela.
1CH 6:19 Maraara adde nayti Mahilanne Muse. Banta soo asan asan xaafetida Leewe yaray haysa.
1CH 6:20 Gedisoona na7ay Libina; Libina na7ay Yahaata; Yahaata na7ay Zamata.
1CH 6:21 Zamata na7ay Yo7aaka; Yo7aaka na7ay Ado; Ado na7ay Zaara; Zaara na7ay Yatira.
1CH 6:22 Qahaata na7ay Amnadaabe; Amnadaabe na7ay Qore; Qore na7ay Aseera;
1CH 6:23 Aseera na7ay Helqaana; Helqaana na7ay Abisaafa; Abisaafa na7ay Aseera;
1CH 6:24 Aseera na7ay Tahata; Tahata na7ay Uri7eela; Uri7eela na7ay Ooziyana; Ooziyana na7ay Saa7ola.
1CH 6:25 Helqaana adde nayti Amaasanne Akmoota.
1CH 6:26 Akmoota na7ay Helqaana; Helqaana na7ay Xofaya; Xofaya na7ay Nahaata;
1CH 6:27 Nahaata na7ay Eliyaaba; Eliyaaba na7ay Yirohaama; Yirohaama na7ay Hilqaana.
1CH 6:28 Sameela bayra na7ay Iyyu7eela; kaaloy Abiya.
1CH 6:29 Maraara adde nayti Mahila; Mahila na7ay Libina; Libina na7ay Same7a; Same7a na7ay Ooza;
1CH 6:30 Ooza na7ay Sam77a; Sam77a na7ay Hagiya; Hagiya na7ay Asaya.
1CH 6:31 Dawiti Taabotiya Yerusalaame ehidaape guye, Godaa keethan shuumida zammaareta halaqati haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata.
1CH 6:32 Solomoney Yerusalaamen Godaa Xoossaa keetha keexana gakanaw, Godaa Taabotey de7iya Dunkaaniya sinthan issoy issoy ba maaran maaran mazmure yexishe Godaas oothidosona.
1CH 6:33 Banta adde naytara yexidaysati haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Qahaata yaraape zammariya Hemaana; Hemaani Iyyu7eela na7a; Iyyu7eela Sameela na7a;
1CH 6:34 Sameeli Helqaana na7aa; Hilqaani Yirohaama na7a; Yirohaami Eli7eela na7a; Eli7eeli Toha na7a;
1CH 6:35 Tohi Xofaya na7a; Xofaya Helqaana na7a; Hilqaani Mahaata na7a; Mahaati Amasaya na7a;
1CH 6:36 Amasayi Helqaana na7a; Helqaani Iyyu7eela na7a; Iyyu7eela Azaariyasa na7a; Azaariyasi Sofoniyaasa na7a;
1CH 6:37 Sofoniyaasi Tahata na7a; Tahati Aseera na7a; Aseeri Abisaafa na7a; Abisaafi Qore na7a;
1CH 6:38 Qorey Yisara na7a; Yisari Qahaata na7a; Qahaati Leewe na7a; Leewey Isra7eele na7a.
1CH 6:39 Hemaana dabboy Asaafi iya ushacha baggara eqidi oothees. Asaafi Baraka na7a; Baraka Sim7a na7a;
1CH 6:40 Shim7i Mika7eela na7a; Mika7eeli Ba7asaya na7a; Ba7aasi Malkiya na7a;
1CH 6:41 Malkey Etaana na7a; Etaani Zaara na7a; Zaari Adaya na7a;
1CH 6:42 Adayi Etaana na7a; Etaani Zamata na7a; Zamati Same7a na7a;
1CH 6:43 Same7i Yahaata na7a; Yahaati Gedisoona na7a; Gedisooni Leewe na7a.
1CH 6:44 Entafe haddirsa baggara enta dabboti, Maraara yarati eqoosona. Etaani Qiisa na7a; Qiisi Abdi na7a; Abdi Maluka na7a;
1CH 6:45 Maluki Hashabaya na7a; Hashabaya Amasiyaasa na7a; Amasiyaasi Kalqe na7a;
1CH 6:46 Kilqey Ameesa na7a; Ameesi Baana na7a; Baani Samara na7a;
1CH 6:47 Samari Mahila na7a; Mahili Muse na7a; Musi Maraara na7a; Maraari Leewe na7a.
1CH 6:48 Enta dabo gidida Leeweti Xoossa Dunkaaniyan oothanaw sunthetidosona.
1CH 6:49 Shin Aaroninne iya kochati ixaane cuyisoosona; yarsho bessan xuussa yarsho yarshoosona. Xoossa aylley Musey kiitidaysada Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessan goyinniya goyinno ubbaasinne Xoossay Isra7eele nagaraa atto yaagisiya yarshuwa yarshanaw aawatethi entaw de7ees.
1CH 6:50 Aarona yeletay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Aarona na7ay Alaazara; Alaazara na7ay Pinihaasa; Pinihaasa na7ay Abisu;
1CH 6:51 Abisu na7ay Buuqa; Buuqa na7ay Oza; Oza na7ay Zaraha.
1CH 6:52 Zaraha na7ay Marayoota; Marayoota na7ay Amaare; Amaare na7ay Akxuuba;
1CH 6:53 Akxuuba na7ay Saadoqa; Saadoqa na7ay Akmaasa.
