1CH 6:54 Aarona kochati daana mela entaw imetida bessati haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa. Koyro saamay Qahaata yaraas keyida gisho
1CH 6:55 Yihudan de7iya Kebroona katamaanne iya yuushuwan de7iya hentha bessata entaw immidosona.
1CH 6:56 Shin Kebroona goshsha gadetanne iya yuushuwan de7iya gutata Yoofone na7aa Kaalebas immidosona.
1CH 6:57 Aarona naytas baqatidi attiya katamata, Kebroona, Yatira, Libina, Eshtamoo7anne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata.
1CH 6:58 Holona, Dabiranne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata,
1CH 6:59 Asana, Beet-Sameesanne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata immidosona.
1CH 6:60 Qassi Biniyaame biitta zawape Gib7a, Galemata, Anatootenne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata entaw immidosona. Aarona naytas imetida katamati kumethi tammanne heedza.
1CH 6:61 Minaase yaraa baggaa biittafe tammu katamata attida Qahaata yaraas immidosona.
1CH 6:62 Yisakoora, Aseera, Niftaalemenne Baasanen de7iya Minaase yaraa biitta zawape tammanne heedzu katamata Gedisoona yaraas immidosona.
1CH 6:63 Robeela, Gaadenne Zabloona biitta zawape tammanne nam7u katamata Maraara yaraas immidosona.
1CH 6:64 Hessada oothidi, Isra7eele asay Leewetas ha katamatanne enta heeran de7iya hentha biitta immidosona.
1CH 6:65 Yihudape, Simoonapenne Biniyaame biitta zawape haysafe qommon xaafetida katamata entaw immidosona.
1CH 6:66 Qahaata yaraape guuthati Efreema biitta zawape katamatanne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata ekidosona.
1CH 6:67 Entaw asay baqatidi attiya katamata, derey dariya Efreema biittan de7iya Seekema, Gezera,
1CH 6:68 Yoqim7aama, Beet-Horona,
1CH 6:69 Eloona, Gaat-Rimoonanne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata immidosona.
1CH 6:70 Minaase kocha baggaafe Aneera, Bil7aamanne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata, attida Qahaata yaraas immidosona.
1CH 6:71 Minaase kocha baggaafe Baasanen de7iya Goolana, Astarootanne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata Gedisoona yaraas immidosona.
1CH 6:72 Yisakoora kochaafe Qaadesa, Dabiraatenne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata,
1CH 6:73 Raamota, Anemananne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata immidosona.
1CH 6:74 Aseera kochaafe Mashala, Abdoona,
1CH 6:75 Huqooqa, Rehoobanne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata immidosona.
1CH 6:76 Niftaaleme kochaafe Galilan de7iya Qaadesa, Hamoona, Qirataymanne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata immidosona.
1CH 6:77 Attida Maraara yaraas Zabloona kochaafe Irmoona, Taaborenne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata immidosona.
1CH 6:78 Robeela kochaafe Iyaarkofe hefinthan Yordaanosepe doloha baggara, dhoqa denban de7iya Boosora, Yaasane,
1CH 6:79 Qidimoota, Mefaatanne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata immidosona.
1CH 6:80 Gaade kochaafe Galadan de7iya Raamota, Mahanayma,
1CH 6:81 Haseboona, Iyazeeranne enta heeran de7iya hentha bessata immidosona.
1CH 7:1 Yisakoora oyddu adde nayti Tola, Puuwa, Yasuubanne Shimiroona.
1CH 7:2 Tola adde nayti Oza, Rafaya, Yir7eela, Himaya, Yibsaamanne Shimu7eela; haysati Tola soo asaa halaqata. Enti wolqaamanne mino asi. Dawita wode enta tayboy 22,600.
1CH 7:3 Oza na7ay Yizraaha. Yizraaha nayti Mika7eela, Abdiyu, Iyyu7eelanne Yishiya; ha ichashati soo asaa halaqata.
1CH 7:4 Banta soo asaa yeletada Oza yaraape olanchoti 36,000; entaw daro machetinne nayti de7oosona.
1CH 7:5 Yisakoora kochaafe olanchoti banta yeletaa mazgaben taybetidi, kumethi 87,000 gididosona.
1CH 7:6 Biniyaame heedzu adde nayti Beella, Bekeranne Yidi7eela.
1CH 7:7 Beella adde nayti Eseboona, Oza, Uzi7eela, Iyarmootanne Ira; ha ichashati soo asaa halaqata. Enti wolqaamanne mino asi. Banta yeletada taybetida olanchoti 22,034 gididosona.
1CH 7:8 Bekera adde nayti Zamira, Iyo7aasa, Alaazara, Eliyo7ana, Omira, Iyarmoota, Abiya, Anatootanne Alemeeta.
1CH 7:9 Banta yeletaa mazgaben taybetida wolqaamanne mino asati 20,200 gididosona.
1CH 7:10 Yidi7eela na7ay Bilihaana. Bilihaana adde nayti Yi7uusa, Biniyaame, Ehuuda, Kin7ana, Zetana, Tarsesanne Aksaara;
1CH 7:11 haysati banta soo asaa halaqa; wolqaamanne mino asi. Banta yeletada taybetida olanchoti 17,200.
1CH 7:12 Sufiminne Hufimi Ira nayta. Hushimi Ahere na7a.
1CH 7:13 Niftaaleme nayti Yahixi7eela, Guna, Yexeranne Shilema; haysati Baala kochata.
1CH 7:14 Minaase kochati haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Minaase Soore laggethefe yelida adde nayti Asiri7eelanne Galada aawa Makira.
1CH 7:15 Makiri Hufimapenne Safimape issi issi macho ekis. Makira miche sunthay Ma7iko. Makira na7ay kaaloy Selophaada; Selophaadi macca na7a xalaala yelis.
1CH 7:16 Makira machiya Ma7ika Pareesanne Suroosa geetetiya nam7u adde nayta yelasu. Paaresa nayti Ulamanne Raqeema.
1CH 7:17 Ulama na7ay Badaana. Haysati Minaase na7aa na7a Makira na7aa Galada kochata.
1CH 7:18 Galada michiya Hamoleketa, Isude, Abi7ezeranne Mahila yelasu.
1CH 7:19 Shamida adde nayti Ahiya, Seekema, Liqanne Ani7aama.
1CH 7:20 Efreema na7ay Shutula; Shutula na7ay Bareda; Bareda na7ay Tahata; Tahata na7ay Elada; Elada na7ay Tahata;
1CH 7:21 Tahata na7ay Zabada; Zabada na7ay Shutula. Efreemas Ederanne Elada geetetiya hara nam7u nayti de7oosona. Enti Geete asaa mehe kaysin asay enta wodhis.
1CH 7:22 Hessa gisho, enta aaway Efreemi daro wode azzanin iya ishati iya minthethanaw yidosona.
1CH 7:23 Hessafe guye, I ba machera aqis; iya qanthatada adde na7a yelasu. Efreema soo gakida iita metuwa gisho I ba na7aa Bari7a gidi sunthis.
1CH 7:24 She7ira geetetiya Efreema na7iya de7awusu; Garsan Beet-Horona, Qommon Uzen-Sheera geetetiya katamata keexasu.
1CH 7:25 Efreema adde na7ay Raafa; Raafa na7ay Resheefa; Resheefa na7ay Teela; Teela na7ay Tahana;
1CH 7:26 Tahana na7ay Laadana; Laadana na7ay Amhuda; Amhuda na7ay Elsama;
1CH 7:27 Elsama na7ay Nawe; Nawe na7ay Iyyasu.
1CH 7:28 Efreema kochati ekidi bantaw daana bessi oothida biittay, Beetelenne iya yuushuwan de7iya gutata; doloha baggan Na7ara, wuloha baggan Gezeranne enta yuushuwan de7iya gutata, Seekema, Ayanne enta yuushuwan de7ya gutata ubbaa oykees.
1CH 7:29 Minaase biitta zawan de7iya Beet-Saananne iya yuushuwan de7iya gutata, Tanakanne iya yuushuwan de7iya gutata, Magidonne iya yuushuwan de7iya gutata, Dooranne iya yuushuwan de7iya gutata. Isra7eele na7aa Yoosefa kochati ha katamatan de7idosona.
1CH 7:30 Aseera adde nayti Yimina, Yesuwa, Yisiwanne Beri7a; enta michiya Saraho.
1CH 7:31 Beri7a adde nayti Hebeeranne Berzaaweta aawa Malka7eela.
1CH 7:32 Hebeeri Yaafilexa, Sameera, Hotama yelis; enta miche sunthay Soosano.
1CH 7:33 Yaafilexa adde nayti Pasaka, Bimihaalanne Asita.
1CH 7:34 Sameera adde nayti Aka, Rooga, Yahuubanne Araame.
1CH 7:35 Hotama adde nayti Xoofa, Yimina, Selesanne Amala.
1CH 7:36 Xoofa adde nayti Suha, Harnefera, Sogala, Beera, Yimira,
1CH 7:37 Bexera, Hoda, Saama, Selisa, Yitiraananne Bi7eera.
1CH 7:38 Yetera adde nayti Yorona, Pispanne Ara.
1CH 7:39 Ula adde nayti Era, Han7eelanne Irxa.
1CH 7:40 Haysati ubbati Aseera kochata. Enti banta soo asaa halaqatanne dooretida wolqaamanne mino asi. Banta yeletada taybetida olanchoti 26,000 gididosona.
1CH 8:1 Biniyaame bayra na7ay Beella; kaaloy Asbeela; heedzanthoy Ahira;
1CH 8:2 oyddanthoy Nohe; ichashanthoy Raafa.
1CH 8:3 Beella adde nayti Adaare, Geera, Abhuuda,
1CH 8:4 Abisu Na7imaane, Ahoha,
1CH 8:5 Geera, Safufaamanne Kiraama.
1CH 8:6 Ehuuda adde nayti Na7imaane, Akiyanne Geera. Enti Gib7an de7idanne guyepe Manahaata biitta di7etidi bida banta soo asaa halaqata. Enta yaa kaalethidi efiday Ozanne Ahuda aawa Geera.
1CH 8:8 Shaharaami ba macheta Hushimonne Ba7iira yeddidaape guye Moo7abe biittan adde nayta yelis.
1CH 8:9 Shaharaami ba mache Hodishipe Yobaaba, Dibaya, Meesa, Malkaama,
1CH 8:10 Ye7uxa, Sakiyaanne Mirma yelis. Iya nayti ubbay banta soo asaa halaqata gididosona.
1CH 8:11 I ba mache Hushimipe, Abixubanne Elfa7aala yelis.
1CH 8:12 Elfa7aala adde nayti Ebeera, Mashemanne Shameda. Shamedi Ononne Looda katamatanne enta heeran de7iya gutata keexis.
1CH 8:13 Shaharaami Beri7anne Shem77a yelis. Enti Eloona kataman de7iya banta soo asaa halaqata. Enti Geete kataman de7iya asaa gooddidosona.
1CH 8:14 Beri7a adde nayti Shaharaama, Ahiya, Shashaqa, Yiremoota.
1CH 8:15 Zabada, Arada, Edera,
1CH 8:16 Mika7eela, Yishphanne Yooha.
1CH 8:17 Elfala7a adde nayti Zabada, Masulaama, Hizqa, Hebeera,
1CH 8:18 Yishmaraya, Yuzilanne Yobaaba.
1CH 8:19 Same7a adde nayti Yaqma, Zikira, Zibada
1CH 8:20 Elanaya, Xiltaya, Elela,
1CH 8:21 Adaya, Birayanne Shimirata.
1CH 8:22 Shashaqa adde nayti Yishphana, Ebeera, Eli7eela,
1CH 8:23 Abdoona, Zikira, Hanaana,
1CH 8:24 Hanaaniya, Elama, Antota,
1CH 8:25 Yifdayanne Panu7eela.
1CH 8:26 Yirohaama adde nayti Shemshiraya, Shehaara, Ataala,
1CH 8:27 Yaaresha, Eelyiaasanne Zikira.
1CH 8:28 Haysati banta yeletan Yerusalaamen uttida banta soo asaa halaqata.
1CH 8:29 Gaba7oona aaway Yi7eeli Gaba7oona kataman de7is; iya mache sunthay Ma7iko.
1CH 8:30 Iya na7aa bayray Abdoona; hara iya adde nayti Xuraya, Qiisa, Ba7aala, Neeranne Nadaaba,
1CH 8:31 Gedoora, Ahiya, Zekeranne
1CH 8:32 Maqloota. Maqlooti Shim7a yelis. Haysati Yerusalaamen de7iya banta dabbota matan de7idosona.
1CH 8:33 Neeri Qiisa yelis; Qiisi Saa7ola yelis. Saa7oli Yoonataana, Malkisa, Abinadaabenne Asba7eela yelis.
1CH 8:34 Yoonataana na7ay Marba7aala yelis; Marba7aali Mikiyaasa yelis.
1CH 8:35 Mikiyaasa adde nayti Pitoona, Meleka, Tare7anne Akaaza.
1CH 8:36 Akaazi Yaho7ada yelis. Yaho7aadi Alemeeta, Azmaawetanne Zimira yelis. Zimiri Mooxa yelis;
1CH 8:37 Mooxi Bin7a yelis; Bin77i Raafa yelis; Raafi El7aasa yelis; El7aasi Axeela yelis.
1CH 8:38 Axeelas usupun adde nayti de7oosona. Enta sunthay Azirqaama, Bokeera, Isma7eela, Sha7aara, Abdiyunne Hanaana.
1CH 8:39 Axeela ishaa Esheqas heedzu nayti de7oosona. Iya na7ay bayray Ulama; kaaloy Yi7uusa; heedzanthoy Elfalaxa.
1CH 8:40 Ulama nayti wolqaamanne mino asi; enti dongen dukeyisata. Ulamas xeetanne ishatamu gidiya naytinne nayta nayti de7oosona. Haysati ubbay Biniyaame kochata.
1CH 9:1 Isra7eele asa ubbay ba yeletan yeletan, Isra7eele kawota maxaafan xaafetidi de7ees. Yihuda asay Godaas ammanetibona gisho Babiloone biitta di7etidi bidosona.
1CH 9:2 Koyro simmidi banta biittaninne banta katamatan uttiday guutha Isra7eele asata, kahineta, Leewetanne Xoossa keetha oosanchota.
1CH 9:3 Yihudape, Biniyaamepe, Efreemapenne Minaasepe guutha asati yidi Yerusalaamen de7idosona.
1CH 9:4 Yihuda na7aa Paaresa yaraape Utayi Yerusalaamen de7eysatas halaqa. Utayi Amhuda na7a; Amhudi Omira na7a; Omiri Imira na7a; Imiri Baana na7a.
1CH 9:5 Yihuda na7aa Seela yaraape Asayinne iya nayti Yerusalaamen de7eysatas halaqa.
1CH 9:6 Yihuda na7aa Zaara yaraape Yi7u7eeli Yerusalaamen de7eysatas halaqa. Yihuda kochaa tayboy usupun xeetanne uddufun tamma.
1CH 9:7 Biniyaame yaraa halaqati haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Masulaama na7aa Saalu, Hodawa na7aa Masulaama, Hasenaa7u na7aa Hodawa,
1CH 9:8 Yirohaama na7aa Yibinaya, Oza na7aa Ela, Mikira na7aa Oza, Safaaxa Masulaama, Ra7uula na7aa Safaaxa, Yibina na7aa Ragu7eela.
1CH 9:9 Biniyaame kochaa tayboy uddufun xeetanne ishatammanne usupuna. Haysati ubbay banta soo asaa halaqata.
1CH 9:10 Yerusalaamen de7ida kahineti haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Enti Yodaha, Yoraba, Yakinanne
1CH 9:11 Xoossa keethan aawatiya Azaariyasa. Azaariyasi Kalqe na7a; Kalqey Masulaama na7a; Masulaami Saadoqa na7a; Saadoqi Mariyoota na7a; Mariyooti Akxooba na7a.
1CH 9:12 Harati qassi Yirohaama na7aa Adayanne Adi7eela na7aa Ma7iseya. Yirohaami Paskora na7a; Paskori Malkiya na7a. Adi7eeli Yahizeera na7a; Yahizeeri Masulaama na7a; Masulaami Mashilmoota na7a; Mashilmooti Imera na7a.
1CH 9:13 Banta soo asaas halaqa gidida kahineta tayboy 1,760. Haysati Xoossa keethan oothanaw danda7iya asata.
1CH 9:14 Yerusalaamen de7iya Leeweti haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Hashuba na7ay Shamayey Maraara yara. Hashubi Aziriqaama na7a; Aziriqaami Hasabaya na7a.
1CH 9:15 Harati qassi Baqbaqara, Hereesa, Galaalanne Mataana. Mataani Mika na7a; Miki Zikira na7a; Zikiri Asaafa na7a.
1CH 9:16 Harati qassi Naxoofata gutan uttiday Abdiyunne Baraka. Abdiyuy Shama7iya na7a; Shama7ey Galaala na7a; Galaali Yedutuuna na7a; Baraki Asa na7a; Asi Elqaana na7a.
1CH 9:17 Kawo pengiya naageysati, Saluma, Aquba, Talmoona, Ahimaananne enta ishata; salumi enta halaqa.
1CH 9:18 Enti wuloha baggara de7iya, Kawo Pengiya naagidosona. Haysafe kase enti Leeweti dunkaanida gutaa naagoosona.
1CH 9:19 Abisaafa na7aa na7ay Qore na7ay Salumi Qore yara. Qore yaray kase Godaa Dunkaaniya naagidaysada Saluminne Qore koche gidida iya dabboti Xoossa keetha pengiya naagoosona.
1CH 9:20 Alaazara na7ay Pinihaasi kase Qore yaraa halaqa; Goday iyara de7ees.
1CH 9:21 Masulaama na7ay Zakariyasi Dunkaaniya giddo geliya pengiya naagees.
1CH 9:22 Pengiya naaganaw dooretidaysati kumethi nam7u xeetanne tammanne nam7a; hessati banta gutan gutan taybetidi xaafetidosona. Enta yaras ha aawatetha immiday kawa Dawitanne nabiya Sameela.
1CH 9:23 Hessa gisho, entinne enta nayti Xoossa keetha pengiya naagoosona.
1CH 9:24 Oyddu baggara dolohan, wulohan, pudehan dugehan issi issi pengey de7ees; he pengeta naageysati de7oosona.
1CH 9:25 He gutan de7iya enta dabboti laapuntha gallasan gallasan laametidi, naagidi enta maaddoosona.
1CH 9:26 Pengiya naagiya oyddu Leeweti halaqa; enti Xoossa keethaa kifiletanne kifileta giddon de7iya miisheta aawatethan aysoosona.
1CH 9:27 Xoossa keethaa naageynne wonta guura kariya dooyey enta gidiya gisho yan aqoosona.
1CH 9:28 Leewetape guuthati goyinno wode go7etiya miisheta naagoosona; he miisheta kare kesseynne soo gelsey enta.
1CH 9:29 Entafe issoti issoti Xoossa keethan go7etiya hara miisheta, dhiille, woyne ushshu, zayte, ixaanenne sawota aawatethan aysoosona.
1CH 9:30 Shin kahineta naytape baggati sawuwa walakoosona.
1CH 9:31 Qore kochaafe Saluma bayra na7ay Mataatas yarsho uytha uukisiya aawatethi de7ees.
1CH 9:32 Qahaata yara gidiya enta dabbotape baggati Sambaatan Sambaatan xarpheeza bolla wothiya uythaa giigisiya aawatethi ekidosona.
1CH 9:33 Leewe kochaafe guutha halaqati Xoossa keethan yexeyisata. Qammanne gallas enti oothiya gisho hara ooso oothonna Xoossa keetha dirsa giddon de7iya keethatan de7oosona.
1CH 9:34 Haysati ubbay Leewe soo asaa halaqata; enti Yerusalaamen de7idosona.
1CH 9:35 Gaba7oona aaway Yi7eeli Gaba7oona kataman de7is; iya mache sunthay Ma7iko.
1CH 9:36 Iya na7ay bayray Abdoona; iya nayti harati Xuraya, Qiisa, Ba7aala, Neera, Nadaaba,
1CH 9:37 Gadoora, Ahiya, Zakariyasanne Mikloota.
1CH 9:38 Miklooti Sim7a yelis. Haysati Yerusalaamen de7iya banta dabbota matan de7idosona.
1CH 9:39 Neeri Qiisa yelis; Qiisi Saa7ola yelis. Saa7oli Yoonataana, Malkisa, Abinadaabenne Eshba7aala yelis.
1CH 9:40 Yoonataana na7ay Marba7aala yelis; Marba7aali Mikiyaasa yelis.
1CH 9:41 Mikiyaasa nayti Pitoona, Meleka, Tare7anne Akaaza.
1CH 9:42 Akaazi Ya7ira yelis. Ya7iri Alemeeta, Azmaawetanne Zimira yelis. Zimiri Mooxa yelis;
1CH 9:43 Mooxi Bin7a yelis; Bin7i Rafaya yelis; Rafayi El7aasa yelis; El7aasi Axeela yelis.
1CH 9:44 Axeelas usupun adde nayti de7oosona. Enta sunthay Azirqaama, Bokeera, Isma7eela, Sha7aara, Abdiyunne Hanaana.
1CH 10:1 Filisxeemeti Isra7eele asaara oletidosona. Isra7eeleti Filisxeemeta sinthafe baqatidosona. He wode daro Isra7eele asay Gilbo7a deriya bolla hayqidosona.
1CH 10:2 Filisxeemeti Saa7olanne iya adde nayta gooddi efidi Saa7ola nayta Yoonataana, Abinadaabanne Malkisa wodhidosona.
1CH 10:3 Olay Saa7ola teqidi un7ethis; dongen dukeysati Saa7ola demmidi madunxisidosona.
1CH 10:4 Saa7oli ba ola miishiya tookeysako, “Ha qaxaretiboona Filisxeemeti tana kaa7onna mela ne mashshan tana wodha” yaagis. Shin iya ola miishiya tookeysi daro yayyida gisho ixis; hessa gisho, Saa7oli ba mashsha sa7an essidi iya bolla kundidi hayqis.
1CH 10:5 Iya ola miishiya tookeysi Saa7oli hayqidaysa be7idi, ika ba mashsha sa7an essidi iya bolla kundidi hayqis.
1CH 10:6 Hessada hanidi Saa7oli, iya heedzu naytinne iya soo asa ubbay he gallas hayqidosona.
1CH 10:7 Zangaaran de7iya Isra7eeleti ubbay banta olanchoti baqatidaysa, Saa7olinne iya nayti hayqidaysa be7ida wode banta katamata aggidi baqatidosona. Filisxeemeti yidi he katamatan de7idosona.
1CH 10:8 Wontetha gallas Filisxeemeti ahata bollafe ola miisheta qaari ekanaw yidi, Saa7olinne iya nayti Gilbo7a deriyan hayqidi, zin7idaysata demmidosona.
1CH 10:9 Enti Saa7ola qoodhiya qanxidi iya ola miishiya qaari ekidosona. Yaatidi banta eeqata keethaninne banta asaa giddon xoonuwa awaajana mela Filisxeeme biitta ubbaas ase kiittidosona.
1CH 10:10 Enti Saa7ola ola miishiya banta xoossata keethatape issuwan wothidosona; iya huuphiya banta Xoossa Daagona eeqa keethan kaqidosona.
1CH 10:11 Filisxeemeti Saa7ola bolla oothidaba ubbaa Galadan de7iya Yaabesa katamaa asay si7ida wode,
1CH 10:12 mino asati ubbay bidi, Saa7ola ahaanne iya nayta aha ekidi Yaabesa katama ehidosona. Yaabesan de7iya wolaa garsan enta moogidosona; yaatidi laapun gallas xoomidosona.
1CH 10:13 Saa7oli Godaas ammanetibona gisho hayqis. Godaa qaala I naagibeenna; Godaa zore oycheysa aggidi,
1CH 10:14 moytille xeegiya asi zore oychis. Hessa gisho, Goday iya wodhidi iya kawotetha Isseye na7aa Dawitas aathidi immis.
1CH 11:1 Hessafe guye, Isra7eele asa ubbay issife Kebroonan de7iya Dawitako bidi, “Nuuni ne suuthunne ne asho.
1CH 11:2 Kase Saa7oli kawo gididi de7iya wodeka, Isra7eele asaa olas kaalethiday nena. Goday ne Xoossay, ‘Ta asaa Isra7eele neeni heemmana; enta bolla neeni kawotana’ ” yaagis.
1CH 11:3 Isra7eele cimati ubbay kawa Dawitako yida wode I entara Kebroonan Godaa sinthan caaqis. Goday Sameela baggara odida qaalada Dawiti Isra7eele bolla kawotanaada enti iya tiyidosona.
1CH 11:4 Dawitinne Isra7eele asa ubbay Yerusalaame katamaa bidosona. He wode Yaabuse asay he bessan de7iya gisho he katamay Yaabuse geetetees.
1CH 11:5 Yaabuseti Dawitako, “Neeni ha katamaa gelanaw danda7aka” yaagidosona. Gidoshin, Dawiti Xiyoonen de7iya enta miixaa oykin, Xiyooney Dawita Katama geetetis.
1CH 11:6 Dawiti ba olanchota, “Yaabuseta koyrottidi oliya oonika toora mocona gidana” yaagis. Xaruya na7ay Iyo7aabi koyrottidi olidi halaqa gidis.
1CH 11:7 Dawiti he miixan de7ida gisho he katamay Dawita Katama geetetis.
1CH 11:8 Dawiti Miilope doomidi he katamaa zaaridi keexis; attida baggaa Iyo7aabi zaaridi keexis.
1CH 11:9 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday iyara de7iya gisho Dawiti minni minni bis.
1CH 11:10 Mino gidida Dawita asati haysafe kaallidi xaafetidosona. Goday Isra7eeles gida qaalada Dawiti kawotana mela ha asati Isra7eele asaara daro maaddidosona. Qassi iya kawotethaa minthidosona.
1CH 11:11 Mino gidida Dawita asati haysafe kaallidi de7eyisata. Entafe heedzati daro eretidaysata. Heedzatape koyroy Hakmoona addiya Yashobi7aama; I issi toho olan heedzu xeetu asaa ba tooran wodhis.
1CH 11:12 Iya kaalley, heedzu mino asatape issoy Ahoha addiya Dooda na7a Alaazara.
1CH 11:13 Filisxeeme asay oletanaw Pasdamima geetetiya bessaa shiiqida wode Alaazari Dawitara de7ees. Isra7eele olanchoti Filisxeeme asata sinthafe baqatiya wode Alaazari banga gaden de7ees.
1CH 11:14 Inne iya asati gadiya giddon Filisxeeme asaara oletin, Goday gita xoono immidi enta ashshis.
1CH 11:15 Filisxeeme olanchoti Raafayme zangaaran dunkaanida wode hastamu halaqatape heedzati Dawiti de7iya Adulaama gongoluwan de7iya zaallako bidosona.
1CH 11:16 He wode Dawiti miixan de7ees; Filisxeeme olanchotape issi cugay Beeteleme olidi oykis.
1CH 11:17 Dawiti haathe uyanaw amotidi, “Beeteleme pengiya matan de7iya pulto haathaafe tana ushshanay oone!” yaagis.
1CH 11:18 Heedzu mino asati Filisxeemeti dunkaanida bessaa kanthi bidi Beeteleme pengiya matan de7iya pulto haathaafe duuqidi Dawitas ehidosona. Shin Dawiti uyonna ixidi haatha Godaa sinthan tigis.
1CH 11:19 “Ha haatha ushshi taape haako! Banta shempuwa bayzidi ehida ha asata suuthaa taani uyo? Enti banta shempuwa aathidi immidi ehidosona” yaagis. Hessa gisho, Dawiti haatha uybeenna. Heedzu mino asati hessa oothidosona.
1CH 11:20 Iyo7aaba ishay Abisi hastamu olanchotas halaqa. I ba tooran heedzu xeetu asaa wodhidi, ika ha heedzatada eretida asi gidis.
1CH 11:21 Abisi heedzatara taybetonna ixikoka, I heedzatape aadhidi bonchetida asi; I entaw halaqa gidis.
1CH 11:22 Qabxeela addey Yoodahe na7ay Banayi mino asi; I mino ooso oothis. I nam7u eretida Moo7abe asata wodhis. Qassi shachi wodhida issi gallas olla giddo gelidi gaammo wodhis.
1CH 11:23 Banayi ichashu wadha gidiya Gibxe addiya wodhis. Gibxe addiya kushen wandaraashe mela toori de7ees; shin Banayi xam7a oykidi addiyako bidi iya kushiyan de7iya toora dafi ekidi iya tooran iya wodhis.
1CH 11:24 Yoodahe na7ay Banayi haysa oothis. Iya sunthay he heedzataysada eretis.
1CH 11:25 I hastamata giddon daro bonchetis; shin I heedzata taybuwan deenna. Dawiti iya bana naageysata halaqa oothis.
1CH 11:26 Mino asati Iyo7aaba ishaa Asaheela, Beeteleme addiya Dooda na7aa Eliyaana,
1CH 11:27 Harooda addiya Samoota, Piloona addiya Selesa,
1CH 11:28 Tequhe addiya Esika na7aa Ira, Anatoota addiya Abi7ezera,
1CH 11:29 Kusata addiya Sabaka, Ahoha addiya Elaya,
1CH 11:30 Naxoofa addiya No7eeranne Banaha na7aa Heleda,
1CH 11:31 Biniyaamen de7iya Gib7a addiya Rabaya na7a Etaya, Pir7atoona addiya Banayasa,
1CH 11:32 Ga7aasa Zangaara matape yida Uraya, Araba addiya Abi7eela,
1CH 11:33 Barhuuma addiya Azmoota, Sa7alboona addiya Abi7eela,
1CH 11:34 Gizoona addiya Hasema, Harara addiya Shaage na7a Yoonataana,
1CH 11:35 Harara addiya Sakara na7a Ahi7aama, Ure na7aa Elfala,
1CH 11:36 Makeera addiya Hefeera, Piloona addiya Akiya,
1CH 11:37 Qarmeloosa addiya Hexira, Ezbaya na7aa Na7iraya,
1CH 11:38 Naatana ishaa Iyyu7eela, Hagira na7aa Mibhaara,
1CH 11:39 Amoone addiya Xeleqa, Xaruya na7aa Iyo7aaba ola miishiya tookiya Ba7eroota addiya Nahiraya,
1CH 11:40 Yatira addiya Iranne Gareeba,
1CH 11:41 Hite addiya Ooriyoona, Ahilaya na7aa Zabada,
1CH 11:42 Robeela koche gidida Shiiza na7aa Adina. I Robeela kochata halaqa; hastamati iyara issife de7oosona.
1CH 11:43 Hara mino asati Ma7ika na7aa Hanaana, Mitaane addiya Iyosaafexa,
1CH 11:44 Astaroota addiya Ooziyana, Aro7eera addiya Hotama nayta Shama7anne Yi7eela,
1CH 11:45 Shimira na7aa Yidi7eelanne iya ishaa Tiixa addiya Yooha,
1CH 11:46 Mahaawa addiya Eli7eela, Elnaama nayta Yiribayanne Yoshawa, Moo7abe addiya Yitima,
1CH 11:47 Xooba addiya El7eela, Obeedanne Ya7isi7eela.
1CH 12:1 Dawiti Qiisa na7aa Saa7olape baqatidi Xiqilaagan uttida wode iyako yida asati haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Enta kase Dawita olan maaddida mino asata giddon de7oosona.
1CH 12:2 Enti dongen dukeyisata; qassi ushacha kusheninne haddirsa kushen yambaranawnne donge dukanaw danda7oosona. Enti Biniyaame koche gidida Saa7ola kochata.
1CH 12:3 Enta halaqay Ahi7ezera; iyape kaallidi Iyo7aasa; enti Gib7a addiya Shama7a na7a. Harati qassi Azmaawe nayta gidida Yizi7eelanne Palaxa, Baraka, Anatoote addiya Iyyu,
1CH 12:4 hastamata giddon wolqaama gididi, enta kaalethiya Gaba7oona addiya Yishima7iya, Ermiyaasa, Yahazi7eela, Yohaana, Gedaara addiya Yozabaata,
1CH 12:5 Eluzaya, Yarmoota, Balaya, Samara, Harifa addiya Safaaxa,
1CH 12:6 Qore koche gidida Elqaana, Yishiya, Azari7eela, Yoo7ezeranne Yashobi7aama,
1CH 12:7 Gadoora addiya Yirohaama nayta Yo7eelanne Zabada.
1CH 12:8 Dawiti bazzon de7iya miixan de7ishin, Gaade kochaafe guutha asati iyako yidosona. Enti minonne olas giigidaysata; gondallenne toora oykanaw danda7eyisata. Enta som7oy gaammo som7o mela; enti dere huuphera gupiya gen7e mela eesotoosona.
1CH 12:9 Enta halaqay Exera; nam7anthoy abdiyu; heedzanthoy Eli7aaba;
1CH 12:10 oyddanthoy Mismaana; ichashanthoy Ermiyaasa;
1CH 12:11 usupunthoy Ataya; laapunthoy Eli7eela;
1CH 12:12 hospunthoy Yohaana; uddufunthoy Elzabaada;
1CH 12:13 tammanthoy Ermiyaasa; tammanne issanthoy Makibanaya.
1CH 12:14 Haysati Gaade kochaa olanchotas halaqata. Entafe ziqay mato halaqa; dhoqay qassi shaalaqa gidis.
1CH 12:15 Yordaanose shaafay, gaxape gaxa gakidi kixida koyro ageenan pinnidaysati haysata. Enti zangaaran dolohanne wuloha baggan de7iya asaa ubbaa yedethidosona.
1CH 12:16 Biniyaame kochaafenne Yihuda kochaafe guutha asati Dawiti de7iya miixa bidosona.
1CH 12:17 Dawiti entara gahetanaw keyidi, “Hinte tana maaddanaw saro taako yidaba gidiko ta wozanay hintera gidana. Shin hinte tana ta morketas aathidi immanaw yidaba gidiko, hintena erite! Taani oothida iitabay bayna gisho nu aawata Xoossay hessa be7o; I hintena pirdo!” yaagis.
1CH 12:18 Hessafe guye, hastamata halaqa Amasaya bolla Xoossa Ayyaanay wodhin, “Dawita, nuuni neyisata! Isseye na7aw, nuuni neera de7oos! Saroy new gido! Nena maaddeysatas saroy gido! Ne Xoossay nena maaddana” yaagis. Dawiti enta ekidi ba olanchotas halaqa oothis.
1CH 12:19 Dawiti Filisxeemetara gididi Saa7ola olanaw bida wode, Minaase kochaafe guutha asati Dawitara gahetidosona. Shin Filisxeemeta halaqati Dawitinne Dawita asay bantara boonnada diggidosona. Dawitinne Dawita asay, enta kawa Saa7olas aathidi immaneko gidi yayyida gisho Filisxeemeti zoretidaape guye enta guye zaaridosona.
1CH 12:20 Dawiti Xiqilaaga simmida wode Minaase kochaafe Dawita maaddanaw keyida asati Adina, Yozabaata, Yidi7eela, Mika7eela, Yozabaata, Elihanne Xiltaya. Haysati kase Minaase biittan shaalaqa.
1CH 12:21 Enti ubbay minonne wolqaama asi gidiya gisho Dawita zugidi oliya asaa olidi iya maaddidosona.
1CH 12:22 Dawita olanchoti, Xoossa olanchoda darana gakanaw iya maaddiya asay gallas gallas guzhetees.
1CH 12:23 Goday iyaw gidaysada Saa7ola kawotethaa Dawitako zaaranaw dancetidi Dawitako Kebroona bida olanchota tayboy haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata.
1CH 12:24 Gondallenne toora oykidi olas giigida Yihuda kochay 6,800.
1CH 12:25 Simoona kochaafe olas giigida minonne wolqaama olanchoti 7,100.
1CH 12:26 Leewe kochaafe 4,600.
1CH 12:27 Aarona kochaa halaqay Yoodahe; Yoodahera issife 3,700 asati de7oosona.
1CH 12:28 Saadoqi na7atethi, minonne wolqaama asi; Saadoqa soo asaape laatamanne nam7u halaqati iyara de7oosona.
1CH 12:29 Biniyaame koche gidida Saa7ola dabboti 3,000. Shin Biniyaame kochaafe dariya baggay Saa7ola soo asaas he wode gakanaw ammanetidosona.
1CH 12:30 Efreema kochaafe banta soo asan eretida minonne wolqaama asati 20,800.
1CH 12:31 Dawita kawoyanaw baanaw dooretida Minaase kochaafe baggati 18,000.
1CH 12:32 Isra7eele asay ay oothanaw bessiyako wodiyaba shaakidi eriya akeekancho asati, Yisakoora kochaa halaqati, nam7u xeeta; enta dabboti ubbay entaw kiitetoosona.
1CH 12:33 Ola miishe ubbaa oykidi banta kumetha wozanan Dawita maaddanaw giigida olanchotan Zabloona kochay 50,000.
1CH 12:34 Niftaaleme kochaafe 1,000 halaqatinne gondallenne toora oykiya 37,000 asati entara de7oosona.
1CH 12:35 Daane kochaafe olas giigida asati 28,600.
1CH 12:36 Olas keyanaw Aseera kochaafe giigida asati 40,000.
1CH 12:37 Yordaanose shaafape hefintha doloha baggan de7iya Robeela kochaafe Gaade kochaafenne Minaase koche baggaafe ola miishe ubbaa oykidi yida asati 120,000.
1CH 12:38 Ha ubba olanchoti Dawita Isra7eele bolla kawothanaw banta qofaa qachidi, Kebroona katamaa yidosona. Qassi Isra7eelepe attidaysati Dawita kawothanaw issi wozanan gididosona.
1CH 12:39 Enta dabboti entaw koshshiyaba giigisida gisho mishenne uyishe Dawitara heedzu gallas uttidosona.
1CH 12:40 Isra7eele asaas ufaysi gidiya gisho, pudeha baggan de7iya Yisakoorape, Zabloonapenne Niftaalemepe daro asay dhiille, balase nuka, woyne teera, woyne ushshunne zayte haren, baqulon, gimaleninne booran caanidi ehidosona; qassi enti mehenne dorse shukidi maanaw ehidosona.
1CH 13:1 Dawiti shaalaqataranne mato halaqatara zoretis.
1CH 13:2 Isra7eele asa ubbaa, “Hintew lo77o daaniyaba gidikonne Godaa nu Xoossaa shene gidiko, Isra7eele biitta gaxan de7iya nu dabboti, hessadaka banta katamataninne hentha bessatan de7iya kahinetinne Leeweti nuuko shiiqana mela ase kiittoos.
1CH 13:3 Saa7ola kawotethaa wode qeli geetetida nu Xoossaa Taabotiya ane zaaridi ehoos” yaagis.
1CH 13:4 Dawita oday lo77o gidida gisho asa ubbay ma7is.
1CH 13:5 Hessa gisho, Dawiti Xoossa Taabotiya Qiriyaat-Yi7aarimepe ehana mela Gibxe zawape doomidi Hamaata Pino gakanaw de7iya Isra7eele asa ubbaa shiishis.
1CH 13:6 Dawitinne Isra7eele asa ubbay kiruubetape giddon ba araata bolla uttida Godaa sunthay xeegetida Xoossa Taabotiya ehanaw Yihuda biittan de7iya Baala geetetiya Qiriyat-Yi7aarima bidosona.
1CH 13:7 Xoossa Taabotiya ooratha para gaaren wothidi, Amnadaabe soope ehidosona; Oozinne Ahiyoy gaariya laaggoosona.
1CH 13:8 Dawitinne Isra7eele asa ubbay diithinne maasinqo kaa7ishe, karaabo baqishe, daala giirsishe, zaye punnishe banta kumetha wolqan Xoossa sinthan ufaytidi, yexishe Xoossaa bonchidosona.
1CH 13:9 Enti Kidoona wudumma gakiya wode boorati dhubetida gisho Oozi Taabotiya oykanaw ba kushiya yeddis.
1CH 13:10 Ooza kushey Taabotiya bochida gisho, Godaa hanqoy Oza bolla eexis. Hessa gisho, Goday iya xadikin, I he bessan Xoossa sinthan hayqis.
1CH 13:11 Goday hanqetidi Ooza wodhida gisho, Dawiti yilotis. Hachi gakanaw he bessay Oozi dhuketida bessaa geetetees.
1CH 13:12 He gallas Dawiti Xoossaa yayyida gisho, “Xoossa Taabotiya taako waata ehanaw danda7iyana?” yaagis.
1CH 13:13 Dawiti Taabotiya Yerusalaame efanaape gidi Gaate addiya Abdaara soo efis.
1CH 13:14 Xoossa Taabotey Abdaara son iya soo asaara heedzu ageena gam7is. Goday iya soo asaanne iyaw de7iya ubbaa anjis.
1CH 14:1 Xiroosa kawoy Kiraami Dawitas gadho keexana mela kiitetiya asata, shuchu masseysatanne anaaxeta ziga mithara yeddis.
1CH 14:2 Goday Isra7eele bolla iya kawo oothidi minthidaysanne ba asaa Isra7eele gisho iya kawotethaa bonchidaysa Dawiti eris.
1CH 14:3 Hessafe guye, Dawiti Yerusalaamen hara macho ekidi adde naytanne macca nayta yelis.
1CH 14:4 Dawiti Yerusalaamen yelida adde nayti Samuusa, Sobaaba, Naatana, Solomone,
1CH 14:5 Yibhaara, Elisu7a, Elfalaxa,
1CH 14:6 Noga, Nafega, Yafaya,
1CH 14:7 Elisaama, Eldaana, Elfalaxa.
1CH 14:8 Dawiti Isra7eele ubbaa bolla kawo gididi tiyetidaysa Filisxeemeti si7ida wode ubbay Dawita olidi oykanaw keyidosona. Dawiti hessa si7idi entara oletanaw keyis.
1CH 14:9 Filisxeemeti Raafayme zangaara yidi oykidosona.
1CH 14:10 Dawiti, “Taani Filisxeemeta olo? Neeni enta taw aatha immanee?” yaagidi Xoossaa oychis. Goday, “Bada ola; taani enta new aatha immana” yaagis.
1CH 14:11 Dawitinne iya asay Ba7al-Parasime geetetiya bessaa bidi yan enta xoonidosona. Dawiti, “Haathi dhuusidi keyeysada Xoossay ta morketa giddora tana kanthisis” yaagis. He bessaa sunthay Ba7al-Parasime geetetis.
1CH 14:12 Filisxeemeti banta eeqata he bessan yeggidi bin, Dawiti kiittidi enta eeqata xuugisis.
1CH 14:13 Filisxeemeti zaari he zangaara yidi olidosona.
1CH 14:14 Dawiti Xoossaa zaaridi oychis. Xoossay, “Enta guyera yuuya aadhada wolaa matan eqada olape attishin, sintha baggara keyopa.
1CH 14:15 Wola huuphen salpe girsi neeni si7iya wode olanaw keya. Hessi Filisxeeme olanchota shocanaw Xoossay neepe sinthe aadhidaysas malla” yaagis.
1CH 14:16 Xoossay kiitidaysada Dawiti oothis. Gaba7oonape Gezera gakanaw Isra7eele asay Filisxeeme olanchota wodhidosona.
1CH 14:17 Dawita sunthay biitta ubbaa gakis. Kawotetha ubbay Dawitas yayyana mela Goday oothis.
1CH 15:1 Dawiti ba kataman baw keethe keexis; Xoossa Taabotiyas besse giigisidi, dunkaane essis.
1CH 15:2 Dawiti, “Xoossa Taabotiya tookanaadanne merinaw Xoossas oothanaada Goday dooriday Leeweta gidiya gisho hari oonika Xoossa Taabotiya tookanaw bessenna” yaagis.
1CH 15:3 Dawiti Godaa Taabotiyas giigisida bessaa Taabotiya ehana mela Isra7eele asa ubbaa Yerusalaame shiishis.
1CH 15:4 Kaallidi Dawiti Aarona kochatanne Leeweta xeegidi shiishis.
1CH 15:5 Qahaata yaraape halaqay Uri7eelinne issi xeetanne laatamu iya dabboti yidosona.
1CH 15:6 Maraara yaraape halaqay Asayinne nam7u xeetanne laatamu iya dabboti yidosona.
1CH 15:7 Gedisoona yaraape halaqay Iyyu7eelinne xeetanne hastamu iya dabboti yidosona.
1CH 15:8 Elzafaana yaraape halaqay Shama7inne nam7u xeetu iya dabboti yidosona.
1CH 15:9 Kebroona yaraape halaqay Eli7eelinne hospun tammu iya dabboti yidosona.
1CH 15:10 Uzi7eela yaraape halaqay Amnadaabeynne xeetanne tammanne nam7u iya daboti yidosona.
1CH 15:11 Dawiti kahineta Saadoqanne Abyataara, Leeweta Uri7eela, Asaya, Iyyu7eela, Shama7a, Eli7eelanne Amnadaabe xeegis.
1CH 15:12 Entako, “Hinte Leewe kochaas halaqata. Godaa Isra7eele Xoossaa Taabotiya taani giigisida bessaa ehanaw hintenne hinte dabboti geeyite.
1CH 15:13 Hinte Leeweti koyro Xoossa Taabotiya tookiboonna gishonne nuuni iya woga mela waati efaneko Xoossaa oychiboona gisho, Goday nu Xoossay nuna seeris” yaagis.
1CH 15:14 Godaa Isra7eele Xoossa Taabotiya ehanaw kahinetinne Leeweti bantana geeshshidosona.
1CH 15:15 Goday Muse baggara kase kiitidaysada Leeweti Xoossaa Taabotiya banta hashiyan kasora tookidosona.
1CH 15:16 Diithi, maasinqonne daala kaa7ishe ufaysa yethi yexana mela banta dabbo gidida Leewetape zammaareta shuumana mela Dawiti kiittis.
1CH 15:17 Leeweti Iyyu7eela na7aa Hemaana, iya dabbotape Baraka na7aa Asaafanne enta dabbotape Maraara yaraa Qusaya na7aa Etaana shuumidosona.
1CH 15:18 Qassi nam7antho dethan Zakariyasa, Yazi7eela, Shamramoota, Yi7eela, Una, Eli7aaba, Banaya, Ma7iseya, Matita, Elfala, Miqineyanne penge naagiya Abdiyunne Yi7eela shuumidosona.
1CH 15:19 Naase daala qaathana mela Hemaani Asaafinne Etaani shuumetidosona.
1CH 15:20 Qassi Zakariyasi, Ya7izi7eeli, Shamramooti, Yi7eeli, Uni, Eli7aabi, Ma7iseynne Banayi maasinqo kaa7oosona.
1CH 15:21 Matita, Elfali, Miqineyi, Abdiyuy Yi7eelinne Azaazey diithi diixoosona.
1CH 15:22 Leeweta halaqay Kanaaney mazmure eriya gisho enta kaalethanaw shuumetis.
1CH 15:23 Barakinne Elqaani Taabotiya dunkaaniya pengiya naaganaw dooretidosona.
1CH 15:24 Kahineti Sabaani, Iyosaafexi, Natina7eeli, Amasayi, Zakariyasi, Banayinne Alaazari Xoossa Taabotiya sinthan moyze punnanaw dooretidosona. Obeed-Edoomeynne Yihey Taabotiya naaganaw dooretidosona.
1CH 15:25 Dawiti, Isra7eele cimatinne shaalaqati Godaa caaqo Taabotiya Abdaara soope ehanaw ufaytishe bidosona.
1CH 15:26 Godaa caaqo Taabotiya tookida Leeweta Xoossay maaddida gisho enti laapun kormanne laapun maraze yarshidosona.
1CH 15:27 Dawiti, Taabotiya tookida Leeweti, mazmure yexeysatinne enta halaqay Kanaaney liinope oosetida ma7o ma7idosona. Dawitika liinope oosetida efuude ma7is.
1CH 15:28 Hessada oothidi, Isra7eele ubbay ufaytidi moyzenne zaye punnishe, daala qaathishe, diithinne maasinqo kaa7ishe Godaa caaqo Taabotiya ehidosona.
1CH 15:29 Godaa caaqo Taabotey Dawita katamaa gelida wode Saa7ola na7iya Melkoola kawoy Dawiti ufaytidi durishininne kaa7ishin maskootera be7ada ba wozanan kadhasu.
1CH 16:1 Enti Xoossa Taabotiya ehidi Dawiti Taabotiya wothanaw essida dunkaaniya giddon wothidi, xuussa yarshonne issifetetha yarsho Xoossas yarshidosona.
1CH 16:2 Dawiti xuussa yarshonne issifetetha yarsho yarshidi polidaape guye Godaa sunthan asaa anjis.
1CH 16:3 Isra7eele asa ubbaas maccasinne addes, huuphen huuphen issi muume uythi, issi qanxo ashonne issi woyne nuka gishis.
1CH 16:4 Godaa Taabotiya sinthan oothana melanne Godaa Isra7eele Xoossaa sabbana mela, galatana melanne bonchana mela guutha Leeweta Dawiti shuumis.
1CH 16:5 Leeweta halaqay Asaafa; Asaafa kaallidi Zakariyasa. Zakariyasa kaallidi de7ey Yi7eela, Shamramoota, Yi7eela, Matita, Eli7aaba, Banayanne Obeed-Edoome. Enti maasinqonne diithi diixanaw shuumetidosona; shin Asaafi daala girsanaw shuumetis.
1CH 16:6 Kahiney Banayinne Yahazi7eeli Xoossa caaqo Taabotiya sinthan ubba wode moyze punnanaw shuumetidosona.
1CH 16:7 He gallas Dawiti Asaafinne iya dabboti Godaa sabbana mela ha mazmuriya koyro kiittis.
1CH 16:8 Godaa galatite; iya sunthaa xeegite; Iya oosuwa kawotethata giddon odite.
1CH 16:9 Iya sabbite; galata mazmuriya iyaw yexite; Malaalisiya iya ooso ubbaa odite.
1CH 16:10 Iya geeshsha sunthan ceeqetite; Godaa koyeyisata wozanay ufayto.
1CH 16:11 Godaanne iya wolqaa be7ite; ubba wode iya sinthaa koyite.
1CH 16:12 Hinteno, Isra7eele kochato, dooretida Yayqooba nayto, Iya malaata, I immida pirdaanne malaalsiyabata hassayite.
1CH 16:14 I Godaa nu Xoossaa; iya pirday biitta ubbaa bollana.
1CH 16:15 Iya caaquwa merinaw mukulu yeletethaa gakanaw, iya qaala naagite.
1CH 16:16 Abrahaamera caaqida caaquwa naagees; Yisaaqas gelida qaala minthees.
1CH 16:17 Yayqoobas wogaa, Isra7eeles merinaa caaquwa, oothidi minthis.
1CH 16:18 “Taani new Kanaane biitta immana; I ne kochaas laata gidana” yaagis.
1CH 16:19 Hessi hinte taybon guuthanne Kanaanen bete gididi de7iya wode hannis.
1CH 16:20 Issi deriyape hara dere pinnidosona; issi kawotethaafe hara kawotethi yuuyidosona.
1CH 16:21 Xoossay enta oonika naaqana mela immibeenna; enta gisho kawota seeris.
1CH 16:22 “Taani tiyidaysata bochofite; ta nabeta qohopite” yaagis.
1CH 16:23 Sa7an de7iya asa ubbay Godaas yexite; iya ashuwa gallas gallas odite.
1CH 16:24 Kawotethata giddon iya bonchuwa, malaalsiya iya oosuwa asa ubbaa giddon awaajite.
1CH 16:25 Goday gita; aadho galatay iyaw bessees; xoossata ubbaafe aadhidi bonchetanaw bessees.
1CH 16:26 Hara kawotethata xoossati ubbay eeqata; shin Goday salota medhida Xoossaa.
1CH 16:27 Iya sinthan bonchoynne teemi de7ees; minotethinne ufaysi I de7iya bessan de7ees.
1CH 16:28 Hinteno, biitta kawotethato, Godaa bonchonne wolqa immite.
1CH 16:29 Iya sunthaas bessiya boncho immite; yarsho ekidi iya sinthe yiite; iya geeshshatetha teeman Godaa goyinnite.
1CH 16:30 Biittan de7iya asa ubbay iya sinthan kokorite; Sa7ay minni eqida gisho qaaxenna.
1CH 16:31 Saloti ufayto; sa7i hashshu go! Kawotethata giddon enti “Goday kawotis!” yaago.
1CH 16:32 Abbaynne iya giddon de7iya ubbay guummo; gadeynne iyan de7iya katha ubbay ufayto.
1CH 16:33 He wode woran de7iya mitha ubbay ufaysan Godaa sinthan yexana. I sa7aa bolla pirdanaw yees.
1CH 16:34 Goday keeha gidiya gishonne iya siiqoy merinaasa gidiya gisho, Godaa galatite.
1CH 16:35 “Abeeti nuna ashshiya Xoossaw nuna ashsha; Nuuni ne geeshsha suntha galatana melanne ne bonchuwan nu bonchetana mela, kawotethata giddofe shiishada nuna ashsha” yaagite.
1CH 16:36 Goday Isra7eele Xoossay, merinaape merinaa gakanaw galatetto! Asa ubbay, “Amin7i” gidi, Godaa galatidosona.
1CH 16:37 Godaa caaqo Taabotiya sinthan gallas gallas goyinnoos koshshiyaba ubba wode enti oothana mela Dawiti Asaafanne iya dabbota wothis.
1CH 16:38 Qassi Obeed-Edoomenne usupun tammanne hospun iya dabbota entara oothana mela wothis; Yedutuuna na7aa Obeed-Edoomenne Hosa pengiya naagana mela wothis.
1CH 16:39 Kahiney Saadoqinne iyara oothiya kahineti Gaba7oonan de7iya dhoqa bessan, Dunkaaniya sinthan oothana mela enta yan aggis.
1CH 16:40 Goday Isra7eeles immida higgiyan xaafetidaysada enti wontanne omarsi ubba wode xuussa yarsho yarshana mela oothis.
1CH 16:41 Iya siiqoy merinaasa gidiya gisho Godaa mazmuren galatana mela Hemaana, Yedutuunanne dooretida harata Dawiti entara issife wothis.
1CH 16:42 Hemaaninne Yedutuuni moyze punnoosona, daala giirsoosona galata mazmure yexishe kaa7iya hara miisheta kaa7oosona. Yedutuuna adde nayti pengiya naaganaw shuumetidosona.
1CH 16:43 Hessafe guye asa ubbay ba soo soo bis. Dawitika ba soo asaa anjanaw simmis.
1CH 17:1 Dawiti ba gadhon uttidaape guye nabiya Naatanako, “Taani zigape keexetida keethan de7ayis; shin Godaa caaqo Taabotey dunkaane giddon de7ees” yaagis.
1CH 17:2 Naatani Dawitako, “Goday neera de7iya gisho ne wozanay qopidaba ubbaa ootha” yaagis.
1CH 17:3 Shin he qamma Godaa qaalay Naatanako haysada yaagishe yis;
1CH 17:4 “Bada ta aylliya Dawitako haysada yaaga; ‘taani daana keethe keexanay nena gidaka.
1CH 17:5 Taani Isra7eele Gibxefe kessida wodepe doomada hachi gakanaw keethan de7abike; taani dunkaanepe dunkaane, bessafe bessi yuuyashe de7as.
1CH 17:6 Taani Isra7eele asa ubbaara yuuyida bessa ubban, ta asaa heemmana mela taani shuumida asaape oona Taw ziga keethi ayis keexabikii?’ gada oychabike” yaagees.
1CH 17:7 “Hessa gisho, ta aylliya Dawitako bada Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees; ‘Taani nena dorse heemmiya bessape denthada ta asaa Isra7eele kaalethana mela ehas.
1CH 17:8 Neeni bida besse ubban taani neera gidas; ne morketa ubbaa ne sinthafe diggas. Hiza taani ha sa7an eretida gita asaada ne sunthaa gitayana.
1CH 17:9 Taani ta asaa Isra7eeles besse immada, enta he bessan tokana. Hessa gisho, enti banta bessan de7ana; enti zaaridi waabaqokona. Kase taani ta asaa Isra7eele bolla daynnata shuumada wode morketi naaqidaysada,
1CH 17:10 zaaridi iita asati enta naaqokona. Taani ne morketa ubbaa new haarsana. “ ‘Hessa bolla Goday ba huuphen new keethe keexanaysa odees.
1CH 17:11 Ne hayqada ne mayzatan gahetiya wode taani neepe guye ne naytape issuwa denthada iya kawotethaa minthana.
1CH 17:12 Taw keethe keexanay iya; taani iya araata merinaw mintha essana.
1CH 17:13 Taani iyaw aawa gidana; ika taw na7a gidana. Neepe sinthe kawotida Saa7olape ta maarotetha ekidaysada taani iyape ekike.
1CH 17:14 Taani iya ta asaa bollanne ta kawotethaa bolla merinaw shuumana; iya araatay merinaw minni eqana’ ” yaagis.
1CH 17:15 Naatani Xoossay iyaw qoncisida qaala ubbaa Dawitas odis.
1CH 17:16 Hessafe guye, kawoy Dawiti dunkaaniya giddo gelidi, Godaa sinthan uttidi, haysada yaagidi woossis; “Abeeti Godaw, Xoossaw neeni haysa ubbaa taw oothanaw taani oonee? Ta soo asayka aybee?
1CH 17:17 Abeeti Godaw, hessi ne ayfiya sinthan guutha daanin, ne aylliya soo asaas sinthafe hananaba odadasa. Neeni tana gita asi oothada xeelladasa.
1CH 17:18 Neeni tana ne aylliya bonchida gisho, Dawiti ay gaanaw danda7ii? Neeni tana ne aylliya eraasa.
1CH 17:19 Abeeti Godaw, ne aylliya gishonne ne wozanaa qofaada ha gitaba ubbaa oothada, ha gita ufaysa qaala ubbaa tana erisadasa.
1CH 17:20 Abeeti Godaw, ne meli oonika baawa. Nuuni nu haythan si7idaysada neepe attishin, hara xoossi baawa.
1CH 17:21 Neeni ne ase oothanaw wozida ne asaa Isra7eele daaniya hara kawotethi sa7a bolla baawa. Neeni oothida gitanne malaalsiya oosota gaason ne sunthay biittan eretis. Neeni Gibxefe wozida ne asaa sinthafe kawotethata goodda kessadasa.
1CH 17:22 Neeni ne asaa Isra7eele merinaw nebaa oothadasa. Abeeti Godaw, neeni enta Xoosse gidadasa.
1CH 17:23 “Abeeti Godaw, neeni ne aylliyasinne iya soo asaas odidabay merinaw minnidi de7o; neeni oothana gidaysada ootha.
1CH 17:24 ‘Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay tuma Isra7eele Xoosse’ asay gaanada ne sunthay merinaw minnidi daananne gita gidana. Ne aylliya Dawita soo asay ne sinthan minnidi daana.
1CH 17:25 “Abeeti ta Xoossaw, neeni ne aylliyas keethe keexana gada qoncisadasa. Hessa gisho, taani ne aylley ha woosa woossanaw minnas.
1CH 17:26 Abeeti Godaw, neeni Xoosse! Neeni ha lo77o ufaysa qaala taw ne aylliyas oothana gadasa.
1CH 17:27 Ne sinthan merinaw daana mela ne aylliya soo asaa anjanaw koyadasa. Abeeti Godaw, ne anjidaysi merinaw anjetidaysa gidana” yaagidi woossis.
1CH 18:1 Hessafe guye, Dawiti Filisxeemeta xoonidi haaris; Geete katamaanne iya gutata Filisxeemeta kushepe ekis.
1CH 18:2 Dawiti Moo7abe asaa xoonin, enti iyaw haaretidi giiridosona.
1CH 18:3 Hamaata katamaa matan de7iya Suubba kawoy Adraazari, ba kawotetha Efraxiisa shaafa gakanaw aassanaw bishin Dawiti iya olis.
1CH 18:4 Dawiti Adraazarape issi mukulu para gaareta, laapun mukulu para asatanne laatamu mukulu toho asata di77is. Dawiti xeetu gaaretas gidiya parata ashshidi hara parata ubbaas gedaa xaphuwa qanxis.
1CH 18:5 Damasqo kataman de7iya Sooreti Suubba kawa Adraazara maaddanaw yida wode Dawiti entafe 22,000 asaa wodhis.
1CH 18:6 Hessafe guye, Soore biittan Damasqo kataman ola miixa medhis. Soore asati Dawitas haaretidi giiridosona. Dawiti bida bessa ubban Goday iyaw xoono immis.
1CH 18:7 Dawiti Adraazara oosanchoti tookida worqa gondalleta ekidi Yerusalaame efis.
1CH 18:8 Qassi Dawiti Adraazari haariya Xebahanne Kuna katamatape daro naase birata ekis. Hessafe guye, Solomoney he naase biratape oosetida kereta, tuussatanne dumma dumma miisheta oothis.
1CH 18:9 Dawiti Suubba kawa Adraazara olanchota ubbaa xoonidaysa Hamaata kawoy Toyi si7is.
1CH 18:10 Toyi Adrazaarara oletishe gam7ida gisho Dawiti Adraazara olidi xoonida gisho iya hashshu gaanawunne sarothanaw ba na7aa Hadoraama kawa Dawitako kiittis. Hadoraami worqafe, birapenne naase biratape oosetida miisheta imota ekidi bis.
1CH 18:11 Kawoy Dawiti Edoomepe, Moo7abepe, Amoonepe, Filisxeemetapenne Amaaleqatape di77idi ekida biraanne worqa ha miishetara gathidi Godaas dummayidi wothis.
1CH 18:12 Xaruya na7ay Abisi Edoome asaape 18,000 asaa, Maxine Zangaaran wodhis.
1CH 18:13 Dawiti Edoomen ola miixa medhis; yaatin, he biitta asa ubbay Dawitas haaretis. Dawiti bida bessa ubban Goday iyaw xoono immis.
1CH 18:14 Hessada oothidi, Dawiti Isra7eele ubbaa bolla kawotidi ba asa ubbaa xillotethaninne suure pirdan aysis.
1CH 18:15 Xaruya na7ay Iyo7aabi toora mocona; Ahiluda na7ay Iyosaafexi taarike xaafe.
1CH 18:16 Ahixuuba na7ay Saadoqinne Abyataara na7ay Abimelekey kahine; Sarayi waanna xaafe.
1CH 18:17 Yoodahe na7ay Banayi Dawita naagiya asaa halaqa; Dawita adde nayti iya kawotethan dhoqa bessa oykida halaqata.
1CH 19:1 Hessafe guye, Amoone kawoy Na7oosi hayqin iya na7ay iya bessan kawotis.
1CH 19:2 Dawiti, “Iya aaway Na7oosi taw keehida gisho taani iya na7aa Hanunas keehana” yaagis. Hanuna aaway hayqida gisho Dawiti iya minthethanaw ase kiittis. Dawiti kiitida asati Hanuna minthethanaw Amoone gakida wode,
1CH 19:3 Amoone moorinnati Hanunako, “Dawiti ne aawa bonchidi nena minthethanaw ha asata kiittis gada na qopay? I ha asaa kiittiday ha katamaa wochidi, olanaasa” yaagidosona.
1CH 19:4 Hanuni Dawiti kiitida asata oykidi, enta buuchaa meedis; enta ma7uwa garsafe dulle gakanaw qanxidi enta yeddis.
1CH 19:5 Hessa gisho, asati daro yeellatidosona. Dawiti hessa si7idi, entara asi kiittidi, “Hinte buuchay diccana gakanaw Iyaarko kataman de7ite; hessafe guye haa yiite” yaagis.
1CH 19:6 Amooneti banta kushen Dawiti enta morkana mela oothidaysa erida wode Masephexoomeninne Sooren de7iya Ma7ikanne Suubba katamatape para gaaretanne parata garxanaw 34,000 kilo giraame bira santime yeddidosona.
1CH 19:7 32,000 para gaareta, parata, Ma7ika kawanne iya olanchota miishen garxin yidi Medaban dunkaanidosona. Qassi Amooneti banta katamaape keyidi olas giigetidosona.
1CH 19:8 Dawiti hessa si7ida wode Iyo7aabanne olanchota yeddis.
1CH 19:9 Amooneti keyidi katamaa pengen olas salpidosona. Enta maaddanaw yida kawoti banta bessaa oykidi denban shiiqidosona.
1CH 19:10 Iyo7aabi oli sintharanne guyera teqidaysa be7ida wode Isra7eeleta giddofe mino olanchota dooridi, Soore olanchota sinthan salpisis.
1CH 19:11 Attida asaa ba ishaa Abisa aawatetha garsan wothis; enti Amooneta sinthan salpidosona.
1CH 19:12 Iyo7aabi ba ishaa Abisako, “Soore asati ta bolla wolqaamiko, neeni yada tana maadda. Amoone asati ne bolla wolqaamiko, taani yada nena maaddana.
1CH 19:13 Hiza minna! Nu asaa gishonne nu Xoossaa katamata gisho ane minnidi oletoos. Goday bana lo77iyaba ootho” yaagis.
1CH 19:14 Hessafe guye, Iyo7aabinne iyara de7iya asay Soore olanchotara oletanaw keyidosona. Yaatin, Soore asay iya sinthafe baqatidosona.
1CH 19:15 Soore asay baqatidaysa Amoone asay be7ida wode entika iya ishaa Abisaya sinthafe baqatidi katama gelidosona. Hessafe guye, Iyo7aabi Yerusalaame simmis.
1CH 19:16 Soore asay Isra7eele asay enta xoonidaysa erida wode ase kiittidi Efraxiisa shaafape hefinthara de7iya Soore asaa ehidosona. Toora moconay Adraazari, Shofaaki enta kaalethees.
1CH 19:17 Dawiti hessa si7ida wode Isra7eele olanchota shiishidi, Yordaanose shaafa pinnidi Soore asaara oletanaw enta sinthan salpidosona. Dawiti entara oletanaw salpin entika iyara oletidosona.
1CH 19:18 Soore asay Isra7eeleta sinthafe baqatidosona; Dawiti Soore asaape para gaare laagiya 7,000 asaanne 40,000 toho asaanne enta toora mocona Shoofaka wodhis.
1CH 19:19 Adraazara olanchoti Isra7eeletan xoonetidaysa erida wode Dawitara sigetidi, iyaw haaretidosona. Hessafe guye, Soore asay Amoone asaa maaddanaw dosibookona.
1CH 20:1 Laytha laamen kawoti olas keyiya wode Iyo7aabi olanchota kaalethidi Amoone biitta olidi Raaba katamaa oykis. Shin Dawiti Yerusalaamen attis; Iyo7aabi Raaba katamaa olidi dhaysis.
1CH 20:2 Hessafe guye, Dawiti yidi enta kawa worqa kallachaa iya huuphepe ekis. Kallacha deexoy hastamanne oyddu kilo giraame gidis; iya giddon al7o shuchi de7ees. He kallachaa ekidi Dawiti ba huuphen wothis. Qassi Dawiti he katamaape daro di7o di77is.
1CH 20:3 Kataman de7iya asaa kessidi magaazen, konteninne kaltan oosisis. Amoonen de7iya asa ubbaa hessada oosisis. Hessafe guye, Dawitinne iya asa ubbay Yerusalaame simmis.
1CH 20:4 Hessafe guye, Filisxeemera Gezeran oli dendin, Kusata addey Sabaki, Raafayme yara gidida Sifaya wodhis. Yaatin, Filisxeemeti xoonetidosona.
1CH 20:5 Filisxeemetara dendida hara olan qassi Ya7ira na7ay Eliyaani, toora toomay wandaraashe mela gidida, Geete addiya Gooliyada ishaa, Lahima wodhis.
1CH 20:6 Qassi hara oli Geeten dendis. He bessan issi wogga adussa addey de7ees. He addiyas issi issi kushiyaninne issi issi tohuwan usupun, woli bolla laatamanne oyddu biradheti de7oosona. Ika Raafa yara.
1CH 20:7 He uray Isra7eeletara qeeletida wode Dawita ishaa Sam7a na7ay Yoonataani iya wodhis.
1CH 20:8 Haysati Geeten de7iya Raafa yarata; enti Dawita kusheninne iya asaa kushen hayqidosona.
1CH 21:1 Xalehey Isra7eele bolla meto ehanaw koyidi, Dawiti Isra7eele asaa taybana mela denthethis.
1CH 21:2 Dawiti Iyo7aabakonne toora moconatako, “Daanepe Barsaabe gakanaw bidi, Isra7eele asaa taybite. Yaatidi, asaa tayboy aapuneko tana erisite” yaagis.
1CH 21:3 Shin Iyo7aabi, “Goday, ha de7iya ba asaa bolla xeetu kushe gujo! Ta godaw, kawaw, enti ubbay ta godaa aylleta gidokonaayee? Ta goday hessa melaba oothanaw ayis koyii? Isra7eele bolla ayis bala oothay?” yaagis.
1CH 21:4 Shin kawa qaalay Iyo7aaba xoonin, Iyo7aabi keyidi Isra7eele biitta ubbaa yuuyidi Yerusalaame simmis.
1CH 21:5 Iyo7aabi taybida asaa taybuwa Dawitas immis. Isra7eele biitta ubban mashshan oletanaw danda7iya issi 1,100,000 asati de7oosona. Qassi Yihuda biittan mashshan oletanaw danda7iya 470,000 asati de7oosona.
1CH 21:6 Iyo7aabi kawa kiitta dosiboonna gisho Leewetanne Biniyaame kochata taybeenna.
1CH 21:7 Xoossay hessan ufaytiboonna gisho Isra7eele seeris.
1CH 21:8 Dawiti Xoossaako, “Taani haysan gita nagara oothas. Shin ha77i nena woossayis; ne aylliya nagaraa atto ga; taani daro eeyaba hanas” yaagis.
1CH 21:9 Goday Dawita qoncethi be7iya Gaadeko haysada yaagis;
1CH 21:10 “Bada Dawitako, Goday, ‘Taani nena heedzu dooro bessayis; taani ne bolla oothana mela entafe taw issuwa doora’ yaagees” yaaga.
1CH 21:11 Gaadi Dawitako bidi, “Goday haysatape issuwa doora yaagees;
1CH 21:12 heedzu laytha kosha woyko heedzu ageena ne morketa kushen aadhada imetanaysa woyko heedzu gallas Godaa mashshay ne biitta shocanaysanne gado Isra7eele bolla ehiya hayqo kiitancho kiitteysafe awusa dooray? Tana kiittidaysas odanaba taw oda” yaagis.
1CH 21:13 Dawiti Gaadeko, “Taani daro un7etas. Godaa maarotay gita gidiya gisho taani iya kushen kundana; asa kushen kundike” yaagis.
1CH 21:14 Hessa gisho, Goday Isra7eele bolla gado yeddin, 70,000 Isra7eele asati hayqidosona.
1CH 21:15 Xoossay Yerusalaame dhaysanaw kiitancho kiittis. Shin kiitanchoy Yerusalaame dhaysanaw doomida wode Goday azzanis. Dhaysiya kiitanchuwako, “Agga! Hiza gidana!” yaagis. He wode Godaa kiitanchoy Yaabuse addiya Orna wudumma matan eqis.
1CH 21:16 Kiitanchoy ba mashsha ba kushen oykidi Yerusalaame dhaysanaw sa7apenne salope giddon eqidaysa Dawiti be7is. He wode Dawitinne cimati kayo ma7o ma7idi, sa7an gufannidosona.
1CH 21:17 Dawiti, “Asay taybetana mela oothiday tana gidikina? Naaqidaynne iitabaa oothiday tana. Shin ha dorsati ay oothidona? Abeeti Godaw, ta Xoossaw, hayyana ne kushey tananne ta soo asaa seero. Ne kushey ne asaa seeropo!” yaagis.
1CH 21:18 Godaa kiitanchoy Gaadeko haysada yaagis; “Dawiti Yaabuse addiya Orna wudumma bidi Godaas yarsho bessi gimbana mela oda” yaagis.
1CH 21:19 Godaa sunthan Gaadi odidaysa si7idi Dawiti bis.
1CH 21:20 He wode Orninne iya oyddu adde nayti wudumman giste qoxoosona. I guye simmidi kiitancho be7is; iyara de7iya oyddu nayti be7idi qosetidosona.
1CH 21:21 Dawiti Ornako yida wode Orni iya be7idi, wudummaafe gaxa keyidi ziggidi sarothis.
1CH 21:22 Dawiti, “Gadoy asaa bollafe kichana mela taani Godaas yarsho bessi keexana mela ne wudumma taw bayza. Taani new kumetha gatiya qanxana” yaagis.
1CH 21:23 Orni, “Eka; ta goday kawoy bana ufaysiyabaa ootho. Heko, boorat xuussa yarshos, katha bukiya miishiya eethanaw, giste kathaa yarshos immana. Taani ha ubbaa new immana” yaagis.
1CH 21:24 Shin kawoy Dawiti, “Akay, taani kumetha gate qanxada shammana. Taani nebaanne ta miishen shammonnaba ekada xuussa yarsho oothada Godaas yarshike” yaagis.
1CH 21:25 Dawiti wudumma usupun xeetu worqa santimen shammis.
1CH 21:26 Dawiti yan Godaas yarsho bessi keexis. Yaatidi xuussa yarshonne issifetetha yarsho yarshis. Godaa woossin, Goday xuussa yarshuwa bolla salope tama yeddidi iyaw zaaris.
1CH 21:27 Goday kiitanchuwa kiittin, kiitanchoy ba mashsha shoohuwan zaaris.
1CH 21:28 Dawiti, Goday iya woosa zaaridaysa be7idi, Yaabuse addiya Orna wudumman zaaridi yarshis.
1CH 21:29 Musey mela biittan giigisida, Godaa Dunkaaneynne xuussa yarsho bessay he wode Gaba7oonan goyinniya dhoqa bessan de7ees.
1CH 21:30 Shin Dawiti Godaa kiitanchuwa mashsha yayyida gisho Xoossaa oychanaw he bessaa baanaw danda7ibeenna.
1CH 22:1 Hessafe guye, Dawiti, “Godaa Xoossaa keethaynne Isra7eele asay xuussa yarsho bessay haysan gidana” yaagis.
1CH 22:2 Dawiti Isra7eele biittan de7iya bete asata shiishana mela kiittis. Xoossa keetha keexanaw shuchu masseysati massidi loythana mela enta giddofe dooris.
1CH 22:3 Dawiti, dirsa pengiya giigisanaw misimaarenne maxaafe qoxanaw daro biratanne zawi bayna naase birata giigisis.
1CH 22:4 Sidoonanne Xiroosa asati Dawitas ziga ehiya gisho Dawiti, tayboy bayna ziga giigisis.
1CH 22:5 Dawiti, “Ta na7ay Solomoney yooganne eratethan loohibeenna. Godaas keexetiya keethay biitta ubban eretidanne bonchetida lo77o keethe gidanaw bessees. Hessa gisho, iyaw koshshiyaba taani giigisana” yaagis. Dawiti hayqanaape sinthe darobaa giigisidi wothis.
1CH 22:6 Hessafe guye, Dawiti ba na7aa Solomone xeegidi, Godaas Isra7eele Xoossaas keethe keexana mela kiittis.
1CH 22:7 Dawiti Solomoneko, “Ta na7aw, taani Godaa ta Xoossaa sunthaas keethi keexanaw ta wozanan qopas.
1CH 22:8 Gidoshin, Godaa qaalay, ‘Neeni daro suuthi gussadasa; daro ola oletadasa. Neeni ha sa7aa bolla ta sinthan daro suuthi gussida gisho ta sunthaas keethe keexaka.
1CH 22:9 Gidoshin, saronne shempo gidida na7i yeletana; Iya yuushuwan de7iya morketape taani iya shempisana. Iya sunthay Solomone; taani iya kawotetha laythan Isra7eele asaas sarotethinne wopa immana.
1CH 22:10 I ta sunthaas keethe keexana. I ta na7a gidana; taani iyaw aawa gidana. Iya araata Isra7eelen merinaw minthada essana’ ” yaagis.
1CH 22:11 “Hiza ta na7aw, Goday neera gido. Godaa ne Xoossaa keetha keexana mela Goday kase odidaysada nena poliso.
1CH 22:12 Goday nena Isra7eele asaa bolla kawo oothiya wode, Godaa ne Xoossaa higgiya naagana mela Goday new cincatethinne akeeka immo.
1CH 22:13 Goday Muse baggara Isra7eele immida wogaanne kiitaa neeni naagiko ubbay new hanana. Minna; yayyofa; dagammofa, ufaysi qanxofa!
1CH 22:14 Taani taw danda7etida mela Godaa keetha keexanaw 3,400 kilo giraame worqa, 34,000 kilo giraame bira, zawi bayna naasenne birata shiishas; hessadaka mithinne shuchu giigisas. Neka ne baggara hessa bolla haraa gujanaw koshshees.
1CH 22:15 Ne matan daro oosanchoti shuchu qoo7eysatinne masseysati, anaaxetinne ubba ooso oothanaw danda7iya hiillanchoti de7oosona.
1CH 22:16 Worqa, bira, naasenne birata oothiya asaas zawi baawa. Hiza neeni oosuwa dooma; Goday neera gido” yaagis.
1CH 22:17 Isra7eele kaaletheysati ubbay ba na7aa Solomone maaddana mela Dawiti haysada yaagidi kiittis;
1CH 22:18 “Goday, hinte Xoossay ha77i gakanaw hintera de7eneyee? I hintena ubba baggara shempisibenneyee? Ha biittan de7iya asaa I ta kushen aathidi immida gisho ha biittay Godaasinne iya asaas haaretis.
1CH 22:19 Hiza Godaa hinte Xoossaa koyanaw hinte wozanaanne hinte shempuwa immite. Godaa sunthaas keexetida keethaa giddon Godaa caaqo Taabotiyanne Xoossaa geeshsha miisheta ehidi wothana mela dendidi Godaa Xoossaa keethaa keexite” yaagis.
1CH 23:1 Dawiti cimida wode ba na7aa Solomone Isra7eele bolla kawothis.
1CH 23:2 Dawiti Isra7eele kaaletheyisata ubbaa, kahinetanne Leeweta issife shiishis.
1CH 23:3 Laythi hastamanne iyape bolla gidida Leeweti taybetidi kumethi 38,000 gididosona.
1CH 23:4 Entafe Godaa keetha aawatethan aysiya 24,000 leeweta kawoy wothis; 6,000 leeweta halaqatanne pirda daynnata oothidi wothis.
1CH 23:5 4,000 leeweta penge naageysata oothidi wothis. Qassi Godaa galatanaw Dawiti giigisida yetha miishen Godaa galatiya 4,000 leeweta wothis.
1CH 23:6 Dawiti Leewe adde nayta Gedisoona, Qahaatanne Maraara enta yaran yaran heedzu cugan shaakis.
1CH 23:7 Gedisoona adde nayti La7idanenne Sam7a.
1CH 23:8 La7idane heedzu adde nayti Yi7eela, Zetaamanne Iyyu7eela.
1CH 23:9 Same7a heedzu adde nayti Salomoota, Hazi7eelanne Harana; haysati La7idane yaraa halaqata.
1CH 23:10 Sama7a oyddu adde nayti Yahaata, Ziiza, Usanne Bar7a.
1CH 23:11 Usi bayraa, Ziizi kaalo. Shin Usasinne Bar7as nayti daronna gisho enti issi yarada taybetidosona.
1CH 23:12 Qahaata oyddu adde nayti Anbaraama, Yisihaara, Kebroonanne Uzi7eela.
1CH 23:13 Anbaraama adde nayti Aaronanne Muse. Aaroninne iya kochay ubbaafe geeshshi gidana mela dummatidosona. Enti Godaa sinthan ixaane cuyisanaw, Godaas oothanawunne Godaa sunthan asaa anjanaw merinaw dummatidosona.
1CH 23:14 Xoossa ase gidida Muse nayta Leewe kochatara gathidi taybidosona.
1CH 23:15 Muse nayti Gedisoona Alaazara.
1CH 23:16 Gedisoona nayta giddofe halaqay Sabu7eela.
1CH 23:17 Alaazara na7ay Rahaaba. Alaazaras hara na7i baawa; shin Rahaabas nayti daro.
1CH 23:18 Yisihaara nayta halaqay Salomita.
1CH 23:19 Kebroona na7ay bayray Yiriya; kaaloy Amaare; heedzanthoy Yahazi7eela; oyddanthoy Yaqim7aama.
1CH 23:20 Uzi7eela bayra na7ay Mikiyaasa; kaaloy Yishiya.
1CH 23:21 Maraara nayti Mahilanne Musa. Mahila nayti Alaazaranne Qiisa.
1CH 23:22 Alaazari macca na7ape attishin, adde na7a yelonna hayqis. Hessa gisho, enta aawa ishaa Qiisa nayti enta machidosona.
1CH 23:23 Musa heedzu nayti Mahila, Ederanne Yiremoota.
1CH 23:24 Leewe yeletan banta kochaaninne soo asan banta sunthan mazgabetida Leewe kochati haysata. Laythi laatamanne iyape bolla gidida Leewe kochati ubbay Godaa Xoossaa keethan oothidosona.
1CH 23:25 Dawiti, “Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay ba asaa shempisis. Goday Yerusalaamen merinaw daana.
1CH 23:26 Leeweti Dunkaaniyanne iya giddon go7etiya miisheta hizape guye tookanaw bessenna” yaagis.
1CH 23:27 Dawita wursetha kiitan, laythi laatamanne iyape bolla gidida Leeweti taybetidosona.
1CH 23:28 Enti Godaa Xoossa keethan oothiya Aarona kochata maaddoosona. Godaa Xoossa keethan kareranne soora oothosona; geeshsha miishe ubbaa tunonna mela naagoosona.
1CH 23:29 Enti Xoossa sinthan wothiya uythaa, katha yarshos shiishiya dhiilliya, irshoy bayna uythaanne zaytera munuqetiya dhiilliya aawatethan aysoosona; Xoossa keethan maketiyabanne likeyabaa ubbaa aawatethan xeelloosona.
1CH 23:30 Qassi enti ubba gallas wontanne omarsi Godaa galatanawunne sabbanaw eqoosona.
1CH 23:31 Sambaata gallas, ageena xeeron, wogay kiittiya hara ba7aale gallasay gakiya wode Godaas xuussa yarsho yarshoosona. Entaw imetida taybuwadanne kiitaada ubba wode Godaa sinthan oothosona.
1CH 23:32 Dunkaaniyanne Godaa Xoossa keetha naagana melanne banta isha gidida, Aarona adde nayta, maaddana mela aawatethi Leewetas imetis.
1CH 24:1 Aarona kochati banta ooso maaran haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Aarona adde nayti Nadaaba, Abyooda, Alaazaranne Itamaara.
1CH 24:2 Shin Naadabeynne Abyooda na7a yelonna banta aawape sinthe hayqidosona. Hessa gisho, Alaazarinne Itamaari kahine gididosona.
1CH 24:3 Dawiti Alaazara yaraape Saadoqa, Itamaara yaraape Abimeleke ekidi Aarona kochata enta oosuwa maaran cugan cugan shaakis.
1CH 24:4 Alaazara yarata halaqati Itamaara yarata halaqatape dari bentida gisho Alaazara yarati tammanne usupun cugan shaaketin Itamaara yarati hospun cugan shaaketidosona.
1CH 24:5 Alaazara yarata giddoninne Itamaara yarata giddon Xoossa keetha halaqatinne Xoossa oosuwas bessiya halaqati de7iya gisho oosoy entaw saaman shaaketees.
1CH 24:6 Alaazara yaratinne Itamaara yarati banta maaran maaran saama kessidosona. Leewe koche gidida Natina7eela na7ay xaafey Shamayey enta mazgabees. Kawoynne iya moorinnati, kahiney Saadoqinne Abyataara na7ay Abimelekey, kahinetanne Leeweta yarata halaqati ubbay hessas marka.
1CH 24:7 Koyro saamay Yo7aaribas keyis; nam7anthoy Yadayas keyis.
1CH 24:8 Heedzanthoy Harimas keyis. Oyddanthoy Sa7oorimas keyis.
1CH 24:9 Ichashanthoy Malkiyas keyis. Usupunthoy Miyaaminas keyis.
1CH 24:10 Laapunthoy Aqoosas keyis; Hospunthoy Abiyas keyis.
1CH 24:11 Uddufunthoy Iyyasus keyis. Tammanthoy Sakanas keyis.
1CH 24:12 Tammanne issinthoy Eliyaseebas keyis. Tammanne nam7anthoy Yaqinas keyis.
1CH 24:13 Tammanne heedzanthoy Hupas keyis. Tammanne oyddanthoy Yeshebas keyis.
1CH 24:14 Tammanne ichashanthoy Bilgas keyis. Tammanne usupunthoy Imeras keyis.
1CH 24:15 Tammanne laapunthoy Heziras keyis. Tammanne hospunthoy Hafixeexas keyis.
1CH 24:16 Tammanne uddufunthoy Patahas keyis. Laatamanthoy Yezekelas keyis.
1CH 24:17 Laatamanne issinthoy Yakinas keyis. Laatamanne nam7anthoy Gamulas keyis.
1CH 24:18 Laatamanne heedzanthoy Dalayas keyis. Laatamanne oyddanthoy Maazas keyis.
1CH 24:19 Goday Isra7eele Xoossay enta mayza Aarona kiittin, I entaw wothida wogaatho, banta Xoossa keetha geliya wode, enti oothana maaray haysa.
1CH 24:20 Hara Leewe kochata halaqati, haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Yehidayi Sabu7eela baggara Amraama koche.
1CH 24:21 Yisheyi Rahaaba koche.
1CH 24:22 Yahaati Salomita baggara Yisihaara koche.
1CH 24:23 Yiriyey, Amaarey, Yahazi7eelinne Yiqam7aami Kebroona koche.
1CH 24:24 Shamiri Mikiyaasa baggara Uzi7eela koche.
1CH 24:25 Zakariyasi Mikiyaasa ishaa Yishiya baggara Uzi7eela koche.
1CH 24:26 Mahili, Musinne Ya7izi Maraara kochata.
1CH 24:27 Ya7iza heedzu adde nayti Shohaama, Zakuranne Ibara.
1CH 24:28 Mahila nam7u adde nayti Alaazaranne Qiisa. Alaazaras adde na7i baawa.
1CH 24:29 Qiisa Yirahima7eela geetetiya adde na7i de7ees.
1CH 24:30 Musa heedzu adde nayti Mahila, Ederanne Yiremoota. Haysati Leewe kochata halaqata.
1CH 24:31 Kase enta dabboti Aarona koche gidida kahineti oothidaysada haysatika kawoy Dawiti, Saadoqi, Abimelekey, kahinetanne Leeweta halaqati de7iya bessan saama yeggidosona. Bayraa ishaa soo asaasinne kaalo ishaa soo asaas issi gina saami wodhis.
1CH 25:1 Dawitinne Leeweta halaqati, Asaafa, Hemaananne Yedutuuna naytape suusul7en, diithaninne daalan tinbite odana mela dummayidosona. Ha oosuwas dummatida asaa sunthay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa.
1CH 25:2 Asaafa nayti Zakura, Yoosefa, Naatananne Asar7eela. Asaafa nayti Asaafape garsara oothosona; Asaafi kawa kiitan tinbite odees.
1CH 25:3 Yedutuuna nayti Gadaaliya, Xaara, Yashaya, Sam7a, Hasabayanne Matita. Ha usupunati maasinqon Godaa galatishenne bonchishe banta aawa, nabiya Yedutuunape garsara kiitetoosona.
1CH 25:4 Hemaana nayti Buqaya, Mataana, Uzi7eela, Sabu7eela, Yarmoota, Hanaaniya, Hanaana, Eli7aata, Gidalta, Oromanti7ezera, Yoshbaqaasha, Maalota, Hotiranne Mazi7aata.
1CH 25:5 Haysati ubbay kawas qoncethi be7iya Hemaana nayta. Xoossay immana gidaysada Hemaana dhoqu dhoqu oothana mela ha tammanne oyddu adde naytanne heedzu macca nayta iyaw immis.
1CH 25:6 Haysati ubbay Xoossa keethan daala qaathanaw, diithinne maasinqo kaa7idi goyinnanaw banta aawape garsara de7oosona. Asaafi, Yedutuuninne Hemaani kawuwape garsara de7oosona.
1CH 25:7 Hessati banta dabbotara gididi Xoossas shiiqiya mazmuren loohidaysata; enti kumethi 288.
1CH 25:8 Enti banta oosuwa shaakidi eranaw na7i cimi, astamaarey tamaarey shaahoy bayna saama yeggidosona.
1CH 25:9 Koyro saamay Asaafa na7aa Yoosefas keyis. Nam7antho saamay Gadallas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:10 Heedzantho saamay Zakuras keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:11 Oyddantho saamay Xaras keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:12 Ichashantho saamay Nataanas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:13 Usupuntho saamay Buqayas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:14 Laapuntha saamay Yishira7eelas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:15 Hospuntho saamay Yashayas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:16 Uddufuntho saamay Matanas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:17 Tammantho saamay Sam7as keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:18 Tammanne issintho saamay Uzi7eelas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:19 Tammanne nam7antho saamay Hasabayas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:20 Tammanne heedzantho saamay Sabu7eelas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:21 Tammanne oyddantho saamay Matitas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:22 Tammanne ichashantho saamay Yarmootas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:23 Tammanne usupuntho saamay Hanaana keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:24 Tammanne laapuntho saamay Yoshibaqaashas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:25 Tammanne hospuntho saamay Hanaaniyas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:26 Tammanne uddufuntho saamay Maalotas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:27 Laatamantho saamay Eli7aatas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:28 Laatamanne issintho saamay Hotiras keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:29 Laatamanne nam7antho saamay Gidaltas keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:30 Laatamanne heedzantho saamay Mahzi7aata keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 25:31 Laatamanne oyddantho saamay Oromanti7ezeras keyis; I, iya naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne nam7a.
1CH 26:1 Xoossaa keetha pengiya naageysati haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Koyroy Qore kochaafe Asaafa adde naytape Qore na7a Masulaama.
1CH 26:2 Masulaami laapun adde nayta yelis; enti banta yeletaa maaran Zakariyasa, Yidi7eela, Yozobaata, Yatini7eela,
1CH 26:3 Elama, Yihoonanne Elhoona.
1CH 26:4 Xoossay Obeed-Edooma anjida gisho, I hospun adde nayta yelis. Enti banta yeletaa maaran Shamaya, Yozabaata, Iyo7aasa, Sakara, Natina7eela,
1CH 26:5 Ami7eela, Yisakooranne Pulaata.
1CH 26:6 Obeed-Edooma na7ay Shamayey usupun adde nayta yelis; enti mino asi gidida gisho, banta aawa soo asaas halaqa gididosona.
1CH 26:7 Shamaya nayti Otina, Rafa7eela, Yobeedanne Elzabaada; enta ishati Elihuynne Samaki qara asata.
1CH 26:8 Haysati ubbay Obeed-Edooma kochata; enti, enta naytanne enta dabboti oosos mino. Obeed-Edooma kochati kumethi usupun tammanne nam7a.
1CH 26:9 Masulaamas mino naytinne mino dabboti de7oosona; enti kumethi tammanne hospuna.
1CH 26:10 Maraara yaraape Hosa geetetiya addiyas oyddu adde nayti de7oosona. Shimiri bayra na7a gidenna, shin iya aaway iya halaqa oothis.
1CH 26:11 Iya ishati Kalqe, Zabalanne Zakariyasa. Hosa naytinne iya dabboti kumethi tammanne heedza.
1CH 26:12 Xoossa keetha pengiya naageysati banta soo asaa halaqata cugan cugan shaaketidosona. Hara Leewetada entaka Xoossa keetha oosoy shaahon gakis.
1CH 26:13 Issi issi pengiya naaganaw banta soo asan asan na7a cima goonna saama yeggidosona.
1CH 26:14 Doloha Pengiya naaganaw saamay Salamas keyis. Lo77o zore zoriya iya na7aa Zakariyasa pudeha Pengiya naaganaw saami keyis.
1CH 26:15 Obeed-Edoomas dugeha pengiya naaganaw saami keyis. Iya naytas buqura minjiya keethaa naaganaw saami keyis.
1CH 26:16 Wuloha pengiyanne qommo baggara de7iya Shalekota pengiya naaganaw saami Sufimasinne Hosas keyis. Naagoy maaran maaran gakees.
1CH 26:17 Gallas gallas doloha baggara usupun, pudeha baggara oydda, dugeha baggara oyddu Leeweti naagoosona. Qassi buqura minjiya keethaa nam7u nam7u Leeweti naagoosona.
1CH 26:18 Wuloha baggara dabaabako efiya ogiya oyddu, qassi dabaaba nam7u Leeweti naagoosona.
1CH 26:19 Hiza Qoresinne Maraara kochaas imetida penge naago oosoy haysa.
1CH 26:20 Akiya geetetiya Leewey Xoossa keethan de7iya buquranne Xoossas dummayi wothida imotata naaganaw shuumetis.
1CH 26:21 Gedisoona na7aa Laadanna yaraape Yi7eeli dumma dumma soo asaas aawates.
1CH 26:22 Yi7eela nayti Zetaamanne iya ishaa Iyyu7eela; enti Xoossa keethan de7iya buqura naaganaw shuumetidosona.
1CH 26:23 Amraama, Yisihaara, Kebroonanne Uzi7eela yaratas oosoy shaaketidi imetis.
1CH 26:24 Muse na7aa Gedisoona yara gidida Sabu7eeli Xoossa keethan de7iya buqura naageysata halaqata bolla shuumetis.
1CH 26:25 I Gedisoona ishaa Alaazara baggara Salomootas dabbo. Al77azari Rahaabiya yelis; Rahaabi Yeshaya yelis; Yeshayi Yoraama yelis; Yoraami Zikira yelis; Zikiri Salomita yelis.
1CH 26:26 Salomootinne iya dabboti kawoy Dawiti, iya soo asaa halaqati, shaalaqati, mato halaqatinne toora moconata Xoossas dummayida miishe ubbaa bolla shuumetidosona.
1CH 26:27 Ha asati olan di7etidi yida miishetape baggaa Xoossa keethan dummayidi wothidosona.
1CH 26:28 Qoncethi be7iya Sameeli, Qiisa na7ay Saa7oli, Neera na7ay Abeneerinne Xaruya na7ay Iyo7aabi kase dummayidi wothida imota ubbaa Salomootinne iya dabboti naagoosona.
1CH 26:29 Yisihaara yaratape Kanaaneynne iya nayti Xoossa keethafe karera de7iya ooson Isra7eele asaa aysanawunne daynnatanaw shuumetidosona.
1CH 26:30 Kebroona yaratape Hashabinne iya dabboti 1,700 mino asati, Godaa oosuwasinne kawa oosuwas Yordaanosepe wuloha baggara de7iya Isra7eele asaa bolla shuumetidosona.
1CH 26:31 Kebroona yarata mazgabiya maaran Yiriyi enta halaqa. Dawiti kawotida oytamantho laythan mazgaben koyin enta asaa giddofe mino asati Galada biittan Ya7izeera geetetiya bessan bentidosona.
1CH 26:32 Enta soo asaas halaqa gidida Yiriya dabboti minoti 2,700. Kawoy Dawiti Xoossa oosuwasinne kawa oosuwas Robeela, Gaadenne Minaase kochatape baggata bolla enta shuumis.
1CH 27:1 Banta cugan cugan kawotethaa aysiya Isra7eele soo asaa halaqati, shaalaqatinne mato halaqati haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Issi issi cugan 24,000 asati de7oosona. Issi issi cugay laythan issi ageena maaran maaran kawotetha ooso oothanaw keyees.
1CH 27:2 Koyro ageenan keya cugaa kaalethey Zabdi7eela na7aa Yashobi7aama; iya cugan 24,000 asi de7ees.
1CH 27:3 Yashobi7aami Paaresa koche; I koyro ageenas tora moconata.
1CH 27:4 Nam7antho ageenan keyiya cugaa kaalethey Ahoha addiya Dodaya; iya cugan 24,000 asi de7ees. He cugaa kaalethiya nam7antho halaqay Mikloota.
1CH 27:5 Heedzantho ageenan keyiya cugaa kaalethey kahiniya Yoodahe na7aa Banaya; iya cugan 24,000 asi de7ees.
1CH 27:6 Banayi hastamu eretida asata giddon mino asi; qassi hastamata halaqa. Iya bessan iya na7ay Amzabadi halaqa gidis.
1CH 27:7 Oyddantho ageenan keyiya cugaa kaalethey Iyo7aaba ishaa Asaheela; iya cugan 24,000 asi de7ees. Iya bessan iya na7ay Zabadi halaqa gidis.
1CH 27:8 Ichashantho ageenan keyiya cugaa kaalethey Yisihaara yaraape Shamhuuta; iya cugan 24,000 asi de7ees.
1CH 27:9 Usupuntho ageenan keyiya cugaa kaalethey Tequhe addiya Iska na7aa Ira; iya cugan 24,000 asi de7ees.
1CH 27:10 Laapuntha ageenan keyiya cugaa kaalethey Efreema koche gidida Piloona addiya Selesa; iya cugan 24,000 asi de7ees.
1CH 27:11 Hospuntha ageenan keyiya cuga kaalethey Husha addiya Sibakaya; iya cugan 24,000 asi de7ees. Sibakayi Yihuda kochenne Zaara yara.
1CH 27:12 Uddufuntho ageenan keyiya cugaa kaalethey Biniyaame koche gidida Anatoote addiya Abi7ezera; iya cugan 24,000 asi de7ees.
1CH 27:13 Tammantho ageenan keyiya cuga kaalethey Naxoofa addiya Zaara yara gidida Mahira; iya cugan 24,000 asi de7ees.
1CH 27:14 Tammanne issintho ageenan keyiya cugaa kaalethey Efreema koche gidida Pir7atoona addiya Banaya; iya cugan 24,000 asi de7ees.
1CH 27:15 Tammanne nam7antho ageenan keyiya cugaa kaalethey Gotoniyala yaraape gidida Naxoofa Heldaya; iya cugan 24,000 asi de7ees.
1CH 27:16 Isra7eele kochata aysanaw shuumetidaysati haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Robeela kochaa aysey Zikira na7aa Alaazara. Simoona kochaa aysey Ma7ika na7aa Safaaxa.
1CH 27:17 Leewe kochaa aysey Qamu7eela na7aa Hasabaya. Aarona kochaa aysey Saadoqa.
1CH 27:18 Yihuda kochaa aysey Dawita ishaa Elihu. Yisakoora kochaa aysey Mika7eela na7aa Omira.
1CH 27:19 Zabloona kochaa aysey Abdiyu na7aa Yashimaya. Niftaaleme kochaa aysey Azri7eela na7aa Yarmoota.
1CH 27:20 Efreema kochaa aysey Azaaza na7aa Hose7a. Minaase kochaafe baggaa aysey Padaya na7aa Iyyu7eela.
1CH 27:21 Galadan de7iya Minaase kochaafe baggaa aysey Zakariyasa na7aa Ido. Biniyaame kochaa aysey Abeneera na7aa Ye7isi7eela.
1CH 27:22 Daane kochaa aysey Yirohaama na7aa Azari7eela. Haysati Isra7eele kochaa ayseysata.
1CH 27:23 Goday Isra7eele asaa salo xoolintoda darsana gida gisho Dawiti laatamu laythinne iyape garsara de7eyisata taybon gelsibeenna.
1CH 27:24 Xaruya na7ay Iyo7aabi asaa taybo doomidi wursonna aggis. Asaa taybida gisho Goday Isra7eele asaa bolla hanqetida gisho enta tayboy kawa Dawita taarike mazgaben xaafetibeenna.
1CH 27:25 Kawo buqura minjiya bessaa aawatethan aysiya asaa sunthay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Adi7eela na7aa Azmooti kawo keetha buqura aawatethan aysees. Ooziyana na7ay Yoonataani gaxaren, katamaninne gutan de7iya kawo keetha miisheta aawatethan aysees.
1CH 27:26 Kaluba na7ay Iziri goshshanchota aawatethan aysees.
1CH 27:27 Rama addey Same7i woyne gadeta aawatethan aysees. Safaama addey Zabdi woyne ushsha minjiya keethaa aawatethan aysees.
1CH 27:28 Gadara addey Ba7al-Hanani zuma bolla de7iya zayte shamahuwanne boobba aawatethan aysees. Zayte wothiya keethaa aawatethan aysey Iyo7aasa.
1CH 27:29 Saarona denban heemetiya mehiya aawatethan aysey Saarona addiya Saxira. Zangaaran heemetiya mehiya aawatethan aysey Adilaya na7aa Shaafaxa.
1CH 27:30 Gimaleta aawatethan aysey Isma7eela addiya Ubisa. Hareta aawatethan aysey Meronoota addiya Yehidaya.
1CH 27:31 Dorsatanne deeshata aawatethan aysey Agara addey Yaziza. Haysati ubbay Dawita shaluwa bolla aawateyisata.
1CH 27:32 Dawita aawa ishay, xaafey Yoonataani akeekanne kawa zoriya asi. Hakmoona na7ay Yi7eeli kawa nayta tamaarsees.
1CH 27:33 Akxoofeli kawa zoreysa. Arka addey Kuussi kawa lagge.
1CH 27:34 Akxoofeli hayqin, iya bessan Banaya na7ay Yodaaheynne Abyataari kawa zoriya asi gididosona; Iyo7aabi kawa toora mocona.
1CH 28:1 Isra7eele halaqati ubbay Yerusalaamen shiiqana mela kawoy Dawiti kiittis. Hessa gisho, issi issi kochaa halaqati, kawo moorinnati, shaalaqati, mato halaqati, kawuwasinne kawa naytas de7iya shaluwanne mehiya ayseysati, kawo gadhon ootheysati, eretidanne mino asati ubbay Yerusalaamen shiiqidosona.
1CH 28:2 Kawoy Dawiti dendi eqidi haysada yaagis; “Ta ishato, ta asaw, si7ite! Godaa caaqo Taabotiya wothiyanne nu Xoossaa tohoy shempiya keethaa keexanaw ta wozanan qopas; koshshiyaba ubbaa giigisas.
1CH 28:3 Shin Xoossay, ‘Neeni olanchonne suuthi gussida asi gidiya gisho ta sunthaas keethe keexaka’ yaagis.
1CH 28:4 Taani Isra7eele bolla merinaw kawotanaada, Goday Isra7eele Xoossay ta aawa soope tana dooris. Kaalethanaada koyro Yihuda kochaa dooris; Yihuda kochaafe ta aawa soo asaa dooris; ta aawa nayta giddofe tana dooridi Isra7eele ubbaa bolla kawoyanaw dosis.
1CH 28:5 Goday taw daro nayta immis; ta nayta ubbaafe Godaa kawotetha araatan uttidi Isra7eele bolla kawotanaada ta na7aa Solomone dooris.
1CH 28:6 “Goday, ‘Ta keethaanne ta dabaaba keexanay ne na7aa Solomone. I taw na7a gidana mela taani iya dooras; taani iyaw aawa gidana.
1CH 28:7 I ha77i ootheysada ta kiitaanne ta higgiya minnidi naagiko taani iya kawotethaa merinaw minthana’ yaagis.
1CH 28:8 Hiza Godaa shiiqo gidida Isra7eele asa ubbay be7ishin, nu Xoossay si7ishin, Godaa hinte Xoossaa kiita ubbaa hinte minthidi naagana mela taani hintew odayis. Yaatiko, hinte ha lo77o biitta laattana; hinte naytaka merinaw laatisana.
1CH 28:9 “Solomone, ta na7aw, Xoossay asa wozananne qofa ubbaa eriya gisho ne aawa Xoossaa era; kumetha wozananinne shenen iyaw ootha. Neeni iya koyiko I new bentana; shin neeni iya aggiko I nena merinaw aggana.
1CH 28:10 Xoossaa keetha keexana mela Goday nena dooridaysa dogopa; ooso ubbaa minnada ootha” yaagis.
1CH 28:11 Hessafe guye, Dawiti ba na7aa Solomones Xoossa keethaa, barandaa, buqura minjiya keethaa, pooqiyanne giddo kifileta, hessadaka nagara atotetha kama wothiya kifiliya halchuwanne qofaa immis.
1CH 28:12 Dawiti Godaa keetha dabaaba keexanaw ba wozanan de7iya qofaa, iya yuushuwan de7iya ubba kifileta halchuwanne Xoossa keethaa buqura wothiya kifiliyanne Godaas dummatida imotata wothiya kifileta oosuwa qofaa immis.
1CH 28:13 Hessadaka Dawiti kahinetanne Leeweta ooso maara, Xoossa keetha ooso maaranne Xoossa keetha miisheta naagiya maara odiya qofaa iyaw immis.
1CH 28:14 Dumma dumma oosos go7etiya miisheta oothanaw maaddiya worqanne bira mizaanen likisidi Solomones immis.
1CH 28:15 Hessika xompe wothiya worqa kocatanne iya xompeta, xompe wothiya bira kocatanne iya xompeta,
1CH 28:16 Godaa sinthan uythu wothiya worqa xarpheezata, bira xarpheezata,
1CH 28:17 worqa qapheta, worqa kereta, worqa wancata, worqa xaarota, bira xaarota
1CH 28:18 ixaane cuyisiya geeshsha worqa saaxine, Godaa caaqo Taabotiya bolla banta qefiya miccidi kammiya kiruubeta wothiya worqa gaariya giigisiya halchuwa iyaw immis.
1CH 28:19 Dawiti, “Goday ba kushiya ta bolla wothidi ha xaafetida qofa ubbaa tana erisis” yaagis.
1CH 28:20 Dawiti ba na7aa Solomoneko, “Hiza minna! Oosuwa ootha! Goday ta Xoossay neera de7iya gisho yayyofa; dagammofa! Xoossa keetha oosoy poletana gakanaw Xoossay nena yeggennanne aggenna.
1CH 28:21 Xoossa keethan de7iya ooso ubbaas kahinetinne Leeweti shuumetidosona. Kushe hiilli de7iya asa ubbay nena ooso ubban maaddana. Halaqatinne asa ubbay new kiitetana” yaagis.
1CH 29:1 Hessafe guye, Kawoy Dawiti shiiqida asa ubbaa haysada yaagis; “Xoossay doorida ta na7aa Solomoney yooganne eratethan loohibeenna. Ha keexetana keethay asa keethi gidonashin Godaa Xoossaa keethi gidiya gisho oosoy gita.
1CH 29:2 Taani taw de7iya wolqa mela ta Xoossa keethaas worqan oosetiyabas worqaa, biran oosetiyabas bira, naase biratan oosetiyabas, naase birata, biratan oosetiyaba biratanne mithan oosetiyabas mithi giigisa wothas. Qassi margide, ibnebarade, dumma dumma mali de7iya alleeqo shuchata, al7o shuchatanne hara shuchata giigisada wothas.
1CH 29:3 Xoossa keetha taani daro dosiya gisho, taani ta Xoossa keethaas giigisidaysafe hara ta buzo shaluwape worqanne bira immas.
1CH 29:4 Keethaa godaa lanxanaw 100,000 kilo giraame Ofira worqanne 240,000 kilo giraame walahi bayna bira immas.
1CH 29:5 Kushe hiillanchoti oothana ooso ubbaas worqan oosetiyabas worqaa, biran oosetiyabas bira immas. Yaatin, hachi hintefe ba shenen bana Godaas dummayey oonee?” yaagis.
1CH 29:6 Isra7eele kochata soo asaa halaqati, kochata halaqati, shaalaqati, mato halaqatinne kawo moorinnati banta shenen bantaw de7iyaba dosan immidosona.
1CH 29:7 Enti Xoossa keetha oosuwas 170,000 kilo giraame worqaa, 340,000 kilo giraame bira, 620,000 kilo giraame naase biratanne 3,000,000 kilo giraame birata immidosona.
1CH 29:8 Al77o shuchi de7iya asa ubbay buqura aysiya Gedisoona yara gidida Yi7eela baggara Godaa Xoossa keetha buqura minjiya keethaas immis.
1CH 29:9 Asay ba shenen ba kumetha wozanan Godaas immida gisho ufaytis; kawoy Dawitika daro ufaytis.
1CH 29:10 Hessa gisho, Dawiti deriya ubbaa sinthan haysada yaagidi Godaa galatis; “Abeeti Godaw, nu aawa Isra7eele Xoossaw neeni merinaape merinaw galateta.
1CH 29:11 Abeeti Godaw, saloninne sa7an de7iya ubbay nebaa! Gitatethi, wolqi, bonchoy, xoonoynne angi nebaa! Abeeti Godaw, maati nebaa; neeni ubbaafe bollanne huuphe.
1CH 29:12 Duretethinne bonchoy neepe yees; neeni ubbaba haarasa. Wolqinne minotethi ne kushena; neeni asa ubbaa gitanne mino oothanaw danda7aasa.
1CH 29:13 Ha77ika nu Xoossaw, nuuni nena galatoos; ne boncho sunthaa sabboos.
1CH 29:14 “Nuuni haysa mela immanaw tanne ta asay oonee? Ubbay neepe yees; nuuni ne kushepe ekidaba new zaaridi immida.
1CH 29:15 Kase nu aawatada nuka ne sinthan bete asinne imathe. Ha sa7an nu de7o laythay ufaysi bayna kuya mela.
1CH 29:16 Abeeti Godaw, nu Xoossaw, ne geeshsha sunthaas nuuni keethe keexanaw shiishida ubbay ne kushepe yidaba; ubbay nebaa.
