2CH 25:13 Shin he wode Amasiyaasi baara olas boonna mela guye zaarida Isra7eele olanchoti Samaarepe Beet-Horona gakanaw de7iya Yihuda katamata olidosona. Enti Yihuda asaape heedzu mukulu wodhidi daro di7o ekidosona.
2CH 25:14 Amasiyaasi Edoometa wodhidi simmiya wode enta eeqata ekidi yis. Enta xoosse oothi essidi enta goyinnis; ixaane cuyisis.
2CH 25:15 Godaa hanqoy Amasiyaasa bolla eexin, Goday Amasiyaasako nabe kiittis. He nabey bidi, “Banta asaa ne kushepe ashshanaw danda7iboona xoossata ayis zore oychadii?” yaagis.
2CH 25:16 Nabey buroo oda bolla de7ishin kawoy, “Nena kawo zoriya asi oothiday oonee? Si77i ga! Ne ayis hayqanaw koyay?” yaagis. Nabey odaa essidi, “Ne haysa oothida gishonne ta zoriya si7onna ixida gisho Xoossay nena dhaysanaw qopidaysa ha77i eras” yaagis.
2CH 25:17 Hessafe guye, Yihuda kawoy Amasiyaasi bana zoriya asatara zoretidi, Isra7eele kawa Iyyu na7aa na7aa, Iyo7akaaza na7aa, Iyo7aasako ase kiittidi, “Haaya; ane nam7ay olaa gahetoos” yaagidi mandis.
2CH 25:18 Isra7eele kawoy Iyo7aasi Yihuda kawa Amasiyaasako haysada yaagis; “Libaanosen de7iya kinchotey Libaanosen de7iya zigaako kiita yeddidi, ‘Ne na7iw ta na7aas imma’ yaagis. Shin Libaanosen de7iya issi do7i yaara aadhishe kinchotiya yedhis.
2CH 25:19 ‘Taani Edoome xoonas’ gada ne wozanan otoron kumadasa. Shin ha77i ne son wopu gada utta; ne bollanne Yihuda bolla metonne dhayo ehanaw ayis denthethay?” yaagidi zaaris.
2CH 25:20 Shin Amasiyaasi si7onna ixis. Enti Edoome xoossata goyinnida gisho Xoossay enta, enta morketa kushen aathidi immanaw koyis.
2CH 25:21 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele kawoy Iyo7aasi olanaw keyin inne Yihuda kawoy Amasiyaasi Yihudan de7iya Beet-Sameesan ola gahetidosona.
2CH 25:22 Yihuda asay xoonetidosona; Yihuda asa ubbay baqatidi banta soo soo bidosona.
2CH 25:23 Kawoy Iyo7aasi Akaziyaasa na7aa na7aa, Iyo7aasa na7aa, Yihuda kawa Amasiyaasa Beet-Sameesan di77idi, Yerusalaame ehis. Efreema dirsa pengiyafe bidi maazane pengiya gakanaw de7iya oyddu xeetu wadha gidiya Yerusalaame dirsa gimbiya laallis.
2CH 25:24 Xoossa keethan de7iya worqanne bira ubbaa, Obeed-Edoomey naagiya miishiyanne kawo gadhon de7iya miishiya ubbaa ekis; qassi oythu oothidi oykida asata ekidi Samaare simmis.
2CH 25:25 Iyo7akaaza na7ay, Isra7eele kawoy Iyo7aasi hayqidaape guye Iyo7aasa na7ay, Yihuda kawoy Amasiyaasi tammanne ichashu laythi de7is.
2CH 25:26 Amasiyaasi oothidaba ubbay koyrope wursethi gakanaw Yihuda kawotanne Isra7eele kawota taarike maxaafan xaafetidi de7ees gidennee?
2CH 25:27 Amasiyaasi Godaa kaalo aggidaape guye enti iya bolla Yerusalaamen maqetidosona. I Laakiso baqatis. Shin enti iya geedo ase kiittin enti iya yan wodhidosona.
2CH 25:28 Iya aha paran caani ehidi, Dawita kataman iya mayzatara moogidosona.
2CH 26:1 Hessafe guye, Yihuda asa ubbay tammanne usupun laythi gidida Ooziyana iya aawa Amasiyaasa bessan kawothidosona.
2CH 26:2 Iya aaway Amasiyaasi hayqidaape guye I Eloota katamaa zaari keexis.
2CH 26:3 Ooziyani kawotiya wode iyaw laythi tammanne usupuna; I Yerusalaamen ishatammanne nam7u laythi kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Yikoolo; iya Yerusalaame maccas.
2CH 26:4 Iya aaway Amasiyaasi oothidaysada ika Godaa sinthan suureba oothis.
2CH 26:5 Xoossas yashshi tamaarsida Zakariyasa wode I Xoossas ammanetidi oothis. Godaa I koyida wode ubban Xoossay iya anjis.
2CH 26:6 Ooziyani Filisxeemetara oletanaw keyidi Gaate katamaanne iya heera, Yabina katamaanne iya heeranne Ashdooda katamaanne iya heera laallis. Yaatidi Ashdooda katamaa mataninne Filisxeeme giddon katamata keexis.
2CH 26:7 Xoossay Ooziyaanas Filisxeemeta, Gurbaalan de7iya Arabetanne Ma7uuneta bolla xoono immis.
2CH 26:8 Amooneti Ooziyaanas giiridosona. Ooziyani daro minnida gisho iya sunthay Gibxe zawa gakanaw keyis.
2CH 26:9 Ooziyani Maazane Pengiya matan, Zangaara Pengiya mataninne dirsaa Maazaniya matan adussa gimbe shakota essidi, Yerusalaame baasuwa minthis.
2CH 26:10 Iyaw zuma xaphoninne denban daro mehey de7iya gisho he bessatan adussa gimbe shakota gimbidi daro haatha ollata bookis. I goshshe dosiya gisho dere bollanne aradda biittan iyaw daro goshshanchotinne woyney tokeysati de7oosona.
2CH 26:11 Ooziyaanas olaw giigida daro olanchoti de7oosona. Olanchota xaafey Yi7eelinne halaqay Ma7iseyi olanchota sunthaa mazgaben xaafidosona. Enta halaqay Hanaana.
2CH 26:12 Banta aawata soo asaa bolla halaqatiya mino asati nam7u mukulunne usupun xeeta.
2CH 26:13 Kawa morketara oletidi, banta kumetha wolqan kawa maaddanaw keyiya heedzu xeetanne laapun mukulunne ichashu xeetu olanchoti enta garsan de7oosona.
2CH 26:14 Ooziyani olanchota ubbaas gondalle, toora, birata barneexa, tiran ma7iya xurure, dongenne yambarsha shuchu giigisis.
2CH 26:15 Ooziyani Yerusalaamen de7iya hiillanchoti wochiya adussa gimbe shakotanne katamaa dirsa gimbe maazaneta bolla donge dukiya miishetanne gita gita shuchata pixiridi holiya miisheta oosisis. Xoossay iya maaddin I daro minnis; iya sunthay ubba bessan keyis.
2CH 26:16 Shin Ooziyani minnida wode otortis; otoroy iya kundethas gathis. Ooziyani Godaa ba Xoossa ammanetona ixidi ixaane cuyisiya bessan ixaane cuyisanaw Xoossa keethi gelis.
2CH 26:17 Kahiney Azaariyasinne mino gidida hospun tammu Godaa kahineti iya kaallidi gelidosona.
2CH 26:18 Kahineti iyako, “Ooziyana, neeni Godaas ixaane cuyisanaw bessaaka. Ixaane cuyisanaw bessey, geeyidi de7iya Aarona koche gidida kahineti xalaala. Ha geeshsha bessaafe keya! Neeni Godaa Xoossa bolla nagara oothadasa; neeni iyape boncho demmaka” yaagidosona.
2CH 26:19 Gidoshin, ixaane cuyisanaw ba kushen ixaane cuyisiya miishe oykidi de7ishe hanqetis. Ooziyani kahineta hanqetishe Xoossa keethan ixaane cuyisiya bessaa matan kahineta sinthan eqidashin, iya som7on baro hargey bentis.
2CH 26:20 Kahine halaqay Azaariyasinne hara kahineti ubbay iya xeelliya wode iya som7on baro hargey bentidaysa be7idi, ellesidi iya Xoossa keethafe kessidosona. Ika Goday iya seeridaysa erida gisho ellesidi yaape keyidi bis.
2CH 26:21 Kawoy Ooziyani hayqana gakanaw he hargiyara de7is; Xoossa keethi gelonna mela digetis. He hargiya gaason dumma keethan barka de7is. He wode iya na7ay Iyo7atami, kawo gadho aawatethan oykidi biitta haarees.
2CH 26:22 Kawoy Ooziyani oothida haraba ubbaa koyrope wursethi gakanaw Amoxe na7ay, nabey Isayaasi xaafis.
2CH 26:23 Ooziyani hayqidi ba mayzata gakis. Asay iya, “Baro hargen oyketidaysa” yaagidi, kawota duufuwa matan moogidosona. I hayqin iya bessan iya na7ay Iyo7atami kawotis.
2CH 27:1 Iyo7atami kawotiya wode iyaw laythi laatamanne ichasha; I Yerusalaamen tammanne usupun laythi kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Yarusho; iya Saadoqa na7a.
2CH 27:2 Iya aaway Ooziyani oothidaysada Iyo7atami Godaa sinthan suureba oothis. Iya aaway Xoossa keethi gelidaysada I gelibeenna; gidoshin, asay nagara ooso aggibeenna.
2CH 27:3 Iyo7atami Xoossa keethi geliya Qommo Pengiya zaaridi oothis; Yerusalaame Ofeela deriya bolla daro ooso oothis.
2CH 27:4 Derey dariya Yihuda biittan katamata keexis; wori dariya zumaa bolla miixanne adussa gimbe shakota gimbis.
2CH 27:5 Iyo7atami Amoone kawuwara oletidi xoonis. Amooneti he laythi heedzu mukulunne oyddu xeetu kilo giraame bira, tammu mukulu kuntaale gidiya gistenne tammu mukulu kuntaale gidiya banga iyaw giiridosona. Amooneti nam7antho laythinne heedzantho laythi hessada iyaw giiridosona.
2CH 27:6 Iyo7atami Godaa ba Xoossaa sinthan suure hemetida gisho daro minnis.
2CH 27:7 Iyo7atama wode oosetida oosoti, I oletida olaynne I oothidaba ubbay Isra7eele kawotanne Yihuda kawota taarike maxaafan xaafetis.
2CH 27:8 Iyo7atami kawotiya wode iyaw laythi laatamanne ichasha; I Yerusalaamen tammanne usupun laythi kawotis.
2CH 27:9 Iyo7atami hayqidi ba mayzata gakis. Enti iya Dawita kataman moogidosona. Iya bessan iya na7ay Akaazi kawotis.
2CH 28:1 Akaazi kawotiya wode iyaw laythi laatama; I Yerusalaamen tammanne usupun laythi kawotis. Akaazi ba mayzay Dawiti suureba oothidaysada Godaa sinthan suureba oothibeenna;
2CH 28:2 I kase de7ida Isra7eele kawota ogiyan hemetis. Gujidi, Ba7aale eeqa goyinnanaw misileta medhis.
2CH 28:3 Hinooma Zangaaran ixaane cuyisis; Goday Isra7eele asaa sinthafe gooddidi kessida asaa, ixetida ogiya kaallidi ba adde nayta taman xuuggidi eeqas yarshis.
2CH 28:4 Akaazi dhoqa goyinno bessatan, dere huuphenne mitha kuya garsan yarsho yarshisinne ixaane cuyisis.
2CH 28:5 Hessa gisho, Goday iya Xoossay iya Soore kawa kushen aathidi immis. Enti iya xoonidi, iya asaape darota di77idi, Damasqo efidosona. Qassi, Goday iya Isra7eele kawa kushen aathidi immin, kawoy iita shochi shocis.
2CH 28:6 Yihuda asay Godaa, banta mayzata Xoossaa aggida gisho Ramala na7ay Paaquhey Yihuda olanchotape issi xeetanne laatamu mukulu mino asata issi gallas wodhis.
2CH 28:7 Efreema koche gidida mino olanchoy Zikiri, kawa na7aa Ma7iseya, kawo gadho shuuma Azirqaamanne kawa kaallidi de7iya Elqaana wodhis.
2CH 28:8 Isra7eele asay banta dabbotape nam7u xeetu mukulu maccasa, adde naytanne macca nayta di77idosona; enti daro di7uwa ekidi Samaare bidosona.
2CH 28:9 Godaa nabey Odeeda geetetiya addey Samaaren de7ees. Odeedi Samaare biya olanchotara gahetanaw keyidi, “Goday, hinte aawata Xoossay Yihuda hanqetida gisho hinte kushen aathidi immis. Shin hinte enta salo gakida hanqon wodhideta.
2CH 28:10 Hessi gidonna ixin Yihudanne Yerusalaame maccanne addiya hinte aylle oothanaw qopeeta. Yaatin, hinte entada hanidi Godaa, hinte Xoossaa bolla nagara oothideta gideketii?
2CH 28:11 Ha77i ta hintew odeysa si7ite. Godaa hanqoy hinte bolla wodhida gisho hinte di77idi, qachida hinte dabbota yeddite” yaagis.
2CH 28:12 Hessafe guye, Efreema kochaa halaqatape Yohaanana na7ay Azaariyasi, Mashilmoota na7ay Baraki, Salooma na7ay Yiziqanne Hadilaya na7ay Amaasi olape simmidaysata bolla dendidosona.
2CH 28:13 Enti “He di7etida asata nuuko ehopite! Kase nuuni Godaa bolla oothida nagaraanne naaquwa bolla haraa gujeeta. Koyroka nu nagaray daro gidiya gisho Isra7eele bolla Godaa hanqoy wodhis” yaagidosona.
2CH 28:14 Hessa gisho, olanchoti di7etida asatanne miishiya halaqata sinthaninne de7iya sinthan immidosona.
2CH 28:15 Sunthay haysafe qommon xaafetida asati dendi eqidi, di7etida asaa ekidosona. Enta giddon kallo de7eysatas di7uwape ma7onne caamma immidosona. Enta muzidosonanne ushshidosona; enta madunthaa bolla zayte tiyidosona. Daaburidaysata hare togisidi enta ishatako zambi de7iya Iyaarko katama efidosona. Hessafe guye, enti Samaare simmidosona.
2CH 28:16 He wode kawoy Akaazi Asoore kawoy bana maaddana mela kiita yeddis.
2CH 28:17 Edoome asati nam7antho Yihuda bolla dendidi, daro asaa di77idi efidosona.
2CH 28:18 Filisxeemeti zuma xaphoninne Yihuda gadhan, Negebe mela biittan de7iya katamata olidi Beet-Sameesa, Eloona, Gaderoota, Sooko, Timina, Gimizonne enta heeran de7iya gutata oykidi yan de7idosona.
2CH 28:19 Yihuda kawoy Akaazi Yihuda asaa nagara oosisida gishonne Godaas ammanetibona gisho Goday Yihuda kawushis.
2CH 28:20 Asoore kawoy Telgeltelfelisoori Akaazako yidi iya meto bessisipe attishin, maaddibeenna.
2CH 28:21 Akaazi Xoossa keethafe, kawo gadhopenne halaqatape darobaa ekidi, Asoore kawas immis. Shin hessi iya aykoka maaddibeenna.
2CH 28:22 Kawoy Akaazi un7etida wode Godaas ammanetona ixidi meto bolla meto gujis.
2CH 28:23 Bana xoonida Damasqo xoossatas yarshishe, “Soore kawota xoossati enta maaddida gisho tanaka enti maaddana mela taani entaw yarshana” yaagis. Shin he xoossati iyawunne Isra7eele asaa ubbaas dhayo ehidosona.
2CH 28:24 Akaazi Xoossa keetha miisheta ubbaa shiishidi tincherethis. Xoossa keethaa pengeta gordis. Yerusalaamen dumma dumma bessan baw yarsho bessi keexis.
2CH 28:25 Akaazi hara xoossatas ixaane cuyisanaw Yihudan de7iya katamata ubban dhoqa goyinno bessata medhis. Yaatidi Godaa, ba aawata Xoossa hanqethis.
2CH 28:26 Heko, Akaaza woden oosetida hara oosoti koyrope wursethi gakanaw Yihuda kawotanne Isra7eele kawota taarike maxaafan xaafetis.
2CH 28:27 Akaazi hayqidi, ba mayzata gakis. Yerusalaame kataman iya moogidosona; shin iya Isra7eele kawota duufuwan moogibookonna. Iya bessan iya na7ay Hizqiyaasi kawotis.
2CH 29:1 Hizqiyaasi kawotiya wode iyaw laythi laatamanne ichasha; I Yerusalaamen laatamanne uddufun laythi kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Abu; iya Zakariyasa na7a.
2CH 29:2 Iya mayzay Dawiti oothidaysada Hizqiyaasi Godaa sinthan suureba oothis.
2CH 29:3 Hizqiyaasi ba kawotida koyro laythan, koyro ageenan, Xoossa keethaa pengeta dooyidi oorathis.
2CH 29:4 Kahinetanne Leeweta Xoossa keethaa doloha baggara de7iya dabaaban shiishis.
2CH 29:5 Entako, “Leeweto, ta odeysa si7ite! Hintenatethaa geeshshite; Godaa hinte aawata Xoossa keethaa geeshshite; Xoossa keethaa tunisiyaba ubbaa diggite.
2CH 29:6 Nu aawati ammanetibokona; Godaa, nu Xoossaa sinthan iitabaa oothidosona. Enti Godaa aggidi, Goday de7iya bessaafe banta som7o hara soo zaaridi, iyaw banta zokuwa zaaridosona.
2CH 29:7 Qassi, enti Xoossa keethaa pengeta gordidosona; xompeta toysidosona. Xoossa keethan Isra7eele Xoossaas ixaane cuyisibookona woyko xuussa yarsho yarshibookona.
2CH 29:8 Hessa gisho, Godaa hanqoy Yihuda bollanne Yerusalaame bolla wodhis. Hinte, hinte ayfen be7eysada Goday enta bolla yashshi, dagamanne hirga yeddis.
2CH 29:9 Hessa gaason, nu aawati mashshan hayqidosona; nu naytinne nu macheti di7etidosona.
2CH 29:10 Godaa hanqoy nu bollafe kichana mela taani Godaara, Isra7eele Xoossara caaqanaw ta wozanan qopas.
2CH 29:11 Ta nayto, hinte Godaa sinthan eqana mela, iyaw oothana mela, iya oosancho gidana melanne ixaane cuyisana mela Goday hintena doorida gisho qelli goopite” yaagis.
2CH 29:12 He bessan de7iya Leeweti haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Qahaata yaraape Amasaya na7aa Mahaatanne Azaariyasa na7aa Iyyu7eela. Maraara yaraape Abda na7aa Qiisanne Yihali7eela na7aa Azaariyasa. Gedisoona yaraape Ziima na7aa Iyo7akinanne Yo7aaha na7aa Edena.
2CH 29:13 Elxafaana yaraape Shimiranne Uzi7eela. Asaafa yaraape Zakariyasanne Mataana.
2CH 29:14 Amaana yaraape Yi7eelanne Same7a. Edotaame yaraape Shamayanne Uzi7eela.
2CH 29:15 Enti banta dabbota shiishidi bantana geeshidaape guye kawoy enta kiittidaysada Godaa higgiyada Xoossa keethi geeshsho doomidosona.
2CH 29:16 Hessa gisho, kahineti Godaa keethaa geeshshanaw gelidosona; Xoossa keethaa giddon de7iya tunaba ubbaa kessidi, Xoossa keethaa dabaaba ehidosona. Yaatin Leeweti ekidi Qediroona Zangaaran holidosona.
2CH 29:17 Enti koyro ageenan, koyro gallas Xoossa keethaa geeshsho doomidosona; he ageenan hospuntho gallas barandaa gakidosona. Hara hospun gallas Xoossa keethaa goyinnoos giigisidosona. Koyro ageenan tammanne usupuntho gallas enti oosuwa polidosona.
2CH 29:18 Leeweti kawa Hizqiyaasako gelidi, “Nuuni Xoossa keethaa, xuussa yarsho bessaanne yarsho bessan go7etiya miishe ubbaa, Godaa sinthan wothiya uythaa xarpheezanne he xarpheezan de7iya miisheta ubbaa geeshshida.
2CH 29:19 Kawoy Akaazi kawotidi de7iya wode Xoossas ammanetona ixidi efida miishe ubbaa nu zaaridi geeshshida. Heko, nu geeshshida miishe ubbay Godaa yarsho bessa sinthan de7ees” yaagidosona.
2CH 29:20 Kawoy Hizqiyaasi wontetha gallas wonta guura dendidi katamaa halaqata shiishidi, entara issife Xoossa keethi bis.
2CH 29:21 Enti kawotethaa gisho, Xoossa keethaa gishonne Yihuda asaa gisho, laapun kormata, laapun marazeta, laapun dorsa urgetanne laapun koleta nagara yarshos ehidosona. Aarona koche gidiya kahineti, Godaa yarsho bessan haysata yarshana mela kawoy kiittis.
2CH 29:22 Kahineti kormata shukidi suuthaa yarsho bessa bolla dharcidosona. Marazeta shukidi suuthaa yarsho bessa bolla dharcidosona. Dorsa urgeta shukidi suuthaa yarsho bessa bolla dharcidosona.
2CH 29:23 Nagara yarshos haniya koleta kawa sinthenne asaa sinthe ehidosona; enti ubbay banta kushiya deeshata bolla wothidosona.
2CH 29:24 Kawoy xuussa yarshonne nagara yarsho yarshana mela enta kiitida gisho kahineti deeshata shukidi Isra7eele asa ubbaa nagaray atto geetetana mela enta suuthaa yarsho bessan yarshidosona.
2CH 29:25 Goday kawas qoncethi be7iya Gaadenne nabiya Naatana baggara kawa Dawiti kiitida kiita Hizqiyaasi kaallidi, Leeweta, daala, diithinne maasinqo oythidi Xoossa keethan essis.
2CH 29:26 Leeweti Dawiti go7etiya yetha miisheta oykin, kahineti zaye oykidi eqidosona.
2CH 29:27 Enti xuussa yarsho yarshana mela Hizqiyaasi kiittis. Xuussa yarshoy yarshetiya wode zayeynne Isra7eele kawa Dawita yetha miishetan Godaas yethi doometees.
2CH 29:28 Xuussa yarshoy poletana gakanaw shiiqo ubbay Godaa goyinnees; yexeysati yexoosona; zaye punneysati punnoosona.
2CH 29:29 Kahineti yarshuwa polida wode kawoynne iyara de7iya asa ubbay gulbatidi goyinnidosona.
2CH 29:30 Kawoy Dawitinne qoncethi be7iya Asaafi xaafida galataa mazmure Godaas yexana mela kawoy Hizqiyaasinne halaqati Leeweta kiittidosona; Enti ubbay ufaysan galatishe gulbatidi goyinnidosona.
2CH 29:31 Hessafe guye, Hizqiyaasi, “Ha77i hinte hintena Godaas dummayideta. Yarshonne galata yarsho Xoossa keethi ehite” yaagis. Shiiqida asay yarshonne galata yarsho ehidosona; wozani dosida asay xuussa yarsho ehidosona.
2CH 29:32 He shiiqida asay ehida xuussa yarsho tayboy laapun tammu kormata, xeetu marazetanne nam7u xeetu dorsa urgeta; he ubbay Godaas xuussa yarsho.
2CH 29:33 Issifetetha yarshos usupun xeetu kormatanne heedzu mukulu dorsati shiiqidosona.
2CH 29:34 Gidoshin, xuussa yarsho ubbaa shukidi, galbaa qaaranaw de7iya kahineti taybon guutha gidiya gisho oosoy wurana gakanawunne hara kahineti bantana geeshshana gakanaw enta dabbo gidida Leeweti maaddidosona. Bantana geeshon Leeweti kahinetape aadhidi ammanetosona.
2CH 29:35 Xuussa yarshora shiiqiya issifetetha yarshuwa, modhuwanne ushsha yarshuwa gujiya wode xuussa yarshoy daro. Hessada hanidi Xoossa keethaa oosoy zaaridi doomis.
2CH 29:36 Hizqiyaasinne asa ubbay oosuwa ellesidi polana mela Xoossay enta maaddida gisho daro ufaytidosona.
2CH 30:1 Hizqiyaasi Godaa Isra7eele Xoossaa Paasika Ba7aale bonchanaw Yerusalaamen de7iya Xoossa keetha Isra7eele asaynne Yihuda asay yaana mela kiittis. Qassi, Efreema asaasinne Minaase asaas dabdaabe xaafis.
2CH 30:2 Kawoy, halaqatinne Yerusalaamen shiiqida asa ubbay Paasika Ba7aale nam7antho ageenan bonchanaw qofa qachidosona.
2CH 30:3 Gidiya kahineti bantana geeshshiboonna gishonne daro asay Yerusalaamen shiiqiboona gisho asay Paasika iya woden bonchanaw danda7ibookona.
2CH 30:4 He qofay kawanne shiiqida asaa ufaysis.
2CH 30:5 Hessa gisho, Godaa Isra7eele Xoossaa Paasika Yerusalaamen bonchanaw Barsaabepe doomidi Daane gakanaw de7iya Isra7eele asa ubbay yaana mela awaajanaw qofa qachidosona. Ha Paasika Baaliya kase higgiyan xaafetidaysada daro asi bonchibeenna.
2CH 30:6 Kawoy kiitan, kiitetidaysati, kawanne shuumata dabdaabiya ekidi Isra7eelenne Yihuda ubbaa bidosona. Dabdaabey haysada yaagees; “Isra7eele asaw, Asoore kawa kushepe attida hinteko simmana mela hinteka Godaako, Abrahaame, Yisaaqanne Isra7eele Xoossaako simmite!
2CH 30:7 Hinte kase be7idaysada enta bores aathidi immana gakanaw banta Godaas, banta aawata Xoossaas ammanetibona hinte aawatadanne hinte ishatada hanopite.
2CH 30:8 Hinte Godaas kiitetite; kase hinte aawatada si7ishe ixas goopite! Hintenatethaa Xoossas immite. Goday merinaw geeshshida Xoossa keethaa yiite. Godaa hanqoy hintefe simmana mela Godaa hinte Xoossaa goyinnite.
2CH 30:9 Hinte Godaako simmiko hinte ishatinne hinte nayti bantana di77idaysata sinthan maarota demmidi ha biitta simmana. Goday hinte Xoossay qadheteysanne maareysa gidiya gisho hinte iyako simmiko ba som7uwa hintefe qosenna” yaagis.
2CH 30:10 Kiitetidaysati Efreemanne Minaase biitta kanthidi Zabloona biitta gakanaw katamaape katamaa bidosona. Shin he katamatan de7iya asay enta kadhidi enta bolla miicidosona.
2CH 30:11 Gidoshin, Aseerape, Minaasepenne Zabloona guutha asati bantana kawushidi Yerusalaame yidosona.
2CH 30:12 Kawoynne kawa shuumati Godaa qaala maaran kiittidaysa polanaw issi wozanan gidana mela Xoossa kushey Yihuda bolla de7ees.
2CH 30:13 Nam7antho ageenan Uytha Ba7aale bonchanaw daro asi Yerusalaamen shiiqis.
2CH 30:14 Enti dendidi, Yerusalaamen de7iya yarsho bessata laallidi, ixaane cuyisiya miishe ubbaa diggidi, Qediroona Zangaaran yeggidosona.
2CH 30:15 Nam7antho ageenan, tammanne oyddantho gallasan Paasika dorsaa shukidosona. Bantana geeshshiboonna kahinetinne Leeweti yeellatidi, bantana geeshshidosona; xuussa yarsho Xoossa keethi ehidosona.
2CH 30:16 Xoossa asi gidida Muse wogaada Xoossa keetha giddon banta bessan bessan eqidosona; kahineti Leeweta kushepe ekida suuthaa dharcidosona.
2CH 30:17 Asaa giddofe daroti bantana geeshshiboonna gishonne dorsata shukonna mela digetida gisho Leeweti entaw Paasika dorsata shukidosona.
2CH 30:18 Efreemape, Minaasepe, Yisakoorapenne Zabloona kochaafe daro asay higgey kiitteysada bantana geeshshiboonnaba gidikoka Paasika Ba7aale gibira midosona. Gidoshin, Kawoy Hizqiyaas, “Abeeti keeha Godaw,
2CH 30:19 higgey kiitteysada haysati bantana geeshshonnaba gidikoka enti nena Godaa, banta aawata Xoossaa koyanaw banta wozanaa giigisida gisho ne entaw atto yaaga” yaagidi woossis.
2CH 30:20 Goday Hizqiyaasa woosa si7idi entaw atto gis.
2CH 30:21 Yerusalaamen shiiqida Isra7eele asay laapun gaalasi kumethi Uytha Baaliya gita ufaysan bonchidosona. Leewetinne kahineti yetha miishen yexishe gallas gallas Godaa galatoosona.
2CH 30:22 Hizqiyaasi Godaa goyinno wogaa kaaleson eretida Leeweta minthethis. Asa ubbay issifetetha yarsho yarshishe, Godaa banta aawata Xoossaa galatishe, mishenne uyishe ba7aale laapun gallas bonchidosona.
2CH 30:23 Shiiqoy hara laapun gallas gujidi ba7aale bonchanaw zore qachidi laapun gallas ufaytidi bonchidosona.
2CH 30:24 Yihuda kawoy Hizqiyaasi yarsho yarshanaw issi mukulu kormata, laapun mukulu dorsatanne deeshata asaas immis; qassi halaqati issi mukulu kormatanne tammu mukulu dorsata asaas immidosona; daro kahineti bantana geeshshidosona.
2CH 30:25 Yihuda asay, kahineti, Leeweti, Isra7eelepe yida asay, ba7aale bonchanaw yida bete asaynne Yihuda biittan de7ida asa ubbay ufaytidosona.
2CH 30:26 Dawita na7aa, Isra7eele kawa Solomone wodiyape doomin hachi gakanaw Yerusalaamen hessa mela ba7aaley bonchetidi eronna gisho Yerusalaamen asay daro ufaytidosona.
2CH 30:27 Kahinetinne Leeweti dendidi, Goday asaa anjana mela woossin Xoossay salon, ba de7iya geeshsha bessan enta woosa si7is.
2CH 31:1 Ba7aaley poletida wode he bessan de7iya Isra7eele ubbay Yihuda katamata bidi eeqa shuchata tincherethidosona; Asheera eeqa misileta qanxerethidosona. Yihudan, Biniyaamen Efreemaninne Minaase biittan de7iya dhoqa goyinno bessatanne yarsho bessata laallidosona. Enti he ubbaa dhaysidaape guye Isra7eele asa ubbay banta katamaanne banta soo soo simmidosona.
2CH 31:2 Hizqiyaasi kahinetanne Leeweta enta ooso maaran cugan cugan shaakidi essis. Enti xuussa yarshonne issifetetha yarsho Godaas yarshana melanne Xoossa keetha pengen Godaa galatananne sabbana mela oothis.
2CH 31:3 Godaa higgiyan xaafetidaysada wontanne omarsi xuussa yarshonne Sambaatan, ageena xeeroninne hara ba7aale gallasatan shiiqiya yarshuwas koshshiya meheta kawoy baape immees.
2CH 31:4 Godaa higgiyan xaafetidaysada kahinetinne Leeweti banta kumetha wodiya Godaa oosos peeshshana mela entaw bessiyaba immana mela Yerusalaame asaa kawoy kiittis.
2CH 31:5 Isra7eele asay kawa kiitaa si7ida wode kathaafe, woyne ushshafe, zaytiyape, eessafenne gaden kaxidabaape bayraa Godaas immidosona; bantaw de7iyaba ubbaafe asraata kessidosona.
2CH 31:6 Yihuda katamatan de7iya Isra7eele asaynne Yihuda asay banta mehetape, dorsatape asraata immidosona; Godaa, banta Xoossaas, dummayidi wothidaba ehidi dooridosona.
2CH 31:7 Enti heedzantho ageenan eho doomidi laapuntha ageenan polidosona.
2CH 31:8 Hizqiyaasinne halaqati dooretidaysa yidi be7ida wode enti Godaanne Godaa asi gidida Isra7eele anjidosona.
2CH 31:9 Hizqiyaasi dooretida imotaba kahinetanne Leeweta oychis.
2CH 31:10 Saadoqa yara gidida kahine halaqay Azaariyasi, “Banta imuwa Xoossa keethi eho doomin nu midi kallida. Goday ba asaa anjida gisho daro palahis” yaagis.
2CH 31:11 Hizqiyaasi Xoossa keethan minja kifileta giigisana mela kiittin asay giigisidosona.
2CH 31:12 Asraata, bayrabanne dummatida imotata ammanetethan kifileta gelsidosona. Leewe gidida Konaaney minja keetha bolla waanna gididi shuumetis. Iya ishay Same7i iyaw nam7antho gididi shuumetis.
2CH 31:13 Kawoy Hizqiyaasinne kahine halaqay Azaariyasi shuumin Konaanepenne Same7ape garsara oothiya Leeweti, Yi7eela, Azaaza, Nahaata, Asaheela, Yarmoota, Yozabaata, Eli7eela, Yismaaka, Mahaatanne Banaya.
2CH 31:14 Doloha bagga pengiya naageysata halaqay Leewey, Yimina na7ay, Qorey, asay dosan Xoossas ehida imuwa ekanawunne gishanaw shuumetis.
2CH 31:15 Kahineti de7iya katamatan gitape guuthu gakanaw de7iya banta ishatas ammanetidi, enta oosuwada oosuwada shaakidi immana mela Edeni, Miniyamini, Iyyasuy, Shama7ey, Amaareynne Sakani Qorepe garsara shuumetidosona.
2CH 31:16 Banta cugan cugan banta oosuwa gallas gallas Xoossa keethan ootheysatas laythi, heedzanne iyape bolla gidida adde ubbaas enta gishuwa shaakidi immidosona.
2CH 31:17 Banta aawata soo asan asan taybetida kahinetasinne laythi, laatamanne iyape bolla gidida Leewetas banta oosuwada oosuwada banta cugan cugan de7eysatas gishidosona.
2CH 31:18 Enti ammanetidi bantana geeshshida gisho enti banta yeletaa maaran taybetiya wode banta naytaranne machetara issife xaafetidosona.
2CH 31:19 Banta katamata yuushon de7iya hentha gadetan woyko hara katamatan de7iya kahine gidida Aarona sheeshas, enta giddon de7iya adde ubbaasinne Leeweta yeleta mazgaben xaafetidaysatas kathi gishanaw shuumetidosona.
2CH 31:20 Kawoy Hizqiyaasi Godaa ba Xoossaa sinthan lo77o, suurenne tuma gididaba Yihuda biitta ubban oothis.
2CH 31:21 Hizqiyaasi Xoossa keethas oothida ooso ubban, Xoossa higgiyanne wogaa naagidi Xoossaa ba kumetha wozanan koyida gisho iyaw ubbay injetis.
2CH 32:1 Kawoy Hizqiyaasi ammanetethan Godaas oothidaape guye Asoore kawoy Sanakreemi Yihuda biitta bolla dendis; xoonidi baw ekanaw qopidi gimbetida katamata teqis.
2CH 32:2 Sanakreemi Yerusalaame olanaw yidaysa Hizqiyaasi be7ida wode,
2CH 32:3 katamaape karera goggiya pulto haathata teqanaw ba shuumatanne toora moconata zore oychis; enti iya maaddidosona.
2CH 32:4 Daro asay shiiqidi, “Asoore kawoti yidi ayis haathe demmanee?” yaagidi pultotanne goggiya haathata teqidosona.
2CH 32:5 Hessafe guye, Hizqiyaasi minni oothidi, laaletida dirsa gimbe ubbaa zaaridi gimbis; iya bolla adussa shako shakis. He dirsa gimbiyafe kare baggara hara dirsa gimbe gimbis. Dawita kataman de7iya Miilo geetetiya bessaa minthis; daro ola miishenne gondalle giigisis.
2CH 32:6 Ola halaqata asaa bolla shuumis; enta ubbaa katamaa pengiya matan de7iya dabaaban shiishidi,
2CH 32:7 “Minnite; gencite; nuura de7eysi entara de7eysafe aadhiya gisho Asoore kawanne iya olanchota be7idi yayyofite, dagammopite.
2CH 32:8 Iyara asa wolqi de7ees; shin nuura Goday nu Xoossay nuna maaddanawunne nuus oletanaw de7ees” yaagidi enta minthethis. Yihuda kawoy Hizqiyaasi odan asay minetis.
2CH 32:9 Hessafe guye, Asoore kawoy Sanakreemi ba olanchotara Laakiso katamaa teqidi de7ishin, Yihuda kawa Hizqiyaasakonne Yerusalaamen de7iya Yihuda asaa ubbaako ba shuumata kiittis.
2CH 32:10 Asoore kawoy Sanakreemi, “Teqetida Yerusalaame kataman hinte oonan ammanetidi uttidetii?
2CH 32:11 Hizqiyaasi, ‘Goday, nu Xoossay nuna, Asoore kawa kushepe ashshana’ yaagidi cimmidi hintena koshaninne saamon wodhanaw hanees.
2CH 32:12 Dhoqa goyinno bessatanne yarsho bessata diggidi, Yihudanne Yerusalaame asaa, ‘Issi yarsho bessa sinthan goyinnite; yarshuwa iya bolla xuuggite’ yaagey Hizqiyaasa gidennee?
2CH 32:13 “Tanne ta aawati hara kawotethata bolla oothidaba hinte ereketii? Enta xoossati banta biitta ta kushepe ashshanaw danda7idonaa?
2CH 32:14 Ta aawati dhaysida ha kawotethata xoossata ubbaa giddon ba asaa ta kushepe ashshanaw danda7iday oonee? Yaatin, hinte Xoossay hintena ta kushepe waati ashshanaw danda7ii?
2CH 32:15 Hiza Hizqiyaasi hintena balethofo woyko hessada cimmofo. Hinte Hizqiyaasa ammanopite. Iya asaa ta kushepe woyko ta aawata kushepe ashshanaw danda7ida hara biitta xoossati woyko kawotethata xoossati baawa. Yaatin, hessi hinte Xoossay hintena ta kushepe ashshanaw waanidi danda7ii?” yaagidosona.
2CH 32:16 Sanakreema shuumati Godaa Xoossaa bollanne iya aylliya Hizqiyaasa bolla hara darobaa haasayidosona.
2CH 32:17 Sanakreemi Godaa Isra7eele Xoossaa cayidi, “Sa7a bolla de7iya kawotethata xoossati banta asaa ta kushepe ashshonaysada Hizqiyaasa Xoossayka ba asaa ta kushepe ashshanaw danda7enna” yaagidi dabdaabe xaafis.
2CH 32:18 Sanakreema shuumati katamaa oykanaw koyidi, dirsa gimbe bolla uttida Yerusalaame asaa yashisanawunne daganthanaw banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, Ibraawetho doonan enta bolla waassidosona.
2CH 32:19 Asa kushen oosetida, ha sa7an de7iya hara kawotethata xoossata bolla odetidaysada Yerusalaame Xoossaa bollaka odetidosona.
2CH 32:20 Kawoy Hizqiyaasinne Amoxe na7ay, nabey Isayaasi hessa gisho woosan salo Xoossaako pude waassidosona.
2CH 32:21 Xoossay ba kiitanchuwa kiittidi Asoore olanchotanne toora moconata dhaysis. Hessa gisho, Asoore kawoy kawuyidi, ba biitta simmis; I ba Xoossa keethaa gelida wode iya nayti iya he bessan mashshan wodhidosona.
2CH 32:22 Hessada oothidi, Goday Hizqiyaasanne Yerusalaame asaa Asoore kawa Sanakreema kushepenne hara morketa kushepe ashshis; enta shooro biittata ubbaafe enta shempisis.
2CH 32:23 Daro asay Godaas imota, Yihuda kawa Hizqiyaasas al7o miishe ehidosona. He wodepe doomidi kawotetha ubbay Hizqiyaasa daro bonchidosona.
2CH 32:24 He wode Hizqiyaasi hargidi, hayqanaw matidi Godaa woossis. Goday woosetidi iya pathanaw malla immis.
2CH 32:25 Shin Hizqiyaasi otortida gisho Goday iyaw keehida keehas bessiya zaaro immibeenna. Hessa gaason, iya bolla, Yihuda bollanne Yerusalaame bolla Godaa hanqoy yis.
2CH 32:26 Gidoshin, wursethan Hizqiyaasi ba otoruwa aggidi Yerusalaame asatara banatetha kawushis. Hizqiyaasi kawo gididi de7iya wode Godaa hanqoy enta bolla yibeenna.
2CH 32:27 Hizqiyaasas daro duretethinne bonchoy de7ees. Hizqiyaasi ba bira, worqaa, al7o shuchaa, sawo, gondallenne hara al7o miishe ubbaa minjiya keethi keexis.
2CH 32:28 Kathaa, woyne ushshaanne zayte wothiya keethe keexis. Mehe daranne dorsinne deeshi eqiya girbe oothis.
2CH 32:29 Xoossay iyaw daro aqo immida gisho baw katamata keexis; daro dorsenne mehe shiishis.
2CH 32:30 Qommo baggan de7iya Giyoone pulto haatha zeeridi, haathay wuloha baggan de7iya Dawita katamaako duge goggana mela oothiday Hizqiyaasa. Hizqiyaasi oothidaba ubban injetida asi.
2CH 32:31 Shin Yihuda biittan hanida malaalsiya oosotaba oychanaw Babiloonepe kiitetida asati Hizqiyaasako yida wode Goday iya paacanawunne iya wozanan de7iyaba eranaw iya yeddi bessis.
2CH 32:32 Hizqiyaasi oothida harabaynne iya keehatethay Amoxe Na7aa, nabiya Isayaasa qoncetha maxaafaninne Yihudanne Isra7eele kawota taarike maxaafan xaafetis.
2CH 32:33 Hizqiyaasi hayqidi, ba mayzatan gahetin qommo baggara de7iya Dawita kochata duufon iya moogidosona. I hayqin, Yihuda asaynne Yerusalaame asay iya bonchidosona. Iya bessan iya na7ay Minaasey kawotis.
2CH 33:1 Minaasey kawotiya wode iyaw laythi tammanne nam7a; I Yerusalaamen ishatammanne ichashu laythi kawotis.
2CH 33:2 Goday Isra7eele asaa sinthafe gooddidi kessida asaa, ixetida ogiya kaallidi Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis.
2CH 33:3 Minaasey ba aaway Hizqiyaasi laallida, dhoqa goyinno bessata zaaridi keexis. Ba7aale yarsho bessatanne Asheera geetetiya eeqa misileta medhis; salo xoolintota goyinnis; entaw gufannis.
2CH 33:4 Goday, “Ta sunthay merinaw Yerusalaamen daana” yaagidi wothida Xoossa keethan Minaasey hara xoossatas yarsho bessi giigisis.
2CH 33:5 Xoossaa keethan de7iya nam7u dabaabatan salo xoolintoti goyinnetiya yarsho bessi giigisis.
2CH 33:6 Hinooma Zangaaran ba adde nayta taman xuuggidi yarshis. I bitanne murunno oothis; marothis; moytillenne tuna ayyaana zore oychis. Godaa sinthan daro iitabaa oothidi Xoossaa yiloyis.
2CH 33:7 Ba oothida eeqa misiliya efidi Xoossa keethan essis. He Xoossa keethay, Xoossay Dawitasinne iya na7aa Solomones, “Isra7eele zare ubbaa giddofe taani doorida Xoossa keethaninne Yerusalaamen ta suntha merinaw xeegisana.
2CH 33:8 Muse baggara ta Isra7eele asaa kiitida kiita, higgiyanne woga ubbaa enti naagiko, taani enta mayzatas immida biittafe enta shoddike” yaagis.
2CH 33:9 Shin Minaasey Yihuda asaanne Yerusalaame asaa balethidi, Goday Isra7eele asaa sinthafe dhaysida hara kawotethatape aadhiya iitaa oothana mela oothis.
2CH 33:10 Goday Minaasesinne iya asaas odis; shin enti iya si7onna ixidosona.
2CH 33:11 Hessa gisho, Goday Asoore olanchota enta bolla denthis. Enti Minaase sidhen dafo aathidi oykidosona; naase birata santhalaatan qachidi, Babiloone efidosona.
2CH 33:12 Minaasey un7etida wode Godaa ba Xoossaa maado woossis; ba aawata Xoossaa sinthan banatetha daro kawushis.
2CH 33:13 Xoossay Minaase woosa si7is; Yerusalaame simmidi zaaridi kawotana mela oothis. Goday tuma Xoossi gideysa Minaasey hessan eris.
2CH 33:14 Hessafe guye, Minaasey Giyoone Pultuwa matan de7iya bessaafe doomidi Ofeela deriyara kanthidi Molo Penge gakanaw kare baggara hara dirsa gimbe gimbis. He gimbey Dawita Katamaape doloha baggara de7iya zangaaran de7ees. Yihuda katamata ubban toora moconata wothis.
2CH 33:15 Allaga xoossatanne eeqa misileta Xoossa keethaafe diggis; Xoossa keethay de7iya zuma bollanne Yerusalaamen de7iya yarsho bessata laallidi he katamaape kare kessidi yeggis.
2CH 33:16 Minaasey Godaa yarsho bessi oorathidi issifetetha yarshonne galata yarsho yan yarshis. Yihuda asay Godaa Isra7eele Xoossaa goyinnana mela kiittis.
2CH 33:17 Asay dhoqa goyinno bessatan yarsho yarsheysa aggonna ixikoka, enti yarshey Godaa banta Xoossaa xalaalasa.
2CH 33:18 Minaase oothida harabay, ba Xoossaa woossida woosaynne Godaa Isra7eele Xoossaa sunthan nabeti iyaw odida qaalay Isra7eele kawota taarike maxaafan xaafetis.
2CH 33:19 Heko, Minaase woosaynne Xoossay iyaw zaarida zaaroy, I oothida nagaraynne Minaasey bana kawushanaape sinthe oothida dhoqa goyinno bessatabay, Asheeri eeqa misiletabaynne eeqataba ubbay nabeta taarike maxaafan xaafetis.
2CH 33:20 Minaasey hayqidi ba mayzata gakis; iya kawo gadhon moogidosona. Iya bessan iya na7ay Amoxey kawotis.
2CH 33:21 Amoxey kawotiya wode iyaw laythi laatamanne nam7a; I Yerusalaamen nam7u laythi kawotis.
2CH 33:22 Iya aaway Minaasey oothidaysada ika Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis. Iya aaway Minaasey goyinnida eeqata goyinnis; entaw yarshis.
2CH 33:23 Shin iya aaway Minaasey banatetha kawushidaysada I banatetha Godaa sinthan kawushibeenna; Amoxey guji guji nagara oothis.
2CH 33:24 Amoxe shuumati iya bolla maqetidi, kawo gadhon iya wodhidosona.
2CH 33:25 Yihuda asay kawa Amoxe bolla maqetida ubbaa wodhidi, Amoxe bessan iya na7aa Iyosyaasa kawothidosona.
2CH 34:1 Iyosyaasi kawotiya wode iyaw laythi hospuna; I Yerusalaamen hastamanne issi laythi kawotis.
2CH 34:2 Iyosyaasi Godaa sinthan suureba oothis; ushachi haddirsi goonna ba mayza Dawita ogen hemetis.
2CH 34:3 I kawotida hospuntho laythan buroo yooga de7ishe ba mayza Dawita Xoossaa koyis. I kawotida tammanne nam7antho laythan Yihudaninne Yerusalaamen de7iya dhoqa goyinno bessata, Asheera eeqa misileta, massidi giigisida eeqatanne seerisidi oothida misileta dhaysis.
2CH 34:4 Iya kiitan, Ba7aale yarsho bessata laallidosona; entafe bollara de7iya ixaane cuyisiya miisheta tinchidosona. Asheera eeqa misileta, massidi giigisida eeqatanne seerisidi oothida misileta gaaccidi dhiille kessidosona; he dhiilliya enta goyinniya asata duufon laallidosona.
2CH 34:5 Iyosyaasi enta kahineta meqethaa he yarsho bessata bolla xuuggis; yaatidi, Yihudanne Yerusalaame geeshshis.
2CH 34:6 Minaase, Efreemanne Simoona biittafe bidi Niftaaleme biitta gakanaw de7iya katamatanne laaletida bessata ubbaa hessada oothidi geeshshis.
2CH 34:7 Iyosyaasi yarsho bessata laallis; Asheera eeqa misiletanne hara eeqa misileta tincherethis; Isra7eelen de7iya ixaane cuyisiya bessata qanxerethis. Hessafe guye, Iyosyaasi Yerusalaame simmis.
2CH 34:8 Iyosyaasi kawotida tammanne hospuntho laythan biittanne Xoossa keethaa geeshidaape guye, Xoossa keethaa oorathana mela Axala na7aa Safaana, Yerusalaame katamaa haariya Ma7iseyanne Iyo7akaaza na7aa waanna xaafiya Iyo7akina kiittis.
2CH 34:9 Enti kahine halaqaa Kalqiyaasako bidosona. Penge naagiya Leeweti Minaasepe, Efreemape, attida Isra7eele asaa ubbaafe Yihudape, Biniyaamepenne Yerusalaamen de7iya asaape kase shiishidi Xoossa keethi ehida miishiya Kalqes immidosona.
2CH 34:10 Enti Xoossa keethaa oorathiya halaqatas immin enti Xoossa keethaa oorathanaadanne zaaridi keexana mela oosanchotas immidosona.
2CH 34:11 Yihuda kawoti laallida Xoossa keethaa loythanaw mithinne masetida shuchu shammana mela anaaxetasinne gimbeysatas miishe immidosona.
2CH 34:12 Asay ammanetidi oosuwa polidosona. Enta bolla shuumetida oyddu Leeweti, Maraara yaraape Yahaatanne Abdiyu, Qahaata yaraape Masulaamanne Zakariyasa. Yetha miishe ka7i eriya Leeweti ubbay,
2CH 34:13 wolqa ooso oothiya asata bollanne dumma dumma ooso ootheyisata bolla shuumetidosona. Qassi hara Leeweti xaafe, halaqanne penge naageysata gididosona.
2CH 34:14 Enti Xoossa keethaa yida miishiya kessiya wode kahiney Kalqey Goday Muse baggara immida higge maxaafaa demmis.
2CH 34:15 Kalqey waanna xaafiya Saafanako, “Taani Xoossa keethafe higge maxaafaa demmas” yaagis. He maxaafaa Saafanas immis.
2CH 34:16 Safaani maxaafaa kawako efidi, “Ne shuumati ne kiitaa ubbaa oothidosona.
2CH 34:17 Xoossa keethan de7iya miishiya ekidi, oosuwa kaalliya halaqatasinne oothiya asaas immidosona” yaagis.
2CH 34:18 Waanna xaafey Safaani kawako, “Kahiney Kalqey taw maxaafaa immis” yaagidi maxaafaa kawa sinthan nabbabis.
2CH 34:19 Kawoy higge qaala si7ida wode azzanidi ba ma7uwa pheedhis.
2CH 34:20 Kawoy, Kalqe, Safaana na7aa Akqaama, Mikiyaasa na7aa Abdoona, waanna xaafiya Saafananne kawo shuuma Asaya haysada yaagidi kiittis;
2CH 34:21 “Bidi ta gishonne Isra7eeleninne Yihudan attida asata gisho ha bentida maxaafan xaafetidaba Godaa oychite. Ha maxaafan xaafetida ubbaa oothanaw nu mayzati Godaa qaala naagiboonna gisho Goday nu bolla ba hanquwa gussis” yaagis.
2CH 34:22 Kalqeynne kawoy kiitida asati Xoossa keethan ma7o naagiya Hasira na7a, Tiquwa na7a, Selema macho gidida Hulda geetetiya nabeko bidi iyo oychidosona. Iya Yerusalaamen nam7antho kataman de7awusu.
2CH 34:23 Hulda entako, “Goday Isra7eele Xoossay, ‘Hintena taako kiitida uraas haysada yaagidi odite’ yaagasu.
2CH 34:24 Goday haysada yaagees; ‘Yihuda kawa sinthan nabbabetida maxaafan xaafetida iita baadetha ubbaa ha bessan de7iya asaa bolla ehana hanayis.
2CH 34:25 Enti tana aggidi hara xoossatas ixaane cuyisidosona; enti banta kushen oothidaban tana hanqethidosona. Hessa gisho, ta hanqoy ha bessan tigetana; teqetenna.’
2CH 34:26 Godaa oychanaw hintena kiitida Yihuda kawako, ‘Goday Isra7eele Xoossay neeni si7ida qaalaba haysada yaagees;
2CH 34:27 Ha bessaaninne ha bessan de7iya asaa bolla Xoossay odetidaba neeni si7ida wode ne wozanay boshetin, ta sinthan nenatethaa kawushida gishonne ne ma7uwa peedhada ta sinthan yeekida gisho taani ne woosa si7as.
2CH 34:28 Heko, ta nena ne mayzata gathana; ne saro moogetana. Ta ha bessaaninne ha bessan de7iya asaa bolla ehana iitabaa ne ayfey be7enna’ yaagite” yaagasu. Enti bidi ha qaala kawas odidosona.
2CH 34:29 Hessafe guye, kawoy Iyosyaasi Yihuda cimatanne Yerusalaame cimata ubbaa shiishis.
2CH 34:30 Kawoy Xoossa keethi keyis; Yihuda asay, Yerusalaame asay, kahinetinne Leeweti, guuthafe gita gakanaw ubbay iyara issife keyidosona. Xoossa keethan bentida caaqo maxaafa qaala ubbaa kawoy entaw nabbabis.
2CH 34:31 Kawoy ba bessan eqidi, Godaa ogen hemetanawunne iya higgiya, iya wogaanne iya kiitaa ba kumetha wozanaaninne ba kumetha shempuwan naaganaw, qassi ha maxaafan xaafetida caaquwa oothanaw Godaa sinthan caaqis.
2CH 34:32 Yerusalaameninne Biniyaamen de7iya asa ubbay eqidi caaqana mela oothis; Yerusalaamen de7iya asay Xoossaa, banta mayzata Xoossaa caaqoy geysada oothidosona.
2CH 34:33 Iyosyaasi Isra7eele zawan de7iya ixetidaba ubbaa diggis. Isra7eelen de7iya ubbay Godaa, banta Xoossaa goyinnana mela oothis. Iyosyaasi de7ida laytha ubban enti Godaa, banta mayzata Xoossaa kaalo aggibokona.
2CH 35:1 Iyosyaasi Yerusalaamen Godaa Paasika Ba7aale bonchis. Koyro ageenan tammanne oyddantho gallas Paasika dorsaa shukidosona.
2CH 35:2 Iyosyaasi kahineta ooson shuumidi, enta Xoossa keetha ooson minthethis.
2CH 35:3 Bantana Godaas dummayida, Isra7eele ubbaa tamaarsiya Leeweta haysada yaagis; “Geeshsha Taabotiya Dawita na7ay, Isra7eele kawoy Solomoney keexida Xoossa keethan wothite. Hizape guye Taabotiya hinte hashen tookanaw koshshenna. Ha77i Godaas, hinte Xoossaasinne, iya asaa Isra7eeles oothite.
2CH 35:4 Isra7eele kawoy Dawitinne iya na7ay Solomoney xaafidaysada hinte cugan cuganinne hinte soo asan asan hintena giigisite.
2CH 35:5 Leeweti hinte dabbota, Isra7eele kochata maaddanaw hinte yaran yaran Xoossa keethan eqite.
2CH 35:6 Goday Muse baggara odida qaala Isra7eele asay, hinte dabboti naagana mela gigisite; hinteka hintenatethaa geeshshite Paasika dorsaa shukite” yaagis.
2CH 35:7 Iyosyaasi he bessan de7iya asaas, Paasika yarsho gidana mela 30,000 dorsenne deeshe immis; qassi 3,000 kormata immis. He ubbaa kawoy ba shaluwape immis.
2CH 35:8 Kawo shuumati banta shenen asaas, kahinetasinne Leewetas yarsho mehe immidosona. Xoossa keetha halaqati Kalqey, Zakariyasinne Yi7eeli Paasika yarshos gidiya nam7u mukulunne usupun xeetu marazeta, heedzu xeetu kormata immidosona.
2CH 35:9 Leeweta halaqati Konaaneynne iya ishati, Shamayeynne Natina7eeli, qassi Hashabi, Yi7eelinne Yozabaati Paasika yarshos haniya ichashu mukulu marazetanne koleta, ichashu xeetu kormata immidosona.
2CH 35:10 Paasika Baaliyas ubbabay giigis; kawa kiitan, kahineti banta bessan bessan, Leeweti banta cugan cugan eqidosona.
2CH 35:11 Paasika dorsati shuketidosona; Leeweti galbaa qaaridosona; kahineti suuthaa yarsho bessa bolla dharcoosona.
2CH 35:12 Muse maxaafan xaafetidaysada asay Godaas yarshana mela xuussa yarshos giigida dorsata ashuwa Leeweti banta soo asan asan shaaketidi uttida Isra7eele yaratas immidosona; kormataka hessada oothidosona.
2CH 35:13 Leeweti wogay kiitteysada shuketida Paasika dorsaa ashuwa taman caacidosona; geeshsha yarshota xaaron, otoninne disten doysidi, Isra7eele asa ubbaas eeson shaakidi shaakidi immidosona.
2CH 35:14 Hessafe guye, Leeweti bantawunne Aarona koche gidida kahinetas Paasika yarsho giigisidosona. Hessa enti oothiday, kahineti xuussa yarshonne modhuwa yarshishe qamma gakanaw oothiya gishosa.
2CH 35:15 Dawiti, Asaafi, Hemaaninne kawa nabey Editaami kase kiittidaysada Asaafa yarati, mazmure yexeysati banta bessan de7oosona. Penge naageysati banta bessan de7oosona. Enta dabboti, Leeweti entaw giigisida gisho enti banta oosuwa aggibokona.
2CH 35:16 Godaas oothiya ooso ubbay, Paasika Ba7aale bonchoynne xuussa yarshoy, kawoy Iyosyaasi kiittidaysada hanidi he gallas giigis.
2CH 35:17 Yan shiiqida Isra7eele asay he gallas Paasika Baaliya bonchidosona; enti Uytha Ba7aale laapun gallas bonchidosona.
2CH 35:18 Nabiya Sameela wodiyape doomin, hessa mela Paasika Ba7aaley Isra7eelen bonchetibeenna. Iyosyaasi, kahineti, Leeweti, Yihuda asay, Isra7eele asaynne Yerusalaame asay bonchidaysada Paasika Ba7aale kase Isra7eele kawotape bonchida issoyka baawa.
2CH 35:19 Paasika Ba7aaley Iyosyaasi kawotida tammanne hospuntho laythan bonchetis.
2CH 35:20 Iyosyaasi Xoossa keethaa giigisidaape guye Gibxe kawoy Naakoy Efraxiisa shaafa matan de7iya Karkamishan oletanaw bis. Iyosyaasi iya teqanaw keyis.
2CH 35:21 Shin Naakoy Iyosyaasako ase kiittidi, “Yihuda kawaw, tananne nena kachiyabay aybee? Taani yiday ta morketa olanaasafe attishin, nena olanaasa gidenna. Ta morketa taani eeson olanaada Xoossay tana kiittis. Xoossay nena dhaysonaada taara de7iya Xoossara eqeteysa agga” yaagis.
2CH 35:22 Gidoshin, Iyosyaasi Goday Nako baggara odidaysa si7onnanne guye simmonna ixis. Ba kawo ma7uwa laammidi Magido denban oletanaw bis.
2CH 35:23 Dongen dukeysati kawa Iyosyaasa caddin, kawoy ba aylletako, “Taani iita cadetida gisho tana olaa giddofe kessite” yaagis.
2CH 35:24 Iyosyaasa para gaariyape wodhisidi, iya para gaariyan wothidi, iya Yerusalaame ehidosona. I yan hayqidi ba mayzata duufon moogetis. Yihuda asaynne Yerusalaame asa ubbay iyaw yeekidosona.
2CH 35:25 Nabey Ermiyaasi Iyosyaasas zelelsi kessidi xaafis. Zeleelidi yeekiya maccasaynne adde ubbay hachi gakanaw Iyosyaasas qopoosona. He zelelsay Isra7eele Yeeho zelelsa maxaafan xaafetis.
2CH 35:26 Iyosyaasi oothida harabay, Godaa higgen maxaafan xaafetidaysa mela I oothida lo77o oosoynne
2CH 35:27 koyrope wursethi gakanaw I oothida ubbay, Heko, Isra7eele kawotanne Yihuda kawota taarike maxaafan xaafetis.
2CH 36:1 He biitta asay Iyosyaasa na7aa Iyo7akaaza dooridi iya aawa bessan Yerusalaamen kawothidosona.
2CH 36:2 Iyo7akaazi kawotiya wode iyaw laythi laatamanne heedza; I Yerusalaamen heedzu ageena kawotis.
2CH 36:3 Gibxe kawoy Iyo7akaaza kawotethaafe wothis; heedzu mukulunne oyddu xeetu kilo giraame biranne hastamanne oyddu kilo giraame worqa Yihuda asay giirana mela oothis.
2CH 36:4 Gibxe kawoy, Naakoy, Iyo7akaaza ishaa Eliyaqeeme Yihuda bollanne Yerusalaame bolla kawothidi iya sunthaa Iyo7aqeema yaagidi laammis. Yaatidi Iyo7aqeema ishaa Iyo7akaaza Gibxe efis.
2CH 36:5 Iyo7aqeemi kawotiya wode iyaw laythi laatamanne ichasha; I Yerusalaamen tammanne issi laythi kawotis. Ba Godaa Xoossaa sinthan iitabaa oothis.
2CH 36:6 Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori iya olidi, Babiloone efanaw naase birata santhalaatan qachis.
2CH 36:7 Qassi Nabukadanaxoori Xoossa keetha miishiya ekidi Babiloone efidi, ba kawo gadhon wothis.
2CH 36:8 Iyo7aqeemi oothida harabay, oothida tunabaynne oothida iitaba ubbay, Heko, Isra7eele kawotanne Yihuda kawota taarike maxaafan xaafetis. I hayqin, iya bessan iya na7ay Yo7akini kawotis.
2CH 36:9 Yo7akini kawotiya wode iyaw laythi hospuna; I Yerusalaamen heedzu ageenanne tammu gallas kawotis. I Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis.
2CH 36:10 Laytha laamen, kawoy Nabukadanaxoori ase kiittidi, Yo7akinanne Xoossa keethan de7iya al7o miisheta iyara issife Babiloone ehis. Yaatidi iya aawa ishaa Sedeqiyaasa Yihudanne Yerusalaame bolla kawothis.
2CH 36:11 Sedeqiyaasi kawotiya wode iyaw laythi laatamanne issino; I Yerusalaamen tammanne issi laythi kawotis.
2CH 36:12 Ba Godaa Xoossaa sinthan iitabaa oothis; qassi Godaa qaala odiya nabiya Ermiyaasa sinthan bana kawushibeenna.
2CH 36:13 Sedeqiyaasi, ammanetana mela bana Xoossa sunthan caaqisida Nabukadanaxoora bolla makallis. Godaa, Isra7eele Xoossaako simmonna ixis; ba wozana Xoossa bolla minthis.
2CH 36:14 Qassi, Yihuda asaynne enta kaalethiya kahineti, ammanetona ixidosona. Enti hara kawotethati oothiya ixetida oosota kaallidi, Goday Yerusalaamen geeshshida Xoossa keethaa tunisidosona.
2CH 36:15 Goday, enta mayzata Xoossay ba asaasinne ba keethas qadhetiya gisho, ba nabeta entaw zaari zaari kiittis.
2CH 36:16 Shin Godaa hanqoy enta bolla wodhana gakanawunne enti kessi ekiyaso dhayana gakanaw Xoossaa kiitanchota qelqisidosona; iya qaala kadhidosona; nabeta bolla miicidosona.
2CH 36:17 Hessa gisho, Goday Kaldaaweta kawa enta bolla denthin, I enta yalaga addeta Xoossa keethan mashshan wodhis. I yalaga addetas woyko geela7otas woyko cimatas woyko ceegatas qadhetonna wursis. Xoossay enta ubbaa Nabukadanaxoora kushen aathidi immis.
2CH 36:18 Babiloone kawoy Xoossa keethan de7iya miisheta ubbaa, gitaanne guuthaa, Xoossa keethan de7iya buqura, kawo buquranne iya moorinnata buqura ubbaa ekidi Babiloone efis.
2CH 36:19 Enti Xoossa keethaa taman xuuggidi, Yerusalaame gimbe dirsaa laallidosona. Kawo gadhuwa taman xuuggidi, yan de7iya al7o miishe ubbaa dhaysidosona.
2CH 36:20 Mashshafe attidaysata kawoy di77idi Babiloone efis. Farse kawotethay dendana gakanaw enti iyawunne iya naytas aylle gididosona.
2CH 36:21 Goday nabiya Ermiyaasa baggara odida qaalay poletis. Wursethan biittay laapun tammu laythi asi bayna bessi gididi shempis. Biittay Sambaata shempo demmis.
2CH 36:22 Farse kawoy Qiroosi kawotida koyro laythan nabiya Ermiyaasa baggara Goday odidaysa polis. Farse kawoy Qiroosi ba kawotethan ubban haysada yaagidi awaajana melanne xaafidi wothana mela Goday iya ayyaana denthethis.
2CH 36:23 Farse kawoy Qiroosi, “Goday, salo Xoossay ha sa7aa kawotethata ubbaa taw immis. Qassi Yihudan de7iya Yerusalaamen ta iyaw Xoossa keethi keexana mela tana shuumis. Xoossa asi gidida oonika yaa boo. Goday iya Xoossay iyara gido” yaagis.
EZR 1:1 Farse kawoy Qiroosi kawotida koyro laythan, nabiya Ermiyaasa baggara Goday odidaba polis. Farse kawoy Qiroosi ba kawotethaa giddon haysada yaagidi awaajana melanne he awaajuwa xaafidi wothana mela Goday iya wozana denthethis.
EZR 1:2 Farse kawoy Qiroosi haysada yaagees; “Goday, salo Xoossay ha sa7aa kawotethata ubbaa taw immis. Qassi Yihudan de7iya Yerusalaamen iyaw keethe keexana mela tana shuumis.
EZR 1:3 Xoossa asi gidida oonika yaa boo; iya Xoossay iyara gido! Hinte Yihudan de7iya Yerusalaame bidi, yan Yerusalaamen Godaa, Isra7eele Xoossaa keethaa zaaridi keexo.
EZR 1:4 Dumma dumma biittan de7iya asa ubbay Ayhudetape attidaysati bira, worqa, dumma dumma miishetanne mehe immidi maaddo; qassi Yerusalaamen de7iya Xoossaa keethaa banta dosan immiya imota bolla gujidi immo” yaagees.
EZR 1:5 Hessafe guye, Yihudanne Biniyaame koche halaqati, kahinetinne Leeweti, qassi Xoossay enta wozanaa denthethida ubbay Yerusalaamen Godaa Xoossaa keethaa keexanaw baanaw dendidosona.
EZR 1:6 Qassi enta shooron de7eysatika banta dosan immidaba bolla gujidi, birapenne worqafe oosetida miisheta, hara dumma dumma miishetanne mehe immidi, enta maaddidosona.
EZR 1:7 Hessa bolla kawoy Qiroosi Nabukadanaxoori Yerusalaamepe efidi ba eeqa keethan wothida Godaa keethaa miisheta immis.
EZR 1:8 Farse kawoy Qiroosi miisheta wothiya keetha halaqaa Mitirdaaxu taybisidi, Yihuda haariya Sesabisaara kushen wothis.
EZR 1:9 Simmida miisheta tayboy haysa; hastamu worqa shaate, mukulu bira shaate, laatamanne uddufun pil7o,
EZR 1:10 hastamu worqaa kere, oyddu xeetanne tammu bira kere mukulu hara dumma dumma miishe.
EZR 1:11 Worqa miishetanne bira miisheta tayboy kumethi ichashu mukulunne oyddu xeeta; Seesabisari Babiloonepe Yerusalaame simmiya wode di7ope simmida asaara ekidi yis.
EZR 2:1 Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori di77idi, ba biitta efida asaape guye, Yerusalaamenne Yihuda banta katamaa katamaa simmida asay haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata.
EZR 2:2 Enta halaqati Zarubaabela, Iyyasu, Nahime, Saraya, Ra7ila, Mardikiyoosa, Bilisaana, Masefaara, Baguwaya, Rehuumanne Ba7ana. Di7ope simmida asaa tayboy haysa.
EZR 2:3 Faroosa yaray 2,172;
EZR 2:4 Safaaxa yaray 372;
EZR 2:5 Era yaray 775;
EZR 2:6 Iyyasunne Yo7aaba koche gidida Fahat-Moo7abe yaray 2,812;
EZR 2:7 Elama yaray 1,254;
EZR 2:8 Zata yaray 945;
EZR 2:9 Zakaya yaray 760;
EZR 2:10 Baana yaray 642;
EZR 2:11 Bebaya yaray 623;
EZR 2:12 Azgada yaray 1,222;
EZR 2:13 Adonqaama yaray 666;
EZR 2:14 Beguwaya yaray 2,056;
EZR 2:15 Adina yaray 454;
EZR 2:16 Hizqiyaasa koche gidida Axeera yaray 98;
EZR 2:17 Basaya yaray 323;
EZR 2:18 Yoora yaray 112;
EZR 2:19 Hasuma yaray 223;
EZR 2:20 Gibara yaray 95;
EZR 2:21 Beeteleme asay 123;
EZR 2:22 Naxoofa asay 56;
EZR 2:23 Anatoota asay 128;
EZR 2:24 Azmoota asay 42;
EZR 2:25 Qiriyat-Yi7aarima, Kafiranne Bi7eroota asay 743;
EZR 2:26 Ramanne Gib7a asay 621;
EZR 2:27 Mikmaasa asay 122;
EZR 2:28 Beetelenne Gaye asay 223;
EZR 2:29 Nabo asay 52;
EZR 2:30 Magibisa asay 156;
EZR 2:31 Nam7antho Elama asay 1,254;
EZR 2:32 Karima asay 320;
EZR 2:33 Looda, Hadidanne Ono asay 725;
EZR 2:34 Iyaarko asay 345;
EZR 2:35 Sana7a asay 3,630;
EZR 2:36 Di7ope simmida kahineta soo asaa tayboy haysa. Iyyasu koche gidida Yadaya yaray 973;
EZR 2:37 Imera yaray 1,052;
EZR 2:38 Paskora yaray 1,247;
EZR 2:39 Karima yaray 1,017.
EZR 2:40 Di7ope simmida Leeweta tayboy haysa; Hodawa koche gidida Iyyasunne Qadimeela yaray 74;
EZR 2:41 Asaafa koche gidida zammaareti 128;
EZR 2:42 Xoossa keetha penge naagiya Salooma, Axeera, Xalmoona, Aquba, Haxixanne Sobaya yaray 139.
EZR 2:43 Haysati di7ope simmidi, Xoossa keethan oothiya asaa yarata; Xiha yara, Hasufa yara, Xaba7oota yara,
EZR 2:44 Keraasa yara, Siha yara, Fadoona yara,
EZR 2:45 Libana yara, Agaba yara, Aquba yara,
EZR 2:46 Agaba yara, Samila yara, Hanana yara,
EZR 2:47 Gadalla yara, Gahaara yara, Raya yara,
EZR 2:48 Ra7asoona yara, Naqooda yara, Gasaama yara,
EZR 2:49 Oza yara, Faseeha yara, Besaya yara,
EZR 2:50 Asina yara, Me7unima yara, Nifuseesima yara,
EZR 2:51 Baqibuuqa yara, Haqufa yara, Harhura yara,
EZR 2:52 Basiluuta yara, Mahida yara, Harsa yara,
EZR 2:53 Barqoosa yara, Sisaara yara, Teema yara,
EZR 2:54 Nasiya yaranne Haxifa yara.
EZR 2:55 Haysati di7ope simmida Solomone oosanchota yarata; Soxaya yara, Sofeereta yara, Faruuda yara,
EZR 2:56 Ya7ila yara, Darqoona yara, Gadalla yara,
EZR 2:57 Safaaxa yara, Haxeela yara, Fakiraata yara, Haxaboyma yaranne Ama yara.
EZR 2:58 Di7ope simmidi, Xoossa keethan oothiya asa yaratinne Solomone aylleta yarata tayboy 392.
EZR 2:59 Haysafe kaalleysati qassi Talmela, Telaresa, Karuba, Adaananne Imera katamatape Yerusalaame simmidosona. Shin enti woyko enta aawati Isra7eele sheeshi gideysa erisanaw enti danda7ibookona.
EZR 2:60 Dalaya, Xoobbiyanne Naqooda yarati 652.
EZR 2:61 Kahinetape Abaya yaray, Aqoosa yaraynne Barzile yaray simmidosona. Barziley ha sunthan xeegetanaw danda7iday Galada biitta asi gidida Barzile na7iw macho ekida gishosa.
EZR 2:62 Haysati banta yeleta xaphuwa eranaw yeleta maxaafan koydosona, shin demmibookona. Hessa gisho, enti tuna geetetidi kahinetethan oothonna mela digetidosona.
EZR 2:63 Uriimeninne Tumiimen shaakidi pirdiya kahiney dendana gakanaw, enti geeshsha kathaafe maanaw danda7onaysa Ayhudeta ayseysi entaw odis.
EZR 2:64 Di7ope Yihuda simmida asaa tayboy kumethi 42,360.
EZR 2:65 Hessika 7,337 addenne macca aylleta gujunna de7ishina. Enta giddon 200 addenne macca zammaareti de7oosona.
EZR 2:66 Di7ope simmida asaa parati 736; baquloti 245;
EZR 2:67 gimaleti 435; hareti 6,720.
EZR 2:68 Enti Yerusalaamen de7iya Xoossa keetha gakida wode issi issi soo asaa halaqati Xoossa keethay kase ba bessan keexetana mela banta dosan imota immidosona.
EZR 2:69 Issoy issoy baw danda7ida mela Xoossa keetha oosuwas imota immis; imotay 500 kilo giraame worqa, 2,800 kilo giraame biranne 100 kahineta ma7o immidosona.
EZR 2:70 Hessafe guye, kahineti, Leewetinne guutha asay Yerusalaamen uttidosona; zammaareti, Xoossa keetha penge naageysatinne Xoossa keethan oothiya oosanchoti Yerusalaame yuushon de7iya katamatan uttidosona; attida asa ubbay banta katamatan katamatan uttidosona.
EZR 3:1 Laapuntha ageenan Isra7eele asay banta de7iya katamatape issi asi gididi Yerusalaame shiiqidosona.
EZR 3:2 Iyosadeqa na7aa Iyyasunne iyara oothiya kahineti, Salatiyaala na7aa Zarubaabelinne iya dabboti Xoossaa asi gidida Muse higgiyan xaafetidaysada xuussa yarsho yarshanaw, Isra7eele Xoossaas yarsho bessi giigisidosona.
EZR 3:3 He biittan de7iya asaa ixuwape dendoysan yayyikoka, yarsho bessi kase bessan keexidi, xuu yarsho Godaas ubba wode wontanne omarsi shiishidosona.
EZR 3:4 Kase xaafetidaysada Shaqara Ba7aale bonchidosona; xuussa yarsho issi issi gallas koshsheysada pacisonna yarshidosona.
EZR 3:5 Qassi ubba wode shiiqiya xuussa yarsho, ageena xeero yarshonne Godaa geeshsha ba7aaletan yarshiya yarsho ubbaa yarshidosona. Hesaa bollaka asay ba dosan Godaas immida imota ubbaa yarshidosona.
EZR 3:6 Xoossa keetha baasoy buroo doometonaba gidikoka Laapuntha ageenan koyro gallas enti Godaas xuussa yarsho shiisho doomidosona.
EZR 3:7 Hessafe guye, shuchu masseysatasinne anaaxetas miishe immidi ooso oykidosona. Farse kawoy Qiroosi entaw kiitida gisho, Libaanoosape ziga abba pinthidi, Yoophe ehanaw Sidoonanne Xiroosa asaas kathi, ushshinne zayte immidosona.
EZR 3:8 Enti Yerusalaame simmida nam7antho laythan nam7antho ageenan, Salatiyaala na7ay Zarubaabeli, Iyosadeqa na7aa Iyyasuynne enta dabboti, kahineti, Leewetinne di7ope simmida asa ubbay Xoossa keetha kase bessan keexo doomidosona. Qassi Xoossa keetha oosuwa aawatethan xeellana mela laatamu laythi gididaysatanne laatamu laythafe aadhida Leeweta shuumidosona.
EZR 3:9 Leewe koche gidida Iyyasu, iya naytanne iya dabboti, Hodawa soo asi gidida Qadimi7eelinne iya nayti issife gididi, Xoossa oosuwa oosisana mela aawatethi ekidosona; Enhadada koche gidida Leeweti enta maaddidosona.
EZR 3:10 Anaaxeti Xoossa keethaa baasuwa yegethi oykiya wode, kahineti banta ma7o ma7idi moyze oykidi, Asaafa koche gidida, Leeweti daala oykidi, Isra7eele kawa Dawita wogaa mela Godaa galatanaw eqidosona.
EZR 3:11 Enti Godaa galatishenne issoy issuwa kaali kaali mazmuren sabbishe, haysada yaagidi zammaridosona. “Goday keeha; Isra7eeles de7iya iya siiqoy merinaasa” yaagidosona. Xoossa keetha baasoy yegetiya gisho, asa ubbay banta qaala dhoqu oothidi ililishe Godaa galatidosona.
EZR 3:12 Shin kase Xoossaa keetha be7ida cima kahinetape, Leewetapenne kochata halaqatape daroti ha77i Xoossa keetha keexanaw yegetida baasuwa be7ida wode banta qaala dhoqu oothidi yeekidosona; harati qassi ufaytishe bonchidosona.
EZR 3:13 Oonika Ufaysa ililisaanne yeeho waasuwa shaakanaw danda7ibeenna; asay waassiya waasoy wolqaama gidiya gisho waasoy haahon si7etees.
EZR 4:1 Yihudasinne Biniyaames morke gidida asay, di7ope simmidaysati Godaas, Isra7eele Xoossas keethe keexeysa si7idosona.
EZR 4:2 Zarubaabelakonne Isra7eele yara halaqatako yidi, “Asoore kawoy Asiradooni nuna ha bessaa ehida gallasape doomidi, nuka hinte Xoossa goyinnoos, iyaw yarshoos. Hessa gisho, nuka hintera keexana” yaagidosona.
EZR 4:3 Shin Zarubaabeli, Iyyasuynne Isra7eele yara halaqati, “Nu Xoossaa keetha keexanaw nuusinne hintew gishoy baawa. Shin Farse kawoy Qiroosi kiittidaysada Godaa, Isra7eele Xoossa keetha nuuni nu xalaala keexana” yaagidosona.
EZR 4:4 Hessafe guye, he biittan de7iya asay, Yihuda asay Xoossa keetha keexonna mela ufaysi qanxisanawunne yashisanaw dendidosona.
EZR 4:5 Farse kawa Qiroosa laythafe bidi Daariyosa kawotetha gakanaw enti Yihuda asaa zoreta laallana mela ase shammidosona.
EZR 4:6 Arxekisisi kawotida wode Yihudanne Yerusalaame asaa mootanaw payle dooyidosona.
EZR 4:7 Arxekisisa kawotetha laythan, Bishilaami, Mitridaati, Xabeelinne enta bagga gididi, Farse kawa Arxekisisas dabdaabe xaafidosona; he dabdaabey Aramike pidaleninne doonan xaafetis.
EZR 4:8 Biitta aysiya Rehuuminne xaafey Simsayi Yerusalaameba haysada yaagidi, kawa Arxekisisas dabdaabe xaafidosona;
EZR 4:9 “Ha dabdaabey biitta aysiya Rehuumape, xaafiya Simsayape, Beteraplesape, Farsepe, Arkafe, Babiloonepe Suusapenne Elama biittan de7iya daynnatapenne biitta ayseysafe,
EZR 4:10 qassi gitanne bonchetida kawa Asnafaari di77idi Samaareninne Efraxiisa Shaafape hefinthan wothida asa ubbaafe xaafetis” yaagidosona.
EZR 4:11 Enta dabdaabey haysada yaagees; “Kawa Arxekisisas, Efraxiisa Shaafape hefinthan de7iya ne moorinatape yedetida dabdaabe.
EZR 4:12 “Kawaw, ne matape nuuko yida Ayhudeti Yerusalaame yidi, ha makallanne iita katamiw zaaridi keexo bolla de7eysa era. I gimbe dirsa oorathosona; I baasuwa yeggoosona; I xaphuwa minthoosona.
EZR 4:13 Hessa bolla qassi, ha katamiya keexetikonne I dirsa gimbey ooraxiko enti giiranne qaraxa qanxonnaysa era; kawo keethi geliya miishey guuxanaysa akeeka.
EZR 4:14 Nuuni kawoy shuumin ootheyisata gidiya gishonne kawoy kawuyishin be7anaw koyonna gisho haysa ne erana mela gidi odoos.
EZR 4:15 Hessa gisho, kase ne aawata taarike maxaafay koyetidi xeeleto; he xaafetidabape ha katamiya makallanne kawotasinne biittatas meto medhashe de7idaysa eranaw danda7aasa; hessa gaason iya laaletasu.
EZR 4:16 Ha katamiya keexetiyanne I dirsa gimbey ooraxiyaba gidiko, Efraxiisa Shaafape hefinthan de7iya biittay ne kushepe keydaysa era” yaagidosona.
EZR 4:17 Kawoy haysada giya zaaro entaw yeddis; “Biitta aysiya Rehuuma, xaafiya Simsaya, Samaareninne Efraxiisa Shaafape hefinthan de7iya entara issifida asaa saro gayis.
EZR 4:18 Hinte taw yeddida dabdaabey birshetidi nabbabetin si7as.
EZR 4:19 Ta kiitan, kase taarikey koyetidi xeeletiya wode, ha katamiya benipeka kawotas makallanne meto medhashe de7iya biitta gideysi eretis.
EZR 4:20 Yerusalaamen wolqaama kawoti kawotidosona; Efraxiisa Shaafape hefinthan de7iya Biittafeka he kawoti giiranne qaraxa ekidosona.
EZR 4:21 Hessa gisho, taani entaw ha kiita immana gakanaw, ha asati he katamiw keexeysa essana mela odite.
EZR 4:22 Hinte ha oda qelli goonna mela naagetite; kawotas meto darsanaw koshshenna” yaagidi kiittis.
EZR 4:23 Kawa Arxekisisa dabdaabey Rehuumas, xaafiya Simsayasinne entara de7iya ubbaas nabbabetida wode Yerusalaamen de7iya Ayhudetako ellesi bidi, enti keexeysa wolqan essidosona.
EZR 4:24 He wodepe doomidi Yerusalaamen de7iya Xoossaa keetha oosoy Daariyosi kawotida nam7antho laythi gakanaw eqis.
EZR 5:1 He wode nam7u nabeti Haggeynne Zakaryaasi Yihudaninne Yerusalaamen de7iya Ayhude asaas Isra7eele Xoossa sunthan tinbite odidosona.
EZR 5:2 Salatiyaala na7ay Zarubaabelinne Iyosadeqa na7ay Iyyasuy dendidi, Yerusalaamen de7iya Godaa keethaa zaaridi keexanaw doomidosona. Xoossaa nabetika enta maaddishe entara de7idosona.
EZR 5:3 He wode Efraxiisa Shaafape hefinthan de7iya biitta aysiya Tantani, Satarbuzaninne entara de7eysati Yerusalaame yidi, “Ha keetha hinte keexana mala hintew maata immiday oonee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
EZR 5:4 Qassi, “Ha keetha keexiya asata sunthay oonee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
EZR 5:5 Shin Xoossa ayfey Yihuda cimata bolla de7iya gisho, ha oday Daariyosako gakin, dabdaabey yaana gakanaw enta oonika ooso digibenna.
EZR 5:6 Efraxiisa Shaafape hefintha biitta aysiya Tantanaya, Satarbuzaninne entara oothiya kawa Daariyosas xaafida dabdaabey haysa.
EZR 5:7 Enti iyaw yeddida dabdaabey haysada yaagidi nabbabetees. Kawa Daariyosa, saroy new gido.
EZR 5:8 Nuuni Yihuda biittan de7iya gita Xoossaa keetha bidi be7idaysa kawoy ero. He Xoossa keethay gita shuchan keexetis; gimbe tuussati keyidosona; oosoyka gita akeekaninne eeson oosetishe de7ees.
EZR 5:9 “Nuuni, Ha keetha keexana mala hintew maata immiday oonee?” yaagidi cimata oychida.
EZR 5:10 Qassi entana kaalethiya asata sunthay ooneko xaafidi nena erisanaw enta oychida.
EZR 5:11 Enti haysada yaagidi zaaridosona: “Nuuni salonne sa7a Xoossaa aylleta; nuuni daro laythafe kase gita Isra7eele kawoy keexidi polida keetha zaaridi keexoos.
EZR 5:12 Nu aawati salo Xoossaa hanqethida gisho, I enta Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxoora kushen aathidi immis. I ha keethaa laallis; asaa di77idi Babiloone biitta efis.”
EZR 5:13 “Shin Babiloone kawoy Qiroosi ba kawotida koyro laythan, Xoossaa keethaa zaari keexana mela awaajo kessis.
EZR 5:14 Nabukadanaxoori Yerusalaamen de7iya Xoossa keethaafe eki efidi, Babiloone biittan de7iya ba kawo gadhon wothida worqanne bira miishetaka Qiroosi zaaridi yeddis. He miisheti kawoy Qiroosi Yihuda biitta aysana mela doorida Sesabisaara kushen imetis.
EZR 5:15 Kawoy, ‘Ha miisheta eka efada Yerusalaamen de7iya Xoossa keethan wotha; Xoossa keethayka kase de7iya bessan keexeto’ yaagin,
EZR 5:16 Sesabisaari yidi, ‘Xoossa keethaa keexiya bessan Yerusalaamen baasis. I ha77i gakanaw wuribeenna; he wodepe doomidi, keexetishe de7ees’ ” yaagidosona.
EZR 5:17 “Hiza ha oday kawa ufaysiyaba gidiko, ane kawoy Qiroosi ha Xoossa keethaa Yerusalaamen keexana mela, tumaka awaajuwa kessidaako eranaw kase aadhida Babiloone kawota taarike mazgabey koyetidi xeeleto. Hessafe guye, kawoy ha oda waatanaw qopidaako nuna eriso” yaagidi xaafidosona.
EZR 6:1 Hessa gisho, kawoy Daariyosa kiitan, Babiloone de7iya miishe wothiya keethan de7iya taarike mazgabeta koydosona.
EZR 6:2 Meedona awurajan Ahimata kataman issi xaatha maxaafi bentis; he maxaafan xaafetidabay haysada yaagees:
EZR 6:3 “Kawoy Qiroosi ba kawotida koyro laythan, Yerusalaamen de7iya Xoossaa keethaa gisho, haysada giya awaajo kessis. Xoossaa keethay yarsho shiishiya bessi gididi zaari keexeto; iya baasoyka yegeto. He keetha adussatethay usupun tammu wadha, dalgatethay usupun tammu wadha gido.
EZR 6:4 Heedzu toho gita shuchan yuushsho, issi toho mitha tuussati yuuyo. Hessas koshshiya miishe ubbay kawo shalo minjiya keethaafe imeto.
EZR 6:5 Nabukadanaxoori Yerusalaamen de7iya Xoossa keethaafe ekidi, Babiloone ehida Xoossa keetha worqanne bira miisheti banta bessaa guye Yerusalaame simmidi; Xoossaa keethan de7o” yaagis.
EZR 6:6 Hessafe guye, Daariyosi xaafida dabdaabey haysada yaagees. “Hinteno Efraxiisa Shaafape hefintha biitta aysiya Tatanaya, Satarbozinyanne entara ootheysato, ha Xoossa keethako shiiqopite.
EZR 6:7 Ha Xoossaa keetha oosuwas dhube gidopite. Ayhudeta halaqatinne Ayhude cimati Xoossa keetha kase bessan zaaridi keexo.”
EZR 6:8 Hessa bolla qassi, “Ha Ayhude cimati Xoossa keetha keexiya wode, enti oothiya oosoy eqonna mela entaw koshshiya miishe ubbaa Efraxiisa Shaafape hefintha biittafe shiishida kawa giira miishiyape entaw immana mela taani kiittas.
EZR 6:9 Yerusalaamen de7iya kahineti salo Xoossas xuussa yarsho yarshanaw koshshiya wofaano gidin, maraze gidin woyko dorsa urge gidin entaw immite. Qassi aybaka pacisonna enti koyiya giste, maxine, woynenne zayte entaw gallas gallas immite.
EZR 6:10 Hessa hinte immey enti salo Xoossaa ufaysiya yarsho yarshanaasanne kawuwasinne iya naytas woossanaasa.
EZR 6:11 Ha awaajuwa laammiya oonika de7iko, iya keethaa tuussaa shoddidi, he tuussaa bolla iya kaqo; iya keethayka pito yeggiya besse gido.
EZR 6:12 Ha kiita laammanaw woyko Yerusalaamen de7iya Xoossaa keethaa laallanaw kushe denthiya ay kawoy woyko asi gidin, ba sunthay xeegetana mela Yerusalaame doorida Xoossay iya dhayso. Taani Daariyosi haysa kiittas. Ha ubbay minotethan poleto” yaagis.
EZR 6:13 Hessafe guye, Efraxiisa Shaafape hefintha biitta aysiya Tatanaya, Satarbuzaninne entara oothiya ubbay kawoy Daariyosi kiittidaysada minotethan oothidi polidosona.
EZR 6:14 Ayhude cimati banta oosuwa aggonna oothidosona; qassi nabey Haggeynne Ido na7ay Zakaryaasi odida qaalan minetidosona. Isra7eele Xoossay kiittidaysada Farse kawoti Qiroosi, Daariyosinne Arxekisisi awaajidaysada Xoossa keetha keexidi wursidosona.
EZR 6:15 Daariyosi kawotida usupuntho laythan Adaare geetetiya ageenan heedzantho gallasan, Xoossaa keetha oosoy poletis.
EZR 6:16 Isra7eele asay, kahineti, Leewetinne di7ope simmida asa ubbay Xoossa keethaa anjisiya ba7aale ufaysan bonchidosona.
EZR 6:17 He ba7aaley bonchetiya wode enti issi xeetu korma, nam7u xeetu maraze, oyddu xeetu dorsa urgeta yarshidosona. Qassi nagara yarshos tammanne nam7u Isra7eele kochata taybon tammanne nam7u kole yarshidosona.
EZR 6:18 Muse Maxaafan xaafetidaysada, Yerusalaamen de7iya Xoossaa keethan oothana mela kahinetinne Leeweti enta maarada maarada wothidosona.
EZR 6:19 Di7ope simmida asay koyro ageenan tammanne oyddantho gallas Paasika Ba7aale bonchidosona.
EZR 6:20 Kahinetinne Leeweti bantana geeshshidosona; enti ubbay wogada geeydosona. Leeweti di7ope simmida ubbaas, kahinetasinne bantaw Paasika dorse shukidosona.
EZR 6:21 Di7ope simmida Isra7eele asaynne Ayhude gidonna asay oothiya tunatethaafe bantana shaakidi, Godaako, Isra7eele Xoossaako simmida asa ubbay Paasika midosona.
EZR 6:22 Goday Asoore kawa qofa laammidi Isra7eele Godaa, Xoossa keethaa keexidi polana mela maaddida gisho, enti laapun gallas Uytha Ba7aale ufaysan bonchidosona.
EZR 7:1 Daro wodepe guye, Farse kawua Arxekisisi kawotida wode Izira geetetiya issi asi de7is. Iziri Saraya na7a; Azaara na7a; Kalqe na7a;
EZR 7:2 Saluma na7a; Saadoqa na7a; Akxuuba na7a;
EZR 7:3 Amaare na7a; Azaara na7a; Marayoota na7a;
EZR 7:4 Zaraha na7a; Oza na7a; Buqa na7a;
EZR 7:5 Abisu na7a; Finihaasa na7a; Finihaasi Alaazara na7a; kahine halaqa Aarona na7a.
EZR 7:6 Haysi Iziri Babiloonepe bis. Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay immida Muse higgiya eriya asi. Godaa, Xoossaa kushey iya bolla de7iya gisho, I oychidaba ubbaa kawoy iyaw immis.
EZR 7:7 Kawoy Arxekisisi kawotida laapuntha laythan Isra7eele asaape guuthatara, kahineti, Leeweti, zammaareti, penge naageysatinne Xoossaa keetha oosanchoti Izirara issife Yerusalaame bidosona.
EZR 7:8 Kawoy kawotida laapuntha laythan ichashantho ageenan Iziri Yerusalaame gakis.
EZR 7:9 Xoossaa lo77o kushey iya bolla de7iya gisho koyro ageenan koyro gallassi Babiloonepe keyidi, ichashantho ageenan koyro gallas Yerusalaame gakis.
EZR 7:10 Iziri Godaa higgiya xanna7on, ooso bolla peeshoninne Isra7eele asaa iya wogaanne iya higgiya tamaarsanaw ba wozanaa giigisis.
EZR 7:11 Goday Isra7eeles immida higgiyanne wogga, loythi eriya kahinenne xaafe gidida Iziras kawoy Arxekisisi xaafida dabdaabey haysa.
EZR 7:12 “Kawota Kawa Arxekisisape, kahinenne salo Xoossa higge loythi eriya Iziras, saroy new gido!
EZR 7:13 “Ta kawotetha giddon de7iya Isra7eele asaape oonika, kahine woyko Leewe gidin, Yerusalaame baanaw koyiya asay neera baana mela taani kiittas.
EZR 7:14 Taaninne taara zorettiya laapun asati issife gididi, ne kushen de7iya Xoossaa higgiyada, bada Yihudaninne Yerusalaamen de7iya hanotethay ay meleko oychana mela nena kiittoos.
EZR 7:15 Yerusalaamen de7iya Isra7eele Xoossaas, taaninne taara zorettiya asati nu dosan immida worqanne bira imota ekada ba.
EZR 7:16 Hessa bolla qassi neeni Babiloone biitta kumethaafe demmida biraanne worqaa ubbaa, qassi Isra7eele asaynne kahineti Yerusalaamen de7iya banta Xoossaa keethas dosan immida imota ekada ba.
EZR 7:17 Ha miishiyan kormata, marazeta, dorsa urgetanne, katha yarshosinne ushsha yarshos koshshiyaba shammada, Yerusalaamen de7iya hinte Xoossaa keethan yarsho bessan yarsha.
EZR 7:18 “Hessafe palahida biraanne worqaa neeninne neera de7iya Ayhude gidida ne ishati hinte Xoossa shenen, hinte oothanaw koiyaba oothite.
EZR 7:19 Qassi nuuni hinte Xoossa keethaas, immida miisheta ubbaa Yerusalaame Xoossaa sinthan shiisha.
EZR 7:20 Hessafe harabay Xoossaa keethas koshshiyabay aybika de7iko, kawo miishe minjiya keethaafe ekanaw danda7aasa.
EZR 7:21 “Taani kawoy Arxekisisi Efraxiisa Shaafape hefinthan biittan de7iya miishe keethan aawatethay de7iya ubbatas ha kiita immas. Kahinenne Salo Xoossaa higgiya loythi eriya Iziri hintena oychiyabay ayba gidikoka iyaw immite.
EZR 7:22 Heedzu mukulunne oyddu xeetu kilo giraame bira, issi xeetu kuntaale giste, nam7u mukulu litiro woyne ushshi, nam7u mukulu litiro shamaho zaytenne koshshiya mela maxine iyaw immite.
EZR 7:23 Kawa bollanne kawa nayta kawotetha bolla hanqoy yoonna mela salo Xoossay ba keethas koyiyaba ubba immite.
EZR 7:24 Kahinetape, Leewetape, zammaaretape penge naageysatape, Xoossa keetha oosanchotapenne Xoossaa keetha giddon dumma dumma ooso oothiya asaape hinte giiranne qaraxa ekanaw hintew maati baawa.
EZR 7:25 “La Izira, neeni, new Xoossay immida cincatethan Efraxiisa Shaafape hefintha biittan de7iya ne Xoossaa higgiya eriya asaa bolla pirdana mela daynnatanne ayseysata shuuma. Higgiya eronna asi de7iko neeni enta tamaarsa.
EZR 7:26 Ne Xoossaa higgiyanne kawa higgiya kiitetonna oonika de7iko, I qadhey bayna hayqo woyko gadepe goodeto woyko iya shaloy bonqeto woyko qashon seereto” yaagis.
EZR 7:27 Yerusalaamen de7iya Xoossa keethaa haysada bonchetana mela kawa wozanan ha qofaa wothida Godaa, nu aawata Xoossaa galati gako!
EZR 7:28 Kawa, kawuwara zoreteysatanne iyara oothiya wolqaama halaqata sinthan ba teema taw immida Xoossaas galati gido! Godaa, ta Xoossaa kushey taara de7iya gisho, Isra7eele halaqatape eretidaysata doorada Yerusalaame eka baana mela I taw minotethi gidis.
EZR 8:1 Kawoy Arxekisisi kawotida wode taara issife Babiloone biittafe simmida soo asaa halaqati haysata;
EZR 8:2 Finihaasa yarape Gersoona, Itamaara yarape Daanela, Dawita yarape Sakana na7aa Haxusa,
EZR 8:3 Paroosa yarape Zakaryaasanne enta yeleta maaran xaafetida hara issi xeetanne ishatamu addeta.
EZR 8:4 Pahati-Moo7abe yarape Zaraha na7aa Eliho7enayanne iyara de7iya nam7u xeetu addeta.
EZR 8:5 Zata yarape Yahazi7eela na7a Sakananne iyara de7iya heedzu xeetu addeta.
EZR 8:6 Adina yarape Yoonataana na7aa Ebeedanne ishatamu addeta.
EZR 8:7 Elama yarape Gotola na7a Yishayanne iyara de7iya laapun tammu addeta.
EZR 8:8 Safaaxa yarape Mika7eela na7a Zibaadanne iyara de7iya hospun tammu addeta.
EZR 8:9 Iyo7aaba yarape Yi7eela na7a Abdiyunne iyara de7iya nam7u xeetanne tammanne hospun addeta.
EZR 8:10 Baana yarape Yosifiya na7a Salomitanne iyara de7iya issi xeetanne usupun tammu addeta.
EZR 8:11 Bebaya yaraape Bebaya na7aa Zakariyasanne iyara de7iya laatamanne hospun addeta,
EZR 8:12 Azgada yarape Haqaxaana na7a Yohaananne iyara de7iya issi xeetanne tammu addeta.
EZR 8:13 Adonqaama yarape wursethan simmidaysati, Elfalaxa, Yi7u7eela, Shamayanne entara de7iya usupun tammu addeta.
EZR 8:14 Bigiwaya yarape Utaya, Zakuranne entara issife hara laapun tammu addeta.
EZR 8:15 Taani Ahawako goggiya shaafa matan enta shiishas. Nuuni he bessan dunkaanidi, heedzu gallas takida. Taani he bessan de7iya asaanne kahineta taybiya wode Leewe yarape issi asika demmabike.
EZR 8:16 Hessa gisho, Alaazara, Ar7eela, Shamaya, Elnaatana, Yariba, Elnaatana, Naatana, Zakaryaasanne Masulaama geeteteysatanne cinca asi gidida Yoyaaribanne Elnaatana xeegas.
EZR 8:17 Enta Kasfiya geetetiya bessan Leewetas halaqanne Xoossa keetha oosancho gidida Adosinne iya dabotas odanaba akeekisada nu Xoossa keethan oothiya ase ehana mela kiittas.
EZR 8:18 Nu Xoossa lo77o kushey nu bolla de7iya gisho, Isra7eele na7a Leewe yara Mahila yaranne daro cinca asi gidida Sarebaya geetetiya addiya tammanne hospun iya naytanne iya ishata, nuus yeddidosona.
EZR 8:19 Hessadaka, Hashaba, Maraara yara gidida Yashaya, iya naytanne laatamu gidiya iya ishatara yeddidosona.
EZR 8:20 Hessa bolla kase aawati Leeweta maaddana mela Dawitanne iyara oothiya halaqati shuumida Xoossa keetha oosanchotape nam7u xeetanne laatamu asata yeddidosona. Hessati ubbay banta sunthan xaafetidosona.
EZR 8:21 Nu Xoossaa sinthan nu huuphiya kawushidi, ogey nuus, nu naytasinne nu shalo ubbaas saro gidana mela woossana mela yan Ahawa Shaafa matan xooma awaajas.
EZR 8:22 Kase nuuni kawas, “Nu Xoossaa lo77o kushey iya koyeyisata bolla de7ees; shin iya wolqaama hanqoy iya aggeyisata bolla de7ees” yaagidi odida gisho, nuuni biya ogiyan de7iya morketape nuna naagana mela wotaadarenne parata immanaada kawa oychanaw yeellatas.
EZR 8:23 Hessa gisho, nuuni xoomidi, Xoossa woossida; ika nu woosa si7is.
EZR 8:24 Kahine halaqatape Sarebaya, Hasabayanne hara enta dabbo gidida tammu asata dooras.
EZR 8:25 Kawoy, iyara zoreteysati, iya shuumatinne Isra7eele ubbay nu Xoossaa keethas immida bira, worqanne, hara miisheta ubbaa likada enta kushen wothas.
EZR 8:26 Taani entaw immidabay haysa; laatamanne nam7u mukulu kilo giraame bira, heedzu mukulunne oyddu xeetu kilo giraame birape oosetida miisheta, heedzu mukulunne oyddu xeetu kilo giraame worqa,
EZR 8:27 hospun kilo giraamenne oyddu xeetu giraame worqafe oosetida laatamu saanetanne worqada al7onne muruuto gidida naase biratape oosetida nam7u saaneta.
EZR 8:28 Hessafe guye, taani entako haysada yaagas; “Hintenne ha miisheti Godaas dummatideta; ha biraynne worqay, asay ba dosan Godaas, hinte aawata Xoossaas immida imota.
EZR 8:29 Yerusalaamen de7iya Xoossa keethan miishe minjiya keethaa gakidi, kahine halaqata sinthan, Leeweta sinthaninne Isra7eele yarata halaqata sinthan immana gakanaw, ha miisheta loythidi naagite” yaagas.
EZR 8:30 Hessa gisho, kahinetinne Leeweti Yerusalaamen de7iya Xoossa keethi efanaw bira, worqanne hara miisheta ubbaa mizaanen likidi aawatethan ekidosona.
EZR 8:31 Koyro ageenan tammanne nam7antho gallasan Yerusalaame baanaw Ahawa Shaafa matape dendida. Nu bolla de7iya nu Xoossaa lo77o kushey nu biya ogen de7iya morketapenne pangatape nuna ashshis.
EZR 8:32 Nuuni Yerusalaame gakidi, yan heedzu gallas shempida.
EZR 8:33 Oyddantho gallas bira, worqanne hara miisheta ubbaa likidi, Uraya na7aa kahiniya Maremootas immida. Finihaasa na7aa Alaazari, Leewe gidida Iyyasu na7aa Yozabaatinne Biniya na7a No7aadi iyara issife de7oosona.
EZR 8:34 Ubbabay he wode taybeti liketidi xaafetis.
EZR 8:35 Hessafe guye, di7ope simmida asay, Isra7eele Xoossaas, tammanne nam7u korma, uddufun tammanne usupun marazenne laapun tammanne laapun dorsa urgeta xuussa yarsho oothidi, qassi tammanne nam7u kole nagara yarsho oothidi Godaas yarshidosona. Hessi ubbay xuussa yarsho gididi Godaas shiiqis.
EZR 8:36 Kawoy kiitida kiittaka kawuwape garsara biitta ayseysatasinne Efraxiisa Shaafape hefintha biitta ayseysatas immidosona; enti Isra7eele asaanne Xoossa keethaa oosuwa maaddidosona.
EZR 9:1 Ha ubbay hanidaape guye, deriya kaaletheysati taako yidi, haysada yaagidosona; “Isra7eele asay, hari attoshin, kahineti, Leeweti, banta heeran de7iya, Kanaaneta, Hiteta, Parzeta, Yaabuseta, Amooneta, Moo7abeta, Gibxetanne Amooreta tunaape bantana shaakibookona.
EZR 9:2 Bantawunne banta naytas Ayhude gidonna macca naytape macho ekidosona; hessa gaason geeshsha zeretha Ayhude gidonna asaara walakidosona. Ha balan koyro gididay kaaletheysatanne halaqata” yaagidosona.
EZR 9:3 Taani ha oda si7ida wode ta ma7uwanne ta qamisiya daakas; ta huuphiyanne ta buuchaa sikas; daro dagammada utta aggas.
EZR 9:4 Di7ope simmida asay oothida nagaraa gisho, Isra7eele Xoossay odida qaalas yayyida asa ubbay taani de7iya bessaa taako shiiqidosona. Omarsa yarsho yarshiya wode gakanaw dagammada uttida bessaafe dendabike.
EZR 9:5 Shin omarsa yarshoy shiiqiya wode, ta ma7oynne ta qamisey daaketidi de7ishin, taani azzanada uttida bessaafe dendas. Gulbatada Godaako, ta Xoossaako, ta kushiya denthada, haysada yaagada woossas.
EZR 9:6 “Abeeti ta Xoossaw, nu nagaray dooretidi nu huuphiyape aadhida gishonne nu naaqoy salo gakida gisho taani ta som7uwa neeko denthanaw yayyaysinne yeellatayis.
EZR 9:7 Nuuni nu mayzata wodepe doomin, hachi gakanaw, nena daro naaqida. Nu nagaraa gaason nuuni, nu kawotinne nu kahineti ha77iysada allaga kawota kushen kundida; mashshas, do7os, bonqeesinne yeellas aadhidi imetida.
EZR 9:8 “Shin ha77i Goday nu Xoossay nuupe guutha asi ashshanawunne ba keethan nuus besse immanaw koyidi guutha wodes marotethi immis. Hessa gisho Xoossay nu ayfiya dooyis; nu aylletethan de7ishin guutha wodes shempo immis.
EZR 9:9 Nuuni aylle gidikoka, nu Xoossay nuna aylletethan aggibeenna; nu de7uwa oorathis. Nu Xoossaa keethaa keexana mela, laaletidaysa oorathana melanne Yihudaninne Yerusalaamen saro daana mela Farse kawota sinthan nuus teemo immis.
EZR 9:10 “Shin nu Xoossaw, ha77i yaatin, nuuni woyganee? Heko ha77ika ne kiita toochida.
EZR 9:11 Nu toochiday ne aylle gidida nabeta baggara ‘Hinte laattanaw geliya biittay, in de7iya asan tunidaaro; ha gaxape hini gaxaa gakanaw enta iita oosuwaninne tunatethan kumasu.
EZR 9:12 Hessa gisho, hinte mino gidana mela, he biitta ayfiya maana melanne merinaw hinte naytas laatisana mela, hinte macca nayta enta adde naytas immofite; enta macca nayta hinte adde naytas ekofite. Enti sarotethaninne duretethan daana mela amottofite’ yaagadasa.
EZR 9:13 “Nu bolla gakida iitaba ubbay nu iita oosuwanne nu gita nagara gaasona. Gidoshin, neeni nu Xoossay nu nagara darotethaa mela nuna pirdabaaka; shin nuupe guuthata ashshadasa.
EZR 9:14 Nuuni haysa mela tunabaa oothiya asaara ekoninne gelon walaketidi, waanidi ne kiita ixas gaanee? Ha attida guutha kochay dhayana gakanaw ne hanqoy nu bolla dareneyee?
EZR 9:15 Abeeti Godaw, Isra7eele Xoossaw, neeni xillo; nuuni ha77i gakanaw attidi de7on de7oos. Nu nagaraa gaason nuupe issoyka ne sinthan eqanaw danda7ey baawa; attidaysati hachi haysan ne sinthan de7oos” yaagas.
EZR 10:1 Iziri Xoossa keetha sinthan kundidi yeekishe woossiya wodenne nagaraa paaxiya wode macci, addeynne na7i de7iya Isra7eele asay iyako shiiqidi, yibbata yeeho iyara yeekidosona.
EZR 10:2 Elama yara gidida Yi7eela na7ay Sakan haysada yaagis; “Nuuni nu yuushon de7iya allaga maccasata ekidi, nu Xoossaas ammanetiboko. Gidoshin, ha77ika Isra7eeles ufaysi de7ees.
EZR 10:3 Ta godaw, neeninne nu Xoossa kiita naageysati zoridaysada nuuni ha maccasaanne entafe yeletida nayta ubbaa yeddanaw qaala geloos. Hessi ubbay Godaa higgey geysada poleto.
EZR 10:4 Izira ha oosoy ne kushen de7ees, denda; nuuni nena maaddana; minna!” yaagis.
EZR 10:5 Iziri dendi eqidi, kahineta, Leewetanne Isra7eele asaa ubbaa ha geetetidaysata oothana mela caaqisis; entika caaqidosona.
EZR 10:6 Iziri Xoossa keetha sinthafe dendidi, Eliyaseeba na7ay Yohaani de7iya kifile gelis. Yan di7ope simmida asay nagaras yeekishe aqida gisho, he bessan kathi mibeenna; haatheka uybeenna.
EZR 10:7 Di7ope simmida asay Yerusalaame shiiqana mela, Yihudaninne Yerusalaamen awaajidosona.
