EZR 10:8 Ha heedzu gallasata giddon he bessan shiiqonna oonika de7iko, iyaw de7iyabay ubbay eketana melanne ika di7ope simmida asa shiiquwape kurettana mela halaqatinne cimati oda kuuyidosona.
EZR 10:9 He geetetida heedzu gallasata giddon, uddufuntho ageenan laatamantho gallasan Yihudanne Biniyaame asa ubbay Yerusalaame shiiqidosona. Ha deexo odaanne wolqaama ira gaason, kokorishe, Xoossaa keetha sinthan de7iya dabaaban uttidosona.
EZR 10:10 Kahine Iziri dendiidi haysada yaagis; “Hinte ammanetonna ixideta; allaga maccasata macho ekidi, Isra7eele naaquwa bolla naaqo gujideta.
EZR 10:11 Hinte nagara Godaas, hinte aawata Xoossas paaxite; iya ufaysiyaba oothite. He biittan de7iya Ayhude gidonna asaapenne hinte ekida Ayhude gidonna hinte machetape shaaketite” yaagis.
EZR 10:12 Shiiqida asay banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, haysada yaagidosona. “Ne giyaba ubba nuuni oothana!
EZR 10:13 Shin haysan shiiqida asay daro; hessa bolla wolqaama iri bukees. Nuuni irape attiya bessi haysan baawa. Ha nagaran qohida asay daro gidida gisho, issi gallasan woyko nam7u gallasan ha oda polanaw danda7oko.
EZR 10:14 Ha shiiqida asaa sunthan nu halaqati Yerusalaamen gam7idi, koshshiyaba ootho. Hessa gaason dendada Xoossaa wolqaama hanqoy nuupe simmana gakanaw, nu katamatan de7iya Ayhude gidonna maccasata ekida ubbay keerida qamman katamata cimatinne daynnatara issife Yerusalaame yo.
EZR 10:15 Asaheela na7ay Yoonataaninne Tequwa na7ay Yahizi enta qofaa phalqidosona; Masulaaminne Leewe gidida Sabati entana maaddidosona” yaagidosona.
EZR 10:16 Di7ope simmida asay gidaysada oothidosona. Kahiney Iziri ubba kochatape halaqata dooridi, ubbaa enta sunthan sunthan xaafis. Tammantho ageenan koyro gallasan halaqati oda pilgidi be7o doomidosona.
EZR 10:17 Koyro ageenan koyro gallasay gakanaw, Ayhude gidonna maccasata ekida asata ubbaa pilgidi wursidosona.
EZR 10:18 Kahine kochata giddofe allaga maccasata ekidaysati haysata; Iyosadeqa na7a Iyyasu kochatapenne iya ishata giddofe Ma7iseya, Alaazara, Yaribanne Godoliya.
EZR 10:19 Enti banta macheta yeddanaw qaala gelidosona; banta nagara gisho, wudiyape issi issi maraze naaqo yarsho oothidi yarshidosona.
EZR 10:20 Imera yarape Allaga macheta ekidaysati Hanaananne Zabada.
EZR 10:21 Harima yarape Ma7iseya, Eeliyaasa, Shamaya, Yi7eelanne Ooziya.
EZR 10:22 Paskora yarape Eliyo7anaya, Ma7iseya, Isma7eela, Natina7eela, Yozabaatanne Elsi.
EZR 10:23 Leewetape, Yozabaata, Same7a, Qalixa geetetiya Qelaya, Fataya, Yihudanne Alaazara.
EZR 10:24 Zammaaretape, Eliyaseeba. Penge naageysatape, Saluma, Xelemanne Ure.
EZR 10:25 Isra7eeletape, Faroosa yarape Ramiya, Yizaya, Malkiya, Mayamina, Alaazara, Malkiyanne Banaya.
EZR 10:26 Elama yarape Mataana, Zakaryaasa, Yi7eela, Abda, Yiremootanne Ela.
EZR 10:27 Zata yarape Eliyo7ana, Eliyaseeba, Mataana, Yiremoota, Zabadanne Aziiza.
EZR 10:28 Babaya yarape Yohaana, Hanaana, Zabayanne Atilaya.
EZR 10:29 Baana yarape Masulaama, Maluka, Adaya, Yasuuba, Shaalanne Yiremoota.
EZR 10:30 Pahati-Moo7aba yarape Adina, Kalala, Banaya, Ma7iseya, Mataana, Basili7eela, Binuyanne Minaase.
EZR 10:31 Karima yarape Alaazara, Yisheya, Malkiya, Shamaya, Simoona,
EZR 10:32 Biniyaame, Malukanne Samaraya.
EZR 10:33 Hasuma yarape Mataana, Mataata, Zabada, Elfalaxa, Yeremaya, Minaasenne Same7a.
EZR 10:34 Baana yarape Madaya, Amraama, Ula,
EZR 10:35 Banaya, Bedaya, Kalqe,
EZR 10:36 Waaniya, Maremoota, Eliyaseeba,
EZR 10:37 Mataana Matinayanne Ya7isa.
EZR 10:38 Binuya yarape Sama7a,
EZR 10:39 Selema, Naatana, Adaya,
EZR 10:40 Makinadabaya, Sasaya, Saraya,
EZR 10:41 Azari7eela, Selema, Samara,
EZR 10:42 Saluma, Amaarenne Yoosefa.
EZR 10:43 Nabo yarape Yi7eela, Matita, Zabada, Zabina, Yadaya, Iyyu7eelanne Banaya.
EZR 10:44 Ha ubbay Ayhude gidonna macheta ekidaysata; issoti issoti na7aka yelidosona.
NEH 1:1 Hakaliya na7aa Nahime qaalay haysa. Arxekisisi Farse biittan kawotin laatamantho laythan, Kisile geetetiya ageenan, taani Nahimey waanna katama gidiya Suusan de7ayis.
NEH 1:2 Ta ishatape issoy, Hanaani, hara asatara issife Yihudape taako yin, taani Yerusalaamebanne Babiloone di7etonna attida Ayhudetaba enta oychas.
NEH 1:3 Enti zaaridi, “Babiloone di7etonna attida asaynne di7etidi simmida Ayhudeti gita metoninne kawushan de7oosona. Yerusalaame gimbe dirsay laaletis qassi gimbiya pengeti taman xuugetidosona” yaagidosona.
NEH 1:4 Ta haysa ubbaa si7ida wode uttada yeekas. Daro gallas azzanoninne xooman salo Xoossaa haysada yaagada woossas.
NEH 1:5 “Abeeti Godaw, salo Xoossaw, gitaw, bonchetidayso, nena doseysatasinne ne kiita naageysatas ne merina siiqo caaquwa naagasa.
NEH 1:6 Taani ne aylley, ne aylle gidida Isra7eele asaa gisho qammanne gallas woossiya woosa si7anaw ne haythay hayzo; ne ayfey tana xeello. Nu Isra7eele asay oothida nagaraa ubbaa new paaxayis; tuma taaninne ta mayzati nena naaqida.
NEH 1:7 Nuuni ne bolla daro iita nagara oothida; neeni ne aylliya Muse baggara nuus immida kiitaa, wogaanne higgiya naagibooko.
NEH 1:8 Ne aylliya Muses ne odida qaala hayyana qopa; neeni, ‘Hinte taw ammanetona ixiko, taani hintena Ayhude gidonna biittatan laallana.
NEH 1:9 Shin hinte taako simmidi, ta kiita naagiko, hinte hari attoshin sa7aa gaxaa gakanaw laaletikoka, ta sunthay xeegetana mela doorida bessaa zaarada ehana’ gidaysa qopa.
NEH 1:10 “Neeni ne gita wolqaaninne ne mino qesiyan woza ekida ne aylletanne ne asata.
NEH 1:11 Abeeti Godaw, taani ne aylley woossiya woosaanne nena bonchanaw dosiya, ne aylleta woosa ne haythay si7o. Ta ne aylley hachi oothanaw koyidabay taw ushacanaada, kawa sinthan taw saba imma” yaagas. Taani he wode kawas woyne ushsha tigiya asi.
NEH 2:1 Arxekisisi kawotida laatamantho laythan, Nisaane geetetiya ageenan, issi gallas kawa sinthan woyne ushsha shiishas. He gallasepe attishin, kase kawa sinthan azzana erike.
NEH 2:2 Hessa gisho, kawoy, “Nena sakiyabay baawa, shin haysa mela ayis azzanadii? Hessi ne wozanay issiban azzanidaysa bessees” yaagis. Yaagin, taani daro yayyada, kawako,
NEH 2:3 “Kawoy merinaw kawoto! Ta mayzati moogetida katamay laaletidi dhayin, qassi he katamaa dirsa pengeti taman xuugetin ayis azzanikina?” yaagas.
NEH 2:4 Kawoy zaaridi, “Yaatin, ha77i ta new ay oothana mela koyay?” yaagis. Taani salo Xoossaa woossa simmada,
NEH 2:5 kawako, “Kawaw, ta ne sinthan saba demmidaba gidikonne ta oyshay ufaysiyabaa gidiko, Yihuda biitta, ta mayzati moogetida katamaa bada zaara keexana mela tana yeddarki” yaagas.
NEH 2:6 He wode kawiya, Kawa Arxekisisa matan uttida de7ishin, kawoy zaaridi, “Ne ogey ay mela wode ekanee? Ne awude simmanee?” yaagidi tana oychis. Taani ta simmana wodiya iyaw odin, kawoy ufaytidi tana yeddis.
NEH 2:7 Qassi, “Kawa, nena ufaysiyabaa gidiko, ta Yihuda gakanaw he biittara kanthada aadhana mela Efraxiisa shaafape wuloha baggara de7iya biitta haareysatas dabdaabey xaafeto” yaagada kawa woossas.
NEH 2:8 Hessadaka, “Xoossa keetha pengiya giigisanaw, katamaa gimbe dirsaa diranawunne ta daana keethaa keexanaw taw mithi immana mela kawo wora naagiya Asaafas dabdaabey xaafeto” yaagada oychas. Xoossaa lo77o kushey taara de7iya gisho kawoy taani oychidaba ubba immis.
NEH 2:9 Kawoy taara guutha toora moconatanne para toggeyisata yeddis. Taani entara issife Efraxiisa shaafape wuloha bagga biitta gakada kawoy yeddida dabdaabiya he biitta haareysatas immas.
NEH 2:10 Shin Horoona katama asi gidida Sanbalaaxinne Amoone biitta halaqa gidida Xoobbey, “Isra7eele asaas lo77oba oothiya asi yis” geetetidaysa si7ida wode daro yilotidosona.
NEH 2:11 Taani Yerusalaame gakada heedzu gallas yan gam7as.
NEH 2:12 Yerusalaames taani oothana mela Xoossay ta wozanan wothida qofaa oodeska odabike. Hessafe guye, taara de7iya asaape guuthata ekada qamma dendada bas. He wode taani toggida mehiyape hara toga mehey nuus baawa.
NEH 2:13 Taani bilahe dendada Zangaara Pengiyara kanthada, Dawe Pulto geetetiya bessaara aadhada, Pito Penge geetetiya bessaa gakanaw bas. Yaara aadhashe laaletida Yerusalaame gimbiyanne taman xuugetida gimbe pengeta be7as.
NEH 2:14 Hessafe simmada Pulto Pengiyakonne kawa teqe haathay de7iya bessaa bas. Gidoshin, ta toggida mehey aadhiya oge demmabike.
NEH 2:15 Hessa gisho, qamma Qediroona Zangaara giddora aadhada gimbiya be7as. Wursethan, guye simmada Zangaara Pengiyara katamaa gelas.
NEH 2:16 Yan de7iya halaqatape oonika taani awu bidaako, woyko ay oothidaako eribeenna. Ayis giiko, taani Ayhudetas, kahinetas, bonchetida asatas, halaqatasinne oosuwa oothanaw de7iya asaape oodeska ta qofaa odabike.
NEH 2:17 Hessefe guye, entako, “Nuuni ay mela meton de7iyako be7eeta; Yerusalaame katamay laaletis; gimbe pengeti taman xuugetidosona. Ha yiite, Yerusalaame gimbiya zaaridi gimboos; nuna gakida yeella ane diggoos” yaagas.
NEH 2:18 Qassi Xoossaa lo77o kushey taara de7eysanne kawoy taw odidaba ubbaa entaw odas. Enti zaaridi, “Ane dendoos; zaaridi gimboos” yaagidi banta kushiya lo77o oosos minthidosona.
NEH 2:19 Shin Horoona katamaa asi gidida Sanbalaaxi, Amoone biitta asi gidida Xoobeynne Araba biitta asi gidida Geesamey hessa si7ida wode, nu bolla qelqisidi miicidosona. “Haysi hinte oothiyabay ayibee? Woyko kawa bolla makallanaw koyeetii?” yaagidi oychidosona.
NEH 2:20 Taani zaarada, “Salo Xoossay nuna polisana; nuuni iya aylleti dendidi oothana. Shin Yerusalaamen hintew gishoy woyko hintena gathiyabay woyko hintena qofisiyabay baawa” yaagas.
NEH 3:1 Kahine halaqay Eliyaseebinne hara kahineti Dorsa Pengiya zaari gimbidi Xoossas dummayidosona; sanqa aathidosona. Enti Xeeta geetetiya gimbe shakuwafe bidi Hanaani7eela geetetiya gimbe shakuwa gakanaw gimbidi Xoossas dummayidosona.
NEH 3:2 Enta lanqen de7iya bessaa Iyaarko asay gimbin, kaallidi de7eysa Imira na7ay Zakuri gimbis.
NEH 3:3 Hasinaa7a nayti Molo Pengiya gimbidosona. Enti gobane essidi, sanqa aathidosona; sanqa gordiya kasuwanne kasuwa gelsiya sagaayuwa giigisidosona.
NEH 3:4 Enta kaallidi de7iya bessaa Haqooxa na7a gidida Uraya na7ay Maremooti gimbis. Iyape kaallidi de7iya bessaa Masezabeela na7a Baraka na7ay Masulaami gimbis. Iyape kaallidi de7iya bessaa Ba7ana na7ay Saadoqi gimbis.
NEH 3:5 Iya matan de7iya bessaa Taqoha katamaa asati gimbidosona. Shin he katamaa halaqati bantaw imetida oosuwa oothonna ixidosona.
NEH 3:6 Paseha na7ay Yodaaheynne Baasodiya na7ay Masulaami Gal7a Pengiya gimbidosona. Enti gobane essidi, sanqa aathidosona; sanqa gordiya kasuwanne kasuwa gelsiya sagaayuwa giigisidosona.
NEH 3:7 Enta lanqen de7iya bessaa Gaba7oona katamaa asi gidida Malaaxinne Meronoota katamaa asi gidida Yadooni gimbidosona. Gaba7oonanne Mixipha katamaa asay entara issife gididi, Efraxiisa shaafape wuloha bagga biitta haareysi de7iya keethaa gakanaw de7iya bessaa gimbidosona.
NEH 3:8 Worqa sheeshiya Harihaya na7ay Uzi7eeli enta matan de7iya bessaa gimbis. Qassi iya matan de7iya bessaa shitto oothiya Hanaani gimbis. Enti nam7ay issife Yerusalaame Dalga Gimbiya geetetiya bessaa gakanaw de7iya bessaa gimbidosona.
NEH 3:9 Enta matan de7iya bessaa Huura na7ay, Yerusalaame woradaas baggaa haariya Rafayi gimbis.
NEH 3:10 Haruma na7ay Yadayi ba keethaafe sintha baggara de7iya bessaa gimbis. Iya matan de7iya bessaa Asebaana na7ay Hatushi gimbis.
NEH 3:11 Harima na7ay Malkeynne Pahati-Moo7aba na7ay Hashubi iya matan de7iya bessaanne Itoone Shako gimbiya gimbidosona.
NEH 3:12 Enta matan de7iya bessaa Haloheesa na7ay, Yerusalaame woradaas nam7antho baggaa haariya Saluminne iya macca nayti gimbidosona.
NEH 3:13 Hanuninne Zanoha kataman de7iya asay issife Zangaara Pengiya gimbidosona. Enti gobane essidi, sanqa aathidosona; sanqa gordiya mithaanne mithaa gelsiya sagaayuwa giigisidosona. Pito Pengiya gakanaw issi mukulu wadha adussa gimbiya gujidi gimbidosona.
NEH 3:14 Rakaaba na7ay, Beet-Hakareema woradaa haariya Malkey Pito Pengiya gimbis. Enti gobane essidi, sanqa aathidosona; sanqa gordiya kasuwanne kasuwa gelsiya sagaayuwa giigisidosona.
NEH 3:15 Kolihaaza na7ay, Mixipha woradaa haariya Salumi Pulto Pengiya zaaridi gimbis. I pengiyas kama giigisidi sanqa aathis; sanqa gordiya kasuwanne kasuwa gelsiya sagaayuwa giigisis. Qassi, Selaha teqe haathay de7iya baggara kawa atakilte bessaafe doomidi, Dawita Katamaape dugethe wodhisiya dethaa gakanaw de7iya gimbiya gimbis.
NEH 3:16 Beet-Xura woradaas baggaa haariya Azibuuqe na7ay Nahimey gimbis. I Dawita duufuwape sintha baggara de7iya bessaa gakanaw, asi oothida teqe haathay de7iya bessaa gakanaw, olanchota keethaa gakanaw de7iya bessaa gimbis.
NEH 3:17 Haysafe kaalleysa Baana na7aa Rehuuma aawatetha garsan de7iya Leeweti gimbidosona. Enta matan de7iya bessaa Qi7aala woradaas baggaa haariya Hashabi ba woradaa sunthan gimbis.
NEH 3:18 Iyape kaallidi Henadaada na7ay, Qi7aala woradaas nam7antho bagga haariya Bawi gimbidosona.
NEH 3:19 Enta matan de7iya bessaa Iyyasu na7ay, Mixipha woradaa haariya Ezeri gimbis. I ola miishe wothiya keethaafe sintha baggara gimbiya maazaniya gakanaw de7iya bessa gimbis.
NEH 3:20 Iyape kaalleysa Zabaya na7ay Baaroki, gimbiya maazaniyape bidi, kahine halaqaa Eliyaseeba keethaa pengiya gakanaw de7iya bessaa gimbis.
NEH 3:21 Iyape kaalleysa Haqooxa na7aa gidida Uraya na7ay Maremooti Eliyaseeba keetha pengiyafe doomidi, wursethi gakanaw de7iya bessaa gimbis.
NEH 3:22 Iyape kaallidi de7eysa heeran de7iya kahineti gimbidosona.
NEH 3:23 Entafe kaallidi Biniyaameynne Hashubi banta keethaa sinthan de7iya bessaa gimbidosona. Entafe kaallidi Ananiya na7a gidida Ma7iseya na7ay Azaari ba keethaa sinthan de7iya bessaa gimbis.
NEH 3:24 Iyape kaallidi Azaara keethaafe bidi, gimbiya maazaniya gakanaw de7iya bessaa Henadaada na7ay Benuyi gimbis.
NEH 3:25 Uzaya na7ay Palali gimbiya maazaniyape doomidi, I naageysata dabaaba matan de7iya qommo bagga kawo gadho naago gimbiya gakanaw de7iya bessaa gimbis. Iyape kaallidi de7eysa Paanose na7ay Padaynne
NEH 3:26 Ofeela deriya bolla de7iya Xoossa keethaa aylleti gimbidosona. Enti Haatha Pengiya matan doloha baggan de7iya bessaanne naago gimbiya gakanaw de7iya bessaa gimbidosona.
NEH 3:27 Entafe kaallidi Taqoha katamaa asay gimbiya sinthan de7iya bessaafe bidi, Ofeela matan de7iya gimbiya gakanaw de7iya bessaa gimbidosona.
NEH 3:28 Para Pengiyafe qommo baggan, banta keethaa sinthan de7iya bessaa kahineti gimbidosona.
NEH 3:29 Entafe kaallidi Imera na7ay Saadoqi ba keethaa sinthan de7iya bessaa gimbis. Iyape kaallidi Doloha Pengiya naagiya Sakana na7ay Shamayey gimbis.
NEH 3:30 Iyape kaallidi Salama na7ay Hananinne Zalafa usupuntho na7a gidida Hanunra gimbidosona. Entafe kaallidi Baraka na7ay Masulaami ba kifiliyape sinthan de7iya bessaa gimbis.
NEH 3:31 Iyape kaallidi Xomooso Pengiya sinthan de7iya Xoossa keetha oosanchotanne zal7anchota keethaa gakanaw de7iya bessaa worqa sheeshiya Malkey gimbis. Qassi I gimbe maazaniyas bolla baggara de7iya bessaaka gimbis.
NEH 3:32 Maazaniyas qommo bagga kifiliyapenne Dorsa Pengiyafe giddon de7iya bessaa worqa sheesheysatinne zal7anchoti gimbidosona.
NEH 4:1 Nuuni dirsa gimbe oosuwa doomidaysa Sanbalaaxi si7ida wode yilo eexidi nuna leqis.
NEH 4:2 Ba laggetanne Samaare olanchota sinthan, “Ha pathonna Ayhudeti ay oothanaw qopoona? Dirsa gimbiya zaari gimbanaw koyoonayee? Yarsho yarshanaw koyoonayee? Enti issi gallasan oosuwa oothidi wursana daanii? Enti gimbees haniya shuchata xuugetidi dooretidaysa giddofe kessanaw danda7oona?” yaagis.
NEH 4:3 Iya matan eqida Amoone biitta asi gidida Xoobbey, “Enti waanida gimbe gimbanaw danda7oona? Enti gimbiya bolla workani keyako laaletana” yaagidi leqis.
NEH 4:4 Taani haysada yaagada woossas; “Nu Xoossaw, enti nuna waati leqisiyako, haysa be7a! Enti nuna cayiya cashshay entaw gido. Banta aquwa bonqetidi allaga biittan di7etida asi gido.
NEH 4:5 Enti gimbeyisata cashshan kawushida gisho, enta naaqoy geemmofo; enta nagaraa ne sinthafe quchofa” yaagas.
NEH 4:6 Nuuni gimbiya oosuwa qanxonna oothida. Asay oosuwa minni oothida gisho gimbiya oosoy ellesidi bagga gakis.
NEH 4:7 Sanbalaaxi, Xoobbey, Arabe asay, Amoone asaynne Ashdooda asay Yerusalaame gimbe oosoy lo77o oosetishe de7eysanne dooya bessati gordetidaysa si7ida wode daro yilotidosona.
NEH 4:8 Hessa gisho enti issife Yerusalaame yidi nuna olanawunne meto medhanaw maqetidosona.
NEH 4:9 Shin nuuni nu Xoossaa woossida; enta teqanaw qammanne gallas naageysata wothida.
NEH 4:10 He wode Yihuda asay, “Toohoy nuna daabursis; buroo dendanaw koshshiya dooretida daro shuchi de7ees; yaaniya gisho, nuuni gimbiya gimbanaw danda7oko” yaagidosona.
NEH 4:11 Nu morketi, “Enti nu oothiyaba eranaapenne be7anaape sinthe nu enta giddo gelidi enta wodhana; enta oosuwaka essana” yaagidosona.
NEH 4:12 Nu morketa heeran de7iya Ayhudeti tamma simmidi nu morketi nuna ubba baggara olanaw giigetoysa nuus odidosona.
NEH 4:13 Hessa gisho, nu asaape mashshe, tooranne donge oykida asaa enta soo asan asan giigisada oosoy wuriboona heeran gimbiyas guyera garsa baggan naagana mela oothas.
NEH 4:14 Asay daggamidaysa taani be7ida wode denda eqada, asaako, enta kaaletheysatakonne halaqatako, “Nu morketa yayyofite! Gitaanne yashshiya Xoossaa qopite. Hinte ishatas, hinte adde naytasinne macca naytas, hinte machetasinne hinte keethaas oletite” yaagas.
NEH 4:15 Nu morketi nuna qohanaw maqetidaysa nuuni eridaysa enti si7idosona. Qassi Xoossay enta maquwa hada kessidaysa akeekidosona. Hessafe guye, nu ubbay simmidi, gimbe oosuwa doomida.
NEH 4:16 He wodepe doomidi ta asaape baggay oosuwa oothiya wode, baggay xurure ma7idi, toora, gondallenne donge oykidi naagana mela oothas. Qassi halaqati Yihuda asa ubbaafe guyera eqidi minthethoosona;
NEH 4:17 gimbiya gimbeysatinne koshshiyaba tookeysati issi kushen ola miishe oykidi, issi kushen ooso oothosona.
NEH 4:18 Gimbiya oothiya issoy issoy mashshe ba xeessan dancidi de7ees. Moyze punneysi ubba wode taape shaaketidi erenna.
NEH 4:19 Kaaletheysatako, halaqatakonne asa ubbaako, “Gimbiya oosoy gitanne dalga gidiya gisho nuuni issoy issuwafe haakidi de7oos.
NEH 4:20 Hessa gisho, hinte moyze puno si7iya wode he bessaa taako haa shiiqite. Nu Xoossay nu gisho oletana” yaagas.
NEH 4:21 Hessa gisho, wonta gontey zo7o wadhiya wodepe doomidi omarsi xoolintoy keyana gakanaw baggay oothiya wode baggay toora oykidi naagees.
NEH 4:22 He wode taani asaako, “Qamma nuna naaganawunne gallas oosuwa oothanaw hinte ubbay hintena maaddeysatara Yerusalaamen aqite” yaagas.
NEH 4:23 Tana gidin, ta ishata gidin, ta asaa gidin, woyko tana naageysata gidin, nu ubbay nu ma7uwa kessonna aqoos; nu ola miishey nuupe shaaketenna.
NEH 5:1 Issi wode addetinne enta macheti banta koche gidida Ayhudeta bolla waassidosona.
NEH 5:2 Entafe issoti issoti, “Nuus, daro adde naytinne macca nayti de7iya gisho nu shempuwa ashshanaw nuus kathi koshshees” yaagidosona.
NEH 5:3 Harati qassi, “Nuna gakida iita koshaape dendoysan kathi demmana gidi, nu goshsha gadiya, nu woyne gadiyanne nu keethaa oythida” yaagidosona.
NEH 5:4 Qassi attidaysati, “Kawo giira giiranaw miishe dhayidi nu goshsha gadiyanne nu woyne bessaa oythidi miishe tal7ida.
NEH 5:5 Ayhude kochatara nuuni issi ashonne issi suuthi; nu nayti enta nayta mela. Shin nuuni nu yelida nayta aylletethas aathidi immanaw un7etida; nu macca naytape issoti issoti aylletethas bayzetidosona. Nu goshshanne nu woyne gadiya nuupe eketida gisho nu wolqa dhayida” yaagidosona.
NEH 5:6 Taani enta waasuwanne oysha si7ida wode daro yilotas.
NEH 5:7 Ta wozanan oothanaba qopidaape guye, kaaletheysatanne halaqata xeegada, “Hinte, hinte ishatas yelora tal7ishe un7etheeta” yaagada enta kaccas. He metuwaba entara odetanaw deriya shiishada,
NEH 5:8 “Ayhude gidonaysatas bayzetida Ayhude koche gidida nu ishata wozanaw nuus danda7etidaba ubbaa oothida. Shin hinte isha gidida Ayhudeti banta koche gidida hintew, bantana bayzana mela ootheeta; nu enta zaari wozanaw koshshees” yaagas. Kaaletheysati zaaranaba dhayidi si77i gidoosona.
NEH 5:9 Taani kaallada, “Hinte oothiyabay woga gidenna; Ayhude gidonna nu morketi nuna qelqisonna mela hinte nu Xoossaas yayyanawunne suureba oothanaw bessennee?
NEH 5:10 Taani, ta ishatinne ta oosanchoti asaas miishenne kathi tal7ida; gidoshin, entafe yelo ekeysi atto.
NEH 5:11 Enta goshsha, woynenne shamaho zayte gadiyanne keethaa ubbaa entaw zaarite. Qassi miishepe, kathafe, woynepenne zaytepe hinte entafe ekida xeetape issi kushe yelo ekidaysa elle zaarite” yaagas.
NEH 5:12 Enti zaaridi, “Nuuni ekidaba ubbaa entaw guye zaarana; enti nuupe tal7idaysa zaaro gidi achoko; ne nuna kiitidaysada oothana” yaagidosona. Taani kahineta taako xeegada kaaletheysati banta gida qaala polana mela caaqisanaada oothas.
NEH 5:13 Taani ta ma7uwa qaarada qoqofashe, “Hintefe oonika ba gida qaala polonna ixiko, Xoossay iya, iya keethaafenne iya aquwape haysada qoqofidi mela kushe asho” yaagas. Shiiqida asa ubbay issi qaalan, “Amin7i” yaagidi Godaa galatidosona. Asa ubbay caaqidaysada oothidosona.
NEH 5:14 Arxekisisi kawotida laatamantho laythafe doomidi hastamanne nam7antho laythi gakanaw taani Yihuda biitta haaras. He tammanne nam7u laytha giddon tana gidin woyko ta ishati shuumas bessiya katha damooze ekibooko.
NEH 5:15 Shin taape kase shuumetidaysati asaas deexo tooho gididi, gallas gallas kathasinne woyne ushshas oytamu bira qanxisidosona. Hari attoshin shuumata aylleti asaa bolla godaa gididi un7ethidi gam7idosona. Shin taani Xoossas yayyida gisho, hessada oothabike.
NEH 5:16 Taw de7iya wolqa ubbaa Yerusalaame gimbe oosuwas immas; ta oosanchotika taara issife he oosuwa bolla gam7idosona; nu aybi biittaka shammibooko.
NEH 5:17 Nu heeran de7iya kawotethatape yida asay attishin, gallas gallas taara miya Ayhudetinne kaaletheysati xeetanne ishatama.
NEH 5:18 Gallas gallas issi boori, usupun modho dorsatanne daro kuttota shukidi asaas shiishosona; qassi tammu gallasape issi toho daro baatha woyne ushsha aggoosona. Shin asaa bolla de7iya deexo toohuwa ta eriya gisho biitta shuumas bessiya katha damooze oychabike.
NEH 5:19 Ta Xoossaw, ta ha asaas oothida keehatetha ubbaa qopada taw keeha.
NEH 6:1 Sanbalaaxi, Xoobbey, Arabe biitta asi gidida Geesameynne hanko nu morketi nuuni gimbiya oothidi polidaysanne dooya bessi baynaysa si7idosona. Gidoshin, ta gimbe pengetas sanqa aathabike.
NEH 6:2 Sanbalaaxinne Geesamey, “Ono Demban de7iya gutatape issuwan yada nuura gaheta” yaagidi kiita yeddidosona. Hessi enti tana qohanaw maqida maqo.
NEH 6:3 Taani entaw, “Taw gita oosoy de7iya gisho hessa aggada hinte gida bessaa baanaw danda7ike. Taani yaa bin, oosoy ayis dhubetii?” yaagada zaaras.
NEH 6:4 He kiitaa zaari zaari oyddu toho kiittidosona; shin taani issi qommo zaaro entaw immas.
NEH 6:5 Ichashantho Sanbalaaxi ba aylletape issuwa dooya de7iya dabdaabe oythidi taako kiittis. Dabdaabey haysada yaagidi xaafetis;
NEH 6:6 “Neeninne ne koche gidida Ayhudeti makallanaw qopidaysanne hessa gaason gimbiya gimbeysa shooro biittan de7iya asa ubbay odeteysa Geesamey taw odis. Qassi neeni nena kawo kessanaw koyeysanne
NEH 6:7 neeni Yihuda kawo gideysa Yerusalaamen awaajana mela nabe wothidaysa taw odis. Ha woriya kawoy si7anaysi attenna. Hessa gisho, taara gahetada zorettanaw haaya” yaagees.
NEH 6:8 Taani, “Ha neeni giya oda ubbay tuma gidonnabaanne ne neepe medhidaba” yaagada zaaras.
NEH 6:9 Nu oothiya oosoy poletonna mela, “Enta kushey argaacana; oosoyka poletonna eqi attana” yaagidi nuna yashisanaw qopidosona. Shin taani, “Xoossaw, ha77i ta kushiya minthetha” yaagada woossas.
NEH 6:10 Taani issi gallas soope keyonna mela gordi wothida Mahexabeela na7aa na7aa Dalaya na7aa Shamayako bas. I taako, “Qamma yidi enti nena wodhanaw danda7iya gisho neera taara Xoossa keethi gelidi, pengiya gordidi qosetana” yaagis.
NEH 6:11 Shin taani, “Ta mela asi yayyidi qosetii? Woyko tana daaniya asi ba shempuwa ashshanaw Xoossa keethi gelii? Ta hessa hanike” yaagas.
NEH 6:12 Ta qopa be7iya wode Shamayey Xoossay kiitida nabe gidonashin Xoobeynne Sanbalaaxi iya miishen shammidi yeddin ta bolla wordo tinbite odeysa akeekas.
NEH 6:13 I miishen shametida gaasoy tana yashisanaasa; ta hessa oothada nagaran gelana melanne tana borisiyabaa demmidi tana kawushanaassa.
NEH 6:14 Taani, “Ta Xoossaw, Xoobeynne Sanbalaaxi oothidaba ubbaa be7a. No7aado geetetiya macca nabiyanne hara wordo nabeti tana yashisanaw oothidaba ubba be7a” yaagada woossas.
NEH 6:15 Gimbe oosoy doometin ishatammanne nam7u gallasape guye Eluule geetetiya ageenan laatamanne ichashantho gallasan oosoy poletis.
NEH 6:16 Nu yuushuwan de7iya kawotethatan de7iya nu morketi hessa si7ida wode yayyidosonanne yeellatidosona. Ayis giiko, oosoy nu Xoossaa maaden poletidaysa akeekidosona.
NEH 6:17 He wode Yihuda shuumati Xoobbiyas dabdaabe xaafishe gam7idosona; ika entaw zaarishe gam7is.
NEH 6:18 Era na7ay Sakani, Xoobbiya bollo gidiya gishonne iya na7ay Yohaanani Baraka na7aa Masulaama na7iw ekida gisho, Ayhudetape daroti iyara caaqidi de7oosona.
NEH 6:19 He asati Xoobbey oothida lo77oba ubbaa ta sinthan nashidi haasayoosona; taani giyaba iyaw odoosona. Hessa gisho, Xoobbey ubba wode tana yashisanaw dabdaabe xaafo aggibeenna.
NEH 7:1 Gimbiya oosoy wurin, sanqayka gelis; pengiya naageysati, zammaretinne Leeweti banta oosuwa oykidosona.
NEH 7:2 Taani Yerusalaame katamaa aysiya maata ta ishaa Hananesinne miixa naageysata halaqaa Anaanas immas. Hanaani haratape aadhida tumanchonne Xoosse yayiya asi.
NEH 7:3 Taani entako, “Wonta away keyidi ho77ana gakanaw Yerusalaame gimbe pengeta dooyopite. Qassi omarsi naageysati banta oosuwa ongidi baanape sinthe pengeta minthi gordanaada oothite. Hessadaka, Yerusalaamen de7iya asaape dooridi baggati banta ooso bessan, harati qassi banta keethaa heeran naagana mela oothite” yaagas.
NEH 7:4 He wode Yerusalaame katamay daro dalganne gita; shin iya giddon de7iya asaa tayboy daro guutha; qassi daro keethati buroo keexetibeenna.
NEH 7:5 Hessafe guye, asa kaaletheyisata, halaqatanne asa ubbaa shiishada enta soo asan asan mazgabana mela Xoossay tana qofisis. Di7etethaafe sinthe simmida asaa enta soo asan asan xaafetida maxaafaka demmas; he maxaafan xaafetiday haysa.
NEH 7:6 Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori di7idi, ba biitta efida asape guye banta katamaa Yerusalaamenne Yihudan de7iya banta katamata simmida asay haysafe kaallidi de7eyisata.
NEH 7:7 Enta halaqati Zarubaabela, Iyyasu, Nahime, Azaara, Rama, Nahamane, Mardikiyoosa, Bilshana, Mispereta, Bigiwaya, Nahumanne Baana. Di7ope simmida Isra7eele asaa tayboy haysa;
NEH 7:8 Paroosa yarati 2,172;
NEH 7:9 Safaaxa yarati 372;
NEH 7:10 Era yarati 652;
NEH 7:11 Iyyasunne Iyo7aaba koche gidida Pahati-Moo7aba yarati 2,818;
NEH 7:12 Elama yarati 1,254;
NEH 7:13 Zaatu yarati 845;
NEH 7:14 Zakaya yarati 760;
NEH 7:15 Binuya yarati 648;
NEH 7:16 Bebaya yarati 628;
NEH 7:17 Azgada yarati 2,322;
NEH 7:18 Adonqaama yarati 667;
NEH 7:19 Bigiwaya yarati 2,067
NEH 7:20 Adina yarati 655;
NEH 7:21 Hizqiyaasa yara gidida Axeera yarati 98;
NEH 7:22 Hashuma yarati 328;
NEH 7:23 Besaya yarati 324;
NEH 7:24 Harifa yarati 112;
NEH 7:25 Gaba7oona yarati 95;
NEH 7:26 Beetelemeninne Naxoofan de7iya asay 188;
NEH 7:27 Anatoota katamaa asay 128;
NEH 7:28 Beet-Azmootan de7iya asay 42;
NEH 7:29 Qiriyat-Ariman, Kafiraninne Ba7erootan de7iya asay 743;
NEH 7:30 Ramanne Gib7an de7iya asay 621;
NEH 7:31 Mikmaasan de7iya asay 122;
NEH 7:32 Beeteleninne Gayen de7iya asay 123;
NEH 7:33 Nam7antho Nabon de7iya asay 52;
NEH 7:34 Nam7antho Elama yarati 1,254;
NEH 7:35 Hariman de7iya asay 320;
NEH 7:36 Iyaarkon de7iya asay 345;
NEH 7:37 Loodan, Hadidaninne Onon de7iya asay 721;
NEH 7:38 Sana7an de7iya asay 3,930.
NEH 7:39 Haysafe kaallidi de7eysati di7etethaafe simmida kahineta. Iyyasu yara gidida Yadaya yarati 973;
NEH 7:40 Imera yarati 1,052;
NEH 7:41 Paskora yarati 1,247;
NEH 7:42 Harima yarati 1,017.
NEH 7:43 Haysafe kaallidi de7eysati di7etethaafe simmida Leeweta; Hodawa yara gidiya Iyyasunne Qadimi7eela yarati 74;
NEH 7:44 Asaafa yara gidida zammaareti 148;
NEH 7:45 Pengiya naagiya Saluma, Axeera, Talmoona, Aquba, Hatitanne Shobaya yarati 138.
NEH 7:46 Haysafe kaallidi de7eysati Xoossa keethan oothiya oosanchota yarata; Xiha yarata, Hasufa yarata, Xaba7oota yarata,
NEH 7:47 Keroosa yarata, Sii7a yarata, Padoona yarata,
NEH 7:48 Libana yarata, Hagaba yarata, Samala yarata,
NEH 7:49 Hanana yarata, Gidela yarata, Gahaara yarata,
NEH 7:50 Raya yarata, Raxina yarata, Naqooda yarata,
NEH 7:51 Gazama yarata, Oza yarata, Paasa yarata,
NEH 7:52 Besaya yarata, Ma7unima yarata, Nafusesima yarata,
NEH 7:53 Baqibuuqa yarata, Haqufa yarata, Harhura yarata,
NEH 7:54 Baasilota yarata, Mahida yarata, Harsha yarata,
NEH 7:55 Barqoosa yarata, Sisaara yarata, Teema yarata,
NEH 7:56 Nasiya yaratanne Haxifa yarata.
NEH 7:57 Haysafe kaallidi de7eysati Solomone aylleta yarata; Soxaya yarata, Sofeereta yarata, Parida yarata,
NEH 7:58 Ya7ila yarata, Darqoona yarata, Gidela yarata,
NEH 7:59 Safaaxa yarata, Haxila yarata, Pokereet-Haxabayma yaratanne Amoone yarata.
NEH 7:60 Di7etethaafe simmida Xoossa keethan ootheysatinne solomone aylleta tayboy 392.
NEH 7:61 Talmela, Telharsha, Karuba, Adaananne Imera katamatape Yerusalaame simmidosona. Shin enti woyko enta aawati Isra7eele sheeshi gideysa erisanaw danda7ibookona.
NEH 7:62 Enti Dalaya, Xoobbiyanne Naqooda yarata; enta tayboy 642.
NEH 7:63 Kahinetape Hobaya yarati, Haqooxa yaratinne Barzile yarati Yerusalaame simmidosona. Barzile geysi Galada biitta asi gidida Barzile na7iw ekidi, ba bolluwa sunthaa ekis.
NEH 7:64 Enti banta yeletaa susa eranaw yeleta maxaafan koydosona, shin demmibookona. Hessa gisho, enti tunada taybetidi kahinetethan oothonna mela digetidosona.
NEH 7:65 Uriimeninne Tumiimen shaakidi pirdiya kahiney dendana gakanaw enti geeshsha kathaafe maanaw danda7onnaysa Yihuda haareysi entaw odis.
NEH 7:66 Di7etethaafe Yihuda biitta simmida 7,337 addenne macca aylleta gujonna de7ishin, kumetha asaa tayboy 42,360. Qassi entara 245 addenne macca zammaareti simmidosona.
NEH 7:68 Parata tayboy 736; baqulota tayboy 245;
NEH 7:69 gimaleta tayboy 435; hareta tayboy 6,720.
NEH 7:70 Yarata halaqatape guuthati oosuwas imota immidosona. Biittaa haareysi 8 kilo giraame worqa, 50 distenne 530 kahine ma7ota immis.
NEH 7:71 Yarata halaqati 168 kilo giraame worqanne 1,250 kilo giraame bira immidosona.
NEH 7:72 Attida asay 168 kilo giraame worqa, 140 kilo giraame biranne 67 kahine ma7ota immidosona.
NEH 7:73 Hessafe guye kahineti, Leeweti, naageysati, zammaareti, asaape issoti issoti, Xoossa keetha oosanchotinne hara Isra7eele asay banta kataman kataman uttidosona.
NEH 8:1 Laapuntho ageenay geliya wode Isra7eele asay banta kataman kataman uttidosona. He ageenan enti ubbay issife Haatha Penge sinthan de7iya dabaaban shiiqidosona. Enti Goday Muse baggara Isra7eele asaas immida Higge Maxaafa ehana mela xaafiya Izira oychidosona.
NEH 8:2 Yaatin, kahiney Iziri, laapuntho ageenan koyro gallasan, addey, maccinne akeekanaw danda7iya asi ubbay shiiqida bessaa Higge Maxaafa ehis.
NEH 8:3 Haatha Penge sinthan de7iya dabaaban eqidi, addes, maccasinne akeekanaw danda7iya ase ubbaas Higge Maxaafa wontafe gallas gakanaw nabbabis. Asayka hayzidi si7idosona.
NEH 8:4 Xaafey Iziri, nabbabanaw mithafe oosetida dhoqa bessan keyidi eqis. Iyape ushacha baggara Matita, Shamaya, Anaya, Uraya, Kalqenne Ma7iseya geetetiya asati eqidosona. Haddirsa baggara Padaya, Misa7eela, Malkiya, Hasuma, Hashibada, Zakariyasanne Masulaama geetetiya asati eqidosona.
NEH 8:5 Iziri asa ubbaafe dhoqiya bessan eqiya wode ubbay iya loythidi xeellishin, enta sinthan Higge Maxaafa dooyis. I dooyiya wode enti ubbay uttida bessaafe dendi eqidosona.
NEH 8:6 Iziri Godaa, gita Xoossaa galatis. Asa ubbay banta kushiya denthidi, “Amin7i! Amin7i!” yaagidosona. Enta som7oy sa7a bochana gakanaw gufannidi Godaa goyinnidosona.
NEH 8:7 Enti banta eqida bessan de7ishin, Leeweti, Iyyasuy, Baani, Saraba, Yamina, Aquba, Sabata, Hoda, Maseya, Qalixa, Azaara, Yozabaata, Hananinne Palahi higgiya asay akeekanaada birshethaa qoncisidosona.
NEH 8:8 Enti Xoossaa Higge Maxaafa nabbabidosona; qassi nabbabeteysi woygiyako asay erana mela birshethaa qoncisidosona.
NEH 8:9 Asay higge qaala si7ida wode yeekida gisho, biitta haariya Nahimey, kahinenne xaafe gidida Izirinne asaas maxaafa birshiya Leeweti, “Ha gallasay Godaas, hinte Xoossaas geeshsha gallas gidiya gisho, yeekofite woyko afuxofite” yaagidosona.
NEH 8:10 Nahimey, “Bidi dooretida kathaa miite; mal7iya ushshi uyite; qassi aykoy baynaysatas hinteysafe shaakidi immite. Hachi gallasay nu Godaas geeshsha gallas. Godaa ufaysay hintew wolqa gidiya gisho azzanopite” yaagis.
NEH 8:11 Leeweti, “Hachi gallasay geeshsha gallas gidiya gisho, azzanopite; si77i giite” yaagidi asa si77i oothidosona.
NEH 8:12 Nabbebetida qaala birshethay entaw gelida gisho, asay ufaysan maanaw, uyanawnne aykoy baynaysatas shaakidi immanaw soo bidosona.
NEH 8:13 He ageena nam7antho gallasan kochata halaqati, kahinetine Leeweti higge qaala entaw birshana mela Izirako yidosona.
NEH 8:14 Enti tamaariya wode laapuntha ageenan Shaqara Ba7aale bonchiya wode Isra7eele asay shaqara garsan uttidi bonchana mela Xoossay Muse baggara kiitidaysa demmidosona.
NEH 8:15 Shaqara Ba7aale bonchanaw katamataninne Yerusalaamen haysada yaagidi awaajidosona; “Shaqara shaqaranaw dere bolla keyidi zayte shamaho, wora shamaho, barseneete mitha, zamba haythinne mitha ubbaafe higgen xaafetidaysada tashe ehite” yaagidosona.
NEH 8:16 Hessa gisho, asay bidi mitha tashe ehidi banta pooqe keetha bolla de7iya denban, banta zabban, Xoossa keetha dabaaban, Haatha Pengiya dabaabaninne Efreema Pengiya dabaaban shaqara shaqaridosona.
NEH 8:17 Di7etethafe simmida asa ubbay shaqara shaqaridi iya garsan uttidosona. Nawe na7aa Iyyasu wodepe haa simmin enti haysa mela ba7aale bonchi erokona. Hessa gisho, enti ubbay daro ufaytidosona.
NEH 8:18 Ba7aaley doometidi wurana gakanaw gallas gallas Iziri Xoossaa Higge Maxaafape asaas nabbabees. Baaliya laapun gallas bonchidaape guye hospuntho gallasan higgey kiiteysada geeshsha duulatta oothidosona.
NEH 9:1 He ageenan laatamanne oyddantho gallasan Isra7eele asay issife shiiqidi, kayo ma7o ma7idi, banta huuphen baana qolidi xoomidosona.
NEH 9:2 Bantana allaga dere asaape shaakidosona. Hessefe guye dendi eqidi entinne enta aawati oothida nagaraa ubbaa paaxidosona.
NEH 9:3 Enti yan eqidi de7ishin heedzu saate kumethi Godaa enta Xoossaa Higge Maxaafay entaw nabbabetis. Qassi hara heedzu saate banta nagaraa paaxishe Godaa banta Xoossaa goyinnidosona.
NEH 9:4 Leeweti, Iyyasuy, Baani, Qadimi7eeli, Sabana, Buni, Saraba, Bananinne, Kenaani madirake bolla keyidi banta qaala dhoqu oothidi Godaa, banta Xoossaa woossidosona.
NEH 9:5 Leeweti, Iyyasuy, Qadimi7eeli, Baani, Asabaani, Sarabi Hodi, Sabaninne Patahi, “Dendi eqidi, merinaape merinaa gakanaw de7iya Godaa hinte Xoossa galatite!” “Iya boncho sunthaa anjite; galatapenne anjofe aadhiya iya sunthaa sabbite.”
NEH 9:6 Xoossaw, ne xalaali Godaa! Neeni salotanne dhoqa salotan de7iya medhetethata, sa7aanne iya bolla de7iya medhetethata, abbatanne enta giddon de7iya medhetethata ubbaa medhadasa. Ubbaas de7o immadasa; salo medhetethati new goyinnoosona.
NEH 9:7 Godaw, neeni Xoosse! Neeni Kaldaaweta biitta Uurepe Abrame doorada kessadasa. Iya sunthaa laammada Abrahaame gada sunthadasa.
NEH 9:8 I new ammanthiya asi gideysa be7ada, Kanaaneta, Hiteta, Amooreta, Parzeta, Yaabusetanne Gergeseta biitta iya kochaas laata biitta oothada immanaw iyaw caaqadasa. Neeni xillo gidiya gisho ne gida qaala poladasa.
NEH 9:9 Neeni nu mayzata Gibxe biittan gakida un7aa be7adasa; qassi Zo7o Abbaa matan de7ishe enti waassida waasuwa si7adasa.
NEH 9:10 Gibxe kawoy, iya shuumatinne he biitta asa ubbay Isra7eele asaa bolla otortida gisho enta bolla mallatanne malaalsiyabata oothadasa. Hessa oothada hachi gakanaw ne sunthay bonchon xeegetanaada oothadasa.
NEH 9:11 Abbaa shaakada ne asaa mela biittara pinthadasa. Shin shuchi ciimmo haathan holin, miteteysada enta goodiya morketa abban mitisada dhaysadasa.
NEH 9:12 Isra7eele asaa gallas shaara tuussan, qamma tama tuussan enta ogiya poo7isada kaalethadasa.
NEH 9:13 Neeni salope wodhada ne asaa Siina zuma bolla odisadasa. Suure pirdaanne tuma gidida higgiya, lo77o wogaanne kiita entaw immadasa.
NEH 9:14 Geeshsha ne Sambaata enti bonchana mela enta tamaarsadasa. Ne aylliya Muse baggara entaw kiita, wogaanne higge immadasa.
NEH 9:15 Enti koshatida wode salope kathi immadasa; qassi enti saamotida wode zaallafe haathe pultisadasa. Neeni entaw immana gada caaqida biitta enti gelidi laattana mela kiittadasa.
NEH 9:16 Shin nu mayzati otortidosona; si7onna ixidi new kiitetibookona.
NEH 9:17 Kiitetonna ixidosona; neeni entaw oothida malaalsiyaba ubbaa hassaybookona. Enti si7onna asi gididosona; banta geellatethan aylletethas Gibxe biitta guye kaalethana mela halaqa bantaw dooridosona. Gidoshin, neeni atto giya Xoossi, keehanne maariya Xoossi; siiqon kumidaysanne hanqos ellesonna Xoossi gidiya gisho enta aggabaaka.
NEH 9:18 Enti mara malan eeqa medhidi, “Hintena Gibxe biittafe kessida hinte xoossay haysa” yaagidi nena gita cashshe cayidosona.
NEH 9:19 Ne daro maarotethan neeni enta mela biittan aggabaaka. Enti biya ogiya poo7isana mela gallas shaara tuussan, qamma tama tuussan enta kaalethadasa.
NEH 9:20 Enta tamaarsana mela ne lo77o Ayyaana entaw immadasa. Maanaw manna, uyanaw haathe entaw immadasa.
NEH 9:21 Oytamu laythi kumethi mela biittan hemetiya wode entaw koshshiyabaape issibaaka pacisabaaka. Enta ma7oy wuribeenna; enta tohoy kixibeenna.
NEH 9:22 Ne enta kawotethatanne dereta hari attoshin haahon de7iya biittata xoonidi oykana mela oothadasa. Kawoy Sihooney haariya Haseboona biittanne kawoy Oogey haariya Baasane biitta entana laatisadasa.
NEH 9:23 Enta kochaa taybuwa salo xoolintoda darsadasa. Enta mayzatas immana gada caaqida biitta enta laatisadasa.
NEH 9:24 Enta nayti Kanaane biitta laattidosona. He biittan de7iya Kanaane asaa enta sinthan neeni kawushadasa. Enti Kanaane asaa bolla, enta kawota bollanne biittan de7iya asaa bolla dosidaba oothana mela enta kushen aatha immadasa.
NEH 9:25 Enti yuushoy gimbetida katamatanne aradda biitta xoonidi ekidosona. Lo77oba ubbay kumida keethata, booketida haatha ollata, woyne bessata, shamahonne hara ayfe ayfiya daro mithata laattidosona. Iyape midi kallidi ordidosona; ne gita keehatethan ufaytidosona.
NEH 9:26 Gidoshin, enti kiitetonna ixidi, ne bolla makallidosona; ne higgiya bolla zoko zaaridosona. Neeko simmanaada entaw minthidi odida ne nabeta wodhidosona. Daro iita cashshi nena cayidosona.
NEH 9:27 Hessa gisho, enta un7ethiya morketa kushen aatha immin, morketi enta un7ethida wode neeko waassidosona. Enta waasuwa salon gidada si7adasa; ne maarotethaa daruwan enta, enta morketa kushepe ashshiya asata kiittadasa.
NEH 9:28 Shin enti shempo demmi simmidi zaaridi ne sinthan nagara oothidosona. Ne zaarada enta morketa kushen aathada immin, enta morketi enta haaridosona. Shin ha77ika enti neeko waassin, enta waasuwa salon gidada si7adasa. Ne maarotethan enta zaara zaaradaka ashsha ekadasa.
NEH 9:29 Ne higgiyako enti simmana mela entaw minthada odadasa, shin enti otortidosona; new kiitetonna ixidosona. Asi kiitetidi de7o demmiya ne higgiya menthidosona. New zoko zaaridi si7onna ixidosona; kiitetonna ixidosona.
NEH 9:30 Gidikoka ne enta daro laythi danda7adasa; ne Ayyaanan nabeta baggara entaw odadasa, shin enti si7ibookona. Hessa gisho, shooro kawotethati enta haarana mela aatha immadasa.
NEH 9:31 Shin neeni keehanne maariya Xoossi gidiya gisho, ne gita maarotethan enta aggabaaka; burxora dhaysabaka.
NEH 9:32 Hiza nu Xoossaw, gitaw, wolqaamanne yayetida Xoossaw, ne merinaa siiqo caaquwa naageyso, beni Asoore kawotethaafe hachi gakanaw nu bolla, nu kawota bolla, nu halaqata bolla, nu kahineta bolla, nu nabeta bolla, nu mayzata bollanne ne asa ubbaa bolla gakida metoy ne sinthan laafaba daanopo.
NEH 9:33 Nuna gakidaba ubban neeni xillo. Nuuni nena naaqikoka ne ammanetetha aggabaaka.
NEH 9:34 Nu kawoti, nu halaqati, nu kahinetinne nu mayzati ne higgiya naagibookona. Qassi ne entaw immida kiitaanne naagisuwa si7ibookona.
NEH 9:35 Ne enta kawotethan entaw gita anjuwa immadasa; dalganne aradda biitta entaw immadasa. Shin enti nena goyinnibookona; banta iita oosuwape simmibokona.
NEH 9:36 “Hiza, hachi nuuni aylle gideysa be7a. Nu mayzati he biitte ayfiyanne iya immiya anjuwa ubbaa maana mela ne immida biittan nu hachi aylle gidida.
NEH 9:37 Nu nagaraa gisho, ne nu bolla denthida kawoti biittay immiya ayfiya ubbaa go77etoosona. Nu bollanne nu mehiya bolla banta koydaba oothosona; nuuni gita meto giddon de7oos” yaagidosona.
NEH 9:38 Hanidaba ubbaa gisho, nuuni haasayidi, he haasaya xaafidi qoncisanaw qofa qachida. Xaafetida xuufiya bolla nu halaqati, nu Leewetinne nu kahineti banta maatame wothidosona.
NEH 10:1 Maatame wothida asaa sunthay, biitta aysiya Nahimey, Hakaliya na7ay, Kahinetape, Sedeqiyaasa,
NEH 10:2 Saraya, Azaara, Ermiyaasa,
NEH 10:3 Paskora, Amaare, Malka,
NEH 10:4 Haxusa, Sabana, Maluka,
NEH 10:5 Harima, Maremoota, Obaada,
NEH 10:6 Daanela, Ginetoona, Baaroka,
NEH 10:7 Masulaama, Abiya, Miyamina,
NEH 10:8 Ma7aaza, Belgayanne Shamaya.
NEH 10:9 Leewetape, Aznaata na7aa Iyyasu, Henadaada kochi gidida Binuya, Qadimi7eelanne
NEH 10:10 entara oothiya Sabana, Hodiya, Qalixa, Palaya, Hanaana,
NEH 10:11 Mika, Rahooba, Hasabaya,
NEH 10:12 Zakura, Saraba, Sabana,
NEH 10:13 Hodiya, Bananne Banina.
NEH 10:14 Halaqatape, Paroosa, Pahati-Moo7aba, Elama, Zata, Baana,
NEH 10:15 Buna, Azgada, Bebaya,
NEH 10:16 Adoona, Bigiwaya, Adina,
NEH 10:17 Axeera, Hizqiyaasa, Azuura,
NEH 10:18 Hodiya, Hasuma, Besaya,
NEH 10:19 Harifa, Anatoota, Nebaya,
NEH 10:20 Magiphaasa, Masulaama, Ezira,
NEH 10:21 Masezabeela, Saadoqa, Yadu7a,
NEH 10:22 Palaxa, Hanana, Anaya,
NEH 10:23 Hose, Hanaana, Hasuba,
NEH 10:24 Haloheesa, Piliha, Sobeqa,
NEH 10:25 Rehuuma, Hasabina, Maseya,
NEH 10:26 Akiya, Hanana, Anaana,
NEH 10:27 Maluka, Harimanne Ba7ana.
NEH 10:28 Attida asay, kahineti, Leeweti, pengiya naageysati, zammaareti, Xoossa keetha oosanchoti, Xoossa higgiyas kiitetanaw bantana Ayhude gidonna deretape shaakida ubbay, enta macheti, akeekanaw danda7iya enta adde naytinne macca nayti,
NEH 10:29 bantana kaaletheysatara issife caaqidosona. Enti Xoossa aylliya Muse baggara Xoossay immida nu Godaa, Xoossaa kiitta, higgiyanne wogaa naaganaw qangethaninne caaqon qaala gelidosona.
NEH 10:30 Enti haysada yaagidi caaqidosona; “Nu macca nayta Ayhude gidonna adde naytas immoko; enta macca nayta nu adde naytas macho oothidi ekooko.
NEH 10:31 “Ayhude gidonna asati kathi gidin woyko haraba Sambaata gallas woyko hara ba7aale gallas bayzanaw ehiko entafe shammoko. Laapuntha laythi gakiya wode wode nu biitta goyoko; nuuni tal7ida acuwa achoko.
NEH 10:32 “Xoossa keetha oosuwas oyddu giraame bira laythan laythan qanxonna immana.
NEH 10:33 Hessika, Godaa sinthan wothiya uythaas, gallas gallas yarshetiya katha yarshuwas, xuussa yarshuwas, Sambaata gallasan, ageena xeeron, laythan de7iya hara ba7aaletan, geeshsha yarshotas, Isra7eele asa nagaraa atotethas yarshetiya yarshuwasinne nu Xoossa keetha oosuwas koshshiya ubbaa kunthanaasa.
NEH 10:34 “Nu, kahineti, Leewetinne hara asa ubbay, laythan laythan oosetiya gallasan, higgiyan xaafetidaysada Godaa, nu Xoossaa yarsho bessan eexiya mithaa issi issi kochay awude ehanaw bessiyako eranaw saama yeggida.
NEH 10:35 “Katha nu shiishiya wodenne dumma dumma mitha ayfiya nu maxiya wode bayraa Xoossa keethi ehana.
NEH 10:36 “Higgiyan xaafetidaysada nuuni koyro yeletiya nu adde nayta, qassi nu miizati, nu dorsatinne nu deeshati yeliya koyro marata Xoossa keethan oothiya kahinetako ehidi Xoossas dummayana.
NEH 10:37 “Nuuni nu biittan kaxida kathaafe koyruwa, nu mitha ubbaa ayfiya, woyniyanne zaytiya imota oothidi, Xoossa keethan oothiya kahinetako ehana. Leeweti nu de7iya katamata goshshan ayfiyabape asraata ekiya gisho, nu biittay ayfiyabape asraata ehana.
NEH 10:38 Leeweti asraata shiishiya wode, Aarona yara gidida kahineti entara issife gidanaw bessees. Leeweti asraata shiishidaape guye, asraatape asraata kessidi nu Xoossa keethi ehidi, miishe wothiya kifiliyan wotho.
NEH 10:39 Isra7eele asaynne Leeweti kathaa, woyniyanne shamaho zayte imota geeshsha miisheti uttiya bessaanne kahineti, pengiya naageysatinne zammaareti shempiya kifiliya eho. “Nuuni Xoossa keethaa ubbaka aggoko” yaagidi caaqidosona.
NEH 11:1 Asaa kaaletheysati Yerusalaamen de7idosona. Hanko asay tammaafe issoy geeshsha kataman Yerusalaamen de7ana mela saama yeggidi dooridosona. Shin hara uddufun kushe asay banta kataman kataman de7idosona.
NEH 11:2 Ba shenen Yerusalaamen de7anaw dosida asa ubbaa asay anjidosona.
NEH 11:3 Hara katamatan de7iya Isra7eele asay, kahineti, Leeweti, Xoossa keetha oosanchoti, Solomone aylleta sheeshati ubbay banta kataman kataman de7iya gadiya oykidi de7idosona. Haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysati, Yerusalaamen de7anaw yida biitta shuumata;
NEH 11:4 Yihuda kochaafe yida asay Paaresa yara gidida Atayanne Seela yara gidida Ma7iseya. Atayi Ooziyana na7a; Ooziyani Zakaryaasa na7a; Zakaryaasi Amaare na7a; Amaarey Safaaxa na7a; Safaaxi Malal7eela na7a.
NEH 11:5 Ma7iseyi Baaroka na7a; Baaroki Kolihooza na7a; Kolihoozi Ooza na7a; Oozi Adaya na7a; Adayi Yoyaariba na7a; Yoyaaribi Zakaryaasa na7a. Haysati Seela kochata.
NEH 11:6 Paaresa yarape wolqaama gidida 468 asati Yerusalaamen de7idosona.
NEH 11:7 Biniyaame kochaafe yida asay Saala, Gabayanne Salaya. Saalu Masulaama na7a; Masulaami Yo7eeda na7a; Yo7eedi Padaya na7a; Padayey Qolaya na7a; Qolayi Ma7iseya na7a; Ma7iseyi Iti7eela na7a; Iti7eeli Yeshaya na7a. Biniyaame zariyape 928 asay Yerusalaamen de7idosona.
NEH 11:9 Zikira na7ay Iyyu7eeli enta halaqa; qassi Hasanu7a na7ay Yihudi kataman nam7antho halaqa.
NEH 11:10 Kahinetape yida asay Yoyaariba na7aa Yadaya, Yakina na7aa;
NEH 11:11 Saraya; Sarayi Kilqiya na7a; Kilqey Masulaama na7a; Masulaami Saadoqa na7a; Saadoqi Marayoota na7a; Marayooti Xoossa keetha halaqa gidida Ahixuuba na7a.
NEH 11:12 Entara issife Xoossa keethan oothiya oosanchoti kumethi 822. Adayi Yirohaama na7a; Yirohaami Palala na7a, Palali Amoxe na7a; Amoxey Zakaryaasa na7a; Zakaryaasi Paskora na7a; Paskora Malkiya na7a.
NEH 11:13 Adayara issife de7iya asaynne enta soo asaa halaqati kumethi 242. Amasasayi Azari7eela na7a; Azari7eeli Ahizaya na7a; Ahizayi Mashilmoota na7a; Mashilmooti Imera na7a.
NEH 11:14 Amasayara issife de7iya olanchoti kumthi 128. Hagidolima na7ay Zabdi7eeli kahineta ayseysa.
NEH 11:15 Leewetape yida asay Shamaya; Shamayey Hashuba na7a; Hashubi Aziriqaama na7a; Aziriqaami Hasabaya na7a; Hashabey Buna na7a.
NEH 11:16 Leeweti Sabatinne Yozabaata Xoossa keethafe karera oosetiya oosuwas halaqa.
NEH 11:17 Mataani Mika na7a; Miki Zabida na7a; Zabidi galata woosa kaalethiya Asaafa na7a; Asaafi iya nam7antho halaqa gidida Baqibuuqa na7a; Baqibuuqi Samusa na7a; Samusi Galaala na7a; Galaali Yedutuuna na7a.
NEH 11:18 Leewetape 284 asay geeshsha kataman Yerusalaamen de7idosona.
NEH 11:19 Pengiya naageysatape, Aquba, Talmoonanne entara issife oothiya oosanchota tayboy 172.
NEH 11:20 Attida kahineti, Leewetinne Isra7eele asa ubbay banta laata biittan Yihuda katamatan de7idosona.
NEH 11:21 Shin Xoossa keetha oosanchoti Yerusalaame kataman de7iya Ofeela deriya bolla de7idosona. Sihanne Gishipa geetetiya nam7u asati enta halaqata.
NEH 11:22 Yerusalaamen de7iya Leeweta halaqay Oza. Ozi Baana na7a; Baani Hasabaya na7a; Hashabey Mataana na7a; Mataani Mika na7a. Ozi Xoossa keetha zammaareta halaqa gidida Asaafa na7a.
NEH 11:23 Zammaareti gallas gallas yexana mazmuriya kawoy enta kiittees.
NEH 11:24 Yihuda na7aa Zaraha yaraape yeletida Masezabeela na7aa Pataha Isra7eele asaas doona gididi, kawa matan de7ees.
NEH 11:25 Yihuda asaape guuthati goshsha gadetaninne gutatan, Qiriyaat-Arbaninne iya gutatan, Diboonaninne iya gutatan, Yaqabxi7eelaninne iya gutatan de7idosona.
NEH 11:26 Qassi Iyyasun, Molaadan, Beet-Phalexan,
NEH 11:27 Haxar-Shu7aalaninne iya gutatan, Barsaabeninne iya gutatan,
NEH 11:28 Xiqilaagan, Makonaaninne enta gutatan,
NEH 11:29 Enirmoonan, Xor7aninne Yarmutan,
NEH 11:30 Zanohan, Adulaamaninne enta gutatan, Laakisoninne iya heeran de7iya goshsha gadiyan, Azeeqaninne iya gutatan de7idosona. Hessada hanidi Yihuda asay Barsaabepe bidi Hinooma Zangaara gakanaw de7iya bessan de7idosona.
NEH 11:31 Biniyaame kochati Gib7an, Mikmaasan, Ayan, Beeteleninne enta gutatan,
NEH 11:32 Anatootan, Nooban, Ananiyan,
NEH 11:33 Haxooran, Raman, Gitaman,
NEH 11:34 Hadidan, Xabo7iman, Nabalaaxan
NEH 11:35 Loodan, Ononinne Kushe Hiillata Zangaara geetetiya bessan de7idosona.
NEH 11:36 Yihudan de7ida Leewetape baggati Biniyaame asaara daanada oosetidosona.
NEH 12:1 Salatiyaala na7aa Zarubaabelaranne kahine halaqaa Iyyasura di7ope simmida kahinetinne Leeweti haysata: Saraya, Ermiyaasa, Izira,
NEH 12:2 Amaare, Maluka, Haxusa,
NEH 12:3 Sakana, Rehuuma, Maremoota,
NEH 12:4 Ida, Ginetoona, Abiya,
NEH 12:5 Miyamina, Ma7ada, Belga,
NEH 12:6 Shama7a, Yoyaariba, Yadaya,
NEH 12:7 Saala, Amoka, Hilqiyaanne Yadaya. Haysati Iyyasu laythan kahinetasinne yaratas halaqa gididaysata.
NEH 12:8 Entara issife simmida Leeweti Iyyasu, Binuya, Qadimi7eela, Saraba, Yihudanne galata mazmure zamareyisata halaqa gidida Mataana.
NEH 12:9 Entara issife zamariya Baqbuqeynne Unoy entafe sinthara haa simmi eqidi yexoosona.
NEH 12:10 Iyyasuy Yoyaaqima yelis; Yoyaaqimi Eliyaseeba yelis; Eliyaseebi Yoyada yelis;
NEH 12:11 Yoyadi Yoonataana yelis; Yoonataani Yadu7a yelis.
NEH 12:12 Yoyaaqimi kahine halaqa gididi de7iya laythi, haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysati kahineta yarata halaqata. Saraya yaraa halaqay Maraya. Ermiyaasa yaraa halaqay Hananiya.
NEH 12:13 Izira yaraa halaqay Masulaama. Amaare yara halaqay Yehohanana.
NEH 12:14 Maluka yaraa halaqay Yoonataana. Sabana yaraa halaqay Yoosefa.
NEH 12:15 Harima yaraa halaqay Adina. Marayoota yaraa halaqay Hilqaya.
NEH 12:16 Ido yaraa halaqay Zakaryaasa. Ginetoona yaraa halaqay Masulaama.
NEH 12:17 Abiya yaraa halaqay Zikira. Miniyaminanne Ma7ada yaraa halaqay Pilxaya.
NEH 12:18 Bilga yaraa halaqay Samu7a. Shamaya yaraa halaqay Yoonataana.
NEH 12:19 Yoyaariba yaraa halaqay Matanaya. Yadaya yaraa halaqay Oza.
NEH 12:20 Salaya yaraa halaqay Qalaya. Amoka yaraa halaqay Ebeera.
NEH 12:21 Kelqe yaraa halaqay Hasabaya. Yadaya yaraa halaqay Natina7eela.
NEH 12:22 Leeweta halaqati Eliyaseebi, Yoyada, Yohaaninne Yadu7i kahine halaqa gidida dumma dumma laythan enti xaafetidosona. He mazgabey giigiday Farse biitta kawa Daariyosa laythana.
NEH 12:23 Gidoshin, Leeweta yarata halaqati mazgaben xaafetiday Eliyaseeba na7aa na7a gidida Yohaani hayqana gakanaw de7iya wode xalaalana.
NEH 12:24 Leeweta halaqati Hasabaya, Sarabanne Qadimi7eela na7aa Iyyasu. Enti Xoossa asi gidida kawoy Dawiti kiittidaysada, nam7an shaaketi eqidi, taran taran Xoossaa bonchoosonanne galata mazmure yexoosona.
NEH 12:25 Xoossa keetha gimbe dirsaa pengiya matan keexetida dumma dumma miishe wothiya keethaa naageysati Mataana, Baqbuuqa, Abdiyu, Masulaama, Xalmoonanne Aquba.
NEH 12:26 Haysati Yoxedeqa na7aa na7aa gidada Iyyasu na7aa Yoyaaqimey, biitta aysiya Nahimeynne kahinenne xaafe gidida Iziri de7ida laythan oothidosona.
NEH 12:27 Yerusalaame gimbe dirsay gimbetidi wurida ba7aale bonchiya wode Leeweti banta de7iya bessaafe koyetidi, daalan, diithan, maasinqon, galata mazmure yexishe ufaysan ba7aale bonchanaw Yerusalaame yidosona.
NEH 12:28 Ha baaliya bonchanaw zammaareti Yerusalaame heeran de7iya Naxoofata gutatape,
NEH 12:29 Beet-Gelgalape, Gib7apenne Azmaawetape shiiqidosona. Enti Yerusalaame heeran bantaw gutata keexidosona.
NEH 12:30 Kahinetinne Leeweti bantana wogada geeshidaape guye asaa, pengetanne gimbe dirsaa geeshshidosona.
NEH 12:31 Taani Yihuda halaqata gimbe dirsaa bolla kessas. Nam7u gita mazmure koyreta galata mazmure yexana mela oothas. Issi koyrey gimbiya huuphesoora ushachi simmidi, Pito Penge bagga bis.
NEH 12:32 Hoshayanne Yihuda halaqatape baggati entana kaallidosona.
NEH 12:33 Entara de7iya harati Azaara, Izira, Masulaama,
NEH 12:34 Yihuda, Biniyaame, Shama7iya, Ermiyaasinne
NEH 12:35 moyze punniya guutha kahineti kaallidosona. Entana kaallidi yiday Zakaryaasa; Zakaryaasi Yoonataana na7a; Yoonataani Shama7a na7a; Shama7i Mataana na7a; Mataani Mikaya na7a; Mikayey Zakura na7a; Zakuri Asaafa na7a.
NEH 12:36 Zakaryaasa yara gidida Shama7ey, Azari7eeli, Milaala, Gilaalay, Ma7ayey, Natina7eeli, Yihudinne Hanaani Xoossa asi gidida Dawiti zammariya wode go7etiya mazmure miishiya ubbaa ekidi, Zakaryaasa kaallidosona. Enta kaalethey xaafiya Izira.
NEH 12:37 Pulto Pengiya gakidaape guye Dawita Katamaako simmidi, gimbiya bolla keyidi, Dawita keethaafe pude baggara aadhidi, doloha baggara de7iya Haatha Pengiyako bidosona.
NEH 12:38 Nam7antho koyrey gimbiya huuphiya oykidi haddirsi simmidi bis. Taani asaape baggara gidada entafe guyera kaallas. Itoone Adussa Gimbiya aadhidi, Dalga Gimbiya bessaa gakida.
NEH 12:39 Yaape simmidi, Efreema Pengiya, Yeshaana Pengiya, Molo Pengiya, Hanaani7eela Adussa Gimbiyanne Xeetata Adussa Gimbiya gakanaw bida. Wursethan Dorsa Pengiya matara aadhidi Naageyisata Pengiya gakidi eqida.
NEH 12:40 Galata mazmure yexiya nam7u koyreti Xoossa keethan banta besse besse oykidosona. Qassi taka taara de7iya halaqatara yaa gakas.
NEH 12:41 Hessadaka, kahineti Eliyaqeemi, Ma7iseyi, Miniyamini, Mikayey, Eliyo7ani, Zakaryaasinne Hanaani banta moyziya oykidi,
NEH 12:42 Ma7iseyi, Shamayey, Alaazari, Uzi, Yehohanani, Malkiyey, Elaaminne Exeri banta bessaa bessaa oykidosona. Yizira enta kaalethin banta qaala dhoqu oothidi mazmure yexidosona.
NEH 12:43 He gallas daro yarsho yarshidosona. Xoossay entaw gita ufaysi immida gisho daro ufaytidosona. Maccasay nayti ubbay ufaytidosona. Yerusalaamen asay ufaytiya ufaysa kooshinchay haahon si7etees.
NEH 12:44 He gallas asay immiya imotata, asraatanne laythan kaxiya katha ayfiyape koyruwa shiishidi wothiya keetha naagiya halaqata dooridosona. Ha dooretida asati dumma dumma katamatan de7iya goshshatape higgey kiitteysada kahinetasinne Leewetas bessiya kathaa shiishosona. Ayis giiko, Yihuda asay kahinetinne Leeweti oothiya oosuwan daro ufaytidosona.
NEH 12:45 Enti Xoossay kiitidaysa oothidosona; geeshsho wogaa polidosona. Enta xalaala gidonashin zammaretinne naageysati Dawitinne iya na7aa Solomoney kiitida oosuwa polidosona.
NEH 12:46 Beni Dawita wodenne Asaafa wode zammaretinne Xoossas shiiqiya galata mazmureta kaalethiya halaqati de7oosona.
NEH 12:47 Zarubaabela laythaninne Nahime laythan Isra7eele asa ubbay zammaretasinne naageysatas bessiya kathaa gallas gallas immoosona. Leewetaska bessiya kathaa immoosona. Leeweti qassi Aarona yara gidida kahinetas bessiya kathaa immoosona.
NEH 13:1 He gallas asa ubbay si7ishin, Muse Maxaafay nabbabetis; he wode enti, “Moo7abe asaynne Amoone asay Xoossaa asaara merinaw gahetanaw bessenna” giya bessaa maxaafan demmidosona.
NEH 13:2 Ayis giiko, Isra7eele asay Gibxefe keyidi, Kanaane biya wode Moo7abenne Amoone biitta asay entaw kathinne haathe immidi mokanaysa aggidi, Isra7eele asaa baaddana mela Balaamas miishe immidi shammidosona. Gidoshin, nu Xoossay baadetha anjon laammis.
NEH 13:3 He higgiya Isra7eele asay si7ida wode allaga asaa banta giddofe shaakidosona.
NEH 13:4 Hessafe kase Xoossa keetha miisheta wothiya keethaas halaqa gidida kahiney, Eliyaseebi Xoobara dabbotethi medhis.
NEH 13:5 Hessafe gaason Eliyaseebi, katha imotata, ixaane, Xoossa keetha geeshsha miisheta, kathaa woyniyanne zaytiya, Leewetas, zammaretasinne naageysatas immiya asraatanne kahinetas immiya kathaa wothiya wogga kifiliyan Xoobbey daana mela immis.
NEH 13:6 Ha ubbay haniya wode ta Yerusalaamen de7ike. Arxekisisey Babiloone biittan kawotida hastamanne nam7antho laythan taani simmada Babiloone biitta kawako bas. Gidoshin, guutha wodepe guye kawa oychada,
NEH 13:7 Yerusalaame simmada yas. Xoossa keetha zabban Eliyaseebi Xoobbiyas daana kifile giigisidi wothida iitabaa si7as.
NEH 13:8 Daro yilotada, Xoobbiya soo miishe ubbaa kifiliyape kessada kare holas.
NEH 13:9 Kifilya wogaada geeshshana mela kiittas. Xoossa keetha miisheta, kathaa, imotatanne ixaaniya zaarada keethaa gelsas.
NEH 13:10 Qassi asay Leewetas bessiya kathaa immiboona gisho Leewetinne zammaareti banta Xoossa keetha oosuwa aggidi goshshas guye bidaysa be7as.
NEH 13:11 Hessa gisho, taani halaqatako, “Xoossa keetha oosuwa ayis yeggi aggidetii?” yaagada hanqetas. Hessafe guye, Leeweta xeegada ubbaa enta oosuwan oosuwan zaaras.
NEH 13:12 Yaatin Yihuda asay kathaafe, woyniyape, zaytiyape immiya asraata wothiya keethaa zaaridi eho doomis.
NEH 13:13 Taani kahiniya Salama, xaafiya Saadoqanne Leewiya Padaya miishe wothiya keethaas halaqa oothada shuumas. Qassi Mataana na7aa na7aa Zakura na7ay Hanaani enta maaddeysa. Haysati ubbay koshshiyaba ubbaa banta ishatas shaaki shaaki imon ammanetidaysata gididosona.
NEH 13:14 “Ta Xoossaw tana qopa; qassi ne keetha oosoy giigana mela taani oothida lo77o oosuwa dogopa” yaagas.
NEH 13:15 He wode taani Yihudan de7iya asay Sambaata gallas woyne gum7ishin be7as; harati kathi, woyne ushsha, woyne ayfiya, balase ayfiyanne harabata banta haren caanidi, Sambaata gallas Yerusalaame ehishin be7as. Hessa gisho, enti Sambaata gallasa zal7onaada taani entaw minthada odas.
NEH 13:16 Hessa bolla qassi Yerusalaamen de7iya Xiroosa asay molonne hara issi issi zal7e miisheta ehidi Sambaata gallas Yihuda asaasinne Yerusalaamen bayzoosona.
NEH 13:17 Taani Yihuda halaqata, “Haysa mela iita ooso oothidi Sambaata ayis tuniseetii?
NEH 13:18 Xoossay nu bollanne nu katamaa bolla haysa mela meto ehiday, kase hinte aawati hessa mela iitabaa oothida gisho gidennee? Ha77i hinte Sambaata tunisidi, Isra7eele asaa bolla hara hanqo ehanaw haneeta” yaagada hanqetas.
NEH 13:19 Hessafe guye, Sambaati gelanaape sinthe Yerusalaame gimbiya pengeti gordetanaadanne Sambaati aadhonashin dooyetonna mela kiittas. Qassi Sambaata gallasan ayba toohoyka gelonnaada naagana mela ta oosanchotape issota issota gimbe pengiya bolla essas.
NEH 13:20 Hessa gisho, dumma dumma zal7e miisheta ehiya zal7anchoti issi toho woyko nam7u toho Yerusalaame gimbiyafe kare baggara aqidosona.
NEH 13:21 Shin taani entako, “Gimbiyafe karera waananaw aqeetii? Hinte nam7antho haysada oothiko taani wolqan hintena teqana” yaagada hanqetas. He gallasape simmin nam7antho Sambaata gallas yibookona.
NEH 13:22 Taani Leeweti banta huuphiya geeshshana mela, pengeta naagana melanne Sambaata gallasaa geeshshi oothana mela kiittas. “Ta Xoossaw, ha ubbaa gisho tana qopa; ne merinaa siiquwa gisho taw qadheta” yaagada woossas.
NEH 13:23 He wode taani Yihuda adde asape issoti issoti Ashdooda, Amoonenne Moo7abe biittafe macho ekidaysa be7as.
NEH 13:24 Enta naytape baggay Ashdooda biitta woyko hara biitta doona haasayoosona; banta biitta, Yihuda doona odetanaw danda7okona.
NEH 13:25 Taani entara ooyetas; enta baaddas; entafe issota issota dechada, enta huuphiya binaana shoddas. Hessa xalaala gidonashin, enti banta macca nayta enta adde naytas immonnaada, enta macca nayta bantawunne banta adde naytas ekonnaada Xoossaa sunthan caaqisas.
NEH 13:26 Qassi entako, “Kawoy Solomoney nagara oothiday allaga biitta maccasata ekoysana gidennee? Solomone mela kawoy hara biitta kawota giddon baawa; Xoossay iya dosida gisho, Isra7eele asa ubbaa bolla kawoyis. Shin, hara attoshin iyaka allaga biitta maccasati haysa mela nagara oosisidosona.
NEH 13:27 Yaatin, nuka hintena si7idi, allaga maccasa ekidi hessa mela iitabaa oothidi Xoossaa naaqaneyee?” yaagas.
NEH 13:28 Kahine halaqaa Eliyaseeba naytape issoy Yoyada. Shin iya naytape issoy Beet-Horona katama asi gidida Sanbalaaxa na7iw macho ekis. Yaatin, taani Yoyada Yerusalaame katamaape gooddas.
NEH 13:29 “Ta Xoossaw, haysati kahinetetha wogaanne kahinetaranne Leewetara caaqida caaquwa waati tunisidaako be7a” yaagada woossas.
NEH 13:30 Enta allaga biitta tunatethaafe geeshidaape guye kahinetasinne Leewetas enta oosuwa oosuwa immas.
NEH 13:31 Yarshos eethiya mithay woden woden yaana melanne asay baw ayfidabape koyro ayfiya imota oothidi ehana mela wogaa wothas. “Ta Xoossaw, ne keehatethan tana qopa” yaagada woossas.
EST 1:1 Kawoy Arxekisisi Hinde biittafe Tophe biitta gakanaw de7iya, xeetanne laatamanne laapun biitta aysiya wode hanidaba.
EST 1:2 Kawoy ba araatan uttidi aysiya waanna katamay Suusa geetetees.
EST 1:3 I kawotida heedzantho laythan, baape garsara daynnatasinne biitta ayseysatas gita gibira giigisis. He gibira bessan Meedonanne Farse toora moconati, biitta haareysatinne ayseysati bentidosona.
EST 1:4 Kawoy issi xeetanne hospun tammu gallas kumethi ba kawotethaa duretethaanne ba yashshiya bonchuwa ubbaa enta bessis.
EST 1:5 He gallasatape guye, kawoy qassi hara laapun gallas gam7iya gibira, Suusa kataman, durepe manqo gakanaw de7iya asa ubbaas giigisis. He gibiray kawo gadhoy de7iya atakilte bessan giigis.
EST 1:6 He bessan de7iya dabaabay, liinope oosetida boothinne kaalose geshetan alleeqis. Gesheti ocha teera daaniya al7o liino kiren aathin, ibnebarade geetetiya shuchafe oosetida tuuqiya bolla de7iya bira migiddotan kaqetidi uttidosona. Qassi worqafenne birape oosetida arsati, dumma dumma mali de7iya al7o shuchatape oosetida baasuwan maaran yegetidosona.
EST 1:7 Issoy issuwafe dumma gidida worqa burcukon woyne ushshi asa ubbaas imetis. Kawoy daro keeha gidida gisho, woyne ushshas zawi baawa.
EST 1:8 Issi issi asi ba koyida mela uyees; hessa kawoy koyrottidi ba aylletas odis.
EST 1:9 He wode Kawiya Asxiina maccasa ubbaas gibira kawo gadhon giigisasu.
EST 1:10 Gibiray doometida laapuntha gallas, kawoy Arxekisisi woyne ushsha alidi ufaytida wode, ba aylleta Mehumana, Bizita, Harboona, Bigita, Abagita, Zataranne Karkasa geetetiya laapun shuufata xeegidi,
EST 1:11 “Kawiw Asxiino kawotetha kallacha wothidi haa ekidi yiite” yaagidi kiittis. Iya daro mala lo77o gidiya gisho, halaqatinne asa ubbay iyo be7ana mela kawoy koyis.
EST 1:12 Shin kawa kiitaa iw odin, kawiya Asxiina kawa sinthe yoonna ixasu. Hessi kawa daro hanqethis.
EST 1:13 He biitta higgiyanne de7o wogaa eriya asaa zore oyshoy kawa matan meezetidaba gidiya gisho, wodiyaba shaakidi eriya cinca asatara odetis.
EST 1:14 Kawoy gita maati de7iya laapun Farsenne Meedona shuumata, Arqesiyoosa, Shetara, Adimata, Tarshesha, Mareesa, Marsananne Memukaana xeegisis.
EST 1:15 Kawoy enta, “Taani, kawoy Arxekisisi, ta shuufata kiittin, Kawiya Asxiina ta kiitaa polonna ixasu. Hessa gisho, higgey odiya maaran iyo waatanaw bessii?” yaagidi oychis.
EST 1:16 Entafe issoy, Memukaani kawa sinthaninne halaqata sinthan haysada yaagis; “Kawiya Asxiina kawa xalaala gidonashin, iya halaqata ubbaanne iya kawotetha giddon de7iya asa ubbaa naaqasu.
EST 1:17 Ha kawotetha giddon de7iya maccasi ubbay kawiya Asxiina oothidaysa si7idi, banta azinata kadho doomana. Enti, ‘Kawoy Arxekisisi baako yaana mela xeegisin, kawiya Asxiina ixabekeyee?’ yaagana.
EST 1:18 Hessa xalaala gidonashin, Farsenne Meedona halaqata maccasay hessa si7ida wode, hachi awi wullana gakanaw banta azinata hessada gidi kadhana. Hessa gaason macheta giddoninne azinata giddon ooshshi keyana.
EST 1:19 Hessa gisho, kawaw, neeni dosiko, kawiya Asxiina nam7antho ne sinthe aadhona mela teqiya awaajo kessa. He awaajoy nam7antho laametonna mela Farsenne Meedona higgiya giddon xaafeto. Hessafe guye, kawotetha bonchuwa iipe ekada hara lo77o maccasas imma.
EST 1:20 Ha neeni aathida awaajoy ha gita kawotetha ubban odetiya wode issi issi maccasi dure gidin manqo gidin, shaakonna ba azinaa bonchana” yaagis.
EST 1:21 Kawoynne iya halaqati ha zoriyan ufaytidosona. Hessa gisho, Memukaani gidaysada kawoy oothis.
EST 1:22 I ba kawotethaa giddon de7iya dumma dumma biittatas enta pidaleninne enta doonan xaafidi, dabdaabe yeddis. He awaajoy, issi issi azini ba keethaa keethaa aysiya halaqa gideysa odees.
EST 2:1 Hessafe guye, kawa Arxekisisa hanqoy dochin, kawiya Asxiina oothidabaanne I bolla keyida awaajuwaba qopis.
EST 2:2 He wode kawa matan haggaaziya na7atethata addeti haysada yaagidosona; “Mala lo77o geela7ota koyidi, kawas ehana mela,
EST 2:3 ne kawotethaa giddon de7iya biitta ubban halaqata shuuma. Enti mala lo77o geela7o dooridi, Suusa katamaa ehidi, maccasas giigida keethan wotho. Yan he maccasa keethaas kaapo gidida kawo shuufa Hegaya kushen enti de7ishin, enta malaa loythiyaba ubbay entaw imeto.
EST 2:4 Hessafe guye, ubbaafe aadhada kawa ufaysiya geela7iya Asxiini bessan kawo macho gido” yaagidosona. Ha zorey kawa ufaysida gisho, kawoy hessada oothis.
EST 2:5 Yan Suusa kataman issi Mardikiyoosa geetetiya Ayhude asi de7ees. I Ya7ira na7a; Ya7iri Same7a na7a; Same7i Biniyaame koche gidida Qiisa na7a.
EST 2:6 Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori Yihuda kawa Yo7akinanne hara Ayhude asaa olan di77idi efida wode Mardikiyoosi entara bis.
EST 2:7 I ba aawa ishaa na7iw, Ibraawetho doonan Hadaso geetetiya Astiro baara wothidi dichees. Astira medhoninne geesan daro mala lo77o. I aawaynne aayiya hayqidaape guye, Mardikiyoosi iyo efidi, ba na7a oothidi dichis.
EST 2:8 Kawoy kessida awaajuwanne kiitaa maaran, Suusa katama yida dooretida daro geela7otape issinniya Astiro. Iya yada, maccasas giigida keetha kaapo gidida Heega aawatetha garsan de7asu.
EST 2:9 Heegi Astiro be7ida wode in daro ufaytis; iyo dumma xeellis. Ellesidi maanaw dumma kathinne bolla tiyetiyaba iw immis. Qassi iyo matan haggaazana mela kawo gadhope dooretida laapun na7atethi, maccasata giigida keethan, kifile ubbaafe aadhidi lo77iya kifilen iyonne entana wothis.
EST 2:10 Mardikiyoosi iw koyrottidi odidaysada, Astira Ayhude asi gideysa oodeska odabuuku.
EST 2:11 Qassi Mardikiyoosi Astira waana de7iyakonne iw haniyaba be7anaw, maccasa keetha sinthara gallas gallas gedenne haa hemetees.
EST 2:12 Geela7oti kawako gelanaape koyrottidi, issi laythi kumethi banta malaa loythishe gam7oosona. Hessika, koyro usupun ageena karbe zayten gorpetishe gam7idi, nam7antho usupun ageena qassi, lo77o sawiya shitton gorpetoosona.
EST 2:13 Hessafe guye, issi geela7iya kawako geliya wodey gakiya wode, ba koyida ma7uwa ma7a lo77ada, maccasa keethafe keyada, kawoy de7iya bessa gelawusu.
EST 2:14 Qamma gelada, kawuwara aqidaape guye, wonta guura keyiko, maccasati de7iya hara keethi iyo efoosona. He keethaas kaapo gidida kawo shuufay Shashagaazi iyo naagees. Kawoy dosidi I sunthaa xeegidi, “Ebelto ehite” goonna ixiko, iya nam7antho kawako gelanaw danda7uku.
EST 2:15 Hessi hanishin, kawako geliya tari Astiro gakis. Astira Mardikiyoosa aawa ishaa Abikaala na7iw; Mardikiyoosi ba na7a oothidi dichidaaro. Iya maccasas giigida keethaas kaapo gidida kawo shuufa Hegayi zoridaysada ma7o ma7asu. Iyo be7ida ubbay I malaa nashshis.
EST 2:16 Arxekisisi kawotida laapuntha laythan, Tebeeta geetetiya tammantho ageenan Astira kawoy de7iya bessaa gelasu.
EST 2:17 Iya Gelida wode, kawoy hara maccasa ubbaafe aathidi, iyo dosis; qassi hara geela7ota ubbaafe in ufaytis. Hessa gisho, kawotetha kallachaa I huuphen wothidi, iyo Asxiini bessan kawo macho oothis.
EST 2:18 Hessafe guye, kawoy Astiri bonchuwas gita gibira giigisidi, halaqatanne biitta ayseysata xeegis. Qassi ba kawotethaa giddon ufaysa ba7aaley bonchetana mela awaajis. Biitta ubbaas issi laytha giira maaris. Imotaka ba keehatetha mela huuphen huuphen immis.
EST 2:19 Geela7oti nam7antho shiiqidi de7ishin, Mardikiyoosi kawa dabaaban uttiya asape issuwa gidis.
EST 2:20 Mardikiyoosi, “Neeni Ayhude gideysa oodeska odopa” gida gisho, Astira ha77i gakanaw oodeska odabuuku. Kase na7atethan kiiteteysada, ha77ika iyaw kiitetawusu.
EST 2:21 Mardikiyoosi kawo keethan oothishe de7iya wode, kawoy de7iya kifileta geliya pengiya naagiya kawo shuufatape nam7ati, Gabatinne Taari kawa Arxekisisa ixidi, wodhanaw maqetidosona.
EST 2:22 Enta maquwa Mardikiyoosi si7idi, kawe Astiris odin, iyaka Mardikiyoosa sunthan kawas odasu.
EST 2:23 Kawoy hanidaba pilgidi xeelliya wode, oday tuma gididi bentin, he nam7u asata kaqidi wodhis. Ha hanotay kawa Arxekisisa Taarike xaafiya maxaafan xaafetis.
EST 3:1 Hessafe guye, kawoy Arxekisisi Haama geetetiya baara ootheysa shuumatetha dhoqisidi, ba halaqata halaqa oothidi shuumis. Haama aaway Hamadaati Agaaga koche.
EST 3:2 Kawoy kiittidi wothida gisho, kawo gadho pengen oothiya halaqati ubbay Haami aadhiya wode gulbatidi iya bonchoosona. Gidoshin, Mardikiyoosi Haamas gulbatonanne iya bonchona ixis.
EST 3:3 He wode kawo gadho pengen oothiya halaqati Mardikiyoosa, “Ayis kawa kiitaa polonna ixay?” yaagidi,
EST 3:4 gallas gallas iyaw odoosona. Shin I enti odeysa si7anaw koybeenna. Ubba qassi, “Taani Ayhude asi gidiya gisho, Haama gulbatanawunne iya bonchanaw danda7ike” yaagis. Hessafe guye, “Mardikiyoosi odiya gaasuwa si7idi, Haami waanandeesha!” yaagidi iyaw odidosona.
EST 3:5 Mardikiyoosi baw gulbatonaysanne bana bonchonaysa Haami erida wode hanqo eexis.
EST 3:6 Hessa bolla qassi, Mardikiyoosi Ayhude asi gideysa eridi, iya xalaala wodhoy laafaba gidi qopida gisho, Arxekisisa kawotethan de7iya Ayhude kocha ubbaa dhaysanaw qopis.
EST 3:7 Arxekisisi kawotida tammanne nam7antho laythan, Nisaane geetetiya koyro ageenan, Ayhudeta wodhiya ageenanne gallasa eranaw, Purima geetetiya saamaa iya sinthan yeggana mela Haami kiittis. He saamay wodhida maaran, Adaare geetetiya tammanne nam7antho ageenan, tammanne heedzantho gallas Ayhudeti wuriya gallas gideysi qashetis.
EST 3:8 Hessafe guye, Haami kawa Arxekisisako haysada yaagis; “Ne kawotethaa giddon ubba bessan laaletidi de7iya issi kochay de7ees. Enta de7o maaray hara asaysafe dumma; hessa xalaala gidonashin, enti kawo higgiyas haaretokona. Hessa gisho, neeni enta de7o gada si77i giiko, hessi lo77o gidenna.
EST 3:9 Hessa gisho kawaw, ha qofay nena ufaysiko, ha asata wodhidi dhaysana mela awaajo kessa. Hessa ne oothiko, taani heedzu xeetanne oytamu mukulu kilo giraame bira kawo buqura minjiya keetha gelsanaada, ne kawotethaa ayseysatas immana” yaagis.
EST 3:10 Kawoy ba maata erisanaw awaajuwa bolla wothiya migiddo maatame ba biradhiyafe kessidi, Ayhudeta morke gidida, Agaaga kochaas, Hamadaata na7aa Haamas immis.
EST 3:11 Kawoy Haama, “Neeni immana gida biray ne matan de7o; shin ha asata bolla ne dosidaba ootha” yaagis.
EST 3:12 Hessa gisho, koyro ageenan, tammanne heedzantho gallasan, Haami kawa xaafeta ubbaa xeegidi, he awaajoy biitta ubban de7iya asaas dumma dumma doonaninne dumma dumma pidalen xaafetidi, kawope garsara biitta haareysatas, awuraja haareysatasinne dere halaqata ubbaas kiitetanaada kiittis. Awaajoy kawa Arxekisisa sunthan xaafetidi, migiddo maatamey iya bolla wosetin,
EST 3:13 kiitetidaysati iya kawotethaa ubbaa gathanaada kiitetidosona. He awaajoy, “Adaare geetetiya tammanne nam7antho ageenan tammanne heedzantho gallasan, Ayhude ubbaa, yalaga, cima, macca, addiyanne, nayta ashshona issi gallas wursidi wodhidi; enta shaluwaka bonqite” yaagees.
EST 3:14 Hessa gisho, he qashetida gallasay gakiya wode asi ubbay giigetanaada, he awaajoy biitta ubbaa kiitetisinne asa ubbaas awaajetis.
EST 3:15 Kawoy kiitidaysati biitta ubbaa kiitaa gathidosona. Qassi Suusa katamanka odetis. Yaatin, Suusa katamaa asa ubbay daggamis. Shin kawuwaranne Haamara issife uttidi, woyne ushsha uyoosona.
EST 4:1 Mardikiyoosi ha hanidaba ubbaa si7ida wode, azzanidi ba ma7uwa peedhidi, kayo ma7o ma7idi, ba huuphen bido qolis. Ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, yibbata yeeho yeekishe, katamaa giddon yuuyis.
EST 4:2 Kayo ma7o ma7idi kawo keethi gelanaw oonika danda7onna gisho, I kawo keethi geliya pengiya gakanaw bis.
EST 4:3 Kawa awaajoy si7etida biitta ubban Ayhudeta giddon gita kayoy, xoomi, yeehoynne zelelsi doometis. Entafe daroti qassi kayo ma7o ma7idi, kayotanaw bido bolla uttidosona.
EST 4:4 Astiri dangirixetinne iyo naagiya shuufati yidi, Mardikiyoosaba iw odida wode iya daro azzanasu. Mardikiyoosi kayo ma7uwa qaaridi, hara ma7o ma7ana mela iyaw ma7o yeddasu; shin I ekonna ixis.
EST 4:5 Hessafe guye Astira, kawoy iw kiitetana mela wothida Hataka geetetiya shuufa xeegada, Mardikiyoosa metoy aybeko qassi I ayis kayotiyako erana mela iyako kiittasu.
EST 4:6 Hataki kawo keethi geliya pengiya matan katamaa dabaaban de7iya Mardikiyoosako bis.
EST 4:7 Mardikiyoosi, ba bolla gakidaba ubbaa qoncisidi, iyaw odis. Qassi Ayhudeta kumethi wursanaw Haami kawo buqura minjiya keethaas immanaw qopida miishiya likiyara ubbaa ashshona geeshshidi odis.
EST 4:8 Hessa xalaala gidonashin, Ayhudeta wursanaw Suusa kataman keyida awaajoy xaafetida worqatiya Astiris immana melanne haniyaba ubbaa iw odana mela odis. Qassi Astira kawako gelada, ba asay wuronnaada gaannatana mela Hatakas odis.
EST 4:9 Hataki yidi, Mardikiyoosi gidaba ubbaa Astiris odis.
EST 4:10 Astira, Hataka zaarada, Mardikiyoosako haysada yaagada kiittasu.
EST 4:11 “Macca gidin, adde gidin, oonika xeegetonna de7ishe, kawuwara gahetanaw kawo gadhos giddo dabaaba geliko, hayqo. Shin I xeegetonna kawako geliya wode kawoy ba worqa xam7aa xeeraa iyako zaaridi bessiko, he uraa xalaali paxa attees. Ha higgiya kawa zoreysatape bidi, coo asaa gakanaw de7iya asi ubbay erees. Shin taani hastamu gallas gidoosape kawako gelanaw xeegeta erike” yaagasu.
EST 4:12 Mardikiyoosi Astira kiitida kiitaa si7idaape guye,
EST 4:13 haysada yaagidi iiko kiittis; “Taani kawo gadhon de7iya gisho, hara Ayhudetape attishin, tana bochiyabay baawa gada qopofa!
EST 4:14 Neeni haysa mela woden si77i giiko, Ayhudetas maadoy harasoope yaana. Enti tuma attana; shin neeninne ne aawa keethaa asay hayqana. Neeni kawo macho gidada yiday haysa mela wodeseko ooni erii?” yaagis.
EST 4:15 Astira Mardikiyoosako haysada yaagada zaarada kiittasu;
EST 4:16 “Bada Suusa kataman de7iya Ayhudeta ubbaa shiisha; xoomidi taw woossite. Heedzu gallasinne heedzu qammi wurana gakanaw, kathi moopite; haathe uyopite. Taani tana haggaaziya maccatara hessada xoomana. Hessafe guye, higgiyan digetidaba gidikoka, kawoy de7iya bessaa taani gelana. Taani hayqikoka hayqana” yaagasu.
EST 4:17 Mardikiyoosi bidi, Astira iya kiittidaysada ubbaa oothis.
EST 5:1 Xoomay doometin heedzantho gallas Astira kawotetha ma7o ma7ada, kawo gadhon giddo dabaaba gelada eqasu. Kawoy kawo keethi geliya pengiyan de7iya ba araatan uttis.
EST 5:2 Astira gelada, giddo dabaaban eqidaaro kawoy be7idi in ufaytida gisho, ba worqa xam7aa iiko miccis. Iya shiiqada xam7aa xeeraa bochasu.
EST 5:3 Kawoy iiko, “Kawe Astire, neeni taako ayis yadii? Qassi neeni tana oychiyabay aybee? Hari attoshin ta kawotethaafe baggaa gidikoka, ta new immana” yaagis.
EST 5:4 Astira zaarada, “Kawaw, nena ufaysiyabaa gidiko, taani new giigisida gibira maanaw neera Haamara nam7ay hachi omarsi yaako dosayis” yaagasu.
EST 5:5 Hessafe guye kawoy, “Nuuni Astira giigisida gibiras baanaw Haama ellesidi ehite” yaagis. Hessa gisho nam7ay he bessaa bidosona.
EST 5:6 Enti issife woyne ushsha uyishin, kawoy nam7antho Astiro, “Neeni tana woossiyabay aybee? Taani new immana. Qassi neeni tana oychiyabay aybee? Hari attoshin ta kawotethaafe baggaa gidikoka, ta ne oysha polana” yaagis.
EST 5:7 Astira zaarada ta oycheynne ta woossey haysa;
EST 5:8 “Kawaw, neeni tanan ufaytiyaba gidiko, qassi taani woossiyaba immanawunne ta oysha polanaw neeni dosiyaba gidiko, wonto ta giigisiya hara gibiras neera Haamara yaana mela oychayis. Taani ay koyaako he wode new qoncisana” yaagasu.
EST 5:9 Haami gibira bessaafe keyidi biya wode, daro ufaytida gisho, ba wozanan ufaysi noocu gishe bis. Shin I kawo keethi geliya pengiya matara aadhidi biya wode yan uttida Mardikiyoosa be7is. Iyaw dendiboonaysanne yayyidi kokoriboonaysa be7idi Haami yilo eexis.
EST 5:10 Gidoshin, ba yiluwa danda7idi bidi ba soo gakis. Hessafe guye, ba laggetanne ba machiw Zosaara xeegisidi,
EST 5:11 Haami ba duretetha likiya, ba adde nayta taybuwa, kawoy bana bonchida bonchuwanne hara halaqatapenne kawo moorinatape aadhiya shuumatethi immidi, waatidi iya bonchidaako nashetis.
EST 5:12 Gujidika Haami, “Hari attoshin kawiya Astiraka ba giigisida gibiras kawuwara baana mela taape attishin, hara oonaka xeegabuuku. Qassi wontoka kawuwara baana mela tana xeegasu.
EST 5:13 Shin Ayhude gidida Mardikiyoosi kawo keethi geliya pengen uttidaysa be7iya wode ha ubbayka tana ufaysenna” yaagis.
EST 5:14 He wode iya machiya Zosaaranne iya laggeti ubbay haysada yaagidosona; “Neeni ishatamu wadha mithi esisada wonto guura Mardikiyoosi kaqetana mela kawa oycha. Hessafe guye, ufaytashe gibira maanaw ba” yaagidosona. Haama ha qofay ufaysida gisho, enti gidaysada kaqa mithi giigisis.
EST 6:1 He wode qamma kawa dhiskoy ekonna ixis. Hessa gisho, kawoy kawo taarike xaafiya maxaafaa ehidi, kase hanida taariketa iyaw nabbabana mela kiittis.
EST 6:2 Nabbabetida taariketape issoy Mardikiyoosi oothidaba. Hessika, kawoy de7iya kifiliya naagiya, Gabatanne Taara geetetiya nam7u shuufati kawa wodhanaw maqida maquwa Mardikiyoosi qoncisis.
EST 6:3 Kawoy, “Yaatin, I hessa oothida gisho iyaw imetida shuumatethay woyko woytoy aybee?” yaagis. Kawa aylleti zaaridi, “Iyaw aykoy oosetibeenna” yaagidosona.
EST 6:4 Kawoy zaaridi, “Kare dabaaban de7ey oonee?” yaagis. He wode ba giigisida mithan Mardikiyoosa kaqanaw, kawa oychanaw, Haami kare dabaaba gelishe de7ees.
EST 6:5 Kawa aylleti, “Haami kare dabaaban eqis” yaagidosona. Kawoy zaaridi, “Haa gela giite” yaagis.
EST 6:6 Haami gelidaape guye kawoy, “Kawoy bonchanaw dosiya asas ay oothanaw koshshii?” yaagidi oychis. Haami, “Kawoy taape haraa oona bonchanaw dosii?” yaagidi ba wozanan qopis.
EST 6:7 Hessa gisho, Haami kawas yaagidi zaaris; “Kawoy bonchanaw dosiya asaas,
EST 6:8 kawoy ba kawotetha ma7uwa ehiso; ba toggiya para huuphen guche wotho.
EST 6:9 Hessafe guye, kawoy ba moorinatape issi daro bonchetidaysa xeegisidi, kawotetha ma7o iya mayzanaadanne kawa para bolla iya utisidi, katamaa dabaaba kessanaada kiitto. Yaatiko he daro bonchetida moorinnay iya sinthan hemetishe, ‘Kawoy bonchanaw dosiya uraas haysada oothees’ yaagidi awaajo” yaagis.
EST 6:10 Kawoy zaaridi, Haama haysada yaagidi kiittis; “Hiza ellesa dendada kawotetha ma7uwanne ta para ekada, ne gidaysada Ayhude gidida Mardikiyoosas ootha. I kawo keethi geliya pengen de7ees. Ne gidaysafe issibaaka ashshofa” yaagis.
EST 6:11 Hessa gisho, Haami Mardikiyoosa kawotetha ma7o mayzidi, kawa para bolla utisis. Qassi katamaa dabaaban iyape sinthara hemetishe, “Kawoy bonchanaw dosiya uraas haysada oothees” yaagidi awaajis.
EST 6:12 Hessafe guye, Mardikiyoosi kawo keethi penge guye simmidi bis. Shin Haami daro azzanida gisho, guuluntidi, ellesishe ba soo bis.
EST 6:13 Bana gakidaba ubbaa ba mache Zosaarisinne ba laggetas odis. Enti iyako, “Iya sinthan neeni kawuyanaw doomida ha addey, Mardikiyoosi, Ayhude asi gidiko, ne iyara eqetada, iya xoonanaw danda7aka; tuma I nena dhaysana” yaagidosona.
EST 6:14 Enti buroo hessa odetishin, kawa shuufati gakidi, Haama Astira giigisida gibiras ellesidi efidosona.
EST 7:1 Kawoynne Haami Astiri gibira maanaw bidosona.
EST 7:2 He nam7antho gallas gibiras bidi, enti woyne ushsha uyishin, kawoy, “Kawe Astire, neeni woossiyabay aybee? Taani new immana. Neeni tana oychiyabay aybee? Hari attoshin ta kawotethaafe baggaa gidikoka, taani ne oysha polana” yaagidi oychis.
EST 7:3 Kawiya Astira zaarada, “Kawaw, neeni tanan ufaytidaba gidiko, qassi ta oyshaaka polanaw dosiyaba gidiko, ta woosaynne ta oyshay tanne ta asay hayqonna attana melasa.
EST 7:4 Tanne ta asay issoyka attonna ubbay hayqos bayzetida. Nuuni bayzetiday macca ayllenne adde aylle gididi de7anaasa gidiyako, taani si77i gaana. Hessa mela metoy kawa waaysanaw bessiyaba gidenna” yaagasu.
EST 7:5 Kawoy Arxekisisi zaaridi, “Hessa oothanaw xaltaamiday oonee? I he addey awun de7ii?” yaagidi kawiw Astiro oychis.
EST 7:6 Astira, “Nu morkey, nuna dhaysanaw koyey, ha iita addiya Haama” yaagasu. He wode Haami kawa sinthaninne kawe sinthan daro dagammis.
EST 7:7 Kawoy daro hanqetidi, ba uttida bessaafe dendi, kawo gadho atakilte bessaa bis. Shin Haami kawoy iya bolla iitabaa ehanaw qopidaysa erida gisho, Astira iya hayqope ashshana mela woossanaw guye attis.
EST 7:8 Kawoy atakilte bessaafe simmidi geliya wode, Haami kawiiw Astiro maarota woossanaw, iya uttida arsa bolla gufannidaysa be7is. Kawoy yilo eexidi, ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “La ha addey haysan kawo keethan, ta sinthan, kawiw kawushanaw koyiyee?” yaagis. Kawoy buroo hessa haasayishin, kawo shuufati yidi, Haama som7uwa goozidosona.
EST 7:9 Entafe issoy, Harboona geetetiya shuufay, “Kawaw, Haami nena hayqope ashshida Mardikiyoosa kaqanaw essida ishatamu wadha mithi iya son de7ees” yaagis. Kawoy zaaridi, “Haama efidi, he mithan kaqite” yaagidi kiittis.
EST 7:10 Hessa gisho, Mardikiyoosa kaqana gidi giigisida mithan Haami kaqetis. Hessafe guye, kawa hanqoy dochis.
EST 8:1 Ayhudeta morkey Haami kaqetida gallas kawoy Arxekisisi Haama shaluwa ubbaa kawe Astiris immis. Qassi Mardikiyoosi iw mata dabbo gideysa Astira kawas odasu. Hessa gisho, he wodepe doomidi, Mardikiyoosi kawako gelanaw danda7is.
