EST 8:2 Kawoy Haamape guye ekida ba migiddo maatamiya kessidi, Mardikiyoosas immis. Astira Mardikiyoosa Haama shaluwa bolla aawayada shuumasu.
EST 8:3 Hessafe guye, Astira yeekashe, kawa toho bolla kundada, Agaaga koche gidida Haami Ayhudeta bolla tukida iita maqoy ooson pee7onna mela kawa woossasu.
EST 8:4 Yaatin, kawoy ba worqa xam7aa iw miccin, iya denda eqada,
EST 8:5 “Kawaw, neeni tanan ufaytidaba gidiko, qassi ta oyshaaka polanaw neeni dosidaba gidiko, ne kawotethaa giddon de7iya Ayhude ubbaa kumethi wodhana mela, Agaaga koche gidida Hamadaata na7ay Haami kessida awaajuwa shaariya hara awaajo kessanaada woossayis.
EST 8:6 Ha ubba dhayoy ta asaa bollanne ta dabbota bolla gakiya wode taani si77i gada waanna xeello?” yaagasu.
EST 8:7 Hessafe guye, kawoy Arxekisisi, kawiw Astironne Ayhude gidida Mardikiyoosa haysada yaagis; “Haami Ayhudeta wodhanaw awaajo kessida gisho, taani mithan iya kaqisidaysanne iya shaluwa ubbaa kawe Astiris immidaysa hinte ereeta.
EST 8:8 Gidoshin, kawo gadho maatame wothin, kawa sunthan keyida awaajoy laametanaw danda7enna. Hessa gisho, hinte hinte baggara Ayhudeta maaddanaw koydaba xaafite. Hessa ta sunthan xaafidi, kawo maatamiya iya bolla wothite” yaagis.
EST 8:9 Nisaane geetetiya heedzantho ageenan, laatamanne heedzantho gallasan, Mardikiyoosi kawa xaafeta ubbaa xeegidi, Hindefe bidi Tophe gakanaw de7iya xeetanne laatamanne laapun biittatan kawope garsara haareysatas, awuraja ayseysatasinne biitta halaqatas yeddiya awaajo xaafisis. Awaajoy dumma dumma doonaninne dumma dumma pidalen xaafetis; qassi Ayhudetaska enta doonaninne enta pidalen xaafetis.
EST 8:10 Mardikiyoosi he awaajuwa ubbaa kawa Arxekisisa sunthan xaafisidi, kawo maatame wothidi, kawo gaaxatan dhiiketida, eesotiya parata toggiya asata bolla biitta ubbaa yeddis.
EST 8:11 Kawoy kessida awaajoy, katamatan de7iya Ayhudeti issife shiiqanawunne banta bolla yaaba oletidi zaaranaw danda7ana mela maata immees. Qassi ola miishiya oykidi, ay biittafeka, enta olanaw yeyisata, enta naytaranne enta machetara ubbaa issuwaka ashshona wodhanawunne enta shaluwa bonqidi ekanaw maata immees.
EST 8:12 Ayhudeti kawa Arxekisisa kawotethan hessa oothanaw qachida gallasay, Adaare geetetiya tammanne nam7antho ageenan, tammanne heedzantho gallasaana.
EST 8:13 Kawa awaajuwa biittata ubban de7iya asay eranaada, higge gididi awaajetis. Hessika Ayhudeti banta morketa bolla halo keyanaw bantana giigisanaw danda7isees.
EST 8:14 Kiiteteysati kawo keetha parata toggidi, kawa kiitaa gathanaw ellesidi bidosona. Qassi Suusa kataman ha awaajoy asa ubbaas odetis.
EST 8:15 Mardikiyoosi kaalosenne bootha kawotetha ma7o ma7idi, ocha teera daaniyanne liinope oosetida kaaba bollara ma7is; qassi gita worqa kallachaa wothidi, kawa sinthafe keyis. Suusa katamay ililisaninne ufaysan noocu gis.
EST 8:16 Hessi Ayhudetas gita ufaysi, ililsinne boncho wode gidis.
EST 8:17 Hessa gisho, kawa awaajoy nabbabetida biittaninne katamaa ubban de7iya Ayhudeti gita ba7aale kessidi, ufaytishenne gibira mishe pee7idosona. Hessa gaason Ayhudetas yayyidi, yan de7iya hara zare asaape daroti Ayhude gididosona.
EST 9:1 Adaare geetetiya tammanne nam7antho ageenan tammanne heedzantho gallasay gakis. He gallas, kawoy koyro kessida awaajuwa maaran morketi Ayhudeta xoonana gida qopida gallasaa. Shin oday shireti wodhin, Ayhudeti banta morketa xoonidosona.
EST 9:2 Kawa Arxekisisa kawotethan de7iya Ayhudeti ubbay bantana qohanaw koyiya ubbaa dhaysanaw banta kataman kataman issife shiiqidosona. Hara zare gidida asay entaw yayyida gisho, entara ay asika eqetanaw danda7ibeenna.
EST 9:3 Enti Mardikiyoosas yayyida gisho, kawope garsara biitta haareysati, awuraja ayseysatinne biitta halaqati ubbay Ayhudeta maaddidosona.
EST 9:4 Mardikiyoosi kawo gadhon gita maati imetidanne wolqan guji guji biya asi gideysi he kawotethan de7iya biitta ubban eretis.
EST 9:5 He gallas Ayhudeti banta morketa ubbaa mashshan goyridi wursidosona; bantana ixiya ubbaa bolla koydaba oothidosona.
EST 9:6 Waanna katama gidida Suusa xalaalan ichashu xeetu asaa wodhidosona.
EST 9:7 Enti Parshandata, Dalfoona, Aspata,
EST 9:8 Porata, Adala, Ardata,
EST 9:9 Parmashita, Arsaya, Ardayanne Wayzata wodhidosona.
EST 9:10 Enti Ayhudeta morke gidida Haama nayta. Shin enti enta shaluwa bonqibookona.
EST 9:11 Ayhudeti Suusa kataman wodhida asaa tayboy aapuneko he gallas kawas odetis.
EST 9:12 Yaatin, kawoy kawiw Astiro, “Ayhudeti waanna katama gidida Suusa xalaalan ichashu xeetu asaanne tammu Haama nayta wodhidosona. Hessi hessa gidiko, kawa biittatan enti wodhiday aapuna gidandesha! Qassi ha77i neeni woossiyabay aybee? Taani new immana. Neeni tana oychiyabay harabay aybee? Taani new polana” yaagis.
EST 9:13 Astira zaarada, “Kawa ha qofay ufaysiko, Suusa kataman de7iya Ayhudeti hachi oothidaysada wontoka ootho. Qassi tammu Haama nayta ahaa mitha bolla kaqanaada kiitta” yaagasu.
EST 9:14 Kawoy hessa oothana mela kiittis. Awaajoy Suusa kataman nam7antho awaajetin, tammu Haama nayta ahay kocaa bolla kaqetis.
EST 9:15 Adaare geetetiya ageenan tammanne oyddantho gallasan, Suusa kataman de7iya Ayhudeti issife shiiqidi, hara heedzu xeetu asaa wodhidosona; shin ha77ika enta shaluwa bonqibookona.
EST 9:16 He wode Suusa katamaape gaxara de7iya kawa biittatan de7iya Ayhudeti issife shiiqidi, banta morketa ubbaa olidosona. Enti laapun tammanne ichashu mukulu asaa wodhidaape guye banta morketape shempidosona. Shin enta shaluwa bonqibookona.
EST 9:17 Haysi ubbay haniday Adaare geetetiya ageenan tammanne heedzantho gallasaana. Tammanne oyddantho gallasan enti shempidosona; gibira mishe, uyishenne ufaytishe pee7iya gallas oothidosona.
EST 9:18 Shin Suusa kataman de7iya Ayhudeti tammanne heedzanthonne tammanne oyddantho gallasan wodhishe pee7idi, tammanne ichashantho gallasan shempidosona. Enti he gallasaa mishe, uyishenne ufaytishe pee7iya gallas oothidosona.
EST 9:19 Hessa gisho, guutha katamatan de7iya Ayhudeti hachi gakanaw Adaare geetetiya ageenan tammanne oyddantho gallasaa ba7aale gallas oothidi bonchoosona. He gallasan moosonanne uyoosona; qassi issoy issuwas imota immoosona.
EST 9:20 Mardikiyoosi ha hanida taarike ubbaa xaafidi, kawa Arxekisisa biitta ubban, haahoninne matan de7iya Ayhude ubbaas yeddis.
EST 9:21 He dabdaabiyan Mardikiyoosi Adaare ageenan tammanne oyddanthonne tammanne ichashantho gallasata, Ayhudeti laythan laythan ba7aale gallas oothidi bonchana mela entaw odis.
EST 9:22 He gallasati Ayhudeti banta morketape shempo demmida gallasata. Qassi he ageenay enta azzanoynne yeehoy ufaysaninne gibira muussan laametida ageena. Hessa gisho, enti muussaninne ushshan ufaytishe, issoy issuwasinne manqotas katha imota immishe bonchana mela entaw odis.
EST 9:23 Ayhudeti Mardikiyoosi immida kiitaa ekidi, enti bonchanaw doomida baaliya, laythan laythan aggonna bonchanaw ma7idosona.
EST 9:24 Agaaga kochay, Hamadaata na7ay Haami, Ayhudeta ubbaa morkey, enta dhaysanaw kase maqetidi enta wodhiya ageenanne gallasa eranaw Purima geetetiya saama yegisis.
EST 9:25 Shin Astira kawako gelidaape guye, Haami Ayhudeta bolla maqida iita maqoy ubbay guye simmidi, iya bolla poletanaada kawoy xuufen kiittis. Yaatin, Haaminne iya tammu nayti ahay mithan kaqetis
EST 9:26 Hessa gisho, ha nam7u gallasati Purima Ba7aale geetetoosona. Ha dabdaabiyan entaw xaafetidaba ubbaa gaason, enti banta ayfen be7idaba gaasoninne enta bolla gakidaba gaason
EST 9:27 Ayhudeti bantaw, banta kochatasinne Ayhude gidanaw koyiya ubbaas, ha baaliya woga oothidi bonchidosona. Hessika laythan laythan aggonna ha nam7u gallasata bonchana melasa.
EST 9:28 He gallasati yeleta ubban, katamata ubban, Ayhudeta keetha ubbaninne biitta ubban bonchetana mela qashetis. Hessika, Ayhudeti awude gidikoka, ha Purima gallasata bonchanawunne he gallasatan hanidabay enta kochan dogetonna mela qopanaw bessees.
EST 9:29 Hessafe guye, Abikaala na7iya, kawiya Astiranne Ayhude addey Mardikiyoosi, Purima Baaliyaba kase xaafida dabdaabiya minthanaw haysa nam7antho dabdaabiya kumetha maatan xaafidosona.
EST 9:30 He dabdaabeti Arxekisisa kawotethan, xeetanne laatamanne laapun biittan de7iya Ayhudeta ubbaas saroynne wopatethi gido giya sarotara xaafetidi kiitetidosona.
EST 9:31 Qassi enti kase xoomanawunne kayotanaw wogaa kessidaysada, ha77i enta gidin, sinthafe yaana enta kochata gidin, ha Purima gallasata laythan laythan woga oothidi bonchana mela he dabdaabeti qoncisosona. Hessi Ayhude addey Mardikiyoosinne kawiya Astira issife zoretidi kessida kiita.
EST 9:32 Kawe Astiri kiitay Purima Ba7aale wogaa minthis; ika maxaafan xaafetis.
EST 10:1 Kawoy Arxekisisi ba kawotethan gaxape gaxa gakanaw de7iya asa ubbay giira qanxana mela wolqan kiittis.
EST 10:2 I oothida gitanne malaalsiya oosoti ubbay, Mardikiyoosaka dhoqu oothidi waati bonchidaako qoncisiya taarikey Meedonanne Farse kawotetha taarike maxaafan xaafetis.
EST 10:3 Maatan gidiko, Mardikiyoosi kawa Arxekisisape nam7antho. I Ayhudetanka daro bonchetidanne dosetida asi. I ba ase gidida Ayhudeti, sarotethaninne hirgi bayna daana mela daro daaburida asi.
JOB 1:1 Uxe biittan Iyyoba geetetiya issi asi de7ees; I borey bayna asi, suure asi, Xoosse yayyiyanne iitabaape haakida asi.
JOB 1:2 Iyaw laapun adde naytinne heedzu macca nayti de7oosona.
JOB 1:3 Iyaw laapun mukulu dorsati, heedzu mukulu gimaleti, ichashu xeetu waatha boorati, ichashu xeetu macca haretinne daro aylleti de7oosona. Doloha bagga biittan de7iya asa ubbaafe I aadhida dure asi.
JOB 1:4 Iya adde nayti banta son son gibira giigisidi, banta heedzu micheta xeegidi issife moosonanne uyoosona.
JOB 1:5 Gibira gallasati poletiya wode Iyyobi ba nayta xeegisidi, “Ooni eri ta nayti banta wozanan Xoosse baaddidi nagara oothonna aggokona” gidi wonta guura dendidi, entana geeshshanaw ba nayta issuwa issuwa sunthaa xeegidi xuussa yarsho yarshees. Iyyobi hessa ubba wode oothees.
JOB 1:6 Issi gallas kiitanchoti Godaa sinthan bentanaw yidosona; Xalaheyka qassi entara yis.
JOB 1:7 Goday Xalahiyako, “Neeni awupe yadii?” yaagis. Xalahey, “Taani sa7a ubban yaanne haanne yuuyashe gam7as” yaagidi zaaris.
JOB 1:8 Goday Xalahiyako, “Yaatin, neeni ta aylliya Iyyoba loytha be7adii? Sa7a bolla iya mela borey bayna asi, suure asi, Xoosse yayyiyanne iitabaape haakida asi baawa” yaagis.
JOB 1:9 Xalahey zaaridi, “Tuma Iyyobi Xoossas coo yayyii?
JOB 1:10 Iyanne iya soo asaa, iyaw de7iyaba ubbaa neeni dirada naagabikii? I oothiya ooso ubbaa neeni anjida gisho iya mehe wudey biitta ubbaa bolla daris.
JOB 1:11 Shin neeni ne kushiya yeddada, iyaw de7iya aquwa ubbaa shociyako, tuma I nena som7on baaddana” yaagis.
JOB 1:12 Goday Xalahiyako, “Ero lo77o, iyaw de7iyaba ubbay ne kushena, shin iya bochofa” yaagis. Hessafe guye, Xalahey Godaa sinthafe keyidi bis.
JOB 1:13 Issi gallas Iyyoba adde naytinne macca nayti banta bayra ishaa son moosonanne woyne ushshi uyoosona.
JOB 1:14 Issi kiitetida asi Iyyobako yidi, “Nuuni boorata waaxidi goyishin, haretika nu matan mishin,
JOB 1:15 Saaba biitta asati akeekona yidi ola kessidi, ubbaa bonqidi ekidosona; qassi aylletaka mashshan wodhidosona. Yaatin, taani ta xalaala attada ha hanidaba new odanaw yas” yaagis.
JOB 1:16 I buroo odishin hara asi yidi, “Salope tami wodhidi dorsatanne heemmeyisata mis. Yaatin, taani ta xalaala attada ha hanidaba new odanaw yas” yaagis.
JOB 1:17 I buroo odishin hara asi yidi, “Kaldaaweti heedzu cugan shaaketidi yidi, nuna olidi gimaleta ubbaa eki bidosona; aylletaka mashshan wodhidosona. Yaatin, taani ta xalaala attada ha hanidaba new odanaw yas” yaagis.
JOB 1:18 I buroo odishin, hara asi yidi, “Ne adde naytinne macca nayti banta bayra ishaa son misheenne woyne ushshi uyishee de7ishin,
JOB 1:19 wolqaama gotey akeekona mela biittafe dendidi, keethaa shocin, keethay enta bolla kundidi nayta wodhis. Yaatin, taani ta xalaala attada ha hanidaba new odanaw yas” yaagis.
JOB 1:20 Hessafe guye, Iyyobi dendidi, kayos ba ma7uwa pheedhis; ba huuphiya buluusis; biittan gufannidi goyinnishe,
JOB 1:21 “Taani ta aaye ulope kallo yeletas; hayqasheka taani kallo baana; Goday immis; Goday zaaridi ekis; Godaa sunthay galatetto” yaagis.
JOB 1:22 Ha ubbanka Iyyobi nagaraa oothibeenna; Xoossaa bolla iitaba odetibeenna.
JOB 2:1 Hara gallas kiitanchoti Godaa sinthan bentanaw yidosona; Xalaheyka qassi entara issife iya sinthan bentanaw yis.
JOB 2:2 Goday Xalahiyako, “Neeni awupe yadii?” yaagis. Xalahey Godaako, “Taani sa7a ubban yaanne haanne yuuyashe gam7as” yaagis.
JOB 2:3 Goday Xalahiyako, “Neeni ta aylliya Iyyoba loythada be7adii? Sa7a bolla iya mela borey bayna asi, suure asi, Xoosse yayyiyanne iitabaape haakida asi baawa. Gaasoy bayna taani iya dhaysana mela ne tana denthethinka ha77i gakanaw I ba suuretethan minnidi eqis” yaagis.
JOB 2:4 Xalahey zaaridi, “Ne shempoy atto” asi geysada asi ba shempuwa gisho baw de7iyaba ubbaa immees.
JOB 2:5 Shin, “Neeni ne kushiya yeddada iya asatethaa bochiyako, I nena tuma som7on baaddana” yaagis.
JOB 2:6 Goday Xalahiyako, “Ero lo77o, iya wodhopafe attishin, iya bolla ne koydaba oothanaw danda7aasa” yaagis.
JOB 2:7 Hessafe guye, Xalahey Godaa sinthafe keyidi, Iyyoba tohope huuphe gakanaw iita madunthan kaa7etana mela oothis.
JOB 2:8 Iyyobi bido bolla uttidi kon7an bana goodis.
JOB 2:9 Iya machiya, “Ha77i gakanawuka neeni ne suuretetha mintha oykadii? Xoossaa baaddada hayqaaga” yaagasu.
JOB 2:10 Iyyobi zaaridi, “Neeni eeya maccasada waanada odetay? Nuuni Xoossaafe lo77oba eki gam7idi, iitabay gakiya wode ekokoyee?” yaagis. Ha waaye ubban Iyyobi Xoossa bolla iitabaa odetibeenna.
JOB 2:11 Heedzu Iyyoba laggeti, Temaana biittafe Elfaazi, Shuuha biittafe Beldadoosinne Na7ima biitta asi gidida Soofari Iyyoba bolla gakida metuwa si7ida wode iyaw qadhetanawunne minthethanaw issife iyako yidosona.
JOB 2:12 Enti iya haahon eqidi xeelliya wode I Iyyoba gideysa eribookona. Guyepe iya gideysa erida wode banta qaala dhoqu oothidi yeekidosona; banta ma7uwa peedhidi, banta huuphen baana qolidosona.
JOB 2:13 Enti iyara laapun gallasinne laapun qamma biittan uttidosona. Enti iya waayey keehi daro gideysa be7ida gisho oonika iya odisibeenna.
JOB 3:1 Hessafe guye, Iyyobi ba doona dooyidi, ba yeletida gallasaa haysada yaagidi baaddis.
JOB 3:3 “Taani qanthatida qammaynne yeletida gallasay baadetidaba gido!
JOB 3:4 He gallasay dhuman laameto! Salo Xoossay he gallasaa qopofo; iya bolla poo7oyka poo7opo.
JOB 3:5 Sakana dhuminne caagani iya goozo; iya shaarii kammo; iya poo7uwa dhumi qoso.
JOB 3:6 He gallasaa qamma sakana dhumi oyko. Laytha giddon de7iya gallasatan taybetofo; ageenata taybonka gelopo.
JOB 3:7 He qammay mayno; ufaysa ililsi iyan si7etofo.
JOB 3:8 Leewataane denthanaw danda7eysatinne gallasata baaddeysati he gallasaa baaddo.
JOB 3:9 He qamman bakali poo7opo; poo7o naagidi demmofo; wonta xalqey iyaw dolopo.
JOB 3:10 He gallasay taani ta aaye ulon qanthatonna melanne ha waayiya be7onna mela ashshiboona gisho baadetidaysa gido.
JOB 3:11 “Taani ta aaye ulon haatha gidida gidarkina! Ta aaye ulope yeleta wodhida mela hayqida gidarkina!
JOB 3:12 Ta aayiya tana ayis ba ki7on ekadesha? Ba dhanthaaka tana ayis dhanthadesha?
JOB 3:13 He wode taani hayqidaba gidiyako, ha77i taani shempada dhiskana shin!
JOB 3:14 Ha77i laaletida bessata bantaw keexida, ha sa7aa kawotaranne zoreysatara,
JOB 3:15 enta keethan worqaynne biray kumida halaqatara issife duufon zin7anashin!
JOB 3:16 Woyko bosha gididi yeletida na7ada, gallasa poo7o be7iboona yooga na7ada biitta giddon ayis qosetabikina?
JOB 3:17 Duufon iitati banta iita ooso aggoosona; yan daaburanchoti shempoosona.
JOB 3:18 He bessan qasho asati shempidi ufaytoosona; enta un7etheyisata waasuwa yan si7okona.
JOB 3:19 Gitinne guuthi yan de7ees; aylletika aylletethafe yan la77a keyoosona.
JOB 3:20 “Meton de7eysatas, shempoy cametidaysatas, poo7oy ayis imetidee?
JOB 3:21 Hayqo amotidi demmonaysatas, qottidi wothida shalope aathidi koyeysatas, de7oy ayis imetidee?
JOB 3:22 Duufo gakiya wode ufayteysatas, de7oy ayis imetidee?
JOB 3:23 Ogey dhayida uraas, Xoossay iya yuushuwa dirida uraas, poo7oy ayis imetidee?
JOB 3:24 Ooley taw kathi gidis; ta waasoy goggiya haathi gidis.
JOB 3:25 Taani yayyidabay ta bolla gakis; taani dagammidabay taw hanis.
JOB 3:26 Taw metope attishin, saroy, wopinne shempoy baawa” yaagis.
JOB 4:1 Temaanape yida Elfaazi zaaridi,
JOB 4:2 “Issi asi xaltaamidi neera odetiko neeni lancanee? Shin haasayonna agganay oonee?
JOB 4:3 Heko, neeni darota tamaarsadasa; argaacida kusheta minthethadasa.
JOB 4:4 Ne qaalay dhubetidaysata koolidi essis; daaburida gulbatata minthis.
JOB 4:5 Shin ha77i metoy nena gakin ufaysi qanxadasa; un7i nena teqin dagammadasa.
JOB 4:6 Ne Xoossaas yayyeysi nena ammanthidi wothibeennee? Ne suure hemethay new ufaysi gidibeennee?
JOB 4:7 “Ane qopa; geeshsha asi gididi dhayday oonee? Suure asi gididi shodetidi dhayday oonee?
JOB 4:8 Ta be7idaysada, iitatethi goyidi meto zereysati, iya zaaridi buucana.
JOB 4:9 Enti Xoossaafe keya shempon punetidi dhayana; iya hanquwa lacuwan meetetana.
JOB 4:10 Iitati gudiya gaammo mela xaaggoosona; shin enta achay meqeretis.
JOB 4:11 Shankatidi miyaba dhayida gaammoy hayqeysada, enta naytika laaleteysada iitata nayti laaletana.
JOB 4:12 “Issi gallas issi xuuray taako yis; he xuura kalkashan ta si7as.
JOB 4:13 Wolqaama dhiskoy ase oykida wode un7ethiya qamma amuho giddon,
JOB 4:14 yashshinne kokorsi tana oykis; ta meqethati kokoridosona.
JOB 4:15 Carkoy ta som7uwa baqidi aadhis; ta dagammin ta asatethaa ikisey eqis.
JOB 4:16 I ta sinthan eqis; shin I aybeko shaakada erabike. Hessafe guye, si77i gida bessafe haysada giya girsaa si7as.
JOB 4:17 ‘Hayqiya asi Xoossaa sinthan xillo gidanaw danda7ii? Woyko asi bana medhidaysa sinthan geeshshi gidanaw danda7ii?
JOB 4:18 Xoossay ba aylletan ammanetonaba gidiko, ba kiitanchotanka bala demmiyaba gidiko,
JOB 4:19 Yaatin, urqa keethan de7eysati, enta de7uwa baasoy biitta gididaysati, guxunepe eeson hayqeysati waananee?
JOB 4:20 Wonta bentidi omarsi hayqoosona; oonika hassayonna merinaw dhayoosona.
JOB 4:21 Dhishey shodetida dunkaane mela cincatethi bayna hayqoosona.’ ”
JOB 5:1 “Iyyoba, new koyana asi de7iko ane xeega! Kiitanchotape oodeko ne xeellanee?”
JOB 5:2 Eeya uraa lancey wodhees; akeeki bayna uraa qanaatey dhaysees.
JOB 5:3 Eeya uray minnidi de7ishin be7as; shin qoponna iya keethay baadetis.
JOB 5:4 Iya nayti saroy bayna daana; pirda dabaaban entaw eqiya asi bayna gisho enti qohetana.
JOB 5:5 I shiishida kathaa koshatida asay maana; hari attoshin aguntha giddon dolidaysaka aggokona. Saamotidaysati iya shaluwa ekanaw amottoosona.
JOB 5:6 Metoy sa7ape keyenna; waayey biittafe dolenna.
JOB 5:7 Tami pinxidi wodheysada, asi metos yeletis.
JOB 5:8 “Ta nena gidiyako ta Xoossako shiiqana; ta mootuwaka iya sinthan wothana.
JOB 5:9 I taybetonna malaatata, pilgetonna wolqaamabata oothees.
JOB 5:10 Ira biittan bukisees; goshsha gadiyas haathe yeddees.
JOB 5:11 Kawushata dhoqu dhoqu oothees; kayoteyisata minthethidi ufaysees.
JOB 5:12 Enta qofay poletonna mela, genanchota halchuwa hada oothees.
JOB 5:13 Cincata enta gene oosuwan oykees; genanchota maquwa aathidi yeggees.
JOB 5:14 Gallasay entaw dhuma gidana; seeta gallas dhuman hemetiya asada tattafana.
JOB 5:15 Manqota enta morketa mashshafe ashshees; enta wolqaamata kushiyape wothi ekees.
JOB 5:16 Hessa gisho, manqotas ufaysi de7ees; geellatethi si77i oothees.”
JOB 5:17 “Xoossay seeriya asi anjetidaysa; hessa gisho, Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaa seera kadhopa.
JOB 5:18 I menthees, shin zaaridi koolees; I madunxisees, shin iya kushey dhallees.
JOB 5:19 Usupun qommo qohotape I nena ashshana; laapunthoy nena bochenna.
JOB 5:20 Kosha laythi hayqope, ola wode mashshafe nena ashshees.
JOB 5:21 I nena iita inxarsafe naagana; boshi gakiya wode yayyaka.
JOB 5:22 Bosha bollanne kosha bolla ne miicana; bazzo do7atas yayyaka.
JOB 5:23 Ne goshsha biittan shuchi deenna; bazzo do7atara ne saron daana.
JOB 5:24 Ne dunkaaney saro gideysa ne erana; ne daraa ne xomoosiya wode aybika pacenna.
JOB 5:25 Ne yeletay daranaysanne ne kochay maata mela gidanaysa ne erana.
JOB 5:26 Kathi wode naagidi caketeysada, neeni cimatethi kaallada duufo baana.
JOB 5:27 “Iyyoba, nuuni hessa ubbaa pilgidi xeellida. Hessi tuma gidiya gisho akeekada eka” yaagis.
JOB 6:1 Hessafe guye Iyyobi zaaridi,
JOB 6:2 Ta waayeynne ta azzanoy ubbay mizaanen liketidi be7etiyako,
JOB 6:3 Abba gaxan de7iya shafiyape aadhidi deexana; Hessa gisho, ta qaalay nena malaalsenashin.
JOB 6:4 Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaa dongeti tana caddidosona; ta asatethay enta yiishsha uyees; Xoossaa daganthoy ta bolla salpis.
JOB 6:5 Harey woyko boori maati de7ishin waassiyee?
JOB 6:6 Mal7onna kathi maxiney gelonna meetetiyee? Woyko phuuphulle haathi mal7iyee?
JOB 6:7 Hessa mela kathi tana suukeyenna; hessa mela kathi ta miiko tana sakees.
JOB 6:8 Ta woosa Xoossi si7iyako aybee? Ta amuwaka taw kunthiyako aybee?
JOB 6:9 Xoossaa shene gidin I tana mentherethiyako, I ba kushiya yeddidi tana dhaysiyako,
JOB 6:10 Ta Geeshsha Xoossaa qaala kaddaboonna gisho, waayey darikoka ufaysan ta gupana.
JOB 6:11 Ta paxa daanaw taw ayba wolqi de7ii? Taw ayba ufaysi de7ishin danda7iyana?
JOB 6:12 Ta wolqay shucha meleyee? Woyko ta ashoy naase birata meleyee?
JOB 6:13 Taani tana maaddanaw ayba wolqi taw de7ii? maado demmanaw xeelliya bessika baawa.
JOB 6:14 Meton de7iya asi Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossas yayyeysa aggikoka, iya laggeti iyaw keehatethi bessanaw koshshees.
JOB 6:15 Shin ta ishati hinte iri bukonna wode meliya shaafa mela tana cimmeeta.
JOB 6:16 Balgo ageenan ha shaafay shachan kumees.
JOB 6:17 Shin boney gakiya wode shachay til7ees; shaafayka melees.
JOB 6:18 Caana mehe laaggishe biya zal7anchoti, haathe koyanaw banta ogiyape gaxa keyidi, mela biittan toylatishe dhayoosona.
JOB 6:19 Teema biitta zal7anchoti haathe koyoosona; Saaba biitta oge asati ufaysi qanxokona.
JOB 6:20 Enti ammanetidi koyidi dhayida gisho yilotidosona, he bessaa gakidi yeellatidosona.
JOB 6:21 Hinteka taw he shaafata mela gidideta; tana gakida metuwa be7idi yayyideta.
JOB 6:22 Hanoshin ta hintena, “Taw issiba immite” woyko, “Hinte shaluwara tana wozite” gadinaa?
JOB 6:23 “Tana ta morketa kushepe ashshite” woyko, “Qadhey bayna asaa kushepe tana wozite” gadinaa?
JOB 6:24 “Ta si77i gaana; hinte tana tamaarsite; ta ay balidaako ane tana bessite.
JOB 6:25 Tuma odi cammikoka eketees! shin hinte oday aybiska maaddenna.
JOB 6:26 Hinte ta haasaya carko mela hada ootheeta; Yaatin, ufaysi qanxidaysas taw ay zaaro immanaw koyeetii?
JOB 6:27 Aawi bayna na7a bolla saama yeggeeta; hinte laggiya bayzanaw washiseeta.
JOB 6:28 Ane shama ayfen tana xeellite; ta hinte sinthan wordotiyana?
JOB 6:29 Hayyana, ane zaarethidi qopite; taani xillo ta bolla coo pirdofite.
JOB 6:30 Ta inxarsan wordoy de7ii? Ta doonay wordonne tumaa shaakanaw danda7ennee?”
JOB 7:1 Asa de7oy sa7a bolla wolqaama baaxe gidenneyee? Iya laythay une oothiya asa de7o mela gidenneyee?
JOB 7:2 Wulliya awa amotiya gaacha mela, woyko ba damooziya ekanaw naagiya oosanchoda,
JOB 7:3 hessada taw mela ageenati meto qammati imetidosona.
JOB 7:4 Taani zin7iya wode awude barkandinasha gayis; Shin qammay taw aduqees; sa7i wontana gakanaw hiixan shireta shireta wodhayis.
JOB 7:5 Ta asatethay guxuntis; ta madunthay giishshi goggees.
JOB 7:6 Ta laythay dorze mooqepe aadhidi ellesees; ufaysi baynashin ta laythay wurees.
JOB 7:7 Abeeti Xoossaw, ta laythay issi shempo mela gideysa qopa! Ta ayfey zaaridi keehaba be7enna.
JOB 7:8 Ha77i be7ey zaaridi be7enna; tana koyana shin zaari demmenna.
JOB 7:9 Shaari laaletidi dhayeysada, duufo wodhiya asi simmidi keyenna.
JOB 7:10 Ba soo simmidi yeenna; iya eriya asayka dogees.
JOB 7:11 “Hessa gisho, ta si77i giike; ta ayyaana un7etetha odana; ta shempuwa cametethaa gisho zuuzumana.
JOB 7:12 Hessa mela neeni tana ayis naagay? Ta new abba woyko abban de7iya iita do7a gadiyee?
JOB 7:13 ‘Ta hiixay tana minthethana; ta arsay tana zuuzunthafe shempisana!’ gada qopas;
JOB 7:14 Shin neeni tana amuhon yashisaasa; qoncethan tana daganthaasa.
JOB 7:15 Taani ha waayey kumida asatethaa tookada daanape, suletada hayqiyako dosayis.
JOB 7:16 Taani ta de7uwa shaatettas; daanaw koyke; ta laythay issi shempo mela gidiya gisho tana aggarki.
JOB 7:17 Ne iya gitayada xeellanaw asi aybee? Ne iyaw qopanaw asi aybee?
JOB 7:18 Wonta wonta ne iya xomoosasa; woden woden ne iya paacasa.
JOB 7:19 Ne ta bolla ayfe wotheysa aggikii? Cuchu mittiya wode taw immikii?
JOB 7:20 Abeeti ase kaalleyso, ta nagaraa oothin nena ay qohidee? Ne ayis tana cadda oykay? New ta tooho gidadinaayee?
JOB 7:21 Ta naaquwa ayis aggikii? Ta nagara ayis atto giikii? Ta duufo geliya wodey gakis; ne tana koyana, shin hizape demmaka” yaagis.
JOB 8:1 Shuha biittafe yida Beldadoosi zaaridi,
JOB 8:2 “Neeni hessa awude gakanaw odetay? Ne doonape keya qaalay wolqaama gote mela.
JOB 8:3 Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossay xillo pirdennee?
JOB 8:4 Ne nayti Xoossaa bolla nagaraa oothida gisho, I enta enta nagaraa gisho seeris.
JOB 8:5 Shin neeni Xoossaako simmiko, Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaa woossiko,
JOB 8:6 neeni geeshshinne suure gidiko, I ne gisho dendidi nena maaddana; I kase ne de7uwa zaaridi woytana.
JOB 8:7 Ne doomethay guutha daanikoka, ne wursethay daro aadhidi darana.
JOB 8:8 Kase yeletaa ane oycha; nu mayzati ay tamaaridaako pilgada demma.
JOB 8:9 Nuuni zine nayta aybaka eroko; nu ha sa7an de7iya laythay kuya mela.
JOB 8:10 Enti nena tamaarseynne new odey, banta wozanan wothidabaape gidenneyee?
JOB 8:11 Carey bayna bessan palki dolanaw danda7ii? haathi bayna bessan mayrey cil7anaw danda7ii?
JOB 8:12 Buroo diccidi qanxetonna de7ishe, cil7o maatapeka eeson melees.
JOB 8:13 Xoossaa dogiya asaa ubbaa wursethay hessa mela; Xoosse eronna asaa ufaysay dhayana.
JOB 8:14 I ammanetiyabay meqiyaba; I ceeqetiyabayka shango haada mela.
JOB 8:15 I ba shango haada bolla zempana, shin eqenna; I iya oykana, shin duuxi wodhana.
JOB 8:16 I awa wode haathe uyidi cil7iya atakilte mela; ba xaphuwa biitta ubban yeddida mitha mela.
JOB 8:17 Ba xaphuwa keelan yeddees; gita shucha bolla ba xaphuwa xaaxees.
JOB 8:18 Shin I ba bessaafe shodetiko, he bessay, ‘Ta nena be7abike’ yaagana.
JOB 8:19 Iita asata ufaysay hessa mela; harati yidi enta bessaa oykana.
JOB 8:20 “Xoossay borey bayna asaa yeggi aggenna; iita ootheyisata maaddenna.
JOB 8:21 I zaaridi nena miichananne ililsana.
JOB 8:22 Nena ixeysati yeella ma7ana; iitata keethay dhayana” yaagis.
JOB 9:1 Iyyobi zaaridi,
JOB 9:2 “Ee, hinte geysi tuma gideysa ta erayis; shin asi Xoossa sinthan waanidi xillo gidanaw danda7ii?
JOB 9:3 Iyara ooni palamanaw danda7ii? I oychiya mukulu oyshatape issuwaka zaaranaw danda7enna.
JOB 9:4 Xoossay cincanne wolqaama; iyara eqetanaw danda7ey oonika baawa.
JOB 9:5 Qoponna de7ishin dereta enta bessaafe diggees; ba hanquwan aathidi yeggees.
JOB 9:6 I biitta iya bessaafe qaathees; biitta tuuqetaka yiggees.
JOB 9:7 Away keyonna mela oothees; xoolintoti poo7onna mela diggees.
JOB 9:8 I barka salota miccis; abba hobbiya bolla hemetees.
JOB 9:9 Xoossay Biire, Ooriyoona, Pilaadisa geetetiya xoolintotanne, dugeha baggara de7iya xoolinto koceeta medhis.
JOB 9:10 I asi pilgid eranaw danda7onna gitabata, taybetonna malaalsiyabata oothees.
JOB 9:11 I ta matara aadhiya wode ta be7anaw danda7ike; I taako shiiqiya wode eranaw danda7ike.
JOB 9:12 I bonqiko digganaw danda7ey oonee? ‘Waatay?’ yaagidi iya oychanay oonee?
JOB 9:13 Xoossay ba hanquwa teqenna; Ra7aaba geetetiya do7a maaddeysati iya tohuwa garsan kundoosona.
JOB 9:14 Yaatin, iya oysha zaaranaw, iyara mootetanaw taani oonee?
JOB 9:15 Taani xillo gidikoka, pirdiya Xoossay tana maaranaada woossanaape attishin, taani iyaw zaaro immike.
JOB 9:16 Ta iya xeegin, I taw koyaakoka, tana si7ees gada ammanike.
JOB 9:17 Tana goten mentherethees; gaasoy bayna ta madunthaa darsees.
JOB 9:18 Tana shempo diggees; ta de7uwa camethees.
JOB 9:19 Wolqaba gidiko, I wolqaama. Xillo pirdaba gidiko, iya pirda keethi shiishanay oonee?
JOB 9:20 Taani tana xillo giikoka ta doonay tana bala kessees; tanan borey baawa ta giikoka ta inxarsay tana geella kessees.
JOB 9:21 Taani borey bayna asi gidikoka tabaa qopike; taani ta de7uwa kadhayis.
JOB 9:22 Xoossay borey baynaysanne iita issife dhaysees; ta dummatethi baawa gey hessa gishosa.
JOB 9:23 Gadoy gelidi asaa qoponna wodhiya wode, I xillo asaa waayan miicees.
JOB 9:24 Ha sa7ay iita asaa kushen wodhiya wode, I pirdeyisata ayfiya goozees. Hessa ubbaa oothey iya gidonna ixiko, hari oonee?
JOB 9:25 Ta de7o laythati woxiya uraape aadhidi ellesoosona; enti lo77oba be7onna piradhidi dhayoosona.
JOB 9:26 Ta de7o laythay palka wogoloda woxees; arganthi miyaba oykanaw salope duge paalleysada paallees.
JOB 9:27 ‘Ta zuuzuntha dogana; som7o tukeysa aggada poo7isana giyako,’
JOB 9:28 Neeni tana geeshshi goonnaysa taani eriya gisho, tana gakana waaye ubbaa taani yayyayis.
JOB 9:29 Yaatin, taani bala gideysi attonna ixiko, coo mela ayis daaburayna?
JOB 9:30 Taani ta asatethaa hari attoshin saamunan meecetiyakoka, ta kushiya dummabaara meecetiyakoka,
JOB 9:31 ta ma7oyka tana shaatettana gakanaw, neeni tana urqa ollan holana.
JOB 9:32 Ta iyaw zaaro immanaw Xoossay ta mela ase gidenna; gidiyako nu nam7ay daynna sinthan eqana.
JOB 9:33 Shin nu nam7aa bolla ba kushe wothidi, nuna sigethiya asi nu giddon de7eerenne!
JOB 9:34 Iya teemoy tana daganthonna mela, issi asi Xoossaa xam7aa taape digereneshin!
JOB 9:35 Yaaniko, taani iyaw yayyonna odetana; shin ha77i taani danda7ike.
JOB 10:1 Tana duussi shaattis! Hessa gisho, ta zuuzumanaape attishin, si77i giike; ta shempuwa seela kessana.
JOB 10:2 Taani Xoossaako haysada gaana; ta bala taw odape attishin, ta bolla pirdofa.
JOB 10:3 Neeni iitata qofaa ufaysan ekashe, tana un7ethanaw bessii? ne kushen medhida uraa kadheysi wogee?
JOB 10:4 Ne ayfey asa ayfe meleyee? neeni asi xeelleysada xeellayee?
JOB 10:5 Ne de7o laythay asa de7o laytha meleyee?
JOB 10:6 Yaatin, ta bala ayis koyay? Ta nagaraa ayis kaallay?
JOB 10:7 Taani bala gidonaysanne ne kushepe tana oonika ashshanaw danda7onnaysa ne eraasa.
JOB 10:8 Tana ne kushey giigisidi medhis; shin ha77i he kushey simmidi tana menthees.
JOB 10:9 Neeni tana biittafe medhidaysa hassaya Yaatin, ha77i tana zaarada baana oothanaw koyay?
JOB 10:10 Tana maathada ta aaye ulon tigidaynne meqa maathada Irkisiday nena gidikii?
JOB 10:11 Neeni tana ashonne goga mayzadasa; shayaninne meqethan waaxadasa.
JOB 10:12 Neeni taw de7onne merinaa siiqo immadasa; ne naagoy tana paxa wothis.
JOB 10:13 Shin neeni he wodepe doomada ne wozanan tana qohanaw qopada de7eysa ta erayis.
JOB 10:14 Ta naaquwa ne be7aasa; ta nagara oothiko seeronna aadhaka.
JOB 10:15 Taani balikoka tana ayye! Ta xillo gidikoka ceeqetanaw danda7ike. Ne tana yeella mayzadasa; waayen wothadasa.
JOB 10:16 Ta otoriko tana gaammoda shankatada oykaasa; tana qohanaw ne malaalsiya wolqaa zaara zaara bessaasa.
JOB 10:17 Neeni ta bolla ooratha markata ehaasa; ne hanquwa ta bolla darsaasa; tana olanaw ooratha olanchota giigisaasa.
JOB 10:18 Yaatin, tana ta aaye ulope ayis kessadii? Oonika tana be7onna hayqidaako taw lo77oshin!
JOB 10:19 Taani medhetonna attidaako, woyko ta aaye ulope keyashe duufo gelidaako lo77oshin!
JOB 10:20 Ta guutha de7o laythay wurees gidenneyee? Ha guutha laythan ufaytana mela tana aggarki!
JOB 10:21 Ta simmonna bessaa boonna de7ishin, leelida dhuma biitta gakonna de7ishin,
JOB 10:22 iya poo7oy dhuma gidida bessaanne hayqoy kawotida bessaa, maari bayna bessaanne leelida dhuma biitta boonna de7ishin, tana aggarki!”
JOB 11:1 Na7ima biittafe yida Soofari zaaridi,
JOB 11:2 “Ha hada haasaya ubbaas zaaro immiya asi baawee? Woyko hessa odida uray tuma gidanaw danda7ii?
JOB 11:3 Ne hada oday ase si77i oothiya daanii? Ne qelqisiya wode nena seeriya asi baawee?
JOB 11:4 Neeni, ‘Ta timirtey tuma; taani Xoossaa sinthan geeshshi’ ” gaasa.
JOB 11:5 Xoossay new odiyako, ba doona dooyidi odetiyako aybe!
JOB 11:6 Cincatethas daro ogey de7iya gisho, Xoossay new cincatetha xuura qoncisiyako aybe! He wode ne seeretida seeray, besseysafe guutha gideysa eranashin.
JOB 11:7 “Ciimmo gidida Xoossaa xuuraa eranaw danda7ay? Woyko Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaba pilgada gakanaw danda7ay?
JOB 11:8 Enti salotape dhoqa; ne ay oothanaw danda7ay? Enti Si7oolepeka aadhida ciimmo; ne eranaw danda7aka.
JOB 11:9 Xoossaa cincatethay biittafe dalgees; abbafeka aadhidi ciimmotees.
JOB 11:10 I yidi nena qasho keethan yeggiyako, pirda keethi shiishiko, iya digganay oonee?
JOB 11:11 Xoossay pathonna asaa erees; iitabaa be7iya wode si77i gidi aggenna.
JOB 11:12 Eeya asi cinca gideysafe, wora harey ase gididi yeletanaysi mata.
JOB 11:13 Neeni ne wozanaa suure oothiko, ne kushiya iyako micciko,
JOB 11:14 nagaraa ne kushepe haassiko, ne keethan iitabay doonna mela oothiko,
JOB 11:15 He wode neeni dhoqu gada yeelli bayna ubbaba be7an; yashshi bayna minnada eqana.
JOB 11:16 Neeni ne metuwa ubbaa dogana; goggidi aadhida di7oda zaara hassayaka.
JOB 11:17 Ne de7oy seeta gallasa awape aadhidi poo7ana; ne de7uwa dhumay wonta xalqeda poo7ana.
JOB 11:18 New ufaysi de7iya gisho neeni hirgonna daana; Xoossay nena naagiya gisho wopu gada daana.
JOB 11:19 Neeni yashshi bayna dhiskana; daro asay nenan nashetanaw koyana.
JOB 11:20 Shin iitati meto be7ishe akeekokona; iyape baqatidi attanaw danda7okona; Enta ufaysay hayqo” yaagis.
JOB 12:1 Iyyobi haysada yaagidi zaaris.
JOB 12:2 Ee, hinte tumaka ase; cincatethi hintera hayqana!
JOB 12:3 Shin taka hinteda akeeki de7iya asi; taani hintefe guuxike; Ha hinte odetidaba eronnay oonee?
JOB 12:4 Taani Xoossaa woossin I tana si7ida asi gidikoka, ha77i ta laggetas miichas attas; taani xillonne borey bayna asi gidikoka qelqisethas attas.
JOB 12:5 Metootidi be7iboona asi hara asa meton miicees; hinte kundanaw gandigariya asi sugeeta.
JOB 12:6 Bonqeyisata keethay saro de7ees; Xoossaa yiloyeysati hirgi bayna de7oosona; banta wolqaa bantaw xoosse oothosona.
JOB 12:7 Ane meheta oycha; enti nena tamaarsana; Woyko salo kafota oycha; enti new odana.
JOB 12:8 Woyko sa7a medhetethatas oda; enti nena tamaarsana; abba molotika new odana.
JOB 12:9 Godaa kushey hessa oothidaysa eronnay oonee?
JOB 12:10 De7oy de7iya medhetethi ubbaynne asa shempoy iya kushena.
JOB 12:11 Inxarsi kathi shaakidi ereysada, haythi oda shaakidi erenneyee?
JOB 12:12 Cincatethi dondzida asaa matan deneyee? daro laythi de7ida asaa matan akeeki benteneyee?
JOB 12:13 Cincatethinne wolqi Xoossasa; zoreynne akeeki iya matan bentees.
JOB 12:14 Xoossay laallidaba zaari keexanay oonee? I qachida uraa birshanay oonee?
JOB 12:15 Xoossay ira teqiko biittay melees; ira bukisiko di7oy biitta dhaysees.
JOB 12:16 Minotethinne xoonoy Xoossasa; cimeteysinne cimmeysi nam7ayka iyape garsan de7ees.
JOB 12:17 Zoreysatape cincatethaa qaari ekees; halaqataka eeya kessees.
JOB 12:18 I kawota araatape wothidi aylle kessees.
JOB 12:19 Kahinetape bonchuwa qaari ekees; adussa wode xapho yeddida wolqaamata shiri yeggees.
JOB 12:20 Ammanetida zoreyisata si77i oothees; cimatapeka akeeka yegisees.
JOB 12:21 Bonchetidaysata kawushshees; minota danco bilisees.
JOB 12:22 Dhuman de7iya xuura qonce kessees; leelida dhumaa poo7o kessees.
JOB 12:23 Xoossay kawotethata gitayees; zaaridi dhaysees; Kawotethata dalgisees; zaaridi laallees.
JOB 12:24 Alamiya kawota akeeka diggees; ogey bayna mela biittan toylatana mela oothees.
JOB 12:25 Poo7oy bayna dhuman tattafoosona; mathotida asada gandigaroosona.
JOB 13:1 Ha ubbaa ta ayfey be7is; ta haythay si7idi akeekis.
JOB 13:2 Hinte ereysa taka erayis; taani hintefe guuxike.
JOB 13:3 Shin taani Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossara odetanaw koyayis; taani ta metuwaba iyara mootetanaw amottayis.
JOB 13:4 Shin hinte wordon kammeyisata; hinte ubbayka pathonna aakimeta.
JOB 13:5 Hinte si77i gidaba gidiyako, cinca gidi bentanashin!
JOB 13:6 Ha77i ta mootuwa si7ite; ta doonape keya palama hayzite.
JOB 13:7 Hinte Xoossaa gisho wordo odeteetii? Iya gisho gidi cimon odeteetii?
JOB 13:8 Hinte iya maaddiyabay de7ii? Woyko iyaw xabaqa eqidi mootetetii?
JOB 13:9 I hintena pilgi xeelliyako hintefe lo77oba demmanee? Hinte ase cimmeysada iya cimmanaw danda7eetii?
JOB 13:10 Hinte geeman asa som7o be7idi maaddiko, I tuma hintena seerana.
JOB 13:11 Iya bonchoy hintena daganthennee? Iya teemay hintena yashshennee?
JOB 13:12 Hinte odida leemisoy bidintha mela pathonnaba; hinte mootoy biittafe medhetida gondalle mela.
JOB 13:13 Ane si77i giite; ta odetana; hizape hanidabay hano.
JOB 13:14 Taani tanatethaa ayis meton yeggiyana? Ta de7uwa ayis ta kushen oykiyana?
JOB 13:15 Xoossay tana wodhikoka taani iya danda7an naagana; taani ta metuwa iya sinthe shiishana.
JOB 13:16 Nagarancho asi iya sinthe shiiqanaw danda7onna gisho; ooni eri ta xaalatethay atotethas gaaso gidanaw danda7ees.
JOB 13:17 Ta haasaya akeekidi si7ite; ta oday hinte haythan gelo.
JOB 13:18 Ha77i taani ta metuwa eka shiiqas; I taw pirdanaysa erayis.
JOB 13:19 Tana mootana asi de7ii? De7iko taani si77i gada hayqana.
JOB 13:20 Xoossaw ne taw ha nam7ubata ootha; yaatiko ta ne sinthafe geemmike.
JOB 13:21 Ne seera kushiya taape dentha; tana dagantheysa agga.
JOB 13:22 Hessafe guye, tana xeega; ta koyana; Woyko ta odana, ne taw zaara.
JOB 13:23 Ta balaynne nagaray aapunee? Ane ta naaquwanne ta nagaraa tana bessa.
JOB 13:24 Neeni ayis ne som7uwa taape genthay? ne morkeda ayis tana taybay?
JOB 13:25 Carkoy efiya kaliya ayis un7ethay? melida punuwa ayis yedethay?
JOB 13:26 Neeni ta bolla xaafida mootoy camo; ta na7atetha balaka aggabaaka.
JOB 13:27 Neeni ta tohuwa duxadasa; ta tanguwa ubbaa wochaasa; ta tohoy yedhiyasuwa kaallasa.
JOB 13:28 Hessa gisho, taani wooqida mithada; bili mida afilada wurayis.
JOB 14:1 “Maccasape yeletida asas laythi qanthi; ika qassi meton kumis.
JOB 14:2 Ciishshada bentidi ellesidi qoqofetees; kuyada gam7onna eeson aadhees.
JOB 14:3 Yaatin, neeni hessa mela asi kaallayee? pirdas ne sinthe shiishayee?
JOB 14:4 Tunabaape geeshshaba kessanaw danda7ey oonee? Oonika baawa.
JOB 14:5 Asi daana laythas zawi de7ees; I daana ageena neeni tayba wothadasa; neeni wothida zawape aadhey oonika baawa.
JOB 14:6 Une oothiya asi ba oosuwa polidi shempeysada, I shempana mela ne ayfiya iyape denthada iya aggaaga.
JOB 14:7 Qanxetida mithas ufaysi de7ees; zaaridi aacees; ooratha tashe kessidi diccees.
JOB 14:8 Mithaa xaphoy biitta garsan cimikoka, durumay biittan wooqikoka,
JOB 14:9 haathe demmidi aacees; ooratha dolada tashe kessees.
JOB 14:10 Shin asi hayqees; hessi iyaw wursethi; iya shempoy keyape guye I awun de7ii?
JOB 14:11 Abbaa haathi meleysada, shaafa haathi wureysada,
JOB 14:12 hessada asika hayqees; simmidi dendenna; saloti aadhana gakanaw asi baarkenna; ba dhiskuwafeka dendenna.
JOB 14:13 Neeni tana duufon genthidaako aybe! Ne hanqoy aadhana gakanaw qottidaako aybe! Ne taw qamida he gallas tana hassaydaako aybe!
JOB 14:14 Asi hayqiko simmidi de7on daanee? Ta shempiya wodey yaana gakanaw, ha meto wode ubbaa danda7an naagana.
JOB 14:15 He wode ne tana xeegana taka koyana; ne medhida tana be7anaw laamotiya wodey yaana.
JOB 14:16 He wode neeni tuma ta tanguwa wochana; shin ta nagaraa kaallaka.
JOB 14:17 Ta balay ogoron yiicetana; ta nagaraa neeni kammana.
JOB 14:18 Zumi woddeysada, zaalli dhoqalleteysada,
JOB 14:19 haathi shucha xapho bookeysada, di7oy biitta meeccidi efeysada, neeni asa ufaysi dhaysaasa.
JOB 14:20 Neeni iya merinaw xoonasa; I simmenna; iya malaa laammada ne sinthafe diggaasa.
JOB 14:21 Iya nayti bonchetiko I erenna; enti kawuyiko I be7enna.
JOB 14:22 Shin iya asatethaa seelay iya xalaalas si7etees; I ba xalaalas yeekees” yaagis.
JOB 15:1 Temaana biittafe yida Elfaazi haysada yaagis;
JOB 15:2 “Cinca asi carkoda oyketonnaba odeetii? Woyko doloha bagga carkuwan ba uluwa coo kunthii?
JOB 15:3 Pathonna qaalan zuuzumii? Woyko gatey bayna odan mootetii?
JOB 15:4 Neeni Xoossas yayyeysa aggadasa; harati Xoossaa goyinnona mela dhubbadasa.
JOB 15:5 Ne iitatethay ne odan eretees; shin ne cinca oday nena genthees.
JOB 15:6 Ne doonay ne bolla pirdees tana gidike; ne inxarsay ne bolla markatees.
JOB 15:7 “Asape koyro yeletiday nenee? Neeni dereti medhetanaape kase yeletadii?
JOB 15:8 Neeni Xoossaa xuura duulatan de7ay? asa cincatethi ne xalaalas de7iyee?
JOB 15:9 Nuuni eronnabay neeni eriyabay aybee? Nuus geemmidi new qoncida ayba cincatethi de7ii?
JOB 15:10 Ne aawape bayratiya asati, cimidi puulumida asati nuura de7oosona.
JOB 15:11 “Xoossay new immida minthethoy gidenneyee? nuuni kahaamatethaba odida qaalay guutheyee?
JOB 15:12 Ne wozanay nena ayis wora efii? Ne ayfey ayis dereeqidi xeellii?
JOB 15:13 Yaatada neeni Xoossaa bolla hanqetadasa; iita qaala ne doonape kessadasa.
JOB 15:14 Asi Xoossa sinthan geeshshi gidanaw danda7ii? Woyko maccafe yeletida asi xillo gidanaw danda7ii?
JOB 15:15 Xoossay ba kiitanchotan ammanetena; hari attoshin saloti iya sinthan geeshshi gidokona.
JOB 15:16 Iitanne tuna gidida asi, nagara haathada uyaa asi waanidi ammanetanee?
JOB 15:17 “Ane si7a, qoncisada ta new odana, taani be7idaba ubbaa new odana.
JOB 15:18 Cincati banta aawatape ekidaysa, ta new genthonna odana.
JOB 15:19 Biittay enta xalaalas imetis; hara biitta asi entara walaketibeenna.
JOB 15:20 Ase un7ethishe de7iya iita asi, ba de7o laytha ubban waayetishe de7ees.
JOB 15:21 Daganthiyabay iya haythan si7etees; I saro de7ayis gishin dhayseysati iya bolla keyana.
JOB 15:22 Dhumape kessi ekoy iyaw hanenna; iya qaaday mashshan dhayo.
JOB 15:23 Iya ahay anko quma gidana; baw dhuma gallas matatidaysa I erees.
JOB 15:24 Metoynne un7i iya bolla yaana; olanaw keyida kawo mela iya bolla goobana.
JOB 15:25 Hessika I ba kushiya Xoossaa bolla denthida gishosa; Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaa bolla xaalida gishosa.
JOB 15:26 I eqetanaw minonne dalga gondalle oykis; otoron Xoossaako hordofees.
JOB 15:27 “Iya kilahoy muumida gisho, iya xeessay kumida gisho,
JOB 15:28 I laaletida katamatan, kaysa keethaninne, kundanaw gakida keethan de7ees.
JOB 15:29 I ba duretethan daro gam7enna; iya zaway aakenna.
JOB 15:30 Dhumape kessi ekenaw danda7enna; tashiya tami labida mithadanne carkoy ciishsha qoqofida mithada gidana.
JOB 15:31 Pathonnaban ammanetidi bana cimmofo; iyape aykoka demmonna attana.
JOB 15:32 Wodey gakonna iya ubbay melidi tasheyka aaconna mitha mela gidana.
JOB 15:33 I teeronna qawu7e de7ishe qoqofetiya woyne mela; ciishshan de7ishe qoqofetiya shamaho mela.
JOB 15:34 Xoossas yayyonna asaa kochay dhayana; wodhaafen keexetida keethay taman meetetana.
JOB 15:35 Enti iitatethi qanthatidi meto yeloosona; enta uluwan geney kumis” yaagis.
JOB 16:1 Iyyobi haysada yaagidi zaaris;
JOB 16:2 “Taani hessa mela haasaya daro si7as; hinte minthethoy tana salethis.
JOB 16:3 Go77i bayna hinte odaas wursethi baawee? taara hintena hessada palanthiya gaasoy aybee?
JOB 16:4 Hinte ta bessan, taani hinte bessan gididaba gidiyako, taani ta huuphiya qaathashe, ha77i hinte giyaba ubbaa hinte bolla loythada gaanashin!
JOB 16:5 Ta zoriyan ta hintena minthethanashin! Ta doonape keyiya oday hintena minthethanashin!
JOB 16:6 “Shin ta haasaykoka ta sahoy decenna; ta si77i gada danda7ikoka taape kichenna.
JOB 16:7 Abeeti Xoossaw, ne tana ta asatethafe kessadasa; ta keethaa asa ubbaa dhaysadasa.
JOB 16:8 Shuuqida ta gogay taw marka gidis; ta gilqatethay tana nagarancho kessis.
JOB 16:9 Xoossay hanqetidi ta asatethaa qanxerethis; tana ixidi ba acha ta bolla garcis; ta morkey ba ayfiya ta bolla kessis.
JOB 16:10 Asay ta yuushon shiiqidi tana qelqisidosona; tana leqidi baqidosona.
JOB 16:11 Xoossay tana nagarachotas aathidi immis; iitata kushen tana yeggis.
JOB 16:12 Taani kase saro de7as; shin Xoossay tana tincherethis; ta mirgaciya oykidi tana mentherethis; cache loohisiya malla oothis.
JOB 16:13 Iya tooranchoti banta dongen tana teqidosona; qadhey bayna ta kilahuwa muxerethidosona; ta ciyaa sa7an gussidosona.
JOB 16:14 I tana zaari zaari madunxisis; olanchoda toollidi caddis.
JOB 16:15 Taani kayo ma7o ma7as; ta wolqay wurin baanan uttas.
JOB 16:16 Yeehon ta som7oy gabbis; ta ayfey zo77is.
JOB 16:17 Shin he ubban ta balidabay baawa; ta geeshsha wozanan woossayis.
JOB 16:18 Biittaw, tana gakida qohuwa kammofa; ta waasoy shempiya soo demmofo.
JOB 16:19 Heko ta markay salona; ta xabaqay bollana.
JOB 16:20 Ta laggeti tana kadhidi xeelloosona; ta ayfey Xoossa sinthan afuthi tigees.
JOB 16:21 Ase asara sigethiya asi de7eysada, tana Xoossara sigethiya asi de7idaba gidernishin.
JOB 16:22 Ta laythay wurana hanees; guutha wodepe guye ta simmonna soo baana.
JOB 17:1 Ta shempoy keyees; ta laythay qaammis; taw duufoy giigis.
JOB 17:2 Ta bolla qelqiseysati ta yuushuwan de7oosona; enti tana yiloyida mela aysidosona.
JOB 17:3 Abeeti Xoossaw, neepe hari tana maaddey bayna gisho, ne taw waase gida.
JOB 17:4 Enti akeekona mela enta qofaa gordadasa; Hessa gisho, ne entaw xoono immofa.
JOB 17:5 Miishe demmana gidi, ba laggeta aathidi immiya uraa nayta ayfey qooqana.
JOB 17:6 Xoossay tana asas miichas aggis; asi cuttishe aadhiya asi gidas.
JOB 17:7 Ta daro kayotida gisho ta ayfey eeyis; ta asatethay laafidi eesho gidis.
JOB 17:8 Keeha asati tana be7idi dagammidosona; suureti Xoossaa ammanonayisata bolla yilotidosona.
JOB 17:9 Gidoshin xilloti banta ogiyape deshokona; suureti wolqa guji guji boosona.
JOB 17:10 Shin zaaridi ubbay taako haa yiite! ta hinte giddofe issi cinca asi demmike.
JOB 17:11 Ta de7o laythay wuris; ta halchoy hada gidis; ta wozanaa amoy coo attis.
JOB 17:12 Ta laggeti qamma gallas goosona; dhuma be7ishe ‘Poo7ana hanees’ yaagosona.
JOB 17:13 Ta ufaysan naagiya keethay duufo; ta hiixa dhuman hiixayis.
JOB 17:14 Duufoko, ‘Ne ta aawa’ yaagana; guxuneko, ‘Ne ta aayo woyko ta micho’ yaagana.
JOB 17:15 Yaatin, taw ay ufaysi de7ii? taw ufaysi gidiyaba ooni demmanay?
JOB 17:16 Ta ufaysay taara duufo bandee? Nu issife biittan duge gelanee?” yaagis.
JOB 18:1 Hessafe guye, Shuuha biittafe yida Beldadoosi zaaridi,
JOB 18:2 “Iyyoba, ne odaas wursethi baawee? Ane akeeka; nu odiyaba si7a.
JOB 18:3 Ne nuna ayis miizi oothay? Ayis nuna tulle kessay?
JOB 18:4 Ne hanqetada nena qohaasa; Ne hanquwan biittay kallo attanee? Woyko zaallay ba bessaafe qaaxennee?
JOB 18:5 Nagaranchota xompey to7ana; iya tama lacoy dhayana.
JOB 18:6 Enta keethan de7iya xompey dhayana; enta poo7oyka dhumana.
JOB 18:7 I tangiya tangoy qaammees; iya iita qofay iya zaaridi mees.
JOB 18:8 Iya hemethay iya xihen gelsees; iya tohoti gitetana.
JOB 18:9 Xihey iya ginde oykana; diizi iya qaaxo diggana.
JOB 18:10 Yurde wodoroy sa7an iyaw geemmi uttees; I hemetiya ogiyan gitey de7ees.
JOB 18:11 Dagami iya teqidi oykees; iya guyera kaallidi iya yedethees.
JOB 18:12 Iya wolqaa koshi wursis; dhayoy iya miyen naagees.
JOB 18:13 Hargey iya laafethees; hayqoy iya mokidi ekees.
JOB 18:14 Hirgi bayna de7iya ba keethaafe goodetees; enti iya hayqo geetetiya kawako efoosona.
JOB 18:15 Iya keethay taman oyketana; I de7iyasuwan diinney laaletana.
JOB 18:16 Garsara xaphoy melana; bollara haythi qoqofetana.
JOB 18:17 Iya qopiya asi biittafe dhayana; iya sunthay sa7an hassayetonna attana.
JOB 18:18 I poo7ope dhuman goodettana; alamiyape dhayana.
JOB 18:19 Iyaw na7i woyko kochi dhayana; I de7ida bessan issi asi paxa attenna.
JOB 18:20 Wuloha bagga asay, iya gakida metuwan dagammidosona; doloha bagga asay yashshan kokoridosona.
JOB 18:21 Iita asaa wursethay awudeka hessa mela; Xoossaa eronna asaa qaaday hessa mela” yaagis.
JOB 19:1 Iyyobi zaaridi haysada yaagis;
JOB 19:2 Hinte tana awude gakanaw madunxiseetii? Awude gakanaw hinte qaalan tana caddetii?
JOB 19:3 Hinte tana tammu toho cayideta; tana kawushishe yeellateketa.
JOB 19:4 Tuma ta balidaba gidiko, ta balay tana oychana.
JOB 19:5 Hinte hintena dhoqu dhoqu oothidi, ta kawusha tana mootanaw go7etiko,
JOB 19:6 ha metuwa ta bolla ehiday Xoosse gideysanne ba gitiyan tana gelsiday iya gideysa erite.
JOB 19:7 Ta qohetas gada waassin, tana alley baawa; ta qaala dhoqu oothada waassinka tana si7ey baawa.
JOB 19:8 Ta kanthada boonnada Xoossay ta ogiya diris; ta hemetiya ogiya dhuman gordis.
JOB 19:9 Ta bonchuwa taape qaaris; ta kallachaa ta huuphepe ekis.
JOB 19:10 I tana mentherethi yeggis; ta ufaysa xaphora shodetida mitha mela oothis.
JOB 19:11 Iya hanqoy ta bolla eexi keyis; I tana morkeda taybees.
JOB 19:12 Tana olanaw ba tooranchota kiittees; enti tana olanaw miixa keexidi, ta dunkaaniya yuushuwan uttidosona.
JOB 19:13 Xoossay ta ishata taape haassis; tana ereysati taw allaga gididosona.
JOB 19:14 Ta dabboti taape haakidosona; ta laggeti tana dogidosona.
JOB 19:15 Ta son moketiya imathati tana dogidosona; ta macca aylleti tana oge asada xeellidosona.
JOB 19:16 Ta aylliya ta xeegin taw koyenna; ta woossin taw ero geenna.
JOB 19:17 Ta machiya ta doona peenuwa shaatetasu; ta ishati tana uufidosona.
JOB 19:18 Hari attoshin guutha nayti tana kadhoosona; tana be7idi leqoosona.
JOB 19:19 Ta mata laggeti ubbay tana uufosoona; ta doseysati taw zoko zaaridosona.
JOB 19:20 Ta meqethay ta gogaara oyketis; taani hayqa kichada attas.
JOB 19:21 Ta laggeto, Xoossaa kushey tana dechida gisho, taw qadheterketi.
JOB 19:22 Xoossay tana yedetheysada, hinte tana ayis yedetheetii? ha77i gakanaw hinte tana waaysidaysi gidennee?
JOB 19:23 “Ha77i gakanaw ta odetida qaalay mazgabetidaako, maxaafan xaafetidaako ta dosayis shin.
JOB 19:24 Merinaw daana mela maarisaninne irsaasen zaalla bolla woocetidi xaafetida gideerenne!
JOB 19:25 Tana Wozidaysi de7on de7eysanne wursethan biitta bolla I eqanaysa ta erayis.
JOB 19:26 Ta gogay meetetidi wurikoka, taani ta ashuwape shaaketada Xoossaa be7anaysa erayis.
JOB 19:27 Hara asi gidonna taani ta huuphen, ta ayfen iya be7ana; ta wozanay he qamma laamotees.
JOB 19:28 “Ha metuwas gaasoy iya, nu iya waati yedethino gidi hinte qopiya gidiko,
JOB 19:29 Mashshas yayyite! Xoossa hanqoy mashshara yaana; pirdi de7eysa erite” yaagis.
JOB 20:1 Na7ima biitta asi gidida Soofari haysada yaagidi zaaris;
JOB 20:2 “Ne oday tana lancisida gisho, ta ellesada ne odaas zaaro immana.
JOB 20:3 Ne oday ta bonchuwa qaariya gisho, ta akeekay new zaaro immana mela tana denthethees.
JOB 20:4 Asi biitta bolla de7ida wodepe doomidi, benipe hanidaba eraasa.
JOB 20:5 Iita asa ceeqoy qantha wodesa; Xoossaa eronna asaa ufaysay guutha wodesa.
JOB 20:6 Iita asa otoroy salo gakanaw dhoqu giikoka, iya huuphey shaara gakidi bochikoka,
JOB 20:7 I baana mela pitetidi dhayana; Iya kase eriya asay ‘I awun de7ii?’ yaagana.
JOB 20:8 Elmoda paallidi dhayana; simmidi bentenna; qamma amuhoda coo dhayana.
JOB 20:9 Iya kase be7ida ayfeti zaaridi iya be7okona; I ba de7iya bessaafe tim7i gidi dhayana.
JOB 20:10 Aaway bonqi ekida miishe, iya nayti banta kushen guye zaarana.
JOB 20:11 Iya meqethaa kumida na7atetha wolqay iyara issife biittan zin7ana.
JOB 20:12 “Iitatethi iya doonan mal7iko, I ba inxarsaafe garsan qosiko,
JOB 20:13 wuronnaada ba doonan oykidi, wothi aggiko,
JOB 20:14 iya uluwan camo gidana; wodhiya shoosha marze gidana.
JOB 20:15 Iita asi mitida shaluwa zaari cuttana; iya uluwan de7iya ubbaa Xoossay cooshshana.
JOB 20:16 Iita asi miyabay iyaw marze gididi, iya wodhana.
JOB 20:17 Eessinne maathi haathada goggishin, I be7onna attana.
JOB 20:18 Ba daabura ayfiya moonna haras immana; zal7idi wodhisida wodhiyan ufaytenna.
JOB 20:19 Hessi haniday I manqota un7ethida gishonne hara asi keexida keethaa bonqida gishosa.
JOB 20:20 “Iya iita amoy shempo diggis; shiishida shaloy iya ashshanaw danda7enna.
JOB 20:21 Iya shaloy wuriya gisho, iya duretethay gam7enna.
JOB 20:22 Iyaw aqoy kumidi de7ishin, metoy akeekona iya bolla gaki wodhana.
JOB 20:23 Iya uloy kaalliya wode, Xoossay wolqaama hanquwa iya bolla gussana.
JOB 20:24 Birata mashshafe I baqatana; shin naase birata dongey iya caddana.
JOB 20:25 He dongey iya zokora kanthi keyana; phooliya xeeray iya tiriya kanthi aadhana; dagami iya wozanaa waabaqisana.
JOB 20:26 I shiishida aqoy sakana dhuman dhayana; asi oythiboonna tami iya maana; iya keethan attida shalo ubbaa xuuggana.
JOB 20:27 Saloti iya nagaraa qoncisana; sa7ika iyaw morke gidana.
JOB 20:28 Xoossaa hanqo gallasan, iya keethaanne iyaw de7iyaba di7oy efana.
JOB 20:29 Xoossay geellatas wothida qaaday, iita asaas giigisida gatey haysa” yaagis.
JOB 21:1 Yaatin Iyyobi haysada yaagidi zaaris;
JOB 21:2 Ane ta oda akeekidi si7ite; hessi hinte tana minthethida mela gido.
JOB 21:3 Taani issi toho odetana mela taw wode immite; taani haasaya simmiko tana qelqisite.
JOB 21:4 Taani mootetey asara gidenna. Yaatin, danda7ay wuriko hessi malaalsiyee?
JOB 21:5 Ane tana xeellidi malaaletite; hinte kushiya hinte doona bolla wothite.
JOB 21:6 Ta hessa qopiya wode tana daganthees; ta asatethay kokorees.
JOB 21:7 Iita asati ayis paxa de7oona? Enta laythay ayis aduqii? Enta wolqay ayis dari dari bidee?
JOB 21:8 Enta naytinne nayta nayti, diccishininne injen de7ishin enti ayis be7oona?
JOB 21:9 Enta soy hirgi bayna saro de7ees; Xoossaa xam7ay enta gakenna.
JOB 21:10 Enta miizati biraysi ekidi koxokona; yelishe awucayokona.
JOB 21:11 Banta nayta dorsaa wudeda kessoosona; enta nayti duroosona.
JOB 21:12 Karaabo baqishe diithi diixishe, suusul7e punnishe ufaysan yexoosona.
JOB 21:13 Enti banta de7o laytha injen de7idi, duufo sarora boosona.
JOB 21:14 Gidoshin, enti Xoossaako “Nuupe haaka! Nuuni ne ogiya eranaw koyoko” yaagosona.
JOB 21:15 “Nu iya goyinnanaw Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossay oonee? Nu iya woossidi ay go7etanee?” yaagosona.
JOB 21:16 Enti duretetha banta minotethan demmida goosona; shin taani enta qofaa ekike.
JOB 21:17 “Hanoshin, iita asaa xompey to7ii? Entana boshi gaki erii? Xoossay ba hanquwan enta seeri erii?
JOB 21:18 Carkoy enta kaleda efida wodey, Gotey enta baanada denthida wodey de7ii?
JOB 21:19 Hinte, ‘Xoossi aawata bala gisho enta nayta seerees’ yaageeta. Ane Xoossay nagaranchota enta huuphen seero; yaatiko enti banta naaquwa erana.
JOB 21:20 Nagaranchoti banta seera bantaw eko; Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaa hanqoy enta bolla wodho.
JOB 21:21 Asi hayqidaape guye, ba naytabaa ay erii?
JOB 21:22 “Dhoqa bessan de7eyisata pirdiya Xoossaa, eratethi tamaarsanaw danda7iya asi de7ii?
JOB 21:23 Issi issi asi kumetha wolqaynne saroy de7ishin, inje duussu de7ishe hayqoosona.
JOB 21:24 Enta asatethay orde shin, enta meqethaa kolizey shica de7ishin hayqoosona.
JOB 21:25 Shin harati lo77oba be7onna, meton un7etidi kayotida mela hayqoosona.
JOB 21:26 Nam7ayka hayqidi biittan moogetosona; enti guxuntoosona.
JOB 21:27 “Hinte tana qohanaw qopidi, hinte wozanan qopida qofaa ta loythada erayis.
JOB 21:28 Hinte, ‘He gita uraa keethay awunee? Iita oothiya uray de7iya soy awunee?’ yaageeta.
JOB 21:29 Oge asata oychibeeketii? Enta markatethaa ammanibeketii?
JOB 21:30 Enti, ‘Iita asay dhayo gallas qohetokona; Xoossaa hanqoy qonciya gallas enti attana’ yaagosona.
JOB 21:31 Iita asi iya iitatethaa gisho kaccanay oonee? Iya oosuwa gisho iya seeranay oonee?
JOB 21:32 I hayqin, iya aha duufo efoosona; iya duufoy bonchon naagetees.
JOB 21:33 Zangaara biittay iyaw injetees; daro asay iya sinthan boosona; tayboy bayna asay iya kaalloosona.
JOB 21:34 Yaatin, hinte tana pathonna qaalan waati minthethanee? Hinte ta oyshaas zaariya zaaro ubbay wordo” yaagis.
JOB 22:1 Hessafe guye, Temaana biittafe yida Elfaazi haysada yaagidi zaaris;
JOB 22:2 “Asi Xoosse go77anaw danda7ii? Hari attoshin cinca gidikoka, bana go77anaape attishin, Xoosse go77enna.
JOB 22:3 Neeni xillo gidiko hessi Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaa ufaysiyee? Ne ogey borey baynaba gidiko hessan I ay wodhe demmii?
JOB 22:4 “I nena seereynne pirdey, Neeni iyaw yayya gishoyee?
JOB 22:5 Ne iitatethay daro gidenneyee? Ne nagaraas zawi baawa gidennee?
JOB 22:6 Gaasoy bayna ne ishata waase xeegisadasa; asaa ma7uwa qaara ekada enta kallo yeddadasa.
JOB 22:7 Saamotidaysata haathe ushshabaaka; koshatidaysata kathi muzabaaka.
JOB 22:8 Neeni wolqaama, durenne bonchetida asi gidada de7ashe,
JOB 22:9 Am7eta mela kushe yeddadasa; yi7otas wolqa dhaysadasa.
JOB 22:10 Ne yuushoy gitetiday, akeekona yashshi nena kokorsey hessasa.
JOB 22:11 Ne be7onna mela dhumiday, qassi kixa haathan ne muuketiday hessasa.
JOB 22:12 “Xoossay dhoqa saluwan uttidi, dhoqan de7iya xoolintota duge xeellees.
JOB 22:13 Shin neeni, ‘Xoossi ay erii? Sakana dhumaa giddora kanthidi, pirdanaw danda7ii?
JOB 22:14 Salo gufantho bolla I simeretiya wode, I be7onna mela siketida shaaray iya goozees’ yaagasa.
JOB 22:15 Nagaranchoti hemetida beni ogiyara baanaw qofaa qachadii?
JOB 22:16 Entaw wodey gakonna de7ishin hayqidosona; enta de7o baasoy di7on meecetidi dhayis.
JOB 22:17 Enti Xoossaako, ‘Nuupe haaka! Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossay nuus ay oothanaw danda7ii?’ yaagidosona.
JOB 22:18 Gidikoka, enta keetha lo77oban kunthiday Xoossaa; Hessa gisho, iita asaa qofaa ta ekike.
JOB 22:19 “Iita asati seeretiya wode, xilloti ufaytoosona; suure asati haysada yaagidi, enta bolla qelqisoosona.
JOB 22:20 ‘Nu morketi dhayidosona; enta duretethay tamas attis’ yaagosona.
JOB 22:21 “Iyyoba, ha77ika Xoossara giiga; iyara saro de7a; yaatiko neeni anjetana.
JOB 22:22 Iya timirtiya si7a; iya qaala ne wozanan wotha.
JOB 22:23 Neeni Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaako simmiko; new sa7i simmana; iita ooso ubbaa ne soope digga;
JOB 22:24 Ne worqaa sa7an hola; ne Ofira worqaa shaafan yegga.
JOB 22:25 Yaatiko Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossay, new worqanne dooretida bira gidana.
JOB 22:26 He wode ne Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossan ufaytana; yeellatonna Xoossako pude xeellana.
JOB 22:27 Neeni iya woossana, I nena si7ana; ne qangetha iyaw gathana.
JOB 22:28 Ne qopidabay poletana; ne hemetiya ogey poo7o gidana.
JOB 22:29 Xoossay otoreyisata kawushshees; shin ashketa ashshees.
JOB 22:30 Ne kushey geeshshi gidiko, bala asay ne gaason maarota ekananne attana” yaagis.
JOB 23:1 Iyyobi haysada yaagidi zaaris;
JOB 23:2 Hachika ta cametada zuuzumayis; ta ooley mino gidikoka iya kushey ta bolla deexeysa aggibeenna.
JOB 23:3 Iya demmana bessaa ta erida gidarkina; I de7iya bessaa ta gakarkina!
JOB 23:4 Taani ta metuwa iya sinthan wothanashin! Ta doona mooton kunthanashin!
JOB 23:5 I taw zaaranay aybeko eranashin, I ay giyako be7anashin!
JOB 23:6 I ba gita wolqan taara eqetanesha? Akay, I tana si7ana.
JOB 23:7 Yan suure asi iyara mootetanaw danda7ees; ta daynnay tana merinaw shatinthana.
JOB 23:8 Shin taani doloha biiko I yan deenna; taani wuloha biiko iya yan demmike.
JOB 23:9 I pudehan oothiya wode taani iya be7ike; dugeha bagga simmiya wode taani iya demmike.
JOB 23:10 Shin I ta tanguwa ubbaa erees; I tana paaciya wode taani worqada geeyada keyana.
JOB 23:11 Ta tohoy iya tanguwa kaallidi bees; iya ogiyape haddirsi ushachi simmabike.
JOB 23:12 Iya doonape keyiya kiitaape taani shaaketabike; iya qaala ta wozanan wothas.
JOB 23:13 Xoossay laametenna; Iyara eqetanay baawa, I koydaba oothees.
JOB 23:14 I ta bolla qopidaysa polis; hessa mela hara daro halchoti iyaw de7oosona.
JOB 23:15 Hessa gisho, iya sinthan eqanaw daro yashshees; hessa ubbaa qopiya wode kokorayis.
JOB 23:16 Xoossay ta wozanay doccana mela oothis; Ubbaa danda7iya Xoossay tana daganthis.
JOB 23:17 Sakana dhumay ta som7uwa goozikoka, tana he dhumay haasaya diggibeenna.
JOB 24:1 Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossay pirda wode ayis qanxennee? Iya ereysati he wodiya ayis coo naagonna?
JOB 24:2 Iita asati zawan de7iya shuchaa denthoosona; kaysi ehida dorsata yan heemmoosona.
JOB 24:3 Yi7o nayta hareta bonqoosona; am7e booraa acos oykidi ekoosona.
JOB 24:4 Manqota shaatetidi ogepe gooddosona; banta sinthafe qosetana mela oothosona.
JOB 24:5 Bazzon de7iya wora hare mela, manqoti banta naytas miyaba koyishe daaburoosona.
JOB 24:6 Enti hara asa gaden kathi cakoosona; iita asaa woyne gaden budhe maxoosona.
JOB 24:7 Enti qamma kallo aqoosona; meegos bolla yeggiyabay entaw baawa.
JOB 24:8 Zuma bolla bukiya iran enti suuruxoosona; geliya bessi dhayidi shucha hom7on aqoosona.
JOB 24:9 Aawi bayna na7a aaye ki7ope dafi ekoosona; manquwa na7a acos oykoosona.
JOB 24:10 Manqoti ma7o dhayidi kallo hemetoosona; enti bantaw koshatishe hara asa mirqe tookosona.
JOB 24:11 Enti bantaw saamotishe, zayte kessanaw hara asa gaden shamaho ayfe maxoosona; woyne ushsha gum7anaw woyne ayfe qoroosona.
JOB 24:12 Kataman kataman hayqana haniya asay oolosona; deshetidi madunxida asay maado koyidi waassoosona; shin Xoossay enta metuwa xeellenna.
JOB 24:13 Poo7o ixiya asati, iya ogiya eronna asatinne; iyan eqona asati de7oosona.
JOB 24:14 Sa7i qammiya wode shempo wodheysi dendidi, manqotanne metootanchota wodhees; qammi qassi kaysos boosona.
JOB 24:15 Laymatiya asi sa7i lem7anaysa naagees; oonika be7onna mela ba som7uwa kammees.
JOB 24:16 Kaysoti qamma keethe bookidi kaysotanaw geloosona; shin gallas qosetidi pee7osona.
JOB 24:17 Daganthiya dhumara enti dabbotiya gisho, sakana dhumay entaw seeta gallasa mela.
JOB 24:18 “Shin iita asati haatha goponto mela; enta laata biittay baadetidaysa; oonika enta woyne gade beenna.
JOB 24:19 Shachi maayin, haathi melidi dhayeysada, nagaranchoti hayqidi biittafe dhayoosona.
JOB 24:20 Yelida aayeti enta dogana; Guxuney enta ashuwa maana; iita asay hassayetokona; mithada meqana.
JOB 24:21 Enti na7i bayna mayntha maccasa naaqidosona; am7eta qadhetonna ixidosona.
JOB 24:22 Xoossay ba wolqan minota dhaysis; entaw sa7i injetida daanikoka, kundonna attokona.
JOB 24:23 Xoossay enti saro daanada oothikoka, enta ogiya wochees.
JOB 24:24 Iita asati guutha wodes dhoqu dhoqu goosona; shin ellesidi sharaafada shullidi dhayoosona; kathada caketoosona.
JOB 24:25 Hessi hanenna gidi kaddiya asi de7ii? taani odida qaala wordo gaana asi de7ii?” yaagis.
JOB 25:1 Hessafe guye, Shuuha biittafe yida Beldadoosi haysada yaagidi zaaris;
JOB 25:2 “Xoossay haareysanne yashsheysa; I dhoqa saluwa sarotethan haarees.
JOB 25:3 Iya olanchota taybanaw danda7iya asi de7ii? Xoossa poo7oy gakonna bessi de7ii?
JOB 25:4 Yaatin, asi Xoossaa sinthan xillo gidanaw danda7ii? Maccasape yeletida asi geeshshi gidanaw danda7ii?
JOB 25:5 Xoossaa sinthan ageenika kumetha poo7o gidenna; iya sinthan xoolintotika geeshshi gidokona.
JOB 25:6 Yaatin, Xoossaa sinthan wooqanne guxune gidida asi ay mela laafee?” yaagis.
JOB 26:1 Iyyobi haysada yaagidi zaaris;
JOB 26:2 “Neeni wolqi baynaysa ayba maaddadii? Daaburanchuwa waata ashshadii?
JOB 26:3 Cincatethi pacidaysas ay zore immadii? Ay mela eratethi qoncisadii?
JOB 26:4 Neeni ha qaala odetana mela nena maaddiday oonee? Ne odan mela nena denthethiday oodde ayyaanee?” yaagis.
JOB 26:5 Beldadoosi zaaridi, “Hayqida asaa ayyaanati, garsan haatha giddon de7eysati kokoroosona.
JOB 26:6 Xoossa sinthan Si7ooley qonce; aybika iya genthanaw danda7enna.
JOB 26:7 Xoossay pudeha salota coo miccis; sa7aa kaqoy bayna bessan kaqis.
JOB 26:8 I shaaratan haathe kunthees; haatha deexuwan shaarati daaketokona.
JOB 26:9 I ba shaara miccidi, kumtha ageena kammees.
JOB 26:10 Poo7o dhumape shaakanaw, abba gaxan Xoossay zawa wothis.
JOB 26:11 I hanqetiya wode, salo tuuqeti dagaman kokoroosona.
JOB 26:12 Ba wolqan abba si77i oothees; ba cincatethan Ra7aaba geetetiya do7aa dhaysees.
JOB 26:13 I ba shempuwan salota geeshshees; iya kushey xongetiya shooshaa caddees.
JOB 26:14 Haysati Xoossay oothiya oosotape guuthata; nu iya kalkashaa xalaala si7oos; iya wolqaa deshuwa akeekanaw danda7ey oonee?” yaagis.
JOB 27:1 Iyyobi kaallidi haysada yaagis;
JOB 27:2 “Suure pirdaa tana diggidi, ta de7uwa camo oothida, Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossan taani caaqayis.
JOB 27:3 Ta shempoy de7ishin, ta siidhey shempishin
JOB 27:4 ta doonay wordo odetenna; ta inxarsay cimo odetenna.
JOB 27:5 Hinte oday like gada ta ekike; hayqana gakanaw ta tana suure geysa aggike.
JOB 27:6 Ta xillotethaa mintha oykanaape attishin, aggike; ta de7ida laytha ubban ta kahay tana mootenna.
JOB 27:7 “Ta morketi nagaranchoda, taara eqeteysati bala gido.
JOB 27:8 Xoossay enta shempuwa entafe ekiya wode, enta laytha qaamisiya wode, iitatas de7iya ufaysay aybee?
JOB 27:9 Enta bolla metoy gakiya wode, Xoossay enta waasuwa si7ii?
JOB 27:10 Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossan enti ufaytanee? Enti ubba wode Xoossaa xeeganee?
JOB 27:11 “Taani hintena Xoossaa wolqaaba tamaarsana; Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaa qofaa ta hintefe qottike.
JOB 27:12 Hinte ubbay hessa be7ideta; yaatin, haysa mela coo haasaya ayis odeteetii?
JOB 27:13 Xoossay iita asatas giigisida qaaday, Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaafe ekiya woytoy haysa.
JOB 27:14 Enta nayti ay darikoka olan wurana; enta kochay miyaba dhayidi koshatana.
JOB 27:15 Hessafe attidaysati gadon wurana; enta am7eti entaw yeekokona.
JOB 27:16 Iita asati bira biittada shiishikoka, ma7o urqada shiishidi doorikoka,
JOB 27:17 enta bira xillo asati shaaki ekana; enta ma7uwa geeshshati ma7ana.
JOB 27:18 Enti keexiya keethati shango haada melanne gaabba mela laaletana.
JOB 27:19 Iita asati dure gididi hiixan zin7oosona; shin enti dhiskofe barkiya wode aykoyka baawa.
JOB 27:20 Dagami di7o haathada qoponna enta bolla yaana; qamma gotey enta denthidi efana.
JOB 27:21 Doloha carkoy enti de7iyasuwape pitidi efana.
JOB 27:22 Enti kessi ekanaw baqatishin, qadhey bayna enta bolla wodhana.
JOB 27:23 Ba kushiya baqidi enta bolla qelqisana ba suyqethan enta sugi yeddana.
JOB 28:1 “Bira bookidi kessiya bessinne worqaa seerisiya bessi de7ees.
JOB 28:2 Birati biittafe keyees; naase birati shuchu seerisin keyees.
JOB 28:3 Asay xompe ekidi dhumaa poo7isees; biitta gaathi gakanaw gelees; sakana dhuman he shuchaa koyees.
JOB 28:4 Asay de7iya bessaafe haakidi, asa tohoy yedhi eronna soo gakidi, yan gita olla bookees. Wodoron yaanne haanne kuullotishe, asaape koxetidi de7ees.
JOB 28:5 Kathi biittafe mokees; shin iya giddoy taman seeridi, shireti shireti wodhees.
JOB 28:6 He zaallafe sanpare geetetiya al7o shuchay keyees; iya biittafe worqay bentees.
JOB 28:7 He shuchaa bookiya bessa xiloy erenna; phircoyka be7ibeenna.
JOB 28:8 Iita do7ati he bessaa yedhi erokona; gaammoy yaara aadhibeenna.
JOB 28:9 Asi mino zaalla mentherethees; deriya bookidi xaphuwape aathidi yeggees.
JOB 28:10 Zaalla lukidi kanthiya oge kessees; he al7o shuchaa demmees.
JOB 28:11 Haathi he bessaara goggonna mela zeeres; geemmidabata poo7o kessees.
JOB 28:12 “Shin cincatethi awupe bentanaw danda7ii? Akeeki de7iya awee?
JOB 28:13 Asi iya gatiya erenna; I de7on de7iya medhetethati de7iya biittan bentenna.
JOB 28:14 Abbaa ciimmoy, ‘Cincatethi ta giddon baawa’ yaagees.
JOB 28:15 Cincatethi worqan shametenna woyko biran bentenna.
JOB 28:16 Cincatethi Ofira worqan, margidenne sanpare geetetiya al7o shuchan shametenna.
JOB 28:17 Worqinne mastootey iyara liketenna; worqafe oosetida al7o miishen laametenna.
JOB 28:18 Cincatetha gatey zaagolepe, almaazepenne al7o shucha ubbaafe aadhees.
JOB 28:19 Toophaze geetetiya Tophe inqoy iyara liketenna; walahi bayna worqan I shametenna.
JOB 28:20 “Yaatin, cincatethi awupe yii? Akeeki awupe bentii?
JOB 28:21 De7on de7iya medhetetha ubbaafe geemmidi de7ees; salo kafoti iya demmokona.
JOB 28:22 Gadoynne hayqoy, ‘Nuuni cincatethaba haythan si7ida’ yaagosona.
JOB 28:23 “Cincatethako efiya ogiyanne I de7iya bessaa erey Xoossaa xalaala.
JOB 28:24 Xoossay sa7aa gaxa ubbaa xeellees; salope garsan de7iyaba ubbaa be7ees.
JOB 28:25 Xoossay carkos wolqaa immida wode, haatha makida wode,
JOB 28:26 iri bukana woga immida wode, dadas oge wothida wode,
JOB 28:27 Xoossay cincatetha be7is; be7idi bonchis; paacidi essis.
JOB 28:28 He wode Xoossay asako, ‘Cincatethi Xoossas yayyeysa; akeeki iitaape haakeysa’ yaagees” yaagis.
JOB 29:1 Iyyobi kaallidi haysada yaagis;
JOB 29:2 Ha77i ta de7iya duussay, Xoossay beni tana naagida wodiyatho gideerenne!
JOB 29:3 He wode iya xompey ta bolla poo7ees; iya poo7uwan dhumaa kanthada bayis.
JOB 29:4 He wodey Xoossay ta keethaa anjin, taani ta na7atetha wolqara de7ida wode.
JOB 29:5 He wode Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossay taape shaaketibeenna; ta nayti ta yuushon de7oosona.
JOB 29:6 He wode taani ta kushiya maathan meeccayis; shucha biittan toketida shamahoy, shaafa haathada goggiya zayte immees.
JOB 29:7 Taani katamaa pirda keethaa bida wode, shangotara issife uttayis.
JOB 29:8 He wode na7atethati tana be7idi oge yeddoosona; cimati tana bonchanaw dendi eqidosona.
JOB 29:9 Halaqati oda aggaagidosona; banta kushiya banta doona bolla wothidosona.
JOB 29:10 He kataman de7iya gita asati si77i gidoosona; enta inxarsay enta kottonuwa baqidi oykis.
JOB 29:11 Tabaa si7ida ubbay nashshees; tana be7ida ubbay bonchees.
JOB 29:12 Hessi haniday, taani manqota waasuwa si7ada ashshida gishonne, yi7o nayta maaddida gishosa.
JOB 29:13 Hayqana haniya asati tana anjidosona; am7eti ta maaduwan ufaytidosona.
JOB 29:14 Xillotethaa ma7oda ma7as; suure pirdaa afilada ma7as; barneexada wothas.
JOB 29:15 Taani qooqetas ayfe, wobbetas toho gidas.
JOB 29:16 Manqotas aawa gidas; oge asas xabaqa gidas.
JOB 29:17 Taani iitata gacuwa menthas; enti bonqidaysa enta doonape yegisas.
JOB 29:18 Taani ta wozanan, “Ta laythay shafeda darin, ta son bonchon hayqana” gada qopas.
JOB 29:19 Taani xaphuwa haathan yeddida, tashiya bolla aki kumida mitha melashin!
JOB 29:20 Ta bonchetida mela de7as; ta wolqay ubba wode oorathishin!
JOB 29:21 Ta haasaya wode si77i gidi si7ees; ta zoriya ufaysan ekoosona.
JOB 29:22 Ta entana alliya gisho, ta oda simmin taape guyera odiya asi baawa.
JOB 29:23 Goshshanchoy ira naageysada, enti ta haasaya si7anaw hakankidi naagoosona.
JOB 29:24 Enti hirgan de7ishin ta som7uwa pashkisayis; ta miichay enta minthethees.
JOB 29:25 Taani enti daana ogiya doorada entaw halaqa gidas. Ba olanchota giddon de7iya kawoda ta enta giddon de7as; enti azzaniya wode minthethas.
JOB 30:1 Shin ha77i taape na7attiya asati tana qelqisoosona. Enti ta dorsa wudiya heemmiya kanatara pee7onna mela taani diggida aawata nayta.
JOB 30:2 Enta aawati wolqi ixidaysatanne gilqata gidiya gisho tana aykoka maaddibokona.
JOB 30:3 Metoynne koshi un7ethin, biitta bazzo bidi xapho coommosona.
JOB 30:4 Cumadhenne bonco maxidosona; mal7onna sankara xapho midosona.
JOB 30:5 Asi waassishe kayso gooddeysada, entana asaa giddofe gooddidosona.
JOB 30:6 Enti zangaaran, gongoloninne zaalla qophon de7idosona.
JOB 30:7 Enti woran do7ada waassishe yuuyidosona; aguntha giddon shiiqidi issife de7idosona.
JOB 30:8 Enti biittafe goodetidosona; sunthi bayna eeyata gididi de7idosona.
JOB 30:9 Ha77i enta nayti tana yethan caddoosona; taani enta giddon hayses attas.
JOB 30:10 Enti tana shaatetidi taape haakoosona; yeellatonna ta som7on cuttoosona.
JOB 30:11 Xoossay ta wolqaa laafethidi tana kawushida gisho, enti tana qohanaw yeda para gididosona.
JOB 30:12 Seeri bayna diccida nayti ta bolla dendidosona; ta tohuwas xihe wothidosona; enti tana dhaysanaw teqidosona.
JOB 30:13 Enti ta ogiya gordidi tana dhaysanaw koyoosona; enti hessa oothonna mela teqiya oonika baawa.
JOB 30:14 Olanchoti katama dirsaa menthidi geleysada, enti ta bolla yidosona.
JOB 30:15 Taani gita dagama dagammas; ta bonchoy carkoy efiyada bis; ta saro duussay shaarada dhayis.
JOB 30:16 Ta shempiya daro un7etasu; metoy tana cuucummidi oykis.
JOB 30:17 Qamma qamma sahoy ta meqetha coommees; seelay taw shempo immenna.
JOB 30:18 Xoossay ba gita wolqan ta ma7uwa shiishidi oykis; qoodhe oykiya ma7oda tana cuullis.
JOB 30:19 Xoossay tana urqan holis; taani baananne bidinthe gidas.
JOB 30:20 Abeeti Xoossaw, taani neeko waassayis; shin neeni tana allabaka. Eqada nena woossas; shin neeni ta woosa si7abaka.
JOB 30:21 Neeni taw wozana mino gidadasa; ne gita wolqan tana yedethaasa.
JOB 30:22 Neeni tana carkora denthada gooddadasa; goten tana harqadasa.
JOB 30:23 Asa ubbaas wursethi gidida, hayqos ne tana aatha immanaysa erayis.
JOB 30:24 Meqida asi, “Tana maaddarki” gidi waassin, iyaw qadhetonna asi de7ii?
JOB 30:25 waayen de7eysatas ta yeekabikina? manqotas ta qadhetabikina?
JOB 30:26 Lo77oba demmana gada amotas shin iitabay gakis; Taw sa7i keehana gada naagas shin gallasi taw dhumis.
JOB 30:27 Ta wozanay hirga aggibeenna; taani wopa demmabike; un7a qammi ta bolla gakis.
JOB 30:28 Ta asatethay awa suulon gidonashin azzanon kareexis; taani deriya shiiquwan eqada maade koyayis.
JOB 30:29 Taani worakanatas isha, diidinthas lagge gidas.
JOB 30:30 Ta gogay kareexidi poqeti poqeti wodhees; ta asatethay mishan xuugetees.
JOB 30:31 Ta ufaysi qoncisiya diithinne suusul7ey, ha77i ta zelelsas gidis.
JOB 31:1 “Geela7o xeellada amottonna mela, taani ta ayfiyara caaqetas.
JOB 31:2 Bollan de7iya Xoossaa matape asas imetida qaaday aybee? Salon de7iya Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossay asas immiya gishoy aybee?
JOB 31:3 Iitata bolla boshi, bala ootheyisata bolla gadoy gakanaysi eretidaba gidenneyee?
JOB 31:4 Xoossay ta ogiya ubbaa be7eneyee? ta tanguwa ubbaa taybeneyee?
JOB 31:5 “Taani wordon de7idaba gidiko, ase cimmidaba gidiko,
JOB 31:6 Xoossay tana like mizaanen mazzano; yaatidi ta xillo gideysa be7o.
JOB 31:7 Ta hemethay ogepe keydaba gidiko, ta wozanay ta ayfey xeellidaba amotidaba gidiko, ta kushey nagaran tunidaba gidiko,
JOB 31:8 ta dolay shodetidi dhayo; ta zeridaysa hari mo.
JOB 31:9 “Ta wozanay hara maccas amotidaba gidiko, woyko taani ta shooruwa machiw geeddidaba gidiko,
JOB 31:10 ta machiya hara asas gaacco; iira hara addey aqo.
JOB 31:11 Hessi yeellayiya nagaras koshshiya gita pirda.
JOB 31:12 Ha nagaray tamada xuuggiyaba gidiya gisho, ta aquwa ubbaa dhaysanashin.
JOB 31:13 “Ta adde woyko ta macca aylleti abeeti gin, entaw pirdonna ixidaba gidiko,
JOB 31:14 Xoossa sinthan ta pirdas shiiqiya wode waananee? I tana oychiya wode taani woyga zaaranee?
JOB 31:15 Tana medhida Xoossay enta I medhibeneyee? Nuna ubbaa nu aaye ulon medhiday issi iya gidenneyee?
JOB 31:16 “Taani manqoti woossidaba diggidaba gidiko, woyko am7eta minthethonna aggidaba gidiko,
JOB 31:17 yi7o nayti mela aqiya wode be7ashe, taani tarka midaba gidiko,
JOB 31:18 Taani enta ta na7atethafe doomada enta aawada dichas; ta yeletoosope doomada am7eta maaddas.
JOB 31:19 Ma7oy dhayin meegoy wodhiya uraa, woyko kallo de7iya metootanchuwa be7ada,
JOB 31:20 ta dorsata ikisepe oosetida ma7o mayzin, tana anjona biday de7iko,
JOB 31:21 Taani mooton enta shatimmanaysa erada, yi7o nayta naaqidaba gidiko,
JOB 31:22 ta qesey kuriyape me77o; ta kushey hashiyape kareti wodho.
JOB 31:23 Xoossaa hanquwa yayyida gisho hessa oothanaw danda7ike.
JOB 31:24 “Taani worqan ammanetidaba gidiko, woyko walahi bayna worqaa ‘Ta ceeqoy nena’ gidaba gidiko,
JOB 31:25 Ta duretetha darotethan, ta kushey demmida wodhen ufaytidaba gidiko,
JOB 31:26 Awa phoolethi be7ada, woyko ageena lo77otethi xeellada,
JOB 31:27 ta wozanay geeman enta nashshibeenna, woyko ta enta yeerada goyinnabike.
JOB 31:28 Hessi pirda ehiya nagara gidiya gisho Xoossaa kaddas guussu.
JOB 31:29 “Ta morketa kundethan ufaytabike; enta gakida metuwan hashshu gabike.
JOB 31:30 ‘Ta morkey dhayo’ yaaga baaddada, nagara oothabike.
JOB 31:31 Ta soo asay, ‘Iya son kathi midi kallonnay oonee?’ yaagidi markatoosona.
JOB 31:32 Ta soy ubba wode dooya gidiya gisho, oge asi karen aqi erenna.
JOB 31:33 Harati ootheysada, ta nagaraa ta wozanan genthabike.
JOB 31:34 Asa pokos yayyada, enta boriyas dagammada, soo gelada qosetida wodey deenna.
JOB 31:35 “Tana si7iya asi de7eerenneshin, Ta oday tuma gideysa paramayis; Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossay taw zaaro immo Ta morkey ba mootuwa xaafidi shiishin ta be7arkinashin.
JOB 31:36 Be7iyako woytoda qoodhen aathada ma7anashin, Kallachada ta huuphen wothanashin!
JOB 31:37 Taani maati de7iya asada xoossaako shiiqada, ta oothidaba ubbaa iyaw qoncisanashin!
JOB 31:38 “Ta goshsha biittay ta bolla waassidaba gidiko, daasatika afuthan laakidaba gidiko,
JOB 31:39 he biittan kaxidaba miishe qanxonna ekidaba gidiko, woyko he biitta ootheyisata koshan wodhidaba gidiko,
JOB 31:40 taw he biittan giste gisho agunthi, banga gisho sharaafi dolo” yaagis. Iyyoba oday hessan poletis.
JOB 32:1 Iyyobi, “Taani xillo asi” gida gisho, ha heedzu asati iyaw zaaro imo aggaagidosona.
JOB 32:2 Iyyobi Xoossaafe aathidi bana xillo oothida gisho, Rama yarape gidida Buza biittafe yida Barkela na7ay Elihuy Iyyoba bolla hanqetis.
JOB 32:3 Enti iya coo bala gidi pirdidi, iyaw bessiya zaaro immanaw danda7iboona gisho Elihuy ha heedzu laggeta bollaka hanqetis.
JOB 32:4 Elihuy entafe kaalotiya gisho enti ubbay haasaya wursana gakanaw naagis.
JOB 32:5 Ha heedzu asati Iyyobas bessiya zaaro immanaw danda7iboonaysa be7idi I daro yilotis.
JOB 32:6 Buza biittafe yida Barkela na7ay Elihuy haysada yaagidi haasaya doomis. “Taani hintefe na7atayis; hinte taape bayrateta; Hessa gisho, taani ta qofaa hintew odanaw yayyas.
JOB 32:7 Taani, ‘Cimati odeto; banta daro laythan demmida cincatethaa tamaarsonna’ ” gada qopas.
JOB 32:8 Shin asa giddon aqidi cincatethi immey, Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaa Ayyaana.
JOB 32:9 Ase cinca oothey cimatethi gidenna, woyko asas akeeka immey laytha darotethi gidenna.
JOB 32:10 Hessa gisho, si7ite; taka ta qofaa hintew odana.
JOB 32:11 Hinte haasaya wode, taani si77i gada hayzas; hinte odana qaala koyishin naagas.
JOB 32:12 Hinte geysa ubbaa wursada si7as; shin hintefe oonika Iyyoba bala gidi ammanthibena; hintefe oonika iya palamas bessiya zaaro immibeenna.
JOB 32:13 Iyyoba odaas kalsiya zaaro immanaw danda7ey, Xoossefe attishin, ase gidonna gisho, hinte, “Nuus cincatethi de7ees” goopite.
JOB 32:14 Iyyobi palamiday taara gidonashin hintera; taani hinte odada iyaw zaaro immike.
JOB 32:15 Enti dagammidi, gaanaba dhayida gisho, zaaro immanaw danda7ibookona.
JOB 32:16 Yaatin enti odetiyaba dhayidi si77i gidi eqiko, taani naaganaw koshshii?
JOB 32:17 Gidenna, taani odiyabay de7ees; taka ta qofaa qoncisana.
JOB 32:18 Ta odanabay daroy de7iya gisho, ta giddon de7iya ayyaanay tana oda gidi sugees.
JOB 32:19 Ta gaathay goozetida manaaceda, woyko mal7anto woyne ushshi kumida ogoroda dhuuqana hanees.
JOB 32:20 Ta odada kessanaw bessees; ta doona dooyada zaaro immanaw koshshees.
JOB 32:21 Ha odan taani oonaka maaddike, woyko oonaka coo sabbike.
JOB 32:22 Ase coo sabbiyabay taw eretenna; ta hessa oothiyako tana medhidaysi pirdanashin.
JOB 33:1 Iyyoba, ha77i ta odaa si7a; ta giyaba ubbaa hayza.
JOB 33:2 Taani ta doona dooyas; ta qaalati ta inxarsaa xeeran de7oosona.
JOB 33:3 Ta qaalati ta wozana suuretetha qoncisosona; ta ereysa ta inxarsay tumatethan odees.
JOB 33:4 Tana medhiday Xoossaa Ayyaana; Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaa shempoy taw de7o immis.
JOB 33:5 Ne danda7iko taw zaaro imma; nena giigisada taara palama.
JOB 33:6 Taani Xoossaa sinthan ne mela; taanika urqafe medhetas.
JOB 33:7 Neeni taw yayiya gaasoy baawa; taani nena naaqike.
JOB 33:8 “Ne haasaya ubbaa taani si7ashe gam7as; ne doonape keyida qaalata hayzas.
JOB 33:9 Taani geeshshinne borey bayna asi; taani xillonne nagara oothaboonna asi.
JOB 33:10 Shin Xoossay tana seeranaw gaaso koyees; I tana ba morkeda taybees.
JOB 33:11 Ta tohuwa duxis; ta tango ubbaa I wochees” yaagadasa.
JOB 33:12 “Iyyoba, ne oday like gidenna; ta new odayis, Xoossay asape aadhees.
JOB 33:13 ‘Xoossay asa odaas zaaro immenna’ gada, ayis iyara palamay?
JOB 33:14 Asi akeekennafe attishin, Xoossay dumma dumma ogera odees.
JOB 33:15 Asi qamma hiixan zin7idi, dhisko eeyidi de7iya wode, Xoossi amuhoninne qoncethan odees.
JOB 33:16 He wode asay si7anaada haythe dooyees; ba seeran enta daganthees.
JOB 33:17 Yaatidi asi nagara oothonna mela teqees; otoro asape diggees.
JOB 33:18 Xoossi ase dhayope ashshees; hayqopeka naagees.
JOB 33:19 Asi hargetidi hiixan de7ishin, iya meqethaa garsan qanxonna saho yeddidi seerees.
JOB 33:20 Hessada hanidi hargida uray kathi ixees; daro mal7o kathi iya shaatees.
JOB 33:21 Iya ashoy gilqidi wurees; iya asatethay melin meqethi taybetees.
JOB 33:22 Iya shempoy duufoko, iya de7oy hayqo kiitanchotako matees.
JOB 33:23 “Asas suure ogiya bessiya mukulun taybetiya kiitanchotape issoy iya maaddanaw danda7ees.
JOB 33:24 Iyaw qadhetidi, ‘I duufo gelonna mela iya ashsha; taani iya woziyaba demmas; iya aggaaga’ yaagidi hayqos odees.
JOB 33:25 Hessa gisho, iya asatethay na7a asatethi gidana; iya yalagatetha wolqay iyaw simmana.
JOB 33:26 He wode I Xoossaa woossana; Xoossay iya woosa si7ana; Xoossay iyaw iya xillotethaa zaariya gisho, I ufaysan Xoossaa goyinnana.
JOB 33:27 He wode asa sinthan I haysada yaagidi yexana; ‘Taani nagaraa oothas; suureba geellayas; shin Xoossay ta hanuwa taw qanxibeenna.
JOB 33:28 Ta duufon gelonna mela tana ashshis; ha77i paxa de7ada poo77o be7ayis’ yaagana.
JOB 33:29 “Heko, Xoossi asas hessa ubbaa zaari zaari oothees.
JOB 33:30 I de7o poo7o be7ana mela, iya shempuwa duufope ashshees.
JOB 33:31 “Iyyoba, taani odeysa hayzada si7a; ane ne si77i ga; taani odetana.
JOB 33:32 Ne odanaw koyaabay de7iko oda; taani ne xillo gideysa be7anaw koyayis.
JOB 33:33 Atto giiko si77i gada, ta haasaya si7a; ta nena cincatethi tamaarsana” yaagis.
JOB 34:1 Qassika Elihuy haysada yaagis;
JOB 34:2 “Hinteno, cincato ta haasaya si7ite; hinteno, eranchoto tana hayzite.
JOB 34:3 Inxarsi mal7o kathi shaaki ereysada, haythi oda shaakidi erees.
JOB 34:4 Ane nuuni suureba shaakidi, lo77oba tamaaridi eroos.
JOB 34:5 “Iyyobi, ‘Taani xillo; shin Xoossi tana suure pirdaa diggis.
