JOB 34:6 Taani tuma shin wordancho gidas; tanan bali baawa shin, paxonna madunthi madunxisis’ yaagis.
JOB 34:7 Iyyobada Xoossa bolla, qelqisiya asi de7ii?
JOB 34:8 I iita ootheysatara laggetees; nagaranchotara hemetees.
JOB 34:9 I, ‘Asi Xoosse ufaysana gidi oothiyabay aykoka maaddenna’ yaagees.
JOB 34:10 “Hessa gisho, hinteno, akeekancho asato si7ite, iita oosoy Xoossaafe, Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaafe bala oosoy haako.
JOB 34:11 Xoossay asas iya oosuwada immees; iya ogiyada iyaw qanxees.
JOB 34:12 Xoossay tuma iita oothenna; Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossay suure pirdaa geellayenna.
JOB 34:13 Sa7a bolla iyaw maata immiday oonee? biitta ubbaa bolla iya shuumiday oonee?
JOB 34:14 Xoossay ba Ayyaananne ba de7o shempuwa zaaridi baako ekiyako,
JOB 34:15 asho ma7ida ubbay issife dhayana; asi biitta simmanashin.
JOB 34:16 “New akeeki de7iko haysa si7a; ta haasaya hayza.
JOB 34:17 Suure pirdaa ixey haaranaw danda7ii? Neeni xillonne wolqaama Xoossaa pirday?
JOB 34:18 Xoossay kawotako, ‘Hinte pathonayisata’; qassi biitta haareysatako, ‘Hinte iita’ yaagees.
JOB 34:19 Enti ubbay iya kushe oosota gidiya gisho, Halaqata som7o xeellidi maaddenna; dureta manqotape aathidi xeellenna.
JOB 34:20 Enti gidi bilahe akeekona hayqana; ubbay kokorishe dhayana; wolqaamati asa kushey bochonna kichana.
JOB 34:21 “Xoossay asa hemethaa xeellees; iya tango ubbaa wochees.
JOB 34:22 Iita ootheyisata, genthanaw danda7iya sakana dhumi baawa.
JOB 34:23 Asay iya sinthe pirdas shiiqana mela, Xoossay qaxaro immenna.
JOB 34:24 Oyshi bayna wolqaamata mentherethees; enta bessan harata shuumees.
JOB 34:25 I enta oosuwa eriya gisho, enta issi qamman maatape wothidi dhaysees.
JOB 34:26 Enta iitatethaa gisho, nagaranchota asa sinthan seerees.
JOB 34:27 Hessa I oothey, enti iya kaallonna ixida gishonne iya kiitaa aggida gishosa.
JOB 34:28 Enti manqota un7ethidi Xoossako waassana mela oothidosona; Xoossay manqota waasuwa si7is.
JOB 34:29 Xoossay si77i giiko iya oone mootanay? I ba som7uwa qosiko iya be7anay oonee? I asaapenne kawotethaafe bolla.
JOB 34:30 Hessi haniday geellay deriya haaronna melanne enta sinthan xihe wothonna melasa.
JOB 34:31 “Asi Xoossako yaagiyako Lo77o; kase ta nagara oothidaba gidiko zaarada oothike.
JOB 34:32 Ta be7onnaysa tana tamaarsa; nagara oothidaba gidiko zaarada oothike.
JOB 34:33 Yaatin neeni paaxike gashe, ne doseysa mela Xoossay new woytaneyee? Hiza qofa qachanay nenape attishin, tana gidike; hessa gisho, ne ereysa taw oda.
JOB 34:34 Akeeka asay haysada yaagosona; cincati yaagosona;
JOB 34:35 ‘Iyyobi eri bayna odetees; Iya odan ayfey baawa.’
JOB 34:36 Iyyobi iita asada zaaro immida gisho, wursethi gakanaw paacetida gideerenne!
JOB 34:37 I ba nagaraa bolla geellatethi gujis; nu sinthan Xoossaa bolla qelqisis; Xoossa bolla daro odetis” yaagis.
JOB 35:1 Elihuy qassi haysada yaagis;
JOB 35:2 “Iyyoba, neeni, ‘Taani Xoossaa sinthan xillo’ geysi likee?
JOB 35:3 ‘Taani nagaraa oothonna aggada ay go7etiyana? ay wodhe demmanee?’ yaagada ne Xoossaa oychanaw danda7aasa.
JOB 35:4 Taani newunne ne laggetas zaaro immana.
JOB 35:5 Dhoqu gada salota xeella; neepe bollara de7iya shaara akeekada be7a.
JOB 35:6 Ne nagara oothiko Xoossaa aybin qohanee? Ne balay dariko hessi iyaw ay oothii?
JOB 35:7 Ne xillo gidiko iyaw ay immanee? Woyko ne kushepe I ay ekanee?
JOB 35:8 Ne nagaraa oothiko ne mela ase qohaasa; qassi xillikoka ase go77aasa.
JOB 35:9 “Un77i dariya wode asay waassees; wolqaamata kushepe kessi ekiya asi koyidi wobbatoosona.
JOB 35:10 Shin oonika, ‘Qamma mazmure immiya, tana medhida Xoossay awun de7ii?
JOB 35:11 Do7atape aathidi tamaarseysi, kafotape aathidi cinca ootheysi awun de7i’ yaagenna.
JOB 35:12 Enti waassoosona; shin Xoossay enta otoruwa gaason, entaw zaaro immenna.
JOB 35:13 Coo waasuwa Xoossi tuma si7enna; Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossay hessa hayzenna.
JOB 35:14 Neeni ta Xoossaa be7anaw danda7ike yaagikoka, ne mootoy iya sinthan de7iya gisho, ne iya danda7an naaganaw bessees.
JOB 35:15 Xoossay ase pirdonnabaanne nagara aggidi aadhana gada qopay?
JOB 35:16 Hessa gisho, neeni ne doona coo dooyasa; eri bayna haasaya darsaasa” yaagis.
JOB 36:1 Elihuy gujidi haysada yaagis;
JOB 36:2 “Xoossaa doona gidada ta new odiyabay de7iya gisho, guuthu danda7ada si7a.
JOB 36:3 Taani ta eraa haaho soope ehana; tana Medhidaysi xillo gideysa qoncisana.
JOB 36:4 Taani wordo haasayike; kumetha eri de7iya asi neera de7eysa ammana.
JOB 36:5 “Xoossay tuma wolqaama; shin I oonaka kadhenna. I ba akeekan mino.
JOB 36:6 I iitati de7on daana mela oothenna; shin un7etidaysatas suure pirdees.
JOB 36:7 Xoossay ba ayfiya xillota bollafe denthenna; enta kawotara utisidi, merinaw dhoqu dhoqu oothees.
JOB 36:8 Shin asay santhalaatan qashetiko, woyko meto wodoron oyketiko,
JOB 36:9 I enta oosuwanne otoron oothida nagaraa enta bolla qoncisees.
JOB 36:10 Seera si7anaada enta haytha dooyees; nagarape simmana mela enta kiittees.
JOB 36:11 Enti si7idi iyaw kiitetiko, banta laytha saroninne ufaysan wursana.
JOB 36:12 Shin enti si7onna ixiko mashshan wurana; enti era dhayida gisho hayqana.
JOB 36:13 “Xoossaa ammanonna asati banta wozanan yilotida mela de7oosona; I enta pirdiya wode maade koyidi woossokona.
JOB 36:14 Enti oothiya tuna oosuwan dhayana; banta na7atethan hayqana.
JOB 36:15 Shin waayeteyisata enta waayiyape ashshees; enta metuwa baggara entaw odees.
JOB 36:16 “Xoossay nena meto wodorope, un7i bayna dalga bessi, dooretida kathi kumida gaytaako kessana.
JOB 36:17 Shin ha77i iitata bolla gakiya pirday ne bolla gakin; xillo pirdan oyketadasa.
JOB 36:18 Oonika nena duretethi bessidi cimmonna mela, wodhaafe daroy balethonna mela naageta.
JOB 36:19 Ne duretethay woyko ne dafetethay nena metope ashshanee?
JOB 36:20 Asay banta bessaafe dhayiya qammay, yaana mela amottofa.
JOB 36:21 Ha meto ubbay nena gakiday hessa gaasona; hessa gisho, iita oothonna mela naageta.
JOB 36:22 “Xoossay ba wolqan dhoqu dhoqu gis; iya mela astamaarey oonee?
JOB 36:23 Xoossaa, ‘Haysa ootha’ gidi kiittey, woyko, ‘Neeni iita ooso oothadasa’ yaaganaw danda7ey oonee?
JOB 36:24 Asay mazmuren sabbida iya oosuwa, neka mazmuren sabba.
JOB 36:25 Asa koche ubbay Xoossaa oosuwa be7is; asay haahon eqidi xeellidosona.
JOB 36:26 Xoossay gita! Iya gitatetha nu akeekanaw danda7oko; iya laytha darotethaas zawi baawa.
JOB 36:27 “Xoossay haathe abbafe pude salo efees; duge zaaridi ira oothidi bukisees.
JOB 36:28 He iray shaarape keyidi, asa bolla bukana mela oothees.
JOB 36:29 Xoossi shaara waatidi micciyako, Xoossay de7iya saluwan waanidi guummiyako, oonika erenna.
JOB 36:30 I ba yuushon wol7antha poo7uwa laallees; abba ciimmuwa waatidi kammiyako be7a.
JOB 36:31 Yaatidi Xoossay deriya aysees; kathaa darsidi immees.
JOB 36:32 I wol7anthi ba kushen oykees; ba mallida bessaa caddana mela kiittees.
JOB 36:33 Dadi dhuuqidi uushoy yaanaysa bessees; meheyka uushoy yaanaysa erees.
JOB 37:1 “Iya uushuwan ta wozanay dirgees; ba bessan qaaxees.
JOB 37:2 Iya doonape keyiya qaala si7ite; dadada guummiya iya girsaa hayzite.
JOB 37:3 I salo garsan ba wol7antha laallees; biitta gaxape gaxa gakanaw kiittees.
JOB 37:4 Hessafe guye, iya guunthay si7etees; ba yashshiya girsaa sissees. Iya girsay si7etiya wode, ba wol7antha teqenna.
JOB 37:5 Xoossaa malaalsiya ogen ba guuntha sissees; nuuni akeekanaw danda7onna gitaba I oothees.
JOB 37:6 I shachako, ‘Sa7an wodha’ yaagees; wolqaama iraako, ‘Buka’ yaagidi kiittees.
JOB 37:7 I medhida asa ubbay iya oosuwa erana mela, asay banta oosuwa aggana mela oothees.
JOB 37:8 He wode do7ati banta bessaa geloosona; banta gongoluwan qosetoosona.
JOB 37:9 Wolqaama gotey dugehape dendees; irxa carkoy pudehape yees.
JOB 37:10 Xoossaa de7o shempoy shachi medhees; dalga haathata shuchada minthees.
JOB 37:11 Shaari haathe tookana mela oothees; ba wol7antha shaara giddon laallees.
JOB 37:12 Shaarati iya kiitan biitta gaxaa yuuyosona; I kiittiya kiita ubbaa poloosona.
JOB 37:13 Xoossay ira bukisey biitta irxisanaasa, woyko asaa seeranaasa, woyko ba siiquwa bessanaasa.
JOB 37:14 “Iyyoba, hessa si7a; Xoossay oothiya malaalsiya oosuwa taki gada akeeka.
JOB 37:15 Xoossay shaarata waatidi kiittiyako, ba wol7antha waatidi wol7amisiyako eray?
JOB 37:16 Shaarati salon waanidi uttiyako, eran polo gidida Xoossay oothiya malaalsiya oosuwa neeni eray?
JOB 37:17 Dugeha carkoy carkidi biitta mishisiya wode, neeni wolqaama bazzo seelan til7ana.
JOB 37:18 Xoossay saluwa til7ida mastooteda micciya wode, neeni iya maaddanaw danda7ay?
JOB 37:19 Nuuni era paca gidiya gisho, Xoossas woygidi odetaneko ne nuna tamaarsa.
JOB 37:20 Xoossara odetana gada taani oychanaw koshshii? tana dhaysana mela ta ayis iya denthethanee?
JOB 37:21 Carkoy salope shaara geeshshiya wode, salon phooliya awa oonika be7anaw danda7enna.
JOB 37:22 Pudeha baggara worqaa daaniya poo7oy bentees; Xoossay yashshiya teeman qoncees.
JOB 37:23 Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaako shiiqanaw danda7oko; iya wolqay gita. I ba tuma pirdaaninne ba gita xillotethan ase qohenna.
JOB 37:24 Hessa gisho, asay iyaw yayyees; bantana cinca geyisata I kadhees” yaagis.
JOB 38:1 Hessafe guye, Goday gote giddon gididi Iyyobas haysada yaagidi zaaris.
JOB 38:2 Eri bayna odan ta zoriya dhumisey I hessi oonee?
JOB 38:3 Ane addeda danceta; ta nena oychana, taw zaara.
JOB 38:4 Taani alamiya medhiya wode neeni awun de7ay? Ane ne akeekiyako taw oda.
JOB 38:5 Ne eriko, ha sa7aa dalgatethaas zawa wothiday oonee? Wadha wodoruwa sa7a bolla yeggiday oonee?
JOB 38:6 Ha sa7aa tuussata kundonna mela minthidi oykiday aybee? Ha sa7aa baasuwas koyro shuchaa wothiday oonee?
JOB 38:7 Wonta bakalati issife yexiya wode, kiitanchoti ubbay ufaysan ilili giya wode ne eray?
JOB 38:8 Abba haathi biittafe dhuuqidi keyiya wode, iya pengeta gordiday oonee?
JOB 38:9 Abbaa shaara mayzas; sakana dhuman gooziday tana.
JOB 38:10 Abbay kanthonna mela zawa medhiday, iyaw pengenne teqe wothiday tana.
JOB 38:11 “Haysa gakanaw ya; shin haysafe aadhofa; ne wolqaama hobbey hessan eqo” yaagiday tana.
JOB 38:12 Iyyoba, ne yeletoosope wonti wontana mela kiita eray, away dolana bessaa malla eray?
JOB 38:13 Wonta poo7oy biitta ubban poo7ana mela, iita asata qosetida bessaafe qonce kessana mela, neeni wonta kiitta eray?
JOB 38:14 Wonta poo7oy zumatanne zangaarata, dakoydi wothida ma7oy eqidi benteysada bessees; oto bolla wothida maatameda qoncees.
JOB 38:15 Iitata poo7oy eketana; enta makalla qesey meqana.
JOB 38:16 Ciimmo abba giddo gelada pultuwa be7adii? Woyko iya baasuwa gakada iya olla simeretadii?
JOB 38:17 New hayqo pengeti bentidona? Woyko sakana dhumaa pengeta be7adii?
JOB 38:18 Sa7ay ay mela giteeko ne eray? Hessa ubbaa ne eriya gidiko taw oda.
JOB 38:19 Poo7oko efiya ogey awunee? dhumi awun de7iyako eray?
JOB 38:20 Poo7onne dhuma enta bessaa bessaa efanaw danda7ay? Enti de7iya bessaa efiya ogiya eray?
JOB 38:21 Neeni sa7i medhetiya wode yeletida gishonne daro laythi de7ida gisho hessa eronna aggaka!
JOB 38:22 Shachi minjetiya keethaa geladii? woyko shachi dooretida bessaa be7adii?
JOB 38:23 Taani enta meto wodes, ola wodesinne toora gallasas minja wothas.
JOB 38:24 Wol7anthi keya bessaa efiya ogey awun de7ii? Woyko doloha carkoy awupe keyidi carkii?
JOB 38:25 Iri wodhiya bessaa giigisiday, dadas oge kessiday oonee?
JOB 38:26 Asi doonna mela biittan ira bukisey oonee?
JOB 38:27 Melida mela biittay iran laakidi, purco maatay dolana mela oothiday oonee?
JOB 38:28 Iras aawi de7ii? Woyko aka yeliday oonee?
JOB 38:29 Shachas aayiya de7ay?
JOB 38:30 Haathay shuchada minthees; abba baasoy shachada uuketees.
JOB 38:31 Pilaadisa geetetiya xoolintota issife gathada qachanaw danda7ay? Ooriyoona geetetiya xoolintoti qashetida wodoruwa billanaw danda7ay?
JOB 38:32 Cugan cugan de7iya xoolintota enta woden woden kessanaw danda7ay? Biire geetetiya xoolintota enta naytara kaalethanaw danda7ay?
JOB 38:33 Saloti ay higgen aqiyako ne eray? He higgey sa7aa haarana mela oothanaw danda7ay?
JOB 38:34 Di7oy nena muukana mela ira bukisanaw, ne qaala dhoqu oothada shaarata sissanaw danda7ay?
JOB 38:35 Wol7anthi kiittanaw danda7ay? Enti neeko yidi, “Heko, ay oothino?” goonna?
JOB 38:36 Wozanas cincatethi, kahas akeeka immiday oonee?
JOB 38:37 Ba cincatethan shaarata taybanaw danda7ey oonee? Baana munuqidi, urqa kessidi minthanaw, salo otota gedi oothidi haathe tiganaw danda7ey oonee?
JOB 38:39 Shankatada macca gaammos miyaba eha eray? koshatida gaammo marata muza eray?
JOB 38:40 Enti gongolon qoseti naagoosona; bazzon zin7idi pee7osona.
JOB 38:41 Quuroti koshatidi daaburiya wode, enta nayti miyaba demmanaw taako waassiya wode, entaw miyaba immey oonee?
JOB 39:1 “Woshi7ey awude yeliyako neeni eray? Baachoti bannakidi banta marata yeliya wode be7adii?
JOB 39:2 Enti ay mela ageena gam7iyako, awude yeliyako ne eray?
JOB 39:3 Enti gulbati eqetidi, banta marata yeley awudeko eray?
JOB 39:4 Enta marati bazzon diccidi minnoosona; banta aayeta aggidi boosona; nam7antho guye simmokona.
JOB 39:5 “Wora hareti yeda daanada oothiday oonee? Qashope enta birshidi yeddiday oonee?
JOB 39:6 Entaw bazzuwa de7iya bessi oothada immas; maxine biittan enti daanada oothas.
JOB 39:7 Katama waasuwape haakidi de7oosona; laaggeysta qodethi si7okona.
JOB 39:8 Enti dereta bolla bantana heemmoosona; yan miya purco maata qoroosona.
JOB 39:9 “Menthi new oothanaw ero gandee? Woyko ne zadalon qamma aqandee?
JOB 39:10 Goyana mela ne iya waaxanee? Woyko waaxada goyanaw danda7ay?
JOB 39:11 Neeni iya wolqaa minotethan ammanetanee? deexo ooso I oothana mela iyaw yegga agganee?
JOB 39:12 Neeni kathaa shaalen qolana mela, woyko wudumman shiishana mela iya ammanay?
JOB 39:13 “Yanchoy ba qefiya ellesada qaathawusu; shin haatha kafoda piradhanaw danda7uku.
JOB 39:14 Yanchoy ba phuuphulliya biittan phuuphulawusu; shafen ho7ana mela aggaagawusu.
JOB 39:15 ‘Tohoy menthana, bazzo do7ati yedhana’ gada qopuku.
JOB 39:16 Nayti babaa gidonnaada oothada entaw daro iitawusu. I daabura ubbay mela atteysi iw aykoka daanenna.
JOB 39:17 Hessada oothada iyo cincatethi diggidaynne akeeka dhaysiday tana.
JOB 39:18 Shin dendada iya woxiya wode, baara gaadetiya para bollanne paraawa bolla miiccawusu.
JOB 39:19 “Iyyoba, paratas wolqaa immiday, woyko parata morgen cimba mayziday nenee?
JOB 39:20 Parati booleda gupanaadanne garmamidi daganthanaada oothiday nenee?
JOB 39:21 Parati banta wolqan ammanetidi dhiskoosona; oletanaw ola demba gaallaboosona.
JOB 39:22 Yashshi erokona; enta aybika daganthenna; enta bolla mashsha shoddikoka guye simmokona.
JOB 39:23 Enta toggiya olanchoti oykida ola miisheti, phoolishe issoy issuwara gahetidi giiroosona.
JOB 39:24 Shin parati biitta kaashishenne yashisishe gaallaboosona; Moyze girsi si7iya wode si77i gidi eqanaw danda7okona.
JOB 39:25 Moyzey punetiya wode ufaysan garmamoosona; ola peeno haahon ekoosona; toora mocona kiitaanne olanchota ceequwa si7oosona.
JOB 39:26 “Xiloy ba qefiya dugeha bagga miccidi, paallanaw danda7ey ne cincatethanee?
JOB 39:27 Arganthi pude keyidi, ba keethaa dhoqa dereta bolla keexey ne kiitanee?
JOB 39:28 Arganthi aafo doonan ba keethaa keexidi de7ees; zaalla qophoti iyaw qol7a gididosona.
JOB 39:29 Yan uttidi baw miyaba wochees; iya ayfey haahon geeshshidi demmees.
JOB 39:30 Argantha nayti suuthi uyoosona; gawuxi de7iya bessan shiiqoosona” yaagis.
JOB 40:1 Goday Iyyobako zaaridi yaagis;
JOB 40:2 “Iyyoba, asi Ubbaa Danda7iya Godaara mootetidi, lathanaw danda7ii? Ane Xoossara mootetiya uray iyaw zaaro” yaagis.
JOB 40:3 Hessafe guye, Iyyobi zaaridi, haysada yaagis;
JOB 40:4 “Godaw, taani pathonna laafa asi; ta doona bolla kushe wothada si77i gaanape attishin, new ay zaaro immanaw danda7iyana?
JOB 40:5 Taani issi toho odas; shin taw zaariyabay baawa; nam7antho odas haraa gujike” yaagis.
JOB 40:6 Hessafe guye, Goday gote giddon giddon gididi Iyyobako haysada yaagis.
JOB 40:7 Addeda ne xeessaa dancada dendada, ta oyshaas zaaro imma.
JOB 40:8 Ne tana bala asi kessana hanayee? New xillo gidanaw tana wordancho kessayee?
JOB 40:9 Xoossa wolqaa mela wolqi new de7ii? Xoossay guummeysada ne guummanaw danda7ay?
JOB 40:10 Hessa gidiko, ne bonchuwanne gitatetha ma7a; ne wolqaanne teemuwa gixa.
JOB 40:11 Ne hanquwa gussa; ane otoranchota xeellada kawusha.
JOB 40:12 Ane loytha xeellada otortiya ubbaa yeellaya; iitata ubbaa enti de7iya bessaafe dhaysa.
JOB 40:13 Enta ubbaa biittan mooga; duufon yeggada enta bolla gorda.
JOB 40:14 He wode ne wolqay nena ashshanaw danda7eysa ta markatana.
JOB 40:15 Taani nena medhidaada medhida Bihemoota geetetiya do7a be7a; I boorada maata mees.
JOB 40:16 Iya xeessan de7iya wolqaynne iya uluwa kammida shayaa minotethay daro.
JOB 40:17 Iya goynay zigada bollan qaaxees; iya gedaa xaphoti minon dooqetidosona.
JOB 40:18 Iya meqethay naase birata mela; iya geday birata kure mela.
JOB 40:19 Xoossay medhida medheta ubbaa garsan I aadhees; taape attishin, hari iya xoonanaw danda7ey baawa.
JOB 40:20 Do7i gupiya derey, iyaw miyaba dolisees.
JOB 40:21 Mitha kuya garsan zin7ees; caren maqa giddon qosetees.
JOB 40:22 Mithati banta kuyan iya genthoosona; shaafa gaxan dicciya mithati iya kammoosona.
JOB 40:23 Shaafay kixidi goggey wode dagammenna; Yordaanose shaafay qoodhe gakanaw kumikoka I hirgenna.
JOB 40:24 Iya ayfiya toysidi, iya oykanaw danda7iya asi de7ii? Iya siidhiya lukidi oykanaw danda7ey oonee?
JOB 41:1 “Neeni Leewataane geetetiya abba do7aa manxaqon oykanaw, woyko iya inxarsaa wodoron ancafanaw danda7ay?
JOB 41:2 Iya siidhiya lukada dafo aathanaw danda7ay? Woyko iya gacuwa wospen lukanaw danda7ay?
JOB 41:3 I nena, ‘Hayyana tana aggarki’ yaagidi woossii? Woyko new mal7o qaala odii?
JOB 41:4 Ne iya merinaw aylle oothada haarana mela, I new ero gidi caaqanee?
JOB 41:5 Asi kafo loohiseysada ne iya loohisanaw danda7ay? Woyko iya qachada ne macca naytara kaa7ana mela oothanee?
JOB 41:6 Molo zal7anchoti iya gatiya bolla palamona? Woyko iya qanxerethidi bayzoona?
JOB 41:7 Neeni iya galbaa tooran, woyko iya huuphiya mashshan caddanaw danda7ay?
JOB 41:8 Ane iya ne kushen bocha; ne iyara butetida butiya dogaka; nam7antho iyara butetanaw qopaka.
JOB 41:9 He do7aa oykanaw paacey mela waaye; hari attoshin iya be7ida ubbay yashshan kokorees.
JOB 41:10 I zin7ida bessaafe iya denthanaw oonika xaalenna; yaatin, ta sinthan eqanaw danda7ey oonee?
JOB 41:11 Taani iyaw zaarana mela koyro taw tal7iday oonee? Salope garsan de7iyaba ubbay tabaa.
JOB 41:12 “Taani Leewataane tohotaba, iya gita wolqaabanne lo77iya iya asatethaba qoncisonna aggike.
JOB 41:13 Iya galbaa qaaranaw danda7ey oonee? Iya gacuwa pooqidi bixaala barsanay oonee?
JOB 41:14 Yashshiya achay de7iya iya gacuwa pooqanaw danda7ey oonee?
JOB 41:15 Iya zoko galbay issoy issuwa bolla dooretidi; shuchada minnida gondalle daanees.
JOB 41:16 Enti issoy issuwas daro matatida gisho, enta giddora hari attoshin carkoy kanthanaw danda7enna.
JOB 41:17 Issoy issuwara gahetidi de7iya gisho, enta aybika shaakenna.
JOB 41:18 I hadhishiya wode poo7oy pol7u gees; iya ayfeti wonta xalqeda caddees.
JOB 41:19 Iya doonape tama lacoy keyees; pinxiya tami bentees.
JOB 41:20 Iya siidhiyape cuyay, tama bolla de7iya otope keya pento mela.
JOB 41:21 Iya siidhera keya shempoy kenchikelo bonqisees; tama lacoy iya doonape keyees.
JOB 41:22 Iya morgiyan wolqay de7iya gisho, I daro yashshees.
JOB 41:23 Iya ashoy issife oyketidi de7iya gisho, iya asatethay biratada minnees.
JOB 41:24 Iya wozanay shuchada mino; gaacha woxa mela mino.
JOB 41:25 I dendiya wode minoti yayyoosona; dagammidi baqatoosona.
JOB 41:26 Iya gakiya mashshay aykoka oothenna; toori woyko dongey woyko mashshi iya qohenna.
JOB 41:27 I birata xinqa maatada, naase birata wooqida mithada mentherethees.
JOB 41:28 Dongey iya betisenna; yambarsha shuchi iyaw suulla mela.
JOB 41:29 Gumba xam7i iyaw xinqo mela; toora xongiya wode qelqisidi miicees.
JOB 41:30 Iya uluwa bolla de7iya galbay meqida kun7a mela qara; urqara I biya wode marasha mela biitta phalqees.
JOB 41:31 Abbaa pentida haatha mela tumbul tumbul oothees; xaaron pentiya zayte mela shiri shiri yeggees.
JOB 41:32 Iya biya ogey poo7ees; abba haatha goponto laammees.
JOB 41:33 I yashshi eronna gisho, biitta bolla iya mela medhetethi hari baawa.
JOB 41:34 I daro gita medhetethata ubbaa kadhees; do7a ubbaas I kawo” yaagis.
JOB 42:1 Hessafe guye, Iyyobi Godaako haysada yaagidi zaaris;
JOB 42:2 “Ne ubbaba oothanaw danda7eysanne ne qofaa teqanaw danda7ey baynaysa taani eras.
JOB 42:3 Ne, ‘Eri bayna ta zoriya qosey oonee?’ yaagada tana oychadasa; tuma taani taw geliboonnaba, ta eraape bolla gidida malaalsiyaba odetas.
JOB 42:4 “Neeni taako, ‘Taani odiya wode hayza; taani oychiya wode zaara’ yaagadasa.
JOB 42:5 Taani kase nebaa haythan si7as; shin ha77i ta nena ayfen be7as.
JOB 42:6 Hessa gisho, ta odan yellatada, bido bollanne baana bolla uttada paaxayis” yaagis.
JOB 42:7 Goday hessa Iyyobas odidaape guye, Temaanape yida Elfaazako haysada yaagis. “Ta aylliya Iyyobada hinte tabaa like odetiboonna gisho, ne bollanne ne nam7u laggeta bolla ta hanqoy eexis.
JOB 42:8 Hessa gisho, ha77i laapun kormatanne laapun marazeta ekidi ta aylliya Iyyobako bidi, xuussa yarsho hinte balas yarshite. Ta aylliya Iyyobi hintew woossana; taani iya woosa si7ada hinte hanuwa mela hintena seerike. Hinte ta aylliya Iyyobada tabaa like odibeketa” yaagis.
JOB 42:9 Hessafe guye, Temaanape yida Elfaazi, Shuuhape yida Beldadoosinne Na7imape yida Soofari bidi, Goday enta kiittidaysada oothidosona. Goday Iyyoba woosa s7is.
JOB 42:10 Iyyobi ba laggetas woossidaape guye, Goday iya zaaridi dureyis; iyaw kaseysa gisho nam7u kushe immis.
JOB 42:11 Hessafe guye, iya ishati, iya michetinne kase iya ereysati ubbay iyako yidi, iya son iyara gibira midosona. Iyaw azzanidosona; Goday iya bolla ehida meto ubban iya minthethidosona; qassi iyaw biranne worqa sagaayo immidosona.
JOB 42:12 Goday Iyyoba wursetha laytha koyro laythaafe aathidi anjis. Iyyobas tammanne oyddu mukulu dorsati, usupun mukulu gimaleti, issi mukulu waaxa booratinne issi mukulu macca hareti de7oosona.
JOB 42:13 Qassi iyaw laapun adde naytinne heedzu macca nayti yeletidosona.
JOB 42:14 Bayra macca na7iw Yimimo, nam7anthiw Qaxi7o, heedzanthiw Qerenhafuko yaagidi sunthis.
JOB 42:15 Iyyoba macca naytada mala lo77o macca na7i awu biittan bentibeenna. Enta aawa entaw enta ishatara laata biitta immis.
JOB 42:16 Hessafe simmin, Iyyobi xeetanne oytamu laythi de7is. Ba naytanne ba nayta nayta oyddantho yeletethaa gakanaw be7is.
JOB 42:17 Iyyobi daro wode de7idi, lo77o cima cimidi hayqis.
PSA 1:1 Iitata zoriyan boonnay, nagaranchota ogen eqonnay, qelqiseyisata shiiqon uttonnay, I anjetidaysa.
PSA 1:2 Shin I Godaa higgiyan ufaytees; iya higgiya gallasinne qamma qopees.
PSA 1:3 I goggiya haatha xaphon toketidi, woden woden ayfe immiya, iya haythay qolettonna mitha mela. I oothiya ubbay iyaw poletees.
PSA 1:4 Shin iitati hessa mela gidokona; carkoy pitidi efiya suulla mela.
PSA 1:5 Iitati xillo pirda bessan eqokona; nagaranchoti xillota duulatan bentokona.
PSA 1:6 Goday xillota ogiya erees; shin iitata ogey dhayana.
PSA 2:1 Kawotethati ayis dendoona? asay ayis coo maqetoona?
PSA 2:2 Kawoti Godaa bollanne I tiyidaysa bolla dendidosona; deriya haareysati enta bolla shiiqidosona.
PSA 2:3 “Enta santhalaata duuthoos; enta qasho wodoruwa holoos” yaagidosona.
PSA 2:4 Salon uttidaysi enta bolla miicees; Goday enta qelqisees.
PSA 2:5 I ba hanquwan enta daganthees; ba yiluwan enta yashisees.
PSA 2:6 “Ta geeshsha zuma Xiyoone bolla ta kawa kawothas” yaagees goday.
PSA 2:7 Taani Godaa higgiya awaajana; Goday tana, “Neeni ta na7aa; taani hachi new aawa gidas.
PSA 2:8 Ne tana oycha; ta new kawotethata immana; sa7a ubbay nebaa gidana.
PSA 2:9 Neeni birata xam7an enta menthana; meqa miisheda enta tincherethana” yaagis.
PSA 2:10 Hiza, kawoto eeyopite; ha sa7aa haareysato akeekite.
PSA 2:11 Godaa yashshan goyinnite; kokoridi kiitetite.
PSA 2:12 Goday hanqetin ogen hinte dhayonnaada iya tumatethan goyinnite. Iya hanqoy eeson eexi keyana; iyan qosetidi attida ubbay anjetidaysata.
PSA 3:1 Dawiti ba na7a Abeseloomepe baqatida wode xaafida mazmure Abeeti Godaw, ta morketi ay mela daridona! Ta bolla dendeysati aapune!
PSA 3:2 Daroti, “Xoossay iya ashshena” yaagidi, tabaa haasayoosona. Salah
PSA 3:3 Shin abeeti Godaw, ne taw gondalle; ta bonchoynne tana dhoqu oothey nena.
PSA 3:4 Ta qaala dhoqu oothada Godaako waassayis. I ba geeshsha zumaape taw zaarees. Salah
PSA 3:5 Goday tana naagiya gisho, ta zin7asinne dhiskas hirgi bayna barkas.
PSA 3:6 Ubba bessara ta bolla dendida, daro mukulu asaas yayyike.
PSA 3:7 Abeeti Godaw, denda! Abeeti ta Xoossaw tana ashsha! Ta morketa gacuwa shoca; iitata acha mentha.
PSA 3:8 Xoonoy Godaasa; Godaw, neeni ne asaa anja. Salah
PSA 4:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure Diithan yexetiya mazmure Abeeti tana xillisiya Xoossaw, taani nena xeegiya wode taw koya. Taani un7etida wode ne tana la77a kessadasa; taw qadheta; ta woosa si7a.
PSA 4:2 Hinteno asaw, hinte awude gakanaw ta bonchuwa kawushsheetii? Awude gakanaw pathonnaba doseetii? Awude gakanaw wordo kaalleetii? Salah
PSA 4:3 Goday ammanetiya asata baw dummayidi wothidaysa erite; taani Godaa xeegiya wode I tana si7ees.
PSA 4:4 Hanqetite, shin nagara oothopite; hinte zin7iya wode hinte wozanaa qorite; si77i giite. Salah
PSA 4:5 Godaas like yarsho yarshite; iyan ammanetite.
PSA 4:6 “Nuna lo77oba bessanay oonee?” yaagidi daroti oychoosona; Abeeti Godaw, ne nuna keeha ayfen xeella.
PSA 4:7 Daro gistefenne woyne ushshafe ne ta wozanan wothida gita ufaysay aadhees.
PSA 4:8 Abeeti Godaw, ne xalaali tana saro wothiya gisho, taani zin7ada wopu gada dhiskayis.
PSA 5:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure Suusul7en yexetiya mazmure. Abeeti Godaw, ta qaala si7a; ta ooliya qopa.
PSA 5:2 Ta kawaw, ta Xoossaw ta waasuwa si7a; ta maade koyada woossiya woosaa hayza.
PSA 5:3 Abeeti Godaw, wonta wonta ta qaala si7aasa. Wonta wonta ta woosa ne sinthe shiishayis; ta ne zaaruwa naagayis.
PSA 5:4 Neeni iitatethan ufaytonna Xoosse; iitabay neera deenna.
PSA 5:5 Otoranchoti ne sinthan eqokona; iitabaa oothiya ubbaa ne ixaasa.
PSA 5:6 Wordo odeteyisata ne dhaysaasa; Goday suuthu gusseysatanne cimmeyisata ixees.
PSA 5:7 Shin ta ne gita maarotethan ne keethaa gelana; ne geeshsha bessaako simmada nena bonchon goyinnana.
PSA 5:8 Abeeti Godaw, ta morketa gisho gada, tana ne xillotethan kaaletha; ne ogiya ta sinthan suurisa.
PSA 5:9 Enta mettershan tumi baawa; enta wozanan dhaysoy kumis. Enta doonay dooyetida duufo mela; enti banta inxarsan cimmoosona.
PSA 5:10 Enti ne bolla makallida gisho, abeeti Xoossaw, enta pirda; Enta tobbay enta ekidi boo; enta daro nagaraa gisho enta yedetha.
PSA 5:11 Shin neeko baqatidi attida ubbay ufayto; enti merinaw ufaysan yexo. Ne sunthaa dosiya ubbay nenan ufaytana mela; neeni enta merinaw naaga.
PSA 5:12 Abeeti Godaw, neeni xillota anjaasa; gondallen ashsheysada ne keehatethan iya ashsha.
PSA 6:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure Hospun shayan yexetiya mazmure Abeeti Godaw, ne yiluwan tana seeropa; ne sheniyan tana hanqofa.
PSA 6:2 Abeeti Godaw, taani daaburancho gidida gisho tana maara; abeeti Godaw, ta wozanay argaacida gisho tana mintha.
PSA 6:3 Ta shempiya daro un7etasu; tana maaddanaw awude gakanaw gam7ay?
PSA 6:4 Abeeti Godaw, neeni simmada tana ashsha; ne keehatetha daruwan tana kessa eka.
PSA 6:5 Hayqida asaa giddofe nena hassayey baawa; duufon gididi nena galatey oonee?
PSA 6:6 Taani oolen daaburas; qamma kumethi yeekashe ta hiixa irxisas; ta arsa afuthan wooqisas.
PSA 6:7 Ta morketa gaason ta ayfey mulcatis; taani afuxida gisho demmonna ixis.
PSA 6:8 Goday ta yeehuwa si7ida gisho, hinteno, iita ootheysato taape haakite.
PSA 6:9 Goday ta waasuwa si7is; ta woosa ekis.
PSA 6:10 Ta morketi ubbay yeellatidosona; dagammidosona; qoponna guye simmidi kawuyidosona.
PSA 7:1 Biniyaame kocha Kuuzaba Dawiti Godaas yexida mazmure. Abeeti Godaw ta Xoossaw, ta nenan qosetayis; tana yedethiya ubbaafe tana ashsha.
PSA 7:2 Neeni tana ashshonaba gidiyako, enti tana gaammoda zaazana; ashshiya asi bayna mentherethanashin.
PSA 7:3 Abeeti Godaw ta Xoossaw, ta haysa melaba oothidaba gidiko, taani ase naaqidaba gidiko,
PSA 7:4 ta laggetas lo77o gisho iitaa zaaridaba gidiko, gaasoy bayna ta morkiya bonqidaba gidiko,
PSA 7:5 ta morkey tana yedethidi oyko; tana sa7an yeggidi yedho; tana baanan gondorsidi kawusho. Salah
PSA 7:6 Abeeti Godaw, ne hanquwan dendada, eexiya ta morketa hanquwa bolla eqa; ta Xoossaw, ta gisho barka; neeni xillo pirda koyaasa.
PSA 7:7 Asay ne yuushon shiiqo; neeni entafe bollara haara.
PSA 7:8 Goday kawotethata bolla pirdees; abeeti Godaw, ta xillotethaadanne ta suuretethaada pirda.
PSA 7:9 Qofanne wozanaa shaakada eriya xillo Xoossaw, iitata geella hanota neeni teqa; shin xilluwa saron naaga.
PSA 7:10 Wozana suureta ashshiya, Xoossay taw gondalle.
PSA 7:11 Xoossay xillo pirdeysa; I ubba wode iitata bolla hanqetiya Xoossaa.
PSA 7:12 Iitati banta iitatethaafe simmonna ixiko, Xoossay ba mashsha leefes; ba dongiya giigisees.
PSA 7:13 I ba wodhiya ola miisheta giigisees; laxiya ba donge toora pitees.
PSA 7:14 Iitati qoho qanthatidi, gene wodexidi, wordo yeloosona.
PSA 7:15 Hara asas olla bookida asi ba bookida ollan baw kundees.
PSA 7:16 Iya geney iya huuphen simmees. Iya geellatethay iya mees.
PSA 7:17 Iya xillotethaa gisho taani Godaa sabbana; Ubbaafe Dhoqa Godaa sunthaas taani galata mazmure yexana.
PSA 8:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure Suusul7en yexetiya mazmure. Abeeti Godaw nu Xoossaw, ne sunthay biitta ubban waanidi bonchetide! Neeni ne bonchuwa salope bollara dhoqu dhoqu oothadasa.
PSA 8:2 Neeni ne morketa gisho ne morkiyanne nena mandeysa si77i oothanaw, guutha nayta doonan dhammiya nayta doonan galata kunthadasa.
PSA 8:3 Neeni ne biradhen medhida ne salota, iya bessan bessan neeni wothida ageenanne xoolintota taani be7iya wode,
PSA 8:4 neeni asaba qopanaw asi aybee? Woyko neeni iya xomoosanaw I aybee?
PSA 8:5 Iya ne neepe guuthara guuthadasa; bonchonne gitatetha kallacha iya huuphen wothadasa.
PSA 8:6 Ne medhida medhetetha ubbaa, haarana mela ne iya shuumadasa; ubbaa iya tohuwape garsara wothadasa.
PSA 8:7 Dorsatanne meheta, wora do7ata ubbaa,
PSA 8:8 salo kafota, abba molotanne haatha garsan qaaxiya ubbaa iyaw haarisadasa.
PSA 8:9 Abeeti Godaw nu Xoossaw, ne sunthay biitta ubban waanidi bonchetide!
PSA 9:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure “Na7a hayqon” geetetiya cuudhethan yexetiya mazmure. Abeeti Godaw, ta nena ta kumetha wozanaape galatana; neeni oothida malaalsiya ooso ubbaa odana.
PSA 9:2 Taani nenan ufaytana hashshu gaana. Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaw, taani ne sunthaas galata mazmure yexana.
PSA 9:3 Ta morketi guye simmiya wode, ne sinthafe dhubetidi dhayana.
PSA 9:4 Ne araatan uttada taw xillo pirdaasa; ta mootuwa ne xillotethan oykadasa.
PSA 9:5 Neeni kawotethata seeradasa; iitata dhaysadasa. Neeni enta sunthaa merinaw quchadasa.
PSA 9:6 Morketi merinaw dhayidosona; enta katamata kumethi laalladasa; enti kumethi dogetidosona.
PSA 9:7 Shin Goday merinaw kawotidi de7ees; I ba araata pirdas giigisis.
PSA 9:8 Ha sa7aa xillotethan pirdana; dereta suuretethan aysana.
PSA 9:9 Goday un7etidaysatas attiya bessi; meto wode gelidi attiya qota.
PSA 9:10 Nena ereysati nenan ammanetosona; Godaw, nena koyeyisata yegga aggaka.
PSA 9:11 Xiyoonen kawotida Godaa galatite; I oothida oosuwa asa ubbaas odite.
PSA 9:12 Halo keyiya Xoossay gukida xillo suuthaa dogenna; boretidaysata waasuwa qelli geenna.
PSA 9:13 Abeeti Godaw, taw qadheta; ta morketi ta bolla ehiya metuwa be7a; hayqope tana ashsha.
PSA 9:14 Xiyoone asaa giddon taani eqada, ne galataa odana; ne atotethan ufaytana.
PSA 9:15 Kawotethati banta bookida ollan bantaw kundidosona; enti wothida xihey enta tohuwa oykis.
PSA 9:16 Goday ba xillo pirdan eretis; iita asay banta iita oosuwan oyketidosona. Salah
PSA 9:17 Iitati duufo baana; Xoossaa dogiya kawotethati ubbay entada hanana.
PSA 9:18 Manqoy ubba wode dogetidi attenna; metootanchuwa ufaysay merinaw dhayenna.
PSA 9:19 Abeeti Godaw denda; asi xoonopo! Kawotethati ne sinthan pirdeto.
PSA 9:20 Abeeti Godaw enta neeni yashisa; kawotethati ase gideysa ero. Salaha.
PSA 10:1 Dawita Mazmure Abeeti Godaw, ayis haakada eqay? Meto wode ayis neeni geemmay?
PSA 10:2 Ba otoruwan iita asi manquwa yedethees; enti banta maquwan bantaw oyketidosona.
PSA 10:3 Iita asi ba iita amuwan ceeqetees; ba uuziyan Godaa cayeesinne kadhees.
PSA 10:4 Iitati banta otoruwan Xoossaa koyokona; banta qofan Xoossas besse immokona.
PSA 10:5 Iyaw ubba wode injetees; ne higgey iyaw gelenna; ba morketa I qelqisees.
PSA 10:6 Ba wozanan, “Tana aybika qaathenna tana metoy gakenna” yaagidi qopees.
PSA 10:7 Iya doonan baadethi, wordoynne mandethi kumis. Geneynne iitatethi iyan inxarsan de7ees.
PSA 10:8 Gutatan zugidi uttees; suure asata wodhanaw qosetidi naagees; wolqi bayna daaburanchota wochees.
PSA 10:9 Ba qosetida bessan geemmidi, manquwa oykanaw gaammoda zugees; iya oykidi ba xihiyan goochidi efees.
PSA 10:10 Wolqi bayna manquwa shocidi yeggees; iya tohuwa garsan I kundees.
PSA 10:11 I ba wozanan, “Xoossay dogis. Ba som7uwa genthidi be7enna” yaagees.
PSA 10:12 Abeeti Godaw, denda! Xoossaw, ne wolqaama kushiya dentha; manqota dogopa.
PSA 10:13 Iita asati Xoosse ayis kadhoona? Banta wozanan, “Xoossay nuna seerenna” ayis yaagona?
PSA 10:14 Shin Xoossaw, ne metuwanne un7aa be7aasa; neeni maaddanaw giiga uttadasa. Neeni yi7otas maade, qohetiday ne maaddana mela bana new aathidi immees.
PSA 10:15 Gene asata wolqaa mentha; iita asata seera; zaaridi enta giddon iitatethi bentofo.
PSA 10:16 Goday merinaw kawotidi de7ees; hara kawotethati iya biittafe dhayana.
PSA 10:17 Abeeti Godaw, neeni ashketa amuwa kunthaasa; enta minthetha; enta woosa si7a.
PSA 10:18 Yi7otanne un7etidaysata qohonna mela, sa7an de7iya oonika enta yashisonna mela, neeni entaw pirda.
PSA 11:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure. Goday taani qosetada attiya bessi; yaatin ayis “Kafoda zumako baqata” yaagetii?
PSA 11:2 Nagaranchoti xillota dhuman caddanaw, banta dongiya waaxidi uttidosona.
PSA 11:3 Baasoy woddida wode, xillo asi ay oothanaw danda7ii?
PSA 11:4 Goday ba geeshsha bessan de7ees; salon ba araatan uttidi asaa xeellees; Godaa ayfey asaa pilgees; wochees.
PSA 11:5 Goday xilluwanne worduwa pilgees; iitatethi doseyisata ixees.
PSA 11:6 Goday iitata bolla eexiya tama bonqonne diinne bukisana; dhaysiya goten enta seerana.
PSA 11:7 Goday xillo gidida gisho, xillotethi dosees; suure asati iya som7uwa be7ana.
PSA 12:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure. Xoossa asi biittafe wurida gisho, asa giddon ammanetethi bayna gisho, Godaw nuna maaddarkii?
PSA 12:2 Ubbay wordo haasayoosona; issoy issuwa cimmiya inxarsan nam7u wozanan odetoosona.
PSA 12:3 Abeeti Godaw, cimmiya doona gorda; otoron ceeqetiya inxarsaa teqa.
PSA 12:4 Enti, “Nu inxarsan nu xoonana; nu doonay nuusa; nuus godi oonee?” yaagosona.
PSA 12:5 “Manqota un7aa gishonne, metootanchota ooliya gisho, ha77i taani dendana; enti amotiya sarotethaa entaw immana” yaagees Goday.
PSA 12:6 Godaa qaalay geeshshi; taman laapun toho seerida birada geeshshi.
PSA 12:7 Abeeti Godaw neeni enta naaga; haysa mela asape merinaw enta ashsha.
PSA 12:8 Iiti asaa giddon bonchetiya wode, geella asati ceeqetishe simeretoosona.
PSA 13:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure. Abeeti Godaw awude gakanaw tana dogay? Awude gakanaw neeni taape geemmay?
PSA 13:2 Ta shempiya awude gakanaw un7etanee? Ta wozanay azzanon awude gakanaw daanee? Ta morkey ta bolla awude gakanaw goobanee?
PSA 13:3 Godaw ta Xoossaw, ha77i tana xeellada taw zaara. Ta ayfiya poo7isada, tana hayqope ashsha.
PSA 13:4 Ta morketi, “Nuuni iya xoonida”, yaagidi ceeqetonnaada teqa; ta kundethan enti ufaytonnaada digga.
PSA 13:5 Shin taani ne maarotethan ammanetayis; neeni tana ashshiya gisho ufaytayis.
PSA 13:6 Ne taw keehida gisho, Godaw, ta new yexana.
PSA 14:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure. Eeyati banta wozanan, “Xoossi baawa” yaagosona; enta de7oy iitis. Enti ixetidaba oothosona; lo77oba oothiya asi baawa.
PSA 14:2 Akeekeynne Xoosse koyey de7iyako be7anaw, Goday salope duge ase xeellees.
PSA 14:3 Shin ubbay zoko zaaridosona; ubbay go77onnaba gididosona. Lo77oba oothiya oonika baawa; hari attoshin issi asika baawa.
PSA 14:4 Asi kathi meysada, enti ta asaa bonqidi moosona; ha iita asati aybaka erokona; enti Xoossaa woossokona.
PSA 14:5 Shin Xoossay xillo asaara de7iya gisho, iita asati yashshan kokoroosona.
PSA 14:6 Hinte manqota qofaa laalleeta; shin Goday manqoti qosetidi attiya besse.
PSA 14:7 Isra7eeles atotethi Xiyoonepe yeerenne! Goday enta duussa zaariya wode, Yayqooba kochay ufaytana; Isra7eele asay hashshu gaana.
PSA 15:1 Dawita Mazmure. Abeeti Godaw, ne dunkaaniyan gam7anay oonee? Ne geeshsha zuma bolla daanay oonee?
PSA 15:2 Suure de7o de7ey, xillobaa oothey, ba wozanaape tuma odetey,
PSA 15:3 hara asa sunthi iissonnay, ba laggiya bolla iitabaa oothonnay, ba laagiya zigironnay,
PSA 15:4 iita asata kadhey, Godaa yayiya asata bonchey, qohetidika ba caaquwa poley,
PSA 15:5 ba miishiya yelon tal7onnay, xillo asi qohanaw wodhaafe ekonnay, haysata oothiya uray merinaw qaaxenna.
PSA 16:1 Dawita Woosa. Abeeti Xoossaw, ta neeko baqatiya gisho tana naaga.
PSA 16:2 Taani Xoossaa, “Neeni ta Godaa; neepe attishin, hari lo77obay taw baawa” yaagas.
PSA 16:3 Sa7an de7iya geeshshati ay mela bonchetidonaa! Ta entara issife ufaytayis.
PSA 16:4 Hara xoossata kaalleysati banta bolla meto darsoosona. Shin taani hara xoossatas suuthi yarshike; taani enta sunthaa xeegike.
PSA 16:5 Ta Godaw ta laatay nena; taw koshshiya ubbaa taw immaasa; ta de7uwa saamay nena.
PSA 16:6 Tana gakida saamay ay mela lo77o! Ee ta laatay tuma lo77o!
PSA 16:7 Tana zorida Godaa galatayis; qamma ta wozanay tana tamaarsees.
PSA 16:8 Taani ubba wode Godaa ta sinthan be7ayis; I ta ushachan de7iya gisho dagammike.
PSA 16:9 Hessa gisho, ta wozanay ufaytees; ta inxarsay galatees; ta asatethay hirgi bayna de7ees.
PSA 16:10 Ta shempiw si7oolen aggaka; ne Geeshshaa wooqana mela oothaka.
PSA 16:11 Tana de7o ogiya bessaasa; ne sinthan kumetha ufaysi de7ees; ne ushachan merinaa injey de7ees.
PSA 17:1 Dawita Woosa. Abeeti Godaw, ta xillo maggannuwa si7a; taani neeko waassiya waasuwa hayza. Cimon gidonashin tuman, woossiya woosa zaara.
PSA 17:2 Ne xillo pirday taw qonco; ne ayfey tumaa xeello.
PSA 17:3 Neeni qamma tana xomoosadasa; ta wozanaa paacadasa. Shin paacadaka ta bolla aykoka demmabaaka; ta inxarsayka baletibeenna.
PSA 17:4 Taani hara asatada iitabaa haasayike; taani ne qaala naagiya gisho, gene ogiya kaallabike.
PSA 17:5 Ta tohoy dhubetonna mela, ta tangoy ne ogiyape gaxa keybeenna.
PSA 17:6 Abeeti Xoossaw ta woosa ne si7iya gisho, taani nena woossayis. Ne haythaa taako zaarada, ta qaala si7a.
PSA 17:7 Banta morketape baqateyisata, ne ushacha kushen qottada ashsheyso, ne keehatetha malaalsiya ogen bessa.
PSA 17:8 Ne ayfe na77e mela tana naaga; ne qefiya garsan tana qosa.
PSA 17:9 Tana un7ethiya iitatape; teqidi oykida morketape ashsha.
PSA 17:10 Entaw qadhey baawa; otoron haasayoosona.
PSA 17:11 Tana gooddidi oykidosona; teqidosona; tana biittan holidi yegganaw xeelloosona.
PSA 17:12 Enti miyaba koyiya gaammo mela; qosetidi naagiya wodala gaammo mela.
PSA 17:13 Godaw, denda; ta morketara eqetada enta sa7an yegga; ne mashshan iitata kushepe tana ashsha.
PSA 17:14 Godaw, haysa mela asape tana qosa; enta qaaday sa7aba gidida asape ne kushen tana ashsha. Ne minjida seeran enta kalsa; he seeray enta naytas gididi, enta nayta naytas palaho.
PSA 17:15 Shin taani xillotethan ne som7uwa be7ana; ta barkiya wode ne malaa be7ada ufaytana.
PSA 18:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure Goday iya morketapenne Saa7ola kushepe ashshida wode Dawiti Godaas yexida mazmure. Abeeti Godaw, ta wolqaw, taani nena dosayis.
PSA 18:2 Goday ta zaalla; ta miixa; tana ashsheysa; ta Xoossay ta iyako baqatiya ta zaalla. I taw gondalle; tana ashshiya wolqa; taani qosetada attiya besse.
PSA 18:3 Galata bessiya Godaa ta xeegayis; ta morketape taani attana.
PSA 18:4 Hayqo wodoroy tana cuullis; dhayo di7oy tana daganthis.
PSA 18:5 Duufo wodoroy ta bolla xaaxetis; hayqo xihey tana oykis.
PSA 18:6 Ta un7an Godaa xeegas; tana maaddana mela ta Xoossaako waassas. Ba keethan gididi ta girsaa si7is; ta waasoy iya haythan wodhis.
PSA 18:7 Xoossay hanqetida gisho, biittay qaaxis; dereta xaphoy kokoris.
PSA 18:8 Iya siidhiyape hanqo cuyay keyis; iya doonape miya tama lacoy keyis; I xuuggiya bonqo cuttis.
PSA 18:9 Saluwa phalqidi wodhis; iya tohuwape garsan dhuma shaari de7ees.
PSA 18:10 Kiruubeta bolla uttidi paallis; carko qefen pude dendis.
PSA 18:11 Bana dhuman kammis; iya dunkaaney iran kumida shaara.
PSA 18:12 Iya sinthan de7iya gita poo7uwape shachinne tama lacoy keyidi dhuma shaara kanthidi bis.
PSA 18:13 Goday dadada salope guummis; Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossay ba girsaa sissis; wol7anthaninne tama lacon qoncis.
PSA 18:14 Ba dongiya dukidi ba morketa laallis; wol7antha poo7o kiittidi enta yedethis.
PSA 18:15 Abeeti Godaw, neeni seerida wode, shenetada peenuqida wode, Abbay zin7ida biittay bentis; sa7a baasoy qoncis.
PSA 18:16 Goday bollafe kushiya yeddidi tana oykis; ciimmo haathaafe tana dafidi kessis.
PSA 18:17 Ta bolla daro wolqaamida ta morketapenne tana ixeysatape ashshis.
PSA 18:18 Ta metootida wode enti ta bolla dendidosona; shin Goday tana katisis.
PSA 18:19 I tana dalga bessi kessis; tanan ufaytida gisho tana ashshis.
PSA 18:20 Ta xillotethaada Goday taw qanxis; ta kushe geeshshatethaada I taw zaaris.
PSA 18:21 Taani Godaa ogiya kaallas; ta Xoossaa aggada kare keyabike.
PSA 18:22 Taani iya higgiya ubbaa naagas; iya kiitaa polo aggabike.
PSA 18:23 Taani iya sinthan suure de7as; tana nagarape naagas.
PSA 18:24 Goday ta xillotethaadanne ta kushe geeshshatethaada taw zaaris.
PSA 18:25 Ammaneteysatas ne ammanetaasa; suuretas ne suure.
PSA 18:26 Geeshshatas ne geeshshi; shin geellatas ne geella.
PSA 18:27 Ashketa ashshaasa; shin otoranchota kawushaasa.
PSA 18:28 Abeeti Godaw, ne taw xompaasa; ta Xoossay ta dhumaa poo7isaasa.
PSA 18:29 Ne maaduwan ta morke toora bolla dendayis; ta Xoossan miixaa xeerara gupada aadhayis.
PSA 18:30 Xoossaa ogey polo; Godaa qaalay geeshshi; iyako baqatiya ubbaas I gondalle.
PSA 18:31 Godaape attishin, hara xoossi oonee? nu Xoossaafe attishin, hara zaalli oonee?
PSA 18:32 Taw wolqa immeynne ta ogiya saro oothey Xoossaa.
PSA 18:33 I ta tohuwa gen7e tohoda minthees; dhoqa bessan hirgi bayna essees.
PSA 18:34 Ta kushiya ola tamaarsees; naase birata dongiya dukana mela ta qessiya minthees.
PSA 18:35 Tana ashshiya ne gondalliya taw immadasa; ne ushacha kushey tana zempisees; ne lo77o oykethay tana gitayees.
PSA 18:36 Ta hemetiya bessaa dalgisadasa; ta tohuwa harchuchi ekibeenna.
PSA 18:37 Ta morketa yedethada oykas; enta dhaysona guye simmike.
PSA 18:38 Enti zaari dendonnaada shocas; enti ta tohuwa garsan kundidosona.
PSA 18:39 Olas tana dancisadasa; taara gaaddeteyisata taw gulbatisadasa.
PSA 18:40 Ta morketa ta sinthafe guye zaaradasa; tana ixeyisata dhaysas.
PSA 18:41 Maade koyidi waassidosona, shin oonika enta ashshibeenna. Godaa enti xeegidosona, shin I entaw koybeenna.
PSA 18:42 Carkoy pitidi efiya baanada enta liiqisas; oge urqada enta yedhas.
PSA 18:43 Gene asape tana ashshadasa; tana kawotethata bolla shuumadasa; ta eronna asay taw haaretidosona.
PSA 18:44 Enti tabaa si7idi taw kiitetoosona; allaga derey ta sinthan ziggees.
PSA 18:45 Enti kaha dhayidosona; banta miixape kokorishe yoosona.
PSA 18:46 Goday de7ees! Xoossay, ta zaallay galatetto! Tana ashshiya Xoossay dhoqu dhoqu go!
PSA 18:47 I taw halo kessiya Xoossaa; kawotethata ta garsan haariseysa.
PSA 18:48 Ta morketape tana ashsheysa; tana ixeyisata bolla dhoqu dhoqu oothaasa; iitatape tana ashshaasa.
PSA 18:49 Hessa gisho, Godaw kawotethata giddon taani nena galatana; ne sunthaa sabbana.
PSA 18:50 I ba kawas xoono immees; ba tiyidaysas, Dawitasinne iya kochaas, ba keehatetha bessees.
PSA 19:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure. Saloti Xoossaa bonchuwa haasayoosona; salo gufanthoy iya kushe oosuwa awaajees.
PSA 19:2 Issi gallasi hara gallassas hessa odees; issi qammi hara qammas eratethi qoncisees.
PSA 19:3 Odi woyko qaali baawa; enta girsay si7etenna.
PSA 19:4 Gidoshin enta oday sa7a ubban laaletis; enta qaalay biitta gaxaa gakis. Awi de7iya bessi Xoossay salon giigisis.
PSA 19:5 Ba soope keyiya mishirada, gaadde woxanaw ufaytidi giigida asada, away wonta wonta keyees.
PSA 19:6 Issi bagga salo gaxape keyidi, hara bagga salo gaxa gakanaw bees; iya suulape geemmiyabay baawa.
PSA 19:7 Godaa higgey suure; shempo zaarees. Godaa kiitay ammanetidaysa; akeeki pacidaysata cinca oothees.
PSA 19:8 Godaa wogay like; wozana ufaysees. Godaa kiitay geeshshi; ayfe poo7isees.
PSA 19:9 Godaas yashshi geeshshi; merinaw eqidi de7ees. Godaa pirday kumethi tumanne xillo.
PSA 19:10 Worqafe aadhidi koyetees; walahi bayna worqafe aadhidi lo77o. Eessafe aadhidi lo77o ililo eessafe aadhidi mal7o.
PSA 19:11 Ne aylley naagetana mela zorees; ne higgiya naagoy daro go77ees.
PSA 19:12 Ba qohuwa demmey oonee? Abeeti Godaw, geemmida nagarape tana geeshsha.
PSA 19:13 Tana ne aylliya, erishe oothiya nagarape naaga. Nagari tana haaronna mela maadda; he wode taani suure gidana, gita balape geeyana.
PSA 19:14 Abeeti Godaw, ta zaallaw, tana wozeyso; ta doonape keyiya qaalaynne ta wozanaa qofay nena ufaysiyabaa gido.
PSA 20:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure. Meto wode Goday nena si7o; Yayqooba Xoossaa sunthay nena naago.
PSA 20:2 Ba keethaafe new maado kiitto; Xiyoonepe nena katiso.
PSA 20:3 I ne yarsho ubbaa hassayo; ne xuussa yarshuwan ufayto. Salaha
PSA 20:4 Ne wozanaa amuwa new immo; ne qofaa ubbaa polo.
PSA 20:5 Ne xoonuwan nuna ufayso; nu Xoossa sunthan nu bandira dhoqu oothana; ne woosa ubbaa Goday new zaaro.
PSA 20:6 Goday ba doorida kawas, xoono immidaysa taani buroo erayis. I ba geeshsha saluwan si7ana; ba ushacha kushen gita xoono iyaw immana.
PSA 20:7 Issoti issoti banta ola para gaariyan, harati banta paran ceeqetoosona; shin nuuni Godaa nu Xoossaa wolqan ceeqetoos.
PSA 20:8 Enti dhubetidi kundana; shin nuuni dendidi minni eqana.
PSA 20:9 Abeeti Godaw, kawas xoono imma; nuuni nena xeegiya wode si7a.
PSA 21:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure. Godaw, kawoy ne wolqan ufaytees; ne immida xoonuwan hashshu gees.
PSA 21:2 Iya Wozanaa amuwa iyaw immadasa; iya mettersha woosa iya diggabaaka. Salaha
PSA 21:3 Lo77o anjora iya mokaasa; walahi bayna worqa kallacha iya huuphen wothaasa.
PSA 21:4 I nena de7o oychis; daro laythinne adussa de7o immadasa.
PSA 21:5 Neeni iyaw xoono immida gisho, iya bonchoy daris; gitatethinne teema iyaw immadasa.
PSA 21:6 Merinaa anjuwa iyaw immadasa; ne bentuwan iya ufaysaasa.
PSA 21:7 Kawoy Godan ammanetees; Ubbaafe dhoqa Xoossaa maarotay, iyara de7iya gisho I dagammenna.
PSA 21:8 Ne kushey ne morketa, ne ushacha kushey nena ixeyisata demmana.
PSA 21:9 Ne qonciya wode cooce tamada enta xuuggana; Goday ba hanqo suulon enta mittana; iya tamay enta maana.
PSA 21:10 Neeni enta nayta biittafe, enta kochaa asaa giddofe dhaysana.
PSA 21:11 Ne morketi ne bolla tobboosona; iitabaa maqetoosona, shin polokona.
PSA 21:12 Neeni enta ne dongiyan dukana; enta guye zaarada gooddana.
PSA 21:13 Godaw, ne minotethan dhoqu dhoqu ga; ne wolqaa gisho galata mazmure yexoos.
PSA 22:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure “Guura gen7e” geetetiya diitha cuudhethan yexetida mazmure Ta Xoossaw, ta Xoossaw, tana ayis aggadii? Tana maadda gada ta nena woossiya wode, ayis taape haakay?
PSA 22:2 Ta Xoossaw, gallas kumethi ta neeko waassas; shin ne tana allaka. Qamma ubban neeko waassayis, shin wopatethi demmike.
PSA 22:3 Gidoshin neeni geeshshi; Isra7eele galatay ne araata yuushon de7ees.
PSA 22:4 Nu aawati nenan ammanetidosona; nenan ammanetin, ne enta ashshadasa.
PSA 22:5 Neeko waassidi attidosona; nenan ammanetidi yeellatibookona.
PSA 22:6 Shin ta ase gidike; guxune; ta asan kadhetidaysanne boretidaysa.
PSA 22:7 Tana be7iya ubbay qelqisoosona; banta huuphiya qaathishe dereeqosona.
PSA 22:8 “I Godan ammanetis; ane iya asho; Goday iya dosiko, ane iya asho” yaagosona.
PSA 22:9 Gidoshin taani ta aaye ulope suure yeletanaada oothiday nena. Ta aaye dhantha dhammiya wodeka tana naagiday nena.
PSA 22:10 Ta yeletoosope doomada nenan diccas; ta aaye ulope doomin ne ta Xoossaa.
PSA 22:11 Metoy taako matiya gishonne tana maaddiya asi bayna gisho, ha77i neeni taape haakofa.
PSA 22:12 Daro morketi qayciya boorada tana teqidosona; qayciya Baasane kormatada tana oykidosona.
PSA 22:13 Mentherethidi gudiya gaammoda banta doona ta bolla dooyosona.
PSA 22:14 Taani haathada goggas; ta meqethay ba kesuwape keyis; ta wozanay oysada ta gaathan til7is.
PSA 22:15 Ta qoodhey kun7ada melis; ta inxarsay kottonuwara oyketis; ne tana hayqida asada baanan yeggadasa.
PSA 22:16 Kanati tana teqidosona; iita asati ta yuushuwa oykidosona; ta kushetanne ta tohota caddoosona.
PSA 22:17 Ta meqethati taybetoosona; ta morketi tana dereeqosona.
PSA 22:18 Ta ma7uwa shaakidi ekoosona; ta adussa ma7uwa bolla saama yeggoosona.
PSA 22:19 Ta Godaw, ne ta matay taape haakofa; Ta wolqaw, tana maaddanaw ellesada haaya.
PSA 22:20 Tana mashshafe kessa eka; ta al7o de7uwa kanatape ashsha.
PSA 22:21 Gaammota doonape tana ashsha; qayciya bazzo boorata kacepe tana naaga.
PSA 22:22 Taani ne sunthaa ta ishatas odana; enta shiiquwan nena galatana.
PSA 22:23 Hinteno, Godaa yayyesato, iya galatite; hinteno, Yayqooba zareto, iya bonchite. Hinteno, Isra7eele kochato, yashshan iya dhoqu dhoqu oothite.
PSA 22:24 I un7etidaysa kadhenna; enta qohuwa be7ishe qelli geenna. Ba som7uwa entafe genthenna; enti iyako waassiya wode, entaw zoko zaaribeenna.
PSA 22:25 Ta ne lo77o oosuwa gisho gita shiiqon galatana; ta qangetha new yayiya asaa sinthan gathana.
PSA 22:26 Manqoti midi kallana; Godaa koyeysati iya galatana; enti merinaw ufaysan daana.
PSA 22:27 Sa7a gaxa gakanaw de7iya asa ubbay, akeekan Godaako simmana; asa zare ubbay iya goyinnana.
PSA 22:28 Maati ubbay Godaasa; I kawotethata haarees.
PSA 22:29 Sa7an de7iya dure ubbay iya goyinnana; bantanan hayqope ashshanaw danda7onaysatinne biitta simmiya ubbay iyaw gulbatana.
PSA 22:30 Yaana yeletay iyaw kiitetana; sintha yeletas Godaaba odana.
PSA 22:31 Buroo yeletiboona asaska, iya geeshshatetha odana.
PSA 23:1 Dawita Mazmure Goday ta henthanchuwa; taw aybika pacenna.
PSA 23:2 Tana aaca qooron shempisees; wopu gida haathaako laaggees.
PSA 23:3 Ta de7uwa ooraxisees; ba sunthaa gisho gidi, tana xillotetha ogiya kaalethees.
PSA 23:4 Ne ta Goday taara de7iya gisho, ta sakana dhumaa giddora biikoka, iitaba yayyike. ne xam7aynne ne guufey tana minthethoosona.
PSA 23:5 Ta morketa sinthan taw gibira giigisaasa; tana mokashe, ta huuphen zayte tiyaasa; ta wancay kumidi goggana gakanaw kunthaasa.
PSA 23:6 Ne keehatethaynne ne maarotethay ta de7o laytha ubban tana kaallana; taani Godaa keethan merinaw daana.
PSA 24:1 Dawita Mazmure Sa7aynne sa7an de7iya ubbay Godaaba; alameynne iyan de7iya asa ubbay iyassa.
PSA 24:2 I sa7aa gita abba bolla hiixis; ciimmo haatha bolla minthidi essis.
PSA 24:3 Godaa zuma bolla keyanaw danda7ey oonee? Iya geeshsha bessan eqanay oonee?
PSA 24:4 Iya kusheynne iya wozanay geeshshi gididaysa; eeqa goyinnonnaysa, wordo caaqonnaysa.
PSA 24:5 I Godaape anjo ekana; ashshiya Xoossaafe xillo pirdaa demmana.
PSA 24:6 Xoossaako xeelliya asinne Yayqooba Xoossaa som7uwa koyiya asi hessa mela ase. Salaha
PSA 24:7 Boncho kawoy gelana mela, hinteno pengeto dooyetite; beni pengeti iya ufaysan mokite.
PSA 24:8 He boncho kawoy oonee? Minonne wolqaama gidida Godaa; olan wolqaama gidida Godaa.
PSA 24:9 Boncho kawoy gelana mela, hinteno pengeto dooyetite; beni pengeti iya ufaysan mokite.
PSA 24:10 Ha boncho kawoy oonee? Ha boncho kawoy salo medhetethata Godaa! Salaha.
PSA 25:1 Dawita Mazmure Abeeti Godaw, shempofe ta nena woossayis.
PSA 25:2 Abeeti ta Xoossaw, ta nenan ammanetayis; tana yeellayopa; ta morketas tana aathada immofa.
PSA 25:3 Nenan ufaysi ootheysati yeellatokona; shin gaasoy bayna geneysati yeellatana.
PSA 25:4 Abeeti Godaw, tana ne ogiya bessa; ne geedo tana kaaletha.
PSA 25:5 Tana ashshiya Xoossay nena gidiya gisho, ne tumatethaa tana kaalethanne tamaarsa; gallas kumetha ta nenan ufaysi oothayis.
PSA 25:6 Abeeti Godaw, benipe de7iya ne qadhiyanne ne keehatetha hassaya.
PSA 25:7 Ta na7atetha nagaraanne iitaba hassayopa; abeeti Godaw, ne keehatethaanne lo77otetha hassaya.
PSA 25:8 Goday keehanne suure gidiya gisho; nagaranchota ba ogiya tamaarsees.
PSA 25:9 Ashketa suuretethan kaalethees; entana ba ogiya tamaarsees.
PSA 25:10 Godaa caaquwanne iya kiitaa naageysatas iya oge ubbay tumanne keeha.
PSA 25:11 Abeeti Godaw, ta nagaray daro; gidoshin ne sunthaa gisho taw atto ga.
PSA 25:12 Godaa yayiya asi oonee? I kaallanaw bessiya ogiya Goday iya tamaarsana.
PSA 25:13 I ubba wode duretethan daana; iya nayti biitta laattana.
PSA 25:14 Goday yayyeysatas ba xuuraa genthenna; I entaw ba caaquwa erisees.
PSA 25:15 Goday ta tohuwa xihepe naagiya gisho, ta ayfey maado ekanaw ubba wode iyako xeellees.
PSA 25:16 Godaw, taani bizzanne metootida asi gidiya gisho, taako simma; ne maarotethaa tana bessa.
PSA 25:17 Taw hirgi daris; ta metuwape tana ne ashsha.
PSA 25:18 Ta metuwanne ta waayiya be7a; ta nagara ubbaa atto ga.
PSA 25:19 Ta morketi ay mela daridaako be7a; enti tana ay mela ixiyako xeella.
PSA 25:20 Ne tana naaga; ne tana ashsha; ta neeko baqatiya gisho tana yeellayopa.
PSA 25:21 Ta nenan ufaysi oothida gisho, suuretethinne tumatethi tana naago.
PSA 25:22 Abeeti Xoossaw, Isra7eele asaa enta meto ubbaafe ne woza.
PSA 26:1 Dawita Mazmure Abeeti Godaw, ta suuretethan hemetida gishonne sidhey bayna nenan ammanetida gisho, taw pirda.
PSA 26:2 Abeeti Godaw, tana paaca; tana pilgada be7a; ta wozanaa xomoosa.
PSA 26:3 Ne siiqoy ta sinthan de7iya gisho, ta ubba wode ne tuma ogiyan hemetayis.
PSA 26:4 Cimmiya asaara ta uttike; cubbota maabaran gelike.
PSA 26:5 Iitata duulata ta ixayis; makallachotara issife uttike.
PSA 26:6 Abeeti Godaw, ta xillotethaa bessanaw ta kushiya meeccayis; ne yarsho bessa yuuyayis.
PSA 26:7 Galata mazmure yexashe ne malaalsiya ooso ubba odana.
PSA 26:8 Abeeti Godaw, ne keethaanne, ne bonchoy aqiya bessaa ta dosayis.
PSA 26:9 Tana nagaranchotara issife pittofa; asa suuthu gusseysatara ta shempuwa dhaysofa.
PSA 26:10 Enta kushen iita halchoy de7ees; enta ushacha kushen wodhaafey kumis.
PSA 26:11 Shin ta suuretethan hemetana; tana woza; taw qadheta.
PSA 26:12 Ta tohoy demba bessan eqis; gita shiiquwan Godaa galatana.
PSA 27:1 Dawita Mazmure Goday taw poo7onne tana ashsheysa; yaatin, ta oona yayiyanee? Goday, ta de7oy naagetiya miixaa; yaatin, ta ayis dagammanee?
PSA 27:2 Iita asati, tana ixeysatinne ta morketi tana wodhanaw hordofiya wode, bantaw dhubetidi kundana.
PSA 27:3 Morke toori tana teqiko ta wozanay yayyenna. Oli ta bolla dendiyakoka, taani Godan ammanetayis.
PSA 27:4 Ta Godaa issiba oychas; hessika, ta de7o laytha ubban Godaa keethan de7anaasa; Godaa lo77otetha be7anaasanne iya keethan iya koyanaasa.
PSA 27:5 Meto gallas tana ba de7iya bessan genthana; ba dunkaaniyan tana qosana; tana dhoqa zaalla bolla essana.
PSA 27:6 He wode taani tana teqida ta morketape aadhada, dhoqu dhoqu gaana. Taani iya dunkaaniyan ufaytashe yarsho yarshana; Godaa mazmuren galatana.
PSA 27:7 Abeeti Godaw, ta nena xeegiya wode ne taw koya; taw qadheta; tana si7a.
PSA 27:8 Neeni, “Ta som7uwa koyite” gadasa, ta wozanay Abeeti Godaw, “Ta ne som7uwa koyana” yaagis.
PSA 27:9 Ne som7uwa taape genthofa; tana maaddeyso; ne shenetada tana ne aylliya guye zaaropa. Abeeti tana ashshiya Xoossaw, tana yeggofa; aggofa.
PSA 27:10 Ta aawaynne ta aayiya tana aggikoka Goday tana shiishidi ekana.
PSA 27:11 Abeeti Godaw, tana ne ogiya tamaarsa; ta morketa gisho tana suure oge kaaletha.
PSA 27:12 Tana mandiya wordo markati ta bolla wolqan dendida gisho, tana ta morketa amuwas aathada immofa.
PSA 27:13 Taani de7on de7ashe, Godaa keehatetha be7anaysa ammanayis.
PSA 27:14 Godan ufaysi ootha; minna, yayyofa; Godan ufaysi ootha.
PSA 28:1 Dawita Mazmure Abeeti Godaw, ta zaallaw, ta nena xeegayis; ne taw si77i goopa. Ne si77i giiko, ta duufo gelida asi gidayis.
PSA 28:2 Maade koyada ta waassiya wode; ubbaafe geeshsha dunkaaniyako, ta kushiya micciya wode ta woosa si7a.
PSA 28:3 Iita oothiya iita asatara tana gathada oykofa; enti banta wozanan gene qopishe, banta doonan sarotethi haasayoosona.
PSA 28:4 Enta oosuwada enta seera; enta iitatethaada entaw qanxa. Enta kushe oosuwada enta pirda; entaw bessiya iitaa entaw zaara.
PSA 28:5 Enti Godaa oosuwanne iya kushe medhuwas, besse immonna gisho Goday enta laallana; zaaridi enta keexenna.
PSA 28:6 Ta woosa si7ida gisho Goday galatetto.
PSA 28:7 Goday taw wolqanne gondalle; ta wozanay iyan ammanetees; ta iyan maadetas. Ta wozanay iyan ufaytees; ta iya mazmuren sabbana.
PSA 28:8 Goday ba asaas wolqa; ba dooridi kawa ashshiya miixa.
PSA 28:9 Godaw, ne asaa ashsha; nebaa gididaysata anja. Enta heemmey nena gida; enta merinaw tooka.
PSA 29:1 Dawita Mazmure Hinteno salo medhetethato, bonchoynne wolqay Godaasa giite.
PSA 29:2 Godaa boncho sunthaa galatite; iya geeshshatetha teema gisho Godaa goyinnite.
PSA 29:3 Godaa guunthay haathata bolla si7etees; boncho Xoossay dadada dechees; Goday gita haathata bolla guummees.
PSA 29:4 Godaa kooshinchay wolqaama; Godaa girsay teemara de7ees.
PSA 29:5 Godaa girsay zigaa menthees; Libaanosen de7iya zigaa menthees.
PSA 29:6 Libaanose dereta galo marada buraaqisees; Siriyoona deriya menthada gufisees.
PSA 29:7 Godaa girsay wol7amees.
PSA 29:8 Godaa girsay mela biittaa qaathees; Goday Qaadesa mela biittaa kokorsees.
PSA 29:9 Godaa girsay wolaa qaathees; mitha haythaa qoqofees. Iya keethan de7iya ubbay, “Bonchoy Godaas gido” yaagees.
PSA 29:10 Goday di7o haatha bolla ba araata wothidi uttis; Goday ba araatan uttidi merinaw kawotis.
PSA 29:11 Goday ba asaas wolqa immees. Goday ba asaa sarotethan anjees.
PSA 30:1 Keethe Anjisos Dawiti Yexida Mazmure. Abeeti Godaw, ne tana ollafe kessida gishonne ta morketi ufaytonna mela oothida gisho, ta nena dhoqu dhoqu oothana.
PSA 30:2 Abeeti Godaw, ta Xoossaw tana maaddana mela, ta nena xeegin ne tana pathadasa.
PSA 30:3 Abeeti Godaw, duufo gelonnaada tana naagadasa; ollan wodhonnaada tana paxa ashshadasa.
PSA 30:4 Hinteno Xoossaa asaw, Godaas yexite; iya geeshsha sunthaa sabbite.
PSA 30:5 Iya hanqoy guutha wodesa, shin iya keehatethay de7o laytha ubbaasa. Qamma yeekishe aqiko, wonta zawi bayna ufaysi gidees.
PSA 30:6 Ta naagetada de7eysa erida wode “Hiza ta qaaxike” yaagas.
PSA 30:7 Abeeti Godaw, ne taw keehida wode, zumada tana minthada essadasa. Shin ne som7uwa hara soo zaarida wode, ta dagammas.
PSA 30:8 Abeeti Godaw, ta nena xeegas; nena maarota woossas;
PSA 30:9 “Ta duufo geliko nena ay go77ii? Biitta giddo gelida asi waatidi nena galatanaw danda7ii? Ne ammanetetha waatidi markatanee?
PSA 30:10 Abeeti Godaw, ne tana si7a; taw qadheta. Abeeti Godaw, ne taw maado gida” yaagas.
PSA 30:11 Ta yeehuwa yethan laammadasa; kayo ma7uwa taape qaarada, tana ufaysi mayzadasa.
PSA 30:12 Hessa gisho, ta nena sabbana; si77i giike. Abeeti Godaw, ta Xoossaw, ta nena merinaw galatana.
PSA 31:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure. Abeeti Godaw, ta neeko baqatayis; awudeka tana yeellayopa; ne xillotethan tana ashsha.
PSA 31:2 Ne haythaa taako zaara; ellesada tana ashsha. Neeni, taw geemmiya zaalla; tana ashshiya mino miixa gida.
PSA 31:3 Ee, ne taw zaallanne miixa; ne sunthaa gisho tana kaaletha; ogiya bessa.
PSA 31:4 Ne taw geemmiya besse gidiya gisho, enti qotidi wothida xihepe tana naaga.
PSA 31:5 Abeeti Godaw, tuma Xoossaw, ta shempuwa ne kushen wothayis; ne tana woza.
PSA 31:6 Pathonna eeqata goyinneyisata ta ixayis; gidoshin taani Godan ammanetayis.
PSA 31:7 Ta metuwanne ta un7a ne be7ida gisho taani merinaw ne siiquwan ufaytana.
PSA 31:8 Ne tana morke kushen aathada immabaaka; ta tohota dalga bessan essadasa.
PSA 31:9 Abeeti Godaw, taani meton gelida gisho taw qadheta; Ta daro azzanida gisho ta ayfey mulcatis; ta ashoynne ta shempoy daaburis.
PSA 31:10 Ta de7oy azzanon, ta laythay oolen wuris; waaye darotethan ta wolqay wuris; ta meqethati argaacidosona.
PSA 31:11 Ta morketa ubbaas qidhes attas; ta shoorotas yeella gidas. Ta laggetas daganthiyaba gidas; tana be7eysati taape haakidosona.
PSA 31:12 Ta hayqida asada dogetas; meqa miisheda wora yegetas.
PSA 31:13 Taani darota kalkashaa si7as; ubba bessara dagami de7ees. Enti ta bolla tobboosona; tana wodhanaw maqetoosona.
PSA 31:14 Shin Godaw, ta nenan ammanetana; neeni ta Xoossaa.
PSA 31:15 Ta de7o laythay ne kushiyana; tana yedethiya ta morketa kushepe tana ashsha.
PSA 31:16 Ne aylliya bolla ne som7uwa poo7isa; ne maarotethan tana ashsha.
PSA 31:17 Abeeti Godaw, ta nena xeegiya gisho, tana yeellayopa. Shin iitati yeellato; duufon gelidi si77i go.
PSA 31:18 Otoroninne boren xillota bolla minnidi haasaya gisho, enta wordo inxarsaa si77i ootha.
PSA 31:19 Nena yayyeysatas ne minjida, neeko baqateysatas ne giigisida, keehatethay ay mela daro!
PSA 31:20 Neeni enta ne sinthan, geema bessan gentha wothadasa; asaa iita maquwafe ashshaasa; iita inxarsafe ne dunkaaniyan qosadasa.
PSA 31:21 Morkey teqida katamaa giddon, malaalsiya ba maarotethaa tana bessida, Goday galatetto.
PSA 31:22 Ta dagammada, “Ne sinthafe haakas” gas; shin ta maado koyada neeko waassida wode, ta waasuwa ne si7adasa.
PSA 31:23 Hinteno, Xoossa asaw, Godaa dosite; Goday ammaneteyisata naagees; shin otoranchotas enta gatiya qanxees.
PSA 31:24 Hinteno, Godan ufaysi ootheysato, minnite; gencite.
PSA 32:1 Dawita Timirte Akeekan xaafetida ginxo Iya nagaray atto geetetidaynne iya nagaray kametida uray anjetidaysa.
PSA 32:2 Goday iya iitatethaa taybonna asi, iya qofan cimoy bayna asi anjetidaysa.
PSA 32:3 Taani ta nagaraa paaxonna aggada, kumetha gallas oolidaysi, ta asatethaa daabursis.
PSA 32:4 Gallasinne qamma ne kushey tana deexis; haathi dhayin bone awan melidibada, ta wolqay wuris. Salaha
PSA 32:5 Taani ta nagaraa new paaxas; ta naaquwa neepe genthabike. “Ta nagaraa Godaas paaxana” yaagas; tana deexida nagaraa atto gadasa. Salaha
PSA 32:6 Hessa gisho, xillo asi oonika, ne bentiya wode nena woosso; iita di7oy yaa wode he uraa gakenna.
PSA 32:7 Ne taw qosetiya bessi; ne tana metope naagasa. Atotetha yethi yexiya asaa ta yuushuwan wothadasa. Salaha
PSA 32:8 Xoossay, “Ta nena tamaarsana; ne baana ogiya bessaana; ta nena zorananne naagana” yaagees.
PSA 32:9 Bixaalaninne puulon oyketonna; kiitetonna wozani bayna baquloda woyko parada hanopite.
PSA 32:10 Iitatas waayey darana; shin Godan ammaneteyisata siiqoy kammana.
PSA 32:11 Hinteno, xilloto, Godan ufaytitenne hashshu giite; hinteno, wozana suureto, ililite.
PSA 33:1 Hinteno, xilloto Godaas ufaysan ililite; suure asati iya galatanaw bessees.
PSA 33:2 Maasinqon Godaa galatite; tammu shayan waaxetida diithan yexite.
PSA 33:3 Ooratha yethi iyaw yexite; diithi loythidi diixishe ililite.
PSA 33:4 Godaa qaalay tuma; iya ooso ubbay ammaneteysa.
PSA 33:5 Goday xillotethinne tuma pirda dosees; iya maarotay sa7aa kumis.
PSA 33:6 Godaa qaalan saloti medhetidosona; iya doonape keyiya shempuwan salon de7iya medhetethati yeletidosona.
PSA 33:7 Abba haatha issi bessan eelisis; ciimmo haatha minja keethan wothis.
PSA 33:8 Sa7a ubbay Godaa yayyo; asa ubbay Godaa boncho.
PSA 33:9 Iya odan ubbay hanis; I kiittin minnidi eqis.
PSA 33:10 Goday kawotethata halchuwa hada oothees; enta qofaa laallees.
PSA 33:11 Godaa halchoy merinaw eqidi de7ees; iya wozanaa qofay yeletetha ubbaasa.
PSA 33:12 Xoossay entaw Godaa gidida kawotethay, I babaa oothidi doorida asay anjetidaysata.
PSA 33:13 Goday salon uttidi xeellees; asa koche ubbaa be7ees.
PSA 33:14 Goday ba araatan uttidi, sa7an de7iya ubbaa be7ees.
PSA 33:15 Enta wozanaa medhiday iya; enti oothiyaba ubbaa I erees.
PSA 33:16 Kawoy ba wotaadare darotethan attenna; olanchoy ba wolqaa minotethan kessi ekenna.
PSA 33:17 Paran xoonana gidi naagoy hada; I ba minotethan ashshanaw danda7enna.
PSA 33:18 Godaa ayfeti iyaw yayyanne iya maarotan ufaysi oothiya asaa be7oosona.
PSA 33:19 Hessika enta hayqope ashshanaasanne kosha wode enta naaganaassa.
PSA 33:20 Nuuni Godaa ufaysan naagoos; nuna maaddeynne nu gondalley iya.
PSA 33:21 Iya geeshsha sunthan nuuni ammanetiya gisho, nu wozanay iyan ufaytees.
PSA 33:22 Godaw, nuuni nenan ufaysi oothidaysada, ne maarotay nu bolla gido.
PSA 34:1 Dawiti gooshshu daanidi shiiqida gisho, Abimeleke sinthafe goodetidi keyda wode yexida mazmure. Taani ubba wode Godaa galatana; iya galatay ta doonape pacenna.
PSA 34:2 Taani Godan ceeqetayis; aadati hessa si7idi ufayto.
PSA 34:3 Taara Godaa bonchite; iya sunthaa issife dhoqu dhoqu oothoos.
PSA 34:4 Taani Godaa koyin, I taw zaaris; ta yayyiyaba ubbaafe tana ashshis.
PSA 34:5 Iyako xeelliya ubbay poo7osona; enta som7oy yeellatenna.
PSA 34:6 Ha manqoy waassis; Goday iya waasuwa si7is; iya meto ubbaafe iya ashshis.
PSA 34:7 Godaa kiitanchoy iyaw yayyeyisata naagees; enta yuushon gididi enta ashshees.
PSA 34:8 Goday keeha gideysa laacidi be7ite; iyako baqatiya asi anjetidaysa.
PSA 34:9 Hinteno, geeshsha asaw, Godaas yayyite; iyaw yayyeysatas aykoyka pacenna.
PSA 34:10 Gaammoti miyaba dhayidi koshatoosona; shin Godaa koyeysatas lo77obay pacenna.
PSA 34:11 Nayto, haa yiite; si7ite; ta hintena Godaa yashshi tamaarsana.
PSA 34:12 Lo77o de7o daanawunne keehaba be7anaw adussa laythi daanaw, amottey oonee?
PSA 34:13 Ne inxarsay iitabaa odetonaada, ne doonay cimmonnaada teqa.
PSA 34:14 Iitape haaka; lo77oba ootha; sarotethi koya; kaalla.
PSA 34:15 Godaa ayfey xillota xeellees; iya haythay enta waasuwa si7ees.
PSA 34:16 Enta qofisiyaba biittafe dhaysanaw, Goday iita ootheyisata ba hanqo ayfen xeellees.
PSA 34:17 Xilloti waassoosona; Goday enta waasuwa si7ees; I enta meto ubbaafe ashshees.
PSA 34:18 Wozani meqidaysatas Goday matana; I ufaysi qanxidaysata ashshees.
PSA 34:19 Xillo asas metoy daro; shin Goday iya he ubbaafe ashshees.
PSA 34:20 Goday iya meqethata naagiya gisho, entafe issoyka meqenna.
PSA 34:21 Iitata enta iitatethay wodhana; xillota ixeysati pirdetana.
PSA 34:22 Goday ba aylleta wozees; iyako baqatiya oonika pirdetenna.
PSA 35:1 Dawita Mazmure Godaw, taara baaxeteysatar ne baaxeta; tana oleyisata ne ola.
PSA 35:2 Gondallenne toora oykada, tana maaddanaw denda.
PSA 35:3 Tana gooddeyisata bolla ne tooranne mashsha dentha; taako “Ta nena ashsheysa” yaaga.
PSA 35:4 Ta shempuwa wodhanaw koyeysati, yeellato; kawuyo. Ta bolla iitabaa maqeteysati, kawuyidi guye simmo.
PSA 35:5 Godaa kiitanchoy enta yedethiya wode, enti carkon laaletiya suullada hano.
PSA 35:6 Godaa kiitanchoy enta gooddiya wode, enta ogey dhumanne hallithi gido.
PSA 35:7 Gaasoy bayna tana oykanaw xihe wothoosona; tana kundisanaw olla bookosona.
PSA 35:8 Eronna de7ishin enta bolla dhayoy yo; enti wothida xihey enta oyko; enti bookida ollan kundidi dhayo.
PSA 35:9 He wode taani Godan ufaytana; I ashshida gisho hashshu gaana.
PSA 35:10 Ta kumetha asatethay nena, “Godaw, ne meli oonee? Manquwa wolqaamaa kushiyape kessa ekaasa; metootanchuwanne un7etidaysa, bonqeyisata kushepe ashshaasa” yaagana.
PSA 35:11 Wordo markateysati ta bolla dendoosona; ta eronnaban tana mootosona.
PSA 35:12 Ta lo77o oothida gisho iita zaaridosona; tana bizza oothidosona.
PSA 35:13 Shin enti hargida wode taani kayo ma7o ma7as; ta asatethaa xooman daabursas; ta woosay zaaro demmonna attis.
PSA 35:14 Tana kawushada dabbos woyko ishas yeekeysada yeekas. Issi asi ba aayes kayoteysada ta huuphiya oykada yeekas.
PSA 35:15 Shin taani dhubetida wode ufaytidi shiiqidosona; gaasoy bayna tana wadhidi, aggonna ixidosona.
PSA 35:16 Iita asati ootheysada enti tana qelqisidosona; yilotidi banta acha garcidosona.
PSA 35:17 Godaw, neeni awude gakanaw, si77i gada xeellay? Enta iita oosuwape tana ashsha; ta al7o shempuwa ha gaammotape wosisa eka.
PSA 35:18 He wode gita shiiqon ta nena galatana; daro asay de7iya bessan nena bonchana.
PSA 35:19 Gaasoy bayna tana morkeysati ufaytofo; tana coo ixeysati ta bolla qam7otopo.
PSA 35:20 Enti saroba haasayokona; si77i gidi de7iya asaa bolla oda xaaxosona.
PSA 35:21 Enti banta doona ta bolla dooyidi, “Haysa be7a, ne oothidaysa nuuni nu ayfen be7ida” yaagosona.
PSA 35:22 Godaw, neeni hessa be7adasa; si77i goopa. Godaw, taape haakofa.
PSA 35:23 Ta Xoossaw, ta Godaw ta gisho, denda; barka; ta doona gidada mooteta.
PSA 35:24 Ta Godaw, ta Xoossaw, xillotethan taw pirda; ta morketa ufaysofa.
PSA 35:25 Enti banta wozanan, “Hashshu, nu amoy poletis; nuuni iya mittida” gaana mela oothofa.
PSA 35:26 Ta waayan ufayteysati, yeellato, kawuyo; ta bolla ceeqeteysati yeellanne kawushe ma7o.
PSA 35:27 Ta xoonuwa doseysati ufayto; ililo; hashshu yaago. “Ubba wode ba aylliya sarotethan, ufaytiya Goday dhoqu dhoqu go” yaago.
PSA 35:28 Ta inxarsay ne xillotethaanne ne galataa, gallasa kumethan odees.
PSA 36:1 Godaa aylley, Dawiti zammaareta halaqaas xaafida mazmure. Iita asi ba wozanan iitabaa qopees; I ba wozanan Xoossas yayyenna.
PSA 36:2 I bana daro nashshiya gisho; ba nagaraa be7anaw woyko ixanaw danda7enna.
PSA 36:3 Iya doonan geneynne wordoy kumis; Cincatethinne lo77oba ooso aggis.
PSA 36:4 Ba hiixan zin7idi gene qopees; bana lo77o gidonna ogen kaalethees; iitabaa ixenna.
PSA 36:5 Godaw, ne siiqoy salota gakees; ne tumatethay shaarape aadhees.
PSA 36:6 Ne xillotethay dhoqa deretape aadhees; ne pirday abba ciimmuwafe ziqa; Godaw, neeni asenne do7a naagasa.
PSA 36:7 Xoossaw, ne siiqoy ay mela al7o! Asay ne qefiya garsan qosetidi attees.
PSA 36:8 Enti ne gibiraape midi kalloosona; ne keehatetha shaafape uyidi aloosona.
PSA 36:9 De7o pultoy neepe keyees; ne poo7uwan nuuni poo7o be7oos.
PSA 36:10 Nena ereysatas ne siiqoy, wozana suuretas ne xillotethay qanxetenna.
PSA 36:11 Otoranchota tohoy tana yedhofo; nagaranchota kushey tana yedethofo.
PSA 36:12 Iita asata kundethaa be7ite; enti kundidosona; dendanaw danda7okona.
PSA 37:1 Dawita Mazmure Iitaa ootheyisata gaason yilotopa; nagara ootheyisata qanaatopa.
PSA 37:2 Enti maatada eeson melana; boncoda shullidi qoqofetana.
PSA 37:3 Godan ammaneta; lo77oba ootha; biitta bolla utta; palahin de7a.
PSA 37:4 Godan ufayta; I ne wozanaa amuwa immana.
PSA 37:5 Ne ogiya hadara Godaas imma; iyan ammaneta; I new oothana.
PSA 37:6 I ne xillotethaa wonta xalqeda, ne pirdaa seeta gallasa awada poo7isana.
PSA 37:7 Godaa sinthan si77i gada de7a; danda7an naaga; Iita asata halchoy poletin be7ada yilotopa.
PSA 37:8 Hanqo agga; yilo teqa; hessi meton yeggees.
PSA 37:9 Iita ootheysati dhoqolletidi dhayana; shin Godan ufaysi wotheysati biitta laattana.
PSA 37:10 Iita ootheysati guutha wodepe guye de7okona; ne enta koyada demmaka.
PSA 37:11 Shin aadati biitta laattana; sarotethan ufaytidi daana.
PSA 37:12 Iita asi lo77o asi dhaysanaw maqetees; ba acha enta bolla garcees.
PSA 37:13 Shin Goday iitata bolla miicees; entaw dhayo gallasi yeysa erees.
PSA 37:14 Iita asati manqotanne metootanchota wodhanaw, suure hemeteyisata shukanaw, banta mashsha shoddoosona; banta dongiya waaxoosona.
PSA 37:15 Shin enta mashshay enta wozanan gelana; enta dongey meqana.
PSA 37:16 Xillo asas de7iya guuthabay, iita asas de7iya darobaape lo77o.
PSA 37:17 Ayis giiko, iitata wolqay meqana; shin Goday xillota zempisees.
PSA 37:18 Suure asata ogiya Goday erees; enta laatay merinaw entaba gidana.
PSA 37:19 Iita wode suure asati yeellatokona; kosha wode enti kallidi maana.
PSA 37:20 Shin iita asati hayqana; Godaa morketi ciishshada qoqofetana; cuyada ayfepe geemmana.
PSA 37:21 Iita asi tal7idi zaarenna; shin xillo asi keehatethan immees.
PSA 37:22 Godan anjetidaysati biitta laattana; shin I baaddidaysati dhayana.
PSA 37:23 Asa ogey Godaa ufaysiko, Goday iya tanguwa kaalethees; minthees.
PSA 37:24 I dhubetikoka kundenna; Goday iya kushiya oykidi katisees.
PSA 37:25 Taani paamas; ha77i cimas; shin xillo asi yegetin, iya nayti kathi woossishin be7abike.
PSA 37:26 I ubba wode keehatethan immees; coo tal7ees; iya nayti haratas anjo gidana.
PSA 37:27 Iitape haaka; lo77o ootha; ne adussa laythi daana.
PSA 37:28 Goday xillo pirda dosees; ammaneteyisata I yeggenna. Enti merinaw naagetoosona; shin iitata kochay dhayana.
PSA 37:29 Xilloti biitta laattana; yan merinaw daana.
PSA 37:30 Xillo asa doonape cincatethi keyees; iya inxarsay xillo odetees.
PSA 37:31 Xoossa higgey iya wozanan de7ees; iya tohoy dhubetenna.
PSA 37:32 Iita asi xillo asi geeddees; iya wodhanaw koyees.
PSA 37:33 Shin Goday iya kushen aathidi immenna; pirdetanaw eqiya wode iya bolla pirdisenna.
PSA 37:34 Godan ufaysi ootha, iya kiitaa naaga; nena biitta laatisidi gitayana; iita asati dhayishin ne be7ana.
PSA 37:35 Nagaranchoy Libaanose zigada, diccidi dhoqu dhoqu gin ta be7as.
PSA 37:36 Shin ta simmada yan demmabike; koyinka bentibeenna.
PSA 37:37 Borey bayna asi be7a; suure asi akeeka; saro asas wursethay lo77o gidana.
PSA 37:38 Shin nagaranchoti dhayana; enta wursethay dhoommana.
PSA 37:39 Xillota atotethay Godaape yees; I meto wode enti naagetidi attiya besse.
PSA 37:40 Goday xillota maaddees; ashshees; enti iyako baqatida gisho, I enta iitatape ashshees; naagees.
PSA 38:1 Dawiti xaafida qofiso mazmure. Abeeti Godaw, ne sheniyan tana seeropa; ne yiluwan tana hanqofa.
PSA 38:2 Ne donge tooray tana caddis; ne kushey tana deexis.
PSA 38:3 Ne hanqida gisho ta asatethay qohetis; ta nagaraa gaason ta meqethay liiqis.
PSA 38:4 Ta balay tana muukis; dendonna gita toohoda tana deexees.
PSA 38:5 Ta eeyatethan oothida nagara gisho, ta madunthay xinqis.
PSA 38:6 Ta sa7a xeellas; hokas; gallas kumethi azzanashe pee7as.
PSA 38:7 Ta ashoy xuuggees; ta asatethay paxa gidenna.
PSA 38:8 Ta daaburas; liiqas; ta wozanay dirgiya gisho oolas.
PSA 38:9 Abeeti Godaw, ta wozanaa amo ubbaa eraasa; ta ooley neepe geemmibeenna.
PSA 38:10 Ta wozanay dirgees; ta wolqay hitti gis; ta ayfiya poo7oy dhayis.
PSA 38:11 Ta madunthaa gaason ta shoorotinne ta laggeti haakidi eqidosona; ta dabboti taape haakidosona.
PSA 38:12 Tana wodhanaw koyeysati banta xihiya taw yeggoosona. Tana qohanaw koyeysati, “Nu nena demmana” yaagidi, mandoosona; gallas kumethi ta bolla tobboosona.
PSA 38:13 Ta tulle asa mela si7ike; muume asa mela doona pogike.
PSA 38:14 Tuma haythi si7onna asi, inxarsi odidi zaaronna asi gidas.
PSA 38:15 Godaw, ta nena ufaysan naagayis; ta Godaw, Xoossaw ne taw zaaro imma.
PSA 38:16 Taani, “Ta tohoy dhubetin, enti hashshu gaanadanne ta bolla ceeqetanaada oothofa” yaagas.
PSA 38:17 Ta kundana hanayis, ta sakoy tana aggonna ixis.
PSA 38:18 Ta nagara paaxayis; ta naaquwa gaason azzanayis.
PSA 38:19 Ta morketi gitane wolqaama; tana coo ixeysati daro.
PSA 38:20 Taani lo77oba oothin iita zaareysati, ta lo77oba kaalliya gisho taara eqetoosona.
PSA 38:21 Godaw, tana yeggofa; ta Xoossaw, taape haakofa.
PSA 38:22 Tana ashshiya ta Godaw, tana maaddanaw ellesa.
PSA 39:1 Dawiti zammaareta halaqa, Edotaames xaafida mazmure. Taani, “Ta inxarsan nagara oothonna mela, ta ogiya naagana. Iita asati ta de7iya wode, ta doona barana” yaagas.
PSA 39:2 Shin doona muumeda si77i gas; hari attoshin lo77oba odeteysa aggas; shin ta waayey haa daris.
PSA 39:3 Ta wozanay ta gaathan teellis; ta qofay tamada eexis; yaatin ta inxarsan haasaya doomas.
PSA 39:4 Godaw, ta de7uwa wursethaanne ta daanaw attida gallasaa tana bessa; ta de7oy ay mela qantheko tana erisa.
PSA 39:5 Neeni ta laytha takadhada wothadasa; Ta laythay ne sinthan baynaba mela; tuma asi ubbay issi shempo mela. Salaha
PSA 39:6 Tuma asi aadhiya eesho mela; I coo daaburees; shalo shiishees; shin ooni go7etaneko erenna.
PSA 39:7 Godaw, ha77i ta naagey oonee? Taani nenan ufaysi oothayis.
PSA 39:8 Ta bala ubbaafe tana ashsha; eeyatan tana tooshisopa.
PSA 39:9 Hessa ubbaa oothiday nena gidiya gisho taani muumas; doonaka pogabike.
PSA 39:10 Ne xam7a ta bollafe dentha; mino ne kushiya gaason ta daaburas.
PSA 39:11 Ase iya nagaraa gisho seerasa; iya al7o de7uwa bilada wursaasa; tuma asi ubbay issi shempo mela. Salaha
PSA 39:12 Godaw, ta woosa si7a; tana maaddanaw ta waasuwa hayza. Ta afuthaa be7ada si77i goopa; taani ta aawatada bete asinne imathe gidada neera de7ayis.
PSA 39:13 Ta shaaketanapenne baanape sinthe taani ufaytana mela tana agga.
PSA 40:1 Zamaareta halaqaas Dawiti xaafida mazmure. Taani Godaa danda7an naagas; I taako simmidi ta waasuwa si7is.
PSA 40:2 Dhayo ollafe, silimo urqafe tana kessis; ta tohuwa zaalla bolla essis; ta hemethaa minthis.
PSA 40:3 Ta doonan ooratha yethi wothis; hessika nu Xoossay galatetto yaageysa; daroti be7idi yayyana; Godan ammanetana.
PSA 40:4 Godan ammanetiya, otoranchota xeellonnay, wordotara hemetonnay, anjetida asi.
PSA 40:5 Godaw, ta Xoossaw, neeni daro malaalsiyaba oothadasa; neera liketey oonika baawa! Neeni nuus qopida lo77o qofaa, oonika taybanaw danda7onna; Hessi taani odin wuriyaba gidenna.
PSA 40:6 Neeni yarshonne imo koyabaaka; shin nena si7ana mela ta haythaa dooyadasa; xuussa yarshonne nagara yarsho koyabaaka.
PSA 40:7 Hessa gisho taani, “Xaatha maxaafan tabay xaafetidaysada taani yas.
PSA 40:8 Ta Xoossaw, taani ne sheniya oothanaw dosayis; ne higgey ta wozanan de7ees” yaagas.
PSA 40:9 Gita shiiqon, ne xillotetha odana; Godaw neeni ereysada, taani markateysa aggike.
PSA 40:10 Ta ne xillotethaa ta wozanan qosabike; ne ammanetethanne ne ashuwa odas. Ne siiquwanne ne tumatethaa, gita shiiquwan genthabike.
PSA 40:11 Godaw, ne maarotethaa taape haassofa; ne siiqoynne ne tumatethay, tana ubba wode naago.
PSA 40:12 Tayboy bayna iitabay tana teqis; ta balay tana goozis; ta xeellanaw danda7ike Ta nagaray ta huuphe binaanape daris; ta wozanay ta giddon til7is.
PSA 40:13 Godaw, tana ashshanaw ero ga; ta Godaw, tana maaddanaw ellesa.
PSA 40:14 Tana wodhanaw koyeysati yeellato, kawuyo; Ta qohetetha amotteysati kawuyidi guye simmo.
PSA 40:15 Taako, “Iyaw hashshu, hashshu” geysati xoonetidi yeellato.
PSA 40:16 Shin nena koyiya ubbay, nenan ufayto; hashshu go. Ne atotetha dosiya ubbay, “Goday gita” yaago.
PSA 40:17 Taani manqonne metootancho; shin Goday tabaa qopo! Tana maaddey ashshey nena; ta Xoossaw, gam7ofa.
PSA 41:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Dawita Mazmure. Manquwas qopiya asi anjetidaysa; meto gallas Goday iya ashshees.
PSA 41:2 Goday iya naagees, de7on wothees; biitta bolla Goday iya anjees; Goday iya, iya morketa amuwas aathidi immenna.
PSA 41:3 I saketidi hiithan de7ishin Goday maaddees; hargiyafe iya pathees.
PSA 41:4 Taani, “Godaw, ta nena naaqida gisho, tana maara; ta hargiyafe tana patha” yaagas.
PSA 41:5 Ta morketi iitabaa ta bolla haasayidi, “I awude hayqandee? iya sunthay awude dogetandee?” yaagosona.
PSA 41:6 Tana be7anaw yaa oonika wordo odees; ba wozanan tana zigiriyabaa shiishees; kare keyidi ta sunthaa iissees.
PSA 41:7 Tana ixiya ubbay issife tana zigiroosona; iitabay iya gakees gidi qopoosona.
PSA 41:8 “Iya iita hargey oykis; I hiza hiixape dendenna” yaagosona.
PSA 41:9 Hari attoshin ta ammanetiya laggey, taara midaysi taw zoko zaaris.
PSA 41:10 Shin Godaw tana maara; ta entaw kushe zaarana mela, harge hiixape tana dentha.
PSA 41:11 Ta morkey tana xoononna gisho, ne tanan ufaytanaysa ta erayis.
PSA 41:12 Ne tana ta suuretetha gisho katisaasa; ne sinthan tana merinaw wothaasa.
PSA 41:13 Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, merinaape merinaa gakanaw galatetto.
PSA 42:1 Qore Nayta Timirte Akeekan xaafida mazmure Gaari pulto haathi laamoteysada, Xoossaw, ta shempiya nena laamotawusu.
PSA 42:2 “Ta shempiya Xoossaa, de7o Xoossaa be7anaw saamotawusu; awude gakada iya som7uwa be7o” yaagawusu.
PSA 42:3 Asay, “Ne Xoossay awun de7ii?” giya wode, gallasinne qammi taw afuthi kathi gidis.
PSA 42:4 Taani enta ba7aale bonchanaw shiiqida, daro asaa kaalethada, galata yethaninne ililisan xoossa keethi beysa qopiya wode, ta wozanay azzanon meqees.
PSA 42:5 Ta shempe, ayis azzanay? ayis un7etay? Ne Xoossan ufaysi wotha; tana ashshiya, ta Xoossaa taani buroo galatana.
PSA 42:6 Ta wozanay azzanis; hessa gisho taani Yordaanose biittan, Armoona dhoqan, Mizaare zuman, eqada nena qopana.
PSA 42:7 Ne soossuwa guunthan ciimmoy ciimmuwa xeegees; ne beetaynne ne zuley ta bollara aadhis.
PSA 42:8 Goday ba siiquwa gallas taw kiittees; qamma galata yethay taara de7ees; ta de7o Xoossaa woossana.
PSA 42:9 Xoossaa, ta zaallako, “Tana ayis dogadii? Ta morketi tana un7ethin, yeekashe ayis hemeto” yaagana.
PSA 42:10 Ta morketi, “Ne Xoossay awun de7ii?” yaagidi cayiya wode ta meqethay meqees.
PSA 42:11 Ta shempe ayis azzanay? ayis un7etay? Xoossan ufaysi wotha; tana ashshiya, ta Xoossaa ta buroo galatana.
PSA 43:1 Xoossaw taw pirda; nena eronna deretara ta gisho mooteta; Cimmiya iita asatape tana ashsha.
PSA 43:2 Xoossaw, neeni, taani qosetada attiya miixa; ne tana ayis aggadii? Ta morkey tana un7ethin, ayis yeekashe boo?
