PSA 43:3 Ne poo7uwanne ne tumaa taw kiitta; enti tana kaalethidi ne geeshsha deriya, ne de7iya bessaa tana gatho.
PSA 43:4 He wode taani Xoossaa yarsho bessaako; tana ufaysiya Xoossaako baana. Xoossaw ta Godaw, taani diithan nena sabbana.
PSA 43:5 Ta shempe ayis azzanay? ayis un7etay? Xoossan ufaysi wotha; tana ashshiya, ta Xoossaa ta buroo galatana.
PSA 44:1 Qore Nayti Zammare Halaqaas Xaafida Mazmure Akeekan xaafida ginxo Xoossaw, beni wode ne oothidaba nu si7ida; nu aawata wode ne oothidaba nuus odidosona.
PSA 44:2 Kawotethata ne kushen goodda kessadasa; nu aawata enta biittan tokadasa. Hara kawotethata seeradasa; shin nu aawata aakisadasa.
PSA 44:3 Enti banta mashshan olidi he biitta laatibookona; enti banta minotethan xoonibookona. Shin neeni enta dosida gisho, enta ne ushacha kushey, ne qeseynne ne som7uwa poo77oy xoonisis.
PSA 44:4 Yayqooba kochaas xoono kiittiya, ta kawoynne ta Xoossay nena.
PSA 44:5 Nenan gididi nu morketa xoonana; ne sunthan nuna ixeyisata yedhana.
PSA 44:6 Taani ta tooran ammanetike; ta mashshay tana ashshena.
PSA 44:7 Shin ne nuna nu morketape ashshaasa; nuna ixeyisata neeni kawushaasa.
PSA 44:8 Nuuni ubba wode Xoossan ceeqetana; ne sunthaa merinaw galatana. Salaha.
PSA 44:9 Shin ha77i nuna aggadasa; kawushadasa; nu olanchotara issife olas keyaka.
PSA 44:10 Nu morketa sinthafe nuna baqatisadasa; nu ixeysati nuna bonqidosona.
PSA 44:11 Nuna dorsada shuhas aatha immadasa; kawotethata giddon nuna laalladasa.
PSA 44:12 Neeni ne asaa laafa gaten bayzadasa; ay wodheka demmabaaka.
PSA 44:13 Nu shooroti nuna boranaada oothadasa; nu heeran de7eysati nuna qilqisanaadanne nu bolla miicanaada oothadasa.
PSA 44:14 Nuna kawotethata giddon hayses aggadasa; enti banta huuphiya nu bolla qaathana mela oothadasa.
PSA 44:15 Gallas kumethi taani tooshetas; ta som7uwa yeelli kammis.
PSA 44:16 Hessi haniday tana cayeysatanne boreyisata gaasoninne, ta morketanne tana mandeyisata gaasona.
PSA 44:17 Nuuni nena dogonna de7ishin, ne caaquwa menthonna de7ishin, ha ubbay nuna gakis.
PSA 44:18 Nu wozanay nena aggibeenna; nu tohoy ne ogiyape kare keybeenna.
PSA 44:19 Shin neeni nuna mentherethada do7a ollan yeggadasa; sakana dhuman kammadasa.
PSA 44:20 Nu, Xoossaa sunthaa dogidaba gidiyako, hara xoossatako nu kushiya miccidaba gidiyako,
PSA 44:21 Wozana xuuraa Xoossay eriya gisho, I haysa xeellidi demmennee?
PSA 44:22 Gidoshin, ne gisho ubba gallas hayqoos; shukanaw efiya dorsada taybetida.
PSA 44:23 Godaw, denda, Ayis dhiskay? Denda, merinaw nuna aggofa.
PSA 44:24 Ne som7uwa nuupe ayis genthay? Nu qohuwanne nu un7aa ayis dogay?
PSA 44:25 Nuuni baanan yegetida; nu asatethay biittara oyketis.
PSA 44:26 Godaw, denda, nuna maadda; ne siiquwa gisho gada nuna woza.
PSA 45:1 Qore Nayti “Ciishshe” Geetetiya cuudhethan Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafida Mazmure Akeekan xaafida siiqo mazmure. Taani ta yethaa kawas sissana; ta wozanay lo77o qofa pultees; ta inxarsay lo77o xaafiya asa bi7ire mela.
PSA 45:2 Asa ubbaafe neeni mala lo7o; ne mettershay aadho keehatetha qaalan kumis; Xoossay nena merinaw anjis.
PSA 45:3 Wolqaama kawaw, ne mashshaa danca; bonchonne teema ma7a.
PSA 45:4 Ne tumatethaa, ne aadatethanne ne xillotetha gisho, ne teema ma7ada xoonanaw denda; ne ushacha kushey malaalsiyaba besso.
PSA 45:5 Ne toorati qara; enti kawa morketa wozanaa caddo; kawotethati ne tohuwa garsan kundo.
PSA 45:6 Xoossaw, ne araatay merinaw de7ees; ne kawotethaa xam7ay xillotetha xam7aa.
PSA 45:7 Neeni xillotethi dosada geellatethi ixaasa; Hessa gisho, Xoossay, ne Xoossay, ne laggetape aathidi, nena ufaysa zayten tiyis.
PSA 45:8 Godare uuthan, karbeninne burguden walaketida shitton, ne ma7oy puuketis. Dangarsa zaalen alleeqetida, ne kawo gadhon diixetiya diithay nena ufaysees.
PSA 45:9 Kawo keethan de7iya maccasata giddon; kawota macca nayti de7oosona. Kawiya Ofira worqan alleeqetada, neepe ushacha baggan eqasu.
PSA 45:10 Ta naatte, si7a; wozanan wotha; ne haytha haa zaara; ne deriyanne ne aawa keethaa doga.
PSA 45:11 Kawoy ne malan ufaytis; ne godaa gidiya gisho iya boncha.
PSA 45:12 Xiroosa asay new woyto ekidi yaana; dureti nena aaddashana.
PSA 45:13 Kawa na7iya, kawo keethan waanna lo77ay! I yaagano ma7oy worqan alleeqetis.
PSA 45:14 Ba alleeqo ma7uwa ma7ada, kawako moyzetasu. I geela7o laggeti iyo kaallidi, iya sinthe ekidi yidosona.
PSA 45:15 Enti ufaytishe yidi, kawo gadho geloosona.
PSA 45:16 Kawaw, ne aawata bessaa ne nayti laattana; biitta ubban ne enta shuumana.
PSA 45:17 Ta ne sunthaa yeleta ubban, hassayetanaada oothana. Hessa gisho, asay merinaw nena galatana.
PSA 46:1 Qore Nayti Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafida Mazmure “Geela7o nayta yethi” geetetiya cuudhethan yexetida mazmure. Xoossay nu qosetidi attiya, bessenne nu wolqaa. Nuna metoy gakiya wode, I nuna maaddanaw ubba wode nu matan de7ees.
PSA 46:2 Hessa gisho, biittay qaaxiyakoka, dereti abban kundiyakoka, nuuni yayyoko.
PSA 46:3 Abbay guummidi gopontikoka, iya wolqaama zuliyan dereti kokoriyakoka, nuuni dagammoko. Salaha.
PSA 46:4 Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossay de7iya, Xoossaa katamaa, geeshsha bessaa, ufaysiya issi shaafi de7ees.
PSA 46:5 Xoossay iya giddon de7iya gisho, he katamay qaaxenna; wonta guura Xoossay iya maaddana.
PSA 46:6 Derey dagammis; kawotethati qaaxoosona; Xoossay ba qaala sissis; biittay til7is.
PSA 46:7 Ubbaafe wolqaama Goday nuura de7ees; Yayqooba Xoossay nu qosetidi attiya besse. Salaha
PSA 46:8 Haa yiite; Godaa oosuwa xeellite; biitta waatidi dhaysidaako be7ite.
PSA 46:9 I biitta bolla de7iya olaa ubbaa teqees; dongenne toora menthees; gondalliya taman xuuggees.
PSA 46:10 Wopu giite; taani Xoosse gideysa erite; taani kawotethata giddon dhoqu dhoqu gaana; biitta bollaka dhoqu dhoqu gaana.
PSA 46:11 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday nuura de7ees; Yayqooba Xoossay nu qosetidi attiya besse. Salaha.
PSA 47:1 Qore Nayta Mazmure Dere ubbay hinte kushiya baqite; qaala dhoqu oothidi Xoossaa galatite.
PSA 47:2 Ubbaafe dhoqa Goday waani yashshii? biitta ubban I gita kawo.
PSA 47:3 Dereta nuupe garsara, kawotethata nu tohuwape garsan haarisees.
PSA 47:4 I nuus laata biitta dooris; I dosiya Yayqoobi he biittan ceeqetees. Salaha.
PSA 47:5 Xoossay ufaysaninne ililsan pude dendis, Goday moyze punon ba araatan keyis.
PSA 47:6 Xoossaas zammarit; ee, iyaw zammarit; iyaw kawas zammarit; ee, iyaw zammarit.
PSA 47:7 Xoossay biitta ubbaa kawo gidiya gisho, galatan sabbite.
PSA 47:8 Xoossay ba geeshsha araatan uttis, Xoossay kawotethata haarees.
PSA 47:9 Kawotethata halaqati, Abrahaame Xoossaa asaara shiiqoosona. Biittan de7iya wolqaama ubbay Xoossaba gidiya gisho I ubbaafe dhoqu dhoqu gis.
PSA 48:1 Qore Nayta Mazmure Goday gita; nu Xoossaa kataman iya geeshsha zumaa bolla gita galati iyaw bessees.
PSA 48:2 Biitta ubbaa ufaysi gidida, pudeha baggara de7iya Xiyoone derey, dhoqanne lo77o; I gita kawa katama.
PSA 48:3 Xoossay he gimbiya giddona; ika iyaw geshe gideysa erisis.
PSA 48:4 Kawoti banta tooranchotara shiiqidosona; Xiyoone olanaw yidosona.
PSA 48:5 Iya be7idi dagammidosona; guye simmidi baqatidosona.
PSA 48:6 Enti yan de7ishe yashshan kokoridosona; iqethi oykida maccasada inxaxidosona.
PSA 48:7 Doloha bagga wolqaama carkon meqiya Tarsesa markabeta mela gididosona.
PSA 48:8 Nu si7idaysada, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa kataman, nu Xoossaa kataman I oothidaba be7ida; Xoossay he katamaa merinaw minthidi naagees. Salaha
PSA 48:9 Abeeti Xoossaw, ne keethan merinaa ne siiquwa qopoos.
PSA 48:10 Abeeti Xoossaw, ne sunthada ne galatay sa7aa gaxaa gakis; ne ushacha kushey xillotethan kumidaysa.
PSA 48:11 Ne pirdaa gaason Xiyoone asay ufayto; Yihuda kumethay ufaysan ililo.
PSA 48:12 Xiyoone yuushuwan hemetite; I dirsa yuuyite; I shakota taybite.
PSA 48:13 Yaa yeletas odana mela iya gimbiya akeekite; miixata wochite.
PSA 48:14 Hinte, “Merinaw Xoossay nu Xoossaa; I nuna hayqana gakanaw kaalethana” yaagidi odite.
PSA 49:1 Qore Nayti Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafida Mazmure. Asa ubbay haysa si7ite; biitta bolla de7eysato, ubbay haysa hayzite.
PSA 49:2 Dhoqay ziqay, durey manqoy si7ite.
PSA 49:3 Ta wozanaa qofay akeeka immees; ta doonay cincatetha qaala odetees.
PSA 49:4 Ta haythaa leemisoko zaarana; diithi diixashe, ta qan7ishiya birshana.
PSA 49:5 Meto gallasay yaa wodenne cimmiya morketi; tana teqiya wode ta ayis babbayna?
PSA 49:6 Banta shaluwan ammaneteysatanne banta duretethan ceeqetiya ta morketa ayis babbayna?
PSA 49:7 Ay asika bana wozanaw, woyko ba shempuwa gatiya Xoossas qanxanaw danda7enna.
PSA 49:8 Asa shempo gatey daro al7o; Ay gate qanxinka gidenna.
PSA 49:9 I hayqonnaadanne duufo gelonnaada, woyko I hayqonnaada oothanaw gakenna.
PSA 49:10 Eeyatinne pathonna asati hayqeysada, cincati banta shaluwa haratas yeggidi beysa asa ubbay be7ees.
PSA 49:11 Enti banta biitta bantaba giikoka, duufoy merinaw entaw keethe gidana.
PSA 49:12 Asi ay gitatikoka ba gitatethaara kanthenna; I do7ada hayqees.
PSA 49:13 Bantarka banta huuphen ammaneteyisata qaadaynne enti gidaba tuma giya eeyata wursethay haysa. Salaha
PSA 49:14 Shukas giigetida dorsatada, hayqoy enta duufo kaalethees. Suureti enta duufuwa bollara hemetana; enta asatethay duufon wooqana; keethafe keyidi haakidi si7oolen attana.
PSA 49:15 Shin Xoossay ta shempuwa wozana; I tana hayqo wolqafe ashshana. Salaha
PSA 49:16 Asi duretiya wodenne iya bonchoy dariya wode yayyofa.
PSA 49:17 I hayqiya wode aykoka ekidi beenna; iya shaloy iyara issife duufo gelenna.
PSA 49:18 Asi paxa de7iya wode taw kumis giiko, ubbabay iyaw injetida gisho galatetikoka,
PSA 49:19 simmidi poo7o be7onna, ba mayzatan gahetees.
PSA 49:20 Eratethi bayna duretida asi do7ada coo dhayana.
PSA 50:1 Asaafa Mazmure Wolqaama Goday, Xoossay odees; dolohape wuloha gakanaw biitta ubbaa xeegees.
PSA 50:2 Medhon polo yegelsi gidida Xiyoonepe Xoossay poo7ees.
PSA 50:3 Nu Xoossay yaana; si77i geenna; eexiya tamay iya sinthana; wolqaama gotey iya yuushuwana.
PSA 50:4 Xoossay ba asaa pirdiya wode, salotanne sa7aa xeegees.
PSA 50:5 “Yarshon taara caaqida, ta geeshshata taako shiishite” yaagis.
PSA 50:6 Xoossay pirdiya gisho, saloti iya xillotethaa awaajosona. Salaha
PSA 50:7 “Ta asaw, si7ite; ta hintew odayis; Isra7eele asaw, ta ne bolla markatana; taani Xoossay, ne Xoossaa.
PSA 50:8 Ne yarshuwa gishonne ne xuussa yarshuwa gisho, nena borike.
PSA 50:9 Ne daraape kormata, ne girbiyafe kole ekanaw koyke.
PSA 50:10 Woran de7iya do7ati ubbay tabaa; mukulu zumaa bolla de7iya mehetika taassa.
PSA 50:11 Taani dhoqa deriyan de7iya kafota ubbaa erayis; denban de7iya medhetethati tayisata.
PSA 50:12 Tana koshaykoka nena oychike; sa7inne sa7an kumidaba ubbay tabaa.
PSA 50:13 Taani kormata ashuwa maynayee? woyko deeshata suuthaa uyanayee?
PSA 50:14 Xoossas galata yarsho imma; Ubbaafe dhoqa Xoossaas ne qangetha gatha.
PSA 50:15 Meto gallas tana xeega; ta nena ashshana; neka tana bonchana” yaagees.
PSA 50:16 Shin Xoossay iita asaa haysada yaagees; “Ta higgiya ne nabbabanaw new ay maati de7ii? Woyko ta caaquwa ne doonan qoncisanaw new ay maati de7ii?
PSA 50:17 Neeni ta timirtiya ixadasa; ta qaala guye yeggadasa.
PSA 50:18 Kaysuwa be7ida wode neeni iyara dabbotadasa; laymateyisata maabaran geladasa.
PSA 50:19 Ne doona iitabaa odetanaw billa yeddadasa; Ne inxarsay wordo haasaya meezetis.
PSA 50:20 Uttada ne ishaa zigiradasa; ne aaye na7aa bolla iitaba odetadasa.
PSA 50:21 Ne haysa ubbaa oothiya wode, taani si77i gida gisho tana ne mela gada qopadasa. Shin ha77i ta nena hanqana; ne nagaraa ne sinthan taybana.
PSA 50:22 Hinteno, Xoossaa dogeysato, haysa akeekite; hessi hanonna ixiko ta hintena mentherethana; he wode hintena ashshanay baawa.
PSA 50:23 Taw galata yarshey tana bonchees; ba ogiya suurisida asas taani Xoossaa atotetha bessaana” yaagees.
PSA 51:1 Dawiti zammaareta halaqaas xaafida mazmure Dawiti Barsaabera laymatida wode nabiya Naatani iyaw odi simmin Dawiti yexida mazmure. Abeeti Xoossaw, ne merinaa siiquwada tana maara; ne qadheta daruwa mela ta nagaraa qucha.
PSA 51:2 Ta iitatethaafe tana meecca; ta nagaraape tana geeshsha.
PSA 51:3 Taani ta qohuwa erayis; ta nagaray ubba wode ta sinthana.
PSA 51:4 Taani nena, ne xalaala qohas; ne sinthan iitabaa oothas. Hessa gisho, ne hanquwan ne like; ne pirdanka ne xillo.
PSA 51:5 Heko ta yeletiya wode nagarancho; ta aaye ulon buroo attiya, wodepe doomada taani nagarancho.
PSA 51:6 Neeni asa wozanape tumatethi koyaasa; ta gaatha asatethaa cincatethi tamaarsa.
PSA 51:7 Hisoophe boncon tana wurxa; ta geeyana; tana meecca; ta shachafe aadhada booxana.
PSA 51:8 Ne tana ufaysinne lo77oba sissa; ne mentherethida ta meqethaa zaarada ufaysa.
PSA 51:9 Ne som7uwa ta nagaraape hara soo zaara; ta bala ubbaa qucha.
PSA 51:10 Abeeti Xoossaw, geeshsha wozana tanan medha; qaaxonna ayyaana ta giddon ooratha.
PSA 51:11 Tana ne sinthafe yeggofa; ne Geeshsha Ayyaana taape ekofa.
PSA 51:12 Ne atotetha ufaysaa taw zaara; ta new kiitetana mela tana zempisa.
PSA 51:13 Ta he wode higge mentheyisata ne ogiya tamaarsana; nagaranchotika neeko simmana.
PSA 51:14 Abeeti Xoossaw, tana ashshiya Xoossaw, suuthu gussiya nagarape tana ashsha; he wode ta inxarsay ne xillotetha yexana.
PSA 51:15 Abeeti Godaw, ta doona dooya; ta inxarsay ne galataa awaajana.
PSA 51:16 Ne yarshon ufaytiyako, ta new yarshanashin, ne xuussa yarshon ufaytaka.
PSA 51:17 Xoossaa yarshoy aada ayyaana; Xoossaw, ne meqidanne kawuyida wozanaa kadhaka.
PSA 51:18 Abeeti Xoossaw, dosan Xiyoones keeha; Yerusalaame gimbeta gimba.
PSA 51:19 He wode ne xillotetha yarshoninne xuussa yarshon ufaytana. pollo shiqiaya mehe yarshon ne ufaytana; kormati ne yarsho bessan yarishetana.
PSA 52:1 Dawiti Zammaareta Halaqaas Akeekan xaafida Ginxo Edoome biitta asi gidida Doyqi Saa7olako bidi, “Dawiti Abimeleke soo bis” yaagidi odi simmin, Dawiti xaafida mazmure. Neno, wolqaama uraw, iitatethan ayis otortay? neno Xoossan kadhetidayso ubba wode ayis ceeqetay?
PSA 52:2 Neno, wordo odeteyso, ne harata dhaysanaw maqetaasa; ne inxarsay qara maqla mela.
PSA 52:3 Ne lo77o aggada iita dosaasa; tuma aggada wordo odetaasa. Salaha
PSA 52:4 Neno, wordanchuwaw, ne bosha qaala ubbaa dosaasa.
PSA 52:5 Xoossay nena merinaw menthana; Xoossay nena mentherethananne ne keethaafe dafidi kessana; nena de7on de7eyisata giddofe shoddidi yeggana. Salaha
PSA 52:6 Xilloti hessa be7idi yayyana; enti haysada yaagidi, ne bolla miicana;
PSA 52:7 “Xoossaa baw geshe oothiboonna, ba duretethan ammanetida, iita ooson minnida, addiya haysa be7ite” yaagana.
PSA 52:8 Shin taani Xoossaa keethan aaciya shamaho mela; iya siiquwan taani merinaw ammanetayis.
PSA 52:9 Ne oothida gisho merinaw ta nena galatana; neeni lo77o gidiya gisho ne sunthan ufaysi oothana; geeshshata sinthan ta nena sabbana.
PSA 53:1 Dawiti Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafida Timirte Akeekan xaafetida ginxo Eeyati banta wozanan, “Xoossi baawa” yaagosona; enta de7oy iitis; enti tunabaa oothosona; lo77oba oothiya asi issoyka baawa.
PSA 53:2 Xoossaa koyiya cinca asi de7iyako be7anaw, Goday salope asaa xeellees.
PSA 53:3 Enti ubbay Xoossaafe haakidosona; ubbay issife tunidosona. Lo77o oothiya asi deenna; hari attoshin issi asika baawa.
PSA 53:4 Asi kathi meysada ta asaa meysati, ha iita oothiya asati erokona? enti Xoossaa xeegokona?
PSA 53:5 Enti dagammi eronna dagama dagammana; Xoossay ba asaa morketa meqethaa laallana; Xoossay enta kadhida gisho enti yeellatana.
PSA 53:6 Isra7eele atotethay Xiyoonepe yeerenne! Xoossay ba asaa di7uwa zaariya wode, Yayqooba zareti ufayto; Isra7eele asay ufaysan hashshu go.
PSA 54:1 Dawiti Zammaareta Halaqaas Diithan Yexida Akeeka Ginxo Ziifa asati Saa7olako bidi, “Dawiti nu biittan qosetis” yaagidi odin, Dawiti xaafida mazmure Abeeti Xoossaw, ne sunthan tana ashsha; ne wolqan taw pirda.
PSA 54:2 Abeeti Xoossaw, ta woosa si7a; ta doona qaala hayza.
PSA 54:3 Allaga asati ta bolla dendidosona; daganthiya asati tana wodhanaw koyoosona; enti Xoossaa qopokona. Salaha
PSA 54:4 Xoossay taw maade; Goday taw zempo.
PSA 54:5 Abeeti Xoossaw, ta morketa iitatethaa enta bolla zaara; ne tumatethaa gisho enta dhaysa.
PSA 54:6 Abeeti Godaw, taani ta dosan new yarshana; ne keeha gidiya gisho ne sunthaa galatana.
PSA 54:7 Ne tana, ta meto ubbaafe ashshadasa; ta morketa xoonetethaa ta ayfen be7as.
PSA 55:1 Dawiti Zammaareta Halaqaas Diithan Yexida Akeeka Mazmure. Abeeti Xoossaw, ta woosa si7a; ta magannuwa qelli goopa.
PSA 55:2 Tana si7a; ta woosaas zaaro imma; ta qofay tana waaysin, ta un7etas.
PSA 55:3 Ta morketa girsa si7ada dagammas; iitata mandiya gaason kokoras. Enti ta bolla meto ehoosona; yilon dendidi tana morkoosona.
PSA 55:4 Ta wozanay dirgees; hayqo hirgay tana wodhees.
PSA 55:5 Tana yashshinne kokorsi oykis; iita dagami ta bolla wodhis.
PSA 55:6 Holleda taw qefey de7iyako, paallada shempoy de7iya bessi gakanashin.
PSA 55:7 Taani haakada baanashin; bazzon aqanashin. Salaha
PSA 55:8 Taani gotepenne carkofe baqatada, ta qosetiya bessi demmanashin.
PSA 55:9 Abeeti Godaw, katamaa giddon ooshshinne gene be7ida gisho iitata odaa laalla.
PSA 55:10 Iitati gallasinne qamma katamaa gimbe dirsaa yuuyosona; waayeynne metoy katamaa giddon de7ees.
PSA 55:11 Dhayoy iya giddon de7ees; naaqoynne cimoy iya dabaabape shaaketenna.
PSA 55:12 Tana cayey ta morkiya gidenna; iya gidiyako ta danda7anashin. Ta bolla ceeqetey tana ixeysa gidenna; iya gidiyako ta iyape qosetanashin.
PSA 55:13 Shin hessa oothey nena, ta laggiya; ta dabbuwanne ta siiquwa.
PSA 55:14 Nu issoy issuwara ulo oda odetida; Xoossa keethan dabaaban asaara issife simeretida.
PSA 55:15 Enta wozanan iitatethi de7iya gisho, ta morketi qoponna hayqo; enti paxa de7ishe duufo gelo.
PSA 55:16 Shin taani Xoossaa xeegana; Goday tana ashshana.
PSA 55:17 Wonta, gallasinne omarsi waassana; ta metuwa iyaw odana; I tana si7ana.
PSA 55:18 Daroti tana morkikoka, I tana toorape ashshees.
PSA 55:19 Benipe ba araatan uttida Xoossay, banta ogiya laammonna gishonne iyaw yayyonna gisho tana si7idi enta kawushana. Salaha
PSA 55:20 Ta laggey ba dabbota qohis; entara caaqida caaquwa menthis.
PSA 55:21 Iya doonay oysape liiqo; shin ba wozanan ola denthees. Iya inxarsay zaytepe aadhida shugo; shin qanxanaw giigida qara mashsha mela.
PSA 55:22 Ne toohuwa Xoossa bolla yegga; I nena katisana. Xoossay xilloti, dagammana mela oothenna.
PSA 55:23 Shin Abeeti Xoossaw, iita asata wolqaama ollan holana. Suuthu gusseysatinne cimmeysati, banta laythaafe baggaaka de7okona; shin taani nenan ammanetana.
PSA 56:1 Filisxeeme Asay Geete Kataman Dawita Oykida Wode Dawiti Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafida Woosa. “Haaho bessan wola bolla uttida hollees” geetetiya diitha cuudhethan yexetida woosa. Abeeti Xoossaw, asay tana un7ethiya gishonne ubba wode ta morketi tana yedethiya gisho taw qadheta.
PSA 56:2 Ta morketi kumetha gallas tana yedhoosona; otoron tana oliya asay daro.
PSA 56:3 Tana yashshiya wode ta nenan ammanetayis.
PSA 56:4 Taani Xoossan ammanetayis; yayyike; iya qaala galatiya Xoossan ammanetayis; asi tana ay oothanee?
PSA 56:5 Kumetha gallasan ta morketi bala koyoosona; tana qohanaw ubba wode tobboosona.
PSA 56:6 Enti ta bolla maqetoosona; tana qohanaw geeddosona. Ta tango ubba kaalloosona; tana wodhanaw koyoosona.
PSA 56:7 Enti ay ogeraka kessi ekana mela oothofa; ne hanquwan he kawotethata kawusha.
PSA 56:8 Ta waayiya tayba; ne ta afuthaa makadasa; enti ne mazgabiyan de7okona?
PSA 56:9 Ta nena xeegiya wode, ta morketi guye simmana; Xoossay ta bagga gideysa ta hessan erayis.
PSA 56:10 Ta iya qaala galatiya Xoossan, ta iya qaala galatiya Godan,
PSA 56:11 ta he Xoossan ammanetayis; yayyike. asi tana ay oothannee?
PSA 56:12 Abeeti Xoossaw ta new qangidabay de7ees; hessa galataa yarsho oothada ta new immana.
PSA 56:13 De7on de7eyisata bolla poo7iya poo7uwan Xoossaa sinthan simeretana mela, ta shempuwa hayqope, ta tohuwa dhubepe ashshadasa.
PSA 57:1 Dawiti Saa7olape baqatidi Gongolon Qosetida Wode Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafida Woosa “Dhaysofa” geetetiya diitha cuudhethan yexetida woosa. Tana maara; abeeti Xoossaw, tana maara; ta neeko baqatayis. Dhayoy aadhana gakanaw, ne qefiya garsan qosetayis.
PSA 57:2 Taani Ubbaafe dhoqa Xoossako, ba qofaatho oothiya Xoossako waassayis.
PSA 57:3 Xoossay salope maado kiittidi tana ashshana; tana yedheyisata kawushana; Xoossay ba siiquwanne ba ammanetetha taw kiittana. Salaha
PSA 57:4 Taani ta morketape giddon, ase miya gaammotape giddon de7ayis. Enta achay tooranne donge toora mela; enta inxarsay qara mashsha mela.
PSA 57:5 Abeeti Xoossaw, ne salope aadhada dhoqu dhoqu ga; ne bonchoy sa7a ubbaa kammo.
PSA 57:6 Enti ta tohuwas xihe wothidosona; taani un7etada hokas. Enti ta ogiyan olla bookidosona; shin he ollan bantaw kundidosona. Salaha
PSA 57:7 Ta wozanay mino; abeeti Xoossaw, ta wozanay mino; taani nena mazmuren sabbana.
PSA 57:8 Ta shempe, barka; diithinne maasinqoy dendite; taani guura barkana.
PSA 57:9 Abeeti Godaw, ta nena asaa giddon galatana; kawotethata giddon nena sabbana.
PSA 57:10 Ne siiqoy salotape dhoqa; ne ammanetethay shaarape bolla.
PSA 57:11 Abeeti Xoossaw, ne salope aadhada dhoqu dhoqu ga; ne bonchoy sa7a ubbaa kammo.
PSA 58:1 Dawiti Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafida Woosa “Dhaysofa” geetetiya diitha cuudhethan yexetida woosa. Deriya haareysato, tuma hinte like odeteetii? Asa ubbaas xillo pirdeetii?
PSA 58:2 Gidenna, hinte wozanan iitabaa halcheeta; hinte kushey biitta bolla geellaba oothees.
PSA 58:3 Iita asi aaye ulope doomidi halees; yeletida gallasape doomidi, baleesinne wordo odetees.
PSA 58:4 Enti shooshada yiishshara de7oosona; enti tulle gopeda si7okona.
PSA 58:5 Biteysi ay cinca gidikoka, Gopey iya xeessi si7enna.
PSA 58:6 Abeeti Xoossaw, gaammo achi daaniya enta achaa mentha; Godaw enta sakiliya dhuka.
PSA 58:7 Enti gukida haathi gido; banta dongiya dukiya wode, donge toora ayfey dhayo.
PSA 58:8 Enti maaydi dhayiya dhaadhe saassoda hano; aaye ulope hayqidi wodhiya, awa poo7o be7onna boshada hano.
PSA 58:9 Enti agunthi gididi daayanape kase, enti buroo puuto gididi de7ishin, enta ba hanquwan dhaysana.
PSA 58:10 Nagaranchota bolla halo keyiya wode xilloti ufaytana; iitata suuthan banta tohuwa meecetana.
PSA 58:11 He wode asay, “Tuma xillotas woytoy de7ees; sa7a bolla pirdiya Xoossi de7ees” yaagana.
PSA 59:1 Dawita wodhanaw iya keetha naagana mela Saa7oli ase kiittin, Dawiti zammaareta halaqaas xaafida woosa “Dhaysofa” geetetiya diitha cuudhethan yexetida woosa. Abeeti ta Xoossaw, ta morketape tana ashsha; ta bolla dendeysatape tana naaga.
PSA 59:2 Iita ootheysatape tana ashsha; suuthu gussiya asatape tana ashsha.
PSA 59:3 Abeeti Godaw, enti tana wodhanaw zugidi naageysa be7a. Abeeti Godaw, ta naaquwa gisho woyko ta nagaraa gisho gidonashin coo ta bolla tobboosona.
PSA 59:4 Ta ay balaka oothonna tana qohanaw giigidosona; hessa be7a; tana maaddanaw denda.
PSA 59:5 Abeeti Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaw, Godaw, Isra7eele Xoossaw, kawotethata ubbaa pirdanaw barka; iita ootheyisata maaropa. Salaha
PSA 59:6 Enti katamaa giddon yuuyishe pee7idi, kanatho laawishe simmoosona.
PSA 59:7 Enta doonape keyeysa be7a; enta inxarsay mashsha mela; asi entana si7eysa qopokona.
PSA 59:8 Shin abeeti Godaw, ne enta bolla miicaasa; kawotethata ubbaa leqisaasa.
PSA 59:9 Xoossaw, ne ta miixaa gidiya gisho, ta ne wolqan ammanetayis.
PSA 59:10 Ta Xoossay ba siiquwan taako yaana; ta Xoossay ta morketa xoonetethaa tana bessaana.
PSA 59:11 Ta asati dogonna mela ne enta wodhopa. Abeeti Godaw, nu gondalliyaw, ne wolqan enta laallanne kawusha.
PSA 59:12 Enta doonape keyiya nagaraa gisho enta inxarsaafe pultiya qaala gisho, banta otoruwan oyketo; enta baadethanne worduwa gisho,
PSA 59:13 ne hanquwan enta dhaysa; enta kumethi digga. Hessan Xoossay Yayqooba zeretha haareysanne sa7aa gaxaa gakanaw haareysi eretana. Salaha
PSA 59:14 Enti katamaa giddon yuuyishe pee7idi, kanatho laawishe simmoosona.
PSA 59:15 Enti miyaba demmanaw toylatoosona; kallona attida laawiya kana gidoosona.
PSA 59:16 Shin taani ne wolqaa sabbana; wonta ne siiquwa yexana. Neeni taw ta waayiya gallas, ta baqata attiya bessenne miixa.
PSA 59:17 Abeeti taw wolqa gidida Xoossaw, ta nena sabbana. Ta qosetada attiya bessaynne siiquwa tana bessiya Xoossay nena.
PSA 60:1 Masephexoomeninne Soobalan de7ida Araame asaara oletida wodenne Iyo7aabi guye simmidi Maxine zangaaran tammanne nam7u mukulu Edoome asaa wodhida wode Dawiti zammaareta halaqaas xaafida woosa “Ciishsha cuudhethe” geetetiya markatetha woosa. Abeeti Xoossaw, ne nuna aggadasa; nuna mentherthadasa. Ne nuna hanqetadasa; shin ha77i nuna zaara; mintha essa.
PSA 60:2 Ne biitta qaathadasanne za7isadasa; biittay kokoriya gisho, ne iya za7uwa kuntha.
PSA 60:3 Neeni ne asaa meto bessadasa; nuna gandigarsiya woyne ushshadasa.
PSA 60:4 New yayyeysati banta morke dongefe attana mela malla immadasa. Salaha
PSA 60:5 Ne siiqeysati attana mela, ne ushacha kushen nuna ashsha; nuna alla.
PSA 60:6 Xoossay ba geeshsha bessan haysada yaagis; “Taani xoonada Seekema biitta shaakana; Sukota zangaara wadhana.
PSA 60:7 Galadi tabaa; Minaaseyka taassa; Efreemey ta huuphe ashshiya birata qoobe; Yihudi ta kawota xam7aa.
PSA 60:8 Moo7abey ta meecetiya kere; Edoomey tabaa gideysa erisanaw, ta caammaa iya bolla wothayis; taani Filisxeeme xoonada gereerayis” yaagis.
PSA 60:9 Gimbetida katamaako tana oone efanay? Edoome gakanaw tana oone kaalethanay?
PSA 60:10 Abeeti Xoossaw, nuna aggiday nena gidikii? Abeeti Xoossaw neeni nu olanchotara olas keyaka.
PSA 60:11 Asa maadoy pathonna gisho, morketara oletanaw ne nuna maadda.
PSA 60:12 Xoossaa wolqan nu morketa xoonana; I nu morketa yedhana.
PSA 61:1 Dawita Mazmure. Abeeti Xoossaw, ne ta woosa si7a; ta woosa hayza.
PSA 61:2 Taani biitta gaxan de7ishin, ta wozanay ufaysi qanxida wode, ta nena xeegayis. Taape dhoqa zaallako, tana kaaletha.
PSA 61:3 Ne taw qotanne ta morketape naagetiya mino miixa.
PSA 61:4 Taani ne dunkaaniyan merinaw darkinaashin! Taani ne qefiya hapha garsan saro attarkinaashin! Salaha
PSA 61:5 Abeeti Xoossaw, ne ta qangetha si7adasa; ne suntha yayyeysatara issife taw laata immadasa.
PSA 61:6 Kawa laytha adussa; I yeletethaafe yeletethaa gakanaw de7o.
PSA 61:7 I Xoossaa sinthan merinaw kawoto; ne siiquwaninne ne tuman iya naaga.
PSA 61:8 Hessa gisho ta qangetha gallas gallas gathana; ne sunthaa ubba wode sabbana.
PSA 62:1 Dawiti Zammaareta Halaqa Edotaames Xaafida Mazmure. Xoossaa xalaalan ta shempo demmas; ta atotethay iyape yees.
PSA 62:2 Iya xalaali ta zaallanne ta atotetha; I ta qosetiya attiya bessi gidiya gisho dagammike.
PSA 62:3 Woddana haniya godaanne qaaxiya dirsi daaniya uraa wodhanaw, hinte awude gakanaw dendetii?
PSA 62:4 Enti iya boncho bessaafe denthanaw koyoosona; enti wordon ufaytoosona. Banta doonan anjoosona; shin banta wozanan baaddoosona. Salaha
PSA 62:5 Ta shempete! Xoossaa xalaala si77i gada naaga; ta ufaysay iyape yees.
PSA 62:6 Iya xalaali ta zaallanne ta atotetha; taani qosetiya bessi gidiya gisho dagammike.
PSA 62:7 Ta atotethaynne ta bonchoy Xoossana; I ta mino zaallanne ta miixaa.
PSA 62:8 Asaw, ubba wode Xoossan ammanetite; I hintew geshe gidiya gisho, hinte qofaa iyaw odite. Salaha
PSA 62:9 Asi, issi toho shempiya carko mela; gooba asi ubbay maaddonna hada. Mizaanen wothin enti carko mela; enti issi toho shempiya carkofe kawuyoosona.
PSA 62:10 Bonqen ammanetofite; kaysoti shiishidi duretethan otortofite. Hinte duretethay darikoka, hinte wozana iya bolla wothofite.
PSA 62:11 Xoossay issi toho odis; taani nam7u oda si7as; wolqi xoossasa.
PSA 62:12 Merinaa siiqoy Xoossaba; Abeeti Godaw, ne asa ubbaas iya oosuwada oosuwada immana.
PSA 63:1 Yihuda Mela Biittan De7iya Wode Dawita Mazmure. Abeeti Xoossaw, ne ta Xoossaa; ta wozanay nena laamotees; ta ashoyka nena amottees. Haathi dhayidi phalqetida biittada, ta asatethay nena saamotees.
PSA 63:2 Ta nena geeshsha bessan xeellas; ne wolqaanne ne bonchuwa taani be7as.
PSA 63:3 Ne siiqoy de7ope lo77iya gisho, ta inxarsay nena bonchana.
PSA 63:4 Ta de7o laythan nena galatana; ne sunthan ta kushiya pude miccana.
PSA 63:5 Asi lo77o kathi midi kalleysada ta nenan kallana. Taani ta inxarsan ufaysa yethan nena galatana.
PSA 63:6 Taani ta hiixan nena hassayayis; qamma kumethan nebaa qopayis;
PSA 63:7 Ne tana maaddiya gisho, Ta ne qefiya kuyan uttada ufaysan yexana.
PSA 63:8 Ta shempiya neera oyketasu; ne ushacha kushey tana oykidi naagees.
PSA 63:9 Shin tana wodhanaw koyeysati, biitta garsan moogetana.
PSA 63:10 Enti mashshas aadhidi imetana; enti suudhumes kaho gidana.
PSA 63:11 Shin kawoy Xoossan ufaytana. Xoossaa sunthan caaqiya ubbay iya galatana; shin wordanchota doonay gordetana.
PSA 64:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas yexetida Dawita Mazmure. Abeeti Xoossaw, ta un7a woosa si7a; ta morketa mandethafe; tana ashsha.
PSA 64:2 Nagaranchota maqofenne iitata duulataape tana gentha.
PSA 64:3 Enti banta inxarsaa mashsha mela leefidosona; iita qaalata donge toorada mallidi yeddoosona.
PSA 64:4 Enti qosetidi xillo asi banta dongiyan qohoosona; akeeki bayna dukoosona; yayyokona.
PSA 64:5 Enti banta iita maquwas issoy issuwa minthethoosona. Banta xihiya wothana bessa koyoosona; enti, “Nuna ooni be7anee?” yaagosona.
PSA 64:6 Enti iitabaa maqetishe, “Nuuni lo77o maqo maqetida” yaagosona; Hessi asa wozana qofi ciimmo gideysa bessees.
PSA 64:7 Shin Xoossay enta ba dongiyan dukana; enti akeekona madunxana.
PSA 64:8 Enta maquwa I enta bolla zaarana; enta be7iya ubbay huuphe qaathana.
PSA 64:9 He wode asa ubbay Xoossas yayyana; iya oosuwa odananne zaari zaari qopana.
PSA 64:10 Xilloti Godan ufayto; iyako baqatidi atto; wozana suureti ubbay iya galato.
PSA 65:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Yexetida Dawita Mazmure. Abeeti Xoossaw, Xiyoonen new galati bessees; nuuni nu qangetha new gathana.
PSA 65:2 Neeni woosa si7iya gisho, asa ubbay neeko yoosona.
PSA 65:3 Nu nagaray nuna muukida wode, ne nuus atotethi immadasa.
PSA 65:4 Ne dooridaysatinne ne dabaaban daana mela neeko shiishida asi anjetidaysa. Nuuni ne son, ne geeshsha dunkaaniyan de7iya lo77oban kalloos.
PSA 65:5 Abeeti nu atotethaw, malaalsiya ne xillo oosuwan nuus zaara. Sa7aa gaxape gaxaa gakanaw, haahon de7iya ubbaas ne ufaysi.
PSA 65:6 Neeni ne wolqan dereta minthadasa; ne wolqaa dancadasa.
PSA 65:7 Neeni abba girsaanne beeta guntha si77i oothaasa; yarkiya asaa waasuwa irxisaasa.
PSA 65:8 Ne oothida malaata gisho, sa7aa gaxaa gakanaw de7iya asa ubbay new yayyana; dolohape wuloha gakanaw de7iya asa ubbaa ufaysadasa.
PSA 65:9 Ne ira immada biitta naagasa; daro dureyasa; asaas kathay dolana mela Xoossa shaafay haathan kumidaysa; hessada oothada ne giigisadasa.
PSA 65:10 Goshshas haathe immaasa; biitta shugisada ollaa kunthaasa. Ne iran zaarada irxisaasa; kathay dolana diccana mela anjaasa.
PSA 65:11 Laytha kalo laythi oothaasa; ne aadhiya bessa ubbay kumidi palahana.
PSA 65:12 Hentha bessata maatan kunthaasa; zumata ufaysi mayzaasa.
PSA 65:13 Ne hentha bessata dorsata kunthaasa; zangaara biittan kathi kunthaasa; enti ufaysan ililishe yexoosona.
PSA 66:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Yexetiya Saba Mazmure. Biitta ubbay hinte qaala dhoqu oothidi, ufaysan Xoossaa galatite.
PSA 66:2 Xoossaa sunthaas bonchon yexite; boncho galataa iyaw immite.
PSA 66:3 Xoossaas haysada yaagite; “Ne oosoti waanidi malaalsii? Ne wolqay darida gisho, ne morketi yashshan ne sinthan kokoroosona.
PSA 66:4 Biitta ubbay nena goyinnees; nena sabbees; ne sunthaas galatan yexoosona” yaagite. Salaha
PSA 66:5 Haayite; Xoossay oothidaba be7ite; asaa giddon malaalsiya ooso oothis.
PSA 66:6 I abba haatha shaakidi, kase nu aawati Yordaanose shaafa banta tohon yedhidi mela biittara pinnidosona. Hessan I oothidaban nuuni ufaytida.
PSA 66:7 I ba wolqan merinaw haarees. Kawotethata ba ayfen xeellees; hessa gisho, makalleysati iya bolla dendofo. Salaha
PSA 66:8 Asaw, nu Xoossaa galatite; hinte iya galatiya galatay si7etto.
PSA 66:9 I nuna paxa wothis; nu kundonna mela naagis.
PSA 66:10 Abeeti Xoossaw ne nuna paacadasa; biri taman paacetidi geeyeysada ne nuna geeshshadasa.
PSA 66:11 Ne nuna xihen gelsadasa; nu zokon deexo toho wothadasa.
PSA 66:12 Morketi nu huuphera toggidi aadhanada oothadasa; Nu haatha giddoranne tama giddora aadhida; shin ha77i nuna inje bessi ehadasa.
PSA 66:13 Ta xuussa yarsho ekada ne keethaa gelana, ta qangetha gathana.
PSA 66:14 Ta metootida wode ta doonay gida qaala, ta inxarsaafe keyida qangetha gathana.
PSA 66:15 Ta new modhuwa, xuussa yarsho oothada shiishana. Marazeta sawo tonku giya yarsho oothada shiishana; Kormanne koleta new yarshana. Salaha
PSA 66:16 Hinteno, Xoossas yayyeysato, ubbay haa yidi, si7ite; Xoossay taw oothidaba ta hintew odana.
PSA 66:17 Ta qaala dhoqu oothada woossas; ta inxarsan iya galatas.
PSA 66:18 Taani wozani erishin nagara genthidaba gidiyako, Goday tana si7enna.
PSA 66:19 Shin Xoossay tuma tana si7is; ta oysha zaaris.
PSA 66:20 Xoossay ta woosa ixiboonna gisho, ba merinaa siiquwa tana diggiboonna gisho galatetto.
PSA 67:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Diithan Yexetida Saba Mazmure. Xoossay nuus qadheto; nuna anjo; iya som7oy nu bolla poo7o. Salaha
PSA 67:2 Ne ogey biitta bolla, ne atotetha wolqay, kawotethata ubban ereto.
PSA 67:3 Abeeti Xoossaw, asay nena galato; asa ubbay nena galato.
PSA 67:4 Kawotethay malaaletidi ufaysan yexo; ayis giiko, neeni asaas xillotethan pirdaasa; sa7an de7iya kawotethata kaalethaasa. Salaha
PSA 67:5 Abeeti Xoossaw, asay nena galato; kawotethati ubbay nena galato.
PSA 67:6 Biittay kathi immana; Xoossay, nu Xoossay nuna anjis.
PSA 67:7 Xoossay nuna anjida gisho, biitta gaxaa gakanaw de7iya asay iya yayyo.
PSA 68:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Yexetida Dawita Mazmure. Xoossay dendo; iya morketi laaleto; Iya ixeysati iya sinthafe baqato.
PSA 68:2 Cuyay carkora dendidi dhaysiya mela, muqaadi taman til7eysada, iitati Xoossaa sinthafe dhayo.
PSA 68:3 Shin xilloti hashshu go; Xoossaa sinthan ufayto; ufaysan ililo.
PSA 68:4 Xoossaas yexite; iya sunthaa sabbite; shaaran beysas oge kessite; iya sunthay Godaa; iya sinthan ufaytite.
PSA 68:5 Xoossay ba de7iya geeshsha bessan, yi7otas aawa; am7etas daynna.
PSA 68:6 Xoossay bizzatas soo asi immees; qasho keethan de7eyisata birshidi, duretethan wothees; shin makallanchoti qaaqa biittan de7oosona.
PSA 68:7 Abeeti Xoossaw, neeni ne asaa kaalethida wode, ne entara mela biitta kanthida wode, Salaha
PSA 68:8 Siina Xoossaa yuussaninne, Isra7eele Xoossaa qoncethan biittay qaaxis; saloy ira immis.
PSA 68:9 Abeeti Xoossaw neeni ira darsada bukisadasa; laddida biitta zaarada oorathaasa.
PSA 68:10 Ne asay yan duussu oykis; abeeti Xoossaw, ne keehatethan manqotas koshshiyaba giigisada immadasa.
PSA 68:11 Goday kiittis; daro Maccasati he kiitaa markatidosona.
PSA 68:12 Kawotinne enta olanchoti baqatidi guye simmidosona; son attida maccasati di7o shaaketidosona.
PSA 68:13 Phooliya worqa qefera de7iya, birape medhetida holle misile di77idi demmiya wode hinte dorsa kelen ayis zin7ideti?
PSA 68:14 Ubbaa danda7iya Xoossay kawota laallida wode, Xalmoona zumaa bolla shacha bukisis.
PSA 68:15 Baasane zumaw, daro xeeri de7iya Baasane zumaw,
PSA 68:16 Daro xeerati de7iya zumato, Xoossay doorida zumaa hinte ayis qanaatidi xeelleetii? Goday iyan merinaw daana.
PSA 68:17 Xoossaa ola para gaareti tammu mukulu toho tammu mukulan taybetees; Goday Siina zumaape ba geeshsha bessaa yis.
PSA 68:18 Di7etida darota ekidi, dhoqa keyis; asaape, hari attoshin makallanchotape imo ekis; Goday Xoossay yan daana.
PSA 68:19 Gallas gallas nu toohuwa tookiya Goday galatetto; Xoossay nuna ashsheysa. Salaha
PSA 68:20 Nu Xoossay nuna ashshiya Xoossaa gidennee? Hayqope ashshiya Xoossay iya.
PSA 68:21 Xoossay tuma ba morketa huuphiya tinchana; nagara ogen hemetiya asa, binaanan kametida enta liiphiya menthana.
PSA 68:22 “Taani hinte morketa Baasanepe zaarada ehana; ta enta ciimmo abbafe kessada guye ehana.
PSA 68:23 Hessika, ne morketa suutha ne tohoy yedhana melanne ne kanatika morke suuthaafe banta gishuwa laaccana melasa” yaagees Goday.
PSA 68:24 Abeeti Xoossaw, ne salpey, ta Xoossay ta kawoy salpey, Xoossa keethi geliya wode ubbaas bentees.
PSA 68:25 Yexeysati sinthana; diixeysati guyena; qassi karaabo baqiya geela7oti giddona.
PSA 68:26 Hinte “Xoossa gita shiiqon galatite; hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, Godaa galatite” yaagosona.
PSA 68:27 He salpiyan ubbaafe kaalo gidida Biniyaame kochay koyro taybetoosona. Kaallidi Yihuda halaqati banta cugan de7oosona; wursethan Zabloona halaqatinne Niftaaleme halaqati taybetoosona.
PSA 68:28 Abeeti Xoossaw, ne wolqaa qoncisa; kase ne nuus oothidaysada, ne minotetha bessa.
PSA 68:29 Hessa gisho, Yerusalaamen de7iya ne keetha kawoti yidi, new imota immana.
PSA 68:30 Do7ada maqa giddon de7iya Gibxe asata neeni seera; boorunne mara wude daaniya kawotethata ne hanqeta. Enti gulbatidi, banta bira new immana gakanaw, neeni enta seera; oletanaw yeemotiya asata laalla.
PSA 68:31 Kiitetida halaqati Gibxefe yaana; Tophey ba kushiya Xoossako miccana.
PSA 68:32 Hinteno, sa7aa kawotethato, Xoossas yexite. Salaha
PSA 68:33 Benipe de7iya salotape bollara beyisas; ba wolqaama girsan ba guntha sisseysas yexite.
PSA 68:34 Xoossaa wolqaaba awaajite; iya gitatethay Isra7eele bollana; iya wolqayka salona.
PSA 68:35 Xoossay ba geeshsha asaa bolla malaalsees; Isra7eele Xoossay ba asas minotethinne wolqa immees. Xoossay galatetto.
PSA 69:1 Dawita Mazmure Haathi taw qoodhe gakida gisho, abeeti Xoossaw, tana ashsha.
PSA 69:2 Eqiya bessi bayna ciimmon mitettas; ciimmo haatha giddo gelas; haatha zuley ta bollara aadhis.
PSA 69:3 Maado demmanaw waassashe daaburas; ta kottonoy melis. Ta Xoossaa xeellishin, ta ayfey teljumis.
PSA 69:4 Tana coo ixeysati ta huuphe binaanape daro; Wordon tana morkeysatinne dhaysanaw koyeysati daro; ta kaysotonnaba zaara gidoosona.
PSA 69:5 Abeeti Xoossaw, ta eeyatetha ne eraasa; ta balay neepe geemmibeenna.
PSA 69:6 Abeeti Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaw, nena ufaysan naageysati ta gaason yeellatopo. Abeeti Isra7eele Xoossaw, nena minthidi koyeysati ta gaason kawuyofo.
PSA 69:7 Ta ne gisho cashshe danda7as; ta som7oy yeella ma7iday ne gishosa.
PSA 69:8 Taani ta ishatas imathe, ta aaye naytas allaga gidas.
PSA 69:9 Taani ne keethas mishetiya mishay tana tamada xuuggees; nena cayiya cashshay ta bolla wodhis.
PSA 69:10 Taani xooman tana kawushida wode, tana cayidosona.
PSA 69:11 Taani kayo ma7o ma7ida wode, entaw kaassas attas.
PSA 69:12 Katama pengen utteysatas zigrisas attas; mathoteysati tabaa yethi kessidosona.
PSA 69:13 Shin Godaw, ta nena woossayis; abeeti Xoossaw, ne dosiya wode, ne merinaa siiquwan, ne atotethan taw zaaro imma.
PSA 69:14 Silimon mitettonnaada tana ashsha; ta morketape tana ashsha, ciimmo haathan mitetethafe tana ashsha.
PSA 69:15 Di7o haathay tana muukofo; ciimmo haathay tana mittofo; ziqa ollay ba doona ta bolla gordofo.
PSA 69:16 Abeeti Godaw, ne merina siiquwa lo77otethan, taw zaaro imma; ne gita maarotan taako simma.
PSA 69:17 Ne aylliyafe ne som7uwa genthofa; taani un7an de7iya gisho taw elle zaaro imma.
PSA 69:18 Taako shiiqa; tana woza; ta morketape tana la77a kessa.
PSA 69:19 Ta cashshaa, yeellaanne kawushatethaa ne eraasa; ta morketa ubbaa ne be7aasa.
PSA 69:20 Cashshay tana hargancho oothis; taw qadhetiya asi koyas. Shin issi asika demmabike; tana minthethiya asi xeellas; shin bentibeenna.
PSA 69:21 Ta kathan ciiye walakidosona; ta saamuwas caala ushshi immidosona.
PSA 69:22 Enta gaytay entaw xihe gido; enta yarshoy entaw xihe gido.
PSA 69:23 Xeellonnaada enta ayfey goozeto; enta zokoy kuuno.
PSA 69:24 Ne hanquwa enta bolla tiga; suulliya ne sheney enta yedetho.
PSA 69:25 Enta kambey kaysi gido; enta dunkaaniyan de7iya asi dhayo.
PSA 69:26 Ne seeridaysata enti yedethidosona; ne madunxisidaysata enti yeessosona.
PSA 69:27 Enti nagaraa bolla nagara gujana mela aggaaga; ne maarotethaafe enta aybika gakofo.
PSA 69:28 Enti de7o maxaafape qusheto; xillo asaara mazgabetofo.
PSA 69:29 Ta waayeninne un7an de7ayis; abeeti Xoossaw, tana ashshada, saro bessan wotha.
PSA 69:30 Taani Xoossaa sunthaa mazmuren galatana; galata imon iya gitayana.
PSA 69:31 Hessi boora yarshofe, woyko kacaama korma yarshofe, aadhidi, Godaa ufaysees.
PSA 69:32 Naaqetidaysati hessa be7ana; ufaytana; hinteno, Xoossaa koyeysato, hinte wozanay minetto.
PSA 69:33 Goday manqota si7ees; qasho keethan de7iya ba asaa kadhenna.
PSA 69:34 Saloy, sa7inne abbay, iya giddon de7iya woxi qaaxiya ubbay Godaa galato.
PSA 69:35 Xoossay Xiyoone ashshana; Yihuda katamaa zaaridi keexana; asay yan daananne biittayka entaba gidana.
PSA 69:36 Iya aylleta nayti he biitta laattana; iya sunthaa doseysati yan daana.
PSA 70:1 Dawita Qofiso Mazmure Abeeti Xoossaw tana ashshanaw haa simma; abeeti Godaw, tana maaddanaw ellesa.
PSA 70:2 Tana wodhanaw koyeysati, yeellatonanne haniyaba dhayo. Ta qohetetha amotteysati, kawuyidi guye simmo.
PSA 70:3 Taako iyaw “hashshu! hashshu!” gidaysati xoonetida gisho yeellato.
PSA 70:4 Nena koyiya ubbay nenan ufaytonne malaaleto. Qassi ne atotetha dosiya ubbay, “Xoossay gitato” yaago.
PSA 70:5 Taani manqonne metootancho; abeeti Xoossaw, ellesada taako haaya. Ta maadeynne tana ashshey nena gidiya gisho; abeeti Godaw, gam7ofa.
PSA 71:1 Godaw, taani neeko baqatada attiya gisho, awudeka tana yeellayopa.
PSA 71:2 Ne xillotethan tana naaga; ne haytha taako zaara; tana ashsha.
PSA 71:3 Neeni ta ubba wode geemmada attiya zaalla taani geemmada attana mela mino miixaa gida; ee, neeni ta zaallanne ta miixa.
PSA 71:4 Ta Xoossaw, iitata kushepenne, qadhey bayna asatape tana ashsha.
PSA 71:5 Abeeti Godaw, ta na7atethafe doomada, neeni ta ufaysaanne ta ammanetetha.
PSA 71:6 Ta yeletida wodepe doomada nenan zempas; ta aaye ulope tana kessiday nena; taani ubba wode nena galatana.
PSA 71:7 Neeni ta qosetada attiya bessi gidida gisho, ta de7oy daro asaas leemiso gidis.
PSA 71:8 Gallasa ubban ta doonay ne galataninne ne bonchuwan kumis.
PSA 71:9 Taani cimida wode tana yeggofa; ta wolqay ixida wode tana aggofa.
PSA 71:10 Ta morketi ta bolla tobboosona; Tana wodhanaw koyeysati ta bolla maqetoosona.
PSA 71:11 Enti, “Xoossay iya aggis; yedethidi oykoos; iya ashshanay oonika baawa” yaagosona.
PSA 71:12 Xoossaw, taape haakofa ta Xoossaw, tana maaddanaw ellesa.
PSA 71:13 Tana mooteysati yeellatidi dhayo; Tana qohanaw koyeysati, yeellanne kawushe ma7o.
PSA 71:14 Shin taani ubba wode ufaysan nena naagana; zaara zaaradaka nena galatana.
PSA 71:15 Ne oothidaba ta taybanaw xoonetikoka, ta doonay gallas ubban ne xillotethaanne ne atotethaaba odana.
PSA 71:16 Taani Ubbaa Haariya Godaa wolqan yada; ne xalaala xillo gideysa awaajana.
PSA 71:17 Xoossaw, neeni ta na7atethafe doomada tana tamaarsadasa; ha77ika ne malaalsiya oosuwa ta odana.
PSA 71:18 Xoossaw ne wolqaanne ne minotethan yaa yeleta ubbaas odana gakanaw, taani cimada puulumikoka tana aggofa.
PSA 71:19 Xoossaw, ne xillotethay salo gakis; gitaba oothida Xoossi, ne meli oonee?
PSA 71:20 Neeni ta bolla daro meto ehadasa; gidoshin ta de7uwa zaarada ooraxisadasa; neeni tana biitta garsafe kessadasa.
PSA 71:21 Neeni ta bonchuwa darsadasa; tana zaarada minthethadasa.
PSA 71:22 Ta Xoossaw, ne tumatethaa gisho, ta nena diithan galatana. Abeeti Isra7eele geeshshaw, ta nena maasinqon sabbana.
PSA 71:23 Ta mettershay ufaysan dhoqu oothidi yexees; neeni tana ashshida gisho taani nena sabbana.
PSA 71:24 Tana qohanaw koyeysati yeellatida gishonne kawuyida gisho ta inxarsay ne xillo maaduwaba gallas ubban odana.
PSA 72:1 Solomone Mazmure Xoossaw, ne suure pirdaa kawas, nu xillotethaa kawa na7aas imma.
PSA 72:2 I ne asaas xillotethan pirdana; qohetidaysatas suuren daynnatana.
PSA 72:3 Dereti duretethi, zumati xillotetha ayfe ne asaas ayfo.
PSA 72:4 Kawoy qohetidaysata gisho mooteto; manqota ashsho; un7etheyisata mentho.
PSA 72:5 Xoossaw, I awadanne ageenada de7o; yeletethaafe yeletethaa gakanaw de7o.
PSA 72:6 Kawoy goshshan bukiya ira melanne biitta kalsiya puuse ira mela gido.
PSA 72:7 Iya laytha ubban xillo asati daayo; ageeni dhayana gakanaw sarotethi daro.
PSA 72:8 Abbaafe abba gakanaw, Efraxiisa shaafape sa7aa gaxa gakanaw I haaro.
PSA 72:9 Bazzon de7iya asati iya goyinno; iya morketi baana laaco.
PSA 72:10 Tarsesanne yuushoy abban teqetida biittata, kawoti iyaw giira giiro; Arabenne Tophe kawoti iyaw imota eho.
PSA 72:11 Kawoti ubbay iyaw gulbato; kawotethati ubbay iyaw kiiteto.
PSA 72:12 Iyako waassiya manqota, qohetidaysatanne maadoy baynayisata I ashshana.
PSA 72:13 Manqotasinne daaburanchotas I qadhetees; manqota shempuwa hayqope ashshees.
PSA 72:14 Enta suuthay iya sinthan al7o gidiya gisho, I, enta qohopenne iitape wozana.
PSA 72:15 Kawoy daro laythi gam7o; Arabe biitta worqay iyaw yo. Asay iya gisho ubba wode woosso; gallas ubban I anjeto.
PSA 72:16 Biittan kathi palaho; dereti kathan kametto. Libaanose deriya bolla kathi ayfiyada ayfo; denbi maatan kumiyada asay katamaa kumo.
PSA 72:17 Kawa sunthay merinaw de7o; awada ubba wode xeegetishe gam7o. Asa ubbay iya baggara anjetana; kawotethati iya “anjetidaysa” yaagana.
PSA 72:18 Malaalisiyaba barka oothiya Goday, Xoossay Isra7eele Xoossay galatetto.
PSA 72:19 Iya boncho sunthay merinaw galatetto; iya bonchoy sa7a ubbaa kumo.
PSA 72:20 Isseye na7aa Dawita woosay haysan poletis.
PSA 73:1 Asaafa Mazmure Tuma Xoossay Isra7eeles lo77o; wozana geeshshatas I keeha.
PSA 73:2 Shin ta tohoy dhubetanaw guuthu attis; ta tangoy hallixanaw matis.
PSA 73:3 Hessi haniday iita asatinne otoranchoti, duretishin taani be7ada qanaatida gishosa.
PSA 73:4 Enta waayey gakonna gisho, enta asatethay payyanne mino.
PSA 73:5 Enti hara asada waayetokona; hara asada meton shocetokona.
PSA 73:6 Hessa gisho, otoroy entaw qoodhe alleeqo mela; buqethi afilada ma7idosona.
PSA 73:7 Enta wozanay iitabaa pultees; enta qofay iita halchon kumis.
PSA 73:8 Enti qelqisoosona; iitabaa haasayoosona; banta otoruwan harata un7ethoosona.
PSA 73:9 Banta doona Xoossaa bolla dooyosona; banta inxarsaa asa bolla adussosona.
PSA 73:10 Hari attoshin, Xoossaa asay entako simmana; enti odiyaba eeson ammanana.
PSA 73:11 Enti, “Xoossi ayko erii? Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaas eratethi de7ii?” yaagosona.
PSA 73:12 Hiza iitati haysa mela; ubba wode injetin de7oosona; enti guji guji duretoosona.
PSA 73:13 Hiza taani ta wozanaa geeshshatethan naagiday, xillotethi bessanaw ta kushiya meecetiday mela.
PSA 73:14 Gallasa kumethi taani meton shocetas; wonta wonta seeretas.
PSA 73:15 Taani iita asatada odetidaako, ne asaas ammanetona attanashin.
PSA 73:16 Taani ha ubbaa eranaw qopiya wode, taw deexo gidis.
PSA 73:17 Hessika taani Xoossa keethaa gelana gakanawunne iita asata wursetha qaada akeekana gakanaasa.
PSA 73:18 Tuma neeni enta hallixiya bessan utisadasa; enti kundidi dhayana mela oothaasa.
PSA 73:19 Enti ellesidi dhayidosona; dagaman issoy attonna wuridosona.
PSA 73:20 Amuhoy barkiya wode baleteysada, abeeti Godaw, neeni dendiya wode, enti dogetana.
PSA 73:21 Taani yilotida wodenne ta wozanan cametida wode,
PSA 73:22 akeekona eeya asi gidas; ne sinthan mehe gidas.
PSA 73:23 Shin taani ubba wode neera de7ayis; ta ushacha kushiya neeni oykadasa.
PSA 73:24 Ne zoriyan tana kaalethaasa; wursethan tana bonchon ekaasa.
PSA 73:25 Taw salon neepe attishin, hari ooni de7ii? Taani neepe attishin, sa7an haraa amotike.
PSA 73:26 Ta wolqaynne ta wozanay daaburanaw danda7ees; shin Xoossay ta wozanaa minotethaanne merinaw tana gakida saamaa.
PSA 73:27 Neepe haakeysati dhayana; nena kaddeyisata ubbaa ne wursana.
PSA 73:28 Shin taw Xoossaako shiiqoy lo77o; iya ooso ubbaa taani odana mela, Ubbaa Haariya Godaa qosetidi attiya besse oothas.
PSA 74:1 Asaafa Timirte Akeekan xaafida ginxo. Xoossaw neeni nuna ayis merinaw aggadii? Ne qooruwan de7iya ne dorsata bolla ne hanqoy ayis eexidee?
PSA 74:2 Neeni beni doorida asaa, new buzo oothada wozida kochata hassaya; neeni de7ida Xiyoone zuma qopa.
PSA 74:3 Laaletida ne keethaa yada xeella; morketi yan de7iyaba ubbaa dhaysidosona.
PSA 74:4 Ne morketi ne keethan, “Nu xoonida” yaagidi gereeridosona. Xoono malaata gidida banta bandira essidosona.
PSA 74:5 Enti mithi qanxanaw wora giddon eqidi, banta kalta denthida asata daanosona.
PSA 74:6 Enti kushe hiillan alleeqida oosota ubbaa, banta kaltaaninne naariqan mentherethidosona.
PSA 74:7 Ne keetha taman xuuggidi dhaysidosona; ne sunthay xeegetiya bessaa tunisidosona.
PSA 74:8 Banta wozanan, “Nu kumethi dhaysana” yaagidosona; biittan de7iya asi Xoosse goyinniya bessata taman xuuggidosona.
PSA 74:9 He wode malaati nuus imetenna; nabeyka deenna. Hessi awude gakanaw gam7aneko, eriya asi nu giddon baawa.
PSA 74:10 Xoossaw, ne morketi awude gakanaw, ne bolla qelqisanee? Enti ne sunthaa merinaw cayanee?
PSA 74:11 Ne ushacha kushiya ayis shiisha ekay? Ne ushacha kushiya ne afilaa giddofe kessada enta dhaysa.
PSA 74:12 Gidoshin, abeeti Xoossaw, neeni benipe ta kawa; ne daro wode ashshadasa.
PSA 74:13 Ne gita wolqan abba shaakadasa; iya giddon de7iya do7aa huupheta doncadasa.
PSA 74:14 Leewataane geetetiya dawiya huupheta doncada, iya ashuwa bazzon de7iya medhetethatas kathi oothada immiday nena.
PSA 74:15 Neeni pultota dooya yeddadasa; ubba wode goggiya shaafata melisadasa.
PSA 74:16 Gallasay nebaa; qammayka nebaa; awanne ageena enta bessan wothiday nena.
PSA 74:17 Biittas zawa wothiday, balgonne bone medhiday nena.
PSA 74:18 Abeeti Godaw, ne morketi nena waati qelqisidaako, eeya asati ne sunthaa waati cayidaako hassaya.
PSA 74:19 Ne holliya shempuwa do7aas aathada immofa; metootanchota merinaw dogopa.
PSA 74:20 Nu biittan de7iya dhuma bessi ubbay makallanchotan kumida gisho, ne nuus caaqida caaquwa qopa.
PSA 74:21 Qohetidaysata yeellayopa; manqotinne metootanchoti ne sunthaa galato.
PSA 74:22 Abeeti Xoossaw, denda; mooteta; gallas kumethi eeyati nena qelqiseysa hassaya.
PSA 74:23 Ne morketi ne bolla waassiya waasuwanne nena ixeysati ceeqetiya ceequwa akeeka.
PSA 75:1 Asaafi zammaareta Halaqaas, “Dhaysofa” Geetetiya Diitha Cuudhethan Yexida Mazmure. Abeeti Xoossaw, new galata immoos; ne sunthay mata gidiya gisho nena galatoos; asay ne malaalsiya oosuwa odoosona.
PSA 75:2 Xoossay haysada yaagees; “Taani pirda immiya wode dooras; suure pirdey tana.
PSA 75:3 Biittaynne iyan de7iya ubbay qaaxikoka, iya tuussaa mintha essey tana. Salaha
PSA 75:4 Taani otoranchota, ‘Otortofite’; iitata, ‘Hinte kaciya bessofite.’
PSA 75:5 ‘Hinte kaciya salo denthofite; qoodhe qaathidi haasayopite’ ” yaagana.
PSA 75:6 Bonchoy dolohape woyko wulohape woyko mela biittafe yeenna.
PSA 75:7 Shin suure pirdey Xoossaa; I issuwa bolla pirdees; hankuwa shatinthees.
PSA 75:8 Xoossaa kushen issi wanci de7ees; he wancay Xoossaa hanqo woyne ushshan kumidi uttis. I he ushshafe tigin, sa7an de7iya iita asati hessa uyana; enti orcuwa ashshona xiiphidi uyana.
PSA 75:9 Shin taani Yayqooba Xoossaaba odana; iya merinaw sabbana.
PSA 75:10 I, iita asata kaciya menthana; shin xillota kacey dhoqu dhoqu gaana.
PSA 76:1 Asaafi Zammaareta Halaqaas Diithan Yexida Mazmure. Xoossay Yihudan eretis; iya sunthay Isra7eelen gita.
PSA 76:2 Iya dunkaaney Saalemana; I de7iya bessay Xiyoonena.
PSA 76:3 Yan xongetiya morke dongiya, gondalle, mashshenne ola miisheta mentherethis. Salaha
PSA 76:4 Abeeti Xoossaw, ne bonchoy ay mela gite! Neeni ne morketa xoonada zumaape simmiya wode, ne teemay ay mela yashshi!
PSA 76:5 Gooba tooranchoti bonqetidosona; enti wolqaama dhisko dhiskidosona; entafe issoyka ba kushiya denthibeenna.
PSA 76:6 Abeeti Yayqooba Xoossaw, ne seerida wode, para asatinne parati kundidi attidosona.
PSA 76:7 Shin abeeti Xoossaw, neeni yashshaasa; ne hanqoy suulliya wode, ne sinthan oone eqanay?
PSA 76:8 Neeni pirdaa salope sissida wode, biittay dagaman si77i gis.
PSA 76:9 Neeni biittan qohetida asaa ashshanawunne entaw pirdanaw dendiya wode hessi hannis. Salaha
PSA 76:10 Ne ase hanqikoka new boncho gidees; Olape attida asati ne ba7aale bonchana.
PSA 76:11 Godaas hinte Xoossaas qangethi gathite; hinteno iya matan de7iya kawotethato, yashshiya iyaw imota ehite.
PSA 76:12 I halaqata ayyaana kawushshees; wolqaama kawotaka daganthees.
PSA 77:1 Asaafi Zammaareta Halaqa Edotaames Xaafida Mazmure. Taani Xoossaa maggannayis; tana si7a gada iyako waassayis.
PSA 77:2 Ta metuwa gallasan Godaa koyas; qamma kumethi shempoy bayna ta kushiya miccas; gidoshin, ta shempiya minnanaw danda7abuku.
PSA 77:3 Taani Xoossaba qopiya wode oolayis; taani wotha denthida wode ta shempoy daaburees. Salaha
PSA 77:4 Qamma kumethi tana dhisko diggada aysadasa; ta un7etida gisho odetanaw danda7abike.
PSA 77:5 Taani aadhida gallasata qopas; kase laythata hassayas.
PSA 77:6 Taani qamma gita qofan aqas; ta wozanan wotha denthashe, haysada yaagada tana oychas;
PSA 77:7 “Xoossay nuna merinaw aggideyee? hizape guye I nuus keeheneyee?
PSA 77:8 Iya siiqoy attideyee? I odida qaala merinaw poleneyee?
PSA 77:9 Xoossay ba maarota dogideyee? Ba qadhiya hanqon laammideyee?” yaagada oychas. Salaha
PSA 77:10 Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaw, tana un7ethiday, ne ushacha kushiyan nuna maado aggidaysa.
PSA 77:11 Godaa oosota taani qopana; I beni oothida malaalsiya oosota hassayana.
PSA 77:12 Ne oosota taani zaara zaarada qopana; ne wolqaama oosota taani wotha denthana.
PSA 77:13 Abeeti Xoossaw, ne ogey geeshshi; ne mela gita Xoossi oonee?
PSA 77:14 Neeni malaalsiyaba oothiya Xoossaa; asaa giddon ne wolqaa qoncisaasa.
PSA 77:15 Ne asaa, Yayqoobanne Yoosefa kochaa ne qesiyan wozadasa. Salaha
PSA 77:16 Abeeti Xoossaw, haathati nena be7idi yayyidosona; abba ciimmotika kokoridosona.
PSA 77:17 Shaarati haathe duge tigidosona; daday salon guummis; ne wol7anthay yan han wol7amis.
PSA 77:18 Ne dadaa guunthay uushuwa giddon guummis; ne wol7anthay sa7aa poo7isis; biittay qaaxis; kokoris.
PSA 77:19 Neeni abba giddora hemetaasa; ciimmo abba giddora kanthaasa; shin ne tohoy yedhida bessay bentenna.
PSA 77:20 Muse kushennine Aarona kushen ne asaa dorsa wudeda kaalethadasa.
PSA 78:1 Asaafi Akeekan Xaafida Ginxo Ta asaw, ta timirtiya si7ite; ta doonape keyiya qaala hayzidi si7ite.
PSA 78:2 Taani ta doona leemison dooyana; benipe geemmida xuura qoncisana.
PSA 78:3 Nuuni si7idaysanne eridaysa, nu aawati nuus odidaysata odana.
PSA 78:4 Hessata nuuni enta naytape qosoko; Godaas bessiya galataa, iya wolqaanne malaalsiya iya oosuwa, yaana yeletas odana.
PSA 78:5 I Yayqooba zerethaas kiitaa, Isra7eele asaas higgiya immis. Kase nu aawati banta nayta he higgiya tamaarsana mela kiittis.
PSA 78:6 Kaalliya yeletay hessa erana mela, enta naytika banta naytas buroo yeletana naytas erisanaasa.
PSA 78:7 He wode enti Xoossan ammanetena; I oothidaba balokona; iya kiitaa naagana.
PSA 78:8 Enti kase banta aawatada wozana muume yeleta, geellanne ammanetona yeleta, Xoossan minnidi eqenna yeleta gidokona.
PSA 78:9 Efreema asay donge dancikoka, ola gallas guye simmidosona.
PSA 78:10 Enti Xoossaa caaquwa naagibookona; iya higgiyan hemetonna ixidosona.
PSA 78:11 Enti I oothida oosuwanne I bessida malaata dogidosona.
PSA 78:12 I enta aawata sinthan Gibxe biittan, Xo7aane Denban malaata oothis.
PSA 78:13 Abbaa shaakidi giddora enta pinthis; haatha shaakidi yan han godada essis.
PSA 78:14 I enta gallas shaaran, qamma tama poo7on kaalethis.
PSA 78:15 I mela biittan zaalla phalqidi, abbada daro haathi enta ushshis.
PSA 78:16 Zaallafe haathe pultisidi, shaafa haathada gogisis.
PSA 78:17 Shin enti iya bolla nagara gujidi oothidosona; Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaa bolla mela biittan makallidosona.
PSA 78:18 Banta amotida kathaa oychidi, Xoossaa erishe paacidosona.
PSA 78:19 Enti Xoossaa bolla haysada yaagidi haasayidosona; “Mela biittan Xoossay nuus kathi giigisanaw danda7ii?
PSA 78:20 Zaalla shocin pultoy keyidi shaafa haathi goggis; shin I nuus kathi immanaw danda7ii? Woyko ba asaas asho immanaw danda7ii?” yaagidosona.
PSA 78:21 Goday hessa si7ida wode daro hanqetis; Yayqooba kochata bolla tami eexis; Isra7eele bolla iya hanqoy daris.
PSA 78:22 Hessika enti Xoossan ammanibookona; woyko iya ashuwan ammanetibokona.
PSA 78:23 Gidoshin, dhoqa saluwa kiittis; salo pengiya dooyis.
PSA 78:24 Enta muzanaw manna bukisis; salo kathaa entaw immis.
PSA 78:25 Kiitanchota kathi asay mis; Xoossay entaw miyaba darsidi immis.
PSA 78:26 Doloha carkoy carkana mela oothis; ba wolqan dugeha carkuwa denthis.
PSA 78:27 I asaas asho biitta kessis; paalliya kafota abba gaxa shafeda bukisis.
PSA 78:28 Enti de7iya bessan, dunkaaniya yuushon wodhisis.
PSA 78:29 Enti amotidaysa entaw immis; midi banta ganjiya gathidosona.
PSA 78:30 Shin enti banta amuwa aathona de7ishin, ashoy enta doonan buroo de7ishin,
PSA 78:31 Xoossaa hanqoy enta bolla wodhis; enta giddofe wolqaama asata wodhis; Isra7eelepe na7atethata dhukis.
PSA 78:32 He ubbay haninka nagara ooso aggibokona; daro malaata oothinka ammanibookona.
PSA 78:33 Hessa gisho, I enta gallasata hada oothis; enta laythata dagaman ongis.
PSA 78:34 Xoossay entafe baggaa wodhiya wode iya koydosona, banta nagaraa paaxidi iyako simmidosona.
PSA 78:35 Xoossay enta zaalla gideysa, Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossay enta wozeysa, gideysa hassayidosona.
PSA 78:36 Shin enti banta inxarsan wordotidosona; banta doonan cimmidosona.
PSA 78:37 Enta wozanay Xoossan minnidi eqenna; iya caaquwas ammanetokona.
PSA 78:38 Shin I enta maaris enta nagaraa atto gis; enta dhaysibeenna. Daro wode ba hanquwa teqis; ba gaduwa kumethi enta bolla yeddibeenna.
PSA 78:39 Enti hayqiya asho gideysanne keyidi simmonna shempo gideysa akeekis.
PSA 78:40 Enti mela biittan iya bolla aapun toho makallidona! Mela biittan iya aapun toho lancisidonaa!
PSA 78:41 Enti zaari zaaridi Xoossaa paacidosona; Isra7eele Geeshshaa yiloyidosona.
PSA 78:42 Entana morketa kushepe ashshida gallasaa, un7ethiya asaape wozida wolqaa dogidosona.
PSA 78:43 I Gibxen oothida malaata, Xo7aane Denban oothida malaalsiya oosuwa hassaybookona.
PSA 78:44 Enta shaafa haathata suuthu laammis; hessa gisho, Gibxe asay shaafatape uyanaw danda7ibookona.
PSA 78:45 Enta waaysiya udunxetanne enta biitta dhaysiya shodheta kiittis.
PSA 78:46 Dolida kathaa duggos, enti daaburida ayfiya booles immis.
PSA 78:47 Enta woyniya shachan, enta balasiya carkon dhaysis.
PSA 78:48 Enta meheta shachan wodhis; enta dorsata dadan wursis.
PSA 78:49 Dhaysiya kiitancho cugara, ba suulliya hanquwa, yiluwa, ixuwanne gaduwa enta bolla yeddis.
PSA 78:50 Ba hanquwas oge giigisis; enta dhayos aathidi immis; enta hayqope ashshibeenna.
PSA 78:51 Gibxe bayra nayta ubbaa shocis; Kaama dunkaanen koyro nayta wodhis;
PSA 78:52 Shin ba asaa dorsada kessis; wudeda mela biittan heemmis.
PSA 78:53 I enta saro kaalethida gisho babibookona; shin enta morketa abbay mittis.
PSA 78:54 I enta ba geeshsha biitta, ba ushacha kushen xoonidi oykida zuma bolla ehis.
PSA 78:55 I enta sinthafe kawotethata gooddis; enta biitta Isra7eele kochatas laata oothidi shaakis; ba asaas enta keethaa immis.
PSA 78:56 Gidoshin, Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaa bolla makallidosona; iya paacidosona; iya higgiya kiitetibookona.
PSA 78:57 Enti banta aawatada geellatanne minnidi eqonna asi gididosona; wobe toorada wora wodhidosona.
PSA 78:58 Dhoqa goyinno bessatan iya yiloyidosona; banta eeqatara iya qanaatisidosona.
PSA 78:59 Xoossay hessa si7ida wode shenetis; Isra7eele ubbaa kadhis.
PSA 78:60 Seelon I de7iya ba bessaa, asaa giddon I de7iya ba dunkaaniya aggis.
PSA 78:61 Xoossa wolqaasinne bonchuwas malaata gidida Taabotiya morketa kushen aathidi immis.
PSA 78:62 I ba asaa bolla shenetis; enta mashshas aathidi immis.
PSA 78:63 Na7atethati ubbay taman meetetidosona; geela7oti azina gelonna attidosona.
PSA 78:64 Enta kahineti mashshan wuridosona; enta macheti yeekonna mela digetidosona.
PSA 78:65 Goday dhiskofe barkiya asada dendis; woyne ushsha mathoy aadhida asada hanis.
PSA 78:66 I ba morketa guye zaaridi shocis; enta merinaw yeellayis.
PSA 78:67 Yoosefa dunkaaniya kadhis; Efreema kochaa dooribeenna.
PSA 78:68 Shin Yihuda kochaanne I dosiya Xiyoone deriya dooris.
PSA 78:69 Ba keethaa saloda dhoqu oothidi keexis; sa7ada merinaw essis.
PSA 78:70 Ba aylliya Dawita dooridi, dorse heemmiya bessaafe ekis.
PSA 78:71 Dorse heemmiya bessafe denthidi, ba asaa Yayqooba, ba laata Isra7eele henthanaw ehis.
PSA 78:72 Dawiti enta suure wozanan heemmis; ba cincatethan kaalethis.
PSA 79:1 Asaafa Mazmure Xoossaw, ayhude gidonna asay, ne biitta bolla dendidosona; Ne geeshsha keethaa tunisidosona; Yerusalaame laallidosona.
PSA 79:2 Ne aylleta aha salo kafotas, ne geeshshata ashuwa sa7a do7atas immidosona.
PSA 79:3 Enta suuthaa Yerusalaame yuushon haathada gussidosona; enta aha moogiya asi dhayis.
PSA 79:4 Nu shoorotas nuuni miichas, nu heeran de7iya asaas qelqisethas attida.
PSA 79:5 Godaw, hessi awude gakanaw hananee? Neeni nu bolla merinaw hanqetadii? Ne hanqoy tamada eexishe daaneyee?
PSA 79:6 Nena eronna dereta bolla, ne sunthaa xeegonna kawotethata bolla ne hanquwa zaara.
PSA 79:7 Hessika enti Yayqooba mida gishonne enti de7iya bessaa dhaysida gishosa.
PSA 79:8 Nuuni daro metootida gisho, nu mayzata iitatethaa nu bolla taybopa; eeson ne maarota nuus kiitta.
PSA 79:9 Abeeti nuna ashshiya Xoossaw, ne boncho sunthaa gisho nuna maadda. Ne suntha gisho nuna ashsha; nu nagaraa atto ga.
PSA 79:10 Dereti, “Enta Xoossay awun de7ii?” ayis gaanee? Ne aylleta suuthaa enti gussida gisho; neeni halo keyeysa nu xeellishin, enta giddon qoncisa.
PSA 79:11 Qasho asaa ooley ne sinthe gako; hayqo pirdetidaysata ne wolqaa gitatethan ashsha.
PSA 79:12 Godaw, nu shooroti nena toochida gisho, laapun kushe halo keyada enta ki7on idintha.
PSA 79:13 He wode nuuni ne asay, ne dorsati, merinaw nena galatana. Yeletethaafe yeletethaa gakanaw, ne peeshsha odana.
PSA 80:1 Asaafi Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafida Mazmure “Ciishsha cuudhethi” geetetiya markatetha mazmure Yoosefa dorsa wudeda kaaletheyso, Isra7eele henthanchuwaw nuna si7a. Kiruubeta bolla de7iya araatan uttidayso, ne poo7uwan qonca.
PSA 80:2 Efreema, Biniyaamenne Minaase sinthan benta; ne wolqaa qaathada nuna ashshanaw haaya.
PSA 80:3 Xoossaw nuna zaara; nu attanaada ne som7uwa nuus poo7isa.
PSA 80:4 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaw Xoossaw, ne asaa woosa bolla awude gakanaw shenetay?
PSA 80:5 Neeni enta yeeho kathada muzadasa; afuthu haathada ushshadasa.
PSA 80:6 Nu shooroti nu biitta ekanaw banta giddon oyaana mela oothadasa; nu morketi nu bolla miicidosona.
PSA 80:7 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaw nuna zaara; nu attanaada ne som7uwa nuus poo7isa.
PSA 80:8 Gibxefe woyne ehadasa; kawotethata yedethada, enta biittan iya tokadasa.
PSA 80:9 Neeni biitta qeexadasa; I xapho yeddidi, daayidi biitta gakis.
PSA 80:10 Dereti iya kuyan, Libaanose zigati iya tashiyan kametidosona.
PSA 80:11 Ba tasheta Medetiraane Abbaa gakanaw, ba xeerata Efraxiisa shaafa gakanaw yeddis.
PSA 80:12 Yaatin, ogera aadhiya ubbay iya ayfiya duuthanaada, iya yuushon de7iya gimbiya ayis laalladii?
PSA 80:13 Bazzo gudunthoy iya bolla gupis; wora do7ati iya midosona.
PSA 80:14 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaw nuuko simma; salora duge xeellada; ha woyniya naaga.
PSA 80:15 I ne ushacha kushey tokida xapho; neeni new dichida puute.
PSA 80:16 Ne morketi ne woyniya qanxidosona; taman xuuggidosona; enta ne hanquwan dhaysa.
PSA 80:17 Ne kushey ne ushachan de7iya asaa, neeni new dichida asaa naago.
PSA 80:18 Hiza nuuni guye simmoko; Nuna paxa wotha; ne sunthaa galatana.
PSA 80:19 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaw Xoossaw, nuna zaara; nu attanaada ne som7uwa nuus poo7isa.
PSA 81:1 Zammaareta halaqaas xaafetida Suusul7en yexetiya Asaafa Mazmure Nuus wolqa gidida Xoossaas ufaysan yexite; Yayqooba Xoossaas ililite.
PSA 81:2 Yethi doomite; karaabo baqite; diithaninne maasinqon yexite.
PSA 81:3 Ageeni xeeriya wode, qassi dhuma uttiya wode, ba7aale gallasan moyze punnite.
PSA 81:4 Hessi Isra7eele biittan higge; Yayqooba Xoossay immida woga.
PSA 81:5 I Gibxe biitta shocida wode, Yoosefa kochaas ha wogaa awaajis. Eronna doonan haysada yaagishin si7as;
PSA 81:6 “Hinte hashiya toohope, hinte kushiya keeshepe shempisas.
PSA 81:7 Hinte metuwan tana xeegideta; ta hintena ashshas; taani dechiya shaara giddofe hintena allas; Mariba pultuwa matan ta hintena paacas.” Salaha
PSA 81:8 “Ta asaw, ta hintena seereysa si7ite; Isra7eele asaw hinte tana si7iko aybee?
PSA 81:9 Hinte giddon allaga xoossi de7opo; hara xoosse goyinnofite.
PSA 81:10 Gibxe biittafe hintena kessida, taani Godaa hinte Xoossaa; Ne doona loythada hakanka; taani iyan kunthana.
PSA 81:11 “Shin ta asay tana si7ibookona; Isra7eeley taw kiitetibeenna.
PSA 81:12 Hessa gisho, enti banta qofaa kaallana mela, simmonna enta wozanaas aathada immas.
PSA 81:13 Ta asay tana si7idaako aybe; Isra7eeley ta ogiya kaallidaako aybi de7i;
PSA 81:14 Taani enta morketa eeson xoonanashin; enta ixeyisata bolla ta kushiya denthanashin.
PSA 81:15 Godaa ixeysati iya sinthan hokana; enta seeray merinaw gidana.
PSA 81:16 Taani hintena lo77o giste muzana; zaallafe keyiya eessan hintena kalsana.”
PSA 82:1 Asaafa Mazmure Xoossay salo shiiquwa giddon, xoossati shiiqida bessan haysada yaagidi pirdees.
PSA 82:2 “Hinte awude gakanaw wobbe pirdanee? awude gakanaw iitata bagga gidanee?” Salaha
PSA 82:3 Metootanchotasinne aawi baynaysatas mootetite; manqotanne qohetida asaa maata naagisite.
PSA 82:4 Daaburanchotanne metootanchota ashshite; iitata kushepe enta yegisite.
PSA 82:5 Hintew eratethinne akeeki baawa; enti dhuman simeretoosona; biitta baasoti qaaxidosona.
PSA 82:6 Taani, “Hinte xoossata; ubbay Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaa nayta.
PSA 82:7 Gidoshin hinte asi hayqeysada hayqana; hara halaqati kundeysada kundana” yaagas.
PSA 82:8 Xoossaw, denda; biitta bolla pirda; kawotethati ubbay nebaa.
PSA 83:1 Asaafa Mazmure Abeeti Xoossaw, si77i goopa; Xoossaw sirphi goopa; muumopa.
PSA 83:2 Ne morketi ne bolla dendeysa, nena ixeysati ne bolla makalleysa be7a.
PSA 83:3 Enti ne asaa bolla geeman duulatoosona; neeni dosiya asaa bolla maqetoosona.
PSA 83:4 “Haayite, enta kawotethaa dhaysoos; Isra7eele geetetiya sunthay merinaw hassayetonna mela oothoos” yaagosona.
PSA 83:5 Enti issi wozanan gididi maqetoosona; ne bolla dendanaw caaqidosona.
PSA 83:6 Enti, Edoomenne Isma7eela asaa, Moo7abenne Aggaari kochata;
PSA 83:7 Gebaalanne Amoone asaa, Amaaleqa, Filisxeemenne Xiroosa asaa.
PSA 83:8 Asooreti entara gahetidosona; Asooreti Looxe asaas wolqaama maado gididosona. Salaha
PSA 83:9 Neeni, Midiyaame, Sisaaranne Yabina bolla Qisoona shaafan oothidaysada enta bolla ootha.
PSA 83:10 Enti Endooran dhayidosona; enta ahay denban wooqidi attis.
PSA 83:11 Enta halaqata Oreebanne Zebada ootha; enta haareyisata Zabheelanne Silmanada dhaysa.
PSA 83:12 Enti, “Nuuni Xoossaa asaa laata nuus buzo oothana” yaagidosona.
PSA 83:13 Ta Xoossaw, enta baanada laalla; carkoy efiya suullada ootha.
PSA 83:14 Tami wora meysada, tama lacoy deriya xuuggeysada,
PSA 83:15 ne uushuwan enta yedetha; ne gotiyan enta dagantha.
PSA 83:16 Godaw, asay ne sunthaa koyana mela, enta som7uwa yeella mayza.
PSA 83:17 Enti merinaw yeellato; hirgo; kawuyidi dhayo.
PSA 83:18 Ne sunthay Godaa gidida ne xalaali, Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossay, sa7a ubbaa haareysa enti ero.
PSA 84:1 Zammaareta halaqaas Qore nayti xaafida Suusul7en yexetiya mazmure Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaw, ne de7iya bessay waani lo77i!
PSA 84:2 Taani Godaa keetha dabaaba laamotayis; ta kumetha asatethay de7o Xoossaas ufaysan yexees.
PSA 84:3 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaw, ta kawaw, ta Xoossaw, ne yarsho bessa matan buube kafoy baw de7iya bessi demmasu; holleyka ba nayta wothiya keethe keexasu.
PSA 84:4 Ne keethan de7eysatinne merinaw nena sabbeysati anjetidaysata. Salaha
PSA 84:5 Nena banta minotethi ootheysati, banta wozanaa Xiyoone ogiya bolla, wotheysati anjetidaysata.
PSA 84:6 Enti yeeho zangaarara aadhiya wode, he bessay pultoy keyiya bessi gidis; torche iray bukidi ollaa kunthees.
PSA 84:7 Enti wolqa bolla wolqa guji guji baana; issoy issoy Xoossa sinthan Xiyoonen bentana.
PSA 84:8 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaw Xoossaw, ta woosa neeni si7a; Yayqooba Xoossaw hayza. Salaha
PSA 84:9 Xoossaw, nu gondalliya be7a; ne doorida kawa keeha ayfen xeella.
PSA 84:10 Taani hara bessan mukulu gallas daanape, ne dabaaban issi gallas de7eysi taw lo77o. Iitata dunkaaniyan daanape, Xoossa keetha penge naagoy taw lo77o.
PSA 84:11 Godaa Xoossay nuus gondallenne poo7o; nuus bonchonne keehatethi immees; suuretethan hemeteyisata lo77oba diggenna.
PSA 84:12 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaw, nenan ammaneteysati anjetidaysata.
PSA 85:1 Zammaareta halaqaas xaafetida Qore nayta mazmure Godaw, neeni ne biittas keehadasa; Yayqooba kochaa di7ope guye zaaradasa.
PSA 85:2 Ne asaa naaquwa atto gadasa; enta nagaraa ubbaa kammadasa. Salaha
PSA 85:3 Ne yiluwa aggadasa; suulliya ne hanquwafe simmadasa.
PSA 85:4 Abeeti nuna ashshiya Xoossaw, nuna guye zaara; nu bolla lancidaysa agga.
PSA 85:5 Neeni nu bolla merinaw shenetayee? Ne hanquwafe simmikiyee?
PSA 85:6 Nuuni nenan ufaytana mela, nuna zaarada oorathikiyee?
PSA 85:7 Abeeti Godaw, ne merina siiquwa nuna bessa; nuna ashsha.
PSA 85:8 Godaa Xoossay odiyaba taani si7ana; enti banta eeya ogiyako simmonna ixiko, I ba geeshsha deriyas sarotethi odees.
PSA 85:9 Iya bonchoy nu biittan daana mela, Xoossaa yayyeyisata ashshanaw I matan de7ees.
PSA 85:10 Siiqoynne tumatethi gahetidosona; Xillotethinne sarotethi idimetidosona.
PSA 85:11 Tumatethi sa7aape pude keyees; xillotethi salope duge xeellees.
PSA 85:12 Xoossay lo77oba nuus immana; nu biittay daro kathi ayfana.
PSA 85:13 Xillotethi Godaa sinthan hemetana; iya ogiya giigisana.
PSA 86:1 Dawita Woosa Godaw, taani manqonne metootancho gidiya gisho, ta woosa si7ada tana alla.
PSA 86:2 Ta new dummatida asi gidiya gisho, tana de7on wotha; nenan ammanetiya tana, ne aylliya ashsha; neeni ta Xoossa.
PSA 86:3 Godaw, gallas kumethi ta neeko waassiya gisho, taw qadheta.
PSA 86:4 Godaw, ta shempoy neeko waassiya gisho, tana, ne aylliya ufaysa.
PSA 86:5 Godaw, neeni keehanne atto geysa; nena xeegiya ubbaas ne siiqoy daro.
PSA 86:6 Abeeti Godaw, ta woosa si7a; ta waasuwa hayza.
PSA 86:7 Ne ta woosaas zaaro immiya gisho, ta metuwa gallasan ta neeko waassana.
PSA 86:8 Godaw, xoossata giddon ne meli baawa; ne oosuwara giney baawa.
PSA 86:9 Godaw, neeni medhida kawotethati yidi, ne sinthan gulbatana; ne sunthaa bonchana.
PSA 86:10 Neeni gita; ne malaalsiya ooso oothiya gisho Xoossi ne xalaala.
PSA 86:11 Godaw, ta ne tuman hemetana mela, tana ne ogiya tamaarsa. Taani ne sunthaas yayyana mela, taw issi wozanaa imma.
PSA 86:12 Godaw ta Xoossaw, taani nena ta kumetha wozanan galatana; ne sunthaa merinaw bonchana.
PSA 86:13 Ne siiqoy taw daro; tana duufope ashshadasa.
PSA 86:14 Xoossaw, otoranchoti ta bolla dendidosona; iita asata cugay tana wodhanaw koyees; enti nena wuda gookona.
PSA 86:15 Shin abeeti Godaw, neeni qadhetiyanne maariya Xoosse. Neeni hanqetanaw gam7aasa; siiqoynne ammanetethi daridaysa.
PSA 86:16 Taako simmada taw qadheta; ne aylliyas wolqa imma; ne gadhinde na7aa tana ashsha.
PSA 86:17 Godaw, ne keehatetha malaata tana bessa; ne tana maaddeysanne minthetheysa be7iya wode, ta morketi yeellatana.
PSA 87:1 Qore Nayta Mazmure Godaa katamay, geeshsha deriya bolla keexetis.
PSA 87:2 Goday Xiyoone pengeta, Yayqoobi de7iya hara bessatape aathidi dosees.
PSA 87:3 Neno Xoossaa katamaw, ne gisho malaalsiyabata haysada yaagidi odis. Salaha
PSA 87:4 “Tana eriya kawotethata giddofe, taani Raabanne Babiloone mazgabana. Filisxeemey, Xiroosinne Tophey, yan yeletidosona.”
PSA 87:5 Xoossay Xiyoones, “Ya derey ha derey Xiyoonen yeletis; Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossay iyo minthana” yaagees.
PSA 87:6 Goday asaa mazgaben xaafiya wode, “Haysi Xiyoonen yeletis” yaagana. Salaha
PSA 87:7 Enti yexishenne durishe, “Nu anjo ubbay Xiyoonepe pultees” yaagana.
PSA 88:1 Zammaareta Halaqaas Xaafetida Qore Nayta Mazmure Akeekan xaafida ginxo; aaretho mazmure Izra7eela addiya Emaana mazmure Godaw, tana ashshiya Xoossaw, taani gallas neeko waassayis; qamma ne sinthan yeekayis.
PSA 88:2 Ta woosay ne sinthe gako; ne haythay ta waasuwa si7o.
PSA 88:3 Ta shempoy meto kallida gisho, ta de7oy duufoko matis.
PSA 88:4 Duufo geliya asaara taybetas; wolqi bayna asi gidas.
PSA 88:5 Taani ahata giddon yegetida asa mela; hayqidi duufon zin7ida asa mela. Hizape neeni hassayonna asinne neepe duuxida asa mela gidas.
PSA 88:6 Neeni tana ciimmon, dhuma ollan yeggadasa.
PSA 88:7 Ne hanqoy tana deexees; ne hanquwa beetay tana muukis. Salaha
PSA 88:8 Neeni ta dabbota taape haassadasa; enti tana shaatettana mela oothadasa. Tana teqidosona; kessa ekanaw danda7ike.
PSA 88:9 Godaw, azzanon ta ayfey teljumis; Ubba gallas taani neeko waassayis; ta kushiya neeko miccas.
PSA 88:10 Hayqidaysatas ne malaalsiyaba oothayee? Enti dendidi nena galatonayee? Salaha
PSA 88:11 Merinaa ne siiqoy duufon, ne ammanetethay dhayo bessan odetiyee?
PSA 88:12 Ne malaalsiya oosoy dhuman, ne xillotethay dogetida biittan eretiyee?
PSA 88:13 Godaw, ta neeko waassayis; wonta wonta ta woosay ne sinthe gakees.
PSA 88:14 Godaw, ne tana ayis ixay? Ne som7uwa taape ayis genthay?
PSA 88:15 Na7atethafe doomada taani un7etas; hayqos matas; ne tana daganthin ufaysi qanxas.
PSA 88:16 Ne suulliya hanqoy ta bolla uushis; ne daganthoy tana dhaysis.
PSA 88:17 Enti gallas kumethi di7oda tana teqidosona; issife shiiqidi tana oykidosona.
PSA 88:18 Ta laggetanne taw mata asata taape haassadasa; taw dabboy dhuma xalaala.
PSA 89:1 Izra7eela Addiya Etaana Mazmure Akeekan xaafida ginxo Godaw, ne siiquwaba taani merinaw yexana; ne ammanetetha yeleta ubbaas awaajana.
PSA 89:2 Ne siiqoy merinaw eqidaysanne tumatethaa neeni salon minthada essidaysa odana.
PSA 89:3 Neeni, “Ta dooridaysara qaala gelas; Ta aylliya Dawitas haysada yaagada caaqas;
PSA 89:4 ‘Taani ne kochaa merinaw kawothana; ne araata yeleta ubban minthana’ ” yaagadasa. Salaha
PSA 89:5 Godaw, saloti ne malaalsiya oosuwa awaajo; geeshshata shiiqoy ne ammanetetha odo.
PSA 89:6 Salon Godaara liketanaw danda7ey oonee? Salo medhetethata giddon Godaa meli oonee?
PSA 89:7 Geeshshata shiiquwan Xoossay yashisees; iya yuushuwan de7iya ubbaafe aadhidi daganthees.
PSA 89:8 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaw Xoossaw, ne mela wolqaami oonee? Godaw, neeni ubbaban ammanetaasa.
PSA 89:9 Neeni guummiya abba wolqaa kiittasa; dendiya zuliya si77i oothaasa.
PSA 89:10 Ra7aaba geetetiya do7a mentherethadasa; ne morketa ne wolqaama qesiyan laalladasa.
PSA 89:11 Saloynne sa7i nebaa; alamiyanne iyan de7iya ubbaa medhiday nena.
PSA 89:12 Pudehanne dugeha ne medhadasa; Taaborenne Armoona zumati, ufaysan ne sunthaa sabboosona.
PSA 89:13 New wolqaama qesey de7ees; ne kushey mino; ne ushacha kushey dhoqu gis.
PSA 89:14 Xillotethinne suure pirdi ne araatas baaso; siiqoynne tumatethi ne sinthan boosona.
PSA 89:15 Godaw, ufaysan ilileysatnne ne som7uwa poo7uwan hemeteysati anjetidaysata.
PSA 89:16 Ne sunthan gallas kumethi ufaytoosona; enti ne xillotethaa dhoqu dhoqu oothosona.
PSA 89:17 Enti ceeqetiya wolqay nena; ne teeman nu kacey dhoqu dhoqu gis.
PSA 89:18 Nu gondalley nu Godaa kushena; nu kawoyka Isra7eele geeshshaa kushena.
PSA 89:19 Beni neeni, ne ammanetida asaas qoncethan haysada yaagadasa. “Taani issi olanchuwa maaddas; asaa giddofe dooretidaysa dhoqu dhoqu oothas.
PSA 89:20 Ta aylliya Dawita demmas; ta geeshsha zaytiya tiyada iya kawothas.
PSA 89:21 Ta kushe iyara daana; ta qesey iya minthana.
PSA 89:22 Iya ay morkeyka giirisenna; ay iita asika iya haarenna.
PSA 89:23 Iya morketa ta iya sinthan tincherethana; iya ixeyisata shoca yeggana.
PSA 89:24 Ta tumatethaynne ta siiqoy iyara gidana; ta sunthan iya kacey dhoqu dhoqu gaana.
PSA 89:25 Taani iya kawotethaa Medetiraane Abbaa, iya zawa shaafata gakanaw aassana.
PSA 89:26 I tana, ‘Neeni ta aawa, ta Xoossaa; tana ashshiya zaalla’ yaagidi xeegana.
PSA 89:27 Taani iya bayra na7a oothana; sa7an de7iya kawota ubbaafe iya gitayana.
PSA 89:28 Taani ta siiquwa merinaw iyaw naagana; taani iyara caaqida caaquwa minthana.
PSA 89:29 Taani iya kochaa merinaw minthada essana; iya araata saloda gam7isana.”
PSA 89:30 “Shin iya kochati ta higgiya aggiko, enti ta wogaada hemetonna ixiko,
PSA 89:31 ta awaajuwa shaariko, ta kiita naagonna ixiko,
PSA 89:32 taani enta nagaraa gisho xam7an, enta iitatethaa gisho lisson seerana.
PSA 89:33 Shin taani ta siiquwa iyape ekike; taani iyaw merinaw ammanetana.
PSA 89:34 Taani entara caaqida caaquwa menthike; ta doonape keyida qaala laammike.
PSA 89:35 Taani issi toho ta geeshshatethan caaqida gisho, Dawitas wordotike.
PSA 89:36 Iya kochay merinaw daana; iya araatay ta sinthan awada gam7ana.
PSA 89:37 Salon ammanetiya marka gidida ageenada, iya kawotethay merinaw minnidi daana” yaagadasa. Salaha
PSA 89:38 Shin ha77i ne tiyida kawa bolla hanqetadasa; iya ixadasa; aggadasa.
PSA 89:39 Ne aylliyara caaqida caaquwa menthadasa; iya kallachaa baanan holada tunisadasa.
PSA 89:40 Iya katamaa gimbe dirsa laalladasa; iya miixaa dhaysadasa.
PSA 89:41 Ogera aadhiya ubbay iya bonqidosona; I ba shoorotas miichas attis.
PSA 89:42 Iya morketas xoono immadasa, enta ubbaa ufaysadasa.
PSA 89:43 Iya mashshaa xeeraa qalam7adasa; iya olan maaddabaaka.
PSA 89:44 Iya kawota xam7aa iya kushepe ekadasa; iya araata biittan holadasa.
PSA 89:45 Iya yalagatetha wodiya qaamisadasa; iya yeella mayzadasa. Salaha
PSA 89:46 Godaw, neeni awude gakanaw gam7ay? Neeni merinaw geemmanee? Ne hanqoy tamada awude gakanaw eexanee?
PSA 89:47 Ta laythay ay mela qantheko qopa; asa ubbaa coo mela medhadi!
PSA 89:48 Hayqope attanaw danda7iya asi de7ii? Duufo gelonna daanaw danda7ey oonee? Salaha
PSA 89:49 Godaw, neeni ne tumatethan Dawitas caaqida, ne siiqoy awun de7ii?
PSA 89:50 Godaw, ne aylley ay mela boretidaako be7a; asa ubbaa boriya waata danda7idaako hassaya.
PSA 89:51 Godaw, ne morketi qelqisidaysa, ne tiyida kawa tangon tangon boreysa be7a.
PSA 89:52 Goday merinaw galatetto!
PSA 90:1 Xoossa asi gidida Muse woosa Godaw, neeni yeletape yeletaa gakanaw, nuuni de7iya bessi gidadasa.
PSA 90:2 Dereti medhetanaape kase, sa7i oosetanaape kase, merinaape merinaa gakanaw ne Xoosse.
PSA 90:3 Neeni, “Asa nayto, guye biittako simmite” yaagada, enta medhetida biittako guye zaarasa.
PSA 90:4 Mukulu laythi zine aadhida gallasa mela; woyko issi qamma giddon issi saate mela.
PSA 90:5 Neeni asaa qoponna di7oda efaasa; enti amuho mela; wonta wonta doliya maata mela.
PSA 90:6 Maati wonta diccidi ciyees; omarsiya wode shullidi melees.
PSA 90:7 Nuuni ne yiluwan wurida; ne hanquwa suulon dagammida.
PSA 90:8 Nu iita oosuwa ne sinthan wothadasa; nu geemmida nagaraa ne som7uwa poo7uwan wothadasa.
PSA 90:9 Nu gallasa ubbay ne hanquwan aadhis; nu laytha oolen wursoos.
PSA 90:10 Nu de7o laythay laapun tamma; woyko dariko hospun tamma. Hessika metoynne waayey kumidaysa; nu laythay eeson wurees; nuka eeson aadhoos.
PSA 90:11 Ne hanquwa wolqaa erey oonee? ne hanquwa suuloy wolqaama.
PSA 90:12 Nu laytha maara ogen nu go7etana mela, nuna cincatethi tamaarsa.
PSA 90:13 Godaw, ne hanqoy awude gakanaasee? hayyana ne aylletas qadheta.
PSA 90:14 Nu laytha ubban nu ufaytanaadanne yexanaada, wonta wonta ne siiquwa nuna kalsa.
PSA 90:15 Ne nuna metoothida gallasata keena, nuuni un7etida laythata keena nuna ufaysa.
PSA 90:16 Nuus ne aylletas ne oosoy qonco; ne bonchoy enta naytas bento.
PSA 90:17 Godaa nu Xoossaa keehatethay nu bolla gido; nu kushe ooso ubba nuus ayfisa; Ee, nu kushe ooso ubbaa ayfisa.
PSA 91:1 Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossan naagetidi de7ey, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaa kuyan aqees.
PSA 91:2 I Godaa, “Neeni taw miixanne qosetta attiya bessi, neeni tana ammanthiya ta Xoossaa” yaagana.
PSA 91:3 I nena shankanchota xihepe, wodhidi ongiya gadope ashshana.
PSA 91:4 I ba baalletan nena kammana; iya qefiya garsan neeni qosetada attana; iya ammanetethay new gondallenne kate.
PSA 91:5 Neeni qamma daganthiyabas, woyko gallas xongetiya tooras yayyaka.
PSA 91:6 Neeni dhuman oykiya harge, woyko gallasa seetan ongiya gado hirgaka.
PSA 91:7 Mukulay ne miyen, tammu mukulay ne ushachan kundana; shin nena aybika bochenna.
PSA 91:8 Iitati seeretishin, neeni ne ayfe xalaalan be7ana.
PSA 91:9 Neeni Godaa new qosetada attiya bessi oothida gishonne, Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaa ne de7iya bessi oothida gisho,
PSA 91:10 iitabay nena bochenna; gadoy ne keethaako shiiqenna.
PSA 91:11 Ne oge ubban nena naagana mela, Xoossay ba kiitanchota kiittana.
PSA 91:12 Ne tohoy shuchan dhubetonna mela, kiitanchoti banta kushen nena denthana.
PSA 91:13 Neeni gaammonne shoosha bolla hemetana; wodala gaammonne iita shooshaa yedhana.
PSA 91:14 Xoossay, “I tana siiqida gisho taani iya ashshana; ta sunthaa eriya gisho taani iya naagana.
PSA 91:15 I tana xeegiya wode taani iyaw koyana; meto wode taani iyara gidana; taani iya ashshananne bonchana.
PSA 91:16 Taani iya laytha adussana; ta atotetha iya bessaana” yaagees.
PSA 92:1 Sambaata gallasa mazmure Godaa galatoy lo77o; Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaw, ne suntha saboy lo77o.
PSA 92:2 Wonta wonta ne siiquwa odoy, qamma ne ammanetetha awaajoy lo77o.
PSA 92:3 Tammu shayan waaxetida diithan maasinqo kaa7ishe nena galatoy lo77o.
PSA 92:4 Taani ne oosuwan ufaytida gisho, ne kushe oosuwa gisho nena galatayis.
PSA 92:5 Godaw, ne oosoy ay mela gite! Ne qofay ay mela ciimmo!
PSA 92:6 Eeya asi eranaw danda7enna; wozani bayna asi akeekanaw danda7enna.
PSA 92:7 Iitati maatada diccikoka, iita ootheysati daaykoka, enti merinaw dhayana.
PSA 92:8 Shin abeeti Godaw, neeni merinaw ubbaafe dhoqa.
