PSA 92:9 Abeeti Godaw, tuma ne morketi dhayana; iita oothiya ubbay piski gaana.
PSA 92:10 Ta kaciya mentha kaceda dhoqu oothadasa; lo77o zayte ta huuphen tiyadasa.
PSA 92:11 Ta morketi xoonetishin ta ayfen be7as; tana un7etheysati waassishin ta haythan si7as.
PSA 92:12 Xilloti zambada diccana; Libaanose zigada daayana.
PSA 92:13 Enti Godaa keethan toketida mitha mela; enti nu Xoossaa dabaaban daana.
PSA 92:14 Enti ceeggidika ayfana; enti irxanne cil7o gididi daana.
PSA 92:15 Enti, “Goday suure; I ta zaalla; iyan iitatethi baawa” yaagana.
PSA 93:1 Goday kawotis! Xoossay boncho ma7is; wolqa dancis; sa7i minnidi eqis; qaaxenna.
PSA 93:2 Ne araatay benipe eqidi de7ees; neeni merinaw de7aasa.
PSA 93:3 Godaw, shaafay guummis; haathay ba guuntha dhoqu oothis haatha zuliya girsay si7etis.
PSA 93:4 Salon de7iya Goday, daro haatha guunthaafe, abba zuliyape aadhidi wolqaama.
PSA 93:5 Abeeti Godaw, ne higgey ammanetidaysa; ne keethay merinaw geeshshatethan alleeqana.
PSA 94:1 Godaw, neeni halo keyiya Xoossi; kushe zaariya Xoossaw, ne bonchuwa bessa.
PSA 94:2 Abeeti sa7aa pirdiya Xoossaw denda; otoranchotas bessiya seera imma.
PSA 94:3 Godaw, awude gakanaw gam7ay? Iitati awude gakanaw ufaytanee?
PSA 94:4 Iita ootheysati otoro qaala haasayoosona; enti coo ceeqetoosona.
PSA 94:5 Godaw, enti ne asaa liiqisoosona; enti ne laata naaqoosona.
PSA 94:6 Am7etanne betanchota wodhoosona; aawi bayna nayta muucosona.
PSA 94:7 Enti, “Goday nuna be7enna; Yayqooba Xoossay akeekenna” yaagosona.
PSA 94:8 Hinteno, asaa giddofe eeyato, akeekite! hinteno, eeyato hinte cinca gidanay awudee?
PSA 94:9 Haythe oothida Xoossay si7ennee? Ayfe medhida Goday be7ennee?
PSA 94:10 Kawotethata seeriya Xoossay seerennee? Ase eratethi tamaarsiya i, erennee?
PSA 94:11 Goday asa qofi pathonnabaanne hada gideysa erees.
PSA 94:12 Abeeti Godaw, neeni seeriya asinne ne higgiya tamaarsiya asi anjetidaysa.
PSA 94:13 Iitati kundiya ollay booketana gakanaw, meto gallas neeni iya shempisaasa.
PSA 94:14 Xoossay ba asaa yeggenna; I ba laata aggenna.
PSA 94:15 Pirdi simmidi xillotetha bolla eqana; wozanaa suureti ubbay xillo pirdaa kaallana.
PSA 94:16 Makallanchota bolla ta gisho dendey oonee? Iita ootheysatara ta gisho eqetey oonee?
PSA 94:17 Goday tana maaddonnaako, taani eeson duufo gelada attanashin.
PSA 94:18 Taani, “Ta tohoy hallixis” gida wode, ne siiqoy tana katisis.
PSA 94:19 Ta wozanan un7etethi kumida wode, neeni tana wopu oothada ufaysaasa.
PSA 94:20 Higge shaariya geella daynnatara geella asara neeni hashetay?
PSA 94:21 Xillota wodhanaw enti tobboosona; suureta bolla hayqo pirdoosona.
PSA 94:22 Gidoshin Goday ta miixaa; ta Xoossay taani qosetada attiya zaalla.
PSA 94:23 Enta iitatethaa gisho I enta seerana; enta nagaraa gisho I enta dhaysana; Goday nu Xoossay enta dhaysana.
PSA 95:1 Haayite; ane Godaa sabboos; nuna ashshiya zaallas ufaysan ililoos.
PSA 95:2 Iya sinthe galatara shiiqoos. Galata mazmure ufaysan yexoos.
PSA 95:3 Goday wolqaama Xoosse; xoossata ubbaa bolla gita kawo.
PSA 95:4 Biitta ciimmoti iya qaaqan de7oosona; deriya xeerati iyabaa.
PSA 95:5 I medhida gisho abbay iyabaa; mela biittaa iya kushey oothis.
PSA 95:6 Haayite; ane gufannidi iya goyinnoos; nuna medhida Godaa sinthan gulbatoos.
PSA 95:7 I nu Xoossaa; nuuni iya qooron de7iya dereta; nuuni I heemmiya iya dorsata. Goday geysa hachi hinte si7iko,
PSA 95:8 Kase hinte mayzati Mariban hanidaysada, he gallas Maasan banta wozanaa minthidaysada, hinte, hinte wozanaa minthofite.
PSA 95:9 Enti ta malaalsiya oosuwa be7idika, tana paacidosona; taara eqetidosona.
PSA 95:10 Taani he yeletaa bolla oytamu laythi shaatettas; “Enti ubba wode banta wozanan baliya asata; enti ta ogiya erokona” yaagas.
PSA 95:11 Hessa gisho, “Enti ta shempo bessaa gelokona” yaagada ta hanquwan caaqas.
PSA 96:1 Godaas ooratha mazmure yexite; sa7an de7iya asa ubbay Godaas yexite.
PSA 96:2 Godaas yexite; iya suntha sabbite; Iya ashuwa gallas gallas odite.
PSA 96:3 Kawotethata giddon iya bonchuwa, asa ubbaa giddon iya malaalsiya oosuwa awaajite.
PSA 96:4 Goday gita gidiya gisho iyaw gita galatii bessees; xoossata ubbaafe aadhidi yayetanaw bessees.
PSA 96:5 Hara kawotethata xoossati ubbay eeqata; shin Goday salota medhida Xoossaa.
PSA 96:6 Bonchoynne sabi iya yuushon de7ees; minotethinne puulatethi iya keethan de7ees.
PSA 96:7 Biittan de7iya asa zare ubbay Godaaba odite; bonchoynne wolqi Godaaba giite.
PSA 96:8 Iya sunthaas bessiya bonchuwa Godaas ehite; Yarsho ekidi iya dabaaba gelite.
PSA 96:9 Iya geeshshatetha teemuwan Godaa goyinnite; biittan de7iya asaw ubbay iya sinthan kokorite.
PSA 96:10 Kawotethata giddon, “Goday kawotis! Sa7ay minnidi eqis; qaaxenna; I asaa bolla suure pirdana” yaagite.
PSA 96:11 Saloti ufayto; sa7ika hashshu go; abbaynne iya giddon de7iya ubbay guummo.
PSA 96:12 Goshshaynne iyan de7iya ubbay ufayto! Woran de7iya mitha ubbay ufaysan yexo.
PSA 96:13 Goday yaa gisho iya sinthan yexo; I sa7a bolla pirdanaw yees. I ha sa7aa bolla xillotethan, asaa bolla tumatethan pirdana.
PSA 97:1 Goday kawotida gisho sa7an de7iya asay ufayto; yuushoy abban teqetida biittati ufayto.
PSA 97:2 Shaarinne sakana dhumi iya yuushuwan de7ees; Xillotethinne tumatethi iya araata baaso.
PSA 97:3 Tami iya sinthara bees; iya yuushuwan de7iya morketa xuuggees.
PSA 97:4 Iya wol7anthay bitta ubbaa poo7isees; biittay hessa be7idi kokorees.
PSA 97:5 Dereti Godaa sinthan, sa7aa ubbaa Godaa sinthan muqaadada til7idosona.
PSA 97:6 Saloti iya xillotethaa awaajosona; asa ubbay iya bonchuwa be7oosona.
PSA 97:7 Eeqata goyinneysatinne entan ceeqeteysati ubbay yeellato; eeqati ubbay Godaas gulbato.
PSA 97:8 Abeeti Godaw, Xiyooney ne xillo pirdaa si7idi ufaytees; Yihuda macca naytika hashshu goosona.
PSA 97:9 Abeeti Godaw, neeni sa7a ubba bolla dhoqa; xoossata ubbaafe neeni dhoqu gadasa.
PSA 97:10 Godaa doseysato, iitaa ixite; iyan ammaneteyisata shempuwa I naagees; iitata kushepe enta ashshees.
PSA 97:11 Xillota bolla poo7oy poo7ees; wozana suuretas ufaysi de7ees.
PSA 97:12 Hinteno xilloto, Godan ufaytite; iya geeshsha sunthaa galatite.
PSA 98:1 Mazmure Goday malaalsiyaba oothida gisho, iyaw ooratha mazmure yexite. Iya ushacha kushey, iya geeshsha qesey iyaw xoono immis.
PSA 98:2 Goday ba xoonuwa erisis; ba xillotethaa kawotethatas qoncisis.
PSA 98:3 I Isra7eele asaa siiqeysanne entaw ammaneteysa hassayis. Sa7aa gaxaa gakanaw de7iya asa ubbay nu Xoossaa atotetha be7idosona.
PSA 98:4 Sa7a bolla de7iya asaw, Godaas ufaysan yexite; ufaysan ililishe sabbite.
PSA 98:5 Godaas diithi diixite; diithaninne mazmuren Godaa sabbite.
PSA 98:6 Suusul7enne moyze punnishe, ufaysan Godaa nu kawa sinthan yexite.
PSA 98:7 Abbaynne abba giddon kumida ubbay guummo; Sa7aynne sa7aa bolla de7iya ubbay yexo.
PSA 98:8 Shaafati banta kushiya baqo; zumati issife Godaa sinthan ufaysan yexo.
PSA 98:9 Goday sa7aa bolla pirdanaw yees; I ha sa7aa bolla xillotethan asaa bolla suuretethan pirdana.
PSA 99:1 Goday kawotida gisho kawotethati kokoro; araata bolla Kiruubeta giddon uttida gisho; biittay qaaxo.
PSA 99:2 Goday Xiyoonen gita; kawotethaa ubbaafe I dhoqu dhoqu gis.
PSA 99:3 Yashshiya iya gita sunthaa ubbay galato; I geeshshi.
PSA 99:4 Neeni, wolqaama kawoy suure pirda dosaasa. Neeni Yayqooba suuretethan minthadasa. Xillotethi essadasa.
PSA 99:5 Godaa, nu Xoossaa dhoqu dhoqu oothite; iya tohoy yedhiya bessan iya goyinnite; I geeshshi.
PSA 99:6 Museynne Aaroni iya kahineta giddofe koyrota; Sameeli iya woossidaysatape issuwa. Enti Godaako waassidosona; I enta si7is.
PSA 99:7 I shaara tuussaa giddora entaw haasayis; I immida higgiyanne wogaa naagidosona.
PSA 99:8 Abeeti Godaw, nu Xoossaw, ne enta woosa si7adasa. Ne entana maaradasa; gidoshin, enta nagara gisho enta seeradasa.
PSA 99:9 Goday nu Xoossay, geeshshi gidiya gisho, iya dhoqu dhoqu oothite; iya geeshsha zumaa bolla iya goyinnite.
PSA 100:1 Galata Mazmure Biittan de7iya asa ubbay, Godaas ufaysan ililite.
PSA 100:2 Godaas ufaysan haggaazite; ufaysa yethara iya sinthe shiiqite.
PSA 100:3 Goday Xoosse gideysa erite; nuna medhiday iya; nu iyabaa; nuuni iya asenne iya qooron heemetiya dorsata.
PSA 100:4 Iya pengiya galatara gelite, iya dabaaba sabara biite; iya galatitenne iya sunthaa anjite.
PSA 100:5 Goday keeha; iya siiqoy merinaasa; iya ammanetethay yeletape yeletaa gakanaasa.
PSA 101:1 Dawita Mazmure Ta ne siiquwabaanne ne xillo pirdaba yexana; Godaw, ta nena mazmuren galatana.
PSA 101:2 Taani suure ogiyan daana; neeni taako awude yaanee? Taani ta keethan suuretethan hemetana.
PSA 101:3 Taani ta ayfey iitabaa xeellenna; Xoossafe haakida asaa oosuwa ixayis; enti taara gahetokona.
PSA 101:4 Wozanaa geellatethi taape haako; iitatethaas besse immike.
PSA 101:5 Geeman ba laggiya zigiriya uraa si77i oothana; otortiyanne ceeqetiya asi taani danda7ike.
PSA 101:6 Enti taara daana mela, biitta bolla de7iya ammanetiya asata Taani keeha ayfen xeellayis; suuretethan hemetiya asi taw kiitetees.
PSA 101:7 Cimmiya asi ta keethan deenna; wordo haasaya asi ta sinthan eqenna.
PSA 101:8 Biittan de7iya iita asaa, taani gallas gallas si77i oothana. Iitaa ootheyisata ubbaa taani Godaa katamaape shoddana.
PSA 102:1 Un7etida wode Xoossa sinthan woossida asa woosa Godaw, ta woosa si7a; ta waasoy neeko gako.
PSA 102:2 Ta waayiya gallas ne som7uwa taape genthofa; ne haytha taako zaara; taani neeko waassiya wode, tana eeson alla.
PSA 102:3 Ta laythay cuyada dhayees; ta meqethay tamada eexees.
PSA 102:4 Ta wozanay buucidi yeggida maatada melis; kathika taw meetetenna.
PSA 102:5 Taani ta qaala dhoqu oothada oolida gisho; ta gogay meqethaara oyketis.
PSA 102:6 Taani woran de7iya solo mela, kaysa keethan de7iya gutto mela.
PSA 102:7 Taani zin7in dhiskoy yeenna; taani keetha huuphen barka uttida kafo gidas.
PSA 102:8 Ta morketi gallas kumethi tana cayoosona; tana qelqiseysati ta sunthan baaddoosona.
PSA 102:9 Bidoy taw kathi gidis; ta afuthay ta ushshara Walaketis.
PSA 102:10 Hessi haniday ne hanqoynne ne yiloy, tana denthadi wora holida gishosa.
PSA 102:11 Ta laythay omarsa kuya mela ellesidi aadhees; taani maatada shullayis.
PSA 102:12 Shin Godaw, neeni ne araatan merinaw uttadasa; ne sunthay yeletaape yeletaa gakanaw hassayetana.
PSA 102:13 Neeni iyo maariya wodey gakida gisho; dendada Xiyoones qadheta; neeni doorida wodey gakis.
PSA 102:14 I shuchati ne oosanchotas al7o; I biittayka enta qadhethees.
PSA 102:15 Kawotethati Godaa sunthaas yayyana; sa7aa kawoti iya bonchuwas dagammana.
PSA 102:16 Goday Xiyoone zaaridi keexana; ba gitatetha bessana.
PSA 102:17 I manqota woosa si7ana; enta oysha kadhenna.
PSA 102:18 Buroo yeletana asay Godaa galatana mela, haysi yaa yeletas xaafeto.
PSA 102:19 Goday dhoqan de7iya ba geeshsha bessaafe xeellis; salon gididi sa7aa xomoosees.
PSA 102:20 Hessika qashetida asaa waasuwa si7anawunne hayqo pirdetida asaa birshanaasa.
PSA 102:21 Hessa gisho, Godaa sunthay Xiyoonen odetana; iya galatay Yerusalaamen awaajettana.
PSA 102:22 Dereynne kawotethay shiiqidi, Godaas he wode goyinnana.
PSA 102:23 Taani na7atethan de7ishin, ta wolqaa ixisis; ta laytha qaamisis.
PSA 102:24 Taani, “Ta Xoossaw, ta laytha giddo zawan tana dhukofa” yaagayis. Godaw, neeni yeletape yeletaa gakanaw de7aasa.
PSA 102:25 Neeni beni sa7aa medhadasa; saloyka ne kushe ooso.
PSA 102:26 Haysati ubbay dhayana; shin neeni daana; enti ubbay afilada wurana. Neeni enta curqa afilada laammana; entika aadhana.
PSA 102:27 Shin neeni nena; ne laythay wurenna.
PSA 102:28 Ne aylleta nayta neeni saro wothaasa; enta kochay ne sinthan minnidi daana.
PSA 103:1 Dawita Mazmure Ta shempe Godaa galata! Ta kumetha asatethaw, iya geeshsha suntha galata.
PSA 103:2 Ta shempe Godaa galata! I new oothida keehatetha ubbaa dogopa.
PSA 103:3 I ne nagaraa ubbaa atto gees; ne harge ubbaafe nena pathees.
PSA 103:4 I nena hayqope ashshees; siiqoninne maarotan nena anjees.
PSA 103:5 Ne yalagatethay arganthada ooraxana mela, ne de7uwa lo77oban kalsees.
PSA 103:6 Goday qohetidaysatas xillotethaninne suuren pirdees.
PSA 103:7 I ba ogiya Muse, ba oosuwa Isra7eele asaa erisis.
PSA 103:8 Goday qadheteysanne maareysa; hanqetanaw eesotenna; iya siiqoy daro.
PSA 103:9 I ubba wode seerenna; merinaw hanqetenna.
PSA 103:10 I nuus nu nagaraada oothenna; nu iitatethaa mela zaarenna.
PSA 103:11 Saloy sa7ape dhoqeysada, Godaa yayyeysatas iya siiqoy gita.
PSA 103:12 Dolohape wulohi haakeysada, Goday nu nagara nuupe haassees.
PSA 103:13 Aawi ba naytas qadheteysada, Goday baw yayyeysatas qadhetees.
PSA 103:14 Nuuni aybipe medhetidaako I erees; nuuni biitta gideysa I akeekes.
PSA 103:15 Asi baw maata mela; I bazzo ciishshada ciyees.
PSA 103:16 Carkoy iya bolla carkiya wode dhayees; I dolida bessay zaaridi eretenna.
PSA 103:17 Shin Godaas yayyeysatas iya siiqoy merinaape merinaa gakanaasa; iya xillotethay na7a na7a gakanaasa.
PSA 103:18 Hessi haney iya caaquwa naageysatanne iya kiitaa polanaw minneysatasa.
PSA 103:19 Goday salotan ba araata essis; iya kawotethay ubbaa haarees.
PSA 103:20 Hinteno, iya kiitanchato, iya kiita naagiya wolqaamato, I odiyaba si7eysato, Godaa galatite!
PSA 103:21 Hinteno salon de7iya minoto, iya sheniya poleysato, Godaa galatite!
PSA 103:22 Hinteno, I haariya bessa ubban, de7iya medhetethato, Godaa galatite! Ta shempe Godaa galata!
PSA 104:1 Ta shempe, Godaa galata; abeeti Godaw, ta Xoossaw ne gita; neeni bonchonne teema ma7adasa.
PSA 104:2 Poo7o afilada guuluntadasa; neeni saluwa dunkaaneda toladasa.
PSA 104:3 Ne keethaa salo bolla keexaasa; shaara para gaare kessaasa; carko qefe bolla uttada baasa.
PSA 104:4 Carkoy new kiitancho, tama laco new oosancho oothaasa.
PSA 104:5 Ne, sa7aa iya baasuwa bolla essadasa; hessa gisho, merinaw qaaxenna.
PSA 104:6 Ciimmo abbay afilada biitta kammis; haathay gita dereta kammis.
PSA 104:7 Ne hanqetin haathati baqatidosona; ne deshuwa si7ida wode qosetidosona.
PSA 104:8 Enti dereta bollanne zangaarata giddo, ne entaw giigisida bessaa goggidosona.
PSA 104:9 Haathati simmidi biitta kammonnaada, enti aadhanaw danda7onna zawa wothadasa.
PSA 104:10 Neeni, pultoti zangaaran gogganaada oothadasa; shaafa haathati dereta giddora goggoosona.
PSA 104:11 Bazzo do7ati ubbay iyape uyoosona; bazzo hareti iyape saamo aloosona.
PSA 104:12 Salo kafoti he haatha matan banta keethaa keexidi, tashiya giddon yexoosona.
PSA 104:13 Ne gita dereta bolla salope ira buksaasa; iya kushe ooso ayfen biittiya kallasu.
PSA 104:14 Neeni mehes maata, asas kathi dolisaasa; hessan asay biitta oothidi, kathi shiishees.
PSA 104:15 Asa wozana ufaysiya woyne, som7o cil7isiya zaytenne wolqa immiya kathi dolisaasa.
PSA 104:16 Godaa mithati, I tokida Libaanose zigati, daro ira demmoosona.
PSA 104:17 Kafoti banta keetha yan keexoosona; xiloti xiidda bolla keexidi de7oosona.
PSA 104:18 Dhoqa dereta bolla gaarati de7oosona; gupalleti shucha qophon qosetoosona.
PSA 104:19 Wode taybuwa erisana mela, ne ageena medhadasa; away ba wulliya wodiya erees.
PSA 104:20 Neeni dhumaa medhadasa; qamma oothadasa; he dhuman wora do7i ubbay keyees.
PSA 104:21 Wodala gaammoti shankatishe gudoosona; enti bantaw miyaba Xoossafe koyoosona.
PSA 104:22 Awi doliya wode guye simmoosona; banta bessaa gelidi zin7oosona.
PSA 104:23 He wode asi ba oosos keyees; sa7i qammana gakanaw oothees.
PSA 104:24 Abeeti Godaw, ne oosoy ay mela daro; ne cincatethan ne enta ubbaa medhadasa; sa7i ne medhidaban kumis.
PSA 104:25 Heko, Abbay gitanne dalga; tayboy bayna qaaxiya medhetethan, gitatanne guutha medhetethan kumidi de7ees.
PSA 104:26 Iya bolla markabeti boosona; ne medhida Leewataane geetetiya dawey iyan kaa7ees.
PSA 104:27 Ne entaw koshshiya wodiyan miyaba immana mela, enti ubbay nena xeelloosona.
PSA 104:28 Ne entaw immin enti maxoosona; neeni ne kushiya miccin, enti lo77oba kalloosona.
PSA 104:29 Neeni ne som7uwa genthiya wode dagammoosona; neeni shempuwa ekiya wode hayqidi, banta biitta simmoosona.
PSA 104:30 Shin neeni ne shempuwa immiya wode, enti medhetoosona; biitta ooraxisaasa.
PSA 104:31 Godaa bonchoy merinaw de7o; Goday ba oosuwan ufayto.
PSA 104:32 I biitta xeelliya wode biittay qaaxees; I dereta bochiya wode dereti cuyoosona.
PSA 104:33 Ta de7o laytha ubban Godaas yexana; ta paxa de7iya wode ubban ta Xoossaa zammarana.
PSA 104:34 Taani Godan ufaytiya gisho, ta qofay iya ufayso.
PSA 104:35 Nagaranchoti biittafe dhayo; iita ootheysati de7opo. Ta shempe, Godaa galata; Goday galatetto.
PSA 105:1 Godaa galatite; iya suntha xeegite; I oothidaba kawotethatas odite.
PSA 105:2 Iya sabbite; galata mazmure yexite; malaalsiya iya ooso ubbaa odite.
PSA 105:3 Iya geeshsha sunthan ceeqite; Godaa koyeyisata wozanay ufayto.
PSA 105:4 Godaanne iya wolqan ammanetite; ubba wode iya koyite.
PSA 105:5 Hinteno, iya aylliya Abrahaame zareto, dooretida Yayqooba nayto, I oothida malaalsiyabata, iya malaatanne suure pirdaa hassayite.
PSA 105:7 I Godaa, nu Xoossaa; iya pirday biitta ubbaa bollana.
PSA 105:8 I ba caaquwa merinaw, ba gelida qaala mukulu yeleta gakanaw naagees.
PSA 105:9 I Abrahaamera caaqida ufaysa qaala, Yisaaqas gelida ufaysa qaala,
PSA 105:10 Yayqoobas woga, Isra7eeles merinaa caaquwa oothidi minthis.
PSA 105:11 I, “Kanaane biitta new immana; I ne kochaa gakida laata gidana” yaagis.
PSA 105:12 Xoossa asati taybon guuthanne Kanaane biittan bete asi gididi de7iya wode,
PSA 105:13 Issi deriyape hara deriya, issi kawotethaafe hara kawotethi yuuyidosona.
PSA 105:14 Xoossay oonika enta un7ethana mela oothibeenna; enta gisho kawota seeris.
PSA 105:15 “Ta tiyidaysata bochofite; ta nabeta qohopite” yaagis.
PSA 105:16 Goday biittan kosha yeddidi, enta kathaa ubbaa dhaysis.
PSA 105:17 Shin I ba asaa ashshanaw, issi addiya Gibxe kiittis; he uray aylle gididi bayzetida Yoosefa.
PSA 105:18 Iya tohoti biratan duxetidosona; I santhalaatan qashetis.
PSA 105:19 I kase odidaysi tumattana gakanaw, Godaa qaalay iya paacis.
PSA 105:20 Hessafe guye Gibxe kawoy ase yeddidi, iya qasho keethafe kessis.
PSA 105:21 Iya ba keethaa bolla godaa oothis; baw de7iya ubbaa bolla shuumis.
PSA 105:22 Ba moorinnata zorana mela, ba cimata cincatethi tamaarsana mela shuumis.
PSA 105:23 Isra7eeley Gibxe bis; Yayqoobi Kaama biittan uttis.
PSA 105:24 Goday ba asaa darsis; enta morketape aathidi enta minthis.
PSA 105:25 Ba asaa ixana mela Gibxe asaa wozanaa laammis; ba aylleta cimmana mela oothis.
PSA 105:26 Ba aylliya Musenne ba doorida Aarona entako kiittis.
PSA 105:27 Enti Gibxe asaa sinthan malaata, Kaama biittan malaalsiyaba oothidosona.
PSA 105:28 Goday dhumaa kiittidi, biitta dhumisis; shin Gibxe asay iya kiita polibookona.
PSA 105:29 Enta haatha suuthi laammidi, molota wodhis.
PSA 105:30 Enta biitta ubbaa, kawo gadhoka shodhe kunthis.
PSA 105:31 I kiittin, udunxenne biinne enta biitta ubbaa bolla biinney wodhis.
PSA 105:32 Ira gisho enta biitta bolla shachi, dadanne wol7anthi bukisis.
PSA 105:33 I enta woyniyanne balasiya shocis; enta biittan de7iya mithaa mentherethis.
PSA 105:34 I kiittin, booleynne tayboy bayna duggoy keyis.
PSA 105:35 Enta biittan dolida katha ubbaa mis; gaden de7iya cil7oba ubbaa dhaysis.
PSA 105:36 Goday Gibxe asaa bayra nayta ubbaa wodhis; koyro yeletida ubbaa dhaysis.
PSA 105:37 Hessafe guye, Isra7eele asaa worqanne bira alleeqora kessis; enta kochaa giddofe guye attiday oonika baawa.
PSA 105:38 Gibxe asay entaw yayyida gisho, enta kessan ufaytidosona.
PSA 105:39 Goday enta kammanaw shaara miccis; qamma entaw poo7isanaw tama giigisis.
PSA 105:40 Enti miyaba oychida wode, kuraacho daaniya kafota entaw yeddis; enta salo kathi kalsis.
PSA 105:41 I shuchaa phalqin, haathi pultis; mela biittan shaafada goggis.
PSA 105:42 I ba aylliya Abrahaames, gelida geeshsha qaala hassayis.
PSA 105:43 I ba asaa ufaysan, ba dooridaysata ililsan kessis.
PSA 105:44 I entaw allaga kawotethata biitta immis; Harati daaburida goshsha laattidosona.
PSA 105:45 I hessa oothiday enti iya wogaa iya higgiya naagananne oothana melasa. Goday galatetto!
PSA 106:1 Godaa galatite! I keeha gidiya gishonne iya siiqoy merinaasa gidiya gisho, Godaa galatite.
PSA 106:2 Goday oothida wolqaama ooso odanaw, woyko iya galataa ubbaa qoncisanaw danda7ey oonee?
PSA 106:3 Pirdaa naageysatinne ubba toho xillobaa ootheysati anjetidaasaata.
PSA 106:4 Abeeti Godaw, neeni ne asaas keehiya wode tana qopa; enta neeni ashshiya wode tana alla.
PSA 106:5 Hessika ne doorida asaa dichaa ta be7ana mela, ne asaa ufaysan taani ufaytana melanne ne asaara issife taani galatana melasa.
PSA 106:6 Nuuni nu aawatada nagara oothida; nu balida; iitabaa oothida.
PSA 106:7 Nu aawati Gibxen de7iya wode, malaalsiya ne oosuwa qopibookona. Ne siiquwa darotethaa enti hassaybookona; Zo7o abba matan iya bolla makallidosona.
PSA 106:8 Gidoshin, I ba sunthaa gisho, ba gita wolqaa erisanaw enta ashshis.
PSA 106:9 I Zo7o abba kiittin, abbay melis; mela biittara kanthidi aadhiyada, ciimmo giddora enta kaalethidi pinthis.
PSA 106:10 I enta ixeyisata kushepe ashshis; morketa kushepe enta wozis.
PSA 106:11 Enta morketa haathay mittis; entafe issoyka attibeenna.
PSA 106:12 He wode enti iya ufaysa qaala ammanidosona; iya mazmuren sabboosona.
PSA 106:13 Gidoshin, enti I oothidaba dogidosona; I zoriya ogiya naagidi baanaw dosibookona.
PSA 106:14 Mela biittan de7ishe daro amotidosona; mela biittan Xoossaa paacidosona.
PSA 106:15 Enti woossidaysa I immis; shin iita harge enta giddo kiittis.
PSA 106:16 Mela biittan dunkaanen de7ishe Musenne Godaas dummatida Aarona qanaatidosona.
PSA 106:17 Biittay dooyetidi Daatane mittis; Abeero iya keetha asaara moogis.
PSA 106:18 Enta maabara giddon tami eexis; lacoy he iita asata xuuggis.
PSA 106:19 Koreeba zuman worqafe mara misile medhidosona; he misiliya goyinnidosona.
PSA 106:20 Enti, banta boncho Xoossa maata miya mehe misilen laammidosona.
PSA 106:21 Enti Gibxen gita ooso oothidanne entana ashshida Xoossaa dogidosona.
PSA 106:22 Kaama biittan oosetida malaalsiyabanne Zo7o Abban hanida malaata oothidaasaa.
PSA 106:23 Hessa gisho, Xoossay enta dhaysana gis; shin dhaysonna mela iya hanqo zaaranaw, Xoossay doorida Musey giddon eqis.
PSA 106:24 Hessafe guye, enti iya qaala ammanonna gisho, he lo77o biitta kadhidosona.
PSA 106:25 Enti banta dunkaaniya giddon zuuzumidosona Godaa qaalas kiitetibookona.
PSA 106:26 Hessa gisho, I enta bazzon yegganaw, ba kushiya denthidi caaqis.
PSA 106:27 Enta kochaa kawotethata giddon, yegganawunne biitta bolla laallanaw caaqis.
PSA 106:28 Hessafe guye, enti Bi7eel-Fagoora eeqa goyinneysatara issife gahetidosona; shempoy bayna eeqatas yarshetida yarshuwa midosona.
PSA 106:29 Banta oosuwan Godaa hanqethidosona; hessa gaason enta giddon iita hargey wodhis.
PSA 106:30 Shin Pinihaasi dendidi, enta nagaraa pirdin, iita hargey enta bollafe kichis.
PSA 106:31 Hessika, iyaw, yeletethaafe yeletethaa gakanaw merinaw xillotetha gididi taybetis.
PSA 106:32 Mariba pultuwa matan Godaa hanqethidosona; enta gaason Muse bolla metoy gakis.
PSA 106:33 Enti iya yiloyidosona; Muse doonape bessonna qaalay keyis.
PSA 106:34 Goday dhaysite gin, enti Kanaane asata dhaysibookona.
PSA 106:35 He palabaape, enti he asatara walaketidosona; enta de7o woga kaallidosona.
PSA 106:36 Xoossa asati enta eeqa goyinnidosona; hessi entaw xihe gidis.
PSA 106:37 Enti banta addenne macca nayta tuna ayyaanatas yarshidosona.
PSA 106:38 Enti xillo suuthu Kanaane eeqatas yarshidi, banta addenne macca nayta suutha gussidosona; he suuthan biittay tunis.
PSA 106:39 Hessada enti banta ooson tunidosona; banta hanotan banta layma kessidosona.
PSA 106:40 Hessa gisho, Godaa hanqoy iya asaa bolla eexis; I ba laata shaatetis.
PSA 106:41 I enta allaga kushen aathidi immis; enta morketi enta haaridosona.
PSA 106:42 Enta morketi enta un7ethidosona banta shenen enta aysidosona.
PSA 106:43 I enta daro wode ashshis; shin enti banta makalla aggonna ixidosona; banta nagaraa gaason dhayidosona.
PSA 106:44 Gidoshin, I enta waasuwa si7is; enta waayiya qopis.
PSA 106:45 I enta gisho, ba ufaysa qaala hassayis; ba siiquwa daruwan enta maaris.
PSA 106:46 Enta di77ida ubbay, entaw qadhetana mela oothis.
PSA 106:47 Nuuni ne geeshsha sunthaa galatana mela Abeeti Godaw, nu Xoossaw, nuna ashsha. Ne bonchuwan nu ceeqetana mela, kawotethata giddofe nuna shiisha.
PSA 106:48 Isra7eele Goday, Xoossay, merinaape merinaa gakanaw galatetto! Asa ubbay, “Amin7i” yaago. Godaa galatite!
PSA 107:1 I keeha gidiya gishonne iya siiqoy merinaasa gidiya gisho; Godaa galatite
PSA 107:2 Goday ashshidaysati, morke kushepe kessi ekidaysati haysada yaagidi odeto.
PSA 107:3 Enti Dolohapenne wulohape, pudehapenne dugehape biitta ubbaafe shiiqidaysata.
PSA 107:4 Entafe issoti issoti mela biittan yuuyidosona. Banta de7iya katamaa biya ogiya demmanaw danda7ibookona.
PSA 107:5 Enti koshatidosona; saamotidosona; enti un7etidosona.
PSA 107:6 Enti metootida wode, Godaako waassidosona; I enta waayiyape enta ashshis.
PSA 107:7 Enti daana katama gakanaw, enta suure ogen kaalethis.
PSA 107:8 Merina iya siiquwa gishonne I entaw oothida malaalsiya oosuwa gisho enti Godaa galato.
PSA 107:9 I saamotidaysata alisees; koshatidaysata lo77oba kalsees.
PSA 107:10 Issoti issoti sakana dhuman uttidosona; birata santhalaatan waayidosona.
PSA 107:11 Hessi haniday enti Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaa, kiita bolla makallida gishonne iya zoriya kadhida gishosa.
PSA 107:12 I enta waaye ooson daaburisis; enta maaddiya asi dhayin kundidosona;
PSA 107:13 Enti metootida wode, Godaako waassidosona; I enta waayiyape enta ashshis.
PSA 107:14 I enta sakana dhumape kessis; enti qashetida santhalaata duuthis.
PSA 107:15 Iya siiquwa gishonne I entaw oothida malaalsiya oosuwa gisho enti Godaa galato.
PSA 107:16 I naase birata pengeta menthis; birata kasota qanxis.
PSA 107:17 Issoti issoti eeya gididosona; banta oothida nagara gaason banta iitatetha gaason metootidosona.
PSA 107:18 Enti kathi ixida gisho hayqos gakidosona.
PSA 107:19 Enti metootida wode, Godaako waassidosona; I enta waayiyape enta ashshis.
PSA 107:20 I ba qaala kiittidi enta pathis; duufope enta ashshis.
PSA 107:21 Iya siiquwa gishonne I entaw oothida malaalsiya oosuwa gisho enti Godaa galato.
PSA 107:22 Enti iyaw galata yarsho shiisho; ufaysa yethan iya oosuwa odo.
PSA 107:23 Issoti issoti markaben abba bollara bidosona; abba bolla banta oosuwa oothidosona.
PSA 107:24 Enti Godaa oosuwa be7idosona; ciimmo abban oothida malaalsiyaba xeellidosona.
PSA 107:25 I kiitida wode gotey dendis; abba zuley qaaxis.
PSA 107:26 Enti pude dendidosona; duge ciimmon wodhidosona; iita metoy gakin enta wozanay til7is.
PSA 107:27 Enti mathotida asada dhubetidi gandigaridosona; enta eray maayis.
PSA 107:28 Enti metootida wode, Godaako waassidosona; I enta waayiyape enta ashshis.
PSA 107:29 I gotiya si77i oothis; abba beeta sirphi oothis.
PSA 107:30 Si77i gida gisho ufaytidosona; enti koyida katamaa Goday gathis.
PSA 107:31 Iya siiquwa gishonne I entaw oothida malaalsiya oosuwa gisho enti Godaa galato.
PSA 107:32 Deriya shiiquwan iya gitatetha awaajo; cimata duulatan iya galato.
PSA 107:33 Goday shaafata melisis; pultoti goggonnaada teqis.
PSA 107:34 He bessan de7iya asaa iitatethaa gisho, aradda biitta quu7e kessis.
PSA 107:35 I mela biittan haathe eelisis; mela biittan pultoy dhuuqanaada oothis.
PSA 107:36 Koshatida asaa he bessan wothis; bantaw daana katamaa yan keexidosona.
PSA 107:37 Enti banta goshshan zeridosona; woyne tokidosona; daro muruuto shiishidosona.
PSA 107:38 I enta anjin enti daridosona; enta mehiya taybuwa guuthibeenna.
PSA 107:39 Enti xoonetiya wodenne un7etiya wode, metoninne azzanon kawuyiya wode,
PSA 107:40 Goday enta halaqata kawushis; mela biittan toylatana mela oothis.
PSA 107:41 Shin manqota metope kessis; enta soo asaa dorsa wudeda darsis.
PSA 107:42 Suure asay hessa be7idi ufaytoosona; shin iita asay yeellatidi si77i goosona.
PSA 107:43 Cincati haysa ubbaa akeeko; Godaa siiquwa qopo.
PSA 108:1 Dawita Mazmure Ta wozanay minnidi de7ees; abeeti Xoossaw, ta wozanay minnidi de7ees. Ta new yexana; nena sabbana.
PSA 108:2 Ta shempe, barka; diithinne maasinqoy denda; Ta wonta guura dendana.
PSA 108:3 Abeeti Godaw, ta nena asaa giddon galatana; kawotethaa giddon nena sabbana.
PSA 108:4 Ne merinaa siiqoy salope dhoqa; ne ammanetethay shaarape dhoqa.
PSA 108:5 Abeeti Xoossaw, salope bollara ne dhoqu dhoqu ga; ne bonchoy sa7a ubbaa bolla gido.
PSA 108:6 Ne doseysati attana mela, ne ushacha kushen nuna ashsha; neeni ta woosa si7a.
PSA 108:7 Xoossay ba geeshsha bessan haysada yaagis; “Ta xoonada Seekema shaakana; Sukota zangaara gishana.
PSA 108:8 Galadinne Minaasey tabaa; Efreemi ta huuphen wothiya uke; Yihudi ta kawota xam7aa.
PSA 108:9 Moo7abey ta meecetiya gabate; Edoomey tabaa gideysa erisanaw ta caammaa iya bolla wothana. Filisxeeme xoonada gereerana” yaagis.
PSA 108:10 Godaw, gimbetida katamaako, tana efanay oonee? Edoome gakanaw tana kaalethanay oonee?
PSA 108:11 Abeeti Xoossaw, nuna aggiday nena gidikii? Abeeti Xoossaw, ne nu tooranchotara olas keyaka.
PSA 108:12 Asa maadoy pathenna gisho, morkiya olanaw ne nuna maadda.
PSA 108:13 Xoossaa wolqan nu morketa xoonana; nu morketa kawushanay iya.
PSA 109:1 Dawita Mazmure Abeeti ta nena galatiya Xoossaw, ne taw si77i goopa.
PSA 109:2 Iita asatinne wordanchoti, banta doona ta bolla dooyidosona; banta wordo inxarsan ta bolla haasayoosona.
PSA 109:3 Ixon ta yuushuwa teqidosona; gaasoy bayna tana olidosona.
PSA 109:4 Ta enta dosaysinne entaw woossayis; gidoshin, enti tana mootosona.
PSA 109:5 Ta lo77o oothin, taw iita zaarosona; ta enta dosin, enti tana ixoosona.
PSA 109:6 Ta morkiya bolla iita daynna shuuma; mootanchoy iya ushachan eqo.
PSA 109:7 Iya pilgiya wode I bala gididi bento; iya woosay iyaw gome gido.
PSA 109:8 Iya laythay qaammo; iya shuumatetha hari eko.
PSA 109:9 Iya nayti yi7o gido; iya machiya am7o gido.
PSA 109:10 Iya nayti woosancho gididi toylato; banta de7iya humpa keethaafe goodeto.
PSA 109:11 Iya shalo ubbaa acoy oyko; I daaburidi kessidaba ubba allagi bonqo.
PSA 109:12 Oonika iyaw keehopo; iya naytas qadhetiya asi bentofo.
PSA 109:13 Iya nayti ubbay hayqidi wuro; kaalliya yeletethan iya sunthay dogeto.
PSA 109:14 Iya aawata nagaray Godaa sinthan qofeto; iya aaye nagaray qushetofo.
PSA 109:15 Goday enta nagara ubba wode qopo; enti sa7a bolla hassayetofo.
PSA 109:16 I keeha oothanaw polo qopibeenna; manqota, metootanchota, qohetidaysata gooddidi wodhis.
PSA 109:17 I baaddanaw dosida gisho, I baadetidaysa gido. I anjanaw dosonna gisho, iya anjoy iyape haakis.
PSA 109:18 Baadethi iya afilada ma7is; iya baadethi haathada iya bolla laakisis; zayteda iya meqethaa giddo gelo.
PSA 109:19 Afilada iya kammo; dancoda ubba wode iya xeessan de7o.
PSA 109:20 Ha tana mooteysanne ta bolla iita odeteyisata Goday hessada oothidi seero.
PSA 109:21 Shin abeeti Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, ne suntha gisho tana maadda. Ne merinaa siiquwanne ne keehatetha gisho tana ashsha.
PSA 109:22 Taani manqonne metootancho asi; ta wozanay madunxis.
PSA 109:23 Ta omarsa kuyada dhayana hanayis; ta booleda qoqofetas.
PSA 109:24 Xooman ta gulbatay daaburis; ta asatethay laafin meqethi attis.
PSA 109:25 Tana mooteysatas qelqisethas attas; tana be7idi, banta huuphiya qaathosona.
PSA 109:26 Abeeti Godaw ta Xoossaw, tana maadda; merinaa ne siiquwada tana ashsha.
PSA 109:27 Ne kushey haysa oothidaysanne, ne haysa oothidaysa ta morketi ero.
PSA 109:28 Enti tana baaddoosona, shin ne tana anjana; tana gooddeysati yeellato; shin ne tana ufaysa.
PSA 109:29 Tana mooteysati yeella ma7o; banta kawushaa afilada ma7o.
PSA 109:30 Taani ta inxarsan Godaa galatana; deriya shiiquwan iya sabbana.
PSA 109:31 I manqota gisho mootetees; hayqos pirdetidaysata ashshees.
PSA 110:1 Dawita mazmure Goday ta godaa, “Ta ne morketa ne tohoy yedhiya bessi oothana gakanaw, haysan taape ushacha baggan utta” yaagis.
PSA 110:2 Godaw ne minotetha xam7a Xiyoonepe yedda; “Ne morketa haara” yaagana.
PSA 110:3 Ne haariya gallas ne derey dosidi new haaretana; ne geeshsha ma7uwa ma7ada, wonta xalqeda ne kumetha wolqan phoolana.
PSA 110:4 Goday, “Malkexaadeqi kahine gididaysada, ne merinaw kahine gidana” yaagidi caaqis; iya caaqoy laametenna.
PSA 110:5 Goday ne ushachan de7ees; ba hanquwa gallas kawota tincherethana.
PSA 110:6 I kawotethata bolla pirdana; ola denbata aha xalaala oothana; biitta ubban de7iya kawota dhaysana.
PSA 110:7 Kawoy oge lanqen de7iya pultuwafe uyidi, I ba huuphiya dhoqu oothana.
PSA 111:1 Godaa galatite; Suureta shiiqon ta kumetha wozanan Godaa galatana.
PSA 111:2 Godaa oosoti ay mela gite! Entan ufaytiya ubbay enta qopees.
PSA 111:3 Iya oosoti bonchoninne teeman kumis; iya xillotethay merinaw de7ees.
PSA 111:4 Iya malaalsiya oosoy hassayetishe daanada oothis; I keehanne qadhetiya Godaa.
PSA 111:5 Baw yayyeysatas kathi immees; ba caaqo qaala merinaw baletenna.
PSA 111:6 Allagata biitta ba asaas aathidi immidi, ba gita wolqaa ba asaa bessis.
PSA 111:7 Iya kushe oosoti tumanne suure; iya woga ubbay ammanetidaysa.
PSA 111:8 Enti merinaw eqidi de7oosona; tumatethaninne suuretethan imetidosona.
PSA 111:9 I ba asaa wozis; caaqo entara merinaw essis; iya sunthay geeshshinne yashsheysa.
PSA 111:10 Cincatethas koyroy Godaas yashshi; iya wogaa naageysatas lo77o akeeki de7ees. Goday merinaw galatetto!
PSA 112:1 Godaa galatite; Godaas yayeysinne iya kiita naageysi anjetidaysa.
PSA 112:2 Iya nayti biittan wolqaama gidana; suure asaa yeletay anjetana.
PSA 112:3 Shaloynne duretethi iya keethan de7ees; iya xillotethay merinaw daana.
PSA 112:4 Keeha, xillonne qadhetiya asas, dhuma giddon poo7oy poo7ees.
PSA 112:5 Keehatethan coo tal7iya uraas, ba oosuwa suuretethan oothiya uraas keehabay yaana.
PSA 112:6 Xillo asi awudeka kundenna; I merinaw hassayetana.
PSA 112:7 Iya wozanay hirgonna gishonne I Godan ammanetiya gisho, iitabaa si7ikoka I dagammenna;
PSA 112:8 Iya wozanay mino gidiya gisho yayyenna; wursethan iya morketi xoonetin be7ana.
PSA 112:9 I manquwas darsidi immees; iya xillotethay merinaw de7ees; iya kacey bonchon dhoqu dhoqu gaana.
PSA 112:10 Iita asi hessa be7idi yilotees; mettershe saxishe coo dhayees; iita asa amoy coo attana.
PSA 113:1 Godaa galatite; hinteno, Godaa aylleto, Godaa sunthaa galatite.
PSA 113:2 Godaa sunthay, hachife merinaa gakanaw galatetto.
PSA 113:3 Away doliyasuwape wulliyasuwa gakanaw, Godaa sunthay galatetto.
PSA 113:4 Goday kawotetha ubbaa haarees; iya bonchoy saluwape dhoqa.
PSA 113:5 Godaa nu Xoossaa meli oonee? I bolla dhoqan ba araatan uttis.
PSA 113:6 I salotanne sa7aa be7anaw duge hokees.
PSA 113:7 I manquwa baanape dhoqu oothees; metootanchuwa bidope denthees.
PSA 113:8 Moorinnatara lagge oothees; halaqatara dhoqa bessan utisees.
PSA 113:9 Mayntha maccasiw nayta aayo oothidi, ufaysidi I keethan iyo bonchisees. Godaa galatite!
PSA 114:1 Isra7eele asay Gibxe biittafe keyida wode, Yayqooba sheeshay allaga qaalan, haasaya asaa aggidi bida wode,
PSA 114:2 Yihuda asay Godaas geeshsha asi gidis; Isra7eele asay iyaw haaretis.
PSA 114:3 Abbay hessa be7idi baqatis; Yordaanose shaafay guye simmis.
PSA 114:4 Dereti deeshada gupidosona; zumati dorsa marada dozgidosona.
PSA 114:5 Abbaw, ne ayis baqatadii? Yordaanose, ne ayis guye simmadii?
PSA 114:6 Dereto, deeshada ayis gupidetii? zumato, dorsada ayis dozgidetii?
PSA 114:7 Neno biittaw, Godaa sinthan, Yayqooba Xoossaa sinthan kokora.
PSA 114:8 I zaalla eele haathi kessees; mino zaalla haatha pulto oothees.
PSA 115:1 Abeeti Godaw, nu gisho gidonashin, ne siiquwanne ne ammanetetha gisho, ne sunthaa boncha.
PSA 115:2 Ayis kawotethati, “Enta Xoossay awunee?” yaaganee?
PSA 115:3 Nu Xoossay salon de7ees; ba dosidaba ubbaa oothees.
PSA 115:4 Shin enta eeqati ase kushen oosetidosona; enti birapenne worqafe medhetidosona.
PSA 115:5 Entaw dooni de7ees, shin haasayokona; ayfey de7ees, shin xeellokona.
PSA 115:6 Entaw haythi de7ees, shin si7okona; siidhey de7ees, shin singokona.
PSA 115:7 Entaw kushey de7ees, shin bochi erokona; tohoy de7ees, shin hemetokona; enta siixinathara kooshinchi keyenna.
PSA 115:8 Enta medheysatinne enta ammaneteysati enta mela gido.
PSA 115:9 Isra7eele asaw, Godan ammanetite; hintena maaddeynne hinte gondalley iya.
PSA 115:10 Aarona keetha asaw, Godan ammanetite; hintena maaddeynne hinte gondalley iya.
PSA 115:11 Godaas yayyeysato, Godan ammanetite; hintena maaddeynne hinte gondalley iya.
PSA 115:12 Goday nuna qopees; I nuna anjana; I Isra7eele asaa anjana; I Aarona keetha asaa anjana.
PSA 115:13 Godaas yayyeyisata, guuthaa gita anjana.
PSA 115:14 Goday hintena darso; hintenanne hinte nayta anjo.
PSA 115:15 Saluwanne sa7aa medhida Goday hintena anjo.
PSA 115:16 Saloy Xoossaba; shin sa7a asas immis.
PSA 115:17 Hayqidaysati Godaa galatokonna; duufon zin7idaysati iya sabbokona.
PSA 115:18 Shin nuuni, de7on de7eysati, hachife merinaa gakanaw, Godaa galatoos. Godaa galatite.
PSA 116:1 Goday ta waasuwanne ta woosa si7ida gisho, taani iya dosayis.
PSA 116:2 I ba haytha taako zaarida gisho, ta de7o laytha ubban iya xeegana.
PSA 116:3 Hayqoy xiheda tana teqis; duufo hirgay tana oykis; un7inne metoy tana qachis.
PSA 116:4 He wode, “Abeeti Godaw, tana ashsha” yaagada Godaa suntha xeegas.
PSA 116:5 Goday keehanne xillo; nu Xoossay qadhetees.
PSA 116:6 Goday ashketa naagees; ta metootida wode tana ashshis.
PSA 116:7 Goday new keeha gidiya gisho, hiza ta shempe, wopu ga.
PSA 116:8 Goday ta shempuwa hayqope, ta ayfiya afuthafe, ta tohuwa dhubepe ashshis.
PSA 116:9 Taani de7on de7eyisata giddon, Godaa sinthan hemetayis.
PSA 116:10 Taani, “Daro waayetas” gida wode, ta ammanuwa aggabike.
PSA 116:11 Taw sa7i haddirida wode, “Asi ubbay wordancho” yaagas.
PSA 116:12 I taw keehida keehatetha gisho Godaas ay qanxanaw danda7iyana?
PSA 116:13 Goday tana ashshida gisho galatana, xuu7a woyne ushsha yarsho oothada shiishana.
PSA 116:14 Iya asaa ubbaa sinthan ta qangetha Godaas gathana.
PSA 116:15 Geeshshata hayqoy Godaa sinthan, daro al7o.
PSA 116:16 Abeeti Godaw, taani ne aylle; taani ne aylle, ne gadhinde na7aa; tana qashope ne birshadasa.
PSA 116:17 Godaw, ta galata yarsho new yarshana; ne sunthaa xeegana.
PSA 116:18 Asa ubbaa sinthan ta qangetha Godaas gathana.
PSA 116:19 Yerusalaamen de7iya Xoossa keethaa dabaaban, ta qangetha gathana. Godaa galatite.
PSA 117:1 Kawotethati ubbay Godaa galatite; asa ubbay iya sabbite.
PSA 117:2 Iya siiqoy nuus mino; iya ammanetethay merinaasa. Godaa galatite.
PSA 118:1 Goday keeha gidiya gisho galatite; iya siiqoy merinaasa.
PSA 118:2 Isra7eele asay, “Iya siiqoy merinaasa” yaago.
PSA 118:3 Aarona keetha asay, “Iya siiqoy merinaasa” yaago.
PSA 118:4 Godaas yayiya ubbay, “Iya siiqoy merinaasa” yaago.
PSA 118:5 Ta un7etida wode Godaako waassas; I ta waasuwa si7idi tana la77a kessis.
PSA 118:6 Goday taara de7iya gisho ta yayyike; asi tana ay oothanee?
PSA 118:7 Goday tana maaddanaw taara de7ees; ta morketa xoonetethaa ta be7ana.
PSA 118:8 Asan ammanetanape Godan geemmidi atteysi lo77o.
PSA 118:9 Gita asan ammanetanape Godan geemmidi atteysi lo77o.
PSA 118:10 Kawotethati ubbay tana teqidi oykidosona; shin Godaa sunthan ta enta xoonas.
PSA 118:11 Enti ta yuushuwa teqidosona; shin Godaa sunthan ta enta xoonas.
PSA 118:12 Enti ta yuushuwa mathada teqidosona; Shin buurey taman eexeysada eexidi dhayidosona; Godaa sunthan ta enta dhaysas.
PSA 118:13 Taani sugetada kundanaw gakas; shin Goday tana maaddis.
PSA 118:14 Goday ta minotethaanne yethaa; I tana ashsheysa gidis.
PSA 118:15 Xillota dunkaaniyan ola xoonidi, simmiya asaa ufaysas giyaba si7ite; Godaa ushacha kushey gitaba oothis.
PSA 118:16 Godaa ushacha kushey xoono immis; Godaa ushacha kushey gitaba oothis.
PSA 118:17 Taani hayqike; de7on daana; Goday oothidaba awaajana.
PSA 118:18 Goday tana iita seera seeris; shin hayqos aathidi immibeenna.
PSA 118:19 Taani gido gelada Godaa galatana mela, xillotetha pengeta taw dooyite.
PSA 118:20 Haysi Godaa penge; xilloti iyara geloosona.
PSA 118:21 Godaw, ne tana si7ida gishonne taw xoono immida gisho ta nena galatayis.
PSA 118:22 Gimbeysati kadhidi yeggida shuchay, godaa xaphuwa minthiya shuchu gidis.
PSA 118:23 Haysi Godaa ooso; nu ayfiyas malaalsiyaba.
PSA 118:24 Haysi gallasay Goday oothida gallas; ane nuuni iyan ufaytoosinne ililoos.
PSA 118:25 Godaw, ha77i nuna ashsha; Godaw, ha77i nuus injeya.
PSA 118:26 Godaa sunthan yaa asi anjetidaysa gido; nuuni Xoossa keethaafe hintena anjoos.
PSA 118:27 Goday Xoossaa; I nu bolla poo7isis; yarsho bessan de7iya kaciyako keyite; irxa tashe oykidi ba7aale bonchite.
PSA 118:28 Neeni ta Xoossaa; ta nena galatana; neeni ta Xoossaa; ta nena sabbana.
PSA 118:29 Goday keeha gidiya gisho iya galatite; iya siiqoy merinaasa.
PSA 119:1 Banta ogiyan borey baynaysatinne Godaa wogaada hemeteysati anjetidaysata.
PSA 119:2 Iya kiitaa naageysatinne banta kumetha wozanan iya koyeysati anjetidaysata.
PSA 119:3 Enti bala oothidi erokona; Godaa ogiyan hemetoosona.
PSA 119:4 Ne kiita ammanetidi naagana mela, neeni nuna kiittadasa.
PSA 119:5 Ne wogaa naagada ta ogey minnana mela koyayis.
PSA 119:6 Ne kiita ubbaa akeekada, ta polo yeellatike.
PSA 119:7 Ne xillo pirdaa ta tamaarida wode, ta nena suure wozanan galatana.
PSA 119:8 Ta ne higgiya naagana; tana polo yeggofa.
PSA 119:9 Yalagay ba ogiya waatidi, geeshshatethan naaganaw danda7ii? Ne qaala kiitetiko danda7ees.
PSA 119:10 Ta kumetha wozanan nena koyas; ne kiitaape kare keyonnaada tana naaga.
PSA 119:11 Taani ne bolla nagara oothonna mela ne qaala ta wozanan qosas.
PSA 119:12 Abeeti Godaw, ne galateta; ne awaajuwa tana tamaarsa.
PSA 119:13 Ne doonape keyiya pirda ubbaa taani ta inxarsan odana.
PSA 119:14 Duretethan ufayteysafe aathada, ta ne higgiyan ufaytayis.
PSA 119:15 Ne wogata zaara zaarada qopayis ne ogiya loythada akeekayis.
PSA 119:16 Taani ne higgiyan ufaytayis; ne qaala dogike.
PSA 119:17 Taani de7on daana melanne ne qaala kiitetana mela taw ne aylliyas lo77oba ootha.
PSA 119:18 Ne higgiyan de7iya malaalsiya tumatethaa ta be7ana mela ta ayfiya dooya.
PSA 119:19 Taani ha sa7an imathe; ne kiita taape genthofa.
PSA 119:20 Ta shempiya ubba wode ne pirdaa laamotashe hayqasu.
PSA 119:21 Otoreyisata, baadetidaysatanne, ne kiitaape kare keyeyisata ne seerasa.
PSA 119:22 Taani neeni odidaysa oothida gisho, enta cashshaanne boriya ta bollafe digga.
PSA 119:23 Hari attoshin halaqati shiiqidi, ta bolla maqetikoka, taani, ne oosanchoy, ne awaajuwa zaara zaarada qopana.
PSA 119:24 Ne markatethay tana ufaysees; I tana zorees.
PSA 119:25 Taani hayqana hanayis; ne gida qaalada tana ashsha.
PSA 119:26 Taani ta ogiyaba new odin, ne tana si7adasa; hiza ne awaajuwa tana tamaarsa.
PSA 119:27 Ne wogaa tana akeekisa; malaalsiya oosuwa taani zaara zaarada qopana.
PSA 119:28 Azzanoy darida gisho ta shempoy daaburis; neeni gida qaalada tana minthetha.
PSA 119:29 Wordo oge taape haassa; ne keehatethan ne higgiya tana tamaarsa.
PSA 119:30 Taani tuma oge dooras; ne pirdaa hayzas.
PSA 119:31 Abeeti Godaw, ta ne higgiya minthada oykas; hiza tana yeellayopa!
PSA 119:32 Ta wozanaa la77a kessida gisho, taani ne higgiya ogiyan woxayis.
PSA 119:33 Abeeti Godaw, ne awaajuwa birshethaa tana tamaarsa; taani wursethi gakanaw iya naagana.
PSA 119:34 Taani ne higgiya naagana malanne ta kumetha wozanaape iyaw kittaatan mela, ne taw akeeka imma.
PSA 119:35 Taani iyan ufaytiya gisho, ne kiita ogiyan tana kaaletha;
PSA 119:36 Ta wozanaa amuwako gidonashin, ne higgiyako tana zaara.
PSA 119:37 Pathonnaba xeellonna mela, ta ayfeta teqa; ne ogiyan ta de7uwa ooraxisa.
PSA 119:38 New yayyana mela, ne gelida qaala, taw ne aylliyas, pola.
PSA 119:39 Tana yashshiya cashsha taape digga; ne pirday ay mela lo77o!
PSA 119:40 Taani ne wogaa naaganaw amottayis; neeni xillo gidiya gisho, ta de7uwa ooraxisa.
PSA 119:41 Abeeti Godaw, ne siiquwa tana bessa; neeni gelida qaalada tana ashsha.
PSA 119:42 Taani ne qaalan ammanetiya gisho, tana cayeyisata zaaranaw danda7ayis.
PSA 119:43 Taani ne pirda ufaysi oothida gisho, ta inxarsaafe tumatethaa qaala dhaysofa.
PSA 119:44 Taani merii merinaw ne higgiya kiitetana.
PSA 119:45 Taani ne woga poliya gisho, aahon hemetana.
PSA 119:46 Taani kawota sinthan eqada, neeni gidaba odashe yeellatike.
PSA 119:47 Taani ne kiitata dosayis, entan ufaytayis.
PSA 119:48 Taani dosiya ne kiita bonchayis; ne awaajuwa zaara zaarada qopana.
PSA 119:49 Neeni taw, ne aylliyas, immida qaala qopa; ne qaalan taani ufaysi oothayis.
PSA 119:50 Ne qaalay tana de7on wothees; I meto wode tana minthethees.
PSA 119:51 Otoranchoti tana likefe aathidi cayoosona; shin taani ne higgiyafe sher7i giike.
PSA 119:52 Abeeti Godaw, benipe de7iya ne pirda taani hassayayis; hessan taani minettayis.
PSA 119:53 Iitati ne higgiya kiitetonaysa be7in, tana yiloy wodhis.
PSA 119:54 Taani de7iya allaga biittan ne awaajoy taw yethi gidis.
PSA 119:55 Abeeti Godaw, taani qamma ne suntha qopayis; ne higgiya naagayis.
PSA 119:56 Ta Ne woga naagana; I taw ooso gidis.
PSA 119:57 Abeeti Godaw, ta saamay nena; ta ne higgiya naaganaw qanxas.
PSA 119:58 Ta kumetha wozanan nena woossayis; ne gelida qaalada taw qadheta.
PSA 119:59 Taani ta ogiya akeeka xeellada, ne higgiya kaallanaw simmas.
PSA 119:60 Taani ne kiita naaganaw, eesotanaape attishin, gam7ike.
PSA 119:61 Iitati taw xihe yeggikoka, taani ne higgiya dogike.
PSA 119:62 Ne xillo pirda gisho, nena galatanaw, taani gidi bilahe dendayis.
PSA 119:63 Taani new yayyeyisata ubbaasinne ne wogaa naageysata dabbo.
PSA 119:64 Abeeti Godaw, sa7i ne siiquwan kumis; ne awaajuwa tana tamaarsa.
PSA 119:65 Abeeti Godaw, ne gelida qaalada taw ne aylliyas keehaba oothadasa.
PSA 119:66 Taani ne kiitatan ammanetiya gisho, lo77o pirdanne eratethi tana tamaarsa.
PSA 119:67 Taani seeretanaape kase kare hemetas; shin ha77i ne qaalas kiitetayis.
PSA 119:68 Neeni keeha; neeni keehaba oothaasa; ne awaajuwa tana tamaarsa.
PSA 119:69 Otoranchoti ta sunthaa wordon iissoosona; shin ta ne wogaa ta kumetha wozanan naagana.
PSA 119:70 Enta wozanay kumthi doccis; shin taani ne higgiyan ufaytayis.
PSA 119:71 Ne higgiya tamaarana mela ne tana seeridaysi taw lo77o gidis.
PSA 119:72 Daro worqafenne birape, ne doonape keyiya higgey taw aadhees.
PSA 119:73 Tana ne kushey medhis; ne kushey giigisis; ne kiita tamaarana mela taw akeeka imma.
PSA 119:74 Taani ne qaalan ufaysi oothida gisho, nena boncheysati tana be7idi ufayto.
PSA 119:75 Abeeti Godaw, ne pirday xillo gideysa eras; ne tana seeriday ammanetethan gideysa ta akeekas.
PSA 119:76 Taw ne aylliyas gida qaalada, ne siiqoy tana minthetho.
PSA 119:77 Ne higgey tana ufaysiya gisho, taani de7on daana mela taw qadheta.
PSA 119:78 Otoranchoti tana wordon mootiya gisho yeellato; taani ne wogaa zaara zaarada qopayis.
PSA 119:79 New yayyeysatinne ne markatethaa ereysati taako yo.
PSA 119:80 Ta yeellatonna mela, ta wozanay ne higgiyan borey baynaysa gido.
PSA 119:81 Neeni tana ashshana mela, taani naagashe daaburas; taani ne qaalan ufaysi oothayis.
PSA 119:82 Neeni gida qaalay poletin be7anaw naagishin ta ayfey teljumis. “Ne tana awude minthethane” yaagas.
PSA 119:83 Cuyan kaqetida ogoroda gundas; gidoshin ne awaajuwa balabiike.
PSA 119:84 Taani ne aylley awude gakanaw naago? Tana yedetheyisata ne awude pirdanee?
PSA 119:85 Ne higgiya naagonna otoranchoti tana oykanaw olla bookosona.
PSA 119:86 Ne kiita ubbay ammantheyisata; gaasoy bayna asay tana yedethiya gisho tana maadda.
PSA 119:87 Enti tana wodhi diggidi aggidosona; shin ta ne wogaa aggabike.
PSA 119:88 Ne siiquwan ta de7uwa naaga; ta ne kiitaa naagana.
PSA 119:89 Abeeti Godaw, ne qaalay merinaasa; I salon minnidi de7ees.
PSA 119:90 Yeletape yeletaa gakanaw ne ammanetaasa; ne ha sa7aa minthada essadasa; ika minnidi de7ees.
PSA 119:91 Ubbay ne aylle gidiya gisho, hachi gakanaw ubbay ne kiittada minnidi de7ees;
PSA 119:92 Ne higgey tana ufaysonnaba gidiyako, ta waayan ta dhayanashin.
PSA 119:93 Taani ne wogaa kumethi dogike; neeni iyan tana de7on wothadasa.
PSA 119:94 Taani nebaa gidiya gisho tana ashsha; taani ne wogaa naaganaw koyayis.
PSA 119:95 Iitati tana dhaysanaw zugidi naagoosona; shin taani neena qopayis.
PSA 119:96 Polo geetetidaba ubbaas zawi de7eysa ta be7as; shin polo gidida higgiyas zawi baawa.
PSA 119:97 Taani ne higgiya waanada dosiyana! kumetha gallas taani iya qopayis.
PSA 119:98 Ne kiitay ubba wode taara de7iya gisho, ta morketape aathidi tana akeeka kessoosona.
PSA 119:99 Taani nee higgiya qopiya gisho, ta astamaaretape aadhida cincatethi taw de7ees.
PSA 119:100 Taani ne wogaa kiitetiya gisho, cimatape aathada akeekayis.
PSA 119:101 Taani ne qaala kiitetanaw koyiya gisho, ta tohuwa iita oge ubbaafe naagas.
PSA 119:102 Neeni tana tamaarsida gisho, ta ne higgiyafe gaxa keyike.
PSA 119:103 Ne qaalay waanidi mal7i! ililo eessafe aadhidi mal7ees.
PSA 119:104 Ne wogaape akeeka demmas; hessa gisho, geella oge ubbaa ixas.
PSA 119:105 Ne qaalay ta tohuwas xompe, ta ogiyas poo7o.
PSA 119:106 Ne xillo pirdada daanaw, ta caaqida caaquwa minthana.
PSA 119:107 Abeeti Godaw, ta waayey daro; ne ufaysa qaalada tana de7on wotha.
PSA 119:108 Abeeti Godaw, ta galataa yarshuwa eka; tana ne pirdaa tamaarsa.
PSA 119:109 Ta shempoy ubba wode meton de7ees; shin taani ne higgiya dogike.
PSA 119:110 Iitati taw gite yeggidosona; shin taani ne wogaape kare keyabike.
PSA 119:111 Ne higgey taw merinaa shalo; I ta wozanaas ufaysi immees.
PSA 119:112 Ta hayqana gakanaw ne awaajuwada oothanaw qofa qachas.
PSA 119:113 Taani nam7u qofi de7iya asaa ixayis; shin ne higgiya dosayis.
PSA 119:114 Ne taw gondallenne qosetada attiya besse taani ne qaalan ufaysi oothayis.
PSA 119:115 Taani ta Xoossaa kiita naagana mela, hinteno, iita oothiya ubbay taape haakite.
PSA 119:116 Taani de7on daana mela ne ufaysa qaalada tana minthetha; ta ufaysaa dhumisopa.
PSA 119:117 Ta saro daana mela tana zempisa; ta ubba wode ne awaajuwa si7ana.
PSA 119:118 Ne awaajuwafe haakeyisata ne koyaka; enta cimoy hada.
PSA 119:119 Iitata ubbaa ne pitoda taybaasa; hessa gisho, taani ne kiitaa dosayis.
PSA 119:120 Ta asatethay yashshan new kokorees; ta ne higgiya daro yayyayis.
PSA 119:121 Ta suurenne xillo oothas; tana ta morketas aathada immofa.
PSA 119:122 Tana ne aylliya maaddanaw caaqa; tana otoranchoti un7ethana mela oothofa.
PSA 119:123 Ne tana ashshana gada ta xeellishin, ne xillo qaala ta naagishin, ta ayfey teljumis.
PSA 119:124 Taw ne aylliyas, ne siiquwada ootha; ne higgiya tana tamaarsa.
PSA 119:125 Tana ne aylliya ne siiquwa bessa; ne wogaa erana mela taw akeeka imma.
PSA 119:126 Abeeti Godaw, asay ne higgiya menthida gisho, ne pirdana wodey ha77i gakis.
PSA 119:127 Taani ne kiita worqafe aathada dosay; ee, walahi bayna worqafe aathada dosayis.
PSA 119:128 Hessa gisho, ta ne wogata ubbaa kaallayis; geella oge ubbaa ixas.
PSA 119:129 Ne woga ubbay malaalsiyaba; hessa gisho, ta iya kiitetayis.
PSA 119:130 Ne qaala birshethay poo7o immees; cincatethi pacidaysatas akeeka immees.
PSA 119:131 Taani ne kiitaa saamotada, ta doona dooyas.
PSA 119:132 Haa taako simma; nena doseysatas ne ootheysada taw qadheta.
PSA 119:133 Ne ufaysa qaalada ta hemethaa suurisa; nagari tana haarana mela oothofa.
PSA 119:134 Ta ne wogaa kiitetana mela tana un7etheyisata kushepe woza.
PSA 119:135 Ne aylliya ta bolla ne som7uwa poo7isa; ne higgiya tamaarsa.
PSA 119:136 Asay ne higgiya menthida gisho, ta afuthay haathada goggees.
PSA 119:137 Abeeti Godaw, ne xillo; ne pirday suure.
PSA 119:138 Ne higgey xillo; ay wodeka ammanetees.
PSA 119:139 Ta morketi ne qaala toochida gisho, ta mishay tamada eexidi keyis.
PSA 119:140 Ne ufaysa qaalay daro ammanetees; ta ne aylley daro dosayis.
PSA 119:141 Taani pathonnanne kadhetida asi; gidoshin ta ne wogaa dogike.
PSA 119:142 Ne xillotethay merinaw de7ees; ne higgey tuma.
PSA 119:143 Metoynne un7i tana gakis; shin ne kiitati tana ufaysoosona.
PSA 119:144 Ne wogay merinaw xillo; ta de7on daana mela taw akeeka imma.
PSA 119:145 Abeeti Godaw, ta kumetha wozanaape neeko waassas; tana alla; Ta ne awaajuwa naagana.
PSA 119:146 Ta neeko waassas; tana ashsha; ta ne higgiya naagana.
PSA 119:147 Xalqey caaronna wonta dendada, tana maadda gada neeko waassayis; ne gelida qaalan ufaysi wothayis.
PSA 119:148 Ne qaalaba zaara zaara qopanaw, qamma utta aqayis.
PSA 119:149 Abeeti Godaw, ne siiquwa gisho, tana si7a; ne xillo pirdada tana de7on wotha.
PSA 119:150 Tana yedethiya iitati tako matoosona; shin enti ne higgiyafe haakoosona.
PSA 119:151 Shin abeeti Godaw, ne taw matan de7aasa; ne kiita ubbay tuma.
PSA 119:152 Taani benipe doomada, ne higgiya tamaaras; ne iya merinaw minthada essadasa.
PSA 119:153 Ta ne higgiya dogonna gisho, ta metuwa be7ada tana ashsha;
PSA 119:154 Ta gisho mootetada tana woza; ne ufaysa qaalada tana de7on wotha.
PSA 119:155 Ne higgiya enti ekonna gisho, iitati atotethi demmokona.
PSA 119:156 Abeeti Godaw, ne qadhey daro; ne xillo pirdada tana de7on wotha.
PSA 119:157 Tana ixeysatinne yedetheysati daro; shin ta ne higgiyafe gaxa keyike.
PSA 119:158 Enti ne kiita naagonna gisho, ta nena kaddeyisata be7ada shaatettas.
PSA 119:159 Abeeti Godaw, ta ne wogaa doseysa be7a; ne siiquwada tana de7on wotha.
PSA 119:160 Ne qaalay tuma; ne xillo pirday merinaw de7ees.
PSA 119:161 Halaqati tana coo yedethoosona; shin ta wozanay ne qaala yayyees.
PSA 119:162 Darobaa di77ida asi ufayteysada, ne ufaysa qaalan ta ufaytayis.
PSA 119:163 Taani wordo ixayis; shaatettayis; shin ne higgiya dosayis.
PSA 119:164 Ne xillo pirdaa gisho, ta nena gallas laapun toho galatayis.
PSA 119:165 Ne higgiya doseysatas polo sarotethi de7ees; enta aybika dhubethanaw danda7enna.
PSA 119:166 Abeeti Godaw, ta ne atotetha ufaysan naagayis; ne kiita kaallayis.
PSA 119:167 Taani ne higgiya naagayis; ta kumetha wozanaape dosayis.
PSA 119:168 Ta oge ubbaa ne be7iya gisho, taani ne higgiyanne ne wogaa naagana;
PSA 119:169 Abeeti Godaw, ta waasoy ne sinthe gako; ne ufaysa qaalada taw akeeka imma.
PSA 119:170 Ta woosay ne sinthe gako; ne ufaysa qaalada tana ashsha.
PSA 119:171 Neeni ne awaajuwa tana tamaarsiya gisho, ta doonape galati pultana.
PSA 119:172 Ne kiita ubbay xillo gidiya gisho, ta inxarsay ne qaalaba yexana.
PSA 119:173 Taani ne wogaa doorida gisho, ne kushey tana maaddanaw giigidaysa gido.
PSA 119:174 Abeeti Godaw, ne ashshana mela ta laamotayis; ne higgey tana ufaysees.
PSA 119:175 Taani nena galatana mela, tana de7on wotha; ne pirday tana maaddo.
PSA 119:176 Taani dhayida dorsada toylatas; tana ne aylliya koya; ta ne kiita dogike.
PSA 120:1 Pudethe keyishe yexiya mazmure Meto wode taani Godaa xeegin I taw koyis.
PSA 120:2 Godaw, wordo doonapenne cimmiya inxarsafe tana ashsha.
PSA 120:3 Hinteno, wordanchoto, Goday hintena waatiko lo77o? I hintena waatidi seeriko lo77o?
PSA 120:4 I hintena leefetida ola tooran caddana; xiifa bonqon hintena xuuggana.
PSA 120:5 Ta Mosahan de7iya gishonne Qedaare dunkaanen uttida gisho tana ayye!
PSA 120:6 Sarotethi ixiya asaara taani daro wode de7as.
PSA 120:7 Taani saro asi; shin ta sarotethaba haasaya wode, enti olaba haasayoosona.
PSA 121:1 Pudethe keyishe yexiya mazmure Taw maadoy awupe yaane gada, taani deretako xeellas.
PSA 121:2 Taw maadoy salonne sa7aa medhida Godaape yees.
PSA 121:3 I ne tohuwa harchisenna; nena naageysi dhiskenna.
PSA 121:4 Isra7eele naageysi zin7enanne dhiskenna.
PSA 121:5 Goday nena naageysa; ne ushachan gididi, new kuya gidana.
PSA 121:6 Gallas awi nena meenna; qamma ageeni nena qohenna.
PSA 121:7 Goday qohiyaba ubbaafe nena naagana; I nena saro wothana.
PSA 121:8 Goday ne kessaane ne geluwa, hachife merinaw naagana.
PSA 122:1 Dawiti pude keyishe yexiya mazmure Enti tana, “Ane Xoossa keethi boos” yaagin, tana ufaysis.
PSA 122:2 Yerusalaame, nuuni ne pengetara gelidi eqida.
PSA 122:3 Yerusalaamey danthetada minna keexetida lo77o katama.
PSA 122:4 Godaa kiitaa maaran Isra7eele zareti, Godaa galatanaw he katamaa yoosona.
PSA 122:5 Dawita kochaafe kawotida ubbay, banta asaas pirdanaw yan uttoosona.
PSA 122:6 Yerusalaame sarotethaas haysada yaagidi woossite; “Nena dosiya ubbay anjeto.
PSA 122:7 Ne gimbeta giddon saroy gido; ne kawo keethan wopatethi de7o” yaagite.
PSA 122:8 Ta ishatanne ta dabbota gisho, “Ne giddon saroy de7o” yaagana.
PSA 122:9 Godaa nu Xoossaa keethaa gisho, new lo77oba amottayis.
PSA 123:1 Pudethe keyishe yexiya mazmure Salon, ne araata bolla uttidayso, taani pude neeko xeellayis.
PSA 123:2 Adde aylley ba godaa kushe xeelleysada, macca aylliya ba godate kushe be7eysada, neeni nuna maarana gakanaw, nu ayfey Godaako, nu Xoossaako xeellees.
PSA 123:3 Nuus kadhey darida gisho, nuna maara; abeeti Godaw, nuna maara.
PSA 123:4 Nuuni otoranchota cashshaanne saaphota kadhiya kallida.
PSA 124:1 Dawiti pude keyishe zammariya mazmure Goday nuura gidonaako, nu waananee? Isra7eeley haysada yaagidi zaaro;
PSA 124:2 “Goday nuura gidonnaako, nu bolla asay dendida wode,
PSA 124:3 enta hanqoy nu bolla suullin, nuna paxa mittanashin.
PSA 124:4 Di7oy nuna efanashin; shaafa haathay nuna mittanashin.
PSA 124:5 Kixa haathay nuna maanashin” yaago.
PSA 124:6 Nuna nu morketa achas aathidi immiboona Goday galatetto.
PSA 124:7 Kafoy shanka gitepe kessi ekeysada, nuuni kessi ekida; xihey meqis, nuuni kessi ekida.
PSA 124:8 Salonne sa7aa medhida, Godaa sunthan nuus maadoy yees.
PSA 125:1 Pudethe keyishe yexiya mazmure. Godan ammaneteysati qaaxanaw danda7onna, merinaw de7iya Xiyoone zuma mela.
PSA 125:2 Dereti Yerusalaame yuushon de7eysada, hachife merinaa gakanaw, Goday ba asaa yuushon de7ees.
PSA 125:3 Xilloti banta kushiya iitabas denthonna mela iitata ayso xam7ay xillota biittan gam7enna.
PSA 125:4 Abeeti Godaw, keeha asatasinne wozana suure asatas lo77oba ootha.
PSA 125:5 Shin neeni iita asata seeriya wode, ne ogiya aggida asaaka seera. Isra7eeles saroy gido.
PSA 126:1 Pudethe keyishe yexiya mazmure Goday di7ope zaaridi nuna Xiyoone ehida wode nuus amuho daanis.
PSA 126:2 Nu doonay miichan, nu inxarsay ufaysa yethan kumis. He wode kawotethati banta giddon, “Goday entaw gitaba oothis” yaagidosona.
PSA 126:3 Tuma Goday nuus gitaba oothis; nuka daro ufaytida.
PSA 126:4 Godaw, Negebe mela biittan ira bukisada, shaafa zaarada kuntheysada, nu duussa ooratha.
PSA 126:5 Yeekishe zeridaysati, ufaysan yexishe cakana.
PSA 126:6 Zerethi tookidi yeekishe bidaysati, ufaysa yethe yexishe, mirqe tookidi simmana.
PSA 127:1 Solomoney pude keyishe yexiya mazmure Goday keethe keexona ixiko, keexeysati coo daaburoosona. Goday katamaa naagonna ixiko, naageysati coo daaburoosona.
PSA 127:2 Duussas koshshiyaba demmanaw, wonta guura dendoy, omarsi daro qamisidi geloy hada. Goday ba doseysatas shempo immees.
PSA 127:3 Nayti Godaa imota; yeloti tuma woyto.
PSA 127:4 Issi asi na7atethan yelida adde nayti, olancho kushen de7iya toora mela.
PSA 127:5 Iya korojoti ha yiishshatan kumida asi anjetidaysa; I ba morketara katama pengen, mootetiya wode shatimmenna.
PSA 128:1 Pudethe keyishe yexiya mazmure Godaas yayyeysatinne iya ogiyan hemeteysati ubbay anjetidaysata.
PSA 128:2 Neeni ne daabura ayfe maana; ufaytananne duretana.
PSA 128:3 Ne machiya ne son ayfe duurkukida woyne mela gidana. Ne nayti ne gayta yuushon shamaho aaca mela gidana.
PSA 128:4 Godaas yayiya asi tuma hessada anjetana.
PSA 128:5 Goday nena Xiyoonepe anjo! Neeni de7ida laytha ubban Yerusalaame lo77otetha nena besso!
PSA 128:6 Ne nayta nayta be7a! Isra7eeles saroy gido!
PSA 129:1 Pudethe keyishe yexiya mazmure Isra7eeley haysada yaago; “Ta na7atethafe doomidi, ta morketi tana un7ethidosona.
PSA 129:2 Ee, enti ta na7atethafe doomidi, tana un7ethidosona; shin enti tana xoonibookona.
PSA 129:3 Ta zokuwa xurqafen shocidi, goshsha gade daanisidosona.”
PSA 129:4 Shin Goday xillo gidiya gisho iitata wodoruwa duuserethi yeggis.
PSA 129:5 Xiyoone ixiya ubbay yeellatidi guye simmo.
PSA 129:6 Keetha huuphen dolida, dicconna melida maata mela gido.
PSA 129:7 He maata buucanaw kushen dankey woyko mirqanaw oykey baawa.
PSA 129:8 Ogera aadheysati, “Goday wolqa immo” gin, cakeysati “Godi anjo” giyabay deenna.
PSA 130:1 Pudethe keyishe yexiya mazmure Godaw, taani meto ciimmon de7ashe, neeko waassayis.
PSA 130:2 Godaw, ta waasuwa si7a; ta woosa ne haythay hayzo.
PSA 130:3 Xoossaw, nu nagaraa ne xaafa oykidaako, Godaw, ooni pirdafe attanaw danda7ii?
PSA 130:4 Shin nuuni new yayyana mela, nu nagaraa atto yaagasa.
PSA 130:5 Taani Godaa laamotan naagayis; ta shempiya laamotan naagawusu; taani iya qaalan ufaysi wothayis.
PSA 130:6 Sa7i awude wontane gidi, naagiya wotaadarepe aathada, taani Godaa laamotan naagayis.
PSA 130:7 Iya siiqoy merinaasa gidiya gishonne iyan kumetha atotethi de7iya gisho Isra7eele, Godan ufaysi ootha;
PSA 130:8 Goday Isra7eele, iya nagaraa ubbaafe ashshana.
PSA 131:1 Pudethe keyishe Dawiti yexiya mazmure Godaw, ta wozanay otortenna; ta ayfeyka otoron xeellenna. Ta qofan gitatana gada koyabike; gahetonnaba ekana gada zaaturabike.
PSA 131:2 Dhanthi duuxida na7i ba aaye ki7on si77i geysada ta si77i gas. Wayetho agida na7ada, ta shempoy ta gaathan wopu gis.
PSA 131:3 Isra7eele, hachife merinaa gakanaw Godan ufaysi ootha.
PSA 132:1 Pudethe keyishe yexiya mazmure Godaw, Dawitanne I danda7ida metuwa ubbaa qopa.
PSA 132:2 Godaas I caaqidaysa, wolqaama gidida Yayqooba Xoossaas, I odidaysa hassaya.
PSA 132:3 Godaas besse giigisana gakanaw, Wolqaama gidida Yayqooba Xoossaas, keethe keexana gakanaw, ta soo gelike; ta hiixan zin7ike. Ta ayfey qilim7enna, woyko tana dhiskoy ekenna.
PSA 132:6 Nuuni Taabotiyabaa Efraatan si7ida; Yi7aarime biittan iya demmida.
PSA 132:7 “Ane I de7iya bessaa boos; iya tohoy yedhiya bessan iya goyinnoos.”
PSA 132:8 Godaw, denda! Ne minotethaa malla gidida ne Taabotiyara ne keethaa gela.
PSA 132:9 Ne kahineti xillotethi ma7o; ne asay ufaysan yexo.
PSA 132:10 Ne aylliya Dawita gisho, neeni tiyida kawa aggofa.
PSA 132:11 Goday Dawitas laametonna caaqo haysada yaagidi caaqis; “Ne gulbatape keyida, ne naytape issuwa ne araatan utisana.
PSA 132:12 Ne nayti ta caaquwanne ta tamaarsiya timirtiya naagiko, enta nayti ne araatan merinaw uttana” yaagis.
PSA 132:13 Goday Xiyoone dooris; baw de7iya bessi oothanaw amotidi, haysada yaagis;
PSA 132:14 “Haysi ta merinaw de7iya besse; taani amotida gisho haysan daana.
PSA 132:15 Taani daro kathi immada Xiyoone anjana; iyan de7iya manqotaka kathi kalsana.
PSA 132:16 Iyan de7iya kahineta atotethi mayzana; iyan de7iya xilloti ufaysan yexana.
PSA 132:17 He bessan Dawita zeriyape kawo kessana; taani tiyida kawa kawotethan gam7isana.
PSA 132:18 Taani iya morketa yeella mayzana; shin iya huuphen de7iya kallachay phoolana” yaagas.
PSA 133:1 Dawiti pudethe keyishe yexiya mazmure Ishati issifethan de7eysi, waani lo77i waani ufaysi!
PSA 133:2 Hessi huuphen tigin, buuchaara goggiya, Aarona buuchaara goggidi iya hashiya gakiya al7o zayte mela.
PSA 133:3 Hessi Armoona zumaape Xiyoone Dereta gakanaw wodhiya aka mela. Goday yan anjuwanne, de7uwa merinaw immis.
PSA 134:1 Pudethe keyishe yexiya mazmure Hinteno, Godaa aylleto, Godaa keethan qamma ootheysato, ubbay yidi Godaa galatite.
PSA 134:2 Xoossa keethan hinte kushiya miccidi, Godaa galatite.
PSA 134:3 Saluwanne sa7aa medhida Goday hintena Xiyoonepe anjo.
PSA 135:1 Godaa galatite! Hinteno, Godaa aylleto, Godaa sunthaa galatite!
PSA 135:2 Hinteno, Godaa keethan, nu Xoossa keethaa dabaaban eqeysato, Godaa galatite!
PSA 135:3 I keeha gidiya gisho Godaa galatite! I lo77o gidiya gisho iya sunthaa sabbite!
PSA 135:4 Goday Yayqooba babaa, Isra7eele baw buzo oothidi dooris.
PSA 135:5 Goday gita gideysanne nu Goday, xoossata ubbaafe aadheysa taani erayis.
PSA 135:6 Salon sa7an, abbaninne iya giddon Goday ba dosidaba ubbaa oothees.
PSA 135:7 Shaara sa7aa gaxape denthees; wol7anthi irara kiittees; carko ba minja keethaafe kessees.
PSA 135:8 Gibxe biittan asape mehe gakanaw, bayra yeletida ubbaa wodhis.
PSA 135:9 Neno Gibxe, Paaronanne iya aylleta ubbaa seeranaw malaatatanne malaalsiyabata kiittis.
PSA 135:10 I daro kawotethata dhaysis; wolqaama kawota wodhis.
PSA 135:11 Amoore kawa Sihoona Baasane kawa Oogenne Kanaane kawota ubbaa wodhis.
PSA 135:12 Enta biitta ba asaa, Isra7eele laatisis.
PSA 135:13 Godaw, ne sunthay merinaw daana; yeletaape yeleta gakanaw ne hassayetana.
PSA 135:14 Goday ba asaas pirdana; I ba aylletas qadhetana.
PSA 135:15 Kawotethata eeqati asa kushe oosota; birapenne worqafe medhetidaysata.
PSA 135:16 Entaw dooni de7ees, shin haasayokona; ayfey de7ees, shin xeellokona.
PSA 135:17 Haythi de7ees, shin si7okona; enta siidhen shempoy baawa.
PSA 135:18 Enta medhidaysatinne entan ammaneteysati ubbay entada hano.
PSA 135:19 Isra7eele asaw Godaa galatite; Aarona soo asaw Godaa galatite.
PSA 135:20 Leewe soo asaw Godaa galatite; Godaa yayyeysato ubbay Godaa galatite.
PSA 135:21 Yerusalaamen de7iya Goday Xiyoonen galatetto! Godaa galatite!
PSA 136:1 Godaa galatite!
PSA 136:2 Xoossata Xoossaa galatite!
PSA 136:3 Godata Godaa galatite!
PSA 136:4 Iya xalaali gita malaalsiyaba oothees;
PSA 136:5 Ba cincatethan salota medhis;
PSA 136:6 Haatha bolla biitta miccis;
PSA 136:7 Gita poo7ota medhis; iya siiqoy merinaasa.
PSA 136:8 Awi gallas haarana mela oothis;
PSA 136:9 Ageeninne xoolintoti qamma haarana mela oothis;
PSA 136:10 Gibxe biittan bayrata wodhis;
PSA 136:11 Isra7eele asaa Gibxefe kaalethidi kessis;
PSA 136:12 Ba mino kushiyan, ba wolqaama qesiyan haysa oothis;
PSA 136:13 Zo7o Abbaa shaakis;
PSA 136:14 Isra7eele asaa he abba giddora pinthis;
PSA 136:15 Gibxe kawanne iya olanchota Zo7o Abban muukisis;
PSA 136:16 I ba asaa mela biittara kaalethis;
PSA 136:17 Gita kawota shocis;
PSA 136:18 Wolqaama kawota wodhis;
PSA 136:19 Amoore kawa Sihoona wodhis;
PSA 136:20 Baasane kawa Ooge wodhis;
PSA 136:21 Enta biitta ba asaa laatisis;
PSA 136:22 Ba aylliya Isra7eele laatisis;
PSA 136:23 Nu kawuyida wode nuna qopis;
PSA 136:24 Nuna nu morketape ashshis;
PSA 136:25 Medhetetha ubbaas kathi immees;
PSA 136:26 Salo Xoossaa galatite!
PSA 137:1 Babiloone shaafata matan uttidi, Xiyoone qopida wode yeekida.
PSA 137:2 He bessan nuuni nu diithaa haatha gaxan dicciya, mithata bolla kaqida.
PSA 137:3 Nuna di77ida asati nuuni yexidi, enta ufaysana mela “Xiyoone yethatape issuwa ane nuus yexite” yaagidosona.
PSA 137:4 Godaa yethaa nuuni allaga biittan waati yexanee?
PSA 137:5 Yerusalaame taani nena dogiko, ta ushacha kushey tana balo.
PSA 137:6 Taani nena hassayonna aggiko, ta gita ufaysi gidida Yerusalaame dosonna ixiko, ta inxarsay kottonuwara oyketo.
PSA 137:7 Godaw, Yerusalaame di7etiya gallas Edoome asay oothidaysa hassaya; Enti, “Laallite! Laallite! Hirki xaphuwa gakanaw laallite!” yaagidaysa dogopa.
PSA 137:8 Babiloone, neeni dhayana! Neeni nu bolla oothida iita oosuwas halo kesseysi anjetidaysa.
PSA 137:9 Ne guutha nayta oykidi, zaalla bolla shoceysi anjetidaysa.
PSA 138:1 Dawita Mazmure Godaw, ta kumetha wozanan nena galatana; xoossata sinthan nena sabbana.
PSA 138:2 Ne geeshsha keethaako simmada nena goyinnana; ne siiquwa gishonne ne tumatethaa gisho galatana. Ne sunthaa gishonne ne qaala dhoqatethaa gisho galatana.
PSA 138:3 Taani xeegida wode ne taw koyadasa; ne minotethan tana minthadasa.
PSA 138:4 Godaw, ne doonape keyiya qaala si7iya wode, sa7an de7iya kawoti ubbay nena galato.
PSA 138:5 Godaa bonchoy gita gidiya gisho, enti Godaa ogiyaba yexo.
PSA 138:6 Goday bolla dhoqan de7ikoka, manqota keeha ayfen xeellees; shin otoranchota haahon erees.
PSA 138:7 Taani meto giddora hemetikoka, neeni tana naagasa. Ta morketa hanquwa bolla ne kushiya miccaasa; ne ushacha kushiyan tana ashshaasa.
PSA 138:8 Goday taw gelida qaala polana; Godaw, ne siiqoy merinaasa; Ne kushe oosuwa yegga aggofa.
PSA 139:1 Dawita Mazmure Godaw, neeni tana pilgada eradasa.
PSA 139:2 Neeni ta utethaanne ta equwa eraasa; ta qofa ubbaa haahon akeekasa.
PSA 139:3 Taani biya bessaanne shempiya bessaa xomoosasa; ta ogeta ubbaa eraasa.
PSA 139:4 Godaw, taani ta inxarsan issi qaala odetanaape sinthe, ta qofa ubbaa eraasa.
PSA 139:5 Neeni ta yuushuwan de7aasa; ne kushiya ta bolla wothaasa.
PSA 139:6 Ne eratethay tana daro malaalsees; ta akeekape dhoqa.
PSA 139:7 Ta ne Ayyaanape aw baqatanee? ne sinthafe aw baanee?
PSA 139:8 Pude salo keyiko ne yan de7aasa! Duge Si7oole wodhikoka ne yan de7aasa.
PSA 139:9 Doloha bagga paallada biiko, woyko wuloha baggan haakada de7iko,
PSA 139:10 yan ne kushey tana kaalethees; ne ushacha kushey tana zempisees.
PSA 139:11 “Dhumaw tana gentha; gallasaw qamma laameta” yaagiyakoka,
PSA 139:12 sakana dhumi new dhumenna; qammi gallasada poo7ees; new dhumi poo7o mela.
PSA 139:13 Neeni ta giddo asatethaa medhadasa; ta aaye ulon tana neeni tiladasa.
PSA 139:14 Neeni tana malaalsiyabanne yegelsi oothada medhida gisho, taani nena galatayis. Ne oosoti malaalsees! taani hessa loythada erayis.
PSA 139:15 Taani geema bessan medhetiya wode, ta meqethay neepe geemmibeenna. Ta asatethay ta aaye ulon ciimmo giddon hiillan alleeqetidi oosetiya wode,
PSA 139:16 ne ayfeti giigonna ta asatethaa be7idosona. Buroo issoyka doometonna de7ishin, ne taw buzoyida gallasa ubbay ne mazgaben xaafetidosona.
PSA 139:17 Xoossaw, ne taw qopiya qofay waanida boncho! Enta tayboy waanidi daride!
PSA 139:18 Taani enta taybiyako shafepe daro; taani barkiya wode ha77ika neera de7as.
PSA 139:19 Xoossaw, neeni iitata wodhiyako aybe! Suuthu gussiya asati taape haako!
PSA 139:20 Enti ne bolla iitabaa haasayoosona; ne morketi ne suntha iissoosona.
PSA 139:21 Godaw, nena ixeyisata ta ixikina? Ne bolla dendeyisata ta shaatetikina?
PSA 139:22 Taani enta kumethi ixayis; enta taani ta morkeda taybayis.
PSA 139:23 Xoossaw, tana pilgada ta wozanaa era; tana un7ethida ta qofaa be7a.
PSA 139:24 Tanan iitabay de7iko xeella; merina ogiyan tana kaaletha.
PSA 140:1 Dawita Mazmure Godaw, iitatape tana ashsha; makallanchotape tana naaga.
PSA 140:2 Enti iita oothanaw maqetoosona; gallas gallas ola denthoosona.
PSA 140:3 Banta inxarsaa shoosha inxarsada qarayoosona; enta doonan wodhiya marzey de7ees. Salaha
PSA 140:4 Godaw, iitata kushepe tana ashsha; ta tohuwa qaxanaw qopiya makallanchotape tana naaga.
PSA 140:5 Otorancho asati taw xihe wothoosona; gite hiixoosona; tana oykanaw gite yeggoosona. Salaha
PSA 140:6 Godaa, “Neeni ta Xoossaa” gaana; Godaw, ta woosa si7a.
PSA 140:7 Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, tana ashshiya minuwaw, ola gallas taw gondalle gidadasa.
PSA 140:8 Godaw, iitatas enta amuwa immofa; enti otortonna mela enta maquwa polisopa. Salaha
PSA 140:9 Ta morketan tana xoonisopa; enta doonape keyiya iitay enta bolla simmo.
PSA 140:10 Enta bolla xuuggiya tama bonqoy qoletto; enti tama ollan yegeto; keyanaw danda7onna olla holeto.
PSA 140:11 Yooyamati biitta bolla de7opo; buqeyisata iitabay yedethidi oyko.
PSA 140:12 Goday manqotas pirdeysanne metootanchotas mooteteysa erayis.
PSA 140:13 Xilloti tuma ne sunthaa galatana; suure asati ne sinthan daana.
PSA 141:1 Dawita Mazmure Godaw, taani nena xeegayis; tana maaddanaw ellesa; Ta neeko waassiya wode tana si7a!
PSA 141:2 Ta woosay ixaaneda ne sinthe shiiqo; ta kushe micethay omarsa yarsho mela gido.
PSA 141:3 Godaw, ta doona naagiya asi wotha; ta mettersha pengiya naaga.
PSA 141:4 Iita oothiya asatara iita oothonna mela, ta wozanaa iitako zaaropa; enta gibira tana muzopa.
PSA 141:5 Xillo asi tana seero, hessi taw keehatethi, I tana hanqeto, hessi ta huuphen zayte tiyo mela. Ta wozanay hessa ixenna; Ta woosay ubba wode enta iita oosuwa bollana.
PSA 141:6 Enta daynnati aafo holetiya wode, ta qaalay tuma gideysa enti erana.
PSA 141:7 Enti, “Asi biitta goyeysadanne phasha laalleysada, nu meqethay duufo doonan laaletana” yaagosona.
PSA 141:8 Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, ta ayfey nena xeellees. Taani neeko baqatayis; tana hayqos aathada immofa.
PSA 141:9 Enti taw yeggida gitiyapenne iitaa ootheyisata xihiyape tana naaga.
PSA 141:10 Taani saro aadhin, iitati banta wothida gitiyan oyketo.
PSA 142:1 Dawiti gongolon de7iya wode xaafida timirte Ta qaala dhoqu oothada Godaako waassayis; maarota demmanaw iya woossayis.
PSA 142:2 Ta oysha ubbaa iya bessayis; ta metuwa ubbaa iyaw odayis.
PSA 142:3 Taani heettida wode ne ta ogiya eraasa; ta ogiyan gite yeggidi wothidosona.
PSA 142:4 Taani ta yuushuwa xeelliya wode, tana maaddey issoyka baawa. Taani qosetada attiya bessi baawa; tana naagiya oonika baawa.
PSA 142:5 Godaw, taani neeko waassayis; taani, “Ne taw baqatada attiya bessi; de7on de7eyisata biittan ta saamay nena” yaagas.
PSA 142:6 Taani daro metootiya gisho, ta waasuwa si7a. Tana yedetheysati wolqaamida gisho, tana entafe ashsha.
PSA 142:7 Ta ne sunthaa galatana mela, tana qashope birsha. Neeni taw keeha gidiya gisho, xilloti ta yuushon shiiqana.
PSA 143:1 Dawita Mazmure Godaw, ta woosa si7a; maarota demmanaw ta waasseysa hayza. Neeni xillotethaninne ne ammanetethan taw zaaro imma.
PSA 143:2 Ne sinthan xillo asi bayna gisho tana ne aylliya pirdas shiishopa.
PSA 143:3 Tana ta morkey yedethidi, tincherethidi sa7an yeggis. Beni hayqida asada tana dhuman wothis.
PSA 143:4 Hessa gisho taani heettas; ta wozanayka til7is.
PSA 143:5 Taani beni wodeta hassayayis; ne oothida ooso ubbaa qopayis; ne kushe ooso ubbaa akeekayis.
PSA 143:6 Taani ta kushiya neeko miccas; mela biitti haathe koyeysada, ta shempoy nena saamotees. Salaha
PSA 143:7 Godaw, ta wozanay heettida gisho taw zaaro immanaw ellesa. Taani duufon geliya asada hanonna mela ne som7uwa taape genthofa.
PSA 143:8 Taani nenan ammanetiya gisho, wonta wonta ne siiquwaba tana bessa. Taani ta shempuwafe nena woossiya gisho, ta baana ogiya tana bessa.
PSA 143:9 Godaw, taani new maggannida gisho, ta morketape tana ashsha.
PSA 143:10 Neeni ta Xoossaa gidiya gisho, ta ne sheniya oothana mela tana tamaarsa; ne lo77o ayyaanay suure ogiyan tana kaaletho.
PSA 143:11 Godaw, ne sunthaa gisho tana ashsha; ne xillotethan tana metope kessa.
PSA 143:12 Ne siiquwan ta morketa wodha; ta ne aylle gidiya gisho tana un7etheyisata ubbaa dhaysa.
PSA 144:1 Dawita Mazmure Goday, ta zaallay, galatetto! Ta kushiya ola tamaarsees; ta biradheta tooras giigisees.
PSA 144:2 I ta siiqo Xoossaanne ta qosetta attiya besse; ta miixanne tana ashsheysa. Ta gondallenne taani baqatada attiya besse; I kawotethati taw haaretana mela oothis.
PSA 144:3 Godaw, neeni iyaw qopanaw asi aybee? Ne wozanan iyaw besse immanaw asa na7i aybee?
PSA 144:4 Asi issi toho carkiya carko mela; iya gallasati aadhiya kuya mela.
PSA 144:5 Godaw, saluwa phalqada duge wodha! dereta bocha; enti cuyo!
PSA 144:6 Wol7anthi yeddada ne morketa laalla; ne dongiya yiishshan dukada enta yedetha.
PSA 144:7 Bollara ne kushiya yeddada, tana wolqaama haathaafe goochada kessa; allaga asata kushepe tana wosisa.
PSA 144:8 Enti tuma haasayidi erokona; banta ushacha kushiya denthidi wordon caaqoosona.
PSA 144:9 Xoossaw taani new ooratha mazmure yexana; tammu shayan waaxetida diithan yexana.
PSA 144:10 Kawotas xoono immaasa; ne aylliya Dawita ashshaasa.
PSA 144:11 Tana iita mashshafe ashsha; allaga asata kushepe tana wosisa. Enta doonay wordon, enta ushacha kushey cimon kumis.
PSA 144:12 Nu adde nayti banta na7atethan, lo77o dicciya mitha mela gido. Nu macca nayti kawo gadho alleeqisanaw, oosetida tuuqe mela gido.
PSA 144:13 Nu shaaleti dumma dumma katha qommon kumo; heemetiya bessan de7iya nu dorsati mukulaninne tammu mukulan yelo.
PSA 144:14 Nu miizati birayso; awucayona yeletidi daro; nu ogetan waasoy si7etofo.
PSA 144:15 Ha anjoti gakiya asati tuma anjetidaysata; Xoossay entaw Godaa gidida asati anjetidaysata.
PSA 145:1 Dawita Galata Mazmure Ta Xoossaw, ta kawaw, ta nena gitayana; ne sunthaa merinaw galatana.
PSA 145:2 Taani nena ubba gallas sabbana; ne sunthaa merinaw galatana.
PSA 145:3 Goday gita; aadho galati iyaw bessees; iya gitatethay asa qofape aadhees.
PSA 145:4 Issi yeletay hara yeletas ne oosuwa odana; ne malaalsiya oosota awaajana.
PSA 145:5 Enti ne bonchuwa, ne teemaanne ne gitatetha odana. Taani ne malaalsiya oosuwa zaara zaarada qopana.
PSA 145:6 Malaalisiya gita ne oosuwaba odana; taani ne gitatetha awaajana.
PSA 145:7 Enti ne keehatetha darotethaa odana; ne xillotethabaa ufaysan yexana.
PSA 145:8 Goday keehanne qadheteysa; hanqetanaw ellesenna; siiqon kumidaysa.
PSA 145:9 Goday ubbaas keeha; I ba medhetetha ubbaas qadhetees.
PSA 145:10 Godaw, medhetetha ubbay nena galatana; ne asa ubbay nena sabbana.
PSA 145:11 Enti ne kawotethaa bonchuwaba odana; ne wolqaaba odana.
PSA 145:12 Hessan enti ne wolqaama oosuwabaanne ne kawotethaa boncho teemaba erisana.
PSA 145:13 Ne kawotethay merina kawotethi; ne maatay yeleta ubbaa haarees. Goday ba gida qaala ubban ammanetees; ba ooso ubban keeha.
PSA 145:14 Goday kundanaw gedgadeyisata katisees; kundidaysata denthees.
PSA 145:15 Ubbaa ayfey nena xeellees; entaw koshshiya woden kathi immaasa.
PSA 145:16 Neeni ne kushiya miccada, medhetetha ubbaa amo alaasa.
PSA 145:17 Xoossay ba oge ubban xillo; ba ooso ubban keeha.
PSA 145:18 Goday bana xeegiya ubbaas, tuman bana xeegiya ubbaas matan de7ees.
PSA 145:19 I baw yayyeyisata amuwa kunthees; enta waasuwa si7idi ashshees.
PSA 145:20 Goday bana doseyisata ubbaa naagees; shin iitata ubbaa dhaysana.
PSA 145:21 Taani ta doonan Godaa galatana; Medhetetha ubbay iya geeshsha sunthaa merinaw galato!
PSA 146:1 Godaa galatite! Ta shempe Godaa galata!
PSA 146:2 Ta de7o laytha ubban Godaa galatana; ta de7ida wode ubban ta Xoossaa sabbana.
PSA 146:3 Halaqatan ammanetofite; ashshanaw danda7onna asa na7an ceeqetofite.
PSA 146:4 Enta shempoy keyiya wode biittako simmoosona; enta halchoy ubbay he gallas aadhees.
PSA 146:5 Yayqooba Xoossay maaddiya asinne Godaa, ba Xoossan ufaysi oothiya asi anjetidaysa.
PSA 146:6 Goday salonne sa7aa, abbanne iya giddon de7iya ubbaa medhis; Xoossay merinaw ammanetees.
PSA 146:7 Goday un7etidaysatas pirdees; koshatidaysatas kathi immees; Goday qashetidaysata birshees;
PSA 146:8 Goday qooqeta xeelisees. Goday kundidaysata denthees; Goday xillota dosees.
PSA 146:9 Goday bete asata naagees; Am7etanne yi7o nayta maaddees; shin iitata ogiya dhaysees.
PSA 146:10 Goday merinaw kawotana; Xiyoone, ne Xoossay, yeletethafe yeletethi gakanaw kawotana. Godaa galatite!
PSA 147:1 Godaa galatite! Nu Xoossaa saboy lo77o; iya saboy ufaysiyabaanne bessiyaba.
PSA 147:2 Goday Yerusalaame oorathana; Isra7eelepe di7etidaysata shiishana.
PSA 147:3 Wozani meqidaysata koolees; enta madunthaa pathees.
PSA 147:4 I xoolintota taybuwa erees; enta ubbaa enta sunthan sunthan xeegees.
PSA 147:5 Nu Goday gita; I wolqaama; iya akeekas zawi baawa.
PSA 147:6 Goday aadata zempisees; shin iitata sa7an yeggees.
PSA 147:7 Godaas galata yethi yexite; nu Xoossaas diithan yexite.
PSA 147:8 I saluwa shaara mayzees; biittas ira immees; zumata bolla maata dolisees.
PSA 147:9 Mehetas kathi, Koshatidi waassiya quuro naytas miyaba immees.
PSA 147:10 I parata wolqaninne tooranchota minotethan ufaytenna.
PSA 147:11 Shin Goday baw yayyeysataninne iya maarotan ammaneteysatan ufaytees.
PSA 147:12 Yerusalaame, Godaa galata! Xiyoone, ne Xoossaa galata!
PSA 147:13 I ne pengiya kobeta minthana; ne giddon de7iya ne asaa anjana.
PSA 147:14 I ne zawa sarotethan naagana; nena lo77o gisten kalsana.
PSA 147:15 I ba kiitaa biittas yeddees; iya qaalay eeson gakees.
PSA 147:16 I shachi bullukoda miccees; caagana bidoda laallees.
PSA 147:17 I shacha shuchada holees; iya meeguwan oonika eqanaw danda7enna.
PSA 147:18 I ba qaala kiittidi shacha maaysees. I carkuwa kiittin haathi goggees.
PSA 147:19 I ba qaala Yayqoobas, ba higgiyanne wogaa Isra7eeles awaajees.
PSA 147:20 I hara kawotethatas hessa oothibeenna; enti iya higgiya erokona. Godaa galatite!
PSA 148:1 Godaa galatite! Salope Godaa galatite; bolla dhoqan iya galatite.
PSA 148:2 Iya kiitanchoti ubbay iya galatite; Salon de7iya iya olanchoti ubbay iya galatite.
PSA 148:3 Away, ageenay iya galatite; poo7iya xoolintoti ubbay iya galatite.
PSA 148:4 Dhoqa saloti iya galatite; Salope bollara de7iya haathati iya galatite.
PSA 148:5 Enti ubbay Godaa sunthaa galato; I kiittin enti medhetidosona.
PSA 148:6 I enta merinaw enta bessan bessan wothis; shaaretonna higge entaw immis.
PSA 148:7 Sa7ape Godaa galatite! abban de7iya gita medhetethato; abba ciimmoto ubbay iya galatite.
PSA 148:8 Wol7anthaw, shachaw, shaaraw, caaganaw, iya kiita poliya carkuwaw, ubbay iya galatite.
PSA 148:9 Dereto, zumato, meetetiya ayfe ayfiya mithato, zigato, ubbay iya galatite.
PSA 148:10 Meheto, do7ato, sa7ara gooshetiya medhetethato, paalliya kafoto ubbay iya galatite.
PSA 148:11 Kawoto, kawotethato, halaqato, deriya haareysato, ubbay iya galatite.
PSA 148:12 Panthato, geela7oto, cimato, nayto, ubbay iya galatite.
PSA 148:13 Iya sunthay ubbaafe dhoqa gidiya gishonne iya bonchoy salotapenne sa7ape dhoqa gidiya gisho, enti ubbay Godaa sunthaa galato.
PSA 148:14 Iyaw mata gidida Isra7eele, I dhoqu dhoqu oothis; iya galatana mela enta minthethis. Godaa galatite!
PSA 149:1 Godaa galatite! Godaas ooratha yethi yexite! xillota shiiquwan iya sabbite!
PSA 149:2 Isra7eeley bantana medhidaysan ufayto; Xiyooney banta kawan hashshu go.
PSA 149:3 Durishe, karaabo baqishe, diithi diixishe iya sunthaa sabbo.
PSA 149:4 Goday ba asan ufaytees; aadatas xoono immidi enta bonchees.
