PSA 149:5 Ne asay banta xoonuwan ufayto; qamma kumethi ufaysan yexo.
PSA 149:6 Enta doonan Xoossaa galatay, enta kushiyan nam7u bagga qara mashshi de7o.
PSA 149:7 Hessan enti kawotethata bolla halo keyana; asaa seerana.
PSA 149:8 Enta kawota santhalaatan, enta moorinnata biratan qachana.
PSA 149:9 Enta bolla xaafetida pirdaa polana; Hessi Xoossaa asata ubbaas xoono. Godaa galatite!
PSA 150:1 Godaa galatite! Iya geeshsha keethan Xoossaa galatite; dhoqa salon iya galatite.
PSA 150:2 Iya wolqaama oosota gisho iya galatite; ubbaafe aadhiya iya gitatethaas iya galatite.
PSA 150:3 Moyze punnishe iya galatite; diithaninne maasinqon iya galatite.
PSA 150:4 Karaabo baqishenne durishe iya galatite; diithi diixishe, suusul7e punnishe iya galatite.
PSA 150:5 Daala qaathishe iya galatite; wolqaama daala girsan iya galatite.
PSA 150:6 Shempora de7iya ubbay Godaa galatite! Goday galatetto!
PRO 1:1 Haysati Isra7eele kawa Dawita na7aa Solomone leemisota.
PRO 1:2 Leemisoti asay cincatethi, seeranne era haasaya akeekanaw maaddoosona.
PRO 1:3 Enti cincatethi, xillotethi, suure pirdinne suure wozani daana mela tamaarsoosona.
PRO 1:4 Eeyatas akeeka immees; na7atethatas eratethinne kahaamatethi immees.
PRO 1:5 Cincati ha leemisota si7idi, era gujoosona; akeekanchoti lo77o zore ekoosona.
PRO 1:6 Hessan leemisotanne enta birshethaa, cincatetha odaanne enta qan7isheta akeekanaw danda7etees.
PRO 1:7 Godaas yashshi cincatethas doomethi; shin eeyati cincatethinne seera kadhoosona.
PRO 1:8 Ta na7aw, ne aawa zoriya si7a; ne aaye timirtiya kadhopa.
PRO 1:9 Hessi ne huuphiyas boncho kallacha; ne qoodhiyas gozda gidana.
PRO 1:10 Ta na7aw, nena nagaranchoti cimmiko ero goopa.
PRO 1:11 Enti, “Nuura yedha; ase wodhanaw hokidi naagoos; xillota wodhanaw qosetoos.
PRO 1:12 Si7ooley mitteysada nuka enta paxa mittoos; nu enta ollan yegetiya asada oothana.
PRO 1:13 Nuuni al7o miishe ubbaa demmana; nu keethaa bonqe miishen kunthana.
PRO 1:14 Nuura laggeta; nu demmidaba issife shaaketana” yaagana.
PRO 1:15 Ta na7aw, entara hemetofa; enta ogiyara baanaw ne tohuwa denthofa.
PRO 1:16 Enti iitabaa oothanaw woxoosona; asa suuthi gussanaw yaa haa goosona.
PRO 1:17 Kafoy xeellishin, iya oykanaw gite yegethi maaddenna.
PRO 1:18 Shin enti banta suuthi gussanaw hokosona; banta shempuwa wodhanaw qosetoosona.
PRO 1:19 Genen go77a demmiya asa wursethi hessa mela; enti shiishida shaloy enta shempuwa ekees.
PRO 1:20 Cincatethi daggala bolla eqada xeegawusu; dabaaban ba qaala dhoqu oothada sissawusu.
PRO 1:21 Cincatethi asi shiiqiya bessan eqada xeegawusu; katamaa geliya pengen eqada haysada yaagawusu.
PRO 1:22 “Hinteno, akeeki pacidaysato, hinte awude gakanaw eeya gididi daanee? Qelqiseysato, awude gakanaw ufaytanee? Eeyato, awude gakanaw eratethi ixanee?
PRO 1:23 Ta seera hinte si7idaba gidiyako, taani ta eraa hinte bolla gussana; ta qaalaka hintena tamaarsana.
PRO 1:24 Shin ta xeegida wode hinte koyonna ixida gisho; taani kushe miccin oonika akeekibona gisho;
PRO 1:25 Ta zoriya hinte kadhida gisho; ta seeraka ekiboonna gisho;
PRO 1:26 Hintena metoy gakiya wode ta miicana; hinte dagaman kokoriya wode ta qelqisana.
PRO 1:27 Gadoy uushoda hinte bolla yaa wode, metoy goteda hinte bolla eqiya wode, un7inne waayey hinte bolla gakiya wode, taani hintena qelqisana.
PRO 1:28 “He wode enti tana xeegana; shin ta koyke; enti tana minthidi koyana; shin demmokona.
PRO 1:29 Enti eratethi ixida gisho; Godaa yashshi dooriboonna gisho,
PRO 1:30 Ta zoriya ekiboonna gisho; ta seera kadhida gisho;
PRO 1:31 Enti banta oosuwa ayfiya maana; banta qofaa ayfiya kallana.
PRO 1:32 Akeeki pacidaysata cincatethafe haakeysi wodhees; eeyata qelli guussi dhaysees.
PRO 1:33 Shin ta odiyaba si7iya ubbay saro daana; meto hirgafeka shempana.”
PRO 2:1 Ta na7aw, ta timirtiya ne ekiko; ta kiitaa ne wozanan wothiko;
PRO 2:2 ne haythaa cincatethako zaariko; ne wozanaa akeekako zaariko;
PRO 2:3 Eratethi xeegiko; akeeka dhoqu oothada xeegiko;
PRO 2:4 Bira woyko geemmida miishe koyeysada, neeni eratethi koyko,
PRO 2:5 He wode neeni Godaas yashshi guussi aybeko erana; Xoossaa loythada erana.
PRO 2:6 Goday cincatethi immees; iyape eratethinne akeeki bentees.
PRO 2:7 I suuretas maaddiya zore minjees; borey baynaysatas gondalle gidees.
PRO 2:8 Suure pirda ogiya naagees; iyaw ammaneteyisata ogiya minthees.
PRO 2:9 He wode neeni xillotethi, suure pirdaa, suure ogenne lo77o oosoy aybeko akeekana.
PRO 2:10 Cincatethi ne wozana giddo gelana; eratethi new ufaysi gidana.
PRO 2:11 Shaakidi eroy nena naagana; akeeki nena kammana.
PRO 2:12 Cincatethi nena iita asata ogiyape naagana; geella odape nena ashshana.
PRO 2:13 Enti nagara dhuman daanaw, xillotetha ogiya aggidosona.
PRO 2:14 Iita ooson ufaytoosona; geellatethan hashshu goosona.
PRO 2:15 Enta oosoy mirqethi; enta de7oy geella.
PRO 2:16 Cincatethi layma maccasape, qaalan cimmiya laggethofe nena ashshana.
PRO 2:17 Iya ba na7atetha azina aggaagasu; Xoossa sinthan caaqida caaquwa dogasu.
PRO 2:18 I soo ogey hayqoko gathees; iiko buussi moytilletako gathees.
PRO 2:19 Iiko biya oonika guye simmenna; de7o oge demmenna.
PRO 2:20 Hessa aggada, lo77o asata leemisuwa kaalla; xillo asata hemethaa naaga.
PRO 2:21 Suure asatinne borey baynaysati, biittan adussa laythi daana.
PRO 2:22 Shin iitati biittafe shodetana; ammanetonaysati dhayana.
PRO 3:1 Ta na7aw, ta timirtiya dogopa; ta kiitaa ne wozanan wotha.
PRO 3:2 Enti ne laytha adussana; injenne sarotethi new gujana.
PRO 3:3 Siiqoynne tumatethi neepe haakofo; enta ne qoodhen qacha; ne wozanan xaafa.
PRO 3:4 Hessa oothiko ne Xoossanne asa sinthan sabetananne nashetana.
PRO 3:5 Ne kumetha wozanan Godaa ammaneta; ne akeekan zempofa.
PRO 3:6 Ne ooso ubban iya sinthaya; I nena suure oge kaalethana.
PRO 3:7 Nena ne huuphen cinca oothofa; Godaa yayya; iitape haaka.
PRO 3:8 Hessi ne asatethaas payyatethi ehana; ne meqethaaka xaalisana.
PRO 3:9 Ne shaluwan Godaa boncha; koyro ayfida kathaafe bayraa immada iya boncha.
PRO 3:10 Hessa ne oothiko, ne shaaliyan kathi kumana; ne daalloy woyne ushshan kumidi palahana.
PRO 3:11 Ta na7aw, Godaa seera kadhopa; I nena seeriya wode lancofa.
PRO 3:12 Aaway ba dosiya na7a seereysada, Goday ba dosiya uraa seerees.
PRO 3:13 Cincatethi demmeynne, akeeka baw miishe oothiya uray anjetidaysa.
PRO 3:14 Cincatethi birape aadhidi go77ees; worqafe aadhidi maaddees.
PRO 3:15 Cincatethi worqafe aadhidi al7o; ne demmanaw amotiya ubbay cincatethara ginenna.
PRO 3:16 Cincatethi ushacha kushen adussa laythi, haddirsa kushen duretethinne boncho oykasu.
PRO 3:17 I ogeti ufaysiya ogeta; I horogay saro horoga.
PRO 3:18 Iya bana oykeysatas de7o mithi; iyo minthidi oykiya ubbay anjetidaysata.
PRO 3:19 Goday ba cincatethan sa7aa medhis; ba akeekan salota minthis.
PRO 3:20 Iya eratethan shaafati goggoosona; shaaratape iri bukees.
PRO 3:21 Ta na7aw, suure pirdanne shaakidi ero minthada oyka enti neepe shaaketofo.
PRO 3:22 Enti new de7o gidana; injenne ufaysi immana.
PRO 3:23 He wode ne hirgi bayna hemetana; ne tohoy dhubetenna.
PRO 3:24 Neeni zin7iya wode yayyaka; qamma kumethi mal7o dhisko dhiskana.
PRO 3:25 Akeekona gakiya gados yayyaka; iitati dhayiya dhayuwan dagammaka.
PRO 3:26 Goday new zempo gidana; ne tohoy xihen oyketonnaada I naagana.
PRO 3:27 New wolqi de7ishin, metootida uraas lo77oba ooso aggofa.
PRO 3:28 Ha77i maaddanaw danda7ashe ne shooruwa, “Simmada ya; ta new wonto immana” yaagopa.
PRO 3:29 Nena ammanetidi, ne matan de7iya, ne shooruwa bolla gene oothofa.
PRO 3:30 Nena qohonna de7ishin, ase coo mootopa.
PRO 3:31 Gene oothiya asata qanaatopa; enta iita oosuwa kaallofa.
PRO 3:32 Goday iita oothiya asata ixees; shin suureta dosees.
PRO 3:33 Goday iita oothiya asaa keethaa baaddees; shin suureba oothiya asaa keethaa anjees.
PRO 3:34 Otoron qelqiseyisata Goday qelqisees; shin bantana kawusheyisata sabbees.
PRO 3:35 Cincati boncho demmana; shin eeyati kawuyana.
PRO 4:1 Ta nayto, hinte aawa zoriya si7ite; loythi si7ite; hinte akeeka demmana.
PRO 4:2 Ta hintew lo77o timirte immiya gisho, ta timirtiya kadhopite.
PRO 4:3 Taka ta aawas na7a; ta aayes iya dosiya issi na7a.
PRO 4:4 Ta aaway tana haysada yaagidi tamaarsis; “Ta oday new gelo; ta kiita naaga; neeni hessa oothiko de7on daana.
PRO 4:5 Cincatethinne akeeka demmanaw minna; ta new odiyaba dogopa; iyape kare keyopa.
PRO 4:6 Cincatethas zoko zaaropa; iya nena ashshana; iyo dosa; iya nena naagana.
PRO 4:7 Cincatethi aadhiya gisho iyo demma; new de7iyaba wursidi ekikoka akeeka demma.
PRO 4:8 Ne iyo boncha; iya nena dhoqu dhoqu oothana; ne iyo oykiko, iya nena bonchana.
PRO 4:9 Iya ne huuphiyas saba gidana; boncho kallacha immana” yaagis.
PRO 4:10 Ta na7aw, si7a; ta odeysa eka; ne laythay aduqana.
PRO 4:11 Taani nena cincatetha oge kaalethana; suure horoga bessaana.
PRO 4:12 Ne hemetiya wode dhubiyabay deenna; woxiyakoka dhubetaka.
PRO 4:13 Ta timirtiya loytha naaga; yeddofa; timirtey new de7o immiya gisho loytha naaga.
PRO 4:14 Nagaranchota ogiyara boopa; iita asata ogiyan hemetofa.
PRO 4:15 Iyape haaka; iyan hemetofa; guye simma; ne ogiyan ba.
PRO 4:16 Enti iitaba oothonna de7ishin dhiskoy ekenna; enti ase dhubbonna de7ishin dhiskoy efenna.
PRO 4:17 Enti nagara kathada moosona; geellatethi ushshada uyoosona.
PRO 4:18 Xillota ogey seeta gallas gakanaw, guji guji poo7iya wonta xalqe mela.
PRO 4:19 Shin geellata ogey sakana dhuma mela; enti aybin dhubetiyakoka erokona.
PRO 4:20 Ta na7aw, ta odeysa si7a; ne haythaa taako zaara.
PRO 4:21 Ne ayfiya sinthafe haassofa; ne wozanan naaga.
PRO 4:22 Enta demmiya ubbaas enti de7o; enti asatethas payyatethi immoosona.
PRO 4:23 De7oy iyape pultiya gisho, ubbaafe aathada ne wozanaa minthada naaga.
PRO 4:24 Ne doonape iita haasaya digga; wordo haasaya ne matape haassa.
PRO 4:25 Sitti gada sinthe xeella; ne ayfey ne sinthan de7iyaba tishshi oothidi xeello.
PRO 4:26 Ne tohuwa ogiya giigisa; suure oge xalaalan hemeta.
PRO 4:27 Suure ogepe ushachi haddirsi goopa; ne tohoy iita oge boonnada naaga.
PRO 5:1 Ta na7aw, ta cincatetha hayza si7a; ne haythaa ta timirtiyako zaara.
PRO 5:2 Hessi nena wozanaama oothana; ne oday ne eratethaa qoncisana.
PRO 5:3 Layma maccasa inxarsafe ililo eessi xokees; I oday oysape aadhidi looxikees.
PRO 5:4 Shin wursethan iya godare uthada cammawusu; nam7u baggara qanxiya mashshada qara.
PRO 5:5 I tohoy hayqoko bees; I tangoy duufo gathees.
PRO 5:6 Iya de7o oge qopuku; I ogey geella; shin geella gideysa iya eruku.
PRO 5:7 Ta na7aw, tana si7a; ta odeysafe keyopa.
PRO 5:8 Layma maccasa heera boopite; I keetha pengiyako shiiqopite.
PRO 5:9 Hessi hanonna ixiko hinte bonchuwa harati ekana; na7atethan wozana mino asa kushen hinte hayqana.
PRO 5:10 Hinte aquwa allagati ekana; hinte daaburadi shiishidabay hara asas gidana.
PRO 5:11 Wursethan hinte ashoynne hinte asatethay wurin hinte yeekana.
PRO 5:12 Hinte yaagana; “Ta ayis timirte ixadina? Ta wozanay seera ayis kadhidee?
PRO 5:13 Taani ta astamaareta si7abike; tana zoreyisata zoriya ekabike.
PRO 5:14 Hesaa gisho, ta asay shiiqida shiiquwan, kawuyanaw matas” yaagana.
PRO 5:15 Neeni ne pultuwafe haathe uya; ne mache xalaala siiqa.
PRO 5:16 Ne pultuwa dabaaban, ne olla haatha denban ayis gussay?
PRO 5:17 Enta new buzo ootha; hara allaga uraara koxofa.
PRO 5:18 Ne pultoy new anjeto; ne na7atetha machera ufayta.
PRO 5:19 Lo77iya gaaredaninne ufaysiya gen7eda I dhanthay ubba wode nena alo; ubba wode I siiqoy nena di77o.
PRO 5:20 Ta na7aw, layma maccasan ayis di7etay? Hara asa macho ayis qoommay?
PRO 5:21 Asi oothiyaba ubbaa Goday be7ees; I hemetiya horoga ubbaa xeellees.
PRO 5:22 Nagaranchuwa I oothida nagaray oykees; Iya nagaraa gitey iya qachees.
PRO 5:23 I ba eeyatethan dhayis; bana naagiboonna gisho hayqis.
PRO 6:1 Ta na7aw, miishe tal7ida ne shooruwas waase gelidaba gidiko, hara asas kushe baqada caaqidaba gidiko,
PRO 6:2 ne caaqida ne caaquwan xihen gelidaba gidiko, ne doonape keyida qaalan oyketidaba gidiko,
PRO 6:3 hiza ne shooruwa kushen geladasa. Hessa gisho, ta na7aw, iyape keyanaw koyko, ne shooruwa soo bada waasetetha ne bollafe wothana mela aaddashada iya woossa.
PRO 6:4 Hessa oothonna de7ashe zin7ofa; dhiskoyka nena ekofo.
PRO 6:5 Shankafe gen7ey kessi ekiyada, gitepe kafoy attiyada nena ashsha.
PRO 6:6 Neno azallaw, zimadoko ba; iyape cincatethi tamaara.
PRO 6:7 Zimaddota kiittey baawa, halaqi woyko enta haarey baawa.
PRO 6:8 Shin bantaw maanaba bone minjoosona; kathi cakiya wode bantaw koshshiya kathaa shiishosona.
PRO 6:9 Neno azallaw, ne awude gakanaw dhiskay? Ne dhiskofe awude barkanee?
PRO 6:10 Neeni “guuthu zin7ana; guuthu dhiskana; kushe shiisha ekada guuthu shempana” yaagasa.
PRO 6:11 He wode manqotethi pangada, paci ola miishe oykida asada ne bolla yaana.
PRO 6:12 Laafanne iita asi yuuyidi oda mirqees;
PRO 6:13 I ba ayfen qam7otees; ba tohon bessees; ba biradhen mallees.
PRO 6:14 Iya ulon geellatethi de7ees; iitabaa qopees; ubba wode ooshshu medhees.
PRO 6:15 Hessa gisho dhayoy akeekona iya bolla yaana; I hassayonna meqana; zaaridi paxenna.
PRO 6:16 Goday ixiya usupun qommoti de7oosona; I shaatetiya qommoti laapuna;
PRO 6:17 kadhidi xeelliya ayfe, wordotiya inxarsi, xillo asata wodhiya kushe,
PRO 6:18 iitaba maqiya wozanaa, iitabaako woxanaw eesotiya toho,
PRO 6:19 Wordo bolla wordo gujiya wordo marka, ishata giddon ooshshi medhiya asi.
PRO 6:20 Ta na7aw, ne aawa kiita pola; ne aaye timirtiya aggofa.
PRO 6:21 Enta ubba wode ne wozanan oyka; ne qoodhiyan qacha.
PRO 6:22 Ne hemetiya wode enti nena kaalethana; ne zin7iya wode, enti nena naagana; ne barkiya wode enti nena zorana.
PRO 6:23 Godaa kiitay xompe; iya timirtey poo7o; iya seeray de7oko efiya oge.
PRO 6:24 Ha timirteti iita maccafenne hara cimmiya maccasa inxarsafe nena naagana.
PRO 6:25 I mala lo77otethay nena qadhethofo; I qam7otoy nena di77ofo.
PRO 6:26 Issi addey guutha miishen layma maccas demmanaw danda7ees; shin hara asa macho laggethoy shempo ekees.
PRO 6:27 Tama idimmin iya ma7oy meetetonna attey de7ii?
PRO 6:28 Tama bonqo yedhin, iya tohoy xuugetonna attey de7ii?
PRO 6:29 Asa macho laggethiya uray hessa mela; iyo bochiya ubbay seerettonna attenna.
PRO 6:30 Kaysoy koshatidi maanaw kaysiko, asi iya borenna.
PRO 6:31 Shin I oyketiyabaa gidiko, laapun kushe qanxana; ba son de7iya miishe ubbaa immana.
PRO 6:32 Shin maccasara laymatiya asi wozani bayna asi; he uray ba shempuwa dhaysees.
PRO 6:33 Deshethinne kawushi iya qaada; yeelli iyape qushetenna.
PRO 6:34 Qanaatey azinas yilo denthethees; halo kessiya wode iw qadhetenna.
PRO 6:35 I ay acaka ekenna; ay mela imotika iya hanquwa doshisenna.
PRO 7:1 Ta na7aw, ta qaala naaga; ta kiitaa ne wozanan wotha.
PRO 7:2 De7on daanaw ta kiita ootha; ta timirtiya ne ayfe na77eda naaga.
PRO 7:3 Ne kushen enta qacha; ne wozanan enta xaafa.
PRO 7:4 Cincatethi ne michida, akeeka ne mata dabboda xeella.
PRO 7:5 Enti nena layma maccasapenne ba qaalan cimmiya hara maccasape naagana.
PRO 7:6 Issi gallas ta maskootera kare xeellas.
PRO 7:7 Eratethi pacida na7atethata be7as; enta giddofe issoy daro eeya.
PRO 7:8 He na7atethay ogera bishe, issi layma maccase keethaa matara aadhees; I soo efiya ogiya simmidi I sooko bis.
PRO 7:9 He wode sa7i laadees.
PRO 7:10 Maccasiya iya demmasu; iya layma gideysa I ma7oy erisees; iya asa cimmanaw halchada keyasu.
PRO 7:11 Iya xaltaamanne yeelli bayna maccas; son wopu gada uttuku.
PRO 7:12 Iya issi toho ogen, issi toho giyan, issi toho dabaaban eqada naagawusu.
PRO 7:13 Iya he na7atetha qoommada yeerasu; iya tishshi oothada xeellashe haysada yaagasu;
PRO 7:14 “Taani ta yarshuwa yarshada, ta qangetha hachi gathas.
PRO 7:15 Yaatada nena mokanaw keyas; nena daro koyas; hiza nena demmas.
PRO 7:16 Taani Gibxefe yida, alleeqetida afila hiixas.
PRO 7:17 Taani ta hiixa, karbefe, almunepenne qarafape, oosetida shittuwa puukas.
PRO 7:18 Haaya; wontana gakanaw siiqo aloos; qoometidi ufaytoos.
PRO 7:19 Ta azinay son deenna; haaho biitta bis.
PRO 7:20 Miishe karxiita kunthidi bida gisho, ageena kumonna soo simmenna” yaagasu.
PRO 7:21 Ba mal7o odan iya balethasu; ba liiqo inxarsan iya cimmasu.
PRO 7:22 Boori shukettanaw beysada, gaari eesotidi xihen geleysada, I iyo kaallidi bis.
PRO 7:23 Toori iya wozanaa caddidaada hanis; gite giddo gelida kafo daanis; hessi ubbay iya shempuwa dhaysanaw haneysa eribeenna.
PRO 7:24 Hiza ta na7aw, tana si7a; ta doonape keyiya qaala hayza.
PRO 7:25 Ne wozanay maccasa geedo boopo; I ogiyan gelada dhayopa.
PRO 7:26 Iya cadda yeggidaysati daro; iya wodhidaysati guutha gidokona.
PRO 7:27 I soy duufoko efiya oge; hayqoko kaalethiya horoga.
PRO 8:1 Cincatethi xeegawusu; si7ite; akeeki ba qaala dhoqu oothida sissawusu.
PRO 8:2 Oge doonan de7iya zumata bollanne daggala ogiyan iya eqawusu.
PRO 8:3 Dirsa penge matan, katamaa geliya pengen eqada, ba qaala dhoqu oothada haysada yaagawusu.
PRO 8:4 Asaw, ta hintena xeegayis; asa koche ubbaa xeegayis.
PRO 8:5 Hinteno eratethi baynaysato eratethi tamaarite; hinteno eeyato, akeeka demmite.
PRO 8:6 Taani lo77oba odiya gisho si7ite; taani doonape suurebay keyees.
PRO 8:7 Taani tuma odetayis; wordoy ta matan ixetidaba.
PRO 8:8 Ta oday tuma; geella woyko mirqethi gidenna.
PRO 8:9 Akeeki de7iya uraas ta oday like; eri de7iya uraas ta oday qonce.
PRO 8:10 Birape aathidi ta zoriya doorite; geeshsha worqafe aathidi eratethi doorite.
PRO 8:11 Cincatethi zo7o al7o shuchafe aadhees; ne amotiya ubbay iira liketenna.
PRO 8:12 Taw, cincatethas akeeki de7ees; eratethinne shaakidi eroy tabaa.
PRO 8:13 Godaas yashshi iitatethi ixo; taani otoronne ceeqetethi ixayis; iita ogenne wordo oda dosike.
PRO 8:14 Zoreynne lo77o eray tabaa; akeekinne wolqi taw de7ees.
PRO 8:15 Kawoti ta baggara kawotoosona; haareysati suure higge ta baggara kessoosona.
PRO 8:16 Halaqati ta maaddin deriya haaroosona; biitta aysiya gita asata ta maaddayis.
PRO 8:17 Tana doseyisata ta dosayis; tana minthidi koyeysati demmana.
PRO 8:18 Duretethinne bonchoy taara de7oosona; wuronna shaloynne injey ta matana.
PRO 8:19 Hinte taape demmiya go77ay, geeshsha worqafenne birape aadhees.
PRO 8:20 Ta xillotetha ogen hemetayis; suure pirda ogiyara kanthayis.
PRO 8:21 Tana doseysatas ta shalo immana; enta keethaa duretethan kunthana.
PRO 8:22 “Goday tana ubbaafe koyro medhis; benipeka iya oosuwas doomethay tana.
PRO 8:23 Alamey medhetanaape kase taani shuumetas.
PRO 8:24 Abbay bayna wode, pultoti dhuuqonna de7ishin ta yeletas.
PRO 8:25 Deretinne zumati medhetanaape sinthe ta yeletas.
PRO 8:26 Goday sa7aanne sa7an de7iya ubbaa medhanaape sinthe woyko koyro kophe biittay oosetanaape sinthe ta yeletas.
PRO 8:27 Goday salota miccida wode, abbatape bollara salo gufantho giigisida wode, taani yan de7ayis.
PRO 8:28 Goday shaarata bollara wothida wode, abba pultota dhuusida wode,
PRO 8:29 abba haathati imetida zawape pinnidi, bolla aadhonada, I enta kiitida wode sa7aa baasuwa minthida wode, taani yan de7ayis.
PRO 8:30 He wode ta iya matan waanna oosancho; ubba wode ta iya ufaysayis; tawuka iya sinthan ufaytayis.
PRO 8:31 I medhida alamiyan ufaytayis; asa naytika tana ufaysoosona.
PRO 8:32 “Hiza ta nayto, si7ite; ta odeysada ootheysati anjetidaysata.
PRO 8:33 Ta timirtiya si7ite; cinca gidite; si7idaba dogopite.
PRO 8:34 Taani odidaba si7iya uray, gallas gallas ta pengiyan bentiya uray, ta pengiyan naagiya uray anjetidaysa.
PRO 8:35 Tana demmiday de7o demmees; Godaape saba ekees.
PRO 8:36 Shin tana demmonna uray bana qohees; tana ixiya ubbay hayqo dosees.”
PRO 9:1 Cincatethi ba keethaa keexasu; laapun tuussata ba keethaas essasu.
PRO 9:2 Iya ba giigisiya gibiras modho mehe shukasu; woyne aggasu; gayta asaa sinthe aathasu.
PRO 9:3 Asaa xeeganaw ba aylleta kiittasu; oosanchoti katamaa dhoqa bessan eqidi,
PRO 9:4 Hinteno, eri pacidaysato haa gelite! Eeyatako haysada yaagasu.
PRO 9:5 “Haa yiite; ta kathaa miite; ta aggida woyniya uyite.
PRO 9:6 Hinte eeyatethi aggidi de7on de7ite; akeekidi hemetite” yaagasu.
PRO 9:7 Qelqisiya uraa seeriya asi cashshe ekees; iita uraa zoriya asi baw qohetees.
PRO 9:8 Qelqisiya uraa zoropa; I nena ixana; cinca uraa zora; I nena dosana.
PRO 9:9 Cincatethi uraa tamaarsa; I cinca gidana; Xillo uraa tamaarsa; I era gujana.
PRO 9:10 Godaas yashshi cincatethas doomethi, Geeshsha Godaa eroy akeeka.
PRO 9:11 Ta gaason ne laythay darana; ne de7o laythay aduqana.
PRO 9:12 Ne cinca gidiko, go7etey nena; Ne qelqisiya asi gidiko nena qohaasa.
PRO 9:13 Eeyo maccasi waaso darawusu; iw yeelli baawa; iya aykoka eruku.
PRO 9:14 Iya ba karen woyko katamaa dhoqa bessan uttawusu.
PRO 9:15 Banta ogiya biya asaa xeegada,
PRO 9:16 “Hinteno, eri pacidaysato taako haa yiite” yaagasu. Eri baynaysatako,
PRO 9:17 “Kaysidi uyaa haathi mal7ees; geeman miya kathi lo77ees” yaagasu.
PRO 9:18 Shin hayqida asay yan de7eysa, I imathatika duufon de7eysa I erenna.
PRO 10:1 Haysati Solomone leemisota. Cinca na7i ba aawa ufaysees; shin eeya na7i ba aayiw azzanthees.
PRO 10:2 Nagaran demmida miishey go77enna; shin xillotethi hayqope ashshees.
PRO 10:3 Goday xillota koshaysenna; shin nagaranchota amuwa polisenna.
PRO 10:4 Azallatethi manqisees; shin minnidi oosoy dureyees.
PRO 10:5 Cinca asi ba kathaa bone shiishees; shin kathi cakiya wode dhiskiya asi kawuyees.
PRO 10:6 Xillo asi anjetees; shin nagarancho asi ba makallatethaa doonan genthees.
PRO 10:7 Xilluwa sunthay anjon xeegetishe de7ees; shin nagaranchota sunthay elle dogetees.
PRO 10:8 Cinca asi kiittidaba oothees; shin eeya asi dhayoko bees.
PRO 10:9 Suure asi saro de7ees; shin geella asi ba gomen oyketees.
PRO 10:10 Gene ayfen qam7otiya asi meto ehees; shin yayyonna seeriya asi sarotethi medhees.
PRO 10:11 Xillo asa odi de7o pulto; shin nagarancho asa odi makalla genthees.
PRO 10:12 Ixoy palama denthethees; shin siiqoy bala ubbaa kammees.
PRO 10:13 Wozanaama asi cincatethan odees; shin eeya asa zokoy xam7as attees.
PRO 10:14 Cincati eratethi dagayoosona; shin eeyata doonay dhayo dafees.
PRO 10:15 Dure asa miishey diretida katamada naagees; shin manqotethi manqota dhaysees.
PRO 10:16 Xillo asa oosoy iya de7o; shin iita asa wursethay dhayo.
PRO 10:17 Seerin simmiya asi de7o ogen hemetees; shin seerin ixiya asi balees.
PRO 10:18 Ixo kammiya asi wordancho; zigirsi laaliya asi eeya.
PRO 10:19 Daro haasaya giddon nagari dhayenna; shin ba doona shiishiya asi cinca.
PRO 10:20 Xillo asa inxarsi geeshsha bira mela; shin iita asa wozani iitaban kumis.
PRO 10:21 Xillo asa odi daro asaa go77ees; shin eeyati banta paca wozanan hayqoosona.
PRO 10:22 Godaa anjoy dure kessees; he duretetha bolla meto gujenna.
PRO 10:23 Eeya uraas iitabaa oosoy kaassa mela; shin wozanaama asi cincatethan ufaytees.
PRO 10:24 Iita asi hirgidabay iya bolla gakana; shin xilloy amotidabay imetana.
PRO 10:25 Gotey aadhiya wode nagaranchoy bentenna; shin xilloti merinaw minnidi daana.
PRO 10:26 Caalabay ache, cuyi ayfe qoheysada, azalla asi kiittidaysa yiloyees.
PRO 10:27 Godaas yashshi laythi adussees; shin nagaranchota laythay qaammees.
PRO 10:28 Xillo asi ufaysi yaana gidi naagees; shin nagaranchota ufaysay dhayana.
PRO 10:29 Godaa ogey xillotas baqatidi attiya besse; shin iita oothiya asaas dhayo.
PRO 10:30 Xilloti ubba wode qaaxokona; shin iitati biitta bolla dookona.
PRO 10:31 Xillo asi cincatethan odees; shin geellaba odetiya inxarsi qanxetana
PRO 10:32 Xillo asa inxarsi bessiya haasaya erees; shin iita asaa oday wobbe.
PRO 11:1 Goday wordo mizaane ixees; shin like mizaanen ufaytees.
PRO 11:2 Otoroy yaa wode kawushatethi yees; shin ashketethan cincatethi yees.
PRO 11:3 Xillota enta suuretethay kaalethees; shin iita asata enta geellatethay dhaysis.
PRO 11:4 Hanqo gallas duretethi go77enna; shin xillotethi hayqope ashshees.
PRO 11:5 Borey bayna uraa ogiya xillotethay suurisees; shin iita uray ba iitatethan kundees.
PRO 11:6 Suureta enta xillotethay ashshees; shin ammanetonayisata enta amoy xihe gididi oykana.
PRO 11:7 Iita asi hayqiya wode, I naagiya ufaysay iyara issife hayqees; I ba wolqan ceeqetiyabay ubbayka dhayees.
PRO 11:8 Xilloy metope attees; iya gisho iitaa bolla metoy yees.
PRO 11:9 Xoossaa kaddida asi ba doonan asa dhaysis; shin xilloti eran kessi ekoosona.
PRO 11:10 Xilloti bonchetiya wode, katamay ufaytees; qassi iitati hayqiya wode, hashshu gees.
PRO 11:11 Xillota anjuwa gaason katamay diccees; shin iita uraa odi katamaa dhaysis.
PRO 11:12 Ba shooruwa kadhiya uraas wozani baawa; shin akeekancho uray si77i gees.
PRO 11:13 Zigiriya asi xuuraa laallees; shin ammanetiya asi xuuraa genthees.
PRO 11:14 Kaalethiyabay dhayiko, kawotethay kundees; shin daro zoreysati de7iko, saroy de7ees.
PRO 11:15 Erenna uraas waase gidiya asi tumape metootana; hessafe waase gidonna ixeysi lo77o.
PRO 11:16 Ulo keeha maccasi bonchetawusu; shin iita asi duretetha xalaala duretees.
PRO 11:17 Keeha asi baw lo77oba oothees; shin wozana mino asi bana qohees.
PRO 11:18 Iita asi demmiya miishey cimo; shin xillotethaa zeriya uray tuma woyto cakana.
PRO 11:19 Xillotethan minnidi de7iya uray paxa de7ana; shin iitatethaa kaalliya uray hayqana.
PRO 11:20 Goday iita qofay de7iya asata ixees; shin suure hemeteysatan ufaytees.
PRO 11:21 Iita asi seerettonna attenna; shin xillota kochay attana.
PRO 11:22 Qofi bayna mala lo77o macca puulatethay guduntho sidhen aathida worqaa mela.
PRO 11:23 Xillota amuwas poloy lo77o xalaala; shin iitata amuwas poloy hanqo xalaala.
PRO 11:24 Issi issi asati banta miishe asas coo keehosona; shin enta aqoy haa darees. Hara asati qassi banta miishas pala uuzettoosona; shin enta aqoy yaa pacees.
PRO 11:25 Keeha asi duretana; harata maaddiya asi maadetana.
PRO 11:26 Kathi al77in bayzanaw minjiya uraa asay baaddees. Shin ba kathaa asay koyiya wode bayziya uraa anjees.
PRO 11:27 Lo77oba minthidi koyiya uray ufaysaa demmees; shin iitabaa koyiya uraa iitabay demmees.
PRO 11:28 Ba duretetha ammanetiya asi kundana; shin xilloti balgo mithada.
PRO 11:29 Ba soo asaa bolla buqethi denthiya uray go7etiyabay aybika baawa. Eeyatika cincatas aylle gidana.
PRO 11:30 Xillo asi de7o ayfe ayfiya mitha mela; shempo ashsheysati cincata.
PRO 11:31 Xilloti sa7an banta ooso gate ekiyaba gidiko, iitatinne nagaranchati banta oosuwas ekana gatey waanidi darandeesha!
PRO 12:1 Seera dosiya uray eratethi dosees; shin seera ixiya uray eeya.
PRO 12:2 Lo77o asi Godaape saba demmees; shin Goday genanchota pirdees.
PRO 12:3 Asi iitatethan minnidi eqenna; shin xillota xaphoy qaaxenna.
PRO 12:4 Wozanaama machiya ba azinaas kallacha mela; shin ba azina kawushiya machiya meqethi miya ajaaje mela.
PRO 12:5 Xilluwa qofay suure; shin iitata zorey cimo.
PRO 12:6 Iitata zoretay asa qohanaasa; shin xillota zoretay enta ashshanaasa.
PRO 12:7 Iita asati kundana; entaw zerethika attenna; shin xillota kochay minnidi de7ana.
PRO 12:8 Asi ba cincatetha mela galatetees; shin geella qofay de7iya asi kadhetees.
PRO 12:9 Dure asi daanidi, meton de7iya asaape coo asa daanidi, oothiiddi ba de7o sugiya asi keeha.
PRO 12:10 Xillo asi ba mehes qadhetees, shin wozana mino asas qadhey baawa.
PRO 12:11 Ba biitta minthi oothiya uray kathi kallees; shin pathonnaba yedethiya uray akeeki pacidaysa.
PRO 12:12 Iitati nagarancho asata di77anaw amottoosona; shin xillota xaphoy daayidi de7ana.
PRO 12:13 Iita asa iya doonape keyida odi xihe gididi oykees; shin xilloy metope kessi ekees.
PRO 12:14 Asi ba doonape keyiya qaalan lo77oba kallees; ba oothida ooso gatiya ekees.
PRO 12:15 Eeya asi biya buussay aw iya huuphen like daanees; shin cinca asi zore si7ees.
PRO 12:16 Eeya uraa hanqoy ellesidi eretees; shin cinca asi cashshe wuda geenna.
PRO 12:17 Tumaa haasayiya asi suureba odees; shin wordo markay wordo odees.
PRO 12:18 Akeekona odetiya odi mashshada caddees; shin cinca inxarsay pathees.
PRO 12:19 Wordo odi guutha wodesa; shin tuma odi merinaw de7ana.
PRO 12:20 Iita qopiya asaa wozanan cimoy de7ees; shin saroba zoreteyisata wozanan ufaysay kumees.
PRO 12:21 Xillota metoy gakenna; shin iitatas metoy darana.
PRO 12:22 Goday wordanchota ixees; shin tumancho asatan I ufaytees.
PRO 12:23 Cinca asi ba eraa qottees; shin eeyati banta eeyatetha odoosona.
PRO 12:24 Minnidi oothiya uray dere haarees; shin azalla asi haaretees.
PRO 12:25 Un7an kumida wozani azzano ehees; shin keeha odi iya ufaysees.
PRO 12:26 Xillo asi ba shooruwa zoridi, suure oge kaalethees; shin iitati oge tumaape haassees.
PRO 12:27 Azalla asi shankatidi ehida asho kathenna; shin minnidi oothiya uray ba miishiyas mishetees.
PRO 12:28 Xillotethaa ogen de7oy de7ees; he ogen hayqoy baawa.
PRO 13:1 Erancho na7ay ba aawa seera si7ees; shin qelqiseysi seera ekenna.
PRO 13:2 Asi ba doonape keyiya qaalan lo77oba ekees; shin ammanetonaysati makallaba amottoosona.
PRO 13:3 Ba doona naagiya uray ba shempuwa naagees; shin eeson haasaya uray bana dhaysees.
PRO 13:4 Azallay amottees; amotikonne aybaka demmenna; shin minnidi ootheysati kallana.
PRO 13:5 Xillo asati wordo oda ixoosona. Shin iita asata odi yeellayeesinne kawushshees.
PRO 13:6 Suure de7uwa de7iya uraa iya xillotethay naagees; shin nagarancho iya nagaray ongees.
PRO 13:7 Bana dure daanisiya asi de7ees; shin iyaw aybinne baawa; qassi bana manqo daanisiya asi de7ees; shin iyaw daro aqoy de7ees.
PRO 13:8 Asi ba miishen ba shempo wozanaw danda7ees; shin manquwa yashisiyabay baawa.
PRO 13:9 Xillota poo7oy phoolees; shin iitata xompey to7ana.
PRO 13:10 Otoroy ooshshi yelees; shin zore ekeysati cincata.
PRO 13:11 Daaburi bayna demmida miishey eeson dhayees; shin minni oothidi demmida aqoy, dari daridi bees.
PRO 13:12 Koyiyabay poletonna gam7eysi azzanthees; shin amotidabay poleteysi ufaysees.
PRO 13:13 Zore kadhiya uray meton gelees; shin kiita bonchiya uray saro de7ana.
PRO 13:14 Cincatethi immiya timirtey de7o pulto; higgey ase hayqo xihepe kessi ekanaw maaddees.
PRO 13:15 Akeeki de7iya uray bonchetees; shin ammanetona ixoy qohos gathees.
PRO 13:16 Cinca asi ubbay eran oothees; shin eeyi ba eeyatetha qoncisees.
PRO 13:17 Iita asati kiitetidi, meton geloosona; shin ammanthiya asati kiitetidi, sarotethi ehoosona.
PRO 13:18 Seera ixiya asi manqeesinne yeellatees; shin seera ekiya uray bonchetees.
PRO 13:19 Amotidabay poleteysi daro ufaysees; shin iitati iitabaape haakanaw koyokona.
PRO 13:20 Cinca asara hemetiya asi cinca gidees; shin eeya asara hemetiya asi meton gelees.
PRO 13:21 Nagaranchota iita qaaday kaallees; shin duretethi xillota woyto.
PRO 13:22 Lo77o asi ba nayta nayta laatisees; shin nagaranchuwa aqoy xilluwas dagayetees.
PRO 13:23 Manquwa goshshay daro kathi ayfenaw danda7ees; shin suure pirda pacan dhayees.
PRO 13:24 Pircon seeranaw dosonna asi ba na7aa ixees; shin ba na7aa siiqiya uray minnidi seerees.
PRO 13:25 Xilloy, uloy kallana gakanaw mees; shin nagaranchoy ubba wode koshatana.
PRO 14:1 Cinca maccasi ba keethaa keexawusu; shin eeya maccasiya ba keethaa ba kushen laallawusu.
PRO 14:2 Suure hemetiya asi Godaa yayyees; shin ba oge geellayiya asi Godaa kadhees.
PRO 14:3 Eeya odi iya zokuwas xam7a ehees; shin cincata inxarsay enta naagees.
PRO 14:4 Boori bayna ixiko shaaley kaysi gidees; shin goshsha boori de7iko, ne shaaley kathan kumees.
PRO 14:5 Ammanetiya marki ubba wode tuma odees; shin wordo marki wordo xalaala odetees.
PRO 14:6 Qelqisiya asi cincatethi koyees, shin demmenna; akeeki de7iya asi eratethi demoy waaysenna.
PRO 14:7 Eeya asape haaka; neeni iya odape eratethi demmaka.
PRO 14:8 Cinca asi cinca gidiya ba oothiyaba erees; shin eeya asa eeyatethay iya balethees.
PRO 14:9 Eeyati nagara oothishe, qiirotanaysa aggidi qelqisoosona; shin suureti banta nagaray atto geetetanaw koyoosona.
PRO 14:10 Issi issi wozani ba azzanuwa erees; iya ufaysa oonika iyara koxenna.
PRO 14:11 Iitata keethay laaletana; shin suureta keethay minnidi daana.
PRO 14:12 Asas like daaniya ogey de7ees; shin iya wursethay hayqoko gathees.
PRO 14:13 Miicha wodeka wozanan azzanoy de7ees; ufaysa wursethay azzano gidanaw danda7ees.
PRO 14:14 Iita asi ba iita oosuwa gate ekana; lo77o asika ba lo77o oosuwa gate ekana.
PRO 14:15 Eeya asi ubbaba ammanees; shin cinca asi akeekidi tangees.
PRO 14:16 Cinca asi Godaa yayyees; iitape haakees; shin eeya asi eesotesinne iitape naagetenna.
PRO 14:17 Elle hanqetiya asi eeya ooso oothees; shin cinca asi danda7ancho.
PRO 14:18 Akeeki bayna asi ba eeyatetha gatiya ekoosona; shin cinca asi eratethi kallachada goxoosona.
PRO 14:19 Iitati lo77ota sinthan gulbatana; nagaranchati xillota pengen hokana.
PRO 14:20 Manqoy ba shooruwan ixetees; shin duretas daro laggeti de7oosona.
PRO 14:21 Ba shooruwa kadhiya asi nagara oothees; shin manquwa maaddiya asi anjetidaysa.
PRO 14:22 Iitabaa maqeteysati baloosona gidokona? shin lo77oba oothanaw halcheysati ammanetethinne siiqo demmoosona.
PRO 14:23 Minnidi oothiya ooso ubban wodhey de7ees; shin coo odi manqotethi ehees.
PRO 14:24 Cincatas enta duretethay entaw kallacha; shin eeyati guji guji eeyoosona.
PRO 14:25 Tuma marki shempo ashshees; shin wordo marki balethees.
PRO 14:26 Godaa yayiya asas mino miixay de7ees; iya naytas baqatidi attiya bessi de7ees.
PRO 14:27 Godaa yashshi de7o pulto; hayqo xihepe ase ashshees.
PRO 14:28 Kawo gitatethi I haariya asaa darotethaana; shin haaretiya asi dhayiko ika pathenna.
PRO 14:29 Danda7ancho asas gita akeeki de7ees; shin elle hanqetiya asi ba eeyatetha qoncisees.
PRO 14:30 Saro wozani asatethas payyatethi immees; shin qanaatey asatethas ajaaje harge mela.
PRO 14:31 Manqota naaqiya asi enta medhidaysa cayees; shin metootanchotas keehiya asi Xoossaa bonchees.
PRO 14:32 Iitati banta iita ooson kundana; shin xillotas hayqope attiya miixi de7ees.
PRO 14:33 Akeekancho asa wozanan cincatethi kumis; shin eeyati cincatethi aybeko erokona.
PRO 14:34 Xillotethi issi kawotetha dhoqu dhoqu oothees; shin nagari ay asika kawushshees.
PRO 14:35 Erancho aylletanan kawoy ufaytees; shin yeellaya aylley kawa hanqethees.
PRO 15:1 Liiqo inxarsi hanqo zarbisees; shin dom7ethiya qaali hanqo denthethees.
PRO 15:2 Cincata inxarsay era puulayees; shin eeyata doonay eeyatethi pultisees.
PRO 15:3 Godaa ayfeti ubba bessi xeelloosona; iitatanne lo77ota shaakidi be7oosona.
PRO 15:4 Lo77o odi de7o mitha mela; shin geella odi ayyaana menthees.
PRO 15:5 Eeyi ba aawa seera kadhees; shin ba aawa seera ekiya asi cinca.
PRO 15:6 Xillo uraa keethan daro miishey de7ees; shin iitata soo geliya miishey meto ehees.
PRO 15:7 Cincata doonay era zerees; shin eeyata wozanay hessa mela gidenna.
PRO 15:8 Goday iitata yarshuwa ixees; shin suureta woosan I ufaytees.
PRO 15:9 Goday iita asata ogiya ixees; shin xillotethi kaalleyisata I dosees.
PRO 15:10 Like ogiya aggida asi pirdi naagees; seera ixiya asi hayqees.
PRO 15:11 Duufoynne dhayoy Godaa sinthan qonce; yaatin, asa wozana qofay waani iyape geemmanee?
PRO 15:12 Qelqisiya asi seera dosenna; cincatape zore oychenna.
PRO 15:13 Wozani ufaytin, som7oy poo7ees; shin wozani azzaniko, ayyaani meqees.
PRO 15:14 Akeeka wozani de7iya asi eratethi koyees; shin eeyati banta eeyatethan ufaytoosona.
PRO 15:15 Manqota de7oy ubba wode baaxe; shin ufaytiya asi ubba wode alees.
PRO 15:16 Ooshshara de7iya gita aqope Godaa yashshara de7iya guuthabay keeha.
PRO 15:17 Ooshshi de7iya bessan modho asho maanape siiqoy de7iya bessan santhi keeha.
PRO 15:18 Hanqoy ooshshi kessees; shin danda7i ooshshi irxisees.
PRO 15:19 Azalla asa ogey agunthan diretis; shin suure asa ogey giiga.
PRO 15:20 Cinca na7i ba aawa ufaysees; shin eeya na7i ba aayiw kadhees.
PRO 15:21 Wozani bayna asi ba eeyatethan ufaytees; shin wozanaama asi bessiya ba oothees.
PRO 15:22 Zorey dhayiko, qopidabay haddirees; daro zorey de7iya bessan qopidabay poletees.
PRO 15:23 Oyshas bessiya zaaro imoy he uraa ufaysees; ba woden odetiya odi ay mela ufaysi!
PRO 15:24 Garsan de7iya si7oolepe attana mela de7o ogey akeeka uraa pude kaalethees.
PRO 15:25 Goday otoranchota keetha laallana; shin am7e zawa naagees.
PRO 15:26 Goday iitata qofaa ixees; shin geeshsha qaalan I ufaytees.
PRO 15:27 Wordon wodhe demmanaw aaliya asi ba soo asaa bolla meto ehees; shin wodhaafe ixiya asi de7on daana.
PRO 15:28 Xillo asi odetanape sinthatidi qopees; shin iitata inxarsaape iitabay pultees.
PRO 15:29 Goday iitatape haakees; shin xillota woosa si7ees.
PRO 15:30 Som7oy pashkin wozani ufaytees; mishiraachoy meqethi minthees.
PRO 15:31 De7o immiya zore si7iya asi cincatethara issife daana.
PRO 15:32 Seera ixiya asi bana qohees; shin seera ekiya asi akeeka demmees.
PRO 15:33 Godaas yashshi cincatethi tamaarsees; ashketethi bonchofe sinthatees.
PRO 16:1 Asi ba wozanan halchees; shin like zaaroy Godaape bentees.
PRO 16:2 Asi oothiya ooso ubbay iyaw like daanees; shin Goday dendo qofaa be7ees.
PRO 16:3 Ne ooso ubbaa Godaas hadara imma; neeni qopidabay poletana.
PRO 16:4 Goday ubbabay qopidaysatho bana mela oothees; hanikoka, makallanchota wursethay dhayo.
PRO 16:5 Goday otoranchota ixees; enti seerettonna attokona.
PRO 16:6 Siiqoninne ammanetethan nagari atto geetetees; Godaas yayyidi asi iitabaape attees.
PRO 16:7 Asa hemethi Godaa ufaysiyabaa gidiko, I ba morketara saro daanada oothees.
PRO 16:8 Xillotethan bentiya guuthabay, wordon demmiya daro wodhepe lo77o.
PRO 16:9 Asi wozanan ba oothanaba halchees; shin halchoy Godaa maaden poletees.
PRO 16:10 Kawoy Xoossaafe ekida maatan pirdees; iya inxarsay suure pirdees.
PRO 16:11 Gina mizaanetinne maka miisheti Godaaba; bayziyaba ubban geney doonna mela Goday koyees.
PRO 16:12 Kawoti iita ooso ixoosona; enta araatay xillotethan eqees.
PRO 16:13 Kawoti xillo inxarsan ufaytoosona; tumaa haasaya uraa dosoosona.
PRO 16:14 Kawa hanqoy hayqo kiitancho mela; shin cinca asi hanquwa irxisees.
PRO 16:15 Kawa som7oy poo7iko de7oy de7ees; Iya lo77otethay ira ehiya shaara mela.
PRO 16:16 Cincatethi demoy worqa demope aadhees; akeeka demoy bira demope lo77o.
PRO 16:17 Suureta ogey iitape haako; ba hemethaa naagiya uray ba shempuwa naagees.
PRO 16:18 Otoroy dhayo kaalethees; ceeqetethi kundethi ehees.
PRO 16:19 Otoranchotara di7o shaaketanaape, ashke gididi manqidi de7eysi lo77o.
PRO 16:20 Zore si7iya uraas I oothiyaba ubbay injetana; Godan ammanetiya uray anjetana.
PRO 16:21 Ba qofan cinca gidida asi akeekancho geetetees; lo77o qaali eratethi gujees.
PRO 16:22 Cinca asas eratethi de7o pulto mela; shin eeyata seeroy coo wode wursees.
PRO 16:23 Cinca asi odetanaape sinthe qopees; iya mettershay eratethi gujees.
PRO 16:24 Lo77o qaali eessa ililoda mal7ees; shempos mal7o; meqethas paxo gidees.
PRO 16:25 Asas suure daaniya ogey de7ees; shin wursethan hayqoko gathees.
PRO 16:26 Asi minnidi oothana mela oothey katha amo; koshi minnidi oothana mela denthethees.
PRO 16:27 Kawusha asi iitabaa halchees; iya oday tamada xuuggees.
PRO 16:28 Wobe asi ooshshi denthethees; zigirsi ammanetiya laggeta shaakees.
PRO 16:29 Gene asi ba shooruwa cimmees; lo77o gidonna oge kaalethees.
PRO 16:30 Ba ayfen qam7otiya asi geellaba qopees; ba mettersha saxidi mandiya asi iitabaa oothees.
PRO 16:31 Puulumida huuphey boncho kallacha; hessika bentey xillo de7o de7ina.
PRO 16:32 Wolqaama asi gidanaape danda7a asi gidoy lo77o, daro katamata olidi oykanaape bana haaroy aadhees.
PRO 16:33 Asi saama yeggees; shin wursetha zaaroy Godaape bentees.
PRO 17:1 Ooshshi de7iya bessan de7iya gita gibiraape saroynne wopi de7iya bessan uytha poqoy lo77o.
PRO 17:2 Cinca aylley pathonna ba godaa na7aa haarees; iya ishatara issife laata shaaketees.
PRO 17:3 Worqinne biri taman paaceteysada; Goday asa wozana paacees.
PRO 17:4 Iita asi iita haasaya si7ees; wordanchoy wordo haasaya hayzees.
PRO 17:5 Manqota bolla qelqisiya asi enta medhida Xoossaa cayees; hara asi gakiya meton ufaytiya asi seerettonna attenna.
PRO 17:6 Na7a na7i cima asas kallacha; aawati banta naytas boncho.
PRO 17:7 Lo77o odi eeya asas giigenna; hessadaka wordo odi ayseysas giigenna.
PRO 17:8 Wodhaafe immeysas wodhaafey bita mela; I biya bessa ubbay iyaw injetees.
PRO 17:9 Qoho genthiya uray siiqo koyees; shin oda zaaridi zaaridi woociya uray, ammanetiya laggeta shaakees.
PRO 17:10 Eeyay xeetu toho lisson shocin ereysafe; akeeki de7iya asas coo hanqoy era immees.
PRO 17:11 Iita asi ubba wode geella; qadhey bayna asi iya bolla kiitetana.
PRO 17:12 Eeyara iya eeyatethan gahetanaape marati eketida maahera gahetethi lo77o.
PRO 17:13 Lo77o oothidaysas iita kushe zaariya uraa soope iitabay kichenna.
PRO 17:14 Ooshshi doomishe haatha dhawa mentheysa mela; hessa gisho ooshshi doomanaape koyrottada palama agga.
PRO 17:15 Nagaranchuwa xillisoynne xilluwa bolla pirdoy, nam7ayka Goday ixiya ooso.
PRO 17:16 Cincatethi demmanaw amoy bayna de7ishin, eeya kushen de7iya miishey ay iya maaddii?
PRO 17:17 Laggey ubba wodeka lagge; ishi meto wode maaddanaw yeletees.
PRO 17:18 Akeeki bayna asi eronna uraa acuwa qanxanaw waase gidees.
PRO 17:19 Ooshshu dosiya asi nagara dosees; ubba wode ceeqetiya asi ba bolla dhayo xeegees.
PRO 17:20 Wobe qofi de7iya asi lo77oba demmenna; ba inxarsan cimmiya asi meton gelees.
PRO 17:21 Eeyaa na7a yelida aawi azzanees; eeya na7a aawas ufaysi deenna.
PRO 17:22 Ufaytiya wozani asas lo77o dhale; shin meqida wozani asas wolqa dhaysees.
PRO 17:23 Iita asi pirda geellayanaw geeman wodhaafe ekees.
PRO 17:24 Akeeka asi cincatethi ba sinthafe haassenna; shin eeya asa ayfey sa7a gaxa yuuyees.
PRO 17:25 Eaya na7i ba aawa azzanthees; ba aayiwuka camisees.
PRO 17:26 Xillo asi seeroy bessenna; suure asi shocoy lo77o gidenna.
PRO 17:27 Guutha qaala haasaya asi erancho; wopa ayyaani de7iya asi akeekancho.
PRO 17:28 Eeya asi si77i giiko cinca daanees; ba doona dooyonna ixiko erancho daanees.
PRO 18:1 Shaahetethi koyiya asi ba amuwa kaallees; suure qofa ubbaa ixees.
PRO 18:2 Eeya asi ba qofaa xalaala qoncisanaw dosees; hara asape era ekanaw dosenna.
PRO 18:3 Iitatethi yaa wode kadhey yees; kawushatethi yaa wode yeelli yees.
PRO 18:4 Asa doonape keya odi, ciimmo haatha mela; cincatethi goggiya pulto mela.
PRO 18:5 Naaqida uraa maaddidi, xilluwa pirdaa geellayeysi lo77o gidenna.
PRO 18:6 Eeya asa odi ooshshu denthethees; iya doonay wadho xeegees.
PRO 18:7 Eeya asa odi bana qohees; iya oday xihe gididi iya oykees.
PRO 18:8 Zigirsi mal7o katha mela; ufaysishe duge ganje gakees.
PRO 18:9 Azalla asi dhaysiya asape aybaka dummatenna.
PRO 18:10 Godaa sunthay mino gimbe mela; xillo asi yaa woxidi saro attees.
PRO 18:11 Dure asata duretethay gimbetida katama mela; enta qofan enta duretethay mino dirsada enta naagiyaba daanees.
PRO 18:12 Otoroy kundethafe sinthatees; ashketethi boncho ehees.
PRO 18:13 Si7onna de7ishe zaaro imoy, he uraas eeyatethinne yeella.
PRO 18:14 Daana gidi qopiko, iya ayyaanay harge danda7isees; shin ufaysi qanxiko iya maaddey baawa.
PRO 18:15 Akeeka asi eratethi koyees; cinca asa haythi cincatethi si7ees.
PRO 18:16 Imoti immeysas oge dooyees; gita asatara erisees.
PRO 18:17 Daynna sinthan koyro shiiqidi mootiya uray, iya morkey yin, iya oychana gakanaw, ubba wode bana xillo gidi qopees.
PRO 18:18 Saama yegethi palama teqees; nam7u palamiya asata shaakees.
PRO 18:19 Qohetida ishay gimbetida katamape aadhidi minnees; iya palamay birata gorde mela.
PRO 18:20 Asi ba doona odan ba ulo kunthees; ba inxarsaa ayfen kallees.
PRO 18:21 Hayqoynne de7oy inxarsana; neeni ne inxarsaa ayfiya maana.
PRO 18:22 Macho demmiday lo77oba demmis; i, Godaape teema demmees.
PRO 18:23 Manqo asi aaddashidi odetees; shin dure asi otoron zaarees.
PRO 18:24 Daro laggey de7iya asi ba bolla meto ehees; shin ishape aadhidi matatiya laggey de7ees.
PRO 19:1 Ba doonan wordotiya eeya asape ba de7uwan borey bayna manqoy lo77o.
PRO 19:2 Eri bayna dafetethi lo77o gidenna; eeso daroy oge balethees.
PRO 19:3 Asi ba eeyatethan ba de7uwa iissees; yaatidi Godaa bolla yilotees.
PRO 19:4 Duretethi daro lagge shiishees; shin manqotethi de7iya laggeta duuthees.
PRO 19:5 Wordo marki seerettonna attenna; wordo odetey kessi ekenna.
PRO 19:6 Daro asay shuuma som7o koyoosona; imota immiya asara asi ubbay dabbotees.
PRO 19:7 Manqo asi hari attoshin iya ishati ixoosona; iya laggeti iyape haakoosona; I enta aaddashinka enti iya koyokona.
PRO 19:8 Cincatethi demmiya asi ba shempuwa dosees; eratethi minthidi oykiya uraas injetees.
PRO 19:9 Wordo marki seerettonna attenna; wordo odetey dhayana.
PRO 19:10 Eeya asas inje de7oy bessenna; aylley halaqata haaroy daro iita.
PRO 19:11 Cincatethi ase danda7a tamaarsees; qoho kadhidi aadhethi bonchisees.
PRO 19:12 Kawa hanqoy gaammo gudetha mela; shin iya nashshoy maata aacisiya aka mela.
PRO 19:13 Eeya na7i ba aawa dhaysees; doonama macha xokiya keetha mela.
PRO 19:14 Asi keethenne shalo aawupe laattees; shin akeeka macho Goday immees.
PRO 19:15 Azallatethi dhisko ehees; ooso oothonna asi koshatees.
PRO 19:16 Kiita naagiya asi ba shempuwa naagees; shin qelli giya asi hayqees.
PRO 19:17 Manqos keehiya asi Godaas tal7ees; Goday he lo77o oosuwa gisho woytees.
PRO 19:18 Simo ufaysi de7ishin ne nayta seera; seeronna ixiko, ne enta dhaysaasa.
PRO 19:19 Elle shenetiya asi ba gatiya ekanaw bessees; neeni iya issi toho ashshiyaba gidiko, hara wodeka ne iya hessada ashshanaysi attenna.
PRO 19:20 Zore si7a; tamaaranaw koya; neeni wursethi gakanaw cinca gidana.
PRO 19:21 Asi darobaa halchees; shin Goday gidabay poletees.
PRO 19:22 Asape koyetey ammanetethi; wordo gidanaape manqo gideysi lo77o.
PRO 19:23 Godaas yashshi de7oko kaalethees; iya yayiya asi kallidi de7ees; iiti iya bochenna.
PRO 19:24 Issi issi asi daro azalla; hari attoshin woxen tushkida uythaa pude baaranaw waayetees.
PRO 19:25 Neeni qelqisiya asi shociko, akeeki pacidaysi cincatethi tamaarana; akeeka asi ne hanqetiko, I eratethi demmana.
PRO 19:26 Ba aawa bonqiya na7ay, ba aayiw yedethiya na7ay, yeellanne kawushatethi ehiya na7a.
PRO 19:27 Ta na7aw, ne zore si7onna ixiko, era ogiyape haakaasa.
PRO 19:28 Wordo marki suure pirda bolla qelqisees; iita asa dooni iitatethi mittees.
PRO 19:29 Qelqisiya asas pirda eeyatas wadho koshshees.
PRO 20:1 Mathoya ushshi eeyanne ooshancho oothees; ushshan baletiya asi cinca gidanaw danda7enna.
PRO 20:2 Kawo hanqoy gaammo gudetha mela; iya yiloyiya asi ba shempuwa bolla pirdees.
PRO 20:3 Palamape haakeysi boncho; shin eeya asi ooyetanaw ellesees.
PRO 20:4 Azalla goshshanchoy wode naagidi goyenna; kathi cakiya wode I woossanaw koyees; shin aybaka demmenna.
PRO 20:5 Asa wozana halchoy ciimmo haatha mela; shin wozanaama asi duuqidi kessees.
PRO 20:6 Daro asati banta lo77otetha odoosona; shin tuma ammanetiya asi demmanay oonee?
PRO 20:7 Xillo asi borey bayna de7o de7ees; iya kaalliya iya nayti anjetidaysata.
PRO 20:8 Kawoy pirdanaw ba araatan uttiya wode, iita ubbaa ba ayfen harqidi kessees.
PRO 20:9 “Ta wozanay geeshshi; tanan nagari baawa” gaanaw danda7iya asi daanesha?
PRO 20:10 Goday wordo mizaanenne gina gidonna maka miishen go7eteyisata ixees.
PRO 20:11 Na7i geeshshinne suure gideysi I oothiya ooson eretees.
PRO 20:12 Si7iya haythinne xeelliya ayfe, Goday medhis.
PRO 20:13 Dhiskon ne wode wursiko ne manqana; minnada oothiko ne kathi kallana.
PRO 20:14 Shammiya asi, “Qohees! Qohees!” yaagees; shin bidaape guye, “Gelan shammas” yaagidi ceeqetees.
PRO 20:15 Worqey kumis; al7o shuchika bentees; shin eri kumida inxarsi ubbaafe aadhida alleeqo.
PRO 20:16 Eronna asas waase geliya uraa ma7uwa qaari ekite; imatha asas waase geliya uraa ma7o oykite.
PRO 20:17 Wordon demmida kathi mal7ees; shin aqidi pee7ishe doonan aceda hanees.
PRO 20:18 Zore ekada ne qofaa qacha; zore ekonna de7ashe ola boopa.
PRO 20:19 Zigiriya asi xuura genthenna; hessa gisho, coo haasaya asape haaka.
PRO 20:20 Ba aawa woyko ba aayiw baaddiya asa, de7o xompey sakana dhuman to7ana.
PRO 20:21 Koyrora eeson shiiqida shaloy wursethan anjetenna.
PRO 20:22 Nena qohida uraa qohada zaarana goopa; Godan ammaneta; I nena ashshana.
PRO 20:23 Goday nam7u qommo mizaane ixees; wordo mizaaney iya ufaysenna.
PRO 20:24 Asay baana ogiya Goday kaalethees; yaatin, asi ba de7on baana ogiya waatidi akeekanaw danda7ii?
PRO 20:25 Eeson, “Haysa taani Xoossas immas” guussinne guyepe qiirotethi asas xihe.
PRO 20:26 Cinca kawoy geellata shaakidi erees; I enta qadhetonna seerees.
PRO 20:27 Asa ayyaani Godaas xompe; iya gaatha asatethaa ubbaa pilgidi xeellees.
PRO 20:28 Siiqoynne ammanetethi kawa naagoosona; iya araatay tuma pirdan minnees.
PRO 20:29 Yalagata bonchoy enta wolqaa; cimata bonchoy enta puulunthaa.
PRO 20:30 Mino seeri iitatethi shoddees; wadhoy iita wozana laammees.
PRO 21:1 Kawo wozani Godaa kushena; iya wozanaa dhawa haathada ba koyida soo zaarees.
PRO 21:2 Asi oothiyaba ubbay iyaw like daanees; shin Goday iya wozanaa qofaa paacees.
PRO 21:3 Yarsho yarshanaape aathidi, xillonne suure ootheysa Goday dosees.
PRO 21:4 Iitati otoroninne ceeqetethan eretoosona; hessi qassi nagara.
PRO 21:5 Mino oothiya asa halchoy dureyees; shin eesotiya ubbay manqees.
PRO 21:6 Wordon dagayida shaloy pentoda dhayees; hessa koyeysati hayqo koyoosona.
PRO 21:7 Iitati suureba oothanaw koyonna gisho, enta geella oosoy enta ekidi bees.
PRO 21:8 Nagaranchoti geella ogen hemetoosona; shin geeshshati suureba oothosona.
PRO 21:9 Doonatiya machira issi keethan daanape kare darmachan duussi lo77o.
PRO 21:10 Iitati iitaba oothanaw amottoosona; banta shoorotas qadhetokona.
PRO 21:11 Qelqisiya asi seeretiya wode wozani bayna uray cincatethi tamaarees; wozanaama uray era demmees.
PRO 21:12 Xillo Xoossay iitata son oosetiyaba ubbaa be7ees; enta shiri yeggidi dhaysees.
PRO 21:13 Manqota waasuwa si7anaape gidi, ba haythaa tucciya uray, ika waassana; I waassin alliya asi dhayana.
PRO 21:14 Geeman immiya imoy hanqo doshisees; qosan immida wodhaafey hanqo irxisees.
PRO 21:15 Suure pirdi pirdetiya wode, xilloti ufaytoosona; shin iita ootheyisata daganthees.
PRO 21:16 Akeeka ogiya haakiya uraa hayqoy naagees.
PRO 21:17 Injetin daana giya uray manqees; woynenne zayte dosiya uray duretenna.
PRO 21:18 Xoossa asata ashshanaw iita asati seeretosona; ammanetona asati suure asata gisho seeretosona.
PRO 21:19 Doonatiyanne yilotiya machira daanape bazzon de7oy lo77o.
PRO 21:20 Wozanaama uraa son mal7o quminne oysi minjettees; shin eeya asi de7iyaba ubbaa midigees.
PRO 21:21 Xillotethinne siiqo koyiya uraa laythay aduqees; he uray xillotethinne boncho demmees.
PRO 21:22 Wozanaama asi wolqaama olanchota katamaa olidi oykees; enti ammanetiya mino miixaa laallees.
PRO 21:23 Ba doonanne ba inxarsaa naagiya asi bana metope naagees.
PRO 21:24 Otoreynne ceeqetey qelqisiya asi; I otorancho gidida gisho asas qopenna.
PRO 21:25 Oothanaw koyonna gisho azalla amoy wodhees.
PRO 21:26 Azalla asi ubba wode darobaa demmanaw amottees; shin xilloy baw ashshona immees.
PRO 21:27 Goday iitata yarshuwa ixees; enti iyaw iita qofan shiishiya yarshuwa aathidi ixees.
PRO 21:28 Wordo marki dhayana; shin tuma marki eqidi daana.
PRO 21:29 Iita asi bessona xaala xaalees; shin suure asi yuushshi qopees.
PRO 21:30 Asi ba cincatethan, akeekaninne zoren Godaara eqetanaw danda7enna.
PRO 21:31 Olas para kooranaw danda7etees; shin xoonoy Godaaba.
PRO 22:1 Lo77o sunthi daro duretethafe aadhees; bonchoy birapenne worqafe aadhees.
PRO 22:2 Durenne manqo Goday medhis; hessan enti nam7ay issino.
PRO 22:3 Cinca asi iita be7idi qosetidi attees; shin akeeki bayna asi meton gelidi qohetees.
PRO 22:4 Ashketethinne Godaa yashshi, duretethi, bonchonne de7o immees.
PRO 22:5 Iitata ogen agunthinne xihey de7ees; shin bana naagiya asi entafe haakees.
PRO 22:6 Na7i waanidi daanaw bessiyako tamaarsa; I cimiya wodeka iyape haakenna.
PRO 22:7 Durey manquwa haarees; tal7e ekiday tal7e immidaysas aylle gidees.
PRO 22:8 Nagara zeriya uray waaye cakees; iya hanqo xam7ay meqana.
PRO 22:9 Ba kathaa manqotas shaakiya gisho keeha asi anjetana.
PRO 22:10 Qelqisiya asi diggiko, palami, ooshshinne cashshi attana.
PRO 22:11 Wozani geeshshi gidida asinne lo77o oda dosiya asi kawora dabbotees.
PRO 22:12 Godaa ayfey eratethi naagees; shin wordanchota qaala shiri yeggees.
PRO 22:13 Azalla asi, “Karen gaammoy de7ees; tana ogen maana” yaagees.
PRO 22:14 Layma maccasa dooni wolqaama olla mela; Goday hanqetidaysati iyan kundoosona.
PRO 22:15 Eeyatethi na7a wozanan de7ees; shin pircoy iyape haassees.
PRO 22:16 Shalo shiishanaw manquwa naaqeynne dure asas imota immiya nam7ay manqana.
PRO 22:17 Ne haytha zaarada cincata qaala si7a; ne wozanaa ta timirtiyako zaara.
PRO 22:18 Enta ne wozanan wothikonne ne doonan enta haasayiko, ne ufaytana.
PRO 22:19 Ne ammanoy Godan gidana mela, taani nena hachi tamaarsayis.
PRO 22:20 Taani new zorenne eratethi kumida hastamu leemisota xaafas.
PRO 22:21 Nena kiittidaysas like zaaro zaarana mela, taani nena tumatethi tamaarsas.
PRO 22:22 Manqotas aybika bayna gisho, enta bonqofa; pirdan enta maata dhaysofa.
PRO 22:23 Goday enta gisho mootetana; enta bonqidaysata I bonqana.
PRO 22:24 Yilotiya uraara laggetopa; elle shenetiya uraara hemetofa.
PRO 22:25 Neeni iya yiluwara meezetiko, guyepe agganaw danda7aka.
PRO 22:26 Asa aco ta qanxana gada waase gidopa.
PRO 22:27 Ne qanxiyaba dhayiko, ne zin7iya hiixay attonna, new de7iyaba ubbay eketana.
PRO 22:28 Ne mayzati tokida beni zawa shoddofa.
PRO 22:29 Ba oosuwan loohida asi be7adii? I coo asatas gidonashin kawotas oothees.
PRO 23:1 Halaqara kathi maanaw uttiya wode, neera de7eysa akeeka.
PRO 23:2 Neeni daro yaramba asi gidiko naageta.
PRO 23:3 I nena paacanaw danda7iya gisho, mal7o kathas yaaretopa.
PRO 23:4 Duretana gada daaburopa; ne qofaa haaranaw cinca gida.
PRO 23:5 Hessa mela duretethi ne xeellishin dhayana; qefe kessidi arganthada salo paallana.
PRO 23:6 Uuze asa kathi moopa; iya mal7o kathay nena amoyopo.
PRO 23:7 Qoodhepe qommon “Ma; uya” gees; shin iya wozanay neera gidenna.
PRO 23:8 Ne mida guutha kathaaka cooyana; ne galatay mela gidana.
PRO 23:9 Ne cincatetha haasaya kadhiya gisho, eeya asas paxaba haasayopa.
PRO 23:10 Beni zawa shoddofa; yi7o nayta zawa sugopa.
PRO 23:11 Enta ashshiya Goday mino gidiya gisho; i, enta gisho neera mootetana.
PRO 23:12 Ne wozanaa zore qaalako, ne haytha timirteko zaara.
PRO 23:13 Na7a seeronna aggofa; ne iya pircon shociko I hayqenna.
PRO 23:14 Ne iya pircon shociko, iya shempuwa hayqope ashshaasa.
PRO 23:15 Ta na7aw, ne wozanay cinca gidiko, ta wozanay ufaytana.
PRO 23:16 Ne inxarsay suureba haasaya wode, ta gaatha asatethay ufaytees.
PRO 23:17 Nagaranchota qanaatopa; shin ubba wode Godaa yayya.
PRO 23:18 Yaatiko new sintha de7oy suurana; ne ufaysay dhayenna.
PRO 23:19 Ta na7aw, si7a; cinca gida; ne wozanaa suure ogiyan naaga.
PRO 23:20 Daro woyne ushshu uyeysataranne asho maanaw yaareteysatara hemetofa.
PRO 23:21 Mathoteysatinne yarambati manqana; dhisko daroy curqa mayzees.
PRO 23:22 Nena yelida ne aaway odiyaba si7a; ne aayiya cimida wode kadhopa.
PRO 23:23 Tumaa, cinca, seeranne akeeka shammafe attishin, bayzopa.
PRO 23:24 Xillo na7a aawi daro ufaytees; wozanaama na7a yelida asi iyan ceeqetees.
PRO 23:25 Ne aawaynne ne aayiya nenan ufayto; nena yelidaara hashshu go.
PRO 23:26 Ta na7aw, ne wozanaa taw imma; ne ayfeti ta ogiya kallo.
PRO 23:27 Layma maccasi ciimmo haatha mela; laggetho maccasi xuntha olla mela.
PRO 23:28 Iya paannoda zugada naagawusu; ammanetona addeta darsawusu.
PRO 23:29 Waasoy oossee? Azzanoy oossee? Ooshshi oossee? Zuuzunthi oossee? Gaasoy bayna madunxethi oossee? Ayfe zo7oy oossee?
PRO 23:30 Woyne ushshu uyishe wode ongeysatasa gidennee? Walahetida woyne ushsha ganxidi be7eysatasa gidennee?
PRO 23:31 Woyne ushshi zo7ida wode, iya malay birille giddon phooliya wode, uyin mal7ishe geliya wode iya xeellofa.
PRO 23:32 Wursethan shooshada I dukees; iita shooshada ba marziya puukees.
PRO 23:33 Ne ayfey be7i eronnabaa be7ana; ne wozanay suure qopanaw danda7enna.
PRO 23:34 Neeni abba giddon zin7ida, markabiya tuussa bolla katida ase daanasa.
PRO 23:35 Neeni, “Enti tana dechidosona; shin ta qohetabike. Enti tana wadhidosona; shin taw eretibeenna. Hara ushshu uyanaw taani awude dendanee?” yaagana.
PRO 24:1 Ta na7aw, iita asata qanaatopa; entara laggetanaw amottofa.
PRO 24:2 Enti ubba wode iitabaa maqetoosona; banta inxarsan gene haasayoosona.
PRO 24:3 Keethi cincatethan keexetees; akeekan minnees.
PRO 24:4 Eri de7iko, qol7i al7obaaninne lo77oban kumees.
PRO 24:5 Cinca asi wolqaama asape aadhees; era asi mino asape lo77o.
PRO 24:6 Olas keyanaape koyro halchanaw koshshees; daro zore zoriya asatan xoonoy bentees.
PRO 24:7 Eeya asi cincatethi akeekanaw danda7enna; shiiqo bessan I odiyabay aybika baawa.
PRO 24:8 Iita oothanaw qopiya asi gene asi geetetees.
PRO 24:9 Eeya asa qofi nagara; qelqisiya asi ixetees.
PRO 24:10 Meto wode ne dol7iko, ne wolqay guutha.
PRO 24:11 Pirdi bayna hayqos beyisata ashsha; shukettanaw biya wode si77i gada xeellofa.
PRO 24:12 Ne, “Ta hessa erike” giiko, wozana eriya i, be7ennee? Ne de7uwa naageysi erennee? Asa ubbaas iya oosuwada oosuwada zaarennee?
PRO 24:13 Ta na7aw, eessi lo77o gidiya gisho, eessi ma; ililo eessi mal7ees.
PRO 24:14 Cincatethika hessada ne shempuwas mal7o gideysa era. Neeni iya demmiyaba gidiko, sinthara yaana keehay nebaa; ne ufaysay dhayenna.
PRO 24:15 Xillo asa keethi bonqanaw naagopa; iya aquwa dhaysanaw dendofa.
PRO 24:16 Xillo asi laapun toho kundikoka dendees; shin iitati gadon dhayana.
PRO 24:17 Ne morkey kundiya wode ufaytofa; I dhubetiya wode hashshu goopa.
PRO 24:18 Goday hessa be7idi ufaytenna; iya hanqetonna aggaagana.
PRO 24:19 Iita ootheyisata gaason hirgofa; enta mela gidarkina gada qopofa.
PRO 24:20 Iita asas sinthara yaana keehi baawa; iitata xompey to7ana.
PRO 24:21 Ta na7aw, Godaanne kawa yayya; enta bolla makalleysatara hemetofa.
PRO 24:22 Hessa mela asata qoponna metoy gakees; kawuwapenne Godaape yaana meto oone erey?
PRO 24:23 Cincati gujidi haysada yaagidosona; Som7o be7idi pirdoy lo77o gidenna.
PRO 24:24 Qohidaysa lo77o oothadasa giya daynna, asi baaddana; kawotethati iya ixana.
PRO 24:25 Qohidaysa ne bala giya daynnati lo77oba ekana daro anjo demmana.
PRO 24:26 Tuma zaaro zaariya asi, tuma lagge mela.
PRO 24:27 Kasetada ne gadiya goya; kathi zera; hessafe guye, ne keethaa keexa.
PRO 24:28 Ne shooruwa bolla gaasoy bayna markatofa; ne doonan cimmofa.
PRO 24:29 “I taw oothidaysada ta iyaw oothana; ta iyaw kushe zaarana” yaagopa.
PRO 24:30 Taani booza asa goshshara aadhas; azalla addiya woyne gadera kanthas.
PRO 24:31 Agunthinne sharaafi goozi wothis; yuushon de7iya dirsayka laaletis.
PRO 24:32 Taani iya be7ida wode qopas; iyape timirte ekas.
PRO 24:33 Neeni guuthu liipha; guuthu dhiska; ne kushiya shiishada guuthu shempa.
PRO 24:34 Shin manqotethi paannoda yaana; duussa waayey ola miishe oykida asada puttu gaana.
PRO 25:1 Haysati Yihuda kawa Hizqiyaasa asati duuqidi xaafida Solomone leemisota.
PRO 25:2 Xuura genthoy Xoossas boncho; xuura pilgidi kesoy kawotas boncho.
PRO 25:3 Saloy dhoqu gidaysadanne sa7i ziqa gididaysada kawota qofaa asi eranaw danda7enna.
PRO 25:4 Birape qita digga; hessafe guye, hiillanchoy loythana.
PRO 25:5 Kawo sinthafe iita asata digga; iya araatay xillotethan minnidi eqana.
PRO 25:6 Kawo sinthan eqiya wode ceeqetofa; gita asata giddon new besse koyopa.
PRO 25:7 Neepe gitatiya asas besse immanaw halaqay nena denthin, kawuyeysafe, I nena, “Ha dhoqa bessan utta” geysi lo77o.
PRO 25:8 Ne ayfen be7idaba markatanaw daynna sinthe baanaw ellesopa. Ne markata simmin hara asi ne markatethay bala gideysa qoncisiko, ne yeellatana.
PRO 25:9 Ne giddoninne ne shooruwa giddon palami medhetiko, iyara odetada ne palama wursa; hara asa xuura qoncisopa.
PRO 25:10 Hessi hanonna ixiko ne odeysa si7ida asi nena kawushana; ne sunthay zaaridi simmonnaada iitana.
PRO 25:11 Bessiya wode odetida like qaali, bira miishe bolla tigetida worqa alleeqo mela.
PRO 25:12 Era asi zoriya zore si7iya haythas, hessi worqafe woyko geeshsha worqafe oosetida alleeqo mela.
PRO 25:13 Katha cakiya wode irxa haathi uyin aleysada, ammanthiya kiitanchoy bana kiittoysa ufaysees.
PRO 25:14 Immonnaba immana gidi ceeqetiya asi iri bayna shaaranne carko mela.
PRO 25:15 Danda7a asi halaqa odidi mayzees; liiqo qaali meqethi kanthi gelees.
PRO 25:16 Eessi demmiko kallana gakanaw ma; shin darsiko nena cooshshana.
PRO 25:17 Nena uufishe ixonnaada, ne shooruwa soo ubba wode boopa.
PRO 25:18 Ba shooruwa bolla wordon markatiya asi, xam7i, mashshinne toori qoheysada qohees.
PRO 25:19 Meto wode ammanetona asan zempoy, qaaxiya achan coommiyanne silida tohon hemeteysa mela.
PRO 25:20 Azzanida asas yethi yexiya asi, meego wode ma7o qaariyanne maduntha bolla caalaba tigiya asa mela.
PRO 25:21 Ne morkey koshatiko muza; saamotiko ushsha.
PRO 25:22 Ne hessa oothiko iya huuphen tama bonqo kaashidi qoleysa mela; Goday nena woytana.
PRO 25:23 Doloha bagga carkoy ira eheysada, zigirsi hanqo ehees.
PRO 25:24 Doonatiya machira issi keethan daanape kare barandan duussi lo77o.
PRO 25:25 Daaburida asi irxa haathi uyidi aleysada, haaho biittafe yaa lo77o odi ufaysees.
PRO 25:26 Iita asa sinthan gulbatiya xillo asi, buullotida pultonne iitida olla haatha mela.
PRO 25:27 Daro eessi muussi lo77o gidenna; hessadaka, ba boncho koshshi bonchisenna.
PRO 25:28 Bana haaronna asi dirsi laaletida katama mela.
PRO 26:1 Bone shachi, kathi cakiya wode iri koshshonaysada, eeyas boncho koshshenna.
PRO 26:2 Kafoti yaanne haanne piradhishe ase qohonnaysada, gaasoy bayna baaddiya baadethi ase gakenna.
PRO 26:3 Paras lisso, hares bixaala koshsheysada eeya zokos xam7a koshshees.
PRO 26:4 Eeya asas iya eeyatethaada zaaropa; zaariko ne iya mela gidana.
PRO 26:5 Eeya asas iya eeyatetha qoncisada zaara; hessi hanonna ixiko I bana cinca gidi qopana.
PRO 26:6 Eeya asa bolla kiita yedoy, ba toho qanxi yeggeysa mela woyko wodhiyaba uyeysa mela.
PRO 26:7 Eeya asa leemisoy, silida toho mela maaddenna.
PRO 26:8 Eeya asas boncho imoy, shuchu yambarshan qachi wothidi yambaranaw paaciya asa mela.
PRO 26:9 Eeya asa leemisoy mathotida asi ba kushe caddida agunthu kessanaw baaxeteysa mela.
PRO 26:10 Eeya asa woyko ba oge biya asi une oosisanaw qaxariya asi ba toora shaaran xongiya asa mela.
PRO 26:11 Kani ba cooshshako guye simmidi laaceysada, eeya asi ba eeyatetha zaari zaari qoncisees.
PRO 26:12 Bana cinca oothidi xeelliya asape eeya asas lo77o qaadi de7ees.
PRO 26:13 “Azalla asi ogen gaammoy de7ees; yashshiya gaammoy ogen yuuyees” yaagees.
PRO 26:14 Sanqi maxaafe bolla yaanne haanne qaaxeysada, azalla asi ba hiixan yaanne haanne shiretees.
PRO 26:15 Issi issi azalla asi hari attoshin, woxen tushidi baaranaw waayetees.
PRO 26:16 Azalla asi markara odiya laapun cincatape bana aadhida cinca gidi qopees.
PRO 26:17 Bana gathiyabay baynaban palamiya asi ogera biya kana haythi oykiya asa mela.
PRO 26:18 Ba shooruwa, “Taani kaasse gayis” yaagidi cimmiya asi, gooyidi bonqo tama holiya, woyko wodhiya donge toora dukiya asa mela.
PRO 26:20 Mithi wuriko tami to7ees; zigirsi dhayiko ooshshi attees.
PRO 26:21 Xiifi bonqo darseysadanne mithi tama darseysada palama darsiya asi ooshshu darsees.
PRO 26:22 Zigirsa qaali mal7o katha mela ufaysishe duge ganje bees.
PRO 26:23 Wozanan iitabay de7ishin, ba inxarsan cimo qaala haasaya asi biran lanxetida urqa miishe mela.
PRO 26:24 Gene asi ba wozanan de7iya iitatethaa ba inxarsan genthees.
PRO 26:25 Iya wozanan laapun tunati kumida gisho, I lo77o qaala haasaykoka iya ammanopa.
PRO 26:26 Ba morketetha I genthikoka, I oothiya iitay dabaaban qoncana.
PRO 26:27 Haratas olla bookiya asi he ollan baw kundana; harata bolla shuchu gondorsiya asa bolla he shuchay simmidi gondoretana.
PRO 26:28 Wordotiya inxarsi ba qohida asata ixees; cimo odi kundethi kaalethees.
PRO 27:1 Wontoy ehanaba ne eronna gisho wontoban ceeqetofa.
PRO 27:2 Hara asi nena galatope attishin neeni nena galatopa; asi ne gisho markatofe attishin, neeni ne keehatethabaa odopa.
PRO 27:3 Shuchi gita tooho; shafey deexo; shin eeya asi medhiya ooshshi nam7aafeka deexees.
PRO 27:4 Hanqos qadhey baawa; yiloy dhaysiya di7o mela; shin qanaatey ubbaafe iita.
PRO 27:5 Geemmida siiqope baliya wode qoncen hanqetethi lo77o.
PRO 27:6 Morkey nena tammu toho yeeranaape siiqoy nena madunxiseysi lo77o.
PRO 27:7 Kallida asi ililo eessi shaattees; shin koshatida uraa cammiyabay mal7ees.
PRO 27:8 Ba soo aggidi yuuyiya asi, ba keethaa aggada paalliya kafo mela.
PRO 27:9 Shittoynne sawiya ixaaney ase ufayseysada siiqo lagge zorey hessada ufaysees.
PRO 27:10 Ne laggetanne ne aawa laggeta aggofa; ne metootida wode ne ishaa soo boopa; haahon de7iya ishape matan de7iya shooroy lo77o.
PRO 27:11 Ta na7aw, cinca gida; tana ufaysa; tana kadhiya asaas ta zaaro immana.
PRO 27:12 Cinca asi metoy yaa wode be7idi qosetees; shin akeeki bayna asi bidi meton gelees; yaatidi guyepe qiirotees.
PRO 27:13 Eronna asas waase geliya uraa ma7uwa qaari ekite; imatha asas waase gelida uraa ma7uwa oykite.
PRO 27:14 Wonta guura ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, ba shooruwa sarotey iya baaddiya asa mela.
PRO 27:15 Doonatiya machanne aathiya keethi issino.
PRO 27:16 Carko teqanaw, zayte kuucidi oykanaw danda7etonaysada, iyo si77i oothanaw danda7etenna.
PRO 27:17 Birati birata posheysada, asi issoy issuwafe tamaarees.
PRO 27:18 Balase mithi loythidi naagiya asi iya ayfe maana; ba halaqaa kaaboya oosanchoy bonchetana.
PRO 27:19 Haathi mastooteda som7o besseysada, asa wozani iya oonatetha bessees.
PRO 27:20 Hayqoynne Duufoy kalli eronnaysada, asa ayfey kallidi erenna.
PRO 27:21 Birinne worqey taman paacetidi geeyeysada, asi ba ekiya galatan paacetees.
PRO 27:22 Kathi udulan caddeysada, eeya asi udulan caddiyakoka iyape eeyatethay kichenna.
PRO 27:23 Ne dorsata hanota loythada era; ne wudiyaka akeekada heemma.
PRO 27:24 Ayis giiko, duretethi merinaw deenna; kallachika yeletethafe yeletethaas aadhenna.
PRO 27:25 Mela maatay buucetin, aaca maati keya wode, deriya bolla de7iya maatay shiiqidaape guye,
PRO 27:26 dorsata ikisepe ne new ma7o kessana; deeshata bayzada gade shammana.
PRO 27:27 Attida deeshata maathay new, ne soo asaasinne ne macca aylletas kathi gidana.
PRO 28:1 Iitati oonika yedethonna baqatoosona; shin xilloti gaammo mela yayyonna de7oosona.
PRO 28:2 Issi kawotethay makalliko, haareysati daroosona; shin kaaletheysi cincanne akeekancho gidiko, sarotethinne wopi de7ees.
PRO 28:3 Manqota un7ethiya kawoy kathi dhaysiya wolqaama ira mela.
PRO 28:4 Higge bonchona asi iita asaa sabbees; shin higge bonchiya asi iita asaa ixees.
PRO 28:5 Iita asatas suure pirdi gelenna; shin Godaa goyinniya asi ubbaa akeekes.
PRO 28:6 Dure gididi cimmiya asi gidanaape, suure asi gididi manqo gideysi lo77o.
PRO 28:7 Higge naagiya na7ay akeeka na7a; shin pathonna asara hemetey ba aawa yeellayees.
PRO 28:8 Mishe yelon tal7eynne ase bonqidi duretiya asi he aquwa manqotas keehiya asas shiishees.
PRO 28:9 Higge si7anaape gidi ba haytha tucciya, uraa woosay Godaa sinthan ixetidaba.
PRO 28:10 Suureta iita ogen kaalethiya uray ba bookida ollan kundana; shin geeshshati lo77oba laattana.
PRO 28:11 Dure asi bana cinca gidi qopees; shin akeeki de7iya manqoy iya paacees.
PRO 28:12 Xilloti xooniya wode asa ubbay ufaytees; shin iitati maata oykiya wode asay qosetees.
PRO 28:13 Ba nagaraa genthiya asi aacenna; shin paaxeynne nagara aggey maarota ekana.
PRO 28:14 Godaa ubba wode yayiya asi anjetidaysa; shin ba wozana minthiya asi meton gelana.
PRO 28:15 Manqo asaa haariya iita halaqay, gudiya gaammonne koshatida babantha mela.
PRO 28:16 Akeeki bayna kawoy ba deriya qohees; shin ase qohonna halaqi daro laythi haarana.
PRO 28:17 Ase wodhiya asi hayqana gakanaw baqatishe de7ees; iya oonika maaddenna.
PRO 28:18 Borey bayna hemetiya asi qohetenna; shin geella asi akeekona kundana.
PRO 28:19 Minnidi oothiya asi kathi kallees; shin pathonna amo kaalliya asi manqotethi laattana.
PRO 28:20 Ammanetiya uray daro anjetana; shin duretanaw woxiya asi meto be7ana.
PRO 28:21 Som7o be7idi pirdoy lo77o gidenna; shin asi baso uytha gisho gidi qohees.
PRO 28:22 Yaare asi duretanaw baqetees; manqotethi akeekona oykanaysa erenna.
PRO 28:23 Ase coo sabbiya asape hanqetiya asi guyepe galatetees.
PRO 28:24 Ba aawanne ba aayiw kaysotidi, “Nagara oothabike” giya asinne demmidaba dhaysiya asi issino.
PRO 28:25 Uuze asi ooshshi denthees; shin Godan ammanetiya asi kallees.
PRO 28:26 Banan ammanetiya asi eeya; shin cincatethan hemetiya asi saro de7ees.
PRO 28:27 Manqos immiya asi metootenna; shin enta be7anaape gidi qilim7ey baadetana.
PRO 28:28 Iita asati shuumetiya wode asay qosetees; shin enti dhayiya wode xilloti daroosona.
PRO 29:1 Daro wode seeretidi simmonna asi hassayonna meqana; he uraas paxoy baawa.
PRO 29:2 Xillo asati shuumetiya wode asay ufaytees; shin iitati biitta haariya wode asay un7etees.
PRO 29:3 Cincatethi dosiya asi ba aawa ufaysees; shin layma maccasa heeran yuuyiya asi ba miishiya wursees.
PRO 29:4 Tuma pirdan kawoy ba kawotethaa wopu oothees; shin wodhaafe ekiya kawoy ba kawotethaa dhaysees.
PRO 29:5 Ba shooruwa cimon sabbiya asi, ba tohos xihe yeggees.
PRO 29:6 Iita asi ba nagaran oyketees; shin xillo asi ufaytees; yexees.
PRO 29:7 Xillo asi manqotas suure pirdees; shin iita asati hessa erokona.
PRO 29:8 Cayiya asati kataman ooshshu denthoosona; shin cinca asati hanqo irxisoosona.
PRO 29:9 Cinca asi eeya asa pirda keethi efiko, eeyay hanqetees; qidhees; iyaw saroy baawa.
PRO 29:10 Suuthu gussanaw saamotiya asati suure asi ixoosona; xillo asaa wodhanaw koyoosona.
PRO 29:11 Eeya asi ba hanquwa yeddi bessees; shin cinca asi bana haarees.
PRO 29:12 Shuumay wordo oda si7iyaba gidiko, iya moorinnati ubbay iita gidoosona.
PRO 29:13 Manqoynne ase naaqiya asi issiba koxoosona; enta nam7aas ayfe immiday Godaa.
PRO 29:14 Kawoy manqotas suure pirdiko, I ba araatan gam7ana.
PRO 29:15 Pircon seeri naytas cincatethi immees; shin yedan diccida na7i ba aayiw kawushshees.
PRO 29:16 Iita asati dariya wode nagari darees; shin xilloti enta kundethaa be7ana.
PRO 29:17 Ne na7aa seera; I new saro immana; I nena ufaysana.
PRO 29:18 Qoncethi bayna ixiko derey yeda gidees; shin higge naagiya asi anjetidaysa.
PRO 29:19 Aylley coo oda xalaalan seeretenna; iyaw geliyakoka I kiitetenna.
PRO 29:20 Eeson haasaya asi be7a eray? Iyape eeya asas ufaysi de7ees.
PRO 29:21 Ne aylliya na7a yeda dichiko, iya wursethay azzano gidana.
PRO 29:22 Hanqetiya asi ooshshu denthethees; elle yilotiya asi daro nagara oothees.
PRO 29:23 Otoroy ase kawushshees; shin ashke ayyaani de7iya asi bonchetees.
PRO 29:24 Kaysora laggetiya asi bana ixiya asi; I dabaaban tuma odiko seeretees; I tumaa odonna ixiko Godan baadetana.
PRO 29:25 Asas yashshi he uraas xihe gidees; shin Godan ammanetiya asi saro de7ees.
PRO 29:26 Daroti maati de7iya asape made koyoosona; shin suure pirdi Godaape bentees.
PRO 29:27 Xilloti nagaranchota shaatettoosona; iitati suure asaa ixoosona.
PRO 30:1 Yaaqe na7aa Agura leemisoti haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysata. Aguri Iti7eelasinne Ukaalas haysa haasayis.
PRO 30:2 Taani asa ubbaafe aadhida eeya; asas de7iya akeeki taw deenna.
PRO 30:3 Taani cincatethi tamaarabike; Geeshsha Xoossabaaka erike.
PRO 30:4 Salo pude keyidi duge wodhiday oonee? Carko ba kushen oykiday, haathe ba afilan yiiciday, sa7aa gaxaa minthidi essiday oonee? Iya sunthay oonee? Iya na7aa sunthay oonee? Iya eriya gidiko ane taw oda?
PRO 30:5 Xoossa qaalan borey baawa; ubbay tuma iyan ammanetiya ubbaas I gondalle.
PRO 30:6 Iya qaala bolla aybaka gujofa; gujiko I nena seerana; ne wordancho gideysa I qoncisana.
PRO 30:7 Godaw, ta nena nam7ubba oychayis; ta hayqana gakanaw enta tana diggofa.
PRO 30:8 Ta ase cimmonna melanne wordo haasayonna mela tana naaga; taw koshshiya kathi immafe attishin, tana dure woyko manqo oothofa.
PRO 30:9 Dure gidada, “Goday oonee?” gada nena kaddana; manqo gidada, kaysada ta Xoossaa sunthaa cayisana.
PRO 30:10 Nena baaddonna melanne iya baadethay new gome gidonna mela, aylliya iya godaara zigropa.
PRO 30:11 Ba aawa baaddiyanne ba aayiw anjona yeletethi de7ees.
PRO 30:12 Daro tuna gidi uttidi bantana geeshshi oothiya asati de7oosona.
PRO 30:13 Otoron kumida asatinne ase kadhidi xeelliya asati de7oosona.
PRO 30:14 Enta achay mashshe gidin, enta gaccoy toora gidin, manqotanne metootanchota naaqidi, entaba bonqiya asati de7oosona.
PRO 30:15 Ullathas nam7u macca nayti de7oosona; enti, “Hamma! Hamma!” yaagidi waassoosona. Kallidi eronna heedzubati de7oosona; oyddanthoy qassi “Gidana” gidi erenna.
PRO 30:16 Hessati, duufo, maynnida maccas, haathe kallidi eronna mela biittanne, “Gidana!” gidi eronna tama.
PRO 30:17 Ba aawa leqiya na7aa ayfiya, ba aayiya cimin kadhiya na7aa ayfiya, zangaaran de7iya quuroti woocana; iya ashuwa ankoti maana.
PRO 30:18 Tana heedzubati malaalsoosona; oyddanthoy ubba taw gelenna.
PRO 30:19 Hessati, salora paalliya arganthi, zaalla bollara kolxiya shooshi abba bollara biya markabenne geela7ora shiiqo oyketida adde.
PRO 30:20 Layma maccasi haniya hanoyka hessa mela; Iya masu; shin ba doona quchada, “Taani aykoka balabiike” yaagawusu.
PRO 30:21 Heedzuban biitti qaaxees; oyddanthuwa ubba tookanaw danda7etenna.
PRO 30:22 Hessatika, aylley kawotida wode, eeya asi kathi kallida wode,
PRO 30:23 asi ixida maccasi azina gelida wodenne macca aylliya ba godatiw laattida wode medhetiya hanota.
PRO 30:24 Sa7a bolla oyddu guutha medhetethati de7oosona; shin enti aadhida cinca.
PRO 30:25 Hessatika, Cuncalley wolqi bayna medhetethi; shin bantaw miyaba bone shiishidi, minjoosona.
PRO 30:26 Gupaleti wolqi baynayisata; shin banta keetha zaalla qophon keexoosona.
PRO 30:27 Booletas kawoy baawa; shin enti ubbay maaran zattoosona.
PRO 30:28 Zareti kushen oyketoosona; shin kawo gadhon de7oosona.
PRO 30:29 Banta maata bessishe hemetiya heedzu medhetethati de7oosona; oyddanthoy lo77o hemethi hemetees.
PRO 30:30 Hessika, do7a ubbaafe minonne yashshi eronna gaammo.
PRO 30:31 Macca kuttota giddon hemetiya adde kutto, wude kaalethiya deesha kole; ba olanchota giddon qoncen eqiya kawa.
PRO 30:32 Neeni eeyada otortidaba gidikoka, iita oothanaw halchidaba gidiko, ane taki gada qopa.
PRO 30:33 Maathi bukey oysu kesseysada, siidhe dichin suuthi yeysada, hanqo denthethoy ooshshu ehees.
PRO 31:1 Haysafe kaallidi xaafetida leemisoy, kawa Limu7eela aayiya kawa Limu7eela tamaarsidaysa.
PRO 31:2 Ta na7aw, ta ulope wodhidayso, taani qangetada yelidayso,
PRO 31:3 maccasan ne wolqaa wursofa; kawota dhaysiya maccasatan ne minotethaa dhaysofa.
PRO 31:4 “Limu7eela, woyne ushshi kawotas bessenna; mathoyiya ushshi shuumatas bessenna.
PRO 31:5 Enti uyaa wode higge baloosona; naaqetida asaa maata qelli goosona.
PRO 31:6 Mathoyaa ushshu hayqana haniya uraasinne sa7i iitida uraas immite.
PRO 31:7 Enti banta manqotethaanne banta waayiya doganaw uyo.
PRO 31:8 Banta gisho odetanaw danda7onna asaa gisho ne odeeta; maaddiya asi baynayisata gisho ne eqa.
PRO 31:9 Enta miyen eqada entaw suure pirda; manqotanne metootanchota maata naaga” yaagada tamaarsasu.
PRO 31:10 “Wozanaama macho ooni demmanaw danda7ii? I gatey zo7o al7o shuchafe aadhees.
PRO 31:11 I azinay iyo ammanetees; iyaw koshshiyabaape aybika pacenna.
PRO 31:12 Iya ba de7o laytha ubban, iyaw lo77obaape attishin, iitaba oothuku.
PRO 31:13 Suufenne liino koyada, ufaytashe ba kushen oothawusu.
PRO 31:14 Iya zal7anchota markabe mela; ba kathaa haaho biittafe shiishawusu.
PRO 31:15 Iya ba soo asaas kathi giigisanawunne ba macca aylletas ooso immanaw, sa7i wontonna de7ishin dendawusu.
PRO 31:16 Lo77o gade koyada shammawusu; ba kushen oothada demmida miishen woyne tokawusu.
PRO 31:17 Iya ba xeessa minthada dancawusu; ba qesiya oosos minthawusu.
PRO 31:18 Iya wodhe demmanaw minnada zal7awusu; iya oothashe qamisiya gisho I xompey to7enna.
PRO 31:19 Iya ba hindziritiya oykawusu; ba biradhen loythada suqawusu.
PRO 31:20 Iya manqotasinne metootanchotas immawusu.
PRO 31:21 I soo asa ubbay ho77iya ma7o ma7iya gisho, shachi bukikoka iya hirguku.
PRO 31:22 Alga bolla hiixiya ma7o sikawusu; liinope oosetida ocha teera daaniya ma7o ma7awusu.
PRO 31:23 Biitta cimati shiiqiya dubbushan I azinay bonchetida asi.
PRO 31:24 Liinope ma7onne danco oothada, zal7anchotas bayzawusu.
PRO 31:25 Iya minonne boncho asi; yaana laytha ubban ufaytada de7awusu.
PRO 31:26 Cincatethan ba doona dooyawusu; ammanthiya zorey I inxarsan de7ees.
PRO 31:27 Iya ba soo asaa de7uwa injeyanaw ubba wode oothawusu; azallatethi I bolla bentidi erenna.
PRO 31:28 I nayti dendidi, iyo nashshoosona; I azinay iyo yaagidi galatees;
PRO 31:29 Lo77oba oothiya daro maccasati de7oosona; shin ne enta ubbaafe aadhasa” yaagees.
PRO 31:30 Mali cimmees; yegelssatethi dhayana. Shin Godaa yayiya maccasiya, iya anjetidaaro.
PRO 31:31 Iya oothidaba ubbaas iyo woytite; I ooso ubbay dabaaban iyo galatiso.
ECC 1:1 Haysi, Dawita na7aa, Yerusalaamen kawotida cinca uraa qaala.
ECC 1:2 He cincay, “Ubbabay hada; ubbabay hadape hada; ubbabay kumethi hada” yaagis.
ECC 1:3 Ba de7iya bessan ubban, asi daaburidi oothiyaba ubban iyaw wodhey aybee?
ECC 1:4 Issi yeletethi aadhiya wode, hara yeletethi bessaa oykees. Shin ha biittay merinawuka laametonna de7ees.
ECC 1:5 Awi dolees wullees; nam7antho dolanaw yaa doliya bessaa ellesees.
ECC 1:6 Carkoy issi toho duge issi toho pude carkees; qassi yuuyi yuuyi aadhidi, simeretidi yees.
ECC 1:7 Goggiya haathi ubbay abban gelees; shin abbay kumi erenna. He haathay simmidi gogganaw, guye ba pultiya bessaa bees.
ECC 1:8 Ubbabay salethiyaba; I ay mela salethiyako odi wursanaw danda7etenna. Ayfey xeellidi kalli erenna; haythi si7idi, taw gidis geenna.
ECC 1:9 Kase hanidabay wontoka simmidi I hanana; qassi ha77i hanishe de7eysi kase hanidaba. Hessa gisho, salo gufanthon oorathabay aybika baawa.
ECC 1:10 Oonika, “Heko, haysi oorathaba” giiko, hessi oorathi gidenna; hessi nuuni yeletanaape kase hanidaba.
ECC 1:11 Kase aadhida wodetan hanidabata zaaridi hassayabay baawa; guyepe hananabata entafe guye oonika hassayenna.
ECC 1:12 Taani cincay, Yerusalaamen Isra7eeles kawo gidada de7as.
ECC 1:13 Taani sa7an de7iyaba ubbaa shaakada eranawunne cincatethan pilgada xeellanaw qofa qachas. Yaatada asa ubbaas Xoossay immida de7oy daro daabursiyabaanne ufaysonnaba gideysa akeekas.
ECC 1:14 Salope garsan hanidaba ubbaa taani be7as; shin ubbayka hada; carko oykanaw yedetheysa mela.
ECC 1:15 Geelli suuranaw danda7enna; baynaba taybanaw danda7etenna.
ECC 1:16 Taani ta wozanan haysada yaagada qopas; “Taape kase Yerusalaame haarida ubbatape taani gitanne cinca gidas. Cincatethinne era guussi I aybeko paacada eras” yaagas.
ECC 1:17 Taani cincatethafe, gooshshatethafenne eeyatethafe giddon de7iya dummatethi aybeko eranaw daro daaburas. Shin wursethan hessika carko oykanaw yedetheysa mela hada gideysa eras.
ECC 1:18 Cincatethi dariya wode azzanthiyabay darees; eri dariya wode qassi metoy darees.
ECC 2:1 Taani taako, “Haaya, ta nena ufaysi aybeko erisanaw lo7oba bessaana” yaagas; shin hessika hada.
ECC 2:2 Miichi eeyatethi gideysa, qassi miikoynne ufaysi aykoka go77onnaysa akeekas.
ECC 2:3 Ha7ika ta wozanay cincatethan tana kaalethishin, tana woyne ushshan ufaysanaw, eeyaka gidanaw paacas. Asi ba qantha woden salope garsan de7iyaba bolla ay oothiko go77aneko eranaw koyas.
ECC 2:4 Issi gitaba oothas; ta daana keethata keexas; woyne tokas.
ECC 2:5 Dumma dumma atakiltiyanne ayfe ayfiya mithata tokas; asi shempiya bessaa giigisas. He bessan dumma dumma ayfe ayfiya mithata tokas.
ECC 2:6 He mithata ushshanaw, haathe dagaaya bessi zeerada giigisas.
ECC 2:7 Addenne macca aylleta shammas; qassi ta son yeletida hara aylletika taw de7oosona. Taape kase Yerusalaamen de7ida asaape aadhiya mehe, deeshenne dorse haaras.
ECC 2:8 Ta haariya dumma dumma biittatapenne kawotape bonchetida buqura ehisada, daro worqanne bira taw dagayaas. Qassi, tana sabbidi yexiya addenne macca shiishas; hessa bolla, asas ufaysi immiya daro maccasata shiishas.
ECC 2:9 Taani kase Yerusalaamen de7ida oodefeka aadhada gita asi gidas. Ta cincatethayka taara wursethi gakanaw de7is.
ECC 2:10 Ta ayfey xeellidabaanne ta wozanay amotidaba ubbaa demmas; ta asatethay koyiya ufaysi ubbaa diggabike. Taani oothida ooso ubban ufaytas; ta daabura wodhey hessa.
ECC 2:11 Gidoshin, hessa ubbaa ootha simmada taani akeekiya wode, daro taani iyaw daaburida ubbay hada gideysa be7as. Salope garsan go77iyabay aykoy baawa; ubbay carko oykanaw yedethiya mela.
ECC 2:12 Hessafe guye, taani cincatethi, eeyatethinne gooshshatethi ayibeko paacada eranaw qofaa doomas. Awude gidinka kawoy oothanaw danda7ey iyape kase kawotida kawoy oothidaysafe harabay aybi de7ii?
ECC 2:13 Poo7oy dhumape, cincatethi eeyatethafe lo77o gideysa taani be7as.
ECC 2:14 Cinca asa ayfeti iya huuphiya giddon de7oosona; shin eeyati dhuman hemetoosona. Gidoshin, enta nam7aa wursethay issino gideysa akeekas.
ECC 2:15 Taani taako, “Eeya gakeya qaaday tanaka gakees; yaatin, taani cinca gideysi tana ay maaddii?” yaagada qopas. Qassi taani ta wozanan, “Haysika hada” yaagas.
ECC 2:16 Eeya gidin cinca, hayqope guye, iya hassayey baawa; sinthafe yaa laythan nuuni ubbay dogetidi attana. Eeyay hayqeysada, cincayka hayqees.
ECC 2:17 Metope attishin, go77iyabay bayna gisho, ha de7oy tana shaattis. Hessika hada; carko oykanaw yedethiya mela.
ECC 2:18 Salope garsan taani daro daaburada demmida ta shaluwa ubbaa taape guyera yaa uraas aggada biya gisho, taani daaburida ubbay tana shaattis.
