ECC 2:19 Taape guyera yaa addey cinceko eeyeko ooni erii? Shin I oona gidinka, taani daro daaburidabaanne ta cincatethan demmidaba ubbaa baw ekidi, godaa gidana; hessika hada.
ECC 2:20 Hessa gisho, salope garsan ta daaburidaba bolla ta wozanay ufaysi qanxis.
ECC 2:21 Asi ba de7ida laythan baw de7ida cincatethan, eraninne hiillan daaburidi demmidaba ubbaa aykoka daaburonaysas yeggidi bees. Hessika hadanne gita qoho.
ECC 2:22 Yaatin, salope garsan asi daro daaburidi oothidaba ubbaafe ay go77a demmii?
ECC 2:23 I ba de7o laythan daaburiya daaburi ubbay azzanopenne muudethafe attishin, hari aybika iyaw gujenna; hari attoshin qammaka iya huuphey qofape shempenna; he ubbayka hada.
ECC 2:24 Hiza asas go77a gidiyabay aybe giiko, asi midi uyidi ba daaburan ufaytanaysa. He ufaysay qassi Xoossaa kushiyape imetidaba gideysa taani akeekas.
ECC 2:25 Iya shene gidonna, min uyin asas ufaysi awun de7ii?
ECC 2:26 Xoossaa ufaysiya uraas Xoossay cincatethi, eratethinne ufaysi immees; nagaranchuwas I daaburidi shiishana mela, daabura immees. Shin I shiishidaysa Xoossay ekidi, baw yayiya haras immees. Hessa gisho, ha ubbay hadanne carko oykanaw yedetho mela.
ECC 3:1 Ubbabaas wodey de7ees; salope garsan oosetiyaba ubbaas wodeynne qammi de7ees.
ECC 3:2 Yeletanaw wodey de7ees; hayqanaw wodey de7ees. Tokanaw wodey de7ees; Shoddanaw wodey de7ees.
ECC 3:3 Wodhanaw wodey de7ees; pathanaw wodey de7ees. Laallanaw wodey de7ees; keexanaw wodey de7ees.
ECC 3:4 Yeekanaw wodey de7ees; miiccanaw wodey de7ees. Kayotanaw wodey de7ees; yexanaw wodey de7ees.
ECC 3:5 Shuchu laallanaw wodey de7ees; shuchu shiishanaw wodey de7ees. Qoometanaw wodey de7ees; duuxanaw wodey de7ees.
ECC 3:6 Koyanaw wodey de7ees; koshshi agganaw wodey de7ees. Shiishi oykanaw wodey de7ees; laallanaw wodey de7ees.
ECC 3:7 Peedhanaw wodey de7ees; sikanaw wodey de7ees. Si77i gaanaw wodey de7ees; odetanaw wodey de7ees.
ECC 3:8 Dosanaw wodey de7ees; ixanaw wodey de7ees. Olas wodey de7ees; saro daanaw wodey de7ees.
ECC 3:9 Yaatin, oosanchoy ba daaburida daaburaape ay wodhe demmii?
ECC 3:10 Taani qassi, asa na7i daaburidi oothana mela, Xoossay immida toohoy daro deexo gideysa be7as.
ECC 3:11 Xoossay ubbaba iya wodiyan wodiyan loythidi oothis. Xoossay asa wozanan merinatethi wothis; gidikoka, Xoossay oothidaba ubbaa koyrope wursethi gakanaw, asi kumethi eranaw danda7enna.
ECC 3:12 Asi ba de7ida laythan lo77iyaba ootheysafenne, ufayteysafe aadhiyabay aybika baynaysa taani akeekas.
ECC 3:13 Qassi, asas oothi daaburidi demmiya daaburas gatey, midinne uyidi ufayteysi Xoossaafe iyaw imetida imota.
ECC 3:14 Xoossay oothidaba ubbay merinaw de7eysa taani eras; I oothidaba bolla gujanaw woyko iyape denthanaw oodesika danda7etenna. Xoossi hessa oothey, asi iya yayyidi bonchana melasa.
ECC 3:15 Ha77i hanishe de7iyabay woyko sinthafe hananaw de7iyaba ubbay kase hanidaba; Xoossay kase hanidabay zaari hananaada koyees.
ECC 3:16 Qassi taani, salope garsan xillo pirda bessan iitatethi, xillotetha bessan geney de7eysa be7as.
ECC 3:17 Ta wozanan, “Xoossay xilluwanne worduwa nam7aaka pirdas shiishana; Xoossay hanidaba ubbaasinne ooso ubbaas wode qanxi wothis” yaagada qopas.
ECC 3:18 Taani taako, “Asi do7ape duumatonaysa enti akeekana mela Xoossay enta paacees” yaagas.
ECC 3:19 Ase gidin, do7a gidin, enta qaaday issino; issoy hayqeysada, hankoyka hayqees. Nam7ay issi carko shempoosona; hessa gisho, asi do7ape dummatenna; hessika hada.
ECC 3:20 Enti nam7ay issi bessi boosona; nam7ay biittafe medhetida gisho, biitta simmoosona.
ECC 3:21 Yaatin, asa shempoy salo pude keyeysanne do7a shempoy biitta duge wodheysa shaakidi erey oonee?
ECC 3:22 Asi ba oothida ooson ufayteysafe lo77iya harabay iyaw baynaysa be7as. Iyaw de7iya lo77o qaaday hessa xalaala. Asi hayqi simmin iyape guye haniyaba bessanaw, iya guye ehanaw danda7ey oonee?
ECC 4:1 Taani zaarada, salope garsan ay mela naaqoy de7iyako be7as. Naaqeteysati minthetho dhayidi yeekosona. Naaqeyisata kushen maati de7iya gisho naaqeteyisata maaddey baawa.
ECC 4:2 Taani, “Ha77i paxa de7eysatape kase hayqidaysati lo77o” yaagas.
ECC 4:3 Gidoshin, ha nam7atape aadhidi yeletiboonaysatanne salope garsan oosetiya naaquwa be7onayisata qaaday lo77o.
ECC 4:4 Asa daaburinne amotidaba demoy, asas ba laggiya bolla de7iya qanaatepe pulteysa be7as. Hessika hada; carko oykanaw kaalo mela.
ECC 4:5 Ba kushe idimmidi uttiya azallay koshan hayqees.
ECC 4:6 Daaburaninne carko kaalon demmiya dakobaape wopan demmiya issi kushey lo77o.
ECC 4:7 Salope garsan hada gididaba haraba be7as.
ECC 4:8 Hessika na7i woyko ishi bayna issi bizza addey de7ees. Shin iya daaburas zawi baawa; baw de7iyaban alenna. I bana, “Ta haysa ooddes daaburayna? Taani tana ayis ufaysi diggadina?” yaagidi oychis. Hessika qassi hadanne meto de7o.
ECC 4:9 Banta oosuwan lo77o ayfe demmiya gisho issino gideysafe nam7a gideysi lo77o.
ECC 4:10 Nam7aafe issoy kundiko issoy denthees; shin barka de7iya uray kundiko iya denthey bayna gisho iya ayye!
ECC 4:11 Nam7ay issife zin7iko ho77ees; shin barka zin7iya uraa waanidi ho77anaw danda7ii?
ECC 4:12 Issi asi barka teqanaw danda7onna metuwa nam7u asati teqanaw danda7oosona. Heedzu ayfen dooqetida wodoroy elle duuxenna.
ECC 4:13 Zore ekonna eeyanne ceega kawuwape manqonne cinca gidida na7atetha kawoy lo77o.
ECC 4:14 He na7atethay qasho keethafe keyidi woyko manqotethafe dendidi kawo gidanaw danda7ees.
ECC 4:15 Salope garsan de7iyanne simeretiya asa ubbay kawa laattiya na7atetha kaalleysa be7as.
ECC 4:16 Issi kawoy haariya asaa tayboy daro gidanaw danda7ees. Shin kaalliya yeletethay iya kawotethan ufaytibeenna. Hessika hada; carko oykanaw kaalo mela.
ECC 5:1 Xoossa keethi geliya wode akeekada tanga. Enti banta iita oosuwa eronna gisho, si7anaw shiiqoy eeyata yarshuwafe aadhees.
ECC 5:2 Odetanaw eesotopa; Xoossa sinthan odetanaw ne wozanan dirgofa. Xoossay salona, neeni sa7ana; hessa gisho, ne qaalay guutha gido.
ECC 5:3 Qofi dariya wode amuhoy darees; oda daroy eeyatethi qoncisees.
ECC 5:4 Xoossas gepidaba polanaw gam7ofa; eeyatan Xoossay ufaytenna. Hessa gisho, neeni gepidaba ubbaa pola.
ECC 5:5 Issiba gepidi polonna agganaape koyro geponna agoy lo77o.
ECC 5:6 Nagaran nena gelsonna mela ne inxarsa yeda oothofa. Xoossa keethan ootheysako, “Koyro haysa taani akeekona gepas” goopa. Hessi Xoossa daro hanqethiya gisho, ne kushe ooso ubbaa I ba hanquwan dhaysanaw danda7ees.
ECC 5:7 Daro amuhoynne daro odi hada. Hessa gisho, Xoossaa yayya.
ECC 5:8 Issi biittan manqoti naaqetishin, pirdi geellatishin neeni be7iko malaaletofa. Issi issi halaqaas iyape bollara shuumetidi iya xeelliya hara halaqi de7ees. Qassi entafe bollara shuumetidi enta xeelliya hara halaqati de7oosona.
ECC 5:9 Biittafe bentiya wodhey ubbaasa; hari attoshin, kawoyka goshshafe go7etees.
ECC 5:10 Bira dosiya uraas biri gidi erenna; duretethi siiqiya uray miishe kalli erenna; he ubbay hada.
ECC 5:11 Duretethi dariya wode miya asi darees. Ba shaluwa coo ayfen xeellidi, “Taani dure” gaanape haraba ay maaddii?
ECC 5:12 Ooso oothiya asi guuthu min daro min, saro dhisko dhiskees; shin durey ba duretethaas ubba wode un7etiya gisho dhisko dhayidi de7ees.
ECC 5:13 Salope garsan daro azzanthiyaba haraba taani be7as. Hessika iita wode bana asho gidi minjida shalo,
ECC 5:14 woyko issi iitabay gakin dhayida duretethi. I na7a yelidaba gidikoka na7aa laatisiyaba dhayidi mela attees.
ECC 5:15 Asi ubbay kallo yeletidaysada mela kushe simmidi baana. Ay mela I daaburidi oothikoka ekidi biyabay baawa.
ECC 5:16 Asi kallo yeletidi kallo guye simmeysi daro azzanthiya iitabaa. Iya daabura ubbay carko oykiyabada hada gidiko iya ay maaddii?
ECC 5:17 I ba laytha ubbaa dhuma de7on, azzanon, yeellan, hargeninne yilon wursees.
ECC 5:18 Hiza, taani akeekida issi lo77obay, salope garsan Xoossi asas immida qantha laythan, asi ba daaburaape midi uyidi ufayteysi lo77onne bessiyaba; iya qaaday hessa.
ECC 5:19 Xoossi asas duretethinne shalo immey, ba daabura gatiya demmidi, midi uyidi ufaytana melasa; hessika Xoossaafe iyaw imetida imota.
ECC 5:20 Xoossi iya wozanan ubba wode ufaysi kunthiya gisho I ba de7o laythaba daro qopenna.
ECC 6:1 Salope garsan asa bolla gakiya daro iitabaa taani be7as.
ECC 6:2 Xoossi asas shalo, duretethinne boncho immees; iyaw koshshiyabaape issibaaka pacisenna. Shin iyaw imetida shaluwaninne duretethan ufaytana mela kumetha maata immenna. Hessa xalaala gidonashin I daaburidi demmidaban hari ufaytana mela oothees; hessika hadanne azzanthiya iitabaa.
ECC 6:3 Issi asi xeetu na7a yelidi, adussa laythi de7idi cimanaw danda7ees. Shin I baw imetidaban ufaytonnanne wursethan bonchon moogetonna attiko iyape boshi lo77o gayis.
ECC 6:4 He boshay coo yeletidi oonika hassayonna dhumaa biya gisho iya sunthay dhuman kametidi attees.
ECC 6:5 I, awa poo7o be7onna woyko aybibaaka eronna attikoka he uraape aadhidi iyaw shempoy de7ees.
ECC 6:6 Hessa gisho, ufaysi bayna nam7u mukulu laythi de7iya asape he bosha qaaday lo77o. Wursethan nam7ay issi bessi boosona.
ECC 6:7 Asi daaburidi oothiya ubbay baw miyaba demmanaasa; shin iya amoy ali erenna.
ECC 6:8 Yaatin, cinca asi eeya asape aybin dummatii? Manqoy daro cincidi, harata sinthan waanidi daaneko eroy iya ay maaddii?
ECC 6:9 Amon xuugetanaape ayfen be7oy lo77o; hessika carko oykanaw kaalo mela hada.
ECC 6:10 Haniyaba ubbay koyrottidi eretidi de7ees. Issi issi asi waananaw de7iyako adussa wodepe kase eretidi uttis. Ay asika baape minneysara baaxetanaw danda7enna.
ECC 6:11 Odi dariya wode hadabay darees; yaatin hessi ase ay maaddii?
ECC 6:12 Hada gididi kuyada coo aadhiya ba guutha laytha asi waatidi aathanaw koshshiyako erey oonee? Asi hayqidi aggin salope garsan hananaw de7iyaba asas odanaw danda7ey oonee?
ECC 7:1 Al77o shittofe lo77o sunthi aadhees; yeletiya gallasape hayqo gallas lo77o.
ECC 7:2 Asa ubbaa wursethay hayqo gidida gisho, gibira keethi beysafe yeeho keethi beysi lo77o; de7on de7iya asi hessa ba wozanan wothanaw koshshees.
ECC 7:3 Azzanoy som7o kareethikoka, wozana poo7isiya gisho miichafe azzanoy lo77o.
ECC 7:4 Cinca asa wozani yeeho son de7ees; shin eeya asa wozani ufaysa son de7ees.
ECC 7:5 Eeyata yethi si7anaape cincata seera sissi lo77o.
ECC 7:6 Eeya asa miichi agunthan tama yeddin dhuuqeysa mela; hessika hada.
ECC 7:7 Gene oosoy cinca asi eeya kessees; wodhaafe ekoy wozana iissees.
ECC 7:8 Doomethafe wursethi lo77o; otorope danda7i lo77o.
ECC 7:9 Eeyata hanqoy enta ki7on de7iya gisho, neeni ne shempuwan hanqos ellesopa.
ECC 7:10 “Ha77i wodiyape kase wodey ayis lo77o gididee?” gada oychofa; hessa mela oyshoy cinca asi oychiya oysho gidenna.
ECC 7:11 Ha sa7an de7iya asi ubbay cinca gidanaw koshshees; cincatethi demoy laatape lo77o.
ECC 7:12 Miishey ase iitape kammidi ashsheysada cincatethika ashshees. Shin cincatethi miishepe aadhey asa de7o naaganaw danda7iya gishosa.
ECC 7:13 Ane Xoossi oothidaba akeeka! Xoossi geellayidaba ooni suurisanaw danda7ii?
ECC 7:14 Sa7i giigida wode ufayta; metoy gakiya wode akeeka. Ufaysi gidin meto gidin Xoossi yeddiya woden yees. Shin awusi koyrottidi yaaneko neeni eraka.
ECC 7:15 Ha hada gidida ta laythan darobaa be7as. Hessika, geellay ba geellatethan adussa laythi de7iya wode xilloy qantha laythan hayqees.
ECC 7:16 Hessa gisho, neeni elle dhayonnaada daro xillo woyko daro cinca gidopa.
ECC 7:17 Neeni wodey gakonna hayqonnaada aadhida iita gidopa; aadhada eeya gidopa.
ECC 7:18 Ha ubban Xoosse yayya; asi meto ubbaa xoonon keyanaw danda7iya gisho neeni daro iita woyko daro xillo gidonashin giddo asi gida.
ECC 7:19 Cincatethi cincaas immiya wolqay issi katama haariya tammu asata wolqafe aadhees.
ECC 7:20 Xillobaa xalaala oothidi nagara oothonna de7iya asi ha sa7aa bolla baawa.
ECC 7:21 Asi haasaya qaala ubbaa si7ada polana goopa; neeni ubbaa si7ana giiko ne aylley nena baaddishin si7ana.
ECC 7:22 Qassi neeni ne huuphen harata baaddiyaba ne wozanay erees.
ECC 7:23 Hessa ubbaa taani cincatethan pilgada be7as. Yaatada, “Taani cinca gidana” yaagas. Shin taani gidaysada hanibeenna.
ECC 7:24 Cincatethi ubba wode haahon de7iyabaanne ciimmoba; yaatin, iya koyidi demmanaw danda7ey oonee?
ECC 7:25 Taani pilgada xeellanaw cincatethinne oda ubbaa wursethaa eranaw qopas. Nagari eeyatethi, eeyatethi gooshshatethi gideysa eranaw gakas.
ECC 7:26 Taani hayqope aadhidi cammiya haraba demmas. Hessika, I wozanay gite, I kushey santhalaata gididi xiheda oykiya issi maccas be7as. Xoosse yayiya asi iipe kessi ekana; shin nagaranchuwa iya ba xihiyan xaaxada oykana.
ECC 7:27 Astamaarey haysada yaagis; “Taani pilgada demmidabay haysa.
ECC 7:28 Hessika, taani hachi gakanaw koyada demmaboonnaba. Mukulu adde asa giddofe bonchoy bessiya issi adde xalaala demmas; shin macca asaa giddofe issinnoka demmanaw danda7abike.
ECC 7:29 Taani pilgada demmida harabay, Xoossi ase suure qofara medhis; shin asi daro gene oge koyidi bis” yaagis.
ECC 8:1 Cinca asi daaney oonee? Ubbabaas birshethaa erey oonee? Cincatethi pashkisidi, dhumida som7uwa poo7isees.
ECC 8:2 Kawos kiiteta; kase neeni kiitetana gada Xoossa sinthan caaqadasa.
ECC 8:3 Kawa sinthafe ellesada keyopa; kawoy ba koydaba oothanaw danda7iya gisho iita ooso oothanaw dendofa.
ECC 8:4 Ubbabaa oothanaw kawas maati de7iya gisho, “Ayis haysa oothadii?” yaagidi iya oychanaw danda7ey oonee?
ECC 8:5 Iya kiitaa poliya asi qohetenna; cinca asi like wodiyanne oothiya ogiya erees.
ECC 8:6 Ase deexo metoy gakikoka ubbabaas wodeynne ogey de7ees.
ECC 8:7 Sinthafe hananaba eriya asi baawa; “Haysi hanana” gidi odanaw danda7ey oonee?
ECC 8:8 Shempoy shaaketidi biya gallas oykidi teqanaw danda7iya asi baawa; woyko hayqoy ba gallasan yoonnaada digganaw danda7iya asi baawa. Ola wode oonika oletike gaanaw danda7onnaysada iitatethi iita oothiya uraa yeddenna.
ECC 8:9 Salope garsan haniyaba ubbaa taani akeekada qopiya wode asi baw de7iya maata hara asi qohanaw go7eteysa be7as.
ECC 8:10 Iita asati bonchon moogetishin be7as. Enti iitatetha oothida katamaa asay shiiqidi enta sabbishin si7as; hessi ubbay hada.
ECC 8:11 Asi qopidi iitabaa oothiya gaasoy, iitabaa oothida asata ellesidi seerey bayna gishosa.
ECC 8:12 Nagaranchoy xeetu toho iitabaa oothishin iya barey aduqikoka, Xoosse yayyeysatasinne boncheysatas sa7i lo77anaysa ta erayis.
ECC 8:13 Iitati Xoosse yayyonna gisho sarotethi entaw baawa; enti Xoosse yayyonna gisho enta barey kuyada qaammana.
ECC 8:14 Ha sa7an oosetiya hara hadabay de7ees. Hessika, geeshsha asati, nagaranchoti ekanaw bessiya seera ekiya wode nagaranchoti geeshshati ekanaw bessiya lo77oba ekeysa; hessi ubbay hada.
ECC 8:15 Asi miyabaape, uyabaapenne bana ufaysiyabape aadhidi lo77obay salope garsan hari bayna gisho, asi ba de7on ufaytiko lo77o gas. Xoossi iyaw immida laythan I daaburidi demmidaban ufaytanaw danda7ees.
ECC 8:16 Taani cincatethi aybeko eranawunne asi ha sa7a bolla daaburiya daabura akeekanaw halchas; wursethan asi dhisko dhayidi oothiya oosoy de7eysa be7as.
ECC 8:17 Taani Xoossi oothidaba ubbaa be7as. Salope garsan oosetida ooso asi pilgidi eranaw danda7onnaysa eras. Asi ay mela daaburidi pilgi xeellikoka, iya birshethaa eranaw danda7enna. Qassi cinca asi haysa erayis gaanaw danda7enna.
ECC 9:1 Ha ubbaa ta wozanan qopidaape guye cincatinne xilloti, enta oosoti Xoossa kushen de7oosona gada kuuyas. Shin siiqo gidin woyko ixo aybi iya naagiyako oonika erenna.
ECC 9:2 Dummatethi bayna ubbaa gakiya qaaday issino; xillo gidin geella, lo77o gidin iita, tuna gidin tuna gidonna ixin, yarsho yarsheysa gidin yarshonaysa ubbaa qaaday issino. Lo77o asas nagaranchuwafe lo77iya qaadi baawa; caaqo yayyeysi yayyonnaysafe dummatenna.
ECC 9:3 Asa ubbaa qaaday issino gideysi, ha sa7an de7iya hara iitatethaa mela daro iita. Asi de7on de7ida laytha ubban iya wozanay iitatethaninne gooshshatethan kumidi de7ees; wursethan hayqidi aggees.
ECC 9:4 Hayqida gaammofe paxa de7iya kani lo77o; de7on de7eysatara de7iya uraas ufaysi de7ees.
ECC 9:5 De7on de7iya asati issi toho hayqanaw de7eysa eroosona; shin hayqidaysati issibaaka erokona. Enti dogetidaysata gidiya gisho aykoka maaddokona.
ECC 9:6 Enta siiqoy, ixoynne qanaate ubbay entara issife dhayees. Hizape guye salope garsan haniyaba ubban merinaw entaw qaadi baawa.
ECC 9:7 Ba, ne kathaa ufaysan ma; ne woyne ushsha ne wozanay ufaytin uya. Xoossay hessa new kasepe giigisidi wothis.
ECC 9:8 Ubba wode ne ma7oy boothi gido; ne huuphen zayte tiya.
ECC 9:9 Salope garsan Xoossay new immida ha hada de7uwan, hada gidida ne qammatan ne siiqiya ne machera ufaytada de7a. Neeni salope garsan daaburada oothidaba ubbaafe nena gakiya saamay hessa.
ECC 9:10 Ne kushey oothanaw demmidaba ubbaa ne kumetha wolqan ootha; neeni baana duufuwan oosoy woyko halchoy woyko eri woyko cincatethi baawa.
ECC 9:11 Taani salope garsan haraba be7as. Hessika, eeson woxeysati ubba wode xoonokona; mino olanchoti ubba wode olan kanthokona; cincati ubba wode kathi demmokona; hiillanchoti ubba wode duretokona; tamaarida asati ubba wode sabetokona. Shin ubbaa qaadinne wodey gathidaysada hanees.
ECC 9:12 Gidoshin he wodey awude yaaneko eranaw danda7iya asi baawa. Kafoy xihen geleysada woyko moloy giten oyketeysada asi ubbay qoponna gakiya iita woden oyketees.
ECC 9:13 Salope garsan taani be7idaba harabay de7ees. Hessika cincatethi gita leemiso gideysa.
ECC 9:14 Guutha asi de7iya issi guutha katamiya de7awusu. He katamiw issi wolqaama kawoy olanaw dendis; iyo teqidi oykis.
ECC 9:15 He katamen manqo gidida issi cinca addey de7ees; I ba cincatethan he katamiw ashshis. Shin he manqo addiya zaaridi hassayday baawa.
ECC 9:16 Taani, “Cincatethi wolqaafe aadhees” yaagas. Gidoshin, cinca gidikoka manqo asi kadhetees; I odiyaba si7ey baawa.
ECC 9:17 Hessi hanikoka, deriya haareysi eeyata shiiqon waassiya waasuwa si7anaape loddara odetiya cinca asa qaala si7eysi lo77o.
ECC 9:18 Cincatethi ola miishepe aadhees; shin issi nagaranchoy daro lo77oba dhaysees.
ECC 10:1 Hayqida udunxeti sawiya shittuwa xinqisoosona; hessadaka, guutha eeyatethi cincatethinne gita bonchuwa iissees.
ECC 10:2 Cinca asa wozanay iya ushachi kaalethees; shin eeya asa wozani haddirsi kaalethees.
ECC 10:3 Eeya asi oge hemetiya wode iyaw akeeki baawa; I eeya gideysa asi ubbay erees.
ECC 10:4 Ne halaqay ne bolla hanqetiko ne bessaa yeddofa; si77i gidi danda7oy gita nagaraa atto giisees.
ECC 10:5 Salope garsan taani be7ida hara iitabay de7ees. Hessika deriya haareysati oothiya naaquwa.
ECC 10:6 Eeyati daro dhoqa shuumatetha oykidi de7iya wode dureti ziqa bessan uttidosona.
ECC 10:7 Taani aylleti haareysatada para toggidi bishin qassi haareysati aylletada tohon hemetishin be7as.
ECC 10:8 Olla bookiya asi he ollan kundees; gimbe dirsi laaliya uraa shooshi dukees.
ECC 10:9 Shuchu denthiya asi he shuchan, mithi qeriya asi he mithan deshetees.
ECC 10:10 Dun7ida kalta leefonna qeriko daro wolqaa wursees; shin cincatethan oothiya oosuwas ayfey de7ees.
ECC 10:11 Shooshi duki aggin shooshu doqiya dhale wotheysi he uraa aykoka maaddenna.
ECC 10:12 Cinca asa odi iyaw boncho imisees; shin eeyay ba doonape keyida qaalan baw meton gelees.
ECC 10:13 Eeyay ba haasaya eeya qaalan doomidi, iitatethaninne gooshshatethan polees.
ECC 10:14 Eeya asi darobaa odetees. Gidoshin, sinthafe hananaw de7iyaba oonika erenna. Asi hayqi aggin, haniyaba iyaw odanaw danda7ey baawa.
ECC 10:15 Eeya asi ba ooson daaburees; I ba soo biya ogiya erenna.
ECC 10:16 Na7a gidida kawoynne wonta guura gibira miya halaqati de7iya biitte nena ayye!
ECC 10:17 Bonchetida kawoynne mathotanaw gidonashin wolqanne minotethi demmanaw maaran miyanne uyaa halaqati de7iya biittiya anjetidaaro.
ECC 10:18 Addey azalla gidiko iya kaaray woddees; iya kushey oothonnaba gidiko, iya keethay xokees.
ECC 10:19 Kathi muussaninne woyne ushshan ufaysi bentees; shin miishey ubbaba shammees.
ECC 10:20 Si7iya asi baawa gada ne wozanan kawo cayopa; woyko ne zin7iya kifiliyan dure uraa baaddofa. Ne gidaysa salo kafoy bidi entaw odanaw danda7ees.
ECC 11:1 Ne kathaa haatha bolla yegga; daro gallasape guye neeni zaarada demmana.
ECC 11:2 New de7iya shaluwa laapun woyko hospun bessan shaakada wotha. Sinthafe ha sa7aa bolla ay iitabay yaaneko neeni eraka.
ECC 11:3 Shaari ira tookiko biitta bolla iri bukees. Mithi pude kundin duge kundin ba kundida bessan de7ees.
ECC 11:4 Carko naagiya oonika kathi zerenna; shaari dendana gakanaw naagiya oonika ba kathaa cakenna.
ECC 11:5 Carkoy biya ogiyanne na7i ba aaye ulon waanidi medhetiyako ne eronnaysada ubbaba medhida Xoossay ba oosuwa waati oothiyako eranaw danda7aka.
ECC 11:6 Guura gidin omarsi ne zerethi zereysa aggofa; wontaysi woyko omarsaysi lo77aneko neeni eraka.
ECC 11:7 Poo7oy ufaysiyabaa; awa ayfe be7oy lo77oba.
ECC 11:8 Asi adussa laythi ha sa7an de7iko he laythan ufayto. Shin ha alamiyabay hada gideysanne yaana dhuma wodey merinaw daanaysa qopo.
ECC 11:9 Neno na7atethaw, na7atethi daro lo77oba gidiya gisho ne na7atetha laythan ufayta; ne wozanayka ufayto. Ne ayfey be7idabaanne ne wozanay amotidaba ubbaa pola. Shin he neeni oothidaba ubbaa gisho nena Xoossay pirdanaw de7eysa dogopa.
ECC 11:10 Na7atethinne goobatethi hada gidiya gisho ne wozanaape azzano, ne asatethafe iitatethi digga.
ECC 12:1 Ne na7atetha laythan nena medhidaysa qopa. Un77a gallasati yoonna de7ishin, “Haysi tana ufaysenna” geetetiya wodeti gakonna de7ishin,
ECC 12:2 awinne poo7oy, ageeninne xoolintoti dhumonna de7ishin, iri bukidi aadhin, shaari simmonna de7ishin, nena medhidaysa qopa.
ECC 12:3 He wodey keethe naageysati kokoriya wode, mino asi kuuniya wode, gaacceysati taybon guuxida gisho gaache aggiya wodenne maskootera xeelleysati daaburiya wode gidana.
ECC 12:4 He wodey, wogga ogiyako simmida pengeti gordetiya wode, gaacciya woxa girsay ziqi giya wode, kafo waasoy ase dhiskofe barkisiya wode, macca nayta yetha girsay lepiya wode gidana.
ECC 12:5 He wodey, dere keyanaw xoonetiya wode, dalga ogetara hemetanaw yashshiya wode, lawuze mithi ciiyiya wode, booley qaaxanaw xoonetiya wode, amoyabay aggiya wode gidana. He wodey, asi ba merinaa keethaa biya wode, yeekeysati dalga ogiyara yeekishe yuuyiya wode gidana.
ECC 12:6 Bira santhalaatay duuxonna de7ishin, worqa kerey meqonna de7ishin, haatha otoy pultuwa matan meqonna de7ishin, haathe ollafe goochi kessiya wodoroy duuxonna de7ishin,
ECC 12:7 biittay biittako simmonna de7ishin, shempoy bana immida Xoossaako simmonna de7ishin, nena medhidaysa qopa.
ECC 12:8 Astamaarey, “Hada! Hada! Ubbabay hada” yaagis.
ECC 12:9 Astamaarey cinca xalaala gidonashin eraka gidiya gisho deriya tamaarsis. I daro leemisota pilgidi issuwa issuwa iya maaran maaran dummayidi wothis.
ECC 12:10 Astamaarey like gidida qaala demmanaw koyis; hessa gisho, I xaafidabay suurenne tuma.
ECC 12:11 Cincata qaalay henthanchoy wude laagiya xeera oco xam7a mela. Issife shiiqida leemisoti gathi oythiya mismaare mela.
ECC 12:12 Ta na7aw, ha ubbaafe bollara neeni naagetanaw koshshiyabay de7ees. Maxaafa xaafidi wursanaw danda7etenna. Qassi darobaa pilgidi aggonna ixoy asatethi daabursees.
ECC 12:13 Heko ubbabay odetis; ubbabaas kuushshay haysa; Xoosse yayiya; iya kiitaa naaga; hessi asas waanna ooso.
ECC 12:14 Xoossay ooso ubbaa qassi geemmida ubbaa lo77o gidin iitaa pirdanaw de7ees.
SOL 1:1 Mazmure ubbaafe aadhiya Solomone mazmurey haysa.
SOL 1:2 Ne siiqoy woynepe aadhidi ufaysiya gisho tana zaara zaara yeera.
SOL 1:3 Ne tiyetiya shittoy waanidi sawii! Ne sunthay goggiya shitto mela; Geela7oti nena siiqey hessasa.
SOL 1:4 Tana neera ekada ba; ane issife woxoos! Kawaw, tana ne quruxuwan gelsa. Nenan nu ufaytoos; ne siiquwa woyne ushshafe aathidi nashshoos. Maccasi ubbay nena siiqeysa bessa.
SOL 1:5 Hinteno, Yerusalaame maccasato si7ite; taani kareethi gidikoka mala lo77o. Ta kareethatethay Qedaare dunkaane mela; shin ta malay Solomone magarajota mela.
SOL 1:6 Ta malaa kareethiday awa; taani kareethi gidida gisho tana boropite. Ta ishati, ta aaye nayti taara ooyetidi, tana woyne gade naagisidosona; hessa gisho ta woyniya naagabike.
SOL 1:7 Ta siiquwaw, ane taw oda; ne dorsaa wudiya awun heemmay? Seeta gallas enta awun shempisay? Nena demmanaw ne laggeta wudiya kaallada, ayis guuluntada biya maccas gido?
SOL 1:8 Maccasa ubbaafe lo77iyare, Bessaa eronna ixiko dorsata geedo kaalla. Ne deesha marata henthanchota dunkaaniya matan heemma.
SOL 1:9 Ta siiqe! Gibxe kawo para gaareta goochiya, parata giddon de7iya magaayeda lo77aasa.
SOL 1:10 Ne haythan de7iya alleequwara shiiqidi, ne shakalay waanidi lo77i! Ne qoodhey al7o shuchan alleeqetis.
SOL 1:11 Nuuni new biran cadetida, worqa alleequwa oosisana.
SOL 1:12 Kawoy gayta bolla uttidashin, ta shittuwa sawoy keethan tonku gis.
SOL 1:13 Ta siiqoy ta dhanthata giddon de7iya, xuntetida sawiya karbe daanees.
SOL 1:14 Ta siiqoy, Engaada woyne gaden, dolida heena ciishsha mela.
SOL 1:15 Ta siiqe, neeni waana lo77ay! Neeni waana lo77ay! Ne ayfeti holle ayfeda lo77oosona.
SOL 1:16 Ta siiquwaw, neeni waanna lo77ay! Ayba ufaysay; nu arsay cil7o maata mela ufaysees.
SOL 1:17 Nu keethaa tuussay ziga; nu kaaray xiiddan oyketis.
SOL 2:1 Taani Saaronan doliya ciishshanne zangaaran doliya suufe ciishsha mela.
SOL 2:2 Ta siiqiya maccasa giddon be7iya wode, aguntha giddon bentiya suufe ciishsha mela.
SOL 2:3 Ta siiqoy hara panthata giddon xeelliya wode woran de7iya apile mithaa mela. Tana daro ufaysin, iya kuyaa giddon uttas; iya ayfey min tana mal7ees.
SOL 2:4 I tana gibira miya keethi gelsis; ba siiquwa bandirada ta bolla dhoqu dhoqu oothis.
SOL 2:5 Taani iya siiquwan oyketada hargida gisho, zabibe ayfe muzidi tana gashtisite; apile muzidi ta wolqaa minthite.
SOL 2:6 Ba haddirsa kushiya tana borkotisis; ba ushacha kushiyan tana qoommis.
SOL 2:7 Hinteno, Yerusalaame yalaga maccasaw, siiqoy baw dosidi dendana gakanaw, iya hinte barkethonna mela, ta hintena gen7eninne wora woshi7en ammatayis.
SOL 2:8 Ta siiquwa girsay deriya bollara gupishenne, zumaa bollara xongetishe yeysi si7etees.
SOL 2:9 Ta siiqoy woshi7e woyko gen7e mari daanees; Heko, nu keethaa matan eqis; maskootera soo xeellees; magarajuwa giddora xeellees.
SOL 2:10 Ta siiqoy, haysada yaagees; “Ta siiqe, denda! Ta yegelsse, haaya, issife ane boos.
SOL 2:11 Heko, balgoy aadhis; irayka eqis.
SOL 2:12 Biittan ciishshi ciiyis; yethi yexiya ageenay gakis; holle yethi nu biittan si7etis.
SOL 2:13 Balase mithay ayfe doomis; woyney ciiyis; ciishsha sawoy biittan tonku gees. Ta siiqe, denda; ta yegelsse, haaya; ane issife boos.”
SOL 2:14 Aafo doonan zaalla qophon, qosetida holle daaniyare; ane issi toho tana ne som7uwa bessa; ne girsa sissa. Ne qaalay tana mal7ees; ne som7oy daro lo77ees.
SOL 2:15 Nu woyney ciiyis; nu woyne gadiya iissiya workanata, he guutha butaleta xihen oykite.
SOL 2:16 Ta siiqoy tabaa; taanika iyabaa; ciishshata giddon I ba wudiya heemmees.
SOL 2:17 Sa7i geeyana gakanaw, kuyay dhayana gakanaw, ta siiquwaw, gen7eda woyko woshi7e marada, aafotiya deriyara woxashe haa simma.
SOL 3:1 Qamma kumethi hiixan zin7ada, ta siiquwa demmanaw amottas; minthada koyas; shin demmabike.
SOL 3:2 Katamaa giddon de7iya dalganne xuntha ogeta ubban yuuyas. Ta siiquwa demmanaw koyas; minthada koyas; shin demmanaw danda7abike.
SOL 3:3 Katamaa yuuyidi naageysati tana demmidosona; taani, “Ta siiquwa be7idetii?” yaagada oychas.
SOL 3:4 Enta aggada aadhida mela ta siiquwa demmas; I taape kessi ekonnaada minthada oykas. Ta aaye soo efas; ta yeletida kifiliya gelsas.
SOL 3:5 Hinteno Yerusalaame macca nayto, siiqoy baw dosidi dendana gakanaw, iya hinte barkisonna mela taani hintena gen7eninne woshi7en ammatayis.
SOL 3:6 Zal7ancho ixaanedanne karbeda sawiyara, cuya tuussu daaniyara, hanna mela biittafe yaara iya oonee?
SOL 3:7 Heko, Solomone para gaariya yawusu; he para gaariw Isra7eelepe dooretida, usupun tammu wolqaama tooranchoti ajabidosona.
SOL 3:8 Enti ubbay mashsha oythan meezetidosona; olanka paacetidosona. Qamma gakiya metuwa teqanaw, enti mashshe dancidi giigidosona.
SOL 3:9 Kawa Solomoney para gaare giddon, baw uttiya araata giigisis; iya araatay Libaanosepe yida mithan oosetis.
SOL 3:10 Araata tuussay biran lanxetis; zempoy worqan alleeqetis. Oydey ocha teera daaniya qacinan kametis; gaathay Yerusalaame geela7ota siiqon alleeqetis.
SOL 3:11 Hinteno, Xiyoone geela7oto, kawa Solomone be7anaw haayite. I daro ufaytida iya yaaganuwa gallas iya aayiya iya huuphen wothida kallacha wothis.
SOL 4:1 Ta siiqe, neeni waana lo77ay! Neeni waanida yegelsse! Ne ayfeti guulunthaa giddora be7iya wode, holleda lo77oosona. Ne binaanay Galada zumaape wodhiya deesha wude daanees.
SOL 4:2 Ne achay meedetidi haathan meecetida, ubbay mente yeliya, enta giddon awucayey bayna dorsa wude mela.
SOL 4:3 Ne mettershay zo7o qacina daanees; ne haasaya wode daro ufaysoosona. Ne nam7u shakalay guulunthaa giddora xeelliya wode, nam7a kessidi phalqida oromaane daanosona.
SOL 4:4 Ne qoodhey loythi oothida, iya bolla olanchota gondalley de7iya, mukulu mino olanchota gondalley kaqetida, Dawita adussa gimbiya daanees.
SOL 4:5 Ne nam7u dhanthati mente yeletida, lo77o ciishshata giddon miya woshi7e marata daanosona.
SOL 4:6 Sa7i geeyanaape sinthe, dhumay kichanaape sinthe, karbe deriyanne ixaane zuma bada shempana.
SOL 4:7 Ta siiqe, ne asatethay kumethi lo77o; nenan boretiyabay baawa.
SOL 4:8 Ta mushurate, Libaanosepe haaya; Gaammoy pee7iya, maahey aqiya, Amaana zumaape, Sanira liiphepe Armoona huuphiyape wodha.
SOL 4:9 Ta siiqe, micho gidida ta mushurate; ne ayfiya xeeloynne ne qoodhiya alleeqoy, ta wozanaa ufaysan gooshshis.
SOL 4:10 Ta siiqo micho gidida ta mushurate! Ne siiqoy tana waani ufaysi! Ne siiqoy woyne ushshafe aadhidi ufaysees; ne shittoy ubbaafe aadhidi sawees.
SOL 4:11 Ta mushurate, ne mettershafe ililo eessi xokees; Ne doonape eessinne maathi pultees; ne ma7oy Libaanose shittoda sawees.
SOL 4:12 Ta siiqo micho gidida ta mushurate, ne yuushoy diretidi naagetiya atakilte bessa mela; ne haratas gordetida, taw dooyetida pulto mela.
SOL 4:13 Neeni atakilte giddon, oromaaney, dooretida atakilte ayfeti, nardoose geetetiya ayfeti de7iya bessa mela.
SOL 4:14 Nardoosey, laadey, sawiya maati, qarafin, ixaanada sawiyabati de7oosona. Karbey, godare uutha ciishshinne dumma dumma qimame atakilteti doloosona.
SOL 4:15 Neeni atakilte bessa ushshiya pulto mela; de7o haathi bentiya olla mela; Libaanose zumaape goggiya shaafa mela.
SOL 4:16 Pudeha bagga carkuwaw, denda! dugeha bagga carkuwaw, haaya! Ta atakiltiya bolla carka! iya sawoy tonku go. Ta siiqoy ba atakiltiya giddo yo; daro mal7iya ayfeta mo.
SOL 5:1 Ta miche, ta mushurate, taani ta atakiltiya giddo gelas. Ta karbiyanne ta shitto ciishsha qoras; taani eessa uythi mas; ta woyniyanne ta maatha uyas. Iya laggeto, miite uyite; siiqo alana gakanaw uyite.
SOL 5:2 Taani dhiskas; shin ta wozanay barkis; ta siiqoy haysada yaagidi pengiya qonkishin si7as. “Ta miche, ta siiqe, ta yegelsse; borey bayna ta holle, taw pengiya dooya. Ta huuphey akan laakis; ta binaanay qamma puusen irxis.”
SOL 5:3 Ta ma7uwa qaaras, zaarada ma7oyee? Ta tohuwa meecetas, zaarada qitayoyee?
SOL 5:4 Ta siiqoy ibitha xoo7era ba kushiya soo yeddis; ta wozanay iya gisho seellees.
SOL 5:5 Ta siiquwas dooyanaw dendas; pengiya dooyanaw kobiya oykiya wode, ta kushiyape karbey, ta biradhiyafe shittoy xokees.
SOL 5:6 Ta siiquwas kariya dooyas, shin I deenna; iya qaala si7anaw daro amottas. Minthada koyas, shin iya demmabike; xeegas, shin taw koybeenna.
SOL 5:7 Katamaa naageysati tana demmidi, wadhidosona; madunxisidosona. Katamaa dirsaa naageysati, ta laxana qaari ekidosona.
SOL 5:8 Hinteno, Yerusalaame geela7oto, ta siiquwa demmiko, taani iya siiquwan hargidaysa, hadara iyaw odite.
SOL 5:9 Neno, maccasa ubbaafe lo77iyara, ne laggey haratape waanidi dummatii? Neeni nuna hadara gey, I haratape aybin dummatii?
SOL 5:10 Ta siiqoy mala lo77onne ayanta; tammu mukulu addeta giddon iya meli baawa.
SOL 5:11 Iya huuphey al7o worqa daanees; iya binaanay lo77onne quuro mela kareethi.
SOL 5:12 Iya ayfey shaafa matan eqida, maathan meecetida holleta daanees.
SOL 5:13 Iya shakalay sawiya qimamey toketida madabeda lo77ees; iya mettershay karbe shittoy xokiya wora ciishshada lo77ees.
SOL 5:14 Iya qesey al7o shuchan alleeqetida worqa xam7ada lo77ees; iya asatethay sanpare al7o shuchan alleeqetida dangarsa zaale mela.
SOL 5:15 Iya tohoti worqa baason eqida salo shucha tuussi daanosona; iya malay zigan alleeqetida Libaanose zuma mela.
SOL 5:16 Iya doonay eessada mal7ees; iya kumetha asatethay lo77ees. Hinteno Yerusalaame geela7oto, ta siiqoynne ta laggey haysa daannes.
SOL 6:1 Maccasa ubbaafe lo77iyare, ne laggey awu bidee? Nu neera koyana mela I bida gina nuus oda.
SOL 6:2 Ta siiqoy dorsa wude heemmanaw, lo77o ciishsha shiishanaw, shitto maatay de7iya atakiltiya giddo bis.
SOL 6:3 Taani ta siiquwaba; ta siiqoy tabaa; I ciishsha giddon wude heemmees.
SOL 6:4 Ta siiqe, ne Tirsa katameeda lo77aasa; Yerusalaameda daro lo77aasa. Bandira oykidi salpiya, olanchoda yashshaasa.
SOL 6:5 Enti tana un7ethida gisho, hayyana ne ayfiya taape dentha. Ne binaanay Galada zumaape wodhiya, deesha wude daanees.
SOL 6:6 Ne achay meecetidi keyiya, ubbay mente yeliya, enta giddon awucayey bayna dorsa wude mela.
SOL 6:7 Ne nam7u shakalay guulunthaa giddora xeelliya wode, nam7u kessidi phalqida oromaane daanosona.
SOL 6:8 Usupun tammu macca kawoti, hospun tammu laggethoti, tayboy bayna geela7oti de7oosona.
SOL 6:9 Shin borey bayna ta holliya taw dumma; iya ba aayes issinno. Iyo yelida aayiya ubbaafe aathada iyo dosawusu; Geela7oti iyo be7idi, “Hanna anjetidaaro” yaagosona; macca kawotinne laggethoti iyo sabboosona.
SOL 6:10 Hanna wonta xalqeda doliyara, ageenada poo7iyara, xalqeda caddiyara, bandira oykidi salpe keyida, olanchoda yashshiyara hanna oonee?
SOL 6:11 Taani zangaaran toketida mithata be7anaw, woyney aacidako oromaaney ayfidaako xeellanaw, duge ocholone gade wodhas.
SOL 6:12 Ta qoponna de7ishin ta amoy tana efidi, kawa asaa para gaareta giddon tana utisis.
SOL 6:13 Neno Sulaamape yidaare, haaya; haa simma; Nu nena loythidi xeellana mela haa simma. Daro asaa sinthan yexiya asada, tana ayis xeelleetii?
SOL 7:1 Kawo na7ada lo77iyare, Laxana caamma aathida ne tohoti waani lo77i! Ne sheechey hiillanchoy qoxidi, alleeqisida al7o shuchu daanees.
SOL 7:2 Ne gul7ay woyney kumida birille daanees; ne xeessa yuushoy ciishshan qashetida giste mirqe daanees.
SOL 7:3 Ne dhanthati mente yeletida, gen7e mari daanosona.
SOL 7:4 Ne qoodhey dangarsa zaalen alleeqetida adussa shako mela. Ne ayfey gita Haseboona katama pengiya matan, de7iya zeero haatha daanees. Ne siidhey Damasqoko zaaridi gimbida, Libaanose gimbiya daanees.
SOL 7:5 Ne huuphey Qarmeloosa zuma daanees; ne binaanay qacina xaathi daanees; ne huuphiya dathay kawa ufaysees.
SOL 7:6 Ta siiqe, ne waanna lo77ay! Ne waanida yegelsse! Ne siiqoy tana waani ufaysi!
SOL 7:7 Ne geesay zamba daanees; ne dhanthay zamba mor77e daanees.
SOL 7:8 Taani, “Zamba bolla keyana; iya ayfiya maxana” yaagas. Ne dhanthay woyne mor7e mela; ne siidhiyara keya peenoy apileda sawees.
SOL 7:9 Ne doonape keyiya peenoy lo77o woyne mela. Hiza lo77iya woyne ushshay, ne siiqe mettershafenne achafe giddora, lepi gidi goggo.
SOL 7:10 Taani ta siiquwaba; ika tana amottees.
SOL 7:11 Ta siiquwaw, haaya; katamaape keyidi gaxare boos; nam7ay qamma yan aathana.
SOL 7:12 Wonta guura woyne atakiltiya giddo boos; woyney ciiyidaako, ayfe aathidako, oromaaney ayfidaako ane be7oos. Taani ta siiquwa nena yan bessaana.
SOL 7:13 Inkoye ayfe sawoynne dumma dumma ufaysiya atakilte ayfey nu karen kumis. Ta siiquwaw! Ha ayfetape teeridaysanne oorathi maxidaysa new wothas.
SOL 8:1 Ne taw ta aaye dhanthi dhammida ta isha gididaako aybe! Ta nena ogen demmada yeeridaako, tana oonika borennashin.
SOL 8:2 Taani nena kaalethada, tana tamaarsida ta aaye soo gelsarkinashin. Mal7iya Oromaane gum7ethaanne lo77iya woyne ushsha ta nena yan ushsharkina.
SOL 8:3 Tana ne haddirsa kushey borkotisees, ne ushacha kushey tana qoommes.
SOL 8:4 Hinteno, Yerusalaame geela7oto, ta siiqoy ba wode dendana gakanaw, koyrottidi hinte iya denthonaada hadara gayis.
SOL 8:5 Ba siiquwa hashen zempada, mela biittafe yaara hanna oonee? Beni ne aayiya nena iqetada yelida, apile mithaa garsan ne zin7idashin, nena ta barkisas.
SOL 8:6 Merina siiquwan tana ne wozanan attama; ne qesiyan maatameda ta xalaala oyka. Siiqoy hayqo mela mino; qanaatey si7oole mela iita; iya lacoy Xoossaa tama laco mela.
SOL 8:7 Daro haathi siiqo tama toysanaw danda7enna; di7oyka meeccidi efanaw danda7enna. Asi siiqo shammanaw baw de7iya ubbaa immikoka, siiqoy miishen shametonna gisho, asi iya kadhees.
SOL 8:8 Dhanthi tiran uttiboona micha nuus de7awusu; azini iyo oychiko, nu iw ay oothanee?
SOL 8:9 Iya gimbe dirsi gidiyako, nuuni I bolla adussa bira gimbe gimbana; iya dirsa penge gidiyako ziga ibithe medhana.
SOL 8:10 Taani dirsa gimbe; ta dhanthay gimbe bolla de7iya shako mela; taani ta siiquwara de7iya wode I tanan ufaytees.
SOL 8:11 Solomones Ba7aal-Hamoonan woyne gadey de7ees; he woyne gadiya une ootheysatas immis. Kera ekidaysati ayfiya gisho, issoy issoy mukulu bira iyaw ehoosona.
SOL 8:12 Shin taw ta buzo woyne gadey de7ees; Solomone, neeni mukulu bira eka; une ekidi ootheysati nam7u xeetu bira eko.
SOL 8:13 Neno, atakiltiya giddon de7iya ta siiqe, ne laggeti ne qaala si7anaw koyoosona; ne qaala tanaka sissa.
SOL 8:14 Ta siiquwaw, taako elle ya! shitto maatay doliya dereta bollara, gupiya gen7e woyko woshi7e marada hana.
ISA 1:1 Ooziyani, Iyo7atami, Akaazinne Hizqiyaasi Yihudan kaalli kaallidi kawotida wode Amoxe na7ay Isayaasi Yihudabaanne Yerusalaameba be7ida qoncethay haysa.
ISA 1:2 Saloto si7ite; sa7aw hayza si7a; Goday haysada yaagees; “Ta nayta yelada dichas; shin enti taw makallidosona.
ISA 1:3 Boori ba godaa erees; hareyka bana haaridaysa zadaluwa erees. Shin Isra7eeley erenna; ta asay akeekenna.
ISA 1:4 Hinteno, nagarancho kawotethato, bala ooson deexidaysato, iitaa oothiya yeletethato, tuna oosos imetida nayto, Godaa aggidaysato, hintena ayye! Isra7eele Geeshshaa kadhideta; iyaw zoko zaarideta.
ISA 1:5 Makalla bolla makalla ayis gujeetii? Ayis zaari zaari shoceteetii? Hinte huuphey hargetis; hinte wozanay daaburis.
ISA 1:6 Huuphe binaanape toho xugunthi gakanaw payyatethi baawa; madunthi, kixinne dhuusi ma7is. Enti giiybookona, woyko meecetidi qashetibookona woyko zayten tiyetidi looxikbookona.
ISA 1:7 “Hinte biittay oxis; hinte katamati taman xuugetidosona. Hinte be7ishin hinte goshsha allagati ekana; imatha asati hinte biitta quu7e kessana.
ISA 1:8 Yerusalaamey woyne gaden de7iya shaqarada, leehe giddon de7iya gaabbadanne morken teqetida katamada hanada attana.
ISA 1:9 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday nuus guutha koche ashshonaako nuuni Soodomenne Gamoora katamaada hananashin” yaagis.
ISA 1:10 Hinteno, Soodome halaqato, Godaa qaala si7ite! Hinteno, Gamoora asaw, nu Xoossa higgiya si7ite!
ISA 1:11 “Hinte yarsho daroy taw ay oothii? Hanno gakanaw hinte taw shiishida urge dorsaanne modho mehe xuussa yarshoy taw gidana. Taani kormata, dorsa urgetanne deeshata suuthan ufaytike.
ISA 1:12 Hinte ta sinthan bentanaw yaa wode ta keethaa dabaaba hinte yedhana mela oone oychiday?
ISA 1:13 Hada yarshuwa eheysa aggite! Hinte cuyisiya ixaaney tana shaattees. Ageena xeeron hinte bonchiya gallasa, Sambaatanne iitatethan hinte shiiqiya shiiquwa taani ixayis.
ISA 1:14 Ageena xeeron hinte bonchiya gallasaanne hinte ba7aale gallasata taani ixas; enti taw tooho gididosona; taani enta tookanaw danda7ike.
ISA 1:15 Hinte kushe miccidi tana woossiya wode taani ta ayfiya hintefe genthana. Hinte kushey suuthan kumida gisho hinte darsi woossikoka taani si7ike.
ISA 1:16 Meecetite; hintena geeshshite; hinte iita oosuwa ta sinthafe diggite; gene hanuwa aggite.
ISA 1:17 Lo77oba ooso tamaarite; xillo pirdaa koyite. Un7etidaysata ashshite; yi7otas eqite; am7etas mootetite” yaagees Goday.
ISA 1:18 “Haayite; ane woli ammanthoos. Hinte nagaray baara biittada zo7ikoka, shachada booxana; suuthada zo7ikoka puutoda booxana.
ISA 1:19 Hinte ero gidi taw kiitetiko biitta anjuwa maana.
ISA 1:20 Shin hinte ixas gidi makalliko, mashshan meetetana” yaagees Goday ba doonan.
ISA 1:21 Ammanetida katamiya waanada layma gidadee? Kase suuretethinne xillotethi I giddon kumis, shin ha77i shempo wodheysati I giddon de7ees.
ISA 1:22 Ne biray baltis; ne mal7o woyney haathan yeletis.
ISA 1:23 Hinte halaqati makallanchotanne kayso lagge gididosona; enti ubbay wodhaafe doseysatanne kushe xeelleyisata. Yi7otas suure pirdokona; am7eta waasuwa si7okona.
ISA 1:24 Hessa gisho, Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay, Isra7eele Wolqaamay, haysada yaagees; “Ha77i taani ta morketa bolla ta hanquwa gussana; taara eqeteyisata halo keyana.
ISA 1:25 Taani ta kushiya ne bolla zaarana; ne baltetha geeshshana; ne tunatetha ubbaa neepe diggana.
ISA 1:26 Taani beniysada ne halaqata, koyroysada ne zoranchota denthana. Hessafe guye, neeni ammanetida biitta; xillotetha Katama geetetana” yaagees.
ISA 1:27 Xiyooney suure pirdan, banta nagara paaxeysatika xillotethan wozetana.
ISA 1:28 Shin makallanchotinne nagaranchoti issife meqana; Godaa aggeysati dhayana.
ISA 1:29 Hinte ufaytida yarsho wolan yeellatana; hinte doorida kooran kawuyana.
ISA 1:30 Hinte haythi qoqofetidi wurida woladanne haathi dhayida atakilte bessada gidana.
ISA 1:31 Bana mino gey buuxa gidana; iya oosoyka pol7u gidi to7iya tama gidana; enti issife xuugetana; he tama toysana asi baawa.
ISA 2:1 Amoxe na7ay Isayaasi Yihudabaanne Yerusalaameba be7idaysi haysa.
ISA 2:2 Wursetha gallasatan Godaa keethay keexetida zumay, zumata ubbaafe dhoqu gidi bentana; zuma ubbaafe bollara dhoqu gaana. Kawotethati ubbay iyako baana.
ISA 2:3 Higgey Xiyoonepe, Godaa qaalay Yerusalaamepe keyiya gisho, daro asay yidi, “Ane haayite! Godaa zumako, Yayqooba Xoossa keethaako keyoos. Nuuni iya ogiyan baana mela I nuna ba ogiya tamaarsana” yaagana.
ISA 2:4 I kawotethata giddon pirdana; daro asata palama shaakana. Enti banta mashshaa marasha, banta toora baaca kessana. Kawotethati kawotethata bolla mashsha denthokona; hizape enti ola timirte tamaarokona.
ISA 2:5 Hinteno, Yayqooba kochato, haayite! Ane Godaa poo7uwan hemetoos.
ISA 2:6 Godaw, ne asaa, Yayqooba kochata aggadasa. Enti doloha bagga asaa Bitaaninne Filisxeeme asaa murunnuwan kumidosona; allaga asaara issifidosona.
ISA 2:7 Enta biittan birinne worqey kumis; enta miishiyas zawi baawa. Enta biittan pari kumis; enta para gaariyas zawi baawa.
ISA 2:8 Enta biittan eeqi kumidosona; enti banta kushe oosuwa goyinnoosona.
ISA 2:9 Hessa gisho, asa ubbay tooshettananne kawuyana. Enta nagaraa atto goopa.
ISA 2:10 Godaa daganthuwafenne yashshiya bonchuwafe attanaw zaallako biite; biitta giddon qosetite!
ISA 2:11 Otoranchoti kawuyana; ceeqeteysati guuxana; he gallas Godaa xalaali dhoqu dhoqu gaana.
ISA 2:12 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, issi gallas otoranchota, ceeqeteysatanne bantana dhoqu dhoqu ootheyisata kawushana.
ISA 2:13 Adussa Libaanose zigatanne Baasane wola ubbaa dhaysana;
ISA 2:14 Dhoqa deretanne zumata dembayana.
ISA 2:15 Katamaa naagiya adussa shakotanne mino dirsa gimbeta ziqi oothana.
ISA 2:16 Goday gitanne lo77o markabeta haathan mitisana.
ISA 2:17 Asa otoroy ziqi gaana; iya ceeqetethay dhayana. He gallas Godaa xalaali dhoqu dhoqu gaana.
ISA 2:18 Eeqa ubbay polo dhayana.
ISA 2:19 Goday biitta qaathanaw dendiya wode iya daganthuwafenne iya yashshiya bonchuwafe attanaw asay shucha gongoloninne biitta ollan qosetana.
ISA 2:20 He gallasay asay goyinnanaw medhida banta bira misiletanne banta worqa misileta girotasinne shirshiqotas yeggana.
ISA 2:21 Goday biitta qaathanaw dendiya wode iya daganthuwafenne iya yashshiya bonchuwafe attanaw enti gongolo giddonne shucha za7o giddo baqatana.
ISA 2:22 Hiza shempoy siidhen de7iya, ha hayqiya asan ammanetofite. Asi ay maaddii?
ISA 3:1 Heko, Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay, minjanne maado ubbaa, katha minjanne haatha minja ubbaa Yerusalaamepenne Yihudape diggana.
ISA 3:2 Minotanne olanchota, daynnanne nabiya, biteysanne cima,
ISA 3:3 toora moconanne deriya ayseysa, zoreysa, hiillanchuwanne qara marota ubbaa diggana.
ISA 3:4 Taani yooga nayta enta halaqa oothana; guutha nayti enta haarana.
ISA 3:5 Asay asa bolla, shooroy shooruwa bolla dendidi, issoy issuwa sugana. Na7atethay cima bolla, kadhetidaysi bonchetidaysa bolla dendana.
ISA 3:6 Issi asi ba aawa keethan de7iya ba ishatape issuwa oykidi, “New ma7oy de7ees; neeni nuus halaqa gida; ha laaletida bessaa aawatethan eka” yaagana.
ISA 3:7 He gallas, I ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Taani maaddike; ta son kathi woyko ma7oy baawa; hinte bolla tana shuumopite” yaagana.
ISA 3:8 Yerusalaamey gandigarasu; Yihudi kundanaw matasu; enti banta odaaninne banta oosuwan Godaa bolla dendidi, iya bonchuwa toochidosona.
ISA 3:9 Enta som7oy enta bolla markatees; enti banta nagaraa Soodome asaa mela awaajosona; banta nagaraa qottokona. Enti banta bolla dhayo ehida gisho enta ayye!
ISA 3:10 Enti banta oosuwa ayfiya maana gisho, xillotas lo77o gidana gada oda.
ISA 3:11 Enti banta kushe oosuwa gatiya ekana gishonne dhayoy enta bolla yida gisho iitata ayye!
ISA 3:12 Na7atethati ta asaa un7ethoosona; maccasati enta haaroosona. Ta asaw, hintena kaaletheysati balethoosona; hinte biya ogiyape kare kessoosona.
ISA 3:13 Goday ba araatan uttis; asaa bolla pirdanaw giigetis.
ISA 3:14 Goday deriya cimatanne kaaletheyisata pirdanaw shiishidi, “Ta woyne gadiya dhaysiday hintena; manqotape bonqidaysi hinte son de7ees.
ISA 3:15 Hinte ta asaa ayis tincherethetii? Manqota som7uwa ayis kareethetii?” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ISA 3:16 Goday, “Xiyoone maccasati otortidosona; banta qoodhiya adussidi, banta ayfiyan qam7otoosona; banta hemethaa laammidi, banta toho albuwa giirsishe hemetoosona.
ISA 3:17 Hessa gisho, Goday Xiyoone maccasa huuphiya dhuusan kunthana; Goday enta huuphiya bo77ayana” yaagees.
ISA 3:18 He gallas Goday Xiyoone maccasa alleeqota, hessika, toho albuwa, shaashiya, qoodhe worqaa,
ISA 3:19 haytha worqa, kushe ambaare, som7o kama,
ISA 3:20 huuphe kama, qese santhalaata, dancuwa, shittuwa, gozdda,
ISA 3:21 siidhe worqa, biradhe migiduwa,
ISA 3:22 koyse ma7uwa, adussa ma7uwa, kaaba, borsa,
ISA 3:23 mastootiya, liinuwa, huuphe alleeqota, sharbiya ubbaa entafe ekana.
ISA 3:24 Shitto gisho xinqo, danco gisho wodoro, goofare gisho bo77a, koyse ma7o gisho kayo ma7o, lo77otetha gisho beeta gidana.
ISA 3:25 Ne asati mashshan, ne olanchoti olan hayqana.
ISA 3:26 Xiyoone pengeti yeekananne zeleelana; kayotada sa7an uttida maccasada hanana.
ISA 4:1 He gallas laapun maccasati issi adde oykidi, “Nuuni nu kathi maana; nu ma7o ma7ana. Ne sunthan xeegetana mela oothada nu kawusha nuupe diggarkii?” yaagidi woossana.
ISA 4:2 He wode Godaa tashey, lo77ananne bonchetana; attida Isra7eele asaas biitta kathay ceeqonne boncho gidana.
ISA 4:3 Xiyoonen attidaysati, Yerusalaamen dhayope kessi ekidaysatinne de7os xaafetidaysati geeshshata geetetana.
ISA 4:4 Goday Xiyoone maccasa qita meeccana; ba pirdaaninne ba ayyaana taman suutha guso Yerusalaamepe diggana.
ISA 4:5 Goday Xiyoone zumaa bollanne yan shiiqiya ubbaa bolla gallas shaara cuyanne qamma tama laco medhana; iya boncho ubbaa bolla kama gidana.
ISA 4:6 I, gallasa mishape ashshiya kuyanne uushopenne irape qosetiya besse gidana.
ISA 5:1 Ta dosiya addiya woyne gadiyaba, siiqo yethi yexana. Taani dosiya addiyas, aradda zuma bolla iyaw woyne gadey de7ees.
ISA 5:2 Biitta bookidi, shuchaa qori kessidi, lo77o woyne tokis. Naago shako iya giddon shakis; woyniya gum7iya bessaa giigisis. Hessafe guye, lo77o ayfe ayfana gidi naagis; shin caala ayfe ayfis.
ISA 5:3 “Hinteno, Yerusalaamen de7eysato, hinteno Yihuda asaw, taapenne ta woyne gadiya giddon de7iya odaa ane pirdite.
ISA 5:4 Taani ta woyne gadiyas oothidaysafe haraa ay oothanabay attidee? Lo77o ayfe ayfana gada naagas, shin ayis caala ayfe ayfidee?
ISA 5:5 Ha77i taani ta woyne gadiya bolla oothanaba hintew odana. Taani iya dirsaa diggana; woyney dhayanaada oothana. Taani gimbiya laallana; woyne gadey yedhetana.
ISA 5:6 Taani he gadiya quu7e oothana; woyney xintetenna, harmetenna. He bessan kinchoteynne agunthi dolana; Iri iya bolla bukonna mela taani shaara kiittana” yaagis.
ISA 5:7 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa woyne gadey Isra7eele asaa. I, ufaytiya atakilte bessay Yihuda asaa. Enta suure pirdoosona gidi naagis; shin suuthi gussidosona. Xillotethi oothosona gidi naagis; shin un7a waasoy darana mela oothidosona.
ISA 5:8 Bessi dhayin, hinte xalaala biitta bolla daana gakanaw, keethe keetha bolla, gade gade bolla, gujeysato hintena ayye!
ISA 5:9 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada gidi caaqishin ta si7as. “He gita keethati kaysatana; he lo77o keethatan daanaw asi dhayana.
ISA 5:10 Tammu waaxan tokida woyniyape, issi oto gum7etha woyne xalaala ekana. Hospun tammu kilo giraame zerida gadepe, tammanne hospun kilo giraame xalaala ekana” yaagis.
ISA 5:11 Mathoya ushsha koyanaw wonta guura dendeysatanne woyne ushshay xuuggana gakanaw, yan qamisiya asaa ayye!
ISA 5:12 Enta imatuwan maasinqoy, diithi, karaaboy, suusul7eynne woyne ushshi de7ees. Shin enti Godaa oosuwa be7ibookona; iya kushe oosuwa akeekokona.
ISA 5:13 Hiza ta asay akeeka dhayida gisho, di7etana; ayseysati koshan hayqana; asay saamon xuugetana.
ISA 5:14 Duufoy ba gompaa dalgisis; ba doona zawi bayna dooyis. Yerusalaamen de7iya gita asaa, daro asaa, wocameysatanne ufayteyisata mittana.
ISA 5:15 Asi tooshetana; asa koche ubbay kawuyana; otortiya ubbay guuxana.
ISA 5:16 Shin Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, ba suure pirdan dhoqu dhoqu gaana; Xoossaa geeshshatethay iya xillotethan qoncana.
ISA 5:17 He wode dorsati he bessan heemetana; dorsa urgeti laaletida keetha bessatan maana.
ISA 5:18 Cimo wodoron nagara, gaare wodoron iitatethi goocheyisata ayye!
ISA 5:19 “Ane Xoossay elleso! Nuuni be7ana mela ba oosuwa eesoyo! Nuuni erana mela Isra7eele Geeshshay qopida qofaa polo” yaageyisata ayye!
ISA 5:20 Iitaa lo77o, lo77uwa iita; dhumaa poo7o, poo7uwa dhuma; camuwa mal7o, mal7uwa camo geyisata ayye!
ISA 5:21 Bantana cincanne qara geyisata ayye!
ISA 5:22 Woyne ushshan eretida asaanne mathoyiya ushshu walakanaw wozani mino gidida asaa ayye!
ISA 5:23 Qohida uraa xillisanaw wodhaafe ekidi, xillo asaa suure pirdaa geellayeyisata ayye!
ISA 5:24 Enti Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa higgiya ixida gishonne Isra7eele Geeshshaa qaala kadhida gisho tama lacoy kale oykeysadanne buurey taman meetetidi dhayeysada enta xaphoy wooqana. Enta ciishshay baanada laaletidi dhayana.
ISA 5:25 Hessa gisho, Godaa hanqoy iya asaa bolla eexis; iya kushey dendidi, enta dhaysis. Dereti qaaxidosona; hayqida asaa ahay oge bolla buureda hanis. He ubbanka iya hanqoy simmibeenna; iya kushey ha77ika dendida bessan de7ees.
ISA 5:26 Goday haaho son de7iya kawotethatas malla dhoqan essis; sa7aa gaxan de7iya asaa suyqidi xeegis; enti dirgishe puttu goosona.
ISA 5:27 Enta giddon daabureynne dhubetey baawa; entafe issoyka dhiskenna woyko zin7enna. Xeessan dancida saqey birshetena; enta caamma wodoroy duuxenna.
ISA 5:28 Enta tooray qara; enta dongeyka waaxetidi de7ees. Enta parata tohoy qara shucha mela; enta para gaareta gertoy gote mela.
ISA 5:29 Enti gaammo mela guummoosona; wodala gaammo mela gudoosona. Enti sarbuqishe miyaba oykidi, tooki ekidi boosona; entafe wothidi ekey oonika baawa.
ISA 5:30 He wode enti gita abba guunthada Isra7eele bolla guummana. Issi asi he biitta xeelliya wode dhuminne waayey be7ana; poo7oy shaaran mitettana.
ISA 6:1 Kawoy Ooziyani hayqida laythi Goday dhoqa araataninne boncho bessan uttidaysa be7as; iya ma7oy Xoossa keethaa kumis.
ISA 6:2 Surafeela geetetiya kiitanchoti iyape bollara de7oosona; issi issi kiitanchuwas usupun qefeti de7oosona; nam7u qefetan ba som7uwa kammees; nam7u qefetan ba tohuwa kammees; nam7u qefetan piradhees.
ISA 6:3 Enti issoy issuwako, “Geeshshay, geeshshay, geeshshay, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa! Sa7a ubbay iya bonchuwan kumis” yaagosona.
ISA 6:4 Enta girsa waasuwa gaason Xoossa keethaa baasoy qaaxis; Xoossa keethay cuyan kumis.
ISA 6:5 Yaatin, “Taani mettershay tunida asaa giddon de7ayis; ta mettershayka tuna. Taani Kawa, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa ta ayfen be7ida gisho, tana ayye! Ta dhayas!” yaagas.
ISA 6:6 He kiitanchotape issoy yarsho bessaafe bonqo tama qaphera ekidi piradhishe taako yis.
ISA 6:7 Bonqo taman ta mettersha bochidi, “Heko; ha bonqo tamay ne mettershay bochida gisho ne naaqoy neepe kichis; ne nagaray atto geetetis” yaagis.
ISA 6:8 Hessafe guye Goday, “Oona kiitto? Nuus oone baanay?” yaagishin si7as. Taani, “Heko, tana kiitta, taani baana” yaagas.
ISA 6:9 Goday taako, “Bada ha asaa, ‘Hinte sissi si7eeta, shin akeekeketa; hinte xeelleta, shin demmeketa’ ” yaagada oda.
ISA 6:10 Kaallidika, “Ha asaa wozanaa muumisa; enta haythaa tullisa; enta ayfiya gooza. Hessi hanonna ixiko, enti banta ayfiyan be7idi, banta haythan si7idi, banta wozanan akeekidi, taako simmana; zaaridi paxana” yaagis.
ISA 6:11 Taani, “Abeeti Godaw, hessi hananay awude gakanaasee?” yaagas. I zaaridi, “Katamati laaletana gakanaw, keethati kaysa gidana gakanaw, biittay polo dogetana gakanaw;
ISA 6:12 asaa haaho bessi yeddana gakanawunne biittay asi bayna mela biitta gidana gakanaasa.
ISA 6:13 Tammu asaape issi asi biitta bolla attiko, ika dhayana. Qanxin attida wolanne caca duruma mela gidana; he durumay geeshsha koche gidana” yaagis.
ISA 7:1 Ooziyana na7ay Iyo7atama na7ay Akaazi, Yihudan kawotida wode Araame kawoy Razininne Isra7eele kawoy Ramala na7ay Faaquhey Yerusalaame olanaw yidosona; shin xoonanaw danda7ibookona.
ISA 7:2 Araame biittay Efreema biittara issife olas caaqidaysa Yihuda kawoy si7ida wode, woran de7iya mithaa carkoy qaatheysada, Akaaza wozanaynne asaa wozanay dagaman qaaxis.
ISA 7:3 Goday Isayaasako, “Neeranne ne na7aa Sheer-Yasuubara Akaazara gahetanaw biite; hinte iya ma7o meecciya goshshaako efiya ogiya matan qommo baggan de7iya haatha olaa wursethan hinte iya demmana.
ISA 7:4 Iyaw haysada yaagada oda; ‘Naageta; wopu ga; yayyofa. Ha nam7u kawoti tamape attidi cuyaa duruma mela gidiya gisho, Araame kawa Razinanne Ramala na7aa hanquwas yayyofa; ne wozanay dagammofo.’
ISA 7:5 Araame biittay, Efreema asaaranne Ramala na7aara ne bolla iitabaa maqetidosona.”
ISA 7:6 Enti “Ane Yihuda olidi oykoos; iya mentherethidi nu giddon shaaki ekidi, Xabeela na7aa kawothana yaagosona” yaaga.
ISA 7:7 Gidoshin, Ubbaa Haariya Goday, “Ha enta maqoy minnenna; enta zoretay poletenna.
ISA 7:8 Damasqoy Araame huuphe; kawoy Razini Damasqo huuphe. Usupun tammanne ichashu laytha giddon Efreemi laaletidi kawotethi gidonna attana.
ISA 7:9 Efreema huuphey Samaariya; Ramala na7ay, Faaquhey Samaariya huuphe. Hinte, hinte ammanuwan minnonna ixiko, eqanaw danda7eketa” yaagees.
ISA 7:10 Qassika Goday Akaazako,
ISA 7:11 “Bolla saluwape woyko garsa sa7aape Goday, ne Xoossay new issi malla immana mela oycha” yaagis.
ISA 7:12 Shin Akaazi, “Oychike; oychada Godaa paacike” yaagis.
ISA 7:13 Yaatin, Isayaasi, “Hinteno, Dawita soo asaw, si7ite! Hinte asa danda7a paaceysi ay guuxin, qassi ta Xoossa danda7a paacetii?
ISA 7:14 Hessa gisho, Goday ba huuphen hintew malla immana; geela7iya qanthatada adde na7a yelana; iya sunthaaka Amanu7eela gada xeegana.
ISA 7:15 I, iitaa ixonne lo77o dooro eriya wode meqa maathinne oysi maana.
ISA 7:16 Shin na7ay iita ixonne lo77uwa dooro eranaape sinthe, neeni yayiya nam7u kawota biittati baysatana.
ISA 7:17 Efreemi Yihudape shaaketoosape doomin haniboonna meto wode Goday ne bolla, ne asaa bollanne ne aawa soo asaa bolla ehana; I ehanayka Asoore kawa” yaagis.
ISA 7:18 He gallas Goday, haaho shaafa gaxan de7iya Gibxe udunxetanne Asoore mathata suyqidi xeegana.
ISA 7:19 Yaatin, enti ubbay yidi, mela biitta zangaaran, shucha gongolon, agunthi de7iya buureninne haatha ollatan uttana.
ISA 7:20 He gallas Goday Efraxiisa shaafa hefintha baggafe garxida shiggiriyan, Asoore kawan, hinte huuphiya buluusana; hinte ikisiyanne hinte buuchaa meedana.
ISA 7:21 He gallas issi asas issi miizinne nam7u deesha xalaali attana.
ISA 7:22 Gidoshin, enta maathay daro gidiya gisho I meqa maathi ustana; he biittan attida asa ubbay meqa maathinne eessi maana.
ISA 7:23 He gallas issi mukulu biran washetiya mukulu woyne tohoti de7iya bessa ubban kinchoteynne agunthi dolana.
ISA 7:24 Biitta ubban kinchoteynne agunthi kumida gisho, asay yaa biya wode donge oykidi baana.
ISA 7:25 Kase konten oothida zumatan ha77i kinchoteynne agunthi kumida gisho yayyidi, issi asika yaa beenna. Shin meheynne dorsi heemetiya bessi gidana.
ISA 8:1 Goday taako, “Gita saleeda ekada, ‘Di7anaw ellesa! Bonqanaw dirga!’ yaagada nabbabetiya pidalen xaafa.
ISA 8:2 Kahiniya Urayanne Baraka na7aa Zakariyasa ammanetiya marka oothada taani xeegana” yaagis.
ISA 8:3 Hessafe guye, taani nabe gidida ta machera aqas; iya qanthatada adde na7a yelasu. Goday taako, “Iya suntha, ‘Mahaar-Shalal-Hash-Baaz’ yaagada xeega.
ISA 8:4 Na7ay, ‘Abbo, immo’ gidi xeessi eranaape sinthe Asoore kawoy, Damasqo duretethaanne Samaariya shaluwa ekidi baana” yaagis.
ISA 8:5 Qassika Goday taako haysada yaagis.
ISA 8:6 “Ha asay loddara goggiya Salihoome haatha ixidi, Razinanne Ramala na7aa ufaytidi ekidosona.
ISA 8:7 Hessa gisho, Goday minonne daro gidida Efraxiisa haatha, Asoore kawa, iya olanchotara ehana hanees. I haathi kixidi kumeysada gaxaa ubbaa ma7idi goggana.
ISA 8:8 Di77ishe Yihuda gelana; kixay qoodhe gakanaw kumidi yaara kanthana.” Abeeti Amanu7eela, iya qefiya micethay ne biitta ubbaa ma7is.
ISA 8:9 Hinteno kawotethato, issife olas shiiqite, shin hinte dhayana. Haaho biittan de7iya asato, si7ite; olas giigite; shin hinte liiqana! Ee, olas giigite; hinte wurana.
ISA 8:10 Xoossay nuura de7iya gisho, olas maqetite, shin hinte maqoy kanthenna; halchite, shin hinte halchoy halana.
ISA 8:11 “Goday ba mino kushiya ta bolla wothidi, ta ha asaa ogiyan boonna mela taw minthidi odis.
ISA 8:12 Ha asaa maqo ubbaa maqo goopite; enti yayyiyaba Yayyofite; dagammopite.
ISA 8:13 Hinte geeshshi gaanaw bessey Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa; iyaw yayyanawunne dagammanaw bessees.
ISA 8:14 I, geeshsha bessi gidana; shin Yihudasinne Isra7eeles I, dhube shuchinne kundisiya zaalla gidana. Yerusalaamen de7iya asaas I gitenne xihe gidana.
ISA 8:15 Entafe daroti dhubetana; kundidi me77ana; xihen oyketidi di7etana” yaagis.
ISA 8:16 Ta odeysa naaga; ta tamaareta giddon higgiya attama.
ISA 8:17 Taani ba som7uwa Yayqooba zerethafe genthiya Godaa naagana; iyan ammanetana.
ISA 8:18 Tananne taw Goday immida nayta be7ite. Nuuni Xiyoone deriyan de7iya Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaape Isra7eele asaas mallanne malaata.
ISA 8:19 “Suyqishenne kalkashishe odiya marotanne moytilleta oychite” yaagidi hintena zoriya asay de7oosona. De7on de7eysatas hayqidaysata oycheysafe asay banta Xoossaa oychanaw bessennee?
ISA 8:20 Higgiyanne Godaa marka si7ite! He asati ha qaalada haasayonna ixiko entaw sa7i wontenna.
ISA 8:21 Asay waayetishenne koshatishe biitta bolla toylatana. Enti koshatida wode yilotidi, pude salo xeellidi banta kawanne banta Xoossaa baaddana.
ISA 8:22 Sa7aa duge xeelliya wode waaye, dhumanne yashshiya caagana be7ana; enti sakana dhuman holetana.
ISA 9:1 Gidoshin, waayetidaysatas hizape guye dhumenna. Beni wode Goday Zabloona biittanne Niftaaleme biitta kawushis. Shin sinthafe Medetiraane Abbaa ogiyan de7iya biittanne Yordaanose shaafape hefinthan de7iya Ayhude gidonna asay de7iya Galila biitta I bonchana.
ISA 9:2 Dhuman hemetiya asay wolqaama poo7o be7is; qassi hayqo dhuman de7eysatas poo7oy poo7is.
ISA 9:3 Neeni kawotethaa darsadasa; enta ufaysaa gujadasa. Asi kathi shiishiya wode ufayteysada woyko di7uwa shaakidi ekiya wode ufayteysada ne sinthan ufaytana.
ISA 9:4 Neeni Midiyaame biitta xoonidaysada enta deexo qambara, enta gannas giigida xam7anne enta un7etheyisata gumba menthadasa.
ISA 9:5 Olanchota caammaynne suuthan munuqetida ma7o ubbay taman xuugetana; tamas oysetho gidana.
ISA 9:6 Nuus na7i yeletis! Adde na7i nuus imetis! Kawotetha maati iya hashiyan gidana; iya sunthay, “Malaalisiya Zorancho, Wolqaama Xoossa, Merinaa Aawa, Sarotethaa Halaqaa” geetetana.
ISA 9:7 Iya kawotethaa dalgatethaasinne iya sarotethaas zawi baawa. Hachife doomidi, merinaa gakanaw suure pirdaaninne xillotethan minthanawunne essanaw Dawita araataninne iya kawotethan I kawotana. Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa qanaatey haysa oothana.
ISA 9:8 Goday Yayqooba zeretha bolla pirda qaala kiittin, Isra7eele kawotethaa bolla wodhis.
ISA 9:9 Efreema asayinne Samaare katamaa asay haysa oothiday Godaa gideysa erishe, otoroninne ceeqon,
ISA 9:10 “Xuubepe keexetida keethati laaletidosona; shin nu zaaridi masetida shuchan keexana; boobba mithati qanxetidosona; shin nu enta bessan zigata laammana” yaagidosona.
ISA 9:11 Shin, Xoossay Rasoona morketa minthana; enta bolla ehana; entara eqetiya morketa enta bolla denthethis.
ISA 9:12 Dolohape Araameta, wulohape Filisxeemeta denthin, enti banta doona dooyidi, Isra7eele mittidosona. He ubban Godaa hanqoy simmibeenna; iya kushey dendida bessan de7ees.
ISA 9:13 Gidoshin, asay bantana shocidaysako simmibokona; Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa koybookona.
ISA 9:14 Hessa gisho, issi gallas Goday Isra7eelepe huuphenne goynaa, zamba daashshanne maqa qanxana.
ISA 9:15 Cimatinne bonchetidaysati huuphe; wordo tamaarsiya nabeti goyna.
ISA 9:16 Ha asaa kaaletheysati balethoosona; enta kaalleysatika baloosona.
ISA 9:17 Hessa gisho, Goday enta na7atethatan ufaytenna; yi7o naytasinne am7etas qadhetenna. Asi ubbay iitanne Xoosse eronnaysa gidana; ubbay ba doonan iitabaa odetees. He ubban Godaa hanqoy simmibeenna; iya kushey dendida bessan de7ees.
ISA 9:18 Tami kinchotenne agunthi meysada iitatethi xuuggees; siketida wori xuugetin, cuyay tuussada keyeysada keyees.
ISA 9:19 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa hanquwan biittay xuugetana; asika tama oysethiyaba gidana; oonika ba ishaa ashshanaw qopenna.
ISA 9:20 Enti ushacha baggara bonqana, shin koshatana; enti haddirsa baggara maana, shin kallokona; enti banta yelida nayta maana.
ISA 9:21 Minaasey Efreema, Efreemika Minaase maana; enti issife gididi Yihuda biitta morkana. He ubban Godaa hanqoy simmibeenna; iya kushey dendida bessan de7ees.
ISA 10:1 Iita higgenne un7ethiya awaajo kesseyisata ayye!
ISA 10:2 Hessan enti manqota, am7etanne yi7ota pirdaa geellayosona; am7etanne yi7ota aquwa bonqoosona.
ISA 10:3 I, haaho biittafe yaa metuwan seeriya wode hinte waananee? Maado demmanaw oodeko baqatanee? Hinte shaluwa awun qottanee?
ISA 10:4 Hinte di7etida asaara gooshetana; hayqida asaa giddon zin7ana. He ubban Godaa hanqoy simmibeenna; iya kushey dendida bessan de7ees.
ISA 10:5 Goday haysada yaagees; “Ta yiluwas pirconne ta hanquwas xam7a gidida Asoore biitta ayye!
ISA 10:6 Enta shaluwa di77anaadanne bonqanaada; oge urqada enta yedhanaada Xoosse eronna kawotethaa bolla taani Asoore kiittana; tana hanqethida asaa bolla iya yeddana.
ISA 10:7 Shin Asoore kawoy haysa halchibeenna; iya wozanay haysa qopibeenna. I qopiday daro kawotethata dhaysanaasa.
ISA 10:8 Hessa gisho, I yaagidi ceeqetees; ‘Ta toora moconati ubbay kawota gidokonaayee?’
ISA 10:9 Kalinoy Karkamisha katamaa mela gidenneyee? Hamaati Arfada katamaa mela gidenneyee? Samaarey Damasqo katamaa mela gidenneyee?
ISA 10:10 Yerusalaameninne Samaaren de7iya eeqatape dariya eeqata goyinniya kawotethata seeranaw taani ta kushiya yeddas.
ISA 10:11 Taani Samaare katamaa bollanne iya eeqa misileta bolla oothidaysada Yerusalaame katamaa bollanne iya eeqa misileta bolla oothikinaayee?” yaagis.
ISA 10:12 Goday Xiyoone deriya bollanne Yerusalaame bolla ba oosuwa ubbaa polidaape guye, Asoore kawa iya otoruwasinne ceequwas iya seerana.
ISA 10:13 Asoore kawoy haysada yaagees: “Ta kushe minotethan, ta cincatethaaninne ta akeekan haysa oothas. Taani kawotethata giddon de7iya zawata shoddas; enta shaluwa bonqas; ta wolqan kawotethata araatape wodhisas.
ISA 10:14 Asi kafo keethan kushe yeddeysada taani kawotethaa shaluwan ta kushiya yeddas. Qassi dogetida phuuphuleta shiisheysada taani biitta ubbaa shiishas. Ba qefiya qaathiday woyko doona phuqiday woyko waassiday issoyka baawa” yaagis.
ISA 10:15 Kalti baara qanxiya addiya bolla dendanaw danda7ii? Woyko magaazey banan go7etiya addiya bolla otoranaw danda7ii? Kushey denthonna xam7i bana baw denthii? Guufey oykiya asi bayna baw hemetii?
ISA 10:16 Hessa gisho, Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay, iya mino olanchota bolla gilqisiya harge yeddana. Iya bonchuwa laxo tami maana.
ISA 10:17 Isra7eele Poo7oy tama gidana; enta Geeshshay laco gidana. Iya agunthanne iya kinchotiya issi gallas xuuggananne maana.
ISA 10:18 Hargey ase gilqiseysada Goday ba wora mitha bonchuwanne ba aradda biitta bonchuwa dhaysana.
ISA 10:19 Woran attiya mithay daro guuthi gidiya gisho, hari attoshin guutha na7ika taybidi wursana.
ISA 10:20 He wode Isra7eelepenne Yihudape attida guuthati bantana shocidaysan gidonashin, tuma Godan, Isra7eele Geeshshan zempana.
ISA 10:21 Attida Yihuda asay Wolqaama Xoossaako simmana.
ISA 10:22 Neno Isra7eele, neeni abba gaxan de7iya shafiya mela darikoka, attida guuthata xalaali simmana. Xillotethi kumida dhayoy iya asaas awaajetis.
ISA 10:23 Ee, Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay sa7a ubbaa bolla ehanaw qopida dhayuwa ehana.
ISA 10:24 Hessa gisho, Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay haysada yaagees: “Xiyoonen de7iya ta asaw, Gibxeti oothidaysada Asooreti hintena xam7an shociya wodenne banta gumba hinte bolla denthiya wode yayyofite.
ISA 10:25 Guutha wodepe guye, taani hinte bolla hanqetidaysa aggana; hessafe guye, ta hanqoy enta dhaysanaw dendana” yaagees.
ISA 10:26 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday Oreeba shuchaa matan Midiyaameta shocidaysada enta lisson shocana. I Gibxen oothidaysada ba xam7a abba bolla denthana.
ISA 10:27 He gallas, iya toohoy hinte hashiyape wodhana; iya qambaray hinte morgefe kichana. Hinte ordida gisho qambaray meqana.
ISA 10:28 Morkiya wotaadarati Gaye katamaa gelidosona; Migroonara kanthidosona; banta ola miishiya Mikmaasa wothidosona.
ISA 10:29 Enti ogiyara kanthi aadhidi, Geeban aqidosona. Raman de7iya asay kokoridosona; Gib7an, kawa Saa7ola kataman de7iya asay baqatidosona.
ISA 10:30 Galima asaw, waaso goochite! Laysha asaw, si7ite! Anatoota asaw, oysha zaarite!
ISA 10:31 Madimana asay baqatidosona; Gebima asay banta shempuwas qosetidosona.
ISA 10:32 Morkiya wotaadarati hachi Nooban de7oosona; enti Xiyoone zuma bolla eqidi, banta kushiya qaathidi, Yerusalaame katamaa babisoosona.
ISA 10:33 Heko, Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay, tasheta gita wolqan shaqana; aduqida mithati qanxetana; dhoqa gidaysati kawuyana.
ISA 10:34 Goday siketida wora kallotana gakanaw qanxana; Libaanosey Wolqaamaa sinthan kundana.
ISA 11:1 Isseye durumay aacana; iya xaphuwape ayfiya tashey keyana.
ISA 11:2 Godaa Ayyaanay iya bolla shempana; cincatethaanne akeeka Ayyaanay, zoriyanne wolqaa Ayyaanay, eratethaanne Godaas yayiya Ayyaanay, iya bolla shempana.
ISA 11:3 Godaas yayyidi ufaytees; ba ayfey be7idaban coo pirdenna; woyko ba haythay si7idaban coo kuuyenna.
ISA 11:4 Shin I, manqotas xillotethan pirdana; sa7an de7iya metootanchotas suuretethan kuuyana. I ba inxarsaa xam7an sa7aa shocana; ba doona shempuwan iitata wodhana.
ISA 11:5 Xillotethi iya xeessa danco gidana; ammanetethi iya miyaas saqe gidana.
ISA 11:6 Suudhumey dorsa marara issife daana; maahey deesha marara issife zin7ana. Mari gaammo butalera issife hemetana; guutha na7i enta heemmana.
ISA 11:7 Miizinne babanthi issife heemetana; enta marati issife zin7ana; gaammoy boorada kale maana.
ISA 11:8 Dhammiya na7i shoosha ollan kaa7ana; dhanthi duuxida na7i wodhiya shoosha ollan ba kushiya yeddana.
ISA 11:9 Ta geeshsha zumaa bolla oonika qohetenna woyko dhayenna. Abbi haathan kumeysada sa7i Godaa eron kumana.
ISA 11:10 He wode Isseye xaphoy asaas malla gidana; kawotetha ubbay iya koyana; I de7iya bessay bonchetana.
ISA 11:11 He gallas Goday attida ba asaa, Asoorepe, Gibxefe, Phatroosape, Tophefe, Elaamape, Sana7oorepe, Hamaatapenne yuushoy abban teqetida biittafe nam7antho ehanaw ba kushiya zaaridi yeddana.
ISA 11:12 I kawotethatas malla dhoqu oothidi denthana; Isra7eelepe laaletidaysata issife gathana; Yihudape sa7aa oyddu baggan zeretidaysata shiishana.
ISA 11:13 Hessafe guye, Efreema qanaatey iyape kichana; Yihuda morketethay iyape qanxetana. Efreemi Yihuda qanaatenna; Yihudi Efreema morkenna.
ISA 11:14 Enti wuloha baggan de7iya Filisxeeme biitta bolla gupi wodhana; enti doloha baggan de7iya asaa bonqana. Enti Edoome bollanne Moo7abe bolla banta kushiya wothana; Amooneti entaw haaretana.
ISA 11:15 Goday Gibxe matan de7iya Zo7o Abbaa melisana; ba melsiya carkuwara ba kushiya Efraxiisa shaafa bolla qaathana. Yaatidi asay mela bessaara pinnana mela laapun guutha shaafa kessidi shaakana.
ISA 11:16 Isra7eele asay Gibxe biittafe keyiya wode ogey keydaysada, attida iya asay, Asoore biittafe simmiya ogey keyana.
ISA 12:1 He wode hinte haysada yaagidi yexana. “Godaw, neeni ta bolla hanqetadasa; shin ha77i ne hanquwafe simmadasa. Tana minthethadasa; hessa gisho, taani nena galatayis.
ISA 12:2 Xoossay ta atotetha; taani iyan ammanetayis, yayike. Goday Xoossay, ta wolqaanne yethaa; I ta atotetha” yaagana.
ISA 12:3 Atotetha pultuwafe hinte haathe ufaysan duuqana.
ISA 12:4 He gallas hinte yaagidi yexana: “Godaa galatite! Iya sunthaa xeegite. Iya oosota kawotethata ubbaas odite; I gita gideysa awaajite.
ISA 12:5 Goday gita ooso oothida gisho, iyaw yexite; haysi sa7a ubban ereto.
ISA 12:6 Isra7eele Geeshshay hinte giddon gita gidiya gisho, Xiyoone asaw, ililite, ufaysan yexite!” yaagana.
ISA 13:1 Amoxe na7ay, Isayaasi Goday Babilooneba qoncisin be7idaysi haysa.
ISA 13:2 Aykoy bayna deriya bolla malla essidi, hinte qaala dhoqu oothidi waassite; enti halaqata pengiyara gelana mela wuttite.
ISA 13:3 Taani hanqetidaysata seerana mela ta geeshshata kiittas; ta xoonoy ufaysiya ta wolqaamata xeegas.
ISA 13:4 Daro asay wocameysada deriya huuphiyan de7iya wocamaa si7ite! Qassi kawotethati issife shiiqidi palamiya palama si7ite! Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday olanchota olas giigisis.
ISA 13:5 Godaynne iya hanqo ola miishey biitta ubbaa dhaysanaw haaho biittafe, salo gaxape yoosona.
ISA 13:6 Godaa gallasay matida gisho yeekite! He gallasay Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaa matape dhaysanaw yaana.
ISA 13:7 Hessa gisho, yashshan enta kushey doccana; asa ubbaa wozanay til7ana.
ISA 13:8 Enti dagammana; iqethinne un7etethi enta oykana. Yelo keyida maccasada enti inxaxana. Enti dagammidi issoy issuwa xeellana; enta som7oy bido gidis.
ISA 13:9 Heko biitta baysa kessanawunne iyan de7iya nagaranchota dhaysanaw yiloninne suullida hanqon Godaa gallasay yaana.
ISA 13:10 Salo xoolintotinne xoolinto koceti banta poo7uwa diggana; doliya away dhumana; ageenayka ba poo7uwa immenna.
ISA 13:11 Goday, “Taani ha sa7aa iya iitatethaa gisho, iitataka enta nagara gisho seerana. Taani otoranchota otoruwa shaarana; iitata ceequwa kawushana.
ISA 13:12 Attidaysati walahi bayna worqafe al7o gidana; asa na7i Ofira worqafe aadhidi boncho gidana.
ISA 13:13 Hessa gisho, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa hanquwan, iya hanquwa suulaa gallas, taani salota kokorsana; sa7aaka iya bessaafe qaathana” yaagees.
ISA 13:14 Shankafe baqatiya gaarada woyko heemmiya asi bayna dorsa wudeda asi ubbay ba asaako simmana; ubbay ba biitta baqatana.
ISA 13:15 Bentida oonika cadetana; oyketida oonika mashshan hayqana.
ISA 13:16 Enta guutha nayti enta sinthan busetana; enta keethay bonqetana; enta macheta hara asi iissana.
ISA 13:17 Bira koyonnanne worqan ufaytonna Meedona asaa taani enta bolla denthana.
ISA 13:18 Enta dongey na7atethata wodhana; yooga naytaka maarokona; enta ayfey naytas qadhetenna.
ISA 13:19 Kawotethatas boncho, ba asaas alleeqo gidida Babiloone biitta, Goday Sodoomedanne Gamoorada shiri yeggana.
ISA 13:20 He biittan asi uttenna; woyko yeletaape yeletaa gakanaw yan asi deenna. Arabe asay yan banta dunkaaniya tolokona; dorse heemmeysatika yan banta wudiya heemmokona.
ISA 13:21 Shin bazzo do7ati yan aqana; workanati enta keethaa kumana; guttoti yan daana; yanchoti yan keexana; bazzo deeshati yan gupana.
ISA 13:22 Enta keethatan godarey waassana; enta kawo gadhon workanati boccana. Iya wodey matis; iya gallasayka gam7enna.
ISA 14:1 Goday Yayqoobas qadhetana; Isra7eele zaaridi doorana; enta, enta buzo biittan wothana. Betanchoti entara issifana, Yayqooba soo asaara oyketana.
ISA 14:2 Kawotethati enta, enta biitta ehana. Isra7eele asay entana maccanne adde aylle oothidi Godaa biittan haarana. Enti bantana di7idaysata di7ana; bantana haaridaysata haarana.
ISA 14:3 Goday hintena, hinte un7aafe, metuwapenne hinte haaretida iita aylletethaafe shempisiya wode,
ISA 14:4 hinte Babiloone kawa bolla haysada yaagidi qelqisana. Un7etheysi waanidi aggidee? Iya hanquwa suulay waanidi attidee?
ISA 14:5 Goday kawotethata xam7aanne haareyisata gumba menthis.
ISA 14:6 Enti asaa zawi bayna hanquwan shocidosona; bantana xoonidaysata qanxonna un7ethishe de7idosona.
ISA 14:7 Shin biitta ubbay shempidi de7is; ufaysan yexis.
ISA 14:8 Hari attoshin, Libaanose zigatinne xiiddati kawa kundethan ufaytidi, “Neeni kawuyada kundidaape guye, nuna qanxanaw yey baawa” yaagosona.
ISA 14:9 Neeni yaa wode, Si7ooley nena mokanaw giigis; I kase biitta kaalethida asaa moytilleta, nena sarothana mela denthethees; qassi kase kawo gidida ubbaa enta araatape denthidi essees.
ISA 14:10 Enti ubbay haysada yaagana. “Heko neka nuuda wolqa dhayadasa; nu mela gidadasa.”
ISA 14:11 Kase diithi diixin sabetiya ne bonchoy ha77i Si7oole gelis. Ollathi neeni zin7iya hiixa; guxuney neeni ma7iya afila gidana yaagana.
ISA 14:12 Neno wonta na7aw, guura bakalaw, salope waana kundadii? Neno kawotethata kawushidayso waana qanxetada sa7an wodhadii?
ISA 14:13 Neeni ne wozanan, “Taani salo keyana; ta kawotethaa araata Xoossaa xoolintotape bollara wothana; taani pudeha bagga gaxan shiiqo deriya huuphen uttana.
ISA 14:14 Taani shaarati de7iya dhoqa bessaafe bolla aadhana; taani, tana Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaa daanisana” yaagadasa.
ISA 14:15 Shin neeni Si7oolen, hirki ciimmo ollan duge yegetadasa.
ISA 14:16 Nena be7idaysati, “Biitta qaathidaysi, kawotethata kokorsidaysi,
ISA 14:17 sa7aa biitta bazzo kessidaysi, sa7an de7iya katamata shiri yeggidaysi, ba qasho asata yeddonna ixidaysi haysee?” yaagidi tishshi oothidi xeellana.
ISA 14:18 Kawotethata kawoti ubbay ba duufon duufon bonchon zin7ana.
ISA 14:19 Shin neeni ixetida tasheda ne duufuwape gaxa holettadasa. Ne ahay mashshan hayqida ahaninne ollan de7iya shuchatako duge wodhidaysata ahan kametis. Neeni tohon yedhetida aha mela gidadasa.
ISA 14:20 Neeni ne biitta dhaysida gishonne ne asaa wodhida gisho entara moogetaka. Iitaa sunthay kochay merinaw xeegetofo.
ISA 14:21 Enti dendidi biitta laattonna; sa7a ubbaa katama xalaala oothonna mela enta aawata nagaraa gisho, iya nayta wodhanaw giigisite.
ISA 14:22 Taani “Enta bolla dendana; enta sunthaa, enta kochaanne enta yeletaa Babiloonepe dhaysana.
ISA 14:23 Taani Babiloone quxarey de7iya bessinne haathi eelliya bessi oothana; taani gado piton iya pittana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ISA 14:24 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagidi caaqis: “Taani halchidaysada hanana; taani qopidaysada poletana.
ISA 14:25 Taani Asoore asaa ta biittan mentherethana; ta deriya bolla iya yedhana. Iya qambaray enta bollafe, iya toohoy enta hashiyape kichana” yaagis.
ISA 14:26 Sa7a ubbaas qofetida qofay haysa; kawotethata ubbaa bolla micetida kusheyka haysa.
ISA 14:27 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysa qopida gisho iya digganaw danda7ey oonee? Iya kushey micetis; hessa guye zaaranaw danda7ey oonee?
ISA 14:28 Kawoy Akaazi hayqida laythi odetida qaalay haysa:
ISA 14:29 Hinteno Filisxeeme asaw, hintena shocida xam7ay me77ida gisho ufaytofite. He shoosha kochaafe hasoy keyana; iya kochay qassi xongetiya shooshi gidana.
ISA 14:30 Manqofe manqoti ta qooruwan heemetana; metootanchoti wopu gidi zin7ana. Shin taani ne kochaa koshan wursana; neepe attida guuthata wodhana.
ISA 14:31 Neno pengiyaw, yeeka! Neno katamaw, waassa! Hinteno Filisxeeme asaw, hinte ubbay hirgan til7ite! Pudeha baggafe cuyi keyidi yees; he cugaape duuxidi guye attey baawa.
ISA 14:32 He kawotethay kiitida asatas woygidi zaaranee? Goday Xiyoone keexin, qohetida asay I giddon qosetidi attiya bessi demmis.
ISA 15:1 Moo7abe biittaba Goday odida qaalay haysa: Moo7aben de7iya Era katamaynne Qiira katamay issi qamma laaletidi dhayidosona.
ISA 15:2 Diboonan de7iya asay banta eeqa keethan yeekanaw dhoqa bessi keyidosona. Moo7abe asay Nebosinne Medebaas yeekees. Huuphe ubbay buluusetis; buuchi ubbay meedetis.
ISA 15:3 Oge bolla kayo ma7o ma7oosona; pooqe bollanne dabaaba ubban yeekoosonanne afuthi dharcoosona.
ISA 15:4 Haseboona asaynne Elaala asay waassoosona; enta waasoy Yahaaxa gakanaw si7etees. Hessa gisho, olas dancida Moo7abe wotaadareti banta qaala dhoqu oothidi waassidosona; enta shempoy kokoris.
ISA 15:5 Taani Moo7abes wozanape yeekas; iyan de7iya asay Zo7aarenne Egilaat-Shelisha katamaa baqatis. Enti Luhita ogiyan yeekishe boosona; baggati qassi Horonayma biya ogiyan, banta dhayuwa gisho waaso goochidosona.
ISA 15:6 Namirima haathati melidosona; maatay miccis; aacay shullis; cil7obay aybika baawa.
ISA 15:7 Hessa gisho, enti banta shiishida shaluwanne minja tooki ekidi, Ahaya mithay de7iya zangaarape hefinthi efoosona.
ISA 15:8 Moo7abe heera ubbay waaso xalaala gidis; enta waasoy Eglaamanne Bi7eer-Elime gakanaw si7etees.
ISA 15:9 Dimoona haathati suuthi gididosona; shin, ha77ika taani Dimoona katamaa bolla kaseysafe aadhiya meto ehana. Moo7abepe kessi ekidi baqateyisata bollanne he biittan attidaysata bolla gaammo yeddada wursana.
ISA 16:1 Moo7abe asaw, bazzo biya ogiyan de7iya Seelape urge dorsata imota oothidi, Yerusalaamen de7iya biitta haareysas yeddite.
ISA 16:2 Moo7abe maccasay banta keethafe goodetida kafotada Arnoona shaafa pinniya bessan laaletana.
ISA 16:3 Moo7abe asay Yihuda asaako, “Nuna zorite; nuna nu morketape ashshite; seeta gallasan mitha kuyada hinte kuyaa nu bolla kuyayte. Goodeteyisata qosite; qosetidaysata aathidi immopite.
ISA 16:4 Moo7abepe goodeteysati hinte giddon de7o; enta dhaysanaw koyeysatape qosetidi attiya besse gidite. Enta un7etheysati wuridosona; enta dhayoy attis; otoranchoti biittafe dhayidosona.
ISA 16:5 Hessafe guye, siiqon issi kawotetha araatay eqana; he araatan, Dawita kochaafe issi ammanetiya kawoy uttana. I suuretetha koyana; xillotethaa oothanaw ellesana” yaagana.
ISA 16:6 Yihuda asay, “Moo7abe asay ay mela otoriyako nu enta otoruwa si7ida; enta ceequwanne enta cashshaa si7ida; shin enta otoroy hada” yaagana.
ISA 16:7 Hessa gisho, Moo7abey baw yeeko; asi ubbayka Moo7abes yeeko. Qir-Hereesan hinte de7iya wode mida lo77o kathaa hassayishe yeekite.
ISA 16:8 Haseboona goshshaynne Sebama woyne gadey dhayis. Kawotethata halaqati yedherethida tasheti mela biitta kanthidi Ya7izeera gakidosona; enta aacay daayidi, abba pinnis.
ISA 16:9 Taani Ya7izeera katamaas yeekidaysada Sebama katamaa woynetas yeekayis. Haseboona katamaasine El7aala katamaas, taani ta afuthaa gussayis. Hinte mithaa ayfiyanne hinte bootida kathaa bolla oli dendis.
ISA 16:10 Goshsha gadiyape ufaysinne hashshu guussi eketis. Woyne gadiyan mazmurey yexetenna. Ufaysan woyne gum7iya bessan gum7iya asi baawa; taani gum7eyisata ililsaa dhaysas.
ISA 16:11 Hessa gisho, ta wozanay Moo7abes, ta garsa asatethayka Qir-Hereesas yeekees.
ISA 16:12 Moo7abey ba zumaa bolla keykoka, bana coo daabursees; I woossanaw ba eeqa keethi gelikoka bana aykoka maaddenna.
ISA 16:13 Goday kasetidi Moo7abeba odida qaalay haysa.
ISA 16:14 Shin ha77i Goday, “Une oosancho wodey guutha gideysa mela Moo7abe bonchoynne iya darotethay heedzu laytha giddon wurana. Iyan attiya asay pathonaysatanne wolqi baynayisata gidana” yaagees.
ISA 17:1 Damasqoba Goday haysada yaagees: “Heko, hizape guye Damasqoy katama gidonnoshin, laaletha doore gidana.
ISA 17:2 Aroora katamati asi bayna baysa biitta gidana; yan mehey heemetana; enta yashshiyabay deenna.
ISA 17:3 Efreemape Miixati, Damasqofe kawotethay dhayana; Soorepe attida guuthati Isra7eele asaa bonchuwa mela gidana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ISA 17:4 “He wode Isra7eele bonchoy qaaretana; iya ordetethay gilqana.
ISA 17:5 Isra7eeley, kathi caki ekidi keyida goshsha gade mela gidana; woyko kathi caki simmin kallotida Raafayme zangaara mela gidana.
ISA 17:6 Shamaho qoqofi simmin, xeeran nam7u woyko heedzu ayfeti atteysada woyko issi yangiya bolla oyddu woyko ichashu ayfeti atteysada Isra7eelepe guuthati attana” yaagees Goday Isra7eele Xoossay.
ISA 17:7 He gallas asay bantana medhidaysako, banta ayfiyaka Isra7eele Geeshshaako zaarana.
ISA 17:8 Enti banta kushen giigisida yarsho bessaako xeellokona; Asheera eeqa misiliyas gidin, ixaane cuyisanaw enti banta kushen medhida yarsho bessa bonchokona.
ISA 17:9 He wode Isra7eele asaa gaason Hiwenne Amoore katamati laaletidaysada enta mino katamati laaletana; baysa gidana.
ISA 17:10 Hinte hintena ashshiya Xoossaa dogideta; hinte qoseti attiya zaalla qopibeketa. Hessa gisho, neeni lo77o mithaanne kare biittafe yida lo77o atakiltiya tokikoka,
