ISA 17:11 he gallas enti diccidi gakana mela oothikoka, qassi neeni zerida wontethe enti ciiyakoka neeni ayfe demmaka. Iya bessan paxonna hargenne meto cakana.
ISA 17:12 Heko, abba beetada guummiya daro asaa, qassi wolqaama haathada waassiya kawotethata ayye!
ISA 17:13 Kawotethati daro haathada guummoosona; shin Goday enta seerana. Enti zumaa huuphen de7iya buure carkoy dentheysadanne gotey baana dentheysada enta denthidi haaho bessi laallana.
ISA 17:14 Sa7i qammiya wode enti dagammana; sa7i wontanaape sinthe enti dhayana. Nuna wolqan ekeysatanne bonqeyisata qaaday haysa.
ISA 18:1 Tophe shaafatape hefinthan giiriya qefeti de7iya biitta ayye!
ISA 18:2 He biittay, kiitetiya asata mayre wogolon wothidi Nayle Shaafa bollara kiittees. Hinteno, eeson kiiteteysato, adusenne liiqo asaako, mataninne haahon yashshiya asaako, wolqaamanne xooniya kawotethaako, shaafan enta zaway shaaketida biittako biite.
ISA 18:3 Hinteno, sa7an de7iya ubbato, hinteno, biittan de7eysato, zumaa bolla malli eqiya wode hinte be7ana; moyzey punetiya wode hinte si7ana.
ISA 18:4 Goday taako, “Seeta gallas si77i gidi poo7iya awada, qassi kathi cakiya ageenan, hombiya qamman bentiya aka mela taani si77i gada, ta de7iya bessaafe duge xeellana” yaagis.
ISA 18:5 Kathaa cakiya wodiyape kase, ciishshay qoletidi simmin, woyne teeriya wode oco baacan xeera qanxeysada I he biitta asaa dhaysana.
ISA 18:6 Enti ubbay deriya huuphiyan de7iya, miyaba wochiya kafotasinne do7atas attana. Kafoti balgon, do7ati bonen enta midi shaacana.
ISA 18:7 He wode adussenne liiqo asaape, mataninne haahon yashshiya asaape, wolqaamanne xooniya kawotethaafe, zaway shaafan shaaketida biittafe, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaas imoti Xiyoone Zumaa, iya sunthay de7iya bessaa yaana.
ISA 19:1 Gibxe bolla Goday haysada yaagidi odis: “Heko, Goday eesotiya shaara toggidi, Gibxe yees. Gibxe eeqati iya sinthan kokorana; Gibxe asaa wozanay yashshan til7ana.
ISA 19:2 Gibxe asaa issuwa issuwa bolla denthana. Ishay ishaa bolla, shooroy shooruwa bolla, katamay katamaa bolla, kawotethay kawotethaa bolla dendana.
ISA 19:3 Gibxe asay eesho dhayana; taani enta halchuwa hada oothana. Enti banta eeqata, moytillera odeteyisata, bitanchotanne marota zore oychana.
ISA 19:4 Taani wozana mino gidida Gibxe kawa kushen aathada immana; I enta haarana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ISA 19:5 Nayle Shaafa guuxi guuxi baana; haathayka melana.
ISA 19:6 Dhaway xinqana; Gibxe haathati guuxananne melana; mayreynne maqay shullana;
ISA 19:7 Nayle Shaafa gaxan de7iya cil7obay melana; iya heeran zeretida katha ubbay melananne dhayana.
ISA 19:8 Molo oykeysati kayotana; Nayle shaafan gitenne molo manxaqo yeggiya ubbay yeekananne doccana.
ISA 19:9 Paadetida talbafe liino ma7o ootheysati, bootha ma7o daddiya dorzeti ufaysi qanxana.
ISA 19:10 Piiqeysatinne une oothiya ubbay kayotana.
ISA 19:11 Xo7aane haareysati eeya; Gibxe kawa zoriya cincati pathonna zore zoroosona. Yaatin, hinte Gibxe kawako, “Nuuni cincata nayta; nuuni beni kawota nayta” gaanaw waanidi danda7eetii?
ISA 19:12 Yaatin, ne cinca asati ha77i awun de7oona? Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday Gibxe bolla oothanaw halchidaba ane enti new odonne nena erisonna.
ISA 19:13 Xo7aane haareysati eeyidosona; Mempisa haareysati cimetidosona. Gibxe zoriya gita asati iya balethidosona.
ISA 19:14 Goday enta giddon eeyisiya ayyaana yeddis; enti mathotida asi ba cooshshan gondoreteysada Gibxey ba ooso ubban gondoretana mela oothidosona.
ISA 19:15 Zamboy woyko boozi, zamba tashey woyko mayrey Gibxen oothanabay aybika baawa.
ISA 19:16 He gallas Gibxe asay maccasa mela gidana. Enti Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday enta bolla qaathiya iya kushiya be7idi yashshan kokorana.
ISA 19:17 Yihudi Gibxe yashisana; Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday enta bolla oothanaw qopida qofaa gisho Yihudaba si7iya ubbay yayyana.
ISA 19:18 He gallas Gibxe biittan de7iya ichashu katamati Kanaane qaalan odeteysatanne Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaas ammanetanaw caaqeyisata gidana. He katamatape issoy, “Awa Katama” geetetidi xeegetana.
ISA 19:19 He wode Gibxe biittas gidduwan, Godaas yarsho bessay giigana; qassi Gibxe biitta zawan Godaas tuussi eqana.
ISA 19:20 Hessi Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaas Gibxe biittan mallanne marka gidana. Enti bantana un7etheyisata gisho Godaako waassiya wode entaw ashsheysa kiittidi enta ashshana.
ISA 19:21 He wode Goday Gibxe biittan eretidaysa gidana; Gibxe asay he gallas Godaa erana. Yarshonne katha yarsho eki yidi iya goyinnana. Enti Godaas qangananne banta qangetha gathana.
ISA 19:22 Goday Gibxe biitta shocana; iyo zaaridi pathana. Enti Godaako simmana; I enta woosa si7idi pathana.
ISA 19:23 He gallas Gibxefe Asoore gakanaw dalga ogey keyana; Asoore asay Gibxe, Gibxe asay Asoore simeretana; Gibxe asay Asoore asaara issife goyinnana.
ISA 19:24 He gallas Isra7eeley Gibxeranne Asoorera heedzantho biitta gididi, sa7aas anjo gidana.
ISA 19:25 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday enta haysada yaagidi anjana: “Ta ase gidida Gibxey anjeto; ta kushe ooso gidida Assory anjeto; ta laata gidida Isra7eeley anjeto” yaagana.
ISA 20:1 Asoore kawoy Sargooni kiitida toora moconati yidi, Filisxeeme katamaa gidida Ashdooda olidi oykida laythi,
ISA 20:2 Goday Amoxe na7aa Isayaasa haysada yaagis: “Ne kayo ma7uwa qaara; ne tohuwape caamma kessa” yaagis. Isayaasi Goday gidaysada oothidi kallonne mela tohon hemetis.
ISA 20:3 Yaatin Goday haysada yaagis: “Ta aylley Isayaasi Gibxenne Tophe bolla gakana metuwas malla gidana mela heedzu laythi kallonne mela tohon hemetis.
ISA 20:4 Hessa gisho, Asoore kawoy, Gibxetas yeella gidana mela Gibxefenne Tophefe di7etida na7atethatanne cimata kallonne mela toho laaggidi efana.
ISA 20:5 Tophen ammaneteysatinne Gibxen ceeqeteysati yayyana; yeellatana.
ISA 20:6 He gallas Abbaa gaxan de7iya asay haysada yaagana: ‘Nuna Asoore kawuwape ashshana gidi ufaysi oothidi entako baqatida asaa bolla haysi gakiko, yaatin, nuuni waanidi kessi ekanee?’ yaagana” yaagis.
ISA 21:1 Abbaa matan de7iya bazzuwas odetida qaala. Nagebe gotey mentherethishe yeysada olanchoy bazzofe, dhayo biittafe yees.
ISA 21:2 Taani issi yashshiya qoncethi be7as; aathid immeysi aathidi immees; di77eysi di77ees. Elama keya! Meedona katamaa oyka! Babilooney gathida waayiya taani diggana.
ISA 21:3 Hessa gisho ta asatethay saketis; maccasi eqeteysada taani un7etas. Taani si7iyabay tana kokorsis; taani be7iyabay tana daganthis.
ISA 21:4 Tana biicoyees; yashshan kokoras; taani ufaysi wothida omarsay un7an laametis.
ISA 21:5 Gibira giigisidosona; uttiya soo giigisidosona; maanawunne uyanaw uttidosona. Hinteno halaqato, dendite! Hinte gondalliya quchite!
ISA 21:6 Goday taako haysada yaagis: “Bada haniyaba wochidi new odiya asi wotha.
ISA 21:7 Parati gaare goochiya wode, harenne gimale toggeyisata be7iya wode, loythidi xeello; akeekidi be7o” yaagis.
ISA 21:8 Wocheysi, “Godaw, gallasinne qamma paci bayna ta shakuwa bolla uttada naagayis.
ISA 21:9 Heko, nam7a nam7a gididi para gaare toggida asati yoosona” yaagis. I qassika, “Babilooney kundis; iya xoossata misileti sa7an kundidi gaacetidosona” yaagidi waassis.
ISA 21:10 Hinteno, wudumman gaacetida ta asaw, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaape, Isra7eele Xoossaafe si7idaba taani hintew odayis.
ISA 21:11 Edoomeba Goday haysada yaagis: “Issi asi Sayrepe tana xeegidi, naageyso, sa7i wontanaw ay mali attidee? Naageyso, sa7i geeyanaw ay mali attidee?” yaagees.
ISA 21:12 Naageysi zaaridi, “Sa7i wontana hanees; shin zaari qammana. Hinte oychanaw koyko oychite; simmi yidi oychite” yaagis.
ISA 21:13 Arabe ba Goday haysada yaagees: “Hinteno Daadana zal7anchoto, hinte, hinte caana gimaletara Arabe mela biittan aqana.
ISA 21:14 Hinteno, Teeman biittan de7iya asaw, saamotidaysatas haathe ehite; koshatidaysatas kathi immite.
ISA 21:15 Enti mashshafe, shohope shodetida mashshafe, dafetida dongefenne mino olape baqatoosona” yaagees.
ISA 21:16 Goday taako haysada yaagis: “Une oosancho wodey wureysada, issi laytha giddon Qedaare boncho ubbay wurana.
ISA 21:17 Qedaaren de7iya dongen dukiya wolqaama olanchotape guuthati attana; Goday Isra7eele Xoossay hessa odis” yaagis.
ISA 22:1 “Qoncetha Zangaara” geetetiya bessaba Goday odida qaala. Hintena ubbaa aybi un7ethin pooqe keetha bolla keydetii?
ISA 22:2 Neno waasoy, dirgoyinne wocami kumida katamaw, ne giddon hayqida asati mashshan woyko olan hayqibookona.
ISA 22:3 Hinte halaqati ubbay issife baqatidosona; enti dongey bayna coo di7etidosona. Enti haakidi baqatikoka betida ubbay oyketidosona.
ISA 22:4 Hessa gisho, “Tana aggaagite; ta asaas misha yeeho afuxada yeekana; ta asaa dhayuwas tana minthethopite” yaagas.
ISA 22:5 Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay Qoncetha Zangaaran dagama, yedhetethinne un7a gallas oothis; qassi gimbeti woddiya gallasinne deretako maaddees waassiya gallas oothis.
ISA 22:6 Elaami ba para gaaretaranne para asatara ba dongiya oykidi yis; Qiira wotaadareti banta gondalleta giigisidosona.
ISA 22:7 Hinte lo77o zangaarati para gaaretan kumidosona; para asati Yerusalaame pengiya sinthan eqidosona.
ISA 22:8 I Yihuda miixata qaaris. He gallas Wora Keethan de7iya kawa olaa miisheta be7ideta.
ISA 22:9 Dawita Katama giddon laaletha dooriya be7ideta; garsa baggan de7iya ollan haathe kunthideta.
ISA 22:10 Yerusalaamen de7iya keethata taybideta; dirsaa zaaridi gimbanaw keethata laallideta.
ISA 22:11 Kase gal7a zeeruwan de7iya haatha zaaridi, nam7u gimbetape gidduwan olla giigisideta. Shin hinte hessa medhida Xoossaa akeekibeketa; woyko daro wodepe sinthe hessa halchidaysa hassaybeketa.
ISA 22:12 He gallas Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay, hintena yeehosinne zelelsas, huuphe buluusanawunne kayo ma7o ma7anaw xeegis.
ISA 22:13 Shin hinte hessa aggidi ufaytetanne yexeeta; boorunne dorse shukeeta; ashuwa meeta; woyne uyeeta. Nuuni “Wonto hayqanaw de7iya gisho, hachi maananne uyana” yaageeta.
ISA 22:14 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysa taw qoncisis; “Hinte hayqana gakanaw ha nagaray hintew atto geetetenna. Taani Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay haysa odayis” yaagis.
ISA 22:15 Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay, “Bada kawo gadhon shuumetida Saminasako haysada yaaga;
ISA 22:16 Neeni haysan ay oothay? Neeni haysan, zaalla woocada duufo giigisana mela, dhoqa bessan new duufo bookana melanne zaalla woocada new shempo bessi oothana mela oona oychadii?
ISA 22:17 Neno mino addiyaw, nena Goday minthidi oykana; cuucummidi wora holana.
ISA 22:18 Kooseda nena yuushshidi dalga biittan holana. Neno ne godaa keethaas yeella gidida addiyaw neeni yan hayqana; ne boncho para gaareti yan attana.
ISA 22:19 Taani nena ne oosuwape kessana; ne shuumatethaafe shaarana.
ISA 22:20 He gallas taani Kalqe na7aa, ta aylliya Eliyaqeeme xeegana.
ISA 22:21 Taani ne ma7uwa iya mayzana; ne dancuwa iya dancisana; ne shuumatetha iyaw immana. I, Yerusalaameninne Yihudan de7iya asaas aawa gidana.
ISA 22:22 Taani Dawita keethaa qulpiya iyaw immana; I dooyin oonika gordenna; I gordin oonika dooyenna.
ISA 22:23 Taani iya ammanthiya bessan dhisheda tolana; I ba aawa keethas boncho araata gidana.
ISA 22:24 Qandafe oto gakanaw de7iya soo miisheta, kocan kaqeysada, iya aawa keethaa bonchuwa, naytanne, nayta nayta ubbaa iya bolla kaqana” yaagis.
ISA 22:25 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees: “He gallas ammanthiya bessan dhishida toley kichana; qanxettananne kundana. Iya bolla kaqetida tooho ubbay duuxidi wodhana” yaagees. Goday haysa odis.
ISA 23:1 Xiroosa katamaas odetida Godaa qaalay haysa. Xiroosa kataman keethi woyko shempiya soy bayna gisho hinteno Tarsesa markabiya laaggeysato yeekite! Qophiroosa biittafe ha worey hinteko yis.
ISA 23:2 Hinteno, abba matan de7iya asaw, hinteno abba bollara hemetiya duretida, Sidoona zal7anchoto, si77i giite!
ISA 23:3 Hintew yaa kathay, Nayle shaafape caketida Shihoora biitta kathi; hinte kawotethatas zal7e bessi.
ISA 23:4 Neno Sidoona katamaw, abba matan de7iya miixaw, abbay, “Taani iqetabike; yelabike; addenne macca na7a dichabike” yaagidi odida gisho yeellata.
ISA 23:5 He worey Gibxe biitta gakiya wode enti Xiroosaba si7idi dagammana.
ISA 23:6 Hinteno abba matan de7iya asaw, zeleelishe Tarsesa pinnite.
ISA 23:7 Beni wode keexetida katamay, iya tohoy iya haaho biitta efidaynne hinte iyan ufaytiya Xiroosa katamay haysee?
ISA 23:8 Kallacha wosisiya katamaa, iya zal7anchoti halaqata gididanne iya giddon bayzeysatinne laammeysati bonchetidaysata gidida Xiroosa katamaa bolla haysa halchiday oonee?
ISA 23:9 Otoranchota boncho ubbaa guuthanawunne biitta bolla bonchetida ubbaa kawushanaw Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysa halchis.
ISA 23:10 Hinteno, Tarsesa asaw, hintena teqiyabay bayna gisho, Nayle shaafada biitta bolla kumidi goggite.
ISA 23:11 Goday abba bolla ba kushiya miccis; iya kawotethaa qaathis. Kanaane miixa laallana mela Goday kiittis.
ISA 23:12 Gujidika, “Hinteno, un7etida Sidoona asaw, hinte ufaysan yexiya wodey wuris. Dendidi Qophiroosa pinnite; yanka hinte saro demmeketa” yaagis.
ISA 23:13 Babiloone biitta be7ite; he biittay ha77i pathonnaba gidis. Asoore asay he biittan do7i aqanaada oothis. Enti yan de7iya wogga keethata laallidi bantaw miixa gimbidosona; biitta baysa oothidosona.
ISA 23:14 Hinteno, Tarsesa markabeto, hinte miixay laaletida gisho, zeleelite.
ISA 23:15 Xiroosa katamay issi kawos de7o laythi gidiya laapun tammu laythi dogetidi daana wodey yaana. Laapun tammu laythi wuriya wode layma maccasas yexetiya yetha mela Xiroosa katamaas yexetana.
ISA 23:16 Enti, “Neno dogetida layma katamaw, ne diitha ekada katamaara yuuya. Nena asay hassayana mela mal7o qaalan daro yethi yexa” yaagana.
ISA 23:17 Laapun tammu laythay poletiya wode, Goday Xiroosa xomoosana. Shin hessafe guye, I beni ba laymatetha oosuwako simmana; sa7an de7iya kawotethata ubbaara laymatana.
ISA 23:18 Gidoshin, iya zal7iya wodheynne iya damoozey Godaas dummatidaysa gidana; iya zal7iya wodheynne kathinne lo77o ma7o shammanaw, Godaas oothiya asaas imetanaape attishin, miishe keethan woyko minja keethan uttenna.
ISA 24:1 Heko, Goday biitta laallananne baysa kessana; I, biitta dhaysidi iyan de7iya asaa laallana.
ISA 24:2 Asi ubbay issino gidana; kahiney asaara issino gidana; aylley godaara issino gidana; gadhindiya godatera issino gidana; shammeysi bayzeysara issino gidana; tal7e immeysi tal7e ekeysara issino gidana; aco acheysi aco ciggeysara issino gidana.
ISA 24:3 Biitta ubbay bonqetidi baysa gidana; Goday ha qaala odis.
ISA 24:4 Biittay melana, iya aacay shullana; alamey argaacana, daaburana; biittan de7iya wolqaama asay daaburana.
ISA 24:5 Biittay banan de7iya asaa gaason tunis. Enti higgiyas kiitetibookona; wogaa naagibookona; merinaa caaquwa menthidosona.
ISA 24:6 Hessa gisho, baadethay biitta mees; asay banta nagaraa gaason pirdetanaw bessees. Sa7an de7iya asay xuugetidosona; guutha asi attis.
ISA 24:7 Woyney xaphora melis, mal7anto woyney wuris; kase ufaytiya ubbay azzanis.
ISA 24:8 Karaabo baqoy attis; yetha waasoy si77i gis; ufaysiya diitha dursay eqis.
ISA 24:9 Hizape yexishe woyne ushsha uyokona; ushshayka entaw camo gidana.
ISA 24:10 Laaletida katamay baysa gidana; oonika gelonnaada keetha ubbay gordetis.
ISA 24:11 Woyne ushshi dhayida gisho asay dabaaban waassees; ufaysi azzanon laametis; ufaysiyabay sa7ape dhayis.
ISA 24:12 Katamay laaletis; katamaa pengeti meqeretidosona.
ISA 24:13 Shamaho teera qoqofeysada, woyne maxi simmin, poshiley atteysada, biitta bolla de7iya kawotethata bolla hessada hanana.
ISA 24:14 Enti banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, ufaysan yexoosona; wuloha baggara de7iya ubbay Godaa gitatetha odana.
ISA 24:15 Hessa gisho, doloha baggara de7eysati, Godaas boncho immana; yuushoy abban teqetida biittati Godaas, Isra7eele Xoossaas boncho immana.
ISA 24:16 Nuuni, “Xilluwas bonchoy gido” giya mazmure biitta gaxape si7ida. Shin, “Taani gilqas! Taani laafas! Tana ayye! Aathi immeysi aathidi immees; kaddeysati gujidi aathidi immoosona” yaagas.
ISA 24:17 Hinteno, sa7an de7iya asaw, dagami aafoynne xihey hintena naagees.
ISA 24:18 Daganthiya girsaafe baqateysi ollan kundana; ollafe keyeysa xihey oykana; salo maskooteti dooyetidosona; biitta baasoti qaaxidosona.
ISA 24:19 Biitti za77is; biitti shaaketis; biitti qaaxis.
ISA 24:20 Biitti matho asada gandigarees; carkoy sugiya gaabbada yuuyees. Geellata balay daro deexida gisho zaari dendonna mela kundisis.
ISA 24:21 He gallas Goday salo wolqata salon, sa7aa kawota sa7an pirdana.
ISA 24:22 Ollan de7iya qasho asada enta issife shiishana; qasho keethan enti gordetidi uttana. Daro gallasape guye enti seeretana.
ISA 24:23 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday Xiyoone zumaaninne Yerusalaamen kawotana; Yerusalaame cimata sinthan ba bonchuwa qoncisana. He wode ageenay dhumana, away yeellatana.
ISA 25:1 Abeeti Godaw, neeni ta Xoossaa. Taani nena dhoqu dhoqu oothana; ne sunthaa galatana. Neeni ne polo ammanetethan benipe qofetidi de7iya malaalsiya oosota oothadasa.
ISA 25:2 Neeni katamaa laaletha doore oothadasa; mino gimbe dirsay de7iya katamaa laalladasa. Allagata kawo keethay zaaridi katama gidonna mela oothadasa; zaaridi polo keexetenna.
ISA 25:3 Hessa gisho, mino asati nena bonchana; wozana mino kawotethata katamati new yayyana.
ISA 25:4 Neeni manqoy baqatidi attiya bessi, metootanchoy qosetiya bessi, uushope attiya geshenne awa seelape attiya kuya gidadasa. Wozana mino asaa hanqoy gimbera dom7ethiya uusho melanne
ISA 25:5 mela biittan honge mela. Shaara kuyay awa seela irxisiya mela neeni allagata yethaa si77i oothadasa; yaatin wozana mino asaa waasoy si77i gis.
ISA 25:6 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday asa ubbaas ha zumaa bolla gita gibira giigisana. He gibira bolla modho ashuwa, lo77o kathinne caalida woyne ushsha giigisis.
ISA 25:7 I ha zumaa bolla asa ubbaa kammida magarajuwanne kawotetha ubbaa bolla micetida kamaa dhaysana.
ISA 25:8 I merinaw hayqo mittana; Ubbaa Haariya Goday ayfe ubbaafe afuthaa quchana; ba asaa kawusha biitta ubbaafe diggana. Goday haysa odis.
ISA 25:9 He gallas enti, “Tuma haysi nu Xoossaa; nuuni iyan ammanetida gisho I nuna ashshis. Nu Goday haysa; nuuni iyan ammanetida; ane iya atotethan ufaytoos; hashshu goos” yaagana.
ISA 25:10 Godaa kushey ashshanaw ha zumaa bolla shempana. Shin utulli urqara ollan yedheteysada Moo7abey yedhetana.
ISA 25:11 Haathe wadheysi ba kushiya yeddeysada enti banta kushiya yeddana. Shin Goday iya gene kushe oosuwan cimetonna, iya otoruwa kawushana.
ISA 25:12 Enti dhoqisidi gimbida mino dirsa gimbiya I wodisananne kawushana; I duge sa7an, ubba hirki baanan holana.
ISA 26:1 He gallas Yihuda biittan ha mazmurey yexetana. Nuus mino katami de7ees; Xoossay atotetha iya yuushuwan gimbenne miixa oothis.
ISA 26:2 Ba ammanuwa naagiya xillo derey, gelana mela kareta dooyite.
ISA 26:3 I nenan ammanetida gisho, ba wozanaa nenan wothida uraa, neeni polo sarotethan naagasa.
ISA 26:4 Goday merinaa zaalla gidiya gisho, Godan merinaw ammaneta.
ISA 26:5 Dhoqan de7eyisata ziqi oothis; dhoqu gida katamaa kawushis. Iya sa7an duge yeggis; biitta baanan holis.
ISA 26:6 Manqoti iya yedhana un7etidaysati iya bollara hemetana.
ISA 26:7 Xillota ogey suure; Abeeti Xilluwaw, neeni xillota ogiya giigisaasa.
ISA 26:8 Abeeti Godaw, nuuni ne higgiya naaganaw amottoos; ne sunthaa bonchoynne ne teemay nu wozanaa amo.
ISA 26:9 Qamma taani nena laamotas; wonta ta ayyaanay nena minthidi koyees. Ne biitta pirdanaw yaa wode, sa7an de7iya asay xillotethi tamaarees.
ISA 26:10 Iita asas keehatethi oosetikoka, I xillotethi tamaarenna. Suure biittan iitabaa oothees; Godaa gitatetha erenna.
ISA 26:11 Abeeti Godaw, ne kushey dhoqu gis; shin enti be7okona. Ne asaas neeni mishetiya misha be7idi yeellato. Neeni ne morketas giigisida tamay enta midi dhayso.
ISA 26:12 Abeeti Godaw, nuus sarotethi immadasa; nu ooso ubbaa ne oothadasa.
ISA 26:13 Abeeti Godaw, nu Xoossaw, hara godati nuna haaridosona; shin nuuni ne sunthaa xalaala bonchoos.
ISA 26:14 Enti hayqidosona; simmidi de7on dookona. Ne seerin dhayida gisho, zaaridi dendokona. Enta qofisuwa ubbaa quchada dhaysadasa.
ISA 26:15 Abeeti Godaw, neeni kawotethaa darsadasa; kawotethaa darsada neeni bonchetadasa; biitta zawa ubbaa dalgisadasa.
ISA 26:16 Abeeti Godaw, meto wode enti nena koydosona. Ne enta seerida wode nena kalkashidi woossidosona.
ISA 26:17 Abeeti Godaw, qanthatida maccasi, yelo wodey gakin un7etada waasseysada, nuuni ne sinthan hessada hanida.
ISA 26:18 Nuuni qanthatida; iqetida; shin carko yelida. Nuuni sa7aas atotethi ehibooko; biittan de7iya asaa yelibooko.
ISA 26:19 Hayqida ne asay paxana; enta ahay dendana. Hinteno, biitta garsan de7eysato, dendidi ufaysa mazmure yexite. Hinte akay wonta aka mela; biittiya hayqidaysata zaarada immana.
ISA 26:20 Ta asaw, bidi hinte soo gelidi, kariya hinte bolla gordite. Godaa hanqoy aadhana gakanaw, guutha wodes hintena qosite.
ISA 26:21 Biitta bolla de7iya asaa, enta nagaraa gisho seeranaw, Goday ba de7iya bessaafe keyidi yees. Biittiya ba bolla gukida suuthaa qoncisana; hayqidaysata zaarada genthuku.
ISA 27:1 He gallas Goday ba mino, gitanne wolqaama mashshan Leewataane geetetiya xongetiyanne xaaxetiya shoosha seerana; abban de7iya do7aaka wodhana.
ISA 27:2 He gallas haysada geetetana: “Lo77o woyne gadiyas yexite;
ISA 27:3 Taani, Goday iya naagayis; taani qanxonna haathe ushshayis; oonika iya qohonnaada qamma gallas naagayis.
ISA 27:4 Taani hanqetike; taara oletanaw agunthinne gom7orey ane dendo! Taani enta bolla keyada enta xuugga wursanashin.
ISA 27:5 Woyko qosetidi attanaw taako yo; taara sigeto; ee, taara sigeto” yaagetana.
ISA 27:6 Yaana wodiyan Yayqoobi xapho yeddana; Isra7eeley aacananne ciiyana; iya ayfey biitta ubbaa kumana.
ISA 27:7 Enta shocidaysata shocidaysada Goday Isra7eele asaa shocideyee? Woyko enta wodhidaysata wodhidaysada enti hayqidonaayee?
ISA 27:8 Goday ba asaa di7etana mela oothidi seeris; wolqaama doloha bagga gotiyan enta gooddidi kessis.
ISA 27:9 Yayqooba naaqoy atto geetetanaynne iya nagaray polo qushetanay, yarsho shucha ubbaa I mentherethidi booqinte shuchada oothiya wodenne Asheera eeqa misiliya woyko ixaane cuyisiya bessaa laaliya wode.
ISA 27:10 Diretida katamay baysatis; kase asi de7iya bessay ha77i bazzo mela dogetidi attis. Mehey heemetiya bessi gidida gisho, maatanne mitha haythaa midi marati yan allatoosona.
ISA 27:11 Mitha tasheti meliya wode meqeretoosona; maccasay mixidi eethanaw efoosona. Ha asay akeeki bayna asi gidiya gisho, enta medhidaysi entaw qadhetenna; enta maarenna.
ISA 27:12 He gallas Efraxiisa shaafape Gibxe shaafa gakanaw Goday kathaa qoxana. Hinte, Isra7eele asay issoy issoy shiiqana.
ISA 27:13 He gallas gita moyzey punetana; Asoore biittan dhaydaysatinne Gibxe biitta di7etidaysati yidi, Yerusalaamen geeshsha zumaa bolla Godaa goyinnana.
ISA 28:1 Efreeman mathoteysatas qofiso kallacha gididaysa, aradda zangaara huuphiyan uttidaysa, iya bonchuwas alleeqo gidida shullida ciishshanne mathoyiya ushshay entaw nashetethas gidida katamaa ayye!
ISA 28:2 Heko, Godaas wolqaamanne mino gidida issoy de7ees. Goday iya shacha uushoda, dhaysiya gotedanne kixida wolqaama haathada mino kushiyan duge sa7an holana.
ISA 28:3 He mathotiya Efreema asaa otoruwa kallachay tohon yedhethana.
ISA 28:4 Aradda zangaara huuphen de7iya shullida ciishshay, iya boncho alleeqoy wodey gakanaape sinthe teerida balase ayfe mela gidana. Issi asi he balasiya be7iya wode ba kushen oykida mela mi aggees.
ISA 28:5 He gallas Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday attida ba asaas boncho kallachanne alleeqo gidana.
ISA 28:6 I daynnatas suure pirdiya ayyaana, katamaa pengiyafe ola zaareysatas wolqa gidana.
ISA 28:7 Enti woyne ushshan biicotoosona; mathoyiya ushshan gandigaroosona. Kahineynne nabey mathoyiya ushshan biicotees; enti woyne ushshan yarkoosona; mathoyiya ushshan gandigaroosona. Qoncethi be7ishe baletoosona; pirdishe dhubetoosona.
ISA 28:8 Enti miya gayta ubbay cooshsha xalaala gidiya gisho, iitiboonna bessi baawa.
ISA 28:9 Enti haysada gaana: “I eratethaa oona tamaarsanee? Kiita ooddes qoncisanee? Buroo maathi paahetiya woyko dhanthi duuxida naytaseyee?
ISA 28:10 I, kiitta bolla kiitta, kiitta bolla kiitta; woga bolla woga, woga bolla woga; yan guutha han guutha” yaagana.
ISA 28:11 Shin Goday allaga qaalaninne imatha doonan ha asaas odana.
ISA 28:12 I entako, “Haysi shempo bessi; daaburidaysa shempisite. Haysi shempi ekiya bessi” yaagis. Shin enti si7onna ixidosona.
ISA 28:13 Hessa gisho, enti bidi kundana mela, me77ana melanne xihen oyketidi baana mela Godaa qaalay entaw kiita bolla kiita, kiita bolla kiita; woga bolla woga, woga bolla woga; yan guutha han guutha gidana.
ISA 28:14 Hinteno, Yerusalaamen de7iya asaa haariya qelqiseysato Godaa qaala si7ite.
ISA 28:15 Hinte, “Nuuni hayqora caaqida; Si7oolera giigida; nuuni wordo nuus qota oothida gishonne malte kate oothida gisho, gadoy nuna bochonna aadhana” yaagidi ceeqeteta.
ISA 28:16 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday, “Heko, taani al7onne dooretida baaso shuchaa Xiyoonen wothas; iyan ammaniya oonika yeellatenna.”
ISA 28:17 Taani suure pirdaa wadha wodoro, xillotethaa tumbe oothana. Hinte, “Nuus qota gida wordo shachay shocana; hinte nuus kate gida bessaa di7oy dhaysana” yaagees.
ISA 28:18 Hinte hayqora caaqida caaqoy laaletana; Si7oolera giigida giigoy minnenna. Gadoy yaa wode hinte iyan shocetana.
ISA 28:19 He gadoy yaa wode hintena ekidi baana; wonta wonta, qamminne gallas yaara aadhana; he aadhiya wode ubban hintena aggenna. Ha kiita akeekoy hintew dagama xalaala immana.
ISA 28:20 Hinte qosetiya bessi hintew baawa; hinte zin7iya arsay hintew gidenna; hinte ma7iya afilay hintena gakenna.
ISA 28:21 Paraziima zuma bolla Goday oothidaysada ba oosuwa, ba imatha oosuwa, hessika ba ooratha oosuwa oothanaw dendana. Gaba7oona zangaaran oothidaysada hanqana.
ISA 28:22 Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay, biitta ubbaa bolla dhayo ehanaw awaajidaysa ta si7ida gisho hinte qashoy minnonna mela qelqiseysa aggite.
ISA 28:23 Hinte haytha haa yeggidi, ta odeysa si7ite; ta odaa akeekite.
ISA 28:24 Kathi zeranaw goyiya goshshanchoy ubba wode goyishe de7iyee? Qassi ubba wode gaggahiya wodhishenne liiqisishe de7ii?
ISA 28:25 Gadiya liiqisidi, kareetha sawanne okashe, banganne giste, banga iya do7uwan, iya bessan bessan zerees gidennee?
ISA 28:26 Ha hiilla iya Xoossay iya erisesinne tamaarsees.
ISA 28:27 Kareetha sawonne okashe shocu wodhan qoxenna; shin guutha xam7an shocetees.
ISA 28:28 Katha ayfey buketeesipe attishin, liiqenna; qassi kathaa bukiya para gaareti iya bollara laagetikoka kathay gaacetenna.
ISA 28:29 Ha cincatethaa ubbay ba zoriyaninne ba cincatethan malaalsiya Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaape yees.
ISA 29:1 Dawiti de7ida Ar7eela katamaw nena ayye! Laytha bolla laythi guja; ne ba7aaleta zaara zaara boncha.
ISA 29:2 Taani Ar7eela katamaa buroo un7ethana; I zeleelidi yeekana. He katamay suuthi kammida yarsho bessa mela gidana.
ISA 29:3 Taani ne yuushuwa teqana; adussa gimbiyan nena dirana; ne bolla ola shako essana.
ISA 29:4 Neeni gelida ollan gidada odetana; garsa baanape ne girsay yaana. Ne girsay moytille girsada biitta giddofe keyana; baana giddofe ne kalkashana.
ISA 29:5 Shin ne morketi baana mela daro; wozana mino asata tayboy carkoy efiya puno mela.
ISA 29:6 Qoponna de7ishin, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday dadan, biitta qaaxon, gita girsan, goten, carkoninne tama lacon hintena wochana.
ISA 29:7 Ar7eela katamaa oliya daro kawotetha ubbay, he katamaanne iya miixa oliya ubbay, iya un7ethiya ubbay dhisko amuhodanne elmoda hanana.
ISA 29:8 Koshatida asi amuhon kathi midi, barkiya wode iya koshay aggonaysada woyko saamotida asi amuhon uyidi, barkiya wode saamuwa alonaysada, Xiyoone deriya oliya kawotethati ubbay hessada hanana.
ISA 29:9 Malaaletite; dagammite; qilim7ite; qooqite. Mathotite, shin woyne ushshan gidopo. Gandigarite, shin mathoyiya ushshan gidopo.
ISA 29:10 Goday dhisko ayyaana hinte bolla gussis. Nabeto, hinte ayfey goozetis; qoncethi be7eysato, hinte huuphey kametis.
ISA 29:11 Ha ubba qoncethay new attametida maxaafa mela gidis. Issi asi, “He7e, haysa nabbaba” yaagidi, issi nabbabo eriya asas immiya wode, I, “Maxaafay attametida gisho, ta nabbabanaw danda7ike” yaagana.
ISA 29:12 Maxaafa nabbabi eronna asako, “He7e, haysa nabbaba” yaagidi immiya wode, I, “Taani nabbaba erike” yaagana.
ISA 29:13 Goday yaagees: “Ha asay tana banta doonan bonchees; shin enta wozanay taape haahon de7ees. Enti asi medhida wogaa tamaarsishe tana coo goyinnoosona.
ISA 29:14 Hessa gisho, taani ha asaa bolla zaara zaara malaalsiyaba oothana. Cincata cincatethaa eeya kessana; eranchota eraa dogisana” yaagis.
ISA 29:15 Banta halchuwa Godaape qosanaw ciimmoyeyisata, banta oosuwa dhuman oothishe, “Nuna ooni be7ii? Nuna ooni erii?” yaageyisata ayye!
ISA 29:16 Hinte ubbaba shiri yeggeeta. Oto medheysi urqa mela gidi qopeeta! Medhetidaysi medhidaysa, “I tana medhibeenna” giyyee? Otoy bana medhidaysa, “I aykoka erenna” gaanaw danda7ii?
ISA 29:17 Libaanose woray aradda gade gidanaw; qassi aradda gadey wora gidanaw guutha wodey attis gidennee?
ISA 29:18 He gallas tulleti maxaafaa qaala si7ana; dhuman de7iya qooqeta ayfey xeellana.
ISA 29:19 Ashketi Godan ufaytana; manqoti Isra7eele Geeshshan hashshu gaana.
ISA 29:20 Ulo iitati wurana; qelqiseysati tim7i gaana; iitabaa oothanaw wochiya ubbay dhayana.
ISA 29:21 Ase odan bala ootheysati, mootetidaysa pirda keethan xihen yeggeysatinne wordo markatethan xillo asa pirdaa geellayeysati dhayana.
ISA 29:22 Hessa gisho, Abrahaame wozida Goday Yayqooba kochaako haysada yaagees: “Yayqooba kochay hizape guye yeellatenna; iya som7oy yeellatidi sa7a xeellenna.
ISA 29:23 Shin enti ta kushe ooso gidida banta nayta banta giddon be7iya wode ta sunthaa geeshshana; enti Yayqooba Geeshshaa, geeshshatetha naagana; Isra7eele Xoossaa yashshatethan bonchana.
ISA 29:24 Ayyaanan baleysati akeeka demmana; zuuzumeysati timirte ekana” yaagees.
ISA 30:1 Goday, “Geella nayta ayye! Taani halchaboona oothosona; ta Ayyaanan gidonashin banta shenen caaqidi nagara bolla nagara gujeyisata ayye!
ISA 30:2 Tana zore oychonna Gibxe wodhoosona. Paarona miixa bantaw teqe, Gibxe bantaw shempiya kuya oothosona.
ISA 30:3 Shin Paarona miixay hintew yeella, Gibxe kuyay hintew kawushatethi gidana.
ISA 30:4 Enta halaqati Xaanesan de7ikoka, enti kiittidaysati Haneesa katamaa gakikoka,
ISA 30:5 yeellafe attishin, hara maaddeynne go77i bayna gisho iyan ammanetiya ubbay kawuyananne yeellatan” yaagees.
ISA 30:6 Negeban de7iya do7ataba Goday odiday haysa: kiitetidaysati metoynne un7i de7iya biittara, adde gaammoynne macca gaammoy worara, iitanne xongetiya shooshati de7iya bazzuwara kanthidi baana. Haretanne gimaleta zokon banta duretetha caanidi enta aykoka maaddonna biitta baana.
ISA 30:7 Gibxey aykoka maaddenna; hessa gisho, taani iya, “Pathonna Ra7aaba” yaagada xeegana.
ISA 30:8 Ha77i bada sinthara yaana wodiyas merinaa malla gidana mela enta sinthan shuchaa woocada xaafa; mazgabenka xaafa.
ISA 30:9 Enti geellanne wordancho nayta; enti Goday odiyaba si7anaw koyonna nayta.
ISA 30:10 Enti qoncethi be7eyisata, “Qoncethi be7opite” yaagosona. Nabeta, “Ufaysiyabaanne cimmiyaba oditepe attishin, suureba odopite.
ISA 30:11 Ogiyape kichite; horogape haakite; Isra7eele Geeshshara nuna som7on gathofite” yaagosona.
ISA 30:12 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele Geeshshay haysada yaagees: “Hinte ha qaala ixidi, geneninne cimon ammanetida gisho,
ISA 30:13 ha nagaray hintew za77idi woddiya, akeekona ellesidi kundiya adussa gimbe mela gidana.
ISA 30:14 Iya meqoy urqafe medhida oto mela dipi gidi meqana. He mequwa giddofe tama kaashiya woyko haathe duuqiya kun7i bentenna” yaagees.
ISA 30:15 Isra7eele Geeshshay, Ubbaa Haariya Goday, haysada yaagees. “Simoninne shempon hinte attana; si77i guussaninne ammanetethan hintew wolqa gidana; shin hinte ixideta.
ISA 30:16 Hinte, ‘Akay, nuuni para bolla uttidi baqatana’ yaagideta; hessa gisho, hinte baqatana. Qassi hinte, ‘Eesotiya para toggidi baana’ ” yaagideta; shin hintena yedetheysati hintefe aadho eesotana.
ISA 30:17 Issi tooranchuwa be7idi hintefe mukulu asay baqatana; ichashu tooranchoti hintena ubbaa yedethana. Zumaa huuphen eqida bandira mithada woyko zuma bolla de7iya mallada hinte hanana gakanaw hintena yedethena.
ISA 30:18 Shin Goday hintew keehanaw naagees; Goday xillo pirdiya Xoossi gidiya gisho hintew qadhetanaw dendana. Iya ammanetidi naagiya ubbay anjetidaysata.
ISA 30:19 Hinteno, Yerusalaamen de7iya Xiyoone asaw, hizape guye yeekeketa. Xoossay qadhen kumida Xoossi gidiya gisho, hinte maade koyidi iyako waassiya wode hintew zaaro immana.
ISA 30:20 Goday hintew meto kathinne un7a haathi immikoka, hinte astamaarey hizape bana qosenna. Shin hinte ayfey hinte astamaariya be7ana.
ISA 30:21 Hinte ushachi woyko haddirsi simmiya wode, guyera hintena, “Ogey haysa; iyara biite” giya qaala hinte si7ana.
ISA 30:22 Biraninne worqan alleeqetida eeqa misileta hinte tunisana. Tuna curqada hinte enta, “Nuupe haakite” yaagidi wora holana.
ISA 30:23 He wode I, hinte biittan zerida kathaas ira bukisana; biittafe doliya kathay daronne muruuta gidana. He gallas hinte mehey dalga denban heemetana.
ISA 30:24 Goshsha booratinne hareti gillan punetida geeshsha harquwa maana.
ISA 30:25 Asi wuriya wode miixati laaletiya gallas deretanne zumata bollafe pulto haathi goggana.
ISA 30:26 He gallas ageena poo7oy awa poo7oda hanana; awa poo7oy kaseysafe laapun kushe darana; laapun gallas poo7uwa mela gidana. He ubbay hananay Goday meqida ba asaa kooliya wodenne I dechin madunxida asaa pathiya wode.
ISA 30:27 Heko, Godaa sunthay suulliya hanquwara, dhumida cuyaa shaarara haaho bessaafe yaana. Iya doonan hanqoy kumis; iya inxarsan miya tami de7ees.
ISA 30:28 Iya peenoy, qoodhe gakanaw kixidi, ubbaba pittidi efiya haatha kixa mela. I, kawotethata dhayo zarzaren harqana; asaa gapata bixaalidi oge balethana.
ISA 30:29 Geeshsha ba7aaley bonchetiya gallas yexeysada, hinte yexana. Godaa zumako, Isra7eele Zaallako biya wode suusul7e punnishe yexiya asay ufayteysada hinte ufaytana.
ISA 30:30 Goday ba yashshiya qaala sissana; ba suulliya hanquwan, tama lacuwan, gotiyan, uushuwaninne shachan ba qesiya qoncisana.
ISA 30:31 Goday ba girsan Asoore daganthana; iya xam7ay enta shocana.
ISA 30:32 Goday enta ba seeriya xam7an enta shociya wode iya asay karaaboranne diithara yexana. Ba qesiya denthidi enta shocana.
ISA 30:33 Benipe doomidi Asoore kawoy xuussa Toofeta geetetiya bessi giigis. He bessay ollanne dalga; qassi daro mithi dooretidi de7iya bessi. Godaa peenoy diinne shaafada goggidi, he tama eethana.
ISA 31:1 Maado demmanaw Gibxe wodheysatanne paran ammaneteyisata ayye! Para gaareta darotethaaninne para asata minotethan ammaneteyisata ayye! Enti Isra7eele Geeshshaa xeellokona woyko Godaape maado koyokona.
ISA 31:2 Shin Goday cinca gidiya gisho gado yeddana; I odidaysa aggenna. Iita asaa bollanne iitabaa oothiya asaa maaddeyisata bolla dendana.
ISA 31:3 Gibxeti asepe attishin, xoosse gidokona; enta paratika ashope attishin, ayyaana gidokona. Goday hanqon ba qesiya denthiya wode maaddeysi dhubetana; maadeteysi kundana; enti ubbay issife dhayana.
ISA 31:4 Goday taako haysada yaagis: “Gaammoy woyko wodala gaammoy mehe oykidi daariya wode henthanchoti xeegetidi shiiqikoka, I enta waasuwas dagammenna; enta qaalas yayyenna. Hessadaka, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday Xiyoone zumanne iya zumata olanaw wodhana.
ISA 31:5 Kafoy aaleysada Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday Yerusalaame gechana, ashshana, naagana; iya bollara aalidi heemmana.
ISA 31:6 “Hinteno Isra7eele asaw, hinte makallidi ixida, iyako simmite.
ISA 31:7 He gallas nagari kumida hinte kushiyan birapenne worqafe oothida eeqata wora holana.
ISA 31:8 Asoorey asaba gidonna mashshan kundana; asaba gidonna mashshi enta maana. Enti mashsha sinthafe baqatana; enta na7atethati wolqan asas oothana.
ISA 31:9 Dagama gaason enta mino miixay laaletana; enta toora moconati dagammidi yeggi dhayana” yaagees, iya tamay Xiyoonen, iya coocey Yerusalaamen de7iya Goday.
ISA 32:1 Heko, kawoy xillotethan kawotana; haareysati suuretethan haarana.
ISA 32:2 Issi issi asi ba huuphen carkofe geemmiya bessi, gotepe qosetidi attiya bessi gidana. Mela biittan goggiya haatha melanne saamo biittan gita zaalla kuya mela gidana.
ISA 32:3 Xeelliya asata ayfey qilim7enna; si7iya asata haythay hayzidi si7ana.
ISA 32:4 Eesotiya asaa wozanay erananne akeekana. Dedotiya asaa inxarsay biletana; geeshshidi odetana.
ISA 32:5 Hizape guye eeyi asi erancho geetetenna; iita asi bonchetenna.
ISA 32:6 Eeyay eeyatethi odetees; iya wozanay nagara qopees. Godaa bolla minoba odetees; iya bolla iitabaa maqetees: koshatidaysas kathi immenna; saamotidaysa haathe diggees.
ISA 32:7 Gene asa qofay iita; manqoti suureba odetikoka enta dhaysanaw wordon iita qofa qopees.
ISA 32:8 Lo77o asi lo77oba halchees; he lo77o halchuwan minnidi de7ees.
ISA 32:9 Hinteno qofi bayna de7iya maccasaw, dendite; ta odeysa si7ite; hinteno ammanetidi de7iya macca nayto, ta hintew odeysa si7ite.
ISA 32:10 Laythi kumonna hinte ammanetidi de7eysati kokorana; woyne iya wodiyan maxeketa; tokidabaape ayfe shiisheketa.
ISA 32:11 Hinteno injetin de7iya maccasaw kokorite. Hinteno ammanetidi de7iya macca nayto yayyite. Hinte ma7uwa qaaridi kayo ma7o hinte xeessan dancite.
ISA 32:12 Lo77o gaden ayfiya woyney dhayida gisho, azzanidi hinte tiraa qoxite.
ISA 32:13 Agunthinne kinchotey ta asaa gadiyan dolis. Asay ufaytidi de7ida keethatasinne katamaas yeekite.
ISA 32:14 Kawo keethaynne daro asay de7iya katamay baysatana; miixatinne gimbe shakoti merinaw laaletana; wora hareti ufaytiya bessinne dorsa wudey heemetiya bessi gidana.
ISA 32:15 Hessi hananay, Ayyaanay nu bolla gukana gakanaw, mela biittay araddana gakanawunne aradda biittay wora gidana gakanaasa.
ISA 32:16 Hessafe guye, mela biittan suure pirdi, aradda biittan xillotethi daana.
ISA 32:17 Xillotethi sarotethi ehana, wopatethinne ammanetethi merinaw biitta kumana.
ISA 32:18 Ta asay saroy kumida keethan, ammanthiya bessaaninne wopu gida son shempidi daana.
ISA 32:19 Shachi bukidi wora dhaysiyakoka, qassi katamay kumthi laaletiyakoka,
ISA 32:20 shaafata gaxan hinte kathaa zeridi, hinte mehiyasinne hinte haretas hentha bessi demmeysati hinte anjetana.
ISA 33:1 Nena dhaysona de7ishin haraa dhayseyso, nena aathidi immonna de7ishin haraa aatha immeyso, nena ayye! Ne dhayso aggida wode nena dhaysana; ne aatha imo aggida wode nena aathidi immana.
ISA 33:2 Abeeti Godaw, nuna maara; nuuni nena ufaysan naagoos; wonta wonta nuus wolqa gida; meto wode nuna ashsha.
ISA 33:3 Ne girsaa deshuwan derey baqatees; neeni nuna maaddanaw dendiya wode kawotethati laaletoosona.
ISA 33:4 Gondoy shiiqeysada hinte di7oy shiiqana; booley dirgeysada asay iya bolla dirgana.
ISA 33:5 Goday bolla de7iya gisho, dhoqu dhoqu gis; Xiyoone suure pirdaaninne xillotethan kunthana.
ISA 33:6 I hinte wodiyas ammanthiya baaso gidana; hintew atotethi, cincatethinne eratethi gidana; Godaas yashshi ha ubba shaluwas qulpe gidana.
ISA 33:7 Heko, goobati oge bolla waassoosona; sigethanaw kiitetidaysati cametidi yeekosona.
ISA 33:8 Wogga ogeti kaysatidosona; ogiyara kanthiya asi baawa. Caaqoy laaletis; katamati kadhetidosona; boncho asati boretidosona.
ISA 33:9 Biittay azzanis; daaburis; Libaanosey yeellatidi melis; Saarona zangaaray mela biitta gidis. Baasane deriyaninne Qarmeloosa deriyan de7iya mitha haythay qoqofetis.
ISA 33:10 Goday haysada yaagees: “Ha77i taani dendana; ha77i taani bonchetana; ha77i taani dhoqu dhoqu gaana.
ISA 33:11 Hinte utulla qanthatidi puno yelideta; hinte shempoy hintena tamada maana.
ISA 33:12 Asay booqinte shuchada taman xuugetana; qassi agunthada taman eexana.
ISA 33:13 Hinteno, haahon de7eysato, ta oothidaysa si7ite; matan de7eysato ta wolqaa akeekite” yaagees.
ISA 33:14 Xiyoonen de7iya nagaranchoti dagammidosona; Xoossaa eronnaysati kokoridosona. Enti, “Nu giddofe miya tamaranne merinaw eexiya lacuwara daanaw danda7ey oonee?”
ISA 33:15 Xillotethan hemetey, suure odetey, bessonna ogera bentiya go77a ixey, ba kushiya wodhaafe ekonna mela diggey, shempo wodhoba si7onna mela ba haythaa tuccey, iitabaa xeellonna mela ba ayfiya kammey,
ISA 33:16 he uray dhoqa bessan daana. I, qosetidi attiya bessay mino zaalla gidana; iya kathay iyaw imetana; I, uyaa haathay pacenna.
ISA 33:17 Hinte ayfey kawa, iya yegelssara be7ana; haahon de7iya biitta demmana.
ISA 33:18 Hinte, “Halaqay awun de7ii? Giira ekeysi awun de7ii? Gimbe shakota halaqay awun de7ii?” yaagidi hinte wozanan beni yashshiya wodiya qopana.
ISA 33:19 Wozana mino asaa, hintew gelonna doonan odetiya asaanne inxarsay dedotiya asaa hizape guye hinte be7eketa.
ISA 33:20 Nuuni nu ba7aale bonchiya Xiyoone katamaa be7ite! Wopu gidi de7iya, iya dhishey shodetonna, iya wodoroy duuxonnanne iya dhishey qaaxonna dunkaane mela hanida Yerusalaame katamaa hinte, hinte ayfen be7ana.
ISA 33:21 He bessan Goday nuus wolqaa gidana. He bessay dalga safanne goggiya haatha mela gidana. Wogoloy iya bollara baanaw danda7enna; gita markabeti yaara kanthanaw danda7okona.
ISA 33:22 Goday nuus pirdeysa; Goday nuus higge immeysa; Goday nu kawa; I nuna ashshana.
ISA 33:23 Ne qasho wodoroy dol7ana; markabiya tuussay shuggana; iya sharayka toletibeenna. He wode daro di7o shaaketana; hari attoshin wobbetika di7o ekana.
ISA 33:24 Xiyoonen de7iya oonika “Tana sakees” yaagenna; yan de7iya asaa nagaray atto geetetana.
ISA 34:1 Hinteno, kawotethato, shiiqidi si7ite! Hinteno, asaw akeekite! Biittaynne biittan de7iyaba ubbay, sa7inne sa7ape keyaaba ubbay si7o.
ISA 34:2 Goday kawotethata ubbaa bolla hanqetis; enta tooranchota ubbaa bolla yilotis. I, enta ubbaa dhaysana; enta shukeysatas aathidi immana.
ISA 34:3 Enta ahay holetidi, attidi xinqana; dereti enta suuthan kametana.
ISA 34:4 Salo xoolintoti ubbay seerana; saloti saleenada xaaxetana. Woyne haythinne balase ayfey qoqofeteysada xoolintoti ubbay qoqofetana.
ISA 34:5 Ta mashshay salotan alana gakanaw uyis; Heko Edoome bolla, taani dhaysida asaa bolla pirdanaw wodhana.
ISA 34:6 Godaa mashshay suuthan muuketis. Yarshos shuketiya dorsatanne deeshata suuthan mashshi muuketeysadanne enta kilaho modhuwan kameteysada Godaa mashshay suuthan muuketis; modhuwan kametis. Goday Baasora kataman yarsho, Edoome biittan gita shuka giigisis.
ISA 34:7 Menthati, wofaanotinne boorati entara kundana. Enta gadey suutha xalaala gidana; enta biittay modhon munuqetana.
ISA 34:8 Goday halo keyana gallasinne Xiyoone olida morketa bolla kushe zaariya laythi giigisis.
ISA 34:9 Edoome shaafati melidi made gidis; iya baanay diinne laametana; iya biittay eexiya made gidana.
ISA 34:10 Qammanne gallas tamay to77enna; iya cuyay merinaw cuyana. Edoome biittay yeletethaafe yeletethaa gakanaw baysa gidana; oonika merinaw yaara kanthenna.
ISA 34:11 Shin xiloynne quxarey iya laattana; guttoynne quuroy yan daana. Xoossay Edoome bolla laaletha wadha wodoronne baysatetha tumbe yeddana.
ISA 34:12 He biitta aysiya kawoy deenna; halaqati yaape kichana.
ISA 34:13 Kawo keethata agunthi, miixata ohi ma7ana; workanati allatiya bessinne yanchoti de7iya soo gidana.
ISA 34:14 Bazzo do7ati godaretara gahetana; tuna ayyaanati issoy issuwara xeegetana; qamma qoolleti wodhidi yan daana.
ISA 34:15 Guttoti yan keethe keexidi, phuuphullidi qoxana. Banta nayta banta qefeta garsan haphana; phircoti banta laggetara yan shiiqana.
ISA 34:16 Godaa maxaafan koyidi nabbabite. Godaa doonay odida gishonne iya ayyaanay shiishida gisho, haysatape issoyka pacenna; qassi issoyka ba laggey bayna deenna.
ISA 34:17 I, entaw saama kessis; iya kushey biitta entaw wodoron shaakis; enti iya merinaw laattana; yeletethaafe yeletethaa gakanaw enti yan daana.
ISA 35:1 Baysa biittaynne mela biittay ufaytana; aykoy bayna mela biittay ufaytananne ciiyana.
ISA 35:2 Mela biittay ciishshe ma7ana; ufaysa mazmure yexana. Libaanose bonchuwa ma7ana; Qarmeloosanne Saarona gitatethay imetana; enti Godaa bonchuwanne nu Xoossaa gitatetha be7ana.
ISA 35:3 Daaburida kushetanne argaacida gulbatata minthite.
ISA 35:4 Yashsha wozani de7eysatako, “Minnite! Yayyofite! Heko, hinte Xoossay halo keyanawunne ba xoossatethan kushe zaaranaw yidi hintena ashshana” yaagite.
ISA 35:5 He wode, qooqeta ayfey dooyetana; tulleta haythay si7ana.
ISA 35:6 Wobbeti gen7eda gupana; dedoti ufaysan yexana; mela biittan haathi goggana; mela bessan pultoy dhuuqana.
ISA 35:7 Xuuggiya shafey eele haathi gidana; mela biittay haathe pultana; workanati allatiya bessan maatinne mayreynne maqi dolana.
ISA 35:8 Yaara wogga ogey keyana; ika “Geeshshatetha Oge” geetetana. Tunati he ogiyara bookona; eeyati yan simeretokona; shin geeshshatas gidana.
ISA 35:9 Gaammoy woyko yashshiya do7ati yaara kanthokona; yan bentokona; shin wozetidaysata xalaali hemetana.
ISA 35:10 Goday wozidaysati simmana; yexish, Xiyoone gelana; merinaa ufaysay enta huuphiyan uttana. Enti ufaytananne hashshu gaana; azzanoynne ooley entafe haakana.
ISA 36:1 Hizqiyaasi kawotida tammanne oyddantho laythan, Asoore kawoy Sanakreemi yuushoy gimbetida Yihuda katamata olidi oykis.
ISA 36:2 Hessafe guye, Asoore kawoy Laakiso katamaape issi toora mocona daro olanchotara kawa Hizqiyaasako Yerusalaame yeddis. I, bidi Ma7o Meecciya gadiyako efiya ogiyape qommo baggara de7iya eelida haathay goggiya dhawa matan eqis.
ISA 36:3 Kawo gadho aysiya Alqa na7ay Eliyaqeemi, xaafey Sheebinne, taarike xaafey, Asaafa na7ay, Yo7aasi iyako kare keyidosona.
ISA 36:4 Asoore toora moconay entako, “Hizqiyaasas haysada yaagidi odite: ‘Wolqaama Asoore kawoy, neeko haysada’ yaagees: neeni haysa mela minnanaw aybin ammanetadii?
ISA 36:5 Neeni coo qaalan, olaa oletanaw taw cincatethinne wolqi de7ees yaagasa. Shin neeni oonan ammanetada ta bolla haysada makallay?
ISA 36:6 Neeni ‘Gibxe kawoy tana maaddana’ gada qopidaba gidiko meqida mayre xam7a guufetiya asa mela. Xam7ay meqin pincoy kushiya caddesinne madunxisees. Gibxe kawoy banan ammanetiya asa ubbaas hessa mela.
ISA 36:7 Shin neeni, ‘Nuuni Godan, nu Xoossan, ammanetoos’ yaagiko, Hizqiyaasi Yihudanne Yerusalaame asaa, ‘Hinte Yerusalaamen de7iya yarsho bessan goyinnanaw koshshees’ gidi, Xoossaa goyinniya dhoqa bessatanne yarsho bessata diggiday iya gidennee?
ISA 36:8 “Ane ha77i haaya! Ta godaa Asoore kawuwara geedareta. Togganaw danda7iya asi ne demmiko, nam7u mukulu parata ta new immana.
ISA 36:9 Neeni, ‘Gibxeti para asatanne para gaareta taw yeddana’ gada ammaniko, ta godaa toora moconatape issi laafaka zaaranaw danda7aka.
ISA 36:10 Hessa bollaka, taani ha biitta dhaysanaw tuma Godaa sheney bayna keyadina? Goday ba huuphen tana ‘Bada ha biitta olada dhaysa’ yaagidi kiittis” yaagis.
ISA 36:11 Hessafe guye Eliyaqeemi, Sheebinne Yo7aasi Asoore halaqaako, “Nuuni eriya Aramike doonara nuus ne aylletas odape attishin, gimbe dirsa bolla de7iya asay si7ana mela Ibraawetho doonan odopa” yaagidosona.
ISA 36:12 Shin halaqay zaaridi, “Ha kiitaa taani hintewunne hinte godaa xalaalas odana mela tana ta goday kiittibeenna. Hintera issife banta shi7a maanawunne banta sheesha uyanaw de7iya, ha gimbe dirsaa bolla de7iya asa ubbaas odana mela kiittis” yaagis.
ISA 36:13 Asoore halaqay dendi eqidi, ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, Ibraawetho doonan haysada yaagis: “Wolqaama gidida Asoore kawoy giyaba si7ite!
ISA 36:14 Kawoy hinteko haysada yaagees; ‘Hizqiyaasi hintena cimmofo’ I hintena ta kushepe ashshanaw danda7enna.
ISA 36:15 Hizqiyaasi hintena, ‘Tuma Goday nuna ashshana; ha katamayka Asoore kawa kushen gelenna’ yaagidi, hinte Godan ammanetana mela oothofo.
ISA 36:16 “Hinte Hizqiyaasi odiyaba si7opite. Asoore kawoy hintena, ‘Taara sigetite; haa taako yiite. Hessa hinte oothiko, hinte ubbay hinte woynepenne hinte balasepe maana; hinte bookida ollaafeka haathe uyana.
ISA 36:17 Taani yada, hintena hinte biitta daaniya biitta ekada efana. He biittay kathinne woyney kumida biitta’ ” yaagis.
ISA 36:18 “Hizqiyaasi, ‘Goday hintena ashshana’ yaagidi cimmonnaada naagetite. Hara kawotethata xoossatape ba biitta Asoore kawa kushepe ashshida xoossi de7iyee?
ISA 36:19 Hamaata xoossatinne Arfada xoossati awun de7oona? Safarwayma xoossati awu bidonaa? Enti Samaariya ta kushepe wothi ekidona?
ISA 36:20 Ha biittata xoossatape ba biitta ta kushepe ashshidi ekiday de7ii? Yaatin hinte, ‘Goday Yerusalaame ta kushepe ashshana’ yaagidi qopeetii?” yaagis.
ISA 36:21 Shin kawoy entako, “Iyaw ay zaaroka immopite” yaagidi zorida gisho, asay issi qaalaka iyaw zaaronna si77i gidoosona.
ISA 36:22 Hessafe guye kawo gadho aysiya Kalqe na7ay Eliyaqeemi, xaafey Sheebinne taarike xaafey Asaafa na7ay Yo7aasi banta ma7uwa peedhidosona. Hizqiyaasako bidi Asoore halaqay gidaba ubbaa iyaw odidosona.
ISA 37:1 Kawoy Hizqiyaasi hessa si7ida wode ba ma7uwa peedhidi, kayo ma7o ma7idi, Godaa keethi gelis.
ISA 37:2 Kawo gadho aysiya Eliyaqeemi, xaafey Sheebinne kaalethiya kahineti kayo ma7o ma7idi, Amoxe na7aa nabiya Isayaasako baana mela kiittis.
ISA 37:3 Enti Isayaasako bidi, Hizqiyaasi haysada yaagees: “Ha gallasay meto gallas, seera gallasinne yeella gallas. Hessika na7i yeletanaw wodey gakin, bannakada yelanaw wolqi dhayida maccasa mela gidida.
ISA 37:4 De7o Xoossaa cayanaada iya goday, Asoore kawoy, kiitida halaqaa qaala Goday ne Xoossay si7onna aggenna. Qassi Goday ne Xoossay he qaala gaason iya seeronna aggenna. Hessa gisho, asaa giddofe attanaysatas woossa” yaagidosona.
ISA 37:5 Kawoy Hizqiyaasi kiittidaysa Isayaasi si7ida wode,
ISA 37:6 entako, “Hinte godaas haysada yaagidi odite: Goday, ‘Asoore kawa aylleti tana cayishin, neeni si7ida cashsha qaalas yayyofa.
ISA 37:7 Heko, I oda si7idi, ba biitta simmana mela, taani iya giddon issi ayyaana yeddana. Yaatada I ba biitta bidi yan mashshan hayqanaada oothana’ yaagees” yaagidi kiittis.
ISA 37:8 Asoore kawoy Laakiso katamaape dendidi bidaysa Asoore halaqay si7idi, guye simmidi kawoy Libina kataman oleteysa demmis.
ISA 37:9 Kawoy Sanakreemi, “Tophe kawoy Tirihaaqi nena olanaw yis” giya odaa si7idi, Hizqiyaasas haysada yaagidi kiittis.
ISA 37:10 “Yihuda kawa Hizqiyaasa, neeni ammanetiya Xoossay, ‘Yerusalaame Asoore kawa kushen yeggenna’ yaagidi cimmofo.
ISA 37:11 Asoore kawoti biittata ubbaa waati dhaysidaako neeni si7adasa. Yaatin, neeni attanee?
ISA 37:12 Beni ta mayzati dhaysida Gozaana, Kaaranenne Rafeesa biitta xoossatinne Talasaaran de7iya Edene biitta xoossati he biittata dhayope ashshidonaa?
ISA 37:13 Hamaata kawoy, Arfada kawoy, Safarwayma kawoy, Heena kawoynne Iwa kawoy awun de7oona?” yaagidi kiittis.
ISA 37:14 Hizqiyaasi dabdaabiya kiitetida asaape ekidi nabbabis. Dabdaabiya Godaa keethi efidi Godaa sinthan miccis.
ISA 37:15 Godaa haysada yaagidi woossis:
ISA 37:16 “Abeeti Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaw, kiruubetape gidduwan uttida Isra7eele Xoossaw, sa7a kawotethata ubbaa bolla ne xalaali Xoosse. Saluwanne sa7aa neeni medhadasa.
ISA 37:17 Abeeti Godaw, ne haytha yeggada haa si7a. Abeeti Godaw, ne ayfiya dooyada haa xeella. Nena, de7o Xoossaa, Sanakreemi cayida cashshaa si7a.
ISA 37:18 “Abeeti Godaw, Asoore kawoti kawotethatanne enta biitta dhaysidaysi ee tuma.
ISA 37:19 Enta xoossata taman xuuggidi dhaysidosona; Enta xoossati kaseka asa kushey massidi kessida mithinne shuchi gidiya gisho, xoossata gidokona.
ISA 37:20 Hiza abeeti Godaw, nu Xoossaw, ne xalaali Godaa gideysa sa7aa kawotethati ubbay erana mela neeni nuna iya kushepe ashsha” yaagidi woossis.
ISA 37:21 Hessafe guye, Amoxe na7ay Isayaasi Hizqiyaasas haysada yaagidi kiittis: Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees: “Neeni Asoore kawa Sanakreema gaason tana woossida woosa taani si7as” yaagees.
ISA 37:22 “Goday Sanakreema haysada yaagis. Xiyoone geela7iya nena kadhasu; leqasu; Yerusalaame na7iya ba huuphiya qaathada nena borasu.
ISA 37:23 Neeni cayidaynne toochiday oonee? Ne oodde bolla ne qaala dhoqu oothada odetadii? Ne otoron oona dhoqu gada xeelladii? Hessa ne oothiday Isra7eele Geeshshaa bollana gidennee?
ISA 37:24 Neeni kiitida asaa baggara Godaa cayadasa. Haysada yaagadasa: ‘Ta daro para gaaretara dhoqa zumaa huuphiya, Libaanose zuma xeera keyas. Ubbaafe adussa zigatanne ubbaafe lo77o xiiddata qanxas. Dhoqa bessan de7iya xittida wora gakas.
ISA 37:25 Taani allaga biittatan haatha olla bookada haathe iyape uyas. Gibxe biittan goggiya haatha ubbaa taani ta tohuwan yedhada melisas’ ” yaagadasa.
ISA 37:26 “Daro wodepe sinthe neeni gimbetida katamata laallada, shucha keela kessana mela, ta qofaa qacha wothidaysa ne erabikii? Taani ha77i oothiya oosota beni halcha wothas.
ISA 37:27 Hessa gisho, enta asaas wolqay ixin, enti kawuyidosonanne yeellatidosona. Enti maata melanne yooga ciishsha mela. Enti keethaa huuphen doliya maata melanne leegey kundisiya katha mela hanidosona.
ISA 37:28 “Shin neeni uttiya, keyiya, geliya bessaanne ta bolla ne hanqetida hanquwa erayis.
ISA 37:29 Ne ta bolla hanqetida gishonne, ne otoruwa taani si7ida gisho, taani ne siidhiyan dafo aathana; ne doonan bixaala barsana. Yaatada neeni yida ogiyara nena guye zaarana.”
ISA 37:30 Isayaasi kawa Hizqiyaasako haysada yaagis. “Hessi poletanaysas mallay haysa; ha laythinne wonto laythi hinte aasebo kaxida kathi maana. Shin heedzantho laythan hinte, hinte huuphen zeritenne cakite; woyne tokitenne iya ayfiya miite.
ISA 37:31 Yihuda asaape attidaysati xapho yeddana; ayfe ayfana.
ISA 37:32 Attida guuthati Yerusalaamepenne Xiyoone deriyape yaana. Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa qanaatey hessa oothana.
ISA 37:33 “Hessa gisho, Asoore kawuwaba Goday haysada yaagees. Asoore kawoy ha katamaa gelenna; woyko haysan ba dongiya dukenna; woyko ba gondalliya oykidi, ha katamaa sinthe aadhenna; woyko katamaa yuushuwa teqenna.
ISA 37:34 Asoore kawoy ba yida ogiyara guye simmana; ha katamaa gelenna.” Taani Goday haysa odayis.
ISA 37:35 “Taani ta bonchuwa gishonne ta aylliya Dawita gisho, ha katamaa ashshana” yaagis.
ISA 37:36 He qamma Godaa kiitanchoy keyidi, Asoore asay dunkaanida guta bidi, 185,000 addeta wodhis. Wontetha gallas asay dendidi ahi aha bolla dooretidaysa be7idosona.
ISA 37:37 Hessa gisho, Asoore kawoy Sanakreema dendidi, guye simmi bidi Nanawe kataman uttis.
ISA 37:38 Issi gallas Sanakreema ba xoossaa Nisirooka keethan goyinnishin, iya nayti Adramelekinne Sarxari mashshan iya wodhidi Araraate biitta baqatidosona. Iya na7ay Asiradooni iya bessan kawotis.
ISA 38:1 He wode kawoy Hizqiyaasi hargidi, hayqanaw matis. Amoxe na7ay nabey Isayaasi iyako bidi, Goday, “Ne hayqana haniya gisho ne keetha giigisa” yaagis.
ISA 38:2 Hizqiyaasi godaako simmi zin7idi, Godaa woossis.
ISA 38:3 “Abeeti Godaw, taani ne sinthan tumatethaninne kumetha wozanan hemetidaysanne nena ufaysiyabaa oothidaysa hassaya” yaagidi cametidi yeekis.
ISA 38:4 Hessafe guye, Godaa qaalay Isayaasako,
ISA 38:5 Bada Hizqiyaasako, Goday ne mayza Dawita Xoossay, “Taani ne woosa si7as; ne afuthaa be7as. Ne laytha bolla taani tammanne ichashu laytha gujana.
ISA 38:6 Nenanne ha katamaa Asoore kawa kushepe ashshana; taani ha katamaas oletana” yaaga.
ISA 38:7 “Goday ba gida qaala polanaw immida mallay haysa yaagis:
ISA 38:8 Akaazi keyanaw giigisida dethan de7iya kuyay tammu tango guye simmidi baana mela taani oothana” yaagis. Kuyay tammu tango guye simmidi bis.
ISA 38:9 Yihuda kawoy Hizqiyaasi hargiyafe paxidi xaafida mazmurey haysa:
ISA 38:10 Taani, “Ta de7o laythay bagga gakonna de7ishin, hayqo pengera gelana haniyana? Attida laytha bonqetana haniyana?” yaagas.
ISA 38:11 “Taani de7on de7eyisata biittan Godaa be7ike; ha sa7an ase be7ike; ha alamiyan de7eysatara zaarada de7ike.
ISA 38:12 Dorse heemmeyisata dunkaaniyada, ta de7oy shodetis. Dorzey afila wandaraashen xaaxeysada, ta de7oy xaaxetis. Dorzey afila duuthiyada, ta de7uwa duuthis. Wontafe omarsi gakanaw tana dhaysaasa” yaagas.
ISA 38:13 “Qamma kumetha danda7an naagas; gaammoda ta meqetha ubbaa menthadasa; wontafe omarsi gakanaw tana dhaysadasa.
ISA 38:14 Taani kaarodanne cilashoda waassas; holleda zuuzumas. Ta ayfey salo xeellishe daaburis; Godaw, taani un7etas; neeni tana ha un7aafe kessa” yaagas.
ISA 38:15 Haysa ubbaa oothiday Godaa; taani ay gaanaw danda7iyana? Ta shempoy un7etida gisho, ta laytha ubbaa ashketethan daana.
ISA 38:16 Godaw, haysa mela seeran asay de7on de7ees. Ha77i ta payyatetha zaarada, tana de7on wotha!
ISA 38:17 Ta un7etethay taw lo77o gidis; neeni ta shempuwa dhayo ollafe ashshadasa; ta nagara ubbaa neeni guye yeggadasa.
ISA 38:18 Duufoy nena galatenna; hayqoy nena sabbenna. Ollan wodhidaysati, ne ammanetetha ufaysi oothokona.
ISA 38:19 Taani hachi nena galateysada, de7on de7eysati nena galatoosona. Ne ammanetetha aawati banta naytas odoosona.
ISA 38:20 Goday tana ashshana; hessa gisho, nuuni nu de7o laytha ubban, Godaa keethan diithan yexana.
ISA 38:21 Isayaasi kase, “Balase daaxidi, iya kixa bolla wothite; I paxana” yaagis.
ISA 38:22 Hizqiyaasi kase, “Taani paxada Godaa keethi baanaysas mallay aybe” yaagidi Isayaasa oychis.
ISA 39:1 He wode, Baldaana na7ay, Babiloone kawoy Mardook-Baldaani, Hizqiyaasi hargidi paxidaysa si7ida gisho, dabdaabenne imota Hizqiyaasas yeddis.
ISA 39:2 Hizqiyaasi kiitetidi yida asata mokis. Ba shaluwa minjiya keethan de7iya bira, worqaa, sawuwa, lo77o zayte, ba ola miishetanne ba shaluwa minjiya keethan de7iyaba ubbaa enta bessis. Ba son woyko ba gadhuwan de7iyaba ubbaafe Hizqiyaasi enta bessonna aggidabay baawa.
ISA 39:3 Nabey Isayaasi kawa Hizqiyaasako bidi, “Ha asati woygidona? Awupe yidona?” yaagidi oychis. Hizqiyaasi, “Enti taako, haaho biitta Babiloonepe yidosona” yaagis.
ISA 39:4 Isayaasi zaaridi, “Enti ne son ay ay be7idonaa?” yaagidi oychis. Hizqiyaasi, “Enti ta gadhon de7iya ubbaba be7idosona; ta shaluwa minja keethan de7iyabaape taani enta bessonnabay baawa” yaagis.
ISA 39:5 Yaatin, Isayaasi Hizqiyaasako, “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday giyaba si7a.
ISA 39:6 ‘Neeni, kawo gadhon de7iyaba ubbaynne ne mayzati hachi gakanaw shiishidaba ubbay kumthi di7etidi, Babiloone biitta baana wodey yaana; aybika attenna.
ISA 39:7 Qassi neepe yeletida ne ashonne ne suuthu gidida ne kochati di7etidi baana; Babiloonen kawo gadhon shuufa gididi oothana’ yaagees” yaagis.
ISA 39:8 Hizqiyaasi zaaridi, “Neeni odida Godaa qaalay lo77o. Shin ta laythan saronne wopa gido” yaagidi qopis.
ISA 40:1 Hinte Xoossay haysada yaagees: “Ta deriya minthethite! Minthethite!
ISA 40:2 I aylletethan de7ida wodey poletis; iya nagaray atto geetetis; ba nagaraa gisho, Goday iya dako seeridaysa, Yerusalaames liiqo qaalan odite; awaajite” yaagees.
ISA 40:3 Haysada giya girsay si7etees; “Mela biittan Godaa ogiya giigisite; nu Xoossaas Araba mela biittan horoga sitti oothite.
ISA 40:4 Zangaara ubbay dhoqu gaana; dereynne zumay ziqi gaana; iita ogetinne gela kessati dembatana.
ISA 40:5 He wode Godaa bonchoy qoncana; asho ma7ida ubbay hessa issife be7ana. Godaa doonay haysa odis” yaagees.
ISA 40:6 Issi girsi, “Waassa” yaagishin si7as; taani, “Woygada waasso?” yaagas. “Asi ubbay maata mela; iya boncho ubbay ciishsha mela.
ISA 40:7 Godaa iya bolla shempiya wode, maatay melees; ciishshay qoqofetees; asi tuma maata mela.
ISA 40:8 Maati melees; ciishshi qoqofetees; shin nu Xoossaa qaalay merinaw eqidi de7ees” yaagada waassa.
ISA 40:9 Neno Xiyoones lo77oba odeyso; zuma bolla keya. Neno Yerusalaames lo77oba odeteyso; ne qaala dhoqu oothada waassa. Yayyofa; dhoqu ootha; Yihuda katamatas, “Hinte Xoossay haysish” yaaga.
ISA 40:10 Heko, Ubbaa Haariya Goday wolqara yees; iya qesey iyaw haarana. Iya woytoy iyara de7ees; ciggiya gatey iya sinthana.
ISA 40:11 I ba wudiya henthanchoda heemmana; Ba dorsa marata ba qesiyan shiishana; enta ba ki7on idimmana; dhantheyisata loddara kaalethana.
ISA 40:12 Haathata ba kushe qaaqan, salota takadhon likiday, biitta baana daachon makiday, deretanne zumata mizaanen likiday oonee?
ISA 40:13 Godaa Ayyaana eriday, iya zoridi tamaarsiday oonee?
ISA 40:14 Iyaw qoncisana mela oona zore oychidee? Suure pirdaa iya tamaarsiday oonee? Iya cincatethi tamaarsiday, iya akeeka bessiday oonee?
ISA 40:15 Heko, kawotethati xuggan de7iya issi xoko mela; enti mizaane bolla de7iya baana mela; I yuushoy abban teqetida biittata baanada likes.
ISA 40:16 Libaanose mithay yarsho bessan eexanaw gidenna; iyan de7iya do7ati xuussa yarshos gidokona.
ISA 40:17 Kawotethati ubbay iya sinthan baynaba mela; enti iya sinthan ubba aykoka gidokona; baynabapeka laafa.
ISA 40:18 Yaatin, Xoossaa hinte oodera ginayetii? Ayba misilera gathidi xeelletii?
ISA 40:19 Kushe hiillanchoy eeqa misile giigisees; worqa sheesheysi worqan lanxees; bira sheesheysi iya bolla bira santhalaata medhees.
ISA 40:20 Miishey bayna manqoy, yarshos xoodhonna mithi doorees. Misiley qaaxonna mela essanaw kushe hiillancho koyees.
ISA 40:21 Eribeeketii? Woyko si7ibeeketii? Haysi hintew koyrope odetibeennee? Woyko sa7i medhetoosape haysa hinte akeekibeketii?
ISA 40:22 I biitta gertuwafe bolla baggan ba araatan uttees; biittan de7iya asati xaqo mela. Salota gesheda miccees; dunkaaneda de7iya bessi oothidi tolees.
ISA 40:23 I, halaqata baynabaada oothees; ha alamiya haareyisata hada kessees.
ISA 40:24 Enti toketidi buroo gam7onnashin, zeretidi buroo xapho yeddonnashin, Goday enta bolla carko yeddis; enti melin gotey enta punoda efis.
ISA 40:25 Yaatin, tana oodera likeyetii? Tana oodera ginayetii? yaagees geeshshay.
ISA 40:26 Hinte ayfiya dhoqu oothidi salo xeellite; ha xoolintota medhiday oonee? I enta olanchoda kaalethees; enta taybuwa erees. I enta ubbaa enta sunthan sunthan xeegees; iya wolqa gitatethaafenne minotethafe dendoysan, entafe issoyka dhayenna.
ISA 40:27 Neno Yayqoobaa, neno Isra7eele, Ta ogey Godaape geemmis; ta pirday Xoossaafe qosetis; yaagada ayis odetay?
ISA 40:28 Erabikii? Si7abikii? Goday merina Xoossa; biitta ubbaa medhiday iya. I daaburenna; woyko argaacena; oonika iya qofaa eranaw danda7ena.
ISA 40:29 I daaburidaysatas wolqa immees; minotethi baynaysas minotethi gujees.
ISA 40:30 Hari attoshin yalaga nayti daaburoosona; argaacosona; na7atethati daaburidi kundoosona.
ISA 40:31 Shin Godaa ammanetidi naageysati, banta wolqaa oorathana. Enti arganthada qefen paallana; woxana, shin daaburokona; hemetana, shin argaacokona.
ISA 41:1 Hinteno, yuushoy abban teqetida biittato, si77i gidi, taani odeysa si7ite! Derey banta wolqaa ooratho; enti haa shiiqidi, odeto; ane nuuni pirdetanaw issife shiiqoos.
ISA 41:2 “Doloha baggafe issuwa denthidi biya bessa ubban xoono immey oonee? I kawotethata iya kushen aathidi immees; kawota iyaw haarisis. I enta ba mashshan bido kessees; ba dongiyan enta puno oothees.
ISA 41:3 I enta yedethishe, iya tohoy kase yedhiboona ogiyara saro kanthees.
ISA 41:4 Haysa oothidaynne poliday yeletethaaka koyrope xeegiday oonee? Taani Goday, koyruwara de7ayis wursetharaka de7ey tana” yaagees.
ISA 41:5 Yuushoy abban teqetida biittati, hessa be7idi yayyidosona; sa7aa gaxan de7eysati kokoridosona. Enti issife shiiqidi taako yidosona.
ISA 41:6 Issoy issuwa maaddees; ba ishaa, “Minna” yaagees.
ISA 41:7 Kushe hiillanchoy worqa sheesheysa minthethees; naariqan qoxidi lee7iseysi baachan birata seeriseysa, “Minna” gees. I birata dhantheysa, “Lo77o oothaasa” yaagees; eeqay qaaxonna mela mismaaren dhishees.
ISA 41:8 “Shin neno Isra7eele, ta aylliyaw, ta doorida Yayqoobaa, ta laggiya Abrahaame kochaw,
ISA 41:9 taani nena biitta gaxape ehas; haahosoope xeegada, ‘Neeni ta aylle’ taani nena dooras; taani nena yeggike.
ISA 41:10 Yayyofa, taani neera de7ayis; dagammofa, taani ne Xoossaa. Taani nena minthana; nena maaddana; taani nena xooniya ta ushacha kushiyan katisana.
ISA 41:11 Ne bolla hanqetiya ubbay yeellatidi kawuyana; neera eqeteysati baynaba gidana.
ISA 41:12 Ne morketa neeni koyana; shin enta demmaka; nena oleysati baynaba gidana.
ISA 41:13 Taani Goday, ne Xoossay, ne ushacha kushiya oykana; yayyofa, taani nena maaddana.
ISA 41:14 Neno guxuniyaw, Yayqooba, hinteno Isra7eele asaw, yayyofite; taani hintena maaddana; hintena woziya Isra7eele Geeshshay tana.
ISA 41:15 Heko, taani nena oorathi, qaranne achara de7iya, kathi qoxiya miishe oothas. Neeni dereta qoxada liiqisana; zumataka puno oothana.
ISA 41:16 Neeni enta punnana; carkoy enta efana; shin neeni Godan ufaytana; Isra7eele Geeshshan bonchetana.”
ISA 41:17 “Manqotinne metootanchoti haathe koyana, shin demmokona; enta qoodhey saamon melana. Gidoshin, taani Goday enta si7ana; taani, Isra7eele Xoossay, enta aggike.
ISA 41:18 Taani mela zumata bolla shaafa, zangaaratan pulto dhuusana. Bazzuwa haathi eelliya bessi, mela biitta pultoy keyaso oothana.
ISA 41:19 Taani mela biittan, ziga, soqala mithi, barseneete mithaanne shamaho dolisana. Mela biitta xiiddi, maaroynne caci kumida biitta oothana.
ISA 41:20 Isra7eele Geeshshay hessa medhidaysanne Godaa kushey hessa oothidaysa asay be7ana, erana, qopananne akeekana mela taani hessa oothas.”
ISA 41:21 “Ane hinte mootuwa shiishite” yaagees Goday; “Ane hinte marka haa ehite” yaagees Yayqooba kawoy.
ISA 41:22 Ane enti banta eeqata haa eho, aybi hananeeko enta eeqati nuus odo. Nuuni akeekana melanne enta wursethaa erana mela kase hanidabay aybeko nuus odo; woyko sinthafe hananaba nuus qonciso.
ISA 41:23 Hinte xoossata gideysa nuuni erana mela sinthafe yaanaw de7iyaba nuus odite. Nuuni dagammana melanne yayyana mela, lo77o gidin iita gidin ane issiba oothite.
ISA 41:24 Shin hinte baynaba mela; hinte oosoyka hada; hintena dooriya asayka ixetidaysata.
ISA 41:25 Taani pudeha baggafe issuwa denthin, I yees. Ta sunthaa xeegiya issoy dolohape yaana; oto medheysi urqa yedheysada, I kaaletheyisata yedhana.
ISA 41:26 Nuuni erana melanne I like gaana mela kasetidi nuus haysa odiday oonee? Hintefe oonika kasetidi haysa qoncisiday, woyko awaajiday woyko ba qaala sissiday baawa.
ISA 41:27 Taani haysa kasetada Xiyoones odas; taani Yerusalaames mishiraacho odeysa immas.
ISA 41:28 Shin taani xeelliya wode issoyka baawa; taani zore oychiya wode enta eeqata giddofe zaaro immiya issoyka baawa.
ISA 41:29 Heko, enti ubbay hada; enta oosoyka pathenna; sheeshidi medhida enta misiletika carko.
ISA 42:1 “Taani katisada oykida ta aylley, ta iyan ufayteysi, taani dooridaysi haysa. Taani ta Ayyaana iya bolla wothas; I kawotethatas suure pirda ehana.
ISA 42:2 I waassenna; ba qaala dhoqu oothenna ba qaala ogen sissenna.
ISA 42:3 Dincetida mayriya I menthenna; lii7i lii7idi eexiya muqaada I toysenna; ammanetethan I suure pirda ehana.
ISA 42:4 I biittan suure pirda essenna gakanaw argaacena woyko guye geenna. Yuushoy abban teqetida biittan de7iya asay iya higgiya si7anaw naagees.
ISA 42:5 Salota medhidaynne enta micciday, sa7aanne sa7a bolla de7iyaba medhiday, sa7an de7iya asaas shempo immiday, iyan hemetiya ubbaas de7o immiday, Godaa Xoossay haysada yaagees.
ISA 42:6 Taani Goday nena xillotethan xeegas; ne kushiya oykada nena naagana. Taani nena asaas caaqo oothana; kawotethatas poo7o oothada immana.
ISA 42:7 Neeni qooqe ayfeta dooyana; dhuma ollan, qasho keethan de7eyisata kessana.
ISA 42:8 Taani Godaa; hessi ta sunthaa; ta bonchuwa taani haras immike; ta galataa eeqatas immike.
ISA 42:9 Heko taani kase odidaba ubbay poletidosona; ha77i taani oorathaba awaajayis; enti hananaape sinthe taani hintew odayis” yaagees.
ISA 42:10 Godaas ooratha mazmure yexite; biitta gaxape gaxaa gakanaw iya galata yexite. Abba giddora beysatinne iyan de7eysati, yuushoy abban teqetida biittatinne iyan de7iya ubbay yexo.
ISA 42:11 Mela biittan de7iya katamati, Qedaare asay de7iya gutati banta qaala dhoqu oothonna. Sela7a kataman de7eysati ufaysan yexo; deriya huuphen banta ililsaa sisso.
ISA 42:12 Enti boncho Godaas immo; iya galata yuushoy abban teqetida biittatan odo.
ISA 42:13 Goday mino asada keyana; ba qaala dhoqu oothidi ola awaajana. Ba qaala dhoqu oothidi gereerana; ba morketa xoonana.
ISA 42:14 Daro wode si77i gada gam7as; si77i gada danda7as. Shin ha77i iqethi oykida maccasada ta waassana; tooka shempananne peenuqana.
ISA 42:15 Deretanne zumata laallana; enta bolla dolidaba ubbaa melisana. Shaafata yuushoy abban teqetida biitta kessana; eele haathata melisana.
ISA 42:16 Taani qooqeta enti eronna ogiyara kaalethana; enti eronna horogara efana. Enta sinthan dhumaa poo7o kessana; enta sinthan de7iya ogiya baasana. Ha ubbaa taani entaw oothana; taani enta oothonna aggike.
ISA 42:17 “Shin eeqa misiletan ammaneteysati, misileta, ‘Hinte nu xoossata’ yaageysati, yeellan guye simmana.
ISA 42:18 Hinte tulleti, si7ite; hinte qooqeti, xeellite, loythidi be7ite.
ISA 42:19 Ta aylliyafe hari qooqey oonee? Ta kiittidaysafe hari tulley oonee? Bana Godaas aathidi immida uraape Godaa aylliyafe hari qooqey oonee?
ISA 42:20 Darobaa be7adasa, shin akeekaka; ne haythay dooya, shin si7aka” yaagees.
ISA 42:21 Goday ba xillotetha gisho, ba higgiya gitayanawunne bonchanaw dosis.
ISA 42:22 Shin ha asay bonqetis; de7iyaba eketis. Olla giddon xihen oyketis, qasho keethan enta bolla gordetis. Enti bonqetidosona, shin enta ashshey baawa; di7etidosona, shin oonika “Enta guye zaara” giya asi baawa.
ISA 42:23 Hinte giddofe haysa si7ey oonee? sinthafe yaana wodiyaba qopey oonee?
ISA 42:24 Yayqooba di7etethas, Isra7eele bonqees aathidi immiday oonee? Nagara oothidi nu qohida, iya ogiya kaallanawunne, iya higgiya kiitetanaw nuuni ixida Godaa gidenneyee?
ISA 42:25 Hessa gisho, I enta bolla ba eexiya hanquwa gussis; enta yuushuwa tama lacon teqis, shin enti eribookona; I enta xuuggis, shin enti akeekibokona.
ISA 43:1 Shin neno Yayqoobaa nena medhiday, neno Isra7eele, nena giigisiday, Goday haysada yaagees: “Taani nena wozida gisho yayyofa; taani nena ne sunthan xeegas; neeni tabaa.
ISA 43:2 Neeni haatha giddora pinniya wode taani neera gidana. Neeni shaafata giddora pinniya wode enti nena mittokona. Neeni tama giddora aadhiya wode xuugetaka; lacoyka nena meenna.
ISA 43:3 Taani nena Ashshiysa, Isra7eele Geeshshaa, Godaa ne Xoossaa. Gibxe new wozo oothada, Tophenne Saaba new laame oothada immana.
ISA 43:4 Neeni ta sinthan al7onne boncho gidiya gisho, taani nena dosiya gisho, asaa ne gisho, kawotethata ne shempuwa gisho laame oothada immana.
ISA 43:5 Taani neera de7iya gisho yayyofa; taani ne nayta dolohape nena wulohape shiishana.
ISA 43:6 Taani pudeha baggaa, ‘Enta zaarada eha!’ dugeha baggaa, ‘Enta teqofa’ yaagana. Ta adde nayta haahosoope, ta macca nayta sa7aa gaxape ehana.
ISA 43:7 Enti ta sunthan xeegetidaysata, taani ta bonchuwas medhidaysata, taani giigisidaysatanne oothidaysata hammite.”
ISA 43:8 Ayfey de7ishin qooqida asata, haythi de7ishin tullida asata kessa.
ISA 43:9 Kawotethati ubbay issife shiiqo; asay duulata utto. Enta eeqata giddofe haysa odanaw, kase aadhidabata nuus qoncisanaw danda7ey oonee? Hara asay si7idi, “Haysi tuma” gaana mela, enti like gideysa bessanaw banta markata eho.
ISA 43:10 Goday haysada yaagees: “Hinte ta markata; hinte tana erana melanne ammanana mela taani Xoosse gideysa akeekana mela taani doorida ta aylleti hintena. Taape kase hara xoossi medhetibeenna; taape guye hara xoossi deenna.
ISA 43:11 Taani Godaa; taape attishin, hari ashshey baawa.
ISA 43:12 Ta kasetada odas, ta oothanaba awaajas, ta ashshas. Hinte giddon de7iya allaga xoossatape hessa oothiday baawa. Taani Xoosse gideysas hinte taw markata.
ISA 43:13 Merinaape merinaw taani Xoosse; ta kushepe oonika ashshena; ta oothidaba laammanaw danda7ey baawa” yaagees Goday.
ISA 43:14 Goday, hintena Woziya, Isra7eele Geeshshay, haysada yaagees: “Hinte gisho, taani Babiloone bolla olanchota kiittana. Babilooneta ubbaa enti ceeqetiya markabetara betana mela oothana.
ISA 43:15 Taani Godaa, hinte Geeshshaa, Isra7eele medhida hinte Kawa” yaagees.
ISA 43:16 Abba giddon oge, wolqaama haathata giddora horoga kessida Goday haysada yaagees.
ISA 43:17 Para gaaretanne parata, olanchotanne mino asata abban ehidi, enti dendonna mela yeggiday, enta muqaada tamada toysida.
ISA 43:18 Goday haysada yaagees: “Kasebata haasayopite; benibata qopofite.
ISA 43:19 Heko, ha77i taani oorathaba oothayis; ika ha77i dolana. Hessi hintew bentennee? Taani mela biittan oge, mela biittan shaafata kessana.
ISA 43:20 Taani doorida, ta asaas mela biittan haathe, mela biittan haatha shaafata immas. Wora do7ati, workanatinne yanchoti tana bonchana.
ISA 43:21 Taani taw medhida dere gidiya gisho, ta galataa awaajana mala ta haysa oothas.
ISA 43:22 Shin neno Yayqoobaa, neeni ta sunthaa xeegabaka; neno Isra7eele, neeni tana saletadasa.
ISA 43:23 Neeni taw xuussa yarshos dorse ehabaaka; hara yarshonka tana bonchabaaka. Taani nena katha yarsho eha gada waaysabike; ixaane taw cuyiso gada daabursabike.
ISA 43:24 Neeni taw sawiya ixaane shammabaaka; ne modho yarshon tana ufaysabaka. Shin neeni ne nagaran tana waaysadasa; ne naaquwan tana daabursadasa.
ISA 43:25 “Ta gisho gada ne nagaraa quchey tana; ne nagaraa zaarada qopike.
ISA 43:26 Ane tana hassayisa; neeni xillo gideysa erisanaw issife shiiqidi mootetoos.
ISA 43:27 Ne koyro aaway nagara oothis; ne astamaareti tana qohidosona.
ISA 43:28 Hessa gisho, taani ta keetha halaqata kawushas; Yayqooba gados, Isra7eele cashshas aathada immas.”
ISA 44:1 Shin ta aylliya Yayqooba, ta doorida Isra7eele, ha77ika si7a.
ISA 44:2 Nena medhida, ne aaye ulon nena giigisida Goday haysada yaagees. Ta aylliya Yayqooba, taani doorida Yishuruuna, yayyofa.
ISA 44:3 Taani saamotida biittan haatha gussana; mela biitta bolla shaafa gogisana. Ta Ayyaana ne nayta bolla, ta anjuwa ne kochaa bolla gussana.
ISA 44:4 Enti haatha doonan dolida maatada, shaafa lanqen de7iya mithada aacana.
ISA 44:5 Issoy bana, taani Godaaba yaagana; hankoy bana Yayqooba sunthan xeegana; haray ba kushiya bolla, “Taani Godaaba” yaagidi caddana; I Isra7eele iya sunthan xeegetana.
ISA 44:6 Goday, Isra7eele Kawoynne iya Woziday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees: “Koyroy tana; wursethay tana; taape hara Xoossi baawa.
ISA 44:7 Ta meli oonee? De7iko ane awaajo; ane ta sinthan eqidi odo. Benipe doomidi, hanidaba odo; sinthafe hananaba qonciso.
ISA 44:8 Yayyofite; dagammopite; taani haysa benipe doomada odabikina? Kasetada erisabikina? Hessas hinte taw marka. Taape attishin, hara Xoossi de7ii? Hara Zaalli baawa; oonika baynaysa ta erayis” yaagees.
ISA 44:9 Eeqa misileta medhiya ubbay hada; iyan ufaytiyabati enta go7okona. Enta markati qooqeta entaw eri baawa; enti yeellatana.
ISA 44:10 Bana go77onna eeqa Xoossa oothidi giigisiday oonee?
ISA 44:11 Eeqa medhey asepe attishin, hara gidenna; inne iya laggeti yeellatana; ubbati issife shiiqidi eqo, yayyo, yeellato.
ISA 44:12 Birata qoxeysi eeqa oothanaw ba birata taman seerisidi mala immanaw ba mino kushiyan naariqan qoxees. Hessa giigisishe koshatees; iya wolqay wurees; saamotesinne labbanees.
ISA 44:13 Anaaxey wodoron likidi irsaasen iya bolla malla wothees; liiqisiya miishen liiqisees. Lo77o asa malan medhidi ba eeqa keethan wothees.
ISA 44:14 I hessa oothanaw ziga qanxees; wola woyko xiidda wora giddofe dooridi diccana mela oothees. Woyko ziga tokidi iran diccana mela naagees.
ISA 44:15 Iyape baggaa eethanaw go7etees; iyape baggaa ekidi, eethidi kayees; baggaa eethidi kathi kathees. Attidaysa ekidi xoosse oothidi iyaw goyinnees; eeqa medhidi iya sinthan gufannees.
ISA 44:16 Iyape baggaa eethidi kathi kathees; baggan asho caacidi kallidi mees. Qassi tama kayishe, “Eroshsho, tama goopa; waani ho77i” yaagees.
ISA 44:17 Qassi attida mithaa massidi, goyinniya xoossa misile kessees. He misiliya sinthan gufannidi, iyaw goyinnees; “Neeni taw xoosse gidiya gisho, tana ashsha” yaagidi woossees.
ISA 44:18 Enti aykoka erokona; aykoka akeekokona; enti be7onna mela enta ayfey goozetis; akeekona mela enta wozanay gordetis.
ISA 44:19 Eeqa oothiya asaa giddofe ba wozanan, “Iyape baggaa taman eethas; iya bonquwan kathi kathas; iyan asho caacada mas. Iyape attidaysa ixetida eeqa oothada medho? attida cugetha mithas gufannada goyinno?” yaagidi qopiya woyko akeekiya asi baawa.
ISA 44:20 I bido mees; iya cimetida wozanay iya hara soo kaalethis. I ba shempuwa ashshanaw danda7enna; “Haysi ta ushacha kushen de7ey wordo gidenna” gaanaw danda7enna.
ISA 44:21 Goday haysada yaagees: “Yayqoobaa, haysa akeeka; Isra7eele, neeni ta aylle gidiya gisho haysa hassaya. Taani nena medhas; neeni ta aylle; neno Isra7eele, taani nena dogike.
ISA 44:22 Taani ne nagaraa pittada diggas, ne naaquwa caaganada quchas. Taani nena wozida gisho, taako simma” yaagees.
ISA 44:23 “Hinteno saloto, Goday haysa oothida gisho, ufaysan yexite; neno biittaw, ilila. Hinteno dereto, worawnne iya giddon de7iya mitha ubbay mazmure yexite. Goday Yayqooba wozis; Isra7eele giddon bonchetis.
ISA 44:24 Ne aaye ulon nena medhidaysi, nena wozidaysi Goday haysada yaagees: Ubbabaa Medhiday, salota tarka micciday; sa7aaka tarka hiixiday, taani Godaa.
ISA 44:25 Taani wordo nabeta tinbitiya hada oothas; marota kaayowa eeyatethi kessas. Taani cincata cincatethaa shira yeggas; enta eraa eeya oothas.
ISA 44:26 Taani ta aylleta qaala minthana; ta nabeta tinbitiya polana. Taani Yerusalaame katamaa, ‘Neeni asay de7iya bessi gidana’ yaagas; Yihuda katamata, ‘Hinte simmidi keexetana; hinte gimbey ooraxana’ yaagas.
ISA 44:27 Taani goggiya haathata melisana gisho ciimmo haatha, ‘Ne mela’ yaagana.
ISA 44:28 Qiroosako, ‘Neeni ta asaa heemmeysa; neeni ta halchuwa poleysa’ yaagana. I, Yerusalaame katamaa, ‘Neeni simmada keexetana’; xoossa keethaa, ‘Ne baasoy yegetana’ ” yaagana.
ISA 45:1 Goday tiyidaysas, kawota danco bilisaana mela, deriya iyaw haarisana mela, pengeti iya sinthan dooyetana mela iya ushacha kushiya oykida Qiroosa Goday haysada yaagees:
ISA 45:2 Taani ne sinthara baana; dereta dembayana; naase birata sanqata menthana; birata kobeta qanxana.
ISA 45:3 Nena ne sunthan xeegey tana Godaa, Isra7eele Xoossaa gideysa neeni erana mela taani new dhuman de7iya shaluwa, geeman qosetida duretetha immana.
ISA 45:4 Ta aylliya Yayqooba gisho, taani doorida Isra7eele gisho, taani nena ne sunthan xeegas. Neeni tana eronna ixikoka, taani nena boncho sunthan xeegas.
ISA 45:5 Taani Godaa; taape hara xoosse baawa; neeni tana eronna ixikoka taani new wolqa immana.
ISA 45:6 Hessika awi doliyasope wulliyaso gakanaw taape hari baynaysa asay erana melasa; taani Godaa; taape hara xoossi baawa.
ISA 45:7 Taani poo7onne dhuma medhas; Sarotethinne dhayo ehayis; ha ubba taani Goday oothayis.
ISA 45:8 Hinteno saloto, bollafe xillotethi tigite; shaarati bukiso. Biittay dooyeto, atotethi xillotethay issife dolo; taani Goday haysa medhas.
ISA 45:9 Bana Medhidaysara palamiya uraa ayye! I sa7an meqidi wodhida otope issuwa mela. Otoy bana medheysako, Neeni, “Ay oothay?” “New kushey baawa” yaagiyee?
ISA 45:10 Ba aawa, “Tana ayis yeladii?” giya, ba aayiw, “Tana haysada ayis bannakadii?” giya uraa ayye!
ISA 45:11 Goday, Isra7eele Geeshshay, iya Medhidaysi haysada yaagees: “Sinthafe hananaba, hinte tana ta naytabaa oychanaw, ta kushe oosotaba tana kiittanaw bessetii?
ISA 45:12 Taani sa7aa oothas; aseka iya bolla medhas. Salota taani ta kushen miccas; enta bolla xoolintota ubbaa wothas.
ISA 45:13 Taani Qiroosa xillotethan denthas; iya ogiya ubbaa suure oothana. Miishe qanxonna woyko woyto immonna I ta katamaa keexana; ta asaa di7ope zaarana” yaagees ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ISA 45:14 “Goday haysada yaagees: Gibxe duretethaynne Tophe zal7ey, geesay adussa gidida Saaba asati neeko yidi, nebaa gidana; enti santhalaatan qashetidi, nena kaallana. Enti new goyinnishe, ‘Xoossi neera de7ees; iyape attishin, hara xoossi baawa’ ” yaagana.
ISA 45:15 “Isra7eele Ashshiya Godaa Xoossaw, tuma neeni nena genthiya Xoosse.
ISA 45:16 Eeqa medheysati ubbay yeellatananne kawuyana; enti issife yeella ma7ana.
ISA 45:17 Shin Goday Isra7eele merinaa atotethan ashshana; hinte merinaw yeellateketa kawuyeketa.
ISA 45:18 Salota medhida Goday, biitta giigisidi oothiday, asi daana melape attishin, biitta coo medhiboonna Xoossay haysada yaagees: taani Godaa; taape hari baawa.
ISA 45:19 Taani geeman, woyko dhuma biittan uttada odabike. Yayqooba zerethaako, ‘Tana coo bessan koyite’ gabike; taani Goday tumaa haasayis; like gididaba qoncisayis.
ISA 45:20 Hinteno kawotethata giddofe attidaysato, issife haa mata shiiqite. Mithafe oosetida eeqa misiliya tooki yuuyeysatas, ashshanaw danda7onna xoossata woosseysatas eri baawa.
ISA 45:21 Ane palamit; hinte mootuwas gaaso shiishite; issife zoretite. Daro wodepe kase haysa odiday oonee? Benipe haysa awaajiday oonee? Tana Godaa gidikinaayee? Taape attishin, hara Xoossi baawa. Taape attishin, hari xilloynne ashshiya Xoossi baawa.
ISA 45:22 Hinteno biitta gaxape gaxa gakanaw de7eysato, taako simmidi attite; taape attishin, hara Xoossi baawa.
ISA 45:23 Taani tanan caaqas; guye simmonna qaali ta doonape xillotethan keyis. Gulbati ubbay taw gulbatana; inxarsi ubbay tanan caaqana.
ISA 45:24 Enti tabaa haasayishe, ‘Xillotethinne minotethi Godaa xalaalan de7ees’ yaagana. Iya ixiya ubbay iyako yidi yeellatana.
ISA 45:25 Shin Isra7eele zeretha ubbay, Godan, xoononne boncho demmana.
ISA 46:1 Beella geetetiya Babiloone eeqay hokis; Nebo geetetiya eeqay gufannis. Enta misileti caana mehe bolla caanetidosona; daaburida mehetas deexo tooho gididosona.
ISA 46:2 Deexuwape dendidaysan caana meheti, caanara issife kundidosona. Eeqati bantana ashshanaw danda7onna gisho bantaw di7etidi bidosona.
