ISA 46:3 Hinteno, Isra7eelepe attidaysato, Yayqooba kochato, hinte qanthatida wodepe doomada naagiday, hinte yeletida wodepe doomada tookiday, taani odeysa si7ite.
ISA 46:4 Hinte cimana gakanaw, puulumana gakanaw taani tana; ta hintena maaddana. Taani hintena medhas; ta hintena naagana; ta hintena tookananne ashshana.
ISA 46:5 Tana oodera gaaddeyeetii? woyko oodera likiseetii? Enti woli daanees gaanaw tana oodera ginayetii?
ISA 46:6 Asay worqanne bira banta qarxiitape qolidi, xoosse oothidi medhana mela worqa sheesheysas immoosona. I oothidi simmin enti eeqa sinthan gufannidi goyinnoosona.
ISA 46:7 Enti iya denthidi, banta hashiyan tookidi, iya bessan iya wothin, I he bessan eqi aggees. Ba de7iya bessaafe qaaxenna; asi iyako waassiko iyaw zaaro immenna; iya metuwape iya ashshena.
ISA 46:8 Hinteno nagaranchoto, haysa hassayite; qopite; hinte wozanan wothite.
ISA 46:9 Beni wode hanidabata hassayite; taape attishin, hara Xoossi baawa; taani Xoosse; ta meli oonika baawa.
ISA 46:10 Ta qofay minnana; taani ta halchuwa ubbaa polana. Wursethan hananaba doomethan, sinthafe hananaba koyrottada erisayis.
ISA 46:11 Doloha baggafe bonqiya kafo, haaho biittafe ta qofaa poliya asi xeegana. Taani qopidaba polana; taani halchidaba oothana.
ISA 46:12 Hinteno wozani muumidaysato, xillotethafe haakidaysato tana si7ite.
ISA 46:13 Taani ta xillotethaa matayana; ika haahona gidenna. Ta atotethay gam7enna; ta atotetha Xiyoones, ta bonchuwa Isra7eeles immana” yaagees.
ISA 47:1 “Babiloone geela7ee, duge wodhada baana bolla utta. Babiloone naatte, ne araata aggada sa7an utta. Hizape guye neeni saaphotiyaronne baalotiyaro geetetaka.
ISA 47:2 Woxa teqada kathi gaacca; ne guulunthaa qaara; ne adussa ma7uwa kessa; ne wodiriya qaarada shaafa pinna.
ISA 47:3 Ne kalloy qaaretana; ne pokoy bentana. Taani halo keyana; oodeska qadhetike” yaagees Goday.
ISA 47:4 Nuna Woziya Isra7eele Geeshshaa sunthay Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa.
ISA 47:5 “Babiloone naatte, bada dhuman si77i gada utta; Hizape guye neeni kawotethata kawiw geetetaka.
ISA 47:6 Taani ta asaa hanqetas; ta laata tunisas; taani enta ne kushen aathada immas. Neeni entaw qadhetabaaka; cimidaysata bolla ne deexo qambara wothadasa.
ISA 47:7 Neeni, ‘Taani merinaw kawo gidana’ yaagadasa; shin ne oothida oosuwanne iya wursethay waananeko qopabaaka.
ISA 47:8 “Neno wopu gada uttidaarenne naagetada de7idaare si7a. Ne wozanan, ‘Taape attishin, hari baawa; taani am7o gidike; woyko yelada na7i bayna asi gidike’ yaagadasa.
ISA 47:9 Ha nam7ubati qoponna issi gallas ne bolla yaana. Ne bitay ay darikoka, ne murunnoy ay wolqaamikoka neeni ne naytape mela atteysinne am7etethay attenna.
ISA 47:10 “Neeni ne iitatethan ammanetada, ‘Oonika tana be7enna’ yaagadasa. Ne eratethaynne cincatethay nena balethin, neeni ne wozanan, ‘Taape attishin, hari baawa’ yaagadasa.
ISA 47:11 Shin neeni waatada ne bitan haassaneeko eronna iitay ne bolla yaana. Neeni gate qanxanaw danda7onna dhayoy ne bolla wodhana; qassi neeni aykoka qoponna gadoy ne bolla yaana.
ISA 47:12 “Ane neeni ne na7atethafe doomada oothashe de7ida ne bitaanne ne murunnuwa ha77ika ootha. Ooni eri ne qopidaysa mela hananeeko woyko neeni iyara daganthaneeko.
ISA 47:13 Neeni ekida zorey ubbay daabursafe attishin, nena aykoka maaddibeenna. Salo xoolinto taybeysatinne iya xeellidi ageenan ageenan hananaba odeysati ane nena asho.
ISA 47:14 Enti buure mela; tami enta maana. Enti tama lacuwape bantana ashshanaw danda7okona. Asi kayaa bonqoy woyko asi iya sinthan uttidi ho77iya tama gidenna.
ISA 47:15 Neeni entara daaburidaysati, na7atethafe doomidi neera zal7idaysati new hessa mela. Enti issoy issoy ba balan balan oyketana; nena ashshiya oonika baawa.”
ISA 48:1 “Hinteno, Yayqooba soo asaw, Isra7eele sunthan xeegetidaysato, Yihuda kochaafe yidaysato, haysa si7ite. Hinte Godaa sunthan caaqeta; Isra7eele Xoossaa xeegeta; shin tumatethaninne xillotethan gidenna.
ISA 48:2 Hinte, ‘Nuuni geeshsha kataman de7oos; Isra7eele Xoossan zempoos; iya sunthay Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa’ ” yaagidi ceeqeteta.
ISA 48:3 Taani sinthafe hananabata daro wodepe kase odas. ta doonape enti keyin, enti eeson poletana mela oothas.
ISA 48:4 Neeni odin si7onnaysa, ne morgey birata mela gideysa ne som7oy naase biratada leeqamonaysa taani erayis.
ISA 48:5 Hessa gisho, neeni, “Haysa ta eeqay oothis; ta masetida misileti, ta sheeshada oothida misileti oothidosona” goonnaada, Taani hessa new benipe doomada odas. Enti hananaape sinthe taani enta new erisas.
ISA 48:6 “Ta kase odidaysa ne si7adasa; I poletidaysa be7adasa, yaatin iya tumatethaa ekikii? Hizape ne eronna oorathabata ta new odana.
ISA 48:7 Enti beni medhetidaba gidonashin ha77i medhetidosona. Neeni, ‘Taani enta erayis’ goonnaada haysafe kase neeni entaba si7abaka.
ISA 48:8 Neeni si7abaka; erabaaka; ne haythay benipeka dooyetibeenna. Neeni ay cimmiya aseeko taani erayis; neeni yeletoosape geella geetetada xeegeteysa erayis.
ISA 48:9 Ta sunthaa gisho, taani ta hanquwa zaarana; ta bonchuwa gisho nena dhaysona mela ta hanquwa teqana.
ISA 48:10 Taani nena paacas; birada gidonashin taani nena meto taman paacas.
ISA 48:11 Taani ta gisho, haysa oothana; ta sunthay tooshetana mela koyke; taani ta bonchuwa haras immike.”
ISA 48:12 “Neno Yayqooba, taani xeegida Isra7eele, taani odiyaba si7a; taani iya; koyroyka tana; wursethayka tana.
ISA 48:13 Ta kushey biitta baasuwa medhis; ta ushacha kushey salota miccis. Taani enta xeegiya wode enti issife eqoosona.
ISA 48:14 “Hinte ubbay issife shiiqidi si7ite; eeqatape haysi hananaysa sinthatidi odiday oonee? Goday dooridaysi iya qofaa Babiloone bolla polana; iya qeseyka Babiloone biitta bolla gidana.
ISA 48:15 Taani, ta huuphen iyaw odas; iya xeegas; ta iya ehana; I oothiyaba ubbay iyaw poletana.
ISA 48:16 “Taako haa shiiqidi haysa si7ite; “Taani koyrope doomada geeman odabike; hessi hanida wodepe doomada taani yan de7ayis” yaagees. Ha77ika Ubbaa Haariya Godaynne iya Ayyaanay tana kiittidosona.
ISA 48:17 Nena woziya Goday, Isra7eele Geeshshay haysada yaagees: “Nena maaddiyaba tamaarsey ne baanaw bessiya ogiya ne kaalethey, tana ne Godaa, ne Xoossaa.
ISA 48:18 Neeni ta kiitaa si7idaba gidiyako, ne sarotethay shaafa haathada gogganashin; ne xillotethay abba beetada hananashin.
ISA 48:19 Ne kochay abba shafeda, ne nayti taybetonna baana mela daranashin; enta sunthay ta sinthafe dhayenna; kichennashin” yaagees.
ISA 48:20 Babiloone biittafe keyite; Babiloonepe baqatite! Qaala dhoqu oothidi, ufaysan haysada yaagidi waassite. Sa7aa gaxape gaxa gakanaw haysa kiittite; “Goday ba aylliya Yayqooba wozis” yaagidi odite.
ISA 48:21 I enta mela biittara kaalethida wode saamotibookona. Zaallafe haathi entaw pultis; I zaalla phalqin haathi dhuuqis.
ISA 48:22 “Iitatas saroy baawa” yaagees Goday.
ISA 49:1 Hinteno, yuushoy abban teqetida biittato, taani odeysa si7ite. Hinteno, haahoson de7iya kawotethato akeekite; taani yeletanaape kase Goday tana xeegis; ta aaye ulon de7ishin, ta suntha sunthis.
ISA 49:2 Ta inxarsaa qara mashshi oothis; ba kushiya kuyan tana genthis. I tana poshetida donge yiishshi oothidi ba shoohuwan tana qottis.
ISA 49:3 I taako, “Isra7eele, neeni ta aylle; taani ta bonchuwa nenan qoncisana” yaagis.
ISA 49:4 Shin taani, “Taani coo daaburas; ta wolqaa go77i baynabaninne hadaban wursas. Gidoshin, ta pirday Godaa matana; ta gatey ta Xoossaa matana” yaagas.
ISA 49:5 Taani Godaa ayfe sinthan bonchetida gisho, ta Xoossay taw wolqa gidida gisho, Yayqooba iyako zaaranaw Isra7eele iyako shiishanaw, taani iya aylle gidana mela tana ta aaye ulon doorida
ISA 49:6 Goday taako haysada yaagees; Neeni Yayqooba kochaa denthanaw Isra7eelepe attida guuthata zaarada ehanaw neeni taw aylle gideysi daro guuthaba. Hessafe aathada, ta atotethay biitta gaxa gakana mela taani nena kawotethatas poo7o oothana.
ISA 49:7 Kadhetidaysasinne ixetidaysas qassi kawotethata haariya aylliyas, Isra7eele woziya Goday, Isra7eele Geeshshay haysada yaagees; Ammanthiya Godaa gisho, nena doorida Isra7eele Geeshsha gisho kawoti be7idi dendi eqana; deriya haareysati be7idi goyinnana.
ISA 49:8 Goday yaagees; “Taani doorida woden ne oysha zaarana; atotetha gallas taani nena maadana. Taani nena naagana; neeni biitta zaarada essana mela; asi doonna biitta neeni laatisana mela taani nena asaas caaqo oothada immas.
ISA 49:9 Di7etidaysata, ‘Keyite!’ dhuma qashon de7eyisata, ‘Birshetite!’ gaana mela taani nena oothana. Enti oge matan heemetana; mela dere bolla heemetiya bessi demmana.
ISA 49:10 Enti koshatokona woyko saamotokona; enta mela biitta mishay xuuggenna; away enta meenna. Entaw qadheteysi enta kaalethana; pulto haathaako enta laaggana.
ISA 49:11 Taani ta dereta ubbaa oge kessana; ta wogga ogeta dhoqu oothana.
ISA 49:12 Heko, ta asay haahosoope yaana: pudeha baggaafenne wuloha baggafe, qassi Aswaana biittafe yaana” yaagees.
ISA 49:13 Hinteno saloto, ufaysan yexite; neno biittaw ufayta. Hinteno dereto, ililite! Goday ba asa minthethis; ba metootetida ba asaas qadhetis.
ISA 49:14 Shin Xiyooney, “Goday tana aggis; Xoossay tana dogis” yaagasu.
ISA 49:15 Aayiya ba dhanthiya na7aa doganaw danda7ay? Ba ulope keyida na7as qadhetekee? Iya dogikoka, taani nena dogike!
ISA 49:16 Heko, taani nena ta kushe qaaqan xaafa wothas; ne dirsa gimbeti ubba wode ta sinthan de7oosona.
ISA 49:17 Nena zaaridi keexeysati ellesidi yaana; nena laallidaysati neepe haakana.
ISA 49:18 Ane dhoqu gada ne yuushuwa xeella; ne nayti ubbay issife shiiqidi neeko yaana. Taani Goday, tanan caaqas: neeni enta ubbaa alleeqoda ma7ana; gelanaw haniya maccasi alleeqeteysada neeni entan alleeqetana.
ISA 49:19 Neeni laaletada baysa gidikoka, ne biittay dhaykoka, ha77i nenan de7iya asaas daro xuummana; nena laallidaysati neepe haakana.
ISA 49:20 Neeni kayotiya laythan new yeletida nayti ne haythan, “Haysi bessay nuus daro xuunthu gidiya gisho, nu daana dalga bessi imma” yaagana.
ISA 49:21 Neeni ne wozanan, “Ha nayta ubbaa taw oone yeliday? Taani yelada dhonthu gidas; taani di7etas, ixetas. Yaatin, haysata oone dichiday? Taani tarka attas; yaatin ha nayti ubbay awupe yidona? yaagana.”
ISA 49:22 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Heko, taani kawotethata mallata bessaana; asaas ta bandira essana. Enti ne adde nayta idimmidi, ne macca nayta banta hashiyan tookidi ehana.
ISA 49:23 Kawoti nena dichiya aawata gidana; enta macca kawoti nena dhanthiya aayo gidana. Enti gufannidi new goyinnana; ne toho baana laaccana. Taani Godaa gideysa neeni hessan erana; tanan ammanetidi naageysati yeellatokona” yaagees.
ISA 49:24 Olanchuwafe di7o yegisanaw, wozan iita asa kushepe di7etida asi kessi ekanaw danda7etiyee?
ISA 49:25 Shin Goday yaagees: Olancho kushepe di7etida asi kessi ekanaw, wozana mino asape di7o yegisanaw danda7etees. Neera oleteysatara taani oletana; ne naytaka ashshana.
ISA 49:26 Nena un7etheysati banta ashuwa maana mela oothana; woyne uyidi mathoteysada enti banta suuthaa uyidi mathotana. He wode asa ubbay taani Godaa, nena Ashshiya, Woziyanne Yayqooba Wolqaamaa gideysa erana.
ISA 50:1 Goday yaagees; “Taani hinte aayiw yeddida pirima worqatey awun de7ii? taani ooddes hintena taani bayzadina? Heko, hinte nagaraa gisho hinte bayzetideta; hinte naaquwa gisho hinte aayiya yedetasu.
ISA 50:2 Taani yida wode, haysan asi ayis dhayidee? Taani xeegida wode, ‘Yee!’ gaanaw ayis asi dhayidee? Taani hintena wozanaw ta kushey qantheyee? hintena ashshanaw taw wolqi baaweyee? Taani abba seerada melisayis; shaafata mela biitta oothayis. Haathi dhayin entan de7iya moloti wooqosona; saamoy wodhin hayqoosona.
ISA 50:3 Taani salota dhuma mayzayis; enta kamay kayo ma7o daanees” yaagis.
ISA 50:4 Daaburidaysa taani qaalan minthetho erana mela, Ubbaa Haariya Goday taw tamaarida inxarsi immis. I tana wonta wonta barkisidi, taani tamaareda si7anaada ta haythaa dooyees.
ISA 50:5 Ubbaa Haariya Goday ta haythaa dooyis; taani geella gidabike; guye simmabike.
ISA 50:6 Taani ta zokuwa shoceysatas, ta buuchaa shoddeysatas ta gacuwa aathada immas. Ta bolla cutteysatapenne tana kawusheysatape ta som7uwa genthabike.
ISA 50:7 Ubbaa Haariya Goday tana maaddiya gisho, taani yeellatike. Taani ta som7uwa salo shuchu oothas; taani yeellatonnaysa erayis.
ISA 50:8 Taw pirdeysi matan de7ees; yaatin, tana mootey oonee? Ane taara mootetanaw eqo!
ISA 50:9 Ubbaa Haariya Goday tana maaddees; yaatin, ta bolla pirdey oonee? Enti ubbay ma7oda cimana; enta bili maana.
ISA 50:10 Hinte giddofe Godaa yayyey, iya aylliya qaalas kiitetey oonee? Dhuman hemeteynne poo7oy baynay I oonee? He uray Godaa sunthan ammaneto; ba Xoossan zempo.
ISA 50:11 Hinteno tama eethiya ubbato, laco xompe hintew shiisheysato, hinte eethida tama poo7uwan hemetite. Laco xompiyan simeretite; Hinte ta kushepe ekanaw de7ey haysa; hinte wolqaama meto seelan zin7ana.
ISA 51:1 Hinteno xillotethi kaalleysato, hinteno Godaa koyeysato si7ite. Hinte phalqetidi eketida shuchaa hinte booketidi keyida ollaa xeellite.
ISA 51:2 Hinte aawa Abrahaamenne hintena yelida Saaro xeellite. I barka de7ishin, taani iya xeegada anjasinne taybon darsas.
ISA 51:3 “Goday Xiyoonenne laaletida bessan de7iya asa ubbaa minthethana. I mela biitta Edene, kalotida biitta Godaa atakilte gadeda oothana. Yan ufaysinne hashshu guussi daana; galatinne mazmurey si7etana.
ISA 51:4 “Ta asaw; ta odiyaba si7ite; ta deriyaw, hinte haythaa taako zaarite. Higgey taape keyees; ta suure pirday kawotethatas poo7o gidana.
ISA 51:5 Ta xillotethay ellesidi shiiqana; ta atotethay matis; ta qesey kawotethatas suure pirdaa ehana. Yuushoy abban teqetida biittati ubbay tanan ammanetidi naagana; taani enta ta wolqan ashshanaysa ufaysan naagana.
ISA 51:6 Pude dhoqu gidi salota xeellite; duge sa7aaka xeellite. Saloti cuyada laaletidi dhayana; sa7i afilada wurana; iyan de7iya asa ubbay udunxeda hayqana. Shin ta atotethay merinaw daana; ta xillotethay wurenna.
ISA 51:7 “Hinteno xillotethaa ereysato, ta higgey hinte wozanan de7eysato, si7ite. Asaa bore yayyofite; enta cashshas dagammopite.
ISA 51:8 Bili ma7o, dorsa ikise guxuney meysada, enti meetetana. Shin ta xillotethay merinaw daana; ta atotethay yeletetha ubbaas gidana” yaagees.
ISA 51:9 Abeeti Godaw, denda! Denda! Godaa qesiyaw, wolqaa ma7a. Beni wodetaninne yeletethan hanidaysada denda; Ra7aaba geetetiya dawiya qanxerethidaynne caddiday nena gidikiyee?
ISA 51:10 Abbaanne gita ciimmo haatha melisiday nena gidikiyee? Ne wozidaysati pinnana mela ciimmo abba oge oothiday nena gidikiyee?
ISA 51:11 Goday wozidaysati yexishe simmidi Xiyoone yaana; merinaa ufaysay kallacha mela enta bolla uttana. Enti ufaysinne hashshu giyaba demmana; azzanoynne yeehoy entafe haakana.
ISA 51:12 Goday, “Taani, hintena minthethey tana; yaatin, hayqiya asenne maatada shulliya asa na7a yayyanaw hinte oonee?
ISA 51:13 Salota miccidanne sa7a baasuwa essida Godaa, hintena medhida Xoossaa dogideta. Enti hintena dhaysanaw un7ethiya asaa hanquwa gaason ubba gallas yashshan de7eeta. Shin hintena un7etheyisata hanqoy awun de7ii?
ISA 51:14 Di7etidaysati eeson birshetana; qashetida ollan hayqokona; koshatokona.”
ISA 51:15 “Taani Godaa, ne Xoossaa; guummana mela abba qaathey tana; ta sunthay Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa.
ISA 51:16 Ta qaala ne doonan wothiday, ta kushe kuyan nena genthiday, salota micciday, sa7aa baasuwa essiday, Xiyooneko, ‘Neeni ta ase’ ” yaagiday tana.
ISA 51:17 Neno, Godaa kushepe gandigarsiya hanqo xuu7aa ashshona uyida Yerusalaame, barka! Denda! Denda.
ISA 51:18 Iya yelida naytape iyo kaalethiya issoyka baawa; iya dichida naytape I kushiya oykidi efida issoyka baawa.
ISA 51:19 Ha nam7ubati ne qaada gididosona; hessati laaletethinne dhayo; koshinne mashshi ne bolla yaana; yaatin, nena ooni minthethanee?
ISA 51:20 Ne nayti giten gelida gen7eda oge gaxan kundidi labbanidosona. Enti Godaa hanquwaninne ne Xoossaa seeran kumidosona.
ISA 51:21 Hessa gisho, woyne ushshan gidonashin meton mathotidaysato, hinte haysa si7ite.
ISA 51:22 “Ba asaas mootetiya ne Goday, ne Xoossay yaagees; Heko, nena gandigarisiya, ta hanqo xuu7aa taani ne kushepe ekas; neeni zaarada he mathoyiya ushsha uyaka.
ISA 51:23 Taani hessa nena un7ethiya asaa kushen wothana; Enti neeko, ‘Nuuni ne bollara hemetidi aadhana mela zaqulla’ ” yaagidosona. Neeni enti aadhana gakanaw ne zokuwa entaw biittadanne ogeda oothadasa.
ISA 52:1 Neno Xiyoone, barka; barka, minotethi afilada ma7a. Neno geeshsha katame, Yerusalaame, ne boncho ma7uwa ma7a. Hizape guye qaxaretonaynne tuni ne giddo gelenna.
ISA 52:2 Neno, di7etida Yerusalaame, ne baana qoqofa; dendada ne araata bolla utta. Neno Xiyoone asaw, ne qoodhen qashetida santhalaata birsha.
ISA 52:3 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Hinte kase gatey bayna bayzetideta; ha77i qassi miishe immonna coo wozetana.
ISA 52:4 Goday haysada yaagees: Ta asay koyro bete asi gididi Gibxe bis; guyepe Asooreti ta asaa coo un7ethidosona.
ISA 52:5 Xoossay haysada yaagidi odees: Ta asay gatey bayna coo di7etidi bin, taw haysan aybe de7ey? Enta haareysati toochoosona; ta sunthay ubba wode cayetees.
ISA 52:6 Hessa gisho, ta asay ta sunthaa erana; he gallas haysa odey tana gideysa enti erana; ee, I tana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
ISA 52:7 Lo77o mishiraacho ehiya, sarotethaa awaajiya, atotethi odiya, Xiyooneko, “Ne Xoossay kawotis” yaagishe deriya bollara yaa tohoti waani lo77oona.
ISA 52:8 Ne katamaa naageysati banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, ufaysan issife yexoosona. Goday Xiyoone simmiya wode enti banta ayfen be7ana.
ISA 52:9 Hinteno Yerusalaamen laaletida bessato, issife ufaysan yexite; Goday ba asaa minthethis; Yerusalaame wozis.
ISA 52:10 Goday ba geeshsha qesiya kawotethata ubbaa sinthan qoncisis. Biitta gaxaa gakanaw de7iya asa ubbay nu Xoossaa atotetha be7ana.
ISA 52:11 Hinteno Godaa miishiya tookeysato, shaaketite, shaaketite, yaape keyite. Tunabaa bochofite; iya giddofe keyite; hintena geeshshite.
ISA 52:12 Shin hinte keyishe eeson keyeketa; woyko goodetidi beeketa. Goday hintefe sinthe aadhidi kaalethana; Isra7eele Xoossay guyera gididi hintena naagana.
ISA 52:13 “Heko, ta aylley akeekan oothana; I bonchetidi, dhoqu dhoqu gaana; daro gitatana.
ISA 52:14 Iya som7oy asa ubbaafe, iya medhoy asa naytape aadhidi qohetis; iya be7idi daro asay dagammidosona.
ISA 52:15 Shin ha77i daro kawotethati ubbay iyaban malaaletana; iya gaason, daro kawoti banta doona oykana. Enti bantaw odetiboonnaba be7ana; si7iboonaba akeekana” yaagees.
ISA 53:1 Nuuni odidaba ooni ammanidee? Godaa qesey ooddes qoncidee?
ISA 53:2 I iya sinthan mela biittan aacida duruma mela; xapho yeddida dola mela diccis. Nuuni iya loythi xeellonna mela mali woyko teemi baawa. Nuuni iyako shiiqonna mela cuchu mal7o gidenna.
ISA 53:3 I asan kadhetis, ixetis; I metopenne azzanope shaaketi eronna asi gidis. Asi iya be7anaape gidi ba som7uwa wora zaariya asada kadhetis; nuuni iya bonchibooko.
ISA 53:4 I tuma nu waayiya baw ekis; qassi nu daabura tookis. Shin nuuni, I Xoossan deshetidi kundidadanne madunxidaada qopida.
ISA 53:5 Shin I nu nagaraa gisho, cadetidi madunxis; nu qohuwa gisho shocetidi liiqis. Iya seeran nuuni saro demmida; iya madunthan nuuni paxida.
ISA 53:6 Nuuni ubbay oge balida dorsada wora bida; nu ubbay nu ogiya ogiya bida. Shin Goday nu ubbaa naaquwa iya bolla wothis.
ISA 53:7 I un7etis; qohetis; shin ba doona dooybeenna. Shukanaw efiya urge dorsada laagetis; ba ikisiya meediya uraa sinthan si77i giya dorsa mela aykoka pogibeenna.
ISA 53:8 Enti iya un7ethoninne geella pirdan efidosona; I ta asaa nagaraa gisho shocetidi, de7on de7eyisata biittafe kichidaysa iya kochaafe ooni akeekidee?
ISA 53:9 Iya doonan bali bayna, I, iitaba oothonna, ba hayquwan iita asatara taybetis; iya duufoy dure asatara gidis.
ISA 53:10 Shin iya qohetethaynne iya un7etethay Godaa shene gidis. I bana nagara yarsho oothiya wode ba kochaa be7ana. Iya laythay aduqana; Godaa sheney iya kushen poletana.
ISA 53:11 Ba shempuwa waayiyape guye, I de7o poo7o be7ana; ufaytana. Ta xillo aylley ba eratethan darota xillisana; enta qohuwaka tookana.
ISA 53:12 Hessa gisho, taani iya gishuwa gita asata giddon immana; minotara I di7uwa shaaketana. I ba shempuwa hayqos aathidi immidi, iitatara paydetis. I daro asaa nagaraa tookis; geellatas gaannatis.
ISA 54:1 Naate, yelonna maynthe, yexa! Naate, iqeta eronnaare, ufaysan ilila! Azinara de7iya maccase naytape barka de7iya maccase nayti darana.
ISA 54:2 Ne dunkaaniya bessaa dalgisa; dunkaaniya gesheta piddi oothada micca; xuumisopa; wodoruwa adussa; dhishiya mintha.
ISA 54:3 Neeni ushachinne haddirsi dalgana; ne kochati kawotethata laattana; baysatida enta katamatan keexidi daana.
ISA 54:4 “Yayyofa; neeni yeellataka; dagammofa; neeni kawuyaka. Ne yalagatetha yeella neeni dogana; ne am7etetha boriya hizape guye hassayaka.
ISA 54:5 Ne azinay nena Medhidaysa; iya sunthay Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa. Isra7eele Geeshshay nena Wozidaysa; I biitta ubbaa Xoossaa geetetana.
ISA 54:6 Azini aggin, dogetada azzaniya maccasada, yalagatethan azina soope keyida, maccasada neeni hanada de7ishin, taani Goday nena zaarada xeegas.
ISA 54:7 “Guutha wode taani nena aggas, shin gita qadhen taani nena zaarada ehana.
ISA 54:8 Suulliya hanqon taani ta som7uwa neepe guutha wodes genthas. Shin merinaa maarotethan taani new qadhetana” yaagees nena woziya Goday.
ISA 54:9 “Haysi taw Nohe wodiya mela; he wode taani dhayo haathan zaarada sa7aa dhaysike gada caaqidaysada, zaarada ne bolla hanqetonna melanne seeronna mela taani caaqas.
ISA 54:10 Dereti qaxanaw, zumati banta bessaafe kichanaw danda7oosona; shin ta merinaa siiqoy neepe shaaketenna; ta sarotetha caaqoy neepe kichenna” yaagees new qadhetiya Goday.
ISA 54:11 “Neno, metootida katame, gotey yaanne haanne shocidaare, minthethiyabay dhayidare, Heko, taani nena boncho shuchan alleeqisada keexana; ne baasuwa sanpare shuchan hiixana.
ISA 54:12 Ne shucha gimbiya qustiya zo7o inqo shuchan, ne pengiya phooliya al7o shuchan, ne dirsa boncho shuchan gimbana.
ISA 54:13 Ne nayti ubbay Godaape tamaarana; ne nayta sarotethay darana.
ISA 54:14 Neeni xillotethan minnada eqana; geneynne un7ethoy neepe haakana. Nena yashisiyaba deenna; dagami neeko shiiqenna.
ISA 54:15 Nena olanaw dendey de7iko, hessi taape gidenna; nena qohanaw koyey de7iko, I kundana.
ISA 54:16 “Heko, huben tama hubidi, ba qopida ola miishiya qoxiya uraa taani medhas; dhaysana mela dhayseysa medhiday tana.
ISA 54:17 Nena qohanaw oosetida ay miisheyka ne bolla oothenna; nena mootiya inxarsa ubbaas ne zaaro immana. Godaa aylleta laatay haysa; taape enti ekiya xillo haysa” yaagees Goday.
ISA 55:1 Hinteno, saamotidaysato, ubbay taako haa yiite; miishey baynaysato, haa yiite. Shammidi miite; haa yidi, miishe qanxonna coo woyne ushshinne maathi shammite.
ISA 55:2 Kathi gidonnabaas hinte miishiya ayis kesseetii? Kalsonnaban hinte wolqaa ayis wurseetii? Ane tana si7ite, taani odeysa hayzite; lo77o kathaa miite; lo77o kathan hinte asatethaa ufaysite.
ISA 55:3 “Hinte haytha taako zaaridi tana si7ite; de7on daanaw ta odeysa si7ite; taani Dawitas gelida ufaysa qaalan hintena anjana.
ISA 55:4 Heko, taani iya kawotethatas marka, kaaletheysanne halaqa oothas.
ISA 55:5 Goday, ne Xoossay, Isra7eele Geeshshay nena bonchida gisho, neeni eronna kawotethata xeegana; nena eronna kawotethati ellesidi neeko yaana.”
ISA 55:6 “Goday bentiya wode iya koyite; matan de7iya wode iya xeegite.
ISA 55:7 Iita asi ba ogiyape simmo; nagaranchoy ba qofaa aggo. Godaako simmo, ika iya maarana; I nu Xoossaako simmo, iyaw atto gaana.
ISA 55:8 Ta qofay hinte qofaa mela, ta ogey hinte ogiya mela gidenna” yaagees Goday.
ISA 55:9 Saloti sa7aape dhoqeysada, ta ogey hinte ogiyape, ta qofay hinte qofaape dhoqees.
ISA 55:10 Irinne shachi salope wodhidi, biitta laakisidi, kathi dolana melanne ayfana mela ootheysada, zereysas zerethi, meysas kathi immonna guye salo simmenna.
ISA 55:11 Ta doonape keyiya qaalay hessa mala; I taani halchidaysa polonnanne ta kiittidaysa oothonna taako coo simmenna.
ISA 55:12 “Hinte ufaysan keyana; saron moyzetana; deretinne zumati hinte sinthan ufaytidi yexana; bazzo mithati ubbay banta kushiya baqana.
ISA 55:13 Aguntha gisho xiidda, gom7ore gisho xaythi dolana. Hessi Godaa qofisiyabaanne merinaw dhayonna malla gidana” yaagees Goday.
ISA 56:1 “Suure pirdaa naagite; xillo oothite; ta atotethay ellesidi yaana; ta xillotethay matan qoncana.
ISA 56:2 Haysa oothiya uray, Sambaata tunisonna bonchiya uraynne ba kushey iitabaa oothonna mela teqiya uray anjetidaysa” yaagees Goday.
ISA 56:3 Godaako shiiqida bete asi, “Goday tana ba asaape shaakana” goopo; shuufay, “Taani melida mithi” goopo.
ISA 56:4 “Ta Sambaata bonchiya, tana ufaysiyaba dooreynne ta caaquwa minthidi naagiya shuufatas,
ISA 56:5 entaw taani ta keethaninne ta dirsa gimbiya giddon enti hassayetiyaba immana. Enti macca na7anne adde na7a yelidi, demmiya bonchuwafe aadhiya sunthi taani entaw immana; taani merinaw dhayonna sunthi entaw immana.
ISA 56:6 Godaa haggaazanaw, Godaa dosanawunne iya aylle gidanaw bantana iyako shiishiya, sambaata tunisonna bonchiyanne ta caaqo qaala minthidi naagiya bete asata,
ISA 56:7 taani ta geeshsha zumaa bolla ehada ta woosa keethan enta ufaysana. Enti ta yarsho bessan shiishiya xuussa yarshoynne hara yarshoy eketana; ta keethay asa ubbay Xoossaa woossiya keethi geetetana” yaagees.
ISA 56:8 “Shiqidaysata bolla gujada harataka taani shiishana” yaagees Isra7eelepe laaletidaysata shiishiya, Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
ISA 56:9 Hinteno bazzo do7ato, hinteno wora do7ato, ubbay haa yidi miite.
ISA 56:10 Isra7eele asaa naageysati qooqe; entaw eri baawa; enti ubbay boccanaw danda7onna butale kanata; enti zin7idi elmotoosona; dhisko dosoosona.
ISA 56:11 Enti midi kallonna yaramba kana mela; enti akeeki pacida henthancho. Enti ubbay banta oge bidosona; ubbay banta go77a xalaala koyoosona.
ISA 56:12 Enti, “Haa yiite; woyne ushsha ane uyoos; mathoyiya ushsha ane ganoos! Wontoy hachi mela gidana; hachifeka aadhidi lo77ana” yaagosona.
ISA 57:1 Xillo asi hayqees; shin hessa qopey baawa. Bantana Xoossas immida asay biittafe eketoosona, shin xillo asi iiti yaanape sinthatidi, eketeysa oonika akeekenna.
ISA 57:2 I, bidi sarotethi de7iya bessi gelees; suuretethan hemeteysati hayqidi, shempo demmoosona.
ISA 57:3 “Hinteno, maro nayto, hinteno laammiyanne laymatiya zareto, haa yiite.
ISA 57:4 Hinte oona qelqiseetii? Hinte oona boreetiii? Hinte inxarsaa oodde bolla kesseetii? Hinte geellatanne wordancho nayta gideketii?
ISA 57:5 Hinte wolaa garsaninne daashsha mitha garsan amon xuugeteeta. Hinte nayta zangaaraninne zaalla qophon shukidi yarsheeta.
ISA 57:6 Zangaaran de7iya liiqo shuchati hinte xoossata; Hinte entaw ushsha yarsho tigideta. Kathaa yarshoka immideta yaatin, taani haysan hanqetikina?
ISA 57:7 Zumaa huuphen hiixa yeggideta; yan yarshanaw keydeta.
ISA 57:8 Hinte pengiyafenne gobanetape soo baggara eeqa misileta essideta. Tana aggidi hinte arsa dalgisidi, yaa keydeta; entara caaqideta; yaatidi enta arsa dosideta; enta kalluwa be7ideta.
ISA 57:9 Zaytenne shitto ekidi Moloka geetetiya eeqako bideta; hinte kiitanchota haaho soo kiittideta; hari attoshin si7oole gakanaw wodhideta.
ISA 57:10 Hinte hara xoossata koyishe daaburideta; shin, ‘Ufaysi baawa’ gibeeketa. Hinte wolqay haa ooraxis; hessa gisho, labbanidi kundibeeketa.
ISA 57:11 “Hinte oona yayyidi, taw wordotidetii? Hinte tana qopibeketa; hinte wozanan qopibeketa. Hinte taw yayyonna ixiday taani daro wode si77i gida gisho gidennee?
ISA 57:12 Taani hinte xillotethaanne hinte oosota awaajana; shin hintena aykoka go77okona.
ISA 57:13 Hinte maado demmanaw waassiya wode hinte shiishida eeqati hintena ashshena! Enta ubbaa carkoy efana; issi toho carkiya carkoy enta punnidi dhaysana. Shin tana baw baqatidi attiya besse oothiya uray biitta laattana; ta geeshsha zumaa ekana” yaagees.
ISA 57:14 “Baasite, baasite! Oge giigisite; ta asaa ogiyape dhubiyaba ubbaa diggite” yaagees Goday.
ISA 57:15 Merinaw de7eysi, gitay, dhoqa bessan de7eysi, iya sunthay Geeshsha geeteteysi, yaagees: “Kawuyida asaa ayyaana denthethanaw, meqida wozani de7eyisata koolanaw, kawuyidanne meqida ayyaani de7eysara daana.
ISA 57:16 Ta medhida asa ayyaanaynne shempoy, ta sinthan docconna mela taani merinaw mootike; ubba wode hanqetike.
ISA 57:17 Enta nagaraa gaason taani enta hanqetada seeras; ta som7uwa entafe genthas; shin enti ha77ika banta wozanaa qofan bidosona.
ISA 57:18 Taani enta ogiya be7as; shin taani enta pathana, kaalethana; iyawunne iya gisho yeekeyisata minthethana.
ISA 57:19 Isra7eele biittan yeekeyisata, mettershan galata kunthana. Haahoninne matan de7eysatas, saroy giddo; taani enta pathana” yaagees Goday.
ISA 57:20 Shin iitati urqanne silimo kessiya, wopu gaanaw danda7onna abba beeta mela.
ISA 57:21 “Iitatas saroy baawa” yaagees ta Xoossay.
ISA 58:1 Goday haysada yaagees: “Ne qaala dhoqu oothada waassa; guye goopa; ne qaala moyzeda dhoqu ootha. Ta asaas enta geellatetha, Yayqooba keethaas enta nagaraa oda.
ISA 58:2 Shin enti tana gallas gallas koyoosona; ta ogiya kaallanaw dosiya daanosona. Xillo oothidanne Xoossaa kiitaa aggiboonna asada enti tana suure pirda oychoosona; taako Xoossaako shiiqanaw dosiya daanosona.
ISA 58:3 Enti Godaako, ‘Nuuni xoomos, shin neeni ayis nuna xeellikii? Nuuni nunatethaa kawushida, shin neeni ayis eronnaada hanadi’ yaagosona. Goday zaaridi, ‘Heko, hinte xoomiya wode hintena ufaysiyabaa ootheeta; hinte oosanchota un7etheeta.’
ISA 58:4 Hinte ooshshaninne palaman xoomeeta; qadhey bayna iita deshethi dechanaw xoomeeta. Hessa mela xoomiya hinte woosay bolla saluwan si7etonna mela oothees.
ISA 58:5 Taani doorida xoomay haysa mela xoomee? Issi asi banatetha kawushey haysa mela gallasa xalaalanee? Taani koyiya xoomay asi ba huuphiya kaxida gasheda hoksana melanne bido tiyetidi kayo ma7o ma7idi utetheyee? Hinte hessa xooma gidi xeegetiyee? He xooma gallasay Godaa sinthan eketiyee?
ISA 58:6 “Taani dooriya xoomay haysa; suure pirda dhayo santhalaata billana melanne qambara menthidi un7etidaysata la77a kessana mela gidenneyee?
ISA 58:7 Taani dooriya xoomay koshatidaysa muzana mela, keethi bayna manqota soo ekana mela, kallotidaysa be7ada mayzana melanne maado koyiya hinte dabbuwafe hintena genthonna melasa gidennee?
ISA 58:8 Yaatiko, hinte poo7oy wonta xalqeda poo7ana; hinte paxotethay eeson yaana. Hinte xillotethay hintefe sinthara baana; Godaa bonchoy hintefe guyera gididi, hintena naagana.
ISA 58:9 He wode hinte xeegana; Goday hintew koyana. Hinte maado koyidi waassana; I, ‘Heko, taani haysan de7ayis!’ yaagana. “Hinte giddofe un7ethiya qambara diggiko, biradhen malleysanne iitaba odeteysa aggiko,
ISA 58:10 Koshatidaysa muziko, metootidaysata koshshiyaban maaddiko, he wode hinte poo7oy dhuman poo7ana; hinte qammay seeta gallas gidana.
ISA 58:11 Goday hintena ubba wode kaalethana; hintena mela biittan koshshiyaban kalsana; hinte xaphuwa xaalisana. Hinte haathe uyaa gannate melanne meli eronna haatha pulto mela gidana.
ISA 58:12 Ne asay beni laaletida bessata zaaridi keexana; daro wodepe kase baasetida baasota keexidi dhoqu oothana. Hinte ‘Laaletida gimbeta gimbeysatanne asay de7iya bessaanne wogga ogey de7iya katamata esseyisata geetetana.’
ISA 58:13 “Sambaata gallasaa boncho aggonna ixiko, ta geeshsha gallas hinte go77a yedetheysa aggiko, Sambaata ufaysinne bonchetida, Godaa gallasaa boncho gada xeegiko, hinte hinte ogiya boonna aggidi he gallasaa bonchiko, hintena ufaysiyabaa oothonnanne hadaba odetonna aggiko,
ISA 58:14 he wode hinte Godan ufaytana; taani hintena daro bonchetidaysata oothana; hinte aawa Yayqooba laata hinte maana mela oothana. Taani Goday haysa odas” yaagees.
ISA 59:1 Heko, Godaa kushey hintena ashshanaw qaammibeenna; iya haythay si7anaw tullibeenna.
ISA 59:2 Shin hinte nagaray hintefenne hinte Xoossaafe giddon shaahetethi medhis. I si7onna mela hinte nagaray iya som7uwa hintefe genthis.
ISA 59:3 Hinte kushey suuthan, hinte biradhey naaqon tunis; hinte doonay wordo odetees; hinte inxarsay iitaba zuuzumees.
ISA 59:4 Xillotethan mootey baawa; suuretethan pirdeyka baawa. Enti coo palaman ceeqetoosona; wordo odetoosona; cimo qanthatidi iitatethi yeloosona.
ISA 59:5 Enti shoosha phuuphulle haphoosona; shango haada daddoosona. He phuuphulleta miya asi hayqees; phuuphulliyafe issoy meqiko, iyape shooshi keyees.
ISA 59:6 Enti daddida shango haaday ma7os hanenna; iyara banta asatethaa kammanaw danda7okona. Enta oosoy iita; geella oosoy enta kushen kumis.
ISA 59:7 Enta tohoti iitabaa oothanaw woxoosona; xillo suuthi gussanaw eesotoosona. Enta qofay iita; enti bida bessa ubban qohoynne boshi de7ees.
ISA 59:8 Enti sarotetha oge erokona; enta ogiyan suure pirdi baawa. Enti banta ogiya geellayidosona; he ogiyara hemetiya oonika saro demmenna.
ISA 59:9 Hessa gisho, suure pirdi nuupe haakis; xillotethi nuuko shiiqenna. Nuuni poo7o koyoos, shin dhuma gidis; wagagga poo7o koyoos, shin sakana dhuman hemetoos.
ISA 59:10 Nuuni qooqeda dirsaa gimbiya bolla tattafoos; seeta gallas, sa7i lem7in hemetiyada dhubetoos; wolqara de7iya asaa giddon nuuni hayqida asa mela gidida.
ISA 59:11 Nuuni ubbay babanthada waassos; holleda kayotidi oolos. Nuuni suure pirda koyida, shin demmibooko; atotethi koyida, shin I nuupe haakis.
ISA 59:12 Nu balay ne sinthan daris; nu nagaray nu bolla markatees. Nu naaqoy nuura de7ees; nu qohuwa nu eroos.
ISA 59:13 Nuuni makallidi, Godaa kadhida; nu Xoossaa aggidi guye simmida. Geellatethinne gene odetida; nuuni wordo qanthatidi wordo yelida.
ISA 59:14 Suure pirdi guye sugetis; xillotethi nuupe haakis. Tumatethi dabaaban dhubetees; ammanetethi gelanaw besse dhayis.
ISA 59:15 Tumatethi awunka bentenna; iitatethafe haakiya asi qohos aadhidi imetees; Goday suure pirdi baynaysa be7idi azzanis.
ISA 59:16 Un7eteyisata maaddiya asinne entaw gaannatiya asi baynaysa Goday be7idi malaaletis. Hessa gisho, iya qesey iyaw atotethi ehis; iya xillotethay iya katisidi oykis.
ISA 59:17 I, xillotethi tiran wothiya ola miisheda ma7is; ba huuphiyan atotetha barneexa wothis; halo kessi ma7oda, hanqo afilada ma7is.
ISA 59:18 I entaw enta oosuwada oosuwada zaarana; hanquwa ba morketas, seera baara eqeteysatas ciggana; yuushoy abban teqetida biittatas enta oosuwada immana.
ISA 59:19 Godaa peenoy wolqaama goteda di77ishe yaana gisho, wuloha baggan de7eysati Godaa sunthaas yayyana; doloha baggan de7eysati iya bonchana.
ISA 59:20 “Xiyoonesinne Yayqooba zeretha giddon banta nagarape simmeyisata Wozeysi yaana.
ISA 59:21 Taw entara de7iya caaqoy haysa: hinte bolla de7iya ta Ayyaanaynne taani hinte doonan wothida ta qaalay, hachife doomidi, merinaa gakanaw, hinte doonape, hinte nayta doonapenne hinte nayta nayta doonape shaaketenna” yaagees Goday.
ISA 60:1 Ne poo7oy yida gisho, dendada poo7isa; Godaa bonchoy ne bolla poo7ana.
ISA 60:2 Heko, dhumi sa7aa, sakana dhumi asaa kammana; shin Goday ne bolla dendana; iya bonchoy ne bolla poo7ana.
ISA 60:3 Kawotethati ne poo7uwako, kawotika ne wonta xolqethaako yaana.
ISA 60:4 Dhoqu gada ne yuushuwa xeella; ubbay issife neeko yaana. Ne adde nayti haahope yaana; ne macca nayti ba7etidi neeko yaana.
ISA 60:5 He wode neeni be7ada ufaytana; ne wozanay ufaysan noocu gaana. Abbaa bolla de7iya shaloy neeko yaana; kawotethata duretethay nebaa gidana.
ISA 60:6 Midiyaamepenne Efa biittafe yida, gimale wudey ne biitta kammana. Worqanne ixaane eheysati Godaa galataa awaajishe Saabape yaana.
ISA 60:7 Qedaarenne Nebayoota dorsa wude ubbay, ta yarsho bessa neeko yaana; taani ta boncho keethaa bonchana.
ISA 60:8 “Haysati shaarada woyko holleda banta keethako paalleysati oonee?
ISA 60:9 Tuma yuushoy abban teqetida biittati, tanan ufaysi wothana; Isra7eele geeshshay, Goday hinte Xoossay, hintena bonchida gisho, Tarsesa markabeti sinthati keyidi, ne nayta haaho biittafe enta biraranne worqara Xoossaa bonchuwas ehana.
ISA 60:10 “Allaga biittati ne dirsaa gimbana; enta kawoti new oothana. Nena taani ta hanquwan kase shocas, shin ha77i ta qadhiyan nena maaras.
ISA 60:11 Ne pengeti ubba wode dooya daana; kawotethata duretethaynne enta kawoti di7etidi neeko yaana mela gallasinne qamma gordetokona.
ISA 60:12 New oothonna asi woyko kawotethi ubbay dhayana.
ISA 60:13 Ta keethaa bessaa loythana mela Libaanose boncho gidida zigay, xiiddaynne xaythay neeko yaana; taani ta tohuwa wothiya bessaa bonchana.
ISA 60:14 Nena un7ethida asaa nayti yidi new hokana; nena kadhida ubbay ne sinthan goyinnana. Enti nena, ‘Godaa Katame, Xiyoone, Isra7eele, Geeshsha Katame’ yaagidi xeegana.
ISA 60:15 “Haysafe kase oonika ne giddora kanthonna mela yegetadasanne ixetadasa. Shin ha77i taani nena merinaw gita oothana; yeletethaa ubbay nenan ufaytana.
ISA 60:16 Neeni kawotethata maatha uyana; kawota dhantha dhammana. Goday, nena Ashsheysa, wozeysanne Yayqooba wolqaama gideysa neeni erana.
ISA 60:17 Naase birata gisho worqa, birata gisho bira, mitha gisho naase birata, shucha gisho birata taani new ehana. Taani, sarotethi nena ayseysa, xillotethi new halaqa oothana.
ISA 60:18 Geellatethi ne biittan, dhayoy woyko boshi ne zawan si7etenna. Neeni ne dirsa gimbiya, ‘Atotethaa’, ne pengiya, ‘Galata’ yaagada xeegana.
ISA 60:19 Gallas awa poo7o, qamma ageena poo7o new koshshenna; Goday new merinaa poo7o, ne Xoossay new boncho gidana.
ISA 60:20 Awi nam7antho wullenna; ne ageenay poo7o aggenna. Goday new merinaa poo7o gidana; neeni yeekida gallasati new gidana.
ISA 60:21 Ne asa ubbay xillo gidana; enti biitta merinaw laattana. Enti taani ta bonchuwa qoncisanaw tokida puutota; ta kushe oosota.
ISA 60:22 Hinte giddon issi keethan de7iya guutha asata darsana; ubbaafe guuthaa gita kawotethi oothana. Taani Godaa; wodey gakiya wode, taani hessa eeson polana” yaagees.
ISA 61:1 Ubbaa Haariya Godaa Ayyaanay ta bolla de7ees; manqotas lo77oba odana mela Goday tana tiyis. Wozani meqidaysata koolana mela, di7etidaysata la77a kessana melanne qashetidaysata billana mela Goday tana kiittis.
ISA 61:2 Dosetida Godaa laytha odana mela, nu Xoossay halo keyana gallasaa awaajana mela, azzaneyisata ubbaa minthethana mela tana kiittis.
ISA 61:3 Xiyoonen kayoteysatas, bido gisho kallacha, yeeho gisho ufaysa zayte, azzano gisho galata ma7o immana mela tana kiittis. Enti Goday ba bonchuwas tokida xillo mitha geetetidi xeegetana.
ISA 61:4 Enti beni laaletida bessata zaaridi keexana; beni kundida bessata zaaridi essana. Enti daro yeletethaafe kase laaletidi onida katamata zaaridi keexana.
ISA 61:5 Allaga asati hinte dorsa wudiya heemmana; imathati hinte gadiya goyana enti hinte woyne gadiya naagana.
ISA 61:6 Asay hintena, “Godaa kahinetanne nu Xoossaa oosanchota” yaagidi xeegana. Hinte kawotethata duretetha maana; enta shaluwan hinte nashetana.
ISA 61:7 Ta asay banta yeella gisho nam7u kushe ekana; banta kawusha gisho laatan ufaytana. Hessa gisho, hinte enta biittan dako laattana; hinte ufaysay merinaa ufaysi gidana.
ISA 61:8 “Taani, Goday suure pirda dosayis; bonqenne iita ooso ixayis. Taani tuma enta oosuwa gatiya qanxana; Taani entara merinaw caaqana.
ISA 61:9 Enta kochati kawotethata giddon, enta nayti dereta giddon eretana; enta be7ida ubbay taani, Goday, enta anjida asi gideysa erana.”
ISA 61:10 Taani Godan daro ufaytayis; ta shempiya ta Xoossan hashshu gawusu. Ekeysi ba huuphen kallacha wotheysada, geliyara bana alleeqiseysada, I tana atotetha ma7o mayzis; xillotethi afila bollara gujis.
ISA 61:11 Biittafe mithi maati doleysada, gadey tokidaba dicheysada, Ubbaa Haariya Goday xillotethinne galata kawotetha ubbaa sinthan purcisana.
ISA 62:1 Xiyoone gisho, taani si77i giike; Yerusalaame xillotethay poo7oda, I atotethay wonta xalqeda keyana gakanaw taani si77i giike.
ISA 62:2 Kawotethati ne xillotethaa, kawoti ubbay ne bonchuwa be7ana. Goday sunthiya ooratha sunthan neeni xeegetana.
ISA 62:3 Neeni Godaa kushen lo77ida kawotetha kallacha gidana.
ISA 62:4 Neeni, “Dogetidaaro” geetetaka; ne biittiya, “Dhonthu” geetetuku. Shin neeni, “Ta ufaysay in de7iyaro”, ne biittiya, “Azina gelidaaro” geetetana. Goday nenan ufaytana; ne biittiyaka azini de7iyaro gidana.
ISA 62:5 Panthi geela7o ekeysada, ne nayti nena machana. Ekeysi geliyarin ufayteysada, ne Xoossay nenan ufaytana.
ISA 62:6 Neno Yerusalaame, ne dirsa gimbiya bolla wocheyisata taani wothas; enti gallasinne qamma si77i gookona.
ISA 62:7 Hinteno, Godaa qofiseysato, I, Yerusalaame keexana gakanawunne biitta ubban nashetida katama oothana gakanaw hinteka shempopite; iyaka shempisopite.
ISA 62:8 Goday ba ushacha kushiyaninne ba wolqaama qesiyan haysada yaagidi caaqis: “Taani nam7antho hinte katha hinte morketi maana mela oothike. Hinte daaburida hinte woyne ushsha allagati uyokona.
ISA 62:9 Shin banta kathaa cakidaysati midi Godaa galatana; woyne maxeysati ta keethaa dabaaban uyana.
ISA 62:10 Aadhite! Pengera keyidi biite! Asaas oge giigisite! Wogga oge kessite. Shuchaa diggite; kawotethati ogiya demmana mela malla essite.
ISA 62:11 Goday sa7a gaxas haysada yaagidi awaajis: ‘Xiyoone asaas haysada yaagite; heko, hintena Ashsheysi gakis! Iya gatey iyara de7ees; I immiya woytoy iya sinthan de7ees’ yaagite.
ISA 62:12 Hinte, ‘Goday Wozida Geeshsha asata’ geetetidi xeegetana. Yerusalaamey, ‘Koyetiyaronne Yegeta Attaboona Katamiw’ ” geetetana.
ISA 63:1 Edoome biittan, Baasora katamaape zo7o ma7o ma7idi yey haysi oonee? Boncho ma7o ma7idi ba wolqaa minotethan sinthe hordofey oonee? “Xillo odeteynne ashshiya wolqi de7ey tana” yaagees Goday.
ISA 63:2 Woyne gum7iyason woyne yedhiya asa ma7oda ne ma7oy ayis zo77idee?
ISA 63:3 “Taani woyne gum7iyason woyniya tarka yedhas; kawotethatape issi asika taara baawa. Taani enta ta hanquwan yedhas; ta yiluwan enta dirxerethas. Enta suuthay ta ma7uwa bolla dharcetin, ta ma7o ubbay iitis.
ISA 63:4 Taani ta asaa woziya gallasaynne enta morketa halo keyiya laythay gakis.
ISA 63:5 Taani be7as, shin tana maaddiya issi asika demmabike; maaddey dhayida gisho, taani malaaletas. Hessa gisho, ta qesey taw atotethi ehis; ta hanqoy tana maaddis.
ISA 63:6 Taani ta hanquwan kawotethata yedhas; ta yiluwan enta dirxerethas; enta suuthaa biittan gussas” yaagees Goday.
ISA 63:7 Goday nuus oothida ooso ubbaa, Goday ba maarotethaaninne ba qadhiyan Isra7eele asaas oothida lo77o ooso ubbaanne iya sunthay galatetana mela bessida keehatetha ubbaa taani odana.
ISA 63:8 I, “Enti tuma ta asenne ta na7a gidiya gisho, taw wordotokona” yaagis. Hessa gisho, I enta ashsheysa gidis.
ISA 63:9 Enta waaye ubbaa I waayetis; iya Sinthaa Kiitanchoy enta ashshis. I enta ba siiquwaninne ba maarotan wozis; kase aadhida wodeta ubban I enta tookis.
ISA 63:10 Shin enti makallidosona; iya Geeshsha Ayyaana azzanthidosona. Hessa gisho, I simmidi, entaw morke gidis; enta olis.
ISA 63:11 Hessafe guye asay benibaanne ba aylliya Muse wode oothidaba qopidi, haysada yaagidosona: “Ba wudiya henthanchotara issife abba giddora kanthisida Xoossay awun de7ii? He wode ba Geeshsha Ayyaana enta giddon, wothida Xoossay ha77i awun de7ii?
ISA 63:12 Baw merinaa sunthu gidana mela enta sinthan haatha shaakidi, ba boncho wolqaama qesey Muses ushacha kushe gidana mela kiittidaysi awun de7ii?
ISA 63:13 Biitta bollara pari biyada enti dhubetonna ciimmo haatha giddora pinthidaysi awun de7ii?” yaagidosona.
ISA 63:14 Zangaara wodhiya meheda, Godaa Ayyaanay entaw shempo immis. Ne sunthay bonchetana mela hessada oothada ne asaa kaalethadasa.
ISA 63:15 Abeeti Godaw, salora duge xeella; neeni de7iya geeshshinne boncho gidida araatape be7a. Ne qinaateynne ne wolqay anee? Ne maarotaynne ne qadhey nuupe haakis.
ISA 63:16 Abrahaamey nuna eronna ixikoka, Yayqoobi nuna akeekona ixikoka, abeeti Godaw, neeni nu aawa; benipe doomidi, ne sunthay nuna wozeysa.
ISA 63:17 Abeeti Godaw, nuuni ne ogiyape dhayanaadanne new yayyonnaada nu wozanaa ayis muumisadii? Godaw, ne aylleta gisho, ne laata gidida kochata gisho, nuuko simma.
ISA 63:18 Ne geeshsha asay ne keetha guutha wodes laattidosona; shin ha77i nu morketi iya yedhidosona.
ISA 63:19 Nuuni benipe nebaa; shin enta neeni haarabaaka; ne sunthanka enti xeegetibookona.
ISA 64:1 Abeeti Godaw, salota daakada duge wodha; dereti ne sinthan kokoro.
ISA 64:2 Tami eexidi haathe pentiseysada duge wodhada, ne suntha ne morketa erisa; kawotethataka ne sinthan kokorsa.
ISA 64:3 Kase nuuni naagiboonna malaatata neeni oothida wode wodhadasa; dereti ne sinthan kokoridosona.
ISA 64:4 Benipe doomidi, nena ammanetidi, naageysatas malaatata oothiday neepe attishin, hara Xoossi asa haythi si7ibeenna; asa ayfey be7ibeenna.
ISA 64:5 Ufaytidi xillotethi ootheysatanne ne ogiya qopeyisata neeni maaddadasa. Shin nuuni nagara ooso aggonna ixida wode neeni hanqetadasa; nuuni waanidi attanee?
ISA 64:6 Nuuni ubbay tuna asi gidida; nu xillotetha ooso ubbay tuna curqa mela. Nu ubbay boncoda qoletida; nu nagaray nuna carkoda pitidi efis.
ISA 64:7 Neeni ne sinthaa nuupe genthadasa; nu nagaray nuna dhaysana mela aggadasa. Ne sunthaa xeegey deenna; nena minthidi oykanaw koyey baawa.
ISA 64:8 Gidoshin, abeeti Godaw, neeni nu aawa; nuuni urqa; ne urqa medhadasa; nuuni ubbay ne kushen medhetida.
ISA 64:9 Abeeti Godaw, daro hanqetofa; nu nagaraa merinaw qopofa. Nuuni ubbay ne ase gidiya gisho, nuna be7a.
ISA 64:10 Ne geeshsha katamati mela biitta gididosona; Xiyoone katamay mela biitta, Yerusalaamey baysa gidis.
ISA 64:11 Nu aawati iyan nena galatida geeshshinne lo77o gidida nu xoossa keethay taman xuugetis; nu lo77o bessa ubbay laaletis.
ISA 64:12 Abeeti Godaw, neeni haysa ubbaa be7ashe si77i gaanee? ha ubbay hanin, nuuko simmikii? Neeni si77i gada zawi bayna seeranee?
ISA 65:1 “Tana oychiboonaysatas qoncas; tana koyboonaysatas bentas. Ta sunthaa xeegiboonna kawotethas, ‘Yee! Yee!’ yaagada koyas.
ISA 65:2 Banta qofaa kaallidi, lo77o gidonna ogiyan hemetiya geella asaas gallas kumethi ta kushiya miccas.
ISA 65:3 Ha asay, ta sinthan atakilte gaden yarshishenne xuube yarsho bessan ixaane cuyisishe tana ubba wode hanqethoosona.
ISA 65:4 Enti duufon utteyisata, geema bessan aqeyisata, guduntho asho meyisata; enta xaaruwan, tuna asho cambi de7eyisata.
ISA 65:5 “Enti, ‘New yan de7a; taani neepe geeshshi gidiya gisho taako shiiqopa!’ yaagosona. Hessa mela asati siidhe tucciya cuyaa mela; gallas kumethi eexiya tama mela.
ISA 65:6 “Heko, ta sinthan xaafeti uttis; taani entaw zaarana si77i giike; enta seeranaw dendas.
ISA 65:7 Taani enta nagaraanne enta aawata nagaraa acuwa issife entaw qanxana. Enti deriya bolla ixaane cuyisidosona; zumata bolla tana cayidosona. Enti kase oothida oosuwa acuwa taani entaw qanxana” yaagees Goday.
ISA 65:8 Goday yaagees: “Iita woyne susa giddon lo77o woyne ayfey de7eysada, asay, ‘Iya giddon lo77o woyne ayfey de7iya gisho ubbaa wora holopite’ geysa mela, Taani ta aylleta haysada oothana; taani enta ubbaa dhaysike.
ISA 65:9 Taani Yayqoobape koche, Yihudape ta deriya laatteyisata kessana; ta dooridaysati iya laattana; ta aylleti yan daana.
ISA 65:10 Tana minthidi koyiya ta asaas, Saaroni dorsa wudey heemetiya bessi gidana; Akoora zangaaray miiza wudey allatiya bessi gidana.
ISA 65:11 “Shin hinteno, Godaa aggidi, ta geeshsha zumaa dogidaysato, ‘Qaada’ geetetiya eeqas gibira giigiseysato, hinte wursethaa eranaw ‘Saama’ geetetiya eeqas walaha woyne ushsha wancan kuntheysato,
ISA 65:12 Taani hinte wursethaa mashshas aathada immana; hinte ubbay goyretanaw hokana. Taani hintena xeegin koybeketa; odisin si7ibeeketa. Hinte ta sinthan iitabaa oothideta; taani dosonnaba doorideta.”
ISA 65:13 Ubbaa Haariya Goday yaagees: “Ta aylleti maana, shin hinte koshatana; ta aylleti uyana, shin hinte saamotana; ta aylleti ufaytana, shin hinte yeellatana.
ISA 65:14 Ta aylleti wozanape ufaytidi yexana, shin hinte wozanape kayotana; hinte ayyaanay meqida gisho, hinte zeleelidi yeekana.
ISA 65:15 Hinte, hinte sunthaa ta dooretida deriyas qangethi oothidi immana. Ubbaa Haariya Goday hintena wodhana; shin I ba aylleta dumma sunthan xeegana.
ISA 65:16 Kase metoti dogetida gishonne ta ayfiya sinthafe geemmida gisho he biittan anjo koyiya ubbay tuma Xoossaa sunthan woossana. He biittan caaqo caaqiya ubbay tuma Xoossaa sunthan caaqana.
ISA 65:17 “Heko, taani ooratha salotanne ooratha sa7a medhana; kaseba ubbay hassayetenna; qofetenna.
ISA 65:18 Shin taani medhiyaban merinaw ufaytitenne hashshu giite. Taani Yerusalaame ufaysasinne I asaaka galatan kumidaysata oothada medhana.
ISA 65:19 Taani Yerusalaamen ufaytana; ta asan hashshu gaana. Hizape guye yeehoynne un7a waasoy yan si7etenna.
ISA 65:20 “Yerusalaamen hizape guye, guutha wode de7idi hayqiya na7i, ba laytha wursonna hayqiya cima asi deenna. Xeetu laythara hayqiya uray, na7atethan hayqis geetetana; xeetu laythi gathonna hayqey, baadetida asada taybetana.
ISA 65:21 He wode asay keethe keexidi daana; woyne tokidi iya ayfiya maana.
ISA 65:22 Enti keexin hari deenna; enti tokin hari meenna. Ta asaa laythay mitha laythada aduqana; taani dooridaysati adussa wode banta kushe oosuwan ufaytana.
ISA 65:23 Enti coo daaburokona qaadi bayna na7a yelokona. Enti banta naytara Godan anjetida kochata gidana.
ISA 65:24 Enti tana xeeganaape sinthe, taani entaw koyana; enti buroo haasayonna de7ishin taani enta si7ana.
ISA 65:25 Suudhumeynne dorsa urgey issife heemetana; gaammoy boorada kale maana; baani shooshas kathi gidana. He wode ta geeshsha zumaa bolla enti qohetokonanne dhayokona” yaagees Godaa Xoossay.
ISA 66:1 Goday yaagees; Saloy ta araata, sa7i ta tohoy yedhiya besse. Yaatin hinte taw keexiya keethay, ay mela keethee? Ta shempana bessay awusee?
ISA 66:2 Haysa ubbaa ta kushey oothis; entika hanidosona. Shin taani bana ziqi oothiya uraa, ba ayyaanan meqida uraanne ta qaalan kokoriya ura xeellana.
ISA 66:3 Korma yarshey ase wodhiya asa mela; urge dorsi yarshey kana yarshiya asa mela; katha yarsho yarshey, guduntho suuthi yarshiya asa mela; qofiso ixaane cuyisey eeqa goyinniya asa mela. Asa ubbay baw injetiya oge dooridosona; enta shempoy enta tunatethan ufaytees.
ISA 66:4 Hessa gisho, taani enta metos aatha immana; enti yayyidaba enta bolla ehana. Taani xeegida wode oonika koybeenna; taani odiya wode oonika si7ibeenna. Enti ta sinthan iitabaa oothidosona; tana ufaysonnaba dooridosona.
ISA 66:5 Hinteno, Godaa qaalas kokoreysato iya qaala si7ite: “Hintena ixiya hinte ishati, ta sunthaa gisho, hintena kureysati, ‘Hinte ufaytin nuuni be7ana mela ane Goday boncheto’ ” yaagidosona; shin enti yeellatana.
ISA 66:6 Katamaape yaa waasuwa si7ite; xoossa keethafe keyiya girsaa si7ite. He girsay ba morketas enta oosuwada kushe zaariya Godaa girsaa.
ISA 66:7 “Iqetonna na7a yeliya maccas de7ii? Bannakonna adde na7a yeliya maccas de7ii?
ISA 66:8 Haysa melaba oone si7iday? Hessa melaba oone be7iday? Issi derey issi gallas yeletanaw danda7iyee? issi kawotethi qiphi zaaron medhetiyee? Xiyooney buroo iqethi oykonna, ellesada ba nayta yelasu.
ISA 66:9 Yelana wode gathiya taani enti yelanaada oothikinaayee? Yelanaada oothiya taani yeliya ulo gordaynaayee? Haysa giday tana, Godaa, ne Xoossaa.
ISA 66:10 Hinteno Yerusalaamo dosiya ubbaw, iira ufaytite; I gisho ufaysan noocu giite. Hinteno iw yeekiya ubbaw, iira ufaytite.
ISA 66:11 Hinte, iya minthethiya dhantha dhammidi kallana; I daro bonchuwafe loythi uyidi, ufaytana.”
ISA 66:12 Goday yaagees; “Taani iw sarotethaa shaafada darsana; iw kawotethata duretetha kixa shaafada ehana. Hinte hessa dhammana; I hashiyan tooketana; I ki7on uttidi baalotana.
ISA 66:13 Aayiya ba na7a minthetheysada taani hintena minthethenna; hinte Yerusalaamen minettana.
ISA 66:14 Hessa hinte be7iya wode hinte wozanay ufaytana; hinte meqethay maata mela aacana. Godaa kushey iya aylleta bolla de7eysin iya hanqoy iya morketa bolla de7eysi eretana.
ISA 66:15 Heko, Goday tamara yaana; iya para gaareti gote mela. Ba sheniya hanqon; ba seeraka tama lacon qoncisees.
ISA 66:16 Goday asho ma7ida ubbaa tamaninne mashshan pirdana; daroti Godaa mashshan hayqana.
ISA 66:17 “Banta eeqa goyinnanaw atakilte gade baanaw, bantana dummayeysatinne geeshsheysati; guduntho, ecerenne hara tunabata meyisata giddofe issuwa kaallidi beysati ubbay dhayana.
ISA 66:18 “Taani enta oosuwanne enta qofaa eriya gisho, kawotethatanne dumma dumma doonan odeteyisata, issife shiishana; enti shiiqidi, ta bonchuwa be7ana.
ISA 66:19 Taani enta giddon malaata oothana; entafe attidaysata giddofe ta gitatetha si7iboonanne ta bonchuwa be7iboona kawotethatako, Tarsesako, Liibeko, Liideko, Tubaalako, Yawaanakonne yuushoy abban teqetidi haaho biittatako kiittana; enti ta bonchuwa kawotethata giddon awaajana.
ISA 66:20 Isra7eele asay katha yarshuwa geeshsha miishen wothidi xoossa keethi eheysada, enti hinte ishata ubbaa kawotethata giddofe, paratan, para gaaretan, gimaletan, baqulotaninne caane gaaretan utisidi, Godaas imo oothidi ta geeshsha zumaa bolla Yerusalaame ehana.
ISA 66:21 Entafe issota issota kahinenne Leewe oothana” yaagees Goday.
ISA 66:22 “Taani medhida ooratha salotinne ooratha sa7i ta sinthan minnidi de7eysada, hinte kochaynne hinte sunthay minnidi daana.
ISA 66:23 Ageena xeerope bidi ageena xeero gakanaw, Sambaatape bidi Sambaata gakanaw asa ubbay ta sinthan goyinnanaw yaana.
ISA 66:24 Enti keyidi bishe, ta bolla makallida asaa aha be7ana. Enta miya guxuney hayqenna; enta xuuggiya tamay to7enna; enti asa ubbaas shaatiyaba gidana” yaagees Goday.
JER 1:1 Biniyaame biittan, Anatoota kataman de7iya kahinetape issuwa gidida Kalqe na7aa Ermiyaasa qaalay haysa.
JER 1:2 Amoone na7ay, Yihuda kawoy Iyosyaasi kawotida tammanne heedzantho laythan Godaa qaalay Ermiyaasako yis.
JER 1:3 Iyosyaasa na7ay, Yihuda kawoy Iyo7aqeemi kawotida laythatan Godaa qaalay Ermiyaasako yis. Qassi Iyosyaasa na7ay, Sedeqiyaasi kawotin, tammanne issi laythi gakanawunne, ichashantho ageenan Yerusalaame asay di7etidi bida wodiya gakanaw Godaa qaalay iyako yis.
JER 1:4 Godaa qaalay taako haysada yaagishe yis:
JER 1:5 “Neeni ne aaye ulon medhetanaape sinthe ta nena erayis. Ne yeletanaape sinthe ta nena dummayada wothas; kawotethatas nena nabe oothada shuumas” yaagis.
JER 1:6 Taani, “Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, taani na7a gidiya gisho waatada odetaneko erike” yaagas.
JER 1:7 Shin Goday, “ ‘Taani na7a goopa’; taani nena kiittiya bessaa bada ta kiita ubbaa asaas oda.
JER 1:8 Taani nena ashshanaw neera de7iya gisho entaw yayyofa. Haysa odey Godaa” yaagis.
JER 1:9 Goday ba kushiya yeddidi, ta doona bochidi, “Heko; taani ta qaala ne doonan wothas.
JER 1:10 Shoddanawunne laallanaw, dhaysanawunne shira yegganaw, keexanawunne tokanaw, asaa bollanne kawotethata bolla ta nena hachi shuumas” yaagis.
JER 1:11 Godaa qaalay taako, “Ermiyaasa, neeni ay be7ay?” yaagis. Taani zaarada, “Lawuze mitha xam7a be7ayis” yaagas.
JER 1:12 Goday, “Neeni like be7adasa. Taka ta qaala polanaw haysada be7ayis” yaagis.
JER 1:13 Zaaridi Goday, “Haraa ay be7ay” yaagis. Taani zaarada, “Issi pentiya xaaroy pudeha baggafe issi bagga gedi gidi uttidaysa be7ayis” yaagas.
JER 1:14 Goday, “Pudeha baggafe dhayoy podhidi, biittan de7iya asa ubbaa bolla gukana.
JER 1:15 Taani pudeha bagga kawotethatan de7iya asa ubbaa xeegana hanayis. Enta kawoti yidi, Yerusalaame geliya pengetan, dirsa yuushuwaninne Yihuda katamata ubban banta araata wothana.
JER 1:16 Yihuda asay tana aggidi, iita oothida gisho, hara xoossatas ixaane cuyisida gishonne banta kushen oothida xoossata goyinnida gisho ta pirdaa enta bolla ehas.
JER 1:17 “Shin neeni giigeta! Dendada taani nena kiittiyaba ubbaa entaw oda. Entaw yayyofa; ne entaw yayyiko, ta nena enta sinthan gujada yashisana.
JER 1:18 Hachi ta nena ha biitta bolla, Yihuda kawota bolla, halaqata bolla, kahineta bollanne ha asaa bolla gimbetida katamada, birata tuussadanne naase biratan dirida dirsada oothada minthas.
JER 1:19 Enti neera oletana; shin ta ashshanaw neera de7iya gisho nena xoonokona. Haysa odey Godaa” yaagis.
JER 2:1 Godaa qaalay taako haysada yaagishe yis:
JER 2:2 “Bada Yerusalaame asa haythan haysada yaagada awaaja. Ne na7atethan taw ay mela ammanetidako, ne buroo meddan de7iya wode tana ay mela siiqidaako, ta akeekayis. Neeni mela biittan zerethi zereti eronna biittan tana kaalladasa.
JER 2:3 He wode Isra7eeley Godaas geeshshi; iyaw bayra katha mela. Iyape mida ubbay bala gidoosona; enta bolla dhayoy yis. Hessa odey Godaa” yaagees.
JER 2:4 Hinteno, Yayqooba nayto, Isra7eele zare, ubbay Godaa qaala si7ite!
JER 2:5 Goday yaagees; kase hinte aawati taape ay bala demmidi taape haakidi bidonaa? Enti pathonna eeqata goyinnidi pathonnaba gididosona.
JER 2:6 Enti, “Nuna Gibxefe kessida, mela biittan kaalethida, aaforanne mela biittara aathida, koshinne sakana dhumi de7iya biittara pinthida, oonika aadhonanne de7onna bessara kaalethida Goday awun de7ii?” yaagidi oychibookona.
JER 2:7 Hinte he biitta ayfiyape lo77uwa maana mela ta hintena aradda biitta ehas. Shin hinte yidi, ta biitta tunisideta; ta laata iisideta.
JER 2:8 Kahineti, “Goday awunee?” yaagidi oychibookona. Ta higgey enta kushen de7iya asati tana eribookona. Deriya ayseysati ta bolla makallidosona. Nabeti Ba7aale eeqa sunthan tinbite odidi pathonna eeqata goyinnidosona.
JER 2:9 “Hessa gisho, ta hintera buroo mootetana; hinte nayta naytara mootetana.
JER 2:10 Ane wuloha bagga bidi, yuushoy abban teqetida biitta Qophiroosa xeellite; doloha bagga bidi Qedaare biitta ase kiittidi xomoosite. Haysa melabay haysafe kase hanidaako be7ite.
JER 2:11 Enti tuma xoossata gidonna ixikoka ba xoossata laammida derey oonee? Shin ta asay entaw boncho gidida tana pathonna eeqatara laammis.”
JER 2:12 “Saloto, haysan malaaletite; dagammidi kokorite” yaagees Goday
JER 2:13 Ta asay nam7u nagara oothidosona; hessika, de7o pulto gidida tana aggis. Haathe oykanaw danda7onna, xoo7e ollata bantaw bookidosona.
JER 2:14 “Isra7eeley shametida aylleyee? woyko son yeletida aylleyee? Yaatin, morketi ayis do7oda shankatoona?
JER 2:15 Iya morketi gaammoda iya bolla gudoosona. Enti banta qaala dhoqu oothidi daarosona. Enti iya biitta kaysi kessidosona; iya katamati laaletidi asi bayna soo gididosona.
JER 2:16 Hesaa bollaka Mempisanne Xafinaasa asati iya huuphiya meedidosona.
JER 2:17 Neno Isra7eele, oge ubban nena kaalethiya, Godaa ne Xoossaa aggada haysa ne bolla ehiday nena gidikii?
JER 2:18 Nayle shaafape haathe uyanaw Gibxe buussi nena ay maaddanee? Efraxiisa shaafape haathe uyanaw Asoore buussi nena ay maaddanee?
JER 2:19 Hiza ne iitatethay nena seerana; ne tana kaddidaysi ne bolla pirdana. Ne tana Godaa ne Xoossaa aggidaysi ay mela iitanne camo gidiyako akeeka be7a. Ne taw yayiya yashshay baawa” yaagees Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay.
JER 2:20 “Ta ne qambara daro wodepe kase menthas; ne qashuwa duuthas. Neeni, ‘Ta nena goyinnike’ yaagadasa. Dere bollanne daashsha mitha garsan laymatanaw zin7adasa.
JER 2:21 Ta nena dooretida zerethafe ekada, lo77o woyne gaden tokas. Yaatin, waanada, guye simmada, woran dolida, iita woyne gidadii?” yaagees Goday.
JER 2:22 “Ne sangeenora meecetiyakoka, saamunan gorpetiyakoka ne qitay ta sinthana.
JER 2:23 Neeni waanada, ‘Ta tunabike; Ba7aale eeqa goyinnabike’ gay? Neeni zangaaran hanidaba xeella; ne oothidaba akeeka. Neeni yaanne haanne woxiya ziita keyida gimale mela.
JER 2:24 Neeni bazzo meezetida, ziita wode carko singethiya hare mela. I amoy dendin, ooni iyo teqanaw danda7ii? Iya baw koyada gakiya gisho ay adde hareyka iyo demmanaw daaburenna.
JER 2:25 Neno, Isra7eele, ne caammay wurana gakanaw ne kottonoy melana gakanaw hara xoossata geedo woxofa. Shin neeni, ‘Atto, hessi tana maaddenna. Taani imatha xoossata dosas; taani enta goyinnana’ yaagadasa.
JER 2:26 “Kaysoy oyketida wode yeellateysada Isra7eele asay yeellatidosona; enti, enta kawoti, enta halaqati, enta kahinetine enta nabeti ubbay yeellatana.
JER 2:27 Enti mithaako, ‘Ne ta aawa’ yaagosona; shuchaa, ‘Tana ne yeladasa yaagosona. Enti banta som7uwa aggidi, banta zokuwa zaaridosona. Shin enti meto wode nuna ashsha!’ yaagosona.
JER 2:28 Shin hinte, hintew medhida xoossati awun de7oona? Hinte meton geliya wode hintena ashshanaw danda7iko dendidi hintena asho. Hinteno, Yihuda asaw, hinte xoossati hinte katamata mela daro” yaagees Goday.
JER 2:29 “Hinte taara ayis mootetetii? Hinte ubbay taw makallideta.
JER 2:30 Ta hintena coo seeras; hinte hinte oosuwape simmiyaba gideketa. Koshatida gaammoda hinte mashshay hinte nabeta mis” yaagees Goday.
JER 2:31 Hinteno, ha wodiya yeletaw, Godaa qaala si7ite. Ta Isra7eeletas bazzo woyko sakana dhuman de7iya biitta gidadinaayee? Yaatin, ayis ta asay, “Nuuni nu sheneda baana; neeko simmoko” yaagidona?
JER 2:32 Geela7iya ba alleequwa, mushuriya ba ma7uwa dogay? Shin ta asay tana tayboy bayna gallas dogidosona.
JER 2:33 Neeni ne laggethota geedo wothaa waanada meezetadii? Daro iita maccasati ne ogiya tamaarosona.
JER 2:34 Menthidi gelishin oykida asaa suuthan gidonashin xillo manqota suuthan ne ma7oy iitis. Neeni hessa ubbaa oothadaka,
JER 2:35 Neeni, “ ‘Taani xillo; tuma Goday ta bolla hanqetenna; taani nagara oothabike’ giya gisho ta ne bolla pirdana.
JER 2:36 Neeni ne ogiya laammashe ayis woxay? Nena Asoorey yeellaydaysada Gibxey yeellayana.
JER 2:37 Goday ne ammaneteyisata kawushida gishonne ne entafe maade demmonna gisho ne huuphiya oykada yaape keyana” yaagees Goday.
JER 3:1 “Issi asi ba machiw yeddin, iya bada hara azina geliko, he addey iyo zaarii? Zaariko he biittay tuna gidennee? Shin ne laymatanaw koyada daro laggethotara de7adasa; ha77i neeni taako simmanee? yaagees Goday
JER 3:2 Dhoqu gada aykoy bayna dereta xeella. Laymatanaw ne zin7aboona bessi de7ii? Arabe asi mela biittan utteysada, neeni laggethota naagada oge doonan uttadasa. Ne laymatethaninne ne iitatethan biitta tunisadasa.
JER 3:3 Hessa gisho, torche iray teqetis; sila irayka bukonna ixis. Hessi haninka, new laymatetha medhoy de7ees; ne yeellatonna ixadasa.
JER 3:4 Ha77i neeni, ‘Ta aawaw, ta na7atetha laggiyaw ne tana siiqasa.
JER 3:5 Ne ubba wode yilotay? Ne hanqoy merinaw aggennee?’ yaagasa. Shin ne oothanaw danda7iya iita ubbaa oothaasa” yaagees Goday.
JER 3:6 Kawa Iyosyaasa wode Goday taako haysada yaagis: “Ammanoy bayna Isra7eeley oothidaba ne be7adii? Iya dere bollanne daashsha mitha ubbaa garsi bada yan laymatasu.
JER 3:7 Iya haysa ubbaa oothinka taako simmande gada qopas, shin simmabuuku. I michiya, ammanetona Yihudika hessa be7asu.
JER 3:8 Ammanoy bayna Isra7eele daro wode laymatida gisho pirima immada iyo yeddas. Hessi haninka Isra7eele michiya, ammanetona Yihudi, yayyonnaysa ta be7as; iyaka keyada laymatasu.
JER 3:9 Laymatethay iw laafaba gidiya gisho, mitharanne shuchara laymatada biitta tunisasu.
JER 3:10 He ubban I michiya, ammanetona Yihudi simmidaba daanawusupe attishin, kumetha wozanape taako simmabuuku” yaagees Goday.
JER 3:11 “Ammanetona Yihudape ammanoy bayna Isra7eeley xillo.
JER 3:12 Bada pudeha baggan de7iya asaas haysada yaagada awaaja: ‘Ammanoy bayna Isra7eele, simma! Taani maaroti kumida Godaa gidiya gisho nena iita ayfen xeellike. Merinaw hanqetike’.
JER 3:13 Gidoshin, ‘Taani Godaa, ta Xoossaa bolla makallas. Allaga xoossatara daashsha mitha garsan laymatas. Ne qaala kiitetabike’ gada ne qohuwa ammana” yaagees Goday.
JER 3:14 “Hinteno, ammanetona asaw, ta hintew azina gidiya gisho simmite. Taani issi katamape issinno, issi yarape nam7a doora ekada Xiyoone ehana.
JER 3:15 Ta wozanaada hintena heemmiya henthanchota hintew immana. Enti hintena eratethaninne akeekan heemmana” yaagees Goday.
JER 3:16 “He gallasatan hinte he biittan dariya wode asay, ‘Godaa caaqo Taabotiya’ gidi odetokona. I entaw qofetenna; hassayetenna; baynaysi entaw eretenna; harika oosetenna.
JER 3:17 He wode enti Yerusalaame, ‘Godaa Araata’ gidi xeegana. Kawotetha ubbaafe asay Godaa sunthaa bonchanaw Yerusalaame shiiqana. Hessafe guye, enti banta wozanaa iitatethaa kaallokona.
JER 3:18 He wode Yihuda asaynne Isra7eele asay gahetidi pudeha bagga biittafe ta hinte aawata laatisida biitta issife yaana” yaagees Goday.
JER 3:19 “Ta hintena na7atho ekada, biitta ubbaafe lo77iyanne aradda biitta hintew immanaw koyas. ‘Ta aawaw’ gidi xeegananne tana kaallana gada qopas.
JER 3:20 Shin Isra7eele asaw, hinte ba azinaas ammanetona machida taw ammanetibeketa” yaagees Goday.
JER 3:21 Enti banta ogiya geellayida gishonne banta Xoossaa aggida gisho manqo zumatape Isra7eele asaa waasoynne yeehoy si7etees.
JER 3:22 “Hinteno, ammanoy bayna asaw, taako simmite. Hinte ammanetana mela ta hintena pathana” yaagees Goday. Hinte, “Neeni, nu Godaa Xoossaa gidiya gisho neeko simmana.
JER 3:23 Dereta bollanne zumata bolla eeqa goyinnoy tuma cimo. Tuma Isra7eele atotethay Godaa, nu Xoossaa.
JER 3:24 Nu na7atethafe doomin, nu aawati daaburidi demmida, enta dorsaanne mehiya, enta maccanne adde nayta yeellayiya eeqati midi dhaysidosona.
JER 3:25 Na7atethafe hachi gakanaw, nunne nu aawati Godaa nu Xoossaa bolla nagara oothida. Godaa nu Xoossaa qaala kiitetibooko. Hessa gisho, nuuni yeellan gufannanaw qassi kawushatethi afilada nuna kammo” yaagosona.
JER 4:1 Goday yaagees, “Isra7eele asaw, simmiko, taako simmite. Hinte tana shaatiya hinte eeqata ta sinthafe diggiko, ta ogiyape kare keyonna ixiko,
JER 4:2 tuman, suuretethaninne xillotethan, ‘De7o Xoossay eriya mela’ gidi caaqiko, he wode kawotethati iyan anjetananne iyan ceeqana.”
JER 4:3 Goday Yihudanne Yerusalaame asaako haysada yaagees: “Hinte othe biitta goyite; aguntha bolla zeropite.
JER 4:4 Hinteno, Yihudanne Yerusalaame asaw, hinte Xoossaas qaxaretite; hinte wozanaa shoohuwa diggite. Hessi hanonna ixiko hinte iitatethaa gisho, ta hanqoy tamada eexana; iya oonika toysanaw danda7enna” yaagees Goday.
JER 4:5 Yihudan awaajite; Yerusalaamen moyze punnite! Hinte qaala dhoqu oothidi haysada gidi waassite! Issife shiiqidi gimbetida katamatako yedhite.
JER 4:6 Asay Xiyoone baana mela mallite! Hinte shempuwa ashshanaw gam7onna baqatite! Gam7ofite! Ta pudeha baggafe gadonne dhayo biitta bolla ehana hanayis.
JER 4:7 Gaammoy worape keyeysada kawotethata dhayseysi ba bessaafe dendidi hinte biitta dhaysanaw yis. Hinte katamati laaletidi baysa gidana.
JER 4:8 Hessa gisho, kayo ma7o ma7idi, “Woo! Woo!” gidi zeleelitenne yeekite. Godaa suulliya hanqoy nu bollafe kichibeenna.
JER 4:9 “He wode kawanne halaqata wozanay til7ana; kahineti dagammana; nabeti hirgana” yaagees Goday.
JER 4:10 Taani, “Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, mashshi enta qoodhen wodhiya wode ‘Hintew sa7i saro gidana’ yaagada ha asaanne Yerusalaame ayis cimmay” yaagas.
JER 4:11 He wode ha asaasinne Yerusalaames haysada yaagidi odetana: “Mela biittan de7iya aykoy bayna dhoqa deretape michiya carkoy ta asaa bolla carkana; hessi kathi geeshshanaasa gidenna.
JER 4:12 Ta kiitan wolqaama carkoy carkana; ta enta pirdana” gees.
JER 4:13 Heko, morkey shaarada keyees. Iya para gaareti gote mela; iya parati arganthafe aadhidi eesotoosona. Nuna ayye! Nu dhayida!
JER 4:14 “Neno Yerusalaame, attana mela ne wozanaa meeccada iitatethaafe geeya. Iita qofay ne wozanan awude gakanaw gam7anee?
JER 4:15 Daane katamaapenne Efreema zumaape yidaysati iitabaa awaajosona.
JER 4:16 Yihuda katamata bolla ola awaajiya olanchoti haaho biittafe yuussaa bolla de7oosona gidi kawotethatas odite; Yerusalaameska awaajite.
JER 4:17 I ta bolla makallida gisho, gaden de7iya kathaa naageysada olanchoti Yihuda yuushuwa teqana” yaagees Goday.
JER 4:18 Yihuda asaw, hinte hanoynne hinte oosoy haysa ubbaa hinte bolla ehis. Haysi hintew seera. I ay mela cammi! Hinte wozanaa ay mela caddi!
JER 4:19 Tana ayye! Ta haysa waata danda7ane! Ayye ta wozanaa! Ta wozanay kokorees; ta si77i gaanaw danda7ike. Taani moyze punonne ola girsi si7ida gisho si77i gaanaw danda7ike.
JER 4:20 Dhayoy dhayo bolla yees; biittay kumethi dhayis. Ta dunkaaney kundis; ta shaqarayka laaletis.
JER 4:21 Taani awude gakanaw ola malla be7anee? Awude gakanaw moyze puno si7anee?
JER 4:22 “Ta asay eeya; enti tana erokona. Enti qofi bayna nayta mela; entaw akeeki baawa. Enti iitabaa oothanaw cinca; shin lo77oba oothidi erokona” yaagees Goday.
JER 4:23 “Taani sa7aa be7iya wode, sa7i aykoyka bayna baysa gididaysa be7as. Qassi salota xeelliya wode, poo7oy baynaysa xeellas.
JER 4:24 Ta dereta xeelliya wode enti qaaxoosona; taani zumata be7iya wode yaa haa woxoosona.
JER 4:25 Ta xeelliya wode asi baawa; salo kafoti ubbay paallidi baqatidosona.
JER 4:26 Ta xeelliya wode aradda biittay qaa7e gididaysa be7as. Godaa sinthaninne iya suulliya hanquwa sinthan he biitta katamati laaletidosona.
JER 4:27 “Biittay dhayana; shin ta iya kumethi dhaysike.
JER 4:28 Sa7ay yeekana; saloy dhumana. Taani odas; marsike. Taani qofa qachas; aggike” yaagees Goday.
JER 4:29 Para asatanne donge asata waasuwan, asay katama ubbaafe baqatana. Baggati woxidi wora gelana, baggati zaalla bolla keyana. Katama ubbay baysi gidin de7iya asi dhayana.
JER 4:30 Neno, dhayos attidaare ne waanay? Ne zo7o ma7uwa ayis ma7adii? Worqa alleeqo ayis wothadii? Ne ayfiya siphintha ayis tiyay? Neeni coo nena loythaasa; ne laggethoti nena kadhidosona; enti nena wodhanaw koyoosona.
JER 4:31 Taani iqethi oykida maccasi waassiya waasuwa mela si7as. I waasoy koyro na7a yeliya maccasa waaso mela. He waasoy, Yerusalaamey shempo dhayada, ba kushiya miccada, “Tana ayye! Ta dhayas! Tana wodhanaw hanoosona!” yaagada waassiya waasuwa.
JER 5:1 “Ane Yerusalaame ogiya bolla keyite; pudenne duge hemetite; iya yuushuwa xeellitenne akeekite; iya gutaranka koyite. Xillo pirdiyanne tuma koya issi asi hinte demmiko, ta Yerusalaame maarana.
JER 5:2 Enti, ‘De7o Goday eriya mela’ gidi caaqikoka, wordo caaqoosona” yaagees Goday.
JER 5:3 Abeeti Godaw, ne ayfeti tumaa xeellokonaayee? Ne enta shocadasa shin enta sakibeenna. Ne enta mentherethadasa shin enti simmonna ixidosona. Enti banta som7uwa zaallafe aathidi minthidi banta nagaraape simmonna ixidosona.
JER 5:4 Hessafe guye, taani, “Haysati Godaa ogiyanne banta Xoossaa higgiya eronna gisho, manqonne eeya” yaagada qopas.
JER 5:5 Hiza, ta gita asatako bada entaw odana. Godaa ogiyanne banta Xoossaa higgiya eroosona. Shin enti ubbay iya qambara menthidosona; iya qashuwaka duuthidosona.
JER 5:6 Enta makallaynne enta kundethay daro gidiya gisho, gaammoy worape keyidi, enta wodhana. Suudhumey bazzofe keyidi, enta maana. Maahey enta katamata hokidi naagana. He katamatape keyiya ubbay puuzetana.
JER 5:7 “Taani hinte nagaraa ayis atto go? Hinte nayti tana aggidi, wordo xoossatan caaqidosona. Taani enta muzada kalsas, shin enti laymatidosona; enta keethan aqidosona.
JER 5:8 Enti dhiiketida korma parada, hara asa macho laggethanaw singethoosona.
JER 5:9 Tuma ta ha oosota gisho, enta seeranaw bessikina? Haysa mela kawotethaa bolla ta haluwa keyikina?” yaagees Goday.
JER 5:10 “I woyne gadiya giddo gelidi iissite, shin kumethi dhaysofite. Enti Godaaba gidonna gisho I tasheta karidi yeggite.
JER 5:11 Isra7eele asaynne Yihuda asay kumethi kaddidosona” yaagees Goday.
JER 5:12 Enti haysada gidi Godaa bolla wordo odetidosona: “I aykoka oothenna; qohiyabay aybika nu bolla yeenna. Morke mashshay woyko koshi nuna polo demmenna.
JER 5:13 Nabeti carko mela; entan Xoossaa qaalay baawa. Hessa gisho, enti giyaba ubbay enta gako” yaagosona.
JER 5:14 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele asaako, “Enti ha qaala odida gisho taani ta qaala ne doonan tama oothana; ha asay mithi gidana; tamayka enta maana” yaagees Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay.
JER 5:15 Goday Isra7eele asaako, “Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, ta hinte bolla haaho biittafe issi kawotethi ehana. Enta qaala hinte eronna, enta oday hintew gelonna wolqaamanne beni kawotethi.
JER 5:16 Enta donge pal7e shoohoy dooya duufo mela; enta olanchoti wolqaama.
JER 5:17 Enti hinte kathaanne hinte goshsha ayfiya maana; hinte adde naytanne macca nayta wodhana; hinte dorsaanne mehiya bonqana; hinte woyniyanne balase mithaa dhaysana. Hinte ammanetiya, gimbetida katamata banta mashshan olidi dhaysana” yaagees.
JER 5:18 “Gidoshin, he gallasatan gidikoka, taani ta asaa kumethi dhaysike” yaagees Goday
JER 5:19 Asay nena, “ ‘Goday nu Xoossay nu bolla haysa ubbaa ayis oothidee?’ gidi oychiko, ne entako, ‘Hinte tana aggidi, hinte biittan imatha xoossata goyinnidaysada, hinteka asa biittan haratas haggaazana’ yaaga” yaagis.
JER 5:20 “Haysa Yayqooba asaas oda; Yihuda biittan awaaja.
JER 5:21 Hinteno, ayfey de7ishin be7onaysato, haythi de7ishin si7onnaysato, eeyanne akeekona asaw haysa si7ite!
JER 5:22 Hinte taw yayyanaw bessennee? Hinte ta sinthan kokoranaw koshshennee? yaagees Goday. Abbay aadhidi boonna mela shafe iyaw zawa oothiday tana? Zuley sugikoka iyape aadhanaw danda7enna; hobbey dendikoka kanthidi aadhenna.
JER 5:23 Shin ha asaas muumenne makalla wozani de7ees. Enti hara soo simmidi wora bidosona.
JER 5:24 Enti banta wozanan, ‘Nuus sila iranne torche ira woden woden immiya, kathaa shiishiya wode nuus immiya Godaa ane yayyoos’ yaagibookona.
JER 5:25 Hinte balay hessa teqis; hinte nagaray hintena lo77obaape ashshis” yaagees.
JER 5:26 “Ta asaa giddon iita asati de7oosona. Kafo oykanaw naagiya asada hokidi naagoosona. Enti gite yeggidi asaa oykoosona.
JER 5:27 Kafo keethan kafoy kumidaada, enta keethay cimon kumis; enti wolqaamanne dure.
JER 5:28 Enti ordenne modho gididosona; enta iita oosuwas zawi baawa. Enti yi7o nayta gisho mootetokona; manqotas suure pirdibookona.
JER 5:29 Yaatin, taani hessa gisho enta seeranaw bessennee? Haysa mela kawotetha bolla ta haluwa keyanaw bessennee?” yaagees Goday.
JER 5:30 “Daro iitabaynne daganthiyabay biitta bolla hanis.
JER 5:31 Nabeti wordo odoosona; kahineti enta zoriyan aysoosona. Ta asayka hessa melaba dosees. Shin wursethan hinte waananee?” yaagees Goday.
JER 6:1 Hinteno, Biniyaame asaw, hinte shempuwa ashshanaw baqatite! Yerusalaamepe keyite! Taquhe kataman moyze punnite! Beet-Hakareeman malla bessite! Pudeha baggafe iitabaynne gita dhayoy yaana hanees.
JER 6:2 Taani lo77iyanne ufaysiya Xiyoone katamata dhaysana.
JER 6:3 Henthanchoti banta wudiya ekidi yaa yaana. Iya yuushuwan banta dunkaaniya tokana; issoy issoy ba wudiya heemmana.
JER 6:4 “Yerusalaame olanaw giigetite! Dendite! Iya seeta gallas oloos. Shin ayye! Sa7i qammees; omarsa kuyay aduqi aduqi bees.
JER 6:5 Hessa gisho, dendite! qamma olidi iya miixaa laalloos” yaagidi maqetoosona.
JER 6:6 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees: “Mithata qanxite. Yerusalaame gimbiya miyen biitta doorite. He kataman naaqoy kumida gisho I seeretanaw bessees.
JER 6:7 Haatha olli haathe pulteysada ika ba iitatetha pultees. Makallinne dhayoy iya giddon si7etees; iya hargeynne madunthay ta sinthana.
JER 6:8 Neno Yerusalaame, ta seera eka. Akay, giiko, ta neepe shaaketananne ne biitta asi bayna baysa kessana” yaagees.
JER 6:9 “Woyne poshiliyada, Isra7eele asaa giddofe attidaysata loythidi poshilite. Woyne qoriya asada, hinte kushiya daashshata giddo zaaridi yeddite” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
JER 6:10 “Ta ooddes odo? Oona seero? Ooni si7anee? Enti si7onna mela enta haythay tullis. Godaa qaalay entaw miichas attis; enti iyan ufaytokona.
JER 6:11 Godaa hanqoy tanan kumis. Ta ha sheniya teqanaw danda7ike. Oge bolla de7iya yooga nayta bollanne shiiqida na7atethata bolla ta hanquwa tiga. Machiya, azinaynne cimida asa ubbay attokona.
JER 6:12 Taani he biittan de7eyisata bolla ta kushiya yeddiya wode enta keethay, enta goshshaynne enta macheti ubbay haratas imetana” yaagees.
JER 6:13 “Guuthafe gita gakanaw ubbay bana go77iyabaa koyees. Nabetinne kahineti ubbay cimmoosona.
JER 6:14 Ta asaa maduntha pathonnaba oothidi guutha dhale wothoosona. Saroy baynashin, ‘Saro; saro!’ yaagosona.
JER 6:15 Enti ha shaatiya oosuwa oothidi yeellatidona? Akay, enti kumethi yeellatibookona; enti yeelli aybeko erokona. Hessa gisho, entika kundidaysata giddon kundana. Taani enta seeriya wode enta kawushana” yaagees Goday.
JER 6:16 Goday haysada yaagees: “Ogiyan eqidi xeellite; beni ogey de7iya bessaa oychite. Lo77o ogey awun de7iyako oychidi iyan hemetite; hinte shempo demmana. Shin hinte, nuuni he ogiyan hemetoko!” yaagideta.
JER 6:17 Taani naageysata hinte bolla shuumada, “Moyze girsaa si7ite” yaagas. Shin hinte, “Nu si7oko” yaagideta.
JER 6:18 “Hessa gisho, kawotethato, si7ite! Taani ta asaa bolla oothanaba akeekite.
JER 6:19 Sa7an de7iya asaw, haysa si7ite! Enti ta qaala si7onna ixida gishonne ta higgiya kadhida gisho ta enta bolla dhayo ehana.
JER 6:20 Saaba biittafe ixaani woyko haaho biittafe yida sawoynne qimamey taw aysee? Hinte xuussa yarshoyka eketenna. Hinte yarshoy tana ufaysenna” yaagees.
JER 6:21 Hessa gisho, Goday, “Taani ha asaa sinthan dhube wothana; aawatinne nayti entan dhubetana; shoorotinne laggeti dhayana” yaagees.
JER 6:22 Goday, “Pudeha bagga biittafe olanchoti yoosona; issi gita kawotethay sa7aa gaxape dendis.
JER 6:23 Enti dongenne toora dancidosona; enti qadhey bayna wozana minotanne maarotethi eronnayisata. Enti paran gaallabiya wode abbada guummoosona. Hinteno, Xiyoone katama asaw, enti hintena olanaw salpidosona” yaagees.
JER 6:24 Nuuni he odaa si7in, nu kushey argaacis; maccasi iqethi oykeysada nuna metoynne un7i oykis.
JER 6:25 Morkey mashsha oykida gishonne yan han dagami de7iya gisho soope keyopite; oge bollaka bentofite.
JER 6:26 Dhayseysi qoponna nu bolla yaana gisho, kayo ma7o ma7idi, bido bolla gondoretidi, asi ba issi na7as yeekiya mela ta asaas yeekite.
JER 6:27 Goday Ermiyaasako, “Neeni enta ogiya xomoosana melanne paacana mela birata paaciya asada ta nena oothas.
JER 6:28 Enti ubbay zigiranaw yuuyosona; odin si7onna makallanchota. Enti naase biratadanne biratada mino; enti ubbay nagara oothosona.
JER 6:29 Birata bolla de7iya shi7a xuuggidi geeshshanaw gilpey punnees. Shin geeshshanaw waayida waayey coo gidis; ta asaa giddon de7iya iitati kichibookona.
JER 6:30 Goday enta yeggidi aggida gisho, enti yegetida bira geetetana” yaagees.
JER 7:1 Godaape Ermiyaasako yida qaalay haysa:
JER 7:2 “Xoossa keetha pengiyan eqada, haysada yaagada awaaja. Hinteno, Godaa goyinnanaw ha pengetara geliya Yihuda asaw, ubbay Godaa qaala si7ite!
JER 7:3 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees: hinte ogiyanne hinte oosuwa laammite; ta hintena ha bessan wothana.
JER 7:4 ‘Haysi Xoossa keethi! Haysi Xoossa keethi! Haysi Xoossa keethi’ yaagidi cimo qaalan ammanetofite.
JER 7:5 Hinte, hinte ogiyanne oosuwa tuma laammiko, issoy issuwas xillo pirdiko,
JER 7:6 bete asaa, yi7o naytanne am7eta naaqonna aggiko, ha bessan xillo asa suuthu gussonna aggikonne, hinte qohetonaada hara xoossata goyinnona aggiko,
JER 7:7 ta hinte mayzatas merinaw immida biittan hintena wothana.
JER 7:8 Shin hinte maaddonna cimo qaalan ammaneteta” yaagees.
JER 7:9 “Hinte kaysoteeta, wodheeta, laymateta, wordo caaqidi markateeta, Ba7aale eeqas yarsho yarsheeta, haysafe kase hinte eronna hara xoossata goyinneta.
JER 7:10 Yaatidi, ta sunthan xeegetida Xoossa keethaa yidi, ta sinthan eqidi, ‘Nuuni saro’ yaageeta. Shin ha shaatiya oosuwa ubbaa ootheeta.
JER 7:11 Ta sunthan xeegetida ha Xoossa keethay hintew pangati qosetiya gongolo gidetiyee? Hinte oothiyaba ubbaa taani ta ayfen be7as” yaagees.
JER 7:12 “Taani ta sunthay de7iya bessi oothada koyro doorida, Seelo biite. Ta asaa Isra7eele iitatethaa gisho, taani he bessaa waatidaako be7ite.
JER 7:13 Hinte ha ubbaa oothiya wode ta hintew zaara zaara odas; shin si7onna ixideta. Ta hintena xeegas; shin taw koybeketa.
JER 7:14 Hessa gisho, ta Seelo bolla oothidaysada haysan hinte ammanetiya, ta sunthan xeegetida ha Xoossa keethaa bolla, hintewunne hinte mayzatas immida ha bessaa bolla hessada oothana.
JER 7:15 Hinte dabbota, Efreema kochaa ta diggidaysada ta sinthafe hintenaka diggana” yaagees.
JER 7:16 “Ermiyaasa, ta si7onna gisho, ha asaas woossofa; enta gisho tana oychofa woyko waassofa; entaw gaannatopa.
JER 7:17 Enti Yihuda katamataninne Yerusalaame ogetan oothiyabay aybeko be7ikiyee?
JER 7:18 Nayti mithi mixoosona; aawati tama eethoosona; maccasati, ‘Salo Kawiw’ geetetiya eeqees uythi uukanaw dhiille munuqoosona. Enti tana yiloyanaw ushsha yarsho hara xoossatas gussoosona.
JER 7:19 Enti haysa oothey tuma tana qohanaaseyee? Haysan qohetidi yeellatanay enta gidokonaayee?” yaagees Goday.
JER 7:20 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Ta hanqoy ha bessaa bolla, asaa bollanne mehiya bolla, gaden de7iya mithaa bollanne biittan de7iya kathaa bolla gukana; I eexana, to7anaw danda7enna.”
JER 7:21 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees: “Hinte xuussa yarshuwa hara yarshota bolla gujidi, ashuwa hintew miite.
JER 7:22 Ta hinte mayzata Gibxe biittafe kessiya wode, xuussa yarshobanne hara yarshotaba odabike woyko kiittabike.
JER 7:23 Shin ta entako, taw kiitetite; ta hinte Xoossaa gidana; hinteka ta ase gidana. Hintew injetana mela ta hintena kiittiya oge ubban hemetite.
JER 7:24 Shin enti tana si7onna woyko taw besse immonna ixidosona. Enti banta iita wozanaa qofaa kaallidi bidosona; sinthe baanaysa aggidi guye bidosona.
JER 7:25 Hinte mayzati Gibxefe keyida wodepe doomidi hachi gakanaw ta aylleta, nabeta wonta wonta hintew kiittas.
JER 7:26 Shin hinte tana si7onna woyko taw besse immonna ixideta. Hinte morgiya minthideta; hinte aawatape aadhidi iitabaa oothideta.
JER 7:27 “Ha ubbaa ne entaw oda; shin enti ne giyaba si7okona. Ne enta xeegana; shin enti koyokona.
