JER 7:28 Hessa gisho, Ermiyaasa, ne entako haysada yaaga: ha kawotethay ba Godaa Xoossaa kiitetonna woyko iya zoriya si7onna kawotethi. Tumi dhayis; tumi enta inxarsan deenna.
JER 7:29 Hinte huuphiya meedidi wora holite. Goday bana yiloyida yeleta ixida gishonne yeggidi aggida gisho aybika bayna dhoqa zumaa bolla keyidi zeleelite” yaagis.
JER 7:30 “Yihuda asay ta sinthan iitabaa oothidosona. Enti ta sunthan xeegetida Xoossa keethaa tunisanaw taani ixiya eeqata ehidi iya giddon wothidosona.
JER 7:31 Enti banta adde naytanne macca nayta taman xuuggidi yarshanaw, Hinooma Zangaaran Toofeta geetetiya yarsho bessa gimbidosona. Shin hessi ta enta kiittaboonabanne ta qofan baynaba.
JER 7:32 Hessa gisho, he bessay Hinooma Zangaara woyko Toofeta geetetidi xeegeteysi attidi, Shuka Zangaara yaagetidi xeegetana wodey yaana. Moogiya bessi bayna gisho, Toofeti enti banta aha moogiya bessi gidana.
JER 7:33 He wode he asaa ahay salo kafotasinne sa7a do7atas kathi gidana; enta gooddana asika baawa.
JER 7:34 Taani yethi, ufaysinne yaagano girsi Yihuda katamataninne Yerusalaame ogetan si7etonnaada oothana; biittay baysa gidana” yaagees Goday.
JER 8:1 “He wode Yihuda kawota meqethay, halaqata meqethay, kahineta meqethay, nabeta meqethaynne Yerusalaamen de7iya asaa meqetha ubbay duufope maxetidi keyana.
JER 8:2 Enti siiqida, kiitetida, kaallida, zore oychidanne goyinnida awa, ageenanne salo xoolintota ubbaa sinthan micetana. Enta meqethay shiiqenna woyko moogetenna; shin biitta bolla pito mela yegetana.
JER 8:3 Ta laallida bessatan de7iya, ha iita kawotethaafe attida asa ubbay de7ope hayqo amotana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
JER 8:4 Goday haysada yaagees gada oda: “Issi asi kundiko, simmidi dendeneyee? Woyko issi asi oge baletiko guye simmenneyee?
JER 8:5 Yaatin, ha asay ayis guye simmidee? Yerusalaamey ayis ubba wode oge baleetii? Enti cimo baqidi oykidosona; simmonna ixidosona.
JER 8:6 Ta minthada hayzas; shin enti tuma haasayokona. ‘Ta ay oothadina?’ gidi ba iita nagaraa paaxey issoyka baawa. Ubbay olas gaallabiya parada baw baw woxees.
JER 8:7 Hari attoshin, haatha kafoti banta wodiya eroosona; holleti, kaarotinne masqala kafoti banta simmiya wodiya naagoosona; shin ta asay Godaa woga erokona.
JER 8:8 “Yaatin waanidi, ‘Godaa higgey nuura de7iya gisho nu cinca’ gaanaw danda7eetii? Wordancho xaafeti ta higgiya wordo kessidaysa be7eketii?
JER 8:9 Cincati yeellatana; enti kawuyananne oyketana. Enti Godaa qaala ixin, entaw ay cincatethi de7ii?
JER 8:10 Hessa gisho, ta enta macheta haratas, enta goshsha allaga asas immana. Guuthafe gita gakanaw bessonna go77as yiiqetoosona. Nabetinne kahineti ubbay asaa cimmoosona.
JER 8:11 Enti ta asaa madunthaa laafa gidi, guutha dhale wothoosona. Saroy baynashin ‘Saro, saro!’ yaagosona.
JER 8:12 Ha shaatiya oosuwa oothishe, enti yeellatidona? Akay, enti aykoka yeellatibookona. Enti yeelli aybeko erokona. Hessa gisho, enti kundidaysata giddon kundana; enti seeretiya wode kawuyana.
JER 8:13 Enta goshsha ayfiya ta entafe ekana. Enta woyne ayfey dhayana; balase mithaa ayfey bentenna. Iya boncoy shullana; ta entaw immidaba entafe ekana” yaagees Goday.
JER 8:14 Asay zaaridi haysada yaagosona: “Nu si77i gidi ayis uttanee? Ane shiiqite; gimbetida katamata gelidi yan hayqana. Goday nu Xoossay nuna hayqos aathidi immis. Nu iya bolla nagara oothida gisho, nu wodhiya haathi uyana mela oothis.
JER 8:15 Sarotethi ufaysan naagida; shin lo77obay yibeena. Nu paxo amotida; shin dagama gidis.
JER 8:16 Morke para garmamoy Daane kataman si7etees; enta korma parata caagethan biitti qaaxees. Enti biittanne biittan de7iyaba ubbaa, katamaanne kataman de7iya ase ubbaa midi dhaysanaw yidosona.
JER 8:17 Taani shooshata hinte giddo yeddana. Biti teqanaw danda7onna haso shooshata hinte giddo yeddana; enti hintena dukana” yaagees Goday.
JER 8:18 Ta azzanuwas minthethoy baawa; ta wozanay til7is.
JER 8:19 Ta asay haaho biittan waassiya waasuwa si7ite. Enti, “Goday Xiyoonen baawee? Ha Xiyoone Kawoy zaaridi yan deennee?” yaagidi waassoosona. Goday enta Kawoy, “Enti banta medhida misiletan, banta pathonna allaga eeqatan tana ayis yiloyidona?” yaagis.
JER 8:20 Asay zaaridi, “Heko caka wodey aadhis; boney wuris; nuuni attibooko” yaagidi waassoosona.
JER 8:21 Ta asay madunxida gisho, ta wozanayka madunxis. Ta kayotas; yashshi tana oykis.
JER 8:22 Galadan tiyetiya dhaley baawee? Yan aakimey deennee? Yaatin, ta asaa meqoy ayis paxennee?
JER 9:1 Hayqida ta asaas qammanne gallas yeekana mela ta huuphey haatha olla, ta ayfey pulto haathi gideerenne.
JER 9:2 Enti ubbay makallanne laymatiya asi gidiya gisho, taani ta asaape shaaketada baana mela, oge asi aqiya bessi, taw mela biittan de7ereneshin.
JER 9:3 “Enti banta inxarsan wordo odetanaw ubba wode giigidi de7oosona. Enta biittan tuma gidonashin wordoy kawotis. Enti issi nagarape hara nagaran pinnidosona; tana erokona” yaagees Goday.
JER 9:4 “Ishi cimmeysa, shooroy zigireysa gidiya gisho shooruwape naageto; ishay ishaa ammanetofo.
JER 9:5 Shooroy shooruwa cimmees; tuma odetey deenna. Wordo odetana mela banta inxarsaa tamaarsidosona; nagara oosona bantana daabursidosona.
JER 9:6 Ne cimo giddon de7aasa; enti banta cimuwan tana eronna ixidosona” yaagees Goday.
JER 9:7 “Hessa gisho, ta enta biratada seerisana; enta paacana. Ta asaa gisho, ta haraba ay oothanaw danda7iyana?
JER 9:8 Enta inxarsay wodhiya donge toora mela; enti cimon haasayoosona. Banta doonan issoy issuwara saro qaala haasayoosona; shin banta wozanan xihe wothoosona.
JER 9:9 Yaatin, ta ha hanotaas enta seeranaw bessennee? Taani haysa mela kawotethaa bolla halo keyanaw bessennee?” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
JER 9:10 Taani dhoqa deretas yeekana; enta gisho waassana; bazzon de7iya hentha gadetas zeleelana. Enti dhayidosona; yaara issi asika aadhenna. Mehe waasoy si7etenna; salo kafotinne do7ati baqatidosona.
JER 9:11 “Yerusalaame katamaa laaletida keelanne workanati gupiya bessi oothana. Yihuda katamata oonika doonna baysa kessana” yaagees Goday.
JER 9:12 Haysa akeekanaw danda7iya cinca asi oonee? Hara asas odana mela Goday ooddes qoncisidee? Issi asika iya giddora aadhona mela biittay iitidi bazzoda oniday aybisee?
JER 9:13 “Haysi haniday, entaw ta immida higgiya enti aggida gishosa. Enti taw kiitetonanne ha higgiya kaallonna ixida gishosa.
JER 9:14 Hessa aggidi, enti banta wozanaa muumetetha kaallidosona; enta aawati tamaarsida Ba7aale geetetiya eeqa goyinnidosona” yaagees Goday.
JER 9:15 Hessa gisho, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees: “Taani ha asaa cammiya kathi muzana; wodhiya haathi ushshana.
JER 9:16 Enti woyko enta aawati eronna kawotethata giddon ta enta laallana. Enta dhaysana gakanaw mashshan yedethana” yaagees.
JER 9:17 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees: “Ane qopite. Yeeho yeekiya maccasata xeegite; zelelsi eriya asata ehite.
JER 9:18 Enti ellesidi yidi, nu ayfey afuthu holthu oothana gakanawunne nu ayfiya ciroy haathe pultana gakanaw zelelsi kesso.
JER 9:19 Xiyoonen zelelsa girsi si7etees; ‘Nu dhayida! Nu kawuyida! Nu keethay laaletida gisho, nu biitta aggidi baanaw koshshees’ ” yaagosona.
JER 9:20 Hinteno, maccasato, Godaa qaala si7ite! Hinte haythay iya doonape keyiya qaala hayzo. Hinte macca nayta zelelsi tamaarsite; issoy issuwa yeeho tamaarso.
JER 9:21 Hayqoy yooga nayta ogen, na7atethata dabaaban qeexishe yidi, nu maskooteta gakis; nu miixaa gelis.
JER 9:22 “Asa ahi buureda denban yegetana; cakeysati cakidi guye yeggida katha mela enta oonika shiishenna” yaagees Goday.
JER 9:23 “Cinci ba cincatethan ceeqofo; wolqaami ba wolqan ceeqofo; durey ba duretethan ceeqofo.
JER 9:24 Shin ceeqiya oonika tana eroninne akeekon ceeqo. Maarotethi, suure pirdanne xillotethi sa7a bolla oothiya Godaa, tana eridi ceeqo; hessi tana ufaysees” yaagees Goday.
JER 9:25 “Banta asho xalaala qaxaretida asaa ta seerana wodey yaana.
JER 9:26 Hessatika Gibxe, Yihuda, Edoome, Amoonenne Moo7abe asaanne banta huuphiya yuushuwa meedidi, mela biittan de7iya asa ubbaa. Ha kawotethati ubbay tuma qaxaretibookona; Isra7eele asa ubbayka banta wozanan qaxaretibookona” yaagees Goday.
JER 10:1 Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, Goday odiya qaala si7ite!
JER 10:2 Goday haysada yaagees: “Hara kawotethata ogiya tamaaropite. Enti salo bolla malaata be7idi dagammikoka, hinte dagammopite.
JER 10:3 Enta wogay hada; enti worape mithi qanxoosona; masseysi kaltan massees.
JER 10:4 Enti biraninne worqan alleeqisosona; qaaxonnaada misimaaren dhishidi oythoosona.
JER 10:5 Enta eeqati leehe giddon kafo daganthanaw essiya malla mela. Enti odetokona; enti hemetanaw danda7onna gisho asay enta tookosona. Entas kumthi yayyofite. Enti qohanawuka maaddanawuka danda7onna gisho entaw yayyofite” yaagees Goday.
JER 10:6 Abeeti Godaw, ne mali oonika baawa. Neeni gita; ne sunthayka gitanne wolqaama.
JER 10:7 Abeeti kawotethata Kawaw, nena bonchonay oonee? Cinca asaa giddoninne enta kawotethaa giddon ne meli bayna gisho new boncho bessees.
JER 10:8 Enti eeyanne eri dhayidaysata; enti mithafe massida, pathonna eeqatape ay tamaarona?
JER 10:9 He eeqati Tarsesa biraninne Afeeza worqan alleeqetidosona. Enti ubbay kushe hiillanchotan oosetida woynenne kaalose daaniya ma7uwan kametidosona.
JER 10:10 Shin Goday tuma Xoossaa; I de7o Xoossaanne merinaa kawa. Iya hanquwan biittay qaaxees; kawotethati iya yiluwa danda7okona.
JER 10:11 “Haysati salonne sa7a medhiboonna xoossati sa7apenne salope dhayana” yaagada neeni entaw oda.
JER 10:12 Ba wolqan sa7aa medhiday, ba cincatethan sa7aa essiday, ba akeekan salota micciday, Xoossaa.
JER 10:13 I, ba kooshincha sissiya wode, salon de7iya haathati guummoosona. I shaara sa7a gaxape pude denthees; wol7anthi irara yeddees; carkuwa ba minja keethaafe kessees.
JER 10:14 Asi ubbay era dhayidi eeyis; worqaa sheeshiya ubbay ba eeqan yeellatis. Enti medhida eeqati wordo; entaw shempoy baawa.
JER 10:15 Enti pathonnabaanne hada; enti seeretiya wode dhayana.
JER 10:16 Shin I ubbaa medhida gisho, Yayqooba Saama gidida Xoossay hessa mela gidenna; Isra7eeley, I baw doorida kawotethi; iya sunthay Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa.
JER 10:17 Hinteno, morkey teqidaysato, biittafe keyanaw hintew de7iyaba shiishite.
JER 10:18 “Taani, ha wodiyan, ha biittan de7iya asaa kessada yambarana. Enta qohoy eretana gakanaw enta bolla iitabaa ehana” yaagees Goday.
JER 10:19 Ta madunxas! Ta madunthay paxenna. Shin taani, “Haysi ta harge; ta danda7anaw bessees” yaagas.
JER 10:20 Ta dunkaaney laaletis; iya wodoro ubbay duuxeretis. Ta nayti ubbay taape shaaketidi bidosona; enti baawa. Ta dunkaaniya zaaridi tokanaw woyko ta magarajuwa kaqanaw issi asika attibeenna.
JER 10:21 Henthanchoti eeyidosona; enti Godaa oychibookona. Hessa gisho, entaw injetonna ixis; enta wude ubbay laaletis.
JER 10:22 Ooratha odi yis; si7ite. Pudeha baggan de7iya kawotethan gita dirgoy medhetis. Iya olanchoti yidi, Yihuda katamata baysanne workanati gupiya bessi kessana.
JER 10:23 Abeeti Godaw, asa de7oy iyaw buzo gidonaysanne ba ogiya suurisanaw iya shene gidonnaysa ta erayis.
JER 10:24 Abeeti Godaw, tana seera; shin likera gido. Ta dhayonna mela ne hanquwan ta bolla yoopa.
JER 10:25 Ne sheniya, nena eronna kawotethata bollanne ne sunthaa xeegonna asaa bolla gussa. Enti Yayqooba asaa midosona; enta mittidosona; enta biitta dhaysidosona.
JER 11:1 Godaape Ermiyaasako yida qaalay haysa:
JER 11:2 “Ha caaqo qaala si7ada Yihuda asaasinne Yerusalaame kataman de7iya asaas oda.
JER 11:3 Goday Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees gada oda. ‘Ha caaquwa naagonna asi oonika baadetidaysa gido’.
JER 11:4 Taani kase hinte aawata Gibxe biittafe, birata seerisiya coociyape kessiya wode, ‘Taw kiitetite; ta hintena kiittiyaba ubbaa oothite. Hinte ta ase gidana; taka hinte Xoosse gidana’ yaagada odas.
JER 11:5 Hessadaka, maathinne eessi goggiya biitta kase hinte aawatas immanaw, taani caaqida caaquwa polana.” Taani, “Ero, Godaw, amin77i” yaagas.
JER 11:6 Goday taako, “Ha qaalata ubbaa Yihuda katamataninne Yerusalaame ogetan haysada yaagada awaaja: ‘Ha caaqo qaala si7ite; iya kaallite.
JER 11:7 Kase hinte aawata ta Gibxe biittafe kessida wodiyape hachi gakanaw, zaara zaarada, “Taw kiitetite” gada seeras.
JER 11:8 Shin enti ta qaala si7ibookona woyko taw kiitetibookona. Enti banta iita wozanaa kaallidosona. Ta caaqo qaala enti naagana mela kiittas; shin enti ixidosona. Hessa gisho, he caaquwa baadetha ubbaa enta bolla ehas’ ” yaagis.
JER 11:9 Zaaridika Goday taako haysada yaagis: “Yihuda asaynne Yerusalaamen de7iya asay ta bolla maqetidosona.
JER 11:10 Enti kase ta qaala si7onna ixida banta mayzata nagarako guye simmidosona. Enti hara xoossata goyinnidosona; entaw oothidosona. Isra7eele asaynne Yihuda asay ta kase enta mayzatara caaqida caaquwa menthidosona.
JER 11:11 Hessa gisho, ‘Enti baqatidi attanaw danda7onna metuwa enta bolla ehana. Enti taako waassinka ta enta si7ike.
JER 11:12 He wode Yihuda asaynne Yerusalaame asay, ixaane cuyisiya banta xoossatako waassana. Shin meto wode he xoossati enta maaddokona.
JER 11:13 Hinteno, Yihuda asaw, hinte xoossati hinte katamata mela daro. Qassi Ba7aale geetetiya yeellaya xoossaas ixaane cuyisanaw hinte giigisiya yarsho bessati Yerusalaame ogeta mela daro’ yaagees Goday.
JER 11:14 “Ermiyaasa, ha asaas tana aykoka woossofa; enta gisho gaannatopa woyko oychofa. Enti banta metuwa gallas tana xeegiya wode ta enta si7ike.
JER 11:15 “Daro asaara ba iita maquwa maqetashe, ta dosiya ta asay, ta keethan bentanaw bessii? Hinte hinte iita oosuwa oothishin, yarshetida mehiya ashoy hintena seerape ashshanee? Hessa gidiyako hinte ufaytanashin” yaagis.
JER 11:16 Goday nena, dicciya, lo77o ayfe ayfiya shamaho yaagidi sunthis. Shin, I he shamahuwa wolqaama dada guunthan, taman xuuggana; iya tasheyka meqana.
JER 11:17 Taani, hintena tokida Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, hinte bolla iitabaa ehanaw awaajas. Isra7eele asaynne Yihuda asay Ba7aales ixaane cuyisidi tana yiloyidosona.
JER 11:18 Goday enta maquwa taw qoncisida gisho ta eras. He wode enti oothiya iita oosuwa tana bessis.
JER 11:19 Taani shukas giigida dorsada hanas. Enti, “Ane mithaanne iya ayfiya dhaysoos. Iya sunthay hassayetonna mela iya paxa de7eyisata giddofe shoddidi diggoos” yaagidi maqetidaysa ta erabike.
JER 11:20 Shin abeeti Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaw, xillo pirdeyso, asa wozananne qofaa shaakada ereyso, ne enta bolla ne haluwa keyada tana bessa. Taani ta qohuwa nena bessaas.
JER 11:21 Hessa gisho, “Godaa sunthan tinbite odopa ixiko, ne nu kushen hayqanna” yaagidi, nena wodhanaw koyiya Anatoota asaaba Goday haysada yaagees.
JER 11:22 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees: “Ta enta seerana; enta panthati mashshan hayqana; enta macca naytinne adde nayti koshan hayqana;
JER 11:23 entafe issoynne attenna. Ayis giiko, taani seeriya laythi Anatoota asa bolla iitaba ehana” yaagees.
JER 12:1 Abeeti Godaw, ta neera mootetiya wode ubbanka ne xillo. Gidoshin, ne xillo pirdaba neera odetanaw koyayis. Iita asati oothiyabay entaw ayis injetii? Gene asati ayis duretidi de7oona?
JER 12:2 Neeni enta tokadasa; enti xapho yeddidosona; diccidi ayfe ayfidosona. Enti nena doonape yeggokona; shin enta wozanaape ne haahon de7aasa.
JER 12:3 Shin abeeti Godaw, ne tana eraasa; tana be7aasa; ta nebaa ay qopiyako paacasa. Shuka dorsada, he iita asata goochada kessa; shuka gallasas enta dummayada wotha.
JER 12:4 Biittay ira dhayidi qohetannay, denban de7iya maatay melanay awude gakanaasee? Asaa iitatethaa gaason, do7inne kafoy wuris. Asay qassi, “Goday nu oothiyaba demmenna” yaagosona.
JER 12:5 Goday Ermiyaasako, “Neeni tohon woxiya asatara gaaddetada daaburiko, parara waanada gaaddetanee? Ne saro biittan dhubetiko, Yordaanose wora giddora waanada hemetanee?
JER 12:6 Ne ishati, hinte soo asati nena aathidi immidosona; ne bolla dendidosona. Hessa gisho, lo77oba odikoka enta ammanopa.
JER 12:7 “Ta Isra7eele aggas; ta dooretida kawotetha yeggas; ta siiqiya asaa iya morketa kushen aathada immas.
JER 12:8 Ta doorida asay taw woran de7iya gaammo mela gidis. I ta bolla gudis; hessa gisho, ta iya ixas.
JER 12:9 Ta doorida asay ubba baggara phircoy teqida kafo mela gididosona. Bidi do7ata ubbaa shiishidi iya maana mela ehite.
JER 12:10 “Daro allaga kawoti ta woyne gadiya iissidosona; ta gadiya yedhidosona; ta lo77o goshsha baysa kessidosona.
JER 12:11 He biittay iitidi oxis; ta sinthan melanne baysa gidis. Qadhetey bayna gisho biittay kumethi iitis.
JER 12:12 Mela biittan de7iya aykoka bayna dere kanthidi, bonqeysati yidosona. Godaa mashshay biitta ha gaxape ya gaxaa gakanaw mis. Hessa gisho, oonika saro attanaw danda7enna.
JER 12:13 Enti giste zeridi, agunthu cakidosona; enti daro daaburidosona; shin aykoka demmibookona. Godaa wolqaama sheniya gaason enta kathay dhayis” yaagis.
JER 12:14 “Taani ta asaa, Isra7eeles, immida biitta oykida, iita shooro kawotethata enta biittafe shoddana. Qassi Yihuda asaa enta giddofe kessana.
JER 12:15 Shin enta biittafe shoddidaape guye, zaarada entaw qadhetana. Enta issuwa enta laata biittanne enta kawotethaa zaarada ehana.
JER 12:16 Kase ta asaa Ba7aale sunthan caaqana mela tamaarsidaysada enti ta asaa ogiya tamaarikonne ta sunthan caaqiko enti ta asaa giddon minnidi daana.
JER 12:17 Shin kiitetonna ixida kawotethata taani polo shoddada dhaysana” yaagees Goday.
JER 13:1 Goday taako, “Bada liino qacinape dadetida danco shammada, ne xeessan danca; shin haathan boshisopa” yaagis.
JER 13:2 Hessa gisho, taani Goday kiittidaysada dancuwa shammada ta xeessan dancas.
JER 13:3 Goday nam7antho taako haysada yaagis:
JER 13:4 “Ne shammada dancida dancuwa ekada, Efraxiisa shaafa bada shucha qophon qosa” yaagis.
JER 13:5 Goday taw odidaysada efada, Efraxiisa shaafa lanqen qosas.
JER 13:6 Daro gallasape guye Goday, “Efraxiisa shaafa bada, ta nena, ‘Yan qosa’ gida dancuwa eka” yaagis.
JER 13:7 Taani Efraxiisa shaafa bada, dancuwa moogida bessaafe ekas. Shin he dancoy iitidi aykoka maaddonnaba gidis.
JER 13:8 Hessafe guye, Godaa qaalay taako,
JER 13:9 “Taani Yihuda ceeqetethaanne Yerusalaame otoruwa haysada oothada dhaysana.
JER 13:10 Ta qaala si7onna ixidi, banta wozanaa muumisidi, hara xoossata goyinnanawunne entaw oothanaw biya ha iita asati, ha dancuwada maaddonnaba gidana.
JER 13:11 Dancoy asa xeessi baqidi oykeysada Yihudinne Isra7eeley taara oyketidi, ta sunthaas galatanne boncho gidana melanne ta ase gidana mela oothas; shin enti si7onna ixidosona” yaagees Goday.
JER 13:12 Goday taako, “Goday Isra7eele Xoossay, haysada yaagees gada oda yaagis: ‘Issi issi xuggay woyne ushshan kumana’ yaaga. Enti neeko, ‘Nuuni issi issi xuggay woynen kumanaysa erokoyee?’ yaagiko,
JER 13:13 ne entako, ‘Taani ha biittan de7iya asa ubbaa, hari attoshin, Dawita araatan uttiya kawota, kahineta, nabetanne Yerusalaamen de7iya asa ubbaa, enti mathotana gakanaw woyne ushshan kunthana.
JER 13:14 Taani enta, issuwa issuwara, aawa na7aara dom7ethana. Ta enta dhaysana; ta entaw keehike, qadhetike; enta maarike’ ” yaagees Goday.
JER 13:15 Haysa odey Godaa gidiya gisho hinte otoruwa aggidi si7ite; akeekite.
JER 13:16 I dhuma ehanaape sinthe, hinte tohoy dhumiya deriyan dhubetanaape sinthe, Godaa hinte Xoossaa bonchite. Hinte, “Poo7oy yaana” gidi naageta; shin I sakana dhuman laammana.
JER 13:17 Shin hinte si7onna ixiko, hinte otoruwa gisho ta geeman yeekayis. Godaa wudey di7etidi bida gisho, ta yeekayis; ta ayfey afuthu gussees.
JER 13:18 Goday taako, “Kawuwasinne kawa aayes, haysada yaagada oda: Hinte boncho kallachay hinte huuphiyape kundida gisho, hinte kawotetha araatape duge wodhite.
JER 13:19 Negebe biittan de7iya katamati ubbay gordetidosona. Enta dooyanaw issi asika yan baawa. Yihuda asay kumethi di7etidi bidosona” yaagis.
JER 13:20 Goday, “Ane dhoqu gada, pudeha baggafe yeyisata xeella. New imetida wudey, ne ceeqetida dorsati awun de7oona?
JER 13:21 Neeni, new lagge gidana mela koydaysati nena xoonidi haariya wode woygay? Yelos keyida maccasada iqethi nena oykennee?
JER 13:22 Yerusalaame, neeni ne wozanan, ‘Ha ubbay tana ayis gakidee?’ giiko, ne ma7oy qaaretidaynne ne bonqetiday ne nagaray darida gishosa.
JER 13:23 Tophey ba malaa woyko maahey ba gazzatethaa laammanaw danda7ii? Hessadaka, iita ooson meezetida hinte, lo77o ooso oothanaw danda7eketa” yaagis.
JER 13:24 “Ta hintena bazzo carkoy efiya suullada laallana.
JER 13:25 Hinte tana dogida gishonne wordo xoossatan ammanetida gisho hinte saamaynne ta hintew immiya gishoy haysa.
JER 13:26 Hinte kalloy bentana mela ta hinte ma7uwa qaara yeggana.
JER 13:27 Ne borso oosuwa, korma parada ziitas caageysa, yeelli bayna laymatethi, zuma bollanne denban ne oothiya ixetida oosuwa ta be7as. Yerusalaame, nena ayye! Ne awude gakanaw geeyonna daanee?” yaagees Goday.
JER 14:1 Koshaba Goday Ermiyaasas odida qaalay haysa:
JER 14:2 “Yihuda biittay kayotees; iya katamati labbanidosona. Yan de7iya asati biittan uttidi yeekosona; Yerusalaamepe gita waasoy si7etis.
JER 14:3 Dure asati haathe tikanaw banta aylleta kiittoosona. Enti haatha ollaako boosona; shin haathe demmokona; banta otuwa mela tooki ekidi simmoosona. Haniyaba dhayidi yeellatishe, banta huuphiya guuluntoosona.
JER 14:4 Iri bukonna gisho biittay melidi za77is. Goshshanchoti yeellatidi, banta huuphiya guuluntidosona.
JER 14:5 Maati bayna gisho woshi7ey ba yelida galo mariw denban yeggada bawusu.
JER 14:6 Bazzo hareti aybika bayna dhoqa zumata bolla eqidi, workanada lafettoosona. Entaw miyabay dhayin, enta ayfey xeellanaw daaburis” yaagis.
JER 14:7 Asay haysada yaagidi woossis: “Abeeti Godaw, nu nagaray nu bolla markatikoka, ne sunthaa gisho, nuus issiba ootha. Nu nena aggidi daro wode guye simmida; ne bolla nagara oothida.
JER 14:8 Abeeti Isra7eele ufaysaw, meto wode ashsheyso, ne imathada, issi qamma aqanaw gelida oge asada ayis hanay?
JER 14:9 Ne dagammida asada, ashshanaw danda7onna asada ayis hanay? Abeeti Godaw, ne nu giddon de7aasa! Nuuni ne sunthan xeegetida; nuna aggofa!” yaagis.
JER 14:10 Ha asataba Goday haysada yaagees: “Enti toylatethi daro dosoosona; banta tohuwa teqokona. Hessa gisho, Goday entan ufaytenna. I enta iita oosuwa hassayidi, enta nagaraa gisho enta seerana” yaagees.
JER 14:11 Hessafe guye, Goday taako, “Ha asaa sarotethaas woossofa.
JER 14:12 Enti xoomikoka, ta enta waasuwa si7ike. Xuussa yarshonne katha yarshuwa enti yarshikoka, ta ekike. Taani enta olan, koshaninne gadon dhaysana” yaagis.
JER 14:13 Taani zaarada, “Abeeti Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, nabeti ‘Hinte ola be7eketa woyko koshi gakenna. Goday ha biittan polo sarotethi immana’ yaagosona” yaagas.
JER 14:14 Goday zaaridi, “Nabeti ta sunthan wordo odoosona; ta enta kiittabike woyko entaw odabike. Enti hintew odey wordo qoncethi, pathonna kaayonne bantaw medhi kessida wordo haasayoosona.
JER 14:15 Hessa gisho, Godaa sunthan odiya nabeta ta kiittabike. Shin enti, ‘Oli woyko koshi ha biitta bochenna’ yaagosona. He nabeti bantaw olaninne koshan dhayana!
JER 14:16 Qassi tinbitey odetida asay koshanne ola gaason hayqana; enta ahay Yerusalaame ogiya bolla holetana. Enta woyko enta macheta, enta adde naytanne woyko enta macca nayta moogiya asi dhayana. Entaw bessiya waayiya enta bolla tigana” yaagis.
JER 14:17 Ta azzanuwaba ta asaas odana mela Goday tana kiittis. “Ta asay deshetidi, daro madunxida gisho, ta ayfey qammanne gallas qanxonna afuxana.
JER 14:18 Ta demba keyiko, mashshan hayqidaysata be7ayis. Katamaa geliko, koshan qohetidaysata be7ayis. Nabetinne kahineti banta oosuwa oothosona; shin ay oothiyako erokona” yaagas.
JER 14:19 Abeeti Godaw, ne Yihuda aggadii? Xiyoone asaa ixadii? Nu paxonnaada oothada ayis dechadii? Nu “Saro gidana” gidi naagida; shin aybika lo77obay bentibeenna. Nu “Paxana wodey yaana” gidi naagida; shin dagama xalaali gakis.
JER 14:20 Abeeti Godaw, nu iitatethaa erida; nu aawata balaa akeekida; nuuni nagara oothida.
JER 14:21 Ne sunthaa gisho gada nuna kadhopa; ne boncho araata kawushofa. Ne nuura caaqida caaquwa hassaya; ne caaquwa menthofa.
JER 14:22 Kawotethata eeqatape issoy ira bukisanaw danda7ii? Saloy ba shenen puusanaw danda7ii? Danda7enna! Abeeti Godaw, nu Xoossaw, hessa danda7ey nena! Haysa ubbaa oothey nena gidiya gisho nenan ufaysi oothoos.
JER 15:1 Hessafe guye, Goday taako haysada yaagis: “Hari attoshin Museynne Sameeli ta sinthan eqidi woossiyakoka ta wozanay ha asaako simmenna. Enta ta sinthafe digga; enti boo.
JER 15:2 Enti nena, ‘Nu awu baanee?’ gidi oychiko, Goday haysada yaagees gada entaw oda: ‘Hayqos pirdetidaysati hayqos; mashshas pirdetidaysati mashshas; koshas pirdetidaysati koshas; di7etanaw pirdetidaysati di7etanaw boo’ yaagis.
JER 15:3 “Taani oyddu qommo gadota enta bolla ehana yaagees Goday. Hessika, enta wodhanaw mashsha, enta aha goochanaw kanata, enta asho midi dhaysanaw salo kafotanne sa7a do7ata ehana.
JER 15:4 Hizqiyaasa na7ay, Yihuda kawoy Minaasey Yerusalaamen oothida iita oosuwa gisho, ta enta sa7aa kawotetha ubbaas dagama oothana.
JER 15:5 “Yerusalaame asaw, hintew oone qadhetanay? Hintew azzananay oonee? Hinte waanidetii? gidi hintena oychanay oonee?” yaagees Goday.
JER 15:6 “Hinte tana aggideta; hinte guye simmideta. Hessa gisho, taani hinte bolla ta kushiya denthada hintena dhaysas; hizape ta hintew qadhetike.
JER 15:7 Enti banta iita ogiyape simmonna ixida gisho enta katamata pengiyan pithe ekada harqas. Ta enta nayta wodha wursas; ta asaa dhaysas.
JER 15:8 Enta am7eta tayboy abba gaxan de7iya shafiyape daris. Taani seeta gallas na7atethata aayeta bolla dhayo ehana. Qoponna de7ishin, enta bolla dagamanne kokorsi ehana.
JER 15:9 Laapun nayti hayqida aayiya shempanaw xoonetada daaburasu. Iwu gallasi qammis; iya kawuyasunne yeellatasu. Paxa attidaysata enta morketa sinthan mashshan wursana” yaagees Goday.
JER 15:10 Ta aaye, tana ayis yeladii? Tana ayye! Ta biitta ubban de7iya asaara kacciyanne baaxetiya asi gidas. Ta oodeska tal7abike; oodefeka tal7ada ekabike; shin asa ubbay tana baaddees.
JER 15:11 Goday taako, “Tuma ta nena lo77o oosos ashshada ekana. Tuma ne morketi metuwa wodenne waaye wode nena woossana mela oothana.
JER 15:12 Asi birata, pudeha baggafe yaa birata woyko naase birata menthanaw danda7ii?
JER 15:13 Biitta ubban hinte oothida nagaraa gisho, hinte shaluwanne duretetha hinte morketas aathada immana.
JER 15:14 Hintena eronna biittan hinte morketi hintena aylle oothana. Ta hanqoy miya tama gididi merinaw eexana” yaagis.
JER 15:15 Abeeti Godaw, ne eraasa. Tana hassaya; tana maadda; tana yedetheyisata bolla ta haluwa keya. Ne danda7an tana wora yeggofa. Ta ne gisho cayeteysa qopa.
JER 15:16 Abeeti Godaw, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaw, ta ne sunthan xeegetida gisho, ne qaalay taako yin mas. Ma simmin tana pashkisis; ta wozanaa ufaysis.
JER 15:17 Qelqiseyisata cugan uttabike; entara ufaytabike. Neeni ne kushiya ta bolla wothida gishonne ta bolla yilotida gisho ta tarka dumma uttas.
JER 15:18 Ta hargey paxonnay, ta madunthay melonnay aybisee? Ne taw eqiya shaafada, meliya pultoda hanayee?
JER 15:19 Hessa gisho, Goday haysada yaagees: “Ne taako simmiko, ta zaarada nena ekana; ne taw oothana. Hada oda aggada, boncho qaala xalaala odetiko, ne ta doona gidana. Enti neeko simmana; shin ne entako simmaka.
JER 15:20 Ta nena ha asaas naase biratan gimbetida gimbe oothana. Enti neera oletana; shin nena xoonokona; ta nena ashshana.
JER 15:21 Iitata kushepe ta nena ashshana; qadhey bayna wozana mino asaape ta nena wozana” yaagees Goday.
JER 16:1 Godaa qaalay, haysada yaagishe taako yis:
JER 16:2 “Neeni macho ekofa; macca na7anne adde na7a ha bessan yelopa.
JER 16:3 Ha bessan yeletiya macca naytabaanne adde naytabaa, enta yeliya aayetanne aawataba Goday haysada yaagees.
JER 16:4 Enti iita hargen hayqana; entaw yeekiya woyko enta moogiya asi bentenna. Enta ahay biitta bolla pito mela yegetana; enti mashshaninne koshan wurana; enta ashoy salo kafotasinne sa7a do7atas kathi gidana” yaagis.
JER 16:5 “Yeeho keethi gelopa; yeekanaw woyko qadhetanaw boopa. Taani ha asaa bollafe ta sarotethaa, ta siiquwanne ta maarotethaa diggas.
JER 16:6 Gitinne guuthi ha biittan hayqana; enti moogetokona. Oonika entaw yeekenna; oonika bana gaarenna woyko huuphe meedetidi kayotenna.
JER 16:7 Yeekiya asaas shochu efidi, entara issife midi uyidi, kayuwa balethiya asi issoyka deenna. Hari attoshin, aayiya woyko aawi hayqida asaaka minthethiya asi baawa.”
JER 16:8 “Entara maanawunne uyanaw gibiri de7iya keethi gelopa.
JER 16:9 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees: ‘Taani ufaysinne ililsi, yaagano yethi ha bessaafe diggana. Hessa asay banta laythaninne banta ayfiyan be7ana.’ ”
JER 16:10 “Ne ha qaala ubbaa asaas odiya wode, enti, ‘Goday ayis haysa mela iitabaa nu bolla awaajidee? Nu ay balido? Godaa, nu Xoossaa bolla nu ay nagara oothido?’ ” yaagana.
JER 16:11 He wode ne entako; “Hinte aawati tana aggida gishosa, enti hara xoossata kaallida gishosa, entaw oothidanne goyinnida gishosa, tana aggidi ta higgiya naagonna ixida gishosa.
JER 16:12 Hinte, hinte aawatape aadhidi iita oothida gishosa. Hinte issoy issoy ero goonna hinte iita wozanaa kaallideta; taw kiitetonna ixideta.
JER 16:13 Hessa gisho, ta hintena ha biittafe denthada, hinte woyko hinte aawati eronna biitta holana. Yan hinte hara xoossata gallasinne qamma haggaazana; taani hintew qadhetike” yaagees Goday.
JER 16:14 Asay, “Isra7eele asaa Gibxe biittafe kessida Goday eriya mela” yaagidi caaqonna wodey yaana.
JER 16:15 Hessa aggidi, “ ‘Isra7eele asaa pudeha bagga biittafenne enta laallida biitta ubbaafe zaaridi ehida Goday eriya mela’ yaagidi caaqana. Taani enta kase enta aawatas immida biitta zaarada ehana” yaagees Goday.
JER 16:16 “Ta molo oykiya daro asaa kiittana; enti enta oykana. Hessafe guye, daro shankatiya asaa kiittana; derepe, zumapenne shucha qophope enta shankatidi kessana.
JER 16:17 Ta ayfey enta ogiya bolla de7ees; enti taape qosetibookona; enta nagaray ta sinthafe geemmibeenna.
JER 16:18 Ta enta iitatethaanne enta nagaraa gisho entaw nam7u kushe zaarana. Enti aha daaniya banta ixetida eeqatan ta biitta tunisidosona; shaatiya banta misiletan ta laata kunthidosona” yaagees Goday.
JER 16:19 Abeeti Godaw, ta wolqaw, ta miixaw, meto gallas ta baqatada attiya bessaw, kawotethati sa7aa gaxape neeko yidi, “Nu aawati pathonnanne maaddonna wordo xoossata xalaala laattidosona.
JER 16:20 Asay bantaw xoossata medhanaw danda7oona? Ee, enti medhiyakoka tuma xoossata gidokona!” yaagana.
JER 16:21 “Hessa gisho, ta enta tamaarsana; ta wolqaanne ta gitatetha enta erisana. He wode enti ta sunthay Godaa gideysa erana” yaagees Goday.
JER 17:1 “Yihuda nagaray birata biiren xaafetis; enta wozanaa bollanne yarsho bessan de7iya kaciya bolla almaaze geetetiya shucha xeeran xaafetis.
JER 17:2 Enta nayti irxa mitha garsan, zumata bollanne dereta bolla giigisida yarsho bessan Asheera geetetiya xoossees essida misiliya goyinnoosona.
JER 17:3 Hinte biitta bolla oothida nagaraa acuwa qanxisanaw hinte shaluwanne hinte miishiya hinte morketas immana.
JER 17:4 Hinte merinaw eexiya ta sheniya denthethida gisho, hintena laatisida biittafe shoddana; hinte eronna biittan hinte morketas aylle oothana” yaagees Goday.
JER 17:5 Goday haysada yaagees: “Asan ammanetey, asho ma7ida asan ceeqeteynne ba wozanaa Xoossafe haassey baadetidaysa gido.
JER 17:6 Hessa mela asi bazzon de7iya tushe mela; lo77obay yaa wode I be7enna. I bazzon, mela bessan, asi doonna maxine biittan daana.
JER 17:7 “Godan ammanetiya asi, iya ceeqoy Godaa gidida asi anjetidaysa.
JER 17:8 I haatha matan toketidi, ba xaphuwa goggiya haathan yeddida mitha mela. I awa suulas yayyenna. He mithaa haythay cil7oshin de7ees. Iri bukonna laythan hirgenna; ubba wode ayfe aggenna.
JER 17:9 “Asa wozani ubbaafe aadhidi cimmeesinne iita; iya gaatha qofaa ooni eranaw danda7ii?
JER 17:10 Taani Goday, asa ubbaas iya ogiyadanne iya oosuwada immanaw, asa wozanaa pilgayis; iya kahaa paacayis” yaagees Goday.
JER 17:11 Bessonna ogen shalo shiishiya asi babaa gidonna phuuphulle qoxiya kuraacho mela. Ba laytha bagga zawan aggidi baana; wursethan iya eeyatethay qoncana.
JER 17:12 Nu Xoossa keethay koyrope doomidi, boncho kawotetha araatada dhoqa deriya bolla de7ees.
JER 17:13 Abeeti Godaw, Isra7eele ufaysaw, nena aggida ubbay yeellatana. De7o pulto haatha, nena Godaa enti aggida gisho baanan xaafetida sunthada dhayana.
JER 17:14 Abeeti Godaw, ne ta galataa gidiya gisho, tana patha; ta paxana; tana ashsha; ta attana.
JER 17:15 Asay taako, “ ‘Goday taw odis’ yaagada ne odida qaalay awun de7ii? I ayis poletennee?” yaagosona.
JER 17:16 Taani henthancho gidada nena haggaazo aggabike; enti metootana gallasaa ta amottabike. Ta doonape keyida qaala ne eraasa.
JER 17:17 Tana daganthofa; meto gallas taani baqatada attiya bessay nena.
JER 17:18 Tana yedetheysati yeellato; shin tana yeellayopa. Enta dagantha; shin tana daganthofa. Enta bolla meto eha; enta nam7u kushe seera.
JER 17:19 Goday taako, “Koyro bada Yihuda kawoti katamaa geliyanne keyiya, asay geliya pengiyaninne hara Yerusalaame pengeta ubban eqa.
JER 17:20 Asaako haysada yaaga: ‘Hinteno Yihuda kawoto, hinteno Yihuda asaw, hinteno Yerusalaame asaw, ha pengetara geliya asaw, ubbay Godaa qaala si7ite.
JER 17:21 Sambaata gallas tooho tookidi Yerusalaame pengiyara gelonna mela naagetite.
JER 17:22 Sambaata gallas hinte keethaafe tooho tookidi kessofite, woyko aybi oosoka oothopite. Kase hinte aawata ta kiittidaysada Sambaata gallas bonchite.
JER 17:23 Gidoshin, enti si7ibookona; banta haythaa taako zaaribookona. Enti tana si7onnanne taape tamaaronna ixidosona.
JER 17:24 Shin hinte taw kiitetiko, Sambaata gallasan tooho tookidi, ha katamaa pengetara gelonna aggiko, Sambaata gallas aykoka oothonna dummayidi bonchiko,
JER 17:25 Dawita araatan uttiya kawoti banta moorinnatara paratanne para gaareta toggidi, ha pengetara gelana. Enti Yihuda asaaranne Yerusalaame kataman de7iya asaara gelana; ha katamay merinaw asi de7iya katama gidana.
JER 17:26 Asay xuussa yarsho, hara yarsho, katha yarsho, ixaanenne galata yarsho ekidi, Yihuda katamatape, Yerusalaame yuushuwan de7iya gutatape, Biniyaame biittafe, gadhape, derey dariya biittafenne, Negebape Godaa Xoossa keethaa yaana.
JER 17:27 Shin hinte Sambaata gallasa dummayidi bonchona aggidi, Sambaata gallasan tooho tookidi, Yerusalaame pengetara gelidi, ta higgiya menthiko, ta he pengetan tama oythana. Yerusalaame kawo keethata maana; he tamay to7enna’ ” yaagees Goday.
JER 18:1 Godaape Ermiyaasako yida qaalay haysa:
JER 18:2 “Dendada urqa medhiya addiya soo ba. Yan ta nena ta qaala sissana” yaagis.
JER 18:3 Taani duge urqa medhiya addiya soo bada, I ba gertuwa bolla urqa medhishin be7as.
JER 18:4 I medhishin, he miishey iya kushen iitis. I he urqa zaaridi munuqidi, bana lo77iya hara miishe kessidi medhis.
JER 18:5 He wode Godaa qaalay, haysada yaagishe taako yis:
JER 18:6 “Isra7eele asaw, urqa medhiya addey ootheysada ta hintena oothanaw danda7ikina? Isra7eele asaw, urqay bana medheysa kushen de7eysada, hinteka ta kushen de7eeta.
JER 18:7 Issi kawotethi woyko issi derey shodetana mela, laaletana melanne dhayana mela ta odida wode,
JER 18:8 he kawotethay ba iitatethaafe simmiko, ta enta bolla ehana gida iitabaa ehonna aggaagana.
JER 18:9 Qassi hara wode issi deriya woyko kawotethaa, ‘Ta hintena keexananne tokana’ gada odida wode,
JER 18:10 he kawotethay ta odeysa si7onna ixidi, ta sinthan iitabaa oothiko, ta oothana gida lo77oba oothonna aggaagana.
JER 18:11 “Hessa gisho, Yihuda asaasinne Yerusalaamen de7iya asaas haysada yaaga. Taani hintew dhayo giigisaysinne iitabaa halchayis. Hinte ubbay hinte iita ogiyape simmite; hinte ogiyanne hinte oosuwa laammite.
JER 18:12 Shin enti, ‘Haysi aykoka maaddenna! Nuuni nu qofaada hanana; nu issoy issoy nu iita wozanaa kaallana’ yaagana” yaagis.
JER 18:13 Hessa gisho, “Goday, ‘Haysa melaba si7i ereetii?’ yaagidi kawotethata oychite. Geela7o gidida Isra7eeley daro shaatiyaba oothasu.
JER 18:14 Libaanose zuma bolla de7iya shachay, zaalla bollafe dhayidi erii? He zumaape goggiya irxa haathi meli erii?
JER 18:15 Shin ta asay tana dogidosona; pathonna xoossatas ixaane cuyisidosona. Banta ogiyape, banta beni ogiyape, gaxa keyidi dhubetidosona.
JER 18:16 Enti banta biitta baysanne kadhetidaba kessidosona. Yaara aadhiya oonika malaaletidi ba huuphiya qaathees.
JER 18:17 Baani doloha bagga carkuwan laaleteysa mela, taani ta asaa morketa sinthan laallana. Enta metuwa gallas ta entaw zoko zaaranaape attishin, ta som7uwa enta bessike” yaagees Goday.
JER 18:18 Asay, “Kahineta matan higgey, cincata matan zorey, nabeta matan qaali dhayonna gisho ane Ermiyaasa bolla maqetoos. Nu inxarsan oykoos; I odiya qaala si7onna ixana” yaagidosona.
JER 18:19 Abeeti Godaw, tana si7a; ta morketi ta bolla giyaba hayza.
JER 18:20 Lo77o oothida asas zaaroy iiteyee? Shin enti taw olla bookosona. Ne hanqoy entafe simmana mela ta enta gisho gaannateysa be7a.
JER 18:21 Hessa gisho, enta nayta koshas aathada imma; enta mashshas aathada imma. Enta macheti na7i baynaysatanne am7o gido. Enta addeti wodhiya hargen gahetonna; enta na7atethati olan wuro.
JER 18:22 Enti tana oykanaw olla bookida gishonne ta tohuwas xihe wothida gisho, qoponna bonqeyisata enta bolla yedda; enta keethan waasoy keyo.
JER 18:23 Shin abeeti Godaw, enti tana wodhanaw maqeteysa ne eraasa. Ne enta iitatethaa atto goopa woyko enta nagaraa ne sinthafe quchofa. Enti ne sinthan xoonetidi kundo; ne shenetiya wode enta haysada ootha.
JER 19:1 Goday taako, “Bada oto medheysafe xugga shamma. Neera guutha biitta cimatanne guutha kahine cimata ekada,
JER 19:2 Kun7a Me7o Pengiya matara aadhada, Hinooma Zangaara ba; yan ta new odiya qaala awaaja.
JER 19:3 ‘Hinteno, Yihuda kawoto, hinteno Yerusalaame katama asaw, Godaa qaala si7ite!’ Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees: ‘Si7iya ubbaa haythas iitiya palaba ha biitta bolla ta ehana.’
JER 19:4 Ha asay tana aggidi, enti woyko enta aawati woyko Yihuda kawoti eronna hara xoossatas ixaane cuyisidi ha bessaa tunisidosona. Enti xillo asaa suuthaa ha bessan gussidosona.
JER 19:5 Ta enta kiittonaba woyko entaw odonnaba woyko ta qoponnaba oothidosona; banta adde nayta nagaras taman xuussa yarsho oothidi yarshanaw, dhoqa goyinno bessata gimbidosona.
JER 19:6 Hessa gisho, ha bessay Toofeta woyko Hinooma Zangaara geeteteysi attidi, Shuha Zangaara yaagetidi xeegetana gallasay yaana.
JER 19:7 Yihudanne Yerusalaame asaa halchuwa ta ha bessan laallana. Enti banta morketa mashshaninne bantana wodhanaw koyiya asaa kushen hayqanaada oothana. Enta aha salo kafotasinne sa7a do7atas kathi oothada immana.
JER 19:8 Taani ha katamaa baysanne miichas kessana. Yaara aadhiya ubbay iya dhayuwan malaaletidi, ‘Poora’ yaagana.
JER 19:9 Enti banta macca naytanne adde nayta ashuwa maanada oothana. Enta wodhanaw koyiya morketi enta teqidi waaysiya wode un7etidi enti issoy issuwa ashuwa maana” yaagis.
JER 19:10 “Hessafe guye, neera bida asaa sinthan xuggaa mentha.
JER 19:11 Entako haysada yaaga: xuggay meqidaysadanne zaaridi koolanaw danda7etonnaysada ta ha kawotethaanne ha katamaa mentherethana. Asi aha moogiya bessi bayna gisho Toofetan moogetana.
JER 19:12 Ha bessaaninne iyan de7iya asaa bolla haysa oothana. Ha katamaa Toofetada oothana.
JER 19:13 Yerusalaame asaa keethatinne Yihuda kawota keethati, keethaa bolla dembayidi oothida bessan salo xoolintotas ixaane cuyisidanne hara xoossatas ushsha yarsho gussida keethati ubbay Toofetada tuna gidana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
JER 19:14 “Hessafe guye, Ermiyaasi Goday tinbite odana mela kiitida Toofetape simmidi, Xoossa keetha giddon de7iya dabaaban eqidi asa ubbaako haysada yaagis:
JER 19:15 Enti morgiya gabbisidi, ta odiyaba si7onna ixida gisho ha katamaa bollanne iya heeran de7iya gutata bolla ehana gida iitabaa ubbaa ehana hanayis” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
JER 20:1 He wode Godaa keethaanne halaqa gidiya, Imera na7aa kahiniya Phaskori Ermiyaasi tinbite odishin si7is.
JER 20:2 Phaskori nabiya Ermiyaasa deshisidi, Qommo Biniyaame Pengiyan Xoossa keethaa geliya pengen gonge luhon qashisis.
JER 20:3 Wontetha gallas Phaskori Ermiyaasa qashope birshin, Ermiyaasi iyaw haysada yaagis: “Hachife doomin, Goday ne sunthaa Phaskori yaagenna; I ne sunthaa ‘Yan Han Dagama’ yaagana.
JER 20:4 Goday haysada yaagees: ‘Taani nena, newunne ne laggeta ubbaas dagama oothana. Enti neeni xeellishin, banta morketa mashshan wurana. Taani Yihuda asa ubbaa Babiloone kawa kushen aathada immana. I enta di7idi, Babiloone efidi, yan mashshan wodhana.
JER 20:5 Hessadaka, ha katama shaluwanne duretetha ubbaa, oyki yedhidaba ubbaa, haaridaba ubbaanne Yihuda kawota miishiya ubbaa taani enta morketas aathada immana; enti enta bonqidi Babiloone efana.
JER 20:6 Qassi neeni Phaskori, ne son de7iya asa ubbay di7etidi, Babiloone baana. Neeni wordo tinbite odida ne laggeta ubbaaraka yan hayqananne yan moogetana’ yaagees” yaagis.
JER 20:7 Abeeti Godaw, neeni tana cimmadasa; taanika cimetas. Neeni taape minnada, tana xoonadasa. Gallasa kumetha taani asa miichas attas; ubbay tana qelqisis.
JER 20:8 Taani haasaya wode ubban, “Makallabaynne dhayoy gakis” gada waassayis. Godaa qaalay taw gallas gallas borenne qelqisethi ehis.
JER 20:9 Taani, “Taani GODAABA denthada odike” woyko, “Iya sunthan nam7antho odike” giiko, Godaa qaalay ta meqethaa giddon qum7etidi, eexiya tama mela gididi, ta wozanan michees. Taani giddon oykada ashshona gada daaburas; shin teqanaw danda7abike.
JER 20:10 Taani daro kalkasha si7as; “Yan han dagami de7ees! Ane iya mootite! Nuunika iya mootoos” yaagosona. Taw mata laggeti ubbay ta kundethaa naagidi, “Ooni eri, nuuni iya oykana melanne nu haluwa keyana mela, I cimmanaw danda7ees” yaagosona.
JER 20:11 Shin Goday yashisiya toora qaradan taara de7ees. Hessa gisho, tana yedetheysati dhubetana; enti tana xoonokona. Entaw giigonna gisho, enti gita yeella yeellatana. Enta kawushay kumthi dogetenna.
JER 20:12 Abeeti Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaw, xillota paaceyso, wozananne kaha be7eyso, neeni ta morketa bolla ne haluwa keyada tana bessa. Ayis giiko, taani ta mootuwa new aathas.
JER 20:13 Godaas yexite! Godaa galatite! ayis giiko, I manqota iitata kushepe ashshees.
JER 20:14 Taani yeletida gallasay baadetidaysa gido! Ta aayiya tana yelida gallasay anjetofo!
JER 20:15 Ta aawas, “New mishiraacho; new adde na7i yeletis!” yaagi odidi, daro ufaysida urayka baadetidaba gido!
JER 20:16 He addey Goday qadhetonna aathidi yeggidi dhaysida katamatada hano. He addey wonta waasuwa, gallas seetan, “Olay gakis!” giya odaa si7o.
JER 20:17 Ayis giiko, ta aayiya taw duufo gidana melanne I uloyka tana merinaw oyki uttana mela, tana ulon wodhibeenna.
JER 20:18 Taani metonne azzano be7anawunne laytha ubbaa yeellatashe wursanaw, ayis ta aaye ulope keyadina?
JER 21:1 Kawoy Sedeqiyaasi Malkiya na7aa Phaskoranne Ma7iseya na7aa kahiniya Sofoniyaasa kiitida wode, Godaa qaalay Ermiyaasako haysada yaagidi yis:
JER 21:2 Enti, “Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori ba olanchotara ha katamaa teqida gisho nuus Godaa oycha. Ooni eri, Goday beniysada malaalsiya oosuwa nu gisho oothidi, iya guye zaaronna aggenna” yaagidosona.
JER 21:3 Ermiyaasi entaw zaaridi, “Bidi Sedeqiyaasako yaagite:
JER 21:4 ‘Neeni Babiloone kawuwaranne gimbiyafe karera ne katama teqida iya olanchotara oletiyanne ne kushen de7iya ola miishiya ta ne bolla zaarana; enta ubbaa ha katamaa giddo gelsana.
JER 21:5 Taani, ta huuphen seeras micetida kushen, wolqaama qesiyan, yilon, hanqoninne wolqaama gadon nena olana.
JER 21:6 Ta ha kataman de7iya asaanne mehiya shocana; enti iita gadon wurana.
JER 21:7 Hessafe guye, Yihuda kawa Sedeqiyaasa, iya moorinnata, gadope, mashshafenne koshape attida, ha katama asa ubbaa, Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxoorasinne enta wodhanaw koyiya morketas aathada immana. I enta qara mashshan goyrana. I entaw qadhetenna; saletidi aggenna; maarenna’ ” yaagees Goday Isra7eele Xoossay.
JER 21:8 Goday Ermiyaasako, “Gujada asaako haysada yaaga: ta hinte sinthan de7o ogiyanne hayqo ogiya wothas.
JER 21:9 Ha kataman gam7iya oonika mashshan woyko koshan woyko gadon hayqana. Shin katamaape keyidi katamaa teqidi oykida Babiloonetas ba kushiya immiya oonika paxa attana; he uray ba shempuwa ashshana.
JER 21:10 Taani ha katamaa bolla lo77oba gidonashin iitabaa oothanaw dendas. Ta iya Babiloone kawas aathada immana; I ha katamaa taman xuuggana” yaagees Goday.
JER 21:11 Yihuda kawa keetha asaas haysada yaaga: Godaa qaala si7ite!
JER 21:12 Hinteno, Dawita kochato, Goday hinteko haysada yaagees; “Wonta wonta suure pirdite; bonqetidaysata un7ethiya asaa kushepe ashshite. Hessa hinte oothonna ixiko, hinte iita oosuwa gaason ta hanqoy tamada eexana; oonika iya toysenna” yaagees Goday.
JER 21:13 Neno, Yerusalaame, denban de7iya zaallada, zangaarape dhoqu gada bentaasa; shin ta nena olana. Neeni, “Oonika ta bolla xaalenna woyko ta de7iya bessaa gelenna” yaagasa.
JER 21:14 Shin, “Taani Goday nena ne oosuwada seerana. Taani ne kawo keethan tama oythana; ne yuushuwan de7iya ubbaa midi dhaysana” yaagees Goday.
JER 22:1 Goday haysada yaagees; “Duge Yihuda kawa gadho bada, yan ha qaala oda.
JER 22:2 ‘Neno Yihuda kawaw, Dawita araatan uttidayso, neeni, ne moorinnatinne ha pengiyara geliya ne asay Godaa qaala si7ite!
JER 22:3 Suure pirdaa pirdite; xillo oothite. Bonqetidaysa un7ethiya asaa kushepe ashshite. Bete asaas, yi7otasinne am7etas gene oothopite woyko sugopite. Xillo asa suuthu ha bessan gussofite.
JER 22:4 Ha kiitata hinte naagiko, Dawita araatan uttiya kawoti paranne para gaare toggidi, banta moorinnataranne banta asaara ha kawo gadho pengiyara gelana.
JER 22:5 Shin hinte kiitetonna ixiko, ha kawo gadhoy baysa gidana yaagada ta Goday ta huuphen caaqas’ ” yaagees Goday.
JER 22:6 Goday Yihuda kawo gadhuwaba haysada yaagees: “Neeni taw Galada biittanne Libaanose zuma mela gidikoka, ta nena mela biittanne asi doonna katama oothana.
JER 22:7 Taani nena laaliya asaa ola miishe oythada kiittana; enti ne ziga tuuqeta qanxerethidi, taman yeggana.
JER 22:8 “Dumma dumma kawotethatape asay he katamaa matara aadhishe, ‘Goday ayis ha gita katamaa haysada oothidee?’ yaagidi issoy issuwa oychana.
JER 22:9 Enti zaaridi, ‘Godaa banta Xoossara caaqida caaquwa menthidi, hara xoossata goyinnida gishonne oothida gishosa’ ” yaagana.
JER 22:10 Hayqida kawa Iyosiyasas yeekofite woyko kayotofite. Hessa aggidi, di7etidi bida Saalomasseeletidi yeekite. I guye simmenna; ba yeletida biitta zaaridi be7enna.
JER 22:11 Ba aawa bessan Yihudan kawotidi de7ishe, ha bessaafe bida Iyosiyaasa na7a Saloomaba Goday haysada yaagees. “I guye simmenna.
JER 22:12 I di7etidi bida biittan hayqana; simmidi ha biitta be7enna” yaagees Goday.
JER 22:13 Ba keetha genen keexeysa, geella ogen pooqe bolla pooqe gujeysa, ba asaas aykoka immonnanne gate qanxonna oosiseysa ayye!
JER 22:14 He uray, “Taani taw gita pooqey de7iya dalga keethi keexana” yaagdi, ba keethas dalga maskooteta kessidi, ziga mithan alleeqisidi, zo7o qalame tiyees.
JER 22:15 Ne daro zigan keexidaysi nena lo77o kawo kessees gada qopay? Ne aawa Iyosyaasas miyabaynne uyaabay dhayidee? I suure pirda pirdis; xillo oothis. Hessa gisho, iyaw ubbabay injetis.
JER 22:16 I manqotasinne metootanchotas suure pirdiya gisho, ubbabay iyaw injetis. Godaa erees guussay haysa.
JER 22:17 Shin ne ayfeynne ne wozanay shempiday, cimon go77a demo, xillo suuthi guso, genenne un7etho bollana.
JER 22:18 Hessa gisho, Goday Iyosyaasa na7aa, Yihuda kawa Iyo7aqeemaba haysada yaagees: “I hayqiya wode enti iyaw, ‘Woo! Ta ishaw, woo! Ta ishaw’ yaagidi yeekokona. Qassi, ‘Woo! Ta godaw, woo! Ta kawaw’ yaagidi zeleelokona.
JER 22:19 Iya moogoyka hare moogo mela gidana. Iya ahay gooshetidi, Yerusalaame pengetape ya baggan yegetana” yaagees Goday.
JER 22:20 Goday Yerusalaameba haysada yaagees: “Olas neera zupeteysati ubbay xoonetida gisho, pude Libaanose bada, yan waassa. Baasane biittan waaso suulisa; Abariima zuman waassa.
JER 22:21 Ne saro de7iya wode ta new odas; shin ne tana si7onna ixadasa. Ne na7atethafe doomin ne hanoy haysa; ne taw kiitetonna ixadasa.
JER 22:22 Ne henthanchota ubbaa carkoy efana; olas neera zupeteysati di7etidi baana. He wode ne iitatetha ubbaa gisho yeellatananne kawuyana.
JER 22:23 Hinteno, Libaanose zigan keexetida keethan de7eysato, iqethi oykida maccasada un7i hinte bolla puttu giiko hinte waananee?” yaagees.
JER 22:24 Goday haysada yaagees: “Ta de7oy ero! Neeni Iyo7aqeema na7ay, Yihuda kawoy Yo7akini, ta ushacha kushen de7iya ta attamiya migiddo gidiyakoka ta nena kessa yeggana.
JER 22:25 Nena wodhanaw koyeysatas, ne yayiya Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxoorasinne iya olanchotas ta nena aathada immana.
JER 22:26 Ta nenanne ne aayiw hinte yeletonna hara biitta holana; hinte nam7ayka yan hayqana.
JER 22:27 Hinte simmanaw laamotiya biitta polo simmeketa” yaagees.
JER 22:28 Ha addey Yo7akini, kadhetidanne meqida xuggee? I, oonika koyonna miishee? Inne iya nayti ayis goodetidi, eronna biittan yegetidi attidonaa?
JER 22:29 Biitte, biitte, biitte, Godaa qaala si7a!
JER 22:30 “Iya kochaafe issuwasika injetonna gishonne Dawita araatan uttiya woyko Yihudan kawotiya asi issoyka bayna gisho, ha addiya, na7i bayna asi, ba laytha ubban de7oy injetonna asi” gada xaafa yaagees Goday.
JER 23:1 “Ta hentha bessan de7iya dorsata dhaysiyanne laaliya henthanchota ayye!” yaagees Goday.
JER 23:2 Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, ba asaa heemmiya henthanchota haysada yaagees: “Hinte ta dorsata laallida gisho, gooddida gisho, naagiboonna gishonne hinte oothida hinte iita oosuwa gisho ta hintena seerana.
JER 23:3 Ta wudiyape attidaysata ta kase laallida biitta ubbaafe ta huuphen shiishana. Enta guye enta hentha bessaa zaarana; enti yan yeletidi darana.
JER 23:4 Enta loythidi heemmiya henthanchota entaw shuumana. Enti zaaridi yayyokona; dagammokona; entafe issoyka dhayenna” yaagees Goday.
JER 23:5 “Dawita kochaafe xillo aaca denthana wodey yaana. I kawotethaa cincatethan aysana; biitta bolla suurenne xillo oothana.
JER 23:6 Iya kawotetha wodiyan Yihudi attana; Isra7eeley saro daana. Iya sunthay, ‘Xoossay nu Xillotethaa’ geetetana” yaagees Goday.
JER 23:7 Hessa gisho, “Asay, ‘Isra7eela asaa Gibxe biittafe kessida Goday eriya mela’ yaagidi caaqanaysa aggidi,
JER 23:8 ‘Isra7eela kochaa pudeha bagga biittafenne enta laallida biitta ubbaafe ehida Goday eriya mela’ yaagidi caaqana wodey yaana. Hessafe guye, enti banta buzo biittan daana” yaagees Goday.
JER 23:9 Nabetaba ta qopiya wode ta wozanay daaburees; ta meqethati kokoroosona. Godaa gishonne iya geeshsha qaala gisho woyney xoonin mathotida asi gidas.
JER 23:10 Biittay laymatethan kumis. Qangetha gisho, biittay yeekees; bazzo hentha bessati melidosona. Nabeti iita ogen hemetoosona; banta maata like gidonna ogen go7etoosona.
JER 23:11 “Nabetinne kahineti tunidosona; hari attoshin ta keethan enti oothiya iitaa ta be7as” yaagees Goday.
JER 23:12 “Hessa gisho, enta ogey hallixana; enti dhuman yegetana, dhubetidi kundana. Enti seeretiya wode enta bolla gado ehana” yaagees Goday.
JER 23:13 “Samaare nabeta giddon iitabaa be7as. Enti Ba7aale sunthan tinbite odoosona; ta asaa Isra7eele balethoosona.
JER 23:14 Qassi Yerusalaame nabeta giddonka haythas deexiyaba be7as. Enti laymatoosona; wordotidi de7oosona. Oonika ba iita oosuwape simmonna mela enti iitaa ootheyisata minthethoosona. Enti ubbay taw Soodoma mela; Yerusalaame asay Gamoora mela” yaagees Goday.
JER 23:15 Hessa gisho, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday nabetaba haysada yaagees: “Yerusalaame nabeta doonape tunabay keyidi, biitta ubban laaletida gisho, ta enta cammiya kathi muzana; enta wodhiya haathi ushshana” yaagees.
JER 23:16 “Nabeti odiyaba si7opite; enti hanonna ufaysan kunthoosona. Goday odonnashin enti bantafe medhi kessidi qoncethi odoosona.
JER 23:17 Tana kadheysatako, ‘Hinte saro daana’ yaagosona; qassi banta wozana iitatethaa kaalleysatako, ‘Hintena iitabay gakenna’ yaagosona” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
JER 23:18 “Shin be7anaw woyko iya qaala si7anaw Goday zoriya bessan entafe oone eqiday? Iya qaala si7iday oonee?
JER 23:19 Godaa gotey hanqon dendana; wolqaama hobbey iitata huuphiya shocana.
JER 23:20 Ba wozanaa qofaa polonna de7ishe, Godaa hanqoy simmenna. Wursetha wodiyan haysa hinte akeekana.
JER 23:21 Ta ha nabeta kiittabike; shin enti banta kiita ekidi woxoosona. Ta entaw odabike; shin enti tinbite odoosona.
JER 23:22 Enti ta zoriya bessan eqidabaa gidiyako, ta qaala, ta asaas odanashin. Enti iita ogiyapenne enta iita oosuwape zaaranashin” yaagees Goday.
JER 23:23 “Ta mata xalaala Xoossee? Haaho Xoossi gidikina?
JER 23:24 Ta be7onnaada, asi geema bessan bana qosanaw danda7ii? Saloninne sa7an kumiday tana gidikina?” yaagees Goday.
JER 23:25 “Ta sunthan wordo tinbite odeysati giyaba si7as. Enti, ‘Ta amuho be7as; ta amuho be7as’ yaagosona.
JER 23:26 Ha nabeti bantaw medhidi kessidi odiya wordo tinbitey enta wozanan awude gakanaw gam7anee?
JER 23:27 Enta aawati Ba7aale eeqa goyinnidi ta sunthaa dogidaysada, enti issoy issuwas odiya amuhuwan, ta asay ta sunthaa dogana mela oothanaw qopoosona.
JER 23:28 Amuho amuhiya nabey ba amuhuwa odo; shin ta qaala si7iya nabey ta qaala ammanetidi odo. Dalinne gistey awun gahetii?
JER 23:29 Ta qaalay tama mela gidennee? Zaalla mentherethiya naariqa mela gidennee?” yaagees Goday.
JER 23:30 “Hessa gisho, ta qaala issoy issuwafe kaysotidi taape ekida daanisidi tinbite odiya nabeta ta ixayis.
JER 23:31 Hessadaka, banta wozanaa qofaa odishe, ‘Goday yaagees’ giya nabetaka taani ixayis.
JER 23:32 Wordo amuhishe tinbite odiya nabeta bolla ta dendana. Enti banta amuhuwan katidi tinbite odiya nabeta taani ixayis. Ta enta kiittonnashin woyko shuumonnashin wordo tinbite odoosona; ta asaa balethoosona. Enti ha asaa aykoka maaddokona” yaagees Goday.
JER 23:33 “Goday taako, ‘Ha asay woyko nabey woyko kahiney, Godaa kiitay aybee?’ gidi oychiko, ne entako, ‘Goday, ta hintena holana’ yaagees” gada oda.
JER 23:34 “Nabey woyko kahiney woyko asay, ‘Haysi Godaa kiita’ yaagidi odiko, ta he addiyanne iya soo asaa seerana.
JER 23:35 Hessa aggidi issoy issoy, ‘Goday woygidee? woyko Goday ay odidee?’ yaagidi ba laggetanne ba dabbota oychanaw bessees.
JER 23:36 Hizape oonika, ‘Godaa kiita’ yaagidi zaaridi odetanaw bessenna. Hessa gisho, iya doonape keyiya qaalay iyaw kiita gidiya gisho, de7o Xoossaa, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa, nu Xoossaa qaala hinte mirqeeta.
JER 23:37 Neeni nabetako, ‘Goday hintena woygidee?’ woyko ‘Ay odidee?’ yaagada oychanaw bessees.
JER 23:38 Shin hinte, ‘Haysi Godaa kiita’ giiko, Goday haysada yaagees: taani hintena, ‘Haysi Godaa kiita goopite’ yaaginka hinte, ‘Haysi Godaa kiita’ gideta.
JER 23:39 Hessa gisho, ta hintena dogana; hintenanne hinte aawatas immida katamaa kumethi ta sinthafe diggana.
JER 23:40 Ta hinte bolla merinaa kawushanne dogetonna yeella ehana” yaagees Goday.
JER 24:1 Kawoy Nabukadanaxoori, Iyo7aqeema na7aa, Yihuda kawa Ikoniyaana, Yihuda halaqatara, kushe hiillataranne birata qoxeysatara Yerusalaamepe Babiloone di77idi efidaape guye, Goday tana qoncethi bessis. Goday tana, Xoossa keethas sintha baggara balasey de7iya nam7u keesheta bessis.
JER 24:2 Issi keeshiyan koyro teerida daaniya lo77o balasey de7ees; hanko keeshiyan qassi maanaw giigonna iita balasey de7ees.
JER 24:3 Goday taako, “Ermiyaasa, ne be7ey aybee?” yaagidi oychis. Taani, “Balase be7ayis; lo77o teeray daro lo77o; iita teeray qassi maanaw giigonna daro iita” yaagas.
JER 24:4 Hessafe guye, Godaa qaalay taako yis:
JER 24:5 Goday Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees: “Yihuda biittafe di7on Babiloone biitta yeddida asata, ha lo77o balase teerada lo77o gaana.
JER 24:6 Taani lo77o ayfen enta xeellana; qassi enta zaarada ha biitta ehana. Ta enta keexanape attishin, laallike; enta tokanape attishin, shoddike.
JER 24:7 Taani Godaa gididaysa enti erana mela entaw wozana immana. Enti banta kumetha wozanape taako simmanaw de7iya gisho, enti ta ase gidana; ta enta Xoosse gidana” yaagees.
JER 24:8 Gidoshin, “Yihuda kawa Sedeqiyaasa, iya moorinnata, ha biittan gidin Yerusalaamen attida asaanne Gibxe biittan de7eyisata maanaw giigonna daro iita balase teerada iita gaana.
JER 24:9 Taani enta gooddada yeddiya biitta ubban, ha sa7a kawotethati enta be7idi dagammana. Taani enta ixetidaysata, cayetidaysata, boretidaysata, leemiseteyisata, qelqiseteyisata, baadetidaysata oothana.
JER 24:10 Ta entawunne enta mayzatas immida biittafe enti polo dhayana gakanaw mashsha, koshanne bosha enta bolla yeddana” yaagees Goday.
JER 25:1 Iyosyaasa na7ay, Yihuda kawoy Iyo7aqeemi kawotida oyddantho laythan, Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori kawotida koyro laythan, Yihuda asaabay Ermiyaasako yida qaalay haysa.
JER 25:2 Nabey Ermiyaasi Yihuda ubbaasinne Yerusalaamen de7iya ubbaas haysada yaagis:
JER 25:3 Amoxe na7ay, Yihuda kawoy, Iyosyaasi kawotida tammanne heedzantho laythafe doomidi, hachi gakanaw, laatamanne heedzu laythi Godaa qaalay taako yis. Ta hintew zaara zaara odas; shin hinte si7onna ixideta.
JER 25:4 Goday ba aylleta, nabeta ubbaa zaari zaari hinteko kiittis; shin hinte si7onna ixideta.
JER 25:5 Enti, “Hinte ubbay hinte iita ogiyapenne hinte iita oosuwape simmite. Goday hintewunne hinte mayzatas merinaw immida biittan hinte daana.
JER 25:6 Hara xoossata goyinnanawunne entaw oothanaw kaallopite. Qassi hinte, hinte kushen oothida eeqatan Godaa hanquwa denthethofite. Hessi haniko Goday hintena qohenna” yaagidosona.
JER 25:7 “Hinte ta odidaysa si7onna ixidi, hinte kushey oothidaban tana yiloyideta. Hinte, hintena qohiyaba oothideta” yaagees Goday.
JER 25:8 “Hessa gisho, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees: hinte ta qaalas kiitetonna ixida gisho,
JER 25:9 pudeha bagga asa ubbaanne ta aylliya Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxoora xeegana. Enta ha biitta bolla, ha biittan de7iya asa bollanne heeran de7iya kawotethata ubbaa bolla ehana. Ta ha biitta kumethi dhaysana; qassi be7ida ubbay shaatiyabanne qelqisiyaba oothana” yaagees Goday.
JER 25:10 Enta giddofe ililsinne ufaysa qaala, yaagano girsi, woxa girsinne xompe poo7o dhaysana.
JER 25:11 Ha biittay kumethi laaletidanne baysa biitta gidana; kawotethati Babiloone kawas laapun tammu laythi haaretana.
JER 25:12 “Laapun tammu laythay poletidaape guye, taani Babiloone kawanne iya asaa enta nagara gisho seerana; enta biitta merinaw baysa oothana.
JER 25:13 Ta ha biitta bolla odida ubbaa, Ermiyaasi kawotethata ubba bolla odida tinbitiyanne ha maxaafan xaafetida ubbaa ha biitta bolla ehana.
JER 25:14 Daro kawotethatinne gita kawoti Babiloone asaa haarana. Ta entaw, enta hanuwadanne enta kushe oosuwada zaarana” yaagees Goday.
JER 25:15 “Ta hanquwan kumida woyne wanca ta kushepe eka. Efada ta nena kiittiya kawotethata ubbaa ushsha.
JER 25:16 Enti uyidi, taani enta giddo yeddiya mashshaa gaason gandigarananne gooyana” yaagees Goday Isra7eele Xoossay.
JER 25:17 Taani Godaa kushepe wanca ekada, I tana kiitida kawotethata ubbaa ushshas.
JER 25:18 Hachi hanidaysada enta ubbaa dhayonne dagama, cashshenne baadethi oothana mela Yerusalaamenne Yihuda katamata, iya kawotanne iya moorinnata ubbaa ushshas.
JER 25:19 Gibxe kawa, iya aylleta, iya moorinnata, iya biitta asa ubbaanne
JER 25:20 yan de7iya allaga asa ubbaa ushshas. Oxa kawota ubbaa ushshas. Filisxeemen de7iya Asqaloona, Gaaza, Eqroonanne Ashdoodape attida kawota ubbaa ushshas.
JER 25:21 Edoome, Moo7abenne Amoone ushshas.
JER 25:22 Xiroosa kawota ubbaa, Sidoona kawota ubbaanne Medetiraane Abbaafe hefinthan, haahon de7iya kawota ushshas.
JER 25:23 Dedaana, Temaana, Buzanne banta huuphiya gaxa meediya asa ubbaa ushshas.
JER 25:24 Arabe kawota ubbaanne mela biittan de7iya walaka asaa kawota ubbaa ushshas.
JER 25:25 Zimira, Elaamanne Meedona kawota ubbaa ushshas.
JER 25:26 Pudeha biitta kawota ubbaa, haahoninne matan de7iya kawota ubbaa kaallada kaallada sa7aa bolla de7iya kawotethata ubbaa ushshas. Entafe guye Babiloone kawoy uyana.
JER 25:27 Goday taako, “Hessa gisho, ‘Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay hinteko haysada yaagees’ yaaga. ‘Uyitenne mathotite; cooyitenne kundite. Taani hinte giddo yeddiya mashshaa gaason zaaridi dendofite’ yaagis.
JER 25:28 Shin enti ne kushepe wanca ekonnanne uyonna ixiko, entako haysada yaaga. ‘Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday hinteko haysada yaagees: hinte uyanaw bessees.
JER 25:29 Ta sunthan xeegetida katamaa bolla iitabaa oothanaw doomayis. Yaatin hinte seerettona attanaw danda7eetii? Ta sa7an de7iya ubbaa bolla mashsha xeegida gisho hinte seerettonna atteketa’ ” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
JER 25:30 “Hessa gisho, Ermiyaasa, ha qaala ubbay enta bolla poletanaysa entaw oda. Goday dhoqan guummana; Goday ba geeshsha bessaafe ba guntha sissana. I ba biitta bolla xaaggana; woyne gum7eysati waasseysada sa7an de7iya ubbaa bolla waassana.
JER 25:31 Godaas kawotethatara mootoy de7iya gisho iya waasoy sa7a gaxaa gakidi si7etees. Goday asa ubbaara pirdetana; I iitata mashshas aathidi immana” yaagees Goday.
JER 25:32 “Iitabay kawotethaafe kawotethaa laaletis; sa7aa gaxape gotey dendis” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
JER 25:33 He wode Goday wodhidaysata ahay, biitta bolla ha gaxape ya gaxa gakanaw laaletana. Entaw yeeketenna, enta ahay shiiqenna woyko moogetenna; enti biittan pito mela gidana.
JER 25:34 Hinteno, henthanchoto, yeekitenne waassite. Hinteno, wudiya kaaletheysato, bidon gondoretite. Hinte shuketiya wodey gakis; hinte kundananne lo77o urqa miishada meqeretana.
JER 25:35 Henthanchoti baqatidi attiya bessi baawa; wudiya kaaletheysati kessi ekiya bessi baawa.
JER 25:36 Goday enta hentha gadiya dhaysiya gisho, henthanchoti waassiya waasuwanne wudiya kaaletheysati yeekiya yeehuwa si7ite.
JER 25:37 Godaa suulliya sheniya gaason saro biittay baysatana.
JER 25:38 Gaammoy ba de7iya worape keyeysada Goday ba de7iya bessaafe keyana. Enta biittay un7etheyisata mashshaninne Godaa suulliya hanquwan baysa gidana.
JER 26:1 Iyosyaasa na7ay Yihuda kawoy Iyo7aqeemi kawotida wode Godaa qaalay yis.
JER 26:2 Goday, “Xoossa keetha dabaaban eqa. Xoossa keethan goyinnanaw Yihuda katamatape yaa ubbaas, ta nena kiitida qaalape issuwaka ashshona oda.
JER 26:3 Enti si7idi, banta iita ogiyape simmaneko ooni eri. Hessa gidiko, taani enta iitatetha gisho dhaysanaw qopidaysa aggaagana.”
JER 26:4 Entako haysada yaaga: “Hinte tana si7onna ixikonne ta hintew immida higgiya kiitetonna ixiko,
JER 26:5 hinte si7onna ixikoka ta zaara zaarada hinteko kiitida, ta aylleta nabeta qaala si7onnan ixiko,
JER 26:6 ta ha xoossa keethaa Seeloda oothana. Ha katamaa sa7an de7iya kawotethata ubbaas baadethi oothana” yaagis.
JER 26:7 Ermiyaasi Xoossa keethan ha qaala odishin, kahineti, nabetinne asa ubbay si7idosona.
JER 26:8 Ermiyaasi, Goday, oda gidi immida kiita odidi ongida wode kahineti, nabetinne asa ubbay iya oykidi, “Ne hayqanaw bessaasa” yaagidosona.
JER 26:9 Neeni, “ ‘Ha xoossa keethay Seeloda hanana; qassi ha katamay dhayana; baysa gidana’ yaagada, Godaa sunthan ayis tinbite odadii?” yaagidi, Xoossa keethan shiiqida asa ubbay Ermiyaasa teqidosona.
JER 26:10 Yihuda halaqati hessa si7ida wode, kawo gadhope keyidi, Xoossa keethi yidosona. Xoossa keethan Ooratha Penge geetetiya pengiyan uttidosona.
JER 26:11 Kahinetinne nabeti halaqatakonne asa ubbaako haysada yaagidosona: “Hinte, hinte haythan si7idaysada, ha addey ha katamaa bolla tinbite odida gisho, I hayqanaw bessees!” yaagidosona.
JER 26:12 Ermiyaasi halaqatakonne asa ubbaako haysada yaagis: “Ha hinte si7ida qaala ubbay ha xoossa keethaa bollanne ha katamaa bolla hanana gada ta odana mela Goday tana kiittis.
JER 26:13 Hiza hinte ogiyanne hinte oosuwa laammite; Godaa hinte Xoossaa qaalas kiitetite. Hessa hinte oothiko, Goday hinte bolla ehana gida iitabaa aggaagana.
JER 26:14 Tana gidiko, ta hinte kushen de7ayis. Hintew lo77onne suure daanidaba ta bolla oothite.
JER 26:15 Taani ha qaala ubbaa hintew odana mela Goday tuma tana kiitida gisho, hinte tana wodhiko, hinte hinte bolla, ha katama bollanne iyan de7iya asaa bolla xillo suutha aco ehanaysa erite” yaagis.
JER 26:16 Halaqatinne asa ubbay, kahinetinne nabeti, “I, Godaa, nu Xoossaa sunthan nuus odida gisho, ha addey hayqanaw bessenna” yaagidosona.
JER 26:17 Biitta cimatape issoti issoti dendi eqidi, shiiqida asaako haysada yaagidosona:
JER 26:18 “Hizqiyaasi Yihudan kawotida laythan Mooreseeta addey Mikiyaasi kase Yihuda asaas haysada yaagidi, tinbite odis: ‘Xiyooney shooqada goyetana. Yerusalaame katamay laaletidi, laaletha doore gidana. Xoossa keethay keexetida derey wora gidana’ yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday” yaagis.
JER 26:19 Yaatin, “Yihuda kawoy Hizqiyaasinne Yihuda asa ubbay iya wodhidona? Akay, Hizqiyaasi Godaas yayyidi, Godaa maarotethi oychibeennee? Godaay enta bolla ehana gida iitabaa aggibeenee? Shin nuuni nu bolla iitabaa ehana hanoos” yaagidosona.
JER 26:20 Qiriyat-Yi7aarima geetetiya bessan, Shamaya na7aa, Ooriyoona geetetiya issi addey de7ees. Ika Ermiyaasi odidaysada, ha katamaa bollanne ha biitta bolla Godaa sunthan kase tinbite odis.
JER 26:21 Kawoy Iyo7aqeemi, iya olanchoti, iya moorinnati, Ooriyooni odidaysa si7ida wode kawoy iya wodhanaw koyis. Ooriyooni hessa si7ida wode yayyidi, Gibxe baqatis.
JER 26:22 Gidoshin, kawoy Iyo7aqeemi Akboora na7aa Elnaatananne hara asata Gibxe kiittis.
JER 26:23 Enti Ooriyoona Gibxefe kessidi, kawa Iyo7aqeemeko efin, iya mashshan wodhisidi derey moogetiya duufon moogidosona.
JER 26:24 Shin Safaana na7ay, Akqaami Ermiyaasa maaddida gisho asay iya wodhanaw aathidi immibookona.
JER 27:1 Iyosyaasa na7ay Sedeqiyaasi, Yihudan kawoto doomida wode ha qaalay Godaape Ermiyaasako yis.
JER 27:2 “Dafo gonne wodorora de7iya qambara medhada ne gannan wotha.
JER 27:3 Yihuda kawa Sedeqiyaasako Yerusalaame kiitetida asaa baggara, Edoome, Moo7abe, Amoone, Xiroosanne Sidoona kiitta.
JER 27:4 Enti banta godatas odana mela enta kiitta. Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees:
JER 27:5 ‘Ta gita wolqaaninne ta micetida kushen sa7aa, sa7an de7iya asaa, mehenne do7ata medhas; taani iya, ta koyiya oodeska immayis.
JER 27:6 Ha77i ta biitta ubbaa ta aylliyas, Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxooras immas. Qassi ta bazzo do7atika iyaw haaretana mela oothas.
JER 27:7 Iya biittay haratas haaretiya wodey gakanaw kawotethati ubbay iyaw, iya na7aasinne iya na7aa na7aas haaretana. Hessafe guye, daro kawotethatinne gita kawoti iya haarana.’
JER 27:8 “Shin ay biitti woyko ay kawotethi Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxooras kiitetonna ixikonne iya qambaran gelonna ixiko, he kawotethay iya kushen dhayana gakanaw mashshan, koshaninne boshan seerana.
JER 27:9 Hessa gisho, ‘Babiloone kawas haareteketa’ giya hinte nabeta, hintew kaayeyisata, hinte amuho billeyisata, hinte marotanne moytille xeegeyisata si7opite.
JER 27:10 Enti hintew wordo odoosona; hintena hinte biittafe shoddana; hintena gooddada kessana; hinteka dhayana.
JER 27:11 Shin ay kawotethika Babiloone kawa qambaran gelidi, iyaw haaretiko, ta he kawotethaa iya biittan ashshana; enti he biitta goyana; yan daana” yaagees Goday.
JER 27:12 Taani, Yihuda kawa Sedeqiyaasaska ha qaala odas; “Babiloone kawa qambaran gelada iyawunne iya asaas haaretiko, ne de7on daana.
JER 27:13 Goday Babiloone kawas haaretonna ixiya kawotethas odidaysada mashshan, koshaninne boshan nenne ne asay ayis hayqeetii?
JER 27:14 Enti odey wordo gidiya gisho, ‘Hinte Babiloone kawas haareteketa’ yaagidi odiya nabeta si7opite.
JER 27:15 Ta enta kiittabike; shin enti ta sunthan wordo tinbite odoosona. Hessa gisho, ta hintena gooddada kessana; hintenne hinte nabeti dhayana” yaagees Goday.
JER 27:16 Hessafe guye, ta kahinetasinne asa ubbaas haysada yaagada odas: “Xoossa keetha miishey Babiloonepe matara simmidi yaana” yaagidi wordo odiya nabeta si7opite.
JER 27:17 Enti giyaba si7onna aggidi, Babiloone kawas haaretite; hinte de7on daana. Ha katamay ayis laaletida bessi gidanee?
JER 27:18 Enti tuma nabe gidikonne Godaa qaalay entan de7iko, Xoossa keethan, Yihuda kawo gadhoninne Yerusalaamen attida miishey Babiloone boonnada Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa Xoossaa woosso.
JER 27:19 “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, xoossa keetha karen eqida nam7u naase birata tuussatabaa, gita keretabaa, caana gaaretabaanne hara miishetaba haysada yaagees:
JER 27:20 Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori Iyo7aqeema na7aa, Yihuda kawa Ikoniyaananne Yihudaninne Yerusalaamen de7iya gita asa ubbaa di77idi efida wode,
JER 27:21 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, Xoossa keethan, Yihuda kawo gadhoninne Yerusalaamen attida miishetaba haysada yaagees;
JER 27:22 Enti Babiloone biitta gaazetana; ta enta gisho yaana wodey gakanaw, enti yan daana. He wode ta enta guye zaarada enta bessan wothana” yaagees Goday.
JER 28:1 He laythi, Yihuda kawoy Sedeqiyaasi kawoto doomida oyddantho laythan, ichashantho ageenan Gaba7oona addey, Azuura na7ay nabey Hanaani, Xoossa keethan kahinetanne asa ubbaa sinthan taako haysada yaagis:
JER 28:2 “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, ‘Babiloone kawa qambara menthana.
JER 28:3 Babiloone kawoy, Nabukadanaxoori, Babiloone efida Xoossa keethaa miishe ubbaa ta nam7u laytha giddon zaarada ha bessaa ehana.
JER 28:4 Iyo7aqeema na7aa, Yihuda kawa Yo7akina, Yihudape di7etidi Babiloone bida asa ubbaa zaarada ha bessaa ehana. Taani Babiloone kawa qambara menthana’ ” yaagees Goday.
JER 28:5 Xoossa keethaa giddon eqida kahinetanne asa ubbaa sinthan nabey Ermiyaasi, nabiya Hananako haysada yaagis.
JER 28:6 “Amin7i! Goday ne gidaysada ootho. Xoossa keetha miishetanne di7etidi bida asa ubbaa Babiloonepe zaaridi, ne odiya qaala Goday polo!
JER 28:7 Gidoshin, ta newunne ne asaas odeysa si7a.
JER 28:8 Neepenne taape kase de7ida nabeti, olaba, dhayobanne gadoba gita kawotethata bolla tinbite odidosona.
JER 28:9 Shin, Saroba odiya nabey, tuma Xoossi kiitida nabe gideysi eretey, I odiya tinbitey poletiya wodena” yaagis.
JER 28:10 Hessafe guye, nabey Hanaani, nabiya Ermiyaasa gannaafe qambara ekidi menthis.
JER 28:11 Hanaani asa ubbaa sinthan, “Taani nam7u laytha giddon Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxoora qambara kawotethata ubbaa gannaafe denthada haysada menthana” yaagees Goday. Hessafe guye, Ermiyaasi dendidi, ba ogiya bis.
JER 28:12 Nabey Hanaani, nabiya Ermiyaasa gannaafe menthida guutha wodepe guye, Godaa qaalay nabiya Ermiyaasako haysada yaagishe yis.
JER 28:13 Bada Hanaanas oda; “Neeni mitha qambara menthadasa; shin neeni iya gisho birata qambara medhana.
JER 28:14 Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxooras haaretana mela taani ha kawotethata ubbaa gannan birata qambara wothana; entika iyaw haaretana. Taani hari attoshin, bazzo do7atika iyaw haaretana mela oothana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay.
JER 28:15 Hessafe guye, nabey Ermiyaasi, nabiya Hananako haysada yaagis: “Hananiya, si7a! Goday nena kiittibeenna; shin neeni ha asay wordoban ammanetana mela oothadasa.
JER 28:16 Hessa gisho, Goday, ‘Ta nena sa7a bollafe diggana. Neeni ha asay ta bolla makallana mela oothida gisho ne ha laythi hayqana’ ” yaagis.
JER 28:17 He laythi laapuntha ageenan nabey Hanaani hayqis.
JER 29:1 Nabiya Ermiyaasi di7etida asaa giddon de7iya attida cimatas, kahinetas, nabetasinne Nabukadanaxoori Yerusalaamepe di77idi, Babiloone efida ubbaas Yerusalaamepe yeddida dabdaabey haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysa.
JER 29:2 Haysi haniday, kawoy Ikoniyaani, iya aayiya kawiya, iya moorinnati, Yihudanne Yerusalaame halaqati, kushe hiillanchotinne birata qoxeysati Yerusalaamepe di7etidi bidi simmina.
JER 29:3 Ermiyaasi Yihuda kawoy Sedeqiyaasi Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxoorako kiitetida Safaana na7aa El7aasanne Kalqqe na7aa Gamaara bolla he dabdaabiya yeddis. Dabdaabey haysada yaagees:
JER 29:4 “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, Yerusalaamepe Babiloone di7etida asa ubbaas haysada yaagees:
JER 29:5 Keethe keexidi yan de7ite. Kathi zeridi ayfiya miite.
JER 29:6 Macho ekidi macca na7anne adde na7a yelite. Hinte adde naytas macho oychidi immite; hinte macca nayta azinas immite. Enti macca adde yelo; yan taybon darite; guuxofite.
JER 29:7 Hinte di7etidi bida katamaas saroy daana mela koyite. He katamaas Godaa woossite. Iyaw saroy de7iko, hintewuka saroy daana.
JER 29:8 Hinte giddon de7iya hinte nabetinne maroti odiyaban cimetofite; enti amuhiya amuhuwa si7opite.
JER 29:9 Enti ta sunthan wordo tinbite odoosona; ta enta kiittabike” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay.
JER 29:10 “Hinte Babiloonen gam7iya laapun tammu laythay poletiya wode ta hinte gisho yada, hintena, hinte biitta zaarada ehana gada gelida qaala polana.
JER 29:11 Taani hintew qopiya qofaa erayis. He qofay, wursethay lo77onne ufaysi de7iya, hintena go77iya qofape attishin, qohiya qofa gidenna.
JER 29:12 Hessafe guye, hinte tana xeegana; taako yaananne tana woossana; taka hintena si7ana.
JER 29:13 Hinte tana koyana; hinte tana hinte kumetha wozanan koyida wode demmana.
JER 29:14 Ta hintew bentana; ta hintena di7etethaafe zaarana. Taani hintena laallida kawotethatapenne dumma dumma bessaafe shiishana. Ta hintena di7on denthida hinte biitta guye zaarada ehana” yaagees Goday.
JER 29:15 Hinte, “Goday nabe nuus Babiloonen denthis” yaagideta.
JER 29:16 Gidoshin, Dawita araatan uttiya kawabanne hinte mela di7etidi boonna attida asaabanne hinte dabbotabaa Goday haysada yaagees.
JER 29:17 “Ta enta bolla mashshe, koshanne gado yeddana. Ta entana meetetanaw danda7etonna iitida balase mitha ayfeda oothana.
JER 29:18 Taani enta mashshan, koshaninne gadon yedethada, enta sa7an de7iya kawotetha ubbaas dagama oothana. Qassi ta enta kessada yeddida biitta ubban baadethas, dagamas, boresinne cashshas oothana.
JER 29:19 Ta aylleta nabeta baggara zaarada zaarada kiitida ta qaala enti si7onna ixidosona. Hinte di7etidi bidaysatika si7onna ixideta.
JER 29:20 Hinteno, Yerusalaamepe Babiloone di7etidi bida asaw, hinte ubbay Godaa qaala si7ite” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
JER 29:21 Ta sunthan wordo tinbite odiya, Qolaya na7aa Akaababanne Maseya na7aa Sedeqiyasaba Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees. “Ta enta Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxooras aathada immana. Hinte xeellishin, I enta wodhana.
JER 29:22 Hessafe guye, Yihudape di7etidi, Babiloone bida asay issi asi baaddanaw koyiko, ‘Babiloone kawoy taman xuuggida Sedeqiyasadanne Akaabada Goday nena ootho’ yaagana.
JER 29:23 Enti Isra7eelen iita nagara oothidosona. Enti banta shoorota machetara laymatidosona; ta enta kiittonna wordo tinbite ta sunthan odidosona. Hessa erey tana; hessas taani marka” yaagees Goday.
JER 29:24 Nahelame addiya Shamayas haysada yaagada oda:
JER 29:25 “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees: ‘Neeni ne sunthan Yerusalaamen de7iya asaas, Ma7iseya na7aa kahiniya Sofoniyasasinne hara kahinetas dabdaabe yeddadasa.’ Ne Sofoniyasas haysada yaagadasa:
JER 29:26 ‘Xoossa keethan halaqa gidana mela Goday nena Yoodahe bessan kahine oothidi shuumis. Bana nabe gidi tinbite odiya gooya oonaka iya tohuwa duthan, iya qoodhiya santhalaatan neeni qachanaw bessees.
JER 29:27 Yaatin bana nabe giya Anatoota addiya Ermiyaasa ayis hessada oothabikii?
JER 29:28 Ermiyaasi, di7etetha laythay daro gidiya gisho Babiloonen keethe keexidi de7ite; kathi zeridi ayfiya miite’ ” yaagidi nuna kiittis.
JER 29:29 Kahiney Sofoniyaasi nabiya Ermiyaasas dabdaabiya nabbabis.
JER 29:30 Godaa qaalay Ermiyaasako haysada yaagidi yis;
JER 29:31 “Ha kiitaa di7on de7iya asa ubbaas kiitta; Nahelama addiya Samayeba Goday haysada yaagees; Taani kiittonna Shamayey wordo tinbite odidi hinte wordon ammantana mela oothis.
JER 29:32 Ta Nahelama addiya Shamayanne iya soo asaa seerana. I ta bolla makallaba odida gisho ha asaa giddon iyaw issi asika de7on attenna. Taani ta asaas oothana keehatetha I be7enna” yaagees Goday.
JER 30:1 Godaape Ermiyaasako yida qaalay haysa.
JER 30:2 “Ermiyaasa, ta new odida qaala ubbaa xaatha maxaafan xaafa.
JER 30:3 Taani ta asaa Isra7eelenne Yihuda di7ope guye zaariya wodey matatis. Enta mayzatas immida biitta enta zaarana; enti iya laattana” yaagees Goday Isra7eele Xoossay.
JER 30:4 Goday Isra7eelebanne Yihudaba odida qaalay haysa.
JER 30:5 “Ta yashshanne dagama waaso si7as; dagama waasope attishin, saro waaso gidenna.
JER 30:6 Ane oychite; be7ite; addey na7a yelanaw danda7ii? Yaatin, adde ubbay iqethi oykida maccasada, ba kushen ba uluwa oykidashin ta be7eysi aybee? Asa ubbaa som7oy ayis kareexidee?
JER 30:7 He gallasay ay mela un7ethiya gallasee? Hessa mela gallas baawa. He gallasay Yayqooba zerethaas un7a wode gidana. Gidoshin enti he ubbaafe attana” yaagees Goday.
JER 30:8 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees: “He gallasan ta enta gannaafe qambara menthana; enti qashetida santhalaata duuthana. Hessafe guye, allaga biitta asay enta aylleyena.
JER 30:9 Shin enti Godaas, banta Xoossaas, oothana; ta entaw denthiya kawa Dawitas haaretana.
JER 30:10 “Hessa gisho, ta aylleto, Yayqooba kochato, yayyofite. Hinteno, Isra7eeleto, dagammopite. Hinte haaho bessan de7ishin, ta hintena ashshana; hinte kochata enti di7etida biittafe zaarana. Yayqooba zareti simmidi, saro daana; enta oonika yashisenna.
JER 30:11 Ta hintena ashshanaw hintera de7ayis. Hintena laallida kawotethata ubbaa dhaysana; shin hintena dhaysike. Ta hintena xillo pirdan seerana; shin seeronna hintena coo yeddike” yaagees Goday.
JER 30:12 “Hinte meqoy kooletenna; hinte madunthay paxenna.
JER 30:13 Hintew mootetey baawa; hinte madunthaas dhaley deenna; hintew paxoy baawa.
JER 30:14 Hinte doseysati hintena dogidosona; enti hintebaa wuda gookona. Hinte balaynne hinte nagaray daro gidiya gisho, ta hintena morkeda shocas; qadhey bayna seeras.
JER 30:15 Paxoy bentonna hinte hargiyasinne hinte madunthaas ayis waassetii? Hinte balaynne hinte nagaray darida gisho ta haysa hinte bolla oothas.
JER 30:16 “Shin hintena gaashidi mida ubbay meetetana; hinte morketi ubbay di7etana. Hintena bonqidaysati bonqetana; hintebaa ekidaysati eketana.
JER 30:17 Enti, ‘Oonika koyonnanne boretida Xiyoone’ gidoosona; shin ta hintew keehana; hinte madunthaa pathana” yaagees Goday.
JER 30:18 “Yayqooba kochata di7etida bessaafe guye zaarada, keexana; enti de7iya bessaasika qadhetana. Yerusalaame katamay kase ba laaletida bessan, kawo gadhoy kase ba bessan simmidi keexetana.
JER 30:19 Yan de7iya asa ubbay galata mazmurenne ufaysa yethi yexana. Ta enta taybuwa darisanape attishin, guuxenna. Taani enta bonchetida dere oothana; enti kawuyokona.
JER 30:20 Enta nayti beni duussaada daana; enta maabaray ta sinthan minnidi daana. Enta un7ethiya ubbaa ta seerana.
JER 30:21 Enta kaalethanay enta giddofe keyana; enta haaranay enta giddofe dendana. Taani iya taw mata ehana; I taako shiiqana. Taani iya shiishonna de7ishin, minnidi taako shiiqanaw danda7ey oonee?” yaagees Goday.
JER 30:22 Hessa gisho, hinte ta ase gidana; taka hinte Xoosse gidana.
JER 30:23 Heko, Godaa hanqoy goteda dendees; shireti shireti wodhishe iitata huuphen wodhana.
JER 30:24 Goday ba wozanaa qofaa wursidi polana gakanaw eexiya iya hanqoy guye simmenna. Hessa sinthafe yaana wodetan hinte akeekana.
JER 31:1 “He wode taani Isra7eele zeretha ubbaas Xoosse gidana; entika ta ase gidana” yaagees Goday.
JER 31:2 “Mashshafe attida asay mela biittan ta sinthan saba demmana. Taani Isra7eele asaas shempo immanaw yaana.
JER 31:3 Taani entaw haaho bessafe qoncas; taani hintena merina siiquwan dosas; ta qadhiyan hintena taako shiishas.
JER 31:4 Geela7o Isra7eele, ta hintena zaarada keexana; hinteka keexetana. Neeni karaabuwa zaara oykada, ufayteysatara neeni yexananne durana.
JER 31:5 Samaare zumaa bolla woyne tokana; tokidaysati iya ayfiyan ufaytana.
JER 31:6 Efreema gezze biittan naageysati, ‘Haa yiite; Godaako, nu Xoossaako, pude Xiyoone boos’ yaagidi xeegiya wodey yaana” yaagees Goday.
JER 31:7 “Yayqooba asaas ufaysan yexite; kawotethata ubbaafe aadhiya Isra7eeles ililite. ‘Isra7eele asaape attidaysata ashsha’ yaagidi galata mazmure yexite.
JER 31:8 Taani enta pudeha bagga biittafe ehana; sa7aa gaxape ta enta shiishana. Qooqeti, wobbeti, wodetha maccasatinne iqethi oykida maccasati entara issife yaana; daro asay banta biitta simmana.
JER 31:9 Ta enta zaarada ehiya wode enti ufaysafe dendoysan yeekishenne woossishe yaana. Taani enta shaafa lanqiyara, enti dhubetonna giigida ogiyara kaalethana. Taani Isra7eeles aawa; Efreemi taw bayra na7a.
JER 31:10 “Hinteno, kawotethato, Godaa qaala si7idi, haaho bessan, yuushoy abban teqetida biittatan, ‘Isra7eele laallidaysi I enta shiishana; henthanchoy ba wudiya heemmeysada I enta heemmana’ yaagidi awaajite.
JER 31:11 Goday Yayqooba kochata wozana; I enta, entafe minneyisata kushepe ashshis.
JER 31:12 Enti yidi Xiyoone zuma bolla ufaysan yexana; enti, Goday immiya keehatethan, kathan, woynen, zayten, dorsaninne mehen ufaytana. Enti haathe loythidi ushshida atakilte bessa mela gidana; enti zaaridi azzanokona.
JER 31:13 He wode geela7oti ufaysan durana; panthatinne cimati ufaytana. Ta enta yeehuwa ufaysan laammana; ta enta minthethana; enta azzanuwa gisho enta ufaysana.
JER 31:14 Taani kahinetas daro kathi immana; ta asay ta keehatetha kaallana” yaagees Goday.
