JER 31:15 “Yeehoynne zelelsi Rama kataman si7etis; Raheela ba naytas yeekasu; enti bayna gisho yeeho minthetho ixasu” yaagees Goday.
JER 31:16 “Yeehuwa aggidi, hinte afuthaa quchite. Hinte oothida oosuwas woyto hinte ekana; morke biittafe hinte nayti simmana.
JER 31:17 Hinte nayti banta biitta simmanaw de7iya gisho, hintew ufaysi de7ees” yaagees Goday.
JER 31:18 “Efreema kochata zuuzuntha ta si7as. Enti, ‘Neeni nuna wadhetiboonna wofaanoda wadhadasa; nuka keedida. Neeni Godaa, nu Xoossaa gidiya gisho nuna zaara; nuuni neeko simmana.
JER 31:19 Nu kase neepe haakidi bida; shin ha77i nu nagara paaxida. Ne nuna seerin, yeellatidi nu tiraa baqida. Nuuni nu na7atetha laytha nagaraa gisho, kawuyidanne yeellatida’ yaagidosona.
JER 31:20 “Efreemi taw tuma al7onne ta dosiya na7a gidennee? Taani iya sunthaa denthiya wode ubban iya hassayayis. Hessa gisho, ta wozanay iya laamotees; ta iyaw daro qadhetayis” yaagees Goday.
JER 31:21 “Hinte ogiyan malaata wothite; malaata mithi essite; hinte bida ogiya akeekite. Geela7o Isra7eele, simma; ne katamata gela.
JER 31:22 Hinteno, ammanoy bayna Isra7eeleto, awude gakanaw toylatetii? Goday sa7a bolla oorathaba oothana; hessika maccasi adde yuushon eqana” yaagees Goday.
JER 31:23 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, haysada yaagees: “Taani Isra7eele asaa di7etethaafe zaarada ehiya wode Yihuda biittaninne iya katamatan enti, ‘Neno xillotethi aqiya bessaw, geeshsha deriyaw, Goday nena anjo’ yaagidi zaaridi odetana.
JER 31:24 Yihudaninne Yihudan de7iya katamatan asay daana; goshshanchotinne henthanchoti banta wudiyara yan daana.
JER 31:25 Taani daaburanchota gashtisana; qassi koshatidi gilqidaysata kalsana” yaagees Goday.
JER 31:26 He wode barkada ta yuushuwa xeellas; ta dhiskoy taw mal7o dhisko gidis.
JER 31:27 “Taani Isra7eeleninne Yihudan asenne mehe kunthiya wodey yaana.
JER 31:28 Enta shoddanaw, laallanaw, shira yegganaw, dhaysanawunne gado ehanaw dendidaysada enta zaarada gimbanawunne tokanaw dendana” yaagees Goday.
JER 31:29 “He wode asay, ‘Aawati qaw7e woyne ayfe min, nayta achay doccis’ yaagidi haasaya leemisoy attana.
JER 31:30 Shin issoy issoy ba nagaran hayqana; qaw7e woyne ayfe miya oodeska iya achay doccana” yaagees Goday.
JER 31:31 “Taani Isra7eeleranne Yihudara ooratha caaqo caaqana wodey yaana.
JER 31:32 He caaqoy ta enta Gibxefe kessanaw enta kushiya oykida wode enta mayzatara caaqida caaquwa mela gidenna. Ta entaw azina mela gida uttinka enti ta caaquwa menthidosona” yaagees Goday.
JER 31:33 “Shin taani he wodiyape guye Isra7eelera caaqana caaqoy haysa: taani ta higgiya enta guuggiyan wothana; enta wozanan xaafana. Taani enta Xoosse gidana; entika ta ase gidana.
JER 31:34 Hizape guye, asi ba laggiya woyko ba ishaa, ‘Godaa era’ yaagidi tamaarsenna. Guuthafe gita gakanaw ubbay tana erana. Taani enta naaquwa atto gaana; enta nagaraa zaarada qopike” yaagees Goday.
JER 31:35 Gallas poo7ana mela awa wothiday, qamma poo7ana mela ageenanne xoolinto kiittiday, abba qaathidi, beetay guummanaada oothey, iya sunthay Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa geeteteysi haysada yaagees.
JER 31:36 “Ha eqidi de7iya medhetetha higgey ta sinthafe shaaretiko, he wode Isra7eele kochay ta dere gideysi merinaw attana” yaagees Goday.
JER 31:37 “Bolla salota wadhanaw woyko garsa sa7aa baasoy eretanaw danda7iko, he wode ta Isra7eele zeretha ubbaa, enti oothida nagaraa gisho ta sinthafe diggana” yaagees Goday.
JER 31:38 “Hanaani7eela shako Gimbiyafe doomidi, Maazane Pengiya gakanaw Yerusalaame katamay ta katama gididi, keexetiya wodey yaana.
JER 31:39 He katamaa zaway wuloha baggafe bidi Gaareba zumanne Go7a yuushuwa gakanaw dalgana.
JER 31:40 Aha moogiyanne bido yeggiya zangaaraynne Qediroona Zangaarape qommora doloha baggara bidi, Para Penge maazaniya gakanaw de7iya biitta ubbay Godaas dummatidi, geeshshi gidana. Hizape guye, katamay merinaw shodetenna; laaletenna” yaagees Goday.
JER 32:1 Yihuda kawoy Sedeqiyaasi kawotida tammantho laythan, Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori kawotida tammanne hospuntho laythan Godaape ha qaalay Ermiyaasako yis.
JER 32:2 He wode Babiloone kawa olanchoti Yerusalaame teqidosona; nabey Ermiyaasi Yihuda kawo gadhon de7iya, naageysata dabaaban iya bolla gordetin de7ees.
JER 32:3 Yihuda kawoy Sedeqiyaasi iya haysada yaagidi qachidi wothis: “Ne ayis haysada yaagada tinbite oday? ‘Goday ha katamaa Babiloone kawa kushen aathidi immana; I iya oykana’ yaagada ayis oday.
JER 32:4 Yihuda kawoy Sedeqiyaasi Babiloone aadhidi imetana; I Babiloone kawa kushen gelana. Iya sinthan eqidi, iyara odetana; I ba ayfen iya be7ana.
JER 32:5 Nabukadanaxoori Sedeqiyaasa Babiloone efana; ta iyabaa be7ana gakanaw I yan daana. Neeni Babiloonetara oletanaw qopiko, hessi new hanenna” yaagees Goday.
JER 32:6 Ermiyaasi, “Godaa qaalay he wode taako haysada yaagidi yis” yaagis.
JER 32:7 “Ne aawa isha Saluma na7ay, Hanami7eeli neeko yidi, ‘Wozanaw maati de7iya mata dabboy nena gidiya gisho Anatoota kataman de7iya ta gadiya shamma’ yaagana.
JER 32:8 Goday gidaysada, ta aawa ishaa na7ay Hanami7eeli taako naageysata dabaaba yidi, ‘Wozanaw maati de7iya mata dabboy nena gidiya gisho, Biniyaame biittan Anatootan de7iya ta gadiya shamma’ yaagin, taani hessa odiday Godaa gideysa eras.
JER 32:9 “Anatoota kataman de7iya gadiya ta aawa ishaa na7aa Hanami7eelape shammas. Iya gatiya mizaanen likin, tammanne laapun bira santime gidis.
JER 32:10 Shama pirimaa markati de7iya bessan paramas; gordas; maatame iya bolla wothas; miishiya mizaanen likada iyaw immas.
JER 32:11 Hessafe guye, taani zal7iya hanota qoncisiya ashshagetidi attametida shama pirimaanne attametiboona shama pirimaa ekas.
JER 32:12 Ta aawa ishaa na7ay Hanami7eeli, shama pirimaa paramida markatinne naageysata dabaaban uttida Ayhudeti ubbay be7ishin, he shama pirimaa Mahiseya na7aa, Neera na7aa Baarokas immas.
JER 32:13 Enta sinthan ta Baaroka haysada yaagada kiittas:
JER 32:14 ‘Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, haysada yaagees: Daro wode gam7ana mela ha ashshagetidi attametida pirimaanne attametiboona pirimaa efada oton wotha.’
JER 32:15 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, haysada yaagees: ha biittan asay zaaridi keethe, gadenne woyne tokiya bessi shammana” yaagees Goday.
JER 32:16 Taani Neera na7aa Baarokas shama pirimaa warqatiya immidaape guye, haysada yaagada woossas.
JER 32:17 “Abeeti Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, ne salotanne sa7aa ne gita wolqaaninne ne micetida kushen medhadasa. New danda7etonnabay baawa.
JER 32:18 Neeni ne siiquwa mukulu asaas bessaasa; shin aawata nagaraa enta nayta bolla zaarasa. Abeeti gitanne wolqaama Xoossaw, ne sunthay Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa geetetees.
JER 32:19 Ne halchoy gita; ne oothiya oosoy wolqaama. Asa oge ubbaa ne be7aasa; asa ubbaas iya ogiyadanne iya oosuwada zaarasa.
JER 32:20 “Ne Gibxen malaatanne mallata oothadasa; hachi gakanaw ha mallata Isra7eele asaa giddoninne hara kawotethata ubbaa giddon ooso aggabaaka. Hessafe dendoysan ne sunthay ubba bessan eretis.
JER 32:21 Neeni ne asaa Isra7eele Gibxefe malaataninne mallatan, ne mino qesiyan, ne micetida kushiyaninne gita dagaman kessadasa.
JER 32:22 Enta mayzatas ne immanaw caaqida biitta, maathinne eessi goggiya biitta entaw immadasa.
JER 32:23 Enti he biitta gelidi laattidosona. Shin enti new kiitetibookona; ne higgiya naagibookona; enti oothana mela ne kiitida ubbaa oothibookona. Hessa gisho, ne enta bolla ha gaduwa ubbaa ehadasa.
JER 32:24 “Babiloone asay katamaa oykanaw gimbiya yuushuwan biitta dooridi teqidosona. Olape, koshapenne boshape dendoysan katamay enta oliya Babiloone kushen aadhidi imetis. Ne ha77i be7eysada ne gidaba ubbay poletis.
JER 32:25 Abeeti Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, katamay Babiloone asaas imetanaw haniya wodeka ne tana, ‘Marka xeegada, miishen gadiya shamma’ gadasa” yaagada woossas.
JER 32:26 Hessafe guye, Godaa qaalay Ermiyaasako haysada yaagidi yis:
JER 32:27 “Taani Godaa, asa ubbaa Xoossaa. Taw danda7etonnabay de7ii?” yaagis.
JER 32:28 Taani ha katamaa Babiloone asaasinne Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxooras aathada immana; enti iya oykana.
JER 32:29 Ha katama teqida Babiloone asay yidi, katamaa taman xuuggana; pooqiya bolla Ba7aale eeqas ixaane cuyisishenne hara xoossatas ushsha yarsho gussishe tana hanqethida asay de7iya keethatika xuugetana.
JER 32:30 “Isra7eeleynne Yihudi banta na7atethafe doomidi, ta sinthan iitabaape attishin, lo77oba, oothibookona; enti banta kushen oothida oosuwan tana hanqethidosona.
JER 32:31 Ha katamay keexetida wodepe hachi gakanaw, ha katamaa asay tana daro hanqethida gisho ha katamaa ta sinthafe dhaysana.
JER 32:32 Isra7eeleynne Yihudi, enta kawotinne halaqati, enta kahinetine nabeti oothida iita ooso ubban tana yiloyidosona.
JER 32:33 Enti banta som7uwa gidonashin, banta zokuwa taw zaaridosona. Ta enta zaara zaarada tamaarsinka, enti si7ibookona woyko seera ekibookona.
JER 32:34 Enti ixetida banta eeqata ta sunthay xeegetida keethan essidi tunisidosona.
JER 32:35 Enti banta adde naytanne macca nayta Moloka eeqas yarshanaw Hinooma Zangaaran Ba7aale eeqas yarsho dhoqa bessata giigisidosona. Enti hessa oothana mela ta kiittabike; Yihuda asay nagara oothana mela hessa enti oothana gada ta naagabike” yaagis.
JER 32:36 “Neeni, ‘Ha katamay olan, koshaninne boshan Babiloone kawa kushen aadhidi imetana’ yaagida ha katamaaba Goday Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees.
JER 32:37 Ta suulliya hanquwaninne gita sheniyan enta laallida biitta ubbaafe shiishada ha bessaa zaara ehada, enti sarotethan daana mela oothana.
JER 32:38 Enti ta ase gidana; ta enta Xoosse gidana.
JER 32:39 Enti taw merinaw yayyana mela, ta entaw issi wozananne issi oge immana; hessi entawunne entafe guye enta naytas lo77o gidana.
JER 32:40 Taani entara merinaw caaqana; he caaquwan ta entaw lo77oba ooso aggike. Enti tana aggidi guye simmonna mela enti taw yayyana mela oothana.
JER 32:41 Ta entaw lo77oba ootheysi tana ufaysees; ta kumetha wozanapenne ta kumetha shempuwafe tuma ha biittan enta tokana” yaagees Goday.
JER 32:42 “Ta ha asaa bolla iita bosha ubbaa ehidaysada ta entaw immana gida lo77oba ubbaa immana.
JER 32:43 Hinte, ‘Ha biittay asaynne mehey bayna baysa biitta gidana; I Babiloonetas imetis’ yaagida biittan asay zaaridi gade shammana.
JER 32:44 Ta enta zaarada ehiya gisho, asay gade shammana; marka sinthan zal7iya hanota qoncisiya pirima paramidi, maatame wothana. Haysi ubbay Biniyaame biittan, Yerusalaame yuushuwan de7iya heeratan, Yihuda katamatan, derey dariya katamatan, gadha katamataninne Negebe mela biittan de7iya katamata ubban hanana” yaagees Goday.
JER 33:1 Ermiyaasi buroo naageysata dabaaban qashetidi de7ishin, Godaa qaalay zaaridi iyako yis.
JER 33:2 Sa7aa medhida Goday, giigisidi iya bessan wothida Goday, iya sunthay Godaa geeteteysi haysada yaagees:
JER 33:3 “Tana xeega; ta new koyana; ne eronna gitabaanne wolqaamaba ta new qoncisana.”
JER 33:4 Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, Babiloone olaa, biitta doorethaanne, di7etetha teqana mela dirsa gimbiya minthanaw laallida ha katama keethatabaanne Yihuda kawota gadhotaba haysada yaagees.
JER 33:5 Enta iitatetha gaason, ta ha katamaa bollafe ta som7uwa denthida gisho, hintera oletanaw taani ta hanquwan shocana asaa ahan ha bessan kunthanaw Babilooneti gelana.
JER 33:6 Gidoshin, “ta ha katamaanne iyan de7iya asaa zaarada pathana; enta payyatetha zaarana; saronne wopa duussu entaw immana.
JER 33:7 Taani Yihuda asaanne Isra7eele asaa di7ope zaarana; enti kase de7idaysada oothada enta gimbana.
JER 33:8 Enti tana oothida nagara ubbaafe ta enta geeshshana; enti naaquwanne enta makalla ubbaa atto gaana.
JER 33:9 Yerusalaame katamay taw ufaysi, bonchonne galata sa7an de7iya kawotethata ubbaa sinthan ehana. Taani Yerusalaame asaas oothiya lo77obaanne katamaas ehiya duretethaanne sarotethaa si7idi, kawotethati ubbay yashshan kokorana” yaagees Goday.
JER 33:10 “Hinte, ‘Asinne mehey bayna baysa’ gida ha bessan, asinne mehey bayna Yihuda katamataninne Yerusalaame ogetan ufaysinne ililsa girsi si7etana.
JER 33:11 Yethinne Yaagano girsi, ufaysa girsi, hessadaka, xoossa keethi galata yarsho ehidi, “I keeha gidiya gisho, iya maarotethay merinaasa gidiya gisho, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa galatite. yaagidi yexishe xoossa keethi galata yarsho ekidi yaa asaa girsay si7etana. Taan enta di7ope zaarana; enti kase de7idaysada oothada wothana” yaagees Goday.
JER 33:12 “Ha asaynne mehey bayna baysa biittaninne iyan de7iya katamatan henthanchoti banta dorsa wudiya heemmiya gadey daana.
JER 33:13 Gezze katamatan, gadha katamatan, Negebe mela biittan de7iya katamatan, Biniyaame biittan, Yerusalaame yuushuwan de7iya bessataninne Yihuda katamatan henthanchoti banta dorsata zaaridi taybana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
JER 33:14 “Taani Isra7eele asaasinne Yihuda asaas gelida qaala poliya wodey yaana.
JER 33:15 He wode taani Dawita kochaafe issi xillo Aaca denthana; I suure pirda pirdana; xillo oothana.
JER 33:16 He wode Yihuda asay attana; Yerusalaame asay wopu gidi de7ana. Ha katamay, ‘Goday nu Xillotethaa’ geetetidi xeegetana.
JER 33:17 Dawita kochaafe Isra7eele araatan uttiya asi dhayenna.
JER 33:18 Hessadaka, xuussa yarsho, katha yarshonne hara yarsho yarshanaw Leewe kochaafe kahine gidiya asi merinaw ta sinthafe dhayenna” yaagees Goday.
JER 33:19 “Godaa qaalay Ermiyaasako haysada yaagidi yis.
JER 33:20 Gallasasinne qammas ta wothida wogaa menthidi, gallasinne qammi banta wodiyan simeretonna mela oothidi ta caaquwa laammanaw hinte danda7iko,
JER 33:21 iya kochaafe araatan uttiya asi dhayonnaada, ta aylliya Dawitara caaqida caaquwa laammana; taw oothiya, Leewe koche gidida kahinetara caaqida caaquwa laammana.
JER 33:22 Taani ta aylliya Dawita kochaanne ta sinthan oothiya Leewe kocha taybanaw danda7etonna salo xoolintotadanne makanaw danda7etonna abba shafiyada darsana” yaagees Goday.
JER 33:23 Godaa qaalay qassika Ermiyaasako haysada yaagidi yis.
JER 33:24 “Ha asay, ‘Goday ba doorida nam7u kawotethata, Isra7eelenne Yihuda aggaagis’ yaagidi odeteysa ne akeekabikii? Enti ta asaa kadhidi, bana danda7ida kawotethi gidokona gidi qopoosona.
JER 33:25 Taani gallasaranne qammara caaqida caaquwanne salonne sa7a higgiya minthaboonnaba gidiko,
JER 33:26 Yayqooba zerethaanne ta aylliya Dawita kochaa aggaagana. Iya naytape Abrahaame, Yisaaqanne Yayqooba kochata bolla kawothanaw Dawita kochaa doorike. Taani ta asaa maarana; enta shaluwa zaarana” yaagees Goday.
JER 34:1 Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori, iya olanchoti ubbaynne I haariya kawotethatan de7iya asa ubbay, Yerusalaamenne Yerusalaame yuushuwan de7iya katamata ubbaa oliya wode, ha qaalay Godaape Ermiyaasako yis:
JER 34:2 Goday Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagis; “Bada Yihuda kawa Sedeqiyaasako haysada yaaga: ‘Taani ha katamaa Babiloone kawa kushen aathada immana; I katamaa taman xuuggana.
JER 34:3 Neeni iya kushepe kessa ekaka; neeni oyketana; iyaw aadhada imetana. Neeni ne ayfen Babiloone kawa be7ana; ika neera odetana. Neeni Babiloone biitta baana’ yaagees Goday.
JER 34:4 “Gidoshin, Yihuda kawaw Sedeqiyaasa, Goday giyaba si7a. Neeni olan hayqaka.
JER 34:5 Ne saro hayqana. Neepe kase de7ida kawota bonchuwas, ne mayzatas ixaane cuyisidaysada, asay ne bonchuwas ixaane cuyisana. Woo! nu kawaw, yaagidi new yeekana. Taani Goday haysa odayis” yaagees.
JER 34:6 Hessafe guye, nabey Ermiyaasi ha tinbitiya Yihuda kawa Sedeqiyaasas Yerusalaamen odis.
JER 34:7 He wode Babiloone olanchoti Yerusalaame katamaanne Yihudan attida Laakisonne Azeeqa katamata olidosona. Yihudan attida gimbetida katamati enta xalaala.
JER 34:8 Kawoy Sedeqiyaasi aylleta la77a kessiya awaajuwa awaajanaw Yerusalaamen de7iya asa ubbaara caaqidaape guye, Godaa qaalay Ermiyaasako haysada yaagidi yis:
JER 34:9 He awaajoy, issi issi Ibraawe asi addenne macca aylle aylletethafe la77a kesso. Oonika Ayhude asi gidida ba ishaa aylle oothofo.
JER 34:10 Hessa gisho, asaynne halaqati ubbay caaqida caaquwan banta addenne macca aylleta aylletethafe la77a kessanawunne zaaridi aylletethan haaronna agganaw giigidi enta aylletethafe la77a kessidosona.
JER 34:11 Shin enti banta qofaa laammidi, aylletethafe la77a kessida banta addenne macca aylleta zaaridi haaridosona.
JER 34:12 Hessafe guye, Godaa qaalay Ermiyaasako yaagis.
JER 34:13 Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees: “Taani hinte mayzata Gibxefe, aylletetha biittafe kessida wode entara haysada yaagada caaqas.
JER 34:14 He caaquwa maaran, ‘Ibraawe aylley de7iya ase ubbay, aylleta usupun laythi oosisidi, laapuntha laythan aylletethafe kessidi yeddite’ yaagada kiittas. Shin hinte mayzati ta odiyaba si7onna ixidosona; taw kiitetibookona.
JER 34:15 Hinteka mata wodepe kase hinte nagaraape simmidi, aylleta la77a kessanaw awaajideta; ta sinthan suureba oothideta. Qassi hessa oothanaw ta sinthan, ta sunthay xeegetiya ta keethan caaqideta.
JER 34:16 Shin hinte, hinte qofaa laammidi, ta sunthaa tunisideta. Enti koyida bessaa baana mela la77a kessida addenne macca aylleta zaaridi haarideta.”
JER 34:17 Hessa gisho, Goday, “Hinte taw kiitetonna ixidi, hinte ishaa woyko hinte shooruwa aylletethafe la77a kessiya awaajuwa awaajibeketa. Hinte bolla oli, boshinne koshi keyana mela ta awaajayis. Ta hintena sa7a bolla de7iya kawotethatas dagama oothana.
JER 34:18 Ta caaquwa menthida asaa, ta sinthan caaquwa naagonna ixida asaa, shukidi, nam7u bessan shaakidi, iya giddora aadhida maraa mela ta enta oothana.
JER 34:19 He asay Yihuda halaqata, Yerusalaame halaqata, biitta ayseysata, kahinetanne nam7u bessan shaakida maraa ashuwa giddora aadhida asa ubbaa.
JER 34:20 Ta enta, enta morketa kusheninne enta wodhanaw koyiya asa kushen aathada immana; enta ahay salo kafotasinne sa7a do7atas kathi gidana.
JER 34:21 “Taani Yihuda kawa Sedeqiyaasanne iya halaqata, enta morketa kushen, enta wodhanaw koyeyisata kusheninne hintena oleysa aggida Babiloone olanchota kushen aathada immana.
JER 34:22 Taani Babiloone olanchota kiittin; enti ha katama simmana. Enti ha katamaa olana, di7ananne taman xuuggana. Yihudan de7iya katamata asi doonna baysa bessi oothana” yaagees Goday.
JER 35:1 Iyosyaasa na7aa Yihuda kawa Iyo7aqeema laythan, Godaa qaalay Ermiyaasako haysada yaagidi yis.
JER 35:2 “Rakaaba yara gidida asaako bada, entara odetada, Xoossa keetha kifiletape issuwa giddo gelsada woyne ushsha entaw imma” yaagis.
JER 35:3 Taani bada, Kabasa na7aa na7aa, Ermiyaasa na7aa Ya7izaana, iya ishatanne iya adde nayta ubbaa, Rakaaba yaraa ubbaa ekada,
JER 35:4 xoossa keethi ehas. Enta, Yigidaala na7aa, Xoossa asi gidida Hanaana nayta kifile gelsas. He kifiley, pengiya naagiya Saluma na7aa Ma7iseya kifiliyape bolla baggara, halaqata kifiliya matan de7ees.
JER 35:5 Hessafe guye, taani Rakaaba yarata sinthan woyne ushshay kumida xuggatanne xuu7ata wothada, “Woyne ushsha uyite” yaagas.
JER 35:6 Shin enti zaaridi, “Nu woyne ushshu uyoko; nu mayzay Rakaaba na7ay Yoonadaabi nuuko, ‘Hintenne hinte nayti woyne ushshu merinaw uyopite.
JER 35:7 Keethe keexofite; goshshe goyopite; woyne tokofite. Dunkaane giddon de7ite; hinte adussa laythi ha biittan daana’ yaagis.
JER 35:8 Nu mayzay Rakaaba na7ay Yoonadaabi nuna kiitida ubbaa kiitetida. Nuuni woyko nu macheti woyko nu adde nayti woyko nu macca nayti nu de7o laytha ubban woyne ushshu uyibooko.
JER 35:9 Duussa keethi keexibooko; woyne gade woyko goshshi nuus baawa.
JER 35:10 Nu dunkaanen de7ida; nu mayzay Yoonadaabi kiitida ubbaa kiitetida.
JER 35:11 Shin Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori nu biitta bolla dendida wode, ‘Babiloonenne Soore olanchotape attanaw, Yerusalaame boos’ yaagida. Ha77i nu Yerusalaamen de7ey hessasa” yaagidosona.
JER 35:12 Hessafe guye, Goday Ermiyaasako yaagis.
JER 35:13 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees. “Yihuda asaakonne Yerusalaame asaako bada haysada yaaga; ‘Ta qaala naaganaw haysafe tamaareketi.’
JER 35:14 Rakaaba na7ay Yoonadaabi ba adde nayta woyne ushshu uyonnaada kiittida kiitaa naagidosona. Enti banta mayza kiitaa naagidi hachi gakanaw woyne ushshu uyokona. Taani hintew ubba wode odayis; shin hinte tana si7ibeeketa.
JER 35:15 Taani zaarada zaarada nabeta, ta aylleta hinteko yeddas; enti, ‘Hinte ubbay hinte iita ogiyape simmite; hinte oosuwa loythite; hara xoossata goyinnofite; entaw oothopite. He wode, ta hintewunne hinte mayzatas immida biittan hinte daana’ yaagidosona. Shin hinte tana si7anaw hinte haythaa taako zaaribeeketa.
JER 35:16 Rakaaba na7aa Yoonadaabe kochati enta mayzay enta kiitida kiita oothidosona; shin ha asay taw kiitetibeenna yaaga” yaagees Goday.
JER 35:17 “Hessa gisho, Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees. ‘Si7ite, ta Yihuda asaa bollanne Yerusalaamen de7eyisata bolla ehana gida iitabaa ehana. Ta entaw odin, si7onna ixidosona; ta enta xeegin koyonna ixidosona’ ” yaagees.
JER 35:18 Hessafe guye, Ermiyaasi Rakaaba yaratako, “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay hintena haysada yaagees: ‘Hinte, hinte mayza Yoonadaabas kiitetida gisho, iya wogaa kaallida gishonne I kiitida ubbaa oothida gisho,
JER 35:19 Rakaaba na7ay Yoonadaabi, taw oothiya adde asi awudeka dhayenna’ ” yaagees.
JER 36:1 Iyosyaasa na7ay Yihuda kawoy Iyo7aqeemi kawotida oyddantho laythan, Goday Ermiyaasako haysada yaagis:
JER 36:2 “Issi xaatha maxaafaa ekada, Iyosyaasa wode taani new odo doomida koyro gallasape doomada, hachi gakanaw Isra7eele bolla, Yihuda bollanne hara kawotethata bolla taani odida qaala ubbaa xaafa.
JER 36:3 Ta Yihuda asaa bolla ehana gada halchida bosha ubbaa si7idi, ooni eri, enti banta iita oosuwape simmana; ta enta naaquwanne enta nagaraa atto gaana” yaagis.
JER 36:4 Hessa gisho, Ermiyaasi Neera na7aa Baaroka xeegidi, Goday iyaw odidaba ubbaa Baarokas odin, I xaatha maxaafan xaafis.
JER 36:5 Hessafe guye, Ermiyaasi Baarokako, “Taani qasho keethan de7iya gisho, xoossa keethi gelanaw danda7ike.
JER 36:6 Hessa gisho, ne xooma gallas xoossa keethi bada, ta odin, ne xaatha maxaafan xaafida Godaa qaala entaw nabbaba; banta katamatape yida Yihuda asa ubbaas nabbaba.
JER 36:7 Ha asaa bolla Goday awaajida hanqoy gita gidiya gisho, ooni eri, enti banta iita oosuwape simmidi, Godaa woossana” yaagis.
JER 36:8 Neera na7ay Baaroki nabey Ermiyaasi kiittidaysada xoossa keethan Godaa qaala ubbaa nabbabis.
JER 36:9 Iyosyaasa na7ay Yihuda kawoy Iyo7aqeemi kawotida ichashantho laythan, uddufuntho ageenan, Yerusalaamen de7iya asaasinne Yihuda katamatape yida asa ubbay Godaa sinthan xoomana mela awaajidosona.
JER 36:10 Baaroki Xoossa keethan, qommo bagga dabaaban, Ooratha Penge geetetiya bessan, xaafiya Safaana na7aa, Gamaara kifiliyan eqidi, Ermiyaasa qaalay xaafetida xaatha maxaafa asa ubbaas nabbabis.
JER 36:11 Safaana na7aa na7ay, Gamaara na7ay Mikayi maxaafape Godaa qaala Baaroki nabbabishin si7ida wode,
JER 36:12 kawo gadhon xaafey uttiya kifiliya bis. I biya wode, xaafey Elishami, Shamaya na7ay Dali, Akboora na7ay Elnaatani, Safaana na7ay Gamaara, Hananiya na7ay Xidiqenne hara halaqati yan uttidosona.
JER 36:13 Baaroki asas maxaafape nabbabishin si7ida qaala ubbaa Mikayi entako odis.
JER 36:14 Halaqati Naatana na7aa Yihuda Baarokako kiittidi, “Asaas neeni nabbabida maxaafaa ekada haa ya” yaagidosona. (Naatani Salama na7a; Salami Kuusa na7a.) Baaroki maxaafaa ekidi, entako yis.
JER 36:15 Entika iya, “Ane uttada, nuus maxaafaa nabbaba” yaagidosona. Yaagin Baaroki maxaafaa nabbabis.
JER 36:16 I nabbabida qaala ubbaa si7idi yayyidosona, issoy issuwa xeellidi, Baaroka, “Ha qaala ubbaa nuuni kawas odanaw koshshees” yaagidosona.
JER 36:17 Qassika zaaridi, “Neeni ha qaala ubbaa waatada xaafidaako nuus oda. Haysa new Ermiyaasi odin xaafadii?” yaagidosona.
JER 36:18 Baaroki, “Ee, ha qaala ubbaa Ermiyaasi ba doonape taw odis; taani qalamen ha xaatha maxaafan xaafas” yaagis.
JER 36:19 Enti Baaroka, “Neeninne Ermiyaasi bidi qosetite; hinte de7iya bessaa oonika eropo” yaagidosona.
JER 36:20 Halaqati maxaafa xaafiya Elishama kifilen wothidaape guye, kawoy de7iya dabaaba bidi, hanidaba ubbaa kawas odidosona.
JER 36:21 He maxaafaa ehana mela, kawoy Yihuda kiittis; xaatha maxaafaa Elishama kifilepe ehidi, kawasinne iya yuushuwan eqida halaqatas nabbabis.
JER 36:22 Uddufuntho ageenan sa7i balgo gidiya gisho, kawoy balguwa aathiya keethan uttis. He wode kawa sinthan de7iya coociyan Tami eexees.
JER 36:23 Yihudi heedzu woyko oyddu bessata nabbabidaape guye, kawoy he bessata xaatha maxaafape mashshan qanxi qanxidi, taman yeggis; hessada oothidi, maxaafa kumethi xuuggis.
JER 36:24 Ha qaala si7idi kawoynne iyara oothiya moorinnati ubbay ayinne babibookona; woyko kayotidi, banta ma7uwa peedhibokonna.
JER 36:25 Hari attoshin Elnaatani, Dalaynne Gamaari kawoy he maxaafaa xuuggonna mela woossinka, enta woosa si7onna ixis.
JER 36:26 Kawa na7a Yirahima7eela, Aziri7eela na7aa Sarayanne Abdi7eela na7aa Selema, xaafiya Baarokanne nabiya Ermiyaasa oykana mela kawoy kiittis. Shin Goday enta qottis.
JER 36:27 Ermiyaasi odin, Baaroki xaafida maxaafaa kawoy xuuggidi simmin, Godaa qaalay Ermiyaasako haysada yaagishe yis:
JER 36:28 “Hara xaatha maxaafaa ekada, Yihuda kawoy Iyo7aqeemi xuuggida xaatha maxaafan de7iya qaala ubbaa zaarada xaafa.
JER 36:29 Qassi Yihuda kawa Iyo7aqeema haysada yaaga: Goday haysada yaagees; Neeni, ‘Babiloone kawoy yidi, ha biitta dhaysana; qassi yan de7iya asaanne mehiya wursana’ gada ayis xaafadii?” yaagada maxaafaa xuuggadasa.
JER 36:30 “Hessa gisho, Goday Yihuda kawa Iyo7aqeema haysada yaagees: Dawita araatan uttiya kochay new kumthi deenna. Ne ahay coo holetidi, gallasi awa suulos, qamma meegon shocetana.
JER 36:31 Hinte nagaraa gisho nena, ne kochaanne neera oothiya moorinnata ubbaa seerana. Enti taani odidaba si7onna ixida gisho, ta gida iitaba ubbay hinte bolla, Yihudaninne Yerusalaamen de7iya asa ubba bolla ehana” yaagees.
JER 36:32 Hessafe guye, Ermiyaasi hara xaatha maxaafaa ekidi, Neera na7aa xaafiya Baarokas immis. Baaroki Yihuda kawoy Iyo7aqeemi taman xuuggida xaatha maxaafaa qaala ubbaa Ermiyaasi iyaw doonan odin xaafis. Qassi Ermiyaasi hessa daaniya hara qaalaka gujin, ubbaka Baaroki xaafis.
JER 37:1 Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori Iyo7aqeema na7aa Ikoniyaana bessan Iyosyaasa na7aa Sedeqiyaasa Yihuda biittan kawothis.
JER 37:2 Sedeqiyaasi, iyara oothiya halaqatinne biittan de7iya asa ubbay, Goday nabiya Ermiyaasa baggara odida qaalas kiitetibookonna.
JER 37:3 Shin kawoy Sedeqiyaasi Selema na7aa Yokaalanne Ma7iseya na7aa kahiniya Sofoniyaasa, “Hayyana, nu gisho Godaa nu Xoossaa woossa” yaagidi Ermiyaasako kiittis.
JER 37:4 He wode Ermiyaasi qasho keethi geliboonna gisho, asaa giddon simeretees.
JER 37:5 Gibxe kawa olanchoti, Gibxefe keydaysa Yerusalaame teqida Babiloone olanchoti si7ida wode Yerusalaame yeddidi keyidosona.
JER 37:6 Hessafe guye, Godaa qaalay nabiya Ermiyaasako yis.
JER 37:7 “Goday Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees: tana oychana mela hintena taako kiitida Yihuda kawas haysada yaagite; ‘Hintena maaddanaw yida Gibxe kawa olanchoti banta biitta simmidi baana.
JER 37:8 Qassi Babiloone olanchoti simmidi yaana; ha katamaa olidi oykana; taman iya xuuggana’ yaagite.
JER 37:9 “Babiloone olanchoti simmidi yuussay attonna gisho ‘Babiloone olanchoti yookona’ gidi hintena hintew cimmofite.
JER 37:10 Hinte Babiloone olanchota kumethi xooniyakoka, madunxidi, dunkaanen zin7idaysati dendidi, ha katamaa taman xuuggana” yaagees Goday.
JER 37:11 Gibxe kawa olanchoti matida gisho, Babiloone olanchoti Yerusalaame aggidi banta de7iya bessaa guye simmidosona.
JER 37:12 He wode Ermiyaasi ba gisho biitta ekanaw Biniyaame biitta baanaw Yerusalaamepe dendis.
JER 37:13 Gidoshin, I bidi, Biniyaame Penge gakiya wode pengiya naageysatape issoy, Hananiya na7ay, Saleema na7a Yeera, “Ne nuna kaddada Babiloone baasa gidikii?” yaagidi oykis.
JER 37:14 Ermiyaasi zaaridi, “Ne geysa mela ta Babiloone biya asi gidike” yaagis. Shin Yeerey I geysa si7onna ixidi Ermiyaasa oykidi halaqatako efis.
JER 37:15 Halaqati daro hanqetidi, Ermiyaasa wadhi, enti qasho keethi oothida, xaafiya Yoonataana keethan iya qachidosona.
JER 37:16 Ermiyaasi yan biitta garsan de7iya kifiliyan daro wode gam7is.
JER 37:17 Hessafe guye, kawoy Sedeqiyaasi ase kiittidi, Ermiyaasa ba kawo gadho xeegisidi, dumma qosan iya, “Goday new odidabay de7ii?” yaagidi oychis. Ermiyaasi zaaridi, “Ee de7ees; neeni Babiloone kawa kushen aadhada imetana” yaagis
JER 37:18 Qassika Ermiyaasi kawa Sedeqiyaasa haysada yaagidi oychis: “Tana hinte qasho keethan yegganaw ta ne bolla, new oothiya halaqata bolla woyko ha asaa bolla ay bala oothadina?
JER 37:19 Yaatin, ‘Babiloone kawoy yidi hintenanne hinte biitta olenna’ yaagidi new tinbite odida ne nabeti ha77i awun de7oona?
JER 37:20 Ta godaw, kawaw, si7a; ta oychiya issiba ne polana mela nena woossayis. Ta he bessan hayqonna mela iya keethay qasho keethi gidida xaafiya Yoonataana soo tana guye zaaropa” yaagis.
JER 37:21 Kawoy Sedeqiyaasi naageysata dabaaban Ermiyaasa daana mela kiittis. Yan I de7ishin katamape daabboy dhayana gakanaw gallas gallas issi issi daabbo uukiya bessaafe ehidi iyaw immoosona. Hessa gisho, Ermiyaasa kawa zaban gam7is.
JER 38:1 Mataana na7ay Safaaxi, Phaskora na7ay Godoliya, Selema na7ay Yokaalinne Malkaya na7ay Phaskori Ermiyaasi asa ubbaas odida qaala si7idosona.
JER 38:2 Ermiyaasi, “Ha kataman attiya oonika olan, koshaninne boshan hayqana. Shin Babiloonetas ba kushe immiya oonika hayqenna; attana; de7on daana.
JER 38:3 Yerusalaame katamay Babiloone kawa olanchota kushen aadhidi imetana; entika iya polo di77ana” yaagees Goday.
JER 38:4 Hessafe guye, halaqati kawako bidi, “Ha addey hayqanaw koshshees; haysa mela oda odidi, ha kataman de7iya olanchotinne asa ubbay shuggana mela oothis. I ase qohiyaba amotteesipe attishin, saroba amottenna” yaagidosona.
JER 38:5 Kawoy Sedeqiyaasi zaaridi, “Hinte iya bolla oothana gidaba ta hintena digganaw danda7ike” yaagis.
JER 38:6 Enti Ermiyaasa kawo gadho dabaaban de7iya, kawa na7aa Malkaya haatha ollan, wodoron duge yeggidosona. He wode he ollan silimope attishin, haathi baawa; Ermiyaasi he silimuwa giddo gelis.
JER 38:7 Shin Tophe ase gidida, kawo morinay, Abemeleke geetetiya addey Ermiyaasi ollan yegetidaysa si7is. He wode kawoy Biniyaame Penge pirda oyden uttis.
JER 38:8 Ebed-Meleki kawako bidi, haysada yaagis;
JER 38:9 “Ta godaw kawaw, ha asati gita iitabaa oothidosona; enti nabiya Ermiyaasa haatha ollan yeggidosona. Qassi kataman qumi bayna gisho I yan koshan hayqana” yaagis.
JER 38:10 Kawoy zaaridi, Tophe addey Ebed-Melekako, “Hastamu asi neera eka bada, Ermiyaasi hayqonna de7ishin haatha ollafe kessite” yaagis.
JER 38:11 Ebed-Meleki ase ekidi, bidi kawo gadhon shalo minjiya keethaafe garsa baggara de7iya kifiliya gelidi, gal7a ma7onne curqa ekis. He curqa wodoruwa xeeran qachidi, Ermiyaasas duge olla giddo yeddis.
JER 38:12 Tophe addey Ebed-Meleki Ermiyaasa xeegidi, “Ha curqa ma7uwa wodoruwape garsara ne shophiyan wotha” yaagis. Ermiyaasi I gidaysada oothis.
JER 38:13 Enti wodoruwara goochidi, Ermiyaasa ollaafe kessidi, naageysata keethi gelsidi gordidosona.
JER 38:14 Hessafe guye, kawoy Sedeqiyaasi Ermiyaasa kiittidi ehisidi, xoossa keethi geliya heedzantho pengiya matan, “Ta nena issiba oychana; ne taape qosopa” yaagis.
JER 38:15 Ermiyaasi zaaridi, “Ta odiko, ne tana wodhikii? Ta zorin ne si7aka” yaagis.
JER 38:16 Kawoy Sedeqiyaasi, “De7o Xoossay eriya mela, ta nena wodhike; nena wodhanaw koyeysatas aathada immike” yaagidi qosan Ermiyaasas caaqis.
JER 38:17 Ermiyaasi zaaridi, “Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees: ‘Babiloone kawa halaqatas ne kushe immiko, ne paxa attana; ha katamay taman xuugetenna; nenne ne keetha asay de7on daana.
JER 38:18 Shin ne entaw kushe immonna ixiko, ha katamay Babiloonetas aadhidi imetana; enti iya xuuggana; ne entafe kessa ekaka’ ” yaagis.
JER 38:19 Kawoy Sedeqiyaasi, “Ta yayyey ha biitta kaddidi, Babiloone bida Ayhudetasa. Babilooneti tana enta kushen aathidi immin, Ayhudeti tana kaa7ana” yaagidi zaaris.
JER 38:20 Ermiyaasi, “Aykoy baawa! Enti nena entaw aathidi immokona. Ta odiya Godaa qaalas hayyana kiiteta. Hessi new lo77o gidana; ne paxa attana.
JER 38:21 Shin ne kushe immonna ixiko, Goday tana bessida qoncethi de7ees.
JER 38:22 Hessika, Yihuda kawo gadhon attida maccasati ubbay di7etidi, Babiloone halaqatako baana. Enti neeko, ‘Ne mata laggeti nena balethidosona; enti nena xoonidosona. Shin ha77i ne tohoy silimo giddo gelin, he laggeti nena yeggidi bidosona’ yaagana.
JER 38:23 Ne machetinne ne nayti ubbay Babiloone di7etidi baana. Ne enta kushepe kessa ekaka. Babiloone kawoy nena oykana. Ha katamay taman xuugetana” yaagis.
JER 38:24 Sedeqiyaasi zaaridi, “Haysa ne taw odidaysa asas odonna ixiko ne hayqaka.
JER 38:25 Halaqati ta neera odetidaysa si7idi, ‘Neera kawara ay odetidaako nuus oda. Ne nuus qottonna ixiko, nu nena wodhoko’ yaagidi oychana.
JER 38:26 Neeni, ‘Ta yan hayqonna mela tana zaarada qasho keethi gidida Yoonataana soo yeddonna mela kawa woossas’ ” gada zara yaaga.
JER 38:27 Hessafe guye, halaqati ubbay Ermiyaasako yidi, he oysha oychidosona. Kawoy iya kiittidaysada entaw odis; Ermiyaasara kawara haasayishin si7ida asi bayna gisho enti si77i gidoosona.
JER 38:28 Yerusalaamey oyketana wodey gakanaw, Ermiyaasi naageysata dabaaban gordetidi gam7is.
JER 39:1 Sedeqiyaasi Yihudan kawotida uddufuntho laythan, tammantha ageenan, Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoorinne iya olanchoti ubbay yidi, Yerusalaame teqidosona.
JER 39:2 Sedeqiyaasi kawotida tammanne issintho laythan, oyddantho ageenan, uddufuntho gallasan Babiloone olanchoti katama gimbiya menthidosona.
JER 39:3 He wode Babiloone kawa halaqati, Ergaal-Sarasira, Samgaar-Nabo, Sarsakimanne Ergaal-Sarasira geeteteysati hara daro halaqatara issife yidi Giddo Penge geetetiya bessan uttidosona.
JER 39:4 Yihuda kawoy Sedeqiyaasinne iya olanchoti ubbay Babiloone olanchota be7ida wode baqatidosona. Qamma katamaape keyidi, kawa atakilte bessaa efiya ogiyara, nam7u dirsa gimbeta issife gathiya pengiyara keyidi Yordaanose Zangaarako simmidi bidosona.
JER 39:5 Gidoshin, Babiloone olanchoti enta yedethidi, Iyaarko demba gathishe, Sedeqiyaasa oykidosona. Hamaata biittan, Irbila kataman de7iya kawa Nabukadanaxoorako efidosona. Kawoy Nabukadanaxoori yan Sedeqiyaasa bolla pirdis.
JER 39:6 Babiloone kawoy, Sedeqiyaasa ade nayta iya sinthan, Irbila kataman wodhis; qassi Yihuda halaqata ubbaa wodhis.
JER 39:7 Sedeqiyaasa ayfeta wooci kessidi, iya Babiloone biitta efanaw santhalaatan qachis.
JER 39:8 Babiloone olanchoti kawo gadhonne asay de7iya keetha ubbaa taman xuuggidosona; Yerusalaame gimbiyaka laallidosona.
JER 39:9 Kawa naageysata halaqay Nabuzardaani kataman attida asaanne kaddidi iyako yida asa ubbaa di77idi Babiloone biitta efis.
JER 39:10 Kawa naageysata halaqay Nabuzardaani aykoka bayna guutha manqota Yihudan aggidi, entaw woyne gadenne goshsha gade immis.
JER 39:11 Nabukadanaxoori, kawa naageysata halaqaa Nabuzardaana haysada yaagidi kiittis:
JER 39:12 “Bada Ermiyaasa koya demmada, iyaw koshshiyaba ubbaa ootha; iya bolla hara iitabaa aykoka oothofa” yaagis.
JER 39:13 Hessa gisho, Nabuzardaani, Nabushazbaana, Ergaal-Sarasiranne Babiloone kawa halaqata ubbaa kiittidi,
JER 39:14 Ermiyaasa qashetidi de7iya, naageysata dabaabape kessidosona. Ba soo efidi wothana mela Safaana na7aa, Akqaama na7aa Godoliyas hadara immidosona. Hessa gaason, Ermiyaasi ba biitta asaara issife de7is.
JER 39:15 Ermiyaasi naageysata dabaaban qashetidi de7ishin, Godaa qaalay iyako haysada yaagidi yis.
JER 39:16 “Bada, Tophe addiya Ebemelekako haysada yaaga: ‘Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, haysada yaagees: hizape guye ta odidaysada ha katamaa bolla lo77oba gidonashin, dhayo ehana. Hessi ubbay haniya wode ne ha kataman uttada, ne ayfen be7ana.
JER 39:17 Gidoshin, he gallas ta nena ashshana; ne yayiya, ne morketa kushen aathada immike.
JER 39:18 Ta nena polo ashshana; ne olan hayqaka; ne tanan ammanetida gisho, hayqope attana’ ” yaagees Goday.
JER 40:1 Kawa naageysata halaqay Nabuzardaani Ermiyaasa Raman birshidi simmin, Godaa qaalay Ermiyaasako yis. Nabuzardaani Yerusalaamepenne Yihudape di77idi, Babiloone efanaw qachida asaa giddon Ermiyaasi santhalaatan qashetidi de7ees.
JER 40:2 Kawa naageysata halaqay Ermiyaasa dumma kessidi, haysada yaagis: “Goday ne Xoossay, dhayo ha biitta bolla ehanaysa odis.
JER 40:3 I ehana gidaysada ha77i oothis; Godaa bolla hinte nagara oothida gishonne iyaw kiitetonna ixida gisho haysi ubbay hanis.
JER 40:4 Heko, ha77i ta ne kushen de7iya santhalaata birshada nena yeddas. Taara Babiloone baana giiko yedha; ta new koshshiyaba ubbaa kunthana. Babiloone baanaw koyonna ixiko attanaw danda7aasa. Biitta ubbay ne sinthan de7ees; nena lo77ida bessi awuka ba” yaagis.
JER 40:5 Ermiyaasi iya matape boonna de7ishin, Nabuzardaani gujidi yaagis; “Safaana na7aa, Akqaama na7aa Godoliyako ba. Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori iya Yihuda katamata haariya asi oothidi shuumis. Hessa gisho, iyara issife yan asaara de7a; woyko nena lo77ida bessi awuka ba” yaagis. Kawa naageysata halaqay iyaw shinqenne hara imota immidi yeddis.
JER 40:6 Ermiyaasi Mixiphan de7iya Akqaama na7aa Godoliyako bis. I yan attida asaara issife de7is.
JER 40:7 Yihuda toora moconatapene olanchotape guuthati Babiloone kawas kushe immibookona. Enti Babiloone kawoy, Akqaama na7a Godoliya biitta haareysa oothidi shuumidaysanne Babiloone di7etidi boonna Yihudan attida manqotas halaqa oothidaysa si7idosona.
JER 40:8 Naatana na7ay Isma7eeli, Qareya nayti Yohaaninne Yoonataani, Tanhumeta na7ay Sarayi, Naxoofa addiya Yoofa naytinne Ma7ika addiya na7ay Yazaani banta olanchota ubbaara Godoliyako Mixipha yidosona.
JER 40:9 Safaana na7ay, Akqaama na7ay Godoliya entaw haysada yaagidi caaqis: “Babiloonetas kushe immanaw yayyofite; he biittan de7ite. Babiloone kawas haaretite; ubbabay hintew inje gidana.
JER 40:10 Ta Mixiphan uttada, Babiloone biittafe hintera gahetanaw yaa ubbaara hinte doona gidada odetana. Shin hinte de7iya bessan woyne, shamaho zaytenne hara katha ayfe ubbaa shiishidi dagayite” yaagis.
JER 40:11 Moo7aben, Amoonen, Edoomeninne hara biittatan de7iya Ayhude ubbay Babiloone kawoy, guutha Yihuda asati Yihudan attana mela oothidaysanne Safaana na7a Akqaama na7a Godoliya enta bolla shuumidaysa si7idosona.
JER 40:12 Enti laaletidi de7iya banta biittafe Yihuda simmidi, Godoliya de7iya bessaa Mixipha yidosona. Yan enti daro woynenne hara katha ayfe shiishidi dagaayidosona.
JER 40:13 Hessafe guye, Qaraya na7ay Yohaaninne kushe immiboona toora moconati ubbay Godoliyako Mixipha yidi,
JER 40:14 “Amoone kawoy Ba7alisi nena wodhana mela Naatana na7aa Isma7eela yeddidaysa eray?” yaagidosona. Shin Akqaama na7ay Godoliya enti odaa ammanonna ixis.
JER 40:15 Qaraya na7ay Yohaani Mixiphan de7iya Godoliyako yidi, “Oonika eronna de7ishin bada, Nataniyaa na7aa Isma7eela ta wodhana. I nena wodhiko, ne matan shiiqida Ayhude ubbay laaletana; qassi Yihudan attida asa ubbay wurana” yaagis.
JER 40:16 Shin Akqaama na7ay Godoliya zaaridi, “Isma7eelaba ne odiya ubbay wordo gidiya gisho hessa melaba oothofa” yaagis.
JER 41:1 Laapuntha ageenan kawo koche gididi, kawa moorinnatape issoy, Elsama na7ay, Naatana na7ay Isma7eeli tammu asaara issife Akqaama na7aa Godoliyara gahetanaw Mixipha bis. Ubbay uttidi kathi mishin,
JER 41:2 Naatana na7ay Isma7eelinne iyara de7iya tammu asati banta mashshaa mashshaa kessidi, Babiloone kawoy Yihuda bolla shuumida Akqaama na7aa Godoliya wodhidosona.
JER 41:3 Isma7eeli qassi Mixiphan Godoliyara de7iya Ayhudetanne Babiloone olanchota ubbaa wodhis.
JER 41:4 Godoliya hayqida wontetha gallas, oonika iya hayquwa eronna de7ishin,
JER 41:5 Seekemape, Seelopenne Samaarepe hospun tammu asati azzanidi, banta buuchaa meedidi, banta ma7uwa daakidi, banta som7uwa gaarishe yidosona. Enti Xoossa keethaas immiya kathinne ixaane ehidosona.
JER 41:6 Isma7eeli yeekishe Mixiphafe keyidi, entara gahetanaw bis. Enta gahetida wode, “Akqaama na7aa Godoliyako haa yidi iya be7ite” yaagis.
JER 41:7 Enti katamaa gelida wode Isma7eelinne iyara de7iya asati enta wodhidi haatha ollan yeggidosona.
JER 41:8 Shin he hospun tammu asatape tammati Isma7eela haysada yaagidi woossidosona: “Nuna wodhopa! Nu goshshan nu qosida daro gistey, bangi, shamaho zayteynne eessi de7ees” yaagidosona. I enta wodhonna yeddi aggis.
JER 41:9 Isma7eeli asaa wodhidi yeggida ollay, Isra7eele olanaw Ba7oosi yida wode kawoy Asi bookisida gita gimbetida haatha olla. Nataniyaa na7ay Isma7eeli he ollaa ahan kunthis.
JER 41:10 Isma7eeli kawa macca naytanne Mixiphan attida asa ubbaa di77is. Hessati kawa naageysata halaqay Nabuzardaani Akqaama na7aa Godoliya aawatetha garsan Mixiphan wothidaysata. I enta di77idi, baara ekidi, Amoone biitta baanaw dendis.
JER 41:11 Qaraya na7ay Yohaaninne iyara de7iya toora moconati Isma7eeli oothida iitaba ubbaa si7idosona.
JER 41:12 Banta asaa ekidi, iyara oletanaw bidosona; Isma7eela Gaba7oonan de7iya gita eele haatha matan oykidosona.
JER 41:13 Isma7eeli di77idi efiya asa ubbay Qaraya na7aa Yohaanananne iyara de7iya toora moconata be7ida wode daro ufaytidosona.
JER 41:14 He di7etidaysati ubbay guye simmidi, Qaraya na7aa Yohaananan gahetidosona.
JER 41:15 Shin Isma7eelinne hara hospun asati Yohaananape kessi ekidi, Amoone biitta baqatidosona.
JER 41:16 Isma7eeli Akqaama na7aa Godoliya wodhidi, Mixiphafe di77idi ehida olanchoti, maccasati, naytinne shuufati ubbay Qaraya na7aa Yohaanaranne hara toora moconatara dendidi bidosona.
JER 41:17 Enti yaape dendidi, Gibxe baanaw, Beeteleme matan de7iya Gerot-Kamahama geetetiya bessan shempidosona.
JER 41:18 Enti Gibxe biday Babiloone kawoy shuumida Akqaama na7aa Godoliya Isma7eeli wodhida gisho, Babiloonetas yayyidi, Babiloonepe baqatidi, Gibxe baanaw dendidosona.
JER 42:1 Tora moconati ubbay, Qaraya na7ay Yohaani, Hoshaya na7ay azariyaas asa ubbay, guuthafe gita gakanaw,
JER 42:2 nabiya Ermiyaasako yidi, “Nu nena oychiyaba nuus ootharki. Attida nu gisho Godaa ne Xoossaa woossarki. Nu kase daro; shin ha77i ne be7eysada guutha asa xalaali attida.
JER 42:3 Nu biya ogiyanne nu oothanaba I nuna bessaana mela Godaa ne Xoossaa nu gisho woossa” yaagidosona.
JER 42:4 Nabey Ermiyaasi zaaridi, “Lo77o; hinte oyshaada, Godaa hinte Xoossaa ta woossana; hintefe aykoka qosonna I odiyaba ubbaa hintew odana” yaagis.
JER 42:5 Enti zaaridi, Ermiyaasako, “Goday ne Xoossay ne baggara nuna kiittiyaba ubbaa nu polonna ixiko, Goday ba huuphen nu bolla tumanne ammanetida marka gido.
JER 42:6 Nu dosiyaba gidin, ixiyaba gidin, nu nena iyako kiittiya Goday, nu Xoossay kiittiyaba nu oothana. Nu iyaw kiitetiko, nuus ubbabay inje gidana” yaagidosona.
JER 42:7 Tammu gallasape guye, Godaa qaalay Ermiyaasako yis.
JER 42:8 Qaraya na7aa Yohaana, iyara de7iya toora moconatanne asa ubbaa, guuthafe gita gakanaw xeegidi,
JER 42:9 Hinte woosa ta iyako shiishana mela hinte tana kiitida Goday Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees.
JER 42:10 “ ‘Ta kase hinte bolla ehida iitabay tana azzanthida gisho, hinte ha biittan uttiko, ta hintena keexanape attishin, laallike; tokanape attishin, shoddike.
JER 42:11 Hinte ha77i yayiya Babiloone kawas aykoka yayyofite. Hintena iya kushepe ashshanaw ta hintera de7iya gisho yayyofite.
JER 42:12 Ta hintew qadhetana; yaatada I hintew qadhetidi, hintena hinte biitta zaarana mela oothana’ yaagees Goday.
JER 42:13 “Gidoshin, hinte Godaas, hinte Xoossaas kiitetonna ixidi, ha biittan uttoko giiko,
JER 42:14 qassi hinte, ‘Ola worenne olas punniya moyze si7onnanne koshi bayna Gibxe bidi, yan daana’ giiko,
JER 42:15 hinteno, Yihudan attida asaw, Goday giyaba si7ite. Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees: ‘Hinte Gibxe bidi, yan daanaw qofa qachiko,
JER 42:16 hinte yayyida olay Gibxen hintena oykana; hinte hirgida koshay hintena kaallidi baana; hinte yan Gibxen hayqana.
JER 42:17 Gibxe bidi daanaw qofa qachida asa ubbay olan woyko koshan woyko boshan hayqana. Ta enta bolla ehiya iitaape issoyka kessi ekenna woyko attenna’ yaagees.
JER 42:18 “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, ‘Yerusalaamen de7eyisata bolla ta hanqoynne ta yiloy gukidaysada, hinte Gibxe geliya wode hinte bolla ta hanqoy hessada gukana. Hinte dagamas, cashshas, baadethasinne miicha attana; ha bessaa zaaridi be7eketa’ yaagees.
JER 42:19 “Yihudan attidaysato, Goday hinteko, ‘Gibxe boopite!’ yaagis. Ta hachi hinteko, ‘Naagetite’ geysa si7ite.
JER 42:20 Hinte taako, ‘Nu gisho Godaa nu Xoossaa woossa; I new odiyaba ubbaa nuus oda; nu oothana’ yaagidi, tana Godaako, hinte Xoossaako, kiittideta; hessan gita bala balideta.
JER 42:21 Ta I gidaba ubbaa hachi hintew odas. Shin Goday hinte Xoossay ta baggara hintew kiitida qaalas kiitetonna ixideta.
JER 42:22 Hiza, haysa si7ite; hinte bidi daanaw koyiya biittan hinte olan, koshaninne boshan hayqidi wurana” yaagis.
JER 43:1 Goday enta Xoossay kiitida qaala ubbaa Ermiyaasi entaw odidi wursidaape guye,
JER 43:2 Hoshaya na7ay Azaariyasi, Qaraya na7ay Yohaaninne otorancho asa ubbay Ermiyaasako, “Ne wordo odaasa! Goday nu Xoossay nu Gibxe bidi uttonna mela digganaw nena nuuko kiittibeenna.
JER 43:3 Shin Babiloone asay nuna wodhanaada woyko di77idi banta biitta efanaada ne nuna enta kushen aathada immana mela nena nu bolla denthiday Neera na7aa Baaroka” yaagidosona.
JER 43:4 Qaraya na7ay Yohaani, toora moconati ubbaynne asa ubbay Yihuda biittan daana mela Goday enta kiitida kiitta polonna ixidosona.
JER 43:5 Qaraya na7ay Yohaaninne toora moconati ubbay banta laaletida kawotethata ubbaafe Yihudan daanaw simmida Yihuda asa bantara ekidi Gibxe bidosona.
JER 43:6 Kawa naageysata halaqay Nabuzardaani Safaana na7aa, Akqaama na7aa Godoliyara daana mela ashshida addeta, maccasa, naytanne kawa macca nayta ubbaa efidosona. Qassi nabiya Ermiyaasanne Neera na7aa Baaroka efidosona.
JER 43:7 Enti Godaa kiitaa ixidi, Gibxe biitta gelidi, Xafinaasa katamaa gakanaw bidosona.
JER 43:8 Xafinaasan Godaa qaalay Ermiyaasako haysada yaagidi yis.
JER 43:9 “Gita shuchata ekada, Yihuda asay be7ishin, Xafinaasan de7iya Gibxe kawa gadho geliya bessan sintha baggara de7iya baasuwan mooga.
JER 43:10 Entako, ‘Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees; ta kiittada, ta aylliya Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxoora ehisana. Ha moogetida shuchata bolla iya kawotethaa araata wothana. I ba kawotetha dunkaaniya iya bolla essana.
JER 43:11 I yidi Gibxe biitta olana. Hayqos besseysati hayqana; di7etanaw besseysati di7etana; mashshan hayqanaw besseysati mashshan hayqana.
JER 43:12 Gibxen de7iya eeqa xoossata keethaa tama oythana; eeqata xuuggana woyko di77ana. Henthanchoy ba itiya ma7eysada, Gibxe biitta ma7ana. Yaatidi, yaape saro baana.
JER 43:13 I, Gibxe biittan Heliyoota kataman de7iya hawultiya mentherethana; Gibxe xoossata keethaa taman xuuggana’ ” yaagis.
JER 44:1 Gibxen Migdoola, Xafinaasa, Mempisanne Phatiroosa biittan de7iya Ayhudetas Godaa qaalay Ermiyaasako haysada yaagidi yis.
JER 44:2 “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, Yerusalaame bollanne Yihuda katamaa ubbaa bolla ta ehida dhayo ubbaa hinte, hinte ayfen be7ideta. Enti hachi gakanaw laaletidi attidosona; oonika yan deenna.
JER 44:3 Hessi haniday, enti iita ooso oothidi, tana hanqethida gishosa. Enti woyko hinte woyko hinte mayzati eronna hara xoossatas ixaane cuyisidi entaw goyinnidosona.
JER 44:4 ‘Ta ixiya haysa mela iitabaa oothopite’ yaagidi odana mela zaara zaara ta aylleta, nabeta kiittas.
JER 44:5 Gidoshin, enti si7onna woyko akeekona ixidosona. Hara xoossatas ixaane cuyisiya iita oosuwa aggonna ixidosona.
JER 44:6 Hessa gaason ta suulliya hanqoynne yiloy Yihuda katamata bollanne Yerusalaame ogetan eexis. Enti hachi hinte be7eysada laaletidosona; baysa gididosona.
JER 44:7 “Ha77ika Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay, Isra7eele Xoossay, haysada yaagees; hinte kochay attonna mela, maccasa, addeta, naytanne yooga nayta Yihuda biittafe dhaysanaada iitabaa hinte, hinte bolla ayis oothetii?
JER 44:8 Hinte daanaw yida Gibxe biittan hara xoossatas ixaane cuyisidi tana ayis hanqethetii? Sa7an de7iya kawotethata ubbaa giddon baadethasinne bores attidi, hintena dhaysanaw ayis koyeetii?
JER 44:9 Kase hinte aawati, Yihuda kawotinne enta macheti, hintenne hinte macheti Yihuda katamataninne Yerusalaame ogetan oothida iita ubbaa dogidetiyee?
JER 44:10 Hinte hachi gakanaw hintenatethaa kawushibeketa; tana bonchibeeketa. Ta hintewunne hinte mayzatas immida higgiyanne woga kaallibeketa.
JER 44:11 “Hessa gisho, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, haysada yaagees; ta hintena, Yihuda zertheta ubbaa dhaysanaw qofa qachas.
JER 44:12 Yihudan attida asaa giddofe, Gibxe bidi, yan daanaw qofa qachidaysata ta dhaysana. Enti ubbay Gibxen wurana; olaninne koshan hayqana. Gitape guuthu gakanaw de7iya ubbay olaninne koshan dhayana. Enti dagamas, cashshas, baadethasinne miichas attana.
JER 44:13 Ta Yerusalaame, olan, koshaninne boshan seeridaysada Gibxe biittan de7eyisata seerana.
JER 44:14 Attida Yihuda asaape Gibxe bidi de7eysati Gibxeta kushiyape polo kessi ekokona. Enti simmidi daana gidi amotiya Yihuda biitta ay asika simmenna. Guutha asape attishin, oonika simmidi yeenna” yaagis.
JER 44:15 Enta macheti hara xoossatas ixaane cuyisethi eriya addey ubbay, yan de7iya maccasa ubbaynne gita maabara gididi, Gibxeninne Phatiroosan de7iya asa ubbay Ermiyaasako haysada yaagidosona.
JER 44:16 “Neeni Godaa sunthan nuus odiyaba ubbaa nu si7oko.
JER 44:17 Nu oothana gidi qopidaba ubbaa oothana. Nuuni, nu mayzati, nu kawotinne nu halaqati Yihuda katamataninne Yerusalaame ogetan kase oothidaysada Salo Kawiw geetetiyaris nu xoossees ixaane cuyisana; ushsha yarshuwa iw gussana. Nu kase hessa oothiya wode, nuus daro kathi de7ees; he wode nuus sa7i keeha; nuna aybika metibeenna.
JER 44:18 Shin Salo Kawees ixaane cuyiseysanne ushsha yarsho gusseysa aggidaape guye, nuus ubbabay pacis; nu olaninne koshan wurida” yaagidosona.
JER 44:19 Maccasati gujidi, “Nu Salo Kawees malan uythu uukiya wode, ixaane cuyisiya wodenne ushsha yarsho iw gussiya wode nu azinati eronna de7ishin, nu oothidabay aybika baawa” yaagidosona.
JER 44:20 Haysada yaagidi zaarida asa ubbaas, maccasasinne addetas, Ermiyaasi haysada yaagis;
JER 44:21 “Hintenne hinte mayzati, hinte kawotinne hinte halaqati, biittan de7iya asa ubbay, Yihuda katamataninne Yerusalaame ogetan ixaane cuyisidaysa Goday erenna woyko dogis gidi qopeetii?
JER 44:22 Hinte oothiya iitanne shaatiya oosuwa Goday si77i gaanaw danda7iboona gisho, hinte biitta hachi hinte be7eysada laaletida, baysanne baadetida biitta oothis.
JER 44:23 Ha dhayo ubbay hintena gakiday, hinte hara xoossatas ixaane cuyisida gishosa, Godaa bolla nagara oothida gishosa, Godaa qaala si7onna ixida gishosanne iya higgiya, iya wogaanne awaajuwas kiitetonna ixida gishosa” yaagis.
JER 44:24 Hessafe guye, Ermiyaasi asa ubbaasinne maccasas haysada yaagis; “Hinteno, Yihudape yidi, Gibxe biittan de7iya asaw, Goday giyaba si7ite.
JER 44:25 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, haysada yaagees; hintenne hinte macheti, ‘Nuuni Salo Kawees ixaane cuyisana; ushsha yarshuwa iw gussana’ gidi caaqida caaquwa polidi, ooson bessideta. Hiza, guye goopite; hinte caaquwa polite.
JER 44:26 “Gidoshin, hinteno, Gibxe biittan de7iya Yihuda asaw, Goday giyaba si7ite! Goday haysada yaagees; ‘Hizape guye Gibxe biittan de7iya Yihuda asaape issoyka ta sunthan, “Ubbaa Haariya Goday ero” ’ gidi caaqonna mela ta gita sunthan caaqas.
JER 44:27 Ta enta bolla lo77oba gidonashin, iitabaa ehanaw minnayis. Gibxen de7iya Yihuda asay wurana gakanaw olaninne koshan hayqana.
JER 44:28 Olape attida guutha asati Gibxefe Yihuda simmana. He wode Gibxen de7iya Yihuda asay, ta qaalapenne enta qaalape awusi tumeeko erana.
JER 44:29 Ta hintena ha bessan seeriya wode, ‘Ta hinte bolla iitabaa ehana’ gidaysi tuma gideysas ta hintew malaata immana.
JER 44:30 Ta Yihuda kawa Sedeqiyaasa iyaw morke gididi, iya wodhanaw koyiya Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxooras aathada immidaysada Gibxe kawa Hofira iya wodhanaw koyiya iya morketas aathada immana” yaagees Goday.
JER 45:1 Iyosyaasa na7ay Iyo7aqeemi Yihudan kawotida oyddantho laythan, Neera na7ay Baaroki ha qaalata Ermiyaasi odin, si7idi, maxaafan xaafis. He wode Ermiyaasi iyaw odida qaalay haysa:
JER 45:2 “Baaroka, Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay neeko haysada yaagees:
JER 45:3 Neeni, ‘Goday ta sakuwa bolla azzano gujida gisho tanooshsho! Taani un7an daaburada shempo dhayas’ ” yaagadasa.
JER 45:4 Baaroka, Goday neeko haysada yaagees: “Ta keexidaysa ta laallana; ta tokidaysa ta shoddana. Ta haysa biitta ubban oothana.
JER 45:5 Yaatin, ne new gitaba koyayee? Hessa koyopa. Asa ubbaa bolla ta dhayo ehana. Shin ne bida bessa ubban ta ne shempuwa ashshana” yaagees Goday.
JER 46:1 Kawotethatabaa Goday Ermiyaasas odida qaalay haysa.
JER 46:2 Iyo7aasa na7ay Iyo7aqeemi Yihudan kawotida oyddantho laythan, Efraxiisa shaafa matan, Karkamisha geetetiya bessan, Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori xoonida Gibxe kawa Nako olanchotabaa Goday haysada yaagees.
JER 46:3 Hinte tooranne gondalle giigisite; olas keyite.
JER 46:4 Hinte parata bixaalidi toggite; hinte huuphiyan birata barneexa wothite. Hinte bessaa bessaa oykite; hinte toora leefite; hinte ola ma7uwa ma7ite.
JER 46:5 “Shin haysi ta be7ey aybee? enti yayyidi guye simmidosona. Wolqaamati xoonetidosona; guye xeellonna baqatidosona; Enta yuusho ubban dagami de7ees” yaagees Goday.
JER 46:6 Eesoteysi kessi ekenna; minoyka attanaw danda7enna. Pudeha baggan Efraxiisa shaafa matan, ubbay dhubetidi kundidosona.
JER 46:7 Haysi Nayle shaafa kixada dendey, di7o haathada goggey oonee?
JER 46:8 Gibxey Nayle shaafada dendees; di7o haathada gupees. Gibxey, “Taani kixada, biittan eellana; katamatanne iyan de7iya asa ubbaa dhaysana” yaagees.
JER 46:9 Parato, gupidi keyite; para gaareto woxite. Gondalle oykida Tophenne Puuxa asaw, dongen dukiya Luuda asaw, mino olanchoto, dendidi oletite.
JER 46:10 He gallasay Godaa Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa gallas, Goday ba morketa bolla halo keyiya gallas. Iya mashshay kallana gakanaw enta maana; alana gakanaw enta suuthaa uyana. Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay, pudeha baggan Efraxiisa shaafa matan, enta yarsho oothidi ekana.
JER 46:11 Geela7ee, Gibxe macca naatte, Galada biitta bada tiyetiya dhale eha. Gidoshin, ne coo dhale darsaasape attishin, new paxoy baawa.
JER 46:12 Kawotethati ne yeella si7idosona; ne yeehoy biitta ubbaa kumana. Ne olanchoti issoy issuwan dhubetidi, ubbay issife kundidosona.
JER 46:13 Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori Gibxe olanaw yaanaysa, Goday nabiya Ermiyaasas odida qaalay haysa:
JER 46:14 Haysa Gibxen oda; Migdoolan, Mempisaninne Xafinaasan awaaja. Hinte bessan bessan eqite; giigetite; hinte yuushuwan de7iya ubbaa mashshi maana.
JER 46:15 Hinte mino olanchoti ayis kundidee? Goday enta sugida gisho gidennee?
JER 46:16 Olanchoti dhubetidi kundidosona; issoy issuwa, “Dendidi yedhite; morke mashshafe attanaw, nu asaako, nu biitta simmoos” yaagosona.
JER 46:17 Enti yan Gibxe kawako, “Ba qaada go7etonna coo wursiya odancho” gidi sunthana.
JER 46:18 “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa” geetetiya kawoy haysada yaagees: “Taani, ta shempuwan caaqayis; dereta giddon Taabore Derey, abba matan de7iya Qarmeloosa Derey, aduqeysada aduqiya morkey hinte bolla yaana.
JER 46:19 Hinteno, Gibxen de7eysato, di7etidi baanaw giigite. Mempisa katamay laaletidi, oonika de7onna mela biitta gidana.
JER 46:20 Gibxey lo77o ussa mela; shin pudeha bagga biittafe yaa boxiyan iya saxetana.
JER 46:21 Miishey cigetin oothiya olanchoti modhida wofaano mela. Enta dhayo gallasay matida gisho, enti seeretiya wodey gakida gisho, enti issife guye simmidi baqatidosona; enti banta bessan eqibookona.
JER 46:22 Morkey wolqan sugidi yaa wode, Gibxe asay baqatiya shooshada kolxana. Morketi mithi qanxiya asada, kalta ekidi iya bolla yaana.
JER 46:23 Asay sixida wora qeexidi dhayseysada, Gibxe asaa qanxidi wursana Morketa tayboy boolepe daro; enta taybanaw danda7etenna.
JER 46:24 Gibxe macca na7iya kawuyana; pudeha bagga asaas aadhada imetana.”
JER 46:25 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees. “Taani Tebisa xoossa Amoone, kawa paarona, Gibxe biittanne Gibxe xoossata, Gibxe kawotanne kawa paarona bolla zempiya ubbaa seerana.
JER 46:26 Enta shempuwa koyiya Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxoora kusheninne iya olanchota kushen aathada immana. Hessafe guye, Gibxe biittay kaseysada asi de7iya biitta gidana” yaagees Goday.
JER 46:27 “Ta aylliyaw, Yayqooba yayyofa; Isra7eele, dagammofa. Nena haaho bessafe, ne kochay di7etidi bida biittafe ashshana. Yayqoobi simmidi, saron wopu gidi daana; enta yashisiyabay deenna.
JER 46:28 Ta aylliyaw, Yayqooba, ta neera de7iya gisho, yayyofa. Ta nena laallida kawotethata ubbaa dhaysana; shin nena dhaysike. Ta nena xillo pirdan seerana; shin seeri bayna nena coo aggike” yaagees Goday.
JER 47:1 Gibxe kawoy Gaaza olidi oykanaape kase, Filisxeemeba Godaape nabiya Ermiyaasako yida qaalay haysa:
JER 47:2 Goday haysada yaagees; “Heko, pudeha baggafe haathi dhuuqana; di7oy gelida kixa haathada goggana. Biittanne biittan de7iyaba ubbaa, katamatanne enta giddon de7iya asa ubbaa muukana. Asay waassana; biittan de7iya ubbay yeekana.
JER 47:3 Parata girsaa, para gaareta kooshincha, gaareta gondorsa girsaa si7ana. Aawata kushey argaacida gisho, banta nayta maaddanaw guye simmokona.
JER 47:4 Filisxeeme asa dhaysanaw, Xiroosanne Sidoona maaddanaw attiya asaa dhaysanaw wodey gakis. Goday Filisxeemepe attidaysata, Haathan teqetida de7iya Kaftoorape yida kochata dhaysana.
JER 47:5 Gaazi kayotada ba huuphiya meedasu; Asqalooni ba kushiya doonna bolla wothasu. Hinteno, abba gaxan attidaysato, awude gakanaw hinte asatethaa gaaretii?
JER 47:6 Hinte, ‘Godaa mashshaw, neeni si77i goonna ixey awudesee? Ne bessaa simmada gela; si77i gada utta’ yaageeta.
JER 47:7 Shin Goday iya kiittin, I waanidi si77i gaanee? Asqaloonanne abba gaxan de7iya biitta olana mela kiittas” yaagis.
JER 48:1 Moo7abe Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay haysada yaagees; “I dhayana gisho, Nabo katamaa ayye! Qiratayma katamay yeellatananne; oyketana; enta miixay kawuyana; meqeretana.
JER 48:2 Hizape Moo7abe ceeqoy dhayana; Haseboona katamaa asay Moo7abe bolla, ‘Haayite, ha biitta dhaysana’ yaagidi iitabaa maqetis. Neno, Madmaana katame, mashshi nena yedethana gisho si77i ga.
JER 48:3 Horonayma asay, ‘Dhayoynne kundethi, gakis’ gidi waassiya waasuwa si7ite!
JER 48:4 Moo7abey meqeretana; iya nayti yeekiya yeehuwa si7ite!
JER 48:5 Enti yeekishe, Luhita pude keyana; Horonaymape duge wodhishe, dhayo waasuwa si7ana.
JER 48:6 Issoy issoy, ‘Baqatite; hinte shempiw ashshite; mela biittan de7iya Aro7eerada dummatite, hinte shempuwa ashshite’ yaagana.
JER 48:7 Neeni ne wolqaaninne ne duretethan ceeqetida gisho, neka di7etana. Kamooshika ba kahinetaranne halaqatara, di7etidi baana.
JER 48:8 Goday odidaysada, katama ubbaa dhayseysi yaana. Issi katamika attenna; zangaaraynne demba ubbay dhayana.
JER 48:9 Moo7abey paallidi attana mela qefe immite. I katamay dhayana laattiya asika demmenna.
JER 48:10 Godaa oosuwa qeli gidi oothiya uray baadetidaysa gido. Suuthu gussonna mela ba mashsha teqiya uray baadetidaysa gido!
JER 48:11 “Moo7abey yalagatethafe doomidi, injen de7ida asa mela; I hara biitta di7etibeenna. Moo7abey otope oton tigetonanne qaaxonna, mal7oy laametonnanne sawoy aggonna, uttidi de7ida woyne ushsha mela.
JER 48:12 Taani otuwa gupanthesata kiittiya wodey yaana. Enti iya gussana; otuwape xiizo dhaysana; otuwa mentherethana.
JER 48:13 Isra7eele asay ba ammanetida, Beetelen de7iya eeqan kawuyidaysada Moo7abey ba xoossaa Kamooshan kawuyana.
JER 48:14 “Hinte, ‘Nu wolqaama asinne mino olancho’ gidi ayis ceeqetetii?
JER 48:15 Heko, Moo7abeynne yan de7iya katamati dhayidosona. Iya yalaga adde nayti shukettanaw duge bidosona” yaagees, kawoy, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
JER 48:16 Moo7abe dhayoy matatis; iya laaletetha wodey ellesidi gakis.
JER 48:17 Iya yuushuwan de7iya asay, iya gitatetha eriya ubbay, “Mino gidida kawotethaa xam7ay waanidi meqidee?” Bonchetida xam7ay waanidi tinchetidee? yaagidi zeleelite.
JER 48:18 “Hinteno, Diboona kataman de7eysato, hinte boncho bessafe wodhidi, mela biittan uttite. Moo7abe dhayseysi hinte bolla yaana; hinte miixa ubbaa laallana.
JER 48:19 Aro7eera kataman de7eysato, oge doonan eqidi xeellite; kessi ekidi baqatiya addetanne maccasa, ‘Aybe keyday?’ yaagidi oychite.
JER 48:20 Enti, ‘Moo7abey kundida gisho kawuyis; iyaw yeekitenne zeleelite. Moo7abe dhaydaysa gisho Arnoona shaafa matan awaajite’ ” yaagidi zaarana.
JER 48:21 “Gezzen de7iya Holona, Yaasa, Mefaata,
JER 48:22 Diboona, Nabo, Beet-Dibilatayma,
JER 48:23 Qiratayma, Beet-Gamula, Beet-Ma7oona,
JER 48:24 Qiriyootanne, Baasora katamata bollanne mataninne haahon de7iya Moo7abe katamata bolla pirdi yis.
JER 48:25 Moo7abe kacey qanxetis; iya qesey meqis.”
JER 48:26 Godaa bolla otortida gisho, Moo7abe ushshidi mathoyite. Ba cooshshaa bolla gondoreto; asa ubbay iya bolla qelqiso.
JER 48:27 Kase ne Isra7eele bolla qelqisabikii? Iyabaa haasaya wode kadhada huuphe qaathiday Isra7eeley kaysotara oyketida gishoyee?
JER 48:28 Hinteno, Moo7aben de7eysato, katamape keydi, shucha hom7on de7ite. Aafo doonan baw keethe keexiya holle mela gidite.
JER 48:29 Moo7abey daro otortis; Moo7abey ay mela ba ganna gabbisidaako, ceeqetiyako, otortiyako, ay mela bana dhoqu oothiyako, ta si7as.
JER 48:30 Ta enta ceequwa erayis; shin aykoka maaddenna; enta otoroy aykoka oothenna.
JER 48:31 Hessa gisho, ta Moo7abes waassas; Qir-Hereesa asaas kayotada yeekayis.
JER 48:32 Hinteno, Sebama asaw, Ya7izeera asaas yeekeysafe aathada hintew yeekayis. Hinte tashey daayidi, Maxine Abbaa pinnidi, Ya7izeera gakida woyne mela; shin hinte woyne ayfiyanne wurcuwa bonqeysati yidi dhaysidosona.
JER 48:33 Ufaysinne Lo77obay ayfiya Moo7abe biittafe eketis. Woyne gum7iya bessaafe woyney goggonnaada teqas. Oonika ililishe woyne gum7enna. Si7etiya girsi de7ikoka ufaysa girsi gidenna.
JER 48:34 Enti Haseboonaninne Eliyaalan waassiya waasoy Yahaaxa gakanaw si7etees. Zo7aarape bidi Horonaymanne Eglaat-Shalisha gakanaw si7etees. Hari attoshin, Nimirima haathay melis.
JER 48:35 Taani Moo7abepe dhoqa bessatan goyinnesatanne banta xoossatas ixaane cuyiseyisata dhaysana.
JER 48:36 “Enti kase demmida duretethay ha77i dhayida gisho, ta wozanay Moo7abesinne Qir-Hereesa asaas susul7eda yeekas.
JER 48:37 Enti banta huuphiyanne banta buuchaa meedidosona; banta kushiya qanxidi madunxisidosona; banta xeessan kayo ma7o dancidosona.
JER 48:38 Taani Moo7abe oonika koyonna otoda menthida gisho, Moo7abeta keethaa bollaninne dabaaban yeehope attishin, harabay baawa” yaagees Goday.
JER 48:39 Moo7abey aybi meqo meqide! Iya asay aybi waaso waassi! Moo7abe waani yeellatidi, ba zokuwa zaaridee? Hessa gisho, Moo7abey ba yuushuwan de7iya ubbaas miichasinne dagamas attis.
JER 48:40 Arganthi ba qefiya miccidi yeysada morkey Moo7abe bolla yaana.
JER 48:41 Iya katamati oyketana; iya miixati eketana. He gallas Moo7abe mino olanchota wozanay iqethi oykida maccasa wozana mela un7etana.
JER 48:42 Moo7abe ta bolla makallida gisho dhayana; hizape guye kawotethi gididi deenna.
JER 48:43 Moo7abe asaw, yashshi, olinne xihey hintena naagees.
JER 48:44 Daganthiyabaape baqatiya oonika ollan kundana; ollafe keyiya oonika xihen oyketana. Taani Moo7abe seeriya wode hessa oothana.
JER 48:45 “Baqatidi bidaysati wolqa dhayidi, Haseboona katama kuyan eqidosona. Haseboona katamaape Tami, kawoy Sihooney de7ida keethaafe lacoy keyidi, Moo7abe biittanne yan de7iya makallancho asaa mis.
JER 48:46 Moo7abe asaw, hintena ayye! Kamoosha geetetiya eeqa xoossaa goyinneysati dhayidosona; enta adde naytinne macca nayti di7etidi bidosona.
JER 48:47 Gidoshin, wursethan taani Moo7abe zaarada oorathana” yaagees Goday. Moo7abe bolla odetida pirday haysan wuris.
JER 49:1 Amoonebaa Goday haysada yaagees; “Isra7eeles adde na7i baawee? Iya laattey baawee? Yaatin, Moloka geetetiya eeqa xoossaa goyinniya asati Gaade biitta ayis oykidona? Enta kataman ayis uttidona?
JER 49:2 Amoone biittan Raaba katamaa bolla ola waasoy si7etana mela ta oothana wodey yaana. He katamay laaletidi baysa gidana. Iya yuushuwan de7iya gutati taman xuugetana. Isra7eeley bana ba biittafe gooddidaysata gooddana” yaagees Goday.
JER 49:3 “Haseboona asaw, Gaye katamay laaletida gisho zeleelite. Raaba asaw, yeekite; kayo ma7o ma7idi kayotite; katamaa gimbiya giddon woxeretite. Hinte xoossay Moloki ba kahinetaranne ba halaqatara di7etis.
JER 49:4 Ammanoy bayna asaw, ‘Nuna olanay oonee?’ yaagidi hinte duretethaaninne hinte aradda zangaaratan ayis ceeqetetii?
JER 49:5 Ta ne yuushuwan de7eysati nena daganthana mela oothana” yaagees Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay. Hinte ubbay keyidi baqatana gisho baqatidi bidaysata shiishiya asi dhayana.
JER 49:6 “Gidoshin, wursethan ta Amoone asaa zaarada oorathana” yaagees Goday.
JER 49:7 Edoomeba Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees; “Temaana asaas de7iya cincatethay aw bidee? Zoreysatape zorey dhayidee? Enta cincatethay entafe eketidee?
JER 49:8 Taani Eesawe kochaa seeriya wode iya bolla dhayo ehana gisho, Dadaanen de7eysato, baqatidi aafon qosetite.
JER 49:9 Woyne maxeysati poshile ashshokona? Kaysoti qamma geliko, bantaw koyaba xalaala ekokona?
JER 49:10 Shin ta Eesawa kochaa qaarada kallo ashshana; enti qosetanaw danda7onna mela, enti qosetiya bessa qaarada qonce bessi oothana. Eesawe sheeshay, iya dabbotinne iya shooroti ubbay dhayana; entafe issoyka attenna.
JER 49:11 Hinte giddon de7iya yi7o nayta aggaagite; enta ta dichana. Hinte am7etika tanan ammaneto” yaagees.
JER 49:12 Goday haysada yaagees; “Hiza seera ekanaw bessonna asas seeretethi attonnaba gidiko, hinte waanidi seerettonna attanee? Tuma hinteka seera xuu7ape uyeetape attishin, coo atteketa.
JER 49:13 Baasora katamay baysa gididi attana; iya be7ida asa ubbaas dagamas, qelqisethasinne baadethas attana. Iya yuushuwan de7iya guta ubbay merinaw laaletidi attana. Haysa taani ta sunthan caaqayis” yaagees Goday.
JER 49:14 Taani Godaape yida issi kiita si7as. Kawotethata giddo kiitetidaysi, “Edoome teqanaw shiiqite; iyara oletanaw dendite” yaagis.
JER 49:15 “Hiza, ta nena kawotethata giddon guuthana; asaa giddon kadhetida asi oothana.
JER 49:16 Shucha qophoninne dere bolla de7eyso, ne daganthoynne ne otoroy nena cimmis. Ne keethaa arganthada dhoqan keexikoka, ta nena yaape duge wodhisana” yaagees Goday.
JER 49:17 “Edoomey ase daganthiya biitta gidana. Yaara aadhiya asa ubbay iya dhayuwa be7idi, dagammana; malaaletana.
JER 49:18 Soodomeynne Gamoori banta yuushuwan de7iya katamatara dhayiya wode hanidaysada oonika yan deenna; asi yan uttenna” yaagees Goday.
JER 49:19 “Yordaanose shaafa lanqen de7iya woraape dorsati heemetiya lo77o qooroy de7iya bessaa, qoponna keyiya gaammoda, ta Edoome asata qoponna enta biittafe yedethana. Ta doorida asi iya bolla shuumana. Ta meli oonee? Ta oothana gidaba teqanaw danda7ey oonee? Taara eqetanaw danda7iya henthanchoy oonee?
JER 49:20 “Ta Edoome bollanne Temaana katamaa bolla oothanaw halchidabanne qopidaba si7ite. Enta nayta wolqan goochidi efana; hessa gaason enta soo asay dagammana.
JER 49:21 Edoome kundethaa girsay biitta qaathana; Edoometa waasoy Zo7o Abbaa gakanaw si7etana.
JER 49:22 Arganthi ba qefiya miccidi duge paallidi yeysada, morkey Baasora bolla yaana. He wode Edoome olanchoti iqethi oykida maccasada hirgana” yaagees.
JER 49:23 Damasqoba Goday haysada yaagees; “Iita oda si7ida gisho, Hamaatanne Arfada katamatan de7iya asay yeellatis; yayyis. Zuley shocida abbada enta wozanay shempo demmanaw danda7ibeenna.
JER 49:24 Damasqoy daaburis; enti dagaman kokoridi baqatidosona; maccas iqethi oykeysada metoynne un7i enta oykis.
JER 49:25 Ufaysi kumida eretida katamay waanidi baysa gididee?
JER 49:26 He wode he kataman de7iya yalaga addeti katamaa giddo ogetan hayqana; olanchoti ubbay wurana.
JER 49:27 Taani Damasqo katama dirsa gimbiyan tama yeddana; he tamay Wolde-Adara miixa maana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
JER 49:28 Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori olidi xoonida Qedaarenne Haxoora kawotethatabaa Goday haysada yaagees; “Dendidi, Qedaare asaa olite; doloha baggara de7iya asaa wursite.
JER 49:29 Enta dunkaanetanne enta wudeta ekite. Enta gesheta, enta shaluwanne enta gimaleta ekite. Yaatidi entaw, ‘Hinte yuushuwan dagami de7ees’ yaagidi odite.
JER 49:30 Haxooran de7eysato, Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori hinte bolla iitabaa oothanaw maqetidi uttida gisho, baqatite; aafon qosetite” yaagees Goday.
JER 49:31 “Dendada; hirgi bayna saro de7iya kawotethata ola. Enta katama gimbiyas ibithi woyko kobey baawa; enti bantarka de7oosona.
JER 49:32 “Enta gimaleti bonqetana; enta wudey di7etana. Banta huuphiya gaxaa meedeyisata carkon laallana; ta ubba bessara enta bolla dhayo ehana.
JER 49:33 Haxoori merinaw workanati de7iya mela biitta gidana. Oonika yan deenna; asi yan uttenna” yaagees Goday.
JER 49:34 Yihuda kawoy Sedeqiyaasi koyro kawotida wode, Elaamaba Godaape Ermiyaasako yida qaalay haysa;
JER 49:35 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees; “Elaamas wolqa gidida donge dukiya asata ta wodhana.
JER 49:36 Ubba bessara ta Elama bolla carko ehana; enta he carkuwan laallana. Hessa gisho, Elama asay laaletidi gakonna biitti deenna.
JER 49:37 Enta morketa sinthaninne enta wodhanaw koyeyisata sinthan ta Elama daganthana. Ta gita hanquwan enta bolla dhayo ehana. Ta enta dhaysana gakanaw mashshan yedethana.
JER 49:38 Taani Elama kawanne enta halaqata dhaysada ta araata yan wothana.
JER 49:39 Gidoshin, wursetha wode taani Elama zaarada oorathana” yaagees Goday.
JER 50:1 Babiloonenne Babiloone asaaba nabiya Ermiyaasa baggara Goday odida qaalay haysa:
JER 50:2 “Kawotethata giddon oditenne awaajite. Bandira dhoqu oothi oykidi, aykoka qosonna, haysada yaagidi odite. ‘Babilooney kundis! Beella geetetiya eeqay yeellatis; Marduka geetetiya eeqay kawuyis. Iya misileti yeellatidosona; iya eeqati kawuyidosona.
JER 50:3 Pudeha baggafe issi kawotethi yidi, Babiloone biitta dhaysana. Asaynne mehey baqatana; oonika yan deenna’ ” yaagis.
JER 50:4 “He wodenne he gallas Isra7eeleynne Yihudi issife yeekishe yidi Godaa banta Xoossaa koyana.
JER 50:5 Enti Xiyoone efiya ogiya oychana; banta som7uwa yaa zaarana. Enti, polo dogetonna merina caaquwan Godaara” oyketana.
JER 50:6 “Ta asay dhayida dorsa mela; enta henthanchoti enta balethidi, zuma bolla guye yeddidosona. Issi zumaape hara zumaa bolla toylatidi banta girbiya dogidosona.
JER 50:7 Demmida ubbay enta shankatis. Enta morketi, ‘Nu aykoka balibooko; ha metoy enta gakiday, enti Godaa, banta shempo bessaa, banta mayzata ufaysa bolla nagara oothida gishosa.’
JER 50:8 “Isra7eele asaw, Babiloonepe baqatite; Babiloone biittafe keyite; wude kaalethiya kole deesha mela gidite.
JER 50:9 Taani pudeha baggafe gita kawotethata cugaa denthada, Babiloone bolla ehana hanayis. Enti iya olidi oykana; enta dongey dukidi, balonna olancho mela.
JER 50:10 Babilooney bonqetana; iya bonqiya ubbay kallana” yaagees Goday.
JER 50:11 Babiloone asaw, ta asaa bonqeysato, hinte ufaytidi hashshu gideta. Qooron kallida ussada peenuqideta; korma parada caagideta.
JER 50:12 Shin ha77i hinte gita katamay yeellatananne kawuyana. Kawotethata giddon Babilooney ubbaafe laafa gidana; haathi bayna mela biitta gidana.
JER 50:13 Godaa hanquwa gaason, Babilooney dhayana; laaletana. Iya matara aadhiya ubbay iya bolla gakida bosha be7idi, dagammananne malaaletana.
JER 50:14 “Donge dukeysato, Babiloone olanaw iya yuushuwan salpite; I Godaa bolla nagara oothida gisho hinte dongiyan iya dukite.
JER 50:15 Ubba baggara Babiloone bolla ola waaso waassite; Babilooney kushe immis; iya gimbeti kundidosona; iya gimbe dirsay laaletis. Goday iya bolla halo keyishe de7iya gisho, hinte iya bolla halo keyite. I harata bolla oothidaba hinteka iya bolla oothite.
JER 50:16 Zerethi zereysanne caka wode baacara keyeysa Babiloonepe dhaysite. Dhayseysata mashshaa yayyida gisho, he biittan de7iya asa ubbay ba yaraako yaraako simmidi ba biitta biitta baqatana.
JER 50:17 “Isra7eeley gaammoy yedethidi laallida dorsaa mela. Koyro Asoore kawoy iya ashuwa mis; wursethan Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori iya meqethaa dhoggis.”
JER 50:18 Hessa gisho, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, “Asoore kawa ta seeridaysada Babiloone kawanne iya biitta seerana.
JER 50:19 Shin Isra7eele, iya hentha bessaa zaarana; Qarmeloosanne Baasane Deretan I heemetana. I Efreemanne Galada gezze biittan kallidi maana.
JER 50:20 He wode, hayqope ta ashshida Isra7eele asaa nagaraa ta atto gana gisho, asay Isra7eelen nagara koyana, shin demmokona. Yihudan nagara koyana, shin bentenna” yaagees Goday.
JER 50:21 “Miraatayma biittaninne Piqodan de7iya asaa bolla dendidi enta olite; wodhite; enta polo dhaysite. Ta hintena kiittiya ubbaa oothite” yaagees Goday.
JER 50:22 Biitta bolla ola waasoy si7etees; gita dhayoy gakis.
JER 50:23 Biitta ubbaa liiqisiya naariqay waanidi meqide! Waanidi liiqide! Kawotethata ubbaa giddon Babilooney waanidi daganthiyaba gidide!
JER 50:24 Neno, Babiloone, ta nena oykanaw xihe wothas; neeni eronnashin gelada oyketadasa. Neeni Godaara eqetida gisho oyketadasa.
JER 50:25 Taani ta ola miishiya wothiya keethaa dooyada, ta yiluwan ola miishiya yaape kessas. Hessa oothiday, Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday Babiloone biittan oothiya oosoy de7iya gishosa.
JER 50:26 Yaara haara iya bolla dendite; kathay de7iya iya shaaliya dooyite; di7uwa kathada doorite; Aybibaaka ashshona wursidi dhaysite.
JER 50:27 Booru shukeysada enta olanchota wodhite. Babiloone asay seeretiya wodey gakida gisho enta ayye!
JER 50:28 “Di7etida asay Babiloonepe kessi ekidi, Yerusalaame baqatana. Babiloone asay Xoossa keethaa bolla oothidabaas Goday, enta Xoossay halo keyanaysa enti Xiyoonen odana.
JER 50:29 Babiloone olanaw donge dukiya ubbaa xeegite; issoyka kessi ekonnaada iya yuushuwa teqo. Godaa bolla, Isra7eele Geeshsha bolla, I otortida gisho, iya oosuwada iyaw zaarite. I harata bolla oothidaysada iya bolla oothite.
JER 50:30 Hessa gisho, iya yalaga addeti katamaa giddo ogiyan hayqana; he gallas iya olanchoti ubbay dhayana” yaagees Goday.
JER 50:31 Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, “Neeni seeretiya wodey gakida gisho, neno, otoranchuwaw, ta ne bolla dendas.
JER 50:32 Otoranchoy dhubetidi kundana; iya denthiya asi deenna. Ta iya katamata taman oythana; he tamay yuushuwan de7iya ubba dhaysana” yaagees.
JER 50:33 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees: “Isra7eele asaynne Yihuda asay un7etidosona. Enta di77idi efidaysati enta minthidi oykidosona; enta yeddenaw koybookona.
JER 50:34 Shin enta Wozeysi mino; iya sunthay Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa. I, enta biittas shempo immanaw enta gisho mootetees. Shin Babiloone biittan de7eyisata bolla dagama yeddana.
JER 50:35 Babilooney, Babiloonen de7eysati, iya halaqatinne iya cincati mashshan hayqana” yaagees Goday.
JER 50:36 “Iya eeya wordo nabeti mashshan hayqonna. Dagammiya iya wolqaama olanchoti mashshan hayqana.
JER 50:37 Iya parata bolla, iya para gaareta bollanne maccasa mela gidida iya allaga olanchota bolla mashshi yo. Iya shaluwa minjiya keethaa bolla mashshi yo; iya buqura ubbay bonqetana.
JER 50:38 Babiloonen eeqi kumida gishonne dagamman kokoriya eeqati de7iya gisho; iya haathay melo; iya bolla koshi yo.
JER 50:39 “Hessa gisho, Babilooney bazzo do7atinne workanati de7iya bessi gidana; qassi yanchoti yan daana. Yan merinaw asi deenna; yeletaape yeleta gakanaw asi de7iya bessi gidenna.
JER 50:40 Xoossay beni Soodomenne Gamoora enta yuushuwan de7iya katamatara dhaysidaysada Babiloonen oonika deenna; asi yan uttenna” yaagees Goday.
JER 50:41 “Heko, asay pudeha baggafe yaana; mino kawotethatinne daro kawoti sa7aa gaxape yaanaw dendidosona.
JER 50:42 Enti banta dongiyanne toora oykidosona; enti wozana minonne yeddi maaronna asi. Enti banta para toggidi biya wode, beetay shociya abba guunthada hanees. Neno, Babiloone, enti ubbay olas giigida asi gididi ne bolla salpidosona.
JER 50:43 “Babiloone kawoy hessa si7iya wode iya kushey daaburidi silis; iqethi oykida maccasada un7etis.
JER 50:44 “Yordaanose shaafa lanqen de7iya woraape, lo77o qooroy de7iya bessafe qoponna keyiya gaammoda, ta yada, Babiloone asaa enta biittafe yedethana. Hessafe guye, ta doorida asi iya bolla shuumana; yaatin ta meli oonee? Ta oothana gidaba teqanay oonee? Ay henthanchoy taara eqetanaw danda7ii?
JER 50:45 Hessa gisho, Goday Babiloone bollanne Babiloone biitta bolla halchidabanne qopidaba si7ite. Enta nayta wolqan goochidi efana; hessa gaason enta soo asa ubbay dagammana.
JER 50:46 Babiloone kundethaa girsay biitta qaathana; Babiloone waasoy kawotethata ubban si7etana” yaagees.
JER 51:1 Babiloone asaanne Babiloone biitta dhaysiya carko kiittana.
JER 51:2 Taani Babiloone bolla carkoda punniya allagata kiittana. Iya dhayuwa gallas enti ubba bessara iya un7ethana.
JER 51:3 Iya olanchoti dongiya dukana gakanaw woyko banta ola miishiya dancana gakanaw naagopite. Iya yalaga addetas mishetopite; iya olanchota polo dhaysite.
JER 51:4 Enti Babiloone biittan shuketana; I dabaaban cadetidi kundana.
JER 51:5 Enti biitta nagaran kunthikoka, Xoossay, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Geeshshay, Isra7eelenne Yihuda am7ida yeggidi aggibeenna.
JER 51:6 Babiloonepe baqatite; issoy issoy ba shempuwa ashsho. I oothida nagaraa gaason hinte wuropite. Ha wodey taani Goday halo keyiya wode.
JER 51:7 Babilooney sa7an de7iya asa ubbay uyidi mathotiya, woyne ushshi tigetiya, ta kushen de7iya worqa wanca mela. Kawotethati ubbay he woyne ushsha uyidi gooyidosona.
JER 51:8 Babilooney qoponna kundidi meqis. Hessa gisho, iyaw yeekite; I paxaneko ooni eri iya madunthaas dhale immite.
JER 51:9 Babiloonen de7iya allaga asay, “Nu Babiloone pathanaw koyida; shin paxanaw danda7ibeenna. Iya pirday haakidi salo gakida gishonne shaara gakanaw dhoqu gida gisho iya aggidi nu biitta simmoos” yaagidosona.
JER 51:10 Isra7eele asay, “Goday nuus pirdida gisho, Xiyoone bidi, Goday nu Xoossay oothidaba odana” yaagana.
JER 51:11 “Goday Babiloone dhaysanaw qofa qachida gisho, Meedona kawota denthis. I ba keethaa gisho halo keyanaw qopis. Meedona halaqati, ‘Donge toora leefite; gondalle oykite.
JER 51:12 Babiloone bolla ola bandira denthite; minthidi naagite. Wocheyisata enta bessan bessan wothite; zugidi caddiya olanchota giigisite’ ” yaagidosona. Goday Babiloone asa bolla qopidabaanne ba gida ba oothana.
JER 51:13 Babiloone, neeni daro shaafatinne duretethi kumida biitta, shin ne wursethay gakis; neeni bessonna ogen shiishiya go77ay attis.
JER 51:14 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, “Booley biitta kumeysada taani asaa ne biittan kunthana; enti nena xoonida ufaysan banta qaala dhoqu oothidi ne bolla gayrana” yaagidi ba sunthan caaqis.
JER 51:15 Goday ba wolqan sa7aa medhis; ba cincatethan biitta baasis; salota ba akeekan miccis.
JER 51:16 I kiittiya wode, salon de7iya haathati guummoosona. Shaarata sa7aa gaxape ehees; iri bukiya wode wol7anthi wol7amees; ba minja bessaafe carkuwa kessees.
JER 51:17 Asi ubbay eeyanne akeeki baynaysa; enta misileti wordonne shempoy baynayisata gidiya gisho, worqaa sheeshidi eeqa medheysati yeellatidosona.
JER 51:18 He misileti pathonaysatanne kedhetidaysata; enta bolla Xoossay pirdiya wode enti dhayana.
JER 51:19 Shin Yayqooba Xoossay enta mela gidenna; ubbaba medhiday iya. I baw doorida kochay Isra7eele asaa; iya sunthay Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa.
JER 51:20 “Babiloone, ne ta naariqanne ta ola miishe; Nena go7etada taani biittata mentherethas; kawotethata dhaysas.
JER 51:21 Nena go7etada paratanne para toggeyisata; para gaaretanne enta laaggeyisata mentherethas.
JER 51:22 Nena go7etada maccanne adde, cimanne nayta panthinne geela7o mentherethas.
JER 51:23 Henthanchuwanne iya wudiya, goyeysanne iya waatha boorata, deriya haareysatanne halaqata nena go7etada mentherethas” yaagees Goday.
JER 51:24 “Babilooneynne Babiloone asay Xiyoone bolla oothida iita oosuwa gisho hinte xeellishin ta halo keyana” yaagees Goday.
JER 51:25 “Neno, Babiloone, ne biitta dhaysiya zuma mela; shin ta Goday nena ixas. Taani ta kushiya yeddada, nena zumaa bollafe duge gondorsana; neeni xuugetida zuma gidada attana.
JER 51:26 Neepe baason yeggiya woyko gimbees eketiya shuchi deenna; ne merinaw baysa gidana” yaagees Goday.
JER 51:27 “Babiloone bolla ola bandira denthite; asa giddon moyze punnite. Iya olanaw asaa ubbaa giigisite; Araraate, Minanne Askanaaza kawotethata xeegite. Ola halaqata shuumite; boole mela daro parata ehite.
JER 51:28 Babiloone olanaw kawotethata ubbaa giigisite; Meedona kawota, enta halaqata, deriya haareysatanne enti haariya biitta asa ubbaa denthite.
JER 51:29 “Babilooney oonika doonna baysa oothanaw Goday halchida halchuwa poliya gisho, biitta ubbay kokoresinne porqatees.
JER 51:30 Babiloone olanchoti ola aggidi, banta miixan uttidosona. Enta wolqay laafin, maccasa mela gididosona. Enta keethati xuugetidosona; katama pengiya kobe mithati meqidosona.
JER 51:31 Ha gaxape hini gaxa gakanaw, katamay morken oyketidaysa Babiloone kawas odanaw, woxeysi woxeysa kaallidi, kiitetidaysi kiitetidaysa kaallidi boosona.
