JER 51:32 Shaafara pinniya bessati oyketidaysa, haatha gaxan de7iya woray xuugetidaysanne olanchoti dagammidaysa enti kawas odanaw woxoosona” yaagees Goday.
JER 51:33 “Babiloone biittay kathi bukiya wudumma gidana; guutha wodepe guye I caketiya wodey yaana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay.
JER 51:34 Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori nuna wursidi mis; nu katamaa kaysa oto kessis. Dawey mitteysada iya mittis; mal7oba midi kuntheysada I nu shaluwan ba ganjiya kunthis; attidaysa mucidi cuttis.
JER 51:35 Xiyooney, “Babilooney nu bolla oothida iitaba ubbay iya bolla simmo” yaagosona. Yerusalaamey, “Nu suuthaa acoy Babiloone asa oyko” yaagosona.
JER 51:36 Hessa gisho, Goday Yerusalaame asaa haysada yaagees: “Ta ne gisho mootetana; ne haluwa ta keyana. Taani Babiloone haathaanne pultota melisana.
JER 51:37 Babilooney laaletha doorenne workanati gupiya bessi gidana. Iya be7iya ubbay dagammananne qelqisana; yan issi asika deenna.
JER 51:38 Babiloone asa ubbay gaammoda gudoosona; gaammo marada daarosona.
JER 51:39 Enta asatethay ho77iya wode, ta entaw ushsha gibira giigisana. Enti mathotana gakanaw ta enta ushshana; enti zaaridi dendonna mela merinaw dhiskana” yaagees Goday.
JER 51:40 Shukanaw efiya urgeda, marazedanne koleda taani enta shuka bessi efana.
JER 51:41 “Asa ubbay sabbiya Babilooney waanidi oyketide! Babilooney kawotethata giddon waanidi daganthiyaba gidide!
JER 51:42 Babiloone morketi abba beetay dendeysada dendidi kataman eellidosona.
JER 51:43 Iya katamati laaletidi, daganthiyaba gididosona; haathi bayna mela biitta daanidosona; asi doonna bessinne oonika kanthidi aadhona bessi gididosona.
JER 51:44 Beella geetetiya Babiloone eeqa ta seerana; I mittidaba iya uluwape kessana. Hizape guye, kawotethati iyako goggeysa aggana; Babiloone gimbey kundana.
JER 51:45 “Ta asaw, iya giddofe keyite! Hinte, Godaa hanqo suuluwape hintena ashshite!
JER 51:46 Biittan odetiya odaa si7iya wode ufaysi qanxofitenne yayyofite. Laythan laythan odi kaallidi kaallidi yaana. He wode kawoy kawa bolla dendiya makalla odi biittan si7etana.”
JER 51:47 “Hessa gisho, taani Babiloone eeqa misileta seeriya gallasi yaana. Biitta ubbay yeellatana; hayqidaysati ubbay katamaa giddon kundana.
JER 51:48 Pudeha baggafe yaana dhayseysata kushen Babilooney geliya wode saloninne sa7an de7iya ubbabay ililana.
JER 51:49 Babilooney, Isra7eele asaanne sa7an de7iya asa ubbaa wodhidaysada Babiloone asay hayqanaw koshshees.
JER 51:50 Ta asaw, olape kessi ekidaysato, biite; haysan eqofite. Hinte de7iya haaho biittan tana Godaa hassayite; Yerusalaame qopite.”
JER 51:51 Hinte, “Nuuni cayetida gisho kawuyida; allagati Xoossa keethan de7iya geeshsha bessata gelida gisho, nu yeella ma7ida” yaagideta.
JER 51:52 Shin “Taani Goday Babiloone eeqata seeriya wodey yaana. Madunxidaysati biitta ubban oolana.
JER 51:53 Babilooney salo pude keyidi, yan miixa medhanaw danda7iyakoka, yaa gakanaw keyidi, iya yan dhaysiya asi taani kiittana” yaagees Goday.
JER 51:54 “Babiloonen waasoy, Babiloone biittan gita dhayo girsi si7etana.
JER 51:55 Goday Babiloone dhaysana; iya wolqaama girsa si77i oothana. Abba beetada guummiya morketi olishe ceeqetana.
JER 51:56 Dhayseysati Babiloone bolla yaana; iya olanchoti oyketana; enta dongey meqana. Taani Goday halo keyiya Xoosse gidiya gisho, enta oosuwada entaw zaarana.
JER 51:57 Iya halaqata, iya cinca asata, iya deriya haareyisata, iya toora moconatanne iya olanchota mathoyana. Enti zaaridi dendonna mela merinaw dhiskana” Taani kawoy, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa geeteteysi haysa odayis.
JER 51:58 “Gita Babiloone gimbey kundana; iya adussa pengeti taman xuugetana. Asay oothidaba ubbay hada; kawotethati daaburiyabay tamasa” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
JER 51:59 Maseya na7aa, Neera na7ay Sarayi kawa Sedeqiyaasa shuuma. Sedeqiyaasi Yihudan kawotida oyddantho laythan, Sarayi iyara Babiloone biya wode Ermiyaasi Saraya bolla kiita yeddis.
JER 51:60 Babiloone bolla gakanaw de7iya iitaba ubbaanne Babiloone xeelliya haraba ubbaa Ermiyaasi maxaafan xaafis.
JER 51:61 Sarayako, “Neeni Babiloone gakida wode ne qaala dhoqu oothada asaas ha maxaafa nabbaba.
JER 51:62 Qassi haysada yaagada woossa: ‘Abeeti Godaw, neeni ha bessaa dhaysana; ha bessan shempora de7iya medhetethi, asinne mehey deenna; ha bessay merinaw mela biitta gidana’ yaaga.
JER 51:63 Ha maxaafa nabbaba wursidaape guye, maxaafa shuchara gatha qachada, Efraxiisa shaafan hola.
JER 51:64 Taani Goday iya bolla ehiya dhayuwa gaason, Babilooney zaaridi dendonna mela haysada muuketana” yaaga. Ermiyaasi odida qaalay haysan wuris.
JER 52:1 Sedeqiyaasi kawotiya wode, iyaw laythi laatamanne issino; I Yerusalaamen tammanne issi laythi kawotis. Iya aaye sunthay Amxaalo; iya Libina kataman de7iya Ermiyaasa na7a.
JER 52:2 Iyo7aqeemi oothidaysada Sedeqiyaasi Godaa sinthan iitabaa oothis.
JER 52:3 Goday Yerusalaame bollanne Yihuda bolla hanqetida gisho enta ba sinthafe diggis. Sedeqiyaasi Babiloone kawa bolla makallis.
JER 52:4 Sedeqiyaasi kawotida uddufuntho laythan, tammantho ageenan, tammantho gallasan Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori ba olanchota ubbaa ekidi, Yerusalaame teqis. Enti iya yuushuwan biitta dooridosona.
JER 52:5 Sedeqiyaasi kawotida tammanne issintho laythi gakanaw, Yerusalaamey teqetidi gam7is.
JER 52:6 He laythi oyddantho ageenan, uddufuntho gallasan, koshi suullin, asay miyaba dhayis.
JER 52:7 Katama gimbey issi baggara meqis. Babiloone asay katamaa yuushuwa naagikoka, Yihuda kawa olanchoti ubbay qamma kawo atakilte bessaa efiya ogiya oykidi, nam7u dirsaa gimbeta issife gathiya pengiyara keyidi baqatidosona. Enti Yordaanose zangaarako simmidi bidosona.
JER 52:8 Shin Babiloone olanchoti kawa Sedeqiyaasa yedethidi, Iyaarko demba gathishe oykidosona. Iya olanchoti ubbay iya kaddidi laaletidosona.
JER 52:9 Hessafe guye, iya Hamaata biittan, Irbila kataman de7iya Babiloone kawako efidosona. Yan Nabukadanaxoori Sedeqiyaasa bolla pirdis.
JER 52:10 Sedeqiyaasa adde nayta Sedeqiyaasi xeellishin, Babiloone kawoy wodhis. Yihuda halaqata ubbaa yan Irbila kataman wodhidosona.
JER 52:11 Sedeqiyaasa ayfeta woocidi, santhalaatan qachidi, Babiloone efidosona. I hayqana gakanaw, yan qasho keethan iya wothidosona.
JER 52:12 Nabukadanaxoori Babiloonen kawotida tammanne uddufuntho laythan, ichashantho ageenan, tammantho gallasan, kawa moorinnay, kawa naageysata halaqay Nabuzardaani Yerusalaame gelis.
JER 52:13 Xoossa keethaa, kawo gadhonne Yerusalaamen de7iya keethata ubbaa taman xuuggis; qassi gita keethata ubbaa xuuggis.
JER 52:14 Babiloone olanchoti ubbay kawa naageysata halaqaa kiitan, Yerusalaame katamaa yuushuwan de7iya dirsa gimbiya ubbaa laallidosona.
JER 52:15 Nabuzardaani guutha manqota, kataman attida asata, kaddidi Babiloone olanchotan gelida asatanne kushe hiillanchota di77idi Babiloone efis.
JER 52:16 Shin Nabuzardaani manqotape guutha asaa woyne tokanaadanne gade goyanaada Yihudan aggis.
JER 52:17 Babilooneti Xoossa keetha karen eqida naase birata tuuqeta, caana gaaretanne gita kereta mentherethidi, naase birata ubbaa Babiloone efidosona.
JER 52:18 Kereta, akaafata, xompe shaluwa xeera pittiyabata, xaarota, ixaane saanetanne yarsho wode go7etiya naase birata miisheta ubbaa efidosona.
JER 52:19 Kawa naageysata halaqay Nabuzardaani worqafenne birape oosetida disteta, tama ekiya miisheta, xaarota, laafa kereta, xompe wothiya kocata, ixaane saanetanne ushsha yarshos go7etiya otota efis.
JER 52:20 Kawoy Solomoney Xoossa keethan oosetiyabas medhida nam7u tuussati, gita kereta, tammanne nam7u kormata misiletinne caana gaareti medhetida naase biratati mizaanen likanaw danda7etenna.
JER 52:21 Nam7u tuussati issi mela gididi, issoy issoy tammanne hospun wadha adusse. Enta ubbay tammanne nam7u wadha. Entaw giddoy kaysi gididi, biratay oyddu biradhe keena orde.
JER 52:22 Nam7u tuussata huuphiyan naasepe oosetida gumboti de7oosona. Issi gumbuwa geesay ichashu wadha gididi, yuushoy gite misileninne oromaane misilen alleeqetidi uttis. Nam7antho gumboyka iya mela.
JER 52:23 Gumbotas miyen miyen de7iya oromaaneta misileti uddufun tammanne usupuna; yuushuwan de7iya gite misiletape bolla baggara de7iya oromaane misileti issi xeeta.
JER 52:24 Kawa naageysata halaqay Nabuzardaani kahine halaqaa Saraya, iya kaalliya kahiniya Sofoniyaasanne penge naagiya heedzu asata oykis.
JER 52:25 Kataman de7iya asaape toora mocona, kawa zoreysatape laapun asata efis. Toora mocona, xaafiya, asaa olanchota dooriya halaqanne hara usupun tammu asata efis.
JER 52:26 Nabuzardaani enta ubbaa ekidi, Babiloone kawako, Irbila katamaa efis.
JER 52:27 Hamaata biittan, Irbila kataman, Babiloone kawoy enta ubbaa wodhisis. Hessada hanidi, Yihuda asay banta biittafe di7etidi bidosona.
JER 52:28 Nabukadanaxoori kawotida laapuntho laythan, heedzu mukulunne laatamanne heedzu asay Yihudape di7etis.
JER 52:29 Tammanne hospuntho laythan hospun xeetanne hastamanne nam7u asay Yerusalaamepe di7etis.
JER 52:30 Nabukadanaxoori kawotida laatamanne heedzantho laythan kawa naageysata halaqay Nabuzardaani laapun xeetanne oytamanne ichashu asaa di77is. Di7etida asa tayboy oyddu mukulunne usupun xeeta.
JER 52:31 Yo7akini di7etida hastamanne laapuntha laythan, tammanne nam7antho ageenan, laatamanne ichashantho gallasan, Yoor-Marodaaki kawotida laythi Yihuda kawa Yo7akina bonchidi, qashope birshis.
JER 52:32 Yoor-Marodaaki Yo7akinara mal7o qaala odetidi, Babiloonen di7on de7iya hara kawota ubbaafe aathidi iya bonchis.
JER 52:33 Hessa gisho, Yo7akini qasho keethan ma7iya ma7uwa laammidi, ba de7o laytha ubban kawo gaytape mishe de7is.
JER 52:34 Yo7akini hayqana gakanaw, gallas gallas iyaw koshshiyaba ubbaa Babiloone kawoy immis.
LAM 1:1 Kase asi kumida katamiya ha77i waanada asi bayna bessi gidadee? Kase kawotethata giddon gita gididaara ha77i waanada am7o gidadee? Katamata giddon kawo gididaara ha77i waanada aylle gidadee?
LAM 1:2 Qamma yibbata yeeho yeekashe aqawusu; afuthi I ayfe karera duge wodhees. Kase iyo doseysatape ha77i iyo minthethiya issoyka baawa. I laggeti iyo aathidi immidosona; iw morke gididosona.
LAM 1:3 Yihudi naaqetada; aylletada di7etasu; ha77i kawotethata giddon de7awusu; shin shempo bessi demmabuku. Iya metootada de7ishin, yedetheysati iyo demmidosona.
LAM 1:4 Laytha ba7aale bonchanaw yaa asi bayna gisho, Xiyoone ogeti yeekosona. I dirsa pengeti baysatidosona; I kahineti oolosona. Yan de7iya geela7o nayti un7etidosona; iyaka un7etada yeekawusu.
LAM 1:5 I morketi iw godaa gididosona; entaw injetin de7idosona. I, nagaraa gaason Goday iyo un7ethis; I nayti morketan di7etidi bidosona.
LAM 1:6 Xiyooni bonchoy iipe qaaretis; I, halaqatika miya bessi dhayida gaarada hanidosona; Enti wolqa dhayidi bantana yedetheyisata sinthafe baqatidosona.
LAM 1:7 Yerusalaamey ba metuwanne ba un7a gallasan, beni ba boncho shaluwa hassayawusu. I, asay morketa kushen aadhidi imetida wode, iyo maaddiya issoyka bentibeenna. I morketi iyo xeellidi, I dhayuwan miicidosona.
LAM 1:8 Yerusalaamey gita nagara oothida gisho tunasu; iyo bonchida ubbay I kalluwa be7ida gisho kadhees; iya oolashe guye simmasu.
LAM 1:9 Tunatethi I afilaa bolla bentis; sinthafe ba bolla yaanaba qopabuuku. I kundethay daganthiyaba gidis; iyo minthethiya oonika baawa. Iya, “Abeeti Godaw, ta un7etetha be7a! ta morketi tana xoonidosona” yaagasu.
LAM 1:10 Morketi I boncho shaluwa bonqidosona; kase ne maabara giddo gelonna mela, neeni diggida asati, I keethaa gelishin be7asu.
LAM 1:11 I asati koshatidi kathi demmanaw oolosona; enti de7on daanaw banta shaluwa kathan laammoosona. Yerusalaamey haysada yaagasu; Abeeti Godaw, tana xeella; ta kawushatethaa be7a!
LAM 1:12 Hinteno, haysara aadheysato, haysi hintew aykoka daanennee? Ane be7ite; akeekite; ba eexiya hanqo gallasan, Xoossay ta bolla ehida metuwa mela metoy de7ii?
LAM 1:13 Bollafe tama duge yeddis; he tamay ta meqethaa giddo gelis. Ta tohoy xihen oyketis; tana guye zaaris; tana gallas ubbaa labbanthidi yeggi aggis.
LAM 1:14 Ta oothida nagara ubbaa shiishi qachidi, qambarada ta gannan wothis; yaatidi ta wolqaa wursis. Ta eqetanaw danda7onna asaas, tana aathidi immis.
LAM 1:15 Goday ta giddon de7iya wolqaama olanchota ubbaa diggis. Ta yalagata dhaysanaw wode qachis; woyne yedheysada, Goday Yihuda geela7ota yedhis.
LAM 1:16 Taani yeekashe ta afuthaa gussey hessasa; tana minthetheynne katisiya oonika baawa; morkey goobin, ta nayti un7etidosona.
LAM 1:17 Xiyooney ba kushiya miccasu; shin iyo minthethiya oonika baawa. I yuushuwan de7eysati iyo morkanaada Goday oothis. Yerusalaamey enta giddon tuna gidasu.
LAM 1:18 Iya haysada yaagasu; “Goday xillo; iya kiitetonna ixiday tana. Hinteno, asato ubbay si7ite; ta metuwaka be7ite; ta panthatinne ta geela7oti di7etidosona.
LAM 1:19 Ta laggeta xeegas; shin enti tana cimmidosona; kahinetinne cimati banta shempuwa ashshanaw, kathi koyishe katama giddon hayqidosona.
LAM 1:20 Abeeti Godaw, ta waayiya be7a! ta garsay dagammis. Taani daro makallida gisho, ta wozanay meqis; karen mashshi wursees; son hayqoy de7ees.
LAM 1:21 Asay ta zelelsa si7idosona; shin tana minthethiya issi asika baawa. Ta morketi ta metuwa si7idosona; ne ta bolla oothidaban ufaytidosona. Enti taada hanana mela, enta bolla ne awaajida gallasaa eha!
LAM 1:22 Enta iitatetha ubbay ne sinthe gako; ta nagaraa gisho tana seeridaysada entaka seera; ta zelelsay daris; ta wozanayka meqis.”
LAM 2:1 Goday ba hanqo shaarape garsan, Xiyoone na7iw, waatidi wothide! Isra7eele bonchuwa salope sa7a holis; ba hanquwa gallas, iya tohoy yedhiya bessaa qopibeenna.
LAM 2:2 Goday Yihudan keethata ubbaa qadhetonna dhaysis; ba hanquwan Yihuda biitta miixaa ubbaa laallis; he kawotethaanne halaqata sa7an duge yeggidi kawushis.
LAM 2:3 Ba wolqaama hanquwan Isra7eele wolqaa mentherethis; morkey iya olanaw yaa wode Goday ba ushacha kushiya enta bollafe diggis. Ba yuushuwan de7iyaba ubbaa miya tamada, Yayqooba bolla tama lacoy eexis.
LAM 2:4 Morkeda I ba dongiya enta bolla dafis; un7ethiya iya ushacha kushey giigis. Ayfees lo77iya asa ubbaa wodhis; Xiyoone bolla ba sheniya tamada qolis.
LAM 2:5 Goday morkeda hanidi, Isra7eele dhaysis; kawo gadhotanne miixa ubbaa laallis yihuda asaas yeehonne kayo gujis.
LAM 2:6 Ba keetha atakilte gaden de7iya shaqarada shoddidi holis; laytha ba7aaletinne Sambaatati dogetanaada oothis; ba gita hanquwan kawanne kahiniya kawushis.
LAM 2:7 Goday ba yarsho bessa kadhis; ba keethaa aggaagis; kawo gadhota gimbiya morketa kushen yeggis. Laytha ba7aale bonchiya gallasa wocamada, morketi Xoossa keethan wocamidosona.
LAM 2:8 Goday Xiyooni na7e dirsa gimbiya, laallanaw qachis; I bolla wadha wodoro yeggis. Iyo dhaysona de7ishe ba kushiya zaarenna; gimbeynne miixay issife kundanaada oothis.
LAM 2:9 Yerusalaame penge sanqati biittan moogetidosona; enta gorde mithata mentherethidi dhaysis. Kawoynne moorinnati di7etidi kawotethata giddo bidosona; higge tamaarsey baawa; nabetika hizape guye qoncethi be7okona.
LAM 2:10 Xiyoone cimati si77i gidi biittan uttidosona; banta huuphen baana qolidi kayo ma7o ma7idosona; Yerusalaame geela7oti sa7an duge hokidosona.
LAM 2:11 Ta asay dhayida gisho, guutha nayti katamaa ogiya bolla daaburidi kundida gisho, ta ayfey afuthan tulcatis; ta wozanay azzanon dagammis.
LAM 2:12 Enti banta aayetako, “Kathi imma! haathe imma” yaagidi waassoosona; katamaa ogiyan madunxidi labbaniya asada, enti daaburin enta shempoy enta aayeta ki7on keyees.
LAM 2:13 Yerusalaame naatte, taani nebaa ay gaanee? ne qohuwa ta aybira ginayo? Dosetida Xiyoone geela7e, ta nena waatada minthetho? Ne madunthay abba mela ciimmo; nena ooni pathanaw danda7ii?
LAM 2:14 Ne nabeti wordonne pathonna qoncethi be7idosona; ne di7etonna mela ne nagaraa qoncisidi odibookona; enti balethiya wordo qoncethi new be7idosona.
LAM 2:15 Ne matara aadhiya ubbay ba kushiya baqees; “Biittan ubbaafe aadhada lo77iya katamiya hanno? Biitta ubbaas ufaysi geetetida katamiya hanno?” yaagidi nena qelqisishe banta huuphiya qaathidosona.
LAM 2:16 Ne morketi ubbay banta doona ne bolla dooyidosona; ne bolla qelqisidosona. Banta achaa qarcishe haysada yaagosona; nu enta dhaysida, nu amotiday hessa wursethan be7ida.
LAM 2:17 Goday ba qopidaba oothis; kase odida ba qaala polis. Yerusalaames qadhetonna iyo laallis I morketi ufaytana mela, morketa wolqaa minthis.
LAM 2:18 Xiyoone, ne dirsa gimbey Godaako waasso! ne afuthay qammanne gallas shaafada goggo! Newuka shempofa; ne ayfiyas shempo immofa!
LAM 2:19 Qamma dendada waassa; Godaa sinthan ne wozanaa haathada gussa. Koshatidi oge doonan kundida ne nayta shempuwas ne kushiya iyako pude denthada woossa!
LAM 2:20 Abeeti Godaw, be7a! kase haysada neeni oodde bolla oothadii? Aayeti banta ki7on ko77isidi dichida banta nayta mo gay? kahinetinne nabeti Xoossa keethan hayqo gay?
LAM 2:21 Ciminne na7atethi oge bolla kundidosona; geela7otinne panthati mashshan wuridosona. Neeni ne hanquwa gallas enta wodhadasa; entaw qadhetonna enta buthadasa.
LAM 2:22 Gibira gallas ase xeegeysada, daganthiya ta morketa ubba bessafe xeegadasa. Godaa hanqo gallasan oonika kessi ekibeenna woyko attibeenna. Taani ta ki7on ko77isada dichida nayta ubbaa morkey wodhidi dhaysis.
LAM 3:1 Godaa shene xam7an meto be7ida asi tana.
LAM 3:2 Tana ba sinthafe kessidi, poo7oy bayna dhuman wothis.
LAM 3:3 Gallas kumethi tana shocanaw zaari zaari ba kushiya denthis.
LAM 3:4 I, ta galbaanne ta ashuwa cimisis; ta meqethaa menthis.
LAM 3:5 I, ta yuushuwa metoninne daaburan diris.
LAM 3:6 Beni hayqida asada tana dhuman wothis.
LAM 3:7 Ta kessa ekonna mela, ta yuushuwa diris; deexo duthan tana duxis.
LAM 3:8 Taani maade koyada iya xeegin, iyako waassin, tana si7onna ixis.
LAM 3:9 Ta ogiya wolqaama shuchan gordis; ta ogiya geellayis.
LAM 3:10 I, taw zugidi naagiya babantha mela, qosetidi naagiya gaammo mela gidis.
LAM 3:11 I, tana ta ogiyape kessidi duuserethis; tana asi bayna bessan yeggi aggis.
LAM 3:12 Ba dongiya dafidi, tana dukanaw mallis.
LAM 3:13 Ba dongiya dafidi, ta wozana ayfen caddis.
LAM 3:14 Taani asa ubbaas miichas attas; gallas kumethi bore yethas gidas.
LAM 3:15 I, tana meton camisis; camo godare uuthi tana ushshidi kalsis.
LAM 3:16 I, ta achaa acen menthis; tana baanan yedhis.
LAM 3:17 Saroy taape haakis; taani inje duussu dogas.
LAM 3:18 Hessa gisho, “Ta wolqay taape eketis; taani Godan wothida ufaysa ubbay dhayis” yaagas.
LAM 3:19 Ta metuwanne ta un7aa hassayin de7oy tana cammis.
LAM 3:20 Ta hessa kumethi dogike; ta shempoy azzanees.
LAM 3:21 Gidoshin, ta issiba ta wozanan qopiya wode ta ufaysan kumayis.
LAM 3:22 Hessika, nuuni dhayboonay Godaa siiquwape dendoysana; iya qadhey wuri erenna.
LAM 3:23 Enti wonta wonta oorathi; ne daro ammanthasa.
LAM 3:24 Goday ta saama; hessa gisho, ta iyan ufaysi wothana.
LAM 3:25 Iyan banta ufaysa wotheysatasinne iya koyeysatas Goday lo77o.
LAM 3:26 Asi si77i gidi Godaa atotethan naagiko lo77o.
LAM 3:27 As ba na7atethan meto danda7a tamaariko lo77o.
LAM 3:28 Goday meto ehiya wode si77i gidi utto.
LAM 3:29 Iyaw sinthafe ufaysi daanaw danda7iya gisho bana ziqi ootho.
LAM 3:30 I ba shakala baqeysas immo; cashshe kallo.
LAM 3:31 Goday ase merinaw yeggenna.
LAM 3:32 I asa bolla meto ehikoka, ba merina siiquwa darotethan zaaridi qadhetees.
LAM 3:33 I asa bolla meto woyko un7a ehidi ufaytenna.
LAM 3:34 Bittan de7iya qasho asa banta tohuwpe garsan yedhiya wode,
LAM 3:35 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaa sinthan asa maati yedhetiya wode,
LAM 3:36 Xillo pirdi dhayiya wode Goday hessa ubbaa be7eneyee?
LAM 3:37 Goday kiittonashin odidi polisanaw danda7ey oonee?
LAM 3:38 Iitaba gidin lo77oba odi poley Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossa gidenneyee?
LAM 3:39 Yaatin, asi de7on de7ishe ba nagaraa gisho seeretiya wode ayis zuuzumii?
LAM 3:40 Ane nu ogiya paacoos; Godaako simmoos.
LAM 3:41 Nu wozanaa nu kushiyara salon de7iya Xoossaako denthidi haysada yaagos:
LAM 3:42 Nu nena naaqida; new makallida; neka nuus atto gabaaka.
LAM 3:43 Ne hanquwan kametada nuna yedethada; ne nuus qadhetonna nuna wodhadasa.
LAM 3:44 Nu woosay neeko gakonnaada, nenatethaa shaaran kammadasa.
LAM 3:45 Asaa giddon nuna pitonne buure oothadasa.
LAM 3:46 Nu morketi ubbay nu bolla banta doona dooyidosona.
LAM 3:47 Nu dagamaninne giten gelida; metoninne un7an laaletida.
LAM 3:48 Ta asaa gakida waayiya gaason ta ayfepe afuthu shaafada goggees.
LAM 3:49 Ta ayfey aggonna afuxees.
LAM 3:50 Goday salope duge be7ana gakanaw hessi hanees.
LAM 3:51 Ta kataman de7iya maccasata bolla gakidaba ta ayfey be7ida wode ta wozanay azzanis.
LAM 3:52 Coo tana morkeysati kafo shankatiyada tana shankatidosona.
LAM 3:53 Ta paxa de7ishin tana ollan yeggidi, ollaa doona shuchan gordidosona.
LAM 3:54 Haathi kumidi ta huuphera goggiya wode ta dhayas gada qopas.
LAM 3:55 Abeeti Godaw, ta ciimmo ollan de7ashe ne sunthaa xeegas.
LAM 3:56 Ta waasuwa si7anaada ta nena woossiya wode tana si7adasa.
LAM 3:57 Taani nena xeegida wode taako shiiqada, “Babofa” yaagadasa.
LAM 3:58 Abeeti Godaw ne ta mootuwa mootetada tana wozadasa.
LAM 3:59 Abeeti Godaw, ne ta un7aa be7adasa; hessa gisho, ne taw pirda.
LAM 3:60 Enti halo keyanaw ta bolla maqetiya maquwa ubbaa be7adasa.
LAM 3:61 Abeeti Godaw, enti tana cayiya cashshaanne ta bolla maqetiya maquwa ubbaa si7adasa.
LAM 3:62 Ta morketi gallas kumethi ta bolla zuuzumeysanne kalkasheysa si7adasa.
LAM 3:63 Enti uttishenne eqishe tana boridi yexoosona.
LAM 3:64 Abeeti Godaw, enti oothida oosuwas bessiya zaaruwa entaw qanxa!
LAM 3:65 Enta wozanaa eysa; ne baadethay enta gako.
LAM 3:66 Abeeti Godaw, ne enta ne hanquwan yedetha; salope garsan enta dhaysa.
LAM 4:1 Worqey phooleysa waanidi aggidee? geeshsha worqay waanidi dammidee? Xoossa keethay gimbetida shuchay oge doonan laaletis.
LAM 4:2 Kase al7o worqa mela bonchetida Xiyoone nayti ha77i biittafe medhetida oto gididosona.
LAM 4:3 Hari attoshin worakani ba mari dhanthawusu; shin ta asay bazzon de7iya yanchoda, ba naytas iita gidis.
LAM 4:4 Saamo gaason yooga nayta inxarsay kottonora oyketis; nayti kathi woossosona; shin entaw immiya oonika baawa.
LAM 4:5 Kase mal7o katha xalaala meysati ha77i oge doonan koshan wuridosona. Kase liino ma7idi diccidaysati ha77i bido bolla zin7idosona.
LAM 4:6 Ta asaa nagaray, oodde kusheyka iyo bochonna, qoponna shiretidi wodhida Soodome asa nagarape daro.
LAM 4:7 Yihuda halaqati shachafe aadhida geeshshi, maathafe aadhida boothu. Enta asatethay zo7o inqofe aadhida aarise; enta medhoy sanpare al7o shucha mela.
LAM 4:8 Shin ha77i enta som7oy shaalape aadhidi kareexis; asasi ogen enta be7idi erenna; enta gogay meqethaara oyketidi mithada melis.
LAM 4:9 Miyaba dhayidi, koshan hayqidaysatape olan hayqidaysati lo77o.
LAM 4:10 Ta asaa bolla yida dhayuwa gaason, qadhetiya aayeti banta nayta doysidi midosona.
LAM 4:11 Godaa hanqo xuu7ay kumis; I ba suulliya sheniya tigis. Yerusalaame baasuwa tama oythis.
LAM 4:12 Ha sa7a kawotape woyko kawotethatan de7iya asaape oonika morkey Yerusalaame pengiyara gelana gidi ammanibena.
LAM 4:13 Shin haysi haniday iya nabetinne nagarasinne iya kahineti oothida naaquwasa, xillota suuthaa iya giddon gussida gishosa.
LAM 4:14 Enti qooqe asada, oge tattafoosona; enti suuthan tunida gisho enta ma7uwa oonika bochanaw koyenna.
LAM 4:15 Hessa gisho, asay, “Kichite! hinte tuna gidiya gisho, nuna bochofite!” yaagidi enta bolla waassidosona. Enti baqatidi toylatiya wode, kawotethatan de7iya asay, “Hinte nuura haysan daanaw danda7eketa” yaagidosona.
LAM 4:16 Goday enta laallis; I entaba zaaridi qopenna; enta kahineti bonchetokona; enta cimati nashetookona.
LAM 4:17 Nu ayfey maado demmanaw xeellishe coo daaburis; nuna ashshanaw danda7onna kawotethatape maado naagida.
LAM 4:18 Asay nu gedaa kaalliya gisho, nu katama ogera hemetanaw danda7ibooko. Nu wursethay matis; nu laythay wuris; nuus dhayo wodeyka gakis.
LAM 4:19 Nuna yedetheysati piradhiya arganthafe aadhidi eesotoosona; enti nuna dere huuphera yedethidosona; bazzon hokidi nuna naagidosona.
LAM 4:20 Goday tiyida kawoy, nu de7uwas shempoy, enta xihiyan oyketis. Nu iya kuya garsan uttidi, kawotethata giddon daana gidi qopida.
LAM 4:21 Hinteno, Uxa biittan de7iya Edoome asaw, ufaytite; hashshu giite. Shin xuu7ay hinte bolla yaana; hinte mathotidi kallo attana.
LAM 4:22 Hinteno, Xiyoone asaw, hinte seeray gidana; I hizape hintena di7o biittan wothenna. Shin Edoome asaw, hinte seeretana; hinte nagarayka qoncana.
LAM 5:1 Abeeti Godaw, nuna gakidaba ubbaa qopa; nu kawushatethaa be7a!
LAM 5:2 Nu laatay allagatas, nu keethayka imatha asaas imetis.
LAM 5:3 Nuuni aawi hayqida na7a gidida; nu aayetika am7o gididosona.
LAM 5:4 Nuuni ushsha haatha shammidi ekoos; eethiya mithas gate qanxoos.
LAM 5:5 Nuna yedetheysati nu gindiya garsana; nu daaburida shin shempanaw danda7ibooko.
LAM 5:6 Nuuni kathi kallana gidi, Gibxetasinne Asooretas kushe immida.
LAM 5:7 Nagara oothiday nu mayzata, shin enti ha77i dookona; enti ekanaw bessiya seera ekiday nuna.
LAM 5:8 Nuna aylleti haaroosona; enta kushepe nuna ashshiya oonika baawa.
LAM 5:9 Mashshan wodheysati bazzon de7iya gisho, nu shempuwa bayzidi kathi demmida.
LAM 5:10 Iita kosha gaason, nu gogay tama cooceda michees.
LAM 5:11 Maccasata Xiyoonen geela7ota Yihuda katamatan wolqan oykidi tunisidosona.
LAM 5:12 Halaqata efidi kaqidosona; cimati bonchetibookona.
LAM 5:13 Yalaga addeti woxan gaaccidosona; adde nayti deexo mithi tookidi gandigaridosona.
LAM 5:14 Cimati katama pengen pirdanaw utteysa aggidosona; yalaga addeti nayti yethi dogidosona.
LAM 5:15 Nu wozanaape ufaysi kichis; nu dursay yeehon laametis.
LAM 5:16 Nu huuphiyape kallachay kundis; nu nagara oothida gisho nuna ayye!
LAM 5:17 Hessa gisho, nu wozanay daaburis; nu ayfey teljumis.
LAM 5:18 Xiyoone Derey baysa gidida gisho, workanati yan gupoosona.
LAM 5:19 Abeeti Godaw, ne merinaw haarasa; ne araatay yeletaape yeletaa gakanaasa.
LAM 5:20 Neeni nuna ayis ubba wode dogay? haysa mela adussa wode nuna ayis aggay?
LAM 5:21 Abeeti Godaw, nuna neeko zaara; nu simmana; nu wodiya beniysatho zaarada ooratha.
LAM 5:22 Neeni nuna polo aggadiyee? Ne hanquwas zawi baaweyee?
EZE 1:1 Hastamantho laythan, oyddantho ageenan, ichashantho gallas, taani Koboora shaafan di7etida asaa giddon de7ishin saloti dooyetin, Xoossaa qoncethi be7as.
EZE 1:2 Kawoy Yo7akini di7etida ichashantho laythan, he ageenan ichashantho gallasan,
EZE 1:3 Kaldaaweta biittan Koboora shaafa matan de7iya taako, Buza na7aa, kahiniya Hizqeelako, Godaa qaalay yis; Godaa wolqay tana haaris.
EZE 1:4 Ta xeelliya wode gotey pudeha baggafe yishin be7as; wolqaama shaara giddofe wol7anthi bentees; iya yuushuwan de7iya saloy poo7is. Tama giddo baggay phooliya naase birata daanees.
EZE 1:5 Iya giddon oyddu de7on de7iya medhetethati de7oosona. Enta malay asa mala daanees.
EZE 1:6 Enta issuwas issuwas oyddu oyddu som7oynne oyddu oyddu qefey de7ees.
EZE 1:7 Enta geday sitti gis; enta tohoy mehe qincafile mela; he tohoti quchidi geeshshida naase biratada phoolees.
EZE 1:8 Enta qefiyape garsara oyddu baggara asa kushe daaniya kushey de7ees. He oyddu medhetethatas som7oynne qefey de7ees.
EZE 1:9 Enta qefey issoy issuwa bochees; enti ubbay yaa haa simmonna sitti gidi sinthe boosona.
EZE 1:10 Enta issuwas issuwas sintha baggara asa som7oy de7ees; ushacha baggara gaammo som7oy de7ees; haddirsa baggara boora som7oy de7ees; guye baggara argantha som7oy de7ees.
EZE 1:11 Enta qefey dhoqu gidi micetidi uttis; enta issuwa issuwa nam7u qefey nam7u baggara hanko medhetethata qefey bochees; nam7u qefey enta asatethaa kammees.
EZE 1:12 Enti ubbay sitti gidi sinthe boosona; yaa haa simmonna, Xoossa Ayyaanay biya soo awuka boosona.
EZE 1:13 Ha de7on de7iya medhetethata giddon issi eexiya tama bonqo daaneysi de7ees. He tamay sinthenne guye qaaxiya, eexiya xompe daanees; he tamay phoolees; iya giddofe wol7anthi keyees.
EZE 1:14 Ha de7on de7iya medhetethati wol7anthada sinthenne guye eeson simeretoosona.
EZE 1:15 Heko, ha oyddu medhetethata ta be7iya wode, enta miyen, sa7an de7iya gertota be7as; issi issi medhetetha miyen issi issi gertoy de7ees.
EZE 1:16 Ha gertoti al7o shuchada phoolosona; enti oydday medhoninne malan issoy issuwa daanosona. Issi gertoy hanko gertuwa giddora kanthidi aadhidaba daanees.
EZE 1:17 Enti biya wode oyddu baggafe awu simmidi baaneko yaa haa simmonna boosona.
EZE 1:18 Gitanne yashshiya oyddu gertoti de7oosona; he gertotas gaxi de7ees; he gaxaa yuushoy ayfen kumidi uttis.
EZE 1:19 Ha medhetethati biya wode, enta miyen de7iya gertoti genderetoosona. He medhetethati biittafe pude dendiya wode gertotika dendoosona.
EZE 1:20 Ayyaanay biya awuka enti dendidi boosona. Hessi haney, de7o Ayyaanay gertota giddon de7iya gishosa.
EZE 1:21 De7o Ayyaanay gertota giddon de7iya gisho, medhetethati biya wode gertoti boosona; medhetethati eqiya wode gertoti eqoosona; medhetethati biittafe pude dendiya wode gertoti entara dendoosona.
EZE 1:22 De7on de7iya medhetethata huuphe soope bolla baggara mastooteda phoolidi ayfe caddiya salo gufantho daaniyabay micetidi de7ees.
EZE 1:23 He salo gufanthuwafe garsa baggara enta qefey sitti gidi, issoy issuwako micetidi uttis. Enta ubbaas banta asatethaa kammiya nam7u nam7u qefey de7ees.
EZE 1:24 Medhetethati paalliya wode enta qefiya girsay haatha kixa guunthada, Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossa qaaladanne daro olanchota kooshinchada haneysa si7as. Enti paalo aggiya wode banta qefiya shiishidi ekoosona.
EZE 1:25 Enti banta qefiya shiishi ekidi, he bessan eqidashin, enta huuphe soope bolla baggara de7iya salo gufanthuwafe bolla dhoqafe girsi si7etis.
EZE 1:26 Salo gufanthuwafe bolla baggara sanpare geetetiya al7o shuchafe medhetida araata daaneysi de7ees; araata daaneysa bolla ase daaneysi uttis.
EZE 1:27 Taani iya be7iya wode iyaw xeesse daaneysafe bolla baggay taman de7iya naase biratada phoolees. Iyape garsa baggay tama daanees; iya yuushon phooliya poo7oy de7ees.
EZE 1:28 Iya yuushuwan de7iya phooliya poo7oy ira wode shaaran eqiya zuulla daanees. Haysi Godaa boncho qoncethaa daanees. Taani hessa be7ida wode biittan duge gufannada issi qaala girsi si7as.
EZE 2:1 I taako, “Asa na7aw, denda eqa. Ta neera odetanaw koyayis” yaagis.
EZE 2:2 I taara odetiya wode Xoossa Ayyaani ta giddo gelidi, tana ta tohuwan essis; I taw odeysa si7as.
EZE 2:3 “Asa na7aw, ta nena Isra7eele asaako, ta bolla makallida deriyako kiittayis. Entinne enta mayzati hachi gakanaw ta bolla makallida mela de7oosona.
EZE 2:4 Enti wozana muumenne yeelli baynayisata gidiya gisho, ta nena entako kiittayis. Taani, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagayis.
EZE 2:5 Ha makallancho asay si7in, si7onna ixin, nabey enta giddon de7eysa enti erana.
EZE 2:6 Asa na7aw, entawunne enta qaalas yayyofa! Kinchoteynne xunduqey ne yuushon de7ikoka, qassi korneta giddon ne uttikoka yayyofa. Enti makallancho koche gidiya gisho entaw woyko enta qaalas yayyofa.
EZE 2:7 Enti makallancho koche gidiya gisho enti si7in, si7onna ixin ta qaala entaw oda.
EZE 2:8 Shin, asa na7aw, ta new odeysa si7a. Ha makallancho asaada neka makallancho gidopa; ne doona dooyada ta new immeysa ma” yaagis.
EZE 2:9 Ta xeelliya wode, Heko, taako micetida kushe be7as; he kushiyan xaatha maxaafi de7ees.
EZE 2:10 I ta sinthan he xaatha maxaafa billis; he maxaafas nam7u baggara yeehoy, azzanoynne zelelsi huuphe qofa gididi xaafetis.
EZE 3:1 Xoossay, “Asa na7aw, ne sinthan de7eysa ma; ha xaatha maxaafa ma; bada, Isra7eele asaas oda” yaagis.
EZE 3:2 Hessa gisho, taani ta doona dooyin, I tana xaaxa maxaafa barsis.
EZE 3:3 I taako, “Asa na7aw, ha ta nena barsiya xaatha maxaafa ma; iyara ne uluwa kuntha” yaagis. Ta miya wode ta doonan eessada mal7is.
EZE 3:4 Xoossay taako, “Asa na7aw, dendada, Isra7eele asaako ba; ta qaala entaw oda.
EZE 3:5 Neeni kiitetiday, enta doonay eretonnanne qaalay gelonna asaako gidenna; shin neeni Isra7eele asaako kiitetadasa.
EZE 3:6 Taani nena enta qaalay gelonna, enta doonay eretonnanne akeekanaw metiya daro deriyako ta nena kiittabike. Ta nena entako kiittidaba gidiyako, enti ne odiyaba si7anashin.
EZE 3:7 Isra7eele asay ta odiyaba si7anaw koyonna gisho, ne odeysa si7okona. Isra7eele asay wozana muumenne yeelli baynayisata gidiya gisho ne odiyaba si7okona.
EZE 3:8 Shin taani nena entada wozana muumenne yeelli baynaysa oothana.
EZE 3:9 Taani nena yashshi baynanne zaallafe aadhida mino oothana. Enti makallancho gidikoka, entaw yayyofa; entaw dagammofa” yaagis.
EZE 3:10 Gujidi Xoossay, “Asa na7aw, ta new odiya qaala ubbaa minthada si7a; akeeka.
EZE 3:11 Di7on de7iya ne asaako bada entaw oda. Enti si7in, si7onna ixin, taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday odeysa entaw oda” yaagis.
EZE 3:12 Hessafe guye, Ayyaanay tana pude denthis; Godaa bonchoy ba bessaafe pude dendiya wode taape guyera wolqaama guunthu si7as.
EZE 3:13 Hessika, de7on de7iya medhetethata qefey issoy issuwara boshetiya girsaynne enta miyen de7iya gertota girsaara gahetidi, wolqaama guuntha girsi si7as.
EZE 3:14 Ayyaanay tana pude denthis; tana ekidi hara bessi efis; Godaa gita wolqay tana haaris; ta ayyaanan cametashenne yilotashe bas.
EZE 3:15 Koboora shaafa matan, Tel-Abiban de7iya di7etida asaako gakas. Taani dagammada yan entara laapun gallas gam7as.
EZE 3:16 Laapuntho gallas wursethan Godaa qaalay taako haysada yaagishe yis:
EZE 3:17 “Asa na7aw, ta nena Isra7eele asaa naagiya asi oothas. Ta doonape keyiya qaala si7idi, naagana mela entaw oda.
EZE 3:18 Taani nagaranchuwa, ‘Tuma neeni hayqana’ giya wode, ne bada iyaw odonna ixiko, I ba iita ogiyape simmana melanne iya shempoy attana mela ne iya naagisonna ixiko, I ba nagaran hayqana; shin iya suutha gisho ta nena oychana.
EZE 3:19 Neeni nagaranchuwas odin, I ba nagarapenne ba iita ogiyape simmonna ixiko, I ba nagaran hayqana; shin neeni ne huuphiya ashshana.
EZE 3:20 “Xillo asi ba xillotethaafe guye simmidi, iita oothiya wode ta iya sinthan dhube wothin, I hayqana. I simmana mela ne iyaw odonna gisho I ba nagaran hayqana. I kase oothida xillo oosoy zaaridi qofetenna; shin taani iya suuthaa gisho nena oykana.
EZE 3:21 Shin xillo asi nagaraa oothonna mela ne iyaw odin, I ne kiita si7idi, nagara oothonna aggiko, tuma I de7on daana; neeni nena ashshana” yaagis.
EZE 3:22 He bessan Godaa wolqay tana haaris; I taako, “Dendada zangaara ba; yan ta new odana” yaagis.
EZE 3:23 Ta dendada, zangaara bas. He bessan kase Koboora shaafa matan ta be7idaysada, yan Godaa bonchuwa be7as; taani sa7an som7ora gufannas.
EZE 3:24 Shin Ayyaanay ta giddo gelidi, tana ta tohaan essis. Goday taako, “Ne soo bada, ne bolla pengiya gordada utta.
EZE 3:25 Asa na7aw, ne wodoron qashetana; asako keyanaw danda7aka.
EZE 3:26 Ha makallancho asaas ne odonna melanne enta bolla hanqetonna mela ta ne doona muumisana.
EZE 3:27 Shin ta new odiya wodenne ne doona dooyiya wode neeni, ‘Ubbaa Haariya Goday, enti makallancho gidiya gisho, si7iya oonika si7o; si7onna ixiya oonika si7opo’ yaagada” odana.
EZE 4:1 “Neno asa na7aw, biittafe medhida xuube ekada, ne sinthan wotha; yaatada Yerusalaame katamaa misile iya bolla medha.
EZE 4:2 Katamaa yuushuwa dira; iya biitta doora; miixa keetha; olanchoti uttiya bessi giigisa; gimbiya laaliya duruma iya yuushon giigisa.
EZE 4:3 Birata bashe ekada, ne giddoninne katamaa giddon dirsi oothada essa. Ne som7uwa iyako zaarada dereeqa; katamaa yuushuwa teqa; iya teqeyka nena; hessika Isra7eele asaas malla gidana.
EZE 4:4 “Isra7eele asaa seeretethas malla gidana mela neeni ne haddirsa miyen zin7a. Neeni ne haddirsa miyen zin7iya gallasata taybuwan Isra7eele asay waanidi seeretanaw de7iyako bessaana.
EZE 4:5 Isra7eele asay waanidi seeretanaw de7iyako bessanaw neeni zin7ana mela heedzu xeetanne uddufun tammu gallas new immas; issi gallasi issi laythara gina gidana.
EZE 4:6 “Neeni he gallasata polidaape guye, zaarada, Yihuda asay waanidi seeretanaw de7iyako bessanaw ne ushacha miyen zin7ana mela oytamu gallas new immas. Issi gallasi issi laythara gina gidana.
EZE 4:7 Ne som7uwa teqetida Yerusalaameko zaarada, ne kushiya denthada mandashe, Yerusalaame bolla tinbite oda.
EZE 4:8 He teqethay wurana gakanaw issi miyepe hara miye shiretonna mela ta nena wodoron qachana.
EZE 4:9 “Neeni gistenne banga, qom7olonne misire, maldonne murqa ekada, kathi wothiya miishen qolada, neeni zin7iya heedzu xeetanne uddufun tammu gallas iyape kathada maana.
EZE 4:10 Gallas gallas ne miya katha mazanna; ika nam7u xeetanne hastamu giraame gido; hessa iya woden woden ma.
EZE 4:11 Gallas gallas ne uyaa haathayka likera gido; ika nam7u kubbaya gido; hessa iya woden woden uya.
EZE 4:12 Wora sheesha kem7ele eethada, asay xeellishin, he walakida kathaa banga uythada uukada ma.
EZE 4:13 Hessi Isra7eele asay ta enta laaliya kawotethata giddon de7ishe, tunida kathi maanaw de7eysas malla” yaagis.
EZE 4:14 Taani, “Hay7i! Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, hessi hanenna; taani tunada erike. Ta na7atethafe doomada hachi gakanaw, bawuta woyko do7i wodhidaba ma erike; tunida ashoy ta doonako shiiqi erenna” yaagas.
EZE 4:15 I zaaridi, “Lo77o, yaatiko, wora sheesha kem7elen uukeysa aggada, osha kem7elen ne uythaa uuka” yaagis.
EZE 4:16 I gujidi, “Neno, asa na7aw, akeeka! Yerusalaame katamaa kathi gelonna mela taani teqana hanayis. Asay kathi hirgishe makidi maana; haathe yayyishe likidi uyana.
EZE 4:17 Hiza, entaw de7iya kathaynne haathay wurana; enti dagaman issoy issuwa xeellana; banta nagaraa gaason seeretidi gilqana.
EZE 5:1 “Neno, asa na7aw, oco mashshi ekada, maqlara meediyada ne huuphiyanne ne buuchaa meeda. He huuphiya mizaanen mazzana; ne binaana heedzu bessan shaaka.
EZE 5:2 Neeni teqiya gallasay wuriya wode, ne shaakida binaanape sikuwa ne giigisida katama misiliyas gidduwan wothada taman xuugga. Nam7antho sikuwa he katamaa yuushuwa ubban mashshan qanxeretha. Heedzantho sikuwa carko bolla laalla; ta enta mashshan yedethana.
EZE 5:3 Iyape guutha binaana ekada, ne ma7uwa macaran qacha.
EZE 5:4 Qassi iyape guuthara ekada, taman yeggada xuugga. Yan doomida tamay Isra7eele asa ubbaa gakana” yaagis.
EZE 5:5 Ubbaa Haariya Goday, “Kawotethata ubbaa iya yuushon essada, iya giddon wothida, Yerusalaame katamaa haysa be7a.
EZE 5:6 Shin I ba iita oosuwan ba yuushuwan de7iya biittatapenne kawotethatape aadhidi ta higgiyanne ta wogaa bolla makallis. Tuma I ta higgiya menthis; ta wogaa kaallibeenna” yaagees.
EZE 5:7 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday, “Ne yuushuwan de7iya kawotethatape aadhada meto medhadasa; ta higgiya menthadasa; ta wogaa naagonna ixadasa. Hari attoshin, ne yuushuwan de7iya kawotethata wogaadaka de7ibeeketa” yaagees.
EZE 5:8 Hessa gaason, Ubbaa Haariya Goday, “Neno, Yerusalaame, taani ne bolla dendana; hara kawotethati ubbay be7ishin, ne bolla taani pirdaa ehana.
EZE 5:9 Ixetida eeqa goyinno ubbaa ne oothida gisho, haysafe kase oothaboonna, sinthafeka yoonna pirdaa ta ne bolla ehana.
EZE 5:10 Hessa gaason, ne giddon aawati banta nayta maana; nayti banta aawata maana. Ta hintena pirdana; attidaysata carko bolla laallana.
EZE 5:11 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday, taani ta de7uwan caaqayis. Hinte eeqataninne ixetida oosotan ta keetha tunisida gisho, ta hintena biittafe pittada dhaysana. Ta hintew qadhetike; hintena maarike.
EZE 5:12 Ne giddon de7iya asaape issi sikoy katamaa giddon boshaninne koshan hayqana; nam7antho sikoy mashshan wurana; heedzantho sikuwa carko bolla laallada, enta mashshan yedethana” yaagees.
EZE 5:13 “Ta yiloy enta bolla poletana; ta wolqaama hanqoy irxana. Taani ta hanquwa enta bolla wursiya wode taani qanaaten odidaysa enti erana.
EZE 5:14 “Ne yuushuwan de7iya kawotethata giddoninne hinte matara aadhiya ubbaa sinthan ta hintena baysa oothana; hintena miichas aggana.
EZE 5:15 Ta hintena ta hanquwan, ta yiluwaninne, qadhey bayna seeran pirdiya wode hinte yuushuwan de7iya kawotethata sinthan qelqisethas, cashshas, hintena be7ida asi naagetiyabaanne dagammiyaba oothana.
EZE 5:16 Dukiya donge toorada, ta hintena wodhiyanne dhaysiya kosha hinte bolla yeddana. Taani zaara zaara kosha hinte bolla ehana; kathi Yerusalaame gelonna mela teqana.
EZE 5:17 Taani koshanne do7a hinte bolla yeddana; enti hinte nayta dhaysana; boshanne shempo wodho hinte bolla ehana” yaagees Goday.
EZE 6:1 Godaa qaalay taako haysada yaagishe yis.
EZE 6:2 “Neno, asa na7aw, Isra7eele zumata dereeqa xeellashe, enta bolla tinbite oda.
EZE 6:3 Hinteno, Isra7eele dereto, Ubbaa Haariya Godaa qaala si7ite. Ubbaa Haariya Goday Isra7eele zumatako, zoozetako, zangaaratakonne kakatako haysada yaagees: ‘Asay eeqa goyinniya bessata taani dhaysanaw mashsha yeddana.
EZE 6:4 Hinte yarsho xarpheezati laaletana; hinte ixaane cuyisiya miisheti meqana; hayqida hinte asay hinte eeqata sinthan yegetana.
EZE 6:5 Taani Isra7eele asaa aha enta eeqata sinthan zin7isana; hinte meqethata hinte yarsho xarpheezata yuushon laallana.
EZE 6:6 Hinte de7iya bessa ubbaan, hinte katamatinne hinte goyinno bessati laaletana. Hessadaka, hinte yarsho bessay tunananne laaletana; hinte eeqati meqana; hinte ixaane cuyisiya miisheti meqana; hinte oothidaba ubbay pitetidi dhayana.
EZE 6:7 Hayqida asay hinte giddon kundana. Taani Godaa gideysa hinte hessan erana.
EZE 6:8 Taani hinte giddon mashshafe attida guuthata paxa ashshana; hinte biittataninne kawotethata giddon laaletana.
EZE 6:9 Mashshafe attida enti, di7etidi bida kawotethata giddon de7ishe tana hassayana. Enti banta layma wozananinne amotiya ayfiyan eeqa goyinnanaw simmidi ta wozanaa menthidaysa enti akeekana. Enti banta iita oosuwaninne ixetida eeqa goyinno gaason bantana shaatettana.
EZE 6:10 Taani Godaa gideysa enti erana. Taani enta bolla iitabaa ehana giday coo babiso gidonnaysa enti akeekana’ ” yaagees.
EZE 6:11 Ubbaa Haariya Goday taako haysada yaagees: “Isra7eele asaay ixetida eeqa goyinnida gisho, ne hanquwa biradhen mallada bessa; ne yiluwa biitta qakada qoncisa. Entana ayye! Enti olan, koshaninne gadon wurana.
EZE 6:12 Haahon de7ey gadon dhayana; matan de7ey olan hayqana; paxa attiday, koshan wurana. Hessada oothada, ta hanquwa enta bolla polana.
EZE 6:13 Enta ahay enta eeqata giddo ubban, enta yarsho bessa yuusho ubban, zumata bolla ubban, dere bolla ubban, cil7o mitha garsa ubban, daashsha mitha garsa ubban, banta eeqatas sawiya yarsho yarshida bessa ubban kundida wode taani Godaa gideysa erana.
EZE 6:14 Taani ta kushiya yeddada, enti de7iya biitta ubbaa, dugeha mela biittafe bidi pudehan de7iya Deblaata gakanaw baysa oothana. Taani Godaa gideysa enti hessan erana” yaagees.
EZE 7:1 Godaa qaalay taako haysada yaagishe yis.
EZE 7:2 “Neno asa na7aw, Ubbaa Haariya Goday Isra7eele biittako haysada yaagees: ‘Wursethi matis; ubba baggara ha biitta bolla wursethi yis.
EZE 7:3 Ha77i, wursethi hinte bolla gakis; taani ta hanquwa hinte bolla yeddana. Taani hinte oosuwada, hinte bolla pirdana; hinte ixetida eeqa goyinnida gisho hintena seerana.
EZE 7:4 Taani hintew qadhetike; hintena maarike. Hinte iita oosuwada hinte bolla pirdana; hinte giddon de7iya ixetida eeqa goyinnota qoncisana. Taani Godaa gideysa hinte hessan erana’ ” yaagees.
EZE 7:5 Ubbaa Haariya Goday, “Heko, gadoy gakis; gadoy gado bolla yees.
EZE 7:6 Wursethi gakis; wursethi matis; I hinte bolla dendis; Heko, gakis.
EZE 7:7 Biitta bolla de7eysato, hinte pirday gakis; wodey matis; gallasay matatis. Hessi dagama gallasipe attishin, zumata bolla ufaysan ililiya gallas gidenna.
EZE 7:8 Ha77i mata wode taani ta hanquwa hinte bolla gussana; ta yiluwa hinte bolla wursana. Taani hinte oosuwa gisho hinte bolla pirdana; ixetida eeqa goyinnida gisho hintena seerana.
EZE 7:9 Ta hintew qadhetike; hintena maarike. Hinte iita oosuwada hinte bolla pirdana; hinte giddon de7iya ixetida eeqa goyinnota qoncisana. He wode hintena seerey tana Godaa gideysa hinte erana.
EZE 7:10 “Heko, gallasay! He gallasay gakis! Hinte dhayoy matis! Hinte iitatethay gambuxis; hinte otoroy ciiyis.
EZE 7:11 Geellatetha gaason iita oosoy daris. Entafe issoyka attenna; enta shaluwape woyko enta asaape woyko enta bonchuwafe attanabay baawa.
EZE 7:12 Wodey gakis; gallasay matis; ta hanqoy asa ubbaa bolla gidiya gisho shammeysi ufaytofo; bayzeysi azzanopo.
EZE 7:13 Nam7ay de7on de7iya wode ubban, bayzidaysi ba bayzidaba ekanaw guye simmenna. Isra7eele asa ubba bolla odetida ha qoncethay poletonna attenna. Enta nagaraa gaason entafe issoyka ba shempuwa ashshena.
EZE 7:14 Ta hanqoy asa ubbaa bolla qoncanaw de7iya gisho enti olas moyze punnidi giigetokona; oonika olas keyenna.
EZE 7:15 “Karen oli de7ees; son boshinne koshi de7ees. Katamaape karen de7ey olan hayqana; katamaa giddon de7ey boshaninne koshaninne wurana.
EZE 7:16 Kessi ekidi attidaysati, zangaarape yashshan dere bolla piradhidi keyida holleda, banta nagaraa gisho dere bolla zeleelana.
EZE 7:17 Kushe ubbay doccana; ubbay yashshan kokoridi sheeshi yeggana.
EZE 7:18 Enti kayo ma7o ma7ana; yashshan kokorana. Enta ubbaa som7oy yeella ma7ana; enta ubbaa huuphey meedettana.
EZE 7:19 Enti banta bira ogen holana; enta worqay tunaba gidana. Godaa wolqaama hanqo gallas enta biraynne enta worqay enta ashshanaw danda7enna. Entaw dhube gididi, nagaran gelsida, biraynne worqay ulo kumidi, enta koshape ashshena.
EZE 7:20 “Enti banta al7o alleeqota otortidi, ixetida eeqanne yeellayiya misile medhanaw go7etidosona. Hessa gisho, taani he al7o alleeqota entaw tunabaa kessas.
EZE 7:21 Taani enta alleequwa allaga biitta asaas di7o, biittan de7iya iita asaas bonqe aathada immana; enti iya tunisana.
EZE 7:22 He wode taani ta som7uwa hara soo zaarana; ta boncho keetha pangati gelidi tunisana.
EZE 7:23 “Suure pirda dhayon biittay suuthan kumida gishonne katamay geella ooson kumida gisho santhalaata giigisa.
EZE 7:24 Taani iita kawotethata ehada enta keethata bonqana mela oothana. Wolqaamata otoruwa dhaysana; enta geeshsha goyinno bessati tunana.
EZE 7:25 Enti dagammiya wode saro koyana; shin demmokona.
EZE 7:26 Issi gadoy hara gado kaalethana; issi worey hara wore kaallidi yaana. Enti nabetape qoncethi koyana; Kahinetas tamaarsiyabay dhayana; cimatas zoriyabay dhayana.
EZE 7:27 Kawoy yeekana; halaqay ufaysi qanxana; asay yashshan kokorana. Taani entaw enta oosuwada oothana; enti harata bolla pirdidaysada ta enta bolla pirdana. Taani Godaa gideysa enti hessan erana” yaagees.
EZE 8:1 Nuuni di7etida usupuntho laythan, usupuntho ageenan, ichashantho gallasan, taani ta son uttidashin, Yihuda cimatika ta sinthan uttidashin, Ubbaa Haariya Godaa wolqay tana haaris.
EZE 8:2 Heko, taani dhoqu gada xeelliya wode ase daaneysa be7as. Iyaw xeesse daaneysafe garsa baggay tama laco daanees; bolla baggay phooliya naase birata daanees.
EZE 8:3 I kushe daaniyaba taako yeddidi, ta binaana oykis. Ayyaanay tana sa7apenne salope giddo pude denthidi, Xoossaa qoncethan tana Yerusalaame efis. Yan qommo baggara Xoossaa keetha giddo dabaaba geliya pengiyara gelsidi, Godaa qanaatiya denthethiya eeqay eqida bessaa bessis.
EZE 8:4 Heko, kase taani zangaaran be7idaysada, Isra7eele Xoossaa bonchuwa yan be7as.
EZE 8:5 Goday taako, “Neno asa na7aw, pudeha bagga xeella” yaagis. Taani xeelliya wode qanaate denthethiya eeqay, dirsa pengiya sinthan de7iya yarsho bessa matan de7eysa be7as.
EZE 8:6 I taako, “Neno, asa na7aw, enti oothiyaba be7ay? Tana ta geeshsha keethafe haassanaw, Isra7eele asay oothiya ixetida eeqa goyinnuwa be7ay? Haysafe aadhiya ixetida eeqa goyinno neeni buroo be7ana” yaagis.
EZE 8:7 I tana Xoossaa keetha dabaaba penge ehin, taani xeelliya wode, Heko, godaa bolla xoo7e be7as.
EZE 8:8 I taako, “Neno, asa na7aw, godaa booka” yaagin, ta bookiya wode issi penge yan be7as.
EZE 8:9 I taako, “Gelada enti yan oothiya iita oosuwanne ixetida eeqa be7a” yaagis.
EZE 8:10 Ta giddo gelada xeelliya wode, Heko, sa7ara gooshetiya dumma dumma medhetethata misiley, tuna do7ata misileynne Isra7eele asaa eeqata ubbaa misiley godaa bolla yuuyi aadhidi medheti uttidaysa be7as.
EZE 8:11 Entafe sintha baggara Isra7eele asaape laapun tammu cimati eqidosona; Safaana na7aa Ya7izaani enta giddon eqis. Ubbay ixaane cuyisiyaba banta kushen oykidosona; ixaaniya cuyay tuqu gees.
EZE 8:12 Goday taako, “Neno, asa na7aw, Isra7eele asaa cimati ubbay dhuman banta eeqa misiliya keethan oothiyaba be7ay? Enti, Goday nuna be7enna; Goday ha biitta aggis” yaagosona.
EZE 8:13 I taako, “Haysafe aadhiya ixetida eeqa goyinno neeni buroo be7ana” yaagis.
EZE 8:14 Hessafe guye, pudeha baggan de7iya Xoossa keethaa pengiyako efin, Heko, maccasay yan uttidi, Tamuuza geetetiya banta xoossas yeekishin be7as.
EZE 8:15 I taako, “Neno asa na7aw, haysa be7ay? Haysafe aadhiya ixetida eeqa goyinno neeni buroo be7ana” yaagis.
EZE 8:16 Hessafe guye, I tana Xoossaa keetha giddo dabaaba efis; yan Xoossaa keetha pengiya matan, barandaafenne yarsho bessaafe giddon, laatamanne ichashu gidiya asata be7as. Enti banta zokuwa Xoossa keethaako, banta som7uwa dolohako zaaridi, dolohara keyiya awa goyinnoosona.
EZE 8:17 Goday taako, “Neno asa na7aw, haysa be7adii? Yihuda asay ha ixetida eqa goyinnoy haysan ootheysi entaw laafaba gididee? Enti biitta geella ooson kunthidi, zaari zaaridi tana hanqethanaw bessii? Enti bantaw danda7etida mela tana iissidi cayoosona.
EZE 8:18 Hesaa gisho, ta entara hanqon gahetana; ta entaw qadhetike; entafe issuwaka ashshike. Enti banta qaala dhoqa oothidi waassinka, ta enta si7ike” yaagis.
EZE 9:1 Hessafe guye, “Katamaa seeranaw dooretida asati, ola miishe banta kushen oykidi haa yoosona” yaagidi waassishin taani si7as.
EZE 9:2 Heko, wodhiya ola miishe banta kushen oykida usupun asati, Pudeha baggan de7iya qommo pengiyafe yidosona. Entara issife liinope oosetida ma7o ma7idi, ba miyen xaafiyabaa korojon oykida issi asi de7ees. Enti giddo gelidi, naase biratape oosetida yarsho bessa matan eqidosona.
EZE 9:3 Isra7eele Xoossaa bonchoy ba de7iya kiruubetape dendidi, Xoossaa keetha penge bis. Goday liino ma7idi, ba miyen xaafiyabaa korojon oykida addiya xeegidi,
EZE 9:4 “Yerusalaame katamaa giddo kanthada bashe, yan oosetiya ixetida eeqa goyinnuwa gisho azzanishenne oolishe de7iya asaa som7on malla wotha” yaagis.
EZE 9:5 Ta si7ishin, Xoossay haratako haysada yaagis: “Iya geedo kaallidi, katamaa giddo kanthidi wodhite. Issuwaka maaropite; oodeska qadhetofite.
EZE 9:6 Cimata, panthata, geela7ota, maccasatanne nayta ubbaa shukite; shin som7on malli de7iya ase oonaka bochofite. Ta keethan wodho doomite” yaagis. Enti Xoossaa keetha sinthan eqida cimatan wodho doomidosona.
EZE 9:7 Xoossay, “Bidi Xoossaa keetha tunisite; dabaabata ahan kunthite” yaagis. Enti keyidi, katamaa giddo ubban wodho doomidosona.
EZE 9:8 Enti wodhishin, taani tarka attada, ta som7uwara biittan gufannada, ta qaala dhoqu oothada, “Abeeti Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, neeni Yerusalaame bolla gussiya ne hanquwan Isra7eelepe attidaysata kumethi dhaysanee?” yaagas.
EZE 9:9 I zaaridi, “Isra7eelenne Yihuda asaa nagaray daro; biitta ubbay suuthan kumis. Katama ubban suure pirdi baawa. Asay, ‘Goday ha biitta aggis; Goday be7enna’ yaagosona.
EZE 9:10 Hessa gisho, ta entaw qadhetike; entana maarike. Taani enta ogiya mela entaw zaarana” yaagis.
EZE 9:11 Hessafe guye, liino ma7idi, ba miyen xaafiyabaa korojon oykida addey, guye simmidi, “Ne tana kiittidaysada oothas” yaagis.
EZE 10:1 Taani Kiruubeta huuphepe bolla baggara de7iya salo gufantho daaneysa be7as. Kirubeela bolla sanpare al7o shuchafe oosetida araata be7as.
EZE 10:2 Goday liino ma7ida addiyako, “Kirubeelape garsa baggara gertota giddora kanthada ba. Xiifa bonqo ne kushen kopheta ekada, katamaa bolla laalla” yaagis. Ta xeellishin tama ekanaw gelis.
EZE 10:3 Addey soo geliya wode Kirubeeti Xoossa keethafe garsa baggara eqidosona; giddo dabaaban shaari kumis.
EZE 10:4 Godaa bonchoy Kirubeela bollafe dendidi, Xoossa keetha penge bis. Shaari keethaa kumis; dabaabay Godaa boncho phoolethan kumis.
EZE 10:5 Kirubeela qefiya girsay Ubbaa Haariya Godaa girsada kare dabaaban si7etees.
EZE 10:6 Goday liino ma7ida addiya, “Kirubeela garsa baggan de7iya gertota giddofe tama eka” yaagidi kiittin, I gelidi issi gertuwa matan eqis.
EZE 10:7 Kirubeelape issoy banta giddon de7iya taman ba kushiya yeddidi, iyape guuthara ekidi, liino ma7ida addiya kushen wothin, I ekidi keyis.
EZE 10:8 Kirubeela qefiyape garsa baggara asa kushe daaniyabay de7ees.
EZE 10:9 Ta xeelliya wode Kirubeela matan oyddu gertoy de7ees. Issi issi Kiruubiya matan issi issi gertoy de7eysa be7as; he gertoy al7o shuchada phoolees.
EZE 10:10 Enti oydday issoy issuwa daanosona; issi issi gertoy hara gerto giddora kanthi aadhidi medhetida daanees.
EZE 10:11 Kirubeeti biya wode oyddu bagga yaa haa simmonna boosona; issi gertoti bida ginde hanko gertoy yaa haa simmonna sitti gidi boosona.
EZE 10:12 Enta kumetha bolla, hessika enta zokuwan, enta kushiyan, enta qefiyaninne enta oyddu gertotan xeelliya ayfey kumis.
EZE 10:13 Ta si7ishin, gertoti yuuyiya gertota geetetidi xeegetidosona.
EZE 10:14 Issi issi Kiruubiyas oyddu som7oy de7ees. Koyro som7oy kiruube som7o, nam7anthoy asa som7o, heedzanthoy gaammo som7o; oyddanthoy argantha som7o.
EZE 10:15 Kiruubeti pude dendidosona. Enti taani Koboora shaafa matan be7ida de7on de7iya medhetathata.
EZE 10:16 Kiruubeti biya wode, enta miyen de7iya gertoti boosona; Kiruubeti biittafe pude dendanaw banta qefiya micciya wode gertoti enta miyepe shaaketokona.
EZE 10:17 De7on de7iya medhetethata ayyaanay gertota giddon de7iya gisho, enti eqiya wode gertoti eqoosona; enti biittafe pude dendiya wode enti dendoosona.
EZE 10:18 Hessafe guye, Godaa bonchoy Xoossa keetha pengefe dendidi, Kiruubetape bolla baggan eqis.
EZE 10:19 Ta xeellishin, Kiruubeti banta qefiya miccidi, kirikirotara issife biittafe pude dendidosona. Enti Xoossaa keethafe doloha bagga pengiya matan eqidosona. Isra7eele Xoossaa bonchoy entafe bolla baggara de7ees.
EZE 10:20 Enti Koboora shaafan Isra7eele Xoossaafe garsa baggara be7ida de7on de7iya medhetathata. Enti kiruubeta gideysa ta eras.
EZE 10:21 Enta ubbaas oyddu som7otinne, oyddu qefeti de7oosona; enta qefetape garsa baggara asa kushe daaniyabay de7ees.
EZE 10:22 Enta som7oti Koboora shaafa matan ta be7ida som7ota daanosona. Enti ubbay sitti gidi sinthe boosona.
EZE 11:1 Xoossa Ayyaanay tana denthidi, Xoossa keethas doloha bagga pengiyako efis. Pengiya matan laatamanne ichashu addeti de7oosona; enta giddon asaa kaalethiya Azuura na7aa Ya7izaana Banaya na7aa Palaxa be7as.
EZE 11:2 Goday taako, “Neno asa na7aw, ha asay katamaa bolla iita qofa qopoosona; iita zore zoretoosona.
EZE 11:3 Enti, ‘Nuuni keethe zaaridi keexana wodey matatis. Ha katamay asho xaaro; nuuni qassi asho’ yaagosona.
EZE 11:4 Hessa gisho, tinbite oda; asa na7aw, enta bolla tinbite oda” yaagis.
EZE 11:5 Godaa Ayyaanay ta bolla wodhidi, taako haysada yaagis: “Isra7eele asaw, hinte hessada geeta; shin ta hinte ay qopiyako erayis.
EZE 11:6 Ha kataman hinte daro asaa wodhidi, oge ubban aha kunthideta” yaagees.
EZE 11:7 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees; “Hinte wodhidi yeggida ahay asho; ha katamay asho xaaro; shin ta hintena ha katamaape yedethada kessana.
EZE 11:8 Hinte olas yayyideta; shin ta hinte yayyida olaa hinte bolla ehana.
EZE 11:9 Ta hintena ha katamaape kessada, allagatas aathada immana; ta hintena hinte zawan pirdana.
EZE 11:10 Hinte olan wurana; ta hintena hinte biittan pirdana. He wode hinte ta Godaa gideysa erana.
EZE 11:11 Ha katamay hintew asho xaaro gidenna; hinteka iya giddon asho gideketa. Ta hinte bolla Isra7eele zawan pirdana.
EZE 11:12 Hinte ta higgiyanne ta wogaa shaaridi hinte yuushuwan de7iya kawotethata wogaa mela de7ida gisho hinte bolla pirdey Godaa gideysa hinte erana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 11:13 Ta tinbite odiya wode Banaya na7aa Palaxi hayqin, taani gufannada, ta qaala dhoqu oothada, “Abeeti Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, Isra7eelepe attidaysata kumethi wursana hanayee?” yaagada waassas.
EZE 11:14 Godaa qaalay taako haysada yaagidi yis;
EZE 11:15 “Neno asa na7aw, Yerusalaamen de7iya Isra7eele asay nebaanne di7on de7iya ne dabbotabaa, ‘Enti Godaape haakidosona; ha biittay nuus laata gididi imetis’ ” yaagidi haasayoosona.
EZE 11:16 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Ta enta haahon de7iya kawotethata giddo yeddikoka, biitta ubban laallikoka, enti bida biittatan guutha wodes entara gidana” yaagees.
EZE 11:17 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Ta hintena kawotethatapenne hinte laaletida biittatape shiishana; Isra7eele biitta zaarada hintew immana.
EZE 11:18 Enti guye simmidi yaa wode tuna misiletanne eeqata biittafe dhaysana.
EZE 11:19 Taani entaw issi wozana immana; ooratha ayyaana enta giddon wothana. Entafe shucha wozanaa diggada, asho wozana entaw immana.
EZE 11:20 He wode enti ta higgiya kaallana; ta kiita naagana. Enti ta ase gidana; taani enta Xoossaa gidana.
EZE 11:21 Gidoshin, ixetida misiliyanne tuna eeqa goyinnanaw doseyisata taani enta oosuwada oothana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 11:22 He wode Kiruubeti banta qefiya miccidosona; enta miyen gertoti de7oosona. Isra7eele Xoossaa bonchoy entafe bollara de7ees.
EZE 11:23 Godaa bonchoy katamaa giddofe dendidi, doloha baggan de7iya zumaa bolla eqis.
EZE 11:24 Xoossaa Ayyaanay taw immida qoncethan Ayyaanay tana biittafe denthidi, Kaldaaweta biittan de7iya di7etidaysatako efis. Hessafe guye, qoncethay taape shaaketis.
EZE 11:25 Goday tana bessidaba ubbaa di7on de7eysatas odas.
EZE 12:1 Godaa qaalay taako haysada yaagidi yis;
EZE 12:2 “Neno asa na7aw, neeni geella asaa giddon de7aasa. Enti geella asi gidiya gisho entaw ayfey de7ees, shin demmokona; haythi de7ees, shin si7okona.
EZE 12:3 Hessa gisho, asa na7aw, di7on biya asada, neeni efanaw danda7iyaba ubba shiisha qachada, gallas enti be7ishin keyada, ne de7iya bessaafe hara bessi ba. Ooni eri enti geella asi gidikoka akeekana.
EZE 12:4 Gallas enti xeellishin, di7o biya asada, ne qachidaba kare kessa; omarsi enti xeellishin, di7etidi biya asada keya.
EZE 12:5 Enti xeellishin, ne keethaa godaa lukada xoo7iyara keya.
EZE 12:6 Ne kessida miishiya enti xeellishin, ne hashen tookada, lem7ishin dendada ba. Ne awu biyako be7onna mela ne som7uwa kamma. Ne haniyabay Isra7eele asaas malla gidana” yaagis.
EZE 12:7 Taani I tana kiittidaysada oothas. Di7etidi biya asada, gallas ta qachidaba kare kessas. Omarsi ta keetha godaa ta kushen lukada keyas; ta kessida miishiya enti xeellishin, ta hashen tookada, lem7ishin bas.
EZE 12:8 Wonta guura Godaa qaalay taako haysada yaagidi yis.
EZE 12:9 “Neno asa na7aw, geella Isra7eele asay, ‘Ne oothiyabay aybee?’ gidi nena oychibookona?
EZE 12:10 Entaw Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada oda. ‘Ha tinbitey Yerusalaamen de7iya halaqabaanne Isra7eele asaaba odees.’
EZE 12:11 Ne haniyabay entaw malla gideysa oda; enti di7etidi hara biitta baana.
EZE 12:12 Enta giddon de7iya halaqay godaa lukidi ba miishiya ba hashen tookidi, lem7ishin baana; biitta be7onna mela ba som7uwa kammana.
EZE 12:13 Ta gite iya sinthan yeggada oykana. Taani iya Kaldaaweta biitta Babiloone katamaa ehana; shin I he katamaa be7onna hayqana.
EZE 12:14 Iya yuushon de7iya iya maaddeysatanne iya olanchota ubbaa ta ubba bessi piski oothana; ta enta mashshan yedethana.
EZE 12:15 “Enta ta hara biittatanne kawotethata giddo laaliya wode ta Godaa gideysa enti he wode erana.
EZE 12:16 Enti biiya kawotethata giddon banta tuna ooso paaxana mela entafe guuthata olape, koshapenne hargepe attidi akekanada oothana. Ta Godaa gideysa enti he wode erana” yaagis.
EZE 12:17 Godaa qaalay taako haysada yaagidi yis;
EZE 12:18 “Neno asa na7aw, ne kathaa dagaman ma; ne haathaa yashshan kokorashe uya.
EZE 12:19 Biittan de7iya asaako haysada yaaga. Ubbaa Haariya Goday Isra7eele biittan de7iya Yerusalaame asaaba haysada yaagees: ‘Biittan de7iya asa ubbay gene oothiya gisho enta biittay kallo attana, enti banta uythaa hirgan maana; banta haatha dagaman uyana.
EZE 12:20 Ha77i asi kumida katamati dhayana; biittay baysa gidana. Taani Godaa gideysa enti he wode erana’ ” yaagees.
EZE 12:21 Godaa qaalay taako haysada yaagidi yis;
EZE 12:22 “Neno asa na7aw, hinte Isra7eele biittan, wode aduqis qoncethi ubbay hada gidis aadhis yaagidi leemisey I aybee?
EZE 12:23 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees; ‘Taani ha leemisoy nam7antho odetonna mela oothana; enti zaaridi, Isra7eele biittan leemisokona’ yaagees. ‘Gallasay matatis; qoncethi ubbay poletana hanees’ yaaga.
EZE 12:24 Hizape guye Isra7eele asaa giddon wordo qoncethinne murunno deenna.
EZE 12:25 Ta Goday odanaw koydaba odana; hessika gam7onna poletana. Hinteno, geellato, ta odiyaba ubbaa hinte laythan polana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 12:26 Qassika Godaa qaalay taako haysada yaagidi yis.
EZE 12:27 “Neno asa na7aw, Isra7eele asay, ‘I be7ida qoncethaynne I odiya tinbitey daro laythafe guye hananaba’ yaagidi odoosona.
EZE 12:28 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: ‘Ta odiya qaalay poletanaape attishin, issoyka gam7enna’ ” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 13:1 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 13:2 “Neno asa na7aw, Isra7eelen tinbite odiya nabeta bolla ne tinbite oda. Bantaw medhi kessidi tinbite odeyisata haysada yaaga; Godaa qaala si7ite.
EZE 13:3 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: ‘Aybaka be7onna banta qofan dendidi tinbite odiya eeya nabeta ayye!’
EZE 13:4 Isra7eele asaw, hinte nabeti laaletida kataman de7iya workanata mela.
EZE 13:5 Godaa gallasan olan minnidi eqana mela Isra7eele asaa dirsa gimbiya minthidi essibeeketa; pude laaletida bessaa keybeketa.
EZE 13:6 Enta qoncethaynne enta bitay wordo. Enti Goday kiittonnashin, Goday haysada yaagees yaagosona. Enti odeysa Goday polana gidi naagoosona.
EZE 13:7 Taani odonnashin, Goday haysada yaagees yaagidi odiyanne wordo qoncethi be7eysatanne muranchota gideketii?” yaagees.
EZE 13:8 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees; “Hinte be7ida qoncethanne hinte odida tinbitey wordo gidiya gisho ta hintew morke gidana.
EZE 13:9 Wordo qoncethi be7iyanne muranchiya nabeta bolla taani ta kushiya denthana. Enti ta asaa zoretan gelokona; Isra7eele asaa mazgaben xaafetokona; enti Isra7eele biitta gelokona. He wode ta Ubbaa Haariya Godaa gideysa hinte erana.
EZE 13:10 “Saroy baynashin sa7i saro yaagidi ta asaa balethoosona. Asay shuchu keelidi doorin, enti booqinte tiyoosona.
EZE 13:11 Ha booqinte tiyeysatas; ha hinte tiyida gimbey kundana; wolqaama iri bukana. Taani gita shachi yeggana; wolqaama gotey dendana.
EZE 13:12 He gimbey kundiya wode asay hinte tiyida nooray anee? yaagidi oychonna aggane” yaagees.
EZE 13:13 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Taani gimbiya laallanaw; ta hanquwan wolqaama gote yeddana; ta yiluwan gita shacha kiittana, ta sheniyan wolqaama ira bukisana.
EZE 13:14 Hinte booqinte tiyida gimbiya ta mentherethana; baasoy bentana gakanaw laallana. I kundiya wode hinte iya giddon hayqana; he wode taani Godaa gideysa hinte erana.
EZE 13:15 Ta hanqoy gimbiya bollanne gimbiya booqinte tiyida asata bolla wodhana. Ta hinteko, ‘Gimbey baawa; gimbiya booqinte tiyidaysatika dookona.
EZE 13:16 Isra7eelen de7iya nabeti, Yerusalaameba tinbite odeysati, saroy baynashin saro qoncethi be7eysati dookona’ ” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 13:17 “Neno asa na7aw, banta qofan dendidi, tinbite odiya maccasa dereeqa xeellada enta bolla tinbite oda.
EZE 13:18 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: ‘Hara asa bolla wolqi daanada, enta hashiya bolla murunnoba sikiyanne asas ubbaas biitta qace giigisiya maccasa ayye! Hinte ta asaa xihen oykidi hinte shempuwa ashshanee?
EZE 13:19 Issi kophe banga woyko issi baso uythi demmanaw, yeellayaba oothidi, ta asaa sinthan tana kawushsheeta. Hinte hayqanaw bessonnayisata wodhidi daanaw bessonnayisata ashsheeta. Yaatidi ta asaa wordo odeeta; entika hinte worduwa si7oosona’ ” yaagees.
EZE 13:20 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Hintew hara asaa bolla wolqi daana mela hinte kushen qachida murunnuwa qacciya ta dafa ekana. Ta iya hinte kushiyape duutha holana; xihepe kessi ekiya kafoda ta enta hinte xihiyape kessa ekana.
EZE 13:21 Taani hinte shaashiya qaara ekada, ta asaa merinaw hinte kushepe ashshana. Taani Godaa hinte he wode erana.
EZE 13:22 Taani azzanthaboonna xillo asaa wozanaa hinte wordon azzanthideta; nagaranchoti banta iita oosuwape simmidi, banta shempuwa ashshona mela enta minthideta.
EZE 13:23 Hizape hinte wordo qoncethi be7eketa; murunneketa. Taani ta asaa hinte kushepe kessa ekana. Taani Godaa gideysa hinte he wode erana” yaagees.
EZE 14:1 Isra7eele cimatape issoti issoti taako yidi, ta sinthan uttidosona.
EZE 14:2 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 14:3 “Asa na7aw, ha asati banta wozanan eeqa essidosona; enta nagaray entaw dhube shuchi gidis. Yaatin, enti tana oychana mela oothoyee?”
EZE 14:4 Ne entaw Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada oda; “Isra7eele asaape oonika eeqa ba wozanan wothidi, iya nagaray iyaw dhube shuchu gidin, nabe oychanaw biiko, taani ta huuphen iya eeqata darotethaada iyaw zaarana.
EZE 14:5 He eeqati Isra7eele asaa taape haassidosona; shin ha77i ta entaw immiya zaaruwan enta wozanaa taako zaarana” yaagees.
EZE 14:6 “Hessa gisho, Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda. Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees; nagara paaxite; hinte eeqa aggite; hinte tuna ooso ubbaafe simmite.
EZE 14:7 “Isra7eele asaa gidin woyko Isra7eele biittan de7iya allaga biitta asaa gidin, taape haakidi, ba wozanan eeqa wothidi, iya nagaray iyaw dhube shuchu gidin, tana zore oychanaw nabeko biiko, taani Goday ta huuphen iyaw zaaro immana.
EZE 14:8 Taani he uraa morkana; ta iya asa malasinne miichas ashshana; taani iya ta asaa giddofe dhaysana; ta Godaa gideysa hinte he wode erana.
EZE 14:9 Issi nabey cimetidi tinbite odiko, he nabey odana mela cimmiday tana Godaa. Taani iya bolla ta kushiya wothada, ta asaa giddofe iya dhaysana.
EZE 14:10 Enti banta nagara seera tookana; nabeynne nabiya oycheysi issi gina seeretana.
EZE 14:11 Hizape guye Isra7eele asay oge baletidi taape haakenna; banta nagaran bantana tunisokona. Enti ta ase gidana; taanika enta Xoossaa gidana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 14:12 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis:
EZE 14:13 “Asa na7aw, issi biitta asay nagara oothidi, taw ammanetona ixiko, taani ta kushiya denthada, enta kathaa dhaysada, kosha ehana; asaanne mehiya wodhana.
EZE 14:14 Hari attoshin ha heedzu asati Nohey, Daanelinne Iyyobi he biittan de7iyakoka, enti banta xillotethan banta shempuwa xalaala ashshana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 14:15 “Taani enta biitta bolla wora do7ata yeddada, he biittay asi baynanne oonika kanthonna mela he biitta baysa oothana.
EZE 14:16 Taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday ta de7uwan caaqas. Hari attoshin, ha heedzu asati he biittan de7iyakoka, enti banta nayta ashshanaw danda7okona. Enti bantaw attana; shin biittay baysa gidana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 14:17 “Taani he biitta bolla toora yeddada, yan de7iya asaanne mehiya wodhiko,
EZE 14:18 taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday ta de7uwan caaqas. Ha heedzu asati he biittan de7iyakoka, banta nayta ashshanaw danda7okona. Enti bantaw attana” yaagees Goday.
EZE 14:19 “Taani he biitta bolla iita harge yeddada, ta hanquwan suuthi gukana mela oothiko, yan de7iya asaanne mehiya wodhiko,
EZE 14:20 taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday ta de7uwan caaqas. Hari attoshin, Nohey, Daanelinne Iyyobi he biittan de7iyakoka, enti banta xillotethan banta shempuwa ashshanaape attishin, banta nayta ashshokona” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 14:21 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees; “Taani asaanne mehiya wodhanaw Yerusalaame bolla oyddu iita pirdata: toora, kosha, wora do7atanne harge yeddana.
EZE 14:22 Gidoshin, attidi keyida guutha asati; macca naytinne adde nayti yaape keyana. Enti hinteko yaa wode enta hanotaanne enta oosuwa hinte be7idi, ta Yerusalaame bolla ehida gadoy like gideysa akeekana.
EZE 14:23 Hinte enta hanotaanne enta oosuwa be7idi, ta enta bolla coo pirdonnaysa erana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 15:1 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 15:2 “Asa na7aw, woyney woran de7iya hara mithafe aybin aadhii?
EZE 15:3 Go77i de7iya ba oothanaw qanxetidi eriyee? Aykoba kaqiya kocaa iyape kessanaw danda7eetii?
EZE 15:4 Iya tama oysethanaw taman yeggin, xeeraynne dulley taman meetetin attida dunchay ay maaddanee?
EZE 15:5 Xuugetonna de7ishe, ayko maaddonnaysi tami min miccidi ay maaddanee?”
EZE 15:6 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Taani woran de7iya mithaa giddofe woyne mithaa tamas aathada immidaysada Yerusalaamen de7iya asaa hessada oothana.
EZE 15:7 Taani ta som7uwa enta bolla zaarana; enti issi tamape keykoka, hara tami enta maana. Taani ta som7uwa enta bolla zaariya wode taani Godaa gideysa hinte erana.
EZE 15:8 Enti tanan ammanetona aggida gisho ta enta biitta baysa kessana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 16:1 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 16:2 “Asa na7aw, Yerusalaame iya tuna oosota erisa.
EZE 16:3 Ubbaa Haariya Goday Yerusalaameko haysada yaagees. Ne mayzanne ne sheeshay Kanaane biittana; ne aaway Amoore; ne aayiya Hite asi.
EZE 16:4 Ne yellatiya gallas ne gul7ay qanxetibnna; woyko nena geeshshanaw haathan meecetabaaka; woyko maxinen gorpetada curqan xaaxetabaaka.
EZE 16:5 Ha geetetidaysatape hari attoshin issuwa oothanaw new mishetiday baawa. Ne yeletida gallas boretida gisho wora yegetadasape attishin, new oonika qadhetibeenna.
EZE 16:6 “Ta yaara aadhiya wode neeni ne suuthan iitada zohetishin be7ada, neeni ne suuthan zin7ida de7ishin, ‘De7on de7a’ yaagas.
EZE 16:7 Ta nena aradda biittan de7iya kathada dichas. Neeni dicca aduqada, gamma gakadasa. Ne dhanthay uttis; ne huuphey diccis; shin ne kallo de7aasa.
EZE 16:8 “Zaarada ta yaara aadhashe nena xeelliya wode, neeni gelos gakada, kallo borsetiya ase gidadasa. Ta afila maccara ne bolla yeggada, ne kalluwa kammas; ta neera caaqada nena taw buzo oothas” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 16:9 “Suuthan iitida ne asatethaa haathan meecca geeshshada, zayten tiyas.
EZE 16:10 Taani nena alleeqo ma7o mayzas; lo77o galbafe oosetida caamma aasisas; liino shaashe nena qacisas; al7o kuta qulintisas.
EZE 16:11 Nena alleequwan alleeqisas; ne kushen sagaayo aathas; ne qoodhiya worqan mayzas.
EZE 16:12 Ne sidhene, ne haythan worqa, ne huuphen lo77o kallacha wothas.
EZE 16:13 Ne worqaninne biran alleeqetadasa; ne ma7o ubbay al7o liino, al7o kutanne alleeqo qamise. Ne miya kathay lo77o dhiille, eessinne zayte. Neeni daro puulatada, kawo gidanaw gakadasa.
EZE 16:14 Ta new immida bonchuwa gaason, ne daro puulatida gisho kawotethata ubban eretadasa” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 16:15 “Shin neeni ne puulan ammanetada, haratan eretida gisho ogera aadhiya ubbaas nena aatha immadasa.
EZE 16:16 Ne ma7uwape baggaa ekada, ne goyinno bessata alleeqisadasa; yan laymatadasa. Hessa melabay haysafe kase hanibeenna; sinthafeka hananaw bessenna.
EZE 16:17 Ta new immida worqafenne birape oosetida lo77o alleeqo, adde misileta oothada entara laymatadasa.
EZE 16:18 Ta immida alleeqo ma7uwa he misileta mayzadasa; ta zaytiyanne ta ixaaniya entaw shiishadasa.
EZE 16:19 Ta new immida lo77o dhiilliya, zaytiyanne eessa enta sinthan sawo tonku giya yarsho oothada shiishadasa” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 16:20 Ne laymatethay guuxibeenashin, ne taw yelida adde naytanne macca nayta efada, eeqatas yarshadasa.
EZE 16:21 Ne ta nayta shukada, eeqatas taman yarshadasa.
EZE 16:22 Ne tunatethaaninne ne laymatethan ubban de7ashe, kase ne yalagatetha laytha, kallo suuthan muuketada zohetiya wodiya dogadasa.
EZE 16:23 Ubbaa Haariya Goday, “Ayye! Nena ayye!” yaagees. Ha iitatetha ubbaa bolla gujada,
EZE 16:24 dabaaba ubban dhoqa eeqa goyinniya bessata new giigisadasa.
EZE 16:25 Oge doonan laymatiya bessata keexada, ne puula tunisadasa; ogera aadhiya ubbaas ne asatethaa aatha immada, laymatethi darsadasa.
EZE 16:26 Neeni amon kumida, ne shooro gidida Gibxetara laymatadasa; ne laymatethan tana yiloyadasa.
EZE 16:27 Hessa gisho, taani ta kushiya ne bolla denthas; nena gakiya ne anjuwa guuthas. Taani nena ne poko hanotan yeellatiya, nena morkiya Filisxeemetas aathada immas.
EZE 16:28 Ne alonna asi gidiya gisho, Asoore asaara laymatadasa. He ubban taw gidana gabaaka.
EZE 16:29 Zal7en aqiya Kaldaawetara laymatadasa, shin hessi taw gidana gabaaka.
EZE 16:30 Ubbaa Haariya Goday, “Neeni yeelli bayna layma maccasada haniyara, ne aybi laafa ase!
EZE 16:31 Neeni oge doonan laymatiya bessata new keexiya wodenne dabaaba ubban eeqas goyinniya bessata giigisadasa. Gidoshin, hara layma maccasati ekiya miishe ekabaaka.
EZE 16:32 Neeni ba azinay de7ishin, allaga addetara laymatiya maccasa mela.
EZE 16:33 Layma maccasas miishey qanxetees, shin neeni ne laggethotas imota immaasa; enti ubba bessafe neeko yaana mela entaw miishe immaasa.
EZE 16:34 Neeni laymatiya hara maccasatape dumma; neera laymatanaw nena kaalliya oonika baawa. Neeni gede imota immasape attishin, haa ekaka; neeni haratape dumma” yaagees.
EZE 16:35 Neno, layma yerusalaame Godaa qaala si7a.
EZE 16:36 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees; “Neeni ne laymatetha amuwan ne laggethotas ne asatethaa qaarida gisho, ne eeqata ubba gishonne ne nayta suuthaa ne entaw gussida gisho,
EZE 16:37 ne entan ufaytida ne laggethota ubbaa, ne doseysatanne ne ixeyisata ta new morke oothada shiishana. Taani enta dumma dumma bessafe ne yuushuwan shiishada, enta sinthan nena qaarana; enti ne kalluwa be7ana.
EZE 16:38 Taani layma maccasata bollanne suuthu gussiya maccasata bolla pirdeysada ne bolla pirdana; ta hanquwaninne ta qaanatiyan ne bolla hayqo ehana.
EZE 16:39 Ta nena ne laggethotas aathada immana; enti ne laymatiya bessatanne eeqa goyinno bessata laallana. Enti ne ma7uwa qaaridi, ne lo77o alleequwa ekidi, nena xire kallo ashshana.
EZE 16:40 Nena shuchan caddidi, mashshan qanxerethidi wodhiya asaa ne bolla enti denthethana.
EZE 16:41 Enti ne keethaa xuuggidi, daro maccasa sinthan ne bolla pirdana. Ta ne laymatetha agisana; ne laggethotas gede miishe qanxaka.
EZE 16:42 Hessan ne bolla de7iya ta yiloy irxana; ta qanaatiya neepe haassana; hizape si77i gaana; zaarada hanqetike.
EZE 16:43 Neeni ne na7atetha laytha dogada, ha iita ooso ubban tana hanqethadasa. Hessa gisho, ne oothidaba ubbaa ta ne bolla zaarana. Ne tuna ooso ubbaa bolla laymatethi ayis gujadiii?” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 16:44 “Yerusalaame, asay nena, ‘Na7iya aaye mala’ gidi leemisana.
EZE 16:45 Tuma neeni ba azinaanne ba nayta shaatetiya ne aaye mela; banta azinatanne banta nayta shaatetiya ne micheta mela; ne aayiya Hite asi; ne aaway Amoore asi.
EZE 16:46 Ne bayra michiya, ba gutaraa neepe pudeha baggan de7iya Samaarenne I macca nayta; ne kaalo michiya ba gutaraa neepe dugeha baggan de7iya Soodomenne I macca nayta.
EZE 16:47 Ne enta ogiya kaallada enta tuna oosota polo xalaala gidonashin, guutha woden entafe aadhada iita oothadasa.
EZE 16:48 “Taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday ta de7uwan caaqas. Neeninne ne gutan de7eysati oothidaysada ne michiya Soodomenne I macca nayti oothibookona.
EZE 16:49 Ne michiya Soodome oothida nagaray haysa: iyanne I macca nayti otorancho, enti kallidaysatanne inje duussu de7ikoka enti metootanchotanne manqota maaddibokona.
EZE 16:50 Enti otorancho gididi, ta sinthan tuna ooso oothidosona. Hessa gisho, hinte be7idaysata ta enta dhaysas.
EZE 16:51 “Samaarey ne oothida nagaras baggaaka oothabuuku; ne iipe aadhada shaatiya tuna oothadasa. Ne oothida tuna oosota ubbaa gaason ne micheti xillo azzanana mela oothadasa.
EZE 16:52 Neeni ne micheta suure asi kessida gisho yeella ma7a. Ne nagaray entaysafe aadhidi iitin, enti neepe xillo daanidosona. Hessa gisho, kawuyada yeella ma7a.
EZE 16:53 “Gidoshin, Soodomenne I macca nayta, Samaarenne I macca nayta taani enta shaluwa zaariya wode ne shaluwaka zaarana.
EZE 16:54 Neban neeni daro yeellatana; ne kawushatethay daro gidiya gisho ne micheti hessan minettana.
EZE 16:55 Ne micheti, Soodome ba gutataranne Samaariya ba macca naytara banta kase duusako simmana; neka ne macca naytara kase ne duussako simmana.
EZE 16:56 Ne otortiya wode ne miche Soodomi bolla qelqisabikii?
EZE 16:57 Hessi haniday ne nagaray qoncanaape kase gidennee? Ha77i neeni ne yuushuwan de7iya Edoomes michetisnne I shoorotas, Filisxeemesinne I miche naytas; hessadaka nena ixiya ubbaas bores attadasa.
EZE 16:58 Ne laymatetha gishonne ne tuna oosota gisho ne seeretana” yaagees Goday.
EZE 16:59 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees; “Neeni ufaysa qaala menthada, caaquwa laallida gisho ne oothida oosuwada ta new oothana.
EZE 16:60 Gidoshin, ta ne na7atetha wodiyan neera caaqida caaqo qaala hassayana; merinaw neera caaqana.
EZE 16:61 Ne bayranne ne kaalo micheta ta neeko ehiya wode neeni ne hemethaa hassayada yeellatana. Shin hessi ta neera caaqida caaquwa mela gidonna ixikoka, ta enta new na7a oothada immana.
EZE 16:62 Taani ta caaquwa neera oorathana; he wode ta Godaa gideysa ne erana.
EZE 16:63 Ne oothida nagaraa ubbaa taani atto giya wode ne oothidaba hassayada, yeellas ne doona oykana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 17:1 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagidi taako yis:
EZE 17:2 “Asa na7aw, Isra7eele asaas qan7ishin oda; leemison qoncisa.
EZE 17:3 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada oda. ‘Gita qefeynne dumma dumma mallara de7iya baalleti de7iya issi arganthi de7ees. He arganthay Libaanose yidi ziga xeeran oykis.
EZE 17:4 He zigaa xeera menthi ekidi, zal7ey dariya biitta efidi zal7anchota kataman tokis.
EZE 17:5 I Isra7eele biittafe aaca efidi, aradda biittan, haatha matan tokis.
EZE 17:6 Aacay daro aduqonna de7ishe daayidi arganthaako simmidi diccis; shin iya xaphoy biitta giddo gelis. He woyney daro tashenne haythe kessis.
EZE 17:7 Hessadaka, gita qefeynne daro baalleti de7iya hara arganthi de7ees. Haathe demmanaw he woyney ba toketida bessafe he arganthay de7iya bessaako ba xaphuwanne ba tashiya yeddis.
EZE 17:8 Shin, he woyney tashe kessana mela, ayfe ayfana melanne lo77o woyne gidana mela aradda biittan, daro haathi de7iya bessan toketis’ ” yaagees.
EZE 17:9 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada oda. “He woyney diccanee? Koyro iya tokida arganthay iya shoddenee? Iya ayfeta qoqofidi, iya irxa haythata melisennee? Iya he bessaafe xaphora shoddanaw gita wolqaa woyko daro asi koshshenna.
EZE 17:10 Iya shoddidi, hara bessan tokiyako I diccanee? Doloha bagga carkoy shocin ba toketida bessan melennee?”
EZE 17:11 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis:
EZE 17:12 “He leemisuwa birshethay aybeko ane ha geella asata oycha. Hessi aybe giiko, Babiloone kawoy Yerusalaame yidi, enta kawaanne enta halaqata di77idi, Babiloone efis.
EZE 17:13 Kawa soo asaape issuwa ekidi, baara caaqisidi, asaa giddofe eretidaysata di77idi efis.
EZE 17:14 Hessa oothiday enta kawotethay wolqa dhayidi, zaaridi dendonnaada banta caaquwa xalaala naagidi daana melasa.
EZE 17:15 Shin Yihuda kawoy makallidi, paratanne daro olanchota yeddana mela Gibxe kiittis. Yaatin hessi hanandee? Hessa oothida I kessi ekandee? I caaquwa menthidi seerettonna attandee?”
EZE 17:16 “Taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday ta de7uwan caaqas. Bana kawothida kawa caaquwa menthida gishonne caaquwa kadhida gisho, he kawa biittan, Babiloonen I hayqana.
EZE 17:17 Babiloone olanchoti daro asaa wodhanaw gimbiya yuushon biitta dooridi dirsi giigisiya wode, Gibxe kawoy ba olanchotaranne ba daro asaara yidi aykoka maaddenna.
EZE 17:18 I caaqo kadhidi menthida gishonne ba kushiya immidi, ba gida ba ubba polonna aggida gisho kessi ekanaw danda7enna.”
EZE 17:19 “Taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday ta de7uwan caaqas. I caaquwa kadhidi ta caaquwa menthida gisho ta sunthan caaqidas ta iya bolla zaarada ehana.
EZE 17:20 Taani ta gitiya iya bolla miccin, I ta xihiyan oyketana. I taw ammanetona ixida gisho ta iya Babiloone efada, yan iya bolla pirdana.
EZE 17:21 Dooretida iya olanchoti mashshan hayqana; attidaysati dumma dumma bessara laaletana.” Hessa odey tana, Godaa gideysa hinte erana.
EZE 17:22 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees; “Taani ta huuphen adussa ziga xeera qanxa ekada, dhoqanne adussa zumaa huuphen tokana.
EZE 17:23 Taani iya Isra7eele zumaa huuphen tokana; yan daayana; ayfe ayfananne lo77o ziga gidana. Kafo koche ubbay iyan keexana; enti iya tashiya kuyan shempana.
EZE 17:24 Adussa mithaa ziqi ootheynne qantha mithaa dhoqu oothey, qassi cil7o mithaa meliseynne mela mithaa aacisey tana Godaa gideysa biittan de7iya mitha ubbay erana. Taani Goday haysa odas; ta odidaysa ta oothana” yaagees.
EZE 18:1 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 18:2 “Isra7eele biittaba asay, ‘Aawati qawu7e woyne min, nayta achay hayqis’ yaagidi odiya leemisoy aybee?
EZE 18:3 Taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday ta de7uwan caaqas. Hizape guye hinte Isra7eele biittan ha leemisuwa leemiseketa.
EZE 18:4 Asa ubbaa shempoy tabaa; aawa shempoynne na7aa shempoy tabaa. Nagara oothiya shempoy i, baw hayqana.
EZE 18:5 “Issi asi xillo gidiko, tuma pirdanne suureba oothiko,
EZE 18:6 I deriya bolla de7iya eeqa goyinniya bessan meenna; Isra7eele asaa eeqa goyinnenna; ba shooruwa machiw tunisenna; kushe metora de7iya maccara aqena;
EZE 18:7 Oonaka un7ethenna; acos oykidaba guye zaarees, bonqenna; koshatida asi muzees; kallotida asi mayzees;
EZE 18:8 ba miishiya yelora tal7ena; ba kushiya iitabaape naagees; ase sigethishe xillo pirdees.
