EZE 18:9 Ta higgiya naagees; ta wogaa ammanetethan polees; he uray xillo asi gidiya gisho I de7on daana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 18:10 Gidoshin, he uraas shempo wodhiya woyko kallidi de7eysatape issuwa oothiya iita na7i de7iko,
EZE 18:11 iya aaway haysatape issuwaka oothonna aggin, iya na7ay dere bolla eeqa goyinno bessatan miiko, asa macho tunisiko,
EZE 18:12 metootanchotanne manqota un7ethiko, bonqiko, acos oykidaba zaaronna ixiko, eeqa goyinniko, tunabaa oothiko,
EZE 18:13 ba miishiya yelora tal7idi wodhe ekiko, hessa mela asi de7on de7anee? I de7on deenna! I hessa mela tunabaa oothida gisho tuma hayqana; iya gomey iya oykana.
EZE 18:14 “Ha iita uraas na7i de7iko he na7ay ba aaway oothiya ha nagara ubbaa be7ishe, hessa melaba oothonna ixiko,
EZE 18:15 I dere bolla de7iya eeqa goyinno bessatan moonna ixiko, Isra7eele asaa eeqa goyinnona ixiko, ba laggiya machiw tunisonna ixiko,
EZE 18:16 oonaka un7ethonna ixiki, acos oykidaba guye zaariko, bonqona ixiko, koshatidaysa muziko, kallotidaysa mayziko,
EZE 18:17 Iita oosope ba kushiya teqiko wodhe ekanaw yelora tal7onna ixiko, ta higgiya naagiko, ta wogaa kaalliko, yaatiko, he na7ay de7on daanape attishin, ba aawa nagaraa gaason hayqenna.
EZE 18:18 Shin iya aaway asa maata sugida gisho, ba ishata bonqida gishonne ba asaa giddon iitaa oothida gisho ba nagaraa gaason hayqana.
EZE 18:19 “Shin hinte, ‘Na7ay ba aawa nagara gaason ayis seeretennee?’ ” yaageeta. Na7ay tuma pirdanne suure oothidi, ta higgiya minthidi naagiko, tuma de7on daana.
EZE 18:20 Nagara oothiya uray baw hayqana. Na7ay aawa nagaraa gaason seeretenna; hessadaka, aaway na7aa nagaraa gaason seeretenna. Xillo asi ba xillotethaa gatiya ekana; iita asi ba iitatethan seeretana.
EZE 18:21 Shin iita asi ba nagara ubbaafe simmidi, ta kiita naagiko tuma pirdaanne suure oothiko, I tuma de7on daanape attishin, hayqenna.
EZE 18:22 I oothida nagaraape issoyka qofetenna; ba oothida xillo oosuwa gaason I de7on daana.
EZE 18:23 Taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday, iita asi ba iita ogiyape simmidi, de7on de7eysan ufaytaysipe attishin, iya hayquwan ufaytike.
EZE 18:24 Shin xillo asi ba xillotethaa aggidi, iita asi oothiya tuna oosota ubba oothiko, I de7on daanee? Hanenna, I oothida xillo oosuwape issoyka qofetenna; I ammanetona ixida gishonne I oothida nagaraa gisho I hayqana.
EZE 18:25 Gidoshin, “Hinte, ‘Godaa ogey suure gidenna’ geeta. Isra7eele asaw, si7ite; suure gidonnay ta ogiyayee? Hinte ogiya gidennee?
EZE 18:26 Xillo asi ba xillotethaa aggidi, iita oothiya wode ba nagaran hayqees; ba oothida qohuwa gaason de7on de7ena.
EZE 18:27 Shin iita asi ba iitatethaa aggidi, tuma pirdanne suure oothiya wode ba shempuwa ashshana.
EZE 18:28 I ba oothida nagaraa qopidi guye simmida gisho, I tuma de7on daanape attishin, hayqenna.
EZE 18:29 Shin Isra7eele asay, ‘Godaa ogey suure gidenna’ yaagidosona. Isra7eele asaw, suure gidonnay ta ogiya? Hinte ogiya gidennee?
EZE 18:30 “Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, ta hintena hinte oosuwatho oosuwatho pirdana. Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees; nagari hintew dhayos gaaso gidonna mela paaxite; hinte bala ubbaafe simmite.
EZE 18:31 Hinte iita oosuwa ubba wora yeggidi, ooratha wozananne ooratha ayyaana ekite. Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, ayis hayqeetii?
EZE 18:32 Taani issi asa hayqonka ufaytike. Hessa gisho, hinte nagaraa paaxidi, de7on de7ite” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 19:1 Goday Hizqeelako, Isra7eele halaqatas haysada yaagada zeleela:
EZE 19:2 “Hinte aayiya gaammota giddon waanida gaammo! Yalaga gaammota giddon zin7ada, ba marata dichasu.
EZE 19:3 Iya ba maratape issuwa dichin, I wodala gaammo gidis; shanka tamaaris; ase muussu doomis.
EZE 19:4 Kawotethati ubbay iyabaa si7idosona; enti bookida ollan gelidi oyketis; siidhen wodoro aathidi Gibxe biitta efidosona.
EZE 19:5 Iya aayiya naagidaysi hanonna ixin, I ufaysay dhaydaysa be7ida wode, ba maratape issuwa dichada, wodala gaammo kessasu.
EZE 19:6 I wodala gaammo gididi, hara gaammota simeretis; I shanka tamaaris; ase muussu oykis.
EZE 19:7 I enta miixaa mentherethis; katamata dhaysis; I gudiya wode biittan de7iya asa ubbay dagammees.
EZE 19:8 Iya yuushuwan de7iya kawotethati ubbay iya oykanaw xihe wothidosona; banta gitiya miccidosona; enta ollan I oyketis;
EZE 19:9 Enti iya sidhen wodoro aathidi hoothen yeggidi, Babiloone kawako efidosona. I gudeysi zaaridi Isra7eelen si7etonna mela enti iya qasho keethan yeggidosona.
EZE 19:10 Ne aayiya haatha doonan toketida woyne mela; daro haathi de7iya gisho woyney daashshaninne ayfen kumidi de7ees.
EZE 19:11 Iya tasheti mino gidiya gisho kawota xam7a gididosona. Woyney woran de7iya mithatape aadhidi diccis; ba tashiya darotethaaninne adussatethan ubbaafe bollara bentis.
EZE 19:12 Shin he woyney hanqon shodetidi sa7an yegetis; doloha carkoy iya ayfiya melisis; iya mino tashey melin tami mis.
EZE 19:13 Ha77i I haathi bayna mela biittan toketis.
EZE 19:14 Tami iya ubbaafe keyidi, iya ayfiyanne tashiya mis. Kawota xam7a gidana mino tashey, iya bolla bentibeenna. Haysi yeeho zelelsi; haysa zelelsi kessiya wode go7etanaw bessees” yaagis.
EZE 20:1 Nu di7etida laapuntho laythan, ichashantho ageenan, tammantho gallasan, Isra7eele cimatape guuthati Godaa sheniya oychanaw yidi, ta sinthan uttidosona.
EZE 20:2 He wode Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis;
EZE 20:3 “Asa na7aw, Ubbaa Haariya Goday, Isra7eele cimatako Goday haysada yaagees yaaga: ‘Hinte ta sheniya oychanaw yidetii? Taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday ta de7uwan caaqas: hinte tana oychana mela ta koyke.’
EZE 20:4 “Asa na7a ne enta bolla pirdanee? Tuma enta bolla pirdanee? Hessa gidiko, enta mayzata tuna oosuwa enta erisa.
EZE 20:5 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada entaw oda. ‘Taani Isra7eele doorida wode ta kushiya denthada Yayqooba zerethas caaqas. Taani tanatethaa Gibxe biittan entaw qoncisas. Ta kushiya denthada, taani Godaa, hinte Xoossa.
EZE 20:6 Ta hintena Gibxefe kessada, hintew doorida biitta, maathinne eessi goggiya biitta, hara biitta ubbaafe aadhida lo77o biitta ehana’ gada caaqas.
EZE 20:7 Ta entako, ‘Hinte issoy issoy dosiya tuna eeqata diggite; Gibxe eeqatan hintena tunisopite. Taani Godaa hinte Xoossaa’ ” yaagas.
EZE 20:8 Gidoshin, enti taw makallidi, ta odiyaba si7onna ixidosona. Enti banta amotida tuna eeqata diggibookona; Gibxe eeqata goyinno aggibokona. Hessa gisho, enti Gibxen de7ishin, ta hanquwa enta bolla gussanaw qopas. Ta sheniya wursanaw qofa qachas.
EZE 20:9 Shin enti de7iya kawotethata giddoninne Isra7eele asaa Gibxefe kessanaw caaqiya wode ta tanatethaa erisida asaa sinthan ta sunthay tunonna mela oothas.
EZE 20:10 Hessa gisho, ta enta Gibxefe kessada mela biitta ehas.
EZE 20:11 Kiitetiya ubbaas de7o immiya ta higgiya entaw immas; ta wogaa enta tamaarsas.
EZE 20:12 Enta geeshshey tana Godaa gideysa enti erana mela, ta Sambaata taapenne entafe giddon malla oothada immas.
EZE 20:13 Shin Isra7eele asay mela biittan ta bolla makallidosona. Kiitetyida ubbaas de7o immiya ta higgiya menthidosona; ta wogaa kaallibookona; ta Sambaata tunisidosona. Taani mela biittan ta hanquwa enta bolla gussada enta dhaysanaw qopas.
EZE 20:14 Shin ta enta Gibxefe kessiya wode be7ida kawotethata sinthan ta sunthay tunonna mela enta dhaysabike.
EZE 20:15 Enti mela biittan de7ishin, entaw immida, hara biitta ubbaafe lo77o gidida maathinne eessi goggiya biitta, enta gelsike gada caaqas.
EZE 20:16 Hessi haniday enti eeqa goyinnidi, ta higgiya menthida gisho, ta wogaa kaalliboonna gishonne ta Sambaata tunisida gishosa.
EZE 20:17 Gidoshin, ta entaw qadhetida gisho, mela biittan enta wursa dhaysabike.
EZE 20:18 Enti mela biitta de7ishin, enta naytako haysada yaagas; “Hinte aawata wogaa kaallopite; enta higgiya naagopite; woyko enta eeqatan tunopite.
EZE 20:19 Taani Godaa hinte Xoossaa. Ta wogaas kiitetite; ta higgiya naagite.
EZE 20:20 Ta hintera caaqida caaquwas malla gidana melanne taani Godaa hinte Xoossaa gideysa hinte erana mela Sambaata dummayite” yaagas.
EZE 20:21 “Shin enta nayti ta bolla makallidosona; kiitetiya ubbaas de7o immiya ta wogaa menthidosona; ta higgiya naagibookona; ta Sambaata tunisidosona. Yaatin, mela biittan ta hanquwa enta bolla gussada ta yiloy wurana gakanaw entana dhaysanaw qopas.
EZE 20:22 Shin taani enta Gibxefe kessiya wode be7ida kawotethata sinthan ta sunthay tunonna mela enta dhaysabike.
EZE 20:23 Enta hara kawotethata giddonne dumma dumma biitta laallanaw mela biittan ta kushiya denthada caaqas.
EZE 20:24 Enti ta wogas kiitetonna ixidosona; ta higgiya menthidosona; ta Sambaata tunisidosona; banta aawata eeqa amotidosona.
EZE 20:25 Yaatin, entaw lo77o gidonna wogatanne de7o immonna higgeta immas.
EZE 20:26 Enti banta yarshuwan tunanaada, banta bayra nayta yarshanaada, ta enta yedda bessaas. Ta hessa oothiday enta daganthanaasanne taani Godaa gideysa enti erana melasa” yaagis.
EZE 20:27 “Hessa gisho, asa na7aw, Isra7eele asaas, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada oda: hessa oothidi hinte aawati ammanetona ixidi tana cayidosona.
EZE 20:28 Ta entaw immana gada ta kushiya dentha caaqida biitta enta ehida wode, enti dereta ubbanne irxa mitha ubba be7idosona. Yan banta yarshuwa yarshidosona. Banta, ixaaniyaninne ushsha yarshuwan tana yiloyidosona.
EZE 20:29 Taani, ‘Haysi hinte biya dhoqa bessay aybee?’ yaagada oychas. Hachi gakanaw he bessay ‘Bama’ geetetees iya birshethay ‘Dhoqa Goyinno Bessata’ geetetidi xeegetees” yaagees.
EZE 20:30 “Hessa gisho, Isra7eele asaas, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees yaagada oda: ‘Hinte mayzati oothida nagara oothidi, ayis hintena tuniseetii? Enta tuna eeqa goyinnanaw amotidi ayis kaalleetii?’
EZE 20:31 Hachika hinte yarshuwa yarshiya wode hinte nayta taman yarshidi, eeqa ubban hintena tuniseeta. Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, taani hintenan oysheto? Taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday ta de7uwan caaqas: ta hintenan oyshetike.
EZE 20:32 Hinte, ‘Nuuni mithinne shuchu goyinniya hara kawotethata melanne biittan de7iya hara asaa mela gidana yaagidi qopeeta. Shin hinte qofay polo hanenna.’ ”
EZE 20:33 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Ta mino qesiyan, ta micetida kushiyaninne ta hanquwan hinte bolla kawotana.
EZE 20:34 Kawotethata giddofe ta hintena kessana; hinte laaletida biitta ubbaafe ta mino qesiyan, ta micetida kushiyaninne ta hanquwan hintena shiishana.
EZE 20:35 Ta hintena ‘kawotethata mela biitta’ giya mela biitta ehada, hintena ta sinthan essada, hinte bolla pirdana.
EZE 20:36 Gibxe mela biittan hinte mayzata bolla pirdidaysada, hinte bolla pirdana.
EZE 20:37 Taani hintena ta kawotetha xam7a garsan haarana; hinte ta caaquwa naagana mela oothana.
EZE 20:38 Makallanchotanne nagaranchota ta hinte giddofe diggana; ha77i enti de7iya biittafe ta enta kessana. Shin enti Isra7eele biitta gelonna mela teqana; he wode taani Godaa gideysa hinte erana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 20:39 Isra7eele asaw, hinteko Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Ha77i ta odeysa hinte si7onna ixiko, ubbay bidi hinte eeqa goyinnite. Shin hizape guye, hinte imotaninne hinte eeqatan ta geeshsha sunthaa tunisopite.
EZE 20:40 Ta geeshsha zumaa bolla, dhoqa Isra7eele zumaa bolla hinte Isra7eele asay tana, Ubbaa Haariya Godaa goyinnana. Taani hintena ekana; hinte yarshuwa, hinte doorida imuwanne hinte geeshsha imuwa ta hintefe koyana.
EZE 20:41 Hinte laaletida kawotethata giddofe taani hintena ehiya wodenne hara biittatape ta hintena shiishiya wode sawo tonku geetetiya yarshoda ta hintena ekana. Kawotethati xeellishin, hinte giddon ta geeshshatetha qoncisana.
EZE 20:42 Kase hinte mayzatas immana gada ta kushiya denthada caaqida Isra7eele biitta hintena zaarada ehida wode taani Godaa gideysa hinte erana.
EZE 20:43 Hinte iita hanotaanne hinte tuna oosuwa hinte he bessan hassayana; hinte oothida iita ooso ubbaa hinte shaatettana.
EZE 20:44 Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, hinte iita hanota melanne hinte tuna oosuwa mela gidonashin, ta sunthaa gisho ta oothiya wode taani Godaa gideysa hinte erana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 20:45 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 20:46 “Asa na7aw, dugeha bagga simmada xeella; dugeha baggaas oda; dugeha wora bolla tinbite oda.
EZE 20:47 Dugeha woraas, Ubbaa Haariya Goday odiyaba si7a yaagada oda. ‘Ta ne giddon tama yeddana; he tamay cil7o mithaanne mela mithaa ubbaa maana. He eexiya tamay to7enna; dugehape bidi, pudeha bagga gakanaw de7iya asa som7o ubbaa he lacoy labana.
EZE 20:48 He tama oythiday tana Godaa gideysa asa ubbay be7ana. He tamay to7enna’ ” yaagees.
EZE 20:49 Taani zaarada, “Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, hessa oda gada tana kiittofa. Enti, ‘I ubba wode leemison odees gidennee?’ yaagosona” yaagas.
EZE 21:1 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 21:2 “Asa na7aw, ne som7uwa Yerusalaameko zaarada, asay goyinniya bessata bollanne Isra7eele biitta bolla tinbite oda.
EZE 21:3 Haysada yaaga: ‘Taani new morke. Taani ta mashsha shoohuwape shoddada, ne gidope xillo asaanne iita asa ubbaa wursana.
EZE 21:4 Xilluwanne nagaranchuwa ubba dhaysanaw dugehape pudeha gakanaw de7iya asa ubba bolla ta mashsha shoddana.
EZE 21:5 Taani Goday, ta mashsha shoohuwape shoddidaysanne guye zaaronnaysa asa ubbay erana’ ” yaagees.
EZE 21:6 “Hessa gisho, asa na7aw, asa ubbay xeellishin, ne wozanay meqin, cametada olla.
EZE 21:7 ‘Ayis oolay?’ yaagidi enti nena oychiko, ‘Sinthara yaa iita woriya gisho ollayis’ yaaga. He woriyan, ‘Wozani ubbay yashshan seerana; kushe ubbay argaacana; goobatethi ubbay eketana; gulbati ubbay kokorana. He wodey gakis; tuma poletana’ ” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 21:8 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis:
EZE 21:9 “Asa na7aw, tinbite oda; taani Goday odiyaba asaas oda; mashsha; leefetidanne qushetida mashsha.
EZE 21:10 “Gora7anaw leefetis; wol7antha mela phoolanaw qushetis. Ta asay imetida seera ixida gisho, hizape guye, oonika ufaytenna.
EZE 21:11 Go7etanaw mashshay qushetis; leefetidinne qushetidi, Gora7eysas imetanaasa.
EZE 21:12 Asa na7aw, yeekanne zeleela; ha mashshay giigetiday ta asaa bollanne Isra7eele halaqata bollana. Halaqati ta asaara issife mashshan hayqana; Hessa gisho, azzanada ne tiraa qoxa.
EZE 21:13 Taani ta asaa paacana; enti nagara paaxonna ixiko, ha metoy ubbay enta bolla yaana; Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysa odis.
EZE 21:14 “Ha77ika asa na7aw, tinbite oda; ne kushiya baqa. He wode mashshi nam7u toho heedzu toho zaaridi shocana; hessika daganthiya, yuushuwa ubban wodhiyanne shukiya mashshi.
EZE 21:15 Hessi enta wozanay til7anaadanne entafe daroti dhubetanaada oothana. Hintena ayye! Hinte pengen mashshi wol7antha mela wol7amees; shukanaw shoohope shodetis.
EZE 21:16 Neno, qara mashshaw, ushachinne haddirsi simmida ne simmida bagga ubbaa butha.
EZE 21:17 Hiza Taani ta kushiya baqana; ta hanqoy dochana” yaagees Goday.
EZE 21:18 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 21:19 “Asa na7aw, Babiloone kawa mashshay yaa nam7u ogetan malla wotha. Nam7u ogeti issi biittafe dendoosona; ogey katamako simmiya ogen mallata tuussu essa.
EZE 21:20 Issi ogiyan de7iya malla Raaba geetetiya Amoone katamaa biya ogiya mallees; hankoy ogey gimbetida Yihudan de7iya Yerusalaame katamaa biya ogiya mallees.
EZE 21:21 Babiloone kawoy ogeti gahetiya daggalan, malla tuussata matan eqees. I awu ogiyara baaneko eranaw, donge tooran saama yeggana; ba eeqata zore oychana; maraaciya be7ana.
EZE 21:22 Gimbiya pengiya laaliya duruma ehana mela, wodho kiita aathana mela, ceeqetana mela, dirsa pengiya laaliya duruma katama pengen essana mela, biitta doorana melanne miixa giigisana mela Yerusalaame saami iyaw ushacha kushen keyis.
EZE 21:23 Yerusalaame asay Babiloone kawuwara caaqida gisho, hessi banta bolla gakana gidi qopibookona. Shin Babiloone kawoy enta di77iya wode enti banta nagaraa hassayana.
EZE 21:24 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees; hinte nagaray qoncis; hinte bala gideysa asa ubbay erees; hinte oosoy hinte nagarancho gideysa bessees. Hessa gisho, hinte iita oosoy hassayetana; hinte, hinte morketas aadhidi imetana.
EZE 21:25 “Neno, iitanne tuna gidida Isra7eele halaqaw, ne pirdaa gallasay gakis.
EZE 21:26 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: ne huuphiyape kallachaa dentha; ne huuphe xaatha qaara. Hizape guye kaseysada hananabay baawa; ziqay dhoqu gaana; dhoqay ziqi gaane.
EZE 21:27 Gado! Gado! Taani ha katamaa dhaysana. Pirdanaw maati de7eysi yaana gakanaw ha katamay zaaridi keexetenna. I yaa wode ta iyaw aathada immana” yaagees.
EZE 21:28 Asa na7aw, haysada yaagada tinbite oda. Isra7eele cayiya Amooneta Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada oda. “Dhaysiya mashshi shoohope shodetis; wodhanaw wol7amees; wursanaw qushetees.
EZE 21:29 Hinte be7iya qoncethay wordo; hinte odiya tinbitey wordo. Hinte iitanne tuna asi; hinte pirda gallasay gakis hinte qoodhen mashshi wodhana hanees.
EZE 21:30 Mashshaa shoohuwan zaarite; hinte medhetida bessan, hinte yeletida biittan ta hinte bolla pirdana.
EZE 21:31 Taani ta hanquwa hinte bolla gussana; ta hanqo tamay hinte bolla eexana; dhayso meezetida, wozana mino asaas aathada immana.
EZE 21:32 Hinte taman dhayana; hinte suuthay hinte biittan gukana; hinte zaaridi hassayeteketa. Taani Goday haysa odas” yaagis.
EZE 22:1 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 22:2 “Asa na7aw, shempo wodheysati kumida katamaa bolla pirdanaw giigadiii? Yaatiko, I oothida tuna ooso ubbaa iyaw oda.
EZE 22:3 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada oda: ne daro asaa wodhida gishonne eeqa goyinnon nena tunisida gisho ne dhayo wodey gakis.
EZE 22:4 Ne gussida suuthan bala gidadasa; ne oothida eeqan tunadasa. Ne pirdaa gallasay matatis; ne dhayo wodey gakis. Hessa gisho, ta nena kawotethatas miichasinne hara biittatas qelqisees aggana.
EZE 22:5 Neno, ne sunthay iitida dagami kumida katamaw, mataninne haahon de7eysati nena qelqisana.
EZE 22:6 “Ne giddon de7iya Isra7eele halaqati ubbay suuthu gussanaw banta wolqaa ay mela go7etiyako be7a.
EZE 22:7 Ne giddon de7eysati banta aawanne banta aayiw bonchokona. Enti bete asaa cimmoosona; am7etanne aawu aayiya bayna nayta naaqoosona.
EZE 22:8 Enti ta geeshsha miisheta kadhoosona; ta Sambaata tunisoosona.
EZE 22:9 Ne giddon issoti issoti harata wodhisanaw wordon odoosona; harati eeqas yashetidaba moosona; harati laymatoosona.
EZE 22:10 Ne giddon issoti issoti ba aawa machera tunoosona; harati kushe metoy de7iya maccasara wolqan tunisoosona.
EZE 22:11 Ne giddon issoti issoti ba shooruwa machera tunoosona; aaway ba na7a machera tunees; ba aawa na7iw, ba michiw wolqan iissidi yeellayees.
EZE 22:12 Ne giddon issoti issoti miishe ekidi, shempo wodhoosona; harati banta miishiya banta yara gidida Isra7eeletas yelora tal7oosona; enta bonqidi bantaw duretoosona; tana kumethi dogidosona” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 22:13 “Asay bessonna miishe ekiya gishonne shempo wodhiya gisho, taani ta kushiya hinte bolla denthana.
EZE 22:14 Ta nena seeriya wode ne goobatethay neera daanee? Woyko ne kushey mino gidanee? Taani Goday haysa odas; ta odidaysada oothana.
EZE 22:15 Ta nena kawotethata giddoninne biittata giddon laallana; ne tunatethaa neepe diggana.
EZE 22:16 Hara kawotethata sinthan ne kawuyana; taani Godaa gideysa ne erana” yaagis.
EZE 22:17 Goday taako haysada yaagis:
EZE 22:18 “Asa na7aw, Isra7eele asay aykoka pathokona; enti ubbay bira sheeshiya wode naase biratape, qorqorope, biratapenne irsaasepe keya sha7a mela.
EZE 22:19 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees; ‘Hinte ubbay atala mela gidida gisho ta hintena ubbaa Yerusalaame shiishana.
EZE 22:20 Bira, naase birata, birata, irsaasenne qorqoro taman hubidi sheesheysada ta hintena shiishada ta hanquwana til7isana.
EZE 22:21 Ta hintena Yerusalaame shiishada, ta hanqo tama hinte bolla eethada hintena yan til7isana.
EZE 22:22 Biri coocen shee7eysada hinte Yerusalaamen til7ana. He wode taani Goday ta hanquwa hinte bolla gussidaysa hinte erana’ ” yaagees.
EZE 22:23 Zaaridi Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 22:24 “Asa na7aw, enta biittay tunida gisho, ta hanquwan iri bukonna mela diggada enta seera domidasa Isra7eele asaas oda.
EZE 22:25 Ne giddon enta halaqati wodhidaba gudishe mentherethiya gaammo mela; enti wodhoosona; miishe gidin, hara buqura gidin, ubbaa bantaw ekoosona; daro maccasata am7o oothidosona.
EZE 22:26 Kahineti ta higgiya menthidosona; ta geeshshabata bonchibookona. Geeshshinne geeshshi gidonna ba shaakokona; tunanne tunaa gidonna ba shaakidi tamaarsokona; ta Sambaata yeggi aggideta. Hessa gaason ta Isra7eele asaa giddon bonchetabike.
EZE 22:27 Halaqati banta wodhidaba duuserethiya suudhume mela; enti bantaw bessona duretethi demmanaw shempo wodhoosona.
EZE 22:28 Nabeti godaa booqinte tiyiya asada, wordo qoncethi be7idi, wordo tinbite odidi enta nagaraa genthoosona. Goday odonna de7ishin, ‘Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees’ yaagosona.
EZE 22:29 Biittan de7iya asay bonqoosona; manqotanne metootanchota un7ethoosona; enti suure pirdaa diggidi bete asaa geellayosona.
EZE 22:30 “Taani biitta dhaysona mela dirsa gimbiya keexey, laaletida dirsa gimbiya baggara ta sinthan eqidi naagiya issi asi koyas; shin oonaka demmabike.
EZE 22:31 Hessa gisho, ta hanquwa enta bolla gussana; taani ta yiluwan enta dhaysana; enti oosuwa enta bolla zaarana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 23:1 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis:
EZE 23:2 “Asa na7aw, issi aayepe yeletida nam7u micheti de7oosona.
EZE 23:3 Enti Gibxen de7ishe, banta na7atethafe doomidi, layma gididosona. He biittan de7iya addeti enta dhanthan kaa7idosona; enta geela7otethay eketis.
EZE 23:4 Entafe bayre sunthay Ohoolo; kaalo miche sunthay Ohooliba. Enta nam7a taani machin, taw addenne macca na7a yelidosona. Ohoola Samaare; Ohooliba qassi Yerusalaame.”
EZE 23:5 “Ohoola taw macho gidada de7ashe laymatasu; iya ba olancho gidida Asoore laggethota kaallada bawusu.
EZE 23:6 Enti kaalose daaniya ma7o ma7ida olanchota, biitta haareysatanne toora moconata; enti ubbay na7atethinne mala lo77o gidida para toggiya asata.
EZE 23:7 Iya bana layma oothada, ubbaafe lo77iya Asoore addetas bana aathada immasu. I laymatethay iya Asoore eeqata goyinnada tunana mela oothis.
EZE 23:8 Iya Gibxen doomida laymatetha ha77ika aggabuku; I na7atethafe doomidi, addeti I dhanthaa kaa7osonanne iira laymatoosona.”
EZE 23:9 “Hessa gisho, iya minthada siiqiya Asoore laggethotas taani iyo aathada immas.
EZE 23:10 Enti iyo qaaridi kalloydosona; I addenne macca nayta di7idi oykidosona; iyo mashshan wodhidosona. Iyo gakida pirda gaason, maccasa giddon qelqisethas attasu.”
EZE 23:11 “I michiya Ohooliba hessa be7asu; iya ba amuwaninne ba laymatethan ba michefe aadhada tuna gidasu.
EZE 23:12 Iyaka Asoore haareysati, toora moconata, lo77o ma7o ma7ida olanchotanne para toggiya asata, na7atethinne mala lo77o asata minthada siiqasu.
EZE 23:13 Iyaka bana tunisidaysa be7as; enti nam7ay issi ogen boosona.”
EZE 23:14 “Iya ba laymatetha yaa darsasu; iya godaa bolla woocetidi oosetidi zo7o qalamen tiyetada Kaldaaweta adde misile be7asu.
EZE 23:15 Enti banta xeessan zinnaare dancidosona; banta huuphiyan lo77o carqe xaaxidosona. Enti ubbay Kaldaawe biittafe yida Kaldaaweta halaqata daanosona.
EZE 23:16 Iya enta misileta be7ida wode daro siiqada, enta xeeganaw Kaldaaweta biitta ase kiittasu.
EZE 23:17 Babilooneti iiko yidi, iira laymatidi iyo tunisidosona. Enti iyo daro tunisidaape guye, iya enta shaatetasu.
EZE 23:18 Iya ba laymatetha qoncen oothida wodenne ba kalluwa qaara bessida wode, taani I michiw aggidaysada iyoka shaatettada aggas.
EZE 23:19 Shin iya Gibxen layma gidada de7iya, ba yalagatetha wodiya hassayada, ba laymatetha kaseysafe yaa darsasu.
EZE 23:20 Enta atunthay hareysa mela, enta kochay paraysa mela gidida ba laggethota kaallada basu.
EZE 23:21 Neno, Ohoolibe, ne yalagatetha wodiyan Gibxe addeti ne dhanthan kaa7ishin, ne geela7otetha ekishin, neeni polida laymatetha zaarada ha77i oothanaw amottaasa.”
EZE 23:22 Hessa gisho, Ohoolibe, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Taani ne laggethota, ne shaatetta aggidaysata ne bolla denthana; ta enta ne bolla ubba bessara ehana.
EZE 23:23 Babiloonetanne Kaldaaweta ubbaa, Faaquda, Sohaane Qo7aana, Asooreta ubbaa, na7atethinne mala lo77o asata, biitta haareyisata, toora moconata, olanchota, halaqatanne para toggiya asata ne bolla ehana.
EZE 23:24 Enti ola para gaaretara, caana gaaretaranne daro olanchotara pudeha baggafe hinte bolla yaana. Enti wogga gondallenne guutha gondalle oykidi, birata barneexa wothidi, ne yuushuwan salpana. Taani nena entaw aathada immana; enti nena banta wogaa mela pirdana.
EZE 23:25 Taani ta hanquwa ne bolla yeddana; enti neera hanqo suulan gahetana. Enti ne siidhiyanne ne haythaa qanxana; attidaysati mashshan wurana. Enti ne adde naytanne ne macca nayta oykana; attidaysata taman xuuggana.
EZE 23:26 Enti ne ma7o ubbaa neepe qaaridi ekana; ne alleeqo ubbaa neepe kessidi ekana.
EZE 23:27 Hessada oothada, ne Gibxefe ehida laymatetha amuwa neepe diggana. Neeni nam7antho Gibxeta eeqa misileta dhoqu gada xeellonnaada woyko enta hassayonnaada oothana.”
EZE 23:28 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Taani nena ne ixeyisata, ne shaatettada aggidaysatas aathada immana.
EZE 23:29 Enti nena ixana; ne daaburada demmidaba ubba bonqidi, nena xire kallo ashshana. Ne laymatetha amoy qoncanaada oothana. Ne laymatetha amoy,
EZE 23:30 hessa ne bolla ehis. Neeni kawotethatara laymatadasa; enta eeqatara nena tunisadasa.
EZE 23:31 Ne michiya bida ogiya neka badasa. Hessa gisho, nena I xuu7aa ushshana.”
EZE 23:32 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Neeni ne miche xuu7ape uyana; he xuu7ay gitanne ciimmo. I tigin, daro ekiya gisho, asi ubbay ne bolla miicananne nena qidhana.
EZE 23:33 Neeni mathota gandigarananne azzanana. Hessi ne miche Samaare xuu7ay new dagamanne dhayo ehana.
EZE 23:34 Ne iya xiizothada uyana; xuu7a menthana; kun7an ne dhantha gaarana.” Taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysa odayis.
EZE 23:35 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Neeni tana dogida gisho, taw zoko zaarida gishonne ne laymatetha amuwas gate ekana.”
EZE 23:36 Goday taako haysada yaagis: “Asa na7aw, Ohooli bollanne Ohoolibi bolla pirdanaw giigetadii? Enti oothida tuna oosuwa entaw oda.
EZE 23:37 Enti nam7ay laymatidosona; shempo wodhidosona. Enti banta eeqa goyinnidosona. Hari attoshin, enti taw yelida banta adde nayta banta eeqatas kathi oothidi yarshidosona.
EZE 23:38 Hessafe aathidi hara iitabaa ta bolla oothidosona; enti ta keethaa tunisidosona; he wode ta Sambaataka shaaridosona.
EZE 23:39 Enti banta nayta eeqatas yarshida gallas, enti ta keetha gelidi tunisidosona; enti ta keethan oothiday haysa.”
EZE 23:40 Enti haaho bessafe addeti yaana mela ase kiittin, enti yidosona. Hinte nam7u micheti hinte bolla meecetideta; hinte ayfiya tiyetideta; alleeqo aathideta.
EZE 23:41 Lo77o arjeeta bolla uttideta; xarpheeza bolla ta ixaaniyanne ta shamaho zaytiya wothideta.
EZE 23:42 Ufaytiya asaa koysethi hinte matan si7etees. Mathotida asay mela biitta yidosona. Hinte kushen sagaayo wothidosona; lo77o kallachata hinte huuphen goxidosona.
EZE 23:43 Taani ta wozanan, “Ha addeti asatethay laymatethan gilqida maccaseera laymatoosona” yaagas.
EZE 23:44 Addey maccasara laymateysada, haysati entara laymatidosona. Enti laymatanaw amotiya Ohooliranne Ohoolibira laymatidosona.
EZE 23:45 Enti layma gidiya gishonne shempo wodhiya gisho, xillo asati laymatiyanne shempo wodhiya enta bolla pirdana.
EZE 23:46 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Daro asa denthethada enta bolla eha. Enta daganthiyanne enta bonqiya asatas aatha imma.
EZE 23:47 Ha daganthiya asati yidi, enta shuchan caddo; mashshan butho; enta addenne macca nayta wodho; enta keethaa taman xuuggo.
EZE 23:48 Maccas ubbay naagetana mela taani biitta ubbaafe laymatethi dhaysana.
EZE 23:49 Hinte nam7u micheti hinte laymatetha gishonne eeqata hinte goyinnida nagaraa gisho hintena pirdana. Taani Ubbaa Haariya Godaa gideysa hinte he wode erana” yaagees.
EZE 24:1 Nuuni di7etida uddufuntho laythan, tammantho ageenan, tammantho gallas, Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 24:2 “Asa na7aw, hachi gallas mazgaben xaafa. Babiloone kawoy Yerusalaame teqiday hachi.
EZE 24:3 Ha makallancho asaas Ubba Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada ha leemisuwa oda. Madabe diste tama bolla wothada haathe iyan tiga.
EZE 24:4 Gedaanne angaasuwa, lo77o asho ubbaa muxada, iyan yegga; lo77o meqethaa qanxerethada iyan kuntha.
EZE 24:5 Hessas ne ekana dorsay wudiyape dooretidaysa gido. Distiya garsan mithi wothada ashuwanne meqetha kaxana gakanaw doysa.”
EZE 24:6 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Suuthu gussiya katamaa ayye! Iya shi7idi geeyonna ixida naase birata diste mela gidasu. I giddon de7iya muxetida ashuwa saama yeggonna kushen gahetidaysa kessa kessa eka.
EZE 24:7 He katamay wodhida asaa suuthay hanno gakanaw in de7ees. Suuthi gussashe, aybika kammonna danda7onna zaalla bolla gussasupe attishin, baanan kammana biitta bolla gussabuuku.
EZE 24:8 Halo keyanaw, ta hanquwa denthethanaada, kamettonna mela iya gussida suuthaa taani zaalla bolla wothas.”
EZE 24:9 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Suuthu gussiya katamaa ayye! Taani mithi gujada wothana.
EZE 24:10 Daro mithi wotha; tama eetha. Ashuwa loythada doysa; cambaa mal7etha; meqetha xuugga.
EZE 24:11 Kaysa Madabe diste tama bolla wotha. Iya bolla de7iya buuqay seeridi kichana gakanawunne iya bolla de7iya shi7ay xuugetidi dhayana gakanaw suullidi michana mela tama bolla wotha.
EZE 24:12 He daaburay ubbay coo mela gidis; iya bolla de7iya daro shi7ay hari attoshin, taman kichibeenna.
EZE 24:13 Yerusalaame, nene tuniday ne iita oosuwana. Ta hanqoy ne bolla wurana gakanaw hizape neeni geeyaka. Ne tunatethafe nena geeshshanaw koyas shin, ne geeyanaw koyabaaka.
EZE 24:14 Taani Goday haysa odas; hessi hanana. Taani guye simmike; new qadhetike; ta qofaa laammike. Ne ogiyadanne ne oosuwada taani nena pirdana. Taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysa odayis” yaagis.
EZE 24:15 Qassika Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 24:16 “Asa na7aw, ne siiqiyanne ne ayfe sinthan lo77iya ne machiw akeekona wodhana. Hessan kayotofa, yeekofanne afuxofa.
EZE 24:17 Oola, shin ne ooliya asi si7opo; hayqidaaris kayotofa. Neeni ne huuphen qace xaaxa; ne tohuwan caamma aatha. Ne doona kammofa; shochi moopa.”
EZE 24:18 Wonta taani asaas odas; omarsi ta machiya hayqasu. Wontetha gallas Goday tana kiittidaysada oothas.
EZE 24:19 Asay taako, “Ha neeni oothiyabas birshethay aybeko nuus ayis odikii?” yaagis.
EZE 24:20 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis yaagada entaw odas.
EZE 24:21 Ubbaa Haariya Goday Isra7eele asaa haysada yaagees; “Hinte ceeqetiya, hinte ayfe amuwanne hinte shempoy amotiya ta keethaa taani tunisana hanayis. Hinte guye ashshida hinte adde naytinne hinte macca nayti mashshan wurana.
EZE 24:22 He wode ta oothidaysada hinte oothana. Hinte doona kammeketa; shochu meeketa.
EZE 24:23 Hinte huuphiya xaaxite; hinte tohuwan caamma aathite. Kayoteketa woyko yeekeketa. Shin hinte hinte nagaraa gaason gilqananne issoy issuwara oolana.
EZE 24:24 He wode Hizqeeli hintew malaata gidana; I oothidaysada, hinte oothana. Hessi haniya wode, taani Ubbaa Haariya Godaa gideysa hinte erana.
EZE 24:25 “Asa na7aw, taani enta ufaysaanne bonchuwa, enta ayfen lo77iyabaanne enta wozanay amotiyaba mino bessa, qassi enta adde naytanne enta macca nayta entafe ekana.
EZE 24:26 He gallas new wore odanaw issi asi kessi ekidi yaana.
EZE 24:27 He gallas ne doonay dooyetana; ne iyara odetana; zaarada muume gidaka. Hessada hanada, ne asaas malaata gidana. Taani Godaa gideysa enti he wode erana” yaagis.
EZE 25:1 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 25:2 “Asa na7aw, ne som7uwa Amooneko zaarada, enta bolla tinbite oda.
EZE 25:3 Ubbaa Haariya Goday odiya qaala si7ite. Hinte ta keetha tunisiya wode, Isra7eele biittay baysa attiya wodenne Yihuda asay di7etiya wode hashshu gideta.
EZE 25:4 Taani hintena doloha bagga biitta asaas laata oothada immana. Enti hinte giddon kambe keexidi daana. Hinte mithaa ayfiya enti maana; hinte maatha enti uyana.
EZE 25:5 Taani Raaba katamaa gimaleti heemetiya bessi kessana; Amooneta biitta dorsaa wudey pee7iya bessi oothana. Taani Godaa gideysa hinte he wode erana.
EZE 25:6 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: ‘Hinte Isra7eele dhayuwan kushe baqida gisho, gupida gishonne ufaytidi qelqisida gisho,
EZE 25:7 taani hinte bolla ta kushiya denthas. Hintena kawotethatas di7o oothada immana. Ta hintena asaape shoddana; kawotethata giddofe dhaysana. Taani Godaa gideysa hinte he woden erana’ ” yaagees.
EZE 25:8 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Moo7abeynne Sayre, ‘Yihudi hara kawotethata ubba mela’ yaagida gisho,
EZE 25:9 taani Moo7abe biitta teqana; iya zawa naagiya, eretida Beet-Yashimoota, Ba7aal-Ma7oonanne Qiratayma katamata dhaysana.
EZE 25:10 Hizape guye Amooneta gujada, enti kawotethata giddon hassayetonna mela enta doloha bagga biittafe yida asaas aathada immana.
EZE 25:11 Taani Moo7abe pirdana; taani Godaa gideysa enti he wode erana” yaagees.
EZE 25:12 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees; “Edoomey Yihuda bolla halo keyida gishonne qohida gisho,
EZE 25:13 taani kushiya Edoome bolla denthana. Yan de7iya asaanne mehiya kumethi dhaysada baysa kessana. Temaanape bidi, Dedaana katamaa gakanaw enti mashshan wurana.
EZE 25:14 Taani Isra7eele baggara Edoome bolla halo keyana. Isra7eeleti enta bolla ta yiluwa mela oothana. Taani halo keydaysa Edoomey erana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 25:15 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Filisxeemeti banta wozanaa iitatethan halo keyida gishonne aqida morken Yihuda kadhidi dhaysanaw koyida gisho,
EZE 25:16 taani ta kushiya Filisxeemeta bolla denthana. Taani Keltaaweta qanxana; abba doonan attidaysata ubbaa dhaysana.
EZE 25:17 Ta enta bolla gita halo keyana; ta hanquwan enta seerana. Taani enta bolla halo keyiya wode, taani Godaa gideysa enti he wode erana” yaagees.
EZE 26:1 Nuuni di7etida tammanne issantho laythan, ageena koyro gallasan, Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 26:2 “Asa na7aw, Xiroosa asay ufaytishe, ‘Hashshu! Yerusalaamey kundis; iya pengey waggi gidi dooyetis. I laaletidi dooyetida gisho hizape guye nu duretana’ yaagosona.
EZE 26:3 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees; ‘Neno, Xiroosa, taani new morke. Abba zuley dendeysada taani daro kawotethata ne bolla ehana.
EZE 26:4 Enti ne dirsa gimbiya laallana; ne gimbe shakota menthana. Ta nena biitta ubbaa quchidi efin, kallo de7iya zaalla oothana.
EZE 26:5 Neeni abba giddon asay banta molo gitiya melisanaw micciya bessi gidana. Hara kawotethati Xiroosa bonqana.
EZE 26:6 Waanna biittan de7iya gutata mashshan wursana. Taani Godaa gideysa enti he wode erana’ yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 26:7 “Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: ‘Xiroosa bolla ola denthana mela kawota kawo gidida Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxoora, paratara, para gaaretaranne daro olanchotara pudeha baggafe ehana.
EZE 26:8 Enti waanna biittan de7iya gutata mashshan wursana. Enti nena teqidi, ne dirsa gimbiya gathidi, biitta doorana; banta gondalliya ne bolla denthana.
EZE 26:9 Dirsa gimbeta dom7idi laaliya miishen ne dirsa gimbiya mentherethana; banta ola miishen ne adussa gimbeta laallana.
EZE 26:10 Iya parati daro gidiya gisho, enti denthiya baanay nena kammana. Paratinne parata gaareti laaletida katamaa dirsa pengiyara geliya wode enti sissiya garmamoy ne dirsa gimbiya qaathana.
EZE 26:11 Enta parati ogeta ubbaa yedhana. Ne asaa mashshan wursana; ne wolqaama tuussati sa7an kundana.
EZE 26:12 Ne shaloy di7etana; ne zal7iya miisheti bonqetana. Ne dirsa gimbetanne ne lo77o keethata ubbaa dhaysana; ne shuchata, ne sanqaanne laaletida ubbaa efidi abban yeggana.
EZE 26:13 Ne mal7o yetha ta teqana; ne diitha girsay zaari si7etenna.
EZE 26:14 Ta nena kallo de7iya zaalla oothana; neeni asay banta molo gitiya micciya bessi gidana. Taani Goday haysa odida gisho, neeni zaarada keexetaka’ ” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 26:15 “Ubbaa Haariya Goday Xiroosa katamaako haysada yaagees: ‘Ne morketi ne bolla dendiya wode yuushoy abban teqetida biittan de7iya asay, ne goyretiya wode waassiya waasuwa si7idi, yashshan kokorana.
EZE 26:16 Abbaa doonan de7iya haareysati banta araatape wodhana. Banta boncho ma7uwanne alleeqetidi oosetida ma7uwa qaaridi yashshan kokorishe biittan uttana. Ne bolla gakida metuwa qopidi, enti daro dagammana; enti ubba wode kokorishe daana.’
EZE 26:17 Enti new haysada yaagidi zelelsi kessana: “Abbaa doonan de7iya yashshiya katamata; wolqaama asay de7iya katame, neeni waana laaletadii? Neeninne ne giddon de7ida asay abba doonan de7iya asa ubbaa yashisadasashin.
EZE 26:18 Neeni kundiya gallas yuushoy abban teqetida biittati kokoridosona. Haathan teqetida biittati ne dhayuwan dagammidosona” yaagis.
EZE 26:19 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Ha77i oonika doonna katamatada ta nena baysa kessana. Taani abba haatha ne bolla ehin, daro haathay nena kammana.
EZE 26:20 Neeni si7oole gelada beni hayqida asaara walaketana mela oothana. Neeni biittafe garsan, beni moogetidi, merinaw laaletidi attidaysatara daana mela oothana. Neeni zaarada asi de7iya katama gidaka; de7on de7eyisata biittan zaarada besse demmaka.
EZE 26:21 Taani ne wursethaa daganthiya wursethi oothana; new hessi wursethi gidana. Asi nena koyana; shin neeni zaarada bentaka” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 27:1 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 27:2 “Asa na7aw, Xiroosas zelelsi kessa.
EZE 27:3 Yuushoy abban teqetida biittan de7iyanne abba gaxan de7iya daro asaara zal7iya, katamaas, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees. “ ‘Neno Xiroosa, taani puulanne borey bayna mala lo77o’ ” yaagadasa.
EZE 27:4 Ne zaway abba gul7aana; nena keexeysati loythidi oothidi keexidosona.
EZE 27:5 Ne sanqa Sanira xiiddan oothidosona; ne markabiya tuussaa Libaanose zigan giigisidosona.
EZE 27:6 Haathaa pidhiya mithati Baasane wolaape oosetidosona. Ne markabiya hiixay Qophiroosa xiiddan, iya yuushoy dangarsa zaalen alleeqetis.
EZE 27:7 Ne sharay bandirada haahon bentana mela, Gibxeta liinope alleeqetidi oosetis. Ne kamaa geshey Qophiroosape yida, kaalose ocha teera daaniya ma7ope oosetidaysata.
EZE 27:8 Ne markabiya kolxiseysati Sidoonanne Arwada katamatape yidaysata; ne markabiya laaggeysati loohida ne asata.
EZE 27:9 Markabiya giigiseysati Gebaalape yida eranchotanne kaalethiya hiillanchota; abban biya markabe ubban de7iya oosanchoti wodha keya gidi ne giddon zal7oosona.
EZE 27:10 “Farsefe, Liidepenne Liibepe yida olanchoti, ne olanchota maaddidi oletidosona. Banta gondalliyanne banta ola barneexa ne giddon kaqidosona; enti nena bonchida asata.
EZE 27:11 Arwadanne Heleka olanchoti, ne dirsa gimbiya naagoosona. Gammada asay ne adussa gimbi shako bolla naagoosona; banta gondalliya ne gimbiya bolla kaqidosona; ne puulatana mela oothiday entana.
EZE 27:12 Ne daro duretetha gaason Tarsesi neera zal7is; I bira, birata, qorqoronne irsaase neera laammidi zal7oosona.
EZE 27:13 Yawaani, Tubaalinne Mosahi neera zal7idosona; aylletanne naase birata immidi, ne miishiyara laammidosona.
EZE 27:14 Beet-Torgaama asay toga parata, ola paratanne baqulota immidi, ne miishiyara laammis.
EZE 27:15 Didaana asay neera zal7idosona; yuushoy abban teqetida biittatan de7iya asay dangarsa zaalenne zophe mithi new ehoosona.
EZE 27:16 “Ne daro duretetha gaason, Soore asati neera zal7idosona; enti ciliilo al7o shuchi, zo7o al7o shuchi, yeleello alleeqo, ocha teera daaniya ma7uwa, al7o liinonne alleeqetida ma7o ehidi ne miishiyara laammidosona.
EZE 27:17 Yihudanne Isra7eele asay neera zal7idosona; enti Minite gade giste, maldo, eessi, zaytenne dhalliya balsaame zayte ne miishiyara laammidosona.
EZE 27:18 Ne daro duretethinne shalloy de7iya gisho, Damasqoy, Kelboona, woyniyanne zahaara dorsa ikise immidi ne miishiyara laammidosona.
EZE 27:19 Uzaalen de7iya Daanenne Yawaana asay ne dumma dumma miisheta shammidosona. Enti ne miishiyara laammanaw alleeqetida biratanne dumma dumma sawo ehidosona.
EZE 27:20 “Didaana asay koora gilaase ehidi zal7idosona.
EZE 27:21 Arabetinne Qedaare halaqati ubbay ne zal7e miishiyas dorsa urgeta, marazetanne deeshata ehidosona.
EZE 27:22 Saabanne Rama zal7anchoti al7o shuchu, worqanne dooretida sawota immidi, ne miishiyara laammidosona.
EZE 27:23 Kaarane, Kane, Edene, sabba Asoorenne Kelmaada katamati ubbay neera zal7idosona.
EZE 27:24 Enti lo77o ma7ota, kaalose daaniya ma7uwa, alleeqetida ma7uwa, gazza sigaajata, loythi dooqida sibaagotanne wodorota immidi, ne giyan zal7oosona.
EZE 27:25 “Tarsesa markabeti ne miisheta caanidosona. Neeni darobay caanetin, abba bolla biya markabe mela gidadasa.
EZE 27:26 Ne markabiya laaggeysati nena ekidi, abba giddo gina efidosona; shin doloha carkoy nena abba giddon mentherethis.
EZE 27:27 Neeni meqeretida wode ne duretethaynne ne zal7e miishe ubbay, ne markabiya laaggeysati, ne markabiya giigiseysati, ne zal7anchotinne ne giddon de7iya olanchoti ubbay abba giddon muuketidosona.
EZE 27:28 Enta waasoy abba gaxaa de7iya biitta daganthis.
EZE 27:29 “Markabiya bolla uttidi haatha pidheysati ubbay markabetape keyidi, abba gaxan eqidosona.
EZE 27:30 Enti ubbay banta huuphen baana qolidi, bidon gondoretishe, ne dhayuwa gisho iita yeeho yeekidosona.
EZE 27:31 New kayotidi, banta huuphiya meedidi, kayo ma7o ma7idosona; enti daro azzanidi new yeekidosona.
EZE 27:32 Enti haysada yaagidi new zeleelidosona: “Ha77i abba giddon si77i gida, Xiroosa meli oonee?”
EZE 27:33 “Ne zal7e miishey abba pinnidi yaa wode, daro asaa kalsadasa; ne shaluwan biittan de7iya kawoti duretidosona.
EZE 27:34 Shin ha77i ciimmo abban meqeretadasa; ne zal7e miisheynne new oothiya asa ubbay, neera abba giddon muuketidi dhayidosona.
EZE 27:35 Yuushoy abban teqetida biittan de7iya asa ubbay ne bolla gakidaba be7idi dagammidosona. Enta kawoti daro yayyidosona; enta som7oy yashshan shullis.
EZE 27:36 Ne wursethay daganthiyaba gidis; neeni zaarada daaka. Hessa gisho, biitta ubban de7iya zal7anchoti, shinchalle gidoosona” yaagis.
EZE 28:1 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 28:2 “Asa na7aw, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gadas Xiroosa halaqa oda: ‘Ne wozanay otortida gisho, taani xoosse; taani abba giddon, xoossata araatan uttas’ yaagadasa. Neeni, ‘Taani xoossada, cinca gidas gada qopikoka ne asepe attishin, xoosse gidaka.
EZE 28:3 Ne Daanelape aadhada cincay? Ay xuurika neepe geemmennee?
EZE 28:4 Tuma ne cincatethaaninne ne akeekan dure gidadasa; ne buqura minja keethan biranne worqaa shiishadasa.
EZE 28:5 Ne zal7iya eran daro wodhe demmadasa; ne duretetha gaason ne wozanay otortis’ ” yaagees.
EZE 28:6 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Taani xoossada cinca gada qopiya gisho,
EZE 28:7 ta ne bolla qadhey bayna wozana mino morketa ehana; enti neeni cincatethaninne eratethan shiishida shalo ubbaa mashshan dhaysana; enti ne bonchuwa tunisana.
EZE 28:8 Enti nena si7oole yeddana, neka ciimmo abban hayqana.
EZE 28:9 Enti nena wodhanaw yaa wode neeni, ‘Taani xoossa’ gaanee? Nena wodhiya asaa kushen ne kundiya wode ne asepe attishin, xoosse gidaka.
EZE 28:10 Neeni allagata kushen ammanonna asi hayqiya hayqo hayqana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 28:11 Qassi Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 28:12 “Asa na7aw, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada Xiroosa kawas zeleela: ‘Neeni kase cincatethan kumadasa; neeni asi leemisidi odiya puulanne cinca gidadasa.
EZE 28:13 Neeni Edenen, Xoossa gannatiyan kase de7adasa; sardiyoone, toophaze, almaaze, birille, margide, yasphide, sanparenne baluure geetetiya al7o shuchan alleeqetada, lo77o worqa alleeqo kase ma7adasa; ne medhetida gallas he ubbay new giigis.
EZE 28:14 Nena naagiya kiruube oothada shuumas; nena tiyas. Ta geeshsha zumaa bolla ne de7adasa; tamada phooliya al7o shuchata giddon simeretadasa.
EZE 28:15 Ne medhetida gallasaape doomada, iitabay ne bolla bentana gakanaw borey bayna de7adasa.
EZE 28:16 Ne daro zal7en mathotida gisho buqethan kumada, nagara oothadasa. Hessa gisho, ta geeshsha zumaape nena wolqan kessas. Nena naagiya kiruubey, he tamada phooliya al7o shuchata giddofe yedethis.
EZE 28:17 Neeni mala lo77o gidiya gisho daro otortadasa; ne boncho koyada cincatetha kawushadasa. Hessa gisho, ta nena sa7an yeggas; hara kawoti nena be7idi bayana mela oothas.
EZE 28:18 Ne nagaraninne ne balethiya zal7iyan, ne goyinno bessata tunisadasa. Hessa gisho, tami ne giddofe keyanaada oothas; ika nena mis. Ubbay xeellishin, ta nena xuuggada sa7aa bolla bido kessas.
EZE 28:19 Nena kase eriya kawotethati ubbay dagammidosona. Ne wursethay yashshiyabaa gidis; neeni zaarada bentaka’ ” yaagis.
EZE 28:20 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 28:21 “Asa na7aw, ne som7uwa Sidoonako zaarada iya bolla tinbite oda.
EZE 28:22 Neno, Sidoona, ta new morke gidana. Taani ne bolla oothiyaban ta bonchoy qoncana. Ne giddon de7eysati pirdan taani ta geeshshatetha bessiya wode, taani Godaa gideysa enti ubbay erana.
EZE 28:23 Ta ne bolla iita harge yeddana; oge ubban suuthi gukanaada oothana. Ubba baggara yaa olaa gaason ne asay mashshan hayqana. Taani Godaa gideysa enti he wode erana.
EZE 28:24 Hizape guye Isra7eele yuushon de7iya, iya kadhidi xeelliya, biitta ubban aguntha melanne kinchote mela qohiya oonika deenna. Taani Ubbaa Haariya Godaa gideysa enti he wode erana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 28:25 “Isra7eele asaa laaletida biitta ubbaafe shiishada ehiya wodenne kawotethata ubbaa sinthan taani ta geeshshatetha bessiya wode, taani ta aylliya Yayqoobas immida banta biittan enti daana.
EZE 28:26 Yan enti saronne naagetidi daana; keethe keexana; woyne tokana. Enta kadhidi xeelliya enta shoorota ubbaa taani pirdiya wode Isra7eele asay saro daana. Taani Godaa enta Xoossaa gideysa enti he wode erana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 29:1 Nuuni di7etida tammantho laythan, tammantho ageenan, tammanne nam7antho gallas, Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 29:2 “Asa na7aw, ne som7uwa Gibxe kawako zaarada, iya bollanne Gibxe biitta ubbaa bolla tinbite oda.
EZE 29:3 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada oda. ‘Neno, Nayle shaafa giddon zin7ida, gitanne yashshiya do7a daaneyso. Nayle shaafay tabaa; iya medhiday tana’ giya Gibxe kawaw, ta new morke gidana.
EZE 29:4 Ta ne siidhen dafo aathana; ne shaafan de7iya molota qefey ne galbara oyketana mela oothana; moloti ne gogaara oyketidi uttidashin, ta nena haathaafe goochada gaxa kessana.
EZE 29:5 Ta nenanne ne shaafan de7iya molota ubbaa mela biitta holana; ne ahay denban yegetidi attana; ne aha shiishidi moogiya asi dhayana. Ta nena salo kafotasinne sa7aa do7atas kathi oothana.
EZE 29:6 Gibxen de7iya asa ubbay taani Godaa gideysa he wode erana. “Neeni Isra7eele asaas maqa xam7a gidadasa;
EZE 29:7 Enti nena oykida wode meqada enta shophen caddadasa; enti nenan zempida wode meqada enta zokuwa duuthadasa.
EZE 29:8 Hessa gisho, taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday, ne bolla mashshe dentheyisata ehana; enti ne asaanne ne mehiya ubbaa wursana.
EZE 29:9 Gibxe laaletidi baysa biitta gidana. Taani Godaa gideysa enti he wode erana. Neeni, ‘Nayle shaafay tabaa; iya medhiday tana’ yaagida gisho,
EZE 29:10 taani ne bollanne ne shaafa bolla dendas. Pudeha baggara Migdoolape doomada, dugeha baggara Aswaana gakanaw, yaara kanthidi Tophe zawa gakanaw Gibxe ubbaa asi bayna baysa besse kessana.
EZE 29:11 Ase gidin mehe gidin yaara kanthenna; oytamu laythi wurana gakanaw, aybika yan deenna.
EZE 29:12 Taani Gibxe biitta ubbaafe aadhida baysa biitta oothana; iya katamati oytamu laythi wurana gakanaw, hara laaletida katama ubbaafe aadhidi laaletida katama gidana. Gibxe asaa taani kawotethata giddoninne hara asaa giddon laallana” yaagees.
EZE 29:13 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Oytamu laythafe guye, taani Gibxey laaletida kawotethata giddofe shiishana.
EZE 29:14 Taani nena zaarada gashtisana enta yeletida dugeha Gibxen de7iya Phatroosa biitta zaarana; yan enti laafa kawotethi gididi daana.
EZE 29:15 Gibxey hara kawotethata ubbaafe laafa kawotethi gidana. Zaaridi hara kawotethata bolla bana dhoqu dhoqu oothenna; I hara kawotethi haaronnaada taani iya guuthana.
EZE 29:16 Isra7eeley zaaridi maado demmanaw Gibxen ammanetena; Gibxen ammanetida ammanetethay ay mela qohoko Isra7eeley akeekana. Taani Ubbaa Haariya Godaa gideysa enti he wode erana” yaagees.
EZE 29:17 Nuuni di7etida laatamanne laapuntho laythan, koyro ageenan, koyro gallasan, Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 29:18 “Asa na7aw, Babiloone kawoy Nabukadanaxoori Xiroosa bolla olaa denthanaw giigis. Enta huuphey qolettana gakanawunne enta hashey shooletana gakanaw olanchoti deexo tooho tookana mela oothidosona. Gidoshin, kawoynne olanchoti ha daabura ubban Xiroosape demmidabay baawa.
EZE 29:19 ‘Taani Gibxe biitta Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxooras aathada immana; ika ba olanchotas damooze gidana mela di7oninne bonqen oykidaba ubbaa ekidi baana.
EZE 29:20 Inne iya olanchoti taw oothida gisho, taani iyaw Gibxe biitta enta daaburas damooze oothada immana’ ” yaagees Ubba Haariya Goday.
EZE 29:21 “He gallas taani Isra7eele deriya minthana. Hizqeela, neka asaas odana mela ta nena minthana. Taani Godaa gideysa enti he wode erana” yaagis.
EZE 30:1 Qassika Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis:
EZE 30:2 “Asa na7aw, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada tinbite oda. “ ‘He gallasaa ayye! Yaagada zeleela.’
EZE 30:3 He gallasay matis! Godaa gallasay gakis! He gallasay shaari kammida gallas kawotethata ubbaas meto gallas gidana.
EZE 30:4 Gibxe bolla oli yaana; Tophe bolla un7i yaana. Daroti Gibxe biittan hayqana; iya duretethay bonqetana; iya baasoy shodetana.
EZE 30:5 He olay Tophe, Liide, Liibe, Arabenne caaqo dere ubbay Gibxera issife mashshan wursana” yaagees.
EZE 30:6 Gibxe maaddeysati kundana; iya otoruwa wolqay wurana. Migdoolape bidi Aswaana gakanaw, enti mashshan hayqana. Taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday hessa odayis.
EZE 30:7 Gibxey biitta ubbaafe aadhida baysa biitta gidana; iya katamati hara laaletida katama ubbaafe aadhidi laaletidi attana.
EZE 30:8 Taani Gibxe taman oythiya wodenne iya maaddeysati ubbay hayqidi wuriya wode, taani Godaa gideysa enti erana.
EZE 30:9 “He wode taani saro de7iya Tophe asaa daganthanaw asata markaben kiittana. Gibxey pirdetiya gallas Tophe asaa bolla waayey yaana. He gallasay gakis” yaagees.
EZE 30:10 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Babiloone kawa Nabukadanaxoora kushen taani Gibxe duretetha dhaysana.
EZE 30:11 Kawotethata ubbaafe aadhidi, wozana mino olanchota kaalethidi yidi, biitta dhaysana; enti Gibxe asaa bolla mashshe shoddidi, biittan aha kunthana.
EZE 30:12 Nayle shaafa taani melisana; taani Gibxe iita asata kushen aathada immana; he biittanne yan de7iyaba ubbaa allagatan dhaysana. Taani Goday haysa odas” yaagees.
EZE 30:13 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Mempisa kataman de7iya eeqatanne misileta ubbaa ta dhaysana; Gibxe biittan zaaridi halaqay deenna; biitta ubbaa taani yashisana.
EZE 30:14 Taani Phatroosa geetetiya dugeha bagga Gibxe baysa kessana; pudeha baggara de7iya Xo7aane kataman tama yeddana; Tebisa katama pirdana.
EZE 30:15 Gibxe miixa gidida Pelusiyaman ta hanquwa gussana; Tebisa asa ubbaa wursana.
EZE 30:16 Taani Gibxen tama oythana; Pelusiyami daro waayetana; Tebisa dirsa gimbey laaletana; Mempisa katamaa duuxonna metoy gakana.
EZE 30:17 Onaninne Bubastu kataman de7iya na7atethati ubbay mashshan wurana; maccasay di7etidi baana.
EZE 30:18 Gibxe wolqaa ta mentherethiya wode Xafinaasan gallasi qammana; I otoruwa wolqay wurana; Gibxe shaari kammana; he katama yuushon de7iya gutati ubbaa di7etidi baana.
EZE 30:19 Taani Gibxe hessada oothada pirdana. Taani Godaa gideysa enti he wode erana” yaagees.
EZE 30:20 Nuuni di7etida tammanne issintho laythan, koyro ageenan, laapuntha gallasan, Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 30:21 “Asa na7aw, ta Gibxe kawa qesiya menthas; iya woyshaninne curqan xaaxidi, koolidi pathiya hiilli baawa; hizape guye I minotethi demmidi mashshe oykanaw danda7enna.
EZE 30:22 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees. Taani Gibxe kawas morke gidana. Kase iyaw meqida qesiyanne lo77o de7iya qesiya nam7aaka ta menthana; iya mashshay iya kushepe sa7an wodhanaada oothana.
EZE 30:23 Taani Gibxeta kawotethata giddoninne hara biittatan laallana.
EZE 30:24 Taani Babiloone kawa nam7u qesiya minthada, ta mashsha iya oythana. Shin Gibxe kawa qesiya menthana; ba morkiya sinthan I hayqana haniya asada oolana.
EZE 30:25 Taani Gibxe kawa qesiya daabursada, Babiloone kawa qesiya minthana. Taani Babiloone kawa ta mashsha oythiya wodenne I Gibxe bolla denthiya wode Gibxeti taani Godaa gideysa erana.
EZE 30:26 Gibxeta taani kawotethata giddoninne biitta ubban laallana. Taani Godaa gideysa enti he wode erana” yaagees.
EZE 31:1 Nuuni di7etida tammanne issintho laythan, heedzantho ageenan, koyro gallasan, Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 31:2 “Asa na7aw, Gibxe kawasinne asa ubbaas haysada yaagada oda: ‘Ne gitatetha ta oodera gaaddeyo?’ ”
EZE 31:3 Ne lo77o daashsha kuyay de7iya Libaanose ziga mela; I diccis; iya xeeray shaara gakis.
EZE 31:4 Yan iya dichiya haathi de7ees; pulto ciimmoti iya dichidosona. Shaafati goggidi iya yuushuwa irxisidosona; pultoti mithay doliya bessa ubbaa ushshoosona.
EZE 31:5 He mithay woran de7iya mitha ubbaafe aduqis; iya daashshay daris; tashey aduqis; haathi darida gisho ordis.
EZE 31:6 Salo kafoti iya daashshan banta keethaa keexidosona; bazzo do7ati iya kuya garsan na7a yelidosona; gita kawotethati ubbay iya kuyan shempoosona.
EZE 31:7 Ba xaphuwa ciimmo haathan duge yeddida gisho he mithay ba daashsha tashiyara waanidi lo77i!
EZE 31:8 Hari attoshin Xoossa gannatiyan he zigaara giniya zigi baawa; iya mela daashshi de7iya xiiddika baawa. Hessa mela ocha mithi, Xoossa gannatiyan hessa mela lo77o mithi baawa.
EZE 31:9 Taani iya daro daashshan puulayas; Edene geetetiya Xoossa gannatiyan de7iya mithati ubbay iya qanaatoosona.
EZE 31:10 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “He mithay aduqidi diccida gisho, iya xeeray shaara gakida gishonne I ba geesan otortida gisho,
EZE 31:11 ta iya yegga aggas; wolqaama, allaga kawas aathada immas. He kawoy iya iitatethaa mela iya bolla oothana.
EZE 31:12 Wozana mino allagati he mitha qanxidi yeggana; qanxida tasheti deretan, ollataninne zangaaratan yegetidi attana. Iya kuyan shempiya kawotethati ubbay he bessaa aggidi baana.
EZE 31:13 Salo kafoti yidi kundida mithaa bolla uttana; bazzo do7ati iya tasheta yedhana.
EZE 31:14 Haatha matan dicciya mithata giddon iya mela aduqidi, xeeray shaara gakiya mithi deenna. Hayqiya asa bolla gakiya hayqo pirday he mithaa bolla gakana; I duufon de7eysatara gidana” yaagees.
EZE 31:15 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “He mithay duufo geliya gallas ciimmo pulto haathati iyaw kayotana mela oothana. He pulto haathay goggonna mela oothana; Libaanosey iya gisho azzanana mela oothana; wora mitha ubbay shullana.
EZE 31:16 Ta he mithaa duufon holiya wode, iya kundethaa girsan kawotetha ubbay qaaxana. Kundidi duufon gelida Edene mithatinne haathe uyidi ordida lo77o Libaanose mithati ubbay iya kundethan mintena.
EZE 31:17 Kawotethata giddon iyara issifidaysatinne iya kuyan de7iya ubbay kase mashshan hayqidaysatara gahetanaw iyara issife duufo gelana.
EZE 31:18 Edene gannatiyan de7iya mithata giddon hessa mela gitinne lo77oy baawa. Shin ha77i Edene mithatada ika hayqidi duufon gelees; yan I mashshan hayqida ammanonaysatara gahetana. “He mithay Gibxe kawaanne iya asaa leemiso” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 32:1 Nuuni di7etida tammanne nam7antho laythan, tammanne nam7antho ageenan, koyro gallasan, Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 32:2 “Asa na7aw, Gibxe kawas haysada yaagada zeleela. Neeni kawotethatas giddon nena gaammo mela kessadasa; shin ne abba giddon de7iya yeeruntha mela. Ne haathaafe keyadasa; ne tohuwan yedhada, haatha buulloyadasa.
EZE 32:3 Daro asay shiiqiya wode taani ta gitiyan nena oykana; asay nena goochidi, haathaafe gaxa kessana.
EZE 32:4 Taani nena biittan hola aggana; sa7a bolla miccana; salo kafota ne bolla utisana; bazzo do7ata ne ashuwa kalsana.
EZE 32:5 Ta ne ashuwa dereta bolla laallana; zangaarata ne ahan kunthana.
EZE 32:6 Shaafata kumidi dereta kammana, gakanaw, ne suuthay gukana mela oothana.
EZE 32:7 Ta nena dhaysiya wode saloy goozetana; xoolintoti dhumana; away shaaran kametana; ageenay ba poo7uwa diggana.
EZE 32:8 Neepe bollara de7iya salo poo7ota ubbaa dhaysada, biitta dhumisana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 32:9 Ne bolla gakida dhayuwa ne eronna kawotethata sissiya wode daro asa wozanay un7ethana.
EZE 32:10 Daro kawotethati nena be7idi dagammana. Taani ta mashsha enta sinthan shoddada seesiya wode, kawotethati yashshan kokorana; ne kundiya wode enti ubbay banta shempuwas yayyana.
EZE 32:11 Ubbaa Haariya Goday Gibxe kawako haysada yaagees: “Babiloone kawa mashshay ne bolla yaana.
EZE 32:12 Hara kawotethatape aadhida, wozana mino olanchoti banta mashshan daro asaa wursanaada taani oothana. Enti Gibxe otoruwa dhaysana; daro asay wurana.
EZE 32:13 Daro haatha matan de7iya mehe ubbaa ta dhaysana; hizape guye, haatha buulloya asi woyko mehey deenna.
EZE 32:14 He wode taani ne haathata xillisana; ne shaafata wopu oothada gogisana. Taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysa odayis.
EZE 32:15 Taani Gibxe baysa kessiya wode iyan de7iya ubbaa quchada dhaysiya wodenne iyan de7iya asa ubbaa shociya wode taani Godaa gideysa enti erana.
EZE 32:16 Ha ubbay entaw zeleeletiya zelelsi gidana. Kawotethata maccasati Gibxesinne iya daro asaas zeleelana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 32:17 Nuuni di7etida tammanne nam7antho laythan, he ageenan, tammanne ichashantho gallasan, Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis:
EZE 32:18 “Asa na7aw, daro gidida Gibxe olanchota gisho yeeka. Iyonne, wolqaama kawotethata macca nayta hayqidi duufo geleysatara issife duge duufo moyza.
EZE 32:19 Entako, ‘Hinteno Gibxeto, hinte haratape aadhidi mala lo77o? Hinte duufo gelana; yan hinte Godaa qaxaretonaysatara issife moogetana.’
EZE 32:20 Gibxe biittas mashshi shodetidi uttida gisho, enti mashshan hayqidaysata giddon kundana; Gibxey ba daro asaara duge gooshetana.
EZE 32:21 Duufon de7iya wolqaamaa halaqati Gibxebaanne Gibxera issifidaysataba haasayishe, ‘Enti duge yidosona; Godaa qaxaretonayisata mashshan hayqidaysatara enti zin7idosona’ yaagosona.
EZE 32:22 “Asoorey duufon de7ees. Olan hayqida Asoore olanchota duufoti iya yuushuwa teqidi uttidosona.
EZE 32:23 Enta duufoti ollas wursetha gaxan de7oosona. Iya olanchoti duufuwa yuushon keeletidosona; kase de7on de7iya asa heeran buqethi denthiya asay shuketidosona; mashshan wuridosona.
EZE 32:24 “Elaami duufon de7ees; iya olanchoti ubbay shuketidosona mashshan kundidosona. De7on de7iya asa matan buqethi denthidasati ubbay qaxaretona biitta garsi aadhidosona duufo gelidi zin7idosona.
EZE 32:25 Hayqidaysata giddon Elaamas bessi giigidi uttis. Elama olanchota duufoti iya yuushuwan de7oosona; enti ubbay mashshan hayqidosona. Enti ubbay qaxaretiboonaysatanne mashshan hayqidaysata Enti de7on de7eyisata giddon buqethi denthida gisho duufo geelidaystara issife zin7idosona.
EZE 32:26 “Mosahinne Tobaali banta olanchotara duufon de7oosona; enti kase kawotethata ubbaa yashshan kokorsidaysata gidikoka, enti ubbay mashshan hayqidosona. Enti ubbay qaxaretonayisata. Enti de7on de7eyisata giddon buqethi denthida gisho mashshan hayqidosona.
EZE 32:27 Enti beni gooba olanchoti banta ola miishiya dancidi banta gondalliya tiran wothidi banta mashsha borkotidi mogeteysada bonchon mogetibookona. Ha olanchota de7on de7iya asa giddon buqethi denthida gisho enta nagaray enta meqetha bolla de7ees.
EZE 32:28 “Hinte Gibxe asati xoonetananne mashshan hayqida, ammanonna asatara issife zin7ana.
EZE 32:29 “Edoomey ba kawotaranne ba halaqatara issife duufon de7ees; enti kase mino olanchota; shin ha77i olan hayqida, ammanonna asatara ollan gelidosona.
EZE 32:30 “Pudeha bagga halaqatinne Sidoona asay duufon de7oosona. Enti kase banta wolqan asaa yashisidosona; shin ha77i enti banta yeellara yaa gelidosona. Mashshan hayqida qaxaretiboonna asaara issife duufo geloosona.
EZE 32:31 “Gibxe kawoynne iya olanchoti, mashshan hayqida olanchota yan be7idi minettana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 32:32 “Ta haysafe kase kawotethati Gibxe kawas yayyana mela oothidaba gidikoka, inne iya olanchoti Godaa ammanonna, mashshan hayqida asatara issife zin7ana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 33:1 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 33:2 “Asa na7aw, ne biitta asaas haysada yaagada oda: ‘Ta issi biitta bolla olaa ehiya wode he biitta asay banta bolla yaaba wochiya asi dooro banta giddofe dooro.
EZE 33:3 He wochiya uray morkey yishin be7idi, asay naagetana mela moyze punniko,
EZE 33:4 Oonika moyze punuwa si7idi, naagetonna ixin, oli yidi iya wodhiko, suuthaa acoy iya oyko.
EZE 33:5 I moyze punuwa si7idi, naagetonna ixida gisho iya suuthaa acoy iya bollana. I si7idi naagetidaba gidiyako hayqope attanashin.
EZE 33:6 Shin wocheysi morkey yeysa be7ishe, moyze punnidi asaa erisonna aggiko, olay yidi, he asaape issi asi wodhiko, he uray ba nagaran hayqees; shin taani iya suuthaa wocheysa kushepe ekana’ ” yaaga.
EZE 33:7 “Asa na7aw, ta nena Isra7eele asaas wochiya asi oothas; ta new odeysa si7ada asaa akeekisa.
EZE 33:8 Taani issi iita asi, ‘Neeni tuma hayqana’ giya wode, I ba nagaraape simmana mela ne iyaw odonna ixiko, he uray ba nagaran hayqees; shin taani iya suuthaa gisho nena achana.
EZE 33:9 Shin nagaranchoy ba nagaraape simmana mela ne odin, I ixiko, I ba nagaran hayqees; shin ne ne shempuwa ashshaasa.”
EZE 33:10 “Asa na7aw, Isra7eele asaas haysada yaagada oda: ‘Hinte, nu nagaray nu qohoy nu bolla de7ees; hessa gaason nu gilqida. Yaatin, nu waanidi paxa daanaw danda7oona?’ ” yaageeta.
EZE 33:11 Taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday ta de7uwan caaqayis: “Nagaranchoy ba nagaraa aggidi, de7on daana mela koyaysipe attishin, nagaranchuwa hayquwan ufaytike. Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, simmite; hinte iita oosuwa aggite! Ayis hayqanaw koyeetii?” yaagis.
EZE 33:12 Asa na7aw, ne biitta asaas oda. “Xillo asi nagara oothiko, iya kase xillotethay iya ashshena; qassi nagaranchoy ba nagaraape simmiko, kase nagaraa gisho I pirdetenna. Xillo asi nagara oothiko, kase xillotethaa gisho de7on daanaw danda7enna.
EZE 33:13 Taani xillo asako, ‘Neeni tuma de7on daana’ yaagida wode, I ba xillotethan ammanetidi nagara oothiko, ba oothida nagaran I hayqanaape attishin, kase xillotethay iyaw qofetenna.
EZE 33:14 Qassi taani nagarancho asako, ‘Neeni tuma hayqana’ yaagida wode I ba nagaraape simmidi, tumanne suure ooso oothiko,
EZE 33:15 miishe tal7anaw oykidaba zaariko, kaysotidaba guye immiko, nagara ooso aggidi, de7o immiya higgiya naagiko, I tuma de7on daanape attishin, hayqenna.
EZE 33:16 I kase oothida nagaray issoy qofetenna; ha77i tumanne suure ooso oothida gisho, I tuma de7on daana.
EZE 33:17 “Gidoshin, ne biitta asay, ‘Godaa ogey like gidenna’ yaagosona; shin like gidonnay enta ogiya.
EZE 33:18 Xillo asi ba xillotethaa aggidi, nagara oothiko, I ba nagaran hayqana.
EZE 33:19 Qassi nagarancho asi ba nagaraape simmidi, tumanne suure ooso oothiko, he oosuwan I de7on daana.
EZE 33:20 Shin hinte, ‘Godaa oge like gidenna’ yaageeta. Isra7eele asaw, ta hinte issuwa issuwa bolla hinte oosuwada pirdana” yaagis.
EZE 33:21 Nuuni di7etida tammanne nam7antho laythan, tammantho ageenan, ichashantho gallasan, Yerusalaamepe kessi ekidi yida issi asi katamay kundidaysa taw odis.
EZE 33:22 He uray yaanape issi gallasi sinthe, omarsa wode Godaa kushey ta bolla de7ees; ta doonay dooyetis; wontetha gallas he uray taako gakiya wode taani oda doomas.
EZE 33:23 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 33:24 “Asa na7aw, Isra7eele biittan laaletida katamatan de7iya asay haysada yaagosona: ‘Abrahaamey barka de7iya issi asi; I ha biitta laattis; shin nuuni daro; biittay tuma nuus laata gididi imetis’ ” yaagosona.
EZE 33:25 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada entaw oda. “Hinte ha77ika suuthara de7iya asho meeta; eeqa goyinneta; shempo wodheeta. Haysa ubbaa oothishe hinte tuma biitta laattanee?
EZE 33:26 Hinte hinte mashshan ammaneteta; tuna ooso ootheeta; hinte ubbay hinte shooruwa macheta tuniseeta. Haysa ubbaa oothishe hinte tuma biitta laattanee?” yaagees.
EZE 33:27 Ubbaa Haariya Goday ba de7uwan caaqidi haysada yaagees: “Laaletida katamatan de7iya asay mashshan hayqana; katamaape gaxan de7iya asaa taani bazzo do7aas kathi oothana; dere bollanne gongolo giddon de7iya asay iita hargen hayqana.
EZE 33:28 Ta he biitta kallonne baysi kessana; enti otortiya wolqay wurana; Isra7eele dereti ay asika yaara kanthonna baysi gidana.
EZE 33:29 Enti oothida tunaa gaason taani biitta kallonne baysi kessiya wode, taani Godaa gideysa enti erana” yaagees.
EZE 33:30 “Asa na7aw, asay katamaa dirsa mataninne banta keethata pengen eqidi, issoy issuwara haysada yaagidi, nebaa odetees. ‘Haayite; Godaa matape yida qaalay woygiyako ane si7oos’ yaagosona.
EZE 33:31 Enti kase asay yeysada neeko yoosona; ta asada ne sinthan uttoosona; ne odeysa si7oosona; shin oothokona. Enti siiqoba haasayoosona; shin enta wozanay go77a xalaala yaaretees.
EZE 33:32 Ne entaw issi siiqo mazmure lo77o girsan yexiyanne diithi loythidi diixiya asa mela. Enti ne odeysa si7oosona; shin oothokona.
EZE 33:33 Shin ne odeysi tuma poletana; poletiya wode, nabey enta giddon de7eysa enti erana” yaagis.
EZE 34:1 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagidi taako yis.
EZE 34:2 “Asa na7aw, Isra7eele henthanchota bolla haysada yaagada tinbite oda: hinteno, hintena heemmiya Isra7eele henthanchoto, hintena ayye! Hinte dorsata heemmanaw bessennee?
EZE 34:3 Enta maatha uyeeta; enta ikisiyape dadetida suufiya ma77eeta; entafe modhuwa shukidi meeta; shin dorsata suure heemmeketa.
EZE 34:4 Daaburidaysata gashtisibeketa; hargidaysata pathibeeketa; meqidaysata koolibeeketa; betidaysata zaaribeeketa; dhaydaysata koybeketa. Hessa aggidi enta wolqan un7ethidi haarideta.
EZE 34:5 Dorsati ubbay heemmiya asi dhayin laaletidosona; bazzo do7atas kathi gididosona.
EZE 34:6 Ta dorsati laaletidosona; enti zumata bollanne dereta bolla toylatidosona. Biitta gaxa gakanaw laaletidosona; shin enta xomoosey woyko koyey baawa” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 34:7 Hessa gisho, hinteno, henthanchoto, Godaa qaala si7ite.
EZE 34:8 “Taani ta de7uwan caaqayis: Ta dorsata heemmiya asi dhayin, ta dorsati oyketidi, bazzo do7atas kathi gididosona. Ta henthanchoti ta dorsata koyiboona gishonne enti ta dorsata heemmonna aggidi, bantana heemmida gisho,
EZE 34:9 hinteno, henthanchoto, Godaa qaala si7ite.
EZE 34:10 Ta hintew, henthanchohotas morke gidana; ta dorsata taani hintefe ekana; ta hintena nam7antho entaw henthancho oothike. Hizape guye hinte hintena heemmishe de7eketa. Ta dorsata ta hintefe ekana; hizape enti hintew kathi gidokona” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 34:11 “Taani ta huuphen ta dorsata xomoosananne koyana.
EZE 34:12 Henthanchoy ba dorsatape dhayin koyeysada, taani ta dorsata koyana; shaarinne dhumi goozida gallas enti dhayida bessaafe ta enta shiishana.
EZE 34:13 Taani kawotethata giddofenne hara biitta ubbaafe shiishanada, entana, enta biitta ehana. Isra7eele deretan, pultotaninne asay de7iya bessatan enta heemmana.
EZE 34:14 Taani enta lo77o qooron heemmana; Isra7eele zumati enti heemetiya besse gidana. Enti lo77o qooroy de7iya Isra7eele zumata bolla hemetananne allatana.
EZE 34:15 Taani ta huuphen ta dorsata heemmananne shempisana.
EZE 34:16 Taani dhayidaysa koyana; betidaysa zaarana; meqidaysa koolana; hargidaysa pathana. Shin taani suure pirdiya henthancho gidiya gisho genen modhidaysanne minnidaysa dhaysana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 34:17 Hinteno, ta dorsato, “Hintena ubbaa ta pirdana; keeha iitaape, dorsaa deeshape ta shaakana.
EZE 34:18 Hinte lo77o qooron heemmeteysi gidonna ixin, attida maata tohon yedheetii? Qassi hinte xillo haathi uyeysi gidonna ixin, attida haatha tohon buulloyetii?
EZE 34:19 Ta dorsati hinte tohon yedhida maata maanawunne hinte tohon buulloyida haatha uyanaw bessii?” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 34:20 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday entako haysada yaagees: “Modho mehiya giddoninne gilqa mehiya giddon ta ta huuphen pirdana.
EZE 34:21 Daaburanchota, hinte, hinte miyanne hinte hashiyan sugiya gishonne gaxa kessana gakanaw hinte enta hinte kaciyan qayciya gisho,
EZE 34:22 taani ta dorsata ashshana. Hizape guye oonika enta oykenna; ta keeha dorsata giddoninne iita dorsata giddon ta pirdana.
EZE 34:23 Ta enta bolla issi henthanchuwa, ta aylliya Dawita shuumana; I enta heemmananne entaw henthancho gidana.
EZE 34:24 Hizape guye ta Goday enta Xoossaa gidana; ta aylley Dawiti enta giddon halaqa gidana” yaagees Goday.
EZE 34:25 “Ta entara sarotetha caaqo caaqana; iita do7ata taani biittafe diggana; ta dorsati bazzon saro daana; wora garsan hirgi bayna allatana.
EZE 34:26 Ta entanne ta zuma yuushon de7iya bessata anjana. Entaw koshshiya ira woden woden immana; he iray entaw anjo gidana.
EZE 34:27 Gaden de7iya mithati ayfana; biittay kathi dolisana; ubbay banta biittan saro daana. Ta enta qambara menthada, enta aylle oothidi haaridaysata kushepe kessiya wode taani Godaa gideysa enti erana.
EZE 34:28 Hara kawotethati enta bonqokona; biittan de7iya do7ati enta mookonna; aykoyka daganthonna enti saro daana.
EZE 34:29 Ta entaw aradda biitta immana; enti zaaridi koshan wurokona; woyko hara kawotethatas cashshas attokona.
EZE 34:30 He wode enti taani Goday, enta Xoossay entara de7eysanne Isra7eele asay ta ase gideysa enti erana.
EZE 34:31 Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, hinte ta wude; ta qooron miya ta wudiya; hinte ta ase, taani hinte Xoossaa” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 35:1 Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 35:2 “Asa na7aw, Sayre zumako ne som7uwa zaarada tinbite oda:
EZE 35:3 ‘Neno, Sayre zumaw, ta new morke gidana; taani ta kushiya ne bolla denthada, nena kallonne baysa kessana.
EZE 35:4 Taani ne katamata laallana; ne baysa gidana. Taani Godaa gideysa ne he wode erana’ ” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 35:5 New Isra7eelera wuronna morketethi de7iya gisho, enta un7aa wodenne enta wursetha pirdaa wode, enta ne mashshas aathada immadasa.
EZE 35:6 Ta Ubbaa Haariya Goday ta de7uwan caaqayis: taani nena hayqon pirdana; ne hayqope kessa ekanaw danda7aka. Ne ase wodho ixonna gisho ase wodhey nena kallana.
EZE 35:7 Taani Sayre zumaa kallonne baysa kessana; yaara oonika aadhona mela oothana.
EZE 35:8 Taani ne dereta ubbaa ahan kunthana; dereti, shaafatinne zangaarati mashshan hayqidaysata ahan kametana.
EZE 35:9 Ta nena merinaw baysa oothana; ne katamati kallo attana; Taani Godaa gideysa hinte he wode erana.
EZE 35:10 “Taani Goday Isra7eeleninne Yihudan de7ishin hinte, ‘Ha nam7u kawotethatanne ha nam7u biittata nu oykana; enti nubaa gidana gida gisho,
EZE 35:11 Hinte enta morkidi, enta bolla yilotida gishonne qanaatida gisho ta hintew seerana. Ta hintena pirdiya wode taani tana gideysa hintena erisana.’
EZE 35:12 Hinte, ‘Isra7eele dereti baysa attidosona; nuuni midi dhaysana mela nuus imetidosona’ gidi, cayida cashsha ubbaa taani Goday si7idaysa hinte he wode erana.
EZE 35:13 Ne ta bolla otoron odetida odaanne zawi bayna haasayida haasaya taani si7as.
EZE 35:14 Biitta ubbay ufaytiya wode taani hintena baysa kessana.
EZE 35:15 Isra7eele laata biittay baysa gidida wode hinte ufaytida gisho, Sayre zumaw Edoome biitta ubbaa taani baysa oothana. Taani Godaa gideysa hinte he wode erana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 36:1 “Asa na7aw, Isra7eele zumata haysada yaagada tinbite oda: ‘Hinteno, Isra7eele zumato, Godaa qaala si7ite.’
EZE 36:2 Hinte morketi, ‘Hashshu! Beni dhoqa dereti ubbay nu laata gididosona’ yaagidosona.
EZE 36:3 Hessa gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada tinbite oda. Enti hintena ubba bessara mentherethidi baysa oothida gishonne hinte hara kawotethatan haaretana mela oothida gisho hintena cashshasinne miichas aggis.
EZE 36:4 Godaa qaala si7ite! Ubbaa Haariya Goday deretako, zumatako, zangaaratako, ollatako, yuushuwan de7iya hara kawotethan bonqetida, qelqisetidanne baysa attida katamatako haysada yaagees.
EZE 36:5 Taani, ta eexiya qaanatiyan hara kawotethata bollanne Edoome ubba bolla tuma odas. Enti ufaytishenne kadhishe ta biitta bantaw ekidosona; hentha gadeta laattidosona.
EZE 36:6 Hessa gisho, Isra7eele biitta bolla tinbite oda. Kawotethata cashshaa gisho, ta qanaaten eexada deretas, zumatas, zangaaratsinne ollatas odeysa oda.
EZE 36:7 Hinte yuushuwan de7iya kawotethati ubbay kawuyanaysa taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday hintew ta kushiya denthada caaqada odayis.
EZE 36:8 “Shin, Isra7eele dereta bolla de7iya mithati ta asaa Isra7eeles zaaridi aacana; ayfe ayfana; enti eeson banta biitta simmana.
EZE 36:9 Ta hintera de7ayis; ta hinteko simmana; hinte biittay goyetananne zeretana.
EZE 36:10 Ta Isra7eele asaa taybuwa ha biittan darsana; asay katamatan daana; laaletida bessati zaaridi gimbetana.
EZE 36:11 Taani asaanne mehiya hintew darsana; enti yeletananne darana. Beni hinte de7idaysada daana; kaseysafe aathada ta hintena dureyana. He wode hinte, taani Godaa gideysa erana.
EZE 36:12 Taani ta asaa Isra7eele, ha biittan zaaridi daana mela oothana. Zaaridi he biittay hinte nayta dhaysena; biittay hinte laata biitta gidana” yaagees.
EZE 36:13 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees asay hintena, “Biittay ase miya biitta” kawotethiuwka, “Na7i bayna asi oothasu” yaageysi tuma.
EZE 36:14 Hizape guye, biittay, “Ase miya biitta” giduku; qassi kawotethati, “Na7i bayna asi gidokona” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 36:15 “Hizape guye, kawotethata cashshaa ta hintena sissike; hizape guye yeellateketa; he biittay hintew dhube giduku” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 36:16 Zaaridi, Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis.
EZE 36:17 “Asa na7aw, Isra7eele asay banta biittan de7iya wode, banta hanotaaninne banta oosuwan biitta tunisidosona; enta hanoy ta sinthan maccasa kushe meto mela.
EZE 36:18 Enti biittan suuthu gussida gishonne banta eeqan biitta tunisida gisho ta hanquwa enta bolla gussas.
EZE 36:19 Taani enta kawotethata giddon laallas; biitta ubban zeras. Taani enta hanotaanne enta oosuwa mela pirdas.
EZE 36:20 Enti bida besse ubban asay enta, ‘Haysati Godaa asata; enti iya biittafe keydaysata’ ” yaagidi ta geeshsha sunthaa tunisana mela oothidosona.
EZE 36:21 Shin Isra7eele asay bida kawotethata ubban tunisida ta geeshsha sunthay tana qofisees.
EZE 36:22 “Hessa gisho, taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday, Isra7eele asaas giyaba oda. ‘Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, ta hessa oothey, hinte bida kawotethata giddon tunisida ta geeshsha sunthaa gishope attishin, hinte gisho gidenna.
EZE 36:23 Hinte tunisida, kawotethata giddon tunida ta gita sunthaa geeshshatetha ta bessaana. Enti xeellishin, hinte baggara ta geeshshatetha bessiya wode, taani Godaa gideysa enti erana’ ” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 36:24 “Taani hintena kawotethata giddofe kessana; biitta ubbaafe shiishada hinte biitta zaarada ehana.
EZE 36:25 Ta hinte bolla xillo haathi dharcana; hinteka geeyana. Hintena hinte tunatethi ubbaafenne eeqa goyinno ubbaafe geeshshana.
EZE 36:26 Ta hintew ooratha wozanaa immana; ooratha ayyaana hinte giddon wothana; shucha wozanaa hintefe kessada, asho wozanaa hintew immana.
EZE 36:27 Ta Ayyaana hinte giddon wothana; ta wogaanne ta higgiya naagana mela oothana.
EZE 36:28 Ta hinte mayzatas immida biittan hinte daana; hinte ta ase gidana; taka hinte Xoossaa gidana.
EZE 36:29 Hinte tuna ubbaafe ta hintena ashshana; kathay hintew darana mela oothana; zaarada hinte bolla kosha ehike.
EZE 36:30 Koshaa gaason hinte kawotethata giddon kawuyonna mela hinte mitha ayfiyanne hinte goshsha kathan kunthana.
EZE 36:31 He wode hinte, hinte iita hanotaanne iita ogiya hassayana. Hinte nagaraanne hinte tuna oosuwa gisho, hinte hintena shaatettana.
EZE 36:32 Ta hessa ubbaa oothey hinte gisho gidonnaysa erite. Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, hinte hanotan yeellatitenne kawuyite” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 36:33 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees: “Ta hintena, hinte nagaraa ubbaafe geeshshiya wode, hinte katamatan zaaridi daana mela oothana; laaletidaysati zaaridi gimbetana.
EZE 36:34 Iya matara aadhiya asaa sinthan baysa gididi de7iya biittay goshsha biitta gidana.
EZE 36:35 Asay, ‘Haysi kase baysa gidida biittay ha77i waanidi Edene Gannate gididee? Kase laaletida, asi doonnanne baysa katamati ha77i waanidi yuushoy gimbetidanne asi de7iya katamata gididona?’ yaagana.
EZE 36:36 He wode hinte yuushuwan de7iya attida kawotethati, taani laaletida katamata zaarada keexidaysanne baysa biittay zaaridi kathi dolana mela oothiday tana Godaa gideysa enti erana. Taani Goday hessa odas; ta odidaysa ta oothana” yaagees.
EZE 36:37 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees; “Isra7eele asay issi toho tana maado oychana mela oothana; enta taybuwa wudeda darsana.
EZE 36:38 Ba7aale gallas yarshos yida wude mehen Yerusalaamey kumeysada, laaletida katamatan ase kunthana. He wode enti taani Godaa gideysa erana” yaagis.
EZE 37:1 Godaa kushey ta bolla de7ees; iya Ayyaanay tana meqethi kumida zangaaran wothis.
EZE 37:2 I tana enta giddon yaanne haanne yuushshis; ta hinchi gidi melida daro meqethata zangaara giddon be7as.
EZE 37:3 I, “Asa na7aw, ha meqethati zaaridi, shempora daanaw danda7oona?” yaagis. Taani, “Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, haysa ne eraasa” yaagas.
EZE 37:4 I taako, “Ha meqethatas haysada yaagada tinbite oda; hinteno, melida meqethato, Godaa qaala si7ite.
EZE 37:5 Ubbaa Haariya Goday ha meqethatako haysada yaagees: ‘Taani shempo hinte giddo gelsana; zaaridi hinte de7on daana.
EZE 37:6 Ta hinte bolla shaya wothana; hintena asho mayzana; hintena gogan kammana. Hinte de7on daana mela ta hinte giddo shempo gelsana. He wode hinte taani Godaa gideysa erana’ ” yaagees.
EZE 37:7 I tana kiittidaysada tinbite odas; ta tinbite odo doomiya wode girsi si7etis; meqethati shiiqidi, ba bessan bessan oyketidosona.
EZE 37:8 Ta xeelliya wode, enta bolla shayi de7ees; ashoy enta bolla bentis; galba ma7idosona; shin shempoy enta giddon deenna.
EZE 37:9 I taako, “Asa na7aw, carkuwas tinbite oda; neno, carkuwaw, oyddu baggafe haa ya; enti de7on daana mela ha hayqidaysata bolla shempo punna” yaagis.
EZE 37:10 I tana kiittidaysada tinbite odas; shempoy enta giddo gelis; de7o demmidosona; enti daro olancho gididi banta tohon eqidosona.
EZE 37:11 I taako, “Asa na7aw, ha meqethati Isra7eele asaa leemiso; Isra7eele asay, ‘Nu meqethati melidosona; nu ufaysay dhayis; nubay kumethi halis’ yaagosona.
EZE 37:12 Hessa gisho, entaw haysada yaagada tinbite oda; ‘Hinteno, ta asaw, taani hinte duufuwa dooyana; hintena yaape kessana; ta hintena zaarada, Isra7eele biitta ehana.
EZE 37:13 Ta asaw, ta hinte duufuwa dooyiya wodenne hintena kessiya wode, ta Godaa gideysa hinte erana.
EZE 37:14 Taani ta Ayyaana hinte giddon wothana; hinte de7on daana. Taani hintena, hinte biittan wothana. He wode taani Goday odidaysanne oothidaysa hinte erana’ ” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
EZE 37:15 Zaaridi Godaa qaalay haysada yaagishe taako yis:
EZE 37:16 “Asa na7aw, issi mitha xam7a ekada, iya bolla, ‘Haysi Yihudasinne iyara de7iya Isra7eele asaasa’ yaagada xaafa. Qassi hara xam7a ekada, iya bolla, ‘Haysi Efreema; Yoosefanne iyara de7iya Isra7eele asaasa’ yaagada xaafa.
EZE 37:17 Hessafe guye, enti ne kushen issi xam7a gidana mela nam7a issife gathada oyka.
EZE 37:18 Ne biitta asay neeko, ‘Haysi ne ootheysi aybee? Nuus birshethaa oda’ yaagidi oychiko,
EZE 37:19 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada oda: taani Efreema kushen de7iya Yoosefa xam7anne iyara de7iya Isra7eele kochata ekanaw hanayis; enta nam7aa issi xam7a oothanaw, Yihuda xam7ara gathana. Enti nam7ay ta kushen isso gidana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday yaagada oda.
EZE 37:20 “He ne enta bolla xaafida nam7u xam7ata enta sinthan oykada,
EZE 37:21 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagees gada oda. Taani Isra7eele asaa enti laaletida kawotethata giddofe kessana; ta enta shiishada, enta biitta zaarada ehana.
EZE 37:22 Isra7eele dereta bollanne enta biittan ta enta issi kawotethi oothana; enta ubbaa bolla issi kawo kawothana. Qassi enti zaaridi nam7u biitta gidokona; nam7u kawotethi gididi shaaketokona.
EZE 37:23 Hizape guye, enti banta eeqatan, banta ixetidabataninne banta nagara ubban bantana tunisokona. Taani enta kundida bessaafe denthada nagara ubbaafe geeshshana. Enti ta ase gidana; taka entaw Xoosse gidana.
EZE 37:24 “Ta aylley Dawiti enta kawo gidana; entaw ubbaas issi henthancho xalaali daana. Enti ta higgiya kaallana; ta wogaa minthidi naagana.
EZE 37:25 Taani ta aylliya Yayqoobas immidanne enta mayzati de7ida biittan enti daana. He biittan enti, enta naytinne enta nayta nayti merinaw daana; ta aylley Dawiti enta bolla merinaw kawo gidana.
EZE 37:26 Ta entara sarotetha caaqo caaqana; he caaqoy merinaa caaqo gidana. Taani enta minthada essana; enta taybuwa darsana; ta keethaa merinaw enta giddon wothana.
EZE 37:27 Taani yan entara daana; entaw Xoosse gidana; enti ta ase gidana.
