DAN 6:28 Daaneli Daariyosa kawotetha wodenne Farse kawa Qiroosa kawotetha wode ubban injetin de7is.
DAN 7:1 Babiloone kawoy Bilxasoori kawotida koyro laythan, Daaneli ba arsan zin7idi, amuhonne qoncethi be7is. Ba amuhuwan be7ida ayfe qofata xaafis.
DAN 7:2 Daaneli haysada yaagis: “Salope yida oyddu carkoti gita abba buqishin ta qamma qoncethan be7as.
DAN 7:3 Issoy issuwafe dumma gidida oyddu gita do7ati abbafe keyidosona.
DAN 7:4 “Koyro do7ay gaammo daanees; iyaw argantha qefey de7ees. Ta be7ishin, iya qefey shodetin, sa7ape dendidi, asada nam7u tohon eqanaada oosetis; iyaw asa wozani imetis.
DAN 7:5 “Nam7antho do7ay issi bagga dhoqu gidi eqida Babanthi geetetiya do7a daanees. He do7ay heedzu gaylle meqethi ba doonan baaridi, ba achan saxidi oykis. Ika, ‘Denda; kallana gakanaw asho ma’ geetetis.
DAN 7:6 “Hessafe kaallada, maahe daaniya hara do7a be7as. Iya zokon kafo qefe daaniya oyddu qefeti de7oosona. Iyaw oyddu huupheti de7oosona; iyaw haaro maati imetis.
DAN 7:7 “Hessafe guye, qamma qoncethan yashshiya, daganthiyanne daro mino gidida oyddantho do7a be7as. Iyaw gita birata achi de7ees. I banan gahetiya ubbaa entan mentherethidi mees; attidaysata ba tohuwan yedherethees. Kase ta be7ida do7ata ubbaafe I dummatees; iyaw tammu kacey de7ees.
DAN 7:8 Taani he kacetaba qopishin, enta giddofe hara issi guutha kacey keyishin be7as. He kacey hanko kacetape heedzata dhoqollidi holis. He qaciyas asa ayfe daaniya ayfeynne otoron odetiya inxarsi de7ees.
DAN 7:9 “Taani hessa be7ishin, araatati utethas giigidosona. Merinaw De7eysi ba araatan uttis; iya ma7oy shachada, iya huuphe binaanay muqaadada boothu. Iya araataynne araata gertoy tamada locees.
DAN 7:10 Iya araata giddofe tama shaafi pultidi, keyees. Mukulu toho mukulan taybeteysati iyaw oothosona; tammu mukulu toho tammu mukulan taybeteysati iya sinthan eqoosona. Pirdi doometis; maxaafati dooyetidosona.
DAN 7:11 “Kacey odetiya otoro qaala taani si7ida gisho, iya cadda xeellas. Taani be7ishin do7ay hayqidi, eexiya taman yeggetidi, dhayis.
DAN 7:12 Hanko heedzu do7ata maatay eketis; shin enti guutha wode de7on daana mela entaw imetis.
DAN 7:13 “Taani, qamma qoncethan, asa na7a daaneysi salope shaarara yishin be7as. Merinaw de7eysako shiiqin, iya sinthe aathidosona.
DAN 7:14 Iyaw maati, bonchoynne kawotethi imetis; derey, kawotethatinne dumma dumma doonan odetiya ubbay haaretidosona. Iya maatay merinaw shaaretonna maata; iya kawotethaas zawi baawa.
DAN 7:15 “Taani, Daaneli, ta be7idaban dagammas; qoncethay tana hirgisis.
DAN 7:16 Taani yan eqidaysatape issuwako shiiqada, ha ubbaas tuma birshethay aybeko oychas. I taw iya birshetha ubbaa haysada yaagidi odis:
DAN 7:17 ‘Ha oyddu gita do7ati sa7an sinthafe dendana oyddu kawotethata.
DAN 7:18 Shin Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaa geeshshati iya kawotetha ekidi, merinaw bantaba oothana; merinaw kawotethaa enti laattana’ yaagis.
DAN 7:19 “Hessafe guye, taani hara do7ata ubbaafe dumma gidida yashshiya oyddantho do7aas de7iya tuma birshethaa eranaw koyas. He do7aas birata achinne naase birata xugunthi de7ees; I banan gahetiya ubbaa mentherethidi mees; attidaysa ba tohuwan yedherethees.
DAN 7:20 He do7aa huuphen de7iya tammu kacetabaanne guyepe keyidi, entafe heedzata dhoqollidi yeggida guutha kaciyaba eranaw koyas. He guutha qaciyas ayfeynne otoro qaala odetiya inxarsi de7ees. He kacey hankotape aadhidi yashshees.
DAN 7:21 Taani be7iya wode he kacey geeshshatara oletidi, enta xoonis.
DAN 7:22 Hessi haniday, Merinaw De7eysi yaana gakanawunne Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaa geeshshatas pirdana gakanaasa; enti kawotethaa laattiya wodey gakis.
DAN 7:23 “I birshethaa taw haysada yaagidi odis; ‘Oyddantho do7ay ha sa7an sinthafe dendana oyddantho kawotethaa. He kawotethay hara kawotetha ubbaafe dumma; I, biitta ubbaa maana, yedhananne mentherethana.
DAN 7:24 Tammu kaceti ha kawotethaafe dendana tammu kawota. Hessafe guye, kase tammu kawotape dumma gidida hara kawoy dendana. I, entafe heedzu kawota xoonidi haarana.
DAN 7:25 I, Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaa bolla otoron odetana; Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaa geeshshata un7ethana. Qassi wodetanne higgiya laammanaw amottana. Wodey, wodetinne wode baggay gakanaw, geeshshati iya maatape garsan haaretana.
DAN 7:26 Shin pirdi doometana; iya maatay kumethi eketana; I merinaw dhayana.
DAN 7:27 Salope garsan de7iya kawotethata maatay, wolqaynne gitatethay, Ubbaafe Dhoqa Xoossaa geeshshatas imetana. Iya kawotethay merinaw daana; biitta haareysati iyaw kiitetana; iya goyinnana’ ” yaagis.
DAN 7:28 Ta qoncethabay haysan wuris. Taani, Daaneli, ta qofan daro dagammas; ta som7oy bido gidis. Shin ubbaba taani ta wozanan wothas.
DAN 8:1 Bilxasoori kawotida heedzantho laythan, taani, Daaneli, kase be7ida qoncethaafe hara qoncethi be7as.
DAN 8:2 He qoncethan, Elama biittan, Suusa kataman, Ubaala shaafa matan eqada tana demmas.
DAN 8:3 He shaafa matan nam7u adussa kaceti de7iya dorsi eqis. Nam7u kacetape issoy guyepe dolis; shin koyro dolidaysafe adusse.
DAN 8:4 He dorsay ba kaciyan qaycanaw, wuloha, pudehanne dugeha bagga koolishin be7as. Iyara eqetanawunne iya wolqaafe kessi ekanaw ay meheyka danda7ibeenna. I, ba koydaba oothees; yaatidi gita gidis.
DAN 8:5 Taani ha qoncethabaa qopishin, issi deeshi wuloha baggafe keyidi, biitta kanthidi, tohoy sa7a yedhonna yis. Iya nam7u ayfetape giddon issi gita kacey de7ees.
DAN 8:6 I, daro yilora, shaafa matan taani be7ida nam7u kacera de7iya dorsaako yis.
DAN 8:7 I, daro yilotidi, ta be7ishin, dorsaa kaceti nam7ay meqana gakanaw, iita dom7e dom7is. Dorsay iyara eqetanaw wolqi dhayis; deeshay iya sa7an yeggidi yedhidi eqis. Deesha wolqaafe he dorsa ashshiyabay baawa.
DAN 8:8 He deeshay daro wolqaamis; shin iya wolqay darishe bin, iya gita kacey meqis. Iya bessan oyddu gita kaceti biitta oyddu baggaa simmidi diccidosona.
DAN 8:9 Ha oyddu kacetape issuwa bolla hara guutha kacey dolidi, dugeha, dolohanne Isra7eele biittako simmidi wolqara diccis.
DAN 8:10 I, bidi salon de7iya olanchota gakanaw diccidi, salo xoolintotape guuthata sa7an yeggidi enta yedhis.
DAN 8:11 Salo tora mocona gidida Xoossara bana likisana gakanaw dhoqu dhoqu gis. Iyaw gallas gallas yarshetiya yarshuwa diggis; iya keethaaka tunisis.
DAN 8:12 Nagara gaason olanchotinne gallas gallas yarshetiya yarshoy he kaciyas imetis. Tumi sa7an holetis; he kacey oothiyaba ubbay iyaw injetis.
DAN 8:13 Hessafe guye, issi geeshsha kiitanchoy, hara geeshsha kiitanchuwara odetishin taani si7as. Issoy issuwa, “Gallas gallas yarshetiya yarshuwaba, dhayo ehiya makallatethaba, salo olanchotinne xoossa keethay yedhetishe daanaba odiya, qoncethay awude poletanee?” yaagidi oychis.
DAN 8:14 I zaaridi, “Nam7u mukulunne heedzu xeetu wontanne omarsi gakanaw gam7ana; hessafe guye, xoossa keethay geeyana” yaagidi odishin si7as.
DAN 8:15 Taani, Daaneli, ha qoncethaa be7ashenne iya birshetha eranaw qopashe de7ishin, issi ase daaniyabay ta sinthan eqidaysa be7as.
DAN 8:16 Ubaala shaafape, “Gabreela, ha addiyas ha qoncethaa birshetha oda” giya girsi si7as.
DAN 8:17 I, yidi ta matan eqida wode, taani dagammada, sa7an kundas. I taako, “Asa na7aw, ha qoncethay wursetha wodiyaba odeysa akeeka” yaagis.
DAN 8:18 I taara odetiya wode, taani sa7an ta som7uwara gufannada, tana bala aggas. I tana sa7aape denthidi, ta tohuwan essis.
DAN 8:19 I taako, “Ha qoncethay wursetha wodiyaba bessiya gisho, Godaa hanqo gallasan hananaw de7iyaba ta new odana.
DAN 8:20 Neeni be7ida nam7u kacera de7iya dorsay, Meedonanne Farse kawota leemiso.
DAN 8:21 Deeshay Girike kawa leemiso; iya nam7u ayfiyape giddon de7iya gita kacey Girike kawa.
DAN 8:22 Kace meqin iya bessan dolida oyddu kaceti iya kawotethaafe shaaketidi keyana oyddu kawotethata leemiso. Shin enta wolqay koyro kawa wolqaa gakenna.
DAN 8:23 “Enta kawotethaa wursethan, enta nagaray zawa gakiya wode, iitanne cimmiya kawoy dendana.
DAN 8:24 I daro mino gidana; shin ba wolqan gidenna. I daganthiya dhayo dhaysana; I oothiyaba ubbay iyaw injetana. I mino asatanne geeshsha asata dhaysana.
DAN 8:25 I cimmiya gisho iyaw injetana; I bana ubbaafe dhoqu dhoqu oothana. Enti sa7i saro gidi de7ishin, entafe darota wodhana. I halaqata Halaqaara eqetana, shin I, asi bochona baw dhayana.
DAN 8:26 “New odetida nam7u mukulunne heedzu xeetu wontanne omarsa qoncethay tuma. Shin ha qoncethay daro wodepe guye poletanaw de7iya gisho, maatame iya bolla wothada gordada naaga” yaagis.
DAN 8:27 Taani Daaneli, daro daaburida gisho, saketada daro gallas zin7as. Hessafe guye, dendada, kawa oosos bas. Ha qoncethan taani daro dagammas; akeekanaw danda7abike.
DAN 9:1 Meedona asi gidida Arxekisisa na7ay, Daariyosi Babiloonen kawotis.
DAN 9:2 I kawotida koyro laythan, taani Daaneli, Geeshsha Maxaafata nabbabashe, nabey Ermiyaasi odidaysada, Yerusalaamey laapun tammu laythi laaletidi gam7anaw de7eysa akeekas.
DAN 9:3 Hessa gisho, kayo ma7o ma7ada, bido ta huuphen qolada, xoomashenne woossashe ta Godaa Xoossaako ta som7uwa zaaras.
DAN 9:4 Ta nagara paaxashe, Godaa, ta Xoossaa haysada yaagada woossas. “Abeeti Godaw, wolqaamanne yashshiya Xoossaw, nena doseysatasinne new kiiteteysatas ne merinaa siiquwanne caaquwa naageyso,
DAN 9:5 nu nagara oothida balida. Nu iitabaa hanida; makallida; ne kiitapenne ne higgiyafe kare keyida.
DAN 9:6 Nu kawotas, nu halaqatas, nu aawatasinne biittan de7iya asa ubbaas ne sunthan tinbite odida ne nabeta si7onna ixida.
DAN 9:7 “Abeeti Godaw, ne xillo; shin nuuni hachi yeella ma7ida. Yihudaninne Yerusalaamen de7iya asa ubbay new ammanetona ixin, ne haaho biittaninne mata biittan laallida Isra7eele asa ubbay yeellatida.
DAN 9:8 Abeeti Godaw, nuuni, nu kawoti, nu halaqatinne nu aawati nena naaqida gisho yeella ma7ida.
DAN 9:9 Shin nu iya bolla makallikoka, Goday nu Xoossay maariyanne atto giya Xoossi.
DAN 9:10 Nuuni nu Godaa, nu Xoossaa, kiitetibooko; qassi ba nabeta baggara immida iya higgiya naagibooko.
DAN 9:11 Isra7eele asa ubbay ne higgiya menthidi, kare keyidosona; new kiitetibookona. “Nu ne bolla nagara oothida gisho, Xoossa aylliya Muse Higge Maxaafan xaafetida baadethaynne pirday nu bolla gakis.
DAN 9:12 Qassi nu bollanne nuna kaaletheyisata bolla gita meto ehanaw ne odida qaala nu bolla poladasa. Yerusalaame bolla gakida metuwa meli salope garsan hara biitta bolla gakibeenna.
DAN 9:13 Muse Higgiyan xaafetidaysada, ha dhayo ubbay nu bolla gakis. Nuuni nu nagaraape simmibooko; ne tumaa si7ibooko; nena, Godaa, nu Xoossaa maarota oychibooko.
DAN 9:14 Goday ha dhayuwa nu bolla ehanaw guye gibeenna. Goday, nu Xoossay ba oothiyaba ubban xillo, shin nu iyaw kiitetonna ixida.
DAN 9:15 “Abeeti Godaw, nu Xoossaw, kase ne asaa, ne mino kushiyan Gibxefe kessada, hachi gakanaw ne sunthaa xeegisadasa; nuuni nagara oothida; balida.
DAN 9:16 Abeeti Godaw, neeni kase ne xillo ooso ubbaa oothidaysada, ha77i ne hanquwanne ne gaduwa ne katamaape, Yerusalaamepe, ne geeshsha zumaape dentha. Nuuni oothida nagaraynne nu aawati oothida balay Yerusalaamenne ne asaa nu yuushuwan de7iya ubbaa sinthan kawushis.
DAN 9:17 “Hiza nu Xoossaw, taani ne aylley woossiya woosaanne magannuwa si7a. Godaw, ne sunthaa gisho gada, ha laaletida ne keethaa, ne keeha ayfiyan xeella.
DAN 9:18 Abeeti ta Xoossaw, ne haythaa nuuko zaara; ne ayfiya dooyada, ne sunthay xeegetida katamaa dhayuwa be7a. Nuuni, nena woossey, nu xillotethaa gisho gidonashin, ne gita maarotethaa gishosa.
DAN 9:19 Abeeti Godaw, si7a! Abeeti Godaw, atto gada! Abeeti Godaw, ne oosuwa qoncisa! Ne katamaynne ne asay ne sunthan xeegetida gisho, abeeti ta Xoossaw, ne sunthaa gisho gam7ofa.”
DAN 9:20 Taani woossashe, ta nagaraanne ta asaa Isra7eele nagaraa paaxashenne ta Xoossaa geeshsha zumabaa, Yerusalaameba Godaa, ta Xoossaas odashe gam7as.
DAN 9:21 Taani woosa bolla de7ishin, kase qoncethan ta be7ida Gabreeley, taako eeson piradhishe, omarsa yarsho yarshiya wode puttu gis.
DAN 9:22 I haysada yaagidi, taw odis: “Daanela, ta new eranne akeeka immanaw ha77i yas.
DAN 9:23 Neeni buroo woosa doomida wode ne woosa zaaroy imetis; ta hessa new odanaw yas. Xoossay nena daro dosees. Hessa gisho, ta odeysa qopa; qoncethaa akeeka.
DAN 9:24 “Xoossay ne asaasinne ne geeshsha katamaas qachida wodey, laapun toho laapun tammu laythi. He wode naaqoy wurana; nagara oosoy attana; qohoy atto geetetana; merinaa xillotethi kawotana; qoncethinne tinbitey poletana Ubbaafe Geeshsha bessay tiyettana.
DAN 9:25 “Haysa era; akeeka. Yerusalaame oorathanawunne keexanaw kiiti keyida gallasaape bidi tiyetida Halaqay yaana gakanaw, laapun toho laapunanne usupun tammanne nam7u toho laapun laythi aadhana. He wode Yerusalaame katamay ooraxana; ogetinne yuusho gimbeti oosetana; shin gimbetiya wodey, meto wode gidana.
DAN 9:26 Usupun tammanne nam7u toho laapun laythafe guye Tiyetidaysi hayqana; iyaw aykoyka attibeenna. Yaana halaqa olanchoti katamaanne Xoossaa keetha laallana. He katamaa wursethay di7oda akeekona yaana. He wodepe bidi wursethi gakanaw olinne dhayoy awaajetis.
DAN 9:27 Laapun laytha giddon, he halaqay asaara mino caaqo caaqetana. He laapun laythata bagga zawan yarshonne imota diggana. Awaajetida pirday, iya bolla tigetana gakanaw, I dhayo ehiya tunatethaa xoossa keethan essana” yaagis.
DAN 10:1 Farse kawoy Qiroosi kawotida heedzantho laythan, Bilxasoora geetetiya Daaneli hara qoncethi be7is. He qoncethay tuma; qoncidabay wolqaama olaba. He qoncethaa erana mela akeeki iyaw imetis.
DAN 10:2 He wode taani, Daaneli, heedzu saaminta yeekas.
DAN 10:3 Heedzu saamintay wurana gakanaw kathi mabike; ashoy woyko woyne ushshi ta doonako shiiqibenna; ta huuphiya tiyettabike
DAN 10:4 Koyro ageenan laatamanne oyddantho gallasan, gita Xegroosa shaafa matan eqas.
DAN 10:5 Taani xeelliya wode liino ma7o ma7ida issi addiya be7as. I ba xeessan Afeeza worqafe oosetida danco dancis.
DAN 10:6 Iya asatethay phooliya al7o shuchu daanees; iya som7oy wol7antha mela wol7amees; iya ayfey tama laco daanees; iya kusheynne iya tohoy qushetida naase biratada poo7ees; iya qaalay daro asa girsada kooshimmees.
DAN 10:7 Ha qoncetha taani, Daaneli tarka be7as. Taara de7iya asay be7ibookona; enti daro dagammida gisho baqatidi qosetidosona.
DAN 10:8 Taani ha gita qoncethaa be7ashe, tarka attas. Taw wolqi ixin daaburas; ta som7oy bullatis.
DAN 10:9 Taani iya kooshincha si7ida wode sa7an ta som7uwara gufannada, tana bala aggas.
DAN 10:10 Hessafe guye, issi kushey tana bochis; taani kokorashin, ta kushiyaninne ta gulbatan tana denthidi essis.
DAN 10:11 I taako, “Daro dosetida Daanela, taani new odiya qaala loythada akeeka; denda eqa. Taani kiitetada neeko yas” yaagis. I taako haysada gin, taani kokorashe denda eqas.
DAN 10:12 Qassika, “Daanela, yayyofa! Neeni akeeka demmanaw qopada, ne Xoossaa sinthan nenatethaa kawushida koyro gallasape doomidi, ne woosay si7etis; ta new zaaro ekada yas.
DAN 10:13 Shin Farse kawotethaa halaqa gidida ayyaanay laatamanne issi gallas tana teqis. Taani, tarka Farse kawotethaa halaqaara yan attida gisho, kiitanchota halaqatape issoy, Mika7eeli, tana maaddanaw yis.
DAN 10:14 Ha qoncethay sinthafe hananaba bessiya gisho, taani neeko yiday, wursetha gallasan ne asaa bolla hananaw de7iyaba new qoncisanaasa” yaagis.
DAN 10:15 I hessa taw odiya wode, taani sa7an gufannada, gaanaba dhayas.
DAN 10:16 Hessafe guye, ase daaniya issoy ta mettersha bochis; ta doonay dooyetin, odetethi doomas. Ta sinthan eqidaysako, “Ta godaw, ha qoncethay tana daro daganthida gisho daro daaburas.
DAN 10:17 Taani ne aylley, neera, ta godaara waanada odetanaw danda7ayna? Ta wolqay wuris; shempanawuka taw ixetis” yaagas.
DAN 10:18 He ase daaniya issoy nam7antho tana bochidi, taw wolqa immis.
DAN 10:19 I taako, “Daro dosetida addiyaw yayyofa! Saroy new gido. Minna; xaala” yaagis. I hessa gidi tana minthin, taani minnada, “Ta Godaw, neeni tana minthida gisho taw oda” yaagas.
DAN 10:20 I zaaridi, “Taani neeko ayis yidaako ne eray? Ha77i ta simmada Farse halaqa gidida ayyaanara oletanaw baana; taani biiko Girike halaqa gidida ayyaanay yaana.
DAN 10:21 Shin Tuma Maxaafan xaafetidaba taani new odana. Taani entara oletiya wode, hinte halaqaa Mika7eelape attishin, tana maaddiya hari baawa.”
DAN 11:1 “Meedona asi gidida Daariyosi, kawotida koyro laythan, taani iya maaddanawnne minthethanaw iya miyen eqas.”
DAN 11:2 “Hiza ta new tuma odayis. Hara heedzu kawoti Farse biittan kawotana; entafe guye kawotiya oyddantho kawoy, hankotape aadhida dure gidana. I ba duretetha gaason wolqa demmiya wode, asa ubbay Girike kawotethaara oletana mela denthethana.
DAN 11:3 “Hessafe guye, wolqan haariya mino kawoy dendidi, ba koydaba ubbaa oothana.
DAN 11:4 I wolqan minnida wode iya kawotethay laaletidi, oyddu bessan shaaketana. Iya kochati iya kawotethaa laattokona; kawotethay I kase ayseysada wolqaama gidenna; iya kawotethay iyape eketidi, haratas imetana.
DAN 11:5 “Dugeha biitta kawoy mino gidana; shin iya shuumatape issoy iyape daro minnidi, he gita kawotethaa haarana.
DAN 11:6 Guutha laythafe guye, dugeha biitta kawoynne pudeha biitta kawoy banta giddon dabbotetha caaqo caaqetana. Dugeha biitta kawa na7iya pudeha biitta kawa gelana; shin I wolqay minnenna; qassi ika iya wolqayka daro wode gam7enna. He wode, iira issife, iyo maaddeysati, I na7aynne I azinay, ubbay aadhidi imetana.
DAN 11:7 “Guutha wudepe guye, I dabbotape issoy dugeha biittan kawotana. Pudeha biitta kawa bolla dendana; iya miixaa menthi gelidi iya xoonana.
DAN 11:8 Qassi enta xoossata, misiletanne birapenne worqafe oosetida miisheta ekidi, Gibxe efana. Guutha wodes pudeha biitta kawa olanaw dendenna.
DAN 11:9 Pudeha biitta kawoy dugeha biitta kawa bolla dendana; shin ba yida ogiyara guye simmana.
DAN 11:10 “Pudeha biitta kawa adde nayti olas giigidi, daro olanchota shiishana. Entara gahetiyaba ubbaa meeccidi efiya wolqaama di7oda kanthidi aadhana; zaari olidi dugeha kawa miixaa gakanaw baana.
DAN 11:11 He wode dugeha biitta kawoy daro hanqetidi, pudeha biitta kawa olanaw dendana. Pudeha biitta kawoy shiishida daro olanchotara oletidi, enta xoonana.
DAN 11:12 Daro olanchota di77idaape guye, otoron punetana. Daro mukulu asaa wodhana; shin iya xoonoy iyara gam7enna.
DAN 11:13 “Pudeha biitta kawoy kaseysafe aadhiya hara olanchota giigisana. Guutha laythi gam7idaape guye, kumetha ola miishe oykida, olanchota ekidi olas keyana.
DAN 11:14 He wode daro asay dugeha biitta kawa bolla dendana. Qoncethay poletana mela ne asaape issi issi makallanchoti dendana, shin enti xoonokona.
DAN 11:15 Pudeha biitta kawoy dugeha biitta yidi, yuushoy gimbetida issi katama olidi oykana. Dugeha biitta kawa olanchoti wolqa dhayana; hari attoshin, entafe mino olanchotika entara eqetanaw danda7okona.
DAN 11:16 Iyara eqetanaw danda7ey bayna gisho pudeha biitta kawoy ba koydaba ubbaa oothana. I dooretida biittan minni eqidi, iya dhaysiya wolqa demmana.
DAN 11:17 I ba kawotethan de7iya wolqa ubbaa ekidi yaanaw halchana; dugeha biitta kawuwara dabbotetha caaqo medhana. He kawotethaa dhaysanaw halchidi, ba na7iw iyaw immana, shin iya halchoy poletenna.
DAN 11:18 Ba som7uwa yuushoy abban teqetida biittatako zaaridi, entafe darota olidi baw ekana. Shin issi toora moconay iya xoonidi iya otoruwa giishshana; iya otoro odaa iya bolla zaarana.
DAN 11:19 Pudeha biitta kawoy ba biitta, ba miixako simmana. Shin I dhubetidi kundana; iya nam7antho oonika be7enna.
DAN 11:20 “Iya bessan kawotiya hara kawoy ba kawotetha bonchuwa naaganaw giira giirsiya ase kawotethaa giddo kiittana. Gidoshin, guutha wodepe guye, qoncen woyko olan gidonashin, I coo hayqidi dhayana.
DAN 11:21 “Iya bessan issi kadhetida asi dendana; shin enti iyaw kawotetha boncho immokona. Asay sa7i saro gidi uttidashin, cimmidi kawotethaa oykana.
DAN 11:22 Daro olanchoti iya sinthafe pitetidi dhayana; caaqo halaqayka hayqana.
DAN 11:23 Iyara caaquwa caaqi simmidi, ba oothiyaba cimon oothana; guutha asata xalaalara I minnana.
DAN 11:24 Asay sa7i saro gidi uttidashin, he biittan I, daro dure gidida issi baggaa oykana. Kase iya aaway woyko iya mayzay oothiboonnaba oothana; I di77idi shiishida duretethaanne aquwa bana kaalleysatas gishana. I miixata laallanaw halchana; shin hessi hananay guutha wodesa.
DAN 11:25 Ba wolqaa minthidi, daro olanchotara dugeha biitta kawa bolla dendana. Dugeha biitta kawoy daronne wolqaama olanchotara olas dendidi, iyara oletana. Shin iya bolla enti maqida maquwa gaason, I entara eqetanaw danda7enna.
DAN 11:26 Kawuwara issi gaytan meysati iya dhaysana; iya olanchoti pitetana; daroti olan hayqana.
DAN 11:27 Ha nam7u kawoti banta wozanan iita qofa oykidi, issife issi gayta bolla uttana; issoy issuwa cimmanaw wordo odetana. Shin qametida wodey buroo gakiboonna gisho enti oothana gidi qopiyabay entaw injetenna.
DAN 11:28 Pudeha biitta kawoy daro duretethara ba biitta simmana. Shin I ba wozanan geeshsha caaquwa ixana. Geeshsha caaquwa qohanaw iya bolla issiba oothidi, ba biitta simmana.
DAN 11:29 “Qametida wodey gakin, I zaaridi dugeha biitta bolla dendana, shin iyaw kaseysada injetenna.
DAN 11:30 Kiximape yaa olaa markabeti iya daganthana. Guye simmidi, geeshsha caaquwa bolla hanqetana. Qassi yaape simmidi, geeshsha caaquwa aggidaysatara dabbotana.
DAN 11:31 “Iya olanchoti Xoossa keethaanne iya yuushuwa tunisana; gallas gallas yarshetiya yarshuwa diggana. Yaatidi, dhayo tunatetha yan essana.
DAN 11:32 I caaqo qaala mentheyisata, cimo qaalan ba bagga zaarana; shin banta Xoossaa eriya asay minnananne iyara eqetana.
DAN 11:33 “Asaa giddon de7iya cincati daro asaa tamaarsana. Shin guutha woden he asati mashshan hayqana, taman xuugetana, di7etana woyko bonqetana.
DAN 11:34 He metuwa giddon de7ishe, enti guutha maado demmana; daro asay enta bagga daanidi, entako simmana; shin tuma wozanape gidenna.
DAN 11:35 Cincatape issoti issoti dhubetana. Qametida wodey buroo gakiboonna gisho, enti hessada hanidi, wursetha wodey gakanaw, paacetidi keyana, geeyananne borey baynayisata gidana.”
DAN 11:36 “Kawoy bana lo77idaba oothana; bana xoossata ubbaafe dhoqu oothidi gitayana; xoossata Xoossaa bolla kase si7etidi eronna iita qaala odetana. Hananaw de7iyabay hananaw bessiya gisho, Xoossa hanqoy poletana gakanaw I oothiyaba ubbay iyaw injetana.
DAN 11:37 I, ba mayzata xoossata woyko maccasay dosiya xoossata kadhana. I bana ubbaafe aathidi dhoqu oothiya gisho, hara xoossata ekenna.
DAN 11:38 I enta boncho aggidi miixata xoossaa bonchana; iya mayzati eronna xoosse, worqa, bira, al7o shuchinne lo77o imota immidi bonchana.
DAN 11:39 Imatha xoossan maadetidi, I mino miixata bolla dendana. Qassi iya maata eriya asaa daro bonchana. I enta, asaa bolla shuumana; biitta woyto oothidi entaw shaaki shaaki immana.
DAN 11:40 “Wursetha wodey gakin, dugeha biitta kawoy dendidi, pudeha biitta kawa olana. Shin pudeha biitta kawoy para gaareta, para asatanne daro markabeta ekidi, iya bolla goteda yaana. Daro biitta oykidi, di7oda meecidi efana.
DAN 11:41 I geeshsha biitta bolla dendana; daro biittati iya kushen kundana. Shin Edoomey, Moo7abeynne Amoonepe dariya baggay iya kushepe attana.
DAN 11:42 I daro biittata bolla dendiya wode, Gibxeyka iyape kessi ekenna.
DAN 11:43 Gibxe worqaa, biraanne duretetha ubbaa, ba kushen aathana. Liibenne Tophe asay iyaw haaretana.
DAN 11:44 Shin doloha baggaafenne pudeha baggafe yaa oday, iya daganthana. Hanqo eexi keyidi, darota wodhananne dhaysana.
DAN 11:45 I ba kawota dunkaaniya abbaafenne lo77o geeshsha zumaape giddon tokana. Shin I, wursethan baw dhayana; iya maaddiya oonika bentenna.”
DAN 12:1 “He wode ne asaa naagiya gita halaqay, Mika7eeli dendana. Kawotethi medhetida wodiyape doomidi, hani eronna meto wodey yaana. Gidoshin, enta sunthay Xoossa Maxaafan xaafetida ne asa ubbay he wode attana.
DAN 12:2 Hayqida asaape daroti dendana. Entafe baggati merina de7os, baggati qassi yeellasinne merinaa kawushas dendana.
DAN 12:3 Cincati salo poo7oda qassi darota xillotetha oge kaaletheysati merinaw xoolintoda poo7ana.
DAN 12:4 Shin neno Daanela, ne wursetha wodey gakanaw, ha maxaafa gordada, maatame wotha. Daroti eratethi demmanaw yaanne haanne woxeretana” yaagis.
DAN 12:5 Taani, Daaneli, nam7u asata, issoy shaafape hafintha, issoy shaafape hefinthan eqidaysata be7as.
DAN 12:6 Entafe issoy liino ma7idi, shaafape bolla baggara eqida kiitanchuwa, “Ha malaatati poletanaw ay mela wode gam7anee?” yaagidi oychis.
DAN 12:7 Liino ma7idi, shaafape qommo baggara eqida kiitanchoy, ba ushacha kushiyanne ba haddirsa kushiya salo denthidi, merinaw de7eysa sunthan haysada yaagidi caaqis: “Haysi, wodey, wodetinne wode baggay gakanaw gam7ana; geeshsha asata wolqay wuriya wode ha ubbay poletana” yaagis.
DAN 12:8 Ha ubba taani si7as, shin taw gelibeenna. Yaatin, taani, “Ta Godaw, ha ubbaas wursethay ay gidandee?” gada oychas.
DAN 12:9 I zaaridi, “Daanela, ha qaalay wursetha wodey gakanaw gordetidanne attametida gisho neeni ba;
DAN 12:10 Daroti paacetidi keyana, geeyananne borey baynayisata gidana; shin iitati, iitabaa oothana. Iitatape issi asika akeekenna; shin cincati akeekana.
DAN 12:11 “Gallas gallas yarshetiya yarshoy digetidaapenne dhayo tunatethay he bessan eqidaape simmin, 1,290 gallas.
DAN 12:12 Gencidi 1,335 gallas gakanaw naagiya asi anjetidaysa.
DAN 12:13 “Neeni wursethi gakanaw ba. Ne shempana; wursethan nena gakiya laata ekanaw dendana” yaagis.
HOS 1:1 Ooziyani, Iyo7atami, Akaazinne Hizqiyaasi kaalli kaalli Yihudan kawotida wode qassi Yo7aasa na7ay Iyorbaami Isra7eelen kawotida wode Bi7eera na7aa Hoseko yida Godaa qaalay haysa.
HOS 1:2 Goday koyro Hose baggara odida wode “Ta asay taape haakidi iita laymatethi oothida gisho, neeni bada, layma maccas ekada layma nayta iipe yela” yaagis.
HOS 1:3 Hessa gisho, Hosey bidi, Dibilayma na7iw Gomero ekin, iya qanthatada adde na7a yelasu.
HOS 1:4 Yaatin, Goday Hoseko ne na7a suntha, “Izra7eele” (laallana woyko zerana) yaagada suntha. Ayis giiko, Izra7eelen gukida suuthaa gisho taani Iyyu kochaa qantha woden pirdana; Isra7eele kawotethaaka dhaysana.
HOS 1:5 He gallas taani Izra7eela zangaaran Isra7eele olanchota mentherethana.
HOS 1:6 Gomera nam7antho qanthatada, macca na7a yelasu. Yaatin, Goday Hoseko, “I suntha Loruhaama (Maarotethi demmonaaro) yaagada suntha. Ayis giiko, hizape guye taani Isra7eele asas qadhetike; entaw atto giike.
HOS 1:7 Shin taani Yihuda asaas qadhetana; taani enta dongen woyko mashshan woyko olan woyko paratan woyko para asatan gidonashin, taani Goday, enta Xoossay, ta wolqan enta ashshana” yaagis.
HOS 1:8 Gomera Loruhaamo dhanthi duuthidaape guye qanthatada hara adde na7a yelasu.
HOS 1:9 Yaatin, Goday Hoseko, “Iya sunthaa Lo7aama (Ta ase gidenna) yaagada suntha. Ayis giiko, hinte ta ase gideketa; taka hinte Xoosse gidike.
HOS 1:10 “Gidoshin, Isra7eele asay makanawunne taybanaw danda7etonna abba shafiya mela gidana. Enti, ‘Hinte ta ase gideketa’ geetetidi xeegetida bessan hinte ‘De7o Xoossaa nayta’ geetetana.
HOS 1:11 Yihuda asaynne Isra7eele asay issife shiiqidi bantaw issi halaqa dooridi di7etida biittafe simmananne injetidi daana. He gallasay Izra7eeles gita gallas gidana.
HOS 2:1 “Hinte ishata, ‘Ta ase’ qassi hinte micheta, ‘Maarotethi demmidaysata’ yaagidi xeegite.
HOS 2:2 “Hinte aayiw hanqetite; iyo kaccite. Ayis giiko, iya ta macho giduku; taka I azina gidike. Iya ba som7uwafe laymatetha mallaa diggo; laymatetha oosuwa ba dhanthata giddofe diggo.
HOS 2:3 Hessi hanonna ixiko iya yeletida gallasaada, taani iyo xire kallo ashshana. Qassi iyo melida mela biitta oothana; taani iyo saamon wodhana.
HOS 2:4 Enti laymepe yeletida nayta gidida gisho, taani I naytas qadhetike.
HOS 2:5 Enta aayiya laymatasu; kawushabaa hanada enta qanthatasu. Iya, ‘Taani ta kathaanne ta haatha, ta suufiyanne ta liinuwa, ta zaytiyanne ta ushsha taw immiya ta laggethota kaallada baana’ yaagasu.
HOS 2:6 Hessa gisho, taani I ogiya agunthan gordana; iya ba ogiya demmonna mela taani I yuushuwa gimben dirana.
HOS 2:7 Iya ba laggethota geedo woxana, shin gakuku; enta koyana, shin demmuku. Hessafe guye, ‘Ha77i duussaafe taw beniysi lo77o gidiya gisho, simmada ta koyro azinaako baana’ yaagana.
HOS 2:8 Kathaa, woyne ushshaanne zaytiya iw immidaynne enti Ba7aale eeqas yarshiya biraanne worqaa iw darsiday tana gideysa iya eronna ixasu.
HOS 2:9 Hessa gisho, kaxiya wode ta kathaa, teeriya wode ta woyniya iipe zaarada ekana. Iya ba kalluwa kammiya suufiyanne liinuwa iipe qaara ekana.
HOS 2:10 I laggethota sinthan taani I kalluwa qaarana; ta kushiyape iyo oonika ashshena.
HOS 2:11 Taani I ufaysa ba7aaleta ubbaa, ageena xeero gallasata, I Sambaata gallasata, laythan laythan bonchetiya ba7aaleta ashshana.
HOS 2:12 Iya, ‘Ta laggethoti taw immida ciga’ giya woyniyanne balase mithaa ta dhaysana; taani he bessa wora oothana; bazzo do7ati iya maana.
HOS 2:13 Iya tana dogada ba laggethota kaallada, sagaayotaninne alleeqotan alleeqetada, Ba7aale eeqas ixaane cuyisida gallasata gisho taani iyo seerana; yaagees Goday.
HOS 2:14 “Hessa gisho, taani iyo cimmada mela biitta ehada, iw siiqo qaalan odana.
HOS 2:15 Yan taani I woyne gade iw zaarada immana; Akoora zangaara (meto zangaara) iw ufaysa penge oothana. Gibxe biittafe keyida wodiyada ba geela7otetha laythan de7iya hanotan ufaysan yexana” yaagees.
HOS 2:16 He gallas iya tana, “Ta azinaw” yaagada xeegana; kaseysada, “Ta godaw” yaagada xeeguku.
HOS 2:17 Ayis giiko, taani I doonape “Ba7aale” eeqata sunthaa diggana; hizape guye taani iyo “Ba7aale” suntha xeegisike.
HOS 2:18 He wode taani ta asaa gisho sa7aa do7atara, salo kafotaranne biittara gooshetiya medhetethatara caaqana. Taani biittafe donge, mashshenne ola dhaysana. Enti biitta bolla saro daana.
HOS 2:19 Taani nena merinaw taw macho oothana; xillotethan, suure pirdan, merinaa siiquwaninne maarotethan taw giigisana.
HOS 2:20 Taani ammanetada nena taw giigisana; neka Godaa erana.
HOS 2:21 “He wode taani zaaro immana; taani salotas zaaro immana, saloti sa7aas zaaro immana.
HOS 2:22 Sa7ay kathaas, woyne ushshasinne zaytiyas zaaro immana; enti Izra7eeles (Xoossay tokana) zaaro immana.
HOS 2:23 Taani iyo ta gisho gada biitta bolla tokana; Kase taani, ‘Maarike’ gidaysata maarana; ‘Ta ase gideketa’; gidaysata, ‘Ta ase’ gaana. Entika tana, ‘Neeni nu Xoossaa’ yaagana” yaagees Goday.
HOS 3:1 Goday tana, “Isra7eele asay hara xoossatako simmidi, zabibe uythaa yarshanaw koykoka, Goday enta doseysada iyo dosa. Iya hara laggethiyabanne laymatiyaba gidikoka neeni iyo dosa” yaagis.
HOS 3:2 Yaagin, taani iyo tammanne ichashu bira santimeninne xeetanne ishatamu kilo giraame bangan shammas.
HOS 3:3 Taani iyo, “Neeni laymatonnanne hara addera doonna taara daro wode daanaw koshshees. Taanika neera daana” yaagas.
HOS 3:4 Isra7eele asay kawoy woyko halaqi bayna, yarshoy woyko eeqa tuussi bayna, efuude ma7oy woyko eeqa misiley bayna daro wode daana.
HOS 3:5 Hessafe guye, Isra7eele asay Godaa banta Xoossaakonne banta kawa Dawitako simmana. Wursetha wodiyan enti kokorishe, Godaakonne iya anjuwako yaana.
HOS 4:1 Ha biittan de7iya asa ubbaa, Goday mootiyabay de7iya gisho, Isra7eele asato, Godaa qaala si7ite. Hessika, biitta bolla ammanetethi, siiqoynne Xoossaa eroy baawa.
HOS 4:2 Ha biitta bolla de7ey baadethi, wordo, shempo wodho, kaysotonne layma xalaala. Enti woga ubbaa menthosona; suuthu gussoosona.
HOS 4:3 Hessa gaason biitta ubbay yeekana; biittan de7iya ubbay daaburana. Sa7a do7ati, salo kafotinne abba moloti hayqana.
HOS 4:4 Hinteno, kahineto, taani hintena mootiyabay de7iya gisho, oonika hara asara palametofo; woyko hara asi mootopo.
HOS 4:5 Hinte gallasinne qamma dhubeteeta; nabetika hintera dhubetoosona. Hessa gisho, taani hinte aayiw dhaysana.
HOS 4:6 Ta asaas eratethi bayna gisho dhayidosona. Hinte eratethi ixida gisho, taka hinte taw kahine gidonna mela ixas. Hinte Xoossaa higgiya dogida gisho, taka hinte nayta dogana.
HOS 4:7 Kahineta tayboy dari dari biya wode tana guji guji naaqidosona; taani enta bonchuwa qaarada yeellayana.
HOS 4:8 Ta asaa nagaray entaw kathi gidida gisho enti ta asay balaba oothana mela koyoosona.
HOS 4:9 Kahineti deriyape dummatibokona. Taani enta hanota gisho, enta seerana; enta oosuwada entaw zaarana.
HOS 4:10 Enti Godaa aggida gisho maana, shin kallokona; laymatana, shin na7a yelokona.
HOS 4:11 Laymatethi, gam7ida woyne ushshinne mal7anto woyne ushshi ta asaa wozanaa dhaysis.
HOS 4:12 Enti mithafe oosetida eeqa misile zore oychoosona; enta xam7ay enta oysha zaarees. Laymatetha ayyaanay enta balethis; enti banta Xoossaafe haakidi laymatidosona.
HOS 4:13 Dereta huuphen yarsho yarshoosona; lo77o kuyay de7iya wolaa garsan, xiidda garsan ixaane cuyisoosona. Hessa gisho, hinte macca nayti laymatoosona; hinte nayta macheti laammoosona.
HOS 4:14 Hinte macca nayti laymatiya wodenne hinte nayta macheti laammiya wode taani seerike. Ayis giiko, addeti banta huuphen laymateysatara laggetoosona; entara yarshoosona. Hessa gisho, akeeki bayna derey dhayana.
HOS 4:15 “Isra7eele asato, hinte laymatikoka, Yihuda asay hinteysada bala gidopo. Galgala boopite; Beet-Aweena (Iitatetha keethi) keyopite; ‘De7o Xoossay eriya mela’ gidi caaqofite.
HOS 4:16 Isra7eele asay geella ussada geellatis. Yaatin, Goday entana dalga denban dorsa marada waatidi heemmanee?
HOS 4:17 Efreemi eeqatara gahetis; enta aggaagite.
HOS 4:18 Enti daro woyne ushsha uyi simmidi, laymatethi aggokona; enta halaqatika yeellayaba daro dosoosona.
HOS 4:19 Enta carkoy efana; banta eeqas yarshida yarshota gaason enti yeellatana.”
HOS 5:1 “Hinteno kahineto, haysa si7ite! Hinteno Isra7eele asato, akeekite! Kawo keetha asato, loythi si7ite! Ha pirday hinte bolla pirdetis. Hinte Mixiphas xihe gidideta; Taabore zuma bolla miccetida giteda gidideta.
HOS 5:2 Geellati wodho aggibokona; hessa gisho, ta enta ubbaa seerana.
HOS 5:3 Taani Efreema erayis; Isra7eeley taape geemmibeenna. Efreema, neeni ha77i layma gidadasa; Isra7eeley tunis.”
HOS 5:4 “Isra7eele asay banta Xoossaako simmonna mela enta iita oosoy enta teqis. Laymatetha ayyaani enta wozanan de7iya gisho enti Godaa erokona.
HOS 5:5 Isra7eele asaa otoroy enta bolla markatees. Isra7eele asaynne Efreema asay banta nagara gaason dhubetoosona; Yihuda asayka entara dhubetees.
HOS 5:6 Enti Godaas yarshanaw banta dorsa wudiyanne mehe wudiya laagi ekidi iya koyanaw baana; shin I entafe shaaketida gisho iya demmokona.
HOS 5:7 Enti laymatethan nayta yelida gisho Godaas ammanetibokona. Hessa gisho, issi ageenan entinne enta biittay dhayana.
HOS 5:8 Gib7a kataman moyze, Rama kataman zaye punnite. Biniyaame asaw, ‘Guye simmidi be7ite’ yaagidi Beet-Aweenan waassite.
HOS 5:9 Seeretiya wode Efreemi baysa gidana. Isra7eele kochaa giddon tuma hananaba taani awaajana.
HOS 5:10 “Goday, ‘Yihuda halaqati zawa sugiya asa mela gididosona; taani ta hanquwa enta bolla di7o haathada gussana.
HOS 5:11 Efreema asay eridi eeqa goyinnida gisho, suure pirdan un7etidosona; tinchetidosona.
HOS 5:12 Hessa gisho, taani Efreema asaas bile, Yihuda asaas xoodha gidana.
HOS 5:13 “ ‘Efreemi ba hargiya, Yihudi ba madunthaa be7ida wode Efreemi Asoore biitta bis; he gita kawa maado oychis. Shin I enta hargiya dhallanaw woyko enta madunthaa pathanaw danda7ibeenna.
HOS 5:14 Hessa gisho, taani Efreemas gaammoda hanana; Yihudas wodala gaammoda hanana. Taani enta mentherethada eka baana; oonika enta ta kushepe ashshena.
HOS 5:15 Enti banta bala akeekana gakanawunne tana koyana gakanaw taani guye ta bessaa simmana. Enti banta waayan tana minthidi koyana’ ” yaagees.
HOS 6:1 Isra7eele asay, “Haayite! Ane Godaako simmoos. I nuna mentherethis, shin I nuna koolana; I nuna madunxisis, shin I nu madunthaa qachana.
HOS 6:2 Nam7u gallasape guye I nuna pathana; heedzantho gallasan nu iya sinthan daana mela nuna denthana.
HOS 6:3 Ane Godaa eroos; iya eranaw minthidi kaalloos. Xalqey doleysada I qoncana; torche iri yeysada I nuuko yaana” yaagidosona.
HOS 6:4 Goday, “Ta hintena Efreema asaa waato? Ta hintena Yihuda asaa waato? Hinte siiqoy wonta xaasa mela; ellesidi dhayiya aka mela.
HOS 6:5 Hessa gisho, taani nabeta baggara hintena qanxerethas; ta doonape keyida qaalan hintena wodhas. Ta pirday hinte bolla poo7oda wagaggi gaana.
HOS 6:6 Ta yarsho gidonashin maarota koyayis; xuussa yarsho gidonashin Xoossaa ero koyayis.
HOS 6:7 “Shin enti Addaameda, caaqo menthidosona; yan taw ammanetona ixidosona.
HOS 6:8 Galada katamay suuthi gukiya iita ooso oothiya asay kumida katama.
HOS 6:9 Pangati ase wodhanaw qosetidi naageysada kahineta cugay hessada naagoosona. Seekema katamaa efiya ogiyan naagidi ase wodhoosona; enti yeellaya worandzo ooso oothosona.
HOS 6:10 Taani Isra7eele asaa giddon daganthiyaba be7as. Efreema giddon laymatethi de7ees; Isra7eeley tunis.
HOS 6:11 “Yihuda, taani ta asaa di7uwa zaariya wode new qassi caka wode giigisas.
HOS 7:1 “Taani Isra7eele pathanaw koyiya wode Efreema nagaraynne Samaare asaa iita oosoy qoncis. Enti ubba wode cimmoosona; kaysoti menthidi geloosona; pangati keyidi bonqoosona.
HOS 7:2 Shin taani enta iita ooso ubbaa ereysa akeekokona. Enta iita oosoy enta naaqi oykis; he iita oosoy ubba wode ta sinthan de7ees.
HOS 7:3 “Enti kawa banta iitatethan, halaqata banta worduwan ufaysoosona.
HOS 7:4 Enti ubbay laammoosona; munuqay dendana gakanaw daabbo uukeysi tama shiisho koshshonaysada enti teellida cooce mela.
HOS 7:5 Banta kawa boncho ba7aale gallasan halaqati woyne ushshan mathotidosona. Ika qelqiseysatas ba kushiya immis.
HOS 7:6 Enta wozanay tama cooce mela; enti shiiqidi iitabaa maqetidosona. Enta hanqoy qamma kumetha cuuyishe aqees; sa7i wontiya wode tama lacoda eexees.
HOS 7:7 Enti ubbay teellida cooce mela banta halaqata moosona. Enta kawoti ubbay kundidosona; entafe oonika tana xeegey baawa.
HOS 7:8 “Efreema asay hara kawotetha asaara walaketis; Efreema asay shiretiboonna uytha mela gidis.
HOS 7:9 Allagati iya wolqaa midosona, shin I hessa eribeenna; iya huuphey puulumis, shin I hessa akeekibena.
HOS 7:10 Isra7eele asaa otoroy enta bolla markatees. Hessi ubbay haninka enti Godaako, banta Xoossaako, simmibokona woyko iya koybookona.
HOS 7:11 “Efreema asay holleda eeyanne coo cimeteyisata. Enti maado demmanaw issi toho Gibxe; issi toho Asoore simmoosona.
HOS 7:12 Enti biya wode taani enta bolla gite yeggana; taani enta kafo oykiyada oykana. Enta iita oosuwa gisho taani enta seerana.
HOS 7:13 “Enta ayye! Enti taape haakidosona. Entaw dhayo gido! Enti ta bolla makallidosona. Taani enta wozanaw koyas, shin enti ta bolla wordo haasayoosona.
HOS 7:14 Banta hiixan zin7idi zeleelosona, shin banta wozanaape woossokona. Kathasinne woyne ushshas banta asatethaa gaarosona, shin enti taape haakidosona.
HOS 7:15 “Enta loohisidaynne minthiday tana, shin taw iitabaa maqetoosona.
HOS 7:16 Enti hadabaako simmidosona. Enti ammanthona donge gididosona. Enta halaqati iitaba odetida gisho mashshan wurana; hessika entaw Gibxen miichas gidana.
HOS 8:1 “Moyze punna! Enti ta caaquwanne ta higgiya menthida gisho, Godaa asaa bolla morkey ankoda aales.
HOS 8:2 Isra7eele asay, ‘Abeeti nu Xoossaw, nuuni nena eroos’ yaagidi taako waassoosona.
HOS 8:3 Shin Isra7eele asay lo77oba ixida gisho, morkey enta yedethana.
HOS 8:4 Enti tana oychonna bantaw kawota kawothidosona; ta eronna de7ishin bantaw halaqata dooridosona. Dhayanaw machidi eeqa misileta banta birapenne worqafe medhidosona.
HOS 8:5 Samaare asaw, hinte mari daanisidi medhida eeqa ta ixas; ta hanqoy hinte bolla eexis. Enti tunida mela awude gakanaw daanee?
HOS 8:6 Ha mara eeqa misiley kushe hiillan medhetisipe attishin, I xoosse gidenna. Samaare eeqa misiley meqeretana.
HOS 8:7 “Enti carko zeridi gote buucosona. Eqon de7iya enta kathaas ayfey bentenna; dhiilleyka baawa; ayfey de7ikoka allagati maana.
HOS 8:8 Isra7eele asay ha77i allaga asaa giddon mitetidosona; enti pathonna asi gididosona.
HOS 8:9 Enti baddo harey barka toylateysa mela toylatishe Asoore bidosona. Efreema asay banta miishiyan laggetho shammidosona.
HOS 8:10 Bantana maaddana mela miishen shammikoka ta enta shiishana. Kare biitta kawotinne halaqati entana un7ethin enti coo dhayana.
HOS 8:11 “Efreema asay nagara yarsho yarshiya daro bessata keexis, shin he yarsho bessati nagara oothiya bessi gididosona.
HOS 8:12 Taani entaw ta higgiyan darobaa xaafas, shin enti he higgiya allagabada xeellidosona.
HOS 8:13 Enti yarshanaw dosoosona; yarsho ashuwa moosona, shin Goday enta yarshuwa ekibeenna. I ha77i enta nagara hassayana; enta nagaraa gisho enta seerana; enti Gibxe biitta simmana.
HOS 8:14 Isra7eele asay bana Medhidaysa dogidi, kawo gadhota keexis. Yihuda asay gimbetida daro katamata keexis. Shin taani he katamatan tama yeddin, enta miixa maana” yaagees.
HOS 9:1 Isra7eele asato, ufaytofite! Hara kawotada poocu goopite! Hinte hinte Xoossaafe haakidi laymatideta; kathaa geeshshiya wudumman laymatethas immiya gatiya dosideta.
HOS 9:2 Hessa gisho, hinte wudummaafe kathi, gum7iya bessaafe woyne ushsha demmeketa; woyney hintew ayfena.
HOS 9:3 Enti Godaa biittan gam7okona. Efreemi Gibxe biitta simmana; Asoore biittan tuna kathi maana.
HOS 9:4 Enti Godaas woyne ushsha yarsho gussokona; enta yarshoy iya ufaysenna. He yarshoy entaw shocha mela gidana; hessa miya ubbay tunana. He kathay enta koshaa xalaala zaaranaasafe attishin, Godaara de7iya issifetethaas maaddenna.
HOS 9:5 Godaa hinte bonchana mela I hintew immida ba7aale gallasatan hinte ay oothanee?
HOS 9:6 Enti dhayope kessi ekikoka Gibxey enta shiishana; Mempisa katamay enta moogana. Enti shiishida bira miishe ubbaa sharaafi mittana; enti de7iya bessan buloy dolana.
HOS 9:7 Seera gallasi yis; pirda wodey gakis. Isra7eele asay hessa ero! Hinte nagaraa gishonne morketetha gisho nabey eeya mela Xoossa asi geetetidaysi gooshsha mela taybetis.
HOS 9:8 Nabey Xoossara gididi, Efreema naagees; shin iya ogiyan xihey yegetis; xoossa keethan iya morketethi naagees.
HOS 9:9 Gib7a kataman hanidaysada enti tunidosona. Xoossay enta naaquwa hassayana; nagaraa gisho enta seerana.
HOS 9:10 Goday, “Taani mela biittan woyne ayfe demmidaysada Isra7eele asaa demmas. Taani balase mithan koyro ayfe be7idaysada hinte aawata be7as. Shin enti Bi7eel-Fagoora geetetiya bessaa yidi, yeellayiya eeqas bantana dummayidosona; enti he dosida eeqada tunidosona.
HOS 9:11 Efreema bonchoy kafoda paalli dhayana; hizape guye yeloy baawa; qanthatoy baawa; atethi baawa.
HOS 9:12 Enti na7a yelidi dichiyaba gidikoka ta enta wodha wursana. Taani entafe haakida wode entana ayye!
HOS 9:13 Efreemi lo77o bessan toketida zamba mitha mela hanin be7as, shin ba nayta shukas aatha immis” yaagis.
HOS 9:14 Abeeti Godaw, entaw imma! Ne entaw ay immanee? Ne entaw boshetiya ulonne melida dhanthi imma.
HOS 9:15 Goday, “Enta iitatetha gisho taani Galgalan ixo doomas. Enta nagaraa gisho taani enta ta keethaafe gooddana; hizape guye ta enta dosike; enta halaqati ubbay geellata.
HOS 9:16 Efreemi deshetin, iya xaphoy melis; ayfeyka baawa. Enti na7a yelikoka taani enti dosiya nayta wodhana” yaagis.
HOS 9:17 Enti iyaw kiitetonna ixida gisho ta Xoossay enta pixiri holana; enti kawotethata giddon toylatishe daana.
HOS 10:1 Isra7eele asay daro ayfe ayfiya daayida woyne mela; enta ayfey darida mela eeqa yarsho bessata darsi keexidosona. Enta biittay duretida keena goyinniya eeqa tuussata alleeqisidi medhidosona.
HOS 10:2 Enta wozanay caaketis; ha77i enti banta nagaraa tookana. Goday enta yarsho bessata laallana; enta eeqa tuussata dhaysana.
HOS 10:3 He wode asay, “Nuuni Godaas yayyiboonna gisho, nuus kawoy baawa. Shin kawoy de7iyakoka nuus ay oothanee?” yaagana.
HOS 10:4 Enti hanonna ufaysa qaala geloosona; wordon caaqoosona; Hessa gisho, wodhiya harmey gaden doleysada enta bolla pirdi dolana.
HOS 10:5 Samaare kataman de7iya asay Beet-Aweenan de7iya mara misiliyas yashshan kokoroosona. Iya bonchoy iyape qaaretida gisho iyaw yeekana; he eeqa misiliya kahineti waassana.
HOS 10:6 He eeqa misiley Asoore tooketidi, bidi, gita kawas imota gididi imetana. Efreemi yeellatana; Isra7eeley eeqa misiliya gisho kawuyana.
HOS 10:7 Samaare kawoy haatha goponto gididi dhayana.
HOS 10:8 Isra7eele asay Aweena kataman eeqas goyinnishe, nagara oothiya dhoqa bessati laaletana. Enta yarsho bessan agunthinne gom7orey dolana. He wode enti deretako, “Nuna qosite!” zumatako, “Nuna genthite” yaagana.
HOS 10:9 Goday, “Isra7eele asaw, Gib7an hinte nagara ooso doomida wodiyape, hachi gakanaw nagara ooso aggibeketa. Hessa gisho, iita ootheyisata Gib7an oli wursibeenee?
HOS 10:10 Taani dosida wode he geellata seerana. Enti oothida daro nagaraa gisho taani enta seeriya wode kawotethati enta bolla dendana.
HOS 10:11 Efreemi kathi yedhanaw dosiya wadhi kessida wofaano mela. Shin taani iya lo77iya morgiyan qambara wothada waaxana. Yihuda asay worxafana; Yayqooba asay shirechana.
HOS 10:12 Goday yidi xillotethi hinte bolla bukisana gakanaw iya koyite. Hinte xillotethi zeriyaba gidiko merina siiqo cakana. Hessa gisho, othe biitta worxafite.
HOS 10:13 Shin hinte, hinte ogiyaninne hinte daro olanchotan ammanetida gisho, iitatethi zeridi nagaraa cakideta; hinte worduwa ayfiya mideta.
HOS 10:14 Hinte bolla wolqaama oli dendana; beni Kawoy Salmani Beet-Arbela katamaa olidi laallidaysadanne aayetanne nayta dhaysidaysada qassi hinte miixata dhaysana.
HOS 10:15 Beetele kataman de7eysato, hinte nagaray daro gidiya gisho hessa melabay hintena gakana. He gallas sa7i wontiya wode Isra7eele kawoy hayqana.
HOS 11:1 “Isra7eeley na7a de7iya wode iya dosiday tana; ta na7aa Gibxefe xeegas.
HOS 11:2 Taani enta darsada xeegin, enti taape daro haakidi bidosona. Ba7aale eeqatas yarsho yarshidosona; eeqa misiletas ixaane cuyisidosona.
HOS 11:3 Efreema asaa kushiya oykada hemethi tamaarsiday tana, shin enta pathiday tana gideysa erokona.
HOS 11:4 Taani enta qadheninne siiqo wodoron goochas; enta morgefe qambara denthada hokada enta muzas.
HOS 11:5 Enti taako simmonna ixidi Gibxe biitta simmana; Asoore biitta kawoy enta bolla kawotana.
HOS 11:6 Enta kataman mashshi dendana; enta katamata pengeta mentherethana; enta zoretay laaletana.
HOS 11:7 Ta asay taape haakanaw koyis. Enti Xoossaako waassikoka, I entana bonchenna.
HOS 11:8 Efreemi, taani nena waatada aggo? Isra7eele, taani nena waatada aatha immo? Taani nena waatada Adaama katamaada ootho? Taani nena waatada Xaboyma katamaada ootho? Taani nena daro dosiya gisho ta wozanay hessa ero geenna.
HOS 11:9 Taani hinte giddon de7iya Geeshsha Xoossaafe attishin, ase gidike. Hessa gisho, taani ta suulliya hanquwa hinte bolla ehike; nam7antho Efreema dhaysike; ta hanquwara hinteko yiike.
HOS 11:10 Enti Godaa kaallana; ika gaammoda gudana. I gudiya wode iya nayti wuloha baggafe kokorishe yaana.
HOS 11:11 Gibxefe kafoda, Asoorepe holleda paallishe yaana. Taani enta, enta keethan keethan wothana. Taani Goday hessa odas” yaagis.
HOS 11:12 Efreema asay wordon, Isra7eele asay cimon tana teqidosona. Yihuda asay ammanthiya Geeshsha Xoossaa bolla xaltaamis.
HOS 12:1 Efreema asay wontafe omarsi gakanaw doloha carko oykees woyko yedethees. Enti wordonne geellatethi darsoosona; Asoore biittara caaqidosona; shamaho zayte Gibxe biitta yeddoosona.
HOS 12:2 Godaas Yihuda asaara mootoy de7ees; I Yayqooba nayta enta ogiyada seerana; enta oosuwada entaw zaarana.
HOS 12:3 Yayqoobi ba aaye ulon de7ishe ba ishaa gindiya oykis. Dicci gakidi Xoossara butetis;
HOS 12:4 kiitanchora baaxetidi xoonis. Bana keeha ayfen xeellana mela ba ishaa yeekidi woossis. Yayqoobi Xoossaa Beetelen demmin Xoossay yan iyara haasayis.
HOS 12:5 I Godaa, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaa. Iya eretida sunthay Godaa geetetees.
HOS 12:6 Hessa gisho, hinte Xoossaako simmite; siiqonne suure pirdaa minthi oykite; hinte Xoossay oothana gakanaw naagite.
HOS 12:7 Zal7anchoy wordo mizaanen zal7ees; I asaa cimmanaw dosees.
HOS 12:8 Efreemi, “Taani daro dure; taani taw aqo demmas. Ta aqo ubban tanan enti bala woyko nagara demmokona.
HOS 12:9 Shin taani hintena Gibxe biittafe kessada ehida Godaa, hinte Xoossaa; Shaqara Ba7aale gallas hinte dunkaanen de7idaysada ta hintena zaara dunkaanen wothana.
HOS 12:10 Taani nabetas odas; daro qoncethi entaw immas; enta baggara daro leemisota odas” yaagis.
HOS 12:11 Galadi iita nagarancho; Galada asati pathonayisata. Enti Galgalan kormata yarshana. Enta yarsho bessay goshshan de7iya keela shuchada laaletana.
HOS 12:12 Yayqoobi Soore biitta baqatis; Isra7eeley macho ekanaw une oothis. Koyta immanaw yan dorse heemmis.
HOS 12:13 Goday Isra7eele asaa nabeta baggara Gibxe biittafe kessidi he nabeta baggara enta naagis.
HOS 12:14 Shin Efreemi Godaa daro hanqethis; I suuthi gussida gisho iya Goday achana; iya cashshaa iyaw zaarana.
HOS 13:1 Efreemi odetida wode si7ida ubbay yashshan kokoris; Isra7eele biittan enti bonchetida asi. Shin Ba7aale eeqa goyinnidosona; he nagara gaason hayqidosona.
HOS 13:2 Ha77ika nagara bolla nagara oothosona; banta bira sheeshidi bantaw eeqa medhidosona; hiillan oosetida misileta giigisidosona; ubbayka kushe hiillan medhetidosona. Asay entaba odishe, “Yarshiya asay mara eeqa misileta yeerite” yaagosona.
HOS 13:3 Hessa gisho, enti wonta shaara mela woyko wonta xaasa mela woyko carkoy wudummafe denthidi efiya puno mela woyko maskootera keya cuyaa mela gidana.
HOS 13:4 Goday “Taani hintena Gibxe biittafe kessada ehida Godaa, hinte Xoossaa. Hinte taape attishin, hara xoossi ereketa; ashshey taape hari baawa.
HOS 13:5 Bazzon, mela biittan taani hintena naagas.
HOS 13:6 Taani hintena muzin, midi kallidi otortideta; hessafe guye, tana dogideta.
HOS 13:7 Hessa gisho, taani hinte bolla gaammo gidana; maahe mela oge doonan zugana.
HOS 13:8 Mari eketida maahe mela taani hintera gahetada ta hintena puuzana. Taani hintena gaammoda mentherethana; bazzo do7ada hintena pooshshana.
HOS 13:9 “Isra7eele asato, hinte ta bolla, hintena maaddeysa bolla dendida gisho ta hintena dhaysana.
HOS 13:10 Hinte tana, ‘Nuus kawonne halaqa imma’ yaagidi oychideta. Hintena ashshiya hinte kawoy anee? Katamatan de7iya hinte halaqati awun de7oona?
HOS 13:11 Taani ta hanquwan hintew kawo immas; ta yiluwan iya denthas.
HOS 13:12 Efreema balaynne nagaray xaafetidi uttis.
HOS 13:13 Iqethi oykida maccasi un7eteysa mela un7i iya bolla yaana. Shin I eri bayna na7a; yeletiya wodey gakin, ba aaye ulope wodhonna ixiya na7a mela.
HOS 13:14 Taani enta duufope ashshana; hayqo wolqaafe wozana. Hayqo, ne gadoy awunee? Si7oole, ne dhaysoy awunee? Taani ta asaas qadhetike.
HOS 13:15 Efreemi ba ishata giddon minnikoka, Goday yeddida doloha bagga carkoy bazzofe carkishe yaana; iya pultoy eqana; iya haathay melana. I minjida al7o miishe ubbay bonqetana.
HOS 13:16 Samaare asay banta Xoossaa bolla geellatida gisho, seera ekanaw bessees. Enti mashshan busetana; enta nayti tinchetana; enta qanthatida maccasata uloy daaketana” yaagees.
HOS 14:1 Isra7eele asaw, hinte nagaraa gaason dhubetidi kundida gisho ha77i Godaa, hinte Xoossaako simmite.
HOS 14:2 Godaako simmidi, haysada yaagidi woossite; “Nu nagara ubbaafe nuna maara; nuuni nu mettersha ayfe gidida galataa new shiishana mela ne nuna ne keehatethan shiisha eka.
HOS 14:3 Asoorey nuna ashshena; nu ola paratanka ammanetoko. Nuuni nu kushen medhida eeqa misileta ubbaa, ‘Nu xoossata’ gooko. Aaway baynaysatas qadhetey nena” yaagite.
HOS 14:4 Goday, “Ta hanqoy entafe simmida gisho, taani enta makalla hanuwape enta pathada, enta wozanape siiqana.
HOS 14:5 Taani Isra7eele asaas aka gidana; enti ciishshada ciyidi, Libaanose zigaa mela xapho yeddana.
HOS 14:6 Enta dolay cil7ana; enti shamahoda lo77ana. Enta sawoy Libaanose zigada tonku gaana.
HOS 14:7 Asay simmidi ta kuya garsan shempana; enti dolada cil7ana; enti woyneda ciiyana; Libaanose woyne ushshada eretiyaba gidana.
HOS 14:8 Efreema asaw, hizape guye eeqa misilera taw ay gahetethi de7ii? Hinte woosa si7eynne hintena naagey tana. Taani cil7o zigaa mela; hinte ayfe ayfana mela oothey tana” yaagees.
HOS 14:9 Cincatethi de7iya oonika haysa akeeko; wozani de7iya oonika hessa ero. Godaa ogey suure; xilloti he ogiyara hemetoosona; shin nagaranchoti iyan dhubetoosona.
JOE 1:1 Batu7eela na7aa Iyyu7eelako Goday kiitida qaalay haysa.
JOE 1:2 Hinteno cimato, haysa si7ite! Yihuda biittan de7iya asa ubbay si7ite! Haysa melabay hinte wode woyko hinte aawata wode hani erii?
JOE 1:3 Haysa hinte naytas odite; hinte nayti banta naytas odo; enta nayti kaalliya yeletas odo.
JOE 1:4 Gondofe attida kathaa booley mis; boolepe attida kathaa guddoy mis; guddofe attida kathaa xaqoy mis.
JOE 1:5 Mal7iya woyney hintefe attida gisho, hinteno, mathoteysato barkite yeekite! Hinteno, woyne uyiya ubbati zeleelite!
JOE 1:6 Tayboy bayna booley ta biitta oykis; Enta achay gaammo acha mela; enta gacoy macca gaammo gaco mela.
JOE 1:7 Enti ta woyniya dhaysidosona; ta balasiya mitha dhoggidosona. Enti poqidi mida gisho, woyniyanne balasiya tasheti puxu gis.
JOE 1:8 Geela7iya, ba giigida azinay hayqin, kayo ma7o ma7ada yeekeysada hinteka yeekite!
JOE 1:9 Katha yarshoynne ushsha yarshoy Godaa keethan dhayida gisho, Godaa keethan oothiya kahineti yeekosona.
JOE 1:10 Goshshay mela attis; biittay yeekees; kathay dhayis; woyneynne zaytey melis.
JOE 1:11 Gaden de7iya gisteynne bangi dhayida gisho, hinteno goshshanchoto, kayotite; hinteno woyne tokeysato, zeleelite!
JOE 1:12 Woyney melis; balasey shullis; oromaaney, temirey, apiley, gaden de7iya hara mithi ubbay melis; hessa gisho, asape ufaysi haakis.
JOE 1:13 Hinteno kahineto, kayo ma7o ma7idi yeekite; hinteno yarsho bessa sinthan ootheysato, zeleelite. Hinteno ta Xoossaa sinthan ootheysato, xoossa keethi gelidi, kayo ma7o ma7idi aqite. Katha yarshoynne ushsha yarshoy, Xoossa keethan yarshiyabay baawa.
JOE 1:14 Xooma awaajite; geeshsha shiiqo xeegite. Cimatanne biittan de7iya asa ubbaa Godaa hinte Xoossaa keethan shiishite; yan Godaako waassite.
JOE 1:15 Godaa gallasay matis; he gallasaa ayye! He gallasay Ubbaa Danda7iya Xoossaa hanqo gallas gididi yees.
JOE 1:16 Nu sinthafe kathi, nu Xoossaa keethaafe, ufaysinne ililsi dhayis gidennee?
JOE 1:17 Zeretida zerethay biitta giddon buuqis; kathay dhayida gisho eley kallotis; shaaley laaletis.
JOE 1:18 Heemmiya bessi bayna gisho, mehey waassees. Hari attoshin dorsa wudeyka maata dhayidi un7etees.
JOE 1:19 Abeeti Godaw, bazzuwa tami mida gisho, xaragi denban de7iya maata xuuggida gisho, wora mithaa tama lacoy dhaysida gisho, taani neeko waassayis.
JOE 1:20 Goggiya haathi melida gisho, tami bazzon de7iya maata midigida gisho, bazzo do7atika neeko waassoosona.
JOE 2:1 Xiyoonen moyze punnite; ta geeshsha zumaa bolla waassite. Biittan de7iya asi ubbay kokoro; Godaa gallasay yees; karen de7ees.
JOE 2:2 He gallasay dhumanne caagana gallas; shaaranne sakana dhuma gallas! Zumaa bolla xalqey caareysada daronne wolqaama booley biitta ma7ana. Hessa melabay kase hanibeenna, sinthafeka hessa melabay hanenna.
JOE 2:3 Entafe sinthara miya tami bees; entafe guyera lacoy xuuggees. Enta sinthay Gannate mela; shin enta guyey booddila bazzo mela; entafe aybika kessi ekenna.
JOE 2:4 Enta medhoy para medho mela; enti ola parada adarsoosona.
JOE 2:5 Pari goochiya gaareda giiroosona; deriya huuphera gupoosona. Buuriya miya tama lacoda xuuggoosona; ola baanaw keyida wolqaama olancho daanosona.
JOE 2:6 Enta sinthan asi kokorees; yashshan asa som7oy kareexees.
JOE 2:7 Enti olanchoda woxoosona; toora asada dirsaa bollara gupoosona. Enti ubbay maaran boosona; banta salpiyafe gaxa keyokona.
JOE 2:8 Issoy issuwara sugetokona; ubbay qinxi gidi sinthe boosona. Enti bantara eqeteyisata menthidi boosona; enta teqiyabay baawa.
JOE 2:9 Enti katamaa oykoosona; dirsa gimbiya bollara woxoosona. Enti keetha bolla keyoosona; kaysoda maskootera geloosona.
JOE 2:10 Enta sinthan biitti qaaxees; saloti kokoroosona. Awinne ageeni dhumees; xoolintoti banta poo7uwa diggoosona.
JOE 2:11 Goday ba olanchota sinthan guummees; iyaw kiitetiya olanchoti taybope bolla. Godaa gallasay gitanne daro yashshees; He gallasa danda7anay oonee?
JOE 2:12 “Ha7ika xooman, yeehoninne azzanon hinte polo wozanaape taako simmite.”
JOE 2:13 Hinte wozanaape attishin, hinte ma7uwa peedhopite. Godaa, hinte Xoossaako, simmite; I, qadheynne maaroti kumidaysa; I, hanqanaw ellesonaysanne siiqoy daridaysa; I, hintena seeranaw ellesenna.
JOE 2:14 Goday hinte Xoossay, ba hanquwafe simmidi, hintena anjaneko ooni erii? He wode Godaas hinte Xoossaas, katha yarshonne ushsha yarsho yarshana.
JOE 2:15 Xiyoonen moyze punnite; xooma awaajite; geeshsha shiiquwa shiiqite!
JOE 2:16 Asaa shiishidi, hinte shiiquwa geeshshite; cimata issife shiishite; guutha naytanne dhammeyisata ashshofite. Meddan de7eysati banta quruxuwape keyo.
JOE 2:17 Godaas oothiya kahineti Xoossaa keethaa barandaafenne yarsho bessaafe giddon eqidi yeeko. Enti haysada yaagidi woosso; “Abeeti Godaw, ne asaas qadheta; kawotethati, ‘Enta Xoossay awunee? yaagana mela oothada, ne asaa boresinne miichas yeggofa’ ” yaago.
JOE 2:18 Goday ba biittas de7iya mishan ba asaas qadhetis.
JOE 2:19 Goday zaaridi ba asa haysada yaagana; “Heko, taani hintew kathaa, woyniyanne zaytiya, kalsana gakanaw yeddana; hizape guye kawotethata giddon hintena bores aggike.”
JOE 2:20 “Pudeha baggara yida booliya, taani yedethada hintefe haassana. Baysanne mela biitta enta gooddana; sintha baggara de7eyisata Maxine Abba, guye baggara de7eyisata Medetiraane Abbaa, yedethana. Yan enti hayqidi xinqana. tuma Goday wolqaamaba hintew oothis” yaagana.
JOE 2:21 Biittaw, hiza yayyofa; Goday gitaba oothida gisho, ufaytanne hashshu ga!
JOE 2:22 Hinteno sa7aa meheto, yayyofite; bazzon de7iya maatay aacis. Mithay ayfis; balaseynne woyne ayfey burkukis.
JOE 2:23 Hinteno Xiyoone asato, ufaytite; Godan hinte Xoossan, hashshu giite! I, balgo ira hintew darsidi immis; kaseysada silanne torche ira gidisidi immis.
JOE 2:24 Kathaa bukiya wudumman kathi kumana; woyniyanne zaytiya gum7iya ollay kumidi palahana.
JOE 2:25 Kase taani hinte giddo yeddida, wolqaama gondoy, booley, guddotinne xaqoti midaysa, ta hintew zaarana.
JOE 2:26 Hinte min kalsidi palahiya kathi daana; malaalsiyaba hintew oothida Godaa; hinte Xoossa sunthu galatana; ta asay zaaridi yeellatenna.
JOE 2:27 He wode taani Isra7eele giddon de7eysa, taani Goday hinte Xoossaa gideysanne taape hara xoossi baynaysa hinte erana; ta asay zaaridi yeellatenna.
JOE 2:28 Hizape guye haysada hanana; taani asa ubbaa bolla ta Ayyaana gussana. Hinte adde naytinne macca nayti tinbite odana; hinte cimati amuho amuhana; hinte na7atethati qoncethi be7ana.
JOE 2:29 He gallasatan ta adde aylleta bollanne ta macca aylleta bolla ta Ayyaana gussana.
JOE 2:30 Taani saloninne sa7an malaalsiyaba oothana, tamanne salo dendiya cuyaa bessaana.
JOE 2:31 Gitanne yashshiya Godaa gallasay yaanape kase, awi dhumana; ageeni suuthu daanana.
JOE 2:32 He wode haysada hanana; Godaa sunthaa xeegiya ubbay attana. Goday gidaysada Xiyoone zumaaninne Yerusalaamen attidaysati daana.
JOE 3:1 “He gallasaninne he wodiyan taani Yihudanne Yerusalaame asaa di7etethaafe zaarada anjana.
JOE 3:2 Taani kawotethatan de7iya asaa shiishada, Yoosafexa zangaara wodhisana. Ta asaa Isra7eele bolla enti oothida iita oosuwa gisho, taani enta yan pirdana. Enti kawotethata giddon ta asaa laallidosona; ta biitta bantaw shaaki ekidosona.
JOE 3:3 Ta asaa bolla saama yeggidosona; laymatiya maccas demmanaw, adde nayta immidosona; woyne ushshas macca nayta bayzidosona.
JOE 3:4 “Hinteno, Xiroosa, Sidoonanne Filisxeeme biitta asato, hinte ta bolla ay oothanaw qopidetii? Ta bolla halo keyanaw koyeetii? Hinte hessa koyiko, taani ellesada hinte oosuwa hinte bolla zaarana.
JOE 3:5 Ta bira, ta worqanne ta al7o miishiya ubbaa ekidi hinte eeqa keethaa gelsideta.
JOE 3:6 Yihudanne Yerusalaame asaa enta biittafe haassi efidi, Girike asaas bayzideta.
JOE 3:7 Heko, hinte bayzida bessaafe taani ha77i enta kessada hinte oothidaba ubbaa hinte huuphen zaarana.
JOE 3:8 Taani hinte adde naytanne hinte macca nayta Yihuda asaas aatha immana. Enti haaho biittan de7iya Saaba asaas enta bayzana. Taani Goday haysa odas.
JOE 3:9 “Haysada yaagidi kawotethata giddon awaajite; Olas giigite; mino asata denthethite, olanchoti shiiqidi olas keyo.
JOE 3:10 Hinte marasha mashshe, hinte baaca toora oothidi qoxite! Daaburanchoy, ‘Taani mino!’ yaago.
JOE 3:11 Hinteno, yuushuwan de7iya kawotethato, elle keyite; haa shiiqite” yaagite. Abeeti Godaw, ne olanchota duge yedda!
JOE 3:12 “Kawotethati dendidi, Yoosafexa zangaara yo; Isra7eele yuushuwan de7iya kawotethata, ubbaa bolla pirdanaw taani yan uttana.
JOE 3:13 Enta iitatethay daro; caka wodey gakida kathada enta cakite. Woyne ayfey ollan kumin yedheysada, enta yedhite.
JOE 3:14 Pirda zangaaran Goday pirdiya gallasay gakis; hessa gisho, taybon daro asay he zangaaran shiiqis.
JOE 3:15 He gallas awinne ageeni dhumana; xoolintoti banta poo7uwa diggana.
JOE 3:16 Goday Xiyoonen gididi dechana; Yerusalaamen ba qaala sissana; saloynne sa7i kokorana. Shin Goday ba asaas, Isra7eeles baqatidi attiya bessi gidana.”
JOE 3:17 “He wode hinte, taani ta geeshsha zumaa bolla, Xiyoonen de7iya Godaa hinte Xoossaa gideysa erana. Yerusalaame katamay geeshshi gidana; allagati zaaridi Yerusalaame olokona.
JOE 3:18 He gallas dereti mal7anto woyne ushshan xokana; zumati maathi goggana. Yihuda biittan de7iya shaafa ubban haathi pultana. Godaa keethan pultoy dhuuqana; Seexima zangaara ushshana.
JOE 3:19 “Gibxey baysa gidana; Edoomey booddila bazzo gidana. Enti Yihuda asaa bolla iitabaa oothidosona; xillo asaa suuthaa gussidosona.
JOE 3:20 Shin Yihudinne Yerusalaamey merinaw, yeleta ubbaas de7iya bessi gidana.
JOE 3:21 Taani halo keyonna aggida enta suuthaa haluwa buroo keyana” yaagees Goday.
AMO 1:1 Ooziyani Yihuda biittan, Iyo7aasa na7ay Iyorbaami Isra7eele biittan kawotida laythan Taqoha biittan mehe heemmeysatape issoy, Amoxey, biitti qaaxanaape nam7u laythafe sinthe Isra7eeleba odida tinbitey haysa:
AMO 1:2 I, “Goday Xiyoone zuma bolla gudees; Yerusalaame kataman dechees. Mehe heemmiya bessati meloosona; Qarmeloosa zuma bolla de7iya irxay shullees” yaagis.
AMO 1:3 Goday, “Damasqo asay zaari zaari oothida nagaraa gisho, taani enta seeronna aggike. Enti Galada biitta asaa birata achi de7iya gaaren gondorsidi yedhidosona.
AMO 1:4 Hessa gisho, taani kawa Haza7eela keethan tama yeddana; he tamay kawa Ben-Hadaada miixata maana.
AMO 1:5 Taani Damasqo katamaa pengiya menthana; Aweena zangaaran de7iya asaa yedethananne kawota xam7aa oykidaysata Beet-Edenape dhaysana; Soore asay de7etidi, Qiira baana” yaagees.
AMO 1:6 Goday, “Gaaza katamaa asay zaari zaari oothida nagaraa gisho, ta enta seeronna aggike. Enti biittan de7iya asa ubbaa di77idi, Edoome biitta asas bayzidosona.
AMO 1:7 Hessa gisho, taani Gaaza katamaa dirsan tama yeddana; he tamay katamaa miixata maana.
AMO 1:8 Ashdoodan de7iya asaa taani yedethananne kawota xam7aa oykidaysata Asqaloonape dhaysana. Eqroona kataman de7iya asaa seerana; Filisxeeme asaape attidaysati hayqana. Taani Ubbaa Haariya Goday hessa odayis” yaagees.
AMO 1:9 Goday, “Xiroosa katamaa asay zaari zaari oothida nagaraa gisho, taani enta seeronna aggike. Enti caaqida ishatetha caaquwa menthidi, de7etida asa ubbaa Edoome asaas bayzidosona.
AMO 1:10 Hessa gisho, taani Xiroosa katamaa dirsan tama yeddana; he tamay katamaa miixata maana” yaagees.
AMO 1:11 Goday, “Edoome asay zaari zaari oothida nagaraa gisho, taani enta seeronna aggike. Enti banta ishaa Isra7eele mashshan yedethidosona; enti entaw qadhetibookona; enta yiloy merinaw irxenna.
AMO 1:12 Hessa gisho, taani Temaana katamaa bolla tama yeddin, he tamay Boosora katamaa miixata maana” yaagees.
AMO 1:13 Goday, “Amoone asay zaari zaari oothida nagaraa gisho, taani enta seeronna aggike. Enti banta zawa aassanaw Galada biittan de7iya qanthatida maccasata uluwa daakidosona.
AMO 1:14 Hessa gisho, taani Raaba katamaa dirsan tama yeddana; he tamay katamaa miixata maana. Hessafe guye, olaa gallas waasoy darana; olanchoti goteda wolqaamana.
AMO 1:15 Enta kawoynne iyara oothiya halaqati ubbay de7etidi baana” yaagees.
AMO 2:1 Goday, “Moo7abe asay zaari zaari oothida nagaraa gisho, taani enta seeronna aggike. Enti Edoome kawa meqethay bido gidana gakanaw xuuggidosona.
AMO 2:2 Hessa gisho, taani Moo7abe biittan tama yeddana; he tamay Qiriyoota katamaa miixata maana. Olanchota waasuwan, moyze punuwaninne ola girsan Moo7abe asay wurana.
AMO 2:3 Taani Moo7abe haareysanne iya moorinnata ubbaa dhaysana” yaagees.
AMO 2:4 Goday, “Yihuda asay zaari zaari oothida nagaraa gisho, taani enta seeronna aggike. Enti Godaa higgiya ixidosona; iya kiitaa naagibookona. Enta aawati kaallida wordo xoossati entana balethidosona.
AMO 2:5 Hessa gisho, taani Yihuda bolla tama yeddana; he tamay Yerusalaame miixata maana” yaagees.
AMO 2:6 Goday, “Isra7eele asay zaari zaari oothida nagaraa gisho, taani enta seeronna aggike. Enti xilluwa miishes, manquwa caammas bayzoosona.
AMO 2:7 Manqota biitta baanan yeggidi, enta huuphiya yedhoosona; un7etidaysata pirda diggoosona. Aawaranne na7aara issi maccasi laggethidi ta geeshsha sunthaa tunisoosona.
AMO 2:8 Enti asape acos oykida ma7uwa yarshiya bessatan ubbaa matan hiixidi, zin7oosona; qassi asape acos ekida woyne ushsha banta xoossata keethan uyoosona.
AMO 2:9 “Gidoshin, hinte gisho gada zigada aduqida, wolada minnida Amoore asata hinte sinthafe dhaysiday tana. Taani entaw bolla ayfiya, garsa xaphuwa ubbaa dhaysas.
AMO 2:10 Taani hintena Gibxe biittafe kessada, bazzon oytamu laythi kaalethas; Amooreta biitta hintew laata oothada immas.
AMO 2:11 Hinte adde nayta giddofe nabeta, hinte na7atethata giddofe Naaziraweta denthas. Isra7eele asaw, hessi tuma gidennee? Taani Goday hessa odas.
AMO 2:12 Shin hinte Naaziraweta caaqo menthisidi, woyne ushsha ushshideta; nabeta tinbite odonna mela diggideta.
AMO 2:13 “Hessa gisho, kathi darsidi caanida gaarey me77eysada taani hintena menthana.
AMO 2:14 Gooba woxeysi kessi ekenna; minuwas wolqi ixana; olanchoy ba shempuwa ashshena.
AMO 2:15 Dongen dukeysi eqanaw danda7enna; gooba woxiya olanchoy kessi ekenna; paraaway ba shempuwa ashshena.
AMO 2:16 He gallas hari attoshin olanchota giddon daro xaala geeteteysati xire kallo baqatana” yaagees Goday.
AMO 3:1 Gibxe biittafe hintena kessida, Isra7eele asaw, Goday hintew odeysa si7ite.
AMO 3:2 Goday, “Sa7an de7iya asa ubbaafe taani hinte xalaala dooras. Hessa gisho, hinte oothida nagara ubbaas taani hintena seerana” yaagees.
AMO 3:3 Nam7u asati wolla baana gidi qofa qachonna de7ishe issife hemetoona?
AMO 3:4 Gaammoy wodhathe demmonna woran coo gudiyee? Woyko wodala gaammoy ayko yedethidi oykonna uti dendidi sarbuqiyee?
AMO 3:5 Kafoy xihey bayna coo denban oyketiyee? Woyko xihey aykoy bochonna coo piriyee?
AMO 3:6 Katama giddon ola moyzey punetiya wode asay yashshan kokoreneyee? Woyko Goday kiittonna de7ishin dhayoy issi katama bolla yiiyee?
AMO 3:7 Tuma Ubbaa Haariya Goday ba xuuraa nabetas, ba oosanchotas kasetidi qoncisonna de7ishe aykoka oothenna.
AMO 3:8 Gaammoy gudin yayyonnay oonee? Ubbaa Haariya Goday odin, tinbite odonnay oonee?
AMO 3:9 Ashdoodaninne Gibxen de7iya miixa ubbaas haysada yaagidi awaajite: “Samaariya dereta bolla shiiqidi, yan de7iya iitatethaanne sugethaa be7ite” yaagite.
AMO 3:10 “Ha asay lo77oba oothi erokona; iitatethaninne bonqidi ehida miishen banta keethaa kunthoosona” yaagees Goday.
AMO 3:11 Hessa gisho, “Morkey hinte biitta teqana; hinte baasuwa laallana; hinte keethaa bonqana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
AMO 3:12 “Henthanchoy gaammo doonape nam7u shuqule woyko duuxa haythi yegisi ekeysada, Samaare biittan inje duussu de7iya Isra7eele asaape guuthati attana” yaagees Goday.
AMO 3:13 “Haysa si7idi Yayqooba kochata bolla haysada yaagidi markatite.
AMO 3:14 Taani Isra7eele asaa enta nagaraa gisho seeriya wode, Beetele kataman de7iya yarsho bessata laallana; yarsho bessan de7iya kaceti me77idi, sa7an wodhana.
AMO 3:15 Enti balgonne bone de7iya keethata ubbaa taani dhaysana. Enti dangarsa zaalen alleeqisidi, keexida keethaa laallana; qassi gita gita keethati ubbay dhayana” yaagees Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay.
AMO 4:1 Hinteno, Baasane miizatada modhida Samaare maccasato, haysa si7ite! Hinte manqota un7etheeta; metootanchota waayetheta. Hinte azinatako, “Nuus ushshi immite” yaageeta.
AMO 4:2 Ubbaa Haariya Goday haysada yaagidi, ba geeshshatethan caaqis, “Hinte manxaqon oyketidi gooshetana gallasinne hintefe attida guuthati manxaqon oyketidi biya moloda hanana gallas yaana.
AMO 4:3 Hinte ubbay dirsa xoo7era gooshetidi, keyidi, Armoone holetana” yaagis.
AMO 4:4 “Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, Beetele bidi nagara oothite; Galgala bidi nagara gujidi oothite. Wonta wonta hinte yarshuwa yarshite; heedzantho gallas gallas hinte asraata ehite.
AMO 4:5 Hinte oothanaw dosey hessa gidiya gisho, Irsho yeggidi uukida oytha xuuggidi, galata yarshuwa yarshite. Hinte hinte dosan immiya imuwa gisho, otortidi awaajite” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
AMO 4:6 “Hinte katama ubban taani kosha yeddada, hari attoshin hinte achan gathiyaba dhaysas; shin hinte hessan taako simmibeketa.
AMO 4:7 Kathi cakiya wodey gakanaw buroo heedzu ageeni de7ishin, taani hintew ira teqas. Taani issi kataman ira bukisada hara kataman bukonnaada diggas; issi goshshan bukis; hara goshshay qassi ira dhayidi melis.
AMO 4:8 Hessa gisho, nam7u woyko heedzu katama asay haathe uyanaw issi katama bidosona; shin alibookona. Hessanka hinte taako simmibeketa” yaagees Goday.
AMO 4:9 “Taani hinte kathaa bolla harge yeddas; hinte atakiltiya, hinte woyniya hinte balasiyanne hinte shamaho ubbaa booley mis; shin hinte hessanka taako simmibeketa” yaagees Goday.
AMO 4:10 “Taani Gibxe asaa bolla gado yeddidaysada, hinte bolla gado yeddas. Hinte pantha nayta mashshan wodhas; hinte parati di77etana mela oothas. Hinte mootha aha xinqon ullas; shin hinte hessanka taako simmibeketa” yaagees Goday.
AMO 4:11 “Soodomenne Gamoora katamata dhaysidaysada hintefe darota dhaysas; hinte tamape attida duncha mela; shin hessanka hinte taako simmibeketa” yaagees Goday.
AMO 4:12 Hessa gisho, “Isra7eele asaw, taani hintena haysada oothada seerana. Taani hintena haysada oothada seerana haniya gisho, Isra7eele asaw, hinte Xoossara gahetanaw giigite” yaagees Goday.
AMO 4:13 Dereta giigisiday, carko medhiday, ba wozana qofaa asas qoncisey, gallasa poo7uwa dhuman laammey, biitta dhoqa bessata bolla hemetey, iya sunthay Godaa, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaa.
AMO 5:1 Isra7eele asaw, taani hintew zeleeliya zelelsa si7ite!
AMO 5:2 “Geela7iya, Isra7eeley kundasu; zaarada denduku. Iya sa7an yegetasu; iyo denthiya oonika baawa” yaagas.
AMO 5:3 “Isra7eele katamaape mukulu olanchota olas yeddiko, xeetu olanchota xalaali attana; katamaape xeetu olanchota olas yeddiko, tammu olanchota xalaali attana” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
AMO 5:4 “Tana koyite; hinte de7on daana.
AMO 5:5 Shin Galgali di7etana; Beeteley dhayana gisho, Beetele koyopite; Galgala gelopite. Barsaabe pinnofite” yaagees Goday.
AMO 5:6 Godaa koyite; hinte de7on daana. Hessa ixiko, I Yoosefa kochaa tamada xuuggana; Beetelen de7iya asaa tami maana. He tama toysana asi baawa.
AMO 5:7 Hinteno, suure pirdaa mirqeysato, xillotethi sa7an yeggeysato, si7ite.
AMO 5:8 Piliyadisa geetetiya laapun xoolintota oothiday, Ooriyoona geetetiya xoolinto kocata medhiday, dhumaa poo7on, gallasa qamman laammey, abban de7iya haathata salo pude xeegidi, sa7a micetha bolla duge tigey, iya sunthay Godaa.
AMO 5:9 I miixata laallanaw wolqaamata bolla gado ehees.
AMO 5:10 Hintena pirdaa dabaaban seereysa ixeeta; tuma odeysa kadheeta.
AMO 5:11 Hinte manqota yedhidi, enta kathaa bonqeeta. Yaatidi shucha keethata gimbideta; shin hinte iyan de7eketa. Lo77o woyne tokideta; shin hinte he woyne ushsha uyeketa.
AMO 5:12 Hinte naaqoy ay mela daroko, hinte nagaray ay mela giteeko taani erayis. Hinte xillota naaqeta; wodhaafe ekeeta; qassi dabaaban manqota pirdaa naaqeta.
AMO 5:13 Hessa gisho, wodey iita gidiya gisho, hessa mela woden cinca asi si77i gees.
AMO 5:14 Lo77o dosite; iita ixite; hinte de7on daana. Hessa oothiko, hinte geysada, Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay hintera gidana.
AMO 5:15 Iitabaa ixite; lo77oba dosite. Pirdaa bessan suure pirda pirdite. Ooni eri Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay Yoosefa kochaafe attida guuthatas qadhetonna aggenna.
AMO 5:16 Hessa gisho, Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay, “Dabaaba ubban waasoy si7etana; oge ubban zelelsi darana. Goshshanchoti yeeho, zeleelidi yeekiya asay zelelsas xeegetana.
AMO 5:17 Taani hintena seeranaw hinte giddora aadhiya gisho, woyne gade ubban yeehoy daana” yaagees.
AMO 5:18 Hinteno, Godaa gallasay yaana mela amotteysato, hintena ayye! Godaa gallasaa ayis amotteetii? He gallasay poo7o gidonashin dhuma gidana.
AMO 5:19 He gallasay asi gaammofe baqatidi attiya wode maahey gakeysa mela qassi ba soo gelidi, ba kushiya godaa bolla zempisiya wode shooshi dukiya asa mela gidana.
AMO 5:20 Godaa gallasay dhuma gidanaape attishin, poo7o gidenna; he gallasay sakana dhuma gidanaape attishin, poo7oy bayna gallas gidana.
AMO 5:21 “Taani hinte bonchiya ba7aaleta ixaysinne shaatettayis; hinte geeshsha shiiqoti tana ufaysokona.
AMO 5:22 Hinte taw xuussa yarshonne katha yarsho shiishiya wode taani ekike. Qassi hinte taw issifetetha yarshos ehiya dooretida modho meheta be7ike.
AMO 5:23 Hinte mazmure cancetha ta matape haassite; hinte diixiya diithaa si7ike.
AMO 5:24 Shin suure pirdi pulto haathada, xillotethi melonna shaafa haathada goggo.
AMO 5:25 “Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, taani hintena mela biittan oytamu laythi kaalethiya wode, taw yarsho shiishidetii? Woyko imota immidetii?
AMO 5:26 He wode hinte, hinte kushen medhida, ‘Kawa Sakuta’ geetetiya eeqanne ‘Kewaana’ geetetiya xoolinto eeqa xoossata tookideta.
AMO 5:27 Hessa gisho, taani hintena di7isada Damasqo katamaape aathada haaho bessi yeddana” yaagees iya sunthay, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaa geetetiya Goday.
AMO 6:1 Hinteno, asay maado oychiya bonchetida Isra7eele halaqato, hinteno, Xiyoonen injen de7eysato, Samaare kataman hirgi bayna uttidaysato, hintena ayye!
AMO 6:2 Ane Kaline katamaa bidi be7ite. Yaape gita Hamaata katamaanne Filisxeeme katamaa Geete wodhite. Enti hinte nam7u kawotethatape aadhona? Enta biittay hinte biittafe dalgii?
AMO 6:3 Hinte, “Iita gallas elle yeenna” gidi, iita ooso ootheysato,
AMO 6:4 zaalepe oosetida arsan zin7eysato, injen uttidaysato, dorsa wudiyape anqaratanne miiza wodiyape gatarmenthuwa meysato,
AMO 6:5 Dawitada yetha miishe hintew giigisidi, dumma dumma yethi yexeysato,
AMO 6:6 woyney ushsha kerera ganeysato, al7o shitton tiyeteysato, Yoosefa kochata dhayuwan azzanonaysato, hintena ayye!
AMO 6:7 Hessa gisho, koyro di7etanay hintena; he wode hinte inje duussay attana.
AMO 6:8 Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay haysada yaagidi, banan caaqis: “Taani Yayqooba otoruwa ixas; enta miixaaka shaatettas; taani katamaanne kataman de7iya ubbaa enta morketas aathada immana” yaagees.
AMO 6:9 Issi keethan tammu asi attiko, entika hayqana.
AMO 6:10 Hayqidaysata dabbotape issoy aha mooganaw soope kessi efishe, he keethan qosetida uraako, “Neera attida hara asi de7ii?” yaagidi oychana. I zaaridi, “Baawa” yaagana. Oycheysi zaaridi, “Hayza, hayza! Godaa sunthaa nuuni xeeganaw koshshenna” yaagana.
AMO 6:11 Godaa kiitan, gita keethati laaletana; laafa keethati meqeretana.
AMO 6:12 Parati zaalla bolla gaallabanaw danda7oona? Woyko goshshanchoy boori waaxidi, abba goyanaw danda7ii? Shin hinte suure pirdaa ciiye, xillotethaa camo oothideta.
AMO 6:13 Hinte Lodobaara katama xoonida gisho ufayteta; hinte, “Nuuni Qarnayma katamaa nu minotethan oykida” gidi ceeqeteta.
AMO 6:14 “Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, taani hinte bolla hara kawotethi denthana; enti hintena Hamaata Pinuwape doomidi, Araba zangaara gakanaw un7ethana” yaagees Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay.
AMO 7:1 Ubbaa Haariya Goday tana qoncethi bessis. He qoncethan taani kawa gakiya kathay caketidaape guye, nam7antho caarida dolaa bolla Xoossay boole wude medhishin be7as.
AMO 7:2 Enti irxaba ubbaa midi wursida wode taani, “Abeeti, Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, hayyana ne deriya maararki! Yayqooba zareti waanidi attanaw danda7oona? Enti ubba guutha!” yaagas.
AMO 7:3 Hessa gisho, Goday entaw qadhetidi, “Ha neeni be7idabay poletenna” yaagis.
AMO 7:4 Ubbaa Haariya Goday tana hara qoncethi bessis. Ubbaa Haariya Goday ba asaa pirdanaw tama xeegis; he tamay gita ciimmo abba mi diggidi, biitta maanaw doomis.
AMO 7:5 Taani, “Abeeti, Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, hayyana ha tama toysarki! Yayqooba zareti waanidi attanaw danda7oona? Enti ubba guutha!” yaagas.
AMO 7:6 Hessa gisho, Goday qadhetidi, “Haysi poletenna” yaagees Ubbaa Haariya Goday.
AMO 7:7 Qassi Xoossay tana hara qoncethi bessis. Taani he qoncethan be7iya wode, Goday tumbe oykidi, tumben liketidi gimbetida gimbiya matan eqis.
AMO 7:8 Goday taako, “Amoxe, neeni ay xeellay?” yaagidi oychis. Taani, “Tumbe xeellayis” yaagas. Goday taako, “Heko, taani ta ase gidida Isra7eele giddon tumbe yeggayis; taani enta seeronna aggike.
AMO 7:9 Yisaaqa kochati goyinniya dhoqa bessati laaletana; Isra7eele geeshsha bessati dhayana; Iyorbaama kawotethaa bolla taani mashshara dendana” yaagis.
AMO 7:10 Beetele kataman kahine gididi de7iya Amasiyaasi Isra7eele kawa Iyorbaamako haysada yaagidi kiittis: “Amoxey Isra7eele asaa giddon de7ishe, ne bolla maqetees; I ba odan biitta dhaysees.
AMO 7:11 I, ‘Iyorbaami mashshan hayqana; Isra7eele asay banta biittafe di7etidi baana’ yaagees” yaagis.
AMO 7:12 Amasiyaasi Amoxeko, “Neno tinbite odeyso, ba; Yihuda biitta bada, yan oothada aqa; yan tinbite oda.
AMO 7:13 Shin Beeteley kawoy goyinniya bessinne kawotetha keethi gidiya gisho, nam7antho ha bessan tinbite odopa” yaagis.
AMO 7:14 Amoxey zaaridi, “Taani mehiya heemmiyanne boobba ayfe maxiya asepe attishin, nabe woyko nabe na7a gidike.
AMO 7:15 Shin Goday tana dorsa wude heemmiya bessaafe ekidi, ‘Bada ta asaa Isra7eeles tinbite oda’ yaagis.
AMO 7:16 Ha77i hiza Goday giyaba si7a! Neeni, ‘Isra7eele bolla tinbite odopa; Yisaaqa kochata sabbakopa’ yaagadasa.
AMO 7:17 Hessa gisho, Goday, ‘Ne machiya katama giddon layma gidana; ne adde naytinne ne macca nayti mashshan hayqana. Ne biittay wodoron shaaketana; qassi neeni ne huuphen allaga biittan hayqana. Sidhey bayna Isra7eele asay banta biittafe di7etidi baana’ yaagees” yaagis.
AMO 8:1 Ubbaa Haariya Goday tana hara qoncethi bessis; hessika, teera ayfey kumida daacho bessis.
AMO 8:2 I taako, “Amoxe, neeni ay be7ay?” yaagidi oychis. Taani, “Teera ayfey kumida daacho be7ayis” yaagas. Goday taako, “Ta asaa Isra7eele wursethay gakis; hizape guye taani enta seeronna aggike” yaagis.
AMO 8:3 Ubbaa Haariya Goday, “He gallas kawo keethan yexiya yethay yeehon laametana; asa ahi dumma dumma bessan wodhana; yeehoy waasoy bayna si77i gidi yegetana” yaagees.
AMO 8:4 Hinteno, metootanchota un7etheysato, biittan de7iya manqota dhaysanaw koyeysato, haysa si7ite!
AMO 8:5 Hinte, “Nuuni kathaa bayzanaw ageena xeero ba7aaley awude aadhane! Qassi nuuni nu zal7iya doomanaw Sambaati awude aadhane! Nuuni kathaa guuthaban makidi, daro miishen bayzana. Qassi wordo mizaanen asaa cimmana.
AMO 8:6 Manquwa biran, metootanchuwa waatha caamman shammana; qassi harqo giste muruuto giste gaten bayzana” yaageeta.
AMO 8:7 Yayqoobi iya sunthan ceeqetiya Goday, Xoossay, haysada yaagidi ba huuphen caaqis: “Taani enti oothida iita ooso ubbaa dogike.
AMO 8:8 Hessa gaason biittay yarkees; asa ubbay yeekees. Nayle shaafay kixidi keyeysadanne wodheysada biitta ubbay qaaxananne simmi wodhana” yaagis.
AMO 8:9 Ubbaa Haariya Goday, “He gallas taani awa seeta gallas wulisana; gallasaa qamisana.
AMO 8:10 Taani hinte ufaysa baaliya azzanon, hinte yethaa yeehon laammana. Mexi issi na7i hayqin yeekiya asada, hinte hinte huuphiya meedetidi kayo ma7o ma7anada, hintena oothana. He gallasaa wursethay daro camo gidana” yaagees.
AMO 8:11 Ubbaa Haariya Goday, “Heko, taani biitta ubbaa bolla kosha yeddiya wodey yaana. He koshay kathi woyko haatha kosha gidonashin, si7anaw Godaa qaala dhayo kosha gidana.
AMO 8:12 Asay dolohape wuloha gakanaw, pudehape dugeha gakanaw woxeretana. Enti Godaa qaala koyanaw yaanne haanne woxana, shin demmokona.
AMO 8:13 He gallas yegelssa geela7otinne wolqaama panthati saamon piqi gaana.
AMO 8:14 Samaare eeqatara caaqidaysati, ‘Daana xoossay ero!’ yaageysati, ‘Barsaabe xoossay ero’ yaageysati kundana. Enti zaari dendokona” yaagees.
AMO 9:1 Taani Goday yarsho bessa matan eqidashin be7as. I taako, “Baasoy qaaxana gakanaw xoossa keetha gumbuwa shocada asa ubbaa huuphen mentheretha. Hessafe attida asaa taani mashshan wodhana. Baqatiya asi kessi ekenna; kessi ekida asika paxa attenna.
AMO 9:2 Enti biitta bookidi, Si7oolen wodhikoka, taani entana yaape kessana. Saluwa keykoka, taani enta yaape wodhisana.
AMO 9:3 Enti Qarmeloosa zuma huuphen qosetikoka, taani enta koyada yaape kessana. Abba ciimmon gelidi, ta sinthafe geemmikoka, taani dawe kiittin, I enta dukana.
AMO 9:4 Enti banta morketan di7etidi, biikoka, yan enti mashshan hayqanaada kiittana; taani enta iita ayfen xeellana; enta lo77o ayfen xeellike” yaagis.
