AMO 9:5 Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay, sa7aa bochin sa7i til7ees; qassi sa7an de7iya ubbay yeekees. Nayle shaafay kixidi keyeysadanne wodheysada biitta ubbay qaaxananne simmi wodhana.
AMO 9:6 Ba keethaa salon keexiday, iya baasuwa sa7an essiday, abba haatha xeegidi, biitta bolla duge bukisey; iya sunthay Godaa.
AMO 9:7 Goday, “Isra7eele asaw, hinte taw Tophe asaa mela gideketiyee? Taani hintena Gibxe biittafe kessidaysada, Filisxeeme asaa Kaftoorape, qassi Soore asaa Qiirape kessabikina?” yaagees.
AMO 9:8 Goday, “Heko, Ubbaa Haariya Godaa ayfey nagarancho kawotethaa bolla de7ees. Taani iya biitta bollafe dhaysana; shin taani Yayqooba kochaa ubbaa dhaysike.
AMO 9:9 Taani kathi zarzaren harqeteysada Isra7eele asay kawotethata ubbaa giddon laaletana mela kiittana. Shin enta giddon ammanetidaysatape issoyka sa7an wodhidi dhayenna.
AMO 9:10 ‘Nuna ayba iitika gakenna woyko demmenna’ giya ta asaa giddon de7iya nagaranchoti ubbay mashshan wurana” yaagees.
AMO 9:11 “He gallas taani kundida Dawita kawotethaa denthana. Dirsa gimbeta zaara essana; laaletida bessata oorathana; taani iya kaseysada oothada keexana.
AMO 9:12 Hessika Edoomepe attidaysatanne ta sunthan xeegetida kawotethata ubbaa laattana” yaagees hessa oothiya Goday.
AMO 9:13 “Kathi cakeysati caki wursonna de7ishin, goyeysati gakiya wodey, woyne gum7eysati gum7idi wursonna de7ishin, woyne tokeysati gakiya wodey yaana. He wode dereti mal7o woyne ushshi pultana; zumati woyne ushshan mitettana.
AMO 9:14 Di77etidi bida ta asaa Isra7eele zaarana; enti laaletida katamata zaari keexidi daana. Woyne tokidi iyape woyne ushsha uyana; atakilte tokidi enta ayfiya maana.
AMO 9:15 Taani ta asaa, Isra7eele enta biittan tokana; enti taani entaw immida biittafe zaaridi shodetokona” yaagees hessa oothiya Goday.
OBA 1:1 Abdiyuy be7ida qoncethaa. Godaa Xoossay Edoomeba haysada yaagees: Edoomeba Goday, ba kiittiya addiya bolla kawotethatas kiittidaysa nuuni si7ida; “Dendite! Edoome olanaw boos” yaagis.
OBA 1:2 “Heko, ta nena kawotethata giddon laafa kessana; neeni daro kadhetidaysa gidana.
OBA 1:3 Neno, zaalla qopho giddon de7eyso, ne keethaa dhoqa dereta bolla keexidayso, ne wozanan, ‘Tana haysafe sa7an wodhisanay oonee?’ yaageyso, nena ne wozanaa otoroy cimmis.
OBA 1:4 Ne arganthada pude haakada piradhikoka, ne keethaa xoolintota giddon keexikoka, ta nena yaape duge wodhisana” yaagees Xoossay.
OBA 1:5 “Kaysoy woyko banqiya asi qamma yiiko, bantaw gideysa mela xalaala kaysotokonayee? Woyne maxeysati maxishe, poshile ashshokonaayee? Shin ne morketi nena polo dhaysana.
OBA 1:6 Abeeti Eesawey waanidi bonqetandee? Qosan de7iya iya shaloy waanidi eketandee?
OBA 1:7 Neera caaqidaysati ubbay nena ne biittafe gooddana; qassi ne ammanetida laggeti cimmidi nena xoonana. Ne kathaa midaysati ne ogen gite yeggana, shin neeni hessa akeekaka” yaagees.
OBA 1:8 “He gallas taani Edoomepe cincatanne Eesawe zumaape akeeka dhaysana.
OBA 1:9 Hinteno, Temaana asato, hinte olanchoti dagammana; Eesawe zuma bolla de7iya asa ubbay goyretana” yaagees Goday.
OBA 1:10 Ne ishaa Yayqooba bolla ne oothida iitabaa gisho, ne yeella ma77ana; ne merinaw dhayana.
OBA 1:11 Imathatinne allagati iya shaluwa bonqiya gallas neeni gaxa keyada eqa xeelladasa. Qassi iya pengera gelidi, Yerusalaame katamaa bolla saama yeggiya wode neeni entafe issuwa mela gidadasa.
OBA 1:12 Neeni ne ishay metootiya gallas iya metuwan ufaytanaw bessennashin; Yihuda asaa bolla waayey gakiya gallas hashshu gaanaw bessennashin. Enta un7a gallasan otoron odetanaw bessennashin!
OBA 1:13 Neeni enta metuwa gallas ta asay de7iya katamaa gelanaw, enta waayan neeni ufaytanawunne enta metuwa gallas enta shaluwa bonqanaw bessennashin!
OBA 1:14 Baqateyisata wodhanaw neeni daggala ogen naaganawunne attidaysata enta un7aa gallas morketas aathada immanaw bessennashin!
OBA 1:15 Godaa pirda gallasay kawotethata ubbaa bolla matis. Neno Edoome, neeni harata bolla oothidabay ne bolla oosetana; ne oosoy ne bolla simmana.
OBA 1:16 Ta geeshsha zumaa bolla ne uyidaysa mela kawotetha ubbay qanxonna uyana; gujidika uyana; enti kase hani eronnabaa hanana.
OBA 1:17 “Shin Xiyoone zuman kessi ekidaysati daana; Xiyooney geeshshi gidana; Yayqooba kochay banta biitta zaari laattana.
OBA 1:18 Yayqooba kochay tama gidana; Yoosefa kochay laco gidana; Eesawe kochay buure gidana. Tami buure meysada, Yayqooba zerethaynne Yoosefa kochay Eesawe kochaa midi polo dhaysana” yaagees Goday.
OBA 1:19 Negebe mela biittan de7iya asay Eesawe zuma laattana; gadha biittan de7iya asay Filisxeeme biitta, Efreema biittanne Samaare biitta laattana. Qassi Biniyaame kochay Galada biitta laattana.
OBA 1:20 Di7etethafe simmida Isra7eele asay, Kanaanepe bidi Sirafta gakanaw de7iya biitta laattana. Yerusalaamepe de7etidi, Safarada geetetiya bessan de7iya asati Negebe katamata laattana.
OBA 1:21 Ashsheysati Eesawe asaa haaranaw Xiyoone zuma bolla keyana; kawotethay Godaaba gidana.
JON 1:1 Godaa qaalay Amaate na7aa, Yoonasas haysada yaagidi qoncis.
JON 1:2 “He katama asa iitatethay ta sinthe gakida gisho, dendada hini wolqaama katama Nanawe bada sabbaka” yaagis.
JON 1:3 Shin Yoonasi Godaa sinthafe betidi Tarsesa biitta baanaw keyis. I, Yoophe katama wodhidi Tarsesa biya markabe demmis. Godaa sinthafe betanaw koyidi Tarsesa baanaw koshshiya miishe ciggidi markabiyan gelis.
JON 1:4 Shin Goday abba bolla wolqaama carkuwa denthis. Abban wolqaama hobbey wolqaamida gisho markabiya meqanaw gakasu.
JON 1:5 Yaatin markabiya oosanchoti yayyidosona. Issoy issoy ba xoossaako ba xoossaako waassis. Qassi markabey kawuyana mela giddon de7iya caana denthidi abban yeggidosona. Shin Yoonasi markabiyas giddo gelidi wolqaama dhisko dhiskis.
JON 1:6 Markabiya laaggeysi iyako shiiqidi, “Haysa mela saaten waana dhiskay? Denda ne xoossa woossa! Ooni eri I nuus qadhetidi nuna ashshanekonne” yaagis.
JON 1:7 Markabiya oosanchoti issoy issuwako, “Haa yiite, ha iitabay nuna oodde gaason gakidaako eranaw saama yeggana” yaagidosona. Saama yeggin, saamay Yoonasa bolla wodhis.
JON 1:8 Enti Yoonasako, “Ha iitabay oodde gaason nu bolla gakidaako ane nuus oda. Ne oosoy aybee? Awupe yadii? Ne biittay awee? Neeni oodde baggee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
JON 1:9 Yoonasi zaaridi, “Taani Ibraawe asi; abbanne biitta medhida Godaa, salo Xoossa goyinniya asi” yaagis.
JON 1:10 I entaw koyrottidi odidaysada I Godaa sinthafe beteysa eridosona. Hessa gisho, enti yayyidi, “La ayba palaba oothadi” yaagidosona.
JON 1:11 Abbaa hobbey kaseysafe haa darida gisho asati Yoonasa, “Nuus abbay si77i gaana mela nena nuuni waatino?” yaagidi oychidosona.
JON 1:12 Ika, “Ha wolqaama hobbey hinte bolla dendiday ta gaason gideysa taani erayis. Hessa gisho, tana ekidi abban yeggite. Yaatiko abbay hintew si77i gaana” yaagis.
JON 1:13 Shin markabiya oosanchoti markabiya gaxa kessanaw gita pidhidosona. Shin abba hobbey haa darida gisho gaxa kessanaw danda7ibookona.
JON 1:14 Hessa gisho, enti Godaako, “Abeeti Godaw, haa ura shempuwa gisho, neeni nuna dhaysonadanne ha geeshsha suutha acuwa neeni nuupe achonada nuuni nena minthidi woossoos” yaagidi Godaa woossidosona.
JON 1:15 Hessafe guye, Yoonasa denthidi, abban yeggidosona. Abbaa hobbayka si77i gis.
JON 1:16 Yaatin asati Godaas daro yayyidi yarsho yarshidosona; iyaw qangidosona.
JON 1:17 Yoonasa mittana mela issi gita molo Goday giigisis. Yoonasi he moluwa ulon heedzu gallasinne heedzu qamma gam7is.
JON 2:1 Yoonasi moluwa ulon de7ishe, ba Godaa Xoossaa haysada yaagidi woossis.
JON 2:2 “Taani ta waayan de7ashe nena xeegas; neka taw si7adasa. Taani Si7oole ciimmuwa giddon de7ashe, maado koyada neeko waassas Neka ta waasuwa si7adasa.
JON 2:3 Neeni tana abba ciimmuwan duge yeggadasa. Haathi ta yuushuwa teqis; wolqaama zuley ta bollara aadhis.
JON 2:4 ‘Taani ne sinthafe wora holetas, Shin ne Geeshsha Keetha zaarada be7ana’ gada qopas.
JON 2:5 Haathi taw qoodhe gakis, Abbaa ciimmoy tana mittis. Abban de7iya maatay ta huuphen xaaxetis.
JON 2:6 Taani haatha garsan de7iya dereta baasuwa gakada mitettas, biitta wulay merinaw ta bolla gordetis, Shin ta Godaw Xoossaw, neeni ta shempiw iita ollafe kessadasa.
JON 2:7 Ta shempiya doccida wode, Godaw ta nena qopas; ta woosay neeko ne Geeshsha keethaa gakis.
JON 2:8 Hada gidida eeqa xoossata bolla zempeysati, new de7iya banta ammanetetha aggoosona.
JON 2:9 Shin taani galata mazmure new yarshana. Ta qangidabaaka new gathana. Ayis giiko, atotethay Xoossafe” yaagis.
JON 2:10 Hessafe guye, Goday moluwa kiittis. Moloy Yoonasa mela biitta bolla cooyis.
JON 3:1 Godaa qaalay nam7antho Yoonasako haysada yaagidi yis.
JON 3:2 “Dendada gita katamaa Nanawe ba; ta new odiya qaala entaw awaaja” yaagis.
JON 3:3 Yoonasi Godaas kiitetidi Nanawe bis. Nanawey daro gita katama. Ha gaxape hini gaxa gakanaw heedzu qamma hemethees.
JON 3:4 Yoonasi katama gelidi issi gallasa oge hemetidi, “Nanawey oytamu gallasape guye dhayana” yaagidi awaajis.
JON 3:5 Nanawe asay Xoossaa ammanidosona. Xooma awaajidosona; guuthafe gita gakanaw asi ubbay kayo ma7o ma7idosona.
JON 3:6 Nanawe kawoy he oda si7ida wode ba kawotetha araatape wodhidi, kawotetha ma7uwa qaaridi kayo ma7o ma7idi bido bolla uttis.
JON 3:7 Nanawe deriyas haysada yaagidi awaajisis: “kawapenne iya moorinatape keyida kiittada hachife doomidi hinteranne hinte mehetara, aybibaaka moonna mela uyonna mela.
JON 3:8 Asinne mehe ubbay kayo ma7o ma77o. Issi issi asi minthidi Xoossaako waasso. Ba iita ogiyape simmo, ba iita oosuwaka aggo.
JON 3:9 Xoossay nuus qadhetidi, nuuni dhayona mela ba wolqaama hanquwafe simmaneko ooni eri!” yaagis.
JON 3:10 Enti banta iita ogiyape simmidaysa Xoossay be7ida wode entaw qadhetidi enta bolla ehana gida iitaba aggaagis.
JON 4:1 Shin hessi Yoonasa daro ufaysibeenna. Hessa gisho, I yilotis.
JON 4:2 Godaako, “Abeeti Godaw taani koyro ta biittan de7ashe gidaysi haysa gidennee? Taani ne sinthafe betada Tarsesa baanaw ellesiday haysasa. Neeni qadheynne maaroti kumida Xoossi gideysa, hanqos ellesonaysanne wuronna siiqon kumidaysa, qassi ehana gida iitabaka qadhetada aggiya Xoossi gideysa taani kaseka erayis.
JON 4:3 Ha7i Abeeti Godaw, hayyana tana wodha; de7ope taw hayqoy lo77o” yaagidi woossis.
JON 4:4 Goday iyako, “Neeni haysatho shenetanaw bessii?” yaagis.
JON 4:5 Hessafe guye, Yoonasi katamaape gaxa keyidi doloha baggan uttis. Hessan baw shaqara shaqaridi I kuyan uttidi katama bolla gakanaw de7iyaba ba7anaw naagees.
JON 4:6 Awa suulape Yoonasa ashshana mela Goday issi gose dolisis. He gose haythay Yoonasa huuphe bolla baggara kuya gidana mela oothis. Yoonasi he gose gaason daro ufaytis.
JON 4:7 Shin wontetha gallas wonta guura Xoossay guxune giigisis. He guxuniya gosey melana gakanaw masu.
JON 4:8 Away keyiya wode Xoossay doloha baggafe misha carko yeddis. Yoonasi labbanana gakanaw away Yoonasa huuphiya xuuggis. Yaatin I, “De7ope taw hayqoy lo77o” yaagidi hayqos woossis.
JON 4:9 Xoossay Yoonasako, “Neeni ha gose gisho yilotanaw bessii?” yaagis. Yoonasi, “Ee bessees; ubbaraka hayqana gakanaw yilotanaw taw bessees” yaagis.
JON 4:10 Yaatin Xoossay Yoonasako, “Zine dolada hachi melida gosees, ne daaburonaaris, ne dichonaris haysa mela qadhetadasa.
JON 4:11 Shin ushachinne haddirsi shaakidi eronna xeetanne laatamu mukulu asinne daro mehey de7iya ha gita katamaa Nanawes taani qadhetanaw bessennee?” yaagis.
MIC 1:1 Iyo7atami Akaazinne Hizqiyaasi kaalli kaallidi Yihudan kawotida wode Mooreseeta katama asi gidida Mikiyaasako yida Godaa qaalay haysa: I Samaarebanne Yerusalaameba qoncethi be7is.
MIC 1:2 Hinte, asa ubbay si7ite; sa7inne iya de7iya ubbay haysa hayzidi si7ite. Ubbaa Haariya Goday, ba geeshsha keethaafe hinte bolla markatees.
MIC 1:3 Heko, Goday ba de7iya bessaafe yees; biitta dhoqa bessata bolla hemetees.
MIC 1:4 Muqaadi taman til77eysada, haathi derepe duge goggeysada, dereti iya tohuwape garsan til7ana; zangaarati phalqetana.
MIC 1:5 Hessi ubbay haniday Yayqooba qohuwa gishonne Isra7eele nagaraa gishosa. Yayqoobi baletana mela gaaso gididay oonee? Enta katamaa Samaare gidenneyee? Yihuda asay eeqa goyinnana mela gaaso gididay oonee? Yerusalaame gidenneyee?
MIC 1:6 Hessa gisho, Goday, “Taani Samaare, denban keeletida shuchinne woyney tokiya bessa mela oothana. Taani iya shuchaa zangaaran holana; iya baasuwa kalloyana.
MIC 1:7 Iya eeqa misileti ubbay tinchetana; iya eeqa keethan oothiya laymatas imetida gatey ubbay xuugetana; taani iya eeqata ubbaa dhaysana. He gate ubbay layman demmidaba gidiya gisho, ika simmidi, hara laymas imetana” yaagees.
MIC 1:8 Hessa gisho, taani yeekananne waassana; xire kallonne mela tohon hemetana. Workanada waassana; qassi yanchoda yii gaana.
MIC 1:9 Samaare madunthay paxanaw danda7enna. He waayey Yihuda biitta gakis; ta asay de7iya Yerusalaame katamaa pengiyako gakis.
MIC 1:10 Gaate kataman de7iya nu morketas hessa odopite; enta sinthan yeekofite. Beet-Ofiira kataman baanan gondoretidi yeekite.
MIC 1:11 Hinteno, Shafira kataman de7eysato, kallo yeellatishe, di7etidi biite. Xanaana kataman de7eysati yaape keyanaw xaalokona. Beet-Exela katamay yeehoy de7iya bessi gidiya gisho, I hintew attiya bessi gidanaw danda7enna.
MIC 1:12 Metoy Godaape Yerusalaame penge gakanaw yida gisho, Marootan de7iya asay, “Lo77obay yandeesha!” gidi naagishe daaburis.
MIC 1:13 Xiyoone asaa nagaray koyro hinte bolla bentida gishonne Yerusalaame asaa nagaray hintenan bentida gisho, hinteno, Laakiso kataman de7eysato, gaare parata koorite.
MIC 1:14 Hessa gisho, hinteno Yihuda asato, hinte bidi, Moreseet-Gaate katama asas imota immana. Akziiba katama asay Isra7eele kawota cimmana.
MIC 1:15 Hinteno, Maaresha kataman de7eysato, Goday hintena olidi oykiya olanchota hinte bolla ehana; bonchetida Isra7eele halaqati Adulaama gongoluwan qosetana.
MIC 1:16 Hinteno, Yihuda asato, hinte dosiya nayti hintefe di7etidi baanaw de7iya gisho, hinte huuphiya meedetite; hinte huuphiya qoorase huupheda borooqo oothite.
MIC 2:1 Iitabaa halcheyisata, qassi banta hiixan de7ishe, gene waati oothaneko qopeyisata ayye! Wolqay enta kushen de7iya gisho, sa7i wontiya wode banta qofaa poloosona.
MIC 2:2 Enti goshsha gade koyiko, wolqan ekoosona; keethe koyiko wolqan oykoosona. Asa maata yedhidi, iya laata coo bonqoosona.
MIC 2:3 Hessa gisho, “Heko, taani hinte bolla iitabaa ehanaw qopas; hinte kessi ekanaw danda7eketa. I iita wode gidiya gisho, hinte otoron simeretanaw danda7eketa.
MIC 2:4 “He wode enti hinte bolla leemison qelqisana; qassi haysada yaagidi zeleelishe hintena oda caddana. ‘Nuuni ubbay tuma dhayida; Goday nu biitta ekidi, nuna di77idaysatas shaakidi immis’ ” yaagees Goday.
MIC 2:5 Hessa gisho, gadey saaman shaaketiya wode Godaa asaa giddon ne saama kessiya asi dhayana.
MIC 2:6 Asay taako, “Nu bolla tinbite odopa; hinte bolla haysa melabay gakana gada nu bolla tinbite odopa. Hessa mela kawushabay nuna gakena” yaagosona.
MIC 2:7 Taani entako, “Yayqooba kochato, Godaa danda7ay wurdeyee? I hessa malaba oothiyee? Suure ogen beysatas ta qaalay lo77oba oothennee? yaagidi hinte oychanaw bessii? yaagas.
MIC 2:8 Shin mata wodepe doomidi, ta asay ta bolla morkeda dendis. Hirgi bayna hinte giddora aadhiya saro asaa olape qaaretidi simmiya asada oothideta.
MIC 2:9 Ta asaa giddon de7iya maccasata enta lo77o keethafe laaggidi kesseeta; ta anjuwa enta naytape merinaw ekideta.
MIC 2:10 Ha bessay tunatethaa gaason iitida gisho, dendidi biite. Haysi hintew shempo bessi gidenna.
MIC 2:11 Issi cimmiya wordanchoy yidi, ‘Hinte sinthafe woyne ushshaninne mathoyiya ushshan ufaytana’ yaagidi wordo tinbite odiko, I hintew nabe gidana.
MIC 2:12 “Yayqooba kochato, taani hintena ubbaa shiishana; taani Isra7eele asaape attidaysata tuma issife shiishana. Dorsi girben shiiqeysadanne wudey hentha bessan shiiqeysada, taani enta issife shiishana. He bessay daro asan kumana.
MIC 2:13 Entaw oge dooyidi kaaletheysi entafe sinthatidi keyana; entika pengiya menthidi, keyana. Goday, enta kawoy ba huuphen entaw enta sinthe aadhidi enta kaalethana” yaagees.
MIC 3:1 Taani, “Yayqooba kochata halaqatonne Isra7eele asaa kaaletheysato, si7ite! Hinte suure pirdaa eranaw besseneyee?
MIC 3:2 Hinte lo77o ixidi, iita doseeta. Ta asaa galbaa qaareta; enta ashuwa enta meqethafe shaaketa.
MIC 3:3 Hinte ta asaa ashuwa meeta; enta galbaa qaaridi; enta meqethaa qanxeretheta; asho disten yegganaw muxeysada enta ashuwa muxeretheta.
MIC 3:4 Enti iita ooso oothida gisho, he wode enti Godaako waassana, shin I entaw zaarenna; I ba som7uwa he wode entafe qottana” yaagas.
MIC 3:5 Goday wordo nabetako, “Hinte miyaba immiya wode, ‘New sa7i saro’ yaageeta; shin hintena muzonna ixiko iya bolla ola awaajeta.
MIC 3:6 Hessa gisho, hintew gallas qamma gidana; qoncethi be7eketa. Sa7i hintew dhumana; zaaridi murunneketa; nabetas awii wullana; gallasi dhumana.
MIC 3:7 Qoncethi be7eysati yeellatana; murunneysati kawuyana. Godaa matape entaw zaaroy bayna gisho, enti yeellatidi, ubbay banta doona oykana” yaagees.
MIC 3:8 Shin taani Yayqooba zerethaas enta nagara, Isra7eele asaas enta nagaraa odana mela wolqan, Godaa Ayyaanan, suure pirdaaninne minotethan kumas.
MIC 3:9 Hinte suure pirdaa ixeysatinne lo77oba geellayiya Yayqooba kochata halaqatinne Isra7eele asaa kaaletheysati haysa si7ite.
MIC 3:10 Hinte Xiyoone katamaa suuthi gussidi keexeta; Yerusalaame katamaa geellatethan gimbeta.
MIC 3:11 Iya halaqati wodhaafen pirdoosona; kahineti miishen tamaarsoosona; nabeti miishey bayna murunnokona. Shin he ubbaa oothidi, “Goday nu giddon de7iya gisho, nu bolla iitabay yeenna” yaagidi iya ammanetosona.
MIC 3:12 Hessa gisho, hinte gaason Xiyoone katamay gadeda goyetana; Yerusalaame katamay laaletha doore gidana. Xoossa keethay keexetida derey wora gidana.
MIC 4:1 Wursetha gallasan Godaa xoossa keethay keexetida zumay, zumata ubbaafe dhoqu gidi bentana. Dere ubbaafe dhoqu dhoqu gaana. Kawotethati ubbay iyako woddana.
MIC 4:2 Higgey Xiyoonepe, Godaa qaalay Yerusalaamepe keyiya gisho, daro kawotethati yidi, “Ane Haayite; Godaa zumako, Yayqooba Xoossaa keethaako keyoos. Nu iya sheniya oothana mela I nuna ba ogiya tamaarsana” yaagana.
MIC 4:3 I daro asata giddon pirdana; haahon de7iya mino kawotethata palama diggana. Enti banta mashshaa marasha, banta toora baaca kessanaw qoxana. Kawotethay kawotethaa bolla ola denthenna; hizape guye, enti ola timirte tamaarokona.
MIC 4:4 Shin asi ubbay ba woyne kuyaninne balase kuya garsan wopu gidi uttana; hirgisiyabay aybika baawa. Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday hessa odis.
MIC 4:5 Asa ubbay ba xoossaa xoossaa goyinnana. Shin nuuni Godaa, nu Xoossaa sunthan merinaw hemetana.
MIC 4:6 Goday, “He gallas taani wobbetanne taani waayees aatha immin, di7etidi haaho bessi bidaysata shiishana.
MIC 4:7 Wobbeti attidi daana mela oothana; di7etidi haaho bessi bidaysata mino kawotethi kessana. He wodepe doomada merinaw taani Goday, Xiyoone deriyan enta bolla kawotana” yaagees.
MIC 4:8 Neno, Godaa asaa wochiya Yerusalaame dhoqa gimbiyaw, kase ne haariya maataynne Yerusalaame kawotethaa zaway ubbay new simmana.
MIC 4:9 Ha77i neeni ne qaala dhoqu oothada waasseynne iqethi oykida maccasada un7etey aybisee? New kawoy bayna gishoyee? Woyko nena zoriya dhayida gishosee?
MIC 4:10 Xiyoone asaw, iqethi oykida maccasada oolishe zooketite. Hinte katamaape keyidi qaa7en daana; yaape Babiloone baana. Gidoshin, yan hinte attana; Goday hintena hinte morketa kushepe wozana.
MIC 4:11 Shin ha77i daro kawotethati ne bolla shiiqidi, “Yerusalaamey tuno; nu ayfey Xiyoone be7o” yaagosona.
MIC 4:12 Shin enti Godaa qofaa erokona; iya halchuwa akeekibokona. Kathi yedhetanaw wudumman shiiqeysada, Goday enta seeranaw shiishis.
MIC 4:13 Goday, “Yerusalaame asaw, dendidi, hinte morketa yedhite. Taani hintew birata kace immana; taani hintew naase birata toho immana. Hinte daro kawotethata tincherethana; enti genen shiishida ubbaa hinte Godaas dummayana; enta shaluwa hinte sa7a ubbaa Godaas immana” yaagees.
MIC 5:1 Hinteno, Yerusalaame asaw, hinte olanchota shiishite! Nu morketi nuna teqidosona; enti Isra7eele kaaletheysa gacuwa xam7an shocana hanoosona.
MIC 5:2 Goday, “Efraatan de7iya Beeteleme katamaw, neeni Yihuda katamata giddon guutha; shin iyaw dendoy benipe doomidi, merinaw gididaysi, Isra7eele haaranaysi taw neepe keyana” yaagees.
MIC 5:3 Hessa gisho, iqethi oykida maccasiya na7aa yelana gakanaw, Goday Isra7eele morketas aathidi immana. Hessafe guye, di7etidi de7iya iya ishati simmidi, banta asaara walaketana.
MIC 5:4 I Godaa minotethan yidi, Godaa ba Xoossaa suntha wolqan ba asaa heemmana. I sa7aa gaxa gakanaw gita gidiya gisho, enti sarotethan daana.
MIC 5:5 I entaw sarotethi gidana. Asoore biitta asati nu biitta oykiya wodenne nu miixata yedhidi geliya wode nuuni laapun naageysatanne hospun kaaletheyisata enta bolla denthana.
MIC 5:6 Enti Namiruudey de7iya Asoore biitta olan xoonidi haarana. Asoore biitta asati nu biitta olidi oykiya wodenne nu zawa yedhiya wode I nuna enta kushepe ashshana.
MIC 5:7 Attida Yayqooba zareti daro deriya giddon Goday kiitida xaasa melanne maata bolla wodhiya aka mela gidana. Enti ammanetidi naagey Godaape attishin, ase gidenna.
MIC 5:8 Attida Yayqooba zareti kawotethata giddoninne daro asaa giddon, bazzon do7ata giddon gaammo melanne dorsa wude giddon gupi wodhiya wodala gaammo mela gidana. I yaara aadhiya wode yedherethesinne mentherethees; oonika ashshanaw danda7enna.
MIC 5:9 Hinte kushey hintera eqeteyisata bolla dendana; hinte morketi ubbay dhayana.
MIC 5:10 Goday, “He gallas taani hinte parata hinte giddofe dhaysana; hinte para gaareta mentherethana.
MIC 5:11 Taani hinte biittan de7iya katamata dhaysana; hinte miixa ubbaa laallana.
MIC 5:12 Hinte marota taani dhaysana; hizape guye murunneysati hinte giddon dookona.
MIC 5:13 Taani hinte eeqa misiletanne hinte goyinnanaw essida shuchata hinte giddofe dhaysana; hizape guye hinte hinte kushen medhidaba goyinneketa.
MIC 5:14 Taani Asheera eeqa xoossata hinte giddofe shoddana; hinte katamata dhaysana.
MIC 5:15 Taw kiitetiboonna kawotethata bolla yiloninne hanqon halo keyana” yaagees.
MIC 6:1 Goday Isra7eele asaas odeysa si7ite. Abeeti Godaw, dendada dhoqa dereta sinthan pirdeta; neeni odiyaba zumati si7o.
MIC 6:2 Hinte dereti, hinte mino sa7aa baasoti, Goday mootiya mootuwa si7ite. Goday ba asaara mootetees; Isra7eele asaara palamees.
MIC 6:3 Goday, “Ta asaw, taani hintena ay qohadinaa? Taani hintew waanada tooho gidadina? Ane taw odite!
MIC 6:4 Taani hintena Gibxe biittafe kessas; ta hintena aylletetha biittafe wozas. Hintena kaalethana mela Muse, Aaronanne Mayraamo hintew immas.
MIC 6:5 Ta asaw, Moo7abe kawa Balaaqi new qopidabaanne Bi7oora na7ay Balaami iyaw woygidi zaaridaako akeekite. Neeni Seeximape Galgala biya wode, ogen hanidaba ane qopite. Hessa hinte qopiko taani Goday hintena ashshanaw oothidaba ubbaa hinte akeekana” yaagees.
MIC 6:6 Godaa, dhoqa bessan de7iya Xoossaa sinthan goyinnanaw yashe taani ay ekada shiiqo? Iyaw xuussa yarsho gidana mela issi laytha wofaano ekada yo?
MIC 6:7 Goday mukulu dorsa marazetan woyko tammu mukulu shaafan de7iya haatha mela shamaho zayten ufaytandee? Ta naaquwa gisho, ta bayra na7aa, ta shempuwa nagaraa gisho ta yeluwa immo?
MIC 6:8 Asa na7o, Goday new lo77oba odi wothis. Goday neepe koyey aybee? Neeni suure pirdana mela, maarota dosana melanne ashketethan ne Xoossara daana mela gidennee?
MIC 6:9 Goday, “Yerusalaame katamaa xeegidi, ‘Iya sunthaas yashetethi cincatethi’ Seera xam7anne iya giigisiday ooneko akeekite.
MIC 6:10 Nagaranchoy genen ba son shiishida shaluwanne ixetida wordo maka miisheta taani doganeyee?
MIC 6:11 Yaatin, taani wordo mizaanen wordo maka miisheta waatada atto go?
MIC 6:12 He katamaa dureti geellatethan kumidaysata. Iyan de7iya asa ubbay wordancho; enta inxarsay iita.
MIC 6:13 Hessa gisho, taani hinte nagaraa gisho hintena dhaysanaw dendas.
MIC 6:14 Hinte maana, shin kalleketa; koshi hintefe duuxenna. Hinte buuridi shiishana, shin hintew aadenna; hinte dagayaba taani mashshan dhaysana.
MIC 6:15 Hinte kathi zerana, shin cakeketa; shamaho teera gum7ana, shin go7eteketa; woyne teera gum7ana, shin iya uyeketa.
MIC 6:16 Hinte kawa Omira wogaa, iya na7aa kawa Akaaba soo iita oosuwanne enta zoriya kaallida gisho, taani hintena dhaysana; hintena asi ubbay boronna mela oothana. Asay hintena cayiya cashshaa hinte tookana” yaagees.
MIC 7:1 Tana ayye! Taani teera ayfey maxetidi wurin, woyniyapenne balase mithafe ba amotidaysa demmanaw danda7iboona koshatida uraa mela gidas.
MIC 7:2 Xoossa asi biittan baawa; asa garsan suure asi dhayis. Asi ubbay asa suuthi gussanaw hokidi naagees; ubbay ba ishaa giten oykanaw kaallees.
MIC 7:3 Enta nam7u kusheti iitaba oothanaw loohidosona. Halaqinne daynni wodhaafe oychoosona; wolqara de7iya asati banta koydaba wolqan polisoosona. Enti ubbay issife pirdaa mirqidi dhaysoosona.
MIC 7:4 Enta garsan keeha geeteteysi aguntha mela; suure geeteteysi kinchote mela. Goday nabeta baggara odidaysada I ba asaa seerana gallasay gakis; enti yarkana wodey ha77i matis.
MIC 7:5 Ne shooruwa ammanopa; ne laggiyan ammanetofa. Neera de7iya ne machefe ne doona naaga.
MIC 7:6 He wode na7ay ba aawa kadhees; na7iya ba aaye bolla, na7aa machiya ba azinaa aaye bolla morketethan dendana. Asas iya soo asay morke gidana.
MIC 7:7 Shin taani ufaysan Godaa xeellana; tana ashshiya Xoossaa naagana; ta Xoossay tana si7ana.
MIC 7:8 Ta morkiyaw, ta metuwan ufaytofa; taani kundikoka dendana; ta dhuman uttikoka Goday taw poo7ana.
MIC 7:9 Taani Godaa naaqas; I taw mootetidi, tabaa pirdana gakanaw, taani iya hanquwa danda7ana. I tana poo7on kessana; taani iya xillo pirdaa be7ana.
MIC 7:10 He wode ta morkey hessa be7ana; taako, “Goday ne Xoossay awun de7ii?” yaagidi qelqisiday yeella ma77ana. I ogen de7iya urqada yedhetin, taani ta ayfen be7ana.
MIC 7:11 Hinteno, Isra7eele asaw, hinte katamaa gimbe dirsati diretiya gallasay yaana; he gallas hinte zaway aakana.
MIC 7:12 He gallas hinte asay hinteko simmana. Enti Asoorepe, Gibxefe, Efraxiisa shaafa heeran de7iya biittatape, haaho bessan de7iya abba gaxapenne dhoqa zumatape hinteko simmana.
MIC 7:13 Shin biittay iya bolla de7iya asaa iitatetha gaason asi bayna baysa gidana.
MIC 7:14 Neeni bazzon barka de7iya, ne laata deriya ne aradda biittan ne asaa heemma. Enti kase wodiyada Baasaneninne Galadan heemetana mela ootha.
MIC 7:15 Goday, “Hinte Gibxepe keyida wodiyada taani hintena malaalsiyaba bessaana” yaagees.
MIC 7:16 Enta wolqay gita gidikoka, kawotethati ubbay hessa be7idi yeellatana. Enti yeellatidi, banta doona oykana; enta haythay tullana.
MIC 7:17 Enti shooshadanne sa7ara gooshetiya medhetethatada biitta laaccana. Enti banta miixape kokorishe keyidi gita dagaman Godaako, nu Xoossaako, simmana; enti Godaa yayyidi daana.
MIC 7:18 Nagara ubbaa atto yaagey, attida ba asaa naaquwa taybonnay ne mela Xoossi oonee? Maarotethi nena ufaysiya gisho ne hanquwan merinaw gam7a eraka.
MIC 7:19 Neeni zaarada ne asaas qadhetasa; nu naaquwa ne tohuwan yedhasa; nu nagara abba ciimmon holaasa.
MIC 7:20 Neeni beni nu mayzatas caaqida caaquwada Abrahaamenne Yayqooba zare gidida ne asaas ne ammanetethanne ne merina siiquwa bessaana.
NAH 1:1 Elqosha kataman de7iya Nahoomi Nanaweba odida qaalaynne be7ida qoncethay haysa.
NAH 1:2 Goday qanaateysanne halo keyiya Xoossi; Goday halo keyeysanne hanqon kumidaysa. Goday baara eqeteyisata halo keyees; ba morketa seeranaw giigeti uttis.
NAH 1:3 Goday hanqetanaw ellesenna; iya wolqay gita; I qohidaysa seeronna aggenna. Godaas gotiyanne hobbiya giddora ogey de7ees; shaaray iya tohoy yedhin dendiya baana.
NAH 1:4 I abbanne shaafa hanqidi melisees; Baasanenne Qarmeloosi shulloosona. Libaanose ciishshay qoqofetees.
NAH 1:5 Iya sinthan dereti qaaxoosona; zumati til7oosona. I qonciya wode biitti qaaxana; sa7an de7iya ubbay kokorana.
NAH 1:6 Iya hanquwa sinthan eqanay oonee? Iya hanquwa suulaa danda7anay oonee? Iya hanquwa tamada bukiya wode zaallati za77idi phalqetoosona.
NAH 1:7 Goday lo77o; meto gallas qosetidi attiya besse; I banan ammaneteyisata erees.
NAH 1:8 Shin I ba morketa di7on muukidi dhaysana; baara eqeteyisata dhuman gelsana.
NAH 1:9 Hinte Godaa bolla maqetey aybisee? I hintena kumthi dhaysana; metoy zaari dendenna.
NAH 1:10 Hinte mathotidi gandigareysati, wolira oyketida agunthinne buurey taman xuugetiya mela hinte taman xuugetidi dhayana.
NAH 1:11 Nanawe, Godaa bolla iitabaa maqeteynne iita zore zorey ne giddofe keyis.
NAH 1:12 Goday, “Nanaweti minonne daro gidikoka, shodetidi dhayana. Taani kase Yihuda asaa un7ethas, shin hizape guye un7ethike.
NAH 1:13 Taani ha77i Asooreta qambara hinte gannaafe menthana; hinte qashetida santhalaata duuserethana” yaagees.
NAH 1:14 Nanawe, Goday ne bolla pirdida pirday haysa: “Hizape guye ne sunthaa xeegisiya koche new deenna. Ne xoossata keethan de7iya misiletanne eeqata taani dhaysana. Neeni pathonnaba gidiya gisho, taani ne duufuwa bookana” yaagees.
NAH 1:15 Heko, lo77o wore odishenne sarotethaa awaajishe kiitetidi yeysa tohoy deriya bollara gakis. Yihuda asaw, hinte morketi kumthi dhaydosona; enti zaaridi hinte biitta olidi oykokona. Hessa gisho, hinte ba7aaleta bonchite; hinte qangetha gathite.
NAH 2:1 Neno, Nanawe, mentheretheysi keyis! Hessa gisho, ne miixa naaga; ne ogiya wocha; ne dancuwa mintha; nena giigisa.
NAH 2:2 Bonqeysati bonqidi, enta woyniya dhaysikoka, Goday Isra7eele bonchuwa zaaridaysada Yayqooba bonchuwa zaarana.
NAH 2:3 Olanchoti zo7o gondalle oykidosona; zo7o ma7o ma77idosona. Enti olas giigiya wode para gaareti qin7aarosona; enti banta toora luuxoosona.
NAH 2:4 Para gaareti ogiyan adarsoosona; enti yaanne haanne hemetishe katamaa ogiyan yuuyosona. Qassi enti lacoy loccu giya xompe daanosona; wol7anthada ellesoosona.
NAH 2:5 Nanawey ba halaqata xeegidi shiishana, shin enti yishe oge bolla dhubetana. Enti katamaa gimbe dirsaako ellesana, morketa qohuwape enta naagiya gondalley giigis.
NAH 2:6 Shaafa baggara de7iya katamaa dirsaa pengeti dooyetidosona; kawo gadhoy dagammis.
NAH 2:7 Kawiya di7etada basu; I macca aylleti azzanidi holleda guugumana; banta tiraa baqishe yeekana.
NAH 2:8 Teqetida haathi dooyi bessin goggeysada Nanawe asay katamaape baqatana. Asi enta ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Eqite! Eqite!” yaagidi xeegana, shin oonika guye xeellenna.
NAH 2:9 He katamaa shaluwasinne, iyan minjetida boncho miishiyas tayboy baawa. Hessa gisho, he biraanne worqaa bonqite!
NAH 2:10 Nanawey baysa gidis; kasatidi, bazo gidis! Asaa wozanay yashshan til7is; gaadey kokoris; xeessay xaaxetis; som7oy bullatis!
NAH 2:11 Gaammoti aqiya bessay, wodala gaammoti de7iya bessay, addeynne macca gaammoti banta maratara yashshi bayna gupiya bessi daaniya Nanawe katamay ha77i awun de7ii?
NAH 2:12 Gaammoy ba maratas gidiyaba oykis; baara de7iya macca gaammes mentherethidi immis. Ba gongoluwa wodhethan, ba ollaa ashon kunthis.
NAH 2:13 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, “Heko, taani ne bolla dendas! Taani ne para gaareta taman xuuggana; ne wodala gaammota mashshi maana. Neeni haratape ekidaba taani neepe wosisana; ne kiitanchota qaalay hizape si7etenna” yaagees.
NAH 3:1 Daro asa suuthi gussida Nanawe katamaa ayye! Wordoy kumis; bonqi ekida shaluwas tayboy baawa.
NAH 3:2 Nanawe katamen lisso girsay, gerto gondorsay, parata adarsoynne para gaareta gufay si7etees.
NAH 3:3 Para asati piirixoosona; mashshay locees; tooray phoolees. Daro asi hayqis! Ahi aha bolla dooretis; hayqidabaas tayboy baawa! Yaara kanthidi biya asi ahan dhubetees.
NAH 3:4 Hessi ubbay haniday maari bayna Nanawe laymatetha gaasuwana. I daro murunno oothasu; kawotethata ba laymatethan, asaa ba murunnuwan aylleyasu.
NAH 3:5 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, “Heko, taani ne bolla dendas! Taani ne ma7uwa neepe qaarana; ne kalluwa asaa, ne pokuwa kawotethata bessaana.
NAH 3:6 Taani nena pito yeggiya bessi kessana; nena kadhana; asi ubbay nena miiccanaada oothana.
NAH 3:7 Nena be7iya ubbay neepe haakidi, ‘Heko, Nanawe katamay baysatis; iyaw azzananay oonee? Iya minthethiya asi awupe bentandesha?’ yaagana” yaagees.
NAH 3:8 Neno, Nanawe, neeni Gibxen de7iya Tebiso katamape aadhay? Iya Nayle shaafa matan de7awusu; haathi I yuushuwa teqis; shaafay iw miixa gidis; qassi haathayka iw dirsi.
NAH 3:9 Topheynne Gibxey iw zawi bayna wolqa; Puuxinne Liibey iyo maaddeyisata.
NAH 3:10 Gidoshin, iya di7etasu; I guutha nayti deshetidi, oge gaxa ubban kundidosona. I bonchetida asata bolla saami yegetis; I gita asati ubbay santhalaatan qashetidosona.
NAH 3:11 Neno, Nanawe, neeni mathotidi gandigariya asada hanana. Ne morketa sinthafe baqatada attiya bessi koyana.
NAH 3:12 Ne miixati ubbay koyro teerida ayfey de7iya balase mithaa mela. Balase mithaa qaathiya wode teeray meysa doonan wodhees.
NAH 3:13 Heko, ne olanchoti ubbay maccasa mela. Ne zawa pengeti ne morketas dalgidi dooyetidosona; kobe mithaa tami mis.
NAH 3:14 Ne morketi ne yuushuwa un7ethiya wode uyana haatha ha77i tika. Ne miixa mintha; urqa yedhada xuube medha; oto giigisa.
NAH 3:15 Nena yan tami maana; booley kathi meysada nena mashshi maana. Neeni booleda dara gondoda yeleta.
NAH 3:16 Neeni ne zal7anchota salo xoolintotape aathada darsadasa. Shin enti booleda ubbaa mi diggidi paallidi dhayana.
NAH 3:17 Ne toora moconatinne ne moorinnati meego wode dirsa bolla uttida boole mela. Enti awi keyiya wode paallidi dhayoosona; enti de7iya bessaa erey baawa.
NAH 3:18 Neno Asoore kawaw, ne halaqati dhiskidosona; ne bonchetida asati kundidosona. Ne asay dereta bolla laaletis; enta shiishiya asika baawa.
NAH 3:19 Neeni zawi bayna iitatethaafe kessi ekida asi bayna gisho, ne me7oy kooletenna; ne madunthay paxenna. Nebaa si7ida ubbay ne bolla kushe baqana.
HAB 1:1 Nabiya Inbaqoomes Goday qoncisida qaalay haysa.
HAB 1:2 Inbaqoomey, “Abeeti Godaw, tana maaddana mela taani nena xeegiya wode awude gakanaw si7onna ixay? Taani un7etada neeko waassiya wode awude gakanaw ashshona ixay?
HAB 1:3 Neeni ha iitatetha ubbaa tana ayis bessay? Neeni bala be7ashe ayis si77i gay? Dhayoynne geellatethi ta sinthana; palaminne ooshshi biitta ubban daris.
HAB 1:4 Hessa gisho, higgey dol7is; suure pirdi kanthenna. Nagaranchoti xillo asata teqidi oykida gisho, pirdi geellatis” yaagis.
HAB 1:5 Goday zaaridi, “Hinte yuushuwan de7iya kawotethata xeellidi malaaletite. Hintew asi odin hinte ammanonna oosuwa taani hinte wodiyan oothana.
HAB 1:6 Taani qadhey baynaysatanne dirgiya Babiloone asaa denthana. Enti bantaba gidonna biitta olidi oykanaw biitta ubban yuuyosona.
HAB 1:7 Enti yashisoosonanne daganthoosona; bantana bonchisiya higge kessoosona.
HAB 1:8 Enta parati maahepe aadhidi ellesoosona; koshatida omarsa suudhumepe aadhidi wozana mino. Enta para asati haahope yoosona; enti arganthi issiba oykanaw wodhiyada paalloosona.
HAB 1:9 Enta olanchoti ubbay iita ooso oothanaw bazzo carkoda carkishe yoosona. Asa di77idi shafeda shiishosona.
HAB 1:10 Enti kawota bolla qelqisoosona; haareyisata enti toochoosona. Enti shucha dirsan diretida katamata ubbaa bolla miicoosona. He dirsata di77anaw enta yuushuwan biitta shiishosona.
HAB 1:11 Hessafe guye, enti ubbaa carko mela pitidi efana. He geellatas enta wolqay enta xoossaa” yaagis.
HAB 1:12 Abeeti Godaw, ta Xoossaw, ta Geeshshaw, neeni merinaa Xoossaa gidikii? Neeni nu Zaalla gidiya gisho nuuni hayqoko. Abeeti Godaw, Babiloone asay nuna pirdana mela enta denthada wolqaa entaw immadasa.
HAB 1:13 Ne ayfeti daro geeshshi gidiya gisho, iitabaa xeellanaw dosokona; neeni iitabay oosetiya wode be7ashe si77i gaaka. Yaatin, ha iitata ayis si77i gada xeellay? Nagaranchoti bantafe aadhidi xilliya asata mittiya wode ayis si77i gay?
HAB 1:14 Neeni ase abba molodanne kaalethey bayna ulora gooshetiya medhetethata medhadasa.
HAB 1:15 Babiloone asay asa ubbaa qaphen qoridi kessana; enta banta gitiyan oykana; enta banta daachuwan buuridi shiishana; hessa oothidi enti ufaytananne hashshu gaana.
HAB 1:16 Hessa gisho, enti banta gitiyaas yarshana; banta daachuwas ixaane cuyisana. Enti shalo demmeynne injetin de7ey he gitetana.
HAB 1:17 Yaatin, enti banta gitiya qadhey bayna yeggishenne mishi kawotethata dhaysishe waanidi daanee?
HAB 2:1 Taani wochiya gimbiya bolla eqada naagana. He bessan eqada Goday taw odiyabaanne ta mootuwas immiya zaaruwa si7anaw naagashshana.
HAB 2:2 Goday zaaridi, “Woxiya addey nabbabana mela loche shucha bolla taani new qoncisiya qaala ordisada xaafa.
HAB 2:3 Qoncethay ba wodiya naagees; qoncethay poletiya wodey elle gakana; wordo gidenna. Gam7ikoka naaga; I tuma hanana; gam7enna.”
HAB 2:4 Heko, iya wozanay otortis; iya qofay suure gidenna; shin xilloy ba ammanuwan de7on daana.
HAB 2:5 Duretethi ase cimmees; ceeqetiya uraas shempoy baawa. I duufoda yaramba gidiya gishonne hayqoda kalli eronna gisho, kawotethata ubbaa baw shiishees; asa ubbaa baw di77ees.
HAB 2:6 Di7etida asay simmidi enta borishenne qelqisishe haysada yaagana: “Babaa gidonna miishe shiishidi dooreysanne bonqidi duretidaysata ayye! Haysi haysada hanidi, awude gakanaw daanee?” yaagana.
HAB 2:7 Neeni entafe bonqida asati ne akeekona ne bolla dendidi nena kokorsana. Hessafe guye, enti ne shaluwa ubbaa bonqana.
HAB 2:8 Neeni daro asa shaluwa bonqida gisho, entafe attidaysati ne shaluwa bonqana. Ne daro asa suuthaa gussadasa; sa7aa bolla, katamata bollanne yan de7iya asaa ubbaa bolla iita ooso oothadasa.
HAB 2:9 Metoy nena gakenna mela ne keethaa dhoqa bessan keexanaw geellatethan miishe shiishidayso nena ayye!
HAB 2:10 Daro asaa genada dhaysida gisho, ne soo asaa kawushadasa; neeni ne bolla dhayo ehadasa.
HAB 2:11 Hari attoshin ne keetha gimbe shuchay ne bolla waassana; keethaa tuuqeti waasuwa kooshummana.
HAB 2:12 Katamaa iitatethan baasidi asa suuthan keexeysato hintena ayye!
HAB 2:13 Asay oothiyaba ubbay tama kaho gidana mela, kawotethati daaburida ubbay hada gidana mela oothiday Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa gidennee?
HAB 2:14 Abbi haathan kumeysada sa7i Godaa bonchuwa eratethan kumana.
HAB 2:15 “Ba shooroy kallotin be7ana gidi, mathoyiya ushshi ushshiya uraa ayye!
HAB 2:16 Neeni boncho aggada kawushe ma77ana. Ha77i mathoy ne tara; ne uyada kallota. Godaa ushacha kushiyan de7iya xuu7ay new imetana; ne bonchoy yeellan laametana.
HAB 2:17 Ne Libaanose dhaysidaysada neka dhayana. Ne do7ata wursadasa, ha77i enti nena yashisana. Ne daro asaa suuthaa gussadasa; sa7a bolla, katamata bollanne iyan de7iya asa bolla iita ooso oothadasa.
HAB 2:18 “I baw eeqi ay maaddii? Iya asa kushen giigis gidennee? Wordofe attishin, iyan harabay bentenna. Yaatin, iya medhida uray ha aykoka odetonna eeqan ammaneteysi iya ay maaddanee?
HAB 2:19 Mithafe giigidaysa ‘Barka’ geyso, qassi shempoy bayna shuchaa ‘Denda’ geyso nena ayye! I wona new ay qoncisanaw danda7ii? Heko, worqaninne biran meeshetis; iyaw shempoy baawa.
HAB 2:20 “Shin Goday ba geeshsha keethaana. Hessa gisho, sa7an de7iya asa ubbay iya sinthan si77i go” yaagis.
HAB 3:1 Mazmuren shiqida nabiya Inbaqoome woosay haysa:
HAB 3:2 Abeeti Godaw, neeni kase oothidaba taani si7ada yayyas. Godaw, nu wodiyanka he oosota zaarada ootha; enti nu wodiyanka ereto. Ne hanqetiya wode ne maarota qopa.
HAB 3:3 Xoossay Temaana biittafe yees; Geeshshay Paarana deriyape wodhees. Iya bonchoy saluwa kammis; iya galatay sa7aa kumis.
HAB 3:4 Iya poo7oy phooliya awa mela; iya wolqay qosetidi uttida iya kushiyape xolqiya poo7oy keyees.
HAB 3:5 Gadoy iya sinthan bees; tama lacoy iya tohuwape keyees.
HAB 3:6 I eqin biittay qaaxis; I xeellin kawotethati kokoridosona. Merinaa dereti woddidosona; I enta bolla hemetiya benipe de7iya zumati laaletidosona.
HAB 3:7 Taani Tophe asaa dunkaaney metootishin be7as; Midiyaame biitta asay kokorishin be7as.
HAB 3:8 Abeeti Godaw, neeni ayis hanqetadii? Shaafati nena hanqethidona? Woyko ne hanqoy abba bollee? Akay, neeni ne paratanne ne para gaareta toggiday ne asaas xoono immanaasa gidennee?
HAB 3:9 Neeni ne dongiya waaxadasa; dukanaw giigisadasa; biitta phalqada haathe kessadasa. Salaha
HAB 3:10 Dereti nena be7idi yashshan kokoridosona; kixa haathay aadhis. Ciimmo haathati waassidosona; banta zuliya dhoqu dhoqu oothosona.
HAB 3:11 Ne dongiya dukan, ne toora phoolethan, awinne ageeni banta de7iya bessan eqidosona.
HAB 3:12 Neeni hanquwan biitta ubba yuuyadasa; kawotethata ne hanquwan yedhadasa.
HAB 3:13 Ne asaanne ne tiyidaysa ashshanaw keyadasa; iitata halaqaa shocadasa; iya ma7uwa qaarada kallo ashshadasa. Salaha
HAB 3:14 Nuna laallanaw goteda yida nu morkiya, metootanchota mittanaw geeman qosetidaysa, iya tooran iya caddadasa.
HAB 3:15 Neeni ne paratara abba bolla hemetadasa; daro haatha yedhadasa.
HAB 3:16 Taani hessa ubbaa si7in ta wozanay dagammis; ta mettershay kokoris. Ta meqethay dagammis; ta tohoy gundis. Nu morketa Goday seerana gakanaw, taani metuwa gallasaa danda7an naagana.
HAB 3:17 Balase mithay ayfonna ixikoka, woyniya bolla ayfey bentonna ixikoka, shamahoy ayfonna ixikoka, goshshan kathi kaxikoka, girben dorsi dhaykoka, zadalon mehey dhaykoka,
HAB 3:18 taani Godan ufaytana; tana ashshiya Xoossan ufaysan kumana.
HAB 3:19 Ta wolqay Ubbaa Haariya Godaa; I ta tohuwa gaara tohoda minthees; I tana dhoqa bessan hemethees.
ZEP 1:1 Amoone na7ay Iyosyaasi Yihudan kawotida wode Sofoniyaasako yida Godaa qaalay haysa. Sofoniyaasi Kuusha na7aa; Kuushi Gadalla na7a; Gadalli Amaare na7a; Amaarey Hizqiyaasa na7aa.
ZEP 1:2 “Taani biitta bolla de7iyaba ubbaa dhaysana.
ZEP 1:3 Asenne mehee, salo kafotanne abba molota dhaysana. Iita asata shira yeggana; asa zare biitta bollafe dhaysana” yaagees Goday.
ZEP 1:4 “Yihudaninne Yerusalaamen de7iya ubbaa seeranaw ta kushiya denthana. Ba7aale eeqa goyinneysatanne iya haggaaziya kahineta he bessaafe dhaysana.
ZEP 1:5 Keetha bolla keyidi awas, ageenasinne xoolintotas goyinneyisata taani dhaysana. Godaa goyinnishenne iya sunthan caaqishe Moloka geetetiya eeqa sunthan caaqeyisata taani dhaysana.
ZEP 1:6 Tana kaalo aggidi guye simmidaysata, tana koyboonaysatanne tana oychiboonayisata taani dhaysana” yaagees Goday.
ZEP 1:7 Godaa gallasay matida gisho, Ubbaa Haariya Godaa sinthan si77i giite! Goday yarshuwa giigisis; qassi ba xeegida imathata geeshshis.
ZEP 1:8 “Godaa yarshuwa gallas halaqata, kawa naytanne allaga biitta ma7o ma77ida ubbaa taani seerana.
ZEP 1:9 He gallas allaga biitta asatada, eeqa goyinneysatanne banta godaa keethaa geellatethaninne cimon kuntheyisata taani seerana” yaagees Goday.
ZEP 1:10 “He gallas Molo Pengiya baggara waasoy, katamaas nam7antho shaahuwan yeehonne zumata bolla gita dom7e girsi si7etana.
ZEP 1:11 Hinteno, katamaas garsa baggan de7eysato, yeekite. Yan zal7iya ubbay dhayidosona; bira oykidaysati hayqi wuridosona.
ZEP 1:12 He gallas taani xompe oythada Yerusalaame gidduwa koyana. Hirgi bayna wodhi uttidi banta wozanan, ‘Goday lo77oka iitaka’ geyisata taani seerana.
ZEP 1:13 Enta shaloy bonqetana; enta keethay laaletana. Enti keethe keexana, shin he keethan dookona; woyne tokana, shin he woyniya uyokona” yaagees Goday.
ZEP 1:14 “Godaa gita gallasay matis; ellesidi gakis. Godaa gallasay camo gallas; He gallas mino olanchotika waaso goochana.
ZEP 1:15 He gallasay hanqo gallas, he gallasay metonne un7a gallas, dhayonne laaletetha gallas, dhumanne caagana gallas, shaaranne sakana dhuma gallas gidana.
ZEP 1:16 He gallasay diretida katamata bolla, adussa gimbeta bolla ola moyzey punetana; giigeta giya waasoy si7etana.
ZEP 1:17 Enti tana qohida gisho, qooqeda tattafana gakanaw, enta bolla meto ehana. Enta suuthay di7oda goggana; enta ahay pitoda yegetana.
ZEP 1:18 Godaa hanqo gallas enta biraynne enta worqay enta ashshena. I sa7an de7iya ubbaa qoponna dhaysana; biitta ubbay iya hanquwa taman meetetana” yaagees Goday.
ZEP 2:1 Hinteno, yeelli bayna asaw, ane issife shiiqite!
ZEP 2:2 Carkoy punnidi efiya baanada hanonna de7ishin, yashshiya Godaa hanqoy hinte bolla wodhonna de7ishin, Godaa hanqo suulaa gallasay hinte bolla yoonna de7ishin Godaako simmite.
ZEP 2:3 Hinteno, biittan de7iya ashketo, iya kiita naagiya ubbato, Godaa koyte; xillotethaa koyte; ashketethi koyte. Ooni eri Godaa hanqo gallas hinte attonna aggeketa.
ZEP 2:4 Gaaza katamay ona gidana; Asqaloona katamay baysa gidana. Ashdooda katama asay seeta gallas goodettana; Eqroona katamay shodetana.
ZEP 2:5 Hinteno, abba gaxan de7iya Keltaaweto, hintena ayye! Neno, Filisxeemeti de7iya Kanaane biittaw, Godaa pirday ne bolla yees. Taani nena dhaysana; issi asika attenna.
ZEP 2:6 Abbaa gaxan de7iya hinte biittay mehe heemetiya bessi, henthanchoti de7iya bessinne mehe dara gidana.
ZEP 2:7 Yihuda asape attidaysati abba gaxan de7iya bessaa laattana; enti yan heemmana. Sa7ay qammiya wode enti Asqaloona kataman de7iya keethatan aqana. Goday enta Xoossay entaba qopana; I enta zaaridi naannisana.
ZEP 2:8 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, “Taani Moo7abe tooshiyanne Amoone cashshaa si7as. Enti ta asaa waatidi toochidaakonne enta biitta ekanaw waatidi mandidaako ta erayis.
ZEP 2:9 Hessa gisho, ta de7o sunthan caaqayis; Moo7abey Sodoomeda hanana; Amooney Gamoorada hanana. Enti merinaw maxine ollanne agunthi ma77ida bazzo gidana. Ta asape attidaysati enta shaluwa bonqana; enta biitta laattana” yaagees.
ZEP 2:10 Enti Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa asaa toochida gishonne cayida gisho, enta bolla metoy gakana.
ZEP 2:11 Enta biittan de7iya xoossata I dhaysiya wode Goday entana yashisana. Sa7an de7iya kawotethatan de7iya asa ubbay ba de7iya bessan iya goyinnana.
ZEP 2:12 Hinteno, Tophe asaw, hinte ta mashshan hayqana.
ZEP 2:13 I ba kushiya pudeha bagga yeddidi Asoore biitta dhaysana. Qassi Nanawe katamaa mela bazzoda baysa bessi oothana.
ZEP 2:14 Mehe wudeynne biittan de7iya do7ati ubbay yan hemetana; guttoynne quxarey laaletida gimbiya giddon daana. Enta qaalay maskooteranne pengiyara si7etana; ziga tuuqeti kallotana.
ZEP 2:15 “Taape attishin, hari baawa” yaagidi otortidi de7ida katamay ha77i waanidi do7ati aqiya bessi gididee? Iya matara aadhiya ubbay banta kushiya baqishe, “Poora!” gaana.
ZEP 3:1 Makallanchuwas, tunidaysasinne ba deriya un7ethida Yerusalaame katamaa ayye!
ZEP 3:2 I oonaka kiitetenna; seerin simmenna; Godan ammanetena; ba Xoossaako shiiqenna.
ZEP 3:3 Iya halaqati gudiya gaammo mela; iya daynnati demmidaba wontos ashshona ubbaa midi ongiya omarsa suudhume mela.
ZEP 3:4 Iya nabeti otoranchonne genancho; iya kahineti geeshshaa tuniseyisata; enti Godaa higgiya mirqoosona.
ZEP 3:5 Shin iya giddon de7iya Goday xillo; I bala oothenna. Wonta wonta I xillo pirdees; gallas gallas hessa aggenna. Gidoshin, yan de7iya geellay yeella erenna.
ZEP 3:6 “Taani kawotethata dhaysas; enta gimbeta laallas. Enta katamata issi doonna baysa biitta oothas; enta ogeta asi kanthonna bazzo oothas.
ZEP 3:7 Taani haysa ubbaa oothada, ‘Ta asay tana bonchana; ta seera ekana; ta kiittidaba dogenna’ yaagas. Shin enti kasepe aadhidi iitidosona; banta oosuwan tunidosona” yaagees Goday.
ZEP 3:8 “Ane taani pirdiya gallasay gakanaw guuthu naagite. Taani deretanne kawotethata shiishanaw qofa qachas; ta hanquwa suulaa enta bolla gussana; biittay kumethi ta hanquwa taman xuugetana.
ZEP 3:9 “He wode asa ubbay geeshsha oda odetana mela oothana. Enti ubbay Godaa sunthaa xeegana; issife iyaw goyinnana.
ZEP 3:10 Laaletida asay, tana tuma goyinneysati, Tophe shaafatape hefinthan de7eysati taw imota ehana.
ZEP 3:11 Otoreysatanne ceeqeteyisata ta hinte giddofe dhaysiya gisho, he wode hinte ta bolla oothida oosuwa gaason yeellateketa. Hizape guye hinte ta geeshsha zumaa bolla otorteketa.
ZEP 3:12 Taani hinte giddofe bantana kawusheysatanne aadata ashshana; enti Godaa sunthan ammanetana.
ZEP 3:13 Isra7eele asaape attidaysati iitabaa oothokona; wordo odetokona; enta inxarsan cimoy bentenna. Hessa gisho, enti midi kallidi saron daana; enta yashisiyabay baawa” yaagees.
ZEP 3:14 Xiyoone na7e, mazmuriya yexa! Isra7eele asaw, ililite! Yerusalaame na7e, ne polo wozanaape ufayta; hashshu ga!
ZEP 3:15 Goday hinte bolla pirdida pirdaa aggis; hinte morketa diggis. Goday, Isra7eele kawoy hinte giddon de7ees; hizape guye hintena yashisiyabay baawa.
ZEP 3:16 He gallas enti Yerusalaame haysada yaagana: “Xiyoone, yayyofa! Ne kushey argaacopo.
ZEP 3:17 Goday, ne Xoossay ne giddon de7ees; I new xoono immiya olanchuwa. I nenan ufaytana; ba siiquwan nena oorathana. Asay ba7aale gallas mazmure yexeysada, I nenan ufayteysa mazmure yexidi bessaana” yaagana.
ZEP 3:18 Goday haysada yaagees: “Hizape guye ne bolla dhayoy gakonnaada oothana; ne yeella diggana.
ZEP 3:19 He wode taani nena un7ethidaysata ubbaa seerana; wobbeta ashshana; laaletidaysata shiishana. Enti yeellatida bessan zaarada bonchana; enta yeella bonchoninne saban laammana.
ZEP 3:20 He wode taani hintena shiishana; hintena issife zaarada shiishana. Taani hintena naannisiya wode, hinte ha sa7an de7iya asa ubbaa matan, bonchetidaysatanne eretidaysata gidana” yaagees Goday.
HAG 1:1 Kawoy Daariyosi kawotida nam7antho laythan, usupuntho ageenan koyro gallasan, Godaa qaalay nabiya Hagge baggara Yihuda biitta haariya Salatiyaala na7aa, Zarubaabelakonne kahine halaqa gidida Iyyosadeqa na7aa, Iyyasuko haysada yaagidi yis.
HAG 1:2 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, “Ha asay Godaa keethaa zaaridi keexiya wodey buroo gakibeenna” yaagees.
HAG 1:3 Yaatin, Godaa qaalay nabiya Hagge baggara haysada yaagis:
HAG 1:4 “Ta asaw, ta keethay laaletidi uttin, hinte, hinte alleeqetida keethatan daanaw haysi hintew wodee?” yaagis.
HAG 1:5 Hessa gisho, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, “Ane hinte hintena gakishe de7iyaba qopite.
HAG 1:6 Hinte daro zerideta, shin guuthu shiishideta. Meeta, shin kalleketa; uyeeta, shin aleketa. Ma77eeta, shin hintena ho77enna. Damooze ekeeta, shin peedhetha kiisen yeggiyada coo dhayees” yaagees.
HAG 1:7 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, “Ane hinte hintena gakishe de7iyaba qopite.
HAG 1:8 Hiza deriya bolla keyidi, mithi qanxidi ehite; taani iyan ufaytana melanne bonchetana mela xoossa keethaa zaaridi keexite.
HAG 1:9 Hinte daro kathi shiishanaw qopideta, shin guutha gidis. Iya hinte soo gelsiya wode ta punnin dhayi aggis. Haysi aybis hanidee? Taani haysa oothiday hinte ubbay hinte keethaa keethaa keexishin, ta keethay laaletidi attida gishosa.
HAG 1:10 Hessa gisho, saloy ira diggis, sa7i kathi immonna ixis.
HAG 1:11 Taani biittanne zumaa bolla, kathaa bolla, woyniyanne zaytiya bolla, biitti dolisiyaba ubbaa bolla, asaanne mehiya bollanne hinte daabura ubbaa bolla koshaa xeegas” yaagees.
HAG 1:12 Haysafe guye, Salatiyaala na7ay Zarubaabeli, kahine halaqa gidida Iyyosadeqa na7ay, Iyyasuynne di7etethaafe simmida asa ubbay, Godaa banta Xoossaa qaalasinne Goday enta Xoossay kiitida nabiya Hagge qaalas, kiitetidosona; asay Godaa yayyidosona.
HAG 1:13 Yaatin, Goday kiitida Haggey asaako, “ ‘Taani hintera de7ayis’ yaagees” yaagidi Godaa kiitaa asaas odis.
HAG 1:14 Yaatin, Goday, Yihuda biitta haariya Salatiyaala na7aa, Zarubaabela, Kahine halaqa gidida Iyyosadeqa na7aa, Iyyasunne di7etethaafe simmida asa ubbaa denthethis. Enti Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa, banta Xoossaa keethaa keexo doomidosona.
HAG 1:15 Haysi haniday kawoy Daariyosi kawotida nam7antho laythan, usupuntho ageenan laatamanne oyddantho gallasaana.
HAG 2:1 Daariyosi kawotida nam7antho laythan, laapuntha ageenan laatamanne issintho gallasan, Godaa qaalay nabiya Hagge baggara haysada yaagis.
HAG 2:2 “Yihuda haariya, Salatiyaala na7aa, Zarubaabelas, kahine halaqa gidida Iyyosadeqa na7aa, Iyyasusinne di7etethaafe simmida asaas haysada yaagada oda:
HAG 2:3 Ha xoossa keetha kase bonchoy ay meleko be7ida asaape hinte giddon attida asi de7ii? Hachi hinte be7iya wode ay daanii? Hinte ayfiya sinthan baynaba daanennee?
HAG 2:4 Gidoshin, Zarubaabela, ha77i minna! Kahine halaqa gidida Iyyosadeqa na7aw, Iyyasu minna! Biittan de7iya asaw hinte minnidi oothite! Taani hintera de7ayis. Taani Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysa odayis.
HAG 2:5 Hinte Gibxefe keyiya wode taani hintera gidana gada caaqidaysada ta Ayyaanay hintera de7iya gisho yayyofite!” yaagis.
HAG 2:6 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, “Taani qantha woden issi toho gujada salotanne sa7aa, abbanne biitta qaathana.
HAG 2:7 Kawotethata ubbaa qaathada kawotethata ubban de7iya shaloy haa yaana mela oothana. Ha xoossa keetha bonchon kunthana.
HAG 2:8 Biray tabaa; worqay tabaa.
HAG 2:9 Koyro bonchuwafe ha nam7antho xoossa keetha bonchoy aadhana. Taani Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday ha bessan sarotethi immana yaagada oda” yaagis.
HAG 2:10 Daariyosi kawotida nam7antho laythan, uddufuntho ageenan laatamanne oyddantho gallasan, Godaa qaalay nabiya Hagge baggara haysada yaagidi yis.
HAG 2:11 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, “Higgey woygiyako eranaw kahineta oycha.
HAG 2:12 ‘Issi asi geeshsha ashuwa ba afilaa macaran qachidi eki bishin, he afilaa macaray, uytha woyko woxiya woyko woyniyanne zaytiya woyko hara ay qommo kathi bochiko, he boshetida kathay geeshshi gidanaw danda7ii?’ yaagada oycha” yaagis. Kahiney zaaridi, “Geeshshi gidanaw danda7enna” yaagis.
HAG 2:13 Haggey zaaridi, “Aha bochidi tunida issi asi haysatape issi qommo kathaa bochiko he kathay tuna gidanee?” yaagidi oychis. Kahiney, “Ee tunana” yaagidi zaaris.
HAG 2:14 Haggey zaaridi, “Ha asaynne ha kawotethay ta sinthan hessa mela. Enti oothiya oosoynne enti immiya imotay ubbay hessa mela tuna” yaagees Goday.
HAG 2:15 “Hachife doomidi, hinte bolla gakidaba akeekite! Godaa keethaa keexo doomanaape kase,
HAG 2:16 hinte nam7u kuntaale kathi ekana gidi, kathi wothida bessaa bideta, shin issi kuntaale xalaala demmideta. Issi xeetu litiro woyne ekanaw woyne gum7iya ollaa bideta, shin hinte oytamu litiro xalaala woyne demmideta.
HAG 2:17 Taani hinte kushe ooso ubbaa bolla melsiya carko, katha hargenne shachi yeddada dhaysas. Shin hinte ha ubban taako simmibeketa” yaagees Goday.
HAG 2:18 “Hachi gallasaape, ha uddufuntho ageenan laatamanne oyddantho gallasaape doomidi ane akeekite. Godaa keethaa baasoy baasetida gallasaape doomidi qopite.
HAG 2:19 Ha77i zerethas haniya kathi hinte shaalen dhayiko, woyney, balasey, oromaaneynne shamahoy hachi gakanaw ayfonna ixikoka, hachife doomada taani hintena anjana” yaagees Goday.
HAG 2:20 He ageenan laatamanne oyddantho gallasan Godaa qaalay nam7antho Haggeko haysada yaagis.
HAG 2:21 Yihuda haariya Zarubaabelas haysada yaagada oda: “Taani salotanne sa7aa qaathana.
HAG 2:22 Kawotethata araata shira yeggana; enta wolqaa dhaysana. Para gaareta enta laaggeysatara shira yeggana; enta parati wurana; para asati wolu wodhana.
HAG 2:23 ‘Ta aylliyaw, Salatiyaala na7a Zarubaabela, taani Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday nena he gallas ekana. Taani nena ta migiddo maatame mela oothana. Taani nena dooras’ yaagees” yaagada oda.
ZEC 1:1 Daariyosi kawotida nam7antho laythan, hospuntho ageenan, Godaa qaalay Ido na7aa, Baraka na7aa, nabiya Zakariyasako yis.
ZEC 1:2 “Goday hinte mayzata bolla daro hanqetis.
ZEC 1:3 Shin ha77i asaas haysada yaagada oda: ‘Taako simmite; taani hinteko simmana’ yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 1:4 Kase nabeti, hinte aawatako, ‘Hinte iita ogiyapenne iita oosuwape simmite’ yaagidi odin, si7onna ixidi, banta iita ogiyapenne oosuwape simmonna ixida, hinte mayzatada hanopite” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 1:5 Hinte mayzati ha77i awun de7oona? He nabeti merinaw paxa de7oona?
ZEC 1:6 Gidoshin, nabeta, ta aylleta baggara taani odida kiitatinne higgeti ubbay hinte mayzata bolla gakibeennee? Yaatin, enti banta nagara paaxidi, “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday nu ogiyadanne nu oosuwada nuus immana gidaysada ba oosuwa oothis” yaagidosona.
ZEC 1:7 Daariyosi kawotida nam7antho laythan, Shabaaxa geetetiya tammanne issintho ageenan, laatamanne oyddantho gallasan, Godaa qaalay Ido na7aa, Baraka na7aa, nabiya Zakariyasako yis.
ZEC 1:8 Taani qamma qoncethan, zo7o para toggida issi asi be7as. I zangaaran de7iya barseneete geetetiya mithata garsan eqis; iyape guye baggara zo7o, daamanne bootha parati de7oosona.
ZEC 1:9 Yaatin taani, “Ta godaw, haysati aybee?” yaagada oychas. Taara haasaya kiitanchoy, “Haysati aybeko taani nena bessaana” yaagis.
ZEC 1:10 Barseneete mitha garsan eqida uray, “Haysati sa7aa ubbaa yuuyidi wochana mela Goday kiittidaysata” yaagis.
ZEC 1:11 Enti barseneete mithaa garsan eqida Godaa kiitanchuwako, “Nuuni sa7a ubbaa yuuyidi wochida; sa7i wopu gidi saro de7ees” yaagidosona.
ZEC 1:12 Hessafe guye, Godaa kiitanchoy, “Abeeti Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaw, neeni hanqetin ha77i laapun tammu laythi kumis; yaatin, neeni Yerusalaamenne Yihuda katamata maaronna awude gakanaw gam7anee?” yaagis.
ZEC 1:13 Goday taara haasaya kiitanchawas lo77onne minthethiya qaalan zaaro immis.
ZEC 1:14 Taara haasaya kiitanchoy taako, “Ha qaala awaaja! Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, ‘Taani Yerusalaamesinne Xiyoones daro mishetayis.
ZEC 1:15 Nuuni saro de7oos gidi qopiya hara kawotethata bolla taani daro hanqetas. Taani ta asaa bolla guuthara hanqetas, shin enti aathidi ta deriya qohidosona.’
ZEC 1:16 Hessa gisho, taani Yerusalaameko maarotan simmana; ta keethay zaaridi yan keexetana; Yerusalaame katama bolla wadha wodoro yeggana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 1:17 Gujada haysada yaagada awaaja: “Ta katamata duretethay kumidi palahana; taani Goday Xiyoone zaara minthethana; Yerusalaame zaara doorana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 1:18 Taani qoncethan oyddu kaceta be7as.
ZEC 1:19 Taara haasaya kiitanchuwa, “Haysati aybee?” yaagada oychas. I zaaridi, “Ha kaceti Yihuda, Isra7eelenne Yerusalaame laallida kawotethata” yaagis.
ZEC 1:20 Hessafe guye, Goday tana birata qoxiya oyddu hiillanchota bessis.
ZEC 1:21 Taani, “Haysati ay oothanaw yidona?” yaagada oychas. I zaaridi, “Haysati oonika zaari denthona mela Yihuda biitta laallida kaceta kawushanawunne dhaysanaw yidosona. Enti Yihuda biitta laallanaw banta kaciya denthida hara kawotethata kaciya shocidi sa7an yegganaw yidosona” yaagis.
ZEC 2:1 Hara qoncethan ba kushen wadha wodoro oykida issi asi be7as.
ZEC 2:2 Taani, “Neeni aw bay?” yaagada oychas. I zaaridi, “Taani Yerusalaame dalgatethaynne adussatethay ay meleko wadhanaw bayis” yaagis.
ZEC 2:3 Hessafe guye, taara haasaya kiitanchoy keyidi bis; iyara gahetanaw hara kiitanchoy yis.
ZEC 2:4 Yida kiitanchoy, “Woxa bada, na7atetha addiyako, ‘Yerusalaamen daro asinne daro mehey daana gisho, katamaa yuushon gimbe dirsi koshshenna.
ZEC 2:5 Taani iya yuushuwan tama dirsi gidana; taani iyaw boncho gidana’ yaagees Goday.
ZEC 2:6 “Taani hintena biitta oyddu baggaa laallida gisho, yaape keyite; elle keyite; pudeha bagga biittafe baqatite” yaagees Goday.
ZEC 2:7 “Neno, Xiyoone keya; Babiloone macca nayta giddon de7iyare, enta giddofe baqata” yaagees Goday.
ZEC 2:8 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday iya bonchuwa qoncisana mela, ba asaa bonqida kawotethatako tana kiittidi, “Hintena bochiya uray iya ayfiya buluwa bochees.
ZEC 2:9 Taani ta kushiya enta bolla denthana; enta aylleti enta zaaridi bonqana. He wode hinte Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday tana kiittidaysa erana.”
ZEC 2:10 “Taani yada hinte giddon daana gisho, Xiyoone asaw, zamarite; ufaytite!” yaagees Goday.
ZEC 2:11 He wode daro kawotethati Godaara gahetidi iya ase gidana. I hinte giddon daana; Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday tana hinteko kiittidaysa he wode hinte erana.
ZEC 2:12 Geeshsha biittan Yihuda, bana gakida gisho oothidi laattana; Yerusalaame zaaridi doorana.
ZEC 2:13 Goday ba de7iya geeshsha bessan dendida gisho, asho ma77ida ubbay iya sinthan si77i go!
ZEC 3:1 Hessafe guye, kahine halaqay Iyyasuy Godaa kiitanchuwa sinthan eqidaysanne xalahey Iyyasu mootanaw iyape ushacha baggara eqidaysa tana qoncethan bessis.
ZEC 3:2 Goday, “Xalahiyaw, Goday nena seero; Yerusalaame doorida Goday nena seero! Ha addey tamape attida duncha mela gidennee?” yaagis.
ZEC 3:3 Iyyasuy qitatida ma7o ma77idi kiitanchuwa sinthan eqis.
ZEC 3:4 Kiitanchoy ba sinthan eqidaysata, “Iya bollafe ha qita ma7uwa qaarite” yaagis. Qassi Iyyasuko, “Heko, taani ne nagara neepe diggas; boncho ma7uwa nena mayzana.”
ZEC 3:5 Taani, “Geeshsha xaatha qaciya iya huuphen xaaxite” yaagis. Enti kiittidaysada oothidosona; ma7o mayzidosona. Godaa kiitanchoy he wode iya miyen eqis.
ZEC 3:6 Hessafe guye, Godaa kiitanchoy Iyyasuko,
ZEC 3:7 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees; “Neeni ta ogiyan hemetikonne ta kiita naagiko, neeni ta keethaa aysana; ta dabaaban aawatana. Qassi haysan eqidaysatara issife geliyanne keyiya maata new immana.
ZEC 3:8 Kahine halaqa Iyyasu, haysa si7a! Sinthara yaana lo77obaas malaata gididaysatinne neera ootheysati haysa si7o! Taani, ‘Tashe’ geetetiya ta aylliya ehana.
ZEC 3:9 Heko, taani Iyyasu sinthan shuchu wothana; he shucha bolla laapun ayfeti de7oosona. Taani he shuchaa woocada iya bolla xuufe xaafana; ha biitta nagara issi gallas diggana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 3:10 “He gallas hinte ubbay hinte woynenne hinte balase garsan uttidi hinte shooruwa xeegana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 4:1 Hessafe guye, taara haasaya kiitanchoy simmidi yidi, dhiskida asi barkiya mela tana barkisis.
ZEC 4:2 I taako, “Neeni ay be7ay?” yaagis. Taani zaarada, “Taani worqa xalaalape oosetida xompe wothiya kocaa be7ayis; iya xeeran zayte xaaroy de7ees. Qassi iya bolla laapun xompeti de7oosona; he laapun xompetas laapun laapun piiqeti de7oosona.
ZEC 4:3 He xompiya wothiya kocaa matan nam7u shamaho mithati de7oosona. Enti zayte xaaruwape ushacha baggaranne haddirsa baggara de7oosona” yaagas.
ZEC 4:4 Taara haasaya kiitanchuwa, “Ta godaw, haysi aybee?” yaagada oychas.
ZEC 4:5 Kiitanchoy zaaridi, “Haysati aybeko erikii?” yaagis. Taani zaarada, “Ta godaw, taani erike” yaagas.
ZEC 4:6 I taako, “Zarubaabelas Goday odida qaalay haysa; ‘Ta Ayyaananape attishin, wolqan woyko minotethan gidenna’ yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 4:7 Gita zumaw, neeni aybee? Neeni Zarubaabela sinthan lichi gida demba gidana. Zarubaabeli xoossa keethaa keexi polidi, wursetha shuchaa kessiya wode asay, ‘Hashshu! Hashshu poletis’ ” yaagana.
ZEC 4:8 Qassika Godaa qaalay taako haysada yaagidi yis.
ZEC 4:9 “Xoossaa keetha baasuwa Zarubaabela kusheti baasidosona; iya kusheti keexidi polana. Hessafe guye, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday tana hinteko kiittidaysa hinte erana.
ZEC 4:10 Ha guutha doomethaa kadhiya oonika guyepe ufaytana; enti Zarubaabela kushen tumbiya be7ana. Haysati laapun xompeti biitta ubbaa yuuyidi xeelliya Godaa ayfeta” yaagis.
ZEC 4:11 Taani kiitanchuwa zaarada, “Ha xompe wothiya kocaape ushacha baggaranne haddirsa baggara de7iya ha nam7u shamahoti aybee?” yaagada oychas.
ZEC 4:12 Gujadaka, “Zaytey entafe goggiya nam7u worqa piiqeta matan de7iya nam7u shamaho mitha tasheti aybee?” yaagada oychas.
ZEC 4:13 I zaaridi, “Haysati aybeko neeni erikii?” yaagis. Taani zaarada, “Ta godaw, taani erike” yaagas.
ZEC 4:14 I zaaridi, “Haysati sa7a ubbaa Godaas oothiya nam7u tiyetida asata” yaagis.
ZEC 5:1 Qassi taani dhoqu gada xeelliya wode bollara piradhiya issi xaatha maxaafa be7as.
ZEC 5:2 Kiitanchoy tana, “Neeni ay be7ay?” yaagidi oychis. Taani zaarada, “Taani bollara piradhiya issi xaatha maxaafa be7ayis; he maxaafa adussatethay laatamu wadha qassi gompay tammu wadha” yaagas.
ZEC 5:3 I taako, “Ha xaatha maxaafaa giddon biitta ubbaa bolla yaana baadethay xaafetis. He maxaafan issi baggara, ‘Kayso ubbay biittafe dhayana’; qassi hanko baggara, ‘Wordon caaqiya ubbay dhayana’ giya xuufey xaafetis.
ZEC 5:4 ‘Taani ha baadetha kiittana; he baadethay bidi, kaysuwa soonne ta sunthan wordo caaqeysa soo gelana. He keetha gelidi mithaanne shuchaa dhaysana’ ” yaages Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 5:5 Hessafe guye, taara haasaya kiitanchoy taako yidi, “Ane dhoqu gada, yaabay aybeko be7a” yaagis.
ZEC 5:6 Taani, “I aybee?” yaagada oychas. I zaaridi, “Haysi makiya daacho” yaagis. Qassi gujidi, “Haysi asay ha biitta ubban oothida naaquwa malaata” yaagis.
ZEC 5:7 Irsaase geetetiya biratape oosetida daachuwa kamaa denthiya wode issi maccasi daachuwan uttasu.
ZEC 5:8 Kiitanchoy, “Hanna iitatetha leemiso” yaagis. Iyo guye daachuwan yeggidi irsaase kamaa zaaridi kammis.
ZEC 5:9 Hessafe guye taani dhoqu gada xeelliya wode enta qefiyan carkoy de7iya, piradhiya nam7u maccasata be7as. Enta qefey gollo qefe mela mino; enti daachuwa sa7ape dinthidi ekidi piradhidosona.
ZEC 5:10 Taani kiitanchuwako, “Haysati daachuwa awu efoona?” yaagada oychas.
ZEC 5:11 I zaaridi, “Enti iyaw keethe keexanaw Sana7oora biitta efoosona. Keethay keexeti simmiko enti he daachuwa iyaw giigida bessan wothana” yaagis.
ZEC 6:1 Qassi taani dhoqu gada xeelliya wode oyddu para gaareti nam7u naase birata deretape giddora yeyisata be7as.
ZEC 6:2 Koyro gaariya zo7o parati goochosona; nam7antho gaariya kareetha parati goochosona.
ZEC 6:3 Heedzantho gaariya bootha parati goochosona; oyddantho gaariya wanco parati goochosona.
ZEC 6:4 Taani kiitanchuwako, “Ta godaw, haysati aybee?” yaagada oychas.
ZEC 6:5 Kiitanchoy zaaridi, “Haysati biitta ubbaa Godaa sinthan eqidi oothiya oyddu salo carkota.
ZEC 6:6 Kareetha parati goochiya gaarey pudeha bagga biitta bees; bootha parati goochiya gaarey wuloha bagga bees; wanco parati goochiya gaarey dugeha bagga bees” yaagis.
ZEC 6:7 He parati biitta wochanaw keyida wode gede haa pachiparoosona. Kiitanchoy entako, “Bidi biitta ubbaa yuuyidi wochite” yaagis. Enti bidi biitta ubbaa yuuyidi wochidosona.
ZEC 6:8 Hessafe guye, kiitanchoy ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Heko, pudeha bagga biitta bida parati ta Ayyaana he biittan shempisidosona” yaagis.
ZEC 6:9 Godaa qaalay taako haysada yaagishe yis:
ZEC 6:10 “Babiloone di7etethaafe simmida Heldayi, Xoobeynne Yadayi immiya biranne worqa imota ekada he gallas Sofoniyaasa na7aa Iyosyaasa soo ba.
ZEC 6:11 Entafe ekida birapenne worqafe kallacha medhada Iyosadeqa na7aa, kahine halaqaa Iyyasu huuphen wotha.
ZEC 6:12 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees gada iyaw oda: heko, tashey ba bessan daaya gishonne I xoossa keetha keexiya gisho, iya sunthay ‘Tashe geetetida addey haysa.
ZEC 6:13 Godaa keetha keexanay iya; I kawotetha ma7uwa ma77idi, araatan uttidi haarana. Qassi iya araata matan issi kahiney eqana; enta nam7aa giddon issifetethi daana.’
ZEC 6:14 He kallachay Heldaya, Xoobbiya, Yadayanne Sofoniyaasa na7aa Iyosyaasa qofiso gididi, Godaa xoossa keethan daana” yaagis.
ZEC 6:15 He wode haaho bessan de7iya asati Godaa keetha keexidi maaddanaw yaana. Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday tana hinteko kiittidaysa hinte hessan erana. Godaas, hinte Xoossaas hinte polo kiitetiko hessi hanana.
ZEC 7:1 Daariyosi kawotida oyddantho laythan, Kisiila geetetiya uddufuntho ageenan, oyddantho gallasan, Zakariyasako yida Godaa qaalay haysa.
ZEC 7:2 Beetele katamaa asay Sarezeera, Regem-Melekanne entara issife de7iya asata Godaa anjoy yaana mela woossanaw kiittidosona.
ZEC 7:3 Qassi Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa keethan oothiya kahinetanne nabeta, “Daro laythi oothishe gam7idaysada nuuni ha77ika ichashantho ageenan yeekanawunne xoomanaw bessii?” yaagidi oychana mela kiittidosona.
ZEC 7:4 Hessafe guye, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa qaalay haysada yaagidi taako yis:
ZEC 7:5 “Biittan de7iya asa ubbaasinne kahinetas haysada yaagada oda: ‘Hinte ha aadhida laapun tammu laythan ichashantho ageenaninne laapuntha ageenan xoomidaynne yeekiday tana bonchanaasee?
ZEC 7:6 Hinte miya wodenne uyaa wode hintew meetanne uyeeta.
ZEC 7:7 Yerusalaame katamaynne iya yuushuwan de7iya katamatan de7iya asay shemponinne injen de7ida wodenne Negebaninne gadhan asay wopu gidi de7ida wode Goday ba nabeta baggara odida qaalay haysa gidennee?’ yaaga” yaagis.
ZEC 7:8 Godaa qaalay Zakariyasako haysada yaagidi yis:
ZEC 7:9 “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday kase immida kiitay, ‘Suure pirdaa pirdite; hinte issoy issuwas keehatethinne maarotethi oothite.
ZEC 7:10 Am7eta, yi7ota, bete asaanne manqota naaqofite. Qassi hintefe oonika ba ishaa bolla iitabaa oothanaw ba wozanan qopofo.’
ZEC 7:11 “Shin enti si7onna ixidosona; zoko zaaridi banta haythaa tuccidosona.
ZEC 7:12 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday ba Ayyaanan kase ba nabeta baggara kiitida higgiyanne qaala si7onna ixidi banta wozanaa zaallada minthidosona. Hessa gisho, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa matape gita hanqoy enta bolla yis.
ZEC 7:13 Taani xeegiya wode enti si7onna ixidaysada enti xeegiya wode taani si7ike” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 7:14 “Taani gote ehada enti eronna kawotethata giddon laallas. Biittay asi yaanne haanne simeretonna kaysa biitta gidis; ha lo77o biittay baysa gidis” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 8:1 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa qaalay qassika taako haysada yaagidi yis:
ZEC 8:2 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, “Taani Xiyoones daro qadhetayis; I mishay tana xuuggees.
ZEC 8:3 Taani Xiyoone simmada Yerusalaamen daana. Qassi Yerusalaamey ammanthiya katama geetetada eretana. Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa zumay Geeshsha Zuma geetetidi xeegetana” yaagees.
ZEC 8:4 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, “Cimidi guufera biya addeynne maccasay kaseysada Yerusalaame dabaaban uttana.
ZEC 8:5 Yerusalaame katamaa ogeti kaa7iya addenne macca naytan kumana” yaagees.
ZEC 8:6 “Attida asaas hessi malaalsiyaba gidikoka, tana hessi malaalsiyabayee? yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 8:7 Heko taani ta asaa dolohapenne wulohape shiishana.
ZEC 8:8 Enti Yerusalaamen daana mela oothana. Enti ta ase gidana; taani xillonne ammanthiya enta Xoossaa gidana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 8:9 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees: “Hinteno, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa keethaa baasoy yegetida gallasaape doomidi nabeti odida qaala si7idaysato, hinte kushiya minthite; oosuwa minnidi polite.
ZEC 8:10 He wodiyape kase asaas damoozey, mehiyas qanxetiya keri baawa. Taani asa ubbaa issuwa issuwa bolla morketethan denthida gisho, geleysasinne keyeysas saroy baawa.
ZEC 8:11 Shin ha77i taani ha attida asaa bolla kase oothidaysada oothike” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 8:12 “Entii zerida ubbay dolana; woyney ba ayfiya immana; goshshay kathan kumana; saloti banta ira immana. Haysa ubba attida asaas laata oothada immana.
ZEC 8:13 Hinteno, Yihuda asaw, Isra7eele asaw, kawotethata giddon hinte baadetidaysata gidideta, shin ha77i taani hintena ashshana; hinte anjetidaysata gidana. Yayyofite! hinte kushiya minthite!” yaagees.
ZEC 8:14 “Hinte mayzati tana yiloyida wode enta qadhey bayna seeranaw qofa qachas.
ZEC 8:15 Ha77i taani Yerusalaamesinne Yihudas lo77oba oothanaw qofa qachas. Hiza yayyofite!
ZEC 8:16 Hinte oothanaw koshshiyabay haysa: issoy issuwara tumaa odetite; pirda dabaaban tumaanne saruwa ehiya pirda pirdite.
ZEC 8:17 Issoy issuwa qohanaw iitabaa hinte wozanan maqetofite; wordon caaqofite. Hayisata ubbaa taani ixayis” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 8:18 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa qaalay qassika taako haysada yaagidi yis:
ZEC 8:19 “Oyddantho, ichashantho, laapunthonne tammantho ageenan hinte xoomida xoomay Yihuda asaas ufaysinne inje wode gidana. Hessa gisho, hinte tumatethinne sarotethi dosite” yaagees.
ZEC 8:20 “Daro asaynne daro katamatan de7iya asay Yerusalaame yaana.
ZEC 8:21 Issi kataman de7iya asay hara kataman de7iya asaako bidi, ‘Godaa anjoy yaana mela woossanawunne Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa koyanaw ane boos; taanika bayis’ yaagana.
ZEC 8:22 Qassi daro asaynne wolqaama kawotethati Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa koyanawunne woossanaw Yerusalaame yaana.
ZEC 8:23 He gallasatan dumma dumma qaalan haasaya kawotethata ubbaafe tammu asati yidi, issi Ayhude addiya ma7uwa macaraa oykidi, ‘Xoossay hintera de7eysa nuuni si7ida gisho, nuuni hintera baana’ yaagana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 9:1 Asaa ayfeynne Isra7eele asa ubbaa ayfey Godaa xeelliya gisho, Sadraaka biittaynne Damasqo katamay dhayanaysa, Goday odida pirda qaalay haysa.
ZEC 9:2 Qassi ha pirday Hadraaka zawa gidida Hamaata katamaanne qara gidida Xiroosanne Sidoona katamata bolla ha pirday gakana.
ZEC 9:3 Xiroosa katamay baw mino miixa gimbis. Qassi biraanne worqaa biittada dooris.
ZEC 9:4 Shin I shiishidaba ubbaa Goday ekana; iya shaluwa abban holana; katamay taman meetetana.
ZEC 9:5 Asqaloona katamay hessa be7idi yayyana; Gaaza katamay un7etana; Eqroona katamay ufaysi dhayana. Gaaza kawoy dhayana; Asqaloona katamay kaysa gidana.
ZEC 9:6 Ashdooda kataman walaha asay daana. Goday haysada yaagees: “Filisxeemeta otoruwa taani wursana.
ZEC 9:7 Taani enta doonape suuthi, enta achaafe tunaba diggana. Entafe attidaysati nu Xoossaa asi gidana; qassi Yihuda yaraape issuwa gidana. Eqroona asay Yaabuse asaada ta ase gidana.
ZEC 9:8 Hessafe guye, olanchoti oykonnaada, taani ta keethaa naagana. Taani ta huuphen naagiya gisho, zaaridi oonika ta asaa un7ethenna” yaagees.
ZEC 9:9 Neno, Xiyoone katame, ufayta! Neno, Yerusalaame katame, ilila! Heko, xoonida ne xillo kawoy neeko yees. Ne kawoy ashke gididi, hare bolla, aadhidi hare mara bolla uttidi neeko yees.
ZEC 9:10 Taani para gaareta Isra7eelepe, ola parata Yerusalaamepe dhaysana; ola dongiya mentherethana. Ne kawoy kawotethatas saro awaajana; I abbas gaxape hini gaxa gakanaw Efraxiisa shaafape doomidi sa7aa gaxaa gakanaw haarana.
ZEC 9:11 Taani neera suutha caaquwa gisho, qashetida ne asata haathi bayna ollaafe kessana.
ZEC 9:12 Hinteno, sinthan ufaysi de7iya qasho asato, hinte miixaa simmite. Kaseysa gisho dako shalo hintew immanaysa hachi taani hintew awaajayis.
ZEC 9:13 Taani Yihuda dongeda, Isra7eele donge toorada go7etana. Xiyoone, taani ne nayta Girike nayta bolla denthana; nena wolqaama olanchuwa mashshaa mela oothana.
ZEC 9:14 He wode Goday enta bolla qoncana; iya donge tooray wol7antha wol7amana. Ubbaa Haariya Goday moyze punnana; dugeha bagga goteda dendana.
ZEC 9:15 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday enta gisho oletana. Enti banta morketa wursana; yambarshan oleyisata yedhana. Enti banta morketa suuthaa woyne ushsha uyana; suuthi keren kumiyada kumana; enti yarsho bessan gukiya suuthada gukana.
ZEC 9:16 He gallas henthanchoy ba dorsata ashsheysada Goday enta Xoossay enta ashshana. Kallacha bolla de7iya alleeqoda enti Godaa biittan phoolana.
ZEC 9:17 Enti waanidi lo77onne puulancho gidandesha! Na7atetha nayta kathay, geela7o nayta woyne ushshay aacisana.
ZEC 10:1 Balgoy gakiya wode Goday ira immana mela woossite. Goday ira tookida shaara kiittees; asaas ira immees; goshshan atakilte dolisis.
ZEC 10:2 Eeqati hadaba odoosona; maroti wordo qoncethi be7oosona; amuheysati wordo amuho odoosona; hada minthetho minthethoosona. Hessa gisho, asay dhayida dorsada toylatoosona; enta heemmiya asi bayna gisho, enti qohetidosona.
ZEC 10:3 Goday haysada yaagees: “Ta hanqoy henthanchota bolla eexi keyis; he kaaletheyisata taani seerana. Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday ba wudiya Yihuda heemmees. I enta olas giigida wolqaama para mela oothana.
ZEC 10:4 Yihuda asaa giddofe quste shuchaa mela, dunkaane dhishe melanne ola toora mela hanida kaaletheysati keyana.
ZEC 10:5 Banta morketa ogiya urqada yedhiya mino olanchota mela gidana. Goday entara de7iya gisho, enti oletidi xoonana.
ZEC 10:6 “Taani Yihuda asaa minthethana; Yoosefa asaa ashshana. Taani entaw qadhetiya gisho, enta zaarada ehana. Enti taani kaseka enta yeggaboonna asa mela gidana. Taani Godaa enta Xoossaa gidiya gisho, enta woosa si7ana.
ZEC 10:7 Isra7eele asay mino olancho mela gidana; woyne uyida asada enta wozanay ufaytana. Enta nayti hessa be7idi, hashshu gaana; enta wozanay Godan ufaytana.
ZEC 10:8 “Taani ta asaa suyqada xeegana; enta issife shiishana. Taani enta wozana; enti kaseysada darana.
ZEC 10:9 Taani enta kawotethata giddon laallikoka enti banta de7iya haaho biittan gididi tana hassayana. Qassi entinne enta nayti de7on daananne banta biitta simmana.
ZEC 10:10 “Taani enta Gibxe biittafe zaarana; Asoore biittafe enta shiishana. Entaw uttiya bessi dhayana gakanaw taani enta Galada biittaninne Libaanose biittan kunthana.
ZEC 10:11 Enti meto abba giddora aadhiya wode taani Goday abba seerana. Ciimmo gidida Nayle shaafay melana. Asoore biitta otoroy kawuyana; Gibxe kawotetha xam7ay meqana.
ZEC 10:12 Taani, enta Goday enta minthana; enti iya sunthan hemetana. taani Goday haysa odayis” yaagees.
ZEC 11:1 Neno, Libaanose, tami ne zigata maana mela, ne pengeta dooya!
ZEC 11:2 Neno xiiddaw, zigay kundida gisho, boncho mithati dhayida gisho, yii gada yeeka! Hinteno Baasane wolato, he siketida woray man7etida gisho, yii gidi yeekite.
ZEC 11:3 Enta lo77o hentha bessay dhayida gisho, Henthanchota zelelsa si7ite; Yordaanose woray dhayida gisho, Gaammoti gudeysa si7ite.
ZEC 11:4 Goday ta Xoossay taako haysada yaagis: “Shukettanaw de7iya dorsa wudiya heemma.
ZEC 11:5 Enta shammeysati shukoosona; shin seerettokona. Bayzeysati, ‘Nuuni duretida; Goday galatetto’ yaagosona; hari attoshin, enta henthanchoti entaw qadhetokona” yaagis.
ZEC 11:6 Goday haysada yaagees: “Taani hizape guye ha biittan de7iya asaas qadhetike. Taani issi issi ase iya shooruwasinne iya kawas aathada immana. Enti biitta dhaysana; taani issi asika enta kushiyape ashshike” yaagees.
ZEC 11:7 Hessa gisho, taani shukettanaw de7iya dorsata, aathada qassi wudiya giddon un7etidaysata heemmeysa gidas. Yaatada dorsata heemmanaw nam7u xam7ata ekada, issuwa “Dosetidaysa” gada xeegas; nam7anthuwa “Issifetethi” gada xeegas.
ZEC 11:8 Taani issi ageenan heedzu henthanchota dhaysas. Enta hanotethay taw danda7etenna; entika tana ixidosona.
ZEC 11:9 Yaata simmada ta dorsatako, “Taani hintena nam7antho heemmike; hayqeysi hayqo; dhayeysi dhayo; attidaysati issoy issuwa mo” yaagas.
ZEC 11:10 Hessafe guye, taani “Dosetidaysa” geetetiya xam7a ekada menthas. Hessa ta oothiday kawotethatara gelida caaqoy duuxidaysa bessanaasa.
ZEC 11:11 He gallas caaqoy me77is; he wode dorse shammeysatinne bayzaysati tana be7idi, hessi Godaa qaala gideysa eridosona.
ZEC 11:12 Taani, “Hinte dosiko ta damooziya immite; ixas giiko aggaagite” yaagas. Yaatin enti taw hastamu bira santime immidosona.
ZEC 11:13 Goday taako, “Enti immida boncho miishiya efada xoossa keethan de7iya otuwan yegga” yaagis. Taani he miishiya efada xoossa keethan de7iya otuwan yeggas.
ZEC 11:14 Hessafe guye, taani Yihudasinne Isra7eeles giddon de7iya ishatethay dhayidaysa bessanaw “Issifetethi” geetetiya ta nam7antho xam7aa menthas.
ZEC 11:15 Qassika Goday tana, “Nam7antho bada pathonna henthanchota miishiya eka.
ZEC 11:16 Taani ha biittan issi henthancho denthana. I qohetida dorsata maaddenna; laaletida dorsata shiishenna; meqida dorsata koolenna; paxa de7eyisata heemmenna. Shin I hessa aggidi, modhota shukidi mees; enta koliziya dhoggees.
ZEC 11:17 Dorsa wudiya yeggi dhayida he pathonna henthanchota ayye! Iya qesiyanne iya ushacha ayfiya bolla mashshi wodho. Iya ushacha kushey silo; iya ushacha ayfey qooqo” yaagis.
ZEC 12:1 Salota micciday, sa7aa medhiday, asas de7o ayyaana immida Goday Isra7eeleba odida Godaa qaalay haysa:
ZEC 12:2 “Heko, taani Yerusalaame katamaa, iya yuushuwan de7iya asa ubbay uyin gandigarsiya woyne ushshi tigiya wanca oothana. Yerusalaamey oyketiya wode Yihuda katamati oyketana.
ZEC 12:3 He wode taani Yerusalaame katamaa asa ubbaas deexo shuchu oothana; iya denthiya ubbay baw deshetana. Sa7aa kawotethati ubbay iya olanaw issife shiiqana.
ZEC 12:4 He wode taani para ubbaa daganthana; para asata gooshshana.” Taani Goday haysa odayis. Yihuda asaa taani ta keeha ayfen xeellana; shin morketa parata ubbaa qooqisana.
ZEC 12:5 He wode Yihuda halaqati banta wozanan, “Yerusalaame asay Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godan, banta Xoossan, minotethaa demmidosona” yaagana.
ZEC 12:6 “He wode taani Yihuda kochata mitha dooriya giddon de7iya xiifanne mirqeeta giddon laxiya xompe oothana. Enti banta ushachan, banta haddirsaninne banta yuushuwan de7iya asa ubbaa maana; shin Yerusalaame katamay, asay saro de7iya bessi gidana.
ZEC 12:7 “Dawita kochata bonchoynne Yerusalaamen de7eyisata bonchoy Yihuda asaa bonchuwafe aadhona mela taani Goday kasetada Yihuda asaas xoono immana.
ZEC 12:8 He wode enta giddon daro laafa geetetiya asi Dawita mela mino gidana. Taani Goday Yerusalaamen de7eysatas gondalle gidana. Dawita kochati Xoossa mela, Godaa kiitancho mela gididi enta kaalethana.
ZEC 12:9 He wode taani Yerusalaame olanaw dendiya kawotethata ubbaa dhaysanaw dendana.
ZEC 12:10 “He wode taani Dawita kochata bollanne Yerusalaamen de7iya asaa bolla qadhenne woosa ayyaana gussana. Hessa gisho, enti banta caddidaysa be7iya wode asi ba issi na7as yeekeysada yeekana. Qassi ba bayra na7as kayoteysada kayotana.
ZEC 12:11 He wode Yerusalaamen yeeketiya yeehoy Magido denban Hadaad-Rimoonas yeeketida yeehuwa mela wolqaama gidana.
ZEC 12:12 Biittan de7iya issi issi kochay baw baw yeekana; Dawita kochati banta machetara, Naatana kochati banta machetara bantaw,
ZEC 12:13 Leewe kochati banta machetara bantaw, Same7a kochati banta machetara bantaw, yeekana.
ZEC 12:14 Attida kocha ubbay baw baw yeekana; enta macheti bantaw bantaw yeekana” yaagees.
ZEC 13:1 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees: “He wode Dawita kochatanne Yerusalaamen de7eyisata nagarapenne tunatethafe geeshshiya pultoy dhuuqana.
ZEC 13:2 He wode taani enti nam7antho qofetonna mela eeqata sunthaa biittafe dhaysana. Qassi nabetanne tuna ayyaanata biittafe dhaysana. Taani Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysa odayis.
ZEC 13:3 Qassi oonika, taani nabe giiko, iya aawanne aayiya iya, ‘Neeni Godaa sunthan wordo odiya gisho, hayqanaw bessees’ yaagana. I tinbite odiya wode iya aawaynne aayiya iya caddidi wodhana.
ZEC 13:4 He wode taani nabe giya oonika ba be7ida qoncethan yeellatana. Qassi ase cimmanaw ikisey de7iya ma7o ma77enna.
