ZEC 13:5 Shin I, ‘Taani nabe gidike; na7atethafe doomada biitta oothiya asi’ yaagana.
ZEC 13:6 Issi asi, ‘Yaatin, ha ne bolla de7iya madunthay aybee?’ yaagidi oychiko, i, ‘Haysi taani ta laggeta son madunxidaysa’ yaagana” yaagees.
ZEC 13:7 “Mashshaw denda, taw mata gidida ta dorsata henthanchuwa bolla barka! Dorsati laaletana mela henthanchuwa wodha. Taani guutha dorsata bolla ta kushiya denthana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
ZEC 13:8 “Biitta ubban de7iya heedzu kushe asaape nam7u kushey shocetidi hayqin, issi kushe xalaali attana. Taani Goday haysa odayis.
ZEC 13:9 Ha attida siko asaa taani taman yeggana; biri taman geeyada enta geeshshana; worqey paacetiyada paacana. Hessafe guye, enti ta sunthan woossana; taani enta si7ana. Taani enta, ‘Ta ase’ gaana; enti, Goday, ‘Nu Xoosse’ yaagana” yaagees.
ZEC 14:1 Heko, Godaa pirda gallasay yees; he wode hinte xeellishin, hintefe bonqidaba hinte sinthan shaaketana.
ZEC 14:2 Kawotethata ubbaa Goday Yerusalaame bolla olas shiishana. Katamay oyketana; keethay bonqetana; macca asaa wolqan iissana. Katamaa asaape baggay di7etidi baana; shin attida asay katamaape keyenna.
ZEC 14:3 Hessafe guye, Goday keyidi, kase ola gallas oleteysada kawotethata olana.
ZEC 14:4 He gallas iya tohoti Yerusalaamepe doloha baggara de7iya Shamaho zuma bolla eqana. Shamaho Derey dolohape wuloha gakanaw nam7u keyidi phalqetin, daro gita zangaaray medhetana. Zumaape baggay pudeha bagga, qassi baggay dugeha bagga sher7i gaana.
ZEC 14:5 He zangaaray bidi Axeela gakana; hinte he zangaarara baqati aadhidi attana. Beni Yihuda kawa Ooziyaane laythi biittay qaaxin, hinte mayzati baqatidi attidaysada hinte baqatana. Hessafe guye, Goday ta Xoossay ba geeshshata ubbaara issife yaana.
ZEC 14:6 He wode meegoy, shachinne dhumi deenna.
ZEC 14:7 He wode qamminne gallasi baawa, Goday xalaali eriya dumma gallas gidana; he gallas qammay poo7o gidana.
ZEC 14:8 He wode de7o haathay Yerusalaamepe goggana; iyape baggay Maxine Abban gelana; qassi baggay Medetiraane Abban gelana. He haathay balgonne bone goggishe daana.
ZEC 14:9 Goday biitta ubbaa bolla kawotana; he wode issi Godaa xalaali daana; iya sunthaa xalaala xeegana.
ZEC 14:10 Gib7ape doomidi Yerusalaame dugeha baggara aadhidi Irmoona katamaa gakanaw de7iya biitta ubbay dembatana. Shin Yerusalaamey Biniyaame Pengiyafe bidi, beni pengiya ginara Zooze Pengiya gakanaw, qassi Hanan7eela Adussa Gimbiyafe bidi, kawo woyne gum7iya bessaa gakanaw ba bessan dhoqu gidi daana.
ZEC 14:11 Yerusalaamey asi de7iya bessi gidana; hizape guye dhayenna; iyan de7iya asay hirgi bayna saro daana.
ZEC 14:12 Goday Yerusalaame olanaw dendida asa ubbaa bolla gado ehana. Enti eqon de7ishin, enta ashoy wooqana; enta ayfey ba ollan, enta inxarsay ba kottonuwan wooqana.
ZEC 14:13 He wode Goday enta wolqaama dagama daganthana. Asa ubbay issoy issuwa kushiya oykidi oletana.
ZEC 14:14 Yihuda asay Yerusalaame bagga gididi oletana. Yuushuwan de7iya kawotethata, tayboy bayna shaluwa, worqaa, biraanne ma7uwa di77idi shiishana.
ZEC 14:15 Ha gaduwa daaniya gadoy parata bolla, baqulota bolla, gimaleta bolla, hareta bollanne morketi dunkaanida bessan de7iya mehe ubbaa bolla yaana.
ZEC 14:16 Hessafe guye, Yerusalaame olida kawotethatape attida ubbay Kawa, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa goyinnanawunne Shaqara Ba7aale bonchanaw laythan laythan Yerusalaame baana.
ZEC 14:17 Sa7an de7iya asaape oonika Kawa, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa goyinnanaw Yerusalaame boonna ixiko, entaw iri bukenna.
ZEC 14:18 Gibxe asay bidi goyinnona ixiko, Shaqara Ba7aale bonchanaw boonna ixida asaa bolla gakida gadoy enta bolla yaana.
ZEC 14:19 Shaqara Ba7aale bonchanaw boonna ixida Gibxeynne hara kawotethati ubbay seeretana seeray haysa.
ZEC 14:20 He wode parata qoodhen de7iya shaashshotiya bolla, “Godaas Geeyidaysa” geetetiya malla xuufey xaafetana. Xoossa keethan de7iya kathiya otoy yarsho bessa matan de7iya saaniya mela geeshshi gidana.
ZEC 14:21 Yerusalaameninne Yihudan de7iya oto ubbay Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaas geeshshi gidana. Yarsho yarshiya asa ubbay he otota ekidi, yarsho ashuwa entan kathana. He wode Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa keethan ay zal7anchoy deenna.
MAL 1:1 Goday Milkiyaasa baggara Isra7eele asaas odida tinbite qaalay haysa.
MAL 1:2 Goday ba asaako, “Ta hintena dosas” yaagees. Shin hinte, “Ne nuna aybin dosadii?” yaageeta. Goday zaaridi, “Eesawey Yayqooba isha gidenneyee? Shin taani Yayqooba dosas;
MAL 1:3 Eesawe ixas. Taani derey dariya Eesawe biitta baysa oothas; iya laata workanati gupiya mela biitta oothas” yaagees.
MAL 1:4 Eesawe koche gidida Edoome asay, “Nu katamati laaletikoka, nu enta zaaridi keexana” yaagikoka, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday, “Enti zaaridi keexana, shin taani laallana. Asay enta, ‘Ha biittay iita biitta; ha asayka Goday merinaw hanqetida ase’ yaagana” yaagees.
MAL 1:5 Hessa hinte, hinte ayfen be7idi, “Heko, Goday Isra7eele biittafe karenka wolqaama” yaagana.
MAL 1:6 Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday haysada yaagees: “Hinteno, ta sunthaa kawushiya kahineto, na7i ba aawa, aylley ba godaa bonchees. Yaatin, taani hintew aawa gidiko, hinte tana bonchiya bonchoy awunee? Taani hintew godaa gidiko, hinte taw yayiya yashay awunee? Hinte ta sunthaa kawushshideta. Hinte zaaridi, ‘Nuuni ne sunthaa waatidi kawushshido?’ yaageeta.
MAL 1:7 “Hinte ta yarsho bessan tuna kathi wotheta. Qassi, ‘Nuuni nena waatidi tunisido?’ yaageeta. Hinte, ‘Godaa yarsho bessay kadhetidaba’ yaagidi tana tunisideta.
MAL 1:8 Hinte qooqe mehe yarshiya wode hessi qoho gidenneyee? Hinte hargancho woyko wobe mehe yarshiya wode hessi qoho gidenneyee? Hinte hessa mela mehe hinte halaqaas immiyako, I hessa ekanabaanne iyan ufaytanaaba hintew daanii? yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 1:9 “Ha77i Xoossay hintew qadhetana mela iya woossite. Wona hinte hessa mela imota iyaw immin, I hintena maaddanee?” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 1:10 “Hinte ta yarsho bessan hada tama eethonna mela xoossa keetha pengiya gordiya issi asi bentida gidereneshin! Ta hintenan ufaytike; hinte immiya imotaka ekike” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 1:11 “Awi doliyasope wulliyaso gakanaw ta sunthay kawotethata giddon wolqaama. Ubba bessan ta sunthaas ixaane cuyisananne geeshsha yarsho yarshana; ta sunthay kawotethata giddon wolqaama” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 1:12 “Shin hinte, ‘Godaa yarsho bessay tuna; iyan yarshetiya kathika kadhetidaba’ yaagidi iya kawushshideta.
MAL 1:13 Qassi hinte, ‘Haysi coo daabursi’ yaagidi, qidhidi cuttideta. “Hinte bonqidi ehidaba woyko wobe woyko hargancho mehe yarsheeta; yaatin, taani hessa hinte kushepe ekanaw bessii?
MAL 1:14 Taani gita kawo; ta sunthayka kawotethata giddon bonchetidaysa gidiya gisho, Xoossas immana gidi doorida marazey iya mehiya giddon de7ishin, iya aggidi, boretida maraze yarsho shiishiya asinne cimmiya asi baadetidaba gido” yaagees Goday.
MAL 2:1 “Ha77ika kahineto, ha kiitay imetiday hintesa.
MAL 2:2 Hinte si7onna ixiko; ta sunthaa bonchanaw hinte wozanan ta qaala wothonna ixiko, ta hinte bolla baadethi yeddana; hinte anjuwa taani baadethan laammana. Hinte hinte wozana tana bonchanaw giigisiboonna gisho, ta hintena baaddas” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 2:3 “Taani hinte kochaa seerana; hinte yarsho mehe osha hinte som7on laallana; hinteka iyara issife holetana.
MAL 2:4 He wode ta Leewera caaqida caaqoy, minnidi daana mela ha kiita kiitiday tana gideysa hinte erana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 2:5 “Ta iyara caaqida caaqoy de7onne sarotetha caaqo; I taw yayyana mela de7onne sarotetha iyaw immas; ika taw yayyis, ta sunthaa bonchida mela de7is.
MAL 2:6 Tuma timirtey iya doonan de7is; iya inxarsanka wordoy bentibeenna. I taara sarotethaninne suuretethan hemetis; qassi darota nagarape zaaris.
MAL 2:7 Kahiney, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday kiitidaysa gidiya gisho, iya mettershay eratethi naaganaw koshshees; asay eratethi iya doonape tamaaranaw bessees” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 2:8 “Shin hinte ta ogiyape gaxa keydeta; hinte timirtiyan darota dhubideta; taani Leewera caaqida caaquwa menthideta.
MAL 2:9 Hessa gisho, hinte ta ogiyan boonna ixidi, hinte timirtiyan asaa giddon shaahetethi medhiya gisho, ta hintena asa ubbaa sinthan kadhetanaadanne kawuyanaada oothas” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 2:10 Nu ubbaas issi aawi de7ees gidennee? Nuna issi Xoossay medhibeneyee? Yaatin, nu issoy issuwas ammanetona ixidi, nu mayzata caaquwa ayis menthanee?
MAL 2:11 Yihudi cimmis; Isra7eeleninne Yerusalaamen tunabay oosetis; Yihudi allaga xoossa macca nayta ekidi, Goday dosiya xoossa keetha tunisis.
MAL 2:12 Hessa tamaarseynne kaalliya oonika, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaas yarsho ehiyakoka, Goday iya Yayqooba dunkaaniyape dhayso.
MAL 2:13 Qassi hinte oothiya harabay aybe giiko, Goday hinte yarshuwako xeellonna gisho woyko ufaysan ekonna gisho yarsho bessa afuthan, yeehoninne azzanon kuntheeta.
MAL 2:14 Hinte, “I nu yarshuwa ayis ekennee?” yaagidi oycheeta. Hessi haniday, hinte, hinte na7atetha machera caaqida caaquwa menthida gishonne cimmida gishosa; iya ne miyenne ne caaqo macho gidiya gisho Goday marka.
MAL 2:15 Goday hintewunne hinte machetas issi asatethinne issi ayyaani daana mela oothibeennee? Hessa ayis oothidee? Xoossa yayiya koche daana mela koyda gishosa. Hessa gisho, hinte ayyaana naagite; hinte na7atetha macheta cimmofite.
MAL 2:16 “Taani Goday, Isra7eele Xoossay, azini ba machiw yeddanaysa ixayis; ba ma7uwa iita ooson kammiya oonaka ta ixayis. Hessa gisho, hinte ayyaana naagite; hinte na7atetha macheta cimmofite” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 2:17 Hinte, hinte odan Godaa salethideta. Hinte zaaridi, “Nuuni iya waatidi salethido?” yaageeta. Hinte iya salethiday, “Iita oothiya ubbay Godaa sinthan lo77o; ika entan ufaytees” yaagusaana; woyko, “Xillo pirdiya Xoossay awun de7ii?” yaagusaana.
MAL 3:1 “Heko, ta sinthan oge giigisana mela ta kiitanchuwa kasetada kiittana. Hinte koya Goday qoponna de7ishin ba keetha yaana. Hinte ufaysan naagiya, caaqo kiitanchoy yaana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 3:2 Shin I bira seerisidi geeshshiya tama melanne ma7uwa meeciya saamuna mela gidiya gisho, I yaa gallasan danda7i eqanay oonee? Qassi I qonciya wode iya sinthan eqanaw danda7ey oonee?
MAL 3:3 I bira sheeshiyanne geeshshiya asada uttana. I Leewe kochata biradanne worqada geeshshana. He wode enti Godaas xillotethan yarsho yarshana.
MAL 3:4 He wode Yihudanne Yerusalaame yarshoy beni wodetanne aadhida laythada Godaa ufaysiyaba gidana.
MAL 3:5 “Hessafe guye, pirdas taani hinteko yada, bitanchota, laammeyisata, wordon caaqeyisata, oosanchota damooze diggeyisata, am7etanne yi7ota un7etheyisata, betanchotas pirda diggeysatanne taw yayyonnayisata bolla eeson markatana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 3:6 “Taani Goday laametike; hessa gisho, hinteno Yayqooba kochato, hinte dhaybeketa.
MAL 3:7 Hinte mayzata wodepe doomidi, ta wogape kare keydeta; iya naagibeketa. Ha77i taako simmite; taanika hinteko simmana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday. Shin hinte, “Nuuni ay ogen simmino?” yaagidi oycheeta.
MAL 3:8 “Asi Xoosse kaysotii? Shin hinte tana kaysotideta.” Qassika hinte, “Nuuni nena waatidi kaysotido? yaageeta. “Hinte asraataninne imotan tana kaysideta.
MAL 3:9 Isra7eele asa ubbay tana kaysotida gisho, hinte baadetidaysata.
MAL 3:10 Ta keethan kathi daana mela asraata ubba shaalen yeggite. Yaatidi, taani salo maskootiya dooyada anjo hintew palahisada immonna ixiko hessan tana paacite” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 3:11 “Kathi moonna mela taani hinte gisho, gonduwa seerana; gaden de7iya woyne ayfeyka qoqofetenna.
MAL 3:12 Hinte biittay daanaw injetiya biitta gidiya gisho, kawotethati ubbay hintena anjetidaysata yaagana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 3:13 Goday haysada yaagees: “Hinte ta bolla mino qaala odetideta. Yaatidi qassi, ‘Nuuni ne bolla woygidi mino qaala odetido?’ yaagidi oycheeta.
MAL 3:14 “Hinte, ‘Xoossas ootheysi hada; iya kiita naagidi, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Godaa sinthan azzaniya asada simeretethi nuna ay maaddidee?
MAL 3:15 Ha77ika nuuni otoreyisata anjetidaysata goos; iita ootheysati duretoosona; hari attoshin enti Xoossaa paacisheka kessi ekoosona’ yaageeta” yaagees Xoossay.
MAL 3:16 He wode Godaas yayyeysati issoy issuwara odetidosona; Godayka hayzidi si7is. Godaas yayyeysatinne iya sunthaa boncheysati dogetonna mela enta hassaysiya maxaafay iya sinthan xaafetis.
MAL 3:17 “Enti tabaa gidana; taani oothiya gallas enti taw buzo miishe gidana; aawi baw oothiya ba na7a maareysada taani enta maarana.
MAL 3:18 He wode hinte simmidi xilluwanne nagaranchuwa giddon, Xoossas kiiteteysanne kiitetonaysa giddon de7iya dummatethaa be7ana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 4:1 “Heko, cooce tamada eexiya gallasi yaana; otoranchotinne iita ootheysati ubbay buure mela gidana. He yaa gallasay enta xuuggana; entaw xaphonne xeera ashshena” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 4:2 Shin “Hintew, ta sunthaas yayyeysatas, xillotetha awi ba qefe garsan paxotethi ekidi keyana. Hinte qashope yedetida ko77o galoda gupana.
MAL 4:3 Taani oothiya gallas, nagaranchoti hinte tohope garsan bidinthe gidana; hinte enta yedhana” yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday.
MAL 4:4 “Isra7eele asay kiitetana mela taani Koreeba zumaa bolla ta aylliya Muse baggara immida higgiyanne kiita akeekite.
MAL 4:5 “Heko, gitanne yashshiya Godaa gallasay yaanape kasetada, taani hintew nabiya Eeliyaasa kiittana.
MAL 4:6 Taani yada biitta baadethan dhaysonna mela aawata wozana naytako, nayta wozana aawatako zaarana” yaagees.
MAT 1:1 Haysafe kaallidi xaafetidaysi Dawita na7a Abrahaame na7a gidida Yesuus Kiristoosa yeletethaa.
MAT 1:2 Abrahaamey Yisaaqa yelis; Yisaaqi Yayqooba yelis; Yayqoobi Yihudanne iya ishata yelis;
MAT 1:3 Yihudi Timaaripe Faaresanne Zaara yelis; Faaresi Asroome yelis; Asroomey Raame yelis;
MAT 1:4 Raamey Amnadaabe yelis; Amnadaabey Na7asoona yelis; Na7asooni Salmoona yelis;
MAT 1:5 Salmoona Raabipe Boo7eza yelis; Boo7ezi Uruutipe Iyobeeda yelis; Iyobeedi Isseye yelis;
MAT 1:6 Isseyey kawa Dawita yelis; Dawiti koyro Ooriyo machefe Solomone yelis;
MAT 1:7 Solomoney Orobi7aama yelis; Orobi7aamey Abiya yelis; Abiyi Asaafa yelis;
MAT 1:8 Asaafi Iyosaafexa yelis; Iyosaafexi Iyoraama yelis; Iyoraami Ooziyana yelis;
MAT 1:9 Ooziyani Iyo7ataame yelis; Iyo7atami Akaaza yelis; Akaazi Hizqiyaasa yelis;
MAT 1:10 Hizqiyaasi Minaase yelis; Minaasey Amoone yelis; Amooni Iyosiyaasa yelis;
MAT 1:11 Isra7eele asay di7etidi Babiloone biitta bida wode Iyosiyaasi Ikoniyaananne iya ishata yelis.
MAT 1:12 Babiloone biitta Isra7eele asay di7etidi bidaape guye Ikoniyaani Salatiyaala yelis. Salatiyaali Zarubaabela yelis;
MAT 1:13 Zarubaabeli Abdiyu yelis; Abdiyuy Eliyaqeeme yelis; Eliyaqeemi Azaara yelis;
MAT 1:14 Azaari Saadoqa yelis; Saadoqi Akime yelis; Akimey Elyuuda yelis;
MAT 1:15 Elyuudi Alaazara yelis; Alaazari Maatane yelis; Maataney Yayqooba yelis;
MAT 1:16 Yayqoobi Yoosefa yelis; Yoosefi Kiristoosa geetetiya Yesuusa yelida Mayraami azina.
MAT 1:17 Hiza, yeletethay Abrahaamepe Dawita gakanaw tammanne oydda. Dawitape bidi Babiloone di7uwa gakanaw tammanne oydda. Babiloone di7uwape bidi Kiristoosa gakanaw tammanne oyddu yeletethi gidees.
MAT 1:18 Yesuus Kiristoosa yeletethaa taarikey haysafe kaalleysa. Iya aayiya Mayraama Yoosefas oysheta de7ashe Yoosefara gahetonna Geeshsha Ayyaanape qanthatasu.
MAT 1:19 Yoosefi Xillo asi gidida gisho iyo asan kessanaw koybeenna. Yaaniya gisho qosan iyo agganaw qopis.
MAT 1:20 I he qofan de7ishin Xoossaa kiitanchoy amuhon qoncidi, “Dawita na7aw, Yoosefa, Mayraama qanthatiday Geeshsha Ayyaanape gidiya gisho iyo ekanaw yayyofa” yaagis.
MAT 1:21 Iya adde na7a yelana, I ba deriya enta nagaraape ashshiya gisho iya sunthaa ne Yesuusa gada xeegana.
MAT 1:22 Goday nabiya Isayaasa doonan,
MAT 1:23 “Heko geela7iya qanthatana; adde na7a yelana; iya sunthay Amanu7eela” geetetana goysi poletana mela ha ubbay hanis. Amanu7eela geysas birshethay “Xoossay nuura de7ees” guussu.
MAT 1:24 Yoosefi dhiskofe barkidi Godaa kiitanchoy kiittidaysa mela Mayraamo ba soo efis.
MAT 1:25 Shin ba bayra na7a yelana gakanaw iyo bochibeenna; yeletida na7aka Yesuusa gidi xeegis.
MAT 2:1 Kawa Herodiisa woden Yesuusi Yihuda biittan Beeteleme kataman yeletidaape guye xoolinto taybiya asati dolohape Yerusalaame yidi,
MAT 2:2 “Yeletida Ayhude kawoy awun de7ii? Nuuni doloha baggara keyida iya xoolintuwa be7idi iyaw goyinnanaw yida” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAT 2:3 Kawoy Herodiisi hessa si7ida wode dagammis. Yerusalaamen de7iya asa ubbayka dagammidosona.
MAT 2:4 Herodiisi kahine halaqatanne higge astamaareta baako xeegidi, “Kiristoosi awun yeletandesha?” yaagidi enta oychis.
MAT 2:5 Entika, “Yihuda Beetelemena; nabey,
MAT 2:6 “ ‘Yihudan de7iya Beeteleme, Yihudan de7iya gooba katamatape, neeni aybinka guuxaka. Ta deriya Isra7eele aysanaysi, neepe keyana’ gidi xaafis” yaagidosona.
MAT 2:7 Hessafe guye, Herodiisi dolohape yida asata geeman xeegidi, xoolintuwa enti be7ida wodiya entafe geeshshidi eris.
MAT 2:8 I entana Beeteleme yeddishe, “Bidi yeletida na7aa minthidi koyite; iya hinte demmida wode taka bada iyaw goyinnana mela simmidi yishe taw odite” yaagis.
MAT 2:9 Entika kawoy Herodiisi gidaysa si7idi bidosona. Enti doloha baggara be7ida xoolintoy entana kaalethishe na7ay de7iyasuwa gakanaw efis.
MAT 2:10 Enti he xoolintuwa be7ida wode gita ufaysi ufaytidosona.
MAT 2:11 Soo gelidi na7aa ba aaye Mayraamira de7eysa be7idosona. Iyaw gulbatidi goyinnidosona. Banta saaxiniya dooyidi worqa, ixaanenne karbe iyaw immidosona.
MAT 2:12 Enti Herodiisako guye simmonna mela Xoossay amuhon entaw odin, hara ogera banta biitta simmidosona.
MAT 2:13 Doloha baggafe yida asati bidaape guye, Godaa kiitanchoy Yoosefas amuhon qoncidi, “Herodiisi na7aa wodhanaw koyiya gisho denda; ellesada na7aanne na7aa aayiw ekada Gibxe biitta ba. Ne simmana wodiya ta new odana gakanaw yan gam7a” yaagis.
MAT 2:14 Hessa gisho, Yoosefi he qamman dendidi, na7aanne na7aa aayiw ekidi Gibxe bis.
MAT 2:15 Nabiya doonan Xoossay, “Taani, ta na7aa, Gibxe biittafe xeegas” geetetida qaalay poletana mela Herodiisi hayqana gakanaw I yan de7is.
MAT 2:16 Hessafe guye, doloha baggafe yida asati iya cimmidaysa erida wode daro yilotis. I kase entafe si7idaysada Beetelemeninne he heeran de7iya nam7u laythi kumidaysatanne nam7u laythafe garsan de7iya adde nayta ubbaa ba wotaadareta yeddidi wodhisis.
MAT 2:17 Nabiya Ermiyaasa doonan, “Yeehoynne zelelsi, Rama kataman si7etis. Raheela ba naytas yeekawusu; enti hayqida gisho minettanaw danda7abuku” gidi odidaysi poletis.
MAT 2:19 Herodiisi hayqidaape guye Gibxen Godaa kiitanchoy Yoosefas amuhon qoncidi,
MAT 2:20 “Na7aa wodhanaw koyiya asati hayqida gisho, dendada na7aanne na7aa aayiw ekada Isra7eele biitta simma” yaagis.
MAT 2:21 Yoosefi dendidi na7aanne na7aa aayiw ekidi Isra7eele biitta simmis.
MAT 2:22 Shin Arkeliyoosi Yihudan ba aawa Herodiisa bessan kawotidaysa si7ida wode yaa baanaw yayyis. Xoossay amuhon iyaw qoncisin Galila biitta bis.
MAT 2:23 Nabeta doonan, “Naazirete asi geetetana” gidi odetidaysi poletana mela Naazirete katamaa bidi yan de7is.
MAT 3:1 He wode Xammaqiya Yohaanisi, “Xoossaa kawotethay matatida gisho hinte nagaraape simmite” yaagidi sabbakishe Yihuda mela biitta bis.
MAT 3:3 Nabiya Isayaasi Yohaanisaba odidaysa mela, “Mela biittan, issoy ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, ‘Godaa ogiya giigisite. Iya horoga piddi oothite’ gis” yaagetiday iyassa yaagis.
MAT 3:4 Yohaanisi gimale ikisepe oosetida afila ma77ees. Ba xeessan dafo dancees. I miya kathayka boolenne degera eessi.
MAT 3:5 Asay he wode Yerusalaame katamaape, Yihuda biitta ubbaafenne Yordaanose Shaafa heerape iyako yoosona.
MAT 3:6 Banta nagaraa paaxidi Yordaanose Shaafan Yohaanisa kushen xammaqetosona.
MAT 3:7 Yohaanisi, daro Farsaawetinne Saduqaaweti xammaqetanaw baako yeyisata be7idi, entako, “Ha iita shooshato, yaana Xoossaa hanquwafe baqatana mela hintena oone zoriday?
MAT 3:8 Hiza, hinte, hinte nagaraape simmidaysa erisiyaba oothite.
MAT 3:9 Hinte, hinte wozanan, ‘Abrahaamey, nu aaway de7ees’ gidi qopofite. Loythi si7ite! Xoossay ha shuchatape Abrahaames na7a kessanaw danda7ees.
MAT 3:10 Beexey mitha xaphon giigidi uttis; lo77o ayfe ayfonna mitha ubbay qanxetidi taman yegetana.
MAT 3:11 “Hinte, hinte nagaraape simmidaysa erisanaw taani hintena haathan xammaqayis. Shin taape guyera yeysi hintena Geeshsha Ayyaananinne taman xammaqana. I taape daro wolqaamees; taani hari attoshin iya caammaa tookanawuka bessike.
MAT 3:12 Kathaa geeshshiya pithey iya kushen de7ees. Kathaa loythi geeshshees; gistiya ba shaaliyan qolana, shin punuwa to7onna taman xuuggana” yaagis.
MAT 3:13 He wode Yesuusi Yohaanisa kushen xammaqetanaw Galilape Yordaanose Shaafa bis.
MAT 3:14 Shin Yohaanisi iya digganaw koyidi, “Taani nenan xammaqetanaw koshshishin neeni taako yay?” yaagis.
MAT 3:15 Shin Yesuusi zaaridi, “Xoossay nuupe koyaba ubbaa nu polanaw bessiya gisho, ha77i taw ero ga” yaagis. Yohaanisi iyaw ero gidi ekis.
MAT 3:16 Yesuusi xammaqetida mela haathaafe keyis. Iiraka saloy dooyetin Xoossaa Ayyaanay holleda yishin qassi ba bolla wol7amidi wodhishin be7is.
MAT 3:17 He wode, “Ta dosiya, iyan tana ufaysiya ta na7ay haysa” giya qaalay salope yis.
MAT 4:1 Hessafe guye, Xalahey Yesuusa paacana mela Geeshsha Ayyaanay Yesuusa mela biitta efis.
MAT 4:2 Oytamu qammanne oytamu gallas xoomidaape guye koshatis.
MAT 4:3 Xalahey Yesuusako yidi “Neeni Xoossaa na7a gidiko, ane ha shuchati uythi gidana mela kiitta” yaagis.
MAT 4:4 Yesuusi zaaridi, “ ‘Asi Xoossaa doonape keyiya qaala ubban de7eesipe attishin, uytha xalaalan deenna’ geetetidi Xoossaa qaalan xaafetis” yaagis.
MAT 4:5 Kaallidika, Xalahey Yesuusa geeshsha katamaa efidi, Xoossaa keetha huuphiya kessidi,
MAT 4:6 “Neeni Xoossa na7a gidiko, ane duge sa7an kunda. “ ‘Ne tohoy shuchan dhubetonna mela, banta kushiyan nena denthana mela, Xoossay ba kiitanchota ne gisho kiittana’ geetetidi Xoossaa qaalan xaafetis” yaagis.
MAT 4:7 Yesuusi iyako, “Qassika, ‘Xoossaa qaalan ne Godaa, ne Xoossaa paacofa’ yaagetidi xaafetis” gidi zaaris.
MAT 4:8 Wursethan Xalahey Yesuusa issi wolqaama zuma huuphe kessidi alamiya kawotethata enta bonchuwara issife bessidi,
MAT 4:9 “Ne taw kundada goyinniko ta new ha ubbaa immana” yaagis.
MAT 4:10 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ha Xalahiyaw, taape haaka! ‘Ne Godaa, ne Xoossaa goyinna, iya xalaala haggaaza’ geetetidi Xoossaa qaalan xaafetis” yaagis.
MAT 4:11 Hessafe guye, Xalahey aggidi bis; kiitanchoti yidi iya haggaazidosona.
MAT 4:12 Yesuusi, Yohaanisi qashetoysa si7ida wode Galila biitta bis.
MAT 4:13 Naazirete katamaa aggidi Zabloonaninne Niftaaleme heeran, abba matan de7iya Qifirnahooma katamaa bidi yan de7is.
MAT 4:14 Hessi haniday nabiya Isayaasa doonan,
MAT 4:15 “Zabloona biittan, Niftaaleme biittan, Yordaanose Shaafape hefinthan, abba ogiya gaxan de7iya, Ayhude gidonna derey de7iya Galilan,
MAT 4:16 dhuman de7iya derey, wolqaama poo7o be7is. Hayqo kuya biittan, de7eysatas poo7oy keyis” yaagidi odetida qaalay poletana melasa.
MAT 4:17 He wodepe doomidi Yesuusi, “Xoossaa kawotethay matatida gisho hinte nagaraape simmite” yaagidi qaala sabbakees.
MAT 4:18 Yesuusi Galila Abbaa matara aadhishe nam7u ishata, Phexroosa geetetiya Simoonanne iya ishaa Indiriyasa be7is. Enti molo oykeyisata gidida gisho banta gitiya abban yeggoosona.
MAT 4:19 Yesuusi entana, “Haa yiite; tana kaallite; taani hintena ase oythi tamaarsana” yaagis.
MAT 4:20 Entika, ellesidi banta gitiya yeggi aggidi Yesuusa kaallidosona.
MAT 4:21 Yesuusi yaape buroo gede sinthe aadhishe hara nam7u ishata, Zabdiyoosa nayta, Yayqoobanne Yohaanisa be7is. Banta aawa Zabdiyoosara issife wogoluwa giddon banta gitiya giigiseyisata xeegis.
MAT 4:22 Entika, ellesidi banta wogoluwanne banta aawa aggidi Yesuusa kaallidosona.
MAT 4:23 Yesuusi ayhude woosa keethatan tamaarsishe, salo kawotethaa Wongela odishenne dumma dumma hargiyafe asaa pathishe Galila biitta ubban yuuyis.
MAT 4:24 Hessafe dendoysan iya sunthay Soore biitta ubban keyis. Dumma dumma hargen oyketidaysatanne waayeteyisata, tuna ayyaanan oyketidaysata, shoci yeggiya hargen oyketidaysatanne, gundata iyako ehidosona; ika entana pathis.
MAT 4:25 Asay Galilape, Tammu Katamatape, Yerusalaamepe, Yihudapenne Yordaanose Shaafa hefinthan de7iya biittafe yida daro asay iya kaallidosona.
MAT 5:1 Daro derey shiiqidaysa Yesuusi be7ida wode zumaa bolla keyidi uttis. Iya tamaareti iyako shiiqin,
MAT 5:2 haysada yaagidi tamaarsis:
MAT 5:3 “Banta ayyaanan manqoti anjetidaysata, salo kawotethay entassa.
MAT 5:4 Yeekeysati anjetidaysata, enti minthetho demmana.
MAT 5:5 Banta wozanan ashketi anjetidaysata, enti sa7aa laattana.
MAT 5:6 Xillobaa oothanaw koshateysatinne saamoteysati anjetidaysata, enti kallana.
MAT 5:7 Maareysati anjetidaysata, enti maarotethi demmana.
MAT 5:8 Wozana geeshshati anjetidaysata, enti Xoossaa be7ana.
MAT 5:9 Sigetheysati anjetidaysata, enti Xoossaa nayta geetetidi xeegetana.
MAT 5:10 Xillobaa oothiya gisho gidi, goodeteysati anjetidaysata, salo kawotethay entassa.
MAT 5:11 “Asay hintena ta gisho gidi cayiya wode, gooddiya wodenne hinte bolla iitabaa ubbaa wordon odisiya wode hinte anjetidaysata.
MAT 5:12 Hinte woytoy salon gita gidiya gisho ufaytite, hashshu giite. Hintefe kase de7iya nabeta hessada goodidosona.
MAT 5:13 “Hinte biittas maxine; maxiney ba maxinetetha aggiko, ba mal7otetha waati zaari demmanee? Kare holin asan yedhetanaape attishin, aybiska maaddenna.
MAT 5:14 “Hinte biittas poo7o; zuma bolla de7iya katamiya qosetanaw danda7uku.
MAT 5:15 Xompe oythidi son de7iya asa ubbaas poo7ana mela dhoqa son wotheesipe attishin, daallo giddon wothey baawa.
MAT 5:16 Hessa mela asay hinte lo77o oosuwa be7idi, salon de7iya hinte aawa bonchana mela hinte poo7oy asa sinthan poo7o.
MAT 5:17 “Taani Muse higgiyanne nabeta qaala shaaranaw yida hintew daanopo. Taani, enti odidaysi tuma gideysa qoncisanaw yasipe attishin, shaaranaw yabiike.
MAT 5:18 Ta hintew tuma odayis; saloynne sa7i aadhana gakanaw higge ubbay poletanaape attishin, higgiyafe issi qaalay woyko pidaley aadhenna.
MAT 5:19 Hessa gisho, ha kiitatape guuxiya issi kiitaa menthiya oonika qassi harata hessatho oothana mela tamaarsey oonika salo kawotethan ubbaafe guutha gidana. Shin ha kiitaa poleysinne harataka polana mela tamaarsey salo kawotethan gita gidana.
MAT 5:20 Ta hintew odayis; hinte xillotethay Farsaaweta xillotethaafenne higge astamaareta xillotethafe aadhona ixiko, salo kawotethaa geleketa.
MAT 5:21 “Hinte mayzatas, ‘Wodhopite; shempo wodhida oonika pirdetana’ geetetoysa si7ideta.
MAT 5:22 Shin ta hintew odayis; ba isha bolla hanqetiya ubbay pirdetana. Ba ishaa cayiya oonika daynna sinthe pirdas shiiqana. Ba ishaako, ‘Eeyay’ giya oonika qassi gaanname taman pirdetana.
MAT 5:23 “Hessa gisho, neeni ne yarshuwa yarshiya wode, ne isha qohidabay new akeeketiko,
MAT 5:24 ne yarshuwa he bessan aggada ba; koyrota bada ne ishaara giiga; yaata simmada, ne yarshuwa Xoossaas yarsha.
MAT 5:25 “Nena mooteysara pirda keethi bashe oge bolla iyara giiga. Hessi atto giiko I nena daynna sinthe efana. Daynnay nena qacheysas aathidi immana; I nena woynen yeggana.
MAT 5:26 Ta tuma odayis; ne bolla pirdetida acuwa issi santimey attonna cigga ongana gakanaw qasho keethafe keyaka.
MAT 5:27 “Haysafe kase, ‘Laymatopite’ geetetoysa si7ideta.
MAT 5:28 Shin ta hintew odayis, maccas xeellidi, amotida ubbay ba wozanan iira laymatees.
MAT 5:29 Ne ushacha ayfey new nagaras gaaso gidiko, kessa hola. Ne asatethay kumethi gaanname taman wodhanaape ne asatethafe issoy dhayiko new lo77o.
MAT 5:30 Ne ushacha kushey new nagaras gaaso gidiko, iya qanxa hola. Ne asatethay kumethi gaanname taman wodhanaape ne asatethafe issoy dhayiko, new lo77o.
MAT 5:31 “ ‘Ba machees anjo worqate immo’ geetetis.
MAT 5:32 Shin ta hintew odayis; ba machiya laymatonna de7ishin billiya oonika iya laymatana mela oothees. Hessadaka, anjetida maccasiw ekiya ubbay laymatees.
MAT 5:33 “Hinte mayzatako, ‘Wordon caaqofite; hinte Xoossaa sinthan caaqidaysa polite’ geetetidaysa si7ideta.
MAT 5:34 Shin ta hintew odayis; ubbaraka caaqofite. Xoossay uttiya araata gidiya gisho, salon caaqofite.
MAT 5:35 Iya tohoy yedhiya soo gidiya gisho, sa7anka caaqofite. Gita kawa katama gidiya gisho, Yerusalaamenka caaqofite.
MAT 5:36 Hinte binaanape issuwaka boothi woyko kareethi oothanaw danda7onna gisho, hinte, hinte huuphenka caaqofite.
MAT 5:37 Hessa gisho, hinte qaalay, ‘Ee’ woyko ‘Akay’ gido. Hessafe kare keyey Xalahepe yees.
MAT 5:38 “ ‘Ayfe gisho ayfe; acha gisho ache’ geetetidaysa si7ideta.
MAT 5:39 Shin ta hintew odayis; hinte bolla iitabaa oothiya uraara eqetofite. Oonika ne ushacha shakala baqiko ne haddirsa shakala bessa.
MAT 5:40 Issi asi ne shamziya ekanaw nena mootiko, ne kootiya gujada imma.
MAT 5:41 Issi asi nena wolqan babaa toossidi issi saate oge baara baana mela nena un7ethiko, iyara nam7u saate oge ba.
MAT 5:42 Woossiya oodeska imma; neepe tal7anaw koyiya oonaka diggofa.
MAT 5:43 “ ‘Nena doseysa dosa; nena ixeysa ixa’ geetetoysa si7ideta.
MAT 5:44 Shin ta hintew odayis; hinte morketa dosite; hintena qoheysatas woossite.
MAT 5:45 Hessatho hinte oothiko, salon de7iya hinte aawas hinte nayta gidana. I iitatasinne lo77otas awa kessees; xillotasinne nagaranchotas ba ira bukisees.
MAT 5:46 Hintena dosiya asaa xalaala hinte dosiko, hintew ay woytoy de7ii? Hari attoshin, qaraxa qanxiseysatika hessa oothosona.
MAT 5:47 Hinte, hinte ishata xalaala sarothiko, haratape ay hara aadhiyaba oothidetii? Hari attoshin, Xoossaa ammanonna asayka hessa oothosona.
MAT 5:48 Hiza, salon de7iya hinte aaway polo gidoysada hinteka polo gidite.”
MAT 6:1 “Asi be7o gidi hinte lo77o oosuwa asa sinthan oothonnaada naagetite. Hessatho hanonna ixiko salon de7iya hinte Aawape woyto demmeketa.
MAT 6:2 “Hinte manqotas immiya wode asa sinthan bonchetanaw gidi cubboti ogiya doonaninne ayhude woosa keethatan ootheysada asi be7o gidi oothopite. Ta hintew tuma odayis; enti banta kumetha woytuwa ekidosona.
MAT 6:3 Shin hinte manqotas immiya wode hinte ushacha kushey ootheysa hinte haddirsa kushey eropo;
MAT 6:4 hinte imoy geeman gido. Geeman ootheysa be7iya hinte aaway hintew woytuwa qoncen immana.
MAT 6:5 “Woosa woossishe cubbotatho hanopite. Enti, bantana asi be7o gidi ayhude woosa keethaninne ogiya doonan eqidi woosseysa dosoosona. Ta hintew tuma odayis; enti banta kumetha woytuwa ekidosona.
MAT 6:6 Shin neeni woossiya wode, ne soo gela, wulaa gordada geeman de7iya ne Aawa woossa; geeman oosetidaysa be7iya ne aaway new woytuwa immana.
MAT 6:7 Hinte woossiya wode ammanonna asatho coo qaala darsidi woossofite. Enti adussi woossin Xoossay si7ees gidi qopoosona.
MAT 6:8 Hessa gisho, entaysada hanopite. Ayis giiko, hinte aaway hintew ay koshshiyako hinte woossanaape sinthatidi erees.
MAT 6:9 “Hiza, hinte yaagidi woossite: “ ‘Salon de7iya nu aawaw, ne geeshsha sunthay anjeto.
MAT 6:10 Ne kawotethay yo, ne sheney salon hanidaysada sa7anka hano.
MAT 6:11 Gallasa kathaa hachi hachi nuus imma.
MAT 6:12 Nuuni nuna qohidaysata, atto geysada, nuuska nu qohuwa atto ga.
MAT 6:13 Nuna iitape ashshafe attishin, paacen gelsofa. [Kawotethay, wolqaynne bonchoy merinaw neesa; Amin7i.’]
MAT 6:14 “Hinte hintena qohidaysata atto giiko, salon de7iya hinte Aaway hinte qohuwaka atto gaana.
MAT 6:15 Shin hinte hara asa nagara atto goonna ixiko hinte Aaway hinte nagara atto geenna.
MAT 6:16 “Hinte xoomiya wode cubbotatho kayotofite. Ayis giiko, enti xoomeysa asi erana mela banta som7uwa qitayoosona. Ta tuma odayis; enti banta woytuwa ekidosona.
MAT 6:17 “Shin neeni xoomiya wode ne som7uwa meecca, ne huuphiya tiyetta.
MAT 6:18 Hessada ne oothiko ne xoomiya xoomay asape geemmidaysa, shin geeman de7iya ne Aaway eriya xooma gidana. Geeman oosetidaysa be7iya ne Aaway new woytuwa immana.
MAT 6:19 “Bili miya bessan, birati shi7iyason, kaysoy bookidi ekiyason, ha sa7an, hintew shalo shiishopite.
MAT 6:20 Shin bili moonnason, birati shi7onnason, kaysoy bookidi ekonnason salon hintew shalo shiishite.
MAT 6:21 Ne shaloy de7iyasuwan ne wozanay de7ana.
MAT 6:22 “Ayfey asatethas xompe. Hessa gisho, ne ayfey paxa gidiko ne kumetha asatethay poo7o gidees.
MAT 6:23 Ne ayfey hargancho gidiko ne kumetha asatethay dhuma gidees. Hiza, nenan de7iya poo7oy dhuma gidiko, dhumay ay mela aadhidi dhumandeesha!
MAT 6:24 “Issi asi nam7u godaas haaretanaw danda7enna. Issuwa dosiko hankuwa ixees; woyko issuwa bonchiko hankuwa kadhees. Xoossasinne miishes haaretanaw danda7eketa.
MAT 6:25 “Hiza, si7ite! Hinte de7on daanaw, ‘Ay maanee? Ay uyanee? Ay ma7anee?’ gidi un7etofite; de7oy kathafe woyko asatethi ma7ope aadhenee?
MAT 6:26 Salo kafota xeellite; enti zerokona, buucokona, shaalen yeggokona, shin hinte salo aaway enta muzees. Hinte entafe daro aadheketii?
MAT 6:27 Hinte giddofe daro un7etidi ba laytha bolla issi gallas gujanaw danda7ey de7ii?
MAT 6:28 “Qassi hinte ma7iyabaas ayis un7etetii? Ane ciishshata be7ite, ooson daaburokona woyko suqokona.
MAT 6:29 Si7ite! Hari attoshin, kawa Solomoney ba boncho ubban ha ciishshatape issuwa melaka ma7ibeenna.
MAT 6:30 Hinteno, ammanoy pacidaysato, Xoossay hachi bentidi wonto taman wodhanaw de7iya maata yaatidi mayziyaba gidiko, hintena entafe aathidi waati mayzennee?
MAT 6:31 Hessa gisho, ‘Ay maanee? Ay uyanee? Ay ma7anee?’ gidi un7etofite.
MAT 6:32 He ubbaa Xoossaa ammanonna asay darsidi demmanaw un7etoosona. Hinte salo aaway he ubbay hintew koshsheysa erees.
MAT 6:33 Shin ubbaafe sinthe Xoossaa kawotethaanne iya xillotethaa koyite; he ubbay hintew guji imetana.
MAT 6:34 Hessa gisho, wontos qopishe un7etofite. Wontoysi wontos aqo; issi issi gallasay baw gidiya metora de7ees.
MAT 7:1 “Hinte bolla pirdetonna mela harata bolla pirdofite.
MAT 7:2 Ayis giiko, harata bolla hinte pirdeysada hinte bolla pirdetana; hinte haratas makidaban hintew zaari maketana.
MAT 7:3 Ne ayfen de7iya tuussu daaneysa be7onna ne ishaa ayfen de7iya buuriya ayis be7ay?
MAT 7:4 Ne ayfen tuussi de7ishin ne ishaa ayfen de7iya buuriya kesso gaanaw waana danda7ay?
MAT 7:5 Neno cubbuwaw, koyrottada ne ayfen de7iya tuussi daaneysa kessa. Iyape guye, ne ishaa ayfen de7iya buuriya kessanaw ne geeshsha xeellana.
MAT 7:6 “Guye simmidi hintena saxona mela geeshshaba kanatas yeggofite. Banta tohuwan yedhidi iissonna mela hinte al7o inquwa gudunthota sinthan yeggofite.
MAT 7:7 “Woossite hintew imetana, koyite hinte demmana, kare yidi xeegite hintew dooyetana.
MAT 7:8 Woossiya oodeska imetana, koyiya oodeska bentana, kare yidi xeegiya oodeska dooyetenna.
MAT 7:9 “Hinte giddofe ba na7i uythi woossiko shuchi immey oonee?
MAT 7:10 Woyko molo woossiko shooshi immey de7ii?
MAT 7:11 Yaatin hinte iita gidishe hinte naytas lo77oba imo eriko, hinte salo aaway bana woosseysatas lo77oba waati darsidi immenee?
MAT 7:12 Harati hintew oothana mela hinte koyaba ubbaa hinteka haratas oothite. Ayis giiko, Muse higgeynne nabeti tamaarsey haysa.
MAT 7:13 “Xuuntha wulara gelite; ayis giiko, dhayos efiya ogey wogga, wulayka dalga. Iyara geliya asayka daro.
MAT 7:14 Shin de7uwako efiya ogeynne wulay xuunthu; yaa geliya asayka guutha.
MAT 7:15 “Bolla baggara dorse daanidi banta gaathan suudhume gididi hinte giddo geliya wordancho nabetape naagetite.
MAT 7:16 Hinte enta, enta ayfiyape erana; agunthafe woyney, kinchotepe laadey maxetenna.
MAT 7:17 Hessa mela lo77o mithi ubbay lo77o ayfe ayfees; iita mithi iita ayfe ayfees.
MAT 7:18 Lo77o mithi iita ayfe ayfena, qassi iita mithi lo77o ayfe ayfanaw danda7enna.
MAT 7:19 Lo77o ayfe ayfonna mithi ubbay qanxetidi taman xuugetana.
MAT 7:20 Hessa gisho, hinte enta, enta ayfiyan erana.
MAT 7:21 “Salon de7iya ta aawa sheniya oothiya uray salo kawotethi gelanaape attishin, coo tana ‘Godaw, Godaw’ giya ubbay salo kawotethi gelenna.
MAT 7:22 Pirda gallas daroti, ‘Godaw, Godaw, ne sunthan tinbite odibooko? Ne sunthan tuna ayyaanata kessibooko? Ne sunthan malaatata oothibooko?’ yaagana.
MAT 7:23 He wode taani, ‘Ta hintena ubbaraka erike, hinte iita ootheysati taape haakite’ yaagana.
MAT 7:24 “Hiza, ha ta qaala si7idi oothiya oonika ba keethaa shucha bolla keexida wozanaama asa mela.
MAT 7:25 Iray bukis, di7oy di77is, carkoyka carkidi he keethaa sugis. Shin keethay shucha baaso bolla keexetida gisho kundibeenna.
MAT 7:26 Ha ta qaala si7idi oothonna oonika ba keethaa shafe bolla keexida eeya uraa mela.
MAT 7:27 Iray bukidi, di7oy di77idi, carkoyka carkidi, he keethaa sugin, he keethay kundis; iya kundethayka wolqaama” yaagis.
MAT 7:28 Yesuusi ba oda ongida wode iya timirtey higge astamaareta mela gidonashin, maatara gidiya gisho asay iya timirtiyan malaaletidosona.
MAT 8:1 Yesuusi zumaape wodhiya wode daro asay iya kaallidosona.
MAT 8:2 Heko issi baro harganchoy iyako shiiqidi, iya sinthan gulbatidi, “Godaw, ne shene gidiko tana geeshshada pathanaw danda7aasa” yaagis.
MAT 8:3 Yesuusi ba kushiya yeddidi iya bochidi, “Ee, ta shene, paxa” yaagis. Uray iiraka geeyi aggis.
MAT 8:4 Yesuusi iyako, “Ne paxuwa oodeska odopa. Shin bada ne geeyada paxoysa kahine bessa. Ne paxuwas marka gidana mela bada Musey kiitida yarshuwa yarsha” yaagis.
MAT 8:5 Yesuusi Qifirnahooma katama gakida wode, issi mato halaqay iyako shiiqidi,
MAT 8:6 “Godaw, ta aylley asatethay gundin daro hargetidi, son zin7idi de7ees” yaagidi woossis.
MAT 8:7 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani bada iya pathana” yaagis.
MAT 8:8 Shin mato halaqay zaaridi, “Godaw, ne ta soo gelanaw bessiya asi gidike, shin ne han uttada qaala xalaala oda, ta aylley paxana.
MAT 8:9 Ayis giiko, taape bollara tana kiittiya asati de7oosona, qassi taape garsara taw kiiteteysati de7oosona. Entafe issuwa, ‘Ba’ giyade bees; hankuwa qassi ‘Haaya!’ giyade yees. Ta aylliya, ‘Haysa ootha’ giyade oothees” yaagis.
MAT 8:10 Yesuusi hessa si7ida wode malaaletidi, bana kaalliya asaako, “Ta hintew tuma odayis; taani haysa mela ammano Isra7eele asanka be7abike.
MAT 8:11 Ta hintew odayis; daroti dolohapenne wulohape yidi, salo kawotethan Abrahaamera, Yisaaqaranne Yayqoobara issife imato bolla uttana.
MAT 8:12 Shin salo kawotethaa laattanaw bessishin attidaysati kare dhuman holetana. Yan entaw yeehonne acha garcethi gidana” yaagis.
MAT 8:13 Yesuusi mato halaqaako, “Ne soo ba, ne ammanuwatho new hano” yaagis. Iya aylley iiraka paxi aggis.
MAT 8:14 Yesuusi Phexroosa soo geliya wode, Phexroosa mache aayiya qoxo misha hargen saketada zin7idaaro be7is.
MAT 8:15 Yesuusi I kushiya bochida wode qoxoynne mishay aggaagis. Paxa dendada iya mokasu.
MAT 8:16 He wode omarsi tuna ayyaanan oyketida daro asata, asay Yesuusako ehidosona. Ika tuna ayyaanata ba qaalan kessis, harganchota ubbaa pathis.
MAT 8:17 Hessanka nabiya Isayaasi, “I nu hargiya baw ekis, nu daabura tookis” gida qaalay poletis.
MAT 8:18 Yesuusi daro asay iya yuushuwan eqidaysa be7idi, abbaafe hefinthi pinnana mela ba tamaareta kiittis.
MAT 8:19 Higge astamaaretape issoy, “Astamaariyaw, ne biya bessa ubbaa ta kaallana” yaagis.
MAT 8:20 Yesuusi iyako “Workanatas olli de7ees, salo kafotas keethi de7ees. Shin Asa Na7aas ba huuphiya shempisiya bessi baawa” yaagis.
MAT 8:21 Yesuusa kaalliya asatape issoy, “Godaw, taani sinthata bada ta aawa moogada yaana” yaagis.
MAT 8:22 Shin Yesuusi, “Hayqidaysati banta hayqota moogo; neeni tana kaalla” yaagis.
MAT 8:23 Yesuusi baanaw wogoluwan gelida wode, iya tamaaretika iyara baanaw gelidosona.
MAT 8:24 Enti qoponna de7ishin, wolqaama hobbey haatha bolla dendin wogoloy mitettanaw gakis. Shin Yesuusi dhiskis.
MAT 8:25 Iya tamaareti iyako shiiqidi iya barkethidi, “Godaw, nu dhayos nuna ashsharki” yaagidosona.
MAT 8:26 Yesuusi entako, “Hinteno, ammanoy pacidaysato, ayis yayyetii?” yaagis. Dendidi, hobbiyanne gotiya essis. Ellesidi ubbabay si77i gis.
MAT 8:27 Iya tamaareti malaaletidi, “Haysi, hari attoshin, hobbeynne gotey kiiteteysi waanida asee?” yaagidosona.
MAT 8:28 Yesuusi abbaafe hefinthan de7iya Gergesoone biitta gakida wode tuna ayyaanay oykida nam7u asati duufope keyidi iyara gahetidosona. Enti daro iitanne yashshiya asata gidiya gisho asi he bessaara aadhanaw danda7enna.
MAT 8:29 Entika, “Xoossaa Na7aw, nunanne nena aybe gathey? Wodey gakonna de7ishin nuna pirdanaw yadii?” gidi waassidosona.
MAT 8:30 Entafe daro haakonna guduntho wudey hemetees.
MAT 8:31 Tuna ayyaanati Yesuusa, “Ne nuna kessanaba gidiko, hini guduntho wudiya giddo yeddarki” yaagidi woossidosona.
MAT 8:32 Yesuusi, “Biite” yaagis. Tuna ayyaanati asatape keyidi gudunthotan gelidosona. Gudunthoti ubbay aafo doonara dirgidi bidi abban mitetidi hayqidosona.
MAT 8:33 Guduntho wudiya heemmeysati baqatidi katama bidi, hanidabaanne tuna ayyaanay oykida asata bolla oosetidaba ubbaa odidosona.
MAT 8:34 Yaatin, kataman de7iya asa ubbay Yesuusa be7anaw keyidosona. Enti Yesuusa be7ida wode banta biittafe keyidi baana mela woossidosona.
MAT 9:1 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi wogoluwan gelidi, abba pinnidi ba katamaa bis.
MAT 9:2 Hanida guutha asati issi gunda ura algara tookidi Yesuusako ehidosona. Yesuusi enta ammanuwa be7idi, gunda uraa, “Ta na7aw, yayyofa; ne nagaray atto geetetis” yaagis.
MAT 9:3 He saatiyan, Ayhude higge astamaaretape issoti issoti, “Haysi Xoossaa cashshe gidenne” yaagidi banta wozanan qopidosona.
MAT 9:4 Yesuusi enta qofaa eridi, “Iitabaa hinte wozanan ayis qopeetii?
MAT 9:5 Hanoshin, ‘Ne nagaray atto geetetis’ geysafenne ‘Denda eqada ba’ geysafe awusi kawuyii?
MAT 9:6 Shin sa7a bolla nagara atto gaanaw Asa Na7aas maati de7eysa ta hintena erisana” yaagidi, gunda addiyako, “Denda eqa, ne algaa tookada, ne soo ba” yaagis.
MAT 9:7 Gunda uray dendidi ba soo bis.
MAT 9:8 Derey hessa be7idi malaaletidosona. Hessa mela maata asas immida Xoossaa galatidosona.
MAT 9:9 Yesuusi yaape dendidi bishe Maatosa geysa qaraxa qanxisiya bessan uttidashin be7idi, “Tana kaalla” yaagis. Ika dendidi kaallis.
MAT 9:10 Yesuusi Maatosa son gayta bolla uttidashin, qaraxa qanxisiya daro asatinne nagaranchoti yidi iyaranne iya tamaaretara issife maanaw uttidosona.
MAT 9:11 Issi issi Farsaaweti hessa be7idi, Yesuusa tamaareta, “Hinte astamaarey qaraxa qanxiseysataranne nagaranchotara ayis mii?” yaagidosona.
MAT 9:12 Yesuusi hessa si7idi, “Dhale koshshey harganchotasafe attishin, paxatasa gidenna.
MAT 9:13 Shin hinte bidi, ‘Taani hinte yarshuwa gidonashin hinte harata maarana mela koyayis’ geetetidi xaafetidaysi ay guusseko erite. Ayis giiko, taani nagaranchota xeeganaw yasipe attishin, xillota xeeganaw yabiike” yaagis.
MAT 9:14 He wode Yohaanisa tamaareti Yesuusako shiiqidi, “Nunne Farsaaweti xoomos, shin ne tamaareti ayis xoomokonaa?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAT 9:15 Yesuusi zaaridi entako, “Machiw ekeysi entara de7ishin xeegetidi yida asay kayotanaw danda7onna? Mushuray enta matape eketana wodey yaana, enti he wode xoomana.
MAT 9:16 “Ooratha ma7ope peedhidi gal7a ma7o bolla sikey oonika baawa. Hessatho oothiko oorathay gal7a peedhees. Peedhethayka guji dalgees.
MAT 9:17 Ooratha woyne gal7a ogoron qoliya oonika baawa. Hessatho oothiko ooratha woyney gal7a ogoruwa dhusees woyneyka gukees; ogoroyka nam7antho maaddonnaba gidees. Shin ooratha woyney ooratha ogoron qoletanaw bessees. Hessatho oosetiko nam7ayka iitonna naagetoosona” yaagis.
MAT 9:18 Yesuusi hessa odo bolla de7ishin, Ayhude halaqatape issoy iyako yidi, iya sinthan gulbatidi, “Ta na7iya ha77i hayqasu, shin iya paxana mela neeni yada ne kushiya I bolla wotharki” gidi woossis.
MAT 9:19 Yesuusi dendidi iyara bis; iya tamaaretika kaallidosona.
MAT 9:20 I bishin tammanne nam7u laythi kumethi suuthi goggidi waaysiya issi maccasiya guyera shiiqada Yesuusa afilaa macaraa bochasu.
MAT 9:21 Iya ba wozanan, “Ta iya afilaa macaraa xalaala bochiyako paxana” yaagada qopasu.
MAT 9:22 Yesuusi guye simmi iyo xeellidi, “Ta naatte, yayyofa! Nena ne ammanoy pathis” yaagis. Maccasiya ellesada paxa aggasu.
MAT 9:23 Yesuusi Ayhude halaqaa soo gakiya wode zaye punneysatanne yeekeyisata be7idi,
MAT 9:24 “Ane kichite; guutha na7iya dhiskasupe attishin, hayqabuuku” yaagis. Shin asay iya bolla miicidosona.
MAT 9:25 Asaa kare kessidaape guye soo gelidi, na7e kushiya oykis, na7iya denda eqasu.
MAT 9:26 He worey he biitta ubbaa gakis.
MAT 9:27 Yesuusi yaape dendidi gede sinthe biya wode nam7u qooqeti banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Dawita na7aw, nuna maararki” yaagishe iya kaallidosona.
MAT 9:28 Yesuusi soo gelida wode qooqeti iya kaallidi yidosona. Yesuusi entako, “Taani hessa oothanaw danda7eysa hinte ammanetii?” yaagis. Entika, “Ee, Godaw” yaagidi zaaridosona.
MAT 9:29 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi enta ayfiya bochidi entako, “Hintew, hinte ammanuwatho hano” yaagis.
MAT 9:30 Enta ayfeyka dooyetis. Yesuusi entako, “Haysa oodeska odopite” yaagidi minthi odis.
MAT 9:31 Shin asati bidi Yesuusaba he biitta ubban odidosona.
MAT 9:32 Enti yaape keyiya wode asay tuna ayyaanay oykidi muumisida issi asi Yesuusako ehidosona.
MAT 9:33 Tuna ayyaanay keydaape guye muume uray odetis. Dereyka malaaletidi, “Haysa mela oorathabay Isra7eele biittan hanibeenna” yaagidosona.
MAT 9:34 Shin Farsaaweti, “Tuna ayyaanata halaqan tuna ayyaanata kessees” yaagidosona.
MAT 9:35 Yesuusi ayhude woosa keethatan tamaarsishe, salo kawotethaa Wongela sabbakishe, asaa harge ubbaafe pathishe katamataninne guta ubban yuuyis.
MAT 9:36 Daro derey, heemmiya asi bayna dorsada entana be7iya asi dhayin un7etidi de7eyisata be7idi entaw qadhetis.
MAT 9:37 Ba tamaaretako, “Shiiqana kathay daro, shin kathaa shiishiya asay guutha.
MAT 9:38 Hessa gisho, Goday kathaa shiishiya oosanchota yeddana mela woossite” yaagis.
MAT 10:1 Yesuusi tammanne nam7u tamaareta baako xeegidi, tuna ayyaanata kessana melanne harge ubbaa pathana mela entaw maata immis.
MAT 10:2 Yesuusi kiitida tammanne nam7u hawaareta sunthay: koyroy Phexroosa geetetiya Simoonanne iya ishaa Indiriyasa, Zabdiyoosa na7aa Yayqoobanne iya ishaa Yohaanisa,
MAT 10:3 Filphoosanne Bartelemoosa, Toomasanne qaraxa qanxisiya Maatosa, Ilfiyoosa na7aa Yayqooba, Taadiyosa,
MAT 10:4 ba biittas mishetiya Simoonanne Yesuusa aathidi immida Asqoroota Yihuda.
MAT 10:5 He tammanne nam7ata Yesuusi kiittidi yeddishe, “Ayhude gidonna deriyako boopite, qassi Samaareta katamaka gelopite.
MAT 10:6 Shin Isra7eele keethaafe gidida hini dhayida dorsatako biite.
MAT 10:7 Yaa bidi, ‘Salo kawotethay matatis’ gidi odite.
MAT 10:8 Harganchota pathite, hayqidaysata hayqope denthite, baro harganchota geeshshi pathite, tuna ayyaanata kessite. Hinte coo ekidaysa coo immite.
MAT 10:9 Hinte kiisen worqa, woyko bira santime oykofite.
MAT 10:10 Hinte ogiyas karxiito, nam7u afila, woyko caamma woyko xam7a oykofite; oosanchuwas gallasa kathi koshshees.
MAT 10:11 “Hinte issi katamaa woyko gutaa geliya wode hintena mokidi ekanaw ufaytiya uraa koyidi iya son shempite; hinte baana gakanaw yan gam7ite.
MAT 10:12 Qassi oodde sooka gelishe sarothite.
MAT 10:13 He keethay hintena mokiko hinte sarothida saroy entana gako, shin enti mokonna ixiko hinte sarothida saroy hintew guye simmo.
MAT 10:14 Oonika hintena mokonnanne hinte odiyaba si7onna ixiko he keethaafe woyko he katamaape keyishe hinte tohuwan de7iya baana pitidi keyite.
MAT 10:15 Ta hintew tuma odayis; Xoossaa pirda gallasan he katamaape Soodomesinne Gamoora katamatas pirday kawuyana.
MAT 10:16 “Ta hintena dorsatada suudhumeta giddo yeddana. Hessa gisho, shooshada cincata, holleda aadata gidite.
MAT 10:17 Asay hintena pirda daynnatas aathidi immana, qassi ayhude woosa keethan hintena garaafana. Hessa gisho, entafe naagetite.
MAT 10:18 Ta gisho gidi hintena deriya haareyisata sinthenne kawota sinthe efana. Enta sinthaninne Ayhude gidonna deriya sinthan eqidi hinte tabaa markatana.
MAT 10:19 Shin hintena pirdas aathidi immiya wode, woygidi zaarino gidi un7etofite; he saatiyan hinte gaanaba Xoossay hintew immana.
MAT 10:20 Ayis giiko, hintenan odetey hinte Aawa Geeshsha Ayyaanape attishin, hintena gideketa.
MAT 10:21 “Ishay ba isha, aaway ba na7a, hayqos aathidi immana, nayti bantana yelidaysata bolla dendidi enta wodhisana.
MAT 10:22 Ta gisho gidi asa ubbay hintena ixana, shin wursethi gakanaw minniday attana.
MAT 10:23 Issi heerape hintena enti gooddiko hara katama baqatite. Taani hintew tuma odayis; Asa Na7ay yaana gakanaw, hinte Isra7eele katama ubbaa kantheketa.
MAT 10:24 “Tamaarey ba astamaariyape, aylley ba godaape aadhenna.
MAT 10:25 Tamaarey ba astamaariya, aylley ba godaa daaniko iyaw gidana. Keetha goda Bi7eel-Zebuula giiko iya soo asaa waatidi iissidi xeegenee?
MAT 10:26 “Hiza, asas yayyofite. Kametidabay qonconna, qosetidabay geeshshi keyonna attenna.
MAT 10:27 Taani hintew dhuman odiyaba hinte poo7on odite; ta hintew haythan kalkashidaba dabaaban awaajite.
MAT 10:28 Ashope attishin, shempo wodhanaw danda7onaysatas yayyofite. Shin shempuwanne ashuwa gaannamen dhaysanaw danda7iya Xoossaas yayyite.
MAT 10:29 Nam7u buubeti issi santimen bayzetokonayee? Hanope attishin, entafe issinnaka hinte Xoossay goonna de7ishin sa7an wodhuku.
MAT 10:30 Hari attoshin, hinte huuphe binaanayka paydetidi de7ees.
MAT 10:31 Hiza, daro buubetape hinte aadhiya gisho yayyofite.
MAT 10:32 “Asa sinthan taw markatiya ubbaas taanika salon de7iya ta aawa sinthan markatana.
MAT 10:33 Shin asa sinthan tana kaddeysa taanika salon de7iya ta aawa sinthan kaddana.
MAT 10:34 “Taani sa7an saro ehanaw yida hintew daanopo. Taani toorape attishin, sarotethi ehanaw yabiike.
MAT 10:35 Taani yiday, “ ‘Na7aa aawape macca na7iw aayepe na7aa machiw azina aayepe shaakanaasa.
MAT 10:36 Asas morketi iya soo asata gidana.’
MAT 10:37 “Taape aathidi ba aawa woyko ba aayiw dosey, tabaa gidanaw bessenna. Ba adde na7a woyko ba macca na7iw taape aathidi dosey, tabaa gidanaw bessenna.
MAT 10:38 Ba masqaliya tookidi tana kaallonna oonika tabaa gidanaw bessenna.
MAT 10:39 Ba shempuwa ashshanaw koyey dhaysana, shin ba shempuwa ta gisho aathidi immey ashshana.
MAT 10:40 “Hintena mokey tana mokees, tana mokey qassi tana kiittidaysa mokees.
MAT 10:41 Nabiya nabe sunthan mokey, nabiyatho woytetana; qassi xilluwa xillo sunthan mokey, xilluwatho woytetana.
MAT 10:42 Ta hintew tuma odayis; ha ta tamaaretape guuxiya issuwas tana kaalliya gisho hari attoshin guutha irxa haathi immiko iya woytoy dhayenna” yaagis.
MAT 11:1 Yesuusi tammanne nam7u tamaareta kiitidaape guye yaape dendidi tamaarsanawunne sabbakanaw Galila katamata bis.
MAT 11:2 Yohaanisi qasho keethan de7ishe Kiristoosi oothiyabata si7idi, ba tamaaretape iyako kiittidi,
MAT 11:3 “Yaana geetetiday neneyee? Woyko nuuni haraa naagino?” yaagidi oychis.
MAT 11:4 Yesuusi entako zaaridi, “Bidi hinte si7iyabaanne hinte be7iyaba Yohaanisas odite.
MAT 11:5 Qooqeti xeelloosona, wobbeti hemetoosona, baro harganchoti paxoosona, tulleti si7oosona, hayqidaysati hayqope dendoosona; manqotas Wongelay sabbaketees.
MAT 11:6 Tanan dhubetonay anjetidaysa” yaagis.
MAT 11:7 Yohaanisa tamaareti guye simmidi bin, Yesuusi deriyas Yohaanisaba odishe, “Ha mela biitta ay be7anaw keydetii? Carkoy qaathiya mayre be7anaw yidetiyee?
MAT 11:8 Yaatin, ay be7anaw keydetii? Koyse ma7o ma7ida ase be7anaseyee? Koyse ma7o ma7ida asati kawo gadhon de7oosona.
MAT 11:9 Yaatin, ay be7anaw keydetii? Nabe be7anaseyee? Heko, hinte nabepe aadheysa be7eeta.
MAT 11:10 “Ne ogiya ne sinthan giigisiya ta kiitanchuwa neepe sinthe kiittana” geetetidi xaafetiday iyassa.
MAT 11:11 Ta hintew tuma odayis; maccasape yeletidaysata giddofe Yohaanisape aadhey oonika baawa; salo kawotethan ubbaafe guuxey I, iyape aadhana.
MAT 11:12 Xammaqiya Yohaanisa wodiyape doomidi hachi gakanaw salo kawotethay daro naaqetees, minnida asati wolqan yaa gelana.
MAT 11:13 Nabeti ubbaynne Muse higgey Yohaanisa wode gakanaw salo kawotethaaba tinbite odidosona.
MAT 11:14 Hiza, hinte enta kiitaa ammanana gidiko, yaana geetetida Eeliyaasi, I Yohaanisa.
MAT 11:15 Hiza, si7iya haythi de7ey si7o.
MAT 11:16 “Hiza, ha wodiya yeletethaa aybira daaniso? Giya giddon uttidi woli xeegidi,
MAT 11:17 “ ‘Nu hintew suusul77e punnin; hinte yexeketa. Nu sabbidi zeleelin; hinte yeekeketa’ giya nayta daanosona.
MAT 11:18 Xammaqiya Yohaanisi moonnanne uyonna yin, ‘Tuna ayyaani de7ees’ yaagideta.
MAT 11:19 Asa Na7ay mishenne uyishe yin, ‘Yarambanne ushshancho, qaraxa qanxiseysatanne nagaranchota dabbo’ yaagideta. Hiza, cincatethaa tumatethay iya oosuwan qoncees” yaagis.
MAT 11:20 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi daro malaatata oothida katamatan de7iya asati banta nagaraape simmidi maarotan gelonna ixida gisho entana,
MAT 11:21 “Korazine katamaw nena ayye! Beetesayda katamaw nena ayye! Ayis giiko, hinte giddon oosetida malaatati Xiroosaninne Sidoonan oosetida gidiyako, enti beni bido tiyetidi, kayo ma7o ma7idi banta nagarape simmi aggana.
MAT 11:22 Shin ta hintew odayis; pirda gallas hintefe aathidi Xiroosasinne Sidoonas pirday kawuyana.
MAT 11:23 Qassi, Qifirnahooma, neeni pude salo keyanaw koyay? Hanenna! Neeni Si7oolen yegetana. Ayis giiko, ne giddon oosetida malaatati Soodomen oosetidaba gidiyako, Soodomey hachi gakanaw de7anashin.
MAT 11:24 Shin ta new odayis; pirda gallas neepe aathidi Soodomes pirday kawuyana” yaagidi hanqetis.
MAT 11:25 He wode Yesuusi, “Aawaw, saluwanne sa7aa Godaw, neeni haysa eranchotapenne cincatape genthada naytas qoncisida gisho, nena galatayis.
MAT 11:26 Ee, ta Aawaw, haysi ne lo77o sheniyada hanis.
MAT 11:27 “Ubbay taw ta Aawape imetis. Aawape hari Na7a erey baawa, Na7aapenne I entaw qoncisanaw koyeysatape hari Aawa eranaw danda7ey baawa.
MAT 11:28 “Hinteno, daaburanchoto, toohoy deexida ubbay taako haa yiite; taani hintena shempisana.
MAT 11:29 Taani ta wozanan ashkenne aada gidiya gisho, ta qambaran gelite, taape tamaarite; hinte, hinte shempuwas shempo demmana.
MAT 11:30 Ta qambaray liiqo, qassi ta toohoyka kawushe” yaagis.
MAT 12:1 Hessafe guye, Sambaata gallas, Yesuusi gade giddora aadhees. Yesuusa tamaareti koshatida gisho tiya banga shirikidi moosona.
MAT 12:2 Shin Farsaaweti hessa be7idi Yesuusako, “Heko, ne tamaareti Sambaata gallas oothanaw bessonnaba oothosona” yaagidosona.
MAT 12:3 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Dawiti koshatida wode iyara de7eysatara ay oothidaako nabbabibeketii?
MAT 12:4 Dawiti Xoossaa keethi gelidi kahineta xalaalape attishin, inne iyara de7eysatas bessonna geeshsha daabbuwa mis.
MAT 12:5 Woyko kahineti Sambaata wogaa shaaridi xoossa keethan Sambaata gallas ooso oothiko entaw bala gidonnaysa Muse higgiyan nabbabibeketii?
MAT 12:6 Shin si7ite! Xoossa Keethaafe aadhey haysan de7ees.
MAT 12:7 ‘Taani hinte yarshuwa gidonashin harata maarana mela koyayis’ giya qaalay woy guuseko hinte eridaako, xillo asa bolla pirdeketa.
MAT 12:8 Asa Na7ay Sambaata Godaa” yaagis.
MAT 12:9 Yesuusi yaape bidi ayhude woosa keethi gelis.
MAT 12:10 Yan kushey gundida issi uray de7ees. Yesuusa mootanaw gaaso koyiya asati, “Sambaata gallas pathanaw bessi bessennee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAT 12:11 I entako, “Hinte giddofe issuwas dorsi Sambaata gallas aafon wulliko, goochidi kessonnay oonee?
MAT 12:12 Yaatin asi dorsaafe waanidi daro aadhenee? Hessa gisho, Sambaata gallas lo77oba oosoy bessees” yaagis.
MAT 12:13 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi addiyako, “Ne kushiya piddi ootha” yaagin, uray piddi oothis. Iya kushey paxidi hanko kushiyada hanis.
MAT 12:14 Shin Farsaaweti yaape kare keyidi, Yesuusa waati wodhaneko maqetidosona.
MAT 12:15 Yesuusi enta qofaa eridi he bessaa aggidi hara soo bis. Daro asay iya kaallidi bidosona, harganchota ubbaa pathis.
MAT 12:16 Yesuusi, “Tabaa hara oodeska odopite” yaagidi minthi odis.
MAT 12:17 Hessika nabiya Isayaasi,
MAT 12:18 “Heko ta doorida aylley, ta doseysi, tana ufayseysi, taani ta ayyaana, iya bolla shempisana; I, Ayhude gidonna deriyas suure pirdaba awaajana.
MAT 12:19 I palamenna woyko kaccenna; ba qaalaka denban coo sissenna.
MAT 12:20 Suure pirdan xoono demmana gakanaw, dincetida mayre menthenna, cuyiyaa muqaada toysenna.
MAT 12:21 Ayhude gidonna derey ubbay iyan ufaysi wothana” yaagidi xaafidaysi poletana melasa.
MAT 12:22 Hessafe guye, tuna ayyaanan oyketida qooqenne muume ase de7eysa iyako ehidosona. Yesuusi ura pathin, uray xeellis; odetis.
MAT 12:23 Asa ubbay malaaletidi, “Haysi Dawita Na7aa gidandesha?” yaagidosona.
MAT 12:24 Shin Farsaaweti hessa si7idi, “Ha uray tuna ayyaanata kessey tuna ayyaanata halaqa Bi7eel-Zebuula wolqaana” yaagidosona.
MAT 12:25 Yesuusi enta qofaa eridi, “Woli giddon shaaketiya kawotetha ubbay kundana; qassi woli giddon shaaketiya katamay woyko keethay minnidi eqenna.
MAT 12:26 Xalahey Xalahe kessiyaba gidiko ba giddon shaaketis guussu. Hessatho haniyaba gidiko iya kawotethay waanidi minnidi eqanaw danda7ii?
MAT 12:27 Taani tuna ayyaana kessey Bi7eel-Zebuula wolqan gidiko hintena kaalliya asati oodde wolqan kessannee? Hessa gisho, hintena kaalliya asati hintena pirdana.
MAT 12:28 Shin taani tuna ayyaanata kessey Xoossaa Ayyaanan gidiko, Xoossaa kawotethay hinteko yis.
MAT 12:29 “Woyko issi asi wolqaama asa soo gelidi iya shaluwa bonqanaw koyko koyrottidi he uraa qachonna ixiko waatidi danda7ii? Yaatiko iya shaluwa bonqanaw danda7ees.
MAT 12:30 “Taara gidonnay oonika taara eqetees; qassi taara issife shiishonna ubbay laallees.
MAT 12:31 Hessa gisho, si7ite; asay oothiya ay nagarinne cashsha qaali ubbay atto geetetana, shin Geeshsha Ayyaana cayiya oodeska iya nagaray atto geetetenna.
MAT 12:32 Oonika Asa Na7a bolla iitabaa odetiko iyaw atto geetetana, shin Geeshsha Ayyaana bolla iitabaa odetiya oodeska ha sa7an gidin yaana alamiyan iya nagaray atto geetetenna.
MAT 12:33 “Lo77o mithay lo77o ayfe ayfees; qassi iita mithay iita ayfees. Hiza, mithay eretey ba ayfiyana.
MAT 12:34 Hinteno, shoosha nayto, hinte iita gidishe waanidi lo77oba odetanaw danda7eetii? Asi ba wozanan kumidabaape doonan odetees.
MAT 12:35 Lo77o asi ba wozanan wothida lo77obaape, lo77oba kessees; iita asi ba wozanan wothida iitabaape, iitabaa kessees.
MAT 12:36 Shin si7ite, asay odetiya coo oda ubbaas pirda gallas zaaro immana.
MAT 12:37 Ayis giiko, ne odetiya ne qaalan xillana; ne odetiya ne qaalay ne bolla pirdana” yaagis.
MAT 12:38 Hessafe guye, issi issi Farsaawetinne higge astamaareti Yesuusako, “Astamaariyaw, neeni malaata oothada nuna bessa” yaagidosona.
MAT 12:39 Shin Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ammanetonanne iita yeletethay malaata koyees. Shin nabiya Yoonasa malaatape hara malaati iyaw imetenna.
MAT 12:40 Yoonasi gita molo ulon heedzu gallasinne heedzu qamma gam7idaysa mela Asa Na7ay heedzu gallasinne heedzu qamma biitta garsan gam7ana.
MAT 12:41 Nanawe asay pirda gallas dendidi ha yeletethaa bolla pirdana; ayis giiko, enti Yoonasi sabbakin, si7idi banta nagaraape simmidosona. Heko, Yoonasape aadheysi haysan de7ees.
MAT 12:42 Pirda gallas dugeha kawiya dendada ha yeletethaa bolla pirdana; ayis giiko, iya Solomone cincatethaa si7anaw biitta gaxape yasu. Heko, Solomonepe aadhey haysan de7ees.
MAT 12:43 “Tuna ayyaanay asape keydaape guye baw shempiya bessi koyidi haathi bayna mela bessan daaburees, shin ba koyiya shempuwa demmenna.
MAT 12:44 Yaanin, ‘Ta agga keyida keetha simmada baana’ yaagees. I simmiya wode keethay kaysi gideysanne pitetidi giigidi uttidaysa demmees.
MAT 12:45 Hiza, simmi bidi, baape iitiya hara laapun iita ayyaanata ekidi yees; entika uraa giddo gelidi de7oosona. He uraas kaseysafe guyeysi daro iitees. Ha iita yeletethaa bolla hessa mela hanana” yaagis.
MAT 12:46 Yesuusi deriyas oda bolla de7ishin iya aayanne iya ishati iya odisanaw koyidi karen eqidosona.
MAT 12:47 Issi asi iyako, “Ne aayanne ne ishati nena odisanaw koyidi karen eqidosona” yaagis.
MAT 12:48 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ta aayiya oonee? Ta ishatika oonantee?” yaagis.
MAT 12:49 Ba kushiyara tamaareta mallishe, “Be7ite, ta aayanne ta ishati haysata.
MAT 12:50 Salon de7iya ta Aawa sheniya oothiya ubbay ta isha, ta michonne ta aayo” yaagis.
MAT 13:1 He gallas Yesuusi soope keyidi abba gaxan uttis.
MAT 13:2 Daro derey iya yuushuwan shiiqin asaa abba gaxan aggaagidi wogolon gelidi uttis.
MAT 13:3 Asaas darobaa leemison yaagidi odis: “Issi goshshanchoy zerethi zeranaw keyis.
MAT 13:4 I zeriya wode issi issi zerethati oge gaxan wodhidosona; entaka kafoti yidi maxi midosona.
MAT 13:5 Issi issi zerethati garsan shaalloy de7iya biitta bolla wodhidosona. Daro biitti bayna gisho ellesidi dolis.
MAT 13:6 Shin away keyin shullis; xaphoy bayna gisho melis.
MAT 13:7 Issi issi zerethay aguntha giddon wodhis; agunthay diccidi he dolaa cuullis.
MAT 13:8 Harati qassi aradda biitta bolla wodhis; dolidi ayfe ayfis. Issoy xeeta, issoy usupun tamma, issoy qassi hastama ayfis.
MAT 13:9 Si7iya haythi de7iya uray si7o” yaagis.
MAT 13:10 Yesuusa tamaareti iyako shiiqidi, “Ayis neeni deriyas leemison oday?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAT 13:11 I zaaridi, “Hintew salo kawotethaa xuuraa eray imetis, shin entaw imetibeenna.
MAT 13:12 De7iya ubbaas guzhetana, iyaw darana, shin baynaysafe hari attoshin iyaw de7iyaraka eketana.
MAT 13:13 Hessa gisho, taani enti, xeellishe demmonna mela, si7ishe si7onna mela woyko akeekona mela entaw leemison odayis.
MAT 13:14 “Isayaasi ba maxaafan odidaysi enta bolla poletis. I odishe, “ ‘Hinte sissi si7eeta, shin akeekeketa; hinte xeelleta, shin be7eketa.
MAT 13:15 Ayis giiko, ha asaa wozanay zel7umis; banta haythaa erishe tullisidosona, banta ayfiya goozidosona. Hessi bayneko enti banta ayfiyan be7idi, banta haythan si7idi, banta wozanan akeekidi, taako simmana, taka enta pathanashin’ yaagis.
MAT 13:16 “Shin hinte ayfeti be7iya gishonne hinte haythati si7iya gisho hinte anjetidaysata.
MAT 13:17 Ta hintew tuma odayis; daro nabetinne xilloti hinte be7eysa be7anawunne hinte si7eysa si7anaw amotidosona, shin entaw hanibeenna.
MAT 13:18 “Hiza, ha zerethi zeriya uraa leemisuwa si7ite.
MAT 13:19 Oge gaxan wodhida zerethi leemisoy haysa: salo kawotethaa qaala si7idi akeekona uraa wozanape Xalahey yidi iya wozanan de7iya zeretha maxi diggees.
MAT 13:20 Shaalloy garsan de7iya biitta bolla zeretidaysi qaala si7idi ellesidi ufaysan ekeyisata.
MAT 13:21 Shin xapho yeddanaw danda7onna gisho daro gam7okona. Qaala gaason metoy woyko goodetethi yaa wode ellesi dhubetoosona.
MAT 13:22 Aguntha gaathan zeretidaysi qaala si7is, shin ha alamiya duussaa Hirgaynne duretetha qofay qaala cuulliya gisho ayfe ayfonna attees.
MAT 13:23 Shin aradda biittan zeretida zerethay akeekan qaala si7iya uraa. I ayfe ayfees; issoy xeeta, issoy usupun tamma issoy qassi hastama ayfees” yaagis.
MAT 13:24 Yesuusi entaw hara leemiso odis, “Xoossaa kawotethay ba goshshan lo77o zerethi zerida uraa daanees.
MAT 13:25 Shin asi ubbay dhiskin iya morkey yidi gistiya giddon leeshsho zeridi bis.
MAT 13:26 Gistey diccidi ayfiya wode leeshshoy iya giddon bentis.
MAT 13:27 “Gadiya godaa aylleti godaako bidi, ‘Godaw, ne goshshan ne lo77o zerethi zerabikisho? Yaatin, leeshshoy awupe yidee?’ yaagidosona.
MAT 13:28 “I entako, ‘Hessa morkey oothis’ yaagis. “Aylleti godaako, ‘Nu bidi leeshuwa shoddana mela koyay?’ yaagidosona.
MAT 13:29 “Shin I, ‘Atto bochofite; hinte leeshuwa shoddayis gishin gistey shodetana.
MAT 13:30 Bochofite; caka wodey gakanaw issife dicco. He wode cakiya asata leeshuwa sinthatidi maxidi taman xuugganaw mirqen mirqen qachite. Shin gistiya shiishidi ta shaaliyan qolite’ yaagana” yaagis.
MAT 13:31 Qassi hara leemiso yaagidi odis; “Salo kawotethay issi asi ba goshshan bakida guutha mithee ayfe daanees.
MAT 13:32 He mithee ayfey hara mitha ayfetape guutha, shin iya dolaa diccida hara mithata ubbaafe aadhada gitatawusu. I tashiyan kafoti keexidi uttana gakanaw wolqaama mithi gidawusu” yaagis.
MAT 13:33 Kaallidika, Yesuusi hara leemiso odis; “Salo kawotethay issi maccasi heedzu gabate dhiille eka munuqada, munuqay dendana mela iyan gujida irsho daanees” yaagis.
MAT 13:34 Yesuusi deriyas he leemisuwa ubbaa odis. Leemisoy bayna issibaaka odibeenna.
MAT 13:35 Nabey ba maxaafan, “Taani ta doona, leemison dooyana; saloynne sa7i medhetoosape, geemmidaysa odayis” yaagidi odidaysi hessan poletis.
MAT 13:36 Yesuusi deriya moyzidi soo gelis. Iya tamaareti iyako shiiqidi, “Goshshan de7iya leeshuwa birshethaa nuus oda” yaagidosona.
MAT 13:37 I zaaridi, “Lo77o zerethi zeriday Asa Na7a.
MAT 13:38 Goshshay ha alamiya. Lo77o zerethay salo kawotethaa nayta. Leeshshoy Xalahe nayta.
MAT 13:39 Leeshuwa zeriday morkiya Xalahe. Caka wodey, wode wursethi; cakeysati kiitanchota.
MAT 13:40 “Leeshshoy maxetidi taman xuugeteysa mela wodiya wursethan hessada hanana.
MAT 13:41 Asa Na7ay ba kiitanchota kiittana. Enti nagaras gaaso gideysatanne iita oothiya ubbaa maxidi iya kawotethaafe kessana.
MAT 13:42 Maxi shiishidi yeehoynne acha garcethi de7iya to7onna taman yeggana.
MAT 13:43 He wode xilloti banta Aawa kawotethan awada poo7ana. Si7iya haythi de7ey si7o!
MAT 13:44 “Xoossaa kawotethay goshshan moogetida miishe daanees. Issi asi he miishiya demmidi zaari moogis. Daro ufaytidi bidi baw de7iyaba ubbaa bayzidi he goshsha gadiya shammis.
MAT 13:45 “Hessadaka, qassi salo kawotethay inqu geetetiya al7o shuchata koyiya zal7ancho daanees.
MAT 13:46 Daro al7o inquwa demmidi bidi baw de7iyaba ubbaa bayzidi iya shammis.
MAT 13:47 “Qassi Xoossaa kawotethay abban yegetida dumma dumma qommo molo oykiya gitiya daanees.
MAT 13:48 Molo oykiya asati moloy gitiyan kumin abbaafe gaxa kessidosona. Yan uttidi lo77uwa qori qori daachon yeggidosona, shin iita molota wora holidosona.
MAT 13:49 Wodiya wursethan hessatho hanana. Kiitanchoti yidi nagaranchota xillotape shaakidi,
MAT 13:50 yeehoynne acha garcethi de7iya to7onna taman yeggana.
MAT 13:51 “Ha ubbay hintew gelidee?” yaagidi enta oychis. Enti zaaridi, “Ee” yaagidosona.
MAT 13:52 Yesuusi, “Hiza, salo kawotethaa eraa ekidi higgiya tamaarsiya ubbay, ba minjida shaluwape oorathaanne gal7a kessiya ase daanees” yaagis.
MAT 13:53 Yesuusi ha leemisuwa odi wursidaape guye yaape dendidi bis.
MAT 13:54 Ba yeletida biitta bidi ayhude woosa keethan deriya tamaarsis. Enti malaaletidi, “Ha uray ha cincatethaanne ha malaatata oothiya wolqaa awupe ekidee?
MAT 13:55 Haysi anaaxiya na7aa gidenneyee? Iya aaye sunthay Mayraamo gidennee? Iya ishati Yayqooba, Yoosefa, Simoonanne Yihuda gidokonaayee?
MAT 13:56 Iya micheti nuura de7oosona gidokona? Yaatin, ha uray ha ubbaa awupe ekidee?” yaagidosona.
MAT 13:57 Hessa gisho, I giyaba ekonna ixidosona. Shin Yesuusi, “Nabey ba yeletida biittaninne ba soo asaa matan bonchetenna” yaagis.
MAT 13:58 Enti ammanonna ixida gisho daro malaatata he bessan oothibeenna.
MAT 14:1 He wode Galila aysiya Herodiisi Yesuusaba si7is.
MAT 14:2 Ba aylletako, “Haysi Xammaqiya Yohaanisa; I hayqope dendis. Yaanida gisho, ha ubbaa malaatata I oothees” yaagis.
MAT 14:3 I hessa giday Herodiisi ba ishaa Filphoosa mache Herodiyadi gaason Yohaanisa qasho keethi gelsida gishosa.
MAT 14:4 Yohaanisi Herodiisa, “Ne iyo ekanaw woga gidenna” yaagis.
MAT 14:5 Herodiisi Yohaanisa wodhanaw koyis, shin derey Yohaanisa nabe oothidi be7iya gisho yashetis.
MAT 14:6 Herodiisi ba yeletida gallasa bonchiya wode, Herodiyada na7iya asaa sinthan yethan durada iya ufaysasu.
MAT 14:7 Yaatin, I, “Iya koyaba ubbaa immana gidi” caaqis.
MAT 14:8 Na7iya ba aaye zoriya si7ada Herodiisako, “Xammaqiya Yohaanisa huuphiya keren wothada taw imma” yaagasu.
MAT 14:9 Iya yaagin kawoy qiirotis, shin ba caaquwa gishonne baara de7iya imathata gisho gidi I oyshay poletana mela kiittis.
MAT 14:10 Kawoy ase kiittidi Yohaanisi qasho keethan de7ishin iya qoodhiya gora7isis.
MAT 14:11 Huuphiya keren wothi ehidi na7ees immidosona; na7iyaka ekada ba aayes efasu.
MAT 14:12 Yohaanisa tamaareti yidi iya aha efidi moogidosona. Iyape guye hanidaba ubbaa bidi Yesuusas odidosona.
MAT 14:13 Yesuusi hanidaba si7ida wode wogolon gelidi he bessaafe issi geemmiya soo barka bis. Asay hessa si7idi katamatape dendidi tohon iya kaallidosona.
MAT 14:14 Yesuusi wogoluwape wodhidi daro asaa be7idi entaw qadhetis. Enta giddon de7iya harganchota pathis.
MAT 14:15 Sa7ay omarsishe biya wode Yesuusa tamaareti iyako shiiqidi, “Ha bessay asi bayna bessi, sa7ika qammis. Yaaniya gisho, heeran de7iya gutata bidi bantaw shammidi maana mela deriya yedda” yaagidosona.
MAT 14:16 Shin Yesuusi entako, “Derey moonna baanaw koshshenna; enti maanaba hinte immite” yaagis.
MAT 14:17 Enti zaaridi, “Nuus haysan ichashu uythaafenne nam7u molope hari baawa” yaagidosona.
MAT 14:18 Ika, “Ane enta haa ehite” yaagis.
MAT 14:19 Kaallidika, derey maatan uttana mela odis. Ichashu uythaanne nam7u molota ekidi, salo xeellidi galati simmidi, uythaa menthidi ba tamaaretas immis; enti qassi deriyas immidosona.
MAT 14:20 Ubbay midi kallidosona. Yesuusa tamaareti mishin attidaysa tammanne nam7u gayta denthidosona.
MAT 14:21 Kathaa mida asay maccasaynne nayti attishin, ichashu mukulu gidees.
MAT 14:22 Yesuusi ba tamaareti wogolon gelidi baape sinthatidi abbaafe he pinthi pinnana mela kiittidi baw deriya moyzanaw guye attis.
MAT 14:23 Deriya moyzi simmidi barka woossanaw issi zuma bolla keyis. Sa7ay qamminka I barka yan gam7is.
MAT 14:24 He wode wogoloy abba bolla bishin sintha baggara carkoy dendin hobbey wogoluwa un7ethis.
MAT 14:25 Wontimaatha bolla Yesuusi abba bolla hemetishe ba tamaaretako yis.
MAT 14:26 Iya tamaareti, I abba bolla hemetishe bantako yeysa be7idi yayyidosona. Entika, “Haysi moytille” gidi yayyidi waassidosona.
MAT 14:27 Shin Yesuusi ellessidi, “Aykoy baawa! Yayyofite! Tanabay” yaagis.
MAT 14:28 Phexroosi iyako, “Godaw, nena gidiko, taani haatha bollara hemetada neeko baana mela tana kiitta” yaagis.
MAT 14:29 Yesuusi Phexroosako, “Haaya” yaagis. Phexroosi wogoluwape wodhidi haatha bollara hemetishe Yesuusako buussu oykis.
MAT 14:30 Shin wolqaama carkuwa be7idi yayyis. Haathan mitetethi oykida wode, “Godaw! tana ashsharki!” yaagidi waassis.
MAT 14:31 Yesuusi ellesidi ba kushiya yeddi iya oykidi, “Neno, ammanoy pacidayso ayis sidhay” yaagis.
MAT 14:32 Yesuusaranne Phexroosara wogoluwan gelida wode carkoy si77i gis.
MAT 14:33 Wogoluwa giddon de7iya iya tamaareti, “Neeni tumaka Xoossa Na7a” gidi goyinnidosona.
MAT 14:34 Enti abba pinnidi Gensareexe biitta gakidosona.
MAT 14:35 He biittan de7iya asay Yesuusa erida wode banta heeran de7iya guta ubba kiita yeddidosona. Asay harganchota ubbaa iyako ehidosona.
MAT 14:36 Harganchoti iya afila macaraa xalaala bochana mela woossidosona. Bochida ubbayka paxidosona.
MAT 15:1 Hessafe guye, issi issi Farsaawetinne higge astamaareti Yerusalaamepe Yesuusako yidi,
MAT 15:2 “Ne tamaareti ayis nu aawata wogaa menthona? Enti kathi maanape sinthe banta kushiya meecetokona” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAT 15:3 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Hinte, hinte wogaa gisho, Xoossaa kiitaa poleysa ayis ixeetii?
MAT 15:4 Ayis giiko, Xoossay, ‘Ne aawanne ne aayiw boncha. I ba aawa woyko ba aayiw cayeysi hayqo gibeennee?’ yaagis.
MAT 15:5 Shin hinte, issi asi ba aawa woyko ba aayiw maaddanabay de7ishin, ‘Haysa ta Xoossas yarshas giiko,
MAT 15:6 ba aawa woyko ba aayiw bonchanaw bessenna’ yaageeta. Yaatidi hinte, hinte wogaa polanaw Xoossaa qaala mentheta.
MAT 15:7 Hinteno, cubboto, Isayaasi hintebaa like odis,
MAT 15:8 “ ‘Ha asay tana banta doonan bonchees, shin enta wozanay taape haahon de7ees.
MAT 15:9 Asay tana coo goyinnoosona; enti asi medhida kiitaa Xoossaa higge daanisidi tamaarsoosona’ gis” yaagis.
MAT 15:10 Yesuusi daro asaa baako xeegidi, “Si7ite! Akeekite!
MAT 15:11 Ase tunisiyabay doonara geliyaba gidonashin doonape keyaaba” yaagis.
MAT 15:12 Hessafe guye, Yesuusa tamaareti iyako yidi, “Farsaaweti neeni gidaysa si7idi dhubetidaysa akeekay?” yaagidosona.
MAT 15:13 Shin Yesuusi zaaridi, “Salon de7iya ta aaway tokiboonna mithi ubbay shodetana.
MAT 15:14 Entaba Hirgofite; enti qooqe kaalethiya qooqeta. Qooqey qooqe kaalethiko, nam7ayka ollan kundana” yaagis.
MAT 15:15 Phexroosi zaaridi, “Ha leemisuwa birshethaa nuus odarkii” yaagis.
MAT 15:16 Yesuusi entako, “Hintewuka ha77i gakanaw gelibeennee?
MAT 15:17 Doonara geliyaba ubbay ulo gelidi kare keyeysa ereketii?
MAT 15:18 Shin doonara keyaabay wozanape keyees. Ase tunisiyabati hessata.
MAT 15:19 Entika:- asa wozana giddofe keyiya iita qofa, wodho, laymatethi, iita ooso, kayso, wordo markatethi, cashshe.
MAT 15:20 Hessa daaniyabati ase tuniseesipe attishin, meecetonna kushera meysi tunisenna” yaagis.
MAT 15:21 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi yaape keyidi Xiroosanne Sidoona katamati de7iya biitta bis.
MAT 15:22 Issi Kanaane biitta maccas Yesuusako yada, ba qaala dhoqu oothada, “Godaw, Dawita na7aw, taw qadhetarki; ta na7iw tuna ayyaanay oykidi iita waaysees” yaagasu.
MAT 15:23 Shin Yesuusi issi qaalaka zaaronna si77i gis. Yesuusa tamaareti iyako yidi, “Ha maccasiya nu geedo kaalla kaallada, woossawusu. Hessa gisho, neeni iyo moyzarki” yaagidi woossidosona.
MAT 15:24 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani wudepe dhayida dorsada Isra7eele keethaafe dhayida asata xalaalas kiitetas” yaagis.
MAT 15:25 Shin iya, iya sinthan kundada, “Godaw, tana maaddarkii?” yaagasu.
MAT 15:26 I zaaridi, “Nayta kathi ekidi kanatas yeggeysi lo77o gidenna” yaagis.
MAT 15:27 Maccasiyaka, “Godaw, hessi tuma, shin hari attoshin kanati banta godati mishin, gaytape wodhiya tiifiya moosona” yaagasu.
MAT 15:28 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ha maccasete, ne ammanoy gita; ne koydaysada new hano” yaagis. I na7iya iiraka paxa aggasu.
MAT 15:29 Yesuusi yaape dendidi Galila Abbaa mati bis. Issi zuma bolla keyidi, yan uttis.
MAT 15:30 Daro asay bantara, wobbeta, qooqeta, kuunata, doona muumetanne, hara daro harganchota ekidi, iyako ehidi iya sinthan wothidosona. Yesuusi entana pathis.
MAT 15:31 Hessa gisho, muumeti odetishin, kuunati piddi gishin, wobbeti hemetishin, qooqeti xeellishin asay be7idi malaaletidi, Isra7eele Xoossaa galatidosona.
MAT 15:32 Yesuusi ba tamaareta baako xeegidi, “Ha daro asay taara heedzu gallas gam7ida gishonne entaw ha77i miyabay bayna gisho taani entaw qadhetayis. Enti ogen daaburidi kundonna mela ayko muzonna enta mela yeddanaw koyke” yaagis.
MAT 15:33 Iya tamaareti zaaridi, “Nuuni ha bazzuwan haysa keena asaas gidiya kathi awupe demmanee?” yaagidosona.
MAT 15:34 Yesuusi entako, “Hintew aapun uythi de7ii?” yaagidi oychis. Enti zaaridi, “Laapun uythinne laafa molotape guuthi de7ees” yaagidosona.
MAT 15:35 Yesuusi deriya sa7an uttite yaagidi kiittis.
MAT 15:36 Hessafe guye, he laapun uythaanne moluwa ekidi Xoossaa galatis. Menthidi ba tamaaretas immis. Iya tamaareti daro asaas gishidosona.
MAT 15:37 Asa ubbay midi kallidosona. Iya tamaareti, mishin attida tiifiya laapun gita gayta kumethi denthidosona.
MAT 15:38 Mida asay maccasinne na7a paydonna adde xalaali oyddu mukulu.
MAT 15:39 Yesuusi deriya yeddidaape guye wogoluwan gelidi Magedoona biitta bis.
MAT 16:1 Farsaawetinne Saduqaaweti Yesuusako yidosona. Iya paacanaw koyidi, bantana salope malaata besso gidi oychidosona.
MAT 16:2 Shin I entako, “Sa7i omarsiya wode, ‘Saloy zo77ida gisho wonto booqallana’ yaageeta.
MAT 16:3 Wontiya wode, ‘Saloy zo77idi shaaratida gisho iri bukana’ yaageeta. Yaatin hinte salo mallaa be7idi ereeta, shin wodiya malla eranaw danda7ibeeketa.
MAT 16:4 Iitanne ammanonna yeletethay malaata koyees. Shin iyaw Yoonasa malaatape hara malaati imetenna” yaagis. Hessafe guye, entana yan aggidi hara soo bis.
MAT 16:5 Enti abbaafe hefinthi pinnida wode daabbo ekidi yaanaysa dogidosona.
MAT 16:6 Yesuusi entako, “Farsaawetapenne Saduqaaweta irshuwafe naagetite” yaagis.
MAT 16:7 Entika banta garsan, “I hessa giday nu daabbo ekidi yoonna gishosa gidana” yaagidosona.
MAT 16:8 Yesuus enta qofaa eridi, “Hinteno, ammanoy pacidaysato! Daabbo ekonna yida gisho woli giddon ayis odeteetii?
MAT 16:9 Ha77ika hinte akeeketii? Ichashu mukulu asaas ichashu uythaa gishidaysanne enti midi kallin hinte aapun gayta kumethi denthidaako dogidetii?
MAT 16:10 Hessadaka, laapun uythaa oyddu mukulu asaas gishidaysanne enti midi kallin, hinte aapun gita gayta kumethi denthidaako akeekeketii?
MAT 16:11 Hiza, taani Farsaawetanne Saduqaaweta irshuwafe naagetite gada odeysi daabboba gidonnaysa akeekeketii?” yaagis.
MAT 16:12 Yaatin, iya tamaareti Yesuusi odey munuqa denthanaw yegetiya irshoba gidonashin Farsaawetanne Saduqaaweta timirtiyafe naagetanaysa gideysa akeekidosona.
MAT 16:13 Yesuusi Qisaare Filphoosa biitta gakida wode ba tamaaretako, “Asay, Asa Na7aa oona goonna?” yaagidi oychis.
MAT 16:14 Entika, “Issoti issoti Xammaqiya Yohaanisa, harati Eeliyaasa qassi hankoti Ermiyaasa woyko nabetape issuwa goosona” yaagidosona.
MAT 16:15 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Yaatin, hinte tana oona geetii?” gidi enta oychis.
MAT 16:16 Simoona Phexroosi zaaridi, “Neeni Kiristoosa, de7o Xoossaa na7a” yaagis.
MAT 16:17 Yesuusi Phexroosako, “Yoona na7aa Simoona, neeni anjetidaysa! Haysa new qoncisiday saluwan de7iya ta aawape attishin, ase gidenna.
MAT 16:18 Ta new odayis Phexroosa, neeni zaalla! Taani ha zaalla bolla ta woosa keethaa keexana. Hayqo wolqatika iyo xoonokona.
MAT 16:19 Salo kawotethaa qulpeta ta new immana. Sa7an neeni diggiyabay ubbay salon Xoossaa matan digetidaba gidana. Sa7an neeni hano giyabay ubbay salon Xoossaa matan hanidaba gidana” yaagis.
MAT 16:20 Hessafe guye, I, Kiristoosa gideysa oodeska odonna mela ba tamaareta minthidi kiittis.
MAT 16:21 He wodiyape doomidi Yesuusi ba tamaaretas, “Taani Yerusalaame baanaw bessees. Yan deriya cimatan, kahine halaqatanne higge astamaareta kushen waaye ekanaw bessees. Enti tana wodhana, shin taani heedzantho gallas hayqope dendana” yaagidi qoncisis.
MAT 16:22 Phexroosi Yesuusa gaxa kessidi, “Godaw, hessi hanenna! Hessa melabay nena ubbaraka gakofo!” yaagidi hanqetis.
MAT 16:23 Yesuusi Phexroosako guye simmidi, “Ha Xalahiyaw, taape haaka! Neeni asa qofa qopaasape attishin, Xoossaa qofa qoponna gisho taw dhube gidaasa” yaagis.
MAT 16:24 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Oonika tana kaallanaw koyaba gidiko bana kaddo, ba masqaliya tookidi tana kaallo.
MAT 16:25 Ba de7uwa ashshanaw koyiya ubbay dhaysees. Shin ba de7uwa ta gisho gidi aathidi immeysi ashshees.
MAT 16:26 Asi alame kumethi baw oothidi, gidoshin ba shempuwa dhaysiko iya ay maaddii? Woyko asi ba shempuwa laame ay immanaw danda7ii?
MAT 16:27 Asa na7ay ba aawa bonchuwan ba kiitanchotara yaana. He wode issi issi uraas iya oosuwada immana.
MAT 16:28 Ta tuma odayis; haysan eqida asatape Asa Na7ay kawo gididi simmeysa be7ana gakanaw hayqonnaysati haysan de7oosona” yaagis.
MAT 17:1 Usupun gallasape guye Yesuusi, Phexroosa, Yayqoobanne iya ishaa Yohaanisa baara ekidi bantarka gidanaw zuma bolla keyis.
MAT 17:2 Yan enta sinthan Yesuusa malay kumethi laametis; iya som7oyka awada xolqis. Iya ma7oyka daro booxis.
MAT 17:3 Heko, Museynne Eeliyaasi iyara odetishin be7idosona.
MAT 17:4 Phexroosi Yesuusako, “Nuuni haysa hashshu yida. Ne koyko issino new, issino Muses, issino Eeliyaasas haysan heedzu shaqara shaqarana” yaagis.
MAT 17:5 Phexroosi hessa buroo odishin bootha shaaray entana kammis. Shaara giddora, “Tana ufaysiya, ta dosiya na7ay haysa, iya si7ite!” giya qaalay yis.
MAT 17:6 Yesuusa tamaareti hessa si7ida wode dagammidi banta som7uwara sa7an kundidosona.
MAT 17:7 Shin Yesuusi entako shiiqidi enta bochidi, “Dendite, yayyofite!” yaagis.
MAT 17:8 Enti dhoqu gidi be7iya wode Yesuusape hara oonaka be7ibookona.
MAT 17:9 Enti zumaa bollafe wodhishin Yesuusi entako, “Asa Na7ay hayqope dendana gakanaw ha hinte be7idaba oodeska odopite” gidi kiittis.
MAT 17:10 Yesuusa tamaareti, “Yaatin, higge astamaareti Eeliyaasi Kiristoosape kasetidi yaana giday aybisee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAT 17:11 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ee! Eeliyaasi kaseti yidi ubbaba giigisana.
MAT 17:12 Shin ta hintew tuma odayis; Eeliyaasi kasetidi yis. Entika iya bolla koydaba oothidosonape attishin, iya shaaki eribookona. Hessada Asa Na7ay enta kushen waayetana” yaagis.
MAT 17:13 He wode Yesuusi giday Xammaqiya Yohaanisaba gideysa akeekidosona.
MAT 17:14 Enti deriyape asaako simmiya wode issi asi Yesuusa sinthan gulbatidi,
MAT 17:15 “Godaw, hayyana ta na7aas qadhetarki; iya shocidi yeggiya hargey daro un7ethidi tamaninne haathan yeggees.
MAT 17:16 Ne tamaaretako ehas, shin enti pathanaw danda7ibookona” yaagis.
MAT 17:17 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Hinteno, ammanonna geella yeletethaw awude gakanaw ta hintera daanee? Awude gakanaw ta hintena danda7anee? Ane na7aa haa eki yiite” yaagis.
MAT 17:18 Yesuusi tuna ayyaana hanqin, tuna ayyaanay na7aape keyis; he saatenka na7ay paxis.
MAT 17:19 Hessafe guye, Yesuusa tamaareti bantarka iyako shiiqidi, “Nuuni tuna ayyaana kessanaw danda7iboonay aybisee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAT 17:20 I entako, “Hintew ammanoy laafida gishosa. Ta hintew tuma odayis; gaashe ayfe mela ammanoy hintew de7iko ‘Ha zumaa haysafe dendada gede aadha’ giiko hintew kiitetana. Hintew danda7etonabay deenna.
MAT 17:21 [Shin hessa melay woosapenne xoomape attishin, haran keyenna”] yaagis.
MAT 17:22 Yesuusa tamaareti Galilan shiiqidi de7ishin Yesuusi entako, “Asa Na7i asa kushen aadhidi imetana.
MAT 17:23 Enti iya wodhana, shin I heedzantho gallas hayqope dendana” yaagis. Iya tamaaretika daro qiirotidosona.
MAT 17:24 Yesuusaranne iya tamaaretara Qifirnahooma katama gakida wode Xoossa Keetha giira qanxiseysati Phexroosako yidi, “Hinte astamaarey Xoossa Keetha giira giirii?” yaagidi oychidosona.
