MAT 17:25 Phexroosi zaaridi, “Giirees” yaagis. Phexroosi soo geliya wode Yesuusi kasetidi, “Phexroosa, new ay daanii? Ha sa7aa kawotethati qaraxanne giira oope ekona? Gade asapeye woyko asa gade asapee?” yaagidi oychis.
MAT 17:26 Phexroosi “Asa gade asape” gidi zaaris. Yesuusi zaaridi, “Gade asay giira giirokona guussu.
MAT 17:27 Shin enti dhubetonna mela abba bada molo oykanaw manxaqo yegga. Koyro ne oykiya moluwa doona dooyada giiras gidiya miishe ne gishonne ta gisho efada giira” yaagis.
MAT 18:1 He wode Yesuusa tamaareti yidi, “Salo kawotethan ubbaafe aadhey oonee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAT 18:2 Yesuusi issi guutha na7a xeegidi enta giddon essidi haysada yaagis.
MAT 18:3 “Taani hintew tuma odayis; hinte laametonnanne guutha naytada hanonna ixiko salo kawotethaa ubbaraka gelanaw danda7eketa.
MAT 18:4 Hiza, ha guutha na7ada bana kawushiya oonika salo kawotethan ubbaafe aadheysa gidana.
MAT 18:5 Haysa mela na7a ta sunthan mokiya oonika tana mokees.
MAT 18:6 “Shin tanan ammaniya ha guuthatape issuwa nagara oothana mela dhube gidiya oonika gita gaacha woxa ba qoodhen qachidi ciimmo abban mitetiko iyaw lo77o.
MAT 18:7 Alamen asay nagara oothana mela oothiyabati de7iya gisho alamiya ayye! Hessa melabati yoonna attenna, shin dhubey iya gaason yaa uraa ayye!
MAT 18:8 “Ne kushey woyko ne tohoy nena balethiko neepe qanxa yegga. Neeni nam7u kushera woyko nam7u tohora merinaa taman yegetanaape kushe woyko toho duuxa gidada merinaa de7o demmeysi new lo77o.
MAT 18:9 Qassi ne ayfey nena balethiko iyo wooca kessada wora hola. Neeni nam7u ayfera gaanname taman yegeteysafe issi ayfera merinaa de7uwa geleysi new lo77o.
MAT 18:10 “Ta hintew odayis; salon de7iya enta naagiya kiitanchoti ubba wode salon de7iya ta Aawa sinthan de7iya gisho, hinte ha guuthatape issuwaka kadhonna mela naagetite.
MAT 18:11 Asa Na7ay dhaydaysata ashshanaw yis” yaagis.
MAT 18:12 Qassi Yesuusi, “Hintew ay daanii? Issi uraas xeetu dorsati de7eysatape issoy dhayiko uddufun tammanne uddufunata deriya bolla yeggi aggidi he dhayidaysa koyanaw beennee?
MAT 18:13 Ta tuma odayis; I demmida wode uddufun tammanne uddufunatape aathidi dhayidi bentida issi dorsa gisho ufaytees.
MAT 18:14 Hessadaka, salon de7iya hinte aaway ha guuthatape issoy dhayana mela koyenna.
MAT 18:15 “Ne ishay nena qohiko nerka iyako bada iya qohuwa iyaw oda. I nena si7iko iya new isha ootha.
MAT 18:16 Shin I nena si7onna ixiko, nam7u woyko heedzu asa markan mootoy lasetiya gisho, issi woyko nam7u asi ekada iyako ba.
MAT 18:17 I entana si7onna ixiko, woosa keethas oda. Woosa keethi giyaba si7onna ixiko ammanonna asada woyko qaraxa qanxisiya asada iya payda.
MAT 18:18 “Ta hintew tuma odayis; sa7an hinte diggiyabati ubbay salon Xoossaa matan digetidaba gidana. Sa7an hinte hano giyabati ubbay salon Xoossa matan hanidaba gidana.
MAT 18:19 “Qassika ta hintew odayis; sa7an hintefe nam7ay banta woossiyabas issi wozanan gididi Xoossaa woossiyaba gidiko salon de7iya ta Aaway hintew oothana.
MAT 18:20 Tana kaalleysatape nam7a woyko heedza gididi shiiqiya bessan taani enta giddon bentana” yaagis.
MAT 18:21 He wode Phexroosi Yesuusako yidi, “Godaw, ta ishay tana qohiko aapun toho taani atto gaanaw bessii? Laapun toho gakanaaseyee?” gidi oychis.
MAT 18:22 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Gidenna, laapun tammu toho laapunape attishin, laapun toho gidenna.
MAT 18:23 “Hessa gisho, Xoossaa kawotethay ba oosanchotara ba miishey pacidaakonne palahidaako be7anaw qopida kawa daanees.
MAT 18:24 He kawoy miishey pacidaakonne palahidaako be7iya wode daro gindiginda acoy de7iya issi uraa iyako ehidosona.
MAT 18:25 Shin he aylley acuwa qanxanaw xoonetin iyara, iya machera, iya naytinne iyaw de7iyabay ubbay bayzetidi acoy cigetana mela iya goday kiittis.
MAT 18:26 Yaatin aylley ba godaa tohuwa bolla gulbatidi, ‘Ta godaw, hayyana guutha wode takarki, ta acuwa ubbaa ta ciggana’ yaagidi woossis.
MAT 18:27 Kawoy iyaw qadhetidi, yeddi aggis; iya acuwa maaris.
MAT 18:28 “Shin he aylley keyi bidi ba lagge oosanchotape issoy baape daro guutha miishe tal7idaysa, ‘Ne bolla de7iya ta miishiya taw cigga’ gidi qoodhe oykis.
MAT 18:29 “He iya lagee aylley iya sinthan gulbatidi, ‘Hayyana guutha wode takarki taani ta acuwa ubbaa ciggana’ yaagidi woossis.
MAT 18:30 “Shin ixidi eki efidi ba laggey acuwa qanxana gakanaw qasho keethi gelsis.
MAT 18:31 Hessa gisho, hara lagge oosanchoti hessa be7ida wode daro yilotidi, bidi banta godaas I oothidaba ubbaa odidosona.
MAT 18:32 “Yaatin kawoy he aylliya xeegisidi, ‘Ha iita aylliyaw, neeni tana woossida gisho, ta ne acuwa ubbaa new maaras.
MAT 18:33 Yaatin, taani ne acuwa maaridaysada neeni ne lagge aylliya acuwa maaranaw new bessennee?’ yaagis.
MAT 18:34 Hessa gisho, kawoy daro yilotidi, I ba acuwa ubbaa ciggana gakanaw paxa kaa7etana mela qasho keethan yeggis.
MAT 18:35 “Hessadaka, hinte issoy issoy hinte ishaa wozanape maaronna ixiko salon de7iya ta Aaway hintena hessada oothana” yaagis.
MAT 19:1 Yesuusi hessa odi ongidaape guye, Galilape dendidi Yordaanose Shaafape hefinthan de7iya Yihuda biitta bis.
MAT 19:2 Daro asay iya kaallidi bin enta giddofe harganchota pathis.
MAT 19:3 Farsaaweti iya paacanaw koyidi iyako yidi, “Issi asi ay gaasonka ba machiw yeddanaw bessii?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAT 19:4 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Xoossay koyro addenne maccas oothi medhidaysa hinte nabbabibeketii?
MAT 19:5 ‘Hessa gisho, Issi asi ba aawanne ba aayiw aggidi ba machera issino gidees, nam7ayka issi asho gidoosona.’
MAT 19:6 Hessa gisho, enti issi asi gidoosonape attishin, nam7u asi gidokona. Hiza, Xoossi qachidaysa asi shaakofo” yaagis.
MAT 19:7 Farsaaweti, “Yaatin, Musey issi asi anjo worqate immidi yeddana mela ayis kiittidee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAT 19:8 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Hinte, hinte macheta yeddana mela Musey hintena kiittiday, hinte wozanaa minotethaa gishope attishin, koyrope hessa mela gidenna.
MAT 19:9 Ta hintew odayis; ba machiya laymatonna de7ishin yeddidi hara ekiya oonika laammees” yaagis.
MAT 19:10 Iya tamaareti iyako, “Azinabaynne machibay hessa mela gidiko eko geloy attiko lo77o” yaagidosona.
MAT 19:11 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Hessa mela timirtey Xoossay danda7a immidaysatasafe attishin, asa ubbaasa gidenna.
MAT 19:12 Hiza, yeletishe shuufa gididi yeletidaysati de7oosona, qassi asi qaaratidaysati de7oosona, qassi salo kawotethaa gisho gidi bantana shuufaydaysati de7oosona. Hessa gisho, haysa ekanaw danda7iya oonika eko” yaagis.
MAT 19:13 Yesuusi ba kushiya guutha nayta bolla wothidi entaw woossana mela issi issi asay nayta iyako ehidosona. Shin iya tamaareti asaa hanqetidosona.
MAT 19:14 Shin Yesuusi, “Xoossaa kawotethay haysata melasa gidiya gisho, guutha nayti taako yeysa diggofite; yo giite” yaagis.
MAT 19:15 Ba kushiya enta bolla wothidaape guye he bessaafe aggidi bis.
MAT 19:16 Issi gallas issi uray Yesuusako yidi, “Astamaariyaw, taani merinaa de7o demmanaw ay lo77oba ootho?” yaagis.
MAT 19:17 Yesuusi iyako, “Lo77oba ne tana ayis oychay? Issi Xoossaafe attishin, hari lo77oy baawa. Shin neeni merinaa de7uwa ekanaw koyko kiitata naaga” yaagis.
MAT 19:18 Uray zaaridi, “Awusa kiitata” yaagidi oychis. Yesuusi zaaridi, “Wodhopa, laymatopa, kaysotopa, wordo markatofa,
MAT 19:19 ne aawanne ne aayiw boncha, ne shooruwa ne huupheda dosa” yaagis.
MAT 19:20 He na7atethay, “Taani haysata ubbaa na7atethafe doomada naagas. Yaatin, hari taw paciyabay aybee?” yaagidi oychis.
MAT 19:21 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Neeni polo gidanaw koyko bada new de7iyaba bayzada manqotas imma; neeni salon duretana. Yaata simma yada tana kaalla” yaagis.
MAT 19:22 Shin he na7atetha uray daro dure gidiya gisho, hessa si7ida wode azzanishe aggidi bis.
MAT 19:23 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi ba tamaareta, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; durey salo kawotethi gelanaysi daro meto.
MAT 19:24 Dure asi Xoossaa kawotethaa gelanaysafe gimaley narpe luhora aadheysi kawuyees” yaagis.
MAT 19:25 Yesuusa tamaareti hessa si7idi malaaletidi, “Yaatin, ooni attanaw danda7ii?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAT 19:26 Yesuusi enta caddi xeellidi, “Haysi asas danda7etenna, shin Xoossas ubbay danda7etees” yaagis.
MAT 19:27 Phexroosi zaaridi, “Nuuni ubbaba aggidi nena kaallida. Yaatin, nuuni ay demmanee?” yaagis.
MAT 19:28 Yesuusi entako haysada yaagis: “Taani hintew tuma odayis; Asa Na7ay yaana alamiyan ba boncho araatan uttiya wode hinte tammanne nam7ati, tana kaallidaysati, tammanne nam7u araatan uttidi tammanne nam7u Isra7eele zerethata bolla pirdana.
MAT 19:29 Ta sunthaa gisho keethe woyko ishata woyko micheta woyko aawa woyko aayiw woyko nayta woyko gadee aggiday oonika xeetu kushe ekana. Qassi merinaa de7uwaka ekana.
MAT 19:30 Shin daroti ha77i dethan sinthe gididaysati guye gidana, qassi guye gididaysati sinthe gidana” yaagis.
MAT 20:1 “Xoossaa kawotethay ba woyne gaden une oothiya asi oosisanaw wonta guura keyida ura daanees.
MAT 20:2 I he une oothiya asa hachi hachi issi dinaare qanxanaw entara giigidi, enta ba woyne gadiya giddo yeddis.
MAT 20:3 “Qassi wontafe heedzu saate gidishin keyidi ooso dhayidi giya bolla eqida hara asata demmis.
MAT 20:4 I entako, ‘Hinteka ta woyne gadee giddo bidi oothite, taani hintew bessiya gatiya qanxana’ yaagis.
MAT 20:5 Entika bidosona. Qassika I usupun saateninne uddufun saaten keyidi hessada oothis.
MAT 20:6 Tammanne issi saate gidishin I keyiya wode harati yan eqidaysata demmidi, ‘Hinte ooso oothonna gallas kumethi haysan ayis eqidi pee7idetii?’ yaagis.
MAT 20:7 “Enti zaaridi, ‘Nuna une oosisiya asi dhayida gishosa’ yaagidosona. “Ika, ‘Hinteka ta woyne gadiya giddo bidi oothite’ yaagis.
MAT 20:8 “Sa7i omarsin, woyne gadiya goday oosanchota halaqaako, ‘Oosanchota xeegada wursethan ooso gelidaysatape doomada koyro gelidaysata gakanaw enta gatiya qanxa’ yaagis.
MAT 20:9 Tammanne issi saaten ooso oykidaysati yidi, huuphen huuphen issi issi dinaare ekidosona.
MAT 20:10 Koyro ooso oykidaysati yidi, bantaw daro imetana gidi qopidosona. Shin entika huuphen huuphen issi issi dinaare ekidosona.
MAT 20:11 Banta miishiya eki simmidi godaa bolla zuuzumidosona.
MAT 20:12 ‘Haysati guyepe yidi issi saate xalaala oothidosona. Shin gallas kumethi awa suulan daaburidi pee7ida nuura enti waanidi issino gidoona’ yaagidosona.
MAT 20:13 “Woyniya goday oosanchotape issuwako, ‘Ta ishaw, taani nena qohabike; ne taara giigiday issi dinaaresa gidennee?
MAT 20:14 Ne miishiya ekada ne soo ba. Ta omarsi yidaysaska neysa mela immanaw koyayis.
MAT 20:15 Taani ta miishiyan koydaba oothanaw taw maati baawee? Woyko taani keeha gidida gisho neeni qanaatay?’ yaagis.
MAT 20:16 “Hessada ha77i dethan guye gididaysati sinthatana, sinthatidaysati qassi guyetana” yaagis.
MAT 20:17 Yesuusi Yerusalaame bishe, tammanne nam7u tamaareta dumma gaxa kessidi entako yaagis:
MAT 20:18 “Heko, nuuni ha77i Yerusalaame buussaa bolla de7oos. Yan Asa Na7ay kahine halaqatasinne higge astamaaretas aadhidi imetana. Enti iya bolla hayqo pirda pirdana.
MAT 20:19 Iya Ayhude gidonna deriyas aathidi immana. Enti iya kawushana, garaafana, yaatidi iya masqaliya bolla kaqana. Shin I heedzantho gallas hayqope dendana” yaagis.
MAT 20:20 He wode Zabdiyoosa machiya ba nam7u adde naytara Yesuusako yada, iya sinthan gulbatada issiba iya woossasu.
MAT 20:21 Yesuusi iiko, “Ne ay koyay?” yaagis. Iya zaarada, “Ne kawotethan ha ta nam7u nayti issoy ne ushachan issoy ne haddirsan utto garki!” yaagasu.
MAT 20:22 Shin Yesuusi naytako zaaridi, “Hinte ay woossiyako ereketa; taani uyanaw de7iya waaye xuu7aa uyanaw danda7eetii?” yaagis. Entika, “Ee danda7oos” yaagidosona.
MAT 20:23 Yesuusi, “Tumaka taani uyanaw de7iya xuu7ape hinte uyana. Shin ta ushachaninne haddirsan uttanayisata doorey tana gidike. He bessay imetey, ta aaway immanaw giigisida asatasa” yaagis.
MAT 20:24 Attida tammu iya tamaareti hessa si7ida wode nam7u ishata bolla hanqetidosona.
MAT 20:25 Shin Yesuusi enta ubbaa xeegidi haysada yaagis. “Ayhude gidonna asaa haareysati banta asaa bolla godateysanne enta kaaletheysati wolqan haareysa hinte ereeta.
MAT 20:26 Shin hinte giddon hessada gidopo. Hintefe gitatanaw koyiya oonika hintew aylle gido.
MAT 20:27 Hinte giddon ubbaafe bolla gidanaw koyiya oonika hintew aylle gidanaw bessees.
MAT 20:28 Hessadaka, Asa Na7ay ase haggaazanawunne daro asaa wozanaw ba shempuwa immanaw yisipe attishin, asan haggaazetanaw yibeenna” yaagis.
MAT 20:29 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi ba tamaaretara Iyaarkofe keyidi bishin, daro asay entana kaallidosona.
MAT 20:30 Oge gaxan uttida nam7u qooqeti Yesuusi yaara aadheysa si7idi, “Godaw, Dawita Na7aw, nuus qadhetarki” yaagidi waassidosona.
MAT 20:31 Daro asay entana, “Hayzite” yaagidi kaccidosona. Shin enti, “Godaw, Dawita na7aw, nuus qadhetarki” gidi guji waassidosona.
MAT 20:32 Yesuusi eqidi, enta xeegidi, “Ta hintew ay oothana mela koyeetii?” yaagidi oychis.
MAT 20:33 Entika, “Godaw, nu ayfey xeellana mela koyoos” yaagidosona.
MAT 20:34 Yesuusi entaw qadhetidi, enta ayfiya bochis. Ellesidi enta ayfey xeellis; enti iya kaallidi bidosona.
MAT 21:1 Yesuusaranne iya tamaaretara Yerusalaame matidi, Shamaho zuma bolla de7iya Beetefaage geetetiya gutaa gakishe, Yesuusi ba tamaaretape nam7ata baape sinthe yaagidi kiittis:
MAT 21:2 “Hintefe sinthan de7iya guta biite. Yan issi harey qashon de7iyaro I maarara hinte demmana. Enta billidi haa eki yiite.
MAT 21:3 Oonika hintena oychiko, ‘Goday entana koyees’ yaagite. I entana iiraka yeddi aggana” yaagis.
MAT 21:4 Hessika nabey,
MAT 21:5 “Xiyoone katamaas, ‘Heko, ne kawoy ashke gididi, hare bollanne hare mara bolla uttidi, neeko yees’ yaagite” yaagidi xaafidaysi poletana mela hessi hanis.
MAT 21:6 Iya tamaareti bidi Yesuusi enta kiitidaysada oothidosona.
MAT 21:7 Hariiwunne hare maraa ehidi bollara ma7ida banta ma7uwa enta zokon yeggidosona. Yesuusi ma7ota bolla uttis.
MAT 21:8 Daro asay banta ma7uwa ogiyan hiixidosona. Harati bonco tashidi oge bolla yeggidosona.
MAT 21:9 Yesuusape sinthara hemeteysatinne iyape guyera kaalliya daro asay, “Hosaana! Dawita na7ay galatetto! Godaa sunthan yeysi anjetidaysa! Bonchoy Ubbaafe Dhoqa Saluwan Xoossaas gido!” yaagidi waassidosona.
MAT 21:10 Yesuusi Yerusalaame katamaa gelida wode he kataman de7iya asa ubbay, “Haysi oonee?” yaagidi yarkidosona.
MAT 21:11 Asay, “Haysi Galilan de7iya Naazirete katamaape yida nabiya Yesuusa” yaagidosona.
MAT 21:12 Yesuusi Xoossa Keethi gelidi, yan bayzeysatanne shammeyisata ubbaa kare goodis. Miishe laammeyisata xarpheezatanne holleta bayziya oydeta shiri yeggis.
MAT 21:13 Ika entako, “Xoossaa qaalan, ‘Ta keethay Xoossaa woossiya keethi geetetana’ geetetidi xaafetis. Shin hinte pangati qosetiya gongolo oothideta” yaagis.
MAT 21:14 Yesuusi xoossa keethan de7ishin qooqetinne gundati iyako yin enta pathis.
MAT 21:15 Shin kahine halaqatinne higge astamaareti Yesuusi oothida malaalsiyabata be7idaysasinne guutha nayti xoossa keethan, “Dawita na7ay, galatetto” yaagidi waasseysa si7idi hanqetidosona.
MAT 21:16 Enti Yesuusako, “Haysati geysa ne si7ay?” yaagidosona. Yesuusi, “Ee si7ayis, Xoossaa qaalan, ‘Guutha nayta doonaninne dhammiya nayta doonan galata wothadasa’ geetetidi xaafetidaysa hinte nabbabibeketii?” yaagis.
MAT 21:17 Entana yan aggidi Bitaane katamaa bidi aqis.
MAT 21:18 Yesuusi wonta guura katama simmidi yishe koshatis.
MAT 21:19 Oge gaxan issi balase mithi be7idi iiko bis. Shin haythafe attishin, hara aykoka demmibeenna. Hessa gisho, iyo, “Hizape nam7antho ayfe ayfopa!” yaagis. He balase mithiya ellesada mela aggasu.
MAT 21:20 Iya tamaareti hessa be7idi, “Ha balasiya waanada ellesa meladee?” yaagidi malaaletidosona.
MAT 21:21 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; hintew ammanoy de7iko, qassi hinte sidhonna ixiko balase bolla taani oothidaysa mela xalaala ootheketa, shin ‘Ha zumaa shodetada abban wodha’ yaagiko hanana.
MAT 21:22 Ammanidi hinte woossiyaba aybiba gidikoka hinte ekana” yaagis.
MAT 21:23 Yesuusi Xoossa Keetha gelidi tamaarsishin, kahine halaqatinne Ayhude cimati iyako yidi, “Neeni haysa oothana mela new ay maati de7ii? New ha maata immiday oonee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAT 21:24 Yesuusi entako, “Taanika hintena issiba oychayis; hinte taw hessa zaariko, taani ay maatan oothiyako hintew odana.
MAT 21:25 Yohaanisi xammaqana mela maatay awupe imetidee? Xoossafeye asapee?” yaagis. Enti banta giddon zoretidi, “Nuuni, ‘Xoossafe’ giiko, I nuna, ‘Yaatin ayis ammanibeketii?’ yaagana.
MAT 21:26 Nuuni, ‘Asape’ giiko, asa ubbay Yohaanisa nabe oothi xeelliya gisho, asaa yayyoos” yaagidosona.
MAT 21:27 Hessa gisho, “Nuuni eroko” yaagidi zaaridosona. Ika, “Hiza, taanika haysa ay maatan oothiyako hintew odike” yaagis.
MAT 21:28 “Yesuusi kaallidika haysada yaagis: nam7u adde nayti de7iya issi uray de7ees. He uray bayra na7aako bidi, ‘Ta na7aw, hachi woyne giddo bada ootha’ yaagis.
MAT 21:29 Na7ay zaaridi, ‘Atto biike’ yaagis. Shin guyepe ba wozanan qopi ekidi oothanaw bis.
MAT 21:30 Aaway ba kaalo na7aako bidi, ba bayra na7aako gidaysada kiittis. Ika, ‘Ero, ta aawaw’ yaagis. Shin bibeenna.
MAT 21:31 Ha nam7u naytape ba aawas kiitetidaysi awusee?” yaagis. Entika, “Bayra” yaagidosona. Yesuusi entako, “Ta hintew tuma odayis; qaraxa qanxiseysatinne laymateysati hintefe sinthatidi Xoossaa kawotethaa gelana.
MAT 21:32 Xammaqiya Yohaanisi suure ogiya tamaarsishe yin I geysa ammanibeketa. Shin qaraxa qanxiseysatinne laymateysati ammanidosona. Hinte hari attoshin, enta be7idika hinte nagaraape simmidi ammanibeketa” yaagis.
MAT 21:33 Qassika Yesuusi haysada yaagis; “Hara leemiso si7ite, woyne tokida issi uray de7ees. He woyniya yuushuwa diris. Woyne gum7iya olla bookis. Woyniya naaganaw shako shaakis. Hessafe guye, gadiya kothe immidi hara biitta bis.
MAT 21:34 Woyne ayfiya maxiya wodey gakin bana gakiya baggaa ekidi yaana mela ba aylleta entako yeddis.
MAT 21:35 Kothe aawati iya aylleta oykidi issuwa wadhidosona, hankuwa wodhidosona qassi attidaysa shuchan caddidosona.
MAT 21:36 Woyne atakiltiya goday kaseysatape dariya hara aylleta kiittis. Kothe aawati enta bollaka hankoyisata bolla oothidaysada oothidosona.
MAT 21:37 Wursethan I, ‘Ta na7aa enti bonchana!’ yaagidi ba na7aa entako kiittis.
MAT 21:38 “Shin kothe aawati na7aa be7idi banta giddon ‘Gadiya laattanaysi haysa, iya wodhidi gadiya nuuni laattoos!’ yaagidosona.
MAT 21:39 Na7a oykidi woyne gadiya giddofe gaxa kessidi wodhidosona.
MAT 21:40 “Hiza, woyne gadiya goday yaa wode he kothe aawata waatanee?” yaagidi oychis.
MAT 21:41 Enti zaaridi, “I he iita asata iita wodho wodhidi, woyney ayfiya wode iya gakiya baggaa woden woden immiya hara kothe aawatas immana” yaagidosona.
MAT 21:42 Yesuusi zaaridi entako, Xoossaa qaalan, “ ‘Gimbeysati boridi ixida shuchay, godaa xaphuwa minthiya, ubbaafe aadhiya shuchaa gidis. Haysi Goday oothidaba; nu ayfiyas malaalsiyaba’ geetetidi xaafetidaysa nabbabibeketii?
MAT 21:43 “Hessa gisho, taani hintew odayis; Xoossaa kawotethay hintefe eketidi lo77o ayfe ayfiya asatas imetana.
MAT 21:44 [Ha shucha bolla kundiya oonika meqeretana. Qassi ha shuchay iya bolla wodhiya urayka gaacetana”] yaagis.
MAT 21:45 Kahine halaqatinne Farsaaweti Yesuusi odida leemisuwan bantana odidaysa eridosona.
MAT 21:46 Enti Yesuusa oykanaw koydosona, shin asay Yesuusa nabe oothidi xeelliya gisho, asaas yayyidosona.
MAT 22:1 Yesuusi asaas zaaridi haysada yaagidi leemiso odis.
MAT 22:2 “Xoossaa kawotethay ba na7aas yaagano giigisida kawa daanees.
MAT 22:3 He kawoy yaagano yaana mela odi wothida asata xeeganaw ba aylleta kiittis. Shin asati yaanaw koybookona.
MAT 22:4 Qassi hara aylleta xeegidi, xeegetida asatako bidi, ‘Taani ta sangatanne modhida gatarmenthota shukas; ubbabay giigis. Ta yaaganuwa haa yiite yaagite’ yaagidi kiittis.
MAT 22:5 Shin xeegetidaysati xeessaa ixidi, banta oosos oosos bidosona. Issoy ba goshshas, hankoy ba zal7iyas bis.
MAT 22:6 Harati qassi kawa aylleta oykidi, kawushi wadhidi wodhidosona.
MAT 22:7 “Kawoy daro yilotidi, ba wotaadareta yeddidi shempo wodhidaysata wodhisis, enta katamaka xuuggis.
MAT 22:8 Hessafe guye, ba aylletako, ‘Yaaganoy giigis, shin xeegetidaysati yaaganuwas bessiya asi gidokona.
MAT 22:9 Hessa gisho, wogga ogeta bidi, demmida asi ubbaa yaaganuwa yaana mela xeegite’ yaagis.
MAT 22:10 Aylleti ogiya bolla bidi banta demmida asi ubbaa lo77otanne iitata ehidi yaagano shaqara gelsidi kunthidosona.
MAT 22:11 “Shin kawoy kathaa maanaw uttida asaa be7anaw gelida wode yaagano ma7o ma7iboona issi asi demmis.
MAT 22:12 Iyako, ‘La, ne yaagano ma7o ma7onna waanada haysa geladii?’ yaagis. Shin uray si77i gis.
MAT 22:13 “Kawoy ba aylletako, ‘Ha uraa kushiyanne tohuwa qachidi, kare dhumaa kessi yeggite. Yan iyaw yeehonne acha garcethi gidana’ yaagis.
MAT 22:14 “Hessadaka, Xoossaa kawotethaas xeegetidaysati daro shin dooretidaysati guutha” yaagis.
MAT 22:15 Hessafe guye, Farsaaweti bidi, Yesuusa waati odan oykaneeko zoretidosona.
MAT 22:16 Banta tamaaretanne Herodiisa baggatape issota issota kiittidosona. Entika, “Astamaariyaw, ne tuma odeysa nu eroos. Neeni asape ase shaakaka, asa woygandes gada aykoka oothaka, Xoossa oge tumatethan tamaarsaasa.
MAT 22:17 Ane nuus oda, nuuni Roome Kawas giira giiranaw bessi bessennee?” yaagidosona.
MAT 22:18 Shin Yesuusi enta iita qofaa eridi, “Ha cubboto, tana ayis paacetii?
MAT 22:19 Giira giiriya miishiya tana bessite” yaagis. Entika iyaw santime ehidosona.
MAT 22:20 I, “Ha sunthaynne misiley oodebayee?” yaagis.
MAT 22:21 Enti, “Roome Kawoysa” yaagidosona. Yaatin Yesuusi entako, “Hiza, Kawas besseysa kawas, Xoossas besseysa Xoossas immite” yaagis.
MAT 22:22 Enti hessa si7ida wode malaaletidi iya matape aggidi bidosona.
MAT 22:23 He gallas hayqope dendoy baawa giya Saduqaaweti Yesuusako yidi, yaagidi iya oychidosona.
MAT 22:24 “Astamaariyaw, ‘Musey, issi asi na7a yelonna hayqiko, he hayqidaysa ishay iya machiw ekidi, ba ishaas na7a yelo’ yaagidi kiittis.
MAT 22:25 Nu eriya laapun ishati de7oosona. Bayray macho ekidi na7a yelonna hayqis. Iya machiw iya kaalo ishay ekis.
MAT 22:26 Hessadaka, he maccasiw ekida nam7anthoyka, heedzanthoyka, bidi laapunati wurana gakanaw ubbay hayqidosona.
MAT 22:27 Ubbaafe guye he maccasiya hayqasu.
MAT 22:28 Yaatin, laapunati ubbay iyo ekida gisho, hayqope dendiya gallas, he maccasiya laapunatape awusas macho gidanee?” yaagidosona.
MAT 22:29 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Hinte Xoossaa qaalay tamaarsiyaba woyko iya wolqaa eronna gisho baleeta.
MAT 22:30 Asay hayqope dendiya wode salon de7iya kiitanchota mela gidanaape attishin, ekokona gelokona.
MAT 22:31 Qassi hayqida asati hayqope dendanaba Xoossay hintew odidaysa nabbabibeketii?
MAT 22:32 Xoossay, ‘Taani Abrahaame Xoossaa, Yisaaqa Xoossaa, Yayqooba Xoossaa’ yaagis. Hessa gisho, Xoossay paxa de7eyisata Xoossaafe attishin, hayqidaysata Xoossaa gidenna” yaagis.
MAT 22:33 Daro asay hessa si7idi, iya timirtiyan malaaletidosona.
MAT 22:34 Yesuusi Saduqaawetas gaanaba dhaysidaysa Farsaaweti si7ida wode issife shiiqidosona.
MAT 22:35 Enta giddofe issi higge astamaarey Yesuusa paace oysho oychis.
MAT 22:36 “Astamaariyaw, higge ubbaafe aadheysi awusee?” yaagidi oychis.
MAT 22:37 Yesuusi zaaridi, “ ‘Ne Godaa, ne Xoossaa, ne kumetha wozanape, ne kumetha shempuwafe, ne kumetha qofaape dosa.
MAT 22:38 Ubbaafe aadheysinne bayra kiitay haysa.
MAT 22:39 Nam7antho ubbaafe aadhiya kiitay, ase ubbaa ne huuphiya ne doseysada dosa’ yaageysa.
MAT 22:40 Muse higgeynne nabeta timirtey ubbay ha kiitata bolla katoosona” yaagis.
MAT 22:41 Farsaaweti issi bolla shiiqidi de7ishin, Yesuusi entana,
MAT 22:42 “Kiristoosaba hinte woygetii? I oodde na7ee?” yaagidi oychis. Enti, “I Kawa Dawita na7a” yaagidi zaaridosona.
MAT 22:43 Yesuusi entako, “Yaatin, Dawiti Geeshsha Ayyaanan gididi waatidi Kiristoosa, ‘Godaa’ gidi xeegii? Dawiti gishe,
MAT 22:44 “ ‘Godaa Xoossay, ta Godaako, ne morketa ne tohoy yedhiyaso oothana gakanaw, haysan taape ushacha baggan utta’ gis.
MAT 22:45 Hiza, Dawiti Kiristoosa Godaa gidi xeegiko, waanidi Kiristoosi Dawita na7a gidii?” yaagis.
MAT 22:46 Yesuusas issi qaala zaaranaw danda7ida asi oonika baawa. Qassi he gallasape doomidi hara oysha oychanaw oonika danda7ibeenna.
MAT 23:1 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi shiiqida asaasinne ba tamaaretas haysada yaagis.
MAT 23:2 “Higge astamaaretinne Farsaaweti Muse higgiya billanaw maatara de7oosona.
MAT 23:3 Hessa gisho, enti hintena kiittiya ubbaa oothitenne naagite. Shin enti ootheysada oothopite. Ayis giiko, enti odeysada oothokona.
MAT 23:4 Enti tookanaw danda7etonna tooho qachidi asaa toossosona. Shin bantaw hari attoshin, he toohuwa asay tookiya wode biradhe xeeran bochanaw koyokona.
MAT 23:5 “Shin enti banta ooso ubbaa asi be7onna mela oothosona. Banta som7oninne qesen qachiya maxaafaa xiqisey de7iya kitaafe dalgisoosona, banta ma7uwa macaraa adussosona.
MAT 23:6 Moketiya bessan boncho bessinne ayhude woosa keethatan daro lo77iya oyde dosoosona.
MAT 23:7 Asay giyan entana bonchon sarothanaysanne ‘Astamaariyaw’ gidi xeeganaysa koyoosona.
MAT 23:8 “Shin hinte astamaarey issuwa xalaala gidida gishonne hinte ubbay ishata gidida gisho, ‘Astamaariyaw’ geetetidi xeegetofite.
MAT 23:9 Hintew salon issi aawa xalaali de7iya gisho, ha sa7an oonaka ‘Aawaw’ gidi xeegopite.
MAT 23:10 Hintew issi Goday Kiristoosa xalaali de7iya gisho ‘Godaw’ geetetidi xeegetofite.
MAT 23:11 Hinte giddon bayratey hinte aylle gido.
MAT 23:12 Bana gitaya oonika kawuyana; bana kawushiya oonika gitatana.
MAT 23:13 “Hinteno, cubboto, higge astamaaretonne Farsaaweto, asa sinthan salo kawotethaa gordeysato hintena ayye! Hinte, hinte huuphen geleketa qassi harataka gelseketa.
MAT 23:14 “[Hinteno cubboto, higge astamaaretonne, Farsaaweto, am7eta keetha hinte bonqishe, asi be7o gidi woosa adusseta. Hessa gisho, hintena ayye! Ubbaafe aadhiya pirday hintena naagees.]
MAT 23:15 “Hinteno, cubboto, higge astamaaretonne Farsaaweto, hinte issi uraa ammanthanaw abbaranne sa7ara yuuyeta. Shin hinte iya ammanthida wode he uraa hintefe aathidi Gaannames giigetidaysa oothiya gisho, hintena ayye!
MAT 23:16 “Oonika xoossa keethan caaqiko aykoyka baawa. Shin Xoossaa Keethan de7iya worqan caaqiko, he caaqoy iya gomana giya qooqeto, hintew qooqidi harata kaaletheysato, hintena ayye!
MAT 23:17 Hinteno, eeyato, qooqeto, worqay aadhiyee? Worqiya Xoossas dummaya xoossa keethay aadhii?
MAT 23:18 Qassi ‘Oonika yarsho bessan caaqiko, aykoyka baawa. Shin oonika iya bolla de7iya yarshuwan caaqiko, he caaqoy iya gomana’ yaagidi tamaarseeta.
MAT 23:19 Hinteno, qooqeto, yarshoy aadhiyee? Yarshuwa Xoossas dummaya bessay aadhii?
MAT 23:20 Hessa gisho, yarsho bessan caaqiya uray, he yarsho bessaaninne iya bolla de7iya ubbaban caaqees.
MAT 23:21 Xoossa keethan caaqiya uray, he xoossa keethaninne iyan de7iya Xoossan caaqees.
MAT 23:22 Salon caaqiya uray Xoossaa araataninne he araata bolla uttiya Xoossan caaqees.
MAT 23:23 “Hinteno, cubboto, higge astamaaretonne Farsaaweto, hintena ayye! Hinte kareetha sawope, naatiropenne okashepe asraata kesseeta. Shin higgen de7iya aadhidi koshsheyisata aggideta. Hessika, suure pirda, qadhetethinne ubbaban ammanetethi. Harataka aggonashin haysata hinte oothanaw bessees.
MAT 23:24 Hintew qooqidi hara asi kaaletheysato, hinte ushshafe udunxe kessidi gimale miteeta.
MAT 23:25 “Hinteno, cubboto, higge astamaaretonne Farsaaweto, hintena ayye! Hinte shaatiyasinne keriyas bolla baggaa geeshsheeta. Shin entaw garsan bonqeynne uuzetethi kumi uttis.
MAT 23:26 Neno qooqe Farsaawiyaw, shaatiyasinne keriyas garsa kasetada geeshsha. Hessafe guye, bolla baggayka geeshshi gidana.
MAT 23:27 “Hinteno, cubboto, higge astamaaretonne Farsaaweto, hintena ayye! Kare baggara qalame tiyetidi lo77idi, giddon meqethinne wooqidabay kumida duufota daaneta.
MAT 23:28 Hessadaka, bolla baggara asas lo77o daaneta. Shin hinte garsan cubbotethinne iitatethi kumis.
MAT 23:29 “Hinteno, cubboto, higge astamaaretonne Farsaaweto, hintena ayye! Hinte nabetas duufo keexeta, qassi xillota duufuwaka loytheeta.
MAT 23:30 Qassi hinte, ‘Nuuni beni nu aawata wode de7idaba gidiyako, entara issife nabeta suuthaa gussokoshin’ yaageeta.
MAT 23:31 Hessa gisho, hinte nabeta wodhida asaa nayta gideysa hinte hinte huuphen markateeta.
MAT 23:32 Hiza, hinte aawati doomidaysa hinte polite.
MAT 23:33 “Ha shooshato, shoosha nayto, hinte Gaanname pirdaafe waanidi attanee?
MAT 23:34 Hessa gisho, heko, taani nabeta, cinca asatanne astamaareta hinteko kiittana. Entafe issota issota hinte wodhananne masqala bolla kaqana. Baggata ayhude woosa keethatan lisson garaafananne katamaape katama gooddana.
MAT 23:35 Hessa gisho, xilluwa Aabela wodhida wodepe doomidi, Xoossa Keethasinne yarsho bessaafe giddon hinte wodhida Baraka na7a Zakaryaasa wode gakanaw hayqida xillo asa ubba gisho, hinte seeretana.
MAT 23:36 Taani hintew tuma odayis; hintenne hinte aawati oothida nagaraas ha pirda ubbay ha yeletethaa bolla gakana.
MAT 23:37 “Yerusalaame, Yerusalaame, nabeta wodhiyare! Xoossay neeko kiittidaysata shuchan caddiyare! Kuttoy ba nayta ba qefen hapheysada taani ne asaa ta qesiyan gechanaw aapun toho koyadina! Shin tana diggadasa.
MAT 23:38 Hiza, heko, hinte keethay kaysi gidana.
MAT 23:39 Taani hintew odayis; ‘Godaa sunthan yeysi anjetidaysa’ hinte gaana gakanaw nam7antho tana be7eketa” yaagis.
MAT 24:1 Yesuusi Xoossa Keethafe keyidi bishin, iya tamaareti iyako yidi, malaaletidi Xoossa Keetha gimbiya bessidosona.
MAT 24:2 Yesuusi entako zaaridi, “Ee! Haysa ubbaa be7eetii? Taani hintew tumaa odayis; shuchi shucha bolla gimbetida mela laaletonna attenna” yaagis.
MAT 24:3 Yesuusi Shamaho zuma bolla uttidashin, iya tamaareti bantarka iyako yidi, “Hessi awude hananeeko nuus oda. Qassi ne yuussasinne wodiya wursethaas malaatay aybee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAT 24:4 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Hintena oonika balethonna mela naagetite!
MAT 24:5 Ayis giiko, daro asati ta sunthan, ‘Taani Kiristoosa, Xoossay asaa ashshanaw kiittidaysa’ yaagishe yidi daro asaa balethana.
MAT 24:6 Matan de7iya ola girsaa, haahon de7iya ola wore si7anaw de7eeta. Hessa melabay hananaw bessiya gisho Hirgofite. Shin wursethay buroona.
MAT 24:7 Derey deriyara, issi kawotethay hara kawotethaara oletana. Koshaynne biitta qaaxoy ubba bessan hanana.
MAT 24:8 Hessi ubbay yelo iqethas zooke mela.
MAT 24:9 “He wode asay hintena waayees aathidi immana, qachananne wodhana. Ta sunthaa gisho asa ubbay hintena ixana.
MAT 24:10 He wode daroti ammano aggana. Banta giddon issoy issuwa aathidi immana, issoy issuwa ixana.
MAT 24:11 Qassi daro wordo nabeti dendidi darota balethana.
MAT 24:12 Geellatethi dariya gisho, daro asaa siiqoy irxana.
MAT 24:13 Shin wursethi gakanaw genciya uray attana.
MAT 24:14 Asa ubbaas marka gidana mela Xoossaa kawotethaa Wongelay biitta ubban odetana. Hessafe guye, wursethay yaana.
MAT 24:15 “Hessa gisho, nabiya Daaneli odida dhayo tunatethay geeshsha bessan eqidaysa hinte be7ana. (Akeekiso: Hessi woy guusseko nabbabeysi akeeko!)
MAT 24:16 He wode Yihuda biittan de7eysati deriyako baqato.
MAT 24:17 Keetha huuphen de7iya uray ba son de7iyaba ekanaw soo gelonna baqato.
MAT 24:18 Gaden de7eysi ba ma7uwa ekanaw guye simmofo.
MAT 24:19 He wode qantha maccasatasinne dhanthiya maccasatas daro un7a gidana.
MAT 24:20 Balgon woyko Sambaatan hinte baqatoy gidonna mela Xoossaa woossite.
MAT 24:21 Ayis giiko, sa7i medhetoosape hachi gakanaw hanonnabay, qassi sinthafeka ubbaraka hanonna waayey he wode hanana.
MAT 24:22 Xoossay he gallasata taybuwa guuthonnaako ase gidida oonika attenna. Shin I ba doorida asata gisho, he gallasata taybuwa guuthana.
MAT 24:23 “He wode oonika hintena, ‘Heko, Kiristoosi haysan’ woyko ‘Hinin de7ees’ yaagiko ammanopite.
MAT 24:24 Ayis giiko, wordo Kiristoosatinne wordo nabeti dendana. Entaw danda7etiko, hari attoshin Xoossay dooridaysataka balethanaw gita malaatatanne malaalsiyabata oothana.
MAT 24:25 Akeekite, taani hintew haysa kasetada odas.
MAT 24:26 “Hessa gisho, asay hinteko, ‘Heko, Kiristoosi bazzon de7ees’ giiko, yaa boopite. Woyko hinteko, ‘Heko, qol7an de7ees’ giiko, entaba ammanopite.
MAT 24:27 Ayis giiko, wol7anthi salon wol7amidi, dolohape wuloha gakanaw benteysada, Asa Na7aa yuussay hessada hanana.
MAT 24:28 “Bawuti de7iyason ankoti shiiqana.
MAT 24:29 “He wode he waaye gallasatape guye, ellesidi away dhumana, ageenay ba poo7uwa diggana. Xoolintoti salope wodhana, qassi salon de7iya wolqati buqettana.
MAT 24:30 He wode Asa Na7aa yuussaa mallay saluwa bolla bentana. Sa7an de7iya asi ubbay yeekana. Qassi Asa Na7ay, wolqaranne gita bonchuwara saluwa shaara giddora yishin enti be7ana.
MAT 24:31 I ba kiitanchota gita moyze punora kiittana. Enti sa7aa oyddu baggaa bidi, ha gaxape ya gaxa gakanaw de7iya iyaw dooretidaysata shiishana.
MAT 24:32 “Balase mithafe tamaarite. Iya aacada hayxiya wode torchey matatidaysa hinte ereeta.
MAT 24:33 Hessadaka, hinte ha ubbaba be7iya wode Yesuusi matidi pengen de7eysa erite.
MAT 24:34 Taani hintew tuma odayis; ha ubbabay poletana gakanaw, ha yeletethay aadhenna.
MAT 24:35 Saloynne sa7i aadhana, shin ta qaalay ubbaka aadhenna.
MAT 24:36 “He gallasaanne he saatiya salon de7iya ta aawape attishin, hari salo kiitanchota gidin woyko Na7aa gidin oonika erenna.
MAT 24:37 Asa Na7aa yuussay, Nohe wode hanidaysa mela gidana.
MAT 24:38 He wode dhayo haathay yaanape sinthe Nohey markabiyan gelida gallasa gakanaw, asay mishenne uyishe, ekishenne gelishe gam7is.
MAT 24:39 Dhayo haathay yidi, enta ubbaa dhaysana gakanaw akeekibokona. Asa Na7aa yuussayka hessada hanana.
MAT 24:40 “He wode nam7u asati gaden oothana. Entafe issoy eketana, hankoy attana.
MAT 24:41 Nam7u maccasati issife gaaccana. Entafe issiniya eketana hankiya attana.
MAT 24:42 “Hiza, hinte Goday ay gallas yaaneko hinte eronna gisho, minnidi naagite.
MAT 24:43 Shin kaysoy qammafe ay saaten yaaneko goday eriyako, ba keethay booketonna mela barkidi naaganashin.
MAT 24:44 Hessadaka, Asa Na7ay hinte qoponna saaten yaana gisho, hinteka giigidi de7ite.
MAT 24:45 “Yaatin, ba soo asaas kathaa koshshiya wodiyan immana mela iya goday doorida ammantheysinne wozanaama aylley oonee?
MAT 24:46 I ba goday kiittidaysa oothishin iya goday yidi demmiya aylley anjetidaysa.
MAT 24:47 Taani hintew tuma odayis; goday he aylliya babaa ubbaa bolla shuumana.
MAT 24:48 Shin he aylley iita gidiko, ‘Ta goday gam7idi yaana’ yaagidi ba wozanan qopidi,
MAT 24:49 ba lagge oosanchota wadho doomiko, mathoteysatara miikonne uyiko,
MAT 24:50 he aylliya goday I qoponna gallasinne I eronna saaten,
MAT 24:51 yidi iya qanxerethana. Iya qaada cubbotara oothana. He bessan iyaw yeehonne ache garcethi gidana.
MAT 25:1 “He wode salo kawotethay banta xompe oykidi, macho ehanaw bida addiya mokanaw keyida tammu geela7ota daanees.
MAT 25:2 Entafe ichashati eeya, qassi ichashati cinca.
MAT 25:3 Eeyati xompe oykidosona, shin guzha zayte oykibookona.
MAT 25:4 Shin cincati banta xompenne hara guzha zayte oykidosona.
MAT 25:5 Machiw ekeysi gam7in, he geela7oti bantana dhiskoy oykin dhiskidosona.
MAT 25:6 “Giddi bilahe gidiya wode, ‘Heko, machiw eheysi gakis, iya mokanaw keyite’ giya gita caboy si7etis.
MAT 25:7 “He wode he geela7oti ubbay barkidi, banta xompiya giigisidosona.
MAT 25:8 Eeyati cincatako, ‘Nu xompey to7ana haniya gisho, hinte zaytiyape nuus immerketi’ yaagidosona.
MAT 25:9 “Shin cincati zaaridi, ‘Akay, nuusinne hintew gidiya zaytey baawa. Hessa gisho, bidi hintew shammidi ekite’ yaagidosona.
MAT 25:10 Eeya geela7oti zayte shammanaw bin, machiw ekeysi puttu gis. Giigeti uttida ichashu geela7oti iyara issife yaagano keethi gelidosona; kareyka gordeti aggis.
MAT 25:11 “Guyepe hanko geela7oti yidi, ‘Godaw, godaw, nuus dooyarki’ yaagidosona.
MAT 25:12 “Shin I zaaridi, ‘Taani hintew tuma odayis; ta hintena erike!’
MAT 25:13 “Hiza, Asa Na7ay yaana gallasaa woyko saatiya hinte eronna gisho barkidi naagite.
MAT 25:14 “Xoossaa kawotethay ba oosanchota xeegidi baw de7iyaba entaw sheedhidi oge baanaw keyida uraa daanees.
MAT 25:15 Entaw huuphen huuphen enta wolqaa mela issuwas ichashu karxiite bira, issuwas nam7u karxiite bira qassi issuwas issi karxiite bira immidi ba ogiya bis.
MAT 25:16 Ichashu karxiite bira ekida aylley ellesi bidi zal7idi, hara ichashu karxiite bira wodhisis.
MAT 25:17 Hessadaka, qassi nam7u karxiite bira ekida aylley hara nam7u karxiite bira wodhisis.
MAT 25:18 Shin issi karxiite bira ekidaysi bidi, olla bookidi, ba godaa miishiya moogis.
MAT 25:19 “Daro wodepe guye he aylleta goday yidi, ba miishiya entara salla7is.
MAT 25:20 Ichashu karxiite bira ekida aylley yidi, hara ichashu karxiite bira ehidi, ‘Ta godaw, neeni taw ichashu karxiite bira immadasa. Shin taani hara ichashu karxiite bira wodhisas’ yaagis.
MAT 25:21 Iya goday, ‘Zamboy! Neeni lo77onne ammanthiya aylle; neeni guuthaban ammanetadasa. Taani nena darobaa bolla shuumana; haa gelada ne godaara ufayta’ yaagis.
MAT 25:22 “Qassi nam7u karxiite bira ekidaysi yidi, ‘Ta godaw, neeni taw nam7u karxiite bira immadasa. Shin taani hara nam7u karxiite bira wodhisas’ yaagis.
MAT 25:23 Iya goday, ‘Zamboy! Neeni lo77onne ammanthiya aylle; neeni guuthaban ammanetadasa. Taani nena darobaa bolla shuumana; haa gelada ne godaara ufayta’ yaagis.
MAT 25:24 “Qassi issi karxiite bira ekidaysi yidi, ‘Ta godaw, neeni zeronna bessafe cakiyanne dharcona bessafe maxiya iita asi gideysa taani erayis.
MAT 25:25 Hessa gisho, yayyada ne bira biittan moogas. Ne miishey haysish’ yaagis.
MAT 25:26 “Iya goday zaaridi, ‘Ha iita azalla aylliyaw, taani zeronna bessafe cakeysanne dharcona bessafe maxiya asi gideysa eradasa.
MAT 25:27 Yaatin, neeni ta miishiya banken wothidaba gidiyako, taani simmiya wode ta miishiya wodhera ekanaysa diggadasa.
MAT 25:28 Hessa gisho, miishiya iyape ekidi, tammu karxiite biri de7eysas immite.
MAT 25:29 Ayis giiko, de7iya ubbaas guzhetananne darana. Shin baynaysafe hari attoshin, he iyaw de7iya guuthiyaka eketana.
MAT 25:30 Ha maaddonna aylliya kare dhumaa kessi yeggite. Yan iyaw yeehonne ache garcethi gidana’ yaagis.
MAT 25:31 “Asa Na7ay, kiitancho ubbatara, ba bonchuwara yaa wode I ba boncho kawotetha araata bolla uttana.
MAT 25:32 Biittan de7iya asi ubbay iya sinthe shiiqana. Henthanchoy dorsata deeshatape shaakeysada I he asaa nam7an shaakana.
MAT 25:33 Qassi dorsata ushacha baggara deeshata haddirsa baggara essana.
MAT 25:34 “Hessafe guye, kawoy ushacha baggara de7eysatako haysada yaagana: ‘Ta Aaway anjidaysato, ha yidi sa7i medhetiya wodepe doomidi hintew giigida kawotetha laattite.
MAT 25:35 Ayis giiko, taani koshatin muzideta, saamotin ushshideta, eretonna imatha asi gidada bin mokideta,
MAT 25:36 kallotin mayzideta, hargetin hargisideta, qashetin tana oychideta’ yaagana.
MAT 25:37 “Hessafe guye, xilloti zaaridi, ‘Godaw, neeni koshatin awude be7idi muzido? Woyko neeni saamotin awude be7idi ushshido?
MAT 25:38 Neeni imathe gidada yin awude be7idi mokido? Woyko neeni kallotin awude mayzido?
MAT 25:39 Neeni hargin woyko qashetin neeko bidi nena awude oychido?’ yaagana.
MAT 25:40 Kawoy zaaridi, ‘Taani hintew tuma odayis; hinte tana kaalliya ha ubbaafe guuxeysas oothidaysa taw oothideta’ yaagana.
MAT 25:41 “He wode haddirsa baggara de7eysatako, ‘Ha baadetidaysato, ta matape haakite. Xalahesinne iya kiitanchotas giigida merinaa taman biite.
MAT 25:42 Ayis giiko, koshatin tana muzibeeketa; saamotin ushshibeeketa.
MAT 25:43 Taani imathe gidada bin tana mokibeketa, kallotin mayzibeeketa, hargininne qashetin tana oychibeeketa’ yaagana.
MAT 25:44 “He wode enti, ‘Godaw, neeni koshatin woyko saamotin woyko imathe gidada bin woyko kallotin woyko hargin woyko qashetin be7idi nena awude maaddonna ixido?’ yaagidi zaarana.
MAT 25:45 “He wode kawoy zaaridi entako, ‘Taani hintew tuma odayis; hinte tana kaalliya ha ubbaafe guuxeysa maaddonna ixidaysi, tana maaddonna ixidaysa’ yaagana.
MAT 25:46 Hessa gisho, he asati merinaa pirdas qassi xilloti merinaa de7uwas baana” yaagis.
MAT 26:1 Yesuusi ha timirtiya ubbaa wursida wode ba tamaaretako,
MAT 26:2 “Nam7u gallasape guye, Paasika Ba7aale bonchiya gallas gideysa ereeta. He gallas Asa Na7i masqale bolla kaqetanaw asa kushen aadhidi imetana” yaagis.
MAT 26:3 He wode kahine halaqatinne cimati, Qayyaafa geetetiya kahine halaqaa keethan shiiqidi,
MAT 26:4 asi eronna Yesuusa oykidi, wodhanaw maqetidosona.
MAT 26:5 Shin enti, “Asay ooshshi kessonna mela gidi, Paasika bonchiya gallas hessa oothoko” yaagidosona.
MAT 26:6 Yesuusi Bitaane kataman baro hargida Simoona son de7ees.
MAT 26:7 Yesuusi imatuwa bolla de7ishin issi maccasiya albasxiroosa philqaaxe kumetha daro al7o shitto eka yada Yesuusa huuphen tigasu.
MAT 26:8 Shin Yesuusa tamaareti hessa be7idi hanqetidi, “Ha shittoy coo iitey aybisee?
MAT 26:9 Ha shittoy al7o gaten bayzetidi, miishey manqotas imetanaw danda7etees” yaagidosona.
MAT 26:10 Yesuusi enti geysa eridi, entako, “Ha maccasiw ayis waaysetii? Iya taw lo77oba oothasu.
MAT 26:11 Manqoti ubba wode hintera daana. Shin taani hintera ubba wode de7ike.
MAT 26:12 Iya ha shittuwa ta bolla tigidaysi tana mooganaw giigisanaasa.
MAT 26:13 Taani hintew tuma odayis; biitta ubban ha Wongelay sabbaketiya bessan awunka, asay iyo hassayana mela iya oothidaysi odetana” yaagis.
MAT 26:14 He wode tammanne nam7u Yesuusa tamaaretape issoy, Asqoroota Yihuda geeteteysi kahine halaqatako,
MAT 26:15 bidi, “Taani hintew Yesuusa aatha immiko, hinte taw ay immanee?” yaagidi enta oychis. Enti zoretidi hastamu bira santime immidosona.
MAT 26:16 Hessafe guye, Yihudi Yesuusa aathidi immanaw injetiya wode wochees.
MAT 26:17 Uytha Ba7aale bonchiya koyro gallas, Yesuusa tamaareti iyako yidi, “Paasika bonchiya gallas neeni maana kathi nuuni awun giigisino?” yaagidosona.
MAT 26:18 Yesuusi entako, “Kataman de7iya addiyako bidi, ‘Astamaarey, taw wodey gakida gisho, ta tamaaretara Paasika bonchiya gallasa ne son aathana yaagees’ yaagite” yaagis.
MAT 26:19 Iya tamaareti Yesuusi bantana kiitidaysada oothidi, Paasika Ba7aale gallas maana kathaa giigisidosona.
MAT 26:20 Sa7ay omarsiya wode, Yesuusi tammanne nam7u hawaaretara kathi maanaw uttis.
MAT 26:21 Enti mishin, Yesuusi entako, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; hintefe issi uray tana aathidi immana” yaagis.
MAT 26:22 Enti daro dagammidi, issoy issoy, “Godaw, tuma taneshsha?” gidi iya oychidosona.
MAT 26:23 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ba kushiya taara issife shaatiyan yeddeysi I tana aathidi immana.
MAT 26:24 Asa Na7ay, Xoossaa qaalan iyaw xaafetidaysada hayqana. Shin Asa Na7aa aathidi immiya uraa ayye! He uray yeletonna attidaako iyaw lo77oshin” yaagis.
MAT 26:25 Iya aathidi immanaw de7iya Yihudi zaaridi, “Astamaariyaw, neeni gey taneyee?” yaagis. Yesuusi zaaridi, “Neeni ne huuphen gadasa” yaagis.
MAT 26:26 Enti mishin, Yesuusi uythaa ekidi Xoossaa galatis. He uythaa menthidi ba tamaaretas immidi, “He7ite, miite, haysi ta ashuwa” yaagis.
MAT 26:27 Xuu7aa ekidi, Xoossaa galatis. Entaw immidi, “Ubbay haysafe uyite.
MAT 26:28 Haysi daro asa nagara atotethas mela gukiya ta suuthaa. Ha suuthay Xoossay hintera geliya caaquwa mintheysa.
MAT 26:29 Shin taani hintew odayis; taani ta Aawa kawotethan ooratha woyne ushsha hintera uyana gallasa gakanaw nam7antho ha woyne ushsha uyike” yaagis.
MAT 26:30 Galata mazmure yexidaape guye, Shamaho zuma bidosona.
MAT 26:31 He wode Yesuusi entako, “ ‘Xoossay henthanchuwa shocana dorsatika laaletana’ geetetidi Xoossa qaalan xaafetidaysa mela hachi qamma hinte ubbay tana aggidi baqatana.
MAT 26:32 Shin taani hayqope dendidaape guye hintefe sinthatada Galila baana” yaagis.
MAT 26:33 Phexroosi zaaridi, “Enti ubbay nena aggidi baqatikoka, taani nena aggike” yaagis.
MAT 26:34 Yesuusi Phexroosako, “Taani new tuma odayis; hachi qamma kuttoy waassanaape sinthe neeni tana heedzu toho kaddana” yaagis.
MAT 26:35 Phexroosi zaaridi, “Taani neera issife hayqope attishin, nena ubbaka kaddike” yaagis. Hanko iya tamaareti ubbayka hessada gidoosona.
MAT 26:36 Yaatidi, Yesuusi ba tamaaretara Geetasemaane geetetiya bessaa bidi, entako, “Taani hini bada Xoossaa woossashana, hinte haysan uttite” yaagis.
MAT 26:37 Phexroosanne Zabdiyoosa nayta nam7ata baara eki bidi daro azzanonne un7etethi doomis.
MAT 26:38 Qassika entako, “Taani hayqos gathiya un7a un7etas. Haysan taara gam7itenne minnidi naagite” yaagis.
MAT 26:39 Guuthi sinthe bidi biittan gufannidi, “Ta Aawaw, danda7etiyaba gidiko ha waaye xuu7aa taape digga. Shin ne sheney hanope attishin, ta sheney hanopo” yaagidi Xoossaa woossis.
MAT 26:40 Yesuusi ba tamaaretako simmi yidi enti dhiskidashin demmis. Phexroosako, “Hinte issi saatekoka dhiskonna taara minnanaw danda7ibeeketii?
MAT 26:41 Paacen hinte gelonna mela barkidi naagitenne Xoossaa woossite. Hintew lo77o amoy de7ees, shin hinte daaburancho asi” yaagis.
MAT 26:42 Yesuusi qassi nam7antho bidi, “Ta Aawaw, taani ha waaye xuu7ape uyonna de7ishe aadhanaw danda7etonnaba gidiko ne sheney hano” yaagidi Xoossaa woossis.
MAT 26:43 Qassika simmi yaa wode iya tamaareta ayfiya dhiskoy goozin, zin7idashin demmis.
MAT 26:44 Qassika enta aggidi, bidi kase qaala zaari heedzantho woossis.
MAT 26:45 Hessafe guye, ba tamaaretako yidi, “Ha77i gakanaw dhisketinne shempetii? Heko, Asa Na7i, nagaranchota kushen aadhidi imetiya saatey gakis.
MAT 26:46 Dendidi yedhite, tana aathidi immeysi haysish gakis” yaagis.
MAT 26:47 Yesuusi buroo hessa haasayishin, tammanne nam7u tamaaretape issoy, Yihudi gaki wodhis. Kahine halaqatinne deriya cimati kiitida daro asati mashshenne xam7a oykidi iyara issife yidosona.
MAT 26:48 Yesuusa aathidi immiya Yihudi he daro asaako, “Taani yeereysi hinte koyeysi iya, iya oykite” yaagidi malla immi wothis.
MAT 26:49 Iiraka Yesuusako shiiqidi, “Astamaariyaw, saro de7ay” yaagidi iya yeeris.
MAT 26:50 Yesuusi iyako, “Ta laggiyaw, neeni oothanaba ootha agga” yaagis. Hessafe guye, shiiqidi, Yesuusa oykidosona.
MAT 26:51 Yesuusara de7eysatape issoy ba mashsha shoddidi kahine halaqaa aylliya shocidi, iya haythaa qanxidi yeggis.
MAT 26:52 Shin Yesuusi, “Ne mashsha guye shoohuwan zaara. Ayis giiko, mashsha shoddiya ubbay mashshan hayqana.
MAT 26:53 Ta, ta Aawa woossiyako daro mukulun taybetiya kiitanchota yeddanaw danda7onnaba new daanii?
MAT 26:54 Yaatin, Xoossaa qaalan hessada hananaw bessees geetetidaysi waanidi poletanee?” yaagis.
MAT 26:55 He saatiyan, Yesuusi he shiiqida daro asaako, “Tana panga oothidi oykanaw mashshanne xam7a oykidi yidetii? Taani xoossa keethan gallas gallas tamaarsashe hintera de7iya wode tana oykibeeketa.
MAT 26:56 Shin haysi ubbay hanidaysi nabeti Xoossaa qaalan xaafidaysi poletana melasa” yaagis. He wode iya tamaareti ubbay iya aggidi baqatidosona.
MAT 26:57 Yesuusa oykidaysati kahine halaqaa Qayyaafako iya efidosona. Yan higge astamaaretinne biitta cimati shiiqidi de7oosona.
MAT 26:58 Shin Phexroosi kahine halaqaa zabbaa gakanaw haahon iya kaallis. Iya wursethay shaaketana gakanaw zabbaa gelidi naageysatara uttis.
MAT 26:59 Kahine halaqatinne shiiqida asa ubbay Yesuusa wodhanaw iya bolla wordo marka koydosona.
MAT 26:60 Daroti yidi iya bolla wordo marka markatidosona, shin aykoka demmibookona. Guyepe nam7u asati yidi,
MAT 26:61 “Ha uray, ‘Taani Xoossa Keetha laallada heedzu gallasan zaara keexanaw danda7ayis’ yaagis” yaagidosona.
MAT 26:62 Kahineta halaqay dendi eqidi Yesuusako, “Haysati nena mootiya mootuwas neeni zaariyabay baawee?” yaagis.
MAT 26:63 Shin Yesuusi si77i gis. Qassika kahine halaqay, “Taani nena de7o Xoossaa sunthan oykayis; neeni Xoossaa Na7aa Kiristoosa gidiko nuus oda” yaagis.
MAT 26:64 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Neeni ne huuphenka gadasa. Shin taani hintew odayis; hizape guye, Asa Na7ay wolqaama Xoossaa ushacha baggan uttidashin, qassi salo shaarara yishin hinte be7ana” yaagis.
MAT 26:65 He wode kahine halaqay daro yilotidi ba ma7uwa peedhidi, “Haysa be7ite Xoossaa cayis! Nuna hara marka ay koshshii? I ha77i cayidaysa hinte si7ideta.
MAT 26:66 Hinte qofay aybee?” yaagis. Entika, “Iyaw hayqo bessees” yaagidi zaaridosona.
MAT 26:67 Yaatin, enti iya som7on cuttidi dechidosona. Harati iya baqidi,
MAT 26:68 “Kiristoosa! Nena dechiday oonee? Ane nuus oda” yaagidosona.
MAT 26:69 Phexroosi zabban uttidashin, issi aylliya iyako yada, “Neenika Galila Yesuusara issife de7aasa” yaagasu.
MAT 26:70 Shin I enta ubbaa sinthan he aylleko, “Neeni giyabay aybeko taani erike” yaagidi kaddis.
MAT 26:71 Qassi bidi dirsaa pengeko gakishin hara aylliya iya be7ada, yan de7iya asaako, “Ha uray Naazirete Yesuusara de7ees” yaagasu.
MAT 26:72 Phexroosi nam7antho caaqidi, “Taani he uraa erike!” yaagis.
MAT 26:73 Guuthu gam7ishin, yan eqida asati Phexroosako yidi, “Neka tuma entara issife de7aasa; neeni ne odan eretasa” yaagidosona.
MAT 26:74 Hessafe guye, Phexroosi, “Taani he uraa erike!” yaagidi, bana baadethinne caaqo doomis. He wode iiraka kuttoy waassi aggis.
MAT 26:75 Yesuusi iyako, “Neeni kuttoy waassanaape sinthe tana heedzu toho kaddana” gidaysa Phexroosi akeekidi, kare keyidi iita yeeho yeekis.
MAT 27:1 Wonta guura kahine halaqatinne biitta cimati ubbay Yesuusa wodhisanaw maqetidosona.
MAT 27:2 Enti Yesuusa qachi efidi deriya haariya Philaxoosas aathidi immidosona.
MAT 27:3 He wode Yesuusa oythida Yihudi, Philaxoosi Yesuusa bolla pirdidaysa be7idi, qiirotidi, he hastamu bira santime kahine halaqatasinne deriya cimatas guye zaaris.
MAT 27:4 “Taani xillo asi hayqos aatha immada nagara oothas” yaagis. Shin enti, “Hessi nu meto gidenna ne meto” yaagidosona.
MAT 27:5 Yihudi miishiya Xoossa Keethan yeggi aggidi enta matape bidi, suletidi hayqis.
MAT 27:6 Kahine halaqati miishiya ekidi, “Ha miishey suutha miishe gidiya gisho, nuuni Xoossa Keethaa miishiyara gatheysi woga gidenna” yaagidosona.
MAT 27:7 Hessafe guye, issife zoretidi, bete asi mooganaw mana biitta shammidosona.
MAT 27:8 Hessa gisho, he gadey hachi gakanaw suutha biitta geetetidi xeegetees.
MAT 27:9 Nabiya Ermiyaasi, “Isra7eele asay iyaw qanxanaw gammatida hastamu bira santime ekidosona.
MAT 27:10 Goday tana kiitidaysada mana biitta shammanaw immidosona” gidaysi he wode poletis.
MAT 27:11 Yesuusi deriya haariya Philaxoosa sinthe shiiqin, Philaxoosi iyako, “Neeni Ayhude kawo?” yaagidi oychis. Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ne gadasa” yaagis.
MAT 27:12 Kahine halaqatinne biitta cimati iya mootiya wode entaw aybi zaaroka immibeenna.
MAT 27:13 He wode Philaxoosi Yesuusako, “Haysati nena mootiya mootuwa ubbaa si7ikii?” yaagis.
MAT 27:14 Yesuusi hari attoshin, issi qaalaka zaaronna ixin, deriya haareysi daro malaaletis.
MAT 27:15 Deriya haareysi laythan laythan Paasika Ba7aale bonchiya gallasan, asay koyiya issi asi qashope birshiya wogi de7ees.
MAT 27:16 He wode issi Barbaana Yesuusa geetetiya daro eretida iita asi qasho keethan de7ees.
MAT 27:17 Hessa gisho, daro asay shiiqidi de7ishin Philaxoosi, “Taani hintew Barbaana billoye woyko Yesuusa geetetiya Kiristoosa billo?” yaagidi asaa oychis.
MAT 27:18 I hessa giday enti qanaatidi Yesuusa oythidaysa eriya gishosa.
MAT 27:19 Philaxoosi pirda keethan uttidashin, iya machiya, “Taani hachi qamma amuhon iyabaa daro waayetashe aqida gisho, he xillo uraa bolla aybibaaka oothofa” yaagada kiittasu.
MAT 27:20 He wode kahine halaqati, “Barbaani bileto, Yesuusi hayqo” gidi Philaxoosa woossana mela asaa cimmidosona.
MAT 27:21 Philaxoosi zaaridi, “Taani enta nam7aafe hintew oona billana mela koyeetii?” yaagidi oychis. Enti, “Barbaana billana mela koyoos” yaagidosona.
MAT 27:22 Philaxoosi, “Yaatin, Yesuusa geetetiya Kiristoosa waato?” yaagidi enta oychis. Ubbay zaaridi, “Masqaliya bolla iya kaqa” yaagidosona.
MAT 27:23 Philaxoosi asaako, “Ayis? I ay iitabaa oothidee?” yaagidi oychis. Shin asay kaseysafe aathidi, “Masqaliya bolla iya kaqa” gidi waassidosona.
MAT 27:24 Ooshshi denthethofe hara aybibaaka oothanaw danda7etonaysa Philaxoosi be7idi, haathe ekidi, “Ha uraa hayquwan taani de7ike. Hessa oothey hintena” yaagidi asaa sinthan ba kushiya meecetis.
MAT 27:25 Asa ubbay zaaridi, “Iya suuthaa gomey nunanne nu nayta gako” yaagidosona.
MAT 27:26 Yaatin, Philaxoosi Barbaana entaw billidi, Yesuusa lisson garaafidi, masqaliya bolla kaqetidi hayqana mela entaw aathidi immis.
MAT 27:27 Hessafe guye, Philaxoosa wotaadareti Yesuusa deriya haareysa soo eki efin, wotaadareti ubbay iya yuushuwan eqidosona.
MAT 27:28 Iya afilaa qaari ekidi zo7o afila mayzidosona.
MAT 27:29 Qassi aguntha kallacha giigisidi, iya huuphen wothidosona. Iya ushacha kushiyan mayre xam7a oythidi, iya sinthan gulbatidi, “Ayhude kawaw, mukulu laythi kawota!” yaagidi, iya bolla qelqisidosona.
MAT 27:30 Iya bolla cuttidosona. He mayre xam7aa ekidi, iya huuphen shocidosona.
MAT 27:31 Enti iya bolla qelqisidaape guye, zo7o afilaa iyape qaari ekidi, iya afilaa iya mayzidosona. Masqaliya bolla iya kaqanaw eki efidosona.
MAT 27:32 Enti kare keyidi, issi Simoona geetetiya Qereena biitta asi demmidi, Yesuusa masqaliya wolqan toossidosona.
MAT 27:33 Golgota geetetiya bessi gakidosona. “Golgota” guussay “Guugge bessi” guussu.
MAT 27:34 Hessan enti ciiye walaketida woyne ushsha uyo gidi iyaw immidosona. Shin I hessa ganxi ekidi, uyonna ixis.
MAT 27:35 Enti masqaliya bolla iya kaqidaysafe guye, iya afilaa shaakidi, saama yeggidi ekidosona.
MAT 27:36 Hessafe guye, yan uttidi iya naagidosona.
MAT 27:37 Qassi, “Haysi Ayhude Kawa Yesuusa” giya mooto xuufiya iya huuphe son wothidosona.
MAT 27:38 Yesuusara he wode nam7u pangata issuwa iyape ushacha baggan, hankuwa iyape haddirsa baggara, masqaliya bolla kaqidosona.
MAT 27:39 Ogiyara aadhiya asay Yesuusa boridi, iya bolla cuttishe,
MAT 27:40 “Xoossa Keethaa laallada heedzu gallasa giddon keexeyso, nena ashsha. Neeni Xoossaa Na7a gidiko, ane masqaliya bollafe wodha” yaagidosona.
MAT 27:41 Hessadaka, kahine halaqati, higge astamaaretinne biitta cimati issife Yesuusa bolla qelqisidosona. Haysada yaagidosona:
MAT 27:42 “Harata ashshis, shin bana ashshanaw danda7ibeenna. I Isra7eele kawo gidiko, ane masqaliya bollafe ha77i wodho, nuka iya ammanana.
MAT 27:43 Xoossan I ammanetees, Xoossay iya ashshanaw koyko ane ashsho. Ayis giiko, I bana, ‘Taani Xoossaa Na7a’ gees” yaagidosona.
MAT 27:44 Qassi hari attoshin, iyara masqaliya bolla kaqetida pangatika hessada gidi iya bolla qelqisidosona.
MAT 27:45 Usupun saatepe bidi, uddufun saate gakanaw biitta ubbay dhumis.
MAT 27:46 Uddufun saate gidiya wode Yesuusi, “Elohe, Elohe, lama sabaqtanii?” gidi gita waaso waassis. “Elohe, Elohe, lama sabaqtanii?” geysa birshethay “Ta Xoossaw, ta Xoossaw, tana ayis aggadii?” guussu.
MAT 27:47 Hessan eqida asaape issoti issoti hessa si7idi, “Ha uray Eeliyaasa xeegees” yaagidosona.
MAT 27:48 Iira entafe issoy woxi bidi, isponje ekidi, caala woyne ushsha kunthis. Hessa mayre xam7a xeeran wothidi ushshanaw iya doonako shiishis.
MAT 27:49 Shin hankoti, “Naaga, Eeliyaasi iya ashshanaw yaaneko ane be7oos” yaagidosona.
MAT 27:50 Yesuusi nam7antho gita waaso waassidi, hayqi aggis.
MAT 27:51 He saaten xoossa keethan kaqetida magaraajoy qommofe duge gakanaw nam7u keyidi, peedheti wodhis. Biittay qaaxis, zaallayka phalqetis.
MAT 27:52 Duufoti dooyetin Xoossaa asatape daroti hayqope dendidosona.
MAT 27:53 Enti duufope keyidi, Yesuusi hayqope dendidaape guye, geeshsha katamaa bidosona; yan enti daro asaas bentidosona.
MAT 27:54 Mato halaqaynne iyara Yesuusa naagiya wotaadareti biittay qaaxidaysanne hessan hanidaba be7ida wode daro yayyidi “Tuma haysi Xoossaa Na7aa” yaagidosona.
MAT 27:55 Hessan daro maccasati, Galilape doomidi Yesuusa haggaazishe kaallidaysati haahon eqidi xeelloosona.
MAT 27:56 Enta giddon Magdela Mayraama, Yayqoobanne Yoosefa aayiya Mayraamanne Zabdiyoosa machiya de7oosona.
MAT 27:57 Sa7ay omarsiya wode Yoosefa geetetiya issi dure aday, Armaate katamape yis. I ba huuphenka Yesuusa kaalliya asi.
MAT 27:58 Yoosefi Philaxoosako bidi, Yesuusa aha ekanaw woossis. Philaxoosi ahay Yoosefas imetana mela kiittis.
MAT 27:59 Yesuusa aha ekidi, geeshsha moogo afilan xaaxis.
MAT 27:60 Baw moogetanaw shuchafe woocida ooratha gongolon iya aha wothis. Qassi he gongoluwa doonan gita shuchaa gondorsi wothidi, aggidi bis.
MAT 27:61 Magdela Mayraamanne hanko Mayraama he gongoluwako simmidi uttidosona.
MAT 27:62 Wontethe Sambaata gallas, kahine halaqatinne Farsaaweti Philaxoosako yidi, haysada yaagidosona:
MAT 27:63 “Godaw, ha wordanchoy paxa de7ishe, ‘Taani heedzu gallasape guye, hayqope dendana’ yaagidaysi nuus hassayetis.
MAT 27:64 Hessa gisho, I moogetida gongoluwa heedzu gallas gakanaw, minthi naagana mela kiittarki. Hessi hanonna ixiko, iya tamaareti bidi iya aha kaysi dhaysidi, ‘Hayqope dendis’ yaagidi asaas odiko nam7antho balesoy koyroysafe ubba haa iitana” yaagidosona.
MAT 27:65 Philaxoosi entako, “Hintew naageysati de7oosona; bidi hintew danda7etida mela naagisite” yaagis.
MAT 27:66 Hessa gisho, enti bidi duufoy boshetonna mela shuchaa bolla maatame wothidi wotaadaretan naagisidosona.
MAT 28:1 Sambaati aadhin, wogga wode wonta guura, Magdela Mayraamanne hanko Mayraama Yesuusi moogetida gongoluwa be7anaw bidosona.
MAT 28:2 Qoponna wolqaama biitta qaaxoy hanis. Godaa kiitanchoy salope wodhidi duufuwa doonan de7iya shuchaa gondorsidi iya bolla uttis.
MAT 28:3 Iya malay wol7anthi daanees. Iya ma7oyka shachada boothi.
MAT 28:4 Naageysati kiitanchuwa be7idi, yashshan kokoridi, hayqida asada hanidosona.
MAT 28:5 Kiitanchoy maccasatako, “Hinte masqaliya bolla kaqetida Yesuusa koyeysa taani eriya gisho, yayyofite.
MAT 28:6 I kase odidaysa mela hayqope dendis; haysan deenna. Haa yidi iya zin7isida bessaa be7ite.
MAT 28:7 Hinte ha77i ellesi bidi, iya tamaaretas, ‘Yesuusi hayqope dendis. Qassi I hintefe sinthatidi Galila baana; hinte iya yan be7ana’ yaagidi odite. Taani hintew haysa odanaw yas” yaagis.
MAT 28:8 Enti yayyishenne daro ufaytishe, duufuwa matape ellessidi bidi, iya tamaaretas odanaw woxidosona.
MAT 28:9 Qoponna Yesuusi entara gahetidi entako, “Saroy hintew gido” yaagis. Enti iyako shiiqidi, iya tohuwa oykidi iyaw goyinnidosona.
MAT 28:10 He wode Yesuusi entako, “Yayyofite; bidi ta tamaareti Galila baana mela entaw odite. Enti yan tana be7ana” yaagis.
MAT 28:11 He maccasati bishin, duufuwa naagiya wotaadaretape baggati katamaa bidi, hanidaba ubbaa kahine halaqatas odidosona.
MAT 28:12 Kahine halaqatinne cimati shiiqidi zoretidi, wotaadaretas daro miishe immidi,
MAT 28:13 “ ‘Nuuni dhiskidashin iya tamaareti qamma yidi, iya aha kaysidosona’ yaagite.
MAT 28:14 Ha odaa deriya haareysi si7iko, hessi hinte bala gidonnaysa nuuni iya odi ammanthana. Hintena aybika Hirgisopo” yaagidosona.
MAT 28:15 Wotaaddareti miishiya ekidi, kiitetidaysada oothidosona. Ha oday Ayhude matan hachi gakanaw odetishe de7ees.
MAT 28:16 Tammanne issi iya tamaareti Yesuusi bantana biite gida Galila Zumaa bolla Keyidosona.
MAT 28:17 Yan enti iya be7ida wode iyaw goyinnidosona, shin entafe issoti issoti sidhidosona.
MAT 28:18 Yesuusi entako shiiqidi, “Saloninne sa7an maati ubbay taw imetis.
MAT 28:19 Hiza, hinte ubba bessi bidi, Aawa, Na7aa, Geeshsha Ayyaana sunthan ase ubbaa xammaqidi tana kaalleyisata oothite.
MAT 28:20 Taani hintena kiittidaba ubbaa enti naagana mela enta tamaarsite. Taani wodiya wursethaa gakanaw ubba wode hintera de7ayis” yaagis.
MAR 1:1 Haysi Xoossa Na7a Yesuus Kiristoosa wongelaa doomethi.
MAR 1:2 Nabiya Isayaasi xaafida maxaafan Xoossay, “Heko, taani ta kiitanchuwa taani neepe sinthe yeddana. I ne ogiya giigisana.
MAR 1:3 Issoy mela biittan ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, ‘Godaa ogiya giigisite; I hemetana horoga iyaw suurisite gis’ ” yaagees.
MAR 1:4 Xammaqiya Yohaanisi asaa xammaqishe, “Hinte nagaraape simmidi xammaqetite; Xoossay hinte nagaraa atto gaana” yaagidi qaala odishe mela biittafe yis.
MAR 1:5 Yihuda biittan de7iya asa ubbaynne Yerusalaame katamaa asa ubbay Yohaanisako yoosona. Banta nagara paaxin, Yohaanisi enta Yordaanose Shaafan xammaqees.
MAR 1:6 Yohaanisi gimale ikisepe dadetida afila ma77ees. Ba xeessan dafo dancees; qassi boolenne degera eessi mees.
MAR 1:7 Yohaanisi qaala odishe, “Taape guyera daro minneysi yees. Hari attoshin, taani iya caammaa wodoruwa hokada billanaw bessike.
MAR 1:8 Taani hintena haathan xammaqayis, shin I hintena Geeshsha Ayyaanan xammaqana” yaagis.
MAR 1:9 Yesuusi he wode Galila biittan de7iya Naazirete katamaape yin, Yohaanisi Yordaanose Shaafan iya xammaqis.
MAR 1:10 Yesuusi haathaafe keyiya wode saloy dooyetin, Geeshsha Ayyaanay ba bolla holleda wodhishin be7is.
MAR 1:11 Qassi salope, “Taani dosiya ta na7ay nena; ta nenan ufaytayis” giya qaalay yis.
MAR 1:12 Iira Geeshsha Ayyaanay Yesuusa mela biitta efis.
MAR 1:13 Yesuusi mela biittan Xalahen paacetishe oytamu gallas gam7is. Do7atara de7is, shin kiitanchoti yidi iya maaddidosona.
MAR 1:14 Yohaanisi qashetidaape guye, Yesuusi Xoossaa kawotethaa Wongela odishe Galila biitta bis.
MAR 1:15 Yan, “Wodey gakis; Xoossaa kawotethay matatis. Hinte nagaraape simmidi, Wongelan ammanite” yaagis.
MAR 1:16 Yesuusi Galila Abbaa matara aadhishe, molo oykiya, Simoonanne iya ishaa Indiriyasa, banta gitiya abban yeggeyisata be7is.
MAR 1:17 Entako, “Tana kaallite; taani hintena ase oythu tamaarsana” yaagis.
MAR 1:18 Enti ellesidi banta gitiya yeggi aggidi Yesuusa kaallidosona.
MAR 1:19 Yesuusi guuthi sinthe bidi, nam7u ishata Zabdiyoosa nayta, Yayqoobanne Yohaanisa wogoluwa giddon banta gitiya giigiseyisata be7is.
MAR 1:20 I enta be7ida mela xeegis. Enti banta aawa Zabdiyoosa, iya oosanchotara wogoluwa giddon yeggi aggidi Yesuusa kaallidi bidosona.
MAR 1:21 Enti Qifirnahooma katamaa gelidosona. Sambaati gelida mela Yesuusi ellesidi ayhude woosa keethi gelidi tamaarso oykis.
MAR 1:22 Maatara de7iya asada tamaarsesipe attishin, higge astamaaretatho tamaarsonna gisho, asay iya timirtiyan malaaletidosona.
MAR 1:23 He wode tuna ayyaanay oykida issi uray ayhude woosa keethi gelidi ba qaala dhoqu oothidi,
MAR 1:24 “Naazirete Yesuusa, neeni nuupe ay koyay? Nuna dhaysanaw yadii? Neeni ooneko ta erayis; neeni Xoossaa Geeshshaa gidikii?” yaagis.
MAR 1:25 Yesuusi he tuna ayyaana, “Hayza, ha addiyafe keya” gidi kiittis.
MAR 1:26 Tuna ayyaanay uraa daferethidi, waassidi iyape keyis.
MAR 1:27 Asa ubbay malaaletidi, “Haysi aybee? Ha uray ba maatan hari attoshin tuna ayyaanataka kiittees. Enti iyaw kiitetoosona; haysi aybi ooratha timirtee?” gidi, banta giddon issoy issuwa oychidosona.
MAR 1:28 Yesuusa sunthay ellesidi Galila biittan de7iya heera ubban keyis.
MAR 1:29 Yesuusi ayhude woosa keethafe keyidi, Yayqoobaranne Yohaanisara Simoona soonne Indiriyasa soo bis.
MAR 1:30 Simoona mache aayiya qoxo misha hargada zin7idaaro Yesuusi yaa gakiya wode iyaw odidosona.
MAR 1:31 I iiko shiiqidi, I kushiya oykidi, iyo denthidi essis. Qoxoynne mishay aggin iya enta mokasu.
MAR 1:32 Hargida asa ubbaanne tuna ayyaanati oykida asa ubbaa omarsi away wullidaape guye, iyako ehidosona.
MAR 1:33 Kataman de7iya asa ubbay he keetha kare shiiqidosona.
MAR 1:34 Yesuusi dumma dumma hargen oyketida daro asaa pathidi, daro tuna ayyaanata kessis. I ooneko tuna ayyaanati erida gisho, enta odisonna diggis.
MAR 1:35 Yesuusi wonta guura dendidi, asi bayna bessi bidi, yan Xoossaa woossis.
MAR 1:36 Simooninne iyara de7eysati iya koyishe bidosona.
MAR 1:37 Enti iya demmidi, “Asa ubbay nena koyees” yaagidosona.
MAR 1:38 Yesuusi qassi enta, “He heeran de7iya hara katamata yedhite. Taani yiday Wongela odanaw gidiya gisho yanka qaala odanaw bessees” yaagis.
MAR 1:39 Ayhude woosa keethatan qaala odishenne tuna ayyaanata kessishe, Galila biitta ubban yuuyis.
MAR 1:40 Baroy oykida issi uray Yesuusako yidi, iya sinthan gulbatidi, “Neeni koyko tana geeshshanaw danda7aasa” yaagidi woossis.
MAR 1:41 Yesuusi iyaw qadhetidi, ba kushiya yeddidi iya bochidi, “Taani koyayis, geeyiya” yaagis.
MAR 1:42 Ellesidi baroy uraa yeddin uray paxis.
MAR 1:43 Yesuusi uraa minthi naagisidi kessi yeddis.
MAR 1:44 Yesuusi iya, “Nena era, haysa oodeska odopa. Shin bada ne asatethaa kahine bessa. Neeni ha77i geeshshi gididaysa asaa erisanaw, Musey kiitida yarshuwa yarsha” yaagis.
MAR 1:45 Shin uray bidi, guta ubban asa ubbaas odis. Hessa gisho, Yesuusi qonce keyidi, katama gelanaw danda7ibeenna. Shin asi bayna bessan gaxan de7is; qassi asay ubba bessafe iyako yoosona.
MAR 2:1 Guutha gallasape guye, Yesuusi Qifirnahooma simmidi, son de7ees giya oday si7etis.
MAR 2:2 Asaa keethay ekonna ixin, hari attoshin kareyka xuummana gakanaw daro asay shiiqin, Yesuusi qaala tamaarsis.
MAR 2:3 Oyddu asati issi gunda uraa tookidi iyako ehidosona.
MAR 2:4 Asay darida gisho, uraa Yesuusako shiishanaw entaw danda7etonna ixin, Yesuusi de7iya ginara keetha qaaridi, kaara qawuxidi uraa I zin7ida algara duge yeddidi Yesuusa sinthan wodhisidosona.
MAR 2:5 Yesuusi enta ammanuwa be7idi, he gunda uraa, “Ta na7aw, ne nagaray atto geetetis” yaagis.
MAR 2:6 Higge astamaaretape he bessan uttida issoti issoti banta wozanan,
MAR 2:7 “La ha uray haysa mela iitabaa Xoossaa bolla ayis odeetii? Xoossaa xalaalape attishin, hari ooni nagara atto gaanaw danda7ii?” gidi qopidosona.
MAR 2:8 Enti banta wozanan hessada qopidaysa Yesuusi ellesidi ba ayyaanan eridi, entako, “Hinte hinte wozanan ayis hessada qopeetii?
MAR 2:9 Gunda uraa, ‘Ne nagaray atto geetetis’ geysi mateyee? Woyko, ‘Denda eqada ne algaa tookada ba’ geysi matee?
MAR 2:10 Shin taw, Asa Na7aas, sa7a bolla nagara atto gaanaw maati de7eysa hinte erana mela” gidi he gunda uraako,
MAR 2:11 “Nena gayis, denda eqada ne algaa tookada ne soo ba” yaagis.
MAR 2:12 Uray ellesi dendi eqidi, ba algaa tookidi asa ubbay be7ishin bis. Asa ubbay malaaletidi, “Nuuni haysa mela malaalsiyaba be7i eroko” yaagidi Xoossaa galatidosona.
MAR 2:13 Yesuusi qassi Galila Abbaa doona simmi bidi, baako yida asa ubbaa tamaarsis.
MAR 2:14 Yaara aadhishe, Ilfiyoosa na7aa Leewe geeteteysi qaraxa qanxisiya bessan uttidaysa be7idi, “Tana kaalla” yaagis. Leewey dendi eqidi iya kaallis.
MAR 2:15 Yesuusi kathi maanaw Leewe son uttis. Iya kaalliya asay daro gidiya gisho, qaraxa qanxisiya daro asaynne nagaranchoti iyaranne iya tamaaretara issife uttidosona.
MAR 2:16 Higge astamaare gidida issi issi Farsaaweti Yesuusi nagaranchotaranne qaraxa qanxiseysatara kathi mishin be7idi, “I ayis nagaranchotaranne qaraxa qanxiseysatara kathi mii?” yaagidi, iya tamaareta oychidosona.
MAR 2:17 Yesuusi enti geysa si7idi, “Harganchotape attishin, paxatas aakime koshshenna. Taani nagaranchota xeeganaw yasipe attishin, xillota xeeganaw yabiike” yaagidi entaw zaaris.
MAR 2:18 Xammaqiya Yohaanisa tamaaretinne Farsaaweti xoomosona. Issi issi asati Yesuusako yidi, “Yohaanisa tamaaretinne Farsaaweta tamaareti xoomosona, shin ne tamaareti ayis xoomokonaa?” yaagidosona.
MAR 2:19 Yesuusi entako, “Yaaganuwa yida asati machiw ekeysi entara de7ishin, xoomanaw danda7onna? Machiw ekeysi entara de7ishin, xoomanaw danda7okona.
MAR 2:20 Shin machiw ekeysi enta matape eketana wodey yaana, enti he wode xoomana.
MAR 2:21 “Gal7a ma7o bolla ooratha carqe wothidi sikiya asi baawa. Wothidi sikiko, oorathay ceega ma7uwa daakees; daakethayka kaseysafe darees.
MAR 2:22 Qassi mal7anto woyne ceega ogoron qoliya asi baawa. Shin qoliko, he woyney ogoruwa daakees, bawuka gukees, ogoroyka iitees. Shin mal7anto woyney ooratha ogoron qoletees” yaagis.
MAR 2:23 Yesuusi issi Sambaata gallas banga gade giddora aadhishin, iya tamaareti iyara bishe banga tiya shirkidi moosona.
MAR 2:24 Farsaaweti Yesuusako, “Heko, ne tamaareti Sambaata gallas woga gidonnaba ayis oothonna?” yaagidosona.
MAR 2:25 Yesuusi entako, “Dawiti koshatidi, miyaba koyida wode, baara de7eysatara oothidaysa nabbabibeketii?
MAR 2:26 Abyataari kahine halaqa gididi de7iya wode Dawiti Xoossa keethi gelidi, kahineta xalaali maanape attishin, oonika maanaw woga gidonnaysa Godaa sinthan wothida daabbuwa mis, baara de7eystaska immis” yaagis.
MAR 2:27 Qassika Yesuusi entako, “Sambaati asa na7a go77as medhetisipe attishin, asi Sambaatas medhetibeenna.
MAR 2:28 Hessa gisho, Asa Na7ay, hari attoshin Sambaataska Godaa” yaagis.
MAR 3:1 Yesuusi ayhude woosa keethi simmi gelis. Yan kushey gundida issi uray de7ees.
MAR 3:2 Issi issi asay Yesuusa mootanaw koyidi, kushey gundida uraa Sambaata gallas I pathikonne aggiko be7anaw koyidi minthidi naagoosona.
MAR 3:3 Yesuusi kushey gundida uraa, “Denda eqada haa sinthe ya” yaagis.
MAR 3:4 Hessafe guye, asaako, “Sambaata gallas lo77oba ootheysi wogeye iitabaa ootheysi wogee? Asa shempo ashoye woyko wodho?” yaagidi oychis. Shin asay si77i gis.
MAR 3:5 Yesuusi hanqetidi, enta yuushshi aathi xeellidi, enti odin si7onnayisata gidiya gisho, enta bolla daro azzanis. He addiyako, “Ne kushiya piddi ootha” yaagis. Uray piddi oothin iya kushey paxis.
MAR 3:6 Ellesidi Farsaaweti ayhude woosa keethafe kare keyidi, Yesuusa waati wodhaneko maqetanaw Herodiisa baggatara issi soo shiiqidosona.
MAR 3:7 Yesuusi ba tamaaretara Galila Abbaako bis. Galilapenne Yihudape yida daro asay iya kaallidosona.
MAR 3:8 Qassika Yerusalaamepe, Edomiyaasape, Yordaanose Shaafa pinthafe, Xiroosa katamaapenne Sidoona katamaape Yesuusi oothidaba si7idi, daro asay iyako yidosona.
MAR 3:9 Asaa darotethaafe dendoysan iya un7ethonna mela iya tamaareti wogolo iyaw giigisana mela kiittis.
MAR 3:10 Daro asaa I pathida gisho, hargiya asa ubbay iya bochanaw sugetoosona.
MAR 3:11 Tuna ayyaanay oykida asati iya be7ida wode iya sinthan kundidi, banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa gidikii?” yaagosona.
MAR 3:12 He tuna ayyaanati iya oonatetha oodeska qoncisonna mela entaw minthidi odis.
MAR 3:13 Yesuusi deriya bolla keyidi, ba koyida asata baako xeegis; entika iyako bidosona.
MAR 3:14 Enti baara daana melanne qaala tamaarsana mela tammanne nam7ata dooridi, enta, “Hawaareta” gidi sunthis.
MAR 3:15 Tuna ayyaanataka kessana mela entaw maata immis.
MAR 3:16 I doorida tammanne nam7ati haysata: Phexroosa yaagidi sunthida Simoona,
MAR 3:17 Bo7anerges (Dada Nayta) yaagidi sunthidaysata, Zabdiyoosa nayta Yayqoobanne Yayqooba ishaa Yohaanisa,
MAR 3:18 Indiriyasa, Filphoosa, Bartelemoosa, Maatosa, Toomasa, Ilfiyoosa na7a Yayqooba, Taadiyosa, ba biittas mishetiya Simoonanne,
MAR 3:19 Yesuusa aathidi immida Asqoroota Yihuda.
MAR 3:20 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi soo bis. Qassi daro asay shiiqin, inne iya tamaareti hari attoshin kathi maanawuka danda7ibookona.
MAR 3:21 Asay iya, “Gooyees” giya gisho, iya dabboti hessa si7idi iya ekanaw bidosona.
MAR 3:22 Higge astamaaretape issoti issoti Yerusalaamepe yidi, “Iya bolla Bi7eel-Zebuuli de7ees”, I, “Xalahey wolqan tuna ayyaanata kessees” yaagidi odetidosona.
MAR 3:23 Yesuusi asaa baako xeegidi leemiso odis. “Xalahey Xalahe waati kessanaw danda7ii?
MAR 3:24 Issi kawotethay ba giddon shaaketiko he kawotethay eqanaw danda7enna.
MAR 3:25 Hessadaka, issi keetha asay banta giddon shaaketiko dhayanape attishin, daanaw danda7okona.
MAR 3:26 Hiza, Xalahey baara kacetidi shaaketiko dhayope attishin, daanaw danda7enna.
MAR 3:27 “Shin koyrottidi wolqaama uraa qachonna de7ishe iya keetha gelidi, iya miishiya bonqanaw danda7iya asi baawa. Qachi simmidi iya keetha bonqanaw danda7ees.
MAR 3:28 “Taani hintew tuma odayis; Xoossay asa naytas nagara ubbaanne enti cayiya cashshe ubbaa atto gaana.
MAR 3:29 Shin Geeshsha Ayyaana bolla iitabaa odetiya oodeska merinaa nagara gidanaape attishin, Xoossay ubbaraka iya maarenna” yaagis.
MAR 3:30 Yesuusi hessa giday, issi issi asati, “Iya bolla tuna ayyaanay de7ees” yaagida gishosa.
MAR 3:31 Iya aayanne iya ishati yidi karen eqidi, iyako ase kiittidi iya xeegidosona.
MAR 3:32 Iya matan uttida daro asati, “Heko, ne aayeranne ne ishatara karen eqidi nena koyoosona” yaagidosona.
MAR 3:33 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ta aayiya oonee? Qassi ta ishati oonantee?” yaagis.
MAR 3:34 Ba matan uttida asa yuushshi aathi xeellidi, “Heko, ta aayanne ta ishati haysata.
MAR 3:35 Xoossay sheniya oothiya ubbay ta isha, ta michonne ta aayo” yaagis.
MAR 4:1 Yesuusi zaaridi Galila Abbaa matan tamaarsees. Daro asay iya matan yuushuwan shiiqin, abban de7iya wogoluwa giddo gelidi uttis, asa ubbay Abbaa matan de7ees.
MAR 4:2 I enta darobaa leemison tamaarsis. Tamaarsishe haysada yaagis:
MAR 4:3 “Si7ite! Issi uray zerethi zeranaw keyis.
MAR 4:4 I zerishin, issi issi zerethay oge gaxan wodhis; kafoti yidi midosona.
MAR 4:5 Issi issi zerethay garsan shaalloy de7iya biitta bolla wodhis. Daro biitti bayna gisho, he zerethay ellesidi dolis.
MAR 4:6 Shin awi keyida wode shullis. Loythidi xapho yeddiboonna gisho, ellesi melis.
MAR 4:7 Issi issi zerethay aguntha giddon wodhis. Dolidaysa agunthay diccidi cuullida gisho ayfe ayfonna attis.
MAR 4:8 Issi issi zerethay aradda biittan wodhidi dolis. Diccidi issoy hastama, issoy usupun tamma issoy xeeta ayfis” yaagis.
MAR 4:9 “Si7iya haythi de7iya oonika si7o” yaagis.
MAR 4:10 Yesuusi odidaysa si7ida issi issi asatinne tammanne nam7u tamaareti Yesuusi barka de7ishin, iyako shiiqidi he leemisuwa birshethaa oychidosona.
MAR 4:11 Yesuusi entako haysada yaagis: “Hintew Xoossaa kawotethaa xuuraa eroy imetis. Shin haratas kawotethaafe karen de7eysatas ubbabay leemison odetees.
MAR 4:12 Gaasoyka, “ ‘Enti xeelloosona, shin demmokona. Si7oosona, shin akeekokona. Enti demmiyakonne akeekiyako, Xoossaako simmana ika enta maaranashin’ ” yaagis.
MAR 4:13 Yesuusi entako, “Ha leemisoy hintew gelennee? Yaatin, leemiso ubbaa hinte waati akeekanee?
MAR 4:14 Zereysi Xoossaa qaala zerees.
MAR 4:15 Qaalay zeretiya wode oge gaxan wodhidaysati qaala si7idaysata. Shin Xalahey ellesidi, yidi enta wozanan zeretida qaala maxi diggees.
MAR 4:16 Hessadaka, garsan shaalloy de7iya biittan zeretidaysi qaala si7idi, ellesidi ufaysan ekeysa.
MAR 4:17 Shin iyaw mino xaphoy bayna gisho ha77issafe attishin, gam7okona. Guutha wodepe guye qaala gaason waayey woyko goodi gakiya wode ellesidi dhubetoosona.
MAR 4:18 Aguntha giddon zeretidaysi qaala si7eyisata.
MAR 4:19 Shin ha sa7a de7uwas hirgoy, duretetha dosoynne haraba amotteysi iya wozanan gelidi qaala cuulliya gisho ayfe ayfonna attis.
MAR 4:20 Shin aradda biittan zeretidaysati qaala si7idi ekeyisata. Enti issoy hastama, issoy usupun tamma issoy xeeta ayfis” yaagis.
MAR 4:21 Yesuusi gujidi, “Xompe ekidi, daachofe woyko algafe garsan wothiya asi de7ii? Dhoqa bessan wothenneyee?
MAR 4:22 Hiza, qosetidabay ubbay qonce keyana; geemmidabay ubbay eretonna attenna.
MAR 4:23 Si7iya haythi de7iya oonika si7o” yaagis.
MAR 4:24 Qassi entako, “Hinte si7iyaba akeekidi si7ite! Xoossaa qaala hinte si7eysa mela I hintew akeeka immana. Ubbaka hintew darsidi immana.
MAR 4:25 Issibay de7iya uraas guji imetana, baynaysafe hari attoshin, iyaw de7iya he guuthiyaka eketana” yaagis.
MAR 4:26 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Xoossaa kawotethay ba gaden zerethi zeriya asa mela.
MAR 4:27 He uray qamma dhiskees; wonta dendees. I ba huuphen waaniyako eronna de7ishin he zerethay doleesinne diccees.
MAR 4:28 Biittay kathi barka immees. Koyro dolidi diccees, kaallidi ayfanaw gambuxees, wursethan kumetha ayfe ayfees.
MAR 4:29 Shin kathay gakiya wode uray ellesidi baacara geli aggees” yaagis.
MAR 4:30 Yesuusi, “Nuuni Xoossaa kawotethaa ay daanees gaanee? Woyko aybira leemisanee?
MAR 4:31 Xoossaa kawotethay ayfe guutha mithi daanees. He mithaa ayfiya zeriya wode sa7an de7iya mitha ayfe ubbaafe guuxees.
MAR 4:32 Zerin dolidi atakilte ubbaafe gitatees; daro daashshi daayees. Kafoti iya tashiya bolla keexidi uttana gakanaw daayees” yaagis.
MAR 4:33 Yesuusi haysa mela daro leemison asay akeekanaw danda7eysa mela qaala odis.
MAR 4:34 Asaas leemisoy bayna odenna. Shin Yesuusi ba tamaareta xalaalara de7iya wode, entaw ubbaba birshidi odis.
MAR 4:35 He gallas sa7i omarsin, Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Abbaafe hefinthi pinnoos” yaagis.
MAR 4:36 Iya tamaareti daro asa yeggi aggidi, Yesuusi kase geli uttida wogoluwan gelidi Yesuusa bantara efidosona. Hara wogolotika yan de7oosona.
MAR 4:37 Wolqaama gotey dendidi, hobbey wogoluwa shocin, kumana gakanaw wogoluwa giddo haathi gelis.
MAR 4:38 He wode Yesuusi wogoluwan guye baggara borkotidi dhiskis. Iya tamaareti iya denthidi, “Astamaariyaw, nuuni dhayiya wode ne si77i gada xeellay?” yaagidosona.
MAR 4:39 Yaatin, I barkidi gotiya, “Si7i ga” gidi, abbaaka, “Wopu ga” gis. Goteyka si77i gin ubbabay wopu gis.
MAR 4:40 Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Ayis haysada babetii? Hintew ammanoy waanidi dhayidee?” yaagis.
MAR 4:41 Enti daro babidi banta giddon, “Haysi hari attoshin, goteynne abbay kiiteteysi oonee?” yaagidosona.
MAR 5:1 Yesuusinne iya tamaareti abba pinnidi, Gergesoone biitta gakidosona.
MAR 5:2 Yesuusi wogoluwape wodhiya wode tuna ayyaanay oykida issi uray duufope keyidi iyara gahetis.
MAR 5:3 He uray aqi pee7idi de7ey duufona. Iya oonika santhalaatan qachanaw danda7enna.
MAR 5:4 I daro toho duthaninne santhalaatan qashetidi de7ees. Shin santhalaata duuserethees, dutha mentherethees. Iya teqanaw danda7iya oonika baawa.
MAR 5:5 I qammanne gallas he duufuwaninne dere bolla waassees, ba asatethaa shuchan gaarees.
MAR 5:6 Yesuusa haahon be7ida wode woxi bidi iya sinthan gulbatis.
MAR 5:7 He uray ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa Na7aw Yesuusa, nenanne tana aybe gathey? Tana dhaysona mela taani nena Xoossaa sunthan woossayis” yaagis.
MAR 5:8 I hessa giday Yesuusi iya, “La ha tuna ayyaanaw, ha addiyafe keya” yaagida gishosa.
MAR 5:9 Yesuusi iyako, “Ne sunthay oonee?” yaagidi oychis. I, “Nuuni daro gidiya gisho, ta sunthay Leegiyona” yaagis.
MAR 5:10 Tuna ayyaanati bantana he biittafe kessi yeddonna mela Yesuusa minthidi woossidosona.
MAR 5:11 He deriya bolla daro guduntho wudey hemetees.
MAR 5:12 Tuna ayyaanati Yesuusako, “Nuna hini guduntho wudiyako yeddarki, entan bidi geloos” yaagidi woossidosona.
MAR 5:13 Yesuusi entako, “Biite” yaagis. Yaatin tuna ayyaanati addiyafe keyidi gudunthotan gelidosona. Nam7u mukulu gidiya guduntho wudey aafo doonara dirgidi bidi abban gelidi mitetidosona.
MAR 5:14 Guduntho wudiya heemmeysati baqati bidi hanidaba katamaninne gaxariyan odidosona. Yaatin asay hanidaba be7anaw keyidosona.
MAR 5:15 Asay Yesuusako yaa wode tuna ayyaanan oyketida uraa be7idosona. I ba wozanaako simmidi, ma7o ma7idi, yan uttidaysa be7ida wode ubbay yayyidosona.
MAR 5:16 Hessa be7ida asati tuna ayyaanati oykida uraa bollanne gudunthota bolla hanidaba ubbaa asaas odidosona.
MAR 5:17 Hessa gisho, asay banta biittafe Yesuusi baana mela woossidosona.
MAR 5:18 Yesuusi wogoluwan geliya wode kase tuna ayyaanay oykidi yeddida uray, Yesuusa kaallanaw iya woossis.
MAR 5:19 Shin Yesuusi ixidi iyako, “Ne soo simmada, Goday new ay mela gitaba oothidaakonne new ay mela keehidaako ne soo asaas oda” yaagis.
MAR 5:20 Uray bidi Tammu Katamaa geetetiya bessan yuuyidi, Yesuusi baw ay mela gitaba oothidaako odis. I odidaysa si7ida asa ubbay malaaletidosona.
MAR 5:21 Yesuusi simmidi, wogoluwan gelidi, abba pinnidaape guye daro asay abba gaxan iya yuushuwan shiiqidosona.
MAR 5:22 Iyaroosa geetetiya ayhude woosa keetha halaqatape issoy, Yesuusa be7ida wode iyako yidi iya tohuwa bolla
MAR 5:23 kundidi, “Ta na7iya hargada hayqana hanawusu. Iya paxada de7ana mela yada ne kushiya I bolla wotharki” yaagidi Yesuusa minthidi woossis.
MAR 5:24 Yesuusi Iyaroosara bis. I bishin daro asay iya kaallidi un7ethidosona.
MAR 5:25 Tammanne nam7u laythi Ipe suuthi dhohiya issi maccasiya de7awusu.
MAR 5:26 Daro aakimeti iyo aakimidosona, shin iya paxa kaa7etasu. Iya ba miishiya ubbaa wursinka iw haa iitisipe attishin, aykoka maaddibeenna.
MAR 5:27 He maccasiya Yesuusaba si7ada, asaa kanthada Yesuusa guyera yada iya ma7uwa bochasu.
MAR 5:28 Iya, “Taani hari attoshin iya ma7uwa bochiyako paxana” gada qopasu.
MAR 5:29 Iipe goggiya suuthay iiraka eqi aggis. Iya ba waayiyape paxidaysa ba asatethan erasu.
MAR 5:30 Yesuusi baape wolqi keydaysa ba huuphen eridi, ellesidi daro asa giddon guye simmidi, “Ta ma7uwa bochiday oonee?” yaagis.
MAR 5:31 Iya tamaareti, “Asay nena sugeysa be7ashe, ‘Woygada tana oone bochiday yaagay?’ ” yaagidosona.
MAR 5:32 Yesuusi hessa ooni oothidaako be7anaw yuushshi aathi xeellis.
MAR 5:33 Shin maccasiya baw hanidaba erada, yashshan kokorashe yada Yesuusa sinthan gufannasu; qassi hanidaba ubbaa tumaa iyaw odasu.
MAR 5:34 Yaanin, Yesuusi iiko, “Ta naatte, nena ne ammanoy pathis, saron ba, ne waayapeka paxa” yaagis.
MAR 5:35 Yesuusi buroo hessa odishin, ayhude woosa keetha halaqaa soope kiitetida asati yidi, “Ne na7iya hayqasu, astamaariya ayis daabursay?” yaagidosona.
MAR 5:36 Shin Yesuusi enti geysa si7idi, ayhude woosa keetha halaqaako, “Ammano xalaala ammanape attishin, babofa” yaagis.
MAR 5:37 Yesuusi Phexroosape, Yayqoobapenne Yayqooba ishaa Yohaanisape hari oonika bana kaallonna mela diggis.
MAR 5:38 Enti ayhude woosa keetha halaqaa soo gakiya wode Yesuusi asay kaha dhayidi yeekeysanne zeleeleysa be7is.
MAR 5:39 Gelidi asaako, “Ayis kaha dhayidi yeeketii? Na7iya dhiskasupe attishin, hayqabuuku” yaagis.
MAR 5:40 Asay iya bolla miicis. Shin asa ubbaa kare kessidi, na7e aawa, aayiwunne heedzu tamaareta baara ekidi na7iya de7iyasuwa gelis.
MAR 5:41 Yesuusi na7e kushiya oykidi, “Xaalita, quumi” (Guutha naatte, nena gayis denda) yaagis.
MAR 5:42 Na7iya ellesa denda eqada hemetasu. Iya tammanne nam7u laytha na7a. Hessan asay daro malaaletidosona.
MAR 5:43 Yesuusi hessa enti oodeska odonna mela enta minthi kiittis. Enti iw miyaba immana mela odis.
MAR 6:1 Yesuusi yaape keyidi, ba tamaareta kaalethidi, ba katama Naazirete bis.
