MAR 6:2 Sambaata gallas ayhude woosa keethan tamaarso oykis. I tamaarseysa si7ida daro asay malaaletidi, “Haysi ha ubbaa awupe demmidee? Ha cincatethaa I awupe ekidee? Ha malaatata oothiya maata I awupe demmidee?
MAR 6:3 Haysi anaaxiya gidennee? Mayraami na7a, Yayqooba, Yoosa, Yihudanne Simoona ishaa gidenneyee? Iya micheti nuura haysan de7okonayee?” yaagidi, I giyaba ekonna ixidosona.
MAR 6:4 Yesuusi he asaako, “Nabey ba biittan, ba dabbotaninne ba soo asan bonchetenafe attishin, harata matan bonchetees” yaagis.
MAR 6:5 I he bessan ba kushiya guutha asaa bolla wothidi pathidaysafe attishin, hara malaatata oothanaw danda7ibeenna.
MAR 6:6 Asay ammanibona gisho daro malaaletis. Hessafe guye, Yesuusi he heeran de7iya gutatan asaa tamaarsees.
MAR 6:7 Yesuusi tammanne nam7u tamaareta baako xeegidi, nam7aa nam7aa gathidi kiittis. Entaw tuna ayyaanata kessiya wolqaa immis.
MAR 6:8 Enta, “Oge xam7afe attishin, kathi, karxiita, hinte kiisen miishe aybibaaka oykofite.
MAR 6:9 Hinte tohuwan caamma aathite, shin nam7u afila oykofite” yaagis.
MAR 6:10 Qassika, “Hintena asi mokida soo awunka gidin he bessaa yeddidi baana gakanaw he keethan gam7ite.
MAR 6:11 Hintena asi mokonasuwa woyko hinte odiyaba si7onnasuwa awun gidikoka, he biittan de7iya asaas marka gidana mela he bessaafe keyishe, hinte tohuwape baana pitite” yaagis.
MAR 6:12 Tammanne nam7u tamaareti bidi, asay banta nagaraape simmanaada qaala odidosona.
MAR 6:13 Enti asape daro tuna Ayyaanata kessidosona. Daro harganchota zayte tiyidi pathidosona.
MAR 6:14 Yesuusa sunthay ubba bessan keyida gisho, Kawoy Herodiisi iyabaa si7is. Issi issi asay, “Xammaqiya Yohaanisi hayqope dendis, hessa gisho ha malaatata oothey iya” yaagidosona.
MAR 6:15 Baggati, “Haysi Eeliyaasa gidennee?” yaagidosona. Harati qassi, “Haysi beni wode nabetape issuwa gidonna aggenna” yaagidosona.
MAR 6:16 Shin Herodiisi hessa si7ida wode, “Haysi taani qoodhiya qanxisida Xammaqiya Yohaanisa gidennee? I hayqope dendis” yaagis.
MAR 6:17 Herodiisi ba ishaa Filphoosa machiw Herodiyada ekida gisho I gaason Yohaanisa oythidi qashisis.
MAR 6:18 Yohaanisi Herodiisa, “Neeni ne ishaa machiw ekanaw bessenna” yaagis.
MAR 6:19 Herodiyada Yohaanisa ba ulon morkada iya wodhisanaw koyasu, shin danda7abuku.
MAR 6:20 Yohaanisi xillonne geeshsha asi gididaysa Herodiisi erida gisho, iyaw babidi loythi naagisees. Herodiisi Yohaanisi giyaba si7anaw dosikoka I giyaba si7iya wode daro dagammees.
MAR 6:21 Herodiisi ba yeletida gallasa bonchanaw deriya haareysatas, shaalaqatasinne Galilan de7iya gita asaas imato giigisis. Hessi Herodiyadas inje gallas gidis.
MAR 6:22 Herodiyada na7iya imathay moketiya bessaa gela durada, Herodiisanne iya imathata ufaysasu. Kawoy na7iw, “Ne koyaba ayba gidikoka tana oycha, taani new immana” yaagis.
MAR 6:23 Qassi iw caaqidi, “Neeni oychiyaba ayba gidikoka, taani new immana. Hari attoshin, ta kawotethaa baggaa gidikoka taani new immana” yaagis.
MAR 6:24 Na7iya kare keyada ba aayeko, “Ay imma go?” gada oychasu. I aayiya, “Xammaqiya Yohaanisa huuphiya imma ga” yaagasu.
MAR 6:25 Na7iya ellesada kawako bada, “Xammaqiya Yohaanisa huuphiya saanen wothada ha77i taw immana mela koyayis” yaagasu.
MAR 6:26 Yaanin, kawoy daro qiirotis, shin ba imathata gisho iw caaqida ba caaquwa menthanaw koybeenna.
MAR 6:27 Hessa gisho, ellesidi naageysa Yohaanisa huuphiya ehana mela kiittis. Naageysi qasho keethi bidi Yohaanisa qoodhiya qanxis.
MAR 6:28 He qanxetida huuphiya saanen wothi ehidi na7ees immis. Na7iya qassi ba aayes immasu.
MAR 6:29 Yohaanisa tamaareti hessa si7ida wode bidi iya aha eki efidi moogidosona.
MAR 6:30 Tammanne nam7u hawaareti simmi yidi enti oothidabaanne tamaarsidaba ubbaa Yesuusas odidosona.
MAR 6:31 Entako yaa asaynne biya asay darida gisho, Yesuusaranne iya tamaaretara, hari attoshin kathi maanawuka enta gathonna ixis. Yaanin, Yesuusi entako, “Nurka guuthi shempi ekanaw asi bayna bessi yedhite” yaagis.
MAR 6:32 Hessa gisho, enti bantarka wogolon gelidi asi bayna bessi bidosona.
MAR 6:33 Enti bishin daro asay enta be7idi eridosona. Yaatin, katama ubbaafe asay tohora woxi bidi enti biya bessaa entafe sinthe gakidosona.
MAR 6:34 Yesuusi wogoluwape wodhidi daro asa be7is. Asay heemmiya asi bayna dorsa mela gididaysa be7idi entaw qadhetidi enta darobaa tamaarsis.
MAR 6:35 Sa7ay omarsiya wode Yesuusa tamaareti iyako yidi, “Haysi bessay asi bayna bessi; ha77i sa7ika qammis.
MAR 6:36 Asay gutatanne katamata bidi bantaw miyaba shammana mela asa yedda” yaagidosona.
MAR 6:37 Shin Yesuusi zaaridi entako, “Asaas miyaba hinte immite” yaagis. Enti, “Nuuni bidi nam7u xeetu dinaaren uythu shammidi asaa muzana mela koyay?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAR 6:38 Yesuusi entako, “Hintew aapun uythi de7ii? Ane bidi be7ite” yaagis. Enti be7idi, “Ichashu uythunne nam7u molo” yaagidosona.
MAR 6:39 Yesuusi ba tamaareta asa ubbaa cugan cugan shaakidi maatan utisana mela kiittis.
MAR 6:40 Asay xeetu cuganinne ishatamu cugan shaaketi shaaketi uttidosona.
MAR 6:41 Yesuusi ichashu uythaanne nam7u molota ekidi, pude salo xeellidi Xoossaa galatis. Uythaa menthidi asaas gishana mela ba tamaaretas immis. Qassi nam7u molota enta ubbaas shaakis.
MAR 6:42 Asa ubbay midi kallidosona.
MAR 6:43 Attida uytha tiifiyanne molota tiifiya, iya tamaareti tammanne nam7u gayta kumethi denthidosona.
MAR 6:44 Uythaa mida adde asaa tayboy ichashu mukulu.
MAR 6:45 Ellesidi Yesuusi ba tamaareti wogoluwan gelidi, abbaafe hefinthan de7iya Beetesayda baape sinthatidi baana mela kiittis. Shin baw asaa moyzanaw guye attis.
MAR 6:46 Asaa moyzidaape guye, Xoossaa woossanaw zuma bolla keyis.
MAR 6:47 Sa7ay qammiya wode wogoloy abba giddon de7ees, shin Yesuusi abbaafe gaxan barka de7ees.
MAR 6:48 Carkoy iya tamaaretako carkiya gisho, abba pidhoy waayseysa Yesuusi be7is. Wontimaathe sa7i geeyana haniya wode I abba bolla hemetishe entako yidi, enta yeggidi aadhanaw koyis.
MAR 6:49 Shin I abba bolla hemetishin, enti be7idi, entaw moytille daanin waassidosona.
MAR 6:50 Enti ubbay iya be7idi, yashshan kokoridosona. Shin Yesuusi ellesidi entako, “Tana, aykoy baawa; yayyofite” yaagis.
MAR 6:51 Yesuusi wogoluwan gelidi entara issife uttin carkoy wopu gis. Enti daro malaaletidosona.
MAR 6:52 Enta wozanay zel7umida gisho, enti uythabaa akeekibokona.
MAR 6:53 Enti abba pinnidi, Gensareexe biitta gakidi, wogoluwa gaxa shiishidi qachidosona.
MAR 6:54 Enti wogoluwape wodhiya wode asay ellesidi Yesuusa eridosona.
MAR 6:55 Enti heeran de7iya biitta ubban woxeretidi harganchota halan tookidi, “Yesuusi de7ees” gin si7ida bessaa ehidosona.
MAR 6:56 Asay I bida soo ubban, gaxariyan gidin, kataman, de7iya harganchota dabaaba efoosona. Harganchoti iya afilaa macaraa gidikoka bochana mela asay iya woossidosona. Bochida ubbay paxis.
MAR 7:1 Yerusalaamepe yida guutha Farsaawetinne higge astamaareti Yesuusa matan shiiqidosona.
MAR 7:2 Yesuusa tamaaretape issoti issoti geeyonna kushiyan, hessika kushe meecetonna kathi meyisata be7idosona.
MAR 7:3 Farsaawetinne Ayhude asa ubbay banta aawata wogaatho banta kushiya meecetonna mookonna.
MAR 7:4 Hessadaka, enti giyape shametidaba meecconna de7ishe mokonna. Qassi enti banta aawatape ekida hara daro wogi de7ees: hessika sineta, kereta, birata miishetanne arsa meecciya wogaa naageysa.
MAR 7:5 Farsaawetinne higge astamaareti Yesuusa, “Ne tamaareti ayis aawata wogaa menthidi banta kushiya meecetonna kathi moonna?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAR 7:6 Yesuusi entako, “Isayaasi hintena cubbota, “ ‘Haysi asay tana ba inxarsa xalaalan bonchees, shin enta wozanay taape haahon de7ees.
MAR 7:7 Asi medhida wogaa Xoossaa higge daanisidi tamaarsiya gisho, enti taw mela goyinnoosona’ ” gidi xaafidaysi tuma.
MAR 7:8 “Hinte Xoossaa kiitaa aggidi asa wogaa minthidi naageta” yaagis.
MAR 7:9 Qassika Yesuusi, “Hinte hinte wogaa naagidi Xoossaa kiitaa yeggi agganaw lo77o oge demmideta.
MAR 7:10 Musey, ‘Ne aawanne ne aayiw boncha’, qassi ‘Ba aawanne ba aayiw cayeysi hayqanaw bessees’ yaagis.
MAR 7:11 Shin issi asi ba aawa woyko ba aayiw maaddanaysa aggidi, ‘Haysi taani Xoossas immida yarsho’ giiko,
MAR 7:12 I ba aawa woyko ba aayiw maaddonna mela ootheeta.
MAR 7:13 Hessadaka, hinte harata tamaarsida hinte wogan Xoossaa qaala kadhideta. Hessa mela hara darobaa ootheeta” yaagis.
MAR 7:14 Yesuusi daro asaa qassika baako xeegidi, “Ubbay taani odeysa si7itenne akeekite.
MAR 7:15 Asa wozanape keyaabay ase tuniseesipe attishin, karepe asa ulo gelidi ase tunisiyabay aybika baawa.
MAR 7:16 Si7iya haythi de7iya oonika si7o” yaagis.
MAR 7:17 Yesuusi daro asaa yeggi aggidi soo gelin iya tamaareti he leemisuwaba iya oychidosona.
MAR 7:18 I entako, “Hintewuka qassi gelibeennee? Karepe asan geliyabay aybika ase tunisanaw danda7onnaysa akeeketii?
MAR 7:19 Ayis giiko, kathi asa ulo giddo gelidi kanthidi aadhesipe attishin, asa wozana giddo gelenna” yaagis. Hessan Yesuusi kathi ubbay geeshshi gideysa erisis.
MAR 7:20 Kaallidika, Yesuusi, “Asa tunisiyabay asa wozana giddofe keyaaba.
MAR 7:21 Asa wozana giddofe keyaabay iita qofa, laymatethi, kayso, ase wodho, laame,
MAR 7:22 iita amo, iitatethi, gene, qayxe, cimo, qanaate, cashshe, otoronne boozatethi.
MAR 7:23 Ha iitabay ubbayka asa wozana giddofe keyidi ase tunisees” yaagis.
MAR 7:24 Yesuusi yaape keyidi, Xiroosa katama matan de7iya biitta bis. I issi keethi gelidi yan de7eysa oonika erana mela koybeenna. Shin qosetidi gam7anaw danda7ibeenna.
MAR 7:25 Shin I guutha na7iw tuna ayyaanay oykida issi maccasiya Yesuusaba si7ada ellesa iyako yada iya tohuwa bolla kundasu.
MAR 7:26 Iya Ayhude maccasi giduku; iya yeletiday Sirofinqe biittana. Iya, ba na7epe tuna ayyaana kessana mela Yesuusa woossasu.
MAR 7:27 Shin Yesuusi zaaridi, “Nayti koyrottidi kathaa kallo; nayta kathaa ekidi kanatas yeggeysi lo77o gidenna” yaagis.
MAR 7:28 Maccasiya zaarada, “Ta Godaw hessi tuma, shin gayta matan de7iya kanati naytape wodhiya tiifiya moosona” yaagasu.
MAR 7:29 Yesuusi qassi iiko, “Ha ne qaala gisho, ne soo ba; tuna ayyaanay ne na7epe keyis” yaagis.
MAR 7:30 Maccasiya ba soo biya wode tuna ayyaanay iipe keyin hiixan zin7idaaro demmasu.
MAR 7:31 Yesuusi Xiroosa katamaape keyidi, Sidoonaranne Tammu Katamata geetetiya biittara kanthidi Galila Abbaako bis.
MAR 7:32 Asay tullenne waayidi odetiya asi Yesuusako ehidi, ba kushiya iya bolla wothana mela iya woossidosona.
MAR 7:33 Yesuusi barka he uraa daro asape gaxa kessidi, ba biradhiya iya haythan yeddis. Qassi cuchu cuttidi iya inxarsaa bochis.
MAR 7:34 Salo pude xeellidi, tooki shempidi, “Eftah” gis. Birshethayka “Dooyeta” guussu.
MAR 7:35 Uraa haythay ellesidi dooyetis, qashetida inxarsayka birshetis, uray geeshshidi odetis.
MAR 7:36 Yesuusi asaako, “Haysa oodeska odopite” yaagis. Shin I daro minthidi odopite gin, asay odaa yaa darsis.
MAR 7:37 Hessa si7ida asa ubbay daro malaaletidi, “Ubbabaa I loythi oothees. Hari attoshin, tulliya sissees, muumiya odisees” yaagidosona.
MAR 8:1 Guutha wodepe guye, daro asay Yesuusako shiiqidosona. Asaas miyabay dhayin Yesuusi ba tamaareta baako xeegidi,
MAR 8:2 “Ha asay taara heedzu gallas gakanaw gam7idi, aykoka miyaba demmiboonna gisho, tana asay qadhethees.
MAR 8:3 Taani asaa koshara soo yeddiko asay bishe ogen daaburidi kundana, bagga asay haahosoope yidosona” yaagis.
MAR 8:4 Yesuusa tamaareti zaaridi, “Ha mela biittan ha asa ubbaa muzanaw gidiya kathi demmanaw danda7ey oonee?” yaagidosona.
MAR 8:5 Yesuusi entako, “Hintew aapun uythi de7ii?” yaagidi oychis. Enti zaaridi, “Laapun uythi de7ees” yaagidosona.
MAR 8:6 Yesuusi asay sa7an uttana mela kiittis. Yaatidi, laapun uythaa ekidi Xoossaa galati simmidi he uythaa menthidi, asaas gishana mela ba tamaaretas immis. Iya tamaareti asaas gishidosona.
MAR 8:7 Entaw qassi guutha laafa moloti de7oosona. Yesuusi he molota gisho Xoossaa galatidi, asaas gishana mela ba tamaareta kiittis.
MAR 8:8 Asa ubbay midi kallidosona. Iya tamaareti attida tiifiya laapun gayta kumethi denthidosona.
MAR 8:9 Kathaa mida asaa tayboy oyddu mukulu gidana. Hessafe guye, Yesuusi asa yeddis.
MAR 8:10 I qassi ba tamaaretara ellesi wogolon gelidi Dalmanuuta biitta bis.
MAR 8:11 Farsaaweti yidi Yesuusa paacanaw koyidi, salope bantana malaata bessaana mela Yesuusara palama oykidosona.
MAR 8:12 Yesuusi tooki shempidi, “Ha wodiya asay ayis malaata koyii? Taani hintew tuma odayis; ha wodiya asaas ay malaatika imetenna” yaagis.
MAR 8:13 I enta yan yeggi aggidi zaari wogolon gelidi abbaafe hefinthi pinnis.
MAR 8:14 Iya tamaareti kathi efanaysa dogidosona; entaw wogoluwa giddon issi uythaafe hari baawa.
MAR 8:15 Yesuusi entako, “Hintena erite. Farsaaweta irshuwafenne Herodiisa irshuwafe naagetite” yaagidi kiittis.
MAR 8:16 Enti banta giddon, “I haysa gey nuus uythi bayna gishosa” yaagidosona.
MAR 8:17 Yesuusi enti geysa eridi entako, “Hintew uythi bayna gisho ayis odeteetii? Ha77ika ereketii? Woyko akeekeketii? Hinte wozanay doccidee?
MAR 8:18 Hintew ayfey de7ishin be7eketii? Haythi de7ishin si7eketii? Hinte akeeketii?
MAR 8:19 Taani ichashu uythaa ichashu mukulu asaas bathida wode aapun gayta kumethi tiife denthidetii?” yaagis. Entika, “Tammanne nam7u gayta kumethi” yaagidosona.
MAR 8:20 “Hessadaka, taani laapun uythaa oyddu mukulu asaas bathida wode aapun gayta kumetha tiife denthidetii?” yaagis. Enti, “Laapun gayta kumethi denthida” yaagidosona.
MAR 8:21 Yaatin, “Ha77ika akeekibeketii?” yaagis.
MAR 8:22 Enti Beetesayda katamaa bidosona. Guutha asati qooqe uraa Yesuusako ehidi he uraa bochana mela iya woossidosona.
MAR 8:23 Yesuusi qooqe uraa kushiya oykidi katamaape gaxa kessis. Iya ayfiyan cuttidi ba kushiya iya bolla wothidi, “New aykoy bentii?” yaagidi oychis.
MAR 8:24 Uray dhoqu gidi xeellidi, “Taw asay bentees, shin asay hemetishe mithi daanees” yaagis.
MAR 8:25 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi zaaridi, uraa ayfiyan ba kushiya wothis. Uray loythi xeellis, iya ayfey paxis, ubbaba geeshshidi be7is.
MAR 8:26 Yesuusi addiyako, “Ne soo ba, shin gutaa gelopa” yaagidi kiittis.
MAR 8:27 Yesuusi ba tamaaretara Qisaare Filphoosa matan de7iya gutaa bis. Enti bishin oge bolla Yesuusi, “Tana asay oona goonna?” yaagidi ba tamaareta oychis.
MAR 8:28 Iya tamaareti, “Issi issi asay nena, ‘Xammaqiya Yohaanisa’ goosona; harati, ‘Eeliyaasa goosona’ qassi harati, ‘Nabetape issuwa’ goosona” yaagidosona.
MAR 8:29 Yesuusi entako, “Yaatin hinte tana oona geetii?” yaagidi oychis. Phexroosi, “Neeni Kiristoosa” yaagidi zaaris.
MAR 8:30 Yesuusi, “Tabaa oodeska odopite” yaagidi enta kiittis.
MAR 8:31 Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Asa Na7ay, daro meto ekanaw bessees; cimati, kahine halaqatinne higge astamaareti iya ixanaw bessees. Enti iya wodhanawunne I, heedzu gallasape guye, hayqope dendanaw bessees” yaagidi enta tamaarsis.
MAR 8:32 I hessa entaw geeshshidi odis. Phexroosi iya issi bagga zaaridi hanqetis.
MAR 8:33 Shin Yesuusi guye simmidi, ba tamaareta xeellidi, Phexroosa hanqetidi, “Ha Xalahey, taape haaka. Neeni asi dosiyaba qopaasape attishin, Xoossay dosiyaba qopaka” yaagis.
MAR 8:34 Qassika Yesuusi daro asaanne ba tamaareta baako xeegidi, “Tana kaallanaw koyiya oonika bana kaddo; ba masqaliya tookidi tana kaalo.
MAR 8:35 Ba shempuwa ashshanaw koyiya uray dhaysana. Shin ta gishonne Wongela gisho ba shempuwa dhaysiya uray ashshana.
MAR 8:36 Issi asi sa7an de7iya ubbaba baw shiishidi, ba shempuwa dhaysiko iya ay maaddanee?
MAR 8:37 Issi asi ba shempuwa wozanaw ay immanaw danda7ii?
MAR 8:38 Xoossaa ammanonna ha iita yeletethan, issi asi tananinne ta qaalan yeellatiko, Asa Na7ay, qassi ba Aawa bonchon geeshsha kiitanchotara yaa wode iyan yeellatana” yaagis.
MAR 9:1 Yesuusi entako, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; Xoossaa kawotethay wolqara yeysa be7onna hayqonna issi issi asati haysan de7oosona” yaagis.
MAR 9:2 Yesuusi usupun gallasape guye, baara Phexroosa, Yayqoobanne Yohaanisa ekidi, enta xalaala gita zuma bolla kessidi enta sinthan laametis.
MAR 9:3 Iya ma7oyka phoolis; sa7an ma7o meecciya oonika geeshshanaw danda7onnaysa mela daro booxis.
MAR 9:4 He heedzu tamaareti, Eeliyaasinne Musey Yesuusara odetishin be7idosona.
MAR 9:5 Phexroosi Yesuusa, “Astamaariyaw, nuuni haysan de7eysi nuus lo77o; nu heedzu shaqarata issuwa new, issuwa Muses, qassi issuwa Eeliyaasas shaqarana” yaagis.
MAR 9:6 Iyaranne hankotara daro yayyida gisho Phexroosi ay giyakoka eribeenna.
MAR 9:7 Hessafe guye, shaaray yidi enta kammin shaarape, “Haysi ta dosiya, ta Na7aa, I geysa si7ite” giya qaalay yis.
MAR 9:8 Ellesidi enti yuushshi aathidi xeelliya wode, Yesuusape attishin, haraa oonaka banta matan be7ibookona.
MAR 9:9 Enti zumaa bollafe wodhishin, Yesuusi entako, “Asa Na7ay, hayqope dendana gakanaw, hinte be7idaba oodeska odopite” yaagidi kiittis.
MAR 9:10 I kiittidaysa enti, “Ero” gidi, “Ha hayqope dendo guussay woyguuse” gidi, banta giddon odetidosona.
MAR 9:11 Enti zaaridi, “Higge astamaareti, ‘Eeliyaasi koyrottidi yaanaw bessees’ ayis goonna?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAR 9:12 Yesuusi zaaridi “Eeliyaasi koyrottidi yidi, ubbaba giigisees; yaatin, Geeshsha Maxaafan, ‘Asa Na7i daro waayetana; ixetana’ yaagidi aybis xaafetidee?
MAR 9:13 Shin taani hintew odayis; Eeliyaasi yis; qassi iyabay Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetidaysada, asay iya bolla banta koydaba oothidosona” yaagis.
MAR 9:14 Yesuusi, Phexroosi, Yayqoobinne Yohaanisi hanko iya tamaaretako simmidi yaa wode, daro asay enta yuushuwan eqidaysatanne higge astamaare gidida guutha asati entara palameysa be7idosona.
MAR 9:15 He daro asay Yesuusa be7ida wode malaaletidi, ellesidi iyako woxi yidi, iya sarothidosona.
MAR 9:16 Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Entara ay palameetii?” yaagidi oychis.
MAR 9:17 He daro asa giddofe issi uray zaaridi, “Astamaariyaw, ta na7aa bolla odetethi diggiya tuna ayyaanay de7iya gisho, iya neeko ekada yas.
MAR 9:18 Ha tuna ayyaanay iya oykiya wode ubban, iya shoci yeggees; iya doonara gopontoy yees; qassi ache garcisees; asatethayka minnees. Iyape ha tuna ayyaana kessana mela, ne tamaaretas odas, shin kessanaw danda7ibookona” yaagis.
MAR 9:19 Yesuusi zaaridi entako, “Ammanonna ha wodiya asaw! Taani hintera awude gakanaw daanee? Qassi hintena awude gakanaw danda7anee? Na7aa taako haa eki yiite” yaagis.
MAR 9:20 Enti na7aa iyako ehidosona; he tuna ayyaanay Yesuusa be7ida mela na7aa kokorsis; na7ay sa7an kundidi, doonara gopontoy toofu gishin gondoretis.
MAR 9:21 Yesuusi he na7aa aawako, “Haysi ne na7aa oykoosape ay mela wode gidanee?” yaagidi oychis. Na7aa aaway, “I guuthan de7ishin oykis.
MAR 9:22 Iya wodhanaw daro wode tamaninne haathan yeggees, shin ne danda7iko, nuus qadhetarki, nuna maaddarki” yaagis.
MAR 9:23 Yesuusi iya, “ ‘Neeni danda7iko gay?’ Ammaniya oodeska ubbabay danda7etees” yaagis.
MAR 9:24 Ellesidi na7aa aaway ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Taani ammanayis, shin guja ammananada tana maaddarki” yaagis.
MAR 9:25 Yesuusi asay dari dari beysa be7idi, tuna ayyaana, “Ha tullenne muume ayyaanaw, ha na7aape keya gada nena ta kiittayis; qassi nam7antho iyan gelopa” yaagis.
MAR 9:26 He tuna ayyaanay waassidi, na7aa daro kokorsidi, iyape keyis. Na7ay hayqida daanin, daro asay, “Na7ay hayqis” yaagidosona.
MAR 9:27 Shin Yesuusi na7aa kushiya oykidi denthin, na7ay dendi eqis.
MAR 9:28 Yesuusi soo gelidaysafe guye, iya tamaareti, “Nuuni he tuna ayyaana kessanaw ayis danda7ibooko?” yaagidi Yesuusa dumma oychidosona.
MAR 9:29 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Hessa melay woosapenne xoomape attishin, haraban keyanaw danda7enna” yaagis.
MAR 9:30 Enti he bessaafe dendidi, Galilara aadhidi bidosona; Yesuusi ba de7iyasuwa oonika erana mela koybeenna.
MAR 9:31 I ba tamaaretako, “Asa Na7aa, asi asas aathidi immananne wodhana; I heedzu gallasape guye, hayqope dendana” yaagidi tamaarsees.
MAR 9:32 Shin entaw I geysi gelibeenna; qassi iya oychanawuka yayyidosona.
MAR 9:33 Enti Qifirnahooma katamaa bidi soo gelidaysafe guye, Yesuusi entako, “Ogen ay odeteetii?” yaagidi oychis.
MAR 9:34 Shin enti, “Nu giddon ubbaafe aadhanay oonee?” yaagidi palamida gisho, si77i gidoosona.
MAR 9:35 Yesuusi uttidi, tammanne nam7u tamaareta xeegidi, “Oonika sinthe aadhanaw koyko, ubbaafe guye aadhidi, ubbaas aylle gidanaw bessees” yaagis.
MAR 9:36 Issi guutha na7aa ekidi, enta giddon essis; he guutha na7aa idimmidi entako,
MAR 9:37 “Haysa mela guutha naytape issuwa ta sunthan mokiya oonika tana mokees; qassi tana mokiya oonika tana kiittidaysaka mokeesipe attishin, ta xalaala mokenna” yaagis.
MAR 9:38 Yohaanisi, “Astamaariyaw, issi asi ne sunthan tuna Ayyaanata kessishin nuuni be7idi, nu bagga gidonna gisho, iya diggida” yaagis.
MAR 9:39 Shin Yesuusi, “Oonika ta sunthan Xoossay oothiya malaatata oothidi, ellesidi ta bolla iitabaa odetanaw danda7ey bayna gisho diggofite.
MAR 9:40 Nubaa ixonna uray nu bagga.
MAR 9:41 Taani hintew tuma odayis; hinte tabaa gidiya gisho, oonika hintew ta sunthan halo haathi uyanaw immikoka, ba woytuwa ekana.
MAR 9:42 “Tana ammaniya ha guuthatape issuwa balethiya oonika, gaacha wogga woxa ba qoodhen qachidi, abban wulliyako iyaw lo77o.
MAR 9:43 Ne kushey nena balethiko, qanxa hola. Neeni nam7u kushera to7onna gaanname taman yegeteysafe, duuxa kushera de7uwa geloy new lo77o.
MAR 9:45 Ne tohoy nena balethiko, qanxa hola. Neeni nam7u tohuwara gaanname taman yegeteysafe, wobbe gidada de7uwa geleysi new lo77o.
MAR 9:47 Ne ayfey nena balethiko, wooca kessa hola. Neeni nam7u ayfiyara gaanname taman yegeteysafe, issi ayfiyara Xoossaa kawotethaa geleysi new lo77o.
MAR 9:48 Yan enta miya guxuney hayqenna, tamayka to7enna.
MAR 9:49 “Yarshoy maxinen geeyeysa mela asi ubbay taman harqetana.
MAR 9:50 Maxiney lo77o, shin I mal7onna ixiko, zaaridi waati mal7ethanee? Hintenan maxiney de7o. Yaanidi, issoy issuwara sarotethan de7ite” yaagis.
MAR 10:1 Yesuusi hessafe dendidi, Yihuda biitta bidi Yordaanose Shaafa pinnis. Daro asay zaaridi iyako shiiqin, kaseysadaka he asaa tamaarsis.
MAR 10:2 Issi issi Farsaaweti paacanaw koyidi Yesuusa, “Issi asi ba machiw yeddana mela Muse higgey kiittii?” yaagidi iya oychidosona.
MAR 10:3 I zaaridi, “Musey hintena woygidi kiittidee?” yaagis.
MAR 10:4 Enti, “Musey, ‘Issi asi ba machees anjo worqate immidi yeddo’ gis” yaagidosona.
MAR 10:5 Yesuusi zaaridi, enta “Hinte odin si7onnayisata gidiya gisho, Musey ha kiitaa hintew xaafis.
MAR 10:6 Shin Xoossay koyro medhiya wode, addenne macca oothidi, enta medhis.
MAR 10:7 Hessa gisho, issi asi ba aawanne ba aayiw aggidi, ba machera issife de7ees.
MAR 10:8 Enti nam7ay issi ase gidoosona; hizape, enti issi ase gidoosonape attishin, nam7u asi gidokona.
MAR 10:9 Hessa gisho, Xoossay issife qachidaysa asi shaakofo” yaagis.
MAR 10:10 Enti soo simmida wode, iya tamaareti ha odabaa Yesuusa nam7antho oychidosona.
MAR 10:11 Yesuusi entako, “Ba machiw yeddidi hara ekiya oonika laymatees.
MAR 10:12 Qassi maccasiyaka ba azinaape keyada hara azina geliko laymatawusu” yaagis.
MAR 10:13 Yesuusi guutha nayta bolla ba kushiya wothana mela, issi issi asay nayta iyako ehoosona, shin iya tamaareti he asa hanqetidosona.
MAR 10:14 Yesuusi hessa be7idi, ba tamaareta hanqetidi; entako, “Guutha nayti taako yeysa diggofite; Xoossaa kawotethay haysata melasa.
MAR 10:15 Taani hintew tuma odayis; Xoossaa kawotethaa guutha na7ada ekonna uray oonika he kawotethaa ubbaraka gelenna” yaagis.
MAR 10:16 Guutha nayta idimmidi, ba kushiya enta issuwa issuwa bolla wothidi anjis.
MAR 10:17 Yesuusi baanaw keyda wode, issi uray woxi yidi, iya sinthan gulbatidi, “Keeha astamaariyaw, taani merinaa de7o laattanaw ay ootho?” yaagidi oychis.
MAR 10:18 Yesuusi, “Ayis tana keehaw gada xeegay? Xoossaa xalaalape attishin, hari keehi oonika baawa.
MAR 10:19 Xoossaa kiitaa, wodhopa; laymatopa; kaysotopa; wordo markatofa; inxarsan cimmofa; ne aawanne ne aayiw boncha yaageysa eraasa” yaagis.
MAR 10:20 Uray, “Astamaariyaw, taani hessa ubbaa na7atethafe doomada ha77i gakanaw naagayis” yaagis.
MAR 10:21 Yesuusi uraa tishshi oothi xeellidi dosis; “New issibay pacees; bada new de7iyaba ubbaa bayzada, he miishiya manqotas imma; neeni salon dure gidana. Yaata simmada tana kaalla” yaagis.
MAR 10:22 Shin uray hessa si7idi, I daro dure gidiya gisho, ba som7uwa kareethis, ufaytonna aggidi bis.
MAR 10:23 Yesuusi ba tamaareta yuushshi aathi xeellidi, “Dure asi Xoossaa kawotethaa gelanaysi waanidi metandeesha!” yaagis.
MAR 10:24 Iya tamaareti iya timirtiya si7idi malaaletidosona. Shin Yesuusi qassika entako, “Nayto, Xoossaa kawotethaa gelanaysi waanidi metandeesha!
MAR 10:25 Dure asi Xoossaa kawotethaa gelanaysafe, gimaley narpe luhora aadheysi kawuyees” yaagis.
MAR 10:26 Iya tamaareti malaaletidi, “Yaatin, ooni attanee?” yaagidi, issoy issuwa oychidosona.
MAR 10:27 Yesuusi enta tishshi oothi xeellidi, “Haysi Xoossas danda7etesipe attishin, asas danda7etenna; Xoossas ubbabay danda7etees” yaagis.
MAR 10:28 Phexroosi Yesuusako, “Heko; nuuni nubaa ubbaa aggidi, nena kaallida” yaagis.
MAR 10:29 Yesuusi “Taani hintew tuma odayis; ta gishonne wongela gisho, keethe woyko ishata woyko micheta woyko aawa woyko aayo woyko machiw woyko nayta woyko gade aggida oonika,
MAR 10:30 ha77i ha wodiyan xeetu kushe keetha, ishata, micheta, aayeta, nayta, gadiya, goodetethara issife ekana. Sinthafe yaana wodiyanka merinaa de7uwa ekana.
MAR 10:31 Shin daroti ha77i dethan sinthe gididaysati guye gidana, qassi daroti ha77i guye gididaysati sinthe gidana” yaagis.
MAR 10:32 Yesuusaranne iya tamaaretara Yerusalaame bishin, Yesuusi ba tamaareta sinthan hemetees. Enti malaaletidosona. Iya kaalleysatika yayyidosona. Nam7antho, tammanne nam7u tamaareta gaxa kessidi, bana gakanaba dumma entaw haysada yaagidi odis.
MAR 10:33 “Heko, nuuni Yerusalaame ha77i keyoos. Yan Asa Na7ay, kahine halaqatasinne higge astamaaretas aadhidi imetana. Enti iya bolla hayqo pirdaa pirdana; qassi Ayhude gidonna deriyas iya aathidi immana.
MAR 10:34 Ayhude gidonna derey iya toochana, iya bolla cuttana, lisson garaafananne wodhana. I heedzu gallasape guye, hayqope dendana” yaagis.
MAR 10:35 Zabdiyoosa nayti Yayqoobinne Yohaanisi Yesuusako yidi, “Astamaariyaw, nuuni nena woossiyaba ubbaa nuus oothana mela koyoos” yaagidosona.
MAR 10:36 Yesuusi entako, “Taani hintew ay ootho?” yaagis.
MAR 10:37 Enti, “Neeni ne boncho kawotethan uttiya wode, nuupe issuwa ushacha baggara qassi issuwa haddirsa baggara utisarki” yaagidosona.
MAR 10:38 Shin Yesuusi entako, “Hinte ay woossiyako ereketa, ta uyanaw de7iya xuu7aa uyanaw danda7eetii? Qassi taani xammaqetanaw de7iya xinqatiya xammaqetanaw danda7eetii?” yaagis.
MAR 10:39 Enti zaaridi, “Ee danda7oos” yaagidosona. Yesuusi qassi, “Tumaka ta uyanaw de7iya xuu7aa hinte uyana, taani xammaqetanaw de7iya xinqatiya hinte xammaqetana.
MAR 10:40 Shin taape ushacha baggaranne haddirsa baggara uttanayisata dooranaw taw maati baawa, shin he bessay Xoossay immanaw giigisidi wothidaysatasa” yaagis.
MAR 10:41 Hanko tammu tamaareti hessa si7ida wode, Yayqoobanne Yohaanisa bolla hanqetidosona.
MAR 10:42 Yesuusi enta ubbaa baako xeegidi, “Ayhude gidonna asaa halaqati deriya haareyisata geetetidi xeegeteysanne haareysatas deriya bolla maati de7eysa hinte ereeta.
MAR 10:43 Shin hinte giddon hessa mela gidenna; hinte giddon gitatanaw koyey oonika hintew aylle gidanaw bessees.
MAR 10:44 Qassi hinte giddon ubbaafe bolla gidanaw koyey oonika hinte ubbaas aylle gidanaw bessees.
MAR 10:45 Hari attoshin, Asa Na7ayka, asaas oothanawunne darota wozanaw ba shempuwa aathidi immanaw ysipe attishin, asi iyaw oothana mela yibeenna” yaagis.
MAR 10:46 Enti Iyaarko katama bidosona. Yesuusi ba tamaaretaranne daro asaara Iyaarkofe keyishin, Ximoosa na7ay, qooqey, Barximoosa geeteteysi, oge gaxan woossishe uttis.
MAR 10:47 Barximoosi, yaara aadhey Naazirete Yesuusa gididaysa si7ida wode, ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Dawita na7aa Yesuusa, tana maararki!” yaagis.
MAR 10:48 Daro asay iya, “Hayza!” gidi hanqetidosona. Shin, I ba qaala kaseysafe daro dhoqu oothidi, “Dawita na7aw, tana maararki!” yaagis.
MAR 10:49 Yesuusi eqidi, “Iya haa xeegite” yaagis. Enti qooqiyako, “Aykoy baawa, denda eqa, nena xeegees” yaagidosona.
MAR 10:50 Qooqey ba ma7uwa holi yeggidi, gupi dendi eqidi, Yesuusako bis.
MAR 10:51 Yesuusi, “Taani new ay oothana mela koyay?” yaagis. Qooqey, “Astamaariyaw, ta xeellanaw koyayis” yaagis.
MAR 10:52 Yesuusi, “Ba, ne ammanoy nena pathis” yaagis. Iiraka iya ayfey xeellin, Yesuusa kaallis.
MAR 11:1 Enti Yerusalaame matishe, Shamaho zuma matan de7iya Beetefaagenne Bitaane katamata gakidosona. Yesuusi ba tamaaretape nam7ata sinthe kiittidi,
MAR 11:2 “Hintefe sinthan de7iya gutaa biite; yaa gelida mela oonika toggiboonna qashon de7iya hare mari hinte demmana, iya billidi, haa eki yiite.
MAR 11:3 Oonika hintena, ‘Haysa ayis oothetii?’ yaagidi oychiko, ‘Goday iya koyees, ellesidi haa yeddana’ yaagite” yaagis.
MAR 11:4 Enti bidi, hare mari kare bolla oge matan qashetidi de7eysa demmidi billidosona.
MAR 11:5 He bessan eqida issi issi asati entako, “Hare maraa waatanaw billeetii?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAR 11:6 Iya tamaareti Yesuusi bantana kiittidaysa odin, asati yeddi aggidosona.
MAR 11:7 Enti hare maraa Yesuusako ehidi, banta ma7uwa iya zokon hiixin Yesuusi he hare maraa toggis.
MAR 11:8 Daro asay banta ma7uwa ogiyan hiixidosona; qassi harati mitha tashe tashidi, ogen hiixidosona.
MAR 11:9 Yesuusape sinthara hemetiya asaynne iya kaalliya asay banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Hosaana! Xoossay galatetto! Godaa sunthan yeysi anjetidaysa.
MAR 11:10 Godaa sunthan yaa nu aawa Dawita kawotethay anjetidaysa. Ubbaafe Bolla Salon de7iya Xoossay galatetto” yaagidosona.
MAR 11:11 Yesuusi Yerusalaame bidi, Xoossaa Keetha gelis. Qassi ubbaba yuuyi xeellidaape guye, sa7i qammiya gisho, tammanne nam7u tamaaretara Bitaane katama bis.
MAR 11:12 Wontetha gallas enti Bitaanepe keyidi bishin, Yesuusi koshatis.
MAR 11:13 Haahon issi balase mithiw haytha xalaala ma7a uttidaaro be7idi, I bolla ayfey bentiko gidi, be7anaw iiko bis, shin iiko I biya wode, haytha xalaalape attishin, issi ayfeka demmibeenna; ayis giiko, balasey ayfiya wodey gakibeenna.
MAR 11:14 Yesuusi he balasiw, “Hiza, asi neepe merinaw ayfe moopo” yaagis. Iya tamaareti I geysa si7idosona.
MAR 11:15 Enti Yerusalaame bidosona; Yesuusi Xoossa Keethi gelidi, yan bayzeysatanne shammeyisata kare goodo oykis; qassi miishe laammeyisata xarpheezanne holle bayzeyisata oydiya shiri yeggidi,
MAR 11:16 asi aybibaaka tookidi, xoossa keetha giddora aadhona mela diggis.
MAR 11:17 Yesuusi asaa haysada yaagidi tamaarsis: “Geeshsha Maxaafan, ‘Ta keethay asi ubbay Xoossaa woossiya keethi gidana’ geetetidi xaafetis. Shin hinte iya pangati qosetiya gongolo oothideta” yaagis.
MAR 11:18 Kahine halaqatinne higge astamaareti hessa si7idi, iya wodhanaw oge koydosona. Shin daro asay iya timirtiyan malaaletiya gisho, iyaw babidosona.
MAR 11:19 Sa7ay omarsiya wode Yesuusinne iya tamaareti katamaape gaxa keyidosona.
MAR 11:20 Enti wontetha gallas he ogiyara aadhishe, he balasiya xaphora melidaaro be7idosona.
MAR 11:21 Phexroosi akeekidi, “Astamaariyaw, Heko, neeni baaddida balasiya melasu” yaagis.
MAR 11:22 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Xoossaa ammanite.
MAR 11:23 Taani hintew tuma odayis; oonika ba wozanan sidhonna gidabay hananaysa ammanidi, ha zumaa, ‘Dendada abban kunda’ yaagiko iyaw hanana.
MAR 11:24 Hessa gisho, taani hintew odayis; Xoossaa hinte woossiyabanne oychiyaba ayba gidikoka ekidaada ammanite, hinte ekana.
MAR 11:25 Xoossaa woossanaw hinte eqiya wode, salon de7iya hinte Aaway hinte nagara atto gaana mela, oonika hintena naaqidabay de7iko, iyaw atto giite.
MAR 11:26 Shin asa nagara hinte atto goonna ixiko, salon de7iya hinte Aawayka hinte nagaraa hintew atto geenna” yaagis.
MAR 11:27 Enti zaaridi Yerusalaame bidosona. Yesuusi xoossa keethan hemetishin, kahine halaqati, higge astamaaretinne cimati iyako yidi,
MAR 11:28 “Neeni haysa oothanaw new ay maati de7ii? Woyko new ha maata immiday oonee?” yaagidosona.
MAR 11:29 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ta hintena issiba oychana, taw odite. Ta qassi haysa ay maatan oothiyako, hintew odana.
MAR 11:30 Yohaanisa xinqatey Xoossafeye woyko asapee? Taw odite” yaagis.
MAR 11:31 Enti banta giddon palama doomidi, “Nuuni, ‘Xoossafe’ giiko, I nuuko, ‘Yaatin, Yohaanisi odidaysa ayis ammanibeketii?’ yaagana.
MAR 11:32 ‘Asape giiko’ asa ubbay Yohaanisi nabe gideysa eroosona.” Hessa gisho, asaas yayidosona.
MAR 11:33 Hessa gisho, enti Yesuusako, “Nuuni eroko” yaagidi zaaridosona. Yesuusi, “Taanika haysa ay maatan oothiyako, hintew odike” yaagis.
MAR 12:1 Yesuusi entaw leemison yaagidi odis: “Issi uray woyne tokidi, iya yuushon dirsi diris. Qassi he woyne gum7iya olla bookis. Iya naaganaw adussa shako shakis. Hessafe guye, kothe oothiya asas immidi, hara biitta bis.
MAR 12:2 Woyne ayfiya maxiya wodey gakin, bana gakiya gishuwa ehana mela, issi ba aylliya kothe aawatako yeddis.
MAR 12:3 Kothe aawati iya aylliya oykidi wadhidi, mela kushe yeddidosona.
MAR 12:4 Nam7antho hara aylle entako kiittin, enti he aylliya huuphiya qoo7idi kawushidi yeddidosona.
MAR 12:5 Woyne atakiltiya goday qassika hara aylle kiittis. He aylliya wodhidosona, qassi hara darota hessada oothidosona, issota issota wadhidi, harata wodhidosona.
MAR 12:6 “Woyne atakiltiya godaas kiittanaw ubbaafe wursethan I daro dosiya ba na7aa xalaali attis. I, ‘Enti ta na7aa bonchona aggokona’ gidi, ba na7aa entako kiittis.
MAR 12:7 “Shin kothe aawati banta giddon, ‘Laattanaysi haysa; yedhite iya wodhoos; iya laatay nubaa gidana!’ yaagidosona.
MAR 12:8 Na7aa oykidi wodhidi, iya aha woyne gadiya giddofe gaxa kessidi yeggidosona.
MAR 12:9 “Hiza, woyne gadiya goday waatanee? Yidi he kothe aawata wodhi ongidi, woyniya kothe oothiya hara asas immana.
MAR 12:10 “ ‘Gimbeysati boridi ixida shuchay godaa xaphuwa minthiya, ubbaafe aadhiya shuchu gidis. Haysi Goday oothidaba; qassi nu ayfiyaska malaalsiyaba’ yaageysa Geeshsha Maxaafape nabbabibeketii?” yaagis.
MAR 12:12 Kahine halaqati, higge astamaaretinne cimati Yesuusi he leemisuwa banta bolla leemisidaysa erida gisho, iya oykanaw koydosona, shin asaas yayyidi, aggidi bidosona.
MAR 12:13 Qassi iya odaape bala demmidi, iya oykana mela, Farsaawetapenne Herodiisa baggatape guutha asata iyako kiittidosona.
MAR 12:14 Enti iyako yidi, “Astamaariyaw, neeni tuma odeteysanne asape ase shaakonnaysa nuuni eroos. Neeni ase dummayaka; qassi Xoossaa ogiya tumatethan tamaarsaasa. Nuuni Roome biitta Kawa Qeesares giira giireysi wogeye woga gidennee? Giira giirane agganee?” yaagidosona.
MAR 12:15 Shin Yesuusi enta cubbotethaa eridi, “Tana ayis paacetii? Ane issi santime tana bessite” yaagis.
MAR 12:16 Enti iyaw ehidosona, “Ha misileynne sunthay oodebayee?” yaagidi enta oychis. Enti, “Roome Kawa Qeesareysa” yaagidosona.
MAR 12:17 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Yaatiko, Qeesareba Qeesares, Xoossaba Xoossaas immite” yaagin enti iyabaa malaaletidosona.
MAR 12:18 Hayqida asi dendenna giya Saduqaawetape issi issi asati Yesuusako yidi, haysada yaagidi, iya oychidosona.
MAR 12:19 “Astamaariyaw, Musey nuus higgiya xaafishe, ‘Macho ekida asi na7a yelonna hayqiko, he hayqidaysa ishay iya machiw ekidi, ba ishaas na7a yelanaw bessees’ yaagis.
MAR 12:20 Beni wode laapun ishati de7eysatape bayray macho ekidi, na7a yelonna hayqis.
MAR 12:21 Nam7anthoy iyo ekis, ika na7a yelonna hayqis. Heedzanthoyka hessada hanis.
MAR 12:22 Laapunatika hessatho iyo ekidi, na7a yelonna hayqidosona. Ubbaafe guye, qassi he maccasiya hayqasu.
MAR 12:23 Yaatin, laapunati iyo ekida gisho hayqida asay hayqope dendiya gallas, iya entafe awusas macho gidanee?” yaagidosona.
MAR 12:24 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Hinte baletey, Geeshsha Maxaafata woyko Xoossaa wolqaa eronna gishosa!
MAR 12:25 Hayqida asay hayqope dendiya gallas, salon de7iya kiitanchota mela gidanaape attishin, ekokona; gelekona.
MAR 12:26 Shin hayqidaysata denduwaba gidiko, Muse maxaafan xaafetida xuugetiya tushiyaba odiya bessan, Xoossay Museko, ‘Taani, Abrahaame Xoossa, Yisaaqa Xoossa, Yayqooba Xoossa’ gidaysa nabbabibeketii?
MAR 12:27 Hessa gisho, I, paxa de7eyisata Xoossaafe attishin, hayqidaysata Xoosse gidenna. Hinte daro balideta” yaagis.
MAR 12:28 Higge astamaaretape issoy enti palameysa shiiqidi si7is. Qassi Yesuusi entaw loythi zaaridaysa si7idi, “Kiita ubbaafe aadhiya kiitay awusee?” yaagidi Yesuusa oychis.
MAR 12:29 Yesuusi zaaridi, iya haysada yaagis: “Kiita ubbaafe aadhiya kiitaa si7ite; ‘Isra7eele asaw, Goday nu Xoossay issi Godaa.
MAR 12:30 Ne Godaa ne Xoossaa ne kumetha wozanape, ne kumetha shempuwafe, ne kumetha qofaape, ne kumetha wolqaafe dosa’ yaagees.
MAR 12:31 Qassi kiita ubbaafe aadhiya nam7antho kiitay haysa; ‘Ase ubbaa ne huuphiyada dosa’ yaageysa; haysatape aadhiya hara kiiti baawa” yaagis.
MAR 12:32 Higge astamaarey Yesuusako, “Astamaariyaw, tuma gadasa; neeni ‘Xoossay issi Xoossaa xalaala. Iyape attishin, hari baawa’ gidaysi tuma.
MAR 12:33 Xoossaa kumetha wozanape, kumetha qofaapenne kumetha wolqaafe doseysinne qassi ase ubbaa ba huuphiyada doseysi, xuussa yarshofenne hara yarsho ubbaafe aadhees” yaagis.
MAR 12:34 Yesuusi higge astamaariya zaaroy aadhida erancho asa zaaro gididaysa be7idi, “Neeni Xoossaa kawotethaafe haakabaaka” yaagis; hessafe guye, Yesuusa haraba oychanaw oonika minnibeenna.
MAR 12:35 Yesuusi xoossa keethan tamaarsishe, haysada yaagis: “Higge astamaareti Kiristoosa woygidi Dawita na7a goonna?
MAR 12:36 Dawiti Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumidi, “ ‘Goday, ta Godaa, “Taani ne morketa ne tohoy yedhiyaso oothana gakanaw, haysan taape ushacha baggara utta” gis’ yaagis.
MAR 12:37 Dawiti ba huuphen Kiristoosa, ‘Godaa’ gidi xeegiko, yaatin, Kiristoosi waanidi, Dawita na7a gidi?” yaagis. Daro asay Yesuusi geysa ufaysan si7idosona.
MAR 12:38 Yesuusi tamaarsishe, haysada yaagis: “Higge astamaaretape naagetite; enti adussa ma7o ma7idi yuuyeysanne giyanka asay enta bonchidi sarotheysa dosoosona.
MAR 12:39 Enti ayhude woosa keethatan daro lo77iya oydiya dosoosona; qassi asi bantana mokiya bessan boncho bessi dosoosona.
MAR 12:40 Enti am7eta keethaa bonqidi, bantaw lo77o daananaw woosa adussosona; enti ubbaafe aadhiya pirdaa ekana” yaagis.
MAR 12:41 Yesuusi xoossa keethan muxaata yeggiya saaxiniya matan uttidi, asay ba miishiya he saaxiniyan yeggeysa be7is; daro dure asay daro miishiya he saaxiniyan yeggoosona.
MAR 12:42 Issi manqo am7iya yada, nam7u bakanna he saaxiniyan yeggasu.
MAR 12:43 Yesuusi ba tamaareta xeegidi, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; muxaata saaxiniyan yeggida asa ubbaafe ha manqo am7iya darsada yeggasu.
MAR 12:44 Ayis giiko, harati ubbay bantaw palahida miishiyape yeggidosona. Shin iya ba pacaape, baw de7iya aquwa kumethi immasu” yaagis.
MAR 13:1 Yesuusi Xoossa Keethafe keyishin, iya tamaaretape issoy, “Astamaariyaw, ha lo77o shuchaanne ha lo77o shucha keethaa be7ay!” yaagis.
MAR 13:2 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ha gita shucha keethaa be7ay? Ha keethay shuchi shucha bolla gimbetida mela laaletonna attenna; issi shuchika attonna ubbay laaletana” yaagis.
MAR 13:3 Yesuusi Xoossa keethafe hini baggara Shamaho zuma bolla uttidashin, Phexroosi, Yayqoobi, Yohaanisinne Indiriyasi bantarka iyako yidi,
MAR 13:4 “Haysi awude hananeeko nuus oda; ha ubbay poletana wodiya erisiya malaatay aybee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
MAR 13:5 Yesuusi qassi entako haysada yaagidi odis. “Hintena oonika balethonna mela naagetite.
MAR 13:6 Daro asati ta sunthan, ‘Taani Kiristoosa’ yaagidi tamaarsishe yidi, daro asaa balethana.
MAR 13:7 Matan de7iya olaanne haahon de7iya ola wore hinte si7iya wode hirgofite. Hessa melabay hananaw bessees, shin wursethay buroona.
MAR 13:8 Issi biitta asay hara biitta asaara oletana; qassi issi kawotethay hara kawotethatara oletana; biitta qaaxoy ubba bessan hanana; koshay daana, shin hessi ubbay yelo iqethas zooke mela.
MAR 13:9 “Shin hinte, hinte huuphen naagetite. Ayis giiko, asi hintena oykidi, pirda keethas aathidi immana; qassi ayhude woosa keethatanka hintena lisson garaafana; deriya haareyisata sinthaninne kawota sinthan ta gisho hinte markatanaw eqana.
MAR 13:10 Wursethay gakanaape sinthe wongelay koyro dere ubbaas odetanaw bessees.
MAR 13:11 Enti hintena pirda keethi ehiya wodenne aathidi immiya wode, woygidi odaneko koyro hirgofite; he saatiyan Xoossay hintew immiyaba odite. Hintenan Geeshsha Ayyaanay odeteesipe attishin, hintena gideketa.
MAR 13:12 “Ishay ba ishaa, aaway ba na7aa wodhisana. Nayti bantana yelidaysata bolla dendidi, enta wodhisana.
MAR 13:13 Asa ubbay hintena ta suntha gisho ixana, shin wursethi gakanaw minniday attana.
MAR 13:14 “Shin dhayo tunatethay eqanaw bessonna bessan eqidashin hinte be7ana.” (Akeekiso: Hessi woy guusseko nabbabeysi akeeko!) “Yihuda biittan he wode de7eysati deriyako baqato.
MAR 13:15 Keetha huuphen de7iya urayka issiba ekanaw duge wodhidi, ba soo gelopo.
MAR 13:16 Gaden de7eysi ba ma7uwa ekanaw guye simmofo.
MAR 13:17 He wode qanthatida maccasatasinne dhanthiya maccasatas daro un7a gidana.
MAR 13:18 Shin haysi ubbay haniya wodey balgo gidonna mela, Xoossaa woossite.
MAR 13:19 Ayis giiko, Xoossay alamiya medhida wodiyape doomidi, ha77i gakanaw haniboonna metoynne sinthafeka hanonna metoy asa bolla he wode hanana.
MAR 13:20 Goday he gallasata taybuwa guuthonnaako, ase gidida oonika attenna. Shin I ba doorida asa gisho, he gallasata taybuwa guuthees.
MAR 13:21 “He wode oonika hintena, ‘Heko, Kiristoosi haysan de7ees woyko Kiristoosi hinin de7ees’ yaagiko, hessa ammanopite.
MAR 13:22 Wordancho Kiristoosatinne wordo nabeti dendidi bantaw danda7etiko, hari attoshin Xoossay dooridaysataka balethanaw malaatatanne malaalsiyabata bessaana.
MAR 13:23 Shin hinte naagetite; taani hintew ubbaba kasetada odas.
MAR 13:24 “Shin he wode he waayiyape guye, away dhumana; ageenay poo7uwa aggana.
MAR 13:25 Xoolintoti salope kundana; qassi salon de7iya wolqatika qaaxana.
MAR 13:26 He wode Asa Na7ay, gita wolqaranne bonchuwara shaara giddora yishin enti be7ana.
MAR 13:27 He wode I kiitanchota sa7a oyddu bagga kiittana; sa7a gaxape salo gaxa gakanaw, Xoossay doorida asaa shiishana.
MAR 13:28 “Leemisuwa balase mithafe akeekite; balasiya aaciya wodenne I haythay cil7iya wode, torchey matatidaysa hinte ereeta.
MAR 13:29 Hessadaka, hinte he ubbabay haneysa be7iya wode, I matidi penge gakidaysa erite.
MAR 13:30 Taani hintew tuma odayis; ha ubbabay hanana gakanaw haysan de7iya asa ubbay hayqenna.
MAR 13:31 Saloynne sa7i aadhana, shin ta qaalay aadhenna.
MAR 13:32 “Shin he gallasaanne he saatiya Aawa xalaalape attishin, hari attoshin salon de7iya kiitanchota gidin woyko Na7aa gidin oonika erey baawa.
MAR 13:33 He wodey awude gidaneeko, hinte eronna gisho, naagetitenne minnite.
MAR 13:34 Ta yuussay, ba keetha aggidi, oge biya asa mela. Uray ba aylletas huuphen huuphen ooso immidi enta ba oosuwa bolla aawa oothis; qassi naageysi minthidi naagana mela kiittis.
MAR 13:35 “Hessa gisho, minnite. Ayis giiko, goday omarsi gidin woyko giddi bilahe gidin woyko kutto waaso gidin woyko wonti maathe gidin awude yaaneko, hinte ereketa.
MAR 13:36 Hinte akeekona I yidi hinte dhiskidi de7ishin demmonna mela minnite.
MAR 13:37 Taani hintew odeysa asa ubbaas odayis; minnite” yaagis.
MAR 14:1 Paasika Ba7aale bonchiya gallasinne Uytha Ba7aale bonchiya gallasi gakanaw nam7u gallasi attis. Kahine halaqatinne higge astamaareti asi eronna Yesuusa oykidi wodhiya oge koyoosona.
MAR 14:2 “Asay ooshshi kessonna mela Paasika bonchiya gallasan hessa oothoko” yaagidosona.
MAR 14:3 Yesuusi Bitaane kataman baro hargancho gidida Simoona son gibira bolla uttidashin, issi maccasiya albasxiroosa shuchafe oosetida philqaaxe kumetha nardoose geetetiya daro al7o shitto ekada yasu. He philqaaxe menthada shittuwa Yesuusa huuphen tigasu.
MAR 14:4 He bessan de7iya asape issoy issoy hanqetidi, “Ha shittoy mela coo iitey aybisee?
MAR 14:5 Ha shittuwa heedzu xeetu dinaaren bayzidi, miishiya manqotas immanaw danda7etees” yaagidi banta giddon odetidosona. Yaatidi, he maccasiw daro boridosona.
MAR 14:6 Shin Yesuusi “Ha maccasiw aykoka goopite; iyo ayis waaysetii? Iya taw lo77oba oothasu.
MAR 14:7 Manqoti ubba wode hintera de7oosona. Hinte koyida wode awudeka hinte enta maaddanaw danda7eeta, shin taani ubba wode hintera de7ike.
MAR 14:8 Iya ba danda7idaysa oothasu; qassi tana moogoos giigisanaw kasetada shitto tiyasu.
MAR 14:9 Taani hintew tuma odayis; sa7a ubban wongela odiya bessa awunka, asay iyo akeekana mela ha iya oothidaysi odetana” yaagis.
MAR 14:10 Tammanne nam7u tamaaretape issoy Asqoroota Yihuda geeteteysi Yesuusa kahine halaqatas aathidi immanaw entako bis.
MAR 14:11 Enti hessa si7ida wode ufaytidi, “Nuuni new miishe immana” yaagidosona; Yihudi Yesuusa aathidi immanaw inje wode koyees.
MAR 14:12 Uytha miya gallas bonchiya koyro gallas, Paasika katha maanaw maraze shukiya wode, Yesuusa tamaareti iyako, “Paasika bonchiya gallas neeni maana katha nuuni aw bidi giigisino?” gidi oychidosona.
MAR 14:13 Yesuusi ba tamaaretape nam7ata haysada yaagidi kiittis: “Katamaa biite; hinte bishin, otora haathe tookida issi uray hintera gahetana; iya kaallite.
MAR 14:14 I bidi geliya keetha godaa, ‘Astamaarey neeko, “Taani ta tamaaretara Paasika maanaw imatha kifiley awunee?” yaagees’ yaagite.
MAR 14:15 Goday hintena pooqiya bolla de7iya giigidi uttida dalga kifile bessaana; hessan giigisite” yaagis.
MAR 14:16 He nam7u tamaareti keyidi, katama bidosona; Yesuusi entaw odidaysada demmidi, Paasika kathi giigisidosona.
MAR 14:17 Sa7ay omarsiya wode Yesuusi tammanne nam7u tamaaretara yaa bis.
MAR 14:18 Enti uttidi kathi mishin, Yesuusi entako, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; hintefe issoy taara meysi, tana aathidi immana” yaagis.
MAR 14:19 Iya tamaareti dagammidi, banta huuphen huuphen, “Tuma taneshsha?” yaagidi iya oychidosona.
MAR 14:20 Yesuusi zaaridi, “He uray, hinte tammanne nam7atape issuwa; I taara issife tushanaw ba uytha shaaten yeddeysa.
MAR 14:21 Asa Na7ay, Geeshsha Maxaafay hayqana gidaysada hayqana, shin Asa Na7a, aathidi immiya ura ayye! He uray yeletonna attidaako iyaw lo77oshin” yaagis.
MAR 14:22 Enti mishin, Yesuusi uythaa ekidi, Xoossaa galatis; he uytha menthidi, ba tamaaretas immishe, “He7ite, haysi ta ashuwa” yaagis.
MAR 14:23 Xuu7a ekidi, Xoossaa galatidi, entaw immin ubbayka he xuu7ape uyidosona.
MAR 14:24 Yesuusi, “Haysi ooratha caaquwan daro asaa gisho gukiya ta suutha.
MAR 14:25 Taani hintew tuma odayis; taani Xoossaa kawotethan ooratha woyne uyana gallasi gakanaw zaarada ha woyniyape uyike” yaagis.
MAR 14:26 Mazmure yexidaape guye, Shamaho zuma bolla bidosona.
MAR 14:27 Yesuusi entako, “Hinte ubbay tana yeggi aggidi baqatana; Geeshsha Maxaafay, “ ‘Xoossay wude aawa shocana, dorsati ubbay laaletana’ yaagees.
MAR 14:28 Shin taani hayqope dendidaape guye, hintefe sinthatada Galila baana” yaagis.
MAR 14:29 Phexroosi zaaridi, “Enti ubbay nena yeggi aggidi baqatikoka, ta nena aggike” yaagis.
MAR 14:30 Yesuusi Phexroosako, “Taani new tuma odayis; hachi qamma kuttoy nam7u toho waassanaape sinthe neeni tana heedzu toho kaddana” yaagis.
MAR 14:31 Shin Phexroosi kaseysafe minthidi, “Taani hari attoshin, neera issife hayqiyakoka, nena kaddike” yaagis. Qassi harati ubbatika hessada gidoosona.
MAR 14:32 Geetasemaane geetetiya bessaa bidosona; Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Taani Xoossaa woossada simmana gakanaw hinte haysan uttishite” yaagis.
MAR 14:33 Yesuusi Phexroosa, Yayqoobanne Yohaanisa baara ekidi bis; daro waayetisinne un7etis.
MAR 14:34 Qassi entako, “Taani hayqana gakanaw azzanas, haysan gam7ishite; dhiskofite” yaagis.
MAR 14:35 Guuthi sinthe shiiqidi, sa7an gufannidi, danda7etiyaba gidiko, he waayiya saatey baape aadhana mela, Xoossa woossis.
MAR 14:36 Qassi, “Abba, ta Aawaw, ubbabay new danda7etees, ha waaye xuu7aa taape digga. Shin ne sheney hanope attishin, ta sheney hanopo” yaagis.
MAR 14:37 Yesuusi ba tamaaretako simmi yidi, enti dhiskidashin demmidi, Phexroosako, “Simoona, dhiskadii? Neeni issi saateka barkada naaganaw danda7abikii?
MAR 14:38 Paacen hinte gelonna mela barkidi naagitenne Xoossaa woossite. Hintew lo77o amoy de7ees, shin hinte daaburancho asi” yaagis.
MAR 14:39 Qassika bidi kaseysada Xoossa woossis.
MAR 14:40 Ba tamaaretako guye simmidi yaa wode, dhiskidashin demmis. Enta ayfiya dhiskoy goozi wothida gisho, iyako ay odetiyakoka erokona.
MAR 14:41 Heedzantho entako yidi, “Ha77i gakanawuka dhisketinne shempetii? Hiza, gidana; saatey gakis; be7ite! Asa Na7ay, nagarancho asaas aadhidi imetana wodey gakis.
MAR 14:42 Dendidi yedhite; be7ite, tana aathidi immanaysi gakis” yaagis.
MAR 14:43 Yesuusi hessa buroo odishin, tammanne nam7u iya tamaaretape issoy, Yihudi, ellesidi gaki wodhis. Qassi kahine halaqati, higge astamaaretinne cimati kiittin, mashshanne xam7a oykida daro asay iyara issife yidosona.
MAR 14:44 Yesuusa aathidi immanaysi he daro asaas, “Taani yeeriya uray iya; iya oykidi, loythi naagidi efite” yaagidi malla odi wothis.
MAR 14:45 Yihudi gaki wodhida mela Yesuusako shiiqidi, “Astamaariyaw” yaagidi Yesuusa yeeri ekis.
MAR 14:46 He daro asay Yesuusa oykidosona.
MAR 14:47 Shin matan eqidaysatape issoy ba mashsha shoddidi kahine halaqaa aylliya shocidi, iya haytha qanxidi holis.
MAR 14:48 Yesuusi zaaridi, he shiiqida daro asaako, “Tana panga kessidi, panga oykeysada oykanaw mashshenne xam7a oykidi yidetii?
MAR 14:49 Taani xoossa keethan tamaarsashe, gallas gallas hintera de7iya wode tana oykibeeketa, shin Geeshsha Maxaafay gidaysi poletanaw bessees” yaagis.
MAR 14:50 Iya tamaareti ubbay iya yeggi aggidi baqatidosona.
MAR 14:51 Laxana xalaala ma7ida issi na7atetha uray Yesuusa kaalleysa asay oykis.
MAR 14:52 Shin he uray laxana yeggi aggidi, xire kallo baqatis.
MAR 14:53 Asay Yesuusa kahine halaqaa soo efidosona. Yan kahine halaqati, cimatinne higge astamaareti shiiqidi de7oosona.
MAR 14:54 Phexroosi kahine halaqaa zabbaa gakanaw haahon iya kaalli bidi yan naageysatara uttidi tama kayees.
MAR 14:55 Kahine halaqatinne shiiqida asa ubbay Yesuusa wodhanaw iya bolla marka koydosona, shin aykoka demmibookona.
MAR 14:56 Daro asati iya bolla wordo markatidosona, shin enta markatethay issino gidibeenna.
MAR 14:57 Issi issi asati dendi eqidi Yesuusa bolla, “I, ‘Taani asi keexida ha Xoossa Keetha laallada, asa kushen keexetiboonna hara Xoossa Keetha heedzu gallasa giddon keexana’ gishin nuuni si7ida” yaagidi wordo markatidosona.
MAR 14:59 Gidoshin, enta markatethay hessanka issino gidibeenna.
MAR 14:60 Kahine halaqay asa ubba sinthan dendi eqidi, “Haysati nena mootiya mootuwas ne zaariyabay baawee?” yaagidi Yesuusa oychis.
MAR 14:61 Shin Yesuusi si77i gis; aykoka zaaribeenna. Kahine halaqay, “Anjetida Xoossaa Na7ay, Kiristoosi neneyee?” yaagidi zaari oychis.
MAR 14:62 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ee tana, hinte Asa Na7ay, wolqaama Xoossaafe ushacha baggara uttidashin qassi saluwa shaarara yishin be7ana” yaagis.
MAR 14:63 Kahine halaqay ba ma7uwa peedhidi, “Nuna hara marka ay koshshii?
MAR 14:64 Hinte iya cashsha si7ideta; hinte qofay aybee?” yaagis. Enti ubbay, “I hayqanaw bessees” yaagidi iya bolla pirdidosona.
MAR 14:65 Entafe issoti issoti iya bolla cutethi oykidosona. Iya ayfiya goozidi baqishe, “Nena dechiday oonee? Ane nuus oda!” yaagidosona. Naageysati iya eki efidi garaafidosona.
MAR 14:66 Phexroosi kahine halaqaa zabban garsa baggara de7ishin, kahine halaqa gadhindotape issiniya ya yasu.
MAR 14:67 Phexroosi tama kayeysa demmada, tishshi ootha xeellada, “Neka Naazirete Yesuusara de7aasa” yaagasu.
MAR 14:68 Shin Phexroosi, “Ne geysi aybeko ta erike, taw akeeketena” yaagidi kaddis. Yaagi simmidi, zago keyiya wode iiraka kuttoy waassis.
MAR 14:69 He gadhindiya Phexroosa be7ada, iya matan eqida asatako, “Ha urayka entara de7ees” gada zaara odasu.
MAR 14:70 Shin Phexroosi qassika kaddis. Guuthu gam7ishin, matan eqida asati nam7antho Phexroosako, “Neeni Galila biitta asi gidiya gisho tuma entara de7aasa” yaagidosona.
MAR 14:71 Shin Phexroosi, “Taani hinte giya uraa erike!” yaagidi bana baadethinne caaqo oykis.
MAR 14:72 Ellesidi kuttoy nam7antho waassi aggis. Phexroosi, Yesuusi iyako, “Neeni kuttoy nam7u toho waassanaape sinthe heedzu toho tana kaddana” gidaysa akeekidi daro yeekis.
MAR 15:1 Wonta guura ellesidi kahine halaqati, cimati, higge astamaaretinne Ayhude shangoti ubbay shiiqidi maqetidosona. Enti Yesuusa qachi efidi Philaxoosas aathidi immidosona.
MAR 15:2 Philaxoosi iyako, “Neeni Ayhude kawo?” yaagidi oychis. Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ne gadasa” yaagis.
MAR 15:3 Kahine halaqati Yesuusa daroban mootidosona.
MAR 15:4 Shin Philaxoosi zaaridi Yesuusako, “New zaariyabay baawee? Enti ne bolla ay mela mootuwa ehiyako be7ikii?” yaagis.
MAR 15:5 Shin Yesuusi haraba zaaronna ixin, Philaxoosi malaaletis.
MAR 15:6 Philaxoosas Paasika Ba7aale bonchiya gallasan asay koya issi asi qashope billiya meezey de7ees.
MAR 15:7 He wode issi Barbaana geetetiya uray ooshshu kessidi shempo wodhida asaara issife qasho keethan de7ees.
MAR 15:8 Shiiqida daro asay Philaxoosi kaseysada oothana mela iya oychidosona.
MAR 15:9 Philaxoosi asa zaaridi, “Taani hintew Ayhudeta kawa billanaysa koyeetii?” yaagidi oychis.
MAR 15:10 Hessa I giday, kahine halaqati Yesuusa qanaatidi aathidi immidaysa eriya gishosa.
MAR 15:11 Shin kahine halaqati Yesuusa gisho Barbaana billanaada, he shiiqida asay Philaxoosa woossana mela asaa maqidosona.
MAR 15:12 Philaxoosi zaaridi, “Yaatin, ha hinte Ayhude kawo geysa waato?” yaagis.
MAR 15:13 Asay Philaxoosa bolla waassidi, “Masqale bolla iya kaqa” yaagidosona.
MAR 15:14 Philaxoosi, “Ayis? I ay iitaba oothidee?” yaagis. Shin asay kaseysafe guji waassidi, “Masqale bolla iya kaqa” yaagidosona.
MAR 15:15 Philaxoosi asaa ufaysanaw koyidi, Barbaana billis. Yaatidi, lisson Yesuusa garaafisidi, masqaliya bolla kaqana mela entaw aathidi immis.
MAR 15:16 Hessafe guye, wotaadareti Yesuusa deriya haareysa ooso keethi efidi, hara wotaadareta ubbaa issife xeegidosona.
MAR 15:17 Qassi zo7o afila iya mayzidosona; aguntha kallacha giigisidi, iya huuphen wothidosona.
MAR 15:18 Hessafe guye, iyako, “Ayhudeta kawaw merinaw kawota” yaagidi, iyaw ziggidosona.
MAR 15:19 Iya huuphiya xam7an shocidosona; qassi iya bolla cuttidosona; gulbatidi iyaw goyinnidosona.
MAR 15:20 Iya toochidaape guye zo7o afila iyape qaari ekidi, iya afila iya mayzidi masqale bolla iya kaqanaw efidosona.
MAR 15:21 Enti bishe, Iskindirenne Rufoosa aawa, Simoona geetetiya Qereena biitta asi, gaxarepe katama yeysara gahetidi, Yesuusa masqaliya wolqan toossidosona.
MAR 15:22 Yaatidi Golgota geetetiya bessaa Yesuusa efidosona. “Golgota” guussay “Huuphe guugge” guussu.
MAR 15:23 Sakoy si7etonna mela karbera walaketida woyne uyo gidi iyaw immidosona; shin I uyonna ixis.
MAR 15:24 Enti masqale bolla iya kaqidosona. Oona aybi gakaneeko gidi iya afila shaakidi saama yeggidosona.
MAR 15:25 Enti masqale bolla iya kaqiya wode wontafe heedzu saate.
MAR 15:26 Enti, “Ayhude kawa” yaagidi iya mootiya xuufe xaafidi wothidosona.
MAR 15:27 Yesuusara nam7u pangata issuwa iyape ushacha baggara hankuwa iyape haddirsa baggara masqale bolla kaqidosona.
MAR 15:28 Geeshsha Maxaafay, “Iitabaa oothida asatara I paydetis” geetetidaysi poletis.
MAR 15:29 Ogera aadhiya asay Yesuusa kadhidi, banta huuphiya qaathidi cayidosona. “Heko! Xoossa Keetha laallada heedzu gallasa giddon keexana geyso,
MAR 15:30 ane masqaliya bollafe wodha; ne huuphiya ashsha” yaagidosona.
MAR 15:31 Hessadaka, kahine halaqati higge asatamaaretara issife Yesuusa toochidi, “Harata ashshis, shin bana ashshanaw danda7enna;
MAR 15:32 nuuni be7idi ammanana mela Kiristoosi, Isra7eele Kawoy, ane masqale bollafe ha77i wodho” yaagidosona. Qassi hari attoshin, iyara masqale bolla kaqetidaysatika iya toochidosona.
MAR 15:33 Usupun saatepe doomidi, uddufun saate gakanaw biitta ubbay dhumis.
MAR 15:34 Uddufun saaten Yesuusi, “Elohe, Elohe, lama sabaqtanii?” yaagidi waassis. Hessa guussay, “Ta Xoossaw, ta Xoossaw, tana ayis aggadii?” guussu.
MAR 15:35 Hessan eqida asape issoy issoy hessa si7idi, “Heko, Eeliyaasa xeegees” yaagis.
MAR 15:36 He asape issoy woxidi, isponjen caala woyne kunthis; hessa xam7a xeeran wothidi, “Naagite; Eeliyaasi masqale bollafe iya wodhisanaw yaaneko ane be7oos” yaagidi, Yesuusa doonako ushshanaw shiishis.
MAR 15:37 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi waassis; hayqis.
MAR 15:38 Xoossa keethan kaqetida magaraajoy qommofe duge gakanaw, nam7u keyidi daaketi wodhis.
MAR 15:39 Masqaliyape sintha baggara yan eqida issi mato halaqay, Yesuusi waanidi hayqidaako be7ida wode, “Ha uray tuma Xoossa Na7a” yaagis.
MAR 15:40 Hessa haahon eqidi be7iya guutha maccasati de7oosona. Enta giddon Magdela Mayraama, kaaluwa Yayqoobanne Yoosa aayiya Mayraamanne Salooma de7oosona.
MAR 15:41 He maccasati Yesuusi Galilan de7iya wode iya kaallidaysatanne iya mokidaysata qassi Yesuusara issife Yerusalaame bida hara daro maccasati yan de7oosona.
MAR 15:42 Sa7i omarsida wode, shiiqida asan bonchetida Ayhude shangotape issoy, Yoosefa geetetiya uray, Xoossa kawotethay yaanaysa naagishe de7eysi, Armaate katama asi de7eysi yis. Wontethe Sambaatas giigetiya gallas gidida gisho, Yoosefi minnidi Philaxoosako bidi, Yesuusa aha ekanaw woossis.
MAR 15:44 Philaxoosi, Yesuusi hayqidaysa si7ida wode malaaletis; mato halaqa xeegidi, “I hayqidi gam7idee?” yaagidi oychis.
MAR 15:45 Philaxoosi, Yesuusi hayqidaysa mato halaqaape si7idi, iya aha Yoosefas immis.
MAR 15:46 Yoosefi moogo afila shammis; Yesuusa aha masqaliyape wothidi, afilan xaaxidi, shuchafe woocetida duufon iya aha moogis. Qassi he duufuwa doonan gita shuchu gondorsidi wothis.
MAR 15:47 Magdela Mayraamanne Yoosa aayiya Mayraama Yesuusa aha enti awun moogidako be7oosona.
MAR 16:1 Sambaati aadhidaape guye, Magdela Mayraama, Yayqooba aayiya Mayraamanne Salooma bidi, Yesuusa aha tiyanaw shitto shammidosona.
MAR 16:2 Wogga wode wonta daro guura xalqey caarishin, duufo bidosona.
MAR 16:3 Enti banta giddon issoy issuwara, “Duufuwa doonape nuus shuchaa oonee gondorsidi digganay?” yaagidi odetidosona.
MAR 16:4 Enti xeelliya wode he daro gita shuchay gondoretidi kichidaysa be7idosona.
MAR 16:5 Yesuusi moogetida duufuwa giddo geliya wode issi pantha addey bootha ma7o ma7idi, ushacha baggara uttidaysa be7idi dagammidosona.
MAR 16:6 Shin I entako, “Dagammofite; masqaliya bolla kaqetida, Naazirete Yesuusa hinte koyeysa taani erayis. I haysan deenna, hayqope dendis. Enti iya moogida bessa haysa be7ite.
MAR 16:7 Ha77i bidi Yesuusa tamaaretasinne Phexroosas, ‘Yesuusi hintefe sinthatidi Galila bees. I, hintew odidaysada hinte iya yan be7ana’ yaagidi odite” yaagis.
MAR 16:8 Maccasati yashshan kokorishe duufope keyidi baqatidosona. Qassi enti yayyida gisho, hessa oodeska aykoka odibookona.
MAR 16:9 Yesuusi hayqope dendidaape guye, wogga gallas wonta, laapun tuna ayyaanata kessida Magdela Mayraamis koyrottidi bentis.
MAR 16:10 Iya bada kase iyara de7eysatas, enti azzanishenne yeekishe de7ishin odasu.
MAR 16:11 Shin Yesuusi paxa de7eysanne iw bentidaysa enti si7ida wode iya geysa ammanibookona.
MAR 16:12 Hessafe guye, entafe nam7ati katamaape keyidi bishin, oge bolla Yesuusi kasepe dummatidi entaw bentis.
MAR 16:13 Enti guye simmidi, haratas odidosona, shin haratika enta odaa tuma gibookona.
MAR 16:14 Guyepe tammanne issi iya tamaareti kathi mishin, Yesuusi entaw bentis. Entaw ammanoy bayna gishonne hayqope I dendidaysa be7ida asay odin, enti ammanonna ixida gisho I enta boris.
MAR 16:15 I entako, “Biitta ubbaa bidi asa ubbaas wongela odite.
MAR 16:16 Ammaneynne xammaqetey attana, shin ammanonay pirdetana.
MAR 16:17 Ammaneysatas ha malaatati imetana. Enti ta sunthan tuna ayyaanata kessana, ooratha doonan odetana.
MAR 16:18 Enti shooshu oykikoka woyko wodhiyaba uyikoka enta qohenna. Qassi enti banta kushiya harganchota bolla wothidi enta pathana” yaagis.
MAR 16:19 Goday Yesuusi tamaaretara odetidaape guye, pude salo keyis; Xoossafe ushacha baggara uttis.
MAR 16:20 Iya tamaareti bida bessa ubban qaala odidosona. Godayka entara issife oothees. Enti odiya qaalay tuma gididaysa Xoossay entaw immiya malaatatan erisis.
LUK 1:1 Boncho Tewofloosa, nu giddon poletidabas daroti, bantaw danda7etida mela xaafidosona.
LUK 1:2 He taarikiya enti xaafiday koyrope doomidi ayfe markatinne qaala haggaazeysati nuus odidaysa.
LUK 1:3 Taka ta baggara koyrope akeeka xeellidaape guye, he taarikiya hanota maarayada new xaafoy lo77o gididi bentis.
LUK 1:4 Hessika, ne tamaaridabay tuma gideysa erisanaasa.
LUK 1:5 Yihuda kawa Herodiisa wode Abiya yaraape gidida Zakaryaasa geetetiya Ayhude kahiney de7ees. Iya machiyaka Aarona sheeshape. I sunthayka Elsabeexo.
LUK 1:6 Nam7ayka Godaa wogaanne kiita ubbaa naagidi borey bayna Xoossaa sinthan xillotethan de7idosona.
LUK 1:7 Hanope attishin, Elsabeexa maynthi gidida gisho entaw na7i baawa; nam7ayka qassi cimidosona.
LUK 1:8 Issi gallas Zakaryaasi ba gishuwa maaran Xoossaa sinthan kahinetethan haggaazees.
LUK 1:9 Kahinetetha wogan Xoossa Keethi gelidi ixaane cuyisanaw iya saami gakis.
LUK 1:10 Ixaaney cuyaa wode asay karen woossees.
LUK 1:11 Godaa kiitanchoy yarsho yarshiya bessaafe ushacha baggara eqidi bentis.
LUK 1:12 Zakaryaasi iya be7ida wode dagammidi daro yayyis.
LUK 1:13 Shin kiitanchoy iyako, “Zakaryaasa yayyofa; ne woosay si7etis. Ne machiya Elsabeexa adde na7a yelana, iya Yohaanisa gada ne sunthana.
LUK 1:14 I new injenne ufaysi gidana; daroti iya yeletethan ufaytana.
LUK 1:15 Godaa sinthan I gita gidana; woyne ushshi gidin hara mathoyiya ushsha uyenna. Ba aaye ulon de7ishe Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumana.
LUK 1:16 Isra7eele asatape darota banta Godaa, Xoossaako zaarana.
LUK 1:17 Aawata wozana naytako zaarana, kiitetonayisata xillota cincatethaako zaarana mela, Godaas bessiya dere giigisanaw Eeliyaasa ayyaananinne wolqan Godaa sinthan baana” yaagis.
LUK 1:18 Zakaryaasi kiitanchuwako, “Ta hessa aybin eranee? Taaranne ta machera cimida” yaagis.
LUK 1:19 Kiitanchoy zaaridi, “Taani Xoossaa sinthan eqiya Gabreele. Ha mishiraachuwa new odanaw Xoossaafe kiitetas.
LUK 1:20 Heko, wodiya naagidi poletiya ta qaala ne ammanonna ixida gisho, haysi poletana gakanaw neeni muume gidana, odetanawuka danda7aka” yaagis.
LUK 1:21 He wode Zakaryaasi Xoossa Keethi gelidi gam7ida gisho, aybi hanide gidi asay karen naagishe gam7is.
LUK 1:22 I kare keyidi entana odisanaw danda7ibeenna. Malli besope attishin, odetanaw danda7onaysa be7ida wode qoncethi be7idaysa eridosona.
LUK 1:23 Zakaryaasi ba haggaazuwa polidi soo simmis.
LUK 1:24 Hessafe guye, iya machiya Elsabeexa qanthatasu. Ichashu ageena kumethi bana genthada gam7asu.
LUK 1:25 Iya, “Goday ba maarotan ta boriya asaa giddofe digganaw be7idi ha wodiyan haysa oothis” yaagasu.
LUK 1:26 Elsabeexa qanthatin usupuntho ageenan, Xoossay kiitanchuwa Gabreele Galila biittan de7iya Naazirete katamaa kiittis.
LUK 1:27 Kawa Dawita sheeshape gidida Yoosefa geetetiya uraas oyshetida geela7eeko kiittis. He geela7iya Mayraamo geetetawusu.
LUK 1:28 Kiitanchoy iiko bidi, “Daro dosetidaare, saroy new gido, Xoossay neera de7ees; neeni anjetidaaro” yaagis.
LUK 1:29 Mayraama iya odan daro dagammada, “Haysi aybi sarotho” gada heetasu.
LUK 1:30 Kiitanchoy zaaridi, “Mayraame, babofa; neeni Xoossa sinthan saba demmadasa.
LUK 1:31 Heko neeni qanthatana adde na7a yelana, iya sunthaa Yesuusa gada sunthana.
LUK 1:32 I gita gidana, Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa na7aa geetetidi xeegetana. Godaa Xoossay iya aawa Dawita araata iyaw immana.
LUK 1:33 I Yayqooba sheesha bolla merinaw kawotana; iya kawotethaas zawi baawa” yaagis.
LUK 1:34 Mayraama kiitanchuwako, “Hessi waanidi hananee? Ta adde erike” yaagasu.
LUK 1:35 Kiitanchoy zaaridi, “Geeshsha Ayyaanay ne bolla wodhana, Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa wolqay ne bolla kuyatana. Hessa gisho, yeletiya geeshsha na7ay Xoossaa Na7aa geetetana.
LUK 1:36 Heko, ne dabiya Elsabeexa ba cimatetha laythan adde na7a qanthatasu. Iya maynthi geetetidaaro, shin ha77i usupuntho ageena oykasu.
LUK 1:37 Xoossaa xooniyabay baawa” yaagis.
LUK 1:38 Mayraama, “Heko, taani Godaa aylliw, ne qaalada taw hano” yaagasu. Hessafe guye, kiitanchoy iipe shaaketis.
LUK 1:39 Mayraama he saamintan dendada Yihuda biittan de7iya issi derey dariya katama basu.
LUK 1:40 Zakaryaasa soo gelada Elsabeexo sarothasu.
LUK 1:41 Elsabeexa Mayraami sarothuwa si7ida wode I uluwan de7iya na7ay ufaysan gupis. Elsabeexa Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumada,
LUK 1:42 ba qaala dhoqu oothada, “Neeni maccasa giddofe anjetidaaro, ne qanthatida na7ayka anjetidaysa.
LUK 1:43 Hanoshin, ta Godaa aaye, neeni taako yaana mela taani oonee?
LUK 1:44 Heko ne sarothuwa ta si7ida wode ta uluwan de7iya na7ay ufaysan gupis.
LUK 1:45 Goday polana gidi immida qaala ammanidara, iya anjetidaaro” yaagasu.
LUK 1:46 Mayraama haysada yaagasu: “Ta shempiya Godaa bonchawusu,
LUK 1:47 ta Ayyaanay dhaliya Xoossan ufaytees.
LUK 1:48 I ba aylle kawushatethaa be7is. Hachife doomidi yeletethi ubbay tana anjetidaaro gaana.
LUK 1:49 Ayis giiko, wolqaama gidida I, taw gitaba oothis. Iya sunthay Geeshshaa.
LUK 1:50 Iya boncheyisata bolla, iya maarotethay merinaape merinaa gakanaasa.
LUK 1:51 Ba qesiyan minoba oothis, banta wozanan otorteyisata laallis.
LUK 1:52 Wolqaama kawota araatape kawushis; bantana kawushidaysata kaaboyis.
LUK 1:53 Koshatidaysata lo77oban kalsis, shin dureta mela kushe yeddis.
LUK 1:54 Ba maarota qopidi, Ba aylliya Isra7eele maaddis.
LUK 1:55 Hessika nu aawatas odida qaala, Abrahaamesinne iya sheeshas gidaysa merinaw polanaasa” yaagasu.
LUK 1:56 Mayraama Elsabeexi matan heedzu ageena mela gam7ada ba soo simmasu.
LUK 1:57 Elsabeexis yelo qammay gakin adde na7a yelasu.
LUK 1:58 I shoorotinne I dabboti Goday gita maarota oothidaysa si7idi, iira issife ufaytidosona.
LUK 1:59 Hospuntha gallasan yooga na7aa qaxaranaw yidosona. Iya aawa sunthan Zakaryaasa gidi sunthanaw koydosona.
LUK 1:60 Shin aayiya, “Akay, Yohaanisa geetetanaw bessees” yaagasu.
LUK 1:61 Entika, “Ne dabbotape ha sunthan xeegetiday oonika baawa” yaagidosona.
LUK 1:62 Iya aaway oona gidi sunthaneko eranaw koyidi iya malla oychidosona.
LUK 1:63 I xaafiyabaa oychi ekidi, “Iya sunthay Yohaanisa” gidi xaafis. Ubbay I xaafidaysa be7idi malaaletidosona.
LUK 1:64 Iira Zakaryaasa inxarsay biletis, Xoossaa galatishe odetethi oykis.
LUK 1:65 Shooroti ubbay yashshan kumidosona. Ha hanidabay derey dariya Yihuda biittan odetis.
LUK 1:66 Hessa si7ida ubbay, “Ha na7ay ay hanandesha” gidi banta giddon odetidosona. Godaa kushey iyara de7ees.
LUK 1:67 Yohaanisa aaway Zakaryaasi Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumidi haysada yaagidi tinbite odis.
LUK 1:68 “Isra7eele Goday galatetto, yidi ba asaa wozis.
LUK 1:69 Ba aylliya Dawita keethan atotetha kaciya denthis.
LUK 1:70 Hessika beni wode geeshsha nabeta doonan odetidaysa mela,
LUK 1:71 Iya ashoy nu morketapenne nuura eqetiya ubbaa kushiyape.
LUK 1:72 Hessa I oothiday nu aawatas ba maarota bessanaasinne, ba geeshsha caaquwa naaganaassa.
LUK 1:73 Nu aawa Abrahaames caaqida caaquwa qopanaasinne
LUK 1:74 nu morketa kushepe kessidi yashshi bayna iya haggaazana melasa.
LUK 1:75 Nu laytha ubban geeshshatethaninne xillotethan ba sinthan nuna essanaasa.
LUK 1:76 Qassi la na7aw, neeni Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa nabe geetetana. Godaa ogiya loythanaw ne iya sinthan baana.
LUK 1:77 Enta nagaray qushetin, enti atotethi demmanaysa ne Godaa deriyas odana.
LUK 1:78 Nu Xoossaa lo77o maarotethaafe dendoysan wonta xalqey nuus saluwape keyis.
LUK 1:79 Hessika dhumaninne, hayqo kuya garsan de7eysatas poo7isanaasa, nu tohuwaka saro ogiyako zaaranaasa” yaagis.
LUK 1:80 Na7ay diccis, Ayyaanan minnis, Isra7eele asaas qoncana gakanaw mela biittan de7is.
LUK 2:1 He wode Roome biittan de7iya asa ubbay taybetana melanne sunthay xaafetana mela kawoy Awugisxoosi kiittis.
LUK 2:2 Hessika Qerenoosi Soore biitta aysiya wode oosetida koyro taybuwa.
LUK 2:3 Hessa gisho, issi issi asi ba sunthaa xaafetanaw ba yeletida biitta bis.
LUK 2:4 Yoosefika Dawita keethaafenne yaraape gidida gisho, Galila Naazirete katamaape dendidi Dawita katama gidida Yihuda Beeteleme bis.
LUK 2:5 Bishe, yelanaw wodey wurida I oychi wothida, Mayraamira wolla xaafetanaw bis.
LUK 2:6 Enti yan de7ishin iw yelo wodey gakis.
LUK 2:7 Ba bayra na7aa yelasu. Curqara xaaxada imathi aqiya keethan bessi dhayida gisho daran mehe muziya gongen zin7isasu.
LUK 2:8 He gadiyan qamma dorsa wudiya naagishe karen aqiya henthanchoti de7oosona.
LUK 2:9 Godaa kiitanchoy hassayonna yidi enta matan eqis. Godaa bonchoy enta yuushuwan poo7is; entika wolqaama yashshi yayyidosona.
LUK 2:10 Shin kiitanchoy, “Yayyofite! Heko, asaa ubbaas gidiya gita ufaysaa mishiraachuwa ekada yas.
LUK 2:11 Hessika, Dawita kataman ashsheysi hintew hachi yeletis. I Godaa Kiristoosa.
LUK 2:12 Zoqale na7i curqara xaaxetidi gongen zin7idaysa hinte demmana; hessika hintew malla gido” yaagis.
LUK 2:13 Qoponna daro salo kiitanchoti kiitanchuwara issife qoncidi,
LUK 2:14 “Bonchoy Xoossaas dhoqa saluwan, saroy biitta bolla Xoossay dosiya asaas gido” yaagidi galatidosona.
LUK 2:15 Kiitanchoti entafe shaaketidi saluwa keydaape guye henthanchoti, “Ane Goday nuus qoncisidabaanne hanidaba be7anaw Beeteleme boos” yaagidosona.
LUK 2:16 Entika ellesidi bidosona. Mayraamo, Yoosefanne zoqale na7aa gongen zin7idaysa be7idosona.
LUK 2:17 Be7i simmidi na7aba entaw odetoysa, qoncisidi he bessan de7iya asaas markatidosona.
LUK 2:18 Hessa si7ida ubbay henthanchoti odidaysan malaaletidosona.
LUK 2:19 Mayraama hanidaba ubbaa ba wozanan qopashe de7asu.
LUK 2:20 Henthanchoti entaw odetidaysada hanin be7idosona. Hessa gisho, banta si7idabaasinne be7idaba ubbaas Xoossaa bonchishenne galatishe simmidosona.
LUK 2:21 Hospuntha qamman, qaxaro wodey gakin, I qanthatanaape sinthe kiitanchoy wothida sunthan Yesuusa geetetis.
LUK 2:22 Muse woga mela enta geeshshatetha wodey poletidaape guye Yoosefaranne Mayraamira yooga na7aa banta Godaas immanaw Yerusalaame bidosona.
LUK 2:23 Hessika, Godaa wogan, “Adde gidida bayra na7i ubbay Godaas dummatidaysa gido” geetetidi xaafetidaysa polanaasa.
LUK 2:24 Qassi Godaa wogan, nam7u kuraacho woyko holle yarshanaw efidosona.
LUK 2:25 He wode geeshshinne ammanora mino gidida Simoona geetetiya asi Yerusalaamen de7ees. I Isra7eeleta atotetha naagishe de7ees. Geeshsha Ayyaanayka iya bolla de7ees.
LUK 2:26 Qassi Kiristoosa be7onna hayqonnaysa Geeshsha Ayyaanay iyaw qoncisin eridi de7ees.
LUK 2:27 I he gallas Ayyaanay kaalethin Xoossa Keethi bis. Na7aa aayeranne aawara wogaa polanaw yooga na7aa Yesuusa ekidi gelida wode,
LUK 2:28 Simooni moki ekidi na7aa idimmidi,
LUK 2:29 “Godaw ne taw gelida qaala mela, ha77i ne aylliya saron moyza.
LUK 2:30 Ta ayfey asaa ubbaa sinthan ne giigisida,
LUK 2:31 ne ashuwa be7is.
LUK 2:32 Hessika kawotethata ubbaas, Xoossaa ogiya qoncisiya poo7o, ne asaa Isra7eeleska boncho” yaagidi Xoossaa galatis.
LUK 2:33 Yoosefaranne Mayraamira iyaw odetidaban malaaletidosona.
LUK 2:34 Simooni enta anjis. Aaye Mayraamiko, “Heko daro asaa wozanaa qofay qoncana mela, Isra7eelen de7iya darotas enta kundethaasinne denduwas Xoossan dooretis.
LUK 2:35 Qassi eqeteysatas malla gidana. Ne shempuwaraka qassi mashshi aadhana” yaagis.
LUK 2:36 Qassi Aseera yaraape gidida Faanu7ela na7iya Haanna geetetiya nabey de7awusu. Iya daro cimasu; iya ba koyro azinaara laapun laythi de7asu.
LUK 2:37 I azinay hayqin hospun tammanne oyddu laythi gidana gakanaw qammanne gallas pacey bayna woosaninne xooman xoossa keethan haggaazasu.
LUK 2:38 Iya he saatiyan bada Xoossaa galatasu; Yerusalaame wozetetha naagiya ubbaas yooga na7aba markatasu.
LUK 2:39 Yoosefaranne Mayraamira Godaa higgiyan kiitetida woga ubbaa polidaape guye Galila biittan de7iya banta katama Naazirete simmidosona.
LUK 2:40 Na7ay diccishenne minnishe bis. Cincatethan kumis; Xoossaa aadho keehatethay iya bolla de7ees.
LUK 2:41 Yoosefaranne Mayraamira Paasika Ba7aale bonchanaw laythan laythan Yerusalaame boosona.
LUK 2:42 Yesuusas tammanne nam7u laythi gidiya wode kase meezetidaysada ba7aale bonchanaw bidosona.
LUK 2:43 Baaliya bonchidaape guye soo simmiya wode na7ay Yesuusi Yerusalaamen attis. Shin Yoosefaranne Mayraamira I Yerusalaamen attoysa eribookona.
LUK 2:44 I soo simmiya asaara wolla de7iya daanin enti issi gallasa oge bidosona. I baynaysa eridaape guye banta dabbotanne laggeta matan koydosona.
LUK 2:45 I yan dhayin koyishe guye Yerusalaame gakanaw bidosona.
LUK 2:46 Heedzu gallasape guye xoossa keethan astamaareta giddon uttidi entaba si7ishenne enta oychishe de7ishin demmidosona.
LUK 2:47 Iya si7iya ubbay iya akeekaninne zaaruwan malaaletidosona.
LUK 2:48 Soo asay iya demmida wode malaaletidosona. Iya aayaka, “Ta na7aw, ayis nuna haysada oothadii? Ne aawaranne taara nena koyishe un7etida” yaagasu.
LUK 2:49 Yesuusi entako, “Tana ayis koyeetii? Ta, ta aawa keethan daanaw besseysa ereketi” yaagis.
LUK 2:50 Shin I entako gidaba enti akeekibokona.
LUK 2:51 Hessafe guye, entara issife Naazirete katama bis. Entaw kiitetishe de7is. Iya aayiya he ubbaa ba wozanan wothada naagasu.
LUK 2:52 Yesuusi, cincatethan, geesaninne teeman Xoossaa sinthaninne asa sinthan diccis.
LUK 3:1 Kawoy Xibaryoosi Roome biittan kawotin, tammanne ichashantho laythan, Phenxe Philaxoosi Yihuda haariya wode, Herodiisi Galila haariya wode, iya ishaa Filphoosi Ixuuriyasanne Xirakondoosa haariya wode, Lisaniyoosi Ablaanisa haariya wode,
LUK 3:2 Haannaranne Qayyaafara kahine halaqa gidi de7ishin, Xoossaa qaalay Zakaryaasa na7aa Yohaanisako mela biitta yis.
LUK 3:3 Yohaanisi, “Hinte nagaraape simmitenne xammaqetite. Xoossay hinte nagaraa atto gaana” yaagidi tamaarsishe Yordaanose Shaafa heeran de7iya biitta ubbaa bis.
LUK 3:4 Hessika nabey Isayaasi ba maxaafan, “Mela biittan ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, waassiya uraa qaalay, ‘Godaa ogiya giigisite, horogaaka piddi oothite.
LUK 3:5 Aafo ubbay kumana, zumaynne derey ziqi gaana. Wobbe ogey luulana, giigonna horogay qinxi gaana.
LUK 3:6 Asho ma7ida ubbay, Xoossaa ashuwa be7ana’ ” gidi xaafidaysada hanis.
LUK 3:7 Yohaanisi, ba kushen xammaqetanaw yida asaako, “Hinteno, shoosha nayto yaanaw de7iya hanquwafe attana mela hintena zoriday oonee?
LUK 3:8 Hiza, hinte simuwa qoncisiya lo77o ooso oothite, hinte wozanan, ‘Nuus, nu aaway Abrahaamey de7ees gidi ceeqetofite.’ Haa si7ite, ha shuchatape Xoossay Abrahaames na7a kessanaw danda7ees.
LUK 3:9 Heko, beexey mithaa xaphon de7ees. Hiza, lo77o ayfe ayfonna mitha ubbay qanxetidi taman yegetana” yaagis.
LUK 3:10 Asay, “Yaatin nuuni ay oothinoo?” yaagidi oychidosona.
LUK 3:11 Yohaanisi zaaridi, “Nam7u afili de7iya asi baynaysas immo. Kathi de7eysi baynaysas immo” yaagis.
LUK 3:12 Qaraxa qanxiseysati xammaqetanaw yidi, “Astamaariyaw, nuuni ay oothinoo?” yaagidosona.
LUK 3:13 I zaaridi, “Hinte qanxisanaw kiitetoysafe aathidi ekofite” yaagis.
LUK 3:14 Qassi wotaadareti yidi, “Nuuni ay oothinoo” yaagidi oychidosona. Yohaanisi, “Oodebaaka wolqan dafidi ekofite, oonaka wordon mootopite, hinte damoozey hintew gido; ufaytidi de7ite” yaagis.
LUK 3:15 Asay Kiristoosa naagishe de7iya gisho, Yohaanisa, “I Kiristoosa gidandesha?” gidi qopidosona.
LUK 3:16 Yohaanisi ubbaas zaaridi, “Taani hintena haathan xammaqayis, shin taape aadhidi wolqaameysi yaana. Taani iya caammaa wodoruwa billanaw bessonna asi. I hintena Geeshsha Ayyaananinne taman xammaqana.
LUK 3:17 Wudumman de7iya kathaa polo geeshshanaw pithey iya kushen de7ees. Geeshsha kathaa ba shaaliyan qolana; kaliya dhayonna taman xuuggana” yaagis.
LUK 3:18 Qassi Yohaanisi asaa daro zore zoridi Wongela odis.
LUK 3:19 Shin Yohaanisi Herodiisi ba ishaa machiw, Herodiyada, ekida gishonne haraa iita oosota gisho hanqeetida wode,
LUK 3:20 Herodiisi kaseysa bolla haraba ubbaa gujidi Yohaanisa woyne gelsis.
LUK 3:21 Yohaanisi qashetanaape sinthe asaa ubbaa xammaqidi simmin, qasi Yesuusika xammaqetis. I woossishin saloy dooyetis.
LUK 3:22 Geeshsha Ayyaanay holleda bentishe iya bolla uttis. Salope “Taani dosiya na7ay nena; ne tana ufaysaasa” giya qaalay yis.
LUK 3:23 Yesuusi tamaarso oykiya wode iyaw hastamu laythi gidishin, asay iya Yoosefa na7a gidi qopis. Yoosefi Eele na7a,
LUK 3:24 Eeley Mata na7a, Mati Leewe na7a, Leewey Malka na7a, Malki Yoona na7a, Yooni Yoosefa na7a,
LUK 3:25 Yoosefi Mataata na7a, Mataati Amoxe na7a, Amoxey Nahoome na7a, Nahoomey Asiliime na7a, Asiliimey Naage na7a,
LUK 3:26 Naagey Ma7aate na7a, Ma7aatey Mataata na7a, Mataati Samaye na7a,
LUK 3:27 Samayey Yihuda na7a, Yihudi Yonaana na7a, Yoonaney Rase na7a, Rasey Zarubaabela na7a, Zarubaabeli Salatiyaala na7a, Salatiyaali Neera na7a,
LUK 3:28 Neeri Malka na7a, Malki Hade na7a, Hadi Qoosama na7a, Qoosami Elmodaana na7a, Elmodaani Era na7a,
LUK 3:29 Eri Yoose7a na7a, Yoose7i Alaazara na7a, Alaazari Yoraame na7a, Yoraamey Mata na7a, Mata Leewe na7a,
LUK 3:30 Leewey Simoona na7a, Simooni Yihuda na7a, Yihudi Yoosefa na7a, Yoosefi Yonaana na7a, Yoonaney Eliyaqeeme na7a,
LUK 3:31 Eliyaqeemi Maliya na7a, Maliyi Maynaane na7a, Maynaaney Mata na7a, Mati Naatana na7a, Naatani Dawita na7a,
LUK 3:32 Dawiti Isseye na7a, Isseyey Iyobeeda na7a, Iyobeedi Boo7eza na7a, Boo7ezi Salmoona na7a, Salmoona Na7asoona na7a,
LUK 3:33 Na7asooni Amnadaabe na7a, Amnadaabey Raame na7a, Raamey Arne na7a, Arney Asroome na7a,
LUK 3:34 Asroomey Faaresa na7a, Faaresi Yihuda na7a, Yihudi Yayqooba na7a, Yayqoobi Yisaaqa na7a, Yisaaqi Abrahaame na7a, Abrahaamey Taara na7a,
LUK 3:35 Taari Nakoora na7a, Naakorey Saruga na7a, Sarugi Rehu na7a, Rehuy Faleqa na7a, Faleqi Ebeera na7a, Ebeeroy Seela na7a,
LUK 3:36 Seeli Qaynama na7a, Qaynami Arfakisaade na7a, Arfakisaadi Seema na7a, Seemi Nohe na7a, Nohey Laameha na7a,
LUK 3:37 Laamehi Matusaala na7a, Matusaali Heenoke na7a, Heenokey Yaareda na7a, Yaaredi Malal7eela na7a, Malal7eeli Qaynana na7a,
LUK 3:38 Qaynani Henoosa na7a, Henoosi Seeta na7a, Seeti Addaame na7a, Addaamey Xoossaa na7a.
LUK 4:1 Yesuusi Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumidi Yordaanose Shaafape simmida mela Ayyaanay iya mela biitta efis.
LUK 4:2 Yan oytamu gallasinne qamma xalahen paacetis. He gallasatan aykoka moonna gam7ida gisho wursethan koshatis.
LUK 4:3 Xalahey iyako, “Neeni Xoossaa na7a gidiko ane haysi shuchay uythu gido gada kiitta” yaagis.
LUK 4:4 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Asi uytha xalaalan deenna geetetidi xaafetis” yaagis.
LUK 4:5 Hessafe guye, Xalahey Yesuusa adussa dere bolla kessidi ha alamiya kawotethata ayfe qiphi zaaranaw bessis.
LUK 4:6 Xalahey, “Ha ubbaas maataynne bonchoy taw imetis. Taani dosida oodeska immiya gisho new immana.
LUK 4:7 Hessa gisho, neeni taw goyinniko ubbay new gidana” yaagis.
LUK 4:8 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ne Godaa, ne Xoossaa, iya xalaala goyinna geetetidi xaafetis” yaagis.
LUK 4:9 Wursethan Xalahey Yesuusa Yerusalaame efidi Xoossa Keethas huuphiya bolla essidi, “Neeni Xoossaa na7a gidiko ane duge sa7an nena yegga.
LUK 4:10 Ayis giiko, “ ‘Nena naagiya Kiitanchota Xoossay ne gisho kiittana.
LUK 4:11 Enti ne tohoy shuchan dhubetonna mela, banta kushiyan dhoqu oothidi nena denthana’ geetetidi xaafetis” yaagis.
LUK 4:12 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ne Godaa Xoossaa paacofa geetetidi xaafetis” yaagis.
LUK 4:13 Xalahey Yesuusa paaciya wursidaape guye hara inje wode demmana gakanaw iyape shaaketis.
LUK 4:14 Yesuusi Ayyaana wolqan kumidi Galila simmis. Iya sunthay heeran de7iya biitta ubban keyis.
LUK 4:15 I ayhude woosa keethi gelidi tamaarsis; asa ubbay iya galatidosona.
LUK 4:16 Yaape I diccida katamaa Naazirete yis. Kase meezetidaysada Sambaata gallas ayhude woosa keethi gelis. Nabbabanawuka dendi eqis.
LUK 4:17 Nabiya Isayaasa maxaafay iyaw imetin, dooyidi, haysada yaagidi xaafetidaysa demmis:
LUK 4:18 “Godaa Ayyaanay ta bolla de7ees, manqotas Wongela odana mela Xoossay tana dooris. Qashetidaysatas biletethi, qooqidaysata xeelisanaasinne un7etidaysata birshana mela,
LUK 4:19 Xoossay keehanaw qopida laytha odana mela tana kiittis” yaagis.
LUK 4:20 Hessafe guye, maxaafaa xaaxidi haggaazeysas immidi tamaarsanaw uttis. Ayhude woosa keethan de7iya asati ubbay caddi xeelloosona.
LUK 4:21 I, “Haysi hinte haythan hinte si7iya ha maxaafaa qaalay hachi poletis” yaagis.
LUK 4:22 Ubbay iyabaa darsidi odetoosona. Qassi iya doonape keyiya aadho keehatethan kumida qaalan malaaletishe, “Haysi Yoosefa na7aa gidenneyee?” yaagidosona.
LUK 4:23 I, “ ‘Neno dhale aawaw nena ashsha, Qifirnahooman ne oothidaba nu si7oysa qassi haysan ne kataman ootha’ giya leemisuwan hinte tana gaanaysas sidhey baawa” yaagis.
LUK 4:24 Qassi, “Tuma odayis; nabey ba yeletida biittan bonchetenna.
LUK 4:25 “Ta hintew tuma odayis; saloy heedzu laythinne bagga gordetin mino koshi biitta ubban de7iya Eeliyaasa wode daro am7eti Isra7eelen de7oosona.
LUK 4:26 Eeliyaasi entafe issinnekoka kiitetibeenna. Shin Saraptan de7iya am7eeko kiitetis.
LUK 4:27 Nabiya Elsa wode Isra7eelen daro baro harganchoti de7oosona. Shin Soore uraa Ni7imaanepe attishin, oonika paxibeenna” yaagis.
LUK 4:28 Ayhude woosa keethan de7iya asa ubbay hessa si7ida wode daro yilotidosona.
LUK 4:29 Banta uttida bessaafe dendidi dere bolla keexetida katamaape gaxa kessidi sugi yeddanaw aafo doona efidosona.
LUK 4:30 Shin I enta giddora kanthidi aadhis.
LUK 4:31 Yaape Galila biittan de7iya Qifirnahooma katamaa bis. Yan Sambaata gallas asaa tamaarsis.
LUK 4:32 I tamaarsey maatara gidiya gisho ubbay iya timirtiyan malaaletidosona.
LUK 4:33 Ayhude woosa keethan tuna ayyaanay oykida uray de7ees.
