LUK 4:34 I, “Naazirete Yesuusa nuna ayis waaysay nuupe haaka; neeni yiday nuna dhaysanaseyee? Neeni ooneko taani erayis. Neeni Xoossaafe yida Geeshsha” yaagidi waassis.
LUK 4:35 Yesuusi tuna ayyaanako, “Si7i gada ha uraape keya” yaagidi hanqis. Tuna ayyaanay uraa asaa ubbaa sinthan holi yeggidi aykoka qohonna yeddidi keyis.
LUK 4:36 Asa ubbay malaaletidosona. Woliko, “Hanos, haysi aybi timirtee? Tuna ayyaanata maataninne wolqan kiittees; entika keyoosona” yaagidosona.
LUK 4:37 Iya sunthay heera ubban keyis.
LUK 4:38 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi ayhude woosa keethafe keyidi Simoona soo gelis. Simoona mache aayiya mino qoxo misha hargen saketasu. Iyo pathana mela Yesuusa woossidosona.
LUK 4:39 I hiixako shiiqi hokidi I hargiya hanqis. Mishay aggin ellesa dendada enta mokasu.
LUK 4:40 Away wullana hanishin dumma dumma hargiyan oyketida asaa iyako ehidosona. I issuwa issuwa bolla ba kushiya wothidi pathis.
LUK 4:41 Tuna ayyaanati qassi, “Neeni, Xoossaa na7aa” gidi waassishe daro asaape keyidosona. Shin I entana hanqis. I Kiristoosa gideysa enti eriya gisho, issibaaka odetonna mela diggis.
LUK 4:42 Buroo wontiya wode Yesuusi issi geema bessi bis. Asay koyishe I de7iya bessaa yidosona. Entafe I shaaketidi boonna mela digganaw koydosona.
LUK 4:43 Shin I, “Taani hara katamata bada Xoossaa kawotethaa Wongela markatanaw bessees. Ta kiitetiday hessasa” yaagis.
LUK 4:44 Yihuda biittan de7iya ayhude woosa keethan sabbakis.
LUK 5:1 Issi gallas Yesuusi Gensareexe Abbaa matan eqidashin daro asay iya yuushuwa un7ethidi, I tamaarsiya Xoossaa qaala si7oosona.
LUK 5:2 Yan haatha gaxan de7iya nam7u wogolota be7is. Molo oykiya asati wogolotape wodhidi banta gitiya meeccosona.
LUK 5:3 He wogolotape Simoonaysan gelidi biittafe guuthi giddo shiishana mela oychis. Yaatidi, he wogoluwa bolla uttidi asaa tamaarsis.
LUK 5:4 Ba timirtiya ongidaape guye Simoonako, “Gede ciimmuwako shiishada moluwa oykanaw hinte gitiya yeggite” yaagis.
LUK 5:5 Simooni zaaridi, “Astamaariyaw, qamma kumethi daaburishe aqidi aykoka oykibooko, shin ne giiko gitiya yeggana” yaagis.
LUK 5:6 Enti gitiya yeggida wode gitey daaketana gakanaw daro molo oykidosona.
LUK 5:7 Hara wogolon de7iya banta laggeti yidi, bantana maaddana mela wuttidi xeegidosona. Enti yidi nam7u wogoloti, haathan mitettana gakanaw molon kunthidosona.
LUK 5:8 Simoon Phexroosi hessa be7ida wode, Yesuusa sinthan kundidi, “Godaw, taani nagarancho asi gidiya gisho, taape shaaketa” yaagis.
LUK 5:9 I hessa giday, inne iyara de7eysati oykida moluwa darotethan malaaletida gishosa.
LUK 5:10 Qassi Simoona lagge gidida Zabdiyoosa nayti Yayqoobaranne Yohaanisara malaaletidosona. Yesuusi Simoonako, “Babofa! Hizape neeni ase oykiya asi gidana” yaagis.
LUK 5:11 Enti wogolota gaxa shiishidaape guye ubbaa aggidi Yesuusa kaallidosona.
LUK 5:12 Yesuusi katamatape issuwan de7ishin issi baro hargen oyketida asi he kataman de7ees. He uray Yesuusa be7idi iya sinthan gufannidi, “Godaw, ne shene gidiko tana geeshshanaw danda7aasa” gidi woossis.
LUK 5:13 Yesuusi ba kushiya yeddi bochidi, “Ee, ta shene; geeyiya” yaagis. Iira baro hargey uraape kichis.
LUK 5:14 Yesuusi, “Haysa oodeska odopa, shin bada nenatethaa Ayhude kahine bessa. Ne geeyidaysas marka gidana mela Musey kiitida yarsho yarsha” gidi kiittis.
LUK 5:15 Gidoshin, iya sunthay kasepe aadhidi eretishe bis. Daro asay I odiyaba si7anawunne banta hargiyafe paxanaw yoosona.
LUK 5:16 Shin Yesuusi daro wode geema bessi bidi woossees.
LUK 5:17 Issi gallas Yesuusi tamaarsishin Galilapenne Yihuda heera ubbaafe qassi Yerusalaamepe yida Farsaawetinne higge astamaareti yan uttidosona. Asaa pathiya Godaa wolqayka iyara de7ees.
LUK 5:18 He wode asay issi gunda asi halara tookidi ehidosona. Soo gelsidi iya sinthan wothanaw qopidosona.
LUK 5:19 Shin asaa darotethaafe dendoysan soo gelsanaw xoonetidi keethaa bolla keyidi, kaara qawuxidi, harganchuwa halara asaa shaakidi Yesuusa sinthan yeggidosona.
LUK 5:20 Yesuusi enta ammanuwa be7idi, “La addiyaw, ne nagaray atto geetetis” yaagis.
LUK 5:21 Higge astamaaretinne Farsaaweti, “Haysi Xoossaa bolla yaagidi odetey oonee? Issi Xoossafe attishin, hari nagara atto gaanaw danda7ey oonee?” yaagidi qopidosona.
LUK 5:22 Yesuusi enta qofaa erida gisho entako, “Hinte wozanan hessatho ayis qopeetii?
LUK 5:23 ‘Ne nagaray qushetis geysafenne dendada ba geysafe awusi kawuyii?’
LUK 5:24 Shin ta hessa giday Asa Na7i sa7a bolla nagara ato gaanaw maati de7eysa hinte erana melasa.” Hessafe kaallidi, gunda uraako, “Denda; ne algaa tookada ne soo ba” yaagis.
LUK 5:25 I ellesi dendidi enta sinthan eqis; I tooketidi yida algaa tookidi Xoossaa galatishe ba soo bis.
LUK 5:26 He wode ubbayka malaaletidosona. Xoossaa galatishe, “Hachi gita malaata be7ida” yaagidi yashetidosona.
LUK 5:27 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi yaape keyidi bis. Leewe geetetiya issi qaraxa qanxiseysi qaraxa qanxisiya bessan uttidaysa be7idi, “Tana kaalla” yaagis.
LUK 5:28 I ubbaba aggidi, dendidi iya kaallis.
LUK 5:29 He Leewey ba son gita gibira giigisis. Daro qaraxa qanxiseysatinne hara asati katha bolla uttidosona.
LUK 5:30 Farsaawetinne higge astamaareti, “Qaraxa qanxeysataranne nagaranchotara ayis meetinne uyeetii?” yaagidi Yesuusa tamaareta bolla zuuzumidosona.
LUK 5:31 Yesuusi entako, “Harganchotasafe attishin, paxatas aakime koshshenna.
LUK 5:32 Taani nagaranchota maarotako zaaranaasafe attishin, geeshshata xeeganaw yabiike” yaagidi zaaris.
LUK 5:33 Enti Yesuusako, “Yohaanisa tamaareti daro wode xoomosona, woossosona; qassi Farsaaweta tamaaretika hessatho oothosona. Shin neysati ubba wode moosonanne uyoosona” yaagidosona.
LUK 5:34 Yesuusi entako, “Machiw ekeysi entara de7ishin xeegetida asay xoomana mela oothanaw danda7eetii?
LUK 5:35 Shin mushuray entafe shaaketana gallasay yaana, he wode enti xoomana.”
LUK 5:36 Qassi yaagidi leemiso odis; “Ooratha ma7ope peedhidi gal7a ma7o bolla sikey oonika baawa. Hessatho oothiko ooratha ma7uwa peedhees, oorathay gal7aas giigenna.
LUK 5:37 Mal7anto woyne gal7a ogoron qoliya oonika baawa. Hessa oothiko, ooratha woyney gal7a ogoruwa dhusees; woyney gukees ogoroyka maaddonnaba gidees.
LUK 5:38 Hessa gisho, ooratha woyney ooratha ogoron qolettanaw bessees.
LUK 5:39 Hiza, caalay lo77o giya gisho, caala woyne uyi simmidi mal7anto koyey oonika baawa” yaagis.
LUK 6:1 Issi Sambaata gallas Yesuusi giste gade giddora aadhees. Yesuusa tamaareti tiya banga duuthidi banta kushen shirkidi moosona.
LUK 6:2 Shin Farsaaweta giddofe issoti issoti, “Sambaata gallas oothanaw bessonnaba ayis oothetii?” yaagidosona.
LUK 6:3 Yesuusi entako zaaridi, “Dawiti koshatida wode baara de7eysatara issife oothoysa nabbabibeketii?
LUK 6:4 Xoossa Keethi gelidi Ayhude kahineta xalaalas bessiya daabbuwa mis; baara de7eysataska immis” yaagis.
LUK 6:5 Qassi Yesuusi, “Asa Na7ay Sambaata Godaa” yaagis.
LUK 6:6 Hara Sambaata gallas Yesuusi ayhude woosa keethi gelidi tamaarsees. He bessan ushacha kushey silida issi asi de7ees.
LUK 6:7 Higge astamaaretinne Farsaaweti iya mootanaw gaaso koyidi Sambaata gallas pathiko be7ana gidi naagoosona.
LUK 6:8 Shin Yesuusi enta qofaa eridi kushey silida uraako, “Dendada asaa giddon eqa” yaagis. Urayka dendi eqis.
LUK 6:9 Yesuusi, “Ane ta hintena issiba oychayis; Sambaata gallas oothanaw bessey lo77obayeye iitabayee? Shempo ashoye woyko dhayso?” yaagis.
LUK 6:10 Qassi Yesuusi iya yuushuwan de7iya asaa yuushshi xeellidi uraako, “Ne kushiya piddi ootha” yaagis. Urayka I gidaysada oothin kushey paxis.
LUK 6:11 Shin higge astamaaretinne Farsaaweti daro yilotidosona. Yesuusa bolla ay oothino gidi banta giddon maqetidosona.
LUK 6:12 He wode gallasatape issuwan Yesuusi woossanaw zuma bolla keyis. Qamma kumethi woossishe aqis.
LUK 6:13 Wontethe ba tamaareta xeegidi enta giddofe tammanne nam7ata dooridi, entana, “Hawaareta” gidi sunthis.
LUK 6:14 Entika, Phexroosa gidi sunthida Simoona, iya ishaa Indiriyasa, Yayqooba, Yohaanisa, Filphoosa, Bartelemoosa,
LUK 6:15 Maatosa, Toomasa, Ilfiyoosa na7aa Yayqooba, ba biittas mishetiya Simoona,
LUK 6:16 Yayqooba na7aa Yihudanne Yesuusa aathidi immida Asqoroota Yihuda.
LUK 6:17 Yesuusi entara issife zumaape wodhidi demba bessan eqis. Iya tamaaretape daroti he bessan de7oosona. Yihuda biitta ubbaafe Yerusalaamepe, Xiroosapenne Sidoona abba gaxape yida daro asay de7ees.
LUK 6:18 Enti yiday, I tamaarsiyaba si7anawunne banta hargiyafe paxanaasa. Tuna ayyaanan waayetiya asatika paxidosona.
LUK 6:19 Wolqi iyape keyidi asa ubbaa pathiya gisho asay iya bochanaw koyoosona.
LUK 6:20 Ba tamaareta xeellidi haysada yaagis: “Hinteno, manqoto, hinte anjetidaysata; Xoossaa kawotethay hintesa.
LUK 6:21 Hinte ha77i koshateysati anjetidaysata, hinte kallana. Hinte ha77i yeekeysati anjetidaysata hinte miicana.
LUK 6:22 Asay hintena Asa Na7aa gisho, ixiya wode, hintena hiliya wode, hintena enti toochiya wodenne, iita sunthu enti hintew immiya wode hinte anjetidaysata.
LUK 6:23 “Heko, hinte woytoy salon gita gidiya gisho he wode ufaysan gupite. Ayis giiko, beni enta aawati nabeta bolla hessada oothidosona.”
LUK 6:24 “Shin dureto hintena ayye! hinte ha77i lo77o duussaa ekideta.
LUK 6:25 Ha77i kallidaysato hintena ayye! hinte koshatana. Ha77i miiceysato hintenosho hinte kayotananne yeekana.
LUK 6:26 Asi ubbay hinte lo77otetha xalaala odiya wode hintena ayye! Enta aawati beni wordancho nabeta bolla hessada oothidosona.
LUK 6:27 “Shin tana si7iya hintew ta odayis; hinte morketa dosite; hintena ixeysatas lo77oba oothite.
LUK 6:28 Hintena baaddeyisata anjite, hintena naaqeysatas woossite.
LUK 6:29 Issi bagga shakala baqeysas hanko bagga bessa. Ne laxana ekana geysas ne shamziya gujada imma.
LUK 6:30 Nena woossiya ubbaas imma; neepe ekida oonaka zaaro gada oychofa.
LUK 6:31 Asay hintew oothana mela hinte koyaba ubbaa hinteka asaas oothite.
LUK 6:32 “Hinte, hintena dosiya asata xalaala dosiko, ay galati hintew de7ii? Hari attoshin, nagaranchotika bantana doseyisata dosoosona.
LUK 6:33 Hintew lo77oba ootheyisata xalaalas lo77oba oothiko hintew ay galati de7ii? Nagaranchotika hessada oothosona.
LUK 6:34 Tal7e zaarana asa xalaalas hinte tal7iko ay dumma galatetetii? Nagaranchotika guye zaarana asi be7idi tal7oosona.”
LUK 6:35 “Shin hinte morketa dosite; entaw lo77oba oothite. Guye ekanaw qoponna tal7ite. Hessan hinte ekana woytoy gita gidana. Hinte Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa nayta gidana. I bana galatonaysatasinne iitatas keeha.
LUK 6:36 Hinte aaway keeha gidoysada hinteka keeha gidite.
LUK 6:37 “Asa bolla pirdofite; hinte bolla pirdetenna. Hinte boretonna mela oonaka boropite. Atto giite; Xoossay hintew atto gaana.
LUK 6:38 Immite; hintew imetana. Hinte makidaban hintew zaari maketana, ubbaraka lo77o makiyaban baqidi, suuddi kunthidi, laaletana gakanaw hintew maketi imetana” yaagis.
LUK 6:39 Qassika Yesuusi yaagidi entaw leemiso odis; “Qooqey qooqe kaalethanaw danda7ii? Kaalethiko nam7ayka woli ekidi aafon wullokonayee?
LUK 6:40 Tamaarey astamaarepe aadhenna. Shin loythi tamaarida uray ba astamaariyatho hanees.
LUK 6:41 “Ne ishaa ayfen de7iya buuriya ayis be7ay? Ne ayfen de7iya tuussu daaneysa ayis be7ikii?
LUK 6:42 Ne ayfen de7iya tuussu daaneysa be7onna ne ishaako, ‘Ta ishaw, ne ayfen de7iya buuriya kesso’ gaanaw waana danda7ey? Neno cubbuwaw, koyrottada ne ayfen de7iya tuussu daaneysa kessa. Hessafe guye, ne isha ayfen de7iya buuriya kessanaw geeshshada xeellana.
LUK 6:43 “Lo77o mithi iita ayfe ayfena; hessadaka iita mithi lo77o ayfe ayfena.
LUK 6:44 Ayfe ayfiya mithi ubbay ba ayfen eretees. Agunthafe balase ayfey maxetenna qassi laadepe woyne ayfey maxetenna.
LUK 6:45 Lo77o asi ba wozanan kumida lo77obaape lo77oba kessees. Iita asi ba wozanan kumida iitabaape iitabaa kessees. Asi ba wozanan kumidi palahidabaape ba doonan odetees.
LUK 6:46 “Ta geysa ootheketa, shin yaatin ayis tana, ‘Godaw, Godaw, geetii?’
LUK 6:47 Taako yeynne ta qaala si7idi poliya ubbay oona daaniyako ta hintena bessaana.
LUK 6:48 I keethe keexanaw ziqi oothi, olla bookidi, garsan de7iya zaalla bolla keethe essida cinca ura daanees. Di7oy di77idi he keetha sugis, shin minthidi keexida gisho, qaaxanaw danda7ibeenna.
LUK 6:49 Shin ta qaala si7idi oothonay ba keetha shafe bolla keexida ura daanees. Di7oy di77idi he keethaa sugida wode ellesidi kundis. He keethay wolqaama kundethi kundis” yaagis.
LUK 7:1 Yesuusi hessa ubbaa asaa sinthan tamaarsidi ongidaape guye, Qifirnahooma katamaa bis.
LUK 7:2 He bessan issi mato halaqay de7ees. I daro dosiya aylley hargetidi hayqos gakis.
LUK 7:3 I Yesuusaba si7ida wode ba aylliya pathana mela iya woosso gidi issi issi Ayhude cimata Yesuusako kiittis.
LUK 7:4 Kiitetidaysati, Yesuusako bidi, “Ne iyaw haysa oothanaw bessees.
LUK 7:5 Ayis giiko, ha uray nu asaa dosees, ayhude woosa keethaaka keexis” gidi minthi woossidosona
LUK 7:6 Yesuusika entara bis. Mato halaqaa sooko matiya wode ba laggeta iyako kiittidi, “Godaw, ta kaarape garsan ne gelanaw ta bessonna gisho, daaburopa.
LUK 7:7 Taka tana ne sinthe shiiqanaw bessiya asi gada qopike. Shin ne issi qaala oda; ta aylley paxana.
LUK 7:8 Taw taape bollara halaqay de7ees, taape garsan ta kiittiya wotaadareti de7oosona. Issuwa, ‘Ba’ giiko bees, hankuwa, ‘Haaya’ giiko yees. Ta aylliyako, ‘Hanno ootha’ giiko oothees” yaagis.
LUK 7:9 Yesuusi hessa si7ida wode malaaletis. Guye simmidi baara yaa asaako, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; hari attoshin Isra7eelenka haysa mela gita ammano demmabike” yaagis.
LUK 7:10 Kiitetida asati soo simmiya wode aylley paxin demmidosona.
LUK 7:11 Guutha wodepe guye Yesuusi Nayne katamaa bis. Iya tamaaretaranne hara daro asati iyara bidosona.
LUK 7:12 I katamaa gelana haniya wode aha tookida daro asati katamaape keyoosona. Hayqida na7ay ba aayes issuwa, iyaka am7o gidada de7awusu. Katama asaape daroti iira de7oosona.
LUK 7:13 Goday iyo be7ida wode qadhetidi, “Yeekofa” yaagis.
LUK 7:14 Shiiqidi hala bochin tookida asati eqidosona. Yesuusi, “La, yalagaw denda” yaagis.
LUK 7:15 Hayqidaysi dendi uttidi oda oykis. Yesuusi na7aa ekidi aayes immis.
LUK 7:16 Asa ubbay yashetidi, “Gita nabey nu giddon dendis; Xoossay ba asaa be7is” yaagidi Xoossaa galatidosona.
LUK 7:17 Iya sunthay Yihudaninne he heeran de7iya biitta ubban si7etis.
LUK 7:18 Xammaqiya Yohaanisa tamaareti hessa ubbaa Yohaanisas odidosona. I enta giddofe nam7ata xeegidi,
LUK 7:19 “Yaana geetetiday neneyee? Woyko haraa naagino?” yaagidi oychite gidi Godaako kiittis.
LUK 7:20 Asati “Yesuusako bidi, Xammaqiya Yohaanisi, ‘Yaana geetetiday neneyee? Woyko haraa naagino?’ giite gidi nuna neeko kiittis” yaagidosona.
LUK 7:21 He saatenka Yesuusi daro asaa hargiyafe pathis. Tuna ayyaanata kessis, qooqida ayfiyaka xeelisis.
LUK 7:22 Yohaanisa matape kiitetidi yidaysatako, “Bidi hinte be7idaysanne si7idaysa Yohaanisas odite. Ayfe qooqeti xeelloosona, gundati birshetidi hemetoosona, baro harganchoti geeyosona, tulleti si7oosona, hayqidaysati hayqope dendoosona, manqotas Wongelay sabbaketees.
LUK 7:23 Tanan dhubetonna oonika anjetidaysa.”
LUK 7:24 Yohaanisi kiittidaysati bidaape guye Yesuusi asaas Yohaanisaba yaagidi odis: “Hinte ay be7anaw mela biitta keydetii? Carkoy qaathiya maata be7anaseyee?
LUK 7:25 Yaatin, ay be7anaw keydetii? Koyse ma7o ma7ida asaa be7anaseyee? Koyse ma7o ma7idaysatinne sa7i injetida asay kawo gadhon de7oosona.
LUK 7:26 Yaatin, ay be7anaw keydetii? Nabiya be7anaseyee? Ee, ta yaagayis: hinte be7anaw keyday nabepe aadheysa.
LUK 7:27 “ ‘Ne ogiya ne sinthan giigisiya ta kiitanchuwa neepe sinthe ta kiittana’ geetetidi xaafetiday iyassa.
LUK 7:28 Ta hintew odayis; maccasape yeletidaysata giddofe Yohaanisape aadhey baawa. Xoossaa kawotethan ubbaafe guuxeysi, I ubbaafe gita gidana” yaagis.
LUK 7:29 Hari attoshin, Yesuusa qaala si7ida qaraxa qanxiseysati ubbay Yohaanisa kushen xammaqetidi Xoossay xillo gideysa qoncisidosona.
LUK 7:30 Shin Farsaawetinne higge astamaareti Yohaanisa kushen xammaqetonna ixidi Xoossaa zoriya leqsidosona.
LUK 7:31 Yesuusi kaallidi haysada yaagis: “Hiza, ha wodiya yeletethaa aybira daaniso? Entika oona daanonna?
LUK 7:32 Giya giddon uttidi woli xeegidi, ‘Nu hintew suusul7e punnin, hinte yexeketa. Nu sabbidi zeleelin, hinte yeekeketa’ giya nayta daanosona.
LUK 7:33 Xammaqiya Yohaanisi moonnanne uyonna yin, ‘Iita ayyaanara de7ees gideta.’
LUK 7:34 Asa Na7ay mishenne uyishe yin, ‘Yarambanne ushshancho, qaraxa qanxiseysatanne nagaranchota dabbo’ gideta.
LUK 7:35 Hiza, cincatethaa tumatethay iya nayta ubbaa matan eretis” yaagis.
LUK 7:36 Issi Farsaawey Yesuusa kathi muzanaw ba soo xeegis. I Farisaawiya soo bidi gayta bolla uttis.
LUK 7:37 He kataman issi nagarancho maccasi, Yesuusi Farisaawiya son gibira bolla de7eysa si7ida wode daro al7o philqaaxe shitto ekada yasu.
LUK 7:38 Yesuusape guye baggara, iya tohuwa matan eqada yeekashe iya tohuwa ba afuthaara laakothawusu. Ba binaanara iya tohuwa quchashenne yeerashe shitto tiyasu.
LUK 7:39 Gibira giigisida Farsaawey hessa be7ida wode ba wozanan, “Haysi nabe gidiyako ha maccasiya, iya bochiyara ooneko qassi iya nagarancho gideysaka I eranashin” yaagis.
LUK 7:40 Yesuusi, “Simoona, ta new odiyabay de7ees” yaagis. I, “Astamaariyaw, taw oda” yaagis.
LUK 7:41 Yesuusi iyako, “Nam7u asati issi uraape miishe tal7idosona. Issoy ichashu xeetu bira hankoy qassi ishatamu bira tal7idosona.
LUK 7:42 Nam7ayka tal7iya cigganaw xoonetin, nam7ataska tal7iya maaris. Hiza, ha nam7atape he uraa daro dosanay new oona daani” yaagis.
LUK 7:43 Simooni, “Daro acoy maaretida uray daro dosana daanees” yaagis. Yesuusi, “Ne tuma pirdadasa” yaagis.
LUK 7:44 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi maccaseeko simmi xeellidi, Simoonako, “Hanno maccasiw be7ay? Taani ne soo gelin hari attishin, ne taw toho haathe immabaaka, shin iya ta tohuwa ba afuthan laakothada ba binaanan quchasu.
LUK 7:45 Neeni tana yeera ekabaaka, shin iya ta ne soo gelosape doomada ta tohuwa yeero aggabuku.
LUK 7:46 Neeni ta huuphiyan zayte tiyabaka, shin iya ta tohuwa shitto tiyawusu.
LUK 7:47 Iya tana daro dosida gisho, I daro nagaray atto geetetis. Guutha nagari atto geetetida uray guuthara dosees.”
LUK 7:48 Yesuusi maccaseeko, “Ne nagaray atto geetetis” yaagis.
LUK 7:49 Iyara issife gaytan uttidi miya imathati, “Nagara atto yaagey, I haysi oonee?” yaagidi banta wozanan qopidosona.
LUK 7:50 Yesuusi maccaseeko, “Ne ammanoy nena ashshis; saro ba” yaagis.
LUK 8:1 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi Xoossaa kawotethaa Wongela sabbakishe katamaaranne gutaara aadhis. He wode tammanne nam7u hawaareti iyara de7oosona.
LUK 8:2 Qassi tuna ayyaanapenne dumma dumma hargiyafe paxida issi issi maccasati iyara de7oosona. Entika, laapun tuna ayyaanati keyida Magdela Mayraamo,
LUK 8:3 Herodiisa shuuma Kuuza machiw Yohaana, Soosinaranne qassi hara daroti entana miishen maaddeysati de7oosona.
LUK 8:4 Daro asay dumma dumma katamaape iyako shiiqin leemison entaw odis.
LUK 8:5 “Issi goshshanchoy zerethi zeranaw keyis. I zerishin issi issi zerethay oge gaxan wodhidi yedhetis, salo kafoti maxidosona.
LUK 8:6 Harati shaalloy garsan de7iya biitta bolla wodhidosona. Buroo dolida mela biittan laahoy bayna gisho miccidosona.
LUK 8:7 Hara zerethay qassi aguntha giddon wodhis. Agunthaara wolla diccida gisho agunthay cuullidi bessan ashshis.
LUK 8:8 Harati lo77o biitta bolla wodhidosona. Dolida wode xeetu kushe ayfidosona.” Hessa odi ongidi, ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Si7iya haythi de7iya ubbay si7o” yaagis.
LUK 8:9 Iya tamaareti, “Ha leemisuwa birshethay aybee?” yaagidi oychidosona
LUK 8:10 I, “Xoossaa kawotethaa xuuraa erana mela hintew imetis. Shin harati be7ishe demmonna mela, si7ishe akeekona mela leemison odayis.
LUK 8:11 “Hiza, ha leemisuwa birshethay haysa: koche yaagetiday Xoossaa qaala.
LUK 8:12 Oge gaxan wodhida zerethay qaala si7eyisata. Gidoshin, enti ammanidi attonna mela Xalahey qaala enta wozanaape maxi diggees.
LUK 8:13 Shaalloy garsan de7iya biitta bolla wodhida zerethay qaala si7idi ufaysan ekeyisata. Enti ha77is ammanoosonape attishin, xaphoy bayna gisho paacey gakiya wode ellesidi kaddoosona.
LUK 8:14 Aguntha giddon zeretida zerethay qaala si7eyisata. Entika alamiya qofan, duretethaninne sa7a duussaa miikotethan cuuletidi besseysada ayfibookona.
LUK 8:15 Lo77o biittan wodhida zerethay lo77o wozanan qaala si7idi naageysatanne danda7an minnidi ayfe ayfeyisata.
LUK 8:16 “Xompe oythidi, daacho kammey woyko arsafe garsan wothey deenna. Geliya asi be7ana mela dhoqa bessan wothees.
LUK 8:17 “Hessa gisho, qonce keyonna qosetidi attiyabay, eretonna geemmidi attiyabay deenna.
LUK 8:18 “Hiza, hinte qaala waati si7iyako akeekite. De7iya ubbaas guzhetidi imetana, baynaysas hari attoshin iyaw de7iya guuthiyaka iyape eketana” yaagis.
LUK 8:19 Yesuusa aayeranne ishatara iyako yidosona. Shin asaa darotethaafe dendoysan iya demmanaw danda7ibookona.
LUK 8:20 Issi asi Yesuusako, “Ne aayeranne ne ishatara nena koyidi karen naagoosona” yaagis.
LUK 8:21 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Xoossa qaala si7idi ooson peesheysati ubbay, taw aayonne taw isha” yaagis.
LUK 8:22 Issi gallas Yesuusaranne iya tamaaretara issife wogolon gelidi, “Abbaa pinnoos” yaagis. Entika baanaw dendidosona.
LUK 8:23 Abbaa bollara enti pinnanaw bishin Yesuusi dhiskis. Qoponna mino carkoy abba bolla dendis. Haathi wogoluwan gelin wogoloy mitetethi oykiya wode ubbay babidosona.
LUK 8:24 Iya tamaareti iyako shiiqidi, “Godaw! Godaw! nu dhayos” yaagidi Yesuusa denthidosona. Yesuusi dendidi carkuwanne gotiya hanqis. Ellesidi carkoynne gotey wopu gis; sarotethi simmis.
LUK 8:25 Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Hinte ammanoy awunee?” yaagis. Entika, yayyishenne malaaletishe issoy issuwako, “Carkoynne haathay kiiteteysi, I haysi oonee” yaagidosona.
LUK 8:26 Abba pinnidi Galila baggara de7iya Gergesoone biitta gakidosona.
LUK 8:27 Yesuusi wogolope keyidi sa7an wodhishin tuna ayyaanan oyketida uray katamaape keydi iyara gahetis. Daro laythi ma7o ma7onna kallo duufon de7eesipe attishin, soo gelenna.
LUK 8:28 Yesuusa be7ida wode iya sinthan gufannidi, ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa na7aw Yesuusa neera taw aybi issifetethi de7ii? Hayyana tana ha77i un7ethofarki” yaagis.
LUK 8:29 Hessa I giday, tuna ayyaanay uraape keyana mela Yesuusi hanqida gishosa. Daro wode tuna ayyaanay iya haarida gisho santhalaataninne toho qachiya biratan qashetidi naagetees. Shin qashuwa duuthidi tuna ayyaanan laagetidi mela biitta gelis.
LUK 8:30 Yesuusi, “Ne sunthay oone” yaagidi oychis. I, daro tuna ayyaanati iya oykida gisho bana, “Leegiyona” gis.
LUK 8:31 Tuna ayyaanati bantana Si7oole kiittonna mela woossidosona.
LUK 8:32 He bessan zooze bolla miya guduntho wudey hemetees. Hini gudunthotan gelino gidi woossidosona, ika “Gelite” gis.
LUK 8:33 Tuna ayyaanati uraape keyidi gudunthotan gelidosona. Wudey deriyape duge gurguxidi abban gelis.
LUK 8:34 Henthanchoti hanidaysa be7ida wode woxi bidi, katamaninne guta ubban odidosona.
LUK 8:35 Asay hanidaba be7anaw keyidi Yesuusako yidosona. Tuna ayyaanay keyida uray ma7o ma7idi, iya wozanay simmin, Yesuusa toho matan uttidaysa demmidi yayyidosona.
LUK 8:36 Iya be7ida asay tuna ayyaanan oyketida uray waanidi paxidaako odidosona.
LUK 8:37 Gergesoone yuushon de7iya asay gita yashshi yayidi, Yesuusi banta matape baana mela woossidosona. I wogoluwan gelidi guye simmis.
LUK 8:38 Tuna ayyaanay keyida uray Yesuusara daanaw woossis.
LUK 8:39 Shin Yesuusi iyako, “Ne soo simma, Xoossay ay mela gitaba new oothidaako oda” yaagidi moyzis. Urayka Yesuusi ay mela gitaba iyaw oothidaako katama ubban markatishe bis.
LUK 8:40 Asay naagidi gam7ida gisho Yesuusi simmiya wode moki ekidosona.
LUK 8:41 Ayhude woosa keetha halaqa gidida Iyaroosa geetetiya uray ba soo yaana mela Yesuusa tohuwa bolla wodhidi woossis.
LUK 8:42 Iyaw tammanne nam7u laythi gidida macca na7i saketada hayqos gakada de7awusu. Yesuusi biya wode asay iya un7ethees.
LUK 8:43 Tammanne nam7u laythi suuthi goggishe gam7ida maccasi de7awusu. Iya baw de7iya miishiya aakimetas immada ongasu. Shin paxanaw danda7abuku.
LUK 8:44 Iya Yesuusas guye baggara shiiqada, iya afilaa macaraa bochasu, iiraka goggiya suuthay eqi aggis.
LUK 8:45 Yesuusi, “Tana bochiday oonee?” yaagis. Ubbay, “Nu bochibooko” yaagin, Phexroosi, “Astamaariyaw, daro asay kaallishininne un7ethishin be7ashe waanada, ‘Tana bochiday oonee?’ gay” yaagis.
LUK 8:46 Shin Yesuusi, “Issi asi tana bochis; ayis giiko, wolqi taape keyoysi taw eretis” yaagis.
LUK 8:47 Maccasiya, ibay qoncidaysa erida wode kokorashe yada Yesuusa tohuwa bolla kundasu. Ayis bochidaakonne waanada ellesada paxidaako asaa ubbaa sinthan markatasu.
LUK 8:48 I, “Ta naate, ne ammanoy nena pathis; saro ba” yaagis.
LUK 8:49 Yesuusi oda ongonna de7ishin, ayhude woosa keetha halaqaa, Iyaroosa soope issi asi yidi, “Iyaroosa, ne na7iya hayqasu; astamaariya mela daabursofa” yaagis.
LUK 8:50 Shin Yesuusi hessa si7idi Iyaroosako, “Babofa! Ammana, ne na7iya paxana” yaagis.
LUK 8:51 Yesuusi Iyaroosa soo gakida wode Phexroosape, Yohaanisape, Yayqoobape, na7e aawapenne aayepe attishin, hari gelana mela koybeenna.
LUK 8:52 He bessan de7iya asa ubbay na7ees mishetidi yeekishin, Yesuusi, “Yeekofite Na7iya dhiskasupe attishin, hayqabuuku” yaagis.
LUK 8:53 Asay na7iya hayqidaysa eriya gisho, iya oda leqidi miicidosona.
LUK 8:54 Shin Yesuusi na7e kushiya oykidi, “Naatte denda” yaagis.
LUK 8:55 Na7ees shempoy simmin denda eqasu. Yesuusi entako, “Iwu miyaba immite” yaagis.
LUK 8:56 Na7ee aawaranne aayera malaaletidosona. Shin Yesuusi haysa, “Oodeska odopite” yaagis.
LUK 9:1 Yesuusi tammanne nam7u hawaareta baako xeegidi, tuna ayyaanata kessana melanne harge ubbaa pathana mela wolqanne maata immis.
LUK 9:2 Xoossaa kawotethaaba markatanaadanne harganchota pathanaada kiittis.
LUK 9:3 I entako, “Xam7a gidin ogoro gidin kathi gidin miishe gidin laammidi ma7iya afila gidin oges gidi aykoka oykofite.
LUK 9:4 He katamaape hinte keyana gakanaw imathatethan hinte gelida keethan gam7ite.
LUK 9:5 Oonika hintena mokonna ixiko he katamaape keyishe entaw marka gidana mela hinte tohuwan de7iya baana pitidi keyite.”
LUK 9:6 Entika kiitetidaysada keyidi wongela odishenne dumma dumma gutatan harganchota pathishe aadhidosona.
LUK 9:7 Galila biitta haariya Herodiisi Yesuusi oothidaba ubbaa si7ida wode dagammis. Ayis giiko, issi issi asati Yohaanisi hayqope dendonna aggenna yaagosona.
LUK 9:8 Baggati, “Eeliyaasi qoncis” goosona; harati qassi, “Beni nabetape issoy hayqope dendis” yaagidi odetoosona.
LUK 9:9 Shin Herodiisi, “Taani Yohaanisa qoodhiya qanxisada wodhas. Yaatin, haysatho yaagetidi iyabaa odetey, I oonee?” yaagidi ba ayfen be7anaw koyees.
LUK 9:10 Tammanne nam7u hawaareti guye simmi yidi, enti oothidaba ubbaa Yesuusas odidosona. I entana ekidi Beetesayda katamaape gaxa efis.
LUK 9:11 Shin daro asay Yesuusa gideysa eridi iya kaallidosona. I enta moki ekidi Xoossaa kawotethaaba tamaarsis; paxanaw koyeysataka pathis.
LUK 9:12 Sa7i omarsiya wode tammanne nam7u hawaareti iyako shiiqidi, “Nu de7ey mela biitta gidiya gisho asay dumma dumma gutatanne katamata bidi, kathinne aqiya bessi koyana mela asaa moyza” yaagidosona.
LUK 9:13 Shin I, “Entaw miyaba hinte immite” yaagis. Enti, “Nuus de7ey ichashu uythinne nam7u molo gidiya gisho, ha asaas gidiya kathi nuuni bidi shammonna ixiko gidenna” yaagidosona.
LUK 9:14 He bessan ichashu mukulu gidiya addeti de7oosona. Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Ishataman ishataman shaaki shaaki asaa utisite” yaagis.
LUK 9:15 Iya tamaareti, I kiitidaysada asaa utisidosona.
LUK 9:16 I ichashu uythaanne nam7u molota ekidi, salo xeellidi, Xoossaa galatidi, menthidi asaa ubbaa gathana mela ba tamaaretas immis.
LUK 9:17 Ubbay midi kallidosona. Entafe attida tiifey tammanne nam7u gayta kumethi gidis.
LUK 9:18 Yesuusi ba xalaala woossishin, iya tamaareti iyako yidosona. I, “Asay tana oona goonna?” gidi oychis.
LUK 9:19 Enti zaaridi “Issoti issoti, ‘Xammaqiya Yohaanisa, baggati Eeliyaasa, harati qassi, beni nabetape issoy hayqope dendis’ yaagosona” yaagidosona.
LUK 9:20 I zaaridi, “Yaatin hinte tana oona geetii?” yaagis. Phexroosi, “Neeni Xoossaafe kiitetida Kiristoosa” yaagidi zaaris.
LUK 9:21 Yesuusi haysa oodeska odopite gidi minthidi odis.
LUK 9:22 Qassika Yesuusi, “Asa Na7i daro metuwa ekana. Biitta cimata, kahine halaqatanne higge astamaareta kushen aadhidi imetana. Enti iya wodhana, shin I heedzantho gallas hayqope dendana” yaagis.
LUK 9:23 Yesuusi asaa ubbaako, “Tana kaallanaw koyey oonika de7iko bana kaddo, ba masqaliya gallas gallas tookidi tana kaallo.
LUK 9:24 Ba shempiw ashshanaw koya ubbay iyo dhaysees, ba shempiw ta gisho gidi dhaysiya oonika iyo ashshees.
LUK 9:25 Asi alame ubbaa haaridi, gidoshin, ba shempiw dhaysiyaba woyko qohiyaba gidiko iya ay maaddii?
LUK 9:26 Oonika tananinne ta qaalan yeellatiko, Asa Na7i ba bonchuwara hessadaka aawa bonchuwaranne Geeshsha kiitanchota bonchuwara yaa wode iyan yeellatana.
LUK 9:27 Ta hintew tuma odayis; haysan eqidaysata giddofe Xoossaa kawotethaa be7onnashin hayqonna asati de7oosona” yaagis.
LUK 9:28 Yesuusi he oda odin, hospun gallasape guye, Phexroosa, Yayqoobanne Yohaanisa baara ekidi woossanaw zuma bolla keyis.
LUK 9:29 I woosa bolla de7ishin iya ayfe karey laametis; afilayka booxidi, awa mela phoolis.
LUK 9:30 Nam7u asati, entika Museranne Eeliyaasara bonchon qoncidi,
LUK 9:31 Yerusalaamen poletanaw de7iyaba, hessika, I ha alamiyape shaaketanaba iyara odetoosona.
LUK 9:32 Phexroosanne iyara de7eyisata dhiskoy efin, enti dhiskofe barkiya wode iya bonchuwanne iyara eqida nam7u asata be7idosona.
LUK 9:33 Asati Yesuusape shaaketidi baana hanishin, Phexroosi Yesuusako, “Godaw, nu haysan gidiko nuus ay mela lo77o! Issino new, issino Muses, issino Eeliyaasas oothidi, heedzu shaqara shaqaroos” yaagis. Shin I ay gidaako erenna.
LUK 9:34 I yaagidi odetishin shaaray yidi entana kammis. Enti he shaara giddo gelishe babidosona.
LUK 9:35 Shaara giddofe, “Ta doorida na7ay haysa iya si7ite” giya qaali si7etis.
LUK 9:36 Qaali si7etidaape guye, Yesuusi barka de7ishe bentis. He wode enti be7idaba oodeska odonna, banta wozanan oykidi si77i gidoosona.
LUK 9:37 Wontethe enti zuma bollafe wodhiya wode daro asay yidi iyara gahetidosona.
LUK 9:38 He wode asaa giddofe issi asi, “Astamaariyaw, ta issi na7aa yada be7arki.
LUK 9:39 Tuna ayyaanay qoponna oykidi waasisees; goponto yegisidi qakerethees, asatethaa qohidi un7ethidi yeddees.
LUK 9:40 Ne tamaareti kessana mela woossas, shin enti danda7ibookona” yaagidi woossis.
LUK 9:41 Yesuusi, “Ammanoy bayna geella yeletato, awude gakanaw ta hintera daane, hintena danda7anee? Ne na7aa bada haa ekaya” yaagis.
LUK 9:42 Na7aa ekidi yaa wode tuna ayyaanay sa7an holi yeggidi kokorsis. Shin Yesuusi tuna ayyaana hanqidi na7aape kessis. Na7aaka na7aa aawas immis.
LUK 9:43 Asa ubbay Xoossaa gita wolqan malaaletidosona. Enti I oothidaban malaaletishin, Yesuusi ba tamaaretako,
LUK 9:44 “Haysa ta hintew odeysa loythi si7ite; Asa Na7i morketa kushen aadhidi imetana” yaagis.
LUK 9:45 Shin I gidabay entafe geemmida gisho, akeekibokona. Hessa gisho, zaaridi oychanaw babidosona.
LUK 9:46 Yesuusa tamaareti, “Nu giddon gita gidanay oonee?” gidi palama oykidosona.
LUK 9:47 Yesuusi enta wozanaa qofaa eridi yooga na7aa ba matan essidi,
LUK 9:48 “Ha yooga na7aa ta sunthan mokiya oonika tana mokees, tana mokey tana kiittidaysa mokees, hinte ubbaafe guuxeysi, I gita gidana” yaagis.
LUK 9:49 Yohaanisi, “Godaw, issi asi ne sunthan tuna ayyaanata kessishin be7idi, I nuura gidonna gisho diggida” yaagis.
LUK 9:50 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Hintera eqetonnaysi, I hinte bagga. Hessa gisho, iya diggofite” yaagis.
LUK 9:51 Yesuusi salo biya wodey matatida gisho, Yerusalaame baanaw qanxidi dendis.
LUK 9:52 Samaare biittan de7iya issi gutaa bidi, ubbaba iyaw giigisana mela ase yaa kiittis.
LUK 9:53 Shin I bey Yerusalaame gidiya gisho, enti iya moki ekibookona.
LUK 9:54 Yesuusa tamaareti Yayqoobaranne Yohaanisara hessa be7idi, “Godaw, salope tami wodhidi enta mo gaana mela ne koyay” yaagidosona.
LUK 9:55 Shin Yesuusi guye simmi enta hanqetidi, “Hinte garsan aybi ayyaani de7iyako hinte ereketa. Asa Na7i ase ashshanaw yisipe attishin, dhaysanaasa gidenna” yaagis.
LUK 9:56 Yaape dendidi hara guta bidosona.
LUK 9:57 Enti ogera bishin, issi asi, “Ne biya soo ubba ta kaallana” yaagis.
LUK 9:58 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Workanatas olli, salo kafotas keethi de7ees, shin Asa Na7i ba huuphe shempisiya bessi baawa” yaagis.
LUK 9:59 Hankuwako, “Neeni tana kaalla” yaagis. Shin uray, “Godaw, koyrottada ta aawa moogada yaana” yaagis.
LUK 9:60 Shin Yesuusi, “Hayqidaysati hayqidaysata moogana mela entaw aggaaga; neeni bada Xoossaa kawotethaa sabbaka” yaagis.
LUK 9:61 Qassi hara asi, “Godaw, ta nena kaallana, shin koyrottada ta soo asa sarothada yaana” yaagis.
LUK 9:62 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Koxe oykidi guye xeelliya oonika Xoossa kawotethas bessenna” yaagis.
LUK 10:1 Hessafe guye, Goday hara laapun tammanne nam7u asata dooris. I baanaw qopida katamanne guta ubba sinthatidi baana mela nam7a nam7a oothidi kiittis.
LUK 10:2 Yesuusi entako, “Heko, shiiqana kathay daro shin oosanchoti guutha. Yaaniya gisho, katha goday oosanchota kiittana mela woossite.
LUK 10:3 Hiza, biite, taani hintena dorsatada suudhumeta giddo yeddana.
LUK 10:4 Hinte biya ogiyas aykoka oykofite, miishe gidin kathi gidin caamma oykofite. Oge bolla oonaka sarothofite.
LUK 10:5 Hinte geliya keethe ubbaa koyrottidi, ‘Saroy ha keethaas gido’ yaagite.
LUK 10:6 Saro dosiya asi he bessan de7iko, hinte saroy yan shempana; ixas giiko hinte saroy hintew simmana.
LUK 10:7 Oosanchos damooze bessiya gisho, hinte gelida keethan hintew shiishidaba ubbaa mishenne uyishe yan gam7ite. Issuwa soope issuwa soo yuuyopite.
LUK 10:8 Ay katamaka hinte geliya wode asay hintena mokidi, hintew shiishidaba ubbaa miite.
LUK 10:9 He kataman de7iya harganchota pathishe, ‘Xoossaa kawotethay hinteko matis’ yaagidi odite.
LUK 10:10 Shin issi katamaa geliya wode asay hintena mokonna ixiko dabaaba keyidi haysada giite:
LUK 10:11 ‘Nu tohuwa bolla de7iya hinte katamaa baana pittoos, shin Xoossaa kawotethi hinteko matatidaysa erite.’
LUK 10:12 Pirda gallasan, ha katamaape Soodome katamaas pirdi kawushe gidanaysa ta hintew odayis” yaagis.
LUK 10:13 Kaallidika, Yesuusi, “Neno Korazine, neno Beetesayda, ayye! Hintenan oosetida malaatati Xiroosaninne Sidoonan oosetidaako yan de7iya asay kayo ma7o ma7idi, bidintha bolla uttidi, beni maarotan geli agganashin.
LUK 10:14 Hessa gisho, hintefe aathidi Xiroosasinne Sidoonas Xoossa pirdi kawuyana.
LUK 10:15 Neka Qifirnahooma, salo gakanaw nena dhoqu oothanaw koyay? Ne duge Si7oole holetana” yaagis.
LUK 10:16 Qassika Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Hintena si7ey tana si7ees, hintena ekonnay tana ekenna, tana ekonnay tana kiittidaysa ekenna” yaagis.
LUK 10:17 Laapun tammanne nam7u tamaareti kiitetida bessaafe daro ufaytishe simmidosona. Yesuusako shiiqidi, “Godaw, ne sunthan tuna ayyaanatika nuus kiitetidosona” yaagidosona.
LUK 10:18 Yesuusi entako, “Xalahey salope wol7anthada wodhishin ta be7as.
LUK 10:19 Heko, shooshinne korne yedhana melanne morkiya wolqa zaarana mela maata hintew immas. Hintena qohanabay aykoyka deenna.
LUK 10:20 Gidoshin, hinte sunthay salo mazgaben xaafetida gisho, ufaytitepe attishin, tuna ayyaanati kiitetida gisho ufaytofite” yaagis.
LUK 10:21 He wode, Yesuusi Geeshsha Ayyaanan ufaytidi, “Saluwa sa7aa Godaw, haysa cincatapenne eranchotape genthada yalagatas qoncisida gisho galateta. Ee, ta aawaw, hessa ne oothanaw lo77o shene gidis.
LUK 10:22 “Ubbabay ta aawape taw imetis. Na7ay ooneko aawape attishin, hari woyko na7ay qoncisanaw koyeysafe hari oonika aawa erey baawa” yaagis.
LUK 10:23 Kaallidika, Yesuusi ba tamaaretas dumma, “Hinte be7eysa be7eysati anjetidaysata.
LUK 10:24 Tuma daro nabetinne kawoti hinte be7eysanne si7eysa be7anawunne si7anaw amotidosona, shin be7ibookona, si7ibookona” yaagis.
LUK 10:25 Heko, issi gallas Muse woga eriya issi uray dendidi Yesuusa yaagidi paace oysho oychis. “Astamaariyaw, merina de7o laattanaw taani ay ootho?” yaagis.
LUK 10:26 Yesuusi, “Muse maxaafan xaafetidaysi woygii? Ne waata nabbabay?” yaagis.
LUK 10:27 Addey zaaridi, “ ‘Ne Godaa ne Xoossaa, ne kumetha wozanape, ne kumetha shempofe, ne kumetha wolqaafenne ne kumetha qofaape dosa. Qassi ne shooruwa ne huupheda dosa’ yaagees” yaagis.
LUK 10:28 Yesuusi iyako, “Neeni like zaaradasa, neka hessada ootha. Neeni merinaw de7on daana” yaagis.
LUK 10:29 Shin uray bana xillo oothanaw koyidi, “I ta shooroy oonee?” yaagis.
LUK 10:30 Iya oyshaas Yesuusi yaagidi zaaro immis; “Issi ase de7eysi Yerusalaame katamape duge Iyaarko katama bishin, oge bolla pangati keyidi shocidosona. Iya ma7uwa qaari ekidi hayqopenne paxape giddon yeggidi bidosona.
LUK 10:31 Guyepe, Ayhude kahine issoy he ogiyara ba buussu bishe uraa be7idi deshshi gidi aadhis.
LUK 10:32 Qassi issi Leewe de7eysi he bessaa gakishe uraa be7idi, hara soora aadhidi bis.
LUK 10:33 Shin, issi Samaare biitta ase de7eysi he ogiyara yishe uraa be7idi iyaw qadhetis
LUK 10:34 Iyako shiiqidi, iya maduntha bolla zaytenne woyne tigidi qachis. Ba hariya bolla utisidi imathi aqiya keethe efis. He bessan iyaw koshshiyaba ubbaa oothis.
LUK 10:35 Wontethe nam7u dinaare kessidi imatha keetha aawas immidi, ‘Hayyana ha uraa loytha xeella. Taani new immidaysafe bollara ne kessiyaba ubbaa ta new ciggana’ yaagis.
LUK 10:36 “Hiza, ha heedzu asatape pangati shocida uraas shoorotey new oona daanii?”
LUK 10:37 Uray zaaridi, “Iyaw qadhetidaysaka” yaagis. Yesuusi, “Neka bada hessada ootha” yaagis.
LUK 10:38 Yesuusi ba tamaaretara oge bishe issi guta gakis. Yan Marta geetetiya issi maccasiya, iya ba son mokasu.
LUK 10:39 Iwuka Mayraamo geetetiya michiya de7awusu, Mayraama qaala si7ashe Godaa tohuwa matan uttasu.
LUK 10:40 Shin Marta daro ooson un7etada Yesuusako shiiqada, “Godaw, ta michiya oosuwa ta xalaalas yeggada utta aggin ta daaburiya wode neeni be7ashe si77i gay? Iya tana maaddana mela odikii” yaagasu.
LUK 10:41 Shin Goday zaaridi, “Marta, Marta, neeni daroban un7etasaanne metootasa.
LUK 10:42 Gidoshin, koyetey issiba xalaala. Mayraama lo77oba doorasu, hessika iipe eketenna” yaagis.
LUK 11:1 Issi gallas Yesuusi issi bessan woossees. Woosaa wursida wode iya tamaaretape issoy, “Godaw, Yohaanisi ba tamaareta woosa tamaarsida mela neka nuna woosa tamaarsa” yaagis.
LUK 11:2 Yesuusi, “Haysada yaagidi woossite: “ ‘Salon de7iya nu aawaw ne geeshsha sunthay anjeto; ne kawotethay yo.
LUK 11:3 Nu gallasa kathaa hachi hachi nuus imma.
LUK 11:4 Nuna qoheyisata nuuni atto geysada, nu nagara atto ga; paacen nuna gelsofa’ yaagite” yaagis.
LUK 11:5 Kaallidika, Yesuusi ba tamaaretako yaagis: “Leemisos hintefe issuwas laggey de7ees. I giddi bilahe ba laggiya soo bidi, ‘Ta laggiyaw, miyabay de7iko taw immarki.
LUK 11:6 Taw lagge gidida issi asi ogepe yin, iyaw aathiyaba dhayas’ yaagiko,
LUK 11:7 “Iya laggey keetha giddon gididi, ‘Hayyana tana waaysopa, pengey gordetis. Ta naytika taara arsa bolla zin7idosona. Yaaniya gisho, dendada ne koyaba immanaw danda7ike’ yaagiyee?
LUK 11:8 Ta hintew odayis; laggetetha gisho dendidi immanaw koyonna ixikoka woosan salethida gisho, dendidi koshshiyaba ubba immees.
LUK 11:9 “Hessa gisho, taani hintew odayis; woossite hintew imetana; koyite hinte demmana; kare yidi xeegite hintew dooyetana.
LUK 11:10 Gaasoyka, woossiya ubbay ekees; koyey demmees; kare yidi xeegeysas dooyetees.
LUK 11:11 “Hinteno, aawato hinte giddofe na7i uythi woossin, shuchu immey oonee? Molo woossin shooshi immey oonee?
LUK 11:12 Woyko phuuphulle woossiko korne immii?
LUK 11:13 Hinte iitata gidishe hinte naytas lo77oba immo eriko, salon de7iya hinte aaway woosseysatas Geeshsha Ayyaana waatidi aathidi immennee?” yaagis.
LUK 11:14 Issi gallas Yesuusi, doona muumisida tuna ayyaana issi uraape kessis. Tuna ayyaanay keyida mela muume uray odetis. Asayka malaaletis.
LUK 11:15 Shin issoti issoti, “Tuna ayyaana halaqa, Bi7eel-Zebuula wolqan tuna ayyaanata kessees” yaagidosona.
LUK 11:16 Harati qassi paacees salope malla bessaana mela koydosona.
LUK 11:17 Shin Yesuusi enta qofaa eridi entako, “Woli giddon shaaketiya kawotethi ubbay dhayees; woli giddon shaaketiya keethi kundees.
LUK 11:18 Xalahey woli giddon shaaketiko iya kawotethay waanidi minnidi eqanee? Hinte tana, ‘I tuna ayyaanata Bi7eel-Zebuula wolqan kessees’ yaageeta.
LUK 11:19 Hiza, taani tuna ayyaana Bi7eel-Zebuula wolqan kessiyaba gidiko hinte nayti oodde wolqan kessonaasha? Hessa gisho, enti hinte bolla pirdeyisata gidana.
LUK 11:20 Shin taani tuna ayyaanata Xoossa biradhen kessiyaba gidiko, hiza, Xoossaa kawotethay hinteko matidaysa erite.
LUK 11:21 “Mino asi tooranne gondalle oykidi, ba keetha naagiyaba gidiko, iya shaloy boshetenna.
LUK 11:22 Hanoshin, iyape aadhidi mino gidida asi yidi, iya qohidi xooniko, ammanetida tooranne gondalle wosisi ekidi, iya shaluwa bonqidi haras shaakees.
LUK 11:23 “Taara gidonaysi tana ixees; taara shiishonnaysi laallees.
LUK 11:24 “Tuna ayyaanay asape keyda wode shempiya bessi koydi haathi bayna soora yuuyees. Shempiya bessi dhayda wode, ‘Ta keydasuwa simmana’ yaagees.
LUK 11:25 I simmiya wode keethay pitetidi lo77idi de7ishin demmis.
LUK 11:26 Hessafe guye, bidi iyape aadhidi iitida hara laapun tuna ayyaanata ekidi yees. Iyan gelidi duussu oykees. He uraas koyroysafe aadhidi guyeysi iita gidees” yaagis.
LUK 11:27 Yesuusi hessa oda bolla de7ishin, issi maccasi asaa gaathafe dendada, ba qaala dhoqu oothada, “Nena tookida uloynne neeni dhammida dhanthati anjetidosona” yaagasu.
LUK 11:28 Shin I, “Anjetidaysati Xoossaa qaala si7idi kiiteteyisata” yaagis.
LUK 11:29 Daro asay shiiqida wode Yesuusi, “Ha yeletethay iita yeletethi; ooratha malla koyees. Shin Yoonasa malaatape attishin, hari entaw imetenna.
LUK 11:30 Yoonasi Nanawe asaas malla gidida mela Asa Na7ika ha yeletethaas malla gidana.
LUK 11:31 Dugeha kawiya pirda gallas ha yeletethaara dendada pirdana. Gaasoyka, iya Solomone cincatethaa si7anaw biitta gaxape dendada yasu. Heko Solomonepe aadhey haysan de7ees
LUK 11:32 Nanawe asati pirda gallas ha yeletethaara dendidi enta bolla pirdana. Gaasoyka, Yoonasa sibkatiyan maarota gelidosona. Heko, Yoonasape aadhey haysan de7ees” yaagis.
LUK 11:33 “Xompe oythidi qosa bessan woyko oto giddon wothiya asi deenna. Asi poo7uwa be7ana mela dhoqa bessan wothees.
LUK 11:34 Ne asatethaas poo7oy ne ayfiya. Ne ayfey lo77o gidiko, ne kumetha asatethay poo7ees. Nena ayfey sakiko ne asatethay ubbay dhumees.
LUK 11:35 Hessa gisho, ne garsan de7iya poo7oy dhumonna mela naageta.
LUK 11:36 Hiza, ne kumetha asatethay poo7o gidiko, ne asatethanka hari dhuma bessi dhayiko, ne asatethaa kumethay wolile poo7o mela gidees” yaagis.
LUK 11:37 Yesuusi ba oda ongida mela issi Farsaawey baara kathi maana mela xeegis. Yesuusi, iyara issife gelidi gibira bolla uttis.
LUK 11:38 Farsaawey Yesuusi kathi maanape sinthe kushe meecconaysa be7idi malaaletis.
LUK 11:39 Goday iyako, “Hinte Farsaaweti quulesinne shaates bolla bagga meeceta. Shin hinte gaathay uuzetethaninne iitatethan kumis.
LUK 11:40 Hinteno, eeyato, kare bagga medhiday, gaatha bagga medhiday iya gidennee?
LUK 11:41 Shin quuliyaninne shaatiyan de7eysa manqotas immite. He wode hintew ubbabay geeshshi gidana.
LUK 11:42 “Farsaaweto hintena ayye! Sawope, xalootepenne hessa melabaape asraata kesseeta. Shin xillotethinne Xoosse dosoy hintenan baawa. Harata aggonna haysataka oothanaw bessees, shin aggideta.
LUK 11:43 “Farsaaweto hintena ayye! Ayhude woosa keethan boncho oyde, giya giddon boncho sarotho doseeta.
LUK 11:44 “Mali dhayin, asay eronna bollara biya duufo daaneysato hintena ayye!” yaagis.
LUK 11:45 Higge astamaarey zaaridi, “Astamaariyaw, ne hessa gashe nuna cayaasa” yaagis.
LUK 11:46 Yesuusi, “Hinteno, higge astamaareto, hintenaka ayye! Asay tookanaw danda7onna deexo tooho toosseta, shin hinte hinte huuphes hari attoshin biradhe xeeranka bocheketa.
LUK 11:47 “Hinte aawati wodhida nabeta duufuwa hinte giigisiya gisho, hintena ayye!
LUK 11:48 Hiza, hinte aawata oosuwa minthanaw enti wodhida nabeta duufuwa hinte loythiya gisho, enta iita oosuwas hinte marka.
LUK 11:49 Hessa gisho, Xoossay ba cincatethan, ‘Nabetanne hawaareta ta hintew kiittana, shin hinte baggata wodhana; harata gooddana’ yaagis.
LUK 11:50 Ha yeletethay alamey medhetoosape hanno gakanaw gukida nabeta ubbaa suuthas oyshetana.
LUK 11:51 Aabelape doomidi yarsho bessaasinne xoossa keethafe gidduwan gukida Zakaryaasa suutha gisho ha yeletethay oyshetana.
LUK 11:52 “Higge astamaareto, hintena ayye! Eratetha qulpiya hinte kushen oykideta, shin hintew geleketa harataka gelseketa” yaagis.
LUK 11:53 Yesuusi yaape baanaw keyiya wode, higge astamaaretinne Farsaaweti iyara eqetidi oyshon waaysosona.
LUK 11:54 Iya doonape keyiya qaalan iya oykanaw koydi hessa oothidosona.
LUK 12:1 He wode daro mukulun taybetiya asay woli bolla yedhetana gakanaw asi asa bolla shiiqidi de7ishin, Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Farsaaweta irshofe naagetite. Hessika enta cubbotethaa.
LUK 12:2 Qonconna qosetidi, eretonna geemmidi attiyabay aykoyka baawa.
LUK 12:3 Hiza, hinte dhuman odetidabay ubbay poo7on si7etana, qol7a gaathan kalkashidabay dabaaban odetana.
LUK 12:4 “Ta baggato, ta odeysa si7ite; ashuwa wodhoosonape attishin, haraa aykoka oothanaw danda7onaysatas babofite.
LUK 12:5 Hanoshin, hinte babanaw besseysa ta hintew qoncisana. Hessika wodhidaape guye Gaannamen yegganaw wolqay de7eysas iyaw babite. Ee, tuma odayis; iyaw babite.
LUK 12:6 Ichashu buubeti issi santimes bayzetokonayee? Hanoshin, entafe issinnaka Xoossaa sinthan dogetuku.
LUK 12:7 Hari attoshin, hinte huuphe binaanayka paydetidi de7ees. Hiza, babofite; daro buubetape hinte aadheta.
LUK 12:8 “Ta odeysa si7ite; asa sinthan taw markatiya ubbaas Asa Na7i Xoossa kiitanchota sinthan markatana.
LUK 12:9 Asa sinthan tana kaddeysas Xoossa kiitanchota sinthan ta iya kaddana.
LUK 12:10 Asa Na7a bolla kadhe qaala haasaya ubbay maarota demmana, shin Geeshsha Ayyaana bolla kadhe qaala odeteysi maaretenna.
LUK 12:11 “Asi hintena oykidi ayhude woosa keethan, daynnata sinthaninne kawota sinthan gooshechiya wode ay odanekonne woygi zaaraneko hirgofite.
LUK 12:12 He wode hinte odanaba Geeshsha Ayyaani hintena tamaarsana” yaagis.
LUK 12:13 Asaa giddofe issi asi Yesuusako yidi, “Ta ishay taw nu aawa laatape shaakana mela iyaw oda” yaagis.
LUK 12:14 Yesuusi zaaridi, “La addiyaw, hinte bolla tana daynnanne laata shaakiya cima oothiday oonee?” yaagis.
LUK 12:15 Gujidika, Yesuusi, “Asa de7oy shalo darotethan gidonna gisho yaare aggidi minthidi hintena naagite” yaagis.
LUK 12:16 Kaallidika leemison, “Gadey daro kathi immiya issi dure uray de7ees.
LUK 12:17 He uray, ‘Ta katha taani shiishanaw bessi guuxida gisho ay ootho?’ yaagidi ba wozanan qopis.
LUK 12:18 Hizape yaatana; kase de7iya shaaleta laallada haraa dalga shaaleta keexana. Kathinne taw de7iyaba ubbaa iyan yeggana.
LUK 12:19 Ba shempeko, ‘Ta shempete, daro laythas new gidiya shalo shiishas. Hiza, shempada ma, uya, ufayta’ yaagana.
LUK 12:20 “Shin Xoossay, ‘La, eeya uraw, hachi qamma ne shempiya neepe eketawusu. Hiza, ne shiishidabay ooddes gidanee?’ yaagis.
LUK 12:21 “Hessa gisho, baw duretethi sa7an shiishiya asas, Xoossaa matan dure gidonna asaas wursethay ha ura mela” yaagis.
LUK 12:22 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Hiza, ta odiyaba si7ite, hinte shempuwas ay miino? Hinte asatethaas ay ma7ino? yaagidi un7etofite.
LUK 12:23 Shempoy kathafe, asatethi afilape aadhees.
LUK 12:24 Kafota be7ite zerokona, kiishokona, eleynne shaaley entaw baawa. Shin Xoossay entana muzees. Hinte kafotape daro aadheta.
LUK 12:25 Hanoshin, hintefe un7etidi ba laytha bolla issi qamma gujanaw danda7ey oonee?
LUK 12:26 Hiza, ha guuthaba oothanaw danda7onna hinte, harabas ayis un7etetii?
LUK 12:27 Ane ciishshati waanidi dicciyako be7ite. Waayokonanne suqokona. Hari attoshin, Solomoney ba de7iya boncho ubban entafe issuwa melaka ma7ibeenna.
LUK 12:28 Hinteno, ammanoy pacidaysato, hiza, Xoossay hachi bentidi wonto taman yegetana ciishshata haysada mayziko, hintena waati aathidi mayzennee?
LUK 12:29 Hessa gisho, ay mino woyko ay uyino gidi un7etofite.
LUK 12:30 He ubbaas Xoossaa ammanonna asati un7etoosona. Shin hinte aaway Xoossay hessi ubbay hintew koshsheysa erees.
LUK 12:31 Ubbaafe aathidi Xoossa kawotetha koyite; hessi ubbay hintew guji imetana.
LUK 12:32 “Hinteno, guutha dereto, yayyofite; hinte aawa Xoossay kawotetha hintew immanaw ufaytees.
LUK 12:33 Hintew de7iyaba bayzidi manqotas immite. Kaysoy ekonnason, bili moonnason, cimonna karxiitan, wuronna shalo salon shiishite.
LUK 12:34 Hinte wozanay hinte shaloy de7iya bessan gidana.
LUK 12:35 “Qanthan dancidi giigetite; hinte xompey poo7o.
LUK 12:36 Banta goday yaaganope simmana gakanaw barkidi naageysatada, goday yidi xeegiya wode ellesidi dooyanaw giigida asata daanite.
LUK 12:37 Banta goday simmiya wode dhiskonna de7ishe naageysati anjetidaysata. Tuma gayis; goday qanthan dancidi gayta yuushon utisidi mokees.
LUK 12:38 Goday laade gidin, giddi bilahe gidin, woyko wonti maathe gidin yidi, hessa mela dhiskona naagishin demmiya he aylleti anjetidaysata.
LUK 12:39 Shin haysa erite; kaysoy awude yaaneko keetha aaway eriyako keethay boketiya wode si77i gidi be7enna.
LUK 12:40 Hinteka giigidi naagite; Asa Na7i hinte qoponna wode yaana” yaagis.
LUK 12:41 Phexroosika, “Godaw ha leemisuwa nu xalaalas odaye woyko asa ubbaasee?” yaagis.
LUK 12:42 Goday zaaridi, “Hiza, kathaa muzanaw bessiya wodiyan immana mela goday ba aylleta bolla shuumida ammantheysinne wozanaama halaqay oonee?
LUK 12:43 Goday simmiya wode hessa mela oothishe bentiya aylley, I anjetidaysa
LUK 12:44 Ta hintew tuma odayis; ba godaas de7iya shalo ubbaa bolla I, shuumetana.
LUK 12:45 Shin he aylley, ‘Ta goday elle yeenna’ yaagidi ba wozanan qopidi, macca aylletanne adde aylleta wadhiko, qassi baw koyda mela mishenne uyishe mathotiko,
LUK 12:46 he aylliya goday, I qoponna gallasaninne hirgonna wode yaana. Yidi iya qanxerethidi, iya qaada ammanonna asaara oothana.
LUK 12:47 “Godaa sheniyada giigonnaysinne iya goday ay dosiyako erishe oothonna aylley daro garaafetana.
LUK 12:48 Shin ba godaa sheniya eronna attidi garaafetanaw besseysa oothiday guuthara garaafetana. Gaasoyka daro imetidaysafe daro koyetees, daro hadara ekidaysafeka daro immana gidi naagetees.
LUK 12:49 “Taani yiday biitta bolla tama oythanaasa. Ha77i tamay oykiyako tana waanidi ufaysandesha!
LUK 12:50 Hanoshin, ta ha77i xammaqetey xinqatey de7ees. I poletana gakanaw ta daro un7etayis.
LUK 12:51 Sa7a bolla sarotethi ehanaw yida hintew daanii? Gidenna, ta yiday shaakanaasa.
LUK 12:52 Ha77ife doomidi woli giddon shaaketida ichashu keethaa asati issife de7oosona. Nam7ati heedzata bolla, heedzatika nam7ata bolla, dendidi shaaketoosona.
LUK 12:53 Aaway na7aa bolla, na7ayka aawa bolla, aayiya na7e bolla, na7iya aaye bolla, azinaa aayiya na7a mache bolla, na7a machiya azina aaye bolla, dendidi shaaketana.”
LUK 12:54 Qassika asaako, “Wuloha baggara saloy shaaratiya wode be7idi, ellesidi, ‘Iri yaana’ yaageeta, hessadaka hanees.
LUK 12:55 Dugeha carkoy carkiya wode ‘Sa7i awana’ yaageeta, hessadaka hanees” yaagis.
LUK 12:56 Hinteno, cubboto, Salobanne sa7aba shaakidi ereetashin ha wodiya shaakidi eroy hintena waanidi xoonidee?
LUK 12:57 “Yaatin, hinte huuphes ayis tuma pirdeketii?
LUK 12:58 Ne morkiyara wolla daynna sinthan eqanaw bashe oge bolla giiganaw koya. Ne giigonna ixiko gooshechidi daynna sinthe nena efana. Daynnay nena qachiya asas aathidi immana. I nena woynen yeggana.
LUK 12:59 Si7ite, issi bakani attonna cigga ongana gakanaw ne yaape keyonnaysa era” yaagis.
LUK 13:1 He wode Yesuusako asay yidi Philaxoosi wodhidi enta suuthara enta yarshuwa walakida Galila asaaba odida asati he bessan de7oosona.
LUK 13:2 I haysada yaagidi zaaris; “Yaatin he Galila asati he iita hayqo hayqida gisho, Galilan de7iya asa ubbaafe aadhida nagarancho daanonna?
LUK 13:3 Gidenna! Gidoshin, hinteka maarotan simmonna ixiko, ubbay hessada dhayana.
LUK 13:4 Woyko qassi Salihoome geetetiya bessan gimbey woddidi wodhida tammanne hospun asay Yerusalaamen de7iya asa ubbaafe aadhida nagarancho daanonna?
LUK 13:5 Gidenna! Shin hinteka maarotan simmonna ixiko ubbay hessada dhayana.”
LUK 13:6 Qassika Yesuusi haysada gidi leemiso odis: “Issi uraas woyne gaden toketida balase mithi de7awusu. I iipe ayfe demmanaw koydi aykoka demmibeenna.
LUK 13:7 Woyne gadiya goday woyne oosanchuwako, ‘Ayfe demmanaw koyada heedzu laythi simeretada aykoka demmabike. Hessa gisho, qanxa digga; ayis biitta melisay?’ yaagis.
LUK 13:8 “Shin oosanchoy, ‘Godaw, I yuushuwa oothada osha yeggana gakanaw ha laythas aggarki.
LUK 13:9 Ha laythi ayfiko lo77o, ixiko qanxa agga’ ” yaagidi zaaris.
LUK 13:10 Yesuusi Sambaata gallas ayhude woosa keethan tamaarsees.
LUK 13:11 He bessan tammanne hospun laythi tuna ayyaani zoko kuunisida issi maccasiya de7awusu. Iya kuunape dendoysan suure eqanaw danda7uku.
LUK 13:12 Yesuusi iyo be7ida wode xeegidi, “Ha maccasete, ne hargiyafe paxadasa” yaagis.
LUK 13:13 Ba kushiya I bolla wothin, iya ellesada, suurada eqasu. Xoosse galatasu.
LUK 13:14 Shin ayhude woosa keetha halaqay yilotidi asaako, “Ooso oothiya usupun gallasati de7oosona. Hessa gisho, he gallasatan yidi paxitepe attishin, Sambaata gallas gidenna” yaagis.
LUK 13:15 Goday, “Cubboto, hinte giddofe boori woyko hare Sambaata gallas zadalope billidi haathe ushshanaw efonnay oonee?
LUK 13:16 Yaatin, ha maccasiya Abrahaame na7a gidashe xalahen qashetada tammanne hospun laythi kumethi de7idaaris Sambaata gallas birshetethi koshshennee?” yaagidi oychis.
LUK 13:17 I hessa odida wode eqeteysati ubbay yeellatidosona. Shin asa ubbay I oothida malaalsiya ooso ubban ufaytidosona.
LUK 13:18 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi haysada yaagis, “Xoossa kawotethi ay daanii? Iya aybira daaniso?
LUK 13:19 Xoossa kawotethi issi asi ba goshshan tokida wola ayfe mela. I diccidi mithi gidis. Salo kafoti iya tashiya bolla shempidosona.”
LUK 13:20 Qassi, “Xoossaa kawotetha aybira daaniso?
LUK 13:21 Issi maccasiya daro dhiillera walakada munuqida guutha irsho daanees” yaagis.
LUK 13:22 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi Yerusalaame bishe I kanthiya ogiyan de7iya katamataninne gutatan tamaarsishe aadhis.
LUK 13:23 Issi asi Yesuusako, “Godaw, attanay guutha asa xalaalee?” yaagidi oychis. Yesuusi entako,
LUK 13:24 “Si7ite, xuuntha wulara gelanaw baaxetite. Daroti gelanaw koyoosona shin entaw hanenna.
LUK 13:25 Keetha aaway dendidi wulaa gordidaape guye, ‘Nuus dooyarki’ yaagishe karen eqidi xeessi oyketa. Shin I, ‘Hinte oonekonne awupe yidaako ta erike’ gidi zaarana.
LUK 13:26 He wode hinte, ‘Neera wolla mida, uyida, nu dabaabanka tamaarsadasa’ yaagana.
LUK 13:27 “I zaaridi, ‘Hinte oonekonne awupe yidaako erike. Hinteno, geellato taape haakite’ yaagana.
LUK 13:28 Abrahaame, Yisaaqa, Yayqoobanne nabeta ubbaa Xoossa kawotethan be7ana, shin hinte karen wodhidi attiya wode hintew yeehonne ache garcethi gidana.
LUK 13:29 Asay dolohape, wulohape, pudehapenne dugehape yidi Xoossaa kawotethan gibira bolla uttana.
LUK 13:30 Hessa gisho, ha77i dethan guye gididaysatape sinthe gidanaysati, sinthe gididaysatape guye gidanaysati de7oosona” yaagis.
LUK 13:31 He wode Farsaawetape issoti issoti yidi, “Herodiisi nena wodhanaw koyiya gisho ha bessaafe dendada ba” gidoosona.
LUK 13:32 I zaaridi, “Bidi, he workanaas, ‘Heko, hachinne wonto tuna ayyaanata kessana, harganchota pathana, heedzantho gallasan kuushsha bolla gakana’ yaagis giite.
LUK 13:33 Hanope attishin, nabey Yerusalaamepe karen hayqanaw bessenna. Hessa gisho, hachi, wontonne wonti pee7in he bessa baanaw dendas.
LUK 13:34 “Yerusalaame, Yerusalaame, nabeta wodhiyare, neeko kiitetidaysata shuchan caddiyare, kuttoy ba nayta ba qefiyape garsan shiishiyada ne nayta ta qesiyape garsan aapun toho shiishanaw koyadina, shin hinte ixas gideta.
LUK 13:35 Ta hintew odayis; hinte keethay kaysatana. Godaa sunthan yeysi anjetidaysa hinte gaana gakanaw tana demmeketa” yaagis.
LUK 14:1 Issi Sambaata gallas Yesuusi issi Farsaaweta halaqa soo kathi maanaw geliya wode asay caddi xeelloosona.
LUK 14:2 He bessan shawuhe hargen waayetiya issi asi iyaw sintha baggara zin7is.
LUK 14:3 Yesuusi Farsaawetanne higge astamaareta, “Sambaata gallas hargancho pasoy wogeye woga gidennee?” yaagidi oychis.
LUK 14:4 Enti si77i gidoosona. Yesuusi hargetiya uraa bochi pathidi moyzis.
LUK 14:5 “Qassika hintefe issuwas na7i woyko boori Sambaata gallas aafon wulliko, ellesidi kessonnay oonee?” yaagidi oychis.
LUK 14:6 Enti issibaaka zaaranaw danda7ibookona.
LUK 14:7 Yesuusi imatuwas xeegetidaysati boncho bessi doorishin be7idi, ha leemisuwa odis:
LUK 14:8 “Issi asi nena yaagano xeegiko boncho bessan uttofa. Neepe aadhidi bonchetiya asi xeegetanaw danda7ees.
LUK 14:9 Hintena nam7ataka xeegidaysi yidi, ‘Ne bessa ha imathas yedda’ giya wode neeni yeellatashe ziqa bessi wodhaasa.
LUK 14:10 Gidoshin, ne xeegetida wode koyrottada ziqa bessi be7ada utta. Xeegoysi yidi, ‘Ta laggiyaw, ha boncho bessan utta’ yaagana. He wode neera issife xeegetida asa ubbaa sinthan ne bonchetana.
LUK 14:11 Bana dhoqu dhoqu oothiya ubbay kawuyana; bana ziqi ziqi oothiya ubbay dhoqu dhoqu gaana.”
LUK 14:12 Qassi Yesuusi iya mokida keetha aawako, “Quma woyko kaho imato xeegiya wode, neeni kushe zaaro xeegonna mela ne laggeta woyko ne ishata woyko ne dabbota woyko ne dure shoorota imato xeegopa.
LUK 14:13 Gidoshin, ne imato giigisida wode manqota, wobbeta, gundatanne qooqeta xeega; neeni anjetana.
LUK 14:14 Haysati kushe zaaranaw danda7onna gisho kushe zaaroy geeshshata dendo gallasan new simmana” yaagis.
LUK 14:15 Yesuusara wolla imato bolla uttoyisata giddofe issoy, hessa si7idi, “Xoossa kawotethan imato bolla utteysi anjetidaysa” yaagis.
LUK 14:16 Yesuusi, “Issi asi gita imato giigisidi daro asata xeegis.
LUK 14:17 Imatoy moketiya saatey gakiya wode, xeegetida imathata, ‘Heko ubbabay giigis, haa yiite’ yaagidi xeeganaada ba aylliya kiittis.
LUK 14:18 “Shin ubbayka banta gaaso gaaso medhidosona. Issoy, ‘Ha77i buroo gade shammida gisho, bada be7anaw koshshees; hayyana tana aggarki yaaga’ yaagis.
LUK 14:19 Hankoy, ‘Ichashu waatha boori shammas; entana waaxa be7ana gisho hayyana tana lancofa’ yaagis.
LUK 14:20 Qassi haray, ‘Taani buroo meddan de7iya gisho, yaanaw danda7ike’ yaagis.
LUK 14:21 “Aylley simmi yidi he ubbaa ba godaas odis. He wode yaagano aaway hanqetidi aylliyako, ‘Ellesada kataman de7iya wogga ogetanne daggalata bada, manqota, wobbeta, qooqetanne gundata haa eha’ yaagis.
LUK 14:22 “Aylley, ‘Ta godaw, ne kiittidaysi ubbay poletis, shin ha77ika bessi de7ees’ yaagis.
LUK 14:23 “Goday aylliyako, ‘Horogata bollanne, gade giddo ogeta keya, ta keethay kumana gakanaw demmida ubba yaana mela ootha.
LUK 14:24 Ta hintew odayis; imato xeegetidaysatape oonika ta gibiraape moonnaysa erite’ gis” yaagis.
LUK 14:25 Daro asay iyara wolla bishin, Yesuusi entako guye simmidi,
LUK 14:26 “Taako yaa ubbay ba aawanne ba aayiw, ba machiwnne ba nayta, ba ishatanne ba micheta, hari attoshin ba de7uwa ixonnay ta tamaare gidanaw danda7enna.
LUK 14:27 Ba masqaliya tookidi tana kaallonnay ta tamaare gidanaw danda7enna.
LUK 14:28 “Hintefe issi asi shucha keethi keexanaw koyko, keetha keexidi onganaw ay mela miishe koshshiyako koyrottidi eranaw qopi be7onnay oonee?
LUK 14:29 Hessa gidonna ixiko, ha uray baaso shuchu hiixin qustethi xooniko,
LUK 14:30 be7iya ubbay, ‘Ha uray gimbethi oykin qustanaw iya xoonis’ yaagidi boroosona.
LUK 14:31 “Woyko issi kawoy hara kawora oletanaw dendishe laatamu mukulu olanchota eki yaa kawuwara tammu mukulu olanchotara eqetanaw danda7anaysanne danda7onaysa uttidi zorettonay oonee?
LUK 14:32 Eqetanaw danda7etonaba gidiko, he kawuwara haahon de7ishin giiganaw koyrottidi cima yeddidi oychees.
LUK 14:33 Hessadaka, hintefe oonika baw de7iyaba ubba aggonna ixiko, ta tamaare gidanaw danda7enna.
LUK 14:34 “Maxiney lo77o, shin maxiney ba mal7uwa aggiko, waanidi maxine geetetanaw danda7ii?
LUK 14:35 Biittatethasinne araddatethas maaddona gisho wora yegetees. Hiza, si7iya haythi de7iya asi si7o” yaagis.
LUK 15:1 Issi gallas qaraxa qanxeysatinne nagaranchoti Yesuusa timirtiya si7anaw iya yuushon shiiqidosona.
LUK 15:2 Shin Farsaawetinne higge astamaareti, “Haysi uray nagaranchota shiishidi ekees, entara issife mees” yaagidi zuuzumidosona.
LUK 15:3 Yesuusi ha leemisuwa entaw yaagidi odis:
LUK 15:4 “Hinte giddofe issuwas xeetu dorsati de7iyaba gidiko entafe issoy dhayiko uddufun tammanne uddufunata bazzon aggidi dhayoysa demmana gakanaw koyonnay oonee?
LUK 15:5 Demmida wode ufaytidi ba gannan tookidi,
LUK 15:6 ba soo simmees. Ba laggetanne shoorota xeegidi, ‘Dhayida ta dorsa demmas, taara issife ufaytite’ yaagees.
LUK 15:7 Hessadaka, maaroti koshshonna uddufun tammanne uddufun xillotape aathidi, maarotan geliya issi nagaranchuwa gaason salon gita ufaysi gidees.
LUK 15:8 “Woyko tammu biri de7iya issi maccasiya tammaafe iissiya dhayiko demmana gakanaw xompe oythada keetha pittada mintha koyonnay oonee?
LUK 15:9 Demmida wode ba laggetanne ba shoorota xeegada ‘Dhayida ta issi bira demmida gisho taara ufaytite’ yaagawusu.
LUK 15:10 Si7ite, hessa mela issi maarotethan geliya nagaranchuwan Xoossaa kiitanchota sinthan ufaysi gidees” yaagis.
LUK 15:11 Zaaridi Yesuusi, “Issi uraas nam7u nayti de7oosona.
LUK 15:12 Entafe kaalo na7ay ba aawako, ‘Ta aawaw, ne shaluwape ta gishuwa taw imma’ yaagis. Aaway ba shaluwa ba naytas shaakis.
LUK 15:13 Guutha gallasape guye, kaalo na7ay ba gishuwa ubbaa, qachi ekidi haaho biitta bis. Yan altacan shaluwa toochidi ongis.
LUK 15:14 I baw de7iyaba ubba wursidaape guye he biitta ubban mino koshi keyin metootis.
LUK 15:15 Hessa gisho, he biitta asaape issuwa soo gaata gelis. Uray iya guduntho heemmana mela ba moothu yeddis.
LUK 15:16 Gudunthoti miya harquwafe maanaw amottis, shin iyoka iyaw immiya asi bentibeenna.
LUK 15:17 I ba wozanaako simmidi, ‘Aapun ta aawa aylletas kathi wora wodhin ta haysan koshara hayqanaw gakadina?’
LUK 15:18 Dendada ta aawako bada, ‘Ta aawaw, salon Xoossa, sa7an nena qohas.
LUK 15:19 Hizape ne na7a geetetada xeegetanaw taw bessonna gisho, ne son de7iya aylletape issuwada tana payda’ yaagana” yaagis.
LUK 15:20 Hessa gisho, dendidi ba aawako bis. “Hanoshin, I buroo haahon de7ishin aaway qadhetidi, iyako woxi bidi, idimmidi yeeris.
LUK 15:21 Na7ayka, ‘Ta aawaw salon Xoossa, sa7an nena ta qohas. Hizape ne na7a geetetada xeegetanaw bessike’ yaagis.
LUK 15:22 “Iya aaway aylleta xeegidi, ‘Ellesidi ubbaafe lo77o gidida ma7o ehidi iya mayzite; iya biradhen sagaayo, iya tohon caamma aathite.
LUK 15:23 Modho gatarmentho ehidi shukite, moos, ufaytoos.
LUK 15:24 Ta na7ay haysi hayqis, shin ha77i paxis; dhayis, shin bentis’ yaagis. Hessafe guye, ufaysi doomidosona.
LUK 15:25 “He wode bayra na7ay goshsha gaden de7ees. Yaape yishe soo matishin yethinne gufa girsi si7is.
LUK 15:26 I, aylletape issuwa xeegidi haniyabay aybeko eranaw oychis.
LUK 15:27 Aylley, ‘Ne ishay saro yida gisho ne aaway modho gatarmentho iyaw shukis’ yaagis.
LUK 15:28 “Bayra ishay yilotidi soo gelanawuka koybeenna. Aaway kare keyidi soo gelana mela iya woossis.
LUK 15:29 Shin I ba aawako, ‘Heko, haysa mela laythi ta new aylletada ne kiitaape issuwaka pacisonna new kiitetin, taani ta laggetara ufaytana mela hari attoshin issi laaqa deeshe immabaaka.
LUK 15:30 Hanoshin, haysi ne na7ay ne shaluwa laymatara dhaysidi yin, modho gatarmentho shukadasa’ ” yaagis.
LUK 15:31 “Aawayka, ‘Ta na7aw, neeni ubba wode taara de7aasa, taba ubbay neesa.
LUK 15:32 Haysi ne ishay hayqis, shin paxis; dhayis, shin bentis. Hessa gisho, daro ufaytanaw bessees’ yaagana” yaagis.
LUK 16:1 Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Issi dure uraas iyape garsara issi shuumi de7ees. He shuumay ba godaa shaluwa toochees giya worey keetha aawa gakis.
LUK 16:2 Keetha aaway shuuma xeegisidi, ‘Taani woygiyaba si7adina? Hizape neeni ta keethas shuuma gidada oothanaw danda7onna gisho, ta shaluwa taw sheedha’ yaagis.
LUK 16:3 “He shuumay ba wozanan haysada yaagidi qopis: ‘Ta goday tana shuumatethaafe wothana hanees, goya aqanaw wolqi baawa, woossa maanaw yeellayees; yaatin ta waano?
LUK 16:4 Shuumatethaafe ta wodhiya wode asay tana mokana mela oothanaba ta erayis’ yaagis.
LUK 16:5 “Hessa gisho, iya godaa acoy de7iya asaa issuwa issuwa xeegi ehidi koyro uraako, ‘Ne bolla ta godaa acoy ay meli de7ii?’ yaagidi oychis.
LUK 16:6 “I, ‘Laatamu barmeele zayte acoy de7ees’ yaagis. “Shuumay, ‘Wule warqatiya he7e, ellesada, tammu barmeele zayte acoy de7ees gada xaafa’ yaagis.
LUK 16:7 “Hessafe kaallidi nam7anthuwako, ‘New aapuni de7ii?’ yaagis. “I, ‘Heedzu xeetanne laapun tammu kuntaale giste acoy de7ees’ yaagis. “Shuumay, ‘Ne wule warqatiya he7e, ellesada, 296 kuntaale yaagada xaafa’ yaagis.
LUK 16:8 Keetha aaway ammanetibona shuuma iya cincatethaas nashshis. Ha alamiya nayti ase oythan poo7o naytape aadhida wozanaamata.
LUK 16:9 “Hessa gisho, ta hintew odayis; ha alamiya miishey wuriya wode merinaa keethan moketana mela ha miishiyara hintew laggeta shammite.
LUK 16:10 Ubbaafe guuthaban ammanetiday daroban ammanetidaysa gidees. Qassi ubbaafe guuthaban ammanetonaysi daroban ammanetena.
LUK 16:11 Hiza, ha alame miishen hinte ammanetona ixiko, tuma miishe hintew ooni hadara immanee?
LUK 16:12 Hinte hara asa miishen ammanetona ixiko, hinte buzo miishe hintew ooni immanee?
LUK 16:13 “Issi aylley nam7u godatas haaretanaw danda7enna. Issuwa ixiko hankuwa dosees woyko issuwako shiiqiko hankuwa kadhees. Hessadaka, hinte Xoossasinne miishes haaretanaw danda7eketa.”
LUK 16:14 Miishe dosiya Farsaaweti hessa si7ida wode Yesuusa qelqisidosona.
LUK 16:15 I, “Hinte, hintena asa sinthan xilliseeta, shin Xoossay hinte wozana erees. Asa sinthan bonchetidaysi Xoossa sinthan boretidaysa.
LUK 16:16 “Muse higgeynne nabeta kiitay Yohaanisa gakanaw hintew odetishe gam7is. Hessafe guye, Xoossaa kawotethaa Wongelay sabbaketishe gam7is. Asi ubbay yaa gelanaw dafetees.
LUK 16:17 Gidoshin, higgiyafe issi laafa pidaley attanaape saloynne sa7i aadheysi kawuyees.
LUK 16:18 “Ba machiw yeddidi haraa ekiya ubbay laammees. Ba azinaape anjetidaaro ekeysika laammees” yaagis.
LUK 16:19 “Al7onne alleeqo afila ma7iya, sa7i injetin gallas gallas ufaysan de7iya issi dure asi de7ees.
LUK 16:20 Hari qassi asatethay kumethi madunxida issi Alaazara geetetiya manqoy he dure uraa karen yegetidi attidaysi de7ees.
LUK 16:21 Koshape dendoysan dure ura gaytape wodhiya tiifiya maanaw amotishe de7ees. Hari attoshin, kanati yidi iya maduntha laacosona.
LUK 16:22 “He manqoy hayqis; kiitanchoti iya Abrahaame ki7o efidosona. Qassi dure urayka hayqidi moogetis.
LUK 16:23 Si7oolen un7etidi de7ishe dhoqu gidi haahon Abrahaamenne iya ki7on de7iya Alaazara be7is.
LUK 16:24 I, ‘Aawaw Abrahaame, taw qadhetarki; ha tama lacon un7etada de7iya gisho Alaazari ba biradhiya haathan yeddidi ta inxarsa laakothana mela hayyana iya yeddarki’ yaagidi waassis.
LUK 16:25 “Shin Abrahaamey iyako, ‘Ta na7aw, ne sa7an de7iya wode lo77obata ekidaysa, qassi Alaazari iitabata ekidaysa akeeka. Shin ha77i I haysan ufaytees, qassi neeni waayetashe de7aasa’ yaagis.
LUK 16:26 Ha ubbaafe aadhidi, ‘Haape hinteko, hinipe haa nuuko aadhanaw koyeysati pinnonna mela nuusinne hintew giddon gita aafoy de7ees’ yaagis.
LUK 16:27 “Dure uray, ‘Aawaw, yaako Alaazara ta aawa soo kiittana mela ta nena woossayis.
LUK 16:28 Taw ichashu ishati de7idosona, entika ha waaye bessaa yoonna mela entaw bidi markato’ yaagis.
LUK 16:29 “Shin Abrahaamey, ‘Entaw Museranne nabetara de7oosona; enti odiyaba si7onna’ yaagis.
LUK 16:30 “Dure uray, ‘Aawaw Abrahaame, hessatho gidenna; issi asi hayqope dendidi biiko enti maarotan gelana’ yaagis.
LUK 16:31 “Abrahaamey, ‘Musenne nabeta si7onna ixiko, hari attoshin hayqope issi asi dendi odikoka ammanokona’ yaagis.”
LUK 17:1 Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Ase dhubethidi nagaran gelsiyabay yoonna aggenna. Gidoshin, nagaran gelana mela oothiya ura ayye!” yaagis.
LUK 17:2 He uray kaalotape issuwa balethanaape woxa ba qoodhen qachidi abban wulliko iyaw lo77o.
LUK 17:3 Hessa gisho naagetite. “Ne ishay nagara oothiko hanqeta; qiirotidi maarotethan simmiko, iyaw atto yaaga.
LUK 17:4 Issi gallasan laapun toho qohidi, laapun toho, ‘Taani ta nagaraa eras tana maara’ yaagidi neeko yiiko iyaw atto ga.”
LUK 17:5 Hawaareti Godaako, “Ammano nuus gujarki” yaagidosona.
LUK 17:6 Goday, “Gaashe ayfe mela ammanoy hintew de7iko ‘Haysa wolaa shodetada abba giddon toketa’ yaagiko hintew kiitetana” yaagis.
LUK 17:7 Gujidika Yesuusi, “Hinte giddofe issuwas goshshanchoy woyko dorse heemmiya aylley de7iko ooso gadepe woyko wudepe soo simmiya wode, ‘Elle haayada kathi maanaw utta’ yaagey de7ii?
LUK 17:8 Deenna, ‘Taw kaho giigisa; taani mada, uyada aggana gakanaw eqada muza. Hessafe guye, neeni qassi maasanne uyaasa’ yaageneyee?
LUK 17:9 Hiza, goday, aylley kiita polida gisho anjiyee?
LUK 17:10 Hessa gisho, hinteka kiitetoysa ubbaa polida wode, ‘Nu pathonna aylleta; oothanaw bessiya oosuwa polida’ yaagite” yaagis.
LUK 17:11 Yesuusi Yerusalaame bishe Samaarisinne Galilas giddora kanthidi aadhis.
LUK 17:12 Issi gutaa geliya wode baro hargen oyketida tammu asati iya demmidosona. Entika haahon eqidi,
LUK 17:13 “Godaa Yesuusa, nuus qadhetarki” yaagidi waassidosona.
LUK 17:14 I enta be7ida wode, “Bidi hintenatethaa Ayhude kahine bessite” yaagis. Enti ogiya bolla bishe paxidosona.
LUK 17:15 Entafe issoy ba paxuwa be7ida wode dhoqu gida qaalan Xoossa bonchishe Yesuusako simmis.
LUK 17:16 I, Samaare biitta asi, shin Yesuusa toho bolla gufannidi iya galatis.
LUK 17:17 Yesuusi, “Paxiday tammu asata gidokonaayee? Yaatin, uddufunati aw bidonaa?
LUK 17:18 Ha allaga uraape attishin, hari simmidi Xoossa galatey deenna guusseyee?” yaagidi oychis.
LUK 17:19 Uraako, “Ne ammanoy nena pathis; dendada ba” yaagis.
LUK 17:20 Farsaaweti, “Xoossa kawotethay awude yaanee?” gidi Yesuusa oychidosona. I, “Xoossaa kawotethay bentiya mallan yeenna.
LUK 17:21 Qassika iya, ‘Hannina woyko hinina yaaganaw danda7enna. Ayis giiko, Xoossa kawotethay hinte giddon de7ees’ ” yaagidi zaaris.
LUK 17:22 Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Asa Na7a gallasatape issuwa be7anaw hinte amotiya wodey yaana, shin hinte be7eketa.
LUK 17:23 Asay, ‘I yan de7ees’ woyko, ‘Haysan de7ees’ yaagana, shin entana kaallidi boopite.
LUK 17:24 Wol7anthi wol7amidi salo gaxape gaxa poo7isiya mela Asa Na7aa yuussaa gallasay hessada hanana.
LUK 17:25 Shin hessi hananaape sinthe Asa Na7ay daro waayanawunne ha yeletethan ixetanaw bessees.
LUK 17:26 Nohe wode hanidaysa mela Asa Na7a woden hessada hanana.
LUK 17:27 Nohey Markabiyan gelida qamma gakanaw asay mishenne uyishe, ekishenne gelishe de7ishin dhayo haathay yidi ubbaa dhaysis.
LUK 17:28 Looxe laythanka hessatho hanis. Asay mishenne uyishe, shammishenne bayzishe, tokishenne keexishe, gam7idosona.
LUK 17:29 Looxey Soodomepe keyida gallas diinne geetetiya xuuggiyabay salope bukidi ubbaa dhaysis.
LUK 17:30 Asa Na7ay qonciya wodeka hessada hanana.
LUK 17:31 “He gallasan karen de7iya oonika keetha giddon de7iyaba ekanaw soo gelopo. Hessadaka, gaden de7iya asi aykoska soo simmofo.
LUK 17:32 Looxe machiw akeekite;
LUK 17:33 ba shempiw ashshanaw koyiya asi oonika dhaysana; ba shempiw aathidi immiya oonika I ashshana.
LUK 17:34 Ta hintew odayis; he gallasan nam7u asati issi arsan zin7ana; issoy eketana, hankoy attana.
LUK 17:35 Nam7u maccasati wolla gaaccishin iissiya eketana, hankiya attana.
LUK 17:36 Nam7u asati wolla gaden goyeysatape issoy eketana, hankoy attana” yaagis.
LUK 17:37 Enti, “Godaw aw eketanee?” yaagidi oychidosona. I, “Bawuti de7iya bessan ankoti shiiqoosona” yaagis.
LUK 18:1 Yesuusi ba tamaareta azallonna ubba wode woossana mela tamaarsanaw koyidi yaagidi leemiso odis:
LUK 18:2 “Issi kataman Xoossas yashetonna, asas yeellatonna issi daynni de7ees
LUK 18:3 He kataman issi am7iya de7awusu. Iyaka, ‘Ta giddoninne ta morkiya giddon de7iya mootuwa pirda’ yaagada ubba wode he daynnaako simeretawusu.
LUK 18:4 Daynnay guutha wodes I odaa si7onna ixis, shin guyepe ba wozanan, ‘Taani Xoossas yayyonna, asas yeellatonna ixikoka,
LUK 18:5 ha am7iya tana waaysiya gisho iw pirdana; yaatonna ixiko ubba wode yada tana salethana’ ” yaagidi qopis.
LUK 18:6 Godayka, “Geella daynnay gidaysa si7ideta;
LUK 18:7 Xoossay qammanne gallas iyako waassiya ba dooridaysatas pirdeneyee? Entana maaddanaw gam7iyee?
LUK 18:8 Ta hintew odeysa si7ite, ellesidi pirdana. Gidoshin, Asa Na7i yaa wode sa7a bolla ammano demmandesha?” yaagis.
LUK 18:9 Qassi zaaridi, Yesuusi, bantana xillo asada oothidi ceeqeteysatasinne harata kadheysatas haysada yaagidi leemiso odis:
LUK 18:10 “Nam7u asati woossanaw Xoossa Keethi bidosona. Issoy Farsaawe hankoy qassi qaraxa qanxisiya asi.
LUK 18:11 Farsaawey eqidi baw woossishe, ‘Xoossaw taani harata mela bonqancho, geellanne laymatiya asi, aadhada qassi ha qaraxa qanxisiya uraa mela gidonna gisho nena galatayis.
LUK 18:12 Saamintafe nam7u toho xoomayis, ta demmiyaba ubbaafe asraata kessayis’ yaagis.
LUK 18:13 “Shin qaraxa qanxiseysi haahon eqidi hari attoshin salo dhoqu gidi xeellanawka yayyidi ba tiraa iccishe ‘Xoossaw, tana nagaranchuwa maararki’ gidi woossis.
LUK 18:14 Ta hintew odeysa si7ite; Farsaawiyape haysi qaraxa qanxiseysi Xoossaa sinthan xillo gididi ba soo simmis. Ayis giiko, bana dhoqu dhoqu oothiya asi kawuyana, bana kawushiya asi dhoqu dhoqu gaana” yaagis.
LUK 18:15 Yesuusi yooga nayta bolla ba kushiya wothidi anjana mela asay iyako ehoosona. Yesuusa tamaareti hessa be7idi “Ayis Yesuusako eheetii?” yaagidi kaccidosona.
LUK 18:16 Shin Yesuusi nayta baako xeegidi, “Yooga nayti taako yaanaysa diggofite; yo giite. Ayis giiko, Xoossa kawotethay entada hanidaysatasa.
LUK 18:17 Taani hintew tuma odayis; Xoossa kawotetha yooga naytatho ekonnay oonika yaa gelenna” yaagis.
LUK 18:18 Ayhude halaqatape issoy, “Keeha astamaariyaw, merina de7o demmanaw ay ootho?” yaagidi oychis.
LUK 18:19 Yesuusi iyako, “Ayis tana keehaw yaagada xeegay? Issi Xoossafe attishin, hari keehi baawa.
LUK 18:20 Laammofa, wodhopa, kaysotopa, wordo markatofa, ne aawanne ne aayiw boncha” giya kiita eray gidi oychis.
LUK 18:21 Urayka, “Hessata ubbaa taani na7atethafe doomada naagashe gam7as” yaagis.
LUK 18:22 Yesuusi hessa si7ida wode, “Hiza, new issibay pacees; new de7iyaba ubbaa bayzada manqotas imma; salon nena shaloy naagees. Yaata simmada, tana kaalla” yaagis.
LUK 18:23 Shin uray hessa si7ida wode iyaw daro shaloy de7iya gisho daro qiirotis.
LUK 18:24 Yesuusi uraa be7idi, “Dure asas Xoossa kawotethi geloy waanidi un7andesha?
LUK 18:25 Durey Xoossa kawotethi gelanaysafe gimaley narpe luhora kantheysi kawuyees” yaagis.
LUK 18:26 Hessa si7ida asay, “Hessa gidiko ooni attanee?” yaagidosona.
LUK 18:27 Yesuusi, “Asas danda7etonabay Xoossas danda7etees” yaagis.
LUK 18:28 Phexroosi, “Heko nuuni nubaa ubbaa aggidi nena kaallida” yaagis.
LUK 18:29 “Yesuusi tuma ta hintew odayis; Xoossaa kawotethaas gidi ba keethaa woyko ba machiw woyko ba ishata woyko ba aawanne ba aayiw woyko ba nayta aggiday;
LUK 18:30 ha wodiyan dako daro, yaana alamen merina de7o ekonnay oonika baawa” yaagis.
LUK 18:31 Yesuusi tammanne nam7ata baako xeegidi, “Ane Yerusalaame boos, nabeti Asa Na7aba xaafidaba ubbay yan poletana.
LUK 18:32 I Ayhude gidonna asaas aadhidi imetana. Enti iya toochana, cayananne iya bolla cuttana.
LUK 18:33 Iya garaafidaape guye, wodhana, shin heedzantho gallasan I hayqope dendana” yaagis.
LUK 18:34 Shin iya tamaareti he ubbaafe issibaaka akeekibokona. Iya xuuray entaw qosetida gisho I woygidaako eribookona.
LUK 18:35 Yesuusi Iyaarko matiya wode issi qooqe uray oge gaxan uttidi woossees.
LUK 18:36 Qooqe uray asay he bessaara aadhishin si7idi, “I aybee?” gidi oychis.
LUK 18:37 Enti, “Naazirete Yesuusi haysara aadhees” yaagidosona.
LUK 18:38 I, “Dawita na7aw, Yesuusa, tana maararki” yaagidi waassis.
LUK 18:39 Sinthe sinthe biya asati, “Si7i ga” gidi hanqetidosona. Shin I, “Dawita na7aw, tana maara” yaagidi darsidi waassis.
LUK 18:40 Yesuusi eqidi uraa baako ehana mela kiittis. Urayka, iyako shiiqin,
LUK 18:41 “Ta new ay oothana mela koyay?” yaagidi oychis. Qooqey, “Godaw ta xeellanaw koyayis” yaagis.
LUK 18:42 Yesuusi, “Xeella, ne ammanoy nena pathis” yaagis.
LUK 18:43 Uray ellesidi xeelli aggis. Xoossaa bonchishe Yesuusa kaallis. Asa ubbay hessa be7idi Xoosse galatidosona.
LUK 19:1 Yesuusi Iyaarko gelidi aadhees.
LUK 19:2 Yan Zakiyoosa geetetiya qaraxa qanxiseyisata halaqay de7ees. I daro dure.
LUK 19:3 I Yesuusi ooneko be7anaw koyis. I qanthi gidiya gisho asaa darotethaafe dendoysan Yesuusa be7anaw danda7ibeenna.
LUK 19:4 Yesuusa be7anaw koyidi I biya ogiyas sinthe woxi bidi issi boobba mitha bolla keyis.
LUK 19:5 Yesuusi he bessaa gakishe dhoqu gidi be7idi, “Zakiyoosa, hachi ta ne son pee7anaw bessiya gisho elle wodha” yaagis.
LUK 19:6 I ellesi wodhidi ufaysan Yesuusa mokis.
LUK 19:7 He bessan de7iya asaa ubbay hessa be7idi, “Nagaranchuwa soo gelidi moketaniw hanees” yaagidi zuuzumidosona.
LUK 19:8 Gidoshin, Zakiyoosi eqidi Godaako, “Godaw, Heko taw de7iya shalo ubbaafe baggaa manqotas immana. Asape aybaka wordon balethada ekidaba gidiko oyddu kushe zaarana” yaagis.
LUK 19:9 Yesuusi qassi, “Ha uray Abrahaame na7a gidida gisho hachi atotethay ha soo yis.
LUK 19:10 Asa Na7ay yiday dhayidaysa koyanaasanne ashshanaasa” yaagis.
LUK 19:11 Asay hessa si7iya wode, Yesuusi Yerusalaame matatida gishonne Xoossaa kawotethay ha77i matara qoncana daanida gisho entaw leemiso odis.
LUK 19:12 Hessa gisho, Yesuusi, “Issi gita asi de7eysi baw kawotethi ekidi yaanaw hara biitta bis.
LUK 19:13 Iyaw oothiya aylletape tammata xeegidi issuwas issuwas tammu minaane immidi ‘Ta simmada yaana gakanaw ha miishiyara zal7ite’ yaagis.
LUK 19:14 “He biitta asay iya ixiya gisho, ha uray nu bolla kawotana mela nu koyoko yaagidi ase iya guyera kiittidosona.
LUK 19:15 “Gidoshin, he uray kawo gididi ba biitta simmis. He tammu aylleti I immida miishiyan ay mela zal7idi wodhisidaako eranaw koyidi entana xeegisis.
LUK 19:16 “Koyroysi yidi, ‘Godaw, ne taw immida miishey haraa tamma wodhis’ yaagis.
LUK 19:17 “Iya Goday, ‘Neno ammanetida aylliyaw lo77o oothadasa. Neeni guuthaban ammanetida gisho new tammu katamata bolla maata immas’ yaagis.
LUK 19:18 “Nam7anthoy yidi, ‘Godaw, ne taw immida miishey haraa ichasha wodhis’ yaagis.
LUK 19:19 “Goday iyako, ‘Newuka qassi ichashu katamata bolla maata immas’ yaagis.
LUK 19:20 “Heko heedzanthoy yidi, ‘Godaw, ta curqan xaaxada naagida ne miishiya hannashu.
LUK 19:21 Ayis giiko, neeni nebaa gidonnaba ekeysanne ne zeronnaba cakiya iita asi gidiya gisho new yayyas’ yaagis.
LUK 19:22 “Iya goday zaaridi, ‘Neno iita aylliyaw ne doonatho ta nena pirdana. Ta wothonnaba ekeysanne zeronnaba cakiya asi gideysa ne eriko,
LUK 19:23 ta yada ta miishiya wodhera ekana mela zal7iya asaas ayis immabikii?’
LUK 19:24 “Iya goday he bessan eqidaysatako, ‘Iyara de7iya miishiya ekidi tamma wodhisidaysas immite’ yaagis.
LUK 19:25 “Enti, ‘Godaw, iyaw kaseka tammu minaaney de7ees’ yaagidosona.
LUK 19:26 “Goday, ta hintew odayis; ‘De7iya ubbaas hari guzhetana, shin baynaysafe haray atto iyaw de7iyaraka eketana.
LUK 19:27 Gidoshin, ta enta bolla kawotonna mela koydaysata he ta morketa ha ta sinthe ehidi gora7ite’ gis” yaagis.
LUK 19:28 Yesuusi hessa odidaape guye, entafe sinthe hemetidi Yerusalaame bis.
LUK 19:29 Shamaho zuma bolla de7iya Beetefaagenne Bitaane matida wode ba tamaaretape nam7ata kiittidi,
LUK 19:30 “Hinte sinthan de7iya gutaa biite, hinte yaa gakiya wode oonika toggonna qashetidi de7iya hare mari demmana. Iya billidi haa eki yiite.
LUK 19:31 Oonika, ‘Ayis billeetii?’ gidi oychiko, ‘Goday iya koyees’ yaagite” yaagis.
LUK 19:32 Kiitetidaysati bidi I gidaysada hanin be7idosona.
LUK 19:33 Enti hare maraa billishin godati be7idi, “Hare maraa ayis billeetii?” yaagidosona.
LUK 19:34 Enti zaaridi, “Goday iya koyees” yaagidosona.
LUK 19:35 Yaape hare maraa Yesuusako ehidosona. Banta ma7uwa hare maraa zokon yeggidi Yesuusa hare maraa bolla utisidosona.
LUK 19:36 Asayka I biya ogiya bolla banta ma7uwa hiixidosona.
LUK 19:37 Shamaho zuma dugethe wodhisiya ogiyako matiya wode, taybon keehi daro asay enti be7ida malaalsiyaban ufaytidi banta qaala dhoqu oothidi,
LUK 19:38 “Godaa sunthan yaa kawoy anjetidaysa saluwan saroy ubbaafe dhoqa saluwan bonchoy Xoossaas gido” yaagidi Xoossaa galatidosona.
LUK 19:39 Asaa giddofe issi issi Farsaaweti Yesuusako, “Astamaariyaw, ne tamaareta hayzite gada hanqeta” yaagidosona.
LUK 19:40 I entako, “Enti si77i giiko shuchati waassana” yaagis.
LUK 19:41 Yesuusi Yerusalaame matishe katamaa be7idi iyaw yeekis.
LUK 19:42 “New saro gidanaysa hachi ne eridaba gidiyakoshin, ha77i ne ayfiyape geemmis.
LUK 19:43 Ne morketi ne yuushuwa diridi dumma dumma ogiyara nena teqidi un7ethiya wodey yaana.
LUK 19:44 Nenanne ne dirsaa garsan de7iya ne nayta dhaysana. Issi issi shuchu denthidi laallana, ayis giiko Xoossay nena ashshanaw yaa wodiya erabaaka” yaagidi iw yeekis.
LUK 19:45 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi Xoossa Keethi gelidi zal7eyisata yaape goodis.
