LUK 19:46 Qassi, “ ‘Ta keethay Xoossaa woossiya keethi gidana’ gidi xaafetis, shin hinte ta keethaa pangata gongolo oothideta” yaagis.
LUK 19:47 Gallas gallas xoossa keethan tamaarsees. Kahineta halaqati, higge astamaaretinne deriya cimati iya wodhanaw oge koyoosona.
LUK 19:48 Gidoshin, asa ubbay iya timirtiya banta wozana yeggidi si7iya gisho, entaw oothanabay dhayis.
LUK 20:1 Issi gallas Yesuusi xoossa keethan asaa tamaarsishininne Wongela markatishin, kahine halaqati, higge astamaaretinne deriya cimati issife iyako yidi,
LUK 20:2 “Neeni haysata aybi maatan oothiyako nuus oda. Ha maata new immiday oonee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
LUK 20:3 I entako, “Taka hintena issiba oychana, ane taw zaarite.
LUK 20:4 Xammaqiya Yohaanisa xinqatey Xoossafeye asapee?” yaagis.
LUK 20:5 Enti woli giddon yaagidi zoretidosona: “Xoossafe giiko yaatin, ayis ammanibeketii?” yaagana.
LUK 20:6 “Asape giiko, asa ubbay Yohaanisi nabe gideysa ammaniya gisho nuna shuchan caddana.”
LUK 20:7 Yaaniya gisho, “Awupeko nu eroko” yaagidi zaaridosona.
LUK 20:8 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Hiza, taka ay maatan haysata oothiyako hintew odike” yaagis.
LUK 20:9 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi yaagidi ha leemisuwa asaas odis: “Issi asi woyne tokis. Goshshanchotas kera immidi daro wode gam7idi yaanaw hara biitta bis.
LUK 20:10 Woyne ayfiya maxiya wodey gakin woyne ayfiyape iyaw yeddana mela goshshanchotako ba aylliya kiittis. Shin goshshanchoti he aylliya oykidi wadhidi mela kushe yeddidosona.
LUK 20:11 Kaallidika hara aylliya kiittis. Qassi goshshanchoti iya wadhidi, kawushidi mela kushe yeddidosona.
LUK 20:12 Ha77ika zaaridi heedzantho aylliya kiittis. Goshshanchoti iyaka madunxisidi woyne gadiya giddofe gaxa kessidi yeggidosona.
LUK 20:13 “Woyne gadiya goday, ‘Yaatin ta ay ootho? Ane qassi ta dosiya ta na7a yeddana; ooni eri enti iya bonchona aggokona’ yaagis.
LUK 20:14 “Shin goshshanchoti uraa na7a be7ida wode, ‘Haysi iya laattanaysa, haa yiite iya wodhana, yaatiko laatay nuus gidana’ yaagidi zoretidosona.
LUK 20:15 Woyne gadiya giddofe gaxa kessidi wodhidosona. Yaatin, woyne gadiya goday he asata waatanee?
LUK 20:16 Yidi he goshshanchota dhaysana, woyne gadiya hara asatas immana. Asay hessa si7ida wode ‘Shinchalle hessa melaba gathofo’ yaagidosona.
LUK 20:17 “Yesuusi enta caddi xeellidi, “ ‘Yaatin, gimbe keexiya asati borida shuchay, keethaas malanne minotethi immiya ubbaafe aadhiya shuchi gidis’ geetetidi xaafetidaysa birshethay aybee?
LUK 20:18 He shuchaa bolla kundiya ubbay qoxettana, shuchay iya bolla wodhiya ubbay liiqana” yaagis.
LUK 20:19 Higge astamaaretinne kahine halaqati ha leemisoy odetiday enta bolla gideysa eridi he wode iya oykanaw koydosona, shin asaas babidosona.
LUK 20:20 Hessa gisho, Yesuusa deriya haariya Roome kawa maatas aathidi immanaw koyidi iya doonape bala qaala naagoosona. Hessa polisanaw xillo daanidi cimmiya asata iyako kiittidosona.
LUK 20:21 Kiitetidi bida asati, “Astamaariyaw, neeni odeysinne tamaarseysi like gideysa, qassi Xoossaa ogiya tumatethan tamaarseysanne oonaka shaakonnaysa nu eroos.
LUK 20:22 Hanoshin, Roome kawas giira giiranaw bessi bessennee?” yaagidi iya oychidosona.
LUK 20:23 Shin I enta wozanaa iitatetha erida gisho,
LUK 20:24 “Ane tana issi santime bessite, Iya bolla de7iya misileynne sunthay oodebayee?” yaagis. Enti zaaridi, “Roome Kawa Qeesareysa” yaagidosona.
LUK 20:25 I zaaridi, “Yaatiko, Qeesareba Qeesares, Xoossaba Xoossaas immite” yaagis.
LUK 20:26 Hessa gisho, I zaarida zaaruwan asaa sinthan bala demmanaw danda7ibookona. Iya zaaruwan malaaletidi si77i gidoosona.
LUK 20:27 Hayqope dendoy baawa giya Saduqaawetape issoti issoti Yesuusako yidi,
LUK 20:28 “Astamaariyaw, issi asi macho ekidi na7a yelonna hayqiko, iya ishay he maccasiw ekidi nayta yelidi ba ishaas koche ashshana mela Musey xaafis.
LUK 20:29 Heko laapun ishati de7oosona. Koyroysi macho ekidi na7a yelonna hayqis.
LUK 20:30 Nam7anthoy iyo ekidi na7a yelonna hayqis.
LUK 20:31 Heedzanthoyka hessatho hanis. Laapunati ubbay hessada hanidi iyo ekidosona, shin na7a yelonna hayqidosona.
LUK 20:32 Wursethan maccasiya hayqasu.
LUK 20:33 Hiza, laapun addey iyo ekida gisho hayqope dendiya wode iya oodde macho gidanee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
LUK 20:34 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Asay ha wodiyan ekoosonanne geloosona.
LUK 20:35 Shin hayqope dendidi yaana alamiyan daanaw besseysati ekokonanne gelokona.
LUK 20:36 Enti kiitancho mela gidiya gisho sinthafe hayqokona. Hayqope dendida gisho enti Xoossaa nayta.
LUK 20:37 Musey Godaa, ‘Abrahaame Godaa, Yisaaqa Godaa, Yayqooba Godaa’ gidi tushiya giddon xuugetiya tama taarikiya xaafidaysan hayqida asay dendeysa bessees.
LUK 20:38 Ubbay iyaw de7on de7eyisata gidiya gisho I de7on de7eyisata Godaape attishin, hayqidaysata Godaa gidenna” yaagidi zaaris.
LUK 20:39 Higge astamaaretape issoti issoti, “Astamaariyaw, lo77oba odadasa” yaagidosona.
LUK 20:40 Hessafe guye, hara oysho oychanaw yayyidosona.
LUK 20:41 Iyape kaallidi Yesuusi entako, “Asay Kiristoosa waatidi Dawita na7a yaagona?
LUK 20:42 Ayis giiko, Dawiti ba huuphen ba maxaafan, “ ‘Xoossay ta Godaako “Ta ne morketa ne tohoy yedhiyaso oothana gakanaw taape ushacha baggan utta” gis’ yaagis.
LUK 20:44 “Hiza, Dawiti Kiristoosa, ‘Godaa gidi xeegishe iyaw na7a waanidi gidii?’ ” yaagis.
LUK 20:45 Derey ubbay si7ishin ba tamaaretako,
LUK 20:46 “Adussa ma7o ma7idi yuushshe doseysatape, giyan boncho sarotho, ayhude woosa keethan boncho oyde, moketiya sonka boncho bessi koyiya higge astamaaretape naagetite.
LUK 20:47 Enti am7eta keethaa kalloyoosona, xillo asi daanidi woosa adussosona. Hessati ubbaafe aadhiya iita pirda ekana” yaagis.
LUK 21:1 Dure asay xoossa keethan muxaata saaxiniyan yeggishin Yesuusi dhoqu gidi asaa be7is.
LUK 21:2 Qassi issi manqo am7iya nam7u sikina yeggishin be7idi,
LUK 21:3 “Ta hintew tuma odayis; ha manqo am7iya ubbaafe aathada immasu.
LUK 21:4 Ayis giiko, ha asa ubbay bantaw de7iyabaape immidosona, shin iya ba pacaape, baw de7iya aquwa ubbaa immasu” yaagis.
LUK 21:5 Yesuusa tamaaretape issoti issoti Xoossa Keethay daro lo77iya shuchaninne asay Xoossaas immida imotan lo77idaysa odetoosona.
LUK 21:6 Shin Yesuusi, “Ha hinte be7iyabay ubbay laaletonna, shuchi shucha bolla gimbetida mela attonna wodey yaana” yaagis.
LUK 21:7 Entika, “Astamaariyaw, ha ubbay hananay awudee? Qassi haysi hananaysas malaatay aybee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
LUK 21:8 Yesuusi yaagidi entaw zaaro immis: “Baletonna mela naagetite. Daroti, ‘Taani Kiristoosa, wodey matatis’ yaagishe ta sunthan yaana, shin hinte enta kaallopite.
LUK 21:9 Hinte olabaanne asaa geellatetha si7iya wode dagammofite. Hessi sinthatidi hananaysi attonnaba gidiya gisho wodiya wursethay ellesidi yeenna” yaagis.
LUK 21:10 Kaallidika, “Derey deriya bolla, kawotethay kawotethaa bolla dendana.
LUK 21:11 Gita biitta qaaxoy hanana, koshaynne gadoy dumma dumma bessan darana, yashshiyabaynne gita malaatati salope qoncana.
LUK 21:12 Shin ha ubbay hananaape sinthe ta sunthaa gisho gidi asay hintena gooddananne oykana. Ayhude woosa keethaninne qasho keethan hintena yeggana. Kawota sinthenne deriya haareyisata sinthe hintena efana.
LUK 21:13 Hessika tabaa hinte entaw markatanaw lo77o oge gidana.
LUK 21:14 Hessa gisho, hinte oyshetiya wode woygidi zaaro immane gidi hinte wozanan un7etonna mela akeekite.
LUK 21:15 Ayis giiko, hinte morketi hintera eqetanawunne palamanaw danda7onna doonanne cincatethi ta hintew immana.
LUK 21:16 Hari attoshin, hintena yelidaysati, hinte ishati, hinte dabbotinne laggeti hintena aathidi immana. Hinte giddofe issota issota wodhana.
LUK 21:17 Ta sunthaa gisho asa ubbaa sinthan hinte ixetidaysata gidana.
LUK 21:18 Shin hari attoshin, hinte binaanape issoyka dhayenna.
LUK 21:19 Polo danda7an hinte, hinte shempuwa ashshana.”
LUK 21:20 “Yerusalaame katamay wotaadaren diretidi uttidashin hinte be7iko iyaw dhayoy matatidaysa erite.
LUK 21:21 He wode Yihudan de7iya ubbay deriyako baqato, kataman de7eysati yaape keyo, gaxariyan de7eysati katama gelopo.
LUK 21:22 Ayis giiko, ha xaafetidabay poletana mela hessi Xoossay kushe zaariya wode.
LUK 21:23 Sa7a bolla gita metoy yaana, hessanka asaa bolla Xoossaa hanqoy yaana. Hessa gisho, qanthatidaysatanne dhantheyisata ayye!
LUK 21:24 Enti mashshan hayqana, asa ubbay allaga biitta di7etana. Ayhude gidonna asaa wodey poletana gakanaw Yerusalaamey entanan yedhetidaysa gidana.
LUK 21:25 “Awan, ageenaninne, xoolintota bolla malaatati hanidi bentana. Abbaafenne zuliya deshuwape dendoysan biittan de7iya asay un7etananne yarkana.
LUK 21:26 Saluwa wolqati buqettana gisho asay yashshaninne biitta bolla aybi hanandesha gidi naagon bantana baletana.
LUK 21:27 He wode Asa Na7ay wolqaninne gita bonchuwan shaarara yishin enti be7ana.
LUK 21:28 Hinte atotethay matatida gisho ha hanoti poletethi oykiya wode giigeti eqite, hinte huuphiya dhoqu oothidi xeellite” yaagis.
LUK 21:29 Kaallidika, haysada gidi leemiso odis; “Balase mithinne hara mithata ubbaa be7ite.
LUK 21:30 Enti aaciya wode torchey matatidaysa hinte ereeta.
LUK 21:31 Hessada ha hanoti poletishin hinte be7iko Xoossaa kawotethay matatidaysa erite.
LUK 21:32 “Ta hintew tuma odayis; ha ubbay poletana gakanaw ha yeletethay aadhenna.
LUK 21:33 Saloynne sa7i aadhana, shin ta qaalay aadhenna.
LUK 21:34 “Hiza, dhassi bayna de7on, ushsha daroninne duussabaas un7etethan hinte wozanay oyketonna melanne he qammay akeekona xiheda hinte bolla gakonna mela naagetite.
LUK 21:35 He qammay biitta kumethan de7iya ubbaa bolla gakana.
LUK 21:36 Hessa gisho, yaa iitaape attanawunne Asa Na7a sinthan eqanaw danda7ana mela ubba wode minnidi woossite” yaagis.
LUK 21:37 Gallas gallas Yesuusi xoossa keethan tamaarsishe, qamma qamma Shamaho zuma bolla keyidi aqees.
LUK 21:38 Asa ubbay iya si7anaw wonta guura iyako Xoossaa Keethi yoosona.
LUK 22:1 He wode “Paasika” giya Uytha Ba7aaley matis.
LUK 22:2 Kahine halaqatinne higge astamaareti ase yayiya gisho, waatidi Yesuusa banta giddofe dhaysaneko oge koyoosona.
LUK 22:3 Xalahey tammanne nam7atape issuwa gidida Asqoroota Yihuda geeteteysa gido gelis.
LUK 22:4 Yihudi kahine halaqatakonne Xoossa Keetha naageysata halaqatako bidi Yesuusa waati aathidi immaneko entara maqetis.
LUK 22:5 Entika hessan ufaytidi miishe immanaw iyara zoretidosona.
LUK 22:6 Ika zoretethan giigis. Aathi entaw immanaw asi bayna inje wode naagishe de7ees.
LUK 22:7 Hessafe guye, Paasika dorsay shuketiya Uytha Ba7aaley gakis.
LUK 22:8 Yesuusi, “Paasika kahuwa maana mela bidi nuus giigisite” yaagidi Phexroosanne Yohaanisa kiittis.
LUK 22:9 Enti, “Nu awun giigisana mela ne koyay” yaagidi oychidosona.
LUK 22:10 I entako, “Heko hinte katama gelishin haatha oto tookida addey hintera gahetana. I bidi geliya keethaa iya kaallidi gelite.
LUK 22:11 Astamaarey godaako, ‘Ta ta tamaaretara wolla Paasika kahuwa maanaw imatha keethi awunee? yaagis’ giite.
LUK 22:12 I pooqiya bolla hiixetidi giigidi de7iya dalga kifile hintena bessaana, yan giigisite” yaagis.
LUK 22:13 Enti bidi Yesuusi gidaysada hanin demmidosona. Paasika ba7aale kahuwa yan giigisidosona.
LUK 22:14 Saateyka gakida wode Yesuusi hawaaretara wolla kahuwa bolla uttis.
LUK 22:15 I entako, “Ta waaye ekanaape sinthe ha kahuwa hintera maanaw daro amottas.
LUK 22:16 Hiza, si7ite! Xoossaa kawotethan haysas birshethay poletana gakanaw ha kahuwa zaarada miike” yaagis.
LUK 22:17 Ushshaa ekidi galati simmidi, “He7ite haysa hinte giddon shaaketite.
LUK 22:18 Si7ite! Xoossaa kawotethay yaana gakanaw hachife doomada ha woyne ushshafe zaarada uyike” yaagis.
LUK 22:19 Uythaa ekidi, galati simmidi, “Haysi hintew imetiya ta ashuwa. Haysa oothishe tana qopite” yaagidi menthidi entaw immis.
LUK 22:20 Hessadaka, kahuwape guye, ushsha ekidi, “Ha ushshay hintew gukida ta suuthan gidiya ooratha caaquwa.
LUK 22:21 Gidoshin, tana aathidi immana uraa kushey taara issife gaytaana.
LUK 22:22 Asa Na7ay iyaw geetetoysa mela hayqanaw de7ees, shin iya aathidi immiya uraa ayye!” yaagis.
LUK 22:23 Enti banta giddon, “Haysa ooni oothanee” gidi woli oychidosona.
LUK 22:24 Qassi enta giddon gita gidanay oone giya palami medhetis.
LUK 22:25 Yesuusi entako, “Deriya kawoti banta asaa wolqan haaroosona; banta deriya bolla godateysataska bantana, ‘Lo77o ootheyisata’ yaagidi xeegosona.
LUK 22:26 Shin hinte giddon hessa mela gidopo. Hinte giddon bayratey kaaloda hano; kaaletheysi kaalleysada hano.
LUK 22:27 Hanoshin, mokeysafenne Moketeysafe awusi aadhii? Moketeysa gidenneyee? Shin taani hinte giddon mokeysa mela.
LUK 22:28 “Hinteka ta metuwan taape shaaketonna taara minnidi eqidaysata.
LUK 22:29 Hinte ta gaytape maana mela, uyana melanne araatata bolla uttidi tammanne nam7u Isra7eele sheeshata bolla pirdana mela ta aaway tana shuumidaysada taka hintena ta kawotethan shuumana” yaagis.
LUK 22:31 Kaallidika Yesuusi, “Simoona, Simoona, Xalahey hintena gisteda harqanaw woossis.
LUK 22:32 Shin taani ne ammanoy dhayonna mela new gaannatas. Neka simmida wode ne ishata mintha” yaagis.
LUK 22:33 Simooni, “Godaw, taani neera qashetanawunne hayqanaw giigetas” yaagis.
LUK 22:34 Yesuusi Phexroosako, “Ta new odayis; hachi kuttoy waassanaape sinthe ne tana heedzu toho kaddana” yaagis.
LUK 22:35 Kaallidika, Yesuusi entako, “Taani hintena korojoy, karxiitinne caammi baynna kiitida wode hintew pacidabay de7ii?” yaagidi oychis. Enti zaaridi, “Aykoyka pacibeenna” yaagidosona.
LUK 22:36 I entako, “Ha77i korojoynne karxiiti de7ey oyko; mashshi baynay ba afilaa bayzidi mashsha shammo.
LUK 22:37 Haa si7ite! ‘Geellatara taybetis’ geetetidi xaafetidaysi tanan poletanaw bessees. Ee, ta gisho xaafetidabay poleteysi tumatis” yaagis.
LUK 22:38 Iya tamaareti, “Godaw haysan nam7u mashshati de7oosona” yaagidosona. I, “Gidana” yaagis.
LUK 22:39 Yesuusi kase meezetidaysada dendidi Shamaho zuma bolla keyis. Iya tamaareti iya kaallidosona.
LUK 22:40 He bessaa gakida wode, “Paacen gelonna mela woossite” yaagis.
LUK 22:41 Entafe shuchi holin gakiya soo mela haakidi gulbatidi woossis.
LUK 22:42 “Ta aawaw, ne shene gidiko ha metuwa taape aatha. Shin ta shene gidopo ne sheney hano” yaagidi woossis.
LUK 22:43 Kiitanchoy salope qoncidi minthis.
LUK 22:44 Daro un7etidi minnidi woossees. Iya cawayka suuthi xokiyada sa7an xokees.
LUK 22:45 Yesuusi woosa wursidi ba tamaaretako yis. Enti, azzanope dendoysan daaburidi dhiskidashin demmidi,
LUK 22:46 “Ayis dhisketii? Paacen gelonna mela dendidi woossite” yaagis.
LUK 22:47 I buroo oda bolla de7ishin daro asati yidosona. Tammanne nam7atape issoy Yihuda geeteteysi entana kaalethees. I Yesuusa yeeranaw mati shiiqis.
LUK 22:48 Shin Yesuusi, “Yihuda, Asa Na7aa yeerada aatha immanee?” yaagis.
LUK 22:49 Yesuusa tamaareti he hanuwa be7idi, “Godaw mashshan shocino?” yaagidosona.
LUK 22:50 Enta giddofe issoy kahine halaqaa oosanchuwa shocidi ushacha haytha qanxidi yeggis.
LUK 22:51 Shin Yesuusi, “Agga! Diggofite” yaagis. Uraa haythaa bochidi pathis.
LUK 22:52 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi bana oykanaw yida kahine halaqatako, Xoossa Keetha naageysata shuumatakonne cimatako, “Paanno oykiya asada mashshenne xam7a oykidi yidetii?
LUK 22:53 Ubba gallas xoossa keethan ta hintera de7iya wode ta bolla kushe wothibeeketa. Shin haysi dhuma kawotethay haarida wodenne hinte wode” yaagis.
LUK 22:54 Hessafe guye, Yesuusa oykidi kahine halaqaa zabbaa efidosona. Phexroosi haahon Yesuusa kaallees.
LUK 22:55 Asati kahine halaqaa zabban tama eethidi wolla uttidashin Phexroosi entara issife uttis.
LUK 22:56 Issi gadhindiya Phexroosi tama matan uttidaysa cadda xeellada, “Ha uray iyara de7ees” yaagasu.
LUK 22:57 Shin Phexroosi, “Ha maccasete ta he uraa erike” yaagidi kaddis.
LUK 22:58 Guutha wodepe guye issi hara addey iya be7idi, “Neka entafe issuwa” yaagis. Shin Phexroosi, “Ha addiyaw tana gidike” yaagis.
LUK 22:59 Issi saate mela gam7idaape guye issi hara addey tillisidi, “Ha uray Galilape gidiya gisho sidhey bayna iyara de7ees” yaagis.
LUK 22:60 Shin Phexroosi, “Ha addiyaw, ne geysa ta erike” yaagis. I he oda ongonna de7ishin kuttoy waassis.
LUK 22:61 Goday guye simmidi Phexroosa xeellis. Phexroosi, “Hachi kuttoy waassanaape sinthe ne tana heedzu toho kaddana” yaagidi, Goday odida qaala akeekis.
LUK 22:62 Phexroosi kare keyidi daro kokoridi yeekis.
LUK 22:63 Yesuusa naagiya asati iya leqisonne deshethi oykidosona.
LUK 22:64 Iya ayfiya goozidi “Ane tinbite oda; nena dechiday oonee?” yaagidi oychoosona.
LUK 22:65 Hara daro cashshe cayidi kawushoosona.
LUK 22:66 Sa7i wontiya wode Ayhude biitta cimati, kahine halaqatinne higge astamaareti shiiqidi, Yesuusa banta sinthe shiishidosona.
LUK 22:67 Enti, “Neeni Kiristoosee? Ane nuus oda?” yaagidi oychidosona. Yesuusi, “Ta odiyako ammaneketa.
LUK 22:68 Ta oychiyako zaareketa.
LUK 22:69 Shin Asa Na7ay haysafe gede baggan wolqaama Xoossaa ushacha baggan uttana” yaagis.
LUK 22:70 He wode ubbay, “Yaatin, neeni Xoossaa na7ee?” yaagidosona. I, “Ta Xoossaa na7a gideysa hinte gideta” yaagis.
LUK 22:71 Enti, “Hiza, hara marka ay koshshii? I ba inxarsan odishin nu si7ida” yaagidosona.
LUK 23:1 He bessan shiiqida shangoti ubbay dendidi Yesuusa Philaxoosako efidosona.
LUK 23:2 “Ha uray nu asaa balethishin, kawas giira giironna mela diggishininne qassi, ‘Taani Kiristoosa hinte kawa’ yaagishin demmida” yaagidi mootidosona.
LUK 23:3 Philaxoosi Yesuusa, “Neeni Ayhudeta kawo?” yaagidi oychis. Yesuusi, “Ee, ne gidaysa mela” yaagis.
LUK 23:4 Philaxoosi kahine halaqatakonne asaako, “Ha uraa bolla taani issi balaka demmabike” yaagis.
LUK 23:5 Shin enti, “Ha uray Galilape doomidi haysa gakanaw Yihuda kumetha iitabas denthethees” yaagidi minthi odidosona.
LUK 23:6 Philaxoosi hessa si7ida wode Yesuusi Galila aseeko eranaw koyidi iya oychis.
LUK 23:7 Yesuusi Herodiisa biittafe yida asi gideysa Philaxoosi erida wode Herodiisi he wode Yerusalaamen de7iya gisho iyako yeddis.
LUK 23:8 Herodiisi Yesuusa be7anaw daro wodepe koyishe de7iya gisho, iya be7ida wode daro ufaytis. Ayis giiko, iyabaa si7ida gisho malaalsiyaba oothin be7anaw amotishe de7ees.
LUK 23:9 Herodiisi Yesuusa daro oyshota oychis, shin I aykoka zaaribeenna.
LUK 23:10 Kahineta halaqatinne higge astamaareti yan eqidi minthidi iya mootosona.
LUK 23:11 Herodiisaranne iya wotaadaretara Yesuusa kadhidosonanne leqsidosona. Boncho afila mayzidi Philaxoosako zaaridi yeddidosona.
LUK 23:12 Herodiisaranne Philaxoosara kase morkeshin he gallas wolla giigidosona.
LUK 23:13 Philaxoosi kahine halaqata, asaa haareysatanne asaa xeegidi,
LUK 23:14 “ ‘Ha uray asaa geellatethas denthethees’ gidi taako ehideta. Taka hinte sinthan pilgada hinte shiishida mootuwas aybi balaka demmabike.
LUK 23:15 Herodiisi, hessatho aybi balaka iya bolla demmiboonna gisho nuuko yeddis. Tumaka ha uray hayqos gathiya aybi balaka oothibeenna.
LUK 23:16 Hessa gisho, iya garaafada billa yeddana” yaagis.
LUK 23:17 Hessa I giday Paasika Ba7aale wode issi asi entaw billanaysi iyaw attonnaba gidiya gishosa.
LUK 23:18 Derey ubbay issi bolla, “Ha uraa gede digga, nuus Barbaana billa” yaagidi waassidosona.
LUK 23:19 Barbaani katamaa giddon asaa iitabas denthethidi ase wodhidi qashetida asi.
LUK 23:20 Philaxoosi Yesuusa billanaw koyidi asaas zaari odis.
LUK 23:21 Gidoshin, asay, “Kaqa! Kaqa!” yaagidi waassidosona.
LUK 23:22 Philaxoosi heedzantho, “Ha uray qohidabay aybee? Wodhos gathiya bala ta demmabike. Hessa gisho, garaafada yedda aggana” yaagis.
LUK 23:23 Enti banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Kaqetanaw bessees” gidi minthi waassidosona. Enta waasoyka xoonis.
LUK 23:24 Enta oysha gisho, gidi Philaxoosi iya bolla pirdis.
LUK 23:25 Ase iitabas denthethidaysanne ase wodhidi qashetidaysa billana mela woossida gisho he uraa entaw billis. Shin Yesuusa enti koydaba oothana mela entaw aathidi immis.
LUK 23:26 Yesuusa oykidi efishin Simoona geetetiya Qereena biitta addey gaxarepe yishin, demmidi masqaliya toossidi Yesuusa kaallidi baana mela un7ethidosona.
LUK 23:27 Daro asaynne banta tiraa iccishe yeekiya maccasati iya guyera kaalloosona.
LUK 23:28 Shin Yesuusi entako guye simmidi, “Hinteno, Yerusalaame maccasato, hinte huuphesinne hinte naytas yeekitepe attishin, taw yeekofite.
LUK 23:29 ‘Heko maynthati, yelonna ulotinne dhanthonna dhanthati anjetidosona’ hinte yaagana gallasay yaana.
LUK 23:30 He wode dereta, ‘Nu bolla kundite’, zumataka, ‘Nuna kammite’ yaagana.
LUK 23:31 Hiza, qaye mithaa hessatho oothiko mela mithaa waatandesha?” yaagis.
LUK 23:32 Iyara wodhanaw hara nam7u worandzota efidosona.
LUK 23:33 Qeraaniyo geetetiya bessaa gathidi kaqidosona. Worandzotape issuwa ushacha baggara hankuwa haddirsa baggara kaqidosona.
LUK 23:34 Yesuusi, “Ta aawaw, enti ay oothiyako eronna gisho, neeni entaw atto yaaga” yaagis. Enti iya afilaa bolla saama yeggidi shaaketidi ekidosona.
LUK 23:35 Asay eqidi xeelloosona, shin deriya haareysati, “Harata ashshis; Xoossay doorida Kiristoosi iya gidiko ane bana asho” yaagidi leqsidosona.
LUK 23:36 Wotaaddareti iyako shiiqidi, caala woyne ushsha immidosona.
LUK 23:37 Yaatidi, “Neeni Ayhudeta kawo gidiko ne huuphiya ashsha” yaagidi leqsidosona.
LUK 23:38 Iyaw huuphe baggara, “Haysi Ayhudeta kawo” giya xuufey de7ees.
LUK 23:39 Kaqetida worandzotape issoy cashshe sa7ara goochishe, “Ane neeni Kiristoosa gidiko, nenaka nunaka ashsha” yaagis.
LUK 23:40 Shin hanko worandzoy, “Neeni haysa mela pirdan de7ashe hari attoshin, Xoossas yayyikii?
LUK 23:41 Nuuni nu oothida nagaraa gisho bessiya pirda ekoos, shin ha uray issi iitabaa oothibeenna” yaagidi hanqetis.
LUK 23:42 Qassika, “Yesuusa, ne ne kawotethaara yaa wode tana qopa” yaagis.
LUK 23:43 Yesuusi, “Ta new tuma odayis; hachi neeni taara gannaten gidana” yaagis.
LUK 23:44 He gallas usupun saatepe bidi uddufun saate gakanaw away poo7uwa diggida gisho, biitta ubbaa bolla dhuma gidis. Xoossa Keetha geshey daaketidi nam7an shaaketis.
LUK 23:46 Yesuusi, qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Ta aawaw, ta ta shempiw ne kushen sheedhayis” yaagidi hayqis.
LUK 23:47 Mato halaqay, hanidaysa be7idi, “Haysi uray tumaka xillo” yaagidi Xoossaa galatis.
LUK 23:48 Ha haniyaba be7anaw he bessaa shiiqida asa ubbay hanidaba be7ida wode banta tiraa iccishe banta soo simmidosona.
LUK 23:49 Gidoshin, Yesuusa matan eriya asa ubbay, hessadaka Galilape kaallidi yida maccasati hessa be7ishe haahon eqidosona.
LUK 23:50 Ayhude shangotape issoy, Yoosefa geetetiya uray de7ees. I Armaate geetetiya Yihuda katamaape yis. I lo77onne Xillo asi gidiya gisho Xoossaa kawotethaa yuussaa naagees. Shangotape issuwa gidishe enta zoretethaaninne oosuwan deenna.
LUK 23:52 He uray Philaxoosako bidi, Yesuusa aha mooganaw taw imma gidi woossis.
LUK 23:53 Philaxoosi eka yaagin, Yesuusa aha wodhisidi afilara xaaxis. Zaallafe woocidi kessida hara asi moogetonna ooratha duufon wothis.
LUK 23:54 Sambaati gelana haniya gisho, he gallasay giigetetha qamma.
LUK 23:55 Galilape dendidi Yesuusa kaallidi yida maccasati Yoosefara bidi iya aha waati moogiyako duufuwa akeekidi be7idosona.
LUK 23:56 Yaape simmidi shittonne qibaate giigisidosona. Higgey kiitteysa mela Sambaata gallas shempi pee7idosona.
LUK 24:1 Saamintafe koyro gallas, wogga wode wonta daro guura, maccasati banta giigisida shittuwa ekidi duufuwa bidosona.
LUK 24:2 Enti yaa gakiya wode duufuwa doonan de7iya shuchay gonderetidi kichoysa demmidosona.
LUK 24:3 Enti duufuwa gaathi gelidosona, shin Godaa Yesuusa aha demmibookona.
LUK 24:4 Enti yan eqidi aybi hanide gidi qopishin akeekona daro phooliya afila ma7ida nam7u asati enta matan eqidosona.
LUK 24:5 Maccasati yashetidi banta huuphiya sa7an ziqi oothidi de7ishin, asati entako, “De7on de7eysa hayqota giddon ayis koyeetii?
LUK 24:6 I haysan deenna; hayqope dendis, ‘Asa Na7ay nagaranchota kushen aadhidi imetana; entika iya kaqana. I heedzantho qamman hayqope dendana’ yaagidi, I hintera Galilan de7ishe hintew odida qaala qopite” yaagis.
LUK 24:8 Maccasati he wode iya qaala qopidosona.
LUK 24:9 Maccasati duufuwape simmidi hanidaba ubbaa tammanne issotasinne haratasika odidosona.
LUK 24:10 Hessa hawaaretas odiday Magdela Mayraamo, Yohaana, Yayqooba aayiw Mayraamonne entara de7iya hara maccasata.
LUK 24:11 Shin entaw maccasati odidaysi elmo daanin ammanibookona.
LUK 24:12 Shin Phexroosi dendi woxidi duufo bis. He bessaa gakidi, hokidi gaathi xeelliya wode moogo afilaa xalaala be7is. Hanidaban malaaletishe ba soo simmis.
LUK 24:13 He gallas kaalliya tamaaretape nam7ati Yerusalaamepe tammanne issi kilo mitire haakiya Emahoose guta boosona.
LUK 24:14 Enti wolla hanidaba ubbaa odetoosona.
LUK 24:15 Enti he hanotaba qopishenne odetishe biya wode Yesuusi ba huuphen shiiqidi entara bees.
LUK 24:16 Hanoshin, enti iya eronna mela enta ayfey oyketis.
LUK 24:17 I, “Hinte wolla oge bolla de7ishe odeteysi aybee?” yaagis. Enti azzanidi si77i gidi eqidosona.
LUK 24:18 Entafe issoy Qeliyoophe geeteteysi, “Ha qammata giddon Yerusalaamen hanidaba eronnaysi, ne biittas imatheyee?” yaagis.
LUK 24:19 I zaaridi, “I hanidaysi aybee?” yaagidi oychis. Enti, “Xoossaa sinthaninne asa sinthan oosoninne odan mino nabe gidida Naazirete Yesuusaba.
LUK 24:20 Iya kahine halaqatinne haareysati hayqo pirdas aathi immidi, kaqidosona.
LUK 24:21 Nuuni Isra7eele asaa wozande gidi ufaytidi naagidashin haysi hanin hachi heedzantho qamma.
LUK 24:22 Qassi nu giddofe issi issi maccasati nuna malaalsidosona. Enti hachi wonta guura duufuwa bidosona.
LUK 24:23 Iya aha dhayida wode simmi yidi, ‘I paxa de7ees’ giya kiitanchoti qoncin be7ida yaagidi odidosona.
LUK 24:24 Nu giddofeka issoti issoti duufuwa bidi maccasati odidaysatho hanin be7idosona, shin iya be7ibookona” yaagis.
LUK 24:25 I entako, “Hinteno, akeekona asato, hinte wozanay nabeti odidaba ubbaa ammananaw gam7eysato,
LUK 24:26 Kiristoosi ha metuwa ekanawunne ba bonchuwan gelanaw bessennee?” yaagis.
LUK 24:27 Musepenne nabeta ubbaafe dendidi Geeshsha Maxaafan iyabay xaafetidaysa ubbaa entaw qoncisis.
LUK 24:28 Enti biya gutaako matatida wode Yesuusi aadhidi haaho soo biya daanin,
LUK 24:29 Enti, “Sa7ay qammida gisho nuura aqa” yaagidi minthidi woossidosona. Hessa gisho, entara aqanaw gelis.
LUK 24:30 Entara issife gayta bolla uttidi, uythaa denthidi, menthidi, anjidi entaw immis.
LUK 24:31 He wode enti erana mela enta ayfey dooyetis. Entika eridosona. Shin I entafe geemmis.
LUK 24:32 Enti, “Nu ogiya bolla de7ishin I nuus Geeshsha Maxaafaa birshishininne nuna odisishin, nu wozanay xuugetibeennee?” yaagidosona.
LUK 24:33 He wode dendidi guye Yerusalaame yidosona. Tammanne issotinne harati issi bolla shiiqidi de7ishin demmidosona.
LUK 24:34 Enti, “Goday tuma dendis; Simoonas qoncis” yaagidosona.
LUK 24:35 He nam7u tamaareti Emmahuuse ogiya bolla de7ishin hanidaysanne uythaa menthida wode waati iya eridaako entaw odidosona.
LUK 24:36 Nam7u tamaareti hessa oda bolla de7ishin, Yesuusi enta giddon eqidi, “Saroy hintew gido” yaagis.
LUK 24:37 Gidoshin, enti dagammidi, moytille be7ida daanin yayyidosona.
LUK 24:38 I entako, “Ayis babidetii? Ayis sidhey hinte wozanan gelidee?
LUK 24:39 Ta kushiyanne ta tohuwa be7ite; taani tana. Qassi oykidi be7ite; tanan hinte be7eysada, moytilles ashoynne meqethi baawa” yaagis.
LUK 24:40 Yaagidi, ba tohuwanne ba kushiya enta bessis.
LUK 24:41 Enti ufaysafe dendoysan ammanonna malaaletethan de7ishin, Yesuusi entako, “Haysan hintew miyabay de7ii?” yaagis.
LUK 24:42 Enti issi caacetida molo iyaw immidosona.
LUK 24:43 I ekidi enta sinthan mis.
LUK 24:44 I, “Ta hintera gam7ida wode ubban Muse maxaafatan, nabeta maxaafataninne Mazmure maxaafatan, ta gisho xaafetidabay ubbay poletanaw bessees yaagada ta hintew odida qaalay haysa” yaagis.
LUK 24:45 He wode Geeshsha Maxaafata akeekana mela enta wozanaa dooyis.
LUK 24:46 Hessadaka, “Kiristoosi waaye ekana, heedzantho qamman hayqope dendana yaagidi xaafetis.
LUK 24:47 Yerusalaamepe dendidi asaa ubbaas nagaraape maarotethaynne atotethay iya sunthan markatana.
LUK 24:48 Hinte hessas markata.
LUK 24:49 Heko, taka ta aaway immida ufaysaa hintew yeddana. Hinte salope wolqa ma7ana gakanaw Yerusalaame kataman gam7ite” yaagis.
LUK 24:50 Hessafe guye, Bitaane katamaa entana ekidi bis. Ba kushiya denthidi anjis.
LUK 24:51 Entana anjishe entafe shaaketidi pude salo eketis.
LUK 24:52 Enti ziggi goyinnidi daro ufaysan Yerusalaame simmidosona.
LUK 24:53 Xoossaa ubbaa wode galatishe xoossa keethan gam7idosona.
JOH 1:1 Qaalay koyro de7ees. Qaalayka Xoossara de7ees; he Qaalay Xoossaa.
JOH 1:2 Koyrope Qaalay Xoossara de7ees.
JOH 1:3 Xoossay ubbaba Qaala baggara medhis. Medhetidabaape issoyka iya baggara medhetonabay baawa.
JOH 1:4 Iyan de7oy de7ees; he de7oy asaas poo7o.
JOH 1:5 Poo7oy dhuman poo7ees; dhumay poo7uwa xoonibeenna.
JOH 1:6 Xoossay kiitida, issi Yohaanisa geetetiya asi de7ees.
JOH 1:7 Asa ubbay poo7uwan ammanana mela I poo7os marka gididi yis.
JOH 1:8 I poo7uwabaa markatanaw yisipe attishin, ba huuphen poo7o gidenna.
JOH 1:9 Asa ubbaas poo7isiya tuma poo7oy alamiya yees.
JOH 1:10 Qaalay alamen de7is. Xoossay Qaalan alamiya medhis, shin alamey iya eribeenna.
JOH 1:11 I ba asaako yis, shin iya asay iya ekibookona.
JOH 1:12 Shin I bana ekidaysatasinne iya sunthan ammanidaysatas Xoossaa nayta gidana mela maata immis.
JOH 1:13 Enti Xoossafe yeletidosonape attishin, asi yeletiya wogan woyko adde shenen woyko asa amon yeletibookona. Xoossay I enta aawa.
JOH 1:14 Qaalay ase gidis; aadho keehatethaanne tumaa kumidi nu giddon de7is. I aawas issi na7aa gididi ekida iya bonchuwa nuuni be7ida.
JOH 1:15 Yohaanisi iyabaa markatis. Ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Taani, ‘Taape guyera yeysi taape kase de7iya gisho taape aadhees’ gada markatidaysi haysa” yaagis.
JOH 1:16 Nuuni ubbay iya aadho keehatetha kumethaafe anjo bolla anjo ekida.
JOH 1:17 Xoossay higgiya Muse baggara immis, shin aadho keehatethaynne tumatethay Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara yis.
JOH 1:18 Xoossaa be7ida asi oonika baawa; ba Aawa matan de7iya issi Na7aa xalaali baw Xoosse gididaysi iya qoncisis.
JOH 1:19 Yerusalaamen de7iya Ayhude halaqati, kahinetanne Leeweta, “Neeni oonee?” gidi, Yohaanisa oychana mela iyako kiittin, Yohaanisi entaw markatida markatethay haysa.
JOH 1:20 Yohaanisi, “Taani Kiristoosa gidike” yaagidi, geeshshidi markatisipe attishin, kaddibeenna.
JOH 1:21 Enti, “Yaatin, neeni oonee? Neeni Eeliyaaseyee?” yaagidi oychidosona. Yohaanisi, “Akay, gidike” yaagis. Qassi enti, “Neeni yaana geetetida nabiyayee?” yaagidi oychidosona. Yohaanisi, “Akay” gidi zaaris.
JOH 1:22 Yaatin, “Neeni oonee? Nuuni nuna kiitidaysatas odana mela neeni nena oona gay?” yaagidosona.
JOH 1:23 Yohaanisi zaaridi, “Nabiya Isayaasi gidaysada, “ ‘Godaa ogiya suurisite!’ gidi mela biittan waassiya uraa qaalay tana” yaagis.
JOH 1:24 Qassi Farsaaweti kiitida asati
JOH 1:25 Yohaanisako, “Neeni Kiristoosa woyko Eeliyaasa woyko nabe gidonna ixiko, yaatin ayis xammaqay?” gidi oychidosona.
JOH 1:26 Yohaanisi zaaridi, “Taani haathan xammaqayis, shin hinte eronna asi hinte giddon eqis.
JOH 1:27 I taape guyera yees. Taani hari attoshin iya caammaa wodoruwa billanaw bessike” yaagis.
JOH 1:28 Hessi ubbay Yordaanose Shaafape hefinthan, Bitaane kataman, Yohaanisi xammaqiya bessan hanis.
JOH 1:29 Yohaanisi wontetha gallas Yesuusi baako yishin be7idi, “Alamiya nagaraa quchiya Xoossaa Dorsay haysa!
JOH 1:30 Taani, ‘Taape guyera issi asi yaana. I taape kase de7iya gisho taape aadhees’ gada odidaysi haysa.
JOH 1:31 I ooneko taani erike. Shin Isra7eele asaas iya qoncisanaw haathan xammaqashe yas” yaagis.
JOH 1:32 Yohaanisi haysada yaagidi markatis: “Geeshsha Ayyaanay salope holleda wodhishininne iyara de7ishin be7as.
JOH 1:33 Hessi hananaape kase taani iya erike. Shin haathan xammaqanaw tana kiitida Xoossay, ‘Geeshsha Ayyaanay wodhidi iyara de7ishin neeni be7anaysinne Geeshsha Ayyaanan xammaqanaysi iya’ yaagidi taw odis.
JOH 1:34 Taani hessi hanishin be7ada, I Xoossaa Na7aa gididaysa markatayis” yaagis.
JOH 1:35 Qassi wontetha gallas Yohaanisi ba tamaaretape nam7atara issife eqis.
JOH 1:36 Yesuusi aadhishin, Yohaanisi be7idi, “Xoossaa dorsay haysish!” yaagis.
JOH 1:37 Yohaanisa nam7u tamaareti Yohaanisi geysa si7idi Yesuusa kaallidosona.
JOH 1:38 Yesuusi bana kaalleyisata guye simmi be7idi, “Ay koyeetii?” yaagidi oychis. Enti zaaridi, “Astamaariyaw, neeni awun de7ay?” yaagidosona.
JOH 1:39 Yesuusi entako, “Haa yidi be7ite” yaagis. Enti bidi I de7iyasuwa be7idosona. He gallas sa7i tammu saate heera gidiya gisho iya matan pee7idosona.
JOH 1:40 Yohaanisi gidaysa si7idi, Yesuusa kaallida nam7u tamaaretape issoy, Simoon Phexroosa ishaa Indiriyasa.
JOH 1:41 Indiriyasi koyro ba ishaa Simoonara gahetidi, “Nuuni Kiristoosa demmida” yaagis.
JOH 1:42 Indiriyasi Simoona Yesuusako ehis. Yesuusi Simoona be7idi, “Neeni Yoona na7aa Simoona; ne sunthay Keefa gidi xeegetana” yaagis.
JOH 1:43 Wontetha gallas Yesuusi Galila biitta baanaw qofa qachis. I Filphoosara gahetidi, “Tana kaalla!” yaagis.
JOH 1:44 Filphoosi, Indiriyasinne Phexroosi de7ida Beetesayda katamaape yida ase.
JOH 1:45 Filphoosi Natina7eelara gahetidi, “Musey higge maxaafan, qassi nabetika iyabaa xaafida Yoosefa na7aa Naazirete Yesuusa nuuni demmida” yaagis.
JOH 1:46 Natina7eeli zaaridi, “Naazirete katamaape lo77obay keyanaw danda7ii?” yaagis. Filphoosi, “Yada be7a” yaagis.
JOH 1:47 Natina7eeli baako yeysa Yesuusi be7idi, “Geney bayna tuma Isra7eele asi haysa!” yaagis.
JOH 1:48 Natina7eeli Yesuusako, “Neeni tana awun eray?” yaagis. Yesuusi zaaridi, “Filphoosi nena xeeganaape sinthe, neeni balase mithaa garsan de7ishin taani nena be7as” yaagis.
JOH 1:49 Natina7eeli zaaridi, “Astamaariyaw, neeni Xoossaa Na7aa! Neeni Isra7eele kawo!” yaagis.
JOH 1:50 Yesuusi iyako, “Taani nena balase mithee garsan be7as gida gisho ammanay? Neeni haysafe aadhiyaba be7ana!” yaagis.
JOH 1:51 Qassi Yesuusi, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; saloy dooyetin, Xoossaa kiitanchoti Asa Na7aa bolla keyishininne wodhishin hinte be7ana” yaagis.
JOH 2:1 Heedzantho gallas Galila biittan Qaana kataman yaaganoy yaaganetis. Yesuusa aayiya he yaaganuwan de7awusu.
JOH 2:2 Yesuusika ba tamaaretara issife he yaaganuwa xeegetis.
JOH 2:3 Woyne ushshay wurin, Yesuusa aayiya Yesuusako, “Entaw woyne ushshay wuris” yaagasu.
JOH 2:4 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ta aaye, ne haysan gelopa? Ta wodey buroo gakibeenna” yaagis.
JOH 2:5 Yesuusa aayiya oosanchotako, “I hintew odiyaba aybiba gidikoka oothite” yaagasu.
JOH 2:6 Ayhudeti banta geeshsho wogaas go7etiya usupun shucha baathati he bessan de7oosona. Issi issi baathay nam7u woyko heedzu xugga oykees.
JOH 2:7 Yesuusi oosanchotako, “Baathatan haathe kunthite” yaagis. Enti baathatas doona gakanaw haathe kunthidosona.
JOH 2:8 Yesuusi entako, “Ha77i duuqidi yaaganuwa aawatethan poliseysas immite” yaagis. Enti iyaw efidi immidosona.
JOH 2:9 Yaaganuwa aawatethan poliseysi woyne ushshi laametida haatha ganxi ekidi awupe yidaako eribeenna, shin haatha kunthida oosanchoti eroosona. Yaaganuwa aawatethan poliseysi machiw ekeysa xeegidi,
JOH 2:10 “Oonika lo77o woyne ushsha asaa koyrottidi ushshees. Yaatidi asay uyi kallidaape guye, qiraariya immees. Shin neeni lo77o woyne ushsha hanno gakanaw wotha aggadasa” yaagis.
JOH 2:11 Yesuusi ha koyro malaata Galila biittan Qaana kataman oothis; hessan ba gitatetha bessis. Iya tamaareti iya ammanidosona.
JOH 2:12 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi ba aayera, ba ishataranne ba tamaaretara issife Qifirnahooma katamaa bidi guutha gallas gam7is.
JOH 2:13 Ayhudeti bonchiya Paasika Ba7aale gallasay matatin Yesuusi Yerusalaame bis.
JOH 2:14 Bidi xoossa keethan boorata, miizata, dorsatanne holleta bayzeysatanne banta oydiyan uttidi miishe laammeyisata demmis.
JOH 2:15 I xurqafe dooqidi asaa ubbaa enta mehetara Xoossa Keethafe gooddidi kare kessis. Miishe laammeyisata xarpheezataka aathi yeggidi enta miishiya laallis.
JOH 2:16 Holle bayzeyisata, “Ha holleta haysafe kessite; ta Aawa keetha giya oothopite” yaagis.
JOH 2:17 Iya tamaareti Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Taani ne keethas mishetiya mishay tana tamada xuuggees” geetetidi xaafetidaysa akeekidosona.
JOH 2:18 Hessafe guye, Ayhudeti zaaridi, “Ne haysa oothanaw new maati de7eysas nuna ay malaata oothada bessanee?” yaagidosona.
JOH 2:19 Yesuusi, “Ha Xoossa Keetha laallite; taani heedzu gallasan zaarada keexana” yaagis.
JOH 2:20 Qassika Ayhudeti, “Ha Xoossa Keetha keexanaw oytamanne usupun laythi ekis, shin neeni heedzu gallasan keexanee?” yaagidosona.
JOH 2:21 Shin Yesuusi odiya Xoossa Keethay ba asatethaba.
JOH 2:22 Hessa gisho, Yesuusi hayqope dendidaape guye iya tamaareti I hessa gidaysa akeekidosona. Qassi enti Geeshsha maxaafan xaafetidaysanne Yesuusi odidaysa ammanidosona.
JOH 2:23 Yesuusi Paasika bonchiya bessan Yerusalaamen de7ishin, I oothida malaatata be7idi daro asay iya ammanidosona.
JOH 2:24 Shin Yesuusi asaa ubbaa eriya gisho enta ammanibena.
JOH 2:25 Asa wozanan de7iyaba I ba huuphen eriya gisho asaba oonika iyaw odana mela koshshibeenna.
JOH 3:1 Farsaaweta yaraape gidida, Ayhudeta halaqay, Niqodimoosa geetetiya issi addey de7ees.
JOH 3:2 Niqodimoosi qamma Yesuusako yidi, “Astamaariyaw, neeni Xoossay kiitida astamaare gideysa nuuni eroos. Ayis giiko, Xoossay iyara doonna ixiko ha neeni oothiya malaata oothanaw danda7iya asi baawa” yaagis.
JOH 3:3 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani new tuma odayis; oonika zaari yeletonna ixiko Xoossaa kawotethaa be7anaw danda7enna” yaagis.
JOH 3:4 Niqodimoosi, “Ceega asi waanidi zaari yeletanaw danda7ii? Ba aaye ulo simmi gelidi zaari yeletanaw danda7ii?” yaagis.
JOH 3:5 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani new tuma odayis; oonika haathafenne Geeshsha Ayyaanape yeletonna ixiko, Xoossaa kawotethaa gelanaw danda7enna.
JOH 3:6 Asho na7atethi aawupenne aayipe yees; Xoossaa na7atethi Geeshsha Ayyaanape imetees.
JOH 3:7 Taani, ‘Hinte zaari yeletanaw bessees’ gada hintew odida gisho neeni malaaletofa.
JOH 3:8 Carkoy ba koyida bessi carkees. Neeni iya kooshincha si7asape attishin, I awupe yaako woyko aw biyako eraka. Ayyaanape yeletida ubbay hessa mela” yaagis.
JOH 3:9 Yaatin Niqodimoosi, “Hessi waanidi hananaw danda7ii?” yaagidi oychis.
JOH 3:10 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Neeni Isra7eeleta astamaare gidashe haysa erikii?
JOH 3:11 Taani new tuma odayis; nu eriyaba odoosinne be7idaba markatoos, shin nu markatethaa hinte ekeketa.
JOH 3:12 Taani hintew sa7aba odin hinte ammanonnaba gidiko saloba odin waatidi ammananee?
JOH 3:13 Salope wodhida Asa Na7aape attishin, salo keyday oonika baawa; [salon de7iya Asa Na7ay tana”] yaagis.
JOH 3:14 Musey mela biittan Naase birata shooshi kaqidaysada tana ammanida ubbay merinaa de7uwa ekana mela Asa Na7ay dhoqu gaanaw bessees.
JOH 3:16 Xoossaa Na7aa ammaniya ubbay merinaa de7uwa laattanaape attishin, dhayonna mela Xoossay ha alamiya daro dosida gisho ba issi Na7aa immis.
JOH 3:17 Xoossay ba Na7aa ha alamiya kiittiday alamiya pirdanaw gidonashin alamiya iya baggara ashshanaasa.
JOH 3:18 Na7aa ammaniya oonika pirdetenna, shin Na7aa ammanonna oonika issi Xoossaa Na7aa ammanibona gisho ha77i pirdetis.
JOH 3:19 Pirdayka haysa: poo7oy alamiya yis, shin asaa oosoy iita gidiya gisho asay poo7uwape aathidi dhumaa dosees.
JOH 3:20 Iitabaa oothiya oonika poo7o ixees. Ayis giiko, ba oosoy qonconna mela poo7uwako yeenna.
JOH 3:21 Shin tuma oothiya oonika Xoossay kiitidaysada I oothidaysa poo7oy qoncisana mela poo7uwako yees.
JOH 3:22 Hessafe guye, Yesuusinne iya tamaareti Yihuda biitta bidosona. Yesuusi yan xammaqishe entara guutha wode uttis.
JOH 3:23 Qassi Yohaanisi Saleema matan de7iya Henoona giya bessan gidiya haathi de7iya gisho asaa yan xammaqees. Asayka yaa bidi xammaqetosona.
JOH 3:24 He wode Yohaanisi buroo qashetibeenna.
JOH 3:25 Hessafe guye, Yohaanisa tamaaretinne issi Ayhude addey geeshsho wogabaa palamidosona.
JOH 3:26 Enti Yohaanisako bidi, “Astamaariyaw, Yordaanose Shaafape hefinthan neera de7eysi, neeni iyabaa markatidaysi, Heko xammaqees. Asa ubbayka iyako boosona” yaagidosona.
JOH 3:27 Yohaanisi zaaridi, “Xoossay immonna asi aybibaaka ekanaw danda7enna.
JOH 3:28 ‘Taani Kiristoosa gidike, shin iyape sinthe kiitetas’ gidaysas taw hinte, hinte huuphen marka.
JOH 3:29 Gelos giigidaara ekenaw giigidaysasa. Ekeysa laggey iya matan eqidi I geysa si7iya wode daro ufaytees. Hessa gisho, haysi ta ufaysay poletis.
JOH 3:30 I gitatanaw taani guuxanaw bessees” yaagis.
JOH 3:31 Bollafe yeysi ubbaafe bolla. Sa7ape bentidaysi sa7aba. I sa7aba odees. Salope yeysi ubbaafe bolla.
JOH 3:32 I ba be7idabaanne si7idaba markatees, shin iya markatethaa ekey baawa.
JOH 3:33 Iya markatethaa ekiya oonika Xoossay tuma gideysa qoncisees.
JOH 3:34 Xoossay ba geeshsha Ayyaana iyaw kumethi immiya gisho Xoossay kiittidaysi Xoossaa qaala odees.
JOH 3:35 Aaway ba Na7aa dosidi ubbaba iya kushen wothis.
JOH 3:36 Na7aa ammaniya uraas merinaa de7oy de7ees. Shin Na7aa ammanonaysa bolla Xoossaa hanqoy de7eesipe attishin, I de7o demmenna.
JOH 4:1 Yesuusi Yohaanisape daro kaalliya asaa baako shiisheysanne xammaqeysa Farsaaweti si7idosona.
JOH 4:2 Gidikoka Yesuusa tamaareti xammaqidosonape attishin, Yesuusi oonaka xammaqibeenna.
JOH 4:3 Yesuusi asay iyabaa geysa si7ida wode Yihudape dendidi Galila bis.
JOH 4:4 I, Galila bishe Samaarera aadhanaysi attonnaba gidis.
JOH 4:5 Hessa gisho, Yayqoobi ba na7aa Yoosefas immida gadiya matan de7iya Sikaare geetetiya Samaare katamaa bis.
JOH 4:6 He bessan Yayqooba haatha ollay de7ees. Yesuusi hemethan daaburidi he haatha olla matan uttis. He wode sa7i usupun saate heera.
JOH 4:7 Issi Samaare katamaa maccas he ollaafe haathe tikanaw yasu. Yesuusi he maccaseeko, “Tana haathe ushsharki” yaagis.
JOH 4:8 He wode Yesuusa tamaareti kathi shammanaw katama bidosonashin.
JOH 4:9 He maccasiya zaarada, “Neeni Ayhude ase gidashe, Samaare maccas gidiya tana waanada haathe ushsha gay?” yaagasu. Hessa iya giday Ayhudeti Samaaretara gahetonna gishosa.
JOH 4:10 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Neeni Xoossa imotanne haathe tana ushsha geysi ooneko eridaba gidiyako iya ne woossana; ika new de7o immiya haathi immanashin” yaagis.
JOH 4:11 Maccasiya zaarada, “Godaw, new duuqiyabay baawa; ollayka ziqa. Yaatin, de7o immiya haathi ne awupe ekanee?
JOH 4:12 Nuus ha haatha olla immida nu aawa Yayqoobape neeni aadhay? I, iya naytinne iya mehey ha ollaafe uyidosona” yaagasu.
JOH 4:13 Yesuusi, “Ha haathaafe uyida oonika zaari saamotana.
JOH 4:14 Shin taani immana haatha uyaa oonika ubbaka saamotenna. Taani immiya haathay iya giddon merinaa de7o immiya goggiya pulto gidana” yaagis.
JOH 4:15 Maccasiya zaarada, “Godaw, taani saamotonna melanne haathe tikanaw ha bessaa yoonna mela taw he haatha imma” yaagasu.
JOH 4:16 Yesuusi iiko, “Bada ne azinaa xeegada ya” yaagis.
JOH 4:17 Maccasiya zaarada, “Taw azini baawa” yaagasu. Yesuusi iiko, “Taw azini baawa gashe balabaka.
JOH 4:18 New kase ichashu azinati de7oosona. Ha77i neera de7iya addey ne azina gidenna. Neeni ha77i tuma odadasa” yaagis.
JOH 4:19 Maccasiya zaarada, “Godaw, neeni nabe gideysa taani eras.
JOH 4:20 Nu aawati ha zumaa bolla Xoossaa goyinnidosona. Shin hinte Ayhudeti asi Xoossas goyinnanaw bessiya bessay Yerusalaamena geeta” yaagasu.
JOH 4:21 Yesuusi, “Ha maccasete tana ammana; ha zumaa bolla woyko Yerusalaamen Aawas hinte goyinnona wodey yaana.
JOH 4:22 Hinte Samaareti eronnaysa goyinneta. Shin nuuni atotethay Ayhudepe yaa gisho nu ereysa goyinnoos.
JOH 4:23 Shin Aawas tuman goyinneysati Ayyaananinne tumatethan goyinnana wodey matatis; ha77ika gakis. Hiza, Aaway koyey haysa mela ogiyan goyinneyisata.
JOH 4:24 Xoossay Ayyaana; iyaw goyinneysati Ayyaananinne tumatethan goyinnanaw bessees” yaagis.
JOH 4:25 Maccasiya zaarada, “Kiristoosi yaanaysa taani erayis. I yaa wode nuus ubbaba odana” yaagasu.
JOH 4:26 Yesuusi, “Ha neera odetey taani iya” yaagis.
JOH 4:27 Enti odetishin, Yesuusa tamaareti bida bessaafe simmidosona. Yesuusi maccasara odetishin enti be7idi daro malaaletidosona. Shin maccaseeko, “Ay koyay?” Woyko Yesuusako, “Iira ayis odetay?” giday oonika baawa.
JOH 4:28 Hessafe guye, maccasiya ba haatha otuwa aggada guye katamaa bada asaako,
JOH 4:29 “Taani oothidaba ubbaa taw odida addiya be7anaw yedhite. I Kiristoosa gidandesha?” yaagasu.
JOH 4:30 Asay katamaape keyidi Yesuusako bidosona.
JOH 4:31 Hessi hanishin, iya tamaareti Yesuusako, “Guuthaba marki” yaagidi woossidosona.
JOH 4:32 Shin I, “Taw hinte eronna kathi ta meysi de7ees” yaagis.
JOH 4:33 Hessa gisho, iya tamaareti banta giddon, “Iyaw miyaba asi ehonna aggenna” yaagidosona.
JOH 4:34 Yesuusi entako, “Ta kathay tana kiittidaysa sheniya oothanaysanne iya oosuwa polanaysa.
JOH 4:35 Hinte, ‘Oyddu ageenape guye kathay caketana’ geeketiyee? Shin taani hintew odayis; kathay kaxidi shiishoos gakidaysa loythi xeellite.
JOH 4:36 Zereysinne cakeysi issife ufaytana mela cakeysi damooziya ekees qassi kathaa merinaa de7os shiishees.
JOH 4:37 Hiza, ‘Issoy zerees; hankoy qassi cakees’ giya oday tuma.
JOH 4:38 Hinte daaburiboonaysa shiishana mela taani hintena kiittas. Harati oothi daaburidasuwan gelidi hinte enta daabura ayfiya ekideta” yaagis.
JOH 4:39 Maccasiya, “I, taani oothida ubbaba odis” gada markatida gisho he kataman de7iya Samaare asaape daroti Yesuusa ammanidosona.
JOH 4:40 Samaare asay Yesuusako yidi, banta matan gam7ana mela Yesuusa woossin I yan nam7u gallas uttis.
JOH 4:41 I odiya qaala gisho kaseysafe daro asay ammanidosona.
JOH 4:42 Qassi enti maccaseeko, “Ha77i nu ammaney nu huuphen I geysa si7ida gishosafe attishin, neeni markatida gishosa gidenna. Qassi I tuma ha alamiya ashsheysa gideysa nuuni erida” yaagidosona.
JOH 4:43 Nam7u gallasape guye, Yesuusi yaape keyidi Galila biitta bis.
JOH 4:44 Yesuusi ba huuphen, “Nabey ba biittan bonchetenna” yaagidi kasetidi odis.
JOH 4:45 Yesuusi Galila gakida wode Galila asay iya mokidosona. Ayis giiko, Paasika Ba7aale bonchiya gallas enti Yerusalaamen de7iya gisho I oothidaba ubbaa be7idosona.
JOH 4:46 Yesuusi haatha woyne ushshi laammida bessaa, Galilan de7iya Qaana katama bis. Qifirnahooman kawo keethan oothiya issi shuumas na7ay hargetis.
JOH 4:47 Yesuusi Yihudape Galila yidaysa he shuumay si7idi iyako yis. Hayqanaw matida ba na7aa bidi pathana mela Yesuusa woossis.
JOH 4:48 Yesuusi shuumako, “Xoossay oothiya malaatatanne oorathabata be7onna de7ishe hinte ubbaraka ammaneketa” yaagis.
JOH 4:49 Shuumay zaaridi, “Godaw, ta na7ay hayqonna de7ishin taara yedharki” yaagis.
JOH 4:50 Yesuusi, “Ne soo ba; ne na7ay paxana” yaagis. He shuumay Yesuusi gidaysa ammanidi ba soo bis.
JOH 4:51 I ba soo bishin iya aylleti iyako yishe iyara ogen gahetidi, “Ne na7ay paxis” gidoosona.
JOH 4:52 I ba aylleta ba na7aas ay saaten lo77idaako oychis. Enti zaaridi, “Zine laapun saaten mishay aggis” yaagidosona.
JOH 4:53 Na7aa aaway Yesuusi baako, “Ne na7ay paxana” giday he saatiyan gideysa akeekis. Hessa gisho, inne iya soo asa ubbay ammanidosona.
JOH 4:54 Hessi Yesuusi Yihudape Galila yidi oothida nam7antho malaata.
JOH 5:1 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi Ayhudeti bonchiya baaliya bonchanaw Yerusalaame bis.
JOH 5:2 Yerusalaamen Dorsa Pengiya matan Ibraawetho doonan Beetesayda giya teqetida haathi de7ees. He teqeti uttida haatha matan ichashu shempiya bessati de7oosona.
JOH 5:3 [Hessan haathay qaaxanaysa naagiya] daro harganchoti, qooqeti, wobbetinne gundati zin7idosona.
JOH 5:4 [Ayis giiko, issi issi toho Godaa kiitanchoy teqetida haathan wodhidi haatha qaathees. Haathay qaaxiya wode koyro gelida uray bana oykida ay hargefeka paxees.]
JOH 5:5 He bessan hastamanne hospun laythi hargetida issi addey de7ees.
JOH 5:6 Yesuusi yan zin7ida addiya be7idi, qassi daro wode hargetidaysa eridi addiyako, “Paxanaw koyay?” yaagis.
JOH 5:7 Harganchoy zaaridi, “Godaw, haathay qaaxiya wode tana haathan yeggiya asi baawa. Taani gelana haniya wode haray taape sinthatidi geli kichees” yaagis.
JOH 5:8 Yesuusi iyako, “Denda eqa; ne algaa tookada ba” yaagis.
JOH 5:9 Addey iiraka paxis; ba algaa tookidi bis. Hessi Sambaata gallasan hanis.
JOH 5:10 Hessa gisho, Ayhudeti paxida addiyako, “Hachi sa7i Sambaata; neeni ne algaa tookeysi woga gidenna” yaagidosona.
JOH 5:11 Shin addey, “Tana pathidaysi, ne algaa tookada ba gis” yaagidi zaaris.
JOH 5:12 Enti iyako, “Nena, ne algaa tookada ba giday I oonee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
JOH 5:13 Shin Yesuusi he bessan daro asaa giddora erisonna kanthidi bida gisho addey bana pathiday ooneko erenna.
JOH 5:14 Yesuusi guyepe he addiya xoossa keethan demmidi, “Heko, neeni paxadasa; haysafe iitabay nena gakonna mela zaarada nagara oothofa” yaagis.
JOH 5:15 Hessafe guye, addey bidi bana pathidaysi Yesuusa gididaysa Ayhudetas odis.
JOH 5:16 Yesuusi hessa Sambaata gallas oothida gisho, Ayhudeti Yesuusa goodda oykidosona.
JOH 5:17 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ta Aaway ubba wode oothees; taka oothanaw bessees” yaagis.
JOH 5:18 Yesuusi Sambaata bonchona gisho xalaalas gidonashin Xoossay ba Aawa gidi bana Xoossara giigisida gisho, Ayhudeti iya wodhanaw kasepe minthidi koydosona.
JOH 5:19 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; Na7ay barka aykoka oothanaw danda7enna. I ba Aaway oothishin be7oysa xalaala oothees. Aaway ootheysa Na7ayka oothees.
JOH 5:20 Aaway ba Na7aa dosiya gisho I oothiya ooso ubbaa ba Na7aa bessees. Hinte malaaletana mela I haysafe aadhiya ooso ba Na7aa bessaana.
JOH 5:21 Aaway hayqidaysata hayqope denthidi entaw de7o immeysada Na7ayka ba koyeysatas de7o immees.
JOH 5:22 Aaway Na7aas pirda maata ubbaa immispe attishin, I oonaka pirdenna.
JOH 5:23 Asa ubbay Aawa boncheysada Na7aaka bonchana. Na7aa bonchona oonika Na7aa kiitida Aawaka bonchenna.
JOH 5:24 “Taani hintew tuma odayis; ta qaala si7eysasinne tana kiittidaysa ammaneysas merinaa de7oy de7ees. I hayqope de7on pinnida gisho pirdetenna.
JOH 5:25 Taani hintew tuma odayis; hayqida asay Xoossaa Na7aa qaala si7iya wodey yaana; hessika ha77i. He qaala si7ey de7on daana.
JOH 5:26 Aaway de7os pulto gididaysada Na7aaka de7os pulto oothis.
JOH 5:27 Na7ay Asa Na7a gidiya gisho Aaway Na7aas pirda maata immis.
JOH 5:28 “Duufon de7eysati iya qaala si7idi dendiya wodey yaana gisho haysan malaaletofite.
JOH 5:29 Lo77o oothidaysati de7on daanaw qassi iita oothidaysati pirda ekanaw duufope dendana.
JOH 5:30 “Taani ta maatan aybibaaka oothanaw danda7ike. Xoossay taw odidaysada pirdayis. Taani tana kiittidaysi koyaba oothaysipe attishin, ta koyaba oothonna gisho ta pirday tuma.
JOH 5:31 “Taani tabaa markatiko ta markatethay tuma gidenna.
JOH 5:32 Tabaa markatiya hari de7ees; I tabaa markateysi tuma gideysa taani erayis.
JOH 5:33 “Hinte Yohaanisako ase kiittin I tumaas markatis.
JOH 5:34 Taani hessa hintew odey, hinte attana mela gadape attishin, asa markatethi taw koshshin gidenna.
JOH 5:35 Yohaanisi muqaadada eexishe poo7is. Hinte guutha wode iya poo7uwan ufaytideta.
JOH 5:36 “Shin taw Yohaanisape aadhiya marki de7ees. Taani oothana mela ta Aaway taw immida oosoti tabaa markatoosona; Aaway tana kiittidaysa qoncisosona.
JOH 5:37 “Qassi tana kiitida Aawayka ba huuphen tabaa markatees. Hinte iya qaala ubbaraka si7ibeeketa woyko iya malaa be7ibeeketa.
JOH 5:38 I kiittidaysa hinte ammanonna gisho iya qaalay hinte wozanan baawa.
JOH 5:39 “Geeshsha Maxaafatape merinaa de7o demmanabaa hintew daanin enta pilgeeta; enti tabaa markatoosona.
JOH 5:40 Shin hinte de7o demmanaw taako yaanaw koyeketa.
JOH 5:41 “Asape taani boncho koyke.
JOH 5:42 Shin taani hinte wozanan Xoossaa siiqoy baynaysa erayis.
JOH 5:43 Taani ta Aawa maatan yas, shin tana mokibeketa. Haray ba maatan yaa wode iya mokeeta.
JOH 5:44 Hinte issoy issuwafe boncho koyeysati, issi Xoossaafe yaa galata ekanaw koyonnaysati, waanidi tana ammananaw danda7eetii?
JOH 5:45 “Taani ta Aawa sinthan hintena mootiyaba hintew daanopo. Hintena mootanay hinte ufaysan naagiya Muse.
JOH 5:46 Hinte Muse ammanidaba gidiyako I tabaa xaafida gisho tanaka ammananashin.
JOH 5:47 Shin hinte I xaafidaysa ammanonna ixiko ta qaala waatidi ammananee?” yaagis.
JOH 6:1 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi Xibradoosa geetetiya Galila Abbaafe hefinthi pinnis.
JOH 6:2 I harganchota pason oothida malaata be7ida gisho, daro asay iya kaallidosona.
JOH 6:3 Yesuusi zumaa bolla keyidi, yan ba tamaaretara issife uttis.
JOH 6:4 Ayhudeti bonchiya Paasika Ba7aale gallasay gakis.
JOH 6:5 Yesuusi daro asay baako yeysa be7idi Filphoosako, “Ha asaa ubbaa muzanaw gidiya kathi awupe shammanee?” yaagis.
JOH 6:6 I hessa Filphoosa paacanaw gisipe attishin, I ba huuphen ay oothaneko erees.
JOH 6:7 Filphoosi zaaridi Yesuusako, “Hari attoshin, Huuphen huuphen, issi issi barsi gathanaw, nam7u xeetu dinaaren uythu shamminka gidenna” yaagis.
JOH 6:8 Qassi Yesuusa tamaaretape issoy, Simoon Phexroosa ishay Indiriyasi,
JOH 6:9 “Ichashu banga uythinne nam7u molo oykida issi na7ay haysan de7ees, shin ha asa ubbaas hessi ay maaddanee?” yaagis.
JOH 6:10 Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Asaa utisite” yaagis. He bessan daro maati de7ees; asa ubbay uttis. Adde asaa tayboy ichashu mukulu gidana.
JOH 6:11 Yesuusi uythaa ekidi Xoossaa galati simmidi yan uttida asaas gishis. Moluwaka ekidi hessada oothidi immin, asay ba koydaysa mela mis.
JOH 6:12 Enti ubbay kallidaape guye, Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Issibayka iitonna mela attida tiifiya shiishite” yaagis.
JOH 6:13 Hessa gisho, enti ubbaa shiishidosona. Asay min attida banga uytha tiifiya shiishidi tammanne nam7u gayta kunthidosona.
JOH 6:14 Asay Yesuusi oothida malaatata be7ida wode, “Haysi tuma ha alamiya yaana geetetida nabiya” yaagidosona.
JOH 6:15 Yesuusi enti iya oykidi wolqan kawo oothanaw haneysa eridi, barka zumaa bolla zaaridi keyis.
JOH 6:16 Sa7ay omarsida wode Yesuusa tamaareti abbaako wodhidosona.
JOH 6:17 Sa7ay qammida gishonne Yesuusi buroo entako yiboona gisho iya tamaareti wogolon gelidi abba pinnidi Qifirnahooma baanaw dendidosona.
JOH 6:18 Wolqaama carkoy carkida gisho abbay qaaxees.
JOH 6:19 Ichashu woyko usupun kilo mitire gideysa mela enti abba pidhidi bidaape guye, Yesuusi abba bollara hemetishe yeysa be7idi yayyidosona.
JOH 6:20 Shin I, “Babofite, tana” yaagis.
JOH 6:21 Enti ufaytidi iya wogoluwan gelsidosona; iiraka wogoloy enti biya abba gaxa gakis.
JOH 6:22 Wontetha gallas abbaafe hefinthan attida daro asay issi wogolo xalaali de7eysa be7idosona. Yesuusi ba tamaaretara wogoluwan gelidi, entara boonnaysanne enti bantarka bidaysa akeekidosona.
JOH 6:23 Shin Xibradoosape hara wogoloti Yesuusi Xoossaa galatin, asay uythaa mida bessaa yidosona.
JOH 6:24 Asay Yesuusi woyko iya tamaareti yan baynaysa be7idi, Yesuusa koyanaw wogolotan gelidi Qifirnahooma bidosona.
JOH 6:25 Asay Yesuusa abbaafe hefinthan demmida wode, “Astamaariyaw, haa awude yadii?” yaagis.
JOH 6:26 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; hinte tana koyey uythi midi kallida gishosafe attishin, malaata be7ida gishosa gidenna.
JOH 6:27 Samiya kathas oothopite, shin merinaa de7o immiya kathas oothite. Xoossaa Aaway I oothana mela iyaw maata immida gisho he katha Asa Na7ay hintew immana” yaagis.
JOH 6:28 Yaatin enti, “Nuuni Xoossaa oosuwa oothanaw ay oothanee?” yaagidi Yesuusa oychidosona.
JOH 6:29 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Hinte oothana mela Xoossay koyiya oosoy haysa: I kiittidaysa ammanite” yaagis.
JOH 6:30 Enti zaaridi, “Nuuni be7idi, nena ammanana mela ay malaata ne bessanee? Ne ay oothanee?
JOH 6:31 Geeshsha Maxaafan, ‘Enti maana mela uythu salope immis’ geetetidi xaafetidaysada nu aawati mela biittan manna midosona” yaagidosona.
JOH 6:32 Yesuusi, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; hintew salope tuma uythaa immiday ta Aawape attishin, Muse gidenna.
JOH 6:33 Hiza, Xoossay immiya uythay salope wodhidaysi alamiyas de7o immeysa” yaagis.
JOH 6:34 Enti zaaridi, “Godaw, nuus he uythaa ubba wode imma” yaagidosona.
JOH 6:35 Yesuusi, “Taani de7o immiya uythaa; taako yaa oonika ubbaraka koshatenna. Qassi tana ammaniya uray ubbaraka saamotenna.
JOH 6:36 Shin taani hintew odas; hinte tana be7ideta, shin ammaneketa.
JOH 6:37 Ta Aaway taw immiya ubbay taako yaana; qassi taako yaa oonaka kare yeddike.
JOH 6:38 Taani ta koyaba oothanaw gidonashin tana kiittidaysi koyaba oothanaw salope yas.
JOH 6:39 Tana kiittidaysi koyey haysa: taani I taw immida ubbataka wursetha gallas hayqope denthana melape attishin, issuwaka dhaysana mela koyenna.
JOH 6:40 Hiza, ta Aaway koyey hessa: Na7aa be7idi ammaniya ubbay merinaa de7uwa ekana; taani he ubbaa wursetha gallas merinaa de7os hayqope denthana” yaagis.
JOH 6:41 Yesuusi, “Taani salope wodhida uythaa” gida gisho, Ayhudeti iya bolla zuuzumidosona.
JOH 6:42 Enti, “Haysi nuuni iya aawanne iya aayiw eriya Yoosefa Na7aa Yesuusa gidennee? Yaatin, I waanidi, ‘Taani salope wodhas’ gaanaw danda7ii?” yaagidosona.
JOH 6:43 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Issoy issuwara zuuzuntha aggite.
JOH 6:44 Tana kiitida ta Aaway taako ehiya asape attishin, taako yaanaw danda7iya oonika baawa. Taani wursetha gallas iya merinaa de7os hayqope denthana.
JOH 6:45 Nabeti, ‘Xoossay asa ubbaa tamaarsana’ yaagidi xaafidosona. Aawa si7eysinne iyape tamaariya oonika taako yees.
JOH 6:46 Xoossaa matape yidaysafe attishin, Aawa be7iday oonika baawa; iya xalaali Aawa be7is.
JOH 6:47 “Taani hintew tuma odayis; tana ammaniya oodeska merinaa de7oy de7ees.
JOH 6:48 Taani de7o immiya uythaa.
JOH 6:49 Hinte aawati mela biittan manna midosona, shin hayqidosona.
JOH 6:50 Salope yaa uythay haysa; he uythaa miya oonika hayqenna.
JOH 6:51 Salope yida de7o uythay tana. Oonika ha uythaa miiko merinaw daana. Qassi ha alamey de7on daana mela taani hintew immana uythay ta ashuwa” yaagis.
JOH 6:52 Ayhudeti, “Ha addey ba ashuwa nu maana mela nuus waatidi immanaw danda7ii?” yaagidi banta giddon palamidosona.
JOH 6:53 Hessa gisho, Yesuusi entako, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; Asa Na7aa ashuwa, hinte moonna ixiko, qassi iya suuthaa hinte uyonna ixiko, hintew de7oy baawa.
JOH 6:54 Ta ashuwa miya uraasinne ta suuthaa uyaa uraas merinaa de7oy de7ees. Taani wursetha gallas iya hayqope denthana.
JOH 6:55 Ta ashoy tuma kathi; ta suuthayka tuma ushshu.
JOH 6:56 Ta ashuwa miya uraynne ta suuthaa uyaa uray tanan de7ees; taka iyan de7ayis.
JOH 6:57 De7o Aaway tana kiittin, taani iya baggara de7on de7eysada, tana miya urayka ta gaason de7on daana.
JOH 6:58 Salope wodhida uythay haysa: hinte aawati midi hayqida manna mela gidenna; ha uythaa miya uray merinaw daana” yaagis.
JOH 6:59 Yesuusi Qifirnahooma kataman ayhude woosa keethan haysa tamaarsis.
JOH 6:60 Yesuusa tamaaretape dariya baggay hessa si7ida wode, “Haysi gelonna timirte; haysi ooddes gelii?” yaagidosona.
JOH 6:61 Yesuusi ba tamaareti hessas zuuzumidaysa eridi, “Haysi hintena dhubbii?
JOH 6:62 Yaatin, Asa Na7ay kase de7iyasuwa pude keyishin hinte be7idi woygandetii?
JOH 6:63 Geeshsha Ayyaanay de7o immees; asa wolqi aykoka maaddenna. Ta hintew odiya qaalay de7o immiya Geeshsha Ayyaanape yees.
JOH 6:64 Shin hinte giddon ammanonaysati de7oosona” yaagis. Ammanonaysati oonanteko Yesuusi koyrope doomidi erees. Qassi bana aathidi immanay ooneko erees.
JOH 6:65 Qassika Yesuusi, “Aaway ba goonna oonika taako yaanaw danda7enna gada taani odiday hessa gishosa” yaagis.
JOH 6:66 Hessa gaason, Yesuusa kaalleysatape daroti iya aggidi guye simmidosona; zaari iya kaallibookona.
JOH 6:67 Yesuusi ba tammanne nam7u tamaaretako, “Hinteka aggidi baanaw koyeetii?” yaagidi oychis.
JOH 6:68 Simoon Phexroosi zaaridi, “Godaw, nuuni oodeko baanee? New merinaa de7o immiya qaalay de7ees.
JOH 6:69 Neeni Xoossaa Geeshshaa gideysa nuuni ammanoosinne eroos” yaagis.
JOH 6:70 Yesuusi entako, “Taani hintena tammanne nam7ata doorabikina? Shin hintefe issoy Xalahe” yaagis.
JOH 6:71 Yesuusi hessa giday Simoona Na7aa Asqoroota Yihudasa. Yihudi Yesuusa aathidi immanaw de7iya tammanne nam7u tamaaretape issuwa.
JOH 7:1 Hessafe guye, Ayhudeti Yesuusa wodhanaw koyiya gisho I Yihuda aggidi Galilan simeretees.
JOH 7:2 Ayhudeti bonchiya Shaqara Ba7aaley bonchetanaw matis.
JOH 7:3 Hessa gisho, Yesuusa ishati, “Ne tamaareti neeni oothiya malaatata be7ana mela haysafe dendada Yihuda biitta ba.
JOH 7:4 Baw eretanaw koya asi oonika ba oosuwa genthenna. Neeni haysata oothada nebaa alamiya erisa” yaagidosona.
JOH 7:5 Iya ishati hessa giday iyan ammanibona gishosa.
JOH 7:6 Yesuusi entako, “Taw inje wodey gakibeenna, shin hintew ubba wodey injetees.
JOH 7:7 Alamey hintena ixanaw danda7enna, shin taani alamiya oosoy iita gideysa markatiya gisho tana ixees.
JOH 7:8 Hinte baaliya biite; ta wodey gakiboonna gisho taani baaliya biike” yaagis.
JOH 7:9 I hessa gidi Galilan attis.
JOH 7:10 Iya ishati ba7aale bonchanaw bidaape guye Yesuusi oonaka erisonna qosan he bessaa bis.
JOH 7:11 Ayhudeti ba7aale bonchiya bessan, “I awun de7ii?” yaagidi iya koydosona.
JOH 7:12 Asay kalkashidi iyabaa odetoosona. Baggay, “I lo77o asi” giya wode harati qassi, “Akay, I asaa balethees” yaagosona.
JOH 7:13 Shin Ayhude halaqatas yayyida gisho oonika iyabaa qoncen odetenna.
JOH 7:14 Baaliya bonchidi giddo gathiya wode Yesuusi Xoossa Keethi bidi tamaarso oykis.
JOH 7:15 Ayhudeti, “Ha addey timirte tamaaronna haysa ubbaa waati eridee?” yaagidi malaaletidosona.
JOH 7:16 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ta tamaarsiya timirtey tana kiitida Xoossaa matape yaa timirtefe attishin, tabaa gidenna.
JOH 7:17 Xoossaa sheniya oothanaw koyiya oonika ha timirtey Xoossaa matape yaakonne woyko taani taape odiyako erana.
JOH 7:18 Babaa odiya oonika ba huuphe boncho koyees. Shin bana kiittidaysa bonchuwa koyiya oonika I tumancho; iyan wordoy baawa.
JOH 7:19 Musey hintew higgiya immis, shin hintefe oonika higgiya naagibeenna. Yaatin ayis tana wodhanaw koyeetii?” yaagis.
JOH 7:20 Asay zaaridi, “Nena Xalahey oykis; nena wodhanaw oonee koyey?” yaagidosona.
JOH 7:21 Yesuusi, “Taani issi malaata oothin hinte ubbay malaaletideta.
JOH 7:22 Hinte, hinte nayta qaxarana mela Musey kiittis. Shin qaxaro hinte mayzati doomidosonape attishin, Muse gidenna. Hessa gisho, hinte Sambaata gallas adde nayta qaxareeta.
JOH 7:23 Muse higgey kiitida gisho, hinte Sambaata gallas qaxariyabaa gidiko, taani issi asa kumetha asatethaa pathida gisho, taara ayis kacceetii?
JOH 7:24 Tuma pirda pirditepe attishin, asa som7o be7idi pirdofite” yaagis.
JOH 7:25 Yerusalaame asaape issoti issoti, “Enti wodhanaw koyiya uray haysa gidennee?
JOH 7:26 Heko, I qoncen odees; enti iya aykoka gookona. I Kiristoosa gideysa Ayhude halaqati tuma eridonaasha?
JOH 7:27 Kiristoosi yaa wode I awupe yaako oonika erenna, shin I awupe yidaako nu eroos” yaagidosona.
JOH 7:28 Yesuusi xoossa keethan tamaarsishe ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Tuma hinte taani oonekonne ta awupe yidaako ereetii? Taani ta maatan yabiike, shin tana kiittidaysi tumancho; hinte iya ereketa.
JOH 7:29 Shin taani I kiittin iya matape yida gisho iya erayis” yaagis.
JOH 7:30 Hessa gisho, enti iya oykanaw koydosona. Shin iya wodey buroo gakiboonna gisho oonika iya bolla kushe wothibeenna.
JOH 7:31 Shin daro asay Yesuusa ammanidi, “Kiristoosi yaa wode ha uray oothida malaatatape dariya malaata oothaneyee?” yaagidosona.
JOH 7:32 Farsaaweti daro asay Yesuusaba kalkasheysa si7idosona. Kahine halaqatinne Farsaaweti iya oythidi qashisanaw Xoossa Keethi naageysata kiittidosona.
JOH 7:33 Yesuusi, “Taani hintera guutha wode gam7ana; hessafe guye tana kiittidaysako baana.
JOH 7:34 Hinte tana koyana, shin demmeketa. Taani de7iyasuwa hinte yaanaw danda7eketa” yaagis.
JOH 7:35 Ayhudeti issoy issuwara, “Haysi nuuni demmonaso aw baana hanii? Girike kataman de7iya Ayhudetako bidi Giriketa tamaarsanaw haniyee?
JOH 7:36 ‘Hinte tana koyana, shin demmeketa’ qassi, ‘Taani de7iyasuwa hinte yaanaw danda7eketa’ guussay ay guussee?” yaagidosona.
JOH 7:37 Baaliya bonchiya gallasatape wolqaamanne wursetha gallasan Yesuusi dendidi, ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Saamotida oonika taako yidi uyo.
JOH 7:38 Tana ammaniya oonika Geeshsha Maxaafay gidaysada de7o immiya pulto haathay iyape goggana” yaagis.
JOH 7:39 I hessa giday iya ammanidaysati ekanaw de7iya Geeshsha Ayyaanaba. Yesuusi buroo bonchetiboona gisho, he wode Geeshsha Ayyaanay imetibeenna.
JOH 7:40 He asaape daroti I geysa si7idi, “Tuma haysi nabiya” yaagidosona.
JOH 7:41 Harati qassi, “Haysi Kiristoosa” yaagidosona. Shin harati qassi, “Kiristoosi Galilape waanidi keyii?
JOH 7:42 Geeshsha Maxaafay, ‘Kiristoosi Dawita sheeshape Dawiti de7ida Beeteleme katamaape yaana’ yaageneyee?” yaagidosona.
JOH 7:43 Hessa gisho, Yesuusa gaason asay banta giddon shaaketidosona.
JOH 7:44 He asaape issoti issoti iya oykanaw koydosona, shin oonika iya bolla kushe wothibeenna.
JOH 7:45 Xoossa Keetha naageysati kahine halaqatakonne Farsaawetako guye simmi yin enti, “Ayis iya ehibeketii?” yaagidi oychidosona.
JOH 7:46 Xoossa Keetha naageysati entako, “Ha addey odeteysatho oonika odetenna” yaagidi zaaridosona.
JOH 7:47 Farsaaweti zaaridi, “I hintenaka balethidee?
JOH 7:48 Ayhude halaqatape woyko Farsaawetepe iya ammanida asi de7ii?
JOH 7:49 Muse higgiya eronna ha asay baadetidaysata” yaagidosona.
JOH 7:50 Farsaawetape issoy qamma Yesuusako bida Niqodimoosi entako,
JOH 7:51 “Issi asi giyaba si7onna woyko I ay oothidaako eronna de7ishe koyrottidi iya bolla pirdeysi nu higgiyan de7ii?” yaagis.
JOH 7:52 Enti zaaridi, “Neenika qassi Galila biitta asee? Galila biittafe nabey keyonnaysa Geeshsha Maxaafape pilgada demma” yaagidosona.
JOH 7:53 Issoy issoy aggidi ba soo ba soo bis.
JOH 8:1 Shin Yesuusi Shamaho zuma bolla keyis.
JOH 8:2 Qassi wontetha gallas guura Xoossa Keethi simmis. Daro asay iyako yin uttidi enta tamaarsis.
JOH 8:3 Higge astamaaretinne Farsaaweti laymatishin oykida issi maccasiw iyako ehidosona. Enti asa ubbaa sinthan iyo essidi,
JOH 8:4 “Astamaariyaw, ha maccasiya laymatishin nu oykida.
JOH 8:5 Muse higgey hanni mela maccas shuchan cadeta hayqana mela kiittees. Yaatin, neeni woygay?” yaagidosona.
JOH 8:6 Enti hessa giday Yesuusa paacidi iya mootiyaba demmanaasa. Shin Yesuusi hokidi ba biradhen biitta bolla xaafis.
JOH 8:7 Enti iya zaari zaari oychidi aggonna ixin, pude dhoqu gidi, “Hinte giddon nagara oothiboonna asi koyrottidi iyo shuchan caddo” yaagis.
JOH 8:8 Qassika hokidi biitta bolla xaafis.
JOH 8:9 Enti hessa si7ida wode cimatape doomidi issoy issoy keyishe wuridosona. Yesuusa xalaali he bessan eqida maccaseera attis.
JOH 8:10 I pude dhoqu gidi maccaseeko, “Maccasete, asati aw bidonaa? Ne bolla pirdiday oonika baawee?” yaagis.
JOH 8:11 Maccasiya, “Godaw, oonika baawa” yaagasu. Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taanika ne bolla pirdike. Ba; zaarada nagara oothofa” yaagis.
JOH 8:12 Qassika Yesuusi asaako, “Taani alamiyas poo7o. Tana kaalliya oonika de7o immiya poo7uwa ekanaape attishin, dhuman simeretenna” yaagidi odis.
JOH 8:13 Farsaaweti, “Neeni nebaa markataasa, shin ne markatethay tuma gidenna” yaagidosona.
JOH 8:14 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani tabaa markatikoka ta markatethay tuma. Ayis giiko, taani awupe yidaako qassi aw biyako erayis, shin hinte ereketa.
JOH 8:15 Hinte asa qofan pirdeta; taani issi asa bollaka pirdike.
JOH 8:16 Taani pirdiyaba gidikoka ta pirday tuma. Ayis giiko, tana kiitida ta Aaway taara de7eesipe attishin, taani tarka de7ike.
JOH 8:17 Nam7u asa markatethi tuma gideysi hinte higgiyan xaafetis.
JOH 8:18 Taani tabaa ta huuphen markatayis; qassi tana kiitida ta Aawayka tabaa markatees” yaagis.
JOH 8:19 Enti, “Ne aaway awun de7ii?” yaagidi iya oychidosona. Yesuusi zaaridi, “Hinte tana woyko ta Aawa ereketa. Tana eridaba gidiyako, hinte ta Aawaka eranashin” yaagis.
JOH 8:20 Yesuusi xoossa keethan muxaata miishiya yeggiya saaxiney de7iya bessan hessa tamaarsis. Iya qammay buroo gakiboonna gisho oonika iya oykibeenna.
JOH 8:21 Qassika Yesuusi entako, “Taani baana; hinte tana koyana, shin hinte atotethi demmonna hinte nagaran hayqana. Taani biya bessaa hinte baanaw danda7eketa” yaagis.
JOH 8:22 Ayhude halaqati, “I, ‘Taani biya bessaa hinte baanaw danda7eketa’ yaagees. I bana barka wodhaneyee?” yaagidosona.
JOH 8:23 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Hinte garsafe; taani bollafe. Hinte ha alamiyape, taani ha alamiyape gidike.
JOH 8:24 Hinte atotethi demmonna hinte nagaran hayqana gada taani hintew odiday hessasa. ‘Taani Tana Gideysa’ hinte ammanonna ixiko hinte atotethi demmonna hinte nagaran hayqana” yaagis.
JOH 8:25 Enti, “Neeni oonee?” yaagidi oychidosona. Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani, koyrope hintew odida tana.
JOH 8:26 Taani hintebaa odada pirdiyabay darobay de7ees. Shin tana kiittidaysi tumancho; qassi taani iyape si7idaysa xalaala alamiyas odayis” yaagis.
JOH 8:27 Yesuusi ba Aawaba odeysa enti akeekibokona.
JOH 8:28 Hessa gisho, Yesuusi entako, “Hinte Asa Na7aa pude dhoqu oothiya wode Taani Tana Gideysa hinte erana. Qassika taani ta maatan aykoka oothonaysanne ta Aaway tana tamaarsidaysa odeysa hinte erana.
JOH 8:29 Tana kiittidaysi taara de7ees. Taani ubba wode iya ufaysiyabaa oothiya gisho I tana ta xalaala aggibeenna” yaagis.
JOH 8:30 Yesuusi hessa odishin si7ida daro asay iya ammanidosona.
JOH 8:31 Yesuusi bana ammanida asatako, “Hinte ta timirtiyas kiitetiko tuma tana kaalleyisata.
JOH 8:32 Hinte tumaa erana; tumayka hintena aylletethafe kessana” yaagis.
JOH 8:33 Enti zaaridi, “Nuuni Abrahaame sheeshi; nuuni oodeska aylletibooko. Neeni woygada, ‘Hinte aylletethafe keyana’ gay?” yaagidosona.
JOH 8:34 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; nagara oothiya oonika nagara aylle.
JOH 8:35 Aylley merinaw soo asaara deenna, shin na7ay merinaw soo asaara de7ees.
JOH 8:36 Na7ay hintena aylletethafe kessiko hinte aylletethafe tuma keyana.
JOH 8:37 Hinte Abrahaame sheeshi gideysa taani erayis. Shin ta qaalay hinte wozanan bayna gisho, tana wodhanaw koyeeta.
JOH 8:38 Taani ta Aaway tana bessidaysa odayis, shin hinteka hinte aawape si7idaysa ootheeta” yaagis.
JOH 8:39 Enti zaaridi, “Nu aaway Abrahaame” yaagidosona. Yesuusi entako, “Hinte Abrahaame nayta gidiyako I oothidaysa oothana.
JOH 8:40 Shin Xoossafe si7ida tumaa odida tana hinte wodhanaw koyeeta. Abrahaamey hessada oothibeenna.
JOH 8:41 Hinte, hinte aaway oothidaysa ootheeta” yaagis. Enti zaaridi, “Nuuni tuma Xoossaa nayta; nuus issi Aaway Xoossaa xalaali de7ees” yaagidosona.
JOH 8:42 Yesuusi entako, “Xoossay tuma hinte aawa gidiyako hinte tana dosana; ayis giiko, taani Xoossaa matape yada haysan de7ayis. Tana I kiittisipe attishin, taani ta maatan yabiike.
JOH 8:43 Taani geysa hinte si7anaw koyonna gisho ta giyabay hintew gelenna.
JOH 8:44 Hinte, hinte aawa Xalahe nayta. Qassi hinte, hinte aaway amotiyaba oothanaw koyeeta. I koyrope doomidi shempo wodheysa. Tumi iyan bayna gisho I tumaa ixees. Wordoy iyaw medho gidida gishonne I wordo aawa gidiya gisho wordo odetishe baape odetees.
JOH 8:45 Taani tuma odayis, shin hinte tana ammaneketa.
JOH 8:46 Hintefe, ‘Neeni nagara oothishin ta be7as’ gaanaw danda7ey oonee? Taani tuma odetiyaba gidiko tana ayis ammaneketii?
JOH 8:47 Xoossaa asi Xoossay giyaba si7ees. Hinte Xoossaa asi gidonna gisho Xoossay giyaba si7eketa” yaagis.
JOH 8:48 Ayhudeti zaaridi, “ ‘Neeni Samaare asi; nenan tuna ayyaanay de7ees’ gishe like gidoko?” yaagidosona.
JOH 8:49 Yesuusi entako “Ta bolla tuna ayyaani baawa. Taani ta Aawa bonchayis, shin hinte tana kawusheta.
JOH 8:50 Taani ta huuphe boncho koyke; taani bonchetana mela koyeysinne taw pirdeysi de7ees.
JOH 8:51 Taani hintew tuma odayis; ta qaala naagiya oonika hayqenna” yaagis.
JOH 8:52 Ayhudeti zaaridi, “Ne bolla tuna ayyaanay de7eysa nuuni ha77i erida. Abrahaamey hayqis; nabetika hayqidosona. Shin neeni, ‘Ta qaala naagiya oonika hayqenna’ yaagasa.
JOH 8:53 Neeni hayqida nu aawa Abrahaamepe aadhayee? Nabetika qassi hayqidosona. Neeni nena oona gada qopay?” yaagidosona.
JOH 8:54 Yesuusi, “Taani tana bonchiko ta bonchoy hada. Hinte, ‘Nu Xoossaa’ giya ta Aaway I tana bonchees.
JOH 8:55 Hinte iya eronna ixiko taani iya erayis. Taani iya erike giiko hinte mela wordotayis. Shin taani iya erayis; qassi iya qaalaka naagayis.
JOH 8:56 Hinte aaway Abrahaamey ta yuussaa gallasa be7idi ufaytanaw amottis; be7idika ufaytis” yaagis.
JOH 8:57 Ayhudeti zaaridi, “Hari attoshin, new ishatamu laythi kumibeenashin waanada Abrahaame be7as gay?” yaagidosona.
JOH 8:58 Yesuusi entako, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; Abrahaamey yeletanaape kase, ‘Taani Tana’ ” yaagis.
JOH 8:59 Hessa gisho, enti Yesuusa caddanaw shuchi ekidosona. Shin Yesuusi entafe geemmidi Xoossa Keethafe keyidi bis.
JOH 9:1 Yesuusi bishe yeletoosape qooqe gididi de7iya issi addiya be7is.
JOH 9:2 Iya tamaareti, “Astamaariyaw, ha addey qooqe gididi yeletana mela nagara oothiday oonee? I oothideye woyko iya yelidaysati oothidona?” yaagidi oychidosona.
JOH 9:3 Yesuusi, “Xoossaa oosoy iya bolla qoncana melape attishin, I woyko iya yelidaysati nagara oothida gisho gidenna.
JOH 9:4 Sa7i gallas de7ishin tana kiittidaysa oosuwa nu oothanaw bessees. Oonika oothanaw danda7onna qammay yees.
JOH 9:5 Taani alamiyan de7ashe alamiyas poo7o” yaagis.
JOH 9:6 Yesuusi hessa gidi sa7an cuttis. Ba cuchan guutha biitta laakothidi he urqan qooqe addiya ayfiya tiyis.
JOH 9:7 Yaatidi, “Bada Salihoome (Salihoome guussay Kiitetidaysa guussu) geetetiya teqetida haathan ne ayfiya meeceta” yaagis. Hessa gisho, addey bidi ba ayfiya meecetidi xeellishe simmis.
JOH 9:8 Addiya shoorotinne addey kase woossishin be7ida asay, “Haysi uttidi woossiya addiya gidenneyee?” yaagidosona.
JOH 9:9 Issi issi asay, “Haysi iya” yaagidosona. Harati qassi, “Akay, haysi iya daaneesipe attishin, iya gidenna” yaagidosona. Shin addey, “Ee, tana” yaagis.
JOH 9:10 Enti iyako, “Yaatin ne ayfey waanidi xeellidee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
JOH 9:11 I zaaridi, “Yesuusa geetetiya addey guutha urqa laakothidi ta ayfiya tiyidi, ‘Salihoome bada ne ayfiya meeceta’ yaagin, taani bada meecetada xeella aggas” yaagis.
JOH 9:12 Enti iyako, “I awun de7ii?” yaagidi oychidosona. Addey, “Taani erike” yaagis.
JOH 9:13 Enti kase qooqe, shin ha77i xeellida addiya Farsaawetako efidosona.
JOH 9:14 Yesuusi urqa laakothidi addiya ayfiya pathida gallasay Sambaata gallas.
JOH 9:15 Hessa gisho, addey waanidi xeellidaako Farsaaweti iya zaari oychidosona. Addey entako, “I ta ayfiyan guutha urqa tiyis. Ta ayfiya meecetada ha77i xeellayis” yaagis.
JOH 9:16 Farsaawetepe issoti issoti, “Haysa oothida addey Sambaata higgiya naagonna gisho Xoossaa matape yibeenna” yaagidosona. Shin harati, “Nagarancho asi haysa mela malaata waati oothanaw danda7ii?” yaagidi banta giddon shaaketidosona.
JOH 9:17 Hessa gisho, Farsaaweti addiyako, “I ne ayfiya xeelisida gisho ne iyabaa woygay?” yaagidosona. Addey, “I nabe” yaagis.
JOH 9:18 Ayhude halaqati, iya aayiwunne aawa xeegidi oychana gakanaw, addey kase qooqe gididaysanne ha77i I xeelleysa ammanibookona.
JOH 9:19 Enti iya aayiwunne iya aawako, “Hinte ‘Qooqe gididi yeletis’ giya hinte na7ay haysee? Yaatin, ha77i waanidi xeellidee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
JOH 9:20 Iya yelidaysati, “Haysi nu na7aa gididaysanne qooqe gididi I yeletidaysa nu eroos.
JOH 9:21 Shin ha77i I waanidi xeellidaako qassi iya ayfiya ooni pathidaako nuuni eroko. Iya oychite. I bana erida asi gidiya gisho babaa odanaw danda7ees” yaagidosona.
JOH 9:22 Iya yelidaysati hessa giday Ayhudetas yayyida gishosa. Ayis giiko, Ayhudeti, Yesuusi I Kiristoosa yaagidi markatiya asi de7iko he uraa ayhude woosa keethafe hilanaw koyrottidi zore qachidosona.
JOH 9:23 Iya yelidaysati, “I bana erida asi; iya oychite” yaagiday hessasa.
JOH 9:24 Hessa gisho, qooqe gididi yeletida addiya enti zaari xeegidi, “Tumaa odanaw Xoossan caaqa; ha addey nagarancho gideysa nu eroos” yaagidosona.
JOH 9:25 Addey zaaridi, “I nagarancho gideysa, ta erike. Taani qooqe gideysanne ha77i xeelleysa he issiba erayis” yaagis.
JOH 9:26 Enti zaaridi, “I new ay oothidee? I ne ayfiya waati pathidee?” yaagidosona.
JOH 9:27 I entako, “Taani hintew odas, shin si7ibeeketa. Ayis zaari si7anaw koyeetii? Hinteka iya tamaare gidanaw koyeetiyee?” yaagis.
JOH 9:28 Enti iya cayidi, “Ne he uraa tamaare gida; nuuni Muse tamaare.
JOH 9:29 Xoossay Muses odidaysa nuuni eroos, shin hari attoshin ha uray I awupe yidaakoka nu eroko” yaagidosona.
JOH 9:30 Addey entako, “I awupe yidaako hinte eronnaysi malaalsiyaba, shin I ta ayfiya pathis.
JOH 9:31 Xoossaa boncheysanne I koyaba oothiya uraa Xoossay si7eesipe attishin, nagaranchota si7enna.
JOH 9:32 Saloy sa7i medhetoosape qooqe gididi yeletida asa ayfe pathiday oonika baawa.
JOH 9:33 Ha addey Xoossafe kiitetiboonaba gidiyako issibaaka oothanaw danda7enna” yaagis.
JOH 9:34 Enti zaaridi, “Neeni nagaran yeletada diccidaysi nuna tamaarsanaw koyay?” yaagidosona. Iya ayhude woosa keethafe hilidosona.
JOH 9:35 Yesuusi enti addiya kessidaysa si7ida wode iya demmidi, “Asa Na7aa ammanay?” yaagidi oychis.
JOH 9:36 Addey Yesuusako, “Godaw, taani iya ammanana mela I oonee? Taw odarkii?” yaagis.
JOH 9:37 Yesuusi addiyako, “Neeni iya be7adasa; ha neera odeteysi iya” yaagis.
JOH 9:38 Addey zaaridi, “Godaw, ammanayis” yaagidi Yesuusas goyinnis.
JOH 9:39 Yesuusi, “Qooqeti xeellana melanne xeelleysati qooqana mela taani pirdanaw ha alamiya yas” yaagis.
JOH 9:40 Iyara de7iya guutha Farsaaweti hessa si7idi, “Nu qooqeyee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
JOH 9:41 Yesuusi, “Hinte qooqe gidiyako hintew nagara gidenna. Shin ha77i hinte xeelloos giya gisho hinte, hinte nagaran de7eeta” yaagis.
JOH 10:1 Yesuusi, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; dorsa girbe giddo pengera gidonna harasoora geliya oonika kaysonne panga.
JOH 10:2 Shin pengera geleysi dorsata heemmeysa.
JOH 10:3 Pengiya naageysi iyaw pengiya dooyees; dorsatika iya qaala si7oosona. I ba dorsata enta sunthan sunthan xeegees; enta kaalethidi kare kessees.
JOH 10:4 I ba dorsata kare kessidaape guye enta sinthan hemetees. Enti iya qaala eriya gisho iya kaalloosona.
JOH 10:5 Hara uraa qaala enti eronna gisho iyape baqatoosonape attishin, iya geedo kaallokona” yaagis.
JOH 10:6 Yesuusi entaw ha leemisuwa odis, shin I ay gidaako enti akeekibokona.
JOH 10:7 Zaaridi Yesuusi entako, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; taani dorsatas penge.
JOH 10:8 Taape sinthe yida ubbay kaysonne panga, shin dorsati enta si7ibookona.
JOH 10:9 Pengey tana; ta baggara geliya oonika attana. I ta baggara gelananne keyana; lo77o heemetiya bessi demmana.
JOH 10:10 Kaysoy kaysotanaw, shukanawunne dhaysanaw yeesipe attishin, harabas yeenna. Taani entaw de7oy daana melanne kumidi palahana mela yas.
JOH 10:11 “Taani lo77o henthancho; lo77o henthanchoy ba dorsata gisho ba shempuwa aathidi immees.
JOH 10:12 Une heemmiya asi dorsata godanne henthancho gidonna gisho suudhumey yaa wode be7idi dorsata aggidi bees. Hessa gisho, suudhumey dorsata oykidi laallees.
JOH 10:13 Une heemmeysi miishes heemmiya gishonne dorsatabay iya qofisonna gisho dorsata aggidi baqatees.
JOH 10:14 “Taani lo77o henthancho. Ta Aaway tana ereysada taanika ta Aawa erayis. Hessadaka, taani ta dorsata erayis; ta dorsatika tana eroosona. Taani ta dorsata gisho ta shempuwa aatha immayis.
JOH 10:16 Ha wudiyan bayna hara dorsati taw de7oosona. Taani entaka ehanaw bessees. Enti ta qaala si7ana; enti issi wude gidana; henthanchoyka issuwa.
JOH 10:17 “Taani ta shempuwa aatha immada zaara ekiya gisho ta Aaway tana dosees.
JOH 10:18 Ta dosada ta shempuwa aatha immaysipe attishin, taape oonika ekenna. Taani ta shempuwa aatha immanawunne zaara ekanaw maati taw de7ees. Taani oothana mela ta Aaway tana kiittidaysi haysa” yaagis.
JOH 10:19 Hessa I gida gisho, Ayhudeta giddon qassika shaaketethi medhetis.
JOH 10:20 Entafe dariya baggay, “Iyan tuna ayyaanay de7ees! I gooyees! I giyaba ayis si7eetii?” yaagidosona.
JOH 10:21 Harati qassi, “Xalahey oykida asi haysada odetenna. Tuna ayyaani qooqe ayfe xeelisanaw danda7iyee?” yaagidosona.
JOH 10:22 Yerusalaamen Xoossa Keetha anjisida gallasata bonchiya ba7aaley gakis; he wode sa7i balgo.
JOH 10:23 Yesuusi xoossa keethan Solomone barandan simeretees.
JOH 10:24 Ayhudeti Yesuusa yuushon shiiqi eqidi, “Neeni nuna awude gakanaw sidhera wothanee? Neeni Kiristoosa gidiko ane nuus geeshshada oda” yaagidosona.
JOH 10:25 Yesuusi zaaridi entako, “Taani hintew odas; shin tana ammaneketa. Taani ta Aaway taw immida maatan oothiya oosoy tabaa markatees.
JOH 10:26 Shin taani hintew odidaysada hinte ta dorse gidonna gisho ammaneketa.
JOH 10:27 Ta dorsati ta qaala si7oosona. Taani enta erayis; entika tana kaalloosona.
JOH 10:28 Taani entaw merinaa de7uwa immayis; enti ubbaraka dhayokona. Oonika ta kushepe enta bonqi ekanaw danda7enna.
JOH 10:29 Enta taw immida ta Aaway ubbaafe aadhees Oonika ta Aawa kushepe enta bonqi ekanaw danda7enna.
JOH 10:30 Tanne ta Aaway issino” yaagis.
JOH 10:31 Ayhudeti Yesuusa caddanaw qassika shuchi denthidosona.
JOH 10:32 Yesuusi entako, “Taani oothana mela ta Aaway taw immida daro lo77o oosota hintena ootha bessaas. Hessatape awusa gisho tana shuchan caddanaw koyeetii?” yaagis.
JOH 10:33 Ayhudeti zaaridi, “Nuuni nena ne lo77o ooso gisho shuchan caddanaw koyoko. Shin neeni Xoossaa cayiya gishonne ase gidashe neeni, nena Xoosse giya gishosa” yaagidosona.
JOH 10:34 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Geeshsha Maxaafan Xoossay, ‘Hinte xoossata’ gidaysi xaafetibeennee?
JOH 10:35 Geeshsha Maxaafay merinaw laametenna. Xoossay ba qaala immida asata, ‘xoossata’ gidi xeegiko,
JOH 10:36 Aaway dooridi ha alamiya kiitida tana Xoossaa Na7a waatidi ‘Xoossaa cayaasa’ yaagetii?
JOH 10:37 Taani ta Aaway ootheysa oothonna ixiko tana ammanopite.
JOH 10:38 Shin taani oothiyaba gidiko hinte tana ammanonna ixikoka, ta Aaway tanan de7eysanne taka ta Aawan de7eysa hinte erana mela ta oosuwa ammanite” yaagis.
JOH 10:39 Qassika enti iya oykanaw koydosona, shin I entafe kessi ekis.
