JOH 10:40 Yohaanisi kase xammaqiya bessaa, Yordaanose Shaafape hefinthi Yesuusi pinnidi yan de7is.
JOH 10:41 Daro asay Yesuusako yidi, “Yohaanisi malaata oothibeenna, shin I ha addiyaba odidabay ubbay tuma” yaagidosona.
JOH 10:42 Yan daro asay Yesuusa ammanidosona.
JOH 11:1 Bitaane gutan Alaazara geetetiya issi addey hargetis. Bitaaney Mayraamanne I michiya Marta de7iya guta.
JOH 11:2 He Mayraama Godaa tohuwa shitto tiyada ba binaanan iya tohuwa quchidaaro. Hargetiday I ishaa Alaazara.
JOH 11:3 Hessa gisho, micheti, “Godaw, ne doseysi hargetis” gidi Yesuusako kiittidosona.
JOH 11:4 Yesuusi hessa si7ida wode, “Ha hargey, Xoossaynne iya Na7ay bonchetana melape attishin, hayqos gathiya harge gidenna” yaagis.
JOH 11:5 Yesuusi Marta, I michiwunne Alaazara dosees.
JOH 11:6 Shin Alaazari hargidaysa Yesuusi si7idi ba de7iya bessan nam7u gallas gam7is.
JOH 11:7 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Zaaridi Yihuda biitta boos” yaagis.
JOH 11:8 Iya tamaareti zaaridi, “Astamaariyaw, guutha wodepe kase Ayhudeti nena shuchan caddidi wodhanaw koydosona; ha77ika yaa baanee?” yaagidosona.
JOH 11:9 Yesuusi, “Issi gallasan tammanne nam7u saatey de7ees gidenneyee? Gallas hemetiya asi ha alamiya poo7uwa be7iya gisho dhubetenna.
JOH 11:10 Shin qamma hemetiya oonika poo7oy bayna gisho, dhubetees” yaagis.
JOH 11:11 Yesuusi hessa gidaape guye entako, “Nu dosiya Alaazari dhiskis, shin iya denthanaw taani baana” yaagis.
JOH 11:12 Iya tamaareti zaaridi, “Godaw, I dhiskidaba gidiko iyaw lo77ana” yaagidosona.
JOH 11:13 Yesuusi Alaazari hayqidaysa odis, shin entaw coo dhisko daanis.
JOH 11:14 Hessa gisho, Yesuusi geeshshidi entako, “Alaazari hayqis.
JOH 11:15 Hinte ammanana mela taani he bessan de7onaysas hinte gisho ufaytayis. Ane yedhite; iyako boos” yaagis.
JOH 11:16 Hessafe guye, Didimoosa geetetiya Toomasi ba lagge tamaaretako, “Astamaariyara hayqanaw nuka boos” yaagis.
JOH 11:17 Yesuusi gakiya wode Alaazari moogetin oyddu gallas gidis.
JOH 11:18 Bitaaney Yerusalaamepe heedzu kilo mitire mela haakees.
JOH 11:19 Daro Ayhudeti Martanne Mayraamo enta ishay hayqidaysas minthethanaw yidosona.
JOH 11:20 Marta Yesuusi yidaysa si7ada iya mokanaw keyasu, shin Mayraama son attasu.
JOH 11:21 Marta Yesuusako, “Godaw, neeni haysan de7idaba gidiyako ta ishay hayqennashin.
JOH 11:22 Shin ha77i gidikoka neeni woossiyaba Xoossay new immanaysa taani erayis” yaagasu.
JOH 11:23 Yesuusi, “Ne ishay hayqope dendana” yaagis.
JOH 11:24 Marta iyako, “Wursetha gallas I hayqope dendanaysa erayis” yaagasu.
JOH 11:25 Yesuusi iiko, “Taani dendonne de7o; tana ammaniya oonika hayqikoka de7on daana.
JOH 11:26 Qassi de7on de7eynne tana ammaniya oonika hayqenna. Hessa neeni ammanay?” yaagis.
JOH 11:27 Marta zaarada, “Godaw, ee taani ammanayis! Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa, alamiya yaanaw de7iya Kiristoosa gideysa taani ammanayis” yaagasu.
JOH 11:28 Marta hessa gidaape guye, bada ba michiw geeman xeegada, “Astamaarey yidi nena koyees” yaagasu.
JOH 11:29 Mayraama hessa si7ida wode ellesa denda eqada Yesuusako basu.
JOH 11:30 He saaten Yesuusi Martara gahetida bessan de7ees; buroo gutaa gakibeenna.
JOH 11:31 Mayraamo minthethishe iira son de7iya Ayhudeti, iya denda eqada ellesada kare keydaysa be7idi, duufo bada yeekanaw haniya daanin iyo kaallidi keyidosona.
JOH 11:32 Mayraama Yesuusi de7iyasuwa bada iya be7ida wode iya tohuwa bolla kundada, “Godaw, neeni haysan de7idaba gidiyako ta ishay hayqennashin” yaagasu.
JOH 11:33 Yesuusi Mayraamanne iira de7iya, Ayhudeti yeekeysa be7idi, ba wozanan daro seeletidi,
JOH 11:34 “Awun moogidetii?” yaagidi oychin, “Godaw, yada be7a” yaagidi zaaridosona.
JOH 11:35 Yesuusi afuxis.
JOH 11:36 Hessa gisho, Ayhudeti, “I Alaazara ay mela dosiyako be7ite” yaagidosona.
JOH 11:37 Shin entafe issoti issoti, “Haysi qooqiya xeelisidaysi ha addey hayqonna mela oothanaw danda7eneshin?” yaagidosona.
JOH 11:38 Qassika Yesuusi seeletidi, Alaazari moogetida duufuwa bis. He duufoy shuchan gordetida gongolo.
JOH 11:39 Yesuusi, “Shuchaa denthite” yaagidi kiittis. Marta, “Godaw, I hayqosaape oyddu gallas gidida gisho, ha77i xinqana” yaagasu.
JOH 11:40 Yesuusi Martako, “Ne ammaniyaba gidiko Xoossaa bonchuwa be7anaysa taani new odabikina?” yaagis.
JOH 11:41 Enti shucha denthin Yesuusi salo pude xeellidi, “Aawaw, tana ne si7ida gisho nena galatayis.
JOH 11:42 Ne ubba wode tana si7eysa taani erayis. Shin haysan eqida asay neeni tana kiittidaysa ammanana mela taani enta gisho haysa gayis” yaagis.
JOH 11:43 Yesuusi hessa gidaape guye, ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Alaazara, haa keya!” yaagis.
JOH 11:44 Hayqida addey ziidhetida mela kusheynne tohoy shalon qashetidi de7ishin iya ayfey karey goozetida mela duufuwape keyis. Yesuusi enta, “Birshite, bo giite!” yaagis.
JOH 11:45 Hessa gisho, Mayraamiko yida Ayhudetape daroti Yesuusi oothidaysa be7idi iya ammanidosona.
JOH 11:46 Shin entafe issoti issoti Farsaawetako bidi Yesuusi oothidaysa entaw odidosona.
JOH 11:47 Hessafe guye, kahine halaqatinne Farsaaweti shanguwa shiishidi, “Ha addey daro malaatata oothiya gisho nu ay oothinoo?
JOH 11:48 Nuuni iya si77i gidi aggiko asa ubbay iya ammanana. Qassi Roome biitta asati yidi nu xoossa keethaanne nu deriya dhaysana” yaagidosona.
JOH 11:49 Entafe issoy Qayyaafa geysi, he laythi kahine halaqa gididaysi, “Hinte aykoka ereketa!
JOH 11:50 Asa ubbay dhayeysafe asa ubbaa gisho issi asi hayqeysi lo77o gideysa ereketii?” yaagis.
JOH 11:51 I hessa baape gibeenna. Shin he laythi kahine halaqa gidiya gisho, Yesuusi Ayhude asaa gisho hayqanaw besseysa tinbite odis.
JOH 11:52 Qassi Yesuusi Ayhude asaa xalaalas gidonashin laaletidi de7iya Xoossaa asa ubbaa issife shiishanawunne issi asi oothanaw hayqana.
JOH 11:53 He gallasape doomidi enti iya wodhanaw maqetidosona.
JOH 11:54 Hessa gisho, Yesuusi Ayhudeta giddon qoncen simeretibeenna. Shin mela biitta matan de7iya Efreema gutaa bis. Ba tamaaretara he bessan gam7is.
JOH 11:55 Ayhudeti bonchiya Paasika gallasay matis. Qassi daro asay bantana geeshshanaw Paasika bonchiya gallasay gakanaape sinthe he biittafe Yerusalaame bidosona.
JOH 11:56 Enti xoossa keethan eqidi Yesuusa yuussaa naagiya gisho, “Ay qopeetii? Yesuusi baaliya bonchanaw yeennee?” yaagidi issoy issuwa oychidosona.
JOH 11:57 Kahine halaqatinne Farsaaweti Yesuusa oykanaw, I de7iyasuwa eriya oonika bantaw odana mela kiittidosona.
JOH 12:1 Paasika bonchiya gallasape usupun gallas sinthatidi, Yesuusi hayqope denthida Alaazari de7iya gutaa, Bitaane bis.
JOH 12:2 He bessan enti iyaw kaho giigisidosona. Alaazari Yesuusara issife gayta bolla uttidashin, Marti entana imatawusu.
JOH 12:3 Mayraama nardoose geetetiya daro al7o geeshsha shitto ehada Yesuusa tohuwa tiyasu. Ba binaanan iya tohuwa quchasu; keetha ubbay shitto sawon tonku gis.
JOH 12:4 Shin Yesuusa tamaaretape issoy, Yesuusa aathidi immanaysi, Asqoroota Yihuda,
JOH 12:5 “Ayis ha shittoy heedzu xeetu dinaaren bayzetidi, miishey manqotas imetennee?” yaagis.
JOH 12:6 I kayso gidida gisho hessa gisipe attishin, manqotas qadhetidi gibeenna. I miishe karxiita oykeysa gidiya gisho ubba wode iyape baw ekees.
JOH 12:7 Yesuusi, “Iya baw de7iyaba ta moogo gallasaas minjida gisho iyo aggaagite.
JOH 12:8 Manqoti ubba wode hintera daana, shin taani ubba wode hintera de7ike” yaagis.
JOH 12:9 He wode daro asay Yesuusi Bitaanen de7eysa si7idi yaa bidosona. Enti Yesuusa xalaala gidonashin, I hayqope denthida Alaazaraka be7anaw bidosona.
JOH 12:10 Hessa gisho, kahine halaqati Alaazaraka qassi wodhanaw maqetidosona.
JOH 12:11 Ayis giiko, Alaazara gaason daro Ayhudeti entana ixidi Yesuusa ammanoosona.
JOH 12:12 Wontetha gallas Paasika bonchiya bessaa yida daro asay Yesuusi Yerusalaame beysa si7idi,
JOH 12:13 Zamba haythi ekidi iya mokanaw keyidosona. Banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Hosaana! Xoossay galatetto! Godaa sunthan yeysi anjeto! Xoossay Isra7eele Kawa anjo!” yaagidosona.
JOH 12:14 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Xiyoone katamaw, babofa! Heko, ne Kawoy hare mara bolla uttidi yees” geetetidayada Yesuusi hare mari demmidi iya toggis.
JOH 12:16 Yesuusa tamaareti hessa kase akeekibokona. Shin Yesuusi bonchetidaape guye enti hessa ubbaa akeekidosona. Hessi ubbay Geeshsha Maxaafay gidaysada hanis.
JOH 12:17 Yesuusi Alaazara duufope xeegidi, hayqope denthida wode iyara de7iya daro asay Yesuusaba markatidosona.
JOH 12:18 Daro asay iya mokanaw keyday, I he malaatata oothidaysa si7ida gishosa.
JOH 12:19 Hessa gisho, Farsaaweti issoy issuwako, “Nu aykoka oothanaw danda7onnaysa be7ite; dere ubbay iya kaallees” yaagidosona.
JOH 12:20 Paasika bonchiya gallas goyinnanaw Yerusalaame bidaysata giddon issi issi Girike asati de7oosona.
JOH 12:21 Enti Galila biittan Beetesayda katamaape yida Filphoosako bidi, “Godaw, nuuni Yesuusa be7anaw koyoos” yaagidi woossidosona.
JOH 12:22 Filphoosi bidi Indiriyasas odin nam7ay bidi, Yesuusas odidosona.
JOH 12:23 Yesuusi entako, “Asa Na7ay, bonchetiya wodey gakis.
JOH 12:24 Taani hintew tuma odayis; issi giste ayfey biittan wodhidi wooqonna ixiko barka attees. Shin he giste ayfey wooqiko daro ayfe ayfees.
JOH 12:25 Ba shempuwa dosiya oonika dhaysees; ba shempuwa ha alamiyan ixiya oonika merinaa de7os ashshees.
JOH 12:26 Taani de7iyasuwan taara daana mela taw oothanaw koyiya oonika tana kaallanaw bessees. Taw oothiya oonaka ta Aaway bonchana.
JOH 12:27 “Ha77i ta shempoy daro un7etis; yaatin woygo? ‘Ta Aawaw, tana ha saatepe ashsharki’ yaago? Akay, taani yiday waaye ekanaasa.
JOH 12:28 Ta Aawaw, ne sunthaa boncha” yaagis. He wode salope, “Taani ta sunthaa bonchas; zaaradaka bonchana” giya qaalay yis.
JOH 12:29 He bessan eqida daro asay he qaala si7idi, “Hessi dada” yaagidosona. Harati qassi, “Kiitanchoy iyaw odis” yaagidosona.
JOH 12:30 Yesuusi zaaridi entako, “Ha qaalay hinte gisho yisipe attishin, ta gisho gidenna.
JOH 12:31 Ha alamey pirdetiya wodey ha77i; ha alamiya haareysi ha77i kare holetana.
JOH 12:32 Qassi taani sa7ape dhoqu oosetida wode asa ubbaa taako ehana” yaagis.
JOH 12:33 I hessa giday ay mela hayqo hayqaneko entaw qoncisanaasa.
JOH 12:34 Daro asay zaaridi, “Nu higgey Kiristoosi merinaw de7eysa odees. Yaatin, neeni woygada, ‘Asa Na7ay dhoqu gaanaw bessees’ gay? ‘I, Asa Na7ay oonee?’ ” yaagidosona.
JOH 12:35 Yesuusi, “Poo7oy hintera guutha wode gam7ana. Hintew dhumonna mela poo7oy de7ishin, poo7uwan hemetite. Dhuman hemetiya asi aw biyako erenna.
JOH 12:36 Poo7o nayta gidana mela poo7oy de7ishin poo7uwa ammanite” yaagis. Yesuusi hessa odetidaape guye bidi entafe geemmis.
JOH 12:37 I hessa mela malaatata enta sinthan oothinka ammanibookona.
JOH 12:38 Nabiya Isayaasi, “Godaw, nu markatethaa ooni ammanidee? Goday ba wolqaa ooddes qoncisidee?” Gidaysi tuma gidana mela enti iya ammanibookona.
JOH 12:39 Qassika Isayaasi, “Enta ayfey xeellonna mela, enta wozanay akeekona mela, enti Xoossaako simmin, I enta pathonna mela, Xoossay enta ayfiya qooqisis. Enta wozanaa minthis” gida gisho enti ammananaw danda7ibookona.
JOH 12:41 Isayaasi hessa giday, Yesuusa bonchuwa be7ida gishonne iyabaa odida gishosa.
JOH 12:42 Gidikoka, Ayhudeta halaqatapeka daroti Yesuusa ammanidosona. Shin Farsaaweti bantana Ayhudeta Woosa Keethafe kessoosona gidi yayyida gisho ammanida gidi qoncen markatibookona.
JOH 12:43 Hessa enti oothiday, Xoossan eretanaysafe aathidi asan eretanaysa dosida gishosa.
JOH 12:44 Yesuusi ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Tana ammaniya oonika tana kiittidaysaka ammaneesipe attishin, ta xalaala ammanena.
JOH 12:45 Tana be7iya oonika tana kiittidaysaka be7ees.
JOH 12:46 Tana ammaniya ubbay dhuman doonna mela taani poo7o gidada alamiya yas.
JOH 12:47 Ta qaala si7idi kiitetonna oonaka taani pirdike. Ayis giiko, taani alamiya ashshanaw yasipe attishin, pirdanaw yabiike.
JOH 12:48 Tana ixeysanne ta qaala ekonna oonaka pirdeysi de7ees. Taani odida qaalay wursetha gallas he uraa pirdana.
JOH 12:49 Ayis giiko, taani hessa taape odike, shin tana kiitida ta Aaway taani gaanaysanne odanaysa kiittis.
JOH 12:50 Qassi iya kiitay merinaa de7o gideysa taani erayis. Hessa gisho, taani odeysi ta Aaway tana oda gidaysa” yaagis.
JOH 13:1 Paasika bonchiya gallasay gakanaape sinthatidi ha alamiya aggidi Aawako biya wodey gakidaysa Yesuusi eris. Ha alamiyan de7iya ba asaa ubba wode dosis; wursethi gakanawuka enta dosis.
JOH 13:2 Yesuusaranne iya tamaaretara issife kaho moosona. Hessafe kase Xalahey Simoona na7aa Asqoroota Yihudi Yesuusa aathidi immanaada iya wozanan iita qofa wothis.
JOH 13:3 Yesuusi Aaway ubbaba iya kushen wothidaysa, I Xoossaa matape yidaysanne simmidi iyako baanaysa eris.
JOH 13:4 Yesuusi gayta bollafe dendidi bolla bagga ma7uwa qaari wothidi, pooxa ekidi ba xeessan marxafis.
JOH 13:5 Hessafe guye, haathe meecha miishen tigidi, ba tamaareta tohuwa meeccis; qassi ba xeessan dancida pooxan quchis.
JOH 13:6 Yesuusi Simoona Phexroosako yaa wode Phexroosi, “Godaw, ne ta tohuwa meeccanee?” yaagis.
JOH 13:7 Yesuusi zaaridi iyako, “Taani ootheysa ne ha77i eraka, shin guyepe akeekana” yaagis.
JOH 13:8 Yaatin, Phexroosi, “Ne ta tohuwa ubbaraka meeccaka” yaagis. Yesuusi iyako, “Taani ne tohuwa meecconna ixiko newunne tawunne issifetethi baawa” yaagis.
JOH 13:9 Phexroosi Yesuusako, “Godaw, yaatiko, ta tohuwa xalaala gidonashin ta kushiyanne ta huuphiya meecca” yaagis.
JOH 13:10 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Bolla meecetida oonika tohope haraba meecetanaw koshshenna; iyaw ubbasoy geeshshi. Hinte geeshshi, shin ubbay geeshshi gideketa” yaagis.
JOH 13:11 Yesuusi bana aathidi immana uray ooneko eriya gisho, “Hinte ubbay geeshshi gideketa” yaagis.
JOH 13:12 Enta tohuwa meeccidaape guye, Yesuusi ba ma7uwa zaari ma7is. Simmi gayta bolla uttidi entako, “Taani hintew oothidaysa akeeketii?
JOH 13:13 Hinte tana astamaarenne Godaa geeta; taani hinte geysa gidiya gisho lo77o gideta.
JOH 13:14 Taani hintew Godanne astamaare gidashe hinte tohuwa meecciko hinteka issoy issuwas hessada oothanaw bessees.
JOH 13:15 Hiza, taani hintew oothidaysada hinteka oothana mela hintew leemiso gidas.
JOH 13:16 Taani hintew tuma odayis; aylley ba godaape, kiitetidaysi kiittidaysafe aadhenna.
JOH 13:17 Hinte hessa eridi oothiyaba gidiko anjetidaysata.
JOH 13:18 “Taani hintena ubbaa giike; taani dooridaysata erayis. Shin Geeshsha Maxaafan, ‘Ta barsidaysi ta kushiya saxis’ geetetidaysi tuma gidanaw bessees.
JOH 13:19 ‘Taani Tana Gideysa’ hinte ammanana mela hessi hananaape sinthatada hintew odayis.
JOH 13:20 Taani hintew tuma odayis; taani kiitida oonaka mokiya uray tana mokees. Tana mokiya oonika tana kiittidaysa mokees” yaagis.
JOH 13:21 Yesuusi hessa odidaape guye, ba wozanan daro un7etidi, “Taani hintew tuma odayis; tana hintefe issoy aathidi immana” gidi qoncisidi odis.
JOH 13:22 I oodeba odiyako iya tamaaretas eretonna ixin issoy issuwa xeellidosona.
JOH 13:23 Iya tamaaretape issoy, Yesuusi doseysi, Yesuusa matan uttis.
JOH 13:24 Hessa gisho, Simoon Phexroosi iya qam7otidi, “I oona giyako ane oycha” yaagis.
JOH 13:25 Hessa gisho, he tamaarey Yesuusako shiiqidi haythan, “Godaw, I oonee?” yaagis.
JOH 13:26 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani uythaa woxen tushada barseysa” yaagis. Qassi uythaa menthi ekidi, woxen tushidi, Simoona na7aa Asqoroota Yihuda barsis.
JOH 13:27 Yihudi uythaa baaridaape guye, Xalahey ellesidi Yihudan gelis. Yesuusi iyako, “Neeni oothanaw qopidaba ellesada ootha” yaagis.
JOH 13:28 Shin gayta bolla uttidaysatape oonika Yesuusi hessa ayis iyako gidaako eribeenna.
JOH 13:29 Yihudi miishe oykiya gisho, iya tamaaretape issoti issoti Yesuusi iya, “Paasika bonchiya gallasaas bantaw koshshiyaba shamma woyko manqotas muxaata imma gis” yaagidi qopidosona.
JOH 13:30 Yihudi uythaa baarida mela ellesidi kare keyis. He wode sa7i qamma.
JOH 13:31 Yihudi kare keydaape guye, Yesuusi, “Ha77i Asa Na7ay bonchetis; Xoossayka iya baggara bonchetis.
JOH 13:32 Xoossay iya baggara bonchetiko I ba huuphen Asa Na7aa bonchana; qassi I hessa ellesidi oothana.
JOH 13:33 Ta nayto, taani hintera daro wode gam7ike. Hinte tana koyana, shin taani Ayhudetas odidaysa mela, ‘Hinte taani biya bessaa baanaw danda7eketa.’
JOH 13:34 Taani hintew immiya ooratha kiitay haysa; issoy issuwa dosite. Taani hintena dosidaysada hinte issoy issuwa dosanaw bessees.
JOH 13:35 Hinte issoy issuwara dosetiko hinte ta tamaare gideysa asa ubbay erana” yaagis.
JOH 13:36 Simoon Phexroosi Yesuusako, “Godaw, neeni aw bay?” yaagis. Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani biya bessaa neeni ha77i kaallanaw danda7aka, shin guyepe tana kaallana” yaagis.
JOH 13:37 Phexroosi, “Godaw, taani nena ha77i kaallanaw ayis danda7ikina? Taani ne gisho, hayqanawuka giiga uttas” yaagis.
JOH 13:38 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ta gisho hayqanaw tuma giiga uttadii? Taani new tuma odayis; kuttoy waassanaape sinthe neeni tana heedzu toho kaddana” yaagis.
JOH 14:1 Yesuusi ba tamaaretako, “Hinte wozanay un7etofo, Xoossaa ammanite, tanaka ammanite.
JOH 14:2 Ta Aawa keethan daro bessi de7ees. Taani hintew besse giigisanaw bayis. Hessa gidonnaako taani hintew odikeshin.
JOH 14:3 Taani bada besse giigisidaape guye, taani de7iyasuwan hinte daana mela simma yada hintena taako efana.
JOH 14:4 Hinte taani biya bessaa efiya ogiya ereeta” yaagis.
JOH 14:5 Yaatin, Toomasi, “Godaw, neeni biya bessaa nuuni eroko; ogiya waatidi eranaw danda7anee?” yaagis.
JOH 14:6 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Ogey, tumaynne de7oy tana. Ta baggara gidonna ixiko oonika ta Aawako baanaw danda7enna.
JOH 14:7 Hinte tana eriyaba gidiyako, ta Aawaka erana. Shin hizape doomidi hinte iya ereetanne iya be7ideta” yaagis.
JOH 14:8 Filphoosi Yesuusako, “Godaw, Aawa nuna bessa; hessi nuus gidana” yaagis.
JOH 14:9 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani haysa mela wode hintera de7inka tana erikii? Tana be7ida uray Aawaka be7is. Yaatin, neeni woygada, ‘Aawa nuna bessa’ gay?
JOH 14:10 Taani Aawara issino gideysanne Aawayka taara issino gideysa neeni ammanikiyee? Taani hintew odiya qaala taani taape odike, shin tanan de7iya Aaway ba oosuwa oothees.
JOH 14:11 Taani Aawan de7eysanne Aawayka tanan de7eysa ammanite. Hessa ammanonna ixiko ta oothiyabatan tana ammanite.
JOH 14:12 “Taani hintew tuma odayis; tana ammaniya uray taani oothiya oosuwape aadhiya ooso oothana. Taani Aawako biya gisho tana ammaniya oonika haysafe aadhiya ooso oothana.
JOH 14:13 Aaway Na7aa baggara bonchetana mela ta sunthan hinte woossiya ubbaa ta hintew oothana.
JOH 14:14 Ta sunthan aybibaaka hinte oychiko ta hintew oothana.
JOH 14:15 “Hinte tana dosiko ta kiitaa naagana.
JOH 14:16 Taani Aawa woossana; hintera merinaw daana mela minthetheysa hintew immana.
JOH 14:17 He Ayyaanay Xoossaa tumaa qoncisees. Ha alamiya asay iya be7onna gishonne eronna gisho iya ekanaw danda7okona. Shin I hintera de7iya gishonne hinte giddon daana gisho hinte iya ereeta.
JOH 14:18 “Taani hintena aayiya aawu bayna na7ada hinte xalaala aggike; simmada hinteko yaana.
JOH 14:19 Guutha wodepe guye alamey tana zaari be7enna, shin hinte be7ana. Taani de7on de7iya gisho hinteka de7on de7ana.
JOH 14:20 Taani ta Aawan, hinte tanan, qassi taani hintenan de7eysa hinte he gallas erana.
JOH 14:21 “Ta kiitaa ekidi naagey tana dosees. Tana doseysa ta Aawayka dosees; taanika iya dosayis; taani iyaw qoncana” yaagis.
JOH 14:22 Asqoroota Yihuda gidonna Yihudi Yesuusako, “Godaw, neeni waatada alamiyas gidonashin nuus nena qoncisanee?” yaagis.
JOH 14:23 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Tana dosiya oonika ta qaalas kiitetana. Ta Aaway iya dosana. Qassi ta Aawaynne taani iyako yidi iyara daana.
JOH 14:24 Tana dosonna oonika ta qaalas kiitetenna. Hinte si7iya qaalay tana kiitida Aawabape attishin, tabaa gidenna.
JOH 14:25 “Taani hintera ha77i de7ashe hessa hintew odas.
JOH 14:26 Shin Aaway ta sunthan kiittana minthethiya Geeshsha Ayyaanay, hintena ubbaba tamaarsana. Taani hintew odida ubbaa I hintena hassayisana.
JOH 14:27 “Sarotethaa hintew immana. Taani ta sarotethaa hintew immana. Ta immiya sarotethay alamey immiya sarotethaa mela gidenna. Hessa gisho, un7etofite, yayyofite.
JOH 14:28 ‘Taani baana, shin simmada hinteko yaana’ gidaysa si7ideta. Hinte tana tuma dosiyaba gidiyako ta Aaway taape aadhiya gisho taani iyako beysan hinte ufaytana.
JOH 14:29 Hessi haniya wode hinte ammanana mela hessi hanonna de7ishin sinthatada taani hintew odas.
JOH 14:30 “Ha alamiya haareysi yaa gisho hizape guye hintera daro odetike. Tana I aykoka oothanaw danda7enna.
JOH 14:31 Shin taani Aawa doseysa alamey erana mela ta Aaway tana kiittidaysa ubbaa oothayis. Dendite; haysafe boos.
JOH 15:1 “Taani tuma woyne ubba. Goshshanchoy ta Aawa.
JOH 15:2 I, ta bolla de7iya ayfe ayfonna tashiya ubbaa karees. Ayfiya tashiya kasepe aadhidi ayfana mela he tashiya I giigisana.
JOH 15:3 Taani hintew odida qaala gisho hinte geeshshi.
JOH 15:4 Tanan de7ite; taanika hintenan de7ana. Woyne tashey ubbara doona ixiko he tashey barka ayfe ayfanaw danda7enna. Hessadaka, hinteka tanan de7onna ixiko ayfe ayfanaw danda7eketa.
JOH 15:5 “Taani woyne ubba; hinte tasheta. Tanan de7eysinne taani iyan de7eysi, I daro ayfe ayfana. Ta bayna hinte xalaala aykoka oothanaw danda7eketa.
JOH 15:6 Tanan doonna uray tashiyada karen yegitidi melana. Hessa mela tasheti shiiqidi taman yegetana, xuugetana.
JOH 15:7 Hinte tanan de7iko, ta qaalayka hintenan de7iko, hinte koyiyabay ayba gidikoka woossite; hinte ekana.
JOH 15:8 Hinte daro ayfe ayfiya ta tamaare gidiko, hessan ta Aaway bonchetana.
JOH 15:9 Aaway tana doseysada taanika hintena dosayis; ta siiquwan de7ite.
JOH 15:10 Taani ta Aawa kiitaa naagada iya siiquwan de7idaysada hinteka ta kiitaa naagiko ta siiquwan daana.
JOH 15:11 “Ta ufaysay hintenan gidana melanne hinte ufaysay polo gidana mela taani hintew hessa odas.
JOH 15:12 Ta kiitay haysa; taani hintena dosidaysada hinteka issoy issuwa dosite.
JOH 15:13 Ba shempuwa ba laggiyas aathidi immeysafe aadhiya gita siiqoy baawa.
JOH 15:14 Taani hintena kiittidaba ubbaa oothiko hinte dosetidaysata.
JOH 15:15 “Aylley ba goday oothiyaba eronna gisho taani hintena hizape guye aylleta giike. Shin ta Aawape si7ida ubbaa taani hintew odida gisho hintena dosetidaysata gas.
JOH 15:16 Taani hintena doorasipe attishin, hinte tana dooribeketa. Hinte bidi dhayonna ayfe ayfana mela taani hintena shuumas. Yaaniko, ta Aaway hinte ta sunthan woossidaba ubbaa immana.
JOH 15:17 Ta kiitay haysa: issoy issuwa dosite.
JOH 15:18 “Alamey hintena ixiko koyrottidi tana ixidaysa akeekite.
JOH 15:19 Hinte alamiyaba gidiyako alamey hintena dosana. Shin taani hintena alamepe doorida gishonne hinte alamiyaba gidonna gisho alamey hintena ixees.
JOH 15:20 ‘Aylley ba godaape aadhenna’ gada taani hintew odidaysa akeekite. Enti tana gooddidaba gidiko hintenaka gooddana. Enti ta qaala naagidaba gidiko hinte qaalaka naagana.
JOH 15:21 Shin enti tana kiittidaysa eronna gisho ha ubbaa ta gaason hinte bolla oothana.
JOH 15:22 Taani yada entaw odonnaba gidiyako nagara gidenna. Shin ha77i enti oothida nagaraas gaasoyabay baawa.
JOH 15:23 Tana ixeysi ta Aawaka ixees.
JOH 15:24 Oonika oothiboonna ooso ta enta giddon oothaboonnaba gidiyako entaw nagara gidonna attana. Shin ha77i enti taani oothida oosuwa be7idi tanaka ta Aawaka ixidosona.
JOH 15:25 Shin enta higgiyan, ‘Tana coo ixidosona’ geetetidi xaafetidaysi poletana mela hessi hanis.
JOH 15:26 “Aawape yaa tumaa qoncisiya Ayyaana ta hintew kiittana. I hintena minthethana, tabaa markatana.
JOH 15:27 Hinteka koyrope doomidi taara de7iya gisho tabaa markatana.
JOH 16:1 “Taani hessa hinte ammanoy dhayonna mela hintew odas.
JOH 16:2 Enti hintena ayhude woosa keethatape kessi yeddana. Hessadaka, hintena wodhiya oonika Xoossi koyaba oothiya daaniya wodey yaana.
JOH 16:3 Enti hessa hinte bolla oothey tana woyko Aawa eronna gishosa.
JOH 16:4 Shin enti hessa hinte bolla oothiya wodey gakiya wode taani hintew odidaysa hinte akeekana mela taani hintew haysa odas. “Sinthatada taani haysa hintew odonna gam7iday ta hintera de7iya gishosa.
JOH 16:5 Shin ha77i taani tana kiittidaysako bayis; hintefe oonika, ‘Awu bay?’ gidi tana oychey baawa.
JOH 16:6 Shin taani hessa odida gisho, hinte wozanan daro azzanoy de7ees.
JOH 16:7 Shin taani hintew tuma odayis; taani biiko hintew lo77o. Ayis giiko, taani boonna ixiko minthetheysi hinteko yeenna. Shin taani biiko iya hinteko yeddana.
JOH 16:8 Minthetheysi yidi, nagaraba, xillotethabaanne pirdaba ha alamiya asaa erisana.
JOH 16:9 Nagarabay, asay tana ammanonna gishosa.
JOH 16:10 Xillotethabay, taani Aawako biya gishonne hinte tana zaari be7onna gishosa.
JOH 16:11 Pirdabay, qassi alamiya haareysi pirdetida gishosa.
JOH 16:12 “Taani hintew odiyabay darobay de7ees, shin ha77i hintew gelenna.
JOH 16:13 Tuma Ayyaanay yaa wode hintena tumatethaa ubbaako kaalethana. I si7idaba odeesipe attishin, baape aybibaaka odenna. Qassi sinthafe yaanaba hintew I odana.
JOH 16:14 I taw de7eysafe ekidi hintew odiya gisho I tana bonchana.
JOH 16:15 Aawas de7iyaba ubbay tabaa; ‘Minthetheysi taw de7eysafe ekidi hintew odana’ taani giday hessasa.
JOH 16:16 “Guutha wodepe guye tana be7eketa; qassi guutha wodepe guye hinte tana be7ana” yaagis.
JOH 16:17 Iya tamaaretape issoti issoti banta giddon, “Guutha wodepe guye hinte tana be7eketa; qassi guutha wodepe guye hinte tana be7ana; qassika taani Aawako bayis guussay woy guussee?” yaagidosona.
JOH 16:18 “Guutha wodepe guye geysi woy guussee? I ay odetiyako nuus eretenna” yaagidosona.
JOH 16:19 Enti bana oychanaw koyeysa Yesuusi eridi, “Taani, ‘Guutha wodepe guye tana be7eketa; qassi guutha wodepe guye hinte tana be7ana’ gidaysas hinte issoy issuwa oycheetii?
JOH 16:20 Taani hintew tuma odayis; hinte yeekananne afuxana, shin ha alamey ufaytana. Ha77i hinte azzanana, shin hinte azzanoy ufaysan laametana.
JOH 16:21 Issi maccasiya na7a yelana haniya wode ba yelo wodey gakida gisho hirgawusu. Shin na7a yelidaape guye na7i ha alamiyan yeletida ufaysaa gisho ba un7aa dogawusu.
JOH 16:22 Hessadaka, hinteka hinte wozanan azzaneeta, shin taani hintena zaarada be7ana. Hinte wozanay daro ufaytana; he ufaysaa oonika hintefe ekenna.
JOH 16:23 “He gallas hinte tana aybibaaka woosseketa. Taani hintew tuma odayis; hinte ta sunthan woossiyaba ubbaa Aaway hintew immana.
JOH 16:24 Ha77i gakanaw ta sunthan aybibaaka woossibeketa. Hinte ufaysay polo gidana mela Xoossaa woossite; hinte ekana.
JOH 16:25 “Taani ha77i gakanaw hintew leemison odas, hizape taani leemison odonna wodey yaana. Shin Aawaba taani hintew qoncen odana.
JOH 16:26 He gallas hinte ta sunthan Aawa woossana; hinte gisho taani Aawa woossike.
JOH 16:27 Ayis giiko, Aaway ba huuphen hintena dosees. Hinte tana dosiya gishonne taani Aawa matape yidaysa ammanida gisho, I hintena dosees.
JOH 16:28 Taani Aawa matape ha alamiya yas; qassi alamiya aggada Aawako baana” yaagis.
JOH 16:29 Iya tamaareti zaaridi, “Heko, ha77i neeni qoncen odaasa; leemison aykoka odaka.
JOH 16:30 Neeni ubbaba ereysa nuuni ha77i eroos; qassi nena oonika oychana mela neeni koyaka. Hessi nuna neeni Xoossafe kiitetidaysa ammanthees” yaagidosona.
JOH 16:31 Yaatin, Yesuusi zaaridi entako, “Ha77i ammanetii?
JOH 16:32 Heko, hinte, hinte soo hinte soo laaletiya wodeynne ta xalaala yeggi aggidi baqatiya wodey yaana; ha77ika yikichis. Shin Aaway taara de7iya gisho taani ta xalaala gidike.
JOH 16:33 Hinte taara de7ishe saroy hintew daana mela taani hessa odas. Alamen de7ishe hinte waayetana. Shin minnite; taani alamiya xoonas” yaagis.
JOH 17:1 Yesuusi hessa odidaape guye pude salo xeellidi, haysada yaagis: “Aawaw, saatey gakis; ne Na7ay nena bonchana mela neeni ne Na7aa boncha.
JOH 17:2 Neeni iyaw immida ubbaas I merinaa de7uwa immana mela asa ubbaa bolla iyaw maata immadasa.
JOH 17:3 Merinaa de7oy, nena, issi tuma Xoossaanne ne kiitida Yesuus Kiristoosa ero.
JOH 17:4 Neeni ta oothana mela immida oosuwa polada nena sa7an bonchas.
JOH 17:5 Ha77ika, Aawaw, alamey medhetanaape sinthe ne matan taw de7iya bonchuwan tana boncha.
JOH 17:6 “Alamiya asaape neeni taw immidaysata nena erisas. Enti neyisata; neeni enta taw immadasa. Enti ne qaalaska kiitetidosona.
JOH 17:7 Neeni taw immida ubbabay neepe yidaysa enti ha77i eroosona.
JOH 17:8 Neeni taw immida qaala taani entaw immas; entika he qaala ekidosona. Taani ne matape yidaysi tuma gideysa eridi neeni tana kiittidaysaka ammanidosona.
JOH 17:9 “Taani entaw woossayis. Enti neyisata gidiya gisho neeni taw immida asaas woossaysipe attishin, alamiyas woossike.
JOH 17:10 Taw de7iya ubbabay nebaa; new de7iya ubbayka tabaa. Taani enta baggara bonchetas.
JOH 17:11 Taani hizape guye alamiyan de7ike; enti alamen de7oosona. Taani ha77i neeko bayis. Geeshsha Aawaw, ha neeni taw immidaysati neeranne taara issino gididaysada enti issino gidana mela enta ne taw immida ne sunthan naaga.
JOH 17:12 Taani entara sa7an de7ashe, ne taw immida ne sunthaa wolqan enta naagas. Geeshsha Maxaafay gidaysi poletana mela dhayoy bessiya uraape attishin, entafe hari oonika dhaybeenna.
JOH 17:13 “Ha77i taani neeko bayis. Ta ufaysay enta wozanan polo gidana mela haysa taani alamen de7ashe odayis.
JOH 17:14 Taani entaw ne qaala immas. Taani alamiyape gidonaysada, entika alamiyape gidonna gisho, alamey enta ixis.
JOH 17:15 Neeni Xalahepe enta naagana melape attishin, alamepe kessana mela woossike.
JOH 17:16 Taani alamepe gidonaysada entika alamepe gidokona.
JOH 17:17 Neeni ne tumatethan enta nebaa ootha; ne qaalayka tuma.
JOH 17:18 Neeni tana alamiya kiitidaysada taanika enta alamiya kiittas.
JOH 17:19 Qassi enti tuma nebaa gidana mela enta gisho taani ta huuphiya new immayis.
JOH 17:20 “Taani enta xalaalas gidonashin enti qaala odin, tana ammananaysataska woossayis.
JOH 17:21 Enti ubbay issino gidana mela taani woossayis. Aawaw, ne tanan de7eysada, qassi ta nenan de7eysada enti nunan daana mela woossayis. He wode neeni tana kiittidaysa alamey ammanana.
JOH 17:22 Neeninne taani issino gideysada, enti issino gidana mela, neeni tana bonchidaysada, taanika enta bonchas.
JOH 17:23 Taani entan, neeni tanan de7eysada enti polo issino gidana mela nena woossayis. Hessika, ne tana kiittidaysanne ne tana dosida dosuwan enta siiqidaysa alamey eran melasa.
JOH 17:24 “Aawaw, neeni taw immidaysati taani de7iyasuwan taara daana mela koyayis. Alamey medhetanaape sinthe neeni tana dosida gisho, taw immida ta bonchuwa enti be7ana.
JOH 17:25 “Geeshsha Aawaw, alamey nena erenna, shin taani erayis. Qassi neeni tana kiittidaysa haysati eroosona.
JOH 17:26 Neeni tana siiqida siiqoy entanan daana mela, qassi taani entanan gidana mela, taani ne sunthaa enta erisas; sinthaska erisana” yaagis.
JOH 18:1 Yesuusi woosa ongidaape guye, ba tamaaretara Qediroona zangaara pinnidi, he bessan de7iya atakiltiya giddo gelidosona.
JOH 18:2 Yesuusi ubba wode ba tamaaretara yan shiiqiya gisho Yesuusa aathidi immida Yihudi he bessaa erees.
JOH 18:3 Hessa gisho, Yihudi paanose, xompe, tooranne gondalle oykida daro wotaadareta, kahine halaqatinne Farsaaweti kiitida Xoossa Keetha naagiya wotaadareta kaalethi ekidi, he bessaa bis.
JOH 18:4 Yesuusi bana gakana haniyaba ubbaa eridi, gaxa keyidi, “Oona koyeetii?” yaagis.
JOH 18:5 Enti zaaridi, “Naazirete Yesuusa koyoos” yaagidosona. I zaaridi, “Taani Yesuusa” yaagis. Yesuusa aathidi immida Yihudi yan entara eqis.
JOH 18:6 I, “Taani Yesuusa” gida wode enti guye shiiqidi, sa7an kundidosona.
JOH 18:7 Yesuusi qassika, “Oona koyeetii?” yaagidi oychis. Enti, “Naazirete Yesuusa koyoos” yaagidosona.
JOH 18:8 I zaaridi, “Taani Yesuusa gideysa hintew odas. Hiza, hinte tana koyaba gidiko haysata yeddite” yaagis.
JOH 18:9 I hessa giday, “Aawaw, neeni taw immidaysatape hari attoshin issuwaka dhaysabike” gidaysi poletana melasa.
JOH 18:10 Simoon Phexroosas mashshay de7ees. I he mashsha shoddidi kahine halaqaa aylliyas ushacha haytha shocidi, qanxi yeggis. He aylliya sunthay Malkosa.
JOH 18:11 Yesuusi Phexroosako, “Ne mashsha shoohuwan zaara. Ta Aaway taw immida xuu7ape taani uyonnabaa new daanii?” yaagis.
JOH 18:12 Roome wotaadaretinne enta halaqay Xoossa Keetha naagiya wotaadaretara issife Yesuusa oykidi qachidosona.
JOH 18:13 Koyro Yesuusa Haannako efidosona. Haanni he laythi kahine halaqa gidiya Qayyaafa bollo.
JOH 18:14 Qayyaafi, “Asa ubbaa gisho, issi asi hayqiko lo77o” gidi kase Ayhudeta zoridaysa.
JOH 18:15 Simoon Phexroosinne hara issi tamaarey Yesuusa kaallidi bidosona. Kahine halaqay he hara tamaariya loythi erees. Hessa gisho, I Yesuusara kahine halaqaa zabbaa gelis.
JOH 18:16 Shin Phexroosi karera dirsaa pengen eqis. Kahine halaqay eriya hara tamaarey kare keyidi, pengiya naagiya na7ees odidi, Phexroosa gaathi gelsis.
JOH 18:17 Pengiya naagiya na7iya Phexroosako, “Neeni, he addiya tamaaretape issuwa gidikii?” yaagasu. Phexroosi zaaridi, “Akay, taani gidike” yaagis.
JOH 18:18 Sa7ay meegiya gisho, aylletinne naageysati xiifa tama eethidi, kayoosona. Phexroosika entara eqidi tama kayees.
JOH 18:19 Kahine halaqay Yesuusa, iya tamaaretabaanne iya timirtiyaba oychis.
JOH 18:20 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani asa ubbaas qoncen odas. Taani Ayhude ubbay shiiqiya ayhude woosa keethaninne xoossa keethan ubba wode tamaarsas. Geeman aykoka odabike.
JOH 18:21 Yaatin, neeni tana ayis oychay? Ta odishin si7ida asaa oycha. He asay taani odidaysa eroosona” yaagis.
JOH 18:22 Yesuusi hessa gida wode, he bessan eqida wotaadaretape issoy Yesuusa baqidi, “Kahine halaqaas haysada zaaray?” yaagis.
JOH 18:23 Yesuusi zaaridi, “Taani iitabaa odidaba gidiko haysan de7iya asa ubbaa sinthan oda. Shin taani tuma odidaba gidiko tana ayis baqay?” yaagis.
JOH 18:24 Hessa gisho, Haanni, Yesuusi qashetida mela kahine halaqaa Qayyaafako yeddis.
JOH 18:25 Phexroosi yan eqidi, tama kayishin, harati iyako, “Neeni ha addiya tamaaretape issuwa gidikii?” yaagis. Phexroosi zaaridi, “Akay, taani gidike” yaagidi kaddis.
JOH 18:26 Kahine halaqaa aylletape issoy, Phexroosi haythaa qanxida addiya dabboy, Phexroosako, “Taani nena iyara atakiltiya giddon be7abikina?” yaagidi oychis.
JOH 18:27 Phexroosi qassika kaddis; ellesidi kuttoy waassi aggis.
JOH 18:28 Wonta guura, enti Yesuusa Qayyaafa soope deriya haareysa ooso keethi eki efidosona. Ayhudeti Paasika Ba7aale kathaa maanaw bantana tunisonna mela deriya haareysa ooso keethaa gelibookona.
JOH 18:29 Hessa gisho, Philaxoosi entako kare keyidi, “Ha addiya ayis mootetii?” yaagis.
JOH 18:30 Enti, “I iita oothonnaba gidiyako nuuni iya neeko ehoko” yaagidosona.
JOH 18:31 Philaxoosi zaaridi, “Hinte iya eki efidi, hinte higgey geysada iya bolla pirdite” yaagis. Ayhudeti, “Oonaka wodhiya maati nuus baawa” yaagidosona;
JOH 18:32 Hessi haniday Yesuusi ay mela hayqo hayqaneko erisanaw odidaysi poletanaasa.
JOH 18:33 Philaxoosi ba ooso keetha zaari gelidi, Yesuusa xeegidi, “Neeni Ayhude kawo?” yaagidi oychis.
JOH 18:34 Yesuusi Philaxoosa, “Ha oysha neeni neepe oychaye woyko hara asi new tabaa odidee?” yaagis.
JOH 18:35 Philaxoosi zaaridi, “Ta Ayhude asee? Ne asaynne kahine halaqati nena taw aathidi immidosona. Ne ay oothadii?” yaagis.
JOH 18:36 Yesuusi, “Ta kawotethay ha alamiyana gidenna. I haysan gidiyako ta Ayhudeta halaqatas aadhada imetonna mela ta aylleti taw oletana. Shin ta kawotethay ha alamiyana gidenna” yaagis.
JOH 18:37 Hessa gisho, Philaxoosi Yesuusako, “Yaatin, neeni kawoyee?” yaagidi oychis. Yesuusi zaaridi, “Tuma ta kawo gideysa ne gadasa. Taani yeletidaynne ha alamiya yiday tumatethaas markatanaasa. Tumaa bagga gidida oonika taani geysa si7ees” yaagis.
JOH 18:38 Philaxoosi, “Tumi aybee?” yaagis. Philaxoosi hessa gidaape guye Ayhudetako kare keyidi, “Taani iyape ay iitaka demmabike.
JOH 18:39 Shin Paasika Ba7aale gallas, issi ase hintew qashope billiya meezey de7ees. Taani hintew Ayhudeta kawa billana mela koyeetii?” yaagis.
JOH 18:40 Enti zaaridi, banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Barbaana billafe attishin, iya gidenna” yaagidosona. Shin Barbaani panga.
JOH 19:1 Hessafe guye, Philaxoosi Yesuusa garaafisis.
JOH 19:2 Wotaaddareti aguntha kallacha medhidi iya huuphen wothidosona. Qassi zo7o ma7o iya mayzidosona.
JOH 19:3 Iyako shiiqidi, “Ayhude kawaw, merinaw kawota” yaagidi iya baqidosona.
JOH 19:4 Philaxoosi qassika kare keyidi, Ayhudetako, “Heko, taani iyape ay iitaka demmaboonnaysa hinte erana mela iya hinteko kare kessana” yaagis.
JOH 19:5 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi aguntha kallacha ba huuphen wothidi, zo7o ma7o ma7idi, kare keyis. Philaxoosi Ayhudetako, “Uraa haysa be7ite” yaagis.
JOH 19:6 Kahine halaqatinne Xoossa Keetha naageysati iya be7ida wode, banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Masqaliya bolla kaqa! Kaqa!” yaagidosona. Philaxoosi entako, “Hinte iya efidi, masqaliya bolla kaqite. Taani iyape ay iitaka demmabike” yaagis.
JOH 19:7 Ayhudeti zaaridi, “Nuus higgey de7ees. I bana Xoossaa na7a oothida gisho nu higgiyatho I hayqanaw bessees” yaagidosona.
JOH 19:8 Philaxoosi hessa si7ida wode kaseysafe daro yayyis.
JOH 19:9 Qassika Philaxoosi ba ooso keethi simmi gelidi Yesuusako, “Neeni awupe yadii?” yaagidi oychis. Shin Yesuusi iyaw aykoka zaaribeenna.
JOH 19:10 Hessa gisho, Philaxoosi, “Taw odikii? Nena billanaw woyko masqaliya bolla kaqanaw taw maati de7eysa erikii?” yaagis.
JOH 19:11 Yesuusi, “Xoossay new maata immiboonnaba gidiyako ta bolla maati new deennashin. Hessa gisho, tana new aathidi immidaysi aadhiya nagara oothis” yaagis.
JOH 19:12 Philaxoosi hessa si7ida wode Yesuusa billanaw oge koyis. Shin Ayhudeti banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Neeni iya billiyabaa gidiko Kawa Qeesare bagga gidaka. Bana kawo giya oonika Qeesare morke” yaagidosona.
JOH 19:13 Philaxoosi hessa si7idi Yesuusa kare kessis. Yaatidi, “Loche Shuchi” geetetiya bessan pirda oydiyan uttis. Ibraawetho doonan he bessay “Gabate” guussu.
JOH 19:14 He gallasay Paasika Ba7aale bonchanaw giigetetha gallas. Sa7ay usupun saate heera. Philaxoosi Ayhudetako, “Hinte kawa haysa be7ite” yaagis.
JOH 19:15 Ayhudeti banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Digga! Digga! Masqaliya bolla kaqa” yaagidosona. Philaxoosi zaaridi, “Hinte kawa taani masqaliya bolla kaqanaysa koyeetii?” yaagidi oychis. Kahine halaqati, “Qeesarepe hara kawoy nuus baawa” yaagidosona.
JOH 19:16 Hessafe guye, enti Yesuusa masqaliya bolla kaqana mela Philaxoosi entaw aathidi immis. Enti Yesuusa oykidi efidosona.
JOH 19:17 Yesuusi ba masqaliya tookidi, “Huuphe guugge” geetetiya bessaa bis. “Huuphe guugge” guussay Ibraawetho doonan “Golgota” guussu.
JOH 19:18 Enti he bessan masqaliya bolla Yesuusa kaqidosona. Qassi iyara hara nam7u asata, issuwa ya baggara hankuwa ha baggara masqaliya bolla kaqidosona.
JOH 19:19 Philaxoosi, “Ayhudeta Kawa, Naazirete Yesuusa” giya xuufe xaafidi masqaliya bolla wothis.
JOH 19:20 Yesuusi masqaliya bolla kaqetida bessay katamas matan de7iya gisho, daro Ayhudeti he xuufiya nabbabidosona. Xuufey xaafetiday Ibraawetho doonan, Laatine doonaninne Girike doonana.
JOH 19:21 Hessa gisho, kahine halaqati Philaxoosako, “ ‘Ha addey bana Ayhude kawo yaagis’ gada xaafape attishin, ‘Ayhude kawo’ gada xaafopa” yaagidosona.
JOH 19:22 Yaatin, Philaxoosi, “Ta xaafidaysa xaafas” yaagidi zaaris.
JOH 19:23 Wotaaddareti masqaliya bolla iya kaqidaape guye, iya ma7uwa ekidi, oyddu bessan shaakidi, isso isso ekidosona. Yeda ma7etiya iya adussa ma7uwa ekidosona.
JOH 19:24 Wotaaddareti, “Oona gakaneeko, saama yegganaape attishin, ma7uwa peedhoko” yaagidosona. Hessi haniday Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Ta ma7uwa shaaki ekidosona; ta adussa ma7uwa bollaka saama yeggidosona” geetetidaysi poletana melasa. Hessa gisho, wotaadareti hessa oothidosona.
JOH 19:25 Shin Yesuusa masqaliya matan iya aayiya, iya aaye michiya, Qeliyoophe machiya Mayraamanne Magdela Mayraama eqidosona.
JOH 19:26 Yesuusi ba aayiwunne I dosiya tamaarey yan eqidaysata be7idi, ba aayeko, “Ta aaye, ne na7aa haysa be7a” yaagis.
JOH 19:27 Hessafe guye, he tamaariyako, “Ne aayiw hanno be7a” yaagis. He tamaarey iyo he wodepe doomidi baara daana mela soo efis.
JOH 19:28 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi ubbay ha77i poletidaysa eridi, Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetidaysi poletana mela “Tana saamees” yaagis.
JOH 19:29 He bessan issi xugga kumetha caala woyney de7ees. Enti isponje he woyniyan yeggidi, hisoophe mitha xeeran wothidi, Yesuusa doonako shiishidosona.
JOH 19:30 Yesuusi woyniya ganxi be7idi, “Poletis” yaagis. Hessafe guye, ba huuphiya ziqi oothidi ba shempuwa immis.
JOH 19:31 He gallasay giigetetha gallas gidiya gishonne wontetha gallasay boncho Sambaata gidiya gisho, asata ahay masqaliya bolla Sambaata gallas pee7onna mela enta tohuwa menthidi, masqaliyape wodhisana mela Ayhudeti Philaxoosa woossidosona.
JOH 19:32 Hessa gisho, wotaadareti bidi, Yesuusara kaqetida nam7u asata tohuwa menthidosona.
JOH 19:33 Shin Yesuusako yida wode I hayqidaysa be7idi, iya tohuwa menthibookona.
JOH 19:34 Shin wotaadaretape issoy iya miya tooran caddin iiraka suuthinne haathi goggis.
JOH 19:35 Hinte ammanana mela hessa be7idaysi markatis. Iya markatethayka tuma. Qassi I odeysi tuma gideysa erees.
JOH 19:36 Hessi haniday Geeshsha Maxaafay, “Iya meqethatape issoyka meqenna” gidaysi poletana melasa.
JOH 19:37 Qassika Geeshsha Maxaafay hara bessan, “Enti banta caddidaysa be7ana” yaagees.
JOH 19:38 Hessafe guye, Armaate katamape yida Yoosefi Yesuusa aha ekanaw Philaxoosa woossis. Yoosefi Ayhudetas yayyida gisho qosan Yesuusa kaalleysa. Philaxoosi, “Eka” yaagis. Hessa gisho, Yoosefi bidi Yesuusa aha ekis.
JOH 19:39 Qassi Niqodimoosi hessafe kase Yesuusako qamma yidaysi, karbenne godare uuthara walaketida hastamanne issi kilo giraame gidiya shitto ekidi Yoosefara yis.
JOH 19:40 He nam7u asati Yesuusa aha ekidi, Ayhudeti aha xaaxiya maaran, shittora, moogo afilan xaaxidosona.
JOH 19:41 Yesuusi masqaliya bolla kaqetida bessan daro atakiltey de7ees. He atakiltiya giddon shuchafe woocetidi oosetida buroo oonika moogetiboonna ooratha duufoy de7ees.
JOH 19:42 He gongoloy matan de7iya gishonne Ayhudeti Sambaatas giigetiya gallas gidiya gisho, Yesuusa aha yan moogidosona.
JOH 20:1 Wogga wode wonta buroo geeyonna de7ishin, Magdela Mayraama, Yesuusi moogetida duufuwa bada shuchay he duufuwa doonape dendidaysa be7asu.
JOH 20:2 Simoon Phexroosakonne Yesuusi dosiya hanko tamaariyako woxa bada, “Duufuwape Godaa efidosona; iya awun wothidaako nu eroko” yaagasu.
JOH 20:3 Hessa gisho, Phexroosinne hanko tamaarey keyidi duufuwa bidosona.
JOH 20:4 Nam7ayka issife woxidosona, shin hanko tamaarey Phexroosape aadhidi sinthatidi duufuwa gakis.
JOH 20:5 He tamaarey hokidi, moogo afilaa be7is, shin duufuwan wodhibeenna.
JOH 20:6 Simoon Phexroosi iya kaalli yidi, duufuwan wodhidi moogo afilay yan de7eysa be7is.
JOH 20:7 Qassi Yesuusa huuphen xaaxetida afilay xaaxetida mela dumma issi bessan de7eysa be7is. He afilay dumma de7eesipe attishin, moogo afilara issife deenna.
JOH 20:8 He wode, sinthatidi duufuwa gakida hanko tamaarey geli be7idi ammanis.
JOH 20:9 Yesuusi hayqope dendanaw besseysa odiya Geeshsha maxaafaa qaala enti buroo akeekibokona.
JOH 20:10 Hessafe guye, iya tamaareti banta soo simmi bidosona.
JOH 20:11 Shin Mayraama he duufuwa doonan eqada yeekashe hokada duufuwa giddo xeellasu.
JOH 20:12 Bootha ma7o ma7ida nam7u kiitanchoti Yesuusa ahay zin7ida bessan issoy huuphesoora hankoy tohosoora uttidashin be7asu.
JOH 20:13 Enti iiko, “Maccasete, ayis yeekay?” yaagidi oychidosona. Iya, “Enti ta Godaa efidosona; enti awun wothidaako taani erike” yaagasu.
JOH 20:14 Hessa gidaape guye, iya guye simma xeelliya wode, Yesuusi yan eqidaysa be7asu. Shin I Yesuusa gididaysa erabuku.
JOH 20:15 Yesuusi iiko, “Maccasete, ayis yeekay? Oona koyay?” yaagidi oychis. Mayraama atakilte oosanchuwa daanin, “Godaw, ne ekidaba gidiko, iya awun wothidaako taw odarkii. Taani iya ekana” yaagasu.
JOH 20:16 Yesuusi iiko, “Mayraame” yaagis. Iya iyako simmada, Ibraawetho doonan “Rebuuni” yaagasu. Hessas birshethay “Astamaariyaw” guussu.
JOH 20:17 Yesuusi iiko, “Taani buroo ta Aawako boonna gisho, tana oykofa. Shin ta ishatako bada, ‘Taani ta Aawakonne hinte Aawako, ta Xoossaakonne hinte Xoossaako, simmana gis’ gada entaw oda” yaagis.
JOH 20:18 Magdela Mayraama Godaa be7idaysanne iw hessa I odidaysa bada iya tamaaretas odasu.
JOH 20:19 Wogga wode omarsi, iya tamaareti Ayhudetas yayyidi kariya gordidi shiiqi uttidashin, Yesuusi yidi, enta giddon eqidi, “Saroy hintew gido” yaagis.
JOH 20:20 Hessa gidi simmidi ba kushiyanne ba miya enta bessis. Iya tamaareti Godaa be7ida wode daro ufaytidosona.
JOH 20:21 Yesuusi zaaridi entako, “Saroy hintew gido; ta Aaway tana kiitidaysada taanika hintena kiittayis” yaagis.
JOH 20:22 Hessa gidaape guye, enta bolla ufu gidi punnis. Qassi, “Geeshsha Ayyaana ekite.
JOH 20:23 Hinte atto gida asaa nagaray atto geetetana. Hinte atto goonnayisata nagaray atto geetetenna” yaagis.
JOH 20:24 Shin tammanne nam7u tamaaretape issoy, Didimoosa geetetiya Toomasi, Yesuusi yida wode entara deenna.
JOH 20:25 Hessa gisho, hanko iya tamaareti Toomasako, “Nuuni Godaa be7ida” yaagidosona. Shin Toomasi entako, “Misimaaren I cadetida iya kushiyan de7iya beeta be7onnanne he beeta ta biradhen bochonna, qassi ta kushiya iya miyen yedda be7onna ammanike” yaagis.
JOH 20:26 Saamintafe guye, Yesuusa tamaareti qassika son shiiqidi uttidosona; Toomasika entara de7ees. Karey gordetidi de7ishin Yesuusi yidi, enta giddon eqidi, “Saroy hintew gido” yaagis.
JOH 20:27 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi Toomasako, “Ta kushiya ne biradhen bochada be7a. Qassi ne kushiya ta miyiyan yedda be7a. Neeni sidhopa, ammana” yaagis.
JOH 20:28 Toomasi zaaridi, “Ta Godaw, ta Xoossaw” yaagis.
JOH 20:29 Yaatin Yesuusi, “Neeni tana be7ida gisho ammanadasa, shin tana be7onna ammanidaysati anjetidaysata” yaagis.
JOH 20:30 Yesuusi ha maxaafan xaafetiboonna hara daro malaatata ba tamaareta sinthan oothis.
JOH 20:31 Shin Yesuusi I Kiristoosa, Xoossaa Na7aa gideysa hinte ammanana melanne ammanidi iya sunthan de7o demmana mela haysi xaafetis.
JOH 21:1 Hessafe guye, Yesuusi Xibradoosa Abba matan ba tamaaretas zaari qoncis. I entaw haysafe kaallidi de7iya hanotan qoncis.
JOH 21:2 Simoon Phexroosi, Mente geetetiya Toomasi, Qaana Galilape yida Natina7eeli, Zabdiyoosa naytinne Yesuusa tamaaretape hara nam7ati issife de7oosona.
JOH 21:3 Simoon Phexroosi entako, “Taani molo oykanaw bayis” yaagis. Enti, “Nuka neera baana” yaagidi, wogoluwa giddo gelidosona. Shin enti he qamman aybi moloka oykibookona.
JOH 21:4 Wonta guura xalqey dolanaape sinthe, Yesuusi abba gaxan eqis, shin iya tamaareti Yesuusa gididaysa eribookona.
JOH 21:5 Yesuusi entako, “Ta laggeto, molo oykibeeketii?” yaagis. Enti zaaridi, “Aykoka oykibooko” yaagidosona.
JOH 21:6 I zaaridi, “Hinte gitiya wogoluwape ushacha baggara yeggite; guutha molo hinte oykana” yaagis. Hessa gisho, gitiya ushacha baggara yeggidosona. Moloy darida gisho goochi kessanaw xoonetidosona.
JOH 21:7 Yesuusi dosiya tamaarey Phexroosako, “Haysi Godaa!” yaagis. Simoon Phexroosi I Godaa gidaysa si7ida wode, kallo de7iya gisho, ba ma7uwa ma7idi abba giddo gupi gelis.
JOH 21:8 Shin wogoluwan attida hanko tamaareti moloy kumida gitiya goochidi, abbaafe gaxa keyidosona. Enti abbaafe nam7u xeetu wadha mela haakoosona.
JOH 21:9 Enti abbaafe gaxa keyida wode, xiifa bonqon moloy de7eysanne uythi be7idosona.
JOH 21:10 Yesuusi entako, “Ha77i hinte oykida moluwape guuthara hammite” yaagis.
JOH 21:11 Simoon Phexroosi wogoluwan gelidi, xeetanne ishatammanne heedzu wogga moloti kumida gitiya goochidi abbaafe gaxa kessis. Moloy hessa mela daro gidin gitey daaketibeenna.
JOH 21:12 Yesuusi entako, “Haa yidi miite” yaagis. I Godaa gideysa enti erida gisho, iya tamaaretape issoyka, “Neeni oonee?” gidi iya oychanaw minniday baawa.
JOH 21:13 Yesuusi yidi, uythaa ekidi entaw immis; moluwaka hessada immis.
JOH 21:14 Yesuusi hayqope dendidi ba tamaaretas qoncishin haysi heedzantho.
JOH 21:15 Enti midaape guye, Yesuusi Simoon Phexroosako, “Yoona na7aw Simoona, tana haysatape aathada dosay?” yaagis. Simoon Phexroosi, “Ee Godaw, taani nena doseysa ne eraasa” yaagis. Yesuusi iyako, “Ta dorsa marata heemma” yaagis.
JOH 21:16 Yesuusi qassika, “Yoona na7aw Simoona, tana dosay?” yaagis. Simoon Phexroosi, “Ee Godaw, taani nena doseysa ne eraasa” yaagis. Yesuusi, “Ta dorsata heemma” yaagis.
JOH 21:17 Yesuusi heedzantho, “Yoona na7aw Simoona, tana dosay?” yaagis. Yesuusi heedzantho Simoon Phexroosako, “Tana dosay?” yaagidi oychida gisho, Phexroosi azzanidi, “Godaw, neeni ubbaba eraasa; taani nena doseysa ne eraasa” yaagis. Yesuusi, “Ta dorsata heemma.
JOH 21:18 Taani new tuma odayis; neeni na7atethan de7iya wode, nerka dancetada, ne koyida soo baasa. Shin ne cimida wode ne kushiya micca bessaana. Hari dancisana; ne dosonna soo efana” yaagis.
JOH 21:19 Yesuusi hessa Phexroosi ay mela hayqo hayqidi, Xoossaa bonchisaneeko erisanaw gis. Hessa gidaape guye, Yesuusi Phexroosako, “Tana kaalla” yaagis.
JOH 21:20 Phexroosi guye simmidi, Yesuusi dosiya tamaarey baape guyera yeysa be7is. He tamaarey, kaho miya bessan Yesuusako shiiqidi, “Godaw, nena aathidi immanay oonee?” gidaysa.
JOH 21:21 Phexroosi he tamaariya be7idi, “Godaw, ha addey qassi waananee?” yaagidi Yesuusa oychis.
JOH 21:22 Yesuusi iyako, “Taani yaana gakanaw I daana mela taani koyko, hessi nena ay metidee? Neeni tana kaalla” yaagis.
JOH 21:23 Hessa gisho, he tamaarey hayqenna giya oday ishata ubbaa gakis. Shin Yesuusi, “Taani yaana gakanaw, I daana mela taani koyko nena ay metidee?” yaagisipe attishin, “Hayqenna” gibeenna.
JOH 21:24 Ha odabaa markatidaynne haysa xaafiday he tamaariya. Iya markatethay tuma gideysa nuuni eroos.
JOH 21:25 Yesuusi oothida hara darobay de7ees. Ta qopin, ubbabay huuphen huuphen xaafetidaako, xaafetiya maxaafatas kumetha alamey wothanaw gidanaba daanenna.
ACT 1:1 Tewofloosa, Yesuusi ba oosuwa oykida wodepe salo bida gallasaa gakanaw, oothidabaanne tamaarsidaba ubba taani ta koyro maxaafan xaafas. Salo baanape sinthe I ba doorida hawaareta, Geeshsha Ayyaanan kiittis.
ACT 1:3 I ba waayiyape guye, hayqope dendidaysa sidhey bayna qoncisidi entaw bana bessis. Oytamu gallas entaw qoncidi Xoossa kawotethaaba enta tamaarsis.
ACT 1:4 Issi wode entara issife de7ishe enta haysada yaagidi kiittis: “Ta hintew odida, ta Aaway immana gida ufaysa qaala naagitepe attishin, Yerusalaamepe keyopite.
ACT 1:5 Yohaanisi haathan xammaqis, shin guutha wodepe guye, Geeshsha Ayyaanan hinte xammaqetana” yaagis.
ACT 1:6 Hawaareti issife Yesuusara shiiqida bessan, “Godaw, Isra7eeletas ne kawotetha zaarana wodey haysee?” yaagidi oychidosona.
ACT 1:7 Yesuusi entako, “Ta Aaway ba maatan oothiya wodenne laythi hinte eranaw danda7eketa.
ACT 1:8 Shin Geeshsha Ayyaanay hinte bolla wodhiya wode, hinte wolqan kumana. Yaani simmidi, Yerusalaamen, Yihuda biitta ubban, Samaareninne sa7a gaxa gakanaw taw markata gidana” yaagis.
ACT 1:9 Hessa gidaape guye enti xeellishin, dhoqu dhoqu gidi, salo bin, iya enta ayfepe shaari genthis.
ACT 1:10 Yesuusi biya wode enti salo tishshi oothidi xeellishin, bootha ma7o ma7ida nam7u asati akeekona enta matan eqidi,
ACT 1:11 “Galila asato, salo xeellishe, hinte ayis eqidetii? Ha hinte be7ishin salo bida Yesuusi hessadaka simmidi yaana” yaagidosona.
ACT 1:12 Hessafe guye, hawaareti Shamaho zumaape Yerusalaame simmidosona. Shamaho zumay Yerusalaames matan de7ees.
ACT 1:13 Enti Yerusalaame gelidi, banta de7iya bessa, pooqiya bolla keyidosona. Entika: Phexroosa, Yohaanisa, Yayqooba, Indiriyasa, Filphoosa, Toomasa, Bartelemoosa, Maatosa, Ilfiyoosa na7a Yayqooba, ba biittas mishetiya Simoonanne Yayqooba na7a Yihuda.
ACT 1:14 Haysati ubbay maccasatara, Yesuusa aaye Mayraamiranne Yesuusa ishatara ubbay issi wozanan gididi minthidi woossosona.
ACT 1:15 He wode, Phexroosi xeetanne laatama gidiya ammaniya asay shiiqida bessan dendi eqidi, haysada yaagis:
ACT 1:16 “Asaw, Yesuusa oykidaysata kaalethida Yihudaba, Geeshsha Ayyaanay kase Dawita doonan odida Xoossa qaalay poletanaw bessees.
ACT 1:17 Yihudi nuura issife ha oosuwa oothanaw dooretida asi.”
ACT 1:18 Shin Yihudi ba iita oosuwan demmida miishen gade shammis. I sintha guthu kundin, iya uloy daaketis; iya maraace ubbay kare keyis.
ACT 1:19 Yihuda bolla hanidaba Yerusalaamen de7iya asa ubbay si7is. Hessa gisho, he gadiya banta qaalan Akeldaama (Suutha gade) gidi xeegidosona.
ACT 1:20 “Hessika mazmure maxaafan, “ ‘Iya keethay kallo atto; oonika iyan de7opo. Qassi iya shuumatetha hari eko’ geetetidi xaafetis.
ACT 1:21 “Hessa gisho, Godaa Yesuusi nu giddon simeretida wode ubban nuura de7eysatape,
ACT 1:22 qassi Xammaqiya Yohaanisa wodepe doomidi Godaa Yesuusi salo bida gallas gakanaw nuura de7eysatape issi asi iya denduwas nuura marka gidanaw bessees” yaagis.
ACT 1:23 Hessa gisho, asay dooruwas Yosxoosa woyko Barsabaasa geetetiya Yoosefanne Maatiyasa nam7a shiishidosona.
ACT 1:24 Hessafe guye, Xoossa woossishe, “Asa ubba wozana eriya Godaw, ha nam7atape ne oona dooridako nuna bessa.
ACT 1:25 Yihudi ba bessaa bidi, aggida oosuwanne hawaaretetha oosuwa ekana mela haysatape nuus qoncisa” yaagidosona.
ACT 1:26 Enta bolla saama yeggidosona. Saamay Maatiyasa bolla wodhin, Maatiyasi tammanne issi hawaareta bolla guzhetis.
ACT 2:1 Phenxeqosxe gallasay gakida wode ammaniya asa ubbay issife issi bessan shiiqidi de7oosona.
ACT 2:2 Qoponna wolqaama goteda guummiya guunthay akeekona salope yidi enti de7iya keetha kumis.
ACT 2:3 Qassi tama laco daaniya inxarsati entaw bentishe, shaaketi shaaketi enta ubbaa bolla wodhidosona.
ACT 2:4 Enti ubbay Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumidi dumma dumma doonan odetana mela Geeshsha Ayyaanay enta danda7isin haasaya doomidosona.
ACT 2:5 He wode biitta ubbaafe yida Xoossas babbiya Ayhudeti Yerusalaamen de7oosona.
ACT 2:6 He guuntha si7ida wode daro asay shiiqidosona. Ammaniya asay enta qaalan odetishin si7ida gisho,
ACT 2:7 malaaletidi, “Ha odetiya asa ubbay Galila ase gidokonaayee?
ACT 2:8 Yaatin, nuuni, nu yeletida biitta doonan enti odetishin waanidi si7anaw danda7ido?
ACT 2:9 Nuuni Pharxen, Meedonan, Elaaman, Masephexoomen de7eysati, Yihudan, Qaphadooqan, Phanxoosan, Iisen,
ACT 2:10 Pirgen, Phinfilen, Gibxen, Qaarena matan de7iya Liiben de7eyisata. Nuupe baggatika Roomepe yida asata.
ACT 2:11 Ayhudetinne Ayhudetetha ammano gelida asati, Qarxeesanne Arabe asati, Xoossay oothida gita oosuwa nu qaalan odetishin si7oos” yaagidosona.
ACT 2:12 Ubbay malaaletidi, gaanaba dhayidi, “La haysi ay guussee?” yaagidosona.
ACT 2:13 Shin harati, “Haysati woyne uyidi mathotidosona” yaagidi qelqisidosona.
ACT 2:14 Shin Phexroosi, tammanne issi hawaaretara dendi eqidi, ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, entaw haysada yaagidi odis: “Ayhudeto, Yerusalaamen de7iya ubbato, taani odeysa si7ite.
ACT 2:15 Wontafe heedzu saate gidiya gisho hinte qopeysada ha asati mathotibookona; hessi hintew ereto.
ACT 2:16 Shin haysi haniday nabey Iyyu7eeli odidaysi poletana melasa.
ACT 2:17 “ ‘Xoossay, wodiya wursethan haysada hanana yaagees: taani asa ubbaa bolla ta Ayyaana gussana. Hinte adde naytinne macca nayti, tinbite odana. Hinte yalagati qoncethi be7ana; hinte cimati amuho amuhana.
ACT 2:18 He gallasatan tana ammaniya adde aylleta bollanne macca aylleta bolla taani ta Ayyaana gussana; enti tinbite odana.
ACT 2:19 Qassi taani bolla salon oorathaba, garsa sa7anka malla bessaana. Suuthay, tamaynne wolqaama caaganay bentana.
ACT 2:20 Gitanne boncho gidida Godaa gallasay gakanaape sinthe awi dhumana; ageeni suuthi daanana.
ACT 2:21 He wode hessada hanana; Godaa sunthaa xeegiya oonika attana’ yaagis.
ACT 2:22 “Isra7eele asato, ha qaala si7ite. Naazirete Yesuusa oonatethay, Xoossay hinte giddon oothida wolqaama oosuwaninne malaatatan hintew qoncoysa hinte, hinte huuphen ereeta.
ACT 2:23 Xoossa kase eraninne iya shenen, Yesuusi hintew aadhidi imetis. Hinte, nagaranchoti iya masqale bolla kaqidi wodhana mela aathidi immideta.
ACT 2:24 Shin Xoossay hayqo wolqa diggidi iya denthis. Hessa gisho, hayqoy iya oykanaw danda7ibeenna.
ACT 2:25 Dawiti iyabaa odishe, “ ‘Taani yarkonna mela, Goday ta ushachan de7ees. Godaa ubba wode ta matan be7ayis.
ACT 2:26 Hessa gisho, ta wozanay ufaytis; ta inxarsan ufaysi kumis; hayqiya ta asatethay ufaysan daana.
ACT 2:27 Ayis giiko, ta shempuwa Si7oolen aggaka. Qassi ne Geeshsha Na7a aha wooqisaka.
ACT 2:28 Neeni tana de7o oge erisadasa. Neeni taara de7eysan ta ufaysay kumethi gidees’ yaagis.
ACT 2:29 “Asaw, nu aawa Dawitaba ta hintew geeshshada odana. Dawiti hayqidi moogetis; iya duufoy hachi gakanaw nu matan de7ees.
ACT 2:30 Dawiti nabe gidida gisho, Xoossay iya sheeshape issuwa iya kawotetha araata bolla utisanaw iyaw caaqida caaquwa erees.
ACT 2:31 Hessa gisho, Kiristoosa denduwa sinthe xeellidi, ‘Iya shempoy Si7oolen attibeenna; iya asatethayka wooqibeenna’ gidi odis.
ACT 2:32 “Xoossay, ha Yesuusa hayqope denthidaysas nuuni ubbay marka.
ACT 2:33 Hessa gisho, Xoossay baara haarana mela baape ushacha baggara iya dhoqu dhoqu oothidi, iyaw immana geetetida Geeshsha Ayyaana ekidi, haysa hinte ha77i be7eysanne si7eysa nu bolla gussis.
ACT 2:34 Gaasoyka, Dawiti ba huuphen salo bibeenna shin yaagis. “Goday, ta Godaa, ‘Taani ne morketa ne tohoy yedhiyaso oothana gakanaw haysan, taape ushacha baggara utta’ ” gis. yaagis.
ACT 2:36 “Hessa gisho, ha hinte masqale bolla kaqida Yesuusa, Xoossay Godanne Kiristoosa oothidaysa Isra7eele asa ubbay tuma ero” yaagis.
ACT 2:37 Asay Phexroosi gidaysa si7ida wode banta wozanan boshetidi Phexroosanne hanko hawaaretako, “Ishato, yaatin nuuni ay oothino?” yaagidosona.
ACT 2:38 Phexroosi entako, “Hinte nagaray atto geetetana mela nagaraape simmidi, hinte issoy issoy Yesuus Kiristoosa sunthan xammaqetite. Xoossay immiya Geeshsha Ayyaana hinte ekana.
ACT 2:39 Gaasoyka Xoossay immana gida ufaysa qaalay hintew, hinte naytasinne Goday nu Xoossay baako xeegiya haahon de7iya ubbaasa” yaagis.
ACT 2:40 Phexroosi entaw hara qaalaka guji markatidi, “Ha wodiya geella asaa bolla yaanaw de7iya pirdafe hinte huuphiya ashshite” yaagidi zoris.
ACT 2:41 Phexroosi odidaysa ekidaysati xammaqetidosona. He gallas heedzu mukulu gidiya asay ammanidosona.
ACT 2:42 Enti hawaareta timirtiyan, issifetethan, uytha muusaninne woosan minnoosona.
ACT 2:43 Hawaareta kushen daro oorathabaynne malaati oosetiya gisho asa ubbay yayidosona.
ACT 2:44 Ammanida ubbay issife de7oosona; bantaw de7iyaba ubbaa issife shaaketoosona.
ACT 2:45 Enti bantaw de7iyaba bayzidi miishiya issuwas issuwas koshshida mela shaakosona.
ACT 2:46 Ubba gallas issi wozanan gididi xoossa keethan shiiqoosona. Banta keethan issoy issuwa xeegidi ufaysaninne ashke wozanan kathi moosona.
ACT 2:47 Xoossa galatishe asa ubban sabetidosona. Goday atteyisata gallas gallas enta bolla gujees.
ACT 3:1 Issi gallas Phexroosinne Yohaanisi woossanaw uddufun saaten Xoossa Keethi bidosona.
ACT 3:2 Yeletoosope doomidi wobbe gidida issi addey Xoossa Keethi geliya asaape miishe woossana mela ubba gallas lo77o geetetiya Xoossa Keetha pengen ehidi wothoosona.
ACT 3:3 He wobbe addey Phexroosinne Yohaanisi Xoossa Keethi gelana hanishin be7idi enta miishe woossis.
ACT 3:4 Entika iya caddi xeellidi, “Nuuko haa xeella” yaagidosona.
ACT 3:5 Wobbe addey entafe ayko ekana daanin entako xeellis.
ACT 3:6 Shin Phexroosi iyako, “Taw miishey baawa, shin taw de7iyaba taani new immana. Naazirete Yesuus Kiristoosa sunthan dendada hemeta” yaagis.
ACT 3:7 Hessafe guye, wobbe addiyas ushacha kushiya oykidi denthis. Ellesidi iya tohoynne qincafiley minni aggis.
ACT 3:8 Addey gupidi dendi eqis. Gedenne haa hemethi doomis. Hemetishe, gupishenne Xoossa galatishe entara issife Xoossa Keethi gelis.
ACT 3:9 I hemetishininne Xoossa galatishin asa ubbay iya be7idosona.
ACT 3:10 Be7ida ubbay miishe woossanaw lo77o geetetiya xoossa keetha pengen uttidaysi, iya gididaysa eridosona; I hanidaba be7idi malaaletidosona.
ACT 3:11 Addey Phexroosapenne Yohaanisape duuxike gidi oykidi de7ishin, asa ubbay malaaletidi, Solomone barandaa geetetiya bessan issife entako woxidosona.
ACT 3:12 Phexroosi asaa be7ida wode asaako, “Isra7eele asaw, ayis haysan malaaletetii? Woyko ayis nuna caddi xeelletii? Nuuni nu wolqan woyko nu xillotethan ha addiya hemethidaba hintew daanii?
ACT 3:13 Abrahaame, Yisaaqa, Yayqooba Xoossay, nu aawata Xoossay, ba na7aa Yesuusa bonchis. Shin hinte hayqos aathidi immidaysa Philaxoosi billanaw koyinka hinte iya sinthan, ‘Nuuni iya eroko’ yaagideta.
ACT 3:14 Hinte geeshshanne xilluwa, ‘Nuuni iya eroko’ gidi, shempo wodhidaysa hintew billana mela Philaxoosa woossideta.
ACT 3:15 De7o immeysa hinte wodhideta, shin Xoossay hayqope iya denthis. Hessas nuuni marka.
ACT 3:16 Ha hinte be7eysinne eriya addey, paxidi minniday Yesuusa sunthan ammanidaysana. Ha hinte ubba sinthan iya haysada pathiday, I Yesuusa ammanida gishosa.
ACT 3:17 “Ha77ika ta ishato, hinteka hintena kaaletheysatada, eronna oothidaysa taani erayis.
ACT 3:18 Shin Xoossay beni nabeta ubba doonan, ‘Kiristoosi waaye ekanaw bessees’ yaagidaysi haysada poletana mela oothis.
ACT 3:19 Hiza, Xoossay hinte nagara atto gaana mela Godaako simmite.
ACT 3:20 Godaa matape minthetho wodey hintew yaana. Xoossay Kiristoosa gidana mela sinthatidi doorida Yesuusa hintew yeddana.
ACT 3:21 Xoossay ba geeshsha nabeta doonan beni odidaysa mela ubbabay ooraxiya wodey gakanaw Yesuusi salon gam7anaw bessees.
ACT 3:22 Musey, ‘Godaa Xoossay tana denthidaysa mela hinte giddofe hintew nabe denthana. Hinte I geysa ubbaa si7ite.
ACT 3:23 He nabey odeysa si7onna asi oonika asaa giddofe shaaketidi dhayo’ yaagis.
ACT 3:24 “Qassi Sameelape doomidi de7iya nabeti ubbay ha wodiyaba odidosona.
ACT 3:25 Hinte nabeta nayta; qassi Xoossay Abrahaames, ‘Sa7an de7iya asa ubbaa taani ne sheesha baggara anjana’ yaagidi nu aawatas gelida qaala laattiya nayta.
ACT 3:26 Xoossay hintena ubbaa hinte iita ogepe zaaridi anjana mela ba na7a denthidi hintew koyro yeddis” yaagis.
ACT 4:1 Phexroosinne Yohaanisi asaas odishin kahine halaqati, Xoossa Keethe naageysata halaqaynne Saduqaaweti entako yidosona.
ACT 4:2 Enti Yesuusi hayqope dendoysanne iya gaason hayqope dendoy de7eysa asaa tamaarsida gisho yilotidosona.
ACT 4:3 Hessa gisho, enta oykidi sa7i omarsida gisho wontana gakanaw qasho keethi gelsidosona.
ACT 4:4 Shin qaala si7idaysatape daroti ammanidosona. Ammanida adde asaa tayboy ichashu mukuluko bis.
ACT 4:5 Wontetha gallas deriya haareysati, cimatinne, higge astamaareti Yerusalaamen shiiqidosona.
ACT 4:6 He asa giddon kahine halaqay Haanni, Qayyaafi, Yohaanisi, Iskindireynne kahine halaqaa soo asati ubbay de7oosona.
ACT 4:7 Hawaareta banta sinthan essidi, “Aybi wolqan woyko oodde sunthan haysa hinte oothidetii?” yaagidi oychidosona.
ACT 4:8 He wode Phexroosi Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumidi, “Deriya haareysato, cimato,
ACT 4:9 hachi ha wobbe addiyas oosetida lo77o oosuwasinne I waanidi paxidaako hinte nuna oychiko,
ACT 4:10 masqaliya bolla hinte kaqin, Xoossay hayqope denthida Naazirete Yesuus Kiristoosa sunthan ha addey paxidi hinte sinthan eqidaysi hintewunne Isra7eele asa ubbaas ereto.
ACT 4:11 “ ‘Gimbeysati boridi ixida shuchay, godaa xaphuwa minthiya, ubbaafe aadhiya shuchu gidis. He shuchay Yesuusa.’
ACT 4:12 Hessa gisho, atotethi iya baggarape attishin, hara oodde baggaraka baawa. Nuuni iya sunthan attana mela asa ubbaas Xoossay salope garsan immida hara sunthi baawa” yaagis.
ACT 4:13 Shiiqida asay Phexroosinne Yohaanisi minnida minotetha be7ida wode enti tamaariboonna coo asi gididaysa akeekidi, malaaletidosona; enti Yesuusara de7eysa eridosona.
ACT 4:14 Qassi paxida addey Phexroosaranne Yohaanisara eqidaysa asay be7idi giyaba dhayidosona.
ACT 4:15 Shin Phexroosanne Yohaanisa kare keyana mela oothidi banta giddon,
ACT 4:16 “Ha asata nu ay oothino? Enta kushen oosetida gita malaatay Yerusalaamen de7iya ubbaas bentees. Nuuni hessa eroko gaanaw danda7oko.
ACT 4:17 Shin ha oday asaa giddon laaletonna mela hizape guye, ha asati Yesuusa sunthan oodeska odonna mela minthidi naagisana” yaagidi zoretidosona.
ACT 4:18 Enta xeegidi, Yesuusa sunthan hizape odonna mela woyko tamaarsonna mela kiittidosona.
ACT 4:19 Shin Phexroosinne Yohaanisi entako zaaridi, “Xoossas kiitetanaysafenne hintew kiitetanaysafe Xoossaa sinthan awusi lo77oko? Ane hinte pirdite.
ACT 4:20 Nuuni be7idabaanne si7idaba odonna agganaw danda7oko” yaagidosona.
ACT 4:21 Biitta cimatinne deriya haareysati kasepe minthi naagisidi enta yeddi aggidosona. Asay hanidabaas Xoossaa galatiya gisho enta seeranaw danda7ibookona.
ACT 4:22 He malaatan hargefe paxida addiyas laythi oytamape aadhis.
ACT 4:23 Phexroosinne Yohaanisi birshetidi banta dabbotako bidi, kahine halaqatinne cimati bantako gidaba ubbaa entaw odidosona.
ACT 4:24 Enti hessa si7ida wode issi wozanan gididi Xoossaa haysada yaagidi woossidosona: “Ubbaa Haariya Godaw, saluwa, sa7aa, abbanne enta giddon de7iya ubbaba medhidayso,
ACT 4:25 Neeni ne aylliya, nu aawa Dawita doonan Geeshsha Ayyaanan, “ ‘Derey ayis yilotidonaa? Asay ayis coo maqetidona?
ACT 4:26 Sa7aa kawotinne deriya haareysati issife Godaa bollanne Kiristoosa bolla dendidosona’ yaagadasa.
ACT 4:27 “Tumaka, Herodiisinne Phenxe Philaxoosi Ayhude gidonna asaaranne Isra7eele asaara ne doorida ne geeshsha Na7aa Yesuusa bolla dendanaw ha kataman shiiqidosona.
ACT 4:28 Qassi neeni ne wolqaaninne ne sheniyan oothana gada qopa uttidaba ubbaa polidosona.
ACT 4:29 Ha77ika Godaw, enta mandetha be7a; nuuni ne aylleti ne qaala kumetha wozanan odana mela nuna danda7isa.
ACT 4:30 Ne geeshsha na7aa Yesuusa sunthan harganchota pathanaw, oorathabaynne malaatati oosetana mela ne kushiya micca” gidi woossidosona.
ACT 4:31 Enti Xoossa woossidaape guye, he enti shiiqida bessay qaaxis. Enta ubban Geeshsha Ayyaani kumin Xoossaa qaala minotethan odidosona.
ACT 4:32 Ammaneysati ubbay qofaninne wozanan issino gididosona. Enti bantaw de7iyaba tabaa goonnashin issife shaaketoosona.
ACT 4:33 Hawaareti, Godaa Yesuusi hayqope dendidaysa gita wolqan markatoosona. Xoossay enta ubbaas aadho keehatetha darsidi immis.
ACT 4:34 Biitti woyko keethi de7eysati ubbay bayzi ekida miishiya ehiya gisho, ammaneyisata giddon metootanchoy issoyka baawa.
ACT 4:35 Miishe ehidi hawaaretas immoosona; he miishiya asaas koshshidaysada issuwas issuwas shaaki shaaki immees.
ACT 4:36 Qophiroosa geetetiya bessan yeletida Yoosefa geetetiya Leewe sheeshape gidida issoy de7ees. Iya sunthaa hawaareti Barnabaasa (Minthetho na7a) gidoosona.
ACT 4:37 Barnabaasi baw de7iya biitta bayzidi miishiya ehidi hawaaretas immis.
ACT 5:1 Issi Hananiya geetetiya addey ba mache Saphirira gade bayzis.
ACT 5:2 He bayzida miishiyape ba machiya erishin bagga ashshidi, attidaysa ehidi hawaaretas immis.
ACT 5:3 Shin Phexroosi Hananiyako, “Neeni Geeshsha Ayyaana cimmana melanne gadiya bayzida miishiyape shaakada ashshana mela Xalahey ne wozanan ayis gelidee?
ACT 5:4 Neeni bayzanaape kase gadey nebaa gidenneyee? Qassi neeni bayza simminka miishey nebaa gidenneyee? Yaatin, hessa melaba oothanaw ayis ne wozanan qopadii? Neeni Xoossa bolla wordotadasape attishin, asa bolla wordotabaaka” yaagis.
ACT 5:5 Hanaani he qaala si7ida mela kundidi hayqis; hessa si7ida ubbay daro yayyis.
ACT 5:6 Na7atetha asati soo gelidi iya aha xaaxidi efidi moogidosona.
ACT 5:7 Heedzu saatepe guye Hananiya machiya hessa eronna de7ashe Phexroosi de7iyasuwa gelasu.
ACT 5:8 Phexroosi iiko, “Hinte gadiya haysa mela miishes bayzidetii? Ane taw oda” yaagis. Iyaka, “Ee, haysa mela miishes bayzida” yaagasu.
ACT 5:9 Phexroosi maccasiw, “Neeranne ne azinara Godaa Ayyaana paacanaw ayis zoretidetii? Heko, ne azina moogida asati karen de7oosona; nenaka enti kare kessana” yaagis.
ACT 5:10 Maccasiya iiraka Phexroosa tohuwa matan kundada hayqa aggasu; na7atethati geliya wode hayqidaaro demmidi kare kessidi, I azina matan moogidosona.
ACT 5:11 Kumetha woosa keethaynne hessa si7ida hara asa ubbay daro yayyidosona.
ACT 5:12 Hawaareti daro malaatatanne oorathabata asaa giddon oothosona. Ammaniya ubbay Solomone barandan issife shiiqoosona.
ACT 5:13 Hara asape entara gahetanaw issi asika minnibeenna, shin asay enta bonchees.
ACT 5:14 Ammaniya addetanne maccasata tayboy kaseysafe darishe bis.
ACT 5:15 Hessa gisho, asay harganchota halaninne algan tookidi Phexroosi aadhiya wode iya kuyay entafe issota issota bolla shempana mela oge doonan kessidi wothoosona.
ACT 5:16 Qassi daro asay Yerusalaame matan de7iya katamatape harganchotanne tuna ayyaani waaysiya asata ekidi yoosona; ubbayka paxidosona.
ACT 5:17 Kahine halaqaynne iyara de7iya Saduqaaweti ubbay qanaaten kumidi hawaareta bolla dendidosona.
ACT 5:18 Hawaareta oykidi deriya qasho keethan yeggidosona.
ACT 5:19 Shin Godaa kiitanchoy qamma qasho keetha pengiya dooyidi hawaareta kare kessidi,
ACT 5:20 “Bidi, xoossa keethan eqidi ha ooratha de7o qaala asa ubbaas odite” yaagis.
ACT 5:21 Hawaareti hessa si7ida wode wonta guura Xoossa Keethi gelidi tamaarso doomidosona. Kahineta halaqaynne iyara de7eysati yidi, Isra7eele cimata ubbaa xeegi shiishidi hawaareta banta sinthe ehana mela wotaadareta qasho keethi kiittidosona.
ACT 5:22 Shin wotaadareti qasho keethi bidi hawaareta demmibookona. Guye simmi yidi deriyas,
ACT 5:23 “Nuuni biya wode qasho keetha pengey minthi gordetin, naageysati pengen eqidaysata demmida. Shin nuuni kariya dooyiya wode giddon hari attoshin issi asika baawa” yaagidosona.
ACT 5:24 Hessa gisho, Xoossa Keethaa wotaadareta kiitteysinne kahine halaqati hessa si7ida wode, “Hawaareta bolla aybi hanidee?” yaagidi hirgidosona.
ACT 5:25 He wode issi addey entako yidi, “Heko, qasho keethi hinte gelsida asati xoossa keethan eqidi asaa tamaarsoosona” yaagidi entaw odis.
ACT 5:26 Xoossa Keethaa wotaadareta kiitteysi ba wotaadaretara bidi hawaareta ehis. Shin enti bantana asay shuchan caddana gidi yayyida gisho enta aaddashidi ehidosona.
ACT 5:27 Enti hawaareta ehidi, shiiqida shanguwa sinthan essin kahine halaqay entako,
ACT 5:28 “Hintena nuuni he uraa sunthan tamaarsonna mela minthidi kiittibooko? Heko, hinte timirtiya Yerusalaame katamaa ubba gathideta. He uraa shempuwas nuna oythanaw qopeetii?” yaagidi oychis.
ACT 5:29 Phexroosaranne hanko hawaaretara entaw zaarishe, “Nuuni asas kiitetanaape Xoossas kiitetanaw bessees.
ACT 5:30 Masqaliya bolla hinte kaqidi wodhida Yesuusa, nu aawata Xoossay hayqope denthis.
ACT 5:31 Isra7eeleti nagaraape simmana melanne enta nagaray atto geetetana mela Xoossay Yesuusa haareysanne ashsheysa oothidi bonchon baape ushacha baggan utisis.
ACT 5:32 Hessas nuuni marka; qassi Xoossay bana ammaneysatas immida Geeshsha Ayyaanayka marka” yaagidosona.
ACT 5:33 Shiiqida asay hessa si7ida wode daro yilotidi, hawaareta wodhanaw qopidosona.
ACT 5:34 Shin asa ubban daro bonchetida Gamaaliyale geeteteysi, issi higge astamaareynne Farsaawey dendi eqidi hawaareta guutha wodes kare kessana mela kiittis.
ACT 5:35 Hessafe guye, shiiqida asaako, “Isra7eele asaw, ha asata bolla hinte oothanaw qopiyabaape naagetite.
ACT 5:36 Ayis giiko, haysafe kase Tewodaasi bana, ‘Taani gita’ gidi dendin, oyddu xeetu gidiya asati iyara issifidosona. Shin iya wodhin iya kaallida ubbay laaletin pathonna asi gididi attidosona.
ACT 5:37 Hessafe guye, asay taybetiya wode Galila Yihudi dendidi daro asa pangayidi kaalethis, shin iyaka wodhin iya kaallida asa ubbay laaletis.
ACT 5:38 Ha77ika ta hintew odayis; ha asatape shaaketite; enta bochofite. Ayis giiko, ha qofaanne ha oosuwa asi oothiyaba gidiko dhayana.
ACT 5:39 Shin ha qofaynne ha oosoy Xoossafe yidaba gidiko, hinte enta dhaysanaw danda7eketa. Hessada hanishe hinte Xoossara kaccetana” yaagidi odis. Hessa gisho, shiiqida asay Gamaaliyale zoriya ekidosona.
ACT 5:40 Hawaareta soo xeegidi lisson garaafisis. Hessafe guye, entako, “Yesuusa suntha nam7antho denthofite” gidi birshidi yeddidosona.
ACT 5:41 Yesuusa suntha gisho, enti kawuyanaysi bessiyaba gideysa erida gisho shanguwa sinthafe ufaytishe keyidosona.
ACT 5:42 Enti ubba gallas Xoossa keethaninne asaa son Yesuusi I Kiristoosa gideysa tamaarsonne sabbako aggibokona.
ACT 6:1 He wode kaalleyisata tayboy dari daridi bishin, Girike doona odetiya Ayhudeti Yihudan yeletidi de7iya Ayhudeta bolla zuuzumidosona. Ayis giiko, Girike doona odetiya Ayhudeti, “Gallas gallas imetiya kathan nu am7eti naaqetosona” yaagidosona.
ACT 6:2 Tammanne nam7u hawaareti woosa keetha asa ubbaa xeegidi, “Nuuni Xoossaa qaala odeysa aggidi kathi gishanaw bessenna.
ACT 6:3 Hiza, ishato, lo77o asata, Geeshsha Ayyaananinne cincatethan kumida laapun asata hinte giddofe doorite; nuuni enta ha oosuwas shuumana.
ACT 6:4 Shin nuuni, nu kumetha wodiya woosaninne qaala tamaarson peeshana” yaagidosona.
ACT 6:5 Hawaareti odida oday asa ubba ufaysis. Hessa gisho, ammanoynne Geeshsha Ayyaani kumida Isxifaanose, Filphoosa, Phirokoroosa, Niqaroona, Ximoona, Pharmenanne Ayhude ammano geli simmida Anxooke addiya Niqolawoosa dooridosona.
ACT 6:6 Enta hawaareta sinthan essin, hawaareti enta bolla kushe wothidi woossidosona.
ACT 6:7 Xoossaa qaalay dalgi dalgi bis. Yerusalaamen de7iya ammaneyisata tayboy dari daridi bis; daro kahinetika ammanidosona.
ACT 6:8 Isxifaanosey aadho keehatethaaninne wolqan kumidi asaa giddon oorathabatanne malaatata oothees.
ACT 6:9 Aylletethafe keyida ayhude woosa keetha asay Qereenapenne Iskindirepe Kilqefenne Iisepe yida issi issi asati dendidi Isxifaanosera palamidosona.
ACT 6:10 Shin Isxifaanosey Ayyaana wolqan odetiya cincatethaa enti eqetanaw danda7ibookona.
ACT 6:11 He wode enti, “Musenne Xoossaa I cayishin si7ida” giya wordo asata shammidosona.
ACT 6:12 Hessada oothidi biitta cimatanne higge astamaareta iya bolla denthidosona. Isxifaanose oykidi shanguwa sinthe efidosona.
ACT 6:13 Iya bolla paydida wordo markati, “Ha uray ha xoossa keethaanne Muse higgiya zaari zaari cayees.
ACT 6:14 I, ‘Haysi Naazirete Yesuusi, ha xoossa keetha laallana; qassi Musey nuus immida higgiya laammana’ yaagishin nuuni si7ida” yaagidosona.
ACT 6:15 Shango shiiqon uttida asa ubbay Isxifaanose loythidi xeelliya wode iya som7oy kiitancho som7o daanees.
ACT 7:1 Kahineta halaqay Isxifaanoseko, “Haysi tumee?” yaagidi oychis.
ACT 7:2 Isxifaanosey, “Ta ishato, ta aawato, si7ite! Nu aawa Abrahaamey Kaaranen daanaw baanape sinthe Masephexoomen de7ishin, boncho Xoossay iyaw qoncidi,
ACT 7:3 ‘Ne biittafenne ne dabotape shaaketada taani nena bessiya biitta ba’ yaagis.
ACT 7:4 He wode Abrahaamey Kaldaaweta biittafe keyidi Kaaranen daanaw bis. Iya aaway hayqidaape guye Xoossay iya ha biitta ha77i hinte de7iya bessaa ehis.
ACT 7:5 I ha biittafe hari attoshin tohoy yedhiya bessika Abrahaames immibeenna. Shin na7i iyaw bayna wode Xoossay ha biitta iyawunne iya sheeshas laata oothidi immanaysa qaala gelis.
ACT 7:6 Xoossay Abrahaameko, ‘Ne sheeshay hara biittan imathatethan daana; yan oyddu xeetu laythi enti aylletethan haaretana.
ACT 7:7 Shin taani ne sheesha haariya kawotethata pirdana. Hessafe guye, enti he biittafe keyidi haysan taw goyinnana’ yaagis.
ACT 7:8 Xoossay Abrahaame sheeshay qaxaretana mela iyara caaqin, Yisaaqi yeletida hospuntho gallasan qaxaris. Yisaaqi Yayqooba qaxaris; qassi Yayqoobi tammanne nam7u ba nayta, nu aawata mayzata qaxaris.
ACT 7:9 “Yayqooba nayti Yoosefa qanaatidi Gibxe biittan aylletethas bayzidosona, shin Xoossay iyara de7ees.
ACT 7:10 Iya, iya waaye ubbaafe kessis. Gibxe kawa sinthan sabanne cincatethi iyaw immis. Gibxe kawoy Yoosefas Gibxe biittanne ba gadhuwa ubbaa aysanaada aawatethi immis.
ACT 7:11 “Gibxe biittaninne Kanaane biittan ubban koshi gelidi daro asaa un7ethis. He wode nu mayzati kathi demmanaw danda7ibookona.
ACT 7:12 Yayqoobi Gibxe biittan kathi de7eysa si7idi nu aawata koyro yaa yeddis.
ACT 7:13 Nam7antho buussan Yoosefi ba ishatas banatetha erisis. Gibxe kawoyka Yoosefa soo asa eris.
ACT 7:14 Yoosefi ba aawa Yayqoobanne ba soo asa ubbaa, laapun tammanne ichashu asaa baako yaana mela kiittidi ehisis.
ACT 7:15 Yayqoobi Gibxe biitta wodhis; inne iya nayti yan hayqidosona.
ACT 7:16 Enta ahay he bessaafe Seekema biitta tooketidi bidi, yan Abrahaamey Hamoore naytape daro biran shammida duufon moogetis.
ACT 7:17 “Shin Xoossay Abrahaames immana gidaysa poliya wodey gakanaw matida wode Gibxe biittan de7iya nu asay dari dari bis.
ACT 7:18 Hessafe guye, Yoosefa eronna hara kawoy Gibxe biittan kawotis.
ACT 7:19 He kawoy nu kochaa genidi guutha nayti hayqana mela enta kare kessi yeggana mela nu aawata un7ethis.
ACT 7:20 “He wode Musey yeletis; I Xoossaa sinthan daro lo77o na7a. Ba aawa keethan heedzu ageena gakanaw diccis.
ACT 7:21 Musey wora holetida wode Gibxe kawa na7iya demma ekada ba na7a oothada iya dichasu.
ACT 7:22 Musey Gibxeta cincatetha ubbaa tamaaridi odaninne ooson mino asi gidis.
ACT 7:23 “Muses laythi oytama kumida wode ba ishata, Isra7eeleta be7anaw ba wozanan qopis.
ACT 7:24 Isra7eeletape issuwa Gibxe issoy qohishin be7idi he Isra7eele uraa maaddidi, he qohida Gibxe uraa wodhidi kushe zaaris.
ACT 7:25 Musey ba ishata ba baggara Xoossay ashshanaw haneysa enti akeekana gidi qopis, shin enti akeekibokona.
ACT 7:26 “Wontetha gallas nam7u Isra7eele asati issoy issuwara wadhetishin demmidi enta sigethanaw koyidi, ‘Asaw, hinte ishanta; ayis issoy issuwa qohetii?’ yaagis.
ACT 7:27 “Shin ba laggiya qoheysi Museko, ‘Nena nu bolla haareysanne daynna oothiday oonee?
ACT 7:28 Neeni zine Gibxe uraa wodhidaysada tanaka wodhanaw koyay?’ yaagidi Muse sugi yeddis.
ACT 7:29 Musey hessa si7ida wode Gibxefe betidi Midiyaame biittan bete asi gididi de7ishe nam7u adde nayta yelis.
ACT 7:30 “Godaa kiitanchoy oytamu laythafe guye, Siina zuma matan de7iya bazzo tushiya giddon eexiya tama laco giddon Muses bentis.
ACT 7:31 Musey ba be7idaysan malaaletidi, loythi be7anaw tushiya mati shiiqidi de7ishin, Godaa qaalay,
ACT 7:32 ‘Taani ne aawata, Abrahaame Xoossaa, Yisaaqa Xoossaa, Yayqooba Xoossaa’ yaagishe Museko yis. Musey yashshan kokoridi xeellanaw danda7ibeenna.
ACT 7:33 “Goday Museko, ‘Neeni eqida biittay geeshshi gidiya gisho ne tohuwan de7iya caammaa kessa.
ACT 7:34 Taani Gibxen de7iya ta asaa un7etetha be7as. Enta waasuwa si7ada enta ashshanaw wodhas. Ha77i haaya! Taani nena Gibxe kiittana’ yaagis.
ACT 7:35 “Isra7eeleti Muse, ‘Nena nu bolla haareysanne daynna oothiday oonee?’ yaagidi ixidaysa tushiya giddon iyaw bentida kiitanchuwa baggara haareysanne ashsheysa oothidi Xoossay kiittis.
ACT 7:36 He Musey Isra7eeleta Gibxefe kessidi malaalsiyabatanne oorathabata Gibxe biittaninne Zo7o Abban oothidi enta oytamu laythi mela biittan kaalethis.
ACT 7:37 “Isra7eele asaako, ‘Xoossay tana denthidaysada hinte sheesha giddofe ta mela nabe hintew denthana’ yaagiday he Muse.
ACT 7:38 Mela biittan shiiqida Isra7eele asaara de7idaysi, nu aawataranne Siina zuma bolla iyaw odida kiitanchuwara de7ida Musey iya. Yaatidi, Xoossaa de7o qaala nuus immanaw ekis.
ACT 7:39 “Shin nu mayzati Muses kiitetanaw dosibookona; iya ixidi guye Gibxe simmanaw amotidosona.
ACT 7:40 Qassi Aaronako, ‘Nuna kaalethiya xoossata nuus ootha. Ayis giiko, haysi nuna Gibxefe ehida Musey, waanidaako nuuni eroko’ yaagidosona.
ACT 7:41 He wode mari daanisidi eeqa oothidosona. He eeqas yarsho yarshidi banta kushen oothida oosuwan ufaytidosona.
ACT 7:42 Shin Xoossay entaw zoko zaaris. Enti saluwa xoolintotas goyinnana mela enta yeggi aggis. Nabeta maxaafan, “ ‘Isra7eele asato oytamu laythi kumethi mela biittan shukida mehiyanne yarshida yarshuwa taw yarshidetii?
ACT 7:43 Hinte, hintew goyinnanaw kessida eeqanne Moloka dunkaaniya Rafana geetetiya hinte xoossaa xoolinto misiliya tookideta. Taani hintena Babiloonepe hini bagga yeddana’ geetetidi xaafetis.
ACT 7:44 “Nu aawatas mela biittan marka dunkaaney de7ees. Iyaka Xoossay Muse kiittidaysadanne iya bessidaysada oothis.
ACT 7:45 Qassi nu aawati he dunkaaniya banta aawatape ekidi Xoossay kase goodida Ayhude gidonna asaa biitta oykida wode Iyyasura yaa ekidi gelidosona. He dunkaaney Dawita wode gakanawuka he bessan de7is.
ACT 7:46 Dawiti Xoossan sabetis. Qassi Yayqooba Goday de7ana keethaa keexanaw Xoossaa woossis.
ACT 7:47 Shin iyaw keethaa keexiday Solomone.
ACT 7:48 “Hanoshin, Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossay asi keexida keethan deenna. Nabey gidaysa mela,
ACT 7:49 “ ‘Saloy ta araata, sa7ika ta tohoy yedhiyaso. Yaatin, taw hinte ay mela keethi keexanee? Woyko taani shempiya bessi awunee?
ACT 7:50 Ha ubbaa ta kushen oothabikina?’ yaagees Goday.
ACT 7:51 “Hinte waanida si7onna asee? Hinte wozanay Xoossaa qaala ekanaw ayis ixidee? Hinte haythay ayis tullidee? Hinte, hinte aawatatho ubba wode Geeshsha Ayyaanara eqeteta.
ACT 7:52 Nabeta giddofe hinte aawati gooddonay oonee? Xoossaa Na7ay, Xilloy yaanaysa kasetidi odidaysata wodhidosona. Ha77i hinte iya aathi immidi wodhideta.
ACT 7:53 Hinte kiitanchuwa kushepe Xoossa higgiya ekideta, shin kiitetibeketa” yaagis.
ACT 7:54 Enti hessa si7ida wode banta wozanan Isxifaanose bolla daro yilotidi, banta mettersha saxidi mandidosona.
ACT 7:55 Shin Isxifaanosey Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumidi, salo pude xeellidi, Xoossaa bonchuwanne Yesuusa, Xoossa ushacha baggan eqidaysa be7is.
ACT 7:56 “Heko, taani saloy dooyetin, Asa Na7ay, Xoossaa ushacha baggan eqidaysa be7ayis” yaagis.
ACT 7:57 Qaala dhoqu oothidi waassishe, banta haytha oykidi issife iyako woxidosona
ACT 7:58 Iya katamaape gaxa kessidi, shuchan caddidosona. Markati banta ma7uwa issi Saa7ola geetetiya na7atetha matan wothidosona.
ACT 7:59 Isxifaanosey, “Ta Godaa Yesuusa, ta shempuwa eka” yaagidi xeegishin enti iya shuchan caddoosona.
