ACT 7:60 Gulbatidi, ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Ta Godaw, ha nagaraa entaw atto ga” yaagis. Hessa yaagidi simmida mela hayqi aggis.
ACT 8:1 Saa7oli Isxifaanose hayquwan ufaytis. He gallas Yerusalaamen de7iya woosa keethan gita goodi dendis. Hawaareti attishin, ammaneysati ubbay Yihuda biittaninne Samaare biittan laaletidosona.
ACT 8:2 Issi issi Xoossa asati Isxifaanose moogidosona; qassi iyaw daro yeekidosona.
ACT 8:3 Shin Saa7oli woosa keetha dhaysanaw koyees. Soo soo yuuyi gelidi, ammaniya addetanne maccasata goochi goochi kessidi qasho keethi gelsees.
ACT 8:4 Laaletida ammaneysati bida bessa ubban qaala odidosona.
ACT 8:5 Filphoosi Samaare katama bidi Kiristoosaba asaas odis.
ACT 8:6 Daro asay Filphoosi odidaysa si7ida wodenne I oothiya malaatata be7ida wode iya akeekidi si7idosona.
ACT 8:7 Tuna ayyaanati waassidi daro asaape keyidosona; qassi daro gundatinne wobbeti biletidosona.
ACT 8:8 He kataman de7iya asay daro ufaytidosona.
ACT 8:9 Shin Simoona geetetiya issi uray he kataman de7ees. I, “Bana gita” gidi Samaare asaa marotethan malaalsishe gam7is.
ACT 8:10 Guuthafe gita gakanaw de7iya asa ubbay, “Gita Xoossa wolqay haysa” gidi iyabaa si7oosona.
ACT 8:11 Daro wodepe doomidi marotishe Samaare asa malaalsida gisho asay iyabaa si7oosona.
ACT 8:12 Shin Filphoosi Xoossaa kawotethabanne Yesuus Kiristoosa sunthaba addetasinne maccatas odin, enti iyabaa ammanidi xammaqetidosona.
ACT 8:13 Qassi Simoonika ba huuphen ammanidi xammaqetis. Filphoosara issife bida bessa ubban oosetiya gita malaatata be7idi malaaletis.
ACT 8:14 Yerusalaamen de7iya hawaareti Samaare asay Xoossaa qaala ekidaysa si7ida wode Phexroosanne Yohaanisa entako yeddidosona.
ACT 8:15 Phexroosinne Yohaanisi bidi, ammaneysati Geeshsha Ayyaana ekana mela entaw Xoossaa woossidosona.
ACT 8:16 Ayis giiko, Samaare asati Godaa Yesuusa sunthaa xalaalan xammaqetidosonape attishin, entafe issuwa bollaka Geeshsha Ayyaanay wodhibeenna.
ACT 8:17 He wode Phexroosinne Yohaanisi banta kushe enta bolla wothin, enti Geeshsha Ayyaana ekidosona.
ACT 8:18 Hawaareti banta kushe enta bolla wothin, entaw Geeshsha Ayyaanay imetidaysa Simooni be7ida wode Phexroosasinne Yohaanisas miishe ehidi,
ACT 8:19 “Taanika ta kushe wothiya ubbay Geeshsha Ayyaana ekana mela ha maata taw immerketi” yaagis.
ACT 8:20 Shin Phexroosi iyako, “Neeni Xoossaa imota miishen shammanaw qopida gisho ne miishey neera dhayo.
ACT 8:21 Ne wozanay Xoossaa sinthan suure gidonna gisho, new haysan gishoy woyko qaadi baawa.
ACT 8:22 Hiza, ha ne wozana iitatetha gisho nagarape simma. Ne wozanan de7iya iita qofa Xoossay atto gaana mela Xoossaa woossa.
ACT 8:23 Gaasoyka, neeni iita qanaateninne nagara qashon de7eysa taani be7ayis” yaagis.
ACT 8:24 Simooni zaaridi, “Hinte gidaysafe issoyka tana gakonna mela taw Xoossaa woossite” yaagis.
ACT 8:25 Phexroosinne Yohaanisi markatidaapenne Godaa qaala odidaape guye Yerusalaame simmidosona. Samaaren de7iya daro gutatan wongela odidosona.
ACT 8:26 Godaa kiitanchoy Filphoosako, “Dendada Yerusalaamepe Gaaza efiya mela biitta ogiyako ba. He ogey dugeha baggara de7ees” yaagis.
ACT 8:27 Filphoosi dendidi bis. Hindeke geetetiya Tophe kawees I miishe ubba naagiya Tophe asi de7ees. Ika goyinnanaw Yerusalaame bis.
ACT 8:28 Para gaaren uttidi, Yerusalaamepe ba biitta simmishe nabiya Isayaasa maxaafaa nabbabees.
ACT 8:29 Geeshsha Ayyaanay Filphoosako, “He gaariyako bada iya mati shiiqa” yaagis.
ACT 8:30 Yaatin Filphoosi woxi bidi gakiya wode moorinnay nabiya Isayaasa maxaafape nabbabishin si7idi, “Ne nabbabeysi new gelii?” yaagis.
ACT 8:31 Moorinnay, “Taw odi gelsiya asi bayna waanidi gelanee?” yaagis. Baara gaariyan keyidi uttana mela Filphoosa woossis.
ACT 8:32 Moorinnay nabbabiya maxaafa kifiley, “I dorsada shuketanaw laagetis; Dorsa mari ba ikisiya meedeyisata sinthan si77i geysada, ika ba doona dooyibeenna.
ACT 8:33 I kawuyis; iyaw xillo pirdi dhayis; iya de7oy ha sa7ape qanxetida gisho, iya sheeshaba oone odanay?” yaagees.
ACT 8:34 Moorinnay zaaridi Filphoosako, “Nabey oodeba odii? Babaa odiye woyko hara asaba odii? Taw odarkii” yaagis.
ACT 8:35 Filphoosi, Xoossa qaala he bessaafe doomidi, Yesuusaba odiya Wongela iyaw odis.
ACT 8:36 Enti bishe haathi de7iyaso gakidosona. Moorinnay, “Haathe haysa be7a; ta xammaqetonna mela aybe diggey?” yaagis.
ACT 8:37 Filphoosi iyako, “Neeni ne kumetha wozanaape ammaniko danda7aasa” yaagis. I zaaridi, “Yesuus Kiristoosi Xoossaa Na7aa gideysa taani ammanayis” yaagis.
ACT 8:38 Gaarey eqana mela moorinnay kiittin, nam7ay wodhidi haathan gelidosona; Filphoosi iya xammaqis.
ACT 8:39 Enti haathaafe gaxa keyida wode Godaa ayyaanay Filphoosa qoponna ekis. Nam7antho moorinnay Filphoosa be7ibeenna, shin ba ogiya ufaytishe bis.
ACT 8:40 Filphoosi Azaxoonan bana demmis. Qassi Qisaare yaana gakanaw katamatan yuuyidi wongela markatis.
ACT 9:1 He wode Saa7oli Godaa kaalleyisata wodhanaw mandidi kahine halaqaako bis.
ACT 9:2 Godaa ogiya kaalliya addenne macca demmiko, qachishe Yerusalaame ehanaw, Damasqon de7iya ayhude woosa keethatas dabdaabe baw xaafana mela woossis.
ACT 9:3 I bidi, Damasqo katama gakanaw matishin, qoponna salope wolqaama poo7oy iya yuushon poo7is.
ACT 9:4 I sa7an kundidashin, “Saa7ola, Saa7ola, ayis tana goodday?” giya qaala si7is.
ACT 9:5 Saa7oli, “Godaw, neeni oonee?” yaagidi oychis. “Taani, neeni gooddiya Yesuusa” yaagis.
ACT 9:6 Shin Saa7oli kokorishenne malaaletishe, “Godaw, taani ay oothana mela koyay?” yaagis. Goday iyako, “Dendada katamaa gela; neeni oothanaw bessiyabay yan new odetana” yaagis.
ACT 9:7 Saa7olara oge biya asati aykoka odetonna eqi attidosona. Qaala si7oosona, shin oonaka be7ibookona.
ACT 9:8 Saa7oli kundida bessaafe dendidi xeelliya wode iya ayfey demmonna ixis. Hessa gisho, enti iya kushiya oykidi kaalethidi Damasqo gelsidosona.
ACT 9:9 Heedzu gallas gakanaw I xeellanaw danda7ibeenna; aykoka mibeenna; uybeenna.
ACT 9:10 Damasqon issi Hananiya geetetiya Yesuusa tamaarey de7ees. Goday qoncethan, “Hananiya” yaagidi xeegis. Hanaani zaaridi, “Ta Godaw, haysan de7ayis” yaagis.
ACT 9:11 Goday iyako, “Dendada Suure geetetiya ogiya bada, Yihuda son Saa7ola geetetiya Tarsesape yida uraa koya; Saa7oli woossees.
ACT 9:12 Qassi Hananiya geetetiya addey gelidi, Saa7oli nam7antho xeellana mela ba kushiya iya bolla wothishin qoncethan be7is” yaagis.
ACT 9:13 Hanaani zaaridi, “Godaw, Yerusalaamen ne geeshsha asaa bolla he uray ay mela iitabaa oothidaako taani daro asaape si7as.
ACT 9:14 Qassi Damasqon ne sunthaa xeegeyisata ubba qachanaw, kahine halaqati iyaw maata immidosona” yaagis.
ACT 9:15 Shin Goday iyako, “Saa7oli Ayhude gidonna asaa sinthan, kawota sinthaninne Isra7eele asaa sinthan, ta sunthaa erisanawunne taw oothanaw dooretida miishe gidiya gisho neeni iyako ba.
ACT 9:16 Ayis giiko, ta sunthaa gisho, I ay mela waaye ekanaw bessiyako taani iya bessaana” yaagis.
ACT 9:17 Hanaani bidi, soo gelidi, ba kushiya Saa7ola bolla wothidi, “Ta ishaa Saa7ola, neeni yaa ogiyan new bentida Yesuusi, neeni xeellana melanne Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumana mela Goday tana kiittis” yaagis.
ACT 9:18 Ellesidi, Saa7ola ayfepe issi poqo melabay wodhin, Saa7oli nam7antho xeellis. Qassi dendidi xammaqetis.
ACT 9:19 Kathi midi xaalidi, Damasqon de7iya ammaneysatara guutha gallas gam7is.
ACT 9:20 Ellesidi Saa7oli, “Yesuusi Xoossaa Na7a” yaagidi Damasqon de7iya ayhude woosa keethatan qaala tamaarsis.
ACT 9:21 Hessa si7ida ubbay malaaletidi, “Haysi Yerusalaamen Yesuusa sunthaa xeegeyisata qacheysa gidenneyee? Qassi haa yiday enta qachidi, kahine halaqata sinthe efanaasa gidennee?” yaagidosona.
ACT 9:22 Shin Saa7oli qaala odon minni minnidi bis. Yesuusi, I Kiristoosa gideysa qoncisidi odida gisho Damasqon de7iya Ayhudeti iyaw zaariyaba dhaydosona.
ACT 9:23 Daro gallasape guye, Ayhudeti shiiqidi, Saa7ola wodhanaw zoretidosona.
ACT 9:24 Shin Ayhudeti bana wodhanaw qopidaysa Saa7oli si7is. Enti iya wodhanaw qammanne gallas katama pengen naagoosona.
ACT 9:25 Shin iya tamaareti iya qamma efidi, gimbe dirsa maskootera daachora wodhisidosona.
ACT 9:26 Saa7oli Yerusalaame gakida wode ammaneysatara gahetanaw koyis. Shin I Kiristoosa ammanidaysi entaw tuma daanonna ixin iyaw yayyidosona.
ACT 9:27 Shin Barnabaasi Saa7ola hawaaretako efis. Ogen Goday waanidi qoncidaakonne odisidaako, qassi Saa7oli Damasqon Yesuusa sunthan yayyonna waatidi qaala odidaako entaw geeshshidi odis.
ACT 9:28 Saa7oli Yerusalaamen yuuyidi Godaa sunthan yayyonna qaala odishe, hawaaretara issife de7is.
ACT 9:29 Qassi Saa7oli Girike doonan haasaya Ayhudetara odetishe palamees. Shin enti iya wodhanaw koydosona.
ACT 9:30 Ammaniya asati hessa si7idi, Saa7oli Qisaare efidi Tarsesa yeddidosona.
ACT 9:31 Yihudan, Galilaninne Samaare ubban de7iya woosa keethati sarotethan de7idosona. Qassi minnidosona; Godaas yayyishe Geeshsha Ayyaana minthethon dari daridi bidosona.
ACT 9:32 Phexroosi biitta ubba yuuyishe Liiden de7iya ammaniya asatako gakis.
ACT 9:33 Yan hospun laythi kumethi gundidi arsan zin7idi de7iya Eniya geetetiya addiya demmis.
ACT 9:34 Phexroosi, “Eniya, Yesuus Kiristoosi nena pathana; dendada ne hiixa dentha” yaagis. Ika ellesidi dendi eqis.
ACT 9:35 Liideninne Saaronan de7iya asa ubbay Eniya be7idi, Godaako simmidosona.
ACT 9:36 Yoophe kataman issi Xaabito geetetiya ammaniyara de7awusu. I sunthay Aramike doonan, “Xaabito”; Girike doonan, “Dorqa”; he nam7u suntha birshethay “gen7e” guussu. Iya ba de7ida wode ubban lo77oba oothashenne manqota maaddashe de7asu.
ACT 9:37 He wode iya hargada hayqin, asay I aha meeccidi, pooqe bolla kessidi zin7isidosona.
ACT 9:38 Liidey Yoophes mata. Ammaneysati Phexroosi Liiden de7eysa si7idi, “Hayyana nuuko ellesada ya” yaagidi nam7u asata iyako kiittidosona.
ACT 9:39 Hessa gisho, Phexroosi dendidi, entara bis. Yaa gakin, pooqe bolla de7iya kifile iya gelsidosona. Am7eti Phexroosa yuushon eqidi yeekishe Dorqa entara paxa de7ashe oothida qamisetanne afilata ubbaa Phexroosa bessidosona.
ACT 9:40 Phexroosi enta ubbaa kare kessidi, gulbatidi woossis. Qassi ahaako simmidi, “Xaabite, denda” yaagis. Xaabita ba ayfiya dooyada Phexroosa be7ada, denda uttasu.
ACT 9:41 Phexroosi iyo ba kushen maaddidi denthidi essis. Hessafe guye, ammaneysatanne am7eta xeegidi, dendidaro enta sinthe shiishis.
ACT 9:42 Ha oday, Yoophe katama ubbaa gakis; daro asay Godaa ammanidosona.
ACT 9:43 Phexroosi Yoophen Simoona geetetiya galba haasheysa son daro gallas gam7is.
ACT 10:1 Qisaaren, “Xaale ola asata” geetetiya olanchota giddon issi Qorneliyoosa geetetiya mato halaqay de7ees.
ACT 10:2 Qorneliyoosi ba soo asaara Xoossaa minthi ammaniya asinne Xoossaa goyinniya asi. Ayhude manqotaka daro maaddees, qassi Xoossaa ubba wode woossees.
ACT 10:3 Issi gallas uddufun saate heeran Xoossaa kiitanchoy iyako yidi, “Qorneliyoosa” gidi xeegishin I qoncethan geeshshidi be7is.
ACT 10:4 Qorneliyoosi dagammidi kiitanchuwa tishshi oothi xeellidi, “Godaw, I aybee?” yaagis. Kiitanchoy zaaridi, “Ne woosaynne manqota ne maaddeysi Xoossaa sinthan hassayetis.
ACT 10:5 Ha77i Yoophe ase kiittada, Phexroosa geetetiya Simoona ehisa.
ACT 10:6 Phexroosi abba doonan galba haashiya Simoona son imathatethi siiratis” yaagis.
ACT 10:7 Qorneliyoosi baw odida kiitanchoy bin, ba aylletape nam7atanne Xoossaa goyinniya ba mata wotaadaretape issuwa xeegidi,
ACT 10:8 entaw ubbaba odidi Yoophe kiittis.
ACT 10:9 Wontetha gallas enti bidi, Yoophe katama matishin usupun saate heeran Xoossaa woossanaw Phexroosi pooqe bolla keyis.
ACT 10:10 I koshatidi kathi maanaw koyis, shin kathi kaxishin I qoncethi be7is.
ACT 10:11 Saloy dooyetin, gita afila daaniyabay oyddu baggara oyketidi wodhishin I be7is.
ACT 10:12 Iyan oyddu tohora de7iya meheti, wora do7ati, ulora gooshetiya medhetethatinne salo kafoti ubbay de7ees.
ACT 10:13 He wode, “Phexroosaa, denda eqada shukada ma” giya qaalay iyako yis.
ACT 10:14 Shin Phexroosi, “Godaw, akay! Ta tunabaa ubbaraka ma erike” yaagis.
ACT 10:15 Qassi, “Xoossay geeshshidaysa neeni tuna goopa” giya qaalay nam7antho iyako yis.
ACT 10:16 Hessika, heedzu toho hanidaape guye he gita afila daaneysi ellesidi pude salo eketis.
ACT 10:17 Phexroosi ba be7ida qoncethaa birshethay, “Ay gidandesha?” gidi ba wozanan qopishin, Qorneliyoosi kiitida asati Simoona soo oychi demmidi karen eqidosona.
ACT 10:18 Banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Phexroosa geetetiya Simoona geetetiya imathay haysan de7ii?” yaagidi oychidosona.
ACT 10:19 Phexroosi qoncethan be7idaba qofa bolla de7ishin, Geeshsha Ayyaanay iyako, “Heko, heedzu asati nena koyoosona.
ACT 10:20 Dendada wodha, taani enta kiitida gisho sidhonna entara ba” yaagis.
ACT 10:21 Phexroosi asatako wodhidi, “Hinte koyey tana; ayis yidetii?” yaagis.
ACT 10:22 Enti zaaridi, “Nuna mato halaqay Qorneliyoosi kiittis. I xillo, Xoossaa goyinniya asinne Ayhude asa ubban daro bonchetida asi. Qorneliyoosi, nena ba soo ehisidi qaala neepe si7ana mela geeshsha kiitanchoy iyaw odis” yaagidosona.
ACT 10:23 Phexroosi asata soo gelsidi mokis. Wontetha gallas, dendidi entara bis. Yoophe kataman de7iya ammaneysatape issoti issoti iyara issife bidosona.
ACT 10:24 Wontetha gallas, Qisaare gakidosona. Qorneliyoosi ba dabbotanne ba mata laggeta issife xeegi shiishidi, Phexroosa naagees.
ACT 10:25 Phexroosi soo gelana hanishin, Qorneliyoosi iyara gahetidi iya sinthan kundidi iyaw goyinnanaw koyis.
ACT 10:26 Shin Phexroosi, “Denda, taka ta huuphen ne mela ase” yaagidi iya denthis.
ACT 10:27 Phexroosi Qorneliyoosara odetishe soo geliya wode daro asay shiiqidaysa demmis.
ACT 10:28 I asaako, “Ayhude asi hara derera issifanaw woyko gahetanaw woga gidonnaysa hinte ereeta. Shin taani oonaka tuna woyko geeshshi gidenna goonna mela Xoossay tana bessis.
ACT 10:29 Hessa gisho, hinte taako kiittin ixoy bayna yas. Ha77i tana ayis xeegisidaako taw odite” yaagis.
ACT 10:30 Qorneliyoosi, “Taani hachi oyddu gallasape kase hannoode uddufun saate woosa woossishin, phooliya ma7o ma7ida asi ta sinthan eqis.
ACT 10:31 I taako, ‘Qorneliyoosa, Xoossay ne woosa si7is, neeni manqota maaddidaysaka hassayis.
ACT 10:32 Hiza, ase Yoophe kiittada, Simoon Phexroosa geysa xeegisa. Simoon Phexroosi Simoona geetetiya galba haashiya uraa son abba doonan siiratis’ yaagis.
ACT 10:33 Hessa gisho, taani neeko ellesada kiittas; ne lo77o yadasa. Hiza, Xoossay nena Kiittidaba ubbaa si7anaw ha77i nuuni ubbay haysan Godaa sinthan de7oos” yaagis.
ACT 10:34 Kaallidika, Phexroosi, “Xoossay asa som7o be7idi ase asape shaakenna.
ACT 10:35 Shin ase ubbaa oona gidikoka baw yayyeysanne xillo ooso ootheysan Xoossay ufayteysa taani tuma akeekas.
ACT 10:36 Xoossay, ubbaa Godaa gidida Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara sarotethaa odishe ha Wongela Isra7eele asaas kiittidaysa hinte ereeta.
ACT 10:37 Yohaanisi xinqateba Galilan sabbakida wodiyape doomidi Yihuda biitta ubbaa gakanaw hanidaba hinte ereeta.
ACT 10:38 Xoossay Naazirete Yesuusas Geeshsha Ayyaananne wolqaa immis. Xoossay iyara de7iya gisho lo77oba I oothishe Xalahe kushen haaretida ubbaa pathishe yuuyis.
ACT 10:39 “Ayhude biittaninne Yerusalaamen I oothida ubbabaas nuuni markata. Enti masqaliya bolla kaqidi iya wodhidosona.
ACT 10:40 Shin Xoossay heedzantho gallasan hayqope iya denthidi asaas qoncana mela oothis.
ACT 10:41 He qoncethay Xoossay koyro doorida markatasafe attishin, asa ubbaasa gidenna. I hayqope dendidaape guye iyara midanne uyida.
ACT 10:42 Xoossay Wongela asaas nuuni odana melanne paxa de7eyisata bollanne hayqidaysata bolla pirdanaw shuumetiday Yesuusa gideysa markatana mela nuna kiittis.
ACT 10:43 Xoossay iya ammaniya ubbaa nagaray, iya sunthan atto geeteteysa nabeti markatoosona” yaagis.
ACT 10:44 Phexroosi buroo he oda ongonnashin qaala si7iya ubbaa bolla Geeshsha Ayyaanay wodhis.
ACT 10:45 Phexroosara Yoophefe yida ammaniya qaxaretida Ayhude ubbay, Ayhude gidonnaysati bolla Geeshsha Ayyaanay gukida gisho malaaletidosona.
ACT 10:46 Gaasoyka, enti dumma dumma doonan odetishininne Xoossa gitatetha sabbishin si7idosona. He wode Phexroosi zaaridi,
ACT 10:47 “Haysati qassi nu mela Geeshsha Ayyaana ekidaysati xammaqetonna mela haathe digganay oonee?” yaagis.
ACT 10:48 Enti Yesuus Kiristoosa sunthan xammaqetana mela enta kiittis. Hessafe guye, enti bantara guutha gallas uttana mela Phexroosa woossidosona.
ACT 11:1 Hawaaretinne Yihuda ubban de7iya ammaneysati, Ayhude gidonaysatika Xoossaa qaala ekidaysa si7idosona.
ACT 11:2 Phexroosi Yerusalaame bida wode qaxaretida ammaneysati,
ACT 11:3 iyako, “Neeni qaxaretiboonaysatako gelada entara kathi ayis maaddii?” yaagidosona.
ACT 11:4 Shin Phexroosi hanidaba koyrope doomidi maaran maaran odis:
ACT 11:5 “Taani Yoophe kataman Xoossaa woossashe qoncethi be7as. Gita afila daaniyabay oyddu baggara oyketidi salope wodhishe taako yis.
ACT 11:6 Taani tishshi ootha iya giddo xeelliya wode oyddu tohora de7iya meheta, wora do7ata, ulora gooshetiya medhetethatanne salo kafota be7as.
ACT 11:7 ‘Phexroosaa, denda, shukada ma’ giya qaala si7as.
ACT 11:8 “Shin taani, ‘Godaw, akay, tunabay woyko geeyonnabay ubbaka ta doonako shiiqi erenna’ yaagas.
ACT 11:9 “ ‘Xoossay geeshshidaysa neeni tuna goopa’ giya qaalay nam7antho salope yis.
ACT 11:10 “Hessi heedzu toho hanin, wursethan ubbabay salo pude eketis.
ACT 11:11 He saatenka heedzu asati Qisaarepe taako kiitetidi taani de7iya keetha gaki aggidosona.
ACT 11:12 Sidhonna entara bana mela Ayyaanay taw odis. Qassi ha usupun ishati Yoophefe taara Qisaare bidaysatara Qorneliyoosa soo gelida.
ACT 11:13 Kiitanchoy iya son eqidi, ‘Yoophe kiittada Phexroosa geetetiya Simoona xeegisa.
ACT 11:14 Nenanne ne soo asa ubbaa ashshiya qaala I new odana’ gidaysa Qorneliyoos nuus odis.
ACT 11:15 “Taani haasaya doomiya wode Geeshsha Ayyaanay koyro nu bolla wodhidaysada enta bollaka wodhi aggis.
ACT 11:16 He wode, ‘Yohaanisi haathan xammaqis, shin hinte Geeshsha Ayyaanan xammaqetana’ yaagida Godaa qaalay taw qofetis.
ACT 11:17 Xoossay nuus Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa ammanidaysatas immida imota Ayhude gidonaysataska immiko, yaatin Xoossaa digganaw taani oonee?” yaagis.
ACT 11:18 Enti hessa si7ida wode banta palama aggidi, “Yaatin, Xoossay Ayhude gidonaysatika nagarape simmidi de7on daanada qaada immis” yaagidi Xoossaa galatidosona.
ACT 11:19 Isxifaanose hayqos gathida goodda gaason laaletida ammaneysati qaala Ayhudeta xalaalas odishe Sirofinqe, Qophiroosanne Anxooke gakanaw yuuyidosona.
ACT 11:20 Shin Qophiroosapenne Qereenape yida issi issi ammaniya asati Anxooke bidi, Godaa Yesuusa Wongela Girike asaaska odidosona.
ACT 11:21 Godaa wolqay entara de7ees; qassi daro asay ammanidi Godaako simmidosona.
ACT 11:22 He odaa Yerusalaamen de7iya woosa keethay si7ida gisho Barnabaasa Anxooke kiittis.
ACT 11:23 Barnabaasi Anxooke bida wode Xoossaa aadho keehatetha oosuwa be7idi ufaytis. Enti ubbay banta kumetha wozanan Godan minnidi daana mela enta zoris.
ACT 11:24 Barnabaasi Geeshsha Ayyaanaynne ammanoy kumida lo77o asi gidiya gisho daro asay Godaa ammanidosona.
ACT 11:25 Hessafe guye, Barnabaasi Saa7ola koyanaw Tarsesa bis.
ACT 11:26 Yan Saa7ola demmida wode Anxooke ekidi yis. Barnabaasinne Saa7oli woosa keetha asaara laythi kumethi uttidi daro asaa tamaarsidosona. Ammaneysati Anxooken “Kiristaane” geetetidi koyro xeegetidosona.
ACT 11:27 He wode issi issi nabeti Yerusalaamepe Anxooke wodhidosona.
ACT 11:28 Enta giddofe Agaboosa geysi dendidi biitta ubban gita koshi keyanaysa Ayyaana wolqan tinbite odis. Hessi haniday Roome Kawa Qalawudiyoosa wodena.
ACT 11:29 Ammaneysati huuphen huuphen banta wolqaa mela miishe kessidi Yihudan de7iya ammaneysatas maade yeddanaw qofa qachidosona.
ACT 11:30 Enti hessada oothidi, miishiya Barnabaasa bollanne Saa7ola bolla woosa keethaa cimatas yeddidosona.
ACT 12:1 He wode Kawoy Herodiisi woosa keetha asaape baggaa goodda doomis.
ACT 12:2 Yohaanisa ishaa Yayqooba mashshan wodhisis.
ACT 12:3 Hessi Ayhudeta ufaysidaysa be7idi, gujidi Phexroosaka oythis. Hessi haniday Paasika Ba7aale bonchiya gallasatana.
ACT 12:4 Phexroosa oykidi qachis. Paasika bonchiya gallasatape guye deriya sinthe aathanaw qopidi, oyddu oyddu wotaadareti iya naagana mela tammanne usupun wotaadaretas aathidi immis.
ACT 12:5 Hessa gisho, Phexroosi qasho keethan naagetees. Shin woosa keetha asay iyaw minthidi Xoossaa woossosona.
ACT 12:6 Herodiisi Phexroosa asaa sinthe shiishanaape kase qamma Phexroosi nam7u baggara nam7u wotaadaretara santhalaatan qashetidi enta giddon dhiskis. Naageysati qasho keethaa pengetan eqidi naagoosona.
ACT 12:7 Akeekona de7ishin Godaa kiitanchoy qoncis. Qasho keethan poo7oy poo7is. Kiitanchoy Phexroosa miya bochi barkisidi, “Elle denda” yaagis. Iiraka santhalaatay iya kushiyape wodhi aggis.
ACT 12:8 Kiitanchoy iyako, “Ne ma7uwa ma7a, ne caammaaka aatha” yaagis. Phexroosi hessada oothis; kiitanchoy, “Ne laxana ma7ada tana kaalla” yaagis.
ACT 12:9 Phexroosi qasho keethafe keyidi kiitanchuwa kaallis. Iyaw qoncethi be7iyaba daanisipe attishin, kiitanchoy oothiyabay tuma daanibeenna.
ACT 12:10 Kiitanchoynne Phexroosi koyruwanne nam7antho wotaadariya aadhidi katamaa efiya birata pengiyako gakidosona. Pengey entaw barka dooyeti aggis. Enti keyidi issi ogiyara bishin kiitanchoy akeekona Phexroosape shaaketi aggis.
ACT 12:11 Phexroosas wozani simmin, “Tana Goday ba kiitanchuwa kiittidi, Herodiisa kushepenne naagidi uttida Ayhude asa ubbaafe ashshidaysa ha77i tuma eras” yaagis.
ACT 12:12 I hessa akeekida wode daro asay issife shiiqidi Xoossaa woossiya bessaa, Marqoosa geetetiya Yohaanisa aaye Mayraami soo bis.
ACT 12:13 Yan karen eqidi xeegis. Issi Rooda geetetiya oosanchiya pengiya dooyanaw yasu.
ACT 12:14 Rooda Phexroosa qaala gididaysa erida wode ufaysan kumada kariya dooyenna guye woxa bada, “Phexroosi karen eqis” yaagada asaas odasu.
ACT 12:15 Asay iiko, “Neeni gooyay!” yaagidosona. Rooda Phexroosa gididaysa geeshshada odasu. Enti, “Hessi iya naagiya kiitanchuwa” yaagidosona.
ACT 12:16 Shin Phexroosi karen eqidi xeegidi aggonna ixin asay kariya dooyidi iya be7idi malaaletidosona.
ACT 12:17 Shin enti si77i gaana mela Phexroosi ba kushiyan mallidi Goday qasho keethafe iya waati kessidaako entaw qoncisi odidi, “Haysa Yayqoobasinne ammaniya asatas odite” gidi yaape keyidi haraso bis.
ACT 12:18 Sa7ay wontiya wode, “Phexroosi aw bide” gidi wotaadareti woli giddon daro kaccidosona.
ACT 12:19 Herodiisi Phexroosa koyisin, I dhayida wode naageysata qoridi, enta wodhana mela kiittis. Hessafe guye, Herodiisi Yihudape Qisaare wodhidi yan guutha wode uttis.
ACT 12:20 Herodiisi Xiroosa asa bollanne Sidoona asaa bolla daro hanqetis. Enta biittay kathi Herodiisa biittafe demmiya gisho enti issife gididi iya Moorinna Bilasxoosa bantaw cima oothidi giiganaw Herodiisako bidosona.
ACT 12:21 Herodiisi bareda gallasan ba kawotethaa afilaa ma7idi, araata bolla uttidi asaas odis.
ACT 12:22 Asay, “Hessi Xoossaa qaala, asa qaala gidenna” yaagidi waassidosona.
ACT 12:23 Herodiisi Xoossaa bonchiboona gisho iiraka Godaa kiitanchoy iya dechin guxunen meetetidi hayqis.
ACT 12:24 Shin Xoossaa qaalay diccishenne dalgishe bees.
ACT 12:25 Barnabaasinne Saa7oli banta oosuwa polidi Marqoosa geetetiya Yohaanisa bantara ekidi Yerusalaamepe simmidosona.
ACT 13:1 Anxooken de7iya woosa keethan nabetinne astamaareti de7oosona. Enti Barnabaasa, Kareethi geetetiya Simoona, Qereenape yida Lukiyoosa, Kawa Herodiisara diccida Minaahenne Saa7ola.
ACT 13:2 Enti Godaa goyinnishininne xoomishin Geeshsha Ayyaanay, “Taani xeegida oosuwas Barnabaasanne Saa7ola taw dummayite” yaagis.
ACT 13:3 Hessa gisho, enti xoomidaapenne woossidaape guye banta kushiya enta bolla wothidi yeddidosona.
ACT 13:4 Hessa gisho, Geeshsha Ayyaanay enta kiittis. Selewuqe bidosona; yaape markaben gelidi Qophiroosa haathan teqetida biitta bidosona.
ACT 13:5 Enti Silmana gakidi ayhude woosa keethatan Xoossaa qaala odidosona. Yohaanisi maaddishe entara de7ees.
ACT 13:6 Enti yuushoy abban teqetida biitta, Qophiroosa kanthidi Phaafu gakiya wode, issi wordancho nabiya, Bar-Yesuusa geetetiya Ayhude maruwa demmidosona.
ACT 13:7 He maroy deriya aysiya Sargiyoos Phawuloosa geetetiya akeekancho addiyara de7ees. Sargiyoos Phawuloosi Barnabaasanne Saa7ola baako xeegidi Xoossaa qaala si7anaw koyis.
ACT 13:8 Shin Girike doonan maruwa sunthay “Elmaasa” geetetees. I deriya haareysi ammanonna mela digganaw koyidi Barnabaasaranne Phawuloosara eqetis.
ACT 13:9 Shin Phawuloosa geetetiya Saa7oli Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumidi maruwa caddi xeellidi,
ACT 13:10 “La, Xalahe na7aw, iitatethi ubbay kumidayso, xillotetha ubbaas morkiyaw, suure Godaa ogiya mirqeysa aggikii?
ACT 13:11 Heko, ha77i Godaa kushey ne bolla de7ees. Neeni qooqe gidana; guutha wodes awa poo7o be7aka” yaagis. Iira caaganne dhumi iya ayfiya goozin, ba kushiya oykidi kaalethiya asi koyishe yuuyis.
ACT 13:12 Deriya ayseysi hessa be7ida wode Godaaba tamaarsiya timirtiyan malaaletidi ammanis.
ACT 13:13 Phawuloosinne iyara de7eysati Phaafupe dendidi, Phinfilen de7iya Pharge markabera bidosona. Yohaanisi entafe shaaketidi Yerusalaame simmis.
ACT 13:14 Shin enti Phargefe aadhidi Phisden de7iya Anxooke gakidosona. Sambaata gallas ayhude woosa keethi gelidi uttidosona.
ACT 13:15 Muse higgeynne nabeta maxaafay nabbabetidaape guye ayhude woosa keetha halaqati, “Nu ishato, asaa minthethiya qaali hintew de7iyako asaas oderketi” yaagidi entako kiittidosona.
ACT 13:16 Phawuloosi dendi eqidi ba kushe mallidi, “Isra7eele asatonne, Xoossaa goyinniya Ayhude gidonna asaw, si7ite.
ACT 13:17 Ha Isra7eele asaa Xoossay nu mayzata dooris. Gibxe biittan imathatethan enti de7ishin, enta darsidi ba gita wolqan Gibxe biittafe enta kessis.
ACT 13:18 Mela biittan oytamu laytha mela enta danda7is.
ACT 13:19 Kanaane biittan Ayhude gidonna laapun kawotethata diggidi enta biitta ba asaa laatisis.
ACT 13:20 “Hessafe guye, nabiya Sameela wode gakanaw oyddu xeetanne ishatamu laytha mela aysiya daynnata entaw immis.
ACT 13:21 Hessafe guye, enti bantaw kawo immana mela woossin, Xoossay Biniyaame sheeshape Qiisa na7aa, Saa7ola oytamu laythi kawotana mela entaw immis.
ACT 13:22 Xoossay Saa7ola shaaridaape guye enta bolla Dawita kawothis. Xoossay Dawitaba markatishe, ‘Taani koyiya ubbaa ta wozanaa mela oothiya Isseye na7aa Dawita demmas’ yaagis.
ACT 13:23 “Xoossay, ‘Taani Dawita sheeshape Isra7eele deriya ashsheysa ehana’ gidaysa mela Yesuusa ehis.
ACT 13:24 Yesuusi yaanape sinthe Isra7eele asa ubbay banta nagaraape simmidi xammaqetana mela Yohaanisi qaala odis.
ACT 13:25 Qassi Yohaanisi ba oosuwa wursana hanishe asaako, ‘Tana oona gidi qopeetii? Taani hinte naagiya Kiristoosa gidike, shin taani iya caammaa birshanaw taw bessonnaysi taape guyera yees’ yaagis.
ACT 13:26 “Ta Ishato, Abrahaame sheeshato, qassi haysan Ayhude gidonashin Xoossas yayyeysato, ha atotetha qaalay nuus kiitetis.
ACT 13:27 Ayis giiko, Yerusalaamen de7iya asaynne enta halaqati Yesuusa eribookona. Sambaata ubban nabbabetiya nabeta qaala akeekibona gisho iya bolla pirdidi nabeti odida qaala polidosona.
ACT 13:28 Yesuusa wodhisanaw issi gaasoyka entaw dhayin Philaxoosi iya wodhana mela woossidosona.
ACT 13:29 Enti Yesuusabay Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetidaba ubba polida wode masqaliyape iya wodhisidi moogidosona.
ACT 13:30 Shin Xoossay hayqope Yesuusa denthis.
ACT 13:31 Hessafe guye, I baara Galilape Yerusalaame yidaysatas daro toho bentis. Enti ha77i iyabaa asaas markatoosona.
ACT 13:32 “Xoossay nu aawatas immana gida Wongela nuuni hintew odoos.
ACT 13:33 Dawiti ba Mazmure Maxaafan nam7antho shempuwan, “Neeni, ta Na7a, taani hachi nena yelas” geetetidi xaafetida Yesuusa, Xoossay hayqope denthidi nu mayzatas immana gidaysa nuus enta naytas polis.
ACT 13:34 I wooqonna mela Xoossay hayqope iya denthon erisanaw, “ ‘Taani Dawitas immana gida ammanetida geeshsha anjuwa hintew immana’ ” yaagidi odis.
ACT 13:35 Hessa gisho, Mazmure Maxaafan hara bessan, “ ‘Ne Geeshsha Na7aa aha wooqisaka’ yaagees.
ACT 13:36 “Dawiti ba wode Xoossaa qofaa polidaape guye hayqidi ba aawatara moogetidi wooqis.
ACT 13:37 Shin Xoossay hayqope denthidaysi wooqibeenna.
ACT 13:38 “Hessa gisho, ta ishato, nagara atotethay Yesuusa baggara kasetidi hintew odetidaysa erite. Muse higgey nagaraape xillisanaw danda7enna.
ACT 13:39 Shin Yesuusa ammaniya ubbay nagaraape xillees.
ACT 13:40 Hessa gisho, nabeti gidaysi hinte bolla gakonna mela naagetite.
ACT 13:41 “ ‘Xoossay gidaba leqiseysato! Be7ite! Malaaletite! Dhayite! oonika odin, hinte ammanonna oosuwa taani hinte wodiyan oothana’ ” yaagis.
ACT 13:42 Phawuloosinne Barnabaasi Ayhude Woosa keethafe keyishin, kaalliya Sambaatan hessa gujidi odana mela asay entana woossidosona.
ACT 13:43 Shiiqoy laaletidaape guye, daro Ayhudetinne Ayhudeta ammanuwan gelidi Xoossaa goyinniya daroti Phawuloosanne Barnabaasa kaallidosona. Ammanidaysati Xoossaa aadho keehatethan minnidi daana mela enta zoridosona.
ACT 13:44 Kaalliya Sambaatan kataman de7iya asaape daroti Xoossaa qaala si7anaw shiiqidosona.
ACT 13:45 Shin Ayhudeti daro asaa be7ida wode Phawuloosa qanaatidi iya haasaya ixidi iya cayidosona.
ACT 13:46 Phawuloosinne Barnabaasi yayyonna, “Xoossaa qaalay koyrottidi hintew odetanaw koshshees. Shin hinte qaala ixidi merinaa de7uwa ekanaw nuus bessenna gidi hinte, hinte huuphen pirdida gisho hiza nuuni Ayhude gidonaysatako simmoos.
ACT 13:47 Gaasoyka Goday, “ ‘Alame kumethay ne baggara attana mela, taani nena Ayhude gidonna deriyas poo7o oothas’ yaagidi nuna kiittis” yaagidosona.
ACT 13:48 Ayhude gidonnaysati hessa si7ida wode ufaytidi Xoossaa qaala bonchidosona. Qassi merinaa de7uwas dooretida ubbay ammanidosona.
ACT 13:49 Godaa qaalay he biitta ubbaa gakis.
ACT 13:50 Shin Ayhudeti, Ayhude gidonna Xoosse goyinniya dure maccasatanne kataman de7iya gita asata Phawuloosa bollanne Barnabaasa bolla denthethidosona. He asati enta goodda doomidi banta biittafe kessidosona.
ACT 13:51 Shin Phawuloosaranne Barnabaasara ixeysatas malla gidana mela banta tohuwape baana pitidi Iqoniyoone katama bidosona.
ACT 13:52 Qassi Anxooken de7iya ammaneysati Geeshsha Ayyaananinne ufaysan kumidosona.
ACT 14:1 Kaseysadaka, Phawuloosinne Barnabaasi Iqoniyoonen Ayhudeta woosa keethi gelidi daro Ayhudetinne Ayhude gidonnaysati ammanana gakanaw qaala odidosona.
ACT 14:2 Shin ammanibona Ayhudeti, Ayhude gidonnayisata wozanaa laammidi ishata bolla denthethidosona.
ACT 14:3 Hawaareti yan daro wodiya gam7idosona. Enti yayyonna Godaaba odidosona. Goday malaatatanne oorathaba enti oothana mela entaw maata immidi, I ba aadho keehatetha qaalay tuma gideysa qoncisis.
ACT 14:4 Shin he katama asay shaaketidi, baggay Ayhudetara baggay qassi Hawaaretara gidis.
ACT 14:5 Ayhude gidonaysatinne Ayhudeti banta halaqatara issife gididi hawaareta qohanawunne shuchan caddanaw koydosona.
ACT 14:6 Hawaareti hessa eridi, Lisxiranne Darbe geetetiya Liqa7oona katamatanne enta heeran de7iya biitta baqatidosona.
ACT 14:7 Yan Wongela odidosona.
ACT 14:8 Yeletoosape doomidi nam7u tohoy wobbin hemeti eronna issi addey Lisxiran de7ees.
ACT 14:9 He addey Phawuloosi odishin uttidi si7ees. Phawuloosi iya tishshi oothi xeelliya wode paxanaw iyaw ammanoy de7eysa be7idi,
ACT 14:10 ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Sitti gada ne tohuwan eqa” yaagis. Yaatin, gupi dendi eqidi hemethi doomis.
ACT 14:11 Phawuloosi oothidaysa asay be7idi banta qaala dhoqu oothidi Liqa7oona doonan, “Xoossati ase daanidi nuuko wodhidosona” yaagidosona.
ACT 14:12 Barnabaasa, “Diya” gidi, Phawuloosi odan waannatiya gisho, iya, “Hermena” gidi sunthidosona.
ACT 14:13 Katamaape gaxan de7iya eeqa Diya keethaa kahineynne asay kormatanne alleeqo ciishshata hawaaretas yarshanaw koyidi katamaa penge ehidosona.
ACT 14:14 Shin Barnabaasinne Phawuloosi hessa si7ida wode enti oothanaw qopidaysa ixidi, banta ma7uwa peedhidosona. Asaa giddo woxi gelidi,
ACT 14:15 banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Asaw, haysa ayis oothetii? Nuka hinte mela ase. Ha pathonabape salonne sa7a, abbanne enta giddon de7iya ubbaba medhida de7o Xoossaako hinte simmana mela hintew nuuni Wongela odoos.
ACT 14:16 I, beni asay banta oge baana mela yeddi aggis.
ACT 14:17 Shin ira saluwape bukisis, kathaaka wodiyan wodiyan immis, kathi immidi hintena daro ufaysis, yaatidi hintew lo77oba oothidi baw marka dhaysibeenna” yaagidosona.
ACT 14:18 Hawaareti hessa gidi, bantaw asay yarshonna mela waaydi diggidosona.
ACT 14:19 Anxookepenne Iqoniyoonepe yida Ayhudeti, asaa banta bagga zaaridi shuchan Phawuloosa caddidosona. I hayqidaba daanin katamaape gaxa goochi efidi yeggidosona.
ACT 14:20 Shin ammaneysati yidi, iya yuushon eqidashin I dendidi katamaa gelis. Wontetha gallas Barnabaasara issife Darbe bis.
ACT 14:21 Enti Darbe kataman Wongela odidi darota ammanthidaape guye Lisxira, Iqoniyoonenne Phisden de7iya Anxooke simmidosona.
ACT 14:22 Yan ammaneyisata minthethishenne enti ammanon minnidi de7ana mela zorishe, “Xoossaa kawotethaa gelanaw nuuni daro waaye ekanaw bessees” yaagidi tamaarsidosona.
ACT 14:23 Qassi woosa keethatas huuphen huuphen cimata dooridosona. Xoomidaapenne woossidaape guye enti ammanida Godaas enta hadara immidosona.
ACT 14:24 Phisde biitta kanthi aadhidi Phinfile bidosona.
ACT 14:25 Phergen qaala odidaape guye Axaale bidosona.
ACT 14:26 Banta oosuwa polidaape guye, Axaalep Xoossa aadho keehatethas enta hadara immida Anxooke markabera guye simmidosona.
ACT 14:27 Anxooke gakida wode woosa keethaa asaa shiishidi Xoossay entara oothida oosuwa ubbaanne Ayhude gidonna asay ammanana mela entaw waati penge dooyidaako odidosona.
ACT 14:28 Hessan ammaneysatara daro wode gam7idosona.
ACT 15:1 Issi issi asati Yihudape Anxooke bidi, “Muse wogaatho hinte qaxaretonna ixiko attanaw danda7eketa” gidi ammaneyisata tamaarso doomidosona.
ACT 15:2 Hessi Phawuloosanne Barnabaasa entara daro palamanadanne kaccanaada oothis. Hessa gisho, Anxooken de7iya issi issi asati Phawuloosaranne Barnabaasara Yerusalaame bidi Hawaaretaranne cimatara gahetidi he oda billanaw qofay qashetis.
ACT 15:3 Woosa keethay enta kiittin bidosona. Enti Sirofinqe Samaarera aadhishe Ayhude gidonnaysati Xoossako waanidi simmidaako odidosona. Hessi ammaneyisata ubbaa daro ufaysis.
ACT 15:4 Enti Yerusalaame gakida wode woosa keethay, Hawaaretinne cimati enta mokidosona. Xoossay bantara oothidaba ubba odidosona.
ACT 15:5 Shin Farsaaweta baggafe ammanida issi issi asati dendi eqidi, “Ayhude gidonashin ammanida asati qaxaretanawunne Muse higge naaganaw bessees” yaagidosona.
ACT 15:6 Hawaaretinne cimati hessa zorettanaw shiiqidosona.
ACT 15:7 Daro zoretidaape guye, Phexroosi dendi eqidi, “Ta ishato, Ayhude gidonnaysati Wongela qaala ta doonape si7idi ammanana mela kasetidi tana Xoossay hinte giddofe dooridaysa hinte ereeta.
ACT 15:8 Asa wozana eriya Xoossay Geeshsha Ayyaana nuus immidaysada entawuka immidi tumayis.
ACT 15:9 Ammanon enta wozana geeshshida gisho nu giddoninne enta giddon dummatethi wothibeenna.
ACT 15:10 Hessa gisho, nu aawatinne nuuni tookanaw danda7iboona qambara ammaneyisata morgen wothidi ha77i ayis hinte Xoossa paacetii?
ACT 15:11 Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa aadho keehatethan enti attidaysada nuka attidaysa ammanoos” yaagis.
ACT 15:12 Asay si77i gidi, Barnabaasinne Phawuloosi Ayhude gidonna asaa giddon banta baggara Xoossay oothida malaatatanne oorathaba ubbaa odishin si7oosona.
ACT 15:13 Enti haasaya ongidaape guye Yayqoobi, “Ishato, ta geysa si7ite.
ACT 15:14 Xoossay Ayhude gidonnayisata giddofe ba ase dooranaw koyidi entana koyro waatidi qopidaako Simooni odis.
ACT 15:15 Nabeta qaalay haysara issino. Geeshsha Maxaafan,
ACT 15:16 “ ‘Haysafe guye, taani simmana, kundida Dawita kawotetha denthana. Laaletida keethaaka zaara essana.
ACT 15:17 Attida asa ubbay taako yaana, taani xeegida Ayhude gidonna asa ubbay tana koyana.
ACT 15:18 Benipe doomada hessi eretana mela oothida Xoossay, taani yaagayis’ yaagees.
ACT 15:19 “Hessa gisho, ta qofay Xoossako simmiya Ayhude gidonnayisata nuuni waaysonaako lo77o.
ACT 15:20 Shin enti eeqas yarshetidi tunidaba moonna mela, laymatonna mela, bawuta moonna melanne suuthi uyonna mela entaw nuuni dabdaabe xaafanaw koshshees.
ACT 15:21 Muse higgey benipe doomidi Sambaatan Sambaatan ayhude woosa keethatan nabbabetishe katama ubban sabbaketees” yaagis.
ACT 15:22 Hessafe guye, hawaaretinne cimati woosa keetha asa ubbaara issife banta giddofe guutha asata dooridi Phawuloosaranne Barnabaasara Anxooke yeddanaw qofa qachidosona. Enti daro bonchetida nam7u asata Barsabaasa geetetiya Yihudanne Sillaase dooridosona.
ACT 15:23 Haysada geetetidi xaafetida dabdaabe enta bolla yeddidosona: “Nuuni hawaaretinne cimati hinte ishati, Anxooken, Sooreninne Kilqen de7iya Ayhude gidonna ishatas nu sarothuwa kiittoos.
ACT 15:24 “Nuuni kiittonna asati nu giddofe bidi, ‘Hinte qaxaretanawunne higgiya naaganaw bessees’ gidi, hintena waaysidaysanne yiloydaysa si7ida.
ACT 15:25 Nuuni dosiya Barnabaasanne Phawuloosa dooretida asatara issife hinteko kiittanaw issi wozanan nu qofaa qachida.
ACT 15:26 Enti nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa gisho banta de7uwa aathidi immidosona.
ACT 15:27 Hessa gisho, nuuni xaafidaysa enti banta doonan gujidi hintew odana mela Yihudanne Sillaase kiitida.
ACT 15:28 “Ha koshsheysatape attishin, hara tooho hintena toossonna mela nunne Geeshsha Ayyaanay oda qachida.
ACT 15:29 Eeqas yarshetidi tunidaba moopite, suuthu uyopite, bawuta moopite, laymatopite. Ha ubbaafe hinte huuphiya naagiko hinte lo77oba ootheeta. Hiza, saro de7ite” yaagidosona.
ACT 15:30 Hessa gisho, kiitetidaysati moyzetidi Anxooke bidi ammaniya asaa shiishidi, dabdaabe immidosona.
ACT 15:31 Enti he minthethiya dabdaabiya nabbabida wode ufaytidosona.
ACT 15:32 Qassi Yihudinne Sillaasey banta huuphen nabe gidiya gisho ammaneyisata loythi zoridi minthethidosona.
ACT 15:33 Enti Anxooken guutha gallas uttidaape guye ishati lo77ora moyzin bantana kiitidaysatako simmidosona.
ACT 15:34 [Shin Sillaasey yan attanaw koyis].
ACT 15:35 Qassi Phawuloosinne Barnabaasi hara daro asatara issife Godaa qaala tamaarsishenne wongelaa odishe Anxooken gam7idosona.
ACT 15:36 Guutha gallasape guye Phawuloosi Barnabaasako, “Nuuni Godaa qaala odida katama ubban ammaneysati waanidi de7iyako guye simmishe xomoosi be7oos” yaagis.
ACT 15:37 Barnabaasi Marqoosa geetetiya Yohaanisa bantara efanaw koyis.
ACT 15:38 Shin Phawuloosi Marqoosa bantara efanaw koybeenna. Gaasoyka, I Phinfilen shaaketidi entara oothanaw bibeenna.
ACT 15:39 Enta giddon iita ooshshi keyin issoy issuwafe shaaketidosona. Barnabaasi Marqoosa ekidi markabera Qophiroosa bis.
ACT 15:40 Shin Phawuloosi Sillaase dooris; ammaneysati Phawuloosa Xoossa aadho keehatethas hadara immidaape guye, I keyidi bis.
ACT 15:41 Yaatidi, woosa keethata minthethishe Sooreranne Kilqiyara aadhis.
ACT 16:1 Phawuloosi Darbenne Lisxira bis. Yan Ximotiyoosa geetetiya ammaniya asi de7ees. Iya aayiya ammaniya Ayhude maccasi, iya aaway Girike asi.
ACT 16:2 Lisxiraninne Iqoniyoonen de7iya ammaneysati Ximotiyoosaba loythidi markatidosona.
ACT 16:3 Phawuloosi Ximotiyoosa baara efanaw koydi, iya aaway Girike asi gididaysa he bessan de7iya Ayhude ubbay eriya gisho iya qaxaris.
ACT 16:4 Enti katamatara bishe Yerusalaamen de7iya hawaaretinne cimati wothida higgiya ammaneysati naagana mela entaw odishe aadhidosona.
ACT 16:5 Hessa gisho, woosa keethati ammanon minnishe, taybonka gallas gallas dari dari bidosona.
ACT 16:6 Iisen qaala odonna mela Geeshsha Ayyaanay enta diggida gisho, Pirgeranne Galatiya biittara aadhidosona.
ACT 16:7 Enti Miise zawa gakida wode Bitaane baanaw koydosona. Shin Yesuusa Ayyaanay enta diggis.
ACT 16:8 Hessa gisho, enti Miise matara aadhishe Xiro7aada wodhidosona.
ACT 16:9 Phawuloosi qamma qoncethan issi Maqedoone asi baako, “Maqedoone pinnada nuna maaddarki” yaagishe eqidi woossishin be7is.
ACT 16:10 Qoncethaa I be7idaape guye ellesidi nuuni Maqedoone baanaw koyda. Ayis giiko, wongela yan de7iya asaas odanaw Xoossay nuna xeegidaysa erida.
ACT 16:11 Xiro7aadape dendidi markaben gelidi Samotiraaqe bida, wontetha gallas Naaphule bida.
ACT 16:12 Yaape dendidi Maqedoone biittan de7iya Filphisiyuusa katama bida. Filphisiyuusi Roome asay de7iya katama. Nuuni he kataman guutha gallas uttida.
ACT 16:13 Sambaata gallas katamaape gaxan Shaafa doonan Ayhudeti Xoossaa woossiya bessi de7eysa eridi yaa bida. He bessan shiiqida maccasaas qaala odida.
ACT 16:14 Nuna si7iya asape issi Liidiya geetetiya Tiyatroona katamaape yida, Xoossaa ammanida zo7o afila zal7iya, maccasiya de7awusu. Phawuloosi odeysa iya si7ana mela Xoossay I wozanaa dooyis.
ACT 16:15 Liidiya ba soo asaara issife xammaqetidaape guye nuuko, “Hinte tana Godaa tuma ammanasu giiko ta soo yedhite” gada minthada woossasu.
ACT 16:16 Nuuni Xoossaa woossiya bessaa bishin iita ayyaanay I bolla de7idi marothiya issi geela7o gadhindoy nuura gahetasu. Iya kaayada daro miishe ba godatas ehawusu.
ACT 16:17 Phawuloosanne nuna kaallada, “Haysati Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa aylleta! Enti hinte attana oge odeyisata” gada waassasu.
ACT 16:18 Ubba gallas hessada gawusu. Shin Phawuloosi yilotidi guye simmidi, he ayyaana, “Yesuus Kiristoosa sunthan neeni iipe keya” gidi kiittis. Iiraka iita ayyaanay iipe keyi aggis.
ACT 16:19 Shin I godati bantaw miishe demmiya ogey dhayidaysa be7idi, Phawuloosanne Sillaase oykidi, dabaaba daynnata sinthe goochi efidosona.
ACT 16:20 Daynnata sinthe enta efidi, “Haysati Ayhude asi gidishe nu katamaa asaa daro waaysosona.
ACT 16:21 Nuuni Roome biitta asi gidishe ekanawunne oothanaw woga gidonnaba tamaarsoosona” yaagidosona.
ACT 16:22 Asay issi bagga gididi, Phawuloosa bollanne Sillaase bolla dendidosona. Daynnati enta ma7uwa qaaridi xam7an shocana mela kiittidosona.
ACT 16:23 Enta daro wadhidaape guye, qasho keethi gelsidosona. Qasho keethaa naageysika enta minthi naagana mela kiittidosona.
ACT 16:24 Qasho keethaa naageysi he kiita ekidi, Phawuloosanne Sillaase qasho keethas qol7a gelsis. Enta tohuwa duxis.
ACT 16:25 Shin giddi bilahe gidiya wode Phawuloosaranne Sillaasera woossishenne mazmure yexishe Xoossaa galatoosona. Qasho keethan de7iya hara asatika enti giyaba si7oosona.
ACT 16:26 Qoponna qasho keetha baasoy qaaxana gakanaw biitta qaaxoy hanis. He saatenka penge ubbay dooyetis; qashetida asa ubbaa santhalaatay birsheti wodhis.
ACT 16:27 Qasho keethaa naageysi dhiskofe barkida wode qasho keethaa penge ubbay dooyetidaysa be7idi qasho asay kessi eki bidaba daanin bana wodhanaw mashshe ekis.
ACT 16:28 Shin Phawuloosi qaala dhoqu oothidi “Nu ubbay haysan de7iya gisho neeni nena qohopa” yaagis.
ACT 16:29 Qasho keethaa naageysi xompe woossi ekidi ellesidi gaathi woxis. Kokorishe Phawuloosa sinthaninne Sillaase sinthan gufannis.
ACT 16:30 Enta kare kessidi, “Ta godato, taani attanaw ay oothanaw bessii?” yaagis.
ACT 16:31 Phawuloosaranne Sillaasera iyako, “Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa ammana; neeranne ne soo asaara attana” yaagidosona.
ACT 16:32 Enti iyasinne iya son de7iya ubbaas Godaa qaala odidosona.
ACT 16:33 Qamma he saatenka qasho keetha naageysi enta efidi enta madunthaa meeccis. Ellesidi ba soo asa ubbaara xammaqetis.
ACT 16:34 Phawuloosanne Sillaase ba soo efidi entaw kathi aathis. I ba soo asa ubbaara Xoossa ammanida gisho ufaytis.
ACT 16:35 Sa7i wontin daynnati, “He asata billa” yaagidi wotaadareta halaqata iyako kiittidosona.
ACT 16:36 Qasho keetha naageysi, “Hinte biletana mela daynnati kiittidosona. Hiza, keyidi saro biite” yaagidi he kiita Phawuloosas odis.
ACT 16:37 Shin Phawuloosi, “Nuuni Roome asi gidishin enti nuna pirdi bayna asaa sinthan wadhidi, qasho keethan yeggidosona. Ha77i nuna geeman keyidi boo goonna? Hanenna, enti banta huuphen yidi nuna kesso” yaagis.
ACT 16:38 Wotaadare halaqati daynnatas hessa odin, Phawuloosaranne Sillaasera Roome biitta ase gididaysa si7ida wode yayyidosona.
ACT 16:39 Hessa gisho, daynnati yidi entako, “Nuuni hintena qohida” gidoosona. Qasho keethafe kare enta kessidi, katamape keydi baana mela woossidosona.
ACT 16:40 Phawuloosaranne Sillaasera qasho keethafe keyidi Liidiya soo bidosona. Yan ammaneysatara gaketidi enta minthethidi keydi bidosona.
ACT 17:1 Phawuloosaranne Sillaasera Amfipholisaranne Apholonara aadhidi Teselonqe bidosona. Yan ayhude woosa keethi de7ees.
ACT 17:2 Phawuloosi kaseysada yaa gelis. Hessan heedzu saaminta Xoossaa qaalape asaas odis.
ACT 17:3 Kiristoosi waaye ekanawunne hayqope dendanaw besseysa entaw qoncisidi odishe, “Yesuusi ha taani hintew odeysi Kiristoosa” yaagis.
ACT 17:4 Entafe issoti issoti oday tuma gideysa ma7idi Phawuloosaranne Sillaasera issifidosona. Hessadaka, Xoossaa goyinniya daro Girike asaynne daro bonchetida maccasatika entara issifidosona.
ACT 17:5 Shin Ayhudeti qanaatidi issi issi oosoy bayna iita asata ogepe shiishidosona. Kataman buqethi kessidosona; Phawuloosanne Sillaase asaas aathidi immanaw koydi Yaasona keethaa teqidosona.
ACT 17:6 Phawuloosinne Sillaasey entaw bentonna ixin, Yaasonanne issi issi ammaneyisata katamaa halaqatako goochi efidi, “Haysati biitta ubbaa buqeysati ha77i nuuko yidosona.
ACT 17:7 Yaasoni enta ba son wothis. Haysati, ‘Yesuusa geetetiya hara kawoy de7ees’ gidi Qeesare kiitaa menthosona” yaagidi dhoqu gida qaalan odidosona.
ACT 17:8 Shiiqida asaynne katama halaqati hessa si7idi hananaba dhaydosona.
ACT 17:9 Halaqati Yaasonanne harata waasera billidosona.
ACT 17:10 Ammaneysati Phawuloosanne Sillaase qammara Beeriya yeddidosona. Beeriya gakidi, ayhude woosa keethi gelidosona.
ACT 17:11 Beeriya asay Teselonqe asaape aadhida suureta. Enti qaala kumetha wozanape ekidosona; Phawuloosi gidaysi tuma gideysa shaaki eranaw gallas gallas Geeshsha Maxaafata pilgoosona.
ACT 17:12 Hessa gisho, entafe daroti, Giriketapeka bonchetida daro maccasatinne daro addeti ammanidosona.
ACT 17:13 Shin Teselonqen de7iya Ayhudeti Phawuloosi Xoossaa qaala Beeriyanka odidaysa si7ida wode Beeriya yidi asaa buqidosona.
ACT 17:14 Hessafe guye, ammaneysati ellesidi Phawuloosa abba mati yeddidosona. Shin Sillaaseynne Ximotiyoosi Beeriyan attidosona.
ACT 17:15 Phawuloosa moyzida asati Ateena gathidosona. He asati Sillaaseynne Ximotiyoosi bantaw danda7etida mela ellesidi baako yaana mela Phawuloosi kiitida kiita ekidi Beeriya simmidosona.
ACT 17:16 Phawuloosi Ateenan Sillaasenne Ximotiyoosa naagishe, kataman eeqi kumidaysa be7idi yilotis.
ACT 17:17 Hessa gisho, ayhude woosa keethan Ayhudetaranne Xoossa goyinniya Ayhude gidonna asaara qassi baara gahetiya asaara ubba gallas palamees.
ACT 17:18 Epiqoroosenne Istoyke geetetiya cugatape issi issi eranchoti Phawuloosara palamidosona. Entafe issoti issoti, “Ha yooyamay ay odanaw koyii?” yaagidosona. Harati Phawuloosi Yesuusabaanne hayqope I dendidaysa bantaw odida gisho, “Ooratha xoossataba odiya daanees” yaagidosona.
ACT 17:19 Phawuloosa oykidi Ariyospagoosa geetetiya shiiqo bessaa efidi, “Ha neeni tamaarsiya oorathabay aybeko nuna erisikii?
ACT 17:20 Ayis giiko, neeni nuus oorathaba odaasa; hiza hessi aybeko nuuni eranaw koyoos” yaagidosona.
ACT 17:21 Ateena asa ubbaynne yan de7iya imatha asay oorathaba odetonanne si7onna pee7okona.
ACT 17:22 Phawuloosi Ariyospagoosa sinthan eqidi, “Ateena asato, xoossatas ubbaban hinte daro yayyeysa taani be7ayis.
ACT 17:23 Taani hinte katamaara yuuyashe hinte goyinniya bessata be7iya wode, ‘Eretonna Xoossaas’ geetetidi xaafetida yarsho bessa demmas. Ha hinte eronnashin goyinneysa taani hintew odayis.
ACT 17:24 Sa7anne sa7an de7iya ubbaba medhida Xoossay, salonne sa7a Goday, asi keexida keethan deenna.
ACT 17:25 I de7o, shemponne ubbaba asa ubbaas immiya gisho paci de7iya asada asa maade koyenna.
ACT 17:26 Xoossay asa koche ubbaa issi addiyafe medhidi biitta ubban wothis. Yaatidi enti daana wodiyasinne bessaas zawa immis.
ACT 17:27 I hessa oothiday asi iya koyana melanne pilgidi demmana melasa. Hanikoka I nuupe geemmibeenna.
ACT 17:28 Hintefe issi issi yexeysati, ‘Nuuni iya nayta’ gidaysada, ‘Nuuni iyan paxa de7oos, qaaxoos.’
ACT 17:29 Hiza, nuuni Xoossaa nayta gidiya gisho, ‘Xoossay asa hiillatethaninne qofan worqafe woyko birape woyko shuchafe oosetidaba daanees’ yaagidi qopanaw bessenna.
ACT 17:30 Hessa gisho, Xoossay beni wode asay eronna oothidaysa aggidi aadhis. Shin ha77i ubba bessan de7iya asay nagarape simmana mela kiitees.
ACT 17:31 Ayis giiko, Xoossay ba doorida addiyan sa7an de7iya asa ubbaa bolla xillo pirda pirdanaw qamma giigisi wothis. Iya hayqope denthidi hessa asa ubbaas tumayis” yaagis.
ACT 17:32 Entafe issi issi asati hayqope dendoba Phawuloosape si7idi, iya bolla qelqisidosona. Shin harati, “Nuuni hessa neepe gujidi si7anaw koyoos” yaagidosona.
ACT 17:33 Hessa gisho, Phawuloosi enta giddofe keyis.
ACT 17:34 Shin issi issi addeti Phawuloosara gaketidi ammanidosona. Enta giddofe Ariyospagoosan shiiquwan de7iya Diyonasiyoosa geetetiya addey, Damarso geetetiya issi maccasiyanne harati de7oosona.
ACT 18:1 Hessafe guye, Phawuloosi Ateenape keyidi, Qorontoosa bis.
ACT 18:2 Yan Phanxoosan yeletida issi Ayhude addiya Aqila demmis. Ayhude asa ubbay Roomepe keyana mela kawoy Qalawudiyoosi kiitida gisho guutha wodepe kase I ba mache Phirisqillara Xaalepe yis. Phawuloosi entara gahetanaw bis.
ACT 18:3 Iya oosoy entaysada dunkaane siko gidiya gisho, entara uttidi issife oothis.
ACT 18:4 Phawuloosi Sambaata ubban Ayhudetanne Giriketa ammanthanaw ayhude woosa keethan palamees.
ACT 18:5 Sillaaseynne Ximotiyoosi Maqedoonepe yida wode Phawuloosi ba kumetha wodiya immidi Ayhudetas Yesuusi I, Kiristoosa gidi qaala odis.
ACT 18:6 Shin enti Phawuloosa ixidi iya cayin Phawuloosi ba ma7uwape baana qoqofishe, “Hinte gomey hintena oyko; taani hessan de7ike. Hizape guye, taani Ayhude gidonna asaako bayis” yaagis.
ACT 18:7 Yaape keyidi Xoossaa goyinniya Titos Yosxoosa geetetiya uraa soo bis. Yosxoosa keethay ayhude woosa keetha matan de7ees.
ACT 18:8 Ayhude woosa keetha halaqay Qarisphoosi ba soo asa ubbaara Godaa ammanis. Qorontoosa asatapeka daroti Xoossaa qaala si7ida wode ammanidi xammaqetidosona.
ACT 18:9 Goday issi qamma Phawuloosas qoncidi, “Yayyofa; oda, si77i goopa.
ACT 18:10 Taani neera de7ayis. Taw ha kataman daro asi de7iya gisho nena qohidi iitaban yeggana asi oonika baawa” yaagis.
ACT 18:11 Hessa gisho, Phawuloosi Xoossaa qaala asaa tamaarsishe issi laythinne usupun ageena entara uttis.
ACT 18:12 Gaaliyoosi Akaya biitta aysiya wode Ayhudeti issife Phawuloosa bolla dendidi pirda keethi iya efidi,
ACT 18:13 “Ha addey higgiya ixidi, asay Xoossaa goyinnana mela oothees” yaagidosona.
ACT 18:14 Phawuloosi odetana hanishin, Gaaliyoosi Ayhudetako, “Ayhudeto, hessi iita ooso woyko naaqo gidiyako taani hintebaa danda7ada si7anaw bessees.
ACT 18:15 Shin qaalas, sunthasinne hinte higgiyas hinte palamiyaba gidiko hinte, hintew billite; hessa taani pirdike” yaagis.
ACT 18:16 Yaatidi, enta pirda keethafe kare kessis.
ACT 18:17 Hessafe guye, Girike asa ubbay ayhude woosa keetha halaqaa Sosteneesa oykidi pirda keethaa sinthan wadhidosona. Shin Gaaliyoosi hessa paxaba gibeenna.
ACT 18:18 Phawuloosi daro gallas Qorontoosan uttidaape guye ammaniya asaa sarothidi, Phirisqilliranne Aqilara markaben Soore bis. Shin I baanape sinthe baw gasoy de7iya gisho Kinkire kataman ba huuphiya buluusetis.
ACT 18:19 Enti Efesoona gakida wode Phawuloosi Phirisqillonne Aqila yan aggis. Shin baw ayhude woosa keethi gelidi Ayhudetara odetis.
ACT 18:20 Enti bantara daro wode uttana mela Phawuloosa woossidosona shin I ixis.
ACT 18:21 Entafe shaaketishe, “Taani yaa baaliya Yerusalaamen bonchanaw bessees. Shin Xoossi giiko hinteko simma yaana” yaagidi Efesoonape markabiyan bis.
ACT 18:22 Qisaare gakida wode Yerusalaame bidi woosa keethaa asaa sarothidaape guye Anxooke bis.
ACT 18:23 Yan guutha wode gam7idaape guye ammaniya asata ubbaa minthethishe Galatiyaranne Pirgera aadhis.
ACT 18:24 Iskindiren yeletida issi Aphiloosa geetetiya Ayhude asi Efesoona bis. I oda eriya asinne Xoossaa qaala daro eriya asi.
ACT 18:25 Godaa ogiyaka tamaaris, ayyaanan xuugetidi Yesuusaba suure tamaarsees. Gidoshin, Yohaanisa xinqatiya xalaala erees.
ACT 18:26 I ayhude woosa keethan yayyonna tamaarsees. Phirisqillanne Aqili I odeysa si7ida wode bantara soo iya efidi Xoossaa ogiya kaseysafe geeshshidi iyaw odidosona.
ACT 18:27 Aphiloosi Akaya baanaw koyin Efesoonan de7iya ammaniya asay iya qofaa ekidi Akayan de7iya ammaneysati iya mokana mela entaw dabdaabiya xaafidosona. I yaa gakida wode Xoossaa aadho keehatetha baggara Yesuus Kiristoosa ammanidaysata daro maaddis.
ACT 18:28 Ayis giiko, Yesuusi, I, Kiristoosa gideysa Ayhudetas Xoossaa qaalape qoncisidi deriya sinthan minthi odidi enta lathis.
ACT 19:1 Aphiloosi Qorontoosan de7ishin, Phawuloosi qommo baggara aadhidi Efesoona bis. Yan issi issi ammaniya asata demmis.
ACT 19:2 Entako, “Hinte ammanida wode Geeshsha Ayyaana ekidetii?” yaagidi oychis. Enti, “Akay, ekibooko; hari attoshin, Geeshsha Ayyaani de7iyabaka si7ibooko” yaagidosona.
ACT 19:3 Phawuloosi entako, “Yaatin, aybin xammaqetidetii?” yaagis. Enti, “Nuuni Yohaanisa xinqaten xammaqetida” yaagidi zaaridosona.
ACT 19:4 Phawuloosi, “Yohaanisi baape guyera yaa Yesuus Kiristoosan asay ammanana mela asaas odishe, nagarape simo bessiya xinqaten xammaqis” yaagis.
ACT 19:5 Enti hessa si7ida wode Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa tamaare gidanaw xammaqetidosona.
ACT 19:6 Phawuloosi ba kushiya enta bolla wothida wode Geeshsha Ayyaanay enta bolla wodhin, dumma dumma doonan odetidosona; qassi tinbite odidosona.
ACT 19:7 He bessan tammanne nam7a gidiya asati de7oosona.
ACT 19:8 Phawuloosi ayhude woosa keethi gelidi, Xoossa kawotethaaba yayyonna palamishenne loythi qoncisishe entara heedzu ageena gakanaw gam7is.
ACT 19:9 Shin entafe issoti issoti dhube gididi daro asaa sinthan Godaa ogiya cayidi ammanonna ixidosona. Phawuloosi ammaneyisata entafe shaaki ekidi Xiranoosa geetetiya timirte keethan ubba gallas enta tamaarsis.
ACT 19:10 Phawuloosi nam7u laythi gakanaw qaala odis. Hessa gisho, Iisen de7iya asa ubbay, Ayhudetinne Ayhude gidonnaysati Godaa qaala si7idosona.
ACT 19:11 Xoossay Phawuloosa kushen wolqaama malaatata oothis.
ACT 19:12 Hessa gisho, asay iya asatethaa bochida maarabe woyko ma7o harganchotas efoosona. Entika paxoosona; tuna ayyaanati entafe keyoosona.
ACT 19:13 Tuna ayyaanata kessishe yuuyiya Ayhudetape issoti issoti, “Phawuloosi sabbakiya Yesuusa sunthan keyite gidi hintena kiittoos” yaagidi, tuna ayyaanati oykida asaa bolla Godaa Yesuusa sunthaa xeegidosona.
ACT 19:14 Kahine halaqaa Asqewa geetetiya issi Ayhude addiyas hessa oothiya laapun nayti de7oosona.
ACT 19:15 Shin tuna ayyaanay entako, “Taani Yesuusaka Phawuloosaka erayis, shin hinte oonantee?” yaagis.
ACT 19:16 Tuna ayyaani oykida addey enta bolla gupi wodhidi, enta madunxisidi, he keethafe kallo baqatana gakanaw wolqaamis.
ACT 19:17 Efesoonan de7iya Ayhudetinne Ayhude gidonnaysati ubbay hessa si7idi daro yayyidosona. Godaa Yesuusa sunthay daro bonchetis.
ACT 19:18 Ammaneysatape daroti banta oothida iita oosuwa paaxishenne qoncen odishe yoosona.
ACT 19:19 Marotape daroti banta maxaafata shiishidi asa ubbaa sinthan xuuggidosona. He maxaafata gatiya tayboy ishatamu mukulu bira santime gidis.
ACT 19:20 Hessada hanidi Xoossa qaalay diccishenne dalgishe bis.
ACT 19:21 Hessi hanidaape guye Phawuloosi, “Taani Yerusalaame ba simmada Roome baanaw bessees” yaagidi Maqedooneranne Akayara aadhidi Yerusalaame baanaw qofa qachis.
ACT 19:22 Qassi bana maaddeysatape nam7ata Ximotiyoosanne Erasxoosa Maqedoone kiittidi, baw Iisen guutha wode gam7is.
ACT 19:23 He wode Godaa ogiya gisho Efesoonan wolqaama kachi keyis.
ACT 19:24 Issi bira oothiya Dimexiroosa geetetiya uray Arxemisi eeqa keetha misiliya birape oothidi daro wodhe demmees.
ACT 19:25 Hessa gisho, hessa mela ooso ootheyisata issife shiishidi, “Asaw, nu duretethay ha oosuwan gideysa hinte ereeta.
ACT 19:26 Haysi Phawuloosi, ‘Asa kushen oosetidaysati xoossata gidokona’ yaagidi, Efesoonaninne guutha biittatape attishin, kumetha Iise ubban de7iya daro asaa odi ammanthidaysanne balethidaysa hinte be7idetanne si7ideta.
ACT 19:27 Meto gididay, nu oosoy kadheteysa xalaala gidonashin, Iisenne biitta ubban de7iya asi goyinniya gita xoosse Arxemisi keethay bonchetonna atteysanne I gitatethay kundanaysa” yaagis.
ACT 19:28 Asay hessa si7ida wode shenen xuugetidi, “Efesoona Arxemisa gita” yaagidi waassidosona.
ACT 19:29 He waasoy katama ubbaa gakis. Phawuloosara hemetiya Maqedoone asata, Gaayoosanne Arxirokoosa oykidi goochishe kaassa bessaa woxidosona.
ACT 19:30 Phawuloosi asay shiiqida bessa gelanaw koyis, shin ammaneysati iya diggidosona.
ACT 19:31 Iise biitta halaqatape Phawuloosa lagge gidida issoti issoti Phawuloosako kiittidi, “Kaassa bessa qoncen keyada bentofa” gidi iya woossidosona.
ACT 19:32 Shiiqida asaas hananabay dhayis; dariya bagga asay hari attoshin ayis shiiqidako eronna gisho, issoy issibas waassiya wode hankoy harabas waassees.
ACT 19:33 Ayhudeti Iskindire geetetiya addiya aathidi bessin, issi issi asay I gaanaba odidi iya sinthe aathidosona. I asay si77i gaana mela ba kushen malli bessidi, asaas mootetanaw eqis.
ACT 19:34 Shin Iskindirey Ayhude asi gididaysa asay erida wode nam7u saate gidanaysa mela ubbay issi qaalan, “Efesoona Arxemisa gita” yaagidi waassidosona.
ACT 19:35 Wursethan, katamaa xaafey asaa si77i oothidi, “Efesoona asaw, Efesoona katamay gita Arxemisi eeqa keethinne salope wodhida I shucha misiliya naagey Efesoona asaa gideysa eronnay oonee?
ACT 19:36 Haysa kashi giya asi bayna gisho, hinte si77i gaanawunne dirgidi ayko oothonna agganaw bessees.
ACT 19:37 Hinte, ha asata eeqa keetha miishe kaysotonashin woyko nu xoossata cayiboonashin coo ha asata oykidi ehideta.
ACT 19:38 Hessa gisho, Dimexiroosinne iyara de7iya oosanchoti asaa mootanaw koyko, pirda keethay dooya de7ees; daynnatika de7oosona; enti mootanaw danda7oosona.
ACT 19:39 Shin hinte hara oda koyko, Shango shiiqon oday be7eto.
ACT 19:40 Hessa gidonna ixiko hachi hanidabaas Roome kawotethay nuna oychana. Ha buqethaas gaasoy bayna gisho, nuuni gaaso odanaw danda7oko”
ACT 19:41 yaagidi shiiquwa laallis.
ACT 20:1 Waasoy dochidaape guye, Phawuloosi ammaniya asata xeegisidi enta zoridaape guye, sarothidi Maqedoone baanaw keyis.
ACT 20:2 He biittara aadhishe qaala odishe asaa daro minthethidaape guye Girike biitta bis.
ACT 20:3 I yan heedzu ageena uttidi, markabera Soore baanaw qopidi de7ishin, Ayhudeti bana wodhanaw koyeysa eridi Maqedoonera guye simmanaw koyis.
ACT 20:4 Phawuloosa moyzidaysati Beeriyape Pharhusa na7aa Sophaxiroosa, Teselonqefe Arsxirokoosanne Sikonduusa, Darbefe Gaayoosa, Iisepe Tikiqoosa, Xirofmoosanne Ximotiyoosa.
ACT 20:5 Hessati sinthe bidi nuna Xiro7aadan naagoosona.
ACT 20:6 Nuuni Uytha Baaliya bonchidaape guye, Filphisiyuusape markabera dendidi, ichashantho gallasan enta Xiro7aadan gakidi yan laapun gallas gam7ida.
ACT 20:7 Saamintafe koyro gallasan nuuni uythaa menthanaw shiiqidi de7ishin, Phawuloosi wontethe baanaw qopida gisho, entaw qaala odishe giddi bilahe gakanaw odaa adussis.
ACT 20:8 Nuuni shiiqidi uttida pooqiyan daro poo7oy de7ees.
ACT 20:9 Ewuxikoosa geetetiya issi na7atethay maskoote bolla uttidi, baana dogidi dhiskis. Phawuloosi oda adussida wode Ewuxikoosi dhisko eeyidi heedzantho pooqiyape kundidi hayqidaysa asay denthis.
ACT 20:10 Shin Phawuloosi wodhidi, iya bolla gufannis. Iya idimmidi, “I hayqibeenna, hirgofite” yaagis.
ACT 20:11 Hessafe guye, pude pooqiya bolla keyidi uythaa menthidi mis. Sa7ay wontana gakanaw asaas odidaape guye dendidi bis.
ACT 20:12 He paxida na7atetha soo efidi daro ufaytidosona.
ACT 20:13 Shin Phawuloosi bana yaape mokana mela nuus odida gisho, kasetidi markabiyako bidi, Asoosa baanaw dendida. Ayis giiko, I tohon baanaw qopida gisho nuna hessatho kiittis.
ACT 20:14 I nuura Asoosan gahetin markabiyan iya ekidi Mixiline bida.
ACT 20:15 Wontetha gallas yaape dendidi markaben Kiyoosa sinthan de7iya bessaa gakida; qassi wontetha gallas Saamosa pinnidi kaalliya gallas Milixe gakida.
ACT 20:16 Phawuloosi Iisen daro gam7onna Efesoona matara aadhanaw qopis. Baw danda7etiko Phanxeqosxe Baaliya gallas Yerusalaame gakanaw eesotees.
ACT 20:17 Phawuloosi Milixepe Efesoona kiittidi woosa keethaa cimata xeegisis.
ACT 20:18 Woosa keetha cimati iyako yin, entako haysada yaagis: “Taani Iise gelida koyro gallasape doomida hintera de7ida wode ubban waana de7idaako hinte ereeta.
ACT 20:19 Ayhudeti duulatidi ta bolla meto gathikoka taani ashketethaninne daro afuthan Godaas oothas.
ACT 20:20 Dabaabanka hinte keethan keethan hintena tamaarsishe hintena maaddiyabape issibaaka pacisabike.
ACT 20:21 Taani Ayhudetasinne Ayhude gidonaysatas nagarape Xoossaako simmana melanne nu Godaa Yesuusa ammanana mela markatas.
ACT 20:22 “Yan tana aybi gakaneeko erike, shin ha77i taani Geeshsha Ayyaanas kiitetada Yerusalaame bayis.
ACT 20:23 Geeshsha Ayyaanay qashoynne waayey tana naageysa katama ubban taw markatis.
ACT 20:24 Shin ta wothaa polanawunne Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosape ekida oosuwa, Xoossaa aadho keehatetha Wongela markateysa polanaw ta shempiw pathonnabada taybas.
ACT 20:25 “Taani ha77ika Xoossaa kawotethaa markatashe hinte ubbaa giddon yuuyas. Hizape guye, hintefe oonika tana be7onnaysa erayis.
ACT 20:26 Hessa gisho, hintefe issi uray dhaykoka ta oyshetonnaysa hachi hintew geeshshada odayis.
ACT 20:27 Ayis giiko, Xoossay oothanaw qopidaba ubbaa hintew aybibaaka ashshona odas.
ACT 20:28 “Ba na7aa suuthan wozida Xoossaa woosa keethaa naagite. Geeshsha Ayyaanay hintena halaqaa oothidi doorida wudiyasinne hinte huuphiyas naagetite.
ACT 20:29 Taani bidaape guye, wudiyas qadhetonna wozana mino suudhumeti hinte giddo gelanaysa taani erayis.
ACT 20:30 Ammaneyisata banta geedo kaalethanaw wordo tamaarsiya asati hinte giddofe dendana.
ACT 20:31 Hessa gisho, taani heedzu laythi qammanne gallas afuthan hintena huuphen huuphen minthethidaysa qopishe naagetite.
ACT 20:32 “Ha77ika hintena minthanawunne geeshsha asaara laatisanaw danda7iya Xoossaasinne iya aadho keehatetha qaalas hintena hadara immayis.
ACT 20:33 “Taani oodde bira woyko worqa woyko afila amottabike.
ACT 20:34 Taani ta kushen oothada tananne taara de7eyisata koshshidaba maaddidaysa hinte, hinte huuphen ereeta.
ACT 20:35 Hinte haysada daaburidi oothishe daaburanchota maaddanaysanne Godaa Yesuusi, ‘Ekeysafe immeysi anjetidaysa’ gida qaala hinte qopanaw besseysa taani hintena ubbaban bessaas” yaagis.
ACT 20:36 Phawuloosi hessa odi ongidi enta ubbaara gulbatidi Xoossaa woossis.
ACT 20:37 Enti ubbayka Phawuloosa idimmidi yeekidi yeeridosona.
ACT 20:38 I Zaaridi, “Tana be7eketa” yaagida qaalay enta daro azzanthis. Enti markabiya gakanaw iya moyzidosona.
ACT 21:1 Nuuni Efesoona cimatape shaaketida mela Qoosa bida. Wontetha gallas Rooda gakidi yaape Phaxara bida.
ACT 21:2 Sirofinqe pinniya markabe demmidi iyan gelidi baanaw dendida.
ACT 21:3 Nuuni Qophiroosa be7anaw danda7iya soo yidi, Qophiroosa haddirsa bagga aggidi Soore bida. Markabey ba caana yan wothanaw koyida gisho Xiroosa bida.
ACT 21:4 Yan ammaniya asata demmidi entara laapun gallas uttida. Phawuloosi Yerusalaame boonna mela enti iyaw Ayyaanan odidosona.
ACT 21:5 Nuuni entara uttiya wodey wurin keyidi bida. Enti ubbay banta maccasataranne banta naytara issife katamaape kare kessidi nuna moyzidosona. Nuuni abba doonan gulbatidi Xoossaa woossida.
ACT 21:6 Hessafe guye, woli sarothidi nu markabiyan gelida; enti banta soo simmidosona.
ACT 21:7 Nuuni abba ogiya ongidi, Xiroosape Phaxelemaasa gakida. Yan ammaniya asata sarothidi, enta matan issi gallas pee7ida.
ACT 21:8 Wontetha gallas keyidi, Qisaare bida. Sabaakiya Filphoosa soo gakidi iya matan uttida. I Yerusalaamen kase dooretida laapunatape issuwa.
ACT 21:9 Filphoosas nabe gidida oyddu geela7o nayti de7oosona.
ACT 21:10 Nuuni undenna gallas yan uttidi de7ishin tinbite odiya issi Agaboosa geetetiya addey Yihudape Qisaare yis.
ACT 21:11 Nuuko yidi Phawuloosa saqiya ekidi ba kushiyanne ba tohuwa qachidi, “Geeshsha Ayyaanay ha saqiya godaa, Yerusalaamen Ayhudeti haysada qachidi, Ayhude gidonna asaas aathidi immana yaagees” yaagis.
ACT 21:12 Nuuni hessa si7ida wode nunne yan de7iya asati Phawuloosi Yerusalaame boonna mela woossida.
ACT 21:13 Shin Phawuloosi zaaridi, “Hinte haysada yeekishe ayis ta wozanaa shugiseetii? Taani, Godaa Yesuusa sunthaa gisho qashetetha xalaala gidonashin Yerusalaamen hayqanawuka giigetas” yaagis.
ACT 21:14 Nu zoriya I ekonna ixin, “Godaa sheney hano” yaagidi si77i gida.
ACT 21:15 Yan guutha wode gam7idaape guye giigetidi Yerusalaame baanaw keyida.
ACT 21:16 Qisaaren de7iya ammaniya asatape guuthati nuura bidosona. Enti nuuni shempana bessi Minaasona geetetiya Qophiroosa addiya soo efidosona. Minaasoni koyro ammanida asaape issuwa.
ACT 21:17 Nuuni Yerusalaame gakida wode ammaniya asati nuna ufaysan mokidosona.
ACT 21:18 Wontetha gallas Phawuloosinne nuuni Yayqoobara gahetanaw bida. Woosa keethaa cimati ubbatika yan de7oosona.
ACT 21:19 Phawuloosi enta sarothidaape guye Ayhude gidonna asaa giddon ba baggara Xoossay oothidaba ubbaa entaw odis.
ACT 21:20 Enti hessa si7ida wode Xoossaa galatidi Phawuloosako haysada yaagidosona: “Nu ishaw, Ayhudeta giddon aapun mukulati Xoossaa ammanidako ne be7aasa; enti ubbayka higgiya minthi naagoosona.
ACT 21:21 Neeni Ayhude gidonnayisata biittan de7iya Ayhude ubbay banta nayta qaxaronna mela, Ayhudeta wogaa kaallonna melanne Muse higgiya ixana mela neeni tamaarseysa Yerusalaamen de7iya Ayhudeti si7idosona.
ACT 21:22 Yaatin aybi lo77o? Neeni yidaysa daroti si7ana.
ACT 21:23 “Hessa gisho, nuuni new odeysa si7a; gasoy de7iya oyddu asati nu matan de7oosona.
ACT 21:24 Enta ekada entara geeya; qassi enti banta huuphiya meedettana mela entaw miishe imma. Enti kase nebaa si7idaysi tuma gidonaysanne neeni ne huuphenka higge naagiya asi gideysa ubbay erana.
ACT 21:25 “Shin ammanida Ayhude gidonna asata gidiko, enti eeqas yarshetidaba moonna mela, suuthu uyonna mela, bawuta moonna melanne laymatonna mela, nuuni oda qachidi, entaw dabdaabe xaafida” yaagidosona.
ACT 21:26 Hessafe guye, Phawuloosi wontetha gallas asata ekidi, entara geeyis. I banta geeyiya gallasay awude poletiyako erisanawunne banta yarshuwa awude yarshaneko erisanaw Xoossa Keethi gelis.
ACT 21:27 Laapun gallasay wurana hanishin, Iisepe yida Ayhudeti xoossa keethan Phawuloosa be7idi, asa ubbaa denthethidi Phawuloosa oykidosona.
ACT 21:28 “Isra7eele asaw, nuna maaddite; ha uray, nu deriya, nu higgiyanne ha Xoossa Keetha ixana mela asa ubbaa tamaarsees. Hessika gidonna ixin Ayhude gidonnayisata Xoossa Keethi gelsidi, ha geeshsha bessaa tunisis” yaagidi waassidosona.
ACT 21:29 Enti hessa giday kase Efesoona Xirofmoosa Phawuloosara kataman be7ida gisho ha77i Phawuloosi Xoossa keethi iya eki gelidaba entaw daanis.
ACT 21:30 Katama ubbay buqetis; asa ubbay shiiqidi Phawuloosa oykidi Xoossa Keethafe kare goochidosona. Xoossa Keethaa pengeti ellesidi gordetidosona.
ACT 21:31 Asay Phawuloosa wodhana hanishin, “Yerusalaame katamay kumethi buqetis” giya oday Roome shaalaqaako gakis.
ACT 21:32 Shaalaqay wotaadaretanne mato halaqata ekidi woxishe yis. Asay shaalaqaanne wotaadareta be7ida wode Phawuloosa wadheysa aggaagidosona.
ACT 21:33 He wode shaalaqay shiiqidi, Phawuloosa oykidi, nam7u santhalaatan qashetana mela kiittis. Yaatidi, I oonekonne ay oothidaako asaa oychis.
ACT 21:34 Asaape baggay issiba gidi waassiya wode, harati haraba gidi waassees. Waasoy darida gisho, shaalaqay tumaa shaakanaw danda7etonna ixin, wotaadareti Phawuloosa banta de7iyaso efana mela kiittis.
ACT 21:35 Phawuloosi yedhi keyiya dethaa gakiya wode asaa sugethaa gisho wotaadareti iya tookidosona.
ACT 21:36 Daro asay, “I hayqo!” yaagidi waassishe kaalloosona.
ACT 21:37 Wotaaddareti Phawuloosa banta de7iyasuwa gelsana hanishin, Phawuloosi shaalaqaako, “Taani new issiba odo?” yaagis. I Phawuloosako, “Neeni Girike doona eray?
ACT 21:38 Neeni haysafe sinthe buqethi medhidi shempo wodhida oyddu mukulu asata ekidi bazzo gelida Gibxe uraa gidikii?” yaagis.
ACT 21:39 Shin Phawuloosi, “Taani, Kilqiyan de7iya eretida Tersesee kataman yeletida Ayhude asi. Hayyana tana odisarkii?” yaagis.
ACT 21:40 Shaalaqay iyako, “Oda” yaagin Phawuloosi dethaa bolla eqidi, asay si77i gaana mela ba kushiyan mallis. Asay si77i gin Ibraawetho doonan haysada yaagis:
ACT 22:1 “Ta ishato, ta aawato, taani ha77i hintew immiya zaaruwa si7ite.”
ACT 22:2 Phawuloosi entaw Ibraawetho doonan odeysa si7idi kaseysafe aathidi si77i gidoosona. I kaallidi,
ACT 22:3 “Taani Kilqiyan de7iya Tersesee yeletada ha kataman diccas. Ta astamaareyka Gamaaliyale; taani nu aawata higgiya mintha tamaarida, hachi hinte ubbay haneysada Xoossas mishetiya Ayhude asi.
ACT 22:4 Taani ha ogiya kaalliya maccatanne addeta oykada qasho keethan yeggashenne enta wodhisana gakanaw waaye bessida asi.
ACT 22:5 Hessadaka, kahine halaqaynne Shango ubbay tabaa markatanaw danda7ees. Taani Damasqon de7iya enta ishatas entafe dabdaabiya ekada yan de7iya asati qashetidi seeretana mela Yerusalaame enta ehanaw yaa bas.
ACT 22:6 “Taani bada Damasqo matida wode seeta gallas qoponna salope gita poo7oy ta yuushuwan poo7is.
ACT 22:7 Taani sa7an kunda de7ishin, ‘Saa7ola, Saa7ola, tana ayis yedethay?’ giya qaala si7as.
ACT 22:8 Taani zaarada, ‘Godaw, neeni oonee?’ yaagas. I zaaridi, ‘Taani, neeni gooddiya Naazirete Yesuusa’ yaagis.
ACT 22:9 Taara de7eysati poo7uwa be7idosonape attishin, taw odeysa qaala akeekibokona.
ACT 22:10 “Taani, ‘Godaw, ta ay ootho?’ yaagas. “Goday taako, ‘Dendada Damasqo ba. Neeni oothana mela Xoossay oothanaw qopidaba ubbay yan new odetana’ yaagis.
ACT 22:11 He wolqaama poo7uwa gaason ta ayfey qooqin, taara de7iya asati ta kushiya oykidi, tana goochin Damasqo gakas.
ACT 22:12 “Damasqon de7iya Ayhude ubbay daro bonchiya issi Hananiya geetetiya addey, nu higgiya boncheysinne Xoossaa minthi woosseysi de7ees.
ACT 22:13 Hanaani taako yidi, ta matan eqidi, ‘Ta ishaw Saa7ola, xeella’ yaagis. Ellesada taani iya xeella aggas.
ACT 22:14 “I taako, ‘Nu aawata Xoossay neeni iya sheniya erana mela, iya xillo Na7aa be7ana melanne iya doonape qaala si7ana mela kasetidi nena dooris.
ACT 22:15 Neeni be7idabaanne si7idaba asa ubbaa sinthan iyaw markatana.
ACT 22:16 Ha77i ayis gam7ay? Dendada xammaqeta; iya sunthaa xeegada ne nagaraape meeceta’ yaagis.
ACT 22:17 “Taani guye Yerusalaame simmada xoossa keethan woossishin, taw qoncethi bentis.
ACT 22:18 Qoncethan Goday taako, ‘Ne taw markatiya markatethaa asay ekonna gisho ellesada Yerusalaamepe keya’ yaagishin taani be7as.
ACT 22:19 “Taani, ‘Godaw, ayhude woosa keetha ubban nena ammaneyisata oykada wadhidaysanne qasho keethan yeggidaysa enti eroosona.
ACT 22:20 Enti ne marka Isxifaanose wodhiya wode taani he odan issifas. Qassi enta matan eqada iya wodheyisata ma7uwa naagayis’ yaagis.
ACT 22:21 “Goday taako, ‘Taani nena Ayhude gidonna asaako haahoso kiittiya gisho dendada ba’ ” yaagis.
ACT 22:22 Phawuloosi he qaala odidi ongana gakanaw asay I geysa si7oosona. Hessafe guye, banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Haysa biittafe dhaysa! I daanaw bessenna” yaagidosona.
ACT 22:23 Enti wocamishin, banta ma7uwa bolla holishininne baana bolla laallishin;
ACT 22:24 Shaalaqay be7idi wotaadareti Phawuloosa banta de7iyasuwa efana mela kiittis. Qassi asay ayis hessada wocamidaako eranaw koyidi Phawuloosa lisson garaafidi pilgana mela enta kiittis.
ACT 22:25 Shin wotaadareti Phawuloosa dafon minthi qachidi garaafana haniya wode Phawuloosi ba matan eqida mato halaqaako, “Roome asi pirdi bayna garaafeysi hintew wogee?” yaagis.
ACT 22:26 Mato halaqay hessa si7ida wode shaalaqaako bidi, “Ha addey Roome asi. Neeni ay oothanaw qopay?” yaagidi oychis.
ACT 22:27 Shaalaqay Phawuloosako shiiqidi, “Neeni Roome asee? Ane taw oda” yaagis. Phawuloosi, “Ee” yaagis.
ACT 22:28 Shaalaqay zaaridi, “Taani ha gadetetha daro miishen shammas” yaagis. Shin Phawuloosi, “Ta ha gadetetha yeletethan demma ekas” yaagis.
ACT 22:29 Hessa gisho, Phawuloosa pilganaw qopidaysati iira iyape shaaketidosona. Shaalaqay Roome asi santhalaatan qachidaysa erida wode yayyis.
ACT 22:30 Wontetha gallas Shaalaqay, Ayhudeti Phawuloosa ayis mootidaako geeshshi eranaw koyis. Kahine halaqatinne shangoy ubbay shiiqana mela kiittis; qassi Phawuloosa qashope bilisidi enta sinthan essis.
ACT 23:1 Phawuloosi shiiquwa caddi xeellidi, “Ta ishato, taani hachi gakanaw Xoossaa sinthan ta de7o ubban lo77o wozanan de7as” yaagis.
ACT 23:2 Kahine halaqay Hanaani, Phawuloosa doonan baqana mela iya matan eqidaysata kiittis.
ACT 23:3 He wode Phawuloosi iyako, “La ha booqinte tiyida godaa daaneyso, Xoossay nena baqana. Neeni ta bolla higgiyatho pirdanaw uttada de7ashe higgey bayna tana baqana mela kiitay?” yaagis.
ACT 23:4 Phawuloosa matan eqidaysati iyako, “Ne Xoossaa kahine halaqaa cayay?” yaagidosona.
ACT 23:5 Phawuloosi, “Ta ishato, I kahine halaqa gididaysa taani erabike; ayis giiko Xoossaa qaalan, ‘Ne deriya ayseysa bolla iita qaala haasayopa’ geetetidi xaafetis” yaagis.
ACT 23:6 Shin Phawuloosi he bessan de7iya asaape baggati Saduqaaweta, baggati Farsaaweta gideysa be7idi, “Ta ishato, taani Farsaawenne Farsaawe na7a; ‘Hayqidaysati hayqope dendana’ gada taani ufaysan naagiya gisho enti ta bolla pirdoosona” yaagidi odis.
ACT 23:7 Phawuloosi hessa gida wode Farsaaweta giddoninne Saduqaaweta giddon ooshshi keyin shaaketidosona.
ACT 23:8 Ayis giiko, Saduqaaweti, “Hayqida asi dendenna; kiitanchoyka ayyaanika baawa” yaagosona. Shin Farsaaweti nam7ayka de7eysa ammanoosona.
ACT 23:9 Gita kachi keyis; Farsaaweta bagga gidida higge astamaareti dendi eqidi, “Ha uraa bolla aybi balaka demmibooko; iyaw ayyaani woyko kiitanchoy haasayonna aggenna” yaagidi palamidosona.
ACT 23:10 Ooshshay darin asay Phawuloosa shaqerethonna mela gidi, shaalaqay ba wotaadareti wodhidi enta giddofe iya ellesi kessidi banta de7iyasuwa efana mela kiittis.
ACT 23:11 He qamma Goday Phawuloosa matan eqidi, “Phawuloosa, neeni taw Yerusalaamen markatidaysada Roomenka markatanaw bessees; minna; aykoy baawa” yaagis.
ACT 23:12 Wontetha gallas Ayhudeti, “Phawuloosa wodhonna de7ishe mooko uyoko” gidi caaqidosona.
ACT 23:13 Phawuloosa bolla hessa maqetida asati oytamape daroosona.
ACT 23:14 Enti kahine halaqatakonne deriya cimatako bidi, “Nuuni Phawuloosa wodhonna de7ishe kathi giyaba mooko gidi caaqetida.
ACT 23:15 Hiza, hintenne shangoy iyabaa geeshshidi pilgiyabay de7iya daanisidi, Phawuloosa hinteko ehana mela shaalaqa oychite. Nuuni I ha shiiquwa gakanaape sinthe iya wodhanaw giigidi uttida” yaagidosona.
ACT 23:16 Shin Phawuloosa miche na7ay he maquwa si7ida wode, bidi wotaadareti de7iyasuwa gelidi, Phawuloosas odis.
ACT 23:17 Phawuloosi mato halaqatape issuwa xeegidi, “Ha na7ay shaalaqas odiyabay de7iya gisho iya shaalaqaako efa” yaagis.
ACT 23:18 Mato halaqay na7aa shaalaqaako efidi, “Qasho keethan de7iya Phawuloosi tana baako xeegidi, ha na7ay new odiyabay de7iya gisho, iya neeko ehana mela tana woossis” yaagis.
ACT 23:19 Shaalaqay na7aa kushiya oykidi, dumma kare kessidi, “Neeni taw odanabay aybee?” yaagidi oychis.
ACT 23:20 Na7ay shaalaqaako, “Ayhudeti Phawuloosaba kasepe minthi pilganaw koydaba daanisidi neeni wonto iya shiiquwa ehana mela nena woossanaw zoreta qachidosona.
ACT 23:21 Shin neeni enti giyaba si7opa. Ayis giiko, oytamape dariya asati Phawuloosa wodhonna de7ishe ‘Kathi mooko, haathe uyoko’ gidi caaqetidi, qosetidi iya naagoosona. Ha77i ne giyaba xalaala si7anaw naagoosona” yaagis.
ACT 23:22 Shaalaqay zaaridi, “Ha oda ne taw odidaysa hara oodeska odopa” yaagidi kiittidi na7aa guye yeddis.
ACT 23:23 Shaalaqay mato halaqatape nam7ata xeegidi, “Qammafe heedzu saaten Qisaare baanaw, nam7u xeetu wotaadareta, laapun tammu para asatanne nam7u xeetu tooranchota giigisite.
ACT 23:24 Deriya aysiya Filkisako Phawuloosa saro gathanaw toga mehe giigisite” yaagidi enta kiittis.
ACT 23:25 Shaalaqay Filkisas haysada giya dabdaabe xaafis:
ACT 23:26 “Qalawudiyoosa Lusiyoosape deriya aysiya boncho Filkisas, saroy new gido.
ACT 23:27 Ayhudeti ha uraa oykidi wodhana hanishin, I Roome biitta asi gidoysa erada wotaadaretara gakada iya ashshas.
ACT 23:28 Enti iya ayis mootiyako eranaw koyada enta shiiquwan iya shiishas.
ACT 23:29 Enti banta higgiyas iya mootidaysafe attishin, iya wodhisiyaba woyko qashisiyaba gidonnaysa ta demmas.
ACT 23:30 Enti ha uraa bolla maqetida zigirsay tana gakin, taani ellesada iya neeko yeddas. Iya mooteysati ne sinthan bidi mootana mela kiittas” yaagis.
ACT 23:31 Hessa gisho, wotaadareti kiitetidaysada Phawuloosa ekidi, qamma Antiphaxirisa gathidosona.
ACT 23:32 Wontetha gallas para asati iyara baana mela oothidi toho asati guye simmidosona.
ACT 23:33 Togay Qisaare gakidi dabdaabiya deriya ayseysas immidi, Phawuloosa iya sinthe aathidosona.
ACT 23:34 Deriya ayseysi dabdaabiya nabbabidaape guye, “Phawuloosa, ne aw awuraja asee?” gidi iya oychis. I Kilqiya asi gidoysa erida wode,
ACT 23:35 “Taani nebaa nena mooteysati yaa wode si7ana” yaagis. Wotaaddareti Phawuloosa Herodiisa gadhon naagana mela kiittis.
ACT 24:1 Ichashu gallasape guye kahine halaqay, Hanaani, cimataranne Xerxeluusa geetetiya issi xabaqaara Qisaare bis. Enti deriya ayseysa bolla Phawuloosa mootidosona.
ACT 24:2 Phawuloosi xeegetidi gelida wode, Xerxeluusi iya haysada yaagidi mootis: “Boncho Filkisa, nuuni ne baggara daro sarotethaa demmida, ne lo77o aysuwan nu biittay daro laametis.
ACT 24:3 Boncho Filkisa, nuuni awunka awude gidin daro galatan hessa ekoos.
ACT 24:4 Taani nena gam7isonashin neeni ne keehatethan nubaa qanthan si7ana mela nena woossayis.
ACT 24:5 Ha uray dhube gididi biitta ubban de7iya Ayhudeta giddon buqethi medhidi Naaziraweta bagga asaa kaaletheysa gidoysa erida.
ACT 24:6 Hari attoshin, Xoossa Keetha tunisana hanishin nuuni iya oykida; nu higgiyada iya bolla pirdanaw qopida.
ACT 24:7 Shin shaalaqa Lusiyoosi yidi, wolqan nu kushepe iya wothi ekis.
ACT 24:8 Iya mooteysati neeko yaana mela kiittis. Neeni ne huuphen ha uraa pilgada nuuni iya mootiya mootuwa ubbaa eranaw danda7aasa” yaagis.
ACT 24:9 Ayhudetika, “Ha oday tuma” gidi iya qofaa ma7idosona.
ACT 24:10 Deriya ayseysi Phawuloosa oda gidi mallis. Phawuloosi haysada gidi zaaris: “Neeni daro wodepe doomada, ha asaas pirdashe de7eysa erada ta odas ufaysan zaaro immayis.
ACT 24:11 Taani Yerusalaame goyinnanaw keyin tammanne nam7u gallasape aadhonaysa neeni ne huuphen eranaw danda7aasa.
ACT 24:12 Ayhudeti tana Xoossaa Keethan gidin ayhude woosa keethan gidin kataman gidin ooderaka palamishin woyko asa shiishada maqishin issi asika demmibeenna.
ACT 24:13 Ha77ika enti tana mootiyabas marka demmanaw danda7okona.
ACT 24:14 “Shin taani haysa issiba ammanayis; taani higgen de7iyabaanne nabeti xaafida ubbaba ammanada, nu aawata Xoossaa, enti wordo giya ogiyan goyinnayis.
ACT 24:15 Enti banta huuphen ammaneysa mela xillotinne nagaranchoti hayqope dendanaysa taka ammanayis.
ACT 24:16 Hessa gisho, taani Xoossaa sinthaninne asaa sinthan ubba wode lo77o kahi taw daana mela minnayis.
ACT 24:17 “Taani Yerusalaamepe keyoosape daro laythafe guye ta biitta manqotas maade immanawunne yarsho yarshanaw Yerusalaame bas.
ACT 24:18 Taani xoossa keethan hessa oothada geeshsha wogaa pola simmin tana demmidosona. He wode taara asi baawa, ooshshika keybeenna.
ACT 24:19 Shin Iisepe yida issi issi Ayhudeti hessan de7oosona; enti ta bolla oda koyko yidi tana ne bolla mootanaw danda7oosona.
ACT 24:20 Woyko taani shanguwa sinthe shiiqida wode oothida bali de7iko haysati ne sinthan de7eysati odonna.
ACT 24:21 Taani enta giddon eqada, ‘Hayqidaysati dendana gada waassada odida gisho hachi hinte sinthan ta bolla pirdoosona’ gas; hessafe haraba oothabike” yaagis.
ACT 24:22 Shin Filkisi Xoossaa ogiyaba geeshshi erida gisho, “Taani hinte oda shaalaqa Lusiyoosi yaa wode pirdana” yaagidi moyzis.
ACT 24:23 Filkisi qassi Phawuloosa qachonna naagana melanne iya dabbotape oonika iya oychanaw yishin diggonna mela mato halaqaa kiittis.
ACT 24:24 Guutha gallasape guye, Filkisi Ayhude bagga gidida ba mache Dirusillara yidi Phawuloosa kiiti ehisidi Yesuus Kiristoosan ammanoba iyape si7is.
ACT 24:25 Phawuloosi xillotethabaa, ba huuphe haarobaanne yaanaw de7iya pirdaba odishin, Filkisi yayyidi, “Neeni ha77is ba; taw injetida wode nena xeegisana” yaagis.
ACT 24:26 He wode Phawuloosape wodhaafe ekanaw qopidi, iya zaari zaari xeegisidi iyara odetees.
ACT 24:27 Nam7u laythafe guye, Filkisa bessaa Phorqiyoos Fisxoosi ekis. Filkisi Ayhudeta ufaysanaw koyidi Phawuloosa billonna aggaagis.
ACT 25:1 Fisxoosi kawotida heedzu gallasape guye Qisaarepe Yerusalaame bis.
ACT 25:2 Yan kahine halaqatinne Ayhudeta kaaletheysati Phawuloosa mootidosona.
ACT 25:3 Phawuloosa Yerusalaame ehishin ogen qosetidi iya wodhanaw entaw injetana mela bantana maaddo gidi Fisxoosa woossidosona.
ACT 25:4 Fisxoosi entako, “Phawuloosi, Qisaaren qasho keethan de7ees; taani ta huuphenka ellesada guye simmana hanayis.
ACT 25:5 I balidabay de7iko hinte giddon aawateysati taara Qisaare bidi iya mootona” yaagidi zaaris.
ACT 25:6 Fisxoosi enta matan hospun woyko tammu gallasa mela gam7idaape guye Qisaare bis. Wontetha gallas pirda oyden uttidi Phawuloosa ehana mela kiittis.
