ACT 25:7 I yin Yerusalaamepe yida Ayhudeti iya yuushuwan eqidi enti lathanaw danda7onna daro deexo mooto iya bolla shiishidosona.
ACT 25:8 Phawuloosi zaaridi, “Taani Ayhude higgiya gidin Xoossa Keethaa woyko Roome Kawa Qeesare naaqabike” yaagis.
ACT 25:9 Shin Fisxoosi Ayhudeta ufaysanaw koyidi Phawuloosako, “Yerusalaame bada ha mootuwaba yan ta sinthan pirdetanaw koyay?” yaagidi oychis.
ACT 25:10 Shin Phawuloosi, “Taani pirdetanaw bessiya Qeesare pirda keethan eqa kichas. Neeni loytha ereysada taani Ayhudeta aybinka naaqabike.
ACT 25:11 Hiza, taani naaqidabay woyko hayqos gathiyaba oothidaba gidiko hayqope tana ashsha giike. Shin enti tana mootiya mootoy mela gididaape guye oonika tana entaw aathidi immanaw danda7enna. Qeesarey tabaa pirdo gada oychayis” yaagis.
ACT 25:12 He wode Fisxoosi ba zoranchotara zoretidi, “Neeni Qeesarey tabaa pirdo gada oychadasa; Qeesareko baasa” yaagidi zaaris.
ACT 25:13 Guutha gallasape guye Kawoy Agirphinne Barniqey Fisxoosa sarothanaw Qisaare bidosona.
ACT 25:14 Yan enti daro gallas gam7in, Fisxoosi Kawas Phawuloosaba haysada yaagidi odis; “Filkisi billonna aggidi bida issi addey haysan de7ees.
ACT 25:15 Taani Yerusalaame bida wode kahine halaqatinne Ayhude cimati iya bolla pirdana mela tana woossidi iyabaa taw odidosona.
ACT 25:16 Taani, ‘Mootetida uray bana mooteyisata sinthan eqidi ba mootidabaas zaaro immonnashin, oona gidikoka aadhidi imeteysi Roome higge gidenna’ yaagada entaw zaaras.
ACT 25:17 “Hessa gisho, enti haysan shiiqida wode taani gam7onna wontetha gallas pirda keethaa gelada Phawuloosa ehana mela kiittas.
ACT 25:18 Iya mooteysati iya matan eqidi, iitaban iya mootonna aggokona gada taani qopidaysa mela iya mootibookona.
ACT 25:19 Shin enti banta haymaanotebanne Phawuloosi, ‘Paxa de7ees’ giya issi hayqida Yesuusa geetetiya addiyaba iyara palamoosona.
ACT 25:20 Ha oday tana shaakanaw metida gisho, Phawuloosi Yerusalaame bidi, yan pirdetanaw koyaako gada iya oychas.
ACT 25:21 Shin Phawuloosi ba oda Qeesarey iyabaa be7ana gakanaw qasho keethan gam7anaw oychis. Taani iya Qeesareko yeddana gakanaw I qashetana mela kiittas” yaagis.
ACT 25:22 Hessa gisho, Agirphi Fisxoosako, “Taani ta huuphenka he uray giyaba si7anaw koyayis” yaagis. Fisxoosi iyako, “Neeni wonto I giyaba si7ana” yaagis.
ACT 25:23 Wontetha gallas Agirphinne Barniqey gita bonchon shaalaqataranne kataman de7iya gita asatara yidi pirda keethi gelidosona. Fisxoosi Phawuloosa xeegisidi ehis.
ACT 25:24 Fisxoosi, “Kawaw Agirpha, haysan nuura de7iya asaw, Ayhudeti Yerusalaamenka haysanka waassidi, ‘I hizape guye paxa daanaw bessenna’ yaagidi, tana woossida uraa haysa be7eeta.
ACT 25:25 Shin iya hayqos gathiyaba aybibaaka taani demmabike. I ba huuphen, ‘Qeesarey tabaa pirdo yaagada oychayis’ gida gisho, Qeesareko iya yeddanaw qofa qachas.
ACT 25:26 Taani iyabaa ta godaa Qeesares xaafanaw gidiya gaasoy aybika baawa. Hessa gisho, iyabaa hinte be7iko ta xaafiyabay bentaneko gada hinte sinthe ubbaraka Kawaw, Agirpha, ne sinthe iya ehas.
ACT 25:27 Ayis giiko, qashetida asi bolla daynnas aathiya wode I ayis mootetidaako qoncisonna aggeysi taw eeyatethi daanees” yaagis.
ACT 26:1 Agirphi Phawuloosako, “Neeni nebaa odanaw danda7aasa” yaagis. He wode Phawuloosi ba kushiya denthidi haysada yaagis:
ACT 26:2 “Kawaw, Agirpha, Ayhudeti tana mootidabaas zaaro immanaw hachi ne sinthan eqashe ta qaaday lo77o gada qopayis.
ACT 26:3 Neeni Ayhude woganne palama loythada eriya gisho tana saletonna si7ana mela nena woossayis.
ACT 26:4 “Taani na7atethafe doomada ta asaa giddoninne Yerusalaamen de7ida ta de7uwa Ayhude ubbay eroosona.
ACT 26:5 Taani koyrope doomada, nu haymaanote higgiya minthidi naagiya Farsaaweta yaraape gideysa enti markatanaw koyko eroosona.
ACT 26:6 Ha77ika taani Xoossay nu aawatas immana gida ufaysaa naagiya gisho mootetada haysan eqas.
ACT 26:7 Qassi tammanne nam7u nu aawata sheeshay Xoossaa qammanne gallas minthidi goyinnishe Xoossay immana gidaysa ekanaw ufaysan naagoosona. Kawaw Agirpha, Ayhudeti tana mootey taani ufaysan hessa naagiya gishosa.
ACT 26:8 Ayhudeto, Xoossay hayqidaysata dentheysa ayis ammaneketii?
ACT 26:9 “Kase taani ta huuphenka Naazirete Yesuusa sunthaa teqanaw danda7etidaba ubbaa oothanaw bessees gada qopas.
ACT 26:10 Taani Yerusalaamen oothiday haysa. Kahine halaqatape maata ekada Xoossaa asatape darota qashisas. Enta wodhiya wodeka enta hayquwa dosas.
ACT 26:11 Daro wode ayhude woosa keethaa ubban enti seeretana melanne Yesuusa cayidi kaddana mela un7ethas. Taani wogi bayna enta hanqetada hari attoshin, hara biitta katamata gakanaw enta gooddas.
ACT 26:12 “Taani ha odas kahine halaqatape maatanne kiitaa ekada Damasqo bayis.
ACT 26:13 Kawaw, taani seeta gallas ogen de7ishin awa poo7ope daro aadhiya poo7oy ta yuushuwaninne taara beyisata yuushuwan salope poo7is.
ACT 26:14 Nuuni ubbayka sa7an kundida wode Ibraawetho doonan, ‘Saa7ola, Saa7ola, tana ayis goodday? Neeni, nena caddiya birata xam7a qakiko nena qohaasa’ yaagidi taw odishin si7as.
ACT 26:15 “Taani, ‘Godaw, neeni oonee?’ yaagas. “Goday, ‘Taani, neeni gooddiya Yesuusa;
ACT 26:16 shin denda eqa. Hachi neeni tana be7idaysaninne sinthafe ta new bessanaysa haratas markatana mela ta oosancho oothada nena shuumanaw new bentas.
ACT 26:17 Isra7eele asatapenne taani nena entako kiittiya Ayhude gidonaysatape nena ashshana.
ACT 26:18 Neeni enta ayfiya dooyana, dhumape poo7oko, Xalahe kushepe Xoossako enta zaarana. Enti tanan ammanidi nagara atotetha ekana. Xoossay doorida asaa giddon banta laata demmana’ yaagis.
ACT 26:19 “Kawaw Agirpha, hessa gisho, taw salope bentida qoncethas kiitetanaysa ixabike.
ACT 26:20 Shin taani koyrottada Damasqon hessafe guye Yerusalaameninne Yihuda biitta ubban de7eysatinne Ayhude gidonnaysati banta nagaraape Xoossaako simmana melanne nagaraape simuwa bessiya ooso oothana mela qaala odas.
ACT 26:21 Hessa gisho, Ayhudeti tana xoossa keethan oykidi wodhanaw koydosona.
ACT 26:22 Hachi gakanaw Xoossaa maadey taape shaaketibeenna; yaaniya gisho, guuthaasinne gitaas markatashe haysan eqas. Nabetinne Musey hanana gidi odidaysafe haraa issibaaka taani odidabay baawa.
ACT 26:23 Hessika, ‘Kiristoosi waaye ekanaw bessees; qassi hayqope koyro dendidi Ayhudetasinne Ayhude gidonaysatas atotetha poo7o odanaw bessees’ gidaysa” yaagis.
ACT 26:24 Phawuloosi hessa yaagidi zaarishin, Fisxoosi ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Phawuloosa, ne gooyadasa; ne daro timirtey nena gooshshatethas gathis” yaagis.
ACT 26:25 Shin Phawuloosi, “Boncho Fisxoosa, taani tumabaanne bessiyaba odaysipe attishin, gooyabike.
ACT 26:26 Taani qoncen odiya odaa Kawoy erees. Ha oday geeman oosetiboonna gisho issoyka iyape geemmonaysa taani geeshshada erayis.
ACT 26:27 “Kawaw Agirpha, neeni nabeta ammanaasa gidikii? Neeni ammaneysa taani erayis” yaagis.
ACT 26:28 Kawoy Agirphi, Phawuloosako, “Ha guutha saaten tana kiristaane oothanaw koyay?” yaagis.
ACT 26:29 Phawuloosi, “Daro wode gidin guutha wode ne xalaala gidonashin hachi tana si7iya ubbay ha qashuwape attishin, ta mela gidana mela Xoossaa woossayis” yaagis.
ACT 26:30 Hessafe guye, Kawoy Fisxoosi, Barniqeynne entara uttida ubbayka dendidosona.
ACT 26:31 Yaape keyidi bishe issoy issuwara, “Ha uray hayqos woyko qashos gathiyaba aykoka oothibeenna” yaagidi odetidosona.
ACT 26:32 Agirphi Fisxoosako, “Ha uray ‘Qeesarey tabaa pirdo’ goonnako biletanaw danda7ees shin” yaagis.
ACT 27:1 Nuuni markaben Xaale baanaw qachida wode Awugisxoosa wotaadareta geeteteysatape issi Yuuliyoosa geetetiya mato halaqaas Phawuloosanne hara guutha qasho asata aathidi iyaw immidosona.
ACT 27:2 Iise gaxan de7iya biittata biya Adramixiyoone markaben gelidi dendida. Maqedoone asi gidida Teselonqe Arsxirokoosi nuura de7ees.
ACT 27:3 Wontetha gallas nuuni Sidoona gakishin, Yuuliyoosi Phawuloosas keehidi ba laggetako bidi koshshiyaban maaddana mela entako iya yeddis.
ACT 27:4 Yaape dendidi sinthara nu bolla carkiya gisho haathan teqetida biitta, Qophiroosan zempidi aadhida.
ACT 27:5 Kilqiyanne Phinfile matan de7iya abba pinnidi Liiqen de7iya Mura gakida.
ACT 27:6 Yan mato halaqay Xaale biya Iskindire markabe demmidi, iyan nuna gelsis.
ACT 27:7 Nuuni daro gallas loddara bidi, daro meton Qandoosa katama mati gakida. Yaara baanaw nuna carkoy diggin Salmonara aadhidi haathan teqetida biitta, Qarxeesan zempidi aadhida.
ACT 27:8 Daro meton gaxa gaxa oykidi Laasa katamaa matan de7iya abba doonan “Markabey Wopu Gidi Shempiya bessi” geetetiya bessa gakida.
ACT 27:9 Nuuni yan daro wode gam7idaape guye xoomi biletida gisho hizape markaben buussi metiya gisho Phawuloosi enta zoris.
ACT 27:10 “Asaw, nu buussan gita boshinne daro qohoy de7eysi taw bentees; qohoy caana bollanne markabiya bolla xalaala gidonashin nu de7uwa bollaka gakana” yaagis.
ACT 27:11 Shin mato halaqay Phawuloosi gidaysafe aathidi markabiya laaggeysinne markabiya goday geysan ammanis.
ACT 27:12 He abba doonan de7iya katamay balgo ageena aathanaw entaw injetonna gisho, dariya asati bantaw danda7etiko Finqe katamaa gakidi balgo ageena yan aathanaw zoretidosona. Finqey pudeha-wulohapenne dugeha-wulohape giddon abba doonan de7iya katama.
ACT 27:13 Kawusha dugeha carkoy loddara carkida wode banta qopidaysada hanidaba entaw daanin dendidi, markabey qaaxonna mela oykiya birata pude ekidi Qarxeesa matara aadhidosona.
ACT 27:14 Shin daro gam7onna “Awuraqis” geetetiya wolqaama gotey haathan teqetida biittafe duge enta bolla dendis.
ACT 27:15 He gotey markabiya sugidi efonna diggida gisho carkoy markabiya ba dosida soo efis.
ACT 27:16 Nuuni yuushoy abban teqetida biitta, Qeedan zempidi bishe daro metootetidi markabiya wogoluwa ashshanaw danda7ida.
ACT 27:17 Enti wogoluwa pude kessidaape guye wodoruwan markabiya bolla xaaxidi, minthi qachidosona. Surtisa geetetiya shafiyan bantana dom7ethana gidi hirgidi, markabiya sharaa wodhisidi markabiya coo yeddi aggidosona.
ACT 27:18 Gotey wolqaamishe bin wontetha gallas caanaape baggaa abban holo oykidosona.
ACT 27:19 Heedzantho gallas markabiya miishiya ekidi banta kushen holidosona.
ACT 27:20 Nuuni daro gallas awa ayfenne xoolinto be7onna gishonne wolqaama uushoy nu bolla uushida gisho sinthafe nuuni shempora attana gidi qopibooko.
ACT 27:21 He wode enti daro gallas kathi moonna gam7ida gisho Phawuloosi enta giddon dendi eqidi, “Asaw, hinte ta zoriya ekidi Qarxeesape dendonna aggidako ha metoynne qohoy nuna gakenna.
ACT 27:22 Shin taani hintena yayyofite gada zorayis; ayis giiko, ha markabey dhayanape attishin, hintefe issi asa shempoyka dhayenna.
ACT 27:23 Zine qamma ta iyabaa gididaysinne ta goyinniya Xoossay kiitida kiitanchoy ta matan eqidi,
ACT 27:24 ‘Phawuloosa, yayyofa; neeni Roome biitta Kawa Qeesare sinthan eqanaw bessees. Heko Xoossay ne gisho neera biya asa ubbaa shempuwa ashshis’ yaagis.
ACT 27:25 Hessa gisho, asaw, yayyofite. He kiitanchoy taw odidaysi hananaysa taani ammanayis.
ACT 27:26 Shin carkoy nuna efidi issi yuushoy abban teqetida biitta gaxan holana” yaagis.
ACT 27:27 Tammanne oyddantho qamman Adire Abban nuna carkoy gedenne haa sugishin, gidi bilahe gidiya wode markabiyan ootheysatas biittako matidaba daanis.
ACT 27:28 Enti ciimmotetha eranaw koyidi wodoro xeeran deexiyaba qachidi abban yeggin, abbay hospun tammu wadha gidis. Guuthi gam7idi, zaari yeggin usupun tammu wadha gidis.
ACT 27:29 Enti abba gaxan de7iya shuchan dom7etona mela yayyidi, markabey boonna mela oykiya oyddu biratata markabiyape guyera abban yeggidi, sa7i wontana mela Xoossaa woossosona.
ACT 27:30 Markabiyan ootheysati markabiyape baqatanaw koyidi, markabey boonna mela oykiya biratata markabiyape sintha baggara abban yeggiya daanin wogoluwa abban yeggidosona.
ACT 27:31 Phawuloosi mato halaqaakonne wotaadaretako, “Haysati markabiyan shempi uttonna ixiko hinte attanaw danda7eketa” yaagis.
ACT 27:32 Hessa gisho, wotaadareti wogoloy qashetida wodoruwa qanxidi yeddi aggidosona.
ACT 27:33 Sa7ay wontana hanishin ubbay kathi maana mela Phawuloosi asaako, “Hinte kathi moonna naagishe hachira tammanne oyddu gallas gam7ideta.
ACT 27:34 Hessa gisho, guutha kathi hinte maana mela taani hintena woossayis. Hinte gashtisana mela guutha kathi maanaw koshshees; hari attoshin hinte huuphe binaanape issoyka dhayenna” yaagis.
ACT 27:35 Phawuloosi hessa gidi uythi ekidi ubbaa sinthan Xoossaa galatis; uythaa menthidi muussu doomis.
ACT 27:36 Ubbay minetidi bantaw kathi ekidi midosona.
ACT 27:37 Nuuni markabiyan de7eysati nam7u xeetanne laapun tammanne usupuna.
ACT 27:38 Enti midi kallida wode caana gistiya abban yeggidi markabiya deexuwa kawushidosona.
ACT 27:39 Sa7ay wontida wode markabiya oosanchoti aw biitta gakidaako eronnashin, abba gaxan de7iya shafenne silimo be7idosona. Bantaw danda7etiko markabiya he shafiyako shiishanaw qopidosona.
ACT 27:40 Yaatidi, markabey boonna mela oykiya biratata birshidi abban yeggidosona. He wode laagiya mithaa qachiya wodoruwa birshidosona. Hessafe guye, carkoy markabiya sinthe sugana mela markabiya efiya sharaa sintha baggara dhoqu oothidi buussu doomidosona.
ACT 27:41 Shin markabey shafe dooren dom7etidi mitetis. Markabiyas sintha baggay xuggunidi shafiya caddi oykidi qaaxonna ixin, guye baggay zuliya sugethan meqeretethi oykis.
ACT 27:42 Wotaaddareti qasho asaape issoyka haatha wadhidi kessi ekonna mela enta wodhanaw zoretidosona.
ACT 27:43 Shin mato halaqay Phawuloosa ashshanaw koyidi wotaadareta zoreta ixis. Haathe wadho eriya ubbay markabiyape haathan gupi gupi wodhidi kasetidi gaxa keyana mela kiittis.
ACT 27:44 Attidaysati sanqa bollanne, markabiya me7uwa bolla keyana mela kiittis. Hessada hanidi ubbay gaxa sarora keyidosona.
ACT 28:1 Nuuni gaxa saro keyida wode gakida bessay yuushoy abban teqetida biitta, Malta gideysa erida.
ACT 28:2 Malta asay nuus daro keeha keehidosona. Iri bukiya gishonne meegiya gisho tama eethidi nuna ubbaa mokidosona.
ACT 28:3 Phawuloosi daro afira shiishidi taman wothishin, shooshi seela gisho keyidi iya kushiya bolla xaaxetidi iya dukis.
ACT 28:4 Malta asay shooshi Phawuloosa kushen xaaxetidaysa be7ida wode issoy issuwako, “Tuma ha uray shempo wodhida asi; hari attoshin abbaafe I attinka xoossa pirdafe attidi paxa daanaw danda7ibeenna” yaagidosona.
ACT 28:5 Shin Phawuloosi ba kushiyape shooshaa wuxarkidi, taman yeggis; iya aykoka qohibeenna.
ACT 28:6 Enti, “Iya asatethay kixees, woyko akeekona kundidi hayqees” gidi iya naagoosona. Shin daro wode naagidi iya asatethan aybika dummatidabay dhayin, “Hessi xoosse” yaagidi banta qofaa laammidosona.
ACT 28:7 He heeran yuushoy abban teqetida biitta halaqaa, Pupliyoosa geeteteysas gadey de7ees; heedzu gallas gakanaw I nuna siiqon mokis.
ACT 28:8 Pupliyoosa aaway qoxo, mishanne ulo uttison hargetidi zin7idi de7ees. Phawuloosi iya soo gelidi iyaw Xoossaa woossis; ba kushiya iya bolla wothidi pathis.
ACT 28:9 Hessafe guye, yuushoy abban teqetida biitta, Maltan de7iya hargiya hara asatika yidi paxidosona.
ACT 28:10 Enti nuna daro boncho bonchidosona; nuuni markaben baanaw dendida wode oges koshshiyaba nuus immidosona.
ACT 28:11 Heedzu ageenape guye, Maltan balgo aathidi Markaben gelidi Iskindire baanaw dendida. He markabiya bolla Diyosqoroosa geetetiya mente eeqata misiley de7ees.
ACT 28:12 Sirakuuse katamaa gelidi yan heedzu gallas uttida.
ACT 28:13 Yaape dendidi Regiyume katamaa gakida. Issi gallasape guye, dugeha bagga carkoy carkin, wontetha gallas Putiyoola katamaa gakida.
ACT 28:14 Yan nuuni issi issi ammaniya asata demmin, bantara saaminta gam7ana mela nuna woossidosona. Hessafe guye, Roome bida.
ACT 28:15 Roomen de7iya ammaniya asati nubaa si7idi, Afiyoosa Giyan, Heedzu Imatha Keethi gakanaw nuna mokanaw yidosona. Phawuloosi enta be7ida wode Xoossaa galatidi minetis.
ACT 28:16 Nuuni Roome gelida wode Phawuloosi bana naagiya wotaadariyara barka de7o geetetis.
ACT 28:17 Heedzu gallasape guye, Phawuloosi Ayhudeta halaqata baako xeegisis. Enti shiiqida wode entako, “Ta ishato, taani nu asaa woyko nu aawata wogaa bolla aybi qohoka oothabike, shin tana Yerusalaamen qachidi Roome asaas aathidi immidosona.
ACT 28:18 Enti ta mootuwa be7idi hayqos gathiyaba ta bolla aybibaaka demmiboonna gisho tana billanaw qopidosona.
ACT 28:19 Shin Ayhudeti hessa ixida wode, ‘Tabaa Qeesarey pirdo’ yaagasipe attishin, taani ta deriya mootiyabay de7in gidenna.
ACT 28:20 Taani hintena xeegisiday hintena be7anawunne hintew haysa odanaasa. Taani ha santhalaatan qashetiday Isra7eele asay naagiya ufaysaa gishosa” yaagis.
ACT 28:21 Ayhude halaqati Phawuloosako, “Nuus Yihudape nebaa xaafetida dabdaabey gakibeenna. Yaape yida asatape issoyka nebaa iita odiday baawa.
ACT 28:22 Shin ha ne kaalliya ammanuwa dumma dumma bessan asay ixeysa nuuni eriya gisho ne qofaa si7anaw koyoos” yaagidosona.
ACT 28:23 Enti banta yaana gallas Phawuloosas qaxaridi, he gallas daridi I de7iyasuwa yidosona. I wontafe omarsi gakanaw Xoossaa kawotethaaba entaw markatis. Qassi enti Yesuusaba ammanana mela Muse higgiyafenne nabeta maxaafape qoncisidi enta tamaarsis.
ACT 28:24 Issoti issoti Phawuloosi gidaysa ammanidosona, shin harati ammanibookona.
ACT 28:25 Enti banta giddon oda ma7onna ixida wode Phawuloosi issiba gidaape guye bidosona. I haysada yaagis: “Geeshsha Ayyaanay nu aawatas nabiya Isayaasa doonan odidaysi tuma.
ACT 28:26 “ ‘Neeni he asaako bada, hinte sissi si7eeta, shin hintew gelenna; hinte be7o be7eeta, shin demmeketa.
ACT 28:27 Ayis giiko, ha deriya wozanay muumis; enta haythay tullis; enta ayfeyka goozetis. Hessi bayneko, enti banta ayfiyan be7idi, banta haythan si7idi, banta wozanan akeekidi, taako simmanashin; taka enta pathanashin’ yaaga” yaagis.
ACT 28:28 “Hiza, haysi Xoossaa atotetha kiitay Ayhude gidonaysatas gideysa ereeta. Entika si7ana” yaagis.
ACT 28:29 Phawuloosi hessa gidaape guye, Ayhudeti banta giddon daro palamishe keyidi bidosona.
ACT 28:30 Phawuloosi kera keethan nam7u laythi kumethi de7is; yan de7ishe baako yaa ubbaa mokees.
ACT 28:31 Yashshi baynanne oonika diggonashin Xoossa kawotethaaba sabbakis; Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosaba qoncisidi tamaarsees.
ROM 1:1 Yesuus Kiristoosa aylle gidida, hawaare gidana mela xeegetidaysafenne Xoossaa Wongela sabbakana mela dooretida Phawuloosi kiitida kiitaa.
ROM 1:2 Xoossay daro wodepe sinthe ba nabeta baggara immana yaagida Xoossaa Wongelay Geeshsha Maxaafatan xaafetis.
ROM 1:3 He Wongelay ashon Dawita sheeshape yeletida, Xoossaa Na7aa, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosaba.
ROM 1:4 Qassi I ba geeshsha Ayyaanan hayqope dendidi, Xoossaa Na7aa gideysa gita wolqan bessis.
ROM 1:5 Iya baggara Ayhude gidonna asa ubbay, ammanidi kiitetana mela Kiristoosa sunthaa gisho, Xoossay aadho keehatethinne hawaaretetha maata nuus immis.
ROM 1:6 Yesuus Kiristoosas gidana mela xeegetida asatape baggati hintena.
ROM 1:7 Roomen de7iya, Xoossay siiqeysatasinne iya geeshsha dere gidana mela dooridaysatas. Xoossaa nu Aawapenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosape aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hintew gido.
ROM 1:8 Ubbaafe koyrottada, hinte ammanoy biitta ubban si7etida gisho, Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara hinte gisho ta Xoossaa galatayis.
ROM 1:9 Taani iya Na7aa wongelaba kumetha wozanan odiya Xoossay, taani ta woosan ubba wode hintena qopeysas I marka.
ROM 1:10 Wursethan, Xoossaa shene gidiko, taani hinteko baanaw ogey taw injetana mela ubba wode woossayis.
ROM 1:11 Taani hintew Ayyaana imuwa shaakanawunne hintena be7anaw laamotayis.
ROM 1:12 Hessika, taani hinte ammanuwan, qassi hinte ta ammanuwan minettana melasa.
ROM 1:13 Ta ishato, taani Ayhude gidonna asaape ayfe demmidaysada, hintefeka ayfe demmanaw hinteko baanaw qopas, shin digetas.
ROM 1:14 Tamaarida asaasinne tamaariboonna asaas qassi cincatasinne eeyatas taw acoy de7ees.
ROM 1:15 Hessa gisho, Roomen de7iya hintewuka wongela odanaw amottayis.
ROM 1:16 Iya ammaniya ubbaa, koyrottidi Ayhudeta, kaallidi Ayhude gidonnayisata ashshanaw Wongelay Xoossaa wolqaa gidiya gisho, ta Wongelan yeellatike.
ROM 1:17 Xilloy ammanon de7on daana geetetidi Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetis. Wongelan Xoossaa xillotethay qoncis; koyrope wursethi gakanaw, asay xilley ammanonna.
ROM 1:18 Tumay eretonna mela banta iita ooson kammiya asaa bollanne nagara ubbaa bolla, Xoossaa hanqoy salope wodhees.
ROM 1:19 Xoossay entaw qoncanaw bessiyaba qoncisida gisho, enti Xoossaba eroosona.
ROM 1:20 Alamey medhetoosape doomidi, asaas bentonna Xoossaa kandoy, hessika iya merinaa wolqaynne Xoossatethay iya medhetethan qoncidi de7iya gisho, asay banta iitatethaas gaasoyabay baawa.
ROM 1:21 Enti Xoossaa erishe, iya bonchibookonanne galatibookona. Enta qofay maaddonnaba gidis; enta akeekona wozanay dhumis.
ROM 1:22 Enti bantana cincata goosona, shin eeyata.
ROM 1:23 Enti hayqonna Xoossaa goyinnanaysa aggidi, hayqiya asa medhon, kafota medhon, do7ata medhoninne ulora gooshetiyabata daanisidi oothida misileta goyinnidosona.
ROM 1:24 Hessa gisho, enti issoy issuwara borsoba oothidi, banta asatethaa kawushana mela Xoossay enta wozanay amotiya tuna oosos enta yeggi aggis.
ROM 1:25 Hessi haniday enti Xoossaa tumaa wordon laammida gishonne medhida Xoossaa aggidi, medhetethi goyinnida gishosa. Xoossay merinaw galatetidaysa. Amin7i.
ROM 1:26 Hessa gisho, Xoossay entana enta borso amuwas yeggi aggis. Enta maccasay bantaw bessiya addera gahetethi aggidi, bessonnaba hanidi maccasi maccasara gahetidosona.
ROM 1:27 Hessadaka, addeti bantaw bessiya maccasara gahetethi aggidi, addey addera gahetidosona. Addeti issoy issuwara amon xuugetidi, borsoba oothidosona. Banta oothida nagaraas bessiya pirdaa ekidosona.
ROM 1:28 Enti Xoossaa erishe, hari attoshin iyabaa qopanaw koyonna ixida gisho, bessonnaba oothana mela Xoossay entana pathonna qofas aathidi immis.
ROM 1:29 Entan geellatethi, iitatethi, yiiqey, geney, qanaatey, shempo wodhoy, palami, cimoynne iita amoy kumis. Enti zigireyisata,
ROM 1:30 asa sunthi iisseyisata, Xoossaa ixeyisata, cayeyisata, otoreyisata, ceeqeteyisata, iitabaa oothanaw koyeysatanne banta aayesinne aawas kiitetonayisata,
ROM 1:31 akeekonayisata, caaqo mentheyisata, siiqoy baynayisata, qadhey baynayisata.
ROM 1:32 Hayisata mela ootheysatas hayqoy bessees giya Xoossaa higgiya erishe, haysata oothosona. Enti bantaw ooso xalaala gidonashin, oothiya harataka nashshoosona.
ROM 2:1 Hessa gisho, neno harata bolla pirdeyso, neeni gaasoyabay baawa. Neeni harata bolla pirdashe, he neeni pirdiya uraa mela oothiko, neeni, ne bolla pirdaasa.
ROM 2:2 Hessa mela ooso ootheyisata bolla Xoossay xillo pirdaa pirdeysa nu eroos.
ROM 2:3 Neno, hessa mela ooso ootheyisata bolla pirdeyso, enti ootheysa mela ootheyso, neeni Xoossaa pirdaafe attanaba daanii?
ROM 2:4 Woyko Xoossaa keehatetha, gencanne danda7a darotethaa kadhayee? Xoossay new keehiday nena nagaraape zaaranaw gideysa erikiyee?
ROM 2:5 Shin hintew shucha wozaninne si7onna haythi de7ees. Hessa gisho, Xoossaa hanqoynne xillo pirday qonciya gallas, ne bolla pirday darana mela oothaasa.
ROM 2:6 Xoossay issuwas issuwas iya oosuwa mela immana.
ROM 2:7 Lo77o ooson minnidi, galataa, bonchonne dhayonna de7uwa koyeysatas Xoossay merinaa de7uwa immana.
ROM 2:8 Shin bantana siiqeyisata, tumaa ixeysatanne iitabaa oothanaw koyeyisata bolla Xoossaa hanqoynne pirday yaana.
ROM 2:9 Iitabaa oothiya asa ubbaa, koyrottidi Ayhudeta, kaallidi Ayhude gidonna asaa metoynne waayey gakana.
ROM 2:10 Shin Xoossay lo77o ooso oothiya ubbaas, koyrottidi Ayhudetas, kaallidi Ayhude gidonaysatas galataa, bonchonne sarotethaa immana.
ROM 2:11 Xoossay som7o be7idi ase shaakenna.
ROM 2:12 Higgey bayna nagara oothida ubbay higgey bayna dhayana. Higgey de7ishin, nagara oothida ubbay higgen pirdetana.
ROM 2:13 Xoossaa sinthan xilleysati higge naageysatape attishin, higge sissa xalaala si7eyisata gidokona.
ROM 2:14 Higgey bayna Ayhude gidonna asay medhon higgey kiitteysa oothosona. Entaw xaafetida higgey bayna ixikoka enti banta wozanan higgiya eroosona.
ROM 2:15 Enta hanotay, higge kiitay enta wozanan xaafetidaysa bessees. Qassi enta kahay enta bolla markatees. Enta qofay issi issi toho entana bala gees; issi issi toho entana like gees.
ROM 2:16 Ta tamaarsida Wongela mela Xoossay Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara asa wozanan geemmida qofaa pirdiya wode hessi eretana.
ROM 2:17 Shin ne nena Ayhude gaasa; higgen zempaasa; Xoossan ceeqasa.
ROM 2:18 Ne oothana mela Xoossay koyiyabay aybeko eraasa. Higgiya tamaarida gisho, tuma gidiyaba dooranaw eraasa.
ROM 2:19 Neeni qooqeta kaaletheysa, qassi dhuman de7eysatas poo7o gideysa shaaka eraasa.
ROM 2:20 Neeni higgiyafe demmida eratethaninne tumatethan eeyata eriseysanne yoogata tamaarseysa gideysa eraasa.
ROM 2:21 Yaatin, ne harata tamaarseysi ne nena ayis tamaarsikii? Neeni, “Kaysotopa” gashe, neeni ne huuphen kaysotayee?
ROM 2:22 Neeni, “Laammofa” gashe, neeni ne huuphen laammayee? Neeni eeqa ixashe, eeqay de7iya keethaa bonqayee?
ROM 2:23 Neeni Xoossaa higgiyan ceeqetasa, shin higgiyas kiitetonna ixada Xoossaa yeellayay?
ROM 2:24 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Hinte gaason Xoossaa sunthay Ayhude gidonna asatan cayetees” geetetidi xaafetis.
ROM 2:25 Ne higges kiitetiko, ne qaxaretethaas maadey de7ees, shin neeni higgiyas kiitetonna ixiko ne qaxaretethay qaxaretiboona mela gidees.
ROM 2:26 Ayhude gidonna asi qaxaretonna de7ishe, higgiyas kiitetiko, Xoossay iya qaxaretida mela taybennee?
ROM 2:27 Hinte, Ayhude asati, hintew xaafetida higgeynne qaxaroy de7ishin, hinte higges kiitetonna ixiko, Ayhude gidonna asay qaxaretonna ixikoka higges kiitetidi, hinte bolla pirdana.
ROM 2:28 Hiza, sunthan Ayhude gidida ubbay tuma Ayhude gidenna. Qassi kare asatethaa qaxaroy tuma qaxaro gidenna.
ROM 2:29 Shin tuma Ayhudetethi gaatha baggan Ayhude gideysa. Tuma qaxaretethi Xoossaa Ayyaanan oosetiya wozana qaxaretethafe attishin, xaafetida higgiyan oosetiya asatethaa qaxaro gidenna. He uray galataa Xoossafe ekeesipe attishin, asape gidenna.
ROM 3:1 Yaatin, Ayhude giddon ay dummatethi de7ii? Woyko qaxaretethan ay maadey de7ii?
ROM 3:2 Tumaka Ayhude gidoy daro ogera maaddees. Ubbaafe sinthe Xoossay ba qaala hadara Ayhudetas immis.
ROM 3:3 Yaatin, entafe issoti issoti qaala ammanonna ixiko, enta ixoy Xoossaa ammanetetha diggiyee?
ROM 3:4 Diggenna! Asa ubbay wordancho gidikoka Xoossay tuma gido. Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Ne qaalan ne xillaasa; nena mooteysa pirdan lathaasa” geetetidi xaafetis.
ROM 3:5 Yaatin, nu nagaray Xoossay xillo gideysa bessiyaba gidiko, nu woyganee? Xoossay nu nagaraa gisho, nu bolla pirdiko, like gidenneyee? Haysa taani asa qofatho gayis.
ROM 3:6 Hessi ubbaraka hanenna. Hessada haniko, Xoossay ha alamiya bolla waati pirdanee?
ROM 3:7 Shin ta wordotethay Xoossa tumaa qoncisidi, iya bonchuwa darsi bessiyaba gidiko, yaatin, ayis ta bolla nagaranchoda pirdeetii?
ROM 3:8 Issi issi asay, “Lo77oy yaana mela iita oothoos” yaagidi tamaarsiyada oothidi tana mootosona. Hessa mela asaa bolla yaa Xoossaa pirday like.
ROM 3:9 Yaatin, nuuni woyganee? Nu Ayhudeti, Ayhude gidonaysatape aadhonayee? Gidenna! Ayhude gidin, Ayhude gidonna ixin ubbay nagarancho gideysa taani kasetada hintew odas.
ROM 3:10 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Xillo asi issoyka baawa.
ROM 3:11 Akeekiya asi baawa, Xoossaa koyiya oonika baawa.
ROM 3:12 Asa ubbay Xoossaas zoko zaaridosona; ubbay issife pathonnaba gididosona. Lo77o oothiya oonika baawa; issi asika baawa.
ROM 3:13 Enta doonape keyiya qaalay, dooyetida duufope keyiya xinqo mela; banta inxarsan cimmoosona. Enta doonape ase wodhiya, shoosha marzey keyees.
ROM 3:14 Enta doonan camo odaynne baadethi kumis.
ROM 3:15 Enti suuthi gussanaw ellesoosona.
ROM 3:16 Enta ogiyan dhayoynne qohoy de7ees.
ROM 3:17 Enti sarotetha ogiya erokona.
ROM 3:18 Banta de7uwan Xoossaas yayyokonna” geetetidi xaafetis.
ROM 3:19 Ase ubbaa doona oythanawunne kumetha alamiya Xoossaa pirdaafe garsan shiishanaw, higgey imetiday higgefe garsan aqeysatas gideysa nu eroos.
ROM 3:20 Hessa gisho, oonika higges kiitetidi Xoossaa sinthan xillanaw danda7enna. Higgey asi ubbay nagarancho gideysa bessees.
ROM 3:21 Shin ha77i Xoossay asi higgey baynashin xilliya oge qoncisis. He ogiya Muse higgeynne nabeti markatidosona.
ROM 3:22 Ha xillotethaa, Xoossay Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara asa ubbaas shaakoy bayna immees.
ROM 3:23 Asa ubbay nagara oothidosona; Xoossay entaw immida bonchuwafe haakidi attidosona.
ROM 3:24 Shin enti Xoossaa aadho keehatethan, woziya Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara coo xillidosona.
ROM 3:25 Xoossay Yesuus Kiristoosa yarsho oothidi immiday, iya ammaniya ubbay iya suuthan nagara atotethi demmana melasa. Xoossay hessa oothiday ba danda7an kase nagaraa taybonna aggidi, ba xillotethaa bessanaasa.
ROM 3:26 Ha77i wodiyan Yesuusa ammaniya ubbaa xillisidi, Xoossay ba huuphen xillo gideysa bessees.
ROM 3:27 Yaatin, nu ceeqetiyabay aybi de7ii? Aybika baawa. Nuuni ceeqetey higges kiitetiya gishoyee? Akay! Ammano gishosa.
ROM 3:28 Xoossay ase xillisey ammanonape attishin, higges kiitetethan gidonnaysa nu akeekos.
ROM 3:29 Woyko Xoossay Ayhudeta xalaala Xoosseyee? Ayhude gidonaysatas Xoosse gidenneyee? Tuma, Ayhude gidonaysataska I Xoosse.
ROM 3:30 Xoossay isso; Ayhudetanne Ayhude gidonnayisata ammanon xillisey iya.
ROM 3:31 Yaatin, nuuni higgiya ammano gisho shaaros guusseyee? Gidenna! Higgiya minthosipe attishin.
ROM 4:1 Yaatin, nu mayzay Abrahaamey ay demmidee?
ROM 4:2 Abrahaamey ooson xillidaba gidiyako, I ceeqetiyabay de7ees, gidoshin, Xoossaa sinthan ceeqetanaw danda7enna.
ROM 4:3 Geeshsha Maxaafay, “Abrahaamey Xoossaa ammanis; Xoossay hessa iyaw xillotethi oothidi ekis” yaagees.
ROM 4:4 Oothiya uray ekiya damoozey, iya ooso wolqaas cigetiya gatepe attishin, iyaw imota gidenna.
ROM 4:5 Shin ooso oothonna oonika nagaranchuwa xillisiya Xoossaa ammaniko, iya ammanoy iyaw xillotethi gididi taybetees.
ROM 4:6 Geeshsha Maxaafan Dawiti, oosoy bayna Xoossay xillisiya asati ay mela anjetidako haysada yaagidi qoncisees:
ROM 4:7 “Enta balay atto geetetidaysatinne enta nagaray kametidaysati anjetidaysata.
ROM 4:8 Goday iya nagaraa taybonna asi anjetidaysa” yaagees.
ROM 4:9 Yaatin, Dawiti odida anjoy qaxaretida asaa xalaalaseyee? Woyko qaxaretiboona asaasee? Nuuni, “Geeshsha Maxaafay, ‘Abrahaamey Xoossaa ammanis; Xoossay hessa iyaw xillotethi oothidi ekis’ yaagees” gida.
ROM 4:10 Yaatin, hessi awude hanidee? Abrahaamey qaxaretineyee? Woyko qaxaretona de7ishinee? Qaxaretanaape sinthe hanisipe attishin, guye gidenna.
ROM 4:11 Abrahaamey qaxaretanaape sinthe iya ammanoy iyaw xillotethi gididi taybetidaysa erisanaw, iya qaxaroy malaata gidis. Hessa gisho, Abrahaamey qaxaretonna ammaneysatasinne ammanon xilleyisata ubbaas aawa gidis.
ROM 4:12 I qaxaretidaysataska aawa. Abrahaamey entaw aawa gididay enti qaxaretida gisho, xalaalas gidonashin, I qaxaretanaape sinthe ammanida ammanuwa enti kaallida gishosa.
ROM 4:13 Abrahaamesinne iya sheeshas, “Alamiya ta hintew immana” yaagida ufaysay, Abrahaamey ammanon xillida gishosafe attishin, higge naagidi polida gisho gidenna.
ROM 4:14 Higges kiitetidaysati Xoossay immana gida ufaysa laateyisata gidiko, asaa ammanoy maaddenna; Xoossaa ufaysay hada gidis.
ROM 4:15 Higge menthoy Xoossaa hanqo ehees, shin higgey baynason higge menthoy baawa.
ROM 4:16 Hessa gisho, Xoossay immida ufaysay ammanon eketees. Ha ufaysay Abrahaame sheesha ubbaas Xoossaa aadho keehatetha baggara imetidaysa qoncisees. Hessika higge naageysata xalaalas gidonashin, Abrahaameda ammanida ubbaasa. Abrahaamey nu ubbaas aawa.
ROM 4:17 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Ta nena daro kawotethatas aawa oothas” geetetidi Abrahaame gisho, xaafetis. Ha ufaysay Abrahaames imetiday hayqidaysatas de7o immeysinne oorathaba oothiya Xoossay iya gideysa I ammanida gishosa.
ROM 4:18 Xoossay Abrahaames daro koche immanaysa caaqis. Ufaysi oothanaw aykoka danda7etonna wode Abrahaamey Xoossan ammanida gishonne ufaysi oothida gisho, daro kawotethatas aawa gidis.
ROM 4:19 Abrahaames xeetu laythi kumana hanikoka, ba daaburida asatethanne Saara na7a yelanaw danda7onnaysa erishe ba ammanuwan daaburibeenna.
ROM 4:20 Gidoshin, I ba ammanuwan minnidi Xoossaas boncho immispe attishin, Xoossay immida ufaysaa ammanonna ixidi, sidhibeenna.
ROM 4:21 Abrahaamey, Xoossay caaqida caaquwa polanaysa ba kumetha wozanan ammanis.
ROM 4:22 Hessa gisho, Xoossay iya ammanuwa xillotethan taybis.
ROM 4:23 Shin, “Iyaw xillotethan taybis” giya qaalay Abrahaame xalaalas xaafetibeenna.
ROM 4:24 He qaalay nu Godaa Yesuusa hayqope denthida Xoossaa ammaniya nuuska nu ammanoy xillotethan taybetana mela xaafetis.
ROM 4:25 Xoossay iya nu nagara gisho, hayqos aathidi immis; I nuna xillisanaw hayqope dendis.
ROM 5:1 Hiza, nu ammanon xillida gisho, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara Xoossara nuus sarotethi de7ees.
ROM 5:2 Nuuni iya baggara ha77i nu eqida aadho keehatetha giddo ammanon gelida. Hessa gisho, nu Xoossaa bonchuwa shaaketanaw de7iya ufaysan ceeqetoos.
ROM 5:3 Hessa xalaala gidonashin, metoy danda7a eheysa nu eriya gisho, nu metuwanka ceeqetoos.
ROM 5:4 Qassi danda7ay genca, gencay ufaysi immeysa nu eroos.
ROM 5:5 Nuus immida Geeshsha Ayyaana baggara Xoossay ba siiquwa nu wozanan gussida gisho he ufaysay nuna yeellayenna.
ROM 5:6 Nuuni buroo daaburanchota gididi de7ishin, Xoossaa wodey gakin, Kiristoosi nagaranchota gisho hayqis.
ROM 5:7 Xillo asa gisho hayqana asi demmanaysi daro meto, shin keeha asa gisho hayqana asi ooni eri bentonna aggenna.
ROM 5:8 Shin nuuni buroo nagarancho gididi de7ishin, Kiristoosi nu gisho hayqis. Hessi Xoossay nuna ay mela siiqiyako iya siiquwa bessees.
ROM 5:9 Hiza, nuuni Kiristoosa suuthan xillidaba gidiko, ubbaafe aathidi iya baggara Xoossaa hanquwafe attana.
ROM 5:10 Nuuni Xoossara kase morke, shin iya Na7aa hayquwan iyara sigetida. Hessafe aathidi, ha77i nuuni Xoossara sigetidaape guye, iya na7aa de7uwa gaason nuuni attana.
ROM 5:11 Hessa xalaala gidonashin, ha77i nuna Xoossara sigethida nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara nu Xoossan ceeqetoos.
ROM 5:12 Addaame baggara nagari ha alamiya gelis. He nagaraa baggara hayqoy yis. Asi ubbay nagara oothida gisho hayqoy asa zare ubbaa gakis.
ROM 5:13 Higgey imetanaape sinthe alamen nagari de7ees, shin higgey bayna wode nagari nagara gididi taybetenna.
ROM 5:14 Shin Addaamepe Muse gakanaw hayqoy asa ubbaa haaris. Hari attoshin, Addaameda higges kiitetonna ixidi, nagara oothiboonayisata bollaka hayqoy kawotis. Addaamey yaana Yesuusas leemiso.
ROM 5:15 Shin Xoossaa aadho keehatethay Addaame nagaraa mela gidenna. Issi asa nagara baggara daro asay hayqis. Shin Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara Xoossaa aadho keehatethay asa ubbaas daridi imetis.
ROM 5:16 Addaame nagaraa giddoninne Xoossaa imota giddon daro dummatethi de7ees. Issi asa nagara gaason Xoossay iya bolla pirdis. Shin asay daro nagara oothinka Xoossaa aadho keehatethay xillotethaa ehis.
ROM 5:17 Issi asa nagara gaason hayqoy asa ubbaa bolla kawotis. Shin Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara Xoossaa aadho keehatethaanne xillotetha imota ekiya ubbay, xoono de7on de7oosona.
ROM 5:18 Hiza, issi asi nagara oothida gaason asa ubbaa bolla pirdi yidaysada issi asi xillo oothida gaason, Xoossay ase ubbaa xillisidi entaw de7o immees.
ROM 5:19 Issi asi kiitetonna ixida gaason, daro asay nagarancho gididaysada issi asa kiitetethan daro asay xillana.
ROM 5:20 Asay nagara wolqaa erana mela higgey yis, shin nagara wolqay darida wode Xoossaa aadho keehatethay aadhidi daris.
ROM 5:21 Nagari hayqo wolqan kawotidaysa mela Xoossa aadho keehatethay xillotethaa wolqan kawotidi, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara nuna merinaa de7uwako kaalethees.
ROM 6:1 Yaatin, nuuni woyganee? Xoossaa aadho keehatethay darana mela nagaran minnidi de7ino?
ROM 6:2 Akay, nuuni nagaras hayqidaba gidiko, yaatin, nuuni hizape waanidi nagaran daanee?
ROM 6:3 Nu ubbay Kiristoos Yesuusara issifanaw xammaqetida wode iya hayquwan iyara issifanaw xammaqetidaysa ereketiyee?
ROM 6:4 Nu xammaqetida wode Kiristoosara hayqidanne moogetida. Kiristoosi Xoossaa Aawa boncho wolqan hayqope dendidaysa mela nuka ooratha de7on daana.
ROM 6:5 Nu iya hayquwan iyara issino gidiko, hessadaka, iya denduwan iyara issino gidana.
ROM 6:6 Nu hizape nagaras aylle gidonna melanne nu nagarancho asatethaa wolqay dhayana mela nu cima asatethay Kiristoosara kaqetidaysa eroos.
ROM 6:7 Issi asi Kiristoosan hayqidaba gidiko, I nagara wolqafe la77a keyis.
ROM 6:8 Nuuni Kiristoosara hayqiko, iyara de7on daanaysa ammanoos.
ROM 6:9 Kiristoosi hayqope dendida gisho, zaari I hayqonaysanne hayqoy sinthafe iya haaronnaysa nu eroos.
ROM 6:10 I hayqida wode nagaras issitoho wursethi gakanaw hayqis, shin ha77i de7on Xoossaas de7ees.
ROM 6:11 Hessadaka, hinte nagaras hayqidi, Godaa Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara Xoossas de7on de7eysa qopite.
ROM 6:12 Hessa gisho, hinte, hinte asatethaa amuwas kiitetonna mela hayqiya hinte asatethaa nagari haaropo.
ROM 6:13 Qassi hinte asatethaa nagara oothanaw geellatetha miishe oothidi immofite. Shin hinte hayqope dendidi, de7on de7iya asada hinte asatethaa Xoossaas immite. Qassi hinte kumetha asatethaa xillo ooso oothanaw Xoossaas aathidi immite.
ROM 6:14 Hinte Xoossaa aadho keehatetha garsan de7eetape attishin, higgefe garsan de7onna gisho nagari hintena haaranaw bessenna.
ROM 6:15 Yaatin, nu woyganee? Higgefe garsan gidonashin, Xoossaa aadho keehatetha garsan de7iya gisho nagara oothaneyee? Akay!
ROM 6:16 Hinte issi asas kiitetanaw hintena aylle oothidi immiya wode he hinte kiiteteysas aylle gideysa ereeta. Hessadaka, hinte nagaras kiitetiko, hintew hayqo ehiya nagaraas aylle gideeta. Woyko hinte Xoossas kiitetiko xillotethi ehiya Xoossaas aylle gideeta.
ROM 6:17 Kase hinte nagaras aylle, shin ha77i hinte ekida tuma timirtiyas kumetha wozanape kiitetida gisho Xoossaas galati gido.
ROM 6:18 Hinte nagara aylletetha qashope biletidi xillotetha aylle gidideta.
ROM 6:19 Hinte hinte qofan daaburancho gidiya gisho, taani oodeska geliya ogen odayis. Kase hinte, hinte asatethaa tunanne iitabaa oothanaw aylle oothidi immidaysa mela ha77i hinte asatethaa geeshshi gidana mela xillotetha aylle oothidi immite.
ROM 6:20 Hinte nagaras aylletidi de7iya wode xillotethas haareteketa.
ROM 6:21 Hintena ha77i yeellayiya beni hinte iita oosuwape ay maade demmidetii? He oosota wursethay hayqo.
ROM 6:22 Shin hinte nagara aylletetha qashope biletidi, Xoossaas aylle gidideta. Hessi hintena geeshshi oothidi merinaa de7uwako kaalethees.
ROM 6:23 Nagara gatey hayqo. Shin Xoossay, nu Godaa Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara immiya imotay merinaa de7o.
ROM 7:1 Ta ishato, taani odey higge eriya asatasa. Higgey issi asi paxa de7iya wode ubban iya haarees.
ROM 7:2 Leemisos, azina gelida maccasiya I azinay paxa de7iya wode higgen iyara qashetasu. Shin I azinay hayqiko iyara iya caaqida caaqoy iyo haarenna.
ROM 7:3 Hessa gisho, iya ba azinay paxa de7ishin, hara adde geliko, iya laammidaaro geetetawusu. Shin I azinay hayqiko, caaqoy iyo haaronna gisho iya hara azina geliko, iya laammidaaro geetetuku.
ROM 7:4 Hessa gisho, ta ishato, hinte Kiristoosa asatethaa baggara higge wolqaas hayqidi, Xoossaas ayfe ayfanaw hayqope dendida Kiristoosas gidideta.
ROM 7:5 Nu asho amoy nuna haarin, nu de7iya wode higgey guji nagara oothana mela nuna denthethees. Nu asatethaa giddon iita amotethi de7iya gisho nuuni hayqo ayfe ayfana mela oothis.
ROM 7:6 Shin ha77i nuuni nuna qachida higgiyas hayqida gisho nuuni higge qashope biletida. Hessa gisho, Geeshsha Ayyaana ogen Xoossaas kiitetosipe attishin, xaafetida cima higgiyas kiitetoko.
ROM 7:7 Yaatin, nuuni woyganee? Higgey ba huuphen nagaree? Gidenna! Shin higgey nagari aybeko tana erisis. Higgey, “Amotofa” goonnako, amotethi aybeko taani erike.
ROM 7:8 Shin ta ubbaba amottana mela nagari higge baggara tanan oge demmis. Higgey bayneko nagari hayqidaysa.
ROM 7:9 Kase higgey bayna wode ta paxa, shin higgey imetida wode nagari paxin ta qassi hayqas.
ROM 7:10 Taani de7on daana mela Xoossay immida higgey taw hayqo ehis.
ROM 7:11 Nagari higge baggara tana cimmiya ogiya demmidi, wodhis.
ROM 7:12 Hessa gisho, higgey geeshshi; iyan xaafetida kiitayka geeshshi, xillonne lo77o.
ROM 7:13 Yaatin, lo77o gididabay ta bolla hayqo ehideyee? Gidenna! Shin nagari nagara gideysi qoncana mela lo77oban maaddetidi taw hayqo ehis. Hessa gisho, nagara nagaratethay higge baggara aadhidi eretis.
ROM 7:14 Nuuni higgey ayyaanaba gideysa eroos. Shin taani nagaras bayzetida asho asi.
ROM 7:15 Taani oothiyaba akeekike; taani dosiyaba oothanaysa aggada ta ixiyaba oothayis.
ROM 7:16 Taani ixiyaba oothiya gidiko, higgey lo77o gideysa ta ma7ayis.
ROM 7:17 Hessa gidiko, he oosuwa tanan de7iya nagaray oothaysipe attishin, ta oothike.
ROM 7:18 Tanan, hessika ta ashuwan lo77obay baynaysa erayis. Lo77oba oothiya amotethi tanan de7ees, shin lo77oba oothanaw danda7ike.
ROM 7:19 Taani ixiya iitabaa oothaysipe attishin, ta dosiya lo77oba oothike.
ROM 7:20 Taani ixiyaba oothiya gidiko, hessa tanan de7iya nagaray ootheesipe attishin, oothey tana gidike.
ROM 7:21 Hiza, ta lo77oba oothanaw dosishin, iitabaa oosoy woga gideysa demmas.
ROM 7:22 Taani ta wozanan Xoossaa higgiyan ufaytayis.
ROM 7:23 Shin ta asatethaa giddon de7iya ta qofaa higgiyara oletiya dumma higge be7ayis. He higgey ta asatethaa giddon oothiya nagara higgiyas tana aylle oothidi immis.
ROM 7:24 Taani waanida yibbata asee? Hayqos efiya ha asatethafe tana ashshanay oonee?
ROM 7:25 Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara tana ashshiya Xoossaas galatay gido. Hiza, taani ta qofan Xoossaa higgiyas haaretayis; shin ta asatethan tana nagara oosisiya higgiyas haaretayis.
ROM 8:1 Hessa gisho, Kiristoos Yesuusan de7eysati ha77i pirdetokona.
ROM 8:2 Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara nuus de7o immiya Geeshsha Ayyaana higgey, tana nagaranne hayqo higge aylletethaafe kessis.
ROM 8:3 Nu nagara asatethaa gaason, higgey daaburancho gidiya gisho nuna ashshanaw danda7ibeenna. Xoossay ba na7aa nagarancho asa leemison nagaras yarsho gidana mela kiittidi hessa oothis. Yaatidi, Xoossay Kiristoosa ashuwa baggara nagara, nagarancho asa giddon pirdis.
ROM 8:4 Xoossay hessa oothiday, nu asho amoy koyeysada gidonashin, Geeshsha Ayyaanay koyeysada de7iya nu bolla higgiya xillo kiitay poletana melasa.
ROM 8:5 Banta asho amuwa kaallidi de7eysati bantana ufaysiyabaa qopoosona. Shin Geeshsha Ayyaana shenen de7eysati Geeshsha Ayyaana ufaysiyabaa qopoosona.
ROM 8:6 Nu qofay asho amos haaretiko hayqo ehees, shin ayyaana amos haaretiko de7onne sarotethi ehees.
ROM 8:7 Asho amos haaretiya asi Xoossaa higgiyas kiitetanaw koyonna gishonne kiitetanaw danda7onna gisho, Xoossara morke.
ROM 8:8 Banta asho amuwas haareteysati Xoossaa ufaysanaw danda7okona.
ROM 8:9 Shin Xoossaa Ayyaanay hintenan de7ikonne hintena haariko, hinte Ayyaana shenen de7eetape attishin, hinte asho amuwas haareteketa. Kiristoosa Ayyaanay bayna oonika Kiristoosaba gidenna.
ROM 8:10 Shin Kiristoosi hintenan de7iko, hinte asatethay nagara gaason hayqidaysa. Shin hinte ayyaanay xillotethaa gaason de7on de7ees.
ROM 8:11 Shin Yesuusa hayqope denthida Xoossaa Ayyaanay hintenan de7iko, Kiristoosa hayqope denthida Xoossay, hintenan de7iya ba Geeshsha Ayyaanan hayqiya hinte asatethaas de7o immana.
ROM 8:12 Hiza, ta ishato, nuuni nu asho amuwa kaallidi daanaw bessenna.
ROM 8:13 Hinte, hinte asho amuwas de7iko hayqana, shin Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqan nagara oosuwa wodhiko hinte de7on daana.
ROM 8:14 Xoossaa Ayyaanay kaalethiya ubbay Xoossaa nayta.
ROM 8:15 Nuuni, “Abbaa, ta Aawaw” yaagidi xeegiya, Xoossaa nayta oothiya Geeshsha Ayyaana ekidaape attishin, zaaridi yashshan daanaw aylle oothiya ayyaana ekibooko.
ROM 8:16 Xoossaa Ayyaanay nu ayyaanara gididi nuuni Xoossaa nayta gideysa markatees.
ROM 8:17 Nuuni iya nayta gidiko Xoossaa anjuwa laattana; Kiristoosara wolla he anjuwa laattana. Qassi nuuni Kiristoosara metuwa ekiko iyara wolla iya bonchuwan shaaketana.
ROM 8:18 Nuuni ha77i waayetiya waayiya, sinthafe nuus qoncana bonchuwara gathi be7iko, ginisanaw danda7etenna gada qopayis.
ROM 8:19 Medhetetha ubbay Xoossaa nayta qoncethaa daro laamotidi naagoosona.
ROM 8:20 Medhetetha ubbay hada gidis; hessika, medhetetha dooron gidonashin, ufaysan naagana mela oothida Xoossaa shenen hanis.
ROM 8:21 Medhetethay ba huuphen dhayo aylletethaafe wozetidi, Xoossaa naytara wolla boncho la77a shaaketana.
ROM 8:22 Medhetethay issife hanno gakanaw iqethi oykida maccasada ooleninne un7an de7eysa nu eroos.
ROM 8:23 Qassi hessa medhetetha xalaala gidonashin, Geeshsha Ayyaana bayra imotada ekida nuuni, nu huuphen nu asatethaas wozo gidida Xoossaa nayta gidana ufaysaa naagishe nu asatethan oolos.
ROM 8:24 Ha ufaysan nuuni attida. Shin nuuni ufaysi oothiyabay bentiya gidiko hessa ooni ufaysi oothii?
ROM 8:25 Shin nu be7onnaba demmana gidi ufaysan naagiko hessa danda7an naagoos.
ROM 8:26 Hessada Geeshsha Ayyaanay nu daaburan maaddees. Nuuni Xoossaa waati woossanaw bessiyako eroko, shin Geeshsha Ayyaanay ba huuphen, asi odanaw danda7etonna qaalan nuus gaannatees.
ROM 8:27 Qassi asa wozana eriya Xoossay Geeshsha Ayyaana qofay aybeko erees. Geeshsha Ayyaanay Xoossaa sheniyada geeshshatas gaannatees.
ROM 8:28 Xoossaa siiqeysatasinne iya sheniyada xeegetidaysatas Xoossay ubbaa lo77os ootheysa eroos.
ROM 8:29 Xoossay koyrottidi eridaysati ba Na7aa daanana melanne na7ayka ammaneyisata giddon bayra gidana mela enta dummayidi wothis.
ROM 8:30 Xoossay koyrottidi dummayidaysata xeegis; he xeegidaysata xillisis; he xillisidaysata qassi bonchis.
ROM 8:31 Yaatin, nu ha ubbaas woyganee? Xoossay nu bagga gidiko nuura oone eqetanay?
ROM 8:32 I hari attoshin, ba na7aas qadhetonnashin, nu gisho aathidi immis. Yaatin, ba na7aa nuus aathidi immidaysi waanidi ubbaba coo immennee?
ROM 8:33 Xoossay entana xillisida gisho I dooridaysata oone mootanay?
ROM 8:34 Yaatin, enta bolla pirdanaw danda7ey oonee? Oonika baawa. Hayqope dendidi Xoossaa ushachan uttida, Kiristoos Yesuusi, I nuus gaannatees.
ROM 8:35 Hiza, nuna Kiristoosa siiquwape shaakanay oonee? Waayeye woyko metoye woyko goodeye woyko kosheye woyko kallotetheye woyko yashsheye woyko oleyee?
ROM 8:36 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Nuuni ne gisho kumetha gallas hayqoos; shukas efiya dorsada taybetida” geetetidi xaafetidaysa mela gidis.
ROM 8:37 Shin nuuni, nuna siiqida Kiristoosan ha ubbaa polo xoonos.
ROM 8:38 Hessa gisho, hayqo gidin de7o gidin kiitanchota gidin haareyisata gidin ha77i de7eysa gidin sinthafe yaanaysa gidin wolqaamata gidin,
ROM 8:39 salo wolqaa gidin sa7a wolqaa gidin ay medhetethi gidin nu Godaa, Kiristoos Yesuusan de7iya Xoossaa siiquwape nuna shaakanaw danda7onnaysa taani eras.
ROM 9:1 Taani Kiristoosan tuma odayis, wordotike. Geeshsha Ayyaanay kaalethiya ta kahay taani wordotonnaysa taw markatees.
ROM 9:2 Ta wozanan Isra7eeletas daro qadhetaysinne qamma gallas qopayis.
ROM 9:3 Taani, ta ishata gisho, Kiristoosape shaaketada Xoossaa baadethafe garsan de7idaako dosaysishin.
ROM 9:4 Enti Isra7eeleta, Xoossay enta ba nayta oothis, ba bonchuwa entaw qoncisis. Entara caaqis; higgiya entaw immis. Enti Xoossaa goyinnana tuma ogiya bessis; Xoossay ufaysa qaala entaw immis.
ROM 9:5 Enti yeletethan mayzata koche; qassi Kiristoosi ashon enta koche gididi yis. Ubbaafe bolla gidida Xoossay merinaw galatetto. Amin7i!
ROM 9:6 Gidoshin, Xoossay gelida qaalay poletonna attis guussu gidenna. Isra7eele asa ubbay Xoossaa asi gidokona.
ROM 9:7 Qassi Abrahaame zare ubbay Abrahaame nayta gidokona. Xoossay Abrahaames, “Ne kochay Yisaaqa baggara xeegetana” yaagis.
ROM 9:8 Hessa guussay ashon yeletida nayti ubbay Xoossaa nayta gidokona. Shin tuma Isra7eele nayti Xoossay Abrahaames gelida qaalada yeletida nayta.
ROM 9:9 Xoossay immana gidi gelida qaalay, “Taani wonto laythi hannoode yaana; Saaraka adde na7a yelana” yaageysa.
ROM 9:10 Hessa xalaala gidonashin, Irbiqinne Yisaaqi yelida mente adde naytabaa akeekite.
ROM 9:11 Enti yeletanaape woyko iita woyko lo77o oothanaape sinthe Xoossaa dooroy ooson gidonashin xeessan gideysa qoncisanaw,
ROM 9:12 “Bayray kaaluwas kiitetana” yaagidi Goday Irbiqas odis.
ROM 9:13 Hessika Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Yayqooba dosas, Eesawe ixas” geetetidi xaafetis.
ROM 9:14 Yaatin, nuuni woyganee? Xoossay ase asape shaakiyee? Gidenna.
ROM 9:15 Goday Museko, “Ta maaranaw koydaysata maarana; ta qadhetanaw koydaysatas qadhetana” yaagis.
ROM 9:16 Hiza, Xoossaa dooroy asa shenen woyko ooson gidonashin iya maarotethaana.
ROM 9:17 Geeshsha Maxaafan, Gibxe kawako, “Taani, ta wolqaa nenan bessanawunne ta sunthay alame ubban eretana mela hessas nena kawothas” geetetidi xaafetis.
ROM 9:18 Hiza, Xoossay maaranaw koyeysa maarees; wozanaa muumisanaw koyeysa wozanaa muumisees.
ROM 9:19 Hintefe issoy, “Yaatin, Xoossay ase iita ooso gisho ayis borii? Xoossaa sheniya ixas gaanay oonee?” yaagidi oychanaw danda7ees.
ROM 9:20 Shin ta ishaw, Xoossara palamanaw neeni oonee? Urqafe Medhetida miishey bana medhidaysa, “Tana haysada oothada ayis medhadii?” gidi oychanaw danda7ii?
ROM 9:21 Woyko urqa medheysi issi urqafe issuwa boncho miishe, hankuwa qassi tooshe miishe oothidi medhanaw maati baawee?
ROM 9:22 Xoossay ba hanquwa bessanawunne ba wolqaa erisanaw koyidi, pirdas giigida hanqo nayta daro gencan danda7idaako ne ay eray?
ROM 9:23 Hessa I oothiday koyrottidi bonchoos giigisida, ba doorida naytas ba bonchuwa qoncisanaasa.
ROM 9:24 Ayhude gidin, woyko Ayhude gidonna asa ubbay Xoossan dooretida.
ROM 9:25 Nabiya Hose maxaafan, “Ta ase gidonnayisata, ‘Ta ase’ gada xeegana. Ta siiqaboonna deriya, ‘Siiqetidaysata’ gada xeegana.
ROM 9:26 Enti, ‘Ta ase gideketa’ geetetidi xeegetida bessan, ‘De7o Xoossaa nayta’ geetetidi xeegetana” yaagees.
ROM 9:27 Nabiya Isayaasi Isra7eele asaaba, “Isra7eele asay abba gaxan de7iya shafeda darikoka, entafe guutha asa xalaali attana.
ROM 9:28 Goday alamiya ubbaa bolla ellesidi polo pirdaa pirdana.”
ROM 9:29 Qassika Isayaasi, “Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday nuus guutha koche ashshonaba gidiyako, nuuni Soodomenne Gamoora katamaada dhayanashin” yaagidi koyrottidi odis.
ROM 9:30 Yaatin, nu woyganee? Xillotethaa koyiboona Ayhude gidonna asay ammanon xillotethi demmidosona.
ROM 9:31 Shin xillotethako gathiya higgey de7iya Isra7eele asay xillotethi demmibookona.
ROM 9:32 Ayis demmibookona? Enti xillotethaa ammanon gidonashin, ooson ekanaw koyida gishosa. Yaaniya gisho, enti, “Dhubiya shuchan” dhubetidosona.
ROM 9:33 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Taani Xiyoonen dhubbi kundisiya shuchaa wothana. Iyan ammaniya oonika yeellatenna” geetetidi xaafetis.
ROM 10:1 Ta ishato, ta kumetha wozanan ta amotteynne Xoosse woossey Isra7eeley attana melasa.
ROM 10:2 Enti Xoossaas mishetoosonashin, tuma eratethan mishetonnaysa ta markatayis.
ROM 10:3 Enti Xoossaa xillotethaa ogiya eronna ixidi, banta huuphe xillotethaa kaallidosonape attishin, Xoossaa xillotethaa koybookona.
ROM 10:4 Asi ubbay ammanon xillana mela Kiristoosi higgiya polis.
ROM 10:5 Asi higge naagidi ekiya xillotethabaa Musey xaafishe, “Higge naagiya oonika he higgiya naagida mela de7ees” yaagis.
ROM 10:6 Shin ammanon ekiya xillotethabaa geetetiday haysa: “Ne wozanan, ‘Ooni salo keyanee?’ yaagopa; hessi Kiristoosa wodhisanaasa.
ROM 10:7 Woyko, ‘Duge sa7a garsi wodhanay oonee?’ goopa; hessi Kiristoosa duufope kessanaasa.
ROM 10:8 Shin yaagidi xaafetis: ‘Xoossaa qaalay ne matana; ne doonaninne ne wozanan de7ees’ Nuuni hintew odiya ammano qaalay haysa.
ROM 10:9 “Yesuusi Godaa” gada ne doonan markatikonne Xoossay iya hayqope denthidaysa ne wozanan ammaniko, ne attana.
ROM 10:10 Asi ba wozanan ammanidi xillees; ba doonan markatidi attees.
ROM 10:11 Geeshsha Maxaafay, “Iyan ammaniya oonika yeellatenna” yaagees.
ROM 10:12 Issi Xoossay ubbaa Godaa gidiya gisho, Ayhudeta giddoninne Ayhude gidonna asaa giddon dummatethi baawa. I bana xeegiya ubbaas daro keeha.
ROM 10:13 Geeshsha Maxaafay, “Godaa sunthaa xeegiya oonika attana” yaagees.
ROM 10:14 Yaatin, enti ammanonna de7ishe waanidi iya xeeganaw danda7onna? Enti iyabaa si7onna de7ishe waatidi iya ammananaw danda7onna? Qassi entaw qaala odiya asi bayna de7ishin, waanidi si7anaw danda7oona?
ROM 10:15 Kiitetida asi bayna de7ishin, qaalay waanidi odetanaw danda7ii? Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Ufaysa Wongela odiya asaa tohoti waanidi lo77oona!” yaagidi xaafetis.
ROM 10:16 Shin Isayaasi, “Godaw, nu markatethaa ooni ammanidee?” yaagidaysada, ubbay Wongela ammanibookona.
ROM 10:17 Hessa gisho, ammanoy sissafe yees; sissi Kiristoosa qaalape yees.
ROM 10:18 Gidoshin, Isra7eele asay qaala si7ibookona guusseyee? Akay, si7idosona. Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Enta qaalay biitta ubban si7etis, enta oday sa7aa gaxa gakis” yaagetis.
ROM 10:19 Shin Isra7eele asay eribookona guusseyee? Musey kase, “Taani hintena leqetida asan qiiroysana; qassi eeya asan hintena yiloyana” yaagis.
ROM 10:20 Qassi Isayaasi, “Tana koyiboona asaas bentas; tana oychiboona asaas qoncas” yaagidi yayyonna odis.
ROM 10:21 Shin Isayaasi Isra7eeletaba odishe, “Ubbaa gallas kiitetonna asaasinne tana ixiya asaas ta kushiya miccas” yaagees.
ROM 11:1 Ane ta oychayis: yaatin, Xoossay ba asaa aggideyee? Aggibeenna! Taani ta huuphen Isra7eele; Abrahaame sheeshi; Biniyaame koche.
ROM 11:2 Xoossay koyro doorida ba asata yeggenna. Geeshsha Maxaafan, Eeliyaasi Isra7eeleta Xoossaa sinthan waati mootidaako, hinte ereketii?
ROM 11:3 Eeliyaasi, “Godaw, enti ne nabeta wodhidosona, ne yarsho bessaaka laallidosona. Ta tarka attas; enti tanaka wodhanaw koyoosona” yaagis.
ROM 11:4 Xoossay iyaw woygidi zaaridee? “Ba7aale geetetiya eeqas goyinniboona laapun mukulu asaa taw ashshas” yaagis.
ROM 11:5 Hessadaka, ha wodiyan Xoossay ba aadho keehatethan doorida guutha Isra7eeleti de7oosona.
ROM 11:6 I enta dooriday ba aadho keehatethanaape attishin, enta ooson gidenna. Dooroy ooson gidiko, iya aadho keehatethay tuma aadho keehatethi gidenna.
ROM 11:7 Yaatin, waanidee? Isra7eeleti banta koyaba demmibookona, shin Xoossay doorida guuthati demmidosona. Attidaysati banta wozanaa muumisidosona.
ROM 11:8 Hessika, Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Enti banta ayfiyan be7onnaada banta haythan si7onnaada, hanno gakanaw entaw Xoossay azalla ayyaana immis” geetetidi xaafetidaysada hanis.
ROM 11:9 Qassi Dawiti, “Enti miya gaytay enta xiheda oyko; enta gufanthiya aafo gido; enta iitatethay enta bolla gako.
ROM 11:10 Enti xeellonnaada enta ayfey goozeto; ubba wode meton enti kuunidi de7o” yaagis.
ROM 11:11 Yaatin, Ayhudeti zaari dendonna mela kundidonayee? Gidenna! Enta kundethay Ayhude gidonna asay attana mela gaaso gidis. Hessika Ayhudeti enta bolla qanaatanaada oothis.
ROM 11:12 Ayhudeta nagaray alamiyas daro anjo ehis; qassi enta kundethay Ayhude gidonna asaas daro anjo gidis. Yaatin, dooretida Ayhudeti kumethi attiya wode anjoy ay mela darandeesha!
ROM 11:13 Taani, ha77i hintew Ayhude gidonna asaas odayis. Ayhude gidonna asaas hawaare gidada ootheysan taani daro ceeqetayis.
ROM 11:14 Ta hessa oothiday taw ashon koche gidida Isra7eeleta qiiroyada entafe guuthata ashshanaasa.
ROM 11:15 Xoossay enta yeggida wode, ha alamey Xoossara sigetis. Xoossay enta shiishi ekiya wode hayqida asi hayqope dendida mela gidees.
ROM 11:16 Koyro menthida baso uythay Xoossaas yarshetidi geeshshi gidiko, muume uythayka geeshshi. Mithas xaphoy geeshshi gidiko, tasheyka geeshshi.
ROM 11:17 Gaden tokida shamaho tashe gidida Ayhudeti karetin, hinte bazzon dolida shamaho tashe gidida Ayhude gidonnaysati enta bessan dhanthetidi enta anjuwanne duretetha shaaketideta.
ROM 11:18 Hiza, hinte tasheda karetidi wodhida Ayhudeta bolla otortofite. Hinte otortiyaba gidiko, xaphoy hintena tookesipe attishin, hinte xaphuwa tookonnaysa akeekite.
ROM 11:19 Neeni, “He tasheti karetiday, ta enta bessan dhanthetana melasa” gaanaw danda7aasa.
ROM 11:20 Hessi tuma. Enti ammanibona gisho karetidosona. Neeni ammanida gisho he bessan eqadasa. Neeni yayyanaw besseesipe attishin, otoranaw bessenna.
ROM 11:21 Xoossay medhon tashe gidida Ayhudetas qadhetonna ixiko hintewuka qadhetenna.
ROM 11:22 Hiza, Xoossay ay mela keehekonne ay mela yashshiyako be7a. I yashshey kiitetonayisata, qassi I keehey iya ammanidi minnidi eqidaysatasa. Minnidi eqonna ixiko hinteka karetana.
ROM 11:23 Ayhudeti ammaniko, kase enti de7iya bessaa simmana. Xoossay enta zaaridi, wothanaw danda7ees.
ROM 11:24 Hintena bazzon de7iya shamaho gidida Ayhude gidonnayisata qanxidi, gaden tooketida shamahuwa bolla hintena tokiko, medhon gade shamaho gidida Ayhudeta banta koyro bessan zaari tokanaw waanidi danda7etennee?
ROM 11:25 Ta ishato, hinte hintena erancho gidi ceeqetofite. Ta hintew odiya issi xuuri de7ees. Hessika Isra7eeletape baggay si7onna ixiday wursethi gakanaw gidonashin, attanaw de7iya Ayhude gidonna asay kumethi Xoossako yaana gakanaasa.
ROM 11:26 Hessadaka, Isra7eele asa ubbay attana. Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Nuna ashsheysi Xiyoonepe yaana; Yayqooba kochaafe iita ubbaa diggana.
ROM 11:27 Taani enta nagara atto giya wode entara caaqana caaqoy haysa” geetetidi xaafetis.
ROM 11:28 Ayhudeti Wongela ekonna ixidi, hinte gisho Xoossara morke gididosona. Gidoshin, ha77ika enti dooretidaysata, Xoossay enta aawata gisho enta dosees.
ROM 11:29 Xoossay ba imuwaninne ba xeessan qiirotenna.
ROM 11:30 Hinte Ayhude gidonnaysati kase Xoossaas kiitetibeketa. Shin ha77i Ayhudeti kiitetonna ixin, hinte Xoossaa maarotethaa ekideta.
ROM 11:31 Hessadaka, hinte ekida maarotethaa Ayhudeti ekana mela ha77i Xoossaas kiitetonna ixidosona.
ROM 11:32 Xoossay asa ubbaa ba maarotethaa bessanaw koyidi, asi ubbay kiitetonna ixana mela oothis.
ROM 11:33 Xoossaa duretetha, cincatethaanne eratethaa akeekidi odanay oonee? Iya pirday pilgetenna, iya ogey eretenna.
ROM 11:34 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Godaa qofaa erey oonee? Iya zoranaw danda7ey oonee?
ROM 11:35 Xoossaas tal7eynne tal7iya zaaridi ekey oonee?” yaagees.
ROM 11:36 Ubbaa I medhis; ubbay iyan de7ees; ubbay iya bonchosa. Xoossaas merinaw bonchoy gido. Amin7i.
ROM 12:1 Hiza, ta ishato, hinte, hinte asatethaa Xoossaa ufaysiya, de7onne geeshsha yarsho oothidi, immana mela taani hintena Xoossaa maarotethan woossayis. Xoossaa hinte goyinnanaw bessiya tuma ogey hessa.
ROM 12:2 Lo77o, ufayseysanne polo gidida Xoossaa sheniya hinte shaaki eranaw hinte qofan laametitepe attishin, ha alamiya daanopite.
ROM 12:3 Xoossay hinte issuwas issuwas immida ammanuwa mela wozanaama asada qopite. Qopanaw besseysafe aathidi hintena dummayidi, otoron qopofite gada taw imetida aadho keehatethan hintew odayis.
ROM 12:4 Nu issi asatethaa giddon dumma dumma kifileti de7oosona; he dumma dumma kifiletas dumma dumma oosoy de7ees.
ROM 12:5 Hessada, nuuni daro asi gidikoka, Kiristoosan issi asatethi gidida. Nuuni issi asatethi gididi dumma dumma kifileti issoy issuwara oyketida.
ROM 12:6 Nuus imetida aadho keehatethan dumma dumma imotati de7oosona. Nu imoy tinbit odo gidiko, nuus de7iya ammanuwa mela odanaw bessees.
ROM 12:7 Nu imoy harata maade gidiko, he oosuwan minnanaw bessees; tamaarso gidiko, he tamaarsuwan minnanaw bessees.
ROM 12:8 Nu imoy harata minthetho gidiko, minnidi minthethanaw bessees. Nu imoy nuus de7iyabaape haratas imo gidiko, wozanape immanaw bessees. Nu imoy ayso gidiko, minnidi aysanaw bessees. Nu imoy haratas keeho gidiko, ufaysan keehanaw bessees.
ROM 12:9 Hinte siiqoy qoodhepe qommon gidanaw bessenna. Iitaba ixite; lo77oba minthidi oykite.
ROM 12:10 Issoy issuwara ishada siiqetite; issoy issuwa bonchite.
ROM 12:11 Azallofite; hinte ayyaanan minnidi, Godaas oothite.
ROM 12:12 Xoossay immida ufaysan ufaytite; metuwa danda7ite; ubba wode Xoossaa woossite.
ROM 12:13 Ammaniya geeshshata koshshiyaban maaddite; imathata mokite.
ROM 12:14 Hintena goodeyisata anjite; anjitepe attishin, baaddofite.
ROM 12:15 Ufayteysatara ufaytite; yeekeysatara yeekite.
ROM 12:16 Issoy issuwara issi qofan de7ite. Otoro qofaa aggidi, hintena kawushidi, kawusha ooso oothite. Hinte hintena cinca gidi qopofite.
ROM 12:17 Oonika hintew iitabaa oothiko, he uraas iita zaaropite. Asa ubbaa sinthan nashisiya lo77o ooso oothite.
ROM 12:18 Asa ubbaara saron daanaw hintew danda7etiya ubbaa oothite.
ROM 12:19 Ta ishato, hinte, hinte huuphen asas halo keyopite. Xoossay halo kessana mela iyaw aggaagite. Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Taani halo kessana; taani kushe zaarana” yaagees Goday, geetetidi xaafetis.
ROM 12:20 Shin Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Ne morkey koshatiko muza; I saamotiko ushsha. Neeni hessa oothiko iya huuphen yeella tama bonqo qolaasa” geetetidi xaafetis.
ROM 12:21 Iitaa lo77on xoonape attishin, iitan xoonetofa.
ROM 13:1 Xoossaa shene gidonashin maati imetonna gishonne ha77i de7iya shuumatika Xoossaa shenen shuumetida gisho asi ubbay deriya ayseysatas kiitetanaw bessees.
ROM 13:2 Hessa gisho, maatara de7eysatas kiitetonna ixiya oonika Xoossaa kiitaa ixees. Kiitetonna ixiya oonika ba bolla pirdaa ehees.
ROM 13:3 Ayseysati iita ootheysatape attishin, lo77o ootheyisata yashshokona. Ayseysatas yayyonna agganaw koyay? Yaako lo77o ootha; enti nena galatana.
ROM 13:4 Enti new lo77oba oothanaw shuumetida Xoossaa aylle. Shin neeni iitabaa oothiko, enti iitabaa oothidaysa seeriya gisho iyaw yayya. Enti iita ootheyisata seeridi, Xoossaa hanquwa qoncisiya Xoossaa aylle.
ROM 13:5 Hessa gisho, Xoossaa hanquwa xalaalas gidonashin, hinte kahay markatiya gisho deriya ayseysatas kiitetanaw bessees.
ROM 13:6 Hinte giira giireyka hessasa. Deriya ayseysati he oosuwa oothey, enti Xoossaa aylleta gidida gishosa.
ROM 13:7 Issuwas issuwas besseysa immite. Giira giiranaw besseysas giirite; qaraxa qanxanaw besseysas qaraxa qanxite; yayyanaw besseysas yayyite; bonchoy besseysa bonchite.
ROM 13:8 Issoy issuwara siiqetite. Siiqo acope attishin, hinte bolla hara acoy doopo. Ase siiqiya oonika higgey geysa polis.
ROM 13:9 “Laammofa; wodhopa; kaysotopa; amottofa” giya kiitaynne hara kiita ubbay, “Ase ne huupheda dosa” giya kiitan qashetis.
ROM 13:10 Ase siiqiya oonika iya bolla iitabaa oothenna. Hessa gisho, ase siiqeysi higge kiitaa polis.
ROM 13:11 Dhiskofe hinte barkiya wodey ha77i gideysa akeekidi hessa oothite. Nu attana wodey koyro nu ammanida wodiyape ha77i nuuko matis.
ROM 13:12 Dhuma wodey aadhanaw hanees; wontay matis. Hiza, nuuni dhuma ooso aggidi poo7o ola miishe oykoos.
ROM 13:13 Ane gallas poo7on de7iya asada maaran de7oos. Mathoninne laymatethara gahetiya dumma dumma tuna oosotan, palamaninne qanaaten gidopo.
ROM 13:14 Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa kanduwa ma7ite; hinte nagarancho asatethay ba amuwa polana mela iyaw qopofite.
ROM 14:1 Ammanon daaburida oonaka shiishi ekitepe attishin, iya qofaa bolla pirdofite.
ROM 14:2 Leemisos, ammanon minnida issi asi ay kathika maanaw danda7ees. Shin ammanon daaburiya asi atakilte xalaala mees.
ROM 14:3 Ubbabaa miya asi moonna uraa kadhopo. Ubbabaa moonna asi miya uraa bolla pirdofo. Xoossay ubbaa miya uraa shiishi ekis.
ROM 14:4 Hara asa aylle bolla pirdey neeni oonee? I daaburin woyko minnin ba Godaasa. Goday iya essanaw danda7iya gisho I minnidi eqana.
ROM 14:5 Qassi “Issi gallasay hara gallasape aadhees” yaagidi qopiya asi de7ees. Haray qassi, “Gallasati ubbay issi mela” gidi qopees. Shin issoy issoy ba qofaa akeekidi qacho.
ROM 14:6 Issi gallasaa hara gallasatape aathidi bonchiya oonika Godaa bonchoos gidi oothees. Ubba kathi miya asi Godaa bonchoos gidi mees. I miya he kathaa gisho, Xoossaa galatees. Ubba kathi moonna asi Godaa bonchoos moonna aggees; qassi moonna agon Xoosse galatees.
ROM 14:7 Nuupe oonika baw deenna; qassi nu giddofe oonika baw hayqenna.
ROM 14:8 Nu de7on de7iko Godaas de7oos; qassi hayqikoka Godaas hayqoos. Hiza, nu de7on de7in woyko hayqin Godaasa.
ROM 14:9 Kiristoosi hayqidi hayqope dendiday, de7on de7eysatasinne hayqidaysatas Godaa gidanaasa.
ROM 14:10 Yaatin, neeni ne ishaa bolla ayis pirday? Woyko neeni ne ishaa ayis kadhay? Nuuni ubbay Xoossaa pirda araata sinthan eqana.
ROM 14:11 Geeshsha Maxaafan Goday, “Taani de7on de7ayis; asa ubbay ta sinthan gulbatana; taani Xoossaa gideysa markatana” yaagees.
ROM 14:12 Hiza, nu oothidabaas nu huuphen huuphen Xoossaa sinthan shiiqidi zaaro immana.
ROM 14:13 Hessa gisho, nuuni issoy issuwa bolla pirdeysa aggoos. Shin hinte ishaa dhubisidi woyko qaxidi nagaran gelsiyaba oothonnaada naagetite.
ROM 14:14 Godaa Yesuusa ammaniya asada, ba huuphen tuna gidida kathi baynaysa taani geeshshada erayis. Shin issi asi issiba tuna gidi qopiko hessi iyaw tuna gidees.
ROM 14:15 Ne miya katha gisho ne ishaa dhubiyaba gidiko, Kiristoosan de7iya ne ishaa siiqaka. Kiristoosi iya gisho hayqida uraa ne miya kathan iya ayyaana de7uwa dhaysofa.
ROM 14:16 Hiza, hintew de7iya la77atetha harati borana mela oothopite.
ROM 14:17 Xoossaa kawotethay Geeshsha Ayyaanay immiya xillotethi, sarotethinne tuma ufaysife attishin, muussabaanne ushshaba gidenna.
ROM 14:18 Hessada Kiristoosas oothiya asi Xoossaa ufaysees; asanka anjetees.
ROM 14:19 Hessa gisho, ane nuuni sarotethi bentiya ogiyanne issuwa issuwa ammanon minthiya ogiya koyoos.
ROM 14:20 Katha gisho gada Xoossaa oosuwa dhaysofa. Ubba kathi meetetees, shin hara asi nagaran dhubisiya kathi muussi iita.
ROM 14:21 Ne ishay dhubetonna mela asho moonna woyko ushshu uyonna woyko ne ishaa dhubiya haraba oothonna agoy lo77o.
ROM 14:22 Hiza, ha ne ammanuwa ne giddoninne ne Xoossaa giddon naaga. Like gidi qopidaba oothiya wode iya kahay mootonna uray anjetidaysa.
ROM 14:23 Shin sidhishe miya uraas iya muussay ammanon gidonna gisho pirdetees. Ammanoy bayna oosetida ooso ubbay nagara.
ROM 15:1 Nuuni ammanon minnidaysati daaburanchota toohuwa tookanaw bessees. Nuuni nuna ufaysanaw bessenna.
ROM 15:2 Nuuni nu ishaa ammanon minthanaw iya maaddanawunne ufaysanaw bessees.
ROM 15:3 Kiristoosi bana ufaysibeenna. Shin Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Asay nena cayida cashshay tana gakis” geetetidi xaafetidaysada hanis.
ROM 15:4 Geeshsha Maxaafay immiya gencaninne minthethuwan nu ufaysaa ekana mela Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetida ubbay nuna tamaarsanaw xaafetis.
ROM 15:5 Gencanne minotethi immiya Goday hinte Kiristoos Yesuusa kaalliya wode issifetethi hintew immo.
ROM 15:6 Hessika, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa Aawa, Xoossaa, issi wozananinne issi qaalan hinte bonchana melasa.
ROM 15:7 Kiristoosi hintena ekidaysada Xoossaa bonchoos issoy issuwa ekite.
ROM 15:8 Xoossay beni aawatas immida ufaysay poletana melanne iya tumatethay eretana mela Kiristoosi Ayhudeta aylle gididi yidaysa ta hintew odayis.
ROM 15:9 Kiristoosi Ayhudeta aylle gidida hara gaasoy qassi Ayhude gidonna asati Xoossaa iya maarotethaa gisho galatana melasa. Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Ta nena Ayhude gidonna asaa giddon galatana; ne sunthaa sabbana” geetetidi xaafetidaysada hanis.
ROM 15:10 Qassi, “Ayhude gidonna asato, Xoossaa deriyara ufaytite” yaagetis.
ROM 15:11 Qassi zaaridi, “Ayhude gidonna asato, Godaa galatite; kawotetha ubbay iya sabbite” yaagetis.
ROM 15:12 Hessada Isayaasi, “Isseye kochaafe yeletiya issoy yaana; I kawotetha ubbaa haarana. Enti banta ufaysaa iya bolla wothana” yaagees.
ROM 15:13 Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqan hinte diccana mela ufaysi immiya Xoossay, hinte ammanuwa gaason hintew ufaysinne sarotethi kumethi immo.
ROM 15:14 Ta ishato, hintenan lo77otethinne eratethi kumidaysa qassi issoy issuwa zoranaw danda7eysa ta geeshshada erayis.
ROM 15:15 Taani hintena issi issiba guja akeekisanaw koyada yayyonna ha dabdaabiya hintew xaafas.
ROM 15:16 Taani Kiristoos Yesuusa aylle gidada, Ayhude gidonna asaas kahineda oothada, Wongela odana mela Xoossay taw aadho keehatetha immis. Ayhude gidonna asay Geeshsha Ayyaanan geeyidi, Xoossaa ufaysiya yarsho gidana mela Xoossay hessa oothis.
ROM 15:17 Taani Kiristoos Yesuusan gidada Xoossaas oothiya oosuwan ceeqetayis.
ROM 15:18 Ayhude gidonna asay Xoossaas kiitetanaada, Kiristoosi ta qaalanne ta oosuwa baggara oothida oosuwape attishin, hari ta ceeqetiyabay baawa.
ROM 15:19 Xoossay hessa malaataninne Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqan waati oothidaako ta hintew odana. Taani Yerusalaamepe doomada, Iliwarqoone gakanaw Kiristoosa Wongela sabbakas.
ROM 15:20 Taani hara asi baasida bessan keexanaw koyke. Kiristoosa sunthay xeegetiboona bessan Wongela odanaw amottayis.
ROM 15:21 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Iyabay odetiboonna asati iya be7ana; iyabaa si7iboona asati akeekana” geetetidi xaafetis.
ROM 15:22 Hessa gaason, taani hinteko yaanaw danda7abike.
ROM 15:23 Shin taani ha77i ha heeran ta oosuwa ongida gishonne daro laythafe doomada hintena be7anaw laamotida gisho,
ROM 15:24 taani Ispeene bashe hintena be7anaw qopas. Qassi guutha wode hintera ufaytidaape guye, Ispeene biya wode hinte ta ogiyas tana maaddana mela koyayis.
ROM 15:25 Shin ha77i taani Xoossaa asata maaddanaw Yerusalaame bayis.
ROM 15:26 Maqedoonenne Akayan de7iya Xoossa asati, Yerusalaamen de7iya manqota miishen maaddanaw koyida gishosa.
ROM 15:27 Enti manqota maaddanaysi entaw attonnaba gidida gisho banta huuphen hessa oothanaw qofa qachidosona. Ayhudeti Ayhude gidonaysatara ayyaana anjuwa shaaketiko, enti qassi bantaw de7iyaban Ayhudeta maaddanaw bessees.
ROM 15:28 Hessa gisho, taani he shiiqida miishiya entaw immidaape guye, Ispeene bashe hinte matara aadhana.
ROM 15:29 Taani hinteko biya wode Kiristoosa anjuwan kumada baanaysa erayis.
ROM 15:30 Ta ishato, taw Xoossaa woossishe ta baaxiyan taara eqana mela Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosaninne Geeshsha Ayyaana siiquwan hintena woossayis.
ROM 15:31 Xoossay tana Yihudan de7iya ammanonna asatape ashshanaadanne Yerusalaamen ta oothana oosoy Xoossaa asata matan eketana mela taw woossite.
ROM 15:32 Qassi Xoossay giiko, taani hinteko bada ufaysan hintera shempana mela taw woossite.
ROM 15:33 Sarotethaa Xoossay hinte ubbaara gido. Amin7i.
ROM 16:1 Kinkire kataman de7iya woosa keethan oothiya nu michiya Feebena lo77o maccas gideysa hinte erana mela koyayis.
ROM 16:2 Hinte ammaniya asati Godaa sunthan mokanaw bessiya ammaniya asatape issuwada iyo mokite. Iya hintefe koyaba ubbaa iyo maaddite. Iya ba huuphen daro asaa maaddasu; qassi tana ta huuphenka daro maaddasu.
ROM 16:3 Kiristoos Yesuusa oosuwa taara issife oothiya Phirisqillanne Aqila saro giite.
ROM 16:4 Enti ta gisho banta shempuwa aathidi immidosona. Ta xalaala gidonashin, Ayhude gidonna asaa woosa keetha ubbay enta galatees.
ROM 16:5 Enta son shiiqiya ammaniya asaa saro giite. Iise biittan Kiristoosa koyro ammanida, ta dosiya Ephanexoosas ta sarothuwa odite.
ROM 16:6 Hinte gisho ooson daro daaburida Mayraamo saro giite.
ROM 16:7 Taara qasho keethan aathida ta Ayhude laggeta Andiraniqosanne Yuniyasa saro giite. Enti Yesuusa hawaareta giddon eretidaysata. Qassi enti Kiristoosa taape sinthe ammanidosona.
ROM 16:8 Godan ammaniya ta siiqo laggiya, Philiyaxoona saro giite.
ROM 16:9 Kiristoosa oosuwa nuura issife oothiya Urbaanosanne ta dosiya Istakuusa saro giite.
ROM 16:10 Kiristoosan ammanthiya aylliya Aphelisas ta sarothuwa odite. Arsxobuloosa soo asaas ta sarothuwa odite.
ROM 16:11 Ta Ayhude laggiya Herodiyoona saro giite. Narsisasinne iya soo asaape Kiristoosa ammanidaysata saro giite.
ROM 16:12 Godaa oosuwan daaburiya Tirufaynanne Tirufoosa saro giite. Qassi Godaas daro daaburada oothiya, ta dosiya Xarsido saro giite.
ROM 16:13 Godaa oosuwan daro eretida Rufoosasinne tana ba na7ada be7iya iya aayes ta sarothuwa odite.
ROM 16:14 Asqarixoonas, Afilesonphas, Hermeesas, Phaxrobaanas, Hermaasinne entara de7iya ammaniya ishata ubbaas ta sarothuwa odite.
ROM 16:15 Filologuusa, Yuula, Neera, iya michiw, Alinxoosanne entara de7iya ammaniya asa ubbaa saro giite.
ROM 16:16 Geeshsha yeeretethi yeeretishe, issoy issuwa sarothite. Kiristoosa woosa keetha ubbay hintena saro yaagosona.
ROM 16:17 Ta ishato, hinte tamaarida timirtiya ixidi, hinte giddon shaaketethinne meto medhiya asatape naagetite. Entafe haakite.
ROM 16:18 Hessa mela asati bantaw oothosonape attishin, nu Godaa Kiristoosas oothokona. Banta mal7iya doonaninne saphothiya qaalan ayko eronna asaa wozanaa balethoosona.
ROM 16:19 Wongelas hinte kiitetidaysa asa ubbay si7idaysi tana ufaysees. Shin hinte lo77oba erana melanne iitabaape haakana mela ta koyayis.
ROM 16:20 Sarotethaa Xoossay Xalahiya hinte tohuwape garsan gaaci yeggana. Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa aadho keehatethay hintera gido.
ROM 16:21 Taara oothiya Ximotiyoosi hintena saro yaagees. Hessadaka, ta dabboti Luqiyoosi, Yaasoninne Sosiphaxroosi hintena saro yaagosona.
ROM 16:22 Taani, ha dabdaabiya xaafida, Xarxiyoosi, hintena Godaa sunthan saro yaagayis.
ROM 16:23 Tana mokidaynne woosa keetha ubbay iya son shiiqiya Gaayoosi, hintena saro yaagees. Katamaa miishiya oykiya Erasxoosinne nu ishaa Qarxoosi hintena saro yaagosona.
ROM 16:24 [Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa aadho keehatethay hinte ubbaara gido. Amin7i.]
ROM 16:25 Galatay Xoossaas gido. Taani, Yesuus Kiristoosaba odiya Wongela qaalanne daro wodepe qosetidi gam7ida tumatethan, Xoossay hintena ammanon minthidi essanaw danda7ees.
ROM 16:26 Shin ha77i he tumay qoncis. Kawotetha ubbay ammanidi kiitetana mela merinaa Xoossaa kiitan nabeti he tumabaa xaafidosona.
ROM 16:27 Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara cincatethi iya xalaalas de7iya, issi Xoossaas merinaw bonchoy gido. Amin7i.
1CO 1:1 Xoossaa sheniyan Yesuus Kiristoosa hawaare gidanaw xeegetida Phawuloosinne, nu isha Sosteneesi,
1CO 1:2 Qorontoosan de7iya Xoossa woosa keethaas, Yesuus Kiristoosan geeydaysatasinne geeshshi gidana mela xeegetidaysatas; qassi entawunne nuus Godaa gidiya nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa suntha ubba bessan xeegiya ubbaas.
1CO 1:3 Xoossay, nu Aawaynne Goday Yesuus Kiristoosi hintew aadho keehatethaanne sarotethaa immo.
1CO 1:4 Xoossay Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara hintew immida aadho keehatetha gisho, taani ubba wode Xoossaa galatayis.
1CO 1:5 Iyan odaninne eratetha ubban hinte duretideta.
1CO 1:6 Taani Kiristoosaba markatidaysi tuma gideysa hessi qoncisees.
1CO 1:7 Hessa gisho, hinte nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa yuussaa naagishe de7ishin, ay ayyaana imoyka hintew pacenna.
1CO 1:8 Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosi simmiya wode hinte boretonayisata gidana mela wursethi gakanaw I hintena minthana.
1CO 1:9 Ba Na7a, nu Godaa, Yesuus Kiristoosara issifetethi daana mela hintena xeegida Xoossay ammanetidaysa.
1CO 1:10 Ta ishato, hinte giddon shaaketethi doonna melanne hinte issi wozananinne issi qofan isso gididi daana mela, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa sunthan hintena woossayis.
1CO 1:11 Ta ishato, Qelo7e soo asay hinte giddon ooshshi de7eysa taw odidosona.
1CO 1:12 Ta hintew odeysi haysa: hintefe issoti issoti, “Taani Phawuloosasa; taani Aphiloosasa; taani Phexroosassa; taani Kiristoosassa” yaageeta.
1CO 1:13 Kiristoosi shaaketideyee? Hinte gisho, masqaliya bolla kaqetiday Phawulooseyee? Woyko hinte Phawuloosa sunthan xammaqetidetiyee?
1CO 1:14 Taani Qarisphoosinne Gaayoosi attishin, hintefe oonaka xammaqaboonna gisho, Xoosse galatayis.
1CO 1:15 Hessa gisho, oonika hintena ta sunthan xammaqetideta gaanaw danda7enna.
1CO 1:16 [Qassi Isxifaanose soo asaaka ta xammaqidaysa akeekayis, shin hara oona xammaqidaako hassayike.]
1CO 1:17 Kiristoosi tana kiittiday wongela odana melasafe attishin, xammaqana mela gidenna. Kiristoosi masqaley hada gidonna mela taani asa cincatetha qaalan odike.
1CO 1:18 Kiristoosa masqala qaalay dhayeysatas eeyatethi, shin nuus atteysatas Xoossa wolqa.
1CO 1:19 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Taani cincata cincatethaa dhaysana; akeekanchota akeeka balethana” yaagees.
1CO 1:20 Yaatin, cinci awun de7ii? Higge astamaarey awunee? Woyko ha sa7a eranchoy awun de7ii? Xoossay ha sa7aa cincatetha eeyatethi oothibeennee?
1CO 1:21 Ha sa7aa asay banta cincatethan Xoossa eronna mela ba cincatethan diggidi, eeyatethan taybetiya, nuuni odiya qaalan ammaneyisata ashshanaw Xoossa shene gidis.
1CO 1:22 Ayhudeti malaata be7anaw koyoosona; qassi Giriketi cincatethi koyoosona.
1CO 1:23 Shin nuuni masqale bolla kaqetida Kiristoosa sabbakoos. Hessi Ayhudetas dhube; qassi Giriketas eeyatethi gidis.
1CO 1:24 Shin Xoossay xeegidaysatas, Ayhude gidin, Girike gidin Kiristoosi Xoossa wolqaanne iya cincatethaa.
1CO 1:25 Xoossa eeyatethi asa cincatethafe aadhees; qassi Xoossa daaburay asa minotethafe minnees.
1CO 1:26 Hiza, ta ishato, Xoossay hintena xeegiya wode hinte ay mela aseeko qopite. Asa qofan, hinte giddofe daroti cinca, wolqaamanne dhoqa koche gideketa.
1CO 1:27 Shin Xoossay cincata yeellayanaw alamen de7iya eeyata dooris; qassi minota yeellayanaw alamen de7iya daaburanchota dooris.
1CO 1:28 Ha alamiyan gita geetetidaba dhaysanaw, Xoossi, ha sa7aa kawushaba, kadhetidabanne pathonaba dooris.
1CO 1:29 Xoossa sinthan oonika ceeqetonna mela hessa oothis.
1CO 1:30 Shin, hintew Kiristoos Yesuusara issifetethi daana mela Xoossay hessa oothis. I, nuus Xoossafe cincatethi, xillotethi, geeshshatethinne atotethi gidis.
1CO 1:31 Hessa gisho, Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Ceeqetiya oonika Godan ceeqo” yaagees.
1CO 2:1 Ta ishato, taani koyro Xoossa qaala hintew odashe yida wode, doona bilatethaninne cincatethan yabiike.
1CO 2:2 Taani hintera de7iya wode masqaliya bolla kaqetida Yesuus Kiristoosape attishin, haraba eranaw koyke gada qofa qachas.
1CO 2:3 Ta hintera de7iya wode daaburan, yashshaninne daro kokorsan de7as.
1CO 2:4 Ta kiitaynne ta timirtey doona bilatethaninne cincatethan gidonashin, Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqa qoncisethaana.
1CO 2:5 Hessika, hinte ammanoy Xoossaa wolqaanape attishin, asa cincatethan zemponna melasa.
1CO 2:6 Ayyaana de7on diccidaysatas nuuni cincatetha qaalan odoos. Shin he cincatethay, ha sa7a cincatethi woyko dhayanaw de7iya ha sa7a haareyisata cincatethi gidenna.
1CO 2:7 Shin nuuni odiya cincetethay, daro wodepe sinthe Xoossay nu bonchuwas giigisidaysanne geemmidi de7iya xuura cincatethi.
1CO 2:8 Ha sa7aa haareysatape oonika ha cincatetha eribookona. Enti eridaba gidiyako, boncho Godaa masqaliya bolla kaqokona.
1CO 2:9 Shin Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Ayfey be7iboonaba, haythi si7iboonaba, wozani qopiboonnaba, Xoossay bana doseysatas giigisis” yaagees.
1CO 2:10 Xoossay ba xuura ba Ayyaana baggara nuus qoncisis. Geeshsha Ayyaanay hari attoshin, geemmida Xoossa xuura ubba pilgees.
1CO 2:11 Asan de7iya asa ayyaanape attishin, asaba oonika erenna. Hessadaka, Xoossaba, Xoossa Ayyaanape attishin, oonika erenna.
1CO 2:12 Xoossay nuus coo immidaba nu erana mela Xoossa Ayyaana ekidaape attishin, ha sa7a ayyaana ekibooko.
1CO 2:13 Nuuni ayyaanaba, ayyaana asatas asa cincatethan gidonashin, Xoossa Ayyaanay immiya cincatethan tamaarsoos.
1CO 2:14 Geeshsha Ayyaani bayna asi Xoossa Ayyaana imotata ekenna. Hessi iyaw eeyatethi; ubbay Geeshsha Ayyaanan pilgetiya gisho, I eranaw danda7enna.
1CO 2:15 Geeshsha Ayyaani de7iya asi ubbaba pilgees, shin iya oonika pilgenna.
1CO 2:16 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Godaa wozana erey oonee? Iya zoranaw danda7ey oonee?” geetetidi xaafetidaysa mela. Shin nuus Kiristoosa wozani de7ees.
1CO 3:1 Ta ishato, hinte Kiristoosan buroo yooganne ammanonna asatho de7iya gisho, taani ayyaanaba hintew odanaw danda7abike.
1CO 3:2 Hinte mino kathi maanaw danda7iboona gisho, taani hintena maathi paahas; ha77ika danda7ibeeketa.
1CO 3:3 Ha77ika hinte ammanonna asada de7eeta. Hinte giddon de7iya qanaateynne ooshshi hinte ammanonna asada de7eysa erisennee? Hinte ammanonna asada haneeta.
1CO 3:4 Hintefe issoy, “Taani Phawuloosasa” haray qassi, “Taani Aphiloosasa” giiko, ammanonna asa mela gideketii?
1CO 3:5 Yaatin, Aphiloosi oonee? Phawuloosi oonee? Nuuni hintena ammanthida Xoossaa oosanchota. Xoossay issuwas issuwas immida imota mela oothiya oosanchota gidokonaayee?
1CO 3:6 Taani tokas; Aphiloosi haathe ushshis, shin dichey Xoosse.
1CO 3:7 Hessa gisho, dichiya Xoossafe attishin, tokeyka haathe ushsheyka aykoka gidenna.
1CO 3:8 Tokeynne haathe ushshey woli mela, shin issoy issoy ba oosuwa mela Xoossay immiya woytuwa ekana.
1CO 3:9 Nuuni issife Xoossas oothiya iya oosanchota gidiya gisho, hinte Xoossa shooqa; Xoossa keethi.
1CO 3:10 Xoossay taw immida aadho keehatetha mela hiillancho anaaxeda baaso yeggas. Hara asi iya bolla keexees. Shin iya bolla keexiya oonika waatidi keexiyako, baw naageto.
1CO 3:11 Issi toho yegetida baasope hara baaso yegganaw oonika danda7enna. He baasoyka Yesuus Kiristoosa.
1CO 3:12 Shin ha baasuwa bolla oonika worqan woyko biran gidin, al7o shuchan woyko mithan gidin, maatan woyko maqan keexiko,
1CO 3:13 issi issi asi he baasuwa bolla aybin keexidako pirda gallas taman paacetidi qoncana.
1CO 3:14 Oonika he baasuwa bolla keexida keethay taman xuugetonna attiko, ba woytuwa ekana.
1CO 3:15 Shin oodde oosoyka taman xuugetiko, he uraas woytoy baawa. Gidoshin, I ba huuphen tamape kessi ekida asada attana.
1CO 3:16 Hinte Xoossa keethi gideysanne Xoossa Ayyaani hintenan de7eysa ereketii?
1CO 3:17 Oonika Xoossaa keethi laalliko, Xoossi iya laallana. Xoossa keethi geeshshi; he keethayka hintena.
1CO 3:18 Oonika bana cimmofo. Ha sa7aa cincatethan bana cinca oothidi ekiya oonika Xoossaa sinthan cinca gidanaw eeya gido.
1CO 3:19 Ha sa7a cincatethay Xoossa sinthan eeyatethi. Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Xoossay cincata enta gene qofan oykees” yaagees.
1CO 3:20 Qassi, “Cincata qofay maaddonnaba gideysa Goday erees” yaagees.
1CO 3:21 Hessa gisho, ubbay hintebaa gidiya gisho, oonika asan ceeqetofo.
1CO 3:22 Phawuloosi, Aphiloosinne Phexroosi, ha alamey, de7oy, hayqoy, ha77i de7ey, sinthafe yaanaysi, ubbay hintesa.
1CO 3:23 Hinte Kiristoosassa; Kiristoosi Xoossasa.
1CO 4:1 Asay nuna Kiristoosa aylledanne Xoossa xuura qoncisanaw hadari imetida asada oothidi qopo.
1CO 4:2 Hadara ekida asati banta Godaas ammanetidaysata gidanaw bessees.
