1CO 4:3 Shin hinte woyko hari tana pirdiko, taw aykoka gidenna. Hari attoshin, taka ta bolla pirdike.
1CO 4:4 Ta kahay geeshshi, shin hessi taani polo xillo gideysa bessenna. Ta bolla pirdanay Godaa xalaala.
1CO 4:5 Hessa gisho, wodey gakonna, Goday yoonna oodde bollaka pirdofite. I dhuman geemmidaba poo7on kessenna; asa wozanan qosetida qofa qoncisana. He wode, issoy issoy Xoossafe galataa ekana.
1CO 4:6 Ta ishato, hinte gisho, tananne Aphiloosa, hintew leemiso oothada odas. Hessa ta oothiday, “Xaafetidaysafe aadhofa” giya zoriya hinte nuupe tamaarana melasa. Hessa gisho, oonika issuwa sabidi hankuwa kadhanaw bessenna.
1CO 4:7 Ne haratape aybin aadhay? Neeni ekaboonabay aybi de7ii? Neeni ekidaba hara asape ekida gidiko, yaatin, ekiboonna asada ayis ceeqetay?
1CO 4:8 Ha77i hinte kallideta. Ha77i hinte duretideta. Nuuni bayna hinte xalaala kawotideta. Hinte tuma kawotidaba gidiyako, nuka hintera kawotanashin.
1CO 4:9 Taw, Xoossay nuna hawaareta, hayqos pirdetida asada, asa ubbaafe nuna guye aathida daanees. Nuuni ha alamiyas, kiitanchotasinne asaas kaassaba gidida.
1CO 4:10 Nuuni Kiristoosa gisho eeya gidida, shin hinte Kiristoosan cincata gidideta. Nuuni daaburancho, shin hinte mino gidideta. Hinte bonchetideta, shin nuuni tooshetida.
1CO 4:11 Ha77i gakanaw nu koshatoos, saamotoos, kallotoos, wadhetoos; daana soo dhaydi toylatoos.
1CO 4:12 Nuuni nu kushen oothidi aqoos. Nuna asi baaddiya wode anjoos; nuna goodiya wode danda7oos.
1CO 4:13 Nu bolla iitabaa odetiya wode lo77o qaala zaaros. Nu ha77i gakanaw ha alamiya pitonne wora yegetiya buure gidida.
1CO 4:14 Taani hessa xaafiday, ta dosiya naytada, hintena zoranaw xaafasipe attishin, yeellayanaw gidenna.
1CO 4:15 Kiristoosan hintena dichiya taybope bolla gidida kaaletheysati de7ikoka, hintew daro aawati dookona. Ta hintena Kiristoos Yesuusa wongelan yelas.
1CO 4:16 Hiza, hinte tana leemiso oothidi kaallana mela hintena woossayis.
1CO 4:17 Hessa gisho, ammanetida, ta dosiya, Godan ta na7a, Ximotiyoosa hinteko kiittayis. I dumma dumma bessan de7iya woosa keethan taani tamaarsida, Kiristoosa Yesuusan de7iya, ta ogiya hintena hassayisana.
1CO 4:18 Taani hinteko yoonnaba daanin, otortiya issi issi asati de7oosona.
1CO 4:19 Shin Goday giiko, mata wode taani hinteko baana. He wode otoranchota haasaya xalaala gidonashin, enta wolqaaka erana.
1CO 4:20 Xoossaa kawotethay oda gidonashin, wolqa.
1CO 4:21 Taani hinteko xam7ara booye woyko siiqoranne ashke ayyaanara boo? Awusa dooretii?
1CO 5:1 Hinte giddon laymatethi de7eysi zigiretees. Hessa mela laymatethi hari attoshin, ammanonna asayka oothokona. Hinte giddon ba aawa machera tunida asi de7ees.
1CO 5:2 Hinte hessan qiirotanawunne yeellatanaw bessenne, shin otortideta. Hessa mela borsoba oothida ura hinte giddofe kessanaw bessennee?
1CO 5:3 Taani ashon hintera doona ixikoka ayyaanan ta hintera de7ayis. Taani hintera de7iya asada hanada hessa mela oosuwa oothida ura bolla pirdas.
1CO 5:4 Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa sunthan hinte shiiqiya wode taani ayyaanan hintera daana. Hessan Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa wolqay hintera gidana.
1CO 5:5 He ura nagara ashoy dhaydi, iya ayyaanay Godaa Yesuusa pirda gallasan attana mela I, Xalahes aadhidi imeto.
1CO 5:6 Hinte ceeqoy lo77o gidenna. Guutha irshoy munuqa ubba dentheysa ereketiyee?
1CO 5:7 Hinte ha77i irshoy bayna munuqa gidana mela, hintefe nagara irsho kessite. Nuus Paasika dorse gidida Kiristoosi yarshetis.
1CO 5:8 Hessi gisho, geneynne iitatethi de7iya irshora gidonashin, tumatethinne geeshshatethi de7iya uythara nu baaliya bonchoos.
1CO 5:9 Ta kase xaafida dabdaabiyan hinte laymatiya asara gahetonna mela hintew odas.
1CO 5:10 Hessa guussay ha alamiyan de7iya laymateysatara woyko uuzetara woyko kaysotara woyko eeqa goyinneysatara polo gahetofite guussu gidenna. Hessa gidiko, ha alamiyape hinte keyanaw bessees shin attis.
1CO 5:11 Shin ammanayis yaagishe laymateysatara woyko uuzetara woyko eeqa goyinneysatara woyko cayeysatara woyko mathoteysatara woyko kaysotara gahetofite gada hintew odayis. Hessa mela asara hari attoshin, kathika moopite.
1CO 5:12 Woosa keethafe karera de7eyisata bolla pirdanaw tana aybe gathey? Woosa keethan de7eyisata bolla hinte pirdeketiyee?
1CO 5:13 Shin karera de7eyisata bolla Xoossay pirdana. He iitaba oothiya ura hinte giddofe kessite.
1CO 6:1 Hinte giddofe issoy issuwara mootoy de7iko, hessa ammaniya asaa sinthan pirdetanaysa aggidi, ammanonna asa sinthan pirdetanaw waanidi bii?
1CO 6:2 Ammaniya asay alame bolla pirdanaysa hinte ereketii? Yaatin, hinte alame bolla pirdiyaba gidiko, haysa mela guuthaba pirdanaw waanidi danda7eketii?
1CO 6:3 Nuuni kiitanchota bolla pirdanaysa ereketii? Yaatin, ha sa7a duussaba bolla pirdanaysi hintena waanidi xoonii?
1CO 6:4 Yaatin, hessa mela metoy hinte giddon medhetiko, woosa keetha ayfen kadhetida asa sinthan pirdetanaw waatidi efeetii?
1CO 6:5 Taani hintena yeellayanaw hessa gayis. Hinte giddon kacetida ishata sigethanaw danda7iya akeeka asi baawee?
1CO 6:6 Yaatin, issi ammaniya ishay hanko ammaniya isha pirda keethan ammanonna asaa sinthan mootanaw bessii?
1CO 6:7 Hiza, hinte issoy issuwa mootiyaba gidiko hessi hinte kundethaa bessees. Hessafe hinte qohetiko keehennee? Hinte cimetiko lo77ennee?
1CO 6:8 Shin hinte woli giddon ammaneysati, issoy issuwa qohetanne cimmeeta.
1CO 6:9 Geellati Xoossa kawotethi laattonaysa hinte ereketii? Hintena cimmofite; laymateysati woyko eeqa goyinneysati woyko laammeysati woyko addera addera gaheteysati,
1CO 6:10 woyko kaysoti woyko uuzeti woyko mathoteysati woyko cayeysati woyko bonqeysati Xoossa kawotethi laattokona.
1CO 6:11 Hintefe issi issi asati kase hessa mela. Shin ha77i, hinte Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa sunthaninne Xoossaa Ayyaanan meecetideta; geeydeta; xillideta.
1CO 6:12 Hinte, “Nu koydaba oothanaw danda7oos” yaageeta. Shin ubbay maaddenna. “Taani koydaba ubba oothanaw danda7ayis” yaageeta. Shin aybika tana haarenna.
1CO 6:13 Hinte, “Kathi ulosa; uloyka kathasa” yaageeta. Shin Xoossi uloka kathika dhaysanaysa ta hintew odayis. Nu asatethay Godasafe attishin, laymatethas gidenna. Godayka nu asatethasa.
1CO 6:14 Xoossay Godaa hayqope denthidaysada, nunaka hayqope ba wolqan denthana.
1CO 6:15 Hinte asatethay Kiristoosa asatethafe issi bagga gideysa ereketii? Yaatin, taani Kiristoosa asatethafe issi bagga efada laymatetha asatethi gidana mela ootho? Hanenna!
1CO 6:16 Laymatiya addey, I gahetiya maccaseera issi asatethi gideysa ereketii? Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Enti nam7ay issi asatethi gidana” geetetidi xaafetis.
1CO 6:17 Shin Godaara issifiya asi iyara ayyaanan issino gidees.
1CO 6:18 Laymatethafe haakite. Issi asi oothiya hara nagari iya asatethafe karera oosetees, shin laymatiya asi ba asatethaa bolla nagara oothees.
1CO 6:19 Hinte asatethay, Xoossay hintew immida hintenan de7iya Geeshsha Ayyaana keethi gideysa ereketii? Hinte hintebaa gideketa.
1CO 6:20 Xoossay hintena gaten shammis. Hessa gisho, hinte asatethan Xoosse bonchite.
1CO 7:1 Hinte taw xaafida dabdaabiyas zaaroy haysa. Issi asi maccas bochonna aggiko lo77o.
1CO 7:2 Shin laymatethafe attanaw issi issi addey macho eko; qassi issi issi maccasas azini de7o.
1CO 7:3 Azinay ba machees, qassi machiya ba azinaas bessiyaba kuntho.
1CO 7:4 Machees ba asatethaa bolla maati baawa, shin maati I azinasa. Hessadaka, azinas ba asatethaa bolla maati baawa, shin maati machesa.
1CO 7:5 Hinte woosan guutha wode gam7anaw zoretethan gidonna ixiko, issoy issuwa diggofite. Hessa gaason hintenatethaa haaranaw xoonetin, Xalahey hintena paaconna mela issife de7ite.
1CO 7:6 Shin taani hintena zoranaw haysa gaysipe attishin, kiita gidenna.
1CO 7:7 Asi ubbay taada macho ekonna de7iyako dosayis, shin Xoossi issuwas issuwas immida dumma imoti de7ees. Issuwas haysa mela hankuwas hessa mela imoti de7ees.
1CO 7:8 Macho ekiboonaysatasinne azina geliboonnaysatas qassi am7etas taani odey, taada de7ite gada zorayis.
1CO 7:9 Shin amon xuugeteysafe ekeysinne geleysi lo77o gidiya gisho, enti bantana haaranaw danda7onna ixiko, ekonne gelo.
1CO 7:10 Taani ekidaysatanne gelidaysata haysada gada zorayis; tana gidike Goday kiittees; machiya ba azinaape shaaketofo.
1CO 7:11 Shin shaaketiko hara azina gelonna barka de7o woyko ba azinara sigeto. Azini ba machiw billofo.
1CO 7:12 Shin haratas Godaa gidonashin, taani haysada gayis. Ammanonna macha de7iya ammaniya azini de7iko, iya machiya iyara issife daanaw koyko iyo billofo.
1CO 7:13 Qassi ammanonna azini de7iya ammaniya macha de7iko, I azinay iira issife daanaw koyko iyape biletofo.
1CO 7:14 Ammanonna azini ba ammaniya mache baggara xillees; qassi ammanonna machiya ba ammaniya azina baggara xillawusu. Hessi bayneko, hinte nayti tuna gidoosona, shin ha77i enti geeshshi.
1CO 7:15 Shin ammanonna azinay woyko machiya billanaw koyko billo. Ammaniya machiya woyko azinay hessa melaban qashetokona. Xoossi nuna sarotethan daana mela xeegis.
1CO 7:16 Neno, ammaniya machete, neeni ammanonna ne azina ashshaneko ay eray? Woyko ammaniya azinaw, neeni ammanonna ne machiw ashshaneko ay eray?
1CO 7:17 Issi issi asi Goday iyaw immida imotadanne Xoossay iya xeegidaysada de7o. Woosa keetha ubban taani tamaarsiya wogay haysa.
1CO 7:18 Oonika qaxaretidi xeegetidaba gidiko, qaxaretonada hanopo. Qaxaretonna xeegetida oonika de7iko, qaxaretanaw koyopo.
1CO 7:19 Xoossa kiitaa polanaw besseesipe attishin, qaxaretin qaxaretonna aggin aykoka maaddenna.
1CO 7:20 Issi issi asi Xoossay bana xeegiya wode de7eysada de7o.
1CO 7:21 Xoossay nena xeegiya wode neeni ayllee? Aykoy baawa hessas un7etofa. Shin neeni aylletethafe la77a keyanaw danda7iko la77a keya.
1CO 7:22 Aylle gididi de7ishe Godan xeegetida asi Godan aylletethafe la77a keyis. Hessadaka, aylle gidonna de7ishe, Godan xeegetida asi Kiristoosa aylle.
1CO 7:23 Xoossay hintena gaten shammida gisho asa aylle gidopite.
1CO 7:24 Ta ishato, hinte issoy issoy xeegetiya wode de7iya de7uwan Xoossara issife de7ite.
1CO 7:25 Geela7otaba Goday tana kiittidabay baawa. Shin Goday taw immida maarotetha mela taani hintena zorayis.
1CO 7:26 Hiza, ha77i metuwa gisho, ekonna woyko gelonna duussi taw lo77o daanees.
1CO 7:27 Ne macho ekidaba gidiko, shaaketanaw koyopa. Neeni macho ekaboonaba gidiko, ekanaw koyopa.
1CO 7:28 Shin ne macho ekiko nagari baawa. Hessada geela7iya azina geliko nagari baawa. Shin ekiya geliya asaas ha sa7an daro metoy de7iya gisho hinte hessafe attana mela taani koyayis.
1CO 7:29 Ta ishato, ta gey hessa; wodey wuris. Hizape guye macha de7ey macho ekonnaada de7o.
1CO 7:30 Yeekeysati yeekonaada, ufayteysati ufaytonnaada, shammeysati aykoyka baynaada bantana taybo.
1CO 7:31 Ha sa7aa shalon maadeteysati maadetiboonada hano. Ha alamiya malay aadhana.
1CO 7:32 Hinte hirgi bayna daana mela ta dosayis. Macho ekiboonaysi Godaa ufaysanaw koya gisho, Godaaba qopees.
1CO 7:33 Shin macho ekidaysi ba machiw ufaysanaw koya gisho, ha sa7aba qopees.
1CO 7:34 Iya qofay nam7an shaaketees. Azina gelaboonna geela7iya ba asatethaninne ba shempuwan geeyada Godaa ufaysanaw koya gisho, Godaaba qopawusu. Shin azina gelidaara ba azina ufaysanaw koya gisho, sa7aba qopawusu.
1CO 7:35 Taani hessa hintew odey, hinte maadetana melasafe attishin, hintena un7ethanaw gidenna. Shin hinte qofay shaaketonna maaran de7idi Godaa ufaysiyaba hinte oothana mela taani odayis.
1CO 7:36 Oonika ba oychida geela7es gelo wodey aadhis gidi iyo agganaw qopiko, hessi qassi iw lo77o gidonnaysi iyaw si7etiko, ba koydaysa ootho; enti eketo, geleto; hessan nagari baawa.
1CO 7:37 Shin issi asi un7ethiyabay dhayin, ba wozanan minnidi, bana haaridi, ba oychida geela7iw ekenaw agganaw koyko loythis.
1CO 7:38 Hessa gisho, geela7iw ekiya uray lo77o oothis; qassi ekonna uray daro lo77o oothis.
1CO 7:39 Machiya ba azinay paxa de7iya wode ubban iyara qashetasu. Shin I azinay hayqiko, ba dosida azina gelanaw danda7awusu. Gidoshin, iya geliya addey ammaniya asi gidanaw bessees.
1CO 7:40 Ta qofan gidiko, iya gelonna de7iko ufaysan daana. Qassi taw, ta bolla Xoossa Ayyaani de7iya daanees.
1CO 8:1 Eeqas yarshetiya kathaba gidiko nu ubbay eroos. Eratethi otorsees, shin siiqoy dichees.
1CO 8:2 Oonika bana erayis gidi qopiko, I buroo eranaw besseysa eribeenna.
1CO 8:3 Shin oonika Xoosse siiqiko, I Xoossa matan eretidaysa.
1CO 8:4 Hessa gisho, eeqas yarshetida kathi muussaba gidiko, ha alamiyan Godi issi Xoossafe attishin, hari bayna gisho, eeqi pathonnaba gideysa nuuni eroos.
1CO 8:5 Xoosse gidonashin, saloninne sa7an xoosse geetetidi xeegetiya daro xoossatinne godati de7ikoka,
1CO 8:6 ubbaba medhida, nu iyabaa gidida, issi Xoossi, Aawi, nuus de7ees. Ubbay iya baggara medhetida, nuka iya baggara de7o demmida issi Goday, Yesuus Kiristoosi nuus de7ees.
1CO 8:7 Shin ha erey ubba matan deenna. Issi issi asay eeqa goyinnora meezetida gisho, kathi miya wode eeqas yarshetidaba oothidi ekoosona. He wode enta kahay daabura gidiya gisho tunees.
1CO 8:8 Shin kathi nuna Xoossara daboyenna. Nu moonna aggidi aykoka qohetoko; qassi midi dumma go7etoko.
1CO 8:9 Shin hinte koydaba maanaw maati hintew de7ikoka hessi ammanon minnonna asata dhubonna mela naagetite.
1CO 8:10 Neeni nena erancho gada eeqas yarshetida kathi maanaw eeqa keethan uttidashin, ammanon minnonna asi nena be7iko, hessi eeqas yarshetida kathi I maana mela denthetheneyee?
1CO 8:11 Hiza, ne eratetha gaason Kiristoosi iya gisho hayqida, ammanon minnonna ne ishay dhayis.
1CO 8:12 Hessada oothidi, ammanon minnonna hinte ishata qohishenne enta kaha madunxisishe Kiristoosa qoheeta.
1CO 8:13 Hessa gisho, kathi ta isha dhubiyaba gidiko, I dhubetonna mela ubbaraka asho miike.
1CO 9:1 Taani yeda de7iya asi gidikina? Ta hawaare gidikina? Taani nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa be7abikina? Hinte Godan ta daabura ayfe gideketii?
1CO 9:2 Hinte Godaaba gidiya gisho, ta haratas hawaare gidonna ixikoka, hintew hawaare gideysas hinte marka.
1CO 9:3 Tana hawaare gidenna geysatas taani immiya zaaroy haysa.
1CO 9:4 Nu hintefe maanawunne uyanaw tuma nuus maati baawee?
1CO 9:5 Hanko hawaaretada, Godaa ishatadanne Phexroosada, ammaniya nu macheta ekidi hemetanaw nuus maati baawee?
1CO 9:6 Woyko oothidi aqanaw bessey taaranne Barnabaasa xalaalee?
1CO 9:7 Ba miishen wotaadaretathi oothey oonee? Woyko woyne tokidi, iyape ayfe moonnay oonee? Woyko wude heemmishe, he wudiyape maathi uyonnay oonee?
1CO 9:8 Taani hessa asa qofatho gaynayee? Muse higgey hessa geeneyee?
1CO 9:9 Muse Higgiyan, “Wuduman kathi yedhiya boora doona qachofa” geetetidi xaafetis. Yaatin Xoossay hessa booras qopidi odidee?
1CO 9:10 Xoossay hessa giday nuus qopidi gidennee? Ee, nu gishosa. Biitta goyeysinne katha geeshsheysi bana gakeysa ekana gidi ufaysan oothanaw bessees geetetidi tuma nu gisho xaafetis.
1CO 9:11 Nuuni hinte giddon ayyaana zerethi zerida gidiko, ashos koshshiyaba nu hintefe ekiko, hessi gitabayee?
1CO 9:12 Harati hessa hintefe ekanaw entaw maati de7iko, nuus entafe aadhiya maati deennee? Shin nuuni Kiristoosa wongelas dhube gidonna mela, ubbaba gencosipe attishin, he maatan go7etibooko.
1CO 9:13 Xoossa keethan oothiya asati banta katha xoossa keethafe ekeysa ereketii? Qassi yarsho bessan oothiya asati yarshuwafe ekeysa ereketii?
1CO 9:14 Hessadaka, wongela markateysati duussas koshshiyaba wongelape ekana mela Goday kiittis.
1CO 9:15 Shin taani ha maata ubban aykoka go7etabike. Taani hessa xaafiday ta maata bonchisanaw koyada gidenna. Oonika ta ceequwa hada oothanaape hayqoy taw lo77o.
1CO 9:16 Taani wongela odey kiitetida gishosafe attishin, tana ceeqisiyaba gidenna. Wongela odonna ixiko, tana ayye!
1CO 9:17 Taani wongela dosada odiko, taw woytoy de7ees. Shin taani wongela dosonna odiyaba gidiko, hessa Xoossi taw hadara immis.
1CO 9:18 Yaatin, ta woytoy aybee? Taani wongela odiya wode ta maatan go7etonna, wongela gatey bayna odeysi taw woyto.
1CO 9:19 Taani oodeska aylle gidike, shin darota maaddanaw ubbaas aylle gidas.
1CO 9:20 Taani Ayhudeta maaddanaw entara enta gidas. Ta huuphen higgefe garsan de7ike, shin higgefe garsan de7eyisata maaddanaw higgefe garsan de7iya asi gidas.
1CO 9:21 Xoossa higgiyafe kare keyonna, Kiristoosa higgiyas kiitetashe, higgey baynayisata maaddanaw higgey bayna asada hanas.
1CO 9:22 Taani daaburanchota maaddanaw daaburancho gidas. Taani issota issota maaddanaw ubbaara ubbaba hanas.
1CO 9:23 Taani wongela anjuwa shaaketanaw, wongela gisho, ha ubbaa hanas.
1CO 9:24 Wothan gaaddetiya ubbay woxees, shin issuwa xalaali woyto ekeysa ereketii? Hessada hinteka woyto ekanaw woxite.
1CO 9:25 Gaaddetiya asa ubbay ubbaban bantana haarees. Enti hessa daaburey dhayiya woyto ekanaasa. Shin nuuni daaburey merina woyto ekanaasa.
1CO 9:26 Hessa gisho, taani qofi bayna asada woxike. Carko yimpiya asada coo kushe yeddike.
1CO 9:27 Shin taani haratas wongela odidaape guye, taani ta huuphen yegetida asi gidonna mela ta asatethaa wolqan haarada taw kiitetana mela oothayis.
1CO 10:1 Ta ishato, taani hinte haysa akeekana mela koyayis. Nu mayzati ubbay shaarape garsara hemetidosona; ubbay abba pinnidosona.
1CO 10:2 Enti Musera issifanaw shaaraninne abban xammaqetidosona.
1CO 10:3 Enti ubbay issi ayyaana kathi midosona.
1CO 10:4 Qassi ubbay issi ayyaana ushsha uyidosona. Enti bantana kaalliya ayyaana zaallafe pultida ushsha uyidosona; he zaallayka Kiristoosa.
1CO 10:5 Shin Xoossay entafe darotan ufaytiboonna gisho, enta ahay mela biittan wodhidi attis.
1CO 10:6 Enti iitaba amotidaysada, nuka iitaba amottonna mela he ubbay nuus leemiso gidis.
1CO 10:7 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Asay maanawunne uyanaw uttidosona; qassi yexanaw dendidosona” geetetidaysada entafe issoti issoti eeqa goyinnidaysa mela hinte eeqa goyinnofite.
1CO 10:8 Entafe issoti issoti laymatidaysada nu laymatanaw bessenna. Hessa gaason entafe issi gallas laatamanne heedzu mukulay hayqis.
1CO 10:9 Entafe issoti issoti Godaa paacidi shooshan duketidi hayqidaysada nu Godaa paacanaw bessenna.
1CO 10:10 Entafe issoti issoti zuuzumidi hayqo ehiya kiitanchuwan dhayidaysada hinteka zuuzumofite.
1CO 10:11 Ha enta bolla gakida ubbay nu naagetana mela nuus leemiso gidis. Qassi wode wursethaa bolla de7iya nuus timirte gidana mela ha ubbay xaafetis.
1CO 10:12 Hessa gisho, ta eqas giya oonika kundonna mela bana naago.
1CO 10:13 Ase ubbaa gakiya paacepe attishin, dumma paacey hintena gakibeenna. Hinte wolqay danda7eysafe aadhiya paacen hinte paacetonna mela aathidi immonna Xoossay ammanetidaysa. Hintena paacey gakiya wode he paaciya I hintena danda7isana. Qassi he paaciyape hinte keyana ogiya I giigisana.
1CO 10:14 Hiza, ta al7o ishato, eeqa goyinnofe haakite.
1CO 10:15 Hinte wozanaama asi gidida gisho ta haysa odayis. Taani geysi tuma gideysa hinte hinte huuphen pirdite.
1CO 10:16 Nuuni Xoossaa galatidi shaaketiya anjo xuu7ay Kiristoosa suuthara issifetethi de7eysa gidenneyee? Qassi nuuni bathiya uythay Kiristoosa ashuwara issifetethi de7eysa gidenneyee?
1CO 10:17 Nuuni daro gidikoka uythay issino, nu he issi uytha shaaketiya gisho issi asatethi.
1CO 10:18 Ane Isra7eele asay oothidaysa akeekite. Yarshetida yarshuwa meysati yarsho bessaara issifetethi baaweyee?
1CO 10:19 Taani ay gaanaw koyada gayna? Eeqas yarshetida kathay woyko eeqay pathiyaba guusseyee?
1CO 10:20 Gidenna, enti yarshey Xoossas gidonashin, tuna ayyaanatasa. Hessa gisho, hintew tuna ayyaanatara issifetethi daana mela koyke.
1CO 10:21 Hinte Godaa xuu7ape uyishe, qassi tuna ayyaanata xuu7ape uyanaw danda7eketa. Godaa gaytape mishe qassi tuna ayyaanata gaytape maanaw danda7eketa.
1CO 10:22 Nuuni hessa oothidi Godaa yiloyno? Nuuni iyape aadhiya minoyee?
1CO 10:23 Hinte, “Ubbabaa oothonna mela diggiyabay baawa” geeta, shin ubbay maaddenna. Hinte, “Ubbabaa oothonna mela diggiyabay baawa” geeta, shin ubbay dichenna.
1CO 10:24 Issi issi asi, hara asi maaddiyaba qopanaw besseesipe attishin, bana maaddiyaba xalaala qopofo.
1CO 10:25 Hinte kaha sidhen gelsiya oysha denthonna giyan bayzetiya ashuwa coo miite.
1CO 10:26 Ayis giiko, sa7inne sa7an de7iya ubbay Godaaba.
1CO 10:27 Issi ammanonna asi hintena imatanaw koydi xeegiko baanaw koyko biite. Hinte kahan medhetiya oyshan sidhonna hinte sinthe aathiyaba ubba miite.
1CO 10:28 Shin issi asi, “Haysi eeqas yarshetidaba” giiko, he hintew odida addiya gishonne kaha gisho he katha moopite.
1CO 10:29 Taani, kaha gisho gey, he hintew odida ura kaha guussufe attishin, hinte kaha gidenna. Hara asa kaha gisho gada taani ta la77atetha bolla ayis pirdo?
1CO 10:30 Taani miya katha Xoossa galatada miiko balidada ayis boretiyana?
1CO 10:31 Hiza, hinte ay miiko ay uyiko, woyko ay oothikoka ubbaba Xoossa bonchoos oothite.
1CO 10:32 Ayhudeta gidin Giriketa gidin woyko Xoossa woosa keethi gidin oodeska dhube gidopite.
1CO 10:33 Taani ubba wode darota ashshanaw enti maadetiya oge koyaysipe attishin tana maaddiya oge koyke.
1CO 11:1 Taani Kiristoosa leemisuwa kaalleysada, hinteka tana kaallite.
1CO 11:2 Hinte ubbaban tana qopiya gishonne taani tamaarsida timirtiya minthidi naagida gisho taani hintena galatayis.
1CO 11:3 Shin Kiristoosi adde ubbaas huuphe, addey maccasas huuphe, qassi Xoossi Kiristoosas huuphe gideysa hinte erana mela koyayis.
1CO 11:4 Ba huuphiya guuluntidi Xoosse woossiya woyko tinbite odiya addey ubbay huuphe gidida Kiristoosa toochees.
1CO 11:5 Ba huuphiya qaconna Xoosse woossiya woyko tinbite odiya maccasiya huuphe gidida ba azina toochawusu. Ba huuphiya qaconna maccasiya ba huuphiya meedetida maccasa mela.
1CO 11:6 Maccasi ba huuphe kammonna ixiko, ba huuphiya qanxeto. Shin iw huuphe qanxoy woyko meedoy borso gidiko, ba huuphiya qaco.
1CO 11:7 Addey Xoossa leemisonne Xoossa boncho gidiya gisho, ba huuphiya kammanaw bessenna, shin maccasi addes boncho.
1CO 11:8 Maccasi addefe medhetasupe attishin, addey maccasape medhetibeenna.
1CO 11:9 Maccasi addes medhetisipe attishin, addey maccasas medhetibeenna.
1CO 11:10 Haysa gishonne kiitanchota gisho maccasi baw maati de7eysa bessiya malla ba huuphen qacanaw bessees.
1CO 11:11 Shin Godaa qofan maccasi addey bayna deenna; addeyka maccasi bayna deenna.
1CO 11:12 Maccasi addefe medhetidaysada addeyka maccasape yeletis. Shin ubbayka Xoossafe medhetis.
1CO 11:13 Ane hinte pirdite; maccasi ba huuphe kammonna Xoossa woossanaw bessii?
1CO 11:14 Addey ba huuphiya dichiko iyaw borso gideysa hari attoshin medhetethi hintena tamaarsennee?
1CO 11:15 Shin maccasi ba huuphe dichiko iw boncho gidennee? Maccasas huuphey imetiday iya bana kammana melasa.
1CO 11:16 Shin haysa bolla palamanaw koya asi de7iko, nuus gidin woyko Xoossa woosa keethatas gidin haysafe hara wogi baawa.
1CO 11:17 Hinte issife shiiqey go77as gidonashin qohos gidiya gisho, ha77i taani immiya kiitan hintena nashike.
1CO 11:18 Taani koyro si7iday, woosa keethan shiiqiya wode hinte giddon shaaketethi de7eysa. Ha ta si7idaysi tuma gideysa ammanayis.
1CO 11:19 Hinte giddofe tumi de7eysati oonanteko eretana mela hinte giddon shaahoy daanaysi attenna.
1CO 11:20 Hinte issife shiiqiya wode hinte shiiqey Godaa kahuwa maanasa gidenna.
1CO 11:21 Hinte kathi miya wode issoy issuwa naagonna baysa baysa miya gisho, issoy koshatees hankoy qassi mathotees.
1CO 11:22 Tuma hinte maanawunne uyanaw hintew keethi baawee? Woyko Xoossa woosa keethi kadheetii? Aykoy bayna manqota yeellayetii? Ta hintena woygo? Haysas ta hintena nashoyee? Nashshike.
1CO 11:23 Taani hintew immida timirtiya Godaape ekas. Goday Yesuusi aadhidi imetiya qamma uythu ekidi,
1CO 11:24 Xoossaa galatis. Uythaa bathidi “He7ite; miite. Haysi hintew imetiya ta ashuwa. Haysa mishe tana hassayite” yaagis.
1CO 11:25 Hessadaka, kahuwa midi simmin, xuu7aa ekidi, “Haysi xuu7ay ta suuthan eqiya ooratha caaquwa. Hinte iyape uyaa wode ubban tana hassayite” yaagis.
1CO 11:26 Hinte ha uytha miya wodenne ha xuu7a uyaa wode ubban Goday yaana gakanaw iya hayquwa odeeta.
1CO 11:27 Hessa gisho, bessonna ogen Godaa uytha miya woyko Godaa xuu7a uya oonika iya ashuwanne suutha toochida gisho ba nagaran oyshetees.
1CO 11:28 Shin asi bana paaco. Yaatidi uytha mo; xuu7ape uyo.
1CO 11:29 Godaa ashuwaba shaakidi eronna, uytha meynne xuu7ape uyey, ba bolla pirda meesinne uyees.
1CO 11:30 Hessa gisho, hinte giddofe daroti daaburidosona; hargidosona; qassi undenna asati hayqidosona.
1CO 11:31 Shin nuuni nuna paacidi be7idaba gidiyako, nu bolla pirdetanashin.
1CO 11:32 Alamey pirdetiya wode nuuni alamiyara pirdetonna mela ha77i Goday nuna seerees.
1CO 11:33 Hessa gisho, ta ishato, Godaa kahuwa ekanaw hinte shiiqiya wode issoy issuwa naagidi ekite.
1CO 11:34 Hinte shiiqoy pirdas gidonna mela koshatida oonika de7iko, ba son mo. Attidaba taani yaa bada hintew odana.
1CO 12:1 Ta ishato, Geeshsha Ayyaana imotataba hinte erana mela ta koyas.
1CO 12:2 Hinte Xoossaa ammanonna wode dooni bayna eeqatan gooshetidi, hinte eronna soo bidaysa ereeta.
1CO 12:3 Xoossaa Ayyaanay kaalethiya asi oonika, “Yesuusi baadeto” yaagenna. Qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanay kaalethonna de7ishin, oonika, “Yesuusi Godaa” gaanaw danda7onaysa hinte erana mela koyayis.
1CO 12:4 Dumma dumma Ayyaana imotati de7oosona, shin imotata immiya Ayyaanay issuwa.
1CO 12:5 Nu Godaas oothiya dumma dumma oosoti de7oosona, shin Goday issuwa.
1CO 12:6 Nu Godaas oothiya dumma dumma ogeti de7oosona, shin he ogetan oothiya asa ubban oothiya Xoossay issuwa.
1CO 12:7 Shin issuwas issuwas imetida imotatan harata maaddana mela Geeshsha Ayyaanay qoncees.
1CO 12:8 Geeshsha Ayyaanay issuwas cincatethi kumida qaala immees; qassi issuwas eratethi kumida qaala immees.
1CO 12:9 He Geeshsha Ayyaanay issuwas ammano, hankuwas qassi pathiya wolqaa immees.
1CO 12:10 Geeshsha Ayyaanay issuwas malaata oothiya wolqaa, issuwas tinbite odiya wolqaa immees. Issuwas ayyaanape ayyaana shaaki eriya wolqaa, issuwas dumma dumma doonan odiya wolqaa, qassi issuwas dumma dumma doonan odetidaysa birshiya wolqaa immees.
1CO 12:11 Shin ha ubbaa oothey he issi Geeshsha Ayyaana. I koyiya mela issi issi asaas dumma dumma imota immees.
1CO 12:12 Issi asatethan daro billiteti de7oosona, shin he dumma dumma billiteti issi asatethi gidoosona. Hessadaka, Kiristoosi dumma dumma billiteti de7iya asatethaa mela.
1CO 12:13 Nuuni Ayhude gidin Girike gidin aylle gidin womaanno gidin, ubbay issi asatethi gidanaw Geeshsha Ayyaanan xammaqetida. Qassi nu ubbay issi Geeshsha Ayyaana ekida.
1CO 12:14 Nu asatethan dumma dumma billiteti de7oosonape attishin, issi billite gidenna.
1CO 12:15 Tohoy, “Taani kushe gidonna gisho billite gidike” giiko, I hessa gida gisho billitetethay attiyee?
1CO 12:16 Haythi, “Taani ayfe gidonna gisho billite gidike” giiko, I hessa gida gisho asatethafe issi billite gideysi attiyee?
1CO 12:17 Asatetha ubbay ayfe xalaala gididaako, nu aybin si7anee? Qassi asatethi ubbay haytha xalaala gididaako nu aybin singanee?
1CO 12:18 Shin Xoossay ba koydaysada, asatethaa giddon dumma dumma billiteta wothis.
1CO 12:19 Ubbay issi billite gididaako asatethi waanidi daanee?
1CO 12:20 Shin billiteti daro gidikoka, asatethay issuwa.
1CO 12:21 Ayfey kusheko, “Ne taw koshshaka” gaanaw danda7enna. Woyko huuphey tohoko, “Ne taw koshshaka” gaanaw danda7enna.
1CO 12:22 Shin daabura daaniya asatethaa billiteti nuus aadhidi koshshosona.
1CO 12:23 Boncho koshshenna gidi nu qopiya nu billitetape baggata daro bonchoos. Qassi nu borsetiya nu asatethaa billiteta aathidi bonchidi naagoos.
1CO 12:24 Nu be7in borsonna asatethaa billitetas boncho koshshenna. Shin Xoossay nu asatethaa billiteta wolira gasethidi borsiya billitetas aadhiya boncho immis.
1CO 12:25 Asatetha billiteti issoy issuwara shaako medhonna wolis qopana mela oothidi medhis.
1CO 12:26 Asatetha billitetape issoy saketiko billiteti ubbay iyara saketoosona. Asatetha billitetape issoy bonchetiko billiteti ubbay iyara ufaytoosona.
1CO 12:27 Hinte ubbay Kiristoosa asatethi; qassi hinte issoy issoy iya billiteta.
1CO 12:28 Woosa keethan Xoossay, koyro hawaareta, nam7antho nabeta, heedzantho astamaareta, kaallidi malaata ootheyisata, patheyisata, harata maaddeyisata, woosa keetha ayseysatanne, dumma dumma doonan odeteyisata wothis.
1CO 12:29 Ubbay hawaaree? Ubbay nabee? Ubbay astamaaree? Ubbay malaata oothii?
1CO 12:30 Ubbay pathiyee? Ubbay dumma dumma doonan odeetii? Ubbay dumma dumma doonan odetoysa birshii?
1CO 12:31 Shin ubbaafe aadhiya imota minthidi koyite. Qassi ubbaafe aadhiya ogiya ta hintena bessaana.
1CO 13:1 Taani asa qaalanne kiitancho qaala odetanaw danda7ikoka, taw siiqoy dhayiko, coo giiriya daala mela.
1CO 13:2 Tinbite odiya imoti taw de7ikoka, xuura ubbaa erikoka, eratethi ubbay de7ikoka, qassi deriya denthidi haraso efiya ammanoy taw de7ikoka, siiqoy dhayiko, ta aykoka gidike.
1CO 13:3 Taw de7iyaba ubbaa manqotas immikoka, hari attoshin, tana tamas aatha immikoka, siiqoy dhayiko tana aykoka maaddenna.
1CO 13:4 Siiqoy danda7ancho. Siiqoy keeha. Siiqoy qanaatenna. Siiqoy ceeqetenna. Siiqoy otorenna.
1CO 13:5 Siiqoy bessonnaba oothenna. Siiqoy uuzetenna. Siiqoy yilotenna. Siiqoy ba qoho paydenna.
1CO 13:6 Siiqoy tuman ufaytesipe attishin, wordon ufaytenna.
1CO 13:7 Siiqoy ubbaa danda7ees; ubbaa ammanees; lo77obay hanana gidi, ufaysan naagees; ubbaa gencees.
1CO 13:8 Siiqoy wursethi gakanaw dhayenna. Shin tinbitey attana; dumma dumma doonan odeteysi attana; eratethika aadhana.
1CO 13:9 Nu eratethaafe guuthi eroos; tinbitepe baggaa odoos.
1CO 13:10 Shin polo gididaysi yaa wode polo gidonnaysi attana.
1CO 13:11 Taani na7a de7iya wode na7ada haasayis; na7ada qopayis; na7ada akeekayis. Ta kahaamida wode na7atetha hanuwa aggas.
1CO 13:12 Ha77i poo7oy bayna son mastooten be7eysada be7oos, shin he wode nu qoncen be7ana. Ha77i nu eratethaafe guutha eroos, shin he wode Xoossay nuna ereysada polo erana.
1CO 13:13 Hiza, ammanoy, ufaysinne siiqoy, ha heedzati eqidi daana. Shin haysatape aadhey siiqo.
1CO 14:1 Siiqo kaallite. Ayyaana imotata minthidi koyite; ubbaafe aathidi, tinbite imota minthidi koyite.
1CO 14:2 Dumma dumma doonan odetiya asi Xoossaas odeesipe attishin, asas odenna. Shin asas qonciboonna xuuraa Ayyaana wolqan odetiya gisho, oonika I odeteysa akeekenna.
1CO 14:3 Shin tinbite odeysati ase dichanaw, minthethanawunne minthanaw asas odees.
1CO 14:4 Dumma dumma doonan odiya asi bana dichees. Shin tinbite odiya asi woosa keethaa dichees.
1CO 14:5 Hinte ubbay dumma dumma doonan odetiyako ta dosayis, shin tinbite odanaysa aathada dosayis. Dumma dumma doonan odeteysa woosa keethi dichanaw birshiya asi dhayiko, dumma dumma doona odeteysafe tinbite odeysi aadhees.
1CO 14:6 Shin ta ishato, taani hinteko bada, qoncethan woyko eratethan woyko tinbite odon woyko timirten gidonashin, dumma dumma doonan odetiko hintena ay maaddanee?
1CO 14:7 Dumma dumma yetha miishetas issi qommo girsi de7iko, suusul7e girsinne diitha girsi waatidi shaaki eranee?
1CO 14:8 Qassi moyze punoy geeyidi eretonna ixiko olas giigetey oonee?
1CO 14:9 Hessadaka, dumma dumma doonan hinte odeteysi qonce gidonna ixiko hinte odeysa ooni eranee? Hessi carkos odiya mela.
1CO 14:10 Ha alamiyan daro doonati de7oosona; he ubbaas birshethi de7ees.
1CO 14:11 Shin issi asi odetiya doona taani eronna ixiko I taw imathe gidees; taka iyaw imathe gidayis.
1CO 14:12 Hessadaka, Geeshsha Ayyaana imota hinte ekanaw minthidi koyko, woosa keethi dichanaw ubbaafe aadhiya imota koyite.
1CO 14:13 Dumma dumma doonan odetiya asi ba odaa birshanaw birshetha imotay imetana mela Xoossaa woosso.
1CO 14:14 Taani dumma dumma doonan Xoossaa woossiko, ta ayyaanay woossees, shin ta wozanay aykoka go7etenna.
1CO 14:15 Yaatin, ta ay oothanaw koshshii? Taani ta ayyaanan woossayis; ta wozananka woossayis. Taani ta ayyaanan yexayis; ta wozananka yexayis.
1CO 14:16 Hessa gidonna ixiko neeni ne ayyaanan Xoossaa galatiya wode he bessan neeni geysa eronna asi ne galateysa woygidi, “Amin7i” gaanee?
1CO 14:17 Neeni Xoossaa galateysi lo77o, shin hara asi maaddenna.
1CO 14:18 Ta hinte ubbaafe aathada dumma dumma doonan odetiya gisho Xoossaa galatayis.
1CO 14:19 Shin taani woosa keethan harata tamaarsanaw dumma dumma doonan tammu mukulu qaala odetanaape ichashu qaala eretiya doonan odetanaw dosayis.
1CO 14:20 Ta ishato, hinte qofan naytada hanopite. Hinte iitabas naytada hanitepe attishin, hinte qofan kahaamata gidite.
1CO 14:21 Goday, Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Taani ha asaas, dumma dumma doonan odetiya asaaninne imatha inxarsan odetiya asan odana. Shin hessi haninika tana si7okona” yaagees.
1CO 14:22 Hiza, dumma dumma doonan haasayoy, ammanonna asaas malla gideesipe attishin, ammaniya asaasa gidenna. Tinbitey ammaniya asaas malla gideesipe attishin, ammanonna asaasa gidenna.
1CO 14:23 Woosa keethaa asay issife shiiqiya wode, ubbay dumma dumma doonan odetiko eronna woyko ammanonna asay hinte shiiquwa yidi, “Haysati gooyosona” gookonayee?
1CO 14:24 Shin eronna woyko ammanonna asay woosa keethi yaa wode asay tinbite odishin, si7iko ba nagaraa akeekana; qassi I si7ida qaalan pirdetana.
1CO 14:25 Enti iya wozanan geemmida qofaa qoncisana. Hessadaka, “Tuma Xoossay hinte giddon de7ees” yaagidi markatidi, gufannidi Xoossaas goyinnana.
1CO 14:26 Ta ishato, nu woygino? Hinte issife shiiqiya wode issuwas mazmurey de7ees; issuwas tamaarso imoti de7ees; issuwas qoncethi de7ees; issuwas dumma dumma doonan haasayoy de7ees; issuwas birshetha imoti de7ees. He ubbay woosa keethi dichiyaba gidanaw bessees.
1CO 14:27 Dumma dumma doonan odetiya asati de7iko, nam7a woyko dariko heedza gididi maaran maaran odetanaw bessees. Enti odeteysa hara asi birsho.
1CO 14:28 Shin birshiya asi dhayiko, dumma dumma doonan odeteysi woosa keethan si77i go. Bawunne ba Xoossaas odo.
1CO 14:29 Tinbite odeysati nam7a woyko heedza gididi odo. Qassi harati enti giyaba pirdona.
1CO 14:30 He shiiquwan de7iya hara asas issibay qonciko kase odeteysi si77i go.
1CO 14:31 Ubbay tamaarana melanne ubbay minnana mela maaran maaran tinbite odanaw danda7eeta.
1CO 14:32 Nabeta ayyaanay nabetas kiitetees.
1CO 14:33 Geeshshata woosa keetha ubbay meezetidaysada Xoossay sarotetha Xoossaafe attishin, buqethi medhiya Xoossi gidenna.
1CO 14:34 Maccasi woosa keethan si77i go. Muse higgey geysada enti haaretofe attishin, woosa keethan odanaw entaw maati baawa.
1CO 14:35 Maccasi woosa keethan haasayoy borso gidiya gisho issiba eranaw koyko son banta azinata oychonna.
1CO 14:36 Xoossaa qaala koyro hinte ehidetii? Woyko Xoossaa qaalay hinte xalaalako yidee?
1CO 14:37 Oonika bana nabe woyko bana Xoossaa asi gidi qopiko, taani hintew xaafeysi Godaa kiitta gideysa akeeko.
1CO 14:38 Shin oonika akeekona ixiko ika akeeketofo.
1CO 14:39 Hessa gisho, ta ishato, tinbite odanaw minthidi amotite; qassi dumma dumma doonan odeteysaka diggofite.
1CO 14:40 Shin ubbayka woganinne maaran gido.
1CO 15:1 Ta ishato, ta hintew markatida wongela hinte ekidaysanne hinte ammanoy iyan eqidaysa hinte akeekana mela taani koyayis.
1CO 15:2 Ta tamaarsida wongela minthidi oykiko hinte iyan attana. Hessi hanonna ixiko hinte ammanoy hada gidana.
1CO 15:3 Taani ekida ubbaafe aadhiya kiitaa kasetada hintew immas. Hessika, Geeshsha Maxaafay geysada, Kiristoosi nu nagaraa gisho hayqis.
1CO 15:4 Moogetis; Geeshsha Maxaafay geysada, heedzantho gallasan hayqope dendis.
1CO 15:5 Phexroosas qoncis. Hessafe guye, tammanne nam7u hawaaretas qoncis.
1CO 15:6 Hessafe guye, ichashu xeetape dariya asaas issitoho qoncis. Entafe dariya baggay ha77i gakanaw paxa de7oosona, shin guuthati hayqidosona.
1CO 15:7 Hessafe guye, Yayqoobas qoncis; guyepe ba hawaareta ubbaas qoncis.
1CO 15:8 Qassi wursethan awucaya mela gidida taw qoncis.
1CO 15:9 Taani Yesuusa hawaareta ubbaafe laafa. Taani Xoossaa woosa keethaa gooddida gisho Yesuusa hawaare geetetada xeegetanaw bessonnaysa.
1CO 15:10 Shin Xoossaa aadho keehatethan ta ha77i gididaysa gidas; I taw immida aadho keehatethay mela attibeenna. Taani hanko hawaaretape aathada daaburas. Shin taara de7iya Xoossaa aadho keehatethay oothisipe attishin, tana gidike.
1CO 15:11 Hiza, tana gidin enti, nu ubbay tamaarsey hessa; hinteka he kiitaa ammanideta.
1CO 15:12 Kiristoosi hayqope dendidaysa nu sabbakiya wode hintefe issoti issoti yaatin, woygidi, “Hayqope dendoy baawa” yaagona?
1CO 15:13 Hayqope dendoy baynaba gidiko Kiristoosi hayqope dendibeenna guussu.
1CO 15:14 Kiristoosi hayqope dendiboonaba gidiko nu timirtey qassi hinte ammanoyka hada.
1CO 15:15 Hayqope dendoy baynashin, nuuni Xoossay, “Kiristoosa hayqope denthis” yaagidi sabbakishe Xoossaa wordancho markata gidida guussu.
1CO 15:16 Hayqida asay hayqope dendiboonaba gidiko hiza, Kiristoosi hayqope dendibeenna.
1CO 15:17 Kiristoosi hayqope dendonaba gidiko, hinte ammanoy hada; qassi hinte ha77i gakanaw hinte nagaran de7eeta.
1CO 15:18 Hiza, Kiristoosa ammanidi hayqidaysatika dhayidosona guussu.
1CO 15:19 Nuuni ha alamiya de7uwa xalaalas Kiristoosan ufaysi oothidaba gidiko, ha sa7an de7iya asa ubbaafe nubay aadhida yibbata.
1CO 15:20 Shin Kiristoosi hayqidaysatas hayqope dendon bayra gididi tuma dendis.
1CO 15:21 Hayqoy issi asa baggara ha alamiya yidaysada hayqope dendoy issi asa baggara yis.
1CO 15:22 Addaame baggara asa ubbay hayqidaysada Kiristoosa baggara asa ubbay de7on daana.
1CO 15:23 Shin issoy issoy ba maaran maaran dendana. Kiristoosi ubbaafe kasetidi dendis; hessafe guye, Kiristoosaysati I yaa wode dendana.
1CO 15:24 Hessafe guye, Kiristoosi halaqatethi, maatanne wolqa ubbaa dhaysidi, kawotethaa Xoossa Aawas immiya wode wodiya wursethay yaana.
1CO 15:25 Xoossay iya morketa ubbaa iya tohuwape garsan wothana gakanaw Kiristoosi haaranaw bessees.
1CO 15:26 Wursethan I dhaysanaw de7iya morkey hayqo.
1CO 15:27 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Xoossay ubbaba iya maatape garsan haarisis” geetetidi xaafetis. Shin ubbaa iya maatape garsan haarisis geysi, ubbaba iya maatape garsan haarisida Xoossaa gujenna.
1CO 15:28 Ubbabay Kiristoosa maatape garsan haaretidaape guye Kiristoosi qassi ba huuphen ubbaba baw haarisida Xoossaas haaretana. He wode Xoossay ba xalaala ubbaa haarana.
1CO 15:29 Hayqidaysati dendonaba gidiko enta gisho xammaqetiya asaas ayba wodhey de7ii? Hayqidaysati dendonaba gidiko yaatin, ayis, asay hayqidaysata gisho xammaqetoona?
1CO 15:30 Yaatin, nuuni ayis ubba wode nunatethaa metos aathidi immoona?
1CO 15:31 Ta ishato, ta gallas gallas hayqos aadhada imetayis. Hessika, Godaa Kiristoos Yesuusan de7iya de7uwa issifetethan hintenan ceeqiya gishosa.
1CO 15:32 Asa qofatho gidiko, taani Efesoonan do7ara butetidaysi tana ay maaddii? Hayqidaysati hayqope dendonaba gidiko, “Wonto nu hayqiya gisho hachi maana uyana” giya asaa mela gidoos.
1CO 15:33 Cimetofite! Iita laggetethi lo77o amale iissees.
1CO 15:34 Hinte akeekako simmite. Nagara oothopite. Hintefe issi issi asay Xoossaa erokona. Taani hintena yeellayanaw hessa gayis.
1CO 15:35 Issi asi, “Hayqida asay waanidi dendanee? Enti ay mela asatethara yaanee?” yaagonna aggenna.
1CO 15:36 Neno eeyaw, neeni biittan zeriya zerethay hayqonna dolenna.
1CO 15:37 Neeni zerey giste gidin woyko hara katha qommo ayfe xalaala zerasaape attishin, dolida dolaa gidenna.
1CO 15:38 Shin Xoossay zerethaas ba dosida mela medhetethi immees. Dumma dumma zerethaas dumma dumma asatethi immees.
1CO 15:39 Medhetetha ubbaa ashoy isso gidenna. Shin asa ashoy issuwa; mehe ashoy dumma; kafota ashoy dumma; qassi molo ashoy dumma.
1CO 15:40 Salo asatethi de7ees; qassi sa7a asatethi de7ees. Shin salo asatethaa bonchoy dumma; qassi sa7a asatethaa bonchoy dumma.
1CO 15:41 Awa bonchoy dumma; ageena bonchoy dumma; xoolintota bonchoy dumma; issi xoolintoy hanko xoolintuwafe bonchon dummatees.
1CO 15:42 Hayqidaysati hayqope dendiya wode hessada hanana. Hayqiya asatethay zeretees; hayqonna asatethi gididi dendees.
1CO 15:43 Tooshen zeretidi, bonchon dendana; daaburan zeretidi, wolqan dendana.
1CO 15:44 Medhetetha asatethay zeretidi, ayyaana asatethi gididi dendana. Medheta asatethi de7iko, ayyaana asatethi de7ees.
1CO 15:45 Hessadaka, Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Koyro addey, Addaamey, paxa de7iya ase gididi medhetis” yaagees. Shin wursetha Addaamey, Kiristoosi, de7o immiya ayyaana gidis.
1CO 15:46 Shin medheta asi koyro yin, guyepe ayyaana asi yisipe attishin, ayyaana asi koyro yibeenna.
1CO 15:47 Koyro Addaamey biittafe medhetida biitta asi; nam7antho Addaamey salope yida salo asi.
1CO 15:48 Biittafe medhetidaysati biittafe medhetidaysa daanosona. Saloysati salope yidaysa daanosona.
1CO 15:49 Nuuni biittafe medhetida addiya daaneysa mela salope yida addiya daanana.
1CO 15:50 Ta ishato, ta geysi hessa; ha77i nu ma7ida asatethay Xoossaa kawotethaa laattanaw danda7enna. Wooqiya asatethay wooqonna asatethaa laattenna.
1CO 15:51 Ta hintew issi xuura odana. Nu ubbay hayqoko, shin wursethan ubbay laametana.
1CO 15:52 Moyzey punetiya wode, ayfey qiphi xeellanaw hassayonna laametana. Hayqida asay wooqonna asi gididi dendana; nuka laametana.
1CO 15:53 Haysi wooqeysi wooqonnaysa, haysi hayqeysi hayqonnaysa ma7anaw bessees.
1CO 15:54 Haysi wooqeysi wooqonnaysa, qassi haysi hayqeysi hayqonnaysa ma7iya wode, Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Hayqoy xoonon mitetis” giya qaalay poletana.
1CO 15:55 Hessadaka, “Hayqo, ne xoonoy awun de7ii? Hayqo, ne qohiya wolqay awun de7ii?” gida qaalay poletana.
1CO 15:56 Hayqoy dukiya wolqay nagara; qassi nagara wolqay higge.
1CO 15:57 Shin nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara nuus xoono immiya Xoossaa galati gako.
1CO 15:58 Hessa gisho, ta siiqo ishato, qaaxonna minnidi eqite. Godaa oosuwan hinte daabureysi coo gidonnaysa eridi ubba wode Godaa oosuwa azallonna oothite.
1CO 16:1 Ammaniya asaas miishe shiishobaa Galatiya woosa keethatas taani kiittidaysada hinteka oothite.
1CO 16:2 Miishiya shiishoy ta hinteko biya wode gidonna mela issoy issoy saamintafe koyro gallas, wogga wode, wogga wode, ba demmeysafe kessidi ba son dagayo.
1CO 16:3 Taani yaa bida wode miishiya Yerusalaame gathana mela hinte dooriya asaas dabdaabe immada enta Yerusalaame kiittana.
1CO 16:4 Entara ta buussay koshshiyaba gidiko enti taara baanaw danda7oosona.
1CO 16:5 Taani Maqedoonera aadhanaw qopida gisho, yaa bada hinteko yaana.
1CO 16:6 Ta biya bessa aw gidikoka, ta buussan hinte tana maaddana mela hinte matan guutha wode gam7onna aggike. Balgo ageenata hinte matan aathona waaya aggana.
1CO 16:7 Taani ogera aadhashe hintena be7anaw koyke. Goday giiko, hinte matan guutha wode takanaw qopayis.
1CO 16:8 Shin taani Phanxeqosxe Ba7aaley gakanaw Efesoonan gam7ana.
1CO 16:9 Taw oosoy kumida dalga pengey dooyetis, shin daro eqetiya morketi de7oosona.
1CO 16:10 I ta mela Godaa ooso oothiya asi gidiya gisho, Ximotiyoosi hinteko biiko, hinte matan I hirgonna daana mela oothite.
1CO 16:11 Oonika iya kadhopo. I taako saro simmana mela iya maaddidi moyzite. Taani I hanko ammaneysatara simmanaysa naagayis.
1CO 16:12 Nu ishaa Aphiloosi hanko ammaneysatara hinteko baana mela ta iya mintha woossas. Ha77i hinteko baanaw koybeenna, shin iyaw injetiya wode hinteko baana.
1CO 16:13 Barkite; Ammanon eqite; xaalite; minnite.
1CO 16:14 Ooso ubbaa siiqon oothite.
1CO 16:15 Ta ishato, Isxifaanoseynne iya soo asay Akayan enti koyro ammanidaysata gideysanne ammaneyisata maaddanaw bantana aathidi immidaysa hinte ereeta.
1CO 16:16 Hinteka enta mela asaasinne, entara ooson daaburiya ubbaas kiitetana mela ta hintena woossayis.
1CO 16:17 Isxifaanosey, Ferdonaxisinne Akayqoosi taako yidaysi tana ufaysis. Hinte bayna bessan enti hintena gididi ta pacaa kunthidosona.
1CO 16:18 Enti hintena ufaysidaysada tanaka ufaysidosona. Hessa mela asata dogopite.
1CO 16:19 Iise woosa keetha asay hintena saro goosona. Aqilinne Phirisqilla banta son shiiqiya woosa keetha asaara issife hintena Godaa sunthan wozanape sarothoosona.
1CO 16:20 Ammaniya ishati ubbay hintena saro yaagosona. Geeshsha yeeretethi yeeretishe issoy issuwa sarothite.
1CO 16:21 Taani, Phawuloosi, ha sarothuwa ta kushen xaafas.
1CO 16:22 Godaa dosonna asi de7iko, baadetidaysa gido. Nu Godaw, haaya!
1CO 16:23 Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa aadho keehatethay hintera gido.
1CO 16:24 Ta siiqoy Kiristoos Yesuusan de7iya hinte ubbaara gido. Amin7i.
2CO 1:1 Xoossa shenen Yesuus Kiristoosa hawaare gidida Phawuloosinne, nu ishaa Ximotiyoosi, Qorontoosan de7iya Xoossaa woosa keethaasinne Akaya biittan de7iya Xoossaa asa ubbaas xaafida kiitaa.
2CO 1:2 Xoossaa nu Aawapenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosape, aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hintew gido.
2CO 1:3 Maarotetha Aawas, ubba wode nuna minthethiya Xoossaas, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa Aawas galati gido.
2CO 1:4 Xoossay nuus immida minthethuwan, meton de7eyisata nu minthethana mela Xoossay nuna nu meto ubban minthethees.
2CO 1:5 Nuuni Kiristoosa daro waayiya shaaketidaysada qassi nuuni iya daro minthethuwan minnana.
2CO 1:6 Nuuni waayetiko hessi hintena minthethanaasanne hintena ashshanaasa. Qassi nuuni minetiko nuuni gencida waayiya mela hinteka gencidi, Xoossay hintew immiya minthethuwan minnana.
2CO 1:7 Hinte nu ekida metuwa mela ekidi, nu minthethuwan shaaketanaysa nu eriya gisho nu ufaysay hintenan mino.
2CO 1:8 Nu ishato, Iise biittan nuna gakida metuwa hinte erana mela koyoos. He nuna gakida metoy nu wolqaafe darin, hayqonna attoko gidi ufaysi qanxidashin.
2CO 1:9 Nuuni nu bolla hayqo pirdi pirdetida mela qopida. Shin nuuni nu huuphen gidonashin, hayqidaysata denthiya Xoossan ammanetana mela hessi hanis.
2CO 1:10 Xoossay hessa mela iita hayqope nuna ashshis; ha77ika ashshana; sinthafeka I nuna ashshana gidi iyan ufaysi wothoos.
2CO 1:11 Woosan nuna maaddite. Daro woosa gaason Xoossaa maaduwa nu demmiya wode daro asay nu gisho Xoossaa galatoosona.
2CO 1:12 Nuuni nu geeshsha kahan ceeqetoos. Nuuni ha alamiyan de7ida de7uwan ubbaraka hintera nu de7ida de7uwan tumatethaninne suuretethan hintera de7ida. Hessika, ha alamiya cincatethan gidonashin, Xoossaa aadho keehatethaana.
2CO 1:13 Nu hintew xaafida dabdaabey hinte nabbabanawunne akeekanaw danda7iyabaape attishin, haraa gidenna. Hinte iya akeekanaw danda7eysa ta ammanayis.
2CO 1:14 Ha77i hinte nuna hanida keena ereeta, shin sinthafe kumethi eranaysa ta ammanetayis. Nu Godaa Yesuusi simmiya wode nuuni hintenan ceeqetidaysada hinteka nunan ceeqetana.
2CO 1:15 Hessa taani loytha erida gisho, hinte nam7antho go7etana mela kasetada hinteko baanaw qofa qachas.
2CO 1:16 Taani Maqedoone bashenne yaape simmashe hintena be7ana. Taani yaape Yihuda biya wode hinte tana ta ogiyan maaddana gada qopas.
2CO 1:17 Taani hessa gashe ay oothanaw bessiyako eronna asi daaniyana? Woyko taani ta qofaa qachiya wode asa qofada, issi toho “Ee” qassi issi toho “Akay” giya asa meleyee?
2CO 1:18 Shin Xoossay ammaneteysa gidiya gisho, nu hintew odiya qaalay “Ee” woyko “Akay” geysa gidenna.
2CO 1:19 Taani, Sillaaseynne Ximotiyoosi hintew markatida Xoossaa Na7ay, Yesuus Kiristoosi ubba wode “Eepe” attishin, “Ee” nne “Akay” gidenna.
2CO 1:20 Xoossay immana gida ubbay Kiristoosa baggara “Ee” gidees. Nuuni Kiristoosa baggara Xoossaa bonchoos, “Amin7i” gey hessa gishosa.
2CO 1:21 Nunne hinte Kiristoosan minnidi eqana mela oothidaynne ba oosuwas dooriday Xoossaa.
2CO 1:22 Nuuni iyabaa gideysa erisanaw ba maatamiya nu bolla wothis; qassi ba Geeshsha Ayyaana oythi oothidi nu wozanan wothis.
2CO 1:23 Taani Qorontoosa boonna aggiday hinte azzanonna attana melasa; hessi wordo gidiko Xoossay ta shempuwa taape eko.
2CO 1:24 Hinte, hinte ammanuwan minnidi de7iya gisho, nu hintena ufaysanaw hintera issife ootheysatape attishin, hintena wolqan ammantheyisata gidoko.
2CO 2:1 Taani nam7antho hinteko biike gada qofa qachiday hintena azzanthonna agganaasa.
2CO 2:2 Taani hintena azzanthikoka ta azzanthida hintefe hari tana ufaysanaw de7ey oonee?
2CO 2:3 Taani hintew he dabdaabiya xaafiday, ta hintena be7anaw biya wode tana ufaysanaw bessiya asan ta azzananaw koyonna gishosa. Ta ufaytiya wode hinte ubbayka ufaytanaysa ta ammanayis.
2CO 2:4 Taani daro waayeninne un7an qassi daro afuthan xaafiday, hintena azzanthanaasa gidonashin, taani hintena ubbaa ay mela dosiyako hintena erisana melasa.
2CO 2:5 Ase azzanthida oonika de7iko ta iya naaquwa darsanaw koyikefe attishin, tana gidonashin, hintefe darota azzanthis.
2CO 2:6 Hintefe dariya asay he uraa seerida seeray iyaw gidana.
2CO 2:7 Hessa gisho, he uray daro azzanidi, ufaysi qanxonna mela hinte iya maaranawunne minthethanaw bessees.
2CO 2:8 Hinte iya siiqeysa zaari iyaw qoncisana mela ta hintena woossayis.
2CO 2:9 Ta he dabdaabiya hintew xaafiday, hinte paacetidi, ubbaban taw kiiteteysa eranaw koyida gishosa.
2CO 2:10 Hinte maariya uraa taka maarana. Taani maaranabay aybi de7ikoka, Kiristoosa sinthan hinte gisho gada maaras.
2CO 2:11 Taani hessa oothiday Xalahiya cimo oosuwa nu eriya gisho, xalahen cimetonna attana melasa.
2CO 2:12 Taani Kiristoosa Wongela sabbakanaw Xiro7aada bida wode, Goday yan taw ooso oge giigisidi wothis.
2CO 2:13 Shin taani ta ishaa Tito yan demmaboonna gisho ta wozanay shempibeenna. Hessa gisho, yan de7iya asaa sarothada iya koyanaw Maqedoone bas.
2CO 2:14 Shin Kiristoosa baggara ubba wode nuna xoonon kaalethiyanne shitto mela sawiya Kiristoosaba nu eriya timirtiya ubba bessi gathana mela oothiya Xoossaa galati gako.
2CO 2:15 Nuuni attiya asaa giddoninne dhayiya asaa giddon Kiristoosa baggara Xoossas imetida sawiya shitto mela.
2CO 2:16 Dhaya asaas hayqoko efiya hayqo peeno; qassi attiya asaas de7oko efiya de7o sawo; yaatin, hessa mela oosos gidanay oonee?
2CO 2:17 Nuuni Xoossaa qaala wodhe demmanaw koyidi walakidi zal7iya daro asaa mela gidoko. Shin Xoossay kiitida suure asata mela Kiristoosan de7idi Xoossaa sinthan qaala odoos.
2CO 3:1 Nuuni zaaridi nuna sabbinoyee? Woyko hara asada, saba dabdaabiya hintew yeddanaw woyko hintefe ekanaw nuna koshshiyee?
2CO 3:2 Asi ubbay hintena erana melanne nabbabana mela hinte nu wozanan xaafetidi de7iya nu dabdaabe.
2CO 3:3 Hinte qalamen gidonashin, de7o Xoossaa Ayyaanan, shucha bolla gidonashin, asa wozanan xaafetidaysatanne nunan haggaazetida Kiristoosa dabdaabe gideysa bessideta.
2CO 3:4 Nu hessa giday, Kiristoosa baggara Xoossan ammanoy nuus de7iya gishosa.
2CO 3:5 Nu hessa oothanaw danda7iday Xoossaa wolqaanape attishin, nuuni nu wolqan aykoka oothanaw danda7oko.
2CO 3:6 Nu ooratha caaquwa oosanchota gidana mela Xoossay nuna danda7isis. He ooratha caaqoy Geeshsha Ayyaanan bentidaysafe attishin, xaafetida higgen gidenna. Higgey wodhees, shin Geeshsha Ayyaanay de7o immees.
2CO 3:7 Shucha bolla xaafetida higgey imetiya wode Xoossaa bonchoy qoncis. Muse som7uwan de7iya bonchoy dhayishe biyaba gidikoka, Isra7eele asay iya som7uwa tishshi oothidi xeellanaw danda7ibookona. Hiza, hayqo ehiya higgey hessa mela bonchon qonciko,
2CO 3:8 yaatin, Geeshsha Ayyaanan oosetiya oosuwa bonchoy waanidi aadhenee?
2CO 3:9 Asa bolla pirda ehiya higgey boncho gidiko yaatin, ase xillisiya ooratha ogey waanidi aadhidi bonchetennee?
2CO 3:10 Kase boncho gididaysa ha77i aadhiya bonchoy de7eysara gathi be7iya wode bonchoy baynaba gidis.
2CO 3:11 Guutha wodes qoncidi guyepe dhaydaysi haysada bonchetiko, merinaw de7eysi waanidi aadhidi bonchetennee?
2CO 3:12 Nuus haysa mela ufaysay de7iya gisho, yeellatonna odetoos.
2CO 3:13 Nuuni, Isra7eele asay dhayishe biya bonchuwa wursethaa be7onna mela ba som7uwa kammida Muse mela gidoko.
2CO 3:14 Shin enta wozanay doccis. Hachi gakanaw enti gal7a caaquwa nabbabiya wode enta wozanay he kaman kametidi de7ees. He kamay Kiristoosa xalaalan qaaretees.
2CO 3:15 Shin hachi gakanawuka enti Muse maxaafaa nabbabiya wode ubban he kamay enta wozanaa kammees.
2CO 3:16 Shin oonika Godaako simmiya wode awudeka he kamay qaaretees.
2CO 3:17 Goday Ayyaana; Godaa Ayyaanay de7iya bessan la77atethi de7ees.
2CO 3:18 Nuuni ubbay kametiboonna som7on Godaa bonchuwa be7ana. Nuuni Ayyaana gidida Godaa malaa daananaw bonchofe bonchon laametana.
2CO 4:1 Hiza, Xoossay ba maarotethan ha oosuwa nuus immida gisho, nuuni ufaysi qanxoko.
2CO 4:2 Nuuni yeellaya geema ooso ubbaa aggida; gene ooso oothoko; Xoossaa qaala wordora walakoko. Tumaa qoncen haasayishe, asa ubbaa kahay nuna ekana mela Xoossaa sinthan nuna shiishoos.
2CO 4:3 Nu odiya Wongelay geemmidaba gidikoka, geemmiday dhayo ogen de7iya asaasa.
2CO 4:4 Ha alamiya haariya xoossay ammanonna asaa wozanaa goozis. Enti Xoossaa mela gidida Kiristoosa boncho Wongela poo7uwa be7onna mela diggis.
2CO 4:5 Nuuni, Yesuus Kiristoosi Godaa gideysanne nu iya gisho hinte oosancho gideysa odoosipe attishin, nubaa odoko.
2CO 4:6 “Dhuman poo7oy poo7o” gida Xoossay, Kiristoosa som7uwan poo7iya Xoossaa bonchuwa eraa poo7uwa immanaw ba poo7uwa nu wozanan poo7isis.
2CO 4:7 Shin ubbaafe aadhiya wolqay nubaa gidonashin, Xoossaba gideysa bessanaw ha boncho shaloy meqa miishe gidida nu asatethan de7ees.
2CO 4:8 Nu ubba baggaraka waayetida, shin meqeretibooko. Nuus haddirsi gidis, shin ufaysi qanxibooko.
2CO 4:9 Nu, morketan goodetida, shin lagge dhaybooko. Nu morketan shocetidi kundida, shin dhaybooko.
2CO 4:10 Yesuusa de7oy nu asatethan qoncana mela iya hayquwa ubba wode nu asatethan tookidi yuuyoos.
2CO 4:11 Yesuusa de7oy hayqiya nu asatethan qoncana mela paxa de7iya nuuni iya gisho, ubba wode hayqos aadhidi imetoos.
2CO 4:12 Hiza, hayqoy nunan oothiya wode de7oy hintenan oothees.
2CO 4:13 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Ta ammanas; hessa gisho odas” yaagetis. Hessa mela ammanoy nuus de7iya gisho haasayoos.
2CO 4:14 Godaa Yesuusa hayqope denthida Xoossay, nunaka Yesuusara hayqope denthanaysanne hintera issife ba sinthe shiishanaysa eroos.
2CO 4:15 Hessi ubbay haniday hinte gishosa. Xoossaa aadho keehatethay daro asaa gakiya wode asay Xoossaa bonchuwas daro galataa immana.
2CO 4:16 Hessa gisho, nuuni ufaysi qanxoko. Nu bentiya asatethay daaburishe biyaba gidikoka, nu ayyaana asatethay gallas gallas ooraxees.
2CO 4:17 Ha77is nuuni waayetiya ha kawusha waayey, ubbaafe keehi gitatiya merinaa bonchuwa nuus imisana.
2CO 4:18 Nuuni bentiyaba gidonashin, bentonnaba xeelloos. Bentiyabay ha77isa, shin bentonnabay merinaasa.
2CO 5:1 Ha77i nu de7iya dunkaane daaniya ha sa7a asatethay laaletikoka, asi keexiboonna, Xoossay keexida merinaa keethay nuus salon de7eysa eroos.
2CO 5:2 Salo asatethaa ma7anaw amotishe ha77i ha sa7an de7ishe oolos.
2CO 5:3 Nuuni hessa ma7iya wode kallotoko.
2CO 5:4 Dunkaane daaniya ha sa7a asatethan nu de7ishe deexetidi oolos. Hayqiya nu asatethay de7on laametana mela salo asatethaa ma7anaw koyoosipe attishin, ashuwape shaaketanaw koyidi gidenna.
2CO 5:5 Nuna haysas giigisiday Xoossaa. Qassi sinthafe yaanabas oythi oothidi ba Ayyaana nuus immis.
2CO 5:6 Hessa gisho, nuuni ha sa7a asatethan de7iya wode ubban Godaape haakidi de7eysa erikoka ubba wode ammanetidi de7oos.
2CO 5:7 Nuuni de7ey ammanonape attishin, be7iyaban gidenna.
2CO 5:8 Nu ha sa7a asatethafe shaaketidi, nu soo bidi Godaara issife daanaw amotiya gisho, ammanetidi de7oos.
2CO 5:9 Hessa gisho, nu ha asatethan de7in woyko ha asatethafe shaaketin, nu amoy iya ufaysanaysa.
2CO 5:10 Nuuni issoy issoy ha sa7an de7ishe lo77o gidin woyko iita gidin, oothida oosuwas bessiya pirdaa ekanaw Kiristoosa pirda araata sinthan shiiqana.
2CO 5:11 Hiza, Godaa yashshi ay guusseko nuuni eriya gisho, asay nu odeysa ekana mela zoroos. Xoossay, nuuni ooneko nuna erees; qassi hinteka hinte kahan nu ooneko ereeta yaagada qopayis.
2CO 5:12 Wozanan gidonashin, malan ceeqetiya asaa doona oythanaw hinte nunan ceeqetana mela hintew gaaso gidanaw koyoosipe attishin, nu nuna zaaridi nashshanaw koyoko.
2CO 5:13 Nu gooshshi gidiko Xoossa bonchosa; wozanaama gidiko hintesa.
2CO 5:14 Issoy ubbaas hayqidaysanne ubbay qassi iyara hayqidaysa nu eriya gisho, Kiristoosa siiqoy nuna haarees.
2CO 5:15 De7on de7eysati hizape guye bantaw gidonashin, entaw hayqidaysasinne hayqope dendidaysas daana mela Kiristoosi asa ubbaa gisho hayqis.
2CO 5:16 Hizape guye, nuuni oonaka asa qofan pirdoko. Haysafe kase nuuni Kiristoosaka asa qofan be7idaba gidikoka, hizape hessada be7oko.
2CO 5:17 Hessa gisho, oonika Kiristoosan de7iko ooratha medhetethi; gal7a medhetethay aadhis; ubbayka oorathi gidis.
2CO 5:18 Hessa ubbaa Xoossay oothis. I Kiristoosa baggara nuna baara sigethis. Qassi harata baara sigethana mela nuus sigetho ooso immis.
2CO 5:19 Xoossay Kiristoosa baggara asa ubbaa baara sigethees. Enta nagaraa taybibeenna; qassi asaa baara sigethiya qaala nuus immis.
2CO 5:20 Xoossay asaa nu baggara xeegiya gisho, nu Kiristoosan kiitetidi asaa Xoossara sigetite gidi Kiristoosa gisho, woossoos.
2CO 5:21 Nuuni Xoossaa xillotethaa Kiristoosa baggara ekana mela, nagara eronna Kiristoosa nu gisho, nagarancho asada oothis.
2CO 6:1 Nuuni Xoossara issife oothiya asi gideysada, hinte ekida aadho keehatetha hada oothonna mela nu hintena woossoos.
2CO 6:2 Xoossay, “Ta nena si7ana woden si7as; atotetha gallasan nena maaddas” yaagees. Heko, ta si7iya wodey ha77i; atotetha gallasay hachi.
2CO 6:3 Oonika nu oosuwa borana melanne nunan dhubetana mela koyoko.
2CO 6:4 Gidoshin, nu tuma Xoossaa oosanchota gideysa nu oothiya ubbaban bessida. Daro gencan, waayen, meton, un7an,
2CO 6:5 garaafetethan, qashon, ixon kumida wocaman, daaburan, dhisko dhayon, xooman,
2CO 6:6 geeshshatethan, eratethan, danda7an, keehatethan, Geeshsha Ayyaanan, tuma siiqon,
2CO 6:7 tumaa odaninne Xoossaa wolqan nuuni iya oosanchota gideysa bessida. Qassi xillotethay nuus tooranne gondalle.
2CO 6:8 Nuuni bonchetidanne tooshetida; cayetidanne galatetida. Tumaa haasayoos, shin asay nuna wordancho gidoosona.
2CO 6:9 Nu asan eretida asi, shin eretonna asa mela gidida. Hayqidosona yaagetida, shin paxa de7oos; shocetida, shin hayqibooko.
2CO 6:10 Nuuni azzanikoka ubba wode ufaytoos. Nu manqo daanos, shin daro asaa dureyoos. Qassi aykoyka bayna asi daanos, shin ubbay nubaa.
2CO 6:11 Qorontoosa asato, nu hintew qoncen odida; nu uluwa hintena bessida.
2CO 6:12 Hinte nuna hinte siiquwa bessonna diggidetape attishin, nuuni nu siiquwa hintena diggibooko.
2CO 6:13 Aawu ba naytas odeysada ta hintew odayis; nu hintena nu uluwa bessidaysada, hinteka hinte uluwa nuna bessite.
2CO 6:14 Ammanonna asaara bessonna ogen waaxettofite. Xillotethasinne nagaras aybi gahetethi de7ii? Poo7osinne dhumas aybi issifetethi de7ii?
2CO 6:15 Kiristoosanne Xalahe issife gathiyabay aybee? Qassi ammaneysinne ammanonaysi issife koxiyabay aybee?
2CO 6:16 Xoossaa Keethas eeqatara aybi issifetethi de7ii? Xoossay, “Taani enta giddon de7ana, enta giddon hemetana. Taani enta Xoossaa gidana; entika ta ase gidana” gidaysada, nuuni de7o Xoossaa keethi.
2CO 6:17 Hessadaka, Goday, “Enta giddofe shaaketidi keyite; tuna gididaba bochofite; ta hintena ekana.
2CO 6:18 Ta hintew aawa gidana; hinte taw adde naytanne macca nayta gidana; yaagees Ubbaafe Wolqaama Goday” yaagis.
2CO 7:1 Hiza, ta siiqoto, ha ufaysay nuus de7iya gisho, nu ashuwanne nu shempuwa tunisiyaba ubbaafe nuna geeshshos. Xoossas yayyidi nu geeshshatetha polo oothoos.
2CO 7:2 Hinte uluwa nuna bessite. Nuuni oonaka naaqibooko; oonaka qohibooko; oonaka cimmibooko.
2CO 7:3 Taani hessa hinte bolla pirdanaw giike. Haysafe kase ta hintew odidaysada, hinte nu wozanan de7eeta; nu paxa de7inka hayqinka hintefe shaaketoko.
2CO 7:4 Ta odiyaba hintefe qotike; ta hintenan ceeqetayis; nu waaye ubban minettayis; qassi gita ufaysi ufaytayis.
2CO 7:5 Nuuni Maqedoone bida wode, ubba baggara waayetidaape attishin shempibooko. Karera morketan, nu gaathan yashshan un7etida.
2CO 7:6 Shin azzanidaysata minthethiya Xoossay, Tito yuussan nuna minthethis.
2CO 7:7 Nuna minthethiday Tito yuussaa xalaala gidonashin, hinteka iya minthethidaysa. Hinte tana laamoteysa, taw azzaneysanne taw qopeysa ta si7ida wode tana daro ufaysis.
2CO 7:8 Ta dabdaabey hintena azzanthikoka ayis xaafadinasha gada qiirotike. Ta qiirotiday ta xaafida dabdaabey hintena guutha wodes azzanthida gishosa.
2CO 7:9 Ha77i taani ufaytiday, ta hintena azzanthida gisho gidonashin, hinte azzanoy hintena hinte nagarape zaarida gishosa. Xoossay ba sheniyada hintena azzanthisipe attishin nu hintena aybinka qohibooko.
2CO 7:10 Xoossay koya azzanoy, atotethako gathiya nagarape simo ehees; iyan qiiroyabay baawa. Shin ha sa7a azzanoy hayqo ehees.
2CO 7:11 Hinte azzanoy hintenan ayfisida ayfiya be7ite. He azzanoy hintena ay mela denthethidako, ay mela zaaro immanaada giigisidaako, he ura bolla ay mela hanqethidaako, ay mela taw yayyana mela oothidaako, ay mela amoydako, he ura seeranaw ay mela giigidaako be7ite. Ha ubbaban hinte geeshshi gideysa markaydeta.
2CO 7:12 Hessa gisho, taani ha dabdaabiya hintew xaafiday, naaqida ura woyko naaqetida ura gisho gidenna. Shin hinte nuus ay mela qopiyako Xoossa sinthan hinte, hintena be7ana mela xaafas.
2CO 7:13 Nuuni ufaytiday hessa gishosa. Nu ufaysaafe aadhidi nuna daro ufaysiday, hinte Tito ufaysidaysanne iya wozanaa shempisidaysa.
2CO 7:14 Taani hintena nashshada iyaw odin, hinte tana yeellaybeketa. Shin nuuni ubba wode hintew tuma odida; hessadaka nuuni Tito sinthan hintena nashidaysi tuma gidis.
2CO 7:15 Hinte iyaw yashshan kokoridi, iya mokidaysa qassi iyaw ay mela kiitetidaako, I qopiya wode hintew de7iya siiqoy minnishe bis.
2CO 7:16 Taani ubbaban hintenan ammanetiya gisho ufaytayis.
2CO 8:1 Nu ishato, Xoossay Maqedoonen de7iya woosa keethatas immida aadho keehatethaba hinte erana mela nu koyoos.
2CO 8:2 Enti gita meton paacetidosona, shin enta ufaysay wolqaama. Enta manqotethas zawi baawa, shin banta imuwan daro keehidosona.
2CO 8:3 Enti banta wolqaa melanne banta wolqafe aadheysa dosidi immidaysas ta marka.
2CO 8:4 Enti Xoossa ase maaddiya lo77o ooso nuura oothanaw koydi nuna daro woossidosona.
2CO 8:5 Enti nuuni qopidaysafe aathidi oothidosona. Xoossa sheniyada, koyrottidi bantana Godaas immidosona; kaallidi, bantana nuus aathidi immidosona.
2CO 8:6 Ha lo77o oosuwa doomida Titoy, gujidi oothanaadanne hintena maaddidi, he oosuwa polisanaada iya woossida.
2CO 8:7 Shin hinte ubbaban, ammanon, odan, eratethan, gita amon, nuna dosoninne ubbaban duretidaysada ha lo77o oosuwanka hinte keeha gidana mela nu koyoos.
2CO 8:8 Taani hessa kiittanaw giike. Shin harata gita amuwa hinte siiquwara gatha be7ada, hinte ay keena tumeeko eranaw gayis.
2CO 8:9 Hinte, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa aadho keehatetha ereeta. Kiristoosi dure gidi uttidi, hinte iya manqotethan duretanaada hinte gisho manqis.
2CO 8:10 Taani ha odan hintena maaddiya zore zoranaw koyayis. Hinte zillaythi immanaw xalaala gidonashin, hessa oothanaw amotisheka hinte koyro.
2CO 8:11 Hinte oothanaw doomida oosuwa ha77i polite. Hinte hintew de7eysa keena immiko, hessi hinte immanaw daro amotteysa qoncisees.
2CO 8:12 Issi asi immanaw amotiko, iya imoy Xoossa sinthan eketey, I baw de7idaysa keena imminape attishin, baynabape immanaw un7etin gidenna.
2CO 8:13 Taani hessa gey, hinte ubbay issi gina gidana melasafe attishin, harati waayiyape shempin, hinte waayetana melasa gidenna.
2CO 8:14 Wode enta palahay hinte pacaa kunthana mela, ha77i hinte palahay enta pacaa kuntho. Hessan hinte gina gidana.
2CO 8:15 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Daro shiishidaysas palahibeenna; guutha shiishidaysas pacibeenna” geetetidi xaafetidaysa mela.
2CO 8:16 Nuuni hintew qopeysada Titoyka hintew qopana mela oothida Xoossay galatetto.
2CO 8:17 Titoy hinteko biday, nuuni iya denthethida gisho xalaala gidonashin, I ba shenen baanaw amotida gishosa.
2CO 8:18 Wongela markatethan woosa keetha ubban daro eretida isha, nuuni Titora issife kiittoos.
2CO 8:19 Hessa bolla nuuni ha keeha imota efiya wode nuura baana mela, ha lo77o oosuwan Godaa bonchanawunne harata maaddanaw de7iya amuwa bessanaw I woosa keethatan dooretis.
2CO 8:20 Ha imetida keeha imuwa, nuuni ooso bolla peeshshiya wode boretonna mela naagetoos.
2CO 8:21 Nuuni Godaa sinthan xalaala gidonashin, asa sinthanka lo77o gididaba oothoos.
2CO 8:22 Qassi daro wode paacen minnidi aadhida nu ishaa, entara hinteko kiitida. I hintenan daro ammanetiya gisho, ha77i hintena maaddanaw daro amottees.
2CO 8:23 Titoba eranaw koyko, hintena maaddanaw taara oothiya ta ooso lagge. Hanko ishataba gidiko woosa keethati kiittidaysata; qassi asay enta duussa be7idi Kiristoosa bonchoosona.
2CO 8:24 Hessa gisho, woosa keethati hinte siiquwanne nu hintena nashiya nashoy tuma gideysa qoncisanaw hinte siiquwa ha asata bessite.
2CO 9:1 Ammaniya asaas kessiya miishiyaba ta hintew xaafanaw koshshenna.
2CO 9:2 Hinte maaddanaw keehi amotteysa ta erayis. Hinte Akaya asay, zillaythafe doomidi maaddanaw giigetidaysa taani Maqedoone asaas doona kunthada odas. Hinte gita amoyka entafe darota denthethis.
2CO 9:3 Ha oosuwan hintenan nu ceeqetiya ceeqoy hada gidonna mela koyro hintebaa ta odidaysada hinte giigetidi naagana mela ha ishata hinteko kiittas.
2CO 9:4 Maqedoone asay taara bidi, hinte giigetonna de7ishin, demmiko, nu hintenan yeellatana; qassi hinte nuupe aadho yeellatana.
2CO 9:5 Hessa gisho, ha ishati taape sinthatidi hinteko bidi, hinte immana gida imuwa kasetidi giigisana mela ta entana kiittas. Taani gakiya wode he imoy giigidi uttees. He wode he keehatetha imoy wolqan gidonashin, dosan gideysa erisees.
2CO 9:6 Haysa akeekite; guuthu zeriday guuthu cakana; daro zeriday daro cakana.
2CO 9:7 Xoossay ufaysan immiya uraa dosiya gisho, wolqan woyko dosi bayna gidonashin, issi issi asi ba wozanan qopidaysada dosan immanaw bessees.
2CO 9:8 Ubba wode ubbaban koshshiyaba ubbaa demmidi lo77o ooso ubbaa oothanaw danda7ana mela Xoossay hintew ba anjuwa darsana.
2CO 9:9 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “I ba shaluwa manqotas laallis; iya xillotethay merinaw de7ana” yaagees.
2CO 9:10 Zereysas zerethi, maanaw kathi immiya Goday, hinte zeriya zerethi darsidi immana. Hinte xillotetha ayfiyaka darsana.
2CO 9:11 Daro asay hinte immiya imuwa nuupe ekidi, Xoossaa galatanaada, hinte ubba wode darsidi immeyisata gidana mela Xoossay hintena ubba baggara dureyana.
2CO 9:12 Ha hinte immiya imoy ammaniya asaa pacaa kuntho xalaala gidonashin, asay Xoossaa galatanaw gaaso gidees.
2CO 9:13 Ha hinte oosoy hinte ammanuwa erisidi Kiristoosa Wongela hinte ammanidinne iyaw kiitetidi hintew de7iyaba entaranne haratara shaaketida gisho ubbay Xoossaa bonchana.
2CO 9:14 Xoossay hintew immida aadho keehatetha gisho enti hintew Xoossaa woossishe hintena be7anaw laamotosona.
2CO 9:15 Zawi bayna Xoossaa imuwas Xoossay galatetto.
2CO 10:1 Taani hintera de7iya wode, “Shugo”, qassi hintefe haakiya wode “Nu bolla minnees” yaagetida, Phawuloosi, keehanne ashke gidida Kiristoosa sunthan hintena woossayis.
2CO 10:2 Taani hinteko biya wode nu asho qofara simeretiya asi oothidi qopiya asaa bolla mino qaalan odetanaw qofa qachas. Hinte bolla hessada odetana mela hinte tana oothonnaada hintena woossayis.
2CO 10:3 Nuuni ha sa7an de7ikoka ha sa7aa asada oletoko.
2CO 10:4 Nu ola miishey ha sa7aba gidenna. Shin miixa laallanaw wolqara de7iya Xoossa toora. Tumaara eqetiya palamanne,
2CO 10:5 Xoossa eratetha bolla otoron dendiya palamanne hada qofa ubba laalloos. Asa qofa ubbaa di77idi Kiristoosas kiitetana mela oothoos.
2CO 10:6 Hinte kiitetethay polo gidiya wode nuuni kiitetetha ixo ubbaa seeranaw giigetana.
2CO 10:7 Hinte ayfey be7ida mela pirdeta. Oonika bana Kiristoosaba gidi qopiyaba gidiko, nuka Kiristoosaba gideysa ero.
2CO 10:8 Goday taw immida maatan ceeqetikoka hessan yeellatike. He maatay taw imetiday hintena dichanaasafe attishin, qohanaasa gidenna.
2CO 10:9 Taani ta dabdaabiyan hintena yashisanaw koyada xaafidaba daanopo.
2CO 10:10 Issi issi asay, “Phawuloosa dabdaabey deexonne wolqaama, shin iya som7on be7iya wode I daaburancho; iya odayka pathenna” yaagosona.
2CO 10:11 He asati nu haahon de7ishe xaafiya dabdaabiyaninne matan hintera de7ishe oothiya oosuwa giddon dummatethi baynaysa akeeko.
2CO 10:12 Nuuni bantana nashshiya asatara nuna ginayanaw woyko gaaddeyanaw koyoko. Shin enti bantana bantara ginayidi woyko gaaddeyidi be7ishe eeya.
2CO 10:13 Shin nuuni Xoossay nuus immida dhassan ceeqetoosipe attishin, zawa pinnidi ceeqetoko; he zaway hintekoka gakees.
2CO 10:14 Nuuni besseysafe aathidi ceeqetoko, shin Kiristoosa Wongela hinteko gathidaysan ceeqetoos.
2CO 10:15 Nuuni Xoossay essida zawape pinnidi, harati oothida ooson ceeqetoko. Gidoshin, hinte ammanoy diccana mela Xoossay immida zawan hinte giddon nu oothiya oosoy dalgana gidi qopoos.
2CO 10:16 Nuuni hara asi ba zawan oothida ooson gelidi ceeqetoko, shin hintefe pinnidi haratas Wongela markatanaw danda7oos.
2CO 10:17 Shin, Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Ceeqiya ubbay Godaa lo77otethan ceeqo” yaagidi xaafetis.
2CO 10:18 Goday nashshiya uraape attishin, bana baw nashshiya uray nashetenna.
2CO 11:1 Ta guutha eeyatetha hinte ha77ika danda7ana gada qopayis; hayyana danda7ite.
2CO 11:2 Xoossay hintew qopidaysada, taka hintew qopayis. Taani hintena geeshsha geela7ida issi addiya, Kiristoosas immanaw oycha wothas.
2CO 11:3 Shin shooshay ba geniyan Hewaanno balethidaysada ooni eri hinte wozanay iitidi Kiristoosas de7iya hinte suuretethaanne geeshshatetha aggandeti gada hirgayis.
2CO 11:4 Issi asi yidi, nuuni hintew markatida Yesuusape hara Yesuusa hintew markatiko, woyko hinte ekida Ayyaanapenne Wongelape hara ayyaananne Wongela hintew odiko, si77i gidi ekeeta.
2CO 11:5 Shin taani Yesuusi kiitida “Gita hawaareta” geetetidi xeegeteysatape guuxayis gada qopike.
2CO 11:6 Taani oda eronna asi gidikoka, eratethi taw de7ees. Hessa ta hintew daro ogen qoncisas.
2CO 11:7 Taani miishe oychonna Xoossaa Wongela hintew coo odidaysinne hintena dhoqu oothada tana toochidaysi taw nagara gidii?
2CO 11:8 Taani hintew oothanaw hara woosa keethatape miishe bonqa ekas.
2CO 11:9 Ta hintera de7iya wode tana metinka hintefe issi asika waaysabike. Maqedoonepe yida ammaneysati tana koshshiyaba ubban maaddidosona. Hachi gakanaw ta hintew tooho gidabike sinthaska tooho gidike.
2CO 11:10 Kiristoosa tumatethay tanan de7ishin, ta ceequwa Akaya biittan tana oonika diggenna.
2CO 11:11 Ta haysa ayis gayna? Hintena dosonna gishoyee? Taani hintena doseysa Xoossay erees.
2CO 11:12 “Nuka hinte mela oothoos” yaagidi ceeqiya hanko hawaareta ceequwa gaasuwa dhaysanaw ha77i ta ootheysa sinthaska oothana.
2CO 11:13 Haysa mela asati Kiristoosa hawaare daananaw bantana laammiya wordancho hawaaretanne cimmiya oosanchota.
2CO 11:14 Hessi malaalsiyaba gidenna; ayis giiko, Xalahey poo7o kiitancho daananaw bana laammees.
2CO 11:15 Hessa gisho, Xalahe oosanchoti xillotethaa oosanchota daananaw bantana laammiko hessi gitaba gidenna. Enti wursethan banta oosuwada ekana.
2CO 11:16 Oonika tana eeya gidi qoponna mela zaaradaka odayis. Ta hintew eeya daanikoka ta guuthara ceeqetana mela tana eeya oothidi ekite.
2CO 11:17 Taani haysada ceeqetada odetey, Goday koyeysada gidonashin, eeyatethan odayis.
2CO 11:18 Daro asay ha sa7aban ceeqetiya gisho, taka ceeqetana.
2CO 11:19 Hinte wozanaama gidiya gisho, eeya asaba ufaysan danda7eeta.
2CO 11:20 Oonika hintena aylleyiko woyko hintena bonqiko woyko baw maadetanaw hinteko shiiqiko woyko hinte bolla otortiko woyko hintena baqiko hinte danda7eeta.
2CO 11:21 Nuuni hessa oothanaw daro daaburancho gideysa yeellatashe ta odayis. Shin oonika minnidi ceeqetiko, taka ceeqetanaw minnayis. Taani hessa eeya asada odetayis.
2CO 11:22 Enti Ibraawee? Taka Ibraawe. Enti Isra7eelee? Taka Isra7eele. Enti Abrahaame sheeshee? Taka Abrahaame sheeshi.
2CO 11:23 Enti Kiristoosa oosancho? Taani gooshsha asada odayis, entafe aadhiya Kiristoosa oosancho. Taani ooson daro daaburas; daro wode qashetas; garaafetas; daro wode hayqope attas.
2CO 11:24 Ayhudeti tana hastamanne uddufuna ichashu toho garaafidosona.
2CO 11:25 Heedzu toho xam7an shocetas; issi toho shuchan cadetas; markabey heedzu toho me77is; abba giddon issi qamma kumethi aqada pee7as.
2CO 11:26 Taani daro ogiya daaburan hemetas. Kixa haathafenne pangafe attas. Ayhudetinne Ayhude gidonna asay ta bolla meto gathidosona. Katamay, bazzoy, abbay, tana yashshis; ammaniya daaniya asati tana waaysidosona.
2CO 11:27 Taani ooson daaburasinne cawatas, daro toho dhisko dhayas, koshatas, saamotas, daro toho xoomas, meegetas, kallotas.
2CO 11:28 Haraba ubbaa taybonna ubba wode tana qofisey woosa keethatabaa.
2CO 11:29 Issi asi daaburiya wode iyara ta daaburabikina? Issi asi nagaran dhubetiya wode ta awude qiirotonna aggadina?
2CO 11:30 Ta ceeqetanaw koshshiyaba gidiko taani daaburancho gideysa erisiyaban ceeqetana.
2CO 11:31 Merinaw bonchetida Xoossay, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa Aaway, ta wordotonnaysa erees.
2CO 11:32 Damasqo kataman kawa Arisxoosape garsara haareysi tana oythanaw koyidi Damasqo katamaa pengiya naagisis.
2CO 11:33 Shin asay tana daachon yeggidi, katamaa dirsaa maskootiyara wodhisin taani iya kushiyape attas.
2CO 12:1 Ceeqetethas go77i baynaysa erayis. Shin ceeqetanaw koshshiko, Godaape ekida qoncethan ceeqana.
2CO 12:2 Tammanne oyddu laythafe kase, Kiristoosa ammaniya issi uray heedzantho saluwa bidaysa ta erayis. He uray ashon woyko ashope karera bidaako ta erike; Xoossay erees.
2CO 12:3 He uray heedzantho saluwa eketidaysa erayis. Shin I ashon woyko ashope karera eketidaako ta erike; Xoossay erees.
2CO 12:4 He uray gannate eketidi asi qoncisanawunne asi odanaw danda7onnaba si7is.
2CO 12:5 Taani he addiyaban ceeqetana, shin taani ta daaburaape attishin, tanan ceeqetiyabay baawa.
2CO 12:6 Taani tumaa odetiya gisho, ceeqetanaw koykoka eeya gidike. Shin asi ta ootheysa be7eysafenne si7eysafe aathidi qoponna mela gada ceeqetethi aggayis.
2CO 12:7 Taw qoncida gita qoncethan ta otortonna mela tana waaysanaw ta ashuwan caddiya Xalahiya kiitanchoy taw imetis.
2CO 12:8 Ha waaysiyaba taape diggana mela taani Godaa heedzu toho woossas.
2CO 12:9 Shin Goday, “Ta wolqay ne daaburan qonciya gisho ta aadho keehatethay new gidana” yaagis. Kiristoosa wolqay tanan qoncana mela ta daaburan ufaytashe ceeqetayis.
2CO 12:10 Taani Kiristoosa gisho, daaburiya wode cayetiya wode waayetiya wode goodetiya wode metootiya wode ta daaburan ufaytayis. Ayis giiko, ta daaburiya wode, he wode minnayis.
2CO 12:11 Taani eeya asada ceeqetas. Hessada ta ceeqetana mela oothiday hintena. Ta, ta huuphen eretonna asi gidikoka, “Gita hawaareta” geeteteysatape guuxike. Hessa taw markatanaw bessey hintenashin.
2CO 12:12 Ta hinte giddon de7ashe danda7an oothida malaatatinne mallati ta tuma hawaare gideysa bessoosona.
2CO 12:13 Ta hintew tooho gidonaysafe attishin, hara woosa keethatape hinte aybin guuxidetii? Hessi bala gidiko tana maarite.
2CO 12:14 Taani hinteko baanaw giigetishin haysi taw heedzantho. Ta hintenape attishin, hintew de7iyaba koyonna gisho hintena waaysanaw koyke. Yelidaysati banta naytas shalo minjoosonape attishin, nayti bantana yelidaysatas shalo minjokona.
2CO 12:15 Ta hinte gisho, taw de7iyabaanne tana aatha imminka tana ufaysees. Yaatin, taani hintena hessada keeha siiqiya wode hinte tana guuthara siiqetii?
2CO 12:16 Gidikoka, ta hintew tooho gidike; waaysabike; shin hintena cimoninne genen oykidaba hintew daanonna aggenna.
2CO 12:17 Hari attoshin, ta hinteko kiitida asatape hintena cimmida asi de7ii?
2CO 12:18 Titoy hinteko baana mela taani woossas; qassi ammaniya ishaaka iyara yeddas. Yaatin, Titoy hintena cimmidee? Nuuni nu oosuwa issi ayyaanan oothibooko? Qassi nu hanoyka issino gidennee?
2CO 12:19 Nu ubba wode hinte sinthan nuna xillisanaw mootetiyaba hintew daanii? Nu Kiristoosan de7idi Xoossaa sinthan ha77i gakanaw odoos. Nu siiqo ishato, nu ha ubbaa oothey hintena dichanaasa.
2CO 12:20 Ta hinteko biya wode ooni eri hinte ta koyeysada hanonna, qassi taka hinte koyeysada hanonna gahetonna aggoko gada yayyayis. Qassi ooni eri hinte giddon palami, qanaatey, hanqoy, yiiqey, zigirsi, asa sunthu iisoy, otoroynne kachi doonna aggenna gada yayyayis.
2CO 12:21 Taani nam7antho hinteko biya wode Xoossay hinte sinthan tana kawushana gada yayyayis. Kase nagara oothidi he banta oothida tunatethaafe, laymatethafenne yeellayiya oosuwape simmiboonna asata be7ada azzanonna aggike gada yayyayis.
2CO 13:1 Ta hinteko bishin haysi heedzantho. Ay mootoyka nam7u woyko heedzu markan minnees.
2CO 13:2 Taani nam7antho hintera gahetida wode hinte giddon kase nagara oothida uraanne harata ubbaa seeronna aggike gada oda wothas. Ha77i ta haakada de7ikoka simmada hinteko biya wode oodeska qadhetike.
2CO 13:3 Tanan de7idi odey Kiristoosa gideysa hinte eranaw koyeeta. I hintera haasaya wode wolqaamape attishin, hinte giddon daaburancho gidenna.
2CO 13:4 Kiristoosi masqale bolla daaburan kaqetis, shin Xoossa wolqan de7on de7ees. I daaburancho gididaysada, nuka daaburancho. Shin hintena haggaazanaw Xoossaa wolqan iyara de7on daana.
2CO 13:5 Ammanon minnidi de7iyako hintena hintew paacidi be7ite. Paacen hinte kundonna attiko, Kiristoosi hintenan de7eysa hinte ereeta. Shin Kiristoosi hintenan doonna ixiko hinte kundeeta.
2CO 13:6 Nuuni paacen kundonaysa hinte ereeta gada ammanayis.
2CO 13:7 Hinte iitabaa oothonna mela nuuni Xoossaa woossoos. Nuuni mino gideysa asay be7ana mela gidonashin, nuuni mino gidonna ixikoka, hinte lo77o oothana mela nuuni woossoos.
2CO 13:8 Nuuni tumaas oothoosipe attishin, tumaara eqetiyaba aybaka oothoko.
2CO 13:9 Nu daaburiya wode hinte qassi minniya wode nuna ufaysees. Hinte borey baynayisata gidana mela nu hintew Xoossaa woossoos.
2CO 13:10 Taani hintefe haakada de7ashe xaafiday hessa gishosa. Taani hinteko biya wode Goday taw immida maatan zempada hinte bolla godatanaw koyke. Goday taw maata immiday, hintena maaddanaasafe attishin, qohanaasa gidenna.
2CO 13:11 Wursethan ta ishato, saro de7ite. Borey bayna de7ite; ta zoriya si7ite. Issi wozanan gididi de7ite; sarotethan de7ite. Siiqonne saro immiya Xoossay hintera gido.
2CO 13:12 Geeshsha yeeretethi yeeretishe, issoy issuwa sarothite.
2CO 13:13 Xoossaa asa ubbay hintena saro saro yaagosona.
2CO 13:14 Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa aadho keehatethay, Xoossaa siiqoy, Geeshsha Ayyaana issifetethay hinte ubbaara gido.
GAL 1:1 Asape woyko asa baggara gidonashin, Yesuus Kiristoosapenne iya hayqope denthida Xoossaa Aawape hawaare gidana mela kiitetida ta Phawuloosi,
GAL 1:2 taara de7iya ammaniya ishati ubbay, Galatiyan de7iya woosa keethatas kiitida kiitaa.
GAL 1:3 Xoossay nu Aawaynne nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosi hintew aadho keehatethaanne sarotethaa immo.
GAL 1:4 Ha iita wodiyape nuna ashshanaw, nu Xoossaa, nu Aawa shenen Kiristoosi nu nagara gisho bana aathidi immis.
GAL 1:5 Xoossaas Merinaape merinaa gakanaw bonchoy gido. Amin7i.
GAL 1:6 Kiristoosa aadho keehatethan hintena xeegida Xoossaa aggidi, hara Wongelako, hinte ellesidi, waanidi simmidaako tana malaalsees.
GAL 1:7 Hintena balethanawunne Kiristoosa wongela wobbisanaw koyiya guutha asati de7oosonape attishin, tuma Wongelay issino.
GAL 1:8 Shin nuna gidin woyko salo kiitancho gidin nuuni hintew koyro odida Wongelape dummatiya hara Wongela hintew odiyaba gidiko, I baadetidaba gido.
GAL 1:9 Haysafe sinthe nuuni gidaysada ha77ika zaarada gayis. Hinte ekida Wongelape dummatiya Wongela oonika hintew odiko he uray baadetidaba gido.
GAL 1:10 Yaatin, tana asi nashshana mela koyaanayee? Woyko Xoossi nashshana mela koyayna? Woyko ta ase ufaysanaw koyayna? Ta ase ufaysanaw koyaba gidiko, Kiristoosa aylle gidike.
GAL 1:11 Ta ishato, ta hintew odida Wongelay asape gidonnaysa hinte erana mela ta koyayis.
GAL 1:12 Taw ha Wongela Yesuusi Kiristoosi qoncisisipe attishin, asape ekabike woyko asi tana tamaarsibeenna.
GAL 1:13 Ta kase Ayhude ammanon de7iya wode waana de7idaako, hinte si7ideta. Ta woosa keethaa qadhey bayna gooddanawunne dhaysanaw baaxetas.
GAL 1:14 Ayhude ammano naagon, ta woden de7iya Ayhude ishatape aadhayis. Nu aawata wogaas aadhada mishetayis.
GAL 1:15 Shin ta buroo ta aaye ulon de7ishin Xoossay tana dooris; ba aadho keehatethan tana xeegis.
GAL 1:16 Ayhude gidonna asaas Wongela odana mela Xoossay ba Na7aa taw qoncisida wode ta ooderaka zorettabike.
GAL 1:17 Woyko taape sinthe hawaare gididaysatara gahetanaw Yerusalaame babike. Shin ta kasetada Arabe biitta bas; hessafe simmada Damasqo katamaa yas.
GAL 1:18 Heedzu laythafe guye, Phexroosara gahetanaw Yerusalaame bada iyara tammanne ichashu gallas uttas.
GAL 1:19 Shin Godaa ishaa Yayqoobape attishin, hanko hawaareta be7abike.
GAL 1:20 Ta hintew xaafiydaysi wordo gidonnaysa Xoossaa sinthan hintew qoncisayis.
GAL 1:21 Hessafe guye, taani Soore biittanne Kilqiya biitta bas.
GAL 1:22 Yihudan de7iya woosa keethaa asay tana be7idi eribookona.
GAL 1:23 Shin enti, “Kase nuna gooddiya uray, ha77i he I dhaysanaw koyiya ammanuwaba sabbakees” yaageysa si7idosona.
GAL 1:24 Si7ida ubbay ta gaason Xoossaa galatidosona.
GAL 2:1 Tammanne oyddu laythafe guye, Barnabaasara zaarada Yerusalaame bas. He wode Tito taara ekada bas.
GAL 2:2 Xoossay taw qoncisida qoncethan yaa bada Ayhude gidonna asaa giddon ta sabbakiya Wongela entaw qoncisas. Kase ta woxida wothaynne ha77ika ta woxiya wothay hada gidonna mela gada kaaletheyisata dumma shiishada entaw odas.
GAL 2:3 Hari attoshin, taara de7iya Titoy Girike asi gidikoka, qaxareto gidi un7ethibookona.
GAL 2:4 Gidoshin, ammaniya ishata daanidi nu giddo gelida issoti issoti I qaxaretana mela koydosona. He asati Kiristoos Yesuusan nuus de7iya la77atetha wochidi be7anaw geeman nu giddo gelidi zaaridi nuna aylle oothanaw koyoosona.
GAL 2:5 Shin tuma Wongelay hintenan minnidi daana mela nuuni hari attoshin, guutha wodeska entaw kushe immibooko.
