GAL 2:6 Shin halaqa daaniya asata oonatethay taw aykoka gidenna. Xoossay asa som7o be7idi pirdenna. Ha asati ta markatiya Wongela bolla gujidabay baawa.
GAL 2:7 Shin Phexroosi, Ayhudetas Wongela odana mela Xoossay iyaw hadara immidaysada tawuka Ayhude gidonna asaas Wongela odiya hadara immidaysa enti guyepe be7idosona.
GAL 2:8 Hiza, Phexroosi Ayhudeta hawaare gidana mela oothida Xoossay, taka Ayhude gidonna asaas hawaare gidana mela oothis.
GAL 2:9 Qassi tuussu daanidi bentiya Yayqoobi, Phexroosinne Yohaanisi, taw imetida aadho keehatetha be7ida wode nuura issifidaysa qoncisanaw ta kushiyanne Barnabaasa kushiya oykidosona. Nuuni Ayhude gidonna asaako, qassi enti Ayhude asaako baanaw giigidosona.
GAL 2:10 Enti nuna minthidi hadara giday, nuuni manqotas qopanaysa. Kaseka ta hessa oothanaw amottayis.
GAL 2:11 Phexroosi Anxooke katamaa yida wode I balida gisho taani iya som7on “Neeni baladasa” gas.
GAL 2:12 Yayqoobi kiitida guutha asay yaanape sinthe I Ayhude gidonna asaara mees, shin enti yidaape guye, “Ayhude gidonna asaape ammanidaysati qaxaretanaw bessees” giya asaas yayyidi entafe shaaketis.
GAL 2:13 Qassi hanko ammanida Ayhudeti Phexroosa hanuwa kaallidosona. Hari attoshin, Barnabaasika iya qofan gooshetis.
GAL 2:14 Shin enti Wongela tumatethan suure hemetonnaysa be7ada, Phexroosa asa ubbaa sinthan, “Neeni Ayhude gidashe, Ayhude wogaatho gidonashin, Ayhude gidonna asada de7aasa; yaatin, waanada Ayhude gidonnayisata, ‘Ayhude wogan de7ite gada wolqatay?’ ” yaagas.
GAL 2:15 Nuuni yeletan Ayhude, shin nagarancho gidida Ayhude gidonna asaa mela gidoko.
GAL 2:16 Shin asi Yesuus Kiristoosa ammanidi xilleesipe attishin, higge naagidi xillonnaysa eroos. Oonika higge naagidi xillonna gisho, nuka higge naagidi gidonashin, Kiristoosan ammanidi xillana mela Kiristoosi Yesuusa ammanida.
GAL 2:17 Nu Ayhudetika Kiristoosa baggara xillanaw koshshees. Hessa gidiko nuka hara asada nagarancho gideysa be7oos. Yaatin, nu nagara oothana mela denthethey Kiristoosa guusseyee? Ubbaka gidenna!
GAL 2:18 Hiza, ta laallidaysa zaarada keexiyaba gidiko taani ta huuphen higge mentheysa gideysa qoncisayis.
GAL 2:19 Taani Xoossaas daana mela higge baggara higges hayqas.
GAL 2:20 Taani Kiristoosara masqaliya bolla kaqetas. Taani hizape taw de7ike, shin Kiristoosi tanan de7ees. Ta ha77i de7iya de7oy, tana dosidi ta gisho bana aathidi immida Xoossaa Na7aa ammanada de7ayis.
GAL 2:21 Taani Xoossaa aadho keehatetha hada oothike. Xillotethi asas higge baggara bentiyaba gidiyako, Kiristoosi coo hayqis guussu.
GAL 3:1 Hinteno, akeeki bayna Galatiya asato, hinte ayfiya sinthan Kiristoosi masqale bolla kaqetida misileda qoncidi bentees. Yaatin, tumaas hinte kiitetonna mela hintena bitiday oonee?
GAL 3:2 Ta issiba eranaw koyayis; hinte Geeshsha Ayyaana ekiday higge naagidiye woyko hinte si7ida Wongela ammanidi ekidetii?
GAL 3:3 Hinte hessa mela eeyee? Hinte Xoossaa Ayyaanan doomidi, ha77i wolqan polanaw koyeetii?
GAL 3:4 Hinte Wongela gaason daro waayetiday melee? He waaye ubbay coo gididee?
GAL 3:5 Xoossay hintew Geeshsha Ayyaana immeynne hinte giddon malaatata oothey, hinte higge naagida gishoye woyko Wongela si7idi ammanida gisho?
GAL 3:6 Ane Abrahaame be7ite, “I Xoossaa ammanis; Xoossay iyaw hessa xillotethi oothidi ekis” geetetidi xaafetis.
GAL 3:7 Hiza, ammaneysati Abrahaame nayta gideysa erite.
GAL 3:8 Xoossay Ayhude gidonna asaa ammanon xillisanaysa Geeshsha Maxaafay be7idi, “Kawotetha ubbay nenan anjetana” yaagidi, Wongela Abrahaames kasetidi odis.
GAL 3:9 Hessa gisho, ammaniya ubbay ammanida Abrahaamera issife anjetidosona.
GAL 3:10 Higge naagidi xillana giya oonika baadetidaysa. Ayis giiko, Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Higge maxaafan xaafetida ubbaa naagonna oonika baadetidaysa gido” geetetidi xaafetis.
GAL 3:11 “Xilloy ammanon daana” geetetidi xaafetida gisho, oonika Xoossaa sinthan higge naagidi xillonnaysi eretidaba.
GAL 3:12 Higgey ammanon zempenna. Shin, “Higgiya naagiya oonika higgiyan de7on daana” yaagees.
GAL 3:13 “Mitha bolla kaqetidi hayqiya oonika baadetidaysa” geetetidi xaafetida gisho, Kiristoosi nu gisho baadetidaysa gididi, nuna higge baadethafe wozis.
GAL 3:14 Xoossay Abrahaames immida anjoy, Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara Ayhude gidonna asaa gakana melanne Xoossay immana gida Geeshsha Ayyaana nuuni ammanon ekana mela hessa oothis.
GAL 3:15 Ta ishato, ta hintew asa de7on meeze gididi de7iyaba leemiso oothada odayis. Asi caaqida caaqoy minnidaape guye, oonika he caaquwa shaaranaw woyko iya bolla haraa gujanaw danda7enna.
GAL 3:16 Xoossay he keeke qaala Abrahaamesinne iya zerethaas immis. Geeshsha Maxaafay, daro asas odiyada, “Ne zerethatas” geenna. Shin issi asas odiyada, “Ne zerethaas” yaagees; ika Kiristoosa.
GAL 3:17 Taani gey haysa; oyddu xeetanne hastamu laythafe guye imetida higgey, koyro Xoossay minthida caaquwa shaaridi ufaysa qaala dhaysanaw danda7enna.
GAL 3:18 Xoossay immiya laatay higgen eketiyaba gidiyako Xoossay immida ufaysaa baggara gideysi attees. Shin Xoossay ba aadho keehatethan laata Abrahaames ufaysa qaala baggara immis.
GAL 3:19 Yaatin, higgey ayis imetidee? Higgey imetiday, Abrahaames ufaysa qaali imetida kochay yaana gakanaw iita oosoy aybeko erisanaasa. Higgey kiitanchota baggara imetidi, giddo gididi sigethiya issi asa baggara ooso bolla pee7is.
GAL 3:20 Giddo gididi sigethiya uray issi asa xalaalas gidenna, shin Xoossay issino.
GAL 3:21 Yaatin, higgey Xoossaa ufaysa qaalara eqetiyee? Akay, gidenna! Higgey imetiday asas de7o immanaw gidiyako, xillotethi higge baggara bentanashin.
GAL 3:22 Shin Yesuus Kiristoosa ammanin bentiya ufaysa qaalay ammaneysatas imetana mela kumetha alamey nagaras haaretidi de7eysa Geeshsha Maxaafay odees.
GAL 3:23 Shin ammanoy yaanape kase higgey nuna qachi wothis. He ammanoy qoncana gakanaw higgey nu bolla gordi wothis.
GAL 3:24 Hessa gisho, nuuni ammanon xillana mela Kiristoosi yaana gakanaw higgey na7a naagiya asa mela nuna naageysa gidis.
GAL 3:25 Shin ha77i ammanoy yida gisho, higgey hizape guye na7a naagiya asa mela nuna naageysi attis.
GAL 3:26 Hinte ubbay Yesuus Kiristoosa ammanidi Xoossaa nayta gidideta.
GAL 3:27 Kiristoosara issino gidanaw xammaqetida ubbay Kiristoosa ma7oda ma7ideta.
GAL 3:28 Hinte ubbay Kiristoosan issino gidiya gisho, Ayhude asaa giddoninne Girike asaa giddon, aylle giddoninne womaanno giddon, adde giddoninne maccasa giddon dummatethi baawa.
GAL 3:29 Hiza, hinte Kiristoosaba gidiko hinte Abrahaame zare. Xoossaa ufaysa qaalada hinte laatteyisata.
GAL 4:1 Ta geysi haysa. Laattey na7aa gidi de7ishe, shalo ubbay iyabaa gidikoka, I ayllefe aykoka dummatenna.
GAL 4:2 Shin iya aaway gida wodey gakanaw I hadara ekidaysata kusheninne naageysata kushen de7ees.
GAL 4:3 Hessadaka, nuuni na7atethan de7iya wode alamiya wogaas aylletidi de7ida.
GAL 4:4 Shin wodey gakida wode Xoossay higgefe garsan, maccasape yeletida ba na7aa kiittis.
GAL 4:5 I hessa oothiday, higges haaretidi de7eyisata wozanawunne nuna ba nayta oothanaasa.
GAL 4:6 Nu Xoossaa nayta gidiya gisho, “Abbaa, Aawaw” gidi xeegiya ba Na7aa Ayyaana nu wozanaa giddo kiittis.
GAL 4:7 Hessa gisho, hizape neeni Xoossaa na7ape attishin, aylle gidaka. Neeni iya na7a gidiko, Xoossaa laatteysa gidadasa.
GAL 4:8 Hinte kase Xoossaa eronna wode xoosse gidonaysatas aylle gididi haaretideta.
GAL 4:9 Shin ha77i hinte Xoossaa erideta; ubbaraka Xoossan eretideta. Yaatin pathonnanne go77onna alame wogatako guye waanidi simmetii? Wodhi eqidi, waanidi entaw aylle gidanaw koyeetii?
GAL 4:10 Dumma gidida gallasata, ageenata, wodetanne laythata hinte loythi boncheta.
GAL 4:11 Tana hintebay yashshees; ta hintew coo daaburadinasha?
GAL 4:12 Ta ishato, ta hinteda hanida gisho, hinteka taada hanite gada hintena woossayis. Hinte tana aybinka qohibeeketa.
GAL 4:13 Taani koyro hargetashe hintew Wongela odidaysa hinte ereeta.
GAL 4:14 Ta hargey hintew paace gidikoka, tana saletibeketa; ixibeketa. Shin tana Xoossaa kiitancho woyko Kiristoos Yesuusa mokeysada mokideta.
GAL 4:15 Yaatin, he hintew de7iya ufaysay ubbay aw bidee? Hintew danda7etidaako, hinte taw, hinte ayfiya kessidi immiyako ixonnaysa ta markatayis.
GAL 4:16 Yaatin, ta hintew tuma odida gisho hintew morke gidadinaayee?
GAL 4:17 He asati hintena bantako zaaranaw koyoosona, shin enta qofay lo77osa gidenna. Enta qofay hintena shaakanaasanne hinte entaw qopana mela oothanaasa.
GAL 4:18 Lo77oba oothanaw amotiko lo77o, shin hessi ta hintera de7iya wode xalaala gidonashin ubba wode gido.
GAL 4:19 Ta siiqo nayto, Kiristoosi hintenan misiletana gakanaw maccasi yelos iqeteysada ta hinte gisho iqetayis.
GAL 4:20 Hintebay taw haddin ta un7etas; ha77i hinte giddon ta bentada shenetada odiyako ay mela dosaynashin.
GAL 4:21 Muse higgen haaretidi daanaw koyeysato, ane taw odite; higgey ay giyako ereketii?
GAL 4:22 Geeshsha Maxaafay, “Abrahaames gadhindefenne godatefe yeletida nam7u nayti de7oosona” yaagees.
GAL 4:23 Gadhinde na7ay asi na7a yeliya maaran yeletis, shin godate na7ay Xoossaa ufaysa qaalan yeletis.
GAL 4:24 Ha maccasati nam7u caaqotas leemiso gididi eketoosona. Entafe issinniya, Siina zumaape yidaara, ba nayta aylletethas yelasu; iyaka Aggaaro.
GAL 4:25 Aggaara Arabe biittan de7iya Siina zuman leemisetada ha77i de7iya Yerusalaame daanawusu. Ayis giiko, iya ba naytara aylletethan de7awusu.
GAL 4:26 Shin salon de7iya Yerusalaamey aylletethan de7uku; iya nu ubbaas aayo.
GAL 4:27 Geeshsha Maxaafay, “Naatte, yelonna maynthete ufayta; naate iqeta eronnaare ilila. Azinara de7iya maccaseepe, azini bayna maccasees nayti daro” yaagees.
GAL 4:28 Ta ishato, hinte Yisaaqada Xoossaa ufaysa qaalan yeletida nayta.
GAL 4:29 Shin he wode asa maarada yeletidaysi, Ayyaana wolqan yeletidaysa goodis. Hachika hessa mela.
GAL 4:30 Shin Geeshsha Maxaafay woygii? “Gadhinde na7ay godate na7aara issife laattonna gisho, aylliw I na7aara wolla kessa yedda” yaagees.
GAL 4:31 Hessa gisho, ta ishato, nuuni godate naytape attishin, gadhinde nayta gidoko.
GAL 5:1 Nuuni la77atethan daana mela Kiristoosi nuna aylletethaafe kessis. Hiza, minnidi eqite; zaaridi aylletetha qambaran gelopite.
GAL 5:2 Ta, Phawuloosi, geysa si7ite. Hinte qaxaretanaw koyko, Kiristoosi hintena aykoka maaddenna.
GAL 5:3 Qaxaretiya oonika higgey kiittiya ubbaa polanaw besseysa gujada ta odayis.
GAL 5:4 Higge naagidi xillanaw koyeysato, Kiristoosape shaaketideta; Xoossaa aadho keehatethaafe kundideta.
GAL 5:5 Shin nuuni Xoossaa Ayyaana baggara ammanon xillanaw ufaysan naagoos.
GAL 5:6 Hiza, Kiristoos Yesuusan de7iko, siiqon qonciya ammanope attishin, qaxaretin, qaxaretonna aggin nuna aykoka maaddenna.
GAL 5:7 Kase hinte lo77o woxeeta, shin ha77i tumaas kiitetonna mela hintena diggiday oonee?
GAL 5:8 Haysa mela iita cimoy hintena xeegida Xoossaafe yibeenna.
GAL 5:9 Hessika, “Guutha irshoy munuqa ubbaa denthees” geetetidi xaafetidaysa mela.
GAL 5:10 Hintew hara qofi baynaysas ta Godan ammanetayis. Shin hintena buqiya oonika Xoossafe ba pirdaa ekana.
GAL 5:11 Ta ishato, ta ha77i gakanaw qaxararetethi sabbakiyaba gidiko, yaatin tana ayis gooddona? Hessi tuma gidiyako Kiristoosa masqaliyaba tamaarsoy asas dhube gidennashin.
GAL 5:12 Hintena buqeysati qaxaretetha xalaala gidonashin, bantana qaaratiyakoka ta dosayis.
GAL 5:13 Ta ishato, hinte la77a daanaw xeegetideta. Gidoshin, hinte la77atethay asho amo polanaw hintew gaaso gidopo; hessafe aathidi issoy issuwa siiqon maaddite.
GAL 5:14 Higge ubbay, “Ase needa dosa” giya issi qaalan qashetis.
GAL 5:15 Shin hinte issoy issuwara saxetiyabaanne meetetiyabaa gidiko, hinte woli wursonna mela naagetite.
GAL 5:16 Hiza, ta hintew odayis; Ayyaanan de7ite; hinte asho amuwa polopite.
GAL 5:17 Asho amoy Ayyaana amuwara morke; qassi Ayyaana amoyka asho amuwara morke. Enti issoy issuwara ixetiya gisho hinte dosiyaba oothanaw danda7eketa.
GAL 5:18 Shin Ayyaanay hintena kaalethiyaba gidiko higgey hintena haarenna.
GAL 5:19 Asho oosoti eretidaysata; entika, laymatethi, tunatethi, qayxe,
GAL 5:20 eeqa goyinno, bita, morketethi, kachi, qanaate, hanqo, bana doso, shaaketethi, iita tobbo
GAL 5:21 gene, matho, yethinne hessa hessa melata. Kase ta hintew odidaysada ha77ika ta hintew odayis. Haysa melabata ootheysati Xoossaa kawotethaa laattokona.
GAL 5:22 Shin Ayyaana ayfey, siiqo, ufaysi, sarotethi, danda7a, keehatethi, lo77otethi, ammano,
GAL 5:23 ashketethi, bana haaro. Haysa melabata ixiya higgey baawa.
GAL 5:24 Kiristoos Yesuusaba gididaysati banta ashuwa iya iita qofaranne iya amuwara issife masqaliya bolla kaqidosona.
GAL 5:25 Nu Ayyaanan de7iyaba gidiko, nuna Ayyaanay kaaletho.
GAL 5:26 Ane issoy issuwa yiloyishenne qanaatishe coo ceeqeteysa aggoos.
GAL 6:1 Ta ishato, issi asi nagaran kundiko, Ayyaanan de7iya hinte he uraa ashketethan suurisite. Shin neeni hessa melaban paacetonna mela nena naaga.
GAL 6:2 Issoy issuwa deexo toohuwa tookite. Yaatiko Kiristoosa higgiya poleeta.
GAL 6:3 Issi asi aykoyka baawashin, bana haratape lo77o gidi qopiko, I bana cimmees.
GAL 6:4 Shin issi issi asi ba oosuwa paaco. Hessafe guye, haratara bana gaaddeyeysa aggidi baw ceeqetiyaba demmees.
GAL 6:5 Issi issi asi ba toohuwa baw tookanaw bessees.
GAL 6:6 Xoossaa qaala tamaariya oonika lo77oba ubbaa ba astamaariyara shaaketees.
GAL 6:7 Hinte, hintena cimmofite. Asi ba zeridabaa zaaridi cakiya gisho Xoossaa bolla qelqisopite.
GAL 6:8 Ba asho amuwa kunthanaw zeriya oonika, ba asho amuwape hayqo buucana. Shin Ayyaana ufaysanaw zeriya oonika Ayyaanape merinaa de7o cakana.
GAL 6:9 Ane lo77o ooso oothanaw azalleysa aggoos. Nuuni azallonna ixiko wodey gakiya wode nu zeridaysa cakana.
GAL 6:10 Nu inje wode demmiko, asa ubbaas, aathidika ammaniya asaas lo77oba oothoos.
GAL 6:11 Taani ta kushen, ay mela gita pidalen hintew xaafidaako be7ite.
GAL 6:12 Asa sinthan lo77o gididi bentanaw koyiya asati hinte qaxaretana mela koyoosona. Shin hessa enti oothey, Kiristoosa masqaliya gisho entana goodi gakonna melasa.
GAL 6:13 Enti hinte qaxaretethan ceeqetanaw koyidi hintena qaxareto goosonape attishin, qaxaretidaysatika banta huuphen higgiya naagokona.
GAL 6:14 Shin alamey taw kaqetidaysafenne taanika alamiyas kaqetida, Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa masqaliyape attishin, hara ceeqoy taape haako.
GAL 6:15 Hiza, qaxaretin qaxaretonna aggin aykoka maaddenna. Maaddey ooratha medhetethi gido.
GAL 6:16 Ha wogaa kaalliya ubbaasinne Xoossaa dere gidida Isra7eeles sarotethinne maarotethi gido.
GAL 6:17 Taani Yesuusas madunxida beeta ta asatethan tookida gisho, hizape tana oonika waaysopo.
GAL 6:18 Ta ishato, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa aadho keehatethay hintera gido. Amin7i.
EPH 1:1 Xoossaa shenen Kiristoos Yesuusa hawaare gidida Phawuloosape, Efesoonan de7iya geeshshatasinne Kiristoos Yesuusa ammaneysatas xaafetida kiitaa.
EPH 1:2 Xoossaa nu Aawapenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosape aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hintew gido.
EPH 1:3 Salon de7iya ayyaana anjo ubban Kiristoosa baggara nuna anjida, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa Aaway, Xoossay galatetto.
EPH 1:4 Nuuni iya sinthan geeshshatanne borey baynayisata gidana mela Xoossay alamey medhetanaape kase Kiristoosa baggara ba siiquwan nuna dooris.
EPH 1:5 Xoossay ba sheniyan ba dosidaysada Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara nuna ba nayta oothanaw kasetidi qopi wothis.
EPH 1:6 Xoossay ba siiqiya Na7aa baggara nuus coo immida aadho keehatethay bonchetana mela hessa oothis.
EPH 1:7 Xoossaa aadho keehatetha duretethaada Kiristoosa suuthan wozetidi nagara atotetha demmida.
EPH 1:8 Ba aadho keehatetha cincatethaninne eratethan kunthidi nuus immis.
EPH 1:9 Xoossay ba dosidaysada Kiristoosa baggara iya sheniya xuuraa nu erana mela oothis.
EPH 1:10 Wodey gakiya wode Xoossay polanaw qopida qofay, saloninne sa7an de7iya medhetetha ubbay Kiristoosape garsan gidana melasa.
EPH 1:11 Ubbabaa ba sheniyada oothiya Xoossay, kasetidi halchidaysa Kiristoosa baggara nuuni iyabaa gidana mela nuna dooris.
EPH 1:12 Hessa I oothiday, Kiristoosan ufaysi wothidi naagon koyro gidida nuuni Xoossaa bonchuwa galatan qoncisana melasa.
EPH 1:13 Hinteka hinte atotetha Wongela, hessika tuma qaala si7ida wode Kiristoosa ammanideta. Xoossay hintew immana gida Geeshsha Ayyaanan hinte attametideta.
EPH 1:14 Xoossaa bonchoy galatetana mela Xoossay ba asaa wozana gakanaw Geeshsha Ayyaana nuus oythu oothidi immis.
EPH 1:15 Hessa gisho, Godaa Yesuusa hinte ammaneysanne geeshshata ubbaa hinte siiqeysa ta si7ida wode
EPH 1:16 ta woosan hintena qopashe hinte gisho Xoossaa galateysa aggabike.
EPH 1:17 Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa Xoossay, boncho Aaway, Xoossaa hinte aathidi eranaada cincatethaanne qoncetha ayyaana hintew immanaada taani Xoossaa woossayis.
EPH 1:18 Xoossay hintena xeegida ufaysaynne geeshshati laattiya boncho laatay ay mela daroko hinte erana mela Xoossay hinte wozana ayfiya dooyana mela taani Xoossaa woossayis.
EPH 1:19 Qassi iya ammaniya nunan oothiya iya wolqay ay mela aadhida giteeko hinte erana mela woossayis. He wolqay xoonetonanne daaburonna wolqaa. Ha nunan de7idi oothiya wolqaynne,
EPH 1:20 Kiristoosa hayqope denthidi, salon Xoossaafe ushacha baggara utisida gita wolqay issino.
EPH 1:21 Iya sunthay, ayseysatapenne maata aawatape, haareysatapenne godatape, bolla gididi ha alamiya xalaalan gidonashin, sinthafe yaana alamiyanka hara sunthata ubbaafe dhoqa.
EPH 1:22 Xoossay ubba Kiristoosa tohope garsan haarisis; qassi woosa keethan, ubbaban Godaa gidana mela iya shuumis.
EPH 1:23 Woosa keethi Kiristoosa kumethi oothiya iya asatethi. Medhetethay de7iya bessa ubban Kiristoosi ba huuphen ubbaba kuntheysa.
EPH 2:1 Haysafe kase hinte, hinte nagaraanne hinte qohuwa gaason hayqidaysata.
EPH 2:2 He wode hinte ha alamiya iita ogiya kaallideta. Carkuwa bolla de7iya ayyaana wolqata halaqaasinne ha77ika Xoossaas kiitetonna asaa haariya ayyaanas kiitetideta.
EPH 2:3 Nu ubbayka kase he asata giddon nu asho amuwanne nu wozanaa sheniya kaallidi de7ida. Nuka harata mela nu medhetethan Xoossaa hanquwa ekanaw de7eyisata.
EPH 2:4 Shin Xoossaa gita maarotethaafenne nuus de7iya gita siiquwape dendidaysan,
EPH 2:5 hari attoshin nuuni nu qohuwan hayqidi de7ishin Kiristoosa baggara nuus de7o immis. Hinteka attiday Xoossaa aadho keehatethaana.
EPH 2:6 Xoossay nuna Kiristoosara issife hayqope denthidi salon iyara issife wothis.
EPH 2:7 I hessa oothiday, Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara nuus qoncisida ba keehatethaanne zawi bayna ba aadho keehatetha duretetha yaana laythan nuna bessanaasa.
EPH 2:8 Hinte aadho keehatethan ammanon attideta. Hessika, Xoossaa imotape attishin, hinte ooson bentidaba gidenna.
EPH 2:9 Oonika ceeqetonna mela atotethay bentiday ooson gidenna.
EPH 2:10 Nuuni Xoossaa medhetethi; I nuus kasetidi giigisi wothida lo77o oosota oothana mela Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara oorathi medhetida.
EPH 2:11 Hessa gisho, hinteno yeletan Ayhude gidonaysato, Ayhudeti bantaw asa kushen qaxaretidi, hintena qassi qaxaretiboonayisata gidi xeegeysa akeekite.
EPH 2:12 He wode hinte Kiristoosape shaaketi de7idaysa, Isra7eele asaas allaga gididi de7idaysa, Xoossaa ufaysa qaalape haakidi de7idaysanne ha alamiyan ufaysinne Xoossi bayna de7idaysa akeekite.
EPH 2:13 Shin hinte kase haakidi de7idaysati, ha77i Kiristoos Yesuusan de7idi Kiristoosa suuthan mata shiiqideta.
EPH 2:14 Kiristoosi nu sarotethaa; I Ayhudenne Ayhude gidonna asaa timidi, nam7aa shaaki wothida morketetha godaa laallis.
EPH 2:15 I banan ha nam7u kochatape issi ooratha ase medhidi, higgiya iya kiitaranne wogatara issife ba asatethan dhaysidi sarotethi immis.
EPH 2:16 Kiristoosi masqaliya bolla hayqidi morketetha dhaysis; qassi nam7u kochata issi asatethi oothidi Xoossara sigethis.
EPH 2:17 Kiristoosi yidi, Xoossaafe haakidi de7iya hintew, qassi matidi de7iya entaw sarotetha Wongela odis.
EPH 2:18 Nu ubbay iya baggara issi Ayyaanan Aawa sinthe shiiqanaw danda7oos.
EPH 2:19 Hizape hinte allaga woyko imathe gideketa, shin hinte ha77i geeshshata biitta asinne Xoossaa soo asi.
EPH 2:20 Hinte hawaaretinne nabeti baasida baasuwa bolla keexetideta. Godaa xaphuwa minthiya shuchay Kiristoos Yesuusa.
EPH 2:21 Iyan keetha ubbay issife oyketidi Godan geeshsha Xoossa keethi gidanaw diccees.
EPH 2:22 Hinte qassi Xoossay ba Ayyaanan de7iya keethi gidanaw Kiristoosan issife keexeteta.
EPH 3:1 Hessa gisho, taani, Phawuloosi, Ayhude gidonna hinte gisho Kiristoos Yesuusan qasho asi gidas.
EPH 3:2 Ta hintena maaddana mela Xoossay ba aadho keehatethan taw immida ha oosuwaba hinte loythi si7ideta.
EPH 3:3 Ta hintew kase qanthan xaafidaysada Xoossay ba xuuraa qoncethan taw qoncisis.
EPH 3:4 Ta xaafidaysa hinte nabbabiya wode Kiristoosa xuuraa ta ay mela eridaako hinte akeekanaw danda7eeta.
EPH 3:5 Ha xuuray geeshsha hawaaretasinne nabetas ha77i Ayyaana baggara qoncidaysada beni wode asaas hessada qoncisibeenna.
EPH 3:6 Xuuray haysa: Ayhude gidonna asay Wongela baggara Isra7eeletara issife Xoossaa anjuwa laattoosona. Isra7eeletara issi keetha asi gidoosona; Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara Xoossaa ufaysa qaala ekoosona.
EPH 3:7 Xoossay ba oothiya wolqaa baggara taw immida aadho keehatethan ha Wongelas oosancho gidas.
EPH 3:8 Taani geeshshata ubbaafe laafa gidikoka Ayhude gidonna asaas zawi bayna Kiristoosa duretetha Wongela odana mela ha aadho keehatethay taw imetis.
EPH 3:9 Qassi kase wodiyan ubbaa medhida Xoossan qosetidi de7iya xuuras, Xoossaa qofay aybeko qoncisanaw aadho keehatethay taw imetis.
EPH 3:10 Xoossay hessa oothiday ha77i wodiyan woosa keetha baggara salon de7iya halaqatasinne haareysatas ba dumma dumma qoncethaa erisanaasa.
EPH 3:11 Xoossay ba merinaa qofaa nu Godaa Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara polanaw hessa oothis.
EPH 3:12 Nu ammanon yashshi bayna Xoossako shiiqana mela Kiristoosi nuus minotethinne la77atethi immis.
EPH 3:13 Taani hinte gisho waaye ekiya gisho, hinte ta waayan yeellatonnaada hintena woossayis; taani hinte bonchuwas waayetayis.
EPH 3:14 Taani aawa sinthan gulbatada woossey hessa gishosa.
EPH 3:15 Saloninne sa7an de7iya issi issi soo asay iyan sunthetees.
EPH 3:16 Xoossay ba boncho duretethaafe hinte garsa asatethaa minthiya wolqaa ba Ayyaana baggara immana mela hintew woossayis.
EPH 3:17 Qassi ammanon Kiristoosi hinte wozanan daana melanne hinte siiqon xapho yeddidi minnidi daana mela woossayis.
EPH 3:18 Hessadaka, Kiristoosa siiqoy ay mela dalgeko, adusseko, dhoqekonne ciimmoko geeshshata ubbaara, hinte akeekana wolqa demmana mela woossayis.
EPH 3:19 Eratethaafe aadhiya Kiristoosa siiquwa hinte erana mela qassi de7o immiya Xoossaa wolqan hinte kumana mela ta woossayis.
EPH 3:20 Hiza, nu giddon oothiya ba wolqaa baggara nuuni woosseysafe woyko qopeysafe aathidi oothanaw danda7iya Xoossaas,
EPH 3:21 woosa keethaninne Kiristoos Yesuusan wode ubban merinaape merinaa gakanaw bonchoy gido. Amin7i.
EPH 4:1 Hiza, Godaa gisho qashetida taani, hinte xeegetida xeessas bessiya de7o daana mela hintena woossayis.
EPH 4:2 Hinte ubba wode aadatanne hayo gidite; issoy issuwa danda7itenne siiqon de7ite.
EPH 4:3 Sarotethan qashetidi Ayyaanay immiya issifetetha naaganaw minnite.
EPH 4:4 Xoossay hintena xeegida wode issi ufaysas xeegidaysada issi asatethinne issi Ayyaani de7ees.
EPH 4:5 Issi Goday, issi ammanoynne issi xinqatey de7ees.
EPH 4:6 Ubbaafe bolla gidida, ubbaa baggara oothiyanne ubbaa giddon de7iya issi Xoossay, ubbaa Aaway de7ees.
EPH 4:7 Shin Kiristoosi immanaw koydaysada nu issoy issoy dumma dumma imota ekida.
EPH 4:8 Hessa gisho, Xoossaa qaalay, “I pude keyida wode di7etida darota baara ekidi bis; asaaska imota immis” yaagees.
EPH 4:9 Yaatin, “Pude keyis” guussay woy guussee? I koyro duge, sa7aa ziqa bessaa wodhis guussu gidonna ixiko ay guussee?
EPH 4:10 Ha duge wodhidaysi, ubba bessan bentanaw ubbaafe dhoqa saluwa keydaysi iya.
EPH 4:11 I issota issota hawaareta, issota issota nabeta, issota issota Wongela sabaaketa, issota issota woosa keethi heemmeyisata, issota issota astamaareta oothidi immis.
EPH 4:12 I hessa oothiday Kiristoosa asatethi gidida woosa keethi dichanawunne ammaniya asaa Xoossaa oosos giigisanaasa.
EPH 4:13 Hessadaka, nu ubbay Xoossaa Na7aa eridi ammanon bentiya issifetethaako gakidi, Kiristoosa ayyaana de7uwa kumethi gakidi diccana melasa.
EPH 4:14 Hizape guye, asaa gene cimon giigida balethiya wordo timirte carkoninne hobben gedenne haa kuullo kaa7iya nayta mela gidanaw bessenna.
EPH 4:15 Shin nuuni tumaa siiqon odishe, asatethaas huuphe gidiya Kiristoosara de7iya issifetetha guji guji dichoos.
EPH 4:16 Kumetha asatethay Kiristoosa bolla zempees qassi dumma dumma asatethaa billiteti issoy issuwara oyketidi uttis. Issi issi asatethaa kifiley ba oosuwa oothiya wode kumetha asatethay siiqon diccees.
EPH 4:17 Hessa gisho, taani haysa hintew Godaa sunthan odaysinne markatayis. Go77i bayna qofaa qopiya Ayhude gidonna asatada de7opite.
EPH 4:18 Enta qofay dhumis; banta wozanaa muumisidosona. Enti eratetha dhayoninne ixas gidi Xoossay immiya de7uwape haakidosona.
EPH 4:19 Enti yeella giyaba erokona; enti laymatethas bantana aathidi immidosona; qassi tunabaa ubbaa guye goonna oothosona.
EPH 4:20 Shin hinte Kiristoosa eriday hessa mela ogen gidenna.
EPH 4:21 Iyabaa tuma si7ideta. Qassi Yesuusan de7iya tumaa mela iyape tamaarideta.
EPH 4:22 Hinte kase de7ida de7o ogiya aggite. Qassi ba cimmiya amon dhayiya hinte ceega asatethaa diggite.
EPH 4:23 Hinte wozanaa qofan ooraxite.
EPH 4:24 Tuma xillotethaninne geeshshatethan Xoossaa leemison medhetida ooratha asatethaa ma7ite.
EPH 4:25 Hiza, wordo odetofite. Nuuni ubbay Kiristoosa asatethaa billiteta gidiya gisho asa ubbaara tuma odetite.
EPH 4:26 Hanqetite, shin hinte hanquwan nagara oothopite. Hinte hanqeti de7ishin awi wullofo.
EPH 4:27 Xalahes besse immofite.
EPH 4:28 Kaysotiya uray hizape guye kaysotopo. Shin manqota maaddiyabay iyaw daana mela ba kushen lo77oba ootho.
EPH 4:29 Hinte doonape iita qaali keyopo. Shin si7eyisata go77ana melanne harata minthethiya koshshiya lo77o qaali hinte doonape keyo.
EPH 4:30 Xoossay hintena woziya gallasas hintena attamidi wothida Xoossaa Ayyaana azzanthofite.
EPH 4:31 Cametethi, yilo, hanqo, waaso, cashshenne iita ubbaa hintefe haassite.
EPH 4:32 Aathidi issoy issuwas keehanne qadheteyisata gidite. Xoossay Kiristoosa baggara hintew atto gidaysada hinteka wolis atto giite.
EPH 5:1 Hiza, Xoossay dosiya naytada iya daanite.
EPH 5:2 Kiristoosi nuna dosidi bana nu gisho Xoossaas sawiya imonne yarsho oothidi immidaysada hinteka siiqon de7ite.
EPH 5:3 Shin laymatethi, tunatethinne uuzetethi ammaniya asaas bessonna gisho hinte giddon ubbaraka si7etofo.
EPH 5:4 Xoossaa galatitepe attishin, yeellayabaynne eeya odi woyko qidhey hintew bessonna gisho hinte giddon ubbaka de7opo.
EPH 5:5 Haysa erite; oonika laymatey woyko tunabaa oothey woyko uuzetey Kiristoosa kawotethaanne Xoossaa kawotethaa laattanaw danda7enna. Uuzetethi eeqa goyinno mela.
EPH 5:6 Hayisata gaason Xoossaa hanqoy kiitetonna asaa bolla yaana gisho oonika hintena pathonna odan cimmofo.
EPH 5:7 Hessa mela asaara issifetethi oothopite.
EPH 5:8 Kase hinte dhuman de7ideta, shin ha77i Godaa baggara poo7on de7eeta. Hiza, poo7o asada poo7on simeretite.
EPH 5:9 Poo7oy lo77otethi, xillotethinne tumatethi ayfees.
EPH 5:10 Godaa ufaysiyabaa oothanaw koyite.
EPH 5:11 Go77i bayna dhuma ooso qoncisitepe attishin, iyara issifopite.
EPH 5:12 Enti geeman oothiya oosuwa hari attoshin odanawuka yeellayees.
EPH 5:13 Shin ubbabay poo7on keyiya wode qoncen bentees.
EPH 5:14 Poo7oy ubbaba qoncen bessees. Hessa gisho, “Neno dhiskeyso barka; hayqope denda; Kiristoosi ne bolla poo7ana” yaagetis.
EPH 5:15 Hiza, hinte waanidi de7iyako akeeki be7ite. Cincata giditepe attishin, eeyata gidopite.
EPH 5:16 Laythay iita gidiya gisho injetiya wode ubbaa go7etite.
EPH 5:17 Hessa gisho, Godaa sheney aybeko akeekitepe attishin, eeyopite.
EPH 5:18 Geeshsha Ayyaanan gallas gallas kumitepe attishin, dhayoko hintena kaalethiya gisho woyne ushshan mathotofite.
EPH 5:19 Mazmuren, sabaninne ayyaana yethan, issoy issuwara odetite. Qassi hinte wozanan yexishenne sabbishe Godaa galatite.
EPH 5:20 Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa sunthan ubba wode Xoossaa Aawa ubbabaas galatite.
EPH 5:21 Kiristoosa bonchuwas gidi issoy issuwas haaretite.
EPH 5:22 Macheto, Godaas haareteysada hinte azinatas haaretite.
EPH 5:23 Kiristoosi woosa keethaas huuphe gideysada azinika ba machees huuphe. Qassi Kiristoos ba asatethi gidida woosa keethaa ashsheysa.
EPH 5:24 Shin woosa keethay Kiristoosas haareteysada macheti banta azinatas ubbaban haaretanaw bessees.
EPH 5:25 Azinatoo, Kiristoosi woosa keethaa dosidi bana iw immidaysada hinteka hinte macheta dosite.
EPH 5:26 I woosa keethaa ba qaala baggara haathan meeccidi geeshshis.
EPH 5:27 Kiristoosi woosa keethaa qiti woyko som7o tuussi woyko hessa melabay bayna I kumetha bonchuwara geeshshinne boretonaaro oothidi baako shiishanaw koyidi hessa oothis.
EPH 5:28 Hessadaka, azinati bantana doseysada banta macheta dosanaw bessees. Ba machiw doseysi bana dosees.
EPH 5:29 Bana ixiya asi oonika baawa, shin Kiristoosi woosa keethaas ootheysada ba asatethaa muzeesinne naagees.
EPH 5:30 Nuuni Kiristoosa asatethaa billiteta.
EPH 5:31 Xoossaa qaalay, “Hessa gisho, asi ba aawanne ba aayiw aggidi, ba machera issife daana; enti nam7ayka issi asho gidana” yaagees.
EPH 5:32 Haysi gita xuura, shin taani hessa Kiristoosabaanne woosa keethabaa leemiso oothada odayis.
EPH 5:33 Gidoshin, hinte issoy issoy hinte macheta hinte, hintena doseysada dosite. Issi issi macha ba azinaa bonchanaw bessees.
EPH 6:1 Nayto, hinte Godaaba gidiya gisho hintena yelidaysatas kiitetite. Hessi hintew bessiyaba.
EPH 6:2 “Ne aayiwunne ne aawa boncha.” Hessi ufaysa qaali de7iya koyro kiitaa.
EPH 6:3 “Ne hessa poliyaba gidiko ubbay new injetana; ne laythay sa7a bolla aduqana.”
EPH 6:4 Aawato, hinte nayta Godaa qaala tamaarsoninne enta kaaleson dichitepe attishin, entana caamisopite.
EPH 6:5 Aylleto, Kiristoosas kiiteteysada hinte sa7a godatas yashshan, bonchoninne suure wozanan kiitetite.
EPH 6:6 Enta sinthan saba demmanaw enti be7iya wode xalaala oothopite. Shin Kiristoosa aylletada Xoossaa sheniya wozanape polite.
EPH 6:7 Asas gidonashin, Godaas gidi hinte kumetha wozanaape oothite.
EPH 6:8 Aylle gidin woyko godaa gidin issoy issoy ba oothida lo77o oosuwas Godaape woyto ekanaysa ereeta.
EPH 6:9 Godato, asa som7o be7idi maaddonna Goday, saluwan de7eysa ereeta. Hessa gisho, hinte aylleta mandeysa aggidi enti hintew bonchon kiiteteysa mela hinte entaw lo77oba oothite.
EPH 6:10 Wursethan, Godaaninne iya gita wolqan minnite.
EPH 6:11 Xalahe cimuwa eqetanaw danda7ana mela Xoossay hintew immida ola miishiya ubbaa ma7ite.
EPH 6:12 Nu olay asara gidonashin, salon de7iya tuna ayyaana olanchotara, maata aawatara, haareysataranne ha dhuma alamiya wolqatara.
EPH 6:13 Hessa gisho, iita gallasaa teqanawunne ubbaa polidi, minnidi eqanaw hinte danda7ana mela Xoossaa ola miisheta ubbaa ma7ite.
EPH 6:14 Tumaa xeessan dancoda dancidi, xillotethaa xurureda tiran wothidi, sarotethaa Wongela hinte tohuwan caammada aathidi minnidi eqite.
EPH 6:16 He ubbaafe aathidi, Xalahey yeddiya laxiya tama donge ubbaa toysanaw danda7iya ammanuwa ubba wode gondalleda oykite.
EPH 6:17 Xoossaa atotetha birata barneexada hinte huuphen wothite; qassi Geeshsha Ayyaana mashsha ika, Xoossaa qaala oykite.
EPH 6:18 Woossa aggofite; haratasika gaannatite; ubba wode Ayyaanan woossite. Hessan, geeshshatas saletonna minnidi ubba wode woossite.
EPH 6:19 Taani Wongela xuuraa yashshi bayna qoncisada odana mela Xoossay taw qaala immana mela woossite.
EPH 6:20 Taani hessa oothanaw kiitetas ha77ika qashon de7ey he Wongela gishosa. Yaaniya gisho, taani yashshi bayna besseysada odana mela taw woossite.
EPH 6:21 Taani waana de7iyakonne ay oothiyako hinte erana mela nu siiqo ishay, Godaa oosuwan ammanetida oosanchoy, Tikiqoosi, tabaa ubbaa hintew odana.
EPH 6:22 Nuuni ubbay waanidi de7iyako hintew odana melanne hintena minthethana mela taani iya hinteko kiittas.
EPH 6:23 Xoossaa Aawape, Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosape sarotethaynne siiqoy ammanora issife ammaniya ubbaas gido.
EPH 6:24 Irxonna siiqon nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa siiqiya ubbaara Xoossaa aadho keehatethay gido.
PHI 1:1 Kiristoos Yesuusara issifida gisho, Xoossaba gidida, Filphisiyuusa kataman de7iya woosa keethaa cimatasinne daaqoneta ubbaas. Yesuus Kiristoosa aylle gidida, Phawuloosapenne Ximotiyoosape kiitetida kiitaa.
PHI 1:2 Nu Aawa Xoossaafenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosape aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hintew gido.
PHI 1:3 Taani hintena qopiya wode ubban, ta Xoossaa galatayis.
PHI 1:4 Taani hinte ubbaas Xoossaa woossiya wode ufaysan woossayis.
PHI 1:5 Hinte koyro gallasape ha77i gakanaw, Wongela markateysan taara issife gididi, tana maaddida gisho, Xoossaa galatayis.
PHI 1:6 Hinte giddon lo77o ooso doomida Xoossay, Kiristoos Yesuusi simmiya gallasay gakanaw, polanaysa erayis.
PHI 1:7 Hinte ubba wode ta wozanan de7eeta. Taani ubba wodeka hessada qopanaw bessees. Ha77i taani qashon de7ashenne qashetanaape sinthe Wongela naagoninne Wongela mintha eson Xoossay taw qaadida qaada hinteka taara shaaketideta.
PHI 1:8 Taani hintena ubbaa Kiristoos Yesuusa siiquwan ay mela laamotiyako Xoossay taw marka.
PHI 1:9 Hinte siiqoy tuma eratetharanne akeekara issife guji guji diccana mela Xoossaa woossayis.
PHI 1:10 Hessan hinte lo77oba shaakidi, dooreyisata, Kiristoosi simmiya gallasan geeshshatanne boretonayisata gidana.
PHI 1:11 Hinte de7oy Xoossaa bonchuwasinne galatas Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara bentiya xillotethaa ayfiyan kumidi ayfana.
PHI 1:12 Ta ishato, tana gakida ubbay Wongelay dalgana mela tuma maaddidaysa hinte erana mela koyayis.
PHI 1:13 Taani Kiristoosa gisho qashetidaysa, kawo gadho naageysatinne haysan de7iya harati ubbay eroosona.
PHI 1:14 Ta qashuwa gaason nu ishatape daroti Godan keehi ammanetidosona. Hessa gisho, Xoossaa qaala yashshi bayna kasepe minnidi odana mela minotethi demmidosona.
PHI 1:15 Gidoshin, issoti issoti qanaateninne palaman Kiristoosaba odoosona, shin harati suure wozanape odoosona.
PHI 1:16 Suure wozanape odeysati, Xoossay taw Wongela naagana mela hadara immidaysa eriya gisho, siiqon odoosona.
PHI 1:17 Shin tana qanaateysati ta qashuwa bolla hara meto ehanaba entaw daanin bantana dosidi Kiristoosaba odoosonape attishin, tuma wozanape odokona.
PHI 1:18 Hessi aykoka metenna. Tuma ogen gidin woyko wordo ogen gidin he ubban Kiristoosi sabbaketees. Tana hessi ufaysees. Qassi harabay tana ufaysiyabay,
PHI 1:19 taani hinte woosaninne Yesuus Kiristoosa Ayyaana maaduwan attanaysa eriya gisho tana ufaysees.
PHI 1:20 Ta gita amoynne ufaysan naagiya naagoy ta yeellatonna attanaysa. Shin ubba wode ootheysada, ha77ika taani paxa de7in woyko hayqin yayyonna ta kumetha asatethan Kiristoosi bonchetana gada minotethan odayis.
PHI 1:21 Ta de7ikoka Kiristoosa xalaalas de7ayis; qassi ta hayqikoka taw aadhida wodhe.
PHI 1:22 Shin ta paxa de7iko ayfey de7iya ooso oothana. Shin paxa de7eysafenne hayqope awusa dooraneko taw eretenna.
PHI 1:23 Taani ha nam7atape awusa dooraneko un7etas. Ha de7uwape shaaketada Kiristoosara issife daanaw amottayis; Kiristoosara issife de7eysi ubbaafe aadhida lo77o.
PHI 1:24 Shin taani hinte gisho paxa de7eysi hintew daro koshshiyaba.
PHI 1:25 Hessa taani geeshshada erayis; taani, hinte ammanon diccanaadanne ufaytanaada hintera paxa daana.
PHI 1:26 Hessa gisho, taani hinteko simmada yaa wode, Kiristoos Yesuusara hinte de7iya de7uwan tanan de7iya ceeqetethay hintew darana.
PHI 1:27 Ubbaafe aathidi, hinte Kiristoosa Wongelas boncho ehiya de7o de7ite. Ta hintena be7in woyko be7onna ixin, hinte issi qofan minni eqidi, harati Wongelan ammanana mela issi wozanan gididi issife baaxeteysa ta si7ana.
PHI 1:28 Hinte morketas yayyofite. Enti hintera eqetiyaba gidiko hessi hintew atotethas, entaw dhayos Xoossaafe gidida malla.
PHI 1:29 Kiristoosas oothiya qaaday hintew imetiday, hinte iya ammanana mela xalaala gidonashin hinte iya gisho meto ekana melasa.
PHI 1:30 Hessa gisho, hinte ta waayiya kase be7ideta; ha77ika ta waayeteysa si7eeta. Hinteka ta waayiya mela waayeteta.
PHI 2:1 Kiristoosan hinte de7iya de7oy hintena minthees; qassi iya siiqoyka hintena minthethees. Geeshsha Ayyaanara hintew issifetethi de7ees; hinte haratas keehetanne qadheteta.
PHI 2:2 Hiza, hinte issi qofan, siiqon, issi wozananinne ayyaanan issino gididi tana polo ufaysite.
PHI 2:3 Hintena doson woyko ceeqetiya hada amon issibaaka oothopite. Shin hinte issoy issuwafe gitatayis yaagidi qoponna hintena kawushite.
PHI 2:4 Hinte issoy issoy, hara asi maaddiyaba koyitepe attishin, hintena maaddiyaba xalaala koyopite.
PHI 2:5 Kiristoos Yesuusan de7iya qofay hintenan daanaw bessees.
PHI 2:6 Iyaw ubba wode Xoossa hanoti de7ees. Gidoshin, iya Xoossara issino oothiya hanota, wolqan ekanaw koybeenna.
PHI 2:7 Gidoshin, I baw de7iya bonchuwa ubbaa aggidi, aylle medheta ekis; ase daanidi qoncis.
PHI 2:8 I bana kawushis; hayqana gakanaw, hari attoshin masqaliya bolla hayqanaw kiitetis.
PHI 2:9 Hessa gisho, Xoossay iya daro dhoqu dhoqu oothis; qassi suntha ubbaafeka aadhiya dhoqa sunthaa immis.
PHI 2:10 Saloninne sa7an, sa7ape garsan de7iya ubbay, Yesuusa sunthaa bonchuwas gulbatana.
PHI 2:11 Asa ubbay banta inxarsan, Yesuus Kiristoosa Godaa yaagidi, Xoossaa Aawa bonchuwas markatana.
PHI 2:12 Ta ishato, taani hintera de7iya wode ubban hinte kiitetidaysada, ha77i taani hinte matape haakinka, kaseysafe aathidi, kiitetanaw bessees. Xoossaas yashshaninne kokorsan hinte atotetha polanaw oothite.
PHI 2:13 Xoossay, hinte iyaw ero gidi kiitetana mela ubba wode hinte giddon oothees.
PHI 2:14 Ay ooso oothisheka zuuzumonna woyko palamonna oothite.
PHI 2:15 Geellanne nagarancho asaa giddon boretonayisata, geeshshatanne pokoy bayna Xoossaa naytada gidite. Hinte enta giddon salo xoolintoda poo7ishe,
PHI 2:16 de7o immiya kiitaa entaw odite. He wode ta daabursaynne ta oosoy mela attiboona gisho, Kiristoosi yaa gallas ta hintenan ceeqetana.
PHI 2:17 Hinte Xoossaas immiya ammano imota bolla ta suuthay ushsha yarshoda gukikoka tana ufaysees. Hinteka taara ufaytana.
PHI 2:18 Hessada hinteka ufaytidi tanaka ufaysanaw bessees.
PHI 2:19 Taani hinte de7uwabaa si7ada ufaytanaw Ximotiyoosa hinteko ellesada yeddana mela Godaa Yesuusi tana maaddanaysa ammanetayis.
PHI 2:20 Hinte de7uwas wozanape qopiya iya mela asi hari oonika baawa.
PHI 2:21 Harati bantana go77iyabaa koyoosonape attishin, Yesuus Kiristoosi koyaba oothokona.
PHI 2:22 I taara issife gididi na7i ba aawas ootheysada Wongela ooso oothidaysanne ammanetiya asi gideysa hinte ereeta.
PHI 2:23 Hessa gisho, tabay haniyaba be7ada ellesada iya hinteko yeddana gada qopayis.
PHI 2:24 Taani, ta huuphen mata woden hinteko baanaysa Godan ammanetayis.
PHI 2:25 Hessadaka, taani, ta ishaa Ephafiraditusa, taara issife ta bagga gididi oothidaysa, oletidaysanne, tana maaddanaw hintew kiitetidaysa, hinteko kiittanaw qopas.
PHI 2:26 I hintena ubbaa be7anaw daro laamotees. Qassi I hargetidaysa hinte si7ida gisho, ba wozanan daro un7etis.
PHI 2:27 I tuma hargetidi, hayqi kichidi attis. Shin Xoossay iyaw qadhetis. Iya xalaalas gidonashin, azzanoy azzano bolla guzhetonnaada tawuka qadhetis.
PHI 2:28 Hiza, hinte iya zaari be7idi ufaytanaada tawuka ta wozanaa seelay irxanaada taani iya ellesada hinteko yeddanaw amottayis.
PHI 2:29 Godaas haggaaziya asada iya kumetha ufaysan mokite. Qassi iya mela asa ubbaa bonchite.
PHI 2:30 Hinte ta matan gididi oothanaw danda7onna maaddiya maaddidi Kiristoosa oosuwa gisho, ba shempuwas mishetonna ixidi hayqi kichidi attis.
PHI 3:1 Wursethan, ta ishato, hinte Godaaba gidiya gisho, ufaytite. Taani kase xaafidaysa zaarada xaafanaysi tana waaysenna, shin hintena balape naagana.
PHI 3:2 Iitabaa oothiya kanatape, qassi qaxaretanaw koshshees giya iita asatape naagetite.
PHI 3:3 Nuuni Xoossaa Geeshsha Ayyaanan goyinniya gishonne nu de7uwan Kiristoos Yesuusan ceeqetiya gisho, tuma qaxaro qaxaretidaysata. Nuuni kare asatethaa bolla oosetiyaban ceeqetoko.
PHI 3:4 Ta kare asatethan ceeqetanaw koshshiko ta daroban ceeqetanaw danda7ayis. Ay asika ba kare asatethan ceeqetiyabay baw de7ees gidi qopiko, taani iyape daro aadhada ceeqetiyabay de7ees.
PHI 3:5 Taani yeletida saamintara qaxaretas. Taani yeletan Isra7eele; taani Biniyaame koche; taani walaki bayna Ayhude ase. Ayhude higge naagon gidiko taani Farsaawe.
PHI 3:6 Ayhude ammanuwas mishetethan gidiko taani woosa keethaa yedethas. Issi asi higge naagidi xilliyaba gidiko, tanan borey bentibeenna.
PHI 3:7 Shin kase tana maaddees gada qopidaba ubbaa, Kiristoosa gisho gada maaddonnaba oothada taybas.
PHI 3:8 Hessa xalaala gidonashin, taani ta Godaa Kiristoos Yesuusa ereysi haraba ubbaafe daro aadhiya gisho, he ubbaa wodhey baynabaada taybas. Taani iya gisho ubbaba dhayas. Kiristoosa demmanaw ubbaba wora holetida buureda taybayis. Taani Yesuusara issino gidas.
PHI 3:9 Taani higges kiitetada demmiya ta huuphe xillotethi taw baawa. Kiristoosa ammanin bentiya xillotethay, Xoossaa matape yaa xillotethay ha77i taw de7ees.
PHI 3:10 Taani Kiristoosanne iya dendo wolqaa eranaw koyayis. Taani iya metuwa iyara shaaketanawunne iya hayquwan iya daananaw amottayis.
PHI 3:11 Hessadaka, hayqope dendada merinaw de7on daanaysa ufaysi oothayis.
PHI 3:12 Taani ha77i gaxa gakas woyko tanan bali baawa giike. Shin Kiristoos Yesuusi tana oykida gisho taani ta sinthan de7iya woytuwa oykanaw woxaysinne butetayis.
PHI 3:13 Ta ishato, taani hessa demmas gada qopike, shin taani issiba oothayis. Taape guyera de7eysa dogada sinthan de7eysa oykanaw zaaturayis.
PHI 3:14 Hessa gisho, taani gaxa gakanaw woxayis. Xoossay Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara salo de7uwas xeegida woytuwa ekanaw daaburayis.
PHI 3:15 Hiza, nuuni Ayyaanan gashtida ubbay hessa qopanaw bessees. Hintefe baggatas dummatiya qofi de7iko, hessaka Xoossay hintew qoncisana.
PHI 3:16 Gidikoka, nuuni hanno gakanaw de7ida de7uwan, ane sinthe boos.
PHI 3:17 Ta ishato, tana daanite; hessadaka, nu leemisuwa kaalliya asata akeekidi be7ite.
PHI 3:18 Taani hessa hintew kase daro toho odas, shin ha77ika zaarada afuthan odayis. Kiristoosa masqaliyas bantana morke oothida daro asati de7oosona.
PHI 3:19 Enta wursethay dhayo; enta uloy entaw xoosse. Yeellatanaw bessiyaban enti ceeqetoosona; qassi ha sa7aba xalaala qopoosona.
PHI 3:20 Nu biittay saluwana. Salope yidi nuna ashshiya Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa naagoos.
PHI 3:21 Kiristoosi ubbaba ba maatape garsan oothanaw danda7iya ba wolqan nu daaburancho asatethaa laammidi ba boncho asatethaa daanisana.
PHI 4:1 Ta ishato, ta doseysato, ta laamoteysato, tana ufayseysato, tana gitayeysato, hiza, Godan minnidi eqite.
PHI 4:2 Ewoodanne Sinxika, hinte nam7ay, issi qofan, michida Godan daanada taani hintena zorayis.
PHI 4:3 Taara oothiya ammantheyso, neeni ha maccasata maaddana mela ta nena woossayis. Ha maccasati taara, Qeleminxoosaranne enta sunthay Xoossaa de7o maxaafan xaafetida haratara issife wongela ubba bessaa gathanaw daaburidosona.
PHI 4:4 Godaara hinte de7iya de7uwan ubba wode ufaytite. Taani hessa gujadaka odayis; ufaytite.
PHI 4:5 Asi ubbay hinte ashketetha ero; Goday matan yaana.
PHI 4:6 Hinte Xoossaa woossiya wode ubban iya galatishe, hintena koshshiyaba ubbaas woossitepe attishin, aybibaasika hirgofite.
PHI 4:7 Asa eratetha ubbaafe aadhiya Xoossaa sarotethay, hinte wozanaanne hinte qofaa Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara naagana.
PHI 4:8 Wursethan, ta ishato, hinte wozanan lo77obaanne galatisiyaba qopite. Tuma gidiyaba ubbaa, bonchoba ubbaa, qoho gidonnaba ubbaa, geeshshaba ubbaa, siiqoba ubbaanne ufaysiyaba ubbaa qopite.
PHI 4:9 Hinte taape tamaaridaba, ekidaba, si7idabanne be7idaba ubbaa oothite. Sarotethi immiya Xoossay hintera issife gidana.
PHI 4:10 Daro wodepe guye, hinte tabaa zaaridi qopanaw doomida gisho taani Godan daro ufaytayis. Hessa guussay, taw qopanaw hintew injetonna ixidaysafe attishin, taw qofaa aggibeketa.
PHI 4:11 Taani hessa tana metida gisho giike; taw de7iyabay gidana guussu tamaaras.
PHI 4:12 Taani metootetidi de7iya duussi erayis; qassi duretidi de7iya duussika erayis. Awun gidin qassi ay wodeka taani kalonne kosha, pacenne palaha tamaaras.
PHI 4:13 Kiristoosi taw immiya wolqan ubbaba oothanaw danda7ayis.
PHI 4:14 Gidikoka, hinte ta metuwa taara ekidaysan lo77o oothideta.
PHI 4:15 Filphisiyuusa asato, Wongela koyro odanaw taani Maqedoonepe keyiya wode immiyabanka ekiyabanka hinte woosa keethaafe attishin, hari tana maaddiboonaysa hinte ereeta.
PHI 4:16 Teselonqen metoy gakida wodeka tana zaari zaaridi maaddideta.
PHI 4:17 Taani, hintefe imota ekanaw koyada gidonashin, imope yaa anjuwa hinte ekana melasa.
PHI 4:18 Taani, hinte immida ubbaanne gididi palaheysa ekas. Hinte yeddida ubbaa Ephafiraditusape ekas; koshshiyaba ubbay taw de7ees. Hinte taw yeddida imoy Xoossaas sawo tonku giya, I dosiya, I ufaytiya yarsho mela.
PHI 4:19 Ta Xoossay ba boncho duretethaafe, Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara hintew koshshiyaba ubbaa immana.
PHI 4:20 Nu Aawa Xoossaas merinaape merinaa gakanaw bonchoy gido. Amin7i.
PHI 4:21 Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara Xoossaba gidida ubbaa saro giite. Taara de7iya ishati hintena saro goosona.
PHI 4:22 Xoossaba gidida asa ubbay, ubbaafe aathidi Kawa Qeesare keethan de7eysati hintena saro goosona.
PHI 4:23 Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa aadho keehatethay hintera gido.
COL 1:1 Xoossaa shenen Kiristoosi Yesuusa hawaare gidida Phawuloosinne nu ishaa Ximotiyoosi,
COL 1:2 Qolaasiyasa kataman de7iya Kiristoosan geeshshatasinne ammanetida asaas xaafida kiitaa. Xoossaa nu Aawape aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hintew gido.
COL 1:3 Nuuni hintew woossiya wode Xoossaa nu Godaa, Yesuus Kiristoosa Aawa ubba wode galatoos.
COL 1:4 Nuuni Kiristoos Yesuusan de7iya hinte ammanuwanne geeshshata ubbaas de7iya hinte siiquwa si7ida.
COL 1:5 Hessa hinte oothiday hinte ufaysay salon hintew naagetida gishosa. Hinte tuma kiitta gidida Wongela koyro ammanida wode he ufaysaa si7ideta.
COL 1:6 Hinte he Wongela si7ida wodenne Xoossaa aadho keehatetha tumaa shaaki erida wodepe doomidi hinte giddon hanidaysada biitta ubban diccishenne ayfishe de7ees.
COL 1:7 Hinte hessa nuura issife Kiristoosas oothiya ammanetida, dosetida Ephafirape tamaarideta.
COL 1:8 I hessa bolla gujidi Ayyaanay hintew immida siiquwaba nuus odis.
COL 1:9 Hessa gisho, nuuni hintebaa si7ida gallasaape doomidi, Xoossay ba sheniya hintena bessaana melanne, Geeshsha Ayyaanay immiya eratethaninne cincatetha ubban hintena kunthana mela ubba wode hintew Xoossaa woossoos.
COL 1:10 Hessadaka, hinte, Goday koyeysada daana mela, ubba wode iya ufaysana mela, lo77o ooso ubban hinte ayfe ayfana melanne Xoossaa aathidi erishe diccana mela Xoossaa woossoos.
COL 1:11 Xoossaa boncho wolqay hinte ubbaba gencanaadanne danda7anaada ba minotethaa immidi hintena ufayso.
COL 1:12 Qassi geeshshata poo7o kawotethaa laattana mela hintena oothida Aawa galatite.
COL 1:13 I nuna dhuma wolqaafe ashshidi ba dosiya na7aa kawotethaako ehis.
COL 1:14 Iyan wozetidi iya suuthan nagara atotethi demmida.
COL 1:15 Kiristoosi bentonna Xoossaas tuma leemiso. I medhetetha ubbaafe bayra.
COL 1:16 Ubbabay iya baggara medhetis. Bentiyabatinne bentonnabati, wolqatinne godati, haareysatinne maata aawati, saloninne sa7an de7iya ubbay iyawunne iya baggara medhetis.
COL 1:17 I ubbabaape kase de7ees. Ubbabay iyan ba bessan bessan oyketidi de7ees.
COL 1:18 I ba asatethi gidida woosa keethas huuphe. I ubbaafe bolla gidanaw hayqope dendon sinthenne bayra.
COL 1:19 Xoossay ba kumetha Xoossatethaara iyan daanaw koyis.
COL 1:20 Qassi masqaliya bolla gussida ba na7aa suuthan sarotethi medhidi saloninne sa7an de7iya ubbaa iya baggara baara sigethis.
COL 1:21 Haysafe kase hinte qofaa iitatethay hintena Xoossaafe shaakisinne iyara morke oothis; hinte oosoyka iita.
COL 1:22 Shin ha77i Kiristoosi ashon hayqida hayquwa baggara Xoossay hintena baara sigethidi, geeshshata, borey baynaysatanne xillota oothis.
COL 1:23 Hinte, hinte ammanuwan qaaxonna minnidinne xaphidi daanaw bessees. Hinte Wongela qaala si7ida wode ekida ufaysaa minthi oykite. He Wongelay hinte si7idaysanne biitta ubban sabbaketidaysa. Ta, Phawuloosika ha Wongelas oosancho gidas.
COL 1:24 Taani hinte gisho ha77i ekiya waayan ufaytayis. Kiristoosi iya asatethi gidida woosa keethaas ekida waayiya taani ta ashuwan polayis.
COL 1:25 Xoossaa qaala hintew polada odana mela taw imetida maatan woosa keethaas oosancho gidas.
COL 1:26 Ha qaalay kase aadhida wodiyan yeletethaa ubbaafe geemmidi de7is. Shin ha77i Xoossay ha xuuraa ammaniya ubbaas qoncisis.
COL 1:27 Xoossay Ayhude gidonna asaa giddon ha xuuraa boncho duretetha qoncisis. Ika boncho ufaysi gidida hinte giddon de7iya Kiristoosa.
COL 1:28 Hessa gisho, issi issi asi Kiristoosan kumetha asi oothidi shiishanaw cincatetha ubban asaa tamaarsoninne zoren Kiristoosaba sabbakoos.
COL 1:29 Xoossay ba gita wolqan tanan oothiya gisho, ha77i gakanaw iya wolqan baaxetaysinne daaburayis.
COL 2:1 Ta hintewunne Loodoqe kataman de7iya asaas, hessadaka tana ayfen be7iboona asa ubbaas ay mela baaxetiyako hinte erana mela koyayis.
COL 2:2 Ta baaxetiya gaasoyka enti banta wozanan minnidi, siiqon qashetidi, polo gidida kumetha akeeka duretetha demmidi Xoossaa xuuraa Kiristoosa erana melasa.
COL 2:3 Iyan Xoossay minjida eraynne cincatetha ubbay de7ees.
COL 2:4 Ta hessa oonika hintena cimo qaalan balethonna mela koyada gayis.
COL 2:5 Ta hintefe haakada de7ikoka ayyaanan hintera de7ayis. Hinte duussaa maaranne Kiristoosa hinte minnidi ammaneysa be7ada ufaytayis.
COL 2:6 Hinte Godaa Kiristoos Yesuusa ekidaysada iyan de7ite.
COL 2:7 Iyan xapho yeddite; iyan keexetite. Hinte tamaaridaysada ammanon minnite; Xoossaas kumidi palahida galataa immite.
COL 2:8 Kiristoosape gidonashin, asa woganinne ha alamiya coo wogan katida timirteninne asape yida eratethan oonika hintena cimi balethidi di77onna mela naagetite.
COL 2:9 Xoossaa Xoossatethay Kiristoosa asatethan kumethi de7ees.
COL 2:10 Hinteka maatasinne wolqa ubbaas huuphe gidiya Kiristoosan kumideta.
COL 2:11 Hinte Kiristoosa ammanidi qaxaretideta. Hessika asa kushen gidonashin, hintena iita hanotethaafe diggiya Kiristoosan oosetida qaxaretethi.
COL 2:12 Hinte xammaqetida wode Kiristoosara issife moogetidi, Kiristoosa hayqope denthida Xoossaa wolqaa ammanidi, Kiristoosara issife dendideta.
COL 2:13 Hinte, hinte nagaraa gishonne hinte ceega asatethaa qaxaretonna gisho hayqidi de7ishin, Xoossay hinte nagaraa atto gis. Kiristoosara hintew de7o immis.
COL 2:14 I nuna mootiyanne nuura eqetiya, nu bolla xaafetida acuwa daakidi masqaliya bolla dhishidi ogepe diggis.
COL 2:15 Kiristoosi wolqatanne maatata masqaliyan xoonidi, enta ola dancuwa bilisidi, di7etida asada enta qoncen yuushshi bessis.
COL 2:16 Hessa gisho, miyaban woyko uyaaban, ba7aale gallas woyko ageeni xeeriya qamma bonchon oonika hinte bolla pirdofo.
COL 2:17 Haysati sinthafe yaanaw de7iyabatas eesho, shin tumay Kiristoosa.
COL 2:18 Qoodhepe qommo ashketethaninne kiitancho goyinnon ceeqetiya oonika hintena hinte woytuwape ashshofo. Hessa mela asi ba be7ida qoncethan nashetishe ba asho qofan coo otortees.
COL 2:19 Hessa mela asaas huuphe gidida Kiristoosara gahetethi baawa. I asatethaa ubbaa shayaninne keson keson gathi oythidi muzidi dichees. Xoossay hessa mela ogen asatethaa ubbaas dichi immees.
COL 2:20 Hinte Kiristoosara hayqidi ha alamiya haariya ayyaanata wolqaafe la77a keydeta. Yaatin, ayis shaaketonna asada gididi ha wogatas haretetii?
COL 2:21 He wogati, “Oykofa; laacofa; bochofa” geeteteysata.
COL 2:22 Ha ubbay asa woganne timirte gidiya gisho ooso bolla pee7idaape guye dhayana.
COL 2:23 Ha kiitati bonchonne cincatethi daanidi bentanaw danda7oosona. Ha wogati Xoosse daro dosisiyaba, ashkenne hinte asatethaa haarisiyaba daanosona, shin nu iita amotetha bolla entaw wolqi baawa.
COL 3:1 Hiza, hinte Kiristoosara hayqope dendidaysada, Xoossaafe ushacha baggan uttida Kiristoosi de7iya bessan, salon de7iyabata koyite.
COL 3:2 Salon de7eyisata bolla hinte qofaa wothitepe attishin, sa7an de7iyabata bolla wothofite.
COL 3:3 Hinte hayqon shaaketida mela ha alamiyape shaaketideta. Hinte de7oy Kiristoosara issife Xoossan geemmis.
COL 3:4 Hintew de7o gidida Kiristoosi qonciya wode he wode hinteka iyara bonchon qoncana.
COL 3:5 Hessa gisho, hintenan de7iya alame amotta wodhite. Hessatika laymatethi, tunatethi, laymatanaw amotethi, eeqa goyinno mela gidida uuzetethi.
COL 3:6 Hayisata gaason Xoossaa hanqoy kiitetonna asaa bolla yaana.
COL 3:7 Hinteka kase he iita ogiyan biya asaa giddon de7ishe haysata oothideta.
COL 3:8 Ha77i hinte hessata oothopite. Qassi hanqo, ixo, kachi, zigirsinne borso oda hintefe diggit.
COL 3:9 Ceega asatethaa iya oosuwara hintefe qaarida gisho, issoy issuwas wordotopite.
COL 3:10 Xoossaa medho daaniya, eratethan laametida ooratha asatethaa ma7ite.
COL 3:11 Ha ooratha medhetethan, Girike asi woyko Ayhude asi, qaxaretiday woyko qaxaretonnay, Barbare asi woyko Iskute asi aylley woyko womaannoy baawa. Kiristoosi ubbaa; I ubban de7ees.
COL 3:12 Hessa gisho, Xoossan dooretida asada geeshshatanne dosetidaysata gididi, maarotethaa, keehatetha, ashketethanne danda7a ma7ite.
COL 3:13 Issoy issuwa danda7ite. Oonika ba laggiyan qohetidabay de7iko iyaw atto go. Goday hintew atto gidaysada hinteka wolis atto giite.
COL 3:14 He ubbaa bolla ubbaba issife shiishidi qachiya siiqo ma7ite.
COL 3:15 Xoossay hintena issi asi oothidi xeegiday, sarotethaas gidiya gisho Kiristoosa sarotethay hinte wozanaa haaro.
COL 3:16 Kiristoosa qaalay hinte wozanan kumidi de7o. Cincatetha ubban issoy issuwa tamaarsitenne zorite. Mazmuren, sabaninne ayyaana yethan Xoossaa wozanape galatishe yexite.
COL 3:17 Xoossaa Aawa Yesuusa baggara galatishe hinte odetiyaba woyko oothiyaba ubbaa Godaa Yesuusa sunthan oothite.
COL 3:18 Macheto, ammaniya asaas bessiyaba gidiya gisho, hinte azinatas haaretite.
COL 3:19 Azinatoo, hinte macheta siiqite; entaw iitopite.
COL 3:20 Nayto, hintena yelidaysatas ubbaban kiitetite; hessi Godaa ufaysiyabaa.
COL 3:21 Aawato, hinte nayti ufaysi qanxonna mela enta camethofite.
COL 3:22 Aylleto, sa7an hintew godaa gididaysatas ubbaban kiitetite. Godaa bonchishe suure wozanape kiitetidi enta ufaysitepe attishin, asi be7o gidi oothopite.
COL 3:23 Hinte oothiya ooso ubbaa asas gidonashin, Godaas oothiya mela wozanape oothite.
COL 3:24 Godaape laata woyto oothidi hinte ekeysa erite; hinte Godaa Kiristoosa haggaazeeta.
COL 3:25 Xoossay asa som7o be7idi pirdonna gisho, oonika iita ooso oothiko ba iita oosuwa gisho zaaro ekana.
COL 4:1 Godato, hintewuka qassi salon Goday de7eysa eridi, hinte aylletas xillotethaninne issuwa issuwafe shaakonna koshshiyaba oothite.
COL 4:2 Xoossaa barkidi galatishe qanxonna woossite.
COL 4:3 Xoossay ba qaalas penge dooyana melanne taani hessa gaason qashon de7iya Kiristoosa xuuraa awaajana mela nuuska woossite.
COL 4:4 Qassi taka besseysada qaala qoncisada odana mela taw Xoossaa woossite.
COL 4:5 Injetiya wode ubbaa go7etishe ammanonna asaa matan cincatethan de7ite.
COL 4:6 Hinte asa ubbaas koshshiya zaaro imo erana mela hinte oday ubba wode aadho keehatethan kumidaysanne maxineda mal7iyabaa gidanaw bessees.
COL 4:7 Nu siiqo ishay Tikiqoosi, taara issife Godaa oosuwan aylle gidida, ammanetiya oosanchoy, ta de7uwabaa hintew odana.
COL 4:8 Taani iya hinteko kiittiday, nu waanidi de7iyako hintew odidi hintena minthethana melasa.
COL 4:9 Anasmoosi, ammanetiya siiqo ishay, hinte baggay, iyara hinteko bees. Enti haysan haniyaba ubbaa hintew odana.
COL 4:10 Taara qashetida Arisxirokoosinne Barnabaasa ishaa na7ay Marqoosi, hintena saro yaagosona. Ta hintew kase odidaysada Marqoosi hinteko biiko iya mokite.
COL 4:11 Yesuusa geetetiya Yasxoosi hintena saro saro yaagees. Xoossaa kawotethaa gisho taara oothiya asata giddofe Ayhude gididaysati ha heedzata; enti tana daro minthethidosona.
COL 4:12 Hinte baggay, Kiristoos Yesuusa aylley, Ephafiri hintena saro saro yaagees. I hinte Xoossaa sinthan minnidi eqanaadanne Xoossaa sheniya eridi polana mela ubba wode Xoossaa hinte gisho woossees.
COL 4:13 I hinte gishonne Loodoqeninne Hirapolisa kataman de7iya asaa gisho daro daaburidaysa ta markatayis.
COL 4:14 Nu siiqo ishay dottorey Luqaasinne Deemasi, hintena saro saro yaagosona.
COL 4:15 Loodoqen de7iya nu ishatas, Nimfaasinne I keethan shiiqiya asaas nu sarothuwa odite.
COL 4:16 Ha dabdaabiya hinte nabbabidaape guye, Loodoqe woosa keethan nabbabisite. Hinteka Loodoqe woosa keethay hintew yeddiya dabdaabiya nabbabite.
COL 4:17 Qassi Arkiphaasa, “Goday new immida oosuwa polanaysa dogopa” yaagidi qofisite.
COL 4:18 Taani, Phawuloosi, ha sarothuwa ta kushen xaafas. Ta qashuwa qopite. Xoossaa aadho keehatethay hintera gido.
1TH 1:1 Phawuloosi Sillaaseynne Ximotiyoosi Teselonqe woosa keethan de7iya, Xoossaa Aawabanne Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosaba gidida asaas xaafida kiita. Aadho keehatethaynne saroy hintew gido.
1TH 1:2 Nuuni Xoossaa woossiya wode ubban hintena qopishe hinte gisho ubba wode Xoossaa galatoos.
1TH 1:3 Xoossaa nu Aawa sinthan ammanon hinte oothida oosuwa, siiqon hinte daaburida daaburanne Yesuus Kiristoosan de7iya ufaysaa ekanaw hinte minnidi eqida equwa ubba wode nuuni qopoos.
1TH 1:4 Nu ishato, Xoossay hintena doseysanne ba ase oothidi hintena dooridaysa nuuni eroos.
1TH 1:5 Ayis giiko, nuuni Wongela doona xalaalan gidonashin, wolqan, Geeshsha Ayyaananinne Wongela tumaa ammanon hintew ehida. Nuuni hintera gam7ida wode ubban hinte gisho waanidi de7idaako hinte ereeta.
1TH 1:6 Hinte daro meto ekikoka Geeshsha Ayyaanay immiya ufaysan kiitaa ekideta; nunanne Godaa daanideta.
1TH 1:7 Hessa gisho, Maqedoonenne Akaya biittan de7iya ammaniya ubbaas leemiso gidideta.
1TH 1:8 Godaa qaalay hintefe keyidi, Maqedooneninne Akaya xalaalan gidonashin, Xoossaa hinte ammaneysi ubbason si7etis. Hiza, nuuni gaanabay aykoyka baawa.
1TH 1:9 Nuuni hinteko bida wode hinte nuna mokida mokuwanne hinte, hinte eeqa aggidi tumaanne de7o Xoossaa haggaazanaw hinte simmidaysa enti banta huuphen odoosona.
1TH 1:10 Qassi Xoossaa Na7ay, Yesuusi, Xoossay hayqope denthidaysi, sinthafe yaana Xoossaa hanquwafe nuna ashshanaysi, salope yaanaysa hinte naageysa enti markatoosona.
1TH 2:1 Ta ishato, nuuni hinteko biday mela gidonnaysa hinte, hinte huuphen ereeta.
1TH 2:2 Shin nuuni hinteko Teselonqe yaanape sinthe Filphisiyuusa kataman waayetidaysanne cayetidaysa hinte ereeta. Daro ixoy de7ikoka hintew iya Wongela odana mela Xoossay nuus minotethi immis.
1TH 2:3 Nuuni hintena zoriday balethon woyko cimon woyko genen gidenna.
1TH 2:4 Shin Xoossay nunan ammanetidi ba Wongela odana mela nuus hadara immida gisho odoos. Nu hessa oothey nu wozanaa be7iya Xoossaa ufaysanaasafe attishin, ase ufaysanaasa gidenna.
1TH 2:5 Nu miishe yaaridi wordo hintena sabbishe hinteko yoonnaysa loythidi ereeta; Xoossay nuus marka.
1TH 2:6 Nuuni hintefe gidin woyko hara asa oodefeka boncho koyibooko.
1TH 2:7 Nuuni Kiristoosa hawaare gideysada nuus koshshiyaba immite gidi ekanaw danda7oos, shin aayiya ba nayta dicheysa mela hinte giddon ashke gidida.
1TH 2:8 Nu hintena dosida gisho Xoossaa Wongela hintew shaako xalaala gidonashin, nu de7uwaka hintew immanaw giigida. Hinte nuus daro al7o.
1TH 2:9 Nu ishato, nu oosuwanne nu daabura ereeta. Hintew Xoossaa Wongela odishe, hintena waaysonna mela qammanne gallas oothida.
1TH 2:10 Nu de7oy hinte ammaneyisata mataninne Xoossaa sinthan geeshshi, xillonne boretonaysa gideysas hinte marka.
1TH 2:11 Nuuni hintew huuphen huuphen yelidaysati banta naytas haneysada hanidaysa ereeta.
1TH 2:12 Nu hintena zorida, minthethida. Qassi ba kawotethaanne ba bonchuwa shaakanaw hintena xeegiya Xoossaa ufaysiya de7o hinte daana mela hintew minthidi odida.
1TH 2:13 Hintew nuuni Xoossaa qaala odida wode asa qaalada gidonashin, Xoossaa qaalada si7idi ekida gisho nuuni ubba wode Xoossaa galatoos. I tuma Xoossaa qaala; Xoossaa qaalay ammaniya hintenan oothees.
1TH 2:14 Ta ishato, hinte Yihuda biittan de7iya woosa keethatanne yan Kiristoos Yesuusa kaalliya asatada hanideta. Enta Ayhudeti waaysidaysada hintenaka hinte biitta asay waaysidosona.
1TH 2:15 He Ayhudeti Godaa Yesuusanne nabeta wodhidosona; qassi nuna goodidosona. Enti Xoossaa ufaysonaysatanne ase ubbaa ixeyisata.
1TH 2:16 Enti hari attoshin, Ayhude gidonna asay attana mela nuuni entaw qaala odeysa diggoosona. Hessada hanidi enta nagaraa xuu7ay kumana gakanaw ubba wode nagara oothosona. Wursethan, Xoossaa hanqoy enta bolla wodhees.
1TH 2:17 Shin nu ishato, nuuni nu qofan gidonashin, ashon hintefe shaaketidi guutha wode gam7idaysan hintena daro laamotidi be7anaw koyida.
1TH 2:18 Nu simmi hinteko baanaw koyida. Taani ta huuphen hinteko baanaw koyas, shin Xalahey nuna diggis.
1TH 2:19 Hiza, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosi yaa wode, nu ufaysay woyko nu ceeqetiya nu kallachay oonee? Hintena gideketiyee?
1TH 2:20 Tuma hinte nu bonchonne nu ufaysi.
1TH 3:1 Hessa gisho, nuus gencanaw danda7etonna ixin, Ateena kataman nurka attanaw qofa qachida.
1TH 3:2 Hintena zoranaadanne ammanon hintena minthethanaada nuura issife Xoossas ootheysanne Kiristoosa Wongela odiya nu ishaa Ximotiyoosa hinteko kiitida.
1TH 3:3 Hintena gakida goodan hintefe oonika guye simmofo. He gooday nuus Xoossa shene gideysa hinte, hinte huuphen ereeta.
1TH 3:4 Nu hintera de7iya wode goodi gakanaysa hintew koyrottidi odida. Hinte ereysa mela hessada hanis.
1TH 3:5 Hessa gisho, taw gencanaw danda7etonna ixin, “Ooni eri Xalahey enta paacidi nu daabura mela ashshona aggenna” gada hinte ammanuwaba eranaw Ximotiyoosa hinteko kiittas.
1TH 3:6 Ha77i Ximotiyoosi hinte matape yidi, hinte ammanuwabanne hinte siiquwaba lo77o wore nuus odis. Qassi hinte ubba wode nuus lo77o qopeysanne nuuni hintena be7anaw laamoteysada hinteka nuna be7anaw laamoteysa I nuus odis.
1TH 3:7 Ta ishato, nuna gakiya waayaninne nu meto ubban hinte ammanuwa gisho hintenan minetida.
1TH 3:8 Hinte Godan minnidi de7iko nuka de7on de7oos.
1TH 3:9 Hiza, nuuni hinte gaason demmida ufaysas Xoossaa waati galatino?
1TH 3:10 Nuuni hintena be7anawunne hinte ammanuwan pacidaba kunthanaw qammanne gallas nu kumetha wozanan Xoossaa woossoos.
1TH 3:11 Xoossay nu aaway ba huupheninne nu Goday Yesuus Kiristoosi nu hinteko baana ogiya giigiso.
1TH 3:12 Nu hintena daro doseysada Goday hinte issoy issuwa siiqiya siiqonne ase ubbaa siiqiya siiqo hintew darsonne gujo.
1TH 3:13 Nu Goday Yesuus Kiristoosi ba geeshshatara yaa wode Xoossaa, nu aawa sinthan hinte wozanay geeshshinne borey baynaysa oothidi I hintena minthethana.
1TH 4:1 Wursethan, ta ishato, Xoossaa ufaysanaw hinte waanidi daanaw bessiyako nuupe tamaarideta. Hessi hinte koyrope de7ida de7uwa, shin ha77i hinte kaseysafe aathidi oothanaada Godaa Yesuusa sunthan hintena woossosinne zoroos.
1TH 4:2 Nuuni Godaa Yesuusa maatan hintena kiitida kiitay awuseko ereeta.
1TH 4:3 Xoossay, hinte geeshshi gidana melanne laymatonna mela koyees.
1TH 4:4 Hinte issoy issoy, hinte machetara geeshshatethaninne bonchon daanaw bessees.
1TH 4:5 Xoossaa eronnanne ammanonna asada laymatetha amon xuugetofite.
1TH 4:6 Nu kase hintew odidaysadanne minthi zoridaysada Goday hessa melaba oothiya ubbaa pirdiya gisho, oonika haysatan ba ammaniya ishaa naaqanawunne cimmanaw bessenna.
1TH 4:7 Xoossay nuna geeshshatethan daana mela xeegisipe attishin, tunatethan daana mela xeegibeenna.
1TH 4:8 Hessa gisho, ha timirtiya ixiya oonika hintew Geeshsha Ayyaana immiya Xoossaa ixeesipe attishin, ase gidenna.
1TH 4:9 Hinte issoy issuwa waati siiqaneko Xoossay hintena tamaarsida gisho, ha77i siiqoba nu hintew xaafanaw koshshenna.
1TH 4:10 Qassi Maqedoone biittan de7iya ammaniya ishata ubbaa tuma hinte doseeta. Shin nu ishato, ha77ika hinte enta aathidi dosana mela hintena woossoos.
1TH 4:11 Nuuni kase hintew odidaysada wopu gida de7uwa de7ite. Hinte, hinte ooso oothidi hintew duussas koshshiyaba demmite.
1TH 4:12 Hessada haniko, ammanonayisata matan hinte bonchetana; qassi hintena koshshiyabas oonaka aaddasheketa.
1TH 4:13 Nu ishato, ammanidi hayqida asati hananaba hinte erana mela nu koyoos. Hinte enta gisho ufaysi bayna asada kayotofite.
1TH 4:14 Nuuni, Yesuusi hayqidaysanne qassi hayqope dendidaysa ammanoos. Hessadaka, Xoossay Yesuusa ammanidi hayqidaysata iyara wolla ehanaysa ammanoos.
1TH 4:15 Goday nuus odidaysada Goday yaa gallas iyara gahetanaw nuuni paxa de7eysati, hayqidaysatape sinthatoko.
1TH 4:16 Goday wolqaama kiitara, kiitanchota halaqa girsara, Xoossaa moyze punora, salope wodhana. Kiristoosa ammanidi hayqidaysati koyrottidi hayqope dendana.
1TH 4:17 Hessafe guye, he wode nuuni paxa de7eysati, Godaara shaaran gahetanaw entara issife salo eketana. Hessafe guye, nuuni Godaara issife merinaw daana.
1TH 4:18 Hessa gisho, ha qaalan issoy issuwa minthethite.
1TH 5:1 Ta ishato, ha hanoti hanana wodiyanne ageena hintew xaafanaw koshshenna.
1TH 5:2 Godaa Gallasay kaysoy qamma yeysada yaanaysa hinte loythi ereeta.
1TH 5:3 Asay, “Sa7i saro, aykoyka hanenna” yaagishin, maccas iqethi oykeysada dhayoy enti qoponna enta bolla yaana. Enti ay ogenka kessi ekokona.
1TH 5:4 Shin nu ishato, he gallasay hintew kaysoy yeysada yaanaw hinte dhuman de7eketa.
1TH 5:5 Hinte ubbay poo7o asinne gallasan de7iya asi; nuuni qamma asi woyko dhuma asi gidoko.
1TH 5:6 Hessa gisho, nuuni harati dhiskeysada dhiskanaw bessenna; nuuni barkanawunne giigidi daanaw bessees.
1TH 5:7 Dhiskeysati qamma dhiskoosona; mathoteysati qamma mathotosona.
1TH 5:8 Shin nuuni gallasa asi gidiya gisho giigidi daanaw bessees. Ammanonne siiqo xurureda tiran ma7idi, atotetha ufaysaa huuphen wothiya ola birata barneexada wothidi daanaw bessees.
1TH 5:9 Xoossay nuna nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara kumetha atotethi ekana mela doorisipe attishin, hanqos dooribeenna.
1TH 5:10 Nuuni paxa de7in woyko hayqin, Kiristoosi yaa wode iyara issife daana mela Kiristoosi nu gisho hayqis.
1TH 5:11 Hessa gisho, hinte kase ootheysada, issoy issuwa minthethitenne dichite.
1TH 5:12 Nu ishato, hinte giddon ootheyisata, hintena kaalethana melanne zorana mela Goday dooridaysata bonchana mela hintena woossoos.
1TH 5:13 Enti oothiya oosuwa gisho, enta daro bonchitenne siiqite. Issoy issuwara sarotethan de7ite.
1TH 5:14 Nu ishato, nuuni hintena zoroos. Boozata hanqite; babeyisata minthethite; daaburanchota maaddite; ase ubbaa danda7ite.
1TH 5:15 Oonika iita gisho iita zaaronna mela naagetite. Hinte wolisinne asa ubbaas lo77oba oothanaw minnite.
1TH 5:16 Ubba wode ufaytite.
1TH 5:17 Ubba wode Xoossaa woossite.
1TH 5:18 Ubbaban galatite. Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara Xoossay hintefe koyey hessa.
1TH 5:19 Geeshsha Ayyaana oosuwa toysopite.
1TH 5:20 Tinbite qaala kadhopite.
1TH 5:21 Ubbabaa paacite; lo77oba ekite.
1TH 5:22 Iita ooso ubbaafe haakite.
1TH 5:23 Saro immiya Xoossay ba huuphen hintena polo geeshsho. Nu Goday Yesuus Kiristoosi yaana gallasaas, Xoossay hinte ayyaana, hinte shempuwanne hinte kumetha asatethaa borey bayna naago.
1TH 5:24 Hintena xeegeysi ammanetidaysa gidiya gisho, hessa I polana.
1TH 5:25 Nu ishato, nuus Xoossaa woossite.
1TH 5:26 Ammaniya asa ubbaa geeshsha yeeretethan sarothite.
1TH 5:27 Hinte ha kiitaa ammaniya asa ubbaas nabbabanaada Godaa sunthan hintena woossayis.
1TH 5:28 Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa aadho keehatethay hintera issife gido. Amin7i.
2TH 1:1 Phawuloosi, Sillaaseynne Ximotiyoosi Teselonqe woosa keethan de7iya, Xoossaa Aawabanne Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosaba gidida asaas xaafetida kiita.
2TH 1:2 Xoossaa nu Aawapenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosape aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hintew gido.
2TH 1:3 Nu ishato, hinte ammanoynne hinte issoy issuwanne harata siiqiya siiqoy daro dicciya gisho, nuuni hessas Xoossaa ubba wode galatanaw bessees.
2TH 1:4 Hintena gakida goodaninne waaye ubban gencaninne ammanon minnidi eqida gisho, nuuni nu huuphen Xoossaa woosa keethatan hintebaa markatishe hintenan ceeqetoos.
2TH 1:5 Hinte iya gisho gidi meto ekiya Xoossaa kawotethaas besseyisata gididi taybetana mela Xoossaa xillo pirdaas haysi malla.
2TH 1:6 Xoossay tuma pirdaa pirdana. Xoossay hintena waayseysata bolla waaye ehana.
2TH 1:7 Goday Yesuusi ba wolqaama kiitanchotara, tama lacora salope yaa wode waayetiya hintenanne nuna shempisana.
2TH 1:8 Qassi Xoossay bana eronnaysatanne nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa Wongelas kiitetonayisata pirdana.
2TH 1:9 Enti Godaa sinthafenne iya bonchuwa wolqaafe shaaketidi merinaa dhayuwan pirdetana.
2TH 1:10 He gallas, I ba geeshsha asaaninne bana ammaniya ubban bonchetanawunne sabetanaw yaa wode nu hintew odida kiitaa hinte ammanida gisho, hinte iya boncheyisata giddoninne sabbeyisata giddon daana.
2TH 1:11 Nuuni hintew ubba wode Xoossaa woossey hessasa. Nu Xoossay hintena xeegida de7uwas besseyisata gididi taybetana mela nuuni woossoos. Hinte lo77oba oothanaw amotiya amuwanne hinte ammano oosuwa I ba wolqan polo.
2TH 1:12 Hessan nu Xoossaanne nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa aadho keehatethan, Godaa Yesuusa sunthaa hinte bonchana; hintenaka I bonchana.
2TH 2:1 Nu ishato, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa yuussabaanne nu iyara gahetanaw shiiqanabas nu hintena woossoos.
2TH 2:2 Tinbiten woyko hara asape si7ida qaalan woyko nuupe ekida kiittada oothidi, “Godaa gallasay gakis” gidi hinte wozanay dagammofonne waabaqopo.
2TH 2:3 Hintena oonika ay ogenka balethofo. Kasetidi geellatethay qonconnanne dhayoy bessiya geella uray yoonna de7ishin, Godaa gallasay gakenna.
2TH 2:4 Asi goyinniyabanne xoossayaba ubbaa I ixananne bana dhoqu oothana. Hari attoshin, Xoossa keethi geli uttidi, “Taani Xoosse” gaana.
2TH 2:5 Taani hintera de7ashe hintew odidaysa akeekeketii?
2TH 2:6 I ba gallasan yaanape attishin, ha77i yaanaysa aybi iya teqiyako hinte ereeta.
2TH 2:7 Asaas qonciboonna geellatetha xuura wolqay ha77ika oothees, shin ha77i iya teqeysi de7ees. Iya teqeysi ogepe kichana gakanaw I qoncenna.
2TH 2:8 Hessafe guye, geella uray qoncana, shin Godaa Yesuusi ba doonape keyiya shempuwan, ba boncho yuussan iya wodhana.
2TH 2:9 Geella uray, Xalahe wolqan yidi wordo malaatatanne malaalsiyabata oothana.
2TH 2:10 Hessadaka, dhayos de7iya asata dumma dumma cimmiya iita ooson balethana. Enti dhayiday ashshiya tumaa dosidi ekonna ixida gishosa.
2TH 2:11 Hessa gisho, enti wordo gidiyaba ammanana mela Xoossay wolqaama baleso enta bolla yeddana.
2TH 2:12 Hessika, tumaa ammanonna asati, nagara ooson ufayteysati ubbay pirdetana melasa.
2TH 2:13 Goday dosiya nu ishato, nuuni Xoossaa hinte gisho, ubba wode galatanaw bessees. Hinte attana mela Xoossay Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqan hintena geeshshidaysanne hinteka tumaa ammanidaysan I hintena bayrada dooris.
2TH 2:14 Xoossay, nu hintew odida Wongela baggara hintena xeegiday, hinte nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosara issife bonchetanaasa.
2TH 2:15 Hiza, nu ishato, minnidi eqite. Nuuni hintena nu doonan gidin woyko dabdaabiyan gidin tamaarsida timirtiya oykite.
2TH 2:16 Xoossay nu aaway nuna dosees. I nuus keeha; I merinaa minthethonne lo77o ufaysaa nuus immis. Hinte ubba wode lo77oba oothanawunne odetanaw minthethana melanne maaddana mela nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosanne Xoossaa nu aawa woossoos.
2TH 3:1 Wursethan nu ishato, Godaa qaalay hinte giddon ellesidi dalganaadanne bonchetanaada nuus woossite.
2TH 3:2 Hessadaka, asi ubbay qaala si7idi ammanonna gisho, Xoossay geellatapenne iita asatape nuna ashshana mela nuus woossite.
2TH 3:3 Shin Goday ammanetidaysa; I hintena minthethananne Xalahepe naagana.
2TH 3:4 Nuuni hintena kiitteysa ha77ika sinthafeka hinte oothanaysas Godan nuuni ammanetoos.
2TH 3:5 Goday hinte wozanaa Xoossa siiquwakonne Kiristoosa danda7aako kaaletho.
2TH 3:6 Nu ishato, hinte nuupe ekida kiitaa kaallonaysatapenne ooso billiya azalla ammaniya asatape hinte shaaketanaada Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa sunthan hintena kiittoos.
2TH 3:7 Nuuda hanidi daanaw besseysa hinte, hinte huuphen ereeta. Nuuni hintera de7iya wode ooso billibooko.
2TH 3:8 Nuuni oodefeka kathi mela mibooko. Nuus danda7etida mela qammanne gallas oothi daaburidi de7idape attishin, oodeska tooho gidibooko.
2TH 3:9 Nuuni hessa oothiday, hintew leemiso gidanaasafe attishin, hintefe maade oychanaw nuus maati dhayina gidenna.
2TH 3:10 Nu hintera de7iya wodeka, “Oothanaw koyonna asi oonika moopo” yaagidi kiitida.
2TH 3:11 Nuuni hessa giday, hinte giddon issi issi azallati de7eysa si7ida gishosa. He asati gelsonnaban gelidi harata ooso bilisoosonape attishin, aykoka oothokona.
2TH 3:12 Nuuni hessa mela asati maara de7o daanadanne bantana koshshiyaba oothidi demmanaada Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa sunthan enta kiittoosinne zoroos.
2TH 3:13 Shin nu ishato, lo77o ooso oothanaw azallofite.
2TH 3:14 Ha77i nuuni ha dabdaabiyan kiitida kiittas kiitetonna asi oonika de7iko he uraa erite. I yeellatana mela iyape shaaketite.
2TH 3:15 Shin iya ishada seeritepe attishin, morkeda xeellofite.
2TH 3:16 Saro immiya Goday, ba huuphen hintew ubba wodenne ubba baggara saro immo. Goday hinte ubbaara gido.
2TH 3:17 Taani Phawuloosi, ha kiitaa ta kushen xaafas. Ta kiita ubbaas mallay haysa; taani hessada xaafayis.
2TH 3:18 Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa aadho keehatethay hinte ubbaara gido.
1TI 1:1 Nuna ashshiya Xoossaaninne nu ufaysan naagiya Yesuus Kiristoosan kiitetida, Yesuus Kiristoosa hawaare gidida, Phawuloosape,
1TI 1:2 ammanon taw tuma na7a gidida Ximotiyoosas. Xoossaa nu Aawa, nu Godaa Kiristoosa aadho keehatethay, maarotethaynne sarotethay new gido.
1TI 1:3 Taani Maqedoone bashe nena hadaridaysada, issi issi asati wordo timirtiya tamaarseysa digganaw ne Efesoonan gam7ana mela koyayis.
1TI 1:4 Enti go77i bayna hayse odanne banta kocha taybuwa agganaada oda. Hessa melabay palama kaaletheesipe attishin, ammanon oosetiya Xoossaa oosuwas maaddenna.
1TI 1:5 Ha kiitaa huuphe qofay geeshsha wozanape, lo77o kahapenne tuma ammanuwape bentiya siiquwa denthethanaasa.
1TI 1:6 Issi issi asati haysa aggidi, pathonna odako simmidosona.
1TI 1:7 Enti Xoossaa higgiya astamaare gidanaw koyoosona. Shin enti ay odiyako woyko tuma oothidi odeysi I aybeko erokona.
1TI 1:8 Asi besseysada higgiyan go7etiko higgey lo77o gideysa eroos.
1TI 1:9 Issiba akeekanaw koshshees. Higgey lo77o asaas medhetibeenna. Shin higgey, higge mentheyisata, worandzota, Xoosse yayyonnayisata, shempo wodheyisata, nagaranchota, geeshshatethi baynayisata, tunata, hari attoshin banta aayiw woyko aawa wodheyisata,
1TI 1:10 laammeyisata, addey addera laymateyisata, ase bayzeyisata, wordanchota, wordon caaqeyisata, woyko tuma timirtiyara gahetonna ay ooso ootheyisata seeranaw keyis.
1TI 1:11 He timirtey bonchonne anjetida Xoossay taani awaajana mela taw hadara immida Wongela giddon de7ees.
1TI 1:12 Taani oothiya oosuwan taw wolqaa immida nu Godaa Kiristoos Yesuusa galatayis. Tana ba oosuwas shuumidi he oosuwas besseysa gidi taybida gisho iya galatayis.
1TI 1:13 Taani haysafe kase iya cayeysa, iya yedetheysanne metootheysa gidikoka taani hessa eronnanne ammanonna oothida gisho Xoossay tana maaris.
1TI 1:14 Nu Goday ba aadho keehatetha ta bolla gussidi, he aadho keehatethaara ammanonne siiqo Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara taw immis.
1TI 1:15 “Kiristoos Yesuusi nagaranchota ashshanaw ha alamiya yis” giya qaalay ammantheysanne asa ubbay ekanaw besseysa. Ubbaafe aadhida nagaranchoy tana.
1TI 1:16 Shin merinaa de7uwa ekanaw iya ammaniya asaas taani leemiso gidana mela Yesuus Kiristoosi daro danda7is. Taw ubbaafe aadhida nagaranchuwas Xoossay ba maarota darsis.
1TI 1:17 Ayfen bentonnaysas, issi Xoossaas, hayqonaysas, merinaa Kawas, merinaape merinaa gakanaw galataynne bonchoy gido. Amin7i.
1TI 1:18 Ximotiyoosa, ta na7aw, kase nebaa nabeti odida qaala bolla eqada ha kiitaa hadara new immayis. Ne he qaala kaalliko lo77o olaa oletana.
1TI 1:19 Ammanoynne lo77o kahi new de7o. Issoti issoti kaha dhayidi markabey hobben dhayeysada banta ammanuwa dhaysidosona.
1TI 1:20 Hessa hanidaysata giddon Hemeneyoosinne Iskindirey de7oosona. Enti tamaaridi Xoossaa cayeysa aggana mela taani Xalahes entana aatha immas.
1TI 2:1 Ubbaafe sinthatada, asa ubbaas Xoossaa oychanaw, woossanaw, gaannatanawunne galatanaw besseysa taani nena akeekisayis.
1TI 2:2 Nuuni tuma ayyaana de7oninne geeshshatethan Xoossaa goyinnishe sarotethaninne wopu gida de7on daana mela kawotasinne shuumata ubbaas woossite.
1TI 2:3 Hessa mela woosay nuna ashshiya Xoossaa sinthan lo77onne ufaysiyabaa.
1TI 2:4 Xoossay asi ubbay attanaadanne tumaa eranaada koyees.
1TI 2:5 Issi Xoossi de7ees. Xoossafenne asape giddon gididi sigethiya issoy de7ees; ika ase gidida Kiristoos Yesuusa.
1TI 2:6 I asa ubbaa wozanaw bana aathidi immis. Xoossay ba wodiyan asa ubbaa wozanaw koyeysa bessiya markay haysa.
1TI 2:7 Xoossay tana Wongelas astamaarenne hawaare oothidi dooriday hessasa. Taani tuma odayis; wordotike; ammanoninne tuman Ayhude gidonna asaas markatana mela Xoossay tana shuumis.
1TI 2:8 Hessa gisho, ubba bessan de7iya addeti, bantana Xoossaas dummayidi, hanqonne palama diggidi, banta kushiya pude denthidi Xoossaa woossana mela koyayis.
1TI 2:9 Hessada maccasay bantana haaridaysa qoncisiya, bonchoynne maari de7iya ma7uwa ma7anaw bessees. Enti maari bayna huuphe dathan, worqan woyko inqon, woyko al7o afilan bantana alleeqisopo.
1TI 2:10 Shin Xoossaas goyinnayis giya maccasay bantaw besseysada lo77oba oothonna.
1TI 2:11 Maccasi kiitetethan si77i gidi tamaaro.
1TI 2:12 Taani maccasay tamaarsana mela woyko adde bolla aawatana mela gidonashin, si77i gidi daana mela koyayis.
1TI 2:13 Addaamey koyro medhetis; guyepe Hewaanna medhetasu.
1TI 2:14 Qassi cimetada Xoossaa higgiya menthiday maccasipe attishin, Addaame gidenna.
1TI 2:15 Shin maccasi ammanon, siiqoninne geeshshatethan bantana haaridi de7iko nayta yelon attana.
1TI 3:1 Oonika, “Woosa keethi kaalethiya asi gidanaw koyko lo77oba amottees” giya oday tuma.
1TI 3:2 Woosa keethaa kaalethiya asi boretonaysa, issi mache xalaali de7eysa, maaran de7eysa, bana haareysa, besseysada ootheysa, imathe mokeysa, tamaarsanaw danda7eysa,
1TI 3:3 mathotonaysa, ooyetonnaysa, palamonnaysa, miishe siiqonnaysa,
1TI 3:4 iya nayti iyaw kiiteteysanne boncheysa, ba keethaa aysanaw danda7eysa gidanaw bessees.
1TI 3:5 Issi asi ba keethaa aysanaw danda7onna ixiko, Xoossaa woosa keethi waati aysanaw danda7ii?
1TI 3:6 Otoron sugetidi, Xalahey Xoossaa pirdan kundidaysada kundonna mela, oorathi ammanida asi gidanaw bessenna.
1TI 3:7 Boreninne Xalahe xihen gelonna mela he uray ammanonna asa matan nasheteysa gidanaw bessees.
1TI 3:8 Hessada qassi woosa keethaa daaqoneti bonchetidaysata, nam7u doona odetonayisata, daro woyne ushshu uyonayisata, miishe yaaretonayisata,
1TI 3:9 ammanuwa xuuraa geeshsha kahan naageysata gidanaw bessees.
1TI 3:10 Enti koyrottidi paacetanaw koshshees; enta bolla borey bayna ixiko, woosa keethaa daaqone gididi ootho.
1TI 3:11 Hessadaka, enta maccasati bonchetidaysata, zigironnayisata, maaran de7eyisata, ubbaban ammaneteyisata gidanaw bessees.
1TI 3:12 Woosa keethaa daaqoneti issi machi xalaali de7eysa gido. Ba naytanne ba keethaa loythi ayseysa gidanaw bessees.
1TI 3:13 Woosa keethaa daaqone gididi, lo77o ooso ootheysati, entaw gita boncho qassi Kiristoos Yesuusan bantaw de7iya ammanuwaba odanaw daro minotethi demmana.
1TI 3:14 Taani ha kiitaa new xaafashe, ellesada neeko baana gada ufaysi wothayis.
1TI 3:15 Shin taani boonna gam7iko, Xoossaa Keethan asay waanidi daanaw bessiyako erana mela haysa new xaafayis. De7o Xoossaa keethay tumatethaas tuussinne baaso.
1TI 3:16 Nu ammanuwa xuuray sidhey bayna gita. Kiristoosi asho ma7idi qoncis; Iya tumatethaa Geeshsha Ayyaanay markatis. Kiitanchotas bentis; I kawotetha ubbaas sabbaketis. Alamen de7iya asan ammanetis; bonchon salo eketis.
1TI 4:1 Yaana wodiyan balethiya ayyaanatanne tuna ayyaanata timirte kaallidi, issi issi asay ammanuwa kaddanaysa Geeshsha Ayyaanay qoncisidi odis.
1TI 4:2 Hessa mela timirtey enta kahay doccin, asaa balethiya wordancho astamaaretape yees.
1TI 4:3 Hessa mela asati ekonne gelo qassi issi issi kathata moonna mela diggoosona. Shin ammaneysatinne tumaa ereysati Xoossaa galati woossidi maana mela Xoossay kathi medhis.
1TI 4:4 Xoossay medhida ubbabay lo77o. Xoossaa galatidi miiko wora wodhiyabay aybika baawa.
1TI 4:5 Ubbabay Xoossaa qaalaninne woosan geeshshi gidees.
1TI 4:6 Hessa gisho, neeni ha timirtiya ammaneyisata tamaarsiko, nu ammanuwaninne lo77o timirtiya kiitetada diccida, Kiristoos Yesuusa lo77o aylle gidana.
1TI 4:7 Shin go77i bayna tuma gidonna odapenne cima maccasa haysepe baqata. Tuma ayyaana de7on daanaw nena loohisa.
1TI 4:8 Asi ba asatethaa minthanaw oothiya oosoy guuthas maaddees. Shin tuma ayyaana de7on bana loohisoy ha77iska merinawuka de7o immiya ufaysi de7iya gisho, ubbaas maaddees.
1TI 4:9 Ha qaalay asa ubbay ekanaw bessiya tuma oda.
1TI 4:10 Nuuni asa ubbaa, ubbaafe aathidi ammaneyisata ashshiya de7o Xoossaafe ekana gidi ufaysan naagiya gisho, hessas nuuni ooson daaburosinne baaxetoos.
1TI 4:11 Haysa kiittanne tamaarsa.
1TI 4:12 Neeni yalaga gidiya gisho, nena oonika kadhopo. Shin ammaneysatas neeni odan, ooson, siiqon, ammanoninne geeshshatethan leemiso gida.
1TI 4:13 Taani yaana gakanaw asaas Geeshsha maxaafaa nabbabon, sabbakoninne tamaarson minna.
