1TI 4:14 Tinbitey odetin, cimati banta kushiya ne bolla wothida wode neeni ekida, nenan de7iya Geeshsha Ayyaana imota kadhopa.
1TI 4:15 Ne dichay asa ubbaas qoncana mela hessa mintha qopa; haysa ubba wode ootha.
1TI 4:16 Ne huuphiyasinne ne timirtiyas naageta. Neeni hessa ubba wode oothiko nenanne nena si7eyisata ashshaasa.
1TI 5:1 Cima addeta ne aawada bonchafe attishin, hanqetofa. Yalaga addeta ne ishada oothada xeella.
1TI 5:2 Cima maccasata ne aayida, yalaga maccasata ne michida, polo geeshshatethan oyka.
1TI 5:3 Azini hayqida tuma am7eta boncha.
1TI 5:4 Shin am7ees nayti woyko nayta nayti de7iko, he nayti tuma ayyaana de7on de7eysa bessanaw bantana yelidaysatanne, banta wogga aayiwunne wogga aawa maaddidi kushe zaaro tamaaro. Hessi Xoossaa ufaysiyabaa.
1TI 5:5 Barka de7iya tuma am7iya Xoossafe maade demmanaw ufaysan naagasu. Gallasinne qamma Xoossay bana maaddana mela woossawusunne oychawusu.
1TI 5:6 Shin ha alamiyan lo77o duussaa xalaala koyiya am7iya paxa de7ashe hayqidaaro.
1TI 5:7 Oonika enta boronna mela ha kiitaa entaw imma.
1TI 5:8 Shin ba dabbotas, ubbaafe aathidi ba soo asaas qoponna oonika ba ammanuwa kaddidaysa; ammanonna asapeka aadhida iita.
1TI 5:9 Laythi usupun tammu kumiboona am7e sunthaa mazgaben xaafopa. Qassi hessa bolla iya ba azinaas ammanetidaro gidanaw koshshees.
1TI 5:10 Nayta dishon, imatha mokon, geeshshata tohuwa meechan, metootiya asaa maaden, lo77o ooso ubbaas bana aatha immidaaronne lo77o ooson eretidaaro gidanaw bessees.
1TI 5:11 Shin yalaga am7eta sunthaa mazgaben xaafopa. Entana azina gelo gelo giya asho amoy oykiya wode Kiristoosa aggana.
1TI 5:12 Enti koyro gelida qaala menthida gisho pirdetana.
1TI 5:13 Hessa bolla enti ooso dhayidi keethafe keethe yuuyana. Yuushsha xalaala gidonashin, zigirsaninne bantana gathonnaban gelidi bessonnaba odetoosona.
1TI 5:14 Hessa gisho, nu morketi nu bolla odetiya iitabaa demmonna mela yalaga am7eti azina gelidi, na7a yelidi, banta keethaa aysana mela zorayis.
1TI 5:15 Haysafe kase guutha am7eti Xalahe kaallanaw guye simmidosona.
1TI 5:16 Issi ammaniya maccasees soo asaa giddon am7eti de7iko, iya enta maaddanaw bessees. Hessada oothiko, woosa keethaas toohoy kawuyees. He wode woosa keethay maade bessiya tuma am7eta maaddanaw danda7ees.
1TI 5:17 Woosa keethi loythi heemmiya cimati, ubbaafe aathidi, qaala sabbakoninne tamaarson daabureysati dako boncho ekanaw bessees.
1TI 5:18 Geeshsha Maxaafay, “Wudumman kathaa yedhiya boora doona qachofa” hessadaka, “Oosanchoy ba damooziya ekanaw bessees” yaagees.
1TI 5:19 Nam7u woyko heedzu marki bayna, woosa keetha cima mootiyaba si7opa.
1TI 5:20 Harati yayyana mela nagara oothiya oonaka asa ubbaa sinthan hanqeta.
1TI 5:21 Neeni asa som7o be7onna, issuwa issuwafe dummayonna ha kiitaa naagana mela Xoossaa, Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosanne dooretida kiitanchota sinthan ta nena zorayis.
1TI 5:22 Oodde bollaka ne kushiya wothada shuumanaw ellesopa. Harata nagaran gelopa; nena geeshshatethan naaga.
1TI 5:23 Neeni ubba wode hargetiya gishonne ne ulo hargiya gisho haatha xalaala uyopa; guutha woyne uya.
1TI 5:24 Issi issi asata nagaray qonce; enta nagaray enta pirdanaw entafe sinthe aadhees, shin harata nagaray guyepe gam7idi qoncees.
1TI 5:25 Hessada, lo77o oosoyka qonce; qonconna ixikoka geemmanaw danda7enna.
1TI 6:1 Xoossaa sunthaynne nu timirtey cayetonna mela aylletethan de7eysati bantana haariya godata boncho.
1TI 6:2 Ammaniya godati de7iya aylleti, enta godati entaw isha gidiya gisho enta kadhopo. Enta oosuwan maadetiya godati, ammaneysatanne dosetidaysata gidiya gisho enti kasepe aathidi oothanaw bessees. Neeni haysa tamaarsanawunne enti oothana mela zoranaw bessees.
1TI 6:3 Oonika dumma timirte tamaarsiyaba gidiko, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa tuma qaalaranne nu ammano timirtiyara gahetenna.
1TI 6:4 He uray otoron sugeteesipe attishin, aykoka erenna. Entaw issi qofa bolla palamanawunne ooyetanaw iita amoy de7ees. Hessi qanaate, ooshshi, cashshe, iita sidhenne,
1TI 6:5 giigonna palama kaalethees. Qassi entaw iita wozani de7ees; tumaa balidosona; enti Xoossaa ammanoy duretethas oge gidi qopoosona.
1TI 6:6 Shin taw de7iyabay gidana giya asas tuma ayyaana de7oy gita wodhe.
1TI 6:7 Nuuni ha alamiya aykoka ehibooko; qassi iyape aykoka ekidi booko.
1TI 6:8 Nuus kathinne ma7oy de7iko hessi gidana.
1TI 6:9 Shin duretethi koyeysati paaceninne xihen geloosona. Qassi entana duge dafiyanne dhaysiya eeyatethinne qohiya amon kundoosona.
1TI 6:10 Miishe siiqoy iitatetha ubbaas pulto. Issoti issoti miishe amotishe ammanope baletidi daro meton bantana yeggidosona.
1TI 6:11 Shin neno, Xoossa aso, hessafe baqata. Xillotethaa, Xoossaa daano, ammano, siiqo, danda7anne ashketethi kaalla.
1TI 6:12 Ammano baaxiya loytha baaxeta. Daro asaa sinthan ne markatida ne ammanuwaba, Xoossay nena iyaw xeegida merinaa de7uwa oyka.
1TI 6:13 Ubbaas de7o immiya Xoossaa sinthaninne, Phenxe Philaxoosa sinthan lo77o marka markatida Kiristoos Yesuusa sinthan ta nena kiittayis.
1TI 6:14 Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosi qoncana gakanaw ha kiitaa balinne borey bayna naaga.
1TI 6:15 Ba xalaala ubbaa haariya boncho Xoossay, kawota kawoy, godata Goday, ba qopida qamman Yesuus Kiristoosa zaari kiittana.
1TI 6:16 Issi iya xalaali hayqenna. Oonika shiiqanaw danda7onna poo7on de7ees. Oonika iya be7ibeenna; qassi be7anawuka danda7enna. Bonchoynne merinaa wolqay iyaw gido. Amin7i.
1TI 6:17 Ha alamiya dureti coo dhayiya shalon otortonna melanne ceeqonna mela oda. Nuus koshshiyaba palahisidi immiya nuna anjiya, dure Xoossan ammanetana mela enta kiitta.
1TI 6:18 Enti lo77o ooso oothanaada lo77o ooson duretanaada, keehatanne haratas shaakeyisata gidana mela kiitta.
1TI 6:19 Hessi entaw sinthas mino baaso gidiya gisho, he wode enti tuma de7oy ay daaniyako erana.
1TI 6:20 Ximotiyoosa, issi issi asay, “Eratethi” giya eeya palamapenne hada odape baqata; new imetida hadara naaga.
1TI 6:21 Issoti issoti nuus eratethi de7ees yaagishe ammanuwa aggidosona. Xoossaa aadho keehatethay hinte ubbaara gido.
2TI 1:1 Xoossaa shenen, Yesuus Kiristoosan bentida de7o ufaysaa markatanaw Yesuus Kiristoosa hawaare gidida Phawuloosape,
2TI 1:2 ta dosiya na7aa Ximotiyoosas kiitetida kiita. Xoossaa Aawapenne nu Godaa Kiristoos Yesuusape aadho keehatethay, maarotethaynne sarotethay new gido.
2TI 1:3 Taani, ta woosan qammanne gallas nena qopayis. Taani woossiya wode ta mayzata Xoossaanne taani lo77o kahan haggaaziya Xoossaa ne gisho galatayis.
2TI 1:4 Taani ne afuthaa qopayis; nena be7ada ufaytanaw daro laamotayis.
2TI 1:5 Qassi new de7iya tuma ammanuwa erayis. He ammanoy beni ne wogga aaye Loydininne ne aaye Ewuniqin de7iya ammanuwa mela.
2TI 1:6 Hessa gisho, taani ta kushiya ne bolla wothida wode Xoossay new immida imota neeni zaara eethana mela akeekisayis.
2TI 1:7 Ayis giiko, Xoossay nuus wolqaa, siiqonne nu huuphe haariya Ayyaana immispe attishin, yashsha ayyaana immibeenna.
2TI 1:8 Hiza, nu Godaas markatanaw yeellatopa; qassi iya gisho qashetida tananka yeellatopa. Shin Xoossay new immiya wolqan Wongela gisho, taara meto eka.
2TI 1:9 Xoossay ba sheneninne ba aadho keehatethan nuna ashshidi, ba geeshsha dere oothanaw nuna doorisipe attishin, nuuni oothida oosuwa gisho gidenna. Ha aadho keehatetha Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara merinaa wodetape sinthe nuus immis.
2TI 1:10 Ha77i ha aadho keehatethay nuna ashshiya Kiristoos Yesuusa yuussan qoncis. I hayqo wolqaa dhaysidi, Wongela baggara dhayonna de7o nuus qoncisis.
2TI 1:11 Taani Wongela sabaake, hawaarenne astamaare gidana mela Xoossay tana dooris.
2TI 1:12 Taani hessa gisho ha metuwa ekayis; shin ta ammaney ooneko eriya gisho yeellatike. Taw imetida hadara he gallasay gakanaw I naaganaw danda7eysa erayis.
2TI 1:13 Taani nena tamaarsida tuma qaala leemiso ootha oykada Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara nubaa gidida ammanuwaninne siiquwan de7a.
2TI 1:14 Nu giddon de7iya Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqan new imetida lo77o hadara naaga.
2TI 1:15 Iise biittan de7iya ubbay taape haakidaysa eraasa; enta giddon Figeluusinne Hermogeneesi de7oosona.
2TI 1:16 Anesfoori tana daro wode minthethida gisho Goday iya soo asaas qadheto. Taani qasho keethan de7iya wode I tanan yeellatibeenna.
2TI 1:17 Hessa bolla I Roome katamaa yida wode tana minthi koyidi demmis.
2TI 1:18 Wursetha gallasan Goday iyaw qadhetana mela taani Godaa woossayis. Efesoona kataman I tana ay mela maaddidaako ne loytha eraasa.
2TI 2:1 Hiza, ta na7aw, Kiristoos Yesuusan de7iya maarotethan minna.
2TI 2:2 Daro markata sinthan taani nena tamaarsida timirtiya, harata tamaarsanaw danda7iya ammanetida asaas hadara imma.
2TI 2:3 Yesuus Kiristoosas ammanthiya wotaadare gidada taara meto eka.
2TI 2:4 Ola wotaadarey ba tora mocona ufaysanaw giigeteesipe attishin, hara ooson bana peeshshenna.
2TI 2:5 Hessadaka, gaadde woxiya oonika bessiya ogera gaaddetonna ixiko woyto ekenna.
2TI 2:6 Goshshan daaburiya goshshanchoy ba daabura ayfiyape miya koyro asi gidanaw bessees.
2TI 2:7 Ne akeekana mela Goday nena maaddana gisho, ta new odidaba ne wozanan naaga.
2TI 2:8 Taani markatiya Wongela mela hayqope dendida, Dawita koche gidida Yesuus Kiristoosa qopa.
2TI 2:9 Taani wongela odiya gisho, iitabaa oothida asada, qashetada meto ekayis. Shin Xoossaa qaalay qashetenna.
2TI 2:10 Hessa gisho, Xoossay doorida asati Kiristoos Yesuusan de7iya atotetha merinaa bonchuwara ekana mela enta gisho ubbaban waayetayis.
2TI 2:11 Haysada giya tuma qaali de7ees; “Nuuni iyara hayqidaba gidiko, Iyara issife de7ana.
2TI 2:12 Nuuni genciko, iyara issife kawotana. Nuuni iya kaddiko, I nuna kaddana.
2TI 2:13 Nuuni ammanetona ixiko, I ammanetidaysa gididi daana. Ayis giiko, I bana kaddanaw danda7enna” yaagees.
2TI 2:14 Neeni enta haysa akeekisa; enti qaalata gaason palamonna mela, Godaa sinthan enta zora. Hessi si7eyisata dhaysesipe attishin, aykoka maaddenna.
2TI 2:15 Neeni tuma qaala suuretethan tamaarseysanne yeellayonna oosancho gidada, Xoossay nashshiya asada, nenatethaa iyaw immanaw minna.
2TI 2:16 Shin ha alamiyas injetiya go77onna odape baqata. Hessa mela oday ase Xoossaafe haassees.
2TI 2:17 Hessa mela oday asatethi midigiya paxonna woyzazire maduntha mela. Hessa mela odaa odeteyisata giddofe Hemeneyoosinne Filixoosi de7oosona.
2TI 2:18 Ha asati tuma ogiya aggidi, “Hayqida asay hayqope beni dendidosona” yaagidi guutha asata ammanuwa dhaysidosona.
2TI 2:19 Gidoshin, Xoossay mino zaalla hiixida gisho qaaxanaw danda7enna. Iya bolla, “Goday ba asaa erees. Godaa sunthaa xeegiya oonika iita oosope haako” giya qaalay xaafetis.
2TI 2:20 Issi gita keethan worqafe woyko birape oosetida miisheta xalaala gidonashin, mithafe woyko urqafe oosetida miishetika de7oosona. Hessatape baggati boncho oosos, qassi baggati tooshetiya oosos pee7osona.
2TI 2:21 Hessa gisho, oonika iita ubbaa aggikonne bana geeshshiko, boncho ooso oothiya miishe gidana. Enta de7oy geeshshinne Godaa ufaysiyabaa, qassi enti lo77o ooso ubbaa oothanaw danda7eyisata gidana.
2TI 2:22 Na7atetha iita amuwape baqata. Geeshsha wozanan Godaa xeegiya asatara issife, xillotethaa, ammanuwa, siiqonne sarotethaa kaalla.
2TI 2:23 Shin ooshshi medheysa erada eeyatethinne hada gidida palamape haaka.
2TI 2:24 Godaa oosanchoy asa ubbaas keeha, lo77o tamaarseysanne danda7ancho gidanaw besseesipe attishin, ooyetanaw bessenna.
2TI 2:25 I baara eqeteyisata ashketethan seereysa gidanaw bessees. Enti banta nagaraape simmidi tumaa eranaada Xoossay oothaneko ooni eri.
2TI 2:26 Enti banta wozanaako simmidi ba sheniya oothana mela enta oykida Xalahe xihiyape kessi ekana.
2TI 3:1 Wursetha gallasan un7ethiya wodey yaanaysa era.
2TI 3:2 Asay bantana doseyisata, miishe siiqeyisata, ceeqeteyisata, otoreyisata, cayeyisata, bantana yelidaysatas kiitetonaysta, galatonaysta, geeshshatethi baynayisata,
2TI 3:3 siiqoy baynayisata, maarotethi eronnayisata, zigireyisata, bantana haaronnayisata, wozana minota, lo77o dosonnayisata,
2TI 3:4 morkees aathidi immeyisata, qofi baynayisata, otoron sugeteyisata, Xoossaafe aathidi asho ufaysanaw doseyisata gidana.
2TI 3:5 Enti ammaniya daanosonape attishin, ammano wolqaa kaddoosona; neeni hessa mela asatape baqata.
2TI 3:6 Entafe issoti issoti asa keethaa gelidi nagaran oyketidaysatanne dumma dumma amon sugetiya daaburancho maccasata bolla godatosoona.
2TI 3:7 He maccasati ubba wode tamaarosonashin, tumaa eranaw danda7okona.
2TI 3:8 Yaanesinne Yambareesi Musera eqetidaysada ha asati guuggey oothonaysatanne ammanon kundida asata gidiya gisho tumaara eqetoosona.
2TI 3:9 Shin Yaanesanne Yambareesa eeyatethay qoncidaysada enta eeyatethayka asa ubbaa sinthan qoncana gisho entaw hanenna.
2TI 3:10 Shin neeni ta timirtiya, ta duussaa, ta qofaa, ta ammanuwa, ta danda7aa, ta siiquwa, ta gencaa,
2TI 3:11 ta goodetethanne ta metuwa eraasa. Anxooke, Iqoniyoonen, Lisxira katamatan tana gakidabaanne taani danda7ida metuwa eraasa; Goday tana he ubbaafe ashshis.
2TI 3:12 Kiristoos Yesuusan Xoossaa ufaysiya de7o daanaw koyiya ubbay goodettana.
2TI 3:13 Iita asatinne baletheysati bantaw baletishenne harata balethishe kasepe iiti iiti baana.
2TI 3:14 Shin ne tamaarida tumaaninne ne ammanida ammanuwan eqa. Ne oodefe tamaaridaako eraasa.
2TI 3:15 Neeni ne na7atethafe doomada Kiristoosa Yesuusa ammanada, atotethi demmiya cincatethi immanaw danda7iya Geeshsha Maxaafata eradasa.
2TI 3:16 Geeshsha Maxaafaa ubbay Xoossaafe imetida qaala. He maxaafay tumaa tamaarsanaw, balidaysata seeranaw, suurisanawunne xillotetha duussas koshshiya zore immanaw maaddees.
2TI 3:17 Xoossaa asi polonne lo77o ooso ubbaa oothanaw giigidaysa gidana mela maaddees.
2TI 4:1 Taani nena Xoossaa sinthaninne, kawo gididi haaranaw qonciya wode paxatanne hayqidaysata pirdanaw de7iya Kiristoos Yesuusa sinthan zorayis.
2TI 4:2 Qaala oda; wodey injetin injetonna ixin minnada oda. Daro danda7aninne tamaarson asaa zora seeranne denthetha.
2TI 4:3 Asay tuma timirtiya si7onna ixiya wodey yaana. Enti banta amuwa kaallidi, bantaw si7anaw ufaysiyabaa odiya astamaareta shiishosona.
2TI 4:4 Enti tuma timirtiya aggidi, tuma gidonna odaa si7anaw banta haytha zaarosona.
2TI 4:5 Shin neeni ubbaban nena haara. Meto danda7a. Wongela markatetha oosuwa ootha. New imetida Xoossaa ooso ubbaa pola.
2TI 4:6 Taani yarshetiya wodey gakis; ha alamiya aggada biya wodey matis.
2TI 4:7 Taani lo77o ola oletas; ta gaaddiya woxada wursas; ammanuwa naagas.
2TI 4:8 Sinthafe xillotetha kallachay tana naagees. Hessa xillo pirdaa pirdiya Goday he gallas taw immana. Hessa ta xalaalas gidonashin, iya qoncethaa amotiya ubbaas immana.
2TI 4:9 Ellesa yada tana be7a.
2TI 4:10 Deemasi ha77i alamiya dosidi, tana aggidi, Teselonqe katamaa bis. Qerqisi Galatiya biitta, qassi Titoy Dilmaxe biitta bis.
2TI 4:11 Luqaasa xalaali taara de7ees. Marqoosi Xoossa ooson tana maaddanaw danda7iya gisho, neera ekada ya.
2TI 4:12 Taani Tikiqoosa Efesoona katama kiittas.
2TI 4:13 Neeni yashe, Xiro7aada kataman Karpoosa matan aggada yida ta kootiyanne maxaafata taw ekada ya. Ubbaka galban xaafetida maxaafata ekonna yoopa.
2TI 4:14 Birata qoxiya Iskindirey tana daro qohis; Goday iya oosuwada iyaw zaarana.
2TI 4:15 I nu timirtiya daro ixiya gisho iyape nena naaga.
2TI 4:16 Koyro ta mootetiya wode ubbay aggidi bidosonape attishin, oonika tana maaddibeenna. Xoossay he naaquwa entaw taybopo.
2TI 4:17 Shin taani kumetha kiitaa Ayhude gidonna asa ubbaas markatin, enti si7ana mela Goday ta matan eqidi taw wolqa immis. Qassi koshatida gaammoda doona dooyida hayquwape tana ashshis.
2TI 4:18 Goday tana iita ubbaafe ashshidi ba salo kawotetha saron efana. Iyaw merinaape merinaa gakanaw bonchoy gido. Amin7i.
2TI 4:19 Phirisqillas, Aqilasinne Anesfoora soo asaas ta sarothuwa oda.
2TI 4:20 Erasxoosi Qorontoosa kataman attis. Xirofmoosi hargetida gisho, Milixe kataman aggas.
2TI 4:21 Balgoy gelanaape sinthe ellesada ya. Ewubulusi, Phudeesi, Linuusi, Qilaadeynne hara ammaniya asati ubbay nena saro goosona.
2TI 4:22 Goday Yesuus Kiristoosi ne ayyaanara gido. Xoossaa maarotethay hinte ubbaara gido.
TIT 1:1 Yesuus Kiristoosa hawaareynne Xoossa aylley, Phawuloosi, xaafida dabdaabiya. Xoossay doorida asaa ammanuwa dichanaadanne tuma ayyaana de7uwa waanidi daaneko bessiya tumaa eraako enta kaalethanaw taani kiitetas.
TIT 1:2 He ammanoynne eratethay merinaa de7uwa ufaysaa bolla zempis. Hessa daro wodepe sinthe wordotonna Xoossay nuus immana gidi qaala gelis.
TIT 1:3 Nuna ashshiya Xoossay ba woden ha kiitaa odana mela taw hadara immis.
TIT 1:4 Nu kothe ammanuwan ta tuma na7aa gidida Tito, Xoossaa Aawapenne nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristoosape aadho keehatethay, maarotethaynne sarotethay new gido.
TIT 1:5 Taani nena Qarxeesan aggada yiday, neeni attidaba giigisanaadanne taani kiittidaysada katamaa ubban woosa keetha cimata doorana melasa.
TIT 1:6 Cimi boretonaysa, issi mache azinaa, maara dhayon woyko kiitetetha ixon asi boronna ammaniya nayti de7iya asi gidanaw bessees.
TIT 1:7 Woosa keetha cimi Xoossaa oosuwa hadara ekida gisho, boretonaysa, otortonaysa, elle yilotonnaysa, mathotonaysa, oda medhonaysanne bessonna go77as dafetonaysa gidanaw bessees.
TIT 1:8 Shin imathe mokeysa, lo77oba ubbaa doseysa, akeekancho, xillo, geeshshinne bana haareysa gidanaw bessees.
TIT 1:9 Harata suure timirtiyan minthethanawunne he timirtiya ixeyisata zaaranaw ba tamaarida tuma qaalan minnidi eqanaw bessees.
TIT 1:10 Kiitetonaysati, pathonna oda odeteysati, cimmeysati ubbaka qaxaretetha wogaa naagiya daro asati de7oosona.
TIT 1:11 Enti bessonna ogen miishe demmanaw koyidi, tamaarsanaw bessonnaba tamaarsishe keetha asaa ubbaa iissiya gisho enta timirtiya teqanaw bessees.
TIT 1:12 Enta nabetape issoy, “Qarxeesa asay ubba wode wordo odetoosona; iita do7atanne azalla yarambata” yaagis.
TIT 1:13 Ha markatethay tuma markatethi. Hessa gisho, entaw tuma ammanoy daana mela enta hanqeta.
TIT 1:14 Tumaa ixiya asaa timirtiyanne Ayhudeta pathonna tossiya si7onna mela enta seera.
TIT 1:15 Bantaw geeshshi gididaysatas ubbay geeshshi, shin tunatasinne ammanonaysatas enta qofaynne kahay tunida gisho, entaw aybika geeshshi gidenna.
TIT 1:16 Enti nu Xoossaa eroos goosona, shin banta oosuwan iya kaddoosona. Enti Xoossan ixetidaysata, kiitetonaysatanne lo77o ooso ubbaas gidonnayisata.
TIT 2:1 Shin neeni suure timirtiya phalqonna timirte tamaarsanaw bessees.
TIT 2:2 Cima addeti bantana haareyisata, wopu gidaysata, bonchetidaysata, ammanon, siiqoninne danda7an, mino gidana mela zora.
TIT 2:3 Hessadaka, cima maccasay banta duussan geeshshata, zigironnayisata, woyne ushshan haaretonnaysatanne lo77oba tamaarseyisata gidana mela tamaarsa.
TIT 2:4 Enti hessada haniko yalaga maccasay banta azinatanne banta nayta siiqana mela tamaarsanaw danda7oosona.
TIT 2:5 Xoossaa qaalay boretonna mela bantana haareyisata, geeshshata, banta son ootheyisata, keehatanne banta azinatas kiiteteyisata gidana mela yalaga maccasa tamaarsonna.
TIT 2:6 Hessadaka, dondza addeti bantana haarana mela zora.
TIT 2:7 Neeni ne huuphen lo77o ooso ubban entaw leemiso gida. Neeni ne timirtiyan eqidaysanne ammanetidaysa gida.
TIT 2:8 Nu morketi nuna zigiranaw gaasoyabay entaw dhayin enti yeellatana mela neeni boretonna lo77o oda odeeta.
TIT 2:9 Aylleti ubbaban banta godatas kiitetana mela enta ufaysana melanne entara palamonna mela zora.
TIT 2:10 Enti banta godatape kaysotopo. Hessika, nuna ashshiya Xoossaa timirtey, ubba ogen dosetidaysa gidana mela banta oothiya oosuwan ammaneteyisata gideysa bessaana mela enta zora.
TIT 2:11 Ase ashshiya Xoossa aadho keehatethay asa ubbaas qoncis.
TIT 2:12 He aadho keehatethay, nu nagaranne ha alamiya amuwa aggidi, ha wodiyan nuna haaridi, tuma ayyaana de7uwaninne xillotethan daana mela nuna tamaarsees.
TIT 2:13 Nuuni anjetida ufaysaa gidida gita Xoossaanne nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristoosa boncho qoncethaa naagoos.
TIT 2:14 Iita ooso ubbaafe nuna wozanawunne lo77oba oothanaw amotiya ba geeshsha asi kessanaw nu gisho bana aathidi immis.
TIT 2:15 Neeni haysa tamaarsa; kumetha maatan zora, seera; oonika nena kadhopo.
TIT 3:1 Asay deriya haareysatas, aawatethay de7eysatas haaretanaw, kiitetanawunne lo77o ooso ubbaa oothanaw giigetidaysata gidana mela akeekisa.
TIT 3:2 Qassi enti oodde bollaka iita odetonna mela, saro asi gidana mela, ashketanne asa ubbaas qadheteyisata gidana mela zora.
TIT 3:3 Nuuni kase eeyata, kiitetonayisata, baletidaysata, dumma dumma asho ufaysasinne amos aylletidaysata. Nuuni iitatethaninne qanaaten kumidaysata; nu ase ixeyisata, asika nuna ixeyisata.
TIT 3:4 Shin ashshiya Xoossaa keehatethaynne siiqoy qoncida wode,
TIT 3:5 nu oothida xillo oosuwa gisho gidonashin, ba maarotethaa gisho nuna ashshis. Nuna I ashshiday, nam7antho yeletethaa meechaninne Geeshsha Ayyaana baggara immida ooratha de7uwana.
TIT 3:6 He Ayyaana, Xoossay nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara nu bolla darsidi gussis.
TIT 3:7 Ba aadho keehatetha baggara nuna xillisidi merinaa de7uwa laata ufaysaa oykana mela hessa oothis.
TIT 3:8 Ha qaalay ammanetida qaala. Xoossaa ammaneysati lo77o ooso oothanaw giigidaysata gidana mela ne ha qaala minthada odana mela ta koyayis. Haysati ase ubbaas lo77onne go77eyisata.
TIT 3:9 Shin eeyatetha palamape, kocha taybope, kachafenne higge gaason dendiya ooshshafe naageta. Hessi go77inne wodhey baynaba.
TIT 3:10 Shaahetethi medhiya uraa koyro zora; nam7antho hanqeta, hessafe guye, iyape haaka.
TIT 3:11 Hessa mela asi geellanne nagarancho; I ba bolla pirdeysa era.
TIT 3:12 Taani balgo yan shaacanaw qopida gisho, Arxemaasa woyko Tikiqoosa neeko kiittiya wode ne taako Niqophilyoona yaanaw minna.
TIT 3:13 Higge eriya Zeemasinne Aphiloosi oge biya wode entaw koshshiyabay paconna mela enta maadda.
TIT 3:14 Nu asayka pathonna asi gididi attonna mela bantaw koshshiyaba demmana mela lo77o ooso oothanaw minnidi tamaaro.
TIT 3:15 Taara de7iya ubbay nena saro goosona; ammanon nuna siiqiya asaa saro ga. Xoossaa aadho keehatethay hinte ubbaara gido. Amin7i.
PHM 1:1 Taani Phawuloosi, Yesuus Kiristoosa gisho qashon de7eysinne nu ishaa Ximotiyoosi, nuura oothiya nuuni dosiya Filmoonas,
PHM 1:2 ne son shiiqiya woosa keethatas, nu miche Afbiyaasinne nuura issife de7iya wotaadare Arkiphaasas xaafida kiita.
PHM 1:3 Xoossaa nu Aawapenne nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosape aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hintew gido.
PHM 1:4 Neeni geeshshata doseysanne Godaa Yesuusa ammaneysa taani si7iya gisho, Xoossaa woossashe nena qopiya wode ubban ta Xoossaa galatayis.
PHM 1:6 Neeni ne ammanuwa haratas shaakeysi nuus Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara yaa lo77oba ubbaa erisana mela taani Xoossaa woossayis.
PHM 1:7 Geeshshata wozanay ne oosuwan minnida gisho, ta ishaw, taani ne siiquwan daro ufaysinne minthetho demmas.
PHM 1:8 Hessa gisho, neeni oothanaw bessiyaba oothana mela nena kiittanaw Kiristoosa baggara taw minotethay de7ees.
PHM 1:9 Taani, cimay Phawuloosi, Kiristoos Yesuusas ha77ika qashon de7eysi, siiqon nena woossayis.
PHM 1:10 Taani qashon de7ashe iyaw zoriya aawa gidada ta na7aa Anasmoosa gisho nena woossayis.
PHM 1:11 I kase nena maaddenna, shin ha77i nenaka tanaka tuma maaddiya asi.
PHM 1:12 Taani wozanape dosiya Anasmoosa neeko yeddayis. Taani Wongela gisho qashetidashin, ne gisho taw oothidi tana maaddana mela ta matan iya ashshanaw koyas.
PHM 1:14 Shin ne sheneda oothanaw koyasipe attishin, neera zorettonna wolqan aykoka oothanaw koyke.
PHM 1:15 Anasmoosi guutha wode neepe shaaketidaysi, ooni eri simmidi ubba wode neera de7onna aggenna.
PHM 1:16 Hiza, haysafe guye Anasmoosi aylle gidonashin, ayllefe I daro aadhees. I taw ay mela siiqo ishe! Qassi I new asa baggaraka Godaa baggaraka aadhida isha.
PHM 1:17 Hiza, neeni tana ne lagge giyaba gidiko tana mokeysada iya moka.
PHM 1:18 I nena qohidabay woyko I acotidabay de7iko taape eka.
PHM 1:19 He acuwa ta qanxana gada taani Phawuloosi, ta kushen xaafayis. Neeni taw ne shempuwa acota uttidaysa taani nena akeekisanaw koshshenna.
PHM 1:20 Ta ishaw, Godaa baggara neepe maade demmanaw koyayis. Kiristoosa baggara tana minthetha.
PHM 1:21 Taani gidaysafe daro neeni oothanaysa erada qassi ne taw kiitetanaysa ammanada haysa xaafayis.
PHM 1:22 Xoossay hinte woosa si7idi tana hinteko guye zaarana gada qopiya gisho, taw imathi shempiya keethi giigisa.
PHM 1:23 Kiristoos Yesuusa gisho taara qashon de7iya Ephafiri nena saro saro gees.
PHM 1:24 Qassi taara issife oothiya Marqoosi, Arsxirokoosi, Deemasinne Luqaasi nena saro goosona.
PHM 1:25 Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa aadho keehatethay hinte ayyaanara gido.
HEB 1:1 Kase Xoossay, nu aawatas nabeta baggara dumma dumma ogen daro wode odis.
HEB 1:2 Shin ha wursetha wodiyan ubbaa iya laatisida qassi alame iya baggara medhida ba Na7aa baggara nuus odis.
HEB 1:3 Na7ay Xoossaa bonchuwa phoolethaanne kumetha Xoossa Xoossatetha ekidi, ba wolqaama qaalan ha alamiya katisidi oykis. Asaa enta nagaraape geeshidaape guye Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa ushacha baggan saluwan uttis.
HEB 1:4 Iyaw imetida sunthay kiitanchota sunthafe bolla gideysada I entafe bolla.
HEB 1:5 Hiza, Xoossay kiitanchotape oodeko, “Neeni ta Na7a; ta hachi new aawa gidas” gidee? Woyko qassi oodeko, “Taani iyaw aawa gidana; ika taw na7a gidana” gidee?
HEB 1:6 Qassi Xoossay ba bayra Na7aa ha alamiya kiittishe, “Xoossaa kiitanchoti ubbay iyaw goyinno” yaagis.
HEB 1:7 Xoossay kiitanchotaba odishe, “Xoossay ba Kiitanchota carko, ba aylleta tama laco oothees” yaagees.
HEB 1:8 Shin ba Na7aba odishe, “Xoossaw, ne araatay merinaw de7ees. Ne kawotethaa ne xillotethan aysaasa.
HEB 1:9 Neeni xillotethi dosadasa; iita ixadasa. Xoossay, ne Goday, nena ne laggetape aathidi dooris, ufaysa zayte nena tiyis” yaagees.
HEB 1:10 Xoossay Zaaridi, “Godaw, koyro neeni sa7a medhadasa; saloti ne kushe ooso.
HEB 1:11 Hessati ubbay dhayana; shin neeni daana. Enti ubbay afilada wurana.
HEB 1:12 Neeni enta saleenada xaaxana; qassi enti afilada laametana. Shin neeni ubba wode nena; ne laythayka wurenna” yaagees.
HEB 1:13 Shin Xoossay kiitanchotape oodeko, “Taani ne morketa ne tohoy yedhiyaso oothana gakanaw, haysan taape ushacha baggan utta” gidee?
HEB 1:14 Kiitanchoti ubbay atotethi demmanaw de7iya asata maaddanaw Xoossay kiitida ayyaanata gidokonaayee?
HEB 2:1 Hessa gisho, nuuni si7ida tumaape haraso eketonna mela he si7idaysa minthidi naaganaw bessees.
HEB 2:2 Hiza, kiitanchota baggara odetida qaalay tuma gidiko, iya naaqoynne kiitetonna ixoy pirda ehiyaba gidiko,
HEB 2:3 yaatin, nuuni haysa mela gita atotetha ixas giiko, waanidi attanee? Koyro Goday ba huuphen he atotetha odis; qassi iyape si7idaysati nuus geeshshidi markatidosona.
HEB 2:4 Qassi Xoossay malaatatan, oorathabatan, dumma dumma mallataninne ba sheniyada immida Geeshsha Ayyaana imotatan markatethaa minthis.
HEB 2:5 Xoossay ha nuuni odiya sinthafe yaana alamiya, kiitanchotas haarisibeenna.
HEB 2:6 Geeshsha Maxaafay issi bessan haysada yaagees: “Neeni asas qopanaw asi aybee? Woyko neeni iya naaganaw I aybee?
HEB 2:7 Ne iya kiitanchotape guutha wodes guuthadasa; Iya huuphen bonchonne saba kallacha wothadasa.
HEB 2:8 Qassi ubbaba iya tohuwape garsan wothadasa” yaagees. Xoossay ubbaba iyaw haarisiya wode iyaw haaretiboonabay aybika baawa. Shin ha77i ubbabay iyaw haaretishin nuuni be7ibooko.
HEB 2:9 Shin nuuni kiitanchotape guuthara guuxida Yesuusa be7oos. Xoossaa aadho keehatetha gaason Yesuusi asa ubbaas hayqis. I waaye hayqo hayqida gisho, bonchonne saba kallacha iya huuphen wothis.
HEB 2:10 Ubbabay iyawunne iya gaason medhetida Xoossay, daro nayta baara bonchisanaw enta atotetha huuphiya, Yesuusa waayen polo oothanaw iyaw bessees.
HEB 2:11 Yesuusinne he I geeshshida asa ubbay issi aawa nayta. Yesuusi enta, “Ta ishata” gidi xeeganaw yeellatonnay hessasa.
HEB 2:12 Yesuusi, “Taani ne sunthaa ta ishatas awaajana; deriya shiiquwan nena galatana” yaagees.
HEB 2:13 Qassi I, “Taani ta ammanuwa iya bolla wothana” Qassika, “Xoossay taw immida naytara ta haysan de7ayis” yaagees.
HEB 2:14 Nayti ashoynne suuthi de7eyisata gidiya gisho, Yesuusika entada ase gidis. I hessa oothiday, hayqo bolla wolqi de7iya Xalahiya ba hayquwan dhaysanaasa.
HEB 2:15 Qassi banta de7o laytha ubban hayqo yashshan aylletidi de7eyisata aylletethaafe wozanaasa.
HEB 2:16 Tuma Yesuusi yiday Abrahaame koche maaddanaasafe attishin, kiitanchota maaddanaasa gidenna.
HEB 2:17 Asaa nagaray atto geetetana mela Xoossaa sinthan maariyanne ammanetida kahine halaqa gidis. Hessa gisho, I ubbaban ba ishata daananaw bessees.
HEB 2:18 I ba huuphen paacen waayetida gisho paaceteyisata maaddanaw danda7ees.
HEB 3:1 Hessa gisho, Xoossay xeegida geeshsha ishato, nu ammanon Godaa gidi xeegiya hawaariyanne kahine halaqaa Yesuusa be7ite.
HEB 3:2 Musey Xoossaa Keetha ubban ammanetidaysada Yesuusika bana doorida Xoossaas ammanetidaysa.
HEB 3:3 Keethe keexeysi keethafe aadhidi boncheteysada Yesuusi Musepe aadhiya boncho ekanaw bessees.
HEB 3:4 Issi issi keethaa keexida asi de7ees, shin ubbaa giigisiday Xoossaa.
HEB 3:5 Musey Xoossaa Keetha ubban ammanetida aylle gididi, Xoossay sinthafe gaanabas marka gidis.
HEB 3:6 Shin Kiristoosi xoossa keethan na7ada ammanetidaysa. Nuuni ekana gidi naagiya ufaysaa minthidi naagiko Xoossaa keethi gidoos.
HEB 3:7 Hessa gisho, Geeshsha Ayyaanay geysada, “Hachi hinte Xoossay geysa si7iya wode,
HEB 3:8 mela biittan paaciya gallas, hinte aawati makallidaysada, hinte wozanaa minthofite.
HEB 3:9 Hinte aawati tana paacidosona; oytamu laythi ta oosuwa be7idosona.
HEB 3:10 Hessa gisho, ta he yeletethaa hanqetada, ‘Enti ubba wode banta wozanan baloosona; ta ogiya eribookona’ yaagas.
HEB 3:11 Hessa gisho, taani ta hanquwan caaqada, ‘Ta shempo bessaa ubbaka gelokona’ yaagas” yaagees.
HEB 3:12 Ta ishato, hintefe oodenka, de7o Xoossaafe hintena shaakiya iitanne ammanonna wozani doonna mela naagetite.
HEB 3:13 Hintefe oonaka nagari balethin, ba wozanaa minthonna mela “Hachi” yaagetidi xeegetishin gallas gallas issoy issuwara zoretite.
HEB 3:14 Nu koyro ammanuwa nuuni wursethi gakanaw minthidi naagiko, Kiristoosara issife laattana.
HEB 3:15 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Hachi Xoossay geysa hinte si7iya wode, he wode enti makallatethan hanidaysada, hinte wozanaa minthofite” yaagis.
HEB 3:16 Xoossay giyaba si7idi makalliday oonee? Musey Gibxefe kaalethi kessida ubbaa gidokonaayee?
HEB 3:17 Xoossay oytamu laythi oona hanqetidee? Nagara oothidaysatanne enta ahay mela biittan wodhi attida asata gidokonaayee?
HEB 3:18 Qassi Xoossay, “Ta shempo bessaa geleketa” yaagidi caaqiday, iyaw kiitetonna ixida asaape attishin, oodesee?
HEB 3:19 Hiza, enti he shempo bessaa gelonna attiday ammanibona gisho, gideysa nu be7oos.
HEB 4:1 Hiza, Xoossay nuna ba shempo bessaa gelsana gida qaalay buroo sinthafe de7iya gisho, hintefe oonika he shempo bessaa gelonna attonna mela naagetoos.
HEB 4:2 Entaw Wongelay sabbaketidaysada, nuuska sabbaketis. Shin enti si7idaba ammanidi ekiboonna gisho enta go77ibeenna.
HEB 4:3 Gidoshin, alamey medhetoosape doomidi Xoossaa oosoy poletidaysa gidikoka, Xoossay, “Taani ta hanquwan caaqada, ta shempo bessaa ubbaka gelokona” gidaysada, nuuni ammanidaysati iya shempo bessaa gelana.
HEB 4:4 Laapuntha gallasaaba issi bessan, “Xoossay laapuntha gallasan ba ooso ubbaafe shempis” yaagis.
HEB 4:5 Qassika he bessan, “Enti ta shempo bessaa ubbaraka gelokona” yaagis.
HEB 4:6 Koyro Wongela si7idaysati kiitetonna ixidi shempo bessaa gelibookona. Yaaniya gisho, ha77ika he shempo bessaa gelana issi issi asati de7oosona.
HEB 4:7 Hessa gisho, Xoossay, “Hachi” gidi xeegishe issi gallas nuus qanxis. Daro wodepe guye Xoossay Dawita baggara, “Xoossay giyaba hachi hinte si7iya wode, hinte wozanaa minthofite” yaagidi odis.
HEB 4:8 Iyyasuy entaw shempuwa immidaba gidiyako, Xoossay hara gallasaba guyepe odennashin.
HEB 4:9 Hiza, Xoossaa asaas Sambaata shempoy naagetidi de7ees.
HEB 4:10 Xoossaa shempo bessaa geliya oonika, Xoossay ba oosuwape shempidaysada ika ba oosuwape shempana.
HEB 4:11 Hessa gisho, oonika he asaa kiitetetha ixuwa kaallidi, kundonaada Xoossaa shempo bessaa gelanaw minnoos.
HEB 4:12 Xoossaa qaalay de7onne ootheysa. Nam7u baggara qaratida mashshafeka aadhidi oco. I shempo, ayyaana, xaphonne kolize gakanaw kanthidi caddees. Qassi asa wozanan de7iya geemmida qofaanne amuwa shaakidi pirdees.
HEB 4:13 Xoossaa sinthafe qosetiyabay ayba medhetethika baawa. Iya ayfe sinthan ubbabay qoncenne kallo de7ees. Nuuni zaaro immanaw bessey iya sinthana.
HEB 4:14 Hiza, salo keyida gita kahine halaqay, Xoossaa na7ay Yesuusi, nuus de7iya gisho, nu ammanuwa minthidi naagoos.
HEB 4:15 Nu kahine halaqay nu daaburiya wode nuus qadhetanaw danda7eysa. I nuuda ubbaban paacetisipe attishin, nagara oothibeenna.
HEB 4:16 Hiza, maarotethaa ekanawunne maade koshshiya wode aadho keehatetha demmanaw aadho keehatethay de7iyasuwa Xoossaa araatako yayyonna shiiqoos.
HEB 5:1 Issi issi kahine halaqi asaa giddofe dooretidi, Xoossara gathiyaban asaa gisho imotanne nagara yarsho yarshanaw shuumetees.
HEB 5:2 I ba huuphen daaburancho gidiya gisho, eronnaysatasinne baleysatas qadhetanaw danda7ees.
HEB 5:3 I ba nagara gishonne asa ubbaa nagara gisho yarsho yarshanaw bessey hessasa.
HEB 5:4 Oonika ha bonchuwa baw ekanaw danda7enna, shin Aaroni kahine halaqa gidanaw xeegidaysada Xoossan xeegetanaw bessees.
HEB 5:5 Hessadaka, Kiristoosi kahine halaqa gidiya bonchuwa baw ekibeenna. Shin Xoossay iya, “Neeni ta Na7a; hachi ta new Aawa gidas” yaagees.
HEB 5:6 Qassi harason, “Malkexaadeqi kahine gididaysada, neeni merinaw kahine gidana” yaagees.
HEB 5:7 Yesuusi ase gididi ha alamiyan de7iya wode bana hayqope ashshanaw danda7iya Xoossaa daro yeehoninne afuthan woossis. I, iya bonchidi kiitetida gisho Xoossay iya woosa si7is.
HEB 5:8 Yesuusi Xoossaa Na7a gidikoka ba waayetida waayan kiitetethi tamaaris.
HEB 5:9 Hessanka, Yesuusi ba oosuwa polidaape guye baw kiitetiya ubbay merinaa atotetha demmana mela gaaso gidis.
HEB 5:10 Xoossay Malkexaadeqa shuumidaysada kahine halaqa oothidi iya shuumis.
HEB 5:11 Ha nu oda bolla guji odanabay darobay de7ees, shin hinte akeekay guutha gidiya gisho hintew odi gelsanaw waaysees.
HEB 5:12 Hinte hannoode astamaare gidanaw bessees, shin Xoossaa qaala koyro timirtiya hintena zaari tamaarsiya hara asi koshshees. Hinte mino kathi maanaw danda7onna gisho maathi koshshees.
HEB 5:13 Maathi paahetiya oonika yooga na7a gidiya gisho, lo77onne iita shaaki erenna.
HEB 5:14 Shin mino kathi lo77onne iita shaaki eriya kahaama asaasa.
HEB 6:1 Hiza, Kiristoosaba tamaarsiya koyro timirtiya aggidi Kiristoosan kahaamatethako boos. Hayqo oosope simobaanne Xoossaa ammanoba koyro timirtiyako guye simmoko.
HEB 6:2 Hessadaka, xinqatetaba, kushe wosobaa, hayqope dendobaanne merina pirdaba zaari tamaaroko.
HEB 6:3 Xoossay giiko nu hessa oothana.
HEB 6:4 Issi toho poo7oy poo7idaysata, salo imota ekidaysata, Geeshsha Ayyaanan shaaketidaysata,
HEB 6:5 lo77o Xoossaa qaalanne sinthafe yaana alamiya wolqaa be7idaysata,
HEB 6:6 guyepe kaddidaysata nagaraape nam7antho zaaranaw danda7etenna. Ayis giiko, enti banta dhayuwas Xoossaa Na7aa zaari kaqiya mela masqaliya bolla iya kaqosonanne asa sinthan kawushoosona.
HEB 6:7 Ubba wode I bolla bukiya ira uyada, goyida uraa maaddiya kathi immiya biittiya Xoossan anjetidaaro.
HEB 6:8 Shin agunthinne kinchote doliya biittiya aybibaaka maadduku; iw baadethay matatis; wursethan xuugetana.
HEB 6:9 Nu siiqo ishato, nuuni haysada odiyaba gidikoka, hintena atotethako kaalethiya lo77obay hintew de7eysa eroos.
HEB 6:10 Xoossay suure pirdeysa. Xoossay, hinte oothida oosuwanne kase gidin ha77ika ammaneyisata maaddidi, iyaw de7iya siiquwa bessidaysa dogenna.
HEB 6:11 Hinte ubbay ufaysan naageysa demmana gakanaw ha minotethaa wursethi gakanaw bessaana mela nu amottoos.
HEB 6:12 Hinte ammanoninne danda7an naagiya ufaysaa laattiya asaa daanana melape attishin, azalla gidana mela koyoko.
HEB 6:13 Xoossay Abrahaames immana gidi caaqida wode baape aadhiya hari giti bayna gisho ba huuphen caaqis.
HEB 6:14 Iyako, “Taani nena anjana; ne zerethaaka darsana” yaagis.
HEB 6:15 Abrahaamey danda7an naagidi Xoossay immana gida ufaysaa ekis.
HEB 6:16 Asi caaqishe baape gitatiya uran caaqees; he caaqoy geetetidaba minthidi, palama ubbaa teqees.
HEB 6:17 Hessa gisho, Xoossay ba laametonna qofaa ufaysa qaala laatteysatas qoncisanaw koyida gisho caaqon minthis.
HEB 6:18 Xoossay wordotenna. Iya ufaysa qaalaynne caaqoy, nam7ayka laametokona. Ha nam7ubatan nu sinthan de7iya ufaysaa oykanaw danda7ana mela geshe demmanaw iyako baqatida nuuni, wolqaama minthetho demmana.
HEB 6:19 Ha ufaysay nu shempuwa, markabey qaaxonnaada minthi oykiya birata mela. He ufaysay magarajuwafe guye baggan de7iya geeshsha bessaa gelis.
HEB 6:20 Yesuusi Malkexaadeqa shuumatethaada merinaw kahine halaqa gididi, nu gisho nuupe sinthatidi he bessaa gelis.
HEB 7:1 Malkexaadeqey, Saleema Kawoy, Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa kahine. He Malkexaadeqi Abrahaamey kawota oli xoonidi simmishin iyara gahetidi iya anjis.
HEB 7:2 Abrahaamey ba di77idaba ubbaafe iyaw asraata kessidi immis. Malkexaadeqa sunthay koyro “Xillotethaa kawa”, nam7antho, “Saleema kawo” birshethayka “Sarotethaa kawa” guussu.
HEB 7:3 Malkexaadeqas aayiya woyko aawu woyko kocha paydoy baawa. Iya yeletethaas doomethi woyko iya de7uwas wursethi baawa, shin Xoossaa Na7a daanidi merinaw kahine gidis.
HEB 7:4 Malkexaadeqi ay mela giteeko be7ite. Nu aawata mayzay, Abrahaamey, ba de77idabaape iyaw asraata immis.
HEB 7:5 Kahine gidiya Leewe kochay Isra7eele asape, hessika Abrahaame koche gidida banta ishatape asraata ekana mela higgey kiittees.
HEB 7:6 Malkexaadeqi Leewe koche gidonna ixikoka Abrahaamepe asraata ekis; ufaysa qaali de7iya Abrahaame anjis.
HEB 7:7 Guuthay gitan anjeteysi palanthenna.
HEB 7:8 Issi baggara, asraata ekeysati hayqiya asata, shin hara baggara asraata ekeysi de7on de7ees yaagidi odetidaysa.
HEB 7:9 Hiza, asraata ekiya Leewey, Abrahaame baggara asraata immis gaanaw danda7etees.
HEB 7:10 Ayis giiko, Malkexaadeqi Abrahaamera gahetiya wode Leewey yeletiboonnaba gidikoka, ba mayza Abrahaame gulbatan de7ees.
HEB 7:11 Isra7eele asaas higgey Leewe kahinetetha baggara imetis. Ha Leewe kahinetethay polo gididaba gidiyako Aaronaysa mela gidonashin, Malkexaadeqa mela hara kahine shuumanaw ayis koshshidee?
HEB 7:12 Hiza, kahineti laametiya wode higgeyka qassi laametanaw bessees.
HEB 7:13 Ha nu iyabaa odiya uray hara koche; iya sheeshape oonika yarsho bessan kahinetethan oothibeenna.
HEB 7:14 Nu Goday Yihuda sheeshape yidaysi eretidaysa. Gidoshin, Musey kahineteba odishe Yihuda kochaaba aybaka odibeenna.
HEB 7:15 Malkexaadeqa mela hara kahiney yidaba gidiyako ha nu odiyabay aadhidi qoncana.
HEB 7:16 I kahine gididay dhayonna de7o wolqanaape attishin, ba mayzaa wogaaninne higgen gidenna.
HEB 7:17 Geeshsha Maxaafay, “Malkexaadeqa kahinetetha mela, neeni merinaw kahine” yaagidi markatees.
HEB 7:18 Koyro higgey daaburanchonne maaddonnaba gidiya gisho shaaretis.
HEB 7:19 Muse higgey aybinka polo oothanaw danda7ibeenna. Shin nuuni iya baggara Xoossaako shiiqiya ubbaafe aadhiya ufaysa qaalay nuus imetis.
HEB 7:20 Kiristoosi kahine gidiya wode Xoossay caaqis, shin harati kahine gidida wode hessa mela caaqoy baawa.
HEB 7:21 Shin Yesuusi caaqon kahine gidis. Xoossay yaagidi caaqis; “Goday caaqis; I ba qofaa laammenna; ‘Neeni merinaa kahine’ ” yaagis.
HEB 7:22 Ha caaquwa gaason Yesuusi nuus ubbaafe aadhiya qaala caaquwas waase gidis.
HEB 7:23 Kahinetethan oothonna mela hayqoy enta diggida gisho koyro kahineta tayboy daro.
HEB 7:24 Shin Yesuusi merinaw de7iya gisho iya kahinetetha hari laattenna.
HEB 7:25 Hessa gisho, I ubba wode enta gisho gaannatanaw merinaw de7iya gisho Xoossaako iya baggara yeyisata polo ashshanaw danda7ees.
HEB 7:26 Hiza, nuus koshshiyaba immiya, geeshshay, boreynne tuni baynaysi, nagaranchotape shaaketidaysinne saluwape aadhidi dhoqida kahine halaqay nuus koshshees.
HEB 7:27 I hanko kahine halaqata mela koyro ba nagara gisho, kaallidi asaa nagaraa gisho gallas gallas yarsho yarshanaw koshshenna. I bana yarshida wode zaarethonna ogen issi toho bana yarshis.
HEB 7:28 Muse higgey daaburancho asaa kahine halaqa oothidi shuumees. Shin higgiyafe guye yida caaqo qaalay merinaw polo gidida Xoossaa Na7aa shuumis.
HEB 8:1 Nuuni haasaya gitabay hessa. Saluwan Ubbaafe Bolla Xoossaa araatape ushacha baggan uttida haysa mela kahine halaqay nuus de7ees.
HEB 8:2 I asan gidonashin, Godan eqida tuma dunkaaniyan xoossa keethan oothees.
HEB 8:3 Kahine halaqa ubbay imonne yarsho yarshanaw shuumetees. Hessa gisho, ha kahiney yarshanaw issibay daanaw koshshees.
HEB 8:4 Higgey kiiteysada yarshiya kahineti de7iya gisho, Kiristoosi sa7an de7iyaba gidiyako I kahine gidenna.
HEB 8:5 Enti kahinetethan oothiya dunkaaney salon de7eysas leemisonne kuya. Musey dunkaaniya essiya wode Xoossay iyako, “Taani nena zumaa bolla bessida leemisuwa kaallada ootha” yaagis.
HEB 8:6 Shin Yesuusi giddo gididi sigethiya caaqoy, koyro caaquwape aadheysada I ekida oosoy entaysafe aadhees. Hessi eqiday aadhiya caaqo qaalana.
HEB 8:7 Koyro caaquwan bali baynaba gidiyako nam7antho caaqo koshshenna.
HEB 8:8 Shin Goday enta boridi, haysada yaagis: “Taani Isra7eele asaaranne Yihuda asaara ooratha caaqo caaqiya wodey yaana.
HEB 8:9 He caaqoy ta enta aawata Gibxe biittafe kushiya oykada, goocha kessida wode entara caaqida caaquwa mela gidenna. Enti ta caaquwan ammanetibona gisho, taani enta yegga aggas yaagees Goday.
HEB 8:10 Shin hizape guye Isra7eele asaara ta caaqana caaqoy haysa yaagees Goday. Taani ta higgiya enta guuggiyan wothana; enta wozanan xaafana. Taani enta Xoossaa gidana; entika ta ase gidana.
HEB 8:11 Entafe oonika ba shooruwa woyko ba ishaa, ‘Godaa era’ yaagidi tamaarsenna. Enti guuthafe gita gakanaw ubbay tana erana.
HEB 8:12 Taani enta naaquwa atto gaana; enta nagaraa zaara qopike” yaagees.
HEB 8:13 Xoossay ha caaquwa “Oorathi” gidi xeegishe koyroysa gal7isis. Hiza, gal7aynne ceegay dhayiya wodey gakis.
HEB 9:1 Koyro caaquwas Xoossaa goyinniya wogaynne sa7a Xoossa Keethay de7ees.
HEB 9:2 Dunkaaney eqis. Iyan xompe wothiya kocay, xarpheezaynne Godaa sinthan wothiya uythay de7ees; he bessay Geeshsha Bessaa geetetees.
HEB 9:3 Nam7antho magarajuwafe guye baggara de7iya bessay Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa geetetees.
HEB 9:4 Iya giddon ixaane cuyisiya worqa saaxineynne worqan meeshetida caaqo Taabotey de7ees. He caaqo Taabotiyan mannay de7iya worqa xaaroy, aacida Aarona xam7aynne Muse higgey xaafetida nam7u loche shuchati de7oosona.
HEB 9:5 He Taabotiyape bolla baggara atotetha kamaa banta qefiyan genthiya boncho kiruubeti de7oosona. Shin ha77i he ubbaa qoncisidi odanaw danda7oko.
HEB 9:6 Ha ubbay haysada giigidaape guye, kahineti ubba wode banta oosuwa oothanaw dunkaaniyas koyro kifiliya geloosona.
HEB 9:7 Shin kahine halaqaa xalaali dunkaaniyas nam7antho kifiliya laythafe issi toho gelees. I yaa gelishe ba nagaraa gishonne asay eronna oothida nagaraa gisho suutha yarsho ekonna gelenna.
HEB 9:8 Koyro dunkaaney eqidi de7ishin, Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa efiya ogey buroo dooyetiboonaysa Geeshsha Ayyaanay hessan erisees.
HEB 9:9 Hessi ha wodiyas leemiso; Xoossas imetiya imoynne yarshoy goyinniya uraa kaha geeshshanaw danda7onaysa haysi bessees.
HEB 9:10 Hessati muussaba, ushshabaanne dumma dumma meecha wogata odeyisata. Enti ooratha wogay yaana gakanaw oosetiya kare bagga wogata.
HEB 9:11 Shin Kiristoosi ha77i nu demmida lo77obatas kahine halaqa gididi yis. I gelida dunkaaney gitanne polo gididaysa. He dunkaaney asa kushen oosetibeenna qassi ha alamiyaba gidenna.
HEB 9:12 Kiristoosi Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa geliya wode deesha suuthinne mari suuthi ekidi gelibeenna. Shin merinaa atotetha immanaw ba suuthaa ekidi zaarethonna ogen issi toho gelis.
HEB 9:13 Deesha suuthaynne korma suuthay, xuugetida ussa bidoy, tunida asaa bolla dharcetidi entana geeshshiyaba gidiko,
HEB 9:14 merinaa Geeshsha Ayyaana baggara borey bayna yarsho oothidi, Xoossaas bana immida Kiristoosa suuthay, de7o Xoossaa goyinnana mela hayqo kaalethiya oosuwape nu kaha waati aathidi geeshshennee?
HEB 9:15 Hessa gisho, xeegetidaysati Xoossay immida merinaa laata ekana mela Kiristoosi ooratha caaquwas giddo gididi sigetheysa gidis. Hessi haniday asay koyro caaquwape garsan de7iya wode oothida nagaraape entana wozanaw I hayqidaysana.
HEB 9:16 Hiza, keekey de7iko, he keekida uraa hayqoy eretanaw koshshees.
HEB 9:17 Keekida uray hayqiko iya keekey minnees. Keekida uray hayqonna attiko iya keekey oothenna.
HEB 9:18 Hari attoshin, koyro caaqoyka suuthi bayna minnibeenna.
HEB 9:19 Musey higge kiita ubbaa asaas odidaape guye mara suuthinne deesha suuthi haathara walakidi, zo7o dorsa ikisenne hisoophe wurco ekidi, maxaafaa bollanne asaa bolla wurxis.
HEB 9:20 Musey asaako, “Hinte naagana mela Xoossay kiitida suutha caaqoy haysa” yaagis.
HEB 9:21 Hessadaka, dunkaaniya bollanne oothiya miishe ubbaa bolla suuthaa wurxis.
HEB 9:22 Tumaka higgey geysada guuthabatape attishin, ubbabay suuthan geeyees. Suuthi gukonnashin atotethi baawa.
HEB 9:23 Saluwabaas leemiso gididaysati ubbay mehe yarshon geeyanaw koshshees. Shin salobati banta huuphen hessafe aadhiya yarshuwan geeyanaw koshshees.
HEB 9:24 Kiristoosi tuma Xoossa keethaas leemiso gidida, asa kushen oosetida Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa gelibeenna. Shin I ha77i nu gisho, Xoossaa sinthan bentanaw saluwa gelis.
HEB 9:25 Kahine halaqay laythan laythan ba suuthi gidonnaysa ekidi, Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessa gelees. Shin Kiristoosi daro toho bana yarshanaw salo gelibeenna.
HEB 9:26 Hessada hanidaba gidiyako, Kiristoosi alamey medhetoosape doomidi daro toho waayetanaw koshshees. Shin ha77i wodiya wursethan nagara digganaw bana yarshidi zaarethonna ogen issi toho bentis.
HEB 9:27 Asi ubbay issi toho hayqanaw hessafe guye pirdetanaw bessees.
HEB 9:28 Hessadaka, Kiristoosi daro asaa nagara digganaw issi toho yarshetis. Shin I nagara tookanaw gidonashin, bana naageysata ashshanaw nam7antho qoncana.
HEB 10:1 Muse higgey yaanaw de7iya lo77obatas kuyape attishin, ba huuphen waanna gidenna. Hessa gisho, laythan laythan pacey bayna yarshetiya yarshoy goyinnanaw shiiqiya asaa polo oothanaw danda7enna.
HEB 10:2 Higgey enta polo oothanaw danda7idaba gidiyako enti yarsho yarsheysa agganashin. Qassi goyinnanaw shiiqiya asay banta nagaraape geeyana; enta kahayka entana bala gidi mootenna.
HEB 10:3 Shin he yarshoti laythan laythan nagara qofisoosona.
HEB 10:4 Ayis giiko, korma suuthinne deesha suuthi nagara digganaw danda7enna.
HEB 10:5 Hessa gisho, Kiristoosi ha alamiya yida wode haysada yaagis: “Neeni yarshonne imo koyabaaka; shin taw asho giigisadasa.
HEB 10:6 Neeni xuussa yarshoninne nagara yarshon ufaytabaaka.
HEB 10:7 He wode, ‘Ta gisho maxaafan xaafetidaysada, Godaw, taani ne sheniya oothanaw yas’ yaagas” yaagis.
HEB 10:8 Yarshoy yarshetana mela higgey kiittiyaba gidikoka, Kiristoosi koyro, “Neeni yarshonne imo, xuussa yarshonne nagara yarsho koyabaaka; entan ufaytabaaka” yaagis.
HEB 10:9 Kaallidika I, “Godaw, Heko taani ne sheniya oothanaw yas” yaagis. Hessa gisho, Kiristoosi nam7anthuwa essanaw koyroysa shaaris.
HEB 10:10 Yesuus Kiristoosi Xoossaa sheniya oothidi, zaarethonna ogen issi toho ba ashuwa yarshida gisho nuuni geeyida.
HEB 10:11 Kahine ubbay, nagara digganaw danda7onna he yarshota gallas gallas yarshishe eqidi ba oosuwa oothees.
HEB 10:12 Shin Kiristoosi ubba wodes gidiya issi nagara yarshuwa yarshidi, Xoossaafe ushacha baggan uttis.
HEB 10:13 He wodiyape doomidi iya morketi iya tohoy yedhiyabaa oothana gakanaw naagees.
HEB 10:14 I zaarethonna ogen issi toho bana yarshida yarshuwan geeshshata merinaw polo oothis.
HEB 10:15 Qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanay nuus haysa markatees. Koyro haysada yaagis:
HEB 10:16 “He gallasatape guye, taani entara caaqiya caaqoy haysa: Taani ta higgiya enta qofan wothana; enta wozanan xaafana” yaagees.
HEB 10:17 Kaallidika, “Taani enta nagaraanne enta iita oosuwa zaara qopike” yaagees.
HEB 10:18 Hiza, nagari atto geetetidaape guye nagaras yarshetiya yarsho koshshenna.
HEB 10:19 Hiza, ta ishato, nuuni Yesuusa suuthaa baggara Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa gelanaw nuus minotethi de7ees.
HEB 10:20 Nu gelanay Kiristoosi ba magarajuwa, hessika ba ashuwa baggara nuus dooyida oorathinne de7o gidida ogiyana.
HEB 10:21 Nuus Xoossa Keetha bolla shuumetida gita kahine halaqay de7ees.
HEB 10:22 Nuuni iita kahape geeyanaw nu wozanaa wurxetidi, nu asatethaa xillo haathan meecetidi, suure wozananinne polo ammanon Xoossaako shiiqoos.
HEB 10:23 Nuus ufaysa qaala immida Xoossay ammanetidaysa gidiya gisho nu markatiya ufaysaa ushachi haddirsi goonna minthidi oykoos.
HEB 10:24 Issoy issuwa siiqosinne lo77o oosos waati denthethaneko ane qopoos.
HEB 10:25 Issoti issoti meeze oothidi shiiqeysa aggidaysada nuuni issife shiiqeysa aggoko. Shin Godaa gallasay matatidaysa hinte be7iya gisho hessa kaseysafe aathidi oothite.
HEB 10:26 Nuuni tuma eratethaa ekidaape guye erishe nagara oothiko, hizape nu nagaraa gisho yashetana yarshoy baawa.
HEB 10:27 Shin hiza attiday yashshiya pirdaanne Xoossaa morketa xuugganaw giigida wolqaama tama.
HEB 10:28 Muse higgiya kiitetonna ixida oonika nam7u woyko heedzu asi iya bolla markatiko qadhey baynashin hayqees.
HEB 10:29 Yaatin, Xoossaa Na7aa kadhida uray, bana geeshshida Xoossaa caaqo suuthaa tunabaada qopida uray, qassi aadho keehatetha Ayyaana cayida uray, ay mela iita pirdaa ekanaw bessiyako ane qopite.
HEB 10:30 Hiza, “Halo kesoy tabaa, ta kushe zaarana” gidaysa nu eroos. Qassika, “Goday ba asa pirdana” yaagis.
HEB 10:31 De7o Xoossaa kushen kundethi daro yashshees.
HEB 10:32 Hintew Xoossaa poo7oy poo7idaape guye hinte daro waayen, gita baaxen gencida beni wodiya qopite.
HEB 10:33 Issi issi toho hinte asa sinthan cayetideta; goodetideta; issi issi toho hessa mela waayey gakida asaara issife waayideta.
HEB 10:34 Qashon de7iya asaaska qadhetideta. Hintew lo77onne dhayonna shaloy salon de7eysa hinte erida gisho hinte shaloy bonqetiya wode ufaysan danda7ideta.
HEB 10:35 Hessa gisho, gita woytoy de7iya hinte minotethaa yeggofite.
HEB 10:36 Xoossaa sheniya polidi, I hintew immana gida ufaysaa ekana gakanaw gencanaw koshshees.
HEB 10:37 Hiza, Geeshsha Maxaafan, “I, yaana gidaysi yaana; gam7enna.
HEB 10:38 Shin ta xilloy, tanan ammanetidi daana; oonika guye simmiko tana ufaysenna” yaagees.
HEB 10:39 Nuuni ammanidi attiya asaa baggafe attishin, guye simmidi dhayiya asaa bagga gidoko.
HEB 11:1 Ammano guussay, demmana gidi ufaysan ammanetidi naagiyabanne nu be7onnaba be7iyada oothidi ekiyaba.
HEB 11:2 Beni aawati ammanon Xoossaafe markatethi ekidosona.
HEB 11:3 Alamey Xoossaa qaalan medhetidaysa nu ammanon eroos. Qassi bentiyabay bentonnabape medhetis.
HEB 11:4 Aabeli Qaayelape aadhiya yarsho Xoossaas yarshiday ammanonna. Xoossay Aabela imuwa ufaytidi ekida wode I xillo gididaysa markatis. Aabeli hari attoshin, hayqidika ba ammanuwan ha77i gakanaw odees.
HEB 11:5 Heenokey hayqonna salo biday ammanonna. Xoossay iya ekida gisho oonika iya be7anaw danda7ibeenna. Heenokey salo eketanaape sinthe I Xoossaa ufaysida asi gideysi odetis.
HEB 11:6 Ammanoy bayna oonika Xoossaa ufaysanaw danda7enna. Xoossaako yaa oonika Xoossay de7eysanne bana koyeysatas woyto immeysa ammananaw koshshees.
HEB 11:7 Nohey buroo bentonnabas Xoossi iyaw odida wode Xoossas yayidi, bananne ba soo asaa ashshanaw ammanon markabe keexis. Yaatidi ba ammanuwan alame pirdidi, ammanon bentiya xillotethi Xoossafe ekis.
HEB 11:8 Abrahaamey laata oothidi ekana biitta baana mela Xoossay iya xeegida wode hari attoshin, I aw biyako eronna ixikoka kiitetiday ammanonna.
HEB 11:9 Abrahaamey Xoossay iyaw immana gida biittan bete asada de7iday ammanonna. Xoossay he immana gidaysa iyara issife laattanaw de7iya Yisaaqaranne Yayqoobara wolla dunkaanen de7is.
HEB 11:10 I, Xoossay qopidi keexida xaala baasoy de7iya katamaa naagees.
HEB 11:11 Saara ba huuphen cimidabaa gidikoka ufaysi immida Xoossay ammanetidaysa gideysa erida gisho qanthatanaw wolqa demmiday ammanonna.
HEB 11:12 Hessa gisho, hayqida asi daaniya issi addiyafe salo xoolinto melanne abba gaxan de7iya tayboy bayna shafe mela zerethi yeletidosona.
HEB 11:13 He asa ubbay bantaw geetetida ufaysaa qaala ekonna ammanon hayqidosona. Shin haahora hessa be7idi, demmidaada oothidi, ufaysan ekidosona. Qassi enti sa7an imathenne bete asi gideysa eridosona.
HEB 11:14 Hessada giya asay banta biitta naageysa qoncen bessees.
HEB 11:15 Enti he aggidi keyida biitta guye qopidaba gidiyako guye simmanaw danda7oosona.
HEB 11:16 Shin ha77i aadhidi lo77iya salo biitta laamotosona. Hessa gisho, Xoossay entaw katama giigisida gisho, “Enta Xoossaa” geetetidi xeegetanaw yeellatenna.
HEB 11:17 Abrahaamey paacetida wode Yisaaqa yarshiday ammanonna. He ufaysa qaala ekida Abrahaamey ba issi na7aa yarshanaw giigis.
HEB 11:18 Xoossay Abrahaameko, “Ne kochay Yisaaqa baggara xeegetana” yaagidi odis.
HEB 11:19 Xoossay hayqope denthanaw danda7eysa Abrahaamey ammanida gisho, Yisaaqa hayqope paxi dendidaada oothidi zaari ekis.
HEB 11:20 Yisaaqi wodepe hananaba eridi Yayqoobanne Eesawe anjiday ammanonna.
HEB 11:21 Yayqoobi hayqana hanishe, issi issi Yoosefa nayta anjidaynne guufe bolla katidi goyinniday ammanonna.
HEB 11:22 Yoosefi hayqanaw matida wode Isra7eele asay Gibxefe keyanaysa odidaynne ba meqethaa oothanaba enta kiittiday ammanonna.
HEB 11:23 Musey yeletidaape guye iya aayanne iya aaway mala lo77o na7a gididaysa be7idi heedzu ageena qottiday ammanonna; enti kawa awaajuwa babibookona.
HEB 11:24 Musey diccidaape guye Gibxe kawa na7e na7a geetetanaysa ixiday ammanonna.
HEB 11:25 Musey nagaran guutha wodes ufaytanaape, Xoossaa asaara waaye ekanaysa dooris.
HEB 11:26 I wodepe demmana woytuwa tishshi oothidi xeellida gisho, Gibxe shaluwape aathidi Kiristoosa gisho boretanaysi daro aadhiya duretethi gididaysa eris.
HEB 11:27 Musey Kawa hanquwa yayyonna, Gibxefe keyday ammanonna. Bentonna Xoossaa be7ida asada hanidi ba qofan gencis.
HEB 11:28 Hayqo ehiya kiitanchoy Isra7eele asaa bayra nayta wodhonna mela Musey Paasikanne suutha wurxetha wogaa oothiday ammanonna.
HEB 11:29 Isra7eele asay mela biittara hemetiyada hemetidi, Zo7o Abbaa pinniday ammanonna. Shin Gibxe asay gelanaw paacidi be7iya wode haathay enta mittis.
HEB 11:30 Isra7eele asay Iyaarko katamaa shucha dirsaa laapun gallas yuuyidi, kundisiday ammanonna.
HEB 11:31 Laymiya Ra7aaba biitta wocheyisata mokida gisho, kiitetonna asaara hayqonna attiday ammanonna.
HEB 11:32 Hiza, haraa ta ay go? Gediyoonaba, Baaraqaba, Samsoonaba, Yoftaaheba, Dawitaba, Sameelaba, qassi nabetaba odanaw taw wodey gidenna.
HEB 11:33 Enti ammanon kawotethata xoonidosona; xillotethan aysidosona; Xoossay immana gida ufaysaa ekidosona; gaammota doona gordidosona;
HEB 11:34 tama wolqaa toysidosona; morketa mashshafe attidosona; banta daaburan minnidosona; olan wolqaama gididosona; allaga toora goodidosona.
HEB 11:35 Maccasati banta hayqidaysata hayqope paxin ekidosona. Qassi harati aadhiya hayqope dendo ekanaw koyidi qashope biletanaysa ixidosona.
HEB 11:36 Harati asan boretidi lisson garaafetidosona; harati santhalaatan qashetidi qasho keethan yegetidosona.
HEB 11:37 Enti shuchan cadetidosona; magaazen nam7a keyidi phalqetidosona; paacetidosona; mashshan hayqidosona; entaw ubbabay dhayin metootidosona. Dorsa itenne deesha ite ma7idi yuuyidosona.
HEB 11:38 Entaw ha alamey giigonna ixin mela biittan, dere bolla, gongoloninne olla giddon yuuyidosona.
HEB 11:39 Xoossay enta ammanuwaba markatikoka, he ubbay geetetida ufaysa qaala ekibookona.
HEB 11:40 Xoossay nuus lo77oba qopi wothida gisho enti nuuni bayna polo gidokona.
HEB 12:1 Hiza, shaarada nu yuushuwan darida haysa mela markati nu matan de7iya gisho nuna dhubiya ubbaanne oykidi haariya nagaraa diggidi, nu sinthan de7iya gaadde wothaa gencan woxoos.
HEB 12:2 Nu ammanuwas oge dooydaysanne nu wursetha poluwako nuna gathiya Yesuusa bolla nu ayfiya wothoos. Yesuusi wodepe de7iya ufaysaa gisho masqaliya waayiya danda7idi, yeella hayquwa kadhidi, Xoossaafe ushacha baggan uttis.
HEB 12:3 Hiza, hinte doccidi ufaysi qanxonna mela nagaranchota ixuwa danda7ida Yesuusa qopite.
HEB 12:4 Nagarara de7iya baaxiyan buroo suuthu gussana gakanaw eqetibeketa.
HEB 12:5 Xoossay ba qaalan, ba naytada hintena zoridaysa dogideta. “Ta na7aw, Xoossaa seera leqofa; I nena seeriya wode ufaysi qanxofa.
HEB 12:6 Goday ba dosiya uraa seerees; qassi ba na7ada ekiya ubba garaafes” yaagees.
HEB 12:7 Xoossay hintena ba naytada seeriya wode gencite; Aaway seeronna na7i oonee?
HEB 12:8 Xoossay ba nayta ubbaa seerees; hinte seerettonna ixiko tuma iya nayta gidonashin balako nayta.
HEB 12:9 Qassi nuna yelida nu aawati nuna seerosona; nuka entana bonchoos. Yaatin, nuuni nu ayyaana Aawas waanidi aathidi haaretoko?
HEB 12:10 Hiza, nu aawati bantaw lo77o daanida mela guutha wodes nuna seeridosona. Shin Xoossay nu go77as, nu iya geeshshatethan shaaketana mela seerees.
HEB 12:11 Nuuni seeretiya wode yiloyeesipe attishin, ufaysenna. Shin guyepe seeretethi meezetida asaas seeray, saroy kumida xillotethaa ayfe ayfisees.
HEB 12:12 Hiza, hinte argaacida qesiyanne hinte daaburida gulbata minthite.
HEB 12:13 Wobbey paxana melape attishin, aathidi meqonna mela hinte tohuwas suure oge giigisite.
HEB 12:14 Asa ubbaara saro daanawunne geeshshatethan daanaw minnite; geeshshatethi bayna oonika Godaa be7anaw danda7enna.
HEB 12:15 Hintefe oodeska Xoossaa aadho keehatethay paconnaada, qassi camo ayfe ayfidi daro asaa tunisiyanne dhaysiya zerethada gidonna mela naagetite.
HEB 12:16 Hinte giddon laymatiya asi woyko issi toho miya kathas ba bayratetha toochidi bayzida Eesawe mela asi doonna mela naagetite.
HEB 12:17 Guyepe Eesawey he anjuwa ekanaw koyida wode digetidaysa ereeta. I he anjuwa afuthan minnidi koykoka, demmanaw danda7ibeenna; I nagaraape simmanaw qaada demmibeenna.
HEB 12:18 Hinte kushen boshetiya Siina deriyako, eexiya tamaako, dhumaako, caaganaako, gotiyaako,
HEB 12:19 moyze punuko woyko qaalay si7etiya bessaako yibeeketa. He qaala si7ida asay hara guzha qaala si7onna mela woossidosona.
HEB 12:20 Ayis giiko, “Hari attoshin, do7i he zumaa bochiko, shuchan cadetidi hayqo” yaagida kiitaa enti tookanaw danda7ibookona.
HEB 12:21 He haniyabay daro daganthiyaba gidida gisho Museyka, “Taani yashshan kokoras” yaagis.
HEB 12:22 Shin hinte Xiyoone zumako, de7o Xoossay de7iya Yerusalaame katamaako, issife shiiqidi ufaytiya daro mukulu kiitanchotako saluwa yideta.
HEB 12:23 Enta sunthay salon xaafetida woosa keethaa bayra naytako, asa ubbaa dayna gidida Xoossaako, polo gidida xillo asaa ayyaanatako yideta.
HEB 12:24 Ooratha caaquwas giddo gididi sigethiya Yesuusako, Aabela suuthaafe aadhiyaba odiya wurxetida suuthako yideta.
HEB 12:25 Hintew odiya ura qaala ixas goonna mela naagetite. Kaseysati sa7an gididi odida kiita si7onna ixidi, kessi ekiboonnaba gidiko, yaatin, salon gididi odiya qaala nuuni ixas giiko waanidi kessi ekanee?
HEB 12:26 He wode iya qaalay sa7a qaathis. Shin ha77i taani, “Sa7a xalaala gidonashin, issi toho zaarada saluwaka qaathana” yaagis.
HEB 12:27 “Issi toho zaarada” giya qaalay qaaxonnabay minnidi daanaysa, qassi qaaxiya medhetidabati dhayanaysa bessees.
HEB 12:28 Nuuni qaaxanaw danda7onna kawotethaa ekiya gisho Xoossaa galatoos; Xoossaa ufaysiya ogen bonchoninne yashshatethan iya goyinnoos.
HEB 12:29 Hiza, nu Xoossay tuma xuuggiya tama.
HEB 13:1 Ammaniya asada issoy issuwara polo siiqetite.
HEB 13:2 Imathe mokeysa dogopite. Issi issi asati hessada oothishe eronna kiitanchota mokidosona.
HEB 13:3 Qashon de7eyisata hinteka entara issife qashon de7iyada oothidi entana qopite. Waaye ekiya asaara issife hinteka waaye ekiyada oothidi entana qopite.
HEB 13:4 Ekoynne geloy asa ubbaa matan bonchetidaba gido. Qassi Xoossay laymateysatanne laammeyisata pirdanaw de7iya gisho azinaynne machiya issoy issuwas ammanetanaw bessees.
HEB 13:5 Miishe siiqope hintena naagite; hintew de7iyaban alite. Xoossay, “Taani nena ubbaraka yeggike woyko aggike” yaagis.
HEB 13:6 Hessa gisho, nuuni ammanetidi, “Goday tana maaddeysa; ta yayyike; asi tana ay oothanee?” yaagos.
HEB 13:7 Xoossaa qaala koyro hintew odida hintena kaaletheyisata qopite. Enti waanidi de7idaako enta duussaa be7idi enta ammanuwa kaallite.
HEB 13:8 Yesuus Kiristoosi zineka hachika merinawuka laametenna.
HEB 13:9 Dumma dumma ooratha timirten haraso bidi dhayopite; boopite. Nu wozanay Xoossaa aadho keehatethan minnanaw besseesipe attishin, min go77onna kathan wogaa polon gidopo.
HEB 13:10 Shin dunkaaniya giddon oothiya kahineti he yarsho kathaafe maanaw entaw maati bayna yarsho bessay nuus de7ees.
HEB 13:11 Kahine halaqay nagara yarshos mehe suuthi ekidi yarshanaw Ubbaafe Geeshsha Bessaa gelees. Shin he mehiya ashuwa dirsaafe karen xuuggees.
HEB 13:12 Hessadaka, Yesuusi deriya nagaraape ba suuthan geeshshanaw katamaa pengiyafe karen waayetis.
HEB 13:13 Hiza, nuuni boriya tookidi dirsaafe kare iyako keyoos.
HEB 13:14 Hiza, nuus haysan merinaw de7iya katami baawa, shin nuuni yaana katamaa naagoos.
HEB 13:15 Hiza, Yesuusa baggara ubba wode iya sunthaas markatiya mettersha galata yarsho Xoossaas immoos.
HEB 13:16 Lo77oba oosonne hintew de7iyabaape metootida asaas imo dogopite. Hiza, hessa mela yarshoy Xoossaa ufaysees.
HEB 13:17 Hintena kaaletheysatas kiitetite; enti giyaba oothite. Enti banta oothiyabas Xoossaa sinthan oyshetanaw de7iya gisho, hintena heemmoosona. Hinte entaw kiitetiko, banta oosuwa ufaytidi oothana; hessi hanonna ixiko, enti azzanishe oothana; hessi hintena aybibaaka maaddenna.
HEB 13:18 Nuus Xoossaa woossite. Nu kahay geeshshi; nu ubba wode lo77oba oothanaw koyoos.
HEB 13:19 Taani hinteko ellesada yaana mela hinte taw minthidi Xoossaa woossana mela ta hintena hadara gayis.
HEB 13:20 Sarotethaa Xoossay, dorsa heemmiya nu Godaa Yesuusa, ba merinaa caaqo suuthan hayqope denthidaysi,
HEB 13:21 iya sheniya oothana mela lo77oba ubban I hintena danciso. Iya ufaysiyabaa Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara nunan Xoossay ootho. Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara Xoossaas merinaape merinaa gakanaw bonchoy gido. Amin7i.
HEB 13:22 Ta ishato, ta ha dabdaabiya hintew qanthan xaafida gisho, hinte ta zoriya saletonna ekana mela ta hintena woossayis.
HEB 13:23 Nu ishay, Ximotiyoosi qashope biletidaysa erite. I ellesidi taako yiiko ta iyara hintena bada be7ana.
HEB 13:24 Hintena kaaletheysatanne ammaniya ubbaa saro giite. Xaalepe yida ammaniya asay hintena saro yaagosona.
HEB 13:25 Xoossaa aadho keehatethay hinte ubbaara gido. Amin7i.
JAM 1:1 Xoossaanne Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa aylley, Yayqoobi, biitta ubban laaletida tammanne nam7u sheeshatas kiitida kiita. Saro, ay mela de7eetii?
JAM 1:2 Ta ishato, hintena dumma dumma paacey gakiya wode hinte lo77oba demmidaada kumetha ufaysan ekite.
JAM 1:3 Hinte ammanuwa paacetethay danda7a hintew immeysa ereeta.
JAM 1:4 Hinte wursethi gakanaw danda7iko aybi pacey bayna polonne kumethi gideta.
JAM 1:5 Hintefe oodeska cincatethi dhayiko Xoossaa woosso. Iyaw imetana. Xoossay oonaka boronna ubbaas keehatethan immiya Xoosse.
JAM 1:6 Shin I woossiya wode sidhonna ammanon Xoossaa woosso. Sidhiya oonika carkoy sugin qaaxiya abba zule mela.
JAM 1:7 Nam7u qofi de7eynne ba ogiyan eqonna oonika Godaape aykoka demmana gidi qopofo.
JAM 1:9 Ammaniya manqo asati, Xoossay entana dhoqu oothiya wode ufayto.
JAM 1:10 Qassi ammaniya dure asati Xoossay entana ziqi oothiya wode ufayto. Dure asati ciishshada dhayana.
JAM 1:11 Away ba mishaara keyidi maata melisin, ciishshay qoletees; iya lo77otethayka dhayees. Hessadaka, dure asati banta oosuwan daaburishe dhayana.
JAM 1:12 Metuwa xoonidi aadhidaape guye, Xoossay bana siiqeysatas immana gidi qaala gelida de7o kallachaa ekana gisho, meton genciya asi anjetidaysa.
JAM 1:13 Oonika paacetiya wode, “Tana Xoossay paacees” goopo. Xoossay iitan paacetenna; qassi I oonaka paacenna.
JAM 1:14 Shin issi issi asi ba iita amuwan gooshetiya wodenne cimetiya wode paacetees.
JAM 1:15 Hessafe guye, amotethi qanthatidi nagara yelees; qassi nagari diccidi hayqo yelees.
JAM 1:16 Ta siiqo ishato, cimetofite.
JAM 1:17 Lo77o imoynne kumetha anjo ubbay salopenne saluwa poo7uwa medhida Xoossaa aawape yees. Xoossay kuyada ubba wode laametenna.
JAM 1:18 Nuuni, iya medhetethas koyro gidana mela nuna tuma qaalan ba shenen yelis.
JAM 1:19 Ta siiqo ishato, haysa akeekite. Asi ubbay si7anaw elleso, shin odetanawunne hanqetanaw ellesopo.
JAM 1:20 Asa hanqoy Xoossay koyiya xillotethaa ehenna.
JAM 1:21 Hessa gisho, tuna hanotanne iitatetha ubbaa diggidi, Xoossay hinte wozanan tokida hinte shempuwa ashshanaw danda7iya qaala aadatethan ekite.
JAM 1:22 Shin Xoossaa qaala ooson peeshshitepe attishin, sissa xalaalan hintena cimmofite.
JAM 1:23 Qaala si7idi oothonna asi, I ba som7uwa mastooten be7iya asa mela.
JAM 1:24 I ba som7uwa be7idi bees, shin I ay daaniyako ellesi dogees.
JAM 1:25 Shin oonika aylletethafe kessiya polo higgiya akeekan be7idi, kaallidi naagey, si7idaysa dogonna ooson peeshshiya uray, ba ooso ubban anjetana.
JAM 1:26 Ba inxarsaa naagonna ammanayis giya uray bana cimees; iya ammanoy hada.
JAM 1:27 Xoossaa Aawa sinthan borey bayna geeshsha ammanoy haysa: aayiya aawu bayna naytanne am7eta maadonne alamiya tunaape bana naago.
JAM 2:1 Ta ishato, hinte nu boncho Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa ammaniyaba gidiko, asa som7o xeellidi ase bonchofite.
JAM 2:2 Leemisos, worqa migiddo aathidi, lo77o ma7o ma7ida dure asi hinte shiiquwa yis. Qassi curqa ma7o ma7ida manqo asika yis.
JAM 2:3 Lo77o ma7o ma7ida addiya hinte aathidi bonchidi, “Ne haysan lo77iya oydiyan utta” gidi, qassi manqo addiya, “Ne yan eqa woyko haysan ta tohuwa matan sa7an utta” geeta.
JAM 2:4 Yaatin, hinte, hinte giddon shaaketethi medheysatanne iita qofara de7iya daynnata mela gideketiyee?
JAM 2:5 Ta siiqo ishato, si7ite. Ammanon dure gidana melanne bana siiqeysatas immana gida salo kawotethaa laattana mela ha sa7an de7iya manqota Xoossay dooribeneyee?
JAM 2:6 Shin hinte manqota toocheta. Hintena un7etheysati dureta gidokonaayee? Hintena daynna sinthe goocheysati enta gidokonaayee?
JAM 2:7 Hinte xeegetida lo77o Godaa sunthaa cayeysati enta gidokonaayee?
JAM 2:8 Shin Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Ase ubbaa nena ne doseysada dosa” geetetidi xaafetida Xoossaa kawotethaa higgiya hinte poliko lo77o ootheeta.
JAM 2:9 Shin hinte asa som7o xeellidi bonchiko, nagara ootheeta qassi higgey hintena higge menthida asada pirdana.
JAM 2:10 Oonika higge ubbaafe issuwa menthidi, attida ubbaa naagiko ubbaa menthidaada taybetees.
JAM 2:11 “Laammofa” gida Goday, qassi “Wodhopa” gis. Shin neeni laammonna aggada wodhidaba gidiko, higgiya menthadasa.
JAM 2:12 Aylletethafe kessiya higgiya sinthan pirda ekanaw de7iya asada odetitenne oothite.
JAM 2:13 Ase maaronna oonaka Xoossay maaronna pirdana. Shin maarotethay pirdaa xoonees.
JAM 2:14 Ta ishato, hintefe issi asi taw ammanoy de7ees gidi, ba ammanuwa ooson bessonna ixiko iya ay maaddanee? Iya ammanoy iya ashshanaw danda7ii?
JAM 2:15 Leemisos issi ishay woyko issi michiya kallotikonne entaw miyabay dhayiko,
JAM 2:16 hintefe issi asi entako, “Saro biite! Tama kayite! Kallidi miite!” gidi, koshshiyaba entaw immonna ixiko enta ay maaddii?
JAM 2:17 Hessa gisho, oosoy bayna ammanoy barka hayqidaysa.
JAM 2:18 Shin issi asi, “New ammanoy de7ees; qassi taw oosoy de7ees. Neeni ne ammanuwa ne oosuwape shaakada tana bessa; taka ta ammanuwa ta oosuwan nena bessaana” gaana.
JAM 2:19 Neeni, issi Xoossay de7eysa ammanaasa; hessi lo77o. Tuna ayyaanatika ammanoosona; yashshan kokoroosona.
JAM 2:20 Neno eeyaw! Ammanoy oosope shaaketidi maaddonnaysa eranaw koyay?
JAM 2:21 Nu aawa Abrahaamey, ba na7aa Yisaaqa yarsho bessa bolla wothida wode ba oosuwan xillibeennee?
JAM 2:22 Iya ammanoynne iya oosoy issife oothidaysa be7ikii? Iya ammanoy iya oosuwan poletis.
JAM 2:23 Geeshsha Maxaafay, “Abrahaamey Xoossaa ammanis. Xoossay hessa iyaw xillotethi oothidi taybis” gidaysi poletis. Qassi I Xoossaa dabbo geetetidi xeegetis.
JAM 2:24 Asi ammano xalaalan gidonashin, ooson xilleysa be7aasa.
JAM 2:25 Hessadaka, laymiya Ra7aaba Isra7eelepe kiitetidaysata mokada hara ogera enta moyzida wode ba oosuwan xillabeekee?
JAM 2:26 Shempoy shaaketida asatethay hayqo gideysada, oosoy shaaketida ammanoyka hayqidaysa.
JAM 3:1 Ta ishato, hintefe daroti astamaare gidopo. Nu, astamaareti haratape aadhiya pirdaa ekanaysa hinte ereeta.
JAM 3:2 Nu ubbay daroban baletoos. Ba odan baletonna oonika banatetha naaganaw danda7iya polo asi.
JAM 3:3 Parati nuus kiitetana mela bixaala barsidi nuuni koyiya bessi ubbaa efoos.
JAM 3:4 Markabey hessa mela gita gidishe wolqaama carkuwan sugetikoka, enta laaggeysi ba koyiya bessi zaaridi laagiya guutha mithan laagetidi bees.
JAM 3:5 Hessada inxarsi asatethaa giddon guutha gidikoka daro gitaban ceeqetees. Guutha tami daro gita wora xuuggees.
JAM 3:6 Inxarsi tama mela. Inxarsi nu asatethaa giddon iitan kumida alame; asatethaa ubbaa tunisees. Gaannamepe keyiya tamada nu de7uwa wotha ubbaa xuuggees.
JAM 3:7 Do7atanne kafota, ulora goosheteysatanne abban de7iya medhetethata ubbaa asi haarees; entika haaretidosona.
JAM 3:8 Shin oonika inxarsi haaranaw danda7ibeenna. Inxarsi wodhiya marzey kumida haaretonna iita medhetethi.
JAM 3:9 Nu inxarsan, nu, Godaanne Xoossaa galatoos. Qassi iyara Xoossaa leemison Medhetida asaa baaddoos.
JAM 3:10 Issi doonape galatinne baadethi keyees. Ta ishato, hessada hananaw bessenna.
JAM 3:11 Pultoy issi ollafe mal7iya haathinne cammiya haathi pultanaw danda7ii?
JAM 3:12 Ta ishato, balase mithi shamaho ayfanaw danda7ii? Woyko woyne mithi balase mitha ayfe ayfanaw danda7ii? Camo haathaafe mal7o haathi keyanaw danda7enna.
JAM 3:13 Hinte giddon cincinne akeekanchoy oonee? Ba lo77o de7uwa, ashketethaninne cincatethan oosetida ooson besso.
JAM 3:14 Shin hinte wozanan cammiya qinaateynne bana dosoy de7iko ceeqetofite; tumaa bolla wordotopite.
JAM 3:15 Hessa mela cincatethay salope yidaba gidonashin, hessi asaba, alameba, xalaheba.
JAM 3:16 Qinaateynne bana dosoy de7iya son ooshshinne iita ooso ubbay de7oosona.
JAM 3:17 Shin bollafe yaa cincatethay ubbaafe sinthe geeshshi. Qassi sarotethi, aadatethi, si7idi ekeysa, qadheteysa, lo77o ayfey kumidaysa, ase shaakonnaysanne cubbotethi baynaysa.
JAM 3:18 Sarotethaa doseysati sarotethi zeridi xillotethi buucosona.
JAM 4:1 Ooshshinne oli hinte giddo awupe yii? Enti yey hinte asatethaa haaranaw oletiya hinte asho amuwape gidenneyee?
JAM 4:2 Hinte amotteeta, shin demmeketa; hessa gisho, wodheeta. Minthi koyeeta, shin demmanaw danda7eketa; hessa gisho, ooyeteetanne oleteeta. Hinte Xoossaa woossonna gisho koyaba demmeketa.
JAM 4:3 Hinte woosseta, shin demmeketa. Hinte asho amuwa polanaw wobbe ogen woossiya gisho demmeketa.
JAM 4:4 Hinteno, laymateysato! Ha alamiya dosey Xoossara morke gideysa ereketii? Ha alamiyara dabbotanaw koyey oonika Xoossara morke.
JAM 4:5 Geeshsha Maxaafay, “Xoossay nunan daana mela oothida Ayyaanay, nuuni iyaw buzo gidana mela amottees” gidaysa coo gidaba daanii?
JAM 4:6 Shin Geeshsha Maxaafay, “Xoossay otoranchota ixees, shin bantana ashketas maarotethi immees” giya gisho, Xoossay maarotethi darsidi immees.
JAM 4:7 Hessa gisho, Xoossaas haaretite; Xalahiyara eqetite; I hintefe haakana.
JAM 4:8 Xoossaako shiiqite; I hinteko shiiqana. Hinteno, nagaranchoto, hinte kushiya meecetite; nam7u qofi de7eysato, hinte wozanaa geeshshite.
JAM 4:9 Kayotite, yeekitenne afuxite. Hinte miichay yeehon, hinte ufaysay azzanon laameto.
JAM 4:10 Godaa sinthan hintenatethaa kawushite; hintena dhoqu dhoqu oothana.
JAM 4:11 Ta ishato, issoy issuwa zigiropite. Ba ishaa zigireynne iya bolla pirdey higge zigiresinne higge bolla pirdees. Neeni higge bolla pirdiko higge bolla pirdeysa gidaasape attishin, higge poleysa gidaka.
JAM 4:12 Higge immeynne pirdey Xoossaa xalaala. Ashshanawunne dhaysanaw danda7ey iya. Yaatin, ne asa bolla pirdey neeni oonee?
JAM 4:13 Hinte, “Nuuni hachi woyko wonto ya katamaa woyko ha katamaa baana; yan laythi uttana; zal7idi wodhisana” yaageysato, si7ite.
JAM 4:14 Wonto aybi hananeeko hinte ereketa. Hinte de7oy waananeko erey oonee? Hinte guutha wode bentidi dhayiya aka mela.
JAM 4:15 Hessa aggidi, “Goday giiko nuuni daana; haysa woyko hessa oothana” yaaganaw bessees.
JAM 4:16 Shin hinte ha77i otortetanne ceeqeteta. Hessa mela ceeqo ubbay iita.
JAM 4:17 Hessa gisho, lo77oba oothanaw erishe oothonna uraas hessi nagara.
JAM 5:1 Hinteno, dureto, hinte bolla iita metoy yaa gisho yeekitenne zeleelite.
JAM 5:2 Hinte shaloy buuqis; hinte afilayka bilan meetetis.
JAM 5:3 Hinte worqaynne hinte biray shi7is. He shi7ay hinte bolla marka gidana. I hinte asatethaa tamada maana. Hinte ha wurida qammatan hintew shalo dagayeeta.
JAM 5:4 Hinte gaden oothi pee7ida asaa une miishiya qanxibeketa. Hessi hinte bolla waassees. He asata waasoy wolqaama Godaa haythan si7etis.
JAM 5:5 Ha sa7an hinte ulo xalaalas qopidi, injen de7ideta. Shukas giigetida meheda hintena dhiikideta.
JAM 5:6 Hintera eqetanaw danda7onna xillo asa bolla pirdideta iya wodhideta.
JAM 5:7 Ta ishato, Goday yaana gakanaw gencite. Goshshanchoy torche iraynne sila iray yaana gakanaw gencidi al7o kathaa naagidi waati gathi ekiyako qopite.
JAM 5:8 He goshshanchuwada hinteka gencite. Godaa yuussay matatida gisho ufaysan naagite.
JAM 5:9 Ta ishato, Xoossay hinte bolla pirdonna mela issoy issuwa bolla zuuzumofite. Pirdeysi pengen eqis.
JAM 5:10 Ta ishato, waayan gencida, Godaa sunthan odida nabeta leemiso oothidi ekite.
JAM 5:11 Danda7an gencidaysata nuuni anjetidaysata goos. Iyyobi waanidi gencidaako hinte si7ideta. Goday wursethan iya waati maaddidaako be7ideta. I maarotinne qadhey kumida Godaa gidiya gisho hessa oothis.
JAM 5:12 Shin ubbaafe sinthe, ta ishato, saluwan gidin woyko sa7an gidin woyko hara aybinka caaqofite. Xoossaa pirdan hinte gelonnaada hinte oday ee gidiko, “Ee” giite; akay gidiko, “Akay” giite.
JAM 5:13 Hinte giddon meto ekiya oonika de7iko Xoossaa woosso. Ufaytiya oonika de7iko galatan yexo.
JAM 5:14 Hintefe hargetiya oonika de7iko woosa keetha cimata xeego. Enti Godaa sunthan shamaho zayte tiyidi iyaw Xoossaa woosso.
JAM 5:15 Ammanon woossida woosay harganchuwa pathana. Goday iya, hargiyafe denthana; I nagara oothidaba gidikoka Goday iya maarana.
JAM 5:16 Hessa gisho, hinte paxana mela hinte nagara issoy issuwas paaxitenne issoy issuwas woossite. Xillo asa woosay wolqaama ooso oothees.
JAM 5:17 Eeliyaasi nu mela ase. Iri sa7an bukonna mela minthidi Xoossaa woossin heedzu laythinne usupun ageena sa7an iri bukibeenna.
JAM 5:18 Zaaridi I Xoossaa woossin salope iri bukis; sa7ika kathi dolisees.
JAM 5:19 Ta ishato, hintefe oonika tuma ogiyape buutiko, haray iya tumaako zaariko,
JAM 5:20 nagaranchuwa iya bala ogiyape zaariya oonika, iya shempuwa hayqope ashsheysanne iya daro nagaraas maarota immeysa ero.
1PE 1:1 Taani, Yesuus Kiristoosa hawaarey Phexroosi; Phanxoosan, Galatiyan, Qaphadooqan, Iiseninne Bitaanen betanchoda laaletidi de7iya Xoossay doorida, asaas ha dabdaabiya xaafas.
1PE 1:2 Yesuus Kiristoosas hinte kiitetana melanne iya suuthan geeyana mela, Xoossaa Aaway ba kase eran dooridaysatasinne Geeshsha Ayyaanan geeyida, hintew aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay gido.
1PE 1:3 Yesuus Kiristoosa hayqope denthidi ba gita maarotethan nam7antho yeletethaanne dhayonna ufaysaa immida nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa Aaway, Xoossay galatetto.
1PE 1:4 Qassi Xoossay hintew dhayonna, iitonnanne buuqonna laata salon giigisis.
1PE 1:5 He laatay wode wursethan qoncanaw de7iya atotethas Xoossaa wolqan ammanon hintew naagetidi de7ees.
1PE 1:6 Ha77i guutha wodes hinte dumma dumma paacen un7etikoka hessan ufaytite.
1PE 1:7 He paacey hintena gakiday, taman yeggin dhayiya worqafe hinte ammanoy aadhonne tuma gideysa bessanaasa. He paacetida ammanuwan Yesuus Kiristoosi qonciya wode galataa, bonchonne saba hinte ekana.
1PE 1:8 Hinte Yesuusa be7ibeeketa, shin iya siiqeta. Hinte ha77i iya be7iboonaba gidikoka, iya ammaneta. Qassi odan qoncisanaw danda7etonna ufaysaninne bonchon kumideta.
1PE 1:9 Hinte ammanon naagiya hinte shempuwa atotetha ekana.
1PE 1:10 Aadho keehatetha baggara hintew giigida ha atotethaaba nabeti eranaw gita koshshaninne naagon koydosona.
1PE 1:11 Entan de7iya Kiristoosa Ayyaanay iya waayabanne hessafe guye, yaana bonchuwaba kasetidi markatishe, awude woyko waanidi hananeeko akeekan pilgidosona.
1PE 1:12 Nabeti odida tinbitey bantaw gidonashin, hintew gideysa Xoossay hintew qoncisis. Ha77i asay hintew odida Wongela salope kiitetida Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqan hintew odidosona. Kiitanchotika hessa be7anaw amotidosona.
1PE 1:13 Hessa gisho, oosos hintena giigisite; hintena haarite. Yesuus Kiristoosi qonciya wode hinte ekana aadho keehatetha ufaysan naagite.
1PE 1:14 Xoossaa naytada iyaw kiitetite; hinte kase eronna oothida iita amuwa kaallopite.
1PE 1:15 Shin hintena xeegida Xoossay geeshshi gididaysada hinteka hinte duussa ubban geeshshi gidite.
1PE 1:16 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Taani geeshshi gidida gisho hinteka geeshshi gidite” geetetidi xaafetis.
1PE 1:17 Asa som7o be7onna iya oosuwada pirdiya Xoossaa, “Nu Aawaw” gidi xeegiyaba gidiko, ha sa7aa imathatetha duussaa yashshan de7ite.
1PE 1:18 Hinte, hinte aawatape laattida pathonna de7uwape wozetidaysi, dhayiya biran woyko worqan gidonnaysa ereeta.
1PE 1:19 Borey woyko borsoy bayna dorsa suuthada al7o gidida Kiristoosa suuthan wozetideta.
1PE 1:20 Xoossay alamey medhetanaape kase Kiristoosa dooris, shin ha wursetha wodiyan Kiristoosi hinte gisho qoncis.
1PE 1:21 Hinte ammanoynne hinte ufaysay Xoossan gidana mela iya hayqope denthidi, bonchida Kiristoosa baggara Xoossan ammaneta.
1PE 1:22 Hinte tumatethaas kiitetidi hintenatethaa geeshshideta. Hinte issoy issuwa wozanape siiqeta, shin ha77ika tuma wozanape minthidi siiqite.
1PE 1:23 Hinte nam7antho yeletiday dhayiya zerethafe gidonashin, merinaw de7iya Xoossaa qaalan dhayonna kochaafe yeletideta.
1PE 1:24 Xoossaa qaalay, “Asi ubbay maata mela; iya boncho ubbay ciishsha mela. Maatay melees, ciishshayka qoletees.
1PE 1:25 Shin Godaa qaalay merinaw de7ees” yaagees. Hintew odetida Wongela qaalay haysa.
1PE 2:1 Hiza, iitatethi ubbaa, cimo ubbaa, cubbotethi qanaatenne zigirsi ubbaa hintefe diggite.
1PE 2:2 Goday keeha gideysa hinte eridi meezetidaysada ha77i yeletida guutha naytada hinte atotethan diccishe baanaw Xoossaa geeshsha qaala maatha ubba wode amotite.
1PE 2:4 Asan boretidi Xoossan dooretida al7o gidida de7o shuchaa, Godaa Yesuusako shiiqite.
1PE 2:5 Hinte Ayyaana keethi keexetiya de7o shuchata. Hinte Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara Xoossaa ufaysiya ayyaana yarsho yarshiya geeshsha kahineta.
1PE 2:6 Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Heko, taani Xiyoone kataman godaa xaphuwa minthiya, dooretida, al7o shuchaa wothas; iyan ammaniya oonika yeellatenna” yaagees.
1PE 2:7 Ha shuchay hintew ammaneysatas al7o, shin ammanonaysatas, “Gimbeysati kadhidi ixida shuchay godaa xaphuwa minthiya, ubbaafe aadhiya shuchu gidis.”
1PE 2:8 Qassika, “Ha shuchay ase dhubiya shuchinne ase kundisiya zaalla” yaagees. Enti hessas qaadetida gisho Xoossaa qaala kiitetonna ixidi dhubetidosona.
1PE 2:9 Shin Xoossay dhumape malaalsiya ba poo7uwako hintena xeegiday, hinte iya lo77otetha haratas odanaw dooretida koche, kawo kahine, geeshsha derenne Xoossaa dumma dere.
1PE 2:10 Hinte kase Xoossaa dere gideketa, shin ha77i hinte iya dere. Hinte kase maarotethi demmibeketa, shin ha77i maarotethi demmideta.
1PE 2:11 Ta ishato, hinte ha sa7an imathenne bete asi gididaysada hinte shempuwa oliya asho amope haakana mela taani hintena woossayis.
1PE 2:12 Ammanonna asay hintena iita oothiya asada zigirya wode Xoossay nuna be7anaw yaa gallas, enti hinte lo77o oosuwa be7idi Xoossaa galatana mela hintew lo77o de7oy de7o.
1PE 2:13 Godaa gisho gidi maatara de7iya asatas haaretite; ubbaafe bolla gidiya gisho kawuwasika haaretite.
1PE 2:14 Enti iita ootheyisata seeranawunne lo77o ootheyisata sabbanaw kawuwape kiitetida gisho deriya ayseysatas haaretite.
1PE 2:15 Hinte, hinte lo77o oosuwan eronna eeya asaa doona oythanaysi Xoossaa shene.
1PE 2:16 Xoossaa aylle gididi la77atethan de7itepe attishin, hinte la77atetha iita oosos kama oothopite.
1PE 2:17 Asa ubbaa bonchite; ammaniya asaa siiqite; Xoossaa yayyite; kawo bonchite.
1PE 2:18 Aylleto lo77o godatasinne keeha godata xalaalas gidonashin, iitataska bonchon haaretite.
1PE 2:19 Asi Xoossaa gisho gidi bessonna waaye waayetiko Xoossay iya anjana.
1PE 2:20 Shin hinte nagara oothin hintena dechiya wode hinte danda7iko hintew ay galati de7ii? Shin lo77oba oothidi waaye danda7iko Xoossay hintena hessas anjana.
1PE 2:21 Xoossay hintena xeegiday hessa gishosa; Kiristoosi hintew waayetis; hinte iya kaallana mela, hintew leemiso gidis.
1PE 2:22 I nagara oothibeenna; iya doonan wordoy bentibeenna.
1PE 2:23 Enti iya cayiya wode, zaaridi cayibeenna. Shin waaye ekishe xillo pirdiya Xoossaas ba pirda aggaagisipe attishin, mandibeenna.
1PE 2:24 Nuuni nagaras hayqidi xillotethas daana mela Kiristoosi ba ashuwan nu nagaraa masqaliya bolla tookis; hinte iya madunthan paxideta.
1PE 2:25 Kase hinte oge balidi dhayida dorsata mela, shin ha77i hinte shempuwa heemmeysakonne naageysako simmideta.
