1PE 3:1 Hessadaka, macheto, hinte azinatape Xoossaa qaalas kiitetonaysati de7ikoka aykoka odetonashin, hinte yashshatethaanne hinte geeshsha de7uwa be7idi ammanana mela entaw haaretite.
1PE 3:3 Hinte, hinte huuphe pixoninne worqa alleeqon woyko lo77o ma7on hinte bolla asatethaa loyson gidopo.
1PE 3:4 Shin hinte wozanaa giddon de7iya yegelsatethay Xoossaa sinthan hintew daro al7o gididi dhayonna, ashkenne wopu gida ayyaana gido.
1PE 3:5 Xoossay immana gidaysa ammanida geeshsha maccasati beni wode banta azinatas haaretidi, bantana hessada daro loythidosona.
1PE 3:6 Hessada Saara Abrahaame, “Ta godaw” yaagada xeegashe, iyaw kiitetasu; hinteka aykoka yayyonna lo77oba oothiko I nayta.
1PE 3:7 Azinatoo, hinte macheti hintefe daaburancho medheta gideysa eridi, entana bonchite; hinte woosa dhubonna mela Xoossay immida de7uwa enti hintera issife laattiya gisho enta bonchite.
1PE 3:8 Wursethan, ubbay issi qofan de7ite. Issoy issuwas qadhetishe, ishada siiqetite; qassi issoy issuwas keehatanne ashketa gidite.
1PE 3:9 Iita gisho iita woyko cashsha gisho cayidi zaaropite; hessa aggidi, Xoossay hintew anjuwa immanaw hintena xeegida gisho anjite.
1PE 3:10 Ayis giiko, Geeshsha Maxaafay, “De7o doseynne lo77o wode be7anaw koyey oona gidikoka ba inxarsan iitabaanne wordo odeteysa aggo.
1PE 3:11 Iitabaa ootheysa aggidi lo77oba ootho; sarotethaaka keehi koyonne kaallo.
1PE 3:12 Godaa ayfey xillotako xeellees; qassi I ubba wode enta woosa hayzees. Shin Goday iitabaa ootheyisata ba hanqo som7uwan xeellees” yaagees.
1PE 3:13 Hinte lo77oba oothanaw amotiko hintena qohanay oonee?
1PE 3:14 Hari attoshin, xillotetha gisho hinte waayetiko anjetidaysata. Asas yayyofitenne hirgofite.
1PE 3:15 Kiristoosa hinte wozanan bonchitenne godayite. Xoossay hintew immida ufaysas gaaso oychiya oodeska zaaro immanaw ubba wode giigidi uttite, shin hessa ashketethaninne yashshan oothite.
1PE 3:16 Qassi Kiristoosan hinte de7iya lo77o de7uwa iitabaa oothidabaada, hintena cayiya asay zigiryaban yeellatana mela hinte kahay geeshshi gido.
1PE 3:17 Xoossay gidaba gidiko iitabaa oothida gisho waaye ekeysafe lo77oba oothida gisho waaye ekeysi lo77o.
1PE 3:18 Kiristoosi nuna Xoossaako shiishanaw baw xillo gididi de7ishe, nagaranchota gisho issi toho nagara ubbaas hayqis; I ba asatethan hayqis, shin ayyaanan paxis.
1PE 3:19 Qassi he ayyaanan I bidi qashon de7iya shempotas qaala odis.
1PE 3:20 Nohey markabiya keexiya wode he shempoti Xoossaas kiitetonna ixidosona, shin Xoossay entana danda7i gam7is. Hospun asa xalaali markabiyan gelidi, dhayo haathaafe attidosona.
1PE 3:21 He dhayo haathay ha77i hintena ashshiya xinqate leemiso gidis. Ha xinqatey bolla qita meecco gidonashin, lo77o kaha Xoossaafe ekanaw iya woossiya oge gididi, Kiristoosa denduwa baggara hintena ashshees.
1PE 3:22 I salo bidi Xoossaa ushachan uttidi, kiitanchota, maata aawatanne wolqaamata haarees.
1PE 4:1 Hessa gisho, Kiristoosi ba ashuwan nuus waayetida gisho hinteka he qofan hintena dancisidi minnidi eqite. Kiristoosa gisho gidi ba ashuwan waaye ekida uray nagara oothike gidi qanxida asi.
1PE 4:2 He uray ba attida laythan Xoossaa shene oothanaw koyeesipe attishin, iita asho amon deenna.
1PE 4:3 Kase hinte ammanonna asay de7idaysada de7ideta. Hinte iita amon, laymatethan, mathon, tunatethi denthethiya yethan, pokiya eeqa goyinnon kase de7ida duussay gidana.
1PE 4:4 Ammanonna asaara hinte shori bayna oosuwa oothonna gisho malaaletidi hintena cayoosona.
1PE 4:5 Shin enti paxata bollanne hayqida asaa bolla pirdanaw de7iya Xoossaas zaaro immana.
1PE 4:6 Hayqida asaas Wongelay sabbaketiday haysa gishosa. Enti asatho banta ashuwan pirdetana qassi banta ayyaanan Xoossaatho de7on daana.
1PE 4:7 Hiza, ubbabaas wursethay matatis. Hessa gisho, woossanaw danda7etana mela wopu gida wozani de7o; maarara de7ite.
1PE 4:8 Siiqoy daro nagara kammiya gisho, ubbaafe aathidi issoy issuwara wozanape siiqetite.
1PE 4:9 Zuuzumonna issoy issuwa imathatethan mokite.
1PE 4:10 Hinte Xoossaafe dumma dumma aadho keehatetha imota ekidaysada hinte issoy issoy he imuwa bessiyada oykidi issoy issuwa haggaazite.
1PE 4:11 Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara ubbaban Xoossay galatetana mela oonika odiyaba gidiko Xoossaafe qaala ekidaada odo. Qassi oonika maaddiyaba gidiko Xoossay iyaw immiya wolqaada maaddo. Bonchoynne wolqi merinaape merina gakanaw iyaw gido. Amin7i.
1PE 4:12 Ta ishato, hinte tamada xuuggiya waaye paaciya giddora aadhiya wode oorathabay hanidaada malaaletofite.
1PE 4:13 Shin iya bonchoy qonciya wode hinte ufaysay gita gidana mela Kiristoosa waayiya hinte ekeysan ufaytite.
1PE 4:14 Kiristoosa sunthaa gisho asi hintena cayiya wode, Xoossaa boncho Ayyaanay hinte bolla shempiya gisho hinte anjetidaysata.
1PE 4:15 Hintefe waaye ekiya oonika shempo wodhidaada woyko kaysotidaada woyko iita oothidaada woyko gelsonnaban gelidaada hanidi waayetofo.
1PE 4:16 Gidoshin, kiristaane gidiya gisho waayetiko Kiristoosa sunthaa gisho Xoossaa galatope attishin, yeellatopo.
1PE 4:17 Pirdi Xoossaa asaa bolla doomiya wodey gakis. Hiza, he pirday koyro nu bolla doomiyaba gidiko, Xoossaa Wongelas Kiitetonna asaa wursethay ay gidanee?
1PE 4:18 Xilloy un7an attiyaba gidiko, makallanchoynne nagaranchoy yaatin waananee?
1PE 4:19 Hessa gisho, Xoossa sheneda waaye ekeysati banta shempuwa bantana medhida, ammanthiya Xoossas hadara immishe lo77oba ootho.
1PE 5:1 Hiza, woosa keethaa cimatara cima gididaysi, Kiristoosa waayiya markateysinne qoncanaw de7iya bonchuwa shaaketanaw de7iya taani, hinte giddon de7iya cimata zorayis.
1PE 5:2 Hinte aawatethafe garsan de7iya Xoossaa wudiya heemmite. Xoossay koyeysada dosanaape attishin, un7etidi heemmofite. Qassi miishe koshshan gidonashin, haggaazanaw de7iya lo77o qofan heemmite.
1PE 5:3 Hinte aawatethafe garsan de7iya wudiyas leemiso giditepe attishin, godatopite.
1PE 5:4 Heemmeyisata halaqay qonciya wode qolettonna boncho kallacha hinte ekana.
1PE 5:5 Hessadaka, yalagato, cimatas haaretite. Hinte issoy issuwas ashke gidite. Geeshsha Maxaafan, “Xoossay otoranchota ixees, shin ashketas aadho keehatetha immees” yaagees.
1PE 5:6 Xoossay ba wode hintena bonchana mela wolqaama Xoossaa kushiyape garsan hintena kawushite.
1PE 5:7 I hintew qopiya gisho hintena hirgisiya ubbaa iya bolla yeggite.
1PE 5:8 Hinte morkey Xalahey, mittiyaba koyidi, gaammoda gudishe hinte matara yuuyiya gisho hintena haaritenne barkite.
1PE 5:9 Alamen de7iya hinte ishati hessada waaye ekeysa eridi, ammanon minnidi, Xalahiyara eqetite.
1PE 5:10 Ba merinaa bonchuwas Kiristoos Yesuusa baggara hintena xeegida aadho keehatetha ubbaa Xoossay, guutha wodes hinte waayetidaape guye, I ba huuphen hintena shiishana, katisana, minthidi essana, xaalisana.
1PE 5:11 Merinaape merinaa gakanaw Xoossay kawoto. Amin7i.
1PE 5:12 Ammanetida ishaa gada ta ekiya Sillaase baggara ha dabdaabiya hintew qanthan xaafas. Ta hessa hintew xaafiday, hintena zoranawunne Xoossaa aadho keehatethay tuma gideysa markatanaasa. He aadho keehatethan minnidi eqite.
1PE 5:13 Hintera issife dooretida Babiloonen de7iya woosa keetha asaynne ta na7aa Marqoosi hintena, “Saro saro” yaagees.
1PE 5:14 Siiqo yeeretetha yeeretishe, issoy issuwa sarothite. Kiristoosan de7iya hinte ubbaas saroy gido. Amin7i.
2PE 1:1 Yesuus Kiristoosa hawaareynne iya aylley, taani, Simooni Phexroosi, nu Xoossaanne nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristoosa xillotethaa baggara nuysa mela al7o ammano ekidaysatas ha dabdaabiya xaafas.
2PE 1:2 Xoossaanne nu Godaa Yesuusa eron aadho keehatethaynne saroy hintew kumo.
2PE 1:3 Ba bonchoninne lo77otethan nuna xeegida iya eron de7osinne Xoossaa daanidi daanaw koshshiyaba ubbaa Xoossay ba wolqan nuus immis.
2PE 1:4 Hinte iita amo gaason medhetiya ha alamiyan de7iya dhayope kessi ekanaadanne Xoossaa xoossatethan shaaketanaada, ha imotata baggara daro al7onne gita ufaysaa nuus immis.
2PE 1:5 Hessa gisho, minnidi, hinte ammanuwa bolla lo77otethi, lo77otetha bolla eratethi,
2PE 1:6 eratetha bolla bana haaro, bana haaro bolla genca, genca bolla Xoossaa daano,
2PE 1:7 Xoossaa daano bolla ishatetha keehatethi, ishatetha keehatetha bolla siiqo gujite.
2PE 1:8 Haysati hintew daridi de7iyaba gidiko, Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa eron maaddiya asinne ayfera de7iya asi oothana.
2PE 1:9 Shin hessati bayna oonika matan de7iyaba xalaala be7iya qooqe. I ba kase nagaraape geeyidaysa dogis.
2PE 1:10 Hessa gisho, ta ishato, hinte xeessanne hinte dooruwa minthanaw kaseysafe aathidi minnite. Hinte hessata oothiyaba gidiko, dhubeteketa.
2PE 1:11 Hessan nu Godaanne nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristoosa merinaa kawotethaa geliya kumetha maatay hintew imetana.
2PE 1:12 Hessa gisho, hinte haysata eriyabaanne he oykida tuman minnidi de7iyaba gidikoka, taani haysata ubba wode hintena hassayiso aggike.
2PE 1:13 Taani shempora de7ida wode ubban hintena hassayisanaysi koshshiyaba gada qopayis.
2PE 1:14 Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosi taw qoncisadaysada taani ha hayqiya asatethaa gam7onna qaara yeggada baanaysa erayis.
2PE 1:15 Taani hintefe shaaketikoka hinte haysata ubba wode akeekana mela taw danda7etiyaba ubbaa oothana.
2PE 1:16 Nuuni Godaa Kiristoosa wolqaanne iya yuussaba hintew odey, iya gita bonchuwa be7idipe attishin, medhi kessida hayse gidenna.
2PE 1:17 Daro wolqaama bonchuwafe, “Taani ufaytiya, ta dosiya na7ay haysa” giya qaalay yida wode, Xoossaa Aawape bonchonne galata ekis.
2PE 1:18 Nuuni geeshsha zumaa bolla iyara de7iya wode he qaalay salope yishin si7ida.
2PE 1:19 Nuus hessafe aadhiya ammanetida tinbite qaali de7ees. Sa7i wontana gakanawunne bakali hinte wozanan dolana gakanaw, dhuman poo7iya poo7o asi naageysada, hinte he qaala naagiko lo77o ootheeta.
2PE 1:20 Ubbaafe kasetidi haysa erite. Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetida tinbite qaala oonika ba dosidaada birshanaw danda7enna.
2PE 1:21 Tinbite ubbaa, Xoossay kiitida asati Geeshsha Ayyaanay kaalethin, odidosonape attishin, asa shenen odibookona.
2PE 2:1 Shin wordo nabeti kase asaa giddon de7eysa mela ha77ika wordo astamaareti hinte giddon dendana. Enti bantana wozida, Godaa kaddidi, dhaysiya wordo timirtiya ehana. Hessan enti banta bolla ellesidi dhayo ehoosona.
2PE 2:2 Daro asay yeellayiya enta iita ogiya kaallana; enta gaason tuma ogey cayetana.
2PE 2:3 Wordo astamaareti miishe yaaridi bantaw medhi kessida haysen hintena bonqana. Benipe doomidi enta pirday giigidi uttis; enta dhayoyka entana naagidi uttis.
2PE 2:4 Nagara oothida kiitanchotas Xoossay qadhetonna, pirda gallas gakanaw gaanname dhuma ollan enta qachi yeggis.
2PE 2:5 Hessadaka, Xoossay xillotethabaa odiya Nohenne hara laapun asata ashshidi, Xoossaa goyinnona asay de7iya beni alamiya qadhetonna dhayo haathan dhaysis.
2PE 2:6 Geellatas leemiso gidana mela Xoossay Soodomenne Gamoora katamata bido oothidi xuuggidi dhaysis.
2PE 2:7 Higges kiitetonna laymatiya asata giddon waayetishe de7ida xillo Looxe Xoossay ashshis.
2PE 2:8 He xillo addey enta giddon de7ishe, enti oothiya iita oosuwa gallas gallas be7ida wodenne si7ida wode iya lo77o wozanay un7etees.
2PE 2:9 Hessa gidiko, Goday, bana goyinniya asata paacepe waati ashshaneko, qassi nagaranchota pirda gallasaas gakanaw waatidi seerishe naagisaneeko erees.
2PE 2:10 Ubbaafe aathidi tuna amon asho qofa kaalleysatanne maata aawata kadheyisata, pirda gallas gakanaw Goday naagisis. He asati ganje minonne otorancho gidiya gisho, salo medhetethata cayishe yayyokonna.
2PE 2:11 Shin kiitanchoti wordo astamaaretape wolqaninne minotethan daro aadhosonashin Godaa sinthan salo medhetethata cayokona.
2PE 2:12 Shin he asati banta eronnaban gelidi cayoosona. Enti oyketanawunne hayqanaw yeletida, wozani bayna do7a mela hanoosona; entika wora do7ada coo dhayana.
2PE 2:13 Enti gathida metuwada zaari metootana. Seeta gallas yexishe gupeysa ufaysiyabaa gidi qopoosona. Enti kawushatanne tunata gidi de7ishe hintera shaaketiya siiqo imatuwan ufaytoosona.
2PE 2:14 Laymatiya maccasi xeellidi aggonna ayfey entaw de7ees; qassi nagara ootheysa aggokona. Ammanon minniboonna asaa cimmoosona. Entaw ubba wode amotiya wozani de7ees; enti baadetidaysata.
2PE 2:15 Enti suure oge aggidi, makalla miishe siiqidi balida, Bi7oora na7aa Balaama ogiya kaallidosona.
2PE 2:16 I ba nagara gaason hanqetis; dooni bayna harey asada haasayidi nabiya gooshshatethaa teqis.
2PE 2:17 He asati melida pultota melanne carkoy tookidi efiya shaara mela; enta naagey sakana dhumaa.
2PE 2:18 Enti hadanne otoro oda odetishe balan de7iya asaa giddofe kessi ekidi buroo minniboonna asata laymatetha asho amon cimmidi balethoosona.
2PE 2:19 Enti bantaw dhayo aylletethan de7ishe haratako, “Hinte aylletethafe keyana” yaagosona. Ayis giiko, asi ba xoonetidaba ubbaas aylle.
2PE 2:20 Enti ashshiya nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa eridi ha alamiya tunatethaafe kessi ekidaape guye, zaari qaxetidi xoonetiko kase de7iya de7uwape guyeysi entaw iita gidana.
2PE 2:21 Enti xillotetha ogiya eri simmidi aggeysafe koyrottidi geeshsha kiitta eronnaako entaw lo77oshin.
2PE 2:22 “Kani ba cooshshaako guye simmees” qassi, “Meecetida gudunthoy guye simmidi urqan gondoretees” giya leemisoy tuma gideysi enta bolla oothees.
2PE 3:1 Ta siiqo ishato, haysi ta hintew xaafida dabdaabey nam7antho. Taani ha nam7u dabdaabetaka hintew xaafiday, hinte suure qofaa qopanaada hintena denthethanaasa.
2PE 3:2 Qassi geeshsha nabeti beni odida qaalanne nuna ashshiya Goday, hawaareta baggara kiitida kiitta hinte hassayana mela koyayis.
2PE 3:3 Ubbaafe kasetidi, wode wursethan banta amuwa kaallidi ase toocheysati, toochishe yaanaysa erite.
2PE 3:4 Enti, “Ta yaana gidaysi awun de7ii? Nu aawati hayqidosona, shin ubbabay sa7i medhetoosape doomidi de7eysada de7ees” yaagosona.
2PE 3:5 Daro wodepe kase saloy Xoossaa qaalan medhetidaysa; qassi sa7i haathafenne haathan medhetidaysa erishe kaddoosona.
2PE 3:6 He wode de7iya sa7ay haathan mitetidi dhayis.
2PE 3:7 Shin ha77i de7iya saloynne sa7i, geellati pirdetiya gallasaynne dhayiya gallasay gakanaw he qaalan tamas naagetidi de7oosona.
2PE 3:8 Shin ta siiqo ishato, ha issiba dogopite. Godaa matan issi gallasi mukulu laytha mela gideysanne mukulu laythi issi gallasa mela gideysa dogopite.
2PE 3:9 Issoti issoti gam7is gidi qopeysada, Goday ba ufaysa qaala gisho gam7enna. Shin oonika dhayonna mela koyidi, ubbay banta nagaraape simmana mela hinte gisho gidi gencees.
2PE 3:10 Shin Godaa gallasay kaysoda yaana. He gallasan saloti wolqaama guunthan dhayana; salo medhetethati taman xuugetana; sa7inne iya bolla de7iya ubbay dhayana.
2PE 3:11 Hiza, ubbabay hessada hanida dhayiyaba gidiko hinte ay mela asi gidanaw bessii? Hinte geeshshinne Xoossaa daaniya de7o daanaw bessees.
2PE 3:12 Hinte sinthara yaa Xoossaa gallasaa naagishe hintew danda7etiyaba ubbaa oothidi he gallasaa eesoyite. He gallas salotinne iyan de7iyabay taman xuugetana; wolqaama suulan til7ana.
2PE 3:13 Shin nuuni xillotethi haariya ooratha salonne ooratha sa7a Xoossaa ufaysa qaalada naagoos.
2PE 3:14 Hessa gisho, ta siiqo ishato, nu he gallasaa naagiya gisho pokoynne borey baynayisata gididi, Godaara saron daanaw minnite.
2PE 3:15 Asi ubbay attana mela koyidi Goday danda7eysa dogopite. Qassi nu siiqo ishay, Phawuloosi, Xoossay iyaw immida cincatethan hessada hintew xaafis.
2PE 3:16 I ba dabdaabeta ubban hessataba xaafis. Iya dabdaabeta giddon akeekanaw waaysiya qofati de7oosona. Tamaariboonnanne minniboonna asati hara Xoossaa qaala mirqeysada ha kiitataka dhayanaw machidi mirqoosona.
2PE 3:17 Hessa gisho, ta siiqo ishato, hinte hessa eriya gisho makallata balan cimetidi, dhayonna melanne minnidi de7iya bessaafe kundonna mela naagetite.
2PE 3:18 Shin hinte nuna ashshiya nu Godaa, Yesuus Kiristoosa aadho keehatethaaninne eratethan diccite. Iyaw ha77ika merinawuka bonchoy gido. Amin7i.
1JO 1:1 Nuuni koyrope doomidi de7iya, nu haythan si7ida, nu xeellida, ayfen be7ida, nu kushen bochida de7o qaalaba hintew xaafoos.
1JO 1:2 He de7oy qoncin, nuuni iya be7idi, iyabaa markatoos. Aawa matan de7iya nuus qoncida, merinaa de7uwabaa hintew awaajos.
1JO 1:3 Nuura hintew issifetethi daana mela nuuni be7idaysanne si7idaysa hintew odoos. Hintew nuura issifetethi de7iya gisho, Aawaranne iya Na7aa Yesuus Kiristoosara issifetethi de7ees.
1JO 1:4 Nu ufaysay polo gidana mela hessa hintew xaafoos.
1JO 1:5 Nuuni de7o gidida iyape si7idi, hintew odiya kiitay haysa: “Xoossay poo7o; iyan dhumi baawa” yaageysa.
1JO 1:6 Nuus iyara issifetethi de7ees yaagishe dhuman de7iko, nu odaaninne nu oosuwan wordotoos.
1JO 1:7 Shin poo7on I de7eysada, nuka poo7on de7iko, nuus woli giddon issifetethi de7ees. Iya Na7aa, Yesuusa suuthay nagara ubbaafe nuna geeshshees.
1JO 1:8 Nuuni, nunan nagari baawa giiko nu nuna cimmoos; nunan tumi baawa.
1JO 1:9 Shin Xoossaas nu nagara paaxiko, I nu nagara atto gaanawunne nu qoho ooso ubbaafe nuna geeshshanaw, ammanetidaysanne tumaa.
1JO 1:10 Nuuni nagara oothibooko giiko Xoossaa wordancho kessoos; iya qaalayka nunan deenna.
1JO 2:1 Ta nayto, nagara hinte oothonna mela taani haysa hintew xaafayis. Shin oonika nagara oothiko Aawa matan nuus gaannatiya Xilloy, Yesuus Kiristoosi, de7ees.
1JO 2:2 Nu nagaray Kiristoosa baggara atto geetetees. I nu nagaraa xalaalas gidonashin, asa ubbaa nagaraas yashetis.
1JO 2:3 Nuuni Xoossaa kiitaa naagiko, sidhey baynashin, tuma nu iya eroos.
1JO 2:4 Oonika, “Taani iya erayis” yaagishe, iya kiitaa naagonna ixiko he uray wordancho; tumatethi iyan baawa.
1JO 2:5 Shin iya qaalas nu kiitetiyaba gidiko he uray Xoossaa siiqiya siiqoy polo gidees. Nuuni Xoossan de7eysas hessi baw tuma marka.
1JO 2:6 Taani, “Xoossan de7ayis” giya oonika Kiristoosi de7idaysada daanaw bessees.
1JO 2:7 Ta siiqo ishato, taani hintew koyrope de7iya gal7a kiitaa xaafaysipe attishin, ooratha kiita xaafike. Ika hinte si7ida he gal7a kiitaa.
1JO 2:8 Gidikoka, Kiristoosaninne hintenan tuma gididi de7iya, ooratha kiitaa xaafayis. Dhumay kichin, ha77i tuma poo7oy poo7ees.
1JO 2:9 “Poo7on de7ayis” gishe ba ishaa ixiya oonika, ha77ika dhuman de7ees.
1JO 2:10 Ba ishaa dosiya oonika poo7on de7ees. He uran hara asi dhubiyabay baawa.
1JO 2:11 Shin ba ishaa ixiya oonika dhuman de7ees; dhuman hemetees. Dhumay iya ayfiya qooqisida gisho aw biyako erenna.
1JO 2:12 Ta nayto, Kiristoosa sunthaa baggara hinte nagaray atto geetetida gisho taani hintew xaafayis.
1JO 2:13 Aawato, koyrope de7iya, iya hinte erida gisho hintew xaafayis. Yalagato, Xalahiya hinte xoonida gisho hintew xaafayis.
1JO 2:14 Guutha nayto, Xoossaa hinte erida gisho hintew xaafayis. Aawato, koyrope de7iya iya hinte erida gisho hintew xaafayis. Yalagato, hinte mino gidiya gisho, Xoossaa qaalay hintenan de7iya gishonne Xalahiya hinte xoonida gisho hintew xaafayis.
1JO 2:15 Alame woyko alamen de7iyaba dosopite. Alamiya dosiya oonika Xoossaa dosenna.
1JO 2:16 Alamen de7iya ubbabay, asho amotethi, ayfen be7idi amotiyabaynne miishen ceeqetethi alamebape attishin, Xoossafe gidenna.
1JO 2:17 Alameynne alamen asi amotiya ubbay aadhana, shin Xoossaa sheniya poliya oonika merinaw daana.
1JO 2:18 Ta nayto, wodiya wursethay matatis. Kiristoosa morkey sinthafe yaanaysa hinte si7idaysada hari attoshin, ha77ika iya morketi daroti dendidosona. Hessa gisho, wodiya wursethay matatidaysa nuuni hessan eroos.
1JO 2:19 He morketi nu bagga gidonna gisho nu giddofe keyidosona. Enti nu bagga gidiyako nu giddon de7ana, shin entafe oonika nu bagga gidonnaysi eretana mela nu giddofe keyidosona.
1JO 2:20 Shin Kiristoosi hinte bolla Geeshsha Ayyaana gussis; qassi hinte ubbay tumaa ereeta.
1JO 2:21 Tumaa hinte eriya gishonne tuman ayba wordoy baynaysa hinte eriya gisho, taani hintew xaafaysipe attishin, tumaa hinte eronna gisho gidenna.
1JO 2:22 Yesuusi, Xoossay dooridaysa gidenna gidi kaddiya asape hari wordanchoy oonee? Hessa mela asi Kiristoosa morke. I na7aa kaddiko Aawaka kaddees.
1JO 2:23 Na7aa kaddiya oodeska Aaway baawa; qassi Na7aas markatiya oodeska Aaway de7ees.
1JO 2:24 Hessa gisho, koyro hinte si7ida qaala hinte wozanan minthidi naagite. Koyro si7idaysa hinte naagiko hintew Na7aranne Aawara issifetethi daana.
1JO 2:25 Na7ay nuus merinaa de7uwa immana gidi qaala gelis.
1JO 2:26 Hintena balethiya asaa gisho taani haysa hintew xaafas.
1JO 2:27 Shin Kiristoosi hinte bolla ba Geeshsha Ayyaana gussis. Geeshsha Ayyaanay hintenan de7iya gisho oonika hintena tamaarso koshshenna. Iya Geeshsha Ayyaanay hintena tumaa tamaarsesipe attishin, wordo gidenna. Geeshsha Ayyaanay hintena tamaarsidaysada Kiristoosan de7ite.
1JO 2:28 Hiza, ta nayto, I qonciya wode nuuni yashshi baynanne iya yuussaa gallas iya sinthan nu yeellan qosetonna mela iyan de7ite.
1JO 2:29 Kiristoosi xillo gideysa hinte eriko xillo oothiya ubbay Xoossaa na7a gideysa erite.
1JO 3:1 Nuuni Xoossaa nayta geetetidi xeegetana mela Xoossay nuna ay mela dosidaako be7ite. Nuuni tumaka Xoossaa nayta. Ha alamey Xoossaa eronna gisho nunaka erenna.
1JO 3:2 Ta siiqo ishato, ha77i nuuni Xoossaa nayta; nuuni ay hananeeko buroo eretibeenna. Shin Kiristoosi qonciya wode nuuni iya daananaysa eroos. I tuma de7eysa nuuni be7ana.
1JO 3:3 Kiristoosa be7ana gidi ufaysan naagiya oonika, Kiristoosi geeshshi gididaysada bana geeshshees.
1JO 3:4 Nagari higge mentho gidiya gisho nagara oothiya ubbay Xoossaa higge menthees.
1JO 3:5 Kiristoosi asaa nagara dhaysanaw qoncidaysa hinte ereeta; iyan nagari baawa.
1JO 3:6 Kiristoosan de7iya oonika nagaran deenna. Qassi nagaran de7iya oonika iya be7ibeenna woyko eribeenna.
1JO 3:7 Ta nayto, hintena oonika balethofo. Kiristoosi xillo gididaysada xillo oothiya oonika xillo.
1JO 3:8 Xalahey koyrope nagara oothida gisho nagara ubba wode oothiya oonika Xalahe dabbo. Hessa gisho, Xoossaa Na7ay Xalahe ooso dhaysanaw qoncis.
1JO 3:9 Xoossaa na7a gidiya oonika Xoossaa Ayyaanay iyan de7iya gisho, I ubba wode nagaran deenna. Xoossay iya Aawa gidiya gisho nagaran deenna.
1JO 3:10 Xoossaa nayta giddoninne Xalahe nayta giddon de7iya dummatethay hessan eretees; xillo oothonna asi woyko ba ishaa dosonna asi Xoossaa Na7a gidenna.
1JO 3:11 Koyrope hinte si7ida kiitay, “Issoy issuwa dosanaw bessees” giya kiitaa.
1JO 3:12 Nuuni Qaayela mela gidanaw bessenna. Qaayela Xalahe dabbo gididi ba ishaa wodhis. I ba ishaa ayis wodhidee? Iya oosoy iita gidida gishonne iya ishaa oosoy lo77o gidida gisho wodhis.
1JO 3:13 Ta ishato, ha alamiya asay hintena ixiko malaaletofite.
1JO 3:14 Nuuni nu ishata siiqiya gisho, hayqope de7o pinnidaysa eroos. Ba ishaa dosonna oonika hayqo kuyan de7ees.
1JO 3:15 Ba ishaa ixiya oonika shempo wodhees. Qassi shempo wodhiya oodeska merinaa de7oy baynaysa hinte ereeta.
1JO 3:16 Kiristoosi ba shempuwa nu gisho aathidi immidaysan siiqoy aybeko nuuni erida. Nuka nu ishata gisho nu shempuwa aathidi immanaw bessees.
1JO 3:17 Shin dure gidida oonika metootanchuwa be7ishe, iyaw qadhetonna ixiko ba wozanan Xoossaa siiqoy de7ees gaanaw waanidi danda7ii?
1JO 3:18 Ta nayto, nuuni oosoninne tumatethan nu siiquwa qoncisanaw besseesipe attishin, coo oda xalaalan woyko doona xalaalan siiqetanaw bessenna.
1JO 3:19 Nuuni issoy issuwa siiqiko, nu tumaa bagga gideysa eroos; hessas Xoossaa sinthan yeellatoko.
1JO 3:20 Nu wozanay nu bolla pirdiyaba gidiko, Xoossay nu wozanaape gita gideysa eroos; I ubbaba erees.
1JO 3:21 Ta siiqo ishato, nu wozanay nu bolla pirdonnaba gidiko nuuni Xoossaa sinthan yayyoko.
1JO 3:22 Nuuni iya kiitaa naagiya gishonne iya ufaysiyabaa oothiya gisho woossiyaba ubbaa iyape ekoos.
1JO 3:23 Kiristoosi nuna kiittidaysada Xoossaa Na7aa Yesuus Kiristoosa sunthan ammananadanne issoy issuwa siiqanaada Xoossay nuna kiittis.
1JO 3:24 Xoossaa kiitaa naagiya oonika Xoossan de7ees; Xoossayka iyan de7ees. Xoossay nuus immida Geeshsha Ayyaana baggara I nunan de7eysa eroos.
1JO 4:1 Ta siiqo ishato, ayyaanata ubbaa ammanopite, shin enti Xoossafe yidaako paacidi be7ite. Ayis giiko, daro wordo nabeti alamen dendidosona.
1JO 4:2 Xoossaa Ayyaana gideysa hinte haysan erana; “Yesuus Kiristoosi ase gididi yidaysa markatayis” giya ayyaana ubbay Xoossafe yees.
1JO 4:3 Kiristoosi ase gididi yidaysa ammanayis goonna ayyaana ubbay Xoossaafe gidenna. Hessi Kiristoosa ixiya ayyaana. Hinte he ayyaanay yaanaysa kase si7ideta; I hari attoshin ha77ika alamen de7ees.
1JO 4:4 Ta nayto, hinte Xoossasa. Hinte giddon de7iya Geeshsha Ayyaanay alamen de7iya ayyaanape daro wolqaama gidiya gisho wordancho nabeta hinte xoonideta.
1JO 4:5 Enti ha alamiya ase gidiya gisho, ha alamiyaba odoosona; ha alamiya asay enta odaa si7oosona.
1JO 4:6 Nuuni Xoossaafe yeletida; Xoossaa eriya oonika nuna si7ees. Xoossaa eronna oonika nuna si7enna. Nuuni tuma ayyaananne wordo ayyaana hessan shaakos.
1JO 4:7 Ta siiqo ishato, siiqoy Xoossafe yaa gisho, ane issoy issuwara siiqetoos. Siiqiya oonika Xoossaa na7a; I Xoossaa erees.
1JO 4:8 Xoossay siiqo gidiya gisho siiqonna oonika Xoossaa erenna.
1JO 4:9 Nuuni Kiristoosa baggara de7uwa demmana mela Xoossay ba issi Na7aa ha alamiya kiittis. Xoossay nuna ba siiquwa hessan bessis.
1JO 4:10 Tuma siiqo guussay haysa: nuuni Xoossaa siiqida gisho gidonashin, Xoossay nuna siiqida gishonne nu nagaraape nuna maaranaw ba Na7aa kiitida gishosa.
1JO 4:11 Ta siiqo ishato, Xoossay nuna haysada siiqiko, nuka issoy issuwa siiqanaw bessees.
1JO 4:12 Xoossaa be7iday oonika baawa. Nuuni issoy issuwa siiqiko Xoossay nunan de7ees; iya siiqoyka nunan polo gidees.
1JO 4:13 Xoossay ba Geeshsha Ayyaana nuus immida gisho, nuuni Xoossan de7eysanne ika nunan de7eysa eroos.
1JO 4:14 Aaway ba Na7aa, ha alamiya ashsheysa gidana mela kiittidaysa nuuni be7idi markatoos.
1JO 4:15 Yesuusi Xoossaa Na7aa gideysa markatiya oodenka Xoossay de7ees; ika Xoossan de7ees.
1JO 4:16 Xoossay nuna siiqeysa nuuni eroosinne ammanoos. Xoossay siiqo. Siiqon de7iya oonika Xoossan de7ees; Xoossayka iyan de7ees.
1JO 4:17 Nu de7oy ha alamiyan Kiristoosi de7idaysa mela gidiya gisho, pirda gallas yayyonna iya sinthe shiiqanaw iya siiqoy nunan polo gidees.
1JO 4:18 Siiqon yashshi baawa, tuma siiqoy yashshi kessi holees. Yashshinne pirdi issife biya gisho, yayiya uraa siiqoy polo gidenna.
1JO 4:19 Xoossay koyro nuna siiqida gisho nu siiqoos.
1JO 4:20 Oonika, “Xoossaa siiqayis” gishe ba ishaa ixiko, I wordancho. Ayis giiko, be7iya ba ishaa siiqonna oonika be7iboona Xoossaa siiqanaw waanidi danda7ii?
1JO 4:21 Kiristoosi nuus immida kiitay haysa; “Xoossaa siiqiya oonika ba ishaa siiqanaw bessees” yaageysa.
1JO 5:1 Yesuusa, I Kiristoosa yaagidi, ammaniya oonika Xoossaa na7a. Aawa siiqiya oonika iya Na7aaka siiqees.
1JO 5:2 Nuuni Xoossaa siiqiya gishonne iya kiitaa naagiya gisho Xoossaa nayta siiqeysa eroos.
1JO 5:3 Nuuni Xoossaa siiqiko, iya kiitata naagoos. Iya kiitati deexo gidokona.
1JO 5:4 Ayis giiko, Xoossaa na7a gidiya oonika ha alamiya xoonanaw danda7ees. Nuuni ha alamiya xoonanay nu ammanuwana.
1JO 5:5 Alamiya xoonanaw danda7ey oonee? Yesuusi Xoossaa Na7aa gideysa ammaniya asa xalaali xoonana.
1JO 5:6 Yesuus Kiristoosi haatha xinqatiyaranne ba hayquwan gusida suuthara yis. I, haatharanne suuthara yisipe attishin, haatha xalaalara yibeenna. Geeshsha Ayyaanay tuma gidiya gisho, hessi tuma gideysa markatees.
1JO 5:7 Heedzu markati de7oosona.
1JO 5:8 Hessati, Geeshsha Ayyaana, haathaanne suuthaa. Ha heedzata markatethay issino.
1JO 5:9 Nu asay markateysa ammanoos. Shin Xoossaa markatethay asaysafe daro aadhees. Xoossay ba Na7aas markatida markatethay haysa.
1JO 5:10 Xoossaa Na7aa ammaniya uraa wozanan ha markatethay de7ees. Xoossaa ammanonna oonika Xoossay ba Na7aas markatida markatethaa ammanibona gisho, Xoossaa wordancho oothees.
1JO 5:11 Hiza, markatethay haysa; Xoossay nuus merinaa de7o immis; he de7oyka iya Na7an de7ees yaageysa.
1JO 5:12 Xoossaa Na7ay de7iya oodeska de7oy de7ees. Xoossaa Na7ay bayna oodeska de7oy baawa.
1JO 5:13 Xoossaa Na7an ammaniya hintew merinaa de7oy de7eysa hinte erana mela haysa hintew xaafas.
1JO 5:14 Xoossaa sheniyada aybibaaka iya woossiko, I si7eysa nuuni eriya gisho iyan ammanetoos.
1JO 5:15 Nuuni woossiya ubbaa I si7eysa eriko, nuuni woossiyaba I immanaysa eroos.
1JO 5:16 Oonika ba ishay hayqo bessonna nagara oothishin be7iko, Xoossaa iyaw woossanaw bessees. Hayqo bessonna nagara oothidaysatas Xoossay de7o immana. Hayqo bessiya nagari de7ees. Taani hintena hessas Xoossaa woossite giike.
1JO 5:17 Iita ooso ubbay nagara, shin hayqo bessonna nagari de7ees.
1JO 5:18 Xoossaa Na7ay iya naagiya gisho, Xoossaa na7a gidida oonika nagaran ubba wode de7onnaysa nuuni eroos. Xalahey iya qohanaw danda7enna.
1JO 5:19 Nuuni Xoossasa gideysanne ha kumetha alamey Xalahen haareteysa eroos.
1JO 5:20 Nuuni tuma Xoossaa eranaada Xoossaa Na7ay yidaysanne nuus akeeka immidaysa eroos. Nuuni iya na7a, Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara tuma Xoossan de7oos. Yesuusi tuma Xoossaanne merinaa de7uwa.
1JO 5:21 Ta nayto, eeqatape hinte haakite.
2JO 1:1 Ta cimay dooretida godatesinne I naytas kiitida kiita. Ta xalaala gidonashin, tumaa eriya ubbay hintena dosoosona.
2JO 1:2 Ha tumay nunan de7iya gishonne merinaw nuura daana gisho taani hintena tuma dosayis.
2JO 1:3 Xoossaa nu Aawanne iya Na7aa Yesuus Kiristoosa aadho keehatethay, maarotethaynne sarotethay tumanine siiqon issife nuura gido.
2JO 1:4 Aaway nuna kiittidaysada, ne naytape baggati, tumaas kiiteteysa be7ada taani daro ufaytas.
2JO 1:5 Godate, ha77ika nuuni ubbay issoy issuwa siiqana mela taani nena woossayis. Ha kiitay koyrope nuura de7iya kiitaape attishin, taani new ooratha kiita xaafike.
2JO 1:6 Tuma siiqoy nuuni Xoossaa kiitaa naagidi daanaysa. Qassi koyrope hinte si7idaysada iya kiitay, hinte ubbay siiqon daana melasa.
2JO 1:7 Yesuus Kiristoosi ase gididi yidaysa ammanonna, daro balethiya asati, alamen dendidosona. Hessa mela asi oonika baletheysanne Kiristoosa morke.
2JO 1:8 Hinte oothida kumetha woytuwa ekanaw minnite. Hinte oothidaysi dhayonna mela naagetite.
2JO 1:9 Kiristoosa timirtiyan doonnaysasinne iyape haakiya uraas Xoossay baawa. Kiristoosa timirtiyan de7iya uraas Aawaynne Na7ay de7oosona.
2JO 1:10 Oonika hinteko yishe ha timirtiya ehonna ixiko, hinte soo gelsofite; saroka goopite.
2JO 1:11 Iya saro giya oonika iya iita oosuwan iyara shaaketees.
2JO 1:12 Taani hintew xaafanaw koyida darobay de7ees, shin worqateninne qalamen xaafanaw koyke. Nu ufaysay poletana mela hintera som7on gahetada odetanaw hinteko baana gada qopayis.
2JO 1:13 Xoossay doorida ne miche nayti nena saro yaagosona.
3JO 1:1 Taani cimay, tumaa dosiya Gaayoosas kiitida kiita.
3JO 1:2 Ta siiquwaw, neeni ne shempuwan lo77o de7eysa ta ereysada new payyatethi daana melanne ne oothiyabay suurana mela new Xoossaa woossayis.
3JO 1:3 Guutha ammaniya asati yidi, ubba wode neeni tuman de7eysanne ne tumatethaba markatida wode taani daro ufaytas.
3JO 1:4 Ta nayti tumatethan de7eysa si7eysafe aadhidi, tana ufaysiyabay baawa.
3JO 1:5 Ta siiquwaw, enti new imathe gidikoka, neeni ammaniya asatas ammanthiya ooso oothaasa.
3JO 1:6 Enti ne siiquwaba woosa keethan markatoosona. Ha77ika enti biya ogiyan Xoossay doseysada oothada enta maaddiko lo77o oothaasa.
3JO 1:7 Enti Kiristoosa sunthaa gisho keyishe, ammanonna asatape aykoka ekibookona.
3JO 1:8 Nuuni tuma oosuwa entara issife oothanaw haysa mela asata maaddanaw bessees.
3JO 1:9 Taani woosa keethatas dabdaabe xaafas, shin enta halaqaa gidanaw koyiya Diyotrafisi nuuni geysa ekenna.
3JO 1:10 Hessa gisho, taani yaa biya wode I nu bolla odetiya iita odanne I oothida oosuwa odana. I hessi guuxis gidi, nu ishati yaa wode mokenna. Hari attoshin, enta mokanaw koyeysataka diggidi woosa keethafe kessees.
3JO 1:11 Ta siiquwaw, lo77oba daanape attishin, iitabaa daanopa. Lo77oba oothiya oonika Xoossaa asi, shin iitabaa oothiya oonika Xoossaa be7ibeenna.
3JO 1:12 Dimexroosi lo77o asi gideysa asa ubbay markatees. Tumay ba huuphen iyabaa markatees; nuka iyabaa markatoos; nu markatethay tuma gideysa hinte ereeta.
3JO 1:13 Taani new xaafanaw koyida darobay de7ees, shin qalameninne worqaten xaafanaw koyke.
3JO 1:14 Shin taani matara neera gahetanaw qopayis; he wode nuuni odetana.
3JO 1:15 Saroy new gido. Ne dabboti nena saro yaagosona. Nu dabbota ubbaa enta sunthaa sunthaa xeegada tana “Saro gis” yaaga.
JUD 1:1 Taani Yihudi, Yesuus Kiristoosa aylley, Yayqooba ishay, Xoossay xeegidaysatas, Xoossa Aaway doseysatasinne Yesuus Kiristoosan naagetidaysatas ha dabdaabiya xaafayis.
JUD 1:2 Maarotethi, sarotethinne siiqoy hintew kumo.
JUD 1:3 Ta siiqo ishato, nuuni issife shaaketiya atotethaaba hintew xaafanaw taani daro amottas. Shin ammaniya asaas issitohonne wursethi gakanaw imetida ammanuwas oletana mela hintena zorashe xaafanaysi taw koshshiyaba gidis.
JUD 1:4 Enta pirday benipe xaafetidi uttida, issi issi asati oonika eronna hinte giddo gelidosona. Enti Xoossaa eronnayisata, nu Xoossaa aadho keehatetha laymatanaw go7etiya oge oothidi ekoosona. Ba xalaala kawo gidida, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa kaddoosona.
JUD 1:5 Shin hinte ha ubbaa eriyaba gidikoka, Goday Isra7eele asaa Gibxe biittafe waati kessidaako, qassi guyepe ammanonayisata dhaysidaysa ta hintena akeekisanaw koyayis.
JUD 1:6 Banta de7iyasuwa aggidi, bantaw imetida maata naagiboonna kiitanchota, gita pirda gallasay gakanaw Xoossay enta dhumape garsan merinaa santhalaatan qachi wothis.
JUD 1:7 Hessada, Soodomenne Gamoora asaynne enta matan de7iya katamatan de7iya asay laymatidosona; laymatethara gahetiya tunatethi oothidosona. Enti merinaa taman pirdetanaysatas leemiso gididosona.
JUD 1:8 Hessadaka, ha amuhanchoti banta asatethaa tunisoosona; maata aawata kadhoosona; salo medhetethata cayoosona.
JUD 1:9 Shin kiitanchota halaqay Mika7eeli Muse ahaas Xalahera palamida wode, “Goday nena seero” yaagisipe attishin, iya bolla cashsha qaala odidi mootanaw koybeenna.
JUD 1:10 Shin ha asati bantaw eronnabaa ubbaa cayoosona; qassi enti wozani bayna meheda medhon eriya eray, I entana dhaysana.
JUD 1:11 Entana ayye! Enti Qaayela ogiyan bidosona. Miishe koyidi Balaama balan kundidosona. Qore geetetiya addey Xoossaa bolla dendidaysada enti Xoossaa bolla dendidi dhayidosona.
JUD 1:12 Ha asati, hinte siiqo gibira miya bessan hintera uttiya wode yeelli bayna kawushata. Enti bantana xalaala heemmeyisata. Enti carkoy efiya iri bayna shaara mela. Qassi ayfe woden ayfe ayfonna, xaphora shodetidi, nam7u toho melida mitha mela.
JUD 1:13 Enti hanqetida abba zuliya mela banta pokuwa goponteyisata. Enti merinaw sakana dhumay naagiya toylatiya xoolintota.
JUD 1:14 Addaamepe doomidi, laapuntha yeleta gidida Heenokey, ha asataba tinbite odishe, “Heko, Goday, ba daro mukulu geeshshatara yaana.
JUD 1:15 Asa ubbaa pirdana; geellata ubbaa enti oothida iita ooso ubbaa gishonne makallatethan enti Xoossaa bolla odetida iita odaa ubbaa gisho pirdana” yaagis.
JUD 1:16 He asati ubba wode zuuzumeysatanne oda koyeyisata. Qassi banta iita amuwa kaalloosona; bantanan ceeqosonanne bantana go77iyabaa demmanaw harata sabboosona.
JUD 1:17 Shin ta ishato, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa hawaareti kase hintew odida qaala akeekite.
JUD 1:18 Enti, “Wursetha wodiyan, banta amuwa kaallidi toocheysati yaana” yaagidosona.
JUD 1:19 He asati asaa giddon shaahetethi medheyisata, banta asho amuwas haareteysatanne Geeshsha Ayyaanay baynayisata.
JUD 1:20 Shin ta ishato, geeshshi gidida hinte ammanuwan hintena dichanaw minnite; qassi Geeshsha Ayyaana wolqan woossite.
JUD 1:21 Hintena merinaa de7uwako gathiya nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa maarotethaa naagishe hintena Xoossaa siiquwan naagite.
JUD 1:22 Sidhey de7iya asaas qadhetite.
JUD 1:23 Issi issi asata tamape kessi ekite. Qassi iita amon tunida enta ma7uwa ixishe haratas yashshan qadhetite.
JUD 1:24 Hinte kundonna mela naaganaw borey baynaysatanne gita ufaysan kumidaysata oothidi ba bonchuwa sinthan hintena shiishanaw danda7iya,
JUD 1:25 nuna ashshiya issi Xoossaas, nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristoosa baggara bonchoy, gitatethi, wolqinne maati, kaseka, ha77ika, merinawuka iyaw gido. Amin7i.
REV 1:1 Eeson hananaw de7iyaba ba aylleta bessaana mela Xoossay iyaw immida Yesuus Kiristoosa qoncethay haysa. Yesuusi ba kiitanchuwa kiittidi, ba aylliya Yohaanisas qoncisis.
REV 1:2 Yohaanisi Xoossaa kiitaa, Yesuus Kiristoosi oothidabaanne odidaba ubbaa markatis.
REV 1:3 Ha ubbay hananaw wodey matida gisho, ha tinbite qaala nabbabiya oonika anjetidaysa; qassi ha qaala si7eysatinne xaafetida kiitaa naagiya ubbay anjetidaysata.
REV 1:4 Ha dabdaabey, Yohaanisape, Iise biittan de7iya laapun woosa keethatas xaafetis. Kaseka, ha77ika de7iya, sinthafeka yaanaw de7iya Xoossaafe, qassi iya araata sinthan de7iya laapun ayyaanatape, hessadaka, hayqope dendon koyro gididaysafe, sa7aa kawota haariya ammanetiya marka gidida Yesuus Kiristoosape, aadho keehatethaynne sarotethay hintew gido. Yesuusi nuna siiqees, qassi ba suuthan nagara aylletethaafe nuna la77a kessis.
REV 1:6 Nuuni Xoossaa iya Aawas oothana mela nuna kawotethaa kahine oothis. Iyaw merinaape merinaa gakanaw bonchoynne wolqay gido. Amin7i.
REV 1:7 Heko, Yesuusi shaarara yees. Asa ubbay hari attoshin, iya caddida asayka iya be7ana. Sa7an de7iya asa ubbay iya gisho yeekana. Hessi tuma hanana! Amin7i.
REV 1:8 “Kaseka, ha77ika de7eysi, sinthafeka yaana Goday, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossay, Alfanne Omegi tana” yaagees Godaa Xoossay.
REV 1:9 Taani, Yohaanisi, hinte ishay, hintera issife Yesuusan waayiya, iya kawotethaanne iya danda7aa be7as. Taani Xoossaa qaala gishonne Yesuusaba markatida gisho, yuushoy abban teqetida biittan, Paximon de7ayis.
REV 1:10 Godaa gallasan ta Geeshsha Ayyaanan haaretada de7ayis; taape guyera moyze puno mela gita girsi si7as.
REV 1:11 He girsay tana, “Ne be7eysa maxaafan xaafada, Iisen de7iya laapun woosa keethatas, Efesoona, Samirneesa, Phargamoona, Tiyatiroona, Sardeesa, Filadelfiyanne Loodoqe yedda” yaagis.
REV 1:12 Taani taw odiya girsaa be7anaw guye simmada xompe wothiya laapun worqa kocata be7as.
REV 1:13 He kocata giddon asa na7a daaneysa be7as. I adussa afila ba tohuwa gathi ma7is, worqa dancon ba tiraa dancis.
REV 1:14 Iya huupheynne iya binaanay bootha dorsa ikise mela woyko shacha mela boothi; iya ayfey tama laco daanees.
REV 1:15 Iya tohoy taman seeridi zo77ida naase birata daanees; iya girsayka gita shaafa kooshincha mela.
REV 1:16 I ba ushacha kushen laapun xoolintota oykis. Iya doonape nam7u baggara qaratida mashshay keyees. Iya som7oy seeta gallasa awa ayfe daanees.
REV 1:17 Taani iya be7ida wode hayqida asada hanada iya tohuwa matan kundas. I ba ushacha kushiya ta bolla wothidi, “Yayyofa; Koyroynne Wursethay tana.
REV 1:18 Taani de7on de7ayis; taani hayqas, shin Heko meri merinawuka de7on de7ayis. Hayqonne Si7oole qulpey ta kushena.
REV 1:19 Hiza, ha77i haniyabanne sinthafe hananaba ne be7idaba xaafa.
REV 1:20 Neeni ta ushacha kushen be7ida laapun xoolintotanne laapun worqa kocata birshethay haysa: Laapun xoolintoti laapun woosa keethata kiitanchota; laapun worqa kocati laapun woosa keethata.”
REV 2:1 “Efesoona woosa keetha kiitanchuwas haysada yaagada xaafa. Ba ushacha kushen laapun xoolintota oykidaysinne laapun worqa kocata giddora hemeteysi haysada yaagees:
REV 2:2 Taani ne oosuwa, ne daaburanne ne gencaa erayis. Neeni iita asataba gencanaw danda7aboonaysa erayis. Qassi hawaare gidonashin bantana, hawaare geyisata pilga erada enti wordancho gideysa demmidaysa ta erayis.
REV 2:3 Neeni gencadasa; ta sunthaa gisho meto danda7adasa; xoonetabaaka.
REV 2:4 Gidoshin, ha77i ta nena boriyabay de7ees; hessika neeni, ne koyro siiquwa aggadasa.
REV 2:5 Hiza, ne ay mela dhoqa bessaafe kundidaako akeeka! Ne nagaraape simma; neeni kase oothiya oosuwa ootha. Neeni ne nagaraape simmonna ixiko, ne xompe wothiya kocaa iya bessaafe ekana.
REV 2:6 Ha77i ta nena nashshiya issibay de7ees; ta ixiya Niqolaweeta oosuwa neka ixadasa.
REV 2:7 Geeshsha Ayyaanay woosa keethatas giyaba si7anaw haythi de7iya oonika si7o. Xooniya oonika Xoossaa gannatiyan de7iya de7o mithee ayfepe maana mela maata immana.”
REV 2:8 Samirneesa woosa keethaa kiitanchuwas haysada yaagada xaafa. “Koyroynne wursethay, hayqidaysinne hayqope dendidaysi haysada yaagees:
REV 2:9 Taani ne waayanne ne manqotetha erayis; gidoshin neeni dure. Ayhude gidonashin bantana Ayhude geysati cayiya cashshaa ta erayis, shin enti Xalahe maabaran de7oosona.
REV 2:10 Neeni ekanaw de7iya waayiya babofa. Xalahey hintefe issota issota paacanaw qasho keethan yeggana; tammu gallas gakanaw hinte waayetana. Hayqana gakanaw ammanetidaysa gida; ta new de7o kallacha immana.”
REV 2:11 “Geeshsha Ayyaanay woosa keethatas giyaba si7anaw haythi de7iya oonika si7o. Xooniya oonika nam7antho hayquwan qohetenna.”
REV 2:12 “Phargamoona woosa keethaa kiitanchuwas haysada yaagada xaafa. Nam7u baggara qaratida mashshay de7eysi haysada yaagees:
REV 2:13 Taani ne de7iya bessaa erayis; neeni Xalahe araatay de7iya bessan de7aasa; ta sunthaa mintha naagadasa. Hari attoshin, Xalahey de7iya hinte kataman hayqida ta ammanetida markay, Antiphaasi, de7iya wodeka ammanuwa aggabaaka.
REV 2:14 Gidoshin, ta nena boriya guuthabati de7oosona. Hessika Isra7eele asay eeqas yarshetida kathaa midi tunana melanne laymatetha nagara oothana mela Balaaqa tamaarsida Balaama timirtiya ekida issi issi asati neera de7oosona.
REV 2:15 Hessadaka, Niqolaweeta timirtiya tamaariya asati neera de7oosona.
REV 2:16 Hessa gisho, neeni ne nagaraape simma. Hessi hanonna ixiko, ta neeko ellesa yada he asata ta doonape keyiya mashshan olana.”
REV 2:17 Geeshsha Ayyaanay woosa keethatas giyaba si7anaw haythi de7iya oonika si7o. Xooniya oodeska qosetidi de7iya mannafe immana. Qassi ekiya uraape attishin, hara asi eronna ooratha sunthay xaafetida bootha shuchu taani iyaw immana.
REV 2:18 “Tiyatiroona woosa keethaa kiitanchuwas haysada yaagada xaafa. Tama laco daaniya ayfey de7eysi, qassi taman seerida naase birata daaniya tohoy de7eysi, Xoossaa na7ay, haysada yaagees:
REV 2:19 Taani ne oosuwa, ne siiquwa, ne ammanuwa, ne oosuwanne ne gencaa erayis. Neeni koyro ootheysafe ha77i aathada ootheysaka erayis.
REV 2:20 Gidoshin, ta nena boriya issibay de7ees; bana nabe giya maccasiw, Elzabeelo, aykoka gabaaka. He maccasiya eeqas yarshetida kathaa midi tunanaadanne laymatanaada oothada ta aylleta balethasu.
REV 2:21 Iya ba nagaraape simmana mela ta iw wode immas, shin iya simmanaw koyabuku.
REV 2:22 Enti I bala ogiyape simmonna ixiko, ta iyo iita hargen yeggana; iira laymateysatika iita waaye waayetana.
REV 2:23 Taani I nayta wodhana; qassi woosa keetha ubbay ta asa qofanne asa wozana ereysa gideysa erana. Ta issuwas issuwas hinte oosuwada oosuwada immana.”
REV 2:24 Shin Tiyatiroonan de7iya harata, he iita timirtiya ekiboonaysatanne, “Xalahe gita xuura” geetetiya ha timirtiya tamaariboonna hintena hara deexo tooho toossike.
REV 2:25 Gidoshin, ta yaana gakanaw hintew de7iyaba minthi naagite.
REV 2:26 Xooneysasinne wursethi gakanaw taw kiitetiya oodeska kawotethata haarana mela maata immana.
REV 2:27 “I enta birata xam7an haarana; meqa miishedaka mentherethana.” He maatay taani ta aawape ekida maata mela.
REV 2:28 Qassi ta iyaw bakala xoolinto immana.
REV 2:29 Geeshsha Ayyaanay woosa keethatas giyaba si7iya haythi de7iya oonika si7o.
REV 3:1 “Sardeesa woosa keetha kiitanchuwas haysada yaagada xaafa. Laapun Xoossaa ayyaanatanne laapun xoolintota oykidaysi haysada yaagees: Taani ne oosuwa erayis; asi nena paxa de7ees giikoka, ne hayqadasa.
REV 3:2 Barka; attida guuthabanne hayqanaw matidaba mintha. Ne oosoy Xoossaa sinthan polo gidonnaysa demmas.
REV 3:3 Hiza, ne ekidabaanne si7idaba akeeka; naaga; ne nagaraape simma. Neeni barkonna ixiko ta kaysoda yaana; ta ay wode yaaneko ne eraka.
REV 3:4 Shin banta ma7uwa qitayonna guutha asati Sardeesan de7oosona. Entaw bessiyaba gidiya gisho bootha ma7o ma7idi enti taara hemetana.
REV 3:5 Xooniya oonika entaysada bootha ma7o ma7ana. Taani iya sunthaa de7o maxaafape quchike. Taani ta Aawa sinthaninne iya kiitanchota sinthan I tabaa gideysa markatana.
REV 3:6 Geeshsha Ayyaanay woosa keethatas giyaba si7iya haythi de7iya oonika si7o.
REV 3:7 “Filaadelfiya woosa keetha kiitanchuwas haysada yaagada xaafa. Geeshshaynne tumanchoy, Dawita qulpiya ba kushen oykidaysi, haysada yaagees: I gordin oonika dooyanaw danda7enna; qassi I dooyin oonika gordanaw danda7enna.
REV 3:8 Taani ne oosuwa eras; Heko ta ne sinthan oonika gordanaw danda7onna dooya penge wothas. Ne wolqay guutha gidikoka, ta qaala naagadasa; tana kaddabaaka.
REV 3:9 Ayhude gidonashin, bantana Ayhude giya wordotanne Xalahe baggata neeko ehananne ne sinthan gulbatisana. Ta nena doseysa entana erisana.
REV 3:10 Neeni, ‘Genca’ gada ta kiitida kiitaa naagida gisho, kumetha alamiya paacanaw yaa waaye wodiyape taani nena naagana.
REV 3:11 Taani ellesada yaana; oonika ne kallachaa ekonna mela new de7iyaba minthada oyka.
REV 3:12 Xoonidaysa ta xoossa keethan tuussu oothana; I yan merinaw daana. Taani ta Xoossaa sunthaanne ta Xoossaa katamaa sunthaa iya bolla xaafana; iyaka ta Xoossaa matape wodhiya ooratha Yerusalaame. Qassi taani ta ooratha sunthaaka I bolla xaafana.
REV 3:13 Geeshsha Ayyaanay woosa keethatas giyaba si7iya haythi de7iya oonika si7o.
REV 3:14 “Loodoqe woosa keetha kiitanchuwas haysada yaagada xaafa. Amin7i gidida ammanetida tuma markay, Xoossaa medhetetha haareysi haysada yaagees:
REV 3:15 Taani ne oosuwa ubba erayis; neeni irxa woyko misha gidaka; neeni nam7aafe issuwa gidiko lo77o!
REV 3:16 Neeni irxa woyko misha gidonashin, bol7o gidiya gisho ta nena ta doonape cuttana hanayis.
REV 3:17 Hiza, neeni, ‘Taani dure, shallora de7ayis, taw aybibayka pacibeenna’ yaagasa. Shin neeni metootancho, manqo, qooqenne kallotida asi gideysa eraka.
REV 3:18 Hessa gisho, ne duretanaw taman geeyida worqaa, ne yeella kalluwa kammanaw bootha ma7onne loytha xeellanaw danda7isiya ayfe dhale taape shammana mela nena ta zorayis.
REV 3:19 Ta doseysa seeraysinne hanqayis; hiza minna; ne nagaraape simma.
REV 3:20 Heko, ta karen eqada xeegayis. Oonika ta xeessaa si7idi, wulaa dooyiko, iyako gelana; iyara issife kathi maana; ika taara issife maana.
REV 3:21 Ta xoonada ta Aawara iya araatan uttidaysada xooniday taara ta araatan uttana mela maata immana.
REV 3:22 Geeshsha Ayyaanay woosa keethatas giyaba si7iya haythi de7ey oonika si7o” yaagis.
REV 4:1 Hessafe guye, taani salo xeelliya wode dooyetida penge be7as. Qassi ta kase si7ida moyze girsaa melay taako, “Ha keya; haysafe guye, hananaw de7iyaba ta nena bessaana” yaagis.
REV 4:2 He wode ta Ayyaanan haaretada de7ayis. Heko, saluwan araata bolla issoy uttidaysa be7as.
REV 4:3 He uttidaysa malay yasphedenne sardiyoone al7o shucha mela. Iya araata yuushuwan al7o margide shuchi daaniya zuulli de7ees.
REV 4:4 He araata yuushuwan laatamanne oyddu araatati de7oosona; enta bolla bootha ma7o ma7idi, huuphen worqa kallachaa wothida laatamanne oyddu cimati uttidosona.
REV 4:5 Araatape wol7anthi, guunthinne deshoy keyees. Araata sinthan laapun poo7iya xompeti de7oosona; enti laapun Xoossaa ayyaanata.
REV 4:6 Araata sinthan birille daaniya phooliya burcuko abbay de7ees. Sintharanne guyera ayfey de7iya oyddu de7ora de7iya medhetethati araata yuushuwaninne araata giddon de7oosona.
REV 4:7 Koyro medhetetha medhoy gaammo daanees; nam7anthoy boori daanees; heedzanthoy ase daanees; qassi oyddanthoy piradhiya arganthi daanees.
REV 4:8 Oyddu medhetethata ubbaas usupun qefey de7ees; enta asatethaa ubbay ayfen kumis. Enti qammanne gallas qanxonna, “Geeshshaw, geeshshaw, geeshshaw, Godaw, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaw, Kaseka, ha77ika de7eyso, sinthafe yaanayso” yaagosona.
REV 4:9 He medhetethati araatan uttidaysasinne merinaw de7eysas saba, bonchonne galata immida wode,
REV 4:10 laatamanne oyddu cimati araatan uttidaysanne merinaw de7eysa sinthan gufannidi goyinnidosona; banta kallachaa araata sinthan wothidi,
REV 4:11 “Nu Godaw, nu Xoossaw, neeni boncho, sabanne wolqaa ekanaw bessaasa. Neeni ubbaa medhadasa; ubbabay ne sheniyada hanis, medhetis” yaagidosona.
REV 5:1 Hessafe guye, araata bolla uttidaysa ushacha kushen giddoranne karera xaafetida laapun maatamen gordetida xaatha maxaafaa be7as.
REV 5:2 Issi mino kiitanchoy ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Maatamiya billanawunne maxaafaa dooyanaw bessey oonee?” yaagidi awaajishin be7as.
REV 5:3 Shin salon gidin sa7an woyko sa7ape garsan gidin he xaatha maxaafaa billanawunne gidduwa be7anaw danda7ey oonika bentibeenna.
REV 5:4 Xaatha maxaafaa billanawunne iya gidduwa be7anaw bessiya asi dhayida gisho ta daro yeekas.
REV 5:5 Yaatin, cimatape issoy taako, “Yeekofa! Heko, Yihuda koche gidiya gaammoy, Dawita sheeshay, laapun maatameta billanawunne maxaafaa dooyanaw danda7is” yaagis.
REV 5:6 Hessafe guye, shuketida Dorsay araatas, oyddu de7on de7iya medhetethatasinne cimatas giddon, eqidaysa be7as. Iyaw laapun kacetinne laapun ayfeti de7oosona. Hessati sa7a ubbaa kiitetida Xoossaa laapun ayyaanata.
REV 5:7 He Dorsay bidi, araata bolla uttidaysa ushacha kushepe xaatha maxaafaa ekis.
REV 5:8 I he xaatha maxaafaa ekida wode, de7on de7iya oyddu medhetethatinne laatamanne oyddu cimati Dorsa sinthan kundidosona. Enti issoy issoy diithinne geeshshata woosa gidida ixaaney kumida worqa shaate oykidosona.
REV 5:9 Enti, “Xaatha maxaafaa ekanaw, maatameta billanaw new bessees. Ayis giiko, neeni shuketadasa; koche ubbaafe, dumma dumma doonape, yaratapenne kawotethata ubbaafe ne suuthan Xoossaas wozadasa.
REV 5:10 Enti iya Xoossaa Aawas oothana mela entana kahine kawotethi oothadasa. Entika biitta ubbaa haarana” yaagidi ooratha mazmure yexidosona.
REV 5:11 Ta be7iya wode mukulu toho mukulunne tammu mukulu toho tammu mukulu gidiya kiitanchota girsaa si7as. Entika araata, oyddu de7on de7iya medhetethatanne, cimata yuushuwan eqidosona.
REV 5:12 He kiitanchoti dhoqu gida qaalan, “Shuketida Dorsay wolqaa, duretethi, cincatethinne minotethi, boncho, sabanne galataa ekanaw bessees” yaagidosona.
REV 5:13 Hessafe guye, sa7an, salon, sa7ape garsaninne abba giddon de7iya medhetethi ubbay, “Araata bolla uttidaysasinne Dorsaas, galatay, bonchoy, sabinne wolqi, meri merinaw gido” yaagidi yexishin si7as.
REV 5:14 Oyddu de7on de7iya medhetethati, “Amin7i” yaagidosona; qassi cimati gufannidi goyinnidosona.
REV 6:1 Dorsay laapun maatametape issuwa dooyishin be7as. Qassi oyddu de7on de7iya medhetethatape issoy, dada desho daaniya girsan, “Haaya!” yaagishin si7as.
REV 6:2 Heko bootha para be7as. He para toggidaysi donge oykis; iya huuphen kallachi de7ees. Ika xoonishe xoonanaw keyis.
REV 6:3 Qassi dorsay nam7antho maatamiya dooyida wode de7on de7iya nam7antho medhetethay, “Haaya!” yaagishin si7as.
REV 6:4 Qassi hara siha zo7o pari keyis. He para toggidaysas sa7ape saro dhaysana melanne asay woli wursana mela maatinne gita mashshay imetis.
REV 6:5 Dorsay heedzantho maatamiya dooyida wode de7on de7iya heedzantho medhetethay, “Haaya!” yaagishin si7as. Heko kareetha para be7as; ika ba kushen mizaane oykis.
REV 6:6 Oyddu de7on de7iya medhetethata giddofe, “Issi gallasa oosos damooze, bagga kilo giste; qassi issi gallasa oosos damooze, issi kilonne bagga banga gido. Shin zaytiyanne woyniya qohopa” yaagishin si7as.
REV 6:7 Dorsay oyddantho maatamiya dooyida wode oyddantho de7on de7iya medhetethay, “Haaya!” yaagishin si7as.
REV 6:8 Heko wanco para be7as. He para toggidaysa sunthay hayqo; iya geedo Si7ooley kaallees. Entaw alamepe oyddantho kushiya olan, koshan, gadoninne do7an wodhisana mela maati imetis.
REV 6:9 Dorsay ichashantho maatamiya dooyida wode enti Xoossaa qaala odida gishonne banta markatethan ammanetida gisho shuketida asaa shempota yarsho bessaafe garsan be7as.
REV 6:10 Enti banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Ubbaa haariya Godaw, geeshshaw, tumanchuwaw, sa7an de7iya asaa bolla ne pirdanaynne nu suuthaa gisho halo keyanay awudee?” yaagidosona.
REV 6:11 Enta issuwas issuwas bootha ma7oy imetis. Entaysada hanidi hayqanaw bessiya enta laggeta tayboy kumana gakanaw guutha wode shempana mela entaw odetis.
REV 6:12 Dorsay usupuntho maatamiya dooyida wode ta be7as; wolqaama biitta qaaxoy hanis. Awa ayfey kareexidi kayo ma7o mela gidis. Ageenayka zo77idi suuthu daanis.
REV 6:13 Wolqaama carkoy carkidi balase mitha qawu7e ayfiya qoqofeysada saluwa xoolintoti sa7an qoqofetidosona.
REV 6:14 Saloy xaatha maxaafada xaaxetidi aadhis; zumaynne yuushoy abban teqetida biittati banta bessaafe dhaydosona.
REV 6:15 Biitta kawoti, deriya haareysati, olla kaaletheysati, dureti, wolqaamati, aylletinne, womaannoti gongoloninne dere bolla de7iya zaalla hom7on qosetidosona.
REV 6:16 Entika zumakonne zaallako, “Nu bolla wodhite; nuna qosite; araatan uttidaysa ayfiyapenne Dorsa hanquwafe nuna genthite.
REV 6:17 Hiza, gita hanqo gallasay gakis; danda7idi eqanay oonee?” yaagidosona.
REV 7:1 Hessafe guye, oyddu kiitanchoti oyddu sa7aa gaxan eqidaysata be7as. He kiitanchoti sa7a bolla woyko abba bolla woyko ay mitha bolla carkoy oyddu sa7aa gaxape carkonna mela teqidosona.
REV 7:2 Qassi de7o Xoossaa maatamiya oykida hara kiitanchoy doloha baggafe keyeysa be7as. He kiitanchoy ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, sa7aanne abba qohanaw wolqi imetida oyddu kiitanchota,
REV 7:3 xeegidi, “Nuuni Xoossaa aylleta som7on maatamiya wothana gakanaw biitta woyko abba woyko mithaa qohopite” yaagis.
REV 7:4 Yaatin, taani Xoossaa maatamey som7on wosetidaysata payduwa si7as. Isra7eele mayzata ubbaafe 144000 asaas som7on maatame wothis.
REV 7:5 Yihuda kochaafe tammanne nam7u mukulu, Robeela kochaafe tammanne nam7u mukulu, Gaade kochaafe tammanne nam7u mukulu,
REV 7:6 Aseera kochaafe tammanne nam7u mukulu, Niftaaleme kochaafe tammanne nam7u mukulu, Minaase kochaafe tammanne nam7u mukulu,
REV 7:7 Simoona kochaafe tammanne nam7u mukulu; Leewe kochaafe tammanne nam7u mukulu, Yisakoora kochaafe tammanne nam7u mukulu,
REV 7:8 Zabloona kochaafe tammanne nam7u mukulu, Yoosefa kochaafe tammanne nam7u mukulu, Biniyaame kochaafe tammanne nam7u mukulu, asaa som7on maatame wothis.
REV 7:9 Hessafe guye, koche ubbaafe, kawotetha ubbaafe, yara ubbaafenne dumma dumma doonape zawi bayna daro asaa be7as. He asay bootha ma7o ma7idi, zamba haythi banta kushen oykidi, araata sinthaninne Dorsa sinthan eqidosona.
REV 7:10 Enti banta qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Atotethay araatan uttida nu Xoossaafenne Dorsaafe yees” yaagidosona.
REV 7:11 Kiitanchoti ubbay araata, cimatanne oyddu medhetethata yuushuwan eqidosona. Enti araata sinthan gufannidi Xoossaa goyinnidosona.
REV 7:12 “Amin7i! Anjoy, bonchoy, cincatethi, galati, sabi wolqi, minotethi meri merinaw nu Xoossaas gido. Amin7i!” yaagidosona.
REV 7:13 Cimatape issoy taako, “Ha bootha ma7uwa ma7ida asati oonantee? Enti awupe yidona?” yaagidi oychis.
REV 7:14 Taani zaarada, “Godaw, ne eraasa” yaagas. Ika taako, “Haysati daro waaye waaydi aadhidaysata. Enti banta ma7uwa Dorsa suuthan meeccidi geeshshidosona.
REV 7:15 Hessa gisho, enti Xoossaa araata sinthan gididi qammanne gallas iya keethan oothosona; araata bolla uttidaysi entaw kuya gidana.
REV 7:16 Hizape guye, enti koshatokona, saamotokona. Awi woyko mishi enta meenna.
REV 7:17 Araata giddon uttida Dorsay enta heemmana. De7o pulto haathaako enta kaalethana. Xoossay enta ayfepe afutha ubbaa quchana” yaagis.
REV 8:1 Dorsay laapuntha maatamiya dooyida wode bagga saate gideysa mela saloy si77i gis.
REV 8:2 Hessafe guye, taani laapun moyzeti imetida laapun kiitanchota Xoossaa sinthan eqidaysata be7as.
REV 8:3 Ixaane cuyisiya worqa shaate oykida hara kiitanchoy yidi, yarsho bessa matan eqis. I araata sinthan de7iya worqa yarsho bessa bolla geeshshata ubbaa woosaara gujidi yarshana mela iyaw daro ixaaney imetis.
REV 8:4 Ixaaniya cuyay geeshshata woosaara issife kiitanchuwa kushepe pude Xoossaako keyis.
REV 8:5 Hessafe guye, kiitanchoy ixaane cuyisiya shaatiya ekidi, iyan yarsho bessaafe bonqo tama kunthidi sa7a duge holis. Yaatin deshoy, wol7anthi, girsinne biitta qaaxoy hanis.
REV 8:6 Hessafe guye, laapun kiitanchoti banta moyziya punnanaw giigetidosona.
REV 8:7 Koyro kiitanchoy ba moyziya punniya wode shachinne suuthara walaketida tami salope bukis. Sa7aape sikoy xuugetis; mithafe sikoy xuugetis; cil7o maata ubbay xuugetis.
REV 8:8 Nam7antho kiitanchoy ba moyziya punnida wode wolqaama zuma daaniyabay taman eexishe abban yegetis. Yaatin, abbaafe sikoy suuthu gidis.
REV 8:9 Abban de7on de7iya medhetethaafe sikoy hayqis; markabetape sikoy dhayis.
REV 8:10 Heedzantho kiitanchoy ba moyziya punnida wode xompeda eexiya wolqaama xoolintoy shaafape sikuwa bollanne pultota bolla salope wodhis.
REV 8:11 He xoolintuwa sunthay Camo geetetees. Haathaafe sikuwa camisis; haathay cammida gisho, daro asay he haatha uyidi hayqidosona.
REV 8:12 Oyddantho kiitanchoy ba moyziya punnis. Awape, ageenapenne xoolintotape sikuwa dechis; enta poo7uwape sikoy dhumis. Gallasaape sikoy, qammaafeka sikoy dhumis.
REV 8:13 Issi arganthi salo dhoqu gidi, piradhishin be7as. He arganthay ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Attida heedzu kiitanchoti banta moyziya punnanaw de7iya gisho, sa7an de7iya asaa ayye! Ayye! Ayye!” yaagishin si7as.
REV 9:1 Hessafe guye, ichashantho kiitanchoy ba moyziya punnin salope duge sa7a kundida xoolinto be7as. He xoolintuwas wolqaama ollaa qulpey imetis.
REV 9:2 Xoolintoy ollaa dooyida wode dalga coocepe keyiya cuyaa mela cuyay he ollaafe keyis. He ollaafe keyida cuyan awinne saloy dhumidosona.
REV 9:3 He cuyape booley keyidi sa7an wodhis. Sa7an de7iya kornetas de7iya wolqaa mela wolqay booletas imetis.
REV 9:4 Xoossaa maatamey som7on bayna asaa xalaalape attishin, sa7an de7iya maata woyko mithi woyko ay cil7oba gidin qohonna mela booletas odetis.
REV 9:5 Booleti asaa ichashu ageena gakanaw paxa kaa7ana mela maati imetisipe attishin, asaa wodhana mela gidenna. Korney ase dukin zaameysa mela booley dukidi zaamisees.
REV 9:6 He gallasatan asay hayqo koyana, shin demmenna. Enti hayqanaw amottana, shin hayqoy entafe haakana.
REV 9:7 Booley olas giigidi uttida para daanees. Booliya huuphen worqa kallachi de7ees; enta som7oyka asa som7o daanees.
REV 9:8 Iya binaanay maccasa binaana mela adusse. Enta achayka gaammo achi daanees.
REV 9:9 Entaw tira bolla wothiya birata xururey de7ees; enta qefiya girsay oletanaw gaallabiya paranne para gaariya girsaa mela.
REV 9:10 Entaw korne goyna daaniya goyninne dukiya yiishshi de7ees. He goynan ichashu ageena asaa qohana mela maati imetis.
REV 9:11 Entana haariya kawoy de7ees; he kawoy olla kiitanchuwa. Iya sunthay Ibraawetho doonan Abdoona; qassi Girike doonan Apholiyoona geetetees. Iya sunthaa birshethay “Dhayseysa” guussu.
REV 9:12 Koyro ayyey aadhis; Heko, buroo hara nam7u ayyeti eeson hanana.
REV 9:13 Usupuntho kiitanchoy ba moyziya punnis. Xoossaa sinthan eqida, worqa yarsho bessan de7iya oyddu kacetape issi girsi si7as.
REV 9:14 He girsay moyze oykida usupuntho kiitanchuwako, “Efraxiisa geetetiya gita shaafan qashetida oyddu kiitanchota birsha” yaagis.
REV 9:15 Biitta bolla de7iya asaape sikuwa wodhana mela he saatiyas, he gallasaas, he ageenasinne he laythas giigidi uttida oyddu kiitanchoti birshetidosona.
REV 9:16 Ola para toggiya olanchota paydoy daro xeetu miloone gideysa si7as.
REV 9:17 Qassi ta qoncethan paratanne he parata toggida asaa be7as. He asay tiran wothiya birata xururey tama bonqo mela zo7o, yaakinte mela, kareetha kaalose melanne diinne mela ciliilo. Parata huuphey gaammo huuphe mela; enta doonape tami, cuyinne diinney keyis.
REV 9:18 Parata doonape keyida taman, cuyaninne diinniyan he heedzu gadotan sa7an de7iya asaape sikoy hayqis.
REV 9:19 He parata wolqay enta doona giddoninne goynan de7ees. Enta goynayka shoosha huuphe mela; enti iyara asaa qohoosona.
REV 9:20 Ha gadotape attidaysati banta kushe oosuwape simmibokona. Enti tuna ayyaanan worqafe, birape, naase biratapenne shuchafe oosetida eeqas goyinnoosona. Xeellanaw, si7anaw, hemetanaw danda7onna eeqatas goyinneysa aggibokona.
REV 9:21 Asay wodheysa, biteysa, laymateysanne kayseysa aggidi maarota oychibookona.
REV 10:1 Hessafe guye, ta hara wolqaama kiitanchoy salope sa7a wodhishin be7as. I shaara ma7is; iya huuphiya bolla zuulli de7ees. Iya som7oy awa mela; iya tohoy tama tuussa mela.
REV 10:2 He kiitanchoy dooya de7iya issi guutha xaatha maxaafaa ba kushen oykidi, ba ushacha tohuwa abba bolla, ba haddirsa tohuwa biitta bolla essis.
REV 10:3 Gudiya gaammoda ba qaala dhoqu oothidi waassis. I waassida wode laapun dadati banta guuntha sissidosona.
REV 10:4 Laapun dadati odetida wode ta xaafanaw giigetas. Shin salope, “Laapun dadati odidaysa maatamen gordafe attishin, xaafopa” giya girsaa si7as.
REV 10:5 Yaatidi, abba bollanne biitta bolla eqida, ta be7ida kiitanchoy, ba ushacha kushiya salo pude miccis.
REV 10:6 I miccidi saloninne iya giddon de7iya ubbaa, sa7aninne iya giddon de7iya ubbaa, abbanne iya giddon de7iya ubbaa medhida, merinaw de7iya Xoossaa sunthan caaqidi, “Hizape guye, Xoossay gam7enna.
REV 10:7 Shin laapuntha kiitanchoy ba moyziya punniya wode Xoossay ba aylle gidida nabeta baggara qoncisida xuura qofay poletana” yaagis.
REV 10:8 Hessafe guye, abba bollanne biitta bolla eqidi, “Iya kushen dooyetidi de7iya xaatha maxaafaa kiitanchuwa kushepe eka” yaagidi nam7antho taw odishin si7as.
REV 10:9 Taani he kiitanchuwako bada, guutha xaatha maxaafaa imma gada oychas. I taako, “Ekada ma; I ne ulon cammana, shin ne doonan eessada mal7ana” yaagis.
REV 10:10 Taani kiitanchuwa kushepe he guutha xaatha maxaafaa ekada mas; ta doonan eessada mal7is, shin ta ulon cammis.
REV 10:11 Hessafe guye, taako, “Neeni yara ubbaas, dere ubbaas, dumma dumma doonan odeteysatasinne kawotas tinbite zaara odanaw bessees” yaagis.
REV 11:1 Hessafe guye, taw wadha xam7a immidi, “Bada xoossa keethaanne yarsho bessa wadha; yan goyinniya asataka payda.
REV 11:2 Shin Xoossa Keetha kare dabaabay Ayhude gidonna asaas imetida gisho wadhonna aggaaga. Ayhude gidonna asay geeshsha katamaa oytamanne nam7u ageena haarana.
REV 11:3 Taani kayo ma7o ma7ida ta nam7u markata kiittana; enti 1,260 gallas tinbite odana” yaagis.
REV 11:4 He nam7u markati alamiya Godaa sinthan eqiya nam7u shamaho mithatanne nam7u xompe wothiya kocata.
REV 11:5 Oonika enta qohanaw koyko enta doonape tami keyidi, enta morketa dhaysees. Enta qohanaw koyiya oonika hessada hayqana.
REV 11:6 Enti tinbite odiya wode iri bukonna mela saluwa gordanaw entaw maati de7ees. Entaw haathe suuthi kessanaw, qassi enti koyida mela biitta dumma dumma gadon dhaysanaw entaw maati de7ees.
REV 11:7 Enti banta markatethaa ongidaape guye, ollaafe keyiya do7ay entana olana. He do7ay enta xoonana; wodhana.
REV 11:8 Enta Goday masqaliya bolla kaqetida gita katamaa ogiya bolla enta ahay yegetana. He katamay leemison Soodome woyko Gibxe geetetidi xeegetees.
REV 11:9 Qassi koche ubbaafe, yara ubbaafe, dumma dumma doonapenne kawotethi ubbaafe yida asay enta aha heedzu gallasinne bagga gakanaw be7ana. Enta ahay moogetonna mela asay diggana.
REV 11:10 Ha nam7u nabeti sa7an de7iya asaa waaysida gisho asay enta hayquwan ufaytana. Banta ufaysaa bessanaw issoy issuwas imota immana.
REV 11:11 Heedzu gallasinne baggafe guye, de7o ayyaanay Xoossaa matape yidi entan gelin, enti dendi eqidosona. Enta be7ida ubbay gita yashshi yayyidosona.
REV 11:12 Hessafe guye, he nam7u nabeti, “Haa pude keyite” giya qaala salope si7idosona. Enta morketi entana be7ishin, enti shaaran gelidi pude salo bidosona.
REV 11:13 He saatiyan biittay wolqaama qaaxo qaaxin, katamaape tammantho kushey dhayis. Qassi biitta qaaxon laapun mukulu asay hayqis. Attida asay daro kokoridi babidi; salo Xoossaas boncho immidosona.
REV 11:14 Nam7antho ayyey aadhis, shin Heko heedzantho ayyey eeson yaana.
REV 11:15 Laapuntha kiitanchoy ba moyziya punnis. Salope, “Sa7aa kawotethay nu Godaasinne Kiristoosas gidis; I merinaape merinaa gakanaw haarana” giya wolqaama qaalay si7etis.
REV 11:16 Yaatin, Xoossaa sinthan, banta araatan uttida laatamanne oyddu cimati gufannidi, Xoossas goyinnidi,
REV 11:17 “Ha77ika kaseka de7eyso, Godaw, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaw, neeni gita wolqaa oykadasa. Neeni haaranaw doomida gisho, nuuni nena galatoos.
REV 11:18 Ayhude gidonna asay hanqetidosona, shin ne hanqoy yis. Hayqidaysata bolla ne pirdiya wodey gakis; neeni ne aylleta, nabetas geeshshatasinne ne sunthaas yayyeysatas, guuthatasinne gitatas, enta oosuwada immiya wodey gakis. Alamiya dhayseysata dhaysiya wodey yis” yaagidosona.
REV 11:19 Salon de7iya Xoossa Keethay dooyetis; iya giddon Xoossaa caaqo Taabotey bentis. Qassi wol7anthi wol7amis, deshoy dechis; daday dhuuqis; biitti qaaxis; shachi bukis.
REV 12:1 Hessafe guye, salon wolqaama malaati bentis. Awa ma7ada, ageena bolla eqada, tammanne nam7u xoolinto kallacha ba huuphen wothida de7iya, issi maccasiya bentasu.
REV 12:2 He maccasiya qanthe; shin iyo iqethi oykin un7etada waassasu.
REV 12:3 Qassi hara malaati salon bentis. Laapun huuphetinne tammu kaceti de7iya gita zo7o dawey bentis. I ba huupheta bolla laapun kallacha wothis.
REV 12:4 He dawey ba goynan xoolintotape sikuwa salope dafidi sa7an yeggis. He dawey na7ay yeleti wodhida mela mittanaw koyidi, yelanaw eqetiya maccase sinthan eqis.
REV 12:5 He maccasiya kawotethaa ubbaa birata xam7an haaranaw de7iya adde na7a yelasu. Na7ay Xoossaakonne iya araatako pude eketis.
REV 12:6 Maccasiya 1,260 gallas gakanaw iyo naagana mela Xoossay iw giigisi wothida bessaa mela biitta baqatasu.
REV 12:7 Salon oli medhetis. Mika7eeli ba kiitanchotara dawiyara oletis; dawey ba kiitanchotara gididi zaari oletis.
REV 12:8 Shin dawey xoonetidi salon entaw de7iya bessi dhayidosona.
REV 12:9 Gita dawey, beni shooshay, sa7an yegetis. Ika Daabuloosa woyko Xalahe geetetiya alamiya baletheysa. I ba kiitanchotara issife duge alamiya yegetis.
REV 12:10 Hessafe guye, salon haysada giya qaala si7as. “Ha77i atotethay, wolqaynne kawotethay, nu Xoossasa; maatay Kiristoosas gidis. Hiza, qammanne gallas Xoossaa sinthan, nu ishata mooteysi salope duge holetis.
REV 12:11 Enti dorsa suuthaaninne banta markatethaa qaalan, iya olidi xoonidosona. Enti banta shempuwas mishetonna bantana hayqos aathidi immidosona.
REV 12:12 Hessa gisho, saloninne iya giddon de7eysato ufaytite. Shin biittanne abba ayye! Hiza, Xalahey baw guutha wodey attidaysa erida gisho, wolqaama hanqon hinteko wodhis” yaagis.
REV 12:13 Qassi dawey bana sa7a yeggidaysa be7ida wode adde na7a yelida maccasiw goodis.
REV 12:14 Maccasiw shooshay qohonna mela heedzu laythinne bagga mashenne uyashe iya naagetiya bessi mela biitta piradhada baana mela nam7u wolqaama argantha qefey iw imetis.
REV 12:15 Yaatidi, maccasiw di7oy di77idi efana mela dawey shaafa haatha mela ba doonape maccase guyera cooyis.
REV 12:16 Shin biittay maccasiw maaddis; biittay ba doona dooyidi dawiya doonape keyida haatha mittis.
REV 12:17 He dawey maccase bolla daro hanqetidi, I kochata, Xoossaa kiitaa naageysatanne Yesuusi qoncisida tumaas ammanetidaysata olanaw bidi.
REV 12:18 Abba gaxan de7iya shafiyan eqis.
REV 13:1 Hessafe guye, issi do7ay abbaafe keyishin be7as. Iyaw tammu kaceynne laapun huuphey de7ees. He tammu kaceta bolla tammu kallachati de7oosona. He huupheta bolla Xoossaa cashsha sunthati xaafetidi uttis.
REV 13:2 Ta be7ida do7ay maahe daanees; iya tohoy babantha toho mela; iya doonayka gaammo doona daanees. Dawey ba wolqaa, ba araatanne ba gita maata he do7aas immis.
REV 13:3 He do7aa huuphiyape issuwa bolla hayqos gathiya madunthi be7as, shin he madunthay paxis. Alamiya asa ubbay malaaletidi he do7aa kaallis.
REV 13:4 Dawey ba maata do7aas immida gisho asa ubbay dawiya goyinnidosona. Qassi asay, “Do7aa meli oonee? Iyara oletanaw danda7ey oonee?” yaagidi do7aas goyinnidosona.
REV 13:5 He do7aas otortana melanne cayana mela dooni imetis; oytamanne nam7u ageena haarana mela maati iyaw imetis.
REV 13:6 He do7ay Xoossaa, iya sunthaa, I de7iya bessaanne salon de7iya ubbaa baadethi oykis.
REV 13:7 He do7ay geeshshatara oletidi, entana xoonana mela wolqi iyaw imetis. Yara ubbaa, dere ubbaa, dumma dumma doona ubbaa bollanne koche ubbaa bolla maati iyaw imetis.
REV 13:8 Alamey medhetoosape doomidi, shuketida Dorsaa de7o maxaafan enta sunthay xaafetonna ha sa7an de7iya asa ubbay he do7aas goyinnana.
REV 13:9 Si7iya haythi de7iya asi si7o.
REV 13:10 Oonika di7etanaw de7ey di7etees. Mashshan hayqanaw de7ey mashshan shuketana. Hessanka geeshshata danda7aynne ammanoy eretana.
REV 13:11 Qassika, hara do7i sa7ape keyishin be7as. Iyaw dorsa kace daaniya nam7u kacey de7ees; iya oday dawe oda mela.
REV 13:12 He do7ay koyro do7aa bessan, iya maatan oothees. Ika hayqos gathiya madunthaafe paxida koyro do7aas; biittan de7iya asa ubbay goyinnana mela oothees.
REV 13:13 He nam7antho do7ay hari attoshin, tama salope asa ubbaa sinthan wodhisana gakanaw gita malaatata oothis.
REV 13:14 Koyro do7aa bessan oothana mela, iyaw imetida malaatatan sa7an de7iya asa ubbaa I balethis. Mashshan madunxidi paxida do7aa bonchoos misile giigisana mela entana kiittis.
REV 13:15 Nam7antho do7ay koyro do7aa misiliyas shempo immidi odetana melanne iyaw goyinnonaysati hayqana mela oothiya maati imetis.
REV 13:16 He nam7antho do7ay gitinne guuthi, manqoynne durey, womaanoynne aylley ba ushacha kushen woyko ba som7on malla wothana mela oothis.
REV 13:17 He do7aa sunthay woyko iya sunthaa payduwa mallay bayna asi oonika bayzanawunne shammanaw danda7enna.
REV 13:18 Cincatethi koshshey hessana. Eratethi de7iya oonika he do7aa payduwa birshethaa ero; he paydoy asa sunthi. He paydoy usupun xeetanne usupun tammanne usupuna.
REV 14:1 Hessafe guye, Dorsay Xiyoone zuma bolla eqidaysa be7as. Iyara iya sunthaynne iya Aawa sunthay enta som7on xaafetida, 144,000 asay de7ees.
REV 14:2 Salope gita haatha guunthunne dada guunthu daaniya wolqaama girsi si7as. Qassi ta si7ida girsay diithi diixishin si7etiya girsaa mela.
REV 14:3 144,000 asay araata sinthan, oyddu de7on de7iya medhetethata sinthaninne cimata sinthan eqidi entafe hara oonika tamaaranaw danda7onna ooratha mazmure yexidosona.
REV 14:4 Haysati maccasara bantana tunisonna naagida geeshshata. Enti dorsay biya bessi ubbaa kaalloosona. Enti Xoossaasinne Dorsaas bayra gididi, shiiqanaw sa7a asaa giddofe wozetidosona.
REV 14:5 Enti wordoynne borey bayna asata.
REV 14:6 Hessafe guye, merinaa Wongela sa7a bolla de7iya kawotethaa ubbaas, koche ubbaas, yara ubbaasinne dumma dumma doona ubbaas markatanaw salora piradhiya hara kiitancho be7as.
REV 14:7 He kiitanchoy ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Xoossay alamiya pirdiya saatey gakida gisho Xoossaas yayyite; iya bonchite. Salo, sa7aa, abbanne pulto haatha medhida Xoossaa goyinnite” yaagis.
REV 14:8 Koyroysa kaallidi hara nam7antho kiitanchoy, “Dere ubbaa tunanne mathoyiya woyne ushshida, gita Babilooney kundasu! Kundasu!” yaagidi waassis.
REV 14:9 Heedzantho kiitanchoy enta kaallidi, ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Do7aanne iya misiliya goyinniya qassi iya malla ba som7on woyko ba kushen wothiya oonika de7iko,
REV 14:10 iya hanqo xuu7an kumida Xoossaa hanqo woyniya uyana. Enti geeshsha kiitanchota sinthaninne Dorsa sinthan eexiya diinne taman waayetana.
REV 14:11 Enta waayiya cuyay meri merinaw cuyishe daana. Do7aanne iya misiliya goyinney qassi he do7aa suntha mallay de7iya oonika qammanne gallas shempoy bayna kaa7etana” yaagis.
REV 14:12 Xoossaa kiitaa naageysatinne Yesuusa ammaneteysati genciya minotethay qonciya wodey hessa.
REV 14:13 Hessafe guye, “Hizape Godan hayqeysati anjetidaysata” giya qaala salope si7as. Ayyaanay, “Ee tuma, enta oosoy enta kaalliya gisho, enti banta daaburaape shempana” yaagees.
REV 14:14 Hessafe guye, bootha shaara bolla uttida Asa Na7a daaneysa be7as. I ba huuphen worqa kallacha wothis; qassi ba kushen baaca oykis.
REV 14:15 Hara kiitanchoy Xoossa keethafe keyidi, shaara bolla uttidaysako ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Kathaa shiisho wodey gakida gisho ne baaca yeddada kathaa caka; sa7an de7iya kathay gakis” yaagis.
REV 14:16 Yaatin shaara bolla uttidaysi ba baaca sa7a yeddidi, sa7an de7iya kathaa cakis.
REV 14:17 Qassika salon de7iya Xoossa keethafe hara kiitanchoy keyis; iyawuka oco baaci de7ees.
REV 14:18 Tama bolla maati de7iya hara kiitanchoy yarsho bessaafe keyis. I ba qaala dhoqu oothidi oco baaca oykida kiitanchuwako, “Woyne ayfey teerida gisho neeni oco baaca yeddada, sa7an de7iya woyniyape qanxa” yaagis.
REV 14:19 He kiitanchoy ba baaca yeddidi, sa7an de7iya woyniyape qanxidi, Xoossaa gita hanquwa gum7iya bessan yeggis.
REV 14:20 Enti Katamaape gaxan de7iya woyne ayfe gum7iya bessan yedhetidosona. Suuthi woyne gum7iya bessaafe keyidi issi mukulunne usupun xeetu kilo mitire mela haakidi, para puulo gakidi, dhoqu gidi eellis.
REV 15:1 Taani salon hara gitanne malaalsiya malaata be7as. Xoossaa wursetha hanquwa qoncisiya laapun boshata oykida laapun kiitanchoti de7oosona.
REV 15:2 Qassi tamara walaketida burcuko abba daaneysa be7as. He abba gaxan do7aa, iya misiliyanne iya sunthaa taybuwa xoonidaysata be7as. Xoossay entaw immida diithaa oykidi eqidosona.
REV 15:3 Enti Xoossaa aylliya Muse mazmuriyanne Dorsa mazmuriya haysada yaagidi yexoosona. “Godaw, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaw, ne oosoy gitanne malaalsiyaba. Dere ubbaa kawaw, ne ogey xillonne tuma.
REV 15:4 Geeshshi ne xalaala gidiya gisho, Godaw, new yayyonnaynne ne sunthaa bonchonay oonee? Ne xillo oosoy asa ubbaas qonce gidiya gisho, kawotethi ubbay ne sinthe yidi goyinnana” yaagidi yexoosona.
REV 15:5 Hessafe guye, salon dooyetidi de7iya Xoossa Keethaa, ika Markatetha Dunkaaniya be7as.
REV 15:6 Laapun boshata oykida laapun kiitanchoti Xoossa keethafe keyidosona. Enti geeshshinne phooliya liino ma7o ma7idosona; banta tiran worqa danco dancidosona.
REV 15:7 Oyddu medhetethatape issoy, merinaw de7iya Xoossaa hanqoy kumida laapun worqa xuu7ata laapun kiitanchotas immis.
REV 15:8 Xoossaa bonchuwafenne iya wolqaafe dendoysan Xoossa Keethay cuyan kumis. Laapun kiitanchoti oykida laapun boshati poletana gakanaw Xoossa Keetha oonika gelanaw danda7ibeenna.
REV 16:1 Hessafe guye, Xoossa keethafe laapun kiitanchotako, “Bidi Xoossaa hanquwa laapun xuu7atape sa7an gussite” yaagidi, odiya wolqaama qaala si7as.
REV 16:2 Koyro kiitanchoy bidi, ba xuu7an de7eysa sa7an gussin, do7aa mallay de7eyisata bollanne iya misiliya goyinnidaysata bolla iitanne zaamiya madunthi keyis.
REV 16:3 Nam7antho kiitanchoy ba xuu7an de7eysa abban gussin, abbay hayqida asa suuthi daanis. Qassi abban de7iya medhetetha ubbay hayqis.
REV 16:4 Heedzantho kiitanchoy ba xuu7an de7eysa shaafataninne pulto haathatan gussin, haathati suuthi gididosona.
REV 16:5 Hessafe guye, haatha bolla maati de7iya kiitanchoy haysada yaagishin si7as. “Ha77ika benika de7iya geeshshaw, haysada ne pirdida gisho neeni xillo.
REV 16:6 Enti geeshshata suuthaanne nabeta suuthaa gussida gisho, enti suuthu uyana mela oothadasa. Enti bantaw bessiyaba ekidosona” yaagis.
REV 16:7 Yarsho bessaafe, “Godaw, Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaw, ne pirday tumanne xillo” giya qaala si7as.
REV 16:8 Oyddantho kiitanchoy ba xuu7an de7eysa awa bolla gussin, away ba seelan asaa xuuggana mela awas wolqi imetis.
REV 16:9 Asay wolqaama seelan xuugetidi, he boshata bolla maati de7iya Xoossaa sunthaa baaddidosona; banta nagaraape simmidi Xoossaa bonchibookona.
REV 16:10 Ichashantho kiitanchoy ba xuu7an de7eysa do7aa araata bolla gussin, he do7aa kawotethay dhumis. Asay un7aa gisho, banta inxarsaa saxoosona.
REV 16:11 Qassi asay un7aa gishonne madunthaa gisho, salo Xoossaa baaddidosona; banta oothida nagaraape simmibokona.
REV 16:12 Usupuntho kiitanchoy ba xuu7an de7eysa gita Efraxiisa shaafan gussin, doloha baggafe yaana kawotas ogey giigana mela haathay melis.
REV 16:13 Hessafe guye, shodhe daaniya heedzu tuna ayyaanati dawiya doonape, do7aa doonapenne wordo nabiya doonape keyishin be7as.
REV 16:14 Enti malaatata oothiya tuna ayyaanata. He heedzu tuna ayyaanati Ubbaafe Wolqaama Xoossaa gita gallasan hananaw de7iya olas shiishanaw alame kawota ubbaako baana.
REV 16:15 “Heko, ta kaysoda yaana! Asa sinthan kallotonaadanne yeellatonnaada barkidi, ba ma7uwa naagiya uray anjetidaysa!” yaagis.
REV 16:16 He tuna ayyaanati kawota Ibraawetho doonan Armagedoone geetetiya bessan shiishidosona.
REV 16:17 Laapuntha kiitanchoy ba xuu7an de7eysa carko bolla gussin, xoossa keethan de7iya araatape, “Poletis” giya wolqaama qaalay yis.
REV 16:18 Hessafe wol7anthi wol7amis; daday dhuuqis, biittay qaaxis. Asi sa7an medhetoosape biitti hessa mela qaaxo qaaxibeenna. Hessi ubbaafe aadhida qaaxo.
REV 16:19 Gita katamay heedza keyidi shaaketis; biitta ubban de7iya katamati dhaydosona. Xoossay gita katamaa Babiloone qopidi, ba iita hanqo woyne ushshay kumida xuu7aa iw immis.
REV 16:20 Yuushoy abban teqetida biittati dhaydosona; deretika bentibookona.
REV 16:21 Asaa bolla oytamanne ichashu kilo giraame mela deexiya wolqaama shachi salope bukis. Boshay daro iita gidiya gisho asay shacha bosha gisho Xoossaa baaddidosona.
REV 17:1 Laapun xuu7ata oykida laapun kiitanchotape issoy taako yidi, “Haaya; daro haathata bolla uttida gita laymatiya maccase bolla yaanaw de7iya pirdaa ta nena bessaana.
REV 17:2 Alamiya kawoti iira laymatidosona; alamen de7iya asayka I laymatetha woyniya uyidi mathotidosona” yaagis.
REV 17:3 He kiitanchoy tana Geeshsha Ayyaanan mela biitta efis. Yan issi maccasiya cashsha sunthay I bolla ubban xaafetidi uttida, zo7o do7aa toggidaaro be7as; he do7aas laapun huupheynne tammu kacey de7ees.
REV 17:4 He maccasiya kaalose ma7onne zo7o ma7o ma7asu; iya worqan, boncho shuchaninne inqo geetetiya al7o shuchan alleeqetasu. Iya ba kushen borsiyabaanne laymatetha tunatethan kumida worqa xuu7a oykasu.
REV 17:5 I som7on xuura ooso birshethay de7iya sunthay, “Gita Babilooney, laymatethasinne sa7an de7iya tunabaa ubbaas aayo” giya xuufey xaafetidi uttis.
REV 17:6 Qassi he maccasiya geeshshata suuthaanne Yesuusas markatishe hayqidaysata suuthaa uyada mathotidaaro ta be7ada malaaletas.
REV 17:7 Kiitanchoy taako, “Neeni ayis malaaletay? Taani new maccase xuura odaanne iya tookida laapun huupheynne tammu kacey de7iya do7aa xuura odaa odana.
REV 17:8 Neeni be7ida do7ay koyro de7ees, shin ha77i baawa. He do7ay ciimmo ollafe keyidi dhayos baana. Sa7i medhetoosape doomidi, de7o maxaafan enta sunthay xaafetiboonna sa7an de7iya asay, do7aa be7idi malaaletana. Hiza, I kase de7ees; ha77i baawa, shin sinthafe yaana.
REV 17:9 “Haysi cincatethinne akeeka koyees. Laapun huupheti maccasiya uttiya laapun dereta; hessati qassi laapun kawota.
REV 17:10 Entafe ichashu kawoti kundidosona. Issoy ha77i gakanaw haarees; hanko Kawoy yibeenna. I yidi guutha wode takanaw bessees.
REV 17:11 Sinthe de7ida do7ay, ha77i baynaysi, I ba huuphen hospuntho do7aa. I laapun do7atape issuwa; I dhayanaw bees.
REV 17:12 “Neeni be7ida tammu kaceti haaro doomiboonna tammu kawota. Shin enti do7aara issife issi saate kawotidi haaranaw entaw maati imetana.
REV 17:13 Enta ubbaas issi qofay de7ees; enti banta wolqaanne banta maata do7aas immana.
REV 17:14 Enti Dorsaara oletana, shin dorsay godata Godaanne kawota Kawo gidiya gisho, I xeegidaysati, dooridaysatinne ammanetidaysati he kawota xoonana” yaagis.
REV 17:15 Kiitanchoy qassika taako, “Laymatiyara uttida he neeni be7ida haathati yarata, kawotethata, zerethatanne dumma dumma doonan odeteyisata.
REV 17:16 Qassi neeni be7ida tammu kaceynne do7ay laymatiyaro ixana. Enti iw de7iya ubbaba ekana. Qassi iyo kallo ashshananne I ashuwa midigana; yaatidi enti iyo taman xuuggana.
REV 17:17 Hiza, Xoossaa qaalay poletana gakanaw enta qofay issino gidana mela enti banta aysiya wolqaa do7aas immanaadanne Xoossay qopidaysa enti oothanaada enta wozanan Xoossay amo wothis.
REV 17:18 He neeni be7ida maccasiya sa7a kawota haariya gita katamiw” yaagis.
REV 18:1 Yaatidi, gita maati de7iya hara kiitanchoy salope wodhishin ta be7as. He kiitanchuwa bonchoy sa7a poo7isis.
REV 18:2 He kiitanchoy ba qaala dhoqu oothidi, “Iya kundasu! Gita Babilooney kundasu! Babilooney tuna ayyaanati aqiya bessi gidasu. Dumma dumma iitabatas keethe gidasu; tuna kafotinne do7ati shempiya bessi gidasu.
REV 18:3 Asa koche ubbaa ba laymatetha woyniya ushshasu. Sa7aa kawoti iira laymatidosona. I miikotethaafe dendoysan biittan de7iya zal7anchoti duretidosona” yaagis.
REV 18:4 Hessafe guye, ta salope haysada giya hara qaala si7as. “I nagaraa iira koxonna melanne, iya ekanaw de7iya seera hinte ekonna mela, ta deriyaw iipe keyite.
REV 18:5 Hiza, I nagaray salo gakanaw dooretis. Xoossay I naaquwa akeekis.
REV 18:6 Iya immidaysa mela zaaridi iw immite. Iya oothida oosuwas nam7u kushe iw zaarite. Iya giigisida ushsha bolla hinte nam7u kushe mathoyiya ushsha I xuu7an kunthite.
REV 18:7 Iya baw bonchetidaysadanne iw injetidaysa mela, iyo metoothitenne kayoyite. Iya ba wozanan, ‘Taani kaweeda uttas; ta azini bayna maccas gidike; taani ubbaka kayotike’ yaagasu.
REV 18:8 Hessa gisho, bosha ubbay, hargey, kayoynne koshi iyo issi gallas oykana. Qassi iya taman xuugetana; ayis giiko, I bolla pirdiya Xoossay wolqaama” yaagis.
REV 18:9 “Iira laymatidaysatinne I miikotethan de7ida, alamiya kawoti he katamiya xuugetin keyiya cuyaa be7ida wode iw waassidi yeekana.
REV 18:10 Enti he katame waayiya be7idi yayyida gisho, haaki eqidi, “ ‘Ha gita katame! Wolqaama katame! Babiloone, nena ayye! Neeni issi saate giddon ne pirda ekadasa’ yaagana.
